title: Te mate o Huntington: Ratonga mō ngā tūroro i Aiarangi ki te Raki 'āwangawanga'
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e tētahi tohunga nui o te mate o Huntington te ratonga mō ngā tūroro i Aiarangi ki te Raki he tino āwangawanga.
text: Nā Marie-Louise ConnollyBBC News NI Health Correspondent Patrick Morrison, ahorangi o ngā iranga tangata i te Hōhipera o Belfast City, i puta i te kore kaimahi tohunga. I whakapaea e ia te kāwanatanga he "hinganga" ngā tūroro i te mate o Huntington. He āhuatanga āhua kore nei, tuku iho, tino matatini hoki e pā ana ki ngā tāngata neke atu i te 120 i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ko ngā whakairinga kāore i whakakīa Ko te mate o Huntington i takea mai i tētahi ira hē e whakangaro ana i te wāhi matua o te roro, e pā ana ki ngā āhuatanga katoa o te oranga o te tangata tae atu ki ngā tukanga ā-tinana, hinengaro me te whanonga. "The current service is extremely overwhelmed and understaffed," Prof Morrison said. "Mō tētahi āhuatanga kino kāore anō kia piki ake te pūtea o ngā ratonga NHS e te kāwanatanga ki te tohu, kei te hapa tēnei i ngā whānau me te mate o Huntington." Kua mōhio te AO kāore he nēhi tohunga tūturu i tēnei wā puta noa i tētahi o ngā whakawhirinaki hauora e rima i Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te tiaki i ngā tūroro me tēnei āhuatanga pūmau, whakangoikore hoki. Ko te Belfast Health Trust anake te whakawhirinaki o Aiarangi ki te Raki e rua ngā pou nēhi mate o Huntington. Heoi anō, nā te mate o tētahi nēhi me tētahi atu mahi hurihuri, kāore anō kia kī te pou i tēnei wā. E tono ana i te āwhina Tata ki te 120 ngā tāne me ngā wāhine e pāngia ana e te mate o Huntington, engari e whakapono ana te whika tūturu he teitei ake i te maha o ngā take kāore anō kia kitea. Kua whakapā atu ngā tūroro mai i te County Fermanagh ki te Belfast Health Trust e tono āwhina ana. I roto i tētahi kōrero ki te HAU, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Whirinaki Hauora o Belfast "he uaua ki te tiki i tētahi nēhi tohunga hei mahi i tēnei tīma". "Kua whakahauhau mātou i ngā kaimahi tīariari e hiahia ana pea ki te tono mō te tūranga wātea," ka kī rātau. "Kua pānuitia anōtia te pōhi. I tēnei wā ka mahi tonu mātou i te pai ki te whakatutuki i ngā hiahia o ā mātou kaiwhakamahi ratonga. "There is currently a proposal in process to secure additional funding for a regional manager which would further enhance the service." I tēnei wā, kua kī atu ngā tūroro ki te AO e whakawhirinaki ana rātau ki o rātau whānau me ngā GP mō te āwhina. Ko tētahi o aua tūroro ko Anne Boyd, e noho ana i te uru o Belfast. 'Tino nanakia' I kitea te āhuatanga i te 11 marama ki mua, ka kī a Ms Boyd kei te ako a ia ki te tango i tētahi rā i te wā kotahi. "I tīmata ahau ki te kite i te nui o ngā huringa," tana kī. "I te whakataka ahau i ngā mea, a, ka hinga. " He āhua rewera anō i roto i ahau. He kino ahau, he uaua ki te noho tahi. Ehara ahau i te tangata pai." He rerekē te haere o te mate o Huntington. Ko te hunga kua pāngia, kua kite rānei i te mamae o te tangata e arohaina ana, kua whakaahuatia he tino nanakia, i te mea ka pā ki te hinengaro me te tinana. Ko te pouri e ai ki a Ms Boyd, i te mea kua pāngia tōna pūmahara kua kore e taea e ia te pānui. E pāngia ana hoki tōna ārohitanga me tōna nekeneke, ā, i a ia e herea ana ki tōna kāinga i te nuinga o te wā, ka pāngia hoki ia e te pouri. "E maranga ana ahau i ia rā kāore i te tino mōhio he aha tērā pea ka kawea," tana kī. "He tino uaua, ehara i te mea mōku anake, engari mō taku whānau. E hiahia ana hoki rātau ki te āwhina." E ai ki a Prof Morrison, ko te mate o Huntington tētahi o ngā mate kino rawa atu ka taea e te tangata. "Ka tīmata ki ngā raruraru nekeneke, ā, ka haere ki te pokapū o te roro," tana kī. "He take pūmahara, he pahūtanga riri, ā, ka mārire te tangata. Tērā anō ētahi āhuahira ā-hinengaro, ā-hinengaro hoki." Matawaenga whakamātautau: Ko te tangata e mate ana i te mate o Huntington, e 50% te tūponotanga ki te tuku atu ki ā rātou tamariki. E ai ki a Prof Morrison, he tino pānga ki ngā whānau. Kua tātaritia hoki te tuakana o Ms Boyd. Kua whakatau tētahi atu tuakana kia kaua e whakamātauria. Kei te anga atu hoki ana tamariki ki te matawaenga mēnā ka whakamātauria, kāore rānei. Kua tīmata kē tētahi tama i te tukanga tohutohu. "Ko tā rātou kōwhiringa," te kī a Ms Boyd. "Ka whakatau katoa rātau i tō rātou ake wā he aha te mea pai rawa mō rātou." I kitea i te Hānuere, ka kī a Ms Boyd i puta mai te rongo hei whakamāmā. Taratahitanga "I te rā i kōrero mai ai te tākuta ki aku hua ka kī atu ahau 'whakawhetai ki te Atua - e mōhio ana ahau he aha te hē ki a au'," tana kī. "I kōrero te tākuta mo taku tauhohenga - engari i kī rātau ko te whaea me te kuia i roto i ahau. " Ināianei kua mōhio ahau, ka taea e au te haere tonu ki tōku oranga me te whakarite i ngā mahi." E kī ana te hunga kua noho tahi me te mate mo te nuinga o nga tau, ka taea e ia te wehi, te whakamā me te taratahi, ehara i te tangata kotahi anake, engari i roto i ngā whakatupuranga whai muri. I kī a Prof Morrison kei te arokē te ratonga i runga i te Belfast Health Trust. "Ehara i te mea kei te whiwhi mātou i ētahi atu tono mō te whakamātautau, engari e mārama ana he nui ake ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te āwhina," tana kī. 'Huri-poto' "E rua ngā pou nēhi i Belfast e mārama ana kāore i te nui. E hiahiatia ana e ia whakawhirinaki ngā tīma nēhi whakatapua. "He āhuatanga āhua kore nei tēnei, ā, e hiahiatia ana te nēhi tohunga. Ka whakararuraru i te katoa, tae atu ki ngā kaimahi. "Nō reira me whakarite i te wāhi o te kāwanatanga ina tae mai ki te pūtea tiaki." I Pākehā me Ingarangi, kotahi neke atu rānei te nēhi tohunga mō ia 50 tūroro me Huntington. I kī a Prof Morrison kei te hurihia ngā tūroro i Aiarangi ki te Raki. "Tērā anō ētahi wae nēhi tohunga me ngā kāinga nēhi i Pākehā," tana kī. "I Aiarangi ki te Raki kāore ngā tūroro i te whiwhi i te tiaki tika i te wāhi tika." 'Pai ake te māramatanga' Kei te kohikohi te take i waenganui i ngā tohunga hauora i roto i te hapori, ā, kua whakatūria e te Huntington's Disease Association of Northern Ireland tētahi kaiwhakahaere - Sorcha McGuinness. Kua ārahi te kaiwhakahauhau motika tangata i ngā tūhuratanga ki ngā mana o te hunga noho kore. "Me nui ake te whakauru i te kaiwhakahaere mō ētahi atu pūtea mō ngā tūroro me ō rātou whānau," te kī a Ms McGuinness. "Me pai ake hoki te māramatanga me te mōhiotanga i waenganui i te iwi whānui. E whai ana ahau ki te mahi i tēnā." The Northern Ireland Rare Disease Partnership (NIRDP) is holding a series of open public meetings next week allowing people to help shape the future of their healthcare. Tae atu ki te 100,000 ngā tāngata ahakoa he tūroro, he kaitiaki, he mema whānau rānei e pāngia ana e te mate āhua kore nei i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Kei roto i ngā herenga: te mate neurone mīhini (MND), te mate uaua, te spina bifida, te mate o Huntington, te vasculitis, te atrophy uaua tuaiwi, te lupus me ngā momo mate pukupuku.

title: Te whakapae a Rolf Harris: E urupare ana a Ahitereiria ki te hinganga o te whetū
summary: Ko Rolf Harris tētahi o ngā Ahitereiria tino rongonui i rāwāhi - ināianei ko ia te tino rongonui.
text: Jon DonnisonSydney correspondent Kua whiwhi te whakawā i te whānuitanga i konei, ā, he rite tonu te rongo whārangi o mua. He tōmuri rawa te whakataunga mō te nuinga o ngā nūpepa o Ahitereiria, engari i oma te nūpepa o Sydney Daily Telegraph me tētahi kupu matua ngāwari "HARA." Ahakoa i mahue i a Hāhi a Ahitereiria ki Ingarangi i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ināianei ka anga atu a ia ki ētahi atu utu e mauria mai ana ki konei. 'Octopus' I te wā o te whakawā, he tokomaha nga wāhine o Ahitereiria i haere mai ki mua e kiia ana i whakararurarutia rātau e Hāhi i te wā o te hokinga mai ki tōna whenua whānau. E rua ngā kaiwhakaatu reo irirangi e kī ana i whāwhā a Hāhi i a rātau i muri i ngā uiuinga. E kī ana a Hēmi, he kaihautū reo irirangi i Pehi, i tūkinotia ia e Hāhi i muri i tētahi uiuinga i te tau 2000. E kī ana a ia ko te tangata e kīia ana e ia ko "te wheke" i pana i a ia ki runga i te pakitara, ka hopu i ōna puku, ka miria ōna uma. E whakapae ana tētahi kaipānui tuarua o Jane Marwick i whāwhā a ia i a ia e whakaahua ana ki a Hāhi i muri i tētahi uiuinga i te tau 2001. Kāore anō tētahi wahine kia kī mēnā ka pēhi rātau i ngā utu ki konei. Ko tētahi wahine o Ahitereiria, ko Tonya Lee, nāna i whakarere tōna mana ki te ingoamuna, tētahi o te hunga i mau i te kēhi ki te whakawā i te UK. I kōrero a ia ki te kōti i whakaekea ia e Hāhi i runga i tētahi haerenga "moemoeā" ki Rāwāhi me tētahi rōpū whare tapere taitamariki i te tau 1986. I kī a ia i pōhiritia ia e Hāhi kia noho i runga i tōna turi i roto i tētahi pāpara, kātahi ka tūkino i a ia. E kī ana a ia ka whakaekea anō ia e ia i waho o te whare kaukau. Mō ngā Ahitereiria pakeke ake, ko Hāhi tētahi o ngā kawenga kaweake tino rongonui o te whenua, he ingoa kāinga. Ahakoa e noho ana i UK, he kanohi auau a ia i runga i te pouaka whakaata o Ahitereiria i nga tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua, 70 me te 80. I whakaurua ia ki roto i te Hall of Fame o te Australian Recording Industry Association. Tae noa ki tērā tau, ka noho tana papa kōpikopiko pūoro rongonui i te Whare Taonga ā-Motu o Ahitereiria i Canberra. 'He kōaro kino' Engari he tokomaha o te whakatupuranga taitamariki e kī atu ki a koe, tae noa ki tēnei take, kāore anō rātau kia rongo i a ia. I whānau a Rolf Harris i te tapa taone o Perth o Bassendean i te tau 1930. I heke ōna mātua ki Ahitereiria mai i Weera. "Ko te tama mai i Bassendean", e mōhiotia ana ia, e whakahonoretia ana ki tētahi tohu whakatakoto ki tētahi o ngā ara hīkoi o te taone. Ināianei he kaupapa hei keri ake. Ināianei kua tapaina taua "tama" he "kōaro kino" e te ture. I te tau 2008 i muri i tana kīanga me mutu te "amuamu mo te rawakore" me te "whakaweto i to rātau kai" ki te "horoi i nga tiriti." Engari i te nuinga o te wā, tae noa ki tēnei take, he mā te whakaahua o Hāhi. I whakarārangitia ia e tētahi poipoi i roto i te Australian Reader's Digest i mua i te putanga mai o tēnei kēhi i a ia i waenganui i ngā tāngata tino pono o te whenua. He torutoru noa iho ka whakawhirinaki ki a ia ināianei.

title: E whakahē ana te MP i ngā pirihimana o Pakihi i runga i te 'kōhuru' o Jane Khalaf
summary: I patua tētahi tauira Peretania i Tiamana mā te inu i tana inu, kua kī tētahi MP Mahi.
text: I mate a Jane Khalaf, 19, mai i Huddersfield, i te 20 o Whiringa ā Rangi, e waru rā i muri i te whakaurunga ki te tautoko ora i te Hōhipera o Hato Marien i Cologne. I a ia e kōrero ana i roto i te Whare o Ngātahi, ka whakahē a Barry Sheerman, te MP Mahi mō Huddersfield, i ngā pirihimana Tiamana mo te kore e uiui i tōna matenga. I runga a Ms Khalaf i tētahi haerenga whakawhiti mai i te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria. E whakaarotia ana i purua ia ki runga i tētahi mīhini tautoko ora i muri i tana ngahoro i te hōhipera i te wā o te hākari ā-tau i te taone nui o Tiamana ki te uru. I kī a Tēnā Sheerman kāore he āwhina mō te whānau o Ms Khalaf mai i nga mana o Tiamana. I karangatia e ia he āwhina mai i te Tari Tawahi i te wā o ngā Pātai a te Tari Tawahi i te Whare o Ngātahi. "Kua patua kinotia tētahi kōtiro i tōku wātūtanga i Pakihi," te kī a te MP. "Kaore he tūhuratanga pirihimana ahakoa he whakaaturanga katoa i werohia tana inu - i paitini a ia." I kī a John Bercow, te Kaikōrero o te Whare o Ngātahi, kua mōhio te Tari Tawahi ki ngā māharahara a Tēnā Sheerman. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria kua tūtaki ōna māngai ki te whānau ki te tuku tautoko. "Ka taea e mātou te whakaū kua mate tētahi o ā mātou ākonga i a ia e ako ana i tētahi whare wānanga hoa i Tiamana. " Kei te whakapā atu mātou ki ngā mana i Tiamana me te UK, ā, e tū ana mātou ki te āwhina anō ki ngā wāhi e taea ai e mātou." Kāore anō kia urupare ngā pirihimana o Cologne ki tētahi tono kōrero mō tētahi kōrero.

title: Ko Nellie's Tree i Aberford i tapaina ko te rākau UK o te tau
summary: Kua karaunatia tētahi rākau beech i honoa ki roto i te āhua N hei whakaoho i tētahi whaiāipo ko Nellie te ingoa, ko te rākau o te tau o UK.
text: I patua e Nellie's Tree, i Aberford, West Yorkshire, tētahi redwood nui i Aiarangi ki te Raki, he rākau Pākehā me tētahi oki Welsh hei koko i te paraihe whānui. Tata ki te 100 tau ki muri, ka honoa e Vic Stead he tarawai i waenganui i ētahi atu tokorua hei hanga i te reta N i a ia e haere ana ki te tūtaki i a Nellie. I mārama tonu te toa o te hītori mātao o te rākau i te ngākau o ngā kaipōti, me te toa i pānuitia i runga i te Whakaaturanga Kotahi o TE WĀ. I mahi tahi hoki te nekehanga ātaahua a Vic me Nellie, i te wā i haere ai te tokorua ki te mārena me te tīmata i tētahi whānau. Ka noho tonu te rākau hei wāhi pai mō ngā whaiāipo ki te pakū i te pātai. I whakaingoatia mō te whakataetae e te mokopuna a Vic rāua ko Nellie, a Chris Lund, i kōrerotia te pūrākau i a ia e tamariki ana e ōna tīpuna i a ia e hīkoi ana i te rākau. Mō te whakataetae, e hia rau ngā rākau i whakamuatia, me ngā whakaingoatanga i whakahekea ki ngā toa ā-rohe mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, Ingarangi, Pākehā me Weera. Ināianei ka haere tonu te rākau a Nellie ki te tohu i te UK i te whakataetae rākau Pākehā o te tau i te tīmatanga o te tau 2019. I kī a Chris ko tōna wikitōria he "takoha tika ki ōku tīpuna". "I am absolutely astounded and hugely happy with the support the tree has had, I think it's just the wonderful story behind it," he said. "E whakaatu ana i te hira o te pare i te āhua e karapoti ana i a tātau, me ngā mea hoki ka ngaro i a tātau ki te kore tātau e tūpato." I whakaahuatia e te Woodland Trust, e whakahaere ana i te whakataetae, te rākau he "kōhatu ki te raki". Kaye Brennan, lead campaigner for the trust, said: "We hope this tree's tale stands as a beacon for the need to protect our special trees and the wonderful tales they have to say." Ko te toa me ngā kaiomaoma o UK:

title: I tukua te tangata i muri i te whakakorenga o te whakapae hinonga tōtahi
summary: Kua tukua tētahi tangata i te whare herehere i muri i te rironga ko te tangata tuatahi mai i te tau 2016 kia whakakorea tētahi whakapae kōhuru hinonga tahi.
text: Nā Ciaran TraceySenior Producer, e 5 Live Breakfast Joint enterprise e whakamahia ana hei whakahē i ngā whakapae i roto i ngā take e pā ana ki te rōpū ahakoa kāore rātau i tūtuki i te moto mate, engari i kitea pea ngā mahi taikaha a o rātau hoa mahi. Engari i te tau 2016, ka kī ngā kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Matua kua hē te whakamāramatanga o te ture. Kua tukua a John Crilly i muri i te 13 tau i roto i te whare herehere. I hoatu ki a ia he whiu ora mo te kōhuru me te tāhaetanga i te tau 2005 i muri i tana pakarutanga me tana hoa mahi a Rawiri Pirihitini ki te kāinga o Aotearoa Maduemezia, e 71 tau te pakeke i Manchester. I mate a Tēnā Maduemezia i muri i te kōwhao i te kanohi e Flynn. Kua whakamahia hoki te ture hinonga tōtahi i roto i te maha o ngā kēhi kōtaha tiketike - tae atu ki te whakahē i ngā mema o te rōpū nāna i patu a Stephen Lawrence. Engari i whakataua e ngā kaiwhakawā he hē te whakamahi i te "matakite" hei whakamātautau tika. 'Kāore he whāinga ki te whakamate' I tōna wā i roto i te whare herehere, ka tīmata a Crilly i tētahi tohu ture. I tana rongonga mo te tahuritanga o te ture hinonga tōtahi i te tau 2016, i whakapono ia ka pā ki tana kēhi. I kī atu a ia ki te Reo Irirangi 5 e whakapono ana a ia kia kaua rawa ia e herea ki te kōhuru i te wāhi tuatahi. "Ehara ahau i te kahunga rongoā taikaha. I ngaro ahau. I ngaro ahau i roto i te rongoā. He kino tōku oranga, kua hurihia e au, engari kāore au i hara ki te kōhuru. E tino whakaae ana ahau ki tāku i mahi ai, ā, he hē. He mea nui tēnā ki a au. Ehara ahau i te kōhuru." I muri i te pīra, ka tautohe a Crilly ki te patu tangata. I muri i te whakahaere, ka puta mai te mataku i te patunga o ngā tono a te hunga hara e whakatūpato ana i o rātau whakapae - engari kāore anō kia puta. Ka kī a Crilly: "Ki te tangohia e koe te kawenga matakite o te whakatika, ka haere tonu ki te whāinga, e tika ana kia mahia e koe, e kore e taea te whakahē i ahau ki te kōhuru. Nā reira he tino ngāwari." Ka kī atu te whānau o Tēnā Maduemezia ki te AO e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakatakoto i ngā mahi ki muri i a rātau. Ka kī a Crilly: "Mēnā e hiahia ana rātau ki te tūtaki i a au, e mōhio ana ahau he uaua engari kua rite ahau ki te mahi i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e au, kua rite ahau ki te āwhina i a rātou ahakoa te aha, e pouri ana ahau." E mōhio ana te AO ki ētahi atu take e rua neke atu rānei kua tautuhia ki te whakatūpato i tētahi whakapae mo te kōhuru i raro i te hinonga hono. 'Riri me te matekiri' i kī te whānau o Tēnā Maduemezia i roto i tētahi kōrero ki te HAU: "He pānga kino tēnei mahi ki te whānau i pau i ngā tau maha ki te whakarite i te matenga o to rātau pāpā. " Kātahi ka taea e koe te whakaaro i to rātau riri me te matekiri i te whakamōhiotanga atu ki a rātau e nga pirihimana kua whakarewaina e Tēnā Crilly tētahi tono tuarua ki tōna whakapae (i rahua tana tuatahi i te tau 2007). I whakaaetia tana tono ki te Kōti Tiketike. "He whakarihariha te rongo i a ia e haere atu ana me te kore whakaoti i tana whiu mo tana wāhi i roto i te kōhurutanga o to mātau pāpā. " Ko ēnei whakahaere o te Kōti Tiketike e whakawhirinaki ana ki te hunga hara, ā, e tata ana ki te whakarere i ngā whakaaro, te whakaaro me ngā whakaaro o ngā tūpāpaku me ō rātou whānau, ka āwhina ki te whakararuraru me te tukituki i te whakaaro tūmatanui ki te pūnaha tika. "E mārama ana mātau kua huri a Crilly i tōna oranga i a ia i roto i te whare herehere, ā, kua whiwhi hoki i tētahi tohu ture. Kei te ora a ia. E hiahia ana mātou kia pai a ia, engari e hiahia ana hoki mātou kia ora to mātau pāpā, kia wātea hoki ki te ora i tōna oranga. "Ahakoa ēnei matekiritanga, kua whakatau te whānau kia neke atu. E whakawhetai ana mātou ki te tūmatanui, ā, e tino whakamihi ana mātou ki tā rātou tautoko puta noa i tēnei whakamatautau."

title: Kōtaha: Tūtaki ki te Komihana Pirihimana o Bernard Hogan-Howe
summary: Ko Bernard Hogan-Howe, te Komihana Pirihimana o Metropolitan kātahi anō ka whakaritea, e uru ana ki te pire mo te "kairiri hara hinengaro kotahi" i rapua e te hēkeretari kāinga.
text: I karangatia e Ēnā Me te waea i muri i tana tuatahi o Tā Paul Stephenson, me tana kaiāwhina ko John Yates, i waenganui i te whakahē i te mahi a te Met i roto i te heitara waea. A, i tino whakatūria te rangatira Pirihimana o Merseyside ki te mahi i te mahi a te pirihimana matua o UK, i karangatia kia mahi hei komihana tuarua o te Met i te oho o nga tukunga iho. I roto i ngā tau e rima i Merseyside ki te tau 2009, i hangaia e Tēnā Hogan-Howe tētahi kōtaha tiketike mā ngā kōrerorero tukutuku auau me ngā pāohotanga, ngā āhuatanga i runga i ngā waea reo irirangi paetata me ngā eke hoiho puta noa i te pokapū o te taone. A, i whiwhi a ia i ngā kaiwaiata mo tana whakatata uaua ki te whanonga ārai pāpori me te tūnga i runga i te hara pū i te oho o te tākarotanga kino o Rhys Jones, 11 tau. I whānau mai i Sheffield, ka tīmata te pikinga o te kaingākau whutupōro i roto i te rārangi ki ngā Pirihimana o South Yorkshire i te tau 1979. 'Tūnga uaua' I mahi a ia hei āpiha waka, he kaitirotiro me te rangatira rohe, i whiwhi i tētahi MA i te ture mai i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford me tētahi tīwhikete i roto i te mātauranga mai i te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge i te huarahi. I te tau 1997 ka neke a ia ki ngā pirihimana o Merseyside, ā, e whā tau i muri iho ka uru ki te Met hei komihana kaiāwhina, i mua i tana hokinga ki Liverpool i te tau 2004. I taua wā, ka heke te hara i te tuatoru, ā, i tapahia ngā pāpātanga whanonga ārai pāpori i te haurua mā te huarahi manawanui kore. I te tau 2006 ka patua e ia nga kupu matua i te tau 2006 mo te rere i muri i tētahi atekōkiri inu whakapae i muri i tana kitenga i a ia i tana motokā ā-kaihautū. Ko Tēnā Hogan-Howe te tangata e whakahaere ana i te tau 2007, i te wā i pūhia ai a Rhys Jones, 11 tau, i a ia e haere ana ki te kāinga mai i te mahi whutupōro. Na te patunga i wehi te iwi, a, he amuamu mai i ētahi i roto i te pāpāho i te korenga o te hopunga inamata. Engari i whiwhi a Tēnā Hogan-Howe i tana tangata i a Hakihea 2008 i te wā i hereheretia ai a Hōne Mercer, 18, ā, he tokomaha hoki ngā mema o tana rōpū i maukatia hoki. 'Ūkui whakaaro' I taua tau, ka whakapaea e ia ētahi kaiwhakawā he mārire ki te hara pū mā te whakarapa i ngā rerenga whakahau e rima tau mo te pupuri i tētahi pū. I karangatia hoki e ia kia panaia te hunga hara pū i nga pirihimana i nga kāinga. I whakatūria e Tēnā Hogan-Howe te tīma Matrix tohunga ki te rutu i te hara pū - ko te tuatahi o tōna momo i waho o Rāwāhi te upoko o mua o te wae, a Det Supt Sloane, i kī ai: "I tana taenga mai he whakaaro mārama tōna. Ko te rutu i te hara whakaritea, te hara e pā ana ki te rōpū, engari kia tika hoki te tautoko i ngā tūpāpaku, i pūruatia e ngā pirihimana taiao kaha." I mua i tana wehenga atu i Merseyside, ka tono ia kia whakakapi i a Tā Hugh Orde hei rangatira kātipa o te Ratonga Pirihimana o Aiarangi ki te Raki. Heoi anō, i mahue atu a ia i te tukanga tono kia mahi i tētahi tūranga ki te Kaitirotiro Pirihimana o Tōna Nui. I karangatia ia ki te Tūtaki i a Hōngongoi ki te tautoko i te Komihana Whakatau o Tim Godwin - ā muri ake nei he tauwhāinga mo te mahi matua - i te mau mai i te pūmautanga ki te tōpana i muri i te tukunga iho o Tā Paul Stephenson. I kī te hēkeretari kāinga me te Koromatua o Rānōna, a Poihāne, he "hinengaro kotahi" rātau i roto i ta rātau whakatau kia whakatūria a Tēnā Hogan-Howe. I kōrerotia e Mrs May tana "pūkete aroturuki tino pai" i te whakaiti i te hara i kitea ai te take whakatau.

title: I whakaorangia te reme i muri i te takanga ki te āpiti i runga i a Lewis
summary: Kua tiakina e nga kaiwhakaora maunga tētahi reme i taka ki roto i te āpiti i ngā Moutere ki te Uru.
text: I mau te kararehe i muri i te takanga tata ki te one o Stoth i Ness i te Motu o Lewis. I kī te SPCA o Pirihitini i rapu āwhina mai i te Tīma Whakaora Maunga o Hebrides nā te whenua. Mā te whakamahi i ngā pūkenga whakaora taura, ka taea e ngā mema o te tīma te whakaora i te reme me te whakahoki ki tōna whaea. I te marama o Me me whakaorangia tētahi atu reme i roto i ngā āhuatanga ōrite mai i ngā pari o Tolsta ki te Raki i Te Raki o Te Raki o T 'Kawa pūnoa' a Maggie Adkins, he kaitirotiro āwhina i te SSPCA, i kī: "E tino whakawhetai ana ahau ki te Tīma Whakaora Maunga o Hebrides, i tēnei wā uaua me te nui ake o ngā rāhuitanga nā te raka. " E tino mōhiotia ana tā rātou tautoko me te āwhina tonu. Ki te kore rātou, kāore e taea e au te whakaora i ngā reme tārewa." I kī te kaiārahi o te tīma MRT o Hebrides, a Charlie Greenwood, he "tino māmā" te whakaora, ahakoa he iti noa iho ngā huringa ki te kawa pūnoa kia taea ai te tawhiti pāpori. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mai i te mutunga o Poutāpeta, kāore i taea e te tīma te whakahaere i tana hōtaka whakangungu auau, ka whakarato ēnei whakaora kararehe i te wā hei pupuri i ngā pūkenga matua me te āwhina i tētahi kararehe e mate ana. " E tūmanako ana te tīma ki te tīmata anō i te whakangungu i ngā wā tata nei, ā, ka haere tonu ki te āwhina i tētahi tangata, kararehe rānei e hiahia ana ki te āwhina."

title: Ngā tirohanga: Ka taea te whakawhirinaki ki ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau ki te pōti?
summary: Tekau mā ono me te 17 tau pea ka taea e ngā pakeke te pōti i roto i te taupānga rangatiratanga o Pākehā. Engari me mātua rātou?
text: Ko ngā pōti a Grant Costello MSYP, Scottish Youth Parliament (SYP) i te 16 e pā ana ki te whakaae ki ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau he tāngata atamai, haumaru, kōrero e tika ana kia kitea he tangata whenua katoa. Kei te whakaae kē mātou ki ngā pakeke 16 tau e āhei ana ki te whakatau i ngā whakataunga wā roa nā te mea ka whakaaetia rātou kia mahi wā katoa, kia uru ki te Taua, me te utu tāke. Ki taku whakaaro kāore e taea e koe te tautohetohe ka taea e te rangatahi te whakatau kia kōwhiri kia mārena, kia whai tamariki rānei, engari kāore e taea te kōwhiri me pēhea te pōti. Engari ehara i te mea mō te āheinga anake. E whakawhirinaki ana te rangatahi ki ngā ratonga tūmatanui pēnei i te waka me ngā kura, engari kāore ō rātou mana ki ngā kaupapa here e pā ana ki ō rātou oranga - ehara i te mea kua whakakorea rātou. Mā te whakaheke i te pakeke pōti ka whai wāhi ēnei rangatahi ki te kōrero mō te iwi e hiahia ana rātau ki te noho hei wāhi. E mahi kē ana te Pāremata Rangatahi o Pākehā me ngā kawenga o ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau; Whakaarohia e hia anō ka uru ina taea e rātou katoa te pōti. E mōhio ana koe he ōrite te pānga o ngā take hira ki te rangatahi, e whakaae ana ka taea e rātau te whakatau, me te whakahauhau i a rātau kia noho hei wāhanga o te iwi - ko ērā ngā take e whakaaetia ai ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau ki te pōti. Ka taea te whai i a Grant Costello i runga i te Twitter @GrantDCostello a Piripi Cowley, Te Whare Wānanga o Rāhui He hē te nuinga o ngā tohenga mō te whakaheke i te pakeke pōti. Hei tauira, ehara i te pono ka taea e koe te "mate mō tō whenua engari kaua e pōti". Kāore e whakaaetia te hunga kei raro iho i te 18 ki te ratonga raina o mua. E whakaae ana hoki mātou i raro iho i te 18 tau kia uru ki ngā ope taua me te whakaaetanga mātua, nā te mea kāore mātou i te whakaaro kua pakeke rawa rātou ki te whakawā ko ia anake. Ditto (i Ingarangi me Weera) mō te mārenatanga, i raro iho i te 18 tau e hiahiatia ana e te whakaaetanga mātua. Nō reira mēnā kei te kimi tauritenga tātau, mēnā he pakeke e whakaarotia ai te tangata he "pakeke" e te kāwanatanga - arā, ko te pakeke e whakaaetia ai rātou ki te mahi i ngā mea, me te kore hiahia whakaaetanga mātua, ā, nā rātou anō i kōwhiri - ko taua pakeke he 18 i te 16. I te tirohanga a te Rōpū Hansard i te whakapono me te mātauranga tūmatanui i roto i te kaupapa ture, kotahi noa iho te wāhi i kī ai te nuinga o te iwi e mārama ana rātau ki te take me te whakaae ki te tūnga o nāianei: a, ko tērā te pakeke pōti o te 18. He huarahi pōhēhē ki te whakapakari anō i te kāwanatanga ā iwi: Kimihia te take anake e mārama ana, e whakaae ana te nuinga, kātahi ka mahi i te tauaro. Kāore e kitea e ngā panekōrero o te hunga i raro iho i te 18 he tautoko nui mō te whakaheke ki te 16. Ka taea te whai i a Piripi Cowley i runga i te Twitter @philipjcowley Ben Page, Ipsos Mori I pātai atu mātou ki ngā pakeke 11-18 tau i ngā tau tata nei mēnā i whakaaro rātou me whakaheke te pakeke pōti, ā, ko te haurua anake o rātou i whakaaro me whakaheke ki te 16. He iti rawa ngā whiriwhiringa i waenganui i te 18 ki te 24 tau, kāore e taea te hoatu pōti ki ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau te rerekētanga. Ko te nuinga o ngā pakeke 18 ki te 24 tau kāore e pōti i te pōti nui, kāore rānei i te rēhitatia, kāore rānei i te huri kia iti iho ai tō rātou pānga i te hunga pakeke. Tekau mā waru tau te pakeke e whakamātau ana i te pōti, ā, ka iti iho te whiriwhiringa i waenganui i te 19 me te 20 tau. E kī ana rātau kāore i tino rerekē ki tā rātou i pai ai. Ko te nuinga o te wāhanga o te kaupapa ture e kī ana te nuinga o te iwi e tautokona ana e rātou, ko te pōti i te 18. I roto i tā mātou pōti hōu rawa i kite ai mātou ko ngā pakeke 25-34 tau, he taitamariki i te putanga mai o te whitiāhua Braveheart i te waenganui o ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, e tino ngākau nui ana ki te rangatiratanga mō Pākehā, ehara i te 18-24 tau." Ka taea te whai i a Pene Whārangi i runga i te Twitter @benatipsosmori Ahorangi Kāreti o Kingi, Te Pāremata o Te Pāremata o Pirihitini, ā, ko te nuinga o te SNP, tērā pea ka hoatu te pōti ki ngā pakeke 16 tau i te mea he kaupapahere SNP kia whakahekea te māngai ki te 16 mō ngā pōti me ngā taupānga katoa. E manakohia ana ahau e nga pōti i te 16. He pono he iti iho te whiriwhiringa i waenganui i nga kaipōti taitamariki. I te pōtitanga nui o te tau 2005, e 44% noa iho o ngā pakeke 18-24 tau i pōti. Engari ko te hunga neke atu i te 16 e herea ana ki ngā ture tāke, mahi, mārena, tae atu ki te ture taihara. Anō hoki, kei te kura ngā pakeke 16 tau, ā, ka whiwhi pea i te tikanga pōti mai i ā rātou akoranga ā-iwi, kirirarau rānei. I te wā ka tae rātau ki te 18, he tokomaha kua mahue i te kura, ka wareware i a rātau akoranga. Nā reira mā te whakahekenga i te pakeke pōti ka tīmata anō te painga o te taitamariki i roto i ngā tōrangapū. Engari ki te whakahekea te manaakitanga, me noho mō ngā pōti katoa, kaua e tīpako. Ko te tikanga kia mahia i muri i te taupatupatu katoa i te Pāremata me te whenua. Mā te whakaheke i te pakeke pōti mō te taupānga o Pirihitini ka mōrearea pea te tikanga tika o te putanga. Mēnā ka toa, ka ngaro rānei te taupānga i runga i te nuinga whāiti, ā, te āhua nei e tohu ana ngā whakaaturanga rangahau i tārewa te toenga e ngā tau 16 me te 17 tau, ka kore pea e whakaae te hunga ngaro ki te whakaae ki te hua. Ko Dr Inaki Sagarzazu, Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o T He maha ngā whenua i Amerika Rātini kua whakahekea te pakeke pōti, kua ngana rānei ki te mahi pēnā i ngā tau tata nei. Heoi anō, me te iti iho o te auau whai wāhitanga o te iwi taitamariki e pātai ana he aha ngā whakahau i muri i te whakatinanatanga o ēnei huringa? Kua kitea tonutia e te rangahau mō te whiriwhiringa kaipōti, puta noa i ngā whenua rerekē me ngā pūnaha kāwanatanga, he iti iho te whai wāhitanga i te awhe pakeke o raro iho i te toharite o te whiriwhiringa. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, ahakoa te āhua nei he taitamariki hohe i roto i ngā mahi tōrangapū, ko te mea pono he iti iho te pōti a ngā whakatupuranga tamariki. E herea ana tēnei whai wāhitanga iti iho ki tētahi pōti e iti iho ana te hiahia ki ngā tōrangapū i ngā rōpū tawhito ake. Heoi anō, ahakoa tēnei pono, ko ngā kāwanatanga i Amerika Rātini - me ētahi atu rohe - e whakatoko ana i te whakaititanga o te iwi whānui pōti ki raro iho i te 18. Ko Rafael Correa i Ekuatoa, ko Hugo Chavez i Venezuela me Christina Kirchner i waenganui i nga kaiārahi e whakatairanga ana i ēnei mahi. Te āhua nei he mārama noa iho ēnei mahi i runga i ngā whakaaturanga ki tētahi mokatere whai wāhitanga nui i waenganui i te pōti taitamariki.

title: Ko te whakawhitinga zebra Ahu-3 tuatahi o UK i hangaia i St John's Wood
summary: Ko te mea e whakaarotia ana ko te whakawhitinga zebra "Ahu-3" tuatahi o UK kua peitatia ki tētahi huarahi ki te raki o Rāwāhi ki te whakapōturi i ngā waka.
text: Kua whakaurua te whakaaro ōmata, e waihanga ana i tētahi rākeitanga māngi, ki St John's Wood e te Kaunihera Taone o Westminster hei wāhanga o tētahi whakamātautau 12 marama. E whai ana te nekehanga i te hanganga o ngā aronui ōrite i ētahi atu whenua. I kī te AA he "whai painga te whakamātautau" engari i whakatūpato i te haumarutanga o ngā atekōkiri me ngā kaiwaewae. He tino tata te ara hīkoi i St John's Wood High Street ki te whakawhitinga tino rongonui o Rāwāhi - te mea i whakapūmautia e The Beatles mō Abbey Road. I waihangatia i muri i te whakaarahia o ngā māharahara mō te haumarutanga huarahi e ngā tangata whenua me tētahi kura pātata. I kī te Kaunihera Taone o Westminster kua "whakamātauria" te hoahoa kia haumaru ake ai ngā huarahi, me tētahi whakawhitinga ōrite i New Delhi, Īnia, e ahu ana ki te tere toharite e taka ana mai i te 31mph (50kph) ki te 19mph (30kph). I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te AA me "whakamātau ngā mana o Rāwāhi i ngā huarahi hou" hei whakapai ake i te haumarutanga i te wā e pākaha ana ngā huarahi ki ngā waka rerenga kē. Heoi anō, i whakatūpato rātau nā te mea i mahi ki tētahi atu wāhi kāore pea e mahi i Rāwāhi nā ngā hoahoa huarahi o te taone nui nā reira "me aroturuki tōna pūkete haumaru".

title: Ka whakarewaina te ringa waea hiko Intel tuatahi o Motorola i UK
summary: Kua tukua e te wae Motorola a Google tana waea atamai hiko Intel tuatahi.
text: I takea te Razr i i runga anō i tētahi tauira awhe waenganui i hokona i roto i a Mātau, e āhua ana i tētahi pūtukatuka ā-ARM. I kī a Motorola ko te huringa o te maramara ko te pai ake o te mahinga kāmera. Heoi anō, ko te tikanga kāore anō kia tāutatia te pūtirotiro Chrome a Google ki te pūrere. Kātahi anō ka tapahia e Intel ana tohu hoko e kī ana i te tono ngoikore. Ahakoa e tohu ana i ngā hokonga maramara rorohiko, he kaitākaro niche i te wāhanga pūrere atamai. Ko ōna hoa waea atamai tīariari - ZTE, Lenovo, Lava, me Gigabyte - he tōpana waea atamai iti noa iho i ngā mākete ki te Uru. Nā reira, ko te herenga a Intel ki a Google - nāna hoki i whakarite te pūnaha Android - e kitea whānuitia ana hei mahi tino nui ki te whāwhā i te mākete ki tēnei wā. Ka tukuna te ringa waea ki te UK, Wīwī, Tiamana me Amerika Rātini. He whakaaturanga 4.3in (10.9cm) tōna e nui ake ai i te iPhone 5 a Apple, engari he iti iho i te Galaxy S3 o Samsung me te One X o HTC. I kī a Intel i roto i ngā mīhini he pūtukatuka tohu atahanga hōu kua arotautia hei mahi me te hangarau a Motorola. "Ka taea e koe te reri ki te tango pikitia i roto i te iti iho i te kotahi hēkona, e rua te tere o ētahi atu hua i runga i te mākete," te kī a Erika Reid, te kaiwhakahaere ahuwhānui o te rōpū pūkoro me ngā whakawhitiwhitinga Intel. "He maha ngā wā e hiahia ana koe ki te tango pikitia maha - ā, ka taea e koe te tango tae atu ki te 10 ngā pikitia i roto i te hēkona, he tere ake i te maha o ngā kāmera DSLR (reflex arotahi mamati kotahi) i te mākete i tēnei rā." Heoi anō, ko te tikanga o te whakaurunga o te hangarau a Intel kāore i taea e Google te tuku Chrome hei pūtirotiro tukutuku taunoa, pērā ki te hoa o te ringa waea o Amerika, te Droid Razr M. "Kāore anō a Chrome kia rite mō te tāuta tōmua i tēnei pūrere," i whakaae a Jim Wicks, te tuakana matua o te hoahoa wheako kiritaki i Motorola. "Kāore mātou e pīrangi ki te mahi i tēnā ki te kore e oti te arotautanga o ngā mīhini i taua taumata." I tāpiritia e ia ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te tikiake i te pūmanawa mai i te pātaka Google Play hei kōwhiringa. Ka hokona e te umanga te pūmanawa hei "tāhuahua whārangi whakatere-pūmārō" i runga i ngā rīpene ā-ARM. I kōwhiria e Intel te oranga pūhiko ki te whakamahi i tētahi hoahoa CPU uho-kotahi (wae tukatuka matua) mō tōna maramara hōu rawa, e whakararuraru ana i tētahi ia umanga mō ngā tauira takirua, tapawhā-uho rānei. Mā ngā uho maha e āhei ai ngā ringa waea waea ki te whakamōrahi i te oranga pūhiko mā te whakamahi anake i ngā uho katoa ina mahi rātou i ngā tūmahi pūtukatuka, engari ka whakaweto ētahi i ētahi wā hei penapena pūngao. I kī kē a Intel kua whakamahia kētia e ia tētahi tikanga e kiia nei ko te miro-hyper e āhei ai tōna uho kotahi ki te mahi i ngā tūmahi whakarara e rua. I kī tēnei i tere ake ai te whakaoti i ngā tatauranga, ā, ka tere ake te whakaweto i te pūtukatuka. "Kāore ngā uho katoa i hangaia kia ōrite," te kī a Tēnā Reid. "It's really about what the architecture can do and how you do it in the most efficient fashion. " I kitea e mātou mā te pūtukatuka Ngota ka taea e mātou te tuku mahinga i runga i tā mātou pūtukatuka e patu ana i te nuinga o ngā pūtukatuka uho takirua i te mākete i tēnei rā." I kī a Motorola kua whakaurua hoki tōna ake pūmanawa Hohenga Atamai hei āwhina i te pūrere kia eke ki te roanga 20 haora i waenganui i ngā utu. Kāore te taputapu i tukuna ki ētahi atu kaihanga pūrere Android. Ka ako te pūmanawa me pēhea te whakamahi a ia rangatira i tō rātou ringa waea, kātahi ka huatau i ngā wā ka taea te whakaweto aunoa i ngā taumahi pēnei i te tūhonotanga nihokikorangi me te taumahinga tauwāhi GPS. "Tērā pea ka tae atu koe ki te 15% ki te 20% anō te oranga pūhiko i roto i ā mātou pūrere," te kī a Tēnā Wicks. I kī ngā pūkoro awhe waenganui: I kī tētahi kaitiaki umanga, e mōhiotia ana kua whakatau a Intel kia kaua e ūkui i tōna maramara ki ngā ringa waea waea o runga o Motorola. "Tērā pea ka āhua rerekē te whakatū a tētahi kamupene rorohiko pēnei i a Intel ki tētahi pūrere awhe waenganui," te kī a Hai Saadi - kaitātari matua i Informa Telecom. "Engari he iti iho te whakataetae i taua wāhanga, ā, he iti iho te mahinga o ērā atu pūrere i taua wāhi utu, nā reira ka kitea. " E ngana ana a Intel ki te tomo ki te mākete pūkoro i runga i te āhua māmā... E tūmanako ana mātou ka whakarewaina tētahi pūtukatuka uho-maha utu nui ake i te 2013, ahakoa kāore mātou i te mōhio ki te hoa." I whakaūngia e Tēnā Wicks e whakaaro ana a Motorola ki te tuku i ētahi atu ringa waea ā-Intel i ngā tau e heke mai nei, engari kāore e kōrerorero mēnā ka rāhuitia hoki ki ngā mākete i waho o te US. I tāpiritia e Tēnā Reid e whakaaro ana a Intel ki te whakapuaki i ētahi atu herenga ki ngā kaiwhakanao i mua i te mutunga o te 2012.

title: Te iti o te GP o Te Raki o Wales e whakanui ana i te raruraru, ka whakatūpato te rongoā
summary: Kua tae atu ngā iti GP puta noa i te raki o Wales, kua whakatūpato tētahi rongoā matua.
text: I kī a Dr Eamonn Jessup, te kaiwhakahaere o te komiti rongoā o te rohe, kei te mōrearea te nuinga o te rohe ki te ngaro i to rātau tākuta whānau. Kua tuhia e ia tētahi reta tūwhera ki ngā AM whakawhiti-rōpū e karanga ana ki a rātau ki te āwhina ki te whawhai i te "raruraru tono". I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he manakē te tautoko i te tiaki tuatahi tino kounga puta noa i te katoa o Wales. Mai i te tau 2015, kua tangohia e te Poari Hauora o te Whare Wānanga o Betsi Cadwaladr (BCUHB) te whakahaere i ngā mahi GP e whitu puta noa i te raki o Wales i muri i to rātau whakamutu i a rātau kirimana NHS. I whakatuwheratia hoki e te poari tētahi pokapū GP i Prestatyn i muri i ētahi atu pokanga e toru i whakahokia ai a rātau kī. E whā anō ngā mahi, ko Criccieth, Rysseldene i Colwyn Bay, me Borras me Forge Road, i Wrexham, ka whakamutua a rātau kirimana i ngā marama e heke mai nei. I kī te poari hauora kei te kaha tonu te mahi ki te kimi rongoā ki ngā uauatanga. I kī a Dr Jessup kua whakatūpato ngā tinana GP mō te raruraru e tū mai nei mō ngā tau, engari ko te tau e tangohia ana e te poari hauora te āhua nei kua "piki ake te tere nui" inā noa nei. I kī a ia he tokomaha ngā tākuta whānau e haere wawe ana nā te nui o ngā mahi, ā, e uaua ana ngā mahi ki te whakakī i ngā wāteatanga. "Kua neke mātou mai i te tūnga he iti noa iho ngā wāhi i te raki o Wales e mōrearea ana ki te ngaro i tō rātou GP ki te nuinga o ngā wāhi e mōrearea ana ināianei. " Mai i te wā whakamutunga i whakaarahia ai e mātau te take o tēnei tiango tūpono, te āhua nei he iti noa iho te āhukahuka he nui ake ngā take o Uēra ki te raki i te tonga," tana tāpiri mai. I Wrexham, e whā ngā mahi GP e whakahaere ana a BCUHB i muri i te whakamutu i a rātau kirimana, i te wā he take kei Colwyn Bay, Conwy, Llandudno, me te Llyn Peninsula. I kī a Dr Jessop he iti ake te utu mō BCUHB ki te whakahaere i ngā ratonga i ngā mahi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh i ngā huringa ki te kirimana GP mō te 2017-18, ko te tikanga o te pūtea penapena i roto i te tiaki tuatahi kua piki ake i te £27m. Kei te mahi tahi ngā minita me ngā poari hauora me te British Medical Association ki te tautoko i ngā mahi mōrearea ki te katinga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mā tā mātou whakahau angitu This is Wales: Train, Work, Live campaign, i hoahoatia ki te mākete i a Wales me NHS Wales hei wāhi ātaahua ki te mahi, kei te tutuki pai mātou ki te tono i ētahi atu GP hei mahi i Weera." I kī a BCUHB e pā ana te take ki te tiaki tuatahi puta noa i te UK, ā, kei te mahi tahi me ngā hoa ki te "tuku i te tiaki tino pai mō ngā tūroro puta noa i te raki o Wales". "Kua kite mātou i te angitu nui ki te whakamahi i ngā tauira mahi hōu, ā, ka kaha tonu te mahi ki te kimi rongoā ki ngā whakamātautau i tāututia," te kī a te kaikōrero.

title: Ka taea e ngā wā hari te 'tūkino i te ngākau'
summary: Ka puta mai te āwangawanga ā-hinengaro e pā ana ki te mamae o te poho me te hāhā i ngā wā o te hari, te riri, te pouri me te wehi, e huatau ana tētahi akoranga o Huiterangi.
text: Nā Hemi GallagherĒtita Hauora, paetukutuku Rongokōrero o TE AO E toru hauwhā o ngā kēhi o te takotsubo cardiomyopathy, he huringa i te āhua o te pukupuku mauī o te manawa, tērā pea ka mate, nā te hau. Ko te mātauranga o te Hōhipera o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga, i roto i te Tuhitaka Manawa o Ūropi, e hua ana mō te kotahi i roto i te 20 kēhi i takea mai i te hari. Ko te tikanga he rangitahi te āhuatanga, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā ka pai te tangata i muri iho. I roto i te mātauranga o ngā tūroro e 1,750, ka kitea e ngā kairangahau ngā raruraru manawa i takea mai e: I huatau hoki te mātauranga ko te nuinga o ngā take i roto i ngā wāhine tōmuri. I kī a Dr Jelena Ghadri, tētahi o ngā kairangahau: "Kua whakaaturia e mātou he rerekē ake ngā keu mo te takotsubo syndrome i te whakaaro o mua. " Kua kore te tūroro takotsubo syndrome i te tūroro 'ngākau whati' tauhira, ā, ka taea hoki te mate i mua i ngā āhuatanga tōrunga. "Me mōhio ngā tākuta ki tēnei, ā, me whakaaro hoki ko ngā tūroro e tae ana ki te tari ohorere me ngā tohu o ngā whakaekenga manawa, pēnei i te mamae o te poho me te manawa, engari i muri i tētahi takahanga hari, i te ngākau rānei, tērā pea ka mamae i te tūroro tūroro ōrite e whakaatu ana i muri i tētahi takahanga ā-hinengaro tōraro." 'E hiahiatia ana ētahi atu rangahau' I kī a ia tērā pea he mahi pouri me te hari i tiritiri i tētahi "ara ā-whakaaro" noa iho e ahu ana ki te āhuatanga. I kī a Prof Peter Weissberg, te kaiwhakahaere rongoā o te British Heart Foundation: "He takahanga āhua kore nei te Takotsubo syndrome. " E hua ana tēnei mātauranga, i roto i ētahi take ruarua, tērā pea he hari te takahanga whakaoho. "He nui ake ngā rangahau e hiahiatia ana kia mārama ai me pēhea e taea ai e aua takahanga ā-hinengaro te whakaoho i te tūkino manawa rangitahi i roto i ētahi tangata mōrearea." Whāia a Hemi i Twitter.

title: 'Ngā tūpāpaku ora': He aha te take i mōrearea ai te rākau ā-motu o Koropia
summary: "He tūpāpaku ora rātau," te kī a te kaipūtaiao o Koropia, o Rodrigo Bernal o te rākau ā-motu o Koropia.
text: Nā Lucy SherriffCocora Valley, Colombia Ko te ceroxylon quindiuense, he momo nikau motuhake i whakapuakina ko te rākau ā-motu o te whenua i te tau 1985, kei te tata ki te ngaro, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā Kōpia kāore i te mōhio ki te raruraru. Koia tērā nā te mea he maha nga tau e whakaatu ana i nga kapu i ngā tohu pirau, ahakoa kua tae kē rātau ki te mutunga o to rātau oranga, ā, kua mate rātau, ka whakamāramatia e Tēnā Bernal. Ko ia tētahi o ngā kaipūtaiao e ako ana i ngā rākau i roto i ngā tau e rua tekau tau kua taha, ā, he iti ake tana māharahara. Tūruhi tūruhi E hia mano nga tūruhi e haere ana ki te Riu o Cocora i te rohe kawhe o Colombia i ia tau ki te mīharo ki nga nikau pourewa. Engari ahakoa i tēnei rohe e rongonui ana mō ōna nikau wax, he ruarua, he tawhiti hoki ngā rākau. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: "E ora ana ngā rākau tae atu ki te 200 tau, ā, nā te roa o tō rātou oranga, ka kitea anake tō rātou pirau e ngā whakatupuranga tamariki," te kī a Tēnā Bernal ki te HAU. " Koinei te take i kore ai te tokomaha o ngā Kōpia e mōhio kei te ngaro to tātau rākau ā iwi." Mai i te tau 1989 kua whakapeka te maha o ngā rākau i te rohe i te 78%, ā, ināianei tata tonu ki te 2,000 ngā nikau e toe ana i te Awaawa o Cocora, e kī ana tētahi rōpū kaipūtaiao e aroturuki ana i te iwi whānui. Ehara ngā nikau wax i te mea tūruhi anake, engari he wae matua i roto i te pūnaha pūnaha o te rohe. Ko ngā hua i puta mai i ngā rākau e whāngai ana i te nui o ngā ngārara, manu me ngā whāngote. Engari e ai ki a Tēnā Bernal, kei te mōrearea nga kapu i te Awaawa o Cocora. Ko te nuinga o te ngahere matomato o te riu kua tapahia hei whakawātea i te kai kararehe. Mā tēnei e raruraru ai ngā kākano o te nikau pani. Ka tahuna rātau i te rā, ka kainga rānei e nga kau. Ahakoa he āhua hauora ngā rākau ora, ina tīmata rātou ki te pirau māori kāore he rākau tamariki hei whakakapi i tō rātou wāhi. Ko ngā tuma hou Ka tipu te Quindío Wax Palm i ngā wāhi ruarua i Koropia. I tua atu i te Riu o Cocora ka kitea rātau i Tochecito, he rohe i te takiwā o Valle del Cauca. E whakaarotia ana ko te Tochecito iti e mōhiotia ana e pupuri ana i te nuinga o ngā rākau - e 70% o te tapeke ā-motu. Engari ko te mea i nohoia ētahi wāhanga o te rohe e te rōpū tohunga o Farc kua whakakorea ināianei, ko te tikanga e kore e taea te rangahau i reira. E tūmanako ana ngā kaipūtaiao ka nui ake pea te maha o ngā rākau. Kua aro atu a Tēnā Bernal me ōna hoa kaipūtaiao ki a Tochecito i runga i te tūmanako ka taea e rātau te tiaki i ōna nikau wax i mua i te tōmuritanga. Mā te rohe ināianei kia haumaru ake, kia āhei kē atu hoki i muri i te mahi rangimārie o te tau 2016 ki te hunga whakakeke o Farc, kei te hoki whakamuri nga kaiahuwhenua, ā, ka wehi nga kaipūtaiao mo te wā heke mai o te rākau ā iwi. "E matapae ana mātou ka kite mātou i te hawhe o te iwi whānui nikau e ngaro ana i roto i te 50 tau," te kī a Luis Santiago Castillo Martínez o te Whare Wānanga o Humboldt, he rōpū rangahau taiao. "Ko Tochecito to mātau wā tino pai ki te pare i nga kapu," tana kī mo te rohe 42 km māra (16 sq mile). E parea ā-ture ana ngā rākau nikau i raro i tētahi ture i puta i te tau 1985 e ārai ana i te tapahi o ō rātou peka hei whakamahi i ngā hākari whakapono pēnei i te Rātapu Nikau, engari he iti noa iho ngā rara mō te hunga i hinga katoa i ngā rākau. I tēnei wā, e 40 ngā kaipupuri whenua tūmataiti a Tochecito, ā, kua tono a Tēnā Bernal me te Whare Wānanga o Humboldt ki te kāwanatanga o Kōpia kia whakapuaki i taua rohe he pāka ā-motu, engari he iti noa iho te angitu. "Ko te tino mea i taea e mātau ko te whakahauhau i ngā rangatira kia whakapuaki i ā rātou pāmu rāhui tūmataiti," te kī a Tēnā Bernal. Ka aroha, tērā tētahi mārō ki taua tūnga, ka tāpiri mai a ia. "This just means your land is a protected area but it's an empty status as you can use your land whatever you see fit. Mēnā ka whakatau ēnei kaipupuri whenua e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakawātea i tō rātou whenua, ka taea e rātou." He maha nga tau e whakahau ana a Tēnā Bernal me ōna hoa kaipūtaiao i te kāwanatanga kia hokona te whenua - he nekehanga e whakaarohia ana e rātau he utu $10m (£7.7m) - engari kāore anō kia mahia. "Ehara i te tino nui. He hēneti mō tētahi iwi pēnei i Koromopia. Kei te kāwanatanga te mana ki te hoko i tēnei whenua, ki te tiaki i ngā rākau, engari e kore e pai ki te pērā. He tino whakapōrearea," tana kī. E whakahaeretia ana ngā pāka ā-motu e 58 o Koropia e ngā Pūnaha Pāka ā-Motu, ā, ahakoa kei te tipu haere te maha o ngā wāhi i tohua hei pare i Koropia, kua piki noa iho te tahua ki te 3% ia tau i roto i ngā tau e whā kua hipa, e kī ana a Wilfredo Cuestas. E whakahaere ana a Tēnā Cuestas i te tahua o te tinana e whakahaere ana i ngā pāka ā-motu o Koropia. "Ahakoa kāore anō kia tapahia te tahua mō ia tau tōmua, kāore i te nui ngā tohatoha i mahia hei taupoki i o tātau hiahia," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "Ko te moni i whakaritea mō ngā mahi taketake," tana kī, e whakamārama ana neke atu i te rua taua moni e hiahiatia ana hei tautoko i ana mahi. E whakaaro ana hoki a Tēnā Castillo he kī te moni: "Ko te hipanga tuatahi ki te pare i ngā kapu ko te tohatoha i te nui tika ki te wāhanga taiao." Kua hangaia e Tēnā Bernal me ōna hoa kaipūtaiao tētahi mahere whakahaere hei tiaki i te momo, engari ko te tikanga o te mutunga o te pūtea, kāore e taea te whakarite i ta rātau rautaki. "Kei te tino matekiri ahau," te kī a Tēnā Bernal. "E arohaina ana tēnei rākau e te iwi o Koropia, e mōhio ana te katoa ko tō mātou rākau ā iwi tēnei, engari kāore he tangata e mōhio ana ka ngaro i a tātau." Whakahōu 7 Whiringa 2018: Kua urupare te tinana kāwanatanga e whakahaere ana i ngā pāka ā-motu o Koropia ki te whakamārama i tana pūtea, ā, kua whakahōutia tā mātou tuhipānui kia whakaurua tērā.

title: I whakapuakina a Mozambique e wātea ana i ngā maina whenua
summary: Kua tangohia e Mozambique tana maina whenua whakamutunga e mōhiotia ana i muri i te rua tekau tau o te mahi ki te whakakore i nga pakū.
text: Tata ki te 171,000 ngā maina whenua i tangohia, e ai ki te Halo Trust, he aroha o Ingarangi nāna i ārahi te whakawāteatanga. I mahue nga maina whenua i muri i te whawhai roa mo te rangatiratanga i muri mai i te pakanga tūmatanui. He tokomaha i whakatōkia tae noa ki ngā tau 1990. E kī ana te aroha koia te whenua nui tuatahi i tāhaetia e maina kia tino ūkuia i ngā pahū. I tangohia te maina whakamutunga i te pūtake o tētahi piriti rerewhenua i waenganui o te whenua. He tokomaha i whakatōkia tata ki ngā hanganga matua, pēnei i ngā matatara, ngā arawhata me ngā pou hiko. I te katoa, e 17m mita māra (183m sq ft) o te whenua i whakawāteatia, ko ngā wāhi e tūmanako ana ngā mana ināianei ka taea te whakamahi ahuwhenua. Kei te haere tonu te mahi ki te whakawātea i ngā pahū i ētahi atu whenua, tae atu ki Sri Lanka, Laos, Angola me Colombia. I te tirohanga: Karen Allen, BBC News, Mozambique Kaua koe e wareware ki te kitenga o tētahi tangata kātahi anō ka whara i te pahūtanga o te whenua ārai kaimahi. I hoahoatia ēnei rākau nanakia hei whakakāhore i te rohe ki "te hoariri" engari ko ngā tāngata noa iho, tae atu ki ngā tamariki, e utu ana i te utu taumaha rawa. Ko te US, ko Rūhia me Haina ētahi o ngā whenua kua mahue ōna kāri waea mōrearea ki Mozambique i roto i ngā tekau tau. He uaua te ine i te tawhiti tangata, engari i kī mai te Halo Trust ki a au e hia rau ngā tāngata kua whara, kua patua rānei e ngā pahū. Ahakoa i tāhuahuatia e ngā pahū ārai kaiāwhina ngā wāhi whenua nui i Mozambique i muri i te tautohetohe mo te rangatiratanga me te pakanga tūmatanui roa, ko te mea e ngaro ana i roto i ngā kupu matua ko te pānga tautāwhi o ngā māra whenua ki te whanaketanga o te ohaoha. I te wāhi i ngaro ai te maina whenua whakamutunga i te taha o te raina rerewhenua, ka kitea e au he pātītī hou e puta ake ana i te oneone momona, i te whenua e tipu huka ana. "Kaua e ohorere mēnā ka tere te tono a ngā whānau ki te whenua me te tīmata ki te pāmu ōpaki," te kī mai a taku kaiārahi ki a au.

title: E 17 tau te patu a Ingarangi i te pūkenga tuhipoka kirihou o Aiarangi ki te Raki
summary: I patua e Aiarangi ki te Raki a Ingarangi ki tētahi tuhipoka kirihou £5 mā te 17 tau.
text: Nā Julian O'NeillBBC News NI Business Correspondent Kei te tukua e te Pēke o Ingarangi tana tuhipoka waerau tuatahi £5, engari ko te Pēke ki te Raki te tuatahi i te UK ki te tuku i tētahi rima waerau i muri i Whiringahora 1999. E rua miriona ngā tuhipoka putanga motuhake i hangaia hei tohu i te mano tau; i whakaaturia e rātau he whakaahuatanga o te Waka Mokowā i tētahi taha. I mutu te tuku a te pēke i a rātou i te tau 2008 engari, e ai ki tētahi kaikōrero, kei te "taea tonu te whakamahi, te whakawhiti". Kei te hokona e ngā pae hoko Ipurangi ngā tuhipoka £5 mō te £125 ia. E rua ngā putanga o te tuhipoka i tukuna - ko te mea i whakaurua ki te rere whānui he tau rangatū MM, ā, i whaia e tētahi putanga kaikohi me tētahi kuhimua Y2K. I tangohia e te Pēke ki te Raki te ingoa o tōna rangatira, a Danske Bank, i te tau 2012. Engari i te tukunga o tana tuhipoka waerau, nā te Rōpū Motu o Ahitereiria, nāna i tuku moni kirihou i ētahi atu wāhi. I Aiarangi ki te Raki e tīari ana te ture kia āhei ai ōna pēke paetata ki te tā me te whakahaere i ā rātou ake putanga tuhipoka. I te tau 2005, ka tāngia anō e te Pēke ki te Raki ōna tuhipoka pēke katoa i muri noa iho i te tāhaetanga o te £26.5m i tōna tari matua e te IRA. Ko te rima kirihou anake te momo tuhipoka kāore i whakakapia. Ka whaia te rima o te Pēke o Ingarangi hou e tētahi tuhipoka waerau £10 i te raumati 2017 me te tuhipoka £20 i te tau 2020. Ka whakaaetia tonutia te tuhipoka pepa £5 kia unuhia rā anō tōna tūnga whakangāwari ā-ture i Me 2017. Kei te tā hoki ngā pēke tuku Pākehā e toru i ā rātou tuhipoka £5 me te £10 e whai ake nei i runga i te waerau. Ka tukuna e Clydesdale Bank tā rātou waerau £5 i te 27 o Mahuru 2016, Bank of Scotland i te 4 o Whiringahora me te TT i Whiringa ā Rangi.

title: I kitea e Dr Feelgood guitarist Wilko Johnson he mate pukupuku
summary: Kua kitea a Wilko Johnson, te kaitā o mua me te pēne toka o Ingarangi o te tau 1970, o Dr Feelgood, i te mate pukupuku kāpeka o te pancreas.
text: I tuhituhi tana kaiwhakahaere i runga i te whārangi Facebook o te kaiwhakatangitangi kua kōwhiria e te tau 65 tau kia kaua e whiwhi i tētahi kōmihi, engari i "roto i te wairua pai". Ahakoa te tātaritanga, ka whakaaro a Hōnea ki te whakaoti i tētahi KK hou me te mahi i tētahi haerenga poto ki Wīwī. Tērā anō ētahi mahere mō ngā rangatū o ngā mahi poroporoaki i te UK. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o Robert Hoy: "Kāore anō a ia kia pāngia e ia ētahi pānga ā-tinana, ā, ka taea e ia te hākinakina i ētahi atu marama o te hauora me te ngohe tika." "E hiahia ana a Wilko ki te tuku i tana mihi pono mo nga tautoko katoa i a ia i roto i tana mahi roa," tana tāpiri mai. "Mai i te hunga i mahi tahi me ia, i runga i ngā mea katoa, ko aua kaipāngai pono me ngā kaiwaiata kua haere ki ana mahi ora, i hokona ana hopukanga, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka tino kī tōna oranga." Ahakoa ehara a ia i te ingoa kāinga, i whakaarotia a Hōne ko tētahi o ngā kaitā tino whai mana mō tōna kāhua tākaro kita kōpikopiko waitohu - i whakaarotia ko tētahi o ngā āhuatanga nui mō te toka punk o Ingarangi. I muri i tana wehenga atu i a Dr Feelgood i te tau 1977, ka uru atu a Hōnea ki a Ian Dury's Blockheads, ā, ka whakatūria tōna ake rōpū, The Wilko Johnson Band. I puta mai a Hōnea i roto i te kiriata pakipūmeka o te tau 2009 Oil City Confidential i reira ka maharatia e ia ōna pūmahara ki a Dr Feelgood. I whakaohotia e ia te whakaoranga anō o te hiahia ki te kaiwaiata me tētahi pouaka pouaka o ngā pukaemi e whā o Dr Feelgood i tuhi, i purei hoki, i whakaputaina i tērā tau, tae atu ki tētahi pukapuka pukapuka. He mahi auau anō tā Hōnea i roto i ngā rangatū moemoea o Amerika Game of Thrones, e tākaro ana i tētahi kaikawe ngū.

title: Covid-19: Rising care home deaths add to Wales total
summary: E 223 nga mate e pa ana ki a Covid-19 i Wales i rehitatia i te wiki whakamutunga.
text: E 33 neke atu tēnei i te wiki o mua, ā, e 26.3% o ngā mate katoa, e ai ki te Office for National Statistics (ONS). E 65 nga mate puta noa i te rohe o te poari hauora o Cwm Taf Morgannwg - 44 i te hohipera - i te wiki ki te 20 o Whiringa-a-rangi. E 58 nga mate i roto i nga whare tiaki e pa ana ki a Covid-19 - te tau teitei rawa atu o ia wiki mai i te waenganui o Mei. Tekau ma tahi o nga mate i roto i nga whare tiaki i Rhondda Cynon Taf (RCT), e iwa i Neath Port Talbot me te ono i te Vale of Glamorgan. E 47 nga mate i te rohe o te poari hauora o Aneurin Bevan, puta noa i nga tautuhinga katoa, 38 nga mate i Swansea Bay, 21 i Betsi Cadwaladr me te 23 i Cardiff me Vale. E 21 nga mate i Hywel Dda - neke atu i te rua te whika i tera wiki - me te waru nga mate e pa ana ki nga tangata o Powys, e rima o ratou i te hohipera. Ko te tapeke o nga mate ia wiki te teitei rawa mai i te timatanga o Mei. Ko nga mate i ripoatahia tae atu ki te 30 o Whiringa-a-rangi 74Royal Glamorgan Hospital, Llantrisant 46Prince Charles Hospital, Merthyr Tydfil 78Princess of Wales Hospital, Bridgend 6Maesteg Hospital I tenei wa, kua ripoatahia e te poari hauora o Cwm Taf Morgannwg etahi atu mate 27 e pa ana ki nga mate hohipera i te wiki kua hipa. E waru anō ngā mate i ngā hōhipera o Royal Glamorgan me Prince Charles, e iwa i te hōhipera o Pirinihi o Wales i Bridgend. Ka tae ki te 204 te tapeke o nga mate. Neke atu i te 700 ngā kēhi e hono ana ki ngā tīmatatanga, ahakoa kua pōturi haere te pikinga o ngā kēhi. Ko ngā mate nui e kiia nei, e whakataurite ana i ngā mate rēhita katoa ki ngā tau o mua, kei runga ake i te wawaenga e rima tau. Ko te titiro ki te maha o ngā mate e tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i tēnei wā o te tau, e kitea ana he mehua pono o te pānga o te mate urutā. I Wales, i piki ake te maha o nga mate mai i te 742 ki te 848 i te wiki whakamutunga, e 195 nga mate (29.9%) teitei ake i te toharite e rima tau mo taua wiki. Katoa, kua 851 ngā mate Covid-19 i ngā kāinga tiaki tae atu ki te 20 o Whiringa-ā-rangi, e 24.6% o ngā mate coronavirus katoa i Wales. There have been 20 care home deaths in recent weeks in Llangollen but only two deaths in Denbighshire were registered in time for the latest figures. Ko te tapeke o nga mate Covid i Wales tae atu ki te 13 o Whiringa-a-rangi ko te 3,464 nga mate. Ina tatauria ngā mate i roto i ngā rā torutoru e whai ake nei, e 3,536 ngā mate tae atu ki te 20 o Whiringa-ā-rangi. Ko RCT, me te 503 nga mate, kei a ia te nuinga o nga mate Covid-19 i Wales i tenei wa i roto i te mate uruta. E 442 ngā tāngata o Kānata tae atu ki te wiki whakamutunga. Kei Ceredigion te tau iti rawa o ngā mate, engari i piki te tapeke i te waru i roto i te wiki ki te 23. Kāore anō a Anglesey, a Gwynedd rānei kia rēhitatia he mate e pā ana ki a Covid i te wiki tata nei. Ko ngā mate e pā ana ki a Covid ko ngā kēhi whakapae me ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia, ā, ko te wāhi he take a Covid - ahakoa e whakaarohia ana i roto i te 90% o ngā kēhi ko te huaketo te take taketake o te mate. Unlike Public Health Wales' daily reporting of deaths, this also includes deaths in people's homes, all care homes and hospices.

title: Kotahi te tamaiti e tatari ana ki te whakawhiti manawa i NI
summary: Whakaarohia e 10 tau te pakeke me te tatari ki te whakawhiti manawa.
text: Nā Marie-Louise ConnollyBBC News NI Health Correspondent Aimee Brady e mōhio ana he aha te āhua - kua noho a ia i te Hōhipera o Royal Belfast mō ngā Tamariki Mate e tatari ana ki tētahi manawa hou mai i Hānuere. Kua karangatia e te whānau o Magherafelt ki te iwi whānui kia whakatuwhera i tētahi kōrero mō te koha whakawhiti okana. Aimee says she loves the nurses but desperately wants to go home to be with her 14-year-old brother. "Being stuck in here it's just you have no life, just sitting here every day hoping you get that call - I just want to go home," she says. 'Wā māharahara' I tēnei wiki, i nekehia a Aimee ki PICU, te Wae Tiaki Āwhina Tamariki. E kī ana te whaea o Aimee, a Valerie, i te wā e pai ake ana tana tamāhine he tino "wā māharahara". "Whānau, tae atu ki ngā mātua me ā rātou tamariki me whai kōrerorero mō te koha okana," te kī a Valerie. "Tēnā kōrerorero; Ka taea e ia te rerekē ki tētahi whānau e tatari ana." E rua te roa o te noho i runga i tētahi rārangi he kēmu tatari. I tēnei wā, tokowhā ngā tamariki i Aiarangi ki te Raki e tatari ana ki tētahi manawa. Ināianei, e 181 ngā tamariki i UK e tatari ana ki tētahi whakawhitinga o te okana whakaora, me te 17 e mate ana i tērā tau i runga i te rārangi tatari. He kaitohutohu manawa tamariki a Dr Brian McCrossan i Belfast. "Ko te pono pouri e tatari ana ngā tamariki e tatari ana ki te whakawhitiwhiti manawa, pūkahukahu rānei," tana kī. "A, ko te tikanga o tēnā, he tokomaha ake ngā tamariki e mate ana e tatari ana ki te whakawhiti manawa, pūkahukahu rānei i te take." 'E tino whakawhetai ana ahau' I a Aimee e tatari ana, kei te ora a Ryan O'Callaghan, 11 tau. I whakawhitia tōna manawa i te 15 marama ki muri, he wā reka kawa i a ia e whakamihi ana ki te matenga o tētahi tangata i āhei ai ia ki te ora. "E tino whakamihi ana ahau mo taua mea. I feel very lucky and I feel like more people should have that opportunity as well," he says. "Ināianei ka taea e au te piki ngāwari i te arawhata. Ka taea e au te mahi i ngā mahi a ngā tamariki pūnoa, ka taea e au te tākaro whutupōro, ka taea e au te tākaro me taku kurī, ka taea hoki e au te oma." Kei te kōrero a Ryan i tana pūrākau mā te Children's Heartbeat Trust hei āwhina i ētahi atu. "I mua i te kore e taea e au te piki me te heke i te arawhata. Ka pau taku manawa i ngā wā katoa, ā, e mōhio ana ahau i te pōrearea ahau - he iti noa iho." I te pātaitanga he pēhea tōna whakaaro i te whai ngākau hou i roto i a ia, ka kī ia: "He tino ngahau. Tērā pea he pai ake i tō mea tawhito." E tino whakamīharo ana tōna whānau ki te tikanga o te ora nā te ohaoha o ētahi atu. "Ko tētahi o ngā mea whakamīharo ka taea e ngā pakeke te hoatu okana ki ngā tamariki me ngā tamariki ka taea te hoatu ki ngā tamariki engari i te nuinga o te wā kāore tonu i te nui," te kī a te pāpā o Ryan, a Shane. "Ka pouri, he mate te puta, engari ko te tikanga ka taea e koe te whakahoki i tētahi mea ki te iwi. " Ko te koha o te kite i tētahi tangata, i roto i tā mātou take e ārahi ana i tētahi oranga hou, me te whai wāhi ki te mahi i ngā mea e kore e taea e Ryan - he tino waimarie mātou."

title: Te Kamupene Arawhiti o Whitchurch i roto i te tautohetohe VAT
summary: E kī ana ngā rangatira o tētahi piriti puta noa i te Thames kāore e hiahiatia ana e rātau te utu WAP i runga i tōna hanganga hou ki tētahi Ture Pāremata o te tau 1792.
text: Ko te piriti tawhiti tūmataiti o Whitchurch kua rārangitia e te Kōeke II e whakawhiti ana i Oxfordshire me Berkshire, ā, me whakaora i te utu tata ki te £4m. Kua kōrero ngā rangatira ki te ture e kī ana kia kaua te piriti e herea ki tētahi "mokatere, tāke, mahi rānei". Engari kua tautohe te Pūtea Moni i te Kōti Tiketike kia kaua e whakawāteatia. E kī ana ōna rōia ko te aronui whakahoki moni VAT mō ngā tinana e pūteatia ana e ngā rawa o te kāwanatanga, ko ōna utu rānei e pūteatia ana e waenganui. 'Āraitanga pūmau' I hangaia tuatahitia te piriti e 10 ngā rangatira paetata mā te whakamahi i ā rātou ake moni. I hangaia anōtia i te tau 1902, ā, ināianei e 6,000 waka i ia rā. I kī atu a David Southern, mai i te Kamupene Arawhiti o Whitchurch, ki te kaiwhakawā: "I raro i te Ture 1792, he āraitanga pūmau tonu te piriti i te tāke. " I tukuna tēnei āraitanga hei āhukahuka i te taumahi tūmatanui i whakaurua ai te kamupene ki te mahi." Ki te angitu, ka whiwhi te kamupene ki tētahi utu tāke £700,000. Engari i kī ngā rōia o te Pūtea mēnā i whakawāteatia te kamupene i ngā momo tāke katoa, ka whakaurua hoki ngā koha inihua ā-motu me te PAYE mō ngā kaimahi, te mahi hīkoi waka me ētahi atu riwai. Ināianei kua rāhuitia e Tēnā Kaiwhakatika Burnett tana whakataunga tae noa ki tētahi rā ā muri ake.

title: Ahi o Ahitereiria: E kī ana ngā kaiwhakarite Taketake 'me tahuna te ngahere'
summary: Mō ngā mano tau, ka tahuna e te iwi taketake o Ahitereiria te whenua.
text: Nā Gary NunnSydney I mua noa atu i te whakaekenga me te whakawāteatanga o Ahitereiria e ngā Pākehā, i whakamahia ngā pūkenga whakahaere ahi - e mōhiotia ana ko "ngā tahu ahurea" - i te mahia. I hoahoatia ngā mura mātao, turi teitei kia haere tonu, puta noa i te whenua. Ka tahuna e te ahi te hinu pēnei i te mura me te otaota rau, ko te tikanga he iti iho te kai o te ahi ngahere. Mai i te tīmatanga o te mate ahi o Ahitereiria i tērā tau, kua kaha ake te kaha o ngā karanga kia pai ake te whakahaere anō i tēnei tikanga. Engari ko te tikanga kia tere ake te mahi, e tautohe ana tētahi tohunga mātauranga Taketake. "Me tahu te ngahere," te kī a Shannon Foster. She's a knowledge keeper for the D'harawal people - relaying information passed on by her elders - and an Aboriginal Knowledge lecturer at the University of Technology Sydney (UTS). Ko te nuinga o ngā mōhiohio tīpuna e tiria ana e ia e pā ana ki te ngahere, e kī ana a Ms Foster. "It's the concept of maintaining country - central to everything we do as Aboriginal people. E pā ana ki ngā mea ka taea e tātau te whakahoki ki te whenua; ehara i te mea noa iho ka taea e tātau te tango mai i taua mea." Ko ngā pūkenga 'naive' o te Whenua o tēnei rā e whakaahuatia ana i roto i te ahurea Aboriginal. "Ko te whenua to mātau whaea. Ka ora tonu a ia," te kī a Ms Foster. Ka nekehia e tēnei pātahitanga ngā manakē huri noa i te tahu whakatūpato. Ahakoa e mahi ana ngā mana o nāianei i te tahu whakaiti mōrearea, e arotahi ana ki te pare i ngā oranga me ngā āhuatanga, e kī ana a Ms Foster "kāore i te mahi". "Ka whakangaromia e ngā tahu whakahaere o nāianei ngā mea katoa. It's a naive way to practise fire management, and it isn't hearing the Indigenous people who know the land best. "Ahakoa ko te tahu ahurea e pare ana i te taiao i runga i te whānuitanga. E hiahia ana mātou ki te tiaki i te whenua, i runga i ngā rawa me ngā rawa. "Kāore e taea e mātou te kai, te inu, te hā rānei i ngā rawa. Ki te kore he whenua, kāore he mea i a mātau." Indigenous cultural burns work within the rhythms of the environment, attracting marsupials and mammals which Aboriginal people could hunt. "Ko te tahu mātao e whakakī ana i te whenua me te whakarei ake i te tipua - ka whakawairakau te pungarehu me te konurehu e whakahau ana i te puawai. He huringa matatini i runga anō i te mātauranga ahurea, wairua, pūtaiao hoki." Ka waihangatia hoki e rātau he mosaic o ngā rauropi, e kī ana a Ms Foster, ā, ka āhei tēnei ki ngā āhuarangi moroiti whai hua. "E whakahauhau ana te wera ngohengohe i te marangai - ka whakamahana i te taiao ki tētahi taumata haurangi, ā, ina tūtaki te mahana me te mātao, ka puta te whakawhāititanga - ua, e āwhina ana ki te whakaiti i te ahi." Kua arotakea e ōna kaumātua Maori i Poihākena te ngahere nui me te mura tino maroke mō tētahi wā, e whakatūpato ana kei te haere mai he ahi nui: "I whakaritea e rātau ki tētahi tamaiti makawe kāore i te mātakitaki, e kī ana me whāngai." Engari kua rāhuitia rātau e nga mana ā rohe kia kaua rātau e tahu ahurea ina tono whakaaetanga rātau. Te wāhi e whakamahia ai te tahu ahurea Kāore he huarahi kotahi ki te tahu whakatūpato nā te mea he rerekē rawa te whenua o Ahitereiria mai i tētahi wāhi ki tētahi wāhi. Ahakoa rā, ka whakaurua e ētahi kāwanatanga te tahu ahurea ki ētahi atu rautaki, e ai ki a Dr Richard Thornton, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o te Pokapū Rangahau Ngākau Ngahere me ngā Mōrearea Māori. "There's a stark difference in northern Australia, where Indigenous cultural burning happens substantially. I ngā kāwanatanga ki te tonga, i ētahi wā ka mahia e ai ki ngā hiahia me ngā hiahia o ngā hapori paetata." Mai i te wā i whakawāteatia a Ahitereiria i te tau 1788, ka āta haepapatia te tahunga ahurea. Engari i ngā tau tata nei kua kite i ngā nekehanga ki te whakauru anō. I tuhia e Associate Prof Noel Preece, tētahi kaitiaki pāka ā-motu o mua, te pukapuka ahi tuatahi mō ngā rāhui pāka o Ahitereiria. E kī ana a ia kei te mahi tonu te tahu ahurea i ētahi wāhi o Melbourne, engari i tū te nuinga o te wā i te tonga-rāwhiti o Ahitereiria nā te mea i hangaia ngā otaota i roto i "ngā wāhi mōrearea" kāore e mahi ana ngā tahu mātao. "That said, Indigenous people had extremely detailed knowledge of 'dirty country' that needs a good burn," says Associate Prof Preece, now of James Cook University. E kī ana a Prof Preece, ka taea e ngā whakahoki o te mahi tahito te tahu ahurea, te whakaheke i te hinu i runga i te whenua mai i te 10 tāna ki te 1 tan. Engari he parenga pai anake mō ngā ahi ngāwari, nā reira me mahi tahi me ngā wera whakaiti mōrearea. Ahakoa rā, ka whakaiti noa iho i ngā mōrearea: "Mā ngā āhuatanga mōrearea o mua tata nei o te hauhau me te hau nui, kāore he mea e aukati i ēnei ahi." "Aboriginal people were taken off their country so there's a re-learning process which is very useful and important. Engari he rā tōmua tonu, ā, kāore i te nui," tana kī. E whakaae ana ngā tohunga he whāititanga tō te tahu ahurea, nā te mea i ahu mai te whakawāwātanga ki te whanaketanga me te huringa āhuarangi i hangaia e te tangata, e whakaatu ana i tētahi whenua tino rerekē ināianei ki ngā rau tau ki mua. Kua noho a Prof Preece i ngā wāhi kāore i tika ngā here mo te tahu ahurea mātao. "He mākū rawa, he mātao rawa, he wera rawa, he maroke rawa - he matapihi whāiti tōu. A, he tokomaha nga kaipatu ahi i Ahitereiria e mahi ana i roto i te wiki, ā, ka taea e koe te haere kia whā ngā Hātarei kia tika rā anō ngā herenga." Mō ngā rākau mātotoru e rere ana i runga i ngā rākau, e kī ana a ia e hiahiatia ana he tahu wera nā te mea e kore ngā tahu mātao e whakakore i aua apa hinu. In addition, Dr Thornton says individual Indigenous burns, undertaken by specific agencies such as Firesticks, absolutely have their place, but need to fit within community expectations if done on a larger scale by others. "Me mātua whakarite mātou kāore te ahi e mawhiti me te tahu i ngā rawa o tētahi tangata. Ka tukitukia ngā tirohanga hapori o te mahi katoa kia mātua whakarite mātou e mahi ana i roto i tētahi anga haumaru e taea ana te tiaki." Kua kī taurangi te huarahi whakamua a te Pirimia o Te Pirimia, a Scott Morrison, he uiui "whānui" ki te mate ahi ngahere e haere tonu ana, ā, neke atu i te 10 miriona heketea. When it goes ahead, Dr Thornton stresses the need to "talk to Indigenous elders in each different area and listen". But he says not a single Indigenous person sits on the board of the national bushfire research centre he manages. E hiahia ana a Shannon Foster ki te mahi tahi me ngā umanga kāwanatanga, engari e māharahara ana ia ki te whakawhānui i te whanaketanga: "E wehi ana ahau i te nui o te whenua kua whakawāteatia, ka taea e ngā kaiwhakawhanake te neke ki roto me te kī ka taea e mātou te hoatu tēnei pānga ki konei; kua whakawāteatia te whenua." "Kua roa rawa te tiaki a te iwi Taketake i tēnei wāhi - ki te kite i te ngaromanga ināianei nā te mea kāore tētahi tangata i whakaae kia tiakina mātau he whakararuraru," tana tāpiri mai. "Ehara i te mea kāore mātou i kōrero ki a koe."

title: Ka kite nga minita i te hunga whakakeke 'whakapiri'
summary: Kua hinga te kāwanatanga i te ngana ki te tahuri i ngā huringa ki te VAT i runga i ngā kai tango, e kīia ana ko "te tāke whakapiri".
text: I ngana tētahi rōpū MP ki te aukati i te VAT mai i ngā hua kātahi anō ka tunua, ā, kāore he ngana ki te whakawera tonu. Ko ngā ngana ki te whakawātea i ngā wīra pateko mai i te VAT me te wete i tētahi tapahi i roto i te mokatere o runga o te tāke moni whiwhinga, i waenganui i ētahi atu i rahua i te wā o te taupatupatu i te Pire Pūtea. Engari e kī ana a Labour ka pōti ki te whakatio i ngā whakaaetanga e pā ana ki te pakeke - te mea e kiia nei ko te "tāke kuia" - ā muri ake. I kī te rōpū ka pau i te whakatio ētahi kaitiaki tae atu ki te £323 i te tau. Ko te "tāke whakapiri" tētahi o ngā tikanga tāke i roto i te Pūtea o tērā marama i tautohetohe ai. Ko te pōti tino tata i te Wenerei i runga i te kawenga o te WAP i runga i nga wīra pateko. Kotahi tekau mā whitu ngā Tohutohu i whakakeke, ā, neke atu i te rua tuatoru ki te 25 noa iho te nuinga o te kāwanatanga. I kite nga minita i nga hoariri o te "tāke whakapiri" ma te tawhē e 35 ngā pōti. Kua anga atu te kāwanatanga ki ngā whakahē mo te kaupapa Pūtea - e kī ana kua hoahoatia hei whakamutu i ngā āhuatanga tūturu i runga i te WAP i runga i te kai wera. Ko ērā e karanga ana ki tētahi whakaaro anō ko ngā kaihanga parāoa ko Greggs, Labour me ētahi MP Conservative me Lib Dem, e tautohe ana ka whakawehi te pikinga tāke i ngā mahi i roto i te umanga, ā, ka whakanuia ngā utu mō ngā kiritaki tae atu ki te 20%. 'Āpure tākaro taumata' E hia rau ngā kaihanga parāoa kua kī ka hīkoi rātau ki Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti a tērā wiki ki te whakahē i ngā huringa tāke. I rapu tētahi rōpū MP - e tohu ana i ngā taiwhanga i te Tonga ki te Uru o Ingarangi - ki te whakatika i te wāhanga o te Pire Pūtea e pā ana ki te VAT i runga i ngā kai wera. Engari i kī atu te minita Pūtea a Rawiri Gauke ki te Kotahitanga he "matatini, he tika hoki" ngā ture tāke o nāianei i runga i te kai wera, nā te mea, ahakoa me utu e te toa ika me te rīwai te VAT i runga i tētahi tākai tōtiti, ka whakawāteatia he whare parāoa i te taha o te taha mō te hoko i taua paramanawa ōrite. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te tikanga o ngā ture o nāianei kāore ngā kiritaki i te mōhio mēnā kei te whakahikotia rātou i runga i te kai wera nā te mea kei te whakawhirinaki tonu ki te whāinga o ngā kaiwhakarato mō te whakamahana i ngā kai wera. " Mā ngā ture hōu e whakarite he papa tākaro taumata, ā, kei te tango mātou i te huānga kaupapa." Ko te nuinga o ngā kai tango wera, pēnei i te ika me te rīwai me te kari, kua āhei ki te VAT i te 20% mai i te waenganui o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Kua tautohe ngā minita ko ngā hua whakatauranga kore pēnei i ngā pasties - e whakaaturia ana i te mahana, ā, i muri iho ka whakamātao - me kawe mai ki te raina, ā, me utu te VAT o te 20% ki ngā hua katoa e hokona ana "i runga ake i te pāmahana ā-taiao". Kua tautohe te umanga tunu kia mahana tonu ngā mīhini, ngā porohita me ētahi atu reka hei whakapai ake i tō rātou āhua, kia ū rānei ki ngā ture hauora me te haumaru, kaua hoki e whakapaunga, nō reira kaua e tāketia. I pātaitia mō tōna tūnga i runga i te WAP i runga i te kai wera, ka kī a Downing Street ko te Pūtea he "Pūtea tika me ngā rākau a te kāwanatanga".

title: Ka toa te kotiro manene o Piripīni i te kēhi o Hong Kong
summary: Kua whakataua e te Kōti Tiketike o Hong Kong kia whakaaetia he kaiāwhina kāinga mai i Piripīni ki te tono noho pūmau i te taone.
text: Nā Katie HuntBusiness reporter, BBC News I mauria mai te kēhi e Evangeline Banao Vallejos, e noho ana i Hong Kong mai i te tau 1986. E whai ana te whakahaere i tētahi arotakenga ā-ture tūturu, ā, neke atu i te 100,000 ētahi atu kotiro kē e whiwhi ana i ngā mana noho. Kua kī te kāwanatanga ka tono ki te whakahaere. Na te kēhi i whakaoho te taupatupatu whānui mo te manaakitanga ōrite mo nga kotiro kē. I kī a Mark Daly, te rōia e whakatau ana mō Ms Vallejos, i tino pai a ia ki te whakahaere. "I to mātau kōrero ki a ia ka kī a ia 'whakawhetai ki te Atua'," tana kī, kātahi anō ka tāpiri he rā mahi noa iho mōna. "He toa pai tēnei mo te ture," tana tāpiri mai. I kī te Hēkeretari o Hong Kong mō te Haumarutanga, a Ambrose Lee, kāore te kāwanatanga e tukatuka, e whakaae rānei ki ngā taupānga matau-o-noho mō ngā kaimahi kāinga i a ia e tono ana ki te whakahaere. "E manaaki ana te kāwanatanga, engari e matekiri ana ki te whakahaere," tana kī. Kua kī ētahi kaiwhakawāwā i te tuku wāhi noho ki ngā kaiāwhina kāinga ka whakararuraru i te whakarato hauora, mātauranga me ngā whare tūmatanui. Ahakoa ka taea e ētahi atu tangata whenua kē te whiwhi noho i muri i te mahi i Hong Kong mō te whitu tau, ka aukatia e ngā ture manene ngā kaiāwhina kāinga kia kaua e rapu noho pūmau. E tautohe ana ngā rōia motika tangata me te tokomaha o ngā kaiāwhina kāinga he aukati tēnei. Ko te tikanga o te noho pūmau, ka taea e te tangata te noho ki Hong Kong mō ake tonu atu, te pōti me te tū i te pōti. Engari i whakatūpato ētahi kaipōrangapū me ētahi kaiwaiata, mā te whakaae kia noho pūmau tonu ngā kaiāwhina kāinga kē, ka āhei rātou ki te kawe mai i ā rātou tamariki me ētahi atu whanaunga ki te taone, e hiahia ana ki te mātauranga me te whare. I kī a Norman Carnay, te āpiha hōtaka i te Mission for Migrant Workers, i pōhiritia e ia te whakataunga. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka waiho te huarahi kia whakatuwheratia e Hong Kong ōna tatau kia ōrite te manaakitanga mō ngā kaimahi kaiheke," tana kī. Engari i tāpiritia e ia ehara te mana noho i te manakē mō te tokomaha o ngā kaiāwhina kāinga. "Mai i ngā uiuinga o to mātau hapori, ko ngā āwangawanga pēhi ake ko ngā utu me ngā āhuatanga mahi," tana kī. Tata ki te 300,000 ngā kaiāwhina kāinga kē i Hong Kong, ko te nuinga mai i Initonīhia me Piripīni. E whakaarohia ana neke atu i te whitu tau e noho ana i konei. E hiahiatia ana rātau kia noho tahi me o rātau kaitukumahi, ā, kāore e taea te whakaae ki ētahi atu mahi. Ki te kore e whai mana ki te noho pūmau, mēnā ka panaia tētahi pononga wahine e tana kaitukumahi, me kimi mahi anō ia hei kaiāwhina kāinga, me wehe rānei i Hong Kong i roto i te rua wiki. He utu mōkito rawa tā ngā kaimahi kāinga o Hong Kong, e 3,740 tāra Hong Kong ($480; £308) i te marama me te rā whakatā i ia wiki, ko te tikanga he pai ake ō rātou here mahi i ētahi atu whenua i Āhia me te tokomaha o ngā kaiāwhina kāinga, pērā i Hingapoa.

title: Ka whakatapua e Stormzy te ataata Superheroes ki a Chadwick Boseman o Black Panther
summary: Kua whakatapua e Stormzy te ataata mō tana waiata Superheroes ki te whetū Black Panther o Chadwick Boseman i muri i te matenga o te kaitapere i te mate pukupuku i te 43 o ona tau.
text: I kī te kaitapere tōmuri ka noho te kaitapere tōmuri hei "tama tangata mo ake tonu atu i roto i o tātau ngākau" i roto i tētahi tapanga i te mutunga o te karaehe. I te whakamōhiotanga o te ataata, ka kī atu a Stormzy ki ngā kaipāngai: "He toa tangata koe i tōu ake tika, ā, kaua rawa e wareware ki tēnā." Kei roto i te ataata hākoritanga ko ngā tohutoro ki Black Lives Matter me ngā hoa rapper Little Simz me Dave. E whakahua ana hoki ngā kupu o te riu i te kaiwaiata o Nina Simone me te kaituhi Noughts and Crosses Malorie Blackman. I puta mai a Stormzy i roto i te urutaunga o te pukapuka o mua tata nei. I runga i te ara, i tangohia mai i tana pukaemi 2019 Heavy Is the Head, ka tukuna e te MC he karere whakahauhau ki "ngā kīngi pango taitamariki" me ngā "kuini pango taitamariki" - he rangatahi noa e raruraru ana, engari he toa i roto i o rātau ake oranga. I roto i tana kupu whakataki, ka kī a Stormzy i whakaawetia te ara e tōna mōhiotanga kua karapoti katoa ngā tauira i a ia e tipu ana. 'Ko te rangi te tepe' "He toa tangata katoa tātau. Ahakoa i haere mai mātou i te wāhi i haere mai ai tātau, tērā pea ka tūkinotia tātau, tērā pea he nui rawa ngā taunahua i mua i a mātau, he toa tangata koe i tōu ake tika, ā, kaua rawa e wareware ki tēnā," tana kī. "Those little skills that we have, those big skills that we have, those talents, those things that often go ignored, that makes you a superhero... "I hiahia ahau ki te hanga i tēnei ataata hei whakaawe i a koutou, kia mōhio ai koe ko te rangi te tepe, kia mōhio ai koe ko aua mea katoa i roto i a koe ka whakamīharo koe." I toroa e Taz Tron Delix, i whakaaturia te ataata i ngā kura i Rāwāhi, i Glasgow, i Dublin me Manatū i te Wenerei. 'He tangata whai tūmanako nui' i tākaro a Boseman i te toa tāne pango tuatahi o Miharo, ā, ko tōna matenga i tērā marama i āki ai i te waipuke takoha mai i ōna hoa kaitapere me ngā kaipōrangapū me ētahi atu tokomaha puta noa i te ao. I tēnei wiki, i tuhituhi a Lupita Nyong'o i tētahi takoha ā-hinengaro ki tōna hoa whetū Black Panther, e maumahara ana ki a ia he "tangata whai tūmanako nui". I tuhituhi te kaiwhakaari toa o Oscar ko te matenga o tana hoa "aroha" he "kōwhao ki taku ngākau i ia ata". "E ora tonu ana tōna mana, ā, ka wheoro mō ngā whakatupuranga e haere ake nei," ko te tuhituhi a te whetū, nāna i tākaro i a Nakia ki te anga atu ki a Kingi T'Challa o Boseman. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Air Southwest to cease Plymouth and Newquay flights
summary: Ko te waka rererangi o Plymouth Air Southwest me whakamutu i ana rerenga katoa, ka kati i te mutunga o Mahuru.
text: I kī te kamupene rererangi ka mutu ngā ratonga Plymouth katoa i te 14 o Mahuru, me ngā ara o Newquay ki Glasgow, Guernsey, Jersey me Manchester e tū ana i te rā kotahi. Ka mutu ngā ratonga Newquay ki Aberdeen, Bristol, Cork, Dublin me Leeds Bradford i te 30 o Mahuru, ka tāpirihia. I kī te kamupene rererangi ko te tikanga o ngā taumata tono iti kāore i te whai hua ā-pūtea ngā ara. Ko Air Southwest - te kaiwhakahaere rererangi kotahi o Plymouth Airport - e whakaaro ana ki te mahi i te wa e tuwhera tonu ana te Taunga Rererangi o Plymouth. Ko te taunga rererangi, nā te Rōpū Whanga o Sutton, me kati i a Hakihea. Engari i tāpiritia: "Heoi anō, ahakoa ā mātou tūmanako taketake, he tino iti iho ngā tāpuitanga whakamua o Air Southwest i te mea e hiahiatia ana, ā, kāore te taumata tono i te whai hua ā-pūtea." Ka whakahokia katoatia ngā pāhihi katoa i tāpuia kia rere i muri i a Mahuru, e kī ana. I whakaahuatia e te Ruma Tauhokohoko o Plymouth te rongo he "tino whakakino". I te tau 2003, i whakarewaina e te Rōpū Whanga o Sutton, nāna i whakahaere te taunga rererangi i te tau 2000, a Air Southwest i te tau 2003. I hokona te waka rererangi ki Humberside-based Eastern International Airways i Whiringa 2010.

title: I kapakina a Christine Hamilton i te aroha i runga i te tweet burka
summary: Kua tangohia a Christine Hamilton hei karere aroha i muri i te whakataurite i ngā burkas ki ngā kōhua o te Ku Klux Klan.
text: Na te kaipānui me te wahine a te mema Whakaminenga o UKIP Welsh, o Neil Hamilton i whakaoho te whakapouri i runga i te Twitter me ana kōrero. I kī a Muscular Dystrophy UK e ātete ana i te "whakaaro nui me te whakahāweatanga" ā, kua motu ngā hononga katoa ki a Mrs Hamilton. Engari i kī a ia ehara te tweet i te mea kia whakataurite i nga wāhine Mohimana ki te rōpū rangatira mā pākaha.
