I whakairihia e Mrs Hamilton, nāna i kāhua ko ia te "Toki Riri o Ingarangi", he whakaahua o ngā mema o te KKK i roto i o rātau kōhua i te Paraire. I a ia e urupare ana ki te haupae i runga i ngā kōrero a Boris Johnson i roto i tētahi tuhinga nūpepa, ka pātai a ia: "Mēnā e whakaaetia ana te #burka, tērā pea ko tēnei hoki?" I ngā haora i muri iho, hei urupare ki tētahi whakahoki i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, ka kī a ia kua pōhēhētia te tweet. "He whakaaro ki te rangi - kāo, kāore au i te whakataurite i ngā wāhine Mohimana ki ngā mema o te KKK, āe, kia ora, e mōhio ana ahau ki te rerekētanga," tana tuhituhi. "I te whakaahua whakairoiro ahau me pēhea te kino o te uhi kanohi katoa, arā, e hia ngā tāngata e tiro ana ki te burka." I whiwhi tana tweet taketake i ngā tākupu e hia mano, ko te nuinga o te whakahē i tana whakataurite i te kīanga whakapono ki tētahi o ngā whakamataku whakahāwea. "Ehara te burka i te tohu o te mauahara," ko te tuhituhi a tētahi kaiwhakamahi Twitter. I whakamutua e Muscular Dystophy UK, he aroha i whakaaturia e ia mai i te tau 2013, to rātau pātahitanga ki te tuakiri pāpāho i te pō Hātarei. I kī tētahi kōrero i mahia ana kōrero i runga i te kaha whaiaro, ā, kāore i te "aha" e tohu ana i te tūnga o te aroha. "E whakapono ana mātau ki tētahi iwi rerekē, whānui hoki, e manaaki ana i te katoa, ā, e whakahē ana mātau i ngā momo whakaaro nui me te whakahāweatanga," tana kī. I kī te rangatira nui o Robert Meadowcroft ko te whakataunga kia whakamutua tana mahi "e tino whakaata ana i ngā uara o te aroha". I roto i tētahi atu tweet, ka whakaae a Mrs Hamilton kua "whakararuraru i te iwi". I kī a ia kua tangohia e ia ngā tohutoro katoa i roto i tōna kōtaha Twitter ki ngā aroha i tautokona e ia "kia kore ai e whakamā".

title: Ka whakamahi a Eminem i te waiata hei aroha ki a Rihanna mo te tautoko i a Pirihi Paraone
summary: Kua whakamahia e Eminem tētahi waiata hou hei whakapōhēhē ki a Rihanna mō te "noho" ki tana hoa tāne o Pirihi Paraone, nāna ia i tūkino i te tau 2009.
text: Ka rapa a Eminem i runga i tana ara a Zeus: "Me te whakapāha katoa ki a Rihanna mo taua waiata i māturu / Aroha mai, Rih, ehara i te mea kia pouri koe." E kōrero ana a ia ki tētahi waiata tekau tau i māturu i te tau 2019, i kī ai ia "he taha ahau ki a Pirihi Paraone". Ka puta a Zeus i runga i te pukaemi ohorere a Eminem Music to be Murdered By Side B. I whakaputaina te pukaemi, e haere tahi ana me te Music to be Murdered By, i te Paraire. I te wā i māturu ai te ara i tērā tau, ka kī te kaikōrero a Eminem: "He māturu tēnei o tētahi mea neke atu i te 10 tau. I muri i te tāhoputanga a Eminem, ka tangohia e ia, ka tuhi anō." I runga i tana ara hou, ka whakaae ia ki te kupu taketake "i hē i ahau". I tautohe a Paraone i te hara ki te whakaekenga i te tau 2009, a, e rima tau te whakamātautau me te whakahau ratonga hapori. He maha ngā wā i mahi tahi ai a Eminem rāua ko Rihanna, tae atu ki te tau kotahi o Amerika o te tau 2010 Love the Way You Lie, tae atu ki a Numb i tana pukaemi 2012 Unapologetic me The Monster from The Marshall Mathers LP 2 i te 2013. Ko te pukaemi hou a te rapper e whakaatu ana i ngā ngātahitanga ki a Dr Dre, Ty Dolla $ign, J Premier me Skylar Gray. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: E whā ngā hoiho Marks i whakaekea, i patua
summary: Kua whakaekea, kua patua tētahi hoiho i tētahi kāinga o Hemihi, e āki ana i ngā pirihimana kia whakatūpato i ngā rangatira kararehe kia mataara.
text: I kitea te tinana o te hoiho tūpāpaku e tētahi mema o te iwi whānui i te 14:10 BST i tētahi papa i Willis Lane i Four Marks. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Kāhui Pirihimana: "Te āhua nei he whara tō te hoiho e ōrite ana ki te whakaeke, ā, ka tirohia e te kararehe ā-ture te tinana." Ka tono a ia ki nga kōinga kia tirohia a rātau kararehe me te whakamaru i nga whare o waho. "E hiahia ana ngā āpiha ki te whakarongo mai i tētahi tangata kua kite i tētahi mea whakatūpato i taua rohe i roto i ngā haora e 24 kua taha," tana kī. "He tino āhua kore tēnei mahi me ngā uiui e haere tonu ana i tēnei ahiahi." Kāore anō ngā pirihimana kia kōrero me pēhea te matenga o te hoiho. Kua whakamōhiotia te RSPCA mo te matenga. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Hampshire Constabulary

title: Ka hopukina e nga Pirihimana o Humberside te atekōkiri taraka kai miraka
summary: Kua mau tētahi atekōkiri o tētahi taraka e pupuri ana i ngā matū mōrearea e kai ana i te miraka me te koko i te wā o te whiu pirihimana i ngā hara mīhini.
text: I mau te tangata i a ia e taraiwa ana i runga i te A15 tata ki te Arawhiti o Humber i te Wenerei. I huri tētahi atu atekōkiri taraka ki te pakihiwi mārō o te M18 tata ki Doncaster i a ia e whakamahi ana i ngā horoi mākū i runga i ōna ringa. I kitea nga atekōkiri hei wāhanga o tētahi mahi e toru rā i mahia e nga Pirihimana o Humberside. I kī a RW Barry Gardner tērā pea ka pā ki tētahi aituā nui, mate rānei. I kī a ia ka taea e ngā atekōkiri te anga atu ki tētahi pānui whiu pūmau me te whaina tae atu ki te £60, ka tonoa rānei kia haere ki tētahi akoranga mōhiotanga atekōkiri. "Kua kite mātou i ngā take rerekē. Ko ngā kaitaraiwa e whakamahi ana i ā rātou waea pūkoro, kāore he atekōkiri e mau ana i te tūru, e kai ana me ngā ringa e rua," tana kī. "Tērā pea ko te mea kino rawa atu inanahi [Wenerei] i runga i te M18 i reira te atekōkiri e whakatuwhera ana i tētahi pōkai horoi mākū, e horoi ana i ōna ringa, engari i a ia e mahi ana i tēnā i whakawhiti tonu ia ki te pakihiwi mārō. " Mehemea i pakaru tētahi waka, e rima maero ki raro, kua patua e ia, ā, kāore e kore ka mate te tangata e tū ana i waho. "Nā reira he mea nui kia titiro mātou ki te whakatū i tēnei momo whanonga me te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga huarahi." I kī a ia kua neke atu i te 50 nga hara i te wā o te mahinga.

title: Ka mate te kaiwhakahaere o te Wicker Man, a Robin Hardy
summary: Kua mate te kaiwhakahaere kiriata o Robin Hardy i te 86 o ona tau, kua whakaūngia e tētahi hoa whānau.
text: I tino mōhiotia a ia mō te kiriata o Ingarangi The Wicker Man, e hāngai ana ki a Tā Christopher Lee rāua ko Edward Woodward. I kōrerotia e te pikitia o te tau 1973 te pūrākau o te haihana pirihimana o Howie, i tākarotia e Woodward, i tonoa ki te rapu i tētahi kōtiro ngaro i te motu pakiwaitara o Summerisle. I mate a Hardy, nāna i whai ake i te Rākau Wicker i te tau 2011, i te Paraire, ka kī te hoa. I tērā tau, ka kī a Hardy e hiahia ana ia ki te hanga i tētahi pikitia Wicker Man tuatoru hei takoha ki a Tā Christopher. Ko te Wicker Man te tīmatanga āhuahira o Hardy, ā, e rua anō ngā whitiāhua āhuahira anake i haere ai ia. Ko te tuarua, ko te Fantasist, i tae mai i te 13 tau i muri i tana tīmatatanga. I te tau 2010, i tapaina e te Kaitiaki ko The Wicker Man te kiriata whakamataku tuawhā tino pai o ngā wā katoa. I kī a Tā Christopher Lee, i mate i tērā tau, ko te tino pai rawa atu o ngā kiriata neke atu i te 200 i whetū ai ia. Heoi anō, i roto i tētahi uiuinga 2013, ka kī a Hardy i te tuatahi ka wehi te studio i te pikitia he "para, kāore e taea te tuari" me te ngana ki te huri i te mutunga. I te mutunga ka tapahia, ka tukua hei wāhanga o tētahi pire taurua me te kiriata wehi rongonui Kaua e Titiro Ināianei. Heoi anō, ka hoatu e te studio he putanga whānui ake i te pikitia i te whiwhinga whakamihi i runga i te ara o te hākari. I waenganui i te hunga hei takoha takoha ki a Hardy ko te tumuaki o Edgar Wright, nāna i kī e kore rawa tana pikitia Hot Fuzz e hangaia me te kore te mana o te Tangata Wicker.

title: Ko Assassin's Creed e ārahi ana i ngā tautapa kēmu ataata Bafta
summary: Ko te Assassin's Creed Brotherhood e ārahi ana i te huarahi me ngā whakaingoatanga e whitu mō te kēmu ataata o tēnei tau o Baftas.
text: Call of Duty: Black Ops me Heavy Rain e ono ngā hurihanga me te Mass Effect 2 i runga i te rima me te LIMBO me te Super Mario Galaxy 2 me te whā ia. I te tapeke e 44 ngā kēmu e mōhiotia ana i tēnei tau me te hui tohu i tū i te Wenerei 16 o Poutāpeta i Rānana. Ko te nuinga o ngā toa e kōwhiria ana e ngā whika umanga, kotahi te kāwai i pōtitia e te iwi whānui. Kei te mahi te Assassin's Creed Brotherhood mō te mahi, te whakatutukitanga toi, te kēmu tino pai, te kēmu, te kaitākaro maha, te hangarau hangarau me te whakamahi ororongo. Ko ētahi atu kēmu i whakaingoatia puta noa i ngā kāwai e 16 ko DJ Hero 2, Fable III, Kaiwhakahaere Whutupōro 2011, Gran Turismo 5 me Plant vs. Zombies XBLA. I roto i te kāwai kēmu whatunga pāpori ka mau a Bejeweled Blitz ki a Farmerama, Fifa Superstars, My Empire, Zoo Mumba, me Zuma Blitz. Mai i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau. I te tau 2004 ka noho motuhake ngā tohu kēmu ataata. Tirohia te rārangi whakaingoa katoa i te paetukutuku a Bafta

title: Douglas Promenade revamp: Businesses to be offered loans
summary: Ka whai hua pea ngā umanga e pāngia ana e te kaupapa whakahou o Douglas Promenade i tētahi moni whakatārewa tae atu ki te £50,000, kua kī te minita hinonga.
text: The Douglas Promenade Support Scheme will offer unsecured interest-free loans repayable after 10 years. Ka wātea ngā moni ki ngā kamupene i ngā wāhanga hokohoko me te manaakitanga. I kī a Laurence Skelly MHK ka homai e te kaupapa he "tautoko pūtea anō e hiahiatia ana" ki ngā umanga kua ngaro te hokohoko nā te raruraru. Kāore i roto i te kaupapa ko ngā hōtēra kāore he wharekai e tuwhera ana ki te iwi whānui. Kua waiho e te Treasury te £2m mō ngā moni tārewa, e wātea ana mai i Hānuere 2020. Ka whakakapia e ia tētahi kaupapa āwhina ohorere i whakatūria i Aotearoa hei āwhina i te hunga i kōkuhu ōna hua i ngā mahi. Ka taea e ngā pakihi i tētahi wāhi i tohua i te huarahi te hoatu ki te kaupapa. Me tuku e ngā kaitono tētahi tauākī e whakaū ana ka haere tonu te umanga hei āwangawanga haere, tae atu ki tētahi take pakihi mō te moni taurewa kua whakamanatia e tētahi kaikaute mātauranga. The £25m promenade refurbishment project, which started in November 2018, is now expected to be completed in April 2021, six months later than originally planned. Mā te hoatu whakaaturanga ki tētahi komiti o Tynwald i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka kī ngā rangatira pakihi ka roa pea ngā kamupene tae atu ki te rua tau ki te whakaora i te pānga o te raruraru. I a ia e kōrero ana i Tynwald, ka kī a Pirihi Robertshaw he "tāpuitanga tino nui" i runga i te tangohanga o te kaupapa nā tōna matatinitanga me te rangirua i te tauine wā o te kaupapa whakahou. Ko tētahi koha £450 e tāpaetia ana hei utu i ngā utu kaute kāore i "tata mamao" ki te utu tūturu, ka tāpiritia e ia. Engari i kī a Tēnā Skelly he "whika tika" te nui hei utu i ngā utu.

title: He aha te tikanga o te rangatiratanga o Pirihitini i te UN?
summary: I te pātaitanga ki nga kaiwhakahaere o Ingarangi i te ono marama ki mua, mehemea kei te mahi mahere ohorere rātau mo te rangatiratanga o Pirihitini, tata tonu te mīharo ki te pātai.
text: Nā Nick BryantBBC News, New York Ehara i te mea kāore rātau i tino nui. Engari, ehara i te mea ko te pēhi i tētahi mahi UK e āwangawanga ana ki Hiria, Ukraine, Iraki me ētahi atu wāhi raruraru o te ao. I taua wā, i huatau mai te panekōrero i te whakahau "Kāo". Ināianei, kotahi wiki e haere ana i mua i te rā o te taupānga, kua whakatūpato a Hoani Matua, te pirimia o Ingarangi o mua, me whakawātea e te UK tōna tūru i runga i te Kaunihera Haumarutanga o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao mēnā ka puta mai i te taupānga he "Āe". "Ka ngaro i a mātau to mātau tūru i te tēpu o runga i te UN," tana kī. Kei te mamae ngā kaiwhakahaere o UK ki te whakamārama e kore te rangatiratanga o Pirihitini e pā ki te tūnga o Ingarangi i te Kaunihera Haumarutanga, ki tōna mema rānei o te karapu tāuke rawa i roto i te matauranga o te ao, te Rima Pūmau, P5 rānei o te tinana. Ko te UK te āhua whakakapi. Ka haere tonu ki te whakamahi i tētahi whakahē, he hōnore e tiritiri ana ki Te Hononga o Amerika, Wīwī, Rūhia me Haina, ahakoa ko tōna papa ingoa o nāianei, "Te Hononga o Ingarangi", tērā pea he tinihanga, he oxymoronic. He tauira mārama te tikanga whakauru. I muri i te wehenga o te Uniana o Rōpū, nāna i wehe te mana nui kotahi ki ngā iwi motuhake e 15, ka mau tonu a Mohihi i tōna tūru. Ahakoa ko te tāke UN, ko te mahi mātāmua o te rōpū whakahaere, e pā ana ki te Kotahitanga o ngā Whenua Manapori o Rōpū, i whakakapia te papa ingoa i roto i te Kaunihera Haumarutanga ki te Tōpūtanga o Rūhia. I tuhituhi noa iho a Boris Yeltsin, te perehitini o te Tōpūtanga o Rūhia, ki te Hēkeretari Ahuwhānui o UN, ka kī atu ki a ia ka tangohia e Mohihi te tūru, me te tautoko a ētahi atu whenua e 11 i te Kotahitanga o Ngā Whenua Motuhake. Kāore he pōti a Pākehā motuhake i runga i te Kaunihera Haumarutanga UN, engari rawa mēnā ka rapu, ka toa hoki i te pōti mō tētahi o ngā tūru rangitahi e 10, e puritia ana mō ngā whakaritenga e rua tau, ā, kāore e haere mai me te whakahē. Heoi anō, i te tuatahi, me tono tētahi Pākehā motuhake mō te mematanga UN. Ko te tikanga he tikanga tēnei, he take ngāwari noa iho ki te hoatu, kātahi ka whakaaetia. Hei tauira, ko ngā whenua katoa e 15 o Rōpūria o mua, ināianei he whenua mema UN. Ko Hūtane ki te Tonga, te whenua hōu rawa o te ao, e tuku ana i tētahi tauira hou ake. I roto i ngā rā e whiwhi ana i te rangatiratanga i te tau 2011, ka noho hei mema o te UN i roto i ngā rā e whiwhi ana i te rangatiratanga. Ko nga kaiwhakahaere o UK, e kī ana i te wheako o Hūtane ki te Tonga, kaore e whakaaro ki ētahi raruraru. He iti iho te uaua o te whakauru ki te UN i te tukanga mematanga o te Uniana o Ūropi, o te NATO rānei. Heoi anō, e ai ki te whakaaturanga a Kosovo, ehara te mematanga i te aunoa. I muri i te whakapuakitanga o te rangatiratanga o Hēpia i te tau 2008, ka mōhiotia a Kosovo e te 108 o ngā whenua mema UN e 193. Engari kua āraia e Rūhia rāua ko Haina, mā te whakamahi i o rāua mana whakahē, tōna mema o te UN. Heoi anō, ka whakamāramatia e nga kaiwhakahaere o UK kua tautohetohetia te rangatiratanga o Kosovo. Ma te pōti e mārama ai te tapahi o Pākehā. Kāore he huringa e tūtata ana ki a Airangi i raruraru hoki ki te uru ki nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao. I āraia e te Uniana o Rōpū ōna mema tae noa ki te tau 1955, i tētahi wāhanga nā te whakatūpato o Dublin i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Engari kāore e taea e Pākehā te tūtaki ki tētahi ātetetanga. I kī te Pirimia o Haina, a Li Keqiang, he pai ake ki a ia tētahi "United Kingdom", e kōrero ana i te taha o Rawiri Karauna i tētahi hui pānui i a Hōngongoi, engari kāore ngā kaiwhakahaere o UK e whakaaro ana e tū ana i te ara o tētahi Pākehā motuhake, ahakoa kei te māharahara a Beijing ki te wehewehenga iwi i roto i ōna ake rohe, ā, ka tautuhia he pātaka nui ki te taparenga o te rohe. E kore te rangatiratanga e whakaiti i te mana o Ingarangi i nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao, e ai ki te tohunga o UN a Thomas Weiss. "Kāore he māharahara mō Whitehall," tana kī. Mo Etinitini? "Te āhua nei kāore te reo o Pākehā i te tīariari," tana whakaaro. Mēnā i pōti a Pākehā "Āe", kāore he huringa inamata. Neke atu i te 18 marama te roa o nga whakaritenga e hama ana i nga taipitopito o te rangatiratanga. Ko tētahi wāhanga mō tēnā take, kāore tonu he whakaritenga ohorere e haere ana i roto i te whare wharenui e noho ana i te mīhana UK i Niu Ioka.

title: Coronavirus: Hinga i roto i ngā tūroro tino mate i Wales
summary: Kua hinga te maha o ngā tūroro mate kino ki te coronavirus i Wales ki tōna tau iti rawa mai i te 25 o Poutū.
text: I tēnei wā, e 32 ngā tūroro i roto i te tiaki nui, i runga rānei i ngā hāora i ngā hōhipera, e ai ki ngā whika hou o NHS Wales. I te rohe o te poari hauora o Cwm Taf Morgannwg, e rua marama ki muri e 29 ngā tūroro Covid-19 i roto i te tiaki nui i te taumata o te mate urutā. Tae atu ki te poari hauora o Hywel Dda, tokotoru ngā tūroro o rāua i tēnei wā. "He tohu pai i tēnei wāhanga kua kite mātou i ngā pēhanga tiaki nui kua whakahekea pea e 80% mai i te taumata," te kī a te rangatira nui o NHS Wales, a Dr Andrew Goodall. "Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e rongoatia ana i roto i te tiaki nui ināianei kāore he coronavirus, e whakaatu ana i ētahi atu mahi NHS e tū ana." I kī a ia ko tētahi o ngā take i tirohia e ia, engari i kī ia he "mīharo" hoki ko te maha o ngā tūroro e noho tonu ana i te hōhipera e rongoatia ana ki te Covid-19 - 885 - e ōrite ana ki te whakakī i ngā hōhipera nui e toru. Ko te toharite e whitu rā i te katoa o ngā whakaurunga o ia rā ki ngā hōhipera o ngā kēhi Covid-19 kua whakaūngia, e whakapaetia ana hoki i tēnei wā, e 90 - 17 te iti iho i tērā wiki. He aha ngā mea e puta ana i ngā wāhi rerekē o Weera? Ko nga whika hou e whakaatu ana i te heke haere tonu o te huaketo. Ko Aneurin Bevan huri noa i Newport me ngā awaawa o Gwent tawhito he wāhi wera moata mō te coronavirus. Ināianei e rua ngā tūroro i roto i ōna wae tiaki nui me ētahi atu take rongoā, kaua e rongoatia mō te huaketo. I te taumata, e 48 ngā tūroro tino mate o te poari hauora i te wā kotahi me Covid-19 engari i tēnei wā e ono. Engari i kōrero a Dr Goodall ki tētahi kōrero pāpāho kei te māharahara tonu ia mō te tūnga tuarua o te tīmatanga o te coronavirus. "Kei roto i te raumati, e hono ana ki ngā rāhuitanga maukati? Kei mua i te hōtoke, ina nui ake pea te mōrearea o te huaketo ki te tarenga i taua wā?" tana kī. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua rite mātou nā te mea kua pupuri mātou i ngā whakaritenga ohorere i whakaritea e mātou, engari nā te mea kua nui ake tā mātou ako mō te huaketo." I kī a Dr Goodall ko ngā hōhipera āpure e 19 kua whakatūria ki Wales e noho tonu ana "he ohorere" engari kei te puritia ngā kōrero ki ngā poari hauora mēnā he "ētahi atu tūranga tautoko ka taea hoki e aua hōhipera āpure".

title: Ka whakatūpato ngā rōia i ngā pirihimana mō ngā 'herenga' reo Welsh
summary: Me kaua ngā pirihimana e 'whakarere i a rātau herenga' ki te tuku uiuinga ā-ture reo Welsh, kua kī ngā rōia.
text: Kei roto i ngā paerewa i whakaritea e te Komihana Reo Welsh he mahi ki te whakarato i tētahi ratonga whakamāori tukutahi mēnā kāore e taea te whakahaere uiui i te reo Welsh. Kua amuamu nga rangatira kātipa i Uēra he 'kore tika, he tōtika hoki' tēnei whakaritenga. I kī te Kaunihera Pae i ngā whakahē pirihimana "kaua e tāpae". I tēnei wā mēnā kāore he āpiha kōrero Welsh e wātea ana ki te whakahaere i tētahi uiuinga i Welsh, ka tukuna e ngā ope pirihimana i Wales tētahi ratonga "whakawhitinga whai muri". Ko te tikanga ka whakamāoritia ngā pātai i te reo Ingarihi ki te reo Welsh, i mua i te whakamāoritanga o te urupare ki te reo Ingarihi. E hiahia ana te Komihana Reo Welsh kia noho ngātahi te whakamāoritanga - pērā i te kōti puta noa i Weera. I kī te Pirihimana Tuarua o Ngā Pirihimana o Te Raki o Wales, a Richard Debicki, e ārahi ana i te reo Welsh mō ngā ope e whā i Weera, e "mahi ana i ngā mahi katoa" ki te whakarato i tētahi ratonga reorua katoa ki ngā hapori paetata. Heoi anō, ka hiahiatia e te whakawhitinga tukutahi te pūtea penapena nui, ā, ka whakakāhoretia pea ngā tūhuratanga, tana kī. "Ki te kore e wātea tētahi āpiha kōrero Welsh, ko tā mātou kōwhiringa manako ko te whakamahi i te whakamāoritanga whai muri," te kī a Tēnā Debicki. "Hei whakamahi i te whakawhitinga tukutahi, me huri e ngā ope Welsh e whā ā rātou hanganga ōkiko, te tiki i tētahi pūnaha IT hōu, te whakangāwari mō tētahi ratonga whakawhitinga tukutahi, me te whakatika i ngā take e pā ana ki ngā whakaritenga o te Ture Whakaaturanga Pirihimana me te Ture Whakaaturanga Hara (PACE). " Hei whakamahi i te whakawhitinga tukutahi, ina whakapūketetia ngā kupu ā-waha, tuhituhi rānei, he tawhiti rawa atu i te tino pai, ā, ka pā pea ki ngā raruraru i te wā o te tūhuratanga," tana tāpiri mai. Mā te whakakāhore i aua tohenga, kua kī te Komiti Whakahōu Ture a te Kaunihera Pae kāore te whakamāoritanga tukutahi e takahi i te PACE, ā, he iti iho te whakararuraru ki ngā uiuinga i te āhua tīmata o te whakamāoritanga whai muri. I kī te rōia o Kānata, a Rhodri Williams: "Kāore te tautohe a nga pirihimana e tāpae kia hoatu ai te paerewa. " Instantaneous translation is in place in courts up and down the land and works very well."

title: I pūruatia te utu kohinga para māra i Carmarthenshire
summary: Me utu e ngā tāngata i Carmarthenshire kia kohia ai a rātau para māra ā muri ake nei.
text: I pūruatia e te komiti nui o te kaunihera ngā mahere hei whakakapi i ngā pēke wairākau ki ngā ipu wīra i te Mane. E £48 te utu o ngā ipu i te taha o te tau, ā, ka kohia ngā para māra i ia wiki i waenganui o Poutāpeta/Aperira me Whiringahora. I tēnei wā ka utua e ngā kainoho te £3.50 mō tētahi tākai e 20 ngā pēke wairākau e kohia ana ia wiki. I kī a Carmarthenshire e hiahiatia ana te huringa nā te whakaurunga o tētahi waka hou i te mutunga o te marama. I tēnei wā ka kohia ngā para māra ki te para kai, engari ka whai wāhanga motuhake ngā waka hōu mō te moumou kai anake. Carmarthenshire council said there was a need to request the new wheelie bin service and, if households do not have enough garden waste, it can be shared with neighbours. Ka taea e ngā tangata whenua te whakamahi tonu i ngā pokapū tukurua para o te whare ki te whakawātea i ā rātou para māra, wairākau rānei i te kāinga.

title: Ko te tuatoru o ngā ākonga NI e haere ana ki ngā whare wānanga ki tētahi atu wāhi
summary: Neke atu i te tuatoru o ngā ākonga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i tīmata i tō rātou tohu i tētahi whare wānanga i tētahi atu wāhi o UK i tērā tau.
text: Nā Robbie MeredithBBC News NI Education Correspondent E ai ki ngā whika i whakaputaina e te Tari mō te Whakahaerenga (DfE). O ngā ākonga 14,035 i tīmata i te mātauranga tiketike i te 2016-17, 65.5% i noho ki Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te ako. Ko ngā ūnga tino pai mō te hunga i haere ki te ako ko Pākehā me te raki-hauauru o Ingarangi. Ko te Whare Wānanga o John Moores i Liverpool te mea tino pai mō te hunga e ako ana i tētahi atu wāhi i te UK, e 1,775 ngā ākonga o Kīriria ki te Raki i te tau 2016-17. Ko ētahi atu whare wānanga e paingia ana e ngā ākonga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i Dundee, i Glasgow, i Etinitini me te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria. Hinga i roto i ngā ākonga wā-wā Ko ngā whika hōu rawa e whakaatu ana e tata ana ki te haurua o ngā pakeke 18 tau i Aiarangi ki te Raki e tomo ana ki te mātauranga tiketike. Ko te tapeke o te 48.2% i uru ki te mātauranga tiketike i te 2015-16, e taumira ana ki te iti iho i te tuatoru 25 tau ki mua. I roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha, neke atu i te 4% te tokomaha o ngā ākonga o Aiarangi ki te Raki e ako ana i tētahi atu wāhi o te UK. Kua whakaaturia e ngā whika o mua he iti iho i te tuatoru e hoki ana ki te kāinga ki te mahi i muri i te whiwhinga whiwhinga. He iti noa iho te hekenga o te 1% o te maha o ngā ākonga i te mātauranga teitei i Aiarangi ki te Raki i te tau 2016-17. E 54,570 ngā ākonga i rēhitatia ki te mātauranga tiketike i te tau 2016-17, he taka o te 675 i te 2015-16. Tērā te hekenga 2.6% o ngā tauira tau tuatahi i roto i te mātauranga tiketike, mai i te 17,250 i te 2015-16 ki te 16,800 i tērā tau. Ko te nuinga o tērā i raro i te hinganga nui o te maha o ngā ākonga e tīmata ana i ngā akoranga wā, i te mea ka piki ake ngā whakaurunga wā katoa i te 7%. E 100 ngā whenua e whakaatu ana i ngā whika mō ia kaupapa e whakaatu ana hoki i ngā āputa ira tangata nui i ētahi wāhi. Neke atu i te whā i roto i te rima ngā ākonga tākuta he wahine, ā, neke atu i te 70% o ngā whakaurunga mātauranga. I roto i te pūkaha me te hangarau, neke atu i te whā i roto i ia rima ngā ākonga he tāne, tae atu ki te toru hauwhā o ngā ākonga pūtaiao rorohiko. Ahakoa neke atu i te whā o ngā ākonga e rima i roto i te mātauranga tiketike nō Aiarangi ki te Raki, ināianei he ākonga mai i ngā whenua neke atu i te 100 i konei. I tua atu i te toenga o te UK me te Republic of Ireland, he nui tonu ngā tau mai i Haina, Mareia me Te Hononga o Amerika.

title: Whakahē i te mate āwhina, e kī ana a BMA
summary: Kua tāruatia e ngā tākuta to rātau ātete ki te āwhina i te mate, i ta rātau hui ā-tau.
text: Nā Nick TriggleHealth, i taupatupatutia e ngā Kaitautapa Rongokōrero o TE AO i te hui a te Pānga Rongoā o Ingarangi i Te Rūnanga o Ingarangi te take i muri i tētahi mōtini e karanga ana ki te rōpū whakahaere kia mau i tētahi tūnga kūpapa. Engari i pōti nga rongoā ki te whakakāhore i te kaupapa. I whakatūpato ngā tākuta e kōrero ana i taua takahanga mā te huringa tūnga e tuku i te karere hē. Ko te mōtini kia neke mai i te ātete i tētahi huringa i roto i te ture ki te tango i tētahi tūnga kūpapa i tonoa e Raymond Tallis, he tohunga geriatric kua mawhiti me te kaiwhakahaere o ngā Tohunga Rongoā mō te Mate Āwhina. E manakohia ana e ia te mate āwhina mō ngā tūroro e mate ana i te mate, i te mātauranga ā-hinengaro. I kī atu a ia ki te hui: "Ko te mate āwhina he take mō te iwi katoa, ehara mō te mahi rongoā." I tāpiritia e ia te ture o nāianei, e whakakore ana i te mate āwhina, e whakahau ana i te tangata kia "matekai i a rātau ki te mate, ki ngā whakamomori me ngā haere ki rāwāhi". Engari i kōrero ētahi atu tākuta i te hui ki te ariā. I kī a Prof Wheua Ilora Finlay, he hoa whakawhiti-tēpu me te ahorangi o te tiaki pārekareka, he mea nui kia "kaua rawa ngā tākuta e haere atu i ngā tūroro". Ka kī a ia: "Kaore te whakatūtū e kawe mai i te toenga ki te taupatupatu. E kī ana ki te Pāremata e kitea ana e mātau he kōwhiringa e whakaaetia ana." A, i kī a Rebecca Briscoe, he tākuta iti, mā te huri i te tūnga o te BMA e "takahi i te whakawhirinaki" o ngā tūroro i te mea he kōwhiringa "māmā, ngāwari, tino mōrearea" te mate āwhina. I kī hoki a Dr Hamish Meldrum, te manukura o te BMA, ka ātete a ia ki te neke ki tētahi tūnga kūpapa. I karangatia e ia ko te "kino rawa atu o ngā kōwhiringa katoa" i te mea ka pā ki te aukati i te rōpū whakahaere i te taupatupatu.

title: Ko te rangatira o te Kaunihera o Middlesbrough 'māminga i runga i te whakahōutanga o te āpiha'
summary: A council boss "misled" councilors into supporting the dismissal of an officer, a tribunal has found.
text: Middlesbrough Council chief executive Tony Parkinson "withheld information" from councillors who were making a redundancy decision on Karen Whitmore. I kī a Mrs Whitmore i whakakorea a ia nā te mea kāore a ia i whakaae ki te "huri matapo" ki ngā hinganga o te kaunihera. I kī te kaunihera ka ako i te kitenga a te rūnanga i ākiritia tikatia a ia. I kī a Mrs Whitmore, te tumuaki kaiāwhina o te whakahaere me te whakahaere tae noa ki June 2016, i muri i tana whakaara i ngā māharahara mō te hokonga rawa a te kaunihera. I roto i tēnei ko Acklam Hall i hokona e te kaunihera mō te £1.2m, he iti iho i tōna uara mākete. Ka kī a ia: "Tērā tētahi ahurea i te Kaunihera o Middlesbrough e huri matapo ana ki te wāhi i hē ai ngā mea, i tonoa ahau kia mahi i tēnā, ā, kāore au i whakaae ki te mahi pēnā." I roto i ngā kitenga a te rūnanga, kua kitea e te HAU, i kitea i ākiritia tikatia a ia. Engari i whakaaro te kaiwhakawā o te rūnanga he take motuhake ngā kerēme a Ms Whitmore mō te hokonga rawa, ā, he "ahurea kōtiro". I kī a Mrs Whitmore: "Ko te kitenga o te pana tika i takea mai i te mea i hoatu ngā mōhiohio hē ki ngā kaihanga whakatau me ngā mōhiohio i puritia. " I kitea e te rūnanga whakawā he mōhiohio i puritia mai i [ngā kaikaunihera], ā, i whakatauria e rātau i runga i tēnā." I kī tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera: "Ka kōrero mātou i te wā e tika ana ina whai wāhi mātou ki te ako taipitopito i ngā kitenga a te paepae. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakamārama i whakatakatia katoatia ngā kerēme whakahāwea a Mrs Whitmore i te wā o ngā whakahaere." Ka whakatauria te utu mō Mrs Whitmore ā muri ake nei.

title: Gloria Arroyo o Piripīni: He pakanga ture roa e whakatata ana
summary: Mehemea i kī atu koe ki ngā Piripīni i te tau 2001 ka hopukina tō rātou perehitini hou o Gloria Arroyo i tētahi rā mō te tinihanga pōti, kāore he tokomaha e whakapono ki a koe.
text: Nā Kate McGeownBBC News, i tīmataria a Manila Mrs Arroyo ki te mana e kī ana i tētahi wā hou o te taparenga me te pono. Ki te iwi o Piripīni, ko ia ngā mea katoa ehara i te mea ko tōna tuatahi nui o Hohepa Estrada. He mārire ia, he mātauranga; i ako a ia i te ohaoha i te US hei hoa akomanga o Bill Clinton; i haere mai a ia i tētahi whānau rongonui - ko tōna pāpā ko Diosdado Macapagal te perehitini i nga tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua. A, ko te mea nui rawa, ahakoa i mahi a ia hei tuakana o Tēnā Estrada, kua tawhiti atu a ia i a ia i nga whakapae hāmate me te tāhaetanga i panaia ai ia i te tari. Engari ināianei, e 10 tau i muri iho, kei te tārua te hītori i a ia anō, ā, kua hopukina a Mīhana Arroyo, pēnei i a Tēnā Estrada i mua i a ia. Kua whakataua a ia ki te tinihanga pōti, ā, ki te kitea he hara, ka taea te whakapau i te toenga o tōna oranga ki te whare herehere. 'Aratau ora' I te tīmatanga o tana perehitini, he angitu nui a Mrs Arroyo. I raro i tana mātakitaki i whakatūria ai te umanga pokapū waea o Piripīni, ā, i hangaia e ia ngā huarahi e tino hiahiatia ana me ngā ratonga waka waka i waenganui i ngā moutere rerekē o te whenua. "He tino rerekētanga nga waka rererangi ki te whakangāwari i te nekehanga taonga puta noa i te whenua. He huringa nui tērā mo te pai ake," te kī a Gonzalo Jurado, te ahorangi ohaoha o mua o Mrs Arroyo, ā, ko tētahi o ana kaitautoko matua. Engari kāore i roa i mua i te kitenga o Mrs Arroyo i a ia e noho ana hei arotahi o nga whakapae hāmate. I te tau 2003, ka tangohia e tētahi rōpū hōia taitamariki tētahi hōtēra me te pokapū hokohoko i waenganui o Manira, e whakapae ana i a Mrs Arroyo ki te whakahaere hē, ā, ka whakaae i a rātau tauwhānui ki te whakaputa moni hōia. I mutu rangimarie te whakakeke, engari i puta mai anō ngā kerēme hāmate i te tau e whai ake nei, i tana anga atu ki tana pōti tuatahi. I whakakapia e ia a Tēnā Estrada me te kore pōti, engari i te tau 2004 i whawhai a ia ki tana ake whakahau, i toa whāiti noa iho i a ia. I te mutunga o te poipoi, ka whakapaea a Mrs Arroyo ki te tinihanga pōti, ā, he hopukanga waea o tētahi kōrerorero i waenganui i a ia me tētahi mana pōti e kōrerorero ana i tōna tawhē wikitōria. "I te tau 2004 i te tīmatanga o te wetewete," te kī a te kaitātari tōrangapū o Marites Vitug. "He tokomaha ana pirihitini i matekiri, i whakarere i a ia, nā reira ka uru ia ki te aratau ora." I ngā tau i muri mai, ka anga atu a Mrs Arroyo ki ētahi atu whakapae. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā i tangohia e ia te $16m o ngā moni kāwanatanga e tika ana kia whakamahia hei hoko maniua, ā, ka ngana ki te uru ki tētahi mahi aunui hei painga whaiaro. I whakakāhore a ia i ngā kerēme katoa, a, ka mau tonu ki te mana, ahakoa he maha atu ngā whakahē me ngā whakamātau kukitanga. Engari i te mutunga o tana wā i June 2010, ko ia te perehitini tino kore pai mai i a Ferdinand Marcos, te tangata i takahia i roto i te People Power Revolution o te tau 1986. Te tautohe pōti I tana wehenga atu i te tari, te āhua nei he wā noa iho i mua i te whakatau i a Mrs Arroyo i runga i ētahi o ngā whakapae maha e makaia ana i tōna ara. Kua whakaritea e tōna kaiwhakawhiwhi, a Benigno Aquino, te whiu i te hāmate tētahi o ngā mahi tino hira i runga i tana rārangi take. E mōhio ana a ia ki te kore e taea e ia te tiki i te wahine nāna te whakahaere o mua ki te whakautu mo ana mahi, ka whiua tōna whakawhirinakitanga hei perehitini. "Ka ngoikore a ia, me te mea kāore e taea e ia te whakatutuki i ana kī taurangi pōti," te kī a Bernito Lim, he ahorangi pūtaiao tōrangapū i te Whare Wānanga o Ateneo de Manila. Engari ehara i te mea ngāwari. I a ia e ngana ana ki te anga atu ki tētahi whakawā, kua kitea e Tēnā Aquino rāua ko te Hēkeretari o te Ture o Leila de Lima i runga i tētahi ara tūtuki ki te Kōti Matua. E rua nga wā i hurihia e te kōti tētahi whakahau kāwanatanga e ārai ana i a Mrs Arroyo kia kaua e wehe atu i te whenua. Ināianei kei te titiro ngā kaiwhakawā mēnā he kore ture te pae nāna i tuku ngā whakapae ki a ia - ahakoa me whakahawea a Mrs de Lima ki te kōti. I tētahi wāhanga, ka korerotia a Mrs Arroyo e nga kaiwhakawā ka taea e ia te haere, nā reira ka tae atu ia ki te taunga rererangi i roto i tētahi tūru tūru me te whītiki kakī kia hurihia e ngā mana kāwanatanga. Ka murua ngā Piripīni e mātakitaki ana i te kōrero i runga i te pouaka whakaata mō te whakaaro ko te kaupapa tērā o tētahi o ngā telenovela e tino paingia ana puta noa i te whenua. E kī ana ngā kaiwawao he whakamāramatanga ngāwari mō ēnei hurihanga me ēnei hurihanga katoa: i te wā e whārahi ana ngā kaitautoko a Tēnā Aquino i te Rōpū Nui, kei te rangatira tonu ngā kaitautoko a Mīhana Arroyo i te Kōti Matua. "Ko tā rātou mahi ko te pōti i tōna manakohanga," e kī ana a Marites Vitug. "He mea tino ahurea. Ki te whakanohoia koe e te mana i whakaritea, e nama ana koe ki te mana whakatū he nama whakamoemiti." Ināianei kua hopukina a Mīharo Arroyo, engari ko tēnei, ko te tīmatanga noa iho. Tērā anō te take o te whakawā. Ki te kitea he hara a ia, ka whakauru anō he tono ki te Kōti Matua. E pā ana ngā utu o nāianei ki ngā kerēme i āwhina a Mrs Arroyo i te whānau kaha o Ampatuan ki te pōti i te tau 2007, engari e mōhio ana ōna kaitautoko me ōna kaiwhakahē tērā pea he nui ake ngā utu e haere mai ana. "He pakanga roa tēnei," te kī a Ahorangi Lim. Ahakoa ēnei taiapa, kei te hiahia tonu ngā Piripīni kia noho a Mrs Arroyo i tōna rā i te kōti. Ka whakarāpopototia e Maria Ignacio, he kaiako o Manila, te whakaaro o te tokomaha: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te mōhio kāore he tangata i runga ake i te ture."

title: Coronavirus: Ka hinga nga mate Pāniora mo te whā o nga rā whai muri
summary: Kua hinga te maha o ngā mate coronavirus i Paniora mō te whā o ngā rā whai muri, e whakapiki ana i ngā tūmanako kua hipa te whenua i te taumata o te tīmatatanga.
text: Ko te tikanga o te pikinga o te Mane e 637 nga mate, 13,055 kua mate katoa. Neke atu i te 135,000 ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia e te iwi, ko te nuinga i Uropi, engari kua pōturi haere ngā mate hou. I Itari, i hinga te maha o nga mate hou i te 1,031 ki te 1,941 i te Mane, engari i piki te mate ki te 636 - neke atu i te 100 teitei ake i te ra o mua. Ko te pōturi o ngā pāpātanga whakapokenga i ngā whenua maha o Ūropi e whakaara ana i te tūmanako kei te whakawhāiti ngā tikanga tawhiti pāpori pākaha i te horapa o Covid-19 - te mate i takea mai i te huaketo. I te Mane, i pānuitia e te tumuaki o Ateria ngā mahere kia tīmata ki te whakaiti i ētahi o ngā rāhuitanga i te wāhi nā te mate urutā. Kua tata ki te 1.3 miriona ngā kēhi me te 70,800 ngā mate i whakaūngia puta noa i te ao mai i te putanga mai o te huaketo i Haina i Hakihea, e ai ki te tatau a te Whare Wānanga o Johns Hopkins. He aha ngā whika Pāniora hou? Ko nga whika o te Mane e whakaatu ana i te pikinga o te 4,273 nga keehi hou kua whakapumautia, ka tae mai te tapeke o te motu ki te 135,032. Ko te tapeke o nga keehi o Spain he tuarua anake ki te United States, he nui ake te taupori. Ko te whenua e 47 miriona tāngata hoki te tuarua o te mate teitei rawa i te ao, i muri i Itari. Engari ko te whika o te Mane o te 637 te mea iti rawa i tuhia i roto i te tata ki te rua wiki, mai i te 24 o Poutū. He heke mai i nga mate hou e 674 i whakapumautia i te Rātapu. Ko te mate o ia rā i pā ki te taumata o te 950 i tērā Tāite. I kī a María José Sierra, te tumuaki tuarua o te komiti ohorere hauora o Paniora, i te āhua nei kei te pōturi haere te tere o te tipu o te taiepa "i ngā rohe katoa" o te whenua. E whakaaro ana ngā āpiha ki te whakawhānui ake i te whakamātautau coronavirus kia whakauru i te hunga kāore he tohumate. "He mea nui kia mōhio ko wai kua tāhaetia kia āhei ai ki te hiki āta hiki i te raka o ngā tangata Pāniora," te kī a te Minita Ā-Rohe a Arancha González i roto i tētahi uiuinga pouaka whakaata. I hikitia ngā wāhitaki i te Mane i te maha o ngā taone mārō i te rohe o Catalonia. I kii te Pirimia a Pedro Sánchez i te mutunga wiki ka taea etahi herenga, tae atu ki te pupuri i nga kaimahi kore-nui i te kainga, ka taea te hiki i muri i te Aranga. Kua katia ngā umanga, tae atu ki ngā toa me ngā wharekai, mai i te 14 o Poutāpeta, ā, kua kīa kia noho ki te kāinga me te haere anake ki waho ki te mahi i ngā mahi matua. He aha te mea e puta ana i tētahi atu wāhi o Uropi? Neke atu i te 50,000 nga oranga o te taiepa puta noa i te whenua. Ko te mate i Itari te teitei rawa o te ao, e tū ana i te 16,523. I te Mane, ka pūrongotia e te minita parenga tūmatanui e 636 nga mate hou. Ko te 111 tērā te teitei ake i te tawhiti o te Rātapu - te mea iti rawa mai i te 19 o Poutāpeta - engari e 45 iti iho i te Hātarei. I piki ake te maha o ngā mate hou i te 1,941, engari i haere tonu te ia whakaheke. I Ateria, i reira e 220 nga mate kua ripoatahia, i panuitia e te Tumuaki Sebastian Kurz nga mahere kia tiimata ki te whakaiti i etahi o nga herenga i whakaritea ki reira. Mēnā ka ū tonu ngā Ateria ki ngā tikanga o nāianei, ka whakaaetia ngā toa iti ake, kāore i te tino nui kia whakatuwhera anō i roto i te wiki noa iho, ka kī a ia. I tēnei wā, ka whakatūpato te minita pūtea Wīwī ko te whakahekenga o te ohaoha i tēnei tau pea ko te tino kino rawa mō te whenua mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I pūrongotia e Wīwī e 833 ngā mate hou i ngā hōhipera me ngā kāinga nēhi, ka kawea mai te tapeke ki te 8,911 mai i te 1 o Poutāpeta. Ko te tawhiti o ia rā e 315 teitei ake i ngā haora 24 o mua. I kī te Tumuaki o Tiamana, a Angela Merkel, ko te taiepa te wero nui rawa atu i anga atu ki te Uniana o Ūropi. I tāruatia e ia kua rite tana kāwanatanga ki te āwhina i te kōti i te āhua o te wā. I Te Hononga o Ingarangi, i noho tonu te Pirimia o Boris Johnson i te hōhipera, engari i roto i te "wairua pai", e ai ki tētahi kaikōrero. Kei te noho tonu te pakeke e 55 tau "i raro i te mātakitaki" i muri i tana whakauru ki te hōhipera me ngā tohu tohetohe o te coronavirus hei mehua whakatūpato i te Rātapu. I kii te Tari Hauora i te Mane e 439 ano nga tangata i mate i te hohipera i muri i te whakamatautau pai mo te coronavirus, ka eke te katoa o te mate ki te 5,373.

title: Ko te tangata ngaro ko Pirihi Me te tono i puta noa i te motu
summary: E toru marama ki mua, e kī ana ngā pirihimana e uiui ana i te ngaronga o tētahi tangata e toru marama ki mua, kāore anō rātau kia whakataki i te kaituku o tētahi reta e kī ana kua mate a ia.
text: I kitea whakamutunga a Pirihi Me, e 28, i tōna kāinga i Kelvedon, i Essex, i te 25 o Me. I kitea tana Volkswagen Golf i mahue i te kāinga o Fairstead, e ai ki nga Pirihimana o Essex. I whiwhi pirihimana i tētahi reta i Hune, i tukuna i roto i te poutāpeta, e kī ana kua mate a Tēnā Me. Ināianei kei te pānui a Charity Missing People i te kēhi o Tēnā Me i te motu. I kī a Det Ch Insp Marina Ericson: "E tino whakamihi ana ahau ki ngā āwhina katoa kua homai e ngā Tāngata Ngaro ki a mātau, ā, ko tēnei pānuitanga ā-motu ka taea e mātou te toro atu ki tētahi hunga whānui ake me te tono mōhiohio mō te wāhi o Pirihi. " Mai i te ngaronga o Pirihi i Mei, kua inoi ahau ki tētahi tangata whai mōhiohio kia haere mai ki mua. "Tērā tētahi tangata i reira e mōhio ana ki tētahi mea, engari, ahakoa he aha, kāore anō kia haere mai ki mua i tēnei wā. " I tono ahau i te 1 o Hune, kia whakapā mai ki a au te kaituhi o tētahi reta, i tukuna e Royal Mail ki te teihana pirihimana o Witham i te 1 o Hune. "I tēnei wā, kāore anō taua tangata kia whakapā atu. E hiahia ana ahau ki te tono ki a rātau kia whakapā hāngai mai ki a au."

title: Raraunga whaimana 'hīpoki i ngā whakamomori'
summary: Tērā pea he teitei ake ngā pāpātanga o te whakamomori i Ingarangi me Uēra i te kōrero tika nā te mea kua rerekē te āhua o te whakapūkete mate a te koroni, e hua ana te rangahau.
text: E kī ana ngā tohunga mātauranga i ngā whakataunga kōrero, e whakaahua ana i ngā āhuatanga e karapoti ana i te matenga, ka uaua ake ki ngā kaitatauranga te tāutu i ngā whakamomori i ngā hopukanga uiui tūturu. E kī ana te Office for National Statistics e 4,648 ngā tāngata i mate i te tau 2009. E kī ana e māia ana ki ngā raraunga e whakaatu ana i ngā mokatere e hinga ana, engari kei te arotake i ngā aratuka. E tautohe ana ngā koroni kāore anō kia rerekē ā rātou mahi ā-ture, ā, e hiahiatia ana e rātou he tohu tiketike hei tāhopu i te whai i a rātou. Ko te nuinga o ngā uiuinga e 30,000 i whakahaeretia i ia tau i Ingarangi me Uēra ka whakamutua ki ngā whakataunga poto tūturu, pēnei i te mate i te patu ture, i te aituā, i ngā take māori rānei. Engari kua tipu te whakamahinga o ngā whakataunga kōrero - mai i te 111 i te 2001, ki te 3,012 i te 2009 - i te nuinga o te wā nā ngā koroni e whakaara ana i ngā take āwangawanga tūmatanui, pēnei i ngā āhuatanga o tētahi hōhipera, kāinga tiaki rānei i mate ai tētahi tangata. 'Arotakenga māminga' Heoi anō, e kī ana a Prof David Gunnell o te Whare Wānanga o Te "I te pikinga o te whakamahinga o ngā whakataunga kōrero, tērā anō pea te whakahāwea i te whai i a ia," ka tuhituhi a ia i roto i tētahi tuhinga i roto i te British Medical Journal, me ngā hoa mahi mai i ngā Whare Wānanga o Oxford me Manchester. Tērā pea ka puta tēnei ki te arotakenga māminga o ngā rautaki ārai ā-motu, ā-rohe hoki, me te hīpoki i ngā pānga o ngā uauatanga o te ohaoha i runga i ngā pāpātanga o te whai i a rātou. "Heoi anō... Tērā pea ka whakapeka ngā pāpātanga o te whai i a ia i ngā wāhi e whakamahia ana e ngā kaiwawao e tino whakamahi ana i aua whakataunga," ka tāpiri mai rātau. Ahakoa me mātua mōhio ngā kaiwawao ki te hopu i ngā whakataunga whai i a ia, ka whakamahia e ngā kaitatauranga he paearu pākaha iho hei tāutu i te wā i patua ai e tētahi i a rātau anō. E mōhio ana nga tohunga mātauranga i roto i ngā whakataunga e pupuri ana i ngā kīanga pēnei i "i mate tōna ake mate i runga i te mate pokanoa", kāore i te whakahuatia te whāinga. Engari ahakoa te kaha o te whakamomori, tērā pea ka whakaakona e te ONS hei aituā. Tērā pea ka hoatu e ētahi kaitirotiro he whakataunga poto i runga i te whakapono ka karohia e tēnei te tāpiri ki te mamae o te whānau, e huatau ana a Prof Gunnell. Ahakoa kei te arotake te ONS i tana waehere o ngā whakataunga kōrero, ka kī tētahi kōrero e mōhio ana "he pono te pikitia whānui o ngā āhuatanga o te whai i a ia e whakaaturia ana e ngā tatauranga ā-motu". Heoi anō, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te rerekētanga o te mahi a ngā koroni rerekē, ko te tikanga ka iti iho te pono o ngā whika paetata. Kei te mahi tahi mātou me ngā koroni, me ētahi atu e āwangawanga ana, ki te whakatika i ēnei take." 'Kāore he mea hōu' E whakaaro ana te ONS mēnā ko ngā mate katoa i te tārewa, i te paitini rānei i hoatu i ngā whakataunga kōrero a ngā kaiwawao, ā, i whakawaeheretia hei aituā a te ONS, ka whakahāwea te mokatere 2009 tae atu ki te ono hēneti. I kī a Onati Rebello, o te Rōpū Koroni o Ingarangi me Weera, i "tino mōhio te iwi ki te raruraru ONS i te whakakotahitanga o ngā mate". Engari i kī a ia: "Ki te kitea te whakamomori, kāore he whakatauranga kē e whakaarotia. " Kua tukuna te whakangungu ki ngā kaiwawao e whakamārama ana i te raruraru me tētahi tono e ai ki ngā whakaaturanga i whiwhia kia tino mārama ki te whakaaro i roto i ngā whakataunga kōrero." I kī a Prof Louis Appleby, te kaiwhakahaere o te Rōpū Tohutohu Rautaki Ārai Whakamate a te kāwanatanga, "kāore he mea hōu" i te kimi i ngā tau whai i a ia nā te rangirua mō te whāinga. "Kaore he take e rangirua ai i te hinganga o te whai i a ia i Ingarangi i roto i te tekau tau kua taha," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ko te mahere utu mōkito 'ka pā pea ki ngā kawenga ake wehikē'
summary: Kua whakatūpato ngā kaiwhakarato wehikē Pākehā ki te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ka pā ngā mahere ki te whakauru i ngā utu mōkito i runga i te waipiro ki te whakarewa i ngā kawenga ake.
text: E karanga ana te Scotch Whisky Association ki tētahi hui me te kāwanatanga SNP hou, ā, ināianei kei a ia te nuinga hei pana i te mehua. I kī te tinana umanga e mōhio ana ki "te ao tōrangapū" ka taea e nga minita te whakauru utu mōkito. Heoi anō, i kī tērā nekehanga ka whai "putanga mo te wā roa" Kua tautohe te SNP mā te utu mōkito o te waipiro e āwhina ki te rutu i te ahurea inu inu o Pākehā. I roto i tana whakahau, ka kī te rōpū ka whakamōhiotia he pire utu mōkito hei manakē i roto i te hōtaka ture tuatahi, e miramira ana i te tautoko i toa ai mō te mehua mai i ngā rōpū rongoā me ngā pirihimana. I whiwhi tautoko hoki te mahere mai i ētahi wāhanga o te umanga inu, tae atu ki ngā kaihanga pia me ngā raihana i runga i te hokohoko. 'Wero ā-ture' Heoi anō, ka kī te Scotch Whisky Association: "Ka rapu mātou i tētahi hui moata me te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ki te whakahauhau kia mārama ki ngā take katoa o te utu mōkito, tae atu ki ngā hua mo te wā roa. " E mōhio tonu ana mātau he nui nga uauatanga ā-ture ki te kaupapahere. "E āwangawanga ana hoki mātou ki te pānga mo te wā roa i runga i te umanga Scotch Whisky i ā mātou mākete kaweake, he take e tūmanako ana mātou ka āta whakaarohia e te kāwanatanga tōna manakē kaupapahere hei whakarewa i ngā kaweake." I kī te tinana umanga ka taea te whakamahi i te whakaurunga o te utu waipiro mōkito hei tauira e te hunga i ngā mākete kaweake hei whakauru atu i ā rātou ake whakahaere tāke hauora, e hāngai ana ki te whakawhāiti i te hokohoko i roto i te wehikē Pākehā. I roto i tētahi tuhipoka kōrero, i kī ko te mehua he "rama kākāriki ki ngā whenua, e hiahia kē ana ki te pare i ngā mākete paetata, ki te whakauru atu i ngā rāhuitanga hauora tinihanga hei ārai i te wehikē Pākehā, koia te whakataetae kawemai matua. " Ka mōrearea ēnei tono ki te whakararuraru i ngā kawenga ake o Scotch Whisky, ā, tērā pea ka anga atu ki tētahi wero ā-ture o te ao whānui". I whakaaturia hoki e te whakahau SNP tētahi whāinga ki te whakarewa i ngā kawenga ake me te whāinga ki te whakanui ake i te katoa o ngā kawenga ake mā te 50% i roto i te ono tau. Ko te wehikē e tohu ana i te hauwhā o ngā kawenga ake katoa o Pākehā i tēnei wā, ā, tata ki te hauwhā o ngā kawenga kai me ngā inu katoa o UK.

title: Te whakaekenga ā-ipurangi o Redcar: Ka tirotiro te kaitiaki i te kaunihera 'pūmanawakino'
summary: Kei te tirotiro tētahi kaitiaki i tētahi whakaekenga ā-ipurangi ki tētahi kaunihera kāore tonu e taea te whakarato ratonga tuihono neke atu i te wiki i muri i te hauātanga o ōna pūnaha.
text: I whakaekea te paetukutuku a Redcar me Cleveland Borough Council me ngā rorohiko katoa i te mana i tērā Hātarei, e pā ana ki ngā tangata 135,000. I kī tētahi tohunga he āhua nei he whakaekenga pūmanawakino, e whāwhāia ai ngā kōnae kia utua rā anō he utu. I whakamōhiotia e te kaunihera te Tari Komihana Mōhiohio (ICO). I kī te kaitiaki kua "whakamōhio mai te mana ki tētahi mahi, ā, kei te aromatawai mātou i ngā mōhiohio". I kī te National Crime Agency e tautoko ana i te kaunihera, nāna i whakaae ki te whakaū i te āhua o te hack. Online appointment bookings, planning documents, social care advice and council housing complaints systems are just some of the services currently offline. Kua noho tētahi tīma tohunga mai i te National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) o UK mai i te whakaekenga i te 11:00 GMT i te 9 o Hui tanguru. I kī te kaiārahi kaunihera a Mary Lanigan "kei te hangaia anōtia ngā pūnaha" ā, he "tīma nui rawa i konei - tae atu ki ngā tohunga haumarutanga ā-ipurangi - e mahi ana i te karaka kia whakatikaina". I kī te kaunihera: "Ka taea tonu e mātou te whiwhi me te whakautu i ngā waea me ngā īmēra whāiti, ā, ka manakē mātou i ngā karere kōhukihuki. " Tērā pea he iti noa iho te takaware ki te mahi i ngā waea me ngā karere kāore i te kōhukihuki i te mea kei te hinga te paetukutuku a te kaunihera i tēnei wā. "Kei te kaha te mahi a o mātau tīma ki te whakatika i te raruraru, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te mihi ki ngā tangata whenua mō tō rātou manawanui tonu i tēnei wā." I kī te kairangahau haumarutanga a Kevin Beaumont: "Te āhua nei kua pāngia e rātau tētahi mahi pūmanawakino tino nui. " Ko te āhua nui o te whakaekenga me tōna pānga me whakaara tukemata ki ngā mana UK mō te hiahia kia nui ake ngā rauemi ki te whiu i ngā rōpū hara ā-ipurangi." Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk.

title: Shrewsbury home floods for third time in 11 months
summary: Kua waipuketia tētahi kāinga whānau mo te toru o nga wā i roto i te 11 marama, i ngā wiki i muri i te mutunga o te mahi i te mahi whakamutunga.
text: Ko te kāinga o Siobhan Connor i Shrewsbury i waenganui i ngā āhuatanga i waipuketia i te pikinga o te Awa o Severn i te mutunga o tērā wiki. I kī a ia kua mahia e ia nga whakahoutanga nunui, i haumi ki nga wawao, a, i mahi i ētahi atu whakatūpatotanga, engari i uru tonu te wai. "Kua moumou katoa ngā mahi i mahia e au," tana kī. I āraia ngā huarahi, i waipuketia ngā kāinga, ā, i pāngia ngā umanga i te pikinga o te Severn ki te taumata 4.9m (16ft) i Welsh Bridge i tērā wiki. I whakamahia e ngā kaimahi o te kāinga tiaki tētahi poti ki te mahi i Longden Coleham, i te wā i waipuketia hoki te whare manuhiri o Darwin Townhouse me te West Mid Showground, i waenganui i ētahi atu wāhi. Kua oti i a Mrs Connor te whakapaipai, ā, e rua marama ki muri i te waipuketanga o Hui tanguru. Kei te tatari tonu a ia ki ngā utu inihua mai i te waipuke o tērā tau nā ngā takaware i takea mai i te taiepa Covid-19. Ko te tikanga o ia takahanga waipuke he paipa hou, he taonga mā hou, he whakakapinga kīhini, he whakapiri me te whakapaipai anō. Kāore e taea e ia te hoatu whika ki runga i ngā utu, tana kī. I te waipuke hou rawa, he "tino whakamataku" te tere o te wai rere i runga i te awa. I tīmata te haere mai ki te pānga i te ahiahi o te Rāite, ā, i te ata Paraire he "taumata hope" ki raro. "He tino whakararuraru. Kāore e taea e te tangata te uru atu ki a mātau nā te mea e karapoti ana mātau i te wai. He tino uaua," tana kī. Ko te whakapai ake i muri i te waipuke he "tino whakararuraru", ka kī a ia, ā, he roa te tukanga o te whakamaroke i te āhuatanga me te horoi i ngā tūemi e pā ana ki te wai e pupuri ana i te parakaingaki. "Kua whakarewaina e mātau to mātau tuanui, kua hurihia to mātau whare, kua haumi ki ngā parenga waipuke me ngā whakatūpatotanga, engari kāore tonu i taea te pupuri i te wai," tana kī. Kua whakapā atu ki te Taiao Agency mō tētahi urupare. Ka noho tonu tētahi matohi waipuke mō te Awa o Severn i Shrewsbury. I kī a Mrs Connor kua whakapā atu ki a ia e te Taiao Agency e tohutohu ana i a ia mō ngā mehua ka taea e ia te pare i tōna rawa, ā, kei te takatū mō te waipuke anō i ngā rā e heke mai nei. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ngā whakatūpato waipuke mō Ingarangi - GOV.UK Shropshire Council Environment Agency

title: E tono ana te Kaupapa Wāhi Mohoao mō te heu mō ngā kararehe
summary: E tono ana tētahi pāka kararehe i ngā koha kakara tē hiahiatia, i muri rānei i te heu mō ngā tōkena Kirihimete o ōna kararehe.
text: I kī a Will Walker, te kaiwhakahaere kararehe i te Kaupapa Wāhi Mohoao i Bristol, "ko te kaha ake ka pai ake" - me ngā kakara reka i runga i ta rātau rārangi Kirihimete. I mau a Cheetahs Jake, Oscar me Brooke i runga i te kāmera i te pāka e hākinakina ana i roto i ta rātau kakara makau o tēnei wā - PS Love Noir na Primark. I kī a Tēnā Walker e aroha ana hoki ngā pea, ngā meerkats me ngā lynx ki ngā kakara kakara. Ka taea e ngā kakara te tākaro i tētahi wāhi nui ki te whakanui i te taiao mō ngā kararehe ki te hoatu i ngā huarahi hou hei whakapuaki i ō rātou whanonga māori, te kī a te kaingākau kararehe. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakanui i o rātau oranga kia whakamahia ai e mātou ngā kakara pēnei i te kakara, ngā otaota me ngā mea kakara hei noho i a rātou," te kī a Tēnā Walker. "Ko te nuinga o ngā kararehe e aroha ana ki te huri i roto i ngā kakara hou i a rātau e whakamahi ana i te kakara hei whakatau ko wai te rohe me tētahi tikanga whakawhitiwhiti. " He pai ki a rātau te takahuri i roto i te kakara ki te taupoki i tō rātou ake haunga mai i ō rātou repe kakara puta noa i ō rātou tinana hei tohu i te rohe hei mea mō rātou." Ka tohe a ia ki te tangata whai kakara tē hiahiatia, i muri rānei i te heu kia whakataka ki ngā mōhiohio manuhiri, ā, ka "whakamahia paitia e te pāka". "Ko ngā kakara e pōrangi ana rātau ko ngā mea tino kaha me ngā kakara reka, kakara rānei," te kī a Tēnā Walker. "Mēnā he kakara tē hiahiatia, he aftershaves rānei tāu mō te Kirihimete, he pounamu wātea rānei i te kāinga, ka koa mātou ki te tango hei kai mō ngā kararehe." Whāia a BBC West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: bristol@bbc.co.uk

title: Āwhā Dennis: I pakaru te tereina i muri i te tūtukitanga o te rākau i runga i te ara
summary: Kua tangohia tētahi tereina i te ratonga mō te tapi i muri i te tūtukitanga o tētahi rākau i te wā o te Āwhā o Dennis.
text: I kī a Thameslink i tūtuki te ratonga 06:41 GMT mai i Cambridge ki Potters Bar i tata ki tētahi whakawhitinga taumata e tata ana ki Royston, Hertfordshire, tata ki te 07:30. I āraia te raina i te wā i tangohia e ngā kaipūkaha Network Rail te rākau, engari i whakatuwheratia anō i te 08:45. I kī tētahi kōrero mō Thameslink kāore he whara, engari i pāngia e te tereina he "tūkino māmā". I mauria ki te kōpae mō te whakatikatika i muri i te taenga atu ki tōna ūnga. "Ko tā mātou tohutohu kiritaki, mēnā kāore i te tino nui te haerenga, he haumaru rawa atu kia kaua e haere i tēnei rā," tana tāpiri mai. I whakapārewa a Network Rail mō tētahi raruraru, engari i kī ana tīma e mahi ana "ngāwari" kia neke tonu ngā pāhihi. I kī a Pirihi Gee, te upoko o te tukunga mahi mō te rohe ki te rāwhiti o Network Rail: "I muri noa iho i te 07:30, ka pūrongotia e tētahi atekōkiri tereina te tūtuki i tētahi rākau tata ki te whakawhitinga taumata o Ivy Farm kei runga i te raina i waenganui i Royston, me Ashwell me Morden. " I te ārai te rākau i te raina rerewhenua, ā, kia āhei ai ngā kaimahi o Network Rail ki te tango haumaru i te rākau, ka tū rangitahitia ngā tereina i tēnei raina."

title: I whakatauria te take hangarau i muri i te '150,000 ngā pūkete pirihimana i ngaro'
summary: Kei te aromatawai te kāwanatanga i te pānga o tētahi "take hangarau" i mukua ai ngā pūkete 150,000 i ngā pātengi raraunga pirihimana.
text: I kitea e te hapa, i pūrongotia tuatahitia i roto i te Times, ngā raraunga tae atu ki te tapukara, te DNA me ngā hītori hopu i ūkuia i muri i te karanga pokanoa mō te mukunga. I kī te Tari Kāinga i ngā tāurunga ngaro e pā ana ki ngā tāngata i hopukina, kātahi ka tukua me te kore mahi anō. Engari i kī a Labour e whakaatu ana i "ngā mōrearea nui" mo te haumarutanga tūmatanui. I ngaro ngā raraunga mai i te Rorohiko ā-Motu Pirihimana - he pūnaha e penapena ana, e tiritiri ana i ngā mōhiohio pūkete hara puta noa i te UK. Ka whakamahia hei āwhina i ngā tūhuratanga pirihimana me te whakarato i ngā taki wā tūturu mō ngā tāngata, ngā waka me ngā hara, tae atu ki te hiahia ana ngā pōhēhētanga mō ngā hara kāore anō kia whakaotia. Nā tētahi hapa waehere i ngaro ai ngā pūkete kua karaina hei muku mai i te pātengi raraunga i mua i te takitaki kia mōhio ai mēnā ka taea te pupuri ā-ture, kāore rānei. Ka aukati pea te ngaronga raraunga i ngā tūhuratanga pirihimana ā muri ake nā te mea kāore e taea te taki whakawhiti i te tapukara, i ngā whakaaturanga DNA rānei ki ngā whakaaturanga mai i ētahi atu tirohanga hara. I kī te minita pirihimana o Kit Malthouse kua tāutua te raruraru, ā, kua whakatikaina te tukanga kia "kore ai e taea anō" - me te Tari Kāinga, te Kaunihera Pirihimana o te Motu me ētahi atu hoa whakahau ture e mahi ana "i te tere" ki te whakaora i ngā raraunga. "Ahakoa e pā ana te ngaromanga ki ngā tangata i hopukina, kātahi ka tukua kāore he mahi anō, kua tonoa e au ngā mana me ngā pirihimana kia whakaū i tā rātou aromatawai tuatahi kāore he tuma ki te haumarutanga tūmatanui," tana kī. I kī te Tari Kāinga kāore he pūkete o te tangata hara, mōrearea rānei i mukua. E honoa ana ngā pūkete ki ngā tūhuratanga pirihimana i whakamutua i mua i te whakapae (Kāore he Hohenga Anō, ngā kēhi NFA rānei) ki ērā rānei i whakawāteatia ai tētahi tangata i te kōti. Kāore anō kia mōhiotia e hia ngā pūkete o ia momo i ngaro, ā, kei te tūhuratia tonutia te whānuitanga o ngā mukunga. Ko te tikanga o te ngaronga o ngā raraunga, ka whiwhi pea ngā āpiha i runga i te whenua i tētahi hua rapu kāore anō kia oti ina uiui i te pūnaha. 'E hiahiatia ana ngā whakautu' Ka karangatia e te hēkeretari kāinga kōruru o Nick Thomas-Symonds ki te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Priti Patel kia whai mana mō te hapa, kia mārama hoki ki tōna pānga. "Me wawe tana kōrero mō ngā mea kua hē, te whānuitanga o te take, me te aha te mahi e mahia ana hei whakaū i te iwi whānui. Me hoatu ngā whakautu." "He pakaru haumarutanga tino nui tēnei e whakaatu ana i ngā mōrearea nui mo te haumarutanga tūmatanui." I kī atu te rangatira o ngā Pirihimana o Cumbria, a Kiriuati Hyde, ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, ko te ngaronga "tino nui" o ngā pūkete hopu i puta he "mōrea ki te haumarutanga tūmatanui". Ka kī a ia: "Kia mārama ai ki te tauine, mēnā e whakaaro ana koe kei waenganui i te 6-700,000 ngā tāngata e hopukina ana i ia tau i te UK, he tino nui tēnā wāhanga o aua tāngata." I muri i te tangohanga o ngā matohi e 40,000 e pā ana ki ngā hara o Ūropi mai i te pātengi raraunga kotahi, te PNC, i muri i te mahi a Ingarangi i muri i te EU.

title: Ko te Kēmu o ngā Torona he 'pūhuri kēmu' mō te tāpoi NI
summary: Kua roa te whakamutunga i tataritia, engari he umanga nui tonu te Kēmu o ngā Torona mō Aiarangi ki te Raki.
text: Nā Sara GirvinBBC News NI North-East Reporter E whakaarohia ana kua kawea mai te £251m ki roto i te whakahaerenga mai i te tīmatanga o te whakanaotanga i te tau 2010, e ai ki te pokapū kiriata o te rohe NI Screen. I taua wā anō, ka hoatu e te rōpū te £15.95m i roto i te pūtea whakanao ki te rangatū whakaari moemoea. Engari he pūtea whai painga tēnā, e kī ana te rangatira nui o NI Screen, a Rākei Williams. "He pūhuri kēmu tēnei mō te umanga mata," tana kī. "Koinei te whakaaturanga nui rawa o te tekau tau, ā, i roto i ngā tikanga umanga, e mōhio ana te katoa kei te hangaia i Aiarangi ki te Raki. " Nā tērā i huri to mātau tūnga i roto i te umanga mata puta noa i te ao." Mō ngā mea e heke mai nei mō te hanga kiriata i Aiarangi ki te Raki, e kī ana a Tēnā Williams "Mēnā kāore e taea e mātou te hoko tahi i te mekameka whakarato i muri i te Kēmu o Ngā Torona, te kaimahi, te studio, he aha tā mātou e hoko ai?" Ko ngā whika mai i Tourism NI, te tinana whanaketanga tāpoi o te rohe, e peita ana i tētahi pikitia ātaahua. E huatau ana rātau kia 350,000 ngā tāngata e haere mai ana ki Aiarangi ki te Raki i ia tau mō te Kēmu o ngā Torona - kotahi i roto i ngā manuhiri whakangahau e ono. E whakaarohia ana e whakapau ana rātau i te £50m ia tau. 'Taraiwa ana i ngā tāngata ki NI' Kua hurihia e te whakanaotanga o TE WHK ngā tauwāhi whakaahua o Aiarangi ki te Raki hei wāhiwera tūruhi. Ko te kaiwhakahaere haereere o Caroline McComb e taurima ana i ngā haerenga o Game of Thrones i ia rā o te tau me tētahi okotahi - Rā Kirihimete. "Ki a mātou, ko Game of Thrones tērā pūhuri kēmu nui i tūmanako ai mātou i ngā wā katoa," tana kī. "Ko te mea e akiaki ana i te tangata kia haere mai ki Aiarangi ki te Raki." Kaore a ia e whakapono ka pāngia te umanga i te mutunga o te whakaaturanga. "Kāore au i te kite i tētahi take ka iti haere ngā tau. " Me titiro anake mātou ki ngā mahi a te Ariki o ngā Mowhiti mō Aotearoa kia kite ai kāore rawa he take kāore e taea e mātou te haere tonu ki tēnei i Aiarangi ki te Raki," tana kī. E whā tau ki muri ka riro i a Hōne McLaughlin te Fullerton Arms i Ballintoy, County Antrim. Ko tana wharekai he tūnga tāmata mō te nuinga o ngā haerenga o Game of Thrones i te takutai raki o Aiarangi ki te Raki. "Kua ngaro mai i te haerenga kotahi e mau mai ana i ngā uhi 18 i ia rā ki te mahi tata ki te 110 ki te 130 ngā uhi ia rā - mō ngā kaihautū Kēmu o Ngā Torona anake," tana kī. "Ki taku whakaaro ka kite mātou i ngā tau e haere tonu ana ki te tipu - he tino rerekē te tawhito tūturu o ngā mea kua waihangatia." 'E kore rawa ngā pahi e tū' Engari na te tomokanga mai o te tokomaha o ngā tūruhi ki ētahi kāinga iti i raruraru ai. He tangata noho a Marian Boyle i Cushendun, County Antrim, ā, e kī ana ngā kaiako tūruhi e whakararuraru ana i te oranga o ngā tangata whenua me te "nui o te urutomo". "E hiahia ana ahau ki te tāpoi tāpoi i Aiarangi ki te Raki, engari ko tēnei momo tāpoi - e whakaū ana i ngā tāngata ki roto, ki waho hoki - ka haere mai rātau ki te kite i tētahi mea, a, koia tērā," tana kī. "Mō ngā tangata whenua he whakapōrearea - e kore rawa e tū ngā pahi auau. " I te mutunga wiki ina arokē ka taea e koe te taraiwa i roto i ngā rau tāngata kāore i te kite i tēnei hei huarahi." He take anō kei te Dark Hedges i waho o Armoy, County Antrim. E 10 hēkona noa iho i te Kēmu o ngā Torona i rawaka hei tūruhi tūruhi. Na te paheketanga me te tūkino i ngā rākau i rāhuitia ai ngā waka, engari kāore i te whakarongo ki ngā wā katoa. He nui ake ngā āhuatanga o te Kēmu o ngā Torona kei roto i te arapae, ā, kei te whakaahuatia tētahi kōrero tōmua ki te whakaaturanga i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Engari e whakaae ana ngā rangatira tāpoi he toenga tērā. E kī ana a Judith Webb, ko ia te kawenga mō te tāpoi mata i Tourism NI: "Ko te tikanga o te angitu me tino whakaaro mātou ki ngā take whakahaere manuhiri me te mahi ki te whakahaere i aua āhuatanga." Kua "panonitia e te whakaaturanga a Aiarangi ki te Raki hei ūnga tāpoi mata o te ao whānui", ka tāpiri mai a ia. "Ko ngā mea kua whakaritea ka whakaroa i te oranga katoa o Game of Thrones - he nui te pūtea penapena e neke whakamua ana, ā, he tino pai mātou mō te wā heke." Ka hōpara a Steven Rainey i te tawhito o Game of Thrones i konei i Aiarangi ki te Raki i Radio Ulster i tēnei Rātapu 26 Me i te 12:30 BST. Ka wātea tuihono te hōtaka i muri tata mai i te pāohotanga.

title: Ko te whakahekenga tepenga whakatahe e manakohia ana e Jeremy Hunt
summary: Kua kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Jeremy Hunt ka manako ia ki tētahi huringa i roto i te ture hei haurua i te tepenga o ngā whakatahe mai i te 24 wiki ki te hapu ki te 12.
text: I puta mai ana kōrero ki te Times i muri i te karangatanga a te Minita Wahine a Maria Miller mō tētahi tepenga 20 wiki. I kī te hēkeretari kāinga ka hoki "pea" ka whakahokia e ia tētahi huringa ki te 20 wiki, engari i tāruatia te tirohanga a te Tau 10 kāore he kaupapa hei huri i te ture. Na nga kōrero i āki te whakahē mai i ētahi rōpū whakahau kōwhiringa. I tohe tētahi kaikōrero o Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti ki a Tēnā Hunt - e kōrero ana i mua i te hui Tūturu - e whakapuaki ana i ngā whakaaro whaiaro tino whaiaro. Nō muri iho ka whakapuakina e te Pirimia a Rawiri, ko te whakatahe he "take hinengaro" te whakatahe, ā, "e tino whai mana ana a Tēnā Hunt ki te pupuri i tētahi tirohanga takitahi". "Engari me mōhio te tangata kāore he kaupapa a te kāwanatanga ki te kawe mai i ētahi ture i tēnei rohe, ā, ko ngā pōti ka puta he pōti koreutu," tana kī. I tāpiritia e Tēnā Karauna he "whaiaro" e manakohia ana e ia tētahi "whakaiti tōtika" mai i te tepenga o nāianei o te 24 wiki, "nā te mea e whakaaro ana ahau he tohenga rongoā mō tērā". "Engari kāore au i te whakaae ki te tepenga 12 wiki, ā, ehara tēnā i te kaupapahere a te kāwanatanga," tana kī. 'Whānuitanga mō te whakaititanga' Ka pā te tepenga wiki 24 ki Ingarangi, Weera, me Pākehā. He ture te whakatahe i Aiarangi ki te Raki hāunga i ngā āhuatanga rongoā tino nui, pērā i te wā e mōrearea ana te hauora o te whaea. Tata tonu ki te 190,000 ngā whakatahe mō ngā wāhine i Ingarangi me Uēra i tērā tau. Ko ngā whika, mai i te Tari Hauora, e huatau ana hoki ko te nuinga - 91% - i mahia i raro iho i te 13 wiki. I kī te Minita Hauora o Welsh, a Lesley Griffiths: "Kua pānui ahau i ngā kōrero a Jeremy Hunt mō te whakaiti i te tepe wā, ā, ko tēnei tētahi mea kāore e taea e au te whakaae kia tino pai ki ngā wāhine i Weera. " Me mahi te kāwanatanga o UK i ētahi tono tika hei huri i te ture, ka kaha taku ātete i tēnei nekehanga." I kī atu a Tēnā Hunt ki te Times i whakaaro ia ko te 12 wiki "te wāhi tika". I kī a ia e hiahia ana a ia ki te kite i tētahi whakahekenga nui i roto i te tepe e ārai ai i te nuinga o ngā whakatahe katoa i taua wā. I kī te hēkeretari hauora hou, he torutoru wiki noa iho ki tana mahi, kua tae ia ki te whakamutunga i muri i tana ako i nga whakaaturanga. "Ko taku tirohanga noa iho mo taua pātai tino uaua mo te wā e whakaaro ana tātau kia tīmata te ora. " Kāore au i te whakaaro ko te take i whiwhi ai ahau i taua tirohanga mō ngā take whakapono." I kī te minita hauora tūmatanui o te kōruru o te mahi, a Diane Abbott, kia kaua ngā minita e "tākaro tōrangapū ki te oranga o te iwi". I kī a ia tērā tētahi "whakaekenga pūkenga tautoko i runga i te pūtaiao me ngā mana i whawhai ai ngā wāhine me ngā whānau o Ingarangi". Engari i a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, ka kī te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Ēnā Me he "tika" te kāwanatanga ki te tango i tōna tūnga, ka tāruatia "kāore he kaupapa hei whakaiti i te tepenga whakatahe". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki taku whakaaro he whānuitanga mō ētahi whakaititanga. Ko taku ake tirohanga pea he whakaiti ki te 20 wiki, engari e kī ana ahau he tirohanga whaiaro tēnā mōku." I kī hoki te Tari Hauora kua whakapuakina e Tēnā Hunt tōna ake whakaaro, ā, he mārama te kaupapa here a te kāwanatanga mo te whakatahe. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka kī atu a Ms Miller ki te Daily Telegraph me whakahekea te tepenga whakatahe ā-ture ki te 20 wiki nā te mea kua pai ake te tiaki i ngā pēpi tino moata. I kī hoki te MP Māori o Mark Pritchard, te tuakana manukura o tētahi rōpū paremata ā-ora, me tapahi te tepe. "Ko ngā ture tīariari mo te whakatahe e takamuri ana i ngā hua o mua tata nei i roto i te pūtaiao," tana kī. I kī a Darinka Aleksic, mai i te rōpū pēhanga Abortion Rights, he "tino mōrihariha" e hiahia ana te hēkeretari hauora ki te "rāhui i te urunga ki aua ratonga". "Ko te whakatahe he wāhanga tino matua o te rongoā wahine. E mārama ana kāore anō a ia kia titiro ki ngā whakaaturanga pūtaiao huri noa i tēnei nā te mea kāore he take rongoā mō te whakaiti i te tepe wā whakatahe," tana kī. I kī atu hoki a Ahorangi Wendy Savage, he kaimātai wahine kua whakahauhau mō ngā tau maha i runga i ngā mana wahine, ki te AO kua mahue ia i te "korero" e ngā kōrero a Tēnā Hunt. "Ehara i te mea pai ko ia te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga mo te hauora. Ko te mea e tino tika ana kia mahia e tātau ko te whakawātea i te whakatahe." I tētahi atu wāhi, ka kī a Clare Murphy o te Ratonga Tohutohu Hapū o Ingarangi i ngā kōrero e whakaatu ana i "te kore mōhiotanga he aha ngā wāhine e hiahia ana ki ngā ratonga ā muri ake".

title: Kua whakatūria e Millie Bobby Brown tētahi pūkete Twitter ārai whakaweti
summary: Kua whakarewaina e te whetū o Stranger Things a Millie Bobby Brown tētahi pūkete Twitter hei rutu i te whakaweti.
text: E tono ana te pakeke 13 tau, nāna i tautoko i ngā whakahau ārai whakaweti i mua, ki ngā kaiwhakamahi kia "tiritiri pūrākau me te aroha". Neke atu i te 7,000 ngā kaiārahi o te pūkete - @Milliestopshate - kē. Ka puta mai i te muku a Ed Sheeran i tana pūkete Twitter i muri i ngā kōrero tōraro i muri i tana āhua o Game of Thrones. Kua tweeting a Millie i te whakahauhau ki ana kaihautū, nāna i tuku i a rātau pūrākau. I whakairihia e tētahi kaiwhakamahi mō te rongo "mahue me te pouri," ka whakautua e Millie: "He kōtiro kaha tō [mana]. Kia mahara ka tautoko tonu ahau i a koe". I tohutohu hoki a Millie i tētahi atu kaihautū "ehara te hākere i te whakautu" i a rātau e kōrero ana mo te whakaweti i te whakatinanatanga. Kua kōrero a Millie ki te whakaweti i mua, e tweet ana ki te tautoko i a Stand Up to Bullying. I Hune, ka kī a ia: "Kāore i te pai tētahi momo whakaweti. He raruraru nui hoki te whakaweti i te Ipurangi. Kaua koa e noho mārire". Ka puta mai tana pūkete i muri i te kōrero a ētahi atu rangatira mō ngā kōrero tōraro. Na te whetū Disney o Dove Cameron i tohutohu i ngā kaiwhakamahi kia "mutu te whakatakoto i ngā wāhine ki a rāua anō". I kī atu te kaitapere o Descendants ki ana kaiārahi e 1.2 miriona kia "haere ki te kata i tētahi mea rekareka". I kī a Ed Sheeran i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama kāore a ia e pānui i tētahi mea i runga i te whatunga pāpori - engari ināianei te āhua nei kua haere kē atu a ia me te tango i tana pūkete Twitter. I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te Rā, ka kī te kaiwaiata: "Ka haere ahau ki runga, ā, kāore he mea engari ko ngā tāngata e kōrero ana i ngā mea kino. " Kotahi te kōrero e whakangaro ana i tō rā. Engari koia ahau i puta mai ai." I mua i te whakamahi anake i tana pūkete hei whakatairanga i ana pūoro, kua ngaro atu te "@edsheeran" i Twitter. Kei te hohe tonu a ia i Instagram me Facebook. Kimihia mātou i Instagram i BBCNewsbeat me te whai i a mātou i Snapchat, rapua bbc_newsbeat

title: Te ara e manakohia ana i kōwhiria mō te hipa ki te uru o Hereford
summary: Kua kōwhiria tētahi ara manako mō te hipa ki te uru o Hereford.
text: Herefordshire Council officers have recommended the £129m 'red route' which would cross Kings Acre Road near the Bay Horse Inn. E rima ngā whare me whakawāteatia hei whakawātea i te huarahi, ā, e whā anō pea ka whakahekea a rātau māra. I kī te mema kāpata o te kaunihera mo te hanganga ko te hipa he "kī ki te whakatairanga i te tupu". Ko te ara marohi tētahi o ngā whitu i pānuitia i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ā, ka haere i waenganui i Warham Farm me Warham House, ā, ka whakawhiti i te Awa Wye e tata ana ki Dorchester Way i Belmont, e hono ana i Rotherwas ki te A49 ki te raki o te taone. I kī a Margaret Andrews i whakamōhiotia ia e te reta e toru haora i mua i te pānuitanga ka whakawāteatia tōna whare. I kī a ia he "tino whakararuraru" te kite. 'Ara whai hua ake' I whakaarahia hoki e ētahi kaikaunihera ngā māharahara, me te kaiārahi rōpū Takitahi, te Kaikaunihera o Bob Matthews, e kī ana i tino kore e whakaaetia te ara whero nā tōna tata ki te Kōeke II kua whakarārangitia e Belmont Abbey. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Tērā tētahi ara utu nui ake, whai hua hoki ki te rāwhiti o te taone e manakohia ana, e tino tautokona ana e ngā tāngata pakihi paetata." Engari i kī te Kaikaunihera o Piripi Price, he mema kāpata mō te hanganga, he pai ake te mahi hangarau i te ara whero i ngā whirinoa nā "ngā take taiao me te whakaiti i te pānga ki ngā tāngata". "Ko te hipa he kī ki te whakatairanga i te tupu me te haere hohe i South Wye me puta noa i te taone," tana tāpiri mai. The Hereford Transport Package, which includes the proposed routes, will be considered by the council's cabinet on 27 July. Ka tīmata pea te mahi a tērā tau, i te tau 2020 rānei, me te whakatuwheratanga o te hipa i te tau 2022.

title: Me pēhea koe e kōrero ai ki ō tamariki mō te tūkino tōnā?
summary: Nā ngā whakaaro tūkino i roto i te whutupōro i whakaara ake ai ngā māharahara mo te haumarutanga o ngā tamariki. Engari me pēhea, he aha hoki te kōrero a ngā mātua mō te tūkino tōkai me te kore whakamataku i a rātau tamariki?
text: Nā Kate PalmerBBC News "Kaua ngā mātua e waiho ki ngā kaiako," te kī a Jon Brown, te upoko o te kaupapahere tūkino a te NSPCC. He tūturu ngā mōrea, ā, me whai "kōrerorero ngāwari" ngā mātua ki a rātau tamariki mai i te rima tau tae noa ki te pakeketanga, e kī ana a ia, ka tāpiri mai "he iti iho te tūkinotanga o ngā tamariki whai kupu hei kōrero". "Bath-time, walking home from school or in the car are all opportunities to have that first talk. " Karo i ngā kupu whakamataku, engari kī atu nā rātou tō rātou tinana, ā, ka taea e rātou te kī kāo mēnā ka ngana tētahi ki te whakapā atu ki a rātou." E kī ana ngā mātua e piri ana ki te "pūrākau o te mōrearea tauhou" me te whakaako i a rātau tamariki kia tūpato ki ngā tāngata kāore rātau i te mōhio. Engari "ka aha mēnā ko te whakapae he tangata e mōhio ana rātau?" tana kī. Ko te momo tūkino tino pūnoa e puta mai ana i roto i te whānau, ā, ka puta mai i tētahi tangata e mōhiotia ana, e whakawhirinaki ana i roto i te hapori. She says parents should talk about sexual abuse in the same way they teach their children about bad behaviour. Te tarau kōrero Ko te karere "kia noho tūmataiti tō tarau" tērā pea he mea e mōhiotia ana e ngā mātua o ngā tamariki pakeke o te kura tuatahi. Ka whakamahia e te whakahau Talk Pants a te NSPCC te karere: "Kāore i te kōrero i te wahine, i te tūkino rānei, he tino ngahau," te kī a Jon Brown o te NSPCC. " Mā tēnei ka ngāwari kē atu te kōrero i tētahi karere whakamataku." Ehara i te mea whakahau kia whakaakona e ngā kura ngā akoranga mō te tūkino ā-waha, ā, ahakoa he tokomaha ngā kaiako e kī ana kei te "mōhio rātou ki te hiranga" o te patu tamariki, he tokomaha kāore i te whakaaro kei a rātou te whakangungu tika. E taunaki ana te NSPCC i ngā mātua kia uru tuihono ki te whakahau, ki te whakamahi rānei i ngā pūrākau wā moe hei rutu i te take. Ko Gemini, he tamaiti kura tuatahi i roto i te pukapuka Whisper, tētahi pūāhua i hangaia hei āwhina i tēnei. Ka kitea e Gemini he taniwha i roto i te kari, engari "kei te whakaaro me huna te taniwha, ka riri rānei te tangata". Pēnei i te Pants, kāore e kōrero ana i te tūkinotanga, i te wahine rānei, engari mā te huna i tētahi muna ka pā atu ki ngā whakaaro o te tamaiti. "I tino hiahia ahau ki tētahi rauemi ka taea e ngā mātua te whakamahi me te kore whakamataku i ngā tamariki," te kī a Michelle Denny-Browne o One in Four, te aroha o ngā mōrehu tūkino nāna i whakaputa te pukapuka. "I ētahi wā he rekareka noa iho ngā tamariki, ā, e kōrero ana tēnei pukapuka i roto i tō rātou reo," tana kī. Te tūkino wahine i roto i ngā whika Pūtake: NSPCC Me pēhea te kōrero ki ngā tamariki pakeke ake Kāore pea te reo o te tarau me ngā taniwha e hāngai ana ki ngā tamariki i a rātou e mōhio ana ki te āhua o te wahine, ā, ka whiwhi wāteatanga tuihono, engari e kī ana ngā tohunga kia kaua e mutu ngā kōrerorero. "Me kōrero tonu ngā mātua mō te tūkino i te wahine tae noa ki te whare wānanga," te kī a Jon Brown. "Ko ngā take pēnei i te whakaaetanga ā-waha me te whakatoi kātahi anō ka mōhiotia he raruraru e ngā whare wānanga." E kī ana a Tom Squire, mai i te whakahau Kāti Ināianei!, me kōrero ngā mātua mō ngā mōrearea i puta mai i te waea atamai me te whakamahi ipurangi. "Tērā pea he tūkino tētahi atu tauira kura, engari mēnā kua whakaponotia tētahi tamaiti ki te tiritiri pikitia tahanga, kei te whakawhitiwhiti rānei." Kōrero ki ngā tamariki taiohi mō taua mea mā te tohutoro i tētahi tangata rongonui kātahi anō ka tiritiri whakaahua tahanga, e kī ana a ia. Whakamahia rānei tētahi pūrākau whakamā mai i tō tamarikitanga hei pūrākau whakatūpato. "Kua mahi katoa mātou i ngā mea pōhēhē i a mātau e tamariki ana," tana kī. "Engari whakamāramatia ka taea te tiritiri me te tiaki pūmau tonu te whanonga tuihono." Engari ka tāpiri mai a ia he mea nui kia kaua e "whakamā" i te whanonga o te tamaiti ki te mahi hē i runga i te ipurangi. "Mēnā kei te whakaaro rātou ka whiua, ka whakamā rānei, he iti iho te haere mai ki te kōrero mō taua mea." Ngā raina āwhina mō ngā tamariki me ngā mātua

title: Te tawhito o te Rōpū Whā o te SDP
summary: Kaore he ōrite o te tohu kikorangi mō ngā rahunga toa.
text: Nā Shaun LeyPresenter, Breaking the Mould Mēnā i reira, tērā pea ka whiwhi whakamaharatanga te piriti awa rino iti i te taha o te Thames i Limehouse i te rāwhiti o Rānana. I te 25 o Hānuere 1981 tokowhā ngā kaipōrangapū - tokotoru o rātau ngā MP Mahi, ko te tuawhā o te kaiārahi tuarua o te rōpū, ā, ko rātou katoa he minita kāpata - i whakatakoto whakaahua i runga i te piriti. Ko te Whakapuakitanga o te Whare Raima te nekehanga tūmatanui tuatahi ki te waihanga i te Rōpū Manapori Pāpori. He iti iho i te tekau tau te tīariari o te SDP, engari kei te rongo tonu tōna mana i tēnei rā. Ko te take ināianei ko te whakatau a Labour kia hoatu he kōrero ki ngā mema o te rōpū me ngā uniana ki te kōwhiri i te kaiārahi o te rōpū. Kua kore te mauī e whakawhirinaki ki ngā MP ki te mahi. Kotahi te mema, kotahi te pōti I whakapono te rōpū tokowhā, i a rātau e mōhiotia ana, ki te kore tēnei kāreti pōti e whakaū i tētahi mema, kotahi pōti, ka tukua te whakataunga tūturu ki ngā kaiwhakahaere uniana me ngā kaiwhaiwhai mauī i tango i ngā rōpū paetata. E noho tonu ana a David Owen i Limehouse, i te whare i tūtaki ai te rōpū tokowhā. Ko te kāreti pōti, e kī ana a ia, ko te paraka tutukitanga tutukitanga e ārai ana i a ia ki te hoki ki te Rōpū Mahi. Ahakoa ko te ture ināianei ko te "kotahi mema, kotahi pōti" ināianei, kāore koe e hiahia kia noho ki te rōpū hei pōti, ā, he maha ngā pōti o ētahi tāngata. I tēnei rā, te āhua nei he rerekē te whakairi i ngā mema kāore i te rōpū. Ko te huatau mō ngā "mātāmua", e whakamahia ana e ngā Tohutohu hei kōwhiri i ētahi o ā rātou MP, i whai wāhi ai ngā tāngata paetata, ahakoa he mema Tory rātou, kāore rānei. Engari e tohu ana a Ariki Owen ki te whakamā i takea mai ki a Ed Miliband, nāna i toa te kaiārahi Mahi nā te mea he kaiārahi whakahau tōna i waenganui i ngā mema uniana, ahakoa ko tōna tuakana te kōwhiringa tuatahi o ngā MP me te rārangi me te kōnae o Labour. E kōrero mahana ana a Ariki Owen mō Miliband, a, ka kī mai ki a au "nō Labour tōku ngākau". E hiahia ana a ia ki te kite i tētahi kāwanatanga Mahi i pōtitia i te tau 2015, i tētahi tauwhāinga rānei i waenganui i a ia me ngā Pāremata Liberal, te rōpū i āwhinatia e ētahi atu mema o te rōpū tokowhā ki te waihanga, i muri i te hanumitanga o te SDP ki te Liberals i te tau 1988. I ātete a Ariki Owen i te whakakotahitanga, engari i tētahi ara, i tika rātou, ā, i hē a ia. I tipu ake te Liberal Democrats hei tōpana tōrangapū whakaharahara, ka maroke te SDP, kātahi anō ka tineia i muri i te whakamutunga o te wāhi tuawhitu i te pōtitanga i te tau 1990, i muri i te Rōpū Monster Raving Loony. Ka kitea te tawhito SDP i roto i te tauwhāinga. He mema o mua ngā Pāremata Liberali pērā i a Vince Cable rāua ko Pirihi Huhne, pērā ki te Hēkeretari Hauora a Andrew Lansley rāua ko Greg Clark, te minita kāwanatanga ā rohe, he Conservatives rāua tahi. Engari ko te mea nui ake ki a Ariki Owen ko te tōrangapū i tēnei rā he iti iho te iwi i te tau 1981. E mihi ana a ia ki te SDP. Ko ētahi e tautohetohe ana i tēnā; engari e kore e mōhiotia he rerekē te āhua o te pae tōrangapū e tū ana i runga i te Arawhiti o Limehouse ināianei i te 30 tau ki mua.

title: BBC Proms 2016: Strictly, Bowie me te puoro i roto i te papa motokā
summary: Ko te BBC Proms, te hākari puoro puāwaitanga ā-tau o Ingarangi, me whakauru he pūoro nā David Bowie me tētahi pō tāhuhu Strictly Come Dancing.
text: Nā Mark SavageMusic te kaipānui The Strictly Prom, i te 21 o Hōngongoi, ka taurimatia e Katie Derham o Te Reo Irirangi 3, he whakamutunga i te whakaaturanga o tērā tau. Ka whakahonoretia a Bowie ki tētahi Prom pō tōmuri i te 29 o Hōngongoi, e whakaatu ana i a Amanda Palmer rāua ko Anna Calvi, i waenganui i ētahi atu. Ā, ka whakakore rangitahi te hākari i tōna kāinga i te Royal Albert Hall mō tētahi konohete i tētahi papa motokā. Ka tū i Peckham, ki te tonga-rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, ka whakaaturia e te whakaaturanga ā-rangi a Christopher Stark me te Multi-Storey Orchestra e mahi ana i ngā mahi a te kaitito mōkito o Steve Reich. I kī te kaiwhakahaere hou o te Proms, a David Pickard, he "tino mīharo" ngā konohete o mua i te wāhi, he karāti pūwhenua kua whakamahia, ā, he rerenga atu i ngā momo wāhi e taurima ana i ngā konohete puāwaitanga. "He tino rerekē te taupori i ngā mea katoa kua kitea e au," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero, kātahi anō ka whakaaturia "te tino pai o ngā pūoro puihi ki te hunga whānui rawa". I tētahi atu wāhi, ka takoha te Proms ki te kaiārahi Wīwī me te kaitito o Pierre Boulez, i mate i te Hānuere e 90 tau te pakeke. Ka whakaaturia e te Ensemble Intercontemporain, nāna i whakatū, tētahi hōtaka o ngā wāhanga i whakahaeretia e ia i roto i ngā tau neke atu i te 40 tau o ngā whakaaturanga i te Proms i te 2 o Mahuru. Ko ētahi atu whakamiramira mai i te hōtaka 2016 ko te Tūhura i te rārangi katoa i te paetukutuku o TE Wānanga o Te Wānanga hei "hākari me te whakamāramatanga anō" o ngā pūoro a te whetū "mai i te taha matau o te tūāwhiorangi", e whakahaeretia ana e te rōpū ā-Perewa t a r g a z e. "Ko Bowie tētahi o aua tāngata i tino whakaawe ki ngā kaiwhakatangitangi o ngā momo katoa, " te kī a Pickard.
