" I pīrangi ahau ki te whakanui i tēnā me te whakaatu i tōna pūkenga, he kaihanga waiata whakaharahara." Ka whakaaturia e te Strictly Prom ngā wīwī, ngā foxtrots me ngā tango, tae atu ki ētahi o ngā kaikanikani ngaio mai i te whakaaturanga BBC One. "Ka noho te pūoro ki mua - engari he maha ngā mea hākinakina," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere o Radio 3 a Alan Davey. Neke atu i te 90 ngā konohete o te hākari o tēnei tau, ko te whakamutunga o te Pō Whakamutunga rongonui o te ao i te 10 o Mahuru. Ka whakakāngia e te whakamutunga matua te rama ki ngā kaipūoro rangatahi, me te Proms Youth Ensemble e tīmata ana i tētahi mahi hou a Tom Harold, tētahi o ngā toa o te whakataetae kaitito rangatahi o TE HAU. The concert will also feature Peruvian tenor Juan Diego Florez, alongside the traditional performances of Elgar's Pomp and Circumstance and Rule, Britannia! Ahakoa he hākinakina noa iho te Pō Whakamutunga, i tērā tau ka kitea ngā tirohanga e whakamahara ana ki tētahi konohete toka, i te wā i makaia e ngā mema o te hunga whakarongo he kākahu ki te kaiwaiata Tiamana o Hona Kauffman. "Ka makaia e te tangata o rātau tarau ki mua [anō]? Ki taku whakaaro ka mahia pea e rātou," te kī a Pickard. "Engari, e mōhio ana koe, kei te tono koe mēnā ka purua e koe a Hona Kauffman ki runga i te atamira i te Pō Whakamutunga." "Bu titiro, ko te Pō Whakamutunga, e mōhio ana tātau katoa, ka manawawera te tangata, ā, he āhuatanga hākari, engari ko tā mātou i whakamātau ki te mahi i te Pō Whakamutunga i tēnei tau ko te āhua o te rōpū e tīmata ana i te hawhe tuarua, ehara i te tīmatanga." Neke atu i te 100,000 ngā tīkiti mō te hākari o tēnei tau ka wātea mō te £12.50 iti iho rānei, ahakoa kua piki te utu o te tīkiti tino iti rawa mai i te £5 ki te £6. I kī a Pickard, ahakoa te mutunga o te pūtea puta noa i te BBC, kua parea e te Proms tana pūtea. E £10 miriona te utu o te takahanga ki te atamira, ko te hawhe o ēnei i ahu mai i te utu raihana, me te toenga i whakaarahia mā te hoko tīkiti. Ka pāohotia ngā konohete katoa i runga i te Reo Irirangi 3, me te 26 i whakaahuatia mō te pouaka whakaata, iPlayer rānei. Ka whakatepetia te pānuitanga pouaka whakaata ki ngā pō Hātarei i te wā o ngā Kēmu Orangirangi i Aotearoa, engari ka pāohotia he rangatū konohete wiki i runga i te Whā i muri tonu i ngā kēmu.

title: Ka haere te rorohiko Watson a IBM ki te kura tākuta
summary: Ko te rorohiko Watson a IBM hei āwhina ki te whakangungu i ngā tākuta i tētahi kura tākuta i Cleveland, Ohio.
text: I rongonuitia te mīhini i te wā i patua ai e ia ngā tauwhāinga tangata tokorua i runga i te whakaaturanga pātaitai o Amerika i tērā tau. Ināianei ka whakamahia tōna hangarau ki te āwhina i ngā ākonga ki te whakaaro i ngā take uaua me te tuku tātaritanga tūpono. Engari e kī ana ētahi kaiwhakawāwā he hē ngā pūnaha mōhiohio mōhiohio (AI). Ko te pānuitanga a IBM e tohu ana i te mahi hou a te umanga US ki te whakawhanake i tana hua mō te wāhanga rongoā. Kei te uru kē a Watson ki tētahi atu kaupapa me tētahi pokapū pukupuku o New York, ā, kei te whakamātauria hoki e te kaiwhakarato inihua hauora o Wellpoint ki te whakarite i ngā rongoā me ngā puka kerēme mō ōna mema. E whakapono ana a IBM ko te wāhanga rongoā tētahi o ngā wāhi ka taea e ia te mahi moni mai i tana pūnaha mōhiohio horihori. Ko ētahi atu ko ngā hotlines ratonga kiritaki me te umanga pūtea penapena pūtea. I hoahoatia a Watson ki te "mārama" i ngā tono reo māori, kātahi ka uru ki te nui o ngā raraunga kāore i hangaia hei kimi i ngā whakautu tino pai ki ngā pātai. I roto i tētahi tauari rongoā, ko te tātari i ngā pūkete tūroro me ngā tuhinga rongoā. Kua hoahoatia a Watson hei waihanga i tētahi rārangi o ngā whakautu tūpono ki te tono a te rongoā, te whakatau i a rātou i runga i te raupapa tūponotanga, kātahi ka whakaatu i ngā rongoā tino pai me ngā mōhiohio e pā ana ki te māia o tō rātou tūponotanga. I kī a IBM ka whakamahia i te Kāreti Rongoā o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga hei āwhina i ngā ākonga ki te arotake i ngā tauari kēhi rongoā me te kimi whakaaturanga hei tautoko i ā rātou whakawā. "He mīharo te ngātahitanga a Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga ki IBM nā te mea ka tukuna mai ki a mātau te wā hei 'whakaaro' i ngā huarahi e kaha ana ki te whakarite hei utauta kaha i roto i te rongoā," te kī a te āpiha mōhiohio matua o te pokapū, a Mātini Hāhi. I kī a IBM, e tūmanako ana kia "mōhio ake" a Watson ki te whakahaere i te reo rongoā. "Mā te āhei ki te mahi tahi me ngā kaiako me ngā ākonga i tētahi whakahaere pēnei i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga ka āwhina mātou ki te ako me pēhea te whakaako me te whakaurutau i a Watson ki tētahi āpure hou mā te tauwhitiwhiti ki ngā tohunga," te kī a David Ferrucci, te kaihautū matua o te kaupapa Watson. Ka hanga te mahi i runga i te mahi a IBM me te wae rangahau o te Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center i Manhattan, New York. E mahi ana te tokorua ki te whakawhanake i tētahi taupānga e āwhina ana ki te kimi i te rongoā tino pai mō tētahi tūroro pūkahukahu, uma, pukupuku pukupuku rānei. E tūmanako ana rātau ki te whakatere i tētahi taupānga me tētahi rōpū whānui o ngā tohunga oncologists i te mutunga o te tau 2013. Ko te moni mai i te rongoā ka whai hua pea ngā nekehanga ki IBM i te roanga o te wā. I pau i a Mātau anake neke atu i te $2.6 trillion (£1.6tn) mō te whakapau hauora i te 2010, e tohu ana i te 17.6% o tōna GDP, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo o mua tata nei a te UTI (Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development). E hua ana ngā rauemi mākete a IBM, ko te nuinga o ngā tātaritanga e rima e hē, kāore rānei i te oti, ā, e tata ana ki te 1.5 miriona ngā hapa rongoā e mahia ana i te US i ia tau. Tērā anō, e kī ana kei te tāruatia te nui o ngā mōhiohio rongoā ia rima tau, ka uaua ake ai te noho a ngā rongoā puta noa i ngā whanaketanga hāngai katoa. Kua whakaaturia e te kamupene ka tonoa e ia he "tiritiri o te uara" o tētahi painga i takea mai i tōna hangarau, kaua ko te utu tautuhi. Ehara i te mea ko ngā raraunga hē ehara i te mea anake e mōhio ana ki te kaha o te wāhanga. Kua titiro hoki ngā kairangahau i te Rōpū Whakatau Rongoā i te Whare Wānanga o Te Hangarau o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Hangarau (MIT) ki te hoatu i te mōhiohio horihori ki te rongoā, i te wā e tīari kē ana ngā pūmanawa pēnei i a Dxplain me Isabel hei āwhina i ngā rongoā ki te waea tika. Heoi anō, kua huatau mai tētahi tohunga hangarau rongoā kei te 30 tau tonu tātau i ngā rorohiko hei tātaritanga pono. E whakapono ana a Pātata Trotter, ko te kaiwhakahaere hangarau i te Tūāpapa Tūroro Tūpato, ko tētahi wāhanga o te raruraru, he hē te nuinga o ngā mōhiohio e tātuhia ana e ngā pūnaha ā-AI. "Ehara i te mea he aha te pai o te hātepe papatono AI mēnā kei te hē ō raraunga rongoā, ā, kei te whakaahuatia ki tētahi āhuatanga rongoā hē," ka tuhituhi a ia mō te kaupapa. "Ko aku wheako whaiaro me ngā raraunga hauora i runga i te tauine whānui? He rite ki te kōrerorero ki tētahi rūpahu pūnoa e whakararuraru ana i te kōrero. "E kī taurangi ana ahau ki a koe ka oti te raruraru AI i mua noa atu i te whiwhinga o ngā raraunga rongoā e tino pono ana hei whakangungu. Kia puta rā anō tērā, whakaarohia he pēhea te mahi a Watson i runga i a Jeopardy mehemea i whakaakona ki te Ariki o ngā Mowhiti me te Ngeru i roto i te Pōtae, kaua ko ngā encyclopaedias."

title: 'Parea ngā tangata whenua' i ngā rohe papā
summary: Kua tohe te kaitiaki motika tangata o Rāwāhi, o Amnesty International, ki ngā rōpū whawhai i Sri Lanka kia mahi wawe ki te pare i ngā tangata whenua i mau i roto i te papā.
text: E kī ana te rōpū motika e tino māharahara ana ki te pānga o te whawhai ki ngā tangata whenua nā "ngā whakaekenga tika" a ngā ope haumarutanga o Sri Lanka me te LTTE. Kua tohe te AI ki ngā rōpū kia "ū ki ā rātou here i raro i te ture o te ao whānui, ki te pare i ngā tangata whenua me te whakaae i te urunga a ngā puna āwhina atawhai ki ngā iwi whānui e mate ana". "Ko ngā tūpāpaku ture, ngā tāhaetanga me te ngaronga o ngā tangata whenua, he takanga ia rā, pērā ki te tautāwhi pokanoa," te kī a AI i roto i tētahi kōrero. Kua whakapaea e te kaitiaki ngā ope haumarutanga o Sri Lanka me te Tāwha Tamila o te "tūkino ā-pūnaha" i a rātau here i raro i te ture o te ao whānui hei pare i ngā tangata whenua e pāngia ana e te papā. "I tērā marama kua puta te papā ki te nekehanga o ngā tāngata e 80,000 neke atu rānei, e whakarua ana i te iwi whānui IDP tīariari i te Takiwā o Batticaloa ki neke atu i te 160,000. E mataku ana, e anga ana ki te haumarutanga, he tokomaha o ēnei IDPs e pā ana ki te iti kai. He tino nui te iti o te wai, e whakahau ana i ngā whānau ki te ngana ki te keri i o rātau ake poka. I tētahi mahi, i te 3 o Poutāpeta 2007 ka toromi tētahi tamaiti i roto i tētahi rua wai e ngana ana tōna whaea ki te keri," te tāpiri mai o te kōrero. I tonoa nga rōpū ki te papā kia whakaaetia te uru ki nga kaupapa āwhina atawhai hei āwhina i nga tangata whenua e pāngia ana. "E pūrongo ana ngā puna āwhina i mua i te whakahāwea hōia hou rawa o Mati, i tino rāhuitia e te kāwanatanga me te LTTE te urunga ki te Takiwā o Batticaloa me ētahi atu wāhi papā i raro i tō rātou mana, ka waiho te tekau mano o ngā IDP hōu, me te nuinga o ētahi atu iwi pāngia, me te kore parenga aowhānui me te āheitanga ki te āwhina atawhai. I tēnei horopaki, kei te mōrearea ngā tāngata whenua ki te mau i roto i ngā taiparatanga pū kāore i te mōhiotia e ngā taha e rua, i raro rānei i te tūkinotanga o te tauwhiro". I mau i roto i te tutu o te Hāwhe Tamila, e whakapaea ana hoki ki te whakarite i ngā tāngata i runga i ngā huarahi maha, e ai ki te rōpū motika. "Kua whakaritea e te LTTE te kawenga mo te maha o ngā tūpāpaku tōrangapū me ngā whakaekenga pōma noa, ā, ka haere tonu ki te tiki i ngā hōia tamariki. Kua āraia e te rōpū ngā tangata whenua kia kaua e rere i ngā wāhi riri i te raki me te rāwhiti". I whakapaea te kāwanatanga o Sri Lanka i te korenga e kawe mai ki te tika i te hunga e haepapa ana ki te tūkinotanga nui o te mana tangata. "Kāore i tēnei wā te kaha o ngā tikanga aroturuki motika tangata tīariari me ngā tikanga whakamatau i tēnei wā ki te mahi i ngā tūkinotanga motika tangata tauine nui. E kī ana te Komihana Motika Tangata o Sri Lanka e hia rau ngā tāngata kua 'ngaro' i tēnei tau, i runga ake i te 1,000 i tērā tau. I te taumata o te ao whānui, e 5749 ngā kēhi tūturu o Sri Lanka e arotakea ana e te Rōpū Mahi UN mō ngā Ngaronga Whakaū me ngā Ngaronga Tūturu, e hia rau o ēnei kua pūrongotia mai i te tīmatanga o te tau 2006". Kua tohe te kaitiaki ki te kāwanatanga kia whakaaetia ngā kaupane motika aowhānui i runga i te whenua hei whakarei ake i te parenga ā-iwi. "E hiahiatia ana tēnei nā te rahunga o ngā rongoā ā-kāinga mō ngā tūkinotanga motika tangata - ahakoa i mahia e te kāwanatanga, te LTTE, ētahi atu rōpū patu rānei," te kī a AI.

title: Shahbaz Taseer: He aha i patua ai te tama a te kāwana o Pakitāne?
summary: Kua huihuia anō te tama kahakina a te kāwana o Hōia i patua, a Ararere Taseer ki tōna whānau, neke atu i te whā tau i muri i te hopukina e nga pūtā i Aotearoa.
text: Nā M Ilyas KanWHC, He maha ngā pātai e karapoti ana i te tāhaetanga me te tuku a Shahbaz Taseer - ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā whakautu mārama. He aha ia i whakawāteatia ai ināianei? Tata tonu te wiki i muri i te kawenga a Pakitāne i a Mumtaz Kadri, te kaitiaki pirihimana nāna i kōhuru a Ararere Taseer (te pāpā o Shahbaz) mō te tiaki i ngā whakahōu ki ngā ture kohukohu o te whenua. Nā reira, tērā pea ka tūmanako te tangata kia whakamahia ia e nga kaiwhakahāwea e pupuri ana i a ia hei ahanoa mo ta rātau utu. Heoi anō, i haere wātea a ia, ko te āhua nei i runga i te whakaaetanga a ana kaihopu. He maha nga ariā. E kī ana ētahi, i te oho o nga mahi hōia a Pakitāne i te rohe o Waziristan, i te oma nga kaiwhakawhanake, a, he uaua ki te pupuri i a ia. Ko ētahi e whakapono ana i tukua ia i muri i te utunga utu ki ana kaikaha. Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei pūrākau: He aha i puritia ai e Pakitāne nga tangi rārangi mārō i te hau? He pēhea te rironga o te kaipatu o te kāwana o Punjab hei toa He aha nga ture kohukohu a Pakitāne? Ararere Taseer: Ko te matenga o te ohaoha He aha te pūrākau whaimana o tana kākātanga? I kī ngā pūrongo tuatahi i takea mai i ngā mana o Hōia, i whakaorangia ia i roto i tētahi mahi "ā-mōhiotanga" i whakahaeretia e tētahi ratonga mōhiohio matua o Hōia (he tautohetohe mō te KI), te wae mōhiohio o te Rūnanga Rohe o te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o T I kī mai tētahi mana CTD i whakaorangia ia e rātau i tētahi pūhui i te takiwā o Tūpāpaku, e 25km (16 km) ki te raki o Quetta. I whakaūngia e te parirau pāpāho o te hōia, a ISPR, te putanga o Tēnā Taseer, ā, i kī taurangi i ētahi atu taipitopito i roto i tētahi karere whai muri kāore anō kia tukua, i tua atu i ētahi o ana pikitia, me te rangatira ISPR e whakaū ana i ngā kaipānui i roto i tētahi tweet he "hākinakina, he ngākau ngākau a ia". He aha te kōrero a te rangatira wharekai? I te wā tonu e kimi ana te pāpāho i ngā pūrongo o tētahi kōtiro, te hopu rānei i ngā kaikaha, ka whakapā atu ētahi kaipānui i Quetta ki te rangatira o tētahi wharekai i te taha o te huarahi i Tūhāhā. I kī te rangatira kua haere tētahi tangata makawe roa me te pahau nui ki roto i te wharekai tata ki te 5:20pm wā paetata (12:20 GMT) me te tono tītī tunutunu, he motuhake paetata. I muri i tana whakaotinga kai, ka utua e ia tana pire e 350 rupeea (£2.35; $3.35). Ka haere atu a ia ki te kaitatau, ka tono waea. Ka kī atu te rangatira ki a ia kāore i a ia. Kātahi ia ka tono ki tētahi kaihoko mō tana waea, ka waea, kātahi ka noho ki tana tēpu. Tata ki te 5.50pm, ka tū mai tētahi motokā o Frontier Corps i te taha o te wharekai. Ka tū te tangata ki runga, ka rere atu ki nga waka o te WH. Ka purua e ētahi hōia he kākahu ki runga i tōna māhunga, a, ka purua ia ki roto i tētahi o ngā waka, ka taraiwa atu, ka hamama ki te iwi i reira kia titiro ki tētahi atu huarahi. Ka kī te rangatira, i tana rongonga i te rongo o te tukunga o Tēnā Taseer, a, ka kite i ana pikitia i runga i te pouaka whakaata, ka mōhio a ia ko wai tana kiritaki. He tokomaha i kitea te pūkete a te rangatira wharekai hei whakaaturanga i whakawāteatia noatia te tama a te kāwana e ana kaihopu, kāore i kapohia e nga ope haumarutanga. Na wai ia i kahaki? I arotahi ngā tūhuratanga pirihimana tuatahi ki ngā tauwhāinga pakihi paetata, engari he waea pūkoro i kitea e nga pirihimana i te wāhi i kahakina ai ia i a Hōngongoi 2013 ki te hopunga o ngā Uzbeks e rua me ngā Hūpia e rima. E kiia ana kua whakaritea e rātau te kākātanga ehara i te mea ko Shahbaz Taseer anake, engari ko tētahi mana āwhina o Amerika, ko Te Pirimia, tae atu ki te tama a te Pirimia o Youss Raza Gilani, o Te Pirimia o Mua, o Te Pirimia o Youss Raza Gilani, o Te Pirimia. Engari i taua wā ka tukuna atu e rātau a rātau tūpāpaku ki ngā rōpū tinihanga i runga anō i te rohe ā iwi o Pakitāne o Waziristan. Ko ngā tuakana Uzbek tokorua i hopukina i a Hōngongoi 2013 i kīa he mema o te Nekehanga Āmāri o Uzbekistan (IMU), i te nuinga o ngā Tūpuhi e rima he ākonga pūkaha pūkaha e whai pānga ana ki Lashkar-e-Jhangvi, he rōpū tinihanga whakawhitiwhiti hōia me ngā hononga ki te Huinga o Hōia (TTP), al-Mōrea me ōna pānga ao whānui, tae atu ki te IMU. He aha ia i kahakina ai? He tokomaha e whakapono ana i mua i tōna tukunga i te Tūtira, i puritia a Shahbaz Taseer e ētahi huānga o te TTP, nāna i taurima te IMU i to rātau pā o Waziristan ki te Tonga mo nga tau. Ko te taikaha me te kākā hei utu he pūtake moni nui mo tēnei whatunga tinihanga katoa. I tua atu i te utu, kua whakamahia hoki e ēnei rōpū nga kākā hai whakaū i te tukunga o o rātau hoa i hopukina. I mua, kua utua e ngā kāwanatanga o Hōia me Pūkeirangi he utu, ā, kua tukua e ngā kaiwhakawhanake kia haumaru ai te wāteatanga o tētahi takawaenga takawaenga o Hōia me tētahi takawaenga takawaenga o Pūkeirangi. I te nuinga o te wā, ka huri ringa te moni mā ngā kaiārahi TTP. I te kēhi o Shahbaz Taseer, tērā ētahi pūrongo o tētahi utu nui ake e tonoa ana, ā, i whakahekea ā muri ake ki te 1bn rupee hōia ($10m). Heoi anō, ka haere tonu te hākinakina, ā, kua whakaaturia e ētahi hauwhā ko te whatunga Haqqani, ahakoa ngā whakakāhoretanga, kua roa te whakapono kua hākinakina te tautoko mai i te whakatūnga hōia a Pakitāne, i āwhina ki te pāpāhotanga i tētahi take e pā ana ki tētahi utu iti iho. Kāore i te mārama mēnā he wāhanga anō ētahi tuku herehere o te whakaaetanga. He aha a Balochistan? He hononga Afghanistan? Kua neke a Pakitāne ki ngā wāhi tapu tinihanga i ngā wāhi ā iwi ki te raki, engari ko ngā wāhi ki te raki o Balochistan kua noho kore noa iho. Ko ēnei wāhi he kāinga ki te iwi whānui nui o te hunga whakaruru o Pūkeirangi, ki te kaiārahi hoki o te Huinga o Pūkeirangi e kiia nei ko Quetta Shura. I te wā o ngā mahi i Waziristan, ko te nuinga o ngā toa TTP me IMU i te tonga o taua rohe i maringi atu ki Balochistan ki te raki. Kua taea hoki e rātau te neke puta noa i te nuinga o te rohe o Pūkeirangi e pātata ana ki ngā rohe ā iwi me Balochistan.

title: Ngā āwangawanga haumaru mō ngā mahere 'whare herehere tino pai'
summary: I kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau e ātete ana i ngā mahere mō tētahi "whare herehere tino pai" e noho ana i ngā hoa 1,000 i Te Rāwhiti o Aotearoa.
text: Kua whakaaetia te whakaaetanga whakarite whakahuahua e te Kaunihera Eke ki te Rāwhiti mō tētahi whare herehere Kāwai C e £91m e tata ana ki tētahi whare herehere haumarutanga tiketike tīariari i Full Sutton. I kī ngā tangata whenua kei te mōrearea te haumarutanga o te kāinga, ā, ka nui ake ngā waka. I kī te kāwanatanga ka āwhina nga whare herehere o nāianei ki te tapahi i te hara anō. More on this and other stories across East Yorkshire Maddy Ruff, 53, who has lived in the village for 13 years, said: "From a safeguarding perspective we feel very vulnerable. " Ka whakaaetia ngā tāngata i roto i ngā tau e rua whakamutunga o ta rātau whiu kia puta atu i te whare herehere me te kopikopiko. He tamariki kei te kāinga, ā, ka mōrearea tō mātou haumarutanga." I kī a ia ko te whare e 38,217 sq m, e tonoa ana kia hangaia ki Moor Lane, ka puta mai he "nui rawa o ngā waka" e puta mai ana i te pikinga o "ngā herehere, ngā manuhiri me ngā kaimahi". "Ka tino whakangaro i to mātau kāinga iti," tana kī. "He tino kore pai te whatunga huarahi. E rua noa iho te haere mai o te pahi i ia rā. "E kore mātou e noho ki te tuku i tēnei kia puta." I kī te tangata noho me te kaiwhakahauhau a Liz Pert: "Ki taku mōhio ka whiwhi manuhiri rātou ki te toru ngā wā i te wiki. Ko te tikanga o te mano herehere, tae atu ki te toru mano nga toronga. "Kāore e taea e te kāinga te whakatikatika i aua waka katoa." I kī a Andrew Neilson, mai i te Rōpū Hauati mō te Whakahōu Penal, ehara te hanga whare herehere nui ake i te whakautu, ā, ka karangatia kia "pai ake te whakahaere i te rahi o te iwi whānui o te whare herehere". I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te Manatu Ture: "Kua pā mātou ki ngā mahi whānui kia tika ai te pae o Te Katoa mō tētahi whanaketanga hou. " We fully understand the concerns of residents, and are committed to mitigating any disruption that may arise from the development of the site."

title: I tauria ngā kaiako rorohiko 'matua' ki te whakangungu i ētahi atu
summary: Kei te tonoa tētahi whatunga o ngā kaiako pūtaiao rorohiko "matua" e 400 ki te tuku i tētahi marautanga pūtaiao rorohiko hōu i ngā kura puta noa i Ingarangi.
text: These specialist teachers will train teachers in other schools and provide resources for teachers to use in class. I pūteatia e te kāwanatanga, e whakahaeretia ana te kaupapa e te Rōpū Rorohiko o Ingarangi. Ka tīmata te marautanga pūtaiao rorohiko hōu, e whakakapi ana i te marautanga hangarau mōhiohio me ngā hangarau whakawhitiwhiti (ICT) o nāianei, i tēnei Mahuru. I te whakatuwheratanga o te whakaaturanga hangarau ako Bett i Rānana, ka kī te Hēkeretari Mātauranga a Michael Gove: "Ko tēnei marautanga hou ko... he poto ake, he iti iho hoki te tohutohu i te marautanga ICT tawhito, ā, ka āhei ngā kura ki te auaha, kia nui ake hoki te hao. "I whakamahia e te ICT te arotahi māmā, whāiti hoki ki te pānui pukapuka rorohiko, te whakaako i ngā ākonga me pēhea te tukatuka kupu, me pēhea te mahi i tētahi ripakaute, me pēhea te whakamahi i ngā papatono kua oti kē - kua tawhito kē. " Ināianei e whakaako ana tā mātou marautanga hōu i ngā tamariki i te pūtaiao rorohiko, te hangarau mōhiohio me te pānui pukapuka matihiko. Māna rātou e ako me pēhea te waehere, me pēhea te waihanga i ā rātou ake papatono, ehara i te mea me pēhea te mahi i te rorohiko engari me pēhea te mahi a te rorohiko, me pēhea te mahi māu." Mai i te rima, ka ako ngā tauira i Ingarangi ki te waehere me te papatono, ā, mai i te 11 o ona tau, ka whakaakona ngā tamariki kia rua neke atu rānei ngā reo papatono. Ka haere tonu a ia: "Koinei tonu ngā momo pūkenga e mahi ana i ngā mahi ā muri ake, ā, mō tēnā take ko ngā mahi o nāianei, e tono ana, ā, mai i tēnei wā, mā ēnei huringa e whakarite kia whiwhi ia tamaiti i tētahi tūāpapa mārō i roto i ēnei pūkenga matua." Ka kaute hoki ngā GCSE pūtaiao rorohiko hei pūtaiao i roto i te Ingarihi Baccalaureate mō ngā tēpu rōpū kura tuarua, i te taha o te ahupūngao, te matū, te koiora me ngā tauira e mau ana i te pūtaiao taurua. Ka whakaurua hei tētahi o ngā kōwhiringa pūtaiao e tatau ana ki tēnei mehua. E hiahiatia ana e te Ingarihi Baccalaureate (EBacc) kia whiwhi ngā ākonga i ngā kōeke GCSE pai i te reo Ingarihi, pāngarau, pūtaiao, hītori, papawhenua rānei me tētahi reo.

title: Ka whakararurarutia e ngā āwhā ngā ratonga waka waka o Te Motu o Tangata
summary: Nā ngā āwhā i runga i te Moana o Airana i whakararuraru ai ngā ratonga utanga me ngā waka waka pāhihi o Te Motu o Tangata.
text: Ko te whakawhitinga 08:45 GMT o te Ben-my-Chree i waenganui i Takiwa me Heysham, i Nekehire, ā, i tangohia tahitia tōna hokinga mai. I whakatārewatia hoki te haerenga 19:45 o te Wenerei me te hokinga mai o te pō nā ngā āhuatanga haurangi. Heoi anō, ka haere te rere o te ahiahi o te Rāitema kia rite ki te whakaritenga, te kī a te Kamupene Pōkai Steam o Te Motu o Man. Ahakoa kei te kati tonu te rohe o te motu ki te nuinga o nga kainoho kore na te mate coronavirus, ko te hunga e noho ana i te motu e wātea ana ki te haere i te wa e mau ana ratou ki nga mana taratahi i te hokinga mai. He aha e kore ai e whai i te Motu o Tangata i runga i Facebook me Twitter? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Isle of Man Steam Packet Company Isle of Man Government - Weather

title: Ka neke a TikTok ki te mākete mātauranga
summary: Kua pānuitia e TikTok ngā mahere hei whakarite i ngā rau tohunga me ngā umanga ki te whakaputa ihirangi mātauranga mō te pūhara.
text: Nā Osman Hēna, ko ngā Whare Wānanga me ngā aroha i waenganui i te hunga ka utua hei waihanga i ngā ihirangi hāngai mō te matua pāpāho pāpori. Ka taea e te arotahi hōu te tono ki te ia mō te ako moroiti, e kī ana tētahi tohunga. Neke atu i te rua miriona ngā wā i tikiake ai a TikTok i runga i te iOS me te Android mai i te wā i whakarewaina huri noa i te tau 2017. Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te hanga ataata tae atu ki te 15 hēkona te roa, me ngā pūoro i te papamuri. Mā tōna angitu i hangaia i runga i ngā ataata whakangahau i hangaia e te kaiwhakamahi, ko te nekehanga ki te whakauru i ngā ihirangi ako i hangaia ngaio e tohu ana i tētahi neke nui, i te wā e ngana ana te kamupene ki te whakaputa i ōna ihirangi. I te whakarewatanga, kei roto i ngā ataata ko te kaitapere o Ingarangi ko Hōne Sagar e tiritiri ana i ngā aki mō te whakarite mō ngā whakamātautau, me te kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata me te pāngarau o Rahera Riley e āwhina ana ki te whakawhanake i ngā pūkenga pāngarau. I a ia e kōrero ana ki a BBC Click, i kī a Rich Waterworth, te kaiwhakahaere ahuwhānui o TikTok mō Uropi, kua kite te pūhara i te hiahia o ngā kaiwhakamahi ki ngā ataata akoranga, neke atu i te whitu miriona ngā tirohanga o te hashtag #LearnOnTikTok. "Ka haere whakamua, ko LearnOnTikTok e pā ana ki a mātou e haumi ana i ngā hoa me ngā kaihanga ihirangi me te whānui o ngā ihirangi ngaio... E whakaaro ana mātou ko tēnei e pā ana ki te hoatu i te mana o TikTok ki te akoranga: ngā pānga, te ororongo, ngā tauwhiro, ngā utauta e tino whai wāhi ana, e ngahau ana, kia ngahau ai te tangata ki te ako." E whakapono ana te rangatira o Disney a Martin Jefferies, kaiwhakahaere pāpāho pāpori i English Heritage, he aroha e whakahaere ana i ngā pae hītori neke atu i te 400 i te UK, ka whai wāhi te urunga ki te hunga taitamariki o TikTok ki te tūhura i ngā momo ihirangi rerekē. "E whakaaro ana mātou he wāhi haumaru a TikTok ki te tūhura i ngā pūrākau e tino hira ana ki te rangatahi, nā reira ko ngā mea pēnei i te hītori pango, ngā pūrākau LGBTQ mai i ētahi o ā mātou pae, te hītori o te wahine hoki - he taiao tino haumaru, pōhiri hoki." Mā ngā ataata i hangaia ngaio ināianei kei te whakaurua i te taha o ngā ihirangi i hangaia e te kaiwhakamahi, e kī ana a Jamie MacEwan, he kaitātari rangahau i Enders Analysis, ka taea e te upoko roma o Disney te tohu i tētahi ahunga hōu mō te pūhara. "E tino hiahia ana a TikTok ki te whakawhānui ake i tana tono, ā, ka kite mātou i ētahi atu ihirangi hanganga, nui ake ngā ihirangi mārō e haere whakamua ana. E hono ana tēnei ki te Tumuaki Whakahaere hou, a Kevin Mayer, e haere mai ana i Disney. E mōhio ana mātou ki a ia hei kaihanga mō ngā ihirangi, ā, e tino mōhio ana mātou ki te kite i ētahi atu mahi ngātahi e haere whakamua ana." I Disney, i whakahaeretia e Tēnā Mayer te whakarewatanga angitu o te ratonga roma a te umanga, Disney Plus, i Whiringa 2019. Ināianei neke atu i te 50 miriona ngā kaiohauru. I whakaarotia hoki ia he tangata matua i roto i ngā whiwhinga a te kamupene o Lucasfilm, Pixar me Marvel. Mā te taupānga e whakawaenga ana i ngā ihirangi poto, ka whakamāramatia e Dr Elizabeth Hidson, he kaiako matua i te mātauranga i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare "Ka mōhio te nuinga o tātau ki te ariā o te haere tuihono ki te kimi ataata tohutohu," tana kī. "Kua tino tū kē tēnei ariā o ngā wae iti o te akoranga i roto i te mātauranga tuihono - e kīia ana e mātou ko te ako moroiti."

title: E kī ana a Pirini William 'ehara i te whenua tauhou'
summary: Ehara tēnei i te whenua tauhou mō Piriniha William, mō tōna whānau rānei.
text: Ko Pita HuntDiplomatic me te ariki correspondent@BBCPeterHunton Twitter Kia kitea e hiahia ana ki te aroaro o ngā nūpepa, he mōrearea mahi tērā i whakararuraru i a rātau mo te nuinga o nga tau. I te whakatau a te rangatira ki te reti me ōna hoa, kaua e haere wawe ki te haere ki tētahi karakia e hira ana ki tōna kuia, ka taea e ia te matapae ka whakawāteatia ia kua hē te whakawā. He hapa tērā ka taea e ia te tatarahapa i te wā e wātea ana. Engari ko te mea kāore i taea e ia te matapae, ka noho tonu a ia hei rongo matua mo te wā roa. Kai te tūpato te kīngi ā muri ake ki te pāpāho. Kei te nui haere te māharahara o nga nūpepa ki ana ngana ki te karo i a rātau me te whakamahi kē i te pāpāho pāpori. Ka tae mai te whakamātautau panuku i te ngahuru ina noho ia hei ariki matua wā katoa. Mēnā kāore he pikinga kitea i roto i tana mahi ariki, tērā te mōrea ka noho anō ngā nūpepa ki te whakawā, ā, ka kite anō i a Piriniha William e hiahia ana.

title: Top NI auditor to investigate over green energy scheme claims
summary: Me tīmata te kaitirotiro matua o Aiarangi ki te Raki i tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i ngā whakaaro mō tētahi atu kaupapa pūngao kākāriki i NI.
text: Nā Conor MacauleyBBC NI Agriculture & Environment Correspondent E mōhiotia ana ka whakarewaina e te kaiwhakahaere me te kaihautū, a Kieran Donnelly, te uiui i te wā o Hui tanguru mō ngā utu ki ngā kaikūnatu anaerobic. Ka whakamahia e rātau he rauemi waro pēnei i te slurry me te silage hei waihanga i tētahi biogas e tahuna ana hei whakaputa hiko. He maha o rātau kua hangaia ki Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i ngā tau tata nei. He nui ake te hua o nga moni i utua i Aiarangi ki te Raki i a rātau i Ingarangi. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka whakapaetia e tētahi pakipūmeka o te Reo Irirangi 4 o TE Reo Irirangi 4 mō te mahinga o ētahi o rātou. I whakapuakina i roto i te maha o ngā take, ko ngā pūkenga whakanao he "tipu kēhua" - he whakapae i whakakāhoretia e ngā kamupene i whakaingoatia. Ka arotahi te tūhuratanga a Tēnā Donnelly ki te pūnaha whānui ake o ngā utu tautoko mō te pūngao whakahou e kiia nei ko ngā Tiwhikete Herenga Whakahou. Engari e mōhiotia ana ka wiri ki te take o ngā tipu AD, i runga anō i ngā take i whakaarahia. He aha te kūnatu anaerobic? Ko ngā utu ki ngā kamupene e whakaputa hiko ana i ngā whakahou i puta mai i te pārekareka i runga i ngā pire hiko, kaua e hāngai ana i te pāhi moni tūmatanui. Engari nā te mea he tūranga tā te Tari Whakahaere me te Kaiwhakarite Taputapu, ka taka tētahi uiui ki roto i te mahi a Tēnā Donnelly. I ētahi take, ko ngā moni mo te hanganga o ngā tipu AD i Aiarangi ki te Raki kua whakaratoa e ngā kamupene pūtea ā-Rāwāhi. Kātahi ka utua he utu ki ngā kaiahuwhenua i hangaia ai rātou ki te whāngai me te whakahaere i te pānga, me ngā moni whai hua e hoki ana ki a rātou i muri i te tekau tau mō te toenga o te wā 20 tau. I ētahi wā, kua whakaarahia ngā māharahara kua hangaia, kua whakahaerehia hoki ngā tipu ki te takahi i ngā tohutohu taiao me ngā tohutohu whakarite.

title: Ka whakatuwheratia e Eddie Izzard te whare tapere o te Kāreti o Bexhill
summary: Kua hoki mai te comedian me te kaitapere toa whakawhiwhinga a Eddie Izzard ki tōna taone kāinga i East Sussex ki te whakatuwhera i tētahi whare tapere hou.
text: Kua tapaina te whare tapere miriona pauna i te Kāreti Puka Tuaono o Bexhill ko te Whare Tapere Izzard i tōna hōnore. Ka taea e ia te pupuri i te hunga e 200 tāngata, ā, he wāhi whakaako motuhake me ngā wāhi whakaako, me ngā rūma kākāriki mō ngā kaiwhakaari. I kī a Tēnā Izzard i kitea e ia te ingoa o te whare tapere he "tino whakamīharo, he pōhēhē hoki i te wā kotahi", engari i tino hari i te whakatuwheratanga. "Ki te hoki whakamuri taku mahi, kei te kāreti taku whakaaetanga ki te huri i te ingoa o te whare tapere ki te Whare Tapere o Blizzard, ā, ka kī i tapaina ki ngā kaihōpara o te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga," tana kōrero. 'Tauira tūranga' I haere mai tana haerenga ki te whare tapere i te ahiahi o te Hātarei tata ki te 10 tau i muri i tana whakatuwheratanga mana i te pae kāreti i Penland Road. I muri i te hui o te Hātarei, ka mahia e ia tētahi mahi takatāpui kotahi i te whare pikitia. I kī te tumuaki o te kāreti o Karen Hucker he "tauira tūranga i te motu, i te ao whānui hoki hei kaiwhakangahau me te karere aroha". "Kua tutuki i a Eddie ngā mea nunui i roto i tana mahi, ā, he nui hoki ngā mahi mō ngā take aroha, nā reira e tika ana kia whakahonoretia e mātau ōna angitu mā te whakaingoa i to mātau whare tapere ki muri i a ia," tana kī.

title: Ko ngā kaupapa hanga i pā ki te kore rawa me te pikinga o te utu
summary: Kei te poto haere ngā rauemi hanga i te UK, ka waiho ngā kaupapa DIY ki te rangirua me te hanga kamupene i raro i te pēhanga.
text: Nā Haimona Pānui & Niall-James ConveryBusiness reporters, kua whakatūpato te Kaunihera Kaiārahi Hanganga he iti noa iho te raima, ētahi wae hiko, rākau, tīra me ngā peita. I whakapaea e ia "ngā taumata tono tawhito rawa" kua tautuhia kia haere tonu. I kī te Tōpūtanga o ngā Kaihanga Matua me whakaroa pea ētahi whare i ngā kaupapa, ā, ka taea ētahi atu kia kati. "Ko ngā kaihanga iti, paetata e tino pā ana ki ngā iti rawa me te pikinga utu," te kī a te rangatira nui o Kōrero Berry. "Kāore e taea e mātou te hanga i tō mātou ara ki te whakaora mai i te mate urutā mēnā kāore i a mātou ngā rawa." Roland Glancy, managing director of design service Peek Home, advised people to delay home improvement projects until autumn. "Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahia ana koe ko te tukituki i roto i tētahi pakitara, kātahi ka uaua ki te pupuri i tētahi pēke pani hei whakaoti i tō kitenga ka waiho koe e noho ana i tētahi wāhi whare, i te wā tonu e hākinakina ana e tātau o tātau wāteatanga hou," tana kī. He maha nga take e piki ana nga utu i takea mai ai nga raruraru putanga. Kua piki ake ngā kaupapa umanga hanganga mai i te tīmatanga o te raka, nā reira i nui ake ai te tono mō ngā rawa mōmona kē. Tērā anō ētahi take e pā ana ki ngā hua tauwhāiti, pēnei i te hōtoke mahana ake e pā ana ki te whakanao rākau i Scandinavia, i te wā i pā te rangi makariri i Tekihi ki te whakanao matū, kirihou me te waerau. Tērā anō te pikinga nui o ngā utu kaipuke, e kī ana a Noble Francis, te kaiwhakahaere ohaoha o te Pānga Hua Hanganga. "Kua nui te piki o ngā utu kaipuke nā te iti o ngā ipu wātea mai i ngā take e pā ana ki Covid-19 me te whakaoranga koi o te tono ā-ao," tana kī atu ki te BBC. Hei tauira, ko te utu mo te tuku i tētahi ipu 40ft mai i Āhia ki Uropi ki te Raki i piki mai i te $1,500 (£1,061) i te raumati 2020 ki neke atu i te $8,300 (£5,873) i Mei 2021, ka kī a ia. Mā te nui haere o te tono i te ao whānui, ā, kei te kawemai te UK i te nuinga o ana rauemi taketake, kei te roa haere ngā wā ārahi mō ngā whakahau i te wā e piki ana ngā utu. 'Kei te whakahuatia ahau e £10,000 mō tētahi mahi kaukau £5,000' E iwa marama e tatari ana a Mohsen Kashan o Milton Keynes kia whakahoutia tōna whare kaukau i muri i te turuturu. Engari me ngā raruraru ki te whiwhi wāhanga me ngā kaihokohoko, ka kī atu a ia ki te AO ināianei kāore e taea e ia te utu i ngā utu e whakahuatia ana ia. "He mahi ngāwari tēnei mō tētahi whare kaukau iti e 2 mita mā te 2.5 mita. Engari kua whakahuatia mātau e £10,000 mo te mea iti iho i te £5,000. "Ki te tūmanako kia utu i waenganui i te £8,000 me te £10,000 mō tētahi whare kaukau iti," te kī a Mohsen. Mai i Mahuru e uaua ana a ia ki te whakatika i ngā tapi. "Kua whakamātauria e mātou a B&Q, ētahi atu pātaka e rua, tae atu ki ngā kaitāuta me te hawhe tekau mā rua ngā kaiuru. " He tiketike rawa te utu o ngā rauemi, he nui rawa te utu mahi, kāore rānei ngā rauemi i te wātea." Kua whakaritea e te Office for National Statistics te pikinga o te 7-8% i roto i ngā utu rawa, me te pikinga mō ētahi rauemi, pēnei i te rākau, e tūmanakohia ana kia neke atu i te rua i te roanga o te tau. "Kei te pā aku mema ki te pikinga utu o te 10-15% puta noa i te poari, e piki ana ki te 50% i runga i te rākau me te 30% i runga i te raima," te kī a Tēnā Berry. 'Tono tawhito rawa' "He tino uaua ki ngā rawa. It's nothing that we've ever experienced before," said Amy Archer, deputy managing director of the Swift Group, based in Cottingham near Hull, which makes caravans, motorhomes and holiday homes. I kī a ia e rua ngā take: "Ko te tuatahi he iti rawa i te wāhi tuatahi me ngā takaware kua kitea e mātou i roto i ngā tauranga nā te iti o te ipu kaipuke." Ko te tuarua ko te pikinga o ngā utu: "Kei te piki haere ngā utu taonga nā te mea he nui rawa te hiahia mō ngā hua." Kāore anō kia āwhina te mahi nui i te kāinga, ka kī a ia. "Lots of people are doing home improvements such as new kitchens and that's all draining the materials that are available." "He tino tawhito tēnei," te kī a Chris Husband, te kaiwhakahaere arumoni i te kaiwhakarato rākau o Bayram Timber. "Ko te rōrahi nui o ngā rākau e hiahiatia ana i tēnei wā, kei te uaua rātau ki te pupuri i a ia i Scandinavia, i reira mātou e pūtake ai te nuinga o ā mātou rawa taketake." Ko tana kamupene, i noho i North Ferriby tata ki Hull. e whakataetae ana ki ētahi atu puta noa i te ao mō ngā rākau, ā, "me tatari i roto i te rārangi", tana kī. "He tino nui te pānga o te utunga moni ki te utu rauemi taketake, ā, e mārama ana hoki ngā wā ārahi." Kei konei te āhuatanga o nāianei ki te noho? "E tino mōhio ana mātou kei a mātau tēnei mō te toenga o tēnei tau," tana kī. Kua pā hoki te pānga o te rākau o te UK i te 80% o ngā rākau ngohengohe i ahu mai i Uropi, e kī ana a Thomas Goodman, tohunga hanganga, mai i MyJobQuote. He poto hoki te tīra, i te mea he nui ake te tono o te ao. "He maha nga kaiwhakanao tīra kua mutu te whakahau, i a rātau e māharahara ana ka tino iti rawa te hua o te hoko ohorere," tana kī. Tērā pea ka heke te take utu kaipuke i roto i ngā marama e toru ki te ono e whai ake nei, engari tērā pea ka noho teitei tonu te tono ā-ao mō ngā marama e ono ki te iwa e whai ake nei, ka matapaetia e Tēnā Francis. I whakamāramatia e Tēnā Berry kāore e taea e ngā kaihanga iti te whakaputu, te whakamahere rānei i ngā mahi i mua, kāore i te rite ki ngā kamupene nui ake, nā reira me mātua mōhio rātou ka noho ngā rauemi ki ngā kaihokohoko ina hiahiatia e rātou. "Me mōhio ngā kiritaki kei te takaware ngā kaupapa, ā, ka rerekē pea ngā utu i ngā marama ki mua nā tēnei pēhanga," tana kī. I kī te kaiwhakarato rauemi hanga, a Travis Perkins: "I ngā wā i kite ai mātou i ētahi whakamātautau i puta mai i te tono ā-ao mō ngā rauemi taketake, i ngā pēhanga utunga rānei, ka mahi ngātahi tonu mātou me ā mātou kaiwhakarato me ō mātou hoa ki te whakarite i te wāteatanga o ngā kararehe hauora mō ā mātou kiritaki." Engari me te nui ake o ngā utu rauemi mō tēnei wā, he maha ngā kaipupuri kāinga me ngā kaihanga e kōwhiri ana ki te whakaroa i te mahi kia nui ake te utu o ngā rauemi e hiahiatia ana.

title: Ko te ratonga tūmatanui kūpapa tōrangapū 'i roto i te mōrearea', e whakatūpato ana i a Labour
summary: Kua whakahē a Labour i ngā mahere kia nui ake te kōrero a ngā minita i roto i ngā wāhui ratonga tūmatanui o runga, e whakapae ana i te kāwanatanga ki te whakararuraru i te tōkeketanga o te ratonga tūmatanui ki te "mōrearea".
text: I whakapaea e te Ariki Hunt o Kingi Heath te Tari Kāpata o te "whakaweti" i te tinana e whakahaere ana i ngā wāhui Whitehall. Kua kī te Komihana Ratonga Tūmatanui me waiho te tono ki ngā mahi matua ki tētahi pae tīpakonga takitahi. Engari kāore anō ngā minita kia whakahaere i tētahi ture hou hei whakahaere i te kōmihana. I te wā pātai i te Whare o Ariki, ka kī a Ariki Hunt, te kaiārahi tuarua o ngā hoa Mahi, ko te Minita Tari Kāpata o Wīwī Maude "i te nuinga o te whakaweti i te Komihana Ratonga Tūmatanui me te whakawehi i ngā ture hou kia taea ai e ngā hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga te mana ki te whakatū i ngā hēkeretari pūmau". Ko te hēkeretari pūmau te tino mana i roto i te tari kāwanatanga. I pātai atu a ia ki te kaikorero o te Tari Kāpata, a Ariki Wallace o Saltaire: "He aha te kāwanatanga e haere ana i taua ara? Kaore koe e whakaae kei te mōrearea koe i te whakatūtū tōrangapū o te ratonga tūmatanui?" I whakamāramatia e Te Ariki Wallace kua whai mana kē te pirimia ki te whakahē i te kōwhiringa hēkeretari pūmau a te pae takitahi. I taea e ētahi atu minita te whakamahi i te "whakaawetanga nui" i runga i te tukanga wāhui i raro i ngā ture o nāianei, ka tāpiritia e ia. 'He painga nui' "Ko te pātahitanga i waenganui i te minita me tana hēkeretari pūmau, he mārama tonu te kī ki te mahi tika a te kāwanatanga," tana kī, e whakaahua ana i te whakahē i ngā mahere hei "tino nui ki runga". I miramiratia e ia te tautoko mo te nekehanga mai i te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga o Mua o Jack Straw, nāna i kōrero ki te Whare o Ngātahi kāore ia i herea ki ngā whakapae pūmau i tana tohe kia kōwhiria e ia ana hēkeretari pūmau mai i tētahi rārangi poto. I kī a Ariki Jenkin o Roding, tētahi hēkeretari mahi Conservative o mua, kua hipa katoatia e ia te tukanga wāhui i te tōmua o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ā, i tāutatia tana ake kōwhiringa o te upoko tari. "He tino nui te whakauru a te minita ki tēnei," tana kōrero. Engari i tohe te takawaenga matua o mua o Ariki Wright o Richmond ki te kāwanatanga kia kaua e "tukitukia ngā tūtohutanga o te pūrongo o Northcote-Trevelyan o te tau 1853 mō tētahi ratonga tūmatanui pūmau, e whakaaro ana ahau, kua nui te painga o tēnei whenua me ngā minita mai i taua wā". I kī tētahi Komihana Ratonga Tūmatanui o mua, ko te hoa whakawhitiwhiti o Wheua Prashar, i "āwangawanga" a ia i ngā tono a Tēnā Maude, i te mea "ko te whakahaere o nāianei e pupuri ana i te ratonga tūmatanui i runga i te whakawhirinaki mō te whakahaeretanga panuku". "Kaua tētahi mea e mahia kia tūkino ai i tōna tōkeketanga," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Ariki Wallace kua whakamāramatia e te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, e mau ana ia ki ngā tikanga o Northcote-Trevelyan. Engari i tāpiri mai te hoa: "Me whakahōu tētahi ki tētahi wā."

title: Ka 'ako ngā chimp i ngā ngunguru paetata' ki te kōrero ki ngā hoa noho hou
summary: Ka taea e ngā chimpanzees te huri i o rātau ngunguru kia pai ake ai te whakawhiti kōrero ki ngā hoa hou, e ai ki tētahi akoranga o ngā rōpū e rua i noho tahi i Etinitini.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Honatana WebbScience, BBC News I te tau 2010, e iwa ngā taenga hou mai i tētahi pāka safari Tatimana i whakamahi i tētahi karanga manawawera, tiketike mō ngā āporo - i te wā i whakamahia e te tangata whenua he ngunguru kāore i te hiahiatia. Tae noa ki te tau 2013, kua whakawhiti nga chimpanzee Tatimana ki tētahi ngunguru iti ōrite, ahakoa te hiahia kore ki te āporo. Koinei te whakaaturanga tuatahi o te ako anō a ngā chimpanzee i aua "waea tohutoro". Ko ngā kitenga, i pūrongotia i roto i te tuhitaka Koiora o Nāianei, e huatau ana ina tohutoro ngā ngunguru ki ngā ahanoa, ka taea e rātou te mahi i runga i te āhua ōrite ki ngā kupu tangata - kaua e whakahaeretia noa iho e te āhua o te āhua o te āhua o te ahanoa. He pono, ko tō tātau kaha ki te ako i ngā "kupu" hou mai i o tātau hoa, tērā pea ka hoki mai ki tētahi tīpuna tiritiri ki ngā chimpanzees, e ono miriona tau ki mua. Ko Dr Katie Slocombe, te kaituhi matua o te pepa, he kaiako hinengaro i te Whare Wānanga o York. "Ko tētahi huarahi tino kaha ki te whakamātau me te mārama ki te āhua o te reo ko te titiro ki ngā pūnaha whakawhitiwhiti o ngā kararehe e pātata ana ki a tātau," tana kī atu ki te Pūtaiao i roto i te Hohenga. "He aha te momo pūkenga whakawhitiwhiti kōrero taketake i roto i taua tīpuna noa iho? He aha hoki te mea ahurei i roto i te tangata, ā, kua tipu mai i taua wā?" He pai me ngā kino i roto i a rātau mahi me ngā chimpanzees whakarau, kua kite kē te tīma a Dr Slocombe ka taea e ngā ngunguru rerekē te tohutoro ki ngā kai tauwhāiti - hei tauira, ngā āporo me te parāoa. Ka urupare ētahi atu chimpanzee ki aua waea mā te kimi i ngā kai e hāngai ana. Engari i tino ōrite aua ngunguru ki te uara ā-hinengaro o te kai. "I mua i ngā wā katoa i whakaarohia ahakoa kei ngā chimpanzee me ētahi atu makimaki ēnei karanga tohutoro... ko te hanganga o aua waea he pānui i te ngākau," te whakamārama a Dr Slocombe. Hei whakamatautau i tēnei ariā, i whai painga a ia me tana tīma i te āhuatanga ahurei i Edinburgh Zoo, i reira e iwa ngā chimpanzee mai i te Beekse Bergen Safari Park o Hōrana i nekehia ki roto me tētahi rōpū tīariari e iwa pakeke i te tau 2010. Ko te mea nui, i kitea e rātau he "kupu" i tino rerekē i waenganui i ngā rōpū e rua. Kāore ngā chimpanzee o Etinitini i tino pai ki ngā āporo, ā, ka whakamahia e ia he ngunguru pāpaku hei kōrero ki a rātou; ko ngā tauhou o Tatimana, i tērā taha, "i tino aroha ki ngā āporo, ā, he nui ake ngā karanga". Kotahi tau i muri mai i te tau 2011, he iti noa iho te huringa i whakaaturia e te aroturuki a nga kaipūtaiao. I whakamahia e ngā rōpū e rua ngā waea tawhito ōrite - engari i te āta titiro ki tō rātou whanonga pāpori, i kitea hoki kāore rātau i te tino pai. "Kāore rātau i te whakapau wā kounga nui, ā, kāore i nui ngā whakahoahoatanga," te kī a Dr Slocombe. "Nā reira kāore rātau i whai whakahau ki te huri i to rātau karangatanga." Heoi anō, i te tau 2013, kua rongonui nga rōpū. Tērā ngā whakahoahoa pūmau o Pākehā-Tatimana, ā, kotahi tonu te rōpū nui o te 18 i hangaia e nga chimpanze. Tae atu ki taua hononga pāpori, tērā tētahi huringa whakamīharo i roto i tētahi āhuatanga matua o ta rātau whakawhitiwhitinga: "Kua whāngaia e ngā chimpanzee Tatimana te karanga āporo o Etinitini." He aha atu anō, i pā mai tēnei me te kore neke o ngā manakohanga. He nui ake te āhua o ngā kararehe Tatimana ki ngā āporo i o rātau hoa i whakatipuria e Etinitini. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i kite ai ngā kaipūtaiao i tēnei momo ngāwari ake i roto i tētahi "waea tohutoro". Nako Kotimana? Ko te take o te huringa, e whakaae ana a Dr Slocombe, he uaua ki te pine tika. Tērā pea i whakarerekētia e ngā chimp Tatimana to rātau ngunguru kia pai ake ai te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero - pēnei i te ako i tētahi kupu hou. Tērā rānei i whakaritea e rātou mō ngā take pāpori: "Mēnā ka anga koe ki te tāwhai i te nako o tētahi tangata, ka pai ake rātou ki a koe, ā, he pai ake ki a koe. Nā reira tērā pea he mea ōrite ki tērā, e kitea ana e tātau i roto i ngā chimpanzee." Ahakoa ko te huringa i roto i te kupu, te nako, te iti rānei o ngā mea e rua, te āhua nei he tauira ātaahua o te ako reo. "Koinei te whakaaturanga tuatahi tērā pea e hua ana, he āheinga tawhito kē atu, tērā pea i a tātau tīpuna pūnoa whakamutunga," te kī a Dr Slocombe. I kī atu a Prof Klaus Zuberbühler, he tohunga ki te kunenga reo i te Whare Wānanga o Neuchatel i Huiterangi, ki a BBC News he "tino whakamere" ngā kitenga. I kī a ia kua whakaaturia e ētahi atu mātauranga he ōrite te "ūngututanga mataoro" i roto i ngā mātāmua, engari ko ngā tauira o mua he turituri pāpori katoa - ahakoa he tawhiti, he waea hoapā rānei - kāore e pā ana ki ētahi ahanoa. I tāpiritia e Prof Zuberbühler he uaua ki te whakahaere ētahi whakamāramatanga whirinoa mō te huringa. "E mārama ana, he maha ngā mea e pā ana i roto i te toru tau i te wā e whakakotahitia ana ēnei kararehe hou," tana kī. Hei tauira, tērā pea i tino māharahara ngā taenga hou i te wā whāngai, ā, ka āta māhorahora ake i tō rātou kāinga hou. "Koia tērā te mea ki ngā akoranga mātakitaki i te nuinga o te wā - i te nuinga o te wā he maha ētahi atu mea e puta ana e kore e taea e koe te whakahaere tika. " Ki a au, ko te take matua i mahia e rātau ēnei tātaritanga whatunga pāpori, e whakaatu ana ko te nui ake o te tauwhiti a ngā chimpanze, ka ōrite ake a rātau waea." Whāia a Honatana i Twitter

title: Te mūmū o te meneti mō ngā tūpāpaku whakaeke wehi o London Bridge
summary: Kua whakahonoretia te mūmū o te meneti, ā, he karakia hāhi i puritia hei whakamaharatanga ki te hunga i patua i roto i te whakaekenga wehi o te Arawhiti o Rāwāhi, kotahi tau tonu ki mua.
text: E waru i mate, a, e 48 i whara e ngā tāngata tokotoru i taraiwa ki ngā kaiwaewae, kātahi ka okaina ngā tāngata i Borough Market. I tahuna e o rātau hoa aroha he kānara i te ratonga o te Whare Karakia o Southwark, i haere mai ai te pirimia me ngā mema o ngā ratonga ohorere. I whakatōngia he rākau oriwa mā te wairākau mai i ngā takoha putiputi. I te whare karakia, ka pānuitia e Dean of Southwark, te Very Reverend Andrew Nunn, ngā ingoa o te hunga i patua i te whakaekenga. I whakamihi a ia ki te "whakatapunga" o nga ratonga ohorere, a, ka inoi mo to rātau "haumarutanga me te parenga tonu". "He kaha ake te aroha i te mauahara, he kaha ake te mārama i te pouri, he kaha ake te ora i te mate," tana kī. I kī te kaiwhakahaere ko te rākau oriwa, i whakatōkia ki te taunga o te whare karakia, he whakamaumahara ki te hiranga o ngā hapori e huihui ana ki te tū ki te tutu. I kī atu a Theo Ancient, he kaitapere, he tangata whenua i ora i te whakaekenga: "I te tekau i te ahiahi, ka taka te pouri i te huarahi tino kino. " I roto i ngā meneti ruarua, ka huri ngā mea katoa, ahakoa he haora i mua i te mōhiotanga ki te utu pono." I kī a Adele Morris, tētahi kaikaunihera paetata: "Kāore he mea i hiahiatia e nga kaiwhakataetae engari ko te mate i tēnei wāhi. Engari, nā rātou mātou i whakaaro me te kōrero i runga i ngā huarahi e tino ora ana." I pānuitia e te Koromatua o Rānōna, o Te Waiata 77 i te ratonga, i haere mai hoki te kaiārahi Mahi, a Jeremy Corbyn. Kātahi ka haere tētahi hāereere ki Southwark Needle, i te pito tonga o London Bridge, i reira ka whakatakotoria e ngā whanaunga he putiputi, ā, ka tū te wahangū o te meneti. I kī atu a Pita John OBE, te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera o Southwark, ki te huihuinga: "I tērā Pipiri i pā ki a mātau tētahi o ngā rā pōuri rawa i roto i te hītori o to mātau rohe. " I tēnei rā ka huihui tātau ki te whakaatu he kaha, he kotahi tātau i mua i te kino." Ā muri ake, ka whakaatahia ngā kupu #LondonUnited ki runga i te piriti, ā, ka wātea tētahi pukapuka mamati tūmanako i te Whare Karakia o Southwark puta noa i te mutunga wiki kia hainatia e te iwi whānui. I kī a Mustafa Field, ko te tumuaki o te Wānanga Whakapono Mō Rānana: "I ohorere katoa mātau i te whakaekenga nui. " He mea nui kia huihui tātau hei hapori me te whawhai i te mauahara me te tautohetohe mā te aroha." I mua i te whakamaharatanga, ka whakahē te Pirimia o Ēnā Me i te whakaekenga hei "whakamātau tāwiri ki te tuki i te ngākau o o tātau wāteatanga". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore anō kia kaha ake to mātau whakatau kia tū mārō me te rongoā tahi i tēnei tuma." I te tirohanga a Alex Regan, e mau ana i tētahi kakara rengarenga, ka mātakitaki a Lucy Fisher i ngā rau tāngata e tomo ana ki te Whare Karakia o Southwark, he mita te mamao atu i te wāhi i tangohia ai te ora o tōna whanaunga. Ko Hemi McMullan, e 32, tētahi o ngā tāngata tokowaru i mate i te 3 o Hune. "He wā wehi tērā," tana kī. E pātata ana, he mārire te Mākete Borough - i te nuinga o te wā e taumaha ana i ngā tūruhi. "It's my favourite market and I'm used to the hustle and bustle of it," says Robyn Hayes, while watching people going into the service. "He tino whakamataku te rongo i te mārire, me ngā pere o te whare karakia i runga i tērā." I te haerenga o nga manuhiri e 700 mai i te Whare Karakia o Southwark ki tērā taha o te Arawhiti o Rāwāhi, ka hinga tonu te huihuinga. Ina mātakina te wahangū o te meneti, ko te haruru anake ko te tangi o ngā tereina e tae mai ana, e wehe ana i te teihana. I muri i te whakatakotoranga putiputi a ngā whānau o ngā tūpāpaku ki Southwark Needle, ka ngaro te huihuinga, ā, ka hoki ngā kaimātakitaki ki o rātau oranga ia rā. I mua o te Rātapu, ka whakaūngia e te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Stuad Javid ko ngā ratonga haumarutanga kia whiwhi i ngā āpiha tāpiri e 2,000 hei wāhanga o tētahi rautaki hei whakarewa i ngā mahi tautohetohe a te UK. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Whakaaturanga a Andrew Marr o TE WĀ, ka kī taurangi a Tēnā Javid kia tino mōhio kei te UK ngā rauemi katoa e hiahiatia ana "hei whawhai i te tuma wehi". I kī a ia ko te tuma "i runga i tōku hinengaro" me "tētahi mea e whakaaro ana ahau i ia rā". I tua atu i te whakarewa i ngā āpiha ratonga haumarutanga, i tonoa tuatahitia i te tau 2015, ka kī a Tēnā Javid ka puta he huringa ki te whakamahinga o te mōhiohio. "Ka tiritiri a MI5 i ētahi atu mōhiohio ki ētahi atu whakahaere," tana kī. "Ehara i te mea ko te ātete pūtōraru anake, engari ko te pirihimana paetata me te kāwanatanga paetata. " Mā tēnei e tino mōhio ai he nui ake te wā ki te kimi i ngā pūhāhā me te whakararuraru i ngā mahi i mua."

title: Ngā takaware BA - he aha aku mana ki te utu?
summary: E anga ana a BA ki te utu i ngā miriona pauna hei utu i muri i te rahunga o ana pūnaha rorohiko i puta ai ngā takaware roa me ngā whakakorenga i te mutunga wiki.
text: Na Bill WilsonBusiness reporter, kei te anga atu ngā Pāhihi Rongokōrero o TE AO ki tētahi rā tuatoru o te raruraru i te wā e pā ana te waka rererangi ki te pānga o tētahi tūtukitanga IT puta noa i te ao. He ture EU e whakahaere ana i te utu mo nga rerenga kua whakakorea e wehe atu ana i nga taunga rererangi EU. Ko te nui o te moni e whakahokia ana kei te āhua tonu o te roanga o te takaware, ahakoa he rerenga poto, waenganui, tawhiti rānei. I kī tētahi kaikōrero BA: "Kua hoatu reta mātou ki ngā kiritaki e kī ana ki a rātou me pēhea te tono i raro i ngā ture utu EU, ā, ka tino whakahonoretia e mātou ā mātou herenga." Neke atu i te £500 pea te utu o te kōti, i runga anō i te tawhiti o te rererangi. Engari ehara te utu i te aunoa - me tuhi e ngā kiritaki he reta amuamu ki te waka rererangi. Ko ētahi waka rererangi, me te tinana kiritaki Ko tēhea? whakarato reta tono utu paerewa hei whakaoti i ngā pāhihi. Ko ngā ture utu EU mō ngā rerenga takaware, kua whakakorea rānei Kāore ngā ture EU e pā ana mēnā i takea mai te raruraru e ngā take i waho o te mana o te waka rererangi, pēnei i te tuki. I te tau 2014, e rua ngā whakawā a te Kōti Matua o UK i kī me utu ngā waka rererangi ina takawaretia e tētahi hapa hangarau, ā, te āhua nei i pā mai i tēnei tauira ki a BA. Ka tāpiri mai te tohunga rererangi o Julian Bray: "Me maumahara hoki mēnā i utua e koe tō utu mā tētahi kāri nama, kātahi ka tākaro te Ture Nama Kaihoko, ā, ka taea e koe te whakahoki moni pērā." Ināianei, e kī ana a BA kei te tutuki i ōna here ki te whakarato i ngā wāhi hōtēra me ngā paramanawa mō ngā kiritaki kua whakararurarutia ō rātou haerenga. "Kei te whakahoki moni, kei te tāpui anō rānei mātou i ngā kiritaki i pāngia ngā whakakorenga ki ngā ratonga hōu i runga i te tere e taea ana, ā, kua whakaurua hoki ngā kaupapahere tāpui anō ngāwari ake mō ngā tāngata katoa e haere ana i te Hātarei, Rātapu, i tēnei rā [Mane] me te Tūrei kua kore e hiahia ki te rere mai i Heathrow, i Gatwick rānei," ka tāpiri mai rātou. "Ka taea e ngā kiritaki i runga i ngā rerenga kua whakakorea te tono whakahoki moni katoa, te tāpui anō rānei ki tētahi rā ā muri ake mō te haere tae noa ki te mutunga o Whiringa 2017. "Me whakapā hāngai mai ngā kiritaki ki a mātou mā tā mātou utauta Whakahaere Taku Tāpuitanga i ba.com, i ā mātou pokapū hoapā rānei kia taea ai e mātou te tāpui anō, te ararere anō rānei ki tō rātou ūnga i runga i te tere e taea ana." I tāpiri mai rātau: "Kua tonoa ngā pāhihi kua whakararurarutia ō rātou haerenga kia pupuri i ngā rīhīti kai, waka, nohoanga rānei, ā, ka taea te kerēme i te wā e tika ana mā ā mātou tīma pānga kiritaki." E kī ana te umanga kua tāpui pāhihi ki ētahi atu waka rererangi ki te hiahiatia. Ka taea e ngā kiritaki i rewa i ngā whakakorenga rererangi te tono tae atu ki te £200 i ia rā mō tētahi rūma (i runga anō i ngā tāngata tokorua e tiritiri ana), £50 mō te waka i waenganui i te hōtēra me te taunga rererangi, me te £25 i ia rā mō ia pakeke mō ngā kai me ngā paramanawa. I kī te tohunga kiritaki o Franky Brehany ka taea pea e ngā kaihaere e mau ana i tētahi "taone uara tiketike" pēnei i Rānana te tono i ētahi atu mea, ā, me pupuri i ngā rīhīti katoa.

title: He nui ake ngā ākonga e tono ana ki te ako rongoā
summary: E 23,710 ngā ākonga kua tono ki te ako rongoā i ngā whare wānanga o UK a tērā o Mahuru.
text: Ko ngā whika hōu mai i te ratonga whakauru Ucas e whakaatu ana i te 6% te pikinga o te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e tono ana mō tētahi tohu rongoā, i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Ko te rā kati mō ngā taupānga hei tīmata i te rongoā, tae atu ki ngā akoranga pūtaiao niho me te pūtaiao kararehe, a tērā ngahuru, ko te 15 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Koinei hoki te rā kati mō ngā ākonga ki te tono ki Oxford me Cambridge. E whakaatu ana ngā whika Ucas e 18,500 ngā kaitono mai i ngā whenua e whā o te UK - tae atu ki te 5% i tērā tau. Ko ngā taupānga mai i ngā ākonga EU mō ngā waeine rongoā kua piki ake i te 1% ki te 1,680, ā, kua piki ake ngā taupānga mai i ngā ākonga i waho o te EU i te 10% ki te 3,530. Tērā te whakawhānuitanga o te maha o ngā wāhi kura tākuta e wātea ana i ngā whare wānanga Ingarihi mō te toru o nga tau i roto i te haupae, te kī a Ucas. Ko te nuinga o te wā, e 68,680 ngā ākonga kua tono mō ngā akoranga waeine katoa me tētahi rā kati 15 o Whiringa ā-rangi, tae atu ki te 4% i tērā tau, kua tāpiritia te ratonga whakauru. I kī te kaiwhakahaere matua o Ucas, a Clare Marchant: "E whakaaweawe ana ahau i te maha o ngā ākonga kua rite ki te whakatūpato i te whakamātautau kei a rātou te mātauranga, ngā pūkenga, me te kaha ki te angitu i ēnei akoranga whakataetae tonu. " It's encouraging to see so many students aim high with their applications."

title: I rahua te pēpi me ngā tohu ngau i Aotearoa
summary: Ko te tikanga kia nui ake te mahi hei pare i tētahi pēpi whā marama te pakeke i pāngia e ia he waewae whati me ngā toto roro maha, kua kitea he pūrongo.
text: I whakawāteatia tōna whaea me tōna hoa ki ngā hara nui e pā ana ki te tamaiti. He whara kanohi anō tō te pēpi, he tohu ngau, me ngā toto retina i ngā whatu e rua. I noho a ia me ōna tuakana tokotoru hei kaupapa o tētahi arotakenga take nui e te Poari Tiaki Tamariki o Leicester. I kitea e noho ana ngā tamariki "i roto i ngā āhuatanga pōrearea", e pūrongo ana te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. I kī te arotakenga, e karanga ana i te pēpi o Nadiya me ōna tuakana ko Adrian, Jana me Mohini: "He raruraru me ngā whara ki a Nadiya kia pai ai te tiaki i ngā tamariki tokowhā, ahakoa ngā mōrea e mōhiotia ana ki ngā tamariki nā te kore whakahaere, ngā rongoā me te whakamahi waipiro... me te whanonga e tohu ana kāore tētahi matua i whakatakoto i ngā hiahia o a rātau tamariki hei manakē." Kāore tonu i te mārama he pēhea te take o ngā whara o Nadiya, engari i kī a Hēni Myers, mai i te Poari Tamariki Tiaki o Te Poari Tamariki, he tamariki rawa a ia ki te tūkino i a ia anō. I kī te rīpoata i whiua te whaea o Nadiya, kātahi ka whiua te hoa ki nga tau maha e pupuri ana. Ko ngā kitenga i tino whakaora ai a Nadiya, ā, ka noho atu nga tamariki i o rātau whaea me o rātau matua. The review made nine recommendations including implementing a review process when children have been subject to child protection plans for more than two years. I kī a Ms Myers "kua whakaae ngā kaupapa e pā ana kia tere ake te mahi". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mai i ēnei mahi, kua whakapai ake mātou i ā mātou kaupapahere, hātepe me ngā tukanga whakawhitiwhiti." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ngā kaiheke o Tiamana: Ka tūhura ngā pirihimana i ngā whakaekenga ki ngā kaiheke
summary: E uiui ana nga pirihimana Tiamana i ngā whakaekenga motuhake e rua ki ngā kaiheke, ā, he tokomaha i whara i te āhua o Saxony-Anhalt i tēnei mutunga wiki.
text: Tokorua nga taitamariki Pūkeirangi i whakaekea e nga tāngata tokorua i te ahiahi o te Hātarei i Hasselfelde, ka kī nga pūrongo. I te pō Paraire, tokorima nga Tiamana haurangi i whakaekea e toru nga Hūmārie i to rātau hokinga ki te kāinga i Halberstadt, ka whakaūngia e pirihimana. Ka puta mai nga whakaekenga ā-iwi i te nui o nga renarena ā iwi i runga i te take o nga kaiheke me te hara. Neke atu i te kotahi miriona ngā kaiheke kua tae mai ki Tiamana hei wāhanga o te kaupapa here tuwhera a Tumuaki o Hēnea Tūturu i te oho o te mate kaiheke o Uropi i te tau 2015. I te takanga o te Hātarei, tokowhā nga taitamariki o Hūnihi i te tapa o tētahi papa tākaro i te wā i tūkinotia ā-waha rātau e ngā tāngata tē mōhiotia e rua, e whakapono ana kei waenganui i te 25 me te 30 tau. Ka huri taikaha te tautohetohe, a, tokorua nga pakeke 17 tau i whara. Ko tētahi wahine i whakamātau ki te uru atu, i panaia ki tētahi motokā e nga kaihōia, engari kāore i whara, ka kī pirihimana. I te takanga o te Paraire, e 30km (19 km) te mamao, ka whara ā-tinana katoa ngā kaiheke tokotoru i muri i te tūkinotanga ā-waha. He tangata 22 tau te pakeke mai i te rōpū e rima ngā kaihōia whakapae, i waenganui i te 22 me te 40, i pā hoki ki ngā whara iti, ka whakaūngia e pirihimana. E kī ana ngā pirihimana kei te uiui rātau mō ngā whakapae whakatoi me te whakaekenga i ngā take e rua, engari kāore anō kia hopukina.

title: Tata ki te 200 ngā huarahi i ūkuia i te wā e waiho ana e te Āwhā Hector he ara otaota
summary: Na te āwhā o Hector i whakaheke ngā rākau, ngā peka me ngā aho hiko puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki i te pō, e 300 ngā waea ki nga mana huarahi.
text: Kua whakawāteatia ngā otaota mai i ngā huarahi e 200, engari tae atu ki te 20 ka kati tonu i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā kaimahi o te Tari Hanganga me ngā kaikirimana i te whakapai. I tae te hau i Belfast ki te 60mph, engari kua tautuhia te hau kia whakangāwari i te ahiahi. I kī a Met Éireann "ngā hau taumaha, whakakino hoki" i pā ki ngā rohe takutai o te Whenua o Aiarangi i mua i te neke ki te hauauru. I runga i nga huarahi, na te āwhā i raruraru ai te haere i ngā taone me ngā tāone puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki: I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Tari Hanganga (DfI) neke atu i te 150 ngā kaimahi kua uru ki te mahi ki te whakawātea i ngā huarahi kua āraia. "Kei te mahi tahi hoki te tari me ngā kaiwhakarato taputapu ki te whakawātea i ngā rākau kua taka ki ngā raina hiko BT, NIE rānei," ka tāpiritia e rātau. "E wātea ana ngā mōhiohio huarahi hōu rawa i www.trafficwatchni.com." 'Ka haere tonu te whakatūpato huarere ki te ahiahi' Nā Angie Philips Storm Hector, he iti rawa mō te wā o te tau, kua neke atu i te raki o Ingarangi me Aiarangi, ā, ka puta mai ētahi hau hau tino ora. Ahakoa ki te tuawhenua, kua tae whānui te hau ki te 40-50mph, engari ko te nuinga o ngā hau kaha rawa atu ki te raki me te hauauru, ā, ko ngā wāhi mārakerake o te tai rāwhiti me te taumata o te hau i te ata o te Rāite. Ko te hau teitei rawa i tuhia ko te 74mph i Orlock Head, North Down i te 08:00 BST, whai muri i te 69mph i Ballypatrick Forest, North Antrim, i te 06:00 BST. I hipa te whakatūpato amipere 'kia whakarite' i te 09:00 BST, engari kei te noho tonu tētahi whakatūpato kōwhai 'kia mōhio' ki te ahiahi. He nui kē ngā otaota, he maha ngā rākau kua hinga, ā, tērā tonu pea ka raruraru te āwhā, te kaha rānei o te āwhā. Ka āta mārire te hau puta noa i te rā, engari ka pupuhi tonu i ngā takikupu kanapa me ngā ua. Na te āwhā hoki i puta ai te motu hiko whānui, ko ngā wāhi tino pāngia ko Craigavon, Newry, Omagh me Campsey. I kī a NIE mō te 26,000 ngā kāinga me ngā umanga kua whakaoratia ā rātou hiko i te 20:00 BST i te Tāite. E kī ana "he iti noa iho ngā kāinga me ngā umanga" i noho kore hiko, engari me whakaora anō ā rātou putunga i te pō o te Rāite. E kī ana ko ngā hau me ngā tere teitei rawa i tuhia i Hāpua mai i te tau 1962 kua tuki ki Aiarangi ki te Raki. I kī a Edel Creery, te upoko o ngā whakawhitiwhitinga i NIE Networks me whakapā atu ngā kiritaki ki te kamupene mēnā ka whakararurarutia tō rātou hiko i te 03457 643 643. "E whakamanamana ana mātou mo te manawanui o ngā kiritaki katoa i ngaro te hiko nā te Āwhā Hector," te kī a Tēnā Creery. "Na te kaha me te kaha o te āwhā, i tino tūkino ai te whatunga hiko, ā, ka mahue i a mātau e tata ana ki te 600 ngā hē, he roa te wā me te kaha ki te tapi." Ko Hector te tuawaru o nga tupuhi o te 2017-2018, i muri mai i a Aileen i te marama o Mahuru, i a Brian i Oketopa, i a Caroline me Dylan i te Hakihea me Eleanor, Fionn me Georgina i te Hanuere.

title: Ko nga kamupene o Pirihitini 'hapa i te tinihanga' mo nga kawenga ake
summary: Kotahi anake i roto i te toru o ngā kamupene iti, waenga hoki o Pākehā e kaweake ana, ā, he torutoru noa iho ētahi atu e whai mahere ana ki te huri i tērā, kua kitea he poipoi.
text: I kī te tuarima o ngā kamupene i tirohia e te Pēke o Pākehā ko ngā ārai reo i waenganui i ngā taunahua nui rawa ki te kaweake. Ko te raruraru o mua tata nei i te pungarehu puia e kitea ana he take anō mo te kore e whakaaro ki te kimi mākete ki rāwāhi. I kī tētahi o ngā kaiwhakahaere o te pēke i aua kamupene e "ngaro ana i tētahi tinihanga". I kī ngā mākete o rāwāhi o Donald Kerr: "Ahakoa kua kitea pea te kaweake he pai anake ki ngā kamupene i roto i ngā umanga pēnei i te whakanaotanga, ka whai wāhi ngā kamupene e mahi ana i ētahi atu wāhanga ki te tūhura i ngā mākete hōu me te aromatawai i te tono aowhānui mō ā rātou hua. " I tētahi wā e ngoikore ana te tono, ka whai hua tonu ngā mano o ngā kamupene iti i ngā mākete o rāwāhi. "Ahakoa ka noho tonu ngā mākete tūturu i Uropi me te US hei ūnga matua mō te nuinga o ngā kamupene, tērā tonu te kaha puta noa i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui me Āhia, kāore anō kia kitea." Heoi anō, neke atu i te rua i roto i ngā kamupene e rima i pūrongotia ko te wehi ki te tono te take matua mo te kore e titiro ki ngā mākete ki rāwāhi. Ko taua wāhanga anō i wehi e kore e utua a rātau nama kino, ā, tata tonu ki te tokomaha e wehi ana i ngā tāreretanga moni kē. I kitea e te uiuinga ko te tuatoru o ngā kamupene e kaweake ana, neke atu i te kotahi i roto i te toru kua pā ki te tupu i taua wāhanga o a rātau umanga. He torutoru noa iho rātau i tūmanako kia hinga te tiri kaweake o te umanga. O aua kamupene e kaweake ana i Pākehā, tata ki te hauwhā e tūmanako ana ki te hanga umanga i Haina me te Rāwhiti Tawhiti, ā, tata ki te rima i kite i ngā wāhi i Āwherika me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, i te wā i noho tonu a Uropi me Amerika ki te Raki i ngā mākete rangatira. I tēnei wā, i whakaaturia e tētahi atu tirohanga o ngā ngohe aowhānui o Pākehā kua nui ake i te nuinga o ētahi atu wāhi o te UK ki te kawe mai i te pūtea penapena kē. I haere tonu te tuatoru o ngā kamupene e kōwhiri ana ki te kimi pakihi i Ingarangi, i muri i Rānana me te tonga ki te rāwhiti o Ingarangi. I noho kaha tonu a Rānana, neke atu i te rua hautoru o ngā whakataunga pūtea penapena whakaroto katoa. E 263 ngā kaupapa pūtea penapena whakaroto i roto i te uiuinga, ā, e whitu ngā kaupapa pūtea penapena o Etinitini me Glasgow, ā, e 51 katoa o Pākehā. I whakaaturia e te uiuinga a Ernst & Young te tawhiti o te pūtea penapena whakaroto hei pūtake o ngā mahi hou. Tekau tau ki mua, neke atu i te 60,000 ngā mahi i hangaia i Ingarangi mā te pūtea penapena hāngai kē. Ko te pūtea penapena whakaroto i tērā tau ko te tuarua o ngā tau whai muri me ngā mahi e 20,000 anake e waihangatia ana mā ngā kaupapa hōu, ngā whakawhānuitanga rānei. I haere tonu te UK ki te whakahaere i te pūtea penapena whakaroto i Uropi, e 30% o ngā kaupapa ratonga pakihi, 36% o ngā kaupapa pūmanawa me te 27% o ngā kaupapa wāhanga pūtea i Uropi ki te uru. Nā tōna mana o ngā kaupapa e haere mai ana i ngā kamupene o Amerika. E tohu ana hoki a Amerika neke atu i te rua hautoru o ngā kaupapa e haere mai ana ki UK, whai muri i Wīwī me Tiamana. Ko Īnia te tuawhā o ngā pūtea penapena nui rawa i Ingarangi, e 38 ngā kaupapa. Ko ētahi atu iwi nui o Ūropi i pupuri i ta rātau wāhanga o te pūtea penapena whakaroto, engari i kite a Aiarangi rāua ko Paniora i te hinganga poupou. Waihoki ko nga mema hou ake o te Uniana o Ūropi, pērā i Pōrana, Hakari, Ruānia me te Whenua o Taikarowākia, i kite nei i ngā tipu whakanao e noho ana i te wāhi e iti iho ana te utu. Engari i te hinganga, ka hinga te maha o aua pūtea penapena i tērā tau i te 40% i aua whenua. I kī a Hemi Kati, o Ernst & Young: "Ina kitea i roto i te horopaki o te 12 marama i pāngia ai e te rangatiratanga o Ūropi he hōhonu hōhonu, he pūrākau angitu o te ohaoha te manahau o te UK ki te whiwhi i te FDI."

title: He hara te kaingākau ki te ngana ki te kōwhao i te ekara pakira o Crystal Palace
summary: Kua kitea he hara tētahi kaihautū whutupōro i te ngana ki te kōwhao i te mascot ekara pakira o Crystal Palace i te wā o te kēmu kapu
text: I hopukina te kaitautoko o Charlton Athletic, a Daniel Boylett, 36, o Eltham, i muri i te pakarutanga o te raruraru i te 23 o Mahuru 2015. I kitea he hara a ia i te Kōti Karauna o Croydon mo te tūkino mo te whakaeke i a Kayla. I kitea hoki he hara a ia mo te mate taikaha. I tukua a Boylett i runga i te utu kia whiua i te 28 o Āperira. I te tau 2010, i whāngaia e Crystal Palace, e karangatia ana ko The Eagles, a Kayla hei mascot. Ko wai a Kayla te Ekara? I rongo te kōti i te kaiwhakahaere o Pirihi Belsey e haere ana i te papa o Selhurst Park me te manu i runga i tōna ringa i te kēmu. I kī te rōia a Daniel Higgins "e toru, e whā rānei ngā kaihautū e hamama ana i te tūkino" ki te tokorua i te wā e whakawhirinaki ana tētahi ki runga i te ārai, a, "ka whiua he kōwhao". I kī a ia kāore a Tēnā Belsey i mōhio mehemea kua tau te kōwhao, ā, "kāore i whara", engari "nā tōna hanganga wheua mārire mehemea i patua ia ki te kaha, he ngāwari noa iho te whati o ōna wheua". Tokowhā ētahi atu tāngata i whakawāteatia ki a Boylett mo te raruraru i tūkinotia ai te here porowhita tuatoru o Capital One. I kī a Tēnā Higgins he raruraru "i mua, i te wā, i muri hoki" i te kēmu. Ka pakaru nga kōaro tuatahi i te wā i arahina e nga pirihimana nga kaitautoko o Charlton ki Selhurst Park. I pāngia e tētahi āpiha tētahi ngutu tapahi i muri i tana pānga ki tāna i whakaaro ai he pounamu i te wā i ngana ai ngā kaihautū tauwhāinga ki te whati i te rāhui pirihimana, ka rongo te kōti. I te mutunga o te taurite, i ngaro ai a Charlton i te 4-1, ka oma a Donegan ki nga pirihimana e mau ana i tētahi koeko kōwhai nui, ā, me "hinga ki te tānga rākau". I muri i tana hopunga, ka kī atu a ia ki nga pirihimana i "riri" a ia i te mea "kātahi anō mātau ka whiua. I tangohia e au, a, ka tukuna taku riri ki waho". I tonoa te hūri i mua kia wetekina a Cowcher, Boylett, Kitto me McConville i runga i tētahi atu tatau o te raruraru taikaha nā te iti rawa o ngā whakaaturanga.

title: Belfast Rapid Transit: £20m hei whakapau i runga i ngā pahi hou
summary: Kua whakaūngia e te Minita Waka a Danny Kennedy te £20m ka pau ki ngā pahi hou mō te pūnaha Belfast Rapid Transit (BRT).
text: I kī hoki a ia kua tīmata tika te mahi i runga i te BRT me te hanganga o tētahi pāka mokowā 520 i Dundonald. Ka honoa e te BRT te pokapū o te taone ki te hauauru me te rāwhiti o Belfast me te Titanic Quarter. E tūmanakohia ana kia tino whakahaere i te tau 2017. I kī te minita ka pau te £20m ki ngā "waka tere tere" e 40 ka tukuna i roto i te toru tau. Ko ngā waka he āhua o ngā pahi nui ake ka mahi i runga i ngā ara ia rima ki te waru meneti i ngā wā tihi. I a ia e kōrero ana mō te pāka me te eke hōu, ka kī te minita: "Ka mahi tēnei pānga i te mutunga o te 2014, ā, ka whakaratohia e ngā pahi tīariari tae noa ki te tīmatanga o ngā ratonga Rapid Transit i te tau 2017. " Ka whakarei ake anō i te pāka me te whakahere eke mō ngā kaihaere e haere ana ki Belfast, otirā ko ērā e haere ana mai i Ards Peninsula." E tūmanakohia ana kia tīmata te hanganga i runga i ngā ara tere i te rāwhiti me te uru o Belfast a tērā marama. Ka hangaia ngā tūnga BRT i runga i ngā ara, ā, ka whakaarahia hei whakangāwari i ngā kaiwhakamahi tūruhi, ngā pakeke me ngā mātua whai tūruhi.

title: Ka mate te kaihoahoa o Tom Searle i muri i te pakanga ki te mate pukupuku
summary: Kua mate te kaiwaiata kaihoahoa a Tom Searle, e 28 ona tau, i muri i te pakanga ki te mate pukupuku.
text: I kī tētahi pou a tōna tuakana māhanga ko Rana i te whārangi Facebook o te pēne e toru tau e noho ana a Tom i te mate pukupuku. "I roto i ngā wiki e rua kua hipa ka huri ohorere ki te kino, ā, kātahi anō ka mahue i a ia mātau," ka tuhituhi a ia. "I pau i a ia ngā marama e rua kua hipa ki te whawhai ki ngā mea katoa i a ia ki te rongoā i te mate, ā, te āhua nei kei te neke ngā mea ki te ahunga tika." Ko te pēne konganuku mai i Brighton e purei auau ana i te whakaaturanga Radio 1 Rock me Daniel P Carter. I whakairihia e ia tētahi 'X' ngāwari ki Twitter i muri i tana mōhiotanga ki te matenga o Tom. I whakairihia e rātau ki Instagram i a rātau i runga i te Reo Irirangi 1. "He kaitito waiata whakamīharo a ia, he kaiwaiata hoki," ko te tuhituhi a Rana. Ko ia tōku hoa tino tata, tawhito rawa hoki. He tangata rekareka, mātauranga, reka hoki a ia, ā, ka waiho e ia he wāhi tino nui i roto i o tātau oranga katoa." Ka haere tonu te pēne i ta rātau haereere me tētahi kāniwha matua o UK me Ūropi e tīmata ana i Whiringahora. I Hune, ka whakakorea e rātau ta rātau haerenga matua o Amerika ki te Raki. I whakairihia e rātau tētahi kōrero ki Instagram i taua wā e kī ana nā tētahi "ohorere whānau". "E tūmanako ana mātou ka noho ēnei whakaaturanga hei wāhi mō ngā tāngata katoa i reira ki te whakaatu i ō rātou manaaki ki taku tuakana whakamīharo. Ehara i te mea ngāwari ki a mātau te eke ki runga i te atamira me te tākaro i ia pō me te kore ia, engari he mea me mahi mātou." Engari kāore i te mārama he aha ka tūpono i muri i tērā. "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha ka pā mai ki ngā Kaihoahoa," te pānui a Rana. "I tīmata māua ko Tom ki te tākaro tahi i roto i tētahi pēne i te 13 o māua, ā, ko Architects he kunenga noa iho o te pēne i tīmataria e mātau i taua wā, neke atu i te hawhe o tōku oranga i mua. " Ki te whakatakune kāore a Tom i te ngākau o ngā mea katoa i hangaia e te pēne, he whakaatu i te kore manaaki ki te pūmanawa whakamīharo i a ia." I whakairihia e Dan i runga i te Twitter kua tino whakararuraru, kua pouri hoki a ia. "E kore rawa te pēne e ōrite, ā, kāore he whakakāhoretanga," ka haere tonu a ia. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te haere tonu, he mea nui tēnā ki te kōrero, ā, ka kaha mātou ki te mahi pērā, engari e kore mātou e tuku pūoro ki te kore mātou e whakapono pono he mea whakahīhī a Tom. " Ahakoa ka taea e tātau, kāore rānei, he mea me tūhura e tātau i te wā." Kimihia mātou i Instagram i BBCNewsbeat me te whai i a mātou i Snapchat, rapua bbc_newsbeat

title: Ka whakapuaki a BBC i te motuhake o Doctor Who 3D
summary: Ka taea e ngā kaipāngai te toro atu ki te Tardis i roto i te Ahu-3 i roto i tētahi wāhanga huritau 50 motuhake o Tākuta Who ā muri ake i tēnei tau.
text: I pānuitia te motuhake hei wāhanga o ngā kōmihana whakaari hou a te BBC, ā, ka kite hoki i te hokinga mai o Call The Midwife i te tau 2014. Ka riro hoki i a Atlantis, he whakaari hou e 13 ngā wāhanga, te kāniwha o te pō Hātarei i puritia i mua e Merlin. I kī te pūmana o te whakaari, a Ben Stephenson, e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakarite i te BBC "kia nui ake te Ingarangi i tētahi atu wā". "E pā ana ki te hoatu i te kitenga a Danny Boyle ki a mātau mahi - he huarahi māia, māia, kaituhi e kaweake ana nā tōna Ingarangi ahakoa rā." E whakanui ana a Tākuta Who i tōna huritau 50 i Whiringa ā Rangi, engari ehara i te wā tuatahi i whai wāhi ai ngā kaimātakitaki ki te kite i te Ariki Wā i roto i te Ahu-3. I tohua te huritau 30 o Tākuta Wai i te tau 1993 me tētahi pūrākau Ahu-3, Ngā Ahu i te Wā, i pāohotia hei wāhanga o Ngā Tamariki e Matea ana. I whakaahuatia te mātātoa wāhanga rua i runga i te huinga Albert Square o EastEnders, ā, i whakaaturia ngā whetū o Doctor Who i mua, i tēnei wā, tae atu ki ngā mema o te hopi o TE WĀ. I kī a Hīnī Moffat, te kaituhi matua me te kaiwhakanao o te whakaaturanga, ka kawea mai e te rerenga Ahu-3 hōu rawa tētahi "ahu hou katoa o te mātātoa hei tūhura mā te Tākuta". Ko Atlantis, i tuhia e te kaituhi Misfits me te kaihanga o Merlin, ko Howard Overman, kua namatia hei rangatū "pōkai mahi" hei tīmata i te Ngahuru. E hāngai ana ki te taone ingoa - "he wāhi ngaro, tawhito; he ao pekepeke pūru, o ngā atua makawe nakahi, me ngā whare rangatira tino nui, i kīia i hangaia e ngā roroa". Ka tīmata te rangatū ki te tākaro i Uēra me Moroko i Aperira. Ko ētahi atu kōmihana hou ko Death Comes to Pemberley, he whakaari haora e toru wāhanga, i whakaritea mai i te pukapuka hokohoko tino pai a PD James. I tautuhia e ono tau i muri i te mutunga o te Whakapehapeha me te Whakawāwā, ka whakaaturia e te pukapuka ngā pūāhua tino rongonui o Jane Austen, a Elizabeth Bennet rāua ko Mr Darcy, ā, ka paheko i te "whakaari wā tauhira" me tētahi tānga ngaro taihoa. Ka takiruatia e TE Whā a Dominic West o The Wire me Helena Bonham Carter mō tētahi whakaari 90 meneti, ko Pēnā rāua ko Taylor. Ka whakatangi rātau i ngā whaiāipo ātaahua, pōturi i roto i tētahi pūrākau o to rātau whakaoranga kino o te 1983 o te whakatangi atamira a Noel Coward, Private Lives.

title: Ka tūkinotia e te pahūtanga o te mīhini moni o Bristol ngā toa
summary: Kua ngaro tētahi mīhini moni i roto i te pahūtanga, e tūkino ana i ngā matapihi me ngā toa toa.
text: I pā mai te pahūtanga ATM i te 03:50 GMT i te Huarahi A38 Gloucester i Bristol. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Avon me Ngā Pirihimana kāore he tangata e haere ana, e noho tata ana rānei. Kua katia te Huarahi o Gloucester i waenganui i te Ara Hāhi me Ashley Down. I kī ngā pirihimana ka katia puta noa i te haora ohorere, a, ka tohe i ngā atekōkiri kia karo i taua rohe. I kī tētahi tangata pātata i rūrū te pahūtanga i tōna whare katoa. "I whakaaro ahau kua tau tētahi mea ki runga i taku tuanui," tana kī. "I puta mai ahau ki te whakaaro he tūtukitanga motokā, engari i rongo kē ahau i ētahi tāngata e hamama ana. " Tekau ngā tatau ki raro, nā reira he tino oro, he āhua rūrū ahau."

title: Covid Roa: Kua whakakitea te taupānga whakaora mō ngā tūroro
summary: Kua whakakitea tētahi taupānga hei āwhina i ngā tāngata whai pānga wā roa o te coronavirus ki te aroturuki i ō rātou tohu me te tiki tohutohu.
text: NHS Wales has developed the bilingual app to help people with so-called "long Covid". Ko te Covid roa - kei reira ngā tohu e mau tonu ana mō ngā wiki neke atu i te 12 - ka pā pea ki te kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā tāngata e hopu ana i te coronavirus, e 300,000 rānei ngā tāngata puta noa i te UK. Neke atu i te 100 ngā ataata me ngā hononga ki ngā tohutohu hei āwhina i ngā tūroro. I hangaia e te rōpū romahā NHS Wales mō te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, ka mahi hei kaiako whaiaro ki ngā kaiwhakamahi, ā, e whakapono ana ko ia te tuatahi o tōna momo. E wātea ana ngā tohutohu mai i ngā kaihautū, ngā hinengaro hinengaro, ngā kaitohutohu me ngā kaitohutohu. 'Ehara i te mea anake' I kī te Minita Hauora o Vaughan Gething: "Kei te ako tonu mātou mō te huaketo engari e whakaarohia ana kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā tāngata kua pāngia e te coronavirus ētahi tohu mo te wā roa. " Ko te whakarewatanga o tēnei taupānga, koia te tuatahi o tōna momo, ko te whakaū i aua tāngata he tautoko e wātea ana ki a rātou, ā, ehara rātou i te mea ko rātou anake. "This app is part of a wider national approach which has been put into place to recognize those people who months later are still feeling a range of cardiac, neurological and psychological issues." E wātea ana te taupānga ki te tangata katoa hei tikiake, engari kei te tonoa ngā tohunga hauora kia tūtohu ki ngā tūroro mō te tautoko haere tonu. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Gething: "Kei te tino pai tonu ngā GP ki te tohu i ō rātou tūroro ki te tautoko tika, te mahi whakamātautau ki te kimi i ngā āhuatanga ka taea te rongoā, me te whakapā atu ki ngā tūroro ki ngā kaitohutohu tohunga mēnā e hiahiatia ana. Ko te tikanga o tēnei kei te wātea tonu te tautoko mō tētahi tangata kāore he waea atamai." E wātea ana te taupānga Whakaora Covid hei tikiake mai i ngā pātaka taupānga waea. Kua whakaahuatia e ngā tūroro Covid roa ngā marama o ngā tohu tae atu ki te ngenge, te manawa, ngā raruraru kiri, te ānini me te ngaromanga haere tonu o te kakara, te reka rānei. Sarah Wakefield from Bridgend was still unable to work and struggled with breathing and simple household tasks eight months after catching Covid. I mua he kaiako hākinakina tino pai e āhei ana ki te eke i runga i ngā maunga mō te ono, e whitu haora rānei, ka kī a ia kāore i taea e ia te piki i ngā arawhata i tōna whare. I whakaahuatia e te kaiwaiata opera a Lee David Bowen mai i Trethomas, Caerphilly, tētahi pakanga roa ōrite ki te Covid roa. I pā ki a ia te ngenge haere tonu me te kohu roro, e kī ana: "Ko tētahi mea ngāwari pēnei i te tunu kai ka pākarukaru, he tino whakangoikore. " E ngana ana koe ki te hopu i te kaiwhakahaere, ngā īmēra mai i taku māngai, he aha rānei, ka puta koe i te īmēra kotahi, ā, he tino ngenge, he tino ngenge." He aha te Covid roa? Ko te Covid roa e whakaatu ana i te whānuitanga o ngā tohu rerekē e pāngia ana e ngā tāngata i ngā wiki, i ngā marama rānei i muri i te whakapokenga, ko ētahi o rātou kāore i tino mate i te huaketo tuatahi. Ko te ngenge te raruraru tino pūnoa, engari ko te hā, te mare e kore e ngaro, ngā raruraru rongo me te kitenga, te ānini me te ngaromanga o te kakara me te ngao kua pūrongotia katoatia. E tohu ana te Office for National Statistics kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā tāngata i whakamātauria pai mō Covid-19 i roto i tētahi uiuinga kāinga i whai tohu tonu i te 12 wiki i muri mai - engari he whakamātautau tonu tēnei. I kī a Danny Altman, he ahorangi o te immunology i Imperial College London tērā pea e 300,000 ngā tāngata whai Covid roa i te UK, ahakoa kei ōna wāhanga tōmua te rangahau.

title: E hē ana te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Northamptonshire i te £8m o te moni hauora tūmatanui
summary: A county council "misappropriated" £8m of funds ring-fenced for public health projects, auditors have revealed.
text: Northamptonshire County Council is facing a budget shortfall of £70m and this week was ordered to restrict spending to statutory services.
