A report by auditors KPMG says the council used Public Health England grants to support other council services between 2015 and 2018. Council leader Matt Golby said the accountancy was "not good enough". I kī a ia ko te nuinga o ngā kaimahi e pā ana ki te aroturuki i te pūtea o ngā kaupapa kua kore e mahi mō te kaunihera. KPMG says having found the public health funds "misappropriated", it was now looking to see if other restricted grants had been used wrong. "Kua whakawhānuitia e mātou tā mātou whakamātautau ki runga i ētahi atu rawa taiapa, ā, kua tonoa he whakaaturanga mai i te mana kua piri ngā ture me ngā tikanga katoa mō aua roma pūtea," te kī a te pūrongo. Ka tāpiri mai kua takaware te arotaupū e "ngā pepa mahi matua" kāore i te rite, ā, "he takaware nui i ngā urupare ki ngā uiui arotaupū" me te "urupare kino mai i ngā tangata me ngā tīma". 'Tautuhia ngā mea katoa kia tika' Mā te titiro ki ngā pūtea o te Wāhanga 106, i whakaratoa e ngā kaiwhakawhanake mō te kaupapa i runga i ngā tauine wā pākaha, e kī ana te pūrongo i whakaae te kaunihera o te rohe "i āta kimi moni me ngā wā utu roa", nāna i whakahoki te mōrea o tētahi wero mai i ngā kaiwhakawhanake me te kaha ki te tono ki runga i te toenga. Conservative councillor Mr Golby said he had "massive concerns over the whole finance function of the council". "Me whakatika e mātou ngā mea katoa. Me whiwhi tātau i ētahi mātāpono taketake ngāwari," tana kī. I tukuna te kaunihera o te rohe he pānui 114 tuarua i te Tūrei. I tukuna te mea o mua i te wā o Hui tanguru. Tokorua nga komihana i whakatūria e te kāwanatanga e whakahaere ana i te mana, ā, ko tētahi e karanga ana i ana moni "tino mōrearea".

title: Ratonga whakamātautau: Kia whakakotahitia te whakahaere i te hunga hara
summary: Kei te whakahokia te whakahaeretanga o ngā hunga hara katoa i Ingarangi me Uēra ki te wāhanga tūmatanui i muri i ngā rangatū o ngā hinganga ki te whakawāteatanga o te pūnaha.
text: Ka whakahokia e ia ngā huringa i mahia i te tau 2014 e te Hēkeretari o te Ture, a Pirihi Grayling. I kī te Tari Arotaupū ā-Motu i ngā raruraru o te whakawāteatanga wāhanga, tata ki te £500m te utu o ngā kaiutuutu. Ka aroturukitia ngā hunga hara katoa e te National Probation Service mai i Hakihea 2020. I mua, ko te whakahaere anake i te hunga e whakararuraru ana i te tuma tiketike, me te hunga hara mōrearea iti me te waenga e aroturukitia ana e ngā kamupene whakaora hapori. I kī te kaitirotiro whakamātautau matua o Dame Glenys Stacey i "rekareka" a ia mo te whakataunga nā te mea he "hē rawa te tauira o te whakawāteatanga wāhanga", ā, ka haumaru ake te tangata i raro i tētahi pūnaha i tukuna e te wāhanga tūmatanui. I kī hoki te Tari Arotaupū ā-Motu - te kaitiaki whakapau moni a te Pāremata - kua "hīkoi" ngā tau e hoki ana ki te whare herehere mō te takahi i ā rātou here raihana. I kī atu te Hēkeretari o te Ture a Rawiri Gauke ki te AO i mōhio ia "kāore te pūnaha i te mahi" me te whakawhanaketanga anō te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te whakaiti i te hara anō me te whakaora i ngā tāngata. Engari i kī a ia he tūranga tonu e tākarotia ana e ngā kamupene tūmataiti, tae atu ki ngā aroha. I raro i te pūnaha hōu, ka aroturukitia ngā herehere i tukua me te hunga e mahi ana i ngā whiu hapori e ngā kaimahi o te National Probation Service i ngā rohe hou kotahi tekau mā tahi. Ka whai hoa wāhanga tūmataiti, tūroro rānei ia rohe, e haepapa ana mō ngā aronui mahi kāore i te utua, ngā hōtaka whakamahi rongoā me ngā akoranga whakangungu. Ko te utunga mā ngā hua - kāore e whakamahia tētahi huānga matua o te tauira a Tēnā Grayling. Kāore i te whakahōutia ngā kirimana a ngā kamupene whakaora hapori. I te whakamōhiotanga a Tēnā Grayling i ngā huringa i te tau 2014, ka whakatūpato ngā hoariri ka mōrearea pea te iwi whānui, ā, he tokomaha ngā kaimahi whakamātautau i puta nā te mataku ka kongakonga rawa te pūnaha hōu. I whakapuakina hoki e te komiti tika o te Whare o Ngātahi te "āwangawanga nui" i taua wā, kāore e hiahiatia kia whai kaimahi mātauranga ngaio ngā kamupene e whakahaere ana i ngā hunga hara. 'I pēnei he tangata i reira mōu' I kōrero tētahi herehere o mua e wheako ana i te pūnaha i mua, i muri hoki i ngā whakahōutanga a Tēnā Grayling ki te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā o Te Reo Irirangi 4. "Kua whakamātauria ahau ināianei e rima, e ono marama, ā, e rima ngā wā i kite ai ahau i taku āpiha whakamātautau. Kaore ahau e whakapae i nga kaimahi nā te mea kei te nui noa iho te mahi. Kua nui ake te tuki i ngā ūnga, ā, ka iti ake tō wā ki tō āpiha whakamātautau. "Kei a au te mea, kua tae mai ahau ki tētahi wāhi kua nui ahau, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi i tētahi mea ki tōku oranga. Ā, kāore tētahi o taua tautoko i puta mai i roto i te whakamātautau. "I whakamahia e rātau he tau waea mahi, ā, ka kī rātau, 'mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te waea mai ki a au, mēnā rānei he raruraru ka puta mai, kātahi ka waea atu koe ki ngā āpiha whakamātautau'. Ka waea atu rātou ki a koe ka mea, 'kei te pai ngā mea katoa?', nā te mea kua tiakina e rātou ā mātou tau katoa i roto i taua waea. "I pēnei i tētahi tangata i reira mōu. " I tēnei wā, mēnā e hiahia ana ahau ki te kōrero ki taku āpiha whakamātautau, me waea atu ahau ki tētahi pokapū waea, kātahi ka ngana ki te kimi i taku āpiha whakamātautau, nā reira kua puta ahau i ngā tāngata e rua, tokotoru rānei, mō tētahi īmēra." I kī atu a Tēnā Gauke ki te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā o te Reo Irirangi 4: "Kua tūpono mātou ki ngā uauatanga mō ngā take matatini", tae atu ki tērā "kāore anō ngā kawenga kēhi kia tūmanakohia", me ētahi atu take mōrearea e hiahiatia ana, ā, he iti ake i roto i ngā kāwai mōrearea iti. I kī a ia he "tūranga tino hira" e tākarotia ana e ngā wāhanga tūmataiti me ngā wāhanga tūroro, hei tauira mō te whakaoranga rongoā me te mahi kāore i te utua. Engari ki te whakahaere i te hunga hara, "ka pai ake mēnā he tauira whakakotahi tērā, ā, ka kawea mai e mātou ki raro i te rōpū kotahi", tana kī atu ki te Parakuihi o TE Parakuihi. I tāpiritia e ia "kua hinga te mokatere hara anō i ngā piro e rua mai i te tau 2014". I kī te MoJ i hoahoatia ngā whakahōu i pānuitia i te Rāitema hei hanga i runga i ngā "huānga angitu" o te pūnaha tīariari, nāna i 40,000 ētahi atu hunga hara e whakahaeretia ana i ia tau. Ko te nēra i roto i te kāwhena mō ngā whakahōu matua ka kitea te whakataunga kia whakakotahitia anō te whakahaere i te hunga hara hei whakaurunga a te kāwanatanga kua rahua ngā whakahōu matua a Pirihi Grayling. I haere tonu a ia i te tau 2014 ahakoa he maha ngā whakatūpato mō ngā mōrea nui o te wehe i ngā ratonga whakamātautau i waenganui i ngā kaiwhakarato rerekē me te whakamōhio i tētahi tikanga utu-ā-hua. Na ngā whakakotahitanga whakamātautau me ngā tohunga ture taihara i tohutohu i a ia kia whakatere i te huarahi hou, kia kitea ai ngā raruraru, kia whakatikaina ai ngā raruraru. Engari i haere a Tēnā Grayling ki te huringa tere, ā-nui. I pīrangi a ia kia mau tonu ngā kirimana me ngā kamupene tūmataiti i mua i te pōtitanga nui o te tau 2015 kia kore ai e taea te wete i te pūnaha mēnā he huringa kāwanatanga. Heoi anō, ko te tirohanga i muri i te tirohanga i tohu i ngā raruraru nui, me te nēra i roto i te kāwhena ko te pūrongo a Dame Glenys Stacey i Poutāpeta. I pōhiritia e te uniana whakamātautau a Napo te huarahi hou, e kī ana kia kaua rawa e puta te whakawāteatanga wāhanga. E kī ana ka haere tonu te whakahē i te whakaurutanga o nga whare tūmataiti i roto i nga hōtaka whakaora. A, i kī te hēkeretari tika o te kōruru, a Rārangi Burgon kua "whakahaua ngā Tohutohu kia anga atu ki te pono" kua "pakaru" ta rātau tauira whakamātautau. Engari i a ia e kōrero ana mō ngā kamupene e whā e haepapa ana mō te 17 o ngā kamupene whakaora hapori e 21 i Ingarangi me Weera, i kī a Janine McDowell, o Sodexo Justice Services i UK & Ireland, i pouri a ia i te whakataunga. "Me te whakanui ake i te utu me te mōrea, mā tēnei pūnaha kongakonga kē atu e mōrearea i te wā e puta ana te hunga hara i waenganui i ngā rōpū maha mō ngā wāhanga rerekē o tā rātou rerenga," tana kī.

title: Te Whare Hiko ki te Raki 'ka taea te whakamutu pēnei i te Rōpū Nui'
summary: Ko te Whare Hiko ki te Raki he "ariā kāore anō kia hopu ahi" e ōrite ana ki te aronui "Big Society", kua kī tētahi ahorangi tōrangapū tōmua.
text: I puta te kerēme i muri i tētahi uiuinga i whakaritea e TE AO e rua ngā tuatoru o ngā kaiwhakautu kāore anō kia rongo, kāore rānei i mōhio ki te whare hiko. E ngana ana te kaupapahere Powerhouse ki te Raki ki te whakatika i te wehenga ki te raki/tonga me te kawe mai i te pūtea penapena ki te raki. I kī ētahi umanga kei te āwhina kē te mahere ki te toa i ngā kirimana kaweake. I kī a Ahorangi Jon Tonge, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Liverpool: "He ariā kāore anō kia mau i te ahi. E mōhio ana ahau mehemea ka rite tonu te haere ki te Rōpū Nui. Ko wai e maumahara ana ki tēnā? "Ko te raruraru, he ariā noa iho. E wāhikētia ana hoki e ngā tapahi nui ki ngā kaunihera i te raki. "Ahakoa ko te hunga kua rongo i taua mea, he pōhēhē. Ko te hunga kāore anō kia rongo i taua ariā e whakaaro ana ko te ariā - kei hea te mahere mārama?" Tata ki te rua tuatoru kāore i te mōhio mō te Whare Hiko ki te Raki 64% o ngā pakeke i te Raki kāore anō kia rongo, kāore rānei i te mōhio ki taua mea 44% Kāore anō kia rongo i taua mea 20% I rongo engari kāore i te mōhio ki tētahi mea mōna 30% I rongo me te mōhio ki taua mea 6% I rongo me te mōhio nui ki taua mea Ko te uiuinga ComRes mō te BBC i huatau 44% kāore anō kia rongo i te kaupapa here i te 20% i rongo engari kāore i te mōhio ki taua mea. I Sheffield, i kī a Paul Firth, te hoa whakahaere ā-rohe o te rōia o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, i "tino ohorere" a ia i te iti o te mōhiotanga o te whare hiko. Ka kī a ia: "He mārama tonu te mahi a te kāwanatanga ki te whakapai ake i te āhua o tana whakawhitiwhiti i te mahi me ngā painga hoki e pā ana ki a ia." I whakamāramatia e tētahi pūrongo i whakaputaina e te umanga i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ngā take "otirā e pā ana ki te mahi tonu ngā mahere a George Osborne". I kī a Tēnā Firth ki te whiu i te wehenga ki te raki/tonga "ehara i te mea ngāwari". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka whakapai ake ngā tono o nāianei i te huaputa me te hanganga mahi i te raki, engari kāore i te mokatere ōrite ki Rāwāhi. " E whakapono ana mātou he mea pai te whakawhānuitanga i Rānana, engari kāore mātou e hiahia kia whakararurarutia ētahi atu tāone i te UK." Ko ngā karanga mō ngā mana mō ngā Tangata o te Raki e hiahia ana kia whai mana ngā kaipōrangapū paetata, ehara i ngā MP i Westminster 82% e hiahia ana ki ngā kaipōrangapū i te Raki ki te whakahaere i te waka me te hauora 70% kāore i te whakapono he pai kia nui ake te moni a Rānōna i te Raki mō ngā toi, pūtaiao me ngā waka 50% e mōhio ana ka whakarewaina e te Whare Hiko ki te Raki te āhua o te mahi i te Raki 49% kāore e whakapono ka āwhina te Whare Hiko ki te Raki ki te whakataurite anō i te wehenga ohaoha o te Raki-Tonga I kī a Kimpton-Smith, te rangatira nui o te Rōpū Cygnet i Northwich e huihui ana, e hoko ana i ngā mīhini mō te hanga muka waro, e "tino āwhina" ana te toa Powerhouse ki te Raki ki te hoko i a ia anō ki ngā kiritaki kaweake, me te 30% o te hokohoko ki Haina. "Ki a mātau hei kawekawe me te kaiwhakanao, ko te whakakotahi i ngā mea pai rawa atu o te raki ki te hauauru me te raki ki te rāwhiti me te pōkai i te katoa e tino āwhina ana i tā mātou take ina hokona e mātou i Haina, i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui," tana kī. I whakaahuatia e ia a Cheshire hei "waharoa" ki te whare hiko, ā, tērā pea "ka noho pea ki te ngākau o taua mea". Engari i kī a Southport Lib Dem MP John Pugh he "kaha rawa atu te tohu i te tukunga." I kī a Tēnā Pugh me whai pūnaha pūtea tika. I kī a Frank McKenna, he kaikaunihera Mahi i te kaunihera takiwā o Te Hauauru: "He maha nga tau ināianei kua wera rawa a Rānōna me te tonga ki te rāwhiti, ā, kua mahue a Liverpool me te raki." I kī a ia i "ohorere" a ia e 56% i mōhio ki taua mea nā te mea ko te "matapakinga me te taupatupatu" e tino arotahi ana ki ngā kaitōrangapū. I kī a ia ko ngā pūkenga, te whakangungu, te mātauranga, te waka me te hanganga i waenganui i ngā take matua kia whakahuatia. I uiuia e ComRes e 1,003 ngā pakeke i te Raki o Ingarangi mā te waea i Whiringahora 2015. I taumahatia ngā raraunga hei māngai mō ngā pakeke katoa 18+ mā te pakeke, te ira tangata, te rohe me te kōeke pāpori.

title: £12m o te pūtea mō ngā kura hou e rima i Powys
summary: Kua whakaaetia te pūtea e tata ana ki te £12m mō ngā kura tuatahi hou e rima i Powys.
text: Kua whiwhi te kaunihera o Powys i te £11.8m mai i te Kāwanatanga o Welsh mō ngā whare hou i te takiwā o Gwernyfed. Ka whakakapia e ngā kura hou ngā kura o nāianei i Hay-on-Wye, Talgarth, Clyro, Llyswen me Llangorse. I kī a Arwel Jones, te Mema Kāpata o te kaunihera mō ngā Kura, ka "whakarato i ngā wāhi whakaako ā-rohe". Ko te utu kaupapa katoa o ngā kura e rima ko te £23.8m. Kua whakawhiwhia te pūtea a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki tēnei utu hei wāhanga o te hōtaka kura o te rau tau 21.

title: Kei te whakararuraru a NI Heatwave mō ētahi kaiahuwhenua
summary: Kua kī tētahi kaiahuwhenua o County Down ka ngaro i a ia ngā hua mēnā ka haere tonu te takikupu maroke o nāianei ki tērā wiki.
text: Nā Rebekah LoganBBC News NI Roy Lyttle e whakahaere ana i tētahi pāmu tata ki Newtownards, ā, e kī ana ka taea anake e ia te uru ki te wai mō te 10-15% o ana huawhenua. Ka whakatipu a ia i ngā huawhenua o te wā pēnei i te riki, te riki kōanga, te parsnips me te kāreti. I kī te Uniana Kaiahuwhenua o Ulster (UFU) i te wā o te ngaru wera, te oranga o te kararehe me te ora o ngā hua, he "āwangawanga matua" mō ōna mema. I kī te perehitini o UFU, a Ivor Ferguson, "he manahau me te rauemi" ngā kaiahuwhenua, ā, ka "āta titiro te uniana ki taua āhuatanga". He tokomaha nga kaiahuwhenua i Aiarangi ki te Raki e whakawhirinaki ana ki te marangai hei whakainu i to rātau whenua, ā, kāore ō rātou pūnaha hawai hei whakatikatika i ngā wā roa o te rangi maroke. Tata ki te 30 tau a Mr Lyttle e pāmu ana i te tapa o Strangford Lough. E whā, e rima maero rānei te wehe o ētahi o ana pārae, he uaua te hawai. Kua tata tāruatia te hiahiatanga o ngā manga huamata, pēnei i te riki kōanga, i ngā wiki tata nei nā te rangi ātaahua, e ai ki a Tēnā Lyttle. "When we sit down in January to plan out our years growing we sow a certain amount, two or three acres of spring onion for every week, but we're going through them very, very quickly." E whakaaro ana a Mt Lyttle ka tipu ngā hua raumati mō tētahi wiki anō i mua i te tūponotanga nā te kore haukū o te oneone. Ko ngā hua o te hōtoke pēnei i te pāhiri me te seleri otaota kua whakatōkia i ngā wiki tata nei, e kore e tupu me te kore marangai. Ko te tikanga o tēnei kāore rātou e rite tae noa ki tērā kōanga ina heke te tono manga ngahuru. I kī a Tēnā Lyttle: "I tēnei wā kei te whakainu mātou i ngā hua e hiahia ana mātou ki te hoko i roto i ngā wiki e rua, e toru rānei e whai ake nei. " He mea māharahara nā te mea kei a mātau ētahi hua kātahi anō ka ruia, ā, e kore e tipu kia tae rā anō te marangai. "Ki te kore te marangai e tae mai tae noa ki te waenganui o Hōngongoi, ka tōmuri rawa ēnei hua ki te hōtoke," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Lyttle. Kua taea e te kaiahuwhenua te uru ki te wai mō tētahi wāhanga iti o tana hua, engari e kī ana "kāore e taea ā-tinana" te taupoki i tana māra 150 eka. "We have some crops at another farm in Comber and we have been able to access a disused bore hole which has excellent water. " E 23,000 kārani te roa o te marangai i runga i te eka kotahi, mēnā ka whakarea e koe ka mapu koe i te ao, i te pō ki te mahi i te 15, i te 20 eka rānei." E kī ana a ia ka kitea te hua iti iho me ngā utu tāpiri i roto i te utu hua ina tae ki ngā whata hokomaha.

title: I ngana ki te whakapae kōhuru i muri i te pūhia e te wahine ki te kanohi i Derby
summary: Kua whakataua tētahi tangata ki te whakamātau i te kōhuru i muri i te pūhia o te wahine ki te kanohi.
text: I karangatia ngā pirihimana ki Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti, i Te 11 o Hānuere, i reira i kitea ai te tūkino i te whara nui. I hopukina a Tyrone Harvey, e 32, o Chattaway Street, i te Hātarei i Te Hātarei. I whakataua hoki ia ki te pupuri i tētahi patu patu me te whakaaro ki te whakamōrearea i te ora, ā, i kore e whakarato i tētahi tauira toto i muri i te tūnga a nga pirihimana. I kī nga Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana o Te Pirihitini e whakaora ana te wahine, e 30 ona tau, i ōna mate. I puta mai a Tēnā Harvey ki te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Te Tonga o Te Rūnanga i te Mane, i reira ia i whakahokia ai ki te tiakitanga. I te 15 o Hui tanguru, ka puta a ia ki te Kōti Karauna o Derby. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Kōti me ngā Rūnanga

title: Ka tukuna e Parihi he waka tūmatanui koreutu hei whakaiti i te kohu nui
summary: Kua mahia e nga mana i Parihi te hipanga āhua kore nei o te whakawātea i te waka tūmatanui mo te toru rā ki te whakaiti i te kohu tino nui i takea mai i te rangi mahana rawa.
text: Ko te rohe pūmatua o Wīwī me ētahi atu tari e 30 i runga i te matohi poke mōrahi mō ngā rā maha. Kāore i kitea ngā whare tohu pēnei i te Pourewa o Eiffel i muri i te kohu mā i runga i Parihi. Ko te kounga o te hau o te pūmatua tētahi o ngā mea kino rawa i runga i te pūkete, e kī ana ngā kaupapa taiao o Wīwī. Na te kore hau, i honoa ki ngā pō mātao i muri mai i ngā rā mahana tōtika, i āwhina ki te hōhā o ngā āhuatanga. Kua pā hoki te kohu ki Peretiama e noho tata ana, i reira kua whakahekea e ngā mana te tepenga tere mōrahi e whakaaetia ana i runga i ngā huarahi matua. I kī te rohe o Wallonia ki te tonga kua whakataua hoki kia whakawāteatia ngā pahi, ngā tereina me ngā tereina o raro kia mutu rā anō te ohorere pokenga. E kī ana ngā tohunga 'Ngā mōrea nui' i ngā taumata kohu i tuhia ki Parihi i tēnei wiki ki ērā o Beijing i Haina, ko tētahi o ngā tāone tino poke o te ao. Hei wāhanga o ngā tikanga ohorere, kāore e hiahiatia e ngā komutere i Parihi me ngā wāhi noho tata te utu mō ngā waka tūmatanui i waenganui i te Paraire me te Rātapu. He koreutu hoki ngā ratonga tiritiri paihikara, pērā ki ngā wātū kotahi haora mō ngā tiri motokā hiko, ka pūrongotia e te pokapū rongokōrero o Associated Press. Ka inoi nga mana Wīwī ki nga atekōkiri kia waiho o rātau motokā ki te kāinga. "E inoi ana ahau ki ngā tangata katoa i Parihi me ngā wāhi noho tata kia manako i te whakamahinga o ngā waka tūmatanui," te kī a Ia-Paul Huchon, te upoko o te mana waka o te pūmatua. I whakatūpato hoki a ia ko ngā taumata poke o nāianei e tohu ana i "ngā mōrea nui" ki te hauora o te iwi. Kua tohutohutia ngā pakeke, ngā tamariki, ngā huangō me ngā tāngata whai raruraru manawa kia noho ki rō whare kia kore ai e raruraru hā. I kī te minita taiao a Piripi Mātini kua noho te kounga o te hau ināianei hei "ohorere me te manakē mō te kāwanatanga". Ko nga rohe ki te raki me te rāwhiti o te whenua kua tino pā ki nga parakino paitini. He maha ētahi atu tāone Wīwī, tae atu ki Reims, Rouen me Caen, i pānui ka whai rātau i te tauira o Parihi me te whakawātea i a rātau waka tūmatanui i te mutunga wiki.

title: Covid: King's College Carol service will have no congregation
summary: Ka mahia te karakia waiata rongonui o te ao i roto i tētahi whare karakia wātea i tēnei tau.
text: I te nuinga o te wā, ko te mahinga Kirihimete - A Festival of Nine Lessons and Carols - e mātakina ana e tētahi whakaminenga hākinakina, ā, ka pāohotia ki ngā miriona. Engari i tēnei tau ka āraia te iwi whānui i nga whare tapu o te whare karakia o Gothic Cambridge. I kī a Dean Stephen Cherry i "pouri ki te whakararuraru" i ngā kaingākau waiata e tūmanako ana ki te haere mai. Engari i tohe a ia ki a rātau kia ngahau ki te pāohotanga auau o te mahinga i runga i te Reo Irirangi 4 i te 15:00 GMT i te 24 o Hakihe. I kī te kāreti kāore he whakaminenga i tēnei tau "hei wāhanga o ngā whakatūpatotanga e hiahiatia ana... kia haumaru ai ngā ratonga". Engari, "e tūmanako ana ki te tiritiri i te hari o ana ratonga Kirihimete ā-tau ki te ao i runga i te reo irirangi me te pouaka whakaata". I whakaurua he Hākari E Iwa Akoranga me ngā Waiata i te tau 1918 hei "kawe mai i tētahi huarahi whakaaro ake ki te karakia". I pāohotia tuatahitia i te tau 1928, ā, ka tuwhera tonu ki te waiata Once In Royal David's City. Ka wātea te raupapa ratonga hei tikiake mai i te 18 o Hakihea. A Festival of Nine Lessons and Carols will be broadcast live on BBC Radio 4 and the BBC World Service on 24 December and will be repeated at 14:00 on Radio 3 on Christmas Day. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: He iro puku a Oetzi the Iceman, e kī ana ngā kairangahau
summary: Kua whakaaturia e ngā moroiti i tangohia mai i roto i tētahi whaea 5,300 tau te pakeke i a ia e mate ana i te iro puku i mua i tōna matenga, kua kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao.
text: Nā Rebecca MorelleScience Correspondent, BBC News Oetzi the Iceman, te ingoa i hoatu ki te tinana whakatotoka i kitea i te Aorangi i te tau 1991, he mate huakita e pūnoa ana i tēnei rā, ka kī ngā kaipūkaro. I patua ia e 5,300 tau i mua i muri i te pānga o te pere. Kua whakaputaina te rangahau i roto i te tuhitaka Pūtaiao. E hua ana tēnei mātauranga hou i te mate a ia i tētahi mate puku me te puku. I mahia he tātaritanga iranga o te huakita, e āwhina ana ki te whakataki i te hītori o te moroiti, e hono tata ana ki te hītori o te hekenga tangata. Na te tūpāpaku whakatotoka o Oetzi i āhei ai ngā kaipūtaiao ki te titiro whakamuri ki tōna oranga. Kua kitea e ngā rangahau o mua i waenganui i te 40 me te 50 tau tōna pakeke, he whatu parauri, i hipokina ki te moko, kātahi anō ka kai i te ibex. I kitea ia me te pere i tōna pakihiwi mauī, a, tērā pea ka mate i te toto. Heoi anō, i pāngia hoki e ia ētahi atu raruraru rongoā, tae atu ki te whatinga rekereke, te kaikōiwi me te mate Lyme pea. Ināianei, hei tāpiri atu ki ōna mate hauora, kua kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao te huakita Helicobacter pylori. I kī a Prof Albert Zink, te upoko o te Institute for Mummies and the Iceman, i te European Academy i Bolzano (EURAC): "Ko tētahi o ngā whakamātautau tuatahi ko te tiki tauira mai i te puku me te kore tūkino i te mummy. " Nō reira i tino whakatio ai mātou i te mummy, ā, i te mutunga ka taea e mātou te uru mā tētahi whakatuwheratanga - mā tētahi kokoti kua mahia kētia e tētahi akoranga o mua. "I taea e mātou te tiki tauira mai i te ihirangi puku, mai i ētahi o ngā ihirangi whekau, mai i ngā wāhi hoki o te pakitara puku." Tata ki te haurua o te iwi whānui e kitea ana te huakita i tēnei rā, ā, tata ki te 10% o ngā take ka puta pea ki te mumura o te puku me te keha. Kāore ngā kairangahau i te mōhio he aha ngā āhuatanga rongoā i whakaaturia e Oetzi, engari he whakaaturanga i urupare te huakita ki te pūnaha ārai o te Iceman. Nā te whakaraupapatanga i te huinga ira o te moroiti i homai ai he mōhiohio hōu mō te hekenga tangata tahito. Ko te momo e whakapoke ana i ngā Pākehā i tēnei rā, e whakaarotia ana ko te hua o ngā momo tawhito ake e rua - kotahi Āwherika me tētahi Āhia - e whakakotahi ana. Ko te tikanga o tēnei ko ngā tāngata kua whakapokea mai i ēnei wāhi e rua, me huihui, kua whāranu. Heoi anō, he rerekē te moroiti i kitea i Oetzi. "I whakaaro mātau ka kitea e mātau te momo ōrite o Helicobacter i Oetzi e kitea ana i ngā Pākehā i tēnei rā," te kī a Tōma Rattei, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Whiria, i Ateria, nāna i mahi i te akoranga. "I puta he uaua e kitea nuitia ana i Āhia Waenganui, ki te Tonga hoki i tēnei rā." E tohu ana tēnei tērā pea he ngaru tāngata mai i Āwherika, e mau ana i te huakita, ki Uropi i tētahi wā i muri i te matenga o Oetzi. "Tērā pea i puta mai te pahekotanga o ngā momo Helicobacter e rua i tētahi wā i muri i te wā o Oetzi, ā, e whakaatu ana tēnei he matatini ake te hītori o ngā kāinga i Uropi i te mea i whakaarotia i mua," te kī a Frank Maixner, mai i Eurac. Ka tāpiri atu ki te nui o ngā whakaaturanga, ehara i te nekehanga kotahi o te tangata i Āwherika, ki Uropi, he maha nga hekenga. Whāia a Rebecca i Twitter

title: Ka taka atu nga pirihitini a Cameron ki a Juncker
summary: Kua kī tētahi takawaenga matua o Ingarangi e "kore a Rawiri Karauna e hoe whakamuri", ka whawhai tonu ia ki te ārai i a Ia-Claude Hīngi hei upoko o te Kōmihana o Ūropi.
text: I editor@BBCGavinHewitton Twitter a Gavin HewittEurope, engari ahakoa e kī ana ngā mana o Ingarangi ka tohe tonu te pirimia ki te pōti i te tihi i te Paraire, ka taka atu ētahi o ngā pirihitini tūpāpaku a Rawiri. I kī te Pirimia o Hōnea, a Mark Rutte: "Mēnā ka karangatia he pōti mārama, ka tautokona e mātou te tauwhāinga a Juncker... e kore mātou e ārai." I kī tētahi atu mema o te puni whakahōu i karangatia, te Pirimia o Huitene, o Te Pirimia o Huitene, mēnā ka kawea e Tēnā Hīhī te nuinga o ngā upoko o te kāwanatanga, tae atu ki te tautoko a te Pāremata o Ūropi, kātahi ka hono a Huitene ki te nuinga. E rua wiki noa iho nei i whakapuakina ai e te Pirimia o Reinfeldt tōna ātete ki te tukanga i noho ai te kaitono o te whakarōpū nui rawa i te Pāremata o Ūropi hei perehitini kōmihana. I ātete a ia ki te mea ko te ingoa anake o Tēnā Hīngū i whakamua nā te mea i aukatia e ia nga ingoa o ētahi atu. Na he aha te mea i tupu? Ko ngā whenua me ngā kaiārahi whai māharahara tūturu mō Hīhī te tangata me te tukanga i tīpakohia ai ia, kāore e hiahia ana ki te tū ki te nuinga. I kī atu te Tumuaki Tiamana o Hēnea Tūturu ki te Pirihitini ehara i te "whakararuraru" mēnā ka pōtitia a Tēnā Hīkaka e te nuinga o te wā. I mua kua pōtitia te perehitini EU i runga i te ngākau kotahi. Ko te kōrero a tētahi o ēnei kaiārahi, ko Tēnā Hīhī te tangata tino pai mō tētahi pou hira, kōtaha tiketike rānei, e whakaae ana rānei rātau ko te kōti nui rawa i te Pāremata o Ūropi e kōwhiri ana i te perehitini Kōmihana. Ahakoa i Pōroa, he whānui aua rangirua, engari i te mutunga kaore nga kaiārahi e pīrangi kia whakapaea ki te whakakāhore i nga kaipōti. Ahakoa ko te 9.7% anake o te pōti pōti o Ūropi - e ai ki tētahi whakaaro - i pōti mō ngā rōpū matau o waenganui e tautoko ana i te tauwhāinga a Tēnā Hīnī, ko te nuinga o ngā MEP e tohe ana he tono manapori tā te pirimia o Rakapurangi o mua. He nui hoki te taumaha ki nga kaiārahi ka tata tonu te whakakāhore a te pāremata i tētahi atu kaitono, ā, ka ahu atu ki te pararaiha ā-iwi. I whakawāteatia kia mahue ai tātau ki tētahi pirimia o Ingarangi e whawhai ana - tērā pea ko ngā Hakari anake hei urunga - e tiaki ana i tētahi kaupapa e tohe ana a ia e tautokona whānuitia ana. E whakapono ana a ia kāore e hāngai ana ki nga tiriti te whakaae i te pāremata ki te tīpako ko wai e ārahi ana i te Kōmihana. E kī ana a ia ka huri i te toenga ā-iwi i te tatau o muri. E whakaaro ana a ia he "tino hē" me te mōrearea o te whakatakoto i te Kōmihana. Ko tētahi o ngā pātai nui kāore anō kia whakautua i roto i tēnei whakaari: he pēhea te mutunga o te tokomaha o ngā kaiārahi e whakaae ana ki tētahi kaitono me tētahi tukanga kāore rātau e whakapono? I pēhea i tae mai ai ki tēnei tawhiti? He pēhea te whakawhitiwhiti a nga kaiārahi e te pāremata? He mea whakarihariha, ahakoa e tata ana te haora 11, e puta ana te nui o ngā rangirua mo Tēnā Hīhī i roto i te pēhi Tiamana me Ūropi. Kei te whakaarahia ngā pātai mō ngā utu e whiwhi ana ia mō te kōrero ki ngā kaiwhakahaere. E tohe ana ngā hoa o Tēnā Hīngere kāore ia i whati i ngā ture, engari e kī ana te pukapuka Bild "e hiahia ana ia ki te kōrero i ngā mea tino nui anake mō ana whaikōrero utu pai. Tērā pea ka mahi tērā i tōna whenua kāinga o Rakapuō, e rongonuitia ana mō tōna huna pēke, engari kāore i Pōroa". E kī ana te kaiwhakatika ohaoha tuarua o te pepa Wīwī o La Rara e kī ana a Tēnā Hīhī "kāore i te whakatinana i te whakahōutanga e hiahiatia ana e ngā Pākehā". Nā, ka aha ā muri ake? Tērā ētahi tīwhiri kaha mai i nga Tiamana ka whakawhiwhia e Tēnā Hīhī te nuinga o te rārangi take whakahōu a Tēnā, ā, ka ngana ki te kōrero ki a ia. Tērā pea ka tukuna ki te UK he whakawhiwhinga whakamarie me te komihana o Ingarangi e whai ana i tētahi pou ohaoha o runga. Ahakoa kaore te pirimia e tango i te karanga a Tēnā Hīrau i tēnei wā, tērā pea ka pēnei a ia ā muri ake nei. Kua tāruatia e Mīharo Tūturu, a Tēnā Rutte me te pirimia o Huitene ta rātau tautoko mo te mema haere tonu o Ingarangi o tētahi Uniana o Ūropi hou. Ko te pono, ko ngā pakanga nui ake e takoto ana i mua. Koia anō, he huānga tōrangapū o te kāinga e tākaro ana ki te rautaki a Rawiri. Te āhua nei kei te pai te tākaro a Tēnā Hīhī ki ngā kaipōti o Ingarangi. E mōhio tūturu ana ka tae mai te pōti ā iwi o UK, ka whakamaharatia ngā kaipōti tūpāpaku ki te tūnga kotahi o te PM i Pōroa. Engari kei te whawhai hoki a Rawiri Karauna mo tētahi mātāpono e whakaingoa ana i a Tēnā Hīhī he "hipanga kāore e taea te whakahoki i te mana mai i te Kaunihera o Ūropi [ngā upoko o te kāwanatanga me te kāwanatanga] ki te Pāremata o Ūropi". He aha tēnā take? Nā te mea e hiahiatia ana e te pirimia i tana tono kia hokona tētahi Uropi hou ki te iwi whānui o Ingarangi kia puta te whakamuri: he neke hiko ki ngā pāremata ā iwi. Ko tēnei whawhai ki te pirimia o Rakapuō o Rakapuō he wāhanga o te uauatanga roa ake ki te whakahou i te EU.

title: Uiui a te Hōro Ika: Ka inoi te wahine ki te pūtohu kia kaua ia e okaina
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e tētahi kaiwhakahaere tari aroha te auau o te okaina i te wā o te whakaekenga wehi i te Hōro o Fishmongers.
text: I kī atu a Isobel Rowbotham ki te hūri uiui i inoi a ia ki te kaiwhakataetae i whakawāteatia e Pakihi Kani i a ia e whakatata ana ki a ia i te 29 o Whiringa 2019. Kātahi anō a ia ka kite i a Jack Merritt i muri i tana matenga i a Kani i roto i nga whare haumaru. "I te hamama a ia kua okaina ia," tana kī atu ki te uiuinga i te Guildhall o Rāwāhi. "I te pupuri a ia i tōna puku. E mārama ana kua whara a ia. He nui te toto." I whakaahuatia e Ms Rowbotham a Kani e neke ana ki a ia "tino tere" me te "tika". Ka kī a ia: "E mārama ana ahau ki te kī 'kāhore a Paksman, koa.' I tino mārama kāore a ia e tū." I kī a Ms Rowbotham i tuohu a ia ki te ngana ki te pare i a ia anō, engari he maha nga wā i okaina ai. "He nui ake te āhua o te kōwhao, ki taku whakaaro," ka haere tonu a ia. "Ko ana wero whakamutunga i roto i taku kakī. " I whakaaro a ia ko rātau te wero whakamutunga, me te mea nei ko rātau te whakaoti i ahau." I rongo te kōti i a ia e takoto ana i runga i te papa, a, "i whakatau kia tākaro tūpāpaku ki te hoki mai anō a ia... I whakamātau ahau ki te whakapōturi i taku hā." I kī a Ms Rowbotham e hiahia ana a ia ki te waea atu ki nga pirihimana i runga i tana pūkoro, engari "he nui rawa te toto hei pēhi i te mata." I mate tahi a Saskia Jones, e 23, me Tēnā Merritt, e 25 tau, i muri i te okaina e Kani i te hui whakaora herehere e tū ana i te Hōro o Fishmongers. I rongo hoki te uiui kua tāpuia anō e Tēnā Merritt tētahi tīkiti rēra mō tana kaipatu i muri i te whakakorenga o te tereina o Kani ki Rāwāhi. I kī a Haimona Larmour, tētahi hoa rangahau Learning Together, i whiwhi waea ohorere mai i a Kani i te rā o te whakaekenga e kī ana kua whakakorea tana tereina mai i Stafford. I rongo te kōti i mua, i te wā o te haerenga, ka herea e Kani he pōma whaiwhai kōrero ki tōna hope i a ia i roto i te whare taonga o te tereina. I tūtakina a Kani i te teihana o Euston e Tēnā Larmour rāua ko Hoani Crilly - nāna i āwhina ā muri ake ki te whakamātau i a Kani i runga i te Arawhiti o Rāwāhi. "I kite ahau i a Pakihi e haere mai ana ki a Issy (Isobel Rowbotham) me ahau me ngā maripi e rua," te kī a Tēnā Lamour. "I te hāparangi a ia, engari kāore au i tino mārama ki tana kōrero." I kī a Tēnā Larmour ka peke a ia ki runga i te tēpu, a, ka oma ki te wāhi kaiwhiwhi i reira ka hoatu e ia te āwhina tuatahi ki a Tēnā Merritt. "Kāore au i kite i ngā wāhi katoa i okaina ai ia. I ohorere ahau i taua wā. I whakamātau ahau ki te kimi i ngā taonga tata rawa hei pēhi i ngā motu. "I tere tonu tana pahemo. He iti noa iho tana aue. Ka kōata ōna whatu. I kōmā a ia." I rongo hoki te uiuinga mai i te kaiwhakawā mōnehu o Hoani Hamuera, nāna i kite i a Ms Jones e takoto ana i te waewae o tētahi arawhata me te kanohi "mā". I a ia e haere ana ki te hui, i mua i tana whakahaere i tētahi akoranga whakangungu mō te rōpū whakaora herehere Learning Together i te tau 2018 i kōrero ia ki te uiuinga i a ia i runga i te paepae o te hōro tomokanga matua o te whare i te putanga o te whakaekenga. ''I rongo ahau i ngā hamama me ngā hākere e haere mai ana i raro, ā, kāore au i mārama ki te aha e puta ana," tana kī. "Ko ngā oro tuatahi he hamama tāne, he riri, he pōraru nga hamama." I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Hamuera tana kitenga i a Ms Jones e takoto ana i runga i te papa. "I mōhio ahau he mā tioka tōna kanohi, i āhua mōhio mai a ia ki a au, kua mate rānei," tana kī. Kātahi ka kite a Tēnā Hamuera i tētahi o ngā kaiwhakahaere o te takahanga, a Dr Amy Ludlow, e hamama ana ''pirihimana, waka tūroro, ināianei'' ki roto i tana waea pūkoro. I te korerotanga ki a ia kia whakawhiti, ka kī a Tēnā Hamuera kātahi ia ka rongo i tētahi 'reo whai mana'' i waho e kī ana he pōma, ā, me kimi whakaruru a ia. I kī a Tēnā Hamuera ināianei i whakaaro ia he pirihimana te reo. Kua whakaritea te uiuinga kia iwa wiki te roa, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia whaia e tētahi uiuinga hūri motuhake ki te matenga o Kani. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts & Tribunals Service

title: Ko ngā pūaroturuki kaipuke 'mōrearea ki te kōrere', ka whakatūpato ngā tohunga
summary: He tino mōrearea tētahi pūnaha e whakamahia ana i te ao whānui hei aroturuki i ngā ngohe moana, kua whakatūpato ngā tohunga haumarutanga.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Te Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero i roto i ngā pūnaha tawhito ka taea e ngā kaihōia te whakangaro i ngā kaipuke i ngā pūnaha aroturuki - te āhua rānei kei te haere mai tētahi rererangi nui. I kī ngā kairangahau i Trend Micro i whakaaturia e ā rātou kitenga te mōrearea o te whakamahi i ngā pūnaha tawhito i hoahoatia ina kāore te haumarutanga i te take. Engari i kī tētahi tohunga aroturuki oko he ngāwari noa iho te kite i ngā whakamātau tinihanga. I kī a Īna Trowbridge o Te Rārangi o Raiti, tāpiri atu ki te hangarau mōrearea - e mōhiotia ana ko te Pūnaha Tāutunga Aunoa (AIS) - ka taea te whakamahi i ētahi atu mehua hei tāutu i ngā ngohe moana. "Ka kitea wawetia te tinihanga e [Te Mōhiohio Rārangi o Raiti] hei oko warp," tana kī, "mā te whakarato pūrongo tūnga kāore i te mōhiotia i waho o te āheinga tere/tawhiti o te oko, ā, ka herea ki ētahi atu tūhuratanga me te whakamanatanga." 'Kāore he taki' Ka whakamahia te pūnaha AIS hei aroturuki i te wāhi o ngā kaipuke e haere ana puta noa i ngā moana o te ao. Mō ngā kaipuke neke atu i tētahi rahi, he mea whakahau te whakauru AIS i raro i te ture moana o te ao whānui. Ka taea e ngā poti whakangahau iti me ngā oko hī ika - he kōwhiringa - ka taea te hoko i tētahi transponder mō te iti iho i te £600, kia tino māmā ake ai te AIS i ngā pūnaha tauwāhi whirinoa. I hoahoatia hei tuku raraunga mō te tūnga o te kaipuke, me ētahi atu mōhiohio hāngai, kia kitea ai ngā nekeneke e ētahi atu poti me ngā mana hāngai ki uta. Ko tētahi atu whakamahinga ko te whakatūpato i ngā kaipuke pātata ina noho tētahi tāne, wahine rānei ki runga i te moana - he matohi e ngāwari ana te tinihanga, e kī ana a Rik Ferguson o Trend Micro. "E kōhua ana ki te mea kāore anō te kawa i hoahoatia me te haumarutanga i roto i te hinengaro," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "Kāore he taki whaimana o ngā mea e whakatakotoria ana ki reira." Mā te whakamahi i ngā taputapu i hokona mō te 700 hōro (£600), ka taea e ngā kairangahau te haukoti i ngā tohu me te whakaputa i ngā oko ki te pūnaha aroturuki, ahakoa kāore i te tīariari. I tētahi tauira, i taea e te tīma te āhua nei kua tātakina e te ara kaipuke te kupu "pwned" - te kōrero mūrere mō te "rangatira". He tūmatanui ngā kaitiaki o Hūmārie Ko ngā mōhiohio e pāohotia ana e AIS - engari i te whakamahinga tuatahi o te pūnaha, i te tōmua o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, he nui rawa te utu o te hangarau e hiahiatia ana hei whiwhi i ngā mōhiohio mō te hunga kāore i uru hāngai ki te umanga. Engari ināianei, ka taea te whakamahi i tētahi tūhononga ipurangi noa hei kite i ngā tauwāhi o ngā poti, me tētahi tohu o te momo utanga e kawea ana e rātou. Tērā te taurangi kua whakamahia e nga kaitiaki o Hūmārie te pūnaha. "Kua roa te whakaaro kei te whakamahi ngā kaitiaki i te AIS hei rārangi hokohoko," te kī a Tēnā Ferguson, "e kite ana i ngā mea e haere mai ana ki ngā wai paetata, me ngā utanga kei a ia." Heoi anō, i kitea e te Mōhiohio Rārangi o Raiti e whakaaetia ana ngā kāpene ki te mono i te AIS mēnā kei te whakaaro rātou ka mōrearea pea ā rātou kaimahi. Whāia a Dave Lee i Twitter @DaveLeeBBC

title: Ko ngā mahere o te Hōhipera o Friarage e pā ana ki a Jeremy Hunt
summary: Plans to scale back maternity and child services at a North Yorkshire hospital will be referred to the government.
text: E whakaaro ana te NHS ki te whakaiti i ngā ratonga i te Friarage i Northallerton, e kī ana kāore e taea te tautoko. I whakaae te Komiti Tirotiro Hauora o te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Te Raki o Aotearoa i tētahi hui i te Rāitema ki te tono i te Hēkeretari Hauora a Jeremy Hunt kia uru atu. Kua whakaroatia te whakaaro ki nga tono kia arotakea rā anō e Tēnā Hunt. Ko te kōwhiringa manako o te NHS Hambleton, Richmondshire me Whitby Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG) ko te whakakapi i te tiaki tamariki pō ki tētahi wae aromatawai tiaki rā, me te whai ratonga kohanga ā-kaiwhakawhanau, kaua ko ngā kaitohutohu. Ko te tikanga me haere ngā wāhine hapū e mōrearea ana ki te hōhipera i Middlesbrough, e 22 maire (35km) ki te raki o Northallerton, ki te whānau. Kei te mahia ngā huringa i muri i te pūrongo a te tīma tohutohu rongoā ā-motu i whakaputaina i te Hānuere i kī ai kāore te wae tamariki o te Friarage. I whakaae te CCG ki te pupuri i tētahi whakaaro tūmatanui mō ngā huringa kua marohitia, engari kāore i whakaae ki te whakauru i te kōwhiringa kia mau tonu ngā ratonga.

title: Northern Powerhouse 'undermined' by austerity, five years on
summary: Kei te "whakararurarutia" te Whare Hiko ki te Raki e te whakawhāititanga ahakoa ngā tohu o te tupu o te ohaoha, e kī ana tētahi kura whakaaro.
text: E rima tau mai i tōna whakarewatanga, ka kī te koromatua o Greater Manchester, a Andy Burnham, kei te mōrearea te kaupapa ki te "fizzling out". I kī te Whare Wānanga o te Rangahau Kaupapahere Tūmatanui (IPPR) ki te Raki kua "neke ki te ahunga tika" engari he tokomaha ake ngā tamariki e noho ana i roto i ngā whare "rawakore". I kī te kāwanatanga he tokomaha o ngā tāngata e mahi ana puta noa i te raki. I kī a IPPR Raki, tētahi kura whakaaro mauī o waenganui, kua tutuki i te Whare Hiko ki te Raki te tuku hiko mā te waihanga i ngā "rangatira metro" hou e rima me tētahi tinana waka ā-rohe - Transport for the North. Heoi anō, e kī ana kua "whakararurarutia" e te kāwanatanga te kaupapa i a ia e tapahi ana i te hokohoko tūmatanui. Ahakoa kātahi anō ka nui ake te whakapau moni, kua kite te raki i te whakahekenga katoa o te £3.6bn i te tau mai i te 2009-10, i te wā i kitea e te tonga-rāwhiti me te tonga-hauauru o Ingarangi he £4.7bn. I roto i tētahi tātaritanga e tohu ana i te rima tau o te Whare Hiko ki te Raki, i kitea e IPPR ki te Raki ngā huringa tōrunga: I pakaru mā ia rohe, ko te Raki ki te Raki anake te tuarua ki Rāwāhi mō te pikinga o ngā mahi. He iti noa iho te hekenga o Pākehā. I whakahuatia tuatahitia te Whare Hiko ki te Raki e te Tumuaki o George Osborne i June 2014, i tana whakahuahua i tētahi hiahia ki te whakakotahi i ngā tāone, ngā taone me ngā hapori ā-taiwhenua o te raki o Ingarangi ki te whakakī i te tupu ohaoha mā ngā hononga waka hou, ngā mana whakahaere me te nui ake o te pūtea penapena. I whakahauhautia ngā tāone pērā i Manchester, Liverpool, Leeds, Sheffield, Hull me Newcastle kia mahi tahi ki te whakataetae i Rāwāhi me te Rāwhiti ki te Tonga, me te "mau ki te ao", me ētahi atu mahi me ngā huarahi. I kī a IPPR North he "maha ngā huringa tōraro" tae atu ki: Kua tautuhia tētahi whare hei "rawakore pātahi" ina iti iho i te 60% o te wawaenga waenga - iti iho i te £17,040 i te tau, i runga i ngā whika hōu rawa. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: I kī ngā tereina kua whakakorea e IPPR North mai i te tau 2014 kua piki ake te whakapau waka i te raki e te £149 mō ia tangata i ngā tikanga tūturu, engari he iti iho tēnei i te haurua o te pikinga o te £330 mō ia tangata i Rāwāhi. E hiahia ana ngā rangatira ki te raki kia nui ake te pūtea penapena i roto i te waka i muri i te whakaaturanga o ngā whika i kino ake hoki ngā ratonga tereina. Ko te maha o ngā tereina kua whakakorea, kua tino tōmuri hoki i runga i ngā māngai TransPennine Express me ngā māngai ki te Raki, neke atu i te rua mai i te 20,000 i te 2014-15 ki te 47,000 i te 2018-19. Ko te tikanga e tata ana ki te kotahi i roto i ia 20 ratonga i whakakorea, neke atu rānei i te 30 meneti tōmuri i te taenga atu ki tōna ūnga. Tātaritanga nā Danny Savage, te kaipānui o TE Raki o Ingarangi i tino pōhiritia te ariā o te Whare Hiko ki te Raki puta noa i tēnei wāhi o Ingarangi - mai i Liverpool ki Hull, tae atu ki Newcastle. He āhua mahana kē atu a Cumbria nā te mea he tawhiti rawa atu i ngā wā katoa. Ka mātakitaki te iwi, ka tatari. A, e rima tau i muri mai, he tokomaha e whakaaro ana kei te tatari tonu rātau. Whakaarahia te take ki ngā tauhou i runga i te tereina me ngā kōrero pēnei i te "Northern Powercut more like" or "your mean the Northern Poorhouse" are coming coming. Ka taea e te kāwanatanga te tohu atu ki te angitu o te mana whakahaere me ngā rangatira ā-rohe me ētahi mahi paetata, engari ko te whakaaro o ngā tāngata e noho ana i konei, kāore anō kia hurihia te tautohe a George Osborne i te tau 2014 hei mahi. E tohu ana rātau ki ngā tereina tawhito, ngā tautohetohe mo te whakawhiriwhiri i ngā ara rerewhenua matua, ā, e mārama ana he nui ake te pūtea penapena i te tonga. Tata ki te 15 miriona ngā tāngata o te raki o Ingarangi. He nui tēnā o ngā kaipōti tūpono kia whakakino tētahi kāwanatanga. Kua pēnei mō ngā tekau tau, engari me tino mārama te wehenga ki te raki-tonga i te tau 2019? 'Fizzle out' Labour mayor Mr Burnham said the north had a louder voice than it did five years ago. "He tohu kei Greater Manchester kei te tīmata te mahi a te mana whakahaere," tana kī. "We're doing more to get people back to work but overall there is a real danger that the Northern Powerhouse could be about to fizzle out. " Kua rahua e Westminster te Raki o Ingarangi, ā, neke atu i te tekau tau i raro i ngā kāwanatanga o ngā kara katoa." I kī te Koromatua o te Rohe o Te Taone o Te Taone, o Labour MP Dan Jarvis, e hiahia ana ia kia "titiro te kāwanatanga ki te raki o Ingarangi hei rawa, ehara i te taunaha". I kī a Judith Blake, te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Taone o Leeds: "Kei te mahi ngātahi ngā mana ki te raki, ā, he tino painga tēnā. " Ko te tino uauatanga kei a mātau ko te takaware o ngā aronui (waka), ā, he tino kore noa iho te whāinga ki te whakataurite anō i te āhua o te whakahaerenga." I kī te rangatira o Tees Valley, a Ben Houchen, i āwhina te Whare Hiko ki te Raki ki te whakaū i te hokonga £35m o Te Taunga Rererangi o Te Riu o Durham Tees. Ka kī a ia: "Kua tino pai ta mātau mahi. He nui rawa a mātau moni mai i te kāwanatanga matua. He nui ake ō mātou mana me te mana ki tō mātou ake tūranga, ā, nā reira i ahu mai ki ngā mea pēnei i taku kaha ki te hoko i tō mātou taunga rererangi paetata me te waihanga i te kaporeihana whanaketanga matua tuatahi i waho o Rānana ka waihanga i ngā mano mahi i te Riu o Tees. "Ka taea e mātou te tono moni anō me ētahi atu mana, ā, ko tērā tētahi mea e mahia ana e mātou i ia rā, engari he nui ake ngā mea ka taea e mātou i runga i te taumata ki te raki e mahi tahi ana puta noa i ngā rōpū tōrangapū." I kī a Luke Raikes mai i IPPR Raki: "Kua whakahekea e te austerity te nui o te rārangi take o te whare hiko nā te mea kua kaha ake te pānga ki te raki i tētahi atu rohe, ā, he hua tērā mō ngā tāngata e noho ana i te Raki me te āhua o te mahi i roto i te Raki. Nā reira kua kite mātou i te rawakore tamariki e piki ake ana i te 200,000 i roto i te rima tau noa iho - he tino nui tēnā." I te whakaaturanga a Tēnā Osborne i ngā mahere Powerhouse i te tau 2014, ko ia te Tumuaki i roto i te kāwanatanga tauwhāinga a Rawiri, ā, he MP mō tētahi wāhanga ki te raki - Tatton, i Cheshire - mō te 13 tau. Engari i mahue i a ia te Kāpata i muri i te taupānga EU o te tau 2016, ka tū hei MP i te pōti nui o te tau e whai ake nei, ā, ināianei ko ia te kaiwhakatika o te nūpepa Evening Standard o Rāwāhi. I kī tētahi kaihautū kāwanatanga i noho manakē tonu te Whare Hiko ki te Raki, ā, "e tuku hua ana mō ngā tāngata puta noa i te raki me te maha o ngā tāngata e mahi ana, ā, tata ki te 200,000 anō ngā umanga i tēnei rā i te 2010". "Kei te haumi mātou neke atu i te £13bn ki te whakapai ake i te waka - neke atu i tētahi kāwanatanga i roto i te hītori - ā, e tata ana ki te haurua o te rohe e whakaaturia ana e ngā rangatira metro kaha e rima, kei te pupuri mātou i tā mātou kī taurangi mō ētahi atu whakataunga i te raki kia mahia e te raki," tana kī.

title: Ko te raupapa marara o te pokapū o te taone nui o Bangor 'angitu'
summary: Ko te whakahēnga i whakahētia hei ngana ki te whakawātea i ngā tiriti i ngā taitamariki, ka mutu ki ngā pakeke anake kua whiwhi whakahau marara.
text: Kua pūrongotia whānuitia ko te whakahāwea i te pokapū o te taone o Bangor, o Gwynedd, i whāia ki raro iho i te 16 tau. Engari i kī ngā pirihimana kāore anō kia whāia ki ngā tamariki, ā, i roto i ngā marama e ono kua whakaritea katoatia ngā whakahau e 61 ki ngā pakeke. I kī ngā āpiha he angitu, ā, ka hinga te hara me te whanonga ārai pāpori. Ka mutu te raupapa i te Tūrei engari kāore i te whakahōutia, me ngā pirihimana e kī ana he kōwhiringa mō te wā heke. I whakaurua te raupapa ki te rutu i te whanonga ārai pāpori pēnei i ngā rōpū e huihui ana ki te inu, i te iwi whānui rānei e "whakatīwheta, whakamataku, whakaoho, pouri rānei". Engari i kawea mai he whakahē mai i te Komihana Tamariki mō Wales Keith Towler me ngā kaiwhakahauhau rangatiratanga tūmatanui nā te mea i wehi kei te ūkuia ngā tamariki. Tērā pea ka rāhuitia e ia ngā tāngata i raro i te 16 mai i te pokapū o te taone i te pō me te whakatūpato me "kaua rātau e noho tata ki waenganui i te 9pm me te 6am ki te kore rātou e whakahaere tika i tētahi matua, pakeke rānei e 18 neke atu rānei". I kī a Tēnā Towler i whakahekea, i whakarerekē hoki i ngā rangatahi, i te wā i karangatia e te rōpū whakahau rangatiratanga tūmatanui ko Big Brother Watch he draconian. Heoi anō, i kī ngā Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki kāore anō kia whāia te whakahau ki ngā tamariki, ā, kāore tētahi tangata i raro iho i te 16 i whiwhi i tētahi. I kī a Supt Peter Newton: "Ko te whāinga katoa o te raupapa marara ko te whakapai ake i te oranga o te iwi paetata me ngā manuhiri ki te taone. " There's a wide range of individuals that have been issued with the dispersal order notices and there's been 61 dispersal notices issued over the last six months and that ranges from people drinking in the street [to] acting in an anti-social manner. "Ā, e koa ana ahau ki te kī atu, kāore he tamariki i raro iho i te 16 tau me whakahoki ki te kāinga ki o rātau mātua." 'Tūkino i te hara' I kī a ia he "angitu nui" te raupapa mō Bangor me te hara e tata ana ki te 30% me te whanonga ārai pāpori e tata ana ki te hauwhā i a ia e noho ana. "Ahakoa kua whakatau mātou kia kaua e whakaroa atu i tēnei wā, ka noho tonu he kōwhiringa mō mātou kia neke whakamua me te whakatara i tētahi mea ōrite ā muri ake nei." I kī te kaikaunihera o Gwynedd Gwynfor Edwards, ko tōna rohe Deiniol e kapi ana i te pokapū o te taone, ko te pahekotanga o te raupapa me ētahi atu āpiha tautoko hapori pirihimana i runga i te tautiaki i ahu hāngai mai ki te whakataka i te hara. "Ko te raina mo te 16 tau te pakeke mo to rātau haumarutanga," tana kī. "He nui ake te āhua o te taitamariki i te hara i te mahi hara. " Kāore i te haumaru tētahi tangata e 16 tau, ā, i te pō i te Paraire, i te pō Hātarei rānei i te pokapū o te taone." I kī a ia tērā pea ka pai ake te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero a nga pirihimana me te pāpāho. I kī a John Wyn Williams, te mema kāpata o te Kaunihera o Gwynedd me te kawenga mō te haumarutanga hapori: "E mōhio kē ana mātou ko ngā pāpātanga hara e whakaatu ana ko Gwynedd tētahi o ngā wāhi haumaru rawa i Ingarangi me Wales e noho ana. " Engari he pai hoki ki te mōhio ko ngā whika mō ngā marama e ono kua hipa e whakaatu ana i te whakahekenga nui o ngā whika hara me ngā mahi whanonga ārai pāpori mō te rohe e hipa ana i te raupapa mararatanga i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i tērā tau."

title: Ko Grayson Perry hei tuku i ngā kauhau a BBC Reith
summary: Ko te kaiwaiata toa whakawhiwhinga ko Grayson Perry hei tuku i ngā kauhau Reith o tēnei tau i runga i te Reo Irirangi 4.
text: Ko tana rangatū, e huaina ana ko Grayson Perry: Playing to the Gallery, ka whakaarohia te āhua o te toi i te rau tau 21. Ko Perry, i toa i te Whakawhiwhinga Turner i te tau 2003, ko ia te kaiwaiata arokite tuatahi hei tuku i ngā kauhau, kia pāohotia i Whiringahora me Whiringa ā Rangi. "Hei poto, e hiahia ana ahau ki te kōrero mō te āhua o te rehetoi, i konei, ināianei," te whakamārama a Perry. "Ki taku whakaaro ināianei he wā pai ki te whakaaro ki te ariā o te kounga me te pēhea e taea ai e tātau, i tētahi tau e kīia mai ai ki a tātau he toi, e whakamihi ana ko tēhea te toi he pai," tana tāpiri mai. Ko ngā kaiako o Reith o mua ko te kaiako o te ohaoha, ko Ahorangi Niall Ferguson, ko te kaiārahi whakahē o Burma, ko Aung San Wū Kyi me te kaipūtaiao ārahi, ko Mātini Rees. He rongonui te reo arotake toi a Perry mō ana mahi uku, engari e mōhiotia ana hoki ia mō tana mahi tā, tātuhi, whakairo me te rīpene. I roto i te kauhau whakatuwhera, kia hopukina ki Tate Modern i Rānana, ka whakaarohia e ia te matatinitanga o ōna ake wheako hei rehetoi, ā, ka tūhura mēnā ka taea e ngā kaiwaiata te pupuri i tō rātou taparenga ina mōhiotia rātou mō ā rātou hanganga. Ka haere tonu a ia ki te tirotiro i te mahi a te mākete toi, me te whakaaro he pēhea te kitenga o te toi o nāianei e te pēhi, te iwi whānui me ngā kaiwaiata i Ingarangi o nāianei. I kī hoki te AO ka tirohia hoki e Perry ngā kupu me te reo kua tupu huri noa i te arotake toi, tae atu ki ngā mea e kitea ana e te rehetoi he hiahia nui ake te tangata ki te "whakanui i a rātau urupare" ki te toi. "Me āta tirotiro hoki ngā kupu me ngā moni e pā ana ki ngā toi o nāianei. " E hiahia ana ahau ki te kōrero mō taku pātahitanga pōhēhē ki te ao toi, he pēhea taku tino whakawhetai ki a ia, engari e uaua ana kia kaua e noho hei kōhukihuki, hei pōhēhē rānei," te kī a Pere. I kī te pūmana o te Reo Irirangi 4, a Gwyneth Williams, i "rekareka" a ia i te whakaurutanga o Perry ki ngā rangatū Reith o te ngahuru. "I taku tūtakitanga ki a ia i whakaaetia ahau e tōna mōhiotanga ki te tukanga auaha me te momo tangata hōhonu e kitea ana i roto i ana mahi," tana kī. I mua rā ko te toi te kaupapa o ngā Kauhau Reith, i te tau 1960 me te Toi me te Anarchy a Edgar Wind me te Toi Kore Ngaro a Denis Donoghue, i tukuna i te tau 1982. Ko te kauhau tuatahi, i hopukina i mua i te hunga whakarongo ora i Tate Modern i Rānana, ka whaia e ngā kauhau i St George's Hall i Liverpool, The Guildhall i Londonderry me Central Saint Martins i Rānana.

title: Ngā whakaekenga wahine a Legoland Windsor: I tukua te tangata i hopukina me te kore utu
summary: Kua tukua tētahi tangata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae i te tūkino i ngā tamariki tokorua e ono tau i te pāka tāhuhu o Legoland.
text: I "whakapā tika" nga kōtiro tokorua i te haerenga ki te tātaritanga, i Windsor, i Berkshire, i te 11 o Aotearoa, ka kī pirihimana. I te 20 o ona tau mai i Bracknell, kua utua taua tangata ki tētahi rā kua whakaritea, engari mai i tērā wā ka tukua me te kore utu. Kua tukua e nga Pirihimana o Thames Valley tētahi e-fit o te hunga hara. I pā mai nga whakaekenga i waenganui i te 12:15 BST me te 12:30 i Te Puni Castaway i te takiwā o Pirate Shores o te tūnga, ka kī te ope. I kī a Det Insp Penny Mackenzie i whakapono a ia i haere te hunga hara ki Legoland i te rā o te hara me ētahi atu - he whānau, he hoa rānei. "Kei te mahi ngātahi mātou me Legoland Windsor ki te whakaneke i tēnei tūhuratanga, ā, kei roto i tēnei ko te arotakenga o te CCTV. " Tata ki te 14,200 ngā tāngata i haere ki te pāka tāhuhu i taua rā, nā reira he tukanga uaua tēnei, ā, me āta mahi. "Mēnā e mōhio ana koe ki te kanohi o te tangata i roto i te E-Fit, i te whakaahuatanga rānei i hoatu, whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana ināianei tonu", tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ko Saffron Barker i waenga i nga YouTubers kohi moni mo NHS me te livestream raka
summary: Ko ētahi o ngā YouTubers tino rongonui o UK me whakaatu i tētahi wātū livestream e whā haora i te Rāitema e tuku aki ana kia noho ngāwari tonu i te wā o te raka, i a ia e kohi moni ana mō te NHS.
text: Ko Saffron Barker, Lady Leshurr, Big Narstie me Anastasia Kingsnorth kei waenganui i ērā e whai wāhi ana. Ka whakahaua ngā kaimātakitaki kia koha ki te whakahau NHS Charities Together. Ka mahi, ka whakaoti hoki ngā YouTubers i ngā wero me te kōrero me pēhea rātou e mahi ai i te raka. I kōrero a Luke Hyams, te upoko o YouTube Originals EMEA, mō te hiranga o te whakakotahi i ngā tāngata ki Stream #WithMe. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te ora i roto i te noho mokemoke e kawe mai ana i ngā whakamātautau uaua me ngā wā hari. E tūmanako ana mātou ka kawea mai e tēnei whakaaturanga te mea whakamutunga." Ka whai kaihautū hou ia haora, me ētahi atu kaiwhakaari e "tūtohu-tīma" ana i tō rātou ara puta noa i te whakaaturanga, me ngā "aki raka" mō "me pēhea te whakangahau, te ngākau nui, me te hohe". Ka whakaaturia hoki ngā kaihanga me ngā whetū ki ngā wero pouaka ngaro e rua e whakaatu ana i ngā mea hei whakamātau mā ngā kaimātakitaki i te kāinga. I kī a Kevin Batchelor, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o te kamupene whakanao o te whakaaturanga, o Electric Robin: "Nā te mea kei te taratahi mātou, he uaua hangarau tūturu tēnei livestream - e whakakotahi ana i ngā tauwāhi ora rerekē e 12 mā te whakamahi tahi i ngā kāmera rerekē e 60." I tāpiritia e ia e tūmanako ana rātau ka "āwhina ki te kawe mai i ētahi mārama ki roto i ngā kāinga i a tātau e whakatere ana i ēnei wā tawhito rawa, me te āwhina hoki ki te kohi moni mō te hunga i te raina o mua". Ko te rārangi katoa o ngā kaitāpae e whai ake nei: Ka tīmata te livestream i te 16:00 BST i te Tāite 30 o Āperira. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: He takoha i utua ki te 'jazz giant' a Chris Barber
summary: I te 90 o ona tau, kua mate tētahi o ngā whika ārahi i roto i te jazz o Ingarangi me Ūropi, te kaiwaiata o Pirihi Barber.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC kaipānui pūoro He toa o te jazz trad, i whakatakotoria hoki e ia ngā tūāpapa mō te tirohanga toka o te 60s mā te uhi i te Raina Motu Toka o Leadbelly me Lonnie Donegan i te tau 1954. I hokona e te waiata he miriona kape, ā, i whakanuia te tirohanga skiffle o Ingarangi i whakaawe i te Beatles, te Rolling Stones me Eric Clapton. I mate rangimārie a ia i roto i tana moe i muri i tana matenga i te mate mate. "Kaore e pōhēhētia, i panonitia e ia te tirohanga pūoro i te UK, ā, ka wetemaukati i te tatau mō tētahi whakatupuranga hou o ngā kaiwhaiwhai pūoro, ā, ka haere tonu ki te whakaaweawe," ko te tuhituhi a tana tapanga pūkete, The Last Music Company, i runga i Facebook. "E kore rawa mātou e kite anō i tōna āhua." I takoha hoki te kaiwaiata a Tā Tim Rice, e whakaae ana ki te "āhuatanga whakaharahara" a Barber me te karanga i a ia he "kaitākaro whetū". I karangatia ia e Steve Van Zandt o te E Street Band ko "te Godfather of British Rock"; i a Billy Bragg e whakaaro ana ki tana mahi "nui" i roto i "te whānautanga o te skiffle" me te kawe mai i "ngā kaiwaiata blues US ki ngā kaimātakitaki o Ingarangi i ngā tau 50 & 60". I tāpiri mai te comedian me te kaituhituhi hītori hītori a Mark Lamarr: "I tino mōhio ahau ki a ia, ā, he rite tonu taku toro ki a ia i tōna kāinga. Kāore e taea e koe te hiahia ki te tūtaki i tētahi rangatira atawhai, whakaaro, mātauranga, ā, i runga ake i ngā rangatira pūoro katoa." I whānau ia i te tau 1930 i Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, ka tīmata te hiahia o Barber ki te jazz trad - te oro wera me te kanapa o New Orleans - i muri i tana whakawhititanga i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, ā, ka tīmata ki te kohikohi pūkete o Amerika. I hangaia e ia tana pēne tuatahi i muri i te pakanga i Rānana, i a ia e ako ana i te trombone me te pango taurua i te Kura Puoro o Guildhall. I honoa e te tētere o Ken Colyer i te tau 1953, he iti noa iho to rātau pānga ki te Motu o Capri - engari kāore i roa ka pāngia te mahi ngātahi, ā, ka whakakapia a Colyer e Pat Halcox, i noho tonu hei hoa pūoro a Barber mo te 54 tau. I puta mai a Rock Island Line i te wā o ngā whakaaturanga ora o te pēne, i reira ka whakatangi te kaitākaro banjo o Lonnie Donegan i ngā whakawhitiwhiti i waenganui i ngā huinga matua. I hopukina e rātau to rātau uhi i te tau 1954, ā, kotahi tau i muri mai ka noho ohorere ko tētahi o ngā pūkete tino tonoa i runga i te reo irirangi o TE AO, i ahu mai ki tētahi putanga kotahi i Decca. "Mō Ingarangi taiohi, ko te pūkete tino whai mana o te tekau tau," ko te tuhituhi a Bob Stanley i roto i tana hītori o te pahū o Ingarangi, āe, āe. "I te mōhiotanga o ngā taiohi o Ingarangi ka taea e rātau te haere ki te reo irirangi mā te whakahaere i te puruma me te kazoo, ka tīmata te hurihanga". "Ki te kore a Pirihi Barber," ka kitea e te kaiwaiata o Rolling Stones, a Bill Wyman, "kāore ngā Pōhatu me ngā Beatles e noho ki hea ināianei". I utua e Paul McCartney te manako mā te hoatu i tētahi waiata Beatles kāore i whakamahia, Cat Call, i te tau 1967, me te whakatangi okana i runga i te ara. Ko te taunga nui rawa o te Pēne o Pirihi Barber ko te Petite Fleur o te tau 1959, nāna i whakaatu tētahi pūrākau māhorahora engari ngākau ngākau nā Monty Sunshine. Neke atu i te 2.5 miriona ngā kape i hokona e ia, ā, ka akiaki i te pēne ki te atamira o te ao whānui, ā, ka mōhiotia a Barber ko "te tangata nāna i whakahoki mai a Trad ki Amerika". I haere tonu a ia ki te mahi i ngā konohete neke atu i te 15,000 i ngā whenua rerekē e 50, ā, i ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā iwa rau, i mauria mai ētahi o ngā kaiwhakatangitangi blues tino whai mana o Amerika ki UK - tae atu ki a Howlin' Wolf, Muddy Waters, Sonny Terry me Sister Rosetta Tharpe. I kī a ia ko tētahi o ana tino whakamiramira mahi ko te mahi i ngā whakaaturanga me Louis Armstrong i te tau 1960. "Ko mātau te pēne whakamutunga i mua i a ia, ā, e mahara ana ahau he tino rata a ia," tana kī atu ki a London Jazz News i te tau 2018. I kī mai a ia me haere tonu mātau mō tētahi tau tāpiri - nā reira i mahia e mātau. He tangata ngākau māhorahora a ia. "I tākaro noa iho a ia pēnei i a Louis Armstrong i ngā wā katoa. Kāore koe i tātari i a ia, i whakarongo noa iho koe. He pai ki a koe te whakarongo ki a ia e tākaro ana." Ahakoa i whakamutua e te hurihanga toka me te pahū o nga tau 60 te auau jazz trad, ka haere tonu te roopu a Barber ki te whakatangi i nga whakaaturanga kua hokona tae noa ki tana whakatānga i te tau 2019. I roto i ngā tau, ka whakawhānuitia e rātau ta rātau repertoire, me te whakauru i te blues me te bebop, i a rātau e hopu ana me ngā whetū mai i a Dr John ki Van Morrison. I waho o te pūoro, he kaitaraiwa whakataetae a ia, ā, i whakaputaina tana pukapuka, Jazz Me Blues, i te tau 2014. I whakaaturia hoki e ia te rangatū o te Reo Irirangi 2 o Te Reo Irirangi o Pirihi Barber's Jazz Diaries, e uiui ana i ngā manuhiri tae atu ki a Georgie Fame, Mark Knopfler me Humphrey Lyttleton. E ora ana a ia e tana wahine tuawhā a Kate, me ngā tamariki tokorua, a Christopher rāua ko Caroline, mai i tana mārena tuatoru. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Daw Mill colliery work 'will prevent fires'
summary: Ko te ahi hou rawa i te kākahu o Daw Mill i Warwickshire te whakamutunga i te pae, e ai ki te Mana Waro.
text: I tēnei wā kei te mahi ngā tohunga ki te whakakī anō i ngā poka me te tapahi i te puna hāora hei ārai i te pakarutanga o ētahi atu ahi. E ai ki te kaikari o mua me te tohunga umanga o Dr Eric Wade, ko nga ahi i te pae o Daw Mill nā te momo waro. "Ko ētahi waro, tae atu ki te waro mātotoru o Warwickshire, e āhei ana ki te wera māhorahora, ā, kua mōhiotia mai i te rau tau 17," tana kī. I kī a Dr Wade, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga: "I tētahi wāhi o Tiamana, hei tauira, he waro tino ōrite ki te waro o Warwickshire, he ahi i raro i te 300 tau." I kī te Mana Waro, he wāhanga o te Tari Pūngao me te Huringa Āhuarangi, he take hoki te rahi o te maunga, me Daw Mill e mahi ana i te maunga waro mātotoru rawa i te whenua. E 56 miriona tāhei waro e noho ana i Daw Mill, ka kī a Dr Wade ko te huarahi anake ki te rutu i te mura o nāianei ko te matekai i te hau. I kī te Mana Waro kia oti te mahi hou i roto i te rua wiki, ā, ka kite i ngā poka matua e rua e kī ana i te pākeho, whai muri i te puru uku. Kātahi ka tūmanakohia kia whakakapia a Daw Mill ki te raima i te mutunga o te tau - he nekehanga i kī ai a Dr Wade ka "whakamutua [ahi] i te wā kotahi, mō te katoa". E tohu ana hoki i te ūpoko whakamutunga mō tōku e pupuri ana i te pūkete UK hei whakaputa i te waro nui rawa i roto i te tau kotahi - e toru miriona tāna i te tau 2008, ko te tuatoru o te huaputa o te Waro o UK. Nuneaton MP Marcus Jones said he had held emergency meetings with The Coal Authority regarding the latest fire. I kī a ia kua whakapūmautia kāore i mōrearea ki ngā tāngata paetata, ki ngā āhuatanga rānei, nā te hōhonutanga o tōku - ētahi 700m (2,300ft).

title: Coronavirus: I hereheretia te tangata o Inverness mo te mare i nga kanohi o nga apiha
summary: E whā marama te tangata i mare i nga kanohi o nga pirihimana tokorua.
text: I mahia e Iain Lindsay, 48, mai i Inverness, te hara i te 15 o Āperira i waenganui i ngā māharahara haere tonu mō te horahanga o Covid-19. E whakapono ana ko ia te tangata tuatahi i Pākehā e hereheretia ana mo te whakamōrearea i te ora o nga pirihimana mā te mare ki a rātau. I kitea kāore a Lindsay me ngā āpiha i te whakapokenga. I puta mai a Lindsay, i whakaahuatia he herehere i Inverness, ki te aroaro o Sheriff Sara Matheson i te Kōti Sheriff o Inverness, ā, ka whakaae ki te whakaeke i ngā pirihimana tokorua mā te mare i o rātau kanohi ki te mōrearea o to rātau ora. I kī tana rōia wawao, a Kiriata Mann, e mōhio ana ia he ōrite ngā take e tārewa ana, engari ko tana kiritaki te tuatahi i Pākehā kia whiua. I rongo te kōti i hopukina a Lindsay e pā ana ki tētahi mahi whakapae i tōna kāinga. 'He pūoho nui me te mamae' I mauria ia ki te Teihana Pirihimana o Te Ara o Inverness kia "tāpuia" me te pātai auau, i a ia e haere tahi ana me ngā pirihimana tokorua. I rongo te kōti i te wā o te tukanga tāpuitanga, ka huri a Lindsay ki tētahi āpiha, a, kotahi te mare i tōna kanohi, i mua i te tahuritanga ki tētahi, ā, kotahi anō te mare i tōna kanohi. Ahakoa kāore a Lindsay i whakaatu i ētahi āhuatanga e pā ana ki te Covid-9, nā te mahi i puta ai ngā āpiha me ō rātou whānau i te "pūoho nui me te mamae". I kī a Tēnā Mann i haurangi tana kiritaki, nāna i whakaae ki tētahi rārangi roa o ngā whakapae o mua, engari ehara tēnei i te takunga, ā, he "whanonga kāore e whakaaetia".

title: Te Whare Taonga o Northampton ki te whakarite i te whakawhānuitanga i pūteatia e Sekhemka
summary: Kua tīmataria e tētahi kaunihera ngā whakaritenga ki te hoko whare e taea ai te whakawhānui i tētahi whare taonga, ahakoa ngaro te tūnga whakamanatanga o te wāhi i muri i te hokonga tautohetohe o tētahi whakapakoko.
text: I whiua te Kaunihera Borough o Northampton e te Kaunihera Toi o Ingarangi mo te hoko i tana whakapakoko pākeho Ihipiana Sekhemka mo te tata ki te £16m i a Hōngongoi. Ka whakamahia ētahi pūtea hei āwhina ki te whakawhānui i te Whare Taonga me te Taiwhanga Toi o Northampton. I kī te kaunihera mā tētahi whare nui ake e "āwhina ki te kawe mai i ētahi atu moni". I tērā marama i whakataua ai e te Kaunihera Toi o Ingarangi ko te hokonga o te whakapakoko 4,000 tau te pakeke i takahi i ngā paerewa kua whakamanatia mō te whakahaere a ngā whare taonga i ā rātou kohinga, ko te tikanga kua kore e taea te whiwhi i ngā pūtea toi me te pūtea. 'Kāore he whakahē' i kī te Kaiārahi Kaunihera a David Mackintosh: "Kei te tautohetohe tonu te tūnga whakamana, ā, kei te tono mātou i taua tukanga." Heoi anō, ko ngā mahere hei whakamahi moni mai i te hokonga o te whakapakoko hei whakawhānui i te whare taonga - mā te hoko i te paraka whare herehere me ngā paraka Huarahi Guildhall o te Hōro o te Takiwā - kua tautuhia kia haere tonu. Ko ngā whakaritenga a tērā wiki ko te whakaae ki te "utu tika" ki te kaunihera o te rohe, me te whiwhi i ngā utu takitahi, te kī a Tēnā Mackintosh. I kī a ia "kaore a ia i pouri" i te hokonga o Sekhemka. "Ki taku whakaaro koinei te whakakōkī mō te whakaae kia nui ngā mea me te whakapai ake," tana kī. "It's very difficult when you have to make these decisions, but I do think the money raised allows us to invest £8m in the museum service... nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau he pai mō te iwi o Northampton."

title: Coronavirus: Great North Run cancelled in 40th year
summary: Kua whakakorea te Great North Run nā te mate urutā coronavirus.
text: Neke atu i te 55,000 ngā kaiomaoma i whai wāhi ki te hāwhe omaoma i te 13 o Mahuru, i tōna tau 40. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere kāore rātau i māmā te whakataunga, ā, kua ngana ki te kimi huarahi ki te pupuri i te oma - mai i Newcastle ki South Shields - i a rātau e mātaki ana i te tawhiti pāpori. E āhei ana ngā kaioma ki te whakahoki moni, ka taea rānei te whakawhiti i tō rātou tāurunga ki tērā tau. Kua whakakorea hoki te Junior me te Mini Great North Run me te Great North 5km, e tū ana i te Rāhoroi i mua i te Great North Run. I whakaahuatia e Brendan Foster, te kaiwhakarewa o te rēhi, he "whakararuraru". Ka kī a ia: "I tēnei tau, i tautuhia to mātau 40 hei mea nui rawa atu, e 60,000 ngā tāurunga, ā, ko te takahanga nui rawa atu o Ingarangi. " He rā tino pouri tēnei ki a mātau, ā, kei te tino matekiri mātou, engari e mārama ana te katoa he aha i kore ai." Ko Hōne Burgin-Plews, nāna i kohi mano pauna mo te aroha i mua mā te oma i roto i te kākahu māwhero, tētahi o ērā e whai wāhi ana. I roto i tētahi tweet, ka kī a ia i "kōaro" a ia, engari i tino mārama ki te take i muri i te whakataunga. I kī a Paul Foster, te rangatira nui o te The Great Run Company: "Kāore anō mātou kia māmā te whakataunga. " Over the past few months we worked hard to try and find a way to stage the Great North Run while observing social distancing rules, and most importantly, not impacting on our local NHS. "Heoi anō, i te tūnga o ngā mea, ahakoa ka pai ake te āhuatanga, kāore e taea te whakatutuki i ēnei whāinga me te mōhiotanga, nā reira kua whakatauria e mātou ko te mahi tino pai ko te whakakore."

title: Ka taea e ngā atekōkiri rangatahi te anga atu ki ngā hōta hei tapahi i ngā pāpātanga aituā
summary: Ka taea e ngā atekōkiri rangatahi te anga atu ki tētahi rāhui rāhui hei wāhanga o ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga ki te ārai i ngā aituā me te whakaiti i ngā utu inihua "tiketike o te rangi".
text: Ka taea hoki te whakapau i a rātau tau ki te ako i mua i te whakamātautau. A, i muri i to rātau pahemotanga, ka taea te whakaroa atu i to rātau "wā whakamātautau", i reira e ono - kaua ko te 12 noa iho - ngā piro whiu e hua ana i te whakakorenga. Ko te rima o ngā aituā huarahi e mate ana, e pā ana rānei ki ngā atekōkiri i raro iho i te 24 tau. Neke atu i te £1,800 te utu inihua ā-tau toharite mō ngā kaiwhakamahi huarahi 17 ki te 18 tau. I kōrero ngā minita waka me ngā rangatira inihua i te Mane me pēhea te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga, me tētahi pepa kākāriki kāwanatanga katoa e whakahuahua ana i ngā ture ā muri ake ka whakaputaina ā muri ake nei i te kōanga. E whakaatu ana ngā tatauranga whaimana 'whakamataku' i te mōrea o ngā aituā i te pō, ā, i te hui, ka whakaarahia e te Association of British Insurers te āheinga o tētahi hōta mō ngā atekōkiri 17 ki te 24 te pakeke. Ko tētahi atu ariā i kōrerorerotia ko te whakawhāiti i te maha o ngā pāhihi ka taea e ngā taitamariki taraiwa te kawe i roto i tō rātou motokā me te tepenga waipiro kore. I tēnei wā ka taea e ngā atekōkiri te whakamātau i te 17 o ō rātou tau, engari kei te titiro ngā minita ki te waihanga i tētahi wā ako mōkito, tērā pea e ono marama, kotahi tau rānei, kia nui ake ai te wheako i runga i te huarahi. Ka taea hoki e ngā ākonga te tango akoranga i runga i ngā huanui, e rāhuitia ana i tēnei wā. I tēnei wā, ka taea te whakakore i ngā atekōkiri mātauranga hou i te huarahi mō te whakaemi i te ono - kaua ko te 12 - ngā piro whiu. Ka taea te whakaroa i tēnei "wā whakamātautau" mai i te rua ki te toru tau. Ā, ka taea e ngā whakamātautau taraiwa te huri kia nui ake te wā taraiwa kāore i te mātakitaki, e taea ai e ngā kaitirotiro te mātakitaki i ngā kaitono i roto i ngā taiao "māori" ake hei aromatawai i ō rātou pūkenga. I kī te Hēkeretari Waka a Patrick McLoughlin: "He whakamataku te rima o ngā tāngata i patua, i tino whara rānei i runga i o mātau huarahi i te tau 2011 i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga i reira kotahi neke atu rānei te pakeke o te atekōkiri e 17 ki te 24 te pakeke. " Nō reira ko te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga o ā mātou atekōkiri rangatahi he tino manakē, ā, e kore e whakaiti noa iho i ngā tūpāpaku, engari ko te tikanga hoki he whakaiti i ngā utu inihua tiketike e utua ana e rātau." I kī a Otto Thoresen, te tumuaki o te Association of British Insurers: "Kua roa mātou e whakahau ana mō ngā huringa ki te huarahi o nāianei ki te ako ki te taraiwa, he iti noa iho hei āwhina i te rangatahi kia noho haumaru, hei atekōkiri haumaru. " Ko te mea pouri, he nui ake te mōrearea o ngā atekōkiri rangatahi hou ki te tūtuki nui i runga i o tātau huarahi, e kitea ana i roto i te utu o tā rātou inihua motokā. E hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakarato ki te kite i ngā atekōkiri rangatahi hei atekōkiri haumaru, ā, ka nui ake te utu ōrau."

title: Weymouth Castle Cove Beach: Decision due on access path
summary: Ko tētahi one kua mahue mō te whā tau i muri i te pakarutanga o tōna pānaki me ngā hipanga i roto i te horo whenua, tērā pea ka tata ki te pōhiri anō i ngā manuhiri.
text: I katia te urunga ki Castle Cove Beach i Weymouth, Dorset, i runga i ngā āwangawanga haumaru i muri i te horo whenua i te tau 2013. A decision by the county council on whether to grant a public right of way to the beach is expected next month. I kī ngā hoa o te aroha o Castle Cove Beach he taumira "kua roa te tōmuri". I tono te rōpū kia whakawāteatia te ara hei tika o te ara i Whiringahora 2014. Heoi anō, i kīia kei roto te taupānga i tētahi tūtira, ā, kāore e taea te whakaaro tae noa ki te mutunga o te 2018, i te tōmua rānei o te 2019, nā reira i tuhituhi ai ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki te Kaitirotiro Whakarite. Kātahi ka uru atu te kāwanatanga, ka kī atu ki te kaunihera me whakatau i te 17 o Hōngongoi. Heoi anō, "nā ngā āhuatanga kaimahi tē mōhiotia" ka kī te kaunihera kāore i taea te whakarite pūrongo i te wā mō te komiti 13 o Hōngongoi, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia kōrerorerotia e te komiti ture i te 17 o Aotearoa. I tāpiritia kua whakamōhiotia te Kaitirotiro Whakarite. E tūmanako ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki te rīhi i te whenua e hiahiatia ana hei hanga anō i ngā kaupae, ā, ka noho haepapa mō tō rātou tiakitanga. The 15m (49ft) sloping footpath, which is on private land, was closed after large cracks appear and a section of steps at the bottom was taken away by Weymouth and Portland Borough Council.

title: Gardens at Delapre Abbey in Northamptonshire restored
summary: He wiki noa iho i te otinga o te mahi ki te whakatika i ngā pakitara pōhatu me ngā toka i te papa o tētahi whare wānanga 850 tau i Northampton.
text: E whā marama te whakaora i ngā māra o Delapre Abbey i London Road. E whai ana i te £40,000 o te mahi i runga i te māra wai o te pānga hei wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa e whakahaeretia ana e te Kaunihera o Te Rohe o Northampton me ngā Hoa o Delapre Abbey. The estate now offers a range of public events such as concerts and tours. Kua mahi ngā tauira Stonemasonry mai i te Kāreti o Moulton me ngā Hoa o Delapre Abbey (FODA) i ngā māra wai o waho mai i Oketopa i tērā tau. 'Plans for abbey' Dee Whitehouse, volunteer and member of FODA, said: "All of the volunteers have worked really hard on the outdoor gardens, as well as the repairs to the stone walling. " Neke atu i te 10,000 ngā pūrama i whakatōkia e ngā tūao i roto i ngā mutunga wiki e toru. E tino tūmanako ana mātou ki te kōanga." Since 2001, improvements carried out to the estate include a tea room, a Victorian greenhouse and garden restoration work. The works have been funded by the borough council, a range of grants and fundraising by FODA. Ināianei kei te tono te mahi ngātahi i muri i te abbey mō tētahi pūtea Tuku iho e £3.5m mō ētahi atu mahi pēnei i ngā whare taonga hou me tētahi pourewa pere. I kī a Mick Ford, te kaikaunihera o te rohe me te mema o te Poari Kaupapa mō te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho mō Delapre Abbey: "He nui ā mātou kaupapa mō te abbey. " I tērā tau he neke atu i te 18,000 ki te whare wānanga, ā, e rua anake ngā whare taonga - e hiahia ana mātou ki te kōrero i tēnā. E hiahia ana hoki mātou ki te kite i ngā whakapainga ki te pourewa karaka me te pounamu tuarua o Wikitōria."

title: Nick Clegg – Tūtatari mō ētahi atu tapahi
summary: Mēnā i whakaaro koe he kino nga tapahi, tūtatari mō ētahi atu rongo kino - £16bn o ngā tapahi kia tino tika.
text: Kātahi anō ka whakapuakina e Nick RobinsonKaiwhakatika tōrangapū Te Hēkeretari Matua o te Pūtea, a Danny Alexander, i te hui a Lib Dem ākuanei me tautuhi e te kāwanatanga "ngā mahere tauwhāiti mō ngā penapena e hiahiatia ana" i te tau 2015 - i muri iho, arā, ka mutu te whakapau moni o nāianei. Ko te mea i mahia e ngā Pāremata Liberali i tēnei wiki ko te whakarite i tō rātou tūnga whakarite ki ngā Tories mō te whakapau moni panuku - ā rātou raina whero mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki "ko wai e utu". Ko tā rātau e hiahia ana kia rongo ngā kaipōti, ka whakahē rātau i ngā tono Tory mō tētahi whakatio takuhe me te tapahi o te £10bn ki te tahua ora. Heoi anō, kia āta whakarongo, ā, ka rongo koe kāore rātou i te whakahaere i te whakamutu i te hononga i waenga i ngā pikinga takuhe me te utunga moni, i ētahi atu tapahi rānei i roto i te pire takuhe. Koinei te kōrero a Danny Alexander: "I te £220bn, ko te oranga ora te tuatoru o ngā whakapau tūmatanui katoa - ahakoa ā mātou whakahōu mamae kei te piki tonu. Me titiro tātau." Ko tana karere ki te Tories ka kōrerorerotia anake tēnei mēnā ka whiwhi whakaaetanga rātau ki ngā tāke teitei ake i runga i te hunga whai rawa. Ināianei e mārama ana te whakahē a Nick Clegg ki te huatau koia tērā te 10% o runga o te iwi whānui - ki tētahi atu kupu, ko ngā tāngata e whiwhi ana i te £50,000 i te tau. Tērā pea ka pouri a ia ki te tīwhiri i te Ao o Te Reo Irirangi 4 i Tētahi ka tirohia anō e ia ngā painga e haere ana ki ngā kaitiaki tino rangatira pēnei i te Whakaaetanga Hinu Hōtoke, ngā pahi koreutu me te raihana pouaka whakaata koreutu. Ehara i te mea miharo i kōrero a ia i te tīmatanga o tēnei Hui mō "ngā riu ki mua". PS: Ehara te whika £16bn i te mea hōu rawa mai i te mea i whakahuatia i roto i te Tauākī Ngahuru o tērā tau i te pānuitanga a te tumuaki me haere tonu ngā tapahi i tua atu i te pōti panuku. Heoi anō, i puta mai he mīharo ki a au.

title: Āwhā Callum: Ko te whakatūpato whakawhitiwhiti o te kāinga me ngā tāngata i whakaorangia i te tereina
summary: Kei te matohi whakawhitiwhiti tētahi kāinga, ā, kua whakaorangia ngā pāhihi i tētahi tereina i te tūtukitanga o te Āwhā o Callum ki Weera.
text: Kua tohutohutia ngā tangata o ngā kāinga e 29 i Te Taha Awa i Aberdulais, tata ki Neath, kia wehe i o rātau kāinga nā te tiketike o ngā taumata awa. I tukuna e te Tari Tūtaki he whakatūpato amipere mō te ua taumaha i te Paraire me te Hātarei mō te tonga o Wales, i te wā e whakatūpato ana te whenua katoa mō te hau. E hia mano ngā kāinga kāore he hiko, ka katia ngā huarahi, kua whakakorea ngā tereina. I karangatia ngā kaimahi ahi ki tētahi tereina e mau ana i roto i te waipuke i Penrhiwceiber, tata ki Mountain Ash, ā, tae atu ki te 30 ngā pāhihi i whakakorea mai i te tereina o Valley Lines. Ka whakakorea ngā tereina i waenganui i Kānata me Aberdare i te wā e anga ana ngā kaihoko ki te ngangau waka i te pō Paraire ki te kāinga. I mutu te rere o ngā tereina i waenganui i Swansea me Carmarthen i te 19:00 i te ahiahi o te Paraire nā te waipuke ākau e tūmanakohia ana. Kua katia te whakawhitinga M48 Severn tata ki Chepstow ki te rāwhiti, ā, ka katia ki ngā waka taha tiketike ki te hauauru. E tuwhera ana hoki te Arawhiti A55 Britannia tata ki Bangor ki ngā motokā me ngā vani anake, engari kua hikitia he tepenga tere 30 mph. I pā te hau ki te 72mph (116km) i Capel Curig i Conwy me te 15mm (0.6in) o te marangai e taka ana i roto i te toru haora tata ki Hato Rawiri. He maha hoki ngā whakatūpato waipuke i tukuna i te ahiahi o te Paraire, neke atu i te 30 anō ngā matohi waipuke. E ūkui ana ngā awa o Neath me Dulais ki Aberdulais i reira kua tīmata ngā whakaritenga ki te whakanuku i ngā tangata. Local councillor Doreen Jones said officials are hoping that river levels will stay where they are. I tētahi atu wāhi, i horaina e ngā Rauemi Māori o Uēra ngā papu hei whakatūpato i te takiwā o Carmarthenshire i te pikinga tonu o ngā taumata awa i te ahiahi o te Paraire. He pēhea te pānga o te kawenga? Kua tūtaki ngā kaihīkoi ki ngā raruraru nui i waenganui i Anglesey me te tuawhenua me te Arawhiti o Britannia i katia ki ngā waka katoa i tua atu i ngā motokā me ngā vans, ahakoa kua whakatuwheratia anō te A5025 Pentraeth Road tata ki Menai Bridge. Kua katia te huarahi A465 Heads of the Valleys i Hirwaun i Rhondda Cynon Taff nā te waipuke. I kī a Arriva Trains Wales he ratonga whakakapinga pahi mō ngā kaihoko mai i Llandudno Junction ki Blaenau Ffestiniog i Gwynedd, i waenganui i Machynlleth me Pwlleli, i Gwynedd hoki, i waenganui i Aberdare me Fernhill. Kua whakaputaina hoki he wātaka whakatika mo te Hātarei. Kua katia katoatia te A5114 Glanhwfa Road i Llangefni, A4215 i Defynnog i Powys me A4059 i Aberdare, Rhondda Cynon Taff. Kua katia hoki te A5 Eastbound mai i Bethesda ki Capel Curig nā te horo whenua, ā, kua kī ngā pirihimana ka kati tonu i te pō. Kua tohe nga Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys ki nga kaitaraiwa kia tiaki i nga huarahi ā-taiwhenua. E tūmanakohia ana kia tino whakararurarutia ngā whakawhitinga waka ki Airangi. Kua whakakorea e ngā Waka o Airani me te Raina Stena ngā whakawhitinga i waenganui i Uēra me Aiarangi i te Paraire. Me pēhea te waipuke me te motu hiko? E kī ana te Tuari Hiko ki te Uru e hia mano ngā kiritaki kāore he hiko, ko te nuinga o te wā nā te takanga o ngā peka me ngā raina tūkino otaota. I pāngia katoatia ngā āhuatanga i Neath Port Talbot, Carmarthenshire, Swansea, Anglesey, Pembrokeshire, Ceredigion, Newport me ngā wāhi o Whitchurch me Llanishen o Kārepa. I katia hoki te Kura o Bryngwran i Anglesey nā te kore hiko. E tūmanakohia ana kia waipuke te marangai taumaha i runga i te maha o ngā awa, tae atu ki te Towy i Carmarthen i reira kua katia te huarahi tahanga ināianei. Ināianei kua tukuna e Ngā Rauemi Māori o Uēra he maha ngā whakatūpato waipuke, e tohutohu ana i ngā tāngata kia mahi i te "mahi wawe". Volunteers have been building a 300m (984ft) sandbag 'wall' to help protect Grade I listed Gwydir Castle, near Llanrwst in the Conwy Valley, from flood damage. He aha te matapae? Ko te tino kino o te marangai e tūmanakohia ana kia noho ki ngā maunga anga ki te tonga, ki te tonga, me te 120mm ki te 160mm (4.7in ki te 6.3in) i matapaetia, e ai ki te Tari Tūtaki.
