Ko te whakatūpato kōwhai mō te hau e pā ana ki te whenua katoa, ā, ko te nuinga o Uēra e hipokina ana e tētahi whakatūpato kōwhai mō te marangai. Kua whakatūpatotia nga kaitaraiwa kia whakaritea mo nga āhuatanga taraiwa rawakore. Ko ngā whakatūpato kōwhai mō te hau me te marangai tae noa ki waenganui pō, engari ko te whakatūpato amipere mō te marangai puta noa i te tonga o Wales ka mutu tae noa ki te 18:00 i te Hātarei. E tūmanakohia ana kia iti iho te tere o te hau, engari tērā pea ka tautuhia te marangai tae noa ki te Rātapu, ka mātao ake, engari ka maroke i te pahemotanga o te āwhā. Ko te tikanga o ngā whakatūpato amipere:

title: He tere ake te haere o te motokā Bloodhound - ki te 562mph
summary: Kua piki ake anō te tere o te kaiomaoma whenua o Bloodhound, ka tae ki te 562mph (904km/h) i tana oma hou puta noa i te Koraha o Kalahari.
text: Nā Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent I tautuhia tōna tino pai o mua o te 501mph (806km/h) i tērā wiki, i muri iho i te motokā i pāngia ai ētahi hēnga hangarau. Engari i te Paraire, ka haere wawe atu a Bloodhound ki tōna ara maroke i te mātao o te pāmahana, ā, kāore i tino hā te hau. Koinei ngā āhuatanga e tino pai ana ki te oma tere. Mēnā he mahana rawa, ka roa te wā ki te tere ake o te mīhini waka rererangi Eurofighter a Bloodhound, ā, ka puta mai i te aroaro o te hau mārō ētahi whakahaere tinihanga mō te atekōkiri, te kaihautū o RAF, a Andy Green. Ko te nuinga o ēnei take e rua e karohia ana mā te oma i muri noa iho i te haeata - ā, i kitea i te Paraire. I muri i te whakairinga i te 562mph, ka whakahokia e te tīma o Ingarangi a Bloodhound ki tōna tēneti hangarau i te tapa o Hakskeen Pan ki te tātari i ngā raraunga mahinga. Kua whakarākaitia te motokā ki ngā pūoko e tāhopu ana i tōna whanonga i a ia e karanga ana puta noa i te mata keke paru. Ka aromatawai ngā kaipūkaha i te hauora o te waka i mua i te hokinga atu ki te parai. Kua kitea e ngā whakamātautau tere rawa i te rohe o Awherika ki te Raki o Awherika ki te Raki te whakanui ake i te tere o te 50mph. Ka tohu tēnei hōtaka hipanga-ki-te-hipanga ināianei ki te oma panuku e ngana ana ki te haere ki tua atu i te 600mph (965km/h). Engari ka whakamātauria anake tēnei e te tīma mēnā kua makona kua rite a Bloodhound, ā, he haumaru ngā herenga. E whitu anake ngā waka i roto i te hītori o te pūkete tere whenua kua oma i runga ake i te 600mph: Sonic 1, Blue Flame, Thrust2, Budweiser Rocket, Sonic Arrow, Aussie Invader III; me Thrust SSC, nāna i tautuhi te tino pai o te ao o nāianei o te 763mph (1,228km/h) i te tau 1997. I tae te tīma ki Hakskeen Pan i te waenganui o Whiringahora. Kua whakawāteatia te moenga o te roto i te 16,000 tāhei kōhatu hei whakaputa i te eke tino māeneene mō Bloodhound. I mahia tēnei mahi herculean e ngā tāngata paetata e tūmanako ana ka noho te parai hei tānga ā muri ake nei mō ētahi atu kaitere, nā reira ka āwhina i te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Kua whakamihi a Wing Commander Green i te angitu o te iwi whānui o Mier i ngā wiki tata nei. "Ka whāki ahau i te mea kotahi i tino māharahara ai ahau i roto i ngā tau e 10 kua hipa atu nei, mēnā i kōwhiria e mātau te koraha tika - nā te mea kāore anō kia mahia e te iwi i konei," tana kī atu ki a BBC News. "Kāore anō tētahi tangata kia whakamātau ki te whakawātea i ēnei kōhatu maha mai i te mata mā te ringa, ki te kōeke rānei i tētahi huarahi e rere ana puta noa i te parai kia rongo ai kāore i reira. " When Bloodhound achieves its world land speed record - so much of the credit is going to the local community and the Northern Cape government for having that belief and creating this amazing race track." Mai i te katoa o te tīma Bloodhound, ko te karere ngāwari kotahi ko te 'baie dankie!' Tēnā koe!" Tērā pea he wiki anō te whakamātautau a Bloodhound i Hakskeen Pan i mua i te hokinga ki te kāinga ki Ingarangi. Kāore e tū tētahi whakamātau i te pūkete tere whenua mō te 12, 18 marama rānei, ā, ka hiahiatia he mīhini tākirirangi kia whakaurua ki te motokā i tua atu i tōna pūkaha Rolls-Royce Eurofighter. Ko tērā atu hiahia ko te pūtea. Ka hoki anake mai te motokā ki Awherika ki te Tonga mehemea he nui te moni mo tēnei kaupapa tūmataiti.

title: Ka pēhi a HRW i ngā Kurds Kōrihi ki te whakakore i te kotinga wahine
summary: Kua karangatia e Human Rights Watch ngā mana i te rohe motuhake o Kurdistan ki te whakakore i te mahi kotinga wahine, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko te taihemahema wahine (FGM).
text: Nā Hēmi MuirBBC News, i kī tētahi pūrongo i tukuna e te rōpū i te Wenerei i te Rā te Wenerei, ā, he pānga kino ki te hauora ā-tinana, ā-hinengaro hoki o te tokomaha o nga wāhine. I karangatia e ia te Kāwanatanga ā Rohe o Kurdistan (KRG) kia whakaritea he ture hei whakakore i te mahi ki ngā kōtiro, ki ngā wāhine pakeke rānei kāore i te whakaaetia. I karangatia hoki e ia ki te KRG kia whakarewa i tētahi whakahau mōhiotanga tūmatanui mō ōna hua whakakino, mōrearea hoki. Kāore i te mōhiotia te kotinga wahine i ērā atu o Iraki, ā, kāore i te mārama he aha te take i pakiaka ai i Te Kurdistan o Iraki, he iwi tino tūturu, ā, i te nuinga o te wā. Kaore he take motuhake i roto i te Islam, ahakoa kua pōhiritia e ētahi kaitohutohu i Kurdistan nā te mea e whakapono ana rātau e whakararuraru ana i ngā hiahia tōkai i roto i ngā kōtiro me ngā wāhine. Kāore he tatauranga whānui, engari he maha ngā uiuinga o nā tata nei kua whakaaturia he tino whānui. Kotahi te uiuinga i mahia i te tōmua o tērā tau e te Manatu Motika Tangata a te KRG i huatau ai ko te 40% o ngā kōtiro me ngā taitama kua pā ki te hātepe i te takiwā o Chamchamal, i waenganui i Kirkuk me Sulaimaniya. Ko tētahi akoranga tōmua a te NGO Tiamana-Iraki o Wadi i tētahi wāhi whānui i waenganui i Irbil, Sulaimaniya me Kirkuk i puta mai he whika toharite teitei ake i te 70%. I te nuinga o te wā ka mahia te tapahi e ngā tāngata kāore i te mātauranga i roto i ngā āhuatanga hauora. Ko ngā kōtiro, i te nuinga o te wā e mauria ana e ngā whanaunga wahine, kāore i te mōhio ki ngā mea e tūpono ana. I huaina e Human Rights Watch tana pūrongo: "I tangohia ahau e rātau, a, kāore he mea i kōrero mai ki a au." E kī ana ko te mahinga "kāore he take rongoā, ā, ka puta pea ki ngā hua nui o te tinana, ā-hinengaro hoki". I te tau 2007, i horahia e te Manatu Ture a te KRG tētahi whakahau kia hopukina, kia whiua hoki ngā tohunga o FGM, engari i kī te Human Rights Watch kāore he whakaaturanga i whakarongohia. I runga anō tētahi ture hukihuki e whakakore ana i te mahi i runga i ngā pukapuka tikanga o te pāremata ā rohe o Kurdistan e rua tau ki mua, engari ko tērā, me tētahi whakahau mōhiotanga tūmatanui i whakaritea, te āhua nei kua rēreti ki te warewaretanga. "Kua tae ki te wā mō te kāwanatanga ā rohe o Kurdistan ki te mahi raima hei whakakore i tēnei mahi kino nā te mea kāore e haere atu i a ia anō," te kī a Nadya Kēlife, nāna i rangahau, i tuhi hoki i te pūrongo HRW. "He take matatini te FGM, engari he mārama tōna tūkinotanga ki ngā kōtiro me ngā wāhine." "Mā te haepapa i Te Kāwanatanga o Te Rohe e hiahiatia ana he ārahi kaha, he whakatapua hoki i te wāhi o te kāwanatanga ā rohe, tae atu ki tētahi karere mārama e kore te FGM e whakaaetia ināianei."

title: Cornwall Wildlife Trust to buy two nature sites
summary: E rua ngā "pae hira" mō te āhua o te ao i te uru o Cornwall ka hokona e Cornwall Wildlife Trust.
text: I whakarewaina e te rōpū he tono tūmatanui kia hokona a Bostraze Bog, tata ki St Just, me Bartinney Downs tata ki Sancreed kia noho tonu ai rātau hei rāhui kararehe. I whakarewaina e te whakawhirinaki tētahi tono i a Hōngongoi kia kohi i te £20,000 kia ōrite ki te pūtea Tuku Iho. The trust said it had now raised £28,000 which means both sites would become nature reserves. I whakaahuatia a Bostraze Bog hei "tētahi o ngā wāhi kararehe tino hira i te uru o Penwith". Ka hokona e te rōpū te 58 eka (23 heketea) o tēnei pae, ā, ka whakahokia ki tētahi wāhi noho e kī ana i ngā momo āhua kore pēnei i te rā rau porowhita, te kōtiro whero iti me te ruru pārekareka. Ka hokona hoki e te whakawhirinaki e 26 eka (10 heketea) o Bartinney Downs, i te taha o te Caer Bran Nature Reserve. I kī a Callum Deveney, te upoko o ngā rāhui māori i Cornwall Wildlife Trust: "He rongo tino mātauranga te whakawhiwhinga o tēnei pūtea Pūtea Tuku iho i te mea he tino hira ēnei pae me ō rātou kararehe. " E whakaatu ana te tono a te whakawhirinaki i te tokomaha o ētahi atu e whakamihi ana i tēnei wāhi motuhake o Cornwall. We would like to thank everyone who donated and can't wait to get started on the project and encourage others to join in and help us."

title: Brexit: Tērā pea ka hiahiatia e ngā nekehanga whare ki NI te whakapuakitanga tikanga
summary: Ināianei e hiahiatia ana e ngā tāngata e neke ana i te whare mai i GB ki Aiarangi ki te Raki, i ētahi āhuatanga, he whakapuakitanga tikanga mō ā rātou taonga.
text: Nā John CampbellBBC News NI Economics & Business Editor Ko te hua o te rohe hou o te Moana o Airana. E hiahiatia ana he whakapuakitanga tikanga mēnā kei te whakamahi koe i tētahi kamupene tangohanga. Mēnā kei te neke whaiaro koe i ō taonga, hei tauira i roto i tō motokā, kāore e hiahiatia he whakapuakitanga. Kei te whakaū tonu a Aiarangi ki te Raki i ngā ture tikanga EU i ōna tauranga. Ko te hua tēnei o tana mahi tauwhāiti o Te Aotearoa, e mōhiotia ana ko te Kawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ko te tikanga he tukanga hou mō te kawe mai i ngā taonga ki Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i ērā atu o te UK. I whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga he tohutohu mo nga nekehanga whare i te Paraire. E kī ana mēnā kei te whakamahi koe i tētahi kamupene tangohanga, i tētahi atu rānei ki te neke i ō taonga, me rēhita rātou mō te Ratonga Nekehanga Waka Taonga (GVMS). Ko te pūnaha IT e whakaputa ana i te whakaaetanga mō ngā taonga kia neke puta noa i te Moana o Airana. E huatau ana hoki ngā tohutohu kia waitohu ngā kamupene tango ki te Ratonga Tautoko Kaihokohoko (TSS). He pūnaha koreutu te TSS ka taea te whakamahi hei whakaoti i te whakapuakitanga tikanga. Kāore he tukanga hōu mō ngā tāngata e neke ana mai i Aiarangi ki te Raki ki GB. Ko ngā whika whaimana hōu rawa, mai i te NI Statistics and Research Agency, e hua ana e 11,400 ngā tāngata i neke ki te noho i Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i tētahi atu wāhi o UK i te tau ki June 2019.

title: Ka hokona ngā whakakai taimana mō te pūkete o te ao e $57.4m
summary: Kua hokona he whakakai taimana takirua i te hokonga i Hiniwa mo te utu pakaru pūkete o te $57.4m (£44.4m).
text: Ko nga taonga āhua pea, e karangatia ana ko Apollo rāua ko Artemis, e tata ana ki te 16 karamu ia. He tino ōrite ngā kōhatu harakore i maina i Awherika ki te Tonga, hāunga tō rātou kara - he māwhero a Artemis, he kikorangi a Apollo. I kī te rangatira kaihoko o Te Aotearoa, a Rawiri Bennet, he tino āhua kore rawa ngā taimana tae. "He pōhatu tino ātaahua ēnei, engari he tino mīharo ēnei," tana kī. Ko ngā mowhiti taringa utu nui rawa o te ao? Ka tautuhia e te taimana Whetū Māwhero he pūkete hou o te ao i hokona e tētahi kaihoko ingoamuna, e kī ana ngā pūrongo pāpāho, engari ka puritia hei takirua. He rerekē a Apollo rāua ko Artemis i tētahi wāhi tino nui - a rāua ake utu. I hokona a Apollo mō te $42.1m i te wā i haere a Artemis mō te $15.3m. He onge ake te kikorangi mārama o Aporo - mai i te maina o Cullinan i Awherika ki te Tonga - nō reira he nui ake te wāriu i te māwhero māwhero o Artemis. E kī ana a Imogen Foulkes o TE AO i Hiniwa ko ngā whakakai ngā whetū o te hokonga taonga o te kōanga o Hiniwa, ā, i te tuatahi ka tukuna motuhake e Te Wānanga o Hiniwa, i muri i to rātau whakaaro hē he āhua kore noa iho pea te kaihoko me ngā mea e rua i ngā taimana. Engari i hokona nga whakakai i raro iho i a rātau utu whakaaro e $70m.

title: Neke atu i te 220,000 ngā rewa hou - UN
summary: E kī ana te UN, neke atu i te 220,000 ngā tāngata i rewa i te whawhai o mua tata nei i waenganui i ngā ope kāwanatanga me te hunga whakakeke Taika Tamila.
text: "Kua hōhonu te papā i reira i te wā e noho ana ngā whatu katoa ki Repanona. I tēnei rā, e 37,5 miriona tāra i hiahiatia hei whakatutuki i ngā hiahiatanga o ngā tāngata rerenga hou e 220,000 i Sri Lanka," te kī a te Kairuruku Āwhina Ohorere o UN Jan Egeland i te Rāite. I te kōrero a Egeland i Niu Ioka ki te pānui i tētahi hui e haere mai ana ki Repanona. I puta mai te mahere hohenga i puta mai ana kōrero i te tīma whenua o te Komiti Tū o te Wānanga (IASC) i Sri Lanka i tētahi mahere hohenga i te Rāitema hei whakangāwari i ngā mahi āwhina whawhai i te raki me te rāwhiti o te whenua. Ko te IASC he wānanga ā-kōwhiringa mō te whakaritenga, te whanaketanga kaupapahere me te whakatau whakatau e pā ana ki ngā hoa atawhai matua o te UN me ngā hoa atawhai kāore i te UN. "Tērā tētahi hiahia kōhukihuki mō te whakaora me te tiaki i te mokowā whakahaere atawhai kia pai ai te āheitanga kia taea ai te tuku ratonga me te aroturuki i ngā hōtaka āwhina," te kī a Pūkenga Pūkenga, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o te Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA) i Hiniwa i te whakarewatanga. Ko te mahi āwhina i kī ai te rōpū whakahaere kia mahia te mahi āwhina i raro i te Mahere Hohenga Atawhai Pūnoa (CHAP) kua whakaritea mō te wā o Mahuru-Hakihea 2006 e kī ana a IASC. "Nā te papā auau i hua ai te pakarutanga o ngā hanganga whānau me ngā kupenga haumaru pāpori. Kua whārōrōtia ngā tikanga whakahaere me te manahau ki ō rātou tepe, e whakaatu ana i ngā tangata ki te whakararuraru tino nui," te kī a tētahi tauākī IASC i te Wenerei. I kī te rōpū i te mutunga o Aotearoa 2006, kua ara te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i rewa i te raki me te rāwhiti o Sri Lanka ki te 217,457, ā, e 9,203 anō ngā tāngata e rapu rerenga ana i Īnia. I tēnei wā, ka kī a Egeland e kore e whakaaetia kāore te kāwanatanga i whakamārama e pā ana ki te kawenga o ngā kaimahi atawhai e 17 i te 5 o Aotearoa, ā, kāore e taea te haere tonu te āwhina atawhai, engari rawa mēnā ka whakaaetia ngā tāngata e haepapa ana ki aua mahi.

title: Ka tīmata te mahi i te māra hōhipera o Salisbury i tapaina ki a Horatio Chapple
summary: Kua tīmata te mahi i tētahi kāri hou i te Hōhipera Takiwā o Salisbury, i tapaina hei pūmahara ki tētahi tama kura o Wiltshire i patua e tētahi pea pākākā i tērā tau.
text: I mate a Horatio Chapple, 17, mai i Bishopstone, i muri i tana whakaekenga i tētahi haerenga i Nōwei i Aotearoa. Ko te wāhi whakaora e £150,000 mō ngā tūroro i te Pokapū Rongoā Tuaiwi o te hōhipera o Duke of Cornwall. I hiahia a Tāne Chapple ki te ako rongoā, ā, i tūao ia i te pokapū i reira tōna pāpā he tākuta tohutohu. I muri i tana matenga, ka whakatūria e ōna mātua he pūtea whakamaharatanga hei painga ki te tono māra o te pokapū. I kī te kaihoahoa o Cleve West ka tukuna e "Horatio's Garden" he "wāhi pāpori ātaahua me tētahi wāhi e mawhiti ai i ngā mahi o ia rā o te oranga hōhipera". Ka whakaaturia he pōhatu whakamaharatanga ki a Tēnā Chapple i roto i te māra. Ko te pāpā o te taiohi, ko Rawiri, he kaitiaki o te Southern Spinal Injuries Trust, te aroha nāna i ārahi te kohi moni mō te kaupapa. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana a ia ka noho te kāri hei "wāhi ātaahua me te rangimārie e noho tahi ai ngā tūroro, o rātau whānau me ō rātou hoa, i muri i tēnei whara tino whakararuraru". I tāpiri mai a ia i "hari" a ia ki te hoahoa i tūmanako ai ia ka waihanga i tētahi tawhito ki tana tama, ā, ka "whakarerekētia ki ētahi atu mōna." E tūmanakohia ana ka oti te mahi i runga i te kāri a te raumati.

title: I muri i ngā Paralympics: Kua rerekē tētahi mea mō te hunga hauā?
summary: E toru marama i muri mai i ngā Pararaiha me ngā āhuatanga tōrunga ki te hunga hauā, kāore anō kia ngaro atu, e huatau ana tētahi uiuinga. Engari he pēhea te nui o te whakarerekētanga o ngā Kēmu, ā, he rite tonu te whakaaro o te hunga hauā?
text: Nā Damon RoseBBC News He mea hira tonu te tawhito o ngā Paralympics 2012. E mōhio ana te katoa e hiahiatia ana he pana whakamutunga kia tae ai te hunga hauā ki te ōritetanga katoa i te UK me ngā tāngata hauā. He ngāwari noa iho te kimi kōrero mai i ngā tāngata hauā e whakaatu ana i te āhua o te oranga o ia rā e tāpae tonu ana ki a rātou. He māngere tauhira nga whare haumaru. E mahara ana te kairangitaki hauā a Lisa Egan ki te haere ki tētahi whare paku āheitanga e tū ai koe, ā, kāore i te whāiti te tipu kia tae ki te kaipupuri pepa wharepaku. "Ehara i te pūtaiao tākirirangi te whakaaro me tae te tangata hauā i runga i te whare paku ki te pepa wharepaku me te kore e tū ake." Kātahi i tētahi hākari he whare haumaru, he waewae waewae tō te totohu hei whakahaere i ngā paipa. Ehara i te nui o te whakamahinga ki te maha o ngā kaiwhakamahi tūruhi. Ka peitatia e aua kōrero he pikitia o tētahi ao e uaua ai te ora o te hunga hauā. "Taraiwa ki raro i tētahi Tiriti Tiketike i te whenua mēnā he tangata kaha koe, ā, tirohia mō tētahi wā poto noa iho mai i te tirohanga a te tangata hauā," e kī ana te rōia hauā a John Horan e tohunga ana ki ngā take e pā ana ki te Ture Ōrite. "Tatauria te maha o ngā hipanga o ia toa mai i te tiriti. E whakaū ana ahau ka haere tonu koe ki runga, ki raro rānei i roto i ngā toa e toru ki te whakarato i tētahi ārai ki ngā kaiwhakamahi tūru tūruhi." Ko tētahi wāhanga nui o te huringa e hiahiatia ana e te hunga hauā e pā ana ki te āhuatanga. Ko te tikanga o te āhuatanga ka whakaae te kaitukumahi ki ngā kararehe āwhina i te wāhi mahi mō ngā tāngata i runga i te tūāwhiorangi pūkenga nā te pānga whakamārire, whakamākū rānei mō tō rātou rangatira. Ahakoa ētahi ture pai i roto i ngā tau e whā kua taha, kāore tonu te hunga hauā i te tino kitea i roto i te oranga tūmatanui, ā, ko te 50% anake o ngā tāngata hauā o te pakeke mahi, ā, e hiahia ana ki te mahi, kei te mahi. I runga i tēnei āhuatanga, he tūmanako kia whakapataritari te huringa. Ko te hiahia ki te mātakitaki i ngā Paralympics i tino teitei ake i te tangata i tūmanakohia me ngā whika mātakitaki pouaka whakaata me ngā wāhi Kēmu kua hokona. I te hui whakamutunga i te 9 o Mahuru, ka kī a Ariki Coe: "I tēnei whenua e kore rawa tātau e whakaaro ki te tākaro i te āhua kotahi, ā, e kore rawa mātou e whakaaro ki te hauātanga i te āhua kotahi." E tohu ana tētahi poipoi BBC i whakahaeretia e ComRes puta noa i ngā wiki e toru kua hipa e 79% o ngā tāngata hauā e whakapono ana kua rerekē ngā āhuatanga ki ngā tāngata hauā mai i ngā Kēmu Paralympic. I kitea e te kaiwhakangahau o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga tētahi nekehanga āhuatanga i runga i te Twitter i te wā o te whakatuwheratanga o te Paralympics. Mō te ngahau, ka whakamāramatia e ia he "tino pai te āhua" o nga kaitākaro para, ā, ka whakamōhiotia tōna ake hashtag #paralympicperving. I uru mai te iwi ki tana kōrero. "I to rātau kitenga i tāku i mahi ai, ka tīmata ngā tāngata kaha ki te tweeting mai ki a au mehemea ka whakaaetia rātau ki te kōrero mō te āhua ōkiko pērā. Kāore tētahi tangata i te titiro ki te hauātanga i te mutunga o te pō e titiro noa ana rātau ko ēhea whenua ngā kaitākaro tino wera." Kotahi maero te tawhiti atu o tēnei tirohanga tūmatanui i ngā tohutoro tūturu ki ngā Pararaihana he "rite tonu ki a koe me ahau" rānei e te pāpāho matua. E ngana ana rātau ki te tika i te whakahaerenga ki ngā Kēmu. I whakaaturia e te poipoi hōu o TE HAU/ComRes e 75% o ngā tāngata hauā i kī he pai ake tō rātou whakaaro mō te tūranga o ngā tāngata hauā i roto i te iwi o UK mai i ngā Kēmu Paralympic. I kitea e te uiuinga e 76% o ngā tāngata hauā i whakaae, e hua ana he ōrite te whakaawe o ngā Pararaiha ki te hunga hauā. He tino rerekē tēnei i ngā hua o tētahi poipoi ipurangi Scope/ComRes i whakahaeretia i te tau i mua i ngā Kēmu Paralympic, nāna i whakaaro ko te tuarima o ngā tāngata hauā i whakaaro ai nā ngā Pararaiha rātau i rongo ai i te karaehe tuarua. I takea tēnei poipoi i runga anō i tētahi tauira iti iho i te poipoi o TE WĀ, ā, i whakaurua ngā mātua me ngā kaitiaki o te hunga hauā. I pātai mai mēnā kua rerekē te āhua o te iwi whānui mai i ngā kēmu, i kitea e te poipoi o TE AO e 79% o ngā tāngata hauā-kore i whakaae. Engari ko te 65% anake o ngā tāngata hauā i whakaae ki te kaupapa - e whakaatu ana i te whakawhirinaki iti iho ki te hunga whai wheako whaiaro ki te āhua e inetia ana. Kāore a Franklin i te ohorere. E kī ana a ia ko ngā tāngata hauā pēnei i a ia kei te whiwhi i ngā āhuatanga, ā, he rerekē te kite i a rātou. "Kāore e taea e mātou te tango atu i ngā mea e haere ana ki ngā tapahi me te āhuatanga ohaoha," e kī ana a ia, e pā ana ki ngā Aromatawai Āheinga Mahi i whakatūria tuatahitia i te tau 2008 e te kāwanatanga Mahi, ā, ināianei ka whakahaeretia mō te tauwhāinga a Atos, e karangatia ai ngā tāngata hauā mō tētahi whakamātautau takitahi o tō rātou kaha ki te hoki, ki te tīmata rānei i te mahi. E whakaaro ana a Franklin ko te āhuatanga o te Paralympic me ngā painga e "tūhono ana" i roto i ngā hinengaro o te hunga hauā i te UK. I haere te kaiwhakahauhau ki ngā Pararaiha i Stratford, ā, ka whakataurite i te aura o ngā Kēmu me te pono o te oranga o ia rā. "I tino kaha te mahi a te iwi ki te whakaahei i te pāka me ōna takahanga. Kua ngāwari kē atu te haere i ngā mea, ā, kua rite ngā kaihanga kēmu ki te āwhina me te menemene i runga i o rātau kanohi. Kātahi mātou ka hoki ki te rangirua e mōhio ai mātou ehara i te tino pērā." I tōna hokinga mai i ngā Kēmu, e whā ngā tīkiti kāore i whakaae ki te tiki i a Franklin, engari ko tētahi atekōkiri tīkiti tuarima, nāna i kite i tēnei mahi, ka whakapāha mutunga kore mō te mea i pā ki a ia. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te noho i roto i taua ao mirumiru Paralympic mīharo," te kī a Franklin. "I whakaaturia e mātou he whenua ka taea e mātou te āhua rerekē ehara i te urunga ā-tinana me te urutaunga anake, engari ko te āhua e tauwhiti ai te tangata me te mahi i a rātou anō." E kī ana a Rārangi Hawkes, mai i te Whānuitanga, kia kaua e tuhia te rākeitanga Paralympics. "Me hanga tātau i runga i te nekehanga. Me pātai tātou he aha atu anō ka taea e tātau hei whakanui ake i te kitenga o te hunga hauā i roto i te pāpāho, i ngā tōrangapū, i ngā toi, i runga ake i ngā mea katoa i ia rā." He wawe rawa pea te pātai mō te tawhito ināianei. I Whiringa o Whiringahora, ka āta tohu atu a Paralympian Wheua Tanni Grey-Thompson ki tētahi inenga tūturu o te āhuatanga. "Ina kite mātou i ngā whika hara kino o tērā tau, ka pai ake tā mātou tirohanga mēnā he huringa tūturu, he wā poto rānei," tana kī. Ka taea e koe te whai i te Pukapuka i Twitter me Facebook

title: I karangatia e te karere UK ki Initonīhia mō te tūkinotanga o te kōro
summary: Kua karangatia e Initonīhia te karere o Ingarangi i muri i te rere o tētahi kaipuke e whakahaeretia ana e tētahi kamupene o Ingarangi i runga i te ākau ākau, nā reira i tino tūkinotia ai.
text: I te 4 o Poutāpeta, ka tūtuki te Rangi Caledonian 4,290 tana ki ngā ākau i tētahi motu i Kāri Ampat, i te takiwā o Papua, i te tai iti. He rongonui te rohe ki te rāwhiti mō tōna tipua tipua, ā, i mauria e te poti ngā tūruhi ki tētahi haerenga mātakitaki manu. Ko nga tāngata o te rohe, e whakawhirinaki ana ki te ruku me te tāpoi taiao, i tūkinotia e te tūkinotanga o te ākau tūturu. "I whānau mai ahau i konei, i roimata ahau i taku kitenga i tēnei tūkinotanga," te kī a Ruben Sauyai ki te HAU. I kino kē atu te tūkinotanga i ngā ngana rahua ki te huti i te kaipuke ki waho o te wheo mā te poti kume, me te kore tatari ki te tai nui. I muri i te karangatanga ki tētahi hui me te Minita Whakariterite o Initonīhia mō ngā Take Moana, a Luhut Panjaitan, ka kī te karere o UK o Moazzam Hai he "kōrero tino pai" tāna, ā, i "pouri ki te ako mō te tūkinotanga o tēnei ākau kōaro i Papua ki te Uru, pērā i a mātau ki ngā mahi taiao e pā ana ki Initonīhia, ki tētahi atu wāhi rānei o te ao". I tāpiri mai a ia: "E tūmanako ana mātou ka tere te whakatau i te take i waenganui i ngā mana o Initonīhia me te kamupene e whakahaere ana i tēnei aituā, ā, i te whakahaere i te kaipuke." I whakaahuatia e ngā tohutūmahi o Noble Caledonia he mahi "whakararuraru", ā, i kī te kamupene i "tino ū ki te pare i te taiao". Ko te kaipuke tonu e whakaritea ana e tētahi kamupene Huitene, ā, i whakaahuatia he "kāore i pakaru" e Noble Caledonia, i mua i tana rere atu ki Piripīni, ki te riri o ētahi mana o Initonīhia. I kī tētahi arotakenga whaimana o mua i tērā wiki i pakaru te mahi tata ki te 1,600sq m (17,220sq ft) o te kōraro. Tērā te whakapouri i Initonīhia, ā, kua huatau mai ngā mana ā rohe ka anga atu te kāpene ki ngā whakapae hara.

title: Te tūtukitanga o te waka rererangi o Glasgow: I tangohia te rererangi i te pāparapara
summary: Kua tangohia e nga kaiwhakaora tētahi hepa i tūtuki ki tētahi pāparapara arokē o Glasgow, e iwa neke atu rānei ngā tāngata.
text: I te 22:25 i te Paraire, i heke iho ai te pakarutanga o te rererangi o Pirihimana Pākehā i te 22:25 i te Paraire. Ināianei kei te haere te rapunga katoa o te pāpara. Kua tangohia te tinana o te iwa o nga tūpāpaku. Kua kī ngā pirihimana kāore e taea e rātau te whakahaere i te kimi tinana anō. I mate nga kaimahi hepa e toru i taua mahi, tae atu ki ngā tāngata tokoono i roto i te pāpara. Tokorima ngā tūpāpaku kua whakaingoatia. I muri i te mahinga o te ata Mane, ka tūtohu te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Pirihitini: "Kua tangohia haumaru te hepaopao e āhei ai ā mātou kaimahi rapu taone me ngā kaimahi whakaora ki te rapu tonu i te whare." I muri tata iho e rua nga waka tūroro tūmataiti, i arahina e nga kaieke Pirihimana o Pākehā, ka mahue i te tirohanga o te aituā. I hangaia e nga kaiwhakaora tae atu ki nga kaipatu ahi, nga kaimahi waka tūroro me nga pirihimana he kaitiaki hōnore i te haerenga o nga waka. I kī te Pirihimana Tuarua o Pirihitini, a Rose Fitzpatrick, kua tangohia te tinana o te iwa o te tangata i te tirohanga, ā, ka mauria ki te Hōhipera Nui o te Tonga o te taone hei tāutunga tika. I kī a ia, i te wā e tika ana ka nekehia te pakaru o te waka rererangi ki te whare o Te Tūhuratanga Aituā o Brach "mō te whakamātautau taipitopito". 'Tukanga māuiui' I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mā tēnei ināianei ka taea e mātou, mā te mahi tahi me ngā hoa mahi mai i te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Pirihitini, ki te haere tonu i te mahi rapu me te whakaora i roto i te pae, ki te whakaae kua whakaorangia ngā tūpāpaku katoa o te pō Paraire." I kī te Tuarua Rangatira Kātipa Fitzpatrick he "uaua, he matatini" tonu te mahi, ā, ko tētahi "tukanga māuiui" e "haere ana ki te rapu me te tiaki hoki i te tirohanga". I whakaae hoki a ia ki te uaua o tēnei i runga i ngā whānau o ngā tāngata e whakaarotia ana kua mate i roto i te aituā. I mua ake, ka kōrero te pāpā o tētahi tangata ngaro, a Mark O'Prey, ki te AO mō tōna āwangawanga i te wā e mahi ana te mahi. I kī a Īna O'Prey: "I whakaaro ahau mehemea i pai ake ta rātau whakamātau i te pō Hātarei, i whakaaro ahau tērā pea ka taea e rātau te whakaputa i a rātau i mua atu i a rātou, engari ki taku whakaaro he nui ake te māharahara ki tēnei hepaopao." E pā ana ki tēnei me ētahi atu āwangawanga whānau, ka kī te Rangatira Tuarua o Te Kāhui Matua o Fitzpatrick: "Ko te rangirua mō ngā whānau o te hunga kua mate kei mua i o mātau hinengaro. " It remains our absolute priority to give clarity to those affected as soon as we are able." I mua ake, ka kī atu te Minita Tuarua Tuatahi o Pākehā, a Nicola Sturgeon, ki ngā kaipatu ahi o Pākehā e mahi ana i runga i te tere, i te haumaru hoki e taea ana. "E mōhio ana ahau kua whakaahuatia tēnei e te hunga i te taha tūhura aituā hau o tēnei ko tētahi o ngā pae tino matatini kua mahi rātou," tana kī. "He mea nui kia tangohia te hepaoro i runga i te tikanga e tiaki ana i te rangatiratanga o ngā tūpāpaku i roto i te pāpara, engari i te tuarua kāore e whakamana i ngā mōrea koretake ki ngā tāngata e mahi ana i tēnei mahi. " E mārama ana ahau ki te pōrearea me te mamae mō ngā tāngata e tatari ana ki ngā rongo." E rua o ngā tūpāpaku e ono i roto i te pāpara, kua tapaina ko Samuel McGhee, 56, o Glasgow, me Gary Arthur, 48 tau, mai i Paisley, Renfrewshire. Ko ngā kaimahi hepa tūpāpaku e toru ko David Traill, 51, me ngā Kātipa Pirihimana o Kirsty Nelis, 36, me Toni Collins, 43. I whakaūngia e te kaiwhakahaere rongoā o NHS Greater Glasgow me Clyde, a Dr Jennifer Armstrong, o ngā tāngata e 32 i whara i te tūtukitanga, e 12 e noho ana i te hōhipera. E waru ngā tūroro e rongoatia ana i Glasgow Royal Infirmary, ā, kotahi te tūroro kei te Whare Hauauru o te taone. E rua anō ngā tūroro kua whakawhitia ki te National Queen Elizabeth Spinal Injuries Unit i te Hōhipera Whānui ki te Tonga, ka riro te katoa o ngā tūroro i taua wae ki te toru. Kua whakaūngia ka ārahi tonu a Pirihimana Pākehā i te tūhuratanga ki te tūtukitanga. I kī te Komihana Pirihimana Motuhake me te Komihana Arotake mō Pākehā kua whai kōrero ki te Tari Karauna me te ratonga pirihimana, ā, ka arotakea tonutia te āhuatanga. Kua tonoa e ngā āpiha e whakahaere ana i te tūhuratanga kia īmēra atu ki ngā whakarākeitanga o taua mahi ki: glasgowhelicopterincident@scotland.pnn.police.uk Ko tētahi tūhuratanga motuhake ki te take o te tūtukitanga e arahina ana e te Peka Tūhura Aituā Rangi (AAIB). Kei te āwhinatia tōna tīma e ngā tohunga mai i Eurocopter, nāna i hanga te rererangi EC135 T2. I whakaūngia e te Mana Pirihimana o Pirihitini (SPA) ka whakahaere tonu a Pirihimana Pākehā i tētahi hepa hei tautoko i ngā mahi. Ko te rererangi i hinga i whakahaeretia e Bond Helicopters, ā, i kī te SPA kua kirimana te umanga kia haere tonu te whakarato i te ratonga. I te wā e haere tonu ana ngā takoha ki te hunga mate me te whara, ka kī a Papa Whāwhānui e inoi ana a ia mo nga tūpāpaku me o rātau whānau. Ko te karere aroha a te Pāpā, i tukuna mā tana karere ki te UK, ko Papal Nuncio Archbishop Antonio Mennini, e pānui ana: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te tuku atu ki a koe, hei Pīhopa Nui o Glasgow, te tata o te Matua Tapu me taku aroha tino pono i ēnei wā uaua. " E whakaū ana ahau ki a koe i aku inoi mo te hunga kua ngaro kino, kua whara rānei, tae atu ki o rātau whanaunga." I roto i te taone, ka haere tonu ngā mahi ki te āwhina i ngā mōrehu me te hunga pouri. I kī te Kaunihera Taone o Glasgow kua whakaritea he tikanga hei whakarato āwhina pūtea ki ngā tūpāpaku o taua mahi. Ka whakawāteatia ngā moni aroha e whakahaeretia ana e te kaunihera hei tautoko i te tangata e anga ana ki te uauatanga nā te tūkinotanga - tae atu ki ngā tūpāpaku me ngā whānau o te hunga i ngaro i a rātou. I kī te kaunihera kua whakapā kē atu ki ētahi o te hunga e pāngia ana e te mahi - ā, ka pānuitia ētahi atu taipitopito me pēhea te whakawāteatanga o te āwhina. Kua kī hoki te kaitapere o Hōne McCredie, e tino mōhiotia ana mō tana mahi i roto i te whakaari pouaka whakaata o Taggart, e whakaaro ana ia ki te whakarite i tētahi konohete hei kohi moni mō ngā tūpāpaku me ō rātou whānau. Tata ki te 120 ngā tāngata e whakarongo ana ki ngā pūoro ora i te tūtukitanga o te hepaopao, i te Tiriti o Stockwell i te taha o te Awa o Clyde. Ka pāohotia tētahi pakipūmeka o TE Pākehā, The Crash That Shook Scotland, i te 22:35 GMT i te Mane.

title: Ka tīmata te tukurua kirihou takaware Covid i Somerset
summary: Me tīmata ngā kohinga tukurua o ngā kōhua kirihou me ngā tāpu i Somerset mai i Whiringahora, i muri i te takawaretanga e te mate urutā.
text: I tēnei wā, ko ngā pounamu kirihou anake e kohia ana hei kōhua me ngā paepae kai rite, he uaua ake te tukurua. I te tuatahi ka whai a Somerset Waste Partnership ki te whakarewa i te 'Recycle More' i June, me te Mendips hei tranche tuatahi. Ka taka hoki ngā kohinga ipu pango ki te toru wiki i te mea ka whakaaetia ētahi atu tūemi hei tukurua. I kī te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere, a Mickey Green: "I whakamātauria e mātou i te ono tau ki mua, ā, e 86% o ngā tāngata i whakaae i taua wā. " Ko te nuinga o te iwi e hiahia ana kia haere tonu, kaua e hoki ki tōna āhua i tēnei wā. "Ināianei e 20 ngā wāhi huri noa i te whenua e mahi ana i tēnei." I kōrero a Tēnā Kākāriki mō te whakaititanga o ngā kohinga ipu pango, ka kī a Tēnā Kākāriki: "He tautoko tā mātou mō te hunga whai tamariki iti i roto i ngā nūpepa, i ngā hiahia rongoā motuhake rānei." Ka whiwhi ngā kāinga i tētahi pēke kikorangi taumaha mō ngā mea tukurua hou, arā ko ngā pouaka miraka me ngā pouaka wai, ngā tūemi hiko iti me ngā pāteri o te whare. Kei te whakawāteatia te kaupapa mai i Whiringahora, tīmata ki te rohe Mendips, ā, kua whakaritea kia oti i te Huitanguru 2022. "What we've done is try to compress it so it finishes at the same time as it would have done if Covid had never happened," added Mr Green. The partnership has also said the Covid-19 delays have cost local councils at least £2m which it hopes will be reimbursed by central government. A final decision on the timetable will be made by councillors on the Waste Board on 31 July. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Somerset Waste Partnership

title: Te ope Pōngia o Eagle Owls nāna i tiaki a Exeter
summary: Nā tētahi kitenga tūpono i roto i tētahi urupa i whānui ake ai te mōhiotanga ki te āwhina a ngā kairererangi Pōrana i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao.
text: Nā Honatana Mohi, i kitea e Michael Parrott tētahi tohu rākau ki te 307 Squadron i tētahi kokonga kāore i whakamahia o tētahi whare karakia i te Urupā Tiketike o Exeter i te tau 2012. Nā tērā i hura ai te tūranga o te ope taua pō, e kīa nei ko te Eagle Owls, i tākaro ki te tiaki i te taone i ngā whakaekenga a te Whāriki. I te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao i Hōngongoi 1940 ka uru atu ngā kaihautū rererangi Pōngia tuatahi ki ngā Matua RAF. E 145 ngā rererangi Pōngia i whawhai i te Pakanga o Ingarangi, e 126 ngā rererangi Tiamana i whakangaromia e te 303 Pōngia Fighter Squadron - ko te nuinga o ngā patu o tētahi matua i te Pakanga o Ingarangi, e 29 ngā kaihautū Pōngia i mate i te Pakanga o Ingarangi. E 1,903 ngā kaimahi o te Ope Rererangi Pōngia i mate i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao "He mema ahau no ngā Hoa o te Urupa Tiketike, ā, i te rapu ahau i te hītori o te whare karakia i reira i taku tūtukitanga ki tēnei tohu," te kī a Tēnā Parrott. "Kāore au i mōhio ki tētahi mea mō te matua 307 i taua wā. " I mōhio ahau he kairererangi Pōngia i tanumia ki reira, engari i miharo tonu ahau he aha, ā, kua pōro hukarere mai i reira." I waenganui i Aperira 1941 me Aperira 1943 i noho te matua ki RAF Clyst Honiton, ināianei ko Exeter Airport, e tiaki ana i te Tonga ki te Hauauru o Ingarangi mai i ngā pomu pō a te hoariri. Ko te matua, he mema anō ētahi atu iwi tae atu ki ngā Pirihitini, ngā Taikarowākia me ngā Āwherika ki te Tonga, i rere i ngā waka rererangi Defiants, Beaufighters, me Mosquito. I Mei 1942 i te wā i whakaekea e 40 ngā pomu Junkers-88 a Exeter, e whā anake ngā Pōrana 307 Squadron Beaufighters e wātea ana hei tiaki i te taone. Ahakoa te nui rawa atu o te tokomaha, ka taea e te matua te kopere e whā o ngā pomu Tiamana i mua i te whakataka i a rātau pomu. I kī a Tēnā Parrott: "Ko te hua i tino nui ai te whanaungatanga i waenganui i te taone me te matua. " I te 15 o Whiringa o Whiringa 1942 ka whakawhiwhia e te 307 Squadron ki te taone o Exeter te haki Pōrana." I whakatakotoria e te kaiārahi matua o Jan Michałowski te haki ki te Koromatua o Exeter i taua wā, a Rowland Glave-Saunders, e kī ana: "Me whakamahara (te iwi o Exeter) ā muri ake nei ina mutu te pakanga... i tētahi wā i ora, i whawhai, i mate hoki ngā Pou me ngā Devonians mō te take kotahi." I mahue i te matua a RAF Clyst Honiton i Aperira 1943, ā, ka neke ki te tonga o Uēra i mua i te neke ki ētahi atu tauwāhi i te UK, tae atu ki a RAF Predannack i Cornwall. E 21 nga kairererangi i ngaro i te wā o te pakanga, ā, e 19 o rātau e tanumia ana ki Higher Cemetery i Exeter. I roto i ngā tau ka ngaro te haki i te Guildhall o Exeter, ā, i manaakitia he haki Pōrana hou i te tau 2012, i te huritau 70 o te hui haki taketake. Ia 15 o Whiringa ā-Rangi i Exeter ināianei ko te 307 Squadron Day, ā, kua tohua te takahanga ki tētahi whakaaturanga i te Guildhall i whakaritea e Mr Parrott me ētahi atu mema o te 307 Squadron Project. Ko Tadeusz Wijaszko, i roto i te matua hei kaiwhakahaere hihiani, i roto i te Ope Rererangi o Pōrana, ā, i whakawāteatia ki Ruānia i muri i te hinganga o Pōrana ki nga Tiamana. I mawhiti a ia i te whakaraupapatanga, a, ka haere ki Marseilles, a, ka uru ki te Ope Rererangi o Wīwī. I muri i te hinganga o Wīwī ka whakakorea ia mai i Cherbourg ki Ingarangi, i reira ka uru atu ia ki te ope Pōrana i te 25 o ona tau. I muri i te pakanga, pērā i ētahi atu hōia Pōrana, ka mārena a ia, ka noho ki taua rohe i muri i te māramatanga kei raro a Uropi ki te rāwhiti i raro i te mana o Rōpūria. I whakatūria he puni noho puta noa i te UK hei whakanoho i ngā Pou me o rātau whānau. Ko ētahi i noho tuwhera tonu mō ngā tekau tau. Ko te mea whakamutunga, ko Ilford Park i Devon, kei te tuwhera tonu, ā, kei te whakahaeretia tonutia e te Ministry of Defence, hei kāinga ināianei mō ngā Pou pakeke e tata ana ki te 100. I mate a Tēnā Wijaszko i ngā tau maha ki mua, engari i kī tana tama ko Toni Wijaszko, e noho tonu ana i Exeter, he "tino whakakake" a ia ki tōna pāpā, i waimarie ki te mawhiti i Pōrana. "I whakaekea e nga Tiamana tētahi papa rererangi i noho ai ia, ā, ka kumea e tētahi hōia he pū ki runga i a ia, a, ka hē." Ko te whakaaturanga, For Your Freedom and Ours, kei Exeter Guildhall i te Rāhoroi me te Rātapu.

title: I kōrero te wahine me pēhea te peia atu o te tāne 'pononga' i te kāinga
summary: Kua kī tētahi wahine i tangohia tana tāne i to rātau kāinga e tētahi tangata i mahi ai ia i mua i te korerotanga ki a ia: "Kua whakarerea koe ināianei".
text: I mārena a Christina Anderson ki a James Keith, e whakapae ana i mamae ia i te ringa o ngā mema o te whānau McPhee. Kua rongo tētahi whakamātautau i te mārenatanga o te whaea tokotoru i a Tēnā Keith e whā wiki noa iho i muri i to rātau tūtakitanga i te tau 1999. Tokowhā ngā tāngata e whakakāhore ana i te tapeke o ngā utu e 30 - e hāngai ana i waenganui i te 1992 me te 2016 - tae atu ki te kahungatanga me te tutu. I kōrero a Miss Anderson, e 49, ki te Kōti Tiketike i Glasgow James McPhee i muri iho ka puta mai i to rātau tatau. Ka kī atu a ia ki a ia kia kī atu "hākinakina" ki tana tāne, ka kī a ia. 'Mā i te wehi' I te whakaaturanga a ia i te whakawātanga o Hemi McPhee, 45, Robert McPhee, 65, Whīni McPhee, 37, me John Miller, 38. I tūtaki tuatahi a Miss Anderson ki a Tēnā Keith i te putanga mai o rāua ko tōna tuakana ko John Anderson i tōna kāinga i June 1999. I mahi rāua tahi mō ngā mema o te whānau McPhee. I whakapae rātau i mua i te kōti i patua rātau, i puritia, a, i ētahi wā ka rere atu i a rātau. I rongo te kōti i te mutunga o te tau 1999 ka puta ake a Hemi McPhee i waho o te kāinga o te mārena hou i Paisley, i Renfrewshire e hamama ana: "Keith, Keith". Ka mahara a Ms Etaka: "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i a ia (tana tāne) e tino mā ana i roto i tōna oranga... mā i te mataku." Kātahi ka haere mai a Tēnā McPhee ki roto i te whare. Ka haere tonu te kaiwhakaatu: "I kī atu a ia ki a Hemi Keith kia neke, e haere tahi ana ia me rātou, kia takatū. " He āhua riri a ia (Mr McPhee). "I kī atu a Hemi Keith ki a ia e hari ana ia, e noho ana, ā, kāore i pīrangi ki te haere." I kī atu a Ms Etaka ki te whakapae ko Tēnā Keith tana tāne. I tāpiri mai a ia: "I kī mai a ia mai i tēnei wā kua whakarerea ahau." I aroturukitia ki Rānōna, ka maharatia e Ms Etaka te tangohanga atu o Tēnā Keith i roto i tētahi van. I kī a ia ka kite anō ia i tana tāne i taua wā i tana oma atu i muri iho, a, ka haere rātau ki Aotearoa. Engari i aroturukitia rātau, a, ka mutu ki tētahi wāhi wīra i Bathgate, West Lothian. I muri iho ka noho te tokorua - kua whakarerea ināianei - i Rāwāhi, engari e kiia ana ko Hemi McPhee i kite tuarua i a rāua. Ko tana whakapā whakamutunga ki te McPhees i tana wehenga atu i tētahi pae i Larkhall, Lanarkshire, me ana tamariki. Ka haere tonu te whakawā, i mua i a Lady Stacey.

title: Pōti waenganui o Amerika: He aha te tūnga?
summary: Ka hangaia e te pōti waenganui o Amerika ngā tōrangapū o Amerika mō ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei, ki tua atu rānei.
text: Kāore a Perehitini Donald Trump i te pōti anō, nā reira he iti ake ngā kaipōti e tūmanakohia ana kia huri. Engari ko tōna kaha ki te whakahaere i roto i ngā tau whakamutunga e rua o tana wā tuatahi, ka whakawhirinaki ki te putanga o te 6 o Whiringa ā Rangi. Ko wai kei runga i te pōti? Ko ngā mema katoa e 435 o te Whare Māngai, e 35 ngā tūru i te Senate mema 100 me te 36 i roto i ngā kāwana kāwanatanga e 50, tae atu ki ngā tari kāwanatanga maha, ā-rohe hoki. I tēnei wā e mau ana te Pākehā i roto i ngā ruma e rua o te Rōpū Nui me te Whare Mā. Engari he kōrero pōkākā i waenganui i ngā Pāremata o tētahi "ngaru kikorangi". Na te tini o ngā kaipānui o te Pākehā e haere ana i tēnei tau, ka whai wāhi tika te rōpū iti ki te tango i te Whare. E hiahiatia ana e ngā Pāremata kia 20 neke atu rānei ngā tūru hei whakahaere i te ruma o raro. Engari i te Senate, ka tūtohutia te Pākehā kia pupuri i to rātau nuinga, ā, tērā pea ka whakatōpūtia. Nā te mea i roto i ngā tūru o te ruma o runga mō te hopu i tēnei ngahuru, e 26 e puritia ana e ngā Pāremata (tae atu ki ngā takitahi e rua e pōti ana ki a rātou) me te iwa noa iho e te Pākehā. Tērā pea me toa ngā Pāremata i aua iwi katoa me te tiki i ngā tūru o te Pākehā e rua, he iti noa iho te tawhē mō te hapa. Tekau o ngā tūru Manapori kei ngā kāwanatanga i kawea e Te Tūruhi i te tau 2016 - ā, e rima o ērā i toa ai ia i ngā mati taurua. Ko ngā take kia hari ai te rōpū o te perehitini kua ngaro i te toharite o ngā tūru e 32 i te Whare, e rua i te Senate i ia pōti waenganui mai i te Pakanga Tūmatanui o Amerika. He hītori hoki a Perehitini Trump, e ai ki te panekōrero whakaaro. I te mea he pūtake ohaoha kaha ki te hoatu i te ihu toto o te 'Trumpism', kei waho ngā kaiwhakataetae Manapori i te kohi moni me te pōti i te ope o ngā kaihoko o te Pākehā. He nui ngā pūmanawa hou. E hua ana ngā whakaaturanga kōrero he tokomaha ake ngā wāhine e oma ana mō te tari i mua, ko te nuinga o te taha mauī, ā, i ētahi iwi kei raro iho i te 30 ngā kaitono Manapori katoa. Ko ngā mea e hiahia ana koe ki te mōhio mō ngā wā waenganui: Ko ngā take kia hari ai te pōti waenganui, he pakeke ake, he nui ake hoki te tūponotanga. Āe, he iti te whakatauranga whakaaetanga a te Puhi, engari kāore he kaipupuri paerewa mārama o te rōpū Manapori, ā, e kitea whānuitia ana he urunga kore mai i te hinganga ohorere o Hillary Kikorangi i te tau 2016. I runga i ngā mea katoa, kei te haruru te āhua o te āhua o te US pēnei i te mīhini waka rererangi i te mōrahi o te tōkeke mōrahi, me ngā pāpātanga kore mahi i raro i te toka, te nui o te maia kiritaki me te piki tonu o ngā utu. He aha ngā take pātene wera o runga? E tūmanako ana kia rongo i te nui o te āhua o tēnei pōti he taupānga ki te Puhi. Ko ngā mātāmua o tēnei raumati - ina whakawahia e te rōpū pono o rātau kaitono mo te pōtitanga o Whiringa ā Rangi - ka noho hei tautohetohe i te taha matau i waenganui i te whakatūnga me ngā tohutohu ārai - i te taha mauī, i waenganui i ngā mātāmua pūkenga e karanga ana ki te whakapaetanga a Te Puhi me ngā pūkenga hāngai. Ka noho tonu te nekeneke hei pōhatu ahurea e tūmanako ana ngā rōpū matua e rua ka tākaro ki tō rātou painga. E whakapono ana ngā Pāremata ki te kōrero mārō a te perehitini i runga i te kaupapa ka āwhina i a rātau ki te whakawai i ngā kaipōti taitamariki, i ngā kaipōti i te taha kotahi me te iti. E whakawhirinaki ana te Pākehā ki te tūnga uaua o Te Puhi ki te huri i ngā tohutohu e whakaaro ana he nui ake te māharahara o ngā Pāremata ki ngā tauiwi ture kore mana i ngā tangata whenua o Amerika. Ko te nekehanga mana pū i whakarewaina i muri i te tākarotanga o te kura tuarua o Hui tanguru i Parkland, Pārera, e nekeneke ana hoki mo te pōti. Ināianei, i kitea e tētahi poipoi Gallup o nā tata nei ko te tino āwangawanga mō ngā kaipōti o Amerika ko te rongoā. Ahakoa te whakawhiti i ngā tikanga maha hei whakaiti i te Ture Tiaki Utu Ōrau, kāore i taea e te Pākehā te whakamate i a Tērā. Ka whiua e ngā kaipōti te rōpū hiko mo te pikinga o ngā utu inihua rongoā, ā, kei raro i te Tūruhi e pā tonu ana ki ngā Kaiāwhina i roto i te pēke. He aha te tikanga o ngā wā waenganui mō te Puhi? Ki te ngaro te mana o te Pākehā i tētahi ruma o te Rōpū Nui, ka mate te rārangi take o te perehitini i te taenga atu ki Capitol Hill. Ki te toa a Democrats i te Whare, ka whakatau rātau ko ēhea pire e haere mai ana ki te papa, ā, ka whakahaeretia e rātau nga manukura o te komiti. Mā tēnā e whai i ngā tūhuratanga tirotiro whakatuki o te whakahaeretanga a te perehitini, tae atu ki te whakapae i te whakakotahitanga o Rūhia, ngā mahi pakihi a Te Puhi me ngā whakaaro tūkino ki a ia. Engari ki te mau tonu te Pākehā ki te Senate, ka whakaae tonu rātau ki ngā tautapa kāpata a Te Pāpāho, ā, ka whakatūria he kaiwhakawā tūturu ki ngā rūma o Amerika. Mēnā ka pai te mahi a Democrats i ngā wā waenganui, tērā pea ka mahi ki te manakohanga o te Puhi. Ka taea e ia te pine te whakapae ki a rātau mo te mātiti o te kāwanatanga, ā, tērā pea ka mōrearea rātau ki te whakatangi i to rātau ringa. Me pēhea ngā whakataetae kāwana? He nui te mana o ngā kāwana ki ngā tōrangapū i roto i ō rātou pūmatua kāwanatanga - me ngā oranga o ō rātou wahanga. I tēnei wā, e whakahaere ana te Pākehā i te 33 i roto i te 50 o ngā whare kāwana me te rua tuatoru o ngā ruma rōpū kāwanatanga e 99. Engari o ngā kāwana kāwanatanga e 36 i runga i te pōti i tēnei tau, e 23 e tiakina ana e ngā kaingākau o te Pākehā, he ūnga whakamīharo mō ngā Pāremata. I waenganui i ngā whakawhiwhinga kāwana ko ngā tūnga tārere perehitini o Ohaio, Mīhini, Pārera me Pennsylvania. I te wā e oma ana a Trump mo te pōtitanga anō i te tau 2020, ka tākaro ngā kāwana i tētahi tūranga nui ki te nekeneke i ngā kaituku, ngā kaihoko me ngā kaiwhaiwhai. Ko ēhea ngā wā waenganui o nā tata nei he kaihuri kēmu? I te tau 1994 ka whakahaeretia e te rōpū Pākehā te Whare me te Senate, e tautuhi ana i te wāhanga mo te ono tau o ngā pakanga ki te Perehitini Manapori o Pire Kikorangi. I tangohia anō e nga Pāremata ngā ruma e rua i te tau 2006, e āhei ai a Perehitini Pakihi ki te whakaoti i ngā wāhanga o tana rārangi take i tana toa i te tari e rua tau i muri iho. I toa anō te Whare o Te Pākehā i te tau 2010, e whakawhāiti ana i te kaha o Te Pākehā ki te whakahaere. I te tau 2014, ka whiwhi anō te Pākehā i te mana o te Senate, ā, ka whakarewaina te nuinga o to rātau Whare ki tōna nui rawa mai i te tau 1929.

title: Ko te kāinga o Llansanffraid kia hoki mai te 't' ki tōna ingoa
summary: Na te haupae e waru tau i runga i te takikupu o tētahi kāinga o Powys i whakahoki ai te kaunihera i te "t" i tōna ingoa.
text: I tātakina a Llansanffraid-ym-Mechain ko Llansantffraid mai i ngā tau 1800 tae noa ki te wā i whakatakahia e te kaunihera o Powys te "t" i te tau 2008, e kī ana kei te whakatika i tētahi hē. I pōhiritia e Montgomeryshire MP Glyn Davies te whakataunga, ā, i kī "kua kaha te whakaaro noa". I whakataua e te kaiwhakahaere kāpata o te kaunihera i te Tūrei ka hoki te "t" ki te ingoa o te kāinga. I whakarerekētia tuatahitia e te kaunihera o Powys te takikupu i te mea i hē i te waenganui o te rau tau 1800 i te wā i whakaahuatia hētia ia e Llansantffraid - i tapaina ki te wahine Celtic Saint Brigit - he tangata. Na te whakataka i te "t" mai i te ingoa i kitea tika ai he wahine a ia, e kī ana te mana. Na te whakataunga i whakaoho he haupae i te kāinga, ā, e rua tau i muri iho, neke atu i te 70 ngā kōinga i whakaae i roto i tētahi uiuinga kia whakahokia te "t", e toru anake e ātete ana. Ka kī a Tēnā Davies: "Tata tonu ki ngā tangata katoa i kōrero ahau ki te whakahoki anō i te t."

title: Ko ngā ture ārai whakahāwea i tukuna e te Pāremata o Pākehā
summary: Ko ngā ture hou hei rutu i te mauahara whakapono me te tautohetohe e pā ana ki te whutupōro kua paahitia e te Pāremata o Pirihitini, ahakoa te kore tautoko ātete.
text: E whai ana te Ture hōu ki te rutu i te take me ngā whakaritenga whare herehere tae atu ki te rima tau mō te whanonga e pā ana ki te raruraru tūmatanui i roto, huri noa i ngā ōritenga. Engari i kī a Labour, te Tories, Lib Dems me ngā Greens o Pirihitini i "whakawāteatia" te pire e te SNP. I kī rātau he "ture kino tērā e nui ake ai te kino i te pai". Ahakoa te ātetetanga, ko te nuinga o te Whanonga Whakahāwea a te kāwanatanga SNP i te Whutupōro me te Pire Whakawhitiwhiti Whakawehi i puta e 64 ngā pōti ki te 57. Ko te ture, kua toa i te pūrua mai i ngā pirihimana me ngā rōia, e whai ana ki te tāpae i te whanonga tūkino, ahakoa kei te mātakitaki ngā kaihautū i ngā ōritenga i roto i tētahi papa tākaro, i te pāpara, i te kōrero tuihono rānei. Nō mua atu, tata ki te 20 ngā kaitautoko whutupōro e mau ana i ngā hāte e mau ana i te peha "ehara i te hunga hara" i aukatia i te ruma o Holyrood i muri i te kōrero a ngā rangatira pāremata ki a rātau ka whakaaetia anake ki roto mēnā ka tangohia e rātau. Ka waihangatia e te ture e rua ngā hara hou e pā ana ki te whanonga e whakaarotia ana he "whakaoho i te whakapono, i te iwi, i ētahi atu momo mauahara rānei". I kī te Minita Haumaru Hapori a Roseanna Cunningham i pai a ia ka wawe te ture hei ture. Ka kī a ia: "Ka tukuna e tēnei pire tētahi karere hira mō te momo Pākehā e hiahia ana mātou ki te noho, nā te mea kāore he wā o te nuinga o ngā tāngata i tēnei whenua mō te momo whakahāwea hinengaro kua āpiti atu ki te iti noa iho e tūkino anake, e tukituki ana i tā mātou kēmu ātaahua - te hunga rānei e hokohoko ana i te mauahara mā te noho i muri i tētahi mata rorohiko e whakairi ana i ngā tuma tūkino i runga i te ipurangi. " Ko te rau tau 21 tēnei, ā, kāore e whakaaetia tēnei momo whanonga, nā reira me mahia he mahi. "Ko te putanga o ēnei ture hou hira e tuku ana i tētahi karere kaha ki te hunga whakahāwea e kore tēnei whanonga e whakaaetia i roto i tētahi Pākehā o nāianei." I tāpiri mai a Ms Cunningham: "He nui ngā taupatupatu i ngā marama tata nei mō tēnei ture, engari kua whakarongo mātou, kua mahi mātou, ā, kei muri tonu ngā tohunga. " Kua whakaaturia e Pākehā te toa o ōna whakaponotanga, ā, kua mahia e ia te mahi e hiahiatia ana." I kawea mai te pire i muri i ngā mahi maha e pā ana ki te whutupōro, tae atu ki te raruraru i ngā kēmu Rangers me Celtic. I whakaputaina e ngā rōpū ātete e whā i Holyrood me MSP takitahi a Margo MacDonald tētahi kōrero tōtahi. E kī ana: "E whakatau ana ngā mema o ngā rōpū tōrangapū katoa ki te ūkui i te tūkinotanga o te whakawhitiwhiti i te iwi o Pākehā. " He tino ātetetanga tērā te wāhanga tuatahi o te ture i tukuna e tēnei pāremata hou kua whakawāteatia e te SNP. "Kua whakamahia e te SNP tōna nuinga ki te whakahau i te ture kino e nui ake ai te kino i te pai. Ka tautuhia e ia he tauira mōrearea mo tēnei pāremata." I tāpiritia e te tauākī ātete: "Kua rahua te SNP ki te whakarite i te take mo te ture i te pāremata, i waho hoki - me ngā kaihautū whutupōro, ngā rōpū whakapono, ngā rōpū ārai whakawhitiwhiti, ngā aroha tamariki, te Rōpū Ture, te Komihana Motika Tangata, te Pānga Kaiwhakatika o Pirihitini. " E whakapono ana mātou he urupare pai ake ko te arotahi ki te mātauranga me te rangatahi, e mahi tahi ana me ngā hāhi me ngā mana whutupōro i runga i ngā tikanga tōrunga, māia, ā-whakaaturanga e rutu ana i ngā take pakiaka o te whakawhitiwhiti me te taupānga pakari o ngā ture tīariari." I kī a Dave Scott, ko te kaiwhakahaere whakahau o te rōpū pēhanga ārai ārai o Nil By Mouth: "Kua whakarerekētia e te taupatupatu i tēnei pire ngā rōpū tōrangapū, engari ināianei kua noho hei ture, ā, ko te wā anake e mōhio ai he pēhea te pai me te whakaū. " Heoi anō, ka tawhiti atu te whakawhitiwhiti i tua atu i te whutupōro me te facebook."

title: Ka toa a Ivanka Trump i ngā moko mō ngā hua i Haina
summary: Kua toa a Ivanka Trump i ētahi moko hou mō ana hua i Haina, e ai ki ngā tuhinga whaimana.
text: Ko ngā hua i rēhitatia e Ivanka Trump Marks LLC ko ngā kaukau, ngā pueru me ngā paraikete pēpi. Na te wā i puta ai ngā whakaaro o ngā papā tūpono i roto i te whānau o te Puhi. I tukuna ngā moko i te wiki i mua i te hurihanga a tōna pāpā, a Perehitini Donald Trump, i tētahi ārai kaweake a AMERIKA ki te umanga hangarau o Haina ZTE. Heoi anō, ka kī atu ngā tohunga ture ki te AO ko te wā i whakaaetia ai ngā moko, he hāngai whānui ki te wawaenga. I puta mai nga whakaaetanga i te wā o te nui ake o te tautohetohe hokohoko i waenganui i a Mātau me Haina. E ngana ana rātau ki te ārai i tētahi pakanga hokohoko hāngai i muri i te whakapakari i ngā utu ki ngā taonga a tētahi i ngā marama tata nei. I muri i te whakakorenga a te US i ngā kamupene o Amerika kia kaua e hoko wāhanga ki ZTE i muri i tana whakaaetanga ki te tuku i ngā tukunga ture ki Irana me Kōrea ki te Raki. I hoatu e Tēnā Puhi he whakatārewatanga ki a ZTE i tērā wiki e kī ana kei te mahi a Mātau i tētahi "mahi hokohoko nui ake" ki Haina. Ahakoa kāore i whakapae i tētahi hē, ka kī te rōpū whakahau Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics (Crew) i Washington "ehara i te wā tuatahi i whakaarahia ai e ngā tūhononga pakihi a Tōnā me Perehitini Trump ki Haina ngā take matatika tūpono". I kī a Crew kua tukuna kētia ki a Ms Ivanka, he kaitohutohu ki tōna pāpā, neke atu i te kotahi tekau ngā moko i Haina, ā, he maha ngā taupānga tārewa. I kī atu tētahi rōia ki te BBC ko te wā toharite mō ngā moko kia tukuna ki Haina ko te 12-18 marama. I mahia ngā taupānga i Poutāpeta i tērā tau. "Engari e noho ana i roto i ngā ūnga hōu i tautuhia e te Tari Moko Hainamana," te kī a Jill Ge, te pāhono matua i te Āhuatanga Hinengaro i Clifford Chance i Shanghai. Mai i tana nohonga hei perehitini i te tau 2016, kua whakahē ngā hononga tata o Tēnā Puhi ki ngā umanga a tōna whānau, engari i whakakāhore tonu a ia i tētahi papā o te painga. I haere mai a ia i raro i te ahi i tērā tau i muri i tana whakairinga i tētahi tweet e whakaeke ana i tētahi kaihoko kākahu nāna i whakataka tētahi raina huatau nā Tōnā.

title: Q&A: Ngā kai kura koreutu mō ngā kōhungahunga
summary: Mai i tēnei wā, ka whai wāhi ngā tauira kōhungahunga katoa i ngā kura o Ingarangi ki tētahi kai wera koreutu i te wā o te tina i ia rā.
text: Nā wai ka whai hua mai i tēnei kaupapahere, he pēhea te putanga mai, ā, kua rite ngā kura? He aha te huringa? Ko ngā kura katoa e pūteatia ana e te kāwanatanga i Ingarangi, tae atu ki ngā wānanga me ngā kura koreutu, ka whai tikanga ā-ture ki te tuku kai koreutu mō ngā tamariki katoa i te Whiwhinga ki te Tau 2, i raro i te kaupapahere Universal Infant Free School Foods. Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, neke atu i te 367,000 ngā tamariki i tēnei rōpū pakeke, kei runga rānei ō rātou mātua i ngā painga, i iti iho rānei i te £16,190 kua āhei ki ngā kai kura koreutu. I raro i te kaupapahere hōu, ka whai wāhi ētahi atu tamariki 1.55m ki tētahi kai wera koreutu i ia wā tina, ka kawea mai te tapeke e tika ana ki neke atu i te 1.9m ngā tamariki e tūmanakohia ana kia tiakina ngā mātua mō te £400 ia tau mō ia tamaiti. E hiahiatia ā-ture ana ngā kura ki te whakarato kai e hāngai ana ki ngā Paerewa Kai Kura a te kāwanatanga hei whakarite kia whiwhi ngā tamariki i ngā kai e hiahiatia ana e rātou puta noa i te rā kura. Me wera nga kai? E kī ana ngā tohutohu ki ngā kura e tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga ka tukuna auautia he kōwhiringa kai wera ki ngā tauira. "Where schools are not in a position to offer hot options from September 2014, they should be working towards doing so soon as possible." Me pēhea ngā tina pōkai? E kī ana te kāwanatanga me tuku e ngā kura he kai kura koreutu ki ngā tauira kōhungahunga katoa, engari kāore e tūmanakohia kia whakahaua te tango. Schools will still have the freedom to set their own policies on packed lunches, says the guidance. Ka kōwhiri ngā whānau katoa? Kua whakaritea e te kāwanatanga he 87% te tangohanga o ngā tina - engari kua kī atu te Minita Kura a David Laws ki te BBC tērā pea ka iti iho tēnei hei tīmata i te wā e whakatau ana ngā mātua o ētahi atu kai pārekareka mēnā ka kainga e a rātau tamariki. Tērā pea ka whakatau ētahi ki te whakarato tonu i tētahi tina pōkai i ia rā. I pēhea te putanga mai? I whakarewaina e te Pirimia tuarua o Nick Clegg te kaupapa i te hui a Liberal Democrat o tērā ngahuru. I taunakitia ngā kai kura koreutu mō ngā tauira katoa tae atu ki te 11 tau i roto i te arotakenga o ngā kai kura mō te kāwanatanga e ngā kaiwhakaū o te mekameka wharekai o Leon. I kī rātau he iti iho te whai kiko o ngā tina pōkai i ngā kai kua tunua, ā, ka piki ake ngā tina koreutu mō ngā tamariki katoa i ngā paerewa mātauranga. He pēhea te pūtea? Kua kī taurangi te Tari Mātauranga ka pūteatia katoatia nga kai e te kāwanatanga matua. It says this year it will pay a flat rate of £2.30 for each meal taken by newly eligible pupils. Kei te whakapau hoki te kāwanatanga i te £150m hei whakapai ake i ngā kītini me ngā whare kai. Anō hoki, ka whiwhi ngā kura iti i te £22.5m hei whakaroa, hei whakapai ake rānei i ngā pūkenga kīhini. He tautoko tā te kaupapahere puta noa i te tauwhāinga? I te wā o Me, ka whakakāhore te hēkeretari mātauranga a Michael Gove me te minita kura a David Laws i ngā pūrongo o te whakararuraru i roto i te tauwhāinga mo te kaupapahere. I roto i tētahi tuhipānui tōtahi mō te nūpepa The Times i kī ai rātau he "tautoko whakawhiti-rōpū" nga kaupapa. Nā ngā pūrongo tōmua i huatau ai ngā kaiwhakahaere matua i te Tari Mātauranga i wehi i te moni mō te whakamohoa i ngā kītini. Nā ngā īmēra māturu i huatau ai ngā kaiwhakahaere e whakapono ana ngā whakapainga kītini o te kura ka nui ake te utu o te £50m i te £150m i whakaritea, me te pānga patoto ki ngā tahua kura whānui ake. I ia Poutāpeta ka karangatia e tētahi kaitohutohu o mua ki te hēkeretari mātauranga te ariā he "wahangu" me te "tinihanga kino". I kī a Dominic Cummings kāore anō kia tika te whakaaro, te utu rānei, ā, ka whakararurarutia. I whakatauria e te minita kura a David Laws he nui tonu ngā mahi, tae atu ki ngā kaihautū, kua uru ki te kaupapahere. Kai te nui te pūtea? I a Hōngongoi ka pātai atu tētahi uiuinga a te hōtaka Puku o Te Reo Irirangi 5 ki ngā kaunihera 152 katoa i Ingarangi mō ā rātou tahua mō te whakatinana i te kaupapahere. O te 99 i whakautu, e 34 i kī kāore i te rawaka te moni mō te kaupapa ahakoa i kīia kua pūteatia katoatia e te kāwanatanga. I kī ētahi mana ā rohe me whakaekea e rātau a rātau tahua tiakitanga, ā, ko ētahi e tuku utu ana ki nga kura. Kua pūrongotia e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Essex tētahi mōkito £3m i te wā e tonoa ana ngā kura 190 i Leeds kia āwhina ki te kimi i te haurua o te utu o te iti i te taone. I kī tētahi upoko o Te Rūnanga e whakaaro ana ia ki te whakapau moni ki ngā rorohiko paparorohiko mō ngā tauira, engari kāore e taea ināianei. Ka rite ngā kura? I Aperira, i kitea e tētahi tūhuratanga o te Tōrangapū o Ia Rā, neke atu i te 2,700 ngā kura i Ingarangi kāore e rite ki te mahi i ngā kai wera koreutu. Nā ngā whika Wāteatanga o ngā Mōhiohio i whiwhia e te AO i huatau kia neke atu i te 1,700 ngā kura kāore he kītini. Nā reira me tuku a rātau kai wera e ngā kaihoko o waho, me tunua rānei ki ngā kura pātata, ā, ka kawea. Tērā pea ka tukuna e ētahi he kai mātao pēnei i te hanawiti hei tīmata - ahakoa e kī ana ngā tohutohu me mahi ngā kura ki te whakarato kai wera. I kī ētahi kura kāore i te nui rawa ngā rūma kai kia tītaha ai ngā wā tina. I kī ētahi i whakamahia e rātau o rātau hōro mō PE i te wā o te tina, ā, ko te tikanga o te kaupapahere kai hou ka mutu ēnei ngohe. He aha te tauhohenga a Tēnā Clegg? E kī ana a Tēnā Clegg, ahakoa he "uauatanga" pea ētahi kura tuatahi Ingarihi ki te whakarato kai, e tohe ana ia he "pūtea" me te "rangahau pai" te kaupapa. He has said pilots in Durham and Newham have shown the policy not only saves whānau money but has a dramatic educational impact, particularly on poorer children who are not receiving free school meals. E whakapono ana hoki a Mr Clegg ki ngā kai kura koreutu mō ngā tamariki kōhungahunga katoa he "pānga pāpori tino nui nā te mea ka whiwhi ngā tamariki i te tina tahi i waenganui o te rā kura". He aha te āhua o Weera, Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki? Kei te whakaratoa he moni mō Weera, Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te hōrite i te kaupapa Ingarihi, engari i te mea he take whakawhāiti te mātauranga, ki ngā tāngata e whakahaere ana i ngā kura i ia whenua ki te whakatau mēnā ka whakapau moni ki ngā tina koreutu. The Scottish government has decided to provide free school meals for all children in Primary One to Three from January 2015, following trials in five local authority areas. I Weera, e whai wāhi ana ngā tamariki kura tuatahi katoa ki tētahi parakuihi kura koreutu. Me whakaroa atu te kaupapa here ki ngā tauira tuatahi katoa? A review of school food for the Department for Education recommended all primary pupils should get free school meals. Kua kī te kaituhi tahi a Henry Dimbleby e tūmanako ana a ia ko te pānuitanga a Tēnā Clegg "ko te hipanga tuatahi i runga i te huarahi ki te koreutu i ngā kai kura mō te katoa". E hiahia ana hoki te Uniana o nga Kaiako o te Motu kia whakaroa atu te kaupapa here ki nga tauira tuatahi katoa. E kī ana te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Christine Blower "kaua ngā tamariki e mutu te hiakai i te whitu tau te pakeke".

title: Coronavirus: Ka mate te kaitapere Star Wars a Andrew Jack i te 76 o ona tau
summary: Kua mate tētahi kaitapere me te kaiako reo i puta mai i Star Wars me te mahi tahi me ngā tāngata rongonui A-rārangi i muri i te kirimana i te Covid-19, kua kī tana māngai.
text: I mate a Andrew Jack, e 76, i tētahi hōhipera o Te Tūrei. I kī a Māngai Jill McCullough kua waipuketia ia e ngā takoha ki tētahi o ngā "reo tino mārama, mārama hoki" o te ao whakatau. I kī a ia kāore i taea e Jack te kite i tana wahine i ōna rā whakamutunga nā te mea i taratahitia ia i Ahitereiria. Ko ana hua mahi ko The Last Jedi and the Force Awakens. I kī a Greg Grunberg i "whakararuraru" a ia ki te ako i te matenga o Jack, e whakaahua ana i a ia he "tangata whakamīharo, whai pūkenga, e arohaina ana". "Ko ia tētahi o ngā tāngata tino atawhai kua mahi tahi ahau," tana tāpiri mai. Ko Jack, e noho ana i runga i tētahi poti whare i te Awa o Thames, i "kī tonu i te ora", "rekareka, ātaahua, me te hari ki te noho," te kī a tana māngai. "I te mahi tonu a ia i te kirikiri katoa, e whakaako ana i tēnei wā i runga i te Batman hou," tana tāpiri mai. Kāore i taea e ia te kite i tana wahine, te kaiako reo o Gabrielle Rogers, nāna i "pōrangi te aroha", nā te mea i "mau ia i roto i te taratahi i Ahitereiria, kātahi anō ka rere mai i Aotearoa i tērā wiki," te kī a Ms McCullough. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Coronavirus - he aha tāu e hiahia ana ki te mahi

title: 'Ki te tāhae pūoro koe, ehara koe i te tino kaingākau pūoro'
summary: E 18 tau te hoa o Wayne Evans i mahue i a ia i te pō i mua. E takatū ana tana tamāhine ki te kura i taua ata, i a ia e ngana ana ki te whakakotahi i a ia. Kātahi ka patoto mai nga pirihimana.
text: Nā Nell MackenzieBusiness reporter "He āhua ohorere, ki te kōrero i te iti rawa," te kī a Wayne kāore i mua i te ture. He DJ amateur a ia mai i Liverpool nāna i hoahoa, i hoko hoki i ngā pūmanawa DJ. I tukuatu hoki e ia te wāriu pūoro e £22.5m, e ai ki te Rōpū Mōtika Mahi. I pākaha a Wayne ki tōna hauora hinengaro mai i te wā i pāngia ai ia e tētahi hara taikaha i ngā tau i mua. I a ia e hinga ana, ko tana "wāhi haere" ko te kimi me te whakarongo ki ngā riu whare ātaahua. I rongonuitia a ia mō tana kohinga, ā, i waipuketia e ngā tono kia tiritiri. "Nō reira kātahi anō ka tīmata ahau ki te tukuatu ki tētahi pae kia taea ai e te tangata te haere ki reira, ā, kāore e raruraru i ahau," tana kī. E kī ana te PRS nā ana tukuatu, e 700,000 ngā riu i tikiake i te ture. Na te hopunga a Wayne i puta mai he whakaeke āwangawanga nui. I karangatia he waka tūroro. I tautohe a ia i runga i te wāhi, a, ka kī taurangi kia whakatikaia ki te umanga pūoro. I te tau 2016, i whakawāteatia ia mo te takahi manatārua me tētahi tatau tinihanga, a, ka hereheretia mo te 12 marama. I ētahi wā ka kī atu te katipa o te whare herehere me ngā hoa herehere ki a Wayne i whakaaro rātau he "āhua poupou" tana whiu, engari e kī ana a Wayne he tika te mea i pā ki a ia. "He nui taku whakaaro mo taua mea. He nui rawa ngā mahi e haere ana ki te hanga pūoro. I tangohia e au i a rātau tāngata - ehara i te rehetoi anake, engari ko te tangata e noho ana i te tēpu whakaranu - he tokomaha ngā tāngata," te kī a Wayne. E utu ana te tāpaetanga i te āhua o te UK e £9bn i te tau, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo 2019 a te Tari Āhuatanga Hinengaro a te kāwanatanga. Ahakoa e rua tekau tau kua taha te tikiake ture, ka huri tonu te āhua o te hara. He nui ake ngā pae tiritiri kōnae Hangarau Pakihi pēnei i te The Pirate Bay i whakamahia whānuitia hei tikiake pūoro kore mana, engari kua heke haere te rongonui nā ngā mahi angitu ki te whakaweto. Heoi anō, kua whakakapia e ngā paetukutuku me ngā taupānga e āhei ai ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te tikiake pūoro i tangohia mai i ngā pae roma raihana tae atu ki YouTube me Spotify. E kiia ana ko te tāhae-roma, e pā ana ki te 80% o te takahitanga manatārua i waenganui i ngā pae tāpaetanga nui rawa, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo o nā tata nei a te PRS. Ka whiwhi moni ngā paetukutuku tāmamau roma mai i ngā kaipānui, e whakapuaki ana i te whāranu o ngā hua tika, ngā tinihanga me ngā tuhinga āhuaāhua. I roto i ngā tau e toru kua hipa, kua piki ake te whakamahinga o taua mea ki te 1,390%, e kī ana te pūrongo. Ko YouTube te pae tino pūnoa hei tāhae pūoro, e tohu ana a Haimona Bourn, te upoko o te PRS o te whakawāteatanga, te whakaū me te ārai tāpaetanga. Ka whakamahia e ngā rippers te atanga pūmanawa o YouTube ake hei tāhae, ā, kāore te rangatira o te pae i te nui o te mahi a Google hei ārai i tēnei, e kī ana a ia. Tērā pea ka whakararurarutia ngā tāhae tohetohe mā te ārai i tō rātou wāhitau IP, e huatau ana a ia. Ahakoa he māminga, e tautohe ana a Tēnā Bourn, ka taea tonutia. "E mōhio ana koe, ko Google tēnei, te kamupene hangarau tino kaha o te ao. And I'm sure they'll know a whole bunch of other ways that the problem can be tackled," he says. I kī tētahi kaihautū YouTube kua āraia e te pae ngā rippers roma. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E tino ū ana mātou ki te whakaū i ngā tūkinotanga o ā mātou ture ratonga, ā, ka nui tonu te haumi i roto i ngā tīma me ngā hangarau hei whawhai i ēnei take." Mā te tikiake pūoro me te kore utu ka tūkino i ngā kaiwaiata nā te mea i ia wā e whakarongo ana tētahi kaihautū ki tētahi waiata e hākinakina ana e rātou i runga i tētahi ratonga roma utu, ka haere te moni pānuitanga ki te rehetoi. "Mēnā kātahi anō koe ka tikiake, ā, kotahi anake tō toro atu ki te tiki i taua tikiake, koia tēnā mō rātou," ko te whakamārama a Tēnā Bourn. I kitea, i kōrero hoki te AO ki ngā tāngata i whakamahi i tētahi pae pērā i whakarārangitia i roto i te pūrongo PRS, y2mate. I kōrero ngā pūtake i runga i te āhua o te ingoamuna. I pēnei tētahi nā te mea he pai ki a rātau te hanga ataata pīrangi me te whakaranu anō i te pūoro hei whakangahau. I hiahia tētahi ki te uru ki ngā riu, mō ngā take ā-ture, kāore i te wātea i taua rohe. I kī tētahi atu tangata i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, kāore a ia i mataku ki te mau nā te mea he iti a ia. Kotahi haora anake tōna hiko i ia rā, ā, ka tikiake ia ina whakakāngia tana ipurangi, kia taea ai e ia te whakarongo ā muri ake. I whakaae a Tēnā Bourn kāore e taea te whiu i te taitama nā te mea, ahakoa e arotahi ana te PRS ki te whakaū i te UK me te ao whānui, he nui ake te hiahia o ngā tapanga pūkete ki ngā pae e tuku pūoro ana i te iwi e mau ana. "Kāore mātou e āhei ki te mahi ki ngā tangata. E pā ana ki te mātauranga - te whakamōhio atu ki ngā tāngata he kino ki ngā kaihanga tā rātou mahi. "I ētahi wā e whakaaro ana te tangata ki te tāpaetanga he hara tūkino, engari ki te kōrero koe ki tētahi o ā mātou kaitito waiata, e tino mārama ana ehara tēnei i te take." "Ki te tāhae pūoro koe, ehara koe i te tino kaingākau pūoro," te kī a Martha Goddard, te kaiwaiata matua o te pēne Liverpudlian, te Hushtones. Ka haumi a Martha me ōna hoa pēne i o rātau wā me ō rātou moni katoa ki te hanga pūoro. Tata ki te £40 i te marama e mahi ana te pēne i a rātau royalti Spotify. Ka pau i runga i nga utu pēne. "E kite ana ahau, he aha te take e whakaaro ai te tangata kia wātea ngā toi me ngā pūoro. Engari mēnā koia tēnā, kei runga anake te utu i te kaiwhakatangitangi. Kaua e pērā," te kī a Ms Goddard. Ahakoa te ngaro o ngā mahi nā Covid-19, he waimarie ngā Hushtones nā te mea, mā te Topa, kei te hangaia tā rātou pukaemi hou i raro i te ārahitanga a te kaiwhakanao pūrākau, a Steve Levine. I tīmata a Tēnā Levine hei kaipūkaha pūoro WHK e mahi ana me The Clash. I haere tonu ia ki te whakaputa i ētahi atu pēne rongonui, pēnei i te Karapu Ahurea me te XTC. E whakahē ana a ia ki ētahi whakapakoko pahū kua kī kāore rātau e māharahara ki te tāhaetia e te tangata a rātau pūoro. "Ina whiwhi koe i te nui o ēnei kaiwaiata pahū, me tētahi tīma kaitito waiata, me ngā kaiwhakanao pūkete maha... katoa e whakangāwari ana i ta rātau mahi. kia tū rātau ki runga i tō rātou pouaka hopi me te kī, 'Kāore au i te māharahara', e whakaaro ana ahau he hakahaka tēnā, nā te mea kei te whakararuraru tērā i te kaha o ētahi atu i roto i te mekameka kai ki te whiwhi i ā rātou moni whiwhinga tika," tana kī. "Ka taea e ia pene te whakarerekē i tō rātou kaha ki te ora ki te waiata nui e whai ake nei." I te hopukina o Wayne, ka pānuitia e ia te nui o ngā tuhinga tuihono e kī ana me noho ia hei whakararuraru mō ētahi atu tāngata tērā pea ka tukuatu pūoro i runga i te ture. E wehi ana a ia ka taka tana kōrero whakatūpato ki runga i ngā taringa turi. "Ahakoa he aha tāu e mahi ai ki te whakamutu, ka waihangatia ētahi atu huarahi e 20," tana kī.

title: Charlie Elphicke: I hereheretia te MP mō ngā whakaekenga wahine
summary: E rua tau i hereheretia ai te MP Conservative o Charlie Elphicke mo te tūkino i ngā wāhine tokorua.
text: I whakawāteatia a Elphicke, e 49, te MP o mua mō Dover, ki te whāwhā i nga wāhine i roto i ngā āhuatanga ōrite, e iwa tau te wehe. I whakakāhore a ia i ngā whakapae, engari i kitea he hara ki tētahi tatau o te tūkinotanga i te tau 2007 me ētahi atu tatau e rua i te tau 2016, i muri i te whakawātanga i te Kōti Karauna o Southwark. Ka kī atu te tiati ki a Elphicke he "kaiwhaiwhai tōkai nāna i whakamahi tō angitu me tō manaakitanga hei uhi". I roto i ngā meneti o tōna hereheretanga, ka whakaūngia e Elphicke ka tono a ia ki tōna whakapae, e kī ana kāore i a ia tētahi "whakawā tika". 'Pōkai teka' i kī a Mrs Justice Whipple kua mahue i ngā whakakāhoretanga a Elphicke ōna tūpāpaku ki te whakamatautau o te hoatu whakaaturanga i te kōti. "I kōrero pono rātau, ā, i kōrero teka koe - ehara i te mea ki te hūri anake, engari ki tō wahine, ki ngā wepu me ngā pirihimana," tana kī atu ki a ia i te wā o te whakarongo whiu. Ahakoa te mea ko te wahine a te tangata whakapae, a Natalie - te MP o Dover o nāianei - i whakamutua to rāua mārena i te wā i whakawāteatia ai ia i a Hōngongoi, ka whakaae a ia kāore i a ia tētahi whakawā tika, ā, ka whakaū ka tautokona e ia tana tono. I mua i te whiunga o Elphicke, ka rongo te kōti i ngā kōrero pānga a ngā wāhine e rua i whakaekea e ia. I te tau 2007, i kī tana tūkinotanga tuatahi, i whakaekea i te kāinga o te MP i taua wā i te tau 2007, he "pānga mau tonu" ana mahi ki tōna oranga, ka tūpato i a ia ki te noho tata ki ngā tāngata. I whakahaua e ia te wahine ki runga i te sofa, a, ka whāwhā i tōna uma i a ia e ngana ana ki te kihi i a ia, i mua i tana whai i a ia me te waiata "He Tory kino ahau", i rongo tana whakawā. 'I tāhaetia tōku wāriu whaiaro' I kī te tūkinotanga tuarua, he kaimahi paremata i tōna 20 tau, i mahue i a ia te whakaaro o te "wehi me te kore āwhina". "I tāhaetia e ia tētahi wāhi nui o tōku wāriu whaiaro me tōku whakaaro whaiaro," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero i pānuitia ki te kōti. E rua ngā wā i tūkinotia ai ia e Elphicke, ko te tuatahi e ngana ana ia ki te kihi i a ia me te whāwhā i tōna uma. I te whakaekenga tuarua i ētahi wiki i muri iho, ka rere tōna ringa ki roto i tōna huha ki tōna whanaunga. I tautohe a Īna Winter QC, e whakangungu ana, kia kaua a Elphicke e hereheretia nā te mea kua ako ia i tana akoranga. "Taro ake nei, ka oti te hekenga o Tēnā Elphicke ki te tāwai katoa," te kī a Tēnā Hotoke. Tae atu ki te mutunga o tana mārenatanga, ka wehe atu a ia i tana tamāhine nā te whakapae, ka tāpiri mai a ia. "Ko te whakahekenga anō anake ko te ngaro i tōna wāteatanga," te kī a Tēnā Hōtoke. I haere mai a Elphicke ki te kōti me ngā kaiwhakaatu pūāhua e 34, tae atu ki ētahi "mema pāremata e mahi ana," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Winter. Kāore i whakaaturia ngā ingoa o ngā MP i te kōti. 'Harakore i te hara hara' i kī a Mrs Justice Whipple e "āta whakaaro" mēnā me whakatārewa te rerenga. "[Engari] kia maumahara ki te pakaru nui o tō tūnga mana... E mōhio ana ahau ka taea anake te whiu tika mā te tiakitanga wawe," tana kī. Heoi anō, i kī tētahi kōrero mō Elphicke kua tīmata ana rōia ki te tahuri i te whakapae. "E mōhio ana ahau he harakore ahau i tētahi hara hara, ā, ka whawhai tonu ahau ki te whakawātea i tōku ingoa," te kī a Elphicke i roto i tētahi kōrero. I whakaūngia e Mrs Elphicke e tautoko ana a ia i tētahi tono ki te whakapae me te "rerenga nui rawa o tēnei rā," me te tāpiri "te āhua nei kei runga te kōti i tētahi mahi". "Kaore he pōhēhētanga i kino te whanonga o Charlie," engari i whakahētia ia he whakawā tika, ka kī a ia. I whakatārewatia a ia e nga Tohutohu i te wā i tukuna atu "ngā whakaaro nui" ki ngā pirihimana i Whiringa 2017, engari i whakaoratia te wepu i mua i te pōti whirinaki ki te Pirimia o Ēnā Me i te tau 2018. I whakatārewatia anō ia i muri i tana whakatau i ngā tatau e toru o te tūkinotanga i te 22 o Hōngongoi 2019.

title: Kua whakaaetia te karaehe rongoā mate pukupuku hou 'hurihuri'
summary: Ko tētahi karaehe rongoā mate pukupuku hou "hurihuri" e āhei ana ki te whakamahi i ngā puku whānui kua whakaaetia hei whakamahi i Uropi mō te wā tuatahi.
text: Nā Hemi GallagherHealth me te korero pūtaiao, kāore ngā rongoā rongoā-pukupuku o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero e māharahara ana ki te wāhi e tipu ana te mate pukupuku i roto i te tinana. I kī ngā tākuta UK e whakamātau ana i ngā rongoā he "mea tino mīharo". I kī rātau ka taea e te huarahi te whakaora i ētahi atu tūroro me te tapahi i ngā pānga taha. Ko te rongoā kua whakaaetia e kiia ana ko larotrectinib. Ko Charlotte Stevenson, e rua tau te pakeke mai i Belfast, tētahi o ngā tūroro tuatahi i whai hua. I kitea he fibrosarcoma kōhungahunga, he mate pukupuku o te kikokiko tūhono o te tinana. Kua whakamahia ia ki te larotrectinib hei wāhanga o tētahi whakamātautau rongoā i te Royal Marsden Sutton, i Rānana, mō te tau kua taha. I kī tōna whaea, a Esther: "I mōhio mātou he whāiti ā mātou kōwhiringa [nā reira] i whakatau mātou ki te whakamātau, ā, kei te tino koa mātou i mahi mātou. " Kua taea e mātou te mātakitaki i a Charlotte e tipu ana, e tipu ana i te tere tere, e whakatika ana i te wā ngaro i roto i ngā huarahi maha, ā, ka whakamīharo i a mātau katoa ki tōna pūngao me tōna ngākau nui ki te ora. "Ināianei ka taea e ia te noho pūnoa, ā, ko te mea pai rawa, he pānga whakamīharo te rongoā ki te puku." Ko te puku o Charlotte i takea mai i tētahi āhuatanga iranga e mōhiotia ana ko te hononga ira NTRK. I hanumi ohorere tētahi wāhanga o tōna DNA ki tētahi atu, ā, na te whakarerekētanga o te kaupapa mō tōna tinana i tupu ai tōna mate pukupuku. Engari ehara ngā hononga ira NTRK i te ahurei ki ngā sarcomas - ka puta hoki i roto i ētahi roro, tākihi, thyroid me ētahi atu mate pukupuku. "He mea tino mīharo, pērā i te mahi puta noa i ngā mate pukupuku. Kāore i te herea ki tētahi," te kī a Dr Julia Chisholm, tētahi kaiwhakahaere mate pukupuku tamariki i te Hōhipera o Royal Marsden. He āhua āhua kore nei ngā irakētanga NTRK, engari kei te whanaketia ētahi atu rongoā kua tohua. 'Ngā rongoā atawhai' E tohu ana i te neke atu i te "mate pukupuku uma", i te "pukupuku whekau" rānei, i te "pukupuku pūkahukahu" rānei, ki te rongoā tōtika e whai painga ana i te hanganga iranga o ia puku tūroro. I kī atu a Dr Chisholm ki te BBC: "Ko te ātaahua e ūkui ana i te rerekētanga. " He maha ngā ara koiora e ngātahi ana i roto i ngā momo puku rerekē. "Ki taku whakaaro koinei te huarahi e haere ana ngā mea, ā, ko tēnei e pā ana ki ngā putanga pai ake, te whakaora i ētahi atu tūroro me te whakaputa i ngā rongoā atawhai me te whakaiti i ngā pānga taha." Ehara te whakataunga a ngā kaiwhakarite Ūropi i te tikanga ka wātea inamata mō ngā tūroro i te UK. Engari i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, i whakaahuatia e NHS Ingarangi ngā rongoā puku-agnostic hei "hurihuri" me te "hua hou mīharo" i roto i te mate pukupuku, ā, i kī kei te haere ngā whakaritenga kia āhei ai ngā tūroro ki a rātou. "Ko ngā painga mō ngā tūroro - i ētahi tamariki - o te āhei ki te whakamahi i ngā momo mate pukupuku maha ki te rongoā kotahi, he tino nui pea, e āwhina ana i a rātou ki te ārahi i ngā oranga roa ake, hauora ake," te kī a te rangatira nui o NHS Ingarangi, a Haimona Stevens i taua wā. I kī a Prof Charles Swanton, te rangatira o te rongoā o Cancer Research UK, he "mīharo". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me mātua whakarite te NHS e wātea ana te whakamātautau ira tika puta noa i te whenua hei tāutu i ngā tūroro e whai hua ana, nā reira he pai kē kei te whakaaro kē te NHS me pēhea te tiki i tēnei ki ngā tūroro mate pukupuku i ngā wā tata nei." I kī a Dr Brendon Gray, mai i Bayer, te kamupene rongoā nāna i whakawhanake te larotrectinib: "Hei rongoā pukupuku tuatahi i whakaaetia i Uropi, ko te larotrectinib e tohu ana i tētahi neke tūturu i roto i te rongoā pukupuku." Whāia a Hemi i Twitter.

title: JMW Turner's Twickenham house 'saved' by Lottery grant
summary: A house designed and owned by JMW Turner is to be restored and opened to the public after receiving a £1.4m grant from the Heritage Lottery Fund.
text: I hangaia e Turner a Sandycombe Lodge i Twickenham, Rānana, i te tau 1813, ā, i whakamahia hei taunga whenua mōna tae noa ki te tau 1826. Engari kua hinga ki roto i te āhua kino o te tapi i roto i ngā tau tata nei. It has only been open to the public for one afternoon a month, but will be open for 46 weeks of the year from 2016, once restoration work is finished. I hoahoatia e Tena, tētahi o ngā kaipeita tino nui o Ingarangi, te whare hei taunga mai i tōna whare mahi pūtahi o Rāwāhi, hei kāinga pūmau mō tōna pāpā pakeke, he kaihanga makawe me te kaikutikut, nāna i tiaki te whare me te māra. I a ia e haere ana, ka pau i te rehetoi ōna rā ki te tātuhi, ki te hī ika, ki te whakangahau. Kāore i te mōhiotia mēnā i peita ia i reira, engari e whakaarotia ana i mahi ia i roto i ngā peita wai i reira. Ka tangohia ngā parirau o te whare i tāpiritia i ngā wā o Wikitōria, ā, ka whakatikaina te tūkinotanga o ngā pakiaka rākau me ētahi atu raruraru. I hinga tētahi wāhanga o te tuanui o raro i muri i te ua nui i te tau 2012. I tāpirihia ki te rēhita Heritage at Risk o English Heritage i te tau 2013. Nā te Turner House Trust te whare, e tūmanako ana ki te kohi i te tapeke o te £2m. I kī a Blondel Cluff, te tūru o te komiti o Rāwāhi o te Heritage Lottery Fund: "Kāore anō kia nui ake te hiahia ki a Tena, e kitea ana i roto i te angitu o te pikitia koiora o nā tata nei me te whakaaturanga o nāianei o ana mahi i Tate Britain. " Na te whakaoratanga o tēnei āhuatanga māori e whakamōhio mai ai ki a Turner, te kaihoahoa, e tāpiri ana i tētahi ahu hou ki tō tātau mōhiotanga ki tēnei kaiwaiata nui. "Ka whakaaetia e Sandycombe tātau katoa ki te haere tūturu i roto i te mahi a tētahi o ngā kaiwaiata ārahi o te ao - he wheako tino ahurei."

title: Te tūtukitanga o Taunton M5: Ka takoha te whānau ki a Rod Teina
summary: Kua hoatu takoha ki a ia te whānau o tētahi tangata e 54 tau i mate i te tūtukitanga o te motokā e haere ana a ia me tētahi taraka.
text: I mate a Rod Teina, mai i Cheddar, i te tūtukitanga i runga i te M5 tata ki Taunton i te 08:30 BST i te Tāite. I whakaahuatia e tōna whānau te pāpā o te tokorua he "tangata whānau ngāwari, ngahau" i "tino arohaina". I kī rātau ka mahue i a rātau tana "kata, te aroha ki te ora, te atawhai me te pono". I tāpiritia e te whānau he mema tūturu a Tēnā Teina no te Hāhi o Hato Anaru i Cheddar, ā, e 38 tau te kaimahi NHS. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Avon rāua ko Somerset he pāhihi a Tēnā Teina i roto i te motokā. I mate hoki tētahi wahine i roto i tōna 40 tau, e taraiwa ana i tētahi motokā i mua.
