Ināianei kei te whakaora te wahine a Tāne Teina, a Ceri i ngā whara i pāngia hoki i te aituā, ā, kei roto i tētahi āhuatanga pūmau i te Hōhipera o Southmead i Bristol. Tokowhā ētahi atu tāngata i whara - tokorua o rātau i tino nui. E hia rau ngā waka i mau i roto i ngā hiku i runga i te M5 i muri i te tūtukitanga. I whakatuwheratia anōtia te huarahi ki te tonga i te ahiahi o te Rāitema tata ki te 11 haora i muri i te tūponotanga. Kua inoi te tōpana ki te tangata i kite i te tūtukitanga kia haere mai ki mua.

title: Te whakaekenga o Ōtautahi: Ka whakahaua e Ardern o Aotearoa te uiui taumata matua
summary: Kua whakahaua e te Pirimia o Aotearoa, a Jacinda Ardern, he uiui taumata matua ki ngā whakaekenga o te wharenui o Ōtautahi i mate ai e 50 ngā tāngata.
text: I kī a ia ka tirohia e tētahi kōmihana ariki mēnā ka nui ake te mahi a ngā pirihimana me ngā ratonga mōhiohio hei ārai i ngā tākarotanga o te 15 o Poutāpeta. Ko te kōmihana kīngi te taumata tiketike o te uiui takitahi e wātea ana i raro i te ture o Aotearoa. I kī a Ms Ardern ka puta mai he pūrongo "whānui". "He mea nui kia kaua he pōhatu e mahue kia tae ki te āhua o tēnei mahi pūtōraru, me pēhea hoki e taea ai e mātou te whakamutu," tana kī atu ki ngā kaipānui i Pōneke i te Mane. "Kotahi te pātai e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakautu, mēnā ka taea, kāore rānei, me mōhio anō rānei," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Ms Ardern ka titiro hoki te uiui tika ki ngā pātai e karapoti ana i te āheitanga o ngā rākau āhua aunoa me te tūnga pāpāho pāpori i tākaro i roto i ngā whakaekenga. Kua whakataua a Ahitereiria o Ahitereiria Tarrant, he tangata whakapuaki mā, e 28 tau, ki tētahi kōhuru e pā ana ki ngā tākaro, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia anga atu ia ki ētahi atu whakapae. Kua whakataua e Ms Ardern te whakamōhio anō i te whiu mate mo te whakawā. I te hui pānui e pānui ana i te uiui, ka kī hoki a ia ka haere a ia ki Haina i te mutunga o te wiki ki te tūtaki ki a Perehitini Xi Jinping. I kī a ia kua whakapototia te haere ki te rā kotahi i muri i ngā whakaekenga o Ōtautahi. I muri i ngā whakaekenga, ka pānuitia e te kaiārahi o Aotearoa he mahi whakahou pū i muri i ngā whakaekenga, e pānui ana i roto i te wiki o ngā whakahōutanga e whakakore ana i ngā momo rākau āhua aunoa me ngā raiwhara whakaeke, tae atu ki ngā pukapuka kaha tiketike. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana ia kia whakaritea he ture hou i te 11 o Āperira.

title: Ko ngā mahi toi a Banksy i tāhaetia i te Bataclan i Parihi e kitea ana i Itari
summary: Kua kitea e ngā pirihimana i waenganui o Itari tētahi mahi toi a te kaiwaiata graffiti o Ingarangi i tāhaetia i tērā tau mai i te hōro pūoro o Bataclan i Parihi.
text: Ko te mahi, e whakaahua ana i tētahi taitama wahine me te kīanga tangi, i peitatia hei takoha ki ngā tūpāpaku o te whakaekenga wehi o te tau 2015 i te wāhi. I tapahia, i tangohia mai i tētahi o ngā tatau ohorere o te wāhi e tētahi rōpū tāngata kōhukihuki e whakamahi ana i ngā mīhini koki. E ai ki a La Repubblica i kitea i roto i tētahi whare pāmu i te rohe o Abruzzo. I kī te rōia rohe o te taone Itari o L'Aquila, a Mīharo Renzo: "I taea te kitenga i muri i ngā tūhuratanga i whakahaeretia e te rōia rohe i runga i te ngātahitanga ki ngā pirihimana me te whakawāwā Wīwī." I tāhaetia te pakitara i te Hānuere 2019. I muri i te tangohanga, ka whakairihia e te Bataclan ki Twitter: "I tēnei rā kei te tino riri mātau. Ko te mahi a Banksy, he tohu pūmahara me te whai wāhi mō te katoa - ngā tangata whenua, ngā Parihi, ngā tangata whenua o te ao - i tāhaetia i a mātau." Kua whakaritea he hui pānui kia whakahōtakatia me ētahi atu taipitopito mō te kitenga. E iwa tekau tāngata i patua i Whiringa 2015 i te wā i ūkuia ai e nga kaiwhakawhanake patu te Bataclan i te wā o tētahi konohete a te pēne toka o Eagles Of Death Metal. Ko te pakitara tātari, i whakaahuatia e te wāhi hei "tohu o te maharatanga", ko tētahi o ngā rangatū o ngā mahi toi i takea mai i a Banksy i puta huri noa i Parihi i June 2018. He tino paingia, he tino rapua ngā mahi a te rehetoi, e pupuri ana i tōna tuakiri. I tērā marama ka puta mai tētahi Banksy hou, e whakaatu ana i tētahi taitama e tākaro ana me tētahi tauira nēhi NHS, i te Hōhipera Whānui o Southampton. Ko te peita taetahi nui, kotahi mita tapawhā, i whakairihia i runga i te mahi tahi me nga kaiwhakahaere o te hohipera i roto i te wharenui tata ki te tari ohorere, i waenganui i te mate coronavirus. I waiho e te rehetoi he tuhipoka mō ngā kaimahi hōhipera, e pānui ana: "Ngā mihi mō ngā mea katoa e mahi ana koe. E tūmanako ana ahau ka whakamāramatia e tēnei te wāhi, ahakoa he pango me te mā anake." Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Jeremy Corbyn: Ka whakaae anō a Labour ki te kaiārahi i muri i te haupae anati-Semitism
summary: Kua whakaae anō a Labour ki te kaiārahi o mua o Jeremy Corbyn hei mema i muri i tana whakatārewatanga i tērā marama.
text: I whiua a ia i muri i tana kīanga i te tauine o te anati-Semitism i roto i te rōpū kua "whakanuia", hei urupare ki tētahi pūrongo whakararuraru a te Komihana Ōritetanga me te Komihana Motika Tangata. I tukuna e Tēnā Kōpia tētahi kōrero i mua e kī ana i whakamamaetia e ia tētahi "mamae" i takea. Engari i mau tonu te kaiārahi o nāianei o Tā Keir Starmer i te tauhohenga tuatahi a Tēnā Kōpia ki te pūrongo i "hē". I kī te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Laura Kuenssberg, kāore anō kia whakatauria mēnā ka whakaora i te wepu Mahi ki a Tēnā Kōpihi, e āhei ai ia ki te noho anō hei tētahi o ōna MP. I tūtaki tētahi pae i hangaia e ngā mema o te Komiti Nui o te Rōpū ā Iwi i te Tūtira ki te whakatau mēnā ka mahi anō i te mahi whakatinanatanga ki a ia, ki te hiki rānei i te whakatārewatanga. I muri i tana whakatau kia whakaae anō ki a Tēnā Kōpihi, ka tūtohu a Tā Keir he "rā mamae tērā mō te iwi Hurai me aua mema Mahi i whawhai kaha ki te rutu i te anati-Semitism". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He hē te kōrero a Jeremy Corbyn hei urupare ki te pūrongo EHRC, ā, i tino nekehia mai i tētahi pūrongo i kitea ai he whanonga ture i roto i tā mātou whiu i te whakahāwea i roto i te Rōpū Mahi. Ko te tikanga kia whakamā tēnei i a tātau katoa." I te tere o te mahi a Labour ki te whakatārewa i a Jeremy Corbyn, i kitea he tohu e hiahia ana te rōpū ki te tawhiti i a ia i tētahi wā tūkino i mua tata nei. I kī a Tā Keir Starmer kāore a ia i whakakīkī i te mahi, engari i tautokona e ia. Engari ahakoa he aha te whakataunga i tae ki te Tūrei, ka whai mai te whakahē. Kāore a Tēnā Kōpia i whakapōhēhē mō te huatau kua whakanuia te tauine o te anati-Semitism e ngā hoariri tōrangapū, koia te take i whakatārewatia ai ia. I whakamāramatia noatia e ia tana kōrero. Nā reira ko te whakahoki anō i a ia e herea ana ki te kawe mai i ngā whakahē mai i te hunga i whakatūpato i tōna whakatārewatanga. Heoi anō, kāore anō kia whakahokia mai a ia, tērā pea ka whakakāhoretia he pakanga wehenga i waenganui i te hunga e tautoko ana i te kaiārahi Starmer me ērā - tae atu ki ētahi kaiārahi uniana - e noho tata tonu ana ki a Tēnā Kōpihi. I tāruatia e Tā Keir tana whāinga ki tētahi tukanga amuamu takitahi i te Tau Hōu - he tūtohutanga a te Komihana Ōritetanga me te Komihana Motika Tangata. Engari kāore anō kia whakangūngia, kia panaia rānei te hunga e tautoko tonu ana i te kaiārahi tawhito. Ā, kāore anō kia tino tātuhia te raina e hiahia ana a Tā Keir ki te tā i raro i ngā haupae anō o te Pākehā. I roto i tētahi kōrero i mua o te Tūtira, ka kī a Tēnā Kōpia - he MP takitahi i tēnei wā - "ehara i tōna whakaaro" ki te kī kia whakaaetia te whakahāwea ā iwi ā Hurai, ā, ka pouri a ia ki te "mamae" i takea. I tāpiritia tana kōrero: "Kia mārama, kāore ngā māharahara mō te anati-Semitism i te 'whakanuia', i te 'whakanuia' rānei. " Ko te take e hiahia ana ahau ki te whakaputa, ko te nuinga o ngā mema o te Rōpū Mahi, ā, ka noho tonu ki te ārai whakahāwea." Kāore anō kia mārama mēnā ka anga atu a Tēnā Kōpia ki ētahi atu whakamanatanga mai i te rōpū. 'Rahunga ki te kounu' Na tana hēkeretari ahuwhānui, a David Evans, i whakatau kia whakatārewatia ia i Whiringahora, ahakoa i tautokona e Tā Keir. I kitea e te pūrongo a te ECHR kua takahia e Labour te Ture Ōritetanga i runga i tana whakahaere i ngā amuamu o te anati-Semitism i te wā e whakahaere ana a Tēnā Kōpihi. I kī a Labour kua whakatārewatia a Tēnā Kōpia "mo te rahunga ki te kounu" i ana kupu. I muri i tana pānuitanga anō, ka kī te MP o Islington Raki: "E tūmanako ana ahau ka whakatauria tēnei take i runga i te tere e taea ana, kia taea ai e te rōpū te mahi tahi ki te pakiaka i te anati-Semitism me te whakakotahi ki te whakahē me te hinga i tēnei kāwanatanga Rangatira tino whakakino." 'Kore manawanui' Engari i karangatia e te Nekehanga Mahi Hurai te whakataunga kia whakaae anō ki a Tēnā Kōpia "whakaharahara", ka tāpiritia: "I muri i tōna rahunga ārahi ki te rutu i te anati-Semitism, nā reira i mārama ai te tautuhi i roto i te pūrongo a te EHRC, ka kitea e tētahi kaitirotiro hinengaro tika te kōrero a Jeremy Corbyn i tēnei rā, he pono, he tino koretake." I kī a Karen Pollock, te rangatira nui o te Holocaust Educational Trust: "He aha te karere e tukuna ana e tēnei? Ko te tikanga o te manawanui kore, kāore rānei he tikanga." Kua tuhituhi te manukura tahi o te Rōpū Rangatira, a MP Amanda Milling, ki a Tā Keir, e kī ana: "Kua kī koe kei raro a Labour i te 'ārahitanga hou', engari ināianei ko te wā hei whakamātau - me peia pūmautia a Tēnā Kōpihi." I kī te MP Mahi o Mua, o Dame Louise Ellman, nāna i waiho te rōpū i runga i ngā āwangawanga anō o te Pākehā i tērā tau, he "hipanga whakamuri" te whakataunga. "Ko te mea e tika ana kia mahia e Keir Starmer me te wepu matua ināianei, ko te kore e pai ki te whakaora i te wepu ki a Jeremy Corbyn, mā tēnā e taea ai e rātau te whakaatu kua whakatauria rātau... ki te whakakore i te rōpū i tēnei poapoa whakamataku," tana kī atu ki a BBC Newsnight. Heoi anō, i karangatia e Len McCluskey, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te uniana Unite me tētahi urunga tata o Tēnā Kōpihi, ko te whakahokinga mai he "whakataunga tika, tika, whakakotahi hoki". I kī a ia me "neke whakamua" a Labour ki te whakatinana i ngā tūtohutanga a te EHRC me te "whakaroha i a mātau mahi ki te whakaawe i ngā kaipōti" mō ngā kaupapa here a Tā Keir, e mahi ana hei rōpū "whakakotahi, kaha hoki". A, ka kī atu a Te Wānanga o Te Rūnanga o te rōpū pro-Corbyn Reo Hurai mō Labour, ki a TE Pō Rongokōrero o TE Pō Rongokōrero e "tino hari ana mātau kua hoki mai a ia (Tēnā Kōpihi) ki te rōpū" ā, ka "tino pouri" mēnā ka tangohia te wepu i a ia.

title: Mōrearea Kōrea ki te Raki: E tohutohu ana a Rex Tillerson i te urupare aowhānui
summary: Kua karangatia e te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika, a Rex Tillerson, ki ērā atu o te ao kia āwhina ki te whakahau i Kōria ki te Raki kia tuku i ōna hiahia karihi.
text: I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Kaunihera Haumarutanga UN, ka karanga a ia ki a Haina kia whakamana i ōna hononga hokohoko hei whakaawetanga. Engari i kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Hainamana, a Wang Yi, kāore te kī ki te whakaoti i te raruraru i takoto ki tōna whenua. Kua nui haere ngā renarena i tēnei wā, me Kōria ki te Raki me te Tonga e whakahaere ana i ngā mahi hōia. Kua tukuna e te US ngā manuao me tētahi pūnaha ārai ārai tūroro hei whakaū i te Tonga, e noho ana ngā mano o ngā hōia o Amerika. Kua ngana anō a Kōria ki te Raki ki te whakaiti i ngā nuku karihi, ā, ka whakaurua ki runga i ngā tawhā tawhiti e taea ai te tae ki a Mātau. Ka whakatūpato a Tēnā Tillerson ki te Kaunihera Haumarutanga UN i Niu Ioka mō "ngā hua kino" ki te kore e mahi, e kī ana "tērā pea he wā noa iho i mua i te whakawhanaketanga o Kōria ki te Raki i te āheinga ki te tuki i te tuawhenua o Amerika". Ka whakamahia e te US te ope hōia ki te hiahiatia, ka tāpiritia e ia. Ka tohe a ia ki ētahi atu whenua kia whakatārewatia ngā here whakawhanaunga ki a Ūngia me te wehe i ana umanga pūtea. I roto i ngā kōrero e āhua hāngai ana ki Haina, ka whakapaea e ia ngā mema o te Kaunihera kāore i te tino whakaū i ngā mana tīariari ki te Raki. He aha ngā whakamanatanga i Kōrea ki te Raki? Kei roto i ngā mana UN ko te whakakore i te hoko i ngā ringa o Kōrea ki te Raki, te hinu, te tini o ngā tuemi ka taea te whakamahi mō te hanga rākau. Kei runga hoki i te rārangi ngā taonga whai rawa tae atu ki ngā taonga peara me ngā waka hukarere e wātea ana ki te $2,000 (£1,540) neke atu rānei. Mai i tērā tau, me tirotiro hoki ngā utanga katoa e tomo ana, e puta atu ana rānei i Kōrea ki te Raki. Engari i kitea e tētahi mātauranga UN o nā noa nei ko ngā kongakonga mai i tētahi whakamātautau tūroro Kōria ki te Raki, ko ngā hiko i takea mai i ngā hinonga Hainamana rānei. He mana motuhake tā te US, tae atu ki tētahi ārai paraikete mo te hokohoko me te rārangi rārangi o te tangata e mahi ana ki Kōrea ki te Raki. He aha te kōrero a te US me Haina? I pātaitia i te Paraire e te kaipānui o Amerika NPR mehemea kua rite te US ki te pupuri kōrero hāngai ki Kōrea ki te Raki, ka whakautua e Tēnā Tillerson: "E mārama ana, koia tērā te huarahi e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakatika i tēnei. Engari me whakatau e Kōria ki te Raki kua rite rātau ki te kōrero ki a mātau mō te rārangi take tika." I whakatūpato te minita ā-rohe o Haina ki te raweke hōia, e kī ana: "Kāore te whakamahinga o te tōpana e whakatika i ngā rerekētanga, ā, ka nui ake ngā tūkinotanga." "Ko te whakatau hūmārie o te take karihi i te koiora o Kōria mā te kōrero me ngā whakaritenga e tohu ana i te kōwhiringa tika anake e māia ana, e whai hua ana," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Wang. I tāruatia hoki e ia tētahi tono Hainamana kia tū te hōtaka hōia a Ūngia hei whakahoki i te whakatio i runga i ngā mahi hōia a US-Korea ki te Tonga. Kua whakakāhoretia e te US te ariā i mua, e kī ana me mutu te hōtaka karihi i te tuatahi. Tātaritanga a Pāremata-Usher i Washington He aha tēnei huarahi hou e hiahia ana te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga ki te kite i nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao? E toru ngā huānga i whakatakotoria e ia: kia tino whakaū i ngā mana tīariari, kia whakaritea he mea hou, me te wehe i Kōrea ki te Raki. A, ka tohu ia i te nui ake o te whakatau a Mātau ki te whai i tēnei rārangi take. Ko te mea tino nui rawa i whakawehi i a ia ki ngā mana o Amerika ki ngā mea me ngā tangata i ētahi atu whenua e tautoko ana i ngā ngohe ture a Kōria ki te Raki. Tērā pea ka whakamōhiotia ngā pēke Hainamana. I karangatia hoki e ia ngā mema UN ki te whakaheke, ki te whakatārewa rānei i ngā whanaungatanga whakawhanaunga - e tūmanako ana ki te tapahi i ngā hononga whaitake o Kōria ki te Raki ki ngā iwi pēnei i Kapotia, Rāoho me Mareia. A, ka whakamāramatia e ia nga tūnga: ko te whakahau hou a AMERIKA e whakahaeretia ana e ōna ake whakaaro haumarutanga ā-motu, ka kī a ia. Nā reira he tino nui. Ka whakamātauria te taumata āwangawanga i runga i te Kaunihera Haumarutanga mēnā ka whakahaere a Kōria ki te Raki i tētahi atu whakamātautau karihi, nui rānei; Koia tērā pea te keu mō tētahi nekehanga ki ngā mana hou. He aha ngā kōrero a ētahi atu whenua? He pēhea anō te pikinga o te tanuku? I waenganui i ētahi atu whanaketanga i ngā wiki tata nei:

title: E kī ana te tino manukura o Welsh i a ia e puta atu ana i te rōpū
summary: Kua mahue i te rōpū te tino manukura o UKIP i Weera, e kī ana he "wetewete".
text: Nā Daniel DaviesBBC Wales korero tōrangapū a Chris Smart, i whakatūria hei manukura whakahaere o te komiti o Uēra o UKIP i tērā raumati, e hiahia ana ia ki te hono anō ki ngā Conservatives. I whakaarahia e ia he pātai mo te kaha o te mahi a te rōpū i a ia e whakatata ana ki te pōti ā rohe o Me. I kī te kaiārahi rōpū whakaminenga o UKIP, a Neil Hamilton, he aroha tōna ki te pōrearea o Tēnā Smart, engari i whakakāhore i te wetewete te rōpū. I kī a Tēnā Hamilton tērā pea i whakaaro te iwi "kei te hanga mātou i tētahi pikitia e kiia nei ko Carry on UKIP i tērā tau", engari i tūmanako ia kia kite i te rōpū e mahi ana i "ngā whāinga tere whakamua" i raro i te kaiārahi hou o Paul Nuttall. "He āhua aroha ahau ki a ia [Mr Smart], engari i Wales kei te neke whakamua mātau," te kī a Tēnā Hamilton. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana a ia ka uru anō a Tēnā Smart ki UKIP. Ko te kaitono whakaminenga o Tory o Mua, ko Tēnā Smart te kaiwhakahaere o te peka Bridgend o UKIP mai i te tau 2013. I kī atu a ia ki a WHK Wales i matekiri a ia i rahua te rōpū ki te whakatika i te haupae mō tōna kaiārahi Welsh o mua, o Natana Gill, e taurua ana hei AM takitahi me tētahi MEP UKIP. I pouri hoki a ia i te tohetohe a te kaituku UKIP o Arron Banks ki te MP anake o te rōpū, o Takitaki Carswell. Kei te "wetewete te rōpū, e huatau ana ahau", te kī a Tēnā Smart. I kī a ia kāore he āpiha wā katoa o TE UKIP i Weera, he iti iho i te rua marama te tawhiti o te pōti paetata. "Kāore au e kite i [te whakahau pōti] e puta ana i te whenua kia pono," tana kī. "From the experience I have had in our branch when I talk to people about being councillors there I don't find much enthusiasm for that," he added. I toa a UKIP i ngā tūru e rua i te pōti kaunihera whakamutunga i te tau 2012, engari kua ngaro rāua tahi - kotahi te kaikaunihera i mate i te wā i mahue i tētahi atu te rōpū i runga i te tīpakonga kaitono whakaminenga. I puta mai te pānuitanga a Tēnā Smart i te rā i whakatuwheratia ai e Tēnā Carswell tētahi tari rōpū hou i Pontypool. I whakakāhore a Tēnā Carswell i ngā kerēme i whakawāteatia e ia ki tētahi kōtiro mō te kaiārahi o te rōpū o Te Rōpū o Te Rōpū. "Kāore au i whakapuaki i tētahi tirohanga," tana kī. I kī te manukura o TE UKIP, a Paul Oakden, ka whakarahia anōtia e UKIP, tae atu ki ngā huringa i Weera, ā, ka whakatūria hoki he kaiwhakarite whakahau pōti paetata o Welsh i tēnei mutunga wiki. Kāore a UKIP i te tīariari tika hei rōpū motuhake i Weera, ā, kāore he kaiārahi Welsh. E ārahi ana a Tēnā Hamilton i te rōpū UKIP kaha e ono i roto i te whakaminenga. "Kei te haere mātou i tēnei tukanga o te whakaraupapa anō i te motu, ā, kei roto ko Wales - e kore e mahue," te kī a Tēnā Oakden. "He tino mārama ngā whakaaro o Paul Nuttall me pēhea te hanganga anō o te rōpū. " That's going to involve me meeting with people in Wales to discuss structures and so on."

title: Jeremy Corbyn: Me ūkui tātou i te mātāmua, ka neke whakamua
summary: E kī ana a Jeremy Corbyn e hiahia ana a ia ki te "ūkui i te mātāmua" mēnā ka pupuri a ia i tōna tūnga hei kaiārahi Mahi.
text: I kī atu a Tēnā Kōpia ki te AO kāore anō a ia kia urupare ki ngā "kōrero kino" i toroa ki a ia e tētahi "tino nui rawa o ngā MP Mahi" i te wā o te whakahau. A, i kī a ia "he nui rawa" o ngā MP i karangatia ia e hiahia ana ki te "tākaro i ta rātau wāhi" i roto i te rōpū i muri i te whakataetae ārahi. Ināianei kua katia te pōti i roto i te whakataetae - e whakatakoto ana i a Tēnā Kōpia ki a Owen Smith - ā, ko te hua i te Hātarei. I roto i tana uiuinga, ka matapaetia e Tēnā Kōpia ka pai ake te utu o Labour i raro i a ia i te wā o Mikaera Waewae, ahakoa te whakamihi ki te kaiārahi o mua. Ko Tēnā Kōpia te tino makau ki te toa i te whakataetae ārahi, ahakoa te kaha o te pūrua i waenganui i ngā kaitautoko o te rōpū, kāore te nuinga o ana MP e whakahoki i tana ārahitanga, ā, kua anga atu ia ki ngā tukunga nui mai i tana kāpata kōruru. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Laura Kuenssberg, ka kī a ia: "He nui rawa aku waea mai i ngā MP Labour i ngā rā torutoru nei, e hiahia ana ki te pēhea tātau e huihui mai ai i muri i te 24, me pēhea rātau e tākaro ai i tā rātou wāhi ki te whawhai ki ngā Tories i te Pāremata, i waho rānei." Ki te patua e ia a Tēnā Hāne, ka kī a ia ka "ōrite a Jeremy Corbyn i puta i a au i tērā tau me ngā tau e 30 kua hipa i te Pāremata", ā, ka tono ia i ana kaiwhakawāwā "kia haere mai ki runga i te papa ki te mahi tahi". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ahakoa te nui o ngā whakahē tino whaiaro kua mahia mōku, ko ngā kōrero kino katoa kua whakaputaina mai ki a au e te nuinga o ngā MP Mahi, kāore anō ahau kia whakautu ki tētahi o rātou. " Kua mauria e au ki runga i te papa, kua mārama ki ā rātou kōrero, ā, e tono ana ahau ki a rātau kia whanonga i runga i te tikanga tika, haepapa hoki, me te huihui kia āhei ai mātou ki te whawhai ki ngā Tories. "Ūkuia te mātāmua ka neke whakamua." I whakapuakina e ia tētahi tūmanako ka hoki mai ētahi o ngā MP o mua i whakarerea, e kī ana "me kawe mai e tātau ētahi atu pūmanawa maha" ki te kāpata kōruru. I kī a Tēnā Kōpia he "tino kaha" te tūnga o te rōpū, ahakoa te pōti e whakaatu ana i muri i ngā Conservatives, ā, i tāpiritia kua puritia e Labour ngā tūru i roto i te pōti Paremata, ā, i toa i te pōti rangatira. "Ina pōti tonu te iwi, kua toa mātau," tana kī. I kī a ia he "tino māia" ka kitea e ngā tāngata "he tino rerekētanga te kāwanatanga Mahi me ngā kaupapa here Mahi ki o rātau oranga", e matapae ana i te hui a te rōpū o tērā wiki i Liverpool he "wāhi huri". I pātai mai mēnā kei te mōrearea a ia ki te hōrite i te kaiārahi Mahi o Mua, a Mikaera Waewae - nāna i tātuhi te huihuinga nui i ngā huihuinga, engari i ārahi a Labour ki tētahi hinganga taumaha i te tau 1983 - i kī a Tēnā Kōpia kua tūkinotia ngā wā o te rōpū i taua pōti nui e te SDP wehe. "He tino pai te mahi a Michael Foot, a, i mahi i tana tino pai," tana kī. "Ka pai ake tā mātou mahi."

title: E whakaae ana te kaihoko rongoā a Curtis Warren ki te whakahau a te kōti
summary: Kua whakaae te kaihoko rongoā whakaharahara o Curtis Warren kia whakatakotoria he rāhuitanga kōti ki a ia i te tukunga atu i te whare herehere.
text: Ko te tau 49 tau mai i Liverpool, e whakaarotia ana he taonga £300m i te maunu rongoā, i whawhai ki tētahi whakahau ārai hara nui. Heoi anō, i whakaae a Warren ki te raupapa i muri i ngā kōrero i waenganui i tana tīma ture me HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC). Ināianei ka kōrerorerotia e ngā rōpū tētahi rārangi rāhuitanga ka tukua e Warren. I te tau 2009, i hereheretia a Warren, i hereheretia mo te 13 tau i te tau 2009 mo te whakatakoto i te tarukino me te uara tiriti o te £1m ki Jersey, e tūmanakohia ana kia tukua i roto i te rua tau. I kī a Ariki Kānata QC, mō HMRC, nā "ētahi whakawhitiwhitinga o nā noa nei, kua taea e mātou te whakarite e tuku ana a [Mārō] ki te whakawā whakarāpopoto". Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Revenue & Customs

title: Ko te whakaoranga o UK 'i aukatia' e te kore o ngā kaipūkaha
summary: Ka taea te "aukati" te whakaoranga ohaoha o te UK i te kore pūkenga pūkaha, e whakatūpato ana i tētahi kaitohutohu kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Judith BurnsBBC News education reporter Prof John Perkins, te kaiwhakahaere pūtaiao matua i te Tari Pakihi, Innovation and Skills kua kitea "he tono nui mō ngā kaipūkaha". Kua tukuna e ia "he karanga ki te mahi" ki te kāwanatanga, ki ngā umanga me ngā kaiwhakaako kia "hīkoi ake" ki te whakaawe i ngā pūmanawa pūkaha ā muri ake me te whakatau i ngā iti pūkenga. I kī te Hēkeretari Pakihi a Vince Cable he torutoru noa iho ngā taitamariki e ako ana i te pūtaiao. "Me kaha te tūāpapa o ngā kaipūkaha i roto i te pāngarau me te pūtaiao, otirā ko te ahupūngao. He iti rawa te raweke wawe "He iti rawa te tokomaha o ngā rangatahi e kōwhiri ana i ēnei kaupapa i muri i te 16, i waenganui hoki i ngā wāhine," te kī a Tēnā Taura. I roto i tana Arotakenga o ngā Pūkenga Pūkaha, e kī ana a Prof Perkins e whakawhirinaki kē ana te UK ki te "hekenga whakaroto" ki te whakakī i ngā mahi pūkenga i ngā wāhanga matua pēnei i te unuhanga hinu me te korohū, te waka rererangi, me te rorohiko, te pūkaha hiko, ōmata hoki. "Ehara tēnei i te rongoā mo te wā roa. " Me tautoko tātau i ngā rangatahi o UK mā te whakarite i a rātau ki te whakataetae mō ngā mahi pūkaha pūkaha tino utu, pūkenga, te whakapai ake i ā rātou tirohanga mahi me te whakaiti i te hiahia ki te kawemai i ngā pūkenga pūkaha," te kī a te arotakenga. E tono ana mō te "raweke wawe whai take, tika hoki hei whakangākau i ngā kaipūkaha o āpōpō" me te whakarite kei a rātou ngā "tūāpapa mātauranga mārō hei whakauru ki te kaupapa". E tono ana te pūrongo ki te tokomaha o ngā rangatahi e taea ana ki te ako i "ngā marautanga uaua i roto i te pāngarau me te pūtaiao". E kī ana ko te UK e takamuri ana i ōna tauwhāinga i te tau o ngā pakeke 16 ki te 18 tau e ako ana i te pāngarau. 'Ngā mōhiotanga' e kī ana a Prof Perkins e mamae ana te umanga "i ngā mōhiotanga whānui me te kore kitenga e whakakaha ana i te rangatahi, ā, ko ngā kōtiro hoki kia kaua e whai hei mahi". E pā ana te pūrongo ki te pōti i mahia mō te whakahau o te Wiki Kaipūkaha Āpōpō, e tohu ana ko te hawhe anake o ngā pakeke 11 ki te 14 tau e whakaaro ana ki tētahi mahi pūkaha. I heke tēnei ki te 35% i waenganui i ngā kōtiro, ā, ko te 24% anake o ngā mātua o ngā kōtiro i kī he mahi pai te pūkaha mō a rātau tamāhine. Ka tātuhia e Prof Perkins "ētahi whakamarietanga kei te haere mātou ki te ahunga tika" me ngā tohutohu hei whakaawe i ngā kaipūkaha ā muri ake, he arotahi ki te pāngarau me te pūtaiao i ngā kura, ētahi atu akoranga me "tō mātou kaha haere tonu i roto i te mātauranga tiketike". E 22 ana tūtohutanga e tohutohu ana i ngā mahi poto me te wā roa kia "whiwhi i ngā karere tika ki te rangatahi" - otirā ko ngā kōtiro, kia tino kounga ai te whakangungu mahi, ā, "kei te tuku tonu te mātauranga tiketike". I kī te Tari Pakihi, Whakahaere me ngā Pūkenga e tata ana ki te £49m hei whakarewa i ngā pūkenga pūkaha. Tūmahi mo te wā roa: Mai i Hānuere, ka āhei ētahi £30m o tēnei moni ki te tono pūtea ōrite mō ngā aronui whakangungu hei whakatau i ngā iti pūkenga pūkaha tauwhāiti. Ka whiwhi tētahi atu £18m i tētahi whare whakangungu rangatira i Coventry, ā, ka whiwhi ngā Kaipūkaha o Āpōpō i te £250,000 hei whakahauhau i ngā tamariki kura ki te pūkaha. I kī a Terry Scuoler, te rangatira nui o EEF, te rōpū kaiwhakanao, e tohu ana i ngā kamupene e tata ana ki te 6,000: "E tika ana te whakamārama o te pūrongo i te hiahiatanga o tētahi paipa o ngā kaipūkaha whai pūkenga, me ngā tūtohutanga whai tikanga me pēhea tēnei e taea ai. " Ahakoa he mahi mo te wā roa tēnei, he mārama te karere a ngā kaitukumahi - kua rite mātou ki te mahi i te wero." I kī a Anne Spackman o te aroha Career Academies, e whakahaere ana i ngā aronui whakaakoranga hei whakarite i ngā tamariki kura mō te mahi, he tino nui ngā mahi ki te "whakatipu i te maha o ngā kaimahi tūpono" ki te pūkaha. "Ko te pūkaha he wāhi whai wāhi mahi engari kāore i te whai kaimahi pūkenga hei whakakī," te kī a Ms Spackman.

title: E kī ana a Eavis i 'kōwhiria' ngā kupu matua o Glastonbury mō te 2013
summary: E kī ana te kaiwhakahaere o Glastonbury, a Michael Eavis, kua "kōmaka kētia" ngā kupu matua o tērā tau.
text: Nā Greg CochraneNewsbeat kaipānui pūoro i Hōrana i whakaaturia e te tau 76 tau te rongo i a ia e whiwhi ana i tētahi whakawhiwhinga whiwhinga mo te roanga o te wā i ngā tohu hākari o Ūropi i Groningen, Hōrana. E kī ana hoki a ia e hiahia ana ia kia whakanuia e te hākari tōna huritau 50 i te tau 2020. I kī a Eavis i "whakatau" a ia ki te kite i te takahanga kia tae ki te tīmatanga i muri i te hākaritanga o tōna huritau 40 i te tau 2010. Ka kī a ia: "Kei te tino whakaaro ahau ki te mahi i ngā tau e 50 - kāore au i te kite he aha ahau e kore ai e mahi. " He tino rerekē, kei te tino pai ahau. Kāore au i te kite he aha e kore ai au e mahi. "Kei a au ngā pēne e hiahia ana ki te tākaro me ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te hoko i ngā tīkiti, nā reira he aha mātou e kore ai e haere tonu?" I kite te mutunga wiki o te tau 2011 i ngā mahinga matua mai i U2, Coldplay me Beyonce. E ai ki tā rātou huringa tūturu, ka pau te tau o te hākari i te tau 2012, engari ka hoki mai a tērā tau. I a ia e kōrero ana i ngā tohu hākari Ūropi o tēnei tau i te hākari Eurosonic Noorderslag i Groningen, Hōrana, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "I tino pai ahau ki te whiwhi pai ki ēnei tāngata, ā, i kitea he pūtake whakaaweawe, he tohutohu rānei." Ko Coldplay, kāore i tae mai, ko ngā toa pūoro nui i te pō tae atu ki te tango i te paraihe mō te taiopenga tino pai.

title: I rahua te utu o te kaupapa Arawhiti Kāri o Rāwāhi e £53m
summary: Ko tētahi mahere rahua ki te hanga i tētahi piriti e kapi ana i ngā rākau me ngā putiputi i runga i te Awa o Thames i waenganui o Rāwāhi, he utu e £53m, kua whakakitea.
text: I whakaaturia e tētahi uiui Transport for London (TfL) te Garden Bridge Trust i pau te £161,000 i runga i tētahi paetukutuku me te £417,000 i runga i tētahi gala mō te kaupapa i mahue. Neke atu i te £9m te utu o te hoahoa o te piriti, ā, i utua e te aroha ōna kaiwhakahaere e £1.7m. Neke atu i te £43m i puta mai i te pēke a te iwi whānui, ka tāpiritia e TfL. Ka tīmata ngā rangirua ki te karapoti i te kaupapa, e whakahaeretia ana e Boris Johnson, i muri i te ngaronga o te tautoko a te Koromatua o Rānōna, o Te Koromatua o Rānōna, o Aperira 2017. I whakarērea tikatia i a Aotearoa o taua tau i muri i te arotakenga i whakahaua kia tangohia. I a Hōngongoi 2015, tae atu ki te £60m o te pūtea tūmatanui i whakawāteatia ki te whakawhirinaki - £30m ia mai i Transport for London (TfL) me te Department for Transport (DfT). Ināianei ka utua e TfL tētahi moni tūmatanui whakamutunga e £5.5m ki te whakawhirinaki hei wāhanga o te whakaaetanga whakakorenga o te aronui, e kī ana te tinana waka he 40% iti iho i tērā pea. Mā te utu e āwhina ki te whakahoki moni i ngā kaituku tae atu ki te £3,200 ki te toa o tētahi whakawhiwhinga hoko Arawhiti Māra, kāore i whiwhi i tā rātou kēmu kīrangi o te "tēnehi tēnehi me Poihāne". I kī te mema o te Whakaminenga o Labour London, a Tom Copley AM: "He whakarihariha te kite i ngā utu o te Arawhiti pōhēhē o Boris e haere tonu ana ki te whakanui ake mō ngā kaihautū o Rāwāhi. " Me whakautu e Rawiri Karauna he aha, i tōna hiahia ki te kite i te kaupapa a Poihāne, ka uru atu ia ki te whakakore i ngā tohutohu a ngā kaimahi tūmatanui matua kia taea ai te whakaroa atu i te tuhituhi mō te Arawhiti." Ko te tātaritanga a te kaipānui waka o TE AO o Rāwāhi, ko Tom Edwards tēnei te tiara i runga i te Thames i ngaro tōna tiahoaho, kātahi ka mate. He nui te kī taurangi a te kaupapa, engari kāore he mea i tukua, ka horomia e ia te £43m o ngā moni tūmatanui i roto i te tukanga. Ko te whakapaunga nui rawa ko te kirimana £21m ki te hanga i te piriti - me ngā kaiwhakahauhau e hiahia tonu ana ki te mōhio he aha i whakaaetia ai i te wā kāore anō kia haumaru te whenua. He nui rawa ngā taipitopito i roto i te pūrongo Transport for London o nā tata nei: he utu £161k mō tētahi paetukutuku me te £417k mō tētahi kohi moni gala. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā he kore noa iho te whakapau moni. Ahakoa he tokomaha i hiahia ki te piriti, kāore ētahi. E kore ngā pātai e mutu i konei. I kī a Caroline Pidgeon, te tūru o te komiti waka o te Whakaminenga o Rāwāhi: "Ko ngā taipitopito o ngā moni moumou i pau i runga i te kaupapa Arawhiti Māra ko te whakaūnga whakamutunga o te tino wairangi o te kaupapa. " Kua whakapaua e te Garden Bridge Trust ngā moni tūmatanui i runga i te tikanga kāore e tika ana kia whanonga te aroha haepapa. "Kāore he aroha e hiahia ana ki te whakapau i te £160,000 ki tētahi paetukutuku, neke atu rānei i te £400,000 i runga i tētahi hapa gala." I kī te Tumuaki o te Whakarite Taone i TfL, a Alex Williams: "I mahi mātou ki te whakarite kua puritia te utu ki te wāhanga tūmatanui. " Kua whakaūngia e mātou ināianei te utu whakamutunga e hiahiatia ā-ture ana i raro i ngā ture o te whakaaetanga tuhituhi i whakaritea e te Kāwanatanga. Ka whakamutua ōkawatia e tēnei to mātau whakauru ki te kaupapa." Rārangi wā Arawhiti Māra

title: Ka huihui anō a Mark Ronson ki a Amy Winehouse
summary: Ko Mark Ronson rāua ko Amy Winehouse te wā tuatahi i mahi tahi ai mai i te pukaemi 2006 a te kaiwaiata Back To Black, nāna i hanga.
text: Nā Greg CochraneNewsbeat pūoro pūoro Ko te waiata, he uhi o te 60s It's My Party nā Lesley Gore, mō tētahi whakahiatotanga i whakaritea e te kaiwhakanao pūrākau o Quincy Jones. I a ia e kōrero ana ki Newsbeat ka kī a Ronson: "He pai ki a au, he tino pai. He tino mātauranga a ia i runga. "He tino rekareka te puta mai i taku pukaemi i reira te raina tūtohu katoa, te mea rānei i kī mai ai mātau ki a mātau anō, kāore he uhi, kāore he haona, kātahi ka mahi i tētahi pūkete tangi tino Amy pērā." Kāore anō kia whakaūngia tētahi rā tuku mō te whakahiatotanga. Ināianei, ka tukua te pukaemi takitahi tuarua a Mark Ronson Record Collection i te wā o Mahuru. Ko tana tuatahi, ko te Putanga, i haere ki te tau rua i roto i te tūtohi pukaemi, ā, i whakaaturia e ngā kaiwaiata pēnei i a Amy Winehouse e kapi ana i te Zutons' Valerie me Lily Allen e mahi ana i tōna ake putanga o Kaiser Chiefs' Oh My God.

title: E mārama ana a Piriniha Charles ki ngā rāhuitanga o te Karauna
summary: E mārama ana a Piriniha Charles ki ngā "rāhuitanga" a te ariki - ahakoa te taurangi pāpāho "kāore i te mōhiotia", e kī ana tētahi mana.
text: I roto i tētahi reta ki te Times, ka kī a William Nye, te hēkeretari tūmataiti a te rangatira, he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata i "pai ake" ki te mōhio ki te tūranga o te ariki kawanatanga. I kī a ia ka "whakaaweawe" te rangatira i te tauira a tōna whaea mehemea he kīngi a ia. Kua whakarārangitia e te Times tētahi haurongo o te rangatira e te kairīpoata a Catherine Mayer, e kī ana e hiahia ana ia ki te tautuhi anō i te arikitanga o UK. E kī ana te haurongo, Charles: Heart of a King: "I te whakamāramatanga i tōna tūranga hei uri tupu, kua tohu te rangatira i tētahi whakamāramatanga anō o te arikitanga. " Ko ētahi kōtiro - me te [Kuini] tonu - e wehi ana kāore te Karauna, ōna kaupapa rānei e whakaae ki te ohorere o te mea hou." Kua whakapuakina e te rangatira ngā tirohanga mō ngā take maha, tae atu ki ngā kura wetereo, te rongoā whakahāngai me te huringa āhuarangi. I roto i tētahi tuhinga i te Tūtira, ka kī te Times "Kua taea e Ingarangi te puku i te rangatira me te āhua o te wāhanga, engari e kore e roa e tū mō tētahi ariki raweke". I whakatūpatotia, ki te kore e taea e ia te tōkeke, "ka poto, ka weriweri tōna kīngitanga, ā, kāore pea e whai i tētahi atu". 'Te roanga o te ratonga' I roto i tana reta ki te Times, ka tuhituhi a Tēnā Nye: "Tērā tētahi taurangi kāore i te mōhiotia inā noa nei, i roto i ō tīwae me ētahi atu wāhi, mō te āhua o te Piriniha o Uēra ki te tūranga ariki. " I ngā wā katoa e hiahia ana tōna Ariki kia kaua e kōrero mō ngā take e pā ana ki tētahi wā heke mai kāore i te mōhiotia tōna rā, ā, ka puta ake i muri noa iho i te matenga o tōna whaea. "I muri i te hawhe rau tau i roto i te oranga tūmatanui, he torutoru noa iho te mea e pai ake ana i Tōna Ariki Ariki kia mārama ki ngā rāhuitanga tika me te tika i runga i te tūranga o te ariki ā-ture. " Me karangatia ia ki te torona, ka whakaaetia te Piriniha o Uēra e ngā tauira a tōna whaea me tōna tipuna tāne, i a ia e tātuhi ana i tōna ake wheako o te ratonga i te roanga o te wā." I kī tētahi kōrero mai i te Whare o Clarence, te whare o te Piriniha o Uēra me te Ariki o Cornwall, kāore i whakamanatia te haurongo, ā, kāore i whai urunga tāuke te kaituhi ki te rangatira, ki ana kaimahi rānei. Ko te whaea o te rangatira, ko Kuini Elizabeth II, i runga i te torona mai i te tau 1952.

title: Ka neke a Cairn Energy ki Senegal
summary: Kua pānuitia e te kaihōpara hinu me te korohū o Etinitini tētahi mahi hou i Senegal.
text: I puta mai te rongo i te whakaaturanga a te kamupene kua tapahia ōna hinganga mahi tau katoa ki te $194m (£128m). Kua pā a Cairn ki ngā utu hōpara kāore i tutuki. Heoi anō, i kī te rōpū kei roto i tētahi tūnga "moni taunaki", ā, ka whakanuia tana tohu mō te maha o ngā oko hinu e tūmanakohia ana e ana i ana mahi Kunirangi. I kī atu te rangatira nui o te kamupene, a Haimona Thomson, ki a BBC Radio Scotland: "Mai i te tirohanga a Cairn, kei te hanga mātou i tētahi kōpaki whārite, ā, kia taea ai e mātou te mahi i tēnā, kua whakarite mātou he tūnga moni pakari tā mātou. " Neke atu i te $1.5bn (£1bn) moni i runga i te rau toenga, ā, ko te uara o tā mātou hea i Cairn India, neke atu i te $1bn (£660m)." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki a mātau e pā ana ki te whiwhi i a mātau ki te wāhi tika kia āhei ai ki te whai i ngā ngohe ā-hōpara." I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka kī a Cairn me arotahi ana mahi keri i te tau 2013 i te Moana ki te Raki, i te takutai o Moroko. Ināianei kua tāpiritia te 'tāpiritanga ātaahua' o Senegal ki taua hōtaka, ā, i kī te kamupene e tohu ana i "tētahi tāpiritanga tino ātaahua ki tā mātou kōpaki Tawhē Atarangi tīariari". Me tatari te umanga hōpara hinu me te umanga whakanao tae noa ki te raumati 2014 i mua i te tīmata anō i ana mahi keri tautohetohe i ngā wai o Kunirangi. Kua tino whakahētia taua mahi, i te papa Pitu, e nga kaitiaki taiao. Kua mahi ngātahi a Cairn i reira me te kamupene pūngao o Nōwei o Statoil. I kī a Tēnā Thomson e māia tonu ana a Cairn ki te angitu i Kunirangi. I pānuitia e ia he whakamohoa i runga i ngā rauemi tūpono, mai i te 700 miriona ngā paero ki te toru miriona pāro. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Cairn Energy

title: Te tēpoko o te Kura Tuarua o Cwmcarn: Ngā āwangawanga mātua me ngā ākonga
summary: He mārire, he wātea hoki ngā huarahi e ahu atu ana ki te Kura Tuarua o Cwmcarn.
text: Nā Nick DermodyBBC News Ina kī tonu te hau i ngā oro o ngā tamariki i te papa tākaro, ko te haruru anake o ngā waka mai i te A465 e haere ana. I te wā o te tina, ka kī tonu ngā ara i ngā taitamariki i roto i te kākahu whero, mā me te pango, e huri haere ana, he tokomaha e haere ana ki te kāinga pātata ki te hoko kai i ngā toa me ngā wāhi kai. Engari kotahi anake e kitea ana: ko Nadia Yamamoto, 15, e eke ana i tana hoiho, ko Layla. Ehara i te rā kura noa iho mō Natia. Engari kāore anō mō ērā atu tauira e 900 i te katinga ohorere o to rātau kura me te kore whakatūpato i tērā Paraire i muri i te kitenga o te tēpoko i muri i tētahi tūhuratanga hanganga. Kua mahue ngā tauira me ngā mātua i te pōhēhē, ā, ka miharo he aha ka tūpono mai. I te pō Mane, ka tīmata ngā tauira pakeke ki te whiwhi hononga ki ngā mahi kāinga i Twitter, engari kāore anō kia āwhina ki te katoa. "Kāore aku pūkete Twitter," te kī a Natia. "Me whakatatū e au tētahi ina tae au ki te kāinga." "Kei te eke hoiho ahau nā te mea kāore he mea atu māku e mahi. Ko te wāhi kino rawa atu ki a au ko te kore mōhio āhea tātau e hoki ana. "Kāore he tino whakahau ki te mahi i ngā mahi kura i te kāinga." E hiahia ana te whaea o Natia, a Sally, kia tirohia ngā tamariki katoa mō te tēpoko. "Ko taku māharahara ināianei ka kī ōna pūkahukahu i te tēpoko i roto i te 40 tau," tana kī. The closure of the school has had a significant impact on Cwmcarn and other nearby communities where pupils live. He tamāhine tā Hōne Hart, e 40, mai i Risca, ko Shaunne Lee, 16, i te kura. Ka kī a ia: "E hiahia ana ahau kia hoki mai a ia ki te kura. " He tau hira tēnei mōna, kei te mahi a ia i ōna taumata A. Kāore mātou i te mōhio kia pēhea te roa e katia ai... E hiahia ana a ia ki te haere ki te kura." He tama 11 tau tā te whaea o Lorraine Morgan, ko Horano, kei te kāinga ināianei. "He tino whakararuraru nā te mea i ohorere te mahi," tana kī. "Kāore au i te māharahara ki te tēpoko, i mōhiotia i reira. E mōhio ana koe he aha i kore ai e mahi i mua. "Kei te tākaro a ia me ōna hoa ināianei, e whakaaro ana ia he mātao, engari kāore au e hiahia kia haere ia ki te kore kura." E kī ana a Joanne Barrett e whakahaere ana i tētahi wharekai pātata, a Chat 'n' Snack, e 80% o te umanga i ahu mai i ngā tauira tuaono i te kura. Mai i te Mane kāore anō rātau kia kite i tētahi. "Kei te haere tonu mai rātou ki konei me ngā parakuihi kua tunua," tana kī. "Ko te tikanga kia heke iho ngā tauira tuaono anake, engari i ētahi wā he tau 11 e haere mai ana. " Kai te mārire te kāinga." Ko Carol Brimble, e 63, he kaihoroi i Cwmcarn mo te 30 tau i mua i tana haerenga i te tau 2005. I kī a ia i mōhio tonu ngā kaimahi he tēpoko i te kura, tae atu ki te kōrero mā ngā whakapiripiri i runga i ngā pakitara. "Kāore au i whakaaro he kino rawa ta rātau kati i te kura," tana tāpiri mai. "I korerotia mai ki a mātau, ki te kore e whakararurarutia, he pai." He rongo pai ake i te Tūrei me te pānuitanga ka whakatuwhera anō te kura i te Paraire. Engari ko ngā rara o ngā mea e puta ana i Cwmcarn e tata ana ki te rongo puta noa i Wales i te mea e whakahaua ana ngā kura katoa kia tuku pūrongo mō ō rātou taumata tēpoko a tērā wiki.

title: Ka whakarewaina e RNLI te tono poti a Hato Rawiri e £150k
summary: Kua whakarewaina e te RNLI tētahi puku kohi moni hapori e £150,000 ki tōna teihana waka whakaora hou o Hato Rawiri.
text: Kei te hangaia tētahi whakakapinga £9.5m i te taha o te whare poti me te ara o nāianei o te aroha i te taone o Pembrokeshire. E hiahiatia ana te whare hei whakanoho i te poti whakaora hou e £2.5m i tukuna i tērā tau. Ko te whutupōro whutupōro nui o Welsh ko Gerald Davies me te kaiwhutupōro o te ao whānui o Wales o Īna Walsh i tuku i to rātau taumahatanga ki te whakarewatanga kohi moni i te Mane. 'Halfway house' Coxswain Dai John said the fundraising aimed to help the community into "taking ownership" of the new building which is expected to provide a 100-year base for the volunteer lifeboat crew. E 100 tau te pakeke o te whare poti me te ara o nāianei, ā, e 140 tau te pakeke o te whare poti taketake i muri i a ia. He nui rawa te poti whakaora hou o Tamar mō te whare poti o nāianei, ā, me noho i runga i tētahi taunga pātata. Ka kī a Tēnā Hoani: "He take kei to mātau whare. Ka pā te moana, ā, kei te pupuhi ētahi o ngā raima i raro. "The facilities which lifeboat crews needed 100 years ago are different from what we need nowadays and there's no prospect of being able to adapt the old building, we haven't go the space to do it. " Kua mutu mātau ki tētahi whare haurua. Kua whiwhi mātou i te poti, ā, ināianei kei te kimi mātou ki te whakaoti i te mahi ākau kia whai teihana ai te poti hei noho." I kī a Tēnā Hoani e tūmanako ana ia kia oti te teihana hou i te tōmua o te ngahuru i te tau 2015. E rua ngā kaimahi wā katoa o te teihana poti whakaora, ā, e 28 ngā kaimahi tūao. Slipways Ko te mahi he wāhanga o te £54m e haumi ana te aroha ki ngā whare poti rere huri noa i te takutai o Welsh. Kua neke kē ngā kaimahi ki tētahi whare poti hou i Mumbles i Swansea. Kua tata oti te mahi i tētahi teihana poti whakaora hou i Porthdinllaen i Gwynedd, ā, kua tīmata te mahi i Moelfre i Anglesey.

title: E rima tau te ngaro o te poti ki te whānau 'harikoa'
summary: Kua huihuia anō tētahi poti e rima tau e ngaro ana ki ōna rangatira.
text: I mawhiti a Roxy, e whitu, i te haerenga ki nga kararehe i Kingswood, South Gloucestershire i te tau 2013. Ko te rangatira o Te Hukihuki, e 35, i tirotiro i nga tiriti e rapu ana i a ia, a, ka whakatakotoria he pānui whakaahua o te tabby e arohaina ana, kaore he hua. Engari i muri i te tīmatanga o te tārewa a Roxy i roto i te kāri a Amy Ward inā noa nei, ka mauria ia e ia. Ka kī a Miss Ward: "He tino angiangi tōna āhua, ā, e mārama ana he puruhi tāna, nā reira ka tīmata mātou ki te whāngai i a ia, ā, ka karanga atu ki te RSPCA kia ngana ki te hopu i a ia, engari i mataku a ia. " I ngana tonu ahau ki te puru i a ia ki roto i tētahi pouaka, engari i tata tonu tana haehae i a au, nā reira ka tīmata mātou ki te whāngai i a ia kia tata atu ki te whare." Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: I āta whiwhi a Miss Ward i te whakawhirinaki a Roxy, ā, ka tīmata ia ki te haere mai ki roto, ā, ka taea e ia te hoatu i ētahi rongoā puruhi ki a ia, kātahi ka whakawai i a ia ki roto i tētahi pouaka. Ka whakahokia e ia te poti ki aua kararehe i ngaro atu ai ia, ā, i a ia e moroiti ana, ka taea e rātau te whakataki i tōna rangatira. 'Merekara Kirihimete Iti' i whiwhi waea a Mrs Oha, ā, tokorua ana tamāhine - e whā me te iwa marama te pakeke - i whiwhi waea i te 29 o Hakihe. Ka kī a ia: "Ko ia to mātau merekara Kirihimete iti, e tino hari ana mātau. " I whakaaro ahau kua mate a ia, engari te āhua nei kei te pai a ia, e tino whakamihi ana mātou ki a Amy mō te kawe mai i a ia." I tēnei wā kei te hākinakina a Roxy i te whakapehapeha o te wāhi i runga i te moenga o ōna rangatira, he nui tonu te whakarihariha o tana whakakapinga o Harley, te kī a Mrs Stokes. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua rerekē ngā mea mai i a ia i konei whakamutunga nā reira e toru ngā poti me ngā tamariki tokorua, ā, e noho ana mātou i tētahi whare kē, engari e tūmanako ana ka noho a ia i roto i te wā poto."

title: Me haere ngā pirihimana ki te mahi i roto i te ōrite?
summary: Kua huatau mai tētahi kura whakaaro kia mau kākahu ngā pirihimana i a rātau e haere ana, mai i te mahi hoki hei whakanui ake i te kitenga pirihimana.
text: I kī te Whakawhiti Kaupapahere e ōrite ana ki te whai āpiha 1,200 anō i runga i ngā tiriti i Rāwāhi - engari i kī te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana he kore noa iho te ariā, ā, ka whakaritea ngā āpiha me ō rātou whānau hei ūnga tūpono. Kua urupare nga pirihimana ki nga tono a te kura whakaaro. Anei tētahi tīpakonga o ā rātou kōrero: Mai i te wānanga Pirihimana Tuihono o UK e kī ana Scouse_bobby: mēnā e hiahia ana rātou kia ōrite ahau ki te mahi, ki hea ahau e penapena ai i taku CS Spray me te Taser i te kāinga? Ka utua ahau e rātou hei utu i taku kāpeka ngaru rererangi i te kāinga? Mēnā ka mutu taku hopu i tētahi tangata i taku haerenga ki te mahi, ā, ka poto taku rohe, ka aha e pā ana ki ngā tau kaimahi? Ka utua ahau mō te hopu i mua i te mahi, ā, he aha te utu? Ka aha mēnā ka hopu ahau i taku hokinga ki te kāinga - ka utua ahau, ā, he aha te mokatere? Ka aha mēnā ka whaia ahau ki te kāinga e ngā tangata hara o te rohe i te mea e mārama ana taku mōhiotanga hei pirihimana? Tērā kē ētahi hoa mahi kua tino whakararuraru kia kitea, ā, kua tahuna o rātau motokā. Heoi anō, mēnā he ngāwari noa iho te mōhio ki ia pirihimana, ka nui ake tēnei? Ka whai kawenga rānei ngā pirihimana hei rōpū whakahaere mō tōku kāinga me tōku whānau? He aha te mea e pā ana ki te inihua motokā - mēnā ka taraiwa ahau ki te mahi i roto i te ōrite katoa, nō reira e hiahia ana ahau ki taku tātua kete, e hia ngā inihua e kore e pai ki te inihua i tētahi waka e whakamahia ana mō tētahi take pirihimana (arā) me tētahi waka e mau ana i tētahi pū Wāhanga 5, 2 rānei? Kei te huatau rātou ki te whakamahi i ngā waka tūmatanui? Mēnā ko rātau te kaiutu tāke me utu mō ētahi atu ratonga tereina i te mea kāore e taea e au te hoki ki te kāinga i muri i ngā pō, i ngā waka tūmatanui rānei, ā, kāore e taea e au te mahi mō ngā ata mā te waka tūmatanui, koia ahau i taraiwa ai i taku motokā! He ariā whakarihariha, ā, e miramiratia ana i runga ake nei, he nui ake ngā take i te whakatau! E kī ana te kaiwhakaoti raruraru: Ka puta atu koe i tō whare i te ata, ā, ko ō hoa noho tata, e mōhio ana, e whakamihi ana ki tō mahi hira i roto i te iwi, ka tono atu ki a koe he "āpiha ata mārie" i a koe e haere ana ki te teihana tereina. He aha pea ka hē! Aroha mai - i whakaaro ahau i runga i te huinga o "Heartbeat" mō tētahi meneti. Mai i te wānanga Pirihimana Ahurewa IveToldYouOnce tuhituhi: OK. Mēnā kei te ōrite ahau, kia taea ai e au te mahi i ngā 'mea' e pā ana ki te mahi, ka hiahia ahau, kāore e tonoa, taku PPE [Personal Protective Equipment]. Ki taku whakaaro he tika tēnā. Nā reira ka hiahia ahau ki tētahi wāhi haumaru hei pupuri i taku CS, TASER me te reo irirangi - he moka whāiti katoa o te kete. Me noho he momo haumaru e mau ana ki tētahi pakitara matua i tētahi wāhi o taku whare. Ka taea e au te utu i te 'reti' i runga i te mokowā e hiahiatia ana....... ā, me whakahiko e au taku PR i te kāinga - nā reira ka hiahia ahau ki tētahi momo utu mō te hiko hei whakahiko. Ka mahia hoki e au tētahi haora mahi tāpiri mō ia nekehanga. Ka utua ahau mō tēnā, he wāhanga rānei o ngā 'whakaritenga mahi ngāwari' e hiahia ana a HMG ki te whakamana? Ka taea anake e au te whakaaro ka pā anake tēnei ki aua āpiha e haere ana ki te mahi i runga i te waka tūmatanui..... ā, e whakaaro ana ahau nā te mea ko te Think Tank (tērā pea) e mahi ana i Rānana, ā, he waka tūmatanui tōtika kāore i te nuinga o te whenua........... E whakaaro ana tētahi, i a au e tika ana 'i te mahi' ina wehe atu ahau i te whare, ka hiahiatia e taku motokā he inihua tāpiri. Aue, ā, kāore e taea e au te whakarongo ki te reo irirangi (pērā i te Reo Irirangi 4) ki te mutu taku rongo i taku PR. E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka whakararu tēnā i aku Motika, engari kei reira koe. He aha rātau e kore ai e haere ki te poaka katoa me te whakarite i ngā kāinga o ngā āpiha hei 'teihana pirihimana rangitahi' i a koe e kite ana i ngā kapa e pehipehi ana (i ngā āhuatanga katoa o te kupu) ina wehe atu rātau i tō rātou whare kia pūrongotia ngā hara ki a rātou - kia tonoa rānei kia mahia. Ka kitea e au ināianei, he patoto i te tatau i te 2000hrs, ā, ko te tangata mai i raro i te tiriti e kī ana "E mōhio ana ahau he kapa koe, ā, ki taku whakaaro ka tīmata koe i ngā pō ākuanei, engari he tangata āhua pōrua kei raro i te huarahi e hiahia ana koe ki te titiro atu". Kāore au i te mōhio mō ērā atu o koutou, engari ka whakamahia e au taku wā haere ki te mahi ki te whakaaro i te rā kei mua, kia mārire me te hau i ngā āwangawanga o te ao/pō. Ka mahia e au tēnā kia whakahekea ai e au te nui o te "ao pōrangi" ki roto i tōku whare kia pā ki taku whānau/oranga tūmataiti. Ka tuhituhi a Otis: Mēnā ka haere ahau ināianei ki te mahi i roto i te ōrite, ko te tikanga kua kore e taea e au te pānui i te pepa, te kai, te inu rānei i taku haerenga, pēnei i ētahi atu? Ko te tikanga o tēnei e whai wāhi ana ahau ki tētahi wehenga utu i te taenga atu ki taku neke? Mēnā ka haere ōrite tātau, ā, ināianei ka pōreareatia e te katoa me te maha nā te mea he iti noa iho ngā mahi i runga, i raro hoki i te tereina, ka kawea mai ki waho (arā, e 3 ngā waka ki runga, he tangata kai paipa i roto i ngā whare haumaru). E herea ana mātau ki te mahi. Ki te hē katoa, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te pūrua, he maha ngā pānga. Tētahi, ka puritia nga tereina puta noa i te wāhi, e mau ana ki ngā Pou i te wā e tatari ana ngā Āpiha ki te āwhina whawhai, ngā waka tūroro, ērā atu mea. Rua, ka hiahiatia e tātau he BTP nui ake [Pirihimana Waka Peretania] hei whāngai i ēnei mahi katoa. E toru, ka tōmuri ahau mo taku ake nekehanga, tae atu ki ērā atu pāhihi katoa. Mai i te Manukura Twitter o te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana a Paul McKeever, @PoliceFedChair, tuhituhi: E ngana ana ngā whakaaro PolEx ki te hīpoki i ngā whāwhā āputa ka kawea mai e te 20% tapahi me te 32,000 ngā āpiha/kaimahi ngaro ki te mahi pirihimana. Ka tuhituhi te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, @PoliceFedforNI: E mahi ana i roto i te ōrite? Ko te whakamomori i konei, ā, i te nuinga o te wā kāore i te haumaru ki tētahi atu wāhi. He utu nui hei utu mo te kitenga tāpiri. @KennyPlod tuhituhi: Te āhua nei ko te kaupapa matua o te @Policy_Exchange e mahi ana ahau i ia haora e tukua ana e te atua, kāore i te kite i taku whānau me te mate i mua i taku tono penihana @TheCustodySgt tuhituhi: Āhea whakarongo ai a Govt ki ērā o tātau e mahi ana i te mahi, ehara i te mātauranga kāore ō rātou wheako ki te mahi pirihimana? Kaua koa te whakauru, kaua e aukati. @Peelian_cop tweets: Ko taku mahi ki te tiaki i taku whānau e haere mai ana i te 1 e wehi ana ahau @Blair_Gibbs kore ahau e whakamōrearea i a rātou, i taku kāinga rānei ki te hoatu i te whakaaro o ētahi atu āpiha @99Ado tuhituhi: nō reira wht ki te mahi koe i ngā kākahu tōkau, me haere koe ki te mahi i roto i te kākahu kia huri ai ki ngā kākahu,  He āhua mōrearea @SuptPayneWMP te tuhituhi: E whakaaro ana ahau kia whakaurua he rama kikorangi kōhiko ki taku i-waea hei whakarei ake i te kitenga pirihimana ina tweet ahau. #stupidpolicingideasday Ō īmēra Hei āpiha mahi, ā, ka taea e au te kī atu ka waiho e au taku mahi i mua i te mau ōrite ki te mahi, ahakoa kāore au i te kākahu e mōhio ana ahau ki te kaha o te whai - tokotoru aku tamariki tamariki me tētahi wahine, ā, ko to rātau haumarutanga te mea nui. E mōhio ana ahau kua whaia ngā hoa mahi i mua - kua pakaru o rātau kāinga, ā, i ētahi wā ka whakawehi o rātau ora. Kingi Kenny He pirihimana mahi ahau i Scotland i tēnei wā i runga i ngā mahi parea nā te hapu. Ko tētahi o ngā mea tuatahi e mahia ana e rātou ko te kī kaua e ōrite ki te kitea koe, ā, ka ūkuia koe i tō haerenga ki te mahi. Mehemea i mōhio ētahi o ōku hoa noho tata he pirihimana ahau, he rā āpure tā rātou. A, ki te huatau rātau kia puritia te kete e hiahiatia ana i te kāinga, ka aroha ngā tāhae ki tēnā. He tino nati. Keiti: He tūturu ēnei tāngata? Tata tonu taku hawhe ki te neke kāinga nā te kitenga o tētahi tangata hara i te wāhi i noho ai ia. E tino hiahia ana ahau kia waiho e rātau nga whakataunga ki te iwi e mōhio ana, ā, kaua e whakaaro nui mai i muri i te tēpu. Birmingham Fox He matua ahau no tētahi rorohiko e mahi ana. He tino tūturu te mōrea o te tauwhiro, ehara i te kino ki te NI engari he tūturu, pēnei i te kitenga i ō taea kua rītahatia, kua pakaru te whare, ērā atu mea. E mōhio ana ahau he kōtaha iti tonu taku tama mō aua take. I tērā taha, he whatu takirua a ia i a ia e weto ana i te mahi, a, ka mauria tana reo irirangi i te haerenga ki te mahi. Ka puta wawe tonu atu ngā mea whakaroto. Pāpā o Andy: Kāore au i te mōhio ki tētahi āpiha, kaimahi ā-iwi rānei e haere ana i te taha o tētahi tangata e mate ana nā te mea kāore anō rātou kia tīmata ki te mahi. He nui tonu tā mātou mahi me te kore e whakamōhio i a mātau ki te tūkinotanga. Engari ka wehi taku whaea pakeke ki te hoatu e au he hīkoi ki a ia e mau ana i taku kākahu - ka pēnei a ia i te pōhēhētanga i roto i te tiakitanga. Jessegee Hei PC e noho ana i te rohe MET, ka eke ahau i tētahi motopaika ki te mahi. Ki te aukati tētahi i ahau i runga i taku motopaika ka tōmuri ahau mo te neke, ka tino whakararuraru i ngā rauemi. Ka taea e au te tāpiri atu kāore au e whiwhi waka koreutu, ā, he maha aku hopunga mahi kāore i te ōrite. Kua tāruatia ponotia ngā tākupu Rocketguy mai i ngā pae pāpāho pāpori

title: Momo Inia: He iti ngā kēhi Covid engari e ngokingoki ana
summary: Kei te iti tonu ngā kēhi coronavirus i te UK, engari he tohu o te pikinga iti, e huatau ana ngā whika o te Office for National Statistics (ONS).
text: Nā Rahera SchraerHealth kaipānui Hauora Ka rite tonu te whiu a te ONS i tētahi tauira matapōkere o te iwi whānui hei whakatau tata i ngā taumata o te huaketo, ahakoa i roto i ngā tāngata kāore ō rātou tohumate, kāore rānei i te whakamātauria. Tata ki te haurua o ngā mate i tīkina te āhua nei nā te rerekētanga i kitea tuatahitia i Īnia. Engari ko ngā raraunga ā-motu e hua ana kei te herea tonutia ki ētahi wāhi. E 60,000 ngā tāngata i te UK i pāngia e te coronavirus i te wiki tae atu ki te 22 o Mei, he pikinga tata ki te 10% mai i te 54,000 tāngata i te wiki tōmua. E ōrite ana tērā ki te 0.09% o te iwi whānui - kotahi rānei i roto i te 1,080 tāngata. I te Paraire i whakaaturia e ngā raraunga ā-motu e 4,182 ngā tāngata i whakamātauria he pai mō Covid, 134 i whakaaetia ki te hōhipera, ā, 10 i mate. Nā reira kāore tonu i te nui o te Covid i whakaritea ki te taumata o te hōtoke. Engari he tohu o te pikinga i Ingarangi, i Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki i te rua wiki o mua. I Wales, ka noho pūmau tonu ngā kēhi. Nō tēnei wā, he iti noa iho tēnei pikinga puta noa i te UK - engari e hua ana ngā raraunga he nui ake ngā pikinga i roto i ētahi mana ā-rohe ruarua noa iho. Kāore ngā raraunga ONS i te pakaru e te mana ā-rohe, i te mea kāore i te nui ngā tāngata i ia rohe hei hoatu i ngā whakatau tata tika. Nā reira he pai mō te kite i ngā āhuatanga ā-motu, engari he iti iho te pai ki te piki i ngā rerekētanga paetata. Ahakoa he iti noa iho ngā pikinga katoa, ka huna tēnei i ngā tara nui i ngā wāhi e maha ana ngā kēhi o te momo Īnia, tae atu ki Bolton, Blackburn me Bedford. Tērā pea ka tītahatia ēnei whika ā-motu e te whakamātautau pātōtō i ngā wāhi āwangawanga, kātahi ka piki ake ētahi atu kēhi. Ko ngā raraunga Public Health England me ONS e huatau ana tata ki te 40-50% o ngā kēhi hōu ko te momo B.1.617.2 i kitea i Īnia i tērā wiki o Mei. Ko te rerekētanga i tēnei wā - i whakaritea ki ngā ngaru o mua - ko te rongoā, ko te tikanga kia whati i te hononga i waenga i te whakapokenga me te mate. I muri i ngā werohanga e rua, he āhua pai tonu ngā wero ki te momo Īnia pērā ki te momo Kent. I Bolton - kei a ia ngā tau kēhi teitei rawa i te UK - ko te nuinga o ngā tūroro hōhipera kāore i te tino werohia, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā kēhi kei roto i ngā tāngata kāore, kātahi anō rānei ka āhei ki te werohia. I te motu, kua hinga tonu te maha o ngā tūroro i te hōhipera. Engari i te Hauauru ki te Raki, e tino pāngia ana e te momo B.1.617.2, kei te tīmata te piki ake o ngā whakaurunga hōhipera. I te mea kātahi anō ka tīmata te ngokingoki o ngā kēhi i te UK, tērā pea ka nui ake te pikinga o ngā whakaurunga hei whai - he takamuri tonu i mua i te whakamāoritanga o te mate ki tētahi mate e tino taumaha ana ki te tuku i tētahi tangata ki te hōhipera. Koia tērā i mahue ai tētahi āputa e rima wiki i waenganui i ia hipanga o te whakaiti i ngā rāhuitanga raka, kia nui ai te wā kia tino kitea aua pānga. Na tenei pikinga o nga keehi o mua tata nei, ka tino nui te wiki e whai ake nei, e rua ranei ki te kite mena me te nui o te pana i te maha o nga whakaurunga hohipera me nga mate. Ko ēnei whika he take matua ina whakatau nga minita kāwanatanga mēnā ka taea te haere tonu nga whakangāwari o te 21 o Pipiri. Ngā whakairoiro nā Daniel Dunford me te Tīma Tuhitaka Arokite me te Raraunga

title: Mōrearea kaiheke: Me pēhea e urupare ai te EU ki te tomokanga?
summary: E whakaae ana te EU he iti rawa ōna hātepe whakangungu, e anga ana ki te tomokanga nui rawa atu o ngā kaiheke mai i nga pakanga o Balkana o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua.
text: Nā Te Rūnanga o Te Aotearoa, kua ohorere a Aotearoa i ngā tūkinotanga kaiheke i te Māuirangi me te makitaunu o te hunga whakaruru - he tokomaha mai i Hiria i haea e te pakanga - i pokanoatia e ngā kaihoko tāngata. Waihoki, ka taea e nga kāhui o Uropi, kaua e whakapae tētahi ki tētahi, te mahi tōtahi ki te whakamutu i te raruraru? Anei ngā wāhi matua e rima e taea ai e te whakaaetanga EU te whakangāwari i te raruraru. E whakaae ana ki ngā ture whakangungu kua uru a Hakari ki Kariki me Itari hei wāhiwera kaiheke, e āwangawanga ana i ngā tau e tūmanako ana ki te noho ki te EU. Kua kōpikopiko ngā pokapū kaiwhiwhi i ngā whenua "frontline". I te nuinga o nga take e raruraru ana ngā mana ki te waipuke o ngā kerēme whakangungu. Ko te tikanga o ngā ture pūnoa tōtika ko te tiritiri raraunga mō ngā kaiheke, pēnei i ngā tapukara me ētahi atu ID matua, kia taea ai te aroturuki i ā rātou nekeneke. He nui ake ngā tīma tohunga EU kua kīa kia āwhina i ngā mana ā iwi ki te tātari i ngā kaiheke ina tae mai rātou me te tukatuka tere i ngā kerēme. Me tino whakarerekētia hoki te Ture o Dublin, e tika ana kia tukatuka te whenua EU i te wāhi tuatahi ka tae mai te kaiheke ki te kerēme whakangungu a te kaiheke. Kāore te pūnaha i hoahoatia mō tētahi raruraru pēnei i tēnei wā. I roto i tana Rārangi Take Ūropi mo te Hekenga, e kī ana te Kōmihana o Ūropi kāore a Dublin i te mahi. I te tau 2014, e rima noa iho ngā tūnga EU i whakahaere i te 72% o ngā taupānga whakangungu katoa. Kai te tautohetohe a Hakari ki ōna hoa noho tata ko Ateria rāua ko Tiamana ko wai e rēhita ana i ngā mano o nga kaiwhaiwhai. E kī ana ngā whenua "frontline", me ētahi o ō rātou hoa Pākehā ki te rāwhiti i te EU, ko te nuinga o ngā kaiheke e hiahia ana ki te tae ki ngā whenua rangatira pēnei i Tiamana, Huitene me te UK. Nā reira ka pātai rātau: he aha te take i rēhita ai me te whare i ngā kaiheke i tētahi whenua e whakaaro ana rātau ki te wehe ahakoa? Engari ko te tautohetohe tautohetohe, kaua nga kāwanatanga e karo i a rātau kawenga atawhai. I raro i te ture o te ao whānui, ko te hunga whakaruru tūturu - ko ngā tāngata e rere ana i te whawhai, i te whakatoinga rānei - e whai mana ana ki te hōhuru. A, ko te mahi iti, kāore rānei he mea hei āwhina i a rātau ka whakaroa noa iho i to rātau mamae. He tautohetohe mura tērā te tautohetohe mura mo tētahi tono EU mo te tohatoha ā iwi, kia tika ai te tiritiri i te pānga o nga kerēme whakangungu. Ā, kei te nui haere ngā karanga kia whakanuia te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e mau ana. Kāore i tutuki te whakamātau a te Kōmihana o Ūropi ki te whakapati i ngā kāwanatanga mema kia whakaae ki tētahi pūnaha mōrahi whakahau mō te mau i ngā Hiriani me ngā Eriteria e 40,000 i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei. I whakaae rātau i a Hōngongoi kia whakaae ki te 32,500 i runga i te tūroro. I kōwhiria e te UK tētahi mōrahitanga, mā te whakamahi i tētahi mana i whakaritea e ia. Tērā pea ka kōwhiri a Airangi, engari i kōwhiria kia kauā e kōwhiri. Ināianei ka whakarite te UK kia tae atu ki te 20,000 anō ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani i roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei, mai i ngā puni i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. Ko te nuinga o nga kāwanatanga o Ūropi ki te rāwhiti e whakahē ana ki te tohatohatanga, e kī ana kāore ngā kaiheke e hiahia ana ki te noho ki o rātau whenua. I roto i tētahi kōrero tōtahi i te 4 o Mahuru, ka kī ngā kaiārahi o te Whenua o Taikarowākia, o Hakari, o Pōrana me Horokia "e kore e whakaaetia ngā tono e ahu ana ki te whakaurunga o [tētahi] whakahau, pūmau hoki mō ngā tikanga pārurutanga". E pātai ana hoki nga kaiārahi o Horokia me Hakari ki te kaupapa o Uropi "Karaitiana" e mau ana i te tokomaha o nga Pirihitini. He tokomaha nga kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku kua rere mai i Hiria, i Iraki, i Awhekenetāna, i Pakitāne - ko ngā whenua katoa o te nuinga o te Mohimana. Engari kāore anō kia ngaro atu te mahere tohatoha. Kai te pana a Wīwī, Tiamana me Itari. Kua tautuhia te Kōmihana ki te hura i tētahi tikanga EU pūmau mō te tohatoha i ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku puta noa i te kōti iwi e 28. Heoi anō, ka pā anake te tohatohatanga ki ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani me Eriteria, nā reira kāore te tikanga e whakatika i te raruraru. E hiahia ana te Perehitini o te Kaunihera o Ūropi a Donald Tusk ki tētahi ūnga nui ake, e karanga ana ki te "tuari tika o te hunga whakaruru e 100,000 neke atu rānei". Na te whiu i te hekenga i te pūtake kua whakarewaina e te EU nga tautiaki moana i Ripia i haea e te whawhai - te pūtake o nga tūkinotanga maha o nga kaiheke i te moana. Tērā ētahi kaupapa hai whakangaro i nga poti o nga kaiwhaiwhai tāngata. Ko te kāwanatanga o UK i waenganui i ērā e whakawhāiti ana i te hiahia ki te tātā i te rere o ngā kaiheke i te pūtake, ki te whakamutu i a rātau haerenga mōrearea ki Uropi. Engari he matatini ngā atekōkiri o te hekenga o nāianei, ā, e hiahiatia ana e te EU ngā mahi āwhina mo te wā roa. Ka tino rerekē te whakamutu i te pakanga i Hiria - engari he tawhiti tonu tēnā. Ko ngā Hiriani te rōpū nui rawa o ngā kaiheke e rere ana ki Uropi. Neke atu i te whā miriona ngā hunga whakaruru kua ringihia ki Tāke, Repanona me ētahi atu whenua noho tata mai i Hiria. Ko te UK te kaituku āwhina EU nui rawa mō aua hunga whakaruru, ā, e tautohe ana ko te nuinga e hiahia ana ki te noho ki te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. He torutoru noa iho ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani i tangohia e nga whenua rangatira o te Kōwhiti Arāpia - ā, e whakahau ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā i a rātau kia nui ake te mahi hei āwhina. Tērā anō te hekenga nui mai i Eritrea, e ngaro ana nga tūkinotanga motika tangata. Mā te whakamutu i tōna papā whakatotoka ki Etiopia e āwhina ki te whakaiti i ngā tau. Engari, kua wehea anōtia te EU me pēhea te rutu i taua raruraru. Mō Āwherika ā-roto-Ahapa, ka taea e te āwhina EU kua ūnga te waihanga i ngā mahi paetata me te whakaiti i te rere o ngā kaiheke ohaoha. Engari he tokomaha hoki e rere ana i ngā papā hōhonu i Naria, i Hūtane, i Somalia me te Whenua Manapori o Kongo, e hiahia ana ki ngā rongoā tōrangapū me ngā rongoā ohaoha. E tono ana tēnā i tētahi kaupapa here ā-whenua EU kua whakaritea, whai rawa. Ara Māuirangi i waenganui i te 1 o Hānuere me te 28 o Aotearoa: e 322,914 ngā kaiheke i tae ki EU 2,432 tāngata i mate 209,457 i tae ki Kariki 111,197 i tae ki Itari 2,166 i tae ki Paniora Ngā ara hekenga ā-ture He wero nui mō te EU ko te whakatatū i ngā pūtahi kaiwhiwhi ki Āwherika me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui ki te whakahaere i ngā kerēme whakangungu. Mā tēnā e āwhina ki te ārai i ngā whakamatautau me ngā tūkinotanga i pāngia e ngā kaiheke e whakawhiti ana i te Māuirangi. Kua karangatia e Tēnā Tusk, e tūtaki ana i ngā tūnga EU, ki ngā pūtahi kaiwhiwhi "tata atu ki ngā wāhi papā i waho o Uropi, kei reira kē ngā puni rerenga". "Ko te tikanga ko ēnei pūtahi he huarahi kia tae ki te Uniana o Ūropi mō ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku katoa," tana kī. I roto i te kaha ki te whāwhā i te hokohoko tāngata mai i Awherika ki te Uru, ka whakatūria e te EU tētahi pokapū kaihautū ki Niger hei hora mōhiohio mō ngā ture nekeneke o Uropi me ngā kōwhiringa mō ngā kaiheke. He aronui Kāri Kikorangi tā te EU mō ngā tohunga ā-whenua tino pūkenga kia whiwhi mahi i Uropi, engari he iti rawa te tango nā te mea e whakataetae ana ki ngā aronui ā-motu, ā, kāore i te whakamahia e te UK, Aiarangi me Tenemaka. Tērā ētahi karanga ki te whakatatū i tētahi aronui Ūropi pēnei i te Tārewa Kāri Kākāriki o Amerika mō ngā kaiheke ohaoha, e tuku ana i ngā visa mahi e 50,000 ki ngā manene i ia tau. E tautohe ana a Jan Semmelroggen, tētahi mātauranga i te Whare Wānanga o Rātata, ka āwhina tēnei kaupapa ki te whakangāwari i te pānga o te pūnaha whakangungu EU. He nui te kore mahi o Uropi, engari he kaha te tono mo ētahi pūkenga i te mākete mahi EU. Hei tauira, e hiahia ana a Tiamana ki ētahi atu kaipūkaha me ngā tohunga rorohiko. Na te pakeke o te iwi whānui, kai te nui haere te hiahia mo nga kaiheke pūkenga. Mā te tuku i ngā kaiheke ki ngā whenua EU e tuku ana i te haurua o ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku i rahua. E mōhio ana ngā kaihoko tāngata ki tēnā, ā, ka pokanoatia, i te nuinga o te wā e mau ana i ngā mano pauna mai i ia kaiheke hei haere ki te EU. I te tau 2014 i tonoa e ngā whenua EU kia 470,080 kia haere. Ko te tapeke 192,445 i tukua. I tīmataria e te UK te rārangi mō ngā tuku - 48,890, ngā pūrongo Ūropi. I te tau 2014 e 45% anake o ngā kerēme whakangungu i angitu. Mō ētahi iwi, tata tonu ki ngā tono whakangungu katoa i ākiritia. Tērā te pēhanga ināianei kia whakaae te EU ki tētahi rārangi o "ngā whenua haumaru taketake", māna e hoatu he take ā-ture mō te tuku i ētahi atu kaiheke ki te kāinga. He tokomaha nga kaiheke e tae ana ki Tiamana kua rere i te rawakore i ngā Balkana ki te Uru - ehara rātau i te hunga whakaruru. He karanga mō te EU kia whakapuaki i a Hēpia, Kosovo, Arapia, Pōngia-Heregovina me Makeronia "haumaru". Heoi anō, he raruraru tēnā, i te mea e hiahia ana aua whenua ki te hono ki te EU - i reira he uara uho te wāteatanga o te nekeneke.

title: £855,000 hei āwhina ki te whakatika i te tūkinotanga o te āwhā hōtoke i mua i te wā tūruhi
summary: Ka whiwhi ngā wāhi i pā ki te tūkinotanga o te āwhā hōtoke i tētahi wāhanga o te £855,000 hei whakarite kia oti ngā tapi i te wā tūruhi raumati.
text: Neke atu i te haurua o taua moni ka wehewehea ki waenga i ngā kaunihera ā-rohe e 17 hei whakatika i ngā wāhanga o te Ara Taiwhenua o Wales. Ā, ka pau te £310,000 ki te whakatika i te hāereere me te taiepa moana o Aberystwyth. I kitea ngā whakaahua o te taone e tūkinotia ana e ngā ngaru nunui me ngā hau tiketike puta noa i te ao i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. I kī ngā minita ko te whakapau moni i pānuitia i te Wenerei ka kawea mai te taumata pūtea katoa i muri i ngā āwhā ki te £10m. I kī te Minita Pūtea o Te Tairāwhiti o Te Tairāwhiti, a Jane Hutt, ko te whāinga kia "tautoko i ngā hapori i pā ki te huarere kino o nā noa nei i ngā huarahi katoa e taea ana e tātau". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua pānuitia kētia e mātou neke atu i te £10m mō ngā whakatika waipuke ohorere, hei whakaora i ngā wāhi takutai pakaru, hei āwhina hoki i ngā umanga pāngia. " By providing this extra funding for the Wales Coast Path and the regeneration of Aberystwyth we can make sure that people keep coming to Wales to enjoy everything it has to offer." E toru miriona ngā tāngata e haere ana ki te Ara Tairāwhiti o Uēra i ia tau, e whakapau ana neke atu i te £30m i ngā taone me ngā kāinga pātata. I kī te Minita Whakatupu Anō a Carl Sargeant kua "tuwhera kē mō ngā umanga" a Aberystwyth, ā, ka "wawe te whakaora ki tōna kororia o mua". Ka whakamahia te moni i pānuitia mō Aberystwyth hei whakatika i te mata o te hāereere me tōna taiepa moana, tae atu ki te whakakapi i ngā rama me ngā taiapa pakaru. I kī te Minita Rauemi Māori o Te Kōruru o Te Kōruru o Russell George: "Ahakoa e pōhiritia ana tēnei pānuitanga tōmuri o te āwhina mō ngā wāhi i pā ki te āwhā, kāore he whakakapi mō te ārai waipuke, ā, me tīmata ngā minita Mahi ki te haumi hei āwhina ki te ārai i te momo whakangaromanga i pā ki te nuinga o ngā taone moana mōrearea o Uēra i tēnei hōtoke." Engari e mau tonu ana ngā minita o Welsh i ngā parenga waipuke o Welsh i roto i ngā āwhā o te hōtoke, he mihi ki te "pūtea penapena nui" me te kī i tohaina e rātau te £7.2m i te tīmatanga o te tau kia tere ai te whakatika i ngā parenga pakaru.

title: DG One centre independent inquiry remit reviewed
summary: Councillors are meeting to agree the remit of an inquiry into construction faults at a £17m leisure centre.
text: Tata ki te £250,000 te utu o te tūhuratanga "takitahi, whānui, kāore i te herea" ki te kaupapa DG One i Dumfries. Ka titiro ki te whānui o ngā take e pā ana ki te whare matua. A proposed timetable for the inquiry would see a full report delivered to Dumfries and Galloway Council by March next year. I whakatuwheratia a DG One i te tau 2008 engari i kati katoa i te tau 2014 i muri i te pāngia o te aho raruraru. Ko te tikanga o tētahi tautohetohe ā-ture roa, tata tonu ki te rua tau i mua i te taenga atu o te kaunihera ki tētahi whakatau me ngā kaikirimana taketake kia tīmata ai te kaupapa whakatika o nāianei ki tētahi umanga kē. Heoi anō, kua tautuhia taua hōtaka whakahoki £10m kia whakahaere i te iti rawa i te £3m i runga i te tahua i muri i te putanga mai o ētahi atu raruraru ki te whare.

title: E hiahia ana te kaiārahi Mahi o Kīriria ki te pōti hou
summary: Kua kī te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Mahi o Kīriria me whai taupānga tuarua mo te taipitopito o tētahi mahi a Pakihi.
text: Nā Stephen WalkerBBC News NI Political Correspondent i kī ai a Brendan Howlin he huatau tika kia pōti i runga i te mōkī whakamutunga, ki te kore e hokona e ngā kaipōti "he poaka i roto i te poka". I a ia e kōrero ana i te takahanga Ulster Fry o te Rōpū Mahi o UK i Aotearoa. Ka whakaritea te takahanga paenga i ia tau e te rōpū Champ, ā, i whakanuia e te kōrero mō Te Wānanga me Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ko te huihuinga parakuihi i tētahi hōtēra moana i haere mai e ngā kaiwhaiwhai me ngā MP, ko Sinn Féin MP Paul Maskey rāua ko Tēnā Howlin. I kī a Tēnā Howlin me pōti i runga i te mahi a Pakihi, e kī ana i whakaaro a ia he "tika" tērā. Ka kī a ia: "He mahi i roto i te kāwanatanga ā iwi, ehara i te whakatau, kātahi ka whakariterite kia hokona ai e koe he poaka i roto i te poka, kia whakamutua e koe ngā whakaritenga, e mōhio ana koe ki te āhua o te wā heke, kātahi ka pātai koe: 'Koia tēnā e hiahia ana koe?'" I whakaarahia te take mēnā me whai tūnga motuhake a Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i te mahi whakamutunga o Te Pakihi. I whai mai i ngā kōrero a Owen Smith, te hēkeretari kōruru o Aiarangi ki te Raki, nāna i kī me whakaaro te kāwanatanga ki tētahi rongoā tōmuri i te wāhi e pupuri ai a Aiarangi ki te Raki i ētahi momo mema o te mākete kotahi me te uniana o ngā tikanga. I kī a ia he 'rongoā whakaaro' tēnei nekehanga. He tokomaha i kitea ngā kōrero a Tāne Smith he whanaketanga nui i roto i te kaupapa here Labour. I roto i te papa tākaro o te hui, he ūnga te comedian ā-Bangor me te kaiwhaiwhai Mahi a Eddie Izzard mō ngā kaiwhakangau waitohu me te hunga e hiahia ana ki te kiritaki. I kī a ia i whakaaro a ia me whai tūnga motuhake a Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i tētahi mahi whakamutunga o Te Raki. "He tino hiahiatia te mākete kotahi, ā, ko te uniana o ngā tikanga," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero o NI. E hiahia ana te kaiwhakaari ki te huri i tana mahi, ā, he kaupapa kia noho hei MP Labour. I whakahauhau a ia mo tētahi pōti noho tonu i roto i te taupānga o tērā tau, ā, i kī a ia he "heahea" te whakataunga kia wehe i te EU. I kī te parāoa rīwai ki te Hauauru, a Paul Maskey, i pōhiritia e ia te karanga a Labour mō tētahi uniana tikanga me tētahi mākete kotahi hei wāhanga o te mahere whānui mō Aiarangi ki te Raki. I kī a ia he tono tōrangapū mo te tūnga EU motuhake. "E whakaaro ana ahau me tae tātau ki tētahi tūnga e kōrero katoa ana tātau ki te reo kotahi," te kī a Tēnā Maskey. I te takahanga parakuihi o tēnei tau, ko te parāoa rīwai i rere mai i Aiarangi ki te Raki mo te wā tuatahi. Heoi anō, kāore pea i pai ki te katoa - i te mea i whakaratoa he mātao, kaua e tunua.

title: Ka tono a Quentin Tarantino i a Gawker i runga i te hononga hōtuhi Hateful Eight
summary: Kua whakahaua e te kaiwhakahaere o Amerika ko Quentin Tarantino te paetukutuku kōrero Gawker mō te takahi manatārua tāpae i muri i tana whakairinga i tētahi hononga ki tētahi whakaaturanga mārire.
text: I noho tonu tētahi hononga ki te hōtuhi The Hateful Eight i runga i te rangitaki Defamer a Gawker i te Mane ahakoa ngā tono a ngā rōia o Tarantino kia tangohia. I tautohe rātau kua pau i te pae ngā royalti ka riro pea i a ia i te tānga o te hōtuhi. Engari i kī a Gawker ko te whakairi i tētahi hononga he wāhanga o tana mahi hei whakarato mōhiohio. "Ko ngā rongo o te mea e tīari ana i runga i te ipurangi i whakaara ake i tētahi pūrākau i whakarewaina e Tarantino, ā, ko tā mātou tānga o te hononga he wae auau, he wae kāore i te mōhiotia o tā mātou mahi: te whakamōhio i ngā tāngata ki ngā rongokōrero me ngā mōhiohio e hiahia ana rātou,'' te kī a te kaiwhakatika o te pae, a John Cook. I roto i tētahi pou, ka tāpiritia e Gawker ka whawhai i te kēhi, ka tāpiritia, ki tōna mōhiotanga, "kāore he take o te takahitanga tāpae i roto i a Mātau i runga i tētahi pūrākau rongokōrero". E rapu ana te kōti i ngā tūkinotanga o te $1m (£603,000) ki a Gawker, tae atu ki te $1m ki te pae tiritiri kōnae ingoamuna i taurimatia ai te hōtuhi mārire. Kua whakaputaina e Tarantino ngā hōtuhi o ana pikitia i mua, he mahi i mua i whiwhi ai ia i ngā royalti nui me ngā nekehanga. "Kāore he mea rongokōrero, he pukapuka kōrero rānei mō Gawker Media e whakangāwari ana, e whakahauhau ana i te tūkinotanga a te iwi whānui i te manatārua [a Tarantino] i roto i te whakaaturanga, ā, e kore tōna whanonga e whakangungu i a Gawker Media i te taunaha mō ā rātou mahi ture," e kī ana te kōti. E whakapae ana hoki te kōti i te tuatahi he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata, ā, kāore te hōtuhi Kino Waru i puta tuihono tae noa ki muri i te whakairinga a Gawker i tētahi tūemi e whakahauhau ana i tētahi tangata whai kape kia māturu ki a rātou. I tērā wiki i roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te paetukutuku mahi whakangahau Deadline.com ka kī ka whakarērea e ia te kaupapa hei pikitia.

title: Te pahūtanga matū o Tianjin: E 49 nga whare herehere o Haina mo te aituā
summary: Kua hoatu e te kōti Hainamana he whiu mate whakatārewa ki te upoko o tētahi wheketere matū mo tana mahi i roto i ngā mahi pāhekoheko i mate ai e 173 ngā tāngata i tērā tau.
text: I whainatia hoki te manukura o Ruihai Logistics, a Yu Xuewei, neke atu i te 700,000 yuan (tata ki te $100,000) i runga i te aituā i te taone tauranga ki te rāwhiti o Tianjin. Ko ia i waenganui i ngā kaimahi e 49 me ngā mana kāwanatanga i hereheretia mo ta rātau mahi i roto i ngā mahi ture a te umanga. Ko te nuinga o te hunga mate he kaipatu ahi me nga pirihimana. E waru nga tinana i kitea. Ko te pahūtanga tētahi o ngā aituā mahi tino mate i roto i te hītori o Hainamana, ā, neke atu i te $1bn ngā hinganga o te ohaoha. I kitea he hara te manukura o Ruihai Logistics ki te utu utu whakapati e āhei ai tana kamupene ki te karo i ngā ture haumaru ina penapena i te konutai cyanide me ētahi atu matū mōrearea. Ko te mōrearea whakamate i tohua kotahi tau i runga i ētahi atu i whiua, i kitea he hara i runga i ngā whakapae e tata ana mai i te tūkinotanga o te hiko ki te rokiroki i ngā rawa mōrearea i runga i te ture. I kitea e tētahi tūhuratanga ko ngā rawa o te nitrocellulose mura - he matū e whakamahia ana i roto i te whakahinuhinu nēra - kua mau i te ahi, ā, kua horapa ki ngā pātaka ture kore mana o te maniua haukini nitrate. Ko nga pahūtanga i whakaohotia i tāhaetia i roto i tētahi wāhi tauranga mahi i te taone, e whakangaro ana i ngā whare, i ngā ipu kaipuke me ngā mano o ngā motokā hou.

title: Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare T
summary: Kei te uiui ngā kairangahau e hia ngā hedgehogs e patua ana i runga i o tātau huarahi hei āwhina i te whakapeka o te iwi whānui o UK.
text: Ka ako hoki tētahi tīma o te Whare Wānanga o Te E whakapono ana nga tohunga kai te raruraru nga kararehe ki nga wāhi ngaro, te nui ake o te whakataetae me nga waka. E tūmanako ana ngā kairangahau ka āwhina tēnei akoranga ki te aukati i te whakapeka o ngā kararehe me te whakarato tohutohu mō ngā mahere me ngā kaiwhakawhanake. Ka aromatawai te akoranga, he wāhanga e pūteatia ana e te aroha kararehe People's Trust for Endangered Species (PTES), te maha o ngā hedgehogs i patua i runga i ngā huarahi, tae atu ki te tokomaha e noho ana i taua rohe. Mā tēnei e āwhina ki te whakatau mēnā he tino nui rawa te raruraru i ētahi wāhi e mōrearea ana te iwi whānui o te rohe ki te ngaro,. Ka titiro hoki ko ēhea ngā hedgehogs - tāne, wahine rānei, taitamariki, pakeke rānei - e tino mōrearea ana ki te whara, ki te mate rānei. Ka tū te akoranga i roto i ngā pae kotahi tekau puta noa i te UK, e ono o ēnei he kauhanga rerekē hei āwhina i ngā kararehe kia haere haumaru i raro i ngā huarahi. I kī a Lauren Moore, he tauira PhD i te Kura Kararehe, Pūtaiao Taiao me te Taiao o te whare wānanga: "Me mōhio mātou mēnā kei te pā ngā huarahi ki te kaha o te iwi whānui hedgehog. " Ki to mātau mōhiotanga, kāore anō kia tūhuratia pēnei te pānga o ngā huarahi ki ngā hedgehogs i mua. "Kāore anō kia kitea mēnā he pai ngā kauhanga ki te whakaiti i te matenga o te huarahi heke, he aha rānei ngā huanga o te kauhanga ka pai ake ai te pai." I whakaputaina e tētahi pūrongo "āhua o ngā hedgehogs o Ingarangi", i whakaputaina i te tau 2018 e PTES me te British Hedgehog Preservation Society, i whakaaturia he 30% te hekenga o te maha o ngā hedgehogs i ngā wāhi taone mai i te tau 2000. I whakapeka ngā tau hedgehog i te hawhe i ngā wāhi tawhiti i taua wā, i kitea te pūrongo. I kī a Nida Al-Fulaij, kaiwhakahaere āwhina i PTES: "Ka āwhina te mahi a Lauren ki te tiaki i tēnei momo tawhito kia kore ai e whakapeka anō." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakarerea e te taone nui o Itari i muri i ngā tuma o te rūma
summary: Na te tukunga iho o te rangatira o tētahi taone iti i te tonga o Itari i aro atu ki ngā pēhanga e tūpono ana ki ngā kaikaunihera paetata e ngana ana ki te tū atu ki te rūpahu.
text: I whakarerea a Maria Carmela Lanzetta hei rangatira o Monasterace i Calabria i muri i te tahuna o tana umanga, a, ka pūhia tana motokā. Kua kōrero a ia mo te rongo "pōhēhē, mokemoke" i mua i nga tuma. Ko tana whakatau kia whakamutua he resonance i tua atu i te taone iti o Monasterace. Ko te taone, ehara i te mea nui ake i te kāinga, e tata ana ki te waewae o Itari. E noho ana i runga i tētahi maunga e titiro atu ana ki te moana, kei roto i tētahi wāhi mamao, ātaahua hoki, e pūrongo ana a Aotearoa. Engari ki a Maria Carmela Lanzetta, ehara i te wāhi rangimārie. I tana tūnga i te tau 2006, i kitea e ia he nama nui. "I tino whakararuraru te hōro o te taone," tana kī. "Kaore he tohunga mātauranga e āhei ana ki te whakahaere i te hōro taone." I ngā marama maha ki muri i tahuna tana umanga, he rongoā rongoā. I mawhiti noa iho a ia me tōna whānau i te mura. I tērā wiki ka pūhia ngā tākainga ki roto i tana motokā i whakatūria i waho tonu o tōna kāinga. I tana kitenga i ngā puare matā i roto i tana motokā, ka whakaaro a ia "koia tēnā," tana kī. E whakapono ana a Mrs Lanzetta i ūkuia ia e te rūma paetata nā te mea i whakamātau a ia ki te whakahau i te whakahaeretanga o te taone. E kī ana a ia i te tāpae i ngā āhuatanga i ngāwari ake ai te ture. E kī ana te taone nui o mua nāna i whakarite ngā whakahōu hei whakataurite i ngā pūkete o te hōro taone, ā, ka utua e te tangata ngā pire wai tōmuri - i tūtakina e te nui o te ātete.
