E kī ana a Mrs Lanzetta kua rongo a ia i te kore mana, i te taratahi - ā, he nui ake nga tōpana o te hara i whakaritea i nga māngai i pōtitia e te iwi. E whakaahua ana a ia i te taone he "kore e taea te whakahaere". No te pātaitanga no hea mai te whakamataku i anga atu ki a ia, ka kī a ia: "He hara whakaritea, kāore aku whakautu anō. Kei tēnei rohe tonu." Kua whakapuakina te aroha ki a ia i te taumata ā-rohe, ā-motu hoki. E whakaae ana te mana matua o te rohe o Calabria kua rahua te āhua o Itari i tana mahi ki te tautoko i a Mrs Lanzetta. E kī ana a ia nā tēnei momo mahi i rangirua ai te kaha o te kāwanatanga ā iwi i taua rohe. Puta noa i te tonga o Itari, he rite tonu te pēhanga a nga kaikaunihera o te rohe i raro i te pēhanga kaha a te rūpahu. Kua pūrongotia e tētahi pāhonotanga i hangaia e ngā kaiwhakahaere i raro i te tuma te tahuna o ngā āhuatanga me ngā tākarotanga - tae atu ki ngā matā, tae atu ki ngā upoko motuhake o ngā kararehe e tukuna ana ki te pou. E kī ana a Avviso Pubblico (ko te tikanga o te "pānui tūmatanui") e 212 ngā kēhi whakamataku o ngā mana ā rohe i te hara i whakaritea i te tau 2010 - 41% o rātou i te rohe o Calabria,  kei hea a Monasterace. E kī ana te perehitini o te kawanatanga o Reggio Calabria, a Giuseppe Raffa, ko te raruraru o te whakamataku "e rangirua ana mō te toitūtanga manapori o Itari ki te tonga me Calabria," ngā wāhi e pāngia ana e ngā pānga o te raruraru o te ohaoha.

title: Ka katia e te tūtukitanga o M6 Birmingham te huarahi ki te raki
summary: I pāngia e tētahi tangata he mate nui i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga waka e toru, nāna i kati tētahi whārōrō o te huanui M6.
text: I pā mai te tūtukitanga i waenganui i ngā tūtakinga e rima me te ono i Birmingham, i muri noa iho i te 04.30 GMT. I katia te huarahi whakaraki mai i te komititanga whā mō te M42 ki te komititanga ono, Spaghetti Junction. I whakatuwheratia katoatia i mua tata i te poutumarotanga. Kua hopukina tētahi tangata 19 tau i runga i te whakapae i te taraiwa mōrearea, ka kī nga Pirihimana o West Midlands. Tokorua nga tāngata i whakamahia e nga paramedics me tētahi tākuta trauma, tae atu ki tētahi tau 25 tau i tino whara. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mo te ratonga waka tūroro: "I tere te kite a te kaimahi waka tūroro i a ia i roto i tētahi āhuatanga tino nui, ā, i whakahaere i te tiaki i te mate i te tirohanga i mua i te kawenga o te tangata ki te Hōhipera o Kuini Irihapeti." I rongoatia tētahi tūroro tuarua mō ngā whara, "kāore i whakapono he tino nui", a, ka mauria ki te Hōhipera o Heartlands. I kī a Insp Damian Shave, mai i te Wae Whakamatau Tūtukitanga o te ope, he "tūtukitanga tino nui." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: I whakaweto ngā rama tiriti o Warwickshire i te pō
summary: Ko te wā tuatahi i whakawetohia ai ngā rama tiriti i Aotearoa i te pō, i roto i tētahi tono kia tapahia ngā utu.
text: E 39,000 ngā rama tiriti e whakaweto ana i waenganui i te 00:00 me te 05:30 GMT, e kī ana te mana ā rohe ka tiakina te £500,000 i te tau. I kī te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Warwickshire ka āwhina hoki ki te tapahi i te kohu waro. I whakawetohia ngā rama i Warwick i te pō Hātarei, me Nuneaton, Whutupōro, Stratford me Te Raki o Warwickshire nā te whai i ngā marama tata nei. I kī te mana ā rohe e kore e pāngia ngā rama huri noa i ngā tūtakinga, ngā whakawhitinga waewae, ngā porowhita me ngā wāhi e hipa ana i ngā kāmera C KK. I kī te kaunihera, e utu ana i te £2.2m ia tau ki te tīramarama tiriti, tata ki te 80% o ōna rama katoa ka whakaurua ki te whakaweto wā i te wā o Aperira. E kī ana kua kōwhiria ngā rama i muri i ngā whakaaro ki ngā pirihimana me ngā rōpū haumaru hapori. Kāore e pāngia ērā e whakahaeretia ana e ngā kaunihera o te taone, o te rohe rānei. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Warwickshire

title: Ko te hāroto rokiroki karihi tawhito rawa o Sellafield kia whakakorea
summary: Kei te whakakorea te hāroto rokiroki karihi nui rawa o te ao, i Sellafield i Cumbria, kia "haumaru ake ai te pae".
text: Ko te Pile Fuel Storage Pond, i hangaia i te tau 1948, i whakamahia tuatahitia hei penapena hinu mai i ngā Windscale Pile Reactors. Ināianei, ka nekehia te paru iraruke mai i te hāroto ki tētahi tipu rongoā para hou. I kī te Kaiwhakahaere Kaupapa a Pirihi Plane ka whakahekea e te tipu hou te "mōrearea paru" ā, ka whakahaere a tērā tau. I hoahoatia te Drum Filling Plant hei whakatere i te tiki paru mai i te hāroto neke atu i te toru tau. Mā te whakamahi i tētahi hoahoa kāhua papu penehīni, ka kī te tipu ka kaweake i te paru mai i te hāroto i tētahi "hautanga" o te utu. 'Tomato ketchup' I mutu te mahi a te hāroto i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā whā, engari ko tētahi o ngā pae e whā i te tipu e tāutua ana hei tino manakē mō te whakaiti mōrearea me te mōrearea. I kī a Dorothy Gradden, te upoko o te Pile Fuel Storage Pond, ko tētahi o ngā kaupapa whakakore "tino uaua" i runga i te pae. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te kaupapa ko te whakakore me te whakawātea i te hāroto kia haumaru ake ai tēnei tipu hītori. " Heoi anō, i mua i te whakahekenga o te wai hāroto, me tango te paru iraruke. He ōrite tēnei paru ki te ketchup tōmato, ā, e takoto ana i raro o te hāroto hōhonu 7m." I kī a Tēnā Rererangi ka homai e te neke he "rongoā utu tōtika", e tiaki ai i ngā moni a ngā kaihautū UK. Ko te utu whakaaro o te whakapai ake i te pūrere tawhito o Sellafield, ngā hanganga tāwere me ngā moumou penapena, kua piki ake ki tētahi "whakamīharo" £70bn, te kī a te Komiti Pūkete Tūmatanui i te wā o Hui tanguru. E kī ana he "rawakore" te kauneketanga, engari i kī te whakawhāiti e whakahaere ana i te pae, ngā Hoa Whakahaere Karihi, e anga ana ki ngā uauatanga "kāore anō kia mōhiotia".

title: Ko te kai 'me whakaatu i ngā ngohe e hiahiatia ana hei tahu pūngoi'
summary: Me tāpiri ngā tapanga ki te kai me te inu hei whakaatu i te nui o ngā ngohe e hiahiatia ana hei tahu i ngā pūngoi kua pau, e kī ana te Royal Society for Public Health.
text: E tautohe ana te tangata e whakahāwea ana i te wā e pau ana ki te whakamahi i ngā pūngoi i roto i ngā hua o ia rā. E 53 meneti te roa o te kawhe moka e 290 pūngoi te haere atu, ā, e 48 meneti te roa o te muffin blueberry. I kī te umanga kai me te inu he pai te tūhura i te ariā. E kī ana tētahi pepa kaupapahere mai i te RSPH ko te take tino pūnoa o te momona ko te pau i te nui ake o ngā pūngoi i te tahuna - ā, ko te hunga e mahi ana i te nui o te mahi, ka ngaro kē atu te taumaha. E kī ana ngā tohu ngohe i runga i ngā pōkai ka tohuāki i ngā kiritaki kia kōwhiri i ngā kōwhiringa hauora ake, kia nui ake rānei te mahi. E whakaatu ana te rangahau e kitea ana e ētahi kiritaki ngā tapanga kai o nāianei i mua o ngā hua e pōraru ana nā te nui o ngā mōhiohio. E ono hēkona noa iho te titiro ki te kai i mua i te hoko. Ko te tikanga o tēnei kia ngāwari noa iho te mārama o ngā mōhiohio i mua i ngā pōkai, ā, me mārama te whakaatu i ngā mōhiohio pūngoi, ka kī te pepa. E kī ana te RSPH he ariā pai ngā ata whakaahua i mua o ngā pōkai, tae atu ki ngā mōhiohio tīariari. Mā ēnei pikitia e whakaatu te nui o te korikori e hiahiatia ana hei hīkoi, hei whakahaere rānei i ngā pūngoi kei roto i te hua. Ka whakamaharatia hoki e te tohu te iwi whānui ki te hiranga o te hohe ā-tinana, e mōhiotia ana ki te whakarewa i te wairua, ngā taumata pūngao me te whakaiti i te hauā me te pouri. I kitea e tētahi uiuinga o ngā pakeke e 2,000 e RSPH neke atu i te 60% o ngā tāngata e tautoko ana i te whakaurunga o te "tohu pūngoi ōrite ngohe". Neke atu i te haurua i kī ka whakahauhau i a rātau ki te kōwhiri i ngā hua hauora ake, ki te kai i ngā wāhanga iti ake, ki te mahi rānei i ētahi atu mahi ā-tinana. Ko te tikanga kia pau i ngā tāngata te 2,500 pūngoi me ngā wāhine e 2,000 pūngoi i ia rā kia mau tonu ai te taumaha hauora, e kī ana te pepa. E rua hautoru o ngā pakeke i te UK kei te taumaha, kei te mōmona rānei. I kī te whakamaumahara mārire a Shirley Cramer, te rangatira nui o te Royal Society for Public Health: "Ahakoa kua pai ake ngā mōhiohio kai i tukuna mō te pōkai kai me te inu, e mārama ana kāore i te mahi pai ki te tautoko i te iwi whānui ki te mahi kōwhiringa hauora. " Ko te tohu pūngoi ōrite ngohe he tikanga ngāwari kia hāngai ake ai ngā pūngoi i roto i te kai me te inu ki ngā oranga o ia rā, me te whakamahara mārire hoki ki ngā kiritaki i te hiahia kia mau tonu ngā āhua noho hohe me te taumaha hauora." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tōpūtanga Kai me te Inu he "ariā whakamere" ngā mōhiohio ōrite ngohe e tika ana kia hōparatia. "Hei umanga, kei te titiro mātou ki ētahi atu mea ka taea e mātou hei āwhina i ngā tāngata ki te whakamahi i ngā mōhiohio kai tīariari kia mārama ai me pēhea te uru o ngā kai me ngā inu rerekē ki roto i tētahi āhua noho hauora. " E tautoko ana mātou i te karanga a RSPH mō ētahi atu rangahau mēnā ka taea e te tohu pūngoi ōrite te ngohe hei whakahauhau i ngā kiritaki ki te whakamahi tapanga." I kī te FDF me whakaaro ngā ture EU e kōrero ana he aha ngā kamupene e whakaaetia ana kia purua ki runga i ā rātou tapanga kai.

title: Yeonpyeong: He motu iti o Kōria ki te Tonga e mātakitaki ana i te pae
summary: E rua me te hāwhe haora mā te waka waka mai i Incheon, Korea ki te Tonga, ko te motu iti o Yeonpyeong.
text: Subin KimBBC News Korean Te āhua mai i te waka waka pēnei i tētahi motu o Kōria ki te Tonga, kia kite rā anō koe i te aroaro o te hōia taumaha. Te āhua nei kei te mau huna te katoa i konei - tae atu ki nga hī ika. Nā te mea e 40km (25 maero) noa iho te tawhiti o te motu i Haeju, Korea ki te Raki. I te rā mārama, ka kite koe i te takutai ma te whatu tahanga. A, e 4km anake te mamao atu he motu iti o Kōria ki te Raki e whakaputua ana i ngā kaiwhakarewa pū tākirirangi. I te pikinga anō o ngā renarena i te koiora o Kōria, he take pai tā ngā tāngata i Yeonpyeong kia mātakitaki āmaimai i te pae. Raina tautohetohe i te moana "I taku hokinga mai ki ōku whakaaro i muri i to mātau whakawhitinga, ka titiro atu ahau ki ngā mea i mauria mai e au," te kī a Ms Kang, tētahi tangata o Yeonpyeong. "I mōhio ahau kua mauria mai e au te koti hōtoke e mau ana ahau me ngā tōkena e rua mō aku pēpi." Ko Ms Kang - kāore a ia i pīrangi ki te hoatu i tōna ingoa katoa - i waenganui i ngā rau tāngata i tere te whakakore mai i Yeonpyeong i te tau 2010 i muri i te mahi a Kōria ki te Raki i tana whakaekenga whakamate anake i runga i te oneone o Kōria ki te Tonga mai i te whawhai. I te tipu o te maia me te kaha o Kōria ki te Raki. I mutu te Pakanga Kōria i te tau 1953 me tētahi armistice i whakatūria ai ngā taitapa mārama ki runga i te whenua - te Raina Whakawehe Hōia me te Rohe Whakawātea. Engari kāore i taea e tētahi taha te whakaae ki te aha ki te moana. Ā muri ake i taua tau, i waenganui i ngā māharahara o te kaiārahi Kōria ki te Tonga, o Syngman Rhee, nāna i ātete i taua mahi, tērā pea ka ngana ki te whakaeke i te Raki i te moana, ka whakaritea e te US te Raina Tepenga ki te Raki (NLL), kia wehe ai ngā taha e rua. E rima ngā moutere, tae atu ki Yeonpyeong, e takoto ana i te taha ki te tonga. Kāore a Kōria ki te Raki i hari mō te NLL - kāore i te iti rawa i a ia e motu ana i te urunga ki ngā taunga hī ika hira - engari me tōna tōpana moana ngoikore kāore he kōwhiringa engari ki te whakaae. Kātahi i muri i te rua tekau tau ka tīmata ki te pana whakamuri, kātahi anō ka whakapuaki i ōna ake rohe moana nui ake. Ka tīmata ngā kaipuke o te Moana o Kōria ki te Raki ki te whakawhiti i te LLL, ā, i ētahi wā ka whakaekea ngā oko o Kōria ki te Tonga. Kātahi i te tau 1999, i te tau 2002 anō ka pakaru ngā matapaki whakamate i waenganui i ngā ope taua moana e rua ki te hauauru o Te Motu o Yeonpyeong. I muri mai tētahi atu tūtū whakamate i te tau 2009 e tata ana ki te Motu o Daechong. I Mati 2010, ka totohu te manuao o Kōria ki te Tonga o Cheonan tata ki Yeonpyeong, ka mate katoa e 46 i runga i te papa, a, ka whakamīharo i Kōrea ki te Tonga. I whakamutua e tētahi tūhuratanga whai mana o te ao whānui kua totohu te manuao e tētahi whakaekenga torpedo Kōria ki te Raki, he mea i whakakāhoretia e te Raki i ngā wā katoa. Kātahi i te ata o te 23 o Whiringa 2010, ka mahia e Kōria ki te Tonga he auau auau ki Yeonpyeong, ahakoa he whakahē mai i te Raki. I riri a Kōria ki te Raki, e kī ana kua taka ngā anga ora ki roto i ngā wai e kī ana. Hāora i muri iho, he tini ngā anga pū ki te motu. Tokorua nga hōia me ngā tāngata tokorua i patua. Ko te wā anake i whakaekea ai e Kōria ki te Raki me te patu i ngā Kōria ki te Tonga i runga i te oneone o Kōria ki te Tonga mai i te whawhai. Na te pakarutanga o te ahi, te pakaru o ngā whare me te iti o te hiko, ka whakahaua e te kāwanatanga kia neke atu te 1,000 tangata ki te tuawhenua. Ka noho atu rātau i to rātau kāinga motu mo te toru marama, e noho ana ki ngā whanaunga, ki ngā mōtēra rānei. Ko ētahi i noho tonu i roto i te whare kaukau tūmatanui. 'Take o te haumarutanga ā-motu' I te pahemotanga o te mōrearea o nāianei, ka puta mai te pātai mēnā he haumaru te hoki ki Yeonpyeong. He tokomaha kāore i pīrangi. I tua atu i te haumarutanga, kāore anō kia ora te ōhanga o te motu i te tiango o te mahi hī ika kōwhai i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua, ko te hua o te hī ika me te huringa āhuarangi. He tokomaha nga tāngata i haere ki te tuawhenua i mua tonu i te pū. I tono nga whakawhitiwhiti ki te tautoko a te kāwanatanga hei āwhina i a rātau ki te neke pūmau, engari kāore te kāwanatanga i whakaae. I kī te tuakana minita o roto me te haumarutanga, a Ahn Yang-ho, i roto i tētahi hui komiti he take haumarutanga ā iwi. "Mēnā ka wehe katoa ngā tangata whenua, ā, ko ngā hōia anake e noho ana ki te motu, ka noho pea te rohe hei wāhi papā ao whānui i roto i ngā huarahi maha. Ki te whakaaro i ta mātau kaupapahere haumarutanga ā-motu ki te tiaki i te NLL ahakoa te utu, e whakaaro ana mātou kia kaua e tautoko i ngā tangata whenua kia wehe i te motu," tana kī. Kāore i taea e ngā tāngata pēnei i a Ms Kang te neke i a rātau anō, ki te kore e taea e rātau te hoko i o rātau kāinga. "Engari ko wai e hoko whare i Yeonpyeong i muri i tērā?" tana kī. I ēnei rā, tata ki te 2,000 ngā tangata o Yeonpyeong. E kore te minita wawao e whakaatu i te nuinga tūturu o ngā kaiāwhina hōia i reira, engari e kī ana ngā kōinga i raro iho i te hawhe o ngā kainoho rēhita e pā ana ki te hōia. He tokomaha ētahi atu e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā mahi wā e āwhinatia ana e te kāwanatanga, i hoahoatia hei whakahauhau i te iwi whānui kia noho tonu. E rua tau i muri mai i te taiparatanga i te wā i tangohia ai e tana tāne tētahi o ēnei mahi, ka neke a Māmā Kimi, he wahine e 50 tau, nāna hoki i tono kia kaua e whakaingoatia. "Mehemea i pā ki a au anō [te taiparatanga], kāore au i haere mai ki konei ki te noho." tana kī. "Kia pono, e hiahia ana ahau ki te wehe i tēnei wāhi ina mutu te mahi [āwhina]." He waka waka ia rā ki te tuawhenua, engari kāore i te pono nā te huringa tai. Kua tono ngā moutere i tētahi tauranga hou e āhei ai ngā oko nui ake ki te tauranga ahakoa te tai ki te ohorere. Tērā tētahi kaupapa mō tētahi, engari i tapahia te tahua. "Kei te tino mataku ahau... kāore he kaipuke mā mātou [ki te whakawhiti] ina pā mai tētahi mea." I te tau 2018, i hainatia e te Perehitini o Kōrea ki te Tonga o Moon Jae-in me Kimi Rangi-un o Kōrea ki te Raki te Whakapuakitanga Panmunjom hītori, e pānui ana i tētahi wā hou o te rangimārie i te koiora o Kōria me to rātau whāinga ki te whakamutu tika i te Pakanga Kōria. I waenganui i ngā whakaaetanga ka "whakamutua e ngā taha e rua ngā mahi ahi ora me ngā mahi nekeneke moana" huri noa i te Raina Tepenga ki te Raki, me te taupoki i a rātau pū pū me ngā pū kaipuke i taua rohe. "Mā te whakarite i te koiora o Kōria hei rohe rangimārie pūmau, ināianei ka taea e tātau te whakahoki i o tātau oranga ki te pūnoa," te kī a Tēnā Marama. Engari kua ngaro atu te manawa o te tōmua o te tau 2018, i te wā i hinga ai ngā kōrero a Kimi Rangi-un ki te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump i te whakakāhoretanga a Kōria ki te Raki ki te tuku i ana rākau karihi i mua i te whakaaetanga a te US i ētahi mana nui mo nga whakaaetanga. Kua hoatu e Kōria ki te Raki ki a Mātau tae noa ki te mutunga o tēnei tau kia puta mai he mahi hou. A, i te taenga mai o te rā kati, kua whakarewaina anō e Ūngia te tanuku. I te 25 o Whiringa Whiringa, ka pūrongotia e te pāpāho kāwanatanga o Kōria ki te Raki kua puritia e tētahi kamupene pū ā-rohe i te Motu o Changrin tētahi wiri ahi ora i raro i te ārahitanga a Kimi Rangi-un. I whakataua tēnei e te minita wawao a Kōrea ki te Tonga he tūkino i te whakaaetanga. E rua rā i muri iho, ka whakawhiti tētahi oko ā-iwi o Kōria ki te Raki i te LLL, ā, ka tīpokapoka i ngā mea e whakaarotia ana e Kōria ki te Tonga ko ōna wai rohe mō te tata ki te 20 haora. I muri noa iho i te pūhia e te Moana o Kōria ki te Tonga ngā tākainga whakatūpato, ka hoki ki tua atu i te raina. Kātahi i tērā wiki, ka whakahaeretia e Kōria ki te Raki tētahi "whakamātautau nui" i roto i tētahi teihana whakarewa aorangi i kīa e ia kia wetewete. Kua whakahaeretia hoki e Kōria ki te Tonga he auau. I te ahiahi i tae atu ai au ki te motu, ka mārama te kite i ngā kurupae whero o te mārama e rere ana i waho o tētahi rōpū o te Marine Corps ki te rangi, me te tangi o te pū ārai rererangi a Vulcan. I kī nga kōinga kua whakamōhiotia rātau e te Rōpū Moana ki a rātau ētahi atu auau ahi ora āpōpō e pā ana ki ngā moata me ngā Vulcans. Kei te āwangawanga ngā moutere. "I whakaae mātou ki te whakamutu i ngā auau, nē?" E kī mai ana a Park Tae-won, e 59, ki a au. "Engari kei te mahi mātou ināianei. Ahakoa he aha... he moata, he Vulcans rānei. Kaua tātau e mahi i tēnā i konei." I kī mai te rōpū o te Rōpū Moana ki a au kāore i takahi i te whakaaetanga ngā auau e pā ana ki ngā rākau kōpere iti. Engari mai i tērā wā ka whakataua e Kōria ki te Raki he "whakatoinga hōia a te hunga whakawhanake". E maumahara ana a Tāne Park, tētahi tangata whenua o te moutere e mahi ana i te hī ika mō te toru tekau tau, i te rā o te taiparatanga. "Ina titiro whakamuri ahau ki mua i te wā i pā mai ai te taiparatanga me ngā pakanga [o Yeonpyeong], he tohu tonu i ngā wā katoa," tana kī. "I muri i ngā tohu, ka puta noa iho. I tawhiti atu i te wāhi i tūmanakohia ai e mātou. Tērā tētahi wiri ahi pū i te Motu o Changrin, ā, i ētahi rā i muri mai ka whakawhiti anō tētahi kaipuke Kōria ki te Raki i te raina [NLL]. "Mā tēnei ahau e tino māharahara. Ka whakaaro ahau ka taea e rātau te raruraru anō i ngā wā katoa."

title: I tangohia a Laura Ingalls Wilder i te whakawhiwhinga pukapuka i runga i te reo whakahāwea
summary: Kua tangohia e te US Association for Library Service to Children (ALSC) te ingoa o Laura Ingalls Wilder mai i tētahi o ana tohu mō ngā tirohanga me te reo whakahāwea.
text: He maha nga tau i whiwhi amuamu ai te pāhonotanga i runga i te "whakaaro anti-Māori me te ārai Pango i roto i ana mahi" a te kaituhi o te Whare Iti i te Prairie. I pōti ngātahi te poari ALSC i te Hātarei ki te tango i te ingoa o Wilder i te whakawhiwhinga pukapuka tamariki. The medal will be renamed as the Children's Literature Legacy award. I kī te ALSC, he wehenga o te American Library Association, ko ngā pukapuka kōrero a Wilder me "ngā kīanga o ngā āhuatanga tīwharawhara" i "maiorooro ki ngā uara uho o ALSC". Kua whakahētia ngā pukapuka a ngā tamariki a Wilder mō te oranga pūkenga i te Uru o Amerika mō te reo e whakaiti ana i ngā iwi taketake me ngā tāngata tae. Ko tētahi o ngā upoko tūwhera o ngā pukapuka o te Whare Iti i whakaahua i tētahi whenua "kāore he iwi. Ko ngā Initia anake e noho ana i reira". I te tau 1953, ka whakatau te kamupene whakaputa a Harper ki te huri i ngā "tāngata" ki ngā "tangata noho", e ai ki te Washington Post. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: Engari kei te whakaara tonu ngā pukapuka i ngā māharahara nā ngā pūrākau e whakaatu ana i ngā āhuatanga whakahāwea me ngā āhuatanga o ngā Amerika mā o te wā o Wilder. "Ko te Īnia pai anake he Initia mate," te kī a tētahi pūāhua. I ētahi atu wā o te rangatū, ka kīia ngā pūāhua o Awherika-Amerika ko "pouri". E kī ana ētahi kaihautū o ngā pukapuka e tuku ana i tētahi tirohanga hītori hira, ā, me whakamahi hei utauta whakaako mā ngā tamariki. I kitea e te reta mai i te poari ALSC te "matatinitanga" o tēnei take me "te ngākau e karapoti ana". "E mōhio ana mātou ehara i te mea he wāhi nui noa iho ngā pukapuka a Wilder i roto i te hītori o ngā tuhinga tamariki, ā, ka pānui tonu i tēnei rā," te tūtohutanga a te poari. "E mōhio ana hoki mātou he tino mamae rātau ki te tokomaha o ngā kaipānui." I whānau mai a Wilder i te tau 1867, i mōhiotia a Wilder mō ana pukapuka kōrero Little House on the Prairie - he rangatū i whakaputaina i waenganui i te 1932 me te 1943. I whakaritea ngā pukapuka ki tētahi rangatū pouaka whakaata i te tau 1974, tae noa ki te tau 1983. Ko E B White rāua ko Dr Seuss ngā kaiwhiwhi rongonui o te Whakawhiwhinga Wilder. Ko te whakataunga kia tangohia a Wilder i tēnei whakawhiwhinga tuhituhi te nekehanga hou ki te whakahōu i ngā takoha ahurea ki ngā whika hītori whakahāwea i te US. Na te tangohanga o ngā whakamaharatanga o te Rūnanga e ngā kāwanatanga ā rohe puta noa i te whenua i whakaoho ai te whakahoki mai i ētahi o ngā Kaiāwhina e whakapono ana e tahuri ana i te hītori o Amerika me te ahurea ki te tonga. E whakaaro ana ngā iti ā-iwi, otirā ko ngā Amerika pango, he whakahāwea te aroaro o ngā tohu Confederate i roto i te oranga tūmatanui.

title: Ka ako a Clegg i ngā 'akoranga uaua' mo te whakatata ki ngā whakahōu tōrangapū
summary: He nui ngā tukemata i whakaarahia i te tau 2010, i whakaahuatia e Nick Clegg tana rārangi take whakahou tōrangapū hei "rūrū nui rawa atu o to tātau kāwanatanga ā iwi" mai i te Ture Whakahōu Nui o te tau 1832.
text: Na Gavin StampPolitical reporter, BBC News Neke atu i te rua tau, ā, he maha ngā patoto uaua i muri iho, te āhua nei kua whakarerekētia e te pirimia tuarua tana rangi - i te itinga rawa o te whakatutuki i ana whāinga. I te putanga mai i mua i te komiti takawaenga o ngā MP matua, ka kī a Tēnā Clegg e tūpato ana a ia ki te whakawhanake i tētahi "kaupapa ā-kaupapa" paraihe whānui, e whakataurite ana i te whai i ngā rongoā "tino pai" ki ngā pūāhua i roto i te tākaro a Samuel Beckett e tatari ana ki a Godot e rapu ana i te tikanga o te ora. Kua ako te kaiārahi Liberal Democrat i te huarahi uaua, i te kitenga i tana whāinga whakamīharo o te whakahou pōti e heke ana i roto i te mura i roto i tētahi taupānga me ngā mahere ki te whakatōpūtanga i te Whare o Ariki i takahia e ngā kaiāwhina Tūturu. A, ka utua e tana rōpū mā ngā mahere kōpikopiko - tae noa ki te tau 2018 - ki te whakaiti i te rahi o te Whare o Ngātahi me te whirihora anō i ngā taiwhanga paremata kia ōrite ai te rahi, i tautokona tuatahitia e te Lib Dems. Ināianei, me te taupānga rangatiratanga o Pirihitini e tū mai ana i tērā tau - me whakaaro te kaiārahi Lib Dem me ōna hoa Rangatira me ōna hoa Mahi ki te āhua o tētahi huringa kaupapa ture hōhonu kāore rātau e pai ki te kite. 'Kāore i te hiahiatia' I pātai atu ki ōna whakaaro mō te mana whakahaere mō Ingarangi me te āhua o te huringa taketake i roto i te pātahitanga i waenganui i te kāwanatanga matua me te kāwanatanga paetata, ka whakaae a Tēnā Clegg kāore i tutuki i a ia i ngā wā katoa "kia mārire" i tana whai i ngā whakahōu tōrangapū nui. He iti noa iho te hiahia whānui ake mo tēnei huarahi tārewa, ka huatau a ia. "I te pātaitanga a te iwi whānui o Ingarangi ki tētahi huringa i roto i te pūnaha pōti, kāore rātau i tino hiahiatia. I te tononga ki a rātau kia pōti mō ngā pirihimana me ngā komihana hara, he torutoru noa iho i puta ake. I te tononga ki a rātau kia taunaki i te pōti rangatira, kāore rātou." Ko te wheako mai i tētahi atu wāhi o Uropi i huatau kia nui ake te "māhorahora" o ngā minita mō te tere o te mana whakahaere i ngā wāhi rerekē o te whenua, ka kī atu a ia ki ngā MP, ā, ka "hihiri" tonu te tukanga. "Kua haere mai ahau ki te ariā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te haere whakamua ki tētahi whenua nui ake, ā, ko te tatari ki tētahi mahere ōrite e rite ana ki te tatari ki a Godot. E kore noa iho e puta." Nā reira i tika te kāwanatanga ki te whakamua i ngā rongoā "hāngai, mahi hoki" ki ngā mea e mōhiotia ana ko te pātai Lothian ki te Uru - e āhei ai ngā MP Pākehā ki te pōti i ngā ture e pā ana ki Ingarangi i ngā wāhi pēnei i te hauora me te mātauranga, engari ehara i te kōrero mō tētahi Pāremata Ingarihi. A, mā te pānui i te aronui o te Taone Nui - neke atu i te 20 ngā tāone i Ingarangi e hoatu ana ki ngā mana hou mō te whakarite me te waka - nāna i huatau he tauira tēnei o tētahi huarahi nui ake, engari he huarahi toitū tonu ki ngā karanga mō tētahi kāinga tōrangapū hou i Ingarangi. 'Rua pango' Ehara i te "kōanga" i ētahi mahere nui ki te iwi whānui, ka kī a ia he pai ake ki a ia te haere tonu me ngā mana whakatau whakatau puta noa i ngā wāhi maha, ā, ka whakaaturia e ia e whakauru ana i ōna hoa mahi kāpata ki te whakatere i te tukanga. "Kua patupatu ahau i te tēpu i Whitehall e kī ana me tuku mana koe ki ngā hōro o te taone," tana kī. Ko ētahi atu nekehanga, pēnei i te whakaae i ngā kaunihera Ingarihi ki te pupuri i ngā moni mokatere pakihi me te tono moni ki ngā moni whiwhinga ā muri ake i puta mai i ngā kaupapa pūtea penapena pūtea, e tohu ana i "tētahi wetewete whakaharahara o te rihi" o te kāwanatanga matua. "Ehara i te mahi pō te whakahīhī i taua pupuhi Whitehall - arā, ko te whakahīhī i ngā mana ki a ia anō me te kōrero ki ētahi atu wāhi me aha - ehara i te mahi pō. Ki taku whakaaro he nui ake tā mātou mahi i roto i ngā tau e rua kua taha ki te whati i taua whakaata pūtahi i tētahi kāwanatanga i roto i tētahi wā roa." Engari te āhua nei he pōhēhē ngā MP ātete i runga i te komiti ki te huarahi hou a te pirimia, e kī ana a Te Kāwanatanga kia kaha ake a Tēnā Clegg, ā, me āhei te kāwanatanga ki te "haere me te ngaungau kāpia i te wā kotahi". "Tērā tētahi rua pango, he tōpana autō e whakahoki ana i ngā mana ki Whitehall," tana kī. "Kia kore ai e puta, ina kore koe e tuarua pirimia, ā, kua kore a Rawiri Karauna e pirimia, kaua e whakaū, e whakaū rānei?"

title: Ka taea e ngā kaihokohoko o Gloucester Road te pupuri i ngā utu i te haupae rohe tūnga tūnga
summary: E whakawehi ana ngā kaihokohoko i te Huarahi Gloucester o Bristol ki te pupuri i ā rātou utu pakihi mēnā ka haere tonu ngā mahere mō ngā Rohe Tūnga Tangata (RPZ).
text: E whakatūpato ana rātau ka nui ngā utu ka utaina e te pūnaha whakaaetanga ki ngā umanga, ā, me mahi ētahi atu whakaaro. E hiahia ana a Koromatua George Ferguson ki te whakataka i te 18 RPZ i te mutunga o te tau 2014, e kī ana ia ka āwhina ki te whakangāwari i te paheketanga. I kī a Tēnā Ferguson he "kino te tohutohu" o nga kaihokohoko kotahi tekau mā rua e mahi ana i ngā tuma. 'E māharahara ana ahau' "Kāore rātou i te whakaaro, kāore rātou i te whakarongo mai ki a au. E hiahia ana ahau ki te urutau," tana kī. "E māharahara ana ahau, neke atu i te tangata, mō ngā kaihokohoko iti, takitahi hoki i tēnei taone. " He pūkete tāku mo te mahi pēnā, ā, e mōhio ana rātau ki tēnā. Ki te kore rātau e mahi tahi me au, he tino kino rawa rātau." I kī a Tom Murray, e whakahaere ana i tētahi toa pūtia i runga i te huarahi, ka ngaro pea i te tangata a rātau mahi. "Mēnā ka taea ā-ture te [pupuri i ngā utu], ko ahau me ētahi atu e kōrero ana mō taua mea i tēnei wā kua tino rite ki te mahi," tana kī. "Ki te kore te kaunihera e whakarongo ki a mātau, tērā pea ka whakarongo mai tētahi tangata o te kāwanatanga ki a mātau. " We've had a hit where the banks didn't support local businesses for many years, and then we get conditions of RPZ that's going to seriously affect small businesses." Tērā pea ka kī a Tēnā Ferguson kei te whakaaro ia ināianei ki ngā mana uru maha ki ngā mahere e āwhina ana i ngā kaihokohoko. Ko tētahi tūponotanga ko te kawe mai i ngā whakaaetanga tūnga māmā ake mō ngā umanga iti, ā, ko tētahi atu ko te whakauru i tētahi whakaaetanga kaihokohoko puta noa i te taone hei āwhina i te hunga e taraiwa ana i Bristol hei wāhanga o tā rātou mahi. I tohe a ia ka whai painga ngā RPZ ki ngā umanga, mā te whakawātea i te tūnga tūnga i tangohia e ngā kaihoko i waho o o rātau toa. I kī a Tēnā Ferguson ko te ariā o te pupuri i ngā utu pakihi ka whai hua anake. I tohe a ia e hari ana a ia ki te whakauru atu ki nga kaihokohoko i runga i nga mahere hukihuki i tēnei wāhanga.

title: Hāhi Katorika 'he emepaea o te wahine wahine' - Mary McAleese
summary: Kua whakahē tētahi perehitini o mua o Aiarangi i te Hāhi Katorika hei "rangatiratanga o te wahine".
text: I te kōrero a Mary McAleese i Roma i mua i te hui Voices of Faith, e whakaatu ana i ngā wāhine Katorika rongonui o te ao. E whakanui ana rātau i te Rā Wahine Ao Whānui mā te tono kia nui ake te kōrero mō ngā wāhine i roto i te whakahaere a te Hāhi. Kua whakapeka a Pope Francis ki te haere ki ta rātau hui, ki te whakanui rānei i te Mass mō te hunga e haere ana. Kua whakatauria e te Reo Irirangi Whatikana ana pūrongo mo ta rātau hiahia kia ōrite te ira tangata. "Ko te Hāhi Katorika tētahi o ngā takahanga nui whakamutunga o te wahine wahine," te kī a Mrs McAleese. "He emepaea o te wahine wahine. " He iti rawa ngā tūranga ārahi e wātea ana ki ngā wāhine i tēnei wā. I kī a Mrs McAleese kāore he tauira kaha o ngā wāhine i roto i te Hāhi ka taea e rātau te titiro atu. Ehara te aroākapa o te Hāhi i te Hāhi o te wā heke", ka tāpiri mai a ia. "Kāore mātou e pīrangi kia rite ki tā te Pāpā e whakaahua ana ko 'te rōpere i runga i te keke', tana kī. " E whakaoho ana o tātau reo i nga hau o te huringa, nā reira me kōrero tātau," tana tāpiri mai. 'Kāore i te tika' I ngā tau o mua kua whakanuia e tēnei nekeneke wahine Katorika te Rā Wahine Ao Whānui mā te hui i roto i te Whatikana, engari i tēnei tau kāore i tūtaki tā rātou rārangi kaikōrero 2018 ki te whakaaetanga whaimana. I whakahē ngā kaiwhakahaere matua o te Whatikana ki te whakaurunga o tētahi wahine Uganda e toa ana i ngā mana Katorika Wahine me ngā Moe Katorika i tōna whenua, i reira he hara te tānetanga. I aukatia hoki e rātau a Tina Beattie, he ahorangi Katorika Ingarihi o te whakapono. I kī te katinara o Aotearoa, a Kevin Farrell, tētahi mana matua o te Whatikana, "ehara i te tika" kia whai wāhi nga wāhine ki te hui. Ināianei kei te tū te hui i te tari matua o te rōpū whakapono Jesuit i tua atu i te huarahi o Vatican City. Kua kī a Papa Whāwhāwhā e tautoko ana a ia i te whakauru nui ake o ngā wāhine ki ngā mahi o runga o te Whatikana, engari kāore i te manakohia kia whakaritea ngā wāhine hei tohunga.

title: £2.9bn te tiaki tamariki kāore i te utua 'kāore e taea te kohikohi'
summary: E kore pea e taea te whakaora i te nuinga o ngā pauna i roto i te tiaki tamariki, e whakaatu ana ngā pūkete kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Claire Savage5 Live Investigates Ko te moni e namatia ana e ngā mātua ngaro kua tohua ki te Child Support Agency. Ko ngā pūkete i whakaritea mō te Pāremata e te Tari Mahi me ngā Penihana (DWP) e £2.9bn o te £3.9bn i roto i ngā tārewa tautiakitanga hei "kāore e taea te kohikohi". I kī ngā minita ko te arotahi ki ngā nama mō ngā tamariki e whakatupuria tonutia ana, engari e kore e "warewaretia" ngā nama tawhito. The Child Support Agency (CSA) was set up 21 years ago with the aim of ensuring that if a relationship break down, a parent could not just walk off and leave an ex to pay the costs of bringing up their children. Ko te mahi a te CSA ko te tātai i te tautiakitanga - me te whakarite kia utua e ngā mātua kāore e noho ana. Engari kua pāngia e ngā raruraru. Kāore i tika te mahi o ngā pūnaha rorohiko. I mahia ngā hē ki ngā aromatawai, ā, kāore i aroturukitia ngā mātua ngaro. 'Kāore i te tūmanako' I te tau 2012, i whakaurua tētahi pūnaha tiaki tamariki hōu ki te tā i tētahi raina i raro i ngā uauatanga o te CSA. Kāore te Ratonga Tiaki Tamariki, e karangatia ana te pūnaha hōu, e whakaaro ana ki te whakaora i ngā nama hītori i runga i ngā pukapuka a te CSA hei manakē. Neke atu i te 1.3 miriona ngā mātua takitahi e nama ana i te moni i whakataua e te CSA e tika ana kia whai wāhi rātau - ā, he maha nga tau e tatari ana ētahi. I kī tētahi matua takitahi, a Marianne Miles mai i Rāwāhi, i tino hiahiatia e ia te moni i whakahaua e te CSA ki tana hoa tuatahi kia utua ki ta rāua tama. Engari i muri i te tata ki te whitu tau e tatari ana ki te utu, kua tukua katoatia e ia. "Kāore au i te tūmanako kia kite i tētahi o aua moni kia tino pono," tana kī. "Kāore anō rātou [te CSA] kia nui te kaha ki te tiki i tētahi mea - ahakoa te £30 i te wiki - nā reira kua tuhia katoatia e au." I te tau 2008, i whakakorea a Marianne Miles, mai i Rānana, i tana mahi hei kaipānui. Ko te whakatipu i tana tama taitamariki anake ka tino uaua ki te pūtea. Ka huri a ia ki te CSA, nāna i whakahau tana hoa tuatahi kia āwhina. Tae noa mai ki tēnei rā, kāore anō a ia kia whiwhi i te moni e namatia ana, kua hangaia ki te tapeke o te £12,000. "E ngana ana ahau kia kaua e riri mo taua mea, engari ehara i te tika," tana kī. "Mēnā e nama ana ia ki te moni tāke o te kaunihera kāwanatanga, mō tētahi tīkiti tūnga rānei, ka whaia e rātau me te whakarite kua utua. Engari ki te utu i te tiaki ki tō ake tamaiti, kāore i te whakaarotia he mea hira." E 20 tau tana tama ināianei, ā, kua mahue i te kāinga, engari kei a Marianne tonu te kawenga mōna. "Nā te mea kāore i a ia i mua, ehara i te mea kāore ia i te hiahia ināianei," tana kī. "He tino nui te rerekētanga. " He ākonga a ia kia haere ai ki ana pukapuka me ana kai, me tautoko e au, ā, kei te ako ia ki te taraiwa. Ko au anake te tangata e karapoti ana ki te āwhina i a ia." E whakapono ana a Janet Allbeson, mai i te aroha matua kotahi o Gingerbread, me whakaora te kāwanatanga i te tiakitanga kāore i te utua, ahakoa i ngā take kua haere mō ngā tau. Ka kī a ia: "Ki te taea e rātau te tiki moni, ahakoa he maha nga tau tōmuri, ka tino rerekē te oranga o te tamaiti. " Hei tauira, ka taea te āwhina i te utu o te haere ki te kāreti, te utu pea i tētahi moni taurewa ākonga, te āwhina rānei i tētahi tamaiti ki te ako i te taraiwa. "I ētahi āhuatanga ka nui ake te utu o ngā tamariki i a rātau e pakeke ana, ā, ka taea e taua moni te whakarerekē i te wā heke mai o te tamaiti." Kāore i te 'waiho i te nama' i kī te kāwanatanga e manakē ana i ngā take e whakaarahia tonutia ana he tamaiti. I kī a Steve Webb, te minita e whai mana ana ki te tiaki tamariki: "E mārama ana mātou nā te mea kua roa te nama o te moni, ehara i te tikanga kia warewaretia. Ko te tikanga kia utua. "E kore e taea e ngā mea katoa te manakē. He tino pūataata mātou... Ā, kua whakamāramatia e mātou, kei hea tonu tētahi tamaiti i te kura, kei te whakatupuria rānei - koia tērā te manakē tuatahi. "Engari kāore mātou i te tuhi, i te waiho rānei i te nama tawhito." Engari ko ngā whika i roto i ngā pūkete DWP i whakaputaina i Tīma ka whakaarahia ngā pātai mō te nui o ngā whakaputunga tārewa ka whakaoratia. Ko te £2.9bn kua whakarārangitia hei "kāore e taea te kohikohi" e pā ana ki ngā take kāore he utu i whiwhia mai i te matua ngaro i roto i ngā marama e ono kua hipa, kāore rānei he hōtaka tārewa tārewa. I kī te DWP ko te whakamāramatanga o te "kāore e taea te kohikohi" i roto i ngā pūkete kāore i hoatu he pikitia pono o te taumata nama i tua atu i ōna mana whakaū - ā, ko te mea ko te £244m anake i "kore e taea te kohikohi". Ka pāohotia tēnei pūrongo i te Rātapu, 25 o Hānuere 2015 i te 11:00 GMT i te Reo Irirangi 5 ora. Ka taea e koe te whakarongo ki ētahi atu putanga o ngā Tūhura ora e 5 i runga i te BBC iPlayer. Ka taea e koe te whakapā atu ki ngā Tūhura ora e 5 mā te īmēra goldberg@bbc.co.uk, te tākupu rānei mō tēnei pūrākau ki @BBC5Live i Twitter.

title: Halton Transport: Ko te kamupene pahi me nga hinganga nui e haere ana ki te whakakorenga
summary: Kua whakakorea tētahi kamupene pahi e whakahaeretia ana e te kaunihera i muri i te kitenga i ngā hinganga e piki ake ana i te 1100% i roto i te rua tau.
text: Ko Halton Transport, e whakahaere ana neke atu i te tuatoru o ngā ratonga puta noa i te takiwā o Cheshire, i ngaro tata ki te £620,000 i te 2019, mai i te £50,500 i te 2017. I kī te Kaunihera o Halton Borough i ngana ki te hoatu i te umanga he "waewae kaha ake, pūmau ake" engari i rahua. E kī ana ko te "tohutohu ngāwari" ki ngā tāngata e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā ratonga Waka Halton ko te "whakarite i ētahi atu whakaritenga". Ko te nekehanga, nāna i mōrearea ngā mahi e 150, i puta mai i muri i te tārewa o te kamupene ki tētahi moni tārewa £750,000 mai i te kaunihera i te tau 2019, te kī a te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero kaunihera e mahi ana te mana me ētahi atu kaiwhakarato pahi kia mau tonu ngā ratonga matua, engari i tāpiritia ka "kore e taea te raruraru". I kī te kaitiaki pāhihi Transport Focus he "tino nui" ngā mana ā rohe me ngā tohutūmahi pahi i whakaheke i te pānga wawe ki ngā pāhihi. 'Ngā kōwhiringa uaua' i pānuitia e Arriva North West i runga i tōna paetukutuku ka tangohia ētahi o ngā ara o te umanga, i te wā i kī te Koromatua o te Rohe o Liverpool City Steve Rotheram ka haere tonu ngā ara kura katoa i pūteatia e Merseytravel. Kua whakahaeretia te umanga hei kamupene "roanga ringa" e te kaunihera mai i te tau 1986, i te whakaurunga o te Ture Waka i kore ai e taea e ngā kaunihera te whakahaere hāngai i ngā kamupene pahi. I kī te Kaunihera o Halton, e anga ana ki tētahi āputa pūtea £6m i te tau 2020, he taiao tauhokohoko "uaua" me ngā utu pūtea kaunihera i mate ai te umanga. "As the major shareholder, the council has been supporting the company in an attempt to place it on a stronger, more sustainable footing [but] unfortunately that has not been possible," the spokeswoman said. I kī a ia he "whakahekenga nui i roto i tana tahua" te kaunihera, ā, me mahi i "ngā kōwhiringa uaua" e haere whakamua ana, ko te tikanga ko tōna "kaha ki te tautoko i tētahi mahi arumoni pēnei i a Halton Transport he whāiti". I tāpiri mai a ia ko te "tohutohu ngāwari ki ngā mema o te iwi whānui, ki te whakawhirinaki koe ki tētahi pahi Waka Halton, me whakarite koe i ētahi atu whakaritenga". "E hiahia ana te kaunihera ki te whakapōhēhē ki ngā kaiwhakamahi pahi mō ngā raruraru i takea, ā, ka ngana tonu ki te whakarite i ētahi atu ratonga." 'Kāore i te ohorere' i kī a Tēnā Rotheram kua "mahi wawe" ia kia haere tonu ngā ratonga kura mai i te ata Mane, mā te whakamahi i ngā pahi Arriva North West me Stagecoach. I tāpiritia e ia, ahakoa i "āraia ā-ture" e te Ture Waka te mana paheko kia kaua e hoko i a Halton Transport, ko tana whāinga kia "whakaiti i te pānga mō ngā tāngata paetata i ngā wā katoa e taea ana". I kī a John Boughton, te āpiha ā-rohe mō te uniana Unite, he "āhua tino pouri, engari kāore i te ohorere" i te mea "i runga i ngā kāri mō tētahi wā". "Ka tangohia e ētahi atu tohutūmahi pahi ngā ratonga, ā, e mōhio ana mātou kei te tono hohe rātou i ngā atekōkiri i whakamahia i mua e Halton Transport," tana tāpiri mai. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o Transport Focus, a David Sidebottom, ko ngā pahi te "tikanga tūturu anake o te waka e wātea ana ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata", nā reira he mea nui kia mahi ngā mana me ngā tohutūmahi pahi "he mahere wā roa ake hei whakarato ratonga e hiahiatia ana e ngā tangata whenua".

title: Palmyra: 'Te urupa maha' i roto i te taone o Hiriani i hopukina
summary: Kua kitea e nga hōia o Hiriani he urupa maha e pupuri ana i ngā tinana e 40 i te taone o Palmyra i muri i tana hopu anō i te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi (IS), ko ngā pūrongo rongokōrero o te kāwanatanga o Haina.
text: I huraina te urupa e pupuri ana i nga tinana o nga tāne, o nga wāhine me nga tamariki i te taha ki te raki o te taone. I panaia ētahi i te wā i pūhia ētahi, ka kī atu tētahi pūtake hōia ki a WHO. Ināianei kua hū te whawhai i waenganui i te hunga whakakeke me ngā ope ā rohe ki te tonga o te taone o Aropo, ka kī nga kaupane. I hopukina e te hunga whakakeke, tae atu ki te al-Mōrea, te rohe rautaki mai i te kāwanatanga, e ai ki te rōpū kaiwhaiwhai o UK, te Taiwhanga Hiriani mō ngā Motika Tangata. Neke atu i te kotahi marama te "whakamutu i ngā whakarihariha" o te motu, engari ka aukatia te aroaro o Nusra me te IS. I roto i te taone tawhito i hopukina anō mai i te IS Recapture of Palmyra e whakamau ana i te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi: Ko te pūrākau katoa kua whakawhitia ngā tinana i kitea i Palmyra ki tētahi hōhipera hōia i te pūmatua o te porowini o Homs. Kua whakaritea ētahi kua tāututia. I waenganui i ērā i kitea, e ai ki te pūtake o te WHW, he hōia, he mema o te hōia ā-kāwanatanga me o rātau whanaunga. E rua tekau mā whā o ngā tūpāpaku he tangata whenua, tae atu ki ngā tamariki tokotoru, ka tāpiritia te pūtake. I tērā Rātapu, ka hopukina anō e te ope taua o Hiriani, i pūruatia e ngā ope Rūhia, a Palmyra me tōna matatini rongonui o te ao o ngā toenga tahito, i whakaekea e IS i a Me i tērā tau. Neke atu i te 280 ngā tāngata i kawea e nga kaiwhakawhanake IS i te wā o ta rātau mahi i te taone, e ai ki te Taiwhanga Hiriani mō ngā Motika Tangata, he rōpū aroturuki ā-UK. I tūkinotia hoki e rātau te wāhi tawhito rongonui o te ao. E kī ana ngā kōrero kōrero ko te hoputanga anō o Palmyra tētahi o ngā tūponotanga nui rawa mō IS mai i te wā i whakapuakina ai he tōpū puta noa i ngā wāhi o Hiria me Iraki i te tau 2014. E kī ana te taua Hiriani ka whakamahia e ia a Palmyra - he taunga rererangi hōia tōna - hei papa whakarewa hei whakaroha i ngā mahi ki a IS me te tapahi i ōna ara putanga. E kī ana ngā pūtake hōia o Hiriani e whakarite ana te taua i ngā taone i puritia e IS, tae atu ki al-Qaryatain, ki te tonga-hauauru o Palmyra, me Sukhnah ki te raki-rāwhiti. Na te whakahau hau e ono marama a Rūhia ki ngā hoariri o Perehitini o Rūhia i huri ai te tai o te whawhai ā iwi e rima tau ki te manakohanga o te kaiārahi Hiriani.

title: Ko nga taimana ngaro a te kaituhi hara a Agatha Christies kia hokona
summary: Ko tētahi kaihautū a Agatha Christie nāna i hoko mai he kākahu mai i te pānga o te kaituhituhi pūrākau kia kitea ai he taonga whānau kei roto, e hoko ana i ngā taimana i te hokonga.
text: I hokona e Jennifer Grant te kēhi, me tētahi pouaka kaha i roto, i te tau 2006 i tētahi hokonga i te kāinga o mua o te kaituhi i Devon. Tae noa ki te whā tau i muri mai ka whakatuwheratia e ia te pouaka, a, ka kitea he brooch taimana me te mowhiti i roto. Ināianei kei te hokona e Mrs Grant, o Nutley, East Sussex, nga taonga i Bonhams ka taea te tiki atu ki te £13,000. Ko te pūtake haere, nā te whaea o Agatha Christie, he wāhanga o tētahi hokonga ihirangi i te pānga o mua o te kaituhituhi, o Greenway. 'Tata ki te hyperventilating' i hokona e Mrs Grant mō te £100, ā, i te taenga atu, ka kitea e ia tētahi pouaka kaha konganuku hiri i roto i te pūtake o te pūtake. Ka kī a ia: "Na te pouaka kaha i tino taumaha ai te pūtake, nā reira i noho ai i raro o te arawhata mo nga tau. " Tata tonu ahau ki te kore e hiahia ki te whakatuwhera nā te mea ka mutu te mea ngaro. "Ina haere mai ngā hoa, ka aki mātau i te pūtake mai i tētahi taha ki tētahi, ka whakarongo ki te rongo mēnā ka pārekareka tētahi mea, "Mēnā i tino mārire koe, ka rongo koe i tētahi mea e rēreti ana ki roto." E whā tau i muri i te hokonga o te pūtake, ka whakatuwheratia e Whaea Grant te pouaka ki te paepae. I roto i kitea e ia he pāhi moni koura, he brooch taimana me tētahi mowhiti taimana pōhatu e toru, he tūemi e whakahuatia ana i roto i te haurongo a Agatha Christie hei wāhanga i tohua mōna me tōna tuahine ko Madge. Ka kī a Mrs Grant: "Kua pānui ahau i te haurongo a Agatha Christie, nā reira i mōhio tonu ahau ki tāku e titiro ana. " I ōrite tonu rātau ki te whakaahuatanga, tata tonu ahau ki te hyperventilating." Ināianei me haere nga taonga ki raro i te hama i Bonhams i Knightsbridge me te brooch i tukuna i waenganui i te £6,000 me te £8,000 me te mowhiti i waenganui i te £3,000 me te £5,000.

title: Labour calls for inquiry into lobbyist involvement during Covid
summary: Kua karangatia e Labour he uiui mēnā i whai hua ngā kaipānui i whakamahia e te kāwanatanga i te wā o te urupare Covid i ngā mōhiohio whai painga.
text: I muri i te pūrongo a te Sunday Times ka haere tētahi kaipupuri, nāna i mahi i te NHS Test and Trace, ki te tiritiri mōhiohio ki ngā kiritaki. I muri i tana wehenga atu i tana tūranga, ka whakaritea e ia he mōhiohio raka tairongo. I kī te Tari Hauora me te Tiaki Pāpori i whakapuakina ngā papā katoa o ngā painga i mua i tana whakatūnga. Engari kua kī te kaiārahi tuarua o Labour, a Angela Rayner, ko te whakapae a te Sunday Times ko "te mea hou rawa i roto i tētahi rārangi roa o ngā whakakitenga e pā ana ki ngā umanga me ngā tangata whai hononga tata ki te Rōpū Rangatira kua pā kino ki te whakawhirinaki tūmatanui i roto i tēnei taiepa". E ai ki te nūpepa o te Rātapu Times, i utua te manukura o te umanga rorohiko o Portland Communications, a George Pascoe-Watson, ki te mahi i te NHS Test and Trace i Aperira. I whakaūngia e te DHSC kua utua e ia a Tēnā Pascoe-Watson mō te ono marama hei kaitohutohu kāore i te utua. I kī te Sunday Times i whai wāhi a Tēnā Pascoe-Watson ki ngā hui me te Hēkeretari Hauora o Mātā Hancock me te rangatira Whakamātautau me te Whakataki i a Dido Harding me pēhea te whakawhitiwhiti kaupapa here ki te iwi whānui. I whakapaea i muri i a Tēnā Pascoe-Watson - e tohu ana i ngā kamupene rongoā, ngā kaiwhakanao rākau me ngā pēke - i mahue i te pou i te 7 o Whiringahora, ka tukuna atu e ia ngā mōhiohio ki te utu kiritaki i mua i te pānuitanga tuarua o te raka ā-motu i te mutunga o Whiringahora. I whakaūngia e Tēnā Pascoe-Watson ka īmēra ia ki ngā kiritaki i ngā rā i muri i tana haerenga, engari i kī: "Kāore ngā mōhiohio i tiria ki ngā kiritaki i te 15 me te 29 o Whiringa ā-rangi, kāore i tūhono ki ngā waea Whakamātautau me te Whakataki, kua kore ahau e kaiuru." I tāpiritia e ia ki te Kaitiaki i puta mai ngā mōhiohio i "ngā kōrerorero maha a o mātau kaiāwhina". I muri i te pānuitanga o te pūrākau, ka tuhituhi te kaiārahi tuarua o Labour, a Angela Rayner, ki te Hēkeretari Kāpata o Haimona Kēhi, e tono ana i tētahi uiui kōhukihuki ki "te pānga o ngā kaipānui me ā rātou kiritaki i tēnei mōhiohio nui i mua i te mōhiotanga o te iwi whānui". I kī a ia mehemea he pono ngā whakaaro, ka tukuna ngā mōhiohio i te wā "e tatari ana te toenga o te whenua ki ngā pānuitanga a te kāwanatanga mō te raka, ā, mēnā ka kite rātou i ō rātou whānau, hoa me ngā hoa aroha". I tāpiritia e Ms Rayner he "tino whakahawea" ki te iwi whānui o Ingarangi, ā, ka karangatia e te Tari Kāpata kia "whakamāramatia tēnei āhuatanga kia mau tonu ai te whakawhirinaki tūmatanui" i runga i te utunga o ngā kaitohutohu kāwanatanga. I uru te SNP ki te karanga mo tētahi uiuinga, e whakapae ana i te kāwanatanga o te "pūkenga pārekareka". I kī te kaiārahi tuarua o te rōpū i Aotearoa, a Kiriata Oswald: "Me uiui tūmatanui ki te huarahi heitara i tukuna atu ai e te kāwanatanga o Tory ngā moni tūmatanui, ngā mahi me te urunga whai painga e te kāwanatanga o Tory i te wā o tēnei raruraru." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te DHSC: "Hei wāhanga o tētahi urupare tawhito rawa ki tēnei taiepa ā-ao, kua tika tā mātou i runga i te tohungatanga o ētahi hoa wāhanga tūmataiti nāna i tuku tohutohu me te tohunga hei āwhina i ngā mahi nui a te kāwanatanga. " I roto i tēnei ko te āwhina ki te whakatū i te whatunga tātaritanga nui rawa i roto i te hītori o Ingarangi me tētahi pūnaha whakamātautau me te aroturuki e whakamahia ana e te tekau miriona tāngata. "As a result of public and private sector organisations working together at pace, we were able to strengthen our response to the pandemic so we are better prepared for the challenges of the coming months."

title: Tokowhitu i whakaingoatia mō te Kaunihera Ture o Te Motu o Tangata
summary: E whitu ngā whakaingoatanga kua whiwhia mō ngā tūru e whā e wātea ana i te Kaunihera Ture o te Motu o Tangata.
text: E wātea ana ngā wāhi i muri i te haerenga o ngā mema tokorua i mua i te pōtitanga i te 18 o Poutāpeta, ā, tokorua i tae ki te mutunga o to rātau mahi. Kua whakararo a David Callister rāua ko Eddie Lowey, ā, i te mutunga o to rāua mahi - ka tū anō a Juan Turner rāua ko Tony Wild - i te mutunga o to rāua mahi - ka tū mō te pōtitanga anō. Ko te Kaunihera Ture te Peka o runga o Tynwald, ā, e 11 ōna mema. Kua whakaingoatia a Linda Bowers-Kasch, Michael Coleman, Geoff Corkish MHK, Peter Hill me Nigel Malpass i te taha o Mr Turner me Mr Wild. Pōti tūmatanui Ka tū te pōti i tētahi nohoanga motuhake o te Whare Pātuhi i te 18 o Poutāpeta i te 10:00 GMT. Me whiwhi ia kaitono pōti i te tautoko a ngā mema 13 neke atu rānei o te Whare Pātuhi (MHK) kia pōtitia. Ko aua mema ko ngā mema e waru i pōtitia, ko te Perehitini o Tynwald, ko te Pīhopa o Sodor me Man me te Rōia Tianara. Ahakoa ka taea e ngā mema o te iwi whānui te haere ki ngā nohoanga ina pōtitia, kāore e whakaaetia kia whai wāhi ki te tukanga pōti. Ko te Kaunihera Ture i te nuinga o te wā e mahi ana hei ruma whakahōu mō ngā pire, ā, ko ia kaitono i te pōtitanga o Poutāpeta me whakaingoa e tētahi mema o te Whare Pātuhi. Kua mahi a David Callister i runga i te Kaunihera Ture mai i te tau 2008 me Eddie Lowey mai i te tau 1982.

title: Chris Evans: Ko te whaikōrero poroporoaki roimata a te kaihautū Irirangi 2
summary: I a ia e poroporoaki ana mo te wā whakamutunga ki ngā kaiwhakarongo me ngā hoa mahi mai i tana Whakaaturanga Parakuihi o te Reo Irirangi 2 o TE Reo Irirangi 2.
text: Anei tana whaikōrero katoa: "Kia ora koe mō ngā mea katoa, kia ora ki te AO mō te tautoko i a au me te whakawhirinaki mai ki tētahi o ā rātou hopuoro utu nui mō ngā tau e 13 kua taha, mō te tuku i ahau ki te tipu mō ia meneti o ia rā i runga i te hau; ahakoa noho mai i Glastonbury, mai i ngā one rānei o Wīwī ki te raki mō ngā whakamaharatanga o ngā taunga o Normandy, i te pārekareka rānei i waenganui i tētahi o ā mātou whakaaturanga Paraire. "Mō ngā manuhiri ātaahua, ērā pūoro whakamīharo katoa, i konei tonu i te studio tawhito o Tā Terry, studio 6C o Wogan House i Rānana. " Tēnā koe ki ngā tāngata katoa kua whakaputa, kua āwhina rānei i te whakanaotanga o te whakaaturanga, me ngā mea katoa e pā ana ki ngā ihirangi mātauranga kua whakawhiwhia mai ki a au i roto i ngā tau e waru kua hipa. "Tēnā koe ki ngā Tamariki e Matea ana, mō te homai i te 'aha' nui rawa o tōku oranga, ki te haere mai me te maha o ngā 'pēhea' e taea ana e au ki te kata tika i te tangata, i raro i te whakaaro o te kohi moni mō te pēke poaka a Pudsey. " Ko te mea tino kaingākau kua mahia e au, ko tētahi o ēnei ko te haere mai me tētahi hākari mō te 40 rā me te 40 pō kia kore ai taku hinengaro e kai parāoa, koia te āhua o CarFest. "Tēnā koe ki taku māngai tino pai ko Mikaera. Kua roa ake māua i a māua mārenatanga, ā, e rima. Ki te kore te aroha, te pono me te tautoko a Mikaera, ehara i te mea kua mahia e au te nuinga o aku mea i waimarie ai ahau, kāore au i konei ināianei ki te kore a Mikaera. "Ngā mihi ki a Lesley [Douglas], taku rangatira taketake i Radio 2, mō te whakapono ki a au i te tau 2005 me te homai i tētahi wā tuarua kia kaua e whakararuraru i ngā mea i tēnei wā. " Tēnā koe ki a Helen i a koe hei kaiwhakanao tuatahi mōku, nā reira i hoatu ai ki a mātau tēnei whakaaturanga. 'Tūturu me te haumarutanga' "Tēnā koe ki a Bob [Shennan] rāua ko Lewis [Carnie] mō ngā tautoko katoa i te wā o taku whakahaeretanga o tēnei whakaaturanga, kia ora ki taku kaiāwhina, te tangata kawhe huka mō te noho i tōku taha mō te neke atu i te tekau tau ināianei, otirā mō ana mahi tohe e pā ana ki ngā Tamariki e Matea ana. Ko ia te toa tūturu o ērā mea katoa. "Tēnā koe ki ōku hoa me ōku whānau katoa mō te whakamau i a au me te kutukutu i ētahi wā e haere mai ana me te whai tangata i roto i tō āwhiotanga whaiaro e mahi ana i tētahi mahi pēnei, otirā ko taku tamāhine ko Jade me tōna whaea tino pai ko Alison. " Tēnā koe ki a koutou katoa mō te whakarongo, engari ko te nuinga o ngā mea katoa e hiahia ana ahau ki te mihi ki taku wahine a Natasha, taku tō ā-papa, taku kāpehu, taku ārahi, taku rama ārahi, mō te homai i a au i te nui o te mōhiotanga me te haumarutanga kia nui ai te māia ki te eke anō ki tētahi āhua rangirua, koia tāku e pai ai. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te rangirua, engari ka taea anake e koe tēnā ki te āhua o te tūturu me te haumarutanga. " Ko te rangirua te wāhi e noho ana te auahatanga, ehara te whakamarie me te auahatanga i te tino nui o ngā hoa moenga. "Hei pānui i tētahi pukapuka me huri tonu koe i ngā whārangi, engari ki te tuhi pukapuka i te wāhi tuatahi me mahi ōrite koe. Ko te kitenga o tētahi whārangi pātea e pā ana ki te wehi o te Atua ki ētahi, engari mō ētahi kāore he mea whakaongaonga ake. "So with your blessing, that's exactly what I'm going to do. "None of look forward to say goodbye to the things and people we love, but that's simply because we love them so much, in the first place, which is exactly as it should be. He aha mātou e hiahia ai ki tētahi atu huarahi?" Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Cerne Abbas Giant: 'Theresa' i tātakina i runga i te pene o te whika tioka
summary: I whakapiria e ngā māminga ngā reta nunui e tātaki ana i te "Theresa" ki te pene o te whika maunga nui o Cerne Abbas.
text: Ko ngā reta papa mārō i peitatia - i whakaarotia he tohutoro ki te pirimia - i whakapiria ki te mema o te whakamaharatanga tahito i te Mane. Engari ko te National Trust, e whakahaere ana i te pae pare i Dorset, i rarautia te māminga i waenganui i ngā mataku kua tūkinotia te whika maunga i whakawhiwhia paitia. E kī ana kua pūrongotia taua mahi ki nga pirihimana. Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei me ētahi atu pūrākau mai i te Tonga o Ingarangi. Kua huatau ētahi mēnā he tohutoro te mahi ki te peha Tory "E tū ana mō Ingarangi". Ko te Cerne Abbas Giant, ki te raki o Dorchester, e parea ana hei Whakamaharatanga Tawhito kua whakaritea, he wāhanga hoki o tētahi Pae Pūtaiao Motuhake. I whakamōhiotia te aroha atawhai ki taua mahi i te ata Mane, ā, ka tukuna atu ngā kaitiaki ki te tango i ngā reta me te aromatawai i te tūkinotanga. I kī te kaiwhakahaere taiwhenua o te National Trust, a Rob Rhodes: "He moumou roa o a mātau rauemi hei aroha ki te whakatika i te tūkinotanga me te horoi i muri i aua mahi ina taea kē te whakapau moni ki ētahi atu kaupapa atawhai. " Hei Whakamaharatanga Tawhito kua whakaritea, kei te tipua te parenga whenua tiketike, ā, he hara te tūkinotanga mai i te whakapiri i ngā papa. E parea ana hoki te pae hei pātītī tioka hira mō ōna putiputi mohoao, me ngā pepe me ngā kararehe e tautoko ana, ā, he ngāwari te pakaru. "E tono ana te National Trust ki te tangata e kite ana i tētahi mahi whakatūpato e tata ana ki te matua i ngā wā katoa ki te waea atu ki ngā pirihimana."

title: Te hōtaka karihi o Kōria ki te Raki: He pēhea te hōhonutanga?
summary: Ko te hōtaka karihi o Kōria ki te Raki he pūtake o te āwangawanga hōhonu mo te iwi ao whānui. Ahakoa he maha nga mahi ki te whakawhāiti, e kī ana a Ūngia e rima nga whakamātautau karihi.
text: Kua whiwhi a Kōria ki te Raki i te pōma? Āe āe - he maha nga whakamātautau i whakahaeretia e Kōria ki te Raki ki ngā pomu karihi. Heoi anō, kia taea ai te whakarewa i tētahi whakaekenga karihi ki ōna hoa noho tata, me āhei ia ki te hanga i tētahi nuku karihi kia iti rawa te whakauru ki tētahi tawhā. Ahakoa e kī ana a Kōria ki te Raki kua tutuki pai te "whakaiti" i ngā nuku karihi, kua roa te rangirua a ngā tohunga o te ao whānui ki ēnei kerēme. Heoi anō, e ai ki ngā mōhiohio i māturu ki te Washington Post i Aotearoa 2017, e whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakahaere mōhiohio o Amerika ināianei ka taea e Kōria ki te Raki te whakaiti. He pēhea te kaha o ngā pomu karihi o Kōria ki te Raki? E kī ana a Kōria ki te Raki e rima ngā whakamātautau karihi angitu: i te tau 2006, 2009, 2013, i Hānuere me Mahuru 2016. Te āhua nei kua nui haere te hua o nga pomu. Kua whakaaturia e te whakamātautau o Mahuru 2016 tētahi pūrere whai hua pakū i waenganui i te 10 me te 30 kirokaramu - ā, mēnā ka whakaūngia, ka noho ko te whakamātautau karihi kaha rawa o te Raki. Ko tērā atu pātai nui mēnā he pomu karihi ngā pūrere e whakamātauria ana, he pomu hauwai rānei, he kaha ake nei. Ka whakamahia e ngā pomu H te hononga - te hanumitanga o ngā ngota - hei tuku i te nui o te pūngao, ā, ka whakamahia e ngā pomu karihi te wehewehenga karihi, te wehewehenga rānei o ngā ngota. Ko ngā whakamātautau 2006, 2009 me te 2013 he whakamātautau pomu karihi katoa. I kī a Kōria ki te Raki ko tana whakamātautau o Hānuere 2016 he pōma hauwai. Engari i rangirua nga tohunga ki te kerēme i te rahi o te pahūtanga i rēhitatia. Plutonium, konupūmā rānei? Ko tētahi atu pātai he aha te rawa tīmatanga mo nga whakamātautau karihi. E whakapono ana ngā kaitirotiro i whakamahia e ngā whakamātautau tuatahi e rua te plutonium, engari mēnā i whakamahia e te Raki te plutonium, te konupūmā rānei hei rauemi tīmata mō te whakamātautau 2013. Ma te whakamātautau konupūmā angitu e tohu he pekenga nui whakamua i roto i te hōtaka karihi o Kōria ki te Raki. He mutunga noa iho ngā rawa plutonium o te Raki, engari mēnā ka taea te whakanui i te konupūmā ka taea e ia te hanga i tētahi putunga karihi. Me puta hoki te whakakao plutonium i roto i ngā pūkenga nui, ngāwari ki te wāhi, ā, he ngāwari kē atu te mahi huna i te whakakao konupūmā. Ka taea e Kōria ki te Raki te tuku? Kaore he whakaaetanga ki te wāhi e noho ana a Kōria ki te Raki ki te whakaiti i tētahi pūrere karihi kia taea ai te tuku mā te tawhā. E ai ki taua mōhiohio i māturu ki te Washington Post, ināianei e whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakahaere mōhiohio o Amerika ki te kerēme a Kōria ki te Raki kei a ia te hangarau hei whakauru i ōna tūroro ki ngā nuku karihi. Kātahi anō ka kīia e te minita wawao a Tiapanī he tūponotanga tēnei. I muri noa iho i te whakamātautau a Kōria ki te Raki i tāna i kī ai he tawhā whakawhitiwhiti ā-whenua (ICBM) e taea ana te tae ki te tuawhenua o Amerika. Ahakoa e rangirua ana ngā kaitirotiro i te kerēme a Ūngia, e whakaae ana te nuinga o ngā tohunga ka tae atu te tūroro ki Alaska, Hawaii rānei. He aha atu anō tātau e mōhio ana mō te hōtaka karihi o te Raki? Ko tētahi pae i ngā maunga e tata ana ki Ūngia, ki te raki o Ūngia, e whakaarotia ana ko te pūkenga karihi matua o te Raki, i te wā i kīa ngā whakamātautau o Hānuere me Mahuru 2016 i te pae o Punggye-ri. I pau te hinu i ngā teihana hiko, ā, ko ia te pūtake o te plutonium mō te hōtaka rākau karihi o Kōria ki te Raki. Kua kī hoki te US rāua ko Kōrea ki te Tonga e whakapono ana rāua he pae tāpiri tā te Raki e honoa ana ki tētahi hōtaka whakakao konupūmā. He nui nga rāhui konupūmā o te whenua. He aha te mahi a te iwi huri noa mō tēnei? I uru te US, Rūhia, Haina, Hapanihi, me Kōrea ki te Tonga ki te Raki i roto i ngā whakaritenga maha e mōhiotia ana ko ngā kōrero a te hunga tokoono. He maha ngā whakamātau ki te whakaae ki ngā mahi tutei ki Kōrea ki te Raki, engari kāore tētahi o ēnei i whakakaha i a Ūngia. I te tau 2005, ka whakaae a Kōria ki te Raki ki tētahi mahi whakahirahira kia tukua ōna hiahia karihi hei whakahoki i te āwhina o te ohaoha me ngā mana tōrangapū. I te tau 2008, i whakangaromia e ia te pourewa whakamātao i Yongbyon hei wāhanga o te mahi tutei mō te āwhina. Engari i kitea he uaua te whakatinana i te mahi, ā, i tūpono ngā kōrero i te tau 2009. Kore rawa te US i whakapono kei te whakaatu katoa a Ūngia i ōna pūkenga karihi katoa - he whakapae i whakapakaritia i te wā i whakakitea e Kōria ki te Raki tētahi pūkenga whakakao konupūmā i Yongbyon, e kiia ana mō te whakatipuranga hiko, ki te kaipūtaiao o Amerika o Siegfried Hecker i te tau 2010. I te tau 2012, ohorere ana te pānui a Kōria ki te Raki ka whakatārewatia e ia ngā ngohe karihi, ā, ka whakatakotoria he takawaenga ki ngā whakamātautau tūroro hei whakawhiti mo te āwhina kai a Amerika. Engari kāore tēnei i puta mai i te wā i whakamātau a Ūngia ki te whakarewa i tētahi tākirirangi i Aperira i taua tau. I Mati 2013, i muri i te pakanga kupu ki a Mātau me ngā mana hou o te UN i runga i te whakamātautau karihi tuatoru o te Raki, ka kī taurangi a Ūngia kia tīmata anō i ngā pūkenga katoa i Te Raki. Tae noa ki te tau 2015, te āhua nei kua tīmata anō ngā mahi pūnoa i reira. Na nga whakamātautau o te tau 2016 i kawe mai te whakahēnga o te ao whānui, tae atu ki Haina - te hoa tauhokohoko matua o te Raki, me te urunga anake. I te tau 2017, i whakaae te UN ki tētahi mōkī whakamana hou hei urupare ki ngā whakamātautau. I a Aotearoa, ka whakawehi te Perehitini o Amerika a Donald Trump i Kōrea ki te Raki ki te "ahi me te weriweri" me kaua te whenua e whakarere i ana tuma ki a Mātau. Ahakoa rā, i rahua te kupu whakapuaki mai i Washington ki te whakahaere anō i Ūngia, nāna i kī kei te whakawhanake i tētahi mahere taraiwa hei tuki i te rohe o Amerika o Guam, he motu i te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa ki te Uru.

title: Ko te kāinga o Tā Paul McCartney i Rāwāhi i ūkuia e ngā tāhae
summary: E uiui ana ngā pirihimana i tētahi pakarutanga i te kāinga o Tā Paul McCartney i Rāwāhi.
text: I ūkuia e ngā tāhae te whare o mua o Beatle i St John's Wood i te ahiahi o te 7 o Hakihea. Kāore i te mōhiotia mēnā ko te kaiwhakatangitangi, e 76, ko tana wahine rānei ko Nancy Shevell, i te kāinga i te wā o te pakarutanga, i tae mai i ngā rā i mua i tana whakatangi i tētahi konohete i tōna taone tupu o Liverpool. Kāore he hopunga i mahia, ā, ka haere tonu te tūhuratanga, ka kī tētahi kōrero Pirihimana o Metropolitan. Ko te tikanga kia tākaro a Tā Paora i te O2 Arena o Rāwāhi i te Rātapu. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe:

title: Tūkinotanga o Clutha: I rere tonu te kaihautū i muri i te whakatūpato hinu
summary: Ko tētahi kaihautū i tūtuki tana waka rererangi ki tētahi pāpara, e 10 ngā tāngata, kāore i whai i te kawa ohorere, ā, ka rere tonu ahakoa he iti ngā whakatūpato hinu, kua puta mai.
text: I puta mai ngā kitenga i runga i te tūkinotanga o te pae o Clutha i Glasgow i roto i tētahi pūrongo mai i te Peka Tūhura Aituā Hau. E kī ana i whakawetohia ngā papu whakawhiti hinu, ā, kāore i tutuki tētahi tauranga whakahaere mō "ngā take tē mōhiotia". E tūtohu ana hoki te pūrongo kia whakarahia ngā hepa pirihimana katoa ki ngā taputapu hopu rererangi pouaka pango. Ināianei kua whakaūngia e te Tari Karauna o Pākehā ka tū wawe tonu tētahi uiuinga aituā kino ki te tūtukitanga. I kī te pūrongo ki te tūtukitanga, i tū i te 29 o Whiringa 2013: I te tirohanga atu ki ngā kitenga a ngā kaihautū. I kī te kaitirotiro matua o te Peka Whakamatau Aituā Rangi (AAIB) o Keith Conradi: "He takitahi te AAIB, e mahi ana ki te tirotiro i ngā take o ngā aituā hei ārai i te hohokitanga me te āwhina kia haumaru ake ai te rererangi. " Kaore mātau e tohatoha i te whakapae i roto i a mātau rīpoata. "Kua mahia e mātou he rangatū o ngā tūtohutanga haumaru i roto i tēnei pūrongo whakamutunga, tae atu ki ngā kaiwhakarite rererangi ā-iwi o Ūropi me Ingarangi e hiahiatia ana e ngā pirihimana me ngā hepa rongoā katoa kia mau i ngā taputapu hopu rererangi." I kī tētahi kōrero mō te Mana Rererangi Tūmatanui kua āwhina te CAA i te AAIB ki tana tūhuratanga, ā, ka ako i te pūrongo me ōna tūtohutanga. 'Tino whakakino' I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka mahi tonu mātou me ngā tohutūmahi hepa kia taea ai ngā paerewa haumaru tiketike e taea ana." I kī te Minita Tuatahi o Nicola Sturgeon he "tino whakakino i muri i te rua tau o te tūhuratanga kāore te pūrongo e tae ki tētahi whakamutunga mārama ake". I kī a ia, i ētahi take, ko te pūrongo "te āhua nei he nui ake ngā pātai i tāna whakautu". She added: "I therefore share the disappointment of the families that it doesn't provide the closure they sought and hope that the FAI that the Crown Office has now said will happen as soon as possible, can help the families get the answers they search." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Karauna: "Ka whakaarahia e te pūrongo he maha ngā pātai e tika ana kia whakautua e ngā whānau o ngā tūpāpaku. " Ināianei ka whakahaere te Karauna i ētahi atu tūhuratanga ki ētahi o ngā take matatini i whakaarahia e te pūrongo AAIB. "Ka whāinga mātou ki te mahi i tēnei i runga i te tere e taea ana, engari he uaua ēnei take, ā, he iti noa iho ngā tohunga e hiahiatia ana." I whakahaeretia te Police Scotland Eurocopter EC 135 e Bond Air Services, e kī ana: "Ko te pūrongo AAIB o tēnei rā he hipanga hira i roto i te tukanga o te mārama ki ngā mahi kino o taua pō, ahakoa kāore anō ētahi pātai kia whakautua. " Kāore anō te AAIB kia tūtohu tauwhāiti mō Bond, engari kei te ako mātou i te pūrongo, ā, ka mahi tonu mātou me ētahi atu, tae atu ki te kaiwhakanao me ngā kaiwhakahaere, ki te ako mai i ōna kitenga." I kī te Rangatira Tuarua o Pirihimana Iain Livingstone o Pirihimana Pākehā: "Mai i te tūtukitanga, kua mahia e Pirihimana Pākehā tētahi tūhuratanga nui whānui i raro i te aronga o te Tari Karauna me te Ratonga Pūtea Moni. " Kei roto i te tānga o te pūrongo a te AAIB i tēnei rā te nui o ngā taipitopito hangarau, ā, he tohu nui. "Ināianei ka whakaarohia ngā kitenga a te AAIB e te tīma tūhura a Pirihimana Pākehā me te Karauna." Ko te riri o ngā whanaunga Ko nga kaimahi waka rererangi i patua ko Rawiri Traill, ko Te RW o Te Rorohiko o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te Rūnanga o Te T Tokowhitu nga kiritaki i roto i te Clutha i mate. Ko John McGarrigle, Mark O'Prey, Gary Arthur, Colin Gibson, Robert Jenkins, Samuel McGhee me Joe Cusker. I whakamōhiotia ngā whanaunga o te hunga i mate mō ngā kitenga a te AAIB i ngā hui tūmataiti i Te Wenerei me te Tāite. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i te pānuitanga o te pūrongo, ka kī a John McGarrigle i ngaro tōna pāpā ko Hoani i te tūtukitanga, kua mārama ināianei he aha ia i "riri". I kī a ia kāore te tuhinga i whakautu, ā, kua "taikahatia ia e ngā raraunga me ngā kauwhata me ngā tau mō te toru haora i te hui" i te Wenerei. I kī a Tēnā McGarrigle i te mutunga o te hui ka korerotia ki ngā whānau mō ngā whakakā putunga hinu e rua i te tūnga weto, ā, kāore pea rātau e mōhio he aha. I kī a ia i riri a ia mo te roanga o te wā i puta mai ai te rīpoata. I kī te Ariki o Glasgow Provost Sadie Docherty i "tino mōhio te kaunihera o te taone nui kei te raruraru ngā whānau me ngā hoa pouri ki te whakatikatika". Ka kī a ia: "Kei roto rātau i o mātau whakaaro me o mātau inoi i a rātau e whakapuaki ana i te matekiri me te pōrearea i a rātau pātai kāore i te tika te whakautu. " Ka wātea te tīma tautoko mahi nui a te kaunihera ki te tangata e rapu āwhina ana."

title: Ka tautohe a Amazon i te nuinga o ngā kāinga utu ōrau i roto i a Mātau
summary: Kua noho a Amazon hei matua hangarau hou rawa o Amerika ki te tautohe i te nuinga o ngā tāra hei tautoko i ngā whare utu ōrau.
text: I kī te matua tauhokohoko e tīmata ana i tētahi pūtea neke atu i te $2bn (£1.47bn) e hāngai ana ki te waihanga, ki te tiaki rānei i ngā kāinga e 20,000 puta noa i ngā rohe e toru i te US. Ka whakamahia nuitia te moni hei tautoko i ngā moni utu iti mō ngā whānau moni whiwhinga ngāwari, e kī ana. E whai ana te mahi i ngā tau o te pikinga o ngā utu kāinga me ngā utu rēti i te US. Kua piki ake ngā utu kāinga neke atu i te 6% ia tau mai i te tau 2012, ahakoa te nui o te utu mō te nuinga o ngā kaimahi. I mua i te mate urutā, kua piki haere tonu ngā utu rēti, e taraiwa ana i te iti o ngā wae utu ōrau. I ētahi tāone, pērā i San Francisco, kua whakapaetia te tere o te tipu o te umanga hangarau mō te whāwhā ake i te raruraru āheinga, i muri i te tomokanga mai o ngā kaipūkaha utu nui i ngā rēti me te utu i ētahi atu tangata. I te tau 2019, i kī taurangi kōtaha tiketike a Microsoft, Apple, Facebook me Google, i waenganui i ētahi atu kamupene hangarau, e hia rau miriona tāra hei āwhina ki te whakangāwari i te karihi. I pōhiritia a rātau mahi e nga kaitautoko, nāna hoki i whakatūpato e hiahiatia ana he tikanga whānui ake. I kī a Amazon, kua anga atu ki te nui haere o te tirotiro i ana mahi i te wā o te taiepa, ka arotahi tana mahi ki ngā wāhi huri noa i tōna taone tupu o Seattle, tae atu ki Nashville me Washington DC, e rua atu pokapū mahi nui. I kī te umanga e hāngai ana i tana pūtea ki ngā whānau e whiwhi ana ki te 80% o te moni whiwhinga waenga o ia rohe - tae atu ki te $95,000 mō tētahi whānau tokowhā i te kēhi o Seattle. I tua atu i te whakawhāiti i ngā moni kāinga utu iti, kei te whakarite hoki te umanga i ngā koha ki ngā aroha me ētahi atu rōpū e mahi ana i te take whare. I kī te rangatira o Amazon, a Te Pūtea Tika Whare, ka "āwhina i ngā whānau paetata kia eke ki te pūmautanga mo te wā roa i a rātou e hanga ana i ngā hapori kaha, whānui hoki". Ko te utu toharite ā-tau o tētahi kaimahi Amazon i te US ko te $36,640 i te 2019, e hāngai ana ki te wawaenga ā-motu. Neke atu i te $185bn me ngā āhuatanga e marara ana puta noa i a Mātau, e 58 ngā wā i whiwhi ai a Tēnā Bezos, neke atu i te $185bn me ngā āhuatanga e marara ana puta noa i a Mātau.

title: Kōtaha whenua o Eritrea
summary: I toa a Eritrea i te rangatiratanga o Etiopia i te tau 1993 i muri i te pakanga e 30 tau, engari kua pāngia e te tāmitanga i te kāinga me te whanaungatanga ki ōna hoa noho tata.
text: E taitapa ana i Hūtane, Etiopia me Djibouti, e noho ana i tētahi wāhi hira i te Haona o Āwherika. I noho tiketike tonu ngā renarena puta noa i te rohe kati, ā, tae noa ki te tau 2018, i te wā i whakarewaina ai e Etiopia tētahi mahi whakawhanaunga ohorere i whakamutua tikatia ai te āhua o te pakanga i waenganui i ngā whenua e rua. He āhua rōpū kotahi a Eritrea, ā, he iwi tino whawhai, e rapu ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakatika mā te kōrero i te tuma o te whawhai ki Etiopia. Nā ngā wā roa o te papā me te tauraki tino nui i pā kino ki te mahi ahuwhenua o Eritrea, ā, ka noho tonu ko tētahi o ngā whenua rawakore i Āwherika. Na ngā whakatau tata a UN, e hia rau mano o ngā Eriteria kua rere i te whenua i roto i ngā tau tata nei, e haere mōrearea ana puta noa i te Sahara me te Māuirangi ki Uropi. NGĀ TAKE Te Āhua o te Pūmatua o Eritrea: Te Iwi Whānui o Asmara 5.6 miriona Horahanga 117,400 km māra (45,300 sq miles) Ngā reo matua Tigrinya, Tigre, Arapi, Ingarihi Major religions Islam, Karaitiana Tūmanako ora 63 tau (tāne), 67 tau (wāhine) Moni Nakfa LEADER Perehitini: Isaias Afwerki Perehitini Isaias Afwerki kua whakahaere i Eritrea mai i te tau 1993. Ko Tōna Aroaro o te Iwi mō te Kāwanatanga ā Iwi me te Ture (PFDF) anake te rōpū tōrangapū. Kāore anō kia tū te pōti perehitini i whakaritea mō te tau 1997, ā, kāore anō kia whakatinanatia he kaupapa ture i whakapūtātia i taua tau kotahi. I te tau 1966 ka uru ia ki te whawhai mo te rangatiratanga mai i Etiopia, a, ka haere ki te whakatū, ā, i muri iho ka ārahi i te Aroaro Whakaora o te Iwi o Eritrea. I te tau kotahi mano, i te tau kotahi mano, i te tau I muri i te pōti taupānga o te tau 1993 mo te rangatiratanga, ka pōtitia ia hei perehitini me te kaiwhakahaere pāremata, e hoatu ana ki a ia te mana o ngā peka nui me ngā peka ture o te kāwanatanga. Kāore he pāpāho pāpāho i tua atu i ngā nūpepa me ngā kaipānui kua whakamanatia e te kāwanatanga. Ko ngā wāhi e whakahaeretia ana e ngā Eritrea o rāwāhi e whakarato ana i ētahi atu pūtake rongokōrero, engari he iti noa iho te toro atu, ehara i te iti rawa nā te iti rawa o ngā taumata āheitanga ipurangi. RĀRANGI WĀ Ko ētahi rā matua i roto i te hītori o Eritrea: 300-600 - Ko Eritrea o nāianei he wāhanga o te kingitanga o Aksum. 1889-1941 - Ka whakanohoia e Itari a Eritrea. 1941-52 - Ka riro i nga ope o Ingarangi te whakahaere. 1952 - Ka whakatūria e UN a Eritrea hei rohe motuhake i roto i Etiopia. 1962 - Ka tāpiritia e Etiopia a Eritrea, e kaha ana ki te nekeneke rangatiratanga. 1991 - I toa te Aroaro Whakaora o te Iwi o Eritrea i te pakanga rangatiratanga, i āwhinatia e te hunga whakakeke o Etiopia. 1993 - Ka pōti a Eritrea mo te rangatiratanga mai i Etiopia. 1997 - Kua tāruatia te kaupapa ture manapori, engari kāore anō kia whakatinanatia. 1998-2000 - Pakanga taitapa ki Etiopia. 2018 - E whakapuaki ana a Etiopia rāua ko Eritrea kua mutu te pakanga. Ka hikitia e te UN nga whakaaetanga.

title: Ka whakanuia e Labour te ārahi o Swansea, ā, ka pupuri i a Neath Port Talbot
summary: Kua whakanuia e Labour tōna nuinga i Swansea, ā, ka mau ki te whakahaere i te kaunihera o Neath Port Talbot.
text: I Swansea, i tāpiritia e te rōpū tētahi tūru hei pupuri i te 48 i roto i te 72 tūru, i te wā i haere a Plaid Cymru ki te piki i ngā tūru hou e whitu i NPT noho tata. Ka noho tonu a Pembrokeshire ki te ringa o ngā takitahi, ā, kāore he rōpū o Carmarthenshire i te mana whānui. I kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o Swansea, a Rob Stewart, ko te angitu o Labour i te taone nui nā te mea i tukuna he tūmanako. "I haere mai mātau ki tēnei pōti i runga i tētahi whakahau tino pai, e tuku ana i te tūmanako ki te iwi, ki te hiahia, ki tētahi taone pai ake, ki tētahi oranga pai ake," tana kī. "We'd just delivered the City Deal for Swansea, the city centre is being rejuvenated, we're after the Tidal Lagoon - we're hoping to land that very soonly, and we're bidding to be the city of culture in 2021. " Kua whakaaturia e mātou ka taea e mātou te tuku mō te iwi o Swansea, ā, kei te tū mātou i runga i tētahi hōtaka nui ake mō ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei." I Swansea, e iwa ngā tūru i tangohia e ngā tūru, e waru ngā Conservatives me ngā Pāremata Liberal. I tēnei wā i Neath Port Talbot, ka haere a Plaid Cymru ki te piki i ngā tūru hou e whitu. I Pembrokeshire, i ngaro i a Rob Lewis tōna tūru i Martletwy ki a Di Clements o te Conservatives. I toa ngā kaitono takitahi i ngā tūru e 34 i te takiwā, e 12 ngā tūru o te Hunga Mahi, e whitu a Labour, e ono a Plaid Cymru, ā, kotahi noa iho te whiwhinga o ngā Pāremata Lib. I Carmarthenshire, i toa a Plaid Cymru i te nuinga o nga tūru me te 36, i te wā i riro i a Labour te 22 me te 16 o nga takitahi.

title: Huringa āhuarangi: E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga i te tau 2016 tērā pea he tau mahana rawa
summary: E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga pāmahana mō te 2016 tērā pea kua mata i mua i te 2015 hei tau mahana rawa o te ao.
text: Nā Mātā McItihi, ko ngā raraunga mai i NASA me te UK Met Office e whakaatu ana i ngā pāmahana tata ki te 0.07 waeine whakarau i runga ake i te tohu 2015. Ahakoa i roto i te tawhē hapa te pikinga o te Tari Tūtaki, e kī ana a NASA ko te 2016 te tau tuatoru i roto i te haupae ki te whati i te pūkete. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao, engari ko te take matua ko te kohu tangata o CO2. E kore ngā whakatauranga hou e puta mai hei ohorere ki ngā kaimātakitaki, i te mea i tino nui te putanga ki te mutunga o tērā tau. Hākoritanga: Kua whakamāramatia te huringa āhuarangi i roto i ngā whakairoiro e ono He aha te huringa āhuarangi? Na te mahana o te wāhanga tōmua o te tau 2016 - i whakaawetia e tētahi El Niño kaha - i matapae ai ētahi kaipūtaiao āhuarangi ā-rangi i te tōmua o Me, tērā pea he pūkete hou. I te wā o te El Niño, ka tupu tētahi tāhei wai moana mahana rerekē i ētahi wāhi o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa. Ka pā te tītohunga ki te āhuarangi i te ao whānui, e whakararuraru ana i ngā tauira huarere. E ai ki ngā whika o NASA, ko te 2016 ināianei te tau mahana rawa i roto i tētahi pūkete e hoki ana ki te tau 1880. "Ko te 2015 te tau mahana rawa i runga i te pūkete tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, nā reira kātahi anō ka patua e te 2016 tērā, ā, kua patua tērā e tata ana ki te 0.1-0.12 o tētahi waeine whakarau, kāore i te āhua nui, engari ki ngā rerekētanga o te tau-ki-te-tau he tino nui," te kī a Dr Gavin Schmidt mai i NASA ki a TE Rongokōrero. "He pūkete tino mārama tēnei e kite ana mātou. Ko te nuinga o ngā huringa i te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, i reira tētahi takahanga El Niño i puta mai ai te mahana nui. Engari kua kite hoki mātou i ngā āhuatanga mo te wā roa i roto i te whakamahanatanga i te nuinga o te wā nā te nui haere o ngā korohū kati kati." Ko tētahi atu take i pā ki ngā pāmahana i te tau 2016 ko te mahana rerekē i te Tiritiri. I tae te hukapapa moana e taupoki ana i te Tiritiri ki tōna taumata tuarua iti rawa (i te whānuitanga) i te wā o Mahuru 2016. Ka tipu te hukapapa moana i te ngahuru me te hōtoke, ā, ka tīngongo i ia kōanga me te raumati. Ahakoa kāore i whati te pūkete i te whānuitanga o te hukapapa moana i tērā tau, ka noho tiketike tonu te taonga me te iti iho o te hukapapa ināianei i te rohe kei ngā taumata kāore anō kia mōhiotia mō te wā o te tau. He maha nga kaupapa huarere o te ao i tuku katoa i a rātau whika i te Wenerei. E huatau ana rātau katoa ko te whakamahanatanga i te tau 2016 he pūkete nui mai i El Niño. E kī ana te Tari Tūtaki i āwhina mō te 0.2C ki te wawaenga ā-tau mō te 2016. Heoi anō, e whakapono ana ngā kairangahau ahakoa he nui tēnei, ehara i te pūrākau katoa. "E mārama ana mātou ki te āwhina a El Niño, ā, he maha ngā wā i kitea ai e mātou," te kī a Prof Ellie Highwood mai i te Whare Wānanga o Reading. "Engari ahakoa tangohia e koe taua koha, e tūmanako ana mātou ko te 2015 me te 2016 tonu ngā tau mahana rawa kua kitea e mātou, nā reira ko te nuinga e haere mai ana i te whakamahana o te ao me te rākeitanga kati kati." E whakaae ana te World Meteorological Organization (WMO), e kume tahi ana i ngā raraunga pāmahana mai i ngā pūtake maha, i whati i te 2016 te pūkete mā te 0.07C. Kāore i te mārama ngā pūrongo katoa mō ngā raraunga pāmahana i te tau 2016 kua pakaru te pūkete tau mahana rawa. Ko te rau tau e whakanuia ana e ngā pūkete e kī ana te Tari Tūtaki ko te 2016 ko te 0.77 i runga ake i te mokatere mo te wā roa, engari he tāpiri, he tango rānei i te tawhē hapa o te 0.1C, ko te tikanga ko tērā tau i te iti rawa, ko tētahi o ngā tau mahana e rua i runga i te pūkete. "Ko ngā whika whakamutunga e whakaū ana ko te 2016 tētahi atu tau tino mahana," te kī a Pita Stott mai i te Tari Tūtaki. "He tino tata te pāmahana mo tērā tau ki te tau i mua, he iti noa iho te pāmahana mō te 2016 i ērā mō te 2015." Ahakoa ngā tawhē iti, ina whakaurua ngā raraunga hōu i te 2016, 15 o ngā tau mahana rawa e 16 i runga i te pūkete kua puta ināianei mai i te tau 2001. E ai ki a Noaa (te US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration), ko te tau anake mai i te rau tau 20 ki te uru ki te 16 o runga ko te 1998, ā, ko ia te tuawhitu o ngā mahana mahana. He nui ngā pānga o tēnei wā whakamahana puta noa i te ao. "Kua whati hoki i a mātau ngā pūkete mōkito hukapapa moana i te Tiritiri o te Moana ki te Moana ki te Moana ki te Tonga," te kī a Petteri Taalas mai i te WMO. "E rua ngā tere o te mahana o te Tiritiri i te wawaenga o te ao. Ko te ngaronga tohetohe o te hukapapa moana e taraiwa ana i te huarere, te āhuarangi me ngā tauira rere moana i ētahi atu wāhi o te ao. Me aro atu hoki tātau ki te putanga tūpono o te mewaro i te whakarewa i te permafrost," tana kī. Ko te tino māharahara ki ngā kaipūtaiao me ngā kaipāngai, ko te mea ko ngā raraunga pāmahana hou i whakaputaina e whakaatu ana i te Ao neke atu i te kotahi waeine mahana ake i ngā wā o mua, ā, ka tata atu ki te paepae o te 1.5C i tautuhia i raro i te pūrākau āhuarangi o Parihi. I te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho e tata ana ki te mahi i roto i a Mātau, tērā pea ka ngaro atu te tautoko tōrangapū mō te mahi āhuarangi. He hē nui tēnei e ai ki nga kaipūtaiao. "Ko te huringa āhuarangi tētahi o ngā whakamātautau nui o te rau tau 21, ā, kāore e whakaatu ana i ngā tohu pōturi," te kī a Prof Mark Maslin, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi. "Ko te whakawāteatanga o te āhua o te ao whānui te whāinga whakamutunga hei ārai i ngā pānga kino o te huringa āhuarangi. Ko te tau tino wera i runga i te pūkete, he whakatūpato mārama tērā, ahakoa kāore e taea e te Perehitini whiriwhiri te waiho." E kī ana ngā kairangahau kāore e taea e te 2017 te whati i te pūkete whakamahana, engari kei roto i ngā tau tino wera e rima. Whāia a Matt i Twitter me Facebook

title: E whakatūpato ana a Fitch mo te nama a te kāwanatanga ā rohe o Haina
summary: Ko ngā nama kino e puritia ana e ngā kāwanatanga ā rohe i Haina e whakaara ana i ngā māharahara ki ōna pēke, kua whakatūpato te kōwhiringa whakatauranga o Fitch.
text: I te wā o Hune, ka kī a Beijing kua whakaputua e ngā kāwanatanga ā rohe te nama 10.7tn yuan ($1.6tn), e ōrite ana rānei ki te 25% o te huaputa ohaoha ā-tau o Haina. I hangaia nga nama hei pūtea i nga mahi tūmatanui, ko te tikanga kia pūteatia e te kāwanatanga matua i mua i te pānga o te raruraru pūtea. Kua tipu haere ngā māharahara mo te nama kino i Haina.
