"Kua piki ake te mōrea nama mai i te toronga nui o ngā moni ki ngā kāwanatanga ā-rohe me ngā āhuatanga - he kaha utunga waenganui," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere matua o Fitch, a Honatana Lee. I whakapuakina e te kōwhiringa tauwhāinga o Moody ngā māharahara ōrite i a Hōngongoi, e kī ana ko te pānga nama i puritia e te kāwanatanga ā rohe ka nui ake pea te 3.5tn yuan i te whakaaro o ngā kaihautū. I whakatūpato ka tae pea te nama kino ki waenganui i te 8% me te 10% o te katoa o ngā moni tārewa. I amuamu hoki a Fitch rāua ko Moody's ka pā pea te kore pūataata i ngā pēke Hainamana ki tōna whiwhinga ā muri ake. "He tino rawakore te whakakitenga," te kī a Tēnā Lee, "ko te tikanga ka tino pōauau pea te wetewete i ngā hua i te wā o te taunoa."

title: Whakaora Redcar: Te tangata nāna i kume te kōtiro mai i te moana 'i mahi i runga i te nanakia'
summary: E kī ana tētahi tangata i te mutunga o te taka ki te moana e ngana ana ki te kukume i tētahi kōtiro 10 tau ki te haumarutanga, "i mahi i runga i te naro".
text: I te haere a Stephen Gill, e 52, me tana wahine i te one o Redcar i te Hātarei i to rātau kitenga i tētahi kōtiro i roto i te wai, a, ka mōhio rātau e karanga ana a ia ki te āwhina. Ka whiua e ia me tētahi atu tangata he taura ki te tamaiti, a, ka taka ki roto i te wai i mua i tana whakahaere i a rāua me te kōtiro ki te haumaru. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Kōtiro he "toa" te hunga i whakamātau ki te āwhina i te kōtiro. I kī a Tēnā Gill kua kite te pakeke 10 tau me tōna hoa 11 tau ki ngā ngaru nunui, a, ka haere ki te titiro. I horoia rāua tahi ki roto i te wai mai i te hīkoi, engari i taea e te tau 11 tau te huti i a ia ki waho. Mr Gill, an accountant, said: "It was windy and a high tide and we saw water going over the barrier and thought 'that's cool we'll go have a look'. " I kite mātau i tētahi kōtiro taitamariki e kauhoe ana i te moana, a, i whakaaro mātau he rerekē tērā, kātahi mātau ka mōhio kei te pārekareka a ia, e karanga ana mō te āwhina. E horoia ana a ia ki ētahi kaupae e te kaha o nga ngaru. "I kitea e au he taura, a, ka peke ki runga i te ārai, ka whiua ki te kōtiro." I kī a ia i mau te kōtiro i te taura, engari kāore i taea e ia te huti atu nā te mea he "taumaha mate" a ia. I tēnei wāhanga e ngana ana tētahi atu tangata ki te āwhina, ā, i te mutunga ka kumea rāua ki roto i te wai. Ka kī a Tēnā Gill: "I te pupuri ahau ki te tangata, ā, i te pupuri ia ki te kōtiro, ā, i taea e mātau te huti i a mātau ki runga i nga kaupae. " He tino ngākau nui, kaore he whakaaro mo taua mea, he adrenaline katoa. "Kei te tino pai ahau kei te pai a ia. " He tino whakahīhī taku wahine, a, ka karangatia ahau he toa - he rerekē tēnā." I kī ngā pirihimana i pāngia e nga kōtiro te ururua, ā, i mātao i te noho i roto i te wai, engari kāore i tūkinotia e to rātau whakamatautau. I tirohia rātau e nga paramedics, engari kāore i hiahiatia he rongoā hōhipera, a, ka mahue ki o rātau mātua. I kī a PC Stewart Shepherd o te ope o Cleveland: "Kaore e kore ko te tikanga o to rātau whakaaro tere he putanga tino nui, ā, ka whakaahuatia e au ēnei tāngata he toa." Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana o Cleveland

title: Ka hono a Pirinihi Anne ki te takahanga o te Rā o nga Ope Taua o Stirling
summary: Me whai wāhi a Pirinihi Anne ki nga hākari o te Rā o nga Ope Taua i Stirling.
text: Ka oha atu te Pirinihi Ariki i te whakatūtū o ngā kaimahi ratonga, ngā hōia me ngā tauira mai i Stirling Castle ki ngā taunga takahanga pātata. Kei roto i te takahanga o te rā he whakaaturanga o ngā waka hōia o nāianei, he pēne paipa, he whakatūtū o ngā kaimahi 1,200 me tētahi whakaaturanga a ngā Pere Whero. Ka ārahi a Stirling i ngā hākari o te Rā o ngā Ope Taua huri noa i te UK i te 28 o Hune. Ko Pirinihi Anne te Admiral me te Rangatira Matua mō ngā wāhine i roto i te Royal Navy, tae atu ki te Kānara Ariki o te Royal Scots Borderers, te Ope Taua 1 o te Royal Regiment of Scotland, ka whakaaturia i roto i te whakatūtū. I kī a Stirling Provost Mike Robbins i "tino hari" a ia ki te pōhiri i Tōna Ariki ki te takahanga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka whakahonoretia e tā mātou takahanga ngā ope taua o UK, ā, ka mōhio ki tā rātou āwhina tino nui ki te wawao i tēnei iwi nui. " Ka whakaata hoki i te ahurei o Stirling e ai ki ōna taiao, hītori, hei tauwāhi o nāianei me ōna hononga e mōhiotia ana ki ngā Ope Taua."

title: Māui Patrice: I hereheretia te taitamariki i runga i te mate hoari o Leamington Spa
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi taitama 17 tau nāna i whakamahi i te hoari hei patu i tētahi mema rōpū tauwhāinga.
text: I mate a Nasir Patrice, 17, o Birmingham, i Tachbrook Road, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, i te 15 o Hānuere 2020. Ko te tangata whakapae mai i Rānana, e kore e taea te whakaingoa mō ngā take ā-ture, i whakawāteatia i te kōhuru, engari i whakawāteatia ki te patu tangata. I kitea hoki e nga kaiwhakawā i te Kōti Karauna o Warwick he hara ia ki te whakataka i te ara o te tika me te whara. I rongo te whakawā i te kī a te tangata whakapae kua mahi i runga i te wawao i a ia anō i te wā o te whakatūpatotanga, i te wā i tomo ai ngā maoho e hono ana ki tētahi rōpū ā-rōpū o Te Rūnanga o Te Wā E whā nga motu i pāngia e Tēnā Patric, a, i muri noa iho i te taenga atu o nga kaiāwhina ki taua wāhi. I te putanga o te rerenga, ka whakaae a Tēnā Kaiwhakatika ki te tau 17 tau, e 16 ana i taua wā, kāore anō kia pā ki te moto tuatahi. I kī atu a ia ki te tangata whakapae, kotahi neke atu rānei o rātau he maripi, engari "ko te mea i muri mai i tua atu i ngā rohe o te wawao i a ia anō". I tāpiritia e ia kua "whakaritea e te tama nga tūpāpaku ki te tukinotanga pōhēhē, tino tōtika". I rongo te kōti i te tau 17 tau he whakapae tōmua mo te whakawehi i tētahi tangata me te pupuri i tētahi rākau whakahāwea. I korerotia ki a ia me mahi ia i te hawhe o tana wā 10 tau o te tautāwhi taitamariki i mua i tana whakawāteatanga. Tokotoru ētahi atu mema o ngā rārangi rohe o Rāwāhi "syndicate" i tautohe he hara i mua i te whakawātanga ki te mahi i ngā mahi hei whakataka i te ara o te tika. I hoatu ki a Rārangi Talawila, 19, mai i Harrow, William Hutsch, 18, mai i Kākāriki rāua ko Aperahama Kombey, 19, mai i Erith, e rua tau, ā, tērā pea ka tukua ināianei tonu nā te wā i mahi ai i runga i te mana whakahaere. I kī a Det Ch Insp Caroline Corfield he "whakamaumahara tino nui ki ngā pānga kino" o te hara maripi. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He maha rawa ngā oranga i tūkinotia e tēnei take, engari ka noho tonu ōku whakaaro ki te whānau o Māhara." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts & Tribunals Service

title: Ko te perehitini tuatahi o te puku ki te haere ki te huihuinga ārai whakatahe
summary: Kua noho a Donald Trump hei perehitini tuatahi o Amerika ki te haere ki te huihuinga ārai whakatahe ā-tau nui rawa o Amerika.
text: Nā Ritu PrasadBBC News, Washington DC I kōrero a ia ki ngā mano o ngā kaiwhakahaere i te Hīkoi mo te Ora tata ki te US Capitol e haere tonu ana tana whakawā. Ka kī a Tēnā Pu: "Kei konei mātou mō tētahi take tino ngāwari: ki te tiaki i te mana o ia tamaiti i whānau mai, kāore anō kia whānau ki te whakaoti i tō rātou kaha i homai e te Atua." I tīmata tuatahi te whakaaturanga ā-tau i te tau 1974 - kotahi tau i muri i te whakamanatanga a te Kōti Matua o Amerika i te whakatahe i Roe v Wade. Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, kāore anō kia haere te perehitini ki te hīkoi, e tū ana i ngā hipanga noa iho mai i te Whare Mā, ahakoa kua kōrero mamao atu ngā perehitini o Te Whenua o Mua, tae atu ki a George W Bush me Ronald Reagan, ki te rōpū. I te tau 2017, ka noho a Maika Pene hei tuakana tuatahi e noho ana ki te huihuinga i te tau 2017. Ko te āhua o Tēnā Puhi i te 47 o Poutāpeta mo te Ora e hari ana ki nga kaiwhakahaere. Ko ngā kaipōti e tautoko ana i te whakawhāiti i te whakatahe he wāhanga matua mō Tēnā Puhi, e rapu ana anō i tā rātou tautoko i te pōti 2020. I te Paraire, ka hamama nga hīkoi i Washington "e whā tau anō" me te "e aroha ana mātou ki a koe". I ngā tiriti e karapoti ana i te National Mall, he nui ngā kaihoko e hoko ana i ngā haki o te Pāpāho me ngā pōtae Make America Great Again. He tokomaha nga kaitāri i tākaro i ngā taonga pro-Trump, ahakoa mō ētahi, he rerekētanga i waenganui i te pīrangi ki te perehitini me te pīrangi ki tōna āhuatanga ārai whakatahe. I kī atu tētahi taitama, a Julia, ki te BBC: "Ehara ahau i te mea he pro-Trump, engari e whakamanamana ana ahau kei te neke te Perehitini o Te Hononga o Amerika ki konei." I tāpiri mai a ia i pouri a ia i te arotahi katoa ki a Tēnā Puhi, ehara i te take. "Tae noa ki te rā e kite ai tātau i te whakawhiti a Roe v Wade, ka haere tonu [te nekeneke], ahakoa ko ia te perehitini i te pōti e whai ake nei, kāore rānei." I kī a Chuck Raymond, he kaitohutohu pūtea i Hato Louis: "Kaore e pōhēhētia, ko ia te perehitini tino ora, ā-whānau, ā-whakapono i a mātau." Kua rerekē kē te āhua o Tēnā Puhi i te Paraire mō ētahi kaipōti. I kī a Jose Sandoval, nāna i taraiwa e iwa haora mai i Knoxville, Tennessee, ki te whai wāhi ki te hīkoi, kāore a ia i pōti mō Tēnā Puhi i te tau 2016, engari kua hurihia e tōna haerenga mai te hinengaro o Tēnā Sandoval mō te tau 2020. "E tino whakamīharo ana ahau ki tāna e mahi ana mātou," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "He aha tana whakaaro mo te [whakatahe], ā, nā tēnei i huri taku whakaaro ki a ia." He rite tonu te haerenga o te whaea-tamāhine o Marci rāua ko Jeanette Houle ki te pūmatua - 10 haora i roto i te pahi mai i New Hampshire. I kī a Marci i whakamīharo rātau i te pūruatanga a te perehitini i tōna aroaro. "I pōti mātau mō te Tūruhi i te wāhi tuatahi nā te mea ko ia te kōwhiringa ā-ora [ārai whakatahe], koia tā mātou tino āwangawanga. Mēnā ehara tōna hoariri [i te tau 2020] i te ora, ka pōti mātou mō Donald Trump." I te tau 2016, e 81% o ngā kaipōti Rongopai - he rōpū ko te whakatahe te take tōrangapū nui rawa - i pūruatia a Tēnā Puhi mō te perehitini. Kua haere tonu a ia ki te kōti i a rātau i te wā e piki ake ana tana whakahau pōti anō. I kī te perehitini o Mati mo te Ora, a Tēnā Tūruhi me tana whakahaere "he toa ōrite mo te ora". Engari i kī ngā rōpū kōwhiringa he mahi nekeneke tōna āhua. I kī a Ilyse Hogue, te perehitini o NARAL Pro-Choice Amerika, he "ngana nui ki te neke atu i tana perehitini hara me te ahi i tōna pūtake tohetohe". He nui ake te whakarerekētanga o nga rōpū tōrangapū matua e rua o Amerika i runga i te take o te whakatahe. Ko ngā Pāremata e whakahauhau ana mō te pōti o te Whare Mā o Whiringa ā Rangi, he kōwhiringa ā-kōwhiringa - he mea i kī ai te tokomaha o ngā kaitāri o Mati mō te Ora i kore ai e taea e ngā kaitono te uru atu ki ngā kaitautoko ārai whakatahe, ahakoa kāore rātau i pai ki a Tēnā Puhi. I te tau 2016, ko te wā tuatahi i whakaurua ai e te rōpū Manapori ki tōna pūhara he karanga ki te whakakore i te Whakarākeitanga o Hyde, he ture tekau tau e whakakore ana i te whakamahi i ngā moni kaihautū mō ngā whakatahe. I tērā tau, i tino whakahētia te kaitauwhāinga o te Whare Mā o Joe Biden e ōna tauwhāinga Manapori mō te pūrua tuatahi i te Whakarākeitanga o Hyde. I waenganui i te ngangau mai i te pūtake ohaoha o te rōpū, ka whakahokia e ia te ara i te wā o June. Ināianei, kua whakapakari a Tēnā Puhi i te tautoko mō ngā tirohanga ārai whakatahe i roto i te rōpū o Te Rōpū ā Iwi. I te tau 2018, ko ia te perehitini tuatahi e noho ana ki te kōrero i te Campaign for Life gala, e tautokona ana e te rōpū mahi tōrangapū ārai whakatahe. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka pānuitia e te rōpū ka pau te $52m (£40m) hei tautoko i te perehitini me te Pākehā i te tau 2020. Kua whakatūria e Tēnā Puhi ngā kaiwhakawā tūturu, kua whakakore i ngā whare hauora e whiwhi moni tāke ana i te whakatairanga i ngā whakatahe, ā, ka āraia ngā moni a te kāwanatanga e haere ana ki ngā rōpū kē e whakaako ana, e mahi ana rānei i ngā whakatahe. Kua pana ngā kaiwhaiwhai ārai whakatahe puta noa i te iwi i ngā rāhuitanga whakatahe i roto i ngā rōpū whakahaere o te kāwanatanga - ngā mehua e ārai ana i te whakatahe i te ono wiki ki roto i te hapu. I tērā tau, e 17 ngā kāwanatanga i whakaritea ētahi momo rāhuitanga whakatahe, e ai ki te Whare Wānanga o Guttmacher, e whakatoko ana i te rangahau mō te urunga whakatahe. E tūmanako ana ngā rōpū ārai whakatahe ka tae nga whakawā ki te Kōti Matua o Amerika, kua tāpaetia ināianei ki ngā kaiwhakatika tūturu, ā, i te mutunga ka hurihia a Roe v Wade. Mā tēnei whakataunga nui e āhei ai ia kāwanatanga, pērā ki ērā i te Tonga me te Midwest, ki te whakatapu i ngā rāhuitanga whakatahe kua hipa kētia e rātau. I roto i ngā wiki torutoru, ka tūmanakohia kia tangohia e nga kaiwhakatika te kēhi nui tuatahi e pā ana ki te whakatahe mai i te taenga mai o ngā kaiwhakatū a Te Pāpāho, o Te Pāpā Kavanaugh rāua ko Neil Gorsuch. I kī a Sarah Schultz, nāna i rere mai i South Dakota mo te huihuinga, "kua āwhina te perehitini i a [Mr Trump] ki te whakaaro i ngā take mōna anō". "Kei te mārama tana raina," tana kī mo tōna āhua i te Paraire. "Ka tāia te tangata ki tētahi taha, ki tētahi atu rānei ināianei - me tū rātau." Ka tāpiri mai a Ms Schultz: "He pai ki a au he mārama ake ngā take, engari i tēnei whenua, me āhei tātau ki te kōrerorero i o tātau rerekētanga me te kore riri." Te whakatahe i roto i a Mātau - he pēhea tātau i tae mai ai ki konei

title: Coronavirus: Ko nga whare tiaki 'e whawhai ana mo te oranga o nga kainoho'
summary: Ko ngā kāinga tiaki e "whawhai ana mō ngā oranga o ngā kainoho kāore anō kia pērā i mua" i mua i te kore āwhina ki te mahi i te coronavirus, e kī ana tētahi rangatira kāinga tiaki.
text: E ono ngā tāngata, i whakamātauria pai mō Covid-19, kua mate i ngā whare nēhi e rua i Sheffield, me te tini atu o ngā kainoho me ngā kaimahi kua whakapokea. I kī te kaiwhakahaere kaiwhakarato tiaki a Nicola Richards i "ohorere a ia i te kore tautoko" mai i te kaunihera. I kī te kaunihera o Sheffield e kōrero ana ki te kaiwhakarato mō ngā māharahara i whakaarahia. Care provider Palms Row Health Care operates three sites in Sheffield - Newfield, Westbourne and Northfield. Its director Ms Richards said: "Care homes across the country are fighting for residents' lives like never before. " Kāore e taea e ngā kupu te whakaahua i te uaua o ngā here i te raina o mua. "He tokomaha e mahi ana hei toronga o te pūnaha hōhipera me te kore tautoko tika." E hia ngā kēhi kei roto i ngā kāinga? I Newfield, tokorua ngā tangata kua mate, ā, 19 ētahi atu kua pāngia. A total of 19 members of staff are in isolation, including five who tested positive. Tokowhā ngā tangata kua mate i Westbourne, ā, e 11 ētahi atu kua whakamātauria he pai. Tekau mā rima ngā kaimahi kei te taratahi, tae atu ki te iwa kua pāngia. I Northfield, tokowhā ngā kaimahi kei te taratahi, tae atu ki te tokorua o te hunga kua whakamātauria he pai mō te huaketo. Tae atu ki te pai ake o te PPE, i kī a Ms Richards e hiahiatia ana e rātau ētahi atu kete whakamātautau swab, te urunga ki ētahi atu kaimahi me ngā tūroro me te "tautoko pūtea, ā-whanonga hoki mai i ngā mana ā-rohe me ngā kaitōrangapū". I kī a Rob Linley e māharahara ana ia ka mau tōna whaea, a Ellen Linley, i te huaketo. "It's a daily, hourly stress that we're waiting for that call. He tino whakararuraru mō te whānau katoa." I kī te kaunihera i whiwhi ngā kaiwhakarato kāinga tiaki katoa i ngā whakahōutanga auau mai i te mana i roto i ngā reta, īmēra me ngā waea ā-wiki mai i ōna āpiha kirimana. George Lindars-Hammond, cabinet member for health and social care, said since the pandemic the council had stepped up that process "to include specific communication relating to the outbreak and to make sure all care homes have been aware of the support available" from the authority. I kī te Tari Hauora me te Tiaki Pāpori kua pānuitia e ia te £2.9bn hei āwhina i ngā mana ā rohe ki te urupare ki ngā pēhanga i roto i ngā ratonga matua, pēnei i te tiaki pāpori pakeke. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kua whakaputaina he tohutohu mō ngā kāinga tiaki me ngā kaunihera me pēhea te manakē i ngā kaimahi, ā, i tāpiritia e whakahoki ana i "te rēhitatanga ngaio o ngā kaimahi pāpori o mua e 8,000 hei whakakī i ngā tūranga nui i roto i te hapori". I kī te tari i te pikinga o te whakamātautau, ka whakatakahia ki te tiaki pāpori me ētahi atu kaimahi matua.

title: Te whakaari whānau Le Pen: Ngā ārai mō Jean-Marie?
summary: I Wīwī, kua roa te tirohanga o te tohetohe a te whānau o Le Pen he mea pēnei ake i te whakaari Kariki - ā, ināianei he amuamu tōrangapū.
text: Nā Lucy WilliamsonBBC News, Parihi i te whakaūnga a Jean-Marie Le Pen i te ata Mane e unu ana ia i tana tauwhāinga mō te pōti ā rohe o Hakihea, ka hoatu e ia te tohu tino raima o tōna mana whakaheke i roto i te rōpū i whakatūria e ia. Mai i tana whiwhinga i te whā tau ki mua, kua ngana tana tamāhine o Marine Le Pen ki te neke atu i te rōpū National Front i te whakaahua i raro i tōna kaiwhakarewa - e whakaheke ana i ōna āhuatanga whakahāwea me te whakawhānui i tana tono. He tokomaha e kī ana he hōhonu te kiri o ēnei kākahu tōrangapū hou, engari ahakoa rā, kua taea e te Moana te toa i te mana o ngā taone kotahi tekau mā rua, ā, tokorua ngā MP ki te pāremata. I mārama tana tatauranga i tērā wiki i te ārai i te tauwhāinga o tōna pāpā - ehara i te pai ngā whakapae o te anati-Semitism mō ngā tirohanga a te rōpū i te pōti ā rohe i Tīma, i te whakataetae perehitini rānei i roto i te rua me te hāwhe tau. Ko ngā kōrero a Tēnā Le Pen mō te Whakanui, i kī tana tamāhine, he "whai i a ia tōrangapū". Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, kua whakaene tūmatanui a Ms Le Pen i te nui o te renarena ki tōna pāpā i runga i o rātau uara pāpori me o rātau whakaaro ki te whakaahua o te rōpū. Engari inā noa nei ka nui rawa aua wehewehenga ki te waiho, ā, ināianei kei te anga atu a Ms Le Pen ki tētahi matawaenga me aha ki tōna pāpā whakakeke, whakakeke hoki. Nā te ārai i tana taunga, ka tūtaki ngā whika matua o te rōpū matua i ngā rā e heke mai nei ki te taupatupatu mēnā ka panaia ia - he hipanga nui ina noho a ia hei perehitini hōnore o te rōpū. Engari kua roa te whakaawetanga a Tēnā Le Pen i roto i te mīhini o te rōpū. Ko ngā whakataunga mo tōna aronga me ōna kaiāwhina ka mahia ki waho i a ia, ā, i huatau mai tētahi poipoi i tēnei marama e Odoxa e tata ana ki te 90% o ngā kaitautoko o Front National e whakapono ana kua tae ki te wā kia wehe katoa atu a ia i te oranga tōrangapū. E kī ana hoki te poipoi ka tino pai ake te atahanga o te rōpū mehemea ka panaia ia. Engari ahakoa ko ia, ehara pea i te mutunga o tōna awe. Kua tautuhia kētia te mema pōtiki o te rangatiratanga tōrangapū o Le Pen, e 25 tau o Marion Marechal-Le Pen, ki te tū i te pōtitanga o Hakihea i te wāhi o tōna tipuna. He MP kē a ia, ā, e kīia ana he tino tata ki a Tēnā Le Pen, nā ōna kaiwhakahē i tapaina ai ia ko "Marionette" - "Puppet" rānei. Ahakoa he aha tana mahi ā muri ake i te National Front, kāore anō a Jean-Marie Le Pen kia pupuri i ōna whakaaro ki a ia anō.

title: Ka noho pea te pae karihi o Chapelcross hei 'autō ohaoha'
summary: Ka taea e tētahi pae karihi o mua i te tonga o Pākehā te noho hei "autō ohaoha", e ai ki tētahi pūrongo kaunihera.
text: The local authority in Dumfries and Galloway is being asked to approve the latest phase in the redevelopment of the Chapelcross site near Annan. I mutu te whakatipuranga hiko o te tipu i te tau 2004, ā, i whakawāteatia ōna pourewa whakamātao i te tau 2007. A report to councillors said the site had the potential to create a large number of "new, high value jobs". Neke atu i te tekau tau te mahi whakakore i te tipu o Dumfries me Galloway - i tīmata ki te mahi i te tau 1959 - neke atu i te tekau tau. E whakaahuatia ana he "pae nui, matatini hoki" kei te huihuia tētahi take pakihi mō tōna whakawhanaketanga anō. I waenganui i ōna whakamahinga tūpāpaku e kīia ana mō te whakaputa pūngao kākāriki nā tōna tūhononga tīariari ki te mātiti ā-motu. Kua hoatu he pūtea here o te £15m mai i te Borderlands Growth Deal ki te kaupapa. Ināianei kei te tonoa te Kaunihera o Dumfries me Galloway kia whakaaetia te tīmatanga o te tukanga hei "wetemaukati i te whanaketanga" o te pae.

title: Ko te mahere mō te whakapakoko 'hōia pango' o te Rūnanga e whakapōauau ana i te kaituhituhi hītori
summary: I te haehae a ngā tāone o Amerika i ngā whakamaharatanga o te Rōpū, e hiahia ana ngā kaipānui o South Carolina ki te whakatū i tētahi whakamaharatanga - ki ngā hōia whakakeke o Awherika-Amerika.
text: Heoi anō, e kī ana tētahi kaituhituhi hītori kāore he hōia pango i whawhai mo te Kotahitanga. Kua tonoa e ngā māngai o te kāwanatanga o Te Whenua o Pire Chumley rāua ko Maika Burns he pire hei hanga i te whakapakoko. Kua kī a Tēnā Burns pēnei "ka taea e tētahi whakamaharatanga te āwhina ki te whakaako i ngā whakatupuranga o nāianei me ngā whakatupuranga o tētahi wāhi iti e mōhiotia ana, engari he mea hira" o te hītori o te kāwanatanga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko ēnei Āwherika-Amerika, pēnei i te nuinga o o rātau hoa Kaukaia, i whakatika ki te tiaki i to rātau āhua kāinga i roto i tētahi wā ngangau i roto i te hītori o to mātau whenua. Kua whakarapaina, kua warewaretia rānei ta rātau ratonga." I kī a Tēnā Chumley ko te kaupapa he whakahonore i tētahi o Awherika Amerika i mahi i roto i te Kotahitanga, ahakoa i tangohia e rātau he pū ki te whawhai, e ai ki te nūpepa o te Kāwanatanga. "He nui te ako a tātau katoa. Ko te take o te pire ko te mātauranga," tana kī. Engari i kī atu te ahorangi hītori o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i ngā tuhinga o ngā hōia pango o South Carolina e whawhai ana mō te Confederacy," tana kī. I kī a Ahorangi Edgar, nāna i tuhi i South Carolina: A History, kua whakakāhoretia e te kāwanatanga ngā pango koreutu e hiahia ana ki te whawhai i te wā o te Pakanga Tūmatanui o Amerika nā te mea kāore rātau i pīrangi ki te patu i ngā Amerikana o Awherika. Kāore he tāngata pango i mahi hei hōia, ā, ko ngā Āwherika anake o Awherika i roto i te ope taua o Te Hononga o South Carolina, he pononga, he pango wātea rānei i whakahaua kia mahi hei pononga, i te kītini rānei, e ai ki te mātauranga. Tērā te taupatupatu i waenganui i nga kaituhituhi kōrero mo tēnei take. E kī ana a John Stauffer, he ahorangi o ngā akoranga o Awherika-Amerika i te Whare Wānanga o Harvard, he hōia pango Confederate. Kua whakaarohia e ia i mua, i waenganui i te 3,000 me te 6,000 ngā Āwherika o Awherika i mahi i roto i te rārangi whakakeke, tērā pea nā te mea i kīa mai he wāteatanga ki a rātau e ngā rangatira māra. Kua tātaitia e Ahorangi Stauffer e 100,000 neke atu rānei ngā tāngata pango i tautoko i te Kotahitanga hei kaimahi me ngā pononga, e hanga ana i ngā pā me ngā pākahiko. Ko te nekehanga o mua tata nei ki te ūkui i ngā whakaahua o te Rūnanga - tae atu ki ngā haki me ngā whakamaharatanga - i whakaterea i muri i te tākarotanga o te 2015 o ngā whare karakia pango e iwa i Charleston, South Carolina. I pōti ngā kaipānui ki te tango i te haki o te kāwanatanga i muri i te tūpāpaku. Kāore a Tēnā Burns i tautoko i te tangohanga, ā, i whakamāramatia tōna tūnga i roto i tētahi op-ed i USA Today.

title: Coronavirus: He tautoko tāpiri mō ngā wāhine e pā ana ki te kairautanga
summary: Kua oati he pūtea tāpiri hei tautoko i ngā wāhine e pā ana ki te kairautanga i te wā o te taiepa Covid-19.
text: I kī te kāwanatanga o Pākehā neke atu i te £61,000 ka tohaina ki ngā rōpū e iwa puta noa i te whenua. Mā te moni tāpiri e āhei ai rātou ki te whakanui ake i ā rātou kaimahi me te whakapai ake i te urunga ki te tautoko me te tohutohu trauma. I kī te Minita Haumaru Hapori a Ash Denham kua whakanuia e te raka te mōrea o te tutu ā-ira tangata. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko ngā wāhine e pā ana ki te kairautanga tērā pea kei te tino uaua nā Covid-19, ā, kei te anga atu ki ētahi atu whakamātautau e hiahiatia ana kia uru ai rātou ki ngā rauemi me te tautoko. " Kaua tētahi tangata e rongo i te tautokona i roto i tēnei raruraru. Ko te tauhae me te āhua huna o te kairautanga e waihanga ana i tētahi ārai ki te whakauru ki ngā ratonga matua." 'Ngā wā tino uaua' Ka tukuna te pūtea mā te Whatunga Whānui o ngā umanga tautoko i roto i ngā marama e toru e whai ake nei. I kī a Linda Thompson, te kaiwhakarite ā-motu mō te Kaupapa Tautoko Wahine me te Whatunga Whānui: "Ko ngā wāhine e pā ana ki te hoko, ki te whakawhiti rānei i te wahine i ngā tautuhinga katoa kua tūtaki ki ētahi wā tino uaua inā noa nei, ā, e mōhio ana mātou ki te uaua o rātau ki te rongoā i ngā ārai mō te āwhina pūtea. " Mā tēnei e āwhina ki te tuku tautoko hāngai ake ki ngā wāhine e anga ana ki ngā uauatanga, mahi tahi me rātou ki te hono ki ngā ratonga paetata me te tuku āwhina pūtea. Me mātua whakarite mātou ka tutuki ō rātou hiahia ināianei, ā muri ake nei." Ko ngā mema o te whatunga ko Aberdeen Cyrenians, Quay Services, Routes Out me Vice Versa.

title: Ko te ururua paitini 'tuma nui o te ao'
summary: Neke atu i te 200 miriona ngā tāngata puta noa i te ao e mōrearea ana ki te ururua paitini, kua mutu tētahi pūrongo.
text: E kī ana ngā kaituhi i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e mōrearea ana ki ngā wāhi tūkino i roto i tētahi rōpū ōrite ki ngā tuma hauora tūmatanui pēnei i te malaria me te mate kohi. E karanga ana te mātauranga mai i te Whare Wānanga o te Whare Wānanga me te Rīpeka Kākāriki kia nui ake ngā mahi hei whakahaere i te raruraru. Neke atu i te 3,000 ngā pae i neke atu i te 49 ngā whenua i mahia e te mātauranga. "He take hauora tūmatanui tino nui kāore anō kia tino inetia," te kī a Dr Jack Caravanos, ko te kaiwhakahaere rangahau i te Whare Wānanga o Blacksmith me te ahorangi hauora tūmatanui i te Whare Wānanga o New York ki te Ratonga Tamila o TE HAU. I kitea e te mātauranga te wāhi putunga o Agbobloshie i te pūmatua o Ghana o Accra hei wāhi e tino tuma ana ki te oranga tangata. E kī ana nga kairangahau kāore anō te rīpoata kia hunaia i nga kāwanatanga, ā, e mōhio katoa ana rātau ki te take. Kua noho a Agbobloshie hei wāhi putunga para ā-ao, nā reira i whakamāramatia ai e Dr Caravanos. E kī ana te mātauranga "he awhe ngohe whakaora e tū ana i Agbobloshie, e whakaatu ana ia i ngā mōrea mahi ahurei, rauropi hoki". Hei wāhi tukatuka e-moumou tuarua nui rawa atu i Awherika ki te Uru, ka kawemai a Ghana i ia tau neke atu i te 215,000 tāhei hiko kiritaki ringa tuarua mai i rāwāhi, otirā mai i Uropi ki te Uru, ā, ka whakaputa i tētahi atu 129,000 tāhei o te ururua i ia tau. E whakatūpato ana te mātauranga ka tauruatia ngā kawemai ururua a Ghana i te tau 2020. I te pae Agbobloshie, i kitea e te akoranga te aroaro o te mata i roto i te oneone i ngā taumata tiketike rawa, e pā ana ki ngā mōrearea hauora me te taiao ki ngā tāngata neke atu i te 250,000 i te rohe. Ko Te Pohobyl i Ukraine te tuarua i roto i te akoranga, i te tuatoru o te Peihana Awa o Citarum i Initonīhia. I waenganui i ngā pae tuma paitini tekau o te ao e whakarārangitia ana i roto i te akoranga, e toru ngā pae o Āwherika, Uropi me Āhia me Amerika Rātini kotahi. E kī ana ngā tamariki e mōrearea ana te mātauranga e mōrearea ana te tekau mano o ngā wāhine me ngā tamariki nā te mahue tūkino me te pokenga taiao. "He pae ēnei e tuku ana i ngā matū paitini ki te hau, ki te wai me te oneone. He pae ēnei e tino mōrearea ana ngā tamariki, ā, he tiketike rawa ngā tau. Kaore anō mātau kia huna i tēnei rārangi i nga kāhui ake, ā, e mōhio katoa ana rātau ki te take," te kī a Dr Caravanos. E whakaae ana hoki a ia he wāhanga nga iwi tipua o tēnei raruraru. I kī atu a Dr Caravanos ki te AO he tokomaha ngā uru e hoko hua ana me te kore mōhio ki te pānga taiao. I kī a ia e hiahia ana a Ghana ki te haere whakamua i te āpure IT, ā, ka tīmata ki te kawemai i ngā rorohiko whakamahia mai i Uropi i te 10 tau ki mua. Nā tērā i noho ai a Agbobloshie hei wāhi putunga mō te ururua mai i Uropi. I ētahi wāhi he tino nui rawa te tūkinotanga o te whenua, nā reira ko te kōwhiringa anake ko te neke atu i te tangata me te hiri i te tāhaetanga. He tino uaua te tango i ngā konganuku taumaha i te oneone, ka whakamātauria e Dr Caravanos. Ahakoa e kī ana te mātauranga kua nui te haere whakamua o Īnia ki te mahi i ngā take poke i runga i te taumata ā-motu, ka whakahē ngā kaitohutohu me ngā kaiwhaiwhai ki taua kitenga. E whakaaro ana te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao, e hāngai ana ki te Pēke Ao, ko te 23% o ngā mate i te ao e tipu ana, e pā ana ki ngā take taiao, tae atu ki te pokenga, ā, ko ngā take mōrearea taiao e āwhina ana ki neke atu i te 80% o ngā mate i pūrongotia auautia e ai ki te pūrongo.

title: Jair Bolsonaro: Ko te tangata nāna i okaina te kaiārahi o Parīhi i whakawāteatia
summary: Kua wetekina tētahi tangata nāna i okaina te Perehitini o Pārihia o Jair Bolsonaro i tētahi huihuinga whakahau i tērā o Mahuru, i muri i te whakatau a te kaiwhakawā he mate hinengaro a ia.
text: Kāore e taea te whakawāteatia a Adélio Bispo de Oliveira i raro i te ture o Pārihia nā te mea kāore a ia i tino mōhio ki ana mahi i taua wā, ka whakamutua e te kaiwhakawā a te hau. Engari i kī a ia he "tino mōrearea" a Tēnā de Oliveira, a, ka hereheretia ia mo tētahi wā noa iho kia whiwhi ai ia i te rongoā. I kī a Tēnā Bolsonaro ka ngana a ia ki te tahuri i te whakataunga. "Ka whakapā atu ahau ki taku rōia. Ka ngana ahau ki te mahi i ngā mea katoa e taea ana," tana kī atu ki te pāpāho paetata i te Paraire. Na te perehitini, nāna i hiahia ki te pokanga i muri i taua mahinga, i huatau he whakahauhau tōrangapū te whakaekenga, ā, i whakahaeretia e ngā tāngata atu i a Tēnā de Oliveira. "I whakamātau rātau ki te whakamate i ahau. E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ko wai rātou, engari kāore e taea e au te kōrero, kāore au e pīrangi ki te whakawā i tētahi tangata," tana kī. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He hara tēnei ki tētahi kaitono perehitini ināianei kei a ia te tononga, ā, me haere tātau ki ngā hua whakamutunga o taua āhuatanga." He maha nga wiki i muri i te whakatau a te kaiwhakawā kia kōrerotia a Tēnā de Oliveira ki tētahi whare hauora hinengaro. He aha te mea i pā ki te perehitini? I pāngia e Tēnā Bolsonaro, e 64, tētahi motu hōhonu, whakamate hoki ki ōna whekau, a, ka ngaro te 40% o ōna toto i te wā i okaina ai ia ki te puku i tētahi huihuinga i Minas Gerais i tērā o Mahuru. I whakanohoia te pāremata matau ki te tiaki nui, ka whāngaia ā-roto, ā, me whakauru he pēke colostomy. I tangohia te pēke - he pūkoro iti e whakamahia ana hei kohikohi para i te tinana ina kore te pūnaha kūnatu e mahi nā te mate, te whara rānei - i tangohia i te Hānuere. Ko Tēnā Bolsonaro, nāna i mahi hei perehitini hou o te whenua i te 1 o Hānuere i tēnei tau, he pāremata whakawehe i whakaritea e ētahi kaitirotiro ki te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump. Ināianei, he kaitautoko parirau mauī a Adélio Bispo de Oliveira, he tino kōrero i tana whakahē i a Tēnā Bolsonaro, e whakairi ana i ngā karere ki Facebook e whakakāhore ana i ana kaupapahere. I muri tonu i te whakaekenga o Mahuru, ka hopukina ia e nga kaitautoko o Tēnā Bolsonaro, ka whiua, ka patua i mua i te maunga pirihimana.

title: Building boss says past 18 months 'toughest ever'
summary: E whakapono ana tētahi rangatira kamupene hanganga ko ngā marama 18 kua hipa ko te uaua rawa atu o te umanga whare.
text: I kī te rangatira nui o te Rōpū o UBC, a Hemi Pedrana i te tiango o tētahi atu umanga, a Rok, i mahue i a ia te "tino pouri". I tīmataria i te 30 tau ki muri i ngā Moutere ki te Uru, he tari a UBC i Glasgow, Inverness, Fort William me Elgin. I kī a Tēnā Pedrana he uaua ngā here tauhokohoko, engari i tūpato ki ngā whakapainga iti i ētahi wāhi. He kirimana tā UBC mō ngā kaupapa i Moray, Tayside me te waenganui o Pākehā. I hinga a Rok i tērā wiki i ngaro ai te mahi puta noa i te UK. E hia rau ngā tāngata e mahi ana i Pākehā, ā, he kirimana miriona pauna tā te kamupene ki Highlands and Islands Enterprise. I Hune, ka whakahaeretia tētahi o ngā kamupene pūkaha tūmatanui me ngā kamupene hanganga nui rawa o Highlands. Ko te Hanganga Kounga o Highland (HQC), e tohunga ana ki te hanga huarahi, he hurihanga ā-tau e £20m. 'Tūranga nui' i kī a Tēnā Pedrana e pouri ana a ia ki ngā kaimahi me o rātau whānau i mau i roto i ngā raruraru i Rok. Ka kī a ia: "I tōku whakaaro ko ngā marama 18 kua hipa ko te tino uaua kua pā ki te umanga, ā, e mōhio ana mātou kei te haere tonu te whakaora. "E whakapono ana ahau he mahi nui tā mātou kiritaki, otirā ko te wāhanga tūmatanui, ki te āwhina i tā mātou umanga ki te rutu i tēnei āhuatanga. " He tino hira kia mahia he mahi ināianei hei whakatere ake i ngā tukanga whakamahere me te whakawhiwhinga kirimana. Mā tēnei e āhei ai mātou ki te mahi i ngā kaimahi, ā, i tēnei wā koia tērā tētahi o ngā hiahiatanga tino hira mō te whenua katoa." I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Pedrana: "Pēnei i ngā wāhanga katoa o te umanga, me āta tirotiro te Rōpū UBC i ngā upoko katoa me te rapu i ngā māiatanga i ngā wāhi katoa e taea ana." Ko te kaihoko e manakohia ana Ko te tūmanako o te rangatira nui i tāia mai i te whakawhiwhinga o ngā kirimana i ngā Highlands e nui ake ana i te £11m. Kei roto i ngā kaupapa ko te whakahou i te Pokapū Whakangahau o Lochaber i Fort William me te hanga i te Wae Pirihimana me te Mahi Pāpori i Elgin. Kua whakatūria hoki a UBC hei kaihoko manako mō ngā kirimana e rua me te Kaunihera o Dunbartonshire ki te Rāwhiti, ā, kei roto i te whakaritenga arā atu anō mō ētahi atu kaupapa i ngā rohe o Highland me te waenganui o Pākehā. Kua whiwhi hoki i te maha o ngā kirimana o te Manatu Arotahi tae atu ki ngā mahi i Kinlochleven me Balmacara. Kei roto hoki a UBC i te whakawhanaketanga anō o tētahi whare rārangi Kōeke II i Broughty Ferry mō tētahi kiritaki tūmataiti me tētahi kaupapa i Carluke.

title: Pahi kura o Winchester: Ko ngā whara o ngā tauira 'tērā pea ka huri i te ora'
summary: Tokotoru nga tamariki i whara i te tūtukitanga o te pahi kura ki tētahi arawhiti rerewhenua i pāngia e "ngā whara whakarerekē", kua kī pirihimana.
text: E 12 anō i pāngia he whara iti i te wā i haehae te tuanui o te taurua i te tūtukitanga i Winchester i te Tāite. E 72 nga tamariki i runga i te papa, i waenganui i te 11 me te 16 te pakeke. Kua pātai ngā mātua he aha te take i kore ai te pahi i runga i tōna ara kua whakaritea. I kī te Kaiwhakahaere Stagecoach e "tino nui ana" ngā āhuatanga. I kī tētahi kōrero a te Kāhui Pirihimana o Hēmihi, e toru nga tamariki tino whara i hiahiatia he pokanga. I tono mōhiohio mō te tangata i kite i te pahi e haere ana ki te Kura o Henry Beaufont. I kī ngā āpiha e hiahia ana hoki rātau ki te whakataki i te atekōkiri o tētahi Ford Focus kikorangi i mua i te tūtukitanga i Wellhouse Lane i te 08:10 BST. Kua maharatia e ētahi o ngā tamariki me o rātau mātua te tūtukitanga. I kī a Heloise Callanan, ko tana tamāhine 11 tau ko Poppy i runga i te pahi: "I taraiwa ahau ki reira, ka kite i te nui o ngā waka ohorere, ā, ā muri ake ka mōhio koe he aha pea, ā, ka pā ki a koe, tērā pea he tino nui ake. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te mōhio he aha taua pahi i haere ai i tētahi ara kē. Ahakoa he papa rua - me kaua e pērā," tana tāpiri mai. I whakaahuatia e Poppy he pēhea tana "hamama kia pārera te katoa" i mua i te pānga i tana kitenga i te pahi e whakatata ana ki te piriti. "He nui tonu ngā whara tino nui - i roimata te katoa," tana kī. "I tapahia e te tuakana o taku hoa ōna ringa me tōna kanohi. " He karaehe puta noa i te papa - he weriweri." 'Everyone screaming' A Year 7 pupil, Kai, who is in his first year at the school, described being covered in glass. "I heke ahau, ā, ka paopao te katoa i o rātau mahunga, ā, ka rongo mātou katoa i tētahi mea puta noa i o mātau mahunga," tana kī. "I te hamama te katoa." I kī tōna whaea a Emmie Wael: "He waimarie ia kei te ora, ā, he waimarie kei te ora aua tamariki katoa, kia pono. I kī tētahi o ngā pirihimana he merekara i puta katoa ai ngā tamariki." I kī tētahi atu tauira, a Robert, 15: "I tō putanga mai i te pahi me te titiro whakamuri ka kite koe i te motu o runga, ā, ka tīmata te tangata ki te mōhio ki te nui o te mea i tūpono, ā, i whara rātau." I kī ngā pirihimana i whakamutua te rēhitatanga o te Arotahi e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakataki i te HPX, ā, he whatanga tuanui me te kaikawe pahikara o te waka. Ka tohe hoki rātau ki te tangata i kite i te pahi i tōna haerenga mai i Itchen Harāna ki Easton me Kingsworthy kia whakapā atu ki a rātau. I whakaūngia e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Hampshire kāore te waka i runga i tētahi ara pahi kua tautuhia. I kī a Rob Humby, te mema nui o te kaunihera mō ngā huarahi me ngā waka, ko te take o tētahi tohu whakatūpato i runga i te piriti e āhua nei kua whakapouritia e ngā rākau, ka noho hei wāhanga o te tūhuratanga e mahia ana, tae atu ki ngā pirihimana me te kaiwhakahaere pahi o Stagecoach. I kī te tohu kia kaua e puta ngā waka neke atu i te 12ft (3.6m). E whakaarotia ana he 14ft (4.3m) te teitei o te pahi i roto i te tūtukitanga. "Ko ngā tūtohutanga ka tino whakatinanatia e mātou. Ka mahia e mātou ngā mahi katoa e hiahiatia ana e mātou ināianei tonu. "Me mārama tātau mēnā he mea ka taea hei ārai i tētahi mea pēnei i te putanga anō," tana tāpiri mai. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Stagecoach South: "Kei te tino nui mātou ki ngā āhuatanga o tēnei mahi, ā, ka noho tonu o mātau whakaaro ki ngā tamariki e pā ana me ō rātou whānau. " Kei te haere kē tētahi tūhuratanga ā-roto katoa ki ngā āhuatanga, ā, ka haere tonu mātou ki te āwhina i ngā ratonga ohorere i ngā huarahi katoa e taea ana e mātou."

title: Kei te whakamahi tonu te ope karihi o Amerika i ngā kōpae pīngore
summary: Kei te whakamahi tonu te ope rākau karihi o Amerika i tētahi pūnaha rorohiko o te tau 1970 me ngā kōpae pīngore inihi-8, kua whakaaturia mai he pūrongo kāwanatanga.
text: I kī te Tari Haepapa Kāwanatanga ko te Pentagon tētahi o ngā tari maha e hiahiatia ana kia whakahōutia ngā "pūnaha tawhito". I kī te pūrongo i pau i ngā kaihautū te $61bn (£41bn) i te tau ki te pupuri i ngā hangarau tawhito. E kī ana e toru ngā wā neke atu i te pūtea penapena i runga i ngā pūnaha IT o nāianei. I kī te pūrongo ko ngā pūnaha o te Tari Waea e whakarite ana i ngā tawhā whakawhitiwhiti ā-whenua, ngā tūruhi karihi me ngā rererangi tautoko taraka "ka haere i runga i tētahi Rorohiko IBM Series-1 - he pūnaha rorohiko o te tau 1970 - ā, ka whakamahi i ngā kōpae pīngore e waru inihi". "Kei te whakamahia tonutia tēnei pūnaha nā te mea, he poto, kei te mahi tonu," te kōrero a Pentagon Lt Col Valerie Henderson ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. Te kōpae pīngore - he aha tērā? "Heoi anō, hei whakatau i ngā āwangawanga tawhito, kua whakaritea kia whakahōutia ngā puku pīngore ki ngā pūrere mamati haumaru i te mutunga o te 2017." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te haere tonu te whakahōutanga puta noa i te katoa o te Tono Karihi, te Mana, me te hinonga Whakawhitiwhiti." I kī te pūrongo e whakaaro ana te Pentagon ki te whakakapi katoa i te pūnaha i te mutunga o te tau 2020. E ai ki te pūrongo, i hiahiatia hoki e te pūtea moni o Amerika te whakapai ake i ōna pūnaha, e kī ana kei te whakamahi i te "waehere reo whakaminenga - he reo rorohiko i whakamahia tuatahitia i ngā tau 1950, ā, i te nuinga o te wā e herea ana ki ngā pūmārō i hangaia ai".

title: Tēneti Hangarau: Te matawaenga hōhonu o Facebook
summary: I roto i tētahi ataata i Instagram i tēnei wiki, ka whāki a Mark Zuckerberg ki te whakahaere i ngā raraunga tāhae o te nuinga o ngā tāngata, ā, i kī ia e nama ana ki tētahi rōpū e kiia nei ko Spectre.
text: Nā Rory Cellan-JonesTe korero kōrero hangarau i tinihangatia te ataata, ā, i te Tēneti Hangarau o tēnei wiki ka tirohia e mātou te matawaenga i puta mai mō te rangatira o Instagram o Facebook. I ngā wiki tata nei, ka puta mai te matua pāpāho pāpori i raro i te ahi mo te whakaae kia noho tonu tētahi ataata tākuta o te Kaikōrero o te Whare o Amerika, o Te Whare o Amerika. Ka pēhea hoki tana urupare ina puta mai te ataata kōrero o tōna kaiwhakarewa? I whakaaturia e te ataata te Mark Zuckerberg tūturu, engari ehara i a ia te reo me ngā kupu e puta mai ana i tōna mangai. Ko te mahi a ngā kaiwaiata tokorua, a Daniel Howe me tētahi tangata e haere ana i te ingoa o Bill Posters, ā, he wāhanga o tētahi tāutanga e whakaaturia ana i Sheffield i tēnei wiki. I a mātau e kōrero ana ki a Bill Posters, ka kī mai a ia kua whakaritea te ataata i mua noa atu i te haupae i runga i te mahinga a Facebook ki a Nancy Pelosi. Ko te whāinga kia whakamāramatia te tauira pakihi a Facebook, arā, ko te whakamahi i te hinengaro whanonga hei whakapati i ngā tāngata kia tiritiri i ngā taipitopito takatāpui o tō rātou oranga kia taea ai te ūkui ki ngā pānuitanga. "Kei te whakawhitiwhiti mātou i te mārama ki Facebook me Zuckerberg ki te pātai he aha ka tūpono ināianei ina noho tūmataiti me ō raraunga kua whakamahia i roto i ngā huarahi ngaro, kāore rānei i te mōhiotia," tana kī. Kāore i te mōhiotia, kāore a Facebook i tango i te ataata, e kī ana i whai i te kaupapahere ōrite ki te ataata o Te Rūnanga me ētahi atu mōhiohio hē i runga i ana ratonga - me mātua whakatau ngā kaitaki tūturu a te hunga tuatoru mēnā he kōrero, kātahi ka iti iho te kite i roto i ngā whāngai a ngā kaiwhakamahi, kaua e tangohia. #deepfake Ka whakamāramatia e Bill Posters ko te ataata e whakaatu ana i te hashtag #deepfake, ā, kāore anō kia tinihangatia tētahi tangata. He uaua ki te whakapono ka tinihangatia tētahi tangata e puta ana i tēnei mahi toi me te reo e kore nei e rite ki a Mark Zuckerberg. Engari i ia marama, kei te kaha ake te hangarau deepfake. Ākuanei ka tino uaua te kite mēnā kua purua ngā kupu ki roto i ngā mangai o ngā kaipōrero, mēnā rānei kua purua ngā kanohi o te hunga rongonui ki ngā tirohanga kāore i konei. Mā te tāutu i aua ataata me te whakatau he aha te mahi mō aua ataata, ka nui ake te wero mō ngā kaiwhakaōrite o Facebook, me te hoatu i te kamupene he tūranga kaha ki te whakatau i ngā tepe o te kōrero koreutu. E kī ana a Bill Posters ko te tikanga me huri ngā mea. "Hei mahi i tēnā, me whai mōhiotanga ā-rōpū ki ngā hangarau me ngā tikanga tino uaua, ngaro, huna. Engari e hiahiatia ana hoki e ia te tirotiro ture," tana kī. Wā whakaritenga? Kei te kaha ake te karanga mo te ture o Facebook me ērā atu rorohiko hangarau o Amerika - mai i Uropi. E rongo ana hoki a Tech Tent mai i te Komihana o Ūropi o Kānata Moedas me te tangata hangarau o UK, o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa, e tohe ana rāua kei te tautuhi a Uropi i te tere - me te tohutohu tūmataitinga raraunga GDPR kotahi noa iho te tauira. Ā, kotahi tonu te rongoā toitū o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa ki te kaha nui me te tiri mākete kaha o Google, Amazon me Facebook - whatiia rātou.

title: Akli Tadjer: Ka tūtaki te kaituhi Wīwī ki ngā ākonga i te haupae whakataetae o te kura
summary: Kua haere tētahi kaituhi pukapuka i whakakāhoretia e ngā taitamariki Wīwī nā tōna kaupapa Aratiria ki tō rātou kura i te rohe o Somme ki te tūtaki i a rātou.
text: I kī a Akli Tadjer, he kaituhi Wīwī whai pakiaka Aratiria, i muri iho he wheako ako tērā mō ngā ākonga me a ia anō. I pōhiritia ia e to rātau kaiako nāna i amuamu mo ētahi o ana tauira "kōrero whakahāwea". I te tau kotahi mano, i te Ka noho tonu te kawa i ngā taha e rua, ā, he uaua ki te hoki ki Aratiria te hunga whakaruru me o rātau uri. He aha te mea i pā mai i te kura? I te marama o Mahuru, ka tono tētahi kaiako i te Lycée Pierre Mendès-France i Péronne ki tana akomanga kia pānui i ngā wāhanga mai i te pukapuka a Tadjer, Le porteur de cartable (The Satchel-Carrier). Ahakoa kāore i runga i te maramara kupu o te kura, i kōwhiria te pukapuka 2002 e te kaiako hei wāhanga o tētahi "haerenga pānui", e kī ana ngā pūrongo Wīwī. E kōrero ana i te pūrākau o te pakanga i Aratiria mai i te tirohanga a ngā tamariki tokorua, ko tētahi he tama a tētahi kairiri rangatiratanga, ko tētahi he tama a tētahi tangata whenua Wīwī i whakahaua kia rere i Aratiria. Ko ētahi ākonga, ka kī atu te kaiako ki te kaituhi i roto i tētahi īmēra, kāore i pai ki te pānui i ngā tangohanga. I kī a ia e amuamu ana rātau ehara te kaituhi i te Wīwī, kāore he pānga o te pūrākau ki Wīwī, kei roto i te pukapuka ngā kupu i roto i te reo Arapi, ā, ko te ingoa o te toa ko Messaoud (he ingoa taitama rongonui i te ao Arapia). Ko te mea pono, ko te kaituhi he Wīwī, ā, ko te hītori o te kawanatanga o Aratiria e herea ana ki Wīwī, i te mea he wāhanga o Wīwī tae noa ki te tau 1962. "He tino whakahāwea nga kōrero," te tuhituhi a te kaiako i roto i tana karere, i whakairihia e Tadjer ki Facebook. I mahia e te kura he mahi ki nga tauira tokowhitu e pā ana, e toru nga whiu nui, e toru nga whiu nui, ko nga pūrongo reo irirangi Wīwī. I tonoa tētahi tauira kāore i pai ki te whakahua i te ingoa o Messaoud ki mua i te komiti whakatinanatanga. I pēhea te haerenga? Kāore he pāpāho i whakaaetia ki te hui o te Paraire, e 25 ngā ākonga, he tamariki katoa, ā, kotahi haora te roa, engari i kōrero te kaituhi me tētahi mana o te kura i muri iho. I kōrero a Tadjer ki nga tauira te pūrākau o tōna oranga, e mahara ana ki ōna mātua kāore i te tuhituhi me ngā pukapuka i whakaawe i a ia, ko ngā pūrongo o te pae rongokōrero paetata o Le courrier picard. Ko Tadjer, i whānau mai i Parihi i te tau 1954, e tuhi ana i ngā pukapuka me ngā hōtuhi toa mai i te waenganui o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. I tana pātaitanga ko wai i waenganui i a rātau ehara i te whakahāwea, ka whakaarahia e te katoa engari e rua o rātau ringa. No te pātaitanga he aha rāua i kore ai e whakaara i o rāua ringa, ka kī rāua "ehara i te whakahāwea, ā, he tōrangapū". I kī te kaituhi i mīharo a ia ki te rongo kāore he tangata i roto i te akomanga i tuhi i tētahi mea hāunga ngā karere kuputuhi, engari kātahi anō ka whakawhirinaki tētahi ākonga kua tuhia e ia he pukapuka, ā, ka whakamihi te katoa. "I ako ngā tauira i ngā mea mōku, ā, i ako hoki ahau i a rātou," tana kī. I kī te kaitirotiro kura o Jérôme Dambla he "wā whakaora" te hui, ā, i tūmanako ia kua whakatōkia ētahi "kākano rangirua" tērā pea ka whai hua i roto i te "rima ki te 10 tau". Ko te kaiako o te karaehe, i te hui hoki o te Paraire, i kiia e te kura kia "whakangāwari, kia hari" i muri iho. He aha a Aratiria i pēnei tonu ai te kaupapa tataramoa? Ko te pakanga o te rangatiratanga i riri mai i te tau 1954 ki te 1962 i kite i ngā mahi whakarihariha i mahia e ngā taha e rua, ā, i whakamutua ki te haerenga o te iwi whānui o Ūropi o Aratiria, e mōhiotia ana ko Pieds Noirs, tae atu ki aua Aratiria taketake i taha ki Wīwī, e mōhiotia ana ko Harkis. Mai i nga tau kotahi rau e ono tekau mā rua, kua heke ētahi atu Aratiria ki Wīwī, ā, ināianei ka noho rātau ko tētahi o ngā iwi iwi nui rawa o te whenua. He tokomaha e noho ana i ngā tawhē o te iwi i roto i ngā pānga whare whakahaere, e mōhiotia ana mō ngā raruraru pāpori, ā, e kī ana e anga ana rātau ki te whakahāweatanga whakahāwea i te mākete mahi. I mua i te hui o te Paraire, i whakamāramatia e Tadjer kua mate ngā hōia Arāpia, he tokomaha o rātau ko Messaoud te ingoa, i runga i nga kauhanga riri o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao i te rohe o Somme. "Ko te kore e whakahua i te ingoa o Messaoud he rite ki te patu i nga hōia taitamariki i mate anō mō rātou," tana kī. Kua roa te whakahau a Wīwī ki te whakakore i te whakahāweatanga, me te kāwanatanga e pānui ana i tēnei tau he puku hou ki te whakakore i te pāpāho pāpori i te kōrero kino i muri i te pikinga o ngā mahi e hāngai ana ki ngā Hurai me ngā Pirihitini.

title: Karangatia ahau: Ka whakamana te hangarau i te angitu o te pokapū waea o Philippines
summary: Ka taka te pō i Manira, ka rere atu te ngaru rangatahi ki roto i nga whare wharenui e whakawhiti ana i te taone.
text: Nā Kate McGeownBBC News, Manila He māngai pokapū waea rātou, ā, nā te mea ko te nuinga o ā rātou kiritaki kei tērā taha o te ao, ko te neke pō tō rātou wā tino pukumahi. I tērā tau, neke atu i te 600,000 ngā kaimahi pokapū waea, i mau tika a Piripīni i Īnia hei pūmatua pokapū waea o te ao. Mēnā ka waea atu koe ki te tāpui rererangi, ki te hoko tīkiti whare tapere, ki te amuamu rānei kei te rere mai te wai i tō mīhini horoi, ka nui ake tō kōrero ki tētahi Piripīni i tētahi Inia. He maha ngā painga mārama o Piripīni ina tae mai ki ngā pokapū waea. He iti ngā utu, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā Piripīni e kōrero Ingarihi ana i roto i tētahi nako, he ngāwari noa iho ki ngā kiritaki o Amerika te mārama. E whakapehapeha ana hoki ngā Piripīni ki te ngāwari me te rata - he āhuatanga e tino nui ana mō te kōrero ki ngā tauhou i runga i te waea i ia rā. Engari kua kore e nui te āhua waea pai. Kei te tere te huri o te umanga - ahakoa kei tētahi whenua e noho rawakore ana neke atu i te hauwhā o te iwi whānui, e mōhio ana ngā kaiwhakahaere pokapū waea, kia whakataetae, me haumi rātou ki te hangarau hei whakataetae i ngā wāhi katoa o te ao. "I haere mai ngā Piripīni ki tēnei umanga tata ki te 10 tau ki mua, i te wā o tētahi neke hangarau ki te waea IP," te kī a Raffy David, tētahi o ngā kaiwhakahaere o Teleserv, he pokapū waea e whakarato ana i ngā kiritaki o Piripīni me rāwāhi. Ko te waea IP - ngā ratonga reo rānei i runga i te ipurangi (pēnei i Skype) - ohorere ana ka taea e ngā kamupene te mahi waea ngāwari, māmā hoki, e whakatuwhera ana i te āheinga ki te whakaputa i ngā pokapū waea i te huarahi kāore anō kia whai wāhi ā-taumaha i mua. "I whiwhi mātou i ngā taputapu hou, ā, he āhua ki te awhi i ngā mea hou," tana kī. "Kei a mātau tonu tēnā." Kotahi tekau tau i muri iho, ka noho iti tonu ngā utu mahi (e whiwhi ana tētahi māngai Teleserv i tēnei wā mō te $4,800 i te tau) ā, e kī ana a Tēnā Rawiri ko te nuinga o ngā moni e tiakina ana e tēnei ka haere ki te haumi i ngā pūkenga hōu mō te ratonga kiritaki pai ake. "E pā ana ki te whakarei ake i te wheako o te kiritaki," tana kī. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te hoatu i tētahi ratonga tere, māia, tino whaiaro hoki." He maha ngā hongere o ngā kaimahi o Teleserv ināianei he nui ake te mahi i te whakautu waea. Kei te whiwhi rātou i te maha o ngā uiui mā te īmēra, ā, kua hangaia e te kamupene tētahi pūnaha e tātari ana i ngā īmēra kia whakarōpūtia tahitia ai ngā kaupapa noa, e āhei ai te māngai ki te tuhi whakautu kotahi ki ngā uiui maha. Ko tētahi atu wāhi tipu ko te pāpāho pāpori. "More and more people are wanting to contact us by Facebook and Twitter," says Raffy David. "Me āhei mātou ki te urupare ki taua hiahia." Ko tētahi o ngā mahi hou a te umanga he pūnaha e whakarōpū ana i ngā pāpāho pāpori katoa ki te kōpaki kotahi, e āhei ai ngā kaimahi ki te kite inamata i ia karere, ahakoa pēhea te tae mai ki te pokapū. Kia noho ai i mua i te kēmu, i ētahi wā ka whakamahia e Teleserv ngā kamupene o waho pēnei i a Avaya, e tohunga ana ki te whakarato rongoā whakawhitiwhiti. "I tēnei wā, me te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i te pāpāho pāpori, me tino tūpato ngā pakihi kia pai tā rātou ratonga," te kī a Edgar Doctolero, te kaiwhakahaere whenua mō Avaya Philippines. "He ngāwari rawa ki te tangata te whakairi whakaaro - pai, kino rānei - ki Facebook, Twitter rānei, ā, ka tere rawa te haere o tā rātou karere. " Whakaarohia te pānga ka taea ki tētahi pokapū hoapā." Ko tētahi pūnaha e whakatairangatia ana e Avaya i tēnei wā ko Pāwhiri Ki te Kōrerorero, hei āwhina i ngā kiritaki i a rātou e tirotiro ana i tētahi whārangi tukutuku - tērā pea he tohutohu kāore rātou i te mārama, kāore rānei rātou i te mōhio me pēhea te whakatere ki te wāhanga hāngai. Mā te whakamahi i te Pāwhiri ki te Kōrerorero, ka taea e te kiritaki te pato i tā rātou uiui ki tētahi pouaka, pāwhiri i tētahi pātene me te whiwhi whakautu a tētahi māngai. E kī ana a Tēnā Doctolero kei te whakawhanake hoki tana umanga i ētahi atu hua ā-ataata i tērā o mua. "He kiritaki tā mātou he kamupene pūreretā - ā, ko te nuinga o ngā waea ka whiwhi rātou me pēhea te whakakapi i tētahi kariri," tana kī. "I mōhio mātou ki tēnei, ā, i hangaia he ataata me pēhea te mahi, kia whakapā mai tētahi kiritaki ki a mātou ki tēnei momo uiui, ka taea e mātou te tuku ataata ki a rātou." Huringa katoa Engari ehara i te mea ko ngā huarahi tauwhiti noa iho ki ngā kiritaki e huri ana. Ko te āhua tonu o ngā pūtahi waea e pā ana ki tētahi neke whakaharahara. He tokomaha ngā tāngata i konei e hiahia ana ki te whakarerekē i waenga i ngā pūtahi waea me ngā BPO (Business Process Outsourcing). He nui ake te PŪPŌ i te pokapū waea - kei roto ko ngā rauemi tangata, pūtea, kaute, tae atu ki ngā mahi paralegal - ā, he tokomaha ngā insiders umanga e kī ana koinei te wāhi e takoto ana te wā heke. Me titiro anake koe ki te tauira o Īnia, e kī ana rātau, kai mua i Piripīni mo tēnei take. Tērā pea he nui ake ngā māngai pokapū waea o Piripīni, engari he nui ake ngā kaimahi o Īnia - ā, i ia tau he nui ake te wāhanga o rātou e mahi ana i ngā ratonga ā-reo-kore whai hua, pūkenga kē atu hoki. Mā te titiro ki ngā hokinga mai, he ngāwari noa iho te kite he aha te take e hiahia ana a Piripīni ki te whai i Īnia i tēnei ara. I te tau 2010, ko te moni katoa o te WHK o Īnia ko te $70bn, i whakaritea ki te $9bn noa iho i Piripīni. Ka hiahiatia ētahi atu kaimahi, ētahi atu whakangungu me ētahi atu pūmārō ki te neke atu i ngā ratonga ā-reo. Engari ko Jojo Uligan, te upoko o te Contact Center Association of the Philippines, e kaha ana ki te wā heke. E whakaatu ana matapae i ngā Piripīni neke atu i te whakarua i ana kaimahi o TE WHK i te tau 2016 - mai i te 600,000 ki te 1.3 miriona tāngata. "He whakamīharo tēnā, e tika?" tana kī, me te menemene māia. Kei te mahi tahi a ia me te kāwanatanga kia pai ake ai ngā hanganga ngahoro o te whenua ki te whakatikatika i tēnei whakawhānuitanga - ehara i te mea i roto i ngā tāone pokapū pokapū o Piripīni anake o Manila me Cebu, engari huri noa i te whenua. Kei te manako te kāwanatanga - kua tukuna kētia e ia ngā wehenga tāke, ngā whakaaetanga aroturuki tere me ētahi atu painga ki ngā BPO e whakaaro ana ki te tatū ki konei. I tērā tau i whakaputaina ai hoki tētahi Rautaki Mamati o Piripīni, hei whakatoko i te whakamahinga o ngā whatunga whakawhitiwhiti hōu. Ehara i te mea uaua ki te kite he aha te kāwanatanga i tino hiahia ai ki te āwhina - he nui te kore mahi, ā, he tino hiahia ki ngā mahi ka taea e ngā BPO. Engari e mōhio ana me kaha te whawhai ki te tiki i a rātou. Nā te āhuatanga o te ohaoha o nāianei i te Uru, kei te nui haere ngā waea mō te whakaiti i te waho - tae atu ki tētahi whakaaetanga o mua tata nei a te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Pākehā ki te whakahoki mai i ētahi atu mahi ki a Mātau. Me āhei ngā Piripīni ki te whakarato i tētahi ratonga māmā ake, engari i te wā kotahi, he ōrite, he pai ake rānei i ngā mea e kitea ana e te kamupene i runga i tōna papa kāinga. I a ia e mahi ana i tēnā, ko te hangarau hou, auaha hoki tētahi o ana rākau matua.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: 14 ngā mea i kitea e mātau mō ngā whetū o tēnei tau
summary: Ko ngā kaiwhakaako whaiaro, ngā kaihoko rehu me ngā kaitohutohu mārena e tata ana ki te whiwhi i tētahi tara nui i roto i te umanga i te tīmatanga o te rangatū hou o Strictly Come Dancing.
text: Nā Whīni McIntoshEntertainment kaipānui, ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā kanohi hou i runga i te whakaaturanga i tēnei tau. Kei te hono a Rylan ki It Takes Two, kei te hono a Motsi Mabuse ki te pae whakawā, ā, i mua i to mātau taenga atu ki nga tauwhāinga. I kōrero mātou ki ngā tāngata rongonui katoa e tūmanako ana ki te toa i tēnei tau, ā, i ako mātou i ngā mea e whai ake nei: 1. E rangirua ana a Alex Scott ka noho roa tonu a ia ki te makau o ngā pukapuka. I tēnei wā, kei te 4/1 te tūponotanga o te kaiwhutupōro o mua ki te toa i tēnei rangatū - nā reira ko ia te kaiwhakataetae tuatahi me ngā kaihanga pukapuka. "E ngana ana ahau ki te waiho i tēnā, nā te mea ina tīmata te whakaaturanga, e whakaaro ana ahau tērā pea ka rerekē!" ka kata a ia. "Ka whiwhi karere ahau mai i ōku hoa pēnei i te 'e mōhio ana koe ko koe te makau', ā, kei te pēnei ahau 'kati!' "Ki taku whakaaro ko au anake te makau nā te mea i mahi ahau i te Āwhina Hākinakina [Tino motuhake]. A, i anga atu ahau ki a Pirihi Kamara, he kino tōna tuarā, ā, kāore i taea te whakangungu. Na ka rere mai a Rawiri Ginola i te rā, ā, e ngana ana a Karen ki te whakaako i a ia. "[Ahakoa] e rua rā ahau ki a Pasha, nā reira ka tū tonu ahau, nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau koia anake te take he aha." 2. Kāore koe e hiahia ki te kōrero ki a Viscountess Emma Weymouth hei Viscountess Emma Weymouth. Ehara tēnei i te āhuatanga o te Ariki Huka. "Ko Emma ahau. Ko Emma anake," ka whakamāramatia e ia, e pā ana ki te taitara i riro i a ia i tana mārenatanga ki a Viscount Weymouth, Ceawlin Thynn i te tau 2012. "E mārama ana kei reira te ingoa whaimana, ā, tērā pea ka āwhina mēnā e rua ngā Emma. [Kei te whakataetae hoki te kaiwhakaari o EastEnders, a Emma Barton i tēnei tau.] Engari kāore au i te mōhio he aha te karanga a [Strictly] ki a mātau... E karanga ana ahau i a au ko Emma." "Kaua e taka ki roto i tēnā!" te kōrero a Pirihi Ramsey. "I karangatia ia e au ko 'Emma anake' i tērā rā, ā, ka piki taku tāke kaunihera! Kaore he kupu teka." 3. He nui ake te māharahara o Dev Griffin ki te tauwhāinga reo irirangi i te whakataetae tūturu. "Kāore tētahi o ēnei tāngata i roto i te maka i taku whakataetae i tēnei wā," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu. "Ko ngā tāngata anake e whakataetae ana ahau ko ngā tāngata o te Reo Irirangi 1 o mua." Tērā tētahi tauwhāinga rata i te teihana, nā te mea kua whai wāhi hoki ngā DJ tae atu ki a Scott Mills, Mollie King me Melvin Odoom i mua. Ka tāpiritia e ia te pāohotanga ki te hunga Irirangi 1 - kāore i te whakamā ki te kuputuhi mēnā e kino ana rātou ki tētahi mea - kua āwhina i a ia ki te whakawhanake i tētahi kiri mātotoru mō te whakahē, e tino āwhina ana ina anga atu ki ngā kaiwhakawā. "E mahi ana ahau i te reo irirangi ki te UK, e te tangata. Ki taku whakaaro kāore he mea e kī mai ana ngā kaiwhakawā ki a au he kino ake i tētahi tangata kāore i whakamīharo ki taku hononga ki te rongo!" 4. E koa ana a Will Bayley ki te whiwhi i tētahi tan rehu tika. "He toa ātaahua tā taku whaea," te whakamārama a te kaitākaro tēnehi tēnehi Paralympic. "Ā, ka whakamātauria tonutia e ia ēnei tans kōrero ki a au. " I mahia e ia i a au e tipu ana, ā, i ngā wā katoa e āhua parapara ana ahau, nā reira kei te titiro whakamua ahau ki te tiki i tētahi tan kōrero tika e āhua pai ana!" 5. E mōhio ana a Saffron Barker i tautuhia e Joe Sugg he pae tiketike mō ngā YouTubers. "He uaua ki te whai i ōna tapuwae, engari ko te tūmanako mō te hapori YouTube katoa ka taea e au," tana kī. "He tino ātaahua tana mahi, ā, ka kite te katoa i tōna tuakiri e tiaho ana." Ka noho a Sugg hei YouTuber tuatahi i tērā tau, a, ka tae katoa ki te whakamutunga. "Ko taku moemoeā tēnei," ka haere tonu a Barker. "E kore rawa ahau e hiahia ki te whakamutu i te YouTube, engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi i te taha o te pouaka whakaata anake. Koia tēnā taku moemoeā, ahakoa he pouaka whakaata, he atamira, he mahi noa iho." 6. He whakararuraru pea te teitei o Karim Zeroual. "E whakaaro ana ahau i runga i te whakaaturanga tūturu, ka tino āmaimai ahau," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu o TE WHK mo tana tīmatatanga o Strictly. "I tēnei wā, kei te mahi mātou i te kanikani rōpū, ā, kei roto mātou i tētahi mirumiru iti, engari i te wā tonu ka marara mātou, koia tērā ka āmaimai ahau. " He pai ki a au te puoro, kua mahi ahau i te kanikani tiriti, me te kanikani kanikani i a au e tamariki ana, nā reira ka tino āwhina. Engari he tamaiti iti ahau, e te tangata, nā reira he uaua ki a au te hiki i tētahi kōtiro, te ārahi i tētahi kōtiro." 7. He iti noa iho te māharahara o te masseuse a Anneka Rice mo tōna oranga. "Tata ki te ono wiki ki muri, i hinga ahau i roto i te māra o taku hoa noho tata, e heke ana i tētahi pāhekeheke māniania," te whakamārama a te kaipānui toa i te pātaitanga mō tōna whara inā noa nei. "I muri i taku waitohutanga, i waenganui hoki i taku whakangungu kaha. Nā reira i roto i ngā wiki e ono kua taha, kua tino okioki ahau. Kua werohia e au ngā werohanga steroid, ā, ko te tūmanako ka pai. Ko te whakamāramatanga tērā o te ture a Sod! "Kua kapi ahau i te ururua. I haere ahau ki te mirimiri, a, ka haere te wahine, 'kei te pai koe?' E whakaaro ana me waea atu ia ki tētahi tangata nā te mea i taupokina ahau i te ururua, ā, nā Anton noa iho tēnā me te katoa e maka ana i ahau pēnei i te pepeha kākahu toto." 8. Kei te noho a Rawiri Hemi hei Kaiwhakaatu Nui. Tērā pea he uaua ki te whakaaro i te kaitiaki o Ingarangi o mua e rumaki ana i a ia ki ētahi o ngā pūoro tino hākinakina, engari koia tonu tērā i puta ai. I pātai mai me pēhea tana whakarite mo te whakaaturanga, ka kī a Hemi: "I ia rā e mātakitaki ana ahau i ngā ataata, kua puta i tōku māhunga, e haere ana i te whare, ā, ina haere ahau i aku kurī, ka ngana ahau ki te karo i te mahi pirouettes, engari he whakapai ake. " I a koe e mātakitaki ana i tētahi pūoro, The Greatest Showman hei tauira, ā, ka tīmata koe ki te mahi i ngā nekehanga i a koe e mahi ana i tētahi kapu kawhe." 9. I puritia e Mīharo Visage mō Strictly nā te mea e aroha ana ia ki te UK. He pai te pātahitanga o te whetū o RuPaul's Drag Race ki te UK - kei te whakaahua a ia mō te putanga Peretania o Drag Race, ā, kātahi anō ka whetū ki te West End. Ā, ko tōna aroha ki ngā Brits e toro atu ana ki te kōwhiri kia mahi i te Strictly i runga i te ōrite o Amerika. "Kāore au i pīrangi ki te mahi i te Dancing With The Stars nā te mea e tatari ana ahau ki a Strictly. Ko tāku anake e hiahia ana ki te mahi ko te Strictly," tana kī. "He hoa ōku i Dancing With The Stars i Amerika, nā reira i homai e rātou ā rātou tohutohu, ā, kāore au e tango nā te mea kāore rātou i tino tawhiti!" 10. Kei te kawea mai e Chris Ramsey te wheako Strictly ki South Shields. E tūmanako ana te comedian ki te whakangungu i tōna takiwā kāinga kia kore ai e nui rawa te wā e wehe atu ana i tōna whānau. "E tūmanako ana. Koia tērā tētahi o ngā mea matua i tino pai ai ahau ki te mahi i te whakaaturanga," tana kī. "He tamaiti e toru me te hāwhe tau tōku, nā reira he whakamīharo te whakangungu i reira. Ka haere mai tētahi kaikanikani rawakore ki South Shields!" Engari, ka tāpiri mai a ia (he āhua tautohetohe): "Tērā pea ka tūtaki ahau ki a rātau i Newcastle ka haere ki Newcastle. Kāore au e pīrangi kia haere rātau ki South Shields. Kaore he nui mō rātou." 11. E koa ana a Catherine Tyldesley ki te whai wāteatanga ki te kai i tāna e hiahia ana. Kua whiwhi a Eva Price o Coronation Street i ētahi tohutohu whai tikanga mai i tētahi tauwhāinga Strictly o mua. "I kōrero ahau ki a Gemma Atkinson, ā, i pēnei ahau 'kōhungahunga, āwhinatia ahau' ā, ka kī noa iho ia 'ko te mea anake hei mahi ko te tuku i ō tautāwhi me te hākinakina'. Ko ētahi atu tāngata katoa e mōhio ana ahau kua mahi i te whakaaturanga, he ōrite te kōrero. "Waihoki, i pēnei a ia 'tiaki i tō tinana, kai i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e koe, moe i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e koe'. Ā, nō tēnei wā, kei te tika a ia nā te mea kāore e taea e au te whakamutu te kai! He nui rawa ngā pūngoi e tahuna ana e au, e ora ana i tōku oranga tino pai." 12. I whakaaro a Maika Bushell he purini tonu ētahi o ngā kanikani. "Kaore au e whakahāwea he aha te kanikani hākinakina tino nui ā-tinana," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu tākaro Parakuihi o TE Parakuihi. "Ko te tākaro e hiahiatia ana e koe kia taea ai e koe te mahi i ngā nekehanga, te kimi uaua kāore koe i mōhio kei a koe, ā, ko te taha hinengaro he rite ki te mirimiri i tō puku i a koe e pato ana i tō māhunga i te wā kotahi, ki te pūoro, i te tere tino tere. " A, tērā te paso doble, i tino whakaaro ahau he purini tae noa ki te tīmatanga o mātau." 13. E kore rawa te Charleston e noho hei kanikani tino pai a Emma Barton. "E tino hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi i tētahi mea kāhua poipoi, te wīwī, ngā mea pērā," te kī a te kaiwhakaari. "E tino aroha ana ahau ki ērā mea puihi katoa, koia tērā te wā e tino arotahi ana ahau. He āhua āmaimai ahau ki ngā mea tere katoa." E whakaae ana a ia tērā pea he iti noa iho tōna painga i tōna wheako tōmua i te mahi. "Ki taku whakaaro tērā pea, ko te taha pūoro, te tatau, [engari] kāore anō ahau kia mahi i tētahi o ēnei kanikani e mahia ana e Strictly i mua, nā reira he mea hou, he nui ake taku ringa jazz." 14. Tērā pea ka waiho e te whakariterite a James Cracknell he nui ngā mea e hiahiatia ana. "E rua tonu ngā tākaro i ngā wā katoa, engari ehara i te mea noa iho kāore anō kia mahia e te kaihoe i mua, nā te mea kāore mātou i te manaakitia i roto i te whakaritenga," te kī a te toa koura o te Orimipia taurua. "Ko te tikanga, mēnā kei te whakaritea koe, ka mahi koe i tētahi atu hākinakina, ko te hoe e pā ana ki te manawa me ngā pūkahukahu, ā, koia tēnā. Ki taku whakaaro ko te mea tūturu ko te kaha ki te kore e mataku ki te āhua heahea, koia tērā te mea ka kitea e au he māminga." I te tuatahi ka whai wāhi te whetū o Made In Chelsea, a Jamie Laing ki tēnei rangatū o Strictly, engari mai i tērā wā ka wehe atu ia nā tētahi whara. I puta tonu a ia i roto i te whakaaturanga whakarewa o te Hātarei. Ko te Strictly Come Dancing i ngā Hātarei i runga i te BBC One me te BBC iPlayer.

title: Ka kitea e te hūri he hara a Hazel Stewart ki te kōhuru taurua
summary: Kua kitea e te hūri he hara a Hazel Stewart i te kōhuru rua o tana tāne me te wahine a tana whaiāipo o mua.
text: Ko Stewart, e 48, mai i Coleraine, me mahi i tētahi whiu ora mo nga kōhurutanga o Trevor Buchanan rāua ko Lesley Howell i Me 1991. E 21 tau i muri i tana tautohe i te hara ki te tūkinotanga, e mahi ana tana tino whaiāipo, te niho niho o mua, a Hōnea. E rua me te hāwhe haora te roa o te hūri i te Kōti Karauna o Coleraine ki te kite i te hara o Stewart i muri i te whakawātanga 15 rā. Ka hoki a ia ki te kōti a tērā Paraire ina ako ia i te wā herehere mōkito me mahi e ia. I muri i te tukunga a te kaiwhakahaere hūri i te whakataunga a Lisa, ka tangi te tamāhine a Stewart, ka mea, "Ehara i te tika." I kitea nga tinana o Lesley Howell rāua ko Trevor Buchanan i roto i tētahi motokā kī i te kohu i waho o tētahi whare i Castlerock i Me 1991. I taua wā ka kitea o rātau matenga he whakamate rua i ākina e te whakakitenga kei te whai take o rātau hoa. I whakatuwheratia anōtia te tūhuratanga i te whākinga a Hōne Howell ki ngā kōhuru i te Hānuere 2009. I whiua ia i Whiringa 2010, kātahi ka hoatu he whakaaturanga mo te ture i te wā o te whakawātanga o Hazel Stewart. I te wā o te whakawā, ka rongo te kōti i whai wāhi a Stewart ki te whakarite i te tūkinotanga. I whiua hoki e ia ngā whakaaturanga tae atu ki te paipa ngongo i whakamahia hei korohū i o rātau hoa. I kī a Stewart he "ngohengohe, ngoikore, mōrearea, ngāwari hoki" e peita ana i tana whaiāipo o mua hei "hiahia, tātai, whakahaere, me te tino māminga". I kī a ia ko te take i kore ai ia e āwhina i tana tāne nā te mea i wehi a ia ka patua ia me ana tamariki. I roto i tētahi kōrero i waho o te rūma kōti, ka kī te whānau o Lesley Howell "i whakamarietia rātau kua kawea mai te hunga i roto i ngā kōhurutanga o Lesley rāua ko Trevor ki te tika". 'Aroha me te ngākau pono' te tamāhine a Lesley Howell, a Lauren: "E hari ana mātau ki te koha a to mātau whaea ki o mātau oranga i roto i te wā poto i noho tahi ai māua. " E mōhio ana mātou he whaea aroha, pono a ia, ā, e tino pouri ana mātou i te āhua weriweri i tangohia ai ia i a mātau." I kī te tuakana o Trevor Buchanan, a Kōnata, he "rā tino whāranu mō te whānau Buchanan". "Ko o mātau whakaaro te tuatahi, ko te tuatahi ki a Trevor i tangohia kinotia mai i a mātau i te tau 1991," tana kī. "Ahakoa he tino ngākau nui kua tutuki te tika mō Trevor, kāore he tikanga o te wikitōria - kāore he take mō te hākari - nā te mea kāore he mea e taea te whakahoki mai i a Trevor rāua ko Lesley ki a mātau." I kī te Kaiwhakahaere Pirihimana o Raymond Murray, nāna i ārahi te tūhuratanga, ko te tangata i roto i te kōti ka mōhio ki te "pakaru ā-hinengaro kua mahue i tēnei". I kī a ia "kāore anō a ia kia rongo i taua tanuku me te ngākau pēnei i roto i te kōti me te whakawāteatanga o te whakataunga". I tāpiritia e te kaitirotiro, ko te mea i whāki a Hōne Howell ki ngā kōhuru, ā, i whakaatu i te whakawātanga "kāore e whakakore i tōna hara ki te tango i ngā oranga tangata tokorua". I kī a Tēnā Murray e mārama ana a ia ki te riri o ngā whānau o ngā tūpāpaku mo te tūhuratanga taketake. Heoi anō, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "E whakaaro ana ahau me maumahara mātou he wāhi tino rerekē te tau 1991 i Aiarangi ki te Raki -e 102 ngā kōhuru pūtohu anake, ā, he nui ake te whārōrō o te CID i a rātou i tēnei meneti."

title: Hui tūturu: Ko te ūnga hekenga 'he pūnoa rawa'
summary: Ko te kaupapa here nekeneke matua a te kāwanatanga he "taputapu pūnoa" me te mōrearea ki te tūkino i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, kua kī tētahi kaihoko tōmua o Tory.
text: Na Gavin StampPolitical reporter, BBC News, i kī a Birmingham Nadhim Zahawi i tautokona e ia te whāinga o te tapahi hekenga kupenga - i whakaritea e te Tories i te ātete - mai i neke atu i te 200,000 ki te "tekau mano". Engari i kī a ia i māharahara a ia i te whakakore i ngā tauira kē kia kaua e haere mai ki konei me te whara i ngā whare wānanga o Ingarangi. "E tika ana te whakatū i ta mātau kaupapahere taitapa ki tā mātou kaupapahere tipu," tana kī. I tautohe nga Tohutohu i roto i ta rātau whakahau 2010 kia tino whakaheke i te hekenga kupenga ā-tau - te rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā tau e tomo ana me te puta atu i te UK - i te tau 2015. I a ia e kōrero ana i te Tūtira, ka tautāwhi te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Ēnā Me i te ūnga, ā, ka kī ka mahia e te rōpū "ngā mea katoa" e taea ana e ia kia tutuki i roto i ngā tau e toru e whai ake nei. Kāore i whakaurua te ūnga ki roto i te whakaaetanga tauwhāinga, ā, kua whakararuraru i te Lib Dems - e tautohe ana ka taea e ia te whakakaha i ngā kaimahi tino pūkenga e hiahiatia ana i ngā wāhanga o te whakahaerenga. Ko Tēnā Zahawi, MP mō Stratford-on-Avon, i whānau mai i Baghdad, Iraki, ki ngā mātua o Kurīhi, nāna i rapu whakangungu i UK i te wā o te pikinga o Skata ki te mana, i whakatūria tahitia e te kamupene pōti YouGov. I kī atu a ia ki tētahi hui paenga o te hui o Tory ka whai take pea ngā ūnga hekenga hei "turanga ine" mō te pupuri i te kāwanatanga ki te pūkete, engari i āwangawanga ia ki te whakamārama. "Me hāngai tonu tātau ki te iwi whānui o Ingarangi mō tā mātou tikanga ina waitohu mātou ki ngā ūnga. " Ina kōhuatia e koe tētahi huinga uara me ngā mātāpono ki roto i tētahi whika tau kotahi, ka noho te ūnga hei mutunga i roto i a ia anō, kaua ko te tikanga ki te mutunga." I hoahoatia te ūnga hekenga kupenga hei tīmata i tētahi pūnaha pai ake, tika ake, engari me pono te kāwanatanga ki te iwi whānui mō "te tikanga me te pēhea e pai ake ai". "He taputapu pūnoa te ūnga o nāianei. Ā, ka āta whakatakoto i tā mātou kaupapahere taitapa ki tā mātou kaupapahere tipu, ā, kāore mātou i te hāngai ki te iwi whānui mō tēnā." I kī a ia he whakaaturanga mārama e hiahia ana te iwi whānui ki ngā mana iti ake i runga i ngā nekeneke, engari he "nui ake te āhua" o te take i ngā pūrākau pāpāho mō te tūkinotanga o te pūnaha. "He roa rawa mātau kua noho herehere i te panekōrero o te Mēra o ia Rā. Me hoki whakamuri tātau i tēnā." Ko te whakataunga a te Tari Kāinga o mua tata nei ki te tango i tōna mana ki te tautoko i ngā ākonga o rāwāhi, kua āki i ngā māharahara i waenganui i ngā MP mō te āhua o te mahinga o ngā ākonga i roto i te pūnaha nekeneke. Kua tonoa ngā minita kia tango i ngā ākonga kē mai i ngā tatauranga hekenga kupenga kia āhei ai te UK ki te whakawhānui tonu i tana tiri o te mākete ākonga whai hua o rāwāhi. Tata ki te 2,600 ngā ākonga o London Metropolitan i kīa kia kimi wāhi kē, kia anga atu rānei ki te tuku i muri i te mahi a te UK Border Agency i runga i ngā whakaaturanga he ākonga kāore he mana kia noho ki te UK, me te kore Ingarihi tika, ā, kāore i te aroturukitia tō rātou haerenga. Heoi anō, i whakataua e te Kōti Tiketike ka whakaaetia ngā ākonga tīariari me te tūnga nekeneke katoa ki te haere tonu i a rātau akoranga, ā, ka taea e te whare wānanga te whakamatautau i te whakataunga a te Tari Kāinga. I kī a Tēnā Zahawi e tika ana kia whiua e te kāwanatanga nga tauira me nga kura tinihanga. Engari i kī a ia he "pōhēhē" te whakahaere a te Tari Kāinga i te kēhi o Metropolitan, ā, ka whakaarahia he pātai mō te karere e tukuna ana ki ngā ākonga kē mō te pōhiri i a rātau i te UK. "Kāore mātou i te whakamua mō ngā ngana ki te whakatutuki i te ūnga (manene) mā te whakakore i tētahi rōpū e whakarato ana i tētahi painga ohaoha mārama, ā, ko wai o ngā rōpū kaiheke katoa e iti iho ana te āwangawanga tūmatanui," tana kī. 'Ngā painga tāpui' Engari i roto i tana whaikōrero ki te hui, ka kī te hēkeretari kāinga kāore i te whakahaeretia, ko te nekeneke maha "i whakararuraru i te hononga pāpori" ā, kāore he whakaaturanga i whai painga ki te āhua o te whakahaerenga. I tautohe a ia, ka mau te kāwanatanga ki "ngā painga kaha rawa" e ātete ana i tana kaupapahere, ā, kāore e taea te mahi rerekē i te wāhanga mātauranga tiketike nā tōna uara ki te rangatiratanga o Ingarangi. "E tautohe ana rātau (ngā kaiwhakawāwā) e hiahia ana mātou ki ētahi atu ākonga nā te mea ko te mātauranga tā mātou hua kaweake tino nui," tana kī. "E whakaae ana ahau me tautoko tātau i o tātau kura me ngā whare wānanga tino pai me te whakahauhau i ngā ākonga tino pai kia haere mai ki konei. " Engari ki te kī atu ko te kawemai i ētahi atu tauiwi ko tā mātou hua kaweake tino pai, engari ko te tohutohu o te pouri. "I pōtitia mātau i runga i tētahi kī taurangi kia tapahia te manene, ā, koia tērā e whakatau ana ahau ka tukua e mātou."

title: Arotahi hara kino a Brexit o te akoranga aroturuki o Cardiff Uni
summary: Ko ngā hara kino i runga i te pāpāho pāpori me ūkui i roto i tētahi kaupapa £250,000 e ngā tohunga o te Whare Wānanga o Kānata e arotahi ana ki a Pakihi.
text: E whai ana rātau ki te hanga i tētahi utauta aroturuki hei āwhina i ngā pirihimana me ngā mana kāwanatanga ki te whāwhā i ngā kēhi i runga i ngā paetukutuku pēnei i Twitter. I kī ngā tohunga i ngā takahanga "keu" pēnei i te hua o te taupānga o Pipiri tērā e mōhiotia ana kia puta he tara i roto i ngā mahi. Ko te hara kino i tuhia e nga pirihimana i Ingarangi me Uēra i peke 41% i te marama i muri i te pōti kia puta atu i te EU. I tērā o Hōngongoi, ka whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga o UK tētahi mahere hei mahi i te hara kino i Ingarangi me Uēra i roto i tētahi tono kia nui ake te pūrongo o ngā mahi me te whakapai ake i te tautoko mō ngā tūpāpaku me te whakaiti i te tauine o te raruraru. I kī a Prof Matthew Williams, mai i te Taiwhanga Pūtaiao Raraunga Pāpori o te whare wānanga: "Kua whakawāteatia e te taupānga mō te wā heke mai o UK i te Uniana o Ūropi ētahi whakaaro whakaaro whakaaro i puritia e te iti o ngā tāngata, nā reira i puta ai te pāpātanga o ngā hara kino. ' Whakarerekētanga' "I te wā e heke mai nei o te rangirua e pā ana ki te āhua o te putanga o te UK, ko ngā kaihanga whakataunga, otirā ko ērā e haepapa ana ki te whakaiti i te mōrea o te raruraru pāpori mā te whakaū hapori, te whakahaere ā-rohe me te whakahaere tuihono, ka hiahiatia he mōhiohio tata ki te wā tūturu mō te āheinga o te whakanuitanga o ngā ihirangi kino i horahia i runga i te pāpāho pāpori." Ko ngā hara kino i Uēra i piki ake i te 60% i te wā pōti taupānga EU i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i tērā tau. Kei te kohikohi raraunga ngā kairangahau i roto i te wā 12 marama, tīmata mai i te 23 o Pipiri 2016 i te wā i pōti ai te UK ki te wehe i te Uniana o Ūropi. I kī a Tēnā Williams e mahi ana te taiwhanga me te Upoko UK o te Hōtaka Hara Kino a te Kāwanatanga i te Kaunihera Pirihimana o te Motu, i waenganui i ētahi atu, hei wāhanga o te kaupapa. Kua mahi tahi te Taiwhanga Pūtaiao Raraunga Pāpori o te whare wānanga me ngā Pirihimana o Metropolitan, te Manatu Ture, te Tari Kāinga me te Tari Pirihimana o Los Angeles. Kua whakaratoa te pūtea e te Kaunihera Rangahau Ohaoha me te Pāpori e tautoko ana i te whakangungu me te akoranga.

title: Ko te mutunga tēnei mo te pōti waea?
summary: I tērā wiki i haere ahau ki te hui tūmatanui tuatahi o te tūhuratanga he aha te hē o te pōti i mua i te pōti nui.
text: Nā Anthony ReubenHead of statistics, BBC News Ko te ngana a te Kaunihera Pōti o Ingarangi ki te kimi he aha i kitea ai e ngā kaipānui katoa he pai te mahi a te Rōpū ā Iwi o Pirihitini, ā, ka tino kino te mahi a ngā Pāremata Liberal, engari i rahua te kite i te rahi o te āputa i waenganui i a Labour me ngā Conservatives, ā, ka matapaetia he pāremata tautau. He pono, he rite tonu te whakautu hē i whiwhi ai rātau katoa i te āhua nei kei te tārua rātau i ngā mahi kāinga a tētahi. He huihuinga whakaharahara tērā o ngā rōpū pōti matua ki te kī kua pōhēhē rātau, ā, ka huatau he take he aha. Ko te whetū o te whakaaturanga ko Martin Boon mai i ICM, nāna i pātai te pātai tē mōhiotia: ka taea tonu te tiki tauira māngai mā te waea? He roa te wā i mahia ai te pōti waea, ka mahi te rōpū pōti i tētahi rārangi o ngā tau waea matapōkere e pātai ana kia pātai rā anō ki te tau tika o ngā tāngata mō te poipoi. Ko te ariā, ki te pātai koe ki te nui o ngā tāngata i tīpakohia matapōkeretia, ka whiwhi koe i tētahi tauira urupare e tohu ana i ngā whakaaro o te iwi whānui. Ināianei kei roto i a rātou te 15%, te 20% rānei o ngā tau pūkoro me ērā atu raina whenua. Engari ko te raruraru, e ai ki a Tēnā Boon, kia whiwhi urupare ai mai i ngā tāngata e 2,000, kua whakahaua rātau kia waea atu ki ngā tau matapōkere e 30,000. He ngākau nui rawa Ina iti rawa te mokatere urupare, tērā tētahi mōrearea tūturu he take e urupare ana te tangata, e tū ana i te tauira hei māngai. I huatau mai a Arama Drummond, mai i Opinium, he tino ngākau nui te iwi i whakaae kia uiuitia, a, ka pōti rātau i te pōti mo te Pāremata o Ūropi. He mea hira te whakauru tōrangapū a ngā kaiwhakautu nā te mea me mōhio ngā kaipānui ehara i te mea ko tēhea te rōpū ka tautokona e tētahi tangata, engari he pēhea hoki te pōti. I kī a Tēnā Drummond kua whakanuia e te panekōrero te āhua o te pōti a te tangata, otirā ko ngā taitamariki e pōti ana i a Labour. I kī a Kiriona Skinner mai i Ipsos Mori ko te nuinga o te wā he 10% iti iho i te pōti taketake, engari i tēnei pōtitanga he 16% te iti iho. Te āhua nei he raruraru Groucho Marx tēnei - ko te whakautu aunoa a ngā tāngata i te waea me te whakaae ki te whakautu i ngā pātai mō ō rātou whakaaro tōrangapū, ko te tikanga he nui rawa rātou ki te māngai. Ko te pōti tuihono he whakahē tēnei i mahia i mua o te pōti tuihono. Ka whakautua ngā pōti tuihono e tētahi pātengi raraunga o ngā tūao kua waitohu kia noho ki tētahi paepae, ā, he nui te mōhio o te kamupene. Ina whakaritea te kamupene ki te mahi i tētahi poipoi, ka taea te mōhio tūturu he ōrite ngā āhuahira o ngā tāngata e tonoa ana ki te katoa o te iwi whānui - hei tauira, te wāhanga o ngā tāne me ngā wāhine, te kōtaha pakeke rānei, te tuari moni whiwhinga rānei. He rite tonu te hē o te panekōrero tuihono ki ngā mea waea. E kore e taea e te tangata te noho i runga i tētahi paewhiri kia kore ai rātau e māngai? Mēnā ka pērā, ko te momo pōti anake e wātea ana ko te kanohi-ki-te-kanohi, arā ko te rara kikorangi o te pōti, engari he nui ake te utu i ērā atu tikanga e rua. E kore e mōhiotia i kī a Tēnā Boon he "take tūturu kia māharahara ki te wā heke mai o te pōti tōrangapū". Te āhua nei kāore e taea e te pūrongo whakamutunga i te 1 o Poutāpeta 2016 te whakamutu e kore e whakaaetia te pōti waea, engari ka mīharo ahau mēnā kāore te raruraru o te whakanui i te āheinga o te tangata ki te pōti i te wāhi nui mō te tūhuratanga anō.

title: PFI: e rima ngā kamupene e karo ana i te tāke ahakoa ngā hua e £2bn, ka ako a TE AO
summary: E rima ngā kamupene PFI o waho i utu i te tāke kaporeihana iti, kāore rānei he tāke kaporeihana i roto i te wā e rima tau ahakoa e tata ana ki te £2bn, kua mōhio te HAU.
text: Nā Andrew HoskenThe World Tonight, BBC Radio 4 Ko ngā kamupene e rima i tohunga ki te whakatārewa moni mā ngā Mahi Pūtea Tūmataiti (PFI). E hia rau ngā rawa tūmatanui tae atu ki ngā kura, ngā hōhipera, tae atu ki ngā teihana pirihimana. Kua mōhio hoki te AO he iti noa iho ngā kamupene nui o waho e hoko ana i tēnei wā. Kei te hokona e rātau ētahi o ngā whare tūmatanui o UK. Ko te rangahau i mahia e te kura whakaaro e tūhura ana i ngā mahi PFI, te Wae Rautaki Ratonga Ūropi, e whakaatu ana i te whānuitanga o te hoko i Ingarangi.
