I kī atu a Meg Hillier, te MP Labour e tūtaki ana i te Komiti Tīpako Pūkete Tūmatanui, ki te Ao o te Ao i te Pō nei: "He tino mīharo. Kei te utu a mātau tāke mo a tātau kura me ā mātou hōhipera... engari kei te mārama tonu te whai hua o ēnei kamupene, ā, kāore he tāke UK. Kāore au i te whakaaro i whakaarohia tērā i te wā i whakatūria ai te PFI." I whakapuakina hoki e Ms Hillier, MP mō Hackney South me Shoreditch, te māharahara ki te whakamōhiotanga o te maha o ngā rawa tūmatanui i roto i ngā ringa torutoru rawa ki waho. "Ki taku whakaaro kāore tētahi tangata i kite i tēnei hokonga o te nama ki ngā kamupene me tēnei huihuinga. Ināianei he torutoru rawa ngā kamupene e whai ana i te nui o te nama, ā, he āwangawanga nui tēnā." I whakaahuatia e ia ngā rawa tūmatanui o UK hei "kau moni" e tāpiri ana: "Ināianei he āputa tino nui i waenganui i te rangatira o te nama me te ratonga me te whakahaere e utu ana." Ko te upoko o Dexter Whitfield i te Wae Rautaki Ratonga Ūropi nāna i mahi te rangahau PFI mō ngā tinana tūmatanui me ētahi atu whakahaere. I kī a ia he nui ngā hua o ngā kamupene o waho i te hoko rawa tūmatanui, me te whakahoki wawaenga ā-tau i runga i ā rātou pūtea penapena PFI ki te 28%. Engari i kī a Tēnā Whitfield he iti, kāore rānei he tāke kaporeihana UK i utua e ngā kamupene ahakoa he nui ngā hua. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te PFI he mīhini hua tūmataiti. Mēnā ka whāngaia e te kāwanatanga tētahi rautaki hanga hāngai i ngā hanganga tūmatanui mā te pūtea penapena tūmatanui me te whakahaere mā ā rātou ratonga ā-whare, kāore tēnei whare katoa e tīariari. "Ko ēnei tauwhitinga katoa he hua o te mea he nui rawa ngā moni e mahia ana i roto i te PFI." I kī a Tēnā Whitfield e rima ngā moni PFI o waho i whai hua i te £1.83bn i roto i te wā e rima tau e mutu ana i Aperira 2015, engari he iti, kāore rānei he tāke kaporeihana. Heoi anō, i tautohetohetia tēnei e tētahi matua PFI o waho, ko HICL Infrastructure Ltd, i runga anō i Guernsey. E kī ana kāore te rangahau a Tēnā Whitfield i pā ki te mea i utua te tāke e ngā anake o te kamupene me ngā kaipupuri moni i runga i a rātau moni hua. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "I te taumata kaupapa, ka haumi a HICL ki ngā kamupene maha, kua whakaurua ki te UK, ā, ka tāketia e HMRC." Ināianei, he maha ngā mahinga PFI e ānini ana puta noa i ngā ratonga tūmatanui, otirā i roto i te NHS. I kī atu te Hōhipera o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te T Ko te tikanga o tēnei he pire ā-tau e £30m, neke atu rānei i te rua o tāna e whakapono ana ka taea e UCLH te utu mēnā ka whakaritea anōtia te nama. I kī atu a Ahorangi Marcel Levi, te Kaiwhakahaere Matua o UCLH, ki te HAU: "Mēnā ka whakapau moni nui mātou ki te utu i ngā mokatere huamoni me tēnei nama PFI, he moni tērā kāore e taea e mātou te whakapau ki te tiaki tūroro, ki ngā nēhi, ki ngā pūnaha whakahaere me ngā pūnaha whakahaere." Ā, he moni kāore i te pau ki te whakaoti i ngā ūnga mō te A&E me ngā wā tatari pukupuku, ka tāpiritia e ia.

title: Ka whakawāteatia e Rūhia te māharahara o Mātau mo te aorangi hōia
summary: Kāore i mōrearea tētahi aorangi hōia o Rūhia i whakatūria i waenganui i ngā aorangi Intelsat e rua o Amerika, e kī ana tētahi tohunga mokowā o Rūhia.
text: Nā Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Rūhia, i kī a Moiseyev, te upoko o te Whare Wānanga Kaupapahere Mokowā o Rūhia, i mārama a ia ki a Mātau mō ngā nekeneke a te aorangi tānga o Luch. "Engari he tino iti rawa te tūtukitanga, tētahi momo whakararuraru rānei," ka whakahuatia a ia me te kōrero. I kī a Intelsat kua whakamātauria, ā, i rahua te whakapā atu ki te kaiwhakahaere o te aorangi. "Ahakoa ngā uiui hāngai, tōtika hoki a ngā tinana mana tika me ngā kaupapa kāwanatanga, kāore te kaiwhakahaere o tērā atu aorangi i urupare," e kī ana i roto i tētahi kōrero ki te HAU. Tata ki te 50 ngā aorangi e whakahaere ana a Intelsat Inc., ko ētahi o ēnei e whakamahia ana e te hōia o Amerika, tae atu ki ngā mahi taiapa me ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ki "ngā tauwāhi hōia mamao". I kī a Lt-Col Tom Crosson o te Tari Whakangungu o Amerika kua whakapā atu te tono mokowā a te hōia o Amerika, a JFCC-Space, ki Rūhia mō te aorangi. "Kua tukuna e JFCC-Space ngā whakamōhiotanga tata ohorere ki Rūhia, i runga anō i ngā matapae o tētahi huarahi tata me tētahi atu ahanoa mokowā o te 5km (e toru māwhiti) iti iho rānei i roto i te 72 haora," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "E mōhio ana ahau he whakawhitiwhitinga anō i waenganui i ngā tohutūmahi tūmataiti," tana tāpiri mai. Kei te aroturukitia te aorangi i runga i te paetukutuku www.space-track.org, e whakaahuatia ana ko "Luch (Olymp)". I whakarewaina i te wā o Mahuru 2014. 'Mōrea iti' E ai ki a Tēnā Moiseyev, "kāore he tūkinotanga i tēnei take". Ko te Luch, i kī a ia, "he aorangi tānga noa iho, e tuku tohu ana mai i te waka ātea ki Te Ao, hei tauira mai i te Teihana Mokowā Ao Whānui (ISS) - he raruraru whakawhitiwhiti kōrero tātau i reira - mai i tētahi aorangi ki tētahi atu". "E kore e taea te noho hei 'kaitukino'," ka whakahuatia ia e te kōwhiringa rongokōrero o Rūhia o RIA Novosti me te kōrero. "Ka taea e tētahi aorangi te mahi i ētahi nekeneke pōhēhē - engari he tino āhua kore nei ngā tūtukitanga." I kī a Tēnā Moiseyev kotahi noa iho te mahi o mua i te tūtukitanga o tētahi aorangi Rūhia tawhito me tētahi aorangi o Amerika. Ko te Whare Wānanga Kaupapahere Mokowā - i whakatūria e ngā tinana kāwanatanga i te tau 1993 - e whakaahuatia ana i runga i tōna paetukutuku hei "rōpū rangahau takitahi". I aroturukitia e tētahi tohunga mokowā o Amerika, a Kōrero Weeden, te aorangi Luch, ā, i kī mai ka neke ki tētahi tūnga i June kāore ētahi atu aorangi Rūhia, engari nāna i puru "i waenganui tonu i ngā aorangi Intelsat mahi e rua... i reira i noho ai tae noa ki te waenganui o Mahuru". I tētahi wā ka tae mai i roto i te 10km o tētahi o aua aorangi, e tino tata ana ki ngā tikanga mokowā. Kātahi anō ka tīmata anō te Luch, ka pūrongotia e Tēnā Weeden i roto i tētahi tuhipānui i roto i te Arotakenga Mokowā. I kī a ia kāore te Luch i rēhitatia ki te Tari UN o ngā Take Mokowā Waho, ā, "he nui hoki te rangirua mo te mahi". He aha tāna? Tērā pea he hē te ingoa "Luch", e whakamahia ana e te pāpāho kāwanatanga o Rūhia, te kī a Tēnā Weeden. "I hoatu e rātau taua ingoa, engari ehara i tēnā momo," tana kī atu ki te AO mā te waea. Ka whakamahia te "Luch" mō tētahi karaehe rerekē o ngā aorangi tānga Rūhia i roto i te āwhiotanga pāpaku o te Ao, ka whakamāramatia e ia. Engari he nui ake te mahi huna - tata ki te 36,000km i runga ake i te wehewehe, i roto i tētahi momo e mōhiotia ana ko te āwhiotanga geosynchronous (GEO). "Kua whakatūria ināianei i te taha o tētahi atu aorangi Intelsat," tana kī. I te pātaitanga mehemea ka haukotia e ia ngā raraunga Intelsat, ka kī noa iho a ia "Kāore au i te mōhio". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "kāore he mōrearea o te tūtukitanga". I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki Space News i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka kī te perehitini o Intelsat General, o Te Ahuwhānui, kāore he whakararuraru i ngā mahi a Intelsat. E kiia ana ngā nekeneke ko ngā mahi tūtaki me ngā mahi tatanga (RPO), ā, kua whakamātauria e te US mō te 15 tau, engari ināianei "kei te hopu ngā Rūhia me ngā Hainamana", te kī a Tēnā Weeden. I whakaahuatia e ia ngā ngohe RPO o Rūhia he "tino ōrite ki ngā āheinga RPO o Amerika". E kī ana te tohunga hangarau mokowā o TE WĀ, a Honatana Amos, ka taea te whakamahi i te RPO mō ngā mahi tūtei, ārai aorangi rānei, engari hei whakaora me te whakatika i tētahi aorangi pakaru, hei whakawātea rānei i ētahi paraurehe aorangi i waho o te āwhiotanga. Engari e hiahiatia ana kia mārama, kia tuwhera hoki ngā rōpū katoa ki ā rātou mahi i te āwhiotanga, ka tāpiritia e to mātau korero. I kī a Intelsat kua "whakapā atu ki ngā tinana mana tika me ngā kaupapa kāwanatanga ki te whakapuaki i tō mātou māharahara, ki te tono hoki kia toro atu ki te kaiwhakahaere ki te whakatika i te āhuatanga". Na Intelsat i tohutohu i te tiritiri mōhiohio mā te Space Data Association (SDA), "ko tana whāinga he whakarei ake i te 'haumarutanga rererangi' mō ngā tohutūmahi aorangi i te ao whānui". Whakahōu, 22 Whiringa 2015: I whakahōutia te pūrākau i muri i te kōrero a Lt-Col Tom Crosson i te Tari Whakangungu o Amerika ki te AO kua tukuna e te hōia a AMERIKA "ngā whakamōhiotanga tata ohorere" ki Rūhia.

title: Hākari Motu o Wight: 'Ko te tikanga kua tirohia e ngā kaiwhakahaere te huarere'
summary: E karanga ana tētahi MP mō te arotakenga o ngā hātepe i muri i te takawaretanga o ngā mano o ngā kaihautū toka mō ngā haora e haere ana ki te Hākari o Te Motu o Wight.
text: I kī te MP o te motu, a Andrew Turner, ko te tikanga kia mōhio ngā kaiwhakahaere kua tautuhia te marangai taumaha ki te whakararuraru nui. Kāore i taea e ngā motokā te whakatū i runga i ngā āpure waipuke - e ahu ana ki te mātiti i te wā e 55,000 ngā tāngata e haere ana ki te pae. I kī tētahi mana o te kaunihera kua whakaritea ngā mahere ohorere, engari "kāore i taea e ngā kaiwhakahaere te mahi". I kī a Stuart Love, kaiwhakahaere taiao mō te Kaunihera o Te Motu o Wight: "He ngangau engari kua tino kaha mātou ki ngā kaiwhakahaere hākari, ngā pirihimana me ngā kaiwhakahaere pahi me ngā waka waka me ngā hipanga kua mahia e mātau ināianei. " Ko te huarere te take matua i roto i ēnei mea katoa." 'Ehara i te mea whakamīharo' Nā ngā hau tiketike i raruraru ai te takaware i ngā pēne e mau ana ki te atamira i te ahiahi o te Paraire. Heoi anō, kei te neke noa ngā waka me ngā manuhiri ki te pae i Seaclose Park, Newport. Ko Tom Petty, Bruce Springsteen me Pearl Jam ngā mahi matua i te wā o te hākari e toru rā. Kua tukuna e te Tari Tūtaki he whakatūpato kōwhai mō ngā wāhi maha o Ingarangi me Pākehā me tētahi whakatūpato amipere tino kaha ake mō te Raki o Ingarangi. I kī ngā matapae o te Tari Tūtaki ka kite te motu i te rangi tino hau, me ngā takikupu ātaahua me ngā ua marara i te mutunga wiki. I kī a Tēnā Turner me kite ngā kaiwhakahaere i ngā raruraru i takea mai i te huarere. Ka kī a ia: "Te āhua nei ko te raruraru kāore i te mōhio mēnā he ua koe i te Rātapu, me te ua i ētahi atu rā, ehara i te mea he ua i te Tāite. " Me tirotiro, engari ko te mea kei a rātau te whakaaetanga ki te tango i ngā tāngata e 90,000 - me arotake tērā." Na te paru i puta ai ngā raruraru uru i te pō o te Rāitema ka kore e taea e ngā mano te uru ki ngā pāka motokā. Ka tūtira ngā kaitaraiwa tae atu ki te 10 haora ki te uru ki te pae. I tīmata ngā raruraru i te ata o te Rāitema i te wā i waipuke ai te papa motokā matua i te ua nui i te pō. I whakahaua ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te whakatuwhera i ētahi atu āpure me te mau mai i ngā riu konganuku kia taea ai te whakahaere i ngā waka ki ngā pāka motokā waipuke. He tokomaha i tōia nā te paru. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te hākari a John Giddings: "I mahia e mātau ngā mea katoa i roto i to mātau kaha, engari i te hekenga mai o taua ua 24 haora ka wehi. " E pouri ana ahau, ka taea anake e au te whakapāha. He mutunga wiki tino pai tēnei, kaua e tuku i a mātau." I kī a Tēnā Giddings kei te whakaritea hoki ngā mahere mō ngā tāngata e haere ana i te Rātapu. Ka kī a ia: "E hiahia ana ngā pirihimana ki tētahi mahere ohorere mai i a au me pēhea taku whakaweto i te tangata i te Rātapu. " Ka rite ahau ki te tango i ngā tāngata." I mua o te rā, i a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te Reo Irirangi o TE Reo Irirangi, i whakaaturia e Tēnā Giddings tērā pea kua rite ia ki te whakarato moni whakahoki moni ki ngā tāngata nā ngā take waka. Engari i kī a ia ā muri ake kāore he take hei whakahoki moni i te wā e haere ana te hākari, ā, he ngāwari noa iho te tae atu o te tangata ki reira.

title: Ka ngaro te ngaro o UK i te tata ki te £1bn o te pūtea EU, e kī ana ngā kaunihera
summary: Ka ngaro pea i te UK te tata ki te £1bn o te pūtea EU ki te kore e tere ake te āhua o te tohatoha moni ki ngā kaupapa paetata, kua whakatūpato ngā kaunihera.
text: E kī ana te Pānga Kāwanatanga Paetata e anga ana ngā wāhi paetata ki ngā hēnga "tino nui" i te mea kāore te moni i te whiwhi. E kī ana ko te 48% anake o te £3.1bn nā te UK kua tohaina - e rima tau ki roto i te wā whakapau moni e whitu tau. I kī atu te Tari Mahi me te Penihana ki te Financial Times ka taea te whakapau moni i muri i te tau 2020. Kua tohe te LGA, e tohu ana i ngā kaunihera Ingarihi me Welsh me ētahi atu mana, ki te kāwanatanga kia whakarite ko ngā moni katoa o te Pūtea Pāpori Pāpori Ūropi - e hāngai ana ki te tautoko i ngā mahi, ngā pūkenga me ngā whakangungu i ngā whenua mema - ka tohaina i mua i te mutunga o te wā i te tau 2020. E tautohe ana ko te ESF he "aho ora" mō ngā rohe paetata, engari e kī ana ko te "mana pūtahi" i runga i ngā moni mai i te Tari Mahi me ngā Penihana i uaua ai ki ngā wāhi paetata te uru ki te pūtea, ā, e kī ana he "kore kaha" i Whitehall kia tere ai te whakapau moni a ESF. E rima tau ki roto i te wā whakapau moni 2014-20, e kī ana ko te 48% anake o te pūtea kua tohaina ki ngā kaupapa, ā, te āhua nei kei te pōturi haere te mokatere e tohatoha ana te kāwanatanga i te moni. Mā te £1.5bn kua whakaritea, e kī ana kei te toe tonu te £1.6bn hei whakapau, ā, i te tere o nāianei, e kore e pau te £914.5m i te wā, ā, ka "whakahokia ki Pōroa". "Ko te āhuatanga o nāianei me te Pūtea Pāpori Ūropi e waiho ana i ngā wāhi paetata e anga ana ki ngā hēnga pūtea nui nā te kore pūtea penapena," te kī a Kevin Bentley, te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū tūmahi o te LGA. "Kua whakamahia tēnei pūtea e ngā rohe paetata ki te waihanga mahi, ki te tautoko i ngā taitara iti, waenga hoki, ki te tuku whakangungu pūkenga me te haumi i roto i ngā waka takenui me ngā hanganga mamati me te whakarewa i te tupu whānui puta noa i te whenua. " Hei āwhina ki te whakarite kia whai ōhanga tātau mō te wā heke, e tohutohu ana mātou i te kāwanatanga kia mahi wawe kia tino mōhio ai kei te whiwhi ngā hapori paetata i te pūtea penapena e tino hiahiatia ana e rātou, me te ako mai i tēnei wheako i te whakawhanake i te UK Shared Prosperity Fund [te whakakapinga i muri i te pūtea EU]. "Ki te kore he mahi, ka ngaro te tata ki te kotahi miriona pauna pūtea penapena ki roto i o tātau hapori, ā, ka whakakorea ngā wāhi paetata me ngā ohanga i te pūtea e tino hiahiatia ana." I kī atu tētahi kaikōrero mō te DWP ki te Financial Times: "Tērā tētahi whakaaetanga ka taea te haere tonu te pūtea i tua atu i te 2020 i te wā e whiwhi ana te taupānga i mua i taua wā. " He nui tonu te āronga ki te Pūtea Pāpori Pāpori o Ūropi, ā, he nui ake ngā taupānga e haere mai ana. Kāore he take ki te kaha o te tari ki te tukatuka i aua taupānga."

title: Ka heke iho ngā kōeke taumata-A, i te pikinga o ngā wāhi o te whare wānanga
summary: Kua heke iho ngā kōeke taumata-A i tēnei tau, i te whiwhinga o ngā tauira i Ingarangi, i Wēra me Aiarangi ki te Raki i ā rātou hua.
text: Nā Sean CoughlanBBC News education correspondent Tērā tētahi hinganga iti i roto i ngā kōeke A* me A, ā, ko te wā tuatahi i roto i te 30 tau te hekenga o te mokatere. Engari he maha ngā wāhi whare wānanga e wātea ana, ā, ka taea tonu e ngā ākonga te whiwhi wāhi ahakoa hapa i a rātau kōeke. Education Secretary Nicky Morgan says the government is "lifting the cap on aspiration". E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere whakamātautau he "pūmau" ngā hua o ngā taumata-A o tēnei tau. Engari mō te toru o nga tau whai muri kua iti noa iho ngā kōeke A* me te A - heke iho i te 26.3% ki te 26%. Ngā kitenga taumata-A 26% i whiwhi kōeke A, A* rānei - heke iho i te 0.3 ōrau piro 98% mokatere hipanga katoa - heke iho i te 0.1% 8.2% i whiwhi A* - tae atu ki te 0.6% 32 tau mai i te 8.5% o ngā taitama i tutuki i te A*, i whakaritea ki te 7.9% o ngā kōtiro He iti noa iho hoki ngā hinga i roto i te wāhanga o ngā tāurunga i roto i ngā kōeke A* ki B. Engari ko te kōeke A* teitei rawa kua piki mai i te 7.6% ki te 8.2%. Whakataetae mō ngā ākonga Mō ngā kaituku kura e hiahia ana ki te haere ki te whare wānanga, tērā pea he tau tino pai tēnei ki te hoatu, me tētahi "mākete kaihoko" e whakataetae ana ngā whare wānanga ki te kawe mai i ngā ākonga. Kua tutuki i tētahi ākonga e whakapā ana ki te AO e rua ngā kōeke C me te D, engari i whiwhi tonu i tētahi wāhi whare wānanga e toru ngā kōeke B o te tono taketake. Tērā pea ko te tikanga o ngā ākonga kua eke ki ngā kōeke teitei ake i te mea e tūmanakohia ana ko te "tauhokohoko ake". I tutuki i a Parata Burhanudin, he tauira i City me Islington College, e rua ngā kōeke As me te A*, ā, e kī ana ka hokona e ia tētahi "whare wānanga tiketike". There are an extra 30,000 university places available and it is expected that for the first time over 500,000 places will be allocated for courses this autumn. Kei te ngāwari tonu ngā whare wānanga ki te tono ākonga e eke ana ki ngā kōeke AAB, pai ake rānei. E kī ana te ratonga whakauru Ucas, e 396,990 ngā ākonga kua whakaaetia ki ngā akoranga waeine i ngā whare wānanga o UK - tae atu ki te 3% i whakaritea ki tēnei wā i tērā tau. E kī ana te Minita Whare Wānanga o Greg Clark ko te whakawhānuitanga i ngā wāhi he "pūtake hira o te nekeneke pāpori". I kī te Kaunihera Tōtahi mō ngā Tohutohu, e tuku ana i ngā hua, he ia mō ētahi atu ākonga ki te tango i ngā "kaupapa whakangāwari" i te taumata-A, pēnei i te pāngarau me te ahupūngao, e āwhina ana i ngā taupānga o te whare wānanga. Ko te pāngarau ināianei te kaupapa taumata-A tino rongonui. Engari he nui ngā hinganga i roto i te tangohanga o ngā kaupapa i waho o tēnei rōpū matua, pēnei i te 47% te hekenga o te whakaaro takenui me te 24% iti iho ngā tāurunga i roto i ngā akoranga ahuwhānui. E kī ana a Nick Foskett, te tumuaki tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Keele, ka nui ake ngā kōwhiringa a ngā ākonga i ngā tau o mua, ahakoa kāore rātou e whiwhi i ō rātou kōeke tūmanako. "Tērā pea ka whakaaetia ētahi atu ākonga ki tā rātou kōwhiringa tuatahi, ahakoa he iti iho ō rātou kōeke i ngā whare wānanga i tonoa," te kī a Prof Foskett. He ngāwari ake "He maha ngā whare wānanga whai mahere mō te tipu ka whakamahi i tēnei tau ki te whakawhānui i ō rātou tau, nā reira ka hiahia ki te whakaae ki ngā ākonga kua ākiritia pea i ngā tau o mua." E kī ana te ratonga whakauru Ucas e whakaatu ana ngā whika tuatahi i te 2% te pikinga o ngā ākonga e whiwhi ana i tō rātou wāhi kōwhiringa tuatahi. Kua whakaaturia e te Rōpū Russell o ngā whare wānanga ārahi ka nui ake te ngāwari ake i te pūnoa. "Some Russell Group universities may still have places available in some subjects for students who have done better than expected," said the group's director general, Wendy Piatt. "Tērā pea he wāhi e wātea ana mō ngā ākonga tino mātauranga kua hapa i tā rātou kōwhiringa tuatahi." He nui ake ngā whare wānanga e tūmanakohia ana kia whai wāhi ki te tukanga ūkui, e ōrite ana ki ngā ākonga e kimi wāhi ana ki ngā akoranga e wātea ana. Mō ngā ākonga e rangirua ana i te tika o ā rātou kōeke, e kī ana te Tari Komihana Mōhiohio e whai mana ana rātou ki te kite i te tohunga o ā rātou whakamātautau. He tāpiritanga tēnei ki te tukanga tono a nga poari whakamātautau. I roto i ngā kitenga o tēnei tau ko ngā kōeke taumata-A tuatahi mai i tētahi kura koreutu, te London Academy of Excellence, me te 43% o ngā tauira e eke ana ki ngā kōeke matua o A* me A. I kī te hēkeretari mātauranga kōruru o Labour, a Tristram Hunt, ka makaia e ia te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga ki te tango i te hononga i waenganui i te AS me ngā taumata-A. Mā tēnei wetewete o ngā whakamātautau e whakawhāiti te "wā o te rangatahi ki te mōhio ki tō rātou kaha katoa", te kī a Tēnā Hunt. I muri i te nui o te māharahara ki te utunga o te kōeke "kaua tātau e patu i a tātau ki te kore ngā kōeke me ngā hipanga katoa e piki ake i ia tau". Engari i whakaarahia e Tēnā Cridland ngā māharahara mō te whakapeka haere tonu o ngā ākonga e mau ana i ngā reo hou. I kī te kaiārahi matua o ngā kaiako o Kōrero Lightman ko ngā hua o tēnei tau he "pūrākau rongo pai tūturu". "E whakaatu ana i te kaha o te mahi a ngā ākonga me ngā kaiako i mua i ngā huringa ki ngā whakamātautau kia taea ai ngā hua e tiketike ana."

title: I karangatia te pōti taraiwa tereina a ngā kaiārahi o London Midland
summary: Kua karangatia e nga kaitātaki tereina te pōti mo te mahi taraiwa i runga i te ratonga a London Midland.
text: I kī te uniana o te rēra e kōrero ana ki ōna mema e 523 mō ngā mahere hei utu i ngā kaikirimana haumarutanga i runga i ngā tereina o te kamupene. I kī atu a London Midland ki te uniana kua mutu te whakamahi i ngā kaikirimana i tērā marama. I kī a RMT ko te whakataunga he "wikitōria nui", i te kī a London Midland e pai ana ki ngā pāhihi e kore e pāngia e ngā tuki "koretake". Ētahi atu whakahōutanga mō tēnei me ētahi atu pūrākau mai i Birmingham me te Whenua Pango. 'Whakapai ake i te haumarutanga' I kī te uniana i whakataua e tana komiti nui ā iwi kia whakakore i te pōti taraiwa me te whakamutu i te tautohetohe i muri i te whiwhinga i "ngā whakaūnga tuhituhi" mai i London Midland ka mutu te whakamahinga o ngā kaikirimana i muri i te 30 o Hānuere. I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Mick Cash ka taea anake te haumarutanga o te tereina me te haumarutanga pāhihi ki ngā kaitukumahi "whakangungu ngaio, whakaraupapa" me "te nui o ngā kaitātaki. " Ka noho mataara tonu a TT i roto i te whawhai haere tonu ki te whakamutu i te tūkinotanga o ngā mahi a ngā kaimahi kaupae me ngā nekehanga e tukituki ana i ngā whakaritenga kaimahi pūmau," tana kī. I kī tētahi kōrero mō London Midland "i whakatau kia arotake i ā mātou whakaritenga o nāianei" i muri i tana kōrero ki ngā kaimahi. "E tiritiri ana tātau katoa i ngā whāinga ōrite o te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga me te whakaiti i te haere kore tīkiti," ka kī rātau. "Ko tā mātou arotahi ināianei ko te mahi tahi me pēhea te whakatutuki i tēnei."

title: Haina coronavirus: Ko te nuinga o nga rerenga i tapahia ki Xinjiang i muri i te pakarutanga
summary: Tata ki te katoa o nga rerenga ki roto, ki waho hoki o Urumqi, te taone nui o te rohe o Xinjiang ki te hauauru o Haina, kua whakakorea na te pakarutanga o te coronavirus.
text: E ono noa iho ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia e te taone me ngā tohu me ngā mate 11 asymptomatic, e whakaatu ana ngā whika whaimana. Ko ngā tikanga pākaha hei whakahaere i te huaketo ko te whakatū i te raina metro kotahi me te maha o ngā pahi tūmatanui kia kaua e mahi. I muri i te putanga mai o te mate uruta i Haina i te mutunga o te tau 2019, kua akiaki te whenua i nga mate hou ki nga taumata iti tonu. Hei karo i te ngaru tuarua, ahakoa ko ngā kāhui iti e tino nui ana e ngā mana hauora. Ko te pakarutanga tuatahi i te taone nui o Wuhan i whakahaerehia e etahi o nga tikanga raka tino kaha o te ao. I Xinjiang, kei te kī taurangi te kāwanatanga i ngā tikanga tūturu hei pupuri i te tīmatatanga, e ai ki ngā pūrongo pāpāho paetata. Neke atu i te 600 nga rerenga ki roto, ki waho hoki o Urumqi Diwopu International Airport, neke atu i te 80% o te tapeke o te Paraire, i whakakorea. E kī ana ētahi kaiwhakamahi pāpāho pāpori i te taone nui kia kaua rātau e wehe i o rātau pānga whare. I huatau ētahi atu pūkete pāpori e tū ana ngā tāngata kia kaua e tomo, kia puta atu rānei i Kashgar, tētahi atu taone i Pakihi. Ko Xinjiang - ko te kāinga ki te nuinga o ngā tāngata Uighur Mohimana me ētahi atu iti tākehi - kua herea kētia ki te mana kaha o te kāwanatanga. I tīmata te kite i ngā mate hou i te Wenerei, te tuatahi i te rohe mō ngā marama. I whakamātauria e tētahi wahine 24 tau te pai i te Rāitema i muri i te whakaaturanga o ngā tohumate. Tokotoru o ana hoapā tata i whakamātauria he pai. Heoi anō, he asymptomatic rātau. Ko tētahi atu kēhi asymptomatic i pā ki tētahi tangata i haere mai i Urumqi ki te kawanatanga ki te rāwhiti o Zhejiang, ka kī te pāpāho kāwanatanga o Hainamana. Mai i te Paraire, he maha ngā waka rererangi tae atu ki Juneyao Airlines me Shenzhen Donghai Airlines e hiahia ana ki ngā pāhihi katoa e haere ana, mai i Urumqi hoki ki te whakaatu i tētahi whakamātautau waikawa karihi tōraro i tangohia i roto i ngā rā e whitu. Me whakaatu e ngā pāhihi tētahi waehere hauora "haumaru ki te haere", i runga i tētahi taupānga e whai ana ki te tāutu i ngā kaikawe huaketo tūpono, e kī ana te Global Times e whakahaeretia ana e te kāwanatanga o Hainamana. Kāore i te mārama āhea ka hikitia ngā rāhuitanga o te waka. I whakaputaina e te pāpāho kāwanatanga ngā whakaūnga i te Paraire kua nui te whakaputu i ngā toa ki te kai i kitea he ngana ki te whakapōturi i te tangata i te hoko ohorere. I tere te tae mai o nga rongo o te pakarutanga o te coronavirus o Xinjiang me te urupare a te kawanatanga i reira. Kātahi anō mātou ka rongo i tētahi kēhi, ā, ohorere ana kua tū te nuinga o ngā rerenga ki roto, ki waho hoki o Urumqi, ā, kāore i te rere ngā tereina o raro. Te āhua nei he tino nui rawa te urupare kia whakatikaina e te mate kotahi anake, e ahu ana ki ngā pātai i runga i te pāpāho pāpori mēnā kei raro pea ngā mana i te pūrongo i ngā whika. Heoi anō, i piki ake te tatau i te ata Paraire, ā, ko te mea nui, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere hauora i Urumqi e 135 neke atu rānei ngā tāngata i raro i te mātakitaki rongoā. Kua noho tēnei hei tauira i Haina. Ina puta mai he kāhui, ka makaia e te kāwanatanga he nui ngā rauemi ki te whakahaere mā te whakamahi i te whakamātautau maha, ngā rāhuitanga paetata me te katinga o ngā hononga waka hei maukati i te tīmatatanga ki ngā wāhi katoa e pā ana. Te āhua nei kua mahi tēnei rautaki i ētahi atu tāone, pērā i Beijing i Hune. I Pakihi, tērā te tairongotanga tāpiri o ngā puni tautāwhi tautohetohe, i reira e hia rau mano o te nuinga o ngā Uighurs iwi i whakawāteatia hei wāhanga o tētahi hōtaka "whakawhanaketanga" maha. Mēnā ka uru te coronavirus ki tētahi o aua puni pērā ki ngā whare herehere i konei, ka tino nui pea te whakapokenga whānui. Ko nga whika hou mai i Haina e whakaatu ana i te 10 nga keehi hou kua whakapumautia, e iwa o ratou i kawea mai i tawahi, i kii te mana hauora o te whenua. Nō tēnei wā ko ngā mate kua whakaūngia e Haina e tū ana i te 83,622, me ngā mate i te 4,634. Kāore anō a Beijing kia pūrongotia he kēhi hōu mō te 11 rā i roto i te haupae. Tērā te āwangawanga o te ao whānui kua pūrongotia ngā mate i Haina. Kua whakaarahia hoki ngā pātai - e te kāwanatanga o Amerika me ētahi atu - mō te whakahaere a Beijing i te urutā, otirā i ōna wāhanga tōmua. Engari kua whakamihitia hoki a Haina mo te mahi i nga hipanga whakapuaki hei whakapōturi i te horapa o te huaketo. Kua rite tonu te whakapae a te minita ā-rohe o Hainamana i te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho e ngana ana ki te nekeneke i ōna ake raruraru i te tau pōti. He nui ake ngā mate me ngā mate o te US i tētahi atu iwi.

title: Thames Garden Bridge halted for finance review
summary: Kua tū te mahi takatū i runga i te Arawhiti Māra i marohitia puta noa i te Awa o Thames kia taea ai e te Hōro Taone te arotake me pēhea te pūteatanga, kua puta.
text: Kua whakapuakina e te taone nui o Rānōna, a Sadiq Kani te tautoko mō te Arawhiti Māra, i tonoa tuatahitia i te tau 2012, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia whakatuwheratia i te tau 2018. Engari i kī hoki a ia e kore a ia e homai he moni tūmatanui anō ki tōna hanganga. Kāore anō kia tīmata te mahi hanga i runga i te piriti i waenganui i te Pēke ki te Tonga me te Temepara. Ko te nui o ngā moni tūmatanui e whakaratoa ana e te Tari Waka me te Hōro Taone hei āwhina ki te pūtea i te hanganga o te piriti e tū kē ana i te £60m. Heoi anō, kei te hiahia te taone nui ināianei ki te arotake i te tūnga pūtea o te piriti i muri i te rapu pūtea tāpiri e £3m mai i Transport for London (TfL). 'Kāore he moni tūmatanui' Ka whakamahia te moni hei āwhina ki te whakapai ake, me te whakakaha, i te teihana Ngongo i te Temepara i te taha raki o te Thames kia noho ai te hanganga piriti ki runga i te tuanui o te teihana. Ko te tikanga kia whakaaetia te pūtea tāpiri i tētahi komiti pūtea me te kaupapa here o TfL i te Paraire. The Garden Bridge Trust, which is behind construction of the bridge, said it would eventually provide the finance for the additional costs to make the improvements to the Tube station. I whakaūngia e tētahi kaikawe kōrero o Garden Bridge Trust kua hainatia e ia tētahi kirimana utu ki TfL, arā ko tētahi hōtaka utunga. I tāpiritia e rātau te utu tuatahi i runga i taua hōtaka i mahia i Hune. Ka kī te kaikōrero: "E hiahiatia ana e tēnei te whakawhirinaki ki te whakatutuki i ngā utu ki tētahi hōtaka utu kua whakaaetia ka pūteatia e ngā utu kaupapa katoa o te whakawhirinaki. Kāore he whakaritenga mō ētahi atu moni tūmatanui mō tēnei mahi." The trust said it was now working on securing planning permission ahead of construction work which is expected to start in July. I te wā o te pōtitanga o te taone nui, i whakapuakina e Tēnā Kani ngā māharahara mo nga whakaritenga moni mo te piriti. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te taone nui: "I whakaaetia tuatahitia e te taone nui ngā mahere hei whakarite i te teihana Ngongo o te Temepara mō te taenga mai o te Arawhiti Kāri e rua tau ki muri i te raumati o te tau 2014, engari i tukuna anake te whakamanatanga whakamutunga i Mati i tēnei tau, e rua marama i mua i te pōtitanga o te rangatiratanga. " Mai i tērā wā kua whakatārewatia tēnei mahi whakahohe, ā, i pūrongotia ki te komiti pūtea me te kaupapahere i tērā Paraire." "Kua mārama a Sadiq Kani kia kaua he moni tūmatanui hōu e tukua ki te Arawhiti Kāri, ā, kua tautohe ia kia nui ake te tuwhera me te pūataata o te kaupapa - ngā paerewa kāore i tutuki i ngā wā katoa i raro i te whakahaeretanga o mua."

title: Tūtuki Bedford: Ka whakaingoatia e ngā pirihimana ngā tāngata i mate i muri i te tūtukitanga o te motokā
summary: Tokorua nga kaiwaewae i mate i muri i te patua e te motokā i te mutunga wiki kua whakaingoatia e nga pirihimana.
text: I mate a John Manning, 66, mai i Bedford rāua ko Mark Varney, 65, mai i Linslade tata ki Leighton Buzzard, i waho o te whare o Bedford Sixth Form tata ki te 12:20 GMT i te Hātarei. Kua tukua tētahi tangata 32 tau i hopukina i runga i te whakapae i te mate i te taraiwa mōrearea. Kua tono nga Pirihimana o Bedfordshire kia haere mai nga kaiwhakaatu o te tūtukitanga. Kua hoatu e nga whānau o nga tūpāpaku he takoha ki a rātau i aroha ai i roto i nga kōrero i tukuna e te ope pirihimana. I kī te whānau o Tāne Manning ko te pāpā me te tipuna tāne he "tangata aroha, ngākau nui". "Kia ora ki te hunga i haere ki te tirohanga mo to atawhai - kua kawea mai he whakamarie nui ki to mātau whānau," ka kī rātau. I kī te whānau o Tēnā Varney he "tangata whānau atawhai, aroha hoki" i "tino hiahia ki te tūtaki i tana mokopuna tuatahi i roto i ngā wiki ruarua". Ka kī rātau: "Hei whānau, e tino whakararuraru ana mātau ki te tāhaetia ia i a mātau pēnei, ohorere, tino kino." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ko te kai paipa 'e tata ana ki te £1.1bn i te tau'
summary: Ko te utu o te kai paipa e tata ana ki te £1.1bn i te tau, kua kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau ārai kai paipa.
text: I whakaarohia e Ash Scotland ngā utu pēnei i te pānga ohaoha o te mate i takea mai i te kai paipa, tae atu ki te ngaro o te hua mā ngā kaimahi e mau ana i te kai paipa. I kī te aroha he rerekē te utu tūmatanui ki te £940m i whiwhi ai te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini i te tāke tupeka. E kī ana me whakanui ake te mahi tupeka, ā, me whakarewa te pūtea hei taupoki i ngā ratonga ārai kai paipa. I kī a Ash Scotland kua ngaro te hua nā ngā kaimahi i ngā wehenga kai paipa, te ngaro i waenganui i ngā kaipaipa me te huaputa ngaro nā te mate o mua, neke atu i te £692m. I kitea hoki tētahi utu tāpiri o te £60m i roto i te huaputa ngaro nā te mate o ngā tāngata e tūpono ana ki te auahi ringa tuarua i te kāinga. I whakaarohia hoki e te mātauranga ko te rongoā i ngā mate i takea mai i te kai paipa e utu ana i te NHS £271m. I tāpiritia he £34m anō i pau i te horoi i ngā parapara e pā ana ki te tupeka i nga tiriti, i te wā i purua te utu ahi i takea mai i te kai paipa i roto i ngā āhuatanga arumoni. 'Ngā utu nui' I kī te rangatira nui o te aroha, a Sheila Duffy, he "nui rawa te utu mo te kai paipa hei utu mō Pākehā". Ka kī a ia: "Ehara i te mea ko te kai paipa anake e whakararuraru ana i to tātau hauora, neke atu i te 13,300 ngā mate pakeke i ia tau me ngā mano o ētahi atu e pāngia ana e te mate e pā ana ki te kai paipa, he pānga kino hoki ki tō tātau whakahaerenga." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mā te pūkete i ngā utu NHS, ngā hinganga hua, te mate moata, ngā utu o ngā ahi e pā ana ki te kai paipa i roto i ngā āhuatanga arumoni, me te whakawātea i ngā paru e pā ana ki te kai paipa, ahakoa i runga i ngā whika tūturu i whakamahia, he utu tūturu o te whakamahinga tupeka ki te whakahaerenga o Pākehā o te £1.1bn. He utu tino nui tēnā ki a mātau." I kī a Ms Duffy he nui ake te utu o te kai paipa i te moni i whiwhia mai i ngā mahi tupeka, e kī ana: "E whakaaro ana te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini e whiwhi ana i te £940m i roto i te mahi tupeka, e waiho ana he iti rawa te £129m. "Kāore ngā moni whiwhinga e taupoki i ngā utu tupeka mō Pākehā, ā, kāore anō kia hoahoatia." I karangatia e te rangatira nui o Ash Scotland kia purua he moni ki roto i ngā ratonga hei āwhina i ngā kaipaipa kia whakamutua, ā, i kī hoki me whakanui ake te mahi tupeka. I tautohe a Ms Duffy: "Kua tae ki te wā ka mōhio tātau katoa ko te kai paipa he manga i runga i a tātau moni, ā, he utu ki a tātau katoa. " Me kaha ake tātau ki te mahi tupeka, te whakanui ake i te mahi i runga i te tupeka, te pupuri i ngā kamupene tupeka ki te pūkete, me te hiahia pūataata nui ake, ā, me haere tonu tātau ki te whakarato i ngā ratonga ārai me te whakamutu hei āwhina i ngā kaipaipa ki te whakamutu me te aukati i te tīmatanga o te rangatahi. "Koia anake te huarahi e taea ai e tātau te whakamutu i ngā utu nui o te tupeka ki tō tātau hauora tūmatanui me tō tātau whakahaerenga." I kī a Haimona Clark, ko te tumuaki o te rōpū kaipaipa o Forest: "Ahakoa he aha te kerēme a te umanga ārai kai paipa, he nui te koha moni a te hunga kaipaipa ki te mahi tupeka me te VAT. He mea pono tēnā. "Ehara te utu whakapae o te kai paipa i runga anō i ngā take, engari i runga anō i ngā matapae me ngā tatauranga e iti ana te hāngai ki te pono."

title: Kōtaha: Mario Monti
summary: He kaitohutohu mātauranga a Mario Monti, ā, i whakatūria hei pirimia o Itari i waenganui i te whakaari tōrangapū tiketike me te rangirua pūtea i te mutunga o te tau 2011.
text: I whakamāmātia e ia ngā mākete, ā, ka pana i ētahi whakahōu tere i mua i tana oma ki te ātete mai i ngā pokapū ohaoha me ngā rōpū tōrangapū. I muri iho i te neke atu i te kotahi tau i roto i te mahi, ka pānuitia e Tēnā Monti ka hīpae a ia i te wā i whakakapia e ia hei minita matua, a SilvioTahitahi, te tautoko a tana rōpū ki te kāwanatanga. I tana pānuitanga i tana tukunga iho i a Hakihea 2012 ka whakapuakina e ia "kua tutuki te mahi", kua taupoki i te raruraru nama o Itari. Engari te āhua nei kāore e taea e Tēnā Monti, e 69, te haere atu i te hūkere o ngā tōrangapū i Roma. E whakaarotia ana he kaiārahi, he mema matua rānei o tētahi tauwhāinga pūtahi hou i muri i te pōtitanga e haere mai ana i te wā o Hui tanguru 2013, ka kitea hoki ia hei kaitono ā muri ake mō te pou perehitini. I whānau a 'Super Mario' Mario Monti i te tau 1943, i te taone o Itari ki te raki o Varese, i te rohe rangatira o Lombardy. I ako a ia i te ohaoha i te Whare Wānanga o Bocconi i Milana, me Yale i Te Hononga o Amerika. I Yale, i ako a ia i raro i a Hemi Tobin, te kaihanga o te "tāke Tobin", e kiia ana hoki ko te "tāke a Robin Hood" - he tono ki te tāke i ngā tauwhitinga pūtea kia whakawhāiti ai i te taurangi. I whakaakona e ia te ohaoha i te Whare Wānanga o Turin mō te 15 tau i mua i tana hokinga ki Bocconi hei tumuaki i te tau 1984. I te tau 1994, i whakatūria ia ko te komihana EU mo te mākete me ngā ratonga o roto. I whakaingoatia a ia e TēnāTahitahi, kātahi ka mahi i tana wā tuatahi hei pirimia. I tana wā tuarua i te kōmihana (1999-2004) i whiwhi ai ia i te ingoa kāinga "Super Mario" mo tana mahi i ngā painga tāpui. I āraia e ia tētahi whakakotahitanga i waenganui i a General Electric me Honeywell, a, ka whawhai ki ngā pēke ā-rohe kaha o Tiamana. I whakarewaina hoki e ia tētahi kēhi ārai whirinaki ki a Microsoft mō tana paihere pūmanawa ororongo me te ataata. I te tau 2004, i whainatia e te EU a Microsoft 497m hōro (£325m) mō tāna i kī ai he tūkino i tōna tūnga mākete kaha. Ko te whakaurunga o Ūropi i whakaingoatia a Tēnā Monti mo tana wā tuarua i Pōroa e te Pirimia mauī o Massimo D'Alema. Engari i te tau 2004, kua hoki mai a TēnāTahitahi ki te mana. Kāore a ia i whakaae ki te whakahoki i te kaitohutohu kōrero ngohengohe mō tētahi wā anō. I te tau 2005, i whakatūria e Tēnā Monti te kura whakaaro o Pōroa, e tohunga ana ki te kaupapa o te ohaoha. I hoki a ia ki te Whare Wānanga o Bocconi, i tēnei wā hei perehitini. I te tau 2010, ko Tēnā Monti tētahi o ngā kaiwhakaū o tētahi mahi rangatira o Ūropi e mōhiotia ana ko te Rōpū Spinelli, e whai ana ki te whakatoko i te whakaurunga EU nui ake. Ko ētahi atu mema ko te perehitini kōmihana o mua, ko Pereke Delors, ko te minita ā-rohe o Tiamana, ko Joschka Fischer me te MEP Kākāriki, ko Daniel Cohn-Bendit. I tuhituhi hoki a ia i tētahi pūrongo mō Pōroa mō te wā heke mai o te mākete kotahi EU, i whakaputaina i te tau 2010. "He wheako tōna, ā, ko Uropi whānui, ko tētahi o ngā tuakiri Itari tino whakanui," te kī a Kiriata Fini, te kaikōrero o te ruma o raro o te pāremata o Itari. Ki a Tēnā Monti i huri ai te Perehitini Itari o Kiriata i te wā i whakarerea ai e TēnāTahitahi i Whiringa ā Rangi 2011, i te wā i whakaputua e ngā mākete pūtea te pēhanga ki Itari. I tere te oatitia a Tēnā Monti hei senator mo te ora, e whakaae ana i tana whakaingoatanga hei upoko o te kāwanatanga. I runga i te mana, ka haere wawe a ia ki te kaupapa o te ohaoha, tae atu ki te whakapiki i te pakeketanga o te whakatānga me ngā whakahōu hanganga. Engari i whakamākūkūtia ngā kaupapa here ā muri ake, ā, ka nui haere te whakaekenga a Tēnā Tahitahi me tana rōpū Tāngata o te Wāteatanga (PDL) i te āhua o te ohaoha o Tēnā Monti. I whakaaro a Tēnā Monti kia mahi tae noa ki Aperira 2013, e tūmanako ana ka whai wā ia ki te "whakaora i Itari i te whakangaromanga pūtea". Engari i te wā i kumea e TēnāTahitahi tana tautoko, he iti noa iho te kōwhiringa a Tēnā Monti i tua atu i te whakapuaki i tōna whakaaro kia whakarerea. Kāore e tūmanakohia kia toa a Tēnā Monti me tana toa pūtahi i te pōti, engari tērā pea ka tino nui rātau ki te whakarato i te Rōpū Manapori parirau mauī ki te nuinga o te whare o runga.

title: I whakamihi ngā kaihautū whutupōro i muri i te whakataetae a Brighton v Crystal Palace
summary: Kua whakamihitia ngā kaihautū whutupōro i te haurua whakamutunga o te Whakataetae i Aotearoa e ngā pirihimana mo te whakarongo ki ngā inoi a o rātau karapu kia noho i waho o te raruraru.
text: I ngaro a Brighton me Hove Albion i te 2-0 ki ngā tauwhāinga o Crystal Palace i te taiwhanga Amex i te pō o te Mane. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Sussex i mahia e rātau "he ringa hopunga" i mua, i muri hoki i te kēmu, e whakaatu ana ka taea e ngā taha e rua te hākinakina me te kore e heke ki te tutu. I kī a Ch Insp Paul Betts kaore he matapaki i waenganui i nga rōpū tauwhāinga. 'I whakaekea e te tuari' "He ruarua noa iho ngā mahi tūroro i muri i te taurite, engari te āhua nei ko te nuinga o ēnei i waenganui i ngā rōpū kaihautū matekiri. " Tae atu ki ngā hoa mahi Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi, i mahi hoki mātau ki te maha o ngā mahi i runga i ngā tereina papa e mahue ana i a Falmer ki ngā ahunga e rua," tana kī. E ono nga hopunga i mahia - e rima i te taiwhanga o Amex, kotahi i Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti, o Te Tiriti. I kī ngā pirihimana i roto i ēnei tētahi tangata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae ki te whakaeke i tētahi tuari taiwhanga Amex, ā, tokorua ngā tāngata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae i te tūkino me te waiata.

title: Ka whiwhi te whakawāteatanga whakamutunga o te Mana Whakataetae me te Mana Mākete o BT
summary: Kua whakawāteatia te whakawāteatanga whakamutunga a te Rōpū BT o te whatunga waea pūkoro EE e te Mana Whakataetae me ngā Mākete (CMA).
text: Ka huihuia mai e te mahi £12.5bn te umanga raina pūmau nui rawa o UK me te umanga pūkoro pūkoro nui rawa atu. I kī te CMA kāore e taea te tūkino i te whakataetae i te mea he "iti iho te pūkoro" me te EE he "kaitākaro iti" i roto i te aunui. Engari i kī te tauwhāinga o Tiwhione kei a ia tonu "ngā āwangawanga mākete whānui ake". Ka waihangatia e te take tētahi matua whakawhitiwhiti kōrero e kapi ana i ngā waea raina pūmau, aunui, pūkoro me te pouaka whakaata. I kī a John Wotton o te CMA: "Kāore te whakaaturanga e whakaatu ana tērā pea ka nui te tūkino o tēnei whakakotahitanga ki te whakataetae, ki ngā painga rānei o ngā kaihoko." I kī te rangatira nui o BT, a Gavin Patterson: "Ka noho te BT me te EE hei toa mamati mō te UK, e whakarato ana i ngā taumata pūtea penapena tiketike me te whakahaere i ngā mahi hou i roto i tētahi mākete tino whakataetae." Neke atu i te 88,000 ngā kaimahi o BT i ngā whenua e 61, me te 72,000 o ērā e mahi ana i te UK. E whakahaere ana i te 31% o te mākete aunui-pūmau o UK, e ai ki a Ofcom, ā, he 37.6% te tiri o te mākete mō ngā whakawhitinga waea kāinga o UK. Ka tāpiritia e te take te tiri mākete pūkoro 33.8% o EE ki te kōpaki a BT. Tātaritanga: Rory Cellan-Jones, korero hangarau o TE AO I tīmata i te tau 2014, engari ināianei kua tata te whakaoti i te hanga anō o te whenua pūkoro o UK. Ko BT me EE, me ngā kiritaki e 35 miriona i waenganui i a rāua, he tōpana whakaharahara puta noa i ngā mākete aunui pūmau, pūkoro hoki e tino nui ana ki te oranga o te ohaoha o Ingarangi. He kaha rawa, e kī ana ngā tauwhāinga, me te tuatoru o ia mākete - engari kāore te Mana Whakataetae me ngā Mākete o UK i whakaae. Ko tērā atu wāhanga i roto i te jigsaw ko te tango i whakaritea o O2 e Hutchison, rangatira o Toru, ka waiho te UK me ngā pūpāpāho pūkoro nui e toru. Kei te ringa tēnā o Pōroa, engari kua uaua te mahi a te CMA kia rangona tōna reo - ā, he uaua ki te kite he aha tēnei take e āraia ai ināianei kua puta te whakakotahitanga BT/EE. Engari kotahi anō te wā mō ngā rōpū tauwhāinga me ngā rōpū kiritaki ki te whakatū i tēnei whakatōpūtanga. Kei te tata te kaiwhakarite Ofcom ki tana whakataunga i runga i te hanga o te mākete pūkoro UK katoa - tae atu ki te pātai matua mēnā me whakaweto te wehenga Openreach a BT, e whakahaere ana i te whatunga aunui. Kua whakaaturia e te rangatira o Ofcom, a Sharon White, ehara te kōwhiringa tūnga i tana kōwhiringa manakohia. I te mutunga o Hānuere, engari kua whakahokia ināianei tae noa ki te mutunga o Hui tanguru. Tērā pea me mahi tonu a Ofcom mēnā kei te huihui mai tēnei jigsaw ki te whakaputa i tētahi pikitia ātaahua mō ngā kaihoko. I pānuitia tuatahitia te whiwhinga EE a BT i te wā o Hui tanguru i tērā tau, ā, i whakaaetia taurangitia e te CMA te whakakotahitanga i Whiringahora i tērā tau. I taua wā, ka karangatia e ngā tauwhāinga o TalkTalk me Tiwhione ki ngā mana whakataetae kia whakahaua a BT kia hurihuri i tana mahi Openreach. I a ia e urupare ana ki te pānuitanga CMA o te Paraire, ka kī a Tiwhione: "Kei te arotake katoa mātou i te tuhinga a te CMA. " E ai ki ngā kōrero i mua, e whakapono ana mātou he mea tika kia āta tirohia e Ofcom i roto i tana Arotakenga Whakawhitiwhiti Mamati ngā āwangawanga mākete whānui ake e pā ana ki BT Openreach i whakaarahia e ngā rōpū maha, ā, e mōhiotia ana e te CMA." Kei te pupuri a Openreach i te whatunga taura whakawhitiwhiti kapa me te muka o UK. I a Hōngongoi, ka tīmata te kaiwhakahaere o Ofcom ki te tirotiro mēnā me wehe a BT me Openreach. I waihangatia a BT Openreach i te 10 tau ki muri me te tuku āheitanga ki ngā tauwhāinga ki tōna whatunga waea me te aunui i runga i ngā whakaritenga ōrite. I āwangawanga a Ofcom he iti noa iho te mahinga a Openreach mō aua kaiwhakarato. I kī te tūpono purei-tapawhā o Rukshan Mehra, he tohunga pūkoro i Enders Analysis, kāore e taea te whakakore katoa i te Openreach mai i BT, engari kāore e taea te noho ōrite tonu te tūnga kōrero. I tāpiritia e ia mā te take e paheko te umanga anake ki tētahi whatunga aunui tere rawa o te motu, BT, me te kamupene anake whai whatunga pūkoro 4G puta noa i te motu, EE. I kī a Ms Mehra ko te whiwhinga a BT he "tūpono kaha" i runga i te purei-tapawhā - e hokona ai e ngā kamupene ngā ratonga waea raina pūmau, pūkoro, ipurangi me ngā ratonga pouaka whakaata hei mōkī kotahi. Kei te hokona kētia e Virgin Media me TalkTalk tēnā momo pōkai, ā, kei te neke hoki a Tiwhione me Sky ki tērā ahunga, ka tāpiritia e ia.

title: Kua whakaingoatia e Dr Paul Stephenson te whakangungu o Bristol ki tōna hōnore
summary: Ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakahauhau motika tūmatanui o UK he tereina i tapaina ki tōna hōnore.
text: I whakaritea e Dr Paul Stephenson te whakapōhēhētanga pahi o Bristol i te tau 1960, nāna i tahuri te ārai i ngā tāngata o te iwi iti e mahi ana i runga i ngā pahi i te taone. Ko te Rerewhenua Nui ki te Uru, nāna i kī e hiahia ana ki te mōhio ki tōna ngākau tūturu ki ngā mana tūmatanui, i tū he hui whakaingoa i te teihana Meads o te Temepara o Bristol. I kī a Dr Stephenson, e 83, he "tohu whakamīharo". "E tino whakahīhī ana ahau ki te whakaarotia e GWR hei tētahi o ōna Uru Nui," tana tāpiri mai. "He tino hira te hītori mō te mōhio ko wai tātau, he aha te mea e pā ana ki a tātau i tēnei rā, ā, kei hea tā mātou kitenga mō āpōpō. " He tino nui te pupuri i tō tātau hītori me te tirotiro anō i ētahi wā kia mārama ake ai tātau ki tō tātau wā me tō tātau mōhiotanga ki tō tātau momo tangata." Neke atu i te 60 tau a Dr Stephenson, ko tōna ingoa ka āhuahira i runga i te 800036 tereina o GWR, e whakahauhau ana mō te hapori o Awherika-Kāriana o Ingarangi. Ko wai a Dr Paul Stephenson? Ko te tama a tētahi pāpā o Awherika me te whaea mā o Ingarangi, i tae mai ia ki Bristol i te tau 1962. I whakatūria e ia he whakapōhēhē i te Kamupene Omnibus o Bristol, i muri iho ka mutu tana kaupapa whakahāwea. He taonga nui ana whakahau ki te whakatū i te huarahi mo te Ture Whanaungatanga Iwi tuatahi i te tau 1965. I te tau 1992, i āwhina hoki ia ki te whakatatū i te Bristol Black Archives Partnership, e tiaki ana, e whakatoko ana i te hītori o ngā tāngata o Awherika-Kāriana i te taone. I te tau 2009 ka meinga ia hei OBE mō ana ratonga ki ngā wāhi ōrite me ngā pānga hapori. I whakaingoatia ia mō te whakaingoatanga tereina e te iwi whānui me ngā kaimahi hei wāhanga o te whakahau a GWR Great Westerners, e mōhio ana ki ngā "toa" o mua, o nāianei hoki mai i tua o te whatunga. I kī te tūru tahi o te whatunga Reach a GWR (E mōhio ana ki te Ethnicity and Cultural Heritage), a Jean Cook, i te "toa me te manawa nui i whakarerekē ai te āhua o tātau katoa e noho ana mō te pai ake". "Hei whatunga kaimahi Āhia Pango i roto i te GWR, i hiahia a Reach ki te mōhio ki tōna kaha roa ki te tukituki i ngā taunahua ki te ōritetanga, te whakauru me te whakaaturanga i te wāhi mahi." Whāia a BBC West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: bristol@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka tapahia e Debenhams ētahi atu mahi e 2,500 i waenganui i te taiepa
summary: E kī ana te rōpū pātaka tari e raruraru ana a Debenhams ka tapahia e ia ētahi atu mahi e 2,500 i a ia e uaua ana ki te ora i te taiepa coronavirus.
text: Kei runga tēnei i te 4,000 i pānuitia mai i Me, ko te tikanga ka tapahia e te kaihoko te tuatoru o ana kaimahi. Ko te nuinga o ngā tapahi puta noa i ōna pātaka UK me te pokapū tuari, engari i kī kāore he toa hou i whakaritea kia kati. I riri te urupare a te uniana o nga kaimahi toa o Usdaw ki te rongo, e kī ana kāore anō kia whaia ngā tikanga ā-ture. Na te ture, me herea ngā whakahōutanga maha ki tētahi wā whakaritenga. I kī a Usdaw e whakarite ana i tētahi wero ā-ture mō ngā mema e pāngia ana. "Kua whakapā mai ki a mātau e ngā mema e kī ana kei te whakakorea rātou e te waea hui, kāore he whakaaro whai tikanga, he wā pānui tika rānei, e hiahiatia ana e te ture," te kī a te āpiha ā iwi o Te Kotahitanga, a Dave Gill. "He huarahi whakarihariha tēnā ki te tiaki i ngā kaimahi." 'Ngā whakataunga uaua' i whakapeka a Debenhams, e whakahaeretia ana i tēnei wā, ki te kōrero, engari i kī ōna kaiwhakahaere, FRP, kāore i taea te whakaaro i te mea kua kore te kaihoko, ā, he kōwhiringa "whāiti". I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Kāore te hunga e pāngia ana e te whakahōutanga e whiwhi i tētahi whakamarietanga mai i tēnei, engari ko ngā hipanga i mahia he urupare ki tētahi taiao tauhokohoko tē mōhiotia, uaua hoki, ā, ka whai kia whakaū i te kaha o te umanga, me te whakatutuki hoki i ngā here ā-ture whānui ake." I Aperira, i hinga a Debenhams ki te whakahaere mo te tuarua o nga wa i roto i te tau i te kaha o te coronavirus ki te umanga. I kī te umanga ko te taiao tauhokohoko o nāianei mō ngā kaihoko he "tawhiti tonu i te hokinga ki te pūnoa". He pēhea tō pānga ki ngā ngaronga mahi i Debenhams? Kōrero mai ki a mātou mō ō wheako mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, e kī ana e 20 o ōna pātaka ka kati pūmau tonu nā te pānga o te taiepa. I kī a Debenhams i te Tūrei: "He maha nga kaihoko e mahi ana i aua whakataunga uaua i tēnei wā, ā, ka haere tonu mātou ki te mahi i ngā hipanga katoa e tika ana kia whai wāhi ai a Debenhams ki tētahi wā whai hua. " Me mātua whakarite mātou e hāngai ana ā mātou utu pātaka ki ngā tūmanako tūturu," kua tāpirihia. I kī te mekameka kua whakamōhiotia ngā tāngata e pāngia ana, ā, kua mihi ki a rātau mo a rātau "ratonga me te tukutahi". "Kua tutuki pai tā mātou whakatuwhera anō i ngā pātaka 124 i muri i te raka, ā, kei te hokohoko ēnei i mua i ngā tūmanako whakahaere," tana kī. Ka taea e ngā whakahōutanga hokohoko a Debenhams te noho ki te whakahaere mō te toenga o tēnei tau, i te mea e tatari ana ngā kaituku moni kia kite me pēhea te mahi i muri i te raka, i te wā tauhokohoko nui o te Kirihimete. Pēnei i te nuinga o ōna tauwhāinga, kua mate kē te kaihoko i mua i te mate urutā ki te whakatārewa i te tauhokohoko i ōna pātaka tari. I puta mai ngā rongo o ngā mutunga mahi hou i muri i te kī a te British Retail Consortium kei te tino heke tonu te maha o ngā toronga ki Ngā Tiriti Tiketike i te wā e hokohoko tuihono kē ana te tangata. I kii te BRC kei te raru tonu etahi kaihoko na te mate coronavirus. I karangatia e ia he karanga hou mo te āwhina a te kāwanatanga ki nga reti. Kua pānuitia hoki e ētahi atu ingoa o High Street ngā hinganga mahi i a rātau e whawhai ana kia noho mānu tonu. I tērā wiki, i kī a WH Smith e tapahi ana i ngā mahi 1,500 - 11% o ana kaimahi - i muri i te raka i heke ai ngā hoko. Ko DW Sports, John Lewis, Marks and Spencer, Boots me Selfridges i waenganui i ētahi atu ingoa nunui hei whakapuaki i ngā whakahōutanga. He iti iho i te rua wiki ki Aotearoa, ā, neke atu i te 10,000 ngā mahi kua ngaro i te tīmatanga o te kaupapa whakawātea. Anei tētahi rārangi o ētahi kaitukumahi matua kua pānui ka haere ngā mahi, kei te mōrearea rānei, mai i te tīmatanga o te taiepa. 11 o Aotearoa: Debenhams - 2,500 7 o Aotearoa: Paerewa Ahiahi - 115 6 o Aotearoa: Travelex - title: Ka taea te whakaoti i te kōhuru a Paul Savage Mold e kī ana te kaitirotiro
summary: E whakapono tonu ana tētahi pirihimana matua o mua nāna i āwhina ki te tūhura i te kōhurutanga o tētahi poutāpeta i Flintshire, ka taea te whakaoti i te kēhi 10 tau.
text: E whakapono ana te kaiwhakahaere matua o te kaitirotiro o Pirihi Corcoran e mōhio ana ētahi tāngata i Mold nā wai i patu a Paora Savage. I patua te pāpā o tētahi Tāne Savage, e 30, ki te rākau rākau i a ia e haere ana i Clayton Road i te 4 o Hui tanguru, 2003, a, ka mate i te hōhipera. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki kei te tuwhera tonu te kēhi. Ahakoa he utu £100,000, kāore anō kia mau te kaipatu, ngā kaipatu rānei. I te tau 2005, ka kī ngā pirihimana o Te Raki o Uēra e mōhio ana rātau he aha te kaupapa, engari kāore i rite ki te tuku i ngā taipitopito. A, i te tau 2010, ka haere anō ngā āpiha ki te tūhuratanga, ā, ka puta te uiui ki tētahi rapunga hou o ngā āpure e tata ana ki te tirohanga kōhuru me ngā tūemi hōu e whai ana i ngā whakamātautau ā-ture. Ināianei i te huritau 10 o te kōhuru, ka kī a Tēnā Corcoran "me whakaoti" te kēhi mō te whānau o Tāne Savage. "E whakapono tonu ana ahau ko te whakautu ki te whakaoti i te kōhuru e takoto ana i Mold me te iwi paetata," tana kī. "Tekau tau ki muri, e whakaaro ana ahau kua pakeke ētahi o ngā kaiwhakaatu taitamariki ki te pakeke ināianei, ā, ka taea e rātou ake te whakatau mēnā ka haere mai ki mua, kāore rānei." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He whakaaro ki te hapori paetata i Mold, me whakaoti tēnei. " Me noho tētahi mea i mua, ehara i te mea e auau tonu ana i ia tau." I pātai mai mehemea i whakaaro a ia he āhuatanga tūturu tonu te whakaoti i te kōhuru i te tekau tau i muri iho, ka kī a ia: "E whakaaro ana ahau. " Kei ētahi tāngata o te hapori te whakautu. E mōhio ana rātau ki ngā mea kua haere. E mōhio ana rātau ki ngā tāngata e pā ana." Ka karanga a ia ki tētahi tangata whai mōhiohio "kia kaha rawa" kia haere mai ki mua. I kōrero te whaea o Tāne Savage, a June White, ki te nūpepa o Ia Rā me pēhea tana hiahia ki te "whai i tōku rā i te kōti". Ka kī a ia: "Ka ora ahau mo tēnei whakapae. E tūmanako ana ahau kia kitea. "E whakaaro ana ahau ki te kēhi o Stephen Lawrence - e 20 tau e tatari ana tōna whaea. E hiahia ana ahau ki te whai i tōku rā i te kōti. Ko ngā mea katoa i ora ai ahau mō ngā tau e 10 kua hipa." I kī a ia e "tūmanako tonu ana ka haere mai tētahi ki mua". I mahue i a Tēnā Savage he wahine, ko Charlotte rāua ko tana tamāhine ko Reagan, e whā ōna tau i tōna matenga. I kī a Ms White kua tata ki te 15 tana mokopuna ināianei, ka tāpiri: "He tino mātauranga a ia. Kaore au e mau mai i ngā mea. Kāore a ia i te maumahara, ā, kāore au e whakamahara ki a ia. "E whā me te hāwhe noa iho a ia e haere mai ana ki te rima i taua wā. Kaore a ia i mahara. He tino roa a ia pēnei i a ia, kei a ia tōna ngahau me te nui o ana tikanga."

title: Kate Middleton: Ko te āhua o te ariki o Corby ko Heidi Agan 'hapū'
summary: Ko tētahi kaimahi o mua nāna i whakawhiti tana mahi £6 ia haora kia noho hei āhua o Duchess of Cambridge e £650 mō ia āhua, kua "hapu" kia mau tonu ai te tika.
text: Nā Martin BarberBBC News Heidi Agan, e 32, ināianei he "tuki i hangaia i roto i ngā rahi maha", tana kī. I whakamutua e te whaea takitahi o te tokorua mai i Corby, Northamptonshire tana mahi i tētahi wharekai Kettering i tērā Me i muri i te kīanga auau a ngā kiritaki he rite a ia ki a Kate Middleton. Ināianei e haere ana a ia puta noa i te UK, puta noa i te ao ki te āhua hei doppelganger ariki. "He uaua te mahi i te 12 tau o tētahi mea e mōhio ana koe, kātahi ka peke ki tētahi umanga e hoatu ana ki tētahi ringa me te tango i tētahi atu, engari kei te tino hari ahau, ā, kei te manaakitia ahau," tana kī. 'Kinitia koe anō' Mai i te pānuitanga a te Ariki me te Ariki o Kemipia i ta rāua pēpi e haere mai nei, kua rite a Ms Agan ki te puta mai i te tamaiti. "I a Keiti e tipu ana, ka pēnei hoki ahau - kia tūturu i whakaaro ahau he mea hira," tana kī. "He uaua i tēnei wā i te mea kāore anō a ia kia nui rawa ki te huri i tōna kākahu kākahu katoa nā reira he uaua ki te kite me pēhea tana kākahu." Mai i te wā i tūpono ai a Ms Agan i te pouaka whakaata, reo irirangi, rangatōpū me te nūpepa hei rangatira. "I mahia e au te Whakaaturanga a Alan Titchmarsh, ā, i ngā wāhi katoa i huri ai koe, he tangata rongonui anō, " tana kī. " Me kini noa koe i a koe anō i te mea kāore au e whakapono kua puta. "He rite tonu i Niu Ioka. I haere ahau ki Times Square me Good Morning America, ā, i kawea ahau me te haumarutanga. "He mea noa iho tēnei kāore au i whakaaro ka pā mai ki a au, engari kua puta ko te mea tino whakamīharo rawa atu." Ka whai a Ms Agan i ngā rongo pāpāho pāpori mō Keiti Middleton kia ōrite ai tōna ake kākahu ki te ariki, me te whakaharatau i "tōna āhua" i ia rā. Whānau 'whakahīhī' "Ko ngā hū tino utu nui kua hokona e au i a Keiti e tata ana ki te £200, tata ki te £300 te kākahu - ki taku whakaaro ehara i te mea kino ki te whakaaro ko tana kākahu mārena ahiahi taketake a Alexander McQueen ka tekau mano pauna. " Me whiwhi tika ahau i ngā kākahu, i ngā āhuatanga, i tana tūnga me tana tauwhiti ki a William. He tino hira katoa ngā mea pēnei mēnā e hiahia ana ahau kia tino pai rawa atu." I kī a Ms Agan e "whakakake" ana tamariki, e 11 me te whā te pakeke, ki tāna e mahi nei. "It's just been incredible and I feel so blessed with it and without the support of my family I just couldn't do it," she said. "Nā te puta mai i a Kate i whai wāhi ai ahau ki te whakapau wā anō me aku tamariki ake i te mahi i taku mahi waitressing, ā, he utu nui tēnā." Engari kāore a ia i pai ki te tātuhi ko wai i kitea e ia he tino ātaahua i waenganui i nga tuakana ariki. "Kāore au i te whakaaro ko William, ko Harry rānei tōku momo, he roa rawa rāua... He nui tēnā whakawhanaunga?," tana kī. I kitea ngā tāngata i Corby ki tētahi "āhua ariki" i te Hātarei i te putanga mai o Ms Agan mō tētahi takahanga i te Tiriti Kaporeihana o te taone.

title: E pana ana nga kairiri o Te Rangitahi ki te pūmatua o Helmand, o Lashkar Gah
summary: Kua whakarewaina e te Huinga o Pūkeirangi tētahi whakaekenga nui ki te taone nui o Lashkar Gah.
text: Ko te taone e 200,000 tāngata te pūmatua o te kawanatanga o Helmand, ko ētahi wāhanga kua hopukina e te rōpū toa. Ko te whakaekenga hou ta rātau pana tino kōnohete ki roto i te taone, i te tonga o te whenua. Neke atu i te 14 nga tāngata i patua e te kaiwhakatūtū tūruhi i Lashkar Gah i te Mane. tae atu ki ngā pirihimana 10. Ko te taone te tirohanga o te whawhai taumaha i waenganui i nga ope a te Huinga me te NATO i mua i to rātau putanga mai i te tau 2014. E kiia ana kua riro i nga ope tinihanga a Bolan, he wāhi e tata ana ki te pokapū o te taone, ā, e kiia ana hoki kia whakahaere i a Nawa, e kiia ana ko te waharoa ki Lashkar Gah. Ka kī atu tētahi pāremata paetata ki te AO e rua kiromita o te pānga o te kāwana. Heoi anō, i whakakāhore tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga porowini e whakataetaetia ana ngā wāhi e tata ana ki te pokapū o te taone. I kī ngā āpiha kua whakahokia ngā kairiri ki ngā pātiki o te taone. E hia mano nga tāngata i rere i a Helmand i a Aotearoa i te whakanuitanga o nga kairiri o Te Rangitahi i a rātau ngohe, me te tokomaha e whakaruru ana i Lashkar Gah. Kua katia e nga mana te taunga rererangi i te wā e haere tonu ana te whawhai. Ko te kawanatanga o Helmand he rohe pāmu mōmona, he pokapū mo te whakanao opium, e rohe ana ki Pakitāne i tētahi pito, ā, e taupoki ana i ngā ara nui i waenganui i ngā tāone. E kitea ana a Lashkar Gah hei kī ki te pupuri i te kawanatanga katoa, ā, ka tohu i tētahi wikitōria nui mo te Huinga. I kī te korero kōrero o Āhia ki te Tonga, a Jill McGivering, ko te hinganga o te taone he "mōrearea tohu" mō ngā ope kāwanatanga me te iwi ao whānui. "Mō ngā tau kotahi tekau mā rima kua taha, kua puritia a Lashkar Gah e te uru hei tūru haumaru, pare o te kāwanatanga - he arotahi mo te whanaketanga o te ao whānui, he rākau i roto i te pakanga mo te ngākau me te hinengaro," tana kī. "E ai ki tōna uara whakatūpato, kāore e taea e te kāwanatanga me ōna kaitautoko te ngaro."

title: Ko nga wāhine i whara i te whakaeke moata
summary: Tokorua nga wāhine i pāngia he whara i roto i nga whakaekenga moata e rua i te ahiahi o te Paraire i tētahi kāinga i te takiwā o Anuradhapura.
text: I whakapaea e nga pirihimana o Weli Oya te Hāwhe Tamila ki te whakarewa i te whakaekenga i te kāinga o Athavetunuwewa mai i te Raina Whakamua Whakamua (FDL). I whakawhitia a Karunawathie, e 58, me Niranata, e 25 ki te hōhipera Ahuwhānui o Anuradhapura i muri i te mahinga tuatahi i te hōhipera o Padaviya. Ka kī atu nga pūtake o te hōhipera ki te kairīpoata o Athula Kota, he tino nui te āhua o Karunawathie. Tokorua ētahi atu wāhine i pāngia he whara i te kāinga o Athavetunuwewa i roto i ngā whakaekenga moata e rua i te ahiahi o te Rātapu. I kī a Ranawana Dhamminda thero, te upoko o te temepara o Sri Udumbararama, e huna ana nga kōinga i roto i nga pokapū i hangaia e rātau anō i muri i te whakaekenga tuarua.

title: Ka whakanuia e ngā pane kuini a Alderney te koroneihana o Kuini
summary: Kei te tukua tētahi huinga motuhake o ngā pane kuini o Alderney hei whakanui i te 60 tau mai i te koroneihana o Te Kuini.
text: I kī a Dawn Gallienne, te upoko o te philatelic i Guernsey Post, ko te ariā i muri i te huinga ko te kōrero o te koroneihana i te 2 o Pipiri 1953. "Ko ngā atahanga i tīpakohia e whakaatu ana i te whakahīhī me te hākari o tēnei wā motuhake," tana kī. I whakaputaina he huinga pane kuini o Guernsey mo nga hākari Hīupiri o tērā tau. Ka tukua te huinga hou i tēnei wiki. Ko ngā whakaahua i kōwhiria ko Tōna Nui e menemene ana ki te huihuinga mai i tētahi waka ariki, te hui i te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi, me te Kuini e noho ana mō te whakaahua o te kāwanatanga tika, e mau ana i tōna orb me te momo, me te mau i te Karauna o te Kāwanatanga o te Emepaea. Kua whakaaturia e ngā Moutere o Channel te pono ki te Karauna Ingarihi mai i te wā i noho ai a William the Conqueror, te Duke of Normandy, hei Kīngi i muri i te wikitoria i te Pakanga o Hastings i te tau 1066.

title: E toru haora tōmuri te tae mai o te tereina hōu o Caledonian Sleeper
summary: E toru haora tōmuri i muri i te tohu i ngā raruraru i runga i te raina, ka tae mai ngā pāhihi i runga i te tuatahi o ngā tereina Sleeper Caledonian hou mai i Pākehā ki Rānana.
text: I takawaretia hoki te ratonga ki te raki ki Glasgow me Etinitini i muri i te pānga ki ngā mea i kīia e ngā tohutūmahi a Serco ko "ngā raruraru niho". I pā mai te take tohu i Carstairs, ā, kāore te tereina i tae ki London Euston tae noa ki te 10:30. Kua whakapārewa a Serco ki ngā kiritaki, ā, ka tukuna he whakahokinga moni katoa ki a rātou. E kī ana ka mahi tahi me Network Rail kia kite he aha i puta ai ngā take. Ko ngā ratonga tīmata o te pō Rātapu he wāhanga o tētahi "whakarewa ngohengohe" o te marama o ngā tereina hou e £150m. I kī te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Caledonian Sleeper, a Ryan Flaherty: "I whakaritea e mātou ngā mea katoa inapō engari ko tētahi o aua mea i waho i to mātau mana. " E mārama ana i tino pouri mātau ki ngā manuhiri i pāngia, ā, ka tae tōmuri rātau ki tō rātou ūnga i te ata nei. "But actually we are very pleased with how the new trains operated and we've had some really nice feedback, particularly from some of our regular guests, who were enjoying the new facilities." I te whakaaturanga a Serco i ōna tereina hou i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka kī ngā pāhihi ka noho pō i roto i "tētahi hōtēra i runga wīra". Ko ngā waka hou e 75 e tuku ana i ngā rūma rua mō te wā tuatahi. E 484 ngā rūma e wātea ana, i te tuatahi i te ara Lowlander i waenganui i Rānana me Glasgow/Edinburgh. Ka whaia rātau e tētahi ara Highlander i waenganui i Rānana me Aberdeen, Inverness me Fort William. Kua pūteatia ngā tereina e ngā pūtea pūtea mai i ngā kāwanatanga o Pākehā me UK. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Flaherty: "I mōhio tonu mātou ka puta ake ētahi niggles i a mātau e whakatakoto ana i ngā tereina ki te ratonga, ā, kua mahi mātou ki aua mea i te pō. " Mō te nuinga o te iwi inapō, he wheako pai tērā."

title: Harry Potter: He pēhea te whakamīharo a te ruānuku tama i te ao
summary: E whakapono ana koe kua 20 tau mai i te tānga o Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone?
text: Na Tim MastersEntertainment korero a Joanne Rowling, e mōhiotia ana i taua wā, i moemoeā i te pūrākau o te ruānuku taitama i runga i tētahi haerenga tereina i waenganui i Rāwāhi me Manchester. I oti i a ia te tuhinga i te tau 1995, ka tuhituhi i te nuinga o taua mea i roto i ngā wharekai i Etinitini i te wā e moe ana tana pēpi mai i tana mārena tuatahi i roto i te waka whakangungu. I muri i te maha o ngā whakakāhoretanga, i te mutunga ka tīkina te tuhinga e Bloomsbury. E 500 noa iho ngā tārua o te tānga mārō tuatahi, i puta mai i te 26 o Pipiri 1997. Kātahi ka puta mai tētahi mea mīharo. Ko taua pukapuka tuatahi - me ngā pukapuka e ono i muri mai - i hokona neke atu i te 450 miriona ngā tārua puta noa i te ao. Anei tētahi tirohanga ki ngā huarahi maha i tātaki ai te tītohunga o Harry Potter i runga i te whenua ahurea i roto i te rua tekau tau. Ka pānui ngā tamariki (me ngā pakeke) i te pai, nā reira he roa te wā i mua i a Harry Potter. Engari i huri a JK Rowling i te whakapaunga pukapuka, otirā mō ngā tamariki, ki tētahi mea e tata ana ki te tūkinotanga. Kei te hiahia whakatika koe? I te tau 1999, i te 3.45pm te putanga o Harry Potter me te Herehere o Azkaban i te tau 1999 hei ārai i ngā tamariki i Ingarangi me Uēra kia tīpoka i te kura ki te tiki i tā rātou kape. I tino nui ngā pukapuka o muri mai, engari kāore i aukati i ngā tamariki ki te kai i a rātou. I māia hoki ngā pakeke, me ngā pukapuka e tukua ana i roto i ngā uhi ratarata pakeke. I te putanga mai o te pukapuka tuawhā o Goblet of Fire i te tau 2000, ka huihui ngā kaihoko pukapuka puta noa i te ao ki te taururuku i te whakarewatanga tuatahi o waenganui pō. I te whiwhinga o Rowling i tētahi tohu hōnore i te Whare Wānanga o Hato Anaru i taua tau anō, ka kī te whare wānanga o Pirihitini kua kitea e ia ko ngā pukapuka tamariki "e āhei tonu ana ki te hopu me te whakamīharo i te hunga tino nui, ahakoa ngā āhuatanga tauwhāinga o te pouaka whakaata, Nintendo, Gameboy me Pokemon". I whiwhi hoki ngā tāngata e tuhi ana i ngā pukapuka a Harry Potter ki te whakatuwhera i te huarahi ki te katoa o ngā pakiwaitara moemoeā taitamariki. He maha ngā pukapuka i whakaputaina i runga i te tūmanako ko rātou "te Harry Potter panuku", pēnei i a Artemis Fowl, The Spiderwick Chronicles me A Series of Unfortunate Events. Tērā pea ka whai rangatū tuhituhi pēnei i ngā pukapuka Twilight me The Hunger Games me te kore a Potter e waiho te huarahi? Kaua hoki e wareware ki te pakiwaitara pakiwaitara. Kei te kōpikopiko te ipurangi i te tekau mano o ngā pūrākau āmio kore mana mō te oranga i Hogwarts, The Dursleys me ngā mea e piki ake ana ngā māhanga Weasley i ngā hākari. He whakatūpato ki te hunga pākiki: ko ētahi he NSFW. I whakangāwari katoa mātau ki ngā tereina Mō tētahi whakatupuranga tamariki i whakaarahia i runga i a Thomas the Tank Engine me The Polar Express, ohorere ana he tereina waka hou mōhinuhinu i roto i te wharau mīhini. Āe, te Hogwarts Express. Kāore he haerenga ki te Teihana Rīpeka o Kingi i Rāwāhi e oti ana me te kore kiriāhua i runga i te Pūhara Iwa me te Toru-Hauwhā. I whakaurua e ia ngā kupu hōu ki te papakupu Ko te nuinga o ngā kupu me noho mō te 10 tau i mua i te whakaarotanga mō te Oxford English Dictionary, engari ko te kupu a JK Rowling "muggle" - i tīmata i roto i te Kohatu Philosopher - he okotahi. I tāpiritia ki te OED i roto i te iti iho i te haurua o te wā pūnoa, i puta mai i te tau 2002 hei "tangata kāore i a ia tētahi pūkenga, pūkenga rānei, e whakaarotia ana rānei he iti iho i tētahi ara". I te ao o Harry Potter, ko te muggle he tangata kaore he mana makutu. E whakapae ana mātau ko Crumple-Horned Snorkack - he mea mahara māhorahora i Huitene - ka roa ake pea te mahi ki roto i te rārangi kupu muggle. I waihangatia e ia tētahi hākinakina hou i roto i ngā pukapuka, he tākaro mīharo a Quidditch e purei ana i runga i ngā puruma rere, ā, kei roto ko ngā pupuhi, ngā quaffles me te snitch koura - he pōro iti me ngā parirau. I te ao tūturu, ko te Quidditch he tākaro kāore i te mīharo e purei ana i runga i ngā puruma, ā, kei roto ko ngā pūkoro, ngā quaffles me te snitch koura - he tangata i roto i tētahi hāte kōwhai me te hiku Velcro e mau ana ki tō rātou tarau poto. I tīmata i te US huri noa i te tau 2005, ā, kua noho hei tākaro huri noa me tōna ake tinana whakahaere. Ka tū te Kapu o te Ao Quidditch i ia tau, ā, i toa i tērā tau e Ahitereiria. I whakaputaina e ia tētahi o ngā māngai kiriata nui rawa o te ao tae noa ki nā tata nei, ko ngā kiriata Harry Potter e waru te māngai kiriata nui rawa atu i roto i te hītori, nāna i mau mai he $7.7bn (£6.1bn) puta noa i te ao. Ko te kiriata tuatahi o Harry Potter - Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (e mōhiotia ana ko te Kohatu Makutu i Amerika ki te Raki) - i tukua i Whiringa 2001. Tae atu ki te whati i ngā pūkete pouaka tere ake i te haerenga i runga i te Pahi Naiti, ka whakamōhiotia hoki e ia te taitamariki o Daniel Radcliffe, a Emma Watson me Rupert Grint ki te ao. Ko te pikitia whakamutunga, ko Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 (2011) te tino nui rawa o ngā kiriata Potter katoa i te $1.34bn. Ko te kiriata tino nui rawa tēnei o ngā wā katoa. Kua haere tonu te māngai - e mōhiotia ana ināianei ko te Ao Ruānuku a JK Rowling - ki te hurihuri i ngā Kararehe Mīharo me te Wāhi e Kitea ai (2016). Ā, he maha atu anō ngā mea e haere mai ana. Kua kī a Rowling kua whakaritea e ia he hōtuhi mō te tapeke o ngā whitiāhua Kararehe Mīharo e rima. I whakatuwheratia hoki e Harry Potter me te Tamaiti Kanga i Rāwāhi i te tau 2016 ki te momo Pottermania ōrite e karapoti ana i te putanga o ngā pukapuka me ngā pikitia. E 1,500 ngā kaihautū i te mahinga tuatahi, he tokomaha i kākahu hei mākutu me ngā ruānuku, i pupuhi i ngā momo whakakitenga tā me ngā whakaaro o te atamira. Ka tīmata te tākaro wāhanga rua ki a Harry, Ron rāua ko Hermione i te waenganui o te 30 tau i a rātau ake tamariki e haere ana ki te kura o Hogwarts. I toro atu tonu ngā kaiwhakawāwā ki ngā tino pai. I tuhituhi tētahi: "Kāore anō te whare tapere o Ingarangi kia mōhio ki tētahi mea pēnei mō ngā tekau tau, ā, kāore anō ahau kia kite i tētahi mea e ōrite ana i ōku rā arotake katoa." I toa te tākaro i ngā whakawhiwhinga e iwa i ngā Tohu Olivier o tēnei tau. Ka whakatuwheratia te Tamaiti Kanga i Broadway i Niu Ioka i te tau 2018, ā, kua kī a JK Rowling e hiahia ana ia kia kitea whānuitia puta noa i te ao. Kua āwhina ki te hanga i te whakatupuranga mano tau: E hia miriona ngā tāngata e tae ana ki te taitamarikitanga, kāore anō kia mōhio ki tētahi ao me te kore a Harry Potter. He tokomaha kua tipu ake me ngā pukapuka ināianei ka whiwhi i ngā rongoā auau o JK Rowling mā te pāpāho pāpori - he ope taua tōna e tata ana ki te 11m ngā kaiārahi. I te whakataurite a Donald Trump ki a Ariki Voldemort i tērā tau, ka tūtohu a Rowling: "Kātahi te weriweri. Kāore a Voldemort i tata ki te kino." I muri iho ka tawai a ia i ngā kaiwhakamahi Twitter nāna i whakawehi ki te tahu i ana pukapuka. Kotahi te urupare i pānuitia: "Whakaaro he pono tā rātou kōrero: ka taea e koe te ārahi i tētahi kōtiro ki ngā pukapuka mō te pikinga me te hinganga o te rangatiratanga, engari kāore tonu e taea e koe te whakaaro i a ia." E rua tekau tau i muri mai i taua pukapuka tuatahi, te āhua nei kāore he tangata e kōrero "Avada Kedavra" ki a Harry Potter ākuanei. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Omirangi o Rāwāhi: E whakaatu ana te whakamutunga i te taha kanapa o te ora
summary: Ka taea e koe te whakaaro i te hui kāhua Rua Tekau mā Rua i tū pea i ngā tari o ngā kaiwhakahaere Kēmu o Locog, i ngā pānui kāwanatanga rānei i ēnei wiki kua hipa.
text: Nā Claire HealdBBC 2012, i te Papa Orimipia "Kua tino pai te haere o ēnei Kēmu. Ka aha tātou ina mutu katoa? Me pēhea tātau e nekeneke ai i te iwi whānui i te pouri e tata mai ana?" Ko te tikanga ko te ariā kanapa ko te arotahi anō i a rātau ki tētahi mahi. He hākari o te pahū o Ingarangi mai i ngā tau e 50 kua hipa. Ko te kaiwhakahaere toi o te hui kati, kaore a Kim Gavin i whakaaro mo te mea e hiahia ana ia ki te taurima i te rōpū tino pai rawa atu i muri i te whakaaturanga. Ko te tākaro te takahanga matua, ka kī a ia, ko tēnei kāniwha te hākari. He iti iho ōna wawata hītori tiketike, ngā mahi tautuhi tirohanga rānei i tōna tuakana, te hanganga whakamīharo a Danny Boyle, i whānau mai i ngā wiki e rua me te iti ki mua. 'Mosh pit' Ehara i te hurihanga mahi, ngā mana kaimahi me Ingarangi, he whakararuraru pūoro me te tae. Tīmata ana i mua i tētahi pae i hangaia o Rānōna, ka mutu anake te whakatakotoranga o nga huarahi i te wā i haere mai ai te hunga whakarongo i te tīmatanga o te ahiahi. He iti iho i te 24 haora mai i te mutunga o ana whakaari i konei. Ko ngā turituri nunui mai i One Direction, mā Emeli Sande me ngā Pet Shop Boys me ngā Kaiser Chiefs ki a George Michael i whakataka i mua i ngā kaitākaro, nāna i haere ki te whakakī i te "poka mosh" i runga i te papa tākaro. He pai ki a rātau te poka mosh i mua me te atamira waenganui, ko ēnei kaiwhakahaere hui o Rāwāhi 2012. A, he iti noa iho nga Kingi - i konei a Piriniha Harry me te Ariki o Kemipiri. I mahia e te hui tana mahi? Kia pono, he āhua rite tonu ki te tākaro rangatira, kotahi meneti, ki runga ake i tērā meneti. Kāore i rite ki te pānga hōtuhi āta hōtuhi o te tīmatanga, i te wā o te kotahitanga o te motu, i ētahi wā ka mahue koe ki te whakaaro me pēhea te whakaaro? Kotahi meneti ka tūtuki atu te hui ki a Kōrero Me i muri i te wairua mata nui o Freddie Mercury. He pouri me te haki Orimipia kua whakahekea me te waiata reo tāne o Welsh i tērā wā. Kua whakatangihia te waiata o te Orimipia a Muse Survival i roto i te rua wiki whakamutunga i nga wā o te whakaari tākaro nui. I te pō nei i whakamātauria ki te pānga katoa o te papa tākaro, me te mura e rere ana ki te rangi i ia taha o te pēne. Engari i muri tonu mai i tētahi wā kōrero i pūhia ai tētahi tangata i te pū repo. I te wā o ngā Kēmu kua kite mātau i te toa nui i roto i te mahinga. He tino ngākau nui tēnei. He mahara te huihuinga o ngā Kōtiro Spice, ehara i te mea ko ngā rangatira pūoro e rima o mua e tū ana i runga i ngā tīkiti. He nui ake mō Poihāne e kume ana i ngā nekehanga kanikani mohoao i a ia e tū ana i te taha o te pirimia. He aha te mahi a Annie Lennox i runga i te poti kōiwi? He tohutoro tērā ki ngā tauira tino ātaahua e tata ana ki a ia i roto i te raupapa whakahaere, ka pātai te iwi? I tangohia e ngā pū rangatahi, o te whakatupuranga i whai ēnei Kēmu ki te whakaaweawe, kia tino tīmata ai te rōpū. He taekaha a Jessie J, Tinie Tempah, Taio Cruz e whai ana i a Fat Boy Slim. Tērā ētahi wāhanga pākaha, he rohe hākari pai tēnei, he pākaha. Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, ko te Kotahi Rā Pēnei a Elbow i ngā wā katoa te waiata tino pai hei whakamutu i tētahi hākari. Ko wai i mōhio he whakaaturanga tika tērā ki te waipuke o ngā kaitākaro i tāhaetia ki roto i te papa tākaro? Mehemea i hiahia a Ariki Coe ki te pounamu i te āhuatanga pai mai i te Omirangi me te tiaki mō te whenua, koinei te wā ki te wetewete i ngā pounamu katoa me te koko ake. Ko te Running Up That Hill a Kate Bush e kore e taea e ngā tāne me ngā wāhine te whakawhiti wāhi. I tika i tētahi Kēmu i nui ake ai te ōrautanga o ngā wāhine o ngā kaitākaro i mua, ā, i whakaaetia ki te mekemeke. Ki te pānga toa mētara koura mō Ingarangi. Tērā anō ētahi whakamaumahara kei te tata tonu te oranga tūturu, ehara i te Orimipia, me ngā pēne tino angitu arumoni e whiwhi ana i ngā umere tino nui; ko ngā tauira e taraiwa ana i ngā mea; Ko ngā waka - ahakoa i takaia ki te nūpepa - e mau ana i te papa. 'Hari, kororia' Pēnei i te mutunga o te Omirangi, ka rere mai te raina whakamutunga o te hui ki te whakatau i a mātau. I whakataratia e te Perehitini o te Komiti o te Omirangi o te Ao Whānui, a Pereke Rogge te waiata ā iwi mā te kī he "hari, he kororia hoki" nga Kēmu. Ka pakaru te reo o Lord Coe i te ngenge, i te ngākau rānei i a ia e kī ana "I te taenga mai o to mātau wā, Ingarangi, i tika ta mātau mahi, kia ora!" Na tana whakamihi ki nga tūao i nga Tākaro i mau mai he oati tū whaikōrero. Tērā te whai wāhitanga a te hunga whakarongo i muri i taua tautoko a te huihuinga i te wā o te Omirangi. He "aue" tūturu mai i te whenua nāna i hoatu ki te ao te panto i te pānuitanga ka tineia te kōhua. Me te whakangū o te tūmanako i mua i te wāhanga o Awatea. Ka pēhea te āhua o ngā Kēmu ina tukuna atu ki te tiakitanga o tētahi atu whenua? He nui rawa te kākahu ka rongo koe i te kōruru. Kei a mātau a Beckham, kia pono tātou, kei a rātau a Pele. He tauira a mātau, he iti noa iho ō rātau kaikanikani Samba. Kōhimu, ka whai take wahine ngā Kēmu o Rio, i te wā i a Rāwāhi te āhuatanga o te Orimipia XXX? Tērā ētahi whakaaturanga whakaongaonga mai i Take That and the Who hei tango i o mātau hinengaro i te mea kua tata te mura o te Orangirangi. Hei whakamahara hoki ki a tātau, ko te mea kino ake i te mutunga o ngā Kēmu e pā ana. I mua i te tīmatanga anō o tēnei katoa mō ngā Kēmu Paralympic i roto i ngā wiki e rua, tērā pea ka tino pai rawa atu, kia mau tonu ai ngā kupu a Erika Idle, i a ia e hoki whakamuri ana i te papa o te Taiwhanga, i mua noa iho i te tāhaetanga a Bhangra. "Mēnā he āhua pirau te ora, tērā tētahi mea kua wareware i a koe, arā, ko te kata, te menemene, te kanikani, te waiata. "Titiro tonu ki te taha kanapa o te ora."

title: Kōtaha: Meredith Kercher
summary: He rite tonu te kī a te whānau Kercher e kore pea rātau e mōhio he aha i pā ki a Meredith, e 21 ōna tau i te kitenga i a ia kua mate i roto i te whare noho i Perugia i tiria e ia ki a Amanda Knox.
text: E mōhiotia ana ko Mez ki ōna hoa, i kite a Meredith i tōna wā i Itari hei haerenga moemoeā. I kī ōna mātua e hiahia ana a ia ki te ako i te reo, ki te tūtaki i ngā hoa hou me te rumaki i a ia ki tētahi ahurea kē. I kōwhiria e Miss Kercher te taone matua o Itari mo tana haerenga whakawhiti, i runga i Milan me Roma nā te mea i whakapono ia ka haumaru ake. "I kaha rawa tana whawhai ki te puta atu ki reira," te kī a tōna pāpā ko Hoani. "He ruarua noa iho ngā tūponotanga, engari i tino whakaaro a ia ki te haere me te tohe tonu, ā, i te mutunga ka whiwhi i tāna i hiahia ai." Engari e toru marama i muri i tana wehenga atu i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga ki te tīmata i tana whakawhitinga tau i Itari, ka kitea kua mate a ia. I te eke te tauira akoranga Pākehā ki tētahi akoranga mō te hītori o nāianei, ngā ariā tōrangapū me te hītori o te whare pikitia, ā, kua neke ki tētahi whare noho i rēhia e ia me American Knox. I reira ka kitea e nga pirihimana Itari tōna tinana - kua okaina ia ki te mate. I whakawāteatia tōna hoa noho rāua ko Rafaele Sollecito, te hoa tāne Itari o Knox i taua wā, i te kōhuru i te tau 2009. I taua wā, ka kī nga rōia kua uru te tokorua ki tētahi kēmu wahine ki a Miss Kercher kua hē. I whakapae nga kaiwhakawa i muri iho ko te kōhuru i puta mai i te tautohetohe wera mo te mā i te whare o Perugia. I te tau 2011, i whakawāteatia e tētahi hūri mema tokowaru a Knox rāua ko Sollecito o te kōhurutanga o Miss Kercher i muri i te whakaaranga o ngā rangirua i runga i ngā hātepe i whakamahia hei kohikohi i ngā whakaaturanga DNA, ā, i whakawāteatia rāua i muri i te whā tau i roto i te whare herehere. I whakahaua he whakawā anō i te tau 2013 i muri i te tono a nga rōia, nāna i tautohe kua whakawāteatia ngā whakaaturanga DNA hira, ā, i te tau 2014 ka whakahokia ngā whakataunga hara taketake. Engari i Mati 2015, i roto i tētahi whakahaere whakamutunga i roto i te kēhi roa, ka hurihia anō e te kōti pīra matua o Itari nga whakapae. I kitea a Miss Kercher i roto i tōna rūma moe, he wāhanga e hipokina ana e te moenga. Kua tapahia tōna korokoro, ā, kua maukatia te tatau o te rūma moe, engari kua pakaru te matapihi. 'He whakahoahoa, he aroha' Ko ia, e ai ki tētahi Itari i kīa ai kua mārena ia, he tino rerekē i tōna hoa noho o Amerika. "He rite te tokorua ki te tioka me te tīhi - he tino tauaro ki te pūāhua," te kī a Giacomo Silenzi, e 24 tau. "He marino, he reka, he whakamā a Meredith. He hākinakina a Amanda, ā, i ngā wā katoa e whakaatu ana." I whakaahuatia he ngākau whakahoahoa, he aroha hoki e ngā hoa me te whānau, he rite tonu te kitenga o Miss Kercher i roto i ngā whakaahua e menemene ana. I tipu ake a ia i te tapa taone o Coulsdon, i te tonga o waho o Rānana. I mua i tana haerenga ki te raki ki te whare wānanga, i kuraina ia i te Kura Tawhito tūmataiti e £10,000 i te tau i Croydon pātata. Ko ia te pōtiki o ngā tamariki tokowhā, me ngā tuakana ko John rāua ko Lyle me te tuahine ko Stephanie. Kua mau tonu te whānau i tētahi whakahau kia mōhio ai he aha i tūpono ki Perugia. "He tino uaua te noho ki te kore taku tuahine," te kī a Stephanie i te tau 2014 i muri i te rongonga i te rongo kua whakahokia mai ngā whakataunga hara a Knox rāua ko Sollecito. "He nui rawa ngā mea e pā ana ki a au e hiahia ana ki te kōrero ki a ia, e hiahia ana rānei ki te waea atu ki a ia."
