I kī a ia i taua wā e tūmanako ana a ia ko te tikanga o te whakahaere ko te mutunga o to rātau whakamatautau kia tīmata ai tōna whānau ki te "maumahara ki a Meredith". Kotahi anake te tangata e noho ana i te whare herehere mo te kōhurutanga o tōna tuahine. I whiua a Rudy Guede, mai i Ivory Coast, kia 16 tau i roto i te whare herehere i te tau 2008, engari i roto i taua whakataunga he whakahaere kāore ia i mahi i te hara anake. A, mo te whānau Kercher, kaore tonu he katinga. "Ki taku whakaaro kei te haere tonu mātou mo te pono, ā, tērā pea kāore mātou i te tino mōhio ki te mea i tūpono i taua pō, e mārama ana he mea me whakarite mātou," te kī a Stephanie Kercher.

title: Ka noho te rōpū pirihimana o South Yorkshire
summary: Kua tiakina te wāhanga pirihimana o South Yorkshire i te katinga.
text: I whakaūngia e te ope pirihimana o te rohe i tērā tau e arotake ana i te wae, e utu ana mō te £1m i te tau. I kī te komihana pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC) a Shaun Wright ka noho tonu te wae ki tōna pūtake Cudworth, engari ka tapahia te maha o ngā kaimahi me ngā hoiho. I whakaarohia he whakakotahitanga ki te wae o West Yorkshire, engari i panaia. I kī a Mark Burns-Williamson i te Uru o Aotearoa, tērā pea me tapahi a ia. Mehemea i haere tonu te whakakotahitanga, kua neke nga hoiho o South Yorkshire ki Wakefield, ā, kua katia te pūtake o Cudworth. Me tapahi te maha o ngā pirihimana i te wāhanga maunga mai i te 12 ki te waru, ka haere te maha o ngā kaimahi tautoko mai i te ono ki te whā, ā, ka tapahia te maha o ngā hoiho mai i te 12 ki te 10. I kī tētahi kaikōrero tōpana e tūmanako ana ko ngā tapahi, e tiaki ana i te tōpana mō te £300,000 i te tau, ka taea mā te whakawāteatanga māori me ngā whakatānga. Ko ngā Pirihimana o Te Tonga o Aotearoa tētahi o ngā ope pirihimana e 16 i Ingarangi me Uēra e pupuri tonu ana i tētahi wāhanga maunga. Ka āwhina te tīma ki te ārai i te raruraru i ngā takahanga pēnei i ngā whakataetae whutupōro me ngā whakahē. I kī tōmua te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana o Te Tonga o Aotearoa he "utauta tino whaitake, ā, me tiaki". I kī a Tēnā Wright: "Ka whakapai ake ngā hoiho i te kitenga o ngā Pirihimana o South Yorkshire me te āwhina ki te whakaiti i te hara. " E whakapono ana māua ko te Kātipa Matua o Rawiri Crompton e tāpiri uara ana te wāhanga maunga ki te ratonga pirihimana, ā, he tikanga pai ki tētahi mahi pirihimana." I kī a Tēnā Burns-Williamson ka haere tonu tōna ope ki tōna ake wāhanga maunga, engari me mahi pea he "penapena tautoko". Ka kī a ia: "Mā ngā tapahi hōhonu e mahia ana ki tā mātou tahua, me mātua whakarite mātou ka taea e mātou te pare tonu i te iwi whānui, pērā i ngā whakahēnga o nā noa nei, me te mahi i tēnei i te utu iti rawa."

title: I hangaia ā-mamati e ngā kaipūtaiao te roro o te dinosaur o Bristol
summary: Kua hangaia ā-mamati te roro o te dinosaur e whakaatu ana i te mea i kīia e ngā kaipūtaiao he mōhiotanga "whakamīharo" ki te kakama me ngā tikanga kai o te kararehe.
text: I whakamahia e ngā kaipūtaiao o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o T I kitea e rātau te kararehe, e mōhiotia ana ko te dinosaur o Bristol nā te mea i kitea i roto i te taone, tērā pea i kai mīti i ōna whanaunga kai tipu. Tērā pea i haere i runga i ngā waewae e rua. I kī te kaimātai Paleontologist o Antonio Ballell: "I kitea e tā mātou tātaritanga o te roro o Thecodontosaurus he maha ngā āhuatanga ātaahua, he tino mīharo ētahi. " Ahakoa i neke āta haere ōna whanaunga o muri ake i runga i ngā whā katoa, e hua ana a mātau kitenga i haere pea tēnei momo i runga i ngā waewae e rua, ā, i ētahi wā he kaikikokiko." I noho a Thecodontosaurus i te mutunga o te tau Triassic tata ki te 205 miriona tau ki muri, a, he kurī nui te rahi. 'Ātaahua te tiaki' Ahakoa i kitea ōna fossil e tata ana ki te Kararehe o Bristol ināianei i te tau 1834, kātahi anō ka taea e ngā kaipūtaiao te hora i ngā pūmanawa atahanga hei tango i ngā mōhiohio hōu me te kore whakangaro. I hangaia ngā tauira ahu-toru mai i ngā karapa CT mā te tango mamati i te wheua mai i te toka, e tohu ana i ngā taipitopito anatomical mō tōna roro me tōna taringa ā-roto kāore i kitea i mua i roto i te fossil. "Ahakoa kua roa te roro tūturu, ka taea e te pūmanawa te waihanga anō i te roro me te hanga taringa ā-roto mā ngā ahu o ngā rua e mahue ana," te whakamārama a Tēnā Ballell. "He ātaahua te tiaki i te roro o Thecodontosaurus, nā reira i whakaritea e mātou ki ētahi atu dinosaurs, e tohu ana i ngā āhuahira noa iho me ētahi e tauwhāiti ana ki Thecodontosaurus. " I whakaaturia e tōna roro te taipitopito o ngā pukupuku floccular, kei muri o te roro, he mea hira mō te whārite. "Ko to rātau rahi nui e tohu ana he waewae. E pāhono ana hoki tēnei hanganga ki te mana o te toenga me ngā nekeneke whatu me te kakī, e hua ana he āhua ngāwari a Thecodontosaurus, ā, ka taea te pupuri i tētahi tirohanga pūmau i a ia e neke tere ana."

title: Children's social services in Wales 'near crisis'
summary: Ko ngā ratonga tamariki i Uēra e tata ana ki te "wāhi mōrearea", e ai ki te tinana e tohu ana i ngā kaunihera.
text: E whakaatu ana ngā whika hōu rawa e 149% te pikinga o te maha o ngā taupānga kōti hei tango i ngā tamariki ki te tiaki i ngā tau e iwa kua taha. The Welsh Local Government Association (WLGA) said councils faced a rising caseload with restricted budgets. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e mōhio ana ki te pēhanga o ngā kaunihera, ā, kua mahia he mahi hei tautoko i ngā whānau. A "section 31" court application is made by a council if they want to take children into care because they have evidence of harm or likely of harm to the child. Figures from the Children and Family Court Advisory and Support Service show the annual number of applications rose from 422 in 2008-09 to 1,050 in 2017-18. I kī te WLGA ahakoa i te pai rawa atu ngā kaunihera, kāore i tautokona te āhuatanga. "Kei te tino tata te pūnaha i te wā mōrearea," te kī a Geraint Hopkins, te kaikorero tuarua mō ngā tamariki i te WLGA. Mr Hopkins added: "Unless we significantly look at the resources available to children's services in Wales and the important early intervention methods that we take to try and prevent children coming into care then we're going to be in serious trouble. " It's been a difficult period over these last 10 years, austerity has hit many local authorities and while we have continued to meet the rising costs of looked after children, it's getting to the point now where we're really at crisis level." 'It felt like a nightmare' Sarah (not her real name) complained to the Public Services Ombudsman about her son being taken into care by Monmouthshire council three years ago. I kitea e te tūhuratanga a te poungaio e tika ana kia tangohia ia, engari ko te āhua o te mahi i "kāore i te tika, i kore e taea te kawe". I kī a ia he nui ngā hinganga i te wāhi o te kaunihera, a, i tautokona te amuamu a Sarah. Ka tono nga kaimahi pāpori ki a Sarah kia haina i tētahi tuhipoka tuhituhi ā-ringa hei whakaatu i whakaae ia ki tana tama e noho ana ki tētahi hoa whānau mō te pō kotahi. I kī te pūrongo a te poungaio he "koretake" te tuhipoka, ā, "he mana rangirua". Ko te hua, i kī a ia kāore a ia i te mōhio ki a Sarah "i roto i tētahi tūnga, i hoatu rānei te wā ki te tuku whakaaetanga mōhiotia" ki te tango noa iho i tana tamaiti. Ka kī a Sarah: "I mauria e ia ētahi mea, ana pea teddy bears, ōna pyjamas, tana paraihe niho me tōna kākahu kura, tana pēke me tana tina mo te rā e whai ake nei, a, ka haere rātau. " I whakaritea ahau ki te haina i tētahi pepa tuhituhi ā-ringa e kī ana mō te pō kotahi anake, ā, kore rawa ia i hoki mai. E toru tau ki muri. Pēnei i te moepuku." I kitea e te poungaio he pai ki te tiaki i te tama, engari "tērā ētahi rangirua, nā te kore rawa o te kaunihera, mēnā ka taea ētahi atu mahi whakatūpato i te mahi wawe". I tino whakaae te kaunihera o Monmouthshire ki ngā tūtohutanga a te poungaio, ā, i kī he "tino manakē" ngā ratonga tamariki. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Ka whakarite mātou i ngā wā katoa kei te haumaru, kei te parea hoki ngā tamariki, ā, kei ngā kaimahi te tautoko e hiahiatia ana hei mahi i tēnei mahi tino uaua. " We work with many hundreds of children and their families every year. "Mai i tēnei take, kāore ētahi atu e pā ana ki ngā ratonga tamariki i tautokona e te [poungaio] ā, mā tēnei e whakarato i te kounga o te ratonga whānui o te pūnaha ki te iwi whānui." I kī a Prof Judith Masson, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o T I kī a ia kua nui ake te tokomaha o te iwi whānui, ā, he nui ake ngā mahi tiaki i mauria mai mō ngā tamariki neke atu i te 13 tau i whakaritea ki ngā tau o mua, nā te nui ake o te mōhiotanga ki te taikaha ā-tamariki. I tāpiritia e ia kua nui ake hoki te inu, te whakamahi rongoā me te tūkino i te kāinga - ko ngā take katoa e ahu ana ki ngā taupānga wāhanga 31. "E rua noa iho ēnei o ngā take. He rerekētanga katoa o ngā kaupapahere me ngā mahi e āhei ana ki ēnei pikinga i roto i te wā," tana kī. I te nuinga o te wā, neke atu i te 5,955 ngā tamariki e tiaki ana i Uēra i Mati 2017 i whakaritea ki te 4,695 i Mati 2009 - he pikinga o te 27%. E ono ngā kaunihera i taka te maha o ngā tamariki i tiakina - Denbighshire, Ceredigion, Carmarthenshire, Swansea, Neath Port Talbot me Newport. Ko te utu toharite o tētahi whakanohonga whāngai e whakaratohia ana e ngā mana ā-rohe e tata ana ki te £23,327 i te tau, ā, ko ērā e whakaratohia ana e tētahi umanga takitahi e utu ana i te £43,378 i te wawaenga. Ko te nuinga o te wā he nui ake te utu o te tiaki kāinga - hei tauira, ā, ka taea e ngā utu te awhe i waenganui i te £2,500 me te £16,000 i te wiki. I kī tētahi kōrero a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e mōhio ana ki ngā pēhanga e whakatakotoria ana ki ngā mana ā rohe. "That's why we have taken action to strengthen early intervention and preventative action to support whānau to continue to safe care for their children and reduce the need for them to become care after."

title: Te papa riri pōti o Lincolnshire me East Yorkshire
summary: Ka kitea e te pōti nui o te tau 2015 ētahi whakataetae pōti ātaahua mai i te Humber ki The Wash.
text: Kua whakarārangitia e au ētahi o ngā papa riri e āhei ana ki te whakarongo ki te rā pōti i te 7 o Me. Boston me Skegness I tētahi pōti "pūnoa", ka kitea a Boston me Skegness hei wāhanga haumaru o Tory. E rima tau ki muri, i toa a Mark Simmonds - e whakararo ana - i tēnei tūru me te nuinga hauora o te 12,426. Heoi anō, mai i te tau 2010 kua kite te rohe i te pikinga nui o te tautoko UKIP, e whakamāramatia ana e te tokomaha o ngā kaiwaiata hei pōti whakahē ki ngā nekeneke i tēnei wāhi o Lincolnshire. He ahurei tēnei wāhanga o Te Rāwhiti me Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti me Te Rāwhiti. I toa a Andrew Percy i tēnei tūru iti mai i Labour i te tau 2010 me te nuinga o te 5,147. Ka whawhai a Labour ki te toa i Brigg rāua ko Goole, engari e tūmanako ana te Tories ki te tārewa. Ko Cleethorpes Tētahi atu tūru e āhei ana ki te whakatau ko tēhea te rōpū e hanga ana i te kāwanatanga panuku. Ka tiakina e Mātini Vickers te nuinga o te 4,298 i tēnei wāhanga o Te Raki o Te Rāwhiti. E hiahia ana a Labour ki te whakahoki i te tūru i ngaro i a rātau i te tau 2010, engari ko te kaha o te pōti a UKIP ka kitea he take pūmau. Mō te 38 tau, i whakaaturia tēnei wāhanga e te MP Labour o Aotearoa, e whakaheke ana. I te tau 2010, i puritia e Labour te tūru me te nuinga o te 714 i runga i nga Conservatives. Ahakoa te mutunga o te tuawhā i te pōti nui whakamutunga, kei te ūkui a TE WHK i a Great Grimsby - i reira i kaha ai te mahi a te rōpū i ngā pōti paetata o nā noa nei. I te tau 2010, he tūru ūnga tēnei o te Liberal Democrat i te tau 2010, engari i pōtitia anōtia a Taiana Hōnea o Labour me te nuinga o te 641. He nui te iwi whānui ākonga o Hull North, nāna i āwhina ki te tāwhana o Lib Dem i te rima tau ki mua. E maia ana a Labour ki te pupuri i te tūru, engari e tohe ana ngā Pāremata Liberali paetata kua hinga rātau, engari kāore i waho. Neke atu i te whā tekau tau kāore he pirimia i tomo ki Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti me te kore tana rōpū i toa i a Lincoln. He wāhanga tauhira "bellwether" a Lincoln, e whakaata ana i te tārere ā iwi i waenganui i a Tory me Labour. Ka tiakina e Karl McCartney te nuinga o te 1,058 i roto i tētahi tūru e tino ūkuia ana e Labour.

title: E maumahara ana a Stephen Hawking ki te kaiako tino pai
summary: Kua takoha te kaipūtaiao a Stephen Hawking ki te kaiako nāna i whakaawe ōna hipanga tuatahi ki te mātauranga.
text: Nā Sean CoughlanEducation correspondent E kī ana a ia i whakatuwheratia e Dikran Tahta i te Kura o Hato Albans ōna whatu ki te pāngarau, e whakaahuatia ana e ia ko te "kaupapa o te ao nui". "He kino taku tuhi ā-ringa, ā, ka māngere ahau. He tokomaha nga kaiako i hōhā. Ehara i a Tēnā Tahta," te kī a te kaiahupūngao. I te kōrero a Prof Hawking i mua i te whakawhiwhinga o te Whakawhiwhinga Kaiako Huri noa i tēnei mutunga wiki. Kua hopukina e te kaipūtaiao toa tētahi ataata e whakamihi ana i tana kaiako, i mate i te tau 2006. "He ora, he mīharo ana akomanga. Ka taea te taupatupatu i ngā mea katoa. I hangaia tahitia e mātau taku rorohiko tuatahi, i hangaia ki ngā whakakā hiko-pūkaha," te kī a Prof Hawking. "Ngā mihi ki a Tēnā Tahta, ka noho ahau hei ahorangi pāngarau i Cambridge, he tūnga i puritia e Isaac Newton." I kī a Prof Hawking "i muri i ia tangata tino pai, he kaiako tino pai". Ka puta mai tana karere ataata i mua i te pānuitanga o te toa o te Whakawhiwhinga Kaiako Huri noa, me te whakawhiwhinga $1m (£704,000). Ko te whakataetae, e whakahaeretia ana e te Varkey Foundation, kotahi te whakaurunga UK i roto i te 10 whakamutunga o runga. Kua tae atu a Hōne Hegarty, he kaiako pāngarau mai i Rāwāhi, ki te rārangi whakamutunga i te taha o ngā kaiako mai i ngā whenua tae atu ki Kenya, Pakitāne me te US.

title: Owen Harding: Te inoi a te whaea kia kitea te taiohi o Saltdean e ngaro ana
summary: E toru rā ki muri i a ia e haere ana ki te mātakitaki i te tōnga o te rā, kua inoi tētahi wahine nāna tana tama taitamariki ki te kimi i a ia.
text: I mahue i a Owen Harding, 16, te kāinga whānau i Saltdean, East Sussex, i te Tāite. I kī a Māmā Stella kua ngaro tōna ngaronga, ā, ka mataku tērā pea ka tūkinotia e ia. "E mārama ana he wā tino uaua tēnei mō te katoa i tēnei wā... ā, he iti noa iho to mātau kaha ki te puta atu i te whare ki te kimi i a ia," tana kī. "E whakaaro ana mātou tērā pea kua pā mai tētahi mea ki a Owen, ā, e tono ana mātou ki te hunga i Saltdean, Telscombe, Ovingdean me Brighton kia tiaki i a ia." Kua rapua e nga ratonga ohorere te takutai o East Sussex. I roto i tētahi pou Twitter, ka tohe te kaitapere o Hemi Hononga, e pā ana ki a Owen mā te tama a tōna whanaunga, ki te waea atu ki ngā pirihimana me ētahi mōhiohio. Ko te kaiwhakaari me te kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata, ko Nadia Sawalha, ko tana tamāhine he hoa no te taitamariki, i tuhituhi hoki i tētahi tono. E whakaahuatia ana a Owen he mā, e 6ft te roa, he hanga tākaro, he makawe parauri poto. I te mau a ia i tētahi tihi pango, pōuri rānei, he tarau hīkoi kiwikiwi me ngā kaiwhakangungu mā. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Sussex i kitea whakamutunga ia e wehe ana i tōna wāhitau kāinga i te 19:00 GMT, ā, kāore anō kia whakapā atu ki ētahi hoa, whānau rānei mai i taua wā. 'Whāia ngā aratohu coronavirus' I kī ngā āpiha he hononga anō a Owen ki te takiwā o East Riding o Yorkshire. Kua tohe rātau ki ngā tangata i Saltdean me ngā wāhi karapoti kia tirotiro i ngā wharau, i ngā whare rānei, me te whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana ki te kite i a ia. Heoi anō, ka tohe rātau ki te katoa kia ū ki ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga Covid-19 i ngā wā katoa, ā, kaua e whakamōrearea i a rātau anō, i tētahi atu rānei. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana o Sussex

title: He aha te nobile officium?
summary: E hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau kia whakahaere te Kōti Wātū mēnā ka taea te whakamahi i tētahi mana motuhake e kiia nei ko te rangatira nobile hei waitohu i tētahi reta tono toronga mō te kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Reevel AldersonHome affairs correspondent, BBC Scotland He aha te rangatira nobile? He ahurei te tikanga o te petihana i te ture o Pākehā, engari he tawhiti rawa atu i te warewaretanga o te pūnaha ture. Ko tōna ingoa he kupu Rātini ko te tikanga o te "tari rangatira". E tautohetohe ana ētahi tohunga puāwaitanga mō te whakahuatanga o te kupu, engari he whakaaetanga whānui kia ōrite te roa o ngā maramara kupu ki te 'c' mārō (nob-eel-ay off-icky-um). Ka tukuna e te hātepe te wā hei whakarato rongoā i roto i tētahi tautohetohe ā-ture kāore i te tīariari. Ki tētahi atu kupu, ka taea e ia te mono i tētahi āputa i roto i te ture, te tuku rānei i te whakamaurutanga mēnā ka kitea he pākaha rawa te ture, ina hoatu, i te wā ā-ture. Āhea ka whakamahia? Ka whakamahia i roto i ngā take taihara, ā-iwi hoki, ā, he tino pūkenga. I te Kōti o te Wātū, te kōti tūmatanui teitei rawa o Pākehā, ko ngā petihana ki te rangatira rangatira e tino whakamahia ana i roto i ngā take pūtea, āhuatanga hoki pēnei i ngā whakawhirinaki, te pokapū me te whakawāteatanga. Ka whakamahia hoki i roto i ngā take matatini e pā ana ki te whānau me te ture tamariki e taea ai e rātou te whakarato rongoā whakaritea. I te Kōti Tiketike, e pā ana ki ngā take hara, kua whakamahia ki te wāhi he kerēme tītaha i roto i ngā whakahaere, ki te whakamatautau rānei i te whakahaere ture a te kaiwhakawā. E whakamahia ana hoki hei tikanga paerewa mo te whakamatautau i te kitenga o te whakahawea ki te kōti. Heoi anō, he rāhuitanga kei runga i tōna whakamahinga. Kei roto i ēnei ko te tūmanako whānui kia kaua te petihana e tono i tētahi mea e hāngai ana ki te ture ture, pēnei i te hiahia kia mahi tētahi tangata i runga i te ture ture. 'Kāore he hē me te kore rongoā' I tuhia e Dr Stephen Thomson, he ahorangi ture i te Whare Wānanga o Hong Kong, tētahi pukapuka mō te hātepe. I kī a ia ka whakamahia noatia te mana rangatira ina "he āhuatanga ātaahua, tē mōhiotia rānei e hiahia ana ki te whakatikatika." He uaua ki te rā i ōna taketake, engari i kī a ia: "Ko te mana rangatira he mana toenga o te kōti e taea te whakataki ki tōna mana tōtika tūturu, tūturu kia kite ai kāore he hē me te kore rongoā." I whakaahuatia e Dr Thomson hei tikanga whakamahi i te "mana tika whakaharahara" o te kōti i reira he āhua ohorere e whakatautika ana i tētahi urupare whakaharahara mai i te kōti. He aha te take o nāianei? I tērā marama, i puta i ngā MP te mea e mōhiotia ana ko te Ture Benn, e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga kia tono toronga ki te rā kati o Te Pāremata mēnā kāore anō kia hainatia e te pāremata i te 19 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Heoi anō, kua kī te Pirimia o Poihāne, he pai ake ki a ia te "mate i roto i te poka" i te tono i ngā kaiārahi o Ūropi mō tētahi atu toronga i tua atu i te 31 o Whiringahora. Kua tohe te kāwanatanga o UK e arotahi ana ki te tae ki tētahi mahi ki te EU, engari ko te putanga kore mahi anake te whiringa. Ko te mahi ā-ture hou rawa, i tīmataria e te kaipāngai o Dale Vince, QC Jo Maugham me SNP MP Joanna Cherry, ka rangona e tētahi pae kaiwhakawā i te Whare o Roto o te Kōti Wātū. Ka whakaarohia e rātau mēnā ka taea e te kōti te whakamahi i tōna mana whakahaere rangatira kia pai ai te waitohu i tētahi reta ki ngā kaiārahi o Ūropi ki te kore a Tēnā Hōnea e pai ki te mahi pēnā. Ko te Kōti o te Wātū hoki e rongo ana i tētahi tono ki tētahi whakataunga i roto i tētahi kēhi whakarara i mauria mai e aua kaiwhakahauhau ōrite. I tautohe rātau ko nga kōrero i whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga e whakaatu ana kaore e taea te whakawhirinaki. Engari i whakakāhoretia te kēhi e te Ariki Pentland, nāna i kī "kāore he pōhēhētanga" kua whakaae te pirimia ki te ū ki te ture.

title: E huatau ana te rangahau pēke i te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Pirihitini 'kāore i te tino tipu'
summary: Kua pai ake te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Pirihitini i muri i te whakarākeitanga i te ngahuru, kua huatau mai tētahi pūrongo hōu.
text: I kitea e te kaupane pakihi hou o te Pēke o Pākehā he iti noa iho te pikinga o ngā kamupene e pūrongo ana i te nui o te hurihanga i roto i ngā marama e toru ki Hui tanguru. He iti ake hoki ngā tūmanako a ngā kamupene mō te hurihanga i roto i ngā marama e ono e whai ake nei i te wā uiuinga o mua. Heoi anō, i kī te pēke e huatau ana "kāore i te tino tipu". I te hauwhā whakamutunga, 29% o ngā kamupene i uiuia te nui o te hurihanga, 37% i pā ki te hurihanga pateko, ā, neke atu i te tuatoru i pā ki te hekenga. Nā tēnei i hoatu he toenga kupenga o -5%, he iti noa iho te whakapai ake i te hauwhā tōmua me te hauwhā kotahi i te tau ki mua. He iti noa iho te toenga kupenga katoa o te huinga mō ngā kamupene i te wāhanga whakanao i te wā uiuinga whakamutunga. He nui ake te whakapai ake o ngā umanga ratonga, i te mea he iti ake te kino o ngā mahi kaweake i ngā whika o mua. Ko ngā tūmanako mō te hurihanga i roto i ngā marama e ono e whai ake nei i whakaatu i te toenga kupenga katoa o +1%, i te wā i hinga ngā tūmanako kaweake ā muri ake mai i te koata whakamutunga, engari i noho pai tonu te katoa. I kī te rangatira o te Pēke o Pākehā, a Donald MacRae: "Ahakoa te mahinga kino i te ngahuru, kua pai ake ngā tūmanako pakihi mō te 2013 mai i tētahi tūnga iti. " Ko te hokinga ki te tipu tūkaha ake i roto i te whakahaerenga o Pākehā e tatari ana ki te nui ake o te maia ki ngā kiritaki me ngā umanga. "Kei te āhua tonu tēnei i te hanga i runga i ngā tikanga kaupapahere hei pupuri i te raruraru o te nama ariki o te rohe ūropi me te whakatinana i ngā kaupapahere hei whakaora i te rohe ūropi me ngā rangatiratanga o UK ki te tupu." I pōhiritia e te Hēkeretari Pūtea a John Swinney te pūrongo, e kī ana kei te "mahi te kāwanatanga o Pākehā i ngā mea katoa e taea ana" ki te whakakaha i te whakahaerenga o Pākehā. I tāpiri mai a ia: "I te aroaro o te whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga o UK, kei te mahi mātou i ngā mea katoa i runga i tō mātou kaha ki te whakaoho i te whakahaerenga o Pākehā, te haumi i roto i ā mātou rangatahi, te tiaki i ngā kāinga me te tautoko i ngā ratonga o mua, ā, ka haere tonu mātou ki te karanga ki te kāwanatanga o UK kia nui ake te mahi."

title: Ka taea e te rūnanga o te Kaunihera Taone o Silloth te whakaoho i te pōti kāore he whakaaro
summary: I muri i te toa o te kaikaunihera i tētahi tūru, engari i ngaro i muri i te pānuitanga hē o te ingoa o tana tāne.
text: I pōtitia a Karen Groucott ki te Kaunihera Taone o Silloth i Cumbria i Me, engari ko tana tāne, i tū hoki, i pānuitia hei kaitono toa. Ko te rongoā i whakaaetia kia whakarerea e Tēnā Groucott, ā, kia kōwhiria a Mrs Groucott ki te whakakī i te tūru wātea. Engari i kōwhiria e nga kaikaunihera tētahi kaitono kē, e whakaoho ana i te whakahē. I tohutohutia te mana e te Kaunihera o Allerdale Borough me tū te whakapuakitanga hē. Hei huri i te hua, me tuku he petihana tika, ka taea rānei e te kaunihera te whakamahi i te hātepe kōwhiringa, e taea ai e ngā kaikaunihera, i ētahi āhuatanga, te kōwhiri i a rātou anō. Heoi anō, ka pōti ngā mema ki tētahi atu kaitono, a Paora Donald, ahakoa kāore a ia i tū i te pōtitanga o Me. Nā tēnei i whakaoho he riri riri. te kī a te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. Ahakoa he ture, kua whakapaea te pōti ki te waiho i te whakaaro o ngā tangata i pōti mō Mrs Groucott. Kua whakatata mai a Tēnā Donald mō te kōrero. Kua karangatia he hui tūmatanui e ngā tangata e ono mo te 3 o Hōngongoi. Ka kōrerorerotia he aha ētahi kaikaunihera i kore ai e pōti ki te kōwhiri tahi i a Mrs Groucott me te titiro ki te pupuri i tētahi poipoi e taea ai te pōti kāore i te whirinaki ki te kaunihera o te taone. E kore te pōti kāore e herea ā-ture.

title: Tiamana AfD: Ka puta atu te PM o Thuringia i waenganui i te weriweri i te taha matau tawhiti
summary: E kī ana tētahi pirimia o te kāwanatanga o Tiamana i pōtitia mā te āwhina a te AfD matau rawa e whakaae ana a ia ki te waiho i te ara mo te pōti hou.
text: Na te pōtitanga o te kaiārahi ohaoha o Tōma Kemmerich i te tūnga ki te rāwhiti o Tūringa i āki te whakapouri ā iwi. "E kore e taea te tuku iho," tana kī. He maha nga tau i whakakahoretia ai e nga rōpū matua o Tiamana te Whirinoa mō Tiamana (AfD). I karangatia e te Tumuaki o Te Tumuaki o Te Wenerei - nāna ake rōpū i pūrua hoki a Tēnā Kēmerich - i karangatia te pōti o te Wenerei "kāore e taea te muru". Kua nui ake te manakohanga o te AfD i roto i ngā tau tata nei, engari kua whakataua mō ōna tirohanga tino nui ki te nekeneke, te wāteatanga o te whaikōrero me te pēhi. I whakaahuatia te pōti o te Wenerei he rū tōrangapū i te wā tuatahi i āwhina ai te AfD ki te hanga i tētahi kāwanatanga i Tiamana, i whati i tētahi whakaaro whakaaro i waenganui i ngā rōpū matua kia kaua rawa e mahi tahi me ngā rōpū pūhāhā. Ināianei kua pānuitia e Tēnā Kemmerich ka rapu a ia i ngā pōti hou i te kāwanatanga, "ki te tango i te poapoa o te tautoko a te AfD mō te tari o te pirimia". Ka hiahiatia e ia he nuinga e rua tuatoru hei memeha i te ruma me te kawe mai i tētahi pōti hou. He aha te mea i tūpono ki Thuringia? Ahakoa he whānui te tautoko a te AfD i Thuringia, i toa te pōti ā rohe i Whiringahora e te Die Linke mauī. A, ko te 5% noa iho o te pōti o ngā Pāremata Wātea (FDP), kāore i te waru ki te pāremata paetata i te pūmatua o te kāwanatanga, o Erfurt. Engari i te Wenerei, i roto i te pōti huna ki te kōwhiri i te kaiārahi o te kāwanatanga, ka patua e Tēnā Kemmerich o te FDP te kaiārahi o Die Linke, o Bodo Ramelow, mā te 45 pōti ki te 44 - kia ora ai ki ngā pōti mai i te AfD. I whiwhi pōti hoki a Tēnā Kemmerich mai i ngā MP paetata i roto i tana FDP me ngā Pāremata Karaitiana a Mrs Tūturu (CDU), e āki ana i te whakapouri mai i ngā kaiwhakawāwā, nāna i kī kua whakaritea e ngā rōpū matau e rua he pūrākau ki te taha matau tawhiti. I tohe a Tēnā Kemmerich kāore he mahi tahi ki te taha matau tawhiti, ā, ka whakapaea te AfD ki te mahi i tētahi "tinihanga tinihanga hei tūkino i te kāwanatanga ā iwi". Heoi anō, ināianei he huatau kua kōrerorerotia e te FDP me te AfD tētahi pūrākau i Thuringia i mua. Kua huaketo tētahi reta i tukuna e te kaiārahi Thuringia o AfD ki a Tēnā Kemmerich i te 1 o Whiringa ā-Rangi, i reira i tukuna ai e te kaiārahi AfD ā-rohe te tautoko a tana rōpū - ki te hanga i tētahi kāwanatanga hikohiko, i tētahi kāwanatanga iti rānei i ārahitia e FDP. Ka whati i a ia te tauwhāinga whakahaere whero-whero-kākāriki e tū ana i Tūringa, tana kī. Ko te reta, i pūrongotia tuatahitia e te kaipānui ā-rohe MDR i taua wā, e whakaatu ana kei te rapu te AfD i tētahi mahi i mua noa atu i te tumeke tōrangapū o te Wenerei. He rū i roto i ngā tōrangapū Tiamana nā Te Maunga, tērā pea i tautohe te korero kōrero o Tiamana "kaua rawa e toe anō". Engari e 90 tau i muri mai i te pikinga o te Rōpū Nazi, kua tākaro anō te taha matau - ahakoa he poto noa iho - te tūranga o te kaihanga kīngi i roto i te āhua o Tiamana. Ko te Pirimia o Peretiana o Mua ko Guy Verhostadt i waenganui i te hunga i mau ki te pāpāho pāpori hei whakahē, e whakawhitiwhiti ana i tētahi whakaahua o tētahi Tāne Kemmerich kātahi anō ka pōtitia e rūrū ringa ana ki te kaiārahi AfD o Tūringa, o Björn Höcke, ā, ka tāpiritia ki tētahi o Hītara e mihi ana ki te Perehitini Tiamana o Paora Hindenburg. I te wiki tata nei, ka whakaarohia e tēnei whenua nga mahi whakarihariha o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, i te wā o nga whakamaharatanga hei tohu i te huritau o te whakawāteatanga o te puni mate o te Nazi i Auschwitz. Kua taea e te taha matau tawhiti te whakamahi i taua whakaawetanga, i whakaae ai tētahi rōpū tōrangapū matua ki tana tautoko, ā, i te mōhiotanga, i te kore rānei, i te āhua nei ko te CDU a Angela Tūturu e hāngai ana ki a rātou, ki te tokomaha, ko te pūtake o te whakamā nui. He aha te tauhohenga? Tērā tonu nga karanga kia whakarerea a Tēnā Kemmerich. I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi haerenga ki Awherika ki te Tonga, ka kī a Tumuaki Tūtira me whakahoki te pōti o Tūringa. "He rā kino tērā mo te kāwanatanga ā iwi, he rā i whati i te tikanga roa, whakahīhī hoki o ngā uara o te CDU. Kaore tēnei e hāngai ana ki ngā whakaaro o te CDU, he pēhea tā mātou mahi puta noa i te nohonga o to mātau rōpū," tana kī. I kī hoki te kaiārahi CDU o Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer me tū a Tēnā Kemmerich, ā, ka karangatia e ngā hoa tauwhāinga o tana rōpū i Perewa ki te CDU kia tawhiti atu i a rātau i te AfD. E whakaaro ana ngā rōpū e rua ki te pupuri kōrero mōrearea i te Hātarei. I waenganui i te nui o te pēhanga, ka kī atu a Tēnā Kemmerich ki ngā kaipānui i te Rāitema kua whakataua e tana FDP kia tonoa te whakakorenga o te pāremata o te kāwanatanga. I haere te kaiārahi FDP o Karaitiana ki Erfurt i te Rāitema mō ngā kōrero ki a Tēnā Kemmerich i mua i te kōrero a te rōpū. I muri iho i te tukunga iho, ka karangatia e ia he pōti whakawhirinaki ki nga kaiārahi ā iwi o te rōpū. Kua whakataurite ētahi i te nekehanga ohorere o te AfD ki te pikinga o te Nazi ki te mana, ā, he whakahē i ngā tāone maha o Tiamana i muri i te pōtitanga. I te tau 1930 ka tomo tētahi Nazi ki te kāwanatanga o Thuringia, te hua nui tuatahi o te rōpū i te Whenua o Weimar, i te tau 1933. Ko te AfD o Thuringia e arahina ana e Björn Höcke, tētahi o ngā whika tautohetohe rawa o te AfD. I whakaohotia e ia he tangi i tana whakatau i te whakataunga kia whakatakotoria te whakamaharatanga o te Whakamaharatanga ki te ngākau o Perewa, e whakaahua ana he "whakamaharatanga o te whakamā". He aha te AfD? He MP tā te ārai nekeneke me te ārai Islam AfD i roto i ngā pāremata kāwanatanga e 16 o Tiamana. I te motu, e 89 ngā tūru o te AfD i te whare pāremata o raro (Pāremata), mai i te 709 te tapeke, nā reira ko te rōpū ātete nui rawa atu. I roto i tētahi tweet (i te reo Tiamana), ka whakahokia e te AfD ngā tāngata i whakataurite i a rātau ki te Rōpū Nazi nā ō rātou whakaaro whakahāwea. "Ko ēnei whakataurite a te Whāriki, hei tauira nā Pita Frey o @ZDF, he tino piro. E tū ana mātau i roto i te AfD mō tētahi āhua ā-ture, te kāwanatanga ā iwi, te pluralism tōrangapū me te oranga Hurai i tō mātou whenua. E WHAKAHĒ ana mātau i ngā tutu me te whakatau whakaaro. Whakamutua te whakatoi!" te kī a te tweet. I waenganui i ngā tuhituhi e whakataurite ana i te AfD ki ngā Whāriki, ko tētahi mai i a Die Linke's Bodo Ramelow, nāna i whakakotahi tētahi whakaahua o Hītara hei tumuaki ki te whakaahua o te Wenerei o Tēnā Höcke e rūrū ringa ana ki a Tēnā Kemmerich. I roto i te tweet he kīanga mai i a Hītara, nāna i kī i te wā o Hui tanguru 1930: "I tutuki i a mātau te angitu tino nui i Tūringa. I tēnei rā, ko tātau tonu te rōpū tino nui i reira... Ko nga rōpū i Tūringa, tae noa mai ki tēnei wā i hangaia ai te kāwanatanga, e kore e taea te whiwhi i te nuinga me te kore āwhina a mātau."

title: New Birmingham 10k route to take in the Jewellery Quarter
summary: Kua whakakitea tētahi ara hou mō te 10k o Birmingham, arā ko ētahi tohu whenua o te pokapū o te taone mō te wā tuatahi.
text: Kua nekehia te tīmatanga o te Great Birmingham 10K i te 31 o Me ki te tata ki te whare tapere o Hippodrome me te whakamutunga e tata ana ki Victoria Square. Ka āhua katoa te Tapawhā o Hato Paora, te Hauwhā Rei, te whare karakia o Hato Mātini me ngā Mākete Pūru. Ka tīaho te takahanga i tētahi mārama "i runga i te ngākau hītori o Birmingham", te kī a nga kaiwhakahaere. New route highlights David Hart, partnerships director for organisers the Great Run Company, said they wanted the new route to be a celebration of all that's great about the city. "Ko te ara hou, pai ake hoki mō te 10k o tēnei tau he whakaaturanga tino pai mō tētahi āhua hou o Birmingham." Kua mahi tahi te Kamupene Whakahaere Nui me te kaunihera o te taone, ngā kaiwhakarato waka tūmatanui me ngā Rohe Whakapai Pakihi e rima o te pokapū o te taone. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Great Birmingham 10K

title: Ngā tākarotanga o Las Vegas: He pūtohu te kaipupuri?
summary: I te putanga mai o ngā taipitopito mō te tangata pū o Las Vegas nāna i patu neke atu i te 58 ngā tāngata, ā, neke atu i te 500 ētahi atu, kua tīmata tētahi taupatupatu tuihono he aha i kore ai a Stephen Paddock e tapaina he pūtohu.
text: Heoi anō, ko te pakeke e 64 tau nāna i whakatuwhera ahi mai i te papa 32 o te Hōtēra o Mandalay Bay ki tētahi hākari pūoro tuwhera i te ahiahi o te Rātapu, kua whakaahuatia e ngā kōrero rongokōrero he "wuruhi takitahi", he "tupuna", he "kaitākaro", me tētahi "kaikaute o mua", engari ehara i te pūtohu. Kāore anō mātau kia mōhio he aha te mea i whakahauhau ai a Paddock ki te mahi i te whakaeke whakamate. Kāore anō kia kitea he hononga ki te pūtōraru o te ao whānui, ā, kāore he whakaūnga o te mate hinengaro. Heoi anō i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, he tokomaha i whakamārama, mehemea he Mohimana a Paddock, tata tonu te whakamahinga o te kupu "pūtohu" hei whakaahua i a ia, he hononga ki te pūtōraru o te Māori ahakoa kāore he whakaaturanga. Kua kōrerorerotia katoatia e ngā tāngata rongonui, ngā tuakiri pouaka whakaata me ngā mātauranga he aha i kore ai tēnei e pā mai i tēnei take. E ai ki te ture o te kāwanatanga o Nevada, e whakaahuatia ana tētahi "mahi pūtōraru" e whai ake nei: "Ko ngā mahi katoa e pā ana ki te whakamahi i te tutu e pā ana ki te tūkino nui, ki te mate rānei ki te iwi whānui." I te taumata o te hau, ka whakamāramatia e te US te "pūtōraru ā-kāinga" hei ngohe e tutuki ana i ngā paearu e toru - "mōrearea ki te oranga tangata e takahi ana i te ture a te hau, kāwanatanga rānei", ko ērā e hiahiatia ana hei whakamataku, hei whakahau rānei i ngā tangata whenua, kāwanatanga rānei, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā i roto i a Mātau. E kī ana hoki te WHW me whai whāinga ki te "whakamataku, ki te whakahau rānei i tētahi kāwanatanga, te iwi whānui, tētahi wāhanga rānei, ki te whakanui ake i ngā kaupapa tōrangapū, pāpori rānei". Te āhua nei he kī tēnei huānga - ehara i te mea ko te whakapae o te tutu e ngana ana ki te tūkino i te nui, engari e ngana ana ki te whakaawe i te kāwanatanga, ki te whakanui rānei i tētahi ariā? He tokomaha i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i tiritiri i tētahi whakaahua o tētahi whakamāramatanga o te ture ā rohe o Nevada, ā, i pātai he aha, ahakoa te whakahuahua mārama, ka kī te sheriff o te Tari Pirihimana o Las Vegas Metropolitan Joseph Lombardo i te wā o tētahi hui pānui mō Paddock: "Kāore mātou i te mōhio he aha tana pūnaha whakapono i tēnei wā. I tēnei wā, e whakapono ana mātou he kaitapere kotahi, he kaitapere momo wuruhi mokemoke." I runga i te Twitter, neke atu i te 200,000 ngā wā i whakamahia ai te kīanga "wuruhi takitahi" mai i te whakaekenga o te Mane. Neke atu i te 170,000 ngā wā i whakamahia ai ngā kupu "kōkiri pūtohu" i te tautohetohe a te tangata he aha te āhua o te rerekētanga mārama i waenganui i te whakaahuatanga o ngā pōhēhētanga mā me ērā tae. I runga i te Facebook kua whakanuia hoki te kōrero. I kī a Mursal i Initonīhia: "Kāore a ia i whakaarotia he pūtū pūtū ao whānui? Tērā pea nā te mea ehara tōna kanohi i te Arapi!" I whakapuakina e te kaiwhakamahi Facebook o Amerika Mohimana a Mahmoud ElAwadi tōna pouri i te rongonga i ngā rongo, engari i whakaahuatia he pēhea te kore e pā te whakaeke ki te iwi mā i te āhua i pāngia ai tōna whānau e ngā whakaekenga a te Rūnanga. "Ko te tikanga o ia tākaro maha kei te mōrearea te ora o taku wahine nā te mea i kōwhiria e ia ki te taupoki i ōna makawe, ka whakaekea taku tama i te kura nā te mea ko Mohamed tōna ingoa, ka tika te mahi a taku tamāhine 4 tau nā te mea e kōrero ana ia i te reo Arapi, engari rawa mēnā he mā te pūtūtū, he Karaitiana hoki, kātahi ka ohorere he tangata mate hinengaro ia, ā, he pūnoa ngā mea katoa." Ko ngā whakawā uara i te AO he tohutohu mārama mo te whakamahinga o ngā kupu pūtohu, pūtōraru rānei. E kī ana te tohutohu ētita o TE HAU: "Kāore he whakaaetanga whakaae ki te aha he mahi pūtohu, pūtohu rānei. Ko te whakamahinga o te kupu ka pā ki te whakawā uara. "Nō reira, kaua tātau e huri i te kupu 'pūtohu' ina whakahua i tētahi atu, engari me karo tātau ki te whakamahi i a tātau anō. " Ehara tēnei i te tikanga kia karohia e tātau te whakapuaki i te pono me te wehi o tētahi mahi; engari me whakaaro tātau he pēhea te pānga o tā tātau whakamahinga reo ki tō tātau rongo mō te pukapuka pukapuka whāinga." Ahakoa te nuinga o ngā kōrero e whakahē ana i ngā mana me te pāpāho mō te kore e tapa i a Paddock he pūtohu, tērā ētahi tohenga ātete me ngā huatau he aha. Nā te UGC me te Tīma Rongokōrero Pāpori, he pūrongo tāpiri nā te Taki Ao Rangirua

title: Me pēhea te whakarata i te rauropi i ia rā
summary: He nui rawa tā mātou rongo mō te huringa āhuarangi inā noa nei, ā, kāore i te pai te āhua o ngā take.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Matua Pūkaha-JonesNewsbeat e whakaatu ana te whakaaturanga, he mihi ki ngā mahi a te tangata, kei te piki ake ngā pāmahana o te ao ki tētahi taumata kāore e taea e te taiao te ora. Koia tērā te take i tangohia ai e ngā tāngata o rātau kākahu i te pāremata me ngā tamariki kura e tuki ana. (Tērā anō, ina tīmata te tipuna o te iwi a David Attenborough ki te kōrero, tērā pea ka whai painga te whakarongo.) Engari he uaua. Kei te taiea mātau ki ngā pūrākau whakamataku, ā, ka kīia me huri tātau i o tātau ara - ākuanei. Nā, he aha tonu tā mātou mahi? Me pēhea e taea ai e tātau te whakarerekē ina āhua nei he kino te pānga o ngā mea katoa ki te āhuarangi? Āe, kua kōrerorero a Radio 1 Newsbeat ki ngā kairangitaki pūmau mō ngā tohutohu mō ngā huringa ngāwari ka taea e mātou hei āwhina ki te whakaiti i tō mātou pānga. Ko te tuatahi kia kaua e patu i a koe ki te wareware koe i tō pēke mo te ora, i tō kapu rānei ka taea te whakamahi anō - tērā pea ka tāpiri noa iho ki tō māharahara rauropi. "Kore rawa ahau i whai whakaaro me tino tika ahau," te kī a Shia Su mai i te rangitaki moumou kore o Wasteland Rebel. "Kaore ahau i whai whakaaro ki te haere ki te kore-moumou. I pānui ahau mō taua mea, ā, i whakaaro noa ahau he cuckoo, he koretake," tana kī. Engari i tētahi rā ka whakatau a ia ki te mau i tētahi ipu ki tōna toa kawhe paetata, kaua e tono i tētahi kai - a, ka kākāriki ake a ia i reira. Nā, i pēhea a Shia i tae ai ki te wāhi e kī ana ināianei ka taea e ia te whakauru i te ururua o tana tau katoa ki roto i te ipu rahi rīta? Ko tana aki tuarua - i tiria e te nuinga o ngā kairangitaki i kōrero ai mātau - ko te huri i ō whakaaro pai hei tikanga pai. Mahia ngā mea katoa e taea e koe, ā, i muri i tētahi wā ka noho hei tikanga," tana kī. "I te nuinga o te wā, ina wehe atu koe i te whare ka hopu koe i tō waea, ka hopu koe i tō pēke, ka hopu koe i ō kī. " I muri i tētahi wā ka hopu koe i tō pounamu, tō ipu kai, kātahi ka pai koe ki te haere - ka noho hei tikanga." A, ko te aki tuatoru e tiritiri ana a ā mātou kairangitaki katoa pea ko te mea e pā ana ki te huringa nui rawa. E pā ana ki te noho i tētahi āhua noho iti rawa - te tapahi i ngā hoko koretake. "Ko te noho i tētahi āhua noho pūmau, he iti iho te kai i te ahuwhānui," te kī a Shia. "Ka hokona anake e au he kākahu hou mēnā e hiahia ana tētahi atu ki te whakakapi." E kī ana a Shia ehara i te uaua ki tōna tangi: "He maha ngā mea kua oti kē - kei te hoki noa mātou ki a rātou. " Pātai atu ki ō tīpuna, ka taea e rātou te ako i a koe me pēhea te kore e waihanga para. "He wheako hononga tino pai hoki. Ki taku whakaaro ka menemene rātau ina puta atu ahau i taku hanky ki te pupuhi i taku ihu [kaua ko te kikokiko maka]." He aha atu anō taku mahi hei āwhina i ahau ki te noho kākāriki ake? I whiwhi mātou i ētahi atu kairangitaki rauropi me ngā Instagrammers ki te homai i ā rātou aki matua mō ngā wāhi rerekē o te ora. Ka rangitaki a Fashion Tolmeia Gregory mō te huatau matatika i raro i te ingoa o TollyDollyPosh. Haere ki te waina: "Mahia ngā mea pēnei i te hokohoko ringa tuarua me te waina, haere ki tō toa aroha paetata. Ka taea hoki e koe te hoko i runga i ngā pae pēnei i te eBay me te Depop." Hokona iti iho: "Mēnā ka taea e koe, ko te kore hokohoko he huarahi tino pai ki te mahi. Te awhi i ngā mea kei a koe kē, me ngā mea kei roto kē i tō kākahu. He kīanga tino pai e rongo ana koe: 'Aroha ki ngā kākahu whakamutunga'". Kimihia ngā rauemi rauropi: "Tirohia ētahi atu weu māori - haere ki te miro i runga i te polyester. Ehara i te mea he pai ake te rongo ina mau koe, engari kāore he mea pēnei i ngā microfibres e haere ana ki roto i tō mātou wai, ki te oranga moana ina horoi mātou i o tātau kākahu." Ako ki te DIY: "Kāore i te nui te ako me pēhea te tuitui ā-ringa me te tuitui i tētahi rua. Mēnā rānei he tarau tāhaehae tāu e āhua tāhaetia ana, ka taea e koe te tapahi i ngā wā katoa me te pupuri hei tarau poto." Kai Immy Lucas he kairangitaki me te YouTuber e haere ana i raro i te ingoa Sustainably Vegan. Whakaarohia he kai tipu ake: "Ki taku whakaaro kāore te katoa e haere ki te vegan kia nui ai te huringa. Ko te mea tūturu ake mō te nuinga o ngā tāngata e tapahi ana i te whakapaunga mīti ki ngā rā e rua i te wiki." Kai i te paetata e taea ana: "Mēnā kei te kai koe i ngā pīni soya e tukuna ana mai i Haina, i ngā panana rānei kua tukuna mai i Koromopia, ehara tēnā i te mea e kai ana koe i ngā āporo i tipu i Keti. Mēnā e tautoko ana koe i tō mākete kaiahuwhenua paetata, kei te tautoko hoki koe i ētahi atu ahuwhenua kai tauine iti e atawhai ake ana ki te Ao. " Kai i te wā e taea ana: "Mēnā kei te kai tōmato koe mai i te UK kāore i te tau, ka mōhio koe kua tipu i roto i ētahi kati kati nui e whakamahi ana i te nui o ngā rauemi hei tinihanga i te huarere. Nā reira kei te whakamahi koe i te pūngao wera nui hei whakatipu i ngā tōmato i waho o te tau." Whakaarohia te pōkai: "He toa parakore kore e hoko ai koe i ngā kai kāore i te pōkaitia. Engari ka taea hoki e koe te haere ki te hokomaha, me te mahi kōwhiringa pai ake mā te hoko hua rākau me ngā manga kāore i pōkaitia, mā te kōwhiri rānei i ngā kēne me ngā pepa e tukurua whānuitia ana, kaua ko te kirihou. Nā reira he kōwhiringa pai ake ka taea e koe te mahi i roto i ngā toa auau." Ko Beauty Nicole Whittle - AKA VeganBeautyGirl - e rangitaki ana mō te noho i tētahi oranga vegan. Waiho ngā horoi kanohi: "Whakamahia noa iho he harakeke tawhito pai pēnei i tō whanau i roto i tōna kaukau, me tētahi horoi hinu pai hei āwhina ki te pakaru i te whakapai i te mutunga o te rā. Mēnā he pēpi tāu, ā, e hiahia ana koe ki tēnā whaikikotanga i runga i te haere, ka kitea e koe ngā horoi biodegradable." Hokona pōkai kore: "Ka taea e koe te tiki i ngā pae horoi horoi tinana - tērā pea he nui ake te utu, engari he roa ake te utu. Nā reira he iti iho te utu-ia-whakamahinga." Whakaarohia ō hua marama: "He tūemi whakamahi-kotahi ngā tampon me ngā papa, ā, kāore te katoa e whakawātea tika. Ko te huringa nui ka taea e koe ko te haere ki te kapu marama, arā, he kapu silicone e hopu ana i ngā toto katoa, ā, ka taea te whakamahi anō i ia marama - ehara i te mea whakamataku ki te tangi. Tērā anō ngā kākahu o roto marama i ēnei rā, he nui ake te pūmautanga." Ka taea hoki e ngā toa nunui te rauropi: "He nui tonu ngā toa ātaahua nunui e tino whai whakaaro ana i te nekehanga taiao vegan. He rawe te kite i ēnei huringa e puta ana. Kua roa te wā engari kua kite ēnei toa he wā heke mai i ēnei momo hua." Ka whakahaere a Travel Florine Hofmann i te Rangitaki Moumou, e ngana ana ia ki te kimi whiringa rauropi ki ngā tikanga o ia rā. Whakaarohia tō haerenga: "He tino waimarie mātou i konei i Uropi - i te nuinga o te wā ka ngana ahau ki te haere i te tereina i ngā wā katoa e taea ana e au. E mōhio ana ahau ki te ngana ki te rere i te iti rawa e taea ana." Pōkai pūmau: "Kātahi anō ahau ka hokona mai he pāhi ringa tuarua nā te mea he mea kē i hangaia, ā, he māmā ake. E ngana ana ahau ki te pōkai i te iti rawa - hei tauira, ko aku taonga horoi e ngana ana ahau ki te whakaiti ki te hopi me te pae horoi, te heu tīra me te paraihe niho. Kāore au e pīrangi ki tēnā nui o ngā para kirihou i tētahi atu whenua. E ngana ana ahau ki te waiho i te iti rawa e taea ana." Whakaritea te wāhi e kai ai koe: "I te nuinga o te wā ka rangahau ahau i mua. He tino kai ahau, nā reira he tino hira i roto i tōku oranga ia rā. Engari nā te mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te tautoko i ngā wharekai hei tauira e whakaaro ana ki ā rātou para, ahakoa wairākau rānei, kāore rānei." Local knowledge is best: "I love reting a bike in a new city and just exploring new areas. Ka kitea e koe ngā wāhi tino pai mā te kōrero ki ngā tāngata me te tiki i ngā kōhatu huna katoa." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Coronavirus: Royal couple say lockdown 'stressful' on mental health
summary: He "hauā" te raka o te Coronavirus mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, ā, he mea nui kia tiaki i te hauora hinengaro, kua kī te Duke me te Duchess of Cambridge.
text: I kī a Pirini William he "hiahia nui tonu" kia mōhio te tangata ki hea uru ai ki te āwhina me te tautoko. I roto i tētahi uiuinga o TE HAU, i kī a ia me ngongo ngā kaimahi NHS i te mamae me te mokemoke o ngā tūroro coronavirus. Ka haere tonu te ariki ki te whakaatu i tōna māharahara i te kitenga o tōna pāpā, te Piriniha o Weera, i te huaketo. I roto i tētahi uiuinga whānui mō te mate urutā, te hauora hinengaro me te NHS, i whakaahuatia e Prince William he pēhea te "whakararuraru" o te raka e toru wiki mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata me te "pēhanga, te hauora me te taratahi". "If we are going to go forward with more time spent in lockdown, then there is going to be an ever-increasing need for people to look after their mental health and take it seriously and also know where to go to get the support they might need," he said. Catherine said there had been a focus on physical well-being during the lockdown - with people being told one of the reason they can leave their homes is for one form of exercise a day. "While that's hugely important we must not forget our mental well-being as well and making sure you're reaching out to those people around you that you have access to - even if it's over the phone or online to really make sure you have those conversations," she said. I kii a Prince William he awangawanga ka whakaaro pea te iwi "kaore e tika kia tautokona" na te pehanga o nga ratonga i te wa o te mate coronavirus. "He mea nui kia kaua e warewaretia ētahi atu tāngata me te hunga e hiahia ana ki te āwhina, me te hiahia tautoko, ā, kāore anō kia whakaaro ki tō rātou oranga hinengaro, tīmata ki te mahi i tēnā i roto i tēnei āhuarangi rerekē kei roto tātau," tana kī. E hiahia ana te tokorua ki te whakahauhau i ngā tāngata kia kōrero tētahi ki tētahi mā te whakamahi i te hangarau me te whakamahi hoki i ngā utauta tuihono pēnei i te NHS Every Mind Matters hei āwhina i a rāua i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus. I te wā o te uiuinga, ka whakamihi hoki te ariki me te ariki ki ngā kaimahi NHS, ā, i kī rātau e whakakake ana i te iwi ki to rātau "ngākau nui me te manawanui" kia puta i te taiepa. Engari i kī a Pirini William e mārama ana ētahi kaimahi, ā, he mea nui kia kaua e whakararuraru i te hunga e "māharahara" ana, ā, "e mataku ana ki te mahi i ia rā". I kī a ia me ngongo e ngā kaimahi NHS te mamae me te mokemoke o ngā tūroro coronavirus, ā, "kawea ki te kāinga ki o rātau whānau". "Ehara mātau i te tangata nui, tētahi o mātau. Nā reira kia āhei ai ki te whakahaere i aua ngākau, ā, ka roa te wā i muri i te mutunga o tēnei katoa." I muri i te whā wiki o te raka, kei te pahū a William rāua ko Catherine i te pahū mo te hauora hinengaro, e kī ana ki ngā tūpāpaku tūpāpaku kia kōrero me te toro atu, me te ngana ki te noho hei kīngi ngākau māia i te wā e kore ai te toenga o te Whānau Kingi, e hiahiatia ana, e kōwhiri rānei, e kore e kitea. He iti noa iho te ārai i tātuhia ki runga i te oranga tūmataiti o Kingi: he waea ataata i waenganui i ngā whakatupuranga, he piki me ngā heke, he mārama tonu te āhua o Māmā i te mea katoa, kei te whakaaro a Pāpā ki tōna tinana. He rite tonu ki te nui o ngā oranga o Ingarangi, ahakoa he nui ake ngā whare kōti. Kua pau i a William rāua ko Catherine te wā e kōrero ana ki ngā kaimahi hōhipera i ngā wiki tata nei, ā, e mārama ana mai i tō rāua reo kua pāngia, kua whakamataku hoki i a rāua. Kei te whakatangi rātau i te matohi ināianei mō te āwhina hauora hinengaro mō te hunga i te pito tino koi o tēnei mate. I tāpiri mai te ariki: "Ko tā mātou e kite nei ināianei ko te NHS me ngā kaimahi o mua e mahi ana i te mahi tino whakaharahara. Ā, kua tino tae mai tēnā ki te aronga i ngā wiki tata nei. "It's going to dramatically change how we all value and see our frontline workers. Koia tērā tētahi o ngā tino pai ka taea e koe te tango mai i tēnei." I kōrero anō a Pirini William mō tōna māharahara ki tōna pāpā, a Piriniha Charles i tana whakamātautau pai mō te coronavirus i muri i tana whakamātautau. "Me whakaae ahau, i te tuatahi i tino māharahara ahau, e uru ana ia ki te kōtaha o tētahi tangata, i tōna pakeketanga, he tino mōrearea," te kī a Piriniha William. Engari i kī a ia he maha ngā mate poho me te rewharewha i pā ki tōna pāpā, nā reira i whakaaro ia ka ora a Piriniha Charles. I kī hoki a ia e māharahara ana ki ōna tīpuna - te Kuini me te Ariki o Etinitini - engari i mahi rātau i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e rātau kia parea, kia taratahitia hoki. I kī te rangatira i anga atu rātau ki "ngā piki me ngā heke" i te wā o te raka "pēnei i te maha o ngā whānau". I kī a ia he "uaua" te whakaako i a rātau tamariki - ko Piriniha Hōri, ko Pirinihi Charlotte me Piriniha Louis - engari he pākaha ta rātau whakahaere. "Kāore mātou e kī atu ki ngā tamariki kua haere tonu mātou i roto i ngā hararei. He tino kino ahau," tana tāpiri mai. I kī hoki te tokorua kua whakapā tonu rāua ki ētahi atu mema o te whānau mā ngā waea ataata tuihono. "He āhua pōhēhē, kāore au e teka, me te rua tau te pakeke me tango e koe te waea," te kī a Catherine. "He tino pōturi ki a rātou katoa te kōrero i te mea tika i te wā tika me te kore pēhi i ngā pātene hē. Engari he tino pai, he pai hoki te whakapā atu ki te katoa."

title: Ka whakahonoretia e Met Gala te kaihoahoa ahua Hapanihi o Rei Kawakubo
summary: Kei te heke iho nga whetū o te ao whakangahau me te ao ahua ki Niu Ioka mo te Met Gala ā-tau.
text: I ia tau, he rerekē te tāhuhu kākahu o te Metropolitan Museum of Art - te pō nui rawa o te maramataka pāpori o New York - ā, i tēnei wā, ka whakahonoretia te poutohu huatau Hapanihi o Rei Kawakubo. Ka tīmata te gala kohi moni i tētahi whakaaturanga motuhake i runga i te kaihoahoa avant-garde i te whare taonga. 'Ultimate renegade' E mōhiotia ana te pakeke 74 tau mō te pana i ngā rohenga, e whakarehu ana i ngā raina i waenganui i te toi me te ahua. Na tana tapanga Comme des Garcons, kua hangaia e ia i roto i nga tekau tau kua taha he emepaea ahua o te ao. I whakanuia i roto i te pēhi ahua, e whakaahuatia ana a Kawakubo hei "kaiwhaiwhai" e Harper's Bazaar, "te kaihoahoa tino whakarihariha" rānei e GQ, e "pātai ana te hunga whakarongo ki ngā mea katoa e mōhio ana rātou mō ngā kākahu taketake". "He wāhanga a Rei Kawakubo o tētahi nekehanga o ngā kaihoahoa Hapanihi i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, i reira rātau i tahuri ai i ngā mea katoa e paingia ana i roto i te ahua," te kī a Sharon Lim, te kaiwhakatika o mua o Elle Asia, ki te HAU. "I rongonuitia ngā kaihoahoa Hapanihi i taua wā mo te kore e whakakororia i te āhua tangata - he momo punk rātau nā te mea i whakangaromia e rātau ētahi ariā o te āhua wahine tūturu." I runga i te rongonui o te whati i te tikanga me te tikanga, e whakaarotia ana a Rei Kawakubo e te tokomaha he rehetoi kē atu i te kaihoahoa - he rerekētanga nāna anō, ahakoa, i whakaahuatia he "koretake". "Ko tāku anake e hiahia ana ko ngā kākahu kāore anō kia kitea i mua, he tino hōu, me pēhea hoki e taea ai te whakapuaki," tana kī i roto i ngā tuhipoka ki te whakaaturanga Tūtaki. "E kiia ana tēnā ko te huatau? Kāore au i te mōhio ki te whakautu." Defying convention The exhibition, titled Art of the In-Between, will open on 4 May and sets out to show Kawakubo's "ability to challenge conventional notions of beauty, good taste, and fashionability". E ai ki te kaitiaki whakaaturanga a Andrew Bolton, "kua whakaawetia e ia tētahi whakatupuranga katoa, ehara i te mea ko ngā kaihoahoa anake, engari ko ngā kaiwaiata me ngā kaihoahoa hoki mā tana mahi". "Ka whakahaua koe e ia ki te whakaaro anō i ngā ariā ātaahua, ngā ariā o te tinana, ngā ariā o te ahua, ngā ariā o te mauranga - te tukituki i ēnei ārai mā te waihanga i ngā tuakiri hinu." Pērā ki te maha o ngā hanganga haute couture, he rite tonu te kotiti atu o ngā hoahoa a Ms Kawakubo i ngā ariā ahua taketake, he uaua ki te whakaaro i tētahi tautuhinga atu i te waka rererangi whakaaturanga ahua. Engari mā te hanga i tana kamupene hei toa maha, kua taea e ia te whai kohinga waka rererangi me ētahi atu toa ā-whare hei taupoki i ngā hoahoa whānui ake me ngā taumata utu. He mea rerekē te tirohanga o waho o Kawakubo ki te tihi o te avant-garde ahu, i tīmata i Tiapanī i tawhiti atu i te māramatanga o te pūmatua ahua o te ao whānui o Parihi. Ehara i te whakangungu i te ahua, i te hoahoa rānei, i ako ia i ngā toi pai me te hītori o ngā āhuatanga rerehua i roto i ngā toi Āhia me te Uru. I a ia e neke ana ki te huatau me te hoahoa hei tauhou, ka whakatūria e ia a Comme des Garcons i ngā tau tōmua o te tau 1970 i Tiapani. I muri i tana tīmatanga ki te whakaaturanga i roto i ngā whakaaturanga ahua Wīwī, ka whakawhānuitia e ia ki Parihi, ā, i te mutunga o te ao. Ehara i te mea he kaihoahoa noa iho, engari he wahine kaipakihi mātauranga hoki, ka huri a ia i tana umanga hei rangatiratanga ahua o te ao. Nō nā tata nei, kua whakarewaina hoki e ia te mekameka hokohoko ā-ao o Dover Street Market. He āhua mokemoke a ia, āhua kore nei a ia e hoatu uiuinga, ā, ka ngana ki te karo i te aro atu ki te iwi whānui. He ahua, he toi rānei? Ko te whakaaturanga o ana mahi te whakaaturanga tuatahi a te Met o tētahi kaihoahoa ahua ora mo te neke atu i te 30 tau. E ai ki a Bolton, ko te mea whakamutunga - he whakaaturanga 1983 o Yves Saint Laurent - i whakahētia mō ngā mea i kitea e te iwi he tauhokohoko kāore e tika ana mō ngā hōro tapu o tētahi whare taonga toi. I te roanga o te wā, e kī ana a ia i roto i te putumōhio whakaaturanga, "kua rerekē te tūnga o te huatau, i te ao toi, i roto hoki i te whare taonga". Sharon Lim agrees that Kawakubo's work can be seen as art, describing it as "architectural, with an incredible technique when it comes to silhouettes, draping and fit". "Ka āhei hoki a ia ki te wehe i ngā ariā tūturu o te ahua," te whakamārama a Ms Lim. "He roa te wā ki te mārama ki tāna mahi, ā, i te nuinga o te wā he tino weriweri tāna e whakaatu ana - engari i roto i tētahi huarahi rerekē he ātaahua ki ōna kākahu."

title: Sports Direct site 'called ambulances thousands of times'
summary: I karangatia ngā waka tūroro ki te tari matua o tētahi o ngā kaihoko hākinakina nui rawa o Uropi e 76 ngā wā i roto i te rua tau, i kitea he tūhuratanga o TE HAU.
text: Ko te nuinga o ngā waea, mō ngā kaimahi i te matatini o Sports Direct i Shirebrook, i Derbyshire, mō ngā mate "whakamate". I kī ngā kaimahi o mua i "mataku rawa" ētahi kaimahi ki te wehe māuiui nā te mea i wehi rātau ki te ngaro i a rātau mahi. I kī a Sports Direct e whai ana kia whakarato i ngā here mahi haumaru mō te katoa. 'E mahi ana i raro i te wehi' E 76 ngā waka tūroro, motokā paramedic rānei i tukuna ki te waehere poutāpeta o te pokapū tuari i waenganui i Hānuere 2013 me Hakihea 2014, me ngā kēhi e 36 i whakaakona hei "whakawehi ora", tae atu ki ngā mamae pouaka, ngā raruraru hā, ngā kōruru me ngā hahau. E whitu anō ngā waea mō ngā waka tūroro i mahia, engari i whakakorea. Ko ngā whika, i puta mai i tētahi tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio i hangaia e te tīma Inside Out o TE AO ki te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o East Midlands, i whakaaturia hoki e toru ngā waea i whiwhi ai te ratonga mō ngā wāhine e uaua ana te hapu, tae atu ki tētahi i whānau i roto i ngā whare taonga i te pae. Mai i tērā wā kua tukuna atu ngā taipitopito ki te Kaiwhakahaere Hauora me te Haumaru, nāna i kī ka tirohia ngā raraunga. O ngā waea e 999, e ono mō ngā aituā motokā i runga i tētahi huarahi, papa motokā rānei i te taha o te pokapū, kotahi mō te ngau kurī, ā, e rua neke atu rānei mō tētahi toa i runga i te pae. Kāore i te mārama e hia o ēnei waea mō ngā mano o ngā kaimahi kōwhiringa i runga i te pae. Ko tētahi o ngā kēhi i pā ki a Guntars Zarins, e 52 tau, i pāngia e ia te whiu i roto i te wharekai whare putunga. I kī tana tamāhine a Liga Zarina-Shaw kua haere a Tēnā Zarins ki te mahi me ngā āhuatanga rewharewha nā te mea i mataku rawa a ia ki te whakawātea. Kaore te whānau e whakapae i a Sports Direct, i te kōwhiringa rānei i mahi i a ia mo tana whiu, engari i kī a Ms Zarina-Shaw e māharahara ana tōna pāpā ki tana mahi. "I mataku tonu a ia ki te mate i tētahi rā," tana kī. "Ināianei e mōhio ana ahau he aha, nā te mea ehara i te mea noa iho te mea e puta ana i reira," tana tāpiri mai. I pararaiha a Tāne Zarins i tōna taha matau, engari mai i tērā wā ka pā mai tētahi atu whiu, ā, kua hoki mai ki te hōhipera. I kī a Ms Zarina-Shaw e māharahara ana ngā kaimahi mō tētahi kaupapahere "e ono ngā tuki" e whakamahia ana e tētahi kōwhiringa e whakarato ana i ngā kaimahi ki Sports Direct. E kī ana tētahi tuhinga i hangaia e tētahi o ngā umanga: "Ko te tangata e nui ake ana i te ono tuki i roto i te wā e ono marama ka mutu tana mahi i Sports Direct." Ka taea e ngā kaimahi te whiwhi i tētahi tuki mō ngā "hara" tae atu ki: Ka tāpiritia e te tuhinga ngā umanga ka taea te whakamutu i tētahi tautapatanga "ahakoa te wā kāore he take, he pānui, he taunaha rānei". I kī a Unite kua korerotia i tērā tau tata ki te 3,000 ngā kaimahi kōwhiringa i te tari matua o Shirebrook o Sports Direct, i whakatūria e te kaiwawao o Maika Ashley. Kua pūrongotia hoki e Sports Direct ngā aituā i roto i tōna whare putunga kua tāruatia i te tau ā-pūtea kua hipa. I whakahekea e te umanga te pikinga o ngā aituā ki ngā mahi hanga i runga i te pae, nāna i hua ai te "nui ake o te waewae me te heke o te mokowāmahi". E ai ki ngā whika o te kaunihera, e 38 ngā aituā i pūrongotia puta noa i te 2013 me te 2014, tae atu ki te kakī whati, i te pānga o tētahi tangata ki tētahi ahanoa nekeneke, he ringa kuru i te mīhini neke, i te whara o te tuarā me te māhunga. I te hui ā-tau a te umanga, ka kī atu a Keith Hellawell, te manukura, ki ngā kaipupuri i a ia e whakaae ana te kamupene ki ngā ture hauora me te haumaru, ā, ka tūhuratia wawetia ngā māharahara. Kua whakahētia te umanga i mua hei "Dickensian" i roto i ana mahi mahi. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Sports Direct: "E whai ana a Sports Direct ki te whakarato i ngā here mahi e hāngai ana ki ngā ture mahi me te hauora me te haumaru, ā, e whai ana ki te whakarato i ngā here mahi haumaru mō ngā kaimahi katoa e mahi ana i tō mātou whare putunga." Tāpiri: "He pai tā mātou pātahitanga mahi ki tō mātou āpiha hauora taiao paetata, ā, ka mahi tahi mātou ki te pupuri me te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga o ā mātou āhuatanga mahi." I tāpiritia e te umanga, e 24 anake ngā waka tūroro i karangatia hāngai ki tōna whare putunga i te wā e hipa ana i te tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio. I korerotia hoki ki te AO he hē te huatau i haere kino nga kaimahi ki te mahi kino nā te pūnaha taraiwa, ā, kaua e wehi te kaimahi o te kōwhiringa ki te ngaro i a rātau mahi ki te karanga māuiui. Ka pāohotia a Inside Out i te 19:30 i te Mane 5 o Whiringahora, ā, mō te 30 rā i muri mai i te iPlayer.

title: Kua rite a Pākehā mo te pōti EU?
summary: Ko te pōti kāore i tika kia puta. Ko te whakawāteatanga a Pākehā me te toenga o UK kia kaua e whai wāhi.
text: Nā Kete CampbellTe kōrero tōrangapū tōrangapū, o TE Pākehā Engari ko te takaware ki to mātau wehenga atu i te EU, ko te tikanga kei roto tonu te pōti Pāremata o Ūropi 2019 i te rātaka mō te 23 o Me. Kei te arokē ngā rōpū Pākehā ki te whakarite mō te whakataetae e mōhio ana ka taea tonu te whakakore. Nō reira, ko te mibbes aye, ko te mibbes naw election. Ahakoa kei te haere whakamua, kāore rānei, kei te āhua o te tūnga o Ēnā Me i te tihi motuhake o EU i Pōroa. E tono ana te pirimia kia whakaroa i a Pakihitini tae noa ki te 30 o Hune, me te kōwhiringa kia puta atu i mua mēnā ka whakaaetia e ngā MP tētahi mahi me ngā ture e hiahiatia ana. Ki te pā tēnā i te 22 o Me, kua kī a Mīharo Me e kore te pōti o Ūropi e haere whakamua i te UK. Ko ngā ture o tētahi toronga o Te Aotearoa me whakaae ki ngā whenua EU e 28 katoa. Ko te SNP te tuatahi i waenganui i ngā rōpū Pākehā ki te rapu kaitono mō te pōti EU i te Hānuere, ki te hiahiatia pea. E noho ana ngā MEP o Īna Hudghton - te perehitini o te rōpū - me Alyn Smith e tū ana mō te pōti anō. E tūmanako ana rātau kia noho i waenganui i ngā tāne tokotoru me ngā wāhine tokotoru i kōwhiria e te pōti hiko i te wā o te hui SNP. E whakaarotia ana kua hoatu hoki e te MSP o mua me te minita o Aileen MacLeod me te rangatira kaimahi o Tāne Smith, a Laura Rayner, o rāua ingoa. Kua whakaae te MEP roa rawa o te UK, a Rawiri Mātini, e 35 tau te wheako, ki te tū anō mō Te Mahi o Pirihitini. Ka whakarunga a ia i te rārangi o te rōpū. Ko ētahi atu kaitono tūpāpaku tae noa ki te 10 o Āperira ki te whakamua i o rātau ingoa. Kātahi ka uiuia e tētahi pae motuhake o ngā rangatira rōpū o Pākehā me UK me te tīpako i ētahi atu tūmanako e rima. He wahine te kaitono tuarua i whakanohoia, e whakakapi ana i a Catherine Stihler i tū hei MEP i tērā marama. Ko te MEP hou rawa o Pākehā, ko Nosheena Mobarik, e tūmanakohia ana hei kaitono matua mō ngā Tohutohu o Pākehā. I whakakapia e ia a Īna Duncan i te Pāremata o Ūropi i te tau 2017 i tana whakamutu ki te tango i tētahi tūru i roto i nga Ariki, a, ka noho hei minita tari o Pākehā. Tērā pea ko te kaitono tuarua o Tories ko Iain McGill, nāna i whakahauhau mō te Pōti Waiho i te tau 2016. Ka pōhiritia ētahi atu ki te whakamua i o rātau ingoa i tēnei wiki kia whakaarohia e te poari whakahaere o te rōpū. Ko te kaiārahi o mua o UKIP Pākehā, ko David Coburn, tētahi o ngā MEP e ono o Pākehā. E tūmanakotia ana kia tū a ia mo te rōpū o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga i tēnei wā. Kua whakaritea e nga Greens o Pirihitini, kāore anō kia whai MEP, kia whakakapia a ia. Ka whakahekea e o rātau mema he rārangi o ngā kaitono tekau mā whitu i roto i ngā wiki e rua e whai ake nei. I tēnei wā, kotahi tekau mā rua ngā kaitono tūpāpaku o ngā mema o Te Pāremata o Aotearoa, ā, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū, ko Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, e whakaarotia ana ko te makau. 'Ngā whakaritenga ohorere' Kua whakaraupapatia tikatia e te kāwanatanga o UK te raupapa ture kia āhei ai te pōti o Ūropi kia haere whakamua i te 23 o Me. Kua tuhituhi hoki ki ngā āpiha whakahoki e tuku ana kia whakahokia "ngā whakapau tika me te tika mō ngā whakaritenga ohorere". Kua whakaarahia e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ngā māharahara kāore pea i te nui te wā ki te whakaoti i ngā pepa tika hei whai wāhi ki te poipoi. E ono o ngā tūru e 73 o UK i te Pāremata o Ūropi o Pākehā. Me tiritiri ēnei tūru i waenganui i ngā tūnga e 27 e toe ana o te EU mēnā, ā, ina wehe atu te UK. Kua whakamāramatia e te EU me whai wāhi te UK ki te pōti o tēnei tau mēnā kāore anō kia pā mai a Brexit i te wā e tū ana.

title: Kōtaha: Ko te tākuta ārahi o te tāpoi o Hēkana Parata Kani
summary: He tākuta tōmua a Dr Sheik Parata Kani mai i Sierra Leone e tohunga ana ki te kirikā hemorrhagic huaketo.
text: I pāngia e ia te huaketo o te Tīpoka i a ia e tiaki ana i ngā tūroro i a rātau hoki, a, ka mate i te 39 tau i te mate. I te pānuitanga kua whakapokea ia, ka karangatia ia e te Minita Hauora o Sierra Leone, a Miatta Kargbo, he "toa ā iwi" mo ana mahi tohetohe. Ko Dr Kani te upoko o te hōtaka kirikā o Lassa i te Hōhipera Kāwanatanga o Kenema, e 300km (186 māwhiti) ki te rāwhiti o te taone nui o Freetown, i tētahi wāhi e tino nui ana te kirikā o Lassa i te ao. Ko te huaketo Tīpoka, pēnei i te kirikā Lassa, he momo kirikā toto. Neke atu i te 600 ngā tāngata i mate i Sierra Leone, Guinea me Liberia i te tau 2014, tōna tīmatatanga tuatahi i Awherika ki te Uru mai i te kitenga i te tau 1976. I tōna wā i te Hōhipera o Kenema, i mahi anō a Dr Kani hei tākuta, hei kaitohutohu hoki mō te United Nations Mission in Sierra Leone (UNAMSIL), e tohunga ana ki te kirikā Lassa. I mua noa iho i tana matenga, ka kōrero a Dr Kani ki a Umaru Fofana o TE AO i Sierra Leone mō ngā mōrea e anga ana ki a ia me ōna hoa mahi ina tiaki i ngā tūroro urutā. "He ngāwari nga kaimahi hauora ki te mate nā te mea ko mātau te tauranga tuatahi o te karanga mō te hunga e mate ana. Ahakoa te kete katoa i purua e mātau, kei te mōrearea mātau. "E mataku ana ahau mo tōku ora, nā te mea e poipoi ana ahau i tōku oranga. A, ki te mataku koe, me mahi koe i ngā whakatūpatotanga mōrahi, kia mataara, kia noho mataara tonu," tana kī. I runga anō i Kenema, i mahi hoki a ia i te Hōhipera o Connaught i Freetown i tōna wā hei kaitohutohu, e mahi ana me ngā tākuta matua i te hōhipera hei wāhanga o te urupare a te Tīpoka. I te Hānuere 2014 ka tīmata a Dr Kani ki te whakaako i tōna whare wānanga o mua i te taha o ana mahi rongoā i te Hōhipera o Kenema. I whakatūria ia hei Kaiako Pāhono i te Tari Rongoā i te Hōhipera o Sierra Leone, i reira i tīmata ai ia i tana whakangungu hei tākuta. Ko ngā āhuatanga tuatahi i a Hōngongoi 2014 i amuamu a Dr Kani i te mea i whakaarotia he mātao noa iho, engari i muri iho ka kitea ko te huaketo o te tāpoi. I whakaaetia a ia mo te rongoā i te Pokapū Rongoā o te Tīpoka i Kailahun, kotahi wiki i muri i tana kitenga i te mate. I tūmanako ngā tākuta o Medecins Sans Frontieres (MSF) e tiaki ana i a ia ka ora a ia, e pūrongo ana kua whakaaturia e ia ngā tohu o te whakapai ake i te hauora. Engari i mate a ia i te 29 o Hōngongoi 2014, kotahi wiki i muri i te tātaritanga. I mahara a Dr Kani ki a Dr Oliver Johnson, Kaiwhakahaere Kaupapa, King's Sierra Leone Partnership, Connaught Hospital Freetown "Ko te tauhohenga i konei he āhuatanga tūturu o te motu. I mōhiotia whānuitia, i manaakitia hoki a Dr Kani mo tētahi mahi roa, i te ārahi hoki i te whawhai ki te kirikā o Lassa. Ka noho a ia hei tino rangatira mo te urupare a te Tīpoka, nā reira he āhua pouri hōhonu i roto i tētahi hapori iti rawa i konei i Freetown. He hoa a Dr Kani ki te tokomaha o nga tākuta matua me nga nēhi i te Hōhipera o Connaught, ā, i tino mōhiotia he kaiako mō ngā tauira tākuta i tino pouri inanahi, tae atu ki te iwi whānui. I te pakarutanga tuatahi o te rongo kei te māuiui a ia, e whakaaro ana ahau i tāpiritia ki te mataku i waenganui i ngā tākuta me ngā nēhi maha mo te tiaki i ngā tūroro o te tāpoi. I whakaaro te iwi, mehemea ka mate a Dr Kani, ka mate tētahi o tātau. I kī tētahi mema kaimahi he tino tūturu tēnei tīmatatanga. Me mau tēnei urupare ki tētahi taumata hou. Kātahi ia ka kī atu, i runga i te manaaki i te patunga tapu a Dr Kani, ka hīpaetia e ia tōna ake mahi i roto i te urupare a te Tīpoka me te āwhina ki te taururuku puta noa i o mātau hōhipera. Nā tōna rongonui me ōna pātahitanga whaiaro, tērā pea he wāhi huri i roto i te urupare a te Tīpoka, ā, ko taku tūmanako he mea tērā i roto i te takahanga pouri o tōna matenga." I ako a Dr Kani i te Kāreti Rongoā me ngā Pūtaiao Hauora Haumi o te Whare Wānanga o Sierra Leone. I te tau 2001, ka tīmata a ia ki te mahi hei tākuta rongoā me te mate urutā. I muri noa iho i te whare wānanga, ka tīmata a ia ki te mahi mō te Manatu Hauora me te Nohoanga o Sierra Leone, i reira ia i mahi ai tae noa ki te tau 2005. Kātahi ia ka whakatairangatia ki te ārahi i te hōtaka kirikā Lassa i Kenema. I pau hoki tana wā, i waenganui i te 2010 me te 2013, i te mahi i tētahi wāhi noho i roto i te Rongoā ā-Roto i te Hōhipera Whakaako Korle-Bu i Accra, Ghana. Tīpoka mai i te tau 1976

title: Ko ngā mārena o Swansea me Caerphilly i waenganui i te tuatahi i UK kia mārena i te tangata kotahi
summary: Tokorua ngā mārena mai i Uēra i waenganui i te tuatahi i te UK kia mārena te tangata kotahi.
text: I kī a Darren Williams rāua ko Federico Podeschi, mai i Swansea, he mea nui kia hoatu e te hui ki a rāua ngā mana ōrite ki te tokorua moe wahine. I Caerphilly, ka kī a Lisa rāua ko Claire: "Kāore te mahi ā-iwi i te ōrite ki te tikanga, koia tērā i tatari ai māua i tēnei rā." Kua tū hoki he whakatūtū hai whakanui i te ture mārena hou. I kitea e tētahi poipoi o TE AO e 68% o ngā tāngata e whakaae ana ki te huringa o te ture, engari ko te rima o ngā tāngata o Ingarangi ka whakakāhore i tētahi tono ki tētahi mārena tangata kotahi. E toru tau te tokorua o Tāne Williams rāua ko Tāne Podeschi, engari i kī rāua kāore rāua i pīrangi ki tētahi mahi ā iwi. Kua kōwhiria e rātau kia tatari kia mārena rā anō rātau i te aroaro o te ture. I neke a Tēnā Podeschi ki Uēra mai i Itari hei ākonga. Ko te kaupapa mo te mārena i te hōro o te takiwā o Swansea he whakakotahitanga o ngā tikanga Celtic me Itari. Kua rere atu tōna whānau me ōna hoa mo te rā nui. I Itari, kāore e whakaaetia, e mōhiotia rānei te mārena tangata kotahi. I kī te tokorua e mōhio ana rāua ka whakaae ētahi tāngata ki to rāua tūnga hou, engari he tokomaha ētahi atu kāore e pai. Engari ki a rāua, ko te mārena he āhukahuka tūmatanui, ā-ture hoki ki to rāua whāinga ki a rāua anō. I kī a Tēnā Williams: "Ko ngā mana e taea ana e te tokorua mārena i te UK i tēnei wā kāore i te tino whakaaturia i roto i tētahi mahi ā iwi. " Nā reira ko te tino ōritetanga mōku me Federico te mea nui. "I te mutunga o te rā, kei te mārena māua tētahi ki tētahi nā te mea e aroha ana māua ki a rāua, ā, kāore he mea kē atu. " I kī tonu taku pāpā 'Kaore au e whakapono kei te mārena taku tamaiti iti'. A, e 44 ahau." I kī a Tēnā Podeschi: "Kei te āhei noa iho ki te whai ōritetanga katoa ina tae mai ki te tuku iho, ina tae mai ki ngā kawenga ā-ture me ngā mahi, tae atu ki ngā painga o te pātahitanga." I muri i te hui, ka kī a ia: "Kāore i taea te tino tika ake. He ngākau whakamahana, he ngākau ngākau, ā, i tino pai mātau ki tōna haerenga." I mārena a Lisa rāua ko Claire, kāore i pīrangi ki te hoatu i o rāua ingoa whānau, i te Whare Penallta o Caerphilly. I kī a Lisa, mai i Ystrad Mynach: "He tino ātaahua, he rā tino nui, ā, e koa ana ahau ko māua te tokorua tuatahi i te takiwā o te takiwā ki te mārena. " Ināianei ka ōrite te mahi a mātau - kāore te mahi ā-iwi i te ōrite ki te tikanga, koia tērā i tatari ai māua tahi i tēnei rā." Kua karangatia e nga kaipōrangapū tāhuhu mārena nga kaipōrangapū o nga rōpū matua te huringa o te ture mo Ingarangi me Weera. I tukuna e Pākehā tētahi ture ōrite e whakaae ana i te mārena tāne i te wā o Hui tanguru. Kaore he kaupapa a Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te whakaae ki te mārena tangata kotahi. I tū tētahi whakatūtū mārena haora te roa huri noa i te pokapū o te taone o Bridgend hei tohu i te rā tuatahi o ngā mārena ōrite. I kī a Hamuera, e noho ana i runga i te Wānanga o Bridgend Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender (LGBT), i ngā huringa i roto i te ture i te tau 2014 ka taea e ia me tōna hoa tūmatanui te tahuri i ta rāua mahi ngātahi ki te mārena me te kore e whakakorea. Ka kī a ia: "He nui rawa te tikanga o tēnei ki a mātau nā te mea kāore mātou e hiahia kia whakarerekētia. Mā ēnei huringa tōrunga katoa e āwhina i a tātau kia ōrite ake i roto i te iwi."

title: Ka hopukina e Īnia i runga i te pou Facebook e whakahē ana i te whakaweto o Pīhīhī
summary: Kua hopukina e nga pirihimana i Īnia tētahi wahine e kī ana rātau i whakahē i runga i te Facebook i te whakaweto o te taone o Pīhīhī i muri i te matenga o te pāremata o Bal Thackeray.
text: I hopukina hoki tētahi hoa wahine i "pīrangi" ki te kōrero, ka kī rātau. I muri i te putanga mai ki te kōti i te taone o Palghar, ka tukua nga wāhine, i whakapaea ki te "whakamamae i nga whakaaro whakapono", i muri i te putanga mai ki te kōti i te taone o Palghar, ka kī atu nga pirihimana ki te HAU. Na te matenga o te pāremata hūhū tautohetohe i te ahiahi o te Hātarei i tū ai a Pīhīhī. I whakapaea a Thackeray, ko tētahi o ngā whika tino whakawehe i roto i ngā tōrangapū Īnia, mo te whakararuraru i waenganui i ngā Hindu me ngā Pirihitini, ā, i whakanuia e ana kaiārahi. I kitea e ngā rongo o tōna matenga ngā umanga e kati ana me ngā tīkiti e noho ana i nga huarahi i waenganui i te āwangawanga o te tukino a ngā kaitautoko o te rōpū parirau matau o Shiv Sena i whakatūria e ia. Ahakoa e pouri ana kaitautoko, he tokomaha ētahi atu i riri i te raruraru ki ngā kaihoko, ā, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i tino nui i runga i ngā pae pāpāho pāpori. I roto i tana kōrero Facebook, ka tuhituhi te tau 21 tau: "Ka whānau mai ngā tāngata pēnei i a Thackeray i ia rā, ā, kaua tētahi e mātaki i tētahi 'bandh' [whakaweto] mō tērā." I ngā marama tata nei, kua hopukina e nga pirihimana he tokomaha nga tāngata i roto i nga take e kitea ana hei whakamātautau i te whakaaetanga a Īnia ki te wāteatanga o te whaikōrero. I Whiringa o Whiringahora, i hopukina a Ravi Srinivasan, he kaipāngai tau 46 tau i te taone o Īnia ki te tonga o Pondicherry, mō tētahi tweet e whakahē ana i a Karti Chidhenam, tama a te Minita Moni Initia P Chidhenam. I muri iho ka tukua a ia i runga i te utu. I te wā o Mahuru, tērā te whakapouri i te hereheretanga o tētahi kaitito i Pīhīhī mo nga whakapae pātaki mo ana tātuhi ārai hāmate. I muri iho ka whakatakatia nga whakapae. A, i Aperira, ka hopukina e te kāwanatanga o Te Uru tētahi kaiako nāna i īmēra ki ōna hoa he pakiwaituhi e whakahē ana i te Minita Nui o Hoa Banerjee. I tukua hoki a ia i muri iho i runga i te utu.

title: Ka hono atu te kaiārahi Tory o Pirihitini ko Ruth Davidson ki te umanga PR hei kaitohutohu motuhake
summary: Kua uru atu te kaiārahi Rangatira o Pirihitini o Ruth Davidson ki tētahi umanga whanaungatanga tūmatanui o te Taone o Rāwāhi hei kaitohutohu matua.
text: E rua marama i muri i te putanga atu o te MSP hei kaiārahi o te rōpū, e waru tau i roto i te mahi. Ka noho tonu a ia ko te MSP mō Edinburgh Central, engari i whakaūngia kāore e taea e ia te rapu pōti anō i te tau 2021. E whakapono ana ka utua a Ms Davidson mo te mahi 24 rā i te tau. I kōrerotia e Ms Davidson ngā huringa "ngaio me te whaiaro" i muri i tana take i whakaheke ai hei kaiārahi Tory o Pirihitini. I kī a ia i roto i ēnei ko te "papā pōhēhē ki a Pakihi" me te taenga mai o tana tama ko Finn i Whiringahora i tērā o Whiringahora. 'Tirohanga ahurei' i kī te hoa whakahaere o Tulchan, a Andrew Feldman, ka "tino whai hua ana kiritaki i tōna mōhiotanga me tōna tirohanga ahurei" i runga i te pātahitanga i waenganui i te pakihi me te tōrangapū. I kī a Ms Davidson: "Kei te haere tonu te rangirua tōrangapū me te ohaoha, ā, he tiketike te whānuitanga o ngā ohorere. " Ko te hua, me haere tonu ngā pakihi ki te whakahōu i tō rātou raihana ki te mahi tahi me ō rātou kaiāwhina me te whakaaro ki ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana e rātou, ka mōrearea rānei te ūkui i ngā painga ārai pakihi me te ngaro i te whakapono tūmatanui." Kua whakahē te tinana hokohoko PR nui rawa o te UK, te Public Relations and Communications Association (PRCA), i te wāhuitanga o Ms Davidson. I kī te tumuaki o PRCA, a Francis Ingham: "He hē noa iho ki ngā kaupapa rorohiko te whakamahi i ngā kaiwhakatikatika. " He mārama te papā o te hiahia ki te mahi pēnā, ā, ka tūkino i te rongo o tā mātou umanga, me te tukanga tōrangapū."

title: Ahuwhānui Suhaila: Ka mate te tākuta wahine rongonui o Awhekenetāna i te 72
summary: He tākuta rongonui a ia i whakapoke i ngā tūranga ira tangata tūturu i Awhekenetāna, a, ka mau ki te Huinga.
text: I te Paraire i te 72 o ona tau, ka mate a Suhaila Pourui, ko te rutene wahine anake o Awhekenetāna, ā, ko tētahi o ngā wāhine iti e pupuri ana i tētahi tūranga minita i te whenua, i te Paraire i te 72 o ona tau. Tata ki te ono tau tōna mate o Pūrehurehu. Ko nga kaiārahi matua o te whenua, ko nga tohunga rongoā me nga wāhine i waenganui i te hunga e tangi ana i tōna matenga. I kī a Hainamana Hainamana, tētahi pirimia moe maori o mua, he minita ā-rohe, ko tana mahi ki te whakatū i tētahi wāhi mō ngā wāhine i roto i ngā āpure rongoā, hōia, i roto hoki i te iwi whānui ake, he "whakamīharo, e kore e taea te whakakāhore". "He pūkenga a ia mō te tini o ētahi atu i roto i te ōrite, ā, ka noho tonu hei whakaaweawe," ko te tuhituhi a tētahi kaiwhakamahi pāpāho pāpori. "Ko ō pūmahara me tō oranga katoa he whakaaweawe pono ki a mātau katoa," te kī a tētahi atu. I whānau mai a Ms Siddiq i te tau 1948 i te pūmatua o Awhekenetāna, o Kabul, ki tētahi whānau rangatira. I ako ia i te rongoā i te taone, a, ka oti tana whakangungu rongoā i Mohihi i mua i tana hokinga ki Awhekenetāna ki te mahi hei tākuta. I te wā o Rōpūria, i te wā i whakawhiwhia ai ki a ia te taitara tianara e te kāwanatanga o Mohiku. Kaore i roa ka mōhiotia whānuitia a ia i te whenua mā te ingoa o "General Suhaila", ā, ka hanga i tētahi rongo hei tākuta tino manaaki o te whenua. I kitea e ana mahi he maha nga tau i roto i te hōhipera hōia 400 moenga o Kabul, i reira i huaina ai tana pokanga puku ki te whakaora i ngā rau o ngā oranga. I tākaro hoki a ia i tētahi tūranga matua ki te pupuri i te hōhipera i ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, i te wā i patua e ngā whakaekenga tākirirangi, i whara hoki i ngā mano. I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki a TE Pashto i tērā tau, ka kī tōna hoa mahi o mua me te ākonga o Dr Yaqoob Noorzai ka rite tonu tana tohatoha i tana utu ki waenganui i ngā kaimahi e mate ana i te hōhipera. "He tino pūkaro a ia mo nga mana o ōna hoa mahi," tana kī. I maharatia e te Huinga i te wā i whai mana ai te Huinga i te tau 1996, ka whakakinotia ngā mana wahine i Awhekenetāna. I te wā o ta rātau ture, ka āraia e te Huinga nga wāhine kia kaua e mātauranga me te mahi, ā, ka whakahaua a rātau ake putanga pākaha o ngā ture ā-Rangi, tae atu ki te kohatu ki te mate me te whiu. Engari i ngā marama i muri i tana wehenga atu i tana mahi, ka kī a Ms Siddiq i te hipanga whakaharahara o te tono i a ia kia hoki mai, i te mōhiotanga e hiahiatia ana e rātau ōna pūkenga haparapara. "I hiahiatia ahau e rātau, ā, ka tono mai rātau kia hoki mai ahau," ka mahara a ia i roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te nūpepa Kaitiaki. I whakaae a ia, engari i runga anake i te tikanga kia kaua rāua ko tōna tuahine e mau i te burka hipoki katoa. "Ehara i te tino wikitōria mōku, engari i tino hiahia rātau kia noho ahau ki reira. Ahakoa i taku haerenga ki Kandahar [te wāhi whānau o te Huinga] kore rawa ahau e mau burka," tana kī atu ki te Kaitiaki. Heoi anō, i ākiritia hoki e ia te whakakaha i runga i te burka. "Ko te tikanga kia hoatu te manakē tuatahi ki te mātauranga, ki ngā pūkenga kura tuatahi, ki te whakahaerenga me te hanga anō o te whenua, engari e arotahi ana te Uru ki te burka, ā, mēnā he pai ake, he kino ake rānei ngā kaupapa here a te Huinga i ētahi atu kāwanatanga," ka whakahuatia a ia me te kōrero ki ngā kaipānui i te mutunga o te tau 2001. 'I roto i te aroha ki tana mahi' I muri i te hinganga o te Huinga, ka neke a ia ki te kāwanatanga, i te wā i whakatūria ai ia hei minita mo te hauora tūmatanui. Ko ia tētahi o ngā minita wāhine tokorua i whakatūria ki te kāwanatanga o te whenua. I a ia e minita ana, i whakahaeretia e ia te werohanga o ngā tamariki e hia miriona ki te pōrori, me te kōrero mō te hiahia ki te rutu i te HIV me te Aids. I tono a ia ki te UN kia āwhina ki te whakangungu i ngā kaimahi rongoā wahine, me te Pūtea Iwi Whānui o UN hei āwhina ki te taururuku i ngā mahi hei whakapai ake i te hauora uri o ngā wāhine o Pūkeirangi. I muri i tana whakaotinga i tana mahi minita i te tau 2004, ka hoki ia ki tana mahi rongoā. I kī atu a Dr Noorzai ki a TE Pashto, i te pātaitanga a ngā hoa mahi ki a ia he aha ia i kore ai e mārena, ka kī a ia nā te mea i "aroha a ia ki tana mahi, ā, ko tana mahi tōna oranga". Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: Stonehenge transformation 'progressing well' says English Heritage
summary: Kei te pai te haere o te mahi i tētahi pokapū manuhiri miriona pauna i Stonehenge, kua kī te Tuku iho Ingarihi.
text: Ko te kaupapa £27m, arā ko te pātītī i runga i te huarahi i te taha o te whakamaharatanga tahito, ka oti i te mutunga o te tau. Kua whakatakotoria ngā pāka motokā me ngā kaiako, ā, kua rite te tuanui o te pokapū manuhiri ki te tāuta, te kī a te aroha. I kī te tumuaki o Stonehenge, a Loraine Knowles, ko te whare "kotahi noa iho te āhuatanga o te panoni" i te pae.
