I tīmata te mahi i ngā taiwhanga me ngā pūkenga hou, e hangaia ana mō te maero me te hāwhe (2.4 km) ki te hauauru o ngā kōhatu, i a Hōngongoi. E rua ngā "pods papa kotahi" e hipokina ana e te tuanui o te kanopi e hangaia ana hei whakanoho i tētahi wāhi whakaaturanga me te wāhi akoranga, wharekai, toa me ngā whare haumaru. Ko tētahi wāhanga o te A344, e haere ana i te taha o te Pae Tuku iho o te Ao, ka katia i te mutunga o Pipiri, ā, ka tarutarutia. Ka katia te toenga o te huarahi A ki ngā waka i te mutunga o te tau 2013, kia āhei ai tētahi waka rererangi ki te mahi i waenganui i te pokapū manuhiri me ngā pōhatu. 'Wheako whakarewa' "Ka rerekē te huarahi e haere ai te tangata ki Stonehenge ā muri ake nei," te kī a Ms Knowles. "Ko te hanganga o te whare manuhiri he āhuatanga kotahi noa iho i roto i te panoni i te mea e whakaaetia whānuitia ana hei wheako tūruhi me te ahurea kāore i te pai. " Ka whakarewaina e mātou te wheako katoa ki tētahi taumata e tika ana ki tēnei whakamaharatanga whakaharahara, hira hoki, ehara i te whakamohoa noa iho i ngā pūkenga manuhiri, ahakoa he mea hira ērā." Ko Stonehenge, i hangaia i waenganui i te 3,000 BC me te 1,600 BC, e whakaarotia ana kua whakamahia mō ngā momo hākari whakapono. E 900,000 ngā manuhiri i te tau - tata ki te 70% e haere mai ana i rāwāhi.

title: Ko te pūtea UK te 'tīmatanga o te mutunga' mō te umanga whakatutukitanga
summary: I kī te kaiwhakahaere o tētahi kamupene tiaki hauora o Jersey ko te tahua UK e tohu ana i te tīmatanga o te mutunga mo te umanga whakatutukitanga.
text: I muri i te pānuitanga pūtea a te Tumuaki o UK, a George Osborne, i kōrero a Phil Balderson mai i Healthspark. Mā te umanga whakatutukitanga e āhei ai ngā kamupene i te motu ki te hoko i ngā hua kore VAT ki ngā kiritaki i te UK e pā ana te VAT. Ināianei me utu e ngā kamupene te VAT hei kaweake i ngā tūemi e £15 neke atu rānei ki te UK. 'Pai me te kino' Ko te tepenga mōrahi o nāianei o te Āwhina Tukunga Uara Iti (LVCR) ko te £18. Ka kī a Tēnā Balderson: "He pai, he kino, kua whakarewaina te guillotine, ā, ka hinga." I kī te Minita Whanaketanga Ohaoha o Jersey, a Senator Maclean: "Kua hē te kōrero a te pāpāho UK ko te wāhanga hokohoko tuihono o te Motu Hongere te kawenga mo te matenga o ngā toa tiriti tiketike o UK. " Ko te mea ko ngā hokonga tuihono o ngā hua pēnei i ngā DVD me ngā KK anake e pūkete ana mō tētahi wāhanga iti o te mākete UK katoa, me te nuinga o ngā hokomaha UK me ētahi atu wāhi hokohoko UK. "Mā te arotakenga a te UK Treasury o LVCR e whai wāhi ki a Jersey ki te ātete i ngā whakahē kāore i te mōhiotia o tā mātou umanga hokohoko tuihono. " Kua mahi ngātahi te [Tari Whanaketanga Ohaoha] ki te wāhanga me te Pūtea UK ki te whakakore i te tūkinotanga o te LVCR." I kī hoki te Tumuaki o UK George Osborne ka mahi tahi ia me te Kōmihana o Ūropi ki te aukati i te pokanoatanga o te āwhina mai i ngā Moutere Hongere me ētahi atu wāhi. I roto i te tuhinga pūtea, ka kī a ia: "Ka tūhura te kāwanatanga i ngā kōwhiringa ki te Kōmihana o Ūropi hei whakawhāiti i te whānuitanga o te āwhina kia kore ai e taea te pokanoa mō tētahi take kāore i tika. " Ka tirohia anō hoki e te kāwanatanga te taumata o te LVCR i te Pūtea 2012, mēnā kāore ngā kōrero ki te Kōmihana o Ūropi e whakaputa i tētahi rongoā mahi ki te raruraru o te apo i te āwhina." I kī a Senator Maclean, neke atu i te 1,000 ngā tāngata e mahi ana i roto i te umanga whakatutukitanga puta noa i ngā Moutere Hongere. Ka kī a ia: "E tino whakaaro ana ahau ki te whakaiti i te pānga o te pānuitanga a te Kāwanatanga o UK me te whakarite ka taea e ngā umanga Poraka tika te hokohoko whai hua." I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka whiwhi taupatupatu i te Whare o Ariki i te tautoko whakawhiti-rōpū ki te kati i te mārō VAT. I pānuitia i taua wā e utu ana te kāwanatanga o UK i te £130m ia tau i roto i te tāke ngaro. Ko te hoa i muri i te mōtini, a Ariki Ralph Lucas, i whakaingoatia te umanga he "hinonga maunu".

title: Ka waiho e te māminga a Pirihitini e anga ana ki te haereere ki Kōrea ki te Raki
summary: Kua noho te kaiwaiata Kānata o Pirihitini hei ūnga o tētahi whakahau huaketo ki te tuku i a ia ki Kōrea ki te Raki.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Daniel EmeryTechnology, i whakapuakina e tētahi paetukutuku ngā kaiwhakamahi ki tēhea whenua e haere ai ia i muri mai, ā, kāore he rāhuitanga ki ngā iwi ka taea te pōti. Ināianei kua tata ki te hawhe miriona ngā pōti hei tuku i te kaiwaiata ki te iwi ā iwi huna ā iwi. Ko te whakataetae, e mutu ana i te 0600 i te 7 o Hōngongoi, i kite i Kōria ki te Raki e neke ana mai i te 24 ki te wāhi 1 i roto i te rua rā. Ko te nuinga o ngā pōti e whakaarotia ana i takea mai i te paetukutuku papaatahanga 4chan, nāna i hanga he rongo mō te whakaoho i ngā whakahau huaketo tuihono. Kāore te pae pōti i te tautokona e te tapanga pūkete a Tēnā Pirihi. Nā te mea kua whakakorea te urunga ipurangi e tata ana ki ngā tangata katoa o Kōria ki te Raki, ā, he mana whāiti kei runga i ngā pāpāho katoa, kāore e taea e tētahi o ngā pōti te puta mai i roto i te whenua. I kī atu tētahi kōrero mō te Kāwanatanga o Kōria ki te Raki i Rāwāhi ki a Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero o Te Ao, ahakoa ka kōrerotia taua take ki a Ūngia. Ko te whakahau kino a Pirihitini i ūnga i te maha o ngā māminga ipurangi i ngā wiki tata nei. I tērā marama, ka tohe tētahi pou i 4chan i ngā kaiwhakamahi kia rapu katoa i te kupu "Pirihitini Syphilis" e pana ana ki runga i te rārangi Rapu Wera a Google Trend. A, i te mutunga wiki, ko ngā ataata o Pirihitini i runga i te YouTube te ūnga mō ngā mūrere ipurangi, e tahuri ana i ngā kaiwhakamahi ki ngā paetukutuku pakeke, e whakaoho ana rānei i ngā karere pakū-ake e kī ana kua mate te kaiwaiata Kānata i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga motokā. I whakatārewatia rangitahitia e Google ngā tākupu mō ngā ataata, ā, ka tukuna he kōrero e kī ana: "I tere mātou ki te whakatika i tētahi whakararuraru hōtuhi pae-whakawhiti (XSS)." I whakakāhoretia te rua whakararuraru i ētahi haora i muri iho. I patua hoki tana whārangi FM Whakamutunga, me ngā whakaahua o te kaiwaiata i whakakapia e ngā whakaahua āhuaatua. Tērā anō ētahi rongo teka e rere ana kua mate a Bieber, kua uru ia ki tētahi karakia, ā, i tukuna ki tōna whaea he $50,000 hei whakatakoto topless i roto i te pukapuka Playboy. "Me whai wā tātou ki te whakautu i ētahi (rongo) heahea... Kāore anō ahau kia mate," ko te tuhituhi a Bieber i roto i tētahi o ana whakairinga Twitter. A, i tērā wiki ka whakairihia e ia "He wahine tūturu taku whaea... me waiho noa iho tēnā mō tōna āhuatanga... nā te mea i whakapōrearea noa iho ahau e taua rongo." Whakatika 7 o Hōngongoi 2010: Kua whakatikaina tēnei pūrākau mai i te wā i whakaputaina tuatahitia ai kia mārama ai kāore te pae pōti i te tautokona e te tapanga pūkete a Tēnā Bieber Universal Music.

title: 'Early Pictish Royal remains' discovered at Rhynie
summary: Kua kitea nga toenga o te mea e whakaarotia ana he mema o te kingitanga o mua o Pictish i te wā o te keri whenua i Aberdeenshire.
text: Ko te kitenga i Rhynie i mahia e ngā tīma mai i ngā whare wānanga o Aberdeen me Chester. I kitea nga toenga i roto i tētahi urupa pōhatu kirikiri i āta hangaia, e whakapono ana nga tohunga he tūnga tiketike taua tangata. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i huraina ai ngā toenga o tētahi tinana i te pae. I kī te kaiārahi kaupapa o Dr Gordon Noble, o te Whare Wānanga o Aberdeen: "I kitea e mātou ngā huānga o ngā waewae, te puku me te wheua kauae i whakaorangia e mātau, ā, kei te tātari ināianei i te taiwhanga. " He tino āhua kore nei te kite i ētahi toenga tangata mai i tēnei wā i te raki ki te rāwhiti o Pākehā i te mea he waikawa rawa te oneone o tēnei wāhi o te ao. "I āta hangaia tētahi o ngā urupa mai i ngā papa kōhatu kirikiri ritua hei waihanga i tētahi kōhatu, ā, ko te rārangi pōhatu me ngā kōhatu i horo i āwhina ki te tiaki i ngā rawa kōiwi. " Kāore i rite ki ngā wāhi Pākehā ki te tonga, ko te tikanga i Pākehā mō te tanumanga kāore i whakaratohia kia kore ai mātou e tūmanako kia kitea he huihuinga urupa taunaki."

title: Ka whakaorangia te hiri o Port Talbot e mau ana i ngā toka
summary: Kua whakawāteatia tētahi hiri i mau i ngā toka i tētahi one ki te tonga o Uēra mō te rua rā neke atu rānei i muri i te mahi whakaora.
text: I kitea tuatahitia te kurī - e karangatia ana ko Miracle e ngā tūroro - i mau i Aberavon Beach i Port Talbot i te Rātapu. Kua kōpikopiko ki tētahi āputa i waenganui i ngā toka, ā, kāore i taea te puta ki waho. I kī te RSPCA i nekehia tētahi toka kotahi tan e tētahi poka hiki e whakahaeretia ana e tētahi kaipūkaha hei whakawātea i te kurī. I kī a Nic de Celis, mai i te aroha, te āhua nei kāore i whara, ā, i mauria ki tētahi wāhi tapu hiri i Taunton, i Tara. "E kore e pōhēhētia, ko tēnei te whakaora tino hangarau, matatini hoki i mahi ai ahau hei kaitirotiro RSPCA," tana kī. "I mau tēnei kurī hiri rawakore i waenganui i ngā toka me ngā toka, ā, he tino uaua te uru ki te kararehe. " Me neke atu tētahi toka kotahi tan i te ara, i mua i to mātau pupuri haumaru i te hiri me te mahi i tētahi aromatawai oranga tūturu." I kī a Clive Morris, te kaiwhakahaere mahi waka whakaora o te RNLI i Port Talbot, i mau te kurī i roto i tētahi rua i roto i ngā toka tata ki te 3m (10ft) ki raro. "He merekara i tae atu ai mātau ki taua mea, he whakamutunga hari, haumaru hoki," tana tāpiri mai. "I whakatakotoria e rātau he taputapu hiki ki runga i te tauwāhi, kātahi ka wiri i ngā toka hei whakaū i te rohe. Kātahi ka whakamahia e rātou ngā pulley tahito hei hiki i ngā toka me te whakawātea i te hiri." I kī a Tēnā Mohi i ārahi te RSPCA i te mahi, arā, i uru hoki ki te Ruku Hiki-Moana me te Whakaora Ora Moana o Ingarangi. Ka noho te hiri i te iti rawa i te marama i te wāhi tapu o te hiri i mua i te tukunga. I kī a Nicki Llewellyn, e noho tata ana ki te one, kua kōrero tētahi hoa ki a ia mō te hiri mau. "I kī tētahi o ngā tāngata e ngaru ana ahau i whakaaro ia i rongo ia i tētahi pēpi e tangi ana, ka titiro huri noa, ka kitea," tana tāpiri mai. Ko tētahi ariā, i ohorere te hiri i te mumura i te mutunga wiki, a, ka whakaruru i roto i nga toka. I hiritia tētahi wāhi o te one i te Tūrei i te wā i mauria mai he taputapu ki te hiki i ngā toka, ā, ka tonoa te iwi whānui kia noho atu.

title: Morrisons data leak: Supermarket liable for staff details breach
summary: Kua kitea he haepapa a Morrisons mō ngā mahi a tētahi mema o mua o ana kaimahi nāna i tāhae ngā raraunga o ngā mano o ngā kaimahi, ā, ka whakairihia tuihonotia.
text: I kawea mai e nga kaimahi he kerēme ki te kamupene i muri i te tāhaetanga a te kaimahi a Andrew Skelton i ngā raraunga, tae atu ki te utu me ngā taipitopito pēke, e tata ana ki te 100,000 ngā kaimahi. Ināianei ka whakaaetia e te Kōti Tiketike te hunga e pāngia ana ki te tono utu mo te "riri me te mamae" i takea. Ko te kēhi te mahi karaehe māturu raraunga tuatahi i te UK. I kī a Morrisons e whakapono ana kia kaua e whakaaetia te whakataunga, ā, ka tono ki te whakataunga. E whai ana te kēhi i tētahi pakaru haumarutanga i te tau 2014 i te wā i māturu ai a Skelton, he kaihautū ā-roto matua i te tari matua o te kaihoko, i ngā raraunga utu a ngā kaimahi. Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei me ētahi atu pūrākau o Aotearoa i whakairihia e ia ngā mōhiohio - tae atu ki ngā ingoa, ngā wāhitau, ngā taipitopito pūkete pēke me ngā utu - tuihono, ā, ka tukuna ki ngā nūpepa. Te āhua nei he riri te kaupapa whakahau a Skelton i tētahi mahi i te whakapaetanga i a ia ki te mahi i ngā tiketike ā-ture i te mahi. I hereheretia a ia mo te waru tau i te tau 2015 i muri i tana kitenga i te hara i te Kōti Karauna o Te Karauna o Te Kōti Karauna o Te Kōti o Te Karauna, i te whiwhi urunga kore mana ki ngā rauemi rorohiko me te whakaatu i ngā raraunga whaiaro. I kī ngā rōia ko te tikanga o te tāhae raraunga, e 5,518 ngā kaimahi o mua, o nāianei hoki i tūpono ki te mōrea o te tāhae tuakiri me te ngaromanga pūtea, ā, ko te kamupene te kawenga mō ngā pakaru tūmataitinga, maia me ngā ture parenga raraunga. I te whakarongo a te Kōti Tiketike e noho ana i Te Kōti Tiketike, ka whakataua e te kaiwhakawā, a Tēnā Kaiwhakawā Langstaff, he taunaha ā-ringa a Morrisons, ā, kāore anō kia whakatūria te taunaha matua. 'Tino hiranga' i kī a Anya Proops, QC mō Morrisons, kua tūkino kē a Skelton ki te kamupene, ā, neke atu i te £2m ngā utu i te urupare ki te whakamahinga. I tautohe a ia ko te whānuitanga e āhei ai te kaitukumahi ki te whakahaere i ngā raraunga a te hunga tuatoru e tētahi kaimahi, he "tino hiranga" mō ngā tangata, ngā umanga me ngā whakahaere. I muri i te whakahaere, ka kī a Nick McAleenan o JMW Solicitors, e whakatau ana mō ngā kaikerēme, nā te māturu i "tino māharahara, te hauā me te raruraru". Ka kī a ia: "Nā aku kiritaki tēnei mōhiohio tūmataiti. He kaimahi taki Morrisons rātau, he tāpae whata, he kaimahi wheketere - he tāngata noa iho e mahi ana i a rātau mahi. "E pōhiritia ana e mātou te whakawā, ā, e whakapono ana mātou he whakataunga tohu tēnei, ko te mahi karaehe māturu raraunga tuatahi i te UK." Kāore e puta ētahi atu rongo mō te nui o te utu kia mutu rā anō te tono a te kamupene.

title: Ka kitea e nga pirihimana o Keighley he pāmu tarukino i muri i te tuanui hukarere-kore
summary: Na te kore hukarere i runga i te tuanui o tētahi whare tūpāpaku i hura ai ngā pirihimana i tētahi pāmu tarukino me ngā tipu e 322.
text: I kite ngā pirihimana i te tuanui mārama i runga i te pānga i Arctic Street i Keighley, West Yorkshire, ā, ka kite i tētahi haunga kaha i te tarukino i a rātau e whakatata ana. Ko te tikanga o ngā taumata wera e hiahiatia ana hei whakatipu i ngā tipu tarukino, kua rewa te hukarere kua noho. I kitea e ngā āpiha he tipu - ko ētahi e tata ana ki te 6ft (1.8m) te roa - i roto i ngā rūma e whā, i roto hoki i te rūma o te whare. Ētahi atu pūrākau mai i Aotearoa, kāore he tangata i roto i te whare i te taenga mai o ngā pirihimana i te 14:00 GMT i te Rāitema, ka kī te ope a Te Hauauru. Ka tūtohu a RW Caroline Foster i ngā pikitia mai i te tirohanga e whakaatu ana i te rahi o te mahinga. Kātahi ka mahi ngā pirihimana ki te tango i ngā tipu me te whakarite kia haumaru te whare. I kī tētahi kaikōrero ka āta tirohia, ka uara hoki nga tipu ināianei. Ka tūtohu a PC Foster mō ngā whakapae a ngā āpiha e pātai ana he aha "kāore he hukarere i runga i tō tuanui?" Ka tūtohu tōna hoa mahi, a Hemi Butterfield i tētahi whakaahua mōna e pupuri ana i tētahi rau tarukino.

title: Ko te pēpi mate o Glasgow East MP e ahu ana ki te waea huringa ture
summary: I te wā e whawhai ana te tamāhine kātahi anō ka whānau mai a Rawiri Linden mo te ora i roto i tētahi rōpū kōhungahunga i tērā tau, ka whakatau ia kia whakatā i ana mahi hei MP.
text: Ināianei e hiahia ana a ia ki te huri i te ture hei whakaroa i te wehenga mātua mō ngā tāngata e noho ana ōna pēpi i roto i te tiaki kōhungahunga kōhungahunga I mātakitaki te MP o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti i tana tamāhine "huri kikorangi" me whakaora anō i muri i tana whānautanga moata i te wā o Mahuru. I kī a ia kia kaua e māharahara ngā pāpā o ngā pēpi mate ki te hoki ki te mahi. I raro i ngā ture UK o nāianei, ka whiwhi ngā hoa i te mōrahi e rua wiki te wehenga mātua utu, ā, me whakamahi i roto i ngā rā tuatahi e 56 i muri i te whānautanga o ta rāua tamaiti. I kī atu a Tēnā Pirihitini ki a Te Iwa o Pākehā i te nuinga o te wā me hoki te hoa ki te mahi i te wā e whiwhi tonu ana ta rāua tamaiti i te tiaki nui, e whakararuraru ana i ngā uaua nui. I whānau moata ngā tamariki a te MP SNP - a Ihaka rāua ko Heka - tae atu ki te 60,000 ngā pēpi i ia tau i te UK. I te nuinga o te wā, tata ki te 100,000 ngā kōhungahunga kātahi anō ka noho wā ki te tiaki kōhungahunga puta noa i te whenua. Mr Linden is calling for mothers and fathers to be compensated for every day or week their child spends on a neo-natal care ward by having their statutory parental leave extended in law. I kī kē a ia i pā kē tēnei ki ngā whenua pērā i Huitene, i tīmata ai te wehenga mātua i te wā i puta ai tētahi tamaiti i te hōhipera. "I te whānautanga o taku tama i a ia mō tētahi meneti, e rua rānei, ā, ka kawea atu ia ki te tiaki nui," tana kī. "Ko te wiki tuatahi o tōna oranga i pau i roto i tētahi pūkoro. Kāore koe i whakaaetia kia pupuri i a ia. "I te pupuri koe i tōna matimati i roto i te incubator, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau mēnā e tūmanako ana mātou kia hoki ngā mātua ki te mahi i te wā e noho ana ta rātau tamaiti i roto i tētahi incubator, kei te mahi mātou i tētahi mea tino hē." I whānau tana tamāhine a Jessica i te marama o Mahuru. "He uaua hōhonu tōna hāora, ko te tikanga me noho ia i runga i te hāora mo te waru marama i te tīmatanga o tōna oranga," tana kī. "E rua wiki noa iho i muri i tana whānautanga, ka mutu tana hā i te hōhipera, ka huri kikorangi, ā, ka mātakitaki ahau i a ia e whakaorangia ana e tētahi nēhi. " The idea that we expect mums and dads to go back to work while their kids are turning blue, I think everyone would accept that is not very good for an employee." 'Employee lottery' Mr Linden said he was "lucky" as an MP to be able to take time to support his wife and child while they were in hospital. "Ki taku whakaaro ka mārama te nuinga o ōku wahanga ka noho ahau i te taha o taku tamāhine i te rōpū kōhungahunga kōhungahunga mō ngā wiki e rua ka noho ahau i te taha o taku tamāhine i te rōpū kōhungahunga kōhungahunga rānei," tana kī. Mr Linden said there were plenty of good employers who would make flexible arrangements to support staff, but many didn't think parents should have to rely on the "employee lottery" of having an understanding boss. I te Tūtira, i te rā i mua i te whakamōhiotanga a Tēnā Linden i tana pire ture 10 meneti ki te pāremata, ka pānuitia e te kāwanatanga o UK he whakaaro mo ana kaupapa. I kī a Tēnā Linden kua whakahaere kē te kāwanatanga i tētahi "arotakenga poto, koi, arotahi" ā, ināianei kei te "whana i te kēne ki raro i te huarahi". "Ko te mea e hiahiatia ana e ngā whānau pēnei i a au ko te mahi a te kāwanatanga, ehara i tētahi atu whakaaro," tana kī. I kī te Minita Pakihi a te kāwanatanga o UK, a Kelly Tolhurst: "He wā tino uaua ki ngā mātua te whai pēpi moata, mate rānei. " Ka taea e ētahi mātua te tūtaki i ngā wero nui mēnā ka roa te wā e noho ana tā rātou pēpi ki te tiaki kōhungahunga, tērā pea ka pā ki tō rātou kaha ki te hoki me te noho ki te mahi. "As a government, we are committed to supporting working parents. This summer, we will be launching a consultation to see what further support can be provided to the parents of premature, sick and multiple babies."

title: E whakahē ana te wāhanga tūmatanui i ngā tapahi i Cumbria
summary: I whai wāhi nga kaimahi o te wāhanga tūmatanui ki tētahi huihuinga i Kānata ki te whakahē i ngā utu pūtea kua whakaritea me ngā ngaronga mahi.
text: Ko ngā kaiako, ngā nēhi me ngā kaipatu ahi i waenganui i ngā mema uniana mahi e 300 i huihui ki te taone i te Hātarei. E riri ana rātau ki te whakapau moni e 600 neke atu rānei ngā kaimahi o te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Cumbria e ngaro ana i a rātau mahi i roto i ngā tau e whā e whai ake nei. Na te takahanga, i whakaritea e te TUC ā-Rohe o te Raki, i tohutohu i te kāwanatanga kia whakaaro anō i te tere o te whakapau moni. I kī te hēkeretari ki te raki o TUC, a Kevin Rowan: "E anga ana a Cumbria ki ētahi o ngā uaua o te ohaoha me te pāpori i te whenua. " He ranunga tinihanga tēnei o ngā taiwhenua ātaahua me ngā hapori tino rawakore. Ko ētahi o ngā taone i Cumbria e pā ana ki ngā taumata tiketike o te kore mahi me te rawakore i te UK. "Ko ngā tapahi mōrearea a te kāwanatanga e tino whakararuraru ana i te kaha o Cumbria ki te whakaora i te raruraru pūtea." Cumbria County Council, which is a Conservative and Labour-controlled administration, has said tough choices are needed to make savings of about £50m over the next four years. Ka haere tētahi whakaaro tūmatanui mō ngā kōwhiringa tiaki tae noa ki te mutunga o Hānuere, ā, ka tāruatia he pūrongo whakamutunga a Hui tanguru. I waenganui i ngā tono ko te whakamōhio utu mō te tūnga tūnga i runga i te tiriti i ngā pūtahi taone me ngā ūnga tūruhi, me te whakaiti i te maha o ngā pūtahi tukurua o te whare.

title: E wero ana te Whare Wānanga o Ulster i te whakataunga papa maha
summary: Me wero te Whare Wānanga o Ulster i tētahi whakataunga e ārai ana i te hanga i tētahi papa motokā papa maha hei mahi i tōna whare wānanga hou.
text: I Poutāpeta, ka whakaaetia e te minita taiao o Alex Attwood tētahi whanaketanga o te whare wānanga tata ki te pokapū o te taone o Belfast. Heoi anō, i āraia e ia te papa motokā i Te Tiriti o Frederick i muri i te kīanga a ngā kaiwhakarite ka pā kino ki ngā kāinga noho tata. Ināianei kua tāpaetia e te whare wānanga he kēhi ki te Komihana Tono Whakarite. I kī te taupānga taketake o te whare wānanga ko te aronui papa motokā mokowā 487, arā ko te mokowā hokohoko me tētahi whakawhitinga waewae hōu, ka "āwhina me te whakaoho i te whakatupuranga anō o te raki o Perehi". Engari i whakahē ngā tangata whenua ki te rahi o te whanaketanga i te wā i kī te Kaiwhakahaere Whare kia kaua e haere tonu i te mea kua rohea te rohe mō ngā whare pāpori i te Mahere Rohe Metropolitan. Kāore anō kia tautuhia he rā mo te whakarongo pīra.

title: Kotahi te tūpāpaku i te tāhaetanga o Bristol, a, e rua i tino whara
summary: Kua mate tētahi tangata, ā, tokorua ētahi atu tāngata i pāngia he whara huri ora i te wā o te tāhaetanga i Bristol.
text: I pā mai te whakaeke i Prewett Street, Redcliffe, i muri noa iho i te 01:00 BST, ā, kei te rongoatia ngā tāngata tokorua i whara i te hōhipera. Tokorua ngā tāngata, e 25 me te 37 te pakeke, kua hopukina i runga i te whakapae kōhuru, ā, kei te tiakina pirihimana i tēnei wā. Ko tētahi rārangi uiui e whaia ana e ngā pirihimana mēnā i honoa taua mahi ki ngā rongoā. E whakaae ana a Reverend Kat Campion-Spall o te Hāhi Redcliffe o Hato Meri pātata ki te mahi rongoā i taua rohe he "take". I kī ngā Pirihimana o Avon rāua ko Ngā Pirihimana o Aotearoa ko ngā tāngata katoa i roto i taua mahi no te takiwā o Rāwāhi. I te tirohanga: Kua rāhuitia tētahi wāhi tino nui huri noa i tētahi huinga whare kaunihera, ā, kua whakatakotoria he rīpene rāhui pirihimana. I tētahi tūnga pahi ka kite koe i te tokomaha o ngā āpiha ā-ture e tirotiro ana i tētahi mea pēnei i te pēke moe me ngā kākahu. I te Tiriti o Prewett anō, he motokā pango o Meheke e whakatūria ana i waenganui o te tiriti me tōna tūnga kua whakaurua, nā reira te āhua nei he painga hoki. I kī te Āpiha Rangahau Matua a Andrew Mott: "I horaina e mātau he nui rawa ngā rauemi ki tēnei mahi, ā, ko te hua kua hopukina e mātau ngā tāngata tokorua i oma atu i te tirohanga i to mātau taenga atu. " Ko ngā tohu o mua he mahi tūhāhā tēnei, engari e tohutohu ana ahau i tētahi tangata whai māharahara kia kōrero ki tētahi o ngā āpiha paetata." E kī ana ngā kaitohutohu tērā pea ka noho tonu he rāhui mō "tētahi wā" kia āhei ai ngā kaihoko tirohanga hara ki te tirotiro i te rohe.

title: E tohutohu ana a Papa Whāwhānui i Manira i ngā kaiārahi kia whakamutua te hāmate
summary: Kua tohe a Papa Whāwhānui ki ngā kaiārahi o Piripīni kia whakamutua "ngā rerekētanga pāpori heitara" me te hāmate i te wā o tētahi hui pōhiri i Manira.
text: I te rā tuatahi o tana haerenga e rima rā, ka karanga a ia ki ngā kaipōrangapū kia whakaatu i te whāinga ki te "pai noa iho". Engari i urupare a Perehitini Benigno Aquino he tokomaha nga minita Katorika i wahangū mo nga tūkinotanga i whakahaeretia i raro i te Perehitini o Mua o Gloria Arroyo. A ka mea ia kua tere rawa etahi minita ki te whakahē i a ia. "He rerekē ki to rātau mūmū o mua, te āhua nei kei te whakaaro ētahi mema o te minita ināianei ko te tikanga kia pono ki te whakapono, ko te kimi i tētahi mea hei whakahē," tana kī. "Ahakoa te nui o te whakatūpato a tētahi kauhau ki a au kia mahi i tētahi mea mo aku makawe, me te mea he hara mate." I tae mai te kōpae ki te whenua Katorika nui i te Rāitema, ā, ka haere ki te taone āwhā o Tacloban i te Hātarei. Ko te pokapū o tana haerenga he Huihuinga tūwhera i Manira i te Rātapu, e tūmanakohia ana kia kawea mai he miriona. Kai runga te Pāpā i tētahi haerenga e ono rā ki Āhia. I te tīmatanga o te wiki ka haere a ia ki Hiri Rānaka. 'Reo o te rawakore' I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi hui pōhiri i te whare kōti o te perehitini, ka karanga a Papa Whāwhānui ki ngā kaiārahi "kia whakakāhore i ngā momo hāmate katoa, e nekehia ana ngā rauemi mai i te rawakore". I kī a ia he mahi Karaitiana te "whati i ngā here o te tika me te tukinotanga e puta ake ai ngā rerekētanga pāpori". He take hāmate tā Piripīni, pēnei i ngā whenua maha i Āhia. Na te rōpū kaiwhaiwhai hāmate Pūataata Ao Whānui i puru ngā Piripīni ki te 85 i roto i tōna Taupū Whakaaro Hāmate hōu rawa, taumata ki Īnia, Sri Lanka me Thailand. I raro i a Tēnā Aquino, kua āta pai ake te pūkete o Piripīni. Na Tēnā Aquino i huatau kāore i nui te mahi a te Hāhi ki te whawhai i te hāmate i raro i a Mrs Arroyo, e anga ana ki ngā whakapae pāhuahua i ngā moni kāwanatanga me te whakatika pōti. "Tērā tētahi whakamātautau pono o te whakapono i te tokomaha o ngā mema o te Hāhi, i tētahi wā e taunaki ana i te rawakore, i te hunga whakawātea, i te hunga pōhēhē, i te aroaro o ngā tūkinotanga a te whakahaere o mua, e ngana tonu ana mātou ki te whakatika tae noa ki tēnei rā," te kī a Tēnā Aquino. E kī ana a Papa Whāwhā i ngā herehere kanikani me te Jeepney Popemobile E kī ana a Caroline Wyatt o TE AO i Manila i te taenga mai o te Pāpa. I katia ngā huarahi i te pokapū o te taone, ā, i whakatūria he mata nunui hei whakaatu i te Mass i te Whare Karakia. Kua whakapuakina nga hararei ā iwi i te pūmatua mo te roanga o te haerenga mai o te Pāpa. He tino kikī te haumarutanga, me te tekau mano o ngā hōia me ngā pirihimana i horaina, i muri i te rahua o ngā whakamātau ki te patu i ngā popa e rua o mua i Piripīni.

title: Schools share £120m in bid to close attainment gap
summary: Tata ki te 2,400 ngā kura puta noa i Pākehā ka tiritiri neke atu i te £120m hei wāhanga o ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ki te kati i te āputa whiwhinga.
text: Education Secretary John Swinney confirmed 2,387 schools will receive money from the £750m Pupil Equity Funding scheme in 2018-19. Ka whai hua ngā kura i Glasgow i neke atu i te ono o ngā moni. They will receive a total of almost £22m to help fund improvements at 191 schools. Ko te nui o ngā moni ka whiwhi ia kura e honoa ana ki te maha o ngā tauira e whiwhi ana i ngā kai kura koreutu, me te moni e haere hāngai ana ki ngā kaiako matua, e āhei ai rātou ki te kōwhiri me pēhea te whakamahi i ngā rauemi. Mr Swinney announced the allocations to areas and schools ahead of the visit to St Francis RC Primary School in Dundee, where staff used part of the cash they received in 2017-18 to set up six week-long summer schools focused on boosting literacy, numeracy and wellbeing for pupils in the most deprived areas. 'Pānga nui' Ka kī a ia: "Ko te tikanga kia tino pai te tīmatanga o ia tamaiti i roto i te ora, ahakoa tō rātou papamuri. Schools have a significant role to play in ensuring every child is given the right support to help them achieve their full potential. "Ko ta mātau manakē ko te kati i te āputa whiwhinga e pā ana ki te rawakore. This £120m of Pupil Equity Funding is aimed at doing just that. "The funding is targeted towards schools who have the highest numbers of pupils receiving free school meals, so that the money is spent on the children who need it most." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te nui kē te pānga o te tohatoha o tērā tau. I have visited a number of schools up and down the country where this funding has empowered teachers to put in place creative new initiatives that are tackling the attainment gap in their schools right now." I kī a Neil Lowden, te kaiako matua o te Kura Tuatahi o St Francis RC, ko te moni mai i te kaupapa "he pānga nui ki taku whakahaere i taku kura i ngā tikanga o te arotahi tūturu ki te whakapiki i te whiwhinga i roto i te pānui pukapuka me te tatau, me te whakapai ake i ngā putanga o te hauora me te oranga mō ngā tamariki i Hato Francis". He added: "As a head teacher, the Pupil Equity Funding has fundamentally allowed our school community to make a real and significant difference to the lives of the children who come through our doors every day." Temporary posts Seamus Searson, general secretary of the Scottish Secondary Teachers' Association (SSTA), said: "The identification of funds to those pupils who need support is always helpful, but unfortunately, it is replacement other support that has been lost during a continuous programme of education cuts. " E hiahia ana ngā kura i ngā wā katoa ki te whakarerekē i te hunga tino tūkino me ētahi atu kaiako hei āwhina i te uru ki te marautanga me te whakanui ake i te whakauru ki ngā ngohe e tangohia ana e te nuinga o ētahi atu tamariki. "Ko te āwangawanga nui ko te toitūtanga o te pūtea me te pūtea nui i roto i ngā tohunga mātauranga pūmau. " Kua kitea e te whakaritenga o nāianei te nui o ngā whakairinga rangitahi e waihangatia ana, kāore i te painga o ngā tamariki e hiahia ana ki ngā tohunga auau, māia hoki hei tautoko i a rātou i roto i tā rātou haerenga akoranga." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tīmatanga te pūtea PEP engari kāore e taea te kati, me te pūtea whāiti o nāianei, te āputa ki te hoatu i te wheako mātauranga ōrite ki te tino whai painga." The Scottish Parent Teacher Council said it had concerns about using free school meal claims as the basis for the allocation of funds. Ua parau te raatira rahi o Eileen Prior : « Ua ite matou e te vai ra te tahi mau ohipa maitai e ravehia nei na roto i te tahi atu mau moni no te ATH, tera râ, te hinaaro nei matou e ite i te tahi mau haapapuraa paari no te faahopearaa i ni'a i te faaotiraa e te faaotiraa. »

title: Scarborough Council agrees to SeaGrown seaweed farm grant
summary: Kua pūruatia e tētahi mana ā rohe tētahi pāmu rimurapa i te tai rāwhiti.
text: Kua raihanatia e te kamupene o Scarborough SeaGrown tētahi pae 25 heketea e toru maero ki te Moana ki te Raki ki te hauhake rimurapa mai i ngā pūhara totohu. I kī te Kaunihera o Scarborough ka noho hei "tinana haepapa" mō tētahi koha mō te paopao rimurapa. Councillors said they were pleased to "back a good news story", according to the Local Democracy Reporting Service. I kī te komiti kāpata ka noho te mana hei kaitiaki mō te £472,150 ki SeaGrown Ltd mai i te Pūtea Hapori Taiwhenua. Ka taumautia ngā pūrei me ngā mekameka ki te pae, me te rimurapa e tipu ana i runga i ngā raina kōruru. E whai ana te kaupapa hei kamupene UK tuatahi hei whakauru i te rimurapa pāmu ki ngā mākete hou pēnei i ngā bioplastics, biotextiles me ngā rongoā rongoā i te tau 2021, te kī a te kamupene. I whakatūria a SeaGrown e te kaihī ika o Scarborough o mua ko Wave Crookes me tōna hoa, ko Laura Robinson, he kaipūtaiao moana. E tūmanako ana te umanga ki te waihanga i ngā mahi e iwa i roto i ngā tau tuatahi e rua, e piki ana ki te 23 i roto i te rima tau, ā, he nui ake ngā mahi tōtika i roto i te mekameka whakarato rimurapa. Ka whakawhitia te rimurapa pāmu ki te whanga o Scarborough, mēnā ka whakaaetia ngā mahere, ki tētahi pānga hou i Eastfield Business Park, ka pūrongotia e te LDRS. I te tau 2015, tata ki te £9.6bn te mākete huri noa o te rimurapa. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whakapaea te hinganga o te taumata-A o ngā reo kē i runga i te tapahi
summary: Ko te whakapeka nui o ngā tāurunga ki ngā taumata A reo kē o nāianei kua whakapaea e ngā kaiako matua i runga i ngā pēhanga pūtea nui.
text: Nā Hannah RichardsonBBC News education reporter Entries to A-levels in French have dropped by 6.4% from last year, in German by 4.2% and in Spanish by 2.7%. I kī a Malcolm Trobe o te uniana o ngā upoko ASCL i uaua ki ngā kura me ngā kura kura te whakahaere akoranga me ngā tauira iti, nā te iti o te pūtea. Ka whakautua e te kāwanatanga he whakahauhau i nga tauira kia mau reo. Ko te nuinga o tēnei mā te Ingarihi Baccalaureate - te tohu tākai e hiahiatia ana e ngā ākonga kia noho i ētahi GCSE tae atu ki tētahi reo. 'Ngā kōwhiringa whāiti' Ko te pānga o te iti o te pūtea e puta mai ana i te wā e whiwhi ana ngā tauira i Ingarangi, i Uēra me Aiarangi ki te Raki i ā rātou hua taumata-A. Engari i kī a Tēnā Trobe, te hēkeretari nui o te Association of School and College Leaders (ASCL), e māharahara ana a ia ki te "whakapeka tonu" i te maha o ngā whakaurunga taumata-A i roto i ngā reo kē o nāianei, me ētahi atu kaupapa "iti" pēnei i te pūoro, me te hoahoa me te hangarau. "E whakaatu ana ēnei tatauranga i te mea kei te uaua haere te whakahaere i ngā akoranga i reira he iti noa iho ngā ākonga nā ngā pēhanga pūtea nui," tana kī. "He pouri te taumata o te pūtea poutāpeta 16, ā, me mātua whakatau wawe. " Kei te mōrearea tātau ki te mau i roto i tētahi porohita kino e whakapeka tonu ai ngā tāurunga ki ēnei kaupapa tino hira, ā, he iti ake ngā tāngata hei whakaako i a rātou ā muri ake nei, e whāwhā ana i tētahi raruraru tono haere tonu," tana tāpiri mai. I kī hoki a Tēnā Trobe i ngā huringa ki te taumata-AS - kāore i te tatau ināianei ki te kōeke taumata-A whakamutunga - kua whakawhāititia hoki ngā kōwhiringa a ngā tauira. I mua, i whakaaetia ngā tauira kia whā ngā kaupapa, kātahi ka whakataka tētahi i te mutunga o te tau tuatahi, ka kī a ia. Ināianei, ka tautohe a ia, "kei te whakaiti noa mātou i te kōwhiringa marautanga, tūnga katoa." I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te National Association of Head Teachers, a Russell Hobby, ahakoa he "pai te kite i te pikinga o ngā kōeke matua i whakawhiwhia ki te reo kē o nāianei", me whakatinana tētahi rautaki ā-motu hei whakatau i te taka o ngā tāurunga. Ka kī a ia: "Ka kite anō mātou i te hekenga o te maha o ngā ākonga e mau ana i ēnei kaupapa." "Me mātua whakarite mātou he rawaka ngā kaiako whakangungu hei tuku i te whānuitanga o ngā reo, ā, kia tautokona ngā kura kia kitea hoki ngā tauira tuatahi ki ngā uauatanga o te ako i tētahi reo," tana tāpiri mai. I whakaae te minita kura a Nick Gibb he "māharahara" te whakataka i roto i ngā reo kē. "He iti noa iho te hekenga o ngā reo kē o nāianei, engari kua hopukina e te whakaurunga o te EBacc te hinganga hītori o ngā reo kē i GCSE, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou ka tipu tēnei i te puna o ngā rangatahi kua whakaritea ki te ako reo i te taumata A." I kī te Tari Mātauranga e pare ana i te pūtea mō ngā pakeke 16 ki te 19 tau, ā, i whakamutua te rerekētanga tika i waenganui i ngā kura me ngā kura 16.

title: Coronavirus: He aha te ako a te UK mai i Tiamana i runga i te whakamātautau?
summary: Kei te whakarite a Tiamana ki te tīmata i ngā whakamātautau hou a tērā wiki kia mōhio ai ko wai kua whiwhi kē i te coronavirus. Ka kimi ngā whakamātautau i ngā ārai ārai i roto i te toto, me te whāinga ki te mahi i ngā pāpātanga whakapokenga.
text: Nā Pirihi MorrisReality Check correspondent, BBC News Ka arotahi rātau i te tuatahi ki ngā koha toto me ngā wāhi e whā o te whenua i tino pā ki te tīmatatanga. He whakamaumahara te whakamātautau, kua tino mua a Tiamana i ētahi atu whenua o Ūropi, tae atu ki te UK. E hia anō ngā whakamātautau i mahia e Tiamana? He nui ake ngā whakamātautau tātaritanga tātaritanga a ngā Tiamana, hei whakatau mēnā kua pāngia tētahi tangata ki te huaketo, i ētahi atu whenua nui o Ūropi, pērā i te UK me Wīwī. I te wiki e mutu ana i te 4 o Āperira, e 132 ngā taiwhanga puta noa i Tiamana i mahi i te toharite o ngā whakamātautau swab 54314 ia rā me te kaha ki te mahi i ngā whakamātautau 116,655 ia rā. A, ko te tapeke o ngā whakamātautau swab i mahia i te 4 o Āperira, neke atu i te 1.3 miriona. Ko te UK, e tūmanako ana kia tae ki te 100,000 whakamātautau i ia rā i te mutunga o te marama. Tae atu ki te 10 o Āperira, ko te tapeke tāpiripiri o UK e tū ana i te 316,836 ngā whakamātautau. "E mōhio ana tātau katoa i mua a Tiamana i tōna kaha ki te whakamātau i te huaketo, ā, he nui tonu ngā mea hei ako mai i tērā," te kī a te kaitohutohu rongoā matua o te kāwanatanga o UK, a Chris Whitty, i te 7 o Āperira. Kotahi te mea e mārama ana: mēnā he nui tō whakamātautau, ka whakamātauria hoki e koe te tokomaha o ngā tāngata kāore i a rātou te huaketo, he tohu māmā noa iho rānei. Nā reira, i runga i te tatauranga, ka iti iho tō pāpātanga mate i te mea ka whakamātauria e koe anake ngā tāngata kua mate kē i te hōhipera. He aha te rerekē o te mahi a Tiamana? Ko te tikanga o te whakamātautau whānui i te tīmatanga o te tīmatanga, he maha ngā kēhi tōrunga i kitea i te wāhanga tōmua. Nā tērā i whai wāhi ai ngā mana ki te whakataki i tētahi tangata i whakapā atu ki ngā tāngata kua whakapokea, ki te ngana ki te whakapōturi i te horahanga o te huaketo. "I tonoa ngā tāngata i te moata o te marama ki muri kia noho taratahi," te kōrero a te Tiamana Association of Accredited Laboratories o Evangelos Kotsopoulos ki a BBC News. "I whakatakina hoki ngā tāngata [i whakapā atu rātou] ki a TE Rongokōrero. E whakapono ana a Tēnā Kotsopoulos kua whakaorangia pea e nga mana Tiamana te ora. "Ki taku whakaaro koia tēnā," tana kī, "kua taea e rātau te whakapapatahi i te ānau me te pōturi i te tere o te whakapokenga." Ki tētahi atu kōrero, ko te maha o ngā take nui, me te maha o ngā tūpāpaku, kāore i tere te piki ki ērā atu whenua maha o Ūropi. Ko te "whakapapatahi i te ānau" te rautaki e whaia ana e nga whenua maha, tae atu ki te UK, ki te karo i te taumata nui o nga keehi coronavirus e whakararuraru ana i nga punaha hauora. He iti rawa te pāpātanga mate o Tiamana - engari ka rerekē tonu tērā. Ko te nuinga o ngā whakamātautau tōmua he taitamariki, ko te nuinga o rātou he iti iho te mōrearea ki te huaketo. Engari he tohu i ngā rā torutoru kua hipa ake nei kei te piki haere te pāpātanga mate - ā, tērā anō pea ka piki ake ki tētahi atu wāhi. Tae atu ki te 10 o Āperira, e 113,525 ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia e Tiamana me te 2,373 ngā mate, e ai ki te Whare Wānanga o Robert Koch, te tinana hauora tūmatanui o te whenua. A, ki te whakamutua a Tiamana ki te iti iho o te mate i ētahi atu whenua i Uropi, ka kitea te whakamātautau wawe hei take matua. He pēhea i taea ai e Tiamana te whakatere i te whakamātautau? Kua huatau mai te Hēkeretari Hauora a Matt Hancock he take nui te kaha o ngā mahi rongoā me ngā mahi hangarau hangarau o Tiamana. I tana tiaki i ngā whakamātautau whāiti o te UK, i whakaritea ki Tiamana, ka kī a ia: "Kei a mātau ngā taiwhanga pūtaiao tino pai i te ao, engari kāore i a mātau te tauine. " Hei tauira, ka taea e taku hoa Tiamana te karanga ki ngā taiwhanga whakamātautau 100 kua rite me te tatari ina pā mai te raruraru, he mihi nui ki a Roche, tētahi o ngā kamupene tātaritanga nui rawa o te ao." Engari ehara pea te kaha mahi i te take matua i muri i te angitu o Tiamana. Ko te nuinga o ngā taiwhanga tūmataiti e whakamahia ana mō te whakamātautau i Tiamana e pāhono ana ki ngā whare wānanga me ētahi atu whare rongoā, kaua ki ngā umanga nui (ā, he kamupene Huitene tonu a Roche). He nui ake pea te whakapau hauora: te āhua nei he take nui hoki te pūnaha tōrangapū o Tiamana. Ka whakahekea e ia te mana ki ngā wāhi nui o te kaupapahere hauora - tae atu ki te whakamātautau - mai i te kāwanatanga matua ki te taumata o te kāwanatanga, i raro iho rānei. Nā tērā i waihanga ai i te mana motuhake me te ngāwaritanga, e āhei ai ngā taiwhanga tūmataiti ki te tīmata ki te whakamātau tere ake i te UK. I te tuatahi, ko ngā umanga kāwanatanga i te UK, pērā i te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi, i te tuatahi ka tohutohu i te whakamātautau maha i te wāhanga o mua, he tino uaua ki te whakatutuki. I whai wā anō te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi ki te whakatau kia tere te pikinga o te whakamātautau kia noho hei kaupapa here. I te 2 o Āperira anake ka pānuitia he mahere hei whakanui ake i te whakamātautau. Ka taea, me mahi rānei i mua? Ko ētahi atu whakataurite o te ao whānui e tohu ana ko te whakamātautau maha he wāhanga tau tōpu o te whawhai ki te coronavirus. Ko te nui ake o ngā mōhiohio kei a koe mō wai kei a ia te huaketo, ko te nui ake o te tūponotanga ka taea te pupuri i tētahi momo mana. I Āhia ki te Rāwhiti, ko te whenua i whakatinana i te kāwanatanga whakamātautau tōmua tino whakatuki ko Kōrea ki te Tonga. Kua taea e tana rautaki "whakataki, whakamātauria me te mahi" te pupuri i te maha o ngā kēhi kua kitea. Ā, pēnei i a Tiamana, he tino iti iho hoki tōna pāpātanga mate i ētahi atu whenua ōrite. I whakatikaina tēnei wāhanga i te 12 o Pipiri hei whakamārama i te wiki e mutu ana i te 4 o Āperira, ka taea e ngā taiwhanga Tiamana te mahi i ngā whakamātautau 116,655 ia rā, engari e 54,314 ngā whakamātautau i ia rā.

title: Roundhay Park: Plans to raise gig capacity to 80,000 submitted
summary: Ka noho pea tētahi pāka taone hei tētahi o ngā wāhi konohete nui rawa o waho i te whenua, i raro i ngā mahere hōu.
text: E hiahia ana te Kaunihera Taone o Leeds ki te whakanui ake i te kaha i Roundhay Park mō "ngā takahanga tauine nui" ki te tata ki te 80,000. I tēnei wā, kei raro noa iho i te 20,000 te tepe kaha i te pāka mō ngā takahanga ora. Kua tautuhia a Ed Sheeran ki te tākaro i ngā pō e rua i te 16 me te 17 o Aotearoa. I kī te mana e hiahia ana ki te whakanui ake i te whānuitanga mō ngā takahanga ora tauine nui ake i te pāka. Ma te pikinga i whakaritea ka ōrite te kaha ki te Taiwhanga Tākaro o Rāwāhi, te Hākari Pānui me te papa whutupōro o Old Trafford i Manchester. E kī ana te tīma takahanga a te mana i roto i tētahi puka taupānga: "Ko Roundhay Park he pāka taone nui e whakarato ana i tētahi pānga mō te iwi o Leeds. " He wāhi tawhito [tērā] mō ngā takahanga nunui puta noa i ngā tau. "In addition it provides a vital function for community groups and charities looking to host events to raise funds." I tāpiritia kua puritia e te pāka he raihana mō te kaha o ngā takahanga e 79,999, engari i whakahekea tēnei i te tau 2006 nā te kore tono i taua wā, e kī ana te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. Mēnā ka whakaaetia te mahere whakawhānui kaha, tērā pea ka hoki ki ngā rā kororia o ngā tau 1980 me ngā tau 1990, i te wā i taurimatia ai e te pāka ngā mahi pahū nui rawa o taua wā. I tākaro te Rolling Stones i te pāka i te tau 1982 - ko tētahi o ngā wāhi Peretania e whā anake i runga i ta rātau haerenga ki Ūropi i taua tau. I te tau 1987 ka taurimatia e te pāka a Genesis, e ono wiki i mua i te tākaro a Madonna i mua i ngā kaihautū e 73,000 i taua pae kotahi. Kotahi tau i muri iho, ka mahi a Michael Jackson i Roundhay Park i tōna huritau 30, i te wā i tākaro ai ngā toka o Airani U2 i mua i ngā kaihautū e 54,000 i te pāka hei wāhanga o ta rātau haereere PopMart. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whara nga āpiha o Liverpool e haere ana ki te tāhae patu i te tūtukitanga
summary: Tokotoru nga pirihimana i whara i te tūtukitanga i a rātau e urupare ana ki tētahi tāhaetanga patu.
text: I a rātau e haere ana ki Morrisons i Belle Vale Shopping Centre, Liverpool, i te tūtukitanga o to rātau motokā ki tētahi BMW i Childwall Valley Road i te 09:40 BST. I mauria nga āpiha ki te hōhipera i te wā kāore i whara nga kainoho i tērā motokā, ka kī nga Pirihimana o Merseyside. I kī te tōpana i tāhaetia te moni e ngā tāngata tokorua, kotahi e mau ana i te naihi, i roto i te tāhaetanga moni. I whakawehitia tētahi tautiaki haumarutanga i mua i te tāhaetanga a ngā tāngata tokorua e mau ana i tētahi pouaka moni, ka kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu. Kātahi ka rere nga hunga hara tokorua i roto i tētahi Volvo V40 pango, i kitea i muri tata iho i Peckmill Green. E tono ana a Det Insp Amy Smith ki tētahi tangata whai mōhiohio mō te tāhaetanga, te tūtukitanga rānei kia whakapā atu ki te ope. I mauria nga āpiha ki te hōhipera hei whakatūpatotanga, a, kaore i whakaarotia he tino whara. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: Neke atu i te 14 neke atu rānei te mate o te whakaeke i te pahi iti i Kabul
summary: Neke atu i te 14 ngā tāngata i patua e tētahi whakaekenga whai i a ia i runga i tētahi pahi iti i Kabul, ā, he tokomaha anō i whara, e kī ana ngā mana o Pūkeirangi.
text: Ko nga tūpāpaku he tangata whenua o Nepali i a rātau e haere ana ki te kāwanatanga o Kānata i mahi ai rātau hei tautīaki haumarutanga. Ka tatari te kaihōia ki te pahi i a ia e mahue ana i tētahi pūhui, ka kī pirihimana. I whaia te pahūtanga e tētahi whakaekenga pōma motuhake i runga i tētahi mākete i te kawanatanga o Badakhshan, e waru neke atu rānei ngā tāngata, a, e waru neke atu rānei ngā tāngata, a, e 18 i whara. I kī te Huinga i mahia e rātau te whakapae o Kabul, te whakaekenga tuatahi mai i te tīmatanga o te marama tapu o Ramadan. I mua noa iho i te 06:00 wā paetata (01:30 GMT) i runga i tētahi huarahi matua e ahu atu ana i te pūmatua ki te taone o Iapara. I whakamahia nga tautīaki e tētahi kamupene haumarutanga tūmataiti, ka kī atu tētahi mana ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. E waru neke atu rānei ētahi atu tāngata i whara. Ka whai te mahi i tētahi whakaekenga whai i a ia i runga i tētahi pahi tata ki Kabul i tērā marama, ā, ka whakaekea tētahi kōti i Ghazni i Hāmata. I whakapuakina e te Huinga nga whakaekenga e rua hei utu mo te kawenga o nga herehere e ono. Mai i te tau 2001, kua whakaekea e te Huinga he tauwhāinga ki te kāwanatanga. I whakamutua e te NATO tana mahi riri i Tīma 2014, ahakoa tata ki te 13,000 ngā hōia whakangungu me ngā hōia pūtohu e noho ana i Awhekenetāna. Kua tūpono nga mahi rangimārie i muri i te whakakāhoretanga a te Huinga ki te whai wāhi ki ngā kōrero hou ki te kāwanatanga o Pūkeirangi kia wehe rā anō ngā ope kē i te whenua.

title: Ko te kore mahi o Kariki e pā ana ki te mokatere teitei rawa atu i te Uniana o Ūropi
summary: Kua piki te mokatere kore mahi hou mō Kariki ki te 26.8%, te whika teitei rawa i tuhia ki te Uniana o Ūropi (EU).
text: Ko te raraunga Kariki whaimana mō Whiringahora e kite ana i a Kariki e mau ana i Paniora hei whenua e tino nui ana te kore mahi i Uropi. Ka noho whakahekea tonutia te āhua o te mahi Kariki, ā, kei te whakapakari te kāwanatanga i ngā tikanga whakawhāiti nui. Kei te tapahi a Atene i te whakapau moni kia tutuki ai ngā whakaritenga o ana tārewa pūtea. Nō tēnei wā, kua tautohe te Pēke Matua o Ūropi, te Pūtea Moni Ao Whānui, me te Kōmihana o Ūropi i te tapeke o ngā hōro 240bn ($315bn; £196bn) i roto i ngā moni whakaora, kua whiwhi a Kariki i neke atu i te rua tuatoru. I hiahiatia e te kāwanatanga Kariki nga tārewa nā te mea e uaua ana ki te whakatutuki i ngā utu huamoni i runga i ana nama tīariari. I raro i ngā ture o ngā moni whakaora, me whakaae a Kariki ki te utu whakapau moni, pēnei i ngā whakahōutanga me te utu i te wāhanga tūmatanui, me te whakaiti i te hekenga. He pānga nui tēnei ki te āhua o te āhua o te Kariki whānui ake. Ahakoa ko te 26.8% o te kore mahi o Kariki i Whiringahora, ko te whika whai mana hōu rawa mō Paniora - mō te marama o Whiringa - ko te 26.6%. Kei te whakahekea hoki a Paniora, me tapahi e tōna kāwanatanga te whakapau moni hei whakaiti i ana nama. I kī te korero kōrero o Atene, a Mark Lowen: "E whakapae ana ngā Kariki i te whakawhāititanga mo te pikinga, me te maha o ngā kore mahi neke atu i te rua mai i te wā i tārewa tuatahitia ai te whenua i te tau 2010. " A, me te nui ake o ngā utu whakapau moni i tēnei tau, he tokomaha e matapae ana ka wawe te mokatere ki te 30%."

title: 'E iwa ngā wā i okaina ahau, a, he toki i roto i tōku māhunga'
summary: Kei te piki haere te hara maripi i Ingarangi me Weera, engari kua kitea e tētahi mahi i Pākehā he nui te hinganga o te maha o ngā wero. Me whakaaro anō rānei te toenga o te UK ki te āhua o te hara maripi?
text: Nā Louis Lee RayBBC Victoria Derbyshire hōtaka "Kua tata motuhake taku ringa. Kua okaina ahau i roto i te māhunga - he angaanga whati, kua okaina ki muri, he pūkahukahu kua werohia, he maha nga wā. He mea whakamīharo kei te ora tonu ahau," te kī a Callum, e 26, ki te hōtaka o Wikitōria o Te Aotearoa. I te tipu ake i te pito ki te rāwhiti o Glasgow, i reira te tutu "āhua noa iho", ka tīmata a ia ki te whawhai i te 12 noa iho, ā, i mauria e ngā pirihimana ki te kāinga i te 13 i muri i te mau rākau whakahāwea. "I whakamahia e ētahi tāngata te haere ki waho ki te tākaro whutupōro, i whakamahia e mātau te haere ki waho me te ngana ki te okaina tētahi ki tētahi," tana kī. "Ko ngā whakaekenga, te whānako me te whakararuraru, te mau rākau whakahāwea, te takahi i te rangimārie, ngā mea pēnei - me whakauru tonu ahau ki ngā pirihimana." I te tau 2005, i kitea e tētahi pūrongo UN ko Pākehā te whenua tino taikaha i te ao tipua, ā, ko Glasgow e mōhiotia ana mō ngā rōpū. Kātahi ka tīmata nga mana ki te huri i ta rātau huarahi. I whakatūria te Wae Whakaiti Tukino, i pūteatia e te kāwanatanga, ā, e whakahaeretia ana e Pirihimana Pākehā. I tangohia he "huarahi hauora tūmatanui" ki te tutu, pēnei i te mate me te mahi i ngā take, kaua ko ngā āhuatanga. Tuatahi, i pā ki te raruraru rōpū o Glasgow, me tētahi "waea" i haere mai e ngā mema rōpū e 200. I korerotia ki a rātau ki te kore rātau e whakamutu i te tutu ka hopukina rātau, engari ki te hiahia rātau ki te whakarere i te oranga rōpū ka hoatu ki a rātau he tautoko hei āwhina i a rātau ki te huri. Kei te tīari tonu nga rōpū, engari he iti ake te tau. Ko te mahi matua a te Wae Whakaiti Tukino, ko te huri i ngā āhuatanga, e whakamatautau ana i te whakaaro me mau rākau te katoa. E kī ana a Will Linden, ko te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o te waeine: "He nui tonu a mātau whakaekenga maripi. " I te mau te tangata i roto i te whawhai, a, i te tango maripi tētahi ki waho, a, ka okaina tētahi tangata. "Nā reira, ki te tangohia e koe taua maripi i te āhuatanga mā te kōrero i te pōhēhētanga mōna, ka heke te tino nui o te tutu." I taua wā, ka haere tonu nga pirihimana ki te whakamahi i te tū me te rapu. I whakanuia ngā whiu whare herehere mo te mau maripi mai i te rua ki te whā ki te rima tau. I whakatūria hoki e te wae he maha o ngā hōtaka - e mahi tahi ana me ngā tāngata i roto i te mātauranga, te hauora me te mahi pāpori puta noa i Pākehā - i whakaritea katoatia ki te whakaiti i te hara taikaha. Ko tētahi o ēnei, e kiia nei ko Navigator, e whakahaeretia ana i ngā hōhipera i Etinitini me Glasgow. E kōrero ana kaimahi ki te tangata e haere ana ki tētahi aituā me te wae ohorere, otirā i muri i te okaina o ngā tāngata, ki te whakamahi i taua wā ki te ngana ki te huri i ngā oranga. Tērā pea ka āwhina i a rātou kia mā - te whakauru i a rātou ki ngā rōpū hapori, te āwhina rānei i a rātou ki te kimi whare tika - he aha hei āwhina ki te whati i te huringa o te tūkinotanga me te tutu. A, kotahi tau ki muri ko Callum tētahi o aua tāngata. "E iwa nga wā i okaina ai ahau, a, ka purua he toki ki roto i taku māhunga. I kite taku tama i tēnei katoa ahakoa te matapihi nā te mea i waho tonu o tōku whare," tana kī. "I te māuiui ahau, i te ngenge i te ārahi i te oranga e ārahi ana ahau. Kāore au i mōhio me pēhea te huri i tōku oranga nā te mea kua roa rawa taku mahi." I roto i te A&E ka whakatata mai tētahi Kaiwhakatere nāna i kī ka taea e rātau te whakaatu ki a ia me pēhea te mawhiti i tōna ora. "I hopukina e au ki ngā ringa e rua nā te mea i mōhio ahau kei te pau ngā wā," tana kī. Ko ta rātau whakatutukitanga tuatahi ko te āwhina i a ia ki te whakamutu i te inu, e kī ana a Callum ko te take taketake o ōna raruraru. 'I whakaorangia tōku ora' Nā te mahi a te Wae Whakaiti Tukino i āwhina ki te tata ki te haurua o te pāpātanga kōhuru o Pākehā i roto i ngā tau e 10 kua hipa. I tērā tau, neke atu i te 35 ngā tamariki me ngā taitamariki i patua ki te maripi i Ingarangi, engari kāore he tangata i Pākehā. Ko ngā whika hōu rawa e whakaatu ana i te 26% te pikinga o ngā hara maripi i Ingarangi me Uēra i tērā tau me te tau teitei rawa mai i te 2011, te wāhi tuatahi e wātea ana ngā raraunga ōrite. E kī ana te Hēkeretari Ture o Pākehā, a Michael Matheson: "Ehara i te mea he nui ake ngā pirihimana, te whakanui rānei i ngā mana whiu mō ā mātou rerenga i roto i ngā kōti... It's about working with organisations and working an approach that helps to reduce the risk of young people from getting involved in the future. "E tino kite ana ahau i tēnā huarahi e whakaaro ana ahau ka āwhina i Ingarangi ki te whiu i ētahi o ēnei take." Ināianei he wāhanga a Callum o tētahi atu o ngā hōtaka a te Wae Whakaiti Taikaha - Tiriti & Pere - e whakarato ana i te mahi me te whakangungu ki te hunga hara i mua, i roto i tētahi vani kai. "Kāore au i te mōhio mehemea ka ora ahau. Nā reira kua whakaorangia tōku ora. A, kua whakaorangia e ia te oranga o ētahi atu tāngata. He tino nui te pānga o te whakauru mai ki a au," tana kī. "It's helped my son, it's helped my daughter, it's helped my mother, it's helped everyone in my community, because I'm not running about involved in violence anymore." Mātakitaki i te hōtaka o Wikitōria o Wikitōria i ngā rā o te wiki i waenganui i te 09:00 me te 11:00 i te Rua me te hongere Rongokōrero o TE AO.

title: Te Whare Wānanga o Manchester: 'Kāore i te āhua kei te uni'
summary: Ko ngā kauhau tuihono, kāore he mahi a ngā kaihautū, he taiapa konganuku i whakatakotoria huri noa i ō hōro - he haumaru te kī atu ko te ora i te Whare Wānanga o Manatū i te tau 2020 ehara i te mea e tūmanakohia ana e ngā ākonga.
text: I oho ake te hunga e noho ana i roto i nga hōro o Fallowfield ki nga kaimahi e whakatakoto ana i "ngā ārai konganuku nunui" huri noa i to rātau nohoanga. Nāna i whakaoho tētahi whakahē i kī ai tētahi ākonga ko te hua o te "tanuku i hangaia i roto i ngā marama e rua kua taha". I kī atu tētahi atu ākonga ki a Radio 1 Newsbeat kua "tino nui" te oranga uni i roto i te taiepa. 'He wehenga nui i roto i te whakawhirinaki' 18 a Ben McGowan, ā, e ako ana i ngā tōrangapū me te mātauranga pāpori i Manchester. "Being here feels like I'm just in a hall halfway across the country, sometimes doing some Zoom calls," he says. "I to mātau taenga mai ki konei, kāore anō kia kīia mai ki a mātau ka tuihono katoa, kua kīia mai ki a mātau he kauhau - he wehenga nui tērā i roto i te whakawhirinaki." I whai wāhi a Pene ki te whakahē i te taiapa e whakatūria ana. "There was a lot of tension that's been building over the last couple of months, there's been a lot of issues. " Nā reira ko te oho ake me te karapoti i te taiepa he tino wāhi tīpoka mō te tangata. "I know it's not technically our homes, but we do live here and pay money to live here. Kāore koe e pīrangi ki te oho ake i tētahi rā, kia karapoti, kia rongo hoki kei roto koe i te whare herehere." He pānga nui te mate urutā ki te hauora hinengaro i te UK, ā, ko te rangatahi e tino mōrearea ana. E hiahia ana a Pene kia nui ake te whakaaro o tana whare wānanga ki te hauora hinengaro o ngā ākonga. "Now we're getting back into lockdown, there's definitely going to be even more issues. " He mano maero te tawhiti atu o te tangata i te kāinga me ngā tāngata kātahi anō ka tūtaki ki a rātou, kua taratahi te tangata. "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i tētahi toro atu i tua atu i tētahi tau waea whānui ka taea e koe te waea mēnā kei te kino koe, engari kāore he tangata e mahi ana i tēnā. " We were meant to get wellbeing check-ups but I don't know anyone that's had one." 'Kaua mātou e tono tautoko' Tekau mā waru tau te pakeke o Eva Humphry e uaua ana ki te pupuri i ana mahi i roto i ēnei wā uaua. Kei te ako a ia i ngā pūtaiao pāpori i Manatāta, ā, e kī ana ehara i te mea pēnei i tana whakaaro. "We were expecting blended learning [online and face-to-face lessons] this year, that's why a lot of us moved into halls. " Uni has been overwhelming, in terms of what we've been put through and what we have to do for work, but underwhelming in all the expectations you have when you come to university." I ngā wiki e rua ki muri, ka waipuketia te rūma moe o Eva i ōna hōro nā te paipa pakaru. I tūkinotia e ia ētahi o ana mea, ā, i kī a ia he pānga kino ki tōna hauora hinengaro. "He paruparu, he wai wera i tino kino, ā, ka kino ake te haunga i ngā rā tata nei nā te mea kāore he tangata i horoi. " I mua i te waipuke, i te hopu noa iho ahau i ngā mea katoa, i rongo ahau kua tata tonu tōku oranga, kātahi ka mutu ka moe ahau i runga i te papa. He tino uaua, he tino nui." Pēnei i a Pene, e whakaaro ana a Eva he iti noa iho te tautoko hauora hinengaro a te whare wānanga. "I waea mai rātau ki a au i tētahi wā ki te pātai he pēhea tōku oranga, kātahi ka kī mai 'Aroha mai, e mōhio tūturu ana ahau he tino uaua ki a koe, kia pai te rā, kia ora'. " I pēnei ahau he whakamātau haurua noa iho." Kāore a ia i haere ki ngā whakahē taiapa, engari e kī ana a ia i "whakarihariha" i tana kitenga i te piki ake. "Kāore mātou i mōhio he aha te mea e haere ana nā te mea kāore rātau i kōrero mai ki a mātau, he tino whakamataku." I kī te Whare Wānanga o Manatū ko te oranga hinengaro o ngā ākonga he "tino hiranga". I whakapārewa hoki "mo te āwangawanga me te āwangawanga i takea" e te taiapa. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Ka taea e ngā ākonga te uru ki tētahi pūhara tautoko hauora hinengaro tuihono, Togetherall, e whakarato ana i te tautoko wā tūturu, ā, ākuanei ka tāpiritia tēnei e tētahi raina waea tautoko hauora hinengaro 24/7 e wātea ana ki ngā ākonga me ngā kaimahi katoa. " I tua atu i tērā, he nui ake te tautoko arotahi e tukuna ana e ngā tīma tautoko i ngā kura me ngā kāinga, e tuku ana i te tautoko tuatahi kanohi-ki-te-kanohi me te tohutohu hohe ki ētahi atu hipanga." I tāpiri mai rātau: "He ara whakanui mārama tā mātou mō ngā ākonga i roto i te mōrearea me ngā hononga kaha ki ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro NHS paetata. Kei roto i tēnei ko te whare wānanga auaha me te mahi ngātahi NHS, te kaihautū ratonga hauora hinengaro o te whare wānanga o Greater Manchester. "The programme has just completed its first year of a two-year pilot and has been open throughout the pandemic, offering face-to-face and remote sessions."

title: Demi Lovato: Ko te whakapae e whai ana i te pakanga roa kia noho whakaaro nui ai
summary: "I te wā whakamutunga i uiui ai ahau i tēnei roa, i runga ahau i te kokaini."
text: E mārama ana mai i te meneti tuatahi o te pakipūmeka mana a Demi Lovato, i whakaputaina i Whiringahora i tērā o Whiringahora, kāore he raruraru o te kaiwaiata ki te tūwhera mō ōna tūkinotanga. Ko te uiuinga tōmua e kōrerotia ana e ia mō tētahi atu pakipūmeka - 2012's Stay Strong - i kōrero ai ia mō tana "pakanga ia rā" ki ngā mate kai, te tūkino i a ia anō me ngā take hauora hinengaro, tae atu ki te tūkinotanga. I moko a Lovato i te "Noho" i tētahi ringa me te "Kaha" i tētahi. Te āhua nei kei te pupuri a ia i nga rewera. I tohe a ia kia mā a ia i muri noa iho i te hanganga o taua pikitia. Heoi anō, i te marama ki muri, ka kitea e ngā kaihautū kua hoki mai a ia i tana whakaaturanga i roto i tētahi waiata hou: "Kāore au i te whakaaro nui." Nā reira ko tōna āhua nui i te Tūtira he hurihanga manawa mō te tau 25 tau me te hunga katoa i whai i a ia i tana haerenga tōraro mai i te whetū Disney ki te ata pahū raruraru. Ko ngā pēhanga o te whetū taiohi, he pātahitanga hē ki tōna pāpā me te whakaweti i āwhina katoa ki ngā take kua whakawehi ki te tō i a ia ki raro i ētahi wā i roto i tana mahi, ka whakaaturia mai aua pakipūmeka. I kī te kaiwaiata i tīmata ōna raruraru ki te kai me ngā whakaaro whai i a ia i mua tonu i tana wehenga nui i runga i te whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata o Barney & Friends i a ia e 10 tau ana. I te 12 o ona tau, ka hainatia e ngā tamariki o tana akomanga tētahi petihana e whakahauhau ana i a ia kia whakamate i a ia anō. I hākinakina ngā pēhanga i tana kitenga i te whetū i roto i te Disney Channel e tuki ana i a Camp Rock me Sonny with a Chance, i mua i te whakarewatanga o tētahi mahi pahū. "I rongo ahau i te nui o te pēhanga i te tīmatanga o te rongonui ki roto i tōku oranga," tana kī i roto i te pakipūmeka hou rawa. "I tīmata ahau ki te rongo i te pēhanga ki te titiro i tētahi ara, ki te waiata i ngā pūoro e hiahia ana te tangata, kaua e waiata i ngā pūoro e hiahia ana ahau. " He nui ake te pēhanga kia angitu... He tino pai ahau, ā, i tino hiahia ahau kia tino pai rawa atu. Kaore rawa i tuku. Kātahi anō ka nui ake te piki." I whakamātauria tuatahitia e ia te kokaine i te 17 o ona tau i a ia e mahi ana i te Disney Channel. "I rongo ahau i te mana ki te coke i te wā tuatahi," tana kī. "He kahunga, he waipiro taku pāpā, ā, ki taku whakaaro i rapu tonu ahau i ngā mea i kitea e ia i roto i ngā rongoā me te waipiro nā te mea i whakatutuki i a ia, ā, i kōwhiria e ia tērā i runga i tētahi whānau." Ko te whakaurunga tūmatanui tuatahi i hē tētahi mea i puta mai i te tau 2010 i tana takanga atu i te haerenga o Camp Rock 2 me ngā Tuakana o Hona, ā, ka haere ki te whakaora mō ngā mea i whakaahuatia i taua wā he "take ā-hinengaro, ā-tinana hoki i mahi ai ia mō tētahi wā". I muri i te inu me te kai paipa tarutaru, ka tae mai te wāhi pakaru i a ia me ana kaikanikani pūrua i to rātau hōtēra i tētahi pō. I te tango hoki a Lovato i a Adderall, he rongoā whakahau whakawairangi - ā, ka kōwhao ia i tētahi kaikanikani pūrua nāna i kī atu ki ōna mātua me te kaiwhakahaere e whakamahi ana a ia i te rongoā. "I tere taku noho, ā, ka mate tamariki ahau," tana kī i te tau 2016. "Kāore au i whakaaro ka tae atu ahau ki te 21." I muri i tana tirotiro ki te rongoā, ka kitea he mate bipolar a ia. I tana putanga mai ki waho, ka whakamahi tonu ia i ngā rongoā pēnei i te kokaine me te Xanax. "Kāore au i te mahi i taku papatono," tana kī. "Kāore au i rite ki te whai whakaaro. " I te hūnuku ahau i runga i ngā rererangi, i te hūnuku i roto i ngā whare kaukau, i te hūnuku puta noa i te pō - kāore tētahi tangata i mōhio... I te hiahia ahau ki te rongoā, ki te rongoā rānei... Ehara i te mea ngāwari ki a au te mahi tahi." I roto i te pakipūmeka, ka whakaaturia e ia ka whakamātauria e ia ngā whakamātautau rongoā mā te tuku i te mimi o ētahi atu tāngata, ā, i tētahi wā ka mauria ki te hōhipera i muri i te ngana ki te whai i a ia. I tana tūtukitanga ki aua pāpaku anake, ka kaha ia ki te mā. I a ia e kaiwhakawā ana i te US X Factor i te tau 2012 me te '13, kāore ngā kaimātakitaki i mōhio e noho ana a ia i tētahi "whare noho whakaaro" - he wāhi noho me te tiki āwhina ki te whakaora. He hoa rūma tōna, kāore he waea, ā, me mahi i ngā mahi. E ono tau te roa o taua ngākau mārire, ka kī a ia. I roto i tana pakipūmeka, i whakaaturia e ia, ahakoa i noho a ia i ngā rongoā me te waipiro, kāore anō kia taea e ia te "raupatu katoa" i tōna bulimia. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te kai tonu te wero nui rawa i roto i tōku oranga, ā, ka whakahaeretia... Kāore au e pīrangi ki te hoatu i te mana ki te kī e whakahaere ana i ōku whakaaro katoa, engari he mea e whakaaro tonu ana ahau. "Ko te whakaahua tinana, ko tāku e kai ai ā muri ake, ko tāku e hiahia ana kia kai ahau, ko tāku e hiahia ana kia kaua au e kai. He taimau noa iho. E hae ana ahau ki ngā tāngata kāore e raruraru ana i te mate kai nā te mea kei te mōhio ahau he ngāwari kē atu tōku oranga." I whakapono ngā kaipānui e haere ana tōna oranga ki te ahunga tika - tae noa ki Pipiri 2018, i tana whakairinga i te waiata Sober. Ka waiata a ia: "E Māmā, e pouri ana ahau, kāore au i te whai whakaaro/Me papa, murua koa ahau mō ngā inu i maringi ki runga i te papa/Ki te hunga kāore anō kia mahue i a au/Kua heke mātou i tēnei huarahi i mua/Aroha mai, kāore au i te whakaaro nui." E rua wiki i mua, kua whakakorea e ia e rua ngā whakaaturanga o tana haereere ki UK. Kua mutu te pakipūmeka 2017 i runga i tētahi tuhipoka mōhiotia, ā, ko tōna huringa i taua wā i whakaahuatia he "merekara". I huaina te pakipūmeka ko Simply Complicated, ā, ko ngā kaihautū kua mau ki a ia e mōhio ana ināianei he ngāwari noa iho tana pūrākau. Engari e tūmanako ana rātau ka taea e ia te hoki ki tētahi wāhi e noho ai ia me ana rewera, ahakoa kua kitea he uaua mamae te whakarata i a rātau. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakakapia e te Whare Wānanga o Bath te tumuaki tumuaki 'tino utu'
summary: Ko te tumuaki hou o te Whare Wānanga o Bath kia whiwhi i te £200,000 iti iho i tōna tuatahi tautohetohe, kua puta.
text: Kei te whakakapi a Ahorangi Īna Mā i a Ahorangi Dame Glynis Breakwell, ko ia te tumuaki tumuaki tino utu i te UK. Ka whiwhi a Prof White i te utu ā-tau o te £266,000, i whakaritea ki te £468,000 a Dame Glynis. I heke iho a ia i a Aotearoa i muri i te tautohetohe roa mo tana utu. I kī te Uniana o ngā Ākonga Bath he "pūataata" te tukanga tono. I tēnei wā ko Ahorangi White te Ahorangi Pūkaha o Te Whare Wānanga o Kemipiri, me te Matua o te Kāreti o Ihu. I whakahaeretia te tukanga wāhui a Ahorangi Mā e tētahi pae - te Komiti i te tari o te Tumuaki Tumuaki - arā ko te tumuaki o te whare wānanga, ko Piriniha Edward, te Earl of Wessex. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: I kī a ia: "I pā mai mātau ki te huarahi i tātaritia ai e ia ngā hiahia o te whare wānanga ināianei, ā muri ake nei, me tana hoatu i ōna wheako mai i Bath, Bristol me Cambridge hei waihanga rongoā ahurei, hāngai hoki." I karangatia e ngā ākonga me ngā kaimahi kia hīpae a Dame Glynis i muri i ngā whakapae o te utu nui rawa, me ngā whakahē puta noa i te taone i Whiringa ā Rangi. President of the University of Bath Students' Union, Eve Alcock, who was a member of the final interview panel, said: "Students and staff had input and representation throughout and so we had the chance hear about Ian White's values and vision for the university. " E mōhio ana ahau ko Īna Mā te kōwhiringa tika. Ka taea e tātau katoa te titiro whakamua ki tētahi wā mīharo, kanapa hoki mō tō mātou whare wānanga."

title: Te matenga o Saima: Tokorima nga āpiha e anga ana ki te rūpahu hē
summary: Tokorima ngā āpiha Pirihimana o Metropolitan e anga ana ki tētahi tūhuratanga hē mo te kēhi o tētahi wahine i kitea kua mate i te taha o tētahi papa korowha o Etinitini.
text: I kitea nga toenga o Saima, e 36, i te Hānuere i te Whare Maunga o Gogar, i te tapa o te Karapu Korowha o Gogarburn. Kua whakahē tōna whānau i te urupare a nga pirihimana i muri i to rātau pūrongo i a Ms Anganui e ngaro ana i tōna kāinga o Rāwāhi i Aotearoa 2015. Kua tono tōna tuakana i tētahi tono hou mō ngā mōhiohio mō ana nekeneke whakamutunga. Kua amuamu te whānau i kitea te kēhi o Ms Anganui he "mōrea iti" i muri i tana ngaro atu i te kāinga whānau i Wembley, ā, kāore i kohikohi i ngā whakarākeitanga C KK. I whakaūngia e te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC) e rima ngā āpiha Pirihimana o Metropolitan kua whakamōhiotia kei te tūhuratia rātau, e rua mō te hē nui, e toru mō te hē, i runga i te āhua o ta rātau whakahaere mōhiohio me te whakahaere i te tūhuratanga. I whakapuakina e te IPPC kāore nga whakamōhiotanga i tohu i te hara. I kitea te tinana o Ms Anganui i Etinitini i te 9 o Hānuere, engari kāore i taea e te whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri te whakatau i te take o te mate. Nā ngā uiui o muri mai a Pirihimana Pākehā i haere te kaitiaki pukapuka ki Etinitini mā runga rēra, mā Birmingham, i Aotearoa nei. E tohu ana ngā whakaaturanga ā-ture i mate a ia i muri noa iho i tōna taenga atu ki Etinitini. I tērā wiki ka tohaina e nga pirihimana he mātārere i runga i te tūmanako kia kohikohi tīwhiri hou. Ināianei kua haere te tuakana o Ms Anganui, o Sadat ki Pākehā, a, ka tono hou ki te wāhi i kitea ai tōna tinana. Ka kī a ia: "E whakapono ana ahau ki nga pirihimana. E tūmanako ana ka tae rātau ki ngā whakautu. Ahakoa he aha te mea i tūpono, ka kitea e tātau. "He whakararuraru ki te katoa, kāore he whakautu ki ngā mea i tūpono. Ka haere noa koe i roto i ngā porowhita e ngana ana ki te whakaaro he aha te mea i tūpono." I kī a Tēnā Anganui he tino kore noa iho te ngaro atu o tōna tuahine. I kī a ia kāore he hononga o te whānau ki Etinitini, ā, kāore rātau i mōhio he aha i haere ai a Ms Anganui ki te taone. I kī atu a Det Ch Insp Martin MacLean, e ārahi ana i te tūhuratanga, ki a BBC Radio Scotland he maha ngā pātai kāore anō kia whakautua. "Ka aroha, nā te wā me ngā pānga o ngā huānga me te āhua, i muri i te mahi ā-ture whānui me ngā pūrongo tūkinotanga, kāore e taea te whakatau i te take o te mate," tana kī. "This is clearly very difficult for the family and is the reason for this appeal for information from the public. E hiahia ana mātou ki te āwhina ki te mōhio he aha a Saima i haere mai ai ki Etinitini me te aha i pā ki a ia i ahu mai ai ki tōna matenga." Tērā pea kāore anō kia kitea a Ms Anganui i Portobello Beach tata ki te tau ki mua. Ka kī atu tētahi tangata e haere ana i tana kurī ki nga pirihimana e kōrero ana ia ki tētahi wahine i te one, e haere ana ko ia anake, ā, e ōrite ana ki te whakaahuatanga a Ms Anganui, tata ki te 10:30 i te Mane o Aotearoa nei, tērā pea i te 31 o Aotearoa, ahakoa kāore i te mōhiotia te rā tūturu. I kī te wahine e hiahia ana a ia ki te kite i te one, a, i kī mai kua haere mai a ia i Rānana, a, ka hoki ki raro i taua rā anō. E hiahia ana nga pirihimana ki te mōhio mehemea i noho a ia i tētahi whare manuhiri i reira i te pō i mua, tērā pea i te Rātapu 30 o Aotearoa. Kāore anō kia whakaūngia ngā nekeneke tūturu a Ms Anganui i a ia e haere ana ki Pākehā. E whakapono ana ngā kaitohutohu i hokona e ia tētahi tīkiti rēra o Birmingham ki Edinburgh i Birmingham New Street Station tata ki te 17:00 i te Rātapu 30 o Aotearoa 2015. I kī ngā āpiha tērā pea ka eke ia ki tētahi o ngā ratonga e rua o Etinitini - ko te ratonga Puhi 17:15 rānei nā te taenga ki Etinitini Waverley i te 22:22, te 13:30 rānei o te Whatunga Whenua Puhi (mā York), i tae mai i te 22:21. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana Pākehā

title: Ko te hōia a US 'e ngaro ana i tōna tapa whakataetae'
summary: Kua tukuna e tētahi pae tohunga tētahi aromatawai mārō, whakaaro nui hoki o te Rautaki Whakangungu ā-Motu a te Perehitini o Amerika Donald Trump.
text: Ko Honatana MarcusDiplomatic correspondent@Diplo1on Twitter "Ko te tūranga huri noa i tākarotia e Te Hononga o Amerika mō ngā whakatupuranga maha e noho ana i runga i te tūāpapa o te mana hōia kāore i te ōrite," te kī a tana pūrongo. "Heoi anō, i tēnei rā, kua tino iti iho to mātau tawhē rangatira i ngā wāhi matua." "Arā," e tohe ana te akoranga, "ngā uauatanga kōhukihuki me whakatau mēnā e hiahia ana te Hononga o Amerika ki te karo i te tūkinotanga mau tonu ki tōna haumarutanga ā-motu." I whakaritea e te Rōpū Nui te Komihana Rautaki Whakangungu ā Iwi ki te hoatu i tētahi arotakenga takitahi, kāore i te āwhina i te rautaki wawao a te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho. I tūtakina e Erika Edelman, tētahi mana o Pentagon o mua i roto i te whakahaeretanga a George W Bush, me Admiral Gary Roughead, he rangatira o mua o nga mahi moana. He insiders ēnei e mōhio ana ki tō rātou ara huri noa i te tahua wawao, tae atu ki ngā pānuitanga o te Pentagon. "He nui ake te mōrearea o te haumarutanga me te oranga o Te Hononga o Amerika i tētahi wā i roto i ngā tekau tau," e kī ana te pūrongo. "Kua whakakinotia te rangatiratanga hōia o Amerika ki tētahi waeine mōrearea." Ko te taenga mai o Perehitini Trump ki te tari e hāngai ana ki tētahi neke tawhiti i roto i ngā manakē hōia a AMERIKA - i tawhiti atu i ngā mahi tauwhāinga me te whawhai ki te wehi, ki tētahi arotahi hōu ki te papā tūpono ki ngā tauwhāinga hoa pēnei i Rūhia, Haina rānei. Ahakoa ko ngā tauwhāinga kāore i te hoa pēnei i a Irana me Kōrea ki te Raki e whakaatu ana i ngā whakamātautau hou, mōrearea hoki. He tino nui nga take mo te hōia o Amerika. I ngā wāhi pēnei i Iraki me Awhekenetāna, hei tauira, kua mahi rātou i ngā taiao kāore he tuma ki ngā ope a AMERIKA mai i te hau, ā, kāore he uaua nui (i tua atu i te papawhenua) ki tō rātou kaha ki te whakawhitiwhiti, ki te whakamahi i te GPS me ērā atu mea. Ināianei, ko ngā hoariri tūpāpaku - pēnei i a Haina me Rūhia - e ako ana i te hōia o Amerika, ā, kei te haere tonu ki te whakahōu i ō rātou ake tōpana e hanga ana i runga i ō rātou kaha tūturu, i a rātou e hōpara ana hoki i ngā huarahi ātete i a Mātau i ngā wāhi i kaha ai i mua. He pono, ko te raweke a Mohihi i te pakanga i Ukraine i whakaatu i te mana whakangaro whakaharahara o ngā pū o Rūhia e honoa ana ki ngā āheinga whawhai hiko mātauranga, ki te kimi, ki te whakatika me te whakangaro i ngā patu o Ukraine, ki te hīpoki hoki i te tauwāhi o ngā ope Rūhia. I te nuinga o ēnei wāhi he nui te mahi a te US. Ko te tikanga o tēnā ko te whakangungu anō me te whakaraupapa anō, engari he whānui ake i tērā. E hiahiatia ana he kaha nui ki te whakapakari i ngā mahi hou me te whakamua i ngā hangarau matua - mōhiohio horihori, ngā whatunga aunui whakatupuranga panuku me ērā atu mea - tērā pea ka homai he huānga matua o te rangatiratanga i tētahi kauhanga riri ā muri ake. He pānui whakatūpato tēnei pūrongo. Mēnā he kōeke mō ngā mahere tīariari a te Pentagon, i taku pānuitanga o te tuhinga ka whiwhi i te B mārō. He maha ngā whakaaro pai me ētahi mōhiotanga o ngā uauatanga nui, engari he whakaaro pōraru me pēhea te whakatau i aua mea, ā, kāore i te nui ngā rauemi hei whakaoti i te mahi. Neke atu i te 30 ngā tūtohutanga taipitopito. Anei ētahi o ngā mea tino hira - kua whakarāpopototia, kua tīpakohia hoki hei whakamārama i te whānuitanga o te tuhinga: Ka tapahia e tēnei pūrongo te nuinga o te pōhēhētanga i whakakākahuria ai e Perehitini Trump tana rautaki wawao ā iwi. Engari ehara tēnei i te tuhinga tōkeke i te wā e tiritiri ana i te tirohanga rautaki taketake e hāngai ana i ngā whakaaro o Pentagon o nāianei. E whakamārama ana i te wāhi e hē ana, e mārama ana rānei ngā mahere whaimana. He karanga tēnei mo ētahi atu whakapau hōia, engari he karanga hoki mo te tahua whai mārama ake. Ā, ka tāraro i te tauine o te tūmahi. He tino nui tēnei. Ehara te hōia a te US i te tōpana hāngai. Engari he nui te utu o te hoki ki te umanga o te pakanga tiketike. Me ako anō ngā pūkenga tawhito. New challenges analysed and addressed. E whakaaro ana te pūrongo kōmihana e noho tonu ana a Mātau hei kaitapere hōia nui puta noa i te ao i Uropi; i Āhia-Kiwa, i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. Kei hea te tārewa ka taea te tapahi? Engari ko ētahi o ngā raruraru taketake e takoto ana i waho o te hōia i roto i te umanga, i te hurihanga whānui ake o te matauranga. I te wā o te Pakanga Makariri, ko te wā roa o te mana hōia o Te Hononga o Amerika i runga i tētahi pūtake pūtaiao, mahi mahi whakaharahara e kore e taea e te tangata te whakataetae. Ko ngā nekehanga mai i te rangahau i roto i te waka rererangi, i ētahi atu rānei o te hangarau ā-hōia i āta horapa ki te oranga tūmatanui. I tēnei rā, he tino rerekē ngā mea. He rangahau ā-iwi - i roto i te rorohiko, ngā mea hiko me ngā wāhi tino nui pēnei i te mōhiohio horihori - e whakahaere ana i te kauneketanga hangarau. A, ko te US - i a ia e kaitākaro kaha ana - ehara i te mea ko ia anake. Ko Haina e whakanoho ana i ngā rauemi nunui ki roto i ngā hangarau tērā pea ka hoatu ki a ia te tapa i runga i te kauhanga riri o te rau tau 21. Kua tāhaetia e te whakawāteatanga ngā rangatiratanga o Amerika me Hainamana i runga i ngā huarahi e whakararuraru ana i te haumarutanga o Amerika. Me whakapau pai ake hoki te moni. Me tere ake, kia tere ake hoki ngā hōtaka tiki rākau, ko te ara mai i te hua hangarau ki te whakarākeitanga kia tere ake, kia iti iho hoki te whakawāteatanga. Ka pau i a Mātau ōna tauwhāinga hōia nui katoa, engari kāore tonu i te whiwhi i te "pahū mō tōna moni". Kātahi anō ka puta te aronga whakawhanaunga. Kaore te US e whakangungu ki te whawhai ko ia anake; Ka pērā tonu ki ngā pirihitini. Kua arotahi a Perehitini Trump ki tētahi āhuatanga anake o tēnei pātahitanga: te tiritiri kawenga, te hiahia kia whiwhi i ngā whenua NATO kia nui ake te whakapau moni ki tā rātou wawao ā-rōpū. Engari kua whakawāteatia, kua whakararuraru hoki a Tēnā Puhi i ngā pirihitini i tana mahi i tēnei. Kua ngoikore te toa o Te Atarangi i te tōrangapū, ahakoa he nui ake ngā ope a AMERIKA kua horaina ki Uropi ki te whakapakari i ōna parenga ki tētahi Rūhia e whakaara ake ana. Ka ora pea te whanaungatanga toa ina pahemo te wā o te Puhi. I te taumata tōrangapū me whāngaia rātau, ā, i te taumata hōia ā-ringa, me mahi ngā hipanga kia kore ai e uaua ake te mahi a ngā ope haumi i te taha o ngā wae o Amerika. Tērā pea ko te wero nui rawa i puta mai i tēnei pūrongo ko tana karanga ki a Mātau kia mahi i tētahi huarahi "kāwanatanga katoa" ki te haumarutanga. E kī ana, he rautaki tā Rūhia rāua ko Haina e whakauru ana i ngā utauta katoa o te mana ā iwi. Me ōrite te huarahi a te US. He tino hira tēnei ina nui haere te tūāwhiotanga o ngā tuma. Kua kore tātau e noho i roto i tētahi ao e mārama ana te rerekētanga i waenganui i te rangimārie me te whawhai. Kī tonu te mokowā i waenganui i ēnei pūmau i ngā momo tuma me ngā whakararuraru: ngā mahi mōhiohio; te kōhuru tōrangapū; ngā whakaekenga ā-ipurangi; me ngā mahi hōia a ngā ope, ngā takawaenga rānei ka mārama noa iho tōna tuakiri tūturu i te wā (whakaarohia ngā hōia Rūhia e mahi ana hei "ngā tāngata kākāriki iti" i Crimea). E hiahiatia ana he rautaki hou, he whakaaro hou me ngā utauta hōu ki te tūtaki i tēnei tūāwhiotanga hōu, matatini hoki. Engari e hiahiatia ana hoki he whakaaro hou i roto i te kāwanatanga, ā, koia pea te mea uaua rawa atu ki te whakatutuki.

title: E hia te moni e pau ana i a koe i te pō?
summary: I tētahi pō nui i Rānana i pau ai a Sarah i te £250.
text: Nā Sam SheadBusiness kaipānui Heoi anō, ko te pō noa iho e tata ana ki te £60 ki te £100, e kī ana te kaitohutohu 30 tau. Ehara a Sarah anake i te mea e tārewa ana i te moni i ngā pō i ngā taone me ngā tāone puta noa i te UK. Ināianei ka pau i ngā kaihoko te toharite o te £69.64 i te pō, e huatau ana tētahi uiuinga. E ai ki tētahi uiuinga o ngā tāngata e 2,335 i whakahaeretia e te karapu pō me te kaiwhakahaere pae The Deltic Group. Ka whakaarohia ia wae o te pō, tae atu ki ngā inu i te kāinga, te waka ki te wāhi, te kai me ngā inu i a ia e haere ana, ngā utu tāurunga me te waka ki te kāinga. Ko te tikanga, ko te āhua o te pō tēnei, e nui haere ana te hiranga o te ohaoha i te UK. I te motu, ko te whakahaerenga o te pō te tuarima o ngā umanga nui rawa o te UK, me ngā moni ā-tau e £66bn, e ai ki te The Night Time Industries Association. He czar pō whakatapua tā Rānōna i Amy Lamé, ko ia te kawenga mō te taone i waenganui i te 18:00 me te 06:00. Ko ngā pō utu nui i te wawaenga, kei te whakapau moni te tangata i te £2.59 anō ina haere rātau i te pō i tēnei wā i tērā tau, e ai ki te uiuinga ia hauwhā. I kī a Deltic ka taea te take o te pikinga ki ngā tāngata e whakapau moni ana i ia āhuatanga o tō rātou pō, hāunga ngā inu i a rātou i waho, he rite tonu te utu ki tērā tau. I whakamāramatia e Sarah, e mahi ana hei kaiwhakahaere whakawhitiwhiti ā-ao mō tētahi umanga tohutohu hangarau, tērā pea ka haere a ia ki te hararei me te moni i pau i a ia i tōna pō tino utu nui. "Ka pouri, ki taku whakaaro he mirionea ahau i te pō," te kī a Sarah. "Mā te kore whakapā e mōrearea ai ngā mea. He ngāwari rawa te whakapau moni." He rerekē ngā utu mo te pō puta noa i te whenua, ā, ko Rātana te taone nui rawa atu i tētahi tawhiti. E kī ana a William, e noho ana i Rānana, e whakapau ana ia i te £60-£80 i te pō. Waihoki, e kī ana a Stewart Brown, he ākonga i Glasgow, he iti iho i te £30 te whakapau moni i te pō. Ko te taitamariki v pakeke Ko ngā tāngata 26-30 te pakeke te whakapau moni nui rawa atu i te whenua, me te toharite o te pō e utu ana i tēnei rōpū pakeke e £75.24. Ko Alan, he kaitohutohu whakahaere e 51 tau te pakeke. E kī ana a ia e whakapau ana ia i waenganui i te £150 me te £200 i te pō me tana wahine. E kī ana, ka taka te whika ki te £50-£80 ina haere tahi ia me ōna hoa. I pātai mai he aha te take i nui ake ai te utu o ngā pō me tana wahine, ka kī a Arana: "Ka haere mātou ki ngā wāhi utu nui ake, kei te utu ahau mō māua tokorua, ā, ka whakaurua he tīkiti mēnā kei te inu māua." I tāpiri mai a ia "ka whiwhi hoki rātau i tētahi waina tika, e tāpiri ana ki te pire". E ai ki ngā whika, 58.8% o ngā tāngata i te UK e haere ana i te pō kotahi i te wiki, mai i te 53.9% i tērā tau. Ka piki tēnei whika ki te 78.6% i waenganui i te 18 ki te 30 tau.
