I tētahi atu wāhi, i huatau te uiuinga kia neke atu i te hauwhā o te 18 ki te 21 tau te pakeke e rua ki te toru ngā wā i te wiki, i whakaritea ki te 15% o ngā kiritaki katoa. Mā te patu i te whare pikitia me ngā karapu pō, te āhua nei ko te pāparapara te wāhi e whakapau ai te tangata i te nuinga o a rātau moni i ngā pō, me te 25.6% o ngā tāngata e kī ana he nui ake ngā moni e pau ana i ngā pāparapara i ia marama i ētahi atu momo whakangahau pō. I te wā o te tau, e hiahia ana hoki te tangata ki te whakapau i ētahi atu mea i tō rātou pō, e ai ki te uiuinga. E ai ki te uiuinga, 48% o ngā kaiwhakautu i kī he nui ake te whakapau i ngā pō i te wā whakangahau i te nuinga o te wā. I kī a Pita Marks, te rangatira nui o Deltic: "E mōhio ana mātou e whakanui ana ngā kaihoko i ngā wā mā te haere i te pō, ā, he aha ngā wā nui ake i te Kirihimete me te Tau Hōu? " Kei te kite mātou i tēnei ia e kitea ana i roto i ngā whika o tēnei hauwhā. Neke atu i te 50% o ngā Brits e whakapono ana ko te pō nui he huarahi pai ki te whakanui i te mutunga o te tau, ā, e whakaatu ana ngā whika, ka tino hākari tātau. "More than 40% of us will enjoy more frequent nights out to catch up with friends and almost half of us will spend more while we're out."

title: Ahitereiria echidnas: E whakanui ana te kararehe o Poihākena i ngā whānautanga puggle tuatahi i roto i ngā tekau tau
summary: E whakanui ana te Kararehe Taronga o Poihākena i ōna pēpi tuatahi i roto i te tata ki te 30 tau.
text: I paopao nga pēpi tokotoru i a rātau hēki i a Aotearoa, engari i hiahia nga kaitiaki kia kite i a rātau e tipu ana i mua i te haerenga ki te iwi whānui. "He uaua rawa te whakaputa uri i roto i te tiaki tangata, engari e pai ana nga kaitiaki ki te haere whakamua o te tokotoru iti," te kī a te kararehe. Kua whakatuwheratia e ngā puggles o rātau whatu, ā, kei te whakawhanake i ngā tuarā āhuatanga o tō rātou momo. Kāore anō rātau kia whakaingoatia e nga kaitiaki, engari kāore e tūmanakohia kia wehe atu i o rātau rua tae noa ki te tōmua o tērā tau. Tae noa ki taua wā ka moe te nuinga o rātau. Kua hangaia e te kararehe he rua kōhungahunga motuhake hei whakanoho i ngā taenga mai hei wāhanga o tōna whare tāuri echidna hou. Ko te puggle iti rawa i tēnei wā e tata ana ki te 250g (9oz). Ko Echidnas tētahi o ngā whāngote Ahitereiria e rua anake e whakatakoto hēki ana (ko tētahi ko te platipus pire pārera). I muri i te 10 rā, ka paopao nga pēpi echidnas, ā, ka kawea e o rātau whaea i roto i te kōpaki kiri pēnei i te rua marama. Me pēhea te moe o ngā echidnas i roto i te ahi ngahere I muri iho ka purua rātou ki roto i ō rātou ruarua, me te whaea e hoki ana ki te whāngai i a rātou i ia rā. He rerekē nga whaea o nga puggles e toru. I whānau mai te puggle pōtiki ki te whaea o Pitpa, ko ia te echidna whakamutunga i whānau mai i Taronga i te tau 1987. "All three mothers are doing an amazing job and serving to their puggles as needed," said zoo keeper Suzie Lemon. "He nui tonu te mea ngaro e karapoti ana i tēnei momo taratara. He tino māhorahora ngā echidnas i te mohoao, nā reira he uaua ki te ako i ō rātou whanonga tāuri māori."

title: E whītiki ana ngā pāhihi o Ryanair mō ngā ture pēke hōu
summary: Brace, brace. Ko ngā huringa hou ki ngā kaupapahere kawenga a Ryanair ka mana i tēnei rā, ko te tikanga ko ngā pāhihi e hiahia ana ki te mau i tētahi mea nui ake i te pēke iti i runga i te papa, me utu te mana.
text: Nā Pirihi JohnstonPakihipānui, Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero anake ka taea e te hunga e utu ana i te £6/€6 mō te haere manakē te mau i tētahi pāhi iti tae atu ki te 10kg i roto i te rūma. He māmā ake taua kōwhiringa i te utu £8/€8 hei taki i roto i tētahi pēke 10kg. E kī ana a Ryanair ko ngā huringa - ko te tuarua o tēnei tau - he whakaiti i ngā takaware rererangi. Ko te raruraru e anga ana ki te kaikawe o Airana - tae atu ki ētahi atu waka rererangi - ko te kore mokowā kākahu o runga i te Boeing 737 me te rererangi Airbus A320 e whakamahia ana mō ngā ara tawhiti poto. E kī ana a Gerald Khoo, he kaitātari i Liberum, he wāhi tā ngā rererangi o Ryanair mō ngā pāhi "wīra" e 90, he iti iho i ngā pāhihi e 189 ka taea e ia. I te mea he 95% te kī o ngā rerenga a te waka rererangi, kāore i te nui te mokowā mō ngā kawenga a te katoa. "Kei te pai te whakarato i te kaha iti me te kī mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki taua mokowā i roto i te rūma, me utu e koe," te kī a Tēnā Khoo. Mai i Hānuere, kua whakaaetia ngā pāhihi o Ryanair ki te mau i tētahi pēke iti ki runga i te papa me tētahi pēke wīra mō te kore utu. Heoi anō, i te nuinga o te wā e hiahiatia ana kia tae atu ki te 120 ngā pāhi nui ake kia tohua ki te kēti me te puru ki roto i te pupuri, e whakaroa ana i ngā wehenga (ia meneti e tatau ana, i tukuna te ūnga hurihanga 25 meneti a te waka rererangi). Ka utu tonu ngā kawenga taki nui ake i te £25 mō ia pēke. Ko te pēke iti ka taea e ngā pāhihi manakē kore te mau ki runga i te papa, ināianei he 40% te nui ake i te 40x20x25cm. Me uru ki raro i te tūru i mua i a koe - ehara i te mea tino pai mēnā e uara ana koe i tō rūma waewae. He iti ake te ohaoha o Easyjet, nā te mea ka taea e ngā pāhihi katoa te mau i tētahi pēke nui ake - tae atu ki te 56x45x25cm - i roto i te rūma, me te whakatūpato me taki kore utu pea ētahi i roto i te pupuri. E ai ki te wā e tāpui ai koe i tō rerenga, ko te utu i te utu teitei ake pea te kōwhiringa anake. Nā te mea he iti noa iho te haere manakē ki te 95 ngā kiritaki mō ia rerenga - tata ki te haurua o te maha o ngā tūru. E wehi ana a Sophie Griffiths, te kaiwhakatika o Travel Trade Gazette, ka ako noa iho ētahi pāhihi i ngā ture hou ina tae rātau ki te kēti. "Kāore au i te tino mōhio ka mōhio te katoa ki ngā huringa - tērā pea ka puta te mōrearea nui," tana kī. "Kotahi anō te mea mō ngā pāhihi kia huri haere o rātau mahunga." Ko ngā kaihaere e ngana ana ki te eke me te kēhi wīra engari kāore anō kia utua, me tuku atu te £25/€25 kia puritia. I kī a Ms Griffiths ko tētahi toa mai i te nekehanga ko British Airways, ko ōna utu paerewa he pēke takiuru. Ko te wā tuarua tēnei i hurihia ai e Ryanair ana ture kawenga i tēnei tau. Ehara pea te arotakenga i te whakamutunga, e kī ana a Tēnā Khoo. He pēhea te whakataurite a ngā waka rererangi i runga i ngā kawenga ringa rūma: Kotahi te pēke rūma o British Airways tae atu ki te 56x45x25cm me te 23kg me te pēke ā-ringa/rorohiko pona kotahi (mōrahi. 23kg tae atu ki te 40x30x15cm) mō ngā utu paerewa. Ka whakapūmautia te pēke iti ake kia haere ki roto i te rūma, engari i ngā rerenga arokē, ka taea te puru i te pēke nui ake ki roto i te puritanga mō te kore utu. easyJet One cabin bag up to 56x45x25cm with no weight limit, but you must be able to lift it into the overhead locker. E kī ana a EasyJet e 70 anake ngā pēke rūma ka taea te whakauru ki roto i ngā pātaka o runga, nā reira ka purua ērā atu ki roto i te pupuri. Ko ngā pēke nui ake i te rahi kua whakapūtātia ka takina ki roto i te puritia mō tētahi utu. Ngā pāhihi manakē kore: Kotahi pēke iti pēnei i te pēke ā-ringa, te pēke rorohiko pona, te pēke iti rānei tae atu ki te 40x20x25cm me uru ki raro i te tūru i mua i a koe. Ngā pāhihi manakē: Kotahi te pēke iti tae atu ki te 40x20x25cm me te pēke kotahi o te 55x40x20cm, tae atu ki te 10kg Wizz Air Ka taea e ngā pāhihi katoa te mau i tētahi pēke kawe-ake tae atu ki te 40x30x20cm ki runga i te papa kia whakatakotoria ki raro i te tūru i mua. Ka taea hoki e te hunga e utu ana i te haere manakē te kawe mai i tētahi pēke wīra tāpiri tae atu ki te 55x40x23cm i roto i te rūma.

title: Ko te whakamātautau rerenga o Ithaca Energy e hiki ana i ngā tūmanako āpure o te Moana ki te Raki
summary: Ko ngā tūmanako a te kaihōpara hinu me te korohū o Ithaca Energy ki te waihanga i tētahi pokapū whakanao hōu nui i te Moana ki te Raki kua whakaarahia e tētahi whakamātautau rerenga "tino angitu" i runga i tōna poka whanaketanga tuatahi i te papa tākaro o Stella.
text: I kī te kamupene i rere te poka A1 i te mokatere mōrahi o te 10,835 ngā oko i ia rā. I whakaūngia hoki e ngā tauira wai he "tino kounga" ngā hydrocarbons. Ināianei ka wiri te wae Ensco 100 o Ithaca i tētahi poka whanaketanga tuarua o Stella mai i te tauwāhi pokapū keri kotahi. Ko te mokatere mōrahi o te 10,835 paero hinu e ōrite ana ki ia rā, e tata ana ki te 6,500 ngā paero hinu me te 26 miriona waewae pūtoru paerewa o te korohū "wai taunaki". 'Tino angitu' te kaiwhakahaere matua o Ithaca, a Iain McKendrick: "Ko tēnei poka me te whakamātautau tino angitu he hua tino pai mō te kamupene. " He pekenga tino nui tēnei ki mua i te whakararuraru i te whanaketanga o te Rohe Nui Ake o Stella me te hanganga o tētahi pokapū whakanao hou nui i te Moana ki te Raki o UK. "Kua uru te poka ki ngā rāhui i hoahoatia hei whakaora, ā, ka whakaū te whakamātautau i te aroaro me te tino kounga tiketike me te tukunga o ngā kirikiri puna." Ko A1 te tuatahi o ngā poka whanaketanga e whā ka wiria ki te papa o Stella i mua i te tīmatanga o te whakanaotanga. Ithaca Energy operates and owns a majority stake in the field. Neke atu i te 18% ngā hea i Ithaca i te ata o te Wenerei i muri i ngā rongo o ngā hua whakamātautau rerenga tuatahi.

title: Tākuta Ko Wai: E kī ana a Billie Piper kua tae ki te wā ki te maka i tētahi wahine
summary: Kua kī te kaiwhakaari o Mua o Doctor Who, o Billie Piper, kua tae ki te wā mo te wahine ki te mahi i te tūranga o te Ariki Wā rongonui.
text: Nā Tim MastersEntertainment, kua pānuitia e Pita Capaldi kei te heke iho a ia i te tūranga ārahi i roto i te rangatū pūtaiao o TE AO i te mutunga o te tau. I kī a Piper, nāna i tākaro i te hoa o Rose Tyler, ka "pēnei i te snub" ki te kore te tūranga e haere ki te wahine. "I ngā wā katoa e tautoko ana ahau i te hōputu taketake, engari kāore au i te mōhio ki hea haere ai rātou mai i konei," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "Ki taku whakaaro he tino pai [te whai Tākuta wahine] i hoatu ki te wairua o te ao i tēnei wā. Ki taku whakaaro he wā tika". Engari i kī a ia he nui rawa te kawenga ki te mahi i a ia anō. "Kāore au i te mōhio," tana kī. "He nui te mahi. He nui te wā i Kārepa." I te kōrero a Piper i ngā Tohu Whare Tapere Porowhita o ngā Kaiwhakawāwā i Rānōna, i reira i riro ai i a ia te whakawhiwhinga mō te kaiwhakaari tino pai mō tana mahi i roto i te tākaro Yerma i Young Vic o Rāwāhi. Ka hoki mai a Capaldi, e purei ana i te Tākuta 12, mō tētahi rangatū hou o te whakaaturanga i Aperira, me tana wāhanga whakamutunga e whakaaturia ana i te Kirihimete. Ko tana rangatū whakamutunga hoki e tohu ana i te wehenga atu o te kaituhi matua me te kaiwhakanao nui o Steven Moffat. Kua huatau a Moffat i mua he wahine pea te whakatupuranga hou o te Tākuta, e kī ana: "E whakaaro ana ahau tērā pea he Tākuta wahine. Kāore au i te kite he aha i kore ai." I roto i ngā rangatū o nā noa nei, i tākaro a Mīharo Gomez i a Missy, te whakatinanatanga wahine tuatahi o te hoariri o te Tākuta Te Matua. Ko ngā makau o ngā pukapuka mō te kaitapere panuku hei tango i te tūranga o te Ariki Wā, ko te whetū o Hemi Bond, ko Ben Whishaw me te kaitapere IT Crowd o mua, ko Rākei Mariade. He kōwhiringa pai hoki a Olivia Colman, e mahi tahi ana me te rangatira hou o Doctor Who, a Chris Chibnall i tana whakaaturanga Broadchurch. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Neke atu i te 1,000 ngā whakahē e whiwhi ana i ngā kāinga o te Karapu Korowha Pānui
summary: Neke atu i te mano ngā tāngata kua tuhituhi ki te kaunihera ki te whakahē i ngā mahere hei hanga i ngā kāinga e 260 i runga i tētahi papa korowha.
text: Kua tono te Karapu Pānui Korowha (RGC) mō te whakaaetanga whakatakoto whakahuahua hei hanga i ngā kāinga i tētahi wāhanga o tōna akoranga i te takiwā o Emmer Green. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahē kāore i te rawaka ngā kura, ā, ka kino kē atu ngā waka. I kī a RGC ka kawea mai e te whanaketanga he whare utu ōrau ki taua rohe. Ko te whanaketanga, i tukuna e te kaipupuri whenua o Reading Golf Club me te kaiwhakahaere Fairfax Acquisitions, ko ngā whare noho me ngā kāinga whānau, he pāka whenua, he pokapū hauora me ngā wāhi tūnga motokā me ngā karāti e 601. I kī atu te mema o Keep Emmer Green a Ian Morgan ki te BBC kāore te iwi i hiahia ki tētahi atu pānga whare. Ka kī a ia: "Neke atu i te 1,100 ngā whakahē, ko tā mātou e whakapono ana ko te tino whakahē ki te taupānga i Reading Borough, kua huihui mai te iwi paetata ki te whakahē i te whanaketanga o ngā āhuatanga e 260 i runga i te whenua kākāriki i Emmer Green. "He rerekē ngā take i whakahuatia e ngā kainoho, mai i te whakangaromanga o te mokowā kākāriki me ngā kararehe, te pānga ki te paheketanga o ngā waka me te pokenga, tae atu ki te tauira e tautuhia ana mō te whanaketanga anō i runga i te Taitapa o Oxfordshire ki te Tonga." I tāpiritia e ia me tuku e RGC te whenua ki te iwi i te utu tika hei wāhi tuwhera. Kua kōrerotia e ētahi whakahē te hiahia mo tētahi piriti tuatoru i runga i te Awa o Thames i te tuatahi. I kitea e tētahi uiuinga a Reading East MP Matt Rodda, i oti e 1,700 ngā tangata, e whā i roto i te rima i "tino māharahara" mō ngā kaupapa. Kai te whakahē te MP i te taupānga. I te Rāitema e 110 ngā tākupu e manakohia ana, e ai ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata (LDRS). General manager of RGC Gary Stangoe said the sale of the land would bring clear benefits with "much sought after family and affordable housing with gardens" and soon to be announced leisure facilities. I tāpiritia e ia he pokapū hauora hou e kore e taea me te kore hua mai i te whanaketanga, ā, ka homai e te mokowā kākāriki hōu he '"tawhito" mō te hapori. Ka kati te whakaaro i te 25 o Mahuru.

title: Ka waihangatia e te kohanga me te wehenga māuiui te iti o te kaiwhakawhanau o Jersey
summary: He iti noa iho ngā kaiwhakawhanau i Jersey nā te mea he tokomaha kei te wehenga kohanga, e ai ki te upoko o te whakawhanau i te Hōhipera Whānui o Jersey.
text: Elaine Torrence said many staff were off work having babies themselves so space for antenatal classes was down. I te tau 2010 ka kite a Jersey i tētahi pēpi pēpi me te 1,000 whānautanga, ā, he ōrite ngā whika i tēnei tau, ka tāpiritia e Ms Torrence. I kī a ia i tūmanako ia i āwhina ngā akomanga tāpiri i te mutunga wiki i te hunga e hiahia ana ki te haere ki ngā wātū. "We've had a large number of our midwives on maternity leave and a little spate of long term sickness lamenttably," Ms Torrence said. "A, no te piki ake te ngohe i roto i te wae, ko taku tikanga i runga i te huinga tuku, mēnā he akomanga i whakaritea i taua ahiahi me whakakore e mātou tēnā me te manakē i te wāhi e tino hiahiatia ana te kaiwhakawhanau." She added: "We had a little flurry of having to cancel our classes but I think we've accommodated most of those women by two extra weekend sessions that we've put on."

title: E whawhai ana ngā whānau o Te Hōia Māmā o Durham ki te whakatuwhera tonu i te whare taonga
summary: Kua pūruatia e ngā whānau o ngā hōia hōia o Te Hōia Māmā tētahi whakahau ki te katinga o te whare taonga o te ope matua.
text: I pānuitia e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Durham i tērā marama me kati te whare taonga o Te Hōia Māmā (DLI) nā te mea he nui rawa te utu ki te whakahaere. Kua werohia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau te katinga, ā, kua whiwhi tō rātou rōpū Facebook i ngā kaitautoko neke atu i te 12,000. I kī te kaunihera he kaupapa hei whakaneke i ngā kohinga ki tētahi pae i Spennymoor ka penapena i te £221,000 i te tau. Ko te pāpā o Christine English, he kaitiaki whare taonga, me tōna tipuna tāne i whakawhiwhia ki ngā mētara i a ia e mahi ana i te DLI, ā, kei te whakaaturia i te whare taonga. 'He mea hira, he hītori' Ko tōna pāpā, ko Meiha Īna Ingarihi mai i Heworth, tētahi o ngā āpiha e 24 anake i toa i te Rīpeka Hōia e toru ngā wā i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I mahi a ia i Wīwī me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, ā, i whai wāhi ia ki ngā taunga o te D-Day i te tau 1944. I kī a Ms English, e noho ana ināianei i Rānana, kāore a ia i te mōhio he aha ka pā ki ngā mētara ina katia te whare taonga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E whakamīharo ana ahau i te katinga o tēnei wāhi ātaahua, hira, hītori hoki. " I whakapono mātou kei te mahi mātou i te mea tino pai mō ngā pūmahara o tō mātou pāpā me tō mātou tupuna. He wāhi tino nui ki tōku pāpā." I kī te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Durham e £397,000 te utu o te whare taonga hei pupuri i tērā tau, e ōrite ana ki te £10 mō ia manuhiri. Ko te utu toharite ki te kaunihera mō ērā atu whare taonga e whā ko te £1.60. I kī te kaunihera kua whakahaua kētia ki te heu i te £150m mai i tana tahua, ā, ka anga atu ki ētahi atu tapahi o te £100m i ngā tau tata nei. I whakatuwheratia te whare taonga i te tau 1968, ā, he whakaaturanga pēnei i ngā kākahu me ngā patu ahi mai i te tau 1758 ki te 2011. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Palace Green Library - Te Whare Wānanga o Durham DLI Durham

title: E whakapeka ana ngā pūtea i te Whakahaeretanga Rawa o Aberdeen
summary: I hinga ngā moni i raro i te whakahaeretanga i te 1% i te umanga pūtea penapena o Aberdeen Asset Management i mua i "ngā here mākete o te ao whānui".
text: I tangohia e ngā kiritaki te £3.4bn i roto i ngā moni a te kamupene i roto i ngā marama e toru ki te mutunga o Pipiri, me te katoa o ngā moni i raro i te whakahaeretanga i te £209.6bn. I whakaahuatia e te rōpū ā-Aberdeen ngā here mākete he "uaua". Heoi anō, i kī tōna whakaaro pūtea penapena mo te wā roa me te tukanga whakatinanatanga kua pai te mahi ki ngā kaiwhakangao. I kī a Martin Gilbert, te rangatira nui o Aberdeen: "Kua tukua e mātou ngā whika manahau i te koata tuatoru i tukuna ai ngā āhuatanga o te mākete o te ao. " Ko te tikanga o tā mātou huarahi pūtea penapena tauwhāiti, he whānui tonu a mātau hua i āwhina mai i ngā kaiwhakangao, ahakoa ki te mutunga o te wā ka nui ake ngā putanga mai nā te nui ake o te hūkere o te mākete." 'Ia hōu' I roto i taua wā, e rua ngā whiwhinga i mahia e Aberdeen. I hokona e ia te umanga whakahaere rawa o New York, o Artio Global Investors mō neke atu i te £100m me tētahi tūnga i SVG Advisers (SVGA) mō te £17.5m. I taua wā, ka kī a Tēnā Gilbert he wāhanga o te rautaki whakawhānui mā ngā whiwhinga bolt-on, ehara i te tīmatanga o tētahi hoko whakatuki. Ahakoa he tohunga te kamupene i ngā mākete puta noa, ka kī a Tēnā Kiriata he pai ki a ia "ngā kamupene o Amerika, Ūropi me Amerika i tēnei wā". I roto i tēnei ko ngā kamupene UK. I kī atu a ia ki te AO kātahi anō ka kite tana kamupene i tētahi "ia hou o ngā kiritaki kāore i te haumi i te taupū UK engari i te taupū o te ao, ā, he maha ngā kamupene UK he kamupene huri noa, koia te take i tino pai ai tā rātou mahi i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa".

title: Princes Gate sale: Nestle buys Pembrokeshire bottled water firm
summary: Kua hokona tētahi kamupene wai pounamu o Pembrokeshire e te matua kai o Nestle.
text: Kua riro i a Nestle Waters tētahi tūnga nui i Princes Gate, koia te kaiwhakanao wai pounamu tuawaru nui rawa o UK, e 49 ngā tāngata. I whakatūria te kamupene e ngā tuakana a David rāua ko Glyn Jones i runga i to rāua pāmu whānau tata ki Narberth 27 tau ki muri. I kī a Nestle ka mahi te kamupene hei hinonga motuhake, ā, kāore he mahi e pāngia. I tāpiritia ka whakahaeretia e tōna tīma whakahaere o nāianei i tōna tauwāhi o nāianei. Ka pupuri a David Jones i tētahi tūnga iti i roto i te kamupene. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī nga tuakana o Jones e tūmanako ana rātau ka "whakanuia" te umanga i te hoko. I kī a Nestle Waters, e noho tata ana ki Buxton, Derbyshire, kua hokona e ia te kamupene Pembrokeshire i waenganui i te nui o te hiahia wai pounamu, ā, mā te whiwhinga e āhei ai ia ki te "urupare tika ki ngā tono kiritaki".

title: I whakakāhoretia te mahere whakawera i Javelin Park
summary: Kua whakakāhoretia tētahi tono whakarite mō tētahi kaitahu para e £500m i Gloucestershire.
text: I muri i tētahi hui whakarite 11 haora, 18 ngā kaikaunihera i pōti ngātahi ki te maka i ngā mahere mō te tipu pūngao mai i te parakore. Kua hainatia kētia e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Gloucestershire tētahi kirimana hei hanga i te whare i Javelin Park, Haresfield. I rongo te hui kua whiwhi te mana i ētahi reta whakahē e 4,000, a, e rua anake hei tautoko. 'Matekiri' a Javier Peiro, he kaiwhakahaere o Urbaser Balfour Beatty (UBB) - i kirimana te kamupene ki te hanga i te tipu - i kī te whakataunga he "tino whakakino i runga i ngā taumata maha". "E tino whakapono ana mātou he hiahia. E whakapono ana mātou ko tēnei te rongoā tika, te rahi tika, te tauwāhi tika, me te tautokona e te maha o ngā kaupapahere, ko te tikanga o te rautaki uho moumou," tana kī. Councillor Stan Waddington, council champion for the waste project, said: "I am disappointed with today's decision. The county council is committed to delivering an alternative to landfill and we understand that UBB is reviewing the best way forward." E tata ana te pae marohi o te tipu ki te komititanga 12 o te M5. E pouri ana te hunga whakahē i tōna rahi, tauwāhi, utu, pānga taiao me ngā pānga hauora. Pānga I muri i ngā haora maha o ngā pātai me te kōrero, ka tonoa e te kaikaunihera o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa (Liberal Democrats) tētahi mōtini kia whakakāhore i te tono i tuaruatia e te kaikaunihera o Sarah Lunnon (Rōpū Kākāriki). I muri i te rua haora anō o te mahi ture, ka pōtitia, ā, e 18 ngā kaikaunihera i reira i pōti ki te manakohanga o te ākiritanga. E rima ngā take i hoatu mō te ākiritanga, e tino arotahi ana ki te pānga arokite o te hanganga ki te whenua o Severn Vale e karapoti ana. I mua rā kua tūtohutia ngā mema o te komiti whakarite a te mana kia whakaaetia te kaupapa. E tautohe ana te hunga e manakohia ana e te whanaketanga e hiahiatia ana kia mahi i ngā mano tāhei para kāinga i hangaia i te takiwā i ia tau. I kōwhiria a UBB e te kaunihera o te rohe ki te hanga i te pūkenga, ā, i hainatia he kirimana 25 tau i tērā o Mahuru.

title: He nui ake te tipu o te whakahaerenga o Haina i te hauwhā tuarua
summary: He iti ake te tipu o te whakahaerenga o Haina i te hauwhā tuarua o te tau i te whakanuitanga o te whakapau hanganga a te kāwanatanga.
text: Ko te hua nui o te kāinga i whakawhānuitia e te 6.7% i roto i ngā marama e toru ki Pipiri i whakaritea ki te tau i mua, ka kī te tari tatauranga o Haina. I mau tonu te mokatere mai i te hauwhā tōmua, i runga ake i ngā tūmanako o te 6.6%. I kī ngā kaiwawao e whakaatu ana te raraunga i te whakahaerenga tuarua nui rawa o te ao. Ko ngā whika o tēnei rā e tohu ana kei te mau tonu te whakahaerenga o Haina mā te tautoko kaupapahere, te kī a Daniel Martin mai i Capital Economics. "Ahakoa kei te pōturi ake te whakawhānui a Haina i te mokatere pōturi ake i tana huatau raraunga GDP, te āhua nei kua mau tonu te tipu o te pūtea penapena o te wāhanga o te āhua i tērā koata." "Tērā pea ka piki ake te tupu i ngā marama e heke mai nei i te pōturi anō, engari kāore he whakarerekētanga mau tonu i runga i ngā kāri." Ko ētahi atu raraunga ā-marama i whakaputaina i tēnei rā, tae atu ki te huaputa mahi me ngā hokohoko hokohoko, ka patua hoki ngā matapae. I tipu ake te huaputa mahi i te 6.2% i whakaritea ki ngā matapae mō te 5.9% i waenganui i ngā māharahara mō te nui o te kaha. I piki ake ngā hokohoko hokohoko i te 10.6% e patu ana i ngā matapae mō te 10% te tipu. Heoi anō, i hapa te pūtea penapena rawa pūmau i ngā tūmanako, e tipu ana i te 9.0% mai i Hānuere ki Pipiri i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i te tau i mua. Ko ngā whakaaro o te kaitohutohu mo te tipu o te 9.4%.

title: Marcus Rashford: Ko te whetū o Man Utd he 'toa' i Wythenshawe
summary: Kua karangatia te kaiwhutupōro a Marcus Rashford he "toa tūturu" e ngā tāngata i te takiwā o Manatū i tipu ake ai ia.
text: Nā Stewart WhittinghamBBC News Te whakamua o Te Hononga o Manatū me Ingarangi, e 22, i whakapati i te kāwanatanga kia whakaroa atu te kaupapa tīkiti kai kura koreutu i Ingarangi puta noa i te raumati i muri i tana tuhi i tētahi reta tūwhera ki ngā MP. I mua rā ka tohe te kāwanatanga e kore e whakawhiwhia he voucher i waho o te wā wā. I roto i tana whakahau #maketheUturn, ka mahara a Rashford ki te whakawhirinaki ki ngā kai kura koreutu me ngā pēke kai i a ia e tamariki ana i Wythenshawe. He aha hoki te mahi a te tangata i reira i tōna angitu? 'Tauira tino pai' Ko te tamāhine a Christian Latimer, e ono tau, kua whai hua a Mia i ngā kai kura koreutu i te wā o te katinga. I whakamihi te kaimahi toa 27 tau ki a Rashford mo tana whakahau "whakamīharo". Ka kī a ia: "I whakaaturia e ia te whawhai nui, ā, he nui rawa tana mahi ki te āwhina i ngā whānau e uaua ana ki te whāngai i a rātau tamariki. " I whiwhi a Mia i a rātou [kai koreutu] i te kura, ā, he tautoko nui, he āwhina hoki mō ngā whānau. "Kua tū ake a Marcus mō te hunga e hiahia ana,. " I a au e pīrangi ana ki a United, i whakaaro ahau he tino pai a ia i mua, engari ināianei kua whakaaturia e ia ki te whenua katoa he aha tōna momo tangata i waho o te papa. "E mōhio ana ahau ka haere ia ki tana kura tawhito me te hoatu koha ki nga tamariki. " He tauira tino pai a ia." 'Mihi ki te rohe' E mahara ana ngā hoa noho tata o Rashford ki a ia e tākaro whutupōro ana i a ia e tamariki ana i mua i tōna whare i te takiwā o Moor ki te Raki. "I tākaro a ia i mua i ngā wā katoa me tōna tuakana," te kī a Anson James, 45. "I ngā wā katoa he pōro tāna ki a ia. " Kāore i te nui te moni a ngā tāngata e noho ana i konei nā reira ka raruraru tōna whānau. "He tino mihi a ia ki te rohe me ngā mea katoa i mahia e ia." I kī a Maika Kura, e 51, i hoatu hoki ki a Rashford he mīhini pīkaokao koreutu mai i tana kaihoko Karipiana makau J S Rhythm. "He tino atawhai a ia ka hoatu e te iwi nāna i whakahaere he kai koreutu ki a ia i tēnei wā, i te mea kāore i a ia te moni hei hoko," te kī a Tēnā Kirihi. "He tamaiti pakaru a ia." 'Mihi ki te whenua' HR kaimahi o Kate Jenner, 31, e noho ana i te whare tawhito o Rashford e rēti ana ia i tōna whānau. I noho te kaiwhutupōro i te kāinga motuhake mai i te tau 2006. Ka kī a ia: "Kua hoki mai a Marcus ki te rohe me te whare i ētahi wā. He mea whakamīharo tana mahi ki te tū ake mo te hunga rawakore me te mau i te kāwanatanga. "He mihi a ia ki te whenua." 'Wāhi mōrearea' Kua huri te Pokapū Hapori o Bideford i Wythenshawe hei pokapū kai i te wā o te raka, ā, i kī ngā tūao "peke ki runga, ki raro" i to rātau rongonga i te kaupapa kai koreutu e whakaroa ana puta noa i ngā hararei. "Kei runga mātou i te marama, ā, kei te tino whakahīhī mātou ki a Marcus," te kī a Kirsty Taylor mai i te pokapū. "Ka pēnei te rerekētanga o tēnei nā te mea kei te wāhi mōrearea tonu tātau. " He nui te rawakore i tēnei rohe, ā, kua tino māharahara mātou - he ngākau pouri te kite i ngā tamariki e hiakai ana." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua mahia e mātou ngā kai 1,000-1,200 i te wiki mai i te katinga." 'E whawhai ana mō ngā whānau rawakore' I kī a Kerry James, e 31, nāna i whakamahi i ngā pēke kai paetata hei āwhina ki te whāngai i ana tamāhine tokorua, e ono me te iwa te pakeke: "Tērā pea he uaua ki te hoatu kai me ngā kākahu ki a rātou. " Kua hiakai ahau kia taea ai e rātau te kai, ā, he pouri i ētahi wā ina kore e taea e au te tiki i ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e rātou." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He toa a Marcus e whawhai ana ia mo ngā whānau rawakore, ā, ka huri te kāwanatanga i [tōna] hinengaro." I kī te kaiako matua o Rashford, a Emma Roberts i te Kura Tuatahi o Button Lane, he "tino toa ki a mātau tamariki" te kaiwhutupōro, ā, he "tino whakahīhī" ngā kaimahi. E rua ngā wā o te kura i te tau toharite ā-motu o ngā tauira e āhei ana ki ngā kai kura koreutu. I kī a ia i tūtaki ētahi whānau ki ētahi atu raruraru pūtea me te kore mahi, te whakahekenga rānei o ngā haora mahi nā te taiepa Covid-19. I whakamihi hoki te karapu whutupōro tawhito o Rashford, o Fletcher Moss FC ki to rātau kaitākaro o mua. Ka tūtohu i ana mahi e whakaatu ana "me pēhea e taea ai e ngā kaiwhutupōro te āwhina i ō rātou ake me ētahi atu hapori" me te tāpiri he "tino whakahīhī ki a ia". I tūtohu a Maika Kane, MP mō Wythenshawe me Sale, kua "tino rerekē te oranga o ngā tamariki". I kī a ia he "tino whakahīhī a Wythenshawe ki a koe", kātahi anō ka "tino whakahīhī a ia".

title: Ka whakarite a Samsung ki te whakarewa anō i ngā pūrere Note 7 kua whakahōutia
summary: E tūmanako ana a Samsung ki te whakahōu anō i ngā pūrere Galaxy Note 7 e 2,5 miriona i auporotia i muri i te hapa pūhiko i ahu mai ki ētahi ahi hopu.
text: Mēnā i whakaae ngā mana ā rohe me ngā kaikawe, ā, he tono, tērā pea ka hokona anō ngā waea, ka kī a Samsung. I whakakitea hoki e rua atu tono mō te tukurua i ngā pūrere, tae atu ki te wehe i ngā wae me te tiki i ngā konganuku utu nui o te pūmārō. I anga atu a Samsung ki te pēhanga a te kaiwhakangahau taiao o Greenpeace. Kua pokaia e te rōpū te matua hangarau i runga i ana mahere mō ngā pūrere, i te whakarewa i tētahi petihana me te whakatū i ngā whakahēnga huri noa tae atu ki te takahanga o te Rōpū Nui o te Ao Pūkoro. "Ahakoa e pōhiri ana mātou i tēnei rongo, me tiritiri a Samsung i ngā rārangi wā taipitopito ake mō te wā ka whakatinanatia ana kupu taurangi, me pēhea hoki te huri i tana pūnaha whakanao kia kore ai tēnei e puta anō," te kī a Hura Lee. I kī a Samsung me tūhono ki "ngā mana mana me ngā kaikawe" me te ine i te tono paetata i mua i te whakatau i te wāhi, āhea hoki ka tukua ngā ringa waea kua whakahōutia. Kua tautuhia te kamupene ki te whakarewa i tētahi pūrere hōu i te Wenerei 29 o Poutāpeta.

title: Te rangatira o te ope taua o Pūkeirangi: 'E whakahaere ana a Pakitāne i te Huinga'
summary: Ka taea te whakatū i te whawhai i Awhekenetāna "i roto i ngā wiki" mēnā ka kī atu a Pakitāne ki te Huinga kia whakamutua te tauwhāinga, kua kī atu te upoko o te ope taua o Pūkeirangi ki te HAU.
text: I kī a Ken Sher Hairamina Karimi i whakahaeretia e Pakitāne me te whakaruru ki ngā kaiārahi o Te Rangitahi, e tuku ana i ngā kairiri ki Awhekenetāna. E whakakāhore ana a Pakitāne i te whakahaere i te Huinga, ā, e kī ana he "kino" nga kōrero. Ko tētahi o ngā kaitautoko matua o te Huinga mai i tōna whakarewatanga i te tau 1994 tae noa ki te hinganga o te kāwanatanga i te tau 2001. Ko te nuinga o nga kaiārahi o te Huinga i whakaritea kātahi ka rere ki Pakitāne, ā, e whakaarotia tonutia ana te rōpū e tino whakamauru ana ki te tautoko a ētahi huānga o te whenua. Wā tairongo "Kei raro te Huinga i te mana o [Pakitāne] - kei Pakitāne te ārahitanga," te kī a Ken Karimi ki te hōtaka Hardtalk a TE HAU. "Kua katia ngā Madrassas, ā, kua tukua katoatia te Huinga ki Awhekenetāna." Ka taea e Awhekenetāna te rangimārie mehemea i hiahiatia tēnei e te US rāua ko Pakitāne, e kī ana te tianara. "Mēnā ka pēhia e [Pakitāne] ngā kaiārahi [Huinga], ka whakatūpato rānei i a rātau me aha, he nui te āwhina a tēnā," tana tāpiri mai. I kī tētahi pūrongo NATO i māturu i Aperira e mōhio ana a Pakitāne e rerenga ana nga kaiārahi o Te Rangitahi i roto i ōna taitapa. Engari e whakakāhore tonu ana a Pakitāne i te whakaawetanga ki runga i te Huinga, e kī ana he tokomaha nga kaiwhakawhanake i noho puta noa i te rohe i te takiwā ki te rāwhiti o Āwhekenetāna o Kunar, mai i te wāhi e mōhiotia ana kua mahia e rātau ngā whakaekenga i te raki o Pakitāne. "Ko nga whakaaro e 'whakahaere' ana a Pakitāne i te Huinga, ā, kua 'tukua' i a rātau ki Awhekenetāna, kaore he take," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere o te manatu kē. "Ka whakakāhore mātou i a rātou. Kua whakamahia e Pakitāne te tautāwhi tino tautohetohe i mua i te reo tautohetohe i whakamahia e ngā mana ā iwi me ngā hōia o Pūkeirangi i ngā marama tata nei, kaua e kōrero i ētahi whakapae tino hangaia." I kī te kaiwhakaatu e whakaata ana aua kōrero i te "ponokore" i tētahi wāhi o ētahi huānga i roto i te kāwanatanga o Pūkeirangi, ā, i tino tautokona e Pakitāne te tukanga whakaritenga. "E kore a Pakitāne e whakapōrearea i ōna kaha ki te tautoko i ngā mahi a te iwi ao whānui ki te mau mai i te rangimārie me te mauritanga ki Awhekenetāna," tana kī. Ko te whakaū i te rohe roa, porous i waenganui i nga whenua e rua, kua roa te uaua ki nga mana. I tētahi wā tairongo ka puta mai ngā kōrero a Gen Karimi i tētahi wā tairongo, e kī ana a Rārangi Galpin o TE AO i Iharaira. E pana ana te US ki ngā kōrero rangimārie ki te Huinga i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā hōia riri a NATO i Awhekenetāna - he tukanga ka oti a tērā tau. I tērā marama ka whakatuwheratia e te Huinga to rātau tari mana tuatahi ki rāwāhi i te pūmatua o Qatari, i Tawhā - te hipanga tuatahi i mua i ngā kōrero rangimārie e tūmanakohia ana. E hiahia ana ngā kaiārahi o Amerika me Pūkeirangi kia hono te Huinga ki te kāwanatanga o Pūkeirangi nā te tukanga rangimārie. E kī ana rātau ka tutuki ngā kōrero rangimārie ina motu ngā here katoa ki a al-Mōrea, ka whakamutua te tutu me te whakaae ki te kaupapa ture o Pūkeirangi, tae atu ki ōna parenga mō ngā wāhine me ngā iti. E pūmau ana ngā mana o Hōia kia mōhiotia ngā "painga tika" a Pakitāne i Awhekenetāna i muri i te putanga mai o ngā hōia NATO. E tohe ana te Huinga ki te whakahekenga katoa o ngā ope kē hei here tōmua kia noho hei wāhanga o tētahi kāinga tōrangapū i Awhekenetāna. I te kōrero a Gen Sher Haira Karimi ki a Sarah Montague o TE AO mō Hardtalk me te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā.

title: Ka rahi ake te tākirirangi Ariane o Uropi mo te whakataetae
summary: Ka tukua tētahi pūrongo mai i te umanga mō te hoahoa o te tākirirangi ā muri ake o Uropi, a Ariane 6, i ngā wiki tata nei.
text: Ka whakamāramatia e Honatana AmosScience correspondent@BBCAmoson Twitter Astrium, e ārahi ana i te tīma whakanao i runga i te Ariane 5 o nāianei, tētahi hoahoa mō tētahi waka hōu e whakapono ana ka taea te hanga i te utu iti iho. E kitea ana tēnei he mea nui i te aroaro o te whakataetae nui mai i a Mātau. Ehara i te mea e hiahiatia ana e ia te whakamahi i ngā tikanga whakanao hōu anake, engari tērā pea he whakaraupapa anō nui o te umanga. "Ki a au, ehara te pātai matua mō Ariane 6 i te hoahoa - e hia ngā boosters me te rahi o ia booster; A, ko te tikanga, e mahi ana mātou i tēnā. Kāo, ko te pātai matua me pēhea te whakarite pātahitanga i waenganui i ngā umanga me ngā umanga, kia taea ai te tuku i tētahi kaiwhakarewa ki tētahi utu ūnga kua tukuna," i kitea e Alain Charmeau, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o Astrium Space Transportation. Tata ki te 70-75m hōro tēnei utu. "A, kia mārama, kaua tātau e pōhēhē. Mēnā e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaiti i te utu mā te 40%, 50% rānei, ko te tikanga o te whakaiti i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata. Tata ki te 80% ki te 90% o te utu o te kaiwhakarewa he utu ia haora - he mana tangata. Nō reira ki te hiahia koe ki te whakaiti i ngā utu, me tuku e koe te kaiwhakarewa me te iti ake o ngā tāngata." I te whakaahua a Tēnā Charmeau i te whenua ā muri ake mō Ariane i konei i te Whakaaturanga Rererangi o Parihi i Le Bourget. I whakaarahia te kēmu i whakaarahia e te Ariane 5 o nāianei e tohu ana i te mākete whakarewa arumoni ā-ao mō ngā aorangi nui. Neke atu i te haurua o ngā pūhara nunui i tukuna ki te whakarato i te ao ki ngā ratonga pouaka whakaata, waea me te ipurangi e whakarewaina ana e te waka o Ūropi. Engari kei te tārewa te huringa i roto i te umanga i te āhua o SpaceX o California, kua kākano e te pokapū mokowā o Amerika o NASA hei whakarato i ngā ratonga whakarewa utu iti i Amerika. Ā, ināianei kei te tango te kamupene i tōna hangarau i te ao whānui, e tuku ana i ngā ratonga whakarewa i ngā utu e whakaiti ana i te whakataetae tūturu. Ahakoa kāore anō kia whakarewaina e te tākirirangi Falcon a SpaceX tētahi pūhara pūkoro arumoni nui, e mōhio ana ngā pūpāpāho tīariari me urupare, ka mōrearea rānei te ngaro i te nuinga o ā rātou kiritaki tūturu. "Āe, kei te neke mātou nā te whakataetae, pērā i te umanga motokā, i te umanga rererangi rānei," te kī a Tēnā Charmeau. "Kei te uru mātou ki tētahi ao whakataetae nui ake mō ngā kaiwhakarewa." E whakaarotia ana a Ariane 6 ko te urupare whakamutunga a Uropi. E kī ana a Tēnā Charmeau kei te kore a Astrium i runga i te ariā whakamutunga, kua whakakore i te maha o ngā whakaaro. Heoi anō, te āhua nei he mārama te whakahuahua whānui. Ko te 6 ko ngā wāhanga o raro e whakahikotia ana e ngā mīhini hinu mārō, me tētahi wāhanga o runga e whakamahi ana i ngā wai cryogenic (hauwai me te hāora). Ka kōwhiria ngā hiato mō te māmā me te kaha, ā, me iti ake ngā wāhanga o ngā pūnaha katoa. Me whakaiti te matatinitanga. Ko ngā aorangi 'momona' Koinei tonu te take mō te hoahoa o te wāhanga o runga, e mōhiotia ana ko Vinci, kua hōhonu kē atu, ā, ka whakaurua wawe atu ki te Ariane 5 tīariari i roto i tētahi "kunenga waenganui" o te tākirirangi ka nui ake te mahinga. Ka āwhina a Vinci ki te whakarewa i te kaha hiki o te 5 kia neke atu i te 11 tāna, e taea ai e te tākirirangi te whakaranu ngāwari ake me te whakaōrite i ngā karaehe rerekē o ngā aorangi e kawea ana e ia ki te āwhiotanga. Ko te mahi noa iho kia whakarewaina e Ariane e rua ngā aorangi i te wā kotahi - kotahi pūhara nui, tae atu ki te 6.5 tāna - ā, ā muri ake nei, ko te tuarua e tata ana ki te rima tāna. Ko te tūmanako ka mau tonu tēnei i te ātaahua o te tākirirangi o Ūropi, engari mēnā - he tokomaha e whakapae ana - ka paingia ngā aorangi hiko hōu. Ka whakamahia e ēnei waka ātea ngā pūkaha katote hei whakaoti i o rātau āwhiotanga ina puta mai i runga i te tākirirangi. He pai ake ēnei pūnaha whakahaere (he iti iho te hinu) i ō rātou tīpuna matū, e penapena ana i te nui o te papatipu ka taea te tuku atu ki ngā kawenga waea nui ake, kaha ake hoki. Ko te tūmanako, tērā pea ka "mōmona" ake ngā pūhara. Tērā pea he nui ake ō rātou huānga kōmaru hei whakatutuki i ō rātou hiahia hiko nui, ā, tērā pea he whānui ake ngā pūnaha whakamātao. Ahakoa he aha, te āhua nei ka nui ake hoki ngā pūhihi pūkoro. Ko ēnei mea katoa e whakahau ana i ngā kamupene tākirirangi kia kaua e whakatau i ā rātou herenga maha anake, engari ko ngā rōrahi utanga ka taea e rātou te tuku ki ngā kiritaki aorangi. Ko te kounga tuatahi "I mua, i tino whakaritea e ngā kaiwhakanao aorangi ā rātou utanga huri noa i ngā reheke [pūkaha matū]," te kī a Erika Beranger, e upoko ana i te wehenga whakanao aorangi o Astrium. "Mēnā kāore anō koe kia whiwhi i ngā reheke, ka taea e koe te tino rerekē ngā huarahi ki te whakauru i ō utanga. Ka whakatuwheratia e ia ngā huarahi nā te mea ka hoatu ki a koe he wāteatanga hou i te āhua o tō hoahoa i tō aorangi." Tērā pea ka tūtaki a Ariane 5 i tēnei wero mā te puru i tētahi mowhiti ki raro i tōna tārewa - te taupoki anga clam-shell e pare ana i te aorangi i te wā o mua o te pikinga i roto i te hau takiwā. Mā tēnei e whakanui ake te teitei o te fairing, me te mokowā e wātea ana i roto, mā te 1-2m. Ko ngā Ratonga Whakarewa Ao Whānui (ILS) te tino tauwhāinga o Ariane i tēnei wā. Ka hokona e te mahi a US-Rūhia te waka Proton. Ka whakarewaina e te tākirirangi ā-Baikonur te nuinga o ngā aorangi pūkoro nui kāore a Ariane. Kei te whakararuraru hoki a Proton i ngā rangatū o ngā whakapainga, tae atu ki te whakawhānuitanga o tōna whāinga, e kī ana te perehitini o ILS, a Phil Slack. "Ko te putanga o tēnei rā o Proton e rere ana i tēnei wā, he āheinga hiki e 6.15 tāhei ki te āwhiotanga whakawhiti geostationary, ā, tērā tā mātou e kīia nei he whanaketanga 'wāhanga whā' ka hiki i tēnei kaha mā tētahi atu 200kiro, ā, ka rere i te tau 2014. Kei te mahia hoki te pūtea penapena nui i roto i tētahi pūkenga diameter 5m e tautoko ana i te hiahia o ngā kiritaki ki te waka ātea nui ake nā ngā pūhihi/whakaata nui ake. Kua whakataetae mātou, ā, e whakaaro ana mātou kia noho whakataetae tonu ā muri ake nei," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero. Pērā ki ngā wā katoa i roto i te tākirirangi, ko te mea tino nui ko te whaikikotanga. He tino whakakino te rahunga whakarewa ki te maia mākete. Ināianei kua oti i te Ariane 5 ngā mahi angitu e 55, engari me whawhai anō a Proton i te maha o ngā pānga i āki ai i tētahi arotakenga tauine katoa o te tukanga whakanao i te kaiwhakanao o Khrunichev. "Ināianei kei a mātou te whakaahua whakahau me te rīpene ataata o ngā mahi takenui i runga i te raina whakanao," te kī a te tumuaki o Khrunichev a Alexander Seliverstov ki a BBC News. "Ko ngā hua katoa e puta mai ana i te raina whakaminenga o Khrunichev me haere mai me te taumata kounga kia tutuki ai te angitu o te mahi. E mārama ana mātou mēnā e hiahia ana mātou ki te pupuri i te tiri mākete, mēnā e hiahia ana mātou ki te pupuri i ētahi kiritaki, me tau tuatahi te kounga."

title: Ko ngā hē 'mate' i kitea i roto i ngā pūmanawa whakatō rongoā
summary: Ko ngā hēnga haumarutanga i kitea i roto i ngā momo whakatō rongoā rerekē e 10, ka pā pea ki ngā hua "kino", ka whakatūpato i ngā kaipūkaro.
text: I kitea ngā hē i roto i ngā whakawhitiwhitinga reo irirangi i whakamahia hei whakahōu i ngā whakatō, tae atu ki ngā kaihanga, me te pānui raraunga mai i aua mea. Mā te pokanoa i ngā hē, ka taea e ngā kairangahau te whakarite i ngā tautuhinga me te whakaweto i ngā taputapu. I taea hoki e nga whakaekenga te tāhae i ngā raraunga muna mō ngā tūroro me ō rātou hītori hauora. Kua waihangatia tētahi pūmanawa pūmanawa hei āwhina ki te aukati i ngā whakaekenga o te ao tūturu. I kitea ngā hē e tētahi tīma kairangahau haumarutanga ao whānui i te Whare Wānanga o Peretiama me te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga 'Ngā karere kino' Ahakoa e mahi motuhake ana te nuinga o ngā whakatō, he tokomaha ināianei e whakamahi ana i ngā pūnaha whakawhitiwhiti ahokore awhe poto kia ngāwari ai te tiki raraunga mō te tangata e āwhinatia ana e te taputapu. Ka taea hoki te tuku ahokore i ngā tono hei huri i te āhua o te taumahi o ngā pūrere kia ōrite ai ki te āhua me te āhua o tētahi tangata. I hangaia e te tīma ngā pūnaha tohu ahokore proprietari i whakamahia e ngā whakatō, nāna i whakaatu ngā hē i te āhua o te pāohotanga raraunga. I mahi anake nga whakaekenga i te wā i roto i te rima mita o nga pūrere nga taputapu whakarongo a nga kairangahau. Mā te whakarongo ki ngā whakawhitinga raraunga, ka taea e ngā kairangahau te tīpako me te purei anō i ngā tono e whakahaere ana i ngā pūrere. Mā tēnei tikanga, ka taea e ngā kaihōia te kite i "ngā mōhiohio tairongo", te tuku rānei i "ngā karere kino", e kī ana te tīma i roto i tētahi pepa e whakamārama ana i ana mahi. "Ka mate pea ngā hua o ēnei whakaekenga ki ngā tūroro i te mea kei roto i ēnei karere he tono hei tuku ohorere, hei mono rānei i tētahi haumanu," ka whakatūpatotia. I hangaia katoatia ngā whakatōnga e te kamupene kotahi, ā, kei te whakamahia whānuitia katoatia i tēnei wā, e kī ana. Kāore i whakaaturia te ingoa o te kaihanga whakatō, engari i kī nga tohunga haumarutanga kua kōrerotia e rātau mō ā rātou kitenga. Nā tēnei i āki ki te whakahōu i ngā pūmanawa pūrere hei āwhina ki te whakawhāiti i te mōrearea ki ngā tūroro. "E whakaatu ana tēnei me tino pai ake te haumarutanga," te kaimātai manawa o Rik Willems, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te

title: Ka tīmata a Awhekenetāna rāua ko Huinga i ngā kōrero hāngai me te whāinga o te whakawhiti herehere
summary: Kua tīmataria e Awhekenetāna ana kōrero kanohi tuatahi ki te Huinga mo te whakawhiti herehere e hia mano.
text: I puta mai ngā taipitopito o te hui tuatahi i Kabul i te Wenerei, i mua i te rā tuarua o ngā kōrero, i te kitenga o ngā Afghans i ngā rāhuitanga iti o te nekeneke nā te taiepa coronavirus. I raro i tētahi whakaritenga a US-Huinga, ka whakawāteatia e te kāwanatanga e 5,000 ngā herehere o Te Rangitahi, i te wā ka tukua e nga kaiwhakawhanake te 1,000. I tū nga kōrero ki te āhua o te tutu haere tonu i te whenua. I whakapaea e nga mana te Huinga mo te pahūtanga i te kawanatanga ki te tonga o Helmand i te Wenerei i mate ai e waru nga tangata whenua, tae atu ki nga tamariki tokomaha. E hia te nui o te kauneketanga i mahia i roto i nga kōrero? I te tīmatanga o Poutāpeta, he wāhanga o tētahi mahi a US-Huinga i hainatia i te 29 o Hui tanguru, engari he rangatū o ngā tūponotanga. Tae noa ki te Wenerei, i tūtaki noa iho ngā taha e rua mā te hui ataata. Me ngā kōrero nā te tīmata anō mō tētahi rā tuarua i te Wenerei, ka kī te Tari o te Kaunihera Haumarutanga ā-Motu o Awhekenetāna kua mahia noa iho te kauneketanga "mō ngā take hangarau". I whakahaeretia nga kōrero e te Komiti Ao Whānui o te Rīpeka Whero (ICRC) ā, ko te arotahi i runga i te tukunga o te ope haumarutanga me ngā whakarau o te arai ā iwi, tae atu ki ngā herehere o Te Rangitahi, te kī a te ICRC. I kī te kaikorero o Te Rangitahi, a Zabihullah Mujahid, kāore nga hui i te nui o nga whakaritenga, e kī ana ki a WHO: "Kaore he kōrero tōrangapū i reira". I karangatia e te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika, a Maika Pompeo te tīmatanga o nga kōrero "rongo pai". He pēhea te nui o te raruraru coronavirus o Afghanistan? Kua tuhia e Afghanistan e tata ana ki te 200 nga keehi o Covid-19, ko te nuinga kei te hauauru o te whenua i te kawanatanga o Herat. Tokowhā nga tāngata kua mate. Kāore te whakamātautau i te whānui i te whenua. Kua whakatakotoria he rāhuitanga ki te nekeneke i te takiwā o Herat me Kabul i te ngana ki te tīmata i te horahanga o te tīmatatanga. Tērā ētahi pūrongo o te hoko mauri me te iti o ngā taonga taketake. I tukuna e te Huinga he tīma nui ki ngā kōrero o Kabul, engari i te mutunga ka tukuna he tonotono tokotoru nā te tīmatanga huaketo. I kī mai tētahi kōrero mo te rōpū tinihanga ka mātakina e te tokotoru te tukanga tuku herehere me te mahi i ngā tikanga hangarau e hiahiatia ana. Ahakoa i tīmata ngā hōia o Amerika ki te neke atu i tērā marama i raro i ngā ture o te mahi ki te Huinga, he pōturi te nekeneke i runga i te whakawhitinga herehere nā ngā tautohetohe i waenganui i a Perehitini Wānanga me tōna tauwhāinga tōrangapū matua o Haina.

title: Ka tūhura ngā pirihimana i te matenga o te kaihī ika tata ki Kilsyth
summary: Kua kitea te tinana o tētahi tangata e 57 tau te pakeke e tata ana ki Banton Loch i Kilsyth i Te Raki o Lanarkshire.
text: Kua kitea ia e nga pirihimana ko Ahana Paraone, a, i kī ia i te hī ika i te rā i mua i tana kitenga. Tata ki te 21:00 i te Hātarei te kitenga whakamutunga o Tēnā Paraone. I kitea tōna tinana e tētahi kaihīkoi kurī i te 14:35 i te rā e whai ake nei. Kei te kitea e nga pirihimana te matenga he mea kāore i te mōhiotia, ā, kua tono mōhiohio. I kī a Det Insp Gordon Sneddon: "E mōhio ana mātou kei roto a Alan i te kamupene o ngā hoa i te hātarei i te rā, kātahi ka noho ko ia anake i muri i to rātau haerenga. " He maha ngā kitenga i a ia i te ahiahi o te Hātarei, engari he mea nui kia huihuia e tātau ana nekeneke i waenganui i te kitenga whakamutunga i a ia me te wā i kitea ai ia kua mate i te ahiahi e whai ake nei. "E inoi ana ahau ki te tangata e whakapono ana kua kite pea rātau i a Alan i waenganui i te 9pm i te pō Hātarei me te 2.35pm i te ahiahi o te Rātapu, kia whakapā atu koa." E whakaahuatia ana a Tāne Paraone he mā, tata ki te 5ft 10in te teitei, he hanga hākinakina, he makawe hina poto me te kakau witi. I te mau koti pango a ia me te kōhua, te peke kiwikiwi, te tarau kikorangi me ngā kaiwhakangungu pango.

title: Ka whakatūpato a Amazon i ngā taringa o Alexa Echo Buds ka mōrearea te haumaru
summary: Kua whakatūpato a Amazon tērā pea ka mōrearea ōna taringa ahokore ki te wera, ā, kei te whakahau i ngā kiritaki kia whakahōu i ā rātou pūmanawa, kia haumaru ai.
text: I tukuna he īmēra ki ngā kiritaki i te Wenerei, e kī ana i roto i "ngā take tino āhua kore" ka wera pea a Echo Buds i roto i tā rātou kēhi whakahiko. I kī a Amazon kua tukua e ia tētahi whakahōutanga pūmanawa hei whakatika i te take "i te nui o te whakatūpato". "Ko te haumarutanga o ā mātou kiritaki tā mātou tino manakē," tana kī. Kāore a Amazon e kī mēnā ko te tikanga o tēnei ka taea e ngā taringa te hopu ahi, te pahū rānei, engari i whakaaturia kua ākina tana tūhuratanga e tētahi kiritaki āwangawanga e whakapā atu ana. I kī a Amazon ka whiwhi aunoa ngā rangatira i te whakahōutanga ina tūhonotia ngā Echo Buds mā Bluetooth ki tētahi waea pūkoro me te taupānga Alexa. I kī hoki mēnā he koha te Echo Buds, me whakatūpato wawe te kiritaki i te kaiwhiwhi. Kei te hokona tonutia ngā taringa i te pae Amazon engari i tapaina hei "kua pau te rawa" tae noa ki te mutunga o Aotearoa. I tiria ngā taipitopito o te īmēra e Daniel Bader, te kaiwhakatika whakahaere i te rangitaki hangarau Android Central. "Kei te tuhituhi mātou ki te whakamōhio atu ki a koe mō tētahi whakahōutanga pūmanawa hira mō ō Echo Buds," te kī a te īmēra. "Kātahi anō mātou ka whakatau i roto i ngā take tino āhua kore nei ka taea e Echo Buds te wera i a ia i roto i te kēhi whakahiko." I kī hoki te īmēra i te whakahōutanga pūmanawa ōrite "ka whakapai ake i te mahinga mo te wā roa o ngā pāteri o Echo Buds". He maha ngā pūhiko taringa ahokore kei roto i te kēhi, e whakahiko aunoa ana i ngā taringa ina purua ki roto. I te nuinga o te wā ka tukuna te wera pūhiko e ngā pūrere i a ia e whakahiko ana, engari i te nuinga o te wā ka noho i roto i ngā tepe haumaru pākaha. Kāore a Amazon i kī mēnā i takea mai te raruraru wera i te whakahiko, i tētahi atu take tauwhāiti rānei i roto i te pū pūhiko. Hei taki mēnā kua whakahōutia ō pūmanawa: Mēnā he putanga pūmanawa kē tāu:

title: Kōrea ki te Raki: Ko te ārai whakaari 'ka ngaru hara'
summary: Na te whakakorenga o te whakaari pouaka whakaata Kōria ki te Tonga i puta ai he ngaru hara i waenganui i ngā taitamariki Kōria ki te Raki, e ai ki ngā pūrongo.
text: Ngā rongo mai i tētahi atu wāhi...... e kitea ana e TE Aroturuki o TE AO Kei te mātakitaki kē ngā rangatahi i ngā kiriata Hainamana, he maha e pā ana ki te tutu me ngā pūrākau utu, te āhua nei. Kātahi ka whakamutua te tokomaha o ngā ākonga ki te mau maripi me te pakoire i "ngā mahi kino" kua kitea e rātau, e ai ki te Daily NK o Seoul. Ka whakahuatia e te paetukutuku tētahi pūtake i te takiwā o Ryanggang o Kōrea ki te Raki - e tata ana ki te rohe o Hainamana - e kī ana: "He tokomaha ngā tāngata e kī ana kei te mataku rātau ki te haere i te ahiahi, ā, kei te rongo i te maha o ngā whakaekenga a te rangatahi." I whakamutua te ia i te whakaoho kino o tētahi hōia i tukua, nāna i uru ki tētahi haupae me ngā tauira haurangi e rua o te kura waenganui, e kī ana te pūrongo. Ko te pae rongokōrero - e arotahi ana ki te āhua huna - kua pūrongotia i mua ngā ākonga e rapua ana e ngā āpiha o te Manatu Haumaru a te Iwi o Ūngia. Ehara hoki i te mea ko te tutu tāruarua anake e kīia ana e āwangawanga ana. He tokomaha nga tauira o te kura tuarua i tētahi atu rohe taitapa - Te Raki o Te Raki - i haere nui ki tētahi sauna ki te whakarite anō i tētahi tirohanga wahine mai i tētahi whitiāhua Hainamana, i pūrongotia e te Daily NK i te wā o Me. Whakamahia #NewsfromElsewhere kia noho hōu tonu ki ā mātou pūrongo mā Twitter.

title: Ka whakatuwheratia te whare kura o Dumfries miriona pauna
summary: Kua rite tētahi whare kura e £28m ki te pōhiri i ngā rau tauira i Dumfries.
text: I tērā marama i muri i te kitenga o tētahi māturu i ngā wiki noa iho i mua i te whakatuwheratanga. I huatau ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori kua hinga tētahi tuanui, engari i whakamutua e ngā kaikirimana he hapa whakauru tauhiuhi hei whakapae mō te "tūkino me te tūkinotanga". Mai i tērā wā ka mahia ngā mahi tapi, ā, kua tautuhia te Whare Hapori ki te Raki ki te Hauauru kia tuwhera i runga i te hōtaka mō te tīmatanga o te wā hou o te kura. I tīmata te mahi i te kaupapa i te tau 2016 hei whakakapi mō ngā kura tuatahi o Lochside me St Ninian, te kura motuhake o Langlands me te Kura Tuarua o Maxwelltown. It is part of the wider Dumfries Learning Town project which is overhauling education provision. I kī a Jeff Leaver, e tūtaki ana i ngā tamariki o Dumfries me Galloway Council, rangatahi me te komiti ako mo te roanga o te wā, he "tino pai" te urupare mai i tētahi rā tuwhera i te pae. "I mīharo ngā mātua ki te rahi o te kura, ngā akomanga me ngā pūkenga hou, te mokowā o waho me ngā tamariki e aroha ana ki te kōhungahunga hou," tana kī. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana ia ka "ngahau katoa ngā tauira ki te pānga hou". Heoi anō, i whakaūngia e te kaunihera kāore anō kia whakatuwheratia he whare pukapuka hou i te kāinga. "Ka tuwhera te whare pukapuka ki te hapori i ngā wiki tata nei," te kī a tētahi kōrero. "Arrangements are in place to deal with any requests for access to library resources in the interim period."

title: NHS 'hapa ngā wāhi' ki te tiaki i te tama me te ruaki kākāriki
summary: I rahua te NHS ki te whakaora i te ora o tētahi taitama e ono tau te pakeke e maka ana i te ruaki kākāriki, kua rongo tētahi uiuinga.
text: I auau te waea a te whānau o Sebastian Hibberd ki NHS 111 me tana GP e tono āwhina ana, engari i mate ia i te 20 meneti i muri i tana taenga atu ki te hōhipera. I kī ōna mātua, a Russell rāua ko Nataliya, i "ohorere, i riri" rāua i te matenga "tino karo" o ta rāua tama. I kī te koroni matua o Īna Pere e whakaaro ana ia mēnā e hiahiatia ana he mahi anō hei ārai i ngā mate ā muri ake. 'E toru ngā haki whero' i mate ai a Sebastian i te māuiuitanga, i te wā i tētahi wāhanga o te karu whekau ki tērā atu, i te Hōhipera o Derriford i Plymouth i te 12 o Whiringahora 2015. I pūrongotia e ngā waea ki te raina āwhina NHS 111 he mātao a ia, he ringa mātao me ngā waewae, ā, kua makaia e ia te ruaki kākāriki. I kitea ēnei e te tākuta tamariki o Dr Dorothy Kufeji he "toru ngā haki whero" e tohu ana he tino mate te tamaiti, ka rongo te Kōti o Plymouth Coroner. I kī a Tēnā Pere e whakaaro ana a ia ki te ārai i te pūrongo mate ā muri ake. I whakamutua e ia he "maha ngā wā i hapa" kia whiwhi ai a Sebastian i te rongoā whakaora. "Mehemea i mōhiotia tōna āhuatanga, ā, kua whiwhi ia i te rongoā... tērā pea i tiakina tōna ora," tana kī. Ko te pokanga GP a Sebastian, te South Western Ambulance Service Trust (SWAST), NHS Pathways, NHS Ingarangi me NHS England South West i mahi i ngā tūhuratanga me ngā arotakenga i muri i tōna matenga. Engari i kī tōna whānau me nui ake te mahi. "Ko te ruaki kākāriki me ngā ringa me ngā waewae mātao he tohu o te mate nui, e tika ana kia aro atu ki te rongoā kōhukihuki," te kī a ngā mātua o Sebastian. "Mēnā anake ka mōhio ngā mātua me te pūnaha tiaki kōhukihuki ki ēnei tohu ka āraia ētahi atu whānau kia kaua e puta i te moepuku kua pā ki a mātau." SWAST, nāna i pupuri te kirimana mō te whakarato ratonga NHS 111 i taua wā, i whakapārewa "kāore i te mōhiotia" mō ngā "āhuatanga kino e karapoti ana i te matenga o Sebastian". Dr Andy Smith, from the organisation, said: "The trust has identified and implemented a number of significant changes to help prevent such situation from happening again."

title: Essex 'raiona': Spotter adamant 'big cat is out there'
summary: I kī tētahi tokorua i kī kua kite rāua i tētahi kararehe e rite ana ki te raiona i tētahi papa o Essex, e whakapono ana rāua kei te nui tonu te kararehe.
text: I karangatia i te Rāhina tētahi rapunga mō te "kararehe tino nui" i kitea e tata ana ki Earl Hall Drive i St Osyth, tata ki Clacton-on-Sea, tata ki te 19:00 BST i te Rātapu. I kī a Gill Atkin, i te hararei i te kāinga me tana tāne ko Steve: "Kāore tonu ahau i te whakaaro he poti kāinga tērā." Kua kī a Ginny Murphy, o Hato Osyth, ko te kararehe tana poti mōkai, ko Teddy Bear. I whakaahuatia e Tāne rāua ko Whaea Atkin, o Louth, Lincolnshire, te kararehe i te ahiahi o te Rātapu. 'I noho noa iho i reira' i kī atu a Tēnā Atkin ki nga pirihimana he "tino kararehe tino nui, he raiona pea, he poti nui". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I kite mātou, e kī ana ahau, mō te 20 ki te 30 meneti e horoi ana i a ia anō me te takahuri i te parae." Ka kī a Mrs Atkin: "Kua mahia e te Mirror [nūpepa] he āhua whakarihariha i tēnei ata, e kī ana he poti tērā ko Tom, engari kāo, ki taku whakaaro ehara i te poti kāinga. " Ahakoa he aha, kei reira tonu." Ko te kitenga tuatahi i pūrongotia e te hararei o Bob Martin, nāna i kī i kite rāua ko tana wahine ko Denise i tētahi poti nui me te raiona "ko te mea tuatahi i puta mai ki te hinengaro". "E whakapono ana mātou i kite mātou i tētahi poti nui e titiro ana ki tētahi rākau... i noho noa iho ki reira e titiro ana ki a mātau," tana kī. I whakataua e ngā pirihimana kia waea atu i te rapunga i te Mane i muri i te kore kitenga o tētahi poti nui, a, ka kī mai he poti nui te kāinga, he poti mohoao rānei. I tāpiritia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu kāore te mahi i te whakamahia hei tinihanga. Kāore anō kia whakaputaina e ngā Pirihimana o Essex ētahi taipitopito o te utu o te rapunga, engari kua kī mō ngā āpiha e 25 i karangatia ki te wāhi i kitea ai te kararehe, tae atu ki ngā āpiha patu me ngā tohunga o te Kararehe o Colchester. E rua nga hepa pirihimana, kotahi me ngā taputapu atahanga wera, i whakamahia hoki hei whakamātau ki te kite i tētahi rehu kararehe.

title: Pūtea 2012: Ka kī taurangi ngā MP ki te whawhai i te 'tāke whakapiri'
summary: Kua whakaarahia te raruraru o te pārekareka māhaki i roto i te Whare o Ngātahi i muri i te pānuitanga a te tumuaki i ngā mahere ki te pakipaki i te VAT i runga i te paramanawa.
text: I kī te MP o Mid Cornwall, a Stephen Gilbert, he "kai tēpara, ngākau" nāna i kawe mai ngā miriona pauna ki tōna takiwā, ā, me pare. I kī tōna hoa mahi a Andrew George ka "whawhai ki a rātau i runga i ngā one" ki te ārai i tētahi "tāke whakapiri". E kī ana ngā minita ko ngā kai katoa e hokona ana "i runga ake i te pāmahana taiao" me mau te VAT. Ko te VAT, i tēnei wā i te 20%, kāore i te utu i runga i te nuinga o ngā kai me ngā inu - e whakaahuatia ana he whakatauranga kore. Ka utua ki ngā kai tango e hokona ana kia kainga wera, engari ko ngā taonga tunu e whakaaturia ana i te mahana, ā, kātahi anō ka whakamātao, ka kore hoki te whakatauranga. E kī ana te kāwanatanga kua tautohe ētahi kaihoko me ngā parāoa e hokona wera ana a rātau kai hei whakapai ake i tōna āhua, kia ū rānei ki ngā ture hauora me te haumaru - ehara mō te whakapaunga pēnā - nō reira kaua e kawe mai i te VAT. I kī te Tumuaki Tumuaki o George Osborne i ngā huringa i pānuitia i roto i te Pūtea - ā, i whakaritea i roto i tētahi tuhinga whakaritenga- i hoahoatia hei whakatika i aua "mārō me ngā māuiui". Mēnā ka puta ngā ture hōu, ka kawea mai e ngā kai katoa e hokona ana i te "pāmahana ā-taiao" te VAT - ahakoa kāore anō kia whakamāramatia te whakamāramatanga o taua pāmahana. Ka noho kore tonu te parāoa - ahakoa kei te mahana tonu ina purua ki runga i ngā whata toa. Kua kī te mekameka parāoa o Greggs ka mahia e ia he "whakaaturanga kaha" mō te kaupapa, ā, kāore i whakapono me whakauru ōna "hua reka kātahi anō ka tunua". I hinga ōna hea i te 5% i te Tāite, e ūkui ana i te £30 miriona i to rātau uara. I te wā o tētahi taupatupatu mo te Pūtea, ka kī a Tēnā Gilbert, Lib Dem MP mō St Austell me Newquay, ko te take ko te "whakamahi i ōku tangata whenua i Cornwall". I tana kōrero ki te Hēkeretari Pakihi a Vince Cable, ka kī a ia: "Tērā ētahi rangirua mēnā ko te pikinga ki te 20% o te VAT i runga i ngā kai wera ka whakaurua mai i ngā parāoa. " E kore te minita e mōhio ehara i te mea he kai tēpara anake, engari, ko te tikanga, ka whakamahia e ia ngā mano tāngata, ā, ka kawea mai e ia he miriona pauna ki roto i te māiatanga o Cornish. "Ka whakamāramatia e ia mēnā ka taea e tātau te karo i te tāke whakapiri?" I kī te hoa o Lib Dem me St Ives MP, a Tēnā George: "I runga i te take tino nui, tino hira hoki o ngā tāke whakapiri i Cornwall, me whakaū e au te rangatira hōnore ka whawhai mātau ki a rātau i runga i ngā one." Kua kī ngā Caravans o Maika Hollings, o te National Association of Master Bakers, ko ngā ture i runga anō i te pāmahana o tētahi hua ka "nui rawa te pōrarutanga". Ināianei, kua karangatia e Labour te kaupapa he "tāke whakamoho i runga i ngā whānau moni whiwhinga waenganui, iti iho" e "whakanui ake ai i te utu o te tapahi makawe, he hanawiti pēkana, he tōtiti, he hararei wīra rānei". I pānuitia hoki e Tēnā Osborne ngā mahere hei utu i te VAT i runga i ngā inu kai hākinakina, te rokiroki i a ia anō, ngā pūkenga kākahu makawe me ngā wīra hararei. I kī te MP Labour o Taiana Hōnea ka whai pānga nui te huringa ki tōna wāhanga o Hull nā te mea ka hangaia e te rohe he wāhanga nui o ngā wīra i hangaia i te UK. "E mōhio ana ahau ka tata te whakaheke i te tono mā te 30%, tētahi atu pupuhi hama," tana kī.

title: Covid-19: Neke atu i te 50 ngā kura e akiaki ana i a Pita Weir kia whakaaro anō i te katinga moata
summary: Neke atu i te 50 ngā kura i Belfast kua tuhi i tētahi reta tōtahi ki te minita mātauranga e whakahau ana i a ia kia "whakaaro anō i tō tūnga mo te katinga o te kura o mua".
text: Nā Robbie MeredithBBC News NI Education Correspondent I ahu mai te reta mai i ngā kura kōhungahunga, tuatahi me ngā kura tuatahi i te Hapori Ako o te Rohe o Te Hauauru (ALC). Kei roto tētahi whakatūpato kaha e whakaiti ana i ngā rāhuitanga maha i te 11 o Hakihea ka whai pānga ki ngā kura. I kī hoki ngā kura e hiahiatia ana he mahere mō Hānuere. I kī rātau "tērā pea he tsunami o ngā kēhi e tae ana ki ia kura" i te tau hou. Kua rite tonu te kī a te Minita Mātauranga a Pita Weir e kore ngā kura e kati wawe mō te wehenga Kirihimete. Kua kī hoki a ia kāore anō ngā tohunga hauora kia tūtohu kia kati wawe i ngā kura. Heoi anō, kua kī ētahi tumuaki e kore ngā tauira e tohua ki te ngaro mēnā e hiahia ana ngā mātua kia mahi rātou i ngā mahi kura i te kāinga i te wiki whakamutunga o te wā. He maha ngā kura e whakamutu ana i te wā o te Paraire 18 o Hakihea, engari ka haere tonu ētahi tae noa ki te 22 o Hakihea. 'Te kore mōhiotanga' I kī atu te reta tōtahi mai i ngā kura o Te Hauauru ki a Tēnā Weir tērā "kāore he māramatanga mai i te Tari Mātauranga, he tohutohu papā mai i te tari me te Pokapū Hauora Tūmatanui, me te kore mōhiotanga tūturu mai i a koe, i tō tari rānei e pā ana ki te nui o ngā mahi e anga atu ana mātou i ia rā". E kī ana ka pā te whakaiti i ngā rāhuitanga maha i ētahi atu wāhi ki ngā kura. "Nā te mea kua whakaae te kaiwhakahaere ki te 'whakangāwari' i ngā rāhuitanga kia taea ai e te tangata te wheako i tētahi Kirihimete pūnoa ake, e wehi ana mātou ka taea e tēnei te whakaranu mirumiru me te nui ake o ngā kāinga me ngā tāngata e āhei ana ki te kohikohi e ahu ana ki te nui ake o ngā pāpātanga whakapokenga," e kī ana. "Ko ēnei mōrea nui ake ki te hauora o te tangata, te pēhanga tāpiri ki te NHS me te tūponotanga o te whakanui ake i te mate nā te Covid-19 me whakawāteatia kia whakaaetia ai te tangata kia kite i te hunga e arohaina ana i te Kirihimete. " However, failure to close schools at a time when hospitality and close-contact services resume, will doubt impact on the Christmas experience of those school staff who are identified by contact tracing over the coming weeks. "Tērā pea ki ētahi, ahakoa ka taea te whakanui i ngā mate me ngā pāpātanga mate, ehara i te mea hira ki te kaiwhakahaere, ki tō tari rānei te tiaki i te Kirihimete o ngā kaimahi o mua pēnei i ngā kaimahi rongoā me ngā kura." 'Breaking point' I kī hoki te reta kua whakarato ngā kaimahi o te kura i te tautoko auau ki ngā tauira me ngā mātua e pāngia ana e te raka. "Kei te tipu tonu o mātau iwi whānui kura, ā, ko te taumata o te hiahia me te whakararuraru," te kī a te reta. "Kei te mōhio rawa mātou ki te 'wāhi whati' kua tae atu ētahi o ā mātou tauira me ngā whānau ki te whakapau Kirihimete i te hunga e arohaina ana. " He tino uaua tēnei wā rāhuitanga ki aua tauira whai hiahia mātauranga motuhake, otirā ko te hunga e pāngia ana e te Autistic Spectrum Disorder, i te mea kua pāngia tō rātou kaha ki te kite i ngā mea e arohaina ana mai i tō rātou whānau whānui, ā, ko te Kirihimete anake pea te wā i ngā marama e heke mai nei." It concludes by pleading with Mr Weir to allow school staff to teach and pupils to learn from home "for a period of just five or six days" before the planned end of term. "As school leaders we also have a duty of care to our staff, pupils and the wider school community," it said. "The biggest cause of stress and anxiety we see at the present time is the uncertainty people feel about their ability to see extended family over the Christmas break. " I roto i tētahi tau tino pai mō tātou katoa, ka taea e au te tono atu kia whakaarohia anō e koe tō tūnga mō te katinga o te kura tōmua, kia whakawhirinaki rānei ki te whakawā ngaio a ngā kaiārahi kura ki te whakarato i ngā wāhi ako kāinga tōtika e āhei ai ngā kaimahi mātauranga tino pukumahi ki te whai i te wehenga Kirihimete kua riro i a rātou puta noa i tēnei mate urutā. "Ko tēnei mahi, ko ia anake, e whai mana ana ki te mahi nui hei whakapiki i te ngākau whakangākau me te oranga o ia kaimahi i ngā kura." Kua kī te kāwanatanga i Wales ka neke ngā kura tuatahi katoa ki te whakaako tuihono tae noa ki te Kirihimete mai i te Mane 14 o Hakihea.

title: Te whakaekenga o Belvoir Hunt: Ko te tuahine o Pirinihi Taiana e whakamana ana i te kaihōia
summary: Kua whakatārewatia tētahi tangata nāna i whakaekea e ngā kaimahi aroha tokorua e aroturuki ana i tētahi whainga, i muri i te whakamana a te tuakana o Pirinihi Taiana ki a ia.
text: I whakaekea e George Grant, e mahi ana mō te Belvoir Hunt i te Rāwhiti o Midlands, ngā tāngata me tana tama ko Thomas Grant, a, ka mahue i a ia tētahi tūkino me te kakī whati. Heoi anō, ka kī atu a Lady Sarah McCorquodale ki te kaiwhakawā ka ngaro i a George Grant tana mahi me tana kāinga mehemea ka hereheretia ia. I hoatu ki ngā tāngata tokorua he whiu whare herehere 13 marama, i whakatārewatia mo te rua tau. I kī atu a McCorquodale, he rangatira tōtahi o te Belvoir Hunt, ki te Kōti Karauna o Te Kōti Karauna o Te Kōti Karauna o Hōri Grant he "tino pukumahi, he pai ki tana mahi" ā, "kāore anō ia kia kite i a ia e ngaro ana tōna riri pērā". I mua rā ka tautohe nga Grant i te hara ki te tūkino i te tinana ki a Darryl Cunnington me te tūkino tinana tūturu ki a Roger Swaine. Tokowhā hoki ngā tāngata hīpoki i whai wāhi ki te whakaeke, engari kāore anō ēnei kia kitea, ā, kāore ngā Grant i whakaae ki te kōrero i te wā i uiuia rātau e ngā pirihimana. I tautohe hoki te pāpā me te tama, e 57 me te 25 tau, ā, o Briary Cottage, o Belvoir, ki te tāhae i tētahi kāmera ataata me te tūkino i tētahi kāri SD i te whakaekenga tata ki Stathern, i Mati 2016. E whakaahua ana te Belvoir Hunt i a ia anō ko "tētahi o ngā foxhunts tino rongonui o te ao". E kī ana ngā mema i te whaiwhai huarahi i taua rā, e tāwhai ana i te whaiwhai pokiha, ā, ko te whakatakoto kakara mō tētahi pōkai kurī hei whai. I whakapae nga kaupane whaiwhai, e mahi ana mō te Rōpū Ki ngā Hākinakina Nanakia, tērā pea kei te whai pokiha kore mana rātau me ngā kuri. Heoi anō, kaore he huatau i te kōti e whati ana te kimi i ētahi ture. I whakaahuatia e Neil Bannister, e whiu ana, he pēhea te whakatata atu a te Grant ki ngā kaupane kimi i runga i tētahi paihikara tapawhā i muri i to rātau tatūnga taputapu hopu. Ka kī atu a Hōri Grant ki tana tama: "Haere ki te tiki i ngā tamariki ka hoki mai." Ka eke atu a Thomas Grant i runga i te paihikara tapawhā, a, ka hoki mai me tētahi waka tiki, a, ka puta atu ia me ngā tāngata hīpoki tokowhā. I kī a Tēnā Cunnington, tētahi pirihimana o mua, i whakaekea ia, a, i panaia ia e "e rua neke atu rānei" o ngā tāngata hīpoki, i te wā i whakaekea tana hoa mahi, a, ka panaia ki raro i tētahi taka iti iho e ngā Grant me ngā tāngata hīpoki. I kī a Tēnā Swaine, nāna i āhei ki te waea atu ki ngā ratonga ohorere, he "waimarie rātau kāore i patua". Ahakoa kāore a Hōri Grant i whakaeke ā-tinana i a Tēnā Cunnington, ka rongo te kōti he "mahi tahi" tērā i waenganui i a ia me ērā atu tāngata. Ka kī atu te Kaiwhakawā o Te Kaiwhakawā o Te Wānanga o Boora ki nga Grants: "I takahuri kōrua. Kāore tētahi o koutou i te tangata taikaha." Tae atu ki ngā rerenga whakatārewa, i whakahaua ngā tāngata kia mahi i te 200 hāora mahi kāore i te utua, ā, ka utua e ia a Tēnā Cunnington £500 hei utu. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i te whakarongo, ka whakapuakina e Tēnā Cunnington tōna āwangawanga kāore anō ērā atu tāngata tokowhā kia kawea ki te tika. "E mārama ana rātau ki aua tāngata tokowhā i uru ki te whati i taku kakī, engari kāore anō rātau kia whakaatu i to rātau tuakiri," tana kī. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Kohinga toi a te kāwanatanga: Ko tā te minita i kite
summary: He maha nga whakataunga nui e anga ana ki nga minita kāpata hou ina tīmata rātau i ta rātau mahi.
text: Nā Giles EdwardsProducer, Ko te Mea i Kitea e te Minita o te Reo Irirangi 4 Ko te Whakatū i ngā kaimahi matua me te whakatau i ngā manakē mō te tari ko te nuinga o te rārangi. Engari i roto i ō rātou wiki tuatahi, ka tonoa hoki rātou kia mahi i tētahi atu whakataunga whaiaro ake - he aha ngā toi hei whakairi ki ngā pakitara o tō rātou tari. Ka uru ngā minita ki ngā taumaha o te Kohinga Toi a te Kāwanatanga. Ka taea e rātou te kōwhiri mai i ngā mahi ātaahua, whai hua hoki mai i ngā whakaahua o Elizabeth I o te rau tau 16 ki ngā mahi o nāianei a Howard Hodgkin rāua ko Grayson Perry. Engari i mua i to rātau rironga hei minita, he tokomaha kāore i te mōhio ki tēnei painga o te tari tiketike: kāore i mōhio te Hēkeretari Pūngao Liberal Democrat me te Huringa Āhuarangi o Pirihi Huhne. Engari ka tino whakakitea a rātau kōwhiringa, ā, i roto i te Reo Irirangi 4 o TE Reo Irirangi 4 ka kōrero mātou ki a Tēnā Huhne me ētahi atu minita kāpata e rua mō ā rātou kōwhiringa - me ngā kōrero a tō rātou reka ki te toi mō rātou. Ko nga tari tūmataiti a nga Minita 'whakamīharo' ko o rātau wāhi tapu ā-roto, ā, ko tā rātou e kōwhiri ai ki te whakairi i reira, ka taea te kōrero nui mō rātou, ō rātou manakohanga whaiaro me te āhua o tō rātou kitenga i a rātou anō. Kei a Pirihi Huhne tētahi o ngā āhuatanga tino hōu rawa o te kāwanatanga. He hou ngā mea katoa i runga i ōna pakitara, ā, he tino whakawaitara ētahi mahi. Some have seen it as a political statement, but he doesn't. "This building has recently been re-vamped and it's very white, very bare walls," he says, "and I thought actually it needed a bit of colour, and therefore modernist painting would be exactly what would be required to liven the place up a bit... Kāore au i te whakaaro he kōrero mōku." Engari ka kitea e ia ngā mahi i kōwhiria e ia he rongoā, ā, ka kaha te take mo te hiranga o te toi. "He tino pai ki a au te kite i ēnei pikitia ina haere mai ahau i te ata, ā, ki taku whakaaro, he tino whakamīharo. E whakaaro ana ahau he pai te whai taiao e taea ai e koe te whakaaro me te mahi i ngā mea, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ka āwhina te toi i tēnā āhuatanga nā te mea ko tētahi o ngā āhuatanga tino motuhake o tētahi iwi ko tōna toi." Ko te 'raruraru uaua' Hēkeretari Ture a Ken Clarke, he maha ngā āhuatanga, ko te tauaro o Pirihi Huhne. I a ia e mema ana i ia whakahaeretanga Tūturu mai i te tau 1974, he tino mōhio a ia ki te kāwanatanga. E rua ngā whakaahua Tudor e whakahaeretia ana tōna tari - o Elizabeth I me tōna kaitohutohu matua, a Ariki Burghley. E kawe ana ēnei pikitia i te mana me te mana: He aha tā rātou kōrero ki tētahi manuhiri ki te tari o Tāne Clarke? "Ehara i te mea kei te whakaputa anō ahau i te āhua whakahauhau iti o te kāwanatanga o Elizabethan, e whakawhirinaki ana ahau," tana kōrero. "E tino whakaaro ana ahau ko Kuini Irihapeti tētahi o a mātau ariki tino angitu. I tino whakawhirinaki a ia ki a Burghley, tana Ariki Kaitiaki Moni mo te nuinga o te wā. "He tangata take a ia, he tangata kāwanatanga, he tangata pakihi, ā, he tino pai a ia ki taua mea." He uaua kia kaua e pā ki ngā whakataurite mārama i reira - tērā pea ko Burghley tētahi tangata hei titiro ake? Ka kata anō a Ken Clarke. "He whakaaro whakamīharo ina anga atu ahau ki tētahi raruraru uaua ka titiro atu ahau ki mua i taku tēpu me te whakaaro 'ināianei he aha te mahi a Ariki Burghley', engari kāore au i te whakaaro ka heke iho te mahi a Ariki Burghley me te Whare o Ngātahi, nā reira me noho ahau i roto i ngā tōrangapū o nāianei me te mīharo ki tētahi hītori i runga i te pakitara." Ngā toa o te tari Mō te Hēkeretari Whanaketanga Ao Whānui a Andrew Mitchell, he wā hei pana i ngā mahi a tana tari. Among the pieces on display are paintings of Disraeli, Pitt the Elder and the Duke of Wellington. Te āhua nei he paraurehe tōrangapū pea a Tēnā Doketa, engari e whakahē ana a ia. "Koinei ngā pikitia i tīpakohia e au, he tikanga ki a au, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau he tikanga ki te mahi i muri i ngā mahi katoa e mahia ana e te tari whanaketanga ao whānui." Ka whakamāramatia e ia i te rau tau 19 o Disraeli, e whakanuia ana e ia, te āputa i waenganui i te rangatira me te rawakore i Ingarangi, ā, e kī ana e hāngai tonu ana tērā ki te mahi a tana tari ki te mahi i te rawakore puta noa i te ao. Engari kātahi ia ka tohu atu ki tētahi pikitia i runga tonu ake i a Disraeli, o tētahi atu pirimia o te rau tau tekau mā iwa, ehara i te mea noa iho i runga i nga pakitara o nga minita Tūturu. "Kua whakakotahitia e mātou te tari nā te mea i runga ake nei ko Disraeli he whakaahua o tētahi Gladstone tino pākaha, ko ia te toa o te hokohoko koreutu, he mea tino hira mēnā ko ngā wāhi rawakore o te ao e hiki ake ana i a rātau i te rawakore," tana whakamārama. Te āhua nei ka taea e te toi te mahi i ngā take tōrangapū rerekē.

title: Pūngao Pūtea: Ka whakapuakina e te umanga hiko o Aiarangi ki te Raki te utu
summary: Kua noho te Pūngao Pūtea hei tuatahi o ngā kamupene hiko o Aiarangi ki te Raki hei whakapuaki i tētahi whakahekenga utu.
text: Ka whakahekea e ia ngā utu kāinga katoa o nāianei mā te 5% mai i te 10 o Poutāpeta, mā te hoatu i tētahi kiritaki pūnoa he penapena ā-tau e £32. Me ngā kiritaki e 60,000, ko te Pūtea te iti rawa o ngā kamupene hiko, ā, e tohu ana mō te 5% o te mākete. Kua pēhia ngā kamupene pūngao ki te mahi i ngā utu nā te mea kua hinga ngā utu ā-taiao, otirā ko te utu hinu. 'Penapena utu' I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero kamupene: "E koa ana te Pūngao Pūtea ki te whakapuaki nā ngā penapena utu o mua tata nei i roto i te umanga, e hari ana mātou ki te tuku penapena ki ā mātou kiritaki kāinga tīariari, hōu hoki." I whakatūria te umanga o Londonderry i te tau 2011. He kiritaki tōna puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i tētahi mākete hiko e whakahaeretia ana e Power NI. I kī a Aodhan O'Donnell, te rangatira nui o te Kaunihera Kaihoko: "Kātahi anō mātou ka tuhituhi ki ngā kamupene hiko katoa e tono ana ki a rātou kia arotake i ā rātou utu i muri i ngā whakahekenga utu pūngao. " Ka pōhiritia e ngā kiritaki 60,000 o Te Pūngao Pūtea tā rātou whakatau kia whakaheke i ngā utu kāinga katoa o nāianei mā te 5%." I te Hānuere, ka kī te Kaiwhakahaere Taputapu o Aiarangi ki te Raki e arotake ana i ngā utu korohū me ngā utu hiko i runga i te hinganga poupou o ngā utu korohū ā-nui. Heoi anō, ehara te whakataunga a te Pūngao Pūtea i te wāhanga o te arotakenga utu i te mea kāore te umanga i te utu e whakahaeretia ana e te kaiwhakahaere.

title: Ko ngā kāri kōhiko Covid-19 a te tākuta o Brighton e whakamahia ana puta noa i te ao
summary: Ko ngā kāri hiko mamati i waihangatia e tētahi tākuta o Brighton hei āwhina i ngā kaimahi hauora ki te whakawhiti kōrero ki ngā tūroro i a rātou e mau ana i te PPE e whakamahia ana ināianei i ngā whenua e 120.
text: I whai whakaaro a Rachael Grimaldi i muri i tana rongonga i te kore e taea e te tūroro Covid-19 te mārama ki ngā kaimahi mā ngā hīpoki. I waihangatia e ia ngā kāri hei pānui, hei rongo rānei, e hāngai ana i ngā kaupapa mai i te hāhā me te whakamarie ki te tiaki i te mutunga o te ora. Cardmedic koreutu-ki-te-whakamahi, i waihangatia i Aperira, ināianei e 35,000 ngā kaiwhakamahi, ā, e 11,500 ngā tikiake taupānga. I tōna marama tuatahi, ka whakawhānuitia te kaupapa ki ngā whenua e 50, he whika kua neke atu i te rua. I kī a Dr Grimaldi, he tohunga rongoā, kei roto i tētahi rōpū mōrearea tiketike, ā, i whakawhanake i ngā kāri i roto i te raka i a ia e wehe ana i te mahi: "I whakaaro ahau ka tiritiri ahau ki ngā hoa, ā, i tūmanako ahau ka whai take rātou. " Ko te mea kāore au i mōhio ko te whakamutu i te miramira i ngā rerekētanga hauora e pārekareka ana puta noa i te NHS me te ao." I te wā o te raka, i puta mai ngā tāngata mai i ngā papamuri iti i te mate "tōtika" i te coronavirus. I kī a Dr Grimaldi he tokomaha nga tūroro e anga ana ki ngā ārai reo, ahakoa i haere mai rānei i Uropi, i Āhia rānei, kāore rānei i a rātou te reo Ingarihi hei reo tuatahi - he take i kino ake i te PPE. I kī te whaea o te tokotoru, e 36 tau, nāna i mahi i te kaupapa me te tauira tākuta o Scarlett Brandley: "Mā te PPE, ka muffled te oro, ka wera, ka ngenge te tangata, ā, kāore i te tino pai te whakawhitiwhitinga. " He uaua ki ngā kaimahi rongoā te mau, ā, mā ngā ārai whakawhitiwhiti kōrero tāpiri ka ngenge ake. Mā tēnei e ngāwari ake ai mō aua rōpū tūroro." Kua hoahoatia hoki ngā kāri hei āwhina i te turi, i te hauā, i te hunga whai raruraru pānui pukapuka pukapuka me ngā tūroro hinengaro i ngā āhuatanga pēnei i te whiu me te mateware. "I tino miramiratia e te mate urutā te āhua o aua rōpū ki te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero," tana kī. Ināianei kei te haere te mahi ki te whakawhanake i te paetukutuku Cardmedic hei tahuri ki te reo waitohu o Ingarangi me Airani me tētahi hōputu pānui ngāwari. Ā, kei te whakawhanake a Dr Grimaldi i te kaupapa tautoko a te kāwanatanga me te whare wānanga o Brighton, Brighton me Sussex University Hospitals NHS Trust, me Brighton me Sussex Medical School hei whakawhānui i mua i te ngaru tuarua o te coronavirus - me te whakamahi i tua atu i te mate urutā.

title: He pukaemi hokohoko tere rawa a Daft Punk o te tau 2013 i tēnei wā
summary: Ko te pukaemi studio tuawhā a Daft Punk te pūkete hokohoko tere rawa o tēnei tau.
text: Kua hokona e Ngā Pūmahara Āheitanga Matapōkere e 133,000 ngā tārua i te UK e mau ana i a Michael Buble's To Be Loved, arā, ko te tau tuatahi i mua. Kua tautuhia te pukaemi ki te tīmata i te tau tuatahi i tēnei mutunga wiki, ā, kei te hokohoko atu i te toenga o te 10 o runga. Ko te takitahi ārahi Get Lucky, e whakaatu ana i a Pharrell Williams me Nile Rodgers, ko te takitahi hokohoko nui rawa atu o te tau 2013 i tēnei wā. Kua mau i a ia te Toa Thrift a Macklemore & Ryan Lewis e whakaatu ana i a Wanz. Kua hokona e Get Lucky te tata ki te 700,000 mai i te wā i hokona ai i te ono wiki ki mua, e ai ki ngā whika mai i te Kamupene Tūtohi Whaimana. E kī ana te pūhopa kāore rātau i tūmanako kia whiwhi i to rātau riu Get Lucky kia rite ki tērā i mua. I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki a Zane Lowe o Radio 1 ka kī rātau: "He tino rangirua. I whakapūketetia e mātau tēnei pūkete i roto i ngā tau e rima kua taha, ā, kua tino momotu mātau i ērā atu o te ao." Ko te takitahi te tau tuatahi mo te toru wiki e hoko ana i ngā tārua neke atu i te 492,000, ā, ka whati i ngā pūkete roma i Spotify. E kī ana a Daft Punk kāore ā rātou kaupapa ki te tirotiro i te pukaemi hou. Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter

title: I whakatūpato ngā umanga mō te īmēra a te pāhi e tono moni ana
summary: Kei te whakatūpatotia ngā kaimahi o te tari mō ngā īmēra kōrero e puta mai ana i tētahi o ō rātou rangatira, e kī ana ki a rātou kia whakawhiti moni.
text: Nā Kōrero MilliganPersonal Finance reporter Financial Fraud Action UK (FFA UK) i kī tērā tētahi pikinga o te tinihanga i ngā wiki tata nei. He maha ngā kamupene iti, waenga rānei i te UK kua ngaro ngā tapeke i waenganui i te £10,000 me te £20,000. I te nuinga o te wā, ka whiwhi īmēra ngā kaimahi i te tari pūtea o tētahi umanga, e whakapono ana rātou nā tētahi kaiwhakahaere matua. Ka whakamahi ngā tinihanga i ngā pūmanawa motuhake kia puta pono ai te karere. E tono ana ngā īmēra kia utua ngā utu kōhukihuki i waho o ngā hātepe pūnoa, i te nuinga o te wā mō tētahi take pēhi, pēnei i te hiahia kia haumaru i tētahi kirimana. Kua tapaina te tinihanga ko te tinihanga "tohorā", i te mea e ūkui ana i te ika nui o te umanga. Reo Ina whakawhitia te moni, ka haere ki tētahi pūkete i whakatūria e te hunga tinihanga. "Ahakoa he tono kōhukihuki mai i te pāhi ka akiaki i tētahi urupare tere, ko te tikanga he tohu whakatūpato tērā o tētahi tinihanga tūpono," te kī a Keiti Worobec, te tumuaki o FFA UK. title: Nga mōrearea o te rere ma te tūru tūru
summary: Ko te haere hau auau he wāhanga o te mahi a te kaipānui haumarutanga o TE AO - engari i ētahi wā he uaua ake te rere me te tūru tūru i te mea e hiahiatia ana.
text: Nā Frank Gardner, te kaipānui haumarutanga o BBC, I raro i te rangi timatanga pouri, whatitiri hoki, ka kuiti ake te kaihautū i te marangai. I te hinga i roto i ngā rau.
