Ko te taunga rererangi o Phnom Penh i te tau 2008 i āhua kore noa iho i taku tūru tūruhi. "He hipanga ki runga i te waka rererangi," te kī a te kaimahi whenua, "nā reira me pēhea koe e piki ai ki reira?" I tino tūmanako ahau ka whiwhi te waka rererangi i te whakautu ki tērā, engari i te mutunga ka puta mai te rongoā i roto i te āhua o te kaihautū hihiri nā te rere i tēnei waka rererangi turboprop ki Siem Reap me ngā temepara tino pai o Angkor Wat. "Taihoa," tana kī atu me te menemene, "Ka hoatu e au ki a koe te poaka". I tua atu tēnei i te karanga o te mahi, engari i tino whakawhetai ahau i a mātau e kākari ana i to mātau ara, i roto i te kata, i runga i ngā kaupae marangai me ngā peka uira kōauau e rere ana i te rangi pō o Kapotia. Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te haere ki ngā kokonga mamao o te ao me te tūru tūruhi, ka mōhio ahau, tērā pea me waiho e koe te rangatiratanga i te tatau me te whakaae ki tētahi waeine hōhā. Engari me pēhea te mau i tētahi tūru tūru i runga i ngā waka rererangi kua whakaritea ki ngā ūnga nui? Mai i te wā i pūhia ai, a, i mahue i tētahi wāhanga pararaiha i roto i tētahi whakaekenga pūtohu i te tau 2004, me mahi ahau i ētahi whakaritenga nui ki taku haerenga. I te tīmatanga, i muri i te whitu marama i te hōhipera me te 14 pokanga, i hiahiatia e au he hoa i ia rerenga. Ahakoa he rerenga poto mai i Rānana ki Hiniwa, ka mamae taku tuarā. Ināianei ka hoki mai ki te kaha, kāore au e whakaaro ki te kōrero ki ngā kaimahi rererangi me ngā kaimahi whenua he aha te āwhina e mahia ana e au, kāore rānei e hiahiatia e au. "Mēnā kei runga te waka rererangi i te waka rererangi, ka taea e au te wīra ki te tatau," ka kī atu ahau ki a rātou. "Engari ka hiahiatia e au tētahi o aua tūru ara whāiti hei tiki i ahau mai i reira ki taku tūru." Ehara tēnei i te take, engari inā noa nei kāore tētahi waka rererangi ā-motu i whakaae ki te whakarato i tēnei ratonga, i te mea i ngana rātau ki te whakakāhore katoa ki te āwhina i ahau kia tae ki te whare paku i runga i tētahi rerenga e waru haora tāpiri, e tohe ana kia tae tēnei ki ōku hoa pāhihi. I whakatūpato ahau ki a rātau e kore e whakaaetia tēnei - ko te mea e hāngai ana ki ngā ture Rererangi Tūmatanui - ā, kāore pea i te tino mōhio ki te whakamahi i tētahi tangata i roto i te pāpāho pēnei. I ora ahau i te rerenga, i te hākinakina, kātahi ka pāhotia te pūrākau i runga i te hōtaka take kiritaki o te Reo Irirangi 4 o TE Reo Irirangi 4 i reira i tīkina ai e te Mēra i te Rātapu. Ko te hua, kua tāruatia e te waka rererangi ināianei, kua hurihia tana kaupapahere, ki te whakamāmātanga nui o ngā rōpū whakatere hauā e ngana ana mō ngā tau ki te whakaū i a rātou. Nō reira he pēhea te rerekē o te rere me te tūru tūru i te rere ki waho? Ehara i te mea kino katoa. He atawhai, he manawanui, he āwhina hoki te tangata, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka whiwhi koe i tētahi tūnga VIP, e kawea ana ki te upoko o ngā tūtira, he iti noa iho te whakamā. Mēnā he waimarie koe, ka tae koe ki te haere tōmua i mua i ērā atu pāhihi. He rerekē ngā taunga rererangi ina tae mai ki tō tūru, me ētahi e tohe ana ki te here i a koe ki te mea e kīia ana e au ko "tētahi tūru Hannibal Lecter" e whakakorikori ana i ngā ringa me ngā waewae pēnei i te pūāhua o Anthony Hopkins i herea ki roto i te pikitia Silence of the Lambs. I runga i tētahi rerenga Pākehā poto i raro iho i te whā haora, āhua kore nei e homai e ngā waka rererangi he tūru tūru i runga i te papa. Nā reira kāore au e kai i mua, i te wā rānei e rere ana, kāore au e kai i mua, i te wā rānei e rere ana. I tērā pito me tatari koe kia putua te waka rererangi katoa i a koe e ngana ana kia kaua e moemoeā mō... he wharepaku. I tētahi wā, i muri i te rerenga o British Airways mai i Roma, kāore anō kia puta mai te taraka hiki tiketike o te taunga rererangi i Heathrow, ka mahue tonu ahau me taku whānau i runga i te waka rererangi i te haora katoa i muri i te haerenga atu o ētahi atu i te waka rererangi. I to rātau whiwhinga nui, kāore te kāpene me te kaiurungi i whakaae ki te whakarere i a māua, kātahi anō ka mauria ahau ki raro i ngā kaupae i roto i te pouri. I te ata i muri mai ka whiwhi waea whakapāha ahau mai i te Tumuaki Whakahaere o te Mana Taunga Rererangi o Ingarangi, a Hōne Māti. I te nuinga o te wā he ngāwari noa iho te puta ki te kāpeka, ahakoa inā noa nei i Rwanda i pātaitia ahau, me te menemene toa, mehemea kāore au e pai ki te tatari ki waho i raro i tētahi rākau acacia i a rātau e tohu ana i taku uruwhenua i te mea he maha rawa ngā kaupae ki te kāpeka. Kāore au i āwangawanga, engari i whakahē ahau i Berlin i te tirohanga a tētahi atekōkiri waka rererangi ki taku tūru ā-ringa, ka rūrū i tōna māhunga, ka tere atu. E kite ana koe, he pakanga pea te haere tūru tūruhi, engari ko te mea e tino heke iho ana, kua whakamutua e au, he pahekotanga o te āhua me te whakaaro tōmua. Ko te nuinga o ngā waka rererangi me ngā taunga rererangi he tino hari ki te āwhina i ngā kaihaere i roto i ngā tūru tūruhi, engari i ētahi wā ka kore e kite i ngā mea e uaua ake ai te ora ki a tātau, i te nuinga rānei o te wā ka whānako i a tātau i tō tātau rangatiratanga me tō tātau rangatiratanga, pēnei i te kōhua i ngā pāhihi hauā katoa ki roto i tētahi momo "ghetto hauā" taura, te piko rānei ki runga i a mātau me te kōrero tino nui,  pōturi rawa. Koinei ētahi o ngā wā torutoru kua ngaro taku mātao i te taunga rererangi.

title: Ngā pēke kai: 'Tere te piki o te tono' mō ngā mōkihi kai ohorere e kī ana a Tohutohu NI
summary: Tērā te tere o te pikinga o te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i Aiarangi ki te Raki e rapu ana i te urunga ki ngā pēke kai, e ai ki tētahi rōpū tohutohu.
text: I kī te tohutohu NI kua nui ake te maha o ngā pēke kai mai i te rua i te 2011, ki te 14 neke atu rānei i te 2014. E kī ana ko te aroha pēke kai nui rawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki, te Trussell Trust, kua neke atu i te 11,000 ngā mōkihi kai koreutu i tēnei tau. Ko ngā whika e tohu ana i te pikinga o te 489% i te tau ā-pūtea o mua. I kī te rangatira nui o Advice NI, a Bob Stronge, he tokomaha ngā tāngata "kāore he wāhi e toe ana ki te huri". 'Tauhae' "Me tino hiahia koe ki te haere ki tētahi pēke kai," tana kī. "E mārama ana, tērā ētahi tauhae e āpiti ana ki tērā. Kāore te tangata e pīrangi ki te whakawhirinaki ki ngā tohanga, engari ki taku whakaaro ko te āhua o te wāhi e noho ana tātau i runga i te āhuatanga ohaoha e anga atu ana tātau. "He tokomaha ngā ratonga tohutohu e whakatata ana i a rātau e whawhai ana ki te ngaromanga mahi, te haumaru mahi, te rawakore, te hauora hinengaro, ā-tinana rānei, te nama me te maha atu o ngā take e nui ana nā te whakahekenga me ngā tikanga whakawhāititanga." 'Āhuatanga wehi' i kī a Tēnā Stronge kua mahi a Tohutohu NI ki ngā pātai e 270,000 e pā ana ki ngā take haumarutanga pāpori, ā, i kī kua hinga te pūnaha i ngā tāngata. "Neke atu i te 16 ngā whakahaere puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki e tohatoha ana i ngā kai ohorere me ētahi atu taonga i runga i te wā katoa. " Tekau mā whā o ēnei e tohu ana i a rātau anō he pēke kai, ahakoa kei te uru hoki rātou ki te tohatoha i ētahi atu taonga pēnei i ngā kākahu, ngā taonga horoi me ngā taonga. "He āhuatanga wehi tēnei e hiahiatia ana kia mārama, kia whakahuatia hoki."

title: E whakaae ana a Laura Ashley ki te mahi taurewa i te whawhai mo te ora
summary: Kua whiwhi moni whakatārewa a te kaihoko uaua o Laura Ashley hei pūtea i ana mahi o ia rā i muri i te taurangi mo tōna oranga.
text: I kōrero te pātaka ahua me te kāinga ki te pēke o Amerika Wells Fargo mō ngā whakaritenga mō te tātuhi i tētahi pūtea tārewa £20m. Ko ngā hea i roto i a Laura Ashley i piki ake i te 45% i runga i te rongo, e hoki mai ana i te hinganga i te tīmatanga o te wiki. I te Mane, ka kī te umanga he "uaua" te tauhokohoko. I hinga ngā hoko tata ki te 11% i te haurua tuarua o te 2019. E kī ana ko tōna kaipupuri nui, te rōpū Whenua o MUI, i kōrero ki a Wells Fargo mō ngā moni kia haere tonu ai te tauhokohoko. I pā te utu tiri a te kamupene i muri i te kīanga a te umanga kua kite i te hekenga o ngā hokonga o ngā tūemi nui ake, nui ake te utu nui, ā, kua whakaitia ngā taumata moni tāpui kiritaki. Nā tērā i whakaoho he rāhuitanga i te nui o te moni tārewa kei a Wells Fargo. I roto i tētahi whakahōutanga ki te London Stock Exchange, ka kī a Laura Ashley me āhei ia ki te whakamahi i ngā moni hei "whakatutuki i ōna whakaritenga pūtea inamata". Heoi anō, ka kī te rōpū, ko te moni "ehara i te wero moni". Uaua ki te noho hāngai tonu i Tīma 2018, i tohua e Laura Ashley e 40 ngā pātaka mō te katinga, i waenganui i ngā here tauhokohoko uaua i te UK High Street. I hinga te tapeke o nga hokonga roopu 10.8% ki te £109.6m i te haurua tuarua o te 2019. I whakatūria i te tau 1953, he ingoa rongonui a Laura Ashley i te Tiriti Tiketike, ā, ko tētahi o ngā toa kākahu matua o te ao i ngā tau 1970 me 1980. Engari kua uaua ki te noho hāngai, me te utu tiritiri e taka ana i te 90% i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa. I kī te kaitātari hokohoko takitahi, a Teresa Wickham, ko te parani te tuatahi ki te pato ki ngā āhuatanga matua i ētahi tekau tau ki mua, engari "kua ngaro tōna ara". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore he rautaki mārama ina tae mai ki a Laura Ashley - he uaua rawa te mōhio mēnā he taonga, he taputapu kāinga, he toa kākahu rānei. " Me mahi te parani i ētahi mahi hei tāutu ko wai ā rātou kiritaki matua ināianei. Kei te rapu ngā tāngata i ngā hua tūturu, tūturu - nā reira he mākete tūturu hei pato atu."

title: Te Kaunihera o Newcastle-under-Lyme: I takahuri a Labour i waenganui i te hinganga o te haupae pōti
summary: A council leader has resigned as the fallout continues from a row over voting in June's general election.
text: I tū a Elizabeth Shenton hei kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Borough o Newcastle-under-Lyme i muri i te ngaronga o te tautoko a te hunga takitahi. Ināianei kua riro i nga Tohutohu te mana mai i te Mahi. Tata ki te 1,500 ngā tāngata kāore i taea te pōti i tētahi wāhanga i kite i te MP angitu e toa ana mā te 30 pōti noa iho. Tokorua nga kaiwhakahaere kaunihera i whakatārewatia i tērā marama. Ko te rangatira nui o John Sellgren rāua ko Elizabeth Dodd, te upoko o te arotaupū me te pōti, i whakahētia mō ngā take maha. 'Tino rangirua' I tūtaki te kaunihera i te Tūtira ki te kōrerorero i ngā kitenga o tētahi tūhuratanga takitahi ki te pōti a te Association of Electoral Administrators (AEA), nāna i kite i tētahi "pikitia matatini o ngā hē whakahaere huri noa i te rēhitatanga me ngā tukanga pōti poutāpeta". Engari i te haerenga o ngā whakahaere, ka pānuitia e Ms Shenton tana tukunga iho. Ka kī a ia: "Ehara nā te mea e whakaae ana ahau ki tētahi kawenga. " It's highly regrettable that the borough independents have chosen to withdraw their support from the Labour group and that the Tories and their allies have chosen to destabilise the council at a time when senior officers, including the chief executive, are suspended." Kua whakakapia a Ms Shenton e te kaikaunihera Conservative Simon Tagg. "Me tū te hua i runga, ā, i te pō nei. E mōhio ana ahau kei te mahi ahau i tēnei tūranga, ā, ka mutu te hua ki a au," te kī a Tēnā Tagg. "I'll be working hard to ensure that future elections run OK and that we set a budget and that the council gets some standing back." E 21,124 ngā pōti i te pōtitanga i te 8 o Pipiri ki te toa i te tūru o Newcastle-under-Lyme, e pupuri ana i te Conservative Owen Meredith nāna i pōti te 21,094. I kī te AEA kāore i taea te wero i te hua i te mea kua hipa te rā kati 21 rā ki te mahi pēnā. I kitea e tana pūrongo ngā kaipōti tuatahi, tae atu ki ngā ākonga, ngā kaipōti poutāpeta - ko ētahi i roto i ō rātou 80 tau e whakamahi ana i te pūnaha mō te wā tuatahi - kāore i taea te pōti. Tērā tētahi "mahinga kore rawa a ngā kaimahi o te tari pōti kāore i te mōhiotia", ka whakamutua. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Newcastle-Under-Lyme Borough Council

title: Me pēhea te whakarahi i tō pūmahara, e ai ki te pūtaiao
summary: Ka taea e koe te whakarahi i tō pūmahara kia rite ake ki tērā o te toa o te ao, e ai ki ngā kaipūtaiao.
text: Nā Helen BriggsBBC News Scans e whakaatu ana, ahakoa ehara ngā roro o ngā toa pūmahara i te mea motuhake, ka whakaaturia e rātou ngā huringa i roto i te tūhonotanga roro. He aha atu anō, i taea e ngā kaipūtaiao te whakaako i ngā tāngata whai pūkenga pūmahara noa iho ki te hōrite i ngā rangatira. Ka taea e ngā ākonga te maumahara i ngā rārangi ingoa i te wā kotahi, ā, ka whakaatu i ngā tauira tūhonotanga roro ōrite. "Ko te pūmahara pai tētahi mea ka taea e koe te ako, ā, ka taea e koe te whakangungu (mō)," te kī a te kairangahau matua, a Dr Martin Dresler, o te Pokapū Rongoā o te Whare Wānanga o Radboud i Nijmegen, The Netherlands. "A, ki te whakamahi koe i ēnei rautaki pūmahara whakangungu mnemonic rautaki ka tino nui ake tō pūmahara, ahakoa he tino kino tō pūmahara i te tīmatanga." Ko ngā kitenga , i runga anō i ngā karapa roro o ngā toa pūmahara o te ao e 23, ka whakaputaina i roto i te pukapuka pūtaiao, Neuron. Whare pūmahara E hāngai ana rātou ki ngā mnemonics, ngā pūrere pūmahara e āwhina ana i a koe ki te auporo i ngā mōhiohio maha, i te āhua o ngā rārangi. Ko ngā pūkenga ko te loci, ko te whare pūmahara rānei, he tikanga tawhito e haere ai koe i tētahi wāhi e mōhio ana koe, pēnei i tētahi whare, mā te whakamahi i ia tauwāhi hei tohuāki arokite hei penapena mōhiohio. I ako ngā kaipūtaiao i ngā roro o ngā toa pūmahara, e tino pai ana ki te pūmahara i te nui o ngā mōhiohio, mai i te tākaro kāri ki ngā ingoa me ngā kanohi. I karapahia e rātau o rātau roro mā te whakamahi i te atahanga resonance autō taumahinga (fMRI), e ine ana i ngā ngohe roro mā te kite i ngā huringa rerenga toto. Kātahi rātau ka whakataurite i o rātau roro ki ērā o ngā tāngata ōrite te pakeke, he ōrite ō rātou IQ. I kitea e nga kairangahau he rerekētanga māheahea i roto i ngā tauira tūhonotanga puta noa i te maha o ngā rohe roro. Heoi anō, kāore he rohe kotahi i tū atu. "I reira i ako ai mātou ko ngā rerekētanga neurobiological i waenganui i ēnei toa pūmahara karaehe o te ao me ngā kaupapa mana pūnoa, neke atu rānei, he tino whānui, he tuari, he māheahea," te whakamārama a Dr Dresler. Kātahi ka whakaakona e nga kaipūtaiao ngā tāngata whai pūkenga pūmahara noa iho kia kite mēnā ka taea e rātou te whakapai ake. Ko ētahi i whakangungu i ngā pūkenga e whakamahia ana e ngā kaitākaro pūmahara, ko ētahi he whakangungu pūmahara kāore i roto i ngā rautaki mnemonic, engari kāore he whakangungu o te toenga. I muri i te ono wiki o te whakangungu mō te 30 meneti i ia rā, ka karapa roro anō ngā kaupapa. I kite nga kairangahau i te nui o ngā mana pūmahara mō te hunga i hoatu ki te whakangungu e whakamahia ana e ngā kaitākaro pūmahara. I haere rātau mai i te auporo i te toharite o te 26 ki te 30 kupu mai i tētahi rārangi 72 ki te maumahara neke atu i te 60. I whakaaturia hoki e tēnei rōpū ngā huringa i roto i te tūhonotanga roro. "I tētahi āhuatanga e tino whakawhanake ana rātau i ngā tauira roro e whakamahara ana ki a mātau ki ērā o ngā kaitākaro pūmahara," te kī a Dr Dresler. "Te āhua nei ko tēnei tauira tauwhāiti i roto i te tūhonotanga roro te pūtake neurobiological o ēnei mahinga pūmahara nui ake, tiketike hoki." Ko ngā tikanga tawhito i karapahia e te kaipūtaiao Neuroscientist Dr Boris Nikolai Konrad tōna ake roro mō te rangahau, ā, i whakaakona ngā tauhou. E rua ngā pūkete o te ao mō te pūmahara i ngā rau kupu, me ngā ingoa me ngā kanohi, i roto i te wā poto, ā, kua whakarārangitia hoki ki te Pukapuka Pukapuka o te Ao o Guinness. Ahakoa tēnei, e kī ana a ia kāore a ia i whānau mai me ngā pūkenga pūmahara tino pai. "I te kura, tata tonu ahau ki te hinga nā te mea kāore au i maumahara ki ngā kupu Ingarihi," tana kī atu ki a BBC News. "He roa te wā ka mōhio ahau he mea e āwhina ana i ahau ki te pūmahara, otirā ko ēnei pūkenga pūmahara. " I really love sharing this idea that you can improve your memory because I still don't know why we don't teach this to kids, to people, much more, because in my opinion it is really useful." I kī a Prof Michael Etaka o te tari pūtaiao i te Whare Wānanga o Kemipiri, kāore i te tūhono ki te rangahau, kua mōhio mātau ki te mana o aua tikanga mai i te wā o nga Kariki onamata. "Kāore anō a Dresler rāua ko Konrad kia whakaahua i te ngāwari o te whakangungu i tēnei āheinga pūmahara tiketike, engari kua mahia hoki e ia te hipanga hira o te tāutu i ngā huringa i roto i te roro e haere tahi ana," tana kī. Engari i kī a ia ka rāhuitia pea ngā painga o te whakangungu ki ngā take e mōhio ai te tangata ki te whakamahi i te rautaki whakangungu. Nā reira, "ka kitea tonutia mēnā ka pā te tangata ki ngā whakapainga huri noa i te pūmahara o ia rā". Whāia a Helen i Twitter.

title: Ngā āhuatanga hangarau 2020: Ngā mata ātea hōu me ngā mata piko
summary: Mēnā ko tō hiahia kia rere ki te mokowā - ā, he nui ō moni tāpui - tērā pea he tau mīharo te 2020.
text: Nā Ben MorrisHangarau o te ētita Pakihi Mēnā ehara te haere ātea i tō mea, engari kei te hiahia koe ki tētahi mata nui ake i tō waea pūkoro, tērā pea ka whai hangarau anō te 2020 māu. Engari ki te whakaaro koe he maha rawa ngā waea kei reira, ā, me iti iho te moumou o te umanga hangarau, tērā pea ka mau ētahi kamupene hangarau ki ō whakaaro. Anei tētahi whakamātau iti o ngā mea e haere mai ana i roto i ngā marama tekau mā rua e whai ake nei. Ko ngā mahi ātea kaimahi 2020 he "tau kaurori" mō te haere ātea, e ai ki a Guy Norris, he kaiwhakatika matua i te Wiki Rererangi & Hangarau Mokowā. Mai i te wā i haere ai a NASA i te Waka Mokowā i te tau 2011, kua whakawhirinaki te US ki te waka ātea o Rūhia ki te kawe i ngā kaiāwhina ki te Teihana Mokowā Ao Whānui. Tērā pea ka rerekē tēnā i te tau 2020, mēnā ka haere katoa ki te kaupapa, me tīmata e rua ngā waka ātea i hangaia e te US ki te kawe kaimahi. Ko te CST-100 Starliner a Boeing, e āhei ana ki te kawe atu ki ngā kaiāwhina e whitu ki te āwhiotanga, mō tana rere whakamātautau tuatahi i tēnei rā i mua i te rerenga tuatahi o te tangata, tērā pea i te tau 2020. Ināianei ka puta te capsule SpaceX Dragon i ētahi whakamātautau whakamutunga i te tōmua o te tau 2020, ā, ki te pai te haere o te katoa, ka rite hoki mō tētahi mahi kaimahi. Ko ētahi atu pūnaha, i hoahoatia kia tae ki te mokowā tata ki te Ao, ka taea hoki te tae ki ngā tohu i te tau 2020. Tērā pea ka rite a Blue Origin, nā te kairau o Amazon, a Te Piriona o Amazon, ki te mau tūruhi i runga i tana tākirirangi ā-roto o New Shepard. Ka rite hoki a Virgin Galactic i te tau 2020 ki te kawe i ngā pāhihi ki te mokowā, neke atu i te tekau tau i muri mai i te tūmanako tuatahi a te kaiwhakarewa o Richard Branson. E pūrongotia ana neke atu i te 600 ngā tāngata kua whakatakotoria he moni mō tētahi rerenga Virgin Galactic, me ngā tīkiti e utu ana i te $250,000 (£195,000). "It's finally delivery time for a lot of these long promised programmes and a chance for a whole range of technologies to really prove themselves for the first time," says Mr Norris. He nui ake te Hangarau Pakihi me te taiao Protests by Extinction Rebellion i āwhina ki te neke i te huringa āhuarangi ki runga i te rārangi take mō ngā kamupene hangarau. I waenganui i ērā e pēhia ana ko ngā kaihanga waea pūkoro. E whakaarohia ana e 18 miriona ngā waea e takoto ana kāore i whakamahia puta noa i te ao. Neke atu i te 1.3 miriona ngā waea i hokona i te 2019, kei te tipu haere taua tau i ngā wā katoa. Ka pēhia ngā kaihanga waea pūkoro kia kākāriki ake ai ā rātou tukanga whakanao, kia ngāwari ake ai te tapi i ā rātou waea. Ka pēnei anō mō ngā kaihanga o ētahi atu taonga kaihoko tae atu ki ngā pouaka whakaata, ngā mīhini horoi me ngā horoi horoi. Mātakitaki hoki i ngā kamupene e whakarato ana i ngā ratonga waea pūkoro. Kua kī taurangi kētia e Tiwhione i te UK i te tau 2023 ka whakahaere katoa ōna whatunga i runga i ngā pūtake pūngao tautoko. Tērā pea ka whai ētahi atu. Kei raro hoki te haere pakihi i te pēhanga. E kī ana a Ben Wood, tētahi kaitātari i CCS Insight ka "kore e whakaaetia e te pāpori" te rere huri noa i te ao mō ngā hui me ngā kamupene ka whakawhiti ki ngā hui mariko. Tērā anō pea ētahi mahi kākāriki mai i te umanga rorohiko kapua. Ko ā rātou pūkenga e noho ana i ngā tūmau rorohiko e hia mano e whakamahi ana i te nui o te hiko. Kāore i ngāwari te haere o ngā whakaaturanga ngāwari i te whakarewatanga o te waea kōpaki tuatahi a Samsung i Aperira. He tokomaha nga kaiarotake i whati i ngā mata, ā, i tere tonu te whakapai ake a te kamupene i mua i te hokona i te wā o Mahuru. He angitu ake te whakarewatanga o Motorola o tana Razr hou, ahakoa i amuamu ētahi kaiarotake mo te utu. Engari kāore tēnei e pupuri i te mākete. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakarewaina e Samsung ētahi atu pūrere me ngā whakaaturanga ngāwari a tērā tau - tērā pea he paparorohiko. Kua kī taurangi hoki a TCL, te kaihanga tuarua nui rawa o ngā pouaka whakaata i Haina, ki te whakarewa i tana pūrere kōpaki pūkoro tuatahi i te tau 2020, ā, ka tere tonu ētahi atu hua i muri i tērā. Kei te tūtohu nui i runga i te mākete, kua haumi i te $5.5bn ki te whakawhanake i ngā whakaaturanga ngāwari. E kī ana ngā kaitirotiro ka whakaurua ngā mata ki ngā momo mata katoa. Tērā pea he whakaaturanga tākai tā ngā tukuoro atamai, ka whai here ngā pūrere pēnei i te mātakitaki me ngā whakaaturanga, ā, he mata nui pea ngā tatau pākatio. Ka taea e tātau te tūmanako kia haere tonu te whakawhiti o ngā whatunga waea pūkoro tere rawa. I te mutunga o te tau 2019, neke atu i te 40 ngā whatunga i ngā whenua e 22 e tuku ana i te ratonga 5G. I te mutunga o te tau 2020 ka neke atu i te rua taua tau ki ngā tohutūmahi 125, e kī ana a Kester Mann i CCS Insight. "Tērā pea he whanaketanga hira i te āhua o te utu o ngā kirimana 5G. Ko te kirimana 5G me te kore waea ka utu huri noa i te £30 i te marama, ā, mō tēnā ka whiwhi koe i te nui o ngā raraunga mutunga kore." Engari e kī ana ngā kaitirotiro, a tērā tau ka kite pea mātou i ngā utu i runga anō i te tere o te ratonga e hiahia ana koe - he āhua rite ki te āhua o te aunui kāinga. Kei te tuku kē a Tiwhione i ngā kirimana i runga anō i te tere i te UK. I te UK hoki, tērā pea ka pana te whatunga 3 i tana whakahere 5G hei whirinoa ki te aunui i te kāinga, e kī ana te kaitirotiro. Tērā pea ka pīrangi tērā ki ngā tāngata e neke haere ana - ngā ākonga hei tauira - ā, kāore e hiahia ana ki tētahi ratonga raina pūmau. Ko te rorohiko quantum a tērā tau he mea nui anō mō te rorohiko quantum; Ko te hangarau e pokanoa ana i te whanonga pōauau, engari he kaha o ngā korakora iti pēnei i ngā irahiko me ngā whakaahua? I te wā o Whiringahora ka kī a Google kua mahia e tana rorohiko quantum tētahi tūmahi i roto i te 200 hēkona, e 10,000 tau te roa o te rorohiko tino tere ki te whakaoti. Tērā ētahi kōrero mo tōna whakatutukitanga, engari e kī ana ngā tohunga he wā nui tērā. "He tohu tino pai tēnei," te kī a Philipp Gerbert, he mema o te rōpū hangarau hōhonu i te umanga tohutohu BCG: "E mārama ana kua hipa atu rātau i te rorohiko puāwai, he aha te tawhē ka taea e koe te taupatupatu. I whakakāhoretia e rātau ētahi rangirua roa." E whakaaro ana a Tēnā Gerbert ki ētahi atu kaiārahi i te papa tākaro - IBM, Rigetti me IonQ - ka taea hoki te whakawātea i taua taiapa: "He tīma tino pai rawa atu ō rātou katoa, ka tae tētahi, tokorua rānei ki tētahi wāhanga ōrite i tērā tau." Ina whakamātauria te hangarau, ka taea e ngā rorohiko quantum te akiaki i ngā hua i roto i te matu, ngā rongoā me te pūkaha. Kua kī taurangi hoki a Google kia whakawātea i tana rorohiko quantum hei whakamahi mā ngā tauhou i te tau 2020, engari kāore anō kia homai ētahi taipitopito. "Clearly people would love to get access to that," Mr Gerbert says.

title: I hereheretia a Rawiri Gilroy mo te kōhuru i te whaiāipo o mua, a Suzanne Pilley
summary: Kua whiua tētahi tangata o Etinitini nāna i patu tētahi hoa mahi i muri i tana whakamutu i ta rātau take kia ora i roto i te whare herehere.
text: Me mahi a Rawiri Gilroy, e 49, i te iti rawa o te 18 tau i roto i te whare herehere mo te patu i te kaipupuri pukapuka 38 tau, o Suzanne Pilley. I kitea he hara a Gilroy, he tangata mārena, i te kōhurutanga o tana whaiāipo o mua i tērā marama. I whakakāhore a ia i te whakapae. I whakaohotia e Ms Pilley tētahi kimi nui i a ia e ngaro ana i Me 2010. I haere a ia ki te mahi i Etinitini, engari kore rawa i tae ki tana tēpu. E whakapono ana nga kaiwhakawa i patua ia e Gilroy i te papa o te whare i mahi ai rātau i Thistle Street, a, ka tanumia ia i te rā a muri ake, neke atu i te 100 maire te mamao i roto i nga ngahere o Argyll. I te putanga o te rerenga, ka kī a Ariki Bracadale ko Gilroy anake te tangata i mōhio ki te wāhi o te tinana o Ms Pilley, kāore anō kia kitea. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka tae mai te rā i roto i tō oranga e āhei ana koe ki te whakaatu i taua mōhiohio, ā, tērā pea ka kawea mai he whakamarie ki tōna whānau mate, otirā ko tōna whaea me tōna pāpā, i muri i te whakaaturanga, ka noho mārire i roto i te rangatiratanga puta noa i te toenga o te whakamātautau," tana kī. I kī a ia kāore te whakaaturanga i tohu ki a Gilroy e tatari ana ki a Ms Pilley, e hiahia ana ki te whakamate i a ia. Ka kī a ia: "I whakaaturia e te whakaaturanga, i te tūtakitanga ki a ia mo tana whakatau kia whakamutua te pātahitanga, ka ngaro tō riri, a, ka patua ia i roto i tētahi whakaekenga tautoko." I kōrero anō a Ariki Bracadale mo te "marino tino mātao" i whakaritea ai e Gilroy ki te whakawātea i te tinana. Tērā te hamama o te "pirau" me te "mate" i te taiwhanga tūmatanui, me te tonoa a Gilroy kia "kōrero mai ki a mātau kei hea ia" i a ia e arahina atu ana. Kaore a Gilroy i whakaatu i te ngākau i a ia e whiua ana. Kāore tana wahine, a Andrea Gilroy, i te kōti, engari ko tōna pāpā me tōna tuakana i te taiwhanga. I roto i tētahi nekehanga āhua kore, i whakaahuatia te whiu i te Kōti Tiketike i Etinitini kia pāohotia i taua rā kotahi. Kua kī atu te pāpā o Ms Pilley, a Rob Pilley, ki a BBC Scotland kua tangohia e te whakapae o tana kaipatu he "kawenga taumaha" i ōna pakihiwi. I tukuna e te whānau tētahi kōrero i muri i te whiu, e kī ana: "E whakangāwari ana mātou kua mutu te tukanga ture, ā, ka whakamarie mātou ki te mōhio kua oti te tika mō Suzanne. " Hei whānau ka ngana tonu mātou ki te neke atu, engari e kore rawa mātou e āhei ki te okioki katoa kia mōhio rā anō mātou kei hea tā māua tamāhine. "Suzanne is sorely missed by everyone who knew her, and we would like to say once again how grateful we are for all the support we've had from her friends and colleagues in the past two years." I kī a Det Supt Gary Flannigan: "E mōhio ana ahau ki te rerenga o tēnei rā, engari kotahi anō o mātau whakaaro e tino nui ana ki te whānau o Suzanne, e haere tonu ana te whakamatautau. " Kotahi anake te tangata e mōhio ana kei hea a Suzanne, ā, ka taea e ia te whakamutu i te rangirua mō tōna whānau me ōna hoa katoa. "Ka tāruatia anō e au kei te mau tonu ngā Pirihimana o Lothian me ngā Taitapa ki te whai i ngā mōhiohio hōu e puta mai ana ki te mārama e āwhina ana ki te whakaora i a Suzanne." I rongo te whakawā i te pātahitanga hūkere i waenganui i a Gilroy rāua ko Ms Pilley, nāna i kite i tētahi atu i ngā rā i mua i tōna ngarotanga. I whakaahuatia a Gilroy i te kōti he whai rawa, he māminga. Neke atu i te 400 ngā kuputuhi i tukuna e ia ki a ia i te marama i mua i tana ngarotanga, engari ka mutu ēnei i tana ngarotanga. I te rā i muri i te ngarotanga o Ms Pilley, ka taraiwa a Gilroy mai i Etinitini ki Lochgilphead. I kitea e nga pirihimana e rua haora roa ake tana tae atu ki reira i te wā toharite, ā, he roa kē atu te haerenga whakahoki. I mōhio ngā āpiha kua peia e ia tana motokā i te huarahi i taua rā, a, i kitea he tapahi me ngā ururua i runga i ōna ringa me ōna kanohi. E whā tau i mārena ai a Suzanne Pilley ki te tāne o mua, a Pita Durrand. I mārena rāua i Las Vegas i Me 2004 i mua i te whakarerekētanga i te tau 2008. He rongonui a Rawiri Gilroy ki te whakanui i ana mahi hōia. I mahi a ia hei kaipūkaha i roto i te Royal Navy. Suzanne Pilley: Ka whakaaturia te Wahine i Ngaro i runga i te BBC One Scotland i te Wenerei 18 o Āperira i te 22:45.

title: Wrightbus: Ka whakaūngia e te kaipāngai NI a Darren Donnelly te tono
summary: Kua whakaūngia e te kaipāngai o Aiarangi ki te Raki o Aotearoa e ngana ana ia ki te hoko i te kaiwhakanao pahi o Ballymena, o Wrightbus.
text: Nā John CampbellBBC News NI Economics & Business Editor Kei te hokona te umanga pahi i waenganui i ngā raruraru pūtea. I kī tētahi kōrero mō Tēnā Donnelly e haere tonu ana ngā kōrero ki te kamupene. He kaitukumahi nui a Wrightbus, tata ki te 1,400 ngā kaimahi i Aiarangi ki te Raki. I te tau 2016, i hokona e Tēnā Donnelly rāua ko tōna pāpā ta rāua umanga matua, SDC Trailers, mō te tata ki te £100m. I whakaūngia e Wrightbus i a Hōngongoi e rapu ana i tētahi kaiwhakangao i a ia e anga ana ki ngā raruraru moni moni. I whakapārewa te whakahaere ki ngā kaimahi e kī ana kua "mārire" ngā rongo ki te pāpāho. E whakaatu ana ngā pūkete hōu rawa i te hua tāke tōmua o te £5m i runga i te hurihanga neke atu i te £181m i te 2017. Engari kua heke tōna āhuatanga pūtea mai i taua wā. E rua ngā whakatata whakahōutanga i tērā tau me ngā mahi e 95 e haere ana i te wā o Hui tanguru me Pipiri - e kī ana e whakaatu ana i ngā taumata iti tonu o te tono mō ngā pahi hou i te mākete o UK. I taua wā e kī ana tēnei e whakaatu ana i ngā taumata iti tonu o te tono mō ngā pahi hou i te mākete o UK.

title: E rima nga whakaata mo te mate kaiheke o Uropi
summary: Kei Berlin ahau e pūrongo ana mō Newsnight i tēnei wā mo te raruraru e pā ana ki Uropi. Anei ētahi o ngā take whānui ake e whakaaro ana ahau e tika ana kia whakaarohia. Kei te rapu te tangata i tētahi oranga pai ake
text: Mark UrbanDiplomatic and defence editor, BBC Newsnight Ngā tohenga mō ngā ingoa - "heke" me te "rerenga" hei tauira - waiho te matatinitanga o te whakahau a te tini o te iwi. I a ia e kōrero ana ki a Faris, he Hiriani nō Aropo, i te pokapū kaiwhiwhi rerenga o Perewa, e mārama ana kei te mawhiti a ia i tētahi pakanga kino. Engari i taku pātai atu ki a ia he aha tana whakaaro mō tētahi pūnaha mōrahi o te Uniana o Ūropi e hiahia ana pea kia neke atu ia ki Pōrana, ki UK rānei, ka tohe a ia, "E hiahia ana ahau ki te noho ki Tiamana," i tāpiritia tēnei nā te kounga o te mātauranga e wātea ana. Ina noho a ia, ka tono a Faris ki tana wahine me ana tamariki. Ko te tautohe o nāianei i roto i te EU mō ngā ture e kiia nei ko "Dublin 2" ka whakahokia tātau ki te rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku (hunga whakaruru rānei i tēnei horopaki) me ētahi atu. E kī ana ngā ture kia rapu whakangungu ngā tāngata e rere ana i te whakatoinga, i te pakanga rānei i te whenua EU tuatahi ka tae atu rātau. I te raruraru o nāianei, ko Kariki, ko Itari rānei tēnei, engari e mārama ana kāore he tokomaha e hiahia ana ki te noho ki reira. Na ngā whakamāramatanga ngāwari o ngā ture o Dublin 2, kāore i te nui te taupatupatu - ko te hunga e whakamutu ana i ngā wāhi pēnei i te pokapū rerenga o Berlin he kaiheke mai i te mea kua whakawhiti rātau i ētahi atu whenua EU kia tae atu ki reira. Ka tīmata te rapunga i tētahi oranga pai ake ki te haumarutanga ā-tinana - engari mō te tokomaha e herea ana hoki ki ngā pātai wātea. Ko te hara anake e mau ana i a koe i tēnei wā, ko tētahi atu tautohe auau e pā ana ki te waeine e haepapa ana ngā whenua o Ūropi ki te waihanga i tēnei raruraru. Tērā tonu tētahi take hei whakautu i te take o te hurihanga a NATO i te kāwanatanga o Rūhia o Kānara Pākia, nāna i tango nga taunahua ki te iwi e whakawhiti ana i te Māuirangi mai i reira. E kī ana, kāore tēnei hara i te hāngai ki tērā atu ara hekenga (me te nui ake) puta noa i Tākehi me ngā Balkana ki Tiamana, Ateria me Huitene. Ko ētahi i kōwhiri ki te whakapae i te Uru mo te kore e uru atu (e whakaputa ana i te rere nui rawa o te hunga whakaruru, mai i Hiria), ko ētahi mō te uru atu (i Awhekenetāna, Iraki me Ripia). I te take o ētahi o ētahi atu rōpū nui i roto i te raruraru o nāianei (Eritrea, ngā Rīria rānei hei tauira) he tino kore noa iho te take o te raweke ki te Uru, ki te raweke rānei. E kōrero ana ngā kaitōrangapū me ngā tohunga mō ngā take "pana" me te "kume" i roto i ēnei nekenekehanga a te iwi. Ko te pakanga, te makitaunu rānei e pana ana, ko te wātea i ngā whenua ki te uru e whakarato ana i te kume. Tērā anō ētahi atu kume. I kī atu a Moameta, he Hiriani i tūtaki ahau i tētahi puni Tākehi i ngā marama maha ki mua, ka ngana a ia ki te tae ki Ingarangi - nā te mea he tuakana kē tōna i Pākehā. Tirohia ngā wāhiwera i roto i tēnei raruraru, ā, ka kite koe i ētahi whenua o Ūropi, pēnei i Hakari, e uru ana ki ngā uauatanga nui, ā, ko ētahi e āhua nei kāore i te whakaurua. Hei tauira, tērā pea i nui ake te whakaaro o Koroātia, me Ruānia i roto i tēnei, engari mō ngā take maha kāore i te mōhiotia. Mā te papawhenua, ngā whakahaere visa, me te mea ehara rātou i te mema o te rōpū Rōpū (me te ngaro o ngā mana taitapa whakamua) ka iti iho te hiahia o Koroātia, Ruānia rānei ki te haere, ki te rapu whakangungu rānei, ahakoa he mema EU rātou. Ko te mea, ko ngā tono whakangungu mai i ngā Hiriani he torutoru noa iho te mano i aua whenua e rua i whakakotahitia. Ka pā ngā take hangai ki Hakari, otirā i tōna hiahia hei wāhi tāurunga ki Rōpū. I ētahi whenua (tae atu ki Kariki me Hēpia) te āhua nei kua whakatauria e nga kāhui kia noho mania tonu, ā, ka rēreti noa iho te hunga whakaruru i roto i a rātou, ehara ēnei rerenga i te raruraru nui. Ko te mea ka taea e rātau te whakarato i tētahi wāhi whiwhi iti mō te āhua o te whakahaerenga o te rohe. Kei te whiwhi katoa ngā kai, te nohoanga, me te waka - tae atu ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāngata. He maha ngā whenua e manawapa ana ki te whakamau i ngā mana uaua ake nā te mea ko te tikanga pea o te tekau, o ngā rau mano rānei o ngā tāngata rewa e tere ana te whakaemi i runga i tō rātou rohe. Kāore rātau e pīrangi kia 'piripiri' i tēnā āhuatanga. I te mōhiotanga he tokomaha e haere ana ki Tiamana, ka kī te pirimia o Hakaria i tēnei wiki e rāhuitia ana e ia te mana ki te pupuri i ngā kaiheke ki waho o tōna whenua, kaua e tū i reira, kia whakamahia rānei hei huarahi kāore i te aukati. Nā tēnei i whiwhi ai ia i te nui o te tautohetohe ki rāwāhi, engari he pai ki te kī atu ko tēnei whakaaro e whakaatu ana i ngā āhuatanga o te tokomaha o ngā kāwanatanga o Ūropi ki te tonga, ki te rāwhiti hoki e ātete ana i ngā tohatoha EU kia nui ake ngā tāngata. Te Ara o te Ātete Iti Rawa Ki te titiro ki ngā ara e rere ana te tangata i roto i tēnei raruraru, e mārama ana ka whai te nuinga nui rawa i te ara o te ātete iti rawa. I kōrero mai tētahi kaipānui Tiamana ki a au, "Kāore i a mātau te rangatiratanga o te Hongere Ingarihi." Ko te papawhenua, te mōrea, me te manawanui whai mana ki te āwhina, kua whakawhāititia katoatia te tono a Ingarangi, e pupuri ana i ngā tau ki raro - ki te pai o Downing Street. Ko ngā hoa noho tata katoa o Tiamana kei Schengen. Ko te peke i runga i te tereina taonga i roto i te kauhanga o te Hongere, he kēmu taitama hoki - ehara i te ara mō ngā kuia, pēpi rānei. He rerekē, i kite taku kaiwhakanao i ngā Hiriani i ngā wiki e rua ki muri i Hakari e utu ana i ngā tīkiti hei kawe i ngā whānau ki ngā ūnga Tiamana o tā rātou kōwhiringa. Ki te huatau kāore e taea e ngā kāwanatanga visa me te papawhenua (tae atu ki tērā i whakakētia e ngā taunahua i hangaia e te tangata) te whakarerekē i te āhuatanga, e whakapoke ana i te kitenga māmā ki te wāhi e haere ana, kāore rānei te tangata. Ko ngā Kōwhiringa Uaua e Takoto Ana ki Mua i tētahi tohatoha EU hōu hei tohatoha i ngā hunga whakaruru e 120,000 (ā muri ake mai i Itari me Kariki) ka homai he rongoā mo te wā poto. Ko te tātauira i nga taupatupatu i Tiamana ahakoa he iti noa iho te rangirua ki te tō ā-papa o tēnei raruraru. E kōrero ana te tangata mō te 800,000 e tae mai ana i tēnei tau me tērā tau. Kua huatau kētia e te Tumuaki o Hēnea Tūturu ko tētahi o ngā whakamātautau tino nui ki Uropi mai i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. He pono, tērā pea kei te tipu kē tēnei āhuatanga hei whakamātautau hōhonu ake mō Uropi me ōna mātāpono uho i ngā mamae o Kariki ki te Ūropi, ki te whakaritenga anō rānei a Ingarangi. Kai te nui haere mai te pēhanga o te whakaaetanga a Rōpū, pērā ki te ture o Tapiri 2 mo nga kaiwhaiwhai. Tērā pea he wehenga tūhāhā te whakatau a Hakari ki te whati i ngā kapa, ka tohu rānei i te huarahi ki te whakanui ake i te wehenga i waenganui i ngā mema tawhito me ngā mema hou o te EU. I te wā e haere tonu ana ngā tautohetohe mo te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te mahi i tēnei, ka whakamātauria ngā momo tikanga katoa mai i te nekehanga koreutu ki te pōti nui i te pēhanga kaingākau e pana ana i ngā kaiārahi ki tētahi pā o Uropi.

title: Emma Stone: I tīmata ahau ki te haumanu mō te māharahara i te whitu o aku tau
summary: Kua whakaaturia e Emma Stone i tīmataria e ia te haumanu mo te māharahara i a ia e whitu tau te pakeke.
text: I roto i tētahi uiuinga i te The Late Show With Stephen Colbert, ka kōrero a ia mō ngā whakaekenga ohorere me te noho hei "tamaiti māharahara". I mauria mai e Pōhatu, e 28, tētahi tātuhi i mahia e ia i roto i te haumanu i te iwa o ona tau, a, ka kōrero he pēhea te mahi i āwhina ai i a ia kia iti iho te māharahara. "Kei te māharahara tonu ahau tae noa ki tēnei rā, engari ehara i te whakaekenga ohorere," tana kī. Ko te kaiwhakaari, e whetū ana i roto i tana pikitia e tū mai nei ko Battle of the Sexes - mō te whakataetae tēnehi o te tau 1973 i waenganui i ngā toa o Billie Jean King me Bobby Riggs - kua kōrero mō te māharahara i mua. I a ia e tamariki ana, i whakapono ia e kore e taea e ia te wehe atu i tōna kāinga tupu o Arizona, engari i te 15 o ona tau ka taea e ia te neke ki Hollywood. I whakamāramatia e ia tana tātuhi, e kī ana: "Nō reira e iwa ahau, ā, i roto i te haumanu i taua wā, ko ahau tēnei e māharahara ana, he taniwha kākāriki iti. " He tamaiti tino māharahara ahau, ā, he nui aku whakaekenga ohorere. I whai hua nui ahau i te haumanu - i tīmataria e au i te whitu. "He nui te āwhina i a au e te mahi me te whakapaipai." Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i kōrero ai a Stone mō ōna raruraru ki te māharahara; he wāhanga ia o tētahi whakahau me te aroha o Child Mind Institute i Me. I roto i tētahi ataata i hangaia mō tētahi whakahau aroha, ka kī a ia: "Ka haere te ora i roto i ngā wāhanga, ā, he mea tonu tērā i noho tahi ai ahau, ā, ka mura ake i ngā huarahi nui i ngā wā rerekē i roto i tōku oranga. " But sometimes when it's happening, when I'm in a phase of real turmoil or the anxiety is very strong, it feels like the anxiety is never going to end, and it does." E kī ana a Stone ināianei e noho ana ia i tētahi oranga whārite ake nā te mea kua whakahaeretia e ia tōna māharahara ki "ngā kaihaumanu nui me ngā utauta whanonga hinengaro nui". Ko ngā tāngata rongonui kua kōrero mō tō rātou māharahara Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko Apikaira Breslin hei whetū i roto i te hanga hou o te pouaka whakaata Kanikani Paru
summary: Me hanga anō te whitiāhua tauhira o te tau 1987 Dirty Dancing mō te pouaka whakaata, e te whatunga US ABC.
text: Ko te kaiwhakaari i whakatauria e Oscar, ko Abigail Breslin, nāna i rongonui i Little Miss Sunshine, ā, i tēnei wā e whetū ana i roto i te whakaaturanga kōrero wehi o Scream Queens, ka tākaro i te tūranga matua o Baby Houseman. Ka whakahaeretia te urutaunga e toru haora e Wayne Kōkā, te Ahitereiria i muri i te pikitia 2012 The Sapphires. Kāore anō kia whakapūtātia tētahi rā rererangi, ā, kāore anō kia pānuitia ētahi atu mema o te kaihautū. I tautuhia i te raumati o te tau 1963, ko te Kanikani Paru te pūrākau aroha waiata me te kanikani mō Pēpi 17 tau, i tākarotia tuatahitia e Te Wānanga Grey, e taka ana ki tana kaiako kanikani mahi, a Hōne Castle - i tākarotia e Patrick Swayze. Nā taua tūranga i āwhina a Swayze ki te kopere ki te whetū, ā, i kite hoki i a ia e hopu ana i te waiata She's Like the Wind mō te whakaaturanga o te pikitia. Ko Eleanor Bergstein, nāna i tuhi te whakaaturanga mō te whitiāhua taketake, ā, i muri hoki i te pūoro Dirty Dancing angitu, kei runga i te papa mō te urutaunga mata iti kia hangaia e Lionsgate TV. I mua i te tau 2011, i pānuitia e Lionsgate ngā mahere hei hanga anō i te pikitia mō te mata nui, me Kenny Ortega - nāna i kōrero te pūoro taketake, i whakahaere hoki i te Pūoro Kura Tuarua - i te urunga.

title: Star Wars: Ka hinga ngā tau kaiohauru o te Whenua Tawhito
summary: Kua kitea e te kēmu ataata tuihono "Star Wars: The Old Republic" te 25% o ngā kaiohauru, e ai ki tōna kaiwhakaputa Electronic Arts (EA).
text: I whakaaturia e te umanga e 1.3 miriona ngā kaiohauru hohe o te taitara i te mutunga o Aperira, i whakaritea ki te "iti ake" 1.7 miriona i te Hui tanguru. I kī te kamupene ā-US he "ōrite" te whika ki ōna matapae taketake. Heoi anō, i hinga ngā hea a EA ki te 10% i muri i te tauhokohoko haora. Ko te Star Wars MMORPG te pūtea penapena nui rawa a EA ki tēnei wā. Ko te whakataka i roto i ngā kaiohauru ahakoa te whakapiki a EA i te nui e whakapau ana i te mākete me te whakarewatanga o te kēmu i Ahitereiria, Aotearoa, Hongipua me Hōroa i te tīmatanga o Poutāpeta. I tūmanakohia he hinganga o te maha o ngā kaiohauru, engari i mīharo ētahi kaitirotiro i te rahi o te whakapeka. I kī atu a Pita Moore ki ngā kaitirotiro "he wāhanga nui o te hekenga nā ngā kaitākaro wairangi, whakamātautau hoki i te ōrautanga katoa o ngā kaiohauru utu," e ai ki tētahi tuhinga i whakaratoa e te pae rongokōrero pūtea Seeking Alpha . I kitea e te umanga he maha ngā mea e kīia ana e ia ko ngā kiritaki wairangi kua taka i te wā ki te whakahōu i tā rātou ohaurunga ā-marama. I tāpiritia kua whakaritea he ihirangi hōu tae atu ki ngā whakawhānuitanga rohe hei āwhina ki te pupuri i "tētahi pūtake mārō" huri noa i tōna taumata ohaurunga o nāianei. I tāpiritia e te rangatira nui, a John Riccitiello, ko te taitara tētahi o ngā taitara 10 o runga o tana kamupene, engari ehara i te rima o runga, he taitara whai hua. "He kaitāpae pakihi, ahakoa he mea hira, ehara i te mea hira ki te Mētara Whakahonore, ki te Kauhanga Riri rānei, ki te WHK rānei, ki Madden, ki te Sims, SimCity rānei," tana kī, kāore a ia i whakapono ki te kēmu Star Wars e whakamana ana i te nui o te aro atu ki ngā kaiwhakangao. Tērā pea ka uaua ake te whakataetae Elder Scrolls i te wāhanga MMORPG. I tērā wiki i pānuitia ai e Bethesda, te kaihanga o te taitara moemoea tino hokohoko Skyrim, e whakaaro ana ki te whakarewa i te The Elder Scrolls Online mō ngā rorohiko rorohiko me ngā rorohiko Macintosh. E tūmanakohia ana kia tukua i te tau 2013. I mua i taua wā ka tautuhia a Activision Blizzard ki te tuku i te whakawhānuitanga o Mists of Pandaria ki te Ao o Warcraft. Ko te ihirangi hōu - tae atu ki tētahi taiao ā-Āhia e nohoia ana e ngā pea panda pūkenga ki ngā toi taua - kei te whakamātauria e ngā kaiwhakamahi kua tīpakohia. Heoi anō, i kī a Michael French, te rangatira o te pukapuka hokohoko kēmu ataata MCV tērā pea ka roa te taitara Star Wars. "He tino māhorahora te huri o ngā tau kaiohauru ina tīmata koe ki te tono i ngā tāngata kia utu mō ā rātou ohaurunga," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "E mōhio ana a EA me pēhea te pana ki ngā mokowā mamati - he tino kaha te pūkenga, ā, he umanga tino kaha rātou, nā reira kāore i te tino māharahara te iti o te kaiwhakamahi i ngā marama tuatahi." "I roto i te hinengaro o EA, ko te mea kei reira ētahi atu MMORPG e haere mai ana, he whakaaturanga anō anake me noho rātou i tēnei mokowā." Ngā Takeovers Mō te hauwhā tuawhā o te katoa o ngā moni whiwhinga kupenga a EA i tapeke i te $400m (£247m), mai i te $151m i tērā tau. I piki ngā hoko i te 20% ki te $1.4bn. I kī te umanga kei te pā ki tētahi ia i nui ake ai te utu o te tupunga o ngā hokonga mamati i te utu mō te hinganga o ngā kēmu pōkai i hokona mā ngā toa. Heoi anō, i tohu te rangatira nui o EA ka tūpato a ia ki te hoko i ngā tauwhāinga kēmu pāpori iti iho, ka mau i tētahi keri mārama i te tangohanga a Zynga o te kaiwhakawhanake Draw Something OMGPOP. "Kāore e hiahiatia kia hokona e mātou he parani kia whiwhi ai i tētahi ārahi rangitahi i runga i ngā tūtohi mō ngā mea katoa e wera ana i tēnei koata," te kī a John Riccitiello. "Ehara tēnā i te tikanga e kore rawa mātou e hoko, e kore rānei e haumi. Ka pai mātou." "Engari i tēnei wā, ko tāku e tīmata ana ki te kite ko ngā tūmanako whakatauranga e whakaaro ana ko ēnei mea he rākau hoki katoa e neke ana ki te taha matau, ā, ki taku whakaaro he whakaaro kino ērā," tana kī.

title: Tokorua nga hōia o Ingarangi i patua i Awhekenetāna i tapaina e MoD
summary: Tokorua nga hōia o Ingarangi i mate i te tūtukitanga o to rātau waka patu i tētahi pomu noa iho i Awhekenetāna, kua whakaingoatia e te Manatu Wawao.
text: I taua wā ka whakarato haumarutanga a Lt David Boyce rāua ko L/Cpl Richard Scanlon, mai i te 1st The Queen's Dragoon Guards, i te takiwā o Helmand i taua wā. I te mahi nga hōia ki te Formation Reconnaissance Squadron. Ka kawea mai e nga mate te katoa o ngā kaimahi hōia o UK i patua i roto i ngā mahi i Awhekenetāna mai i te tau 2001 ki te 388. I mau a Lt Boyce, 25, mai i Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, me L/Cpl Scanlon, 31, mai i Rhymney, Caerphilly, i te pahūtanga i te rohe o Yakchal o Nahr-e Saraj, Helmand. I horaina a Lt Boyce i te 21 o Whiringa ā-rangi hei whakahau i te Ope 1, B Squadron, 1st The Queen's Dragoon Guards. I ako a ia i ngā whanaungatanga ao whānui i te Whare Wānanga o Exeter i mua i tana urunga ki te Ope Taua i te tau 2009. I kī te whānau o Lt Boyce kua mauria mai e ia te rā ki roto i te oranga o ngā tāngata katoa i mōhiotia e ia. I roto i tētahi kōrero ka kī rātau: "I whakahonoretia a Rawiri hei āpiha hōia e whakaae ana ki te oranga hōia i runga i te hiahia. E tino whakahīhī ana mātou ki ngā mea katoa i tutuki i a ia i roto i tētahi oranga poto, ā, ka whakamarie mātou i te mōhio kua mate ia i tana mahi i tāna i aroha ai. "I kawea mai e ia te rā ki roto i te oranga o te hunga katoa i mōhiotia e ia. Ka tino mahue a Rawiri i tōna whānau aroha me tōna hoa wahine ko Jodie." I kī a Lt Col Jasper de Quincey Adams, te āpiha rangatira o te 1st The Queen's Dragoon Guards i tohu ia i ngā mea katoa e tino pai ana mō te Ope o Ingarangi. I kī a Col de Quincey Adams: "I ārahi ia mai i mua, i te tautuhi i ngā paerewa tino tiketike, me te whakaawe i ōna tāngata me ōna hoa. " He roa, he kaha, he menemene pāhekoheko a ia, pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā āpiha o tōna whakatupuranga, i tukua ki ana tāngata, ā, i whakatau kia tutuki i ngā mahi." I kī hoki ngā hoa ko Lt Boyce "kī tonu i te kata me te kino" me tētahi pūāhua nui ake i te ora. I horaina a L/Cpl Scanlon ki Awhekenetāna i te 18 o Whiringahora 2011. I mahi hoki a ia i Pōngia i te tau 2001 me Iraki i te tau 2003 me te 2005. I kī tōna whānau ka tino mahue a ia i te hunga katoa i mōhio ki a ia. I kī rātau i roto i tētahi kōrero: "He taitama aroha ngahau a Rākei e hākinakina ana ki te ora. He tino aroha tōna ki tōna whānau - i ngā wā katoa e āwhina ana i a rātou i ngā wā katoa e taea ana e ia ina hiahiatia. "He pūāhua tino pai a Rārangi, ā, ka tino mahue i a ia tōna whānau me ngā tāngata katoa i mōhio ki a ia. E kore rawa tētahi atu tangata e rite ki to mātau Richard." I kī a Col de Quincey Adams ko ia "tētahi o ngā pūāhua nunui o te ora" me tētahi hōia pūkenga i marino i raro i te pēhanga. Ka kī a ia: "Ka tino mihi mātou ki a ia, ka ngaro ētahi o tōna kanapa, engari he iti noa iho to mātau ngaromanga kino ki tērā o tōna whānau; tōna whaea, tōna pāpā, tōna pāpā me ōna tuahine ko Lisa rāua ko Emma, ā, i tino arohaina e ia. "E kore rawa a Lance Corporal Scanlon e warewaretia, ā, ka poipoia o tātau pūmahara ki a ia mo ake tonu atu."

title: Ko te ope rererangi o Sri Lanka 'whakautu'
summary: E kī ana te hunga whakakeke Taika Tamila i Sri Rānaka kua poapoa e nga waka rererangi o te ope rererangi i nga wāhi whakakeke i te raki.
text: I pā mai nga whakaekenga whakapae i nga haora i muri i te whakarewatanga a nga whawhai i tētahi pūtake hōia i te taha o te taunga rererangi matua o te whenua. Heoi anō, i whakakāhoretia e te hōia o Hiri Rānaka te whakapae LTTE. I kī atu te kaikorero hōia o Brigadier Prasad Samarasinghe ki a TE Ratonga Sinhala e uru ana te hōia ki ngā mahi ārai anake. Ko te whakaekenga whakakeke, i te atatū o te Mane, te tuatahi mai i te hau. Tokotoru nga kairererangi i mate, tekau mā ono i whara. I kī te Hāwhe Tamila e rua nga rererangi i uru ki te whakapae. I katia te taunga rererangi ā-iwi mō tētahi wā, engari i muri iho ka whakatuwheratia anōtia.

title: Te whakapūtātanga o te puni o Balcombe: I hopukina ngā kaiwhakahaere
summary: E ono nga kaiwhakahaere ārai ārai i hopukina i muri i te whakatūpatotanga kia wehe atu i to rātau puni i Balcombe, i Te Uru, i te whakapūtātanga rānei.
text: E tata ana nga kaiwhakahaere ki te wāhi e mahi ana te kamupene pūngao o Cuadrilla i te mahi keri hōpara ki te rapu hinu. I whakatūpato te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Takiwā o Te Hauauru ki te hunga whakahē kia wehe atu i to rātau puni i te 09:00 BST. Tata ki te 100 ngā tāngata i huihui ki waho o ngā kēti ki te wāhi wiri. I kī a Haimona Jenkins o TE HAU: "I huihui te rōpū o ngā kaiwhakahaere e 100 i waho o ngā kēti, e waiata ana i ngā waiata. " Ka haere ngā āpiha ki roto, ka tango i ngā tāngata i te whakahē." I kī te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Uru o Te Takiwā o Te Hauauru kua tohutohutia e ia ōna māngai kia rapu i tētahi raupapa pupuri i te mea kāore anō kia mahue nga kaiwhakahaere i te rā kati. E kī ana ka tangohia ngā tāngata, ngā teneti i te taha o te huarahi, ngā kākano me ngā wīra i te Huarahi B2036 o Rāwāhi. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka wehe tonu te tangata i tō rātou ake whakaaro, ā, ka whakahauhau anō mātou i ngā kaiwhakahaere kia whakamahi i te wāhi kua whakaritea e whakangāwari ai te whakahē hūmārie," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu. I kī te kaiwhakahaere a Daniel Evans ka "whakapekatia te tono kia haere". E wehi ana te hunga whakahē i te wiri whakamātautau ka puta ki te whatinga wai, ki te fracking rānei. 'Wāhi whakahē kua tautuhia' I kī ngā Pirihimana o Sussex i katia te Huarahi B2036 o Rāwāhi i Balcombe mō neke atu i te haora i mua i muri i te kume a ngā kaiwhakahaere i tētahi wīra puta noa i te huarahi, e ārai ana ki ngā ahunga e rua. I kī tētahi kaihautū tōpana kua maukati tētahi tangata i a ia ki te waka, ā, ka karangatia he "tīma tango whakahē" ki te tuku i a ia. I hopukina te tangata e 26 tau, tae atu ki ngā tāngata tokorua i whakamātau ki te ārai i te taenga mai o tētahi taraka ki te pae me tētahi tangata 34 tau mai i Balcombe, e kī ana ko ia te kōinga tuatahi i hopukina i runga i nga whakahē. I kī a Ch Supt Paul Morrison neke atu i te 100 ngā tāngata i hopukina mai i te tīmatanga o te whakahē i a Hōngongoi. "Kua homai e mātou he wāhi e mārama ai te kite a ngā kaiwhakahaere me te kite i tō rātou mana tika ki te whakahē hūmārie e anga atu ana ki te tomokanga ki te pae wiri," tana kī. "I a rātau e mahi ana i tēnei e tino hari ana mātou ki te whakangāwari i ta rātau whakahē, engari he nui te pānga o ngā mahi hara a ētahi ki te iwi paetata, ā, kāore tēnei e whakaaetia." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te kaunihera o te rohe e mahia ana te mahi hei pare i ngā kaiwhakamahi huarahi katoa, ā, ehara i te tango i te mana ki te whakahē rangimārie. Ka kī tētahi kaikōrero: "He huarahi tino arokē tēnei me te tepenga 60 mph, ā, kāore i te mārama i te pō. Tērā te nui ake o ngā āwangawanga haumaru me kōrero tātau hei mana huarahi haepapa." I kī a ia he maha nga mahi i puta ake ai ngā māharahara hou, tae atu ki tētahi mahi i piki ai tētahi tangata i tētahi torutoru i waenganui i te huarahi, me karo ēhea motokā. I kī te tangata o Balcombe, a Helen Savage, e māharahara ana nga kōinga ki te turituri o te wiri i te pō. I kī a Cuadrilla i tū te wiri i te ahiahi o te Hātarei i muri i te tata o te umanga ki te tae ki te tepenga turituri mōrahi. I tīmata anō i te Mane i muri i te tāutatanga o ngā taputapu whakaiti turituri. I tērā wiki, ka pānuitia e Cuadrilla kua unuhia e ia tētahi tono mō tētahi toronga ki tana whakaaetanga whakarite mō te keri hōpara i Balcombe. A new planning application for the site will be lodged in the near future, the firm said, but this won't go in front of the committee before next year.

title: Ngā painga hauātanga: Ka whakahōutia e ngā minita ngā ture aromatawai
summary: Ka hurihia ngā ture e whakahaere ana i te āheinga mō ngā painga mō ngā tāngata hauā i muri i te whakahē i tō rātou pānga pea, kua pānuitia e te kāwanatanga.
text: Ko te hua, me pēhea - ehara i te mea noa iho - ka taea e te kaikerēme te whakatutuki i ngā tūmahi pēnei i te hīkoi me te whakamahere haerenga, ka āwhina ki te whakatau i te nui e tika ana ki a rātou i roto i ngā painga. Ko ngā kaikerēme e whakahaere ana i ngā tūmahi, engari kāore i te "pono", ka whiwhi utu nui ake. I whakaae nga minita he āwangawanga he "mārama" nga tono. Ka whakakapia e te Utunga Rangatiratanga Whaiaro (PIP) te Whakaaetanga Ora Hauātanga (DLA) tīariari i Aperira. Ka whai wāhi ngā tāngata iti iho te pūkoro ki ngā utu teitei ake. Kua whakatūpato ngā kaiwhakahauhau ka taea e ngā tāngata e āhei ana ki te haere neke atu i te 20 mita te whiwhi utu iti iho - ahakoa kāore i taea e rātou te mahi "haumaru, pono, auau, i roto i tētahi wā tika". I whakakāhore ngā minita i mua i te kerēme, ā, kāore e hiahiatia kia tuhia ēnei kupu ki ngā ture here ā-ture. Engari i kī te minita mo te hauā a Esther McVey i te Tāite: "E mōhio ana ahau kei te kaha te whakaaro o te hunga hauā me o rātau māngai kua whakaritea tēnei ariā hira i roto i te ture, ā, e hari ana ahau ki te mahi i tēnei." 'Te kore whakaaro' I tāpiri mai a ia: "He rite tonu to mātau whakaaro - e hiahia ana mātou ki te ūnga tautoko ki te hunga e tino hiahia ana. " I ngā wā katoa e kī ana mātou e kore mātou e titiro noa mēnā ka taea e te tangata te mahi ngohe, engari ko te āhua hoki e mahi ai rātou." E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā o ngā huringa a te kāwanatanga ko te tuatoru o ngā tāngata hauā e noho ana i roto i te rawakore, ā, e 42% iti iho ngā tāngata e āhei ana ki te whakaaetanga nekeneke. I roto i ngā whakawhitinga i te Whare o Ariki i tērā wiki, ka whakahē a Crossbencher Wheua Grey-Thompson, he toa koura Paralympic, i te kāwanatanga mō tōna "kore whakaaro ki ngā tāngata hauā" mō ngā marohi. Kua kī te hoa whakawhiti a Ariki Alton i te mea ka tangohia e te tangata ngā waka urutau motuhake i a rātau i puta ai te "whakaponokore whānui me te pouri nui". Mō ngā minita, ka whakaae a Ariki Freud: "Me whakaae ahau kāore i te tika te kōrero mo ngā huringa, ā, kāore i te tika te mōhiotanga ki aua huringa."

title: Coronavirus: Ko nga ture taratahi haere hou o UK he mahi, e kii ana te rangatira o Ryanair
summary: Kua mana ngā ture hōu e hiahia ana ki ngā tāngata katoa e tae ana ki te UK kia wehe i a rātou anō mō te 14 rā.
text: Ko te hunga e tae mai ana mā runga rererangi, waka rererangi, tereina rānei - tae atu ki ngā tangata whenua o UK - me hoatu he wāhitau e wehe ai rātau i a rātau anō. Ka whainatia nga kaiwhati ture. Kua kī te Hēkeretari Kāinga a Priti Patel i hoahoatia ngā ture "hei ārai i te ngaru tuarua" o te coronavirus. Engari kua kī te rangatira o Ryanair he "mahi tōrangapū" ngā ture, ā, ehara i te taratahi. I kī atu a Michael O'Leary ki te HAU: "Tērā pea kei Sainsbury's, tērā pea kei te one, ka noho koe i runga i te papa korowha i te wā kāore e taea e te Tari Kāinga te waea atu ki a koe - he tau pūkoro noa iho tā rātou." I kī a ia ahakoa i whakaae te Tari Kāinga ki ngā ture kāore e taea te whakaū. Kua whakatūpato ētahi umanga ka tino pāngia rātau e ngā ture, ā, ka whakatūpato a Tēnā O'Leary ki te tūkinotanga. Ahakoa te whakahē a ngā umanga, kua kī a Ms Patel he "ōrite" ngā mehua, ā, kei te whakatinanatia "i te wā tika". He aha ngā ture hōu? Mō ētahi atu kōrero mō ngā ture, pāwhiri ki konei. Tata ki te katoa o nga kaihaereere me whakakii i tetahi puka "kairapu kaihihi hauora tūmatanui" i te taenga atu. Ki te kore e pēnei, ka whiua pea te whiu o te £100, ka whakakorea rānei te tomokanga o te hunga haere. Ki te kore e taea e rātou te whakarato wāhitau, ka whakaritea e te kāwanatanga he nohoanga hei utu mo te tangata haere. E kī ana ka whai taki anō mēnā kei te whaia ngā ture. 'Kāore i te mōhiotia' Kotahi te pāhihi rererangi e rere ana ki Tiamana mai i Stansted mō te mahi, engari e noho ana i te UK, i kī tērā pea me noho ia ki rāwāhi mō te roa ake nā te ture taratahi 14 rā. I kī atu a ia ki te HAU: "Me whakaaro ahau ki te hoki mai, kāore rānei." I kī hoki a ia ko te ture taratahi a te UK "kāore he tikanga nā te mea i Tiamana [he] he iti iho te tere i konei, ā, he nui ake te whakapokenga i konei i te UK i Tiamana, nā reira ki a au kāore he mōhiotanga." Ngā ture 'matatini' Ko te tangata e tae mai ana i te Whenua o Airani, i ngā Moutere Hongere, i te Motu rānei o Tangata kāore e hiahiatia kia whakaoti i tētahi puka, ki te uru rānei ki te taratahi. He waihotanga anō mō ngā kaimahi i ētahi umanga pēnei i te waka huarahi me ngā tohunga rongoā e whakarato ana i te tiaki nui. I kī te uniana e tohu ana i ngā kaimahi o te Ope Taitapa o UK he matatini ngā ture, ā, kāore i tino whakaritea. I kī atu a Lucy Moreton, te āpiha ngaio i te Uniana o ngā Ratonga Manene, ki te AO ko ngā pepa hangarau e whakamārama ana i ngā mea hei taki anake i tae mai i te Paraire, ā, kāore tonu i te wātea ki te hunga e mahi ana i te raina o mua. I kī a ia e 42 ngā kāwai i whakawāteatia i ngā ture taratahi. I tāpiritia e Ms Moreton kāore he pūnaha mō te taki wāhitau, ā, ko ngā ture kōaro anake - pēnei i te whakamahi i te ingoa o Mickey Mouse - ka tīkina. I kī atu tētahi manatu ā-roto, i kitea e te HAU, ki ngā māngai o te Ope Taitapa kāore e pā te whaina ki ngā pāhihi e tae ana ki UK mā Airangi, e hipa ana i tētahi huinga ture motuhake. Kua whakahē te umanga haerere i ngā ture taratahi a te kāwanatanga, me te whakatūpato ka aukati te wā taratahi i ngā manuhiri me te mōrearea o ngā mahi. Kua miramiratia hoki e te umanga whakanao he iti ake ngā rerenga ka rāhuitia ngā kawemai me ngā kaweake, ā, ka whai pānga patoto mō te umanga utanga, tae atu ki te whakararuraru i te whakaoranga o ētahi umanga. Kua tuhituhi a British Airways, EasyJet me Ryanair ki te Procurator General Sir Jonathan Jones, te mana ture matua rawa o te kāwanatanga - te wāhanga tuatahi e hiahiatia ana ina mahi ture ki te kāwanatanga. E kī ana ngā waka rererangi kua rite rātau ki te tono arotakenga ā-ture ki ngā ture taratahi haere a te kāwanatanga. Kua karanga te tinana hokohoko haerere a Abta ki te kāwanatanga kia wawe te waihanga i tētahi mahere huarahi mō te tīmata anō i ngā haerenga o te ao, i te wā i whakatūpato te kamupene ratonga taunga rererangi nui rawa o UK, a Swissport, ka taea te tuku i tētahi "moto kaipatu" ki te wāhanga tāpoi. I tuhituhi ngā kaiārahi umanga ki te Pirimia o Boris Johnson i Me e tono ana kia kaua te kāwanatanga e mahi i tētahi "huarahi paraikete" ki te taratahi, e huatau ana i ngā mea e kiia nei ko "ngā arawhata hau" me ngā whenua he iti ngā pāpātanga coronavirus. I pōhiritia ngā kaiārahi mahi rererangi, moana, rēra hoki ki te kōrerorero i ngā mahere taratahi hōu, engari kāore a British Airways i whakaae ki te haere ki te hui, ā, ka kī atu ngā rangatira rererangi ki te BBC kāore rātau i mīharo ki te ihirangi o te waea. E tono ana a BA kia whakakorea ngā kaimahi e 12,000. I tua atu, kua whakatupato te rangatira nui o te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow e tata ana ki te 25,000 nga mahi ka morearea pea i te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow. Kua kī atu ngā pūtake kāwanatanga ki te AO e tūmanako ana te UK ki te whakaū i ngā whakaaetanga arawhiti hau ki ētahi whenua, pēnei i Potukara, Paniora me Wīwī, tae atu ki Ahitereiria me Hōroa. Engari ko te tūnga o te kāwanatanga ko te ariā anake e "whakaarohia". I ētahi atu whanaketanga:

title: He kōrero whakamīharo mo te hoa Hurai taitamariki o Hītara
summary: I te tirohanga tuatahi, te āhua nei ko te pikitia o te tangata e awhi ana i te kōtiro hihiko e whakaatu ana i tētahi tirohanga o te hari nui.
text: Engari mā te titiro tata atu e whakaatu ana i tētahi kōrero pōuri kē atu: ko Adolf Hitler tēnei, te tangata i muri i te kōhurutanga o ngā Hurai e ono miriona, ā, he Hurai te kōtiro iti. Ahakoa tēnei, ka haere tonu a Hītara ki te hanga whakahoahoa ki a Rosa Bernile Nienau, i mutu noa iho i te wā i uru mai ai ngā kaiwhakahaere matua o te Nazi i te rima tau i muri iho. Ā, ināianei kei te haere tēnei atahanga waitohu mai i te tau 1933 ki te hokonga i te US. E whakaaro ana a Alexander Historical Auctions, i Maryland, i te pikitia, i tangohia e te kaiwhakaahua o Heinrich Hoffmann, ka taea te tiki i te $10,000 (£7,500) ina hokona i te Tūrei. "Ko te putanga kua hainatia he wāhanga kāore anō kia kitea e te iwi whānui," te kī a te kaihoko o Bill Panagopulos ki a MailOnline. "I tino whakaahuatia a Hītara me ngā tamariki mō ngā take whakatūpato. Ko te mea whakamīharo mo tēnei wāhanga, te āhua nei he tino hototahi tōna ki te kōtiro. "I ohorere noa iho ahau." 'Te whaiāipo a Hītara' He rā whānau tiritiri tērā i huihui mai ai tētahi kōtiro iti me te kaiārahi Whāriki. E ai ki te paetukutuku hokohoko, i uru atu a Rosa rāua ko tōna whaea ki te huihuinga i waho o te taunga o Hītara Alpine i Berghof i te tau 1933 i tōna rā whānau. E whakaarohia ana i tana kitenga he ōrite te rā whānau o Rosa, ka pōhiritia e ia a Rosa rāua ko tōna whaea ko Karoline ki te whare - i reira i tangohia ai ēnei whakaahua. Kāore i roa i muri iho, ka kitea he Hurai te whaea o Karoline, nā reira ko Rosa he Hurai i te aroaro o te kāwanatanga o te Nazi. Engari kāore tēnei i whakakaha i a Hītara kia kaua e whakahaere i tana whakahoahoa ki te kōtiro, nāna i tuku atu he kape waitohu o te whakaahua. "Te aroha me te [whakaaro?] Rosa Nienau Adolf Hitler Munich, te 16 o Hune 1933," ka tuhituhi ia. Te āhua nei, i tāpiritia e Rosa tōna ake pane kuini ki te whakaahua, e tātuhi ana i ngā putiputi ki runga i te atahanga pango me te mā. Neke atu i te 17 ngā wā i waenganui i te tau 1935 me te 1938, ka tuhituhi a ia ki a Hītara me tana kaiawhina a Wilhelm Bruckner, tae noa ki te 1935 me te 1938, tae noa ki te wā i korerotia ai rāua ko tōna whaea, he pouaru, kia tapahia te hoapā e te hēkeretari tūmataiti a te kaiārahi Nazi, a Mātini Bormann. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea: Kāore a Hītara i mīharo ki te raupapa, ka kī a Hoffmann ā muri ake. "Tērā ētahi tāngata whai pūmanawa pono ki te pahua i taku hari katoa," ka mahara a Hoffmann ki te kaiārahi Nazi e kī ana ki a ia i roto i tana pukapuka, Ko Hītara Tōku Hoa. Kei roto i te kaiwhakaahua tētahi pikitia rerekē o te tokorua i roto i tana pukapuka o te tau 1955, e tapaina ana: "Te Whaiāipo a Hītara - i koa ki a ia te kite i a ia i te Berghof kia kitea rā anō e ētahi tangata pukumahi ehara a ia i te uri Aryan parakore." I te tau i muri mai i te motu a Bormann i te hoapā, ka tīmata te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I te wā i mutu, e ono tau i muri iho, e ono miriona nga Hurai kua mate. Kaore hoki a Rosa i ora i te pakanga. I mate a ia i te pōrori, i te 17 o ona tau, i tētahi hōhipera i Munich i te tau 1943, kotahi tekau tau i muri i tana hui tuatahi ki a Hītara.

title: James Corfield: Council sets up Royal Welsh safety group
summary: Ka whakatūria he rōpū hei whakapai ake i te haumarutanga o ngā tāngata e haere ana ki te Royal Welsh Show, whai muri i te matenga o James Corfield.
text: I whakaorangia te tinana o te tau 19 tau i te Awa o Wye i Builth Wells, Powys, i a Hōngongoi - e rima rā i muri i tana ngaro i te whakaaturanga. I te Paraire, ka whakaae te kaunihera o Powys ki te whakatū me te whakarite i tētahi rōpū mahi haumaru mō te takahanga. Ka titiro ki ngā take pēnei i te tīrama, te taiapa, te waka me ngā pūtahi rongoā. I tūtaki ngā ratonga ohorere, te Royal Welsh Agricultural Society (RWAS), ngā kaiwhakahaere wāhi, ngā tūao me ngā ratonga kaunihera i tēnei wiki ki te arotake i ngā whakaritenga i te whakaaturanga i muri i te matenga o Mr Corfield. Council leader Rosemarie Harris said: "We are all desperately sorry for the whānau that this tragedy happened and believe that, while many improvements have been made to the event and the safety of people attending over the years, we need to look at everything with fresh eyes. " He mea nui kia whakamahia e mātou ō mātou wheako me tō mātou mātauranga paheko hei whakapai ake i te haumarutanga o ngā tāngata e neke ana i waenganui i ngā wāhi matua e whā - te papa whakaaturanga, te kāinga rangatahi, Penmaenau me te taone tonu i roto i te wiki. "The greatest challenge will be issues in and around Builth Wells town centre and I want a radical look at how we look after visitors to the town at the important event." I kī a Steve Hughson, te rangatira nui o RWAS: "Ka mahi tonu te RWAS i tētahi mahi hohe i roto i ngā mahi katoa kia āta whakaritea ai ngā takahanga katoa e pā ana ki te Ariki Welsh i runga i te āhua e whakamōrahi ana i te haumarutanga." Neke atu i te 600 ngā tāngata i huihui ki te takoha ki a Tēnā Corfield i te karapu kirikiti o Montgomery, i reira a ia he mema, i tērā Paraire.

title: Ngā kirimana haora-kore: He aha te āhua o te noho i runga i tētahi?
summary: Tērā pea e whā ngā tāngata i whakaarohia i mua i ngā mahi kāore e whakaū ana i a rātou mahi, e huatau ana ngā whika hōu. He aha hoki te āhua o te noho i runga i tētahi kirimana haora kore?
text: Nā Sean ClareBBC News Mō te nuinga o ngā tau e 25 i mahi ai a Karen i roto i te tiaki pāpori pakeke, kua kirimana ia i ngā haora, ā, i utua he utu wā katoa mō te mahi o te marama katoa. Engari i te tīmatanga o tana kaunihera paetata ki te whakamahi i tētahi kamupene tiaki tūmataiti hou, ka whakawhitia a ia me ōna hoa mahi ki ngā kirimana haora kore. I te pō, e kī ana a Karen, i tapahia a rātau utu ki te haurua ki te £300 i te marama. Caring mainly for elderly people with dementia and other personal care needs, she says the move impacted her approach to work. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakaaro i mahi tonu ahau i te mahi ōrite, i tiaki i a rātau i runga i te āhua kotahi - engari i ngaro i a au taua kōanga i taku hīkoi." 'Kāore he haumarutanga' I runga i tētahi kirimana haora kore, ka utua anake tētahi kaimahi mō ngā haora e hiahiatia ana e te kaitukumahi. "Kei te rongo koe i te whakaweti. Ka tīmata koe i te 06:30am, ka taea te mahi tae noa ki te 11:30am, kātahi ka kīia kāore he mahi mōu i tēnei rā," te whakamārama a Karen. "Engari ki te kī koe kāore e taea e koe te mahi i taua rā kāore rātau e waea anō ki a koe nā te mea e kī ana rātau kāore koe i te huri ake - ka rongo koe i te kore tika." E hua ana ngā whika kāwanatanga mō Ingarangi neke atu i te 300,000 ngā kaimahi haora kore i roto i te tiaki pāpori pakeke anake. E pōhiritia ana e ētahi te whakamahinga o ēnei kirimana, e kī ana ka hoatu e rātou he ngāwari ake ki ngā kaimahi mō ā rātou ake hōtaka mahi, me te whai painga ki ngā kaitukumahi. Calum, a 17-year-old housekeeper at the holiday operator Center Parcs, says having a zero-hours contract enables him and other students working there to fit work around their studies. "E pai ana te mahi ki a au," tana kī. Engari i ngā rā i tawhiti atu i tōna huritau e rua tau ki te kamupene, e kī ana a ia kua korerotia ki a ia kua kore ia e hiahiatia. "Ka whakamāramatia e rātou ina tīmata koe - kāore ō mana mahi, ā, kāore he haumarutanga mahi kia rua tau rā anō koe e mahi ana. Ināianei e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakamutu i ahau." Center Parcs spokesman Simon Kay says he cannot comment on individual cases but says: "We only offer this type of contract to employees who benefit from the flexibility." Ko te hunga e 18 ki te 24 tau te pakeke - kua pā kē ki te whakahekenga - kei waenganui i ērā e tino noho ana i runga i ngā kirimana haora kore, e huatau ana te rangahau hou rawa. "Mēnā ka whakakāhoretia e mātou tētahi neke, ka kite rātou (ngā kaitukumahi) i a mātau he koretake, ā, ka tapahia o mātau haora mō ngā wiki e haere ake nei," e tohe ana tētahi tau 18 tau e mahi ana mō te Pūngao 1 i Essex - he kerēme i ākiritia hei "kutukutu" e tōna rangatira nui, a Sean Rider. Heoi anō, ko tētahi atu tauira e mahi ana i tētahi wāhi tūruhi i Pia, Devon - e hiahia ana hoki kia noho ingoamuna - e kī ana i pai noa iho a ia ki te tiki i te mahi. "E iwa marama ahau e kimi mahi ana," tana kī. "I'm probably the best person to hire on this type of contract as I don't have to do any budgeting or family planning." 'Moe i runga i ngā sofa' Ināianei, mō te hunga i roto i ngā wāhanga hōhonu ake o tā rātou mahi, ko te tikanga kia puritia ngā mahere o te ora. Kua kī atu tētahi kaiako mātauranga anō e 40 tau ki te AO kei te noho tonu a ia me tōna whaea nā te mea ka āraia e tana kirimana kore haora tana penapena mō tētahi moni tāpui me te whiwhi mōkete. "I tētahi marama ka whiwhi koe i te £1,000, i tērā wā ka £600. He tino whakapōrearea," tana kī. Ehara hoki a ia i te mea ko ia anake. Tata ki te 50 a Pat. Tae noa mai ki nā tata nei, ko tana mahi ko te ngana ki te tiki koha mā te waea mō ētahi o ngā aroha tino rongonui o UK - Cancer Research UK, Oxfam, te National Trust, Save the Children. E kī ana a ia i hari ngā hoa mahi ki te noho i runga i ngā kirimana ngāwari ina nui ake te mahi. Engari i te tīmatanga o te whakahekenga, e kī ana a ia ko Pell rāua ko Bales - te kamupene mākete waea i mahi ai ia - i whakatau kia whakanohoia ana kaimahi ki ngā whakaritenga kore haora. Ko te tikanga ka taea te whakakore ohorere i ana neke i te pānui 24 haora noa iho, ā, ka pau pea ngā wiki i mua i te nui ake o te mahi. "Ka karanga mai te rangatira ki a au mo te reti," tana kī. "Ka putua te pouaka whakamātao. Me whakawhirinaki ahau ki ngā hoa mō te āwhina, kua moe ahau i runga i ngā sofa - he tokomaha o mātau i mahi. Koia anake te huarahi e haere tonu ai." I a ia e urupare ana ki ngā kōrero, e kī ana te rangatira matua o Pell me Bales, a Derwyn Jones: "E ngana ana mātou ki te whakarato i ā mātou kaimahi ki te momo kirimana e hiahia ana rātou," e tohu ana he tokomaha ngā kaimahi he kaiwhakatangitangi, he ākonga, he kaitapere rānei e whakamihi ana ki te ngāwaritanga. E kī ana a Īna Brinkley, ko te tumuaki o te kura whakaaro o te Tūranga Mahi, he nui tonu te tūāwhiotanga o ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te pikinga o ngā kirimana haora kore. "I tētahi pito - i roto i te tiaki kāinga, hokohoko, hōtēra - he pokanoa, he tino wehi. Engari i tērā taha, e 25% [o ngā kaimahi i runga i aua kirimana] he ākonga, ā, ko ērā i muri i te mātauranga hei kaiako. "Ki a rātou tērā pea he wheako pai ake, ā, ka hoatu he waeine ngāwari."

title: Brexit: 1,000 ngā āpiha tikanga hou me ngā kararehe mō ngā tauranga o Airana
summary: Kua kī te pirimia o Airani (taoiseach) e takatū ana tana kāwanatanga ki te utu i ngā tikanga 1,000 me ngā kaitirotiro kararehe ki te mahi i ngā huringa o ngā ture hokohoko i waenganui i te UK me te Republic of Ireland i te tau 2021.
text: I te kōrero a Leo Varadkar i muri i te hui kāpata i te Takiwā o Kerry. I tū te hui ki te kōrerorero i ngā mahere ohorere mō ngā tauari maha, tae atu ki tētahi Brexit kāore he mahi. I kī a ia me whakarite ngā tauranga me ngā taunga rererangi o Airana. I te Mane, ka karohia e te kāwanatanga o UK te hinganga i runga i tana Pire Tikanga i muri i te whakaaetanga ki ngā tono a Te Kāwanatanga kia huri i ōna kupu. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i te hui i te Whare o Derrynane, ka kī a Tēnā Varadkar "me te nui o te rangirua" mēnā ka whiwhi te Pirimia o Ēnā Me ki tētahi whakaaetanga putanga mā Te Whenua o Aotearoa, me "whakatika a mātau whakaritenga ina tae mai ki Te Aotearoa". I kii ia kei roto i tenei ko te whakarite i nga tauranga me nga taunga rererangi o Airani mo te huringa o nga ture i waenga i te UK me Ireland i te Hanuere 2021. "Ko tēnā ko te whakarite me te utu i ngā kaitirotiro kararehe ki te mahi i ngā taki hauora i runga i ngā hua ahuwhenua me ngā hua tipu e haere mai ana i Ingarangi me ngā kaitirotiro tikanga hoki," tana kī. "E whakaaro ana mātou me utu e mātou mō te 1,000 ngā kaitirotiro tikanga me ngā kaitirotiro kararehe hei whakarite i ā mātou tauranga me ngā taunga rererangi mō Pakihi." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki te kore e taea te whakarite i te 1,000 tāngata mō taua wā, engari mā mātou e whakarite ngā whakaritenga ohorere i te wā ka puta mai." I kī a ia kua whakanuia hoki e te kāwanatanga o Kīriria ngā rauemi mō ngā kaiwhakahaere o rāwāhi i runga i te tūmanako ki te whakatuwhera i ngā mākete hou puta noa i te ao mō ngā kaiahuwhenua, ā, ka waiho te £450m hei whakarato moni huamoni iti mō te wāhanga kai māori. Heoi anō, i whakapuakina e ia ko te tauari matua e whakaritea ana e te kāwanatanga o Kīriria, ko tētahi e tae ana ki te whakaaetanga i te tihi o Whiringahora. I kī a Tēnā Varadkar: "Ko te tauari kēhi matua e whakaritea ana e mātou, he whakaaetanga i Whiringahora, he wā tauwhiro e haere ana tae noa ki te mutunga o te tau 2020, ā, he tauwhāinga e whakaū ana ki a mātau kāore he rohe mārō i waenganui i Aiarangi ki te Raki me Aiarangi. " Engari i muri i tērā, me mahi tātau ki ngā tauari pēnei i te Pakihi." I kī a ia kei te whakatūria he "pūtea rā marangai" hei mahi i te pānga tūpono. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki te raruraru tātau i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei, nā te Pakihi, koia hoki te take e pai ai te whakataurite i ngā pukapuka kia kore ai tātau e tūpono ki te pīrangi, kāore mātou i te mārakerake i a mātau i te 10 tau ki mua." I a ia e kōrero ana i te Whare o Ngātahi i te ahiahi o te ahiahi o te Wenerei, kua kī te hēkeretari ā-rohe o mua, a Boris Johnson, kua "whakahaua ā-tōrangapū" te rohe o Kīriria, ā, e whārahi ana i te taupatupatu o Te Wānanga.

title: Ka taea e te Tumuaki te 'tautuhi anō' i te kaupapahere ohaoha i roto i te Tauākī Ngahuru
summary: Kua kī te Tumuaki hou o te Pūtea Moni ka whakamahia pea e ia te Tauākī Ngahuru hei "tautuhi anō" i te kaupapa o te ohaoha o Ingarangi.
text: I te tīmatanga o tētahi haerenga ki Haina ki te whakakaha i ngā here pakihi i muri i te Pakihi, ka kī a Piripi Hammond ka arotakea e ia ngā raraunga ohaoha i ngā marama e heke mai nei. I tāpiritia e ia ka mahi te Pūtea Moni "mēnā e whakaaro ana mātou e tika ana kia pērā". I ākiritia e te tumuaki kōruru o Labour, a John McDonnell, te kaupapa a Tēnā Hammond hei "kupu mahana noa iho mai i tētahi atu tumuaki Tory". A, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "I tēnei wā kei te haere tonu ngā kaupapa here whakawhāiti rahua a Hōri Osborne, ā, kei te mau tonu te kāwanatanga ki te anga tōtika i rahua. " Ko te tikanga o tēnei kei te puritia a Ingarangi kia whakatau rā anō a Piripi Hammond. E mārama ana kāore he kaupapa a te Tories mō Te Tūroro, ā, kei te whakatikatika i a rātau e haere ana." I mua i te rironga o te Pirimia, i kī a Ēnā Me kua kore te kāwanatanga e whai kia tae ki te nui i te tau 2020. I kī a Tēnā Hammond i te Paraire: "I te wā waenga ka whai wāhi mātou ki tā mātou Tauākī Ngahuru, tā mātou takahanga tōtika tōmuri o te tau, ki te tautuhi anō i te kaupapahere tōtika mēnā e whakaaro ana mātou e tika ana kia pēnā i runga i te mārama o ngā raraunga ka puta mai i ngā marama e heke mai nei." I muri i te kōrero a Tēnā Hammond, ka whakaaturia mai e ngā whika mai i te Taupū Kaiwhakahaere Hoko a IHS Markit tētahi "hinganga whakaharahara" i roto i ngā mahi ohaoha i ngā ratonga me ngā wāhanga whakanao i a Hōngongoi, i hinga ki te taumata iti rawa mai i Aperira 2009. Tātaritanga: He mīharo tēnā. I waenganui i ngā kupu mahana mō ngā pānga o Haina-Peretania (kei te hiahia tonu te UK kia noho hei hoa pūtea penapena nui ki Haina) ka taka e te Tumuaki hou o te Pūtea Moni tētahi pohū iti. I kī a ia ka hiahia te kāwanatanga ki te "tautuhi anō i te kaupapahere tōtika" mēnā e tika ana kia hoatu te whakataunga mo Te Kāwanatanga. I muri mai i te pānuitanga a Ēnā Me kua kore te ūnga a te kāwanatanga 2020 ki te whakakore i te tāpaetanga, te āhua nei kei te whakaaro a Tēnā Hammond ki tētahi huarahi toitū me tīmata te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Mā tēnā e whakatuwhera i te tini o ngā tūponotanga. He nui ake te nama? He nui ake ngā whakapau hanganga e tautokona ana e te kāwanatanga me ngā moni tūmataiti hoki? Āe, kua kī te kāwanatanga e hiahia ana ki te "noho i roto i ōna tikanga". A, kāore he mea i whakataua. Kotahi anake te kupu "Tautuhi anō", ahakoa he mea nui. Engari, pērā ki a Mrs May, tērā pea ka nui ake te upoko matua o Tēnā Hammond ki ngā huringa o te aronga ohaoha i ētahi e tūmanakohia ana. Otirā mēnā he māuiui te āhua o te āhua o te āhua i mua i te Tauākī Ngahuru. I tēnei wiki i whakaaturia e ngā raraunga hōu he iti iho te nama tūmatanui i te mea e tūmanakohia ana i June, engari e tūmanakohia tonutia ana kia nui ake te tohu nama tau katoa a te kāwanatanga e £14bn. I kī a Paul Johnson, ko te tumuaki o te Institute for Fiscal Studies, te kura whakaaro takitahi: "Ki taku whakaaro he rite tonu te kōrero a Tēnā Hammond ki ngā kōrero a George Osborne mō te mea me whakaaro anō te kāwanatanga i ana ture moni,  E kore e tae ki te nui o te pūtea i whakaritea i te tau 2020 nā te mea ka pōturi haere te āhua o te whakahaerenga. "Kāore mātou i te mōhio e pēhea te nui, tērā pea he whakahekenga, tērā pea he pōturi noa iho. Ko te tikanga o tēnā ka iti iho te moni tāke e haere mai ana, ā, ka tino uaua ētahi kōwhiringa a Tēnā Hammond ki te mahi i roto i te Tauākī Ngahuru. Whakanuia te whakapau moni? Tapahia ngā tāke? Me haere tonu rānei mātou i a mātou?" E haere ana a Tēnā Hammond ki tana hui tuatahi hei tumuaki me nga minita pūtea G20 e tū ana i Chengdu. Ka haere hoki a ia ki Beijing me Hong Kong. I whakapuakina e ia ko Ingarangi he "tuwhera mō ngā umanga" ā, ko "tētahi o ngā ūnga tino ātaahua i te ao mō te pūtea penapena ao whānui". I mua i te pōtitanga o Ingarangi ki te wehe i te EU, ka kī te Minita Moni o Haina o Lou Jiwei kāore i te mārama ngā hua, engari ka rongohia mō ngā tau e haere ake nei. I kī a Tēnā Lou ka "maka he kōruru ki runga i te āhua o te ao whānui" ā, ka puta mai ngā "rara me te hinganga" i roto i ngā tau e rima ki te 10 e whai ake nei.

title: Ka whakatārewatia e te kōti o Iharaira te kaupapa ki te tuku i ngā kaiheke o Awherika
summary: Kua whakatārewatia e te kōti matua o Iharaira tētahi kaupapa kāwanatanga tautohetohe ki te tuku i ngā mano mano o ngā kaiheke o Awherika i tomo ki te whenua.
text: I hoatu e ia te kāwanatanga tae noa ki te 26 o Poutāpeta hei whakarato mōhiohio anō mō te kaupapa. I te Hānuere, ko te nuinga o ngā kaiheke - ko te nuinga o Eritrea me Hūtane - i tukuna he $3,500 (£2,510) me tētahi tīkiti rererangi kia wehe noa atu i a Iharaira i te mutunga o Poutāpeta. Ki te kore, ka anga atu rātau ki te tautāwhi me te pananga o muri mai. I whakahē te pokapū rerenga o UN i te kaupapa. I tukuna e te kōti o Iharaira tana whakahaere i te Rāitema, i muri i tētahi wero ture a tētahi rōpū kaiheke mai i Eritrea me Hūtane. Ināianei kāore e taea e te kāwanatanga te tuku i ngā kaiheke o Awherika kia whiwhi rā anō te kōti i ētahi atu mōhiohio. E kī ana ngā mana o Iharaira i tēnei wā, neke atu i te 40,000 ngā kaiheke o Awherika i roto i a Iharaira, e whakaahua ana i a rātau he "hūrato". Ko te nuinga o rātau i tomo mai i Ihipa i ngā tau maha ki mua, i mua i te hanganga o tētahi taiapa hou i te rohe o te koraha. Kua tata whakamutua e tēnei ngā whakawhitinga ture. Ko nga taitama takitahi anake e pāngia ana e te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga. Ka whakawāteatia e ia ngā tamariki, nga wāhine, ngā mātua o ngā tamariki whakamauru me ngā tūkinotanga o te kahungatanga me te hokohoko tangata. Kua kī nga mana he tangata, he "tūroro" te hokinga mai o nga kaiheke. Kua kī te Pirimia o Iharaira, a Pineamine, ka whakawehi pea te tomokanga mai o ngā kaiheke o Awherika ki te āhua o ngā Hurai o Iharaira. He tuhipoka mō ngā kupu: Ka whakamahia e te AO te kupu kaiheke hei tohutoro ki ngā tāngata katoa e neke ana kāore anō kia whakaoti i te tukanga ā-ture o te tono whakangungu. Kei roto i tēnei rōpū ko ngā tāngata e rere ana i ngā whenua i haea e te pakanga pērā i a Hiria, tērā pea ka tukuna ki a rātou te tūnga rerenga, tae atu ki ngā tāngata e rapu ana i ngā mahi me ngā oranga pai ake, ko wai pea ngā kāwanatanga e whakahaere ana he kaiheke ohaoha.

title: I whakawāteatia te taitamariki neo-Nazi o Durham ki te whakarite whakaeke whakamataku
