summary: Kua whakawāteatia tētahi taitamariki nekeneke nāna i tuhituhi mō tētahi "pakanga iwi tē mōhiotia" i roto i tana rātaka, ā, i kitea he rangatū o ngā ūnga tērā pea kua whakawāteatia ki te whakarite i ngā mahi pūtohu.
text: I whakarārangitia e te taitama 16 tau nga tauwāhi mai i tōna taone kāinga o Durham i roto i tana pukapuka "whawhai toitū". I whakaahuatia hoki e ia he "kaikino māori", ka rongo te Kōti Karauna o Manatāne. Ko te tama te pōtiki e whakawāteatia ana mo te whakarite i tētahi whakaekenga pūtohu i te UK. I kitea e te hūri te tama, e kore e taea te whakaingoa mō ngā take ā-ture, he hara ki te whakarite i ngā mahi pūtohu i waenganui i Whiringahora 2017 me Mati i tēnei tau. I whakawāteatia hoki ia ki te whakaputa i tētahi tānga pūtohu, e whai ana i tētahi tuhipānui mō tētahi take e hono ana ki te pūtōraru, e toru ngā tatau o te whai tuhinga whai painga ki tētahi tangata e whakarite ana i ngā mahi pūtōraru. I whakahokia a ia i roto i te tiakitanga, a, ka whiua i te 7 o Hānuere. I rongo te kōti i tīmata te tama ki te whakatakoto i tētahi "pukapuka mō te whawhai tohutohu tika ki te pūnaha Hurai i te takiwā o Te Taone o Durham". I whakarārangitia e te pukapuka "ngā tikanga whakaeke" me ngā "wāhi hei whakaeke", e whakarārangi ana i ngā wāhi paetata "e tika ana kia whakaekea" pēnei i ngā poutāpeta, ngā pāparapara me ngā kura. I roto i tētahi rārangi "mea hei mahi" mai i Aotearoa 2018 ko ngā kupu "whakaheke aroha" i te taha o tētahi tohu ā-ringa o te Order of Nine Angles, i rongo ai te kōti he rōpū Hatana "mārama, tino kino". I tuhituhi hoki te tama mo te whakaaro ki te whakahaere i tētahi mahi tūpāpaku me ngā waipiro Molotov i runga i ngā whare karakia o te rohe. I rongo ngā kaiwhakawā, i te wā o ana rapunga ipurangi, ka kimi ia i tētahi "mahere o ngā whare karakia i te UK" me te "whare karakia o Newcastle". I haere hoki a ia ki ngā paetukutuku mō ngā pū, ā, i te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero ki tētahi kaihoko pū. I muri i tana hopunga i a Poutāpeta, ka kitea e nga pirihimana he tohutohu e whakaatu ana ki te hanga pomu me te ricin paitini. I kitea hoki e rātau kua tuaritia e ia ngā pukapuka patu i runga i te ipurangi mā te tukuatu ki tētahi paetukutuku neo-Nazi. Mā te hoatu whakaaturanga, ka whakakāhore te tama he neo-Nazi, ā, i kī noa iho i hangaia e ia tētahi "persona" pūhāhā i runga i te ipurangi, i roto hoki i tana pukapuka. I kī a Det Chf Supt Martin Snowden, te upoko o Counter Terrorism Policing North East: "He tino māharahara ngā tirohanga parirau matau me ngā kupu whakarihariha kino e whakaaturia ana e tēnei taiohi, ā, kāore e taea e mātou te kōrero mō te hunga tērā pea i pā ki tōna awetanga, me pēhea rānei e mahi ai rātou ā muri ake nei. " Ko ana rapunga ipurangi auau whānui, ngā tāurunga rātaka me te whakanui ake i te whanonga i honoa ki tōna hiahia ki te rongonui, e miramira ana i te mōrearea o tōna mōrearea mehemea kāore ia i aro atu ki ngā mana."

title: E taraiwa ana ngā tarakihana i roto i Melton Mowbray i roto i ngā ture pāmu e whakahē ana
summary: He tini ngā tarakihana i porowhita i a Melton Mowbray ki te whakaara i ngā māharahara mō ngā paerewa pāmu me ngā paerewa kai i muri i te Brexit.
text: I kī nga kaiahuwhenua e māharahara ana rātau i mua i te mutunga o te wā tauwhiro EU. Ka hoki mai tētahi Pire Ahuwhenua ki te Whare o Ngātahi a tērā wiki i muri i te wātū o te Whare Ariki i tēnei marama. I kī te Tari Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua "e kore e whakararuraru i tā mātou parenga taiao tiketike, te oranga ora kararehe me ngā paerewa kai". "He kaiārahi ao mātau i ēnei wāhi, ā, e kore tēnā e rerekē," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu. I kī a Steve Elnor, e whakahaere ana i tētahi pāmu whānau tata ki Grantham i Lincolnshire, e anga ana tana umanga ki "tētahi tuma nui mai i te manawa mārama o te kāwanatanga ki te haehae i te USP o ngā kai o Ingarangi kia taea ai te mahi hokohoko i roto i te mōrearea", mā te tāpiri i ngā kaiahuwhenua "kei a ia te tautoko nui a te iwi whānui". "Kei te anga atu mātou ki tētahi hurihanga, ā, e māharahara ana ahau he mea kāore e taea e mātau, me ētahi atu pāmu whānau ki runga, ki raro hoki i te whenua, te urutau," tana kī. "E anga ana mātou ki te rangirua mai i te 1 o Hānuere 2021, kāore i te mōhio he aha te mākete me ngā utu." I kī a Ariki Tyler, tētahi hoa Liberal Democrat i runga i te Komiti Ahuwhenua o te Whare Ariki i ngā Ariki, i tāruatia e ia ngā mahi ki te "tautoko i ngā kaiahuwhenua o Ingarangi me te pare i a tātau kai mai i ngā kawenga mai i ngā kawenga utu nui". Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: E 'ngaro' ana te kaihautū o Liverpool i Madrid i whakaputaina e nga pirihimana
summary: I pūrongotia e nga pirihimana Pāniora te ngaro o te kaihautū o Liverpool i muri i te whakamutunga o te Rōpū Toa Toa.
text: I whakaarahia e te whānau o Macauley Negus, e 23, ngā māharahara i muri i tana ngaronga i a ia e whakanui ana i te toa o Liverpool i Madrid. I muri iho ka puta mai kua hopukina a ia i te Hātarei. I tukua a ia i te pō o te Mane. I roto i tētahi kōrero ki te Plymouth Herald, ka kī tōna whānau i "koa rātau ki te hoki ki te kāinga" ki Plymouth. I tāpiritia e te whānau he "rōra rōra e 48 haora o te māharahara, te whakamāmātanga me te hōhā o te aro atu ki te pāpāho ao whānui".

title: Ko te kaiwhakawā matua o Lady Smith hei upoko i te uiui tūkino tamariki o Pākehā
summary: Kua whakatūria te kaiwhakawā matua o Lady Smith hei manukura hou o te uiuinga tūkino tamariki a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā.
text: E whai ana i te tukunga iho o Susan O'Brien QC, nāna i waiho te pou i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama e kī ana i te whakararuraru a te kāwanatanga i roto i te uiuinga. Ko tētahi mema tuarua o te pae tangata tokotoru, ko Prof Michael Lamb, i whakarerea hoki i runga i ngā māharahara ōrite. Ka tirohia e te uiui ngā whakaaro hītori o te tūkino tamariki i Pākehā. E whā tau te roa, ā, ka titiro ki te nui o te tūkinotanga o ngā tamariki e tiakina ana, ā, ka kitea ngā rahunga pūnaha. Engari kua whakahētia mai i te tīmatanga e ngā mōrehu o te tūkinotanga, ā, i mahue ki a Kete Hōtata hei mema paewhiri anake i muri i te whakarerenga o Ms O'Brien rāua ko Prof Lamb i roto i ngā rā o tētahi. I kī te Minita Tuarua Tuatahi o John Swinney ko Lady Smith - he kaiwhakawā mai i te tau 2001, ā, i whakatūria ki te Whare o Roto i te tau 2012 - ka kawea mai he "nui o te mātauranga me te wheako" ki te ārahitanga o te uiui. Ka kī a ia: "I roto i te āhua o te papamuri o Lady Smith hei kaiwhakawā pūkenga, ka mauria te uiui me te kore wehi, te manako rānei ki te tāutu me pēhea te rahua o ngā tangata me ngā rōpū i te nuinga o ngā tamariki mōrearea o Pākehā. " Me mātua whakarite mātou kia pai te parenga o ngā tamariki nā ngā mea e ako ana mātou i te uiui." I kī a Lady Smith he tokomaha ngā tamariki kāore i hoatu ki a rātau te parenga e tika ana i muri i te whakanohonga ki te tiaki kāinga. 'Whakaoratanga o te rangatiratanga' I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me rangona o rātau reo ināianei me ngā pātai āhea, ki hea, me pēhea, he aha hoki i pā mai ai. " Me mahi ngā mahi tūturu ki te ngana ki te whakaora, ki te tapi, ki te whakaora i te rangatiratanga me te tūmanako mō te wā heke. "It is, so very important that the work of the Scottish Child Abuse Inquiry continue and it is for these reasons that I welcome the invitation that has been extended to me by the deputy first minister and have today given my commitment to being its chair." I kī a Tēnā Swinney i taua wā kua whakaae ia ki te tukunga iho o Ms O'Brien i muri i te tīmatanga o te hātepe tika hei tango i a ia i tōna tūranga. I kī a ia kua amuamu mō Ms O'Brien "e whakaatu ana i ngā tirohanga" i te wā o tētahi wātū whakangungu mō ngā mema o te tīma uiui. I whakawāteatia e ngā tohunga tūkino tamariki e rua ngā kōrero i whakaputaina e Ms O'Brien i "whakaatu i tētahi pūnaha whakapono e hotokore ana ki te pou tūru o tēnei uiui". I whakaaturia ngā kōrero e rua i roto i ngā rangatū o ngā reta i whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini. 'Ngā tuma tukurua' i whakaae a Ms O'Brien kua mahia e ia ngā kōrero, engari i kī he "whakaaetia i roto i te horopaki i mahia ai" ā, e "kore rawa ia e whakahāwea i te tō ā-papa o te tūkino tamariki". I kī a ia kua "pūrongo tika, me te kore tautoko, he aha te kōrero a te mōrehu ki a au mō tō rātou āhua ki tō rātou ake tūkinotanga" i te wā o te wātū whakangungu. I kī anō a ia kua "whai te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ki te whakahaere moroiti me te whakahaere i te uiui", ā, kua "whakararuraru" i a ia, ā, ka whakawehi ki te peke i a ia i a ia e ātete ana. I kī hoki a Prof Lamb kua tukua e ia nā "ngā tuma tukurua ki te rangatiratanga o te uiui", nāna i kī kua "whakararuraru i te wāteatanga o te paepae" me te "whakataka i te uiui i mua i te rongonga o te kaiwhakaatu tuatahi". Kua kī a Tēnā Swinney e whakakāhore ana a ia i ngā whakapae whakararuraru i te rangatiratanga o te uiui, ā, e hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki tētahi "uiui takitahi pakari e āhei ana ki te mahi me te kore wehi, manako rānei."

title: Ka whakamōhiotia e FCA ngā ture hōu hei whakarewa i te whiu pūtea
summary: Kua whakaputaina e te Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) ngā ture hōu hei whakahauhau i ētahi atu whiu i te Taone.
text: E kī ana ko te ariā he whakamana i ngā tangata ki te whakaara i ngā māharahara mō te whanonga kino i roto i ngā pēke me ngā kamupene inihua. E whai ana i ngā heitara pēke pēnei i te ngana ki te rāwekeweke i te mokatere Libor e Barclays, i whainatia ai te pēke e £290m i te tau 2012. I whakahaua e ngā MP ā muri ake kia ngāwari kē atu te amuamu a ngā kaipupuri. I te tau 2013 i huatau mai te Komihana Paremata mō ngā Paerewa Pākehā (PCBS) tērā pea ka tae wawe mai aua heitara, mēnā kua rite ngā kaimahi ki te whakaara i te pūoho. Ko te mahi tino pai Ko ngā ture hōu - ka mana i te wā o Mahuru 2016 - ka hiahiatia e ngā kamupene pūtea nunui kia "whai wāhi nui ngā kaipānui ki te whakaatu i te mahi kino i roto i ngā kamupene, ā, i ngā tau tata nei kua āwhina rātou i te mōhiohio e tino nui ana ki te mahi ki ngā kamupene me ngā tangata," te kī a Tracey McDermott, te rangatira nui o te WHK. I te 2014-15, i whiwhi te FCA i ngā amuamu 1,340 mai i ngā kaipupuri, he pikinga o te 28% i tērā tau. Ka pā ngā ture ki ngā pēke nunui, ki ngā rōpū hanga me ngā kamupene inihua, engari ka tohu hoki rātou i ngā tohutohu mahi tino pai mō ngā kamupene iti ake.

title: Whakapae tāwai mō te karaka kōti o Te Kōti o Te Kōti o Te Kō
summary: Kua noho te karaka hei tangata tuatahi i whakawāteatia i raro i te Ture Whakapati, mo te tango utu i a ia e mahi ana i tētahi kōti ki te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi.
text: I te wā o te takanga o Aotearoa, i mahi a Munir Yakub Patel, e 22, i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Redbridge i te wā o te takanga o Aotearoa. I tangohia e Patel, o Green Lane, Dagenham, te £500 hei karo i te hoatu i ngā taipitopito o tētahi karanga waka ki te pātengi raraunga o te kōti. I whakaae a ia ki tētahi tatau whakapati me te hē i a ia e puta ana ki te Kōti Karauna o Southwark. Na te Ture Whakapati hou, i mana i te 1 o Hōngongoi, i kore ai e taea te tuku, te whiwhi utu whakapati, me te kore e ārai i te utu whakapati. I mua i te ture hou, he rite tonu ngā ture i hoki mai ki te tau 1906, engari ko te Ture Whakapati e kapi ana hoki i te whakapati i tētahi mana tūmatanui kē me tētahi hara rangatōpū o te kore e whakamutu i te utu whakapati mō tō whakahaere. Nō mua atu, ka kī te Tari Tinihanga Nui ka whakamahia e ia te ture - e kapi ana i ngā kaimahi umanga, ngā māngai, ngā āpitihanga, ngā kaiwhakahaereroto, ētahi atu rōpū tuatoru rānei - ki te whai i ngā kamupene me ngā umanga kē kua whakarārangitia i Rāwāhi e whakapaetia ana e mahi ana i te utu whakapati. I hopukina a Patel i muri i te whakaahuatanga a te Rā i a ia e whakarite ana i te utu whakapati hei ārai i te whiu waka mo te tere o te tāurunga ki tētahi pātengi raraunga ā-ture. E anga ana a ia ki te mōrahi 10 tau i roto i te whare herehere. I kī te utu hē, i waenganui i a Hēpuari 2009 me Aotearoa 2011, ka hoatu e Patel he tohutohu ki te iwi me pēhea te karo i te karangatanga ki te kōti mo aua take. Engari i whakakāhore a ia i ngā tatau e whitu o te pupuri i tētahi tuhipānui hei whakamahi i te tinihanga. I whakahaua e te kōti ēnei whakapae kia takoto ki runga i te kōnae. Na te Kaiwhakawā o Hoani Utu i whakatūpato a Patel ka taea e ia te anga atu ki te tiakitanga wawe, ā, ka hikitia te whiu tae noa ki te 11 o Whiringa ā Rangi. Kua utua a ia tae noa ki tana whiu. I kī a Janice Johnson, nāna i tohu te karaka, he tangata pai a Patel i mua. I muri i te whakapae, ka kī a Gaon Hart, o te Ratonga Ture Karauna: "E hiahiatia ana ngā pononga tūmatanui kia mahi i runga i te tapatahi, te pono, te ahanoa me te tōkeke, engari kāore i taea e Patel te mahi i tua atu i ia o ēnei. " Na tana whanonga i whakararuraru ai te pūnaha ture hara i a ia e whai ana ki te tukituki i ngā ture i whakamahia e ia ki te tautoko. "Ko tēnei mahinga te tuatahi o tōna momo i raro i te Ture Whakapati 2010, nāna i whakarato he rākau nui i roto i ngā patu a ngā rōia e āhei ai mātou ki te arotahi ki te huānga whakapati, kaua ki te whanonga hē ahuwhānui."

title: Ka tohe a EU kia tiritiri i te kawenga whakangungu i waenganui i te ngangau o Āwherika
summary: Kua tohe ngā whenua i Uropi ki te tonga ki te toenga o te EU kia tiritiri i te pānga o te whakaae ki ngā kaiheke mai i Awherika ki te Raki i te wā e matapaetia ana he tomokanga hou.
text: I whakatakotoria e Itari, Paniora, Wīwī, Kaiperu, Malta me Kariki ngā tono tōtahi i tētahi hui a nga minita o roto o EU i Pōroa i te Tāite. E hiahia ana ngā whenua e ono kia noho tētahi pūnaha whakangungu EU noa iho i te tau 2012. Engari ko ngā whakatūpato Itari o tētahi haerenga "Paipera" mai i Ripia i pōhiritia e Tiamana me ētahi atu. E kī ana a Pirihi Mohi o TE AO i Pōroa, kotahi miriona neke atu rānei ngā kaiheke, he tokomaha o rātau mai i Āwherika ā-roto, e whakapono ana kei Ripia, e tūmanako ana kia tae ki Uropi. He tokomaha pea o rātau he hunga whakaruru tōrangapū, ehara i te mea ko ngā kaiheke ohaoha noa iho, nā reira he here tā Uropi i raro i ngā whakaaetanga motika tangata ki te tāutu i ngā hunga whakaruru tūturu e whai mana ana ki te hōhuru. Ka tono te Komihana Tiketike o UN mō ngā Hunga Whakaruru, o Te Komihana Nui o Te Hunga Whakaruru, ki te EU kia āwhina i te iwi o Ūrai. "Mēnā ka nui ake te āhuatanga o te āhuatanga, mēnā ka neke tātau ki tētahi taumata whawhai e kaha ana ki te putanga nui mai i Ripia, he tino hira kia whakapūmautia te mokowā parenga i Uropi," tana kī i muri i tana tūtakitanga ki ngā kaiwhakahaere matua o EU. 'Ohorere kino' I tonoa e ngā whenua Māuirangi e ono i tūtaki ōna minita ki Roma i te Wenerei he hōtaka mō te whakawhitiwhiti - arā, ko te hora i ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku puta noa i Uropi mēnā ka tae mai rātau i roto i te nuinga o te wā. E hiahia ana rātau kia whakatūria he pūtea tāruru motuhake hei āwhina i a rātau ki te tukatuka i ngā kaiheke e tae mai ana. "Kei mua mātau i tētahi ohorere atawhai, ā, e inoi ana ahau ki Uropi kia whakatau i ngā tikanga katoa e tika ana hei mahi i tētahi ohorere atawhai," te kī a te Minita o Roto o Itari, o Roberto Maroni i Pōroa i te Rāite. I pūruatia e te Minita o Roto Pāniora a Alfredo Perez Rubalcaba tōna hoa, e kī ana ko Itari "te tatau anake o Uropi". E kī ana to mātau korero kōrero he tono tino tautohetohe ēnei, e kore e manakohia e Ingarangi, e ētahi atu whenua maha rānei. I kī te Minita o Roto o Ahurangi, a Maria Theresia Fekter, kua whiwhi tōna whenua i ngā rau mano o ngā hunga whakaruru i te wā o ngā pakanga o Balkana i nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, ā, ka taea e Itari te whakahaere i a ia anō ngā kaiheke ture e 5,000 mai i Tunihia i tae mai i tērā wiki ki te motu o Lampedusa. I kī te Minita o Roto o Tiamana, a Tōma de Maiziere, "kāore he tomokanga rerenga i tēnei wā" ā, me kaua e "whakapataritari i tētahi mā te kōrero mōna". "Kaua tātou e tākaro ki te whakamataku i a tātau anō," te kī a Melchior Wathelet o Peretiama. I roto i tētahi whakahaere o nā noa nei, i werohia e te Kōti Motika Tangata o Ūropi te Ture Dublin II o te EU, e whakahokia ai ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku ki tō rātou wāhi tāurunga ki te EU. Ko te tikanga o te ture hei ārai i te "hokohoko whakangungu" i Uropi, engari kua whāwhā ake i te matawaenga o Kariki, e raruraru ana ki te whakatikatika i ngā mano o ngā taupānga whakangungu. Ko te tomokanga mai o Lampedusa Lampedusa - he motu iti i te Māuirangi i waenganui i Tunihia me Itari - he wāhi tomokanga nui ki Uropi mō ngā tauiwi mai i Āwherika. I ngā tau tata nei kua haukotia hoki e Malta rāua ko Paniora te maha o ngā kaiheke mai i Āwherika. I te nuinga o te wā he pārekareka nga poti, ā, ka mōrearea o rātau oranga i roto i to rātau hiahia kia tae ki Uropi. Kei te whakarato te pokapū taitapa EU o Frontex i te tautoko arawhiti ki Itari. I te kaha o te whakatikanga i Ripia, ka whakatūpato te kāwanatanga o Col Muammar Pākia ki te EU ka mutu te mahi tahi i runga i te hekenga ture mai i Awherika ki te Raki mēnā ka tāruatia e te EU te hunga e rapu ana ki te turaki i a ia i te mana. I ngā tau tata nei, kua mahi tahi a Itari rāua ko Ripia ki te haukoti i ngā kaiheke ture kore mana i te Māuirangi. I muri i te tīmatanga o ngā pōhēhētanga nahanaha, ka nui te heke o aua poti.

title: Tūtukitanga a Harry Dunn: Ka whakaarahia e ngā mātua o te taitamariki ngā 'āwangawanga' waka tūroro
summary: Kua tūtaki ngā mātua o te taitamariki nāna i mate te tautohetohe o te ao whānui ki ngā rangatira waka tūroro NHS ki te whakaara i ngā "māharahara" i tōna wā urupare.
text: I mate a Harry Dunn, 19, i te hōhipera i muri i te tūtukitanga i te taiwhenua o Northamptonshire i Aotearoa. I mahue i te kaipōhēhē te UK e tohu ana i ngā āraitanga whakawhanaunga. I tae mai te kaimahi tuatahi o te East Midlands Ambulance Service (EMAS) i te 41 meneti i muri i te tīmatanga o te waea 999. I korerotia ki ōna mātua i tētahi hui i tukuna te rauemi tata rawa e wātea ana. I tūtuki te motopaika a Tāne Dunn ki tētahi motokā nā te tangata whenua o Amerika, a Anne Sacoolas, te wahine 42 tau a tētahi takawaenga, i waho o RAF Croughton, tata ki Brackley, i te 27 o Aotearoa. E whakahauhau ana tōna whaea, a Charlotte Charles, me tōna pāpā, a Tim Dunn, ki te tika i muri i te hokinga mai o Mrs Sacoolas ki a Mātau, e tono ana i ngā āraitanga whakawhanaunga, i muri noa iho i te tūtukitanga. Kua hoatu e ngā Pirihimana o Northamptonshire tētahi kōnae ki te Ratonga Ture Karauna i muri i te uiuitanga i te hunga pōhēhē i te US. I mahia te waea ohorere mō te tūtukitanga i te 20:25 BST, ā, i te mōhiotanga me te hāhā a Tēnā Dunn i te taenga mai o te waea 999, i māka hei kāwai tuarua, e kī ana ngā tohutohu me urupare aua waea ki te iwa i roto i te 10 ngā wā i mua i te 40 meneti. I tae mai tētahi tākuta, i tukuna i roto i te rua meneti, e 41 meneti i muri i te tīmatanga o te waea 999, ā, e rua meneti i muri i te tākuta ka tae mai he waka tūroro. I whakawhitia a Tēnā Dunn ki te Pokapū Trauma Matua i te Whare Wānanga o John Radcliffe i Oxford, engari i muri iho ka kōrerotia kua mate. I kī a Richard Henderson, te rangatira nui o EMAS NHS Trust, i muri i te hui: "I hiahia ahau ki te whai wāhi ki te whakarongo mai i te whānau i tēnei wāhanga, i a au e mōhio ana ki ngā matatinitanga me ngā tairongotanga o ngā tūhuratanga ā-waho e haere tonu ana. " E mōhio ana ahau he wā tino uaua tēnei mō te whānau, nō reira e whakamihi ana ahau ki te wā i noho ai ahau ki a rātou." I kī te kaikorero o te whānau o Tāne Dunn, a Radd Seiger, i "tino whakamihi ngā mātua ki ngā kaimahi katoa i mahi ngāwari ki te whakaora i te ora o Harry i taua pō". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tino mahana, he kōrero whaitake tā mātou me tētahi tirohanga ki te whakamārama i ngā whakamātautau maha e anga ana ki te ratonga, ā, tērā pea i whai wāhi ki te takaware i te pō o te tūtukitanga. " I taea e ngā mātua te whakapuaki i o rāua māharahara ki a Rārangi rāua ko Nichola [Bramhall, kaiwhakahaere kounga] i runga i te huarahi pai me te whakaaro ki te mahi tahi kia kore ai tētahi atu tūroro e pāngia e Harry."

title: Ko te takawaenga ExoMars o Uropi i roto i te 'saloon whakamutunga'
summary: Ko te mahi takawaenga a Uropi ki Mars e "inu ana i roto i te saloon whakamutunga", e whakatūpato ana i te tumuaki o te European Space Agency.
text: Nā Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent, kua kī atu a Prague Jan Woerner ki ngā kaipānui i tōna hōhonu hōhonu kua takaware anō te kaupapa ki te puru i te robot ki runga i te mata o te Aorangi Whero. Kāore i taea e te mahi te whai hōtaka, tahua rānei, tana kī. I te tau 2011, i whakaritea tuatahitia te waka wīra ono o ExoMars kia wehe atu i te Ao i te tau 2011, engari kāore e haere ināianei tae noa ki te tau 2020. Ko te kore e taea e ngā tīma te whakatutuki i ngā rā kati tuku pūmārō kua whakahuatia hei take mo te takaware hou rawa. He hōtaka hipanga rua a ExoMars e hangaia tahitia ana me ngā Rūhia. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi he aorangi hei ako i te hauora o te aorangi, ā, i tutuki pai te whakarewa i tēnei i Poutāpeta. Engari ko te wāhanga tuarua - he takawaenga e āhei ana ki te wiri i te 2m ki te mata o Mars - he rōra o te haere mai i te wā i whakaaetia tuatahitia hei ariā i te tau 2005. Kua kite tēnei i te mania whakarewa mai i te 2011 ki te 2013, ki te 2016, ki te 2018, ā, ināianei ki te 2020. "Ehara i te mea ohorere noa iho ahau, engari i tino pōrangi ahau i taku whiwhinga i ngā mōhiohio he raruraru takaware," te kī a Tēnā Woerner ki a TE Rongokōrero. "Kāore au i whakaae ki te takaware mo te hawhe tau, a, i whawhai pēnei i te reinga kia whai rongoā, engari i te mutunga o te rā me whakaae ahau ki a Igor Komarov (te tumuaki o te wāhi ātea o Rūhia) me ahau kāore e taea te whakarewa i te tau 2018." I kī a Tēnā Woerner tērā pea ka whakaritea te takawaenga me ana taputapu tautoko katoa i te wā kia whakarewaina i te tīmatanga o te tau 2019, engari i taua wā ka hapa i te wā ā-waka tino pai e puta ana i ia 26 marama ina tiaro te Ao me te Mars. I hoatu ētahi whakaaro ki te whakarewa i te takawaenga, kātahi ka rokiroki noa iho ki te āwhiotanga i runga ake i te Ao i mua i te whakarewatanga ki Mars i te tīaroaro panuku, engari ka mōrearea tērā i te tūkinotanga o te taiao mokowā pākaha. Ko ngā hui takenui Ko te hiahia ki te whakaiti i ngā utu tāpiri ka puta mai i tētahi atu taumahatanga i roto i te hōtaka. He nui te utu o te pupuri i ngā tīma nunui, ā, ka nui ake te tūtohu utu e tū ana ināianei neke atu i te kotahi miriona hōro. Kai te tūtaki a Tēnā Woerner ki nga iwi o Ūropi e tino nui ana te mahi i roto i te takahurihuri. Ko ēnei whenua ko te UK me Itari. Tae atu ki ērā atu āhuatanga mema o Esa, ināianei me tā rātou i tētahi ara tautoko mō te kaupapa. Ko ngā hui karihi e whakatauria ai te wā heke mai o te takawaenga ka tae mai i June i tētahi kaunihera o ngā tonotono ā iwi, whai muri i te huihuinga o ngā minita mokowā i te mutunga o te tau. I tēnei wā kei te tautohetohe a Esa ki ōna hoa mahi mo te utu o te mahi. Me whakatika tēnei whakawhāititanga i te tuatahi. Engari kāore i taea e Tēnā Woerner te huna i tōna riri i te utu e piki haere tonu ana a Esa kia utua. "Ko te tangata ko ia te pūtake o ngā takaware - me tino āta titiro mēnā e āhei ana hoki rātou ki te tiki moni tāpiri, nā te mea ko rātou te take i takawaretia ai tātau," tana kī. "Mai i taku tirohanga he tino rerekē mēnā ka kī koe, 'Āe, ka mahia e au ā muri ake, nō reira ka nui ake taku moni'." I kī te tumuaki ahuwhānui he uaua ki te tango moni mai i ētahi atu wāhi o te tahua a te kōwhiringa hei tārewa noa iho i a ExoMars. "Ka whai kōrero mātou i roto i ngā kāwanatanga mema matua e uru ana ki te hōtaka, ā, ka kite mātou me pēhea e taea ai e mātou te whakahaere, mēnā ka taea e mātou te whakahaere. Kāore au i te kī ka taea e mātou te whakahaere." E kōrero ana a Tēnā Woerner i konei i Prague i te Huihuinga Aorangi Ora o te Pokapū Mokowā o Ūropi - he hui i whakatapua ki te Kitenga Whenua. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i runga i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: Na nga whēkau i whakawhitia i hoatu ki nga tūroro te mate pukupuku
summary: Kua karangatia e te whānau o tētahi tangata i mate i muri i te whiwhinga i tētahi whakawhitinga ate mai i tētahi kaituku mate pukupuku kāore i kitea, kia nui ake ngā whakamātautau hōhonu.
text: I te tuatahi ka ora a Tom Tyreman, e 63, mai i Stockton, i muri i te mahinga i te Hōhipera Freeman o Newcastle i te tau ki mua, engari i mate i te mate pukupuku i te wā o Hui tanguru. I kitea ā muri ake he puku pukupuku iti i roto i te okana kaituku kāore i tīkina e te whakamātautau. I kī te hōhipera kāore i taea te tūmanako i te "putanga kino". I kī te Ratonga Toto me te Whakawhitiwhiti NHS e mahi ana i ngā mea katoa e taea ana kia tika ai ngā okana katoa i homai, engari nā te āhua ohorere me te tere o te koha o te okana, kāore i taea te tirotiro i tētahi kaituku i mua. Ko Pauline Hunt, e 49, mai i Kilmarnock, kua mate pukupuku hoki i muri i te whiwhinga tākihi mai i te kaituku kotahi; he wahine i mate i te toto toto. I kī te tuahine o Tāne Tyreman, a Jane Bird, me "nui ake te mōhiotanga" o ngā kaimahi o te hōhipera mō ngā mea ka hē pea. "I korerotia mai ki a mātau ka taea e ia te whakawhanake i te mate pukupuku i raro ake i te raina nā te mea i tino pēhia tana pūnaha ārai, i whakaaetia e mātau", tana kī. "Engari kāore anō mātau i korerotia tērā pea ka taea e ia te tiki mai i te okana i homai. " Ki taku whakaaro me nui ake ngā whakamātautau pākaha. E kore e whakaaetia i tēnei rā me te pakeke kāore e taea te mahi i ngā whakamātautau tūkaha ake." I kōrero te whānau o Tāne Tyreman i muri i te whakaahuatanga a Mrs Hunt i a ia anō "i raro i te whiu mate". Ka kī a ia: "Kaua tētahi tangata e whawhai ki te mate pukupuku o tētahi atu." Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: I kī tētahi kaikōrero NHS Blood and Transplant e "āta tirohia" ana te hītori rongoā o ngā kaituku tūpono, ā, mēnā ka kitea he āhuatanga ka mahia he biopsy. Engari "i ngā take tino āhua kore nei tērā pea he puku iti tā te kaituku kāore e taea te tiki ake e ngā whakamātautau i mahia i te wā whāiti e wātea ana i mua i te whakawhitinga". "Ko te tikanga o tēnei he mōrearea te tarenga o tētahi mate pukupuku kāore i kitea, ahakoa he tino āhua kore nei." I kī te Hōhipera o Freeman e haere ana tētahi tūhuratanga.

title: Works planned to protect Weymouth from flood
summary: E hiahiatia ana ngā mahi pūkaha "tauine nui" neke atu i te £115m hei pare i a Weymouth i te waipuke ākau, kua kī te Kaunihera o Dorset.
text: Kua whakaritea e te mana he mahere hei whakanui ake i te teitei o te taiepa whanga, te whakatika i ngā tūāpapa taiepa moana me te whakakapi i ngā taiepa koiora i roto i ngā tau e 35 e whai ake nei. E kī ana kei te tāruatia hoki ngā mahere ōrite mō Swanage. I whakaahuatia e te kaikaunihera o te tupu o te ohaoha o Te Rūnanga o Te Wānanga te rautaki he "tino mīharo, he hao hoki". I kī te kaunihera i mōrearea a Weymouth, kua pāngia kētia e te waipuke, i te pikinga o te taumata moana 1.3m i matapaetia i roto i ngā tau e 100 e whai ake nei. The council's strategy includes the replacement of seven sections of harbour walls including North Quay Road, Custom House Quay, and Westwey Road and raising nine sections including Commercial Rd, Cove Row and Nothe Parade by 2030. Tae noa ki te tau 2025, ka kī te mana e whakaaro ana ki te whakatika i ngā tūāpapa taiepa moana o te wāhanga o Greenhill, ā, i te tau 2035 ka oti ngā mahi whakapaipai, tae atu ki ngā mahi ki te hāereere. E whā ngā wāhanga o ngā pakitara koiora e whakakapia ana i te tau 2027. Tata ki te hauwhā o te utu katoa ka pūteatia e te Kaunihera o Dorset, ka kī te mana. I te 6 o Whiringa ā-rangi, ka kōrerorerotia te rautaki e te kāpata o te kaunihera.

title: Extinction Rebellion 'not sorry' after Wiltshire chalk horse deface
summary: E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere taiao kāore rātau i te pouri mō te waihanga i tētahi moko Extinction Rebellion i runga i te hoiho tioka.
text: I whakatakotoria te moko, i hangaia ki ngā kākahu, ki runga i te hoiho o Alton Barnes i Wiltshire, kātahi anō ka tioka anō e ngā tamariki kura. I kī a Rob Sutherland, nāna i ārahi te tioka anō o Hōngongoi, kua "tino whakararuraru" te hapori. I kī a ia i "matekiri, i te riri" ngā tamariki, ā, "kāore i mārama me pēhea e taea ai e ngā pakeke te mahi i tēnei". I kī a Hemi Noble, mai i Extinction Rebellion Vale o Pewsey, kua mahia te moko, i tāpiritia i te ata Rātapu, hei miramira "kei te whakangaromia e tātau te aorangi e noho nei tātau". I kī a ia ko te mahi a te iwi paetata me ngā tamariki i mahi anō, "he mahi tino pai". "Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahia ana mātau ki te mahi ko te tūkino. I tino tūpato mātau ki te āhua o to mātau hīkoi i runga. I mōhio tonu a Emily ko wai hei tono āwhina ki te whakahou i tētahi tohu whenua o te rohe! (mā te BBC Wiltshire) "E pouri ana ahau kei te riri te iwi... engari kaore ahau e whakapāha mo te whakararuraru i te iwi, i mahi mātau i to mātau kaha kia kaua e tūkino i te hoiho," tana tāpiri mai. I tangohia te moko e te rangatira o te whenua i te ata Mane. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Sutherland: "He tokomaha aku tāngata i whakapā mai ki a au i roto i ngā haora e 24 kua hipa. I whakamāramatia e au ki ngā tamariki i tēnei ata - kāore rātau i te mārama he pēhea te mahi a ngā pakeke i tēnei. "Kua whakawāteatia e rātau tētahi mea i pau i a rātau te wā me te kaha ki te mahi, ā, kei te tino whakarihariha rātau. " E pouri ana rātau, kei te riri rātau, kei reira katoa te riri. "Ko te mea nui rawa atu i te rōpū [Extinction Rebellion] anō. " E whakahauhau ana koe i ngā tamariki kia mahi i te mea tika, ka mahi koe i ngā mahi tōrunga, ā, kāore anō tēnei kia puta. He tino tauaro." I whakaoratia te whakamaharatanga i te raumati me tētahi hepa RAF Chinook i whakamahia hei kawe i ngā tāhei tioka neke atu i te 40 tāhei ki runga i te maunga. I whakakāhoretia te nganatanga tuatahi e te hau nui me te marangai taraiwa, engari i te mutunga o te mahi i a Aotearoa i te otinga o ngā tauira Tau 6 me o rātau mātua i te kanohi. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: E tautāwhi ana te PM o Ahitereiria i te kaupapa whakangungu 'uaua' i waenganui i ngā kerēme tūkino
summary: I kī te pirimia o Ahitereiria e "mahi" ana ngā kaupapa here whakangungu hou uaua, i te āhua o ngā whakakitenga hou e whakaatu ana i ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku e whakahokia ana ki Initonīhia.
text: I kī a Taraiwa kāore he poti ture i tae ki Ahitereiria i roto i ngā rā e 50 kua taha. I tēnei wā, i whakaputaina e tētahi nūpepa tētahi uiuinga ki tētahi tangata nāna i kite i ngā kaimahi o te taua moana e tūkino ana i ngā kaiwhaiwhai i tērā marama. Kua tino whakakāhore nga minita kāwanatanga i nga kerēme tūkino me te whakahē i te pānuitanga o nga pūrongo. I te Paraire, ka whakaputaina e te kaipānui o Ahitereiria ABC he whakakitenga o te āhua nei he waka whakaora o ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku e tōia ana e tētahi oko o Ahitereiria. E whakaarotia ana he waka whakaora i tae mai ki te takutai o Java i te Wenerei, ka kī a ABC. I muri i te kī a ngā pūrongo pāpāho kua hokona e te kāwanatanga he poti whakaora mo te whakahoki i ngā kaiwhaiwhai whakangungu ki Initonīhia. I kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Initonīhia, a Marty Natalegawa: "Kāore tēnei momo kaupapahere whakawhiti i ngā tāngata mai i tētahi poti ki tētahi atu, kātahi ka whakahoki i a rātou ki Initonīhia, ehara i te tino āwhina." Kāore te kāwanatanga i whakaae ki te kōrero mō ngā pūrongo o ngā poti whakaora me ngā tāhae whakamuri. Heoi anō, kātahi anō ka tukuna he whakapae ki Initonīhia mō te tūkino "pokanoa" i ōna wai i ngā wā maha. Ko Initonīhia he wāhi whakawhiti mō ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāngata, e kawe ana i ngā kaiwhaiwhai ki Te Motu Kirihimete, te wāhi tata rawa o te rohe o Ahitereiria, i runga i ngā poti kōpikopiko, kōpikopiko hoki. I a ia e kōrero ana i te Paraire, ka kī a Tēnā Wānanga: "E koa ana ahau kua 50 rā ināianei kāore he poti ture e tae ana ki Ahitereiria, ā, kei te mārama te karere ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāngata me ā rātou kiritaki kua katia te huarahi." "Kei te mahi ēnei kaupapahere," tana tāpiri mai. "Āe, he uaua rātou, engari kei te mahi rātou." Ināianei, i whakaputaina e te pāpāho o Fairfax tētahi uiuinga ki tētahi kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku, nāna i kite i te tūkinotanga o ngā kaiwhaiwhai e toru e ngā kaimahi o te taua moana, i te wā o tētahi mahi whakamuri i te tōmua o Hānuere. Ka kī atu a Yousif Ihu Fasher ki a Fairfax media ka tahuna e nga kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku o rātau ringa i muri i to rātau whakahau kia pupuri i tētahi paipa wera wera i runga i te poti hei whiu mo te whakahē mo te urunga ki te whare haumaru. Kāore anō tana kōrero kia whakapūtātia e ngā tāngata tokotoru, nāna i kī he mataku rawa ki te kōrero. I kī te Minita Manene, a Scott Morrison i te Rāitema he "whakahāwea kino, kāore i te mōhiotia" nga whakaaro ki te taua moana. "Ko te kāwanatanga... ka whakakāhore hāngai tonu i ngā whakaaro o te whanonga kore mahi a to tātau iwi e mahi ana i roto i te Mahi Taitapa Ariki," tana tāpiri mai. Nā ngā kerēme tūkino, me te āhua o te hīpoki, i puta ai te tautohetohe nui. I pūrongotia e ABC ngā whakaaro i te 22 o Hānuere, e whakaatu ana i ngā whakakitenga o ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku e whakamahia ana mō te wera i runga i o rātau ringa. I whakaūngia e nga pirihimana o Initonīhia he tohu tahu i runga i o rātau ringa ētahi kaiwhaiwhai. Heoi anō, kāore tonu i te mārama he pēhea te wera. I tino whakakāhoretia nga kerēme tūkino e te hōia me te kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria. I whakahē hoki a Tēnā Wānanga i te pānuitanga a te ABC o ngā kerēme, e kī ana ehara i te "tika, whārite", "tika" rānei. I roto i tētahi kōrero i tēnei wiki, ka kī te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere me te kaiwhakahaere rongokōrero o ABC ko te tikanga kia "pū ake" te kupu o te pūrongo. "Ka pouri [mātou] mēnā i ārahi tā mātou pūrongo ki te whakaaro hē i tautokona e te ABC ngā kerēme a ngā kaiwhaiwhai," te kī a te kōrero. "I ngā wā katoa ka whakaaturia e te ABC ngā whakaaro kia rite tonu ki tērā - e tika ana kia tūhuratia anōtia," te kī a te kōrero, kātahi anō ka noho tonu te pūrākau "i runga i te painga tūmatanui". I kī te Minita Whakangungu a Rawiri Johnston i te Paraire kua "kino kino" te taua moana, ā, i kī a ia i riri ka whakaekea e tētahi "pokapū rongokōrero o Ahitereiria [ABC] te taua moana". Kua whakapaea e nga kaiwhakawāwā te kāwanatanga mo te huna mo te kaupapa whakangungu. I te Paraire, ka kī a Tēnā Wānanga e kore te kāwanatanga e tuku i ngā whakarākeitanga o ngā mahi a te taua moana ki te haukoti i ngā kaiwhaiwhai, e kī ana "tērā pea ka whakararuraru i te mahi o te whakatū i ngā poti". Heoi anō, i kī te kaiārahi whakahē a Bill Shorten e "huna ana" te kāwanatanga i te hōia. "Ko te mea e hiahiatia ana e tātau i konei ko te wareware i te huna," tana kī. "Ka hoatu e te iwi o Ahitereiria he āhua tārewa ki ngā kāwanatanga mēnā kei mua rātau ki te iwi o Ahitereiria".

title: Kirihou: Ka whakarewaina e WHO te arotakenga hauora
summary: Me whakarewa e te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao he arotakenga ki ngā mōrea tūpono o te kirihou i roto i te wai inu.
text: Nā David ShukmanKaiwhakatika pūtaiao Ka aromatawai i ngā rangahau hou ki te horahanga me te pānga o ngā kirihou moroiti - he iti rawa ngā korakora hei kai. I muri i te kitenga o te rōpū pukapuka pukapuka Orb Media i ngā korakora kirihou i roto i ngā toa nui o te wai pounamu. Kāore he whakaaturanga ka taea e ngā kirihou moroiti te tukituki i te hauora tangata, engari e hiahia ana te WHO ki te aromatawai i te āhua o te mātauranga. I kī atu a Bruce Gordon, te kairuruku o te mahi huri noa a WHO i runga i te wai me te noho ma, ki a BBC News ko te pātai matua mēnā ka pā pea te kai, te inu rānei i ngā korakora kirihou. "Ina whakaaro mātou ki te hanganga o te kirihou, mēnā he paitini kei roto, he aha te nui o ngā wahanga kino, he aha tonu te mahi a ngā korakora i roto i te tinana – kāore noa iho te rangahau i reira hei kōrero mai ki a mātau. " I te nuinga o te wā he tepenga 'haumaru' tātau, engari kia whai tepenga haumaru, hei whakamārama i tēnā, me mārama mēnā he mōrearea ēnei mea, ā, mēnā ka puta i roto i te wai i ngā whakamōhiotanga mōrearea." I kī a Tēnā Kōnata kāore a ia i pīrangi ki te whakaoho i tētahi tangata, ā, i whakawhāititia hoki he tuma nui ake te wai e puta mai ana i ngā whenua e tāhaetia ai ngā rawa ki te paraka. Engari i kī a ia i mōhio ia ka huri ngā tāngata e rongo ana ki te aroaro o ngā kirihou moroiti i roto i a rātau wai inu ki te WHO mō ngā tohutohu. "E mārama ana ka māharahara te iwi whānui mēnā ka mate rātou i te wā poto me te wā roa." Ko tētahi wāhanga o te mahi a WHO he urupare ki tētahi akoranga i mātakina ai neke atu i te 250 ngā pounamu wai mai i ngā toa rerekē e 11 i hokona i ngā whenua e iwa - ko te tūhuratanga nui rawa atu o tōna momo. I kawea ngā whakamātautau i te Whare Wānanga o Niu Ioka i Fredonia hei wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa e pā ana ki te rangahau taketake me te pūrongo a te rōpū pukapuka pukapuka ā-US, o Orb Media. Mā te whakamahi i tētahi tae e kiia nei ko te Whero o Naira, e here ana ki ngā wāhanga kirihou mānu koreutu, ka kitea e Prof Sherri Mason o te whare wānanga he toharite e 10 ngā korakora kirihou mō ia rīta wai, he nui ake i te rahi o te makawe tangata. I kitea hoki ngā korakora iti iho he kirihou, engari kāore i kitea tikatia - he toharite 314 mō ia rīta. O ngā pounamu katoa i whakamātauria, e 17 i kitea kāore he korakora i te nuinga o ngā rau, mano rānei, me ngā rerekētanga nui i roto i ngā toa me te pōkai pounamu ōrite. I whakapā atu mātou ki ngā kamupene i muri i ngā toa me te nuinga o te urupare, e tū ana i te kounga me te haumaru o ā rātou hua. He torutoru noa iho ngā pātai he aha i teitei ake ai ngā hua o te akoranga i ā rātou ake rangahau ā-roto, i whakamārama rānei kāore he ture mō ngā kirihou, i ngā tikanga whakaae rānei mō te whakamātau mō rātou. Ka puta mai te akoranga i runga i ngā tūhuratanga tōmua kua kitea he kirihou moroiti i roto i te wai paipa, pia, tote moana me te ika, ā, ka kī mai a Prof Mason ki a au me āhei ngā kairangahau ki te whakautu i te pātai pēhi mēnā ka tūkino ngā kirihou. "Ko tā mātou e mōhio ana, he nui rawa ētahi o ēnei korakora, ina kainga, tērā pea ka whakawāteatia, engari i te huarahi ka taea e rātou te tuku i ngā matū e pā ana ki te hauora tangata. " He tino iti rawa ētahi o ēnei korakora ka taea e rātou te haere puta noa i te ara whekau, puta noa i te papa, ā, kāore mātou i te mōhio ki ngā take o tērā tikanga ki o tātau momo okana me ngā pūtautau." I kī te Pokapū Paerewa Kai o UK, kāore e taea e ngā taumata kirihou moroiti i pūrongotia i roto i ngā pounamu wai te tūkino, engari i tāpiritia, "māna e aromatawai ētahi mōhiohio puta noa e pā ana ki ngā kirihou moroiti i roto i te kai me te inu". For Dr Stephanie Wright of the King's College Centre for Environment and Health, the priority is to understand how much microplastic we are exposed to, and exactly what happens to it inside us. Kua whakapūtātia e ngā kairangahau ka taea e ngā korakora iti o te titanium dioxide te puta i roto i te whāngai o te ngākau kia taea ai te kirihou, e whakaara ana i te pātai ki hea ka mutu. I kī mai a Dr Wright ki a au: "Ka noho pea ngā korakora i roto i tētahi pūtau ārai i roto i te whāngai whekau, ka tukuna rānei ki roto i tō mātou pūnaha lymphatic ka mutu ki ngā kōpuku lymph, he iti rānei te kaha ki te tomo ki te awa toto, ā, tērā pea ka whakaemi i roto i te ate. " He korakora mārō kē ēnei e tino hiahia ana tō tātau tinana ki te whakakore, engari kāore e taea nā te mea kāore te kirihou i te whakaheke, nā reira ka tūkino te kikokiko o te rohe. "Engari i tēnei wā kāore mātou i te mōhio." I huatau atu ahau ki a Michael Walker, he kaitohutohu ki te Office of the UK Government Chemist me te mema o te poari kaiwhakarewa o te Food Standards Agency, kei te mōhio te hūri mēnā ka tūkinotia e ngā kirihou moroiti. Ka whakautua e ia: "E kī ana ngā tuhinga pūtaiao ehara i te mea kāore anō te hūri kia puta i tēnei pātai, engari kāore anō kia whakaritea te hūri ki runga." Ka kitea te pūrongo katoa o Orb Media i www.OrbMedia.org Whāia a Rawiri i Twitter

title: E kī ana a Zuckerberg o Facebook i hauhaketia ana raraunga
summary: Kua whakaaturia mai e te rangatira nui o Facebook ko ana raraunga i waenganui i tērā i hauhaketia i roto i tētahi heitara tūmataitinga.
text: I whakapuakina e Mark Zuckerberg te whakaaturanga i tōna rā tuarua e pātaitia ana i Washington. I roto i tētahi whanaketanga pātahi, kua pānuitia e te tohutohu tōrangapū i te ngākau o te take e whakararo ana tana rangatira nui. I whakaaturia hoki e ia kei te hōpara tana umanga mēnā ka mahi ki te Whare Wānanga o Kemipiri. Ko te whare wānanga te wāhi i noho ai te kairangahau o Aleksandr Kogan, nāna i kohikohi, i hoko hoki i ngā raraunga whaiaro ki Cambridge Analytica. "What we found now is that there's a whole programme associated with Cambridge University where... he maha ētahi atu kairangahau e hanga ana i ngā taupānga ōrite," te kī a Tēnā Zuckerberg. "Nā reira, me mārama mātou mēnā he mea kino e haere ana i te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge e hiahiatia ana he tauhohenga kaha ake mai i a mātau." Kua urupare te whare wānanga mā te kī ka "ohorere" mēnā kei te mōhio noa iho a Tēnā Zuckerberg ki te mahi. "Kua whakaputaina e ā mātou kairangahau ēnei rangahau mai i te tau 2013 i roto i ngā pukapuka pūtaiao nui i arotakea e te hoa, ā, kua pūrongotia whānuitia ēnei akoranga i roto i te pāpāho aowhānui," kua tāpirihia. "Kua whakaurua e ēnei tētahi akoranga i te tau 2015 i arahina e Dr Aleksandr Spectre (Kogan) me ngā kaimahi Facebook tokorua. " Kāore i kitea e mātou he whakaaturanga kei te kohikohi hē ngā kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga i ngā raraunga whaiaro." I mua rā ka whakapārewa a Tēnā Zuckerberg i te korenga o te taki i te tau 2015 kua mukua e Cambridge Analytica ngā mōhiohio i kohia mō ngā miriona kaiwhakamahi Facebook. Engari i tukuna e Facebook te tohutohu tōrangapū ki te whakamana i a ia anō kua whakangaromia ngā pūkete, e kī ana kua riro mai i te tūkinotanga o ngā ture o te whatunga pāpori. "He kawenga tā mātou ki te whakarite kāore e puta anō te mea i pā ki [kaiwhakawhanake taupānga] Kogan me Cambridge Analytica," te kī a Tēnā Zuckerberg. I tāpiritia e te tau 33 tau ka pau ngā marama hei whakaoti i te arotaupū a Facebook o ētahi atu taupānga. Engari i kī a ia kāore anō te umanga kia kite i ngā whakaaturanga kua ngana a Rūhia, Haina rānei ki te waru i ngā mōhiohio a te iwi. Whakapai ake koa i tō pūtirotiro hei tiro i ēnei ihirangi. Ngā whakapāha a Facebook Rārangi Wā, Tiria tēnei rārangi wā, kua whakakāhore a Cambridge Analytica i te whati i te ture, ā, i kī kua mukua ngā raraunga. Kua pānuitia hoki e te kamupene kei te heke iho tōna rangatira nui o Dr Alexander Taylor i te pou ki te tīmata anō i tōna tūnga tōmua hei āpiha raraunga matua. Ko Alexander Nix, nāna i whakahaere tae noa ki Poutāpeta, ka whakatārewatia tonutia. E whā haora te āhua o Tēnā Zuckerberg i mua i te Komiti o te Whare mo te Pūngao me te Tauhokohoko, i whai i tētahi wātū e rima haora i mua i ngā komiti e rua o te Senate inanahi. I te wā o tētahi whakawhitinga tōmua whakamātautau, ka whakapeka a ia ki te tuku i tētahi whakaaetanga ki te huri i ngā tautuhinga tūmataitinga taunoa katoa a ngā kaiwhakamahi hei kohikohi i te mōkito o ngā mōhiohio whaiaro. "He take matatini tēnei," te kī a Tēnā Zuckerberg. "He whakakino tēnā ki a au," te urupare a te tangata o te Rōpū Manapori o Frank Pallone. I tētahi atu wāhi i roto i te whakarongo, ka whakaae a Tēnā Zuckerberg e whakapono ana a ia he "tē mōhiotia" ka hiahiatia e te ipurangi he ture hou. "Ehara taku tūnga i te mea kia kaua he ture, engari e whakaaro ana hoki ahau me tūpato koe ki ngā ture i whakaritea e koe," tana kī. I anga atu hoki te rangatira Facebook ki ngā whakapae hou mai i te tangata o te Rōpū ā Iwi o Steve Scalise e whakahāwea ana te hātepe papatono a te Whāngai Rongokōrero ki ngā rongokōrero me ngā ihirangi tūturu e manakohia ana e ngā whakairinga ohaoha. "Kāore rawa he tohutohu i roto i tētahi o ngā huringa e mahia ana e mātau kia tītaha," te urupare a Tēnā Zuckerberg. "I tua atu, ko tā mātou whāinga kia noho hei pūhara mō ngā whakaaro katoa." I ohorere tētahi atu Pākehā mā te whakaatu i ngā whakaahua o ngā pānuitanga ture mō ngā rongoā opioid i kī ai ia i runga i Facebook inanahi. "Kei te whakahohe tonu a Facebook i tētahi ngohe kore mana, ā, kei te whakamamae koe i ngā tāngata," te kī a te tangata kōwanatanga a David McKinley. "He maha ngā wāhi ihirangi e hiahiatia ana e tātau kia pai ake te mahi pirihimana," te whakautu a Tēnā Zuckerberg, kātahi anō ka whakapono ia ka taea tēnei e ngā utauta mōhiohio horihori ā muri ake nei. Heoi anō, he tokomaha nga kaipōrangapū i tohutohu i a Facebook kia nui ake te āwhina mo taua take. I anga atu hoki a Tēnā Zuckerberg ki ngā pātai mō te hokohoko rei kore mana i roto i ngā rōpū Facebook kati. I tētahi atu whakawhitinga whawhai, ka pātaitia te kaiārahi pakihi mō ngā raraunga i kohia e tana umanga ki ngā tāngata kāore anō kia waitohu ki tana ratonga. I kī a Tēnā Zuckerberg i mahia tēnei mō ngā take haumarutanga. Engari i whakapuakina e ia kāore i te mōhio ki te kupu "kōtaha kōruru" ahakoa i whakamahia whānuitia e te pāpāho i te wā o tētahi tautohetohe tūmataitinga raraunga Facebook o mua. Ā, kāore i taea e ia te kōrero e hia ngā momo raraunga e kohia ana mō ngā mema-kore. "I kī koe e whakahaere ana te katoa i ā rātou raraunga," te kī a te tangata kāwanatanga Manapori o Ben Ray Lujan. "Engari kei te kohikohi raraunga koe mō ngā tāngata ehara i te kaiwhakamahi Facebook, kāore anō kia hainatia he whakaaetanga, he whakaaetanga tūmataitinga rānei. " Ina haere koe ki te Facebook 'Kāore aku whārangi pūkete Facebook, ā, kei te hiahia koe ki te tono i aku raraunga whaiaro katoa e penapena ana e Facebook', ka kawea koe ki tētahi puka e kī ana haere ki tō whārangi Facebook, ā, ki ō tautuhinga pūkete ka taea e koe te tikiake i ō raraunga. "Me whakatika tēnā" Ko ētahi atu whanaketanga i te rā kua hipa ko:

title: Facebook i Ahitereiria: He aha i pā mai i muri i te āraitanga o ngā rongokōrero?
summary: E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā o Facebook i te āraitanga a te kamupene i ngā rongokōrero e puta ana i runga i tōna pūhara i Ahitereiria, kua uaua ake ki te tangata te uru ki ngā pūtake pono - me te whakanui ake i te mana o ngā mōhiohio kino, māminga hoki.
text: Mā te Taki Ao Rangirua me te Aroturuki i te Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero Engari he whakaaturanga anō tēnei mai i te wā i whakaritea ai te rāhuitanga i te Tāite? Ko ngā hua kāore i te mōhiotia, i tere tonu te mārama, ko tētahi pānga o te nekehanga a te matua hangarau, i tua atu i ngā kaituku rongokōrero, kei te āraia hoki ngā ratonga ohorere. I kitea e ētahi o te tari hauora kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria me ngā whārangi ratonga ohorere kua pāngia ā rātou pūkete Facebook. I whakaorangia ā muri ake i muri i te whakamōhiotanga o Facebook. I tūtaki hoki ngā rōpū ora pērā i te Hauora Wahine o Tasmania ki ngā uauatanga. "We stream physical activity classes through Facebook," says Jo Flanagan, the group's chief executive. "E pana ana mātou i ngā whakahōutanga Covid i hangaia e te hauora tūmatanui. " Ka whakamahi ngā kiritaki i ngā karere i Facebook hei whakapā mai ki a mātou ina kāore ō rātou nama waea. He tino whakararuraru." Kei te mahi anō te whārangi ināianei. I kī a Will Easton, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Facebook Ahitereiria: "Ko ngā whārangi pēnei i te kāwanatanga, ngā whārangi haumaru tūmatanui me ngā whārangi mātauranga kia kaua e pāngia e tēnei pānuitanga. " Ka whakapāha mātou ki ētahi whārangi i pāngia noatia." I te rā i muri mai i te rāhuitanga, ka tirohia e mātau ētahi o ngā whārangi i tūpono ki ngā raruraru, tae atu ki tētahi pae rongokōrero kōrero, tētahi whārangi ratonga ā-ture a te wahine, me tētahi pūhara matapae huarere. Kua whakahohea katoatia rātou. E kī ana a Facebook kei te mahi ki te whakaora i ētahi atu pae kua āraia noatia hoki. Kua nui ake ngā mōhiohio kino? Kāore e taea e mātou te hoatu whakautu tūturu ki tēnei mō ngā kaiwhakamahi Facebook katoa i Ahitereiria. Engari kua mahia e mātou ētahi keri me te utauta tātari raraunga CrowdTangle, he wāhanga tonu o te whānau Facebook o ngā hua tuihono. Mā te whakamahi i te CrowdTangle, ka taea te titiro ki ngā whakairinga tino whakauru mai i ngā whārangi Facebook me ngā kaiwhakahaere i tētahi whenua - nō reira ka tino pai te whakaaro ki ngā mea kua tiria mō taua kaupapa. I tētahi tauira, i titiro mātou ki ngā whakairinga Facebook mai i ngā whārangi i Ahitereiria e pā ana ki te Covid-19 me ngā kano ārai mate i roto i ngā wā e rua 24 haora - i mua, i muri hoki i te whakamanatanga o te rāhuitanga. I kitea e mātou: Kua urupare a Facebook ki ōna kaiwhakawāwā mā te kī kāore anō kia rerekē tōna whāinga ki te whawhai i ngā mōhiohio. "Kei te tohutohu mātou i ngā tāngata ki ngā mōhiohio hauora whai mana me te whakamōhio atu ki a rātou mō ngā whakahōutanga hōu mā tā mātou Pokapū Mōhiohio Covid-19," e kī ana. "Kei te haere tonu mātou i ā mātou hoa mahi takitaki tūturu a te hunga tuatoru ki a AWHWHT (Australian Associated Press) me te WHK (Agence France-Press), e arotake ana i ngā ihirangi me te whakakāhore i ngā kerēme hē tuihono." Heoi anō, e kī ana a Pita Bodkin, te kaiwhakatika o te tīma takitaki tūturu o AWHWHT, kei te rāhuitia te ihirangi o tana rōpū rongokōrero. Ka taea tonutia e te AWHWHT te whakatau me te tapa i ngā whakairinga i runga i Facebook me te whakapiri i ngā hononga ki ngā pūrākau AHO, engari kāore e taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te tiritiri i ngā tuhinga o te pae. "Te āhua nei he putanga wehi, ki te kōrero i te mea mārama," tana kī. Ko te tikanga, ka taea te uru atu ki ngā pae takitaki tūturu me te kore hiahia ki te haere mā Facebook. Heoi anō, ka whakamāramatia e Russell Skelton, o te kaupapa takitaki tūturu a ABC (Australian Broadcasting Corporation) me te Whare Wānanga o TE Whare Wānanga, ka pā tonu te ārai ki te hunga e hiahia ana ngā kaitaki tūturu ki te toro atu. "E 11 miriona ngā Ahitereiria e whakamahi ana i te Facebook hei pūtake rongokōrero matua mō rātou," tana kī. "Nā te mahi a Facebook i ārai ai mātou i te whakauru atu ki tētahi hunga rerekē kē atu kāore e haere mai ki te paetukutuku rongokōrero ABC mō ā rātou mōhiohio." Ko te pūrongo a Jack Goodman, Shayan Sardarizadeh, Olga Robinson me Christopher Giles He aha ngā kerēme e hiahia ana koe kia tūhuratia e te Taki Ao Rangirua? Whakapā atu Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Reality Check

title: I whiua e te paramedic mo te waiho i te tūroro o Walsall e mate ana
summary: Kua tūtuki tētahi paramedic mo te korenga e tiaki i tētahi tangata i hinga i roto i tētahi papa motokā hōhipera, a, i muri iho ka mate.
text: I kitea he hara a Andrew Davies e tētahi pae mahi hauora mo te kore āwhina i a Carl Cope i te papa motokā o te Hōhipera o Walsall Manor. I muri iho ka mate a Tāne Cope, e 47, i te hōhipera i te whakaeke manawa i June 2012. I rongo te pae e whā ngā mema o ngā kaimahi rongoā i reira i taua wā, ā, i whakahaua katoatia ki te kore tiaki i tētahi tūroro e mate ana. Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei me ētahi atu pūrākau o Te Whenua Pango i rongo ai te pae o te Kaunihera Mahi Hauora me te Tiaki i a Tēnā Davies kua ākiritia e tana kaitukumahi, te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o West Midlands, mō te hē nui. I muri mai i tētahi tūhuratanga ki te rahunga ki te tiaki i a Tēnā Cope i te 23 o Pipiri 2012. I kī te tūru paepae, a Naseem Hai: "Ko te rahunga o Tēnā Davies ki te mahi, he whanonga e taka ana ki raro iho i tērā e tūmanakohia ana e te iwi whānui, tana mahi, me ngā hoa tohunga. " I te tirohanga a te paepae, he iti rawa ngā whakaaturanga kua whiwhi a Tēnā Davies i te mōhiotanga whai tikanga ki ōna hinganga. I te korenga o taua mōhiotanga, ka noho tonu te tūponotanga o te tāruatanga o te hē." I whiua atu a Tēnā Davies, kāore i konei, i whakaaturia rānei i te whakarongo, i te Rēhita HCPC. I te wā o Hui tanguru i tērā tau, ka whakaae te paramedic Matthew Geary, 36, mai i Manor Avenue i Great Wyrley, Staffordshire, i te kore e mahi i tētahi mahi e pā ana ki te mahinga a Tēnā Cope, i hoatu ki a ia he wā whare herehere e waru marama i whakatārewatia.

title: Sophie Wilson: E hia mano i whakaarahia mo te backpacker pakaru kakī
summary: Tata ki te £65,000 kua kohia mō tētahi kaieke i whati i tōna kakī i muri i tana ruku ki tētahi puna kaukau i tētahi pae i Thailand.
text: Kāore i te mārama mēnā ka haere anō a Sophie Wilson, 24, mai i Shepshed, i Aotearoa, i muri i te aituā i te 1 o Hakihea. Kua haere te moni ki tētahi rererangi rongoā tohunga ki te kawe mai i a ia ki te kāinga, e tae mai ana i te Rā Mekemeke. Kua rongoatia a Ms Wilson i tētahi hōhipera i Chiang Mai. Kotahi wiki noa iho a ia ki roto i tētahi haerenga e ono marama hei wāhanga o tana "moemoeā roa" ki te haere i te ao. Tata ki te 10 haora te mahinga o te kaimahi toa kawhe o mua i muri i te aituā. I kī a Ms Wilson i roto i tētahi pou i Facebook: "Kei te hoki mai mātou ki te kāinga! Mehemea ehara i a koutou katoa i pīrangi, i tiritiri, i koha hoki kāore tēnei e puta, nā reira kia ora mai i te takere o tōku ngākau. "E tino mīharo ana ahau ki ngā mea katoa i mahia e te katoa mōku." I kī tōna whaea ko Jane Wilson, i Thailand, kua "āwangawanga" te whānau i te atawhai i whakaaturia. I kī a ia he "tino kaha, ā-hinengaro, ā-tinana hoki" tana tamāhine, ā, me whakamanawanui i te rima ki te ono haora o te hauora i mua i te rerenga. Kua haere te moni i kohia ki te utu i tētahi tākuta me ngā nēhi tokorua mo te roanga o te rerenga mai i Thailand, nā te "kaha o ngā whara o Tōnā". Ko te tikanga kia mauria ia ki te Pokapū Rongoā o Kuini o Rāhui mā te waka tūroro mō te aromatawai i muri i te taenga atu ki te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow. I a ia e kōrero ana mō te aituā, ka kī te tuahine o Ms Uira, a Georgina Uira, nāna i tīmata te whārangi kohi moni, kāore i whakaaetia he tohu whakatūpato i te ruku, engari i te pouri, kāore anō a Tōnā kia kitea. I kī a ia kāore tōna tuahine e mahi i "tētahi mea hei whara i a ia anō". Kāore anō te kamupene inihua haere a Insure and Go kia hipokina ngā utu o te rererangi, e kī ana kāore tā rātou kaupapahere mēnā "kua mahi te kiritaki ki tētahi huarahi e mōrearea ai rātou". Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka mutu ngā koha Lego i roto i te Mēra o Ia Rā i waenganui i te whakahē
summary: Kua pānuitia e Lego ana koha whakatairanga me te Mēra o Ia Rā kua mutu - i waenganui i tētahi whakahau kia aukati i ngā pānuitanga a ngā kamupene ki ētahi nūpepa i runga i te pānuitanga "whakawehewehe" o ngā kaiheke.
text: Ka rite tonu te hoatu a te umanga i ngā taonga tākaro koreutu mā te pepa, engari i kī kāore he "ā muri ake nei". Kaore a Lego i kōrero he aha i mutu ai te herenga - engari i kī kua āta whakarongo ki ngā mātua me ngā tīpuna. Kua whakahaua e Kāti te Pūtea Kino ngā kamupene kia mutu te pānuitanga ki ētahi nūpepa. Kua whakahē te rōpū, i hangaia i te raumati, he maha ngā nūpepa ā-motu mō te "whakaahua i ngā kaiheke i runga i ngā kupu tino tōraro" me te wepu i te mauahara i mua, i muri hoki i te taupānga EU. Kua tohe i ngā kamupene tae atu ki a Hoani Wairangi, Waitrose me Marks & Spencer kia mutu te pānuitanga ki te Mēra o ia Rā, te Rā me te Daily Express. I a ia e urupare ana ki tētahi tweet mai i Stop Funding Hate, i whakaūngia e Lego kua mutu tana whakaaetanga whakatairanga ki te Mēra. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Kāore mātou e kōrero mō ngā kōrero ki ngā rōpū tuatoru. Engari ko tā mātou whāinga matua ko te waihanga i ngā wheako Lego mō ngā tamariki. "Kua oti te whakaaetanga ki te Mēra o ia Rā, ā, kāore ā mātou mahere ki te whakahaere i tētahi ngohe whakatairanga ki te nūpepa ā muri ake nei." I kī atu a Lego ki te BBC e pau ana "he nui te wā ki te whakarongo ki ngā kōrero a ngā tamariki. A, ki te whai wā ngā mātua me ngā tīpuna ki te whakamōhio mai ki a mātau he pēhea ō rātou whakaaro, ka āta whakarongo tonu mātou." I tāpiritia: "E whakaiti ana, e whakahonoretia ana mātou ki te kite i te nui o ngā kiritaki puta noa i te ao e whakapuaki ana i tō rātou tiaki ki tā mātou kamupene me tō mātou waitohu. " Ā, ka mahi tonu mātou i tō mātou tino pai ki te noho ki te whakawhirinaki me te whakapono e whakaaturia mai ana e ngā tāngata huri noa i te ao ki a mātau i ia rā." Kāore anō te Mēra kia kōrero mō te pānuitanga a Lego, i tua atu i te kī: "Kua mutu tā mātou whakaaetanga ki Lego, ā, kāore ā mātou mahere ki te whakahaere i tētahi ngohe whakatairanga ki a Lego ā muri ake nei." Ko ngā whakatairanga Mēra o ia Rā a Lego - e tukuna ai ki ngā kaipānui he tīkiti e taea ai e rātou te tono i tētahi taonga tākaro Lego koreutu i tētahi kaihoko tauwhāiti - kua whakahaeretia i ngā wā auau e hoki ana ki te 2013 neke atu rānei. I mua i tērā, ka whakahaere te umanga o Tenemāka i ngā koha ōrite ki te Rā. Ko te Mēra te nūpepa tuarua o ia rā, ā, e whakamanamana ana i ngā kaipānui e tata ana ki te 15m i ia rā i runga i te ipurangi - te nui rawa o tētahi nūpepa o Ingarangi. 'Hua whānui' I tērā wiki, i tiria tuihonotia tētahi reta mai i tētahi pāpā o Ingarangi ki a Lego, i reira i whakahē ai ia i te kaiwhakanao tākaro mō te pānuitanga ki te Mēra. I kī a Bob Jones kua "tawhiti rawa" te nūpepa, ā, i kī a ia e whakapono ana he "hē" ngā hononga o Lego ki te Mēra. I tuhituhi a ia: "Ko Lego, ki a au he hua whānui i ngā wā katoa. Te whati i ngā ārai i waenganui i te ira tangata, te hanga i te whakaaro me te maia o ngā tamariki ki te mahi i ā rātou ake mahi. Something adults and children can and do, bond over." "Kei te hē ō hononga ki te Mēra o ia Rā. Kaua hoki tētahi kamupene pēnei i a koe e tautoko i a rātou. I pānuitia te rongo i te wiki i muri i te whakahēnga a te Mēra o Ia Rā me te Daily Express mō ā rātou panekōrero e pūrongo ana i te Kōti Tiketike e whakatau ana me pōti te Pāremata i mua i te whakaoho a te kāwanatanga i te Tuhipānui 50 hei tīmata tika i te tukanga o te putanga o te UK i te EU. I whakaingoatia e te Mēra o Ia Rā ngā kaiwhakawā "Ngā hoariri o te iwi", i te wā i kī te Daily Express ko "te rā i mate ai te kāwanatanga ā iwi". I tonoa e te Kaunihera Pae kia tiakina e te Ariki Tumuaki, a Liz Truss, nga kaiwhakawā nāna i whakahaere te whakahaere, e kī ana kei raro rātau i tētahi whakaekenga "kāore anō kia kitea" mō te "mahi i a rātau mahi".

title: Ko ngā pūrongo a Shepherd me Wedderburn e pūkete ana i ngā moni me ngā hua
summary: Kua pūrongotia e te umanga ture a Shepherd me Wedderburn ngā moni pūkete me ngā hua mō te tuarua o ngā tau i roto i te haupae.
text: I kite te kamupene, he tari ōna i Etinitini, i Glasgow, i Aberdeen, i Rānōna, i Hōroa, i te 4% ki te £55.7m. Ko ngā hua i mua i ngā tuari hoa i piki ake i te 3.6%, ki te £22.8m. I whakaingoatia e te umanga ā-Etinitini tana mahinga i roto i te tau ki te 30 o Āperira ki tētahi wāhanga ki te "mahi kiritaki kaha" i te UK me rāwāhi. Ko Shepherd rāua ko Wedderburn, i whakatūria i te 250 tau ki mua, e 77 ngā hoa, e 211 ētahi atu rōia me ngā kaitohutohu me ngā kaimahi ratonga whakahaere e 183. I roto i tērā tau ā-pūtea, neke atu i te 1,200 ngā kiritaki hōu i toa ai te umanga, tae atu ki ngā whakahaere me ngā tangata. I Poutāpeta, ka whakatūria he tari ki Hōroa. Ināianei ka tautokona e ōna rōia ngā kiritaki i ngā mana neke atu i te 120 i waho o te UK. I kī te hoa whakahaere a Andrew Blain: "I toa mātou i ngā umanga hōu nui i te tau mai i ngā kiritaki tīariari me ngā kiritaki hou, nāna i kōwhiri a Shepherd me Wedderburn mō tōna tohunga ārahi mākete i ngā wāhi pēnei i te pūngao mā, te hangarau, te whenua, te hanganga, te kai me te inu me ngā ture. " Ahakoa kāore anō mātou kia kite he aha te hua o Te Pakihi, ka tūpato tonu mātou ki te tau ki mua."

title: Uiuinga a Pirinihi Taiana: Ka kī taurangi a TE AO kia 'whiwhi ki te pono' mō te uiuinga Panorama
summary: Kua kī taurangi te AO kia "tae ki te pono" me pēhea te uiuinga ki a Pirinihi Taiana i a ia e pānui ana i ngā ture o tētahi tūhuratanga takitahi.
text: I muri i te whakapae a te tuakana o Taiana, i whakamahia e te kairīpoata o TE AO a Mātini Ngā tauākī pēke hei whakatūpato i a ia ki te mahi i te uiuinga Panorama i te tau 1995. Kua whakatūria a Ariki Dyson, tētahi o ngā kaiwhakawā matua rawa o te whenua, hei ārahi i te uiuinga. He kaiwhakawā o mua o te Kōti Matua, i haere a ia i te tau 2016. I kī te tumuaki o te HAU, a Tim Davie: "E whakatau ana te AO kia tae ki te pono mō ēnei takahanga, koia hoki i whakaritea ai e mātau he tūhuratanga takitahi. " He tangata rangatira, he tino manaaki a Ariki Dyson e ārahi ana i tētahi tukanga hōhonu." I karangatia e te tuakana o Taiana, a Earl Spencer, he uiui takitahi i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, e kī ana i whakamahia te "tinihanga tūturu" hei whakaū i te uiuinga ki te pirinihi. I roto i tētahi reta ki a Tēnā Davie, i pūrongotia e te Mēra o ia Rā, ka kī te earl kua whakamahia e Te Pākehā ngā tauākī pēke, e hē ana te whakaatu e rua ngā kōtiro matua e utua ana e ngā ratonga haumarutanga mō ngā mōhiohio mō tōna tuahine. I tuhituhi a Earl Spencer: "Mehemea ehara i te mea mōku e kite ana i ēnei kōrero, kāore au i whakamōhio atu ki taku tuahine." I tētahi atu uiuinga o te Mēra o ia Rā, i whakapae hoki a ia he maha ngā kerēme hē, tūtaratara hoki a te kaipānui Panorama mō ngā kīngi matua i te wā o tētahi hui ki a ia kia whiwhi ai i tōna whakawhirinaki me te āheitanga ki tōna tuahine. I roto i ēnei kerēme kei te whakatuwheratia ngā tuhinga tūmataiti a Taiana, i aroturukitia tana motokā, ā, i patohia ngā waea - i whakaahuatia e te Mēra he "teka whakarihariha". Kei te whakaora a Ia, e 57, i tēnei wā, i te pokanga manawa me ngā raruraru mai i Covid-19, ā, kāore i taea te kōrero mō ngā whakapae a Earl Spencer. He aha te titiro a te tūhuratanga? 1. He aha ngā hipanga i mahia e te WHK, arā, ko Mātini Pakihi, me te whiwhi i te uiuinga Panorama i te tau 1995? Kei roto i tēnei ko te titiro ki ngā tauākī pēke i tawaitia, ngā utu whakapae ki ngā mema o te whare ariki, me ētahi atu take i whakaarahia e Earl Spencer. 2. I tika aua hipanga, otirā e pā ana ki ngā paerewa ētita a te AO i taua wā? 3. He aha te nui o ngā mahi a te HAU, ā, i whakaawe a Mātini Harahara i te whakatau a Taiana ki te hoatu uiuinga? 4. He aha te mōhiotanga o te AO i te tau 1995 me te 1996 o ngā whakaaturanga hāngai, pēnei i ngā tauākī pēke tinihanga? 5. He pēhea te pai o te tūhuratanga a te AO i ngā āhuatanga e ahu ana ki te uiuinga? Ko ēnei ture tohutoro mō te tūhuratanga i tautuhia e Ariki Dyson, ā, i whakaaetia e te HAU. I kī te AO ka tīmata hāngai tonu te tūhuratanga, ā, kei te tuku atu i "ōna pūkete hāngai katoa". I tērā wiki, ka whakaaturia e te kaipānui he tuhipoka ngaro i mua mai i Taiana, i whakaaro ki te tohu i te āhua o tana uiuinga a TE Panorama, kua kitea, ā, ka tukua atu ki te tūhuratanga. Ko te ārahi i te uiui ko Lord Dyson, ko ia te Matua o ngā Rārangi - te tuarua o ngā kaiwhakawā matua i Ingarangi me Uēra - mō te whā tau tae noa ki tana haerenga i Whiringahora 2016. Ko ētahi atu tūnga whai mana ko te Kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Matua o UK - te kōti teitei rawa o te whenua - me te Ariki Ture o te Kōti Pīra o Ingarangi me Weera. I kī a MP Julian Knight, te tūru o te Komiti Mamati, Ahurea, Pāpāho me te Hākinakina (DCMS), ko te tūhuratanga te huarahi tika ki te haere tonu "i te tō ā-papa o te kaupapa". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore he mahere a te Komiti DCMS ki te pupuri i tōna ake uiui ki tēnei take, engari mā mātou e arotake te hua me te rāhui i tētahi whakataunga mēnā me mahi anō i taua wā." Tata ki te 23 miriona ngā tāngata i āta mātakitaki i te hōtaka Panorama i te 25 tau ki mua. I roto i taua mārenatanga, ka kī rongonui te pirinihi "tokotoru mātau i roto i tēnei mārenatanga", e pā ana ki te pātahitanga o te Piriniha o Uēra ki a Camilla Parker-Bowles. I taua wā, i wehea a Pirinihi Taiana i a Piriniha Charles, engari kāore anō kia whakarerea. I mate a ia i te 31 o Aotearoa 1997, e 36 ona tau, i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga motokā i Parihi.

title: Pōti Rīria 2019: Ko wai e wehe ana i te whenua?
summary: Ko te mākete mahi mō ngā rangatahi o Rīria e haere ana te tangata, e kī ana tētahi o ngā kaitauwhāinga matua kia noho hei perehitini panuku o Naria.
text: Nā Jack GoodmanBBC Reality Check "Kāore ngā rangatahi o Rīria i te wehe noa iho i Naria nā te utu kino me ngā āhuatanga mahi - kei te haere rātou nā te mea kāore he tūmanako," ko te kaitono ātete o Atiku Abubakar i tuhituhi i Twitter. He amuamu auau hoki te rerenga o nga tohunga mātauranga o Nigeria - otirā ko ngā tākuta - he amuamu auau. He aha tātau e mōhio ana mō te tauine o ngā tāngata e wehe ana i Nigeria? E tū ana te whakaaro ki ngā tatauranga? Ko te ara o Ūrai i tuhituhi ai tētahi kōrero rongokōrero o Rīria, ko te nui o ngā Rīria e wehe ana i te whenua, ā-ture, ā-ture, kua pā ki ngā taumata mōrearea. Ko te nuinga o ngā kaiheke e haere ana i te ara Māuirangi ki Uropi e haere mai ana i Nigeria - i te nuinga o te wā mā te poti mai i te takutai o Ripia ki Itari. I te tau 2016, tata ki te 40,000 ngā Rīria i tae ki Itari, neke atu i tētahi atu iwi. Tata ki te 18,000 i haere i te tau 2017. Engari ko ngā raraunga hōu rawa e whakaatu ana kua nui te whakapeka. E 1,250 noa iho ngā Rīria i tae ki Itari mā te moana i te tau 2018. E whakaatu ana tēnei hinganga i te ia whānui ake - he iti ake ngā kaiheke i whakawhiti i te Māuirangi i tērā tau. E kī ana te UN kei te huri tonu ngā ara e whakamahia ana e ngā kaihoko tangata, ā, e whakamauru ana ki ngā take maha, engari ko te taka o ngā tau e tae ana ki Itari, ko te nuinga o te mahi tahi ki te kaitiaki taiwhenua o Ūrai. Ā, nā tēnei aroturuki tata atu o te takutai o Ripia i uaua ake ai ngā whakawhitinga ture. Ko ngā mōrea nui Ko te whakaaturanga mai i te hunga e hoki mai ana ki Naria i muri i ngā whakamātau rahua e mau ana i tēnei, e kī ana a Jorge Galindo o te International Organization for Migration (IOM). E kī ana a ia, e whakatūpato ana ngā kaiheke e hoki mai ana ki ngā tāngata ki ngā mōrea nui e pā ana ki te haerenga mōrearea. E hua ana ngā raraunga UN kāore ngā Rīria i te ngana ki te tae ki Uropi mā Paniora, koia ināianei te wāhi tāurunga matua mō ētahi atu kaiheke puta noa i te Māuirangi. Ko tētahi take pea he hononga tūturu a Naria ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāngata i te ara i waenganui i Ripia me Itari. Kāore anō aua tūhononga kia hangaia i te ara ki Paniora. Heoi anō, kāore i roto i ngā whika hekenga ngā Rīria kua mahue i o rātau kāinga, engari kāore i taea te whakawhiti ki Uropi - he maha ngā mano e whakaarotia ana e puritia ana i ngā pūtahi tautāwhi i Ripia, i te huarahi rānei i ētahi atu whenua o Awherika. Tata ki te 11,500 ngā Rīria kua hoki mai ki te kāinga, i āwhinatia e te IOM, mai i te tau 2017. I roto i tēnei aronui, kua puta mai he tauira e whakaatu ana i te wāhi i tīmata ai nga kaiheke i a rātau haerenga. E kī ana te IOM mō te haurua o te tapeke mai i te āhua o Edo ki te tonga - me tētahi atu hauwhā mai i te āhua o Delta e noho tata ana. He whenua tino nui a Nigeria me te iwi whānui, engari ko tēnei raraunga e tohu ana ko te iwi e heke ana i ahu mai i tētahi wāhi iti rawa. He aha a Edo? Ko te kāwanatanga o Edo te pūtake tino tūturu mō ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāngata, e kī ana a Esohe Aghatise, e whakahaere ana i te rōpū ārai kaihoko o Iroko. Ko ētahi e haere ana ki te rapu i ngā huarahi ohaoha, engari ka taka ki te ringa o ngā kaihoko, e kī ana a ia. Engari he tokomaha ētahi atu, otirā ko ngā wāhine me ngā kōtiro, e kī ana a ia, e whakawhitiwhiti ana ki tō rātou hiahia, kāore rānei i te mōhio ki ngā mea e uru ana rātou. "Ko ngā tāngata whai ariā ki tētahi oranga pai ake i Uropi, ka mutu te kura, ā, ka kīa mai he pararaiha." He rere roro anō? He maha ngā Rīria whai tohu ngaio e rapu ana ki te haere ki rāwāhi, e tono ana i ngā visa kia mahi ā-ture. Tērā anō ērā e whakaaro ana ki te ako ki rāwāhi, ki te hono rānei ki ētahi atu mema o te whānau kei reira. Ko ētahi ka noho mō ngā wā roa, ko ētahi ka hoki mai i te mutunga o ā rātou kirimana, akoranga rānei. Kāore he tatauranga kāwanatanga whai mana e wātea ana, nā reira ko tētahi huarahi ki te titiro ki te hekenga ā-ture, mā ngā tau e whai ana i ngā aromatawai rongoā hei whakaritenga mō ngā tono visa. Ka mahia ēnei e ngā pokapū aromatawai hauora hekenga a IOM i Roto me Abuja. I te tau 2018, e 21,000 ngā whakamātautau - he whika teitei ake i ngā tau o mua. Mō ngā tākuta rongoā e wehe ana i Naria me te āwhina ki te "rere roro o te whenua, he uaua tēnei ki te tatau. E mōhio ana mātou he nui ake ngā tākuta i whakaakona e Rīria e mahi ana ināianei i te UK, hei tauira. Tata ki te 5,300, e ai ki te Kaunihera Rongoā Nui o Ingarangi. Koia tērā te tiketike rawa i muri i Īnia me Pakitāne, ā, kua piki haere tonu mai i te tau 2006. I kī atu te perehitini o mua o te National Association of Resident Doctors ki a Africa Check he tokomaha atu ngā tākuta e heke ana nā te rawakore o ngā āhuatanga mahi me te utu iti. Ko tētahi tohu whakamutunga mō te hunga e haere ana ki te mahi, ki te ako rānei ki rāwāhi ko te maha o ngā visa i tukuna ki ngā Rīria. Mai i tētahi wāhi iti i te tau 2010, kua piki haere tonu ngā visa kaimahi pūkenga ki UK - e 620 i tukuna i te tau 2017. Heoi anō, kua whakapeka te maha o ngā visa akoranga, hāunga te akoranga mo te wā poto. Ko te tāpuitanga nui rawa o Rīria kei te US, e ai ki ngā whika UN. Tata tonu te rua o taua iwi whānui i waenganui i te 2007 me te 2017. 'Ehara i te mea ko ngā waka ara kotahi noa iho ko te kōaro ki te hekenga ko ngā utu e whakahoki ana ki te whakahaerenga o Rīria. I whiwhi a Nigeria i te $22bn i te tau 2017, te 5 teitei rawa o te ao, e ai ki te Pēke Ao. He uaua ake te tiki whika tūturu mō ngā tāngata e neke ana ki Naria nā te mea he nekehanga koreutu o ngā tāngata i te rohe o te Hapori Ohaoha o Ngā Whenua o Awherika ki te Uru (Ecowas). Ko te nuinga o ngā kaiheke i Nigeria e whakaarohia ana i te 1.2 miriona, ko te nuinga o rātau e haere mai ana i Benin, Ghana me Mali, e ai ki te UN. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Reality Check Tukuna mai ō pātai Whāia mātou i Twitter

title: Coronavirus: Ka hoatu e Tesla ngā rau o ngā hāora ki New York
summary: Kua kī taurangi a Elon Musk ki te whakarato i a New York me ngā rau hāora hei āwhina ki te whakatutuki i te hiahia mai i te pakarutanga o te coronavirus.
text: I kī te rangatira nui o Tesla ka tukua te rōpu tuatahi o ngā mīhini i homai ā muri ake nei i te Paraire. I hokona mai ngā hāora mai i ngā kaiwhakanao kua whakaaetia e te kāwanatanga o Amerika i Haina. I mihi te rangatira o New York City, a Bill de Blasio, ki a Tēnā Musk i runga i te Twitter, e tuhi ana, "Kei te tino whakawhetai mātou." "E hiahiatia ana e mātou ia haora ka taea e tātau te tiki i o mātau ringa ki ēnei wiki tata nei hei whakaora ora," tana karanga. Ka hoatu nga ventilators ki nga hohipera i New York City, puta noa i te kawanatanga o New York. Kei Niu Ioka te nuinga o ngā kēhi o Covid-19 i te US. Tae atu ki te Paraire, ka kī te kāwana e 519 ngā tāngata i te kāwanatanga kua mate i te mate. I te Tāite, ka noho mana te US hei whenua me ngā kēhi Covid-19 tino whakaū i te ao whānui. E hiahiatia ana ngā haora nā te mea ka whakaekea e te huaketo ngā pūkahukahu. I te nuinga o te wā e hiahiatia ana e ngā tūroro whai tohu mahi ngā hāora hei hā. I kī te Kāwana o New York, a Andrew Cuomo, e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga kia 30,000 ngā haora hei whakarite mo te taumata o te tīmatatanga. I hokona e Tēnā Musk e 1,255 ngā hāora mai i ngā kaiwhakanao e toru - ResMed, Philips me Medtronic - i tērā wiki. I kī a ia ka hoatu e tana kamupene ōna haora katoa "mēnā ka hokona e mātou, ka hangaia rānei". I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka oati a Tēnā Musk ki te whakatuwhera anō i te gigafactory a Tesla i Buffalo, New York - e hanga ana i ngā pūtau kōmaru - me te whakamahi anō hei waihanga i ētahi atu ventilator. "Giga New York will reopen for ventilator production as soon as humanly possible. Ka mahia e mātau ngā mea katoa e kaha ana ki te āwhina i ngā iwi o Niu Ioka," tana tuhituhi i runga i te Twitter. Kua whakatārewatia e te kamupene te whakanaotanga i ōna wheketere i Niu Ioka me California. Te āhua nei ko ēnei koha e tohu ana i tētahi huringa i roto i te tirohanga a Tēnā Musk ki te coronavirus. I te tīmatanga o Poutāpeta ka tūtohu a ia he "wahangu" te mauri i runga i te coronavirus. I tētahi atu tweet i huatau ai ia he "tino ārai" ngā tamariki ki te huaketo - he hē. Ehara a Tesla anake i te kaihanga waka o Amerika e tuku ana ki te whakaputa i ngā ventilators me ētahi atu taonga hōhipera e hiahiatia ana. E hiahia ana hoki a Ford me General Motors ki te mahi pēnā. Engari i tūtuki aua whakaritenga i te Paraire i muri i te whakapaetanga a te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump i nga kamupene e whakahiko ana i nga mīhini.

title: Ka whakawāteatia auautia te rongoā ārai HIV i Uēra
summary: Ko tētahi rongoā e ārai ana i te tarenga o te huaketo HIV kia wātea auau i Weera, kua pānuitia e te minita hauora.
text: I whakawāteatia te rongoā ārai ārai PrEP - te rongoā tōmua rānei - i Ingarangi i Aperira. I tohutohu te Rōpū Rautaki Rongoā Katoa o Wales (AWMSG) i mua i te Kāwanatanga o Welsh kia kaua e pūtea i te rongoā nā te mea he nui rawa te utu. I tīmata tētahi whakamātautau o te rongoā i Uēra i Aperira 2017 ahakoa tēnei tohutohu. I kī a Vaughan Gething kua heke te utu o te rongoā nā te putanga whānui. I kī a ia kāore he kēhi HIV hōu i waenganui i te hunga e mau ana i te PrEP hei wāhanga o te whakamātautau. Ināianei ka wātea te rongoā hei wāhanga o te tiaki NHS auau. "He mehua hira te whakarato o PrEP i roto i tā mātou whāinga ki te whakakore i te HIV, ā, e whakakake ana ahau ki ngā mea kua tutuki i a mātou i Weera," te kī a Tēnā Gething. "Kua tino nui ta mātau kauneketanga ki te whakawhanake i ngā ratonga hauora tōkai hōu ake, pai hoki i roto i ngā tau tata nei." I kī te Terrence Higgins Trust he "tohu nui i roto i te whawhai ki te HIV i Weera." I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Mā te whakawātea auau i tēnei rongoā ārai HIV me te mōhio ki tōna utu, ka taea te whakawātea katoa i ōna painga ināianei. " Kua tuku kē te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te whakamutu i ngā whakawhitinga HIV hōu i te tau 2030, ā, ināianei ka whai wāhi nui a PrEP ki te whakatutuki i tēnei." Kua kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao ka taea e te rongoā te pare i ngā tāngata e tino mōrearea ana ki te whakawhiwhi i te HIV. Ko te PReP, e tangohia ana i ia rā, e huatau ana mō ngā tāngata kāore pea i te noho haumaru. I te Hānuere i pūrongotia he 71% te hekenga o ngā kēhi HIV i te UK. I takea tēnei i te pikinga o te whakamahinga PrEP.

title: E hiahia ana a Wales ki ētahi atu rākau e kī ana te kaiwhakanao taiapa
summary: Me whakatō e Wales ētahi atu rākau hei pare i te umanga rākau kāinga, kua whakatūpato tētahi o ngā kaiwhakarato taiapa nui rawa o UK.
text: I kī te umanga o Denbighshire, a Clifford Jones Timber, e 100 heketea noa iho (250 eka) o te ngahere hou i whakatōkia ki konei i tērā tau. Ko te ūnga a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e 2,000 heketea i te tau. I kī te pokapū taiao, Natural Resources Wales, i noho tonu ngā mahi rākau arumoni "he manakē tiketike". Engari i kī te kaiwhakahaere hoko a Clifford Jones, a Penny Lloyd, he "tino nui te whakatō rākau ināianei mō te oranga o tā mātou umanga". "I ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, neke atu i te 7,000 eka rākau i ia tau - i ngā tau tata nei he iti iho i te 250, ā, he hua tēnei e 20 tau te roa kia tipu ki te pakeke," tana kī. E 2.5 miriona ngā pou taiapa e whakaputaina ana e te kamupene i tōna tipu i Ruthin, i Pākehā hoki, ā, neke atu i te 80 ngā kaimahi. E ai ki ngā whika a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, ko te mahi whakanao rākau i Wales e tata ana ki te £175m i te tau - ā, i honoa ki te ngahere, ka whakarato mahi tae atu ki te 11,000 tāngata. "He mākete tino nui mo a mātau rākau. Ka tāruatia, ka toru rānei te whakanao o ia mira i Uēra mēnā i reira te rākau hei whāngai i taua mira," te kī a te manukura o Clifford Jones, a Rārangi Jones. "Kei te titiro tonu mātou ki ngā huarahi whakarerekē kia whiwhi ai mātou i te mōrahi mai i ngā rākau ka kawea mai e mātau mā ngā kēti, engari kei te iti haere te pūtea penapena mai i ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua." Kua tohe a Natural Resources Wales ki te āwhina i te umanga. E whakahaere ana i te 117 heketea o te ngahere e 306 heketea o Weera. "I tēnei tau kei te whakaputua anō e mātou neke atu i te 1,200 heketea o te pānga ngahere o Welsh - e whakataurite pai ana ki tētahi o ngā tau e rima o mua," te kī a Ruth Jenkins, te upoko o te whakamahere rauemi māori i NRW. "I taua wā, i pā mātou ki tētahi tīmatanga nui o P ramorum, ā, he pānga kino ki ngā ngahere o Welsh - neke atu i te toenga o te UK - engari kei te urupare mātou ki tēnei mā te waihanga i tētahi he ngahere rerekē ake, he pakari hoki. "I roto i tēnei wā kua mahi ngātahi mātou me te umanga rākau ki te waihanga i ngā mākete hou mō te larch tāpiri kua tae mai ki te mākete."

title: Ngā hokonga o te Rā Mekemeke: He waewae mo te toru tau, e kī ana ngā kaitirotiro
summary: Kua hinga te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e haere ana ki ngā hokonga o te Rā Mekemeke mo te toru o nga tau e haere ana ahakoa ētahi whakahekenga taumaha, kua kī ngā kaitirotiro hokohoko.
text: I kī a Springboard, e tirotiro ana i ngā mōhiohio mai i ngā kāmera o UK High Street me ngā kāmera pokapū hokohoko, he 3.1% iti iho i te 2017. I huatau mai kua iti iho te hira o te 26 o Hakihea hei rā tauhokohoko. Engari he tūtira tonu mō ētahi toa mai i waenganui pō, ā, kāore i roto i ngā raraunga ngā hokohoko tuihono. Ā, i whakapuakina e ngā kaihoko i te West End o Rāwāhi tētahi "tāwhana Rā Mekemeke" e kī ana he 15% te pikinga o te waewae mai i tērā tau. I kī atu ngā Kaihoko o te Paraire Pango i te Tiriti o Oxford o Rāwāhi ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o Aotearoa, ka toa rātau i te huihuinga ki te tiki i tētahi utu me te tirotiro i ngā hua, kaua e hoko tuihono noa iho. I tukuna e ētahi toa he whakahekenga utu tae atu ki te 70% i muri i ngā hokonga pōturi tae noa ki te Kirihimete. I kī a Springboard i roto i ngā tau tata nei he iti ake ngā kaihoko i ngā hokonga o te Paraire Pango i te mutunga o Whiringa ā Rangi. Ko te maha o nga kaihoko i te ata i kiia he nui ake i te 9% iti iho i te Paraire Pango. Heoi anō, kāore i roto i ngā hokonga tuihono, e 21% o ngā hokonga hokohoko i Whiringa ā Rangi, e ai ki te Office for National Statistics. Kua tangohia e te tātaritanga a Joe Miller, te kaipānui pakihi o TE Paraire Pango te hau i ngā hokonga o te Rā Mekemeke mō ētahi tau ināianei, ā, kua whakahaua ngā kaihoko ki te rītaha i ngā utu i te wā whakangahau. Ahakoa he rongo pai tēnei mō ngā kaihoko, kei te māharahara ngā kaitirotiro kei te uru ngā mekameka uaua, me ngā whare putunga kī tonu i ngā kararehe hei neke, ināianei kei te rēhi ki raro, ina hiahia rātou ki te whakanui i ngā hua. He aha te mea kino rawa, kāore he tohu o te whakapau moni i te pae. Ahakoa he uaua ki ngā rorohiko tuihono pērā i a Asos i tēnei wā, i te mea kei te tipu haere te nama o te kāinga, ā, he iti iho te moni whiwhi a te tangata. Ko tētahi wāhi e āhua nei kei te whakararuraru i te ia - i tēnei rā - ko te West End i Rānana. Ko tēnā e whakahaeretia ana e te tini o ngā manuhiri mai i rāwāhi, e tūmanako ana kia whai painga i te pauna ngoikore. Engari puta noa i te whenua katoa, he torutoru noa iho ngā rā e toe ana ki te whakatika i tētahi tau pouri. I whakatuwheratia ētahi toa i te 06:00 GMT, me ngā rārangi o ngā kaiwhaiwhai tino hiahia i te 02:00. E tūmanako ana ngā kaihoko i te West End o Rāwāhi kia kite i ngā kaihoko e 500,000 i te rā me te £50m i roto i ngā hokohoko. I kī a Jace Tyrrell, te rangatira nui o te Kamupene o New West End, e tohu ana i ngā umanga i Bond Street, Oxford Street me Regent Street: "Kei te kaha ngā tūruhi ao whānui e aia ana e te pauna ngoikore, tae atu ki ngā kaihoko kāinga e kimi ana i tētahi rā i muri i ngā hākari whānau inanahi," tana kī. I kī a Myf Ryan, te āpiha mākete matua mō Uropi i Unibail-Rodamco-Westfield, nāna ngā pokapū hokohoko o Westfield: "Ko te Rā Mekemeke tētahi o ā mātou rā tauhokohoko tihi, ā, kua tīmata ki tētahi tīmatanga tino arokē." Ko te mea e kiia nei ko te "Hātarei Matua" i mua i te Kirihimete i rahua ki te tuku i te āwhina i tūmanakohia e ngā kaihoko, me te 1% noa iho te pikinga o te waewae. I matapaetia e ngā kaitirotiro hokohoko he nui ake i ngā whakahekenga utu o te Rā Mekemeke i te wā e ngana ana ngā toa ki te whakawai i ngā kiritaki ki te Tiriti Tiketike.
