I kī te tohutohu whakahaere o Deloitte e tūmanako ana kia 52% ngā whakahekenga toharite o te 52% mai i ngā kaihoko e rapu ana ki te tango i ngā rawa tē hiahiatia. He maha ngā toa kua tīmata kē ki te whakahekenga utu i mua i te Kirihimete, me te pikinga o te Paraire Pango e whakawhānui ana i ngā hoko ki Whiringa ā Rangi. I whakapaea e te kaihoko tuihono a Asos te whakahekenga utu "tawhito rawa" mo te whakakino i te tauhokohoko o Whiringa ā Rangi, e kī ana ka ngoikore te hua mo te tau katoa. I kī a Kiriuati McClure, o te paetukutuku aroturuki utu me te whakahekenga utu LovetheSales.com, i runga i te ipurangi, kua puritia e ētahi kaihoko ngā whakahekenga utu mai i te Paraire Pango tae noa ki te Kirihimete, ā, ko te nui haere o ngā tau e tīmata wawe ana i ā rātou hokonga o te Rā Mekemeke. "He hōhonu ake hoki nga whakaititanga. I tēnei wā ko te whakahekenga utu toharite tuihono e tū ana i te 43% - koinei te teitei rawa atu i te Rā Mekemeke," tana kī. I whakatūpato hoki ngā toa tae atu ki Primark, Ted Baker me John Lewis ki te hinganga o ngā hokohoko, i te wā i kī a Maika Ashley, rangatira o Sports Direct me House of Fraser, ko te "Whiringa kino rawa atu i roto i te pūmahara ora". Ko te nui ake o te hokohoko tuihono e whakaarotia ana ko tētahi hara: I hinga ngā hokonga i roto i te pātaka o Whiringa ā-Rangi i te 2.6% i whakaritea ki tērā tau, i te wā i piki ake ngā hokohoko tuihono i te 18.2%, e ai ki te rangahau a ngā kaikaute me ngā kaitohutohu pakihi BDO. Engari i whakaaturia e ngā hokonga Kirihimete whakamutunga ētahi tohu o te whakapai ake. I kī te Mahinga Hokohoko Ipsos i te 27.4% i te Pō o te Kirihimete i whakaritea ki te 2017. I kī atu a Kiriuati Rōhi, te pāhi M&S o mua e tūru ana ināianei i te hokomaha tuihono o Ocado, ki te hōtaka PM o te Reo Irirangi 4 o TE "tere o te huringa" i roto i te hokohoko UK i tērā tau. I kī a ia me mahi tahi ngā mana ā rohe, ngā kāwanatanga, ngā rangatira me ngā kaihoko ki te whakarite i ngā tiriti tiketike o Ingarangi hei "wāhi mīharo ake, whakamere hoki".

title: He pātai mo te hokinga mai o te mahi a Neil Rhodes i ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire
summary: E kore tētahi kātipa rangatira rangitahi i whakakorea e te kōti, e hoki mai ki te ārahi i te ope, kua kī tētahi pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC),
text: I whakatārewatia a Neil Rhodes e te PCC o Lincolnshire, a Alan Hardwick i te wā o Hui tanguru. I te Rāitema ka whakataua e te Kōti Tiketike he "kōaro" te whakataunga kia whakatārewatia a ia. Ka mutu te kirimana a Tāne Rhodes hei kānataraki kātipa rangitahi i te 31 o Poutāpeta, ā, ka tīmata anō ia i tana mahi hei rangatira tuarua, ka kī a Tēnā Hardwick. E kī ana tētahi tohunga mo te mahi pirihimana kāore pea taua whakataunga i te whaimana. I te whakarongo whakawā kotahi rā i te Kōti Tiketike i Manchester, e kiia ana i āwhinatia e Tēnā Rhodes tētahi rōia Mohimana matua, i ākiritia mai i ngā Pirihimana o Te Uru i muri i te 17 tau, ā, i te tono i tana kaitukumahi o mua. Kātahi ka uru a Tēnā Rhodes ki ngā kōrero me te whai i ngā kerēme whakahāwea ā-iwi i mōhio ai ia he pono, ka korerotia ki te kōti. I a ia e kōrero ana i te Rāitema, ka kī a Tēnā Rhodes: "E tino pai ana ahau ki te whakataunga a te kaiwhakawā i tēnei rā, nāna i whakapuaki taku whakatārewatanga he koretake, he kōaro, nō reira he ture. " Ka hoki ahau ki te mahi ināianei, ā, ka haere tonu ahau ki te mahi i ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire me tētahi taparenga whaiaro, ngaio hoki e whakapono ana ahau kua whakaaturia e au i roto i ngā tau e 27 kua hipa." Heoi anō, i roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te Titiro ki te Raki o BBC, ka kī a Tēnā Hardwick: "Ka mutu te tūnga rangitahi o Tēnā Rhodes i te rā whakamutunga o te marama. " Ko tana tūranga nui ko te rangatira tuarua o te kātipa. Ko Alec Wood te rangatira kātipa whakahaere, ko ia te rangatira kātipa i te Tūrei." 'Ūkui ture' i kī a Paora Uru, tētahi kātipa matua o mua e tohutohu ana ināianei i te kāwanatanga mō ngā take pirihimana i roto i tana tūranga hei tumuaki o Te Pirihimana Mō te Katoa, i mōhio te katoa ki te kirimana rangitahi a Tēnā Rhodes i te mutunga o Poutāpeta. "Kua tika te wā kia whakatūria he rangatira kātipa. Ahakoa he aha te take, kāore anō a Alan Hardwick kia haere i taua ara, ā, i te Mane ka hoki a Neil Rhodes ki te noho hei rangatira tuarua kātipa. "There is currently no chief constable in Lincolnshire, therefore he [Neil Rhodes] must act up to be acting chief constable. " He mārama tēnā i roto i te ture. Kaore he whakaritenga i roto i te ture mō tētahi mea atu i tērā kia puta." I whakatūria a Tēnā Rhodes hei kātipa rangatira rangitahi i te mutunga o Poutāpeta, i tērā tau. I whakanohoia a Tēnā Rhodes ki te whakahaere tae noa ki te mutunga o Poutāpeta, i te wā e kōrerorerotia ana tōna wā heke mai ki te PCC hou. I kōrerotia taua take ki te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC), engari i whakataua kia kaua e tūhura.

title: Mehana Murphy: Ko te kōrero whakawhitiwhiti a te wahine wahine o Kānata e whakaoho ana i te ngangau
summary: Kua whakahētia tētahi whare pukapuka Kānata mo te whakakāhore ki te whakakore i tētahi takahanga e hautū ana i tētahi mana wahine whai whakaaro tautohetohe mō ngā motika transgender.
text: E hia rau nga kaiwhakahaere i huihui i waho o tētahi peka o te Whare Pukapuka Tūmatanui o Torōna i te wā i kōrero ai te kaituhi o Mehana Murphy i roto. I tautāwhi te whare pukapuka i tana whakataunga kia whakaaetia tana kōrero mō te tuakiri ira tangata me te "iwi, te ture me ngā wāhine". Kua karangatia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau ko Ms Murphy he ārai transgender, e whakakāhore ana a ia. I kī ngā pirihimana o Torōna i whakahuatia e Global News kua noho ngā āpiha i roto, i waho rānei o te takahanga ki te "pupuri i te rangimārie." I te mutunga o te kōrero, ka tūtohu te kaipānui Rongokōrero o te Ao Whānui, a, i arahina ngā kaitāri e nga pirihimana ki muri o te whare. He aha te tūnga o Mehana Murphy? Ms Murphy says she wants to ensure the safety of women in places like female prisons, women's refuges and changing rooms. I Kānata, kua kōrero a ia ki tētahi pire nāna i whakatika te ture motika a Kānata hei whakakore i te whakahāweatanga i runga i te kīanga ira tangata me te tuakiri i runga i ngā māharahara ka tukitukia pea ngā mana wahine mā te whakakino i ō rātou "mokowā haumaru". "I raro i te akoranga kaiwhaiwhai o nāianei kāore e whakaaetia kia aukati i tētahi tangata i te mokowā o te wahine mēnā e kī ana ia he wahine a ia, ā, ka kitea e au he tino mōrearea, he whakararuraru hoki," tana kī atu ki te HAU. E kī ana a ia e whakapono ana a ia ko te nekeneke kaiwhaiwhai transgender he "whakaheke, he whakahāwea" me te waiho i ngā wāhine me ngā kōtiro. Kua kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o te kōrero, he rōpū e kiia nei ko Radical Feminists Unite, "ehara rātau i te rōpū kino, ā, kāore mātou e tautoko i te kōrero kino, e taunaki rānei mō te tango i ngā mana mai i tētahi rōpū whakawātea". I hokona te takahanga. E karanga ana a Judith Taylor, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Torōna, ko Ms Murphy "he tautohetohe". E whakaaro ana a ia ko Ms Murphy, i te whakapuaki i ngā mana o tētahi rōpū "e ngana ana ki te whakataha i tētahi atu" me te whakahē ki a Ms Murphy kāore e taea e ngā mokowā haumaru me te rerenga kētanga te noho tahi. "The more that we start embracing that diversity the better our learning and the better our strength," she said. He aha te kōrero a te puna? I whakaputaina e te kaitiaki pukapuka o te taone nui o Vickery Bowles tētahi kōrero i te waenganui o Whiringahora e tiaki ana i te whakataunga kia taurima i te takahanga, e kī ana he "here ki te pare i te kōrero koreutu". I kī a ia, ahakoa e tautoko ana te whare pukapuka i te hapori LGBT, ā, ka taea te whakakore i tētahi rēti rūma mēnā e whakapono ana "ka whakatokona e te takahanga te whakahāweatanga, te whakahawea, te mauahara rānei ki tētahi tangata, rōpū rānei" kāore tēnei take e takahi i ōna kaupapahere rēti. I tāpiritia e Ms Bowles, nāna i rapu whakaaro ā-ture mo taua take, kāore anō a Ms Murphy kia whakataua, kia herea rānei ki te kōrero kino i Kānata. Ko te whakataunga kia whakahonoretia te tāpuitanga rūma i whiwhi i te tautoko a PEN Kānata, he rōpū kaituhi nui, i te Mane. He aha te urupare? Ko ngā hoariri ki te whakataunga a te whare pukapuka ko te Koromatua o Torōna, ko John Tory, nāna i kīia he "whakakino". He petihana tuihono i tīmataria e ngā kaituhi paetata e toru e karanga ana kia whakakorea te takahanga, neke atu i te 8,000 ngā waitohu i te Tūrei. I kī te hunga i hainatia e kore rātau e whai wāhi ki ngā takahanga puna mēnā ka haere tonu te kōrero a Ms Murphy. I whakatūpato a Pride Toronto, te rōpū i muri i te hākari whakapehapeha ā-tau o te taone, ki te whare pukapuka "ka puta he hua ki to mātau whanaungatanga mo tēnei whakawhitinga". E kī ana i roto i tētahi kōrero ko ngā tirohanga a Ms Murphy he "whakakāhore i ngā oranga, ngā wheako me ngā tuakiri o ngā tāngata whakawhiti". Two city councillors - Kristyn Wong-Tam and Mike Layton - are asking for a review of policies governing the use of community spaces at the Toronto library and other public spaces. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, he kōrero ōrite i roto i a Ms Murphy i tētahi whare pukapuka tūmatanui i Vancouver i tāia ai ngā kaiwhakahaere me te huihuinga i hokona atu. I muri iho ka āraia te whare pukapuka kia kaua e whai wāhi ki te whakatūtū whakapehapeha o te taone. I te wā o Me, i pōhiritia a Ms Murphy ki te Pāremata o Pirihitini ki te kōrero mō ngā take transgender i te wā i whakaritea e Etinitini ngā whakahōu ki te Ture Āhukahuka Ira Tangata kia āhei ai ngā tāngata ki te "whakapuaki i a rātou anō" i tō rātou ira tangata e mōhiotia ā-ture. I kī ngā kaiwhakangahau i taua wā e hiahia ana a Ms Murphy ki ngā parenga ōritetanga o te ira tangata "kua tāhaetia". I rāhuitia hoki a ia i Twitter mō te kōrero "ehara ngā tāngata i te wahine" me te "whakahē" i ngā wāhine transgender i runga i te pae. Kua mahia e ia he mahi ture ki te kamupene.

title: Ko te ūnga kohu āhuarangi 'tērā pea ka hapa' i Uēra
summary: Tērā pea ka hapa tētahi ūnga hei whakaiti i te kohu kohu kati kati mā te 40% i Uēra i te tau 2020, kua whakatūpato ngā kaitohutohu kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Steffan MessengerBBC Wales Environment Correspondent Ko te pūrongo kaunuku o te Komiti hōu rawa mō te Huringa Āhuarangi (CCC) e whakaatu ana kua piki ake te kohu i te 0.5% ia tau i te wawaenga i waenganui i te 2009 me te 2015. Heoi anō, i hinga te 1.2% i te tau 2015, nā te whakahekenga o te kohu o te umanga. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e mōhio ana "e hiahiatia ana he mahi anō". Waihoki, kei te ara tonu a Pākehā ki te whakatutuki i tōna ake ūnga 2020. He ūnga ā-ture tā Wales hei whakaiti i te kohu kohu kati kati mā te 40% mai i ngā taumata 1990 i te tau 2020. I te tau 2015, i kitea e te CCC - e tohutohu ana i te UK me ngā kāwanatanga whakahaere - he 20% iti iho i te 1990, i whakaritea ki te 38% mō te UK katoa. Kua piki ake te kohu waka mo te rua tau i Weera, ā, he rerekē ki te UK, i noho papatahi tonu te kohu o te wāhanga hiko o Welsh i te tau 2015. E hiahiatia ana te "mahi kōhukihuki", e tautohe ana te pūrongo, i ngā wāhi e tika ana te mana o ngā iwi hei mahi. E huatau ana ki te whakatau i ngā rahunga hei whakatutuki i ngā ūnga whakatō rākau, me ētahi atu tohutohu hei whakapai ake i te tōtika pūngao me te whakamahana o ngā whare, ki te whakatoko hoki i ngā waka hiko. Ki te rāhuitia ngā wāhi kaupapahere, "he mea nui kia mahi tahi me te Kāwanatanga o UK kia tino kaha ai te anga whānui ki te whakahaere i ngā whakaiti kohu e hiahiatia ana". Heoi anō, kei te mahia te kauneketanga pai i ngā wāhi pūngao whakahou me te tukurua, e kī ana te pūrongo. Tērā pea ka tutuki tētahi ūnga hei whakaputa i te 7TWh hiko mai i ngā whakahou i Wales i te tau 2020, i te wā e ārahi ana a Wales i te UK mō ngā mokatere tukurua. I pūketetia e Uēra te 9% o te kohu UK i te tau 2015. E mahi ana i te 14.7 tāhei waro taikura mō ia tangata i Uēra - neke atu i te 10 tau ki mua; ko te whika mō te UK katoa e tata ana ki te 7 tāna, ā, i Pākehā e tata ana ki te 8.4 tāna mō ia tangata. I kī a Jessica McQuade, te āpiha kaupapahere me te rōpū taiao o WWF Cymru, i "tino pōrangi rātau i te kore kauneketanga, he whakaaro e tino mōhiotia ana e ētahi atu rōpū me ngā tāngata puta noa i Wales e hiahia ana ki te rerekētanga o te āhuarangi". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He maha nga tau e mōhio ana te Kāwanatanga o Welsh me whakatere tātau i te mahi mo te whakaiti i te kohukohu. " Engari e whakaatu ana anō ngā whika o tēnei rā kāore ngā tohutohu me ngā hōtaka i Uēra i te tauine pānga e hiahiatia ana." I kī a WWF e hiahia ana ki te kite i ngā mahere hei tuku i ngā wāhi pēnei i te wera whakahou me te whakaiti i te kohu ahuwhenua. I kī a Haf Elgar, ko te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Ngā Hoa o te Ao Cymru i te pūrongo "e whakaatu mārama ana me wawe tātau kēmu ināianei". "E pouri ana mātou i te kohu i Uēra i ngā tau tata nei, me ngā rerekētanga nā ngā take o waho, kaua ko te mahi a te kāwanatanga," tana kī. "Kua whiwhi mātou ināianei i te anga hei mahi i tēnei i Uēra me te Ture Taiao, engari me tautuhi ngā ūnga nui hei whakaiti i a tātau kohu e hāngai ana ki te Whakaaetanga o Parihi." E tūtaki ana te CCC ki te Kāwanatanga o Welsh a tērā wiki, me ngā minita nā te tohutohu i mua i te tautuhi i ngā taumata o ana tahua waro tuatahi e rua i te tau 2018. I pōhiritia e tētahi kaikawe kōrero a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh te pūrongo, e miramira ana i te pūkete a Wales ki te ārahi i te huarahi me ngā mokatere tukurua teitei rawa puta noa i te UK. "He nui tonu te tiri o te whakatipuranga hiko me te umanga taumaha o te UK, ā, he kawekawe pūngao kupenga," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Ko te hiko i hangaia i Uēra e whāngai ana ki te mātiti ā-motu, ā, ka pau i ngā kāinga me ngā umanga puta noa i te UK. Mā te pūkete i ēnei kawenga ake pūngao, kua tino heke iho te kohu i runga anō i te whakapaunga pūngao whakamutunga o Uēra mai i te tau 1990. "E mōhio ana mātou ki ētahi atu mahi e hiahiatia ana, ā, ka tautuhia e tā mātou Ture Taiao kia 80% te whakahekenga wā roa i te tau 2050."

title: Ka hoki whakamuri te whaea o ngā māhanga kōhungahunga i te whakahau rongoā 'huri ora'
summary: Ko te whaea o ngā kōtiro māhanga e tautoko ana i tētahi whakahau mō tētahi rongoā e āhei ana ki te whakamāmā ake.
text: Ko ngā māhanga a Leanne Barnett, ko Olivia rāua ko Ruby, e 21 marama te pakeke, i whānau mai me te phenylketonuria, PKU rānei. Ko te āhuatanga, ko te tikanga kāore e taea e rātau te kai i te nui o te pūmua, ka pā ki te kotahi i roto i te 10,000 ngā pēpi UK. E kī ana a Mrs Barnett kua whakahuatia ia ki te £75,000 mō ia māhanga mō tētahi rongoā Kuvan ā-tau. Neke atu i te 16,500 ngā waitohu i whiwhi ai tētahi petihana e karanga ana kia māmā ake te rongoā, kia wātea hoki i runga i te NHS. I kī a Mrs Barnett, mai i Kingswood, South Gloucestershire, me tuku e ia tana mahi kia tino mōhio ai ka whai ana tamāhine i te kai pākaha, nā te mea kāore e taea e ngā tāngata whai PKU te tukatuka tika i te pūmua mā te tinana. "Mēnā he nui rawa ō rātou pūmua ka tiketike ō rātou taumata, ā, ka pā pea ki ngā raruraru whanonga, ā, ka tūkino pea te roro me ngā mate hinengaro," tana kī. "Ko ngā mea katoa e kainga ana, e inu ana rānei, me tirotiro e au ngā tapanga. " Me paunatia e au [a rātau kai] kia waru, e iwa rānei ngā karamu pūmua i ia rā." Ko te nui o te pūmua i ia rā mō te kōhungahunga ko te 13 grams. Ka āwhina te rongoā Kuvan i te tangata ki te whakaputa i tētahi waikawa amino e kitea ana i ētahi pūmua, engari kāore i te wātea i te UK. "Ki taku whakaaro ko mātau anake te whenua i te EU kāore i a ia, nā te mea he nui rawa te utu," te kī a Ms Barnett. I tēnei wā ka whiwhi a ia i te kai pūmua iti mō ngā māhanga i runga i te whakahaunga mai i te NHS, ā, ka tunu i tana ake parāoa pūmua iti. Kua tāpiritia e ia tana tautoko ki tētahi petihana tuihono i whakatūria i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau e tono ana ki te kamupene US e mahi ana i te rongoā "huri ora" hei whakaiti i tōna utu. "Ka tino nui te rerekētanga ki o mātau oranga mēnā kei a mātau," te tāpiri mai a Ms Barnett. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Phenylketonuria - NHS

title: Ka whakanuia e tētahi o ngā mārena mārena roa rawa o UK te huritau
summary: Kua huihuia anō tētahi o ngā mārena roa rawa o Ingarangi ki te hākinakina i to rāua huritau mārena 80.
text: I hākari a Keni Hāhi, 102, me te wahine a Margaret, 99, i muri i te wehenga tuatahi mai i te pakanga. I wehi a Tēnā Hāhi e kore a ia e kite anō i tana wahine aroha i muri i tana haerenga ki te hōhipera me te hope whati. Engari kua huihuia anō te tokorua, i mārena i te tau 1937, i tētahi kāinga nēhi i Llangynidr, tata ki Crickhowell, i Powys. "E pupuri ringa ana rātau i ia rā ināianei nā te pūmahara o te wehenga i roto i te whawhai," te kī a te hunaonga a Pat Harris, e 75. Mai i taua wā, i horaina a Tēnā Hāhi, nāna i mau tētahi whakaahua o to rāua rā mārena i roto i tana kopa mai i taua wā, ki Burma i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao me ngā Taitapa o Uēra ki te Tonga. Ko te tokorua o Llanhilleth, tata ki Newbridge, tokorua ā rāua tamariki, ko Alan rāua ko Ann, i noho tahi i ia rā mai i taua wā. Tae noa ki te wā i nekehia ai a Mrs Harris ki tētahi kāinga tiaki i muri i te kitenga i te mate mateware. Kātahi ka tukuna te pūtia o mua ki te hōhipera i muri i te whatinga o tōna hope i te hinganga e ono wiki noa iho i mua i to rātau huritau 80, ā, i whakapono ko te wā whakamutunga tērā ka kite ia i tana wahine. Engari i muri i te paunga o te marama i te hōhipera, ka hoatu ki a Tēnā Hāhi te mārama katoa ki te haere, ā, ka kitea he rūma i te kāinga tiaki ōrite ki tana wahine i te Brecon Beacons. "I haere a Ken ki te pakanga, ā, ka noho a Margaret ki te kāinga e mahi ana hei hēkeretari a te tākuta, engari i ngā wā katoa i roto i tana putea," ko te tāpiri mai a Mrs Harris. "I te haerenga o Ken ki te hōhipera kāore a ia i whakaaro ka kite anō ia i a ia. He tino waimarie i wātea mai he rūma i te kāinga o Margaret. "He pakanga tūturu tēnei e ngana ana ki te pupuri tahi i a rātau. I hoatu e Ken tōna ora mo tōna whenua, ā, e tika ana kia noho ia ki tana wahine. "He tokorua tino aroha rāua, ā, e tino whakahīhī ana mātau ki te whakanui i to rāua huritau 80 ki a rāua."

title: Rangatiratanga o Pirihitini: Ka tiakina e Anaru Uira te mahere moni SNP
summary: Kua tohe te tangata nāna i tātuhi ngā tono tautohetohe mō tētahi moni o Pākehā motuhake, ka tukuna e rātau te wā tino pai ki te toa i tētahi taupānga.
text: I whakahaeretia e Andrew Wilson tētahi kōmihana SNP e taunaki ana kia pupuri i te pauna i ngā tau i muri i te rangatiratanga. Kātahi ka whakamōhiotia e Pākehā tōna ake moni mēnā ka tutuki he rangatū o ngā whakamātautau ohaoha. Kua anga atu nga tono ki nga whakahē taumaha mai i ētahi i roto i te nekeneke rangatiratanga. E kī ana rātau kāore i te nui te kaupapa, ā, ka herea rawa a Pākehā ki te kaupapa here ohaoha o UK i muri i te rangatiratanga - i te wā e matapae ana ngā hoariri o te rangatiratanga e kore te tangata e hiahia ki te "tūpono" i tō rātou mōkete, utu me te penihana i runga i ngā marohi. Engari i tohe a Nicola Sturgeon he "tino whai tikanga" ngā tono moni i te wā i whakaputaina ai te pūrongo i Me o tērā tau. I tāpaetia e te kaiārahi tuarua o te SNP, a Keith Brown, ana ake tono kia whakatau tētahi Pāremata Pākehā motuhake i roto i tōna wā tuatahi ki te whakauru i tētahi moni motuhake. I kitea whānuitia te pānuitanga he ngana ki te kimi i tētahi wāhi whakararuraru i roto i te taupatupatu, me te rōpū nā te kōrerorero i ngā tono i tōna hui ā muri ake nei i tēnei marama. I tonoa e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini he uniana moni tika me te toenga o te UK i mua i te taupānga 2014 - engari i whakahaeretia te nekehanga e te Tumuaki o George Osborne. I roto i tētahi uiuinga whānui ki te hōtaka o te Ata Pai o Aotearoa, ka kī a Tēnā Uira kua whai te Komihana Tupu ki te tuku i tētahi "tirohanga whārite ake o te wā heke, e kī ana ka nui te mahi a te rangatiratanga, engari ka whai painga taua mahi." I kī a ia e tohu ana te pōti he nui ake te whakapono o te tangata i mua ka whai painga te rangatiratanga ki te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te wā roa - engari ka noho tūturu tonu rātau ki te āhua o te tauwhiro, i te nuinga o te mōrearea i runga i a Pakihi. I tāpiritia e te SNP MSP o mua: "Ko te taumata whakaurunga kei a mātau ki te toenga o te UK neke atu i te 300 tau i roto i ngā ratonga pūtea, i roto i ngā utu me ngā hekenga me ngā mōkete he tino ahurei, nā reira me tiaki mātou i te tauwhiro ki te whenua e hiahia ana mātou ki te noho. " E hiahia ana mātou kia tere te tipu, e hiahia ana mātou kia whakaputa a mātau hokohoko i te nui o te whakawhirinaki ki tētahi o ngā rangatiratanga pōturi rawa i te ao tipua. "But transitions need to be managed and they need to be managed honestly so that people can say as we're going through it we knew this was what was going to happen. " Ko tētahi o ngā akoranga nui mai i a Pakihi, me pēhea te kore e mahi huringa, me pēhea e kore ai e whakahaere i ngā tauwhiro." Ko te MP SNP o Mua o George Kerevan i waenganui i te hunga i whakahē i ngā tono moni a te Komihana Whakatupuranga, kua whakaahuatia e ia he "tūturu rawa". E hiahia ana a Tēnā Kerevan ki tētahi tauwhiro tere ake ki tētahi moni motuhake, me te whakakore i ngā whakamātautau e ono i kī ai te kōmihana kia tutuki i mua i tērā tūponotanga. Engari i roto i tana uiuinga ki te kaiwhakatika o te whakahaerenga o TE Pākehā, o Takiwā, ka kī a Tēnā Uira me "pūtea tautoko ngā ratonga tūmatanui" me te whakatūpato i ngā kaituku moni "he hoa pai mātou ka utua anōtia". E whakaae ana ki ngā whakahē kua whāia ki a ia, ka kī a ia "kāore a ia i te rapu i te manakohanga whaiaro - kei te rapu ahau ki te toa". 'He uauatanga' te kī a Tēnā Uira: "Me toa tātau mā te whakapati i ngā tāngata kāore i te mōhio ki te kēhi, ā, ko ngā whakaaturanga pōti katoa e kī ana kua whakaponotia rātau e tētahi karere e kī ana kei te ngahoro te kēhi mō Ingarangi, ā, kei te tipu haere te kēhi mō Pākehā. " He tautohe tātau he mahi te rangatiratanga. Kaore te moni e taka i te rākau, kāore a Roma i hangaia i te rā kotahi, kāore he mea e taka ki roto i tō pona. Ehara tēnā i te oranga tūturu. Kaore koe e toa i te rota. "What happens is you get a tool box and the ability to work, and that work will be worth it. He mahi, he uaua, engari ko ngā whakaaturanga katoa o te hītori i ngā whenua iti e tino pai ana i te ao, he pai taua wero." I te pānuitanga o te pūrongo a te Komihana Whakatupuranga, ka kī te kaiārahi Rangatira o Pirihitini, a Ruth Davidson, ka waiho e te mahere SNP ki te pupuri i tētahi Pākehā motuhake mā te whakamahi i "te moni o tētahi whenua kē me te kore pātai, me te kore pēke matua, ā, kāore he pūrua". I tāpiri mai a ia kāore i te mārama ngā mahere mō ngā mea e whai ake nei, ka tāpiri: "Kāore au i te tino mōhio he nui tēnā mō te iwi o Pākehā e hiahia ana ki te peti i tā rātou mōkete, ā rātou penihana, ā rātou utu me tō rātou wā heke." I kī te kaiārahi Mahi o Pirihitini, a Rārangi Rēneti he "kōmihana tapahi" te pūrongo, ehara i te kōmihana tipu. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko ngā tono kia tapahia te tāpaetanga o Pākehā e tata ana ki te rua tuatoru i roto i te tekau tau, ka hua ki tētahi taumata whakawhāiti kāore anō kia whakamātauria e Hōri Osborne".

title: E piki haere ana ngā kaiako o ngā tauira, ka whakatūpato a NASUWT Cymru
summary: Kua nui ake te raruraru o ngā tauira e mau puku ana i ngā panekoti o ngā kaiako me te whakairi ki runga i te pāpāho pāpori, kua whakatūpato tētahi uniana whakaako.
text: I whakaarahia te take i te hui a NASUWT Cymru i Wrexham. E whai ana te kōrero i te whakaurunga o te ture a te kāwanatanga o UK e mahi ana i te upskirting hei hara hara. I kī a Sion Amlyn, he mema nui ā-motu o te uniana, e kite ana i te pikinga o te maha o ngā pūrongo o ngā tauira e hīkoi ana. I kī atu a ia ki a Cymru Fyw o TE AO o Wales: "He tino whakararuraru tērā te pikinga o te mahi o te upskirting, o te downblousing rānei e ngā tauira i runga i ngā kaiako, ā, he pānga kino tērā ki te oranga o o mātau mema. " E pāngia ana rātau e te pouri, kāore rātau e hiahia ki te hoki anō ki te mahi, ā, i roto i tō tātau hinengaro, he nui ake ngā mea e hiahiatia ana hei rutu i tēnei momo mahi. "Kei te ngana ngā kura. He tikanga kei ngā kura hei rutu i tēnei, engari ki taku whakaaro kāore i te tika te whakamahinga, i te tika rānei." He aha te ture o nāianei? He aha ngā whāititanga o te āhuatanga o nāianei i Ingarangi me Weera? He aha te kaupapa a te ture hou?

title: Tahua 2021: Extra £1.6bn for UK's Covid vaccination rollout
summary: Ka whiwhi te whakatakotoranga kano ārai mate Covid o UK i tētahi atu £ 1.65bn i roto i te Tahua hei āwhina i a ia ki te tae ki tana ūnga o te tuku i tētahi rongoā tuatahi ki ia pakeke i te 31 o Hōngongoi.
text: Ka pānuitia hoki e te tumuaki te £22m o te pūtea tīariari o te hōtaka ka whakamahia i roto i tētahi whakamātautau kia kite ai mēnā ka pai te whakaranu i ngā rongoā kano ārai mate rerekē. Neke atu i te 20 miriona ngā tāngata i te UK kua whiwhi i te wero tuatahi, ā, kei te tono a NHS Ingarangi ināianei ki ngā pakeke 60 ki te 63 tau ki te tāpui i ngā werohanga. I kī a Rishi Sunak he "mea nui kia mau tonu tātau i tēnei nekehanga". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te tikanga o te pare i a tātau ki te huaketo, ka taea e tātau te hiki i ngā rāhuitanga, te whakatuwhera anō i to tātau ōhanga me te arotahi ki te waihanga mahi me te whakaoho i te tupu." Ka tūhura hoki te whakamātautau i ngā kano ārai mate mēnā ka pai te rongoā tuatoru. E whai ana te kāwanatanga ki te tuku i ngā pakeke katoa he wero tuatahi i te mutunga o Hōngongoi. Ināianei, e iwa mai i te 10 ngā tāngata e 65 neke atu rānei te pakeke kua whiwhi i tā rātou kano ārai mate Covid tuatahi, e ai ki te NHS i Ingarangi. I kī te Whare Taonga e tūmanakohia ana hoki te tumuaki kia whakahuahua i ngā whakapainga ki te āheinga o te UK ki te urupare ki ngā taupēnga Covid hōu i roto i tana pānuitanga Pūtea. Ka oati a Mr Sunak ki te hoatu i te £28m mai i te putea o te Vaccine Taskforce ki te whakawhānui i te kaha o te whakamatautau kano kano a te UK me te kaha ki te tiki wawe i nga tauira o nga momo coronavirus hou. Ā, ka whakamahia te £5m e te Pokapū mō te Whakahaere Tukanga i Darlington ki te tiki i tētahi "puna" o ngā kano ārai mate Covid hei whakamahi i roto i ana mahi ki ngā momo rerekē. I kitea he coronavirus "rerekētanga āwangawanga" i kitea tuatahitia i Paratira i te UK, e toru ngā kēhi i kitea i Ingarangi me te toru i Pākehā. I Ingarangi, kei te ngana tonu ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te aroturuki i tētahi o te hunga i whakamātauria he pai mō te momo hou. Ko nga keehi tuatahi e rua i ahu mai i te whare kotahi i South Gloucestershire, me te hitori o te haerenga ki Brazil, engari ko te tuatoru kaore i honoa, i kii a Public Health England (PHE). Tērā anō ētahi āwangawanga kāore pea ngā kano ārai mate e pai ki te momo Pārihia - engari i kī a Prof Stephen Powis o NHS Ingarangi ka taea te "tere te urutau". Ko nga whika hou a te kawanatanga e whakaatu ana i te 20,089,551 nga tangata i te UK kua whiwhi i te werohanga tuatahi, i te 796,132 kua whiwhi i te tuarua. I karangatia e te Pirimia a Boris Johnson he "whakatutukitanga nui a te motu" me te kī "ka rerekē ia wero i roto i ta mātau pakanga ki a Covid". I tutuki i te kawanatanga tana oati ki te tuku jab ki nga tangata katoa i roto i nga roopu manaaki e wha o runga i te UK, tae atu ki nga kaimahi hauora me te tiaki hauora, i te waenganui o Hui-tanguru. Mai i te Mane, tata ki te rua miriona ngā tāngata e 60 ki te 63 tau te pakeke i Ingarangi ka tīmata ki te whiwhi reta e tono ana i a rātou ki te tāpui i tā rātou kano ārai mate. Ko te ūnga panuku ko te tuku i tētahi rongoā tuatahi ki ngā tāngata katoa neke atu i te 50 i te 15 o Āperira, tae atu ki ngā tāngata 16-64 te pakeke me ētahi āhuatanga hauora me ngā kaitiaki kāore i utua mō ngā tāngata hauā me ngā pakeke. I muri i tērā, ka manakētia ngā tāngata e te rōpū pakeke. Kua tautuhia ngā rāhuitanga i Ingarangi kia hikitia katoatia i te 21 o Pipiri i te wā tata nei, me ngā tauira katoa kia hoki ki ngā kura mai i te 8 o Poutāpeta. I a ia e kōrero ana i te Whakaaturanga a Andrew Marr o te BBC i te Rātapu, ka kī te tumuaki "kei te whakarite ia i tētahi Pūtea e whakarato tautoko ana i ngā tāngata" i te whakangāwari o ngā ture raka Covid. I whakapumautia e Mr Sunak ka homai e ia he awhina tae noa ki taua wa, engari i tapiritia e hiahia ana ia ki te "taumata ki te iwi" mo te "ohorere ki te ohanga" i takea mai e Covid.

title: Ko te tikanga o te huringa tūnga kua kore ngā Antilles Tatimana i te tīariari
summary: Kua mutu te tīariari o te whakawhirinakitanga o ngā Kāriana Hōrana i te huringa o te tūnga ā-ture o ngā moutere e rima.
text: Kua noho a Curacao me St Maarten hei whenua motuhake i roto i te Kīngitanga o Hōrana, ka hono ki Aruba, i whiwhi i te tūnga i te tau 1986. Ko Bonaire, ko Hato Eustatius me Saba ināianei he rohe motuhake motuhake o te kingitanga. E pupuri ana a Hōrana i te kawenga mo te wawao me te kaupapa here kē. Ka whai tirotiro tuatahi hoki te kāwanatanga o Hōnea i ngā moni a Curacao i raro i tētahi whakaritenga āwhina nama. I te huihuinga, kua whakaemi nga moutere i te nama e tata ana ki te 2bn hōro (£1.75bn; $2.8bn), ko te nuinga o taua nama ki Hōrana. I kī ngā moutere iti o Hato Maarten, Bonaire, Hato Eustatius me Saba i te nuinga o te wā i whakahaeretia te nama e Curacao, te motu nui rawa me te pūmatua moe maori o ngā Anatira o Hōrana o mua. I amuamu a Curacao he nui rawa te kawenga pūtea mō te tōpūtanga, otirā mō Saba, St Eustatius me Bonaire. Ko te tāpoi, te whakangāwari hinu me te pūtea ā-waho nga kaupapa matua o nga ohanga o nga moutere. I whakanohoia e te Tatimana nga moutere, i te taha o Aruba, i te rau tau 17. I te tau 1954, ka noho te rohe, i karangatia ko Ngā Initia Uru o Hōrana, i te tau 1954. Ko te tūnga hou, i pā mai i te Rātapu, i whai i ngā taupānga i ngā tau tata nei i kōwhiri ai a Curacao, St Maarten, Bonaire me Saba ki te wehe i te tōpūtanga i te wā e tautoko ana a Hato Eustatius i te tūnga kōkuhu. Kaore tētahi o nga moutere i pōti mo te rangatiratanga.

title: Sierra Burgess: Kua wehewehea e te whitiāhua taitamariki hou a Netflix ngā kaimātakitaki
summary: Mō ētahi, ko Sierra Burgess Is A Loser he rom-com Netflix tūkino e hāngai ana ki a Shannon Purser.
text: Ki ētahi atu, he māharahara ki te hunga turi, he kōrero whakawhitiwhiti, he whakangahau pōhēhē, he whakakororia i te hī ika, e pokanoa ana i te take whakaaetanga. Kua kī te kaiwhakaari matua ko te pikitia he "kōrero mō te ahurea ipurangi". E kite ana i tētahi kōtiro kura tuarua e ngana ana ki te haere tahi me tētahi atu ākonga mā te whakatakune he kaingākau kaingākau a ia. I a ia e kōrero ana ki a Clevver, ka kī a Shannon, e mōhiotia ana e te tokomaha ko Barb mai i Stranger Things, e titiro ana te whitiāhua "ki te āhua e pēhi ana te iwi i ngā taitama kia whakataetae tētahi ki tētahi, kia rite ki tētahi tino pai". Kāore anō kia whakaritea katoatia te pikitia e ngā kaiwhakawāwā, e whiwhi ana i tētahi whakatauranga 68% tika i Rotten Tomatoes. Engari tērā ētahi whakaaro tino nui i whakairihia e ngā kaiwhakamahi i Twitter. I runga i te take hauātanga, ka whakatakune te pūāhua matua he turi kia kore ai ia e kōrero ki te pūāhua o Noa Centineo, a Jamey (arā, e whakaatu ana i tōna tuakiri pono). I kī te tauira me te kaitapere o Nyle DiMarco, he turi: "He tino ngāwari noa iho te whakangahau mō ngā rōpū whakawātea, whakawāteatia rānei - engari mā tēnā koe e noho hei kaituhi māngere." Ko ētahi e kī ana ko ngā kōrero kōrero mō te hapori LGBTQ e mahia ana, kāore he taenga mai, he whakahē rānei a ētahi atu pūāhua. He kaiwhakahaere pāpāho pāpori a Rowan Ellis, e 26, mai i Rāwāhi, ā, ka kitea ētahi o ngā huānga i roto i te whitiāhua "raruraru", otirā he tirohanga e kihi ana a Jamey i a Sierra, e whakaaro ana he tangata rerekē tērā. "He tino kore whakaae tēnei kihi," tana kī. "Kāore i whakaarotia, i kōrerotia rānei i roto i te whitiāhua. He pūoro pupuhi, he pūoro māhorahora e kī ana kei te kihi a ia i te tama. Engari, he tino kino noa iho ki a au. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te tikanga kia āta tirohia ngā mea. Ko ngā mea pēnei i ngā take morare o te hī ika i tētahi tangata, ngā take ā-hinengaro o tērā, me te kihi kāore i te whakaaetia. I whakaaro ahau kua tino paraihetia - kāore he kōrerorero e karapoti ana." Koia anō, tērā ētahi atu e whakaaro ana he koretake te whakahē. E whakaaro ana a Charlotte Coombs, e 23, he kaiāwhina arumoni i roto i te umanga pouaka whakaata, he "pūrākau reka" tā te pikitia. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te karere o te pikitia ko te kī kia noho koe ko koe anō, whakawhitiwhiti i tō tuakiri, kia tika hoki mai i te tīmatanga. He mātakitaki ngāwari, koia i pai ai ahau. "E tūmanako ana ahau e mōhio ana te nuinga o te iwi he hē te hī ika, ā, kāore te pikitia i te kī atu ki a koe kia mahi i tēnā. Tērā pea kāore koe e noho ki tētahi wāhi pai mēnā kei te whai whakaaro koe i te pikitia." Ko te pikitia te mea hou rawa i roto i ngā rangatū o ngā ihirangi ā-taitamariki e panaia ana e Netflix i tēnei wā. I te tau kua taha ake nei he āhua huri noa i ngā kiriata pēnei i te The Kissing Booth me To All the Boys I've Loved Before, tae atu ki ngā rangatū pēnei i te Insatiable, i whakahētia hoki mō tōna whakaahuatanga o ngā pūāhua rahi-tāpiri. Kua whakapā atu a Newsbeat ki a Netflix kia kite he aha tāna e pā ana ki te kōrero huri noa i tana pikitia hou rawa. Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Omirangi 2024: E kī ana a Hamburg 'Kāo' ki te hautū i ngā Kēmu
summary: Kua pōti ngā tangata o te taone nui o Tiamana o Hamburg ki te hautū i ngā Kēmu Orimipia me ngā Tākaro Paralympic 2024.
text: Ko Hamburg tētahi o ngā tāone e rima e toe ana i te oma, i te taha o Roma, Paris, Budapest me Los Angeles. Engari e 51.6% o ngā tangata o te taone i pōti kāo i roto i tētahi taupānga i te Rātapu. I tautohe te puni Kāo ka pai ake te whakapau moni i tohua mo te Omirangi. I kōwhiria e nga kaiwhakahaere o te Omirangi o Tiamana a Hamburg hei taone kaitono pai i mua i Berlin. Kāore anō a Tiamana kia taurimatia ngā Kēmu mai i te tau 1972 i Mīhini. I whakakāhoretia e ngā kaipōti i reira te wā ki te taurima i te Omirangi Hōtoke 2022 e rua tau ki mua. Tata ki te rua tuatoru o ngā kaipōti i Kiel pātata, i reira ka tū ngā takahanga rererangi, i tāruatia te kaupapa o te Orangirangi i te taupānga o te Rātapu. Engari i raro iho i te 32% te neke atu i te taone iti rawa o Kiel, i te wā e 651,000 ngā kaipōti i Hamburg - ko te hawhe o te pōti. I pouri te taone nui o Hamburg, a Olaf Scholz ki te hua: "He whakataunga tēnā kāore mātou i pīrangi, engari he mārama." Ko ngā tāone e toe ana e whakataetae ana ki te whakatū i ngā Tākaro 2024 ko Putapeta, Parihi, Los Angeles me Roma. I kī ngā kaiwhakawāwā o te mahere o Hamburg he moumou, he utu €11.2bn ($11.9bn; £7.9bn). I kī taurangi nga mana o te taone o Hamburg i te € 1.2bn mo te takahanga, engari ko te tiri o te raiona i homai e te kāwanatanga ā iwi. I kī a Florian Kasiske mai i te whakahau Kāo NOlympia ka kitea e te tangata ka pai ake te whakapau moni. I kite a ia i tētahi rerekētanga o te wairua i Hamburg, e hua ana kua honoa te pōti ki te tokomaha o ngā kaiheke me ngā hunga whakaruru e tae ana ki te taone. "E pā ana ki ngā tōrangapū o te taone. He tokomaha ngā tāngata kātahi anō ka tae mai ki tēnei taone, ā, me moe i roto i ngā teneti - ā, me whai moni mō tēnā," tana kī. Ko te hua he tūponotanga mo te tākaro Tiamana. I kī te tumuaki o te Rūnanga Hākinakina o Te Orangirangi o Tiamana (DOSB), a Michael Vesper, e mārama ana "ināianei e kore e taea te pupuri i te Omirangi i Tiamana mō ngā tekau tau". I whakapono a ia ko ngā whakaekenga o Parihi o nā noa nei, tae atu ki te mate kaiheke, i whai wāhi ki te kore pōti. A, i kī a ia ko te heitara hāmate haere tonu e pā ana ki te WHK me te haupae mahi i roto i ngā tākaro o te ao, he take matua hoki. Ko ētahi i wehi i ngā pānga kino ki te tākaro Tiamana. Ka tūtohu te toa pōro ā-ringa o Olympic, a Stefan Kretzschmar, "kua katia te waharoa ki te ao Orimipia (hākinakina) mo ake tonu atu. Kāore tēnei Kāo e tika ana kia whiwhi mētara". I kī tētahi kōrero mō te Komiti o te Orangirangi Ao Whānui (IOC) "kua ngaro tētahi wāhi nui mō te taone, te whenua me te tākaro i Tiamana". "E hapa ana hoki te taone nui i te pūtea penapena a te WHK tata ki te $1.7bn ki te angitu o ngā Kēmu, e whakataurite ana ki te €1.2bn e hiahia ana a Hamburg ki te haumi," tana tāpiri mai. "Ināianei ka kaha te whakataetae me ngā tāone kaitono tino pai e whā. Mā ēnei tauwhāinga kaha ka taea e tātau katoa te titiro whakamua ki ngā Kēmu Orimipia mīharo 2024, ahakoa ko wai te toa." I a Hōngongoi, ka whakatau te taone nui o Boston kia wehe atu i te rēhi hei kaihautū mō te 2024 i waenganui i te kore tautoko tūmatanui. Ka tīpakohia te taone toa i te wā o Mahuru 2017.

title: Covid-19: Karangatia kia whakaarohia anō te ārai korowha raka
summary: Kei te karangatia ngā karanga kia ōrite te korowha ki te hī ika i te wā o te raka hou o Ingarangi.
text: Kua tohe te kāwanatanga i ngā tāngata kia noho ki te kāinga ki te whakatū i te horahanga o Covid-19. Ahakoa tērā, i hoatu e ia te hīkoi kia haere tonu, e kī ana ka whakamahia hei momo mahi. E kī ana ngā kaitākaro korowha me hoatu taua huarahi ōrite ki tā rātou tākaro, neke atu i te 129,000 ngā tāngata e haina ana i tētahi petihana e karanga ana kia whakatuwhera anō ngā akoranga. Nā te mea kua hipa te petihana i te 100,000 ngā waitohu, ināianei ka taupatupatutia i te Pāremata. I kī a Paul Callin, he mema o Copt Heath Golf Club i Solihull, West Midlands, he "tino ōrite" te hī me te korowha. "He mea nui kia āwhina kāore tētahi o ngā karapu e tono ana kia tuwhera ō rātou whare karapu, ka huri katoa i te papa motokā, hāngai tonu i te akoranga i runga i tētahi pūnaha ara kotahi, ā, ka hāngai atu anō," tana kī. "Nā reira mai i tērā tirohanga ka tino haumaru." I kī te Korowha o Ingarangi, te tinana whakahaere e tohu ana i ngā kaitākaro mātāmua o te whenua, tata ki te rua miriona ngā kaitākaro i Ingarangi e whai hua ana i te whakaaro anō a te kāwanatanga. I kī te Tumuaki Whakahaere a Jeremy Tarling he "māori" te tawhiti pāpori o te tākaro, i te rangi tuwhera, ā, ka whakamahia e te tangata ā rātou ake taputapu. I tāpiritia e ia he tino painga ki te hauora hinengaro o ngā kaitākaro me te whiwhi i te mahi tinana. I kī te Karapu Korowha o Llanymynech, e noho ana i te rohe o Ingarangi me Weera, ā, e 15 ngā rua i Powys me te toru i Shropshire, kua pāngia hoki e ngā ture rerekē i waenganui i ngā whenua e rua i te wā o te taiepa - ahakoa kua rāhuitia te korowha i roto i aua whenua e rua. There are still grounds people on site and people manning phones, but no players, said secretary Sian Whiteoak. "He mema pakeke tāku, ā, i ētahi wā koia anake te mea e mahia ana e rātau i te kāinga," tana kī. "One member who is over 70, is a widower, hasn't have his family in his home since March. Ko tana putanga kotahi ko te taraiwa ki te karapu mo te korowha me tōna tuakana - kāore rātau e hiahia ki te haere ki roto i te 2m. "Ko tōna putanga anake ko te toro i te urupa o tana wahine, ā, ka taea e au te whakaaro, i tēnei wā, kei te tino mōrearea a ia." He ngāwari noa iho te pupuri i te tawhiti pāpori, e kī ana a Ms Whiteoak, i te rahi o ngā akoranga. "Llanymynech covers 160 acres and we have around 450 members, so even if each single member was out on our course we would only have about four people per acre," she said. "Kei te noho paetata tonu te take ki te mahi. E mōhio ana ahau kāore rātau e hiahia ki ngā ope tāngata e haere ana ki ngā maunga me ngā one, engari he tino rerekē te taraiwa 10 meneti mō tētahi hurihanga korowha. "Ka taea e mātou te whakahaere i te nui o ngā tāngata... E kore e taea e koe te toka noa iho me te tākaro korowha." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Mamati, Ahurea, Pāpāho me te Hākinakina: "I a mātou e whakatere ana i ēnei rāhuitanga hōu e hiahiatia ana, ka mārama tonu mātou ki te hira o te mahi ki te hauora me te oranga o te tangata, i a mātou e noho haumaru ana i te kāinga. " Koia tērā te take e whakaaetia tonutia ana te mahi o waho i roto i ngā whare, ki tētahi atu tangata rānei mai i tētahi atu whare, i tō mirumiru tautoko rānei, kotahi i te rā i tō rohe paetata." Engari e kī ana, ko te wāhi matua i roto i te tohutohu a te kāwanatanga i noho tonu kia whakamōkitotia e te tangata te wā i waho o o rātau kāinga, i tukuna ai te tō ā-papa o te āhuatanga o nāianei. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ingarangi Korowha

title: Te pāpā o Greta Thunberg: 'Kei te hari a ia, engari e māharahara ana ahau'
summary: Kua kī te pāpā o Greta Thunberg i whakaaro ia he "whakaaro kino" ki tana tamāhine te mau ki te "raina o mua" o te pakanga ki te huringa āhuarangi.
text: E hia miriona ngā tāngata kua whakaaetia kia hono ki te pakeke 16 tau ki te whakapiki i te mōhiotanga ki ngā take taiao. Engari i kī atu a Svante Thunberg ki te AO "kāore a ia i te tautoko" i tana tamāhine e tīpoka ana i te kura mo te tuki āhuarangi. I kī a Tēnā Thunberg he nui ake te hari o Greta mai i te rironga o te kaiwhaiwhai - engari e māharahara ana a ia ki te "kino" e anga atu ana ki a ia. Hei wāhanga o te pāohotanga kotahi, i whakatikaina e Greta mō te hōtaka o te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, ka kī atu a Tā David Attenborough ki a ia kua "whakaoho i te ao" ki te huringa āhuarangi. I karangatia e ia a Tā Rawiri i runga i Skype mai i Stockholm i Huitene, e noho ana ia, ka kōrero ki a ia he pēhea tana whakaawe i tana mahi whakaoho. Ka kī atu te kaipānui me te kaipānui māori ki a Greta kua "tutuki i a ia ngā mea i rahua e te tokomaha o mātau e mahi ana i te take mo te 20 tau". I tāpiritia e ia ko te tau 16 tau te "take anake" i noho ai te huringa āhuarangi hei kaupapa matua i te pōti nui o UK o nā noa nei. I whakaingoatia a Greta mo te Whakawhiwhinga Rangimārie o tēnei tau, i muri i te tohu i tētahi nekehanga huri noa e whakahau ana i ngā kaiārahi o te ao kia mahi i runga i te huringa āhuarangi. I ahu mai ki ngā tuki kura tauriterite puta noa i te ao. Ko ia i waenganui i ngā tāngata kōtaha tiketike e rima e whakahaere ana i te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā hei kaiwhakatika manuhiri i te wā whakangahau. I rere atu te kaiwhakaatu o TE AO i a Mishal Husain ki Huitene ki te uiui i te taitamariki me tōna pāpā. I runga i te whakatau kia rere, ka kī te kaiwhakatika o tēnei rā, a Sarah Sands: "Kāore i whai wā mātou mō ētahi atu huarahi waka. Engari i tūtaki mātau ki to mātau kaikāmera i reira, ā, ko te uiuinga i waenganui i a Greta rāua ko David Attenborough i whakahaeretia e Skype, nāna i rongo i te huarahi tika kia whakawhitiwhiti kōrero ai rāua tokorua." I te kōrero ki a Husain hei wāhanga o te whakaaturanga, ka kī a Tēnā Thunberg kua pākaha tana tamāhine ki te pouri mo te "toru, e whā tau rānei" i mua i tana tīmatanga i tana taraiwa kura. "I mutu tana kōrero... ka mutu tana haere ki te kura," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia ko te "moepuku whakamutunga mō tētahi matua" i te tīmatanga o Greta ki te kore e kai. Hei āwhina i a ia kia pai ake, ka nui ake te wā i noho ai a Tāne Thunberg ki a Greta rāua ko tōna taina, a Beata, i to rāua kāinga i Huitene. I whakakorea e te whaea o Greta, te kaiwaiata opera me te kaiuru o mua o te Whakataetae Waiata Eurovision, a Malena Ernman, ngā kirimana kia noho tahi ai te whānau katoa. I rapu āwhina hoki te whānau i nga tākuta, ka kī a Tēnā Thunberg. I kitea a Greta i te Asperger - he momo autism - 12 te pakeke, he mea i kī ai ia e āhei ai ia ki te "kite i ngā mea mai i waho o te pouaka". I roto i ngā tau tata nei ka tīmata rātau ki te kōrerorero me te rangahau i te huringa āhuarangi, ā, ka nui haere te hiahia o Greta ki te whiu i te take. I a ia e taunaki ana i te motika tangata "tino hohe", ka whakapaea e Greta ōna mātua he "tino tinihanga", te kī a Tēnā Thunberg. "I kī a Greta: 'Ko wai ngā mana tangata e tū ana koe?', i te mea kāore mātou i te tino āta whakaaro ki tēnei take āhuarangi," tana whakamārama. I kī a ia i whiwhi a Greta i te "pūngao" mai i ngā huringa whanonga o ōna mātua kia rata ake ai ki te taiao - pēnei i tōna whaea e kōwhiri ana kia kaua e haere mā runga waka rererangi, ā, ka noho tōna pāpā hei vegan. Kua haere tahi hoki a Tēnā Thunberg me tana tamāhine i ana haerenga rere ki ngā tūnga āhuarangi o UN i Niu Ioka me Madrid. Kaore a Greta e pai ki te haere mā te hau nā tōna pānga taiao. "I mahia e au ēnei mea katoa, i mōhio ahau ko rātau te mea tika hei mahi... engari kāore au i mahi hei tiaki i te āhuarangi, i mahia e au hei whakaora i taku tamaiti," te kī a Tēnā Thunberg. "Tokorua aku tamāhine, ā, kia pono, ko rātau katoa te mea nui ki a au. E hiahia ana ahau kia hari rātau," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Tēnā Thunberg kua "huri" a Greta, ā, kua "tino hari" nā tōna whakaohooho. "E whakaaro ana koe ehara a ia i te mea noa iho ināianei nā te mea he motuhake a ia, he tino rongonui a ia, me ēnei mea katoa. Engari ki a au he tamaiti noa iho a ia ināianei - ka taea e ia ngā mea katoa e taea e ētahi atu tāngata," tana kī. "E kanikani ana a ia, he nui tana kata, he nui te ngahau - ā, kei roto a ia i tētahi wāhi tino pai." Heoi anō, mai i te wā i huaketo tuihono ai te mahi taraiwa a Greta, ka kī a Tēnā Thunberg kua anga atu a ia ki te tūkino mai i ngā tāngata "kāore e hiahia ana ki te huri" i ō rātou āhua noho kia tiakina ai te taiao. Kua kī a Greta i mua e tūkino ana te tangata i a ia mō "ōku āhua, ōku kākahu, taku whanonga me ōku rerekētanga". I kī tōna pāpā i tino māharahara a ia ki "ngā rongo kōrero, ngā mea katoa e ngana ana te tangata ki te waihanga i a ia - te kino e puta mai ana". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia e pā ana tana tamāhine ki te whakahē "tino pai". "He pono, kāore au i te mōhio me pēhea tana mahi, engari ka kata a ia i te nuinga o te wā. Ka kitea e ia he hākinakina." I kī a Tēnā Thunberg e tūmanako ana ia ka "iti iho te kaha" mō tōna whānau ā muri ake nei, ā, e whakaaro ana a ia "e tino hiahia ana a Greta ki te hoki ki te kura". I tāpiritia e ia, i te 17 o ngā tau o Greta, kua kore ia e hiahia kia haere tahi i ana haerenga. "Mēnā e hiahia ana ia ki a au i reira, ka ngana ahau ki te mahi," tana kī. "Engari ki taku whakaaro ka nui ake tana mahi, ko ia anake, he tino pai."

title: I whainatia e te umanga pūkoro o Hull KCOM neke atu i te 999 ngā rahunga waea
summary: Kua whainatia te kaiwhakarato whakawhitiwhiti kōrero KCOM e £900,000 i muri i te waipuke i takea mai i te Āwhā Eva i rahunga ai ngā waea ohorere e 74.
text: I kitea e Ofcom "ngā ngoikoretanga nui" i roto i te ratonga waea ohorere a te umanga o Hull, ko te tikanga kāore e taea e ngā tāngata o taua rohe te waea ki te 999, ki te 112 rānei. I kitea e te kaiwhakarite kua pakaru ngā ture kia taea ai e te tangata te whakapā atu ki ngā ratonga ohorere i ngā wā katoa. Ka whakahaere a KCOM i te whatunga waea matua me te aunui i Hull. Koia anake te taone UK kāore i te whakaratohia e te Openreach a BT, e whakahaere ana i te whatunga pūkoro. Pānuitia ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei me ētahi atu pūrākau puta noa i Aotearoa, i kī a KCOM i whakamōhio atu ki te kaiwhakarite i te 28 o Hakihea 2015 kua rahua tana ratonga waea ohorere mō te takiwā o Hull mō te whā haora. E kī ana ko te rahunga nā te waipuke i tētahi o ngā whakawhitinga waea a BT i York i te oho o te Āwhā Eva. Heoi anō, i kitea e Ofcom ko ngā waea ohorere katoa mai i ngā kiritaki i taua rohe i whakawhirinaki ki te whakawhitinga waea waipuke i York. I raro i ngā ture Ofcom, ko te tikanga kia taea e te kaiwhakahaere waea me te aunui te whakawhiti aunoa i ngā waea ohorere mā ngā ara pūrua. I kitea e te tūhuratanga, ahakoa he ara pūrua tā te umanga, i whakawhirinaki hoki ēnei ki te whakawhitinga waea waipuke i York. I kī a Ofcom i hangaia e KCOM tētahi ara whirinoa hei kawe i ngā waea ohorere i hipa atu i te whakawhitinga waea waipuke i York i roto i te rua haora o te kitenga i te raruraru. I kī te kaiwhakarite e tūmanako ana kia kaha rawa ngā ratonga a ngā kamupene waea "ki te tino nui e taea ana" ki te tūhono i ngā waea ohorere i ngā wā katoa, ahakoa i roto i ngā āhuatanga uaua.

title: Ko ngā hua o Hēneti i pā ki te utu KC-46A
summary: Kua pūrongotia e te umanga rererangi o Amerika a Boeing he 33% te hinganga o te hua ia hauwhā i muri i te utunga o ngā takaware ki tētahi rererangi whakahinuhinu hōia.
text: I kī a Boeing ko ngā whiwhinga kupenga mō ngā marama e toru ki te mutunga o Pipiri ko te $1.11bn (£710m) mai i te $1.65bn i te tau i mua. I tangohia e Hēneti he utu $536m mo ana mahi ki te whakatika i tētahi take ki te pūnaha hinu i runga i tana waka rererangi taraka KC-46A. Kua tukua e Hēneti ki te tuku i ngā taraka 18 ki te Ope Rererangi o Amerika i a Aotearoa 2017, me te 179 i te tau 2027. Ko te hua o te utu, ināianei e tūmanako ana a Hēneti ki ngā whiwhinga uho o te $7.70-$7.90 mō ia tiritiri mō te 2015, heke iho i tana tohu tōmua o te $8.20-$8.40 mō ia tiritiri. Heoi anō, i kī te Boeing i te 11% ki te $24.5bn i āwhinatia e ngā tukunga rererangi arumoni, i piki 9% mai i te tau i mua ki te 197. Kei te ara tonu a Hēneti ki te whati i tētahi pūkete ā-tau hōu mō ngā tukunga rererangi arumoni i muri i ngā tukunga 381 i te hawhe tuatahi o te 2015. I mau tonu hoki te kamupene i tana tohu moni ā-tau i waenganui i te $94.5bn me te $96.5bn. "Ko te whakapūketetanga o ngā tukunga rererangi arumoni ki ngā kiritaki puta noa i te ao i kaha ai te tipu moni mārō, ā, ko te kaha o tā mātou kōpaki katoa me te arotahi uaua i puta ai te rerenga moni mahi nui i roto i te koata," te kī a te perehitini me te rangatira nui o Te Wānanga o Te Aotearoa. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te mahinga mahi kaha puta noa i ā mātou papatono whakanao arumoni, waea hoki, i wāhikē i tētahi wāhanga o te utu taraka, ā, ka taea e mātou te pupuri i ā mātou whakaritenga ki te whakahoki moni ki ā mātou kaipupuri me te haumi i roto i ngā mahi hou me tō mātou iwi."

title: Ko te umanga pūoko Velodyne i 'pōhēhētia' e te mate taraiwa whaiaro o Hekerangi
summary: Kua kī te umanga nāna i hoahoa ngā pūoko i runga i te motokā taraiwa whaiaro o Hekerangi i patua ai tētahi wahine i tēnei wiki, ehara tōna hangarau i te whakapae.
text: I kī atu a Dave LeeNorth America, ki a Velodyne, i "pōauau" i taua mahi, ā, ka taea e ana taputapu te kite i roto i te pouri. I tūtuki a Elaine Herzberg, e 49, i te motokā i te pō o te Rātapu i Tempe, i Arāna. I mate a ia i te hōhipera. Kei te haere tonu te tūhuratanga ki te take o tōna matenga. I whakaputaina te ataata o te mahi e nga kaihoko i mua o te Wenerei. I whakaaturia e Ms Herzberg e haere ana me tana paihikara, i tawhiti atu i te whakawhitinga waewae. Kāore te motokā - tōna atekōkiri tangata rānei - i urupare. I kī atu tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō Hekerangi ki te AO e kore e kōrero mō te tirohanga a Velodyne i te wā e tū ana te uiui. 'Ka tino pai te kite' Ka whakamahia ngā pūoko Lidar a Velodyne e ngā kamupene maha e whakamātau ana i ngā motokā taraiwa whaiaro i runga i ngā huarahi tūmatanui i tēnei rā. Ko te Lidar tētahi momo hihiani e āhei ai te motokā ki te "kite" i ngā mea e karapoti ana. I kī atu te perehitini o Velodyne Lidar, a Marta Hall ki te AO e kore e tohutohu i ana kiritaki kia whakatū i ngā whakamātautau i te oho o te matenga o Arāna nā te mea "kāore mātou i te whakapono nā Lidar te aituā". Engari, kei te tohu kē te kamupene ki te rorohiko papa-papa a Hekerangi hei whakapae, ka kī a Ms Hall. "Ka tino pai te kite a to mātau Lidar i te pouri, me te kite i te awatea, e whakaputa ana i ngā miriona mōhiohio. " Heoi anō, kei te toenga o te pūnaha te whakamārama me te whakamahi i ngā raraunga hei whakatau. Kāore mātou i te mōhio he pēhea te mahi a te pūnaha whakatau a Hekerangi." Whakapae pūmanawa i a ia e whakamahi ana i ngā pūmārō hunga-tuatoru, ka whakamahia e ngā motokā taraiwa whaiaro a Hekerangi ngā pūmanawa i hangaia i roto i te whare. Kua whakatārewatia e Hekerangi tana hōtaka taraiwa whaiaro - e tū ana i roto i ngā tāone e whā o Amerika - kia mōhio rā anō ki te mea i tūpono. I kī te rangatira nui o te umanga, a Dara Khosrowshahi mo taua mahi: "Kei te whakaaro mātou ki te whānau o te tūkino i a mātau e mahi tahi ana me ngā ture ā-rohe kia mārama ai ki te mea i tūpono." I kī a Velodyne kāore anō kia whakapā atu ki a Hekerangi mō taua mahi, engari kei te takatū ki te kōrero ki ngā kaihopu. I kī te Poari Haumaru Waka ā-Motu e mahi ana i tētahi pūrongo tuatahi kia whakaputaina i roto i ngā wiki tata nei - kāore e mahia he whakaotinga whānui ake mō ngā marama maha. I tāpiri mai a Ms Hall: "Kei te tino pouri, pouri, me te māharahara mō te wā heke mai o tētahi kaupapa e hiahiatia ana hei whakaora ora." _____ Whāia a Dave Lee i Twitter @DaveLeeBBC Kei a koe ētahi atu mōhiohio mō tēnei, tētahi atu pūrākau hangarau rānei? Ka taea e koe te toro hāngai, haumaru hoki mā te taupānga karere whakamuna Signal i: +1 (628) 400-7370

title: E kī ana a Louis Tomlinson i 'warewaretia' a ia i One Direction
summary: Louis Tomlinson says he was frustrated at being the "kid at the back" in the early months of One Direction.
text: "Kāore au i waiata takitahi i runga i te X Factor," tana whakamārama ki te pukapuka Observer. "Ina whakaaro tonu koe ki te āhua o tēnā, e tū ana i runga i te atamira i ia wiki, me te whakaaro: 'He aha taku tino mahi hei āwhina i konei?" I tae mai te Aronga Kotahi i te tuatoru i roto i te rangatū 2010 o X Factor. Ka taea e koe te mātakitaki i to rātau haerenga i te whakataetae i konei. I te wā o te pēne i runga i te whakaaturanga, e kī ana a Louis i tino mōhiotia a ia ko "te tamaiti e mau ana i ngā espadrilles, kāore i te hoki ki muri" me te waiata "he hākoritanga iti iho kāore e taea e koe te rongo i roto i te whāranu". Ināianei, he tino rerekē te haere takitahi ki a Louis. I whakaputaina e ia tana tīmatanga i tērā Hakihea e whakaatu ana i a Steve Aoki, i ngā rā noa iho i muri i te matenga o tōna whaea i te kano toto, e 43 tau te pakeke. I tae atu a Just Hold On ki te tau rua i roto i ngā tūtohi UK. "Kāore i taea e au te kī atu ki a koe ināianei ka taea e au te tiki i tētahi kaituhi kōroto i tētahi wātū ki a au," tana kī. "Ā, e mārama ana ahau ki tēnā." Ka tūtohu a ia: E tino hiahia ana ki a koutou katoa ki te rongo i te takitahi hou, engari e kī ana a Louis he rerekē mō ētahi atu mema o One Direction. E kī ana a Harry "e kore e uaua" ki te kimi hoa mahi. Tata ana ki te tuku i tana takitahi tuarua, e whakapono ana a Louis i tētahi wā i "warewaretia, ki tētahi waeine". One Direction are officially on a "hiatus", meaning they're all taking a temporary break working on solo projects. A, no te tuatahi ka whakaarahia tērā: "Ehara i te mea he kōrerorero pai," te whakaae a Louis. Kimihia mātou i Instagram i BBCNewsbeat me te whai i a mātou i Snapchat, rapua bbc_newsbeat

title: Ka tuihonotia e te 'keri' mamati te mātauranga whenua
summary: Kei te tuihonotia te mātauranga whenua puta noa i Pākehā i tēnei raumati hei miramira i ngā mahi "karaehe o te ao" e mahia ana puta noa i te whenua.
text: Na te nui o ngā mahi āpure i hikitia nā te coronavirus, he maha ngā tohunga kua huri ki te pāpāho pāpori ki te tiritiri i ā rātou mahi. Kua whakatūria he hashtag hei miramira i te mahi i #ScotlandDigsDigital. Dr Jeff Sanders, project manager at the Society of Antiquaries of Scotland's Dig It! project, said it was a new chapter in challenging times. "E mahi ana te katoa ki te urutau ki te āhuatanga o nāianei kia tuwhera tonu ai te mātauranga o Pākehā ki te katoa - he tikanga kei te ngākau o tēnei whakahau," tana kī. Ka kitea ngā taipitopito katoa o te mahi e mahia ana i te paetukutuku Dig It!. Kei roto ko ngā takahanga e tū mai nei pēnei i ngā kōrero i runga i te tāruarua "Atlantic Wall" tata ki Stirling, ngā toi toka i tētahi o ngā urupa 5,000 tau o Orkney, me ngā kaipuke o Kirkcudbright Bay i Dumfries me Galloway. I kī a Amy Eastwood, te upoko o ngā pūtea i Historic Environment Scotland, he "huarahi tino pai" te whakahere tuihono hei whakahauhau i ngā tāngata kia uru ki ngā taonga tuku iho o te iwi. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka whai te tangata i te hashtag me te kimi i ētahi atu mea mō ngā keri me ngā mahi nui e mahia ana e ngā kaimātai whenua puta noa i te whenua ki te hura i ngā pūrākau o Pākehā," tana kī. E tūmanako ana ka tīmata anō te mahi āpure a tērā tau, ā, ka taea anō e ngā kaupapa te pōhiri i ngā mema o te iwi whānui me ētahi atu haerenga koreutu, ngā rā tuwhera me ngā wāhi tūao.

title: E hiahiatia ana ngā kōrero 'taumata tiketike' mō te whakaurunga anō o te beaver
summary: Kua tonoa e ngā kaihīkoi he whakaaro anō mō te whakaurunga anō o ngā beavers ki te awa o tētahi takiwā.
text: I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, i whakaputaina tētahi tokorua e Dorset Wildlife Trust hei wāhanga o tētahi akoranga mō ō rātou pānga ki te kounga o te wai. Engari e rapu ana tētahi pāhonotanga hī ika i ngā kōrero "i te taumata tiketike" i waenganui i te mataku ka āraia e o rātau matatara te tae atu ki ngā taunga whakaputa. I kī te whakawhirinaki kararehe ka hangaia e nga beavers tētahi "wāhi noho rerekē ake". I kī a Rārangi Slocock o te Frome, Piddle me te West Dorset Fisheries Association: "Me whai taupatupatu tika, tērā pea ka maukatia i roto i tētahi rūma i tētahi wāhi, i te taumata tiketike, me te whiu i ngā tikanga whakahaere mō ngā beavers. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i tēnā i mua i te tukunga atu o ētahi atu beavers i raro i te raihana ki te mohoao. "He taupatupatu mō te pūtaiao i muri i ngā beavers - ngā painga me ngā kino." I whakaurua e Dorset Wildlife Trust tētahi beaver pakeke tāne me te wahine Eurasian ki tētahi wāhi rāhui i te uru o te takiwā i te 8 o Hui tanguru. I kī a Imogen Davenport o Dorset Wildlife Trust: "Kei te kimi katoa mātou i ētahi atu wāhi mō te āhua, he tino pouri kei roto mātou i tētahi āhuatanga e tino māharahara ana te tangata, kaua e kōrerorero ki a mātau me te rapu huarahi whakamua kua kōwhiria e rātau kia riri ki taua mea. " Ka waihangatia e ia tētahi wāhi noho rerekē ake - nā reira ka whai wāhi paruparu koe, ka tere ake te rere i a rātou ināianei - ā, ko te pānga katoa ko te pupuri i ētahi o taua pokenga kia teitei ake ai te awa kia kore ai e raruraru ki raro." I whaia ngā beavers ki te ngaro i UK i te rau tau 16. Ko te whakaurunga anō he wāhanga o tētahi akoranga pūtaiao a te Whare Wānanga o Exeter me Wessex Water hei aroturuki i tō rātou pānga ki te kounga o te wai, te waipuke me ētahi atu kararehe. Whāia a BBC South i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki south.newsonline@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Frome, Piddle & West Dorset Fisheries Association Dorset Wildlife Trust

title: E tono ana te MP kia kaha ake te parenga mahi mō ngā whaea me ngā wāhine hapū
summary: Me kaha ake te parenga a te kāwanatanga ki te whakahōutanga mō ngā wāhine hapū me ngā whaea hou, kua whakahaua e tētahi minita kāpata o mua.
text: I kī te MP Māori a Maria Miller kāore i tino tawhiti ngā tono a te kāwanatanga kia whakaroa atu i ngā parenga tīariari. Kua whakamōhiotia e ia tētahi pire e ārai ana i ngā whare kia kaua e peke i ngā wāhine i te wā e hapu ana, i te ono marama rānei i muri iho. Engari i kī tētahi rōpū whakahau ehara te raruraru i te ture engari ko te huarahi i whakaūngia ai. I raro i ngā ture o nāianei, ko ngā kaitukumahi e hiahia ana ki te whakawātea i tētahi wahine i runga i te waihotanga kohanga, me tuku ki a rātou he tūranga "tika" e wātea ana. Kua tonoa e te kāwanatanga te whakaroa i tēnei ture hei taupoki i te wā e ono marama i muri i to rātau hokinga ki te mahi, e kī ana ka āwhina ki te rutu i te whakahāweatanga. I raro i ngā mahere hōu i pānuitia i te Hānuere, ka taea te whakaroa atu i ngā parenga ki ētahi atu, tae atu ki ngā tāngata, e hoki mai ana i te whakatamarikitanga, i te wehenga mātua tiritiri rānei. Engari i kī a Ms Miller, e tūru ana i te Komiti Wāhine me ngā Ōritetanga, i "waihotia rawatia, i karohia rānei e ngā kaitukumahi". I tāpiritia e ia ko ngā wāhine i runga i te waihotanga kohanga e mahi ana "kāore e taea te whai wāhi i runga i ngā whakaritenga ōrite" me ētahi atu kaitono e tono ana mō ngā tūranga. Ko te waihotanga o te kohanga, i tāpiri mai a ia, "kāore he wā e haere ana ki tētahi uiuinga mahi". Ko ngā mahere whakawhitiwhiti i kī a ia e pōhiritia ana ngā mahere hei whakaroa i ngā parenga o nāianei, engari mā te ārai whānui ake i te mahi whakahōutanga ka "tango i te onus i nga wāhine". I tāpiritia e ia ka whakaata tēnei i te pūnaha i Tiamana, e kore ai e taea te whakakore i ngā wāhine hapū me te kore whakaaetanga a tētahi mana tūmatanui motuhake. I raro i tana pire, i whakaurua ki te Pāremata i te Tūrei, ka kī a ia ka pā tētahi ārai pēnei ki te kore e kati, ka mutu rānei te mahi a te whaea hou ki te mahi. I roto i tana tuhinga whakaritenga, ka kī te kāwanatanga kua rongo i ngā whakaaturanga "kei te whakahaua ngā whaea hou ki waho o te mahi ina rapu rātau ki te hoki mai". I tāpiritia mā te whakarite i ngā ture e pā ana i te wā, i muri hoki i te waihotanga o te kohanga, ka āwhina i ngā tāngata kia "mārama, kātahi ka rapu ki te whakamahi i ō rātou mana". I tana urupare ki te whakaritenga, ka kī te Komiti Wāhine me ngā Ōritetanga me whakaroa atu hoki ngā parenga tīariari mō te hunga e wehe ana i te whakatamarikitanga, i te wehenga mātua tiritiri rānei. Kua karangatia hoki e te komiti te tepe wā e toru marama mo te mau mai i tētahi kerēme i roto i ngā take whakahāweatanga o te kohanga kia whakaroa atu ki te ono marama. 'He iti noa iho te rerekētanga' i kitea e te rangahau a te Tari Pakihi i te tau 2016 kua panaia, kua whakakorea rānei ina hoki mai rātau ki te mahi i muri i te whai tamaiti, i tino kino rānei te mahi i a rātau mahi. Na te mātauranga hoki i huatau kia ngaro pea i nga wāhine e 54,000 a rātau mahi nā te hapu, te kohanga rānei i ia tau. Heoi anō, i kī te rōpū whakahau Hapū Kātahi ka Tīwiri te ture i whakahaua e Ms Miller ka "iti rawa te rerekētanga". "He iti iho i te 1% o ngā wāhine e pā ana ki te hapūtanga, ki te whakahāweatanga rānei i tētahi kerēme rūnanga", te kī a te rōpū i Twitter. "He iti rawa te wāhi e whakarei ake ana i te ture ina kore e taea e ngā wāhine te whakamahi i te ture hei pare i a rātau anō." I whakamōhiotia e Ms Miller te pire i raro i te ture tekau meneti, e āhei ai ngā MP o muri ki te tuku whakaaro mō ngā ture hou. He iti noa iho te wā e anga ana taua ture ki te noho hei ture me te kore tautoko a te kāwanatanga, ā, ka whakamahia hei tikanga ki te whakaara i tētahi take, ki te whakapuaki rānei i tētahi whakaaro mō ngā ture tīariari.

title: Tiaki: Kaua e ngaro i ngā pakeke ngā penapena - Te komihana o Uēra
summary: E kī ana te komihana pakeke o Wales kia kaua e ngaro i nga pakeke a rātau penapena hei utu mo to rātau tiakitanga.
text: I te kōrero a Ruth Marks i muri i tētahi pūrongo e kī ana me whakawhāiti ngā utu tiaki i Ingarangi kia kore ai te tangata e anga atu ki te ngaro i ngā wāhanga nui o a rātau rawa. I kī a ia kāore i tino pai te mahi a te hunga pakeke e te pūnaha utu tiaki o nāianei, ā, kāore i tino tiketike ngā paerewa. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he hōtaka whakahōu ratonga pāpori tāna. I tonoa e te kāwanatanga o UK ki a Andrew Dilnot kia titiro me pēhea e taea ai te huri i te pūnaha pūtea pūtea pāpori i Ingarangi nā te māharahara kua uaua ake ki te tangata te whiwhi tautoko kāwanatanga. I kī tana pūrongo me tuku ngā pakeke me ngā pakeke hauā ki te āwhina kāinga me ngā wāhi kāinga tiaki mēnā he rawa iti iho i te £100,000 - mai i te £23,250 o nāianei. E kī ana he tika te utu mo te roanga o te wā e £35,000. I Weera, e āhei ana te tangata ki te āwhina mēnā he pūtea kei raro iho i te £22,500. Over this they fund all of their care costs. I kī a Ms Marks: "He tino nui, he whārite tēnei pūrongo ki tētahi take tino pēhi. " Me tika, kia mārama hoki te pūtea tiaki pāpori, kia āhei ai te tangata ki te whakarite mō te oranga ā muri ake. "Older people tell me that they do not want to lose a lifetime of assets simply because they need care and support. E tika ana kia tautokona e te tikanga pūtea te hunga e tino hiahiatia ana, engari kāore e ngaro ngā tāngata kua tiakina." A maximum charge of £50 a week is being introduced for people in Wales receiving council home care services. Ka utua ngā Kaunihera tārewa waehere poutāpeta mō te ngaronga moni whiwhinga i raro i tētahi kaupapa Kāwanatanga Welsh £10.1m hei whakamutu i tētahi "tārewa waehere poutāpeta" i te nuinga i utua, i pānuitia i Poutāpeta. Engari he whakatūpato i taua wā ka nui ake te pēhanga pūtea o te nekehanga. I kī tētahi kōmihana takitahi i tērā tau me nui ake ngā ratonga whakawhaiaro o ngā kaiwhakamahi, me ngā ture tika paerewa e pā ana puta noa i Uēra mō wai e whiwhi ana. I whakaputaina i Whiringa ā Rangi i tērā Whiringa, ka whakatūpato te pūrongo Mai i te Kitenga ki te Hohenga mō ngā "rerekētanga whakaharahara" i ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana e te tangata i ngā wāhi rerekē o te whenua. I kitea kāore i tautokona te pūnaha whakarite, te whakatau, me te tuku ratonga puta noa i ngā mana ā-rohe e 22. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki a Whitehall me te kāwanatanga o UK ki te urupare ki te pūrongo a Dilnot. I kī a ia he hōtaka anō tā te Kāwanatanga o Welsh mō te whakahōu i ngā ratonga pāpori, ā, kua tohu te Minita Tuatahi o Carwyn Jones i tētahi whakaaro ki te kawe mai i tētahi pire ratonga pāpori. I kī te minita tuarua o ngā ratonga pāpori a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, a Gwenda Thomas: "He take tino hiranga tēnei mō ngā tāngata i Weera, tae atu ki ērā atu o te UK, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te kite i tētahi pūnaha tika, pūmau hoki i konei. " Koia tērā i mahi kē ai mātou i Uēra ki te whakahiko i te utu mō te tiaki pāpori - kua whakaurua e mātou he utu mōrahi ia wiki o te £50 mō te tiaki kāore i te noho, ā, e hari ana ahau ki te kite kei te rongo ngā tāngata puta noa i Uēra i ngā painga o taua huringa." I kī a ia i pai a ia ki te whai te Komihana Dilnot i tētahi "huarahi hāngai, hāngai hoki" i roto i ana tūtohutanga. "Ko ētahi āhuatanga o ngā tūtohutanga i mahia ka whai pānga pea ki Uēra, ā, ka hiahia ahau ki te kōrerorero i ēnei ki te Kāwanatanga o UK i te wā tata nei," te tāpiri mai a Ms Thomas.

title: Edinburgh parents urged to drop extra nursery year
summary: E tonoa ana ngā mātua kia waiho te ia o nāianei o te pupuri i ngā tamariki mō tētahi tau anō i roto i te kōhungahunga i mua i te tuku i a rātou ki te kura.
text: He tokomaha ake ngā mātua i Pākehā e whai ana i ngā whenua o Ūropi, e tīmata ana ngā tamariki ki te kura i te ono tau. Engari i kī te kaiwhakahaere mātauranga o te kaunihera o te taone o Etinitini i huatau te rangahau ka tūkino pea te mahi i ngā tamariki. Heoi anō, kua kī ētahi tohunga mātauranga ko te tau tāpiri i roto i te kōhungahunga ka nui ake te wā ki te pakeke i ngā tamariki. I te tuhituhi i roto i te Edinburgh Evening News, i kī te kaiwhakahaere mātauranga o Marilyne MacLaren i te "huatau" o nāianei, i kite i te pikinga o te tokomaha o ngā mātua e tono ana kia whakatārewatia te tomokanga o ta rātau tamaiti ki te kura tuatahi, i whakahaeretia e "ngā whakaaro tino pai". I whakaae a ia ki ētahi mātua e māharahara ana ka tamariki rawa ta rātau tamaiti ki te tīmata i te kura, ā, tērā pea ka tūkinotia tō rātou whanaketanga i te tauwhiro i tērā pakeketanga. Engari i tautohe a ia "i ēnei wā o te mātauranga ā-tamaiti, 'kia tika mō ia tamaiti' me te marautanga mō te tino pai, me wero ēnei whakaaro". I kī a Cllr MacLaren kua tae atu a ia ki tōna whakaaro i runga anō i te mahi a tētahi hinengaro hinengaro tamariki o te Kaunihera o Etinitini, nāna i tātari e 36 ngā pepa rangahau i tuhia mō te tāurunga takaware o te kura. I tuhituhi a Cllr MacLaren: "I te tīmatanga ka tere ake pea te haere o ngā tamariki mātāmua i roto i te tau kura, engari i te mutunga o te toru o te kura kua kore tēnei rerekētanga e kitea. " Ko ngā tamariki kua takaware tō rātou tāurunga ka tae ki te 16 tau o te kura i mua i te whakaotinga o ā rātou mātauranga katoa. "Studies find that these children tend to drop out of secondary education earlier and, in some cases, it means that they can finish school without completing their exams. " E mārama ana hoki i kitea e ētahi rangahau he nui ake te tere o ngā uauatanga pāpori me te whanonga i te taumata tuarua i waenganui i ngā tamariki i takawaretia tō rātou tāurunga kura." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua mōhio ahau kia kaua tātau e whakatārewa i te tomokanga o te tamaiti ki te tuatahi hei take, nā te mea rānei e hiahia ana ngā mātua. " Ko te take anake mō te pupuri i tētahi tamaiti mō tētahi tau anō i te kura tōmua, nā te mea ko ngā whakaaturanga katoa e tohu ana ki te mea he tino painga ki taua tamaiti, ā, he tohu mārama o te takaware whanaketanga." 'Mīharo' Heoi anō, kua puta kē mai te tirohanga a Cllr MacLaren i raro i te ahi. I kī a Ahorangi Henry Maitles, mai i te kura mātauranga o te Whare Wānanga o Te Uru o Pākehā, i "mīharo" a ia i tana rongonga i te kaupapa. I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Scotland: "I whakaaro ahau kei te haere tonu te taupatupatu - kei te tuku wawe rawa mātou i a mātau tamariki ki te kura i whakaritea ki ērā atu whenua katoa o Ūropi. " Te āhua nei ki a au kāore he painga ki te tuku i a mātau tamariki ki te kura i mua, ā, ko te tikanga kia titiro te taupatupatu ki te tuku i a rātou ā muri ake, kaua i mua." I kī a Prof Maitles i te nuinga o ngā whenua o Ūropi, ka tīmata ngā tamariki i te kura tuatahi i muri i te haerenga i tētahi marautanga kōhungahunga tākaro. 'Kāore he whakaaturanga' Ka haere tonu a ia: "I ētahi whenua - Scandinavia hei tauira, engari i Hinerangi, e kitea ana he pūnaha mātauranga tino pai i tēnei wā - ka tīmata rātau ki te kura i te whitu. " Kāore he whakaaturanga e mahi ana ēnei tamariki i te 'kino ake' i te āhua whānui ake o te whakatutukitanga i a tātau tamariki. "Ko te mea, ko ngā whakaaturanga katoa e tohu ana kei te pai ake te tipu o tā rātou pūnaha akoranga i a tātau i tēnei wā." I tāpiritia e Prof Maitles ko tōna "whakaaro wawe" mō te kaupapa he "mahi tapahi utu" tērā o te kaunihera, mā te whakahoki i te whakarato kōhungahunga. I kī te kaunihera ā muri ake he pono te huatau ko te utu he take mo te whakapōturi i te tau anō i roto i te whare kōhungahunga.

title: ScotRail i raro i te ahi i runga i ngā hinganga mahinga
summary: I muri i te mutunga wiki o te raruraru mō ngā pāhihi i te Teihana Matua o Glasgow, kua puta mai i hapa a ScotRail i te nuinga o ana ūnga mahinga hou.
text: I kitea e te tūkinotanga o ngā raina o runga i ngā pāhihi e paea ana i runga i ngā tereina mō ngā haora maha i te Hātarei i te whakakorenga o ngā ratonga, ā, i katia te teihana. Ināianei kua puta mai ngā ūnga mahinga hapa a ScotRail i te 22 mai i ngā wāhi e 34 i ngā marama tuatahi o te 2018. I kī te kamupene ka whakapai tonu i tōna taumata ratonga. Motuhake, kua tapaina e tētahi uiuinga kaitiaki takitahi ko Glasgow Queen Street - e whakahaeretia ana hoki e Abellio ScotRail - hei teihana tino pai o Ingarangi, ahakoa he pai te tūnga o Glasgow Central, ka tae ki te 10 o runga. Ka inea e Transport Scotland te mahinga a ScotRail mā ngā whika ia hauwhā e kiia nei ko te Service Quality Incentive Regime (Squire). E honoa ana ngā whika Squire ki ngā whiu pūtea mo te kore e tutuki i ngā tohutohu. I kī a ScotRail i mua kua hainatia e ia ki tāna i kīa ai ko te "kāwanatanga kounga ratonga tino uaua i te UK" ā, "ehara i te whaina", i te mea "ka whakahokia te moni ki ngā rerewhenua o Pākehā". I whakaūngia e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kua whakaemi te umanga i tētahi pūkete £1.6m i roto i ngā whiu pūtea i roto i ngā marama e toru kua hipa - tata ki te £400,000 neke atu i ngā marama e toru o mua. Ko ngā whika hōu rawa i whakaputaina i te 4 o Me i whakaatu i rahua a ScotRail ki te tuki i ngā ūnga matua i ngā wāhi maha, tae atu ki te parapara me te tāhaetanga, ngā tūru tereina, ngā paramanawa, ngā kai, ngā pūwāhi āwhina, ngā waea, ngā mīhini tīkiti, ngā whare taonga tereina me te teihana, te mā, ngā tūnga tīkiti me ngā pāka motokā. Ko tētahi o ngā tou nui rawa o te mahinga i puta mai i te CCTV teihana, i te 77.8% i poto i te tohu 95%. Tērā tētahi tautohetohe uniana haere tonu mo te tapahi i te maha o ngā kaimahi aroturuki C KKK me tētahi tuki i whakaritea i te 19 Me - te rā o te Whakamutunga o te Kapu o Pirihitini.. I whakairihia e Abellio ScotRail he hua o te £9.5m i te 2015 me te ngaronga o te £3.37m i te 2016. I kī a ScotRail kua kitea e 10 ngā wāhi manakē, ā, kua hangaia he mahere taipitopito hei whakatau i ngā take matua e ahu ana ki ngā rahunga o Squire. I kī te kamupene nā tēnei i whakapai ake ai ngā arotakenga tīkiti i runga i te tereina me ngā wā tūwhera o te tari tāpui. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Ehara ēnei i te whaina - he pūtea pūtea anō e whakahaere ana i ngā paerewa kia teitei ake, ā, ko ia pene i kohia mā te pūtea ka whakahokia ki te whakarei ake i te rerewhenua o Pākehā. " Kua hangaia e mātou ngā mahere taipitopito hei whakapai ake tonu i te taumata tiketike o te ratonga e tūmanakohia ana e ā mātou kiritaki." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Transport Scotland: "Ko te kāwanatanga o Squire, te tino uaua o tōna momo i te UK, he wāhanga tino nui o a mātau mahi ki te whakapai ake i te wheako pāhihi. He whakakino tēnei taumata whiu, engari ki te whakataurite ki te koata e ōrite ana i te 2016/17. "Kua kaha mātou ki te wero i a ScotRail mō ngā take e āwhina ana, ehara i te mahinga Squire anake, engari ko te kore tukunga o te tūmanako taketake o ngā teihana kaimahi me ngā tereina. " Ko te hua kua tukua e ScotRail kia rua ngā arotakenga, kotahi mō ngā kaimahi/tono, ā, ko tētahi ki te whakaputa i tētahi mahere whakaora hei arotahi ki ngā tikanga pai ake hei whakatika me te whakatika i ngā hē. "Ko ngā whiu katoa e puta ana ka haumi anō ki te māngai mā ngā whakapainga ki te Whatunga Rerewhenua o Pirihitini." I katia katoatia te taumata tiketike o te teihana o Glasgow Central i te 22:45 i te Hātarei i muri i te ngaronga o te hiko o ngā tereina e 10 e haere ana i runga i ngā ara taumata tiketike i te 21:15.. Ko ngā pāhihi i paea i runga i ngā ratonga pāngia i āwhinatia e ngā kaimahi, me ngā kiritaki katoa i waho o ngā tereina i te 12:45 i te Rātapu. Ka haere tonu te raruraru ki te ahiahi o te Rātapu. I whakatuwheratia anō ngā raina tereina i te 13:00 engari i kī a ScotRail i ētahi ara e hau wawe ana kia taea ai ngā whakatika tino nui. I kī atu a Robert Hamahona, te kaikorero mō Transport Focus, ki te hōtaka Good Morning Scotland o TE Aotearoa: "He raruraru nui tērā. He pai kia hoki mai nga ratonga ki te pūnoa i tēnei rā. "Engari me arotake te āhua o te whakahaere i ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ki ngā pāhihi i te mutunga wiki. " Ka heke iho ngā rārangi o runga, engari i mau ngā pāhihi i runga i te tereina mo te rua ki te toru haora. I katia te teihana o Glasgow Central inapō mō tētahi wā. "I taua wā o te pō he uaua ki te tiki pahi whakakapi mō te maha o ngā ratonga i whakakorea. " Ki taku whakaaro me arotake kia kite i te āhua o te whakahaere, engari e whakapono ana ahau i mahi rātau i te pai rawa i raro i ngā āhuatanga uaua, engari he tokomaha ngā tāngata i whakararurarutia." I te wā i tapaina ai a Glasgow Queen Street ko te teihana rerewhenua tino pai rawa o Ingarangi i roto i tētahi uiuinga o ngā pāhihi. I tangohia e te kaitiaki takitahi Transport Focus ngā tirohanga o ngā tāngata neke atu i te 28,000 i ngā pou e 56 mō tōna tūranga. Ko te 58% anake o nga kaihaereere i "makona" ki Queen Street, te teihana tuatoru o Scotland. Engari i hangaia e Glasgow Central te 10 o runga me te whakatauranga whakaaetanga 91%.

title: Kaunuku aunui ā-taiwhenua mō Gloucestershire me Herefordshire
summary: Ko te wā heke mai o te aunui i ngā wāhi tawhiti o Gloucestershire me Herefordshire he hipanga tata atu ki te whakamōhiotia.
text: Kua whakaae ngā kaunihera o te rohe ki te uru ki ngā whakaritenga whakamutunga me tētahi kaiwhakarato kāore i whakaingoatia e hiahia ana ki te tuku ipurangi tere rawa ki ngā rohe. Ko te kaupapa Aunui Taitapa £35.4m tētahi o ngā kaihautū ā-motu e whā hei whakatau i te raruraru o te whānuitanga aunui rawakore. Ina hangaia, ka whakamahia te whatunga e ngā kaituku ratonga ipurangi hei hoko i ngā mōkī whānui ki ngā kiritaki. Ināianei ka whakatata atu te kaiwhakarato marohi e ngā kaunihera e rua i te wāhanga whakamutunga o te tukanga tīpakonga. Ka tukuna tētahi kirimana kotahi hei wāhanga o te kaupapa Aunui Taitapa e ārahina ana e ngā kaunihera e rua, o Gloucestershire First me te wae Broadband Delivery UK a te kāwanatanga.

title: Me tīmata te wā whare herehere o Parīhi, ko ngā ture a te Kōti Matua
summary: Ka hereheretia te tino Perehitini o Parīhi o Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva i a ia e tono ana ki tētahi whakapae kōkuhu, kua whakataua e te Kōti Matua.
text: E anga ana a ia ki te 12 tau i roto i te whare herehere mo te whakaae ki te utu whakapati, engari i tono kia noho wātea tonu i te wā o tana tono. E kī ana a Lula he whakahauhau tōrangapū nga whakapae, ā, i hoahoatia hei ārai i a ia kia kore ai ia e oma mo te perehitini i Whiringahora. Kai a ia te ārahi i roto i nga panekōrero whakaaro. I kī tana Rōpū Kaimahi he "rā kino te whakahaere mo te kāwanatanga ā iwi me Parīhi". I whakataua e nga kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Matua ki a ia e ono ki te rima i muri i te wātū omaoma, i mutu i nga haora tōmua o te Tāite. I mātakitaki a Lula i te whakahaere i te Uniana o te Kaimahi Konganuku, i reira i tū ai ōna kaitautoko i tētahi konohete hauora. Tērā pea ka noho wātea tonu te perehitini o mua, e 72 tau, kia oti rā anō ngā pepa mo tana hopunga. I mahi a Lula hei perehitini i waenganui i te 2003 me te 2011. Ahakoa tōna ārahi i roto i te panekōrero, ka noho tonu a ia hei whika whakawhanaunga. Tae atu ki te 20,000 ngā tāngata i whakahē i São Paulo i te Tūtira e karanga ana ki tōna hereheretanga wawe, i te wā i huihui hoki ngā kaitautoko i roto i tētahi whakaaturanga tauwhāinga. Te mamae me te hākinakina - Katy Watson, BBC News, São Paulo I te wā e whakamahia ana ngā Pārihia ki ngā takaware auau me ngā whakataunga hīkoi i roto i o rātau kōti, he tino roa tēnei whakawānanga 10 haora i roto i tēnei āhuatanga tino whakahiko. Kua wehewehea e nga pakanga ture a Lula nga Pārihia, ā, kāore tēnei whakataunga i rerekē. I whakarewaina e ana kaiwhakawāwā he mumura hei hākari. Ka hoki riri nga kaitautoko o Te Rūnanga ki te kāinga mo ta rātau kōrero he whakahāwea ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi me te kukitanga. Ahakoa e kite ana nga kaiwhakawāwā o Te Rūnanga he wikitōria tēnei. He pāremata a ia kua kitea he hāmate i te taumata tiketike, e kī ana rātau, ā, e tika ana kia noho i muri i ngā tūru - i roto i ngā rā ka tino pono, e kuru ana i ōna tūmanako kia hoki ki te mana. He tino hinga tēnei i te aroha noa mō tētahi tangata i mua ko tētahi o ngā kaitōrangapū tino aroha o te ao. He rā hītori hoki tērā mo nga tōrangapū o Pārihia. He aha te whakahaere? Tae noa mai ki nā tata nei, i whakaaetia ngā whakapae i Paratira kia noho wātea kia pau rā anō ta rātau tono whakamutunga. Heoi anō, e whakaaro ana te Kōti Matua ki tētahi whakahaere 2016 mai i tētahi kōti o raro, e taea ai te tuku i ngā whakapae ki te whare herehere i muri i te tono tuatahi i rahua. I ngaro i a Lula tana tono tuatahi i te Hānuere, i te wā kāore i tautokona e te kōti pīra tōna whakapae, engari i whakanuia te whiu mai i te iwa me te hāwhe tau ki te 12. I puta mai nga whakapae i tētahi tūhuratanga ārai hāmate e mōhiotia ana ko Operation Car Wash, nāna i whakapā ki ngā kaipōrangapū matua o ngā rōpū maha. Ko wai a Lula? He kaimahi konganuku o mua, he kaiwhaiwhai uniana, ko ia te kaiārahi parirau mauī tuatahi i tae atu ki te perehitini i Paratira i te tata o te hawhe rau tau. I te wā o tana perehitini, i pā ki a Paratira tōna wā roa rawa o te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te toru tekau tau, e āhei ai tana whakahaere ki te whakapau moni nui ki ngā hōtaka pāpori. Tekau miriona i whakarewaina i te rawakore nā ngā mahi i mahia e tōna kāwanatanga, ā, ka mahue i a ia te tari i muri i ngā whakaritenga e rua whai muri (te mōrahi e whakaaetia ana i Parīhi) me ngā whakatauranga manakohanga pūkete. He aha te Operation Car Wash? I te tau 2014, i muri i te wehenga atu o Te Tari o Te Kāwanatanga, ka tīmata nga rōia ki te uiui i ngā whakaaro kua whakaae ngā kaiwhakahaere o te kamupene hinu o te kāwanatanga o Petrobras ki ngā utu whakapati hei whakawhiwhi kirimana ki ngā kamupene hanga.
