I huraina e te tūhuratanga, e kīa nei ko Operation Car Wash, tētahi tukutuku nui o te hāmate e pā ana ki ngā pūkenga taumata matua mai i ngā tūāwhiotanga whānui o ngā rōpū e mau ana i ngā whanaketanga. I whakawāteatia a Lula i te whiwhinga i tētahi whare moana kua whakahoutia, e 3,7 miriona reais ($1.1m, £790,000), hei utu whakapati a te umanga pūkaha OAS. E kī ana te wawao kāore anō kia kitea te rangatiratanga o te whare noho, ā, ko tōna whakapae e takoto ana i runga i te kupu a te manukura o mua o OAS, i whakawāteatia e ia te hāmate. He aha te kōrero a Lula? Kua whakaahuatia e Te Rūnanga te pakanga ki tōna whakapae me tōna wā whare herehere hei roanga atu o tana whawhai ki te ture hōia o Parīhi, i mutu i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. "Kaore ahau i whakaae ki te mana whakahaere hōia, ā, e kore ahau e whakaae ki tēnei mana tāketanga a nga rōia," tana kī atu ki tētahi huihuinga kaitautoko i te Mane. Ka aha ā muri ake? Ko te kaiwhakawā e whakahaere ana i te Mahi Horoi Motokā, ko Sérgio Moro, e tūmanakohia ana kia tukuna he whakamana mo te hopunga o Te Rūnanga i roto i ngā rā. Engari ehara tēnei i te tikanga ka haere a Lula ki te whare herehere mo te 12 tau. Kāore anō a ia kia pau ana tono. E rua ngā kōti tiketike ka taea tonutia e ia te huri atu, te Kōti Matua me te Kōti Matua - kua whakatauria e te Kōti Matua mēnā me haere ia ki te whare herehere e tārewa ana i ētahi atu tono, kaua i runga i te kēhi taketake. Kaore tētahi o aua kōti e tirotiro anō mehemea i hara a Rū ki te hāmate. Ka tirohia e rātau mēnā i tika te whai i ngā tikanga ā-ture, ā, mēnā i takahia ōna mana ā-ture. Ka pau pea ngā marama, ngā tau rānei o tēnei tukanga. Mehemea ka whakahaere tētahi kōti i runga i te manakohanga o Lula, ka taea te whakakore i tōna whakapae, ā, ka tukua ia. Me pēhea te pōti? I raro i tētahi ture Pārihia 2010 e kiia nei ko te "ture mā", kāore e taea e tētahi tangata e herea ana ki tētahi hara e tautokona ana i runga i te pīra te whakahaere mō te tari pōti mō te waru tau neke atu rānei. Ma taua ture e whakahaere a Lula i te oma mo te perehitini i Whiringahora. Heoi anō, kua whakaritea he okotahi ki te ture i mua. Ko te whakataunga mēnā ka taea e Te Kōti Pōti Matua (TSE) te whakatau mēnā ka taea e Te Kōti Pōti Matua (TSE) te whakatau. E kore te TSE e whakatau mēnā ka taea e Te Rūnanga te whakahaere, kāore rānei kia rēhitatia rā anō ia hei kaitono, ā, tae noa ki te 15 o Aotearoa hei mahi pēnā. Nā reira kāore pea tātau e mōhio mō ngā marama e haere ake nei mehemea ka taea e ia te tū.

title: Elections 2021: Conservatives take Cornwall Council
summary: Kua toa nga Conservatives i te Kaunihera o Cornwall, te rōpū tuatahi hei whakahaere katoa i te mana kotahi.
text: I toa te rōpū i te 47 o ngā tūru e 87, me ngā Independents i te 15 me ngā Liberal Democrats me ngā tūru e 14. E rima nga tūru o te rōpū ā-Cornwall, o Mebyon Kernow, ā, e whā nga tūru o Te Rōpū Mahi me te Rōpū Mahi me nga Greens. Kāore he rōpū i whai mana whānui o te mana ā rohe mai i te wā i waihangatia ai i te tau 2009. Cornwall Council results Conservative group leader Linda Taylor said the result was "absolutely amazing". I kī a ia ko te manakē tuatahi ko te tiaki pāpori pakeke whai muri i te whare. "We want to listen to our community and deliver for our community and most importantly from a fiscal point of view, deliver value for money," she said. E hiahiatia ana tētahi pūtirotiro hōu me te JavaScript me tētahi tūhononga ipurangi pūmau hei tiro i tēnei tauwhitinga. Ētahi atu mōhiohio mō ēnei pōti Ko wai i toa i tōku rohe? Tāurua tō waehere poutāpeta, te ingoa rānei o tō kaunihera Ingarihi, o Pākehā, o Welsh rānei kia mōhiotia. Hei tauira 'W1A 1AA', 'Westminster' Fellow Conservative Connor Donnithorne, nāna i whiu te kaikaunihera Takitahi o Mark Kaczmarek kia toa i Redruth Central, Carharrack & St Day, i kī: "E whakaaro ana ahau ka tukuna he karere tino mārama e hiahia ana mātou ki te tiki i tētahi whakatupuranga hou o ngā kaikaunihera o Cornwall ki te rutu i te whakapau moumou." I tū ngā kaute i te pokapū whakangahau o Carn Brea, ā, ko te wā tuatahi, i te Whare Karakia o Truro. I tukuna e te kaikaunihera takitahi me te kaiārahi kaunihera o mua, a Julian German ana "mihi" ki nga Conservatives. "Kei te tino tūmanako tonu ahau ki te tū ake mō Cornwall me te whakarite kia tukua aua kī taurangi (Conservative)," tana kī. This year the council was contested under new ward boundaries with the number of seats on the council falling from 123 to 87. Tātaritanga: Martyn Oates, BBC South West Political Correspondent Sometimes the South West goes its own way in local elections regardless of the national picture. I tēnei rā, ahakoa kua tino kite mātou i te Uru ki te Tonga e taka ana ki ngā mea e puta ana i tētahi atu wāhi o te whenua, ko te tikanga he rongo tino pai mō ngā Tohutohu. Te āhua nei kua whakaritea anō e te whakaititanga o ngā tūru i runga i te Kaunihera o Cornwall te nui o ngā rārangi hē tōrangapū e manakohia ana e ngā Conservatives, engari he rongo kino mō ngā Independents me ngā Pāremata Liberal, e rua ngā rōpū kua nui ake i konei. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ngā Hua o te Rūnanga o Cornwall

title: Coronation Street to go live for 50th anniversary
summary: Me pāoho a Coronation Street i tētahi wāhanga ora hei wāhanga o ōna hākari huritau 50, kua whakaūngia e ngā rangatira hopi.
text: Ka whakamātauria e te rangatū ITV1, e tohu ana i tōna hāwhe rau tau i Tīma, te wāhanga motuhake ā muri ake i tēnei tau. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mo te hopi: "He tino hiahia te katoa, mēnā kāore e kōrero āmaimai." I mua rā ka whakaaturia e te hopi tētahi wāhanga ora mō tōna huritau 40, e whakaatu ana hoki i te Piriniha o Weera. I kī te kaikōrero i whakaaro rātau he huarahi tika te whakaaturanga ora ki te "whakanui i tētahi huritau tūturu." I whakaaturia e te kaiwhakanao o Phil Collinson i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka patua ngā pūāhua matua i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga tereina e tūpono ana i Weatherfield i Tīma. Kāore i te mārama mēnā ka pā mai te aituā i te wā o te hōtaka ora. I tērā marama, he whakaaturanga whare tapere e kiia nei ko Corrie! i whakatuwheratia i The Lowry i Salford hei wāhanga o ngā hākari huritau 50 o te hopi. I te wā o Hui tanguru, i pāohotia hoki e EastEnders tētahi wāhanga ora hei tohu i tōna huritau 25. Neke atu i te 16 miriona ngā tāngata i āta mātakitaki.

title: Leighton Andrews: Te Whare Wānanga o Wales 'tuku i a Wales ki raro'
summary: Education Minister Leighton Andrews says the University of Wales has let down higher education in Wales and brought the nation "into disrepute".
text: Nā Ciaran JenkinsBBC Wales kōrero mātauranga i puta mai i muri i te pūrongo a te kaitiaki ki te whare wānanga kia arotake i ōna hononga kāreti puta noa i te ao. I kitea e TE AO Uēra ko ngā hononga ko tētahi ki tētahi whetū pahū o Te Whenua me ngā waeine tinihanga me tētahi kāreti i te kāreti o Bangkok e kī ana e mahi mana kore ana. E kī ana te whare wānanga kei te whakawhanake i tētahi rautaki hou o te ao whānui. I kī a Prof Roger Brown, tētahi tohunga mātauranga tiketike, ko te pūrongo "tino whakararuraru" tērā i kitea e ia. I whakaroatia e te Quality Assurance Agency (QAA) tana tānga o te arotakenga ā-iwi o te whare wānanga - he taki hauora e ono tau - i a ia e whakahaere ana i ana tūhuratanga. I oti te arotakenga ā-iwi i mua i te pāohotanga o ngā whakakitenga a TE WĀNANGA, ā, ka tae ki ngā whakawā o te 'maia' i te whare wānanga, ahakoa i kitea ngā ngoikoretanga i roto i ōna tukanga whakamanatanga o waho. Ināianei me tā e te whare wānanga he mahere hohenga hei whakatau i ngā take. E whai ana te tūhuratanga a te QAA i te rūpahu o TE WĀNANGA ki ngā kōtiro i Mareia me Thailand e tuku ana i ngā akoranga e ahu ana ki ngā tohu o te whare wānanga. I tērā Whiringa o Whiringa ā-Rangi, i kitea he kāreti o Te Wiki I kitea e te pūrongo a te QAA kāore te whare wānanga i whakahaere i ngā taki tika i a ia e tatū ana i ngā mahi ngātahi me ngā kōtiro e pātai ana - he tukanga e mōhiotia ana ko te whakamanatanga. E kī ana te whare wānanga "i hapa i te wā kia tūpato" mō Tēnā Yaakob, nāna i kī he tākuta tākuta i roto i te whakahaere pakihi. 'Ngā āwangawanga haere tonu' I whakawāteatia tōna whakaaetanga ki tētahi kāreti ahua i Thailand "kāore i te tika" me te "hē". I kitea e te tūhuratanga QAA kāore he maharatanga o te kaimahi o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga ki te tirotiro i te kāreti i reira. I whakaarohia hoki e te pūrongo ngā hononga o te whare wānanga ki tētahi kāreti pakihi i Hōroa, i ngaro ai ngā huinga rangatira e rua, ka mahue ngā ākonga i roto i te taumaha. I kī atu a Tēnā Anaru ki a TE Wānanga o Weera: "Kua kawea mai e te whare wānanga te tohu o Weera, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau kua tukua e ia te mātauranga tiketike i Weera, ā, kua tukua a Weera. E kore e whakaaetia. "Tērā tonu ngā māharahara mō ngā mahi ao whānui o te Whare Wānanga o Wales, e hoki ana ki muri i ngā tau maha. " E hiahia ana ahau ki te kite i te mahi a te tūru o te kaunihera i te whare wānanga nā te mea kua pā mai ēnei mea katoa i tana mātakitaki. "He aha tana mahi mō taua mea, ā, he aha tāna e mahi ai ā muri ake nei kia tika ai tana tirotiro i te whakahaeretanga o te Whare Wānanga o Weera." Ko te tapeke, e 130 ngā hoa mahi a te whare wānanga i ngā whenua e 30 o rāwāhi, e 20,000 ngā tāngata e ako ana mō ōna waeine puta noa i ngā whenua e whā. Ko te hua o te tūhuratanga QAA te moto hou rawa mō te whare wānanga, i muri i te tānga o tētahi pūrongo i ia Poutāpeta e kī ana me whakaheke, kia katia mēnā ka rahua ētahi atu mahere mō tōna wā heke. I kī te arotakenga, i whakaritea e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, kua whakawhirinaki rawa ki te moni whiwhinga mai i te whakamana i ngā akoranga i ngā kura o rāwāhi. Ko te Whare Wānanga o Wales te tinana whakawhiwhi tohu mō ngā whare wānanga e rima - UWIC, Trinity Saint David, Glyndwr University, Swansea Metropolitan me Newport. Heoi anō, e ai ki te QAA, ko ngā ākonga i ēnei whare wānanga "kāore i te mōhio ki te whare wānanga (o Weera) me te whakapono kei te whiwhi rātou i ō rātou tohu mai i te whare wānanga i haere ai rātou." I ngā tau tata nei, kua mahue katoa atu a Kānata, Swansea, Bangor me Aberystwyth i te whare wānanga. I kī a Prof Brown he "tino nui rawa ngā take hei whakautu". "It's a serious challenge and one the university has to address with the utmost seriousness if the university is to retain its reputation in this field. " Kāore anō ahau kia rongo i tētahi take i tonoa ai e te QAA ki tētahi whare wānanga kia arotake i ōna mahi ngātahi katoa i roto i taua tau, kāore anō kia mōhiotia. "E kī ana ahau ko tēnei tētahi o ngā pūrongo tino nui i hangaia i runga i tētahi whare wānanga i roto i ngā tau tata nei." 'Ngā hē nui' i kī a Prof Philip Gummett, te rangatira nui o te Kaunihera Pūtea Mātauranga Tiketike mō Uēra (HEFCW), i kitea e te pūrongo "he nui rawa ngā hēnga nui" i roto i te whanonga o te whare wānanga. "Me whai urupare kōhukihuki, tika hoki," tana kī. "Ka whakaarohia hoki e mātou ēnei whanaketanga i roto i tā mātou whakaaro ki ngā kōrero whakakotahitanga o nāianei e pā ana ki te Whare Wānanga o Weera." I kī te Whare Wānanga o Uēra i pōhiritia te kitenga o te pūrongo arotake ā-rōpū ka taea te whakanoho i te maia ki te tika o tana whakahaere i ngā paerewa mātauranga o ōna tohu me te kounga o ngā wāhi ako e wātea ana. I kī tētahi kōrero e mahi ana i "ngā tikanga tauwhiro me te whakarerekē". "Kia haere tonu ai te tiaki i ngā paerewa me te wheako ākonga, ka hangaia e te Whare Wānanga o Weera, i roto i te mahi ngātahi me ōna whare wānanga whakakotahitanga, tētahi rautaki aowhānui hōu e mau ana i roto i Weera," tana kī. I roto i ngā marama e ono kua hipa kua whakapuakina ngā āwangawanga mō ngā mahi whakamanatanga o te Whare Wānanga o Weera. Kua arotakea e ngā āpiha o te whare wānanga te ngohe whakamanatanga, ā, kua tae mai ki te tirohanga kua kore te tauira o nāianei e tika mō te whāinga, nā reira kua whakaritea kētia he takawaenga ki ngā whanaketanga whakamanatanga katoa.

title: E mōrearea ana te rawakore penihana a nga taitamariki, e kī ana a Fawcett Society
summary: Ko ngā wāhine pakeke i roto i te 20 me te 30 tau e mōrearea ana i te rawakore i te whakatānga mā te tapahi i ngā koha i a rātau e utu ana i te tiaki tamariki, e kī ana tētahi kura whakaaro.
text: I kī te Rōpū Fawcett, e whakahau ana kia ōrite, he tokomaha nga taitama e whakawhirinaki ana ki to rātau hoa mo te haumarutanga pūtea i te whakatānga. E kī ana he tokomaha nga wāhine i tēnei rōpū pakeke e mau ana i te utu katoa o te tiaki tamariki. I kī te kāwanatanga e tāruatia ana te tiaki tamariki koreutu. 'Āputa penihana' I kī te Rōpū Fawcett ko te nama ākonga, ngā utu tiaki tamariki, me te wehenga i te mahi e ārai ana i ngā wāhine kia kore ai e penapena mō te oranga ā muri ake. I kī a Sam Smethers, te rangatira nui: "Ka noho te āputa utu ira tangata hei āputa hekenga i te whakatānga. Ko te tikanga, kai te nui te pānga o nga wāhine ki o rātau hekenga ina whai tamariki rātau, engari kaore i te mōhio ki te pānga o tēnei ki a rātau i te wā roa. "Women are putting everyone's needs before their own, especially when it comes to who pay for childcare. Ka noho ta rāua pēpi hei pire tiaki tamariki māna." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Mahi me te Penihana: "E hiahia ana mātou kia haumaru te whakatānga ā-pūtea o ngā wāhine katoa, koia i whakamōhiotia ai e mātou ngā whakahōu whānui kia māmā ake, kia mārama ake ai te penapena penihana, tae atu ki te whakaurunga o te penihana hōu me te whakaurunga aunoa. " We are also committed to supporting mothers by making childcare more affordable and more accessible, and we are doubling free childcare for almost 400,000 working parents of three and four-year-olds from 15 to 30 hours." Nō nā tata nei i whakatūpato te Whare Wānanga Kaupapahere Penihana ka waiho e te penihana kāwanatanga hou, i whakaurua i tēnei marama, neke atu i te 11 miriona ngā kaimahi ināianei kua pakeke kē atu i te 20 me te 30 tau i raro i te pūnaha o mua. I te tau 2010, i whakaaturia mai e tētahi tūhuratanga o te Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero i te tau 2010 he pēhea te takanga o te hekenga i te rārangi manakē mō te tokomaha o nga taitama.

title: Ka whakatūpato a Ryanair ki ngā hua i te wā e pā ana ki te moni whiwhinga
summary: Kua whakatūpato a Ryanair ki ngā kaihoko ka iti iho ōna hua tau katoa i te mea e tūmanakohia ana, nā te ngaru o te mahi mahi o nā noa nei.
text: I kii te kamupene rererangi ka 12% te iti iho o ana hua i te € 1.25-1.35bn (£ 1.11-1.2bn) i matapaetia i mua, a inaianei e tatari ana kia whai hua i waenga i te € 1.1-1.2bn. I kī a Ryanair nā te nui ake o ngā utu hinu, he nui ake ngā utu e pā ana ki ngā ture utu rererangi EU, me ngā utu ngoikore nā ngā tuki o nā noa nei. I whakatūpato tērā pea ka whakahekea anō ngā tohutohu. I whakatuwheratia ngā hea o te waka rererangi ki raro i te 8%. I tērā wiki, i mahia e ngā kaimahi rūma me ngā kaihautū i Tiamana, Hōrana, Peretiama, Paniora me Potukara he mahi mahi, ā, he maha ngā whakakorenga rererangi. Ko te pire hinu nui ake i kī a Ryanair he iti iho ngā utu mo te hauwhā tuatoru o te tau i te mea he iti iho ngā tāpuitanga whakamua, otirā mō te kura o Whiringahora me te Kirihimete, e pāngia ana e te wehi ki ētahi atu tuki. I kī te kaikawe kāore anō kia āraia tana pire hinu ki te pikinga o ngā utu, ā, ko te tikanga o tēnei ka utua e ia te 10% anō mō tana hinu nā te pikinga o te utu o te ao whānui. I kī te rangatira nui o Ryanair, a Michael O'Leary: "Ahakoa i tutuki pai ta mātau whakahaere i ngā tuki e rima e te 25% o ā mātou kaihautū Airani i tēnei raumati, e rua ngā tuki o mua tata nei e ngā kaimahi rūma me ngā kaihautū puta noa i ngā whenua EU e rima kua pā ki ngā tau pāhihi (mā ngā whakakorenga rererangi). " Kua pāngia te maia kiritaki, ngā tāpuitanga whakamua me ngā utu [hauwhā tuatoru], i te nuinga o ngā wā waenganui o te kura o Whiringahora me te Kirihimete, i aua whenua e rima i tāruatia ai ngā tuki koretake." Kei te tapahi te waka rererangi ki ētahi ararere me te kati i ētahi o ōna turanga. Ka kati tōna pūtake rererangi whā o Eindhoven i Hōrana, ahakoa ko te nuinga o ngā ara ki Eindhoven ka haere tonu i runga i ngā rererangi o rāwāhi. Kei te mahi ōrite i tōna pūtake rererangi e rua i Tiamana, ā, kei te tapahi i tōna pūtake o Niederrhein. E kī ana a Ryanair kua whakapā atu ki ngā kiritaki pāngia katoa mā te īmēra, mā te karere kuputuhi rānei, ā, ka whakanohoia anō ki ētahi atu rerenga, ka whakahokia rānei ki tā rātou e hiahia ana. Ngā tautohetohe I muri i ngā tau maha o te waiho i ngā whakamātau a ngā kaimahi kia mōhio ki ngā uniana, kātahi anō ka whakaae a Ryanair i te mutunga o te tau 2017. Engari kua whai take tonu ngā kaimahi i ngā whenua maha ki ngā mahi mahi a te kamupene, engari ko tana whakamahi i ngā kirimana i runga anō i te ture mahi a Kīriria me tōna kaha ki te utu i ngā kaimahi mā ngā pūkete pēke o Kīriria. I roto i tētahi papamuri whanaungatanga mahi matatini, e pā ana ki ngā tautohetohe rerekē i ngā whenua rerekē me ngā kaimahi rūma me ngā kaihautū me ā rātou ake amuamu, e kī ana a Ryanair e tuku ana i ngā kaimahi i ngā mea i tonoa e rātou. Engari kāore ngā kaimahi i ētahi wāhanga o ngā mahi taitapa a te kamupene e whakaae ana, nā te mea kei te noho tonu te mahi tuki anō. I kī a Ryanair i roto i tana kōrero "kāore e taea te whakahaere i ētahi atu raruraru i [te koata tuatoru], tērā pea ka hiahiatia he tohutohu tau katoa kia whakahekea anōtia, ā, ka hiahiatia pea he kuti anō i te kaha o te hōtoke ngaro". 'Tūkinotanga mo te wā roa' i kī a David Madden, tētahi kaitirotiro i CMC Markets, he mārama tonu te pānga kino o te tūnga whakatuki a Ryanair ki tana umanga: "I Aotearoa 2017 ka pā te utu tiri a te kamupene ki te whakapai ake i te ratonga kiritaki i mua i tērā, ā, i mārama tonu te utu." I whakamāramatia e ia, mai i taua wā, kua ngaro ngā hea i te 38% "He pai ki ngā kiritaki ngā utu rererangi māmā, engari he nui ake te uara o te rererangi, ā, kei te mōrearea te kamupene ki te mahi tūkino mo te wā roa ki te parani. Kei te whai tonu te kamupene rererangi kia nui ake i te € 1bn te hua, nā reira ehara i te mea kāore e taea e rātou te utu pai i ā rātou kaimahi."

title: Ko te kōhuru a David Brickwood Northampton: E kōrero ana te tama mo te 'miriona roimata'
summary: I kī te tama a tētahi tangata i patua i roto i tētahi whakaekenga "taikaha, whakamataku" kua "tangi ia i te miriona roimata".
text: I mate a Rawiri Brickwood, e 74, i te hōhipera i muri i te tūkinotanga i Te Ara o Te Aotearoa, i Abington, i te 02:00 BST i te 26 o Mahuru. Tokorua nga tāngata i hopukina e pā ana ki te kōhuru, engari i tukua me te kore utu. I whakaahuatia e Dale Brickwood tōna pāpā ko "te tangata tino pono, pukumahi, atawhai kua mōhiotia e au". I te Rāitema ka tahuna e te whānau me ngā hoa he rama i waho o te whare, i te inoi a tōna whānau kia haere mai te kaipatu. He tini putiputi i mahue i waho o te kāinga o Tāne Brickwood i ngā haora i muri i te whakaaturanga a pirihimana kua patua ia, ā, ka utua tonutia ngā takoha i runga i te pāpāho pāpori ki te tangata e mōhiotia ana ko "Monty". "Ko te ingoa tērā o tōna pāpā, nā reira i karangatia e te whakatupuranga pakeke taku pāpā ko 'Young Monty'," te kī a Tēnā Brickwood. "Ka āwhina a ia i te tangata." I kī a ia ko ia me ōna tuakana e "kore rawa e whakawhiti" i te kōhurutanga o to rātau pāpā. "I mate tahi ahau me ia, i te pō i tino tangohia ai ia i a mātau. E hiahia ana ahau kia noho ahau ki reira ki te tiaki i a ia i te paru kino," te kī a Tēnā Brickwood. I whakaritea e ia me ōna tuakana he whakatūpato i waho o te kāinga o Tāne Brickwood i te pō o te Rāite, e whakamārama ana i ngā rama me te tuku i ētahi ki te rangi. Ka whakaritea he whakatūpato anō ā muri ake nei i te Paraire. "Kua tangi ahau i te miriona roimata," te kī a Tēnā Brickwood. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te tika, me te whakatakoto i taku pāpā rawakore ki te okioki." I kī ngā Pirihimana o Northamptonshire e whai ana rātau i te maha o ngā kaiārahi, engari kāore anō kia whakataua tētahi tangata ki te kōhuru o te kaitiaki.

title: Papā o Hiria: E whakaaro ana te Uru ki ngā mana hou i runga i Aropo
summary: Kua whakatūpato te US me te UK ki ngā kāwanatanga o Hiriani me Rūhia ka taea te whakamana i ngā mana ohaoha hou ki te haere tonu te whakapae o Aropo.
text: I whakaahuatia e te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika a John Kerry te āhuatanga ko "te nui rawa o ngā tūkinotanga atawhai". I kī a ia me mārama a Rūhia "kāore e taea e tēnei pakanga te whakamutu me te kore rongoā tōrangapū". Kai Rāwāhi a Tēnā Kerry e whai wāhi ana ki ngā kōrero e whai ana ki te kimi rongoā hūmārie ki te papā o Hiria. I a ia e kōrero ana i te taha o te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o UK, a Poihāne, ka kī a ia e tū ana "ngā hara ki te tangata" i ia rā i Aropo. Na Tēnā Hōnea hoki i tohutohu i a Rūhia kia "mahi i te mea tika e te tangata me te iwi o Hiria" mā te tuku i te whakaruruhau. "E hiahiatia ana he whakaruruhau, ā, ko te tikanga kia hoki ki te tēpu whakarite i Hiniwa," tana kī. "I te mutunga ka tae mai ēnei mea ki te ngau i ngā whakapae o ēnei hara, ā, me whakaaro rātau ināianei," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Hōnea. I kī a ia, he wāhanga o ngā mehua i hoahoatia hei "pupuri i te pēhanga", kei te whakaarohia ētahi atu whakaaetanga ki te kāwanatanga o Hiriani "me ā rātou kaitautoko". Ka aha mēnā kāore e mahi te tuma o ngā whakaaetanga? Ko te tātaritanga a Sebastian Usher, ko te kaiwhakatika o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui i tūmanakohia mai i ngā kōrero hou rawa mō Hiria i Rāwāhi, hāunga te pupuri i te tukanga whakawhanaunga ahakoa ngā tūponotanga katoa i ngā wiki tata nei. Ko te āhuatanga i Aropo te arotahi matua o te āwangawanga o te ao whānui. I kī a Tēnā Hōnea, he tino nui te pupuri i te pēhanga ki te kāwanatanga o Hiriani me ōna kaitautoko, ā, ka karanga ia ki Rūhia rāua ko Irana kia whakaatu i te aroha ki te iwi e mau ana i Aropo. Engari he whāiti te tikanga o te hoatu pēhanga, ahakoa i tāruatia e Tēnā Kerry kāore anō kia tangohia e te US ētahi kōwhiringa i te tēpu. He iti noa iho te pānga o ngā mana tīariari ki te ārahitanga o Hiria i tēnei wā, ā, i te kōrero a Tēnā Hōnea, kāore he hiahia i Uropi mo te haere ki te whawhai i Hiria. I tīmata nga kōrero o Rāwāhi ki ngā kōrero mō Īmene me te karanga mo te whakaruruhau i roto i te papā e rua tau. "Ko te wā tēnei ki te whakatinana i tētahi whakaruruhau tōtika, kātahi ka neke ki te tēpu whakarite," te kī a Tēnā Kerry. I honoa te tono mo te whakaruruhau i roto i ngā rā e te UK me te karere a UN Yemen, a Ould Cheikh Anganui. Ko te papā o Īmene, e pā ana ki tētahi tauwhāinga tauwhāinga ā-Hauti e tautoko ana i te perehitini e mōhiotia ana e te ao whānui ki te hunga whakakeke o Houthi, kua kite i ngā tāngata neke atu i te 6,800 i patua, he tokomaha o rātau tangata whenua. I muri noa iho i ngā rā torutoru noa iho ka hinga ngā taha ātete i te whakaruruhau i Hiria i tērā marama. Mai i taua wā ka whakapaea e ngā ope Hiriani, i pūruatia e Rūhia, te taone nui o Aropo - te papa riri kōtaha tiketike rawa i te whawhai ā iwi o te whenua - i te mea i kīia e Washington he hara whawhai. E kī ana ngā puna āwhina e hiahiatia wawetia ana he whakaruruhau 72 haora kia whakaaetia ai ngā taonga ki roto me ngā tāngata i waho i ngā wāhi tūkino i te rāwhiti o te taone, e noho ana ngā tāngata e 275,000. I te Hātarei ka honoa a Rūhia me te US ki ngā kōrero rangimārie i Lausanne, Huiterangi, e ngā whenua e hoki whakamuri ana i ngā taha ātete i roto i te whawhai. I reira ngā māngai o Hauti Arapia, o Irana, me Tākehi. Ināianei kei te tautoko ngā hōia o Ārepa i ngā ope Hiriani, i te wā e whakarākeitanga ana a Arapia i te ātete. I muri iho i te rima haora i Huiterangi, ka pakaru nga whakaritenga, kaore he whakaaetanga mo te mutunga o te whakapae o Aropo, i te āwhina rānei mo nga taone whakapaea o Hiria. Engari i whakaae katoa nga kaiwhakahaere kia haere tonu te kōrero.

title: Abortion clinic preacher given injunction
summary: Kua rāhuitia tētahi kaikauwhau tiriti Karaitiana kia kaua e whakamahi i tētahi whakakaha me te whakamahi i te kupu "kōhuru" i waho o tētahi whare hauora whakatahe.
text: I korerotia ki a Michael Overd, e 56, o Taunton, ka taea ia te tuku ki te whare herehere ki te takahia e ia te whakahau takiwā, i whiwhia e nga Pirihimana o Avon me Somerset. I kī ngā pirihimana i whai i ngā amuamu mō tōna whanonga i waho o tētahi whare hauora whakatahe i te taone. I whakaroatia te whakahau tae noa ki Hōngongoi 2022 e te Kōti Tiketike i Bristol. I muri i te whakarongo, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Avon rāua ko Somerset e ngana ana ki te whakataurite i ngā mana o Tēnā Overd ki te kōrero koreutu me te ārai i ngā mema o te iwi whānui kia kore ai e "whakaoho, kia pouri rānei". Ka kī te ope: "E mārama ana mai i te rōrahi o ngā amuamu kua whiwhi mātau i roto i ngā tau tata nei kua pā kino ngā mahi me ngā kupu a Michael Overd ki te oranga o te tokomaha o ngā mema o te iwi whānui." I raro i ngā ture o te whakahau, e rāhuitia ana a Tēnā Overd kia kaua e whakamahi i tētahi pūrere whakarahi ina kauwhau i te wāhi tūmatanui, ina purei rānei i ngā tārua o te kauwhau kua tuhia kētia i ngā wāhi tūmatanui i Somerset me Bristol. Kua rāhuitia hoki ia kia kaua e whakamahi ā-waha i te kupu "kōhuru" ki tētahi tangata i roto i te 80 ngā whāwhā (73m) o tētahi whare hauora whakatahe i Taunton. Ahakoa rā, kāore i tutuki ngā pirihimana i ētahi atu whakamātau ki te rāhui i a Tēnā Overd. Ko ngā ngana ki te aukati i a ia ki te whakamahi i tētahi pouaka hopi, te whakamahi i ngā āwhina arokite, te aukati i a ia e haere ana i roto i te 80 mita o tētahi whare hauora whakatahe i Taunton, e kauwhau ana mō te neke atu i te 20 meneti i roto i tētahi taone, pārihi rānei, i te takahi rānei i te rangimārie mā ngā kupu, ngā mahi rānei i tētahi wāhi tūmatanui.

title: Hapu ariki: Ka wehe atu a Duchess i te hōhipera
summary: Kua mahue i te Ariki o Kemihana te hōhipera i muri i ngā rā maha o te rongoā mo te mate o te ata.
text: I mahue i a Catherine, e pupuri ana i tētahi kakara rōhi kōwhai, te hōhipera o Kingi Edward VII i waenganui o Rāwāhi i te ata o te Rāitema me tana tāne, a Piriniha William. He iti iho i te 12 wiki e hapu ana, i whakaaetia ia ki te mate o te ata - hyperemesis gravidarum - i te Mane. I kī te Whare o Hato Hemi i roto i tētahi kōrero e haere ana a ia ināianei ki te Whare o Kensington mō tētahi wā okiokinga. Ko tana tamaiti tuatahi te tuatoru o te rārangi ki te torona, ā, ka noho hei ariki, ahakoa he tama, he kōtiro rānei, i muri i ngā huringa ki ngā ture whakakapinga. I tēnei wiki ka whakaae nga kāwanatanga o Kotahitanga ki te pēhi whakamua me tētahi pire e whakamutu ana i te whakahāweatanga ki nga wāhine i te takahanga ki te torona o Ingarangi. Ka menemene a Catherine ki te pāpāho, kua huihuia ki waho mai i tana whakaurunga, i tana putanga mai i te hōhipera. Ka tūtuki a ia i te pātaitanga a nga kaipānui mehemea kai te pai ake a ia. I kī te korero kōrero ariki o TE AO o Luisa Baldini i te āhua petipeti o te ariki, ā, he iti iho te kaha i te mea noa iho. He pānuitanga tūmatanui mo te hapu o te ariki, i mua i te tohu e toru marama, i ākina e tōna mate rongoā. I tāpiritia e te Whare o Hato Hemi: "E hiahia ana o rātau Ariki Ariki ki te mihi ki ngā kaimahi i te hōhipera mo te tiaki me te manaakitanga kua whiwhi te ariki." I kī te hungawai o Catherine, te Piriniha o Weera, i "hari" a ia i te hapu. "He whakaaro tino pai te noho hei tipuna i tōku pakeketanga," te kī a te uri o te torona, i HMS Belfast i Rānana, i reira ia e haere tahi ana ki te kaipuke ka haere tahi me te haerenga o Tā Ranulph Fiennes ki te Moana ki te Tonga. I te rā i muri mai i te putanga mai o ngā DJ reo irirangi o Ahitereiria e rua i tāwhai i te Kuini me te Piriniha o Uēra ki te tinihanga i ngā kaimahi o te hōhipera ki te whakahōu i te āhua o te ariki. I kī te hōhipera i tino nui te matatapu, ā, kei te arotakea ngā kawa waea. I kī te 2Day FM i mīharo i te whakaurunga o ta rātau waea, engari "he tino whakapāha". I kī te Mana Whakawhitiwhiti me te Pāpāho o Ahitereiria kua whiwhi amuamu mō te waea māminga. Ko ngā whakaritenga tūmataitinga o ngā waehere reo irirangi arumoni e pā ana ki ngā hōtaka rongokōrero me ngā take o nāianei, e kī ana, engari i tāpiritia kāore he kōrero anō hei mahi. Kāore a Catherine e tūmanakohia kia haere ki ētahi whakaritenga kua whakaritea mō tēnei wā, engari ka haere tonu a Pirini William ki ana mahi ariki, tae atu ki ngā takahanga e rua i te mutunga wiki. Ehara i te mea rerekē ki ngā wāhine hapū te pā ki te mate o te ata, otirā i ngā marama tuatahi o te hapu, engari ko ētahi wāhine (kotahi i ia 200) e pā ana ki te pārekareka me te ruaki, e haere tonu ana. E mōhiotia ana tēnei āhuatanga ko te hyperemesis gravidarum, HG rānei, ā, e hiahiatia ana he rongoā tohunga, ā, i te nuinga o te wā e hiahiatia ana kia noho ki te hōhipera. Ko te mōrearea matua ko te whakamaroke - he uaua pea te pupuri i te wai ā-waha, ā, ka taea e ngā tākuta te rongoā ki te rongoā hei āwhina ki te whakangāwari i te nausea.

title: Ko te Thinking Out Loud a Ed Sheeran kei runga i te tūtohi takitahi o UK
summary: Kua tīmataria e te riu a Ed Sheeran Thinking Out Loud te Tūtohi Takitahi Mana o UK, 19 wiki i muri i tana tomokanga tuatahi ki te 40 o runga.
text: I tūtohia te waiata i te wā i tukua ai te pukaemi tuarua a Sheeran, X, ā, kua āta piki ki te 10 o runga mai i taua wā. Ko te tau tuatahi tuarua tēnei o te tau 23 tau i roto i te ono marama, i muri i te angitu o Waiata. I kī te Kamupene Tūtohi Whaimana kua hokona e te waiata neke atu i te 356,000 ngā kape. I tāpiritia ko te riu hoki te tino roma o te wiki, kua whakarongo ki te 1.6 miriona ngā wā, ka kawea mai tōna katoa o ngā roma ki te tata ki te 14 miriona ki tēnei wā. Na te pikitanga roa o Sheeran ki te wāhi o runga e whati ana i te pūkete o mua i puritia e Celine Dion, nāna te 1994 kotahi Think Twice i pau i te 13 wiki kia tae ki te tau tuatahi. "Kāore au i te whakamahia ki te whai takitahi tau tahi, ā, ko taku waiata makau tēnei i runga i te pukaemi, taku waiata makau kua tuhia e au, nā reira kei te tino whakahīhī ahau kei te whiwhi i tēnei āhukahuka," te kī a te kaiwaiata. I whakamutua e Sheeran te oma e whā wiki a Mehana Trainor i runga, e pana ana i a ia ki te tau tuarua. E rua ngā wāhi ki te toru i piki ai te Shake It Off a Taylor Swift, i te wā i mau tonu te ngātahitanga a Jessie J ki a Nicki Minaj me Ariana Grande, Bang Bang, i te whā. Kaua e Kōrero 'Em, nā Jeremih e whakaatu ana i a YG, i whakatata i te rima o runga. Ko te tāurunga hōu teitei rawa ko te mahi anō o te Kēmu Kino a Pirihi Issak i te tau 1990 mai i te kaiwhakanao Tiamana o Parra For Cuva e whakaatu ana i a Anna Naklab. I roto i te tūtohi pukaemi, i whiwhi a Taylor Swift i tana pūkete tuarua o UK me tana mahi hou rawa, i te tau 1989. I hokona e te pukaemi te 90,000 i te wiki kua hipa, ka noho ko te pukaemi hokohoko tere rawa o te tau e tētahi rehetoi wahine. I piki te X a Sheeran i tētahi wāhi ki te tau tuarua, kātahi anō ka piki a Sam Smith's In The Lonely Hour, e toru ngā wāhi i piki ki te wāhi tuatoru. Ko te pukaemi tau tuatahi o tērā wiki, ko Ben Howard's I Forget Where We Were, i hinga ki te whā me te Wanted On Voyage a George Ezra e piki ana ki te rima. Ko tētahi atu tāurunga hou anake i roto i te 10 o runga ko te Nostalgia a Annie Lennox - tana putanga tuatahi i roto i te whā tau - i tae mai i te tau iwa. Ko ngā toa o te Paraihe Mercury i uru ki te 40 o runga mō te wā tuatahi i muri i to rātau angitu i te Wenerei, i te tīmatatanga i te 35. E 2,386 noa iho ngā tārua o ta rātau pukaemi Dead i hokona e te trio hip-hop o Pākehā mai i tōna putanga i te wā o Hui tanguru, i mua i to rātau toa i Mercury. I kī te Kamupene Tūtohi Whaimana i āwhina te āwhina o te rōpū ki te tārua i ngā hokonga katoa o te pukaemi i roto i te wiki kotahi noa iho.

title: Ka whakahekea e Homebase ngā mahi i muri i te hokonga o te kamupene mō te £1
summary: Me tapahi e Homebase ngā mahi e 303 i tōna pokapū tautoko pātaka i muri i te hokonga o te mekameka e tētahi kamupene whakarākeitanga.
text: I hokona e te umanga o Ahitereiria Wesfarmers ki a Hilco mō te £1 i tērā marama, e rua tau noa iho i muri i tana utunga i te £340m mō te kamupene. I kī a Homebase e hiahiatia ana ngā huringa i tōna pokapū i Milton Keynes i a ia e hoki ana ki tētahi parani kotahi, e whakawhāiti ana i te ingoa Bunnings i whakaaetia e ngā pātaka e 24. I kī tētahi kōrero ka "pai ake te whakarite a te kamupene mō ngā tono o te taiao hokohoko uaua o UK". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I mahi te pokapū tautoko pātaka i ngā toa Homebase me Bunnings i mua i te hokonga a Wesfarmers i te umanga. " Na te whakahekenga o te waitohu Bunnings, me whakarite anō te tīma kia tino pai ai te mahi i tētahi toa kotahi, takitahi." I hokona e Wesfarmers te kamupene i te tau 2016, ā, kua tīmata ki te whakawhanake anō i ōna pātaka Homebase i raro i tōna tohu Bunnings. I whakaae te umanga o Ahitereiria ki te mahi i te maha o ngā whakatakotoranga "ā-whaiaro" tae atu ki te whakahāwea i te tono hōtoke mō ngā tūemi mai i ngā whakamahana ki te horoi me te rokiroki, me te whakataka i ngā awhe kītini me te kaukau e paingia ana. Ko te mekameka - e tata ana ki te 250 ngā pātaka me ngā kaimahi 11,500 i te UK - i hokona i tērā marama e te tohunga whakarākeitanga anō o Hilco, nāna i whakaora te mekameka pūoro HMV i te tau 2013. I kī te uniana mahi a ngā kaimahi toa o Usdaw i taua wā he "tino māharahara mō te wā heke". I kī a Damian McGloughlin, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o Homebase: "Kāore anō mātou kia māmā tēnei whakataunga, engari e hiahiatia ana he mahi pūmau hei tīmata ki te hanga anō i te tūnga o Homebase i te mākete o UK. " We will be providing as much support as we can to help those affected through this difficult time."

title: Ka puta mai te hēkeretari o Pirihitini, a Rawiri Mundell hei tāne
summary: Kua puta mai tētahi minita kāpata Rangatira hei tāne, he whakataunga i whakaahuatia e ia ko "tētahi o ngā mea tino hira o tōku oranga".
text: I tuhituhi te Hēkeretari o Pirihitini a Rawiri Mundell i runga i tana paetukutuku whaiaro kua tae ki te wā ki te "whakaae ki te iwi whānui, ki te tūmataiti hoki, ko wai ahau". I kī te MP tau 53 tau e tūmanako ana ia e kore te putanga mai e huri i tētahi mea mō te āhua o tana mahinga. Ko Tēnā Mundell te MP mō Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale me Tweeddale. E whakapono ana ko ia te minita kāpata Tūturu tuatahi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti i "tino pai" te pirimia i te "kōrero tino whaiaro" a Tēnā Mundell, ā, he "tino whakahauhau ki te kite". I tuhituhi a Tēnā Mundell, tokotoru ana tamariki pakeke, i roto i tana pou tuihono: "Tau Hōu, tīmatanga hou! Kua whakaritea kētia e au aku manakē tōrangapū mo te tau, ā, ināianei kei te whakatakoto ahau i taku whaiaro. "I a au e mahi ana i tētahi o ngā whakataunga tino hira o tōku oranga, ā, i whakatau ahau kia puta mai hei tāne i te tau 2016, e hiahia ana ahau ki te haere tonu, ā, ināianei, pērā tonu, kua kī atu ahau." 'Ngā rangirua me ngā āwangawanga' i kī a Tēnā Mundell, ko ia anake te MP Tory o Pākehā, kua tirohia e ia te āhua o te putanga mai he "uaua ake i te tū mo te pōti, te kōrero i roto i te Whare o Ngātahi, te tirotiro rānei i runga i te pouaka whakaata". I kī te MP "kāore tonu e taea e ia te whakahau i aua whakaaro", engari i kī "ehara i te mea rerekē, otirā i roto i ngā tāngata o tōku pakeke". I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Mundell: "Koia anō, ko ngā tāngata katoa e tae ana ki tēnei wā, kua whai ake haerenga. Kua tino noho ahau i runga i ōku - ngā āhuatanga papā, o ngā rangirua me ngā mataku, engari i te mutunga he pai, he whakahīhī, me te aronga haere kāore e taea te tū. "I te roanga o te wā, ka mārama ahau, ki a au, ko te huarahi anake kia tino hari i runga i te taumata whaiaro ko te whakaae i te wāhi tūmatanui, i te tūmataiti hoki, ko wai ahau." I kī a ia kāore i taea e ia te nui ake te aroha me te tautoko mai i tōna whānau me ōna hoa, ka tāpiri: "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha te tauhohenga whānui ake, engari e mōhio ana ahau ko te mea tika māku e mahi". Ka kawea mai e te pānuitanga a Tēnā Mundell te maha o ngā MP tūturu i te Whare o Ngātahi ki te 33 - te wāhanga tiketike rawa o tētahi pāremata i te ao, e ai ki tētahi akoranga a ngā mātauranga o Amerika - ā, ko te tikanga he tokomaha kei runga i te Tory me ngā tūru Mahi (13). 'Tino whakahīhī' te kaiārahi Rangatira o Pirihitini, a Ruth Davidson, he tāne tūturu hoki, i tūtohu a ia i "tino whakakake ki taku hoa ko Rawiri". I tāpiri mai a ia: "E mōhio ana ahau kāore a Rawiri i māmā te kōrero o tēnei rā, engari i whakatata atu ki a ia i runga i tōna āhua whakaaro, pai hoki. " Kei a ia taku tautoko ngākau katoa, tae atu ki te tautoko a te whānau Pākehā whānui ake." Ka tūtohu te Minita Tuatahi o Pirihitini, a Nicola Sturgeon: "He pai ki a koe, e Rawiri. Kia pai te mahi me ngā hiahia tino pai." I kī a Hōne Macfarlane, ko te tumuaki o Stonewall Scotland: "He tino nui te whai tāngata kōtaha tiketike puta noa i ngā wāhi katoa o te iwi, mai i ngā tōrangapū ki te tākaro, ki te waihanga i ngā taiao whānui me te āwhina ki te whakarite i te mahinga tika o ngā tāngata moe wahine, tāne, bi me ngā tāngata trans i te mahi, i te kāinga, i ō rātou hapori hoki. " Ko ngā tauira tūranga pēnei i a Rawiri Mundell e whakaawe ana hoki i ngā taitamariki moe wahine, tāne, bi me ngā tāngata trans mā te whakamōhio atu ki a rātou ehara i te mea ko rātou anake, ā, ka taea hoki e rātou te whakakake i tō rātou tuakiri."

title: Christo: Ka mate te kaiwaiata whānau o Bulgarian nāna i takai rongonui i ngā tohu whenua i te 84
summary: Kua mate te kaiwaiata whānau o Purukāria, o Christo, e tino mōhiotia ana mō te takai whare me ngā tohu whenua rongonui ki te papanga, kirihou rānei, i tōna kāinga i Niu Ioka, e 84 ona tau.
text: I mate a ia i ngā take māori i te Rātapu, e ai ki tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki te whārangi Facebook mana o te rehetoi. Ko Christo, nāna i mahi tahi me tana wahine ko Jeanne-Claude, i rongonuitia te Reichstag i Berlin me te Pont-Neuf i Parihi ki te kākahu. E kī ana mahi toi "i huihuia ai ngā tāngata" puta noa i te ao, e kī ana te kōrero. "I tino ora a Christo i tōna oranga, ehara i te moemoeā anake i ngā mea e kore e taea, engari i te mōhiotanga," e pānui ana, kātahi anō ka "ora tonu te toi a te tokorua i roto i o māua ngākau me o mātau pūmahara". Ko tētahi tāutanga 2016 e huaina ana ko The Floating Piers, e 100,000 sq m o te papanga kōwhai kanapa e mānu ana i runga i ngā kupiki polyethylene i te roto o Iseo, i Sulzano, Itari. I kī mai a Shakespeare ki a mātau 'he atamira te ao katoa', i whakaaturia mai e Christo ki a mātau he taiwhanga toi katoa o te ao. Kāore te kaiwaiata whānau o Purukāria i āro atu ki ngā pakitara mā o te whare taonga o nāianei e tīari ana ngā ahanoa i tua atu i te oranga o ia rā. I hiahia a ia ki te huri i te oranga o ia rā hei toi, kia titiro anō ai te tangata me te whakaaro anō ki ō rātou taiao. I mahia tēnei e ia mā te raweke - mā te tākai i tētahi whare pēnei i te Reichstag i Berlin ki te rauemi kikorangi, i tētahi wāhanga rānei o te takutai o Ahitereiria i roto i te kotahi miriona waewae tapawhā o te papanga - i ngā take e rua ka huri i ngā hanganga mātao, mārō hei whakairo ngāwari, ngohengohe. I mahi ngātahi a ia me tana wahine ko Jeanne-Claude, i tūtaki ai ia i Parihi i te tau 1958. E toru tau i muri mai ka mahia e rātau a rātau mahi nui tuatahi i Tiamana, e taupoki ana i ngā oko hinu i tāpaetia ki te whanga o Cologne ki ngā rawa. I mate a Jeanne-Claude i te tau 2009 ka waiho a Christo kia haere tonu ko ia anake, ā, i mahia e ia, me tētahi kaupapa ki te tākai i te L'Arc de Triomphe i Parihi a tērā tau - he kaupapa tērā pea ka kitea tonutia. I te tau 2018, i whakakitea tētahi mahi toi a Christo - tana wāhanga nui tuatahi o waho i te UK - i te Serpentine i Hyde Park o Rānana. He whakairo ātaahua te Mastaba o Rānōna, ā, i hangaia mai i ngā oko neke atu i te 7,500 200 rīta e tāpae tahitia ana, e whakaaturia ana i runga i tētahi pūhara māngi. I whānau a Christo Vladimirov Javacheff i Gabrovo, Bulgaria, i te tau 1935, i noho ia i Ateria me Huiterangi i mua i tana neke ki Wīwī, i reira i tūtaki ai ia ki a Jeanne-Claude Denat de Guillebon i Parihi. Tae atu ki te panoni i ngā tohu whenua nui, i hangaia hoki e te tokorua ngā mahi toi taiao nui i roto i ngā tautuhinga māori, i mua i te matenga o Jeanne-Claude i te tau 2009, e 74 tau te pakeke. He kaupapa kāore anō kia oti i Parihi e kīa nei ko L'Arc de Triomphe, Wrapped kua whakaritea kia oti, kia whakaaturia hoki i te Mahuru 2021, e ai ki ngā hiahia o Christo. "Ka tono mokowā mātou me te waihanga i ngā whakararuraru mārire mō ētahi rā," te kī a Christo i tētahi wā. Ka whakamutua te kōrero o te Rātapu: "I roto i tētahi reta o te tau 1958 i tuhituhi ai a Christo, 'Ka wikitōria tonutia te ātaahua, te pūtaiao me te toi'. E pupuri tata ana mātau i aua kupu i tēnei rā."

title: I mōhio wawe ngā mātua o Alice Ruggles ko wai te kaipatu o te tamāhine
summary: Kua kī nga mātua o tētahi wahine i patua e tana hoa tāne i mōhio wawe rātau ko ia te kawenga.
text: I tāhaetia e Lance Corporal Trimaan "Harry" Dhillon a Alice Ruggles i mua i te whakaekenga kino i a ia i Whiringahora i tērā o Whiringahora. I whakaahuatia e ōna mātua ko Sue Hills rāua ko Clive Ruggles te wā i patoto ai ngā pirihimana tokorua o Northumbria i to rāua tatau. Ka kī a Prof Ruggles: "Kātahi rātau ka kī mai ki a mātau kua patua a Alice. Na ka titiro mātau ki a rāua anō, ka mea, 'Ko Harry tērā'. I mōhio mātou, i mōhio tonu mātou i taua wā." I rongo te whakawā i te Kōti Karauna o Aotearoa kua pākaha a Dhillon ki te tau 24 tau, a, kua tāhaetia ia. I kōrero a Dr Hills ki tōna hara mo te ngana ki te whakaū i tana tamāhine i runga i te waea e rua rā i mua. Ka kī a ia: "A, i whakaū ahau i a ia e pai ana, i mōhio nga pirihimana ki ngā mea e haere ana, ā, ki te waiho noa ia e ia ka waiho ia e ia ka waiho ia e ia. " A, ka whakatakotoria e au te waea mō te 10 meneti, ā, ka waea a Emma (tamāhine) ka mea, 'Kāore e taea e koe te kōrero tēnā ki a ia, ka patua ia e ia. Me mahi koe i tētahi mea'. "A, i whakaaro ahau kei te nui rawa tana urupare nā reira i kī noa atu ahau 'kaua e heahea'. " Heoi anō, i taku kitenga i nga pirihimana, ka mōhio ahau koia tēnā. "A, i rongo ahau i te āhua o te hara i te tuatahi o ngā mea katoa i kī atu ai ki a Alice kia kaua e māharahara, ā, i te tuarua ka kī atu ki a Emma kia kaua e heahea, mehemea kāore au i kī kei te ora tonu a Alice." I kī a Prof Ruggles kāore a ia i whakaaro i tētahi o rātou, tae atu ki tana tamāhine, i mōhio ki te nui o te āhuatanga ahakoa nga tohu. Kua whakatūria e ōna mātua te Alice Ruggles Trust, ā, i kī rātau e tūmanako ana rātau ki te whakamahi i tēnā me te "tuakiri kātoretore" o ta rāua tamāhine kia mōhio ai ētahi atu tāngata ki ngā mōrearea o te tāhae. I kī rātau e hiahia ana rātau kia maumaharatia ia mō tēnā, ā, he "menemene, he kata, he kōrero pārekareka." I whakakāhore a Dhillon, e 26, i te kōhuru, engari i kitea he hara, a, ka whiua kia iti rawa te 22 tau.

title: Hōtēra o Chelsea: Ka hokona te tatau o Bob Dylan mō te $100,000
summary: Kua hokona te tatau ki te rūma o te kaiwaiata o Amerika o Bob Dylan i te Hōtēra o Chelsea i Niu Ioka i te hokonga mō te $100,000 (£70,000).
text: Ko tētahi o ngā tatau e 50 mai i te hōtēra, i noho ai te tini whetū i roto i ngā tau, kia hokona. Ko te tatau ki tētahi rūma i whakamahia e ngā kaiwaiata o Janis Joplin rāua ko Leonard Cohen i te wā o tētahi take, tae atu ki te kaiwaiata o Joni Mitchell, i tīkina e $85,000. I whiwhi tētahi kairīhi o mua i ngā tatau i muri i te tīmatanga o te mahi whakahou i te tau 2011. Ko te hōtēra, i hangaia i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ka noho hei nohoanga mo te wā roa mō ngā whakatupuranga kaiwaiata, bohemians me ngā kaituhi. I tuhia e Jack Kerouac tana pukapuka tauhira On the Road i a ia e noho ana i reira i nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. I hokona te tatau o tōna rūma i te hokonga mō te $30,000. I noho hoki te hōtēra hei whare mō ngā kaituhi a Mark Twain rāua ko Tom Wolfe, ā, i tuhia e te kaituhi pakiwaitara pūtaiao a Arthur C Clarke te whakaaturanga mō te 2001: A Space Odyssey i reira. I te tau kotahi mano, i I mate a Vicious i te rongoā hīkini i mua i te whakawātanga o te kēhi. Ko ētahi atu tatau e haere ana i raro i te hama i te whare hoko o Guernsey, ko tērā o te rūma o te kaiwhakaari o Edie Sedgwick, i reira i whakaahuatia ai e te kaiwaiata a Andy Warhol a Chelsea Girls. I hokona mō te $52,500. E $13,000 te tatau ki te rūma o te kaiwaiata o Jimi Hendrix. I hokona te tatau ki tētahi rūma i whakamahia e te kaiwaiata o Madonna, te kaiwhakaari a Isabella Rosselini me te kaituhituhi o Shirley Clarke mō te $13,000. I whakaorangia ngā tatau e tētahi kairīhi o mua, a Jim Georgiou, nāna i kite i a rātou e makaia ana, ā, ka whakaritea kia riro i a rātou. "Ki a au he hītori me te ātaahua, ā, e tūhono ana ki tōku ngākau. He utu nui rātau nā te mea he tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata kua puta i a rātou," tana kī atu ki te New York Times. I tohua te whare hei tohu whenua o te taone i te tau 1966, ā, i hokona i te tau 2016 ki tētahi rōpū kaiwhakangao. I mutu te tango i ngā tāpuitanga hou i te tau 2011 engari kei te noho tonu tētahi rōpū iti o ngā tangata noho roa i runga i ngā papa o runga i te wā e haere tonu ana te mahi whakahou. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe:

title: I whakangaromia ngā patu i Colombo
summary: I kī te Minita o te Haumarutanga Tūmatanui, te Ture me te Whakahau me te Minita Tuarua o te Whakangungu, o Te Minita Whakangungu o Te Rūnanga o Wickramanayake, kua nui haere te whakahekenga o ngā uara manapori i Sri Lanka nā ngā ngohe hara.
text: I kī a ia ko nga mema pāremata o TNA, hei tauira, ka āraia kia kaua e kōrero i o rātau hinengaro i te pāremata e te Hāwhe Tamila. E kōrero ana a ia ki tētahi huihuinga i Colombo hei tohu i te Rā Whakangaromanga Rākau Ao Whānui. I whakamahia e nga mana ārai i te Paraire e rua nga waka rererangi hei kuru i te tata ki te 35,000 o ngā ringa ture i whakamahia i te wā o te whawhai a te JVP, e rua tekau tau o te whawhai tūmatanui ki te Hāwhe Tamila, e nga rōpū hara. He maha nga tau e noho ana nga rākau, i kohia e te kāwanatanga i te wā o te whakawāteatanga o nga rākau. Kua whakaritea te takahanga e te Manatu Haumarutanga Tūmatanui, te Ture me te Whakahau me te Komihana a te Motu ki te Tōpūtanga o ngā Ringa Iti me ngā Rākau Māmā. I kī te hēkeretari ki te Manatu Thilak Ranavirajah e tata ana ki te 53,000 ngā hara i mahia i ia tau i Sri Lanka mā te whakamahi i ēnei rākau. Kua whakaaturia hoki he maha nga rākau i hoatu ki nga mema pāremata i te mutunga o nga tau 80 kāore anō kia whakaoratia. I haere a IGP Rūhīhī Whāwhā me ētahi atu kaiwhakahaere matua ki te hui.

title: Coronavirus: 1m distancing is possible in NI from Monday
summary: Kua whakaae te Kaiwhakahaere o Stormont ki te whakaheke i te tawhiti pāpori i Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i te 2m (6ft) ki te 1m me ngā rāhuitanga mai i te Mane, kua whakaūngia e Arlene Foster.
text: I ngā rā i muri i te kī a te pirimia ka neke a Ingarangi ki te "1m plus" i te 4 o Hōngongoi, i te mea kua whakangāwari tōna raka. I kawea mai te kaupapa ki te kaiwhakahaere e te Minita Whakahaere, a Diane Dodds. I kī te minita tuatahi me tautoko ngā umanga manaaki i te haumarutanga. I whakaae te Kaiwhakahaere o Stormont kia rua mita te tawhiti o te tangata ki te taea, engari mai i te 29 o Pipiri ka taea te haere mai i roto i te kotahi mita e taea ai ngā whakamaurutanga tika. I pānuitia hoki e Mrs Foster me te Minita Tuarua Tuatahi a Michelle O'Neill ētahi atu rā tohu mō ngā umanga me ngā whare tūmatanui kia whakatuwhera anō i te whakangāwari o te raka i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Kei roto i a rātou: E pā ana ki te nekehanga 1m, i tautohe ngā mema o te umanga manaaki me āwhina i a rātou ki te tīmata anō i ā rātou umanga. Ko ngā hōtēra, ngā pāpara, ngā wharekai me ngā wharekai ka whakatuwhera anō i Aiarangi ki te Raki i te 3 o Hōngongoi. "Ko te take i whakapono ai mātou ka taea e mātou te neke ki te 1m e pā ana ki ētahi atu whakamaurutanga hei whakahaere i taua mōrea," te kī a te minita tuatahi ki te hui pānui ā-kaiwhakahaere o ia rā. "Kaore he mea e kore e mōrearea, ā, he mea nui kia mahi tahi ngā wāhanga manaakitanga me te tāpoi tāpoi." I kī a Ms O'Neill he "whakahau" te whakatūpato. "Tērā pea me whakatika e mātou ēnei rā, ā, kua rite te kaiwhakahaere ki te hīpae whakamuri mēnā ka puta mai te hiahia," tana tāpiri mai. Kāore anō te Kaiwhakahaere o Stormont kia whakatau mēnā ka whakahaua ngā uhi kanohi i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui katoa, i muri i te pūrongotanga i mua ka kōrerorerotia i te hui o te Tāite. I kī kē te tuatahi me te tuarua kua tohutohu kē rātau i ngā tāngata kia mau ārai kanohi i ngā wāhi tūmatanui, engari i mārama rātau kāore pea i te māia mēnā e haere ana te tangata ki te kai. Ākuanei ka whakahaua ngā uhi kanohi ina whakamahi i ngā waka tūmatanui i te Whenua o Airangi. I whakaūngia e te Minita Hauora o Airani a Haimona Hāhi i te Rāitema e tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakarite i te take i te wiki e whai ake nei ki te 10 rā. Ko te rama kākāriki mō ngā kaitākaro rangatira o Aiarangi ki te Raki kua korerotia hoki ka taea e rātau te tīmata anō ki te whakangungu i roto i te whare mai i te 29 o Hune. Ko ngā kaitākaro i whakaakona hei rangatira ko ngā Orangirangi, Paralympians, whutupōro ngaio, GAA me ngā kaitākaro whutupōro me ngā mahi pāpāho. Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, kua whakaaetia anake rātau ki te whakangungu i waho, me ētahi kaikauhoe e haere ana ki Dublin mō te whakamahi i te puna kaukau o roto. Ka whakaaetia hoki kia tīmata anō te whakangungu hākinakina whakapā mai i te Mane. I whakaūngia hoki e ngā minita tuatahi me ngā minita tuatahi ka taea e ngā wāhi karakia te whakatuwhera anō, e ai ki te whakarite, i runga anō i te Mane. I kī rātau kua tū he "whakaurunga nui" ki ngā kaiārahi hāhi me ngā whakapono me pēhea e taea ai te whakahaere i ngā ratonga. "Ko tā mātou e hiahia ana ki te mahi i te rā e whai ake nei, ko te mahi i ngā tau e pā ana ki ngā mārena me ngā nehunga," te kī a Ms O'Neill. I whakatauria te take kai kura koreutu i whakatauria e ia ka kōrerorerotia e te kaiwhakahaere tērā a tērā wiki. I kī a Mrs Foster kāore anō kia tae ngā minita ki tētahi whakaaetanga mēnā me whakahau ngā uhi kanohi i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui - engari ka tirohia anō i te Mane. I whakaaturia hoki e te minita tuatahi kua taea e te kaiwhakahaere te waitohu pūtea mō ngā kai kura koreutu i te raumati. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki i puritia i muri i te haupae i waenganui i a Sinn Féin me te DUP i runga i te rahunga ki te whakatinana i tētahi aronui utu mō ngā tūpāpaku o ngā Raruraru. I kī a Mrs Foster ka whakamāramatia e te Minita Pūtea a Conor Murphy ngā tohatoha pūtea mai i te whakaminenga o Pipiri i te Tūtira, arā ko te £12m e whakaarohia ana kia haere tonu ngā utu kai kura koreutu i a Hōngongoi me Aotearoa. I te Tāite, kāore he mate anō i tāpiritia ki te tapeke o te Tari Hauora e 547, ko te nuinga o ngā mate i ngā hōhipera. E rua anō ngā kēhi tōrunga o Covid-19 i Aiarangi ki te Raki i whakapūketetia. Kua kī hoki te Tari Hauora ko te tau R o Aiarangi ki te Raki - te tau whakaputa uri rānei - "ka noho pūmau" i waenganui i te 0.6 me te 0.9. Ko te tau toharite o ngā tāngata ka tukuna atu e tētahi tangata pāngia te huaketo ki a ia. I kī hoki a Mrs Foster he iti iho i te 600 te nuinga o ngā tāngata urutā i Aiarangi ki te Raki. He haumaru te tawhiti 1m? E taunaki ana te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao kia mau tonu te tawhiti o te 1m neke atu rānei. Kua whāngaia e ētahi whenua tēnei tohutohu, i te nuinga o te wā nā te mea e tohe ana hoki rātou ki ngā tāngata e mau hīpoki ana. Engari ehara i te mea mo te tawhiti anake, engari ko te wā hoki. Ko te roa ake o tō noho tata ki tētahi tangata kua pāngia, ko te nui ake o te mōrea. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao e tohutohu ana i te kāwanatanga o UK e whakapau ana i te ono hēkona i te tawhiti o te 1m mai i tētahi tangata, he rite tonu ki te whakapau i te kotahi meneti i te tawhiti o te 2m. I muri i te pānuitanga 1m a te kaiwhakahaere i te Rāitema, ka kī te tūru o te British Medical Association (BMA) i Aiarangi ki te Raki, a Dr Tom Black, ka "whakaaetia anake te huringa mēnā ka haere tahi me tētahi tūtohutanga mārama, kaha hoki mai i to mātau kāwanatanga kia mau ngā tāngata i ngā ārai kanohi tika i ngā wāhi katoa i waho o ō rātou ake kāinga, i ngā āhuatanga katoa i waho o te kāinga e iti iho ana i te 2m". "E hiahia ana hoki mātou ki te kite me pēhea te ine a te kāwanatanga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i te pānga o tēnei whakangāwari hou, me te whakaatu he tikanga mārama, pakari hoki hei whakarite kia kore ēnei huringa e hua i te nui ake o ngā tāngata e whakapokea, e mate ana, e mate rānei, ka āwhina rānei ki tētahi tara tuarua ka taea te whakararuraru i te ratonga hauora me puta i tēnei hōtoke." I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te Tirohanga a TE NI, i kī a Pat Cullen, o te Kāreti Ariki o Nēhi, tērā ētahi māharahara i waenganui i ngā nēhi mō te nekehanga. "Ko te māharahara nā te mea e kī ana rātau kia kaua tātau e tuku katoa i te tautiaki," tana kī. "Me arotake tonu, engari e whakaaro ana ahau mō te hauora me te oranga o te iwi whānui o Aiarangi ki te Raki, me kite mātou i tērā e pā ana i tēnei rā, ā, ka pōhiritia e mātou." This article was amended on 29 June 2020 to include further details of the Executive's advice on social distancing.

title: Te whakaekenga o Rāwāhi: Ka haere ngā whānau ki te ratonga o Aotearoa
summary: Kua uru atu ngā whanaunga o te hunga i patua i roto i te whakaekenga mōrearea o Westminster ki ngā mema o te Whānau Ariki i tētahi "ratonga tūmanako" i Westminster Abbey.
text: Tokotoru nga tāngata i patua e Te Pirihitini i tana taraiwa ki roto i te huihuinga i te 22 o Poutāpeta, a, ka okaina he pirihimana kia mate i mua i tana pūhia mate i te Pāremata o UK. Ko ngā kaimahi ratonga ohotata i waenganui i te whakaminenga whakapono maha e 2,000. I kī a Melissa Cochran, i mate tana tāne i te whakaekenga, ko te ratonga "te mea tino ātaahua kua kitea e au". "He tino pīrangi taku tāne ki ngā whare karakia, ā, he tino pai ki a ia te kite i taua wāhi - he ātaahua," tana tāpiri mai. Ka kī a ia: "Na te tautoko a taku whānau me te ringihanga o te aroha mai i te katoa i homai ai ki a au te kaha ki te mahi i tāku e mahi ai. E hiahia ana taku tāne kia haere tonu ahau, ā, kāore au e hiahia kia kaua ahau e neke whakamua i runga i te tere e taea ana." I tino whara a Mrs Cochran i te wā o te whakaekenga, i mahue i a ia he waewae whati, he rara whati me ngā whara māhunga. "Ko Kurt pea te tangata tino pai kua tūtaki ahau. He reka, he atawhai a ia, ā, e tino whakahīhī ana ahau ki a ia. E tino hari ana ahau kua mōhio te ao ināianei he tangata tino pai a ia", tana tāpiri mai. 'I kurua ahau' I a ia e kōrero ana ki te HAU, ka kī a Mrs Cochran ka taea e ia te mahara "te mauri o te kore e kite i taku tāne ki hea" me te wā i kitea ai e ia kua mate tana tāne. "I muri i te pokanga o taku waewae, kua puta mai ahau i te whakaora, a, ka whakatakotoria ahau e rātau ki tētahi rūma hōhipera. I haere mai ōku mātua ki te toro, ā, i reira e tatari ana ki a au i taku putanga mai, ā, i tono ahau ki a rāua kia mōhio he aha i pā ki taku tāne. "I mua atu kāore i taea e tētahi te kōrero mai ki a au... kāore he mōhiohio. Ka puta aku mātua i te rūma, ka hoki mai ki roto. "I hopu rāua i taku ringa, a, ka mea, kāore ia i mahi, nāna ahau i kuru." I a ia e kōrero ana ki te whakaminenga i mua, ka whakamihi te Dean of Westminster, te Tino Reverend John Hall ki te kotahitanga o ngā tāngata o Rātana me ngā Pirihitini i muri mai i te whakaekenga. I kōrero a ia mo te huihuinga o te hunga i huihui rangimārie ki Trafalgar Square, ko te nuinga o nga wāhine Mohimana e tū ana i runga i te Arawhiti o Westminster, te kotahitanga o ngā kaiārahi whakapono me ngā karere whakatoi i marara i waenganui i ngā putiputi i runga i te piriti. Ka mea ia: "E tu tahi ana tatou i roto i tenei ratonga e whakaaturia ana nga whakapono o te ao, a ka inoi tahi tatou i runga ake i nga mea katoa mo te koha o te tumanako. " Ko tā mātou inoi me tā mātou whāinga kia noho tahi i runga i te rangimārie, i te whakaute i roto i tō tātau rerenga kētanga, me te waiata tahi i runga i te hāngai." Heoi anō, i kī a ia kua mahue i te whakaekenga te iwi "pōhēhē". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He aha pea te mea e whakahauhau ana i te tangata ki te utu i tētahi motokā, ka mauria mai i Birmingham ki Brighton ki Rāwāhi, kātahi ka tere te taraiwa ki ngā tāngata kāore anō ia kia tūtaki, kāore pea i mōhiotia, kāore ōna riri whaiaro, kāore he take e kino ai ki a rātou, kātahi ka oma ki ngā kuwaha o te Whare o Aotearoa ki te mate anō? Te āhua nei e kore rawa tātau e mōhio." 'Best of humanity' Labour MP Mary Creagh said the mood at the service was both poure and resolute. Ka kī a ia: "I kite mātau i te tino kino o te tangata i te whakaekenga wehi... Engari i kite hoki mātou i te tino pai o te tangata, e haere tahi ana, ā, i kite anō mātou i tēnei rā, i roto i te taumira hou, me te kotahitanga ki ngā whānau." I pōhiritia e te Dean ngā mema o te whakaminenga ki te tahu kānara hei whakahonore i te whakaaetanga. Ka tahuna e Pirini William te kānara tuatahi, ā, ka tukuna atu te rama ki ngā tāngata i te karakia. I hoatu e te Hēkeretari Kāinga a Amber Rudd te pānui tuatahi i te karakia mai i a Heremaia 31: 15-17, e whakaata ana i te kaupapa tūmanako o te ratonga. Ko te pānui tuarua i mahia e Piriniha William, nāna i kōrero te pūrākau o te Samaria Pai. I roto hoki i te ratonga he pānuitanga a te Koromatua o Rānōna, a Te Koromatua o Rāwāhi. Ko ētahi atu kaikōrero ko te Rangatira Pirihimana Tūtaki, ko Mak Chishty, ko Rabbi Wheua Julia Neuberger DBE, ko Ayatollah Sayyid Fadhel Hosseini Milani, ko PC Jaskaran Garcha me te Reverend Anthony Ball. Ko te hunga i mate i te whakaekenga ko Aysha Frade, e 44, i mahi i tētahi kāreti tuaono o Rāwāhi; Ko te tūruhi o Amerika ko Kurt Cochran, 54, mai i Utaha; te kaihoroi matapihi o Leslie Rhodes, 75, mai i te tonga o Rānana; me te pāpā o te tokorua o PC Keith Palmer, 48. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i huihui ai ngā mema o o rātau whānau katoa ki te wāhi kotahi. I reira hoki te Kaiārahi Kotahi, a David Lidington me te Komihana Pirihimana Tūtaki, a Craig Mackey. Tīkina ngā rongo mai i te BBC i tō pouakaroto, ia ata o te wiki

title: Ka kaweake ake a Tiapanī i ngā tūmanako whakaora
summary: I whakaaturia e ngā kawenga ake Hapanihi tētahi pikinga ohorere i a Hōngongoi, e tīmata ana i ngā tūmanako ki te tupu mo te rangatiratanga nui rawa o te ao.
text: I piki ake ngā kawenga ake i te 3.9% ina whakaritea ki te kotahi tau ki mua, i āwhinatia e te nui ake o ngā tukunga motokā me ngā mīhini hiko. Ko te pikinga tuatahi tēnei i roto i te toru marama. I piki ngā kawemai i te 2.3% i taua marama kotahi, nā te pikinga o te tono hinu me te korohū i muri i te mōrearea o Te Wānanga i te tau 2011 i whakaweto ai ngā pūrere karihi. Kua pinea e te kāwanatanga ngā tūmanako mo te tupu i runga i te whakaoranga kaweake. I whakawhānuitia te tāupenga hokohoko a Tiapanī ki te 964 billion iene ($9.4bn; £5.6bn) i a Hōngongoi, i whakaritea ki te tāpaetanga o te 822bn iene i June. E tūmanako ana ngā kaitirotiro mā te whakaora kaweake e āwhina ki te wāhikē i te hinganga o te tono ā-kāinga. Engari kāore te katoa i te mōhio ka nui te hurihanga o ngā kawenga ake hei tautoko i te whakahaerenga o Tiapanī i te wā roa. "E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga i ngā kawenga ake e whakaora ana i te āhua o te ia, nā reira ka wāhikē pea te tono ā-waho i ētahi o ngā ngoikoretanga o te tono ā-kāinga ki mua," te kī a Takeshi Minami, te rangatira o te ohanga i te Whare Wānanga Rangahau o Norinchukin. "Engari kāore e taea e te tupu kaweake te whakatere ake i konei. Kāore he āwhina o te whakahaerenga o Uropi, ā, mā tēnei e taumaha te tupunga o ngā mākete kaweake nui o Āhia o Tiapanī pēnei i Haina," tana tāpiri mai. Ko te pānga tāke i kirimana te whakahaerenga o Tiapanī e te 6.8% ā-tau i te koata tuarua o te tau, ko te hinganga nui rawa mai i te tau 2011 i te wā i tūkinotia e te rū me te tsunami. Ko te nuinga o te tīngongo he urupare ki tētahi tāke hoko a te kāwanatanga, nāna i pupuri te hokohoko kaihoko. Kua piki ake te tāke hoko a Tiapanī mai i te 5% ki te 8% i Aperira. Ko te pikinga tuatahi tērā i roto i te 17 tau. Kua whakaritea te kāwanatanga kia whakaarohia ā muri ake i tēnei tau mēnā ka whakarewaina te tāke hoko mā tētahi atu 2% ki te 10% i te 2015.

title: Karanga ki te huri i ngā tatauranga mokatere utu mōkito o Guernsey
summary: Ko te tikanga kia tātaitia te utu mōkito e ai ki te utu toharite, kua huatau mai tētahi pāremata o Guernsey.
text: A tērā wiki, ka pōti ngā kawana ki te whakanui i te utu mōkito ia haora ki te £6.15 mō ngā pakeke me te £4.36 mō te rangatahi. I kī a Tuarua Mātā Fallaize ko te kaupapahere manako a Commerce and Employment e whakanuia ana e te taupū utu hokohoko (RPI). Kua whakatakotoria e ia he mōtini e tono ana kia honoa kētia ki ngā whiwhinga toharite. Ko te rārangi wā kua tautuhia e ia ka kite i te utu mōkito kia 40% o ngā whiwhinga toharite i te 2014, me te 45% ki te 2020. I kī a Tuarua Fallaize e hiahia ana hoki ia kia ngāwari ake te ngana ki te huri i te mokatere i marohitia e Commerce and Employment i tēnei wā ko te kōwhiringa anake a ngā mema ko te whakaae, te whakakāhore rānei i ngā marohi.

title: I muri i te raumati wera e pupuhi ana ngā manu wahine harlequin ki roto i ngā kāinga
summary: E kī ana ngā tāngata puta noa i Ingarangi me Weera, kei te kōpikopiko o rātau kāinga me o rātau whare e ngā ladybirds.
text: E huatau ana ngā tohunga ladybird i te raumati wera kua whakarewaina te maha o ngā momo Harlequin urutoki, i tae tuatahi mai ki UK i te tau 2004. I te mātao o te pāmahana, ka moe te Harlequin mo te hōtoke i roto i ngā whare - tae atu ki ngā kāinga. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao he kore kino te nuinga o nga ladybirds, ā, ka taea te waiho anake mēnā ka kitea i roto i tō whare. Kua puta mai ngā pokai whakairinga i runga i te pāpāho pāpori e tuhinga ana i te whakaekenga o te ladybird, me ngā iro whero iti e kitea ana e ngokingoki ana i runga i ngā tatau me ngā matapihi i ngā kāinga o te iwi. I kī a Ahorangi Helen Roy i te Pokapū mō te Rauropi me te Hydrology, e whakahaere ana i te UK Ladybird Survey, kua tīmata ngā pūrongo i te raki o Ingarangi i te wāhi i mātao ai te huarere, i mua i te horahanga o te whenua. Ka kī a ia: "He tino mātakitaki kararehe te kite." Tērā pea i whakarewaina e te raumati wera ngā tau o te ngārara, ahakoa i kī a ia kāore anō kia oti ngā raraunga rangahau. I kitea tuatahitia te wahine Harlequin i te UK i te 14 tau ki mua, ā, ināianei ko ia te momo wahine tuarua tino pūnoa, e kitea ana puta noa i Ingarangi me ētahi wāhi o Weera. Engari nā tōna taenga mai i āwangawanga kei te whakawhitiwhiti i ētahi momo māori, pēnei i te ladybird wāhi rua. E kī ana a Pita Paraone, tētahi atu kaiwhakahaere rangahau ladybird, he kaiako matua hoki i te Whare Wānanga o Anglia Ruskin, ahakoa he nui ake te momo Harlequin, ehara i te mea ngāwari noa iho te wehe i ngā momo māori i te mohoao. Engari i kī a ia ko ngā manu wahine e kitea ana e ngokingoki ana ki roto i ngā kāinga, tērā pea ko tēnei whakaariki, i te mea ko ētahi atu momo e moe ana i roto i ngā rākau, i te paru rau rānei. Ka kī a ia: "Mēnā kei te whiwhi koe i te nui o ngā kuia e haere mai ana ki roto i tētahi whare, tērā pea he Harlequins rātau." I kī a Dr Brown i te ngahuru o te Harlequin i mua i te hōtoke i ahu mai ki te ingoa kāinga o te wahine Halloween i te US. I kī a Dr Brown i ētahi wā ka ngau ngā wahine Harlequin i te tangata mēnā kāore he kai, i te nuinga o te wā ka waiho he tūtuki iti me te wero. I ētahi take, he tino tauhohenga pāwera te tangata. Engari i kī a ia mēnā ka kite koe i ngā Harlequins i tō kāinga, he ngāwari kē pea te waiho i a rātou - ina whakararurarutia ka huna e rātou he taonga kōwhai e poapoa ana i ngā taonga.

title: Northamptonshire: Kua whakaaetia te mahere a nga mana Unitary
summary: Kua whakaaetia e te kāwanatanga tētahi mahere mō ngā mana kotahi e rua hei whakakapi i tētahi kaunihera mōrearea moni.
text: Northamptonshire County Council's money problems in 2018 led to a scheme to scrap it and seven other district and borough councils next year. Engari kāore ngā mana hou e mahi tae noa ki te 1 o Āperira 2021, kotahi tau i muri mai i te mea i whakaritea tuatahitia. I kī te Hēkeretari Hapori a James Brokenshire ka whakatūria "ngā mana kōruru" i te tau 2020 i te wā tauwhiro. These will be established following local elections in May 2020 - this month's local elections in Northamptonshire were cancelled. As well as two new unitary councils, a children's trust will also be established to deliver services on behalf of the new authorities. 'Time to plan' Mr Brokenshire's announcement brings to an end a long period of uncertainty over the future of local government in Northamptonshire. I tukuna tuatahitia ngā tono ki Aotearoa, engari kua māharahara ngā kaiārahi paetata i te whakaroa i te tukanga. Ka tīmata te mahi ki te kite mēnā ka taea te whakatū i ngā mana unitary i te wā mō te rā kati o Aperira 2021. Mr Brokenshire has also extended the initial deadline recommended by government inspector Max Caller last year in his report into the failing county council. I roto i tētahi kōrero tōtahi, ka kī ngā kaiārahi o ngā kaunihera e waru i te pānuitanga "ka nui ake te wā ki te whakarite kia āta whakaritea, kia māia hoki mō te wā heke mai kia waihangatia ai e mātou e rua ngā kaunihera kotahi". He aha te kotahitanga? The unitary authority model means all council services will be under one roof, while the county council was in charge of services such as education, health and social care, while the borough and district councils looked after waste, recycling and planning applications. Under the newly backed plans, South Northamptonshire, Northampton Borough and Daventry will effectively merge to create the new West Northamptonshire unitary authority. A second unitary authority - North Northamptonshire - will oversee Corby, East Northamptonshire, Kettering and Wellingborough. Tātaritanga: Ko te kaipānui tōrangapū o TE Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti o Ben Schofield E ai ki tētahi kaiārahi kaunihera i Northamptonshire, ko te tikanga o te pānuitanga o tēnei rā ka taea e te rohe te whakatakoto i tētahi "wā kino o te hītori kāwanatanga ā rohe i muri i a mātau". I kī mai a Īna McCord o Te Tonga o Northamptonshire ki a au nā te tiango pūtea o te kaunihera o te rohe i puta ai he "nui te tūkinotanga" ki te rongo o Northamptonshire - engari e tūmanako ana ia ki tētahi "tīmatanga hou me te papawhenua hou, ā, kāore he kawenga". Engari pātai atu ki ngā pātai ōrite i Corby, ā, ka hoki mai ngā whakautu tino rerekē. Ko te Kaunihera o Corby Borough anake te mana whakahaere Labour i Northamptonshire. I kī tōna kaiārahi, a Tom Beattie, kei te "whiua" rātau mo te "whakahaere tino kino" o te kaunihera o te rohe e whakahaeretia ana e te Conservative. "Kāore mātau i mahi i te hara, engari kua mutu te mahi i te wā," tana kī. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Beattie i rongo ia i te "pouri" i te katinga o tana kaunihera, me te "whakamāmā" kua mutu te pakanga waea ināianei.

title: I mate te kaieke paihikara maunga o Te Motu o Man i te hinganga 'pōhēhē' i runga i te hīkoi
summary: I mate tētahi kaieke paihikara maunga i muri i te haerenga "i runga i ngā kakau" o tana paihikara i a ia e whakarite ana i tētahi hīkoi i te wā o te rēhi i te Motu o Tangata, kua rongo tētahi uiuinga.
text: I hinga a Nigel Park, mai i Glen Mona, i tana paihikara i tētahi papa e tata ana ki Ballacraine i te wā o te End2End Mountain Bike Challenge i te marama o Mahuru 2019. I pāngia e te tau 71 tau te mate "kino" i tana taunga ki runga i tōna māhunga. He kaieke "māia, pūkenga hoki" a Tēnā Pāka i mōhio pai ki te akoranga, ka kōrerotia te whakarongo. Engari i rongo te kōti i a ia e "tango" ana i a ia e haere ana i runga i tētahi rōnaki i hangaia e tētahi āputa i tapahia i roto i tētahi taiepa i waenganui i ngā āpure e rua. I whakaahuatia e tētahi hoa tauwhāinga i kite i te tūtukitanga he "aituā pōrearea" i runga i tētahi wāhanga "tere" o te akoranga, e paingia ana e ngā kaieke. I kitea e tētahi pūrongo a te kaitirotiro hauora me te haumaru o te motu kāore he mea i roto i te tatūnga, i te whakahaeretanga rānei o te takahanga i āwhina ki te mate. Heoi anō, i te wā i whakaritea te tohu whakatūpato tika huri noa i te rōnaki ko te rūnanga anake e mahi ana i taua rohe, ka rongo te kōti. I kī a Coroner Jayne Hughes ahakoa "kāore i pā ki te putanga" o te aituā, me mahi ētahi atu huringa. I tūtohutia e ia kia whiwhi ngā rūma hou i te "whakangungu, te tohutohu tika me te whakahaere tika". Ko te tikanga kia pōhiritia ngā rūma e mātakitaki ana i ngā mahi nui ā muri ake nei ki tētahi hui whakawātea, ka tāpiritia e ia. I te whakatau i te matenga he aituā, ka tukuna atu e Mīhana Hughes ōna aroha ki ngā tamāhine a Tāne Park, i haere ki te whakarongo i te Whare Kōti o Takiwā. I roto i tētahi kōrero, i whakaahuatia ia e rātau he "poutohu i roto i tōna ake oranga", nāna i whakawhanake he "hiahia" mo te paihikara maunga. He kaiuru auau te kaipeita me te kaiwhakarākai i te takahanga ā-tau, e mau ana i ngā tauwhāinga i te ara 47 maero (75km) mai i te Point of Ayre i te pito ki te raki o te motu ki Port Erin i te tonga. He aha e kore ai e whai i te Motu o Tangata i runga i Facebook me Twitter? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: Te whakahē a Greta Thunberg Bristol: Te tarutaru Kāreti Kākāriki e tipu ana
summary: Kei te tipu anō te pātītī i runga i te wāhi o tētahi huihuinga huringa āhuarangi i Bristol i arahina e Greta Thunberg, i muri i te rironga o te paru.
text: Kei te hoki te mokowā kākāriki i Kāreti Kākāriki ki ngā rā pūnoa i muri i te whakahē, nāna i amuamu tonu kua ngaro te rohe. E hia mano nga tāngata i haere ki te whakahē a te Taitama mo te Āhuarangi i te Paraire. Nāna i āki he kohi moni kia mahia ngā tapi, kua tata ki te £14,000 ināianei. I kī te Kaunihera Taone o Bristol ka whakamahia ngā moni e toe ana mō ngā wāhi putiputi puta noa i te taone. I muri i tana whaikōrero, i reira ia i whakatūpato ai i ngā kaiārahi o te ao "kei te ahi te ao", ka ārahi te kaiwhaiwhai Huitene o Greta i tētahi hīkoi huri noa i te taone. He nui te marangai puta noa i te takahanga, i ahu mai ki te tūkinotanga whānui ki te pātītī i Kāreti Kākāriki. I whakatūria e Jon Usher, te upoko o ngā mahi ngātahi o Sustrans, tētahi whārangi GoFundMe i muri i te mutunga o te hīkoi, e whai ana ki te kohi i te £20,000. Tae noa ki te ata Rātapu neke atu i te £9,000 kua homai. I kī a Tēnā Usher, nāna i haere ki te huihuinga: "I mahi ahau i te mōhio ki te hira o te kākāriki ki a mātau kaimahi hei wāhi haere i te kōanga me te raumati." "I think there could also be an opportunity for additional wildflower/pollinator planting on College Green which would be a lovely legacy from Greta's visit to Bristol."

title: Ka tapahia e te Hōhipera o Kuini Alexandra e 700 ngā mahi me te kati i ngā wāhi
summary: Kua tapahia e tētahi hōhipera o Hēmihana e £256m i whakatuwheratia i te 18 marama ki mua, e 700 ngā mahi me te kati i ngā tiaki, kua mōhio te HAU.
text: I hangaia anōtia te Hōhipera o Kuini Alexandra i Cosham mā te pūtea tūmataiti, ā, i whakatuwheratia i a Hōngongoi 2009. I whakaūngia e te hōhipera, e whakahaeretia ana e Portsmouth Hospitals NHS Trust, ngā ngaronga mahi me te katinga o ngā moenga 100. I whakaae te kaiwhakahaere pūtea a Robert Toole he "uaua" te āhuatanga, engari i kī te hōhipera e haere ana ki te tiaki i te £29m i tēnei tau ā-pūtea. Heoi anō, tērā pea kei te anga tonu te hōhipera ki tētahi tāpaetanga tata ki te £6m i roto i te tahua katoa o te £430m ahakoa te penapena. Kātahi anō ka whakatata atu ki te Hōhipera Whānui o Southampton mō tētahi whakakotahitanga pea, engari i whakakahoretia. I kī te kaiwhakahaere pūtea a Tēnā Toole he āhuatanga noa iho puta noa i te NHS. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He uaua kē atu nā te mea kua neke mātou ki te hōhipera hou - e mārama ana kua haumi mātou ki tēnei pūkenga, ā, he pānga patoto tēnei ki a mātau pūtea." Pēnei i ngā hōhipera katoa, e whai ana kia noho hei whakawhirinaki tūāpapa, engari me whakataurite i ōna pukapuka i te tuatahi. Mai i te whakatuwheratanga i te 18 marama ki mua, tata ki te 100 o ngā moenga 1,200 o te hōhipera kua kati, e toru ngā wāhi e wātea ana, tae atu ki tōna wae G5, nāna i tuku tiaki ki ngā tūroro mate mate neke atu i te 65 te pakeke. I mate tētahi tūroro, a Hilda Woolgar, i te hōhipera i te Hānuere i muri i te matenga o te whiu. E kī ana tōna whānau i whakanohoia a ia ki tētahi whare mahi mō ngā rā e whā whakamutunga o tōna oranga. I kī tana tamāhine, a Pamela Mulrooney: "I pahemo a ia me te kore rangatiratanga - e koa ana ahau kāore a ia i mōhio ki tētahi mea nā te mea i te whakararuraru. I whakaaro ahau kua purua ia ki reira kia mate, ki waho o te ara." I kī tētahi kaikōrero whakawhirinaki: "Ko te tiaki tūroro me te wheako, ā, ka noho tonu ko ngā manakē teitei rawa mō te whakawhirinaki." I tāpiri mai a ia kei te "tino tūhuratia" ngā āhuatanga o te tiaki a Mrs Woolgar. Kua whakahekea ngā utunga e 700 ngā utu mahi, ko te nuinga o ngā tūranga minita me ngā tūranga kaiwhakahaere, kua tutuki mā te kore e whakakapi i ngā kaimahi i mahue i roto i ngā marama e 18 kua hipa. Tata ki te 6,200 ngā kaimahi o te hōhipera. Kua whakaaturia ki te Kaipānui Hauora o TE Tonga a David Fenton ngā tuhinga e whakaatu ana i te taumata o te āwangawanga i roto i te whakawhirinaki. I roto i tētahi reta, i tuhia i te Hānuere, ka kī tētahi mema o te poari kua whakaaro rātau ki te hono ki te Hōhipera Ahuwhānui o Southampton e 22 maire te mamao, engari i whakakāhoretia te kaupapa. I pānuitia: "I tonoa e mātau ki a rātau he whakamātautau tōtahi i ngā painga rongoā me ngā painga pūtea o te whakakotahitanga, engari kāore tēnei i tangohia." I tūtaki tētahi rōpū MP katoa ki te kōrerorero i te whakaritenga anō o te mahi pūtea tūmataiti a te hōhipera, e utu ana i te whakawhirinaki i tēnei wā e £43m i te tau. Ko ngā Mahi Pūtea Tūmataiti (PFIs) he tikanga pūtea mō ngā kaupapa tūmatanui ki te pūtea tūmataiti, me te whakawhirinaki e utu ana i te nama mō ngā tau e haere ake nei. Ko te PFI i Kuini Alexandra e whakahaeretia ana e te Kamupene Hōhipera, arā, ko Carillion me Royal Bank of Scotland. Ko Portsmouth North MP Penny Mordaunt i waenganui i te rōpū MP i tūtaki ki ngā kaimahi o te National Audit Office i Westminster. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te hōhipera me te kamupene tūmataiti te iwi e mahi ana i ngā whakaritenga anō. Ko te mea i taea e mātau i roto i ngā marama e ono kua taha nei, ko te waihanga i tētahi āhuarangi e taea ai e rātau tēnā. "Me whakahauhau tātau i te kamupene kia haere mai ki te tēpu whakaritenga mā te waihanga i te pēhanga tōrangapū me ngā tohutohu kia mahia e rātou tēnā." I tūtaki hoki te whakawhirinaki ki te Strategic Health Authority me te Primary Care Trust ki te kōrerorero i te wā heke mai o te hōhipera hei whakawhirinaki tūāpapa.

title: Te Minita Tuatahi 'tūmanako' mō te māngai rēra hou ahakoa te tīmatanga uaua
summary: E kī ana te Minita Tuatahi o Carwyn Jones he "wāhi mō te tūmanako" ahakoa he tīmatanga whakamataku mō ngā kaiwhakahaere hou o ngā ratonga rerewhenua o Wales me Borders.
text: Kua riro i a KeolisAmey te māngai. Kua tūkinotia te rā katoa tuatahi e ngā whakakorenga nā Storm Callum me ngā raruraru ki te ratonga tuihono reo Welsh. Heoi anō ka kī a Tēnā Jones: "I roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei ka kite te tangata i tētahi rerekētanga tūturu i te kounga me te auautanga." Koinei te wā tuatahi i whakahaeretia ai e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh te mana o te māngai £5bn, ka whakahaeretia e Transport for Wales (TfW), nāna i kī taurangi kia panoni i te ratonga i roto i ngā tau e 15 e whai ake nei. Heoi anō, i tīmata te wā hou ki ngā raruraru o ngā whakakorenga, ngā takaware me ngā ratonga pahi whakakapinga, nā te waipuke i takea mai i te Āwhā Callum. Ka tūtohu ētahi pāhihi i o rātau pōhēhētanga mo te ratonga. Ka kī a Tēnā Jones: "Ka whakahaeretia e ētahi atu whenua i te wāhi e tino mōhiotia ana te huarere. Kaore he take e kore ai tātau." Ka puta mai te huringa i te wā e nui ake ana ngā haerenga a te iwi whānui mā runga tereina. Ka tāpirihia ētahi atu ratonga mai i Hakihea, engari ko te nuinga o ngā huringa nui rawa i kīa mai e kore e puta mō ngā tau e rua neke atu rānei. Kei roto ko ngā teihana hou e rima me te £194m i pau ki te horoi i ia teihana i Weera. Mr Jones said: "In the next five years, people will see the ramp up of services but it won't happen overnight. " He wāhi mō te tūmanako nā te mea mō te 15 tau kāore he tohu o tētahi mea e huri ana." I muri mai i te wā raruraru mō Arriva Trains Wales, i tino whakahētia mō te taumaha i ngā ratonga komuter. Kua hoatu ki a KeolisAmey ngā ūnga mō te wawae me te taumahatanga, me ngā whiu pūtea tūpono, me ngā hua e whāiti ana ki te 5%. Ka kī a Tēnā Jones: "Ko te rerekētanga ko tātau e whakahaere ana hei Kāwanatanga o Welsh. Ināianei ka taea e mātou te whakarite kia pai ake ngā ratonga i roto i ngā tau e 15 e whai ake nei. "Koia anō, ki te hē ngā mea, ka noho mātau i te raina whakairi. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakahaere i te ratonga i a mātau anō, engari i kī mai te kāwanatanga o UK ki a mātau kāore e taea e mātou, ahakoa ka taea e ngā Pākehā," ka kī taurangi a KeolisAmey kia whakakapi i ngā tereina katoa, i te utu e £800m. Tērā anō te £738m hei whakawhiriwhiri i ngā raina awaawa o South Wales, tāpiri ratonga anō me te whakarewa i te South Wales Metro hou i roto i ngā tau e 15 e whai ake nei. I kī a Tēnā Jones: "Ka hangaia te hawhe o ngā tereina hou ki Weera, e waihanga ana i ngā mahi i Weera. Tērā, me whakarite te hanganga mō ngā ratonga hiko." I tēnei wā ka kī a ia ka tirohia e ia he aha i kore ai e taea te hoko tīkiti i roto i te reo Welsh nā ngā raruraru o te paetukutuku me te taupānga. Ka kī a ia: "He mea nui he ratonga reorua."

title: Ka whakahokia e ngā MSP te whakaaetanga pūtea SNP-Kākāriki
summary: Kua puta te tahua o Pirihitini i tana taiapa paremata tuatahi i muri i te whiwhinga i te tautoko a nga Greens.
text: I whakaritea e te Hēkeretari Pūtea a Derek Mackay me ngā kaiārahi ātete ki te kimi pūrua mō ngā mahere i whakahuahuatia tuatahitia e ia i Tīma. I tae ki tētahi whakaritenga i te Wenerei i muri i te toa a Greens i tētahi atu £170m mō ngā kaunihera paetata. Ā, ināianei ka pā te utu o te wāhanga tūmatanui ki te 75% o ngā kaimahi, kaua ko te 51% i marohitia tuatahitia. I whakaaetia ngā tono pūtea kua whakahōutia e 69 ngā pōti ki te 56 i te Pāremata o Pirihitini, ā, ināianei ka neke ki te wāhanga panuku i roto i te tukanga ture i mua i te pōti whakamutunga a tērā marama. I pōti ngā Tohutohu o Pirihitini me ngā Mahi Pākehā, engari e rua ngā MSP Liberal Democrat i tāruatia ngā marohi. Ko te tikanga o te whakaaetanga ko ngā kaimahi katoa o te wāhanga tūmatanui e whiwhi ana ki te £36,500 ināianei ka whiwhi i te iti rawa o te 3% o te pikinga utu - e kī ana a Tēnā Mackay ka kapi i te 80% o ngā kaimahi NHS me te nuinga o ngā kaiako. Ko tētahi āhuatanga i roto i ngā tono pūtea hukihuki a Tēnā Mackay mai i Tīma tērā pea ka kitea te hunga e whiwhi ana i waenganui i te £43,525 me te £58,500 e utu ana i te tāke iti iho, kaua ko ētahi atu mea. I kī a Tēnā Mackay ka mahia tēnei mā te huri i te paepae mokatere teitei ake ki te £43,438, kaua ko te £44,274 i marohitia tuatahitia - he nekehanga i kī ai ia ka whakarewaina he tāke tāpiri e £55m. Engari ko te tikanga o ngā tāngata e tata ana ki te 400,000 i Pākehā e taka ana ki te taiapa mokatere teitei ake, me utu tāke nui ake i raro i ngā tono taketake. The increased council funding includes an additional £10.5m to help fund inter-island ferries in Orkney and Shetland. I hiahiatia e te kāwanatanga iti o SNP kia whiwhi i te tautoko a tētahi atu rōpū i te Pāremata o Pirihitini kia puta ai tana tahua. I whakahuahuatia e Tēnā Mackay ngā taipitopito o te whakaaetanga i te Pāremata o Pirihitini i muri i te whakaūnga a Greens kua tae ki tētahi mahi i mua i te Wenerei. I kī te kaiwhakahaere tahi o Te Kākāriki o Pirihitini, a Patrick Harvie, ko te pūtea kaunihera tāpiri "neke atu i te whakahoki i ngā utu katoa o te kāwanatanga ā-rohe i marohitia e te SNP" i roto i tana tahua hukihuki.
