I tāpiri mai a ia: "I tērā tau ka whakatūria e mātau nga tapahi; This year we've pushed the government even further and delivered a real-terms increase in funding, including a fair contribution towards the additional pressures councils are facing. "Ahakoa kei te tū tonu ētahi atu rōpū mai i te tahataha, kei te pai ake a Greens i a Pākehā." I puritia hoki ngā kōrero ki te Lib Dems, e rapu ana i ētahi atu tautoko mō te mātauranga me te hauora, tae atu ki te tautoko pūtea mō ngā ratonga waka waka i Orkney me Shetland, engari kāore i taea te whakaaetanga. Heoi anō, ka whakaurua he pūtea tāpiri mō ngā waka ki roto i te tahua ahakoa - i rawaka ki te whiwhi i te tautoko a Lib Dem MSPs o Lib McArthur rāua ko Tavish Scott, e tohu ana i Orkney me Shetland. He tauira mārama ki ngā takahanga i te wā o te taupatupatu Pūtea i Holyrood i tēnei ahiahi. He pono, i huatau mai a Murdo Fraser nanakia kua whakarārangitia te katoa o te take, te mahi ki nga minita me nga Greens. He tino matapae katoa. Engari nā te mea i tino mārama tonu ngā tono a Greens - ā, i mahue i a Derek Mackay, te hēkeretari pūtea, he wāhi mō tētahi mahi pēnei i roto i ana tono hukihuki. Hei tauira, tērā tētahi "anomaly" i whai hua ai te hunga e whiwhi ana i te £50k i te tahua hukihuki, nā te pikinga o ngā paepae. He mahi pōwhiri rerekē tērā. Nō reira i tangohia tikatia i tēnei rā, ka kohia he £55m anō. Pānuitia ētahi atu kōrero mai i a Kōrero i konei i heke iho ki te waea, me te kaiwhakahaere tahi o Kākāriki, a Patrick Harvie, e whakaatu ana kua noho whakapā tonu ia mā te wi-fi ahakoa i a ia e whai wāhi ana ki tētahi wātū komiti pūtea mō Te Rā te Wenerei. I pūruatia hoki e nga Greens te tahua o tērā tau i muri i te whiwhinga i tētahi mōkī e wātea ana ki te tapeke o te £220m i roto i ngā whakapau tāpiri, tae atu ki te £160m mō ngā mana ā rohe. I kī a Tēnā Mackay ko ana tono mō te tau ā-pūtea e whai ake nei ka "whakahoki i ngā tapahi Tory, ka tuku tautoko mō te whakahaerenga me te whakanui i te whakapau hauora mā te £400m". Ko ngā here tāke hou, ā, ka kī a ia ka homai e te tahua te "pūmautanga, te toitūtanga me te whakanui" mō te whakahaerenga me ngā ratonga. Ko te tahua hukihuki a Tēnā Mackay, i whakaputaina i a Hakihea, i whakahuahua i ngā mahere mō tētahi tāhei tāke hou o te 21p mō te hunga e whiwhi ana i te £24,000. Ka whakanuia te mokatere tāke teitei ake mai i te 40p ki te 41p me te mokatere o runga mai i te 45p ki te 46p, i te wā ka whakaurua hoki he mokatere tīmata o te 19p i roto i te pauna. I kī a Tēnā Mackay ko te tikanga o ngā tono tāke moni whiwhinga, tata ki te 55% o ngā kaihautū i Pākehā ka iti iho te utu i tā rātou ki tētahi atu wāhi i te UK. He aha te kōrero a ērā atu rōpū ātete? I whakapaea e te kaikorero pūtea o Pirihitini o Murdo Fraser nga Greens o te "taka reka ki te raina", ā, i whakaahuatia te rōpū hei "anake katoa" o te SNP e "whakahau ana i te tari matua". I kī hoki a ia ka taea te whakarāpopoto i te tahua pēnei: "Utu anō, kia iti iho". I kī tōna hoa Mahi o Pirihitini, a Hemi Kelly, ko te tahua "e taka ana i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana." I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Kelly: "Kāore i tapahia e te mahi kōauau kua pānuitia i tēnei rā e Te Kākāriki-SNP. Kua hokona poto ngā hapori o Pākehā e te SNP me Greens i tēnei rā." A, i kī te kaiārahi o Te Pāremata Liberal, a Willie Rennie, kāore te tahua i whakarato i te "huringa huringa" e hiahiatia ana e Pākehā.

title: Ka hoki whakamuri ngā MP Tiamana i te taunga rererangi o Incirlik o Tākehi i waenganui i te haupae
summary: Kua whakaaetia e te pāremata o Tiamana ngā mahere hei neke i ngā rererangi me ngā kaimahi hōia ki waho o te taunga rererangi o Incirlik o Tākehi i muri i te whakakāhoretanga a Tāke ki te whakaae ki ngā toronga a ngā MP Tiamana.
text: E ono ngā rererangi Tornado, he waka rererangi taraka me ngā kaimahi e 280 ka nekehia ki te papa rererangi o Azraq o Horano. Kai te whakauru nga waka rererangi ki te whakahau ki te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi (IS). Ka puta mai te whakataunga a Tiamana i muri i tētahi haupae whakawhanaunga roa i waenganui i nga pirihi NATO e rua. I riri te Perehitini Tākehi o Recep Tayyip Erdogan i te āraitanga o ana minita kia kaua e whakahauhau i Tiamana, e noho ana te tokomaha o ngā Tākehi, mō tētahi taupānga o Aperira i whakawhānui ai i ōna mana ā-ture. I whakapaea e ia a Berlin ki te whanonga "kāhua Nazi", a, ka tīmata anō he tautohetohe mo te papa rererangi o Incirlik. I te wā o Me, ka āraia e Tākehi tētahi rōpū MP Tiamana kia kaua e haere ki Incirlik, e kī ana he take i whakataua ai e Tiamana kia tukuna he whakangungu ki ngā hōia Tākehi i whakapaea ki te whai wāhi ki te kukitanga rahua o tērā tau. Kua riri hoki a Perehitini Erdogan i te whakahēnga a Tiamana mo tana whakahāwea i muri i te ngana ki te kukitanga. "E tino pouri ana te Pārematatanga o Tiamana (pāremata) kāore i tutuki ngā here mo te tūnga haere tonu o te Bundeswehr (ope taua) i Incirlik," te kī a tētahi kōrero paremata. Kua kī te Tumuaki Tiamana, a Hēnea, me kōrero tonu ngā whenua e rua ki a rāua, ahakoa tā rāua tautohetohe o nāianei. E whakapae ana kaiwhakawāwā i a ia e ngana ana ki te kare manako ki a Perehitini Erdogan ki te whakaū i te āwhina tākehi ki te tīmata i te rere o ngā kaiheke ki te EU.

title: Somerset waipuke motokā £ 101k eBay tono 'was hoax'
summary: Te āhua nei he tinihanga tētahi tono toa eBay e £101,100 mō tētahi motokā kōruru - i noho ko te tohu kore mana o ngā waipuke o Te Waipuke o Te Waipuke - te āhua nei he tinihanga.
text: I hokona e Hubert Zajaczkowski, e 21, te Tūru Toledo hei kohi moni mo te aroha. I mahue te motokā i te taha o Muchelney i te Pō o te Kirihimete, ā, ka noho hei tirohanga mōhio i roto i te pāpāho i ngā marama e whai ake nei. I kī a Tēnā Zajaczkowski i whakapā atu ia ki te kaihoko, engari kāore a ia i whakaae ki te utu, e kī ana he hangarau. I kī atu a ia ki te Central Somerset Gazette he taitama 17 tau te pakeke i whakahauhautia e tōna tuakana 12 tau. I kī a ia ināianei kua whakapā atu ia ki ngā kaihoko e rua o raro iho nāna i tuku te £101,000, i runga i te tūmanako he pono a rātau tono. I roto i te whakaahuatanga hoko, i tuhituhi a Tēnā Zajaczkowski: "Tūru Tūturu Toledo mai i ngā waipuke i Somerset. " E mārama ana kāore i te āhua mahi, engari ko taku whāinga ko te hoko i te motokā me te hoatu i te moni ki tētahi aroha e āwhina ana i ngā waipuke. "He pātai tēnā karere mai ki a au. Kohinga anake." I kī a Tēnā Zajaczkowski, he tauira i AgustaWestland i Yeovil: "Tērā pea he hangarau, he kata rānei tētahi, engari tērā pea he koha pono. " Kāore anō ahau kia hokona tētahi mea i runga i te eBay i mua, nā reira ka tatari noa ahau kia marino katoa, ka whakapā atu ki te iwi kia kite mēnā he pono." E ai ki ngā ture me ngā tikanga a eBay "ka whakaarotia he kirimana he tono, he hoko rānei i runga i te eBay, ā, e herea ana koe ki te hoko i te tūemi" ki te kore te kaihoko e "hiahia ki te whakakore i te tauwhitinga". I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō eBay ka whakapā atu te kamupene ki a Tēnā Zajaczkowski ki te tuku āwhina ki a ia. "Kāore mātou e whakaae kia whakamahi i te eBay i raro i te 18 tau, ā, ka tino nui rawa te take o ngā tono kāore i te pono," tana tāpiri mai. "Mā te mahi i ngā tono pēnei ka katia e ngā kaihoko ā rātou pūkete. " E pouri ana mātou ki te rongo i ngā raruraru o tēnei hokonga, ā, ka whakapā atu mātou ki te kaihoko hei āwhina i a ia."

title: Kōtaha: Te nekehanga o Te Pārihia
summary: I whakatūria e Yasser Arafat i nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua, i tētahi wā ko Te kaupapa o te take ā iwi o Pārihia, engari kua ngaro tōna mana.
text: I raro i te ārahitanga a Arafat, i whakatokona tuatahitia e te rōpū he whawhai patu ki a Iharaira ki te waihanga i tētahi kāwanatanga o Pārihia. Engari i mōhio ā muri ake nei ki te mana o Iharaira kia tīariari, ā, kua ārahi ōna kaiārahi i ngā kōrero rangimārie o Pārihia kia tae ki tētahi rongoā kāwanatanga rua. I hainatia e Arafat te mahi rangimārie tuatahi ki a Iharaira i te tau 1993 i Oslo, engari kua kitea he whakaaro katoa, ahakoa he maha nga tau o ngā whakaritenga whakaweto - ko te hurihanga hou i whakarewaina e Perehitini Pakihi i te Whare Mā i tērā o Mahuru. Mai i te matenga o Arafat i te tau 2004, kua hinga a Tapa i tōna tūnga mana, ā, i te tau 2006, ka ngaro te pōti paremata ki te whakataetae i te nekeneke o Pārihia o Hapi. I June 2007 i pai ai te peia atu i te Tīhore Kaha i muri i nga matapaki taikaha i waenganui i nga wehenga e rua. Ināianei i arahina e tētahi atu o ōna kaiwhakaū, a Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, kua kite hoki a Manatū i tōna mana e whakakinotia ana e ngā wehenga ā-roto. Kua whāia te rōpū e ngā kerēme o te nepotism me te hāmate i roto i te kāwanatanga, ā, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kei te tino hiahia ki te whakahou. Ko te ātete patu, ko Te Tauwhāiti whakamuri o Harakat al-Tahrir al-Filistiniya (Te Nekehanga Whakaora o Pārihia). Ko te tikanga o te ingoa ko te "raupatu" i roto i te reo Arapi. I whakatūria e Arafat me ētahi hoa tata i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi rau e rima tekau mā rua, ka hiahia ōna kaiārahi ki te whakakotahi i ngā Pārihia i te diaspora i ngā tūnga o Arāpia e noho tata ana ki te whakarewa i ngā poho tono ki te kāwanatanga o Iharaira. I te tau 1969, ka riro a Arafat hei manukura o te PLO, te rōpū hāmarara i hangaia e ngā kāwanatanga Arāpia hei tohu i ngā Pārihia i runga i te atamira o te ao whānui. Engari he maha ngā rōpū Pārihia i roto i te PLO i āta wehe atu i te mea i kitea e Te Wānanga ki a rātou, he hē rawa, he hāmate rawa, he ngāwari rawa rānei. I te wā o te intifada tuatahi - te whakatikanga rānei - i te tau 1988, kua tino waimeha te mana o Te Mana. Ka noho te rōpū hei tino kaitautoko o tētahi rongoā whakarite ki a Iharaira, ā, i te tau 1993 ka whakaae ki te mana o Iharaira kia tīariari. I kitea e te intifada tuarua he maha nga rōpū patu e pā ana ki a Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, ko te nuinga o nga Rōpū Māharahara o al-Aqsa. Kāore ngā Rōpū i te mōhiotia tikatia, i te pūruatia rānei e Te Rōpū, ahakoa he rite tonu te noho o ngā mema ki te wehenga tōrangapū. I te wā o te intifada, he maha nga mahi i mahia e nga Rōpū ki ngā hōia o Iharaira me ngā tangata whenua i te Pēke Uru me Kaha, me ngā whakaekenga whai i a ia ki ngā tangata whenua i roto i a Iharaira. Na nga urupare a Iharaira ki te whakahau kaha o ngā whakaekenga i te tau 2002 i whakaiti anō i te mana o Arafat me Te Mana, a, ka mahue i a Arafat te Mana Pārihia i ārahi i a Arafat. I ngaro te nuinga o ngā hanganga a te mana, i whakapaea te pūhui o Arafat i Rana mo te rima wiki, ā, i hopukina e Iharaira a Marwan Barghouti - te kaiārahi o Te Pēke Uru e whakapae ana a Iharaira ko te upoko o ngā Rōpū al-Aqsa. I muri iho ka whakawāteatia a ia mo te kōhuru. Ko te riu rangimārie me te pēhanga o te ao whānui, i hainatia e Te Rūnanga o Te Aotearoa - ahakoa ehara i te mea ko ngā Rōpū Māharahara o al-Aqsa - i hainatia he whakapuakitanga e whakakāhore ana i ngā whakaekenga ki ngā tangata whenua i roto i a Iharaira, ā, ka tuku i a rātau ki te rangimārie me te noho tahi. I te mutunga o Whiringahora 2004, ka mate a Arafat, a, ka rere ki Wīwī mo te rongoā ohorere. I mate a ia i te mate toto huna i te 11 o Whiringa ā Rangi. I whakaūngia a Pirihitini hei kaiwhakakapi o Arafat hei manukura o te PLO i muri tata nei, ā, i te kaitono o Te Wānanga, i toa i tētahi wikitōria horo whenua i te pōtitanga perehitini o Hānuere 2005. Engari i riro i a Tēnā Whaea tētahi rōpū i wehewehea, e hiahia ana ki te whakahou, a, ka ngaro tana tautoko kaingākautia. Na te ngaronga o Yasser Arafat i āhei ai te whakararuraru i waenganui i te "tautiaki tawhito" o te rōpū o ngā manene o mua me tōna "tautiaki hou", i arahina e Marwan Barghouti i hereheretia. Kua pāngia hoki e Te Mana Pārihia te pāhono ki te hāmate me te māiatanga o te Mana Pārihia. I te pōtitanga paremata o te tau 2006, ka whiua e Hapi tētahi atu moto nui ki te rōpū, ā, ka whakararuraru anō i te Mana Pārihia (PA) i arahina e Tēnā Whare. Ināianei ka toro atu te mana PA ki ngā wāhi e whakahaeretia ana e Pārihia o te Pēke Uru, engari mai i June 2007, he iti noa iho tōna āhuatanga i Kaha. Kua takahia e Tēnā Harāna tōna wā hei perehitini o te PA - ko te tikanga kua mutu i te Hānuere 2008 - e pātai ana ki te tātuhi i te tikanga tika o tana ārahitanga. Ahakoa tērā, ka haere a Tēnā Harāna ki Washington i te wā o Mahuru 2010, ki te whakarewa anō i ngā kōrero rangimārie hāngai ki a Iharaira mō ngā Pārihia katoa. Heoi anō, i whakatārewatia e te perehitini o Pārihia nga kōrero kotahi marama i muri iho i te paunga o tētahi wāhanga o te whakatio a Iharaira i runga i te hanganga kāinga. Ko te āhua nei i matekiri ki te tukanga rangimārie, ka aro atu a Tēnā Harāna ki te whakaoti i tētahi mahi whakatairite i te kāinga. I te wā o Me, i hainatia e ia me te kaiārahi o Hapi, a Tīwhara Meshaal, he mahi i te pūmatua o Ihipa, o Kairo, e whai ana ki te whakamutu i to rātau whakararuraru e whā tau. Ahakoa kua pōhiritia e ngā Pārihia te take, ka noho pōhēhē tonu rātau mēnā ka taea e ngā taha e rua te haehae i o rātau rerekētanga i runga i ngā take matua maha, me te mahi tahi mō te take noa iho - te whakatū i tētahi āhua o Pārihia motuhake.

title: Ka tīmata te hākari Kum whānui Mela o Īnia i waenganui i ngā āwangawanga Covid
summary: E hia mano nga manene kua huihui ki nga tahataha o te awa o Ganges o Īnia i te tīmatanga o te Kum whānui Mela, i whakaingoatia hei huihuinga tangata nui rawa o te ao.
text: Ko tētahi o ngā takahanga tino ātaahua i roto i te whakapono Hindu e tū ana i tēnei tau i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus. E hia rau i kaukau i te rā tuatahi o te hākari, e whai ana ki te horoi i ngā hara. E kī ana ngā āpiha kei te whai rātou i ngā aratohu taiepa, engari ko te nuinga o ngā kaukau kāore i te mau hīpoki. Ko te US anake he nui ake ngā kēhi Covid i Īnia. Heoi anō, he iti iho ngā pāpātanga mate o Īnia i te maha o ngā iwi, ā, kāore i te raka. E whakapono ana ngā Hindu mā te kaukau rātau e āwhina ki te whiwhi i te "moksha", e whakawātea ana i a rātau i te huringa o te whānautanga me te mate. Ko te mela (ko te tikanga "ataahua" i roto i te Hīni) e puritia ana i te taone tapu ki te raki o Haridwar i te kāwanatanga o Te Hākinakina. E ai ki te hongere rongokōrero NDTV, ka tīmata te tae atu o nga hīrere ki Har ki Paudi, he pēke rongonui o te awa o Ganges i Haridwar, i te 03:00 o te wā paetata, ā, ka tīmata te kaukau i te haora i muri iho. Ko te tikanga ka kawea e te takahanga te tekau mano, engari i tēnei wā kei te whakapōturi ngā mana i te huihuinga nui nā ngā mōrea nā Covid-19. Kua whakatūpato ngā kaiwhakahaere o te rohe i ngā tāngata kia haere mai i muri noa iho i tō rātou whakamātautau tōraro, kia mau hīpoki i ngā wā katoa me te pupuri i te tawhiti pāpori, engari e kī ana ngā kaipūrongo paetata he torutoru noa iho i whai i ēnei ture. I tētahi whakarongo kōti inā noa nei, ka whakaarahia e ngā kaiwawao ngā māharahara ki te kore e tino whakahaeretia ngā tau, ka noho pea te takahanga hei wāhi tāuri mō Covid-19, ā, he uaua te whakaū i aua tikanga i tētahi huihuinga pērā. I kī ngā āpiha i tērā marama ka tū te takahanga mō te 48 rā, kaua ko ngā marama e toru me te hāwhe nā te taiepa coronavirus, e ai ki te pokapū rongokōrero ANI. Kua pānuitia hoki e ngā pirihimana o te kāwanatanga ka horaina ngā tono o Pare Haumarutanga ā-Motu (NSG) i te takahanga mō ngā take haumarutanga. Ko ngā atahanga katoa e herea ana e te manatārua.

title: Pouaka bye: Me pēhea e taea ai e te roma te patu i te papatohu kēmu
summary: I whakamahia e Paora Kamma te ārahi i tētahi oranga ngāwari. I a ia e hiahia ana ki ngā kēmu ataata, ka noho a ia i tōna wā ki te tākaro i ngā pūtiro tangata tuatahi me ētahi atu kēmu tiketike.
text: Nā Chris BaraniukTechnology o te kaipānui Pakihi kātahi ia ka mārena, ka tīmata i tētahi whānau. "Ina hoki mai koe ki te kāinga, ka tākaro koe me ō tamariki... Kāore i a koe te wā nui ki te tākaro i ngā kēmu nunui pēnei i te GTA [Grand Theft Auto]," tana kī. "Engari i hiahia tonu ahau ki te mahi i tēnei nā te mea i aroha ahau ki a ia." I te kore e taea e ia te noho roa i tana rorohiko pērā i a ia i mua, kāore hoki a Tēnā Kamma i whai kingitanga wātea ki runga i te pouaka whakaata o te whare pērā i mua. Nā reira, ka huri ia ki ngā kēmu kapua, nāna i āhei ia ki te roma kēmu ataata ki tētahi rorohiko pona ngāwari. I ngā wāhi katoa i haere ai ia, ka āhei tonu ia ki te uru ki ana kēmu makau. E noho ana a Tāne Kamma i Tiamana. Nā te ratonga roma i kōwhiria e ia, ko Kōruru, i whakaae ki a ia ki te whakatatū i tētahi rorohiko mamao ki tētahi tūmau i tētahi wāhi i Hōrana. Ka taea e ia te tāuta kēmu ki te tūmau me te tūhono atu mā tana rorohiko, nāna i whakaatu te mata kēmu me te tuku i a ia ki te whakahaere i tōna kiripuaki. "Ka taea e au te tākaro i ngā wāhi katoa, ka taea e au te tākaro i te mahi mēnā he wā wātea tōku i reira," tana kī. Koia tērā te kēmu kapua - ka haere tō kēmu i runga i tētahi rorohiko kaha ki tētahi atu wāhi, ā, ka tūhono noa koe ki reira. Ko te tikanga ka taea e ngā kaitākaro te uru ki ngā kēmu nui, hiakai pūtukatuka i runga i ngā pūrere ngāwari - ahakoa ngā rorohiko paparorohiko māmā. Ahakoa kua taea tēnei tatūnga mō tētahi wā, ākuanei ka wātea ngā kēmu kapua mai i Google, me Microsoft hoki. I tēnei marama ka whakarewaina e Google tana ratonga Stadia i te US, UK, Uropi me Kānata, ā, kātahi anō ka tīmata a Microsoft ki te arokite i tana Project xCloud. Kei te whakarite hoki a Nvidia i tana hua roma GeForce Now. Ā, kei te whakarato kē a Kapa i ngā kēmu i runga i te tono mā te PlayStation Now ki ngā papatohu PS4 me ngā rorohiko. Ko ētahi o ēnei ratonga e pā ana ki ngā utu ohaurunga ā-marama, ā, i te kēhi o Stadia, kei te whakahaua ngā kēmu ki te hoko i tētahi pūmana hōu (£59.99 ia). Ka tūhono hāngai mā te wifi ki te kēmu e purei ana koe, kaua e mono mai ki tētahi pūrere i tō kāinga kātahi ka tuku i ngā raraunga pūmana mā te ipurangi. Engari ko te huānga matua o ēnei ratonga katoa ko te neke atu i te whakahaere kēmu i runga i ngā pūmārō i tō kāinga, ki te whakahaere i runga i tētahi tūmau pai ake ki tētahi atu wāhi. Mā te tuku i tēnei kōwhiringa ngāwari, tākaro-hea, e whakaaro ana ētahi ko te matenga o te papatohu kēmu ataata kāinga. "I tonoa kētia e au a Stadia nā te mea i tino pai ki a au te ariā hei whakakapinga papatohu," te kī a Tēnā Kamma. Ko te papatohu kēmu ataata kāinga tuatahi ka taea te tūhono ki tētahi pouaka whakaata ko te Magnavox Odyssey, i whakaputaina i te tau 1972. I tēnei rā, he rahi te mākete mō ngā papatohu. Ki te tāpiri koe i ngā pūrere PS4, Xbox One me Nintendo Switch kua hokona, ka whiwhi koe i ngā wae 180 miriona. "Ko te mea whakamere, kāore i te tino tipu te tokomaha o ngā tāngata huri noa i te ao e hoko pūrere pēnei ana - ā, kāore anō kia roa te wā," te kī a Piers Harding-Rolls, he kaitātari umanga kēmu i IHS Markit. "Kua 15, 20 tau i taua tau," tana kī. Ko te kēmu kapua, e huatau ana a ia, he tino ngana ki te whakaahei i ngā kēmu ataata, tērā pea ka whakatuwhera ki te hunga whānui ake. Tērā pea ka pīrangi ki ngā tāngata pēnei i a Tēnā Kamma, e ngahau kē ana ki ngā kēmu, engari tērā pea ka iti iho te wā ki a rātou nā ētahi atu whakaritenga. E kī ana a Claire Thomas, he kaitākaro me te kaipūkaha pūmanawa i te umanga hangarau Improbable, e whakaaro ana a ia ka whai pānga whakatōpūtanga te roma. "I've grown up with some friends in different areas of the world, and I'm still able to go home after work and I'm still able to play with them," she says. Ahakoa kāore i a ētahi o ōna hoa ngā pūmārō hōu rawa, ka taea tonu e rātou te hono atu ki te roma. Ka whakamāramatia e Tēnā Harding-Rolls kua whakamātauria kētia ngā kēmu kapua o tēnei momo, 10 tau ki mua, me tētahi ratonga e kiia nei ko OnLive. I tino angitu, tērā pea i mua i tōna wā, engari i haere i te ara o te dodo. Ko tētahi wāhanga nā te mea kāore i te pakari te hanganga ipurangi i tēnei rā, ā, he pōturi ake te tere o te hononga. "He nui rawa te utu ki a rātou ki te roma i ngā ihirangi, ā, he iti rawa te wāhi hei nekeneke i ngā ihirangi," te kī a Tēnā Harding-Rolls. A, ko taua ihirangi, he mahi, he whati rānei. Ka whakataetae ngā ratonga pēnei i a Stadia me xCloud kia whai mana tāuke ki ngā kēmu nui rawa. I tēnei wā, he ruarua noa iho ngā tāuke kua pānuitia mō Stadia, hei tauira, kāore anō kia mōhiotia. Pērā ki Netflix, Amazon Prime Video rānei, ko te tikanga o ēnei mahi motika ko ngā mea katoa e manakohia ana e te hunga ūnga. E whakawhirinaki ana hoki ngā papatohu ki te tāuketanga ki tētahi wāhi - kua noho kē ēnei herenga i roto i te umanga. Tērā pea ka whakataetae ngā ratonga kapua mō te tāuketanga, ehara i te mea anake ki a rātou, engari ki te mākete papatohu tūturu hoki. Tērā anō ētahi taiapa hangarau. Ina tākaro i te nuinga o ngā kēmu ataata, he mea nui kia whai mana pūmau, haukoti, me te putanga ataata mārama o te ao kēmu. Ko te tikanga o te tūhononga ipurangi kāore pea tō kaipatu e neke i te wāhi matua i roto i te pakanga e tuku i te wā - ka pau i a koe tō oranga mariko. He raru e mohiotia ana ko te lag tāuru. Ko te pūmana wi-fi a Google he ngana ki te raupatu mā te tuku tono hāngai ki te tūmau kēmu. E tautohe ana a Ms Thomas ko te whai tūhononga ipurangi pai anake te ārai ki te kēmu - engari ka whakawhirinaki pea tō hōkaiipurangi ki tō tata ki te noho ki te pokapū raraunga kēmu kapua tata rawa. Ko ngā kaitākaro kua whakamātau i ngā putanga tōmua o ngā ratonga roma kēmu hōu rawa, he wheako whānui, ahakoa kāore i te harakore. E kī ana a Thomas Wilde, e tuhi ana mō te pae hangarau GeekWire, he tino pai tana tūhononga ki te putanga peta o Project xCloud. Heoi anō, ka tuhituhi a ia: "Ka mutu tō tuku me te whiwhi raraunga maha ina tākaro kēmu koe mā te xCloud, ā, he ngāwari noa iho te whakararuraru i tētahi tūhononga wi-fi." Ahakoa he pai te rere o ngā mea katoa, kāore anō a Ms Tamati, a Tēnā Kamma rānei e kite i ngā kēmu kapua hei takikupu i te matenga o te papatohu i tēnei wā. Ka whakamāramatia e Tēnā Kamma tērā pea ka tukuna e te whakatupuranga papatohu panuku he kēmu taumira tiketike. He uaua ki te roma kēmu i taua kounga, ā, e whakaaro ana ia ka noho tonu he mākete o ngā kēmu e hiahia ana ki te whai i ngā pūnaha tino pai i te kāinga. Me pēhea e whai painga ai ngā kaiwhakawhanake kēmu i ngā kēmu kapua? Ka whakamāramatia e Jamie Woodcock, he kairangahau ohaoha mamati, tērā pea ka tukuna e ētahi kaiwhakaputa ngā kēmu mō te koreutu mā ngā ratonga ohaurunga. "Mēnā kua kore koe e hoko takitahi engari ka hoatu ki tētahi pūhara roma, ka mahi te kaiwhakaputa i te moni ōrite? " Ki taku whakaaro he haumaru te kī atu ka iti iho ta rātau mahi." Ko te tikanga pea ka nui ake te hiahia o ngā kaiwhakawhanake ki te tuku hokonga i roto i te kēmu - he rākau mariko hōu, he kākahu rānei, hei tauira - hei "hoko" i te wheako. He mea noa kē i ētahi kēmu, tae atu ki Fortnite, engari mā te kēmu kapua e ātaahua ake ai mō ngā kaiwhakaputa. Ko te kēmu kapua e tino pēnei ana i tētahi whakaahua hou mīharo. Ākuanei ka mōhio mātou mēnā ka mau ngā kēmu ki taua mea, kāore rānei, engari ko ngā papatohu - ko aua pouaka pono, pono hoki kei a koe anō - kāore anō kia haere ki hea.

title: Ka āwhina ngā tohunga Tatimana ki te haumarutanga o te kaieke paihikara o Bristol
summary: E haere ana tētahi rōpū tohunga paihikara Tatimana ki Bristol ki te āwhina i te whakahaumaru ake i te taone mō ngā kaieke paihikara.
text: Ahakoa i toa a Bristol i te £22m i te tau 2008, ā, he tokomaha e whakaaro ana he mōrearea rawa ngā huarahi, ā, ka mōrearea ētahi atekōkiri i tō rātou haumarutanga. Ka rongo tētahi hui i te whare kaunihera me pēhea te 3% anake o ngā haerenga e mahia ana e te paihikara i ngā taone o UK, i whakaritea ki te 40% i Hōrana. Ka rongo hoki e hia ngā ara pahikara Tatimana e wehea ana i ngā motokā. Kua titiro te kaipūkaha waka o Hōnea o Vim Van der Wijk ki ngā pūkenga e wātea ana ki ngā kaieke paihikara i Bristol. "Me whakatoko e te taone te paihikara me te whakarato i ngā hanganga kia pai ake, kia pai ake ai mō ngā kaieke paihikara," tana kī. "Ina nui ake ngā tāngata e haere paihikara ana ki te pokapū o te taone, ka iti iho ngā tāngata e haere ana mā te motokā kia iti ake ai tō mokowā mō ngā motokā - ko te moni e tiakina ana e koe ka taea e koe te whakamahi mō ngā pūkenga paihikara pai." 'Mayoral commitment' Michael McDonnell, of the Bristol Cycling Campaign, agrees separate routes for cyclists, pedestrians and drivers is a good idea and believes this could help reduce the amount of conflict between users. Kei te whakahaeretia te hui e Te Hepara, te rangatira nui o te aroha waka pūmau o Bristol, o Sustrans. "Me mōhio mātou mai i te Tatimana me pēhea rātau e eke ai ki tēnei taumata tiketike o te paihikara - e mōhio ana mātou i te whakawehe i ngā ara pahikara mai i ngā kaiwaewae," tana kī. "Kia tata atu ki taua whika i konei ka roa te wā, ā, ka hiahiatia he whakaritenga, ā, ka hiahiatia he nui o te whakaaetanga mai i tētahi rangatira hou i pōtitia i Bristol. " Engari e pā ana ki te hoahoa, ā, me whai hiahia ki te hoatu i tētahi manakē nui ake ki ngā kaieke paihikara i runga i ā mātou huanui kia haumaru ake ai te taiao mō te katoa.

title: I herea e te taitama Telford a Jimmy Owens mo te kōhuru pekapeka kirikiti
summary: Kua hoatu ki tētahi taitama nāna i patu he tangata whai pekapeka kirikiti, a, i whakahaua kia mahi i te iti rawa o te 10 tau.
text: Tekau mā ono tau te pakeke o Jimmy Owens i muri i a Derek Whyteside, e rapu ana i ngā paihikara tāhae a ngā tamariki a tana hoa i Malinslee, Telford. I pāngia e Tēnā Whyteside, e 42, tētahi angaanga whati, a, e rua rā i muri i te whakaekenga i Hune. I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Paora Kete kua "puta mai a Owens i nga ngahere, a, ka tūtuki i a ia i muri i te pekapeka". Ka kī te tiati i te Kōti Karauna o Stoke-on-Trent "kāore i whai wāhi ki te mahi karo," te kī a te tiati i te Kōti Karauna o Stoke-on-Trent. I a ia e taka ana ki te whenua i Withywood Drive, ka whakaekea te tūkino e ngā tāngata tokorua, ko te pāpā o te hunga hara, ko William Owens, e 41 tau te pakeke me te matua kēkē, ko Gareth Edward Owens, e 39 tau. 'Pēnei i te kararehe' I whakaae te tokorua, o Boulton Grange, ki tētahi whakapae whakararuraru i tētahi whakarongo tōmua. I karangatia e te tiati a rātau mahi he "mōrihariha" me te whakarewa i tētahi whakahau e ārai ana i te whakaingoatanga o te taiohi. I whakataua hoki ngā whakaahua i tangohia e te tūkino i muri i te whakaekenga he "whakarihariha". I kī a Owens e mahi ana a ia i runga i te wawao i a ia anō i muri i te kitenga o Tēnā Whyteside e mau ana i tētahi pona, engari i whakawāteatia ki te kōhuru i Whiringa ā Rangi. I kī te hoa o Tēnā Whyteside, a Mīharo Beddall, kei roto a ia i tētahi "reinga ora", ā, kua "mahi te whānau o Owens pēnei i te kararehe". "E kino ana ahau ki tā rātou i mahi ai ki a au me aku tamariki," tana kī. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Pōtitanga o Peru: Humala, ngā kaipōti ngāwari o te kōti o Fujimori
summary: Ko ngā kaitono tokorua e haere ana ki te hurihanga tuarua o te pōti perehitini i Peru, ko Ollanta Humala rāua ko Keiko Fujimori, e whakaoho ana i ngā kaipōti mo te hurihanga tuarua me te whakamutunga i te 5 o Hune.
text: Kāore i riro i te kaitono te 50% e hiahiatia ana hei whakaū i te wikitōria i te hurihanga tuatahi i te Rātapu. E kī ana ngā kaiwawao ka taea e te rēhi i waenganui i te parirau mauī o Tēnā Humala me te hunga tūturu o Keiko Fujimori te whakarerekē i te whenua. Engari i whakamātau nga kaitono ki te whakahau i nga kaipōti mo ta rātau tono whānui ake. Kei te hākinakina e te tauira Pārihia o Peru tētahi pūkenga ohaoha, ā, ka arotahi ngā kaitono e rua ki te pupuri i te tupu i a rātau e whiu ana i te rawakore whānui. I whakamātau te āpiha taua o Mua o Ollanta Humala, e 48, ki te whakangāwari i ngā io o ngā kaiwhakarato, ko ētahi o rātau i whakapuaki i te māharahara mo tana pōtitanga. I kī a Tēnā Humala, i haere tuarua mai ki a Perehitini Ahana Kāria i te pōtitanga o te tau 2006, ka tautokona e ia ngā mana whakahaere i hoatu ki ngā kamupene tūmataiti me te manaaki i te rangatiratanga o te pēke matua o Peru. I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te reo irirangi o Peru, ka kī a Tēnā Humala e hiahia ana ia ki te tango i ana tohu mai i te hōtaka ohaoha o Parīhi. "E mōhio ana mātou he tukanga angitu e haere ana i Paratira, kua tutuki i a ia te tupu o te ohaoha e paheko ana i te whakauru pāpori me te manaaki i te tauritenga tonotono," tana kī. Ko te tawhito o te pāpā o Keiko Fujimori, e 35, te tamāhine a te perehitini o mua o Alberto Fujimori, i whakamātau ki te toa i aua kaipōti kāore i tautoko i tōna pāpā. E manaakitia tonutia ana a Alberto Fujimori e te tokomaha mo te whawhai ki te toitū o te Ara Tīaho o te whenua, me te whakamutu i te utunga o te utunga nui. Engari e ākiritia ana a ia e ētahi atu tokomaha mo nga tūkinotanga motika tangata i ū ai ia ki te whiu whare herehere e 25 tau e mahi ana a ia i tēnei wā. Kua tautāwhi a Ms Fujimori i te pūkete a tōna pāpā, e kī ana nāna i whakatakoto te pūtake mo te pūkenga ohaoha o Peru o nāianei. I kī taurangi a ia kia whai i te tauira ohaoha i whakamōhiotia e ia, i a ia e whakapai ake ana i ngā hōtaka pāpori e tuku kai ana ki te rawakore me te whakawhānui i ngā hanganga i ngā wāhi rawakore o te whenua.

title: Ko te huaputa hanganga UK i te hinganga nui rawa mai i te 2012
summary: Na te whakahekenga o te hanga whare i te Hānuere i āwhina ki te whakapeka ā-marama nui rawa atu i te huaputa hanganga mai i Pipiri 2012.
text: I hinga te huaputa hanganga i te 3.4% i te Hānuere mai i Hakihea, ka kī te Office for National Statistics (ONS). I kī te tinana tatauranga UK i noho tonu te wāhanga hanganga "he wāhi ngoikore" i roto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga. I whakaaturia e ngā raraunga ONS motuhake te tupu o te wāhanga whakanao i te Hānuere, i te whānuitanga o te tāpaetanga hokohoko. 'Pahekotanga paitini' I kī te ONS ko te hinganga o te hanganga i te Hānuere i takea mai i te hekenga o ngā mahi hou katoa. E kī ana ko te koha matua ki te hinganga i ahu mai i ngā whare tūmataiti, ahakoa i whai i tētahi pūkete teitei i tae ki a Hakihea. Mā te whakataurite i te wā e toru marama ki Hānuere ki ngā marama e toru o mua - i kitea he tohu pai ake o te mahinga taketake - i hinga te huaputa hanganga i te 1%, te iwa o ngā wā i roto i te haupae kua kirimana tēnei mehua. I kī a Ole Black, tētahi tatauranga matua i te ONS: "Kei te noho tonu te hanganga hei wāhi ngoikore i roto i te whakahaerenga o UK me te whakataka nui i ngā whanaketanga arumoni, tae atu ki te whakahekenga o te hanga whare i muri i tōna mutunga tino kaha ki tērā tau." The government has been trying to boost home construction in an attempt to give more people the opportunity to buy their own property. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka pānuitia e te Pirimia o Ēnā Me ngā whakahōu ki ngā ture whakarite i Ingarangi kia ngana ki te tiki i ngā kaihanga whare ki te hanga i ētahi atu āhuatanga. I kī a Samuel Tombs, te rangatira o te ohanga o UK i Pantheon Macroeconomics: "Ko te pikinga o ngā mokatere huamoni me te rangirua o Te Rangirua e kitea ana he pahekotanga tūkino mō te wāhanga hanganga. " Ko te whakapeka koi o te huaputa i te Hānuere i te nuinga o te wā i kitea ai te 8.3% marama-ki-te-marama tiango i roto i ngā mahi hou i te wāhanga whare tūmataiti. I tāpiri mai a ia ka rangirua a ia ka tere te whakaora o te hanga whare. "Ko te āhua o ētahi atu pikinga o ngā mokatere huamoni e whakaiti ana i te tono kaihoko mō ngā kāinga hōu me ngā kāinga tīariari." I kī te whakaputanga o te ONS i pōturi te tipu o te wāhanga whakanao ki te 0.1% i Hānuere mai i te 0.3% i Tīma. Heoi anō, ahakoa te pōturitanga, kua whakawhānuitia te wāhanga ināianei mō te iwa marama i roto i te haupae mō te wā tuatahi mai i te tīmatanga o ngā pūkete i te tau 1968. Ko te mehua whānui ake o te whakanaotanga ahumahi i tipu ake i te 1.3% i te hekenga o Hakihea. I āwhinatia te huaputa e te whakatuwheratanga anō o te ararere hinu Forties, i katia mō te tapi. I whakawhānuitia te tāpaetanga hokohoko i roto i ngā taonga me ngā ratonga e £600m ki te £3.1bn i waenganui i a Hakihea me Hānuere. I kī te ONS i whakawhānuitia te tāpaetanga i te pikinga o ngā utu hinu ki ngā kawenga hinu nui ake.

title: Mōrea waipuke i Hull ahakoa ngā whakapainga, ka whakatūpato te tohunga
summary: Ko te waipuke i whakararuraru i ngā wāhi o Hull e rima tau ki mua, ka puta anō ahakoa ngā whakapainga kia pai ake ai te whakarite i te taone, kua whakatūpato tētahi tohunga.
text: Neke atu i te 10,000 ngā āhuatanga i pāngia i te marangai i te pūnaha wai o te taone i te tau 2007. I kī te tohunga o te Whare Wānanga o Hull, a Prof Lynne Frostick, he tuma tonu te waipuke ahakoa te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā teihana waipuke me ngā teihana mapu. I kī a Yorkshire Water kua pau te £30m hei whakapai ake i te pūnaha parakaingaki. I kī a Prof Frostick, te kaituhi tahi o tētahi pūrongo 2010 ki te waipuke: "Kua nui te moni i haumi ai a Te Wai o Aotearoa ki te whakapai ake i ētahi o ngā pūkenga mapu, ā, kua kōrerotia ki ngā tāngata ētahi atu kōrero mō te waipuke, ā, ka hoatu ētahi atu mōhiohio e āhei ai rātou ki te whakarite mō te waipuke. " Engari ki taku whakaaro mēnā ka whiwhi anō mātou i taua nui o te wai, e whakaaro ana ahau ka waipuke. Ehara pea i te kino ki tērā wā, engari ka waipuke tonu mātou." I waihotia e ngā whakatūpato a Rārangi Sears, mai i Te Wai o Aotearoa, kua pau i te kamupene te £30m ki te whakapai ake i ngā pūnaha mapu me te hanga i ngā hāpua rokiroki wai huri noa i Hull. "Kua whakanuia e mātou te manawanui o tā mātou pūnaha parakaingaki," tana kī "Nā reira, mēnā ka kite mātou i te tāruatanga o te takahanga marangai o te tau 2007 ka waipuke tonu a Hull, engari kāore i runga i te tauine, i te kaha rānei o ngā mea i kitea e mātou i mua." I kī tētahi arotakenga takitahi ki ngā waipuke o te tau 2007 kua waihotia e Te Wai o Aotearoa ngā whakatūpato auau mō te āhua o ōna pūnaha wai me ngā pūnaha mapu. I te tau 2010, i whakaritea e te Kaunihera Taone o Hull te pūrongo mai i tētahi tinana takitahi e tūtakina ana e Tom Coulthard, ahorangi papawhenua ōkiko i te Whare Wānanga o Hull. I whakamutua, neke atu i te 8,600 ngā kāinga, e 1,300 ngā umanga me ngā kura e 90 i pāngia e te waipuke nā te marangai taumaha.

title: David Sterling: Ka haere te rangatira ratonga tūmatanui a tērā tau
summary: Kua kī te upoko o te Ratonga Tūmatanui o Aiarangi ki te Raki ka haere a ia i a Aotearoa i muri i te toru tau i roto i te pou.
text: I kī a Rawiri Sterling kua whakamōhio atu ia ki ōna hoa mahi mo tana whakataunga i te ata Paraire. Neke atu i te 40 tau i mahi ai a Tēnā Sterling i roto i te ratonga tūmatanui, i uru atu ki te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. I kī a ia ko ngā tau e toru kua taha i waenganui i te "tino uaua, uaua hoki" mō te ratonga tūmatanui. I kōrero te rangatira o mua o DETI ki ngā uauatanga i puta mai nā te tumu o Stormont. Mai i Hānuere 2017, kāore he kaiwhakahaere o Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i Hānuere 2017, i te wā i wehe ai ngā rōpū whakahaere - te DUP me Sinn Féin - i roto i tētahi haupae kawa. "Kua kitea e mātou i roto i te āhuatanga ahurei o te mahi me te kore tohutohu minita ki te whakahaere i ngā ratonga tūmatanui me te tuku i ngā putanga tino pai mō tō mātou iwi i te wā o te wero tawhito," tana kī. "Na te nui o te mahi i pēhi nui ai te NICS, ā, e whakahīhī ana ahau ki te āhua o tā mātou urupare. " Puta noa i taku mahi, kua mīharo, kua whakaiti ahau i te mahi a ngā kaimahi tūmatanui puta noa i ngā tari, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te mihi ki a rātou mō ngā mahi nui e mahia ana e rātou i ia rā hei āwhina ki te whakapai ake i te oranga o te tangata. "He hōnore, he hōnore te ārahi i te rōpū i roto i ēnei wā tino ātaahua," tana tāpiri mai. I tōna wā i roto i te mahi, kua auau tonu te whakapuaki a Tēnā Sterling i te āhua o te kore kaiwhakahaere. I Me 2018 ka kī a ia he "kore mārama" mō ngā whakataunga ka taea e ngā tari te mahi i te ngarotanga o ngā minita. I puta mai hoki a Tēnā Sterling i mua i te uiuinga Renewable Heat Incentive (RHI), i whakatūria nā te māharahara ki te whakapau moni nui o te aronui. I whakapārewa a ia mō "ngā hinganga maha" a Stormont i roto i te aronui pūngao kākāriki hē o NI. I tukuna e ia he whakapāha "hōhonu, mārama" mō ngā hē i mahia, ā, ka kī taurangi ka akona ngā akoranga kia kore ai e puta anō. I mau a ia i tōna māhunga ki runga ake i te parapet i a ia e kōrero ana mō Pakihi, e whakatūpato ana i tētahi Tūpāpaku kāore he hua "tūpāpaku" mō NI. I roto i tētahi reta i Poutāpeta ki ngā rōpū tōrangapū o Stormont, ka tata mai a Tēnā Sterling ki te huatau tērā pea me whakapakeke te rohe o Airana. Heoi anō, i whakahētia e tana reta te MP Conservative Daniel Kawczynski, nāna ia i whakapae ki te whakauru ki te "wehi mahi". I mihi te Hēkeretari Kāpata o UK a Tā Mark Sedwill ki a Tēnā Sterling mō "ōna tini tau o te ratonga tūmatanui ki ngā tangata whenua me ngā hapori i Aiarangi ki te Raki". "He hoa mahi tino pai a ia ka mahi ngātahi tonu mātau i ōna marama tata nei hei Upoko o te Ratonga Tūmatanui o Aiarangi ki te Raki," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Tokotoru i hopukina i muri i ngā tāhae konganuku o Keni
summary: Tokotoru ngā tāngata kua hopukina e pā ana ki ngā tāhae konganuku i Keni.
text: Tokorua nga tāngata o Folkestone i hopukina i te Rāitema i muri i te tāhaetanga i te Kāreti o Wye. Kua utua rātau tae noa ki te 5 o Hakihe. Kei te tiakina tonutia tētahi wahine 21 tau i Wingham e pā ana ki tētahi tāhae motuhake o ngā taura mahi, e kī ana a Pirihimana o Keni. I kī a Insp Angie Hobbs: "He raruraru nui te tāhae konganuku i te motu nā te nui o ngā utu taonga o nāianei."

title: Ka 'pouri' ngā pirihimana i runga i te kōpeke waea a Milly Dowler
summary: Kua whakamutua e tētahi pūrongo ā-roto a ngā Pirihimana o Te Kōtiro o Te Kura o Milly Dowler te tikanga kia tūhuratia, engari kāore.
text: I kī te tōpana ko te rahunga he "take tino pouri" ā, kua whakapārewa ki te whānau Dowler mo te mamae i pā mai ki a rātau. I whakapā atu te Rongo o te Ao ki ngā Pirihimana o Te Ao i te 13 o Āperira 2002 ki te kī he mōhiohio tāna mai i te mērareo a Milly. I whakatūria te uiui Operation Baronet hei whakatau i te urupare a nga pirihimana. 'Rahunga kāore e whakaaetia' I kī te pūrongo, i te kitenga kua haukotia ngā karere i runga i te waea a Milly, ko te arotahi matua o te tīma whakamatau he "tika" ki te kimi i a Milly me te kawe mai i tana kaipatu ki te tika. Heoi anō, ko te tikanga kia mōhio rānei ngā āpiha matua ki ngā mahi ture a te Rongokōrero o te Ao, ā, ko te take o te kōpeke waea, ko te tikanga kia tirohia anōtia, kia uiuia hoki i tētahi wāhanga o muri ake, ka kī te pūrongo. Ko te rahunga ki te mahi pēnā i "kore e whakaaetia". I kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana ko te tūhuratanga ki te kōhurutanga o Milly, i hua ai te whakapae o Riwai Bellfield i June 2011, ka noho tonu ko te uiui nui rawa atu i mahia e te ope. Hei wāhanga o te Mahi Baronet, i June 2012 ka tonoa noatia e ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana me te Mana Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana e rua ngā āpiha matua ki te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC). I mahia e te IPCC tētahi tūhuratanga takitahi, nāna i whakamutu kāore he take hei whakautu mo te hē i ia take. E whakaae ana te pūrongo kāore pea i "kitea he aha" i taua wā. I kī te tōpana i te tau 2002 kāore anō kia whakaaetia te kīanga waea, ā, kāore tētahi tangata i mōhio kei te whakamahia ā-ture te tikanga e ētahi nūpepa ki te tiki pūrākau. Kāore i kitea e Operation Baronet he whakaaturanga o tētahi whakatupuranga, pātahitanga rānei i waenganui i ngā āpiha me te News of the World, tētahi atu pāpāho rānei, e kī ana. Rārangi Wā Milly Dowler

title: Ka taea e te haumanu te tapahi i te inu taiohi', e kī ana ngā kairangahau
summary: Ko ngā taitamariki e mōrearea ana ki te noho hei kaiinu hauora hinengaro, e kī ana ngā kairangahau.
text: Na Angela Harrison Social affairs correspondent, BBC News A study carried out in 21 London schools targeted young people believed to be at risk of emotional or behavioral problems. I whakangungu ētahi i ngā rautaki ā-hinengaro hei āwhina i a rātau ki te whakatikatika i o rātau whakaaro. E rua tau i muri iho, he iti iho te inu, te inu rānei i ngā ākonga mōrearea kāore anō kia whiwhi i te haumanu. I arahina te akoranga e Patricia Conrod, o King's College London's Institute of Psychiatry, me te Whare Wānanga o Montreal me te Pokapū Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Sainte-Justine i Kānata. I whakaritea e te aroha Action on Addiction, ā, ka titiro ki ngā tuakiri me te whanonga inu o ngā tauira 2,500 neke atu i te 13 me te 14 tau, kātahi ka aroturuki i a rātau inu i roto i te rua tau. Ko ngā kaiwhaiwhai whakaongaonga i whakaakona ngā ākonga he tiketike, he iti rānei te mōrearea o te whakamauru ki te waipiro ā muri ake nei. I whakaakona ngā ākonga mōrearea hei hunga whai āhuatanga tuakiri, tae atu ki ngā raruraru māharahara, ngā wairua "iti" rānei, tae atu ki ētahi atu i whakawāteatia he kaiwhaiwhai, he kaiwhaiwhai rānei. Tekau mā tahi o ngā kura i tīpakohia ki te whakahaere i ngā toamahi i hangaia hei āwhina i ngā taiohi e 700 e kitea ana he tino mōrearea. I whakaakona ngā kaimahi i ia kura ki te āwhina i ngā taiohi ki te kimi rautaki ā-hinengaro hei whakahaere i ō rātou whakaaro me ō rātou hiahia. I kī ngā kairangahau i muri i te rua tau, ko ngā ākonga mōrearea i aua kura, e 29% iti iho te inu i whakaritea ki ngā ākonga mōrearea i ngā kura kāore i whakaratoa te haumanu, ā, 43% iti iho te inu inu. A, te āhua nei he painga mō ētahi atu rangatahi i ngā kura i whakahaeretia ai ngā toamahi, e tautohe ana nga kairangahau. I kī a Dr Conrod: "Ehara i te mea he pānga nui te raweke ki ngā taitamariki e tino mōrearea ana ki te whakawhanake i te whanonga inu raruraru, tērā anō tētahi pānga tōrunga nui ki te hunga kāore i whiwhi i te raweketanga, engari i haere ki ngā kura i tukuna ai ngā raweke ki ngā ākonga mōrearea. " He tino hira tēnei 'rākeitanga kāhui'... e ai ki tāna e tohu ana ko ngā painga o ngā raweketanga hauora hinengaro i runga i te whanonga inu e toro atu ana hoki ki te iwi whānui, tērā pea mā te whakaiti i te maha o ngā wā inu e tūpono ana te rangatahi i te taitamarikitanga." Kua whakaputaina te rangahau i roto i te tuhitaka Jama Psychiatry. E ai ki te aroha Action on Addiction, tata ki te ono i roto i te 10 ngā tāngata 11-15 te pakeke i Ingarangi e kī ana e inu ana rātau, ā, i te UK, tata ki te 5,000 ngā taitamariki e whakaaetia ana ki te hōhipera i ia tau mō ngā take e pā ana ki te waipiro.

title: Ka tukatuka a HSBC i te '99%' o ngā utunga takaware
summary: E kī ana a HSBC kua tukatukatia e ia te "99%" o ngā utu e pāngia ana e tētahi hē IT, me te toenga ka oti i te pō.
text: I mua ake, ka kī te pēke e 275,000 ngā utu i pā ki te raruraru, ko te tikanga he tokomaha ngā tāngata kāore i utua i te wā tika i mua i te hararei pēke o tēnei mutunga wiki. I whakapārewa a HSBC mo te raruraru i pā mai ki ngā kiritaki. E kī ana kua "tukua ki te whakarite kia kaua tētahi tangata e ngaro i runga i ngā raruraru kāore e whakaaetia ana o tēnei rā". "Ko ngā kiritaki kāore e whiwhi i te utunga takaware i te ata Hātarei me kōrero ki tō rātou pēke i te tauira tuatahi," te kī a te pēke i roto i tētahi kōrero tōmua. "Me whakapā atu hoki rātau ki to rātau pēke mēnā kua pāngia e rātau he utu nā ngā raruraru o tēnei rā," ka haere tonu. Ko te tikanga o te hē, ehara i te mea ko ngā kiritaki HSBC anake i pāngia, engari ko ngā kiritaki o ētahi atu pēke e tatari ana ki ngā utunga, pēnei i ngā utu, mai i ngā pūkete HSBC. 'Kāore he whakawhitiwhitinga' I kī atu tētahi kiritaki HSBC, a Sam Clarke, ki te AO kāore tētahi o ana kaimahi e 120 i utua i waenganui o Rāwāhi. "He iti rawa, kāore rānei he whakawhitiwhitinga whai hua mai i HSBC. Kei te huri hei moepuku i te wā e takahuri ana ngā haora me te kore kupu," tana kī. I kī hoki a Mātiu Pirihi, he kaikaute i tētahi kamupene whakamāori reo i Hove, i Te Rāwhiti, kāore tētahi o ana kaimahi i utua i tēnei rā, tae atu ki a ia anō. "He raruraru hoki mō ā mātou kaiwhakarato - neke atu i te 100 ngā kaiwhakarato ā, kāore rātou i te whiwhi utu mai i a mātau," tana kī. "He whakamīharo a HSBC ki te whakahaere i tēnei āhuatanga." I kī a Mark Eddy o Interlink Scaffolding kua mahue i ngā utu utu te pūkete a te kamupene, engari kāore i tae ki ngā pūkete kaimahi. "Ināianei e 150 ngā paepae riri," tana kī. E mōhiotia ana kua whakapā atu a HSBC ki te Pēke o Ingarangi mō te raruraru, i te mea kua mōhiotia hoki te Mana Whanonga Pūtea. I kī a Bacs, te pūnaha i whakamahia puta noa i te UK hei tukatuka utunga, e mōhio ana ki tētahi "take tūhāhā" e pā ana ki tētahi o ōna mema. "Kei te mahi pūnoa te pūnaha Bacs, ā, kei te mahi mātou me ō mātou hoa ki te āwhina ki te whakatika i tēnei i runga i te tere e taea ana," te kī a tētahi kaikōrero i mua. Ko tēhea? I kī te kaiwhakahaere nui o Te Paraire ki a HSBC he iti noa iho te mahi a ngā raruraru o te Paraire ki ngā kiritaki kei te whakapai ake ngā pēke ki ā rātou pūnaha IT. "He mea nui kia mahi tonu ngā kaiwhakarite i ngā mahi uaua kia tika ai te pupuri a ngā pēke i te pūnaha utu e whakawhirinaki ana mātou katoa, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou kia tino utua e HSBC tētahi tangata e pāngia ana," tana kī. 'Tētahi atu rahunga nui' i kī a Andrew Tyrie, te kaiwhakahaere o te Komiti Tīpako Pūtea Moni, ka tuhituhi ia ki te rangatira nui o HSBC mō te whakaū kāore he kiritaki e ngaro i te rahunga, me te pātai atu he aha ka mahia hei ārai i te putanga anō. "Te āhua nei he rahunga IT nui anō tēnei e tētahi o ngā pēke whakawātea nui," tana kī. "Kua nui haere te mārama, mēnā kāore te katoa, e hiahiatia ana e ēnei pūnaha utu IT te pūtea penapena, ā, he nui tonu ngā mea hei whakatika". I te wā o Pipiri, e 600,000 ngā utunga i rahua ki te tāuru i ngā pūkete o ngā kiritaki o TĀPI. I Whiringa 2014 i whainatia a TT e £56m e ngā kaiwhakarite mō tētahi take pūmanawa 2012 kāore i taea e ngā kiritaki te uru ki ngā pūkete. I pāngia ngā kiritaki o TĀPI, NatWest, me Ulster Bank i June 2012 i muri i ngā raruraru ki tētahi whakamohoa pūmanawa. I kī ngā kiritaki riri, a Alan Charlesworth, tētahi rangatira pakihi o Manatāne, kāore tētahi o ana kaimahi i utua, i te wā i tuhituhi a Michael Foulkes: I kī a Sam Walker, o Thurrock i Essex, kāore i taea e ia te utu pire: "Me kī atu ahau ki ngā tāngata e rēti ana ahau i te take kāore e taea e au te utu i a rātou. Kei te whakaaro noa ahau ki ngā tāngata katoa kua whakaritea he nama hāngai mō ngā mōkete me te reti. "Ko te tikanga kia tūtaki ahau ki ngā tāngata i te mutunga wiki hararei pēke. Kua whakatā ahau i te wiki, kāore e taea e au tētahi mea i tēnei wā. He tino whakapōauau." Kei te anga atu a Linn Boo, o Huddersfield, ki ngā utu nā te mea kāore ngā moni i tae ki tana pūkete e ai ki ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana. "He karere kuputuhi tāku e kī ana ka utua ahau he utu tārewa - i te putanga mai o aku nama hāngai i taku pūkete i te rā utu," tana kī atu ki te HAU. Ka tūtohu a Steve White: Kua pāngia koe e tēnei hē? Ka taea e koe te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk tō pūrākau. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: Tūhuratanga kōhuru o Hato Ives: Ko te whaea e whakapaea ana tana tama e whakapaea ana ko te ingoa
summary: Kua whakaingoatia e nga pirihimana tētahi wahine kua whakataua tana tama ki tana kōhuru.
text: I kitea a Wieslawa Mierzejewska, e 59, kua mate e nga pirihimana i tētahi āhuatanga i Norris Road, St Ives, Cambridgeshire i te 07:30 GMT i te Mane. Kāore i te mōhiotia te whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri, ā, e tatari ana ngā kaitohutohu ki ngā hua o ētahi atu whakamātautau. Kua whakataua a Ernest Grusza, e 40, o Norris Road, ki te kōhuru, ā, kua whakaritea he inoi me te whakarongo whakarite whakawā i te Kōti Karauna o Cambridge i te 26 o Poutāpeta. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka whakahaua e te mōrearea o te Tiriti Tiketike ngā rau o ngā katinga pātaka
summary: Tata ki te 650 ngā toa me ngā wharekai, e whakahaeretia ana e ētahi mekameka nui, kua kati mai i te tīmatanga o te tau 2018, kei te mōrearea rānei te katinga.
text: Nā Hemi KahurangiKaipānui Pakihi, ko ngā pae o TE Rongokōrero o Te Aotearoa me ngā pae o Toys R Us mō te hawhe o taua tapeke, e ai ki te tātaritanga a te Wake Up to Money o TE 5 ora. I taka ngā mekameka e rua ki te whakahaere i te rā kotahi o Hui tanguru. Ka kati ngā pātaka Toys R Us e toe ana i te Tūrei, ina ngaro atu te mekameka o Amerika i ngā pāka hokohoko me ngā tiriti tiketike o UK. Kei te tuwhera tonu ngā kaiwhakahaere mō Maplin i ōna toa e 217, engari kei te "arotakea" i te wā e rapua ana he kaihoko. E whakaatu ana te tātaritanga a te AO kua pāngia e ngā tāone te tāwhara o ēnei mahi hokohoko, engari kua pāngia hoki ngā taone puta noa i te UK. He tokomaha kē he nui kē te pāpātanga wātea o te toa. Ko Doncaster tētahi o ngā taone e 14 kua pāngia e whā ngā toa: e rua ngā toa Toys R Us e kati ana, i te wā e mōrearea ana te pātaka New Look me tētahi toa Maplin. He maha tonu ngā mekameka ā-motu nui, engari e ai ki te rangahau mai i Te Kamupene Raraunga Paetata i ngaro ai te taone i ngā toa 13 i tērā tau - tata ki te 5% o te tapeke. Tata ki te kotahi i roto i te rima ngā toa i Doncaster e wātea ana, ahakoa e kī ana te kaunihera e 11% anake kāore he kairīhi. I kī a Abs Ruata, e whakahaere ana i te toa kākahu X-ited i Printing Office Street, he take nui ngā utu pakihi. "Kāore e taea e ngā kaihoko te utu i ngā utu. He maha ngā toa e wātea ana ka kī tonu ngā rangatira 'tangohia taua toa mō te koreutu'," tana kī. "Engari me pēhea e taea ai e koe te toa ina £20,000 ō utu? Kāore te kaunihera i te pōrearea nā te mea ka kohikohi noa iho rātau mō te kāwanatanga matua." I whakapuakina e Tēnā Ruānuku he whakataunga kia neke i tētahi teihana pahi ki te pokapū hokohoko o Frenchgate, i tino whakahekea ai te waewae i tōna taha o te taone. Engari i tētahi hīkoi poto atu i kī a Fran Bishop e pai ana tana mahi i muri i tana neke mai i tētahi wae matua ki te Waterdale, he wāhi o te tau 1960 e whakahoutia ana e te kaiwhakawhanake o Hato Modwen. "Kua tāruatia e mātou te hurihanga i ia tau, nā reira kei te whakararuraru mātou i te ia. Kei te mahi mātou i ētahi mea hei pana i ngā kiritaki ki roto i te toa. Ka mahia e mātou ngā ataata Facebook Live... Kei te kumea e mātou ngā tāngata ki roto, ā, he kiritaki ā mātou puta noa i te whenua," tana kī. "I anga atu mātau ki a Makitānara, engari e £17,000 tērā i te tau mo te haurua o te rahi. I neke mātou ki konei nā te mea he wāhi whakatupu anō nā reira i whiwhi mātou i tētahi wā rēti e toru marama i āhei ai mātou ki te hanga i te waewae. He wāhi hokohoko nui ake, ā, kāore he utu pakihi." E tūmanako ana te Kaunihera o Doncaster kia nui ake te ūnga whakangahau o te taone me tētahi whare pikitia hou, ētahi atu takahanga me tētahi Mākete Wūru kua whakarerekētia e noho ana hei kāinga ki ngā pae me ngā wharekai. I kī a Pita Dale, te kaiwhakahaere whakahou me te taiao o te kaunihera: "Kei te urutau a Doncaster ki ngā uauatanga o te hokohoko tuihono me te ngana ki te tuku i tētahi mea kāore e taea e ngā kaihoko mamati." I kī a Bryan Roberts, tētahi kaitātari hokohoko i TCC Global, kua whakararurarutia ētahi rahunga hokohoko i te korenga o ngā kamupene ki te urutau ki te huri i te whanonga kiritaki. "He maha ngā kaihoko ngāwari i reira. Tērā anō ētahi pēhanga utu pēnei i te utu mōkito, me ngā utu pakihi - otirā ko ērā i te Tiriti Tiketike." Kua whai ētahi atu umanga ki te whakangāwari i a rātau pēhanga pūtea mā tētahi whakaritenga tūturu a te kamupene, tētahi atu momo pōreareatanga. E whakaaro ana a Carpetright me New Look ki te kati i ngā pātaka pēnei, ā, kei te whakamahi hoki ngā mekameka wharekai o Jamie's Italian, Prezzo me Byron Burger i te tukanga hei kati pae. Motuhake, kei waenganui a Marks rāua ko Spencer i tētahi mahere katinga pātaka, ā, ka katia e ono i te mutunga o Āperira, ā, ka kati ētahi atu whitu ā muri ake i tēnei tau.

title: Ko te kohanga o Mehana me nga toa ahua e tūmanako ana ki te tarai koura
summary: I muri i te pānuitanga o tōna hapu, kua whakaohotia e te pūeru tuatahi o Te Ariki o Sussex tētahi hōkeke hokohoko tuihono.
text: Nā Te Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero o Ahitereiria i hinga te paetukutuku o te kaihoahoa o Ahitereiria o Karen Gee i te waipuketanga o ngā kiritaki hou e kimi ana i te kākahu rei "Manaakitia" e £975 i kī a Ms Gee i "hari" a ia ki te kite i a Mehana e mau ana i tana hoahoa. "Kāore mātou i mōhio ka mau a ia i te kākahu Manaaki i te rā tuatahi o te haerenga ariki - he mīharo tino mīharo," tana kī. "He tino nui te urupare, ā, i waipuketia te paetukutuku inanahi. " E manaakitia ana mātou i te nui o te hiahia ahakoa ko te tikanga o te whakatutuki i ngā whakahau puta noa i te pō." I kī a Ms Gee kua aro atu te kākahu puta noa i te ao, me ngā hokonga kaha i te US, i te UK me Aorangi, tae atu ki Ahitereiria. I kī te kaiwaiata rongonui o Alex Longmore, ko te tikanga o ngā hononga o Amerika o Mehana ka nui ake tōna mana i runga i te mākete o te ao whānui i tōna hunaonga o Catherine, te Ariki o Kemipiri, i a ia e hapu ana i tana tamaiti mātāmua, ko Piriniha Hōri. "Ehara te pānga i te UK anake, kei Amerika hoki. He tino nui te hiko hokohoko i Amerika," tana kī. Ka mahara a Ms Longmore i te korerotanga a tētahi kaihoahoa Peretania, i te maunga o tētahi o ngā pāhi o te parani, ka whiwhi waea te kaihoahoa mai i ngā kaihoko maha o Amerika e hiahia ana ki te whakaputu. Ko Cecile Reinaud, te kaiwhakarewa o te waitohu kohanga o Seraphine, kua pā tuatahi ki te pānga ariki. He maha nga wā i mau ai te Ariki o Cambridge i te parani i roto i ana hapu e toru, ā, i ia wā ka tere te hoko atu o ngā kākahu. "Ina mau o mātau kākahu e ngā kīngi, he pai tonu mō ngā hoko me te whakapiki i te kōtaha o te parani i te ao whānui," te kī a Miss Reinaud. "I roto i te hapu, he nui ake te arotahi mai i te pāpāho. Ki taku whakaaro ka ōrite te pānga o Mehana." He rite tonu te wheako o JoJo Maman Bebe i te wā i mau ai a Catherine i te Koti Pirinihi Kirīmi o te kohanga i a ia e hapu ana i te tau 2015. I tere tonu te hoko atu o te koti. I kī te kaiwhakarewa o te parani, a Laura Tenison: "He tino mīharo te rongo kei te hapu a Meki. He ngāwari noa iho tōna kāhua. "I a ia he wahine hou o te ao, kaore a ia e mataku ki te whakamātau i te ahua, ā, ko te tikanga tērā pea ka mau ia i ngā kākahu kohanga o nāianei." Engari e kī ana a Ms Longmore, kāore e taea e Meki, he rerekē ki tōna hunaonga, te whakaatu i ngā toa tiriti tiketike i roto i te tahua o ngā kaihoko noa. Ahakoa te ngahau i puta mai i a ia e mau ana i tētahi peke Marks & Spencer £45 i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, he nui ake te utu o Mehana i a Kate, i kitea rongonuitia i roto i tētahi kākahu Topshop i a ia e hapu ana. "Ko te Tiriti Tiketike te mea a Kate. Kāore au i te whakaaro he kōtiro High Street a Mehana," te kī a Ms Longmore. I matapaetia e ia, i a ia e hapu ana, ka mau tonu a Mehana ki ana kaihoahoa makau, pērā i a Givenchy, nāna i hoahoa tana kākahu mārena. Engari ehara tēnei i te mea kāore tonu a ia e whakaawe i te Tiriti Tiketike. "He tino mau ōna kākahu. Tērā pea he utu nui, engari he ngāwari noa iho te hōrite," te kī a Ms Longmore. I kī a ia ko te āhua o te moko o Mehana, tae atu ki ngā koti kua whakaritea, ngā hāte nui rawa me ngā kara ngahuru, ka taea te tiki ake mō tētahi hautanga o te utu i te Tiriti Tiketike, ā, ka whakamāoritia hoki ki te mau kohanga. "E whakaaro ana ahau mā tōna āhua iti tērā pea ka mau tonu ia ki tētahi kāhua ōrite," te kī a Ms Longmore. "Ka mau a ia i ngā raina e patipati ana i a ia, ā, tērā pea ka whakaatu i tōna tūtuki. Ki taku whakaaro kāore mātou e kite i tētahi huringa nui i roto i tōna kāhua engari he urutaunga." I whakaae a Ms Tenison ka whakaawe tonu te kāhua o Mehana i ētahi atu toa utu ōrau pēnei i a ia, ā, ka kī ngā kaihoko matua e "mātakitaki tata ana i a ia" ki te kawe mai i tōna kāhua ki ā rātou kiritaki. Ā, kāore pea e mutu te hiahia ina whānau tana pēpi. Kātahi ka noho ngā whatu katoa ki ngā kākahu pēpi, te kākahu me ētahi atu apatoko kōhungahunga ka haere pea te ariki. Kātahi anō ka noho te mokopuna a te Kuini, a Zara Tindall, hei karere mō ngā tūru iCandy, ā, i puta mai i te taha o tana tamāhine e toru marama i roto i tētahi pānuitanga mō tētahi waka e utu ana i te £1,500. I te mea kāore he taitara ariki a Mrs Tindall, he iti ake ngā rāhuitanga e anga ana ki te hanga i ngā hoa mahi arumoni. Kāore e taea e Mehana, he ariki me te wahine a te rangatira, te whai i tana ārahi. Nā reira kāore pea ngā toa pēpi e whiwhi i ngā mahi tautoko whai hua ākuanei, engari i kī a Miss Reinaud ka kimi tonu rātau ki te pato ki te āhuatanga ā-ao o Mehana. "Ahakoa kei te hapu a ia, kāore rānei, kei te mātakitaki ia kaihoahoa i a ia."

title: Ka whakakorea e te kōti o Kūweiti te pōti, ā, ka whakahokia mai te pāremata
summary: Kua whakahokia te pāremata o mua o Kūweiti i muri i te whakapuakitanga o te pōti hou o te whenua "kore mana".
text: I whakataua e te kōti kawanatanga he kore ture te nekehanga ki te memeha i te kāwanatanga o mua, i whakahaua e Emir Sabah al-Anganui al-Sabah. I whakatārewatia e Hēkana Sabah te pāremata mo te marama i mua o te wiki, i muri i te haupae i waenganui i te kāpata me ngā kaipāngai. I whakahaua e te rangatira o Kūweiti te whakakorenga o te pāremata i tērā Tīma i waenganui i te raruraru mo nga whakapae hāmate. I muri iho ka tū te pōti i te wā o Hui tanguru, i reira i nui ai te whiwhinga o te ātetetanga a te Māori. E whā nga wā i memeha ai te pāremata mai i te tau 2006. I puta mai te whakakorenga o mua tata nei i muri i te tukunga iho o te kāpata o te whenua i mua i te pātaitanga a te Pirimia o Mua, a Hēkana Nasser al-Moameta al-Sabah. I muri i te whakamātau a te kāwanatanga ki te ārai i a ia ki te anga atu ki ngā pātai mo te utunga whakapae ki ngā MP kāwanatanga. Ko te whakatau a te kōti kawanatanga kia whakahokia mai te pāremata o mua e whakaarotia ana he whakamutunga, ā, kāore e taea te whakawātea. I kī te ātete MP Mussallam al-Barra ko te whakahaere he "kukitanga ki te kaupapa ture", e ai ki te kōrero rongokōrero o TE WĀ.

title: Coronavirus: Ka kati te Kura Tamariki Hitchin nā te whakamātautau tōrunga
summary: Kua katia tētahi kura tuarua i muri i te whakamātautau pai a tētahi kaimahi mō Covid-19.
text: I tūtohu te Kura Tamariki o Hitchin i Hertfordshire he "tau nui" o ētahi atu kaimahi e noho wehe ana i a rātau anō mō te 14 rā. I kī "kāore e taea te whakatuwhera haumaru" i te Mane, ā, ka tuihono te akoranga. Head teacher Fergal Moane said they were looking at introducing a mixture of remote and on-site learning for the rest of the two-week period. I kī te kura, he wānanga pūtea ā-kāwanatanga, i whakamōhiotia te whakamātautau tōrunga i te ahiahi o te Rāhoroi, ā, ka whakawhitiwhiti ki te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Hertfordshire me te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi i tana urupare. 'Hoapā tata' I roto i tētahi reta ki ngā mātua, ka kī a Tēnā Moane kua tohutohutia ko te hunga anake i roto i te "hoapā tata" ki te mema o ngā kaimahi e āwangawanga ana me wehe i a rātau anō. I kī a ia kua kitea e te kura aua tāngata, ā, "he nui ake ngā kaimahi e pāngia ana i ngā ākonga". I roto i ngā "take ruarua" i whakapā tata atu ai ngā tauira ki te kaimahi, kua whakapā hāngai atu ngā mātua ki te tono i ā rātou tamariki kia wehe i a rātou anō. "Ka aroha, he nui rawa te maha o ngā kaimahi kua whakapā tata ki te kēhi kua whakaūngia, kāore e rawaka ngā mema o ngā kaimahi whakaako i runga i te pae hei whakaako haumaru i ngā ākonga katoa i te Mane," tana kī. I kī a ia i katia te kura mō te rā ki te "whakatakoto whakarato kia neke ki tētahi huarahi haumaru, pūmau hoki" arā, ka taea e ētahi whakaako te tīmata anō i te kura, me te ako tuihono e haere tonu ana i ētahi atu wā. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Kent youth commissioner replacement to be recruited
summary: E ono marama i muri i te tukunga atu o te kaipupuri tuatahi o te pou i runga i ngā karere Twitter.
text: I whakatūria a Parihi Paraone i Aperira, engari i waiho i runga i ngā kōrero i mahia e ia i runga i te ipurangi i mua i tana hoatutanga ki te tūranga. Me tīmata te komihana pirihimana me te komihana hara o Keni (PCC) a Ann Barnes ki te tiki i tōna whakakapinga i Whiringahora. E tūmanakohia ana kia whiwhi te kaitono angitu i te £15,000 mō te tau, he wāhanga i utua mai i te utu £85,000 a Ms Barnes. Ko te wāhuitanga o tētahi taitamariki PCC tētahi o ngā tautohe whakahau matua a Ms Barnes i roto i te whakahau i mua i tana pōtitanga hei PCC tuatahi o Keni i Whiringa ā Rangi. 'Tuhituhi heahea' I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō Ms Barnes: "Me tuku e ia hei wāhanga o ana kī taurangi, ā, e tino māia ana ki te mahi pēnā." I whakatūria a Miss Brown ki te pou taitamariki i te 3 o Āperira, i a ia e 16 tonu ana, hei tohu i te rangatahi puta noa i te takiwā. Neke atu i te 50 ngā amuamu i whiwhi ai ngā Pirihimana o Keni mai i ngā mema o te iwi whānui mō ngā kōrero i mahia e ia i runga i te ipurangi i mua i tana wāhuitanga, e whakaarotia ana he whakahāwea, he pōhēhē. I uiuia e te tōpana ngā whakairinga Twitter, engari i kī kāore i whakapono ki ngā kōrero, i roto i te horopaki, he tino whakahāwea i runga i tētahi aromatawai whāinga. I whakapārewa a Miss Brown mo te mahi i ngā tuhituhi "heahea, whakarihariha" i a ia e 14, 15 me te 16, ā, i kī ana rōia he "tōtika" te tūhuratanga pirihimana. Ka tirohia te hītori pāpāho pāpori o ngā kaitono hou hei wāhanga o te tukanga tono, e ai ki te tari o Ms Barnes.

title: Crossrail bridges in Slough and Hillingdon to be replaced
summary: Kua tīmata te mahi ki te whakakapi i ngā arawhata e whā hei whakarite mō ngā tereina hiko hou o Crossrail.
text: Tīmata i te tau 2018, ka honoa e Crossrail a Maidenhead, Berkshire, i te hauauru ki Shenfield, Essex, me Abbey Wood, ki te tonga-rāwhiti o Rānana, i te rāwhiti. E rua ngā arawhata i Slough me ngā piriti e rua i Hillingdon me whakakapi hei whakawātea i ngā taputapu hiko o runga. Kua whakatūria ngā pae mahi me te tango piriti e tīmata ana i te Kirihimete. Ka whakaoti a Network Rail i te mahi i te Aranga 2013 i runga i te arawhiti o Middlegreen Road me te arawhiti Trenches i Slough, tae atu ki te arawhiti Old Stockley Road me te arawhiti Horton i Hillingdon, ki te uru o Rāwāhi. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, i tāutatia e Network Rail tētahi arawhiti rangitahi i te taha o te arawhiti o Middlegreen, e pupuri ana i te urunga waewae me te pahikara. I kī a Jorge Mendonca mai i Network Rail: "Ko te mahi e mahia ana e mātau i runga i ngā arawhata puta noa i te wāhanga ki te uru o te ara, e kore e taea anake te whakahaere i ngā tereina Crossrail roa ake, engari he wāhanga nui hoki o te hōtaka hei whakawhiriwhiri i te raina matua o te Uru Nui. " We've spent months preparing for this to ensure we complete the work with the least possible impact on residents."

title: E tono ana te pikinga i roto i te kiriāhua he ohorere mō Ēnā Me
summary: E kī ana a Ēnā Me kua mīharo a ia i te maha o ngā tono kiriāhua i a ia mai i tana nohonga ko te pirimia.
text: I kī atu a ia ki te Parakuihi a BBC One kua tonoa ia kia nui ake te whakatakotoranga i a ia e hēkeretari ana i te kāinga. "He torutoru noa iho taku mahi, engari kāore e taea e au te mahi i aua mea katoa. E wehi ana ahau kāore e whakaaetia ahau e te wā." He kaiuru kiriāhua nui a Rawiri, engari i whakahētia mō te hono atu ki a Te Pākehā mō tētahi hopu i te ratonga whakamaharatanga a Nelson. Ka mahia e Mrs May, nāna i whakakapi i a Tēnā Karauna i a Hōngongoi, te wāhitau a tana kaiārahi tīmata ki te hui Tūturu i te Wenerei. I mua i tēnei, ko Mrs May - āhua kore nei e kōrero mō tōna oranga i waho o ngā tōrangapū - i whai wāhi ki ngā uiuinga pāohotanga tūturu i pēhia ai ia i runga i ngā kaupapa tōrangapū, whaiaro hoki mai i te Pakihi. I pātai mai ngā scones me ngā hū he aha te rerekētanga nui rawa i kitea e ia mai i tana nohonga ko te pirimia, ka kī a ia "kia tonoa kia nui ake ngā kiritaki i ēnei rā". "He torutoru noa iho ngā kiritaki i konei i te hui a te rōpū, e ai ki tāu e whakaaro ai." I runga i te Ata Pai o ITV o Ingarangi, i pātaitia a Mrs May mō tana tohutohu mō ngā scones - ngā taipitopito i tiria e ia i roto i tētahi uiuinga nūpepa i te Rātapu - me tana kohinga hū. I kī atu a Mrs May, e kī ana he pai ki a ia te whakangāwari mā te tunu kai me te hīkoi maunga, ki te Sunday Times i te mutunga wiki kua whakamahia e ia te pata me te margarine hei hanga scones i mua - he tikanga i piki ake i waenganui i ētahi kaihanga parāoa kāinga i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. I kī atu a ia ki a ITV kāore a ia i mahi scones i te nuinga o te wā mai i te kitenga i te mate huka, engari i kī ia he pai rawa atu te whakamahi i te pata mārō: "Me miri koe ki roto ki te parāoa. He ngāwari kē atu mēnā he uaua, ka taea e koe te mirimiri pai. Mēnā he ngohengohe rawa ka tīmata ki te āhua kōpikopiko." I kī a Mrs May, nāna i mau i tētahi rekereke poti tā reparo i a ia e kōrero ana ki tētahi hui Conservative i te ātetetanga, i te nuinga o te wā e whakangahau ana a ia i te nui o te pānuitanga pēhi i kawea e tana kōwhiringa kākahu kākahu. "He ātaahua te tangata e arotahi ana ki ōku hū. Ki taku whakaaro kāore rātau e arotahi ana ki a Piripi Hammond, ki a Boris Johnson rānei. E pouri ana ahau i te mea e titiro ana te tangata ki aku hū? E, ka homai he takunga ki a au ki te haere ki te hoko hū hou." A, i uiuia i runga i te Reo Irirangi o LBC, ka pātaitia a Mrs May mō te whakaahuatanga a te hoa mahi o mua o Ken Clarke ki a ia he "wahine uaua toto". "E tū ana ahau ki te mahi i tāku e whakapono ana ko te mea tika," tana whakautu. "Mēnā ko te tū ake mō tāu e whakapono ana he tika he 'uaua toto', kia pērā tonu." I pātaitia mō ōna hiahia tōrangapū i runga i te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, e kī ana a Mrs May kāore i taea e ia te maumahara ki te kōrero i a ia e taitamariki ana e hiahia ana ia hei pirimia - e ai ki ētahi hoa tawhito - engari i tāpiri mai i whakataua e ia mai i tōna pakeketanga kia noho hei MP hei "whakarerekē" ki te oranga o te iwi.

title: Ka whakakitea e Īnia nga whare taonga kāinga hou māmā
summary: Kua whakakitea e tētahi aroha Īnia e 108 nga whare horoi hou i tētahi kāinga i rongonuitia i te kitenga o ngā kōtiro tokorua e taronatia ana i tētahi rākau i reira i Me.
text: I patua nga whanaunga taitamariki i Katra Sahadatganj i hōmai pākākā i a rātau e haere tahi ana ki te whakaora i a rātau i roto i nga pārae. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau i te kore whare taonga me te hiahia ki te haere tawhiti ka mōrearea ngā wāhine ki te whakaeke. Tata tonu ki te hawhe o ngā tāngata e 1,2 miriona o Īnia kaore he whare taonga i te kāinga. I te hura i nga whare horoi kanapa, māhorahora i te Rātapu, ka kī te aroha noho ma, ko Sula whānui Ao Whānui, e whai ana kia homai te pānga ōrite mō ia nohoanga i Īnia. "E whakapono ana ahau kia kaua tētahi wahine e ngaro i tōna ora nā te mea me haere ia ki waho ki te whakawātea," te kī a Bindeshwar Pathak, te kaiwhakaū o te aroha. "Ko tā mātou whāinga ko te whakarato whare paku ki ia whare i te whenua ā muri ake nei," te kī a Tēnā Pathak ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. Kai te mārama tonu nga āhuatanga o te kōhurutanga o nga taitama tokorua i Katra Sahadatganj. Engari i patua rātau i a rātau - pēnei i ētahi atu kōtiro me ētahi atu wāhine - i haere ki ngā pārae i roto i te pouri, mō te tūmataitinga, ki te whakangāwari i a rātau anō. I roto i tana whaikōrero o te Rā o Te Rangatiratanga i te 15 o Aotearoa, ka kī taurangi te Pirimia o Moemoe Modi kia whakamutua te whakahekenga tuwhera. "Kei te rau tau 21 tātau, engari kāore tonu he rangatiratanga mō ngā wāhine i a rātau e haere ana i te wāhi tuwhera ki te whakawātea, ā, me tatari rātau kia taka te pouri," tana kī. "Ka taea e koe te whakaaro i te maha o ngā raruraru e anga atu ana rātau nā tēnei?" tana pātai.

title: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere ki te turaki i te hōtēra rererangi rererangi o Alveston
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere ki te turaki i tētahi hōtēra Hōriana nā tētahi pūkenga rererangi ki te hanga i ngā kāinga hou e 22.
text: I tukuna ngā tono whakahuahua hei tukituki i te Hōtēra Whare o Alveston e tata ana ki Bristol, ahakoa e 40 ngā whakahē a ngā tangata whenua me tētahi kaunihera pāriha. He tohu kikorangi anō tā te whare hei whakamaharatanga ki a Capt Frank Barnwell, nāna i hanga, i rere hoki te rererangi tuatahi i Pākehā i te tau 1910. I kī te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata (LDRS) ka puritia te tohu. Ko te whakataunga e tohu ana i te "mutunga o tētahi kōrero roa i runga i te whare 'whatu'" e noho ana i David's Lane i te A38 i Alveston, tata ki Bristol, e ai ki te LDRS. I kī atu te karaka o te Kaunihera o Alveston Parish ki te komiti whakahaere whanaketanga o te Kaunihera o Te Tonga o Te Rūnanga o T Mr Smith said: "The council and residents are particularly concerned that the parish is on the verge of losing one of its iconic landmarks. " Nō reira e tono ana te kaunihera kia whakawāteatia ngā tāpiritanga hou katoa ki tēnei whare o te rau tau 18, ā, ka tahuri te anga e toe ana ki ngā whare utu ōrau. "Kātahi ka taea te whakamahi i te toenga o te whenua mō te whanaketanga whare e ai ki te marohi." I kī a ia he nui ake ngā waka me ngā motokā whakatū ka whakawehi i te haumarutanga o ngā kaihīkoi me ngā kaieke paihikara, ā, he "arokē, he pōrearea hoki". I kī tētahi māngai o Prestige Retirement Living, nāna i tāpae ngā mahere, engari kāore i te hiahia kia noho hei kāinga whakatānga, ko ngā tono mō ngā whare kiato iti iho i mua, ā, he nui ake ngā waka i hangaia e tētahi hōtēra i ngā kāinga hou. South Gloucestershire councillor Judy Adams said the area would be improved if the hotel was demolished. I whakaae ngā mema ki te tūtohutanga a ngā āpiha kia whakaaetia mā te rima pōti ki te rua, me ngā whakawāteatanga e rua.

title: Ko te whakatūpato 'ka hinga' te hoko whakahau o Manston Airport
summary: Kua kī ngā rangatira o te pae Taunga Rererangi o Manston o mua ka hinga ngā whakamātau a te kaunihera UKIP hou i Thanet ki te whai i tētahi Raupapa Hoko Whakahau (CPO).
text: I muri i te pōtitanga o tērā wiki, ka noho te Kaunihera Takiwā o Thanet hei mana whakahaere tuatahi i te UK. I kī a Pirihi Wells, e whakaaro ana ki te ārahi i te mana, ka tūmanakohia kia haere tonu te tautohe a tana rōpū ki te whai i tētahi CPO. Kua tohua te taunga rererangi, i katia i Me 2014, mo te whanaketanga. 'Moumou moni' I kī ōna rangatira o nāianei, a Trevor Cartner rāua ko Pirihi Musgrave, i roto i tētahi kōrero tōtahi: "E whakaaro ana mātou ka hinga te whakaneketanga o tētahi tukanga CPO a te Kaunihera Takiwā o Thanet. " Kāore he tūāpapa e taea ai te haere whakamua i tētahi tukanga CPO, ā, he nui ake te pānga o tēnei ki ngā tōrangapū i ngā painga o te iwi whānui. "Ki te haere tonu te Kaunihera Takiwā o Thanet, ka moumou rātau i ngā moni a ngā kaihautū i runga i tētahi mahi kāore i taea e rātau te toa." E rua ngā ariā mō te rohe kua whakakitea, ia wāhi noho, mokowā arumoni me te pāka. Mr Wells said: "The first thing we do now is put forward a proposal for council and cabinet to approve an indemnity partner in the context of moving a CPO forward. " Ā, ka mahia e mātou tēnā i roto i ngā rā torutoru nei, e ai ki te kī taurangi."

title: E tono ana te Whare Karakia o Lincoln mō te £12m hei whakapiki i ngā tau manuhiri
summary: Kei te tono a Lincoln Cathedral mō te £12m o te pūtea Tuku iho i roto i te kaha ki te kawe mai i ētahi atu manuhiri.
text: Ki te angitu, ka whai ngā kaiwhakahaere o te whare karakia ki te whakamahi i te moni hei whakaputa i ngā whakaterenga tauwhitiwhiti, te waihanga i tētahi pokapū akoranga, me te whakapai ake i te urunga ki te tomokanga matua. I kī a Canon John Patrick ka panoni te mahi i ngā pūkenga i te whare 900 tau, e kawe ana i ngā manuhiri 180,000 i te tau. I kī a ia "e tika ana kia mōhiotia pai ake te taone tahito, hītori hoki". 'Haere hāngai ki roto' i kī a Canon Patrick ka hono te kaupapa, Lincoln Cathedral Connected, ki tētahi aronui £20m i te pāra - kei roto ko te hanganga o tētahi taumaha i raro i te whare o Lincoln's Magna Carta. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He kaupapa tino mīharo tēnei - ehara i te mea mō te whare karakia anake, engari ko te taone me te rohe hoki. " Ka taea te nui ake te tokomaha o ngā manuhiri ki te taone." He koreutu te tomokanga ki te whare karakia, engari he utu e £6 mō ngā pakeke e haere ana ki te whare me te utu £1 mō te tamaiti. Mā te whakamārama i ngā whāinga o te aronui, ka kī a ia: "Ko tētahi o ngā mea e tino hiahia ana mātou ki te mahi ko te whakarite kia mārama te tangata ki te whare mā te whakamahi i ngā paparorohiko hiko me te waihanga i tētahi pokapū whakamārama hōu. " We are also putting the ground back to where it was before the Victorians lowered it in the 19th Century to create an open space which will allow people to walk straight in without the need for ramps." Ka tīmata pea te mahi i te tau 2016, ā, e rima tau te roa ki te whakaoti.

title: Puritia ngā mumura ki te 5, e tohutohu ana i te rōpū haumaru o Guernsey
summary: Puritia ngā whakaaturanga mumura o te kāinga ki te Hātarei, 5 Whiringa 2011 te karere mai i te rōpū Guernsey i whakatūria hei whakatoko i te haumarutanga mumura.
text: Kei roto i te rōpū ko ngā ratonga ohorere, ngā mana hauora, ngā tikanga, tētahi aroha kararehe, Age Concern me tētahi tohunga pyrotechnic. Kua tohe ki ngā moutere kia haere ki ngā whakaaturanga whakaritea, ka tū i ngā rā maha. Kua tonoa e te rōpū ki tētahi tangata e pupuri ana i tētahi whakaaturanga tūmataiti kia oti i te 21:00 GMT. E kī ana i te mea ka taea anake e ngā kaihangarau ngaio o te motu te whakarato haumaru i te maha o ngā whakaaturanga i te pō kotahi, e rua rā anō kua tohua mō ngā whakaaturanga ngaio anake. I kī te rōpū haumaru i te tau 2010 kāore he ahi ahi i pūrongotia kua kore e taea te whakahaere, engari kotahi neke atu rānei te tangata i whiwhi tahu i te mura.

title: Covid: PPE 'could be recycled' with help of sunlight
summary: Ka taea te tukurua i ngā kanohi Covid whakamahi-kotahi, ngā kākahu kirihou me ngā kanohi hei hinu kākāriki mā tētahi tikanga hou i hangaia e ngā kaipūtaiao.
text: Nā Steffan MessengerBBC Wales Environment Correspondent I kī te tīma ā-Whare Wānanga o Swansea ka āwhina pea ki te rutu i tētahi raruraru ā-ao me aha ki ngā ururua rongoā o te taiepa. I tēnei wā, kua tahuna te PPE tawhito, e whakaputa ana i te kohu waro whakamahana āhuarangi. Ka whakamahia e tēnei huarahi hōu te rā o te rā hei whati i ngā tūemi hei hauwai. Kei te ako hoki ngā kairangahau mēnā ka taea e te tukanga te whakamate i ngā pathogens e toe ana ki te PPE - tae atu ki te huaketo Covid. E kī ana rātau ka taea pea te penapena moni nui mō te NHS - me te £700m i te tau e pau ana i te whakawātea i ngā ururua rongoā mōrearea puta noa i te UK, ahakoa i mua i te pānga o te taiepa. I whakaahuatia e te kaiārahi kaupapa a Dr Moritz Kuehnel ngā ārai kanohi e paru ana i ngā taha o te huarahi hei "pito noa iho o te hukapapa mēnā ka whakaaro koe ki te NHS me ērā karapu me ngā karapu katoa kua nui ake nā Covid. " Mā te hoatu i tā mātou hangarau ki te tukatuka anō i te 1% noa iho o tēnei moumou ka tiakina ngā miriona me te whakaiti i te pokenga i te wā kotahi." I kī a Dr Kuehnel he tino hira te kimi rongoā "māmā, ngāwari hoki ki te whakatinana", otirā mō ngā whenua e tipu ana, tērā pea kāore he hanganga tukurua pai me ngā pūkenga tārua. Ahakoa kei te wāhanga tōmua te rangahau, i kī a ia ko te tūmanako kia hangaia he pūrere utu iti ka taea e te tangata te whakamahi. "Nā reira ka whai koe i tētahi momo mīhini horoi māmā - purua ō para katoa, whakakāngia, tatari kia whiti te rā, kātahi ka ngaro katoa ngā para, engari ka whiwhi anō koe i tētahi mea whai uara." 'He raruraru taiao nui' i kī a Lesley Jones, te rangatira nui o Keep Wales Tidy, kua tino raruraru taiao te PPE whakamahi-kotahi. Ko ngā raraunga i tukuna ki a BBC Wales e te aroha i huatau kua tūtaki ōna tūao ki ngā tūemi PPE i runga i te 45% o ngā kōwhiringa paru mai i Mahuru. "Kei roto i taua punipuni he kirihou e uru ana ki roto i o tātau awa me tō tātau taiao moana, ā, ko ngā aho iti kei runga i ngā hīpoki ka tūkino tūturu ki ngā manu me ngā kararehe iti pēnei i ngā hedgehogs," te kī a Ms Jones. "Tērā anō te mōrearea ki te hauora mō ngā tāngata e piki ake ana. " Ko tā mātou karere e mārama ana, tēnā mauria tō paru ki te kāinga, hoatu rānei ki roto i tētahi ipu, engari kia tino whakaaro hoki mō te hoko hīpoki ka taea te whakamahi anō i te mea he pai ake tēnā mō te taiao." Me pēhea te tukurua i te PPE whakamahi-kotahi? Ka hanga te rangahau i runga i ngā mahi tōmua a te tīma ki te hanga hauwai mai i ngā kirihou parakore - he tikanga e kiia nei ko te whakaahua. Kei roto i te whakamahi i tētahi whakaahua whakaahua - he rauemi e ngongo ana i te mārama, ā, ka taea te huna ki te pūngao hei whakatoko i ngā tauhohenga matū - i tēnei tauira ko te pakarutanga o te moumou kirihou me te tahuringa o te wai ki te hauwai. Ka whakaputaina hoki e ia ngā mea e mōhiotia ana ko te momo hāora tauhohe e āhei ana ki te patu i ngā meroiti. Ka āwhina te tīma o Swansea, e mahi tahi ana me ngā kaipūtaiao i Īnia, ki te tirotiro i ngā ngohe ārai ārai whakaahua ki ngā pathogens rerekē, tae atu ki te huaketo e pā ana ki a Covid-19. The Welsh Government has awarded £47,000 of grant funding to support the project. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Whare Wānanga o Swansea Keep Wales Tidy

title: Emilia Clarke rāua ko Emma Thompson i te Kirihimete Whakamutunga me ngā arotakenga pānui
summary: Ko tētahi mea e kore rawa mātou e mahi i roto i tēnei tuhipānui ko te hoatu i ngā kaipahua mō te Kirihimete Whakamutunga. I tua atu i tētahi atu mea, kei te mataku mātou i a Dame Emma Thompson.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Whīni McIntoshEntertainment "Ko te tikanga kaipahua tika ko: kaua e pahuatia!" ka kī atu te kaiwhakaari me te kaituhi ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero i muri i te wiki o ngā arotakenga a ngā kaiwhakawāwā kua whakaaturia mai te mutunga. "He ngāwari, ehara i te mea? He rite ki te 'kaua e kōwhao i ngā tauhou'. Kaua e pahuatia. Ngāwari. Ture ngāwari. Ehara i te matatini." Waimarie, he nui te wheako o te whetū o Game of Thrones, o Emilia Clarke, e whakatangi ana i te pūāhua matua o Keiti i roto i te whitiāhua, ki te pupuri huna i ngā rārangi tā. "Kāore anō ahau kia mahi i tētahi mahi kāore i pā ki te kaipahua," ka whakamārama a ia. "Ko te tikanga, kāore he mahi i mahia e au. Ā, he nui ake ētahi o rātou i ētahi atu. Engari mā tēnei hurihanga, he huarahi mō te kōrero mō ā mātou kiripuaki me te kaupapa me te kore haere ki tētahi wāhi e tata ana." Ko tētahi mea ehara i te mea huna, i takea te whitiāhua i runga anō i te pūoro a Hōri Mikaera. Ko ana waiata tino rongonui (me Wham) e hanga ana i te whakatangitangi, ā, i ētahi wā ka waiatatia e ngā kiripuaki. Tērā pea, ko te whitiāhua ā-Kirihimete hōu rawa kua noho hei makau ā-tau ko te Love Actually o te tau 2003 - e whetū ana hoki ki a Dame Emma. Engari e kī ana a ia e ngana ana ki te hanga i te pikitia whakangahau nui panuku "ehara i tōna tino whakahau" mō te tuhi tahi i te Kirihimete Whakamutunga. "Ko te Aroha Tūturu, i hangaia e tētahi o aku hoa tino pai," e kī ana a ia, e pā ana ki te kaituhi-kaiwhakahaere o Rārangi Curtis. "Ā, kei te tino hari ahau kei te aroha tonu te tangata ki taua mea. Nā reira kāore mātou i te whakaaro kei te whakataetae mātou ki tētahi mea. I hiahia noa ahau ki te ngana ki te hanga i tētahi pikitia pai, he Kirihimete kei roto. Me te āhua o te aroha, he iti noa iho te whakaari, me ngā mea katoa ka taea e mātau te maka atu." He pai ētahi arotakenga o te pikitia. E rima ngā whetū i hoatu e te Whakaata, i te kī a te Tākai "he nui te mura mahana, makaro hei whakamārama i tētahi hōtoke hākinakina". Heoi anō, he pai ki te kī, he tokomaha nga kaiwhakawāwā i iti iho te ngākau nui. "Ko te Kirihimete whakamutunga te pikitia whakangahau kino rawa atu kua kitea e au," ko te tuhituhi a Dan Wootton i roto i te Rā. "He whakaoho, he aue, he tino tika rawa te tōrangapū o tētahi whitiāhua e whakahaere ana ki te ngote i ia inihi o te ngahau, te hari me te ngātahitanga i waho o te wā e tika ana kia hari tātau." 'Kāore i taea e mātou te karo i a Pakihi' Ko ana kōrero e pā ana ki ngā tohutoro o te pikitia, tae atu ki te mea he tauiwi te whānau matua.
