E kōrero ana te pūāhua o Dame Emma (te whaea o Kate) nā te hua o te taupānga EU i kore ai ia e manakohia, i te wā e whakaatu ana tētahi tirohanga i runga i tētahi pahi o Rāwāhi i tētahi tangata e kōrero ana i ngā pāhihi kāore i te kōrero Ingarihi. Engari e tautohe ana a Dame Emma: "Ki taku whakaaro he tino māmā te paraihe [ngā tohutoro tōrangapū]. Nā te mea ko to mātau pūāhua matua te tamāhine a ngā tauiwi, he tino uaua ki te kōrero i tēnei pūrākau me te kore kōrero, i te itinga rawa, te wehi o ngā tāngata he tauiwi me Te Pakihi. "Nā te mea kua tautuhia i tētahi wā tino motuhake hoki, kua tautuhia i te tau 2016, kāore i taea e mātou te karo. Ki te kore i reira, he iti noa iho te hinengaro. Ā, ki taku whakaaro he aha te mea hira ake mō ngā mea i raro i te ngahau o te whitiāhua he karere mō te atawhai." Kei a Clarke tōna ake kaupapa here ina pānui arotakenga. "Kāore au e titiro ki a rātou. It's part drama school training, and then you do a bit of theatre, and it's just not helpful," she says. "Ko taku kitenga, e tika ana, kua mutu taku Googling i a au i roto i te tau o te putanga o Game of Thrones. Nā te mea i pēnei ahau, 'Kāore au i te hiahia ki te mōhio he aha te whakaaro o te tangata mō te rahi o taku raro, kia nui te mihi ki a koe.' "Kātahi ka mutu tō Googling i a koe anō, ka mutu tō pānui i ngā arotakenga. Ki te kōrero tētahi i tētahi mea tino pai, mēnā ka whiwhi koe i tētahi arotakenga whetū 15 miriona, ka kī atu tētahi ki a koe, ā, ki te whiwhi koe i tētahi 'waro whetū kotahi i roto i te tapawhā', ka kī atu tētahi ki a koe!" Ka kata a ia i a ia e titiro ana ki tana hoa whetū ko Henry Golding. (E kōrero ana a ia ki te āhua whakairoiro i whakaahuatia e Rolling Stone te wheako o te mātakitaki i te pikitia, e kī ana a Clarke i aro atu a Golding ki a ia "i mua tonu i to mātau hīkoi i runga i te pouaka whakaata ora!") Ko te 'whiti' a Hōri Mikaera i te Kirihimete Whakamutunga te mea hou rawa i roto i te aho whitiāhua i takea mai i ngā whakarārangi o muri o tētahi mahi pūoro. Nō nā tata nei i whiwhi ai a Kuini, a Bruce Springsteen rāua ko Elton John i te manaakitanga o Karaihe. "Tērā pea i hoatu e Māmā Mia taua ariā ki runga i te mahere," te kī a Dame Emma. E kī ana a Golding, e tino mōhiotia ana mō te whetū i roto i Crazy Rich Asians, ko te painga o aua kiriata ko te "whakaoho i te hari, te pūmahara, te nostalgia". "I runga anō i a Freddie Mercury rāua ko Elton John," ka haere tonu a ia. "He pūoro tēnei i tipu ake ai mātou katoa, ā, ki te kite i ngā mea e puta ana, he kitenga o tō rātou koiora, ka whakapakari i a mātau, ā, ka aroha tonu mātou ki taua rehetoi. " Ā, ko te tūmanako koia tērā e pā ana ki a Hōri, ā, ka whakarongo tētahi mākete whānui ake ki a Hōri mō te wā tuatahi, e whakaaro ana ahau ka puta." I tūtaki a Dame Emma ki a Mikaera i mua i tōna matenga i te tau 2016. Ka manaakitia e te kaiwaiata te whitiāhua, ā, kua uru tōna whānau me tōna whakahaere ki te whakanaotanga mai i taua wā, ahakoa he hopukanga kāore anō kia rangona i mua ki te whakaaturanga oro. "He āhua rēreti noa iho ngā waiata," te kī a Dame Emma. "Kāore au i mōhio he pēhea te whakaahuatanga o ana whiti i te nui o ngā mahi tiaki i a ia anō me te atawhai e tino kōrero ana tēnei pikitia." Nā te mea i tuhi tahi a Dame Emma, tae atu ki te tāne o Greg Wise, i te whakaaturanga o te pikitia, ka taea e ia te mātakitaki i te āhua o te whitiāhua. I mōhiotia a Phoebe Waller-Bridge, nāna i tuhi, i whetū hoki i Fleabag, mō te tuhi anō i ngā tirohanga i a ia e tākaro ana. He hākinakina hoki tērā e hākinakina ana e Dame Emma? "Deffo. Tino pai," tana kī. "Ka haere koe, 'Aue, kāore au i te whakaaro he tika tēnā'. Rānei, 'Tērā pea he rekareka ake'. Kātahi ka mahia e mātau he mea i a mātau e haere ana. He āhua riff mātou. Nā reira āe, he whaitake te noho i runga i te huinga, nā te mea ki te kī tētahi, 'Aue, kāore i te tino mahi', ka taea e koe te whakaaro mō tētahi atu mea." Koinei tā mātou uiuinga tuatahi ki a Dame Emma mai i tana waea whaiaro ki te kaiwhakahaere o te wharekai o Mayfair Brown's ki te tono kia whakahokia mai tētahi kaihoko i panaia mō te tono kiriāhua ki a ia. Kua rongo a ia mehemea i whakahokia mai e ia tana mahi? "Aue, koia anō ia!" tana whakautu. "Ehara te tango kiriāhua i te hara tārua. Ko taku kōrero, he pai te mahi a Paraone mo te whakaputa ake. Engari ko te mea kiriāhua tētahi mea e hiahia ana tātau katoa ki te kōrero me te whakaaro mō tētahi wāhi iti, kanohi ki te kanohi." Kotahi anō tā mātou pātai whakamutunga mō Clarke i mua i to mātau haerenga, e pā ana ki te kōrero kapu kawhe o Game of Thrones, e haruru ana mō ngā marama maha. I muri i te hapa hononga i te waru o nga tau, ka whakaaturia e Clarke kua whāki tūmataiti tana hoa whetū o Conleth Hill ko ia te kawenga mo te waiho i a ia ki te pūtiro. Heoi anō, i te rā i mua i ta mātau uiuinga, ka kōrero kōrero a ia ki te Rātapu Brunch kāore e taea te whakamatau i tōna hara. "TĒRĀ PĀREKAREKA ITI... KĀO!" Ka pahū a Clarke i a mātau he torutoru noa iho ngā kupu ki roto i te pātai. "KĀTI! Kāore au i te whiwhi!" E ngana ana mātau ki te haere tonu i roto i te kata, i whakawehi i te mahi ture ki a Clarke mo te whakararuraru i a ia. Kua rongo a ia i tana rōia? "Kāo, kāore anō ahau kia rongo mai i tana rōia, ka rongo ia i taku i roto i te meneti kotahi!" ka kata a ia. A, me tēnā, ka tākai mātou, e hiahia ana kia pai a Clarke rāua ko Golding ki te whakaaturanga tuatahi o taua ahiahi. "Kia ora," ka menemene a Clarke, i mua i te tāpiritanga: "Whakamōhio mai mēnā ka noho a Rolling Stone ki reira..." I te Paraire ka tukua te Kirihimete whakamutunga. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Nicholas Winton memorial service honours Holocaust hero
summary: Kua tū he karakia whakamaharatanga mō Tā Nicholas Winton, nāna i whakaora ngā tamariki rau i te Holocaust i ngā marama i mua i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao.
text: E 28 o ērā i tiakina e ia i a ia e tamariki ana, i waenganui i ngā tāngata e 400 i haere ki te takahanga i te Guildhall o Rāwāhi, tae atu ki ngā māngai kāwanatanga o Tiekeika, Hōrokia me UK. I whakaritea e Tā Nicholas te "Kindertransport" i reira e 669 te nuinga o ngā tamariki Hurai i haere mai ki Ingarangi mā runga tereina mai i Taikarowākia i te tau 1939. I mate a ia i te 1 o Hōngongoi i tērā tau, e 106 ona tau. I te tau 1988, i te tau 1988, ka huihuia anō e te kaiwhakaatu a Esther Rantzen ētahi o ērā i tiakina ki te tangata nāna rātau i āwhina ki te mawhiti i ngā Whāriki. He tokomaha o ngā tamariki i haere ki te whai whānau ake, ā, ko te tokomaha e ora ana i tēnei wā nā te Kindertransport e whakapono ana e tata ana ki te 7,000. I kōrero a Esther Rantzen ki te ratonga mō te wā i tūtaki ai ngā wāhine tokorua i whakaorangia mā te Kindertransport ki a Tā Nicholas i That's Life. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te wā anake i roto i tōku oranga ngaio me tū ahau, ka heke i taku tūru, ka tae ki muri i te tirohanga, ūkui i ōku whatu, ka hoki mai anō me te haere tonu ki te kaupapa, nā te pānga o taua wā, i te wā tuatahi ka tūtaki te tangata ki to rātau toa." Neke atu i te 130 ngā tamariki me ngā mema o te whānau i haere mai i te ao katoa ki te ratonga. Mō tētahi wāhanga o te ratonga, tokowhā o rātau i kōrero ki a Esther Rantzen mō ō rātou wheako haere ki UK i runga i te Kindertransport. Ko tētahi o ērā ko Ruth, 13 ōna tau i tana haerenga ki Rānana. I kī a ia i te mutunga o tana tiaki i tētahi pēpi i haere tahi me tana rōpū, a, ka whāngaia te kōhungahunga ki te tiakarete i muri i te pakarutanga o tana pounamu miraka. "Ko taku pūmahara ki te titiro atu i te matapihi me te kite i ngā kanohi katoa o o mātau whanaunga, i te roimata, i te māharahara nui, ka noho tonu ki a au mo ake tonu atu," tana kī. I kī a Ruth i whakaaro ia ki a Tā Nicholas he matua, ka tāpiri mai: "Ko ia te tauira tino tangata o te tangata ka kitea e tātau." Ko tētahi atu o ērā i whakaorangia, ko Hugo, i whakamihi ki ngā mātua i tuku i a rātau tamariki ki runga i te Kindertransport me Tā Nicholas. I tāpiritia e ia kua "whakaaweawe" a Tā Nicholas i ngā mātua ki tōna maia, i muri iho i te tautoko mō te Kindertransport kua "horapa pēnei i te ahi". I te tirohanga a Mario Cacciottolo, i te Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o te Guildhall i te haruru mahana o ngā hoa, ngā rangatira me ngā whānau i te huihuinga a te tangata ki te whakanui i te oranga o te tangata i mōhiotia e rātau ko "Nicky". I te wā e whiu ana te piana i ngā kī o te piana matua pango, ka haere ētahi o te hunga i runga i te Kindertransport i raro i ngā kopere matua o te hōro, ka mauria mai a rātau tama me a rātau tamāhine. Ko ēnei tāngata katoa he wāhanga o te whānau whānui o Tā Nicholas Winton. I te tīmatanga o te takahanga, ka takoha te tamāhine a Tā Nicholas, a Pāpa, ki tōna pāpā, e kī ana kua huihui katoa rātau ki te "kōpeke i tōna oranga roa", i kī hoki a ia ko tētahi o te "aroha, te kata, te hiahia me te tukutahi". I te toru o ona tau, ka haere a Eva Paddock, e 80, e noho ana ināianei i Cambridge, i Massachusetts i te US, i taua haerenga whakaora me tōna tuahine. "Kei a au taku whānau, ā, ki a mātau he tikanga whakawhiti. He tauira a Nicky mo te tangata i mahi ina hiahiatia he mea. "He tino ngākau whakaaro, he tino nekeneke te noho ki konei. He tino hira te noho ki konei me taku whānau whānui." Ko tētahi o ngā tamariki Kindertransport, ko Hana Isaac-Kleiner, e 88 ināianei, i kī atu ki te BBC i whakaorangia e Nicholas Winton o rātau ora. Ka kī a ia: "Ko ia tētahi o ngā torutoru i runga i te tīma i Prague i tino mōhio ki ngā mea e puta ana i Tiamana me Ateria kia mōhio ai kei te tūtata mai te mōrearea ki te iwi Hurai." Ko tētahi atu, ko Kurt Taussig, 92, mai i Stanmore, Harrow, i kī kāore ia i haere mai ki ngā takahanga Kindertransport engari ka "kauhoe i tētahi moana kia noho ki konei". "Kāore anō kia mahia te mahi a taua tangata i mua, i tētahi wā rānei. He tino ahurei a ia i te whakatutukitanga o tētahi merekara." E whitu tau a Tēnā Taussig i roto i te RAF i muri i tana haerenga mai i runga i te Kindertransport. Ko te Ingarangi nāna i whakaora ngā tamariki i te Holocaust I pēhea te whakaora a tētahi Ingarihi i ngā tamariki e 669 i te Holocaust? Ko ētahi atu i reira i te karakia ko Lord Alfred Dubs, Lady Milena Grenfell-Baines me te Rev John Fieldsend, he wāhanga katoa rātou o te Kindertransport, tae atu ki ngā māngai mai i ngā kāwanatanga o Tiamana me Huitene. He koha anō tā te ratonga mai i te Ariki Dubs me te karere o mua o Tieke, a Michael Zantovsky. I pātai mai he aha te karere e tika ana kia tangohia e te tangata i te oranga o Tā Nicholas, ka kī a Ariki Dubs: "Ki taku whakaaro ko te mea e tika ana kia kitea e rātau ko te pūrākau te whakamanamana o te wairua tangata i kī ai tētahi tangata ka mahi ia i tētahi mea me te whakaora i te Holocaust, ā, i mahia e ia." I haere tonu a Tā Nicholas ki te mahi hapori i Maidenhead, Berkshire. E kōrero ana tamariki mōrehu a Nick rāua ko Barbara Winton i ngā takahanga puta noa i te ao me pēhea e taea ai e te tangata kotahi te huri i ngā oranga. I tuhia e Barbara Winton tana haurongo If It's Not Impossible, ko te taitara i tangohia mai i tana pepeha: "Ki te kore tētahi mea e kore e taea, me whai huarahi ki te mahi." A separate memorial concert is to take place on Friday at St John's Smith Square in central London, including readings by actors Jason Isaacs and Rupert Graves and music from celllist Alexander Baillie, raising funds for current child refugees.

title: Kua kore te pāpāho Rūhia e whakamīharo i te Tūruhi
summary: Mō ngā marama maha, kāore he mea a te pāpāho pro-Kremlin engari he whakamihi ki a Donald Trump.
text: Nā Steve RosenbergBBC News, Mohihi I te wā o te whakahau pōti a Amerika, i whakaahuatia ia e ngā pānui pouaka whakaata kāwanatanga o Rūhia me ngā nūpepa kāwanatanga i a ia hei momo Rawiri e mau ana i te Koriata o tētahi "hāmate... E kino ana ki Rūhia" te rangatira o Washington. I pōhiritia e rātau ana karanga mo te whanaungatanga mahana ake o Amerika-Rūhia. I whakatangihia e rātau ētahi o ana kōrero rerekē. Tata tonu ki te mea he kaitono perehitini o Amerika, ā, i muri iho he perehitini hou o Amerika, kua noho ko te tama koura o ngā tōrangapū o Rūhia. I te Hānuere i whiwhi ai a ia i ētahi atu kōrero i roto i te pāpāho o Rūhia i a Perehitini Tūroro. Engari ka kitea e au he rerekētanga o te oro. I te Paraire, i whakapaea e te nūpepa tino pai o Rūhia, a Komsomolskaya Pravda, a Perehitini Trump ki te mahi kōrero "tūturu" mō te NATO. Ka whakamāramatia e te pepa: "(I te wā o te whakahau pōti) I karangatia e te Tūruhi te Pūtahitanga he tawhito, he koretake. He iti iho i te rua marama kua hipa mai i tana neke ki te Tari Porotītaha, ā, kua whakapuakina kētia e ia te tautoko katoa mō te NATO. "E ai ki te kōrero, me haurangi koe kia mārama ai koe ki te tūnga pono o te perehitini o Amerika." E kī ana a Tillerson 'ātete, pōraru' i te putanga o te Paraire o te pepa kāwanatanga o Rūhia, o Te Rūhia Gazeta: "Nō nā tata nei i mahi ai te Whare Mā i ngā kōrero tūpono, hotokore hoki mō te aronga kaupapahere ā-rohe o te tīma o Te Puhi, tae atu ki ngā take e pā ana ki ngā painga o Rūhia." Mā te pūrongo i te hui o te Rāwiki i Bonn i waenganui i te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rūhia, o Te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rūhia, o Te Hēkeretari hou o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika, o Rex Tillerson, e whakatūpato ana te pepa "i mārama te āhua o te ātete, ā, i te wā kotahi, ka pōraru te āhua o Tillerson". Ināianei, ka whakatūpato a Nezavisimaya Gazeta ki te "nui rawa o te Trumpophilia". A, i raro i te pēhanga tautoko a Perehitini Trump i te kāinga i runga i ngā hononga whakapae ki Rūhia, e rangirua ana te umanga o ia rā ka whai "ngāwaritanga... i roto i ngā kōrero ki Rūhia. "Ko ia hipanga ka mahia e ia, otirā ko ngā mana whakahaere, ka tirohia i raro i te karu whakarahi. He uaua tonu ki te whakapono ināianei he matapihi wātea (hei whakapai ake i te whanaungatanga) i āhua pai ai te whakarewa i a mātau mōhiti me te whakaoho i te wikitōria o te Puhi." Ko te whakatikatika anō i te arotahi i ngā rā tata nei, he iti iho te Tūruhi i runga i te pouaka whakaata o Rūhia. Ko te tukunga iho o te kaitohutohu haumarutanga ā iwi o te perehitini, a Michael Flynn i te Tūtira, tērā pea i puta he kupu matua puta noa i te ao. Engari kāore i whakahuatia i roto i te pānui rongokōrero o te ahiahi o te pouaka whakaata o Rūhia. He mea whakamīharo tēnā, mehemea ko Rūhia te pūtahi o te pūrākau. Tērā ētahi pūrongo kua tohutohutia te pouaka whakaata kāwanatanga kia whakahoki i tana pānuitanga o te perehitini o Amerika. Kua ākiritia ēnei e te Pirihitini hei "rongo". "I korerotia mai ki a au e tētahi tangata e tūhono tata ana ki tētahi o ngā kamupene pouaka whakaata matua o Rūhia e tīari ana aua tohutohu, ā, i tukuna i te oho o te haerenga o Te Rūhia," te kī a Konstantin Eggert, he kaiwaiata tōrangapū mō te hongere takitahi o TV Rain. "Ki taku mōhiotanga, ehara te ariā i te tino nui ki te whakaatu i a ia i roto i tētahi mārama tōraro, engari ki te tauine i te whānuitanga o Te Hononga o Amerika. E whakaaro ana ahau ka whakahekea hoki te pānuitanga tōrunga o te Puhi. Ko te ariā o Te Pirihitini ko te whakaiti i ngā tūmanako mai i tēnei whakararuraru i waenganui i Mohihi me Washington." I kī atu te kōrero a Perehitini Hapa ki ngā pūrongo o TE AO o te raweke a Te Rūnanga he "otaota pūmau" me te "rongo kōrero". "Kei ngā hongere pouaka whakaata me te pāpāho Rūhia te tino rangatiratanga ki te whakatau i tā rātou ake kaupapahere ētita," te kī mai a Dmitry Peskov ki a au. I pātai atu ahau ki a ia mehemea i whakaaro a ia he rerekē te āhua nei kua whakahekea e ngā hongere pouaka whakaata o Rūhia ta rātau pānuitanga ki a Tēnā Puhi. "Kia pono, kāore mātou e āta ako i ngā wāhanga e pūrongotia ai ngā pūrākau rerekē," tana whakautu. Ka whakaritea e Mātau he huarahi tūpato ki Rūhia Rūhia: Kāore e taea e te heitara te rūrū i te wāhi e tū ana a Te Puhi i runga i ngā take matua o ngā hākari moata? I tērā Whiringa o Whiringa ā Rangi, ka whakaae mai tētahi mana Rūhia ki a au kua whakanuia e ia te wikitōria o Tēnā Puhi - me te hikareti me te pounamu champagne. He aha te take i papatahi ai te champagne? Na te whakatau i te tauhohenga riri a ngā kaipōrangapū matua o Rūhia, ka matekiri a Mohihi i te haerenga o Mikaera. I toa te kaitohutohu o te Pāpāho i ngā here tata atu ki a US-Rūhia. Kātahi ka puta mai ngā kōrero o te Whare Mā mō Crimea, e whakamārama ana e tūmanako ana a Perehitini Trump kia whakahokia e Rūhia te koiora tāpiri ki Ukraine. Ki Rūhia he hurihanga ohorere 180 waeine. I te wā o te whakahau pōti, ka kī atu a Donald Trump ki te pouaka whakaata ABC: "Ko te iwi o Crimea, mai i tāku i rongo ai, he pai ake ki Rūhia i te wāhi i noho ai rātau." A, i te Rāitema he iti iho te ngākau nui o te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho ki te ariā o te rapprochement ki Moscow. I kī te Hēkeretari Whakangungu o Amerika, a Hemi Mātiti, "kāore a Washington i roto i tētahi tūnga i tēnei wā ki te mahi tahi i runga i te taumata hōia... Kua tūkinotia e nga mahi whakatuki a Rūhia te ture o te ao whānui, ā, kei te pōhēhē." I whakaaturia e te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika, a Rex Tillerson, "ka whakaaro a Amerika ki te mahi tahi me Rūhia". Ehara tēnā i te tautoko tangi. Heoi anō, kua whakamāramatia e Donald Trump e whakapono tonu ana a ia ki tētahi pātahitanga pai ake ki a Tūroro me Rūhia he pai mō Amerika. Ka taea anō e ia te noho hei kaingākau Amerika o te pāpāho o Rūhia? Ka whakawhirinaki tērā ki te āhei ngā perehitini e rua ki te whakatū i tētahi pātahitanga pai ina tūtaki rāua. Engari kei te āhua tonu hoki o te nui o te pēhanga a Perehitini Trump i taua wā, i runga i ngā tūhononga Rūhia e kiia ana e tana tīma.

title: Lincoln Cathedral's WW2 water tank to be excavated in dig
summary: Me keri tētahi kura nui, i raro i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao hei whakarato wai ki te pā ki te Whare Karakia o Lincoln e tētahi poho hau.
text: Ko te kura tāwere ināianei, e tanumia ana ki te taha raki o te whare karakia, me tango i roto i tētahi keri hapori i te tau 2017. Ināianei kua puta mai ngā pikitia o tōna hanganga me te whakamahinga a ngā kaipatu ahi i te wā o te pakanga. He wāhanga te mahi o tētahi kaupapa £16m hei whakahou i te whare karakia me ōna taunga. Live updates on this story and others from Lincolnshire Susan Taylor has found the photographs, some showing her grandfather Frank Brown who was a member of Lincoln Fire Brigade during the war. E whakaatu ana ngā whakaahua i te rōpū e āwhina ana ki te hanga i te kura me te "hopu i tētahi tīma e mahi tahi ana ki te āwhina ki te pare i to mātau whare karakia utu nui", tana kī. Kua whakaritea he pokapū manuhiri hou me te mokowā whakaaturanga hei whakaatu i ētahi o ngā taonga o te whare karakia ki te wāhi e noho ana te kura wai. I kī te kaihoahoa o te whare karakia me te kaitirotiro o Nicholas Rank ka whakaaturia e te keri ngā mōhiohio hītori mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, mai i ngā whare i runga i te pae i mua i te tāutatanga o te kura wai. He wā tērā e kite ai i "te mahi tuatahi i mahia hei pare i te whare karakia i ngā tuki hau whakawehi". Ko te whenua o Dean's Green he waihanga i tētahi wāhi waho hou, ā, me whakaora hoki te West Front i raro i ngā mahere. I whakatapua te whare karakia tuatahi i runga i te wāhi i hangaia e Pīhopa Remigius i te tau 1092, ā, ka haere tonu te hanganga puta noa i te wā o te tau waenganui.

title: E kī ana te minita i ngā toa o Guernsey 'e hiahia ana ki te mōhiotanga' i runga i te tauhokohoko o te Rātapu,
summary: E "hiahia ana ngā umanga ki te mōhiotanga" mō ngā huringa ki ngā ture mo te tauhokohoko i ngā Rātapu, i muri i te nekehanga ki te whakakeke i te ture.
text: I tērā marama i whakaae ai ngā Kāwanatanga o Guernsey ki te tango i ngā mana i te tauhokohoko o te Rātapu mai i te Paraire, 11 o Hakihe. I whakakāhoretia tētahi whirinoa o te whakahōu i te pūnaha mana o nāianei, engari kua marohitia anōtia. Kua tonoa e te Minita Tauhokohoko me te Minita Mahi a Kevin Stewart ki ngā kawana i pōti mō te whakawāteatanga kia tautoko tūmatanui i te nekehanga kia mōhio ai ngā umanga. 'E whakaaro ana ki te whakatuwhera' He whakataunga mo te whakakore i te ture e tautuhi ana i ngā mana tauhokohoko o te Rātapu, me tango e ngā Kāwanatanga i te wiki i mua i te 11 o Hakihe. I kī a Jo Porritt, te upoko o te Rōpū Iti Hokohoko o te Chamber of Commerce o Guernsey: "Kei a mātou ngā kaihoko e tino whakaaro ana ki te whakatuwhera mō ngā Rātapu e ahu atu ana ki te Kirihimete, e mārama ana ko tētahi o ngā wā tino pukumahi o te tau. " E whakaatu ana tērā i ngā momo take mahi, arumoni hoki mō rātou, e rerekē ana mai i ngā kaimahi ki te whakarite ratonga utanga. "Mēnā ka whakatau ngā Kāwanatanga ināianei i muri i tēnei noho i runga i te tēpu mō ngā tau me ngā tau me ngā tau me ngā tau ki te mahi i tētahi huri-U ināianei, i tēnei wā e tika ana kia tautoko mātou i te whakahaerenga me tēnei wāhanga, he tino rawakore." Kua whakahokia kētia e ngā tohenga a Tuarua Al Brouard tana pūnaha whirinoa hei kōwhiringa mēnā ka whakatau ngā Kāwanatanga ki te whakakāhore i te whakakore i te ture. Kua īmēra atu a Tuarua Stewart ki ngā mema katoa o ngā Kāwanatanga o Guernsey e tono ana ki a rātau kia "whakaū anō i to rātau tūnga ki a au me te tautohe tūmatanui kia mau ki taua whakataunga". Ka kī a ia: "Ko te taupatupatu mo te tauhokohoko o te Rātapu he āhuatanga o ngā tōrangapū o Guernsey mo te 30 tau, ā, ko ngā tohenga i taea te mahi, kua mahia. " E whakapono ana ahau ka taea e tātau te hoatu i ngā kaihoko te mōhiotanga e hiahiatia ana e rātau mēnā kei te hinengaro mātou."

title: Kāore he raruraru o te Voice UK, e kī ana te kaikawe kōrero o TE AO
summary: E kī ana tētahi kaikōrero mō Te Reo kei te ara ngā mea i muri i ngā rongo kua puta e rua o ngā kaiako o te whakaaturanga, ā, tokorima anake ngā tāngata i huri ki tētahi whakamātautau.
text: Nā Chi Chi IzunduNewsbeat kaipānui whakangahau Kua pūrongotia kāore anō kia waitohu te kaiwaiata o Jessie J rāua ko Tā Tom Jones mō te rangatū tuarua. Engari e kī ana te AO kāore he mea i whakaūngia, ā, kei te haere tonu ngā kōrero ki ngā kaiako. Kāore ngā māngai mō Tā Tom Jones rāua ko Jessie J i whakaae ki te kōrero. I te mutunga wiki, i karangatia e ngā kaitohutohu pūmanawa mō te hōtaka ngā kaiwaiata i Birmingham kia haere mai ki te mahi mō rātou i runga i te tūmanako ka waitohu rātou me te rēhita tuihono, kātahi anō ka mahi mō ngā kaiako. Engari tokorima anake nga tauwhāinga i puta mai. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mo te whakaaturanga: "He pō hopuoro tuwhera noa iho te takahanga o te Hātarei. Ka whakahaere ā mātou whakamātautau whaimana puta noa i te motu i Aotearoa me Mahuru, ā, he tino nui tā mātou urupare. "Neke atu i te 25,000 ngā tāngata kua tono kē. He nui ake tēnā i tērā tau." I kī hoki rātau he pai ake te whiriwhiringa i te Rātapu. Applications for registration to audition for the show end on 28 July. I Hāmata, i whakahaua hoki te whakaaturanga ki te whakakore i tana haereere ora nā te rawakore o ngā hokonga tīkiti.

title: Northamptonshire County Council: Firm linked to commissioner wins contract
summary: Kua toa tētahi umanga whai hononga ki te komihana o te kaunihera i tētahi kirimana ki te mana e wātea ana ki te £7m.
text: He kaitohutohu utu hoki a Toni McArdle, he komihana i whakatūria e te kāwanatanga i te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Northamptonshire, i tētahi umanga e kiia nei ko Newton Europe. Ināianei he kirimana tā Newton Europe ki te whakawhanake i tētahi tauira whakahaere hōu mō te tari tiaki pāpori pakeke o te kaunihera. I kī tētahi kōrero mō nga komihana "he tino mārama, he tuwhera, he pūataata" mō tērā atu tūranga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua tino whakapuakina tēnei i runga i tana rēhita painga, ā, kaua e waiho noa iho i te rūma i te wā o ngā kōrero, kāore anō ia kia uru ki ngā mahi a te kamupene i Northamptonshire." I whakatūria nga komihana hai whakahaere i te kaunihera i a ia e uaua ana ki te whakahaere i tana tahua. Ka utua anake te kirimana ki te umanga o Oxfordshire, o Newton Europe, mēnā ka tukuna ngā penapena - e mōhiotia ana he kirimana "mōrearea me te utu". I utua te umanga i mua i te £435,000 mō tētahi kaupapa 12 wiki i whakahuatia ai te kirimana mōrearea me te utu, e ai ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata. I kī te manukura o te komiti tirotiro o te kaunihera, a Mick Scrimshaw o Labour, kāore a ia i te mōhio mēnā he papā o te hiahia. "E tūmanako ana ahau i tino tūpato te kāpata ki ngā take tūpono, ā, i āta haere ki roto i ētahi taipitopito i mua i te whakataunga," tana kī. I kī a Īna Mohi, he mema kāpata mō te tiaki pāpori pakeke i te kaunihera whakahaere Conservative, kua "whai i tētahi tukanga tiki tuwhera katoa, ā, i āta arotakea ngā tono i whiwhia". I kī a ia ko te mahi "e tū ana i runga i te āhua o te huringa nui, tae atu ki te arotahi ā-motu ki te hauora nui ake me te whakaurunga tiaki pāpori me te takatū mō ngā kaunihera unitary hou e rua i Aperira 2021". The county council and seven district and council will be scrapped in 2021 and replaced by two new unitary authorities. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka karangatia e te ratonga ohorere o Jersey ngā weto 'whakawehi ora'
summary: I tūtaki ngā moutere ki ngā āhuatanga "whakawehi ora" i te wā kāore i taea e rātou te waea 999 i ngā wā maha, kua kitea e tētahi kaiwhakahaere.
text: Nā ngā rahunga a ngā kaiwhakarato whatunga JT me Sure i ono ngā weto ohorere i Jersey i waenganui o Hānuere me Aperira. I kitea ngā waea ki ngā ratonga ohorere kua "rahua katoa" i te motu i te rua o ēnei wā. Mai i taua wā ka whakapārewa a JT, ā, i kī a Sure kua mahia "ngā huringa inamata". Kāore anō te Mana Whakahaere Whakataetae Jersey (JCRA) kia whakatau mēnā ka whaina tētahi kamupene. I tū te 7 me te 29 o Āperira, e ai ki te tūhuratanga a te JCRA. I ēnei wā kāore i taea e ngā moutere te whakapā atu ki ngā ratonga ohotata mō ngā wā kotahi haora me te 57 meneti, me te 41 meneti. I whakaahuatia e te kaiwhakarite ngā rahunga he "tino kore whakaaetia" me te "pōhēhē". 'Tino nui' I kī tētahi pūrongo a te Tari Ture me te Tari Take Kāinga ko te "raruraru tino nui" ko te wāhanga o tētahi pūnaha IT hōu nā TE AHA. I kī te JCRA he "tino nui" ōna hē i te mea ko te kaiwhakarato te kawenga mō te tūhono i ngā waea Jersey katoa ki ngā ratonga ohorere mā tōna pokapū waea. I whakapōhēhē te rangatira nui o te kamupene, a, ka kī mai ko ta rātau whakahaere waea "i hinga ki raro iho i te taumata e tūmanakohia ana e mātau". I kitea hoki e te JCRA kua takahi a Sure i tana raihana mā te kore e whakarite kia tae atu ngā kiritaki ki te whatunga JT. I kī te rangatira nui o Kirihi, kua mahia e te kamupene he "huringa wawe" hei whakarite i ngā ratonga ā muri ake he "māeneene me te pono". I whakamutua e te JCRA: "Waimarie, kāore he whara, he ngaromanga rānei o te ora e mōhiotia ana nā tētahi o ngā mahi e ono e kōrerotia ana i runga ake nei. " Ahakoa rā, e mārama ana ko ngā rahunga i puta ai tō rātou takanga i puta mai he mōrea mōrearea ki te iwi whānui." I tohutohutia ngā kamupene e rua kia mahi i ngā taki tautiakitanga ia 30 meneti, me te whakarato āheitanga mō ngā kaihautū takitahi.

title: Te matenga o te tiriti o Dawley: Tokorua i puritia i runga i te whakapae i te kōhuru
summary: Kua whakarewaina he uiui kōhuru i muri i te kitenga o tētahi tangata kua mate i te pokapū o te taone i te Rā Mekemeke.
text: I kitea te tau 32 tau i te 20:00 GMT. Kei te kitea tōna matenga he "kāore i te whakamāramatia" ā, kua whakamōhiotia tōna whanaunga, ka kī pirihimana. Tokorua nga tāngata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae i te kōhuru. E ngana ana ngā āpiha ki te whakataki i ētahi atu tāngata tokorua nāna i āwhina i te tūpāpaku kia uru ki roto i tētahi tīkiti i waho o te Talbot Inn. Kai taua rohe ētahi atu āpiha, ka tāpiritia e pirihimana. "Kei te kitea tēnei i tēnei wā, ā, kei te whānau o te tangata kua mate i tēnei wā uaua," te kī a Det Ch Insp Mark Bellamy. "E mōhio ana mātou i roto a ia i te Talbot Inn i Dawley i mua i te urunga ki roto i tētahi waka, ā, e whakapono ana mātou i āwhinatia ia e ngā tāngata tokorua e hiahia ana mātou ki te kōrero hei kaiwhakaatu ki a mātau uiui. " Kāore mātou i te whakapono kei roto ngā tāngata, ā, kei te tino rapua rātou hei kaiwhakaatu matua, ā, e hiahia ana ahau kia whakapā mai rātou ki a mātau." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Intel hei whakaroa i te whakanaotanga maramara rorohiko o Broadwell
summary: Kua kī a Intel, te kaihanga rorohiko nui rawa o te ao, ka takaware te whakanaotanga o tōna maramara rorohiko whakatupuranga panuku, o Broadwell, i te hauwhā.
text: I kī te rangatira nui o Kōrero Krzanich nā tētahi hē hangarau te takaware. E tūmanakohia ana kia tutuki i ngā rīpene Broadwell te raina pūtukatuka Haswell o te umanga, ā, ka karangatia kia pai ake te hiko, kia tere ake hoki. Ko Intel te kaihanga maramara rorohiko tōmua, ā, ko ōna hua whakahōu i te nuinga o te wā e akiaki ana i ngā hokonga rorohiko pona me te papamahi hōu. "He kaha te hiahia o mātau me o mātau hoa (whakanao) ki te tiki i a Broadwell ki te mākete," te kī a Tēnā Krzanich. "He iti noa iho tēnei i roto i te hōtaka." 'Taiao uaua' Ka puta mai te takaware i te pūrongotanga a Intel i tētahi hinganga iti i roto i ngā hua o te koata tuatoru, i whara i te pōturi o te tono mō ngā rorohiko whaiaro (RW). I pūrongotia he moni whiwhinga kupenga e $2.95bn (£1.86bn) mō ngā marama e toru ki te mutunga o Mahuru, i whakaritea ki te $2.97bn i te wā kotahi i tērā tau. Ko te wehenga e mahi ana i ngā rīwai mō ngā rorohiko papamahi i kite i te 3.5%. Ināianei kua hinga ngā hokonga rorohiko mō te ono hauwhā i roto i te haupae, ā, kua pā ki te iti rawa e rima tau i te wā o Hōngongoi ki te wā o Mahuru. Kua whara ngā hoko i te nui o te manakohanga me te hinganga o ngā utu o ngā paparorohiko me ngā waea ā-rorohiko, e mamae ana i ngā kaihanga rīpene rorohiko. "I tae mai te koata tuatoru i runga i te tūmanako, me te tupu iti i roto i tētahi taiao uaua," te kī a Tēnā Krzanich i roto i tētahi kōrero. Heoi anō, i pūrongotia e te umanga pokapū raraunga a Intel ngā hokonga pūkete o te $2.9bn, tae atu ki te 12%.

title: Te Whare Wānanga o Pānui ki te whakawātea i ngā kamupene hinu fossil
summary: Kua pānuitia e te Whare Wānanga o Pānui me hoko ana pūtea penapena katoa e toe ana i roto i ngā hinu fossil.
text: Ka whakakorea katoatia tana kōpaki i ngā kamupene hinu i roto i ngā marama, ā, ka purua kētia ki roto i ngā aronui kākāriki. Ka aukatia hoki e te whare wānanga tētahi pūtea penapena i roto i ngā kamupene e hanga rākau, tupeka, āhuaatua rānei mai i tana kōpaki hea me ngā here e £120 miriona. I kī te tumuaki tumuaki o Prof Robert Van De Noort i pai a ia ki te whakatutuki i tana tautohe ki te whakaiti i ngā pūtea penapena. Ka puta mai te whakataunga i muri i te whakatūnga o te whare wānanga i tētahi kaiwhakahaere pūtea hou o Cazenove Capital, ā, i hiahia ki te urupare ki ngā āwangawanga o ngā ākonga me ngā kaimahi. Ināianei ka whakahaeretia ngā taonga o te whare wānanga o Berkshire i runga i te waro kore. I kī a Prof Van De Noort: "Hei umanga, he kaiārahi ao mātau i roto i te rangahau taiao, ā, kua mahi kē mātou i ngā whāinga nui ki te whakaiti i ā mātou kohu waro me te tautoko i te toitū taiao. " I muri i tētahi tukanga wāhui uaua, e mōhio ana mātou kei tō mātou kaiwhakahaere pūtea hōu te āheinga ki te whakarārangi i ā mātou pūtea penapena ki tā mātou whāinga kia mārama me te whawhai i te huringa āhuarangi." I tāpiritia e te whare wānanga e tūmanako ana ki te whakaheke i tana whakamahinga pūngao mā te 45% i te tau 2021.

title: E kī ana te puku e whakaaro ana ia ki te whakawhānui i te ārai haere a US
summary: I kī a Perehitini Donald Trump e whakaaro ana ia ki te tāpiri whenua ki tana ārai haere tīariari kia kore ai e uru atu ki a Mātau.
text: Ko te āraitanga o nāianei - i hainatia e Tēnā Puhi i ngā tau e rua ki mua - ka katia ngā taitapa o Amerika ki ngā tangata whenua e whitu, ko te nuinga o te nuinga o ngā Mohimana. E pāngia ana a Ripia, Irana, Somalia, Hiria, Īmene, Kōrea ki te Raki me Penehūera. Kei te whakaarohia ngā whenua mai i Uropi, Āwherika me Āhia mō te raupapa whakawhānui, e ai ki te pāpāho o Amerika. I whakaūngia e Tēnā Puhi ka tāpiritia ētahi atu whenua. "Ka kite koe i ngā mea e haere ana i te ao, me haumaru tō tātau whenua," tana kī atu ki ngā kaipānui i te Wānanga Ohaoha o te Ao i Te Wenerei. Kāore a ia i hoatu ētahi atu taipitopito mō ēhea whenua ka ūngaia, e hia rānei, engari i kī ka tukua ngā mōhiohio "taro ake nei". Ko te rārangi whakawhānui, i pūrongotia tuatahitia e Politico, tērā pea ko Pērara, Myanmar (e mōhiotia ana hoki ko Burma), Eritrea, Kyrgyzstan, Nigeria, Sudan me Tanzania. Kua whakaarotia ngā putanga rerekē o tēnei rārangi i waenganui i te whakahaeretanga mō ngā wiki, ka kī te pāpāho o Amerika. I muri noa iho i te huritau e toru tau o te raupapa tuatahi, ka puta mai ngā pūrongo o te ārai whakawhānui. Ko te ārai tautohetohe, i hainatia e te perehitini e whitu rā i muri i tana mahi i te Hānuere 2017, i te tuatahi ka aukatia ngā kaihaere mai i ngā whenua e whitu o te nuinga o te Mohimana. I whakakētia te rārangi i muri i ngā rangatū o ngā whakamātautau kōti, ā, ināianei ka rāhuitia ētahi tangata whenua o Irana, Ripia, Somalia, Hiria, Īmene, Venezuela me Kōrea ki te Raki. I June 2018, ka tautokona e te Kōti Matua te āraitanga a Tēnā Puhi, ka whakakāhore i ngā kitenga mai i ngā kōti o raro e whakaaro ana he kore ture te whakakorenga. I kī te kaikōrero o te Whare Mā, a Hogan Gidley i roto i tētahi kōrero, kāore he pānuitanga hou a te whakahaere e pā ana ki te āraitanga, nāna i whakaahua he "tino angitu ki te pare i tō mātou whenua me te whakarewa i te tauanga haumarutanga puta noa i te ao". "Ko te whakaaro noa me te haumarutanga ā-motu e whakatau ana mēnā e hiahia ana tētahi whenua ki te whai wāhi katoa ki ngā papatono nekeneke a te U.S., me ū hoki rātou ki ngā tikanga haumarutanga me ngā tikanga ātete pūrarau," te kī a Tēnā Gidley. "Nā te mea kāore mātou e hiahia ki te kawemai i te pūtōraru, i tētahi atu tuma haumarutanga ā-motu rānei ki Te Hononga o Amerika." Kua kitea e ngā kaiwhakawāwā o te āraitanga ko ngā whakaekenga nui pēnei i ngā whakaekenga 9/11 o Niu Ioka, te whakapae o te omaoma o Boston me te whakaekenga o te hōpua pō o Otaota, i kawea e ngā tāngata mai i ngā whenua kāore i runga i te rārangi, e ngā kaihōia rānei i whānau mai i a Mātau. Ā, kāore i te rite ki te rārangi tuatahi, ko ngā tāpiritanga ka taea ko ngā whenua whai pānga kaha ki a Mātau. Hei tauira, ko Nigeria he hoa tautohetohe mō te US.

title: E anga ana te 'mahi taurua' o TE MEP o Natana Gill ki te pana a te rōpū
summary: E anga ana te kaiārahi o UKIP i Uēra ki te pananga i te rōpū nā ngā māharahara ki a ia e mahi ana hei MEP me te mema whakaminenga.
text: I pōti te Komiti Nui o te Rōpū ā Iwi ki te tango i a Natana Gill ki te kore ia e whakarere i tētahi o ana tūnga i pōtitia. Kua tohu a Tēnā Gill i a Uēra i te Pāremata o Ūropi mai i te tau 2014, ā, i toa i tētahi tūru i te Senedd i te pōtitanga o Me. I kī te MEP he "ārai manapori" me te "koretake" te whakataunga. I roto i tētahi reta tūwhera, ka kī a Tēnā Gill: "Ehara i te mea mā te NEC e whakamōhio mai ki a au me pēhea te whakatutuki i te tono kua hoatu ki a au e te pōti." I kī a ia "e kore a ia e whakahaua e te NEC ki te tuku i ngā tūnga i pōtitia ai ahau e te iwi o Weera, i whakatūria rānei e te kaiārahi rōpū". I tāpiritia e Tēnā Gill tērā pea ka "mārama te takahi i te kirimana". E tūmanakohia ana kia kōrerorerotia e tētahi hui rōpū o ngā AM o UKIP te take i te Tūtira. I kī te kaiārahi rōpū Whakaminenga o UKIP, a Neil Hamilton, e kōrero ana i te National Eisteddfod, ko te pōti ki a Tēnā Gill "kāore he pānga ki te whawhai". "I a ia e rapu ana i te whakaingoatanga mo te whakaminenga, ka kī a ia mēnā ka pōtitia ia ka tū ia hei MEP me te tuku i tōna wā ki te whakanui ake i ngā painga o te iwi o Weera. Kāore anō a ia kia pērā," tana kī. "E wehi ana ahau e whitu noa iho mātau i roto i te 60 mema o te whakaminenga. Kāore e taea e mātou te utu i ngā AM wā, haurua wā rānei. He kōwhiringa tāna. Kāore e taea e koe te mahi tika i ngā mahi e rua. Me kōwhiri e ia tētahi, tētahi atu rānei." I te Paraire, ka kī te manukura o UKIP Wales, a Pirihi Smart, me hīpae a Tēnā Gill hei MEP hei kaiwhakawhiwhi ināianei. I kī a Tēnā Smart i a Hemi Kora - ko ia te tau tuarua i runga i te rārangi Uēra o UKIP i te pōtitanga o Ūropi 2014, ā, kua rite anō ki te rōpū - kua rite ki te whakahaere. Heoi anō, i kī a Tēnā Gill i mua i ngā karanga kia waiho e ia te tūranga i hangaia i runga i te "kino".

title: Kōhuru a Jodie Chesney: E hiahia ana te pāpā o te kōtiro i okaina ki te 'tika'
summary: Kua kī te pāpā o tētahi kōtiro 17 tau i okaina ki te mate i roto i tētahi pāka, ko tana tamāhine "atawhai" "kāore i tika" kia patua.
text: I maripi a Jodie Chesney i muri i a ia e purei pūoro ana me ōna hoa i te pāka ki te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi i te Paraire. Ināianei e whakapono ana ngā pirihimana "tae atu ki te whā" ngā kaihōia i whakaurua, i mua i te rapu i ngā tāngata tokorua. Ka kī te pāpā o Jodie, a Pita: "E mōhio ana tētahi tangata nā wai tēnei i mahi. E hiahiatia ana e Jodie te tika." Ko tētahi tangata 20 tau i hopukina i Aotearoa i te Tūtira i runga i te whakapae i te kōhurutanga o Jodie. I tukuna e te kaiwhakawā he toronga ki nga pirihimana ki te tepe wā pupuri. I Scotland Yard i te Rāitema, ka kī a Tēnā Chesney ko wai nāna i patu tana tamāhine he "wehi", ā, ka tohe ki tētahi tangata whai mōhiohio mō te whakaekenga kia haere mai ki mua. "E mōhio ana tētahi ko wai tērā," tana kī. "Kāore e taea e koe te whiwhi kudos mo te okaina i tētahi tau 17 tau ki muri. " Nā reira, me mahi noa iho, pātītī ki runga, ehara tēnei i te pai." I kī a Tēnā Chesney kua ngaro i tana tamāhine "te nui o te toto" i roto i te "whakaekenga kino" ā, e mārama ana "ko te tikanga o tētahi tangata ki te kōhuru i a ia". I a Jodie me ōna hoa e tata ana ki tētahi papa tākaro tamariki i Harold Hill i te wā i okaina ai ia i roto i tētahi whakaekenga kore take. Neke atu i te haora i muri i te karangatanga o ngā āpiha ki te pāka i Romford, ki te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, tata ki te 21:25 GMT. I pātai mai he aha te āhua o Jodie, ka kī a Tēnā Chesney he "geek whakahīhī" a ia, he "kōtiro tino pai". I kī a ia ko te weu o tōna oranga "he pai, he atawhai noa iho. Kaore he kino i roto i tōna tinana". I kī a Tēnā Chesney kua haehae te whānau i te matenga o Jodie, ā, he "pārekareka" rātau, ka tāpiri: "Kāore mātou i te mōhio me pēhea te mahi. " Kei te mamae te katoa nā te mea he tino pai a ia. Kāore e taea e te katoa te whakapono - he aha ia? "Ehara i te mea e tika ana kia patua tētahi oranga i runga i tētahi atu, engari ko ia, he tino atawhai a ia." I kī te whaea matua o Jodie, a Joanne, he "tino maroke" te taiohi, ā, "kāore he tātari" - i ngā wā katoa e kōrero ana i tōna hinengaro mēnā e hiahia ana tētahi ki te rongo, kāore rānei. I te mau rīpene waiporoporo a Tēnā Chesney i hangaia e ngā hoa o Jodie. I kī a ia e tae ana ōna hoa ki te waiporoporo i o rātau makawe i runga i tōna hōnore, koia hoki tōna tae makau. Ko Jodie te tuarima o nga taitamariki i okaina ki te mate i te pūmatua i tēnei tau. I kī a Det Ch Insp Dave Whellams, he āpiha mō te neke atu i te 30 tau, ko te patunga o Jodie "tētahi o ngā mea kino rawa kua puta mai i ahau" nā te mea he "tino kore take". I tāpiri mai a ia: "E whakaaro ana ahau i ia rā i te haerenga o te tūhuratanga ka tata atu tātau ki te pono, me te tata atu ki te tohu ko wai rātou. " E whakapono ana ahau he nui ake i te rua o rātau e pā ana, tērā pea tae atu ki te whā, ā, he pango tētahi o rātou, ā, he mā tētahi o rātou." I kī hoki a Det Ch Insp Whellams kāore i taea e ia te maumahara ki tētahi takikupu o te hara maripi i tino kino i tōna wā i roto i te ope.

title: Hōhipera o Basildon: Na te 'waihotanga' i āwhina ki te matenga o te pēpi haora
summary: Tērā pea ka ora tētahi tamaiti pēpi mehemea kāore i te waihotia e te hōhipera o Essex, kua whakamutua e te koroni.
text: I mate a Ennis Pecaku i ngā haora i muri i tōna whānautanga i te Hōhipera o Basildon, i muri i ngā "hinganga nui" a ngā kaimahi e tiaki ana i tōna whaea o Louise Davies. I tae mai i te rā i muri i te whakakorenga o te wāhanga C a Ms Davies nā te iti o te moenga, ka rongo te Kōti o Te Kōti o Te Koroni o Essex. I haere a ia ki te mahi a tērā rā, i tērā o Mahuru, engari i te wā i tirohia ai ia kāore i taea te C-section. Ko ngā iti o ngā kaimahi, ngā hēnga whakawhitiwhiti kōrero me ngā take huri noa i te whakamātautau, i kitea katoatia he hinganga e karapoti ana i te tiaki a Ms Davies, i kōrerotia te rongo i Chelmsford. 'Kaua rawa e kōrero, e haere rānei' i whānau a Ennis i te 27 o Mahuru 2018 i te 19:39 BST, ā, i hiahiatia kia whakaorangia i mua i te maunga ki te rōpū kōhungahunga kōhungahunga rānei. E whakaarohia ana i mua i te whānautanga o Ennis i te 25 meneti, ā, kua mutu hoki tana hāhā i te wā o te whakawhānautanga. E ono haora i muri iho, ka korerotia ki ōna mātua he tino rawakore tōna āhuatanga, e kore rawa ia e haere, e kōrero rānei, ā, ka whakatau rāua ki te whakaweto i tana tautoko ora i ngā haora tōmua o te 28 o Mahuru. "Tērā ētahi hinganga nui i roto i te tiaki i hoatu ki te pēpi Ennis me tōna whaea e te Hōhipera o Basildon. Tērā pea ka pai ake te hua o te raweke i te wā tika," te kī a te koroni matua o Caroline Beasley-Murray i roto i tētahi whakamutunga kōrero. "Tērā pea ka ora a Pēpi Ennis mēnā i whānau mai i mua i te 19:16 i te 27 o Mahuru 2018. Na te waihotanga i āwhina ai [tōna] matenga." 'Ngaromanga whakararuraru' I muri i te whakarongo, ka kī ngā mātua o Ennis, mai i Grays, Essex: "E koa ana mātou ki te whakamutunga o te koroni, ā, ko te rangatū o ngā hinganga i kitea i te whakarato rongoā taketake ki a Louise me te pēpi Ennis, he nui tonu te waihotanga. " Kāore he mea e huri i te putanga mō tō mātou whānau me te ngaromanga kino o ta māua tama." I kī a Diane Sarkar, te āpiha nēhi matua i te Rōpū Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Mid me South Essex i mōhio te hōhipera "ehara te tiaki i homai i taua wā i te paerewa e tūmanakohia ana e mātau. " "Mā mātou e whakarite kia ako mātou i ngā akoranga katoa e taea ana mai i tēnei takahanga kino", tana kī. He maha ngā huringa kua mahia i te hōhipera i muri i te matenga o Ennis.

title: Ko te teihana hiko o Drax hei whakamutu i te tahu waro i Maehe 2021
summary: Ko te kamupene pūngao o Drax me whakamutu te tahu waro i tōna teihana hiko o Te Raki o Aotearoa - i tētahi o ngā whakapoke nui rawa atu o Uropi ki te uru - mai i Poutāpeta 2021.
text: E kī ana ka katia ōna wae waro e rua i te wā o Mahuru 2022 me te ngaronga o ngā mahi e 230 i te pae tata ki Selby. I mua i te āraitanga a te kāwanatanga i runga i te hiko waro i te tau 2025. I kī a Drax kua whakaritea he kōrero ki te Mātiti ā-Motu, te kaiwhakahaere me te kāwanatanga i mua i te whakatau kia whakamutua te whakatipuranga waro arumoni. "Ko te whakamutu i te whakamahinga waro i Drax he tohu i roto i a mātau mahi haere tonu ki te panoni i te umanga me te noho hei kamupene tōraro waro ā-ao i te tau 2030," te kī a te rangatira nui o Will Gardiner. He nui ake ngā pūrākau mai i te Waro o Aotearoa e tohu ana i te 3% o te whakatipuranga hiko a Drax i te 2019, heke iho i te 30% i te 2016. Kua nui haere te kaha o Ingarangi ki te wean i tana hiko i te waro. I tērā tau i neke atu i te rua wiki te haere o ngā whatunga hiko o te whenua me te kore tahu i tētahi puranga kotahi, i whakaarotia ko te wā tuatahi mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Tae atu ki te 08:00 GMT i te Rāitema, ko te waro anake e whakarato ana i te 1.9% o ngā hiahia pūngao o te whenua. Kua whakakapia nuitia e te korohū, nāna i whakarato te 50% me te hau, 17%. Heoi anō, kei te whakamahia tonutia te waro mō ngā take mahi, pēnei i te hanga tīra. Ka whakaputa kē a Drax i te hiko mai i ngā biomass mā te tahu i ngā pellets rākau. I kī a Tēnā Gardiner: "Mā te whakamahi i ngā biomass pūmau, kāore anō mātou kia haere tonu ki te hanga i te hiko haumaru e hia miriona ngā kāinga me ngā umanga e whakawhirinaki ana, kua tākaro hoki mātou i tētahi tūranga nui ki te whakahohe i te pūnaha hiko o UK kia tere ake te whakaheke i ētahi atu i te ao." Heoi anō, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā o ngā biomass e pā ana ki te whakawhāititanga, ā, ka whakahauhau i ngā kaiahuwhenua kia whakatipu i ngā kaiahuwhenua kia tahuna anake. I kī te kamupene i whakaritea te hua i mua i te tāke i te £142m i te 2019, mai i te £37m i te tau i mua, i runga i ngā moni hua o te £4.7bn, tae atu ki te 11%.

title: Kāore i te tino tawhiti ngā mahere whakatamariki, ka kī atu ngā AM ki ngā minita
summary: Kua whakahētia tētahi mahere hei whakapai ake i te ratonga whakatamariki i Uēra kāore i te nui rawa te tautoko e hiahiatia ana mō ngā whānau.
text: The proposed national adoption service would bring together councils to form a single service. Engari i kitea e tētahi uiui ki te mahere ngā maiorooro tae atu ki te āhua o te tauria me te aromatawai me te tautoko i hoatu. I kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh ka tapahia e tana kaupapa ngā rārangi tatari whakatamariki. E kī ana ngā āpiha e kore te ratonga e whakakapi i ngā kaupapa whakatamariki, engari ka āwhina ki te tango i te tāruatanga e tātuhi ana i te tukanga o te whakaae ki ngā mātua tūpono me te kimi kāinga pūmau mō ngā tamariki. Ko ngā mema whakaminenga e noho ana i runga i te komiti tamariki me te rangatahi i "whakamihi" i ngā kaupapa, i pānuitia i tērā tau, ā, kei te tuwhera ināianei mō te whakaritenga. Engari i kī ngā mema kāore i tino tawhiti ngā tono e kī ana me "tino whakakaha" te kaupapa, ā, i hangaia he rēhita whakatamariki ā-motu. I kitea he rerekē ngā ratonga whakatamariki huri noa i Weera, tae atu ki te āhua o te tauria me te aromatawai i ngā kaiwhāngai. I kī te komiti me nui ake te mahi a ngā kura me ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro ki te tautoko i ētahi tamariki whāngai. I kī hoki kua rongo mai i ngā tāngata e uaua ana ki te rēhita kia whakaarotia hei matua whāngai. I taunakitia e te komiti: I kī a Christine Chapman AM, te tūru o te komiti: "Ki te kore e hurihia ngā tono o nāianei, ka hapa tētahi wā nui ki te whakapainga i ngā oranga o ngā whānau whāngai me ētahi o ngā tamariki mōrearea rawa i Weera." I kī a Gwenda Thomas, te minita tuarua mō ngā tamariki me ngā ratonga pāpori, i whakaae ia ki te komiti e hiahiatia ana he "mahi taketake" hei "panoni" i ngā ratonga whakatamariki i Weera. "Koia tērā e mahi ana mātou ki te huri i te pūnaha. " Kei te whakamahi mātou i ō mātou mana hou, mā te Pire Ratonga Pāpori me te Oranga (Wales), ki te tohutohu i ngā mana ā-rohe kia huihui ki te hanga i tētahi ratonga whakatamariki ā-motu, kia taea ai te rutu i ngā maiorooro o nāianei i roto i te tukunga ratonga," tana kī. "Mā tēnei e panoni te ratonga whakatamariki i Weera, e taea ai te whakangao anō i te pūmautanga mō ngā tamariki kāore e taea te whakakotahi anō ki ō rātou whānau me te whakarato i te tika nui ake i roto i ngā ratonga i muri i te whakatamarikitanga." I kī a Yvonne Rodgers, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te aroha tamariki o Barnardo's Cymru, kei te tohutohu kē rātau i te kāwanatanga o Welsh mō te whakatamarikitanga, engari i pōhiritia ngā tūtohutanga a te komiti kia whakapai ake i te ratonga. "In particular we welcome the significance given in the report to post placement support to adopters and their families which is crucial in minimizing the risk of placement breakdown and offers continuous support to them in their parenting role," said Ms Rodgers. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te whakaraupapa i te tukanga whakatamariki he wāhanga kotahi anake o te jigsaw. We urgently need more potential adopters to come forward to provide these vulnerable children with loving and stable homes."

title: Kimi tautoko ngā ingoa rohe ipurangi .wales me .cymru
summary: E tohu ana tētahi uiuinga o ngā umanga me ngā kiritaki o Welsh e tautoko ana te nuinga o rāua tahi i te iwi ki te whiwhi i tōna ake ingoa rohe.
text: Mā te neke e tuku i ngā rangatira paetukutuku te wā ki te whakamutu i tō rātou wāhitau ki te .wales me te .cymru, kaua ko .uk. Ka whakaaetia e te kaiwhakarite Ipurangi ICANN ngā whenua me ētahi atu rōpū whakahaere ki te hoatu mō ngā ingoa hōu mai i Hānuere. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko ka āwhina pea ki te waitohu, engari ka whakatūpato ngā kaiwhakawāwā ka nui ake pea te wā tinihanga. I whakaritea te poipoi e te ratonga rēhita rohe kore hua o Nominet. E tohu ana e 69% o ngā kiritaki i pūrua i te nekehanga me te 59% o ngā umanga Welsh me ētahi atu tinana. I whakamahia e te poipoi he tauira o ngā tangata e 1,003 - 21% o ēnei he kaikōrero Welsh - me ngā kaihanga whakatau matua e 250 i roto i ngā rōpū Welsh Heoi anō, i huatau te uiuinga kia wehea te ingoa hei tango. "I te taha o te kiritaki, he iti ake te manakohanga mō te .cymru," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere o te whanaketanga pakihi a Nominet, a Kete Hayward, ki te HAU. "I waenganui i ngā umanga, he kaha ake te manakohanga mō .wales hei āwhina i a rātau ki te mākete i a rātau ki waho o te whenua." Costs Nominet suggests one solution would be for the both name to be registered. Ka taea e ngā wāhitau paetukutuku e mutu ana ki tētahi hiku te ārahi i ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te wāhi kotahi. Heoi anō, kei te utu a ICANN i te $185,000 (£116,045) mō ia taupānga, ā, kāore e pai ana kia waiho a Wales hei take motuhake. I kī te minita pakihi o Welsh, a Edwina Hart, i tērā wiki kāore a ia i te whakaaro ki te utu mō tētahi taupānga. Kei te kōrero a Nominet ki te utu i ngā utu, ā, e kī ana ka whakatūria he tari paetata ki te tutuki ōna mahi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "E whakaatu ana ngā kitenga e hiahia ana ki te whakataurite i ngā whakaaro ohaoha me ngā whakaaro reo i te whakataunga i waenganui i te .cymru, .wales rānei, ā, mō tēnei mō te hunga e kōrero ana i te reo Welsh me te Ingarihi". Heoi anō, e kī ana tētahi kaihoko tauwhāinga, dotCYM, mā te hoatu i te mana Tautapa ki te hoko atu i te tuakiri o te whenua. Ngā painga I mahia e te tohutohu o te Ohaoha o Rāwāhi te poipoi hei wāhanga o tētahi akoranga whānui ake. "Ka taea e tētahi ingoa rohe Welsh te tākaro i tētahi tūranga tautoko tōrunga i roto i ngā ngohe e hāngai ana ki te whakarewa i te kōtaha parani o Uēra me te whakahauhau i ngā kawenga ake me te pūtea penapena whakaroto," te kī a te pūrongo. "Ka taea hoki e ia te whakarato i tētahi roma auau o te taumata iti engari he pānuitanga koreutu." Heoi anō, e whakatūpato ana hoki te akoranga he utu taua whakaaturanga. E kī ana me mahi ngā umanga me ētahi atu rangatira parani hei ārai i ngā pae whakahaere a ngā rōpū tuatoru me tō rātou ingoa. Ka anga atu hoki rātau ki ētahi atu utu mākete hei whakawhānui i ā rātou wāhitau hōu.

title: Ka whakawāteatia te kaipupuri korohū pānui mō ngā whare noho
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere ki te turaki i te kaipupuri korohū o Pānui hei whakawātea i tētahi paraka raorao.
text: I whakaae ngā kaikaunihera ki te kaupapa ki te haehae i te Kaipupuri Korohū No.4 i Alexander Turner Close i muri i te whakakāhore tuatahi i te whakawāteatanga i runga i ngā taunga haumaru. I mahia e Danescroft tētahi aromatawai mōrearea, ā, ka whakaritea he mehua hei ārai i te horahanga o te tāhaetanga kia whakaaetia ai te kaunihera. Ina tangohia te pourewa, e 130 ngā whare noho ka hangaia ki runga i te pae. I kī te kaikaunihera o Te Pānui o Mua, a Richard Stainthorpe, ka "tino pai ake ngā raorao mō tēnei wāhanga o Reading". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te kaipupuri korohū he taonga o mua, ā, ko te whenua kei runga he tauwāhi tino pai mō tētahi whanaketanga kāinga," engari i kī te kaiwhakaahua Pānui a Callum Cromwell i whakaaro ia he "wawau" ngā kaupapa, ā, ka tāpiritia ngā raorao ka "titiro atu ki waho o te wāhi me te pūāhua". " Ko te tikanga kia noho tonu te kaipupuri korohū," tana kī. Kua tipu ake ahau i te kitenga. He whakamā kei te ngaro i a Pānui tētahi wāhanga tuku iho mahi mai i mua." Ka tīmata ngā mahi i muri i te whakaotinga o tētahi pūranga whakaahua e ono marama e ngā kaiwhakawhanake hei "whakarato pūkete o te rawa tuku iho mō ngā whakatupuranga e heke mai nei", te kī a te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. The tower site has a cast iron column base structure dating back to 1887 which is to be uplifted and placed into an area away from any demolition activities, before a decision is made on its future resting place. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pānui Borough Council

title: I whakawāteatia a Enrique Pena Nieto o Mehiko hei perehitini
summary: Kua oatitia a Enrique Pena Nieto hei perehitini hou o Mehiko, e kī ana ki te whakarewa i te tupu o te ohaoha me te rutu i te tutu e pā ana ki te rongoā.
text: "Ko te whāinga tuatahi a taku kāwanatanga ko te mau mai i te rangimārie ki Mehiko," tana kī. E 60,000 ngā tāngata i mate i roto i te tutu e pā ana ki te rongoā i te wā o te ture a tōna tuatahi, a Felipe Calderon. I kikī te haumarutanga i Te Taone o Mehiko mo te whakatūnga i mua i te tūnga o nga kaiwhakahaere pōma penehīni ki nga pirihimana whakararuraru i pūhia he korohū roimata. I tino whara tētahi kaiwhakahaere i muri i te patua ki te ipu korohū roimata. E riri ana nga kaiwhakatūtū ki tā rātau e kī ana he hoko pōti na te whakahau a te perehitini, e kī ana te Will Grant a TE AO i Te Taone o Mehiko. I te nuinga o te wā e whakahē ana rātau ki te hokinga mai ki te mana o te Rōpū Takawaenga ā-Iwi (PRI) a Tēnā Pena Nieto i muri i te ngaronga o te 12 tau. Engari i roto i tana whaikōrero tuatahi i tētahi whare kawa i te pokapū o te taone tawhito, ka kī a Tēnā Pena Nieto kua "ngaro te whenua" o te kāwanatanga mai i te wā i mahue ai te mana o tana rōpū. "Kua whānako te ture me te tutu i ētahi wāhi o te whenua i te rangimārie me te wāteatanga," te kī a te tau e 46 tau. I mua ake, i waenganui i te pārekareka tētere puta, ka hoatu e Perehitini Putaatu a Piripi Calderon he kākahu me ngā kara o te haki o Mehiko ki a Tēnā Pena Nieto i te whare o te Rōpū Nui o te taone. Puta noa te wiki i Mexico City, he mowhiti tīra i te whare i mua i te hui. I hangaia e ia he tāmi waka nui i roto i te taone nui kē i te wā e ngana ana nga mana ki te ārai i ngā kaiwhakahaere kia kore ai e uru ki te pāremata. I mua ake, ko te perehitini hou, e 46 tau, i whakaingoatia he kāpata mema 20. Ko tana minita ā-rohe ko Jose Antonio Meade, he minita pūtea i roto i te kāwanatanga putaatu o Tēnā Calderon. I pau i a Tēnā Pena Nieto ōna rā whakamutunga hei perehitini whiriwhiri i roto i ngā kōrero ki ngā kaiārahi i te US me Kānata, ngā hoa o Mehiko i roto i te rōpū hokohoko ā-rohe, o Nafta. I whakahaere te PRI me te kore haukoti mo te 71 tau tae noa ki te tau 2000, ā, he rite tonu te whakapae a ōna hoariri he whakamana, he hāmate, he hononga hoki ki nga kaihoko rongoā. Engari i te wā o tana whakahau pōti, i whakapūmau a Tēnā Pena Nieto kua tipu te rōpū. "Ka taea e au te kī āta kī, i roto i taku kāwanatanga, kāore he momo pūrākau, whakaaetanga rānei ki te hara whakaritea," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "Ehara i te ara, i te ara rānei ki te haumarutanga nui ake mō te iwi o Mehiko." I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka whakakāhore a ia i te hokinga mai o te PRI ki te hiko he hokinga ki mua. "Ehara i te mea, nā te mea he whenua kē tēnei," tana kī. Kua whakaaturia e te perehitini hou ka arotahi a ia ki te whiu i te taikaha, te kākā me te kōhuru, ā, kua whakaritea e ia he tautoko mai i te pirihimana matua o Koromopia. Ko te perehitini putaatu e mau ana i tētahi tūnga i te Whare Wānanga o Harvard, ā, ka mau tonu kua haumaru ake a Mehiko. Engari mō te tokomaha o ngā Mehiko, ko te tawhito o Tēnā Calderon hei perehitini, e 10,000 ngā tūpāpaku rongoā i te tau mō ngā tau e ono kua hipa.

title: E whakawehi ana te maringi hinu Kariki i ngā one rongonui o Atene
summary: Kai te whāwhā nga kaimahi horoi ki te pupuri i tētahi maringi hinu mai i tētahi taraka Kariki i a ia e whakawehi ana i ētahi o ngā one tino pai o Atene.
text: E 2,500 tāhei hinu te kawenga o te oko, a Agia Zoni II, i te totohu atu i te motu o Salamis i te Rātapu. I pokea ngā one pātata e te hinu, engari i whakapono ngā āpiha ka taea te pupuri i ngā āhuatanga hau māmā. E rima rā i muri mai, kua neke atu ētahi wāhanga o te heke ki te tauranga o Glyfada, i te Athens Riviera. Kai te whakawehitia nga one tino arohaina o Voula me Vouliagmeni e te tai pango mātotoru. Kua amuamu ngā rōpū taiao i te urupare a ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te maringi, e kī ana i whakaaetia kia horapa atu i te mana. "I pā mai tēnei māturu i te taha o te whanga nui rawa o te whenua [Piraeus], he māwhiti noa iho i te pokapū mahi o te minita e whakatau ana i aua tūkinotanga," te kī a Dimitris Ihu, te kaiwhakahaere whakahau i Kariki, ki te pae rongokōrero paetata o In.gr. I whakapuakina e WWF Kariki te wehi i te mea "kāore e taea e tētahi whenua whai waka taraka taumaha te pare i ōna one mai i tētahi mahi tauine iti i te tuatahi". "Kaore tētahi tangata i whakaaro ka tae mai te heke ki a mātau," te kī a te koromatua o Glyfada, a Yiorgos Papanikolaou, ki a Skai TV. "Mehemea i whakatūpato tētahi i a mātau ahakoa i te Tūrei, kua whakatūpatotia e mātau." I hiritia e nga mana te kaipuke pakaru i te Tūrei, ā, kaore he maringi anō, ka kī te kaitiaki taiwhenua. E mahi ana ngā taraka kura ki te horoi i te pokenga, e āwhinatia ana e ngā waro māngi me ngā oko ārai poke ki waho - tae atu ki tētahi i tukuna e te EU. Kāore tonu i te mārama he aha te take i totohu ai te taraka 45 tau. Ko tōna kāpene me te kaipūkaha matua, ko ngā tāngata anake i runga i te papa i taua wā, kua whakataua rāua tahi ki te whakawātea.

title: Emergency GP service in Somerset 'unacceptable'
summary: Ko nga ratonga GP i waho o nga haora i Somerset e "kore e whakaaetia", kua kii te roopu komihana rongoa o te rohe.
text: I kī tōna āpiha matua kua whakaaro ngā rangatira ki te whakakore i te kirimana a te kaiwhakarato, engari kāore anō kia pērā nā te wehi i ngā pēhanga o te hōtoke. I whakatauria te ratonga e te Komihana Kounga Tiaki (CQC) i Aotearoa i muri i tētahi tirohanga. Kua whakapārewa a Vocare, e whakahaere ana, mō te kore e tutuki i ngā "paerewa e tūmanakohia ana" me te kī kua mahia ngā huringa. I kī a Nick Robinson, te āpiha matua o Somerset Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG), te tinana e haepapa ana ki te rongoā i te takiwā, "ehara i te mea huna" he "kōrerorero uaua" ki a Vocare mō tana mahinga. "Kāore mātou i te pai kei te tutuki i a rātou ngā paerewa mahinga," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia kua whakaarohia e te CCG te "tango" i te kirimana a Vocare, engari "ka tino mōrearea mō te pūnaha mēnā ka tino pōhēhē te ratonga i waho o ngā haora me te 111 [e whakahaere ana hoki a Vocare] i a tātau e haere ana ki te hōtoke, he wā tino pēhi mō te katoa o te pūnaha NHS". Heoi anō, i kī a ia kua "whakaūngia te CCG e te tauhohenga a [Vocare] i tēnei wā, kei te mahi rātou ki te whakarato i taua ratonga puta noa i te hōtoke". I kī a Tēnā Pirihitini ko te whakaurunga o tētahi "mahere rautaki" hōu mō te rongoā i Taraiwa a tērā tau, ā, ka puta ki tētahi huringa i roto i te kirimana i waho o ngā haora, he take hoki ki te kore e whakakore i te kirimana. 'Rapid improvement' In August Wellington House, the premises run by Vocare to provide the out-of-hours service, was rated inadequate following a CQC inspection in April, and was put in special measures. I kī te kaiwhakahaere rongoā tuarua o Vocare, a Alan Maguire, ko te ratonga i Somerset "kāore anō kia tutuki i ngā paerewa e tūmanakohia ana, ā, ka whakapōhēhē pono mātou". "Kua ako mātou mai i tēnei, ā, kei te tino kaha mātou ki te mahi tahi me ō mātou hoa i te NHS kia tika ai ia āhuatanga." I tāpiritia e ia kua mahia "ngā huringa mahi". I kī a Tēnā Kōpana "kāore a ia i whakaae kei te pai ngā mea ināianei". "Kua kite mātou i te nui o ngā nekeneke i runga i te whakapai ake? Kāo, kāore anō mātou." I kī a ia ko ngā mahere a Vocare ki te whakapai ake "e āhua tika ana, engari ka puritia e mātou kia tere te whakapai ake mai i konei". I a Aotearoa ka whakatauria e te CQC te ratonga GP i waho o ngā haora i Somerset he koretake. I muri i te whakatauranga i whiwhi ai te AO i tētahi reta ingoamuna, ko te āhua nei mai i tētahi mema kaimahi i roto i te ratonga, e kī ana kāore anō kia whakakīa ngā neke tākuta pō, ā, ka mauria mai ngā tākuta mai i tawhiti rawa atu ki Aotearoa ki te mono i ngā āputa i waho o ngā haora. I kī hoki i utua e Vocare ngā tākuta me te kore mahi i ngā taki papamuri tika. I kī atu tētahi kaiwhakahaere HR o Vocare ki te AO i whakaae ia ki te nuinga o ngā kerēme, ā, i whakaae kāore i te tika te tirotiro i ngā tākuta kōwhiringa. I kī te kaiwhakahaere he pūkete hara tā ētahi tākuta i whakamahia e Vocare, tae atu ki tētahi e whai take hauora hinengaro ana. Kāore e āraia tonutia e ngā tākuta te mahi a ngā whakapae taihara. I taua wā kei runga tonu ngā tākuta i te Rēhita o te Kaunihera Rongoā Whānui, ahakoa e rua ngā wā i whakatārewatia tētahi. Hei urupare, ka kī a Vocare ko tōna kaiwhakahaere rongoā me te tumuaki rongoā tuarua i noho tahi i Newcastle, ā, i mahi neke i ngā pokapū puta noa i te whenua. I kī tētahi kaikōrero i waho o ngā GP rohe i whakamahia "i ētahi wā... i te nuinga o te tau 2015", engari i kī kua "tino whakahekea... ā, kua tata te whakakore ināianei".

title: Ngā karakia o te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga i tū puta noa i Scotland
summary: Kua whakahonoretia ngā tūpāpaku pakanga o Pākehā i ngā ratonga o te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga puta noa i Pākehā.
text: I whakatakotoria e te Minita Tuatahi a Nicola Sturgeon he kupenga ki te Kohatu Whakamaharatanga i Edinburgh City Chambers. I kī a ia e nama ana te iwi ki te hunga i whawhai i roto i ngā pakanga me ngā papā "he nama tino nui o te whakamoemiti". I tēnei wā, i kī te Minita Toa o Keith Brown me whakamahi te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga hei whakarite kia "tohungia ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake nei i ngā wehi o te pakanga". I whakatakotoria e ia he kupenga ki te cenotaph i Puller Memorial Park i te Bridge of Allan Remembrance Service. E rua meneti o te mūmū i kitea i te 11:00 puta noa i te whenua. I kī a Ms Sturgeon: "He wā whakamahara tonu te Rātapu whakamaharatanga. " He wā tēnei mō tātou katoa takitahi, ā-rōpū hoki ki te whakanui i te hunga kua whawhai i roto i ā mātou ope taua, o tātau hōia, me te hunga e mahi ana i tēnei wā i roto i ā mātou ope taua kia noho haumaru ai te ao katoa. "E nama ana mātau ki a rātau he nama tino nui o te whakamoemiti. I tēnei rā he wā e maumahara ai ki ngā patunga tapu kua mahia." I whakatakotoria e Anne Kōkā, te pouaru o te hōia tūnga tiketike i patua e te IRA, he kupenga mō te Pānga Pouaru Pakanga. Ka kī a ia: "He hōnore me te hōnore te noho ki konei i tēnei rā. He wā tino nui tēnei mōku me taku tamāhine." I kī a ia i whakaaro a ia he iti iho pea te arotahi ki ngā papā o mua tata nei i ngā ratonga whakamaharatanga, ka tāpiri: "He kaupapa tino uaua a Aiarangi ki te Raki. He mea whakawhanaunga, māminga nā reira kāore he tino arotahi ki a rātou." I a ia e kōrero ana i mua i ngā whakamaharatanga, ka kī a Tēnā Paraone: "He kawenga tā mātou ki te ako mai i ngā akoranga o mua, ā, ko te tikanga kia noho te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga hei wā nui, rangatira ina tuku mātou ki te whakarite kia tohungia o tātau ake whakatupuranga me ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake i ngā wehi o te pakanga. " Kotahi rau tau i muri mai i te whakangaromanga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, i mahue ai tētahi hapori, whānau kotahi rānei kāore i pāngia e te tūkinotanga me te ngaromanga, ka noho nui tonu kia huihui mai tātau puta noa i Pākehā ki te whakamaumahara i te hunga i ngaro i roto i ngā papā katoa, o mua, o nāianei hoki." Ā muri ake i te Rātapu, ka huihui ngā Tono tōpū me ngā Tono mahi mō tētahi ratonga i te Whakamaharatanga o Te Arawhiti o Spean e tata ana ki Fort William. I whakaaturia te ope taua, ngā Tono Moana Ariki me ngā wae motuhake o ngā ope katoa i te ratonga, i muri mai i tētahi whakatūtū puta noa i Fort William. Ko te whakamaharatanga he takoha ki ngā hōia i whakangungu i taua rohe i te wā o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I tū hoki tētahi karakia i te whakamaharatanga o te pakanga i George Square o Glasgow, i arahina e Lord Provost Eva Bolander. Ko te Rev Ian Galloway, te kaiwhakaōrite o Glasgow Presbytery, i ārahi i ngā inoi, ā, ko te Minita Tuarua Tuatahi ko John Swinney i waenganui i te hunga i tae mai. E rua meneti o te mūmū i kitea puta noa i te whenua i te 11:00 i te Hātarei - Rā Armistice.

title: Ingarangi lockdown: ICU worker's wedding cancelled
summary: Kua kī tētahi wahine e mahi ana i roto i te tiaki nui me ngā tūroro coronavirus e pouri ana ia kua whakakorea tana mārena nā te kati ā-motu, engari e mōhio ana ia ki te wehi o te huaketo.
text: Nā Charley AdamsBBC News Amy Norton, mai i Bideford i Devon, i mārena i te 20 o Whiringa ā Rangi. E titiro whakamua ana ki te mārena i mau tonu a ia me tōna whānau i roto i te raka o mua, ka kī a ia. I raro i ngā ture hōu, kāore e whakaaetia kia tū ngā mārena, i tua atu i ngā āhuatanga tino ātaahua. I kī te kaiāwhina hauora 27 tau i rongo ia i te pānuitanga raka i a ia e mahi ana i te Hōhipera Takiwā o Te Raki o Devon, i reira i taua wā ko te wae e mahi ana ia "kāore he tūroro coronavirus". Engari, i te mōhiotanga ki te "wehi" o te huaketo, ka kī a Ms Norton kāore a ia i te "tino pouri" mō te mārena i whakakorea i a ia e mōhio ana ki ngā mea ka puta i ētahi atu tāngata. I te wā o te raka, he take i te whakakorenga tuatahi o te wāhi mārena, kātahi ka whakaū anō i ta rāua tāpuitanga, ā, me whakaheke te tokorua i a rāua manuhiri ki te 30, kātahi ka 15 i te rerekētanga o ngā rāhuitanga i te raumati. I kī a ia i "riri" tana hoa, a Matthew Lee, mo te āhuatanga i te Rātapu "nā te mea ka huri tonu". He whanaunga pakeke, mōrearea hoki te tokorua e hiahia ana rāua i te hui. "E mōhio ana ahau he wā wehi, ā, kei te puta te katoa i ā rātou ake mea... E hiahia ana mātou kia noho rātou i reira i te rā," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a ia kāore rātau i te tino mōhio he aha te kaupapa panuku, engari i muri i te katinga ka ngana rātau ki te mārena me te hākari ā muri ake. "Kua kōrero mātou ki tō mātou whānau katoa, ā, kua kī katoa rātou e hiahia ana rātou kia mārena mātou ināianei - kāore rātou i te tino mōhio ko wai kei reira, ko wai kāore i reira."

title: Hī ika: Tērā pea ka whai pānga 'tūpāpaku' ngā ture EU hōu ki te umanga UK
summary: Tērā pea ka whai pānga "tūpāpaku" ngā ture EU hōu mō ngā tohatoha hī ika ki te mahi hī ika o UK, kua kī tētahi komiti o te Whare o Ariki - kotahi rā noa iho i mua i te whakaurunga o te kaupapahere hōu.
text: I raro i ngā ture o mua, he rite tonu te maka a ngā kaimahi, ki te moana, i ngā ika i mau i a rātau ki runga i te nui o taua momo. Engari i raro i te kaupapa hou, me whakahoki mai e nga kaihīika te katoa o te taia ki uta. Ko tēnei huringa hai aukati i te moumou ika. Kua karangatia te ture he "kino te hoahoa" e nga tinana umanga o UK. I rongo te komiti iti o te Whare o Ariki EU Pūngao me te Taiao i ngā whakaaturanga tērā pea ko te tikanga o te ture e tūtuki ana ngā hī ika i ā rātou tohatoha ā-tau i mua o te tau, ā, me mutu te hī ika. I korerotia ki te komiti he tino raruraru tēnei i roto i "ngā hī ika whāranu" e uaua ai ki ngā poti te karo i te hopu i tētahi momo ika he tino iti rawa te mōrahitanga. Ina tae rātau ki tō rātou mōrahi mō tētahi momo, ka whakahaua ngā hī ika ki te kōwhiri i waenganui i te whakatū i ngā mahi mō te toenga o te tau, i te whati rānei i te ture mā te haere tonu ki te hī ika mō ētahi atu momo me te turaki i tētahi mea i runga i te tohatohatanga. I kī hoki te komiti he māharahara ki te pēhea e whakaūtia ai ngā ture - e pā ana ki te katoa i muri i te wā whāwhā tau - ka whakaūngia. E kī ana ka taea anake e ngā oko tautiaki te taupoki i tētahi ōrautanga iti o ngā poti, e waihanga ana i tētahi whakamatautauranga mō ngā hī ika ki te whati i ngā ture. I kī te mema o te komiti a Lord Krebs: "He tino māharahara ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata - ngā hī ika, ngā rōpū taiao, tae atu ki ngā kaupapa whakaū - kāore e whakaaro ka taea ēnei ture hōu te whakatinana mai i te 1 o Hānuere." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i kōrero mātau ki a mātau i whakaaro kāore he mea e rerekē - ka haere tonu ngā hī ika ki te turaki, e mōhio ana he iti noa iho ngā tūponotanga o te maunga, ā, ki te ū ki te ture ka pōraru pea rātau." I kī a Barrie Deas, te rangatira nui o te National Federation of Fishermen's Organisations, he "kino te hoahoa" o ngā ture, ā, ka mutu te hī ika a ngā poti mō ngā wā roa i muri i te taenga atu ki ngā tohatoha i runga i ngā momo motuhake. I kī te Tari Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua e mahi tahi ana me te umanga ki te whakatau i ngā whakamātautau i puta mai i te kaupapa hī ika pūmau hou. Ko te tikanga kia whakaputaina e te komiti tana pūrongo mō te whakatinanatanga me te whakaū i te "here tauranga" EU i te wā o Hui tanguru.

title: He whakahāweatanga te ārai pahau mekemeke, e kī ana te kairiri mātāmua o Tīmata
summary: He aukati te whakahaere me heu mā ngā kairiri mātāmua i Weera, e kī ana tētahi kaimekemeke Tīmata.
text: Nā Joe LangstaffeBBC Wales News Aaron Mahi, e 20, i kī ko te ture i whakamahia e te Welsh Amateur Boxing Association (WABA) e ārai ana i a ia ki te whakataetae nā tōna whakapono. I whakahokia e te tinana mātāmua Ingarihi, a Ingarangi Mekemeke, te āraitanga i muri i tētahi whakahau a ngā kaimekemeke Tīmata me ngā Mohimana. I kī te WABA mēnā he aukati te ture, kāore rānei ka whakatauria i tēnei marama e ōna mema me te poari. I tāpiritia ka whakaarohia mēnā ka pāngia te "taparenga tākaro" o te mekemeke mātāmua i te whakarere i te ture. I kī a Tēnā Mahi, nō te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti, engari e ako ana i te whakaaro whakaaro me te ohaoha i te Whare Wānanga o Kānata: "Kia whakataetae ahau, e tono ana rātau kia heu katoa taku pahau, e hāngai ana ki taku hāhi. " I kōrero ahau ki te WABA i runga i te waea, ā, ka kī mai rātau he take hauora tērā. "Kia kī mai tētahi ki a au kāore au e whakaaetia kia whai wāhi ki tētahi mea pēnei i tētahi takahanga tākaro nā te mea he pahau tōku - e kite ana ahau he hē tēnā. " E whakaaro ana ahau he aukati te ture. Ka taea e au te mahi i tētahi haora te tawhiti, engari ina tae mai ahau ki konei kāore e whakaaetia." E ārai ana te mātāpono Tīmata o Kesh i te tangohanga o ngā makawe i runga i te tinana, nā te mea e whakaarotia ana he tapu, he mea homai hoki nā te Atua. E whakaae ana a Amerpreet Mahi, he tangata tūturu i roto i te iwi o Tīmata i Kānata, ki a Tēnā Mahi, a, ka mea: "Ki a au, he 100% aukati. Mā te kī kāore e taea e koe te whawhai i Wales hei kaimekemeke mātāmua nā te mea he pahau tōu pāhau. "I whawhai nga tāhuhu i te pakanga tuatahi me te tuarua o te ao. I a mātau e whawhai ana i aua pakanga, kaore rātau i whawhai me te pahau kua tapahia. Ka whawhai rātau ki o rātau tāhae me o rātau pahau katoa. "E mamae ana kei te ngana rātau ki te kōrero mai ki a mātau kāore e taea e mātau te mahi mekemeke amateur i Wales nā te mea he pahau tātau, engari i pai tonu mātau ki te whawhai mo te wāteatanga i aua pakanga." Ko te mekemeke amateur e whakahaeretia ana i te ao whānui e te International Boxing Association (AIBA), e āraia tonutia ai ngā kaimekemeke kia kaua e whakataetae ki ngā makawe kanohi. Engari i tangohia a AIBA i tōna tūnga Orangirangi i Me, ko te tikanga ka tautuhia e te Komiti o te Orangirangi o te Ao Whānui ōna ake ture mō te mekemeke i te Omirangi o Tokyo o tērā tau. He kaiako hākinakina a Prof Carwyn Jones i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare T I kī a ia e mārama ana a ia ki te whakaaro a te WABA mo te ture, engari kāore i te whakaaro e whakatika ana i te āraitanga o nāianei. "Te āhua nei he whakaaturanga tērā pea ka whakararuraru te kaiwawao me te kaha o te tākuta ki te mōhio me te tiaki i ngā whara," tana kī. "Ko te pātai mai i te tirohanga ōrite, mēnā he nui rawa te tūkinotanga, te whara rānei hei whakamana i tētahi ture e tino aukati ana ki ētahi hāhi. " Mēnā ko Tātai Kotahi tēnei, hei tauira, ā, i kī tētahi mō ngā take whakapono kāore e taea e au te mau tātua haumaru, ka taea e koe te kī he mōrea nui tēnā ki te kī me mātua kī koe. "Mā tēnei ture, he tākaro mōrearea te mekemeke. E mōhio ana ngā kaimekemeke ki ngā mōrea, ā, ka whakatūpatotia e rātau." E wehi ana a Tēnā Mahi kua whakakāhoretia kētia e te ture ōna whakaaro mo te mahi i roto i te tākaro. Ka kī a ia: "He maha ngā wheako i hapa i a au. He whakaaturanga kāinga tā mātou i te Whare Wānanga o Kānata kāore i taea e au te whai wāhi, he tino whakararuraru ki a au. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakarerekē i tēnei ture, ehara i te mea mōku anake, engari mō ōku tuakana Tīmata katoa, ōku tuakana Mohimana, me te tangata katoa i reira he pahau tōna."

title: I muri i te matenga o tōna whaea i te 92 o ona tau
summary: E kī ana a Tā Elton John kei te "ohorere" a ia i muri i te matenga o tōna whaea, o Sheila Farebrother, i ngā marama noa iho i muri i to rātau whakahoahoatanga.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC Music reporter "Tino pouri ki te kī atu kua mate taku whaea i tēnei ata," tana kī i runga i tana whārangi Facebook, i te taha o tētahi whakaahua o rāua tahi. "I kite noa iho ahau i a ia i tērā Mane, ā, kei te ohorere ahau. Haere haumaru, e māmā. Tēnā koe mō ngā mea katoa." Ko Tā Elton, i whānau mai ko Reginald Dwight, te tama kotahi a Ms Farebrother. Ahakoa ko tōna pāpā - he rutene rererangi i roto i te RAF - he pūtere i tōna wā wātea, ko tōna whaea nāna i whakakā tōna aroha ki te pūoro pahū. He kaikohi pūkete kaingākau, i mauria mai e ia he pūoro ki te kāinga e ngā kaiwaiata pērā i a Elvis Presley me Bill Haley, ā, i tautoko i a Tā Elton puta noa i tana mahi. I te tau 2008, i te tono a Tā Elton ki a ia kia motu ngā here ki ngā hoa tawhito tokorua, ko Bob Halley rāua ko John Reid. E toru tekau tau i mahi ai a Tēnā Halley mō Tā Elton, i te tuatahi hei atekōkiri, kātahi anō hei kaiāwhina whaiaro, i mua i tana whakarerenga hei wāhanga o ngā huringa i mahia e Tā Elton ki tana tīma. I āwhina a Tēnā Reid, ko ia te kaiwhakahaere o Tā Elton, ā, he poto noa iho tana whaiāipo, i āwhina i te kaiwhakatangitangi kia noho ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakatū tino rongonui o te ao, engari i hinga hoki rātau. "I kī atu ahau ki a ia: 'Kāore au i te mahi i tēnā me te whakataka i a rātou,'" te kī a Ms Farebrother ki te Mēra o ia Rā. " Kātahi ka tino mīharo ahau, ka kī mai a ia e kino ana ia ki a au. Kātahi ka paoa e ia te waea. Whakaarohia! Ki a au, tōna whaea!" I kī atu a Ms Farebrother ki te nūpepa i taua wā kāore anō a ia kia tūtaki ki ana mokopuna ko Zachary rāua ko Iraia, nāna a Tā Elton rāua ko tōna hoa ko David Furnish i pāpā mā te IVF me tētahi whaea whakakapi o Amerika. Mo tōna huritau 90, ka utua e Ms Farebrother tētahi mahi takoha a Elton John hei mahi. I muri tata iho ka whakapā atu tana tama, ka tukuna atu ana orchids mā ki te whakanui i te tīmatanga. Engari i uaua tonu to rāua whanaungatanga. Ka kī atu a Tā Elton ki a Rolling Stone kāore tōna whaea i karanga ki a ia ki te mihi ki a koe i muri i te taenga mai o te kakara. "Kia pono ki a koe, kaore ahau e mihi ki a ia," tana kī. "E tiaki ana ahau i a ia, engari kāore au e hiahia ki a ia i roto i tōku oranga." Heoi anō, te āhua nei kua tino whakarongo te tokorua i tēnei tau, i muri i te whakaoranga o Tā Elton i tētahi mate huakita tino mate. "E Whaea, Rā Whaea Hari!" i tuhituhi a ia i runga i Instagram i te wā o Hui tanguru. "Tino hari kua hoki mai mātou ki te whakapā. Aroha, Elton xo" Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Waipuke o Newcastle: tērā pea ka whakawāteatia mō ngā whare noho tūkino
summary: Tērā pea ka whakawāteatia ngā raorao tūkino waipuke i Newcastle e tata ana ki te tiango, kua kī ngā kaipūkaha.
text: I te Tūtira, ka werohia e te waipuke te whenua i raro i te Kōti o Spencer, i Newburn, i te Tūtira, e whakaatu ana i ngā pūkei e mau ana, e tino tūkino ana i ngā tūāpapa. Ka riri te urupare a ngā tangata e haere ana ki tētahi hui tūmatanui ki te rongo me hutia pea ngā raorao. I te Rāitema e rua anō ngā paraka o ngā whare kaunihera i whakakorea i waenganui i ngā āwangawanga ka tiango pea te Kōti o Spencer. I whakaaetia ngā kainoho o Hareside Walk me Hareside Close ki te kāinga, engari i tonoa kia haere anō. Housing company Your Homes Newcastle - which manages council housing for Newcastle City Council - said it took the decision in the interests of residents' safety. I muri i te hui, ka kī a Mick Murphy, te kaiwhakahaere hangarau i te Kaunihera Taone o Aotearoa: "E kī ana ngā aromatawai kaipūkaha he haumaru, ā, kāore pea i te haumaru te ngana ki te tapi." I kī a Kate Scaife, e noho ana i Te Kōti o Spencer: "He mīharo te kite i roto i tētahi hui tūmatanui. Ki ētahi atu he pereki me te moata, engari ki a mātau he kāinga tērā, ā, ka mamae." Caroline Charlton, who lives in Mill Vale, said: "There's a lot of upset people and for us poor residents we're going to be stuck in the middle of a long legal battle between landowners. " Ko wai e hiahia ana ki te hoko i o tātau whare? He kāinga ātaahua ērā, engari ko wai ka mōrearea? E kore rawa ahau e pai." I kī a Paul Nicholson, e noho ana hoki i Mill Vale, "Kua nui te whakararuraru i ngā marama tata nei, me haere atu mātou i tēnei ināianei nā te mea he rima tau tōku pakeke, kotahi tau te pakeke, ā, kāore au i te rongo he haumaru anō." I hinga te pūrongo arotakenga i te taha o ngā raorao pakaru i te wā o Me, engari na te kaha o te waipuke i te Mane i whakakino te oneone, ā, ka hangaia he wairere e tata ana ki nga raorao. Developer Dunelm Homes owns the land on which the homes stand, while the culvert is on land owned by Northumberland Estates. Kāore anō tētahi kamupene kia whakaae ki te taunahatanga. Northumberland Estates said it was working hard to find a long-term solution but said there was little it could do "in the face of such very extreme weather conditions until the culvert can be cleared". Dunelm Homes said it was attending emergency meetings and providing whatever assistance and support it could. I kī a Tēnā Murphy he "tino tūkino" nga raorao i Te Kōti o Spencer. I kī atu ngā kaipūkaha mō Northumberland Estates ki te hui tūmatanui kua mahia he arotakenga, ā, i tūmanakohia te pūrongo kia whakaū i ngā raorao kei tua atu i te tiaki. 'He take wā' i kī a Greg Blyth, tētahi tangata o Te Kōti o Spencer, i mua: "Kāore au i te whakaaro me hanga rātau ki runga i tēnei whenua. " Me tukituki te wāhi katoa nā te mea he tino haumaru, ā, he wā tonu i mua i te haerenga o ngā mea katoa." Ko te Kaunihera Taone o Newcastle, nāna i kī kua tukuna te whakaaetanga whakarite nā te mea e tika ana ngā mahere mō te whenua, e titiro ana ki te pai o te pupuri i te kōpae. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Murphy: "Ka taea e koe te hanga i te nuinga o ngā wāhi i te wā e mahi ana koe i ngā hipanga pūkaha tika. Kua whakaarohia e tētahi kaipūkaha te whenua rawakore nā te mea kua whakamahia e rātau aua pūkei roa." I whakataua e nga Pirihimana o Northumbria kia whakanuku i te rohe i te Tūtira i muri i te mea i kīia e te Tari Tūtaki ko ngā āwhā tino kaha o Mahuru mo te 30 tau. I whakaaetia ngā tangata o Mill Vale kia hoki mai mō tētahi wā poto ki te kohikohi taonga i te Wenerei.

title: E tautoko ana te Kāpata i ngā whakahōutanga a te Ariki a Nick Clegg, e kī ana a Downing Street
summary: Ka whakaputaina tētahi pire paremata hei whakauru atu i tētahi Whare Ariki i pōtitia nuitia i te Wenerei i muri i te whiwhinga i te "tautoko kaha" mai i te kāpata, kua kī a Downing Street.
text: Ko ngā mahere, ko te tikanga o te 80% o ngā hoa e kōwhiria ana e ngā kaipōti, he tautohetohe i roto i te tauwhāinga, me te tokomaha o ngā Tohutohu e ātete ana. Engari i kī te kāwanatanga ka whakahaua ngā MP kia ū ki te hiahiatia. Kua whakaae a Labour ki te whakahoki i te pire, ahakoa te ātetetanga a ētahi MP. Tērā pea he mea hira te tautoko a te rōpū ki te whakaoti i ngā huringa, me ngā pūrongo ka taea e ngā MP Tūturu 100 te whakakeke. 'Ngā āwangawanga tūpāpaku' He tokomaha nga backbenchers o Tory e whakaaro ana ka tukitukia e ngā huringa te Kotahitanga, ā, e whakaaro ana kia kaua te whakahou ā-ture e noho hei manakē i te wā o te whakahekenga. Ko te tuarua Pirimia o Nick Clegg, ko ia hoki te kaiārahi o Liberal Democrat, te tōpana taraiwa i muri i te whakahōutanga a te Ariki, ā, ka kite hoki i te maha o ngā hoa kua whakahekea ki te 450 mai i te 800 i tēnei wā.
