Kua whakaarahia tēnei tau mai i tētahi ūnga tōmua o te 300, i muri i te huatau a te komiti o ngā MP ka iti rawa pea te ruma tuarua o te Pāremata ki te mahi tika i tana mahi ki te tirotiro i ngā ture. I whakahuahuatia e Tēnā Clegg ana kaupapa i te hui kāpata o te Tūrei, e 16 nga minita e kōrero ana e manakohia ana, te kī a te Pirimia o Rawiri. I roto i a rātau ko te kaiārahi o te Whare o Ariki, ko Ariki Strathclyde, ko te Hēkeretari Ture a Kenneth Clarke me te Hēkeretari Hapori ko Erika Pickles. I tāpiritia e te kaikōrero: "Ka whakaritea e mātou ngā whakahōu mō tētahi Whare Ariki i pōtitia nuitia, he iti iho i te Whare Ariki i tēnei wā, e tū ai te pōti tuatahi i Me 2015, ā, ka pupuritia te tuatahi o te Whare o Ngātahi. " He tino kaha te tautoko mo nga whakahōu huri noa i te tēpu kāpata." I muri i te tāpaetanga o te 'Tutukitanga' i te Wenerei, ka tūmanakohia kia whiwhi te pire i tētahi pānui tuarua i te Whare o Ngātahi i mua i te pikinga mo te wā raumati i te 17 o Hōngongoi, ā, e whai ana ngā minita ki te whakaoti i tōna wāhanga ki te pukapuka tikanga a Me a tērā tau. Engari i kī atu a Conservative MP Penny Mordaunt ki te Ao o Te Reo Irirangi 4 i te Kotahi, ahakoa ko ngā hoa mahi kāore anō kia pōti ki te kāwanatanga e "whakaaro ana ki te mahi i tēnei take". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tokomaha ngā tāngata i runga i te rārangi utu a te kāwanatanga [ngā minita me ā rātou hēkeretari tūmataiti paremata] e māharahara ana ki tēnei." Engari i kī te kaikōrero a te pirimia e kore ngā MP Conservative e tukua i ngā whakaritenga o te whakatakotoranga rōpū, ā, ka whakaaetia kia pōti i runga i o rātau hinengaro. "He pire kāwanatanga tēnei," tana kī. "Ka whiua tikatia, ā, mēnā e hiahiatia ana ka whakamahia e mātou te Ture Pāremata [e tautuhi ana i te rangatiratanga o te Ngātahi i runga i ngā Ariki mēnā he tūtū]." E kiia ana kei te anga atu te kaiārahi mahi a Ed Miliband ki tētahi tutukitanga mai i ētahi o ana MP matua rawa i runga i tana tautoko i te whakahou a te Ariki. E kī ana ngā pūtake i pāngia e ia tētahi "hui uaua" me ana MP i tana pānuitanga e hiahia ana ia kia whakahokia e te rōpū te pire a te kāwanatanga. He tokomaha nga MP Mahi matua, tae atu ki te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Mua, a Rawiri Blunkett, i whakahē tūwhera i te whakataunga. Ko te āhua nei ka kī atu a Tēnā Blunkett ki te hui ka whakahē a ia i te wepu Mahi mo te wā tuatahi i roto i te 25 tau. E mōhiotia ana ka whakarite a Tēnā Miliband ki te whakahau i ngā MP Mahi ki te tautoko i te mehua, ahakoa ka hono te kaiārahi ki te hunga whakakeke o Tory ki te ātete i te pire hōtaka e tautuhi ana i te "wātaka" mō te taupatupatu. Ki te angitu, mā tēnei e āhei ai ngā hoariri ki te tō i te taupatupatu, ka horomia te wā e hiahiatia ana mō ētahi atu umanga, ā, ka taea pea te "kōrero".

title: Coronavirus: Ka mahi a Boris Johnson i te 'tino pai o te kauneketanga' i roto i te tiaki kaha
summary: Kei te haere tonu a Boris Johnson ki te mahi i te "kauneketanga tino pai" i te hōhipera, kei reira ia e rongoatia ana mō te coronavirus, e ai ki a Downing Street.
text: I mauria te pirimia, e 55, ki te hōhipera i te Rātapu - 10 rā i muri i te whakamātautau pai mo te huaketo. E toru ngā pō i roto i te tiaki nui i mua i tana hokinga ki tētahi whare i te Tāite. Kāore he 10 i kī e whiwhi ana ia i ngā whakahōutanga o ia rā me ngā karapa hapu mai i tana hoa wahine, a Carrie Symonds, ā, kua pau te wā ki ngā kiriata me te sudoku. I te Paraire, kāore he 10 i kī ai a Tēnā Hōnea i āhei ki te hīkoi poto i waenganui i ngā wā okiokinga i te Hōhipera o Hato Tōma i Rāwāhi, e whakamahia ana ia. Ko Ms Symonds, e whānau ana i roto i te rua marama, kua wehe i a ia anō me ngā tohu pēnei i te coronavirus, engari kāore anō kia whakamātauria. I kī a Downing Street kua tukuatu ngā kaimahi i ngā whitiāhua tae atu ki ngā kōrero kōrero o Ingarangi Withnail & I me Love Actually ki tētahi iPad mō te PM. I te wā o te pōtitanga nui o Hakihe, ka tuhituhia e Tēnā Hōnea ngā karere whakahau i runga i ngā kāri mā i a ia e tū ana i tētahi tatau, e whakaatu ana i tētahi tirohanga mai i te pikitia o Rārangi Curtis. I tēnei wā kei te whakahaere te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o Dominic Raab i te kāwanatanga, ā, ko ngā kaiawhina e tūmanako ana kia kore a Tēnā Hōnea e mahi mō te roa o te marama. Kua karangatia e te pāpā o Tāne Hōnea, a Stanley Johnson, kia "whai wā" tana tama kia pai ake. I kōrero a ia ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā i te Paraire: "Me okioki a ia. Ki taku whakaaro kāore e taea e koe te kī atu kei waho tēnei i te ngahere ināianei. "Me whai wā a ia. Kāore au e whakapono ka taea e koe te haere atu i tēnei me te hoki hāngai ki Te Tiriti ki te tiki i ngā whatumanawa me te kore wā whakatikatika."

title: He Kirihimete: He pēhea te tiaki a Scrooge i ngā whare pikitia i tēnei Kirihimete
summary: I whakaputaina a Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol i te mutunga o te tau 1843. I roto i ngā wiki ka whakamātao ngā putanga atamira i ngā tuarā o ngā kaitākaro o Wikitōria - i a rātau e whakamahana ana hoki i o rātau ngākau.
text: Na Vincent DowdArts, te kaipānui o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o Te Wairua me tōna whakaoranga wairua i roto i te whare tapere i tēnei tau, neke atu i tētahi atu wā. He mea anō mō te pūrākau e kōrero ana ki ngā wā uaua? I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka whakahaere a Owen Calvert-Lyons i te Whare Tapere Royal hītori i Bury St Edmunds i Suffolk. E tūmanako ana a ia ki te whakatū i a Cinderella hei panto Kirihimete ā-tau - te papa pūtea e pupuri ana i te maha o ngā whare tapere o Ingarangi mō te toenga o te tau. Engari i tīmata a ia ki te whakaaro he pēhea te whakararuraru o te taiepa Covid-19 mō te whare tapere i ngā wāhi katoa. I tēnei wā, ahakoa te whakawhāititanga o ngā rāhuitanga ki tētahi atu wāhi i tēnei mutunga wiki, ka noho tonu a Suffolk ki te taumata tuarua, ā, ka taea te haere tonu ngā whakaaturanga mēnā ka tawhiti tika atu i te pāpori. "So I decided we'd do our Christmas show outdoors in the town centre. Engari ko te tikanga o tēnā ko te kimi i tētahi mea poto ake, he ngāwari hoki ki te atamira," tana kī. "Ko A Christmas Carol te kōwhiringa mārama - he ngāwari kē atu te kimi i ngā pokatata whakaharahara me tētahi pūrākau kua mōhiotia kētia e ngā tāngata e mātakitaki ana. " He pai hoki te mahi a te pūrākau ki tētahi rōpū iti e rima pēnei i a mātau - ā, ko ētahi pānga e tino hāngai ana ki te ahiahi o te hōtoke." Ko te kaiwhakaari o Rebecca Peyton e puta mai ana i te pouri i runga i ngā pou hei Wairua pango nui o te Kirihimete Future, he whakaahua e kore e warewaretia. Ko te putanga o Bury St Edmunds o A Christmas Carol tētahi o ngā urutaunga e rua tekau neke atu rānei i pānuitia mō tēnei Kirihimete huri noa i te UK. Hei tauira, ko te putanga o Liverpool Playhouse, e whakamanamana ana hoki i te tokorima, ā, kua haere ki mua. Ko ētahi atu putanga i tēnei tau i rerekē mai i ngā whakaaturanga tangata māhaki ki te pūoro nui i te West End e whakaatu ana i a Brian Conley - tae noa ki te wā i hinga ai me ētahi atu Scrooges i te huringa tere o ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus. Kua āta whakatūria anō e te Old Vic o Rāwāhi te whakanaotanga i takea mai i te tau 2017: i tēnei tau ka whakaoratia anake, ā, kāore he hunga māharahara hei māharahara. Ko Andrew Lincoln i a Scrooge e ārahi ana i tētahi kōrero katoa i ia ahiahi i roto i te atamira rongonui me te kaituhituhi a Jack Thorne (BBC One's His Dark Materials and stage show Harry Potter and the Cursed Child) urutaunga whakaharahara. He whakanaotanga ātaahua e pai ana te mahi i runga i te Topa. E kī ana a Thorne he ruarua noa iho ngā huringa e hiahiatia ana ki te whakaaturanga. "I whakahaua e te Coronavirus ētahi whakarerekētanga ruarua - kāore he tangata ināianei e kawea ana e tētahi atu kaitapere, hei tauira. Engari he ōrite te take o te tākaro, ā, kei reira tonu te huinga mātauranga a Rob Howell, ā, kei reira tonu te pūoro." He aha a Thorne i whakaaro ai he pūrākau i tuhia kia pānuitia i roto i tētahi pukapuka e tuku ana ki te atamira 177 tau i muri mai? "Ko tētahi mea taketake i ngā wā katoa kei roto i ngā mahi e whā - te taenga mai o ngā kēhua e toru, kātahi ko te whakaoranga a Scrooge i te mutunga. He hanganga ātaahua pēnei i a Ibsen. Ā, ka mārama te whakakā o te pūrākau i tētahi pūāhua e āwhina ana i te whakaari. "Engari ko tētahi take he toa tuhituhi a Tiki mōku, i ngā wā katoa ka tāparetia e ia tētahi pūrākau mā tētahi whenua tōrangapū - engari e kore rawa ia e tuku i taua whenua kia whārahi i te kōrero. He tino pono tēnā i roto i A Christmas Carol, ā, e aroha ana ahau ki a ia mōna." He ngāwari noa iho te whakaaro ko te mea i akiaki i te nui o ngā Waiata Kirihimete i te tau 2020 ko Covid-19. He pūrākau tēnei, i ngā wā uaua mō ngā kaihanga whare pikitia, ka taea te whakatū ngāwari, engari e tuku ana i tētahi whakamutunga tino pai mō ngā kaimātakitaki e hiahia ana ki te hari i roto i o rātau oranga. Ka arotahi kē a Thorne ki te rawakore nāna i raruraru te kōrero a Dickens. "He mīharo kua noho ngā pēke kai - i a au e tamariki ana- kua noho hei tikanga. Ki taku whakaaro kei te tuku mātou i te iwi ki raro i tētahi huarahi e mōhiotia ana e Dickens. "Kei te hoki mātou ki tētahi ariā Wikitōria he aha te tikanga o Ingarangi, ā, i whakatere noa iho a Covid i tērā. E mōhio tūturu ana ahau koia te take i kitea ai e te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ināianei a A Christmas Carol i roto i o rātau ngākau i te tau 2020. "I te mutunga, ka hoatu e Dickens ki te kaituku moni a Scrooge te whakaoranga mā te tiritiri - ā, e whakaatu ana ki a mātau he huarahi e taea ai tātau katoa te hoko. " After each performance we ask for charity donations and this year it's for the charity FoodCycle. Ka hoatu e rātau he kai ki ngā tāngata rawakore kai - ā, kua puta ngā koha tuihono i te tuanui." Ehara i te mea ko te kōrero a Dickens e purei ana i roto i ngā whare tapere o Ingarangi anake. He makau tau hoki i te US. Kei te whakatūria e te tumuaki o Michael Baron mo te tekau tau e haere ana i te Whare Tapere Lyric i Oklahoma City. "I roto i te whare tapere o Amerika ko A Christmas Carol te hararei nui mō ngā whānau, pērā i te Nutcracker mō ngā kamupene kanikani," tana kī. Engari tata ki te 5,000 maero mai i Suffolk, kua tīmata hoki a Baron ki te whakaaro he pēhea te tinihanga o te mate urutā ka whakanao mō te toenga o te tau 2020. "Nō reira ka kimi koe i tētahi huarahi hei huri i tēnā hei pai," tana kī. "We're really lucky that we have the Harn Homestead near us which is a beautiful open air collection of historical American buildings in a big park in downtown Oklahoma City. " E kore au e kī he tino rite ki a Victorian London, engari mā te whakamahi mō te pūrākau ka puta he āhua hītori e arohaina ana e te tangata. Ā, kei a mātau tonu te 17. Actually we hope to use the location again next year, whatever happens with the virus." Ka pāoro a Baron i ētahi o ngā whakaaro o Thorne he aha i tino paingia ai a A Christmas Carol i tēnei tau. "Well firstly it's a great story and that will never change. Engari ki taku whakaaro i tēnei tau, otirā ko ngā huānga tōrangapū me te hiahia tūmanako me te aroha ki tōu hoa tangata, kua tino tae mai ki te aronga o Amerika. "Ko ngā wāhanga o te pūrākau e pā ana ki te rawakore o te whānau Cratchit me te mate me te matenga o Tiny Tim, kua tautuhia ki Ingarangi. Engari ka whakamahara rātau ki te iwi kāore te pūnaha rongoā i te ōrite i Amerika, ā, he pai ake te utu o te hunga whai rawa. "Tērā anō tētahi aronga coronavirus. Tērā tētahi raina i roto i te hōtuhi e kī ana tētahi pūāhua mō Scrooge, 'Aue, e tūmanako ana ahau kāore ia i mate i tētahi mea e hopu ana.' A, i tēnei tau ka rongo koe i ngā mema o te hunga whakarongo e hopu ana i tō rātou manawa i taua wā i tētahi huarahi kāore anō kia mahia e rātou." I ngā tau e tīari ana te whakanaotanga, kua kohia e te whare tapere neke atu i te $200,000 (£148,000) mai i ngā kaimātakitaki mō te Pēke Kai ā-Rohe o Oklahoma. "Ka kite koe i ngā tāngata i roto i ngā rārangi kai i konei i Oklahoma City e mīharo ana. " I ia tau e kī ana ahau ki te hunga whakaari, he nui te tirohanga me ngā kēhua, me ngā kōrero tino atamai e hāngai ana mai i a Dickens. Engari ko te pūrākau katoa i takea mai i te kimi i te ngākau pono i te matenga o Tiny Tim. "I tēnei tau - i waho - kei te pupuhi te hau, ā, tērā pea ka hukarere, ā, i tētahi mutunga wiki ka pā mai he āwhā hukapapa. Engari kei te rongo tonu tātau i te roimata i roto i te hunga whakarongo nā te mea, i te coronavirus, kua tino puta mai ngā whakaaro o te mate inā noa nei. "He whakamaumahara te pūrākau a Dickens i ia tau ki te momo tangata me te ohaoha e whakaaturia ana e tātau." Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka āwhina te kōtiro o Devon i te rangatira ki te whakatuwhera i te pokapū whakaora o nga ope taua
summary: A nine-year-old from Devon has helped Prince William open a new Help for Heroes rehabilitation centre at Headley Court in Surrey.
text: Ko ngā pūkenga hou i te pokapū rongoā o ngā ope taua e āhua ana i ngā rauemi tae atu ki tētahi puna kaukau hou me te whare tākaro. He kairangi tamariki a Lydia Cross no Help for Heroes i muri i te ngaronga o ōna waewae e rua ki te meningitis. "He tino mīharo, engari i tino āmaimai ahau", tana kī atu ki a Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero. "E whakaaro ana ahau ka taea e au te whakarerekē i ngā mea e pā ana ki ēnei tamariki whara, nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau me āwhina ahau i a rātau," tana tāpiri mai. I te whakatuwheratanga o te pokapū, ka takoha a Prince William ki ngā kaimahi me te aroha: "Ko te mea e tutuki ana i konei, ko te pono, engari ko te pito o te hukapapa. " Kua whakarewaina tēnei whenua e te Āwhina mō ngā Toa ki tētahi āhua o te mōhiotanga me te tautoko āwhina mō tā mātou hōia nāna ahau i tino whakahīhī ki te noho ko Ingarangi." I whakaahuatia e te whaea o Lydia, a Jodie Cross, he "tino nui" te rā mō tana tamāhine, engari i kī he "tino pai ki a ia" te tūtaki ki ētahi atu tāngata pēnei i a ia. I kī a ia i tautokona e tana tamāhine te aroha i muri i tana mōhiotanga i āwhina i ngā tāngata pēnei i a ia, kua ngaro ngā waewae. Kua tūtaki a Pirini William rāua ko tōna tuakana ko Harry ki ngā tūroro e whakararuraru ana i te Kōti o Headley i muri i te whara i ngā papā i Awhekenetāna me Iraki. I tīmata te pokapū i tana mahi i muri i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao mō ngā kaiāwhina RAF, engari i te tau 1996 ka noho ko te pokapū whakaora hōia matua o UK mō ngā ope taua e toru.

title: He aha te mea e puta ana i Bolivia?
summary: Ināianei kua mahue i te Perehitini o Bolivia a Evo Morales te whenua i muri i tētahi pōti tautohetohe i reira.
text: Na tana tukunga iho i te Rātapu i whakaoho ai ngā matapaki i ngā tāone puta noa i te whenua, e ai ki ngā pūrongo pāpāho paetata. Tērā anō ētahi whakahēnga i ngā whenua noho tata ki ngā mea i tūpono, me ngā kerēme hāmate me te whakararuraru kē. Engari mēnā ka haere mai koe ki te pūrākau mō te wā tuatahi, he nui tonu ngā mea hei tango. Nō reira mēnā he rite tēnā ki a koe, me tīmata tātou mai i te tapawhā tuatahi me te whakatere i a koe. Neke atu i te 11 miriona ngā tāngata e noho ana i Poriwia, e toro atu ana mai i ngā maunga Andes i te uru ki te ngahere o Amazon i te rāwhiti. Ka kite koe i ngā tohu ā iwi i runga i te haki o te whenua - te condor me te lama. I whiwhi rangatiratanga a Bolivia i Paniora i te tau 1825 - ā, pēnei i te nuinga o Amerika ki te tonga, ki waenganui hoki - kei roto ināianei he ranunga tāngata i heke iho i ngā tīpuna Pāniora me ngā iwi taketake o taua rohe. But it's important to know that indigenous people make up around two thirds of the population. He tini ngā reo taketake e kōrero whānui tonu ana, tae atu ki te Quechua, i takea mai i te iwi Inca i whakahaere i te rohe i ngā rau tau ki mua. Mai i te kaiahuwhenua ki te perehitini i pōtitia te kaiahuwhenua o Mua o Evo Morales, e 60, ki te ārahi i Poriwia i te tau 2005 - te perehitini tuatahi i haere mai i tētahi papamuri taketake. I taua wā, e 38% o ngā tāngata i reira i whakaakona e noho ana i roto i te tino rawakore, ā, i whakamihitia ia mo te whakaheke i taua whika. He parirau mauī a ia, a, i whakakotahitia nga mahi hinu me te korohū o te whenua. Ka taea e koe te pānui i ētahi atu kōrero mō tana oma hei perehitini o Bolivia i konei. He aha te mea i whakaoho i te raruraru o nāianei? E kī ana ētahi i muri i te tata o te 14 tau e kaha ana, kaua a Evo Morales e whakaaetia kia oma anō mō te perehitini. Engari i whakaaetia ia kia tū i muri i te whakataunga a te Kōti Kawanatanga o te whenua. Heoi, i mua i te pōtitanga kotahi i te 20 o Whiringa ā-rangi, he pōti tautohetohe tēnei. I te whakaaturanga o te tatau i tētahi toa mō Tēnā Morales, he kerēme hāmate mai i ngā kaitautoko o tōna hoariri o Kānata Mesa. Kātahi ka whakaae tētahi rōpū aroturuki - te Rōpū Whakahaere o Amerika - kua "rāwekeweke" me te karanga kia whakakorea te hua. He raruraru, he kupenga rānei? Ka weriweri nga whakahē i te pikinga o nga rā, kaore he hua pōti mārama - tokotoru neke atu rānei ngā tāngata i mate i roto i ngā matapaki. Ehara i te mea noa iho te pōti hou. Ko te mea nui, i ngaro i a Evo Morales te tautoko a nga ope taua o Bolivia, a, i te mutunga ka whakahaua kia waiho i te mutunga wiki. Nā tērā i whakaahua ai ia i te mea i tūpono hei kupenga - he whakahaere hōia. Ka tū anō ana kaitautoko ki nga pirihimana, i te wā i haere ōna hoariri ki nga tiriti ki te whakanui. E kī ana te tauhohenga o te ao whānui a Perehitini Trump e "whakamihi ana ia ki te iwi o Poriwia mo te tono wāteatanga". I tērā taha, i kī a Rūhia kua toa a Tēnā Morales i te pōti, engari kāore i taea te whai mana nā te "ngaru tutu". Ko Mehiko, he kaiārahi parirau mauī hoki, i pāoro i te kerēme a Tēnā Morales mo te kukitanga. Ināianei kua haere a Tēnā Morales ki Mehiko, e kī ana ka hoki a ia ki Poriwia me te nui ake o te "kaha me te pūngao". Ko wai kei te whakahaere ināianei? Kua tono te tumuaki tuarua o te Senate o Bolivia, a Jeanine Áñez, kia riro hei perehitini takiwā kia tū rā anō te pōti hou. Engari i te āwangawanga o te hauora, me te taua ināianei ka karangatia ki te tārua i nga pirihimana ki nga kaiwhakatūtū pro-Morales. He āhuatanga whārite mārire, me ngā pūrongo o te parakete me te tūkinotanga. E 20 kē ngā tāngata kua whara i te tipu o ngā whakahē hou. Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: Ngā pukapuka Ladybird: Whakaaturanga o ngā 'capsule wā' tuhituhi
summary: Me tūhura ngā mahi toi a ngā kaiwhakaahua mai i ngā Pukapuka Ladybird tauhira i roto i tētahi whakaaturanga.
text: Ko ngā pukapuka, i tīmata i te ora i Loughborough tata ki te 100 tau ki mua, kua whakawaia ngā whakatupuranga tamariki ki ngā pūrākau tauhira me ngā kupu mōhiohio. I kī te tohunga Pukapuka Ladybird, a Helen Day, ko ngā "capsule wā iti" e whakaata ana i te iwi nāna i waihanga. Kei te Whare Taonga Hīkoi Hōu o Leicester te Ao Whakamīharo o ngā Kaiwaiata Pukapuka Ladybird tae noa ki te 1 o Mahuru. I tīmata te umanga ki te whakaputa pukapuka tamariki i te tau 1914, engari i kī te kaitiaki o Ms Day ko ngā pukapuka pikitia o ngā tau 1950, 1960 me 1970 te pānga nui ake ki te mōhiotanga o a rātau tamariki. "Ko tētahi o ngā mea e tino mīharo ana ki a au mō ngā pukapuka Ladybird [ko] te āhua o tā rātou tuhinga i te maha o ngā huringa pāpori i roto i ngā tau," tana kī. "The stories and the artwork reflect the society that created them and that's the context in which you have to enjoy them today. " Kāore he ao Ladybird kotahi, engari he rangatū o ngā hopuāhua huri tonu, e tuhinga ana i ngā āhuatanga me ngā whakaaro i roto i ngā tekau tau." Ko ngā mea rerekē i roto i ngā Pukapuka Ladybird I te tau 2019, tērā pea he rerekē ētahi o ngā whakaahua me ngā kuputuhi a Ladybird - he whakahāwea rānei. I whakahētia te umanga mō te tīwharawhara, otirā i runga i te tūranga o ngā wāhine, nāna i whakahōu ngā pukapuka i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Ko tētahi tauira māheahea, i runga ake nei, e whakaatu ana i tētahi tāne e tuku ringa ana i tētahi koha i te tau 1976, i te wā e mātakitaki noa ana tōna hoa o te tau 1964. Ko ētahi atu āhuatanga o ngā pukapuka Ladybird tawhito e whakaatu ana i te kore rerenga kētanga, ahakoa ngā huringa pāpori i Ingarangi i muri i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Ētahi atu mea i konei: Ngā Pukapuka Ladybird: Ko ngā mea rerekē i akona e mātau i katia ngā tari me ngā mahi tā o Loughborough Ladybird i te tau 1999, engari kei te whakaputa tonu a Penguin Random House i ngā pukapuka Ladybird. Kua whakamahia hoki e te kaiwhakaputa a Michael Joseph te mahi toi taketake i roto i ngā pukapuka parody mō ngā pakeke pēnei i te The Hangover, The Hipster rānei. I kī a Helen Day, e kōrero ana i te 4 o Aotearoa, kāore he pukapuka e ōrite te pānga ki te hinengaro o ngā tamariki pērā ki ngā taitara Ladybird i waenganui i ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā iwa rau. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: "I taua wā kāore i nui rawa te kōwhiringa - kāore i nui ētahi atu mea e whawhai ana kia aro atu mātou," tana kī. " I tēnei rā ehara i te pukapuka noa iho engari he paetukutuku, he taupānga, he pikitia, he pakiwaituhi, he taonga tākaro tauwhiti me ngā kēmu... "E whakaaro ana ahau ka iti iho te pānga o [ngā pukapuka]." Hundreds of original artworks by 14 artists including the creator of Tootles the Taxi, Leicestershire artist John Kenney, will be on show at the New Walk Museum from Saturday. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko nga kōinga e wehi ana i nga otaota
summary: Ko Āhiana tētahi o ngā kawekawe nui rawa o te ao o te soya kua whakakētia ā-ira. He umanga nui, engari e wehi ana ētahi tangata whenua i ngā otaota e whakamahia ana e te umanga ka mate pea rātau.
text: Nā Grace LivingstoneBBC News E noho ana a Horacio Brignone i te kāinga o María Juana i ngā whenua o Āhiana, i ngā pampas rānei. Mai i tōna matapihi ka kite atu a ia i ngā māra soya. Mai i te toru o ona tau, e kī ana a ia, kua pāngia tana tama e 20 tau i te huangō, engari i tana nekehanga ki tētahi taone nui ka ngaro atu te āhuatanga. "Kāore anō a ia kia whakaekea mō te rua tau mai i tana haerenga ki te ako i Córdoba," te kī a Horacio. "Engari i tana hokinga mai ki te kāinga mō te rua marama inā noa nei, ka tīmata anō a ia ki te mare." E whakapae ana a ia i te kaipatu tarutaru i rehu ki runga i nga pārae soya. "We are 50m from the fields," Mr Brignone says. "Kāore e taea e mātou te mōhio, engari he tino noa iho ngā raruraru romahā me ngā amuamu kiri i konei i waenganui i te hunga e noho tata ana ki ngā pārae." He maha nga tau i pāngia ai e te wahine a Tāne Brignone, a Rosalía Ramonda, i te ruānuku i runga i tōna kiri. Ka kī mai a ia ki a au: "Ka whero, he ngau. He maha nga tau i pā mai ai tēnei, ā, i kī noa iho ahau: 'He mea i kainga e au.'" I ngā tekau tau tata nei, kua nui haere te whakanao soybean i Āhiana. Ko te tikanga kia iti iho te hiahia o ngā hua GM ki te patu otaota, engari, i te nui o te tarutaru kua whakamahia. Ahakoa i tipu te rohe whenua mahinga i te 45% i waenganui i te 1994 me te 2010, e whakaatu ana ngā whika mai i te Rōpū Kai me te Ahuwhenua o te UN e nui ake ana te nui o te otaota i whakamahia i Āhiana mai i te 19,376 tāhei o ngā mea hohe ki te 227,185 tāhei - neke atu i te 1,000%. Kei te hokona auautia hoki ngā whakamōhiotanga kaha ake, e ai ki ngā raraunga mai i te tinana o te umanga matū o Āhiana CASAFE. Ko te kaipatu tarutaru e tino whakamahia ana i Āhiana ko te glyphosate. Kua karangatia e te Tōpūtanga o ngā Tohunga Rongoā o Āhiana kia rāhuitia te glyphosate, engari he tino tautohetohe te huatau tērā pea ka tūkinotia. Nō nā tata nei i whakatau ai te Uniana o Ūropi he haumaru rawa ki te raihana anō i te patu otaota i Uropi mō te 18 marama, i a ia e haere tonu ana ki te aromatawai i ngā whakaaturanga. Kua ako a Dr Damián Verzeñassi me tana tīma i te māngai pūtaiao rongoā i te Whare Wānanga o Rosario i te hauora o neke atu i te 80,000 tāngata i roto i ngā hapori e 25 i te pampa o Āhiana mai i te tau 2010. He akoranga tahumaero i runga anō i ngā uiuinga, kaua ko ngā whakamātautau rongoā. Ka inea e ia te pupūtanga o ngā mate i roto i te iwi whānui paetata, ā, kāore e taea te tā mai i tētahi hononga tūturu i waenganui i ngā pareketo me te hauora tangata. Kāore he tohu mārō i kitea e te mātauranga i ēnei wāhi tawhiti, e 40% o ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e ngā raruraru romahā - he nui ake te mokatere i ērā atu o Āhiana. "He nui ake ō mātau raruraru romahā i te taiwhenua i te taone," tana kī. "A, i whakaaro mātou mēnā e noho ana koe i te taiwhenua, ka hā, ka noho hauora ake koe." I kitea hoki e te mātauranga he pupūtanga tiketike o ngā tamariki whai kiri, i muri iho i te rehu o ngā otaota e pātata ana. Te āhua nei he tino teitei ake te pāpātanga o te mate pukupuku i ēnei wāhi i te wawaenga ā-motu. "I waenganui i te 75% me te 95% o ngā hapori i ēnei wāhi e noho ana i roto i te 1,000 mita o ngā pārae e rehu ai rātou i ngā otaota," te kī a Dr Verzeñassi. "Ā, ko ēnei hapori katoa, hāunga tētahi, mō te 20 tau i ngā wāhi e hangaia ai ngā hua whakawhitiwhiti, e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā matū tūkino, ko te tino glyphosate.... Nā reira kāore e taea e mātou te whakahaere tērā pea e pā ana ngā raruraru e kitea ana e mātau ki ēnei matū." I tērā tau, i kī te Ao Whānui o te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao mō te Rangahau i te Mate pukupuku he "mate pukupuku pea". Ko Monsanto, tētahi o ngā kaiwhakanao glyphosate o te ao, e tautohe ana i ngā kitenga a te pokapū pukupuku o WHO, e kī ana kāore anō kia whakaarohia ngā whakaaturanga katoa, ā, kua "hē te whakaahuatanga o te mōrearea". E kī ana kua whakamutua e ētahi atu kaiwhakarite takitahi ko te glycophosate "ka taea te whakamahi haumaru" me "i ngā taumata mārakerake tūturu kāore he mōrea mate pukupuku". I kī a Mark Buckingham o Monsanto: "He iti iho te paitini o te glyphosate i te nuinga o ētahi atu pareketo. " E ai ki te tūkinotanga tāhapa [mārakerake i te rā kotahi] he iti iho te paitini o te glyphosate i te winika, te tote tēpu, te paracetamol me te kawheine." I kī a Marcelo Kānga, o te pāhonotanga umanga soya o Āhiana ACSOJA, he maha ētahi atu whenua, tae atu ki a Mātau, e tautohetohe ana i ngā take hauora o ngā otaota, engari kāore he tohu e pā ana te glyphosate ki te mate pukupuku. Neke atu i te 30,000 ngā tāngata i te kawanatanga o Āhiana o Santa Fe kua hainatia tētahi petihana e karanga ana kia rāhuitia te rehu otaota i roto i te 800 mita o ngā kāinga me te 1,000 mita o ngā kura. E noho ana a Sonia Lobos i Maria Juana. He whaea a ia no tētahi taitama 13 tau te pakeke i kitea he kano toto i te Pō Kirihimete i tērā tau. "I tētahi rā ka kī a ia: 'E māmā, titiro he ururua tāku, ā, kāore au i te maumahara i patua.' I pā atu ahau, a, ka rongo ahau i tētahi pukupuku uaua," tana kī. E noho tata ana a Mrs Lobos ki nga pārae, ā, e kī ana ko ngā taraka e mau ana i ngā matū hei rehu i ngā hua whenua e haere tonu ana i tōna whare. "Kāore au i te mōhio mēnā koinei tonu te take o te mate o taku tama, engari koia te mea tino pai e taea e au te whakaaro," tana kī. Kaore te minita o te umanga ahuwhenua o Āhiana i pīrangi ki te kōrero. Engari i ākiritia e te kāwanatanga kāwanatanga o Eduardo Amadeo tētahi huatau ka taea te hono i te glyphosate, i ngā otaota rānei ki ngā mate. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore he take kotahi e taea te whakamatau pūtaiao e pā ana ki te glyphosate. Ngā mihi ki ngā otaota pēnei i te glyphosate, kua takitoru te hua ahuwhenua o te ao. "Ki te kore rātau ka mate te ao i te hiakai."

title: Covid-19: Ka tautohe a Boris Johnson i ia rā i te wā e āwhina ana te Ope Taua ki te whakarewa
summary: Ko te whakatakotoranga kano ārai mate coronavirus he wero ā-motu e hiahia ana ki tētahi mahi kāore anō kia mōhiotia - e whakauru ana i ngā ope taua - e kī ana a Boris Johnson.
text: I whakaūngia e te PM e tata ana ki te 1.5 miriona ngā tāngata i te UK kua whiwhi ināianei i te kotahi neke atu rānei o te kano ārai mate Covid. Neke atu i te 1,000 ngā pae ā-GP i Ingarangi ka taea te tuku i te tapeke o ngā "rau mano" o ngā jabs ia rā i te 15 o Hānuere. Ka whakamahia e te Taua "ngā pūkenga whakarite riri" hei āwhina ki te whakaoti i taua whāinga. I tae mai he 1,162 anō ngā mate i roto i te 28 rā o tētahi whakamātautau tōrunga i pūrongotia i te Rāitema - te rā tuarua o ngā mate neke atu i te 1,000 i tuhia - me te 52,618 ngā kēhi hou. A, i te whakatūpato a Haimona Stevens, te upoko o te NHS i Ingarangi, e 10,000 ngā tūroro me Covid kua whakaaetia ki te hōhipera mai i te Rā Kirihimete. I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi hui rongokōrero o Downing Street, ka kī a Mr Johnson tērā pea he "lumpiness and bumpiness" i roto i te whakatakotoranga o ngā kano ārai mate. Ka kī a ia: "Kia mārama tātou, he wero ā-motu tēnei i runga i tētahi tauine kāore anō kia kitea e tātau i mua, ā, ka hiahiatia he mahi ā-motu kāore anō kia kitea. " Ko te tikanga, ka puta he uauatanga, ka hurihia ngā wāhui engari... kei te mahi tahi te Ope Taua me te NHS me ngā kaunihera ā-rohe ki te whakatatū i tā mātou whatunga kano ārai mate me te whakamahi i ngā pūkenga whakarite pakanga hei āwhina i a mātou ki te pupuri i te tere." I te taha o ngā GP, e 223 ngā pae hōhipera me ngā "pokapū werohanga nui" e whitu - tae atu ki ngā rongoā hapori 200 tuatahi - e tuku ana i ngā werohanga, te kī a Tēnā Johnson. Ka whai pokapū werohanga te katoa i roto i te 10 maero o to raatau kainga, ka tapiritia e ia, me tetahi "mahere werohanga katoa" ka whakaputaina i te Mane. I kī hoki a ia ka puta he pūnaha tāpui ā-motu mō ngā werohanga - engari kāore i hoatu ētahi atu taipitopito. I kī atu a Brigadier Phil Prosser, te rangatira o te tautoko hōia ki te hōtaka tuku rongoā, ki te hui rongokōrero i "tāmautia" tana tīma ki te NHS. I kī a ia ko tana "mahi rā" ko te tuku i ngā taonga riri ki ngā ope UK i te wā o te pakanga, "i te tere i roto i ngā āhuatanga tino uaua, uaua hoki". Kua tautuhia e te kāwanatanga he ūnga ki te tuku kāniwha werohanga ki te 15 miriona i roto i ngā rōpū manakē e whā o runga - tae atu ki ngā tau neke atu i te 80 - i te 15 o Huitanguru. A, i kī a Tēnā Hōnea, mā te kano ārai mate Oxford-AstraZeneca e wātea ana, ka taea e ia te tautohe tētahi o aua rōpū - ngā kainoho kāinga tiaki - ka whiwhi katoa i tā rātou wero i te mutunga o Hānuere. Kua tīmata te whakatakotoranga whānui o te kano ārai mate me ngā rongoā tuatahi i tukuna i te rā ki ngā tākuta whānau hei tohatoha. Engari he āwangawanga mai i ētahi GP mō ngā rawa, i te mea i kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Matt Hancock ko ngā taumata o te putanga kano ārai mate te take "whakawhāiti mokatere" i te mea ka tukuna ngā wero i te tere o te wātea o ngā rawa. Mōrea hōhipera Ka puta mai i te mōrearea o ētahi hōhipera i Ingarangi kia noho hei pae Covid anake, me te pikinga o ngā whakaurunga mō te huaketo e whakahau ana i ngā whakawhirinaki ki te tapahi i ētahi atu ratonga. E whakaatu ana hoki ngā tatauranga NHS hōu rawa e 30,370 ngā tūroro me Covid i ngā hōhipera o UK i te Tūrei, he whika teitei ake i te taumata tuatahi i te kōanga o te tau 2020. Kua whakatūpato ngā kaiārahi hōhipera kei te nui haere te whārōrō ki ngā "kaimahi kāore i te mōhiotia" e whakamahia ana hei whakakī i ngā āputa. I te 20:00 GMT, ka puta atu ngā tāngata i ētahi tiriti ki ngā kūaha ki te pakipaki mō ngā toa o te taiepa, whai muri i tētahi mahi ā-wiki i rongonuitia i te wā o te raka tuatahi o te UK. Heoi anō, he nui ake te whakangū o te pakipaki o te Tāite mō ngā toa i ērā i kitea i tērā tau, tērā pea e whakaata ana i te whakahē kua whakawāteatia te mahi. Homai te taiapa nui rawa atu He maha ngā taipitopito kua hoatu mō te āhua o te NHS - e mahi tahi ana me te hōia - ka taea te tuku i ngā kano ārai mate. Ka nui ake ngā pokapū werohanga paetata, ngā pokapū hōhipera, tae atu ki te werohanga maha i ngā taiwhanga hākinakina. E hia mano ētahi atu kaiwerohanga kua whakaakona kētia - ā, e hia mano anō e tatari ana i roto i ngā parirau. Engari ko te taiapa nui rawa atu e anga ana ki te UK ko te putanga kano ārai mate. Ki te kore e wātea, kāore e taea te whakauru ki roto ahakoa te pai o te whatunga werohanga. I te wā roa, kāore pea e raruraru te putanga - engari i ngā wiki e heke mai nei ka kikī pea. He nui te kano ārai mate i te whenua hei tuku i te hunga katoa e tino mōrearea ana i te werohanga i te waenganui o Hui tanguru. Engari kāore anō kia rite katoa mō te NHS ki te whakamahi, nā te mea kāore anō kia mahia ngā taki haumaru whakamutunga, kāore anō rānei kia purua te kano ārai mate ki roto i ngā pounamu. Ko te mea o mua e whakawhirinaki ana ki te mahi taiwhanga a te kaiwhakahaere rongoā, ko te mea whakamutunga te mahi a tētahi tipu i Wrexham. Ka roa te wā o ia wāhanga. Ka taea te ūnga, engari he nui tonu te haere tika. I kī a Tā Haimona Stevens e 50% anō ngā tūroro coronavirus i ngā hōhipera o Ingarangi ināianei i whakaritea ki te taumata o Aperira kua hipa, e pā ana ki ia rohe puta noa i te whenua. Ka kī a ia: "Kei te tino tere te tere o taua tau... He tūturu ngā pēhanga, ā, kei te tipu haere rātou." I Aiarangi ki te Raki, kua kī te Belfast Health Trust kāore he kōwhiringa kē atu engari ki te whakakore i ōna pokanga mate pukupuku kōhukihuki i waenganui i te tono "tino nui" mō te mokowā moenga. Ka pā ngā mahi kua whakakorea ki aua tūroro ka pā pea te pokanga ki te whakaora, ki te ora hoki, ka kī te whakawhirinaki. I roto i tētahi whanaketanga tōrunga mō ngā hōhipera, e rua anō ngā rongoā whakaora ora ka taea te tapahi i ngā mate mā te hauwhā i roto i ngā tūroro e tino mate ana i te Covid kua whakawāteatia mō te whakamahinga whānui, me te pānga wawe. Ko ngā rongoā ārai ārai, i hoatu mā te turuturu, ka tiakina he oranga anō mō ia 12 i mahia, ka kī ngā kaipūkaro, i muri i ngā whakamātautau NHS. I tetahi atu wahi, kua whakatinanatia e te UK nga herenga mo nga kaihaereere ki Ingarangi mai i nga whenua tata ki Awherika ki te Tonga hei aukati i te horapa o te momo Covid o Awherika ki te Tonga. I tēnei wā, i pātaitia a Tēnā Hōnea rāua ko Tā Haimona mō ngā kerēme pāpāho pāpori tohetohe kāore i te tīariari te coronavirus - ā, he pūrākau noa iho ngā pūrongo o ngā wāhi hōhipera pōkai o ngā tāngata e rongoatia ana. I kī a Tā Haimona he "muhani" taua mōhiohio hē ki ngā kaimahi tiaki nui. "Kaore he mea whakaheke ake i te whakaheke i tēnā momo kutukutu i te wā e tino mārama ana te pono," tana kī.

title: Ka tukuna e Unesco te tūnga Tuku iho o te Ao i te pūnaha huarahi o Inca Qhapaq Nan
summary: Kua tukuna he pūnaha huarahi i hangaia e te Emepaea o Inca ki te tūnga Tuku iho o te Ao e te pokapū ahurea o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao, o Unesco.
text: E ono nga whenua o Amerika ki te Tonga e haere ana nga huarahi o Qhapaq Nan. I hangaia ki ngā whenua tino rerekē, e hono ana i ngā hapori i ngā maunga Andes ki ngā awaawa mōmona, ngahere ngahere me ngā koraha. I whakaahuatia e Unesco te pūnaha he mīharo pūkaha me whakaora, me tiaki hoki. I whakataua te whakataunga i te pūmatua o Qatari, i Tawhā, i reira e huihuia ai te Komiti Tuku iho o te Ao o Te Ao ki te whakaaro i te whakaurunga o ngā pae ahurea me ngā pae māori e 40 ki te rārangi. I hangaia te Pūnaha Huarahi Andean i roto i ngā rau tau, ā, i whakamahia e te Pāniora i to rātau taenga atu ki Amerika ki te Tonga i te rau tau 16. I whakamahia nuitia mō te hokohoko me te wawao. E kapi ana i ētahi 30,000 km (18,600 km), mai i Kōpia o nāianei i te raki ki Āhiana me Hiri i te tonga, mā Peru, Ekuatoa me Poriwia. Kei te tiakina tonutia ētahi wāhanga, engari kua heke te nuinga o te ara mai i te hinganga o te Emepaea Inca. "Kāore tonu e taea e mātou te kite i te huarahi katoa nā te mea he nui tonu te wāhi e hipokina ana e te otaota," te kī a Fernando Astete, te rangatira o te kaimātai whenua i te pae Machu Picchu o Peru. Ko te pūnaha ara i whakamahia hei hono i te pūmatua o Inca, o Cusco, ki ngā wāhi tawhiti o te emepaea. "Ko te Qhapaq Nan na tōna tauine tino nui me te kounga o te huarahi, he whakatutukitanga ahurei o ngā pūkenga pūkaha. E whakaatu ana i te mātauranga i roto i te hangarau pūkaha," te kī a Unesco i roto i tētahi kōrero. E kī ana a Unesco mā te tuku i te tūnga Tuku iho o te Ao o ngā huarahi o Qhapaq Nan ka āhei rātou ki ngā moni whakaora e tino hiahiatia ana.

title: E whakaae ana a JP Morgan ki te whakatau mōkete $4.5bn
summary: Kua whakaae te pēke pūtea penapena a AMERIKA JP Morgan ki te utu i te $4.5bn (£2.8bn) ki ngā kaiwhakangao i ngaro moni i runga i ngā pūtea e pā ana ki te mōkete i te wā o te raruraru pūtea.
text: E 21 ngā kaiwhakarato ā-iwi matua te whakataunga. Ko ngā pūtea penapena e pā ana ki te mōkete he take nui i roto i te raruraru, i tīmata i te tau 2007 me te tiango o te mākete whare o Amerika. I tērā marama i whakaae ai a JP Morgan ki tētahi mahi motuhake, tuatahi $13bn ki te kāwanatanga o Amerika mō ngā mōkete mōkete. Hei wāhanga o taua mahi, ka haere te $5.1bn ki te whakatau i ngā utu i whakawāteatia e te pēke ngā tāhuhu mōkete o Fannie Mae rāua ko Pātata Mac i te wā o te pahū whare. Ko taua whakataunga te mea nui rawa atu i te pēke o Amerika. Ināianei, e 21 ngā kaiwhakangao ā-rōpū e hoatu moni ana ki roto i ngā pūtea pūrua mōkete kāinga neke atu i te 300 me whakahoki e te pēke. I tukuna ngā haumarutanga i waenganui i te 2005 me te 2008 e JP Morgan me Bear Stearns - he pēke i tangohia e ia i te wā o te raruraru pūtea. "This settlement is another important step in JP Morgan's efforts to resolve legacy related... ngā take" i takea mai i ngā haumarutanga e pā ana ki te mōkete, i kī te kaikōrero o JP Morgan, a Te Wānanga o Zuccarelli i roto i tētahi kōrero i te Paraire. Me whakaae tonu te mahi a te Paraire e ngā kaitiaki mō ngā whakawhirinaki e pupuri ana i ngā haumarutanga. Ākuanei ka pānuitia tētahi whakataunga whakamutunga ki te Tari Ture o Amerika. Ko ngā pūtea pūrua mōkete he hua pūtea mātauranga i hangaia e te maha o ngā pēke pūtea penapena i te whakahaerenga o te raruraru pūtea. I roto i ēnei here motuhake he whāranu pūtea penapena, engari i roto i tō rātou ngākau ko te tikanga he moni kāinga kore mōrearea. I te pakarutanga o te mirumiru whare, ka nui te hinga o te uara o ēnei rawa, ā, ka mau ngā mākete nama. Ko nga rau toenga o te maha o nga pēke o Amerika me Ūropi, tae atu ki ērā i te UK, ka tūkinotia, ā, me tārewa rātau e o rātau kāwanatanga. Ko te mea e kiia ana a JP Morgan ko te hoko i ngā rawa i pūruatia e te mōkete, e mōhio ana he tino mōrearea te nuinga o ngā moni kāinga.

title: E kī ana a Kimi Rangi-un o Kōrea ki te Raki i te whakapono ki a Trump 'kāore i hurihia'
summary: Ko te whakapono o te kaiārahi Kōria ki te Raki o Kimi Rangi-un ki a Donald Trump e noho "kāore anō kia hurihia", ā, e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakakore i te koiora o Kōria i te wā tuatahi o te perehitini o Amerika, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere i te Tonga.
text: I kōrero a Tēnā Kimi ki ngā karere mai i Seoul i te Raki ki te whakarite i tētahi tūnga kaiārahi hou ā muri ake i tēnei marama. Kua kawa te whanaungatanga i waenganui i te Raki me te US mai i te tihi hītori o Te Puhi-Kimi i Hōroa i Hāmata. Ko te nuinga o ngā kaimātakitaki e whakatūpato ana kāore anō kia mahia e te Raki he hipanga whai tikanga hei whakawātea. Ko te tihi e whakaritea ana ko te wā tuatahi i roto i te neke atu i te tekau tau kua haere tētahi kaiārahi Kōria ki te Tonga ki te pūmatua o Kōria ki te Raki. I kī a Te Wānanga o Aotearoa i Seoul e tūmanako ana ka taea e Perehitini Moon Jae-in te mahi hei takawaenga me te whakakā anō i ngā kōrero tūpāpaku i waenganui i Te Hononga o Amerika me Kōrea ki te Raki. I kī te whakaaetanga hārangirangi o Hōroa ka mahi ngā taha e rua ki te whakawāteatanga, engari kāore i whakaurua he rārangi wā, he taipitopito, he tikanga rānei hei manatoko i te tukanga. "He nui tonu te mahi hei mahi. Kāore anō kia puta he whakamātautau karihi, he whakamātautau tūroro rānei... engari ka haere tonu te mahi ki te mahi i te neke rautaki," te kī a Te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika ko Maika Pompeo i te haerenga ki te pūmatua o Īnia, o Delhi. Ka haere a Tēnā Marama ki te Raki mai i te 18 ki te 20 o Mahuru ki te kōrerorero i "ngā tikanga ā-ringa hei whakawātea" i te koiora o Kōria, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o Kōrea ki te Tonga i muri i te tūtakinga ki a Tēnā Kimi i Ūngia. I tētahi hui pānui, ka kī nga karere kua kī atu a Tēnā Kimi ki a rātau ko tōna hiahia kaha ki te mahi tahi me Kōrea ki te Tonga kia taea ai tētahi whakataunga rangimārie mau tonu. "Te Manukura o Kim... i whakapuakina te āwangawanga i runga i te rangirua e whakaaturia ana e ētahi wāhanga o te iwi ao whānui mō tōna hiahia," te kī a te kaitohutohu haumarutanga ā iwi o Chung Eui-yong. "Kua mahi tōmua a Kōria ki te Raki i ngā mehua e hiahiatia ana mō te whakawāteatanga, ā, ka kī a Kimi ka whakamanamana ia ka whakaaetia taua whakapono pai i runga i te whakapono pai." He rite tonu ngā kōrero a te pāpāho kāwanatanga o Kōria ki te Raki mai i a Tēnā Kimi. "Ko te tikanga kia whakanuia e te Raki me te Tonga a rātau mahi kia mōhio ai ki te whakawāteatanga o te koiora o Kōria," ka whakahuatia ia e KCNA me te kōrero. Ahakoa ngā uaua mai i te tihi o te Pāpāho-Kimi, kua haere tonu ngā kōrero taumata tiketike me ngā toronga, ā, tērā ētahi tohu ā-ringa mai i te Raki pēnei i te whakahoki i ngā toenga o ētahi o ngā hōia o Amerika i patua i te Pakanga Kōria i nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. Engari i tērā marama i karangatia ohorere ai tētahi haerenga a te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga o Amerika i te meneti whakamutunga, me te kōrero a Tēnā Puhi i te kore kauneketanga hei take. Kua whakapae ngā taha e rua i a rāua anō mo nga whakaritenga pōhēhē, i te wā i whakapaea hoki e Tēnā Puhi a Haina. Heoi anō, kua haere tonu ngā kōrero i waenganui i Kōrea ki te Raki me Kōrea ki te Tonga mai i te hui tuatahi o Kim-Moon i Aperira. Ko te tauira hou rawa o te rewa taitapa he tīma poti tarakona whakakotahi i whiwhi mētara koura i ngā Tākaro Āhia i Initonīhia.

title: I muri i te 13 tau ka tuohu atu te rangatira o te Reo Irirangi 1 o Andy Parfitt
summary: I muri i te 13 tau, ka wehe atu a Andy Parfitt, te kaiwhakahaere o te Reo Irirangi 1 me te Reo Irirangi 1Xtra.
text: Nā Rod McKenzieNewsbeat ētita, Andy, ko tōna tūranga o nāianei e whakauru ana hoki i te Whatunga Āhia me ngā pūoro kaingākautia, ka wehe i te mutunga o Hōngongoi ki te whai i ngā huarahi hou. Kua ārahi a ia i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra ki te hopu i ngā kaimātakitaki, ā, tata ki te 12 miriona ngā kaiwhakarongo i ia wiki. I kī atu a ia ki a Newsbeat: "He tino nui ki a au, ā, kei te mōhio ahau ko te mea tika māku e mahi." Kua hangaia e ia te rongo o te whatunga mō te reo irirangi ratonga tūmatanui mā te whakangahau kounga tiketike, ngā rongokōrero, ngā pakipūmeka, te mahi pāpori me te tautoko mō ngā pūoro hou, ora hoki. Kua panonitia hoki te Reo Irirangi 1 'hanga nui' mai i tētahi whakahere tairitenga tino pai ki tētahi mahi pūhara maha tauwhiti katoa. E kī ana a ia kei runga te Reo Irirangi 1 i tōna kēmu: "He tino pai te āhua, kua whakaritea ināianei mō te ao tukutuku me ngā ihirangi arokite. " He whakatutukitanga whakamīharo mō te AO te whai ratonga taitamariki e hira ana, e hāngai ana ināianei pērā i te mutunga o ngā tau 60." Nā te 13 tau o Andy Parfitt i te urunga, ka noho ko ia te pūmana mahi roa rawa atu o Radio 1 mai i tōna whakarewatanga i te tau 1967. I pātai mai he aha tana tino mahue i a ia ka kī atu a ia ki a Newsbeat: "Ko ngā DJ, he tāngata motuhake rātau - ka mahue i a au te mahi ki a rātau i ia rā." I kī te Tumuaki o te Ororongo me te Pūoro a Tim Davie: "He pūmana tino pai a Andy, ā, ka waiho te Reo Irirangi 1 i roto i te hauora āhuaatua - me ngā hōtaka motuhake, kounga tiketike me ngā whika whakarongo pūkete - kua panoni i te teihana hei tono mamati tauwhiti katoa. " He kaiārahi whakaaweawe a ia i roto i te WHK, ā, he tino manaakitia puta noa i te katoa o te umanga reo irirangi." 'Rangatira tino pai' Kua hoatu takoha ētahi o ōna hoa mahi DJ. I kī te kaiwhakaatu whakaaturanga parakuihi a Pirihi Moyles: "Ko Andy te rangatira tino pai rawa atu i a au. He tino tautoko, he auaha, he āwhina hoki a ia ki a au me taku whakaaturanga mō te neke atu i te tekau tau. "Nā tōna whakaaro whakamua me tōna ngaiotanga i āwhina ki te pupuri i te Reo Irirangi 1 i te tapa o te pāohotanga ahurea taitamariki. Tērā pea ko te tangata tino pai ki te whakahaere i te Reo Irirangi 1." I tāpiri mai a Zane Lowe: "I tino whakarerekētia e te tangata tōku oranga. Ko tōna whakawhirinaki ki a mātau hei tīma me te tautoko auau te tūāpapa i hangaia ai e au tōku pono ki te Reo Irirangi 1. E hiahia ana ahau ki a ia engari ko te tino pai." A, i takoha hoki a DJ Trevor Nelson, nāna i mahi i runga i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra: "Ko Andy tētahi o ngā tāngata tino whakaaweawe, ngākau nui hoki kua tūtaki ahau i tēnei umanga. " Ko ia te rangatira tino pai rawa atu."

title: He ārai hou i te rongoā mate hukihuki i te wā e hapu ana
summary: Me kaua e whakaritea he rongoā mate hukihuki e tūkino ana i ngā pēpi kāore anō kia whakaritea ki ngā kōtiro me ngā wāhine pakeke i te UK ki te kore rātau e haina i tētahi puka hei kī e mārama ana rātau ki ngā mōrea.
text: E kī ana te kaiwhakarite rongoā, te MHRA, ko ngā tikanga hou e whakamōhiotia ana e ia ka noho haumaru ai ngā whakatupuranga tamariki ā muri ake. Ko te hunga kei runga kē i te rongoā valproate me kite i tō rātou GP kia arotakea ai tō rātou rongoā. Kaua tētahi wahine, kōtiro rānei e mutu te tango me te kore tohutohu rongoā. E whakaarotia ana e 20,000 ngā tamariki i te UK kua mahue i te hauātanga i takea mai i te valproate mai i te wā i whakaurua ai te rongoā i ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua. Kua karangatia e ngā whānau pāngia he uiui tūmatanui me te utu. E kī ana ngā aroha mate hukihuki, kotahi i roto i te rima ngā wāhine i runga i te konutai valproate kāore i te mōhio mā te tango i te wā e hapu ana ka tūkino pea te whanaketanga me te hauora ā-tinana o tētahi pēpi kāore anō kia whānautia. Neke atu i te kotahi i roto i te whā kāore anō kia hoatu mōhiohio mō ngā mōrea mō tā rātou tamaiti kāore anō kia whānautia. Kua hurihia e te MHRA te raihana mō te valproate, ko te tikanga me mātua whakarite ngā tūroro wahine ki tētahi Hōtaka Ārai Hapū, arā: Mēnā ka tangohia te valproate i te wā e hapu ana, tae atu ki te whā i roto i te 10 ngā pēpi e mōrearea ana ki ngā raruraru whanaketanga, ā, tata ki te kotahi i roto i te 10 e mōrearea ana ki ngā hēnga whānautanga. I kī a Dr June Raine, mai i te MHRA: "Ko te haumarutanga tūroro to mātau tino manakē. E tino mōhio ana mātou ki te whakarite kia mōhio ngā wāhine me ngā kōtiro ki ngā mōrea tūturu o te mau valproate i te wā e hapu ana. Heoi anō, e mōhio ana hoki mātou he tino hira kia kaua ngā wāhine e mutu te tango i te valproate me te kore kōrero tuatahi ki tō rātou tākuta. "I would like to particularly thank the families involved in the Valproate Stakeholder Network who have shared their experiences and expertise with us. Mā tā rātou tautoko e āwhina ki te noho haumaru i ngā whakatupuranga tamariki ā muri ake." I kī a Haimona Wigglesworth, te rangatira tuarua o Epilepsy Action: "E mōhio ana mātou he tokomaha rawa ngā wāhine kāore anō kia mōhio ki ngā mōrea tūpono o te tango konutai valproate i te wā e hapu ana. " He tino hira kia mātua whakarite ngā tohunga rongoā kia arotakea ngā wāhine katoa e mau ana i te konutai valproate e hāngai ana ki ngā tohutohu hōu."

title: Inoi hou mo te kōhuru o Leonard Farrar i Leeds i te tau 2002
summary: He inoi hou mō ngā mōhiohio kua mahia e ngā kaitohutohu e uiui ana i te kōhurutanga o tētahi tangata 71 tau i Leeds 11 tau ki mua.
text: I kitea a Leonard Farrar, he kāpene moana kaihokohoko, kua mate i tōna kāinga i Cardinal Road, Beeston i te 4 o Me, 2002. I tīmataria tētahi uiuinga a ngā Pirihimana o Te Hauauru, engari kāore anō tētahi tangata kia kawea ki te tika. Ināianei kei te whakahaeretia e te tīma arotake tūhura nui. Ka tohe ngā āpiha ki "ngā tāngata kua noho mārire" kia haere mai ki mua. I auau tonu te okaina o Tēnā Farrar i roto i te mea i whakaahuatia e pirihimana he whakaekenga tautoko. I kitea tōna tinana i te rā i muri i te kitenga o tana motokā o Fiat Panda i te taha o tōna kāinga. I kī a Det Ch Insp Paul Fountain: "E mōhio ana tētahi tangata i reira nā wai i patu a Leonard Farrar. " I te roanga o te wā, ka taea e ngā tāngata i noho mārire mō te neke atu i te 11 tau te haere mai ki mua ki te āwhina i a mātau ki te hoatu i te katinga whānau o Tēnā Farrar."

title: He raruraru wahine tā Jeremy Corbyn?
summary: He pātai tēnei i hangaia mō tētahi panekōrero nūpepa, engari kāore he pānga o te take e anga ana ki a Jeremy Corbyn ki tōna oranga tūmataiti.
text: Nā Alex HuntBBC News E pātai ana ngā kaitautoko pono me ngā kaiwhakawāwā i mua: He raruraru wahine tā te kaiārahi Mahi hou? He take tērā i puta tuatahi mai i te wā i pānuitia ai te pōti ārahi o Labour i te ata Hātarei, i te wā i noho ai a Kōpia rāua ko Tom Watson hei tīma tāne katoa o te kaiārahi me te kaiārahi tuarua o te rōpū. I te pānuitanga o ngā wāhui matua ki te kāpata kōruru, ka kaha ake ngā reo. Tumuaki kōruru - tangata. Hēkeretari ā-rohe kōruru - tangata. Hēkeretari kāinga kōruru - tangata. I te tōmuri o te pō o te Rātapu, ka rongo tuatahi ngā kaipānui e tatari ana ki ētahi atu wāhui, kei te tino nui te take ira tangata i roto i te Tīma Kōpihi. E ai ki te pūrongo a Eleanor Garnier o TE HAU: "Kātahi, tata ki waenganui pō, he reo hou, i whakaaro mātou ko Haimona Fletcher pea: 'Kei te nui tonu tā mātou mahi mō ngā wāhine... me hanga e tatou a Angela... te minita tuatahi o te Kāwanatanga, pēnei i a Mandelson, ka taea e ia te mahi PMQs... mahia te āhua o te Angela ināianei." I muri tata iho ka noho a Eagle, ko te hēkeretari pakihi kōruru kē, ko te tuarua moe maori o Kōpihi. I te wā i whakaingoatia ai te kāpata kōruru katoa i te wā o te Mane, ka taea e Labour te whakapuaki i te mea neke atu i te hawhe o ta rātau kāpata kōruru i hangaia e nga wāhine. Nā tērā i whakatutuki te tautohe whakahau a Kōpihi, ā, ko te wā tuatahi i taea ai e tētahi rōpū te kerēme pērā. I te pātaitanga ki a ia, me tana tumuaki kōruru hou, a John McDonnell mō te kore wāhine i roto i ngā mahi o runga, he rite tonu a rātau urupare - ko ngā tirohanga tūturu o ngā tari nunui o te kāwanatanga, i takea mai i ngā rā i whai Emepaea ai a Westminster hei whakahaere. Ko te tikanga, i kī rāua, ko te mātauranga me te hauora ngā manakē nui me ngā mahi nunui mō rāua, ā, i whakakīa rāua e ngā wāhine. Heoi anō, kāore i taea e taua huatau te whakapakari i nga kaiwaiata. I roto i te Daily Telegraph ka tuhituhi a Dan Hodges: "I roto i te 48 haora noa iho, kua ngaro katoa - ko ngā mea katoa e pā ana ki ngā mātāpono hou me ngā uara hou me tētahi tīmatanga hou. Ngaro atu ki te pō." I roto i te The Times, ka tuhituhi a Rahera Sylvester: "mō ngā kōrero katoa o tētahi momo tōrangapū hou, ko te whakatata a Team Corbyn ki ngā wāhine he whakahoki ki ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua". Ka haere tonu a ia: "Ahakoa e tohe ana te tari o te kaiārahi kia whārite te kāpata kōruru katoa, tokorua o ngā mema wahine kua whakatūria ki ngā tūnga hou katoa, e pā ana ki te hauora hinengaro me te rangatahi. Anō nei kua whakawhitia te kaupapa a Tēnā Kōpia mō ngā waka wahine anake i runga i ngā tereina ki Aotearoa, me ngā kaipōrangapū wahine i hoatu ki ō rātou ake wāhi "haumaru". Mō tētahi rōpū e tika ana kia tukua ki te ōritetanga, te āhua nei he rahunga whakamīharo - engari e mau ana ki te āhua o te āhua o ngā tōrangapū mārō tūturu e noho ana te kaiārahi hou." I roto i te Guardian Rowena Mason e pūrongo ana i te kaiārahi Ariki o mua o Labour, a Lady Royall e kī ana: "E whakamihi ana ahau ... [arā] ka ōrite te tokomaha o ngā tāne me ngā wāhine i roto i te kāpata kōruru. Tērā pea e whakapono ana a Jeremy he hira te kōpaki whanaketanga ao whānui o te kōruru ki te Whare Taonga Moni. Engari ko te mea kāore te ao o waho e whakaaro pēnā. Tērā pea ka taea e tātau te huri i te ahurea o to tātau rōpū, pāremata me te whenua, engari kāore rātau i te [whakaaro] i tēnei wā." E mārama ana he take e hiahia ana a Kōpia ki te rutu - e kī ana ki te TUC i te Tūtira ko te toenga ira tangata o tana kāpata kōruru he tohu o ana tōrangapū hou. Me pēhea te tāpiri i ōna tau? Kei roto i te kāpata kōruru i pānuitia e Labour e 31 ngā tūranga (tae atu ki ētahi kāore i te kōruru i ngā tūranga kāpata) e 16 e puritia ana e ngā wāhine. E whakataurite ana tērā ki te kāpata o nāianei, e whitu nga wāhine i roto i ngā mema e 22, ā, ko te kāpata tuatahi o te tau 1997, neke atu i te rua nga wāhine i roto. ( e rima - tirohia te rārangi katoa i konei) I mua i te pōtitanga nui, kotahi tekau mā tahi ngā mema o te kāpata kōruru kaha o Ed Miliband he wāhine. I runga i tētahi tuhipoka ahuwhānui ake - puta noa i te Whare o Ngātahi - e 191 ngā wāhine, arā ko te 29% o te tapeke - ko te tiketike rawa. (Mō ētahi atu tatauranga mō ngā wāhine i te Pāremata me te Kāwanatanga, whakamātauria tēnei pepa kōrero o te Whare Pukapuka o Te Whare Pukapuka) I te nuinga o te wā, kāore aua whakatauritenga i te kino rawa. Engari, ahakoa e whakaae ana ki te hunga i whakahauhautia e te ātete ki a Kōpia, tērā tētahi pirimia wahine, he hēkeretari kāinga wahine, ā, mō tētahi wā poto, he hēkeretari ā-rohe wahine. A, kia whakakīa rā anō tētahi o aua tūranga - ngā tūranga kōruru rānei - ki te tīma o Kōpia e te wahine, tērā pea ka tārewa te pātai ira tangata.

title: Ngā mana tangata o Kōria ki te Raki: He aha te mea kāore i te kōrerotia
summary: I muri iho i te nuinga o nga tau i roto i te koraha tōrangapū, kua pau i Kōria ki te Raki te tau kua taha i roto i te kōhukihuki o ngā mahi whakawhanaunga.
text: Engari ko ngā kōrero ki a Mātau, kua arotahi katoa a Haina me Kōrea ki te Tonga ki te hokohoko me te whakawāteatanga. Ko te pūkete motika tangata kino o Kōria ki te Raki tētahi kaupapa kāore anō kia puta ake - ā, tērā pea ka noho pērā. E kī ana te UN e noho ana ngā Koreana ki te Raki i raro i "ngā tūkinotanga pūnaha, whānui, nui hoki o ngā mana tangata". Anei ētahi o ngā take: Ko te mana kāwanatanga katoa i wehe atu i ērā atu o te ao, kua whakahaeretia a Kōria ki te Raki e te whānau o Kimi mō ngā whakatupuranga e toru, ā, e hiahiatia ana ōna iwi kia whakaatu i te ngākau nui ki te whānau me tōna kaiārahi o nāianei, a Kimi Rangi-un. E whakahaere ana te kāwanatanga i ngā mea katoa, ā, ka tūtei hohe ki ōna iwi mā te whakamahi i tētahi whatunga matatū nui me te whakamōhiotanga. E tino whakahaeretia ana hoki te āhua o te whakahaerenga, ā, ka kōrere moni te kāwanatanga ki roto i tana hōtaka karihi, tūroro hoki, ahakoa te iti o te kai, te hinu me ētahi atu mea taketake. I kī atu a Pirihitini Arama, ko te tumuaki o Āhia o Human Rights Watch (HRW), ki te AO kua taea anake e Kōria ki te Raki te whakawhanake i tētahi hōtaka karihi utu nui nā te mea he āhua whānui, ā, ka mahia mā te "tango kai i roto i ngā puku o ngā Kōria ki te Raki hiakai". Ko te mana pāpāho o Kōrea ki te Raki te tino whakahaere i te ao. Ko ngā Kaipānui me te kore Taitapa (RSF) e whakatau whakamutunga ana i roto i tōna Taupū Wāteatanga Pēhi Ao. Ka whiwhi ngā Koreana ki te Raki i ā rātou rongokōrero, whakangahau me ngā mōhiohio mai i te pāpāho kāwanatanga, e whakamihi ana i te kaiārahi. E ai ki te RSF, ka taea te tuku tangata ki te whare herehere mō te tirotiro, te pānui, te whakarongo rānei ki ngā ihirangi i whakaratoa e ngā pāpāho ao whānui. He pūnoa ake ngā waea pūkoro i mua, engari ehara i te mea ngāwari te waea ki rāwāhi. "Me whiwhi koe i tētahi waea pūkoro Hainamana i runga i te mākete pango, ka taraiwa ki te rohe Hainamana, ā, ahakoa i te ara ka tū pea koe i ngā māngai kāwanatanga," ka whakamāramatia e Arnold Fang, tētahi kairangahau mai i Amnesty International, ki te HAU. E wātea ana te urunga Ipurangi mō ngā torutoru noa iho i te pūmatua, o Ūngia, e ārahi ana i ngā oranga ātaahua. Tērā pea he urunga whāiti tā ētahi atu. Kei te whenua tōna ake ipurangiroto tino taketake - he whatunga kati e whakaaetia ana ētahi tāngata ki te whakamahi. Engari ko te nuinga o ngā Kōria ki te Raki e kore pea e tuihono. Ko te wāteatanga whakapono e kī taurangi ana te kaupapa ture i tētahi "mana ki te whakapono" ā, he Puta, he Shamanists me ngā kaiārahi o Chondoism - he hāhi Kōria māori - Kōrea ki te Raki. Kei te tīari hoki ngā hāhi e whakahaeretia ana e te kāwanatanga. Engari e kī ana a Tēnā Fang he tino whakaaturanga tēnei. "Ko te mea pono, kaore he wāteatanga o te whakapono. E whakawāteatia ana te katoa ki te whakamahi i te whānau o Kimi hei mea hei koropiko." I kī tētahi pūrongo UN 2014 e anga ana ngā Karaitiana ki "te whakatoi me ngā whiu taumaha" mēnā ka mahi rātau i tō rātou hāhi i waho o ngā hāhi e whakahaeretia ana e te kāwanatanga. He tirohanga hina hoki a Kōria ki te Raki ki nga mihinare kē. I waenganui i ōna taurewa tino rongonui ko Kenneth Bae, he kaikauwhau Koreana-Amerika nāna i whakahaere ngā haerenga Karaitiana ki Kōrea ki te Raki. I whiua a ia kia 15 tau mahi uaua i te tau 2013 mo nga hara "ārai kāwanatanga". I tukua ia i te tau 2014 i runga i nga take hauora. Ko ngā puni whare herehere me ngā here "Kua kīia ko Kōria ki te Raki te puni whare herehere tuwhera nui rawa o te ao," te kī a Tēnā Arama. "Ki taku whakaaro ehara tēnā i te tika." E ai ki tētahi pūrongo a te Tari Kāwanatanga o Amerika, kei waenganui i te 80,000 me te 120,000 ngā tāngata i te whare herehere i te Raki. Ka taea te herehere i ngā tāngata mō ngā mea katoa, e kī ana ngā kaiwhaiwhai, me ngā hara e tata ana mai i te mātakitaki i tētahi DVD Kōria ki te Tonga ki te ngana ki te hē. I te nuinga o te wā ka tukuna ngā tāngata e herea ana ki ngā hara tōrangapū ki ngā puni mahi kino, e pā ana ki ngā mahi ā-tinana pēnei i te kari kari me te rangitaki. Kua whakaahuatia e te Whakawāteatanga nga puni whare herehere he "pākaha i tua atu i te manawanui". E anga ana ngā taurewa ki te whakamamaetanga me te patupatu a nga tautīaki, ā, ka tino mōrearea nga wāhine ki te whakahauhau me te tūkinotanga. Ehara i te mea ko te hunga katoa i roto i te whare herehere i mahi hara. Ka mahi a Kōria ki te Raki i te whiu ā-rōpū, nā reira ki te kitea he hara tētahi mema o tētahi whānau, tērā pea ka whiua tō rātou whānau katoa. Ka whakamahia e Kōria ki te Raki te whiu mate, ā, kua mōhiotia ki te whakahaere i ngā kawenga tūmatanui. Kua hopukina, kua herea hoki ngā tangata whenua kē i Kōrea ki te Raki mō ngā wā roa - i te nuinga o te wā e puritia ana hei herehere mō ngā take tōrangapū, ā, ka whakamahia hei pūkenga whakawhanaunga i ngā wā tika. Tokotoru ngā tangata whenua o Amerika, i hereheretia mō ngā ngohe ārai kāwanatanga, ā, i whakanohoia ki ngā puni mahi, i whakawāteatia i te whare herehere o Kōria ki te Raki hei tohu manaaki i mua i te tūnga ārahi o Amerika-Kōrea ki te Raki i te tau 2018. Engari kāore i tino waimarie te tauira o Amerika, a Otto Warmbier. I hopukina a Tēnā Warmbier i te tau 2016 mo te tāhae i tētahi tohu whakatūpato. I tukua a ia i muri i te 17 marama i roto i te tautāwhi i runga i ngā take hauora, engari i tino mate - i mate a ia i ngā rā i muri i tana hokinga ki te kāinga. Ko ōna mātua, e whakapono ana kua whakamamaetia a ia, ka tono i Kōrea ki te Raki mo tōna matenga. E ono nga herehere o Kōria ki te Tonga e whakapono tonu ana kei te tautāwhi. Kua whakaae hoki a Kōria ki te Raki ki te kahakina e 13 neke atu rānei ngā tangata Tiapanī i ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, i whakamahia e rātau ki te whakaako i a rātau tūtei i roto i te reo me ngā tikanga Hapanihi. I waenganui i ētahi atu kākātanga i mōhiotia ko tētahi kaiwhakaari rongonui o Kōria ki te Tonga me tana tāne, he kaiwhakahaere pikitia, i mauria i nga tau kotahi rau e whitu tekau mā rua. I whakahaua rātau ki te hanga pikitia mo te kāwanatanga, engari i muri iho ka taea e rātau te mawhiti. Ko te mahi tōpana Ko te nuinga o ngā Kōria ki te Raki e mahi ana i ngā mahi kāore i te utua i tētahi wā i roto i o rātau oranga, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo HRW. I kī atu ngā tauira o mua i Kōrea ki te Raki ki a HRW e rua ngā wā i te tau - i te wā parau me te kotinga - mō te kotahi marama i te wā kotahi. Ka tukuna hoki e Kōria ki te Raki ngā rau mano tāngata ki te mahi ki rāwāhi hei mahi utu iti - ā, ko te nuinga o rātau e mahi ana i raro i ngā here pēnei i te kahunga. Kua tukuna e ia ngā kaimahi ki ngā wāhi pēnei i Haina, Kūweiti, Qatar - ahakoa kua mutu te whakahōu visa mahi a te nuinga o ngā whenua ki ngā Kōria ki te Raki kia ū ki ngā mana o te UN. Heoi anō, kua puta mai ngā pūrongo kei te mahi tonu ngā Koreana ki te Raki i ētahi wāhi ahakoa ngā whakaaetanga. "He tokomaha nga kaimahi o rāwāhi e noho ana i roto i tētahi whare moenga e aroturukitia ana kāore he wāteatanga o te nekeneke, e noho herehere ana rātau," te kī a Tēnā Arama. Ko te nuinga o te ōrautanga o nga utu a nga kaimahi e hopukina ana e te kāwanatanga - he pūtake moni nui mo te whenua. He tino tīariari te whakahāweatanga o ngā mana wahine ki ngā wāhine, engari "kāore he huarahi hei ine i te ōritetanga i te Raki pēnei i tō ine i te āputa utu i waenganui i ngā tāne me ngā wāhine", e kī ana a Tēnā Fang. Ahakoa e whakaatu ana a Kōria ki te Raki i a ia anō he iwi ōrite, e kīia ana kua tangohia ngā wāhine i te mātauranga me ngā wāhi mahi. "He tino mōrearea ngā wāhine - kei te tīariari te tukino, engari ki te tūkinotia rātau e tētahi tangata, kāore he tangata hei amuamu ki a rātou," te kī a Tēnā Arama. Kai te pākaha hoki ngā pūrongo o nga wāhine e anga ana ki te whakamamaetanga, te whakakōhuru me ētahi atu tūkinotanga ā-waha i a rātau e puritia ana i roto i ngā whare tautāwhi - me te tūkino whānui i roto i te hōia. E whiwhi ana ngā tamariki me ngā tamariki kai kai i Kōrea ki te Raki i te mātauranga, ahakoa me whakataka wawe ētahi i te kura hei āwhina i o rātau whānau kia ora ā-wā, e ai ki a Tēnā Fang. Ko te marautanga o te kura e "whakanuia ana e te rārangi take tōrangapū o te whenua, e whakawhāiti ana i to rātau mōhiotanga mai i te pakeketanga rawa". E ai ki a Hēpa, e 200,000 ngā tamariki Kōria ki te Raki e mate ana i te mate kai tāhapa - e 60,000 tērā pea ka "tino pāngia". Ka whakakāhore auau a Kōria ki te Raki i te whakahē i ōna pūkete motika - kua kī ōna iwi "e whakakake ana ki te pūnaha motika tangata tino painga o te ao" - me te tohu i te matimati ki ngā hē o ētahi atu whenua. Engari e kī ana a Tēnā Arama o HRW ko te kaupapa motika tangata i Kōrea ki te Raki he "poka tōraro". "Kei te titiro te katoa ki ā rātou ake painga. Kaore he tangata e tirotiro ana i nga painga o nga tangata whenua o Kōrea ki te Raki".

title: Gabon timber scandal: How 300 containers of kevazingo went missing
summary: Kua panaia e te Perehitini o Gabon a Ali Bongo tana tuakana perehitini me tana minita ngahere i waenganui i tētahi heitara maunu rākau.
text: Nā Louise DewastBBC Africa Kāore he take i hoatu mō ngā peke, engari i muri i te 300 ipu rākau kevazingo - he mana kore mana ki te kaweake - i kitea i tētahi tauranga. Tērā te tono mo te rākau i Āhia e whakamahia ana hei hanga taonga. Tata ki te rua tuatoru o Gabon e kapi ana i te ngahere, ā, he mea hira te mahi rākau mo te whakahaerenga o te whenua. He aha te mea motuhake o te rākau? Ko Kevazingo, e mōhiotia ana ko te bubinga, ko te guibourtia rānei, he momo rākau whero e kitea ana i Awherika ki te Hauauru. Neke atu i te 500 tau te pakeke o ētahi rākau i Gabon, ā, ka taea te whakaaro he tapu e te iwi o te rohe. Engari he tino uara te rākau mai i te kevazingo i ētahi wāhi o Āhia, e whakamahia ana hei hanga taonga tiketike me ngā taonga puoro. I whakakorea e te kāwanatanga te kaweake o te kevazingo i te tau 2018 ki te pare i ngā rauemi o te whenua. E hia te nui o ngā rākau i ngaro? I tērā marama, neke atu i te 350 ngā ipu rākau utu nui i kitea i te tauranga o Owendo, i waho o te pūmatua, o Libreville, kua rite ki te kaweake. I kitea rātau i roto i ngā kōpae a ngā kamupene Hainamana, i tapaina hētia, e kiia ana ki te tapanga o te mahi ngahere. Kātahi ka ngaro puku atu ngā ipu. Tata ki te 200 o rātau kua whakaorangia mai i taua wā. Kāore i te mārama te nui o te wāriu o te rākau ngaro. E kī ana te pokapū rongokōrero o Kōrero Kōrero he uara tiriti tōna e $250m (£200m) engari i kī te rōia e whakahaere ana i te kēhi, a Olivier Nzaou, kāore i taea e ia te kōrero nā te mea he tūhuratanga haere tonu. He aha te tikanga o tenei mo Gabon? Kua kī taurangi nga mana kia whai i te hunga e haepapa ana i roto i tētahi tūhuratanga e mōhiotia ana ko "kevazingogate". E whakapono ana te panatanga o te Tuakana Perehitini o Pierre Claver Maganga Moussavou me te Minita Ngahere o Guy Bertrand Mapangou e honoa ana ki tēnei tūhuratanga, ahakoa kāore he take whai mana mō ā rātou pananga, ngā taipitopito rānei mō tō rātou whakaurutanga. E 13 ētahi atu mana i whakatārewatia i tērā wiki, ā, i whakaingoatia he kaipāngai Hainamana hei whakahaere i muri i te mahi ture. I ngā rā tata nei, he karanga kia whakarerea e Tēnā Mapangou. Ko tētahi tuhinga e āhua nei e mau ana i tana waitohu - e whakamana ana i tētahi kamupene Hainamana ki te kaweake i ngā ipu - i te huri tuihono. I kī a ia he tuhinga kōrero tērā, ā, kua whakakāhore i tētahi whakauru ki te heitara. E huatau ana ētahi kaimātakitaki i Gabon ko te take tūturu o te pananga a Tēnā Maganga Moussavou tērā pea ko tōna hiahia. I te whakaoranga o Perehitini Ali Bongo i te whiu i tērā tau, e kiia ana kua whakapuakina e Tēnā Maganga Moussavou te hiahia kia nui ake ngā kawenga. Kaore anō a ia kia kōrero mo te heitara rākau. Kua tohu a Perehitini Bongo, ināianei ki te tūru o mua, e hiahia ana ia ki te tū kaha me te whai i tēnei tūhuratanga.

title: Ka ngaro te raihana o te karapu o Coventry i muri i te whakaoho kino
summary: Kua tangohia tōna raihana i tētahi karapu i tino okaina ai te mokopuna a te kaiwaiata Motuhake, o Neville Staple.
text: I tāpaetia e ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands tētahi tono kia whakakore i te raihana o Karapu M i Coventry i muri i te matenga o Te Hauauru, e 21, i te 1 o Mahuru. E toru ngā okanga i pūrongotia i roto i te tata ki te karapu i roto i ngā marama e ono kua taha, ka kī pirihimana. Kua puta mai tētahi tangata ki te kōti e pā ana ki te matenga. I roto i tētahi pūrongo ki te komiti raihana o te Kaunihera o Coventry City, ka kī te āpiha Pirihimana o West Midlands, a Karen Healy, he "āwangawanga nui" tōna mō ētahi atu tutu mēnā ka tuwhera tonu te hōpu. I tētahi hui i te Paraire, i whakakorea te raihana o Karapu M, engari i whakaaetia he huringa whakamahinga mō ngā kāinga. I kī a Sarah Clover, rōia mō Westbourne Leisure, ko te mahere hou "taketake" mō te pae he korowha pōrangi i roto. I whakaae te komiti ki te huri i te raihana hei whakanoho i te korowha pōrangi. I kī ngā rongo hou me ngā whakahōutanga mai i te Kaikaunihera o West Midlands, a Pat Hetherton, he māharahara tōna mēnā ka āraia te matenga o Tēnā Glasgow i tētahi whakarongo raihana tōmua. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore anō mātou kia whai wāhi ki te kōrero i ngā take maha e tino māharahara ana, arā, i te aroaro o ngā tuhinga, ka waiho he pātai e tautau ana mēnā ka taea te ārai i te matenga o tēnei taitama i tētahi arotakenga tōmua o te raihana. " Tērā tētahi taitamariki kātoretore e noho ana i ngā tāngata i Coventry, ā, e mōhio ana te komiti iti ki tā rātou kawenga kia noho haumaru rātou i ngā wā katoa mā te kāwanatanga raihana." I whakapuakina hoki e ia te "aroha hōhonu me te aroha" ki te whānau me ngā hoa o Tēnā Glasgow.

title: Ka whakatū te kaiwhakarite US i te hokonga maimai-mamati Munchee
summary: Kua whakatūria e te US Securities and Exchange Commission tētahi hokonga maimai mamati miriona tāra e te umanga taupānga arotake wharekai o California, Munchee.
text: I whakatūpato hoki te kaiwhakahaere o Amerika i ngā kiritaki o ngā mōrearea o te haumi i roto i ngā moni crypto i tukuna e ngā kamupene. SEC chairman Jay Clayton said there were substantial more opportunities for fraud from initial coin offerings. Ko te mea hou rawa i roto i te aho whakatūpato mai i ngā kaiwhakarite o te ao. Mā ngā whakahere moni tuatahi (ICOs) e āhei ai ngā whakaoho ki te whakapiki tere i te pūtea mā te tuku i ngā maimai mariko ki ngā kaiwhakangao, i te nuinga o te wā hei whakawhiti mō ngā moni crypto tūturu pēnei i te Bitcoin, Ethereum rānei. Ko te tikanga ka whakamahia e ēnei maimai te blockchain, e whakamahi ana i te tuhimuna hei hopu i ngā tauwhitinga ka taea te whakamotuhēhē. I whakaarahia e te umanga manatoko tuakiri US Civic te $33m (£26m) i tēnei tau, i te wā i whakaarahia e ngā kamupene hangarau blockchain Bancor me Tezos neke atu i te $350m. Kua heke te uara o ngā maimai Bancor i te haurua mai i Pipiri, e ai ki te paetukutuku a te umanga. I kī te SEC kua tukuna e Munchee tētahi haumarutanga kāore i rēhitatia hei hoko. "Ka āta tirotiro tonu mātou i te mākete mō ngā whakahere hē e rapu ana ki te hoko i ngā haumarutanga ki te iwi whānui me te kore rēhitatanga, waihotanga rānei e hiahiatia ana," te kī a Stephanie Avakian, te kaiwhakahaere tahi o te wehenga whakaū o te SEC. I rapu a Munchee ki te kohi i te $15m hei waihanga i tētahi "pūnaha rauropi" e taea ai e Munchee me ētahi atu te hoko me te hoko taonga me ngā ratonga mā te whakamahi i ngā maimai. Engari i kī te umanga ka taea e ngā kaiwhakangao te whakahoki mai i tā rātou pūtea penapena, e noho ai ngā maimai hei haumarutanga e hiahia ana ki te rēhitatanga SEC. I whakatūria e te SEC te hokonga o ngā maimai i te 1 o Whiringa Whiringa, i te rā i muri i to rātau hoko, ka kī te kaiwhakarite i roto i te raupapa whakamutu me te whakamutu. I whakatūpato te manukura SEC o Piki Clayton ki ngā kiritaki "he iti iho te parenga kaiwhakangao i roto i ā mātou mākete pūtea tūturu, me ngā wāhi nui ake mō te tinihanga me te māminga" me ngā whakahere moni tuatahi. I pāorotia e tana kōrero tētahi whakatūpato SEC tōmua i a Hōngongoi. Kei te nui haere te māharahara o ngā kaiwhakarite huri noa i te ao ki te manakohanga o ngā ICO. I te UK, i kī te Mana Whanonga Pūtea i te marama o Mahuru ka ngaro pea i ngā kaiwhakangao tō rātou tūnga katoa i roto i ngā pūtea penapena maimai mamati mōrearea. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka whakakorea e Haina ngā whakahere moni tuatahi, e karanga ana i a rātou ko "kohi moni kore mana". Kua whakamāramatia hoki e ngā kaiwhakarite i Hōroa, i Hong Kong, i Kānata ētahi o ngā mōrearea.

title: Wildwood Discovery Park tāhae pūtea tāhaetanga: E rua i puritia
summary: Tokorua nga tāngata i hopukina i muri i te tāhaetanga o tētahi toa i tētahi pāka kararehe, ā, ka tāhaetia he moni mo tētahi kaupapa atawhai.
text: E hia rau pauna i roto i ngā koha aroha i tangohia mai i te Wildwood Discovery Park, tata ki Canterbury i Keni, i te pō i waenganui i te Rātapu me te Mane. Ko te moni mo te hōtaka tāuri dormice o te pāka, ā, neke atu i te 170 ngā kararehe mō tētahi kaupapa whakataki anō ā-motu. E whakapono ana nga pirihimana i whakaekea hoki e nga tāhae e iwa atu kāinga i taua rohe. Ko te nuinga o ngā tāhaetanga, i ūkuia ai ngā pae wīra, ngā karapu me ngā umanga, i pā mai i ngā haora tōmua o te hararei pēke o te Mane. I kī ngā kaimahi i Wildwood kua mahue i a rātau te ngākau pouri i te tāhaetanga. I kī te āpiha pīra a Sarah Anstee: "Ko tēnei mahi whakarihariha o te tāhae moni i homai mō ā mātou mahi atawhai nui i tino hoatu e ā mātou kaitautoko." I tāpiri mai a Pita Smith, te kaiwhakarewa o te Wildwood Trust: "Ka haere hāngai taua moni ki te utu i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e mātou hei tuku i te dormice. " Ka ngaro rātau, ā, ko a mātau mahi tētahi o ngā mea torutoru e mahia ana." Kei te whakamahia e ngā Pirihimana o Keni ngā tāhae i Manston, Broadstairs, Ramsgate, Birchington, Westgate-on-Sea, Sholden, Whitstable, me Canterbury hei hononga, ā, kua tono kia tirohia e ngā tangata whenua ā rātou pūnaha C KKK ki te hopukina e rātou tētahi mea e āwhina ana i te tūhuratanga. I kī a Sgt Steve Moat: "He tino rerekē te maha o ngā tāhaetanga i te pō kotahi... ā, e mōhio tūturu ana mātou ka mōhio tētahi ko wai te kawenga mo ēnei hara." Tokorua nga tāngata 26 tau o Ramsgate e pātaitia ana mo te whakapae i te tāhaetanga.

title: Ka rere atu te tāhae o Keith Cockerton i te whare herehere o Kent
summary: Kua ngaro tētahi tāhae hara i muri i te korenga e hoki ki te whare herehere o Keni.
text: I kī ngā Pirihimana o Keni i rahua a Keith Cockerton, e 28, ki te hoki ki te Whare o Blantyre, tata ki Goudhurst, i te 20:00 BST i te Hātarei i muri i te tukunga hapori. Kua whakatūpatotia te iwi kia kaua e whakatata atu ki a Cockerton i hoatu ki tētahi whiu tūturu i te tau 2006. He mā a ia, e 5ft 10in me ngā makawe kākano heu, ā, e mau ana i tētahi hāte pōro māwhero me te tarau poto kikorangi. Ko te tangata e kite ana i a ia e tohutohutia ana kia whakapā atu ki nga pirihimana. Ko te Whare o Blantyre he whare herehere mo nga herehere tāne mo te wā roa i hangaia hei whakarite i a rātau mo te tuku.

title: E tiaki ana nga pirihimana o Ahitereiria i te mahinga o Pākihi Iwa
summary: Kua tautāwhi nga Pirihimana o Ahitereiria (ĀPĀ) i ta rātau mahi i roto i nga hopunga o te rōpū rongoā o Ahitereiria o Bali Nine.
text: Ko ngā mōhiohio i tiria e te WHK ki ngā pirihimana o Initonīhia i te tau 2005 i ahu mai ki te hopunga me te whakaponotanga o te rōpū me te kawenga o ngā kaiārahi e rua. Kua whakahētia nga pirihimana mo te pūrongo i nga tāngata ahakoa e mōhio ana rātau ka anga atu rātau ki te whiu mate. Engari i kī ngā āpiha matua kāore i taea e rātau te hopu i te rōpū i mua i to rātau wehenga atu i Ahitereiria ki Initonīhia. I patua a Andrew Chan rāua ko Myuran Sukumaran e tētahi rōpū whakaeke o Initonīhia i te Wenerei ahakoa te pēhanga whakawhanaunga o Ahitereiria. Ākuanei ka karangatia te WHK ki mua i tētahi komiti paremata ki te whakamārama i te whakataunga. I kī atu te Komihana 'ātaahua me te whakahāwea' ki tētahi hui pāpāho i te Mane: "Mēnā i rawaka ngā mōhiohio hei hopu i te Iwa o Pākihi i mua i to rātau wehenga atu i Ahitereiria, kua mahia e mātau tēnā." I kī a ia kāore te WHK i mōhio e hia ngā mema i roto i te rōpū, he aha rānei ngā rongoā e mahi ana rātau, koia rātau i whakapā atu ai ki o rātau hoa o Initonīhia. I kī a ia i ngā pūrongo pāpāho i kitea e te WHK te rōpū mai i tētahi aki mai i te pāpā o tētahi o te rōpū, i hē nā te mea kua mōhio kē te WHW ki te tākai. I kī hoki a ia e pūrongo ana kua "hoko" e te WHK te rōpū ki Initonīhia i roto i tētahi tono kia manakohia e ngā pirihimana, he "ātaahua, he whakahāwea". Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia ki tētahi o ngā āpiha whakatūpato kia tangohia mai i te tīma nā te mea i riri a ia ki te mōrea ka anga atu ngā mema rōpū ki te whiu mate. I kī hoki te Komihana Colvin kāore i taea e ia te whakaū e kore ētahi atu Ahitereiria e mau i ngā rongoā maunu i ngā whenua e whiu ana i te whiu mate. I kī a ia i whakaarohia e nga pirihimana te mōrea o te tuku mōhiohio, engari i kī ngā tohutohu pirihimana me mahi anō rātau me ngā pirihimana kē. I kī te kēhi o te Kawanatanga Tuarua o Te Komihana o Te Iwa o Pāremata, a Mikaera Phelan, nāna i whakatau kia tiritiri mōhiohio ki Initonīhia, i taua wā, mai i taua wā, mai i taua wā. I kī a ia i tana whakataunga, ko te pare i ngā Ahitereiria i ngā rongoā i mua i tōna hinengaro, ehara i te pātahitanga o Ahitereiria ki Initonīhia. "Mēnā e whakaaro ana tētahi kāore anō ahau kia mamae i tēnei mō ngā tau e 10 kua hipa atu, kāore rātau i te mōhio ki a au," tana kī. I kī te Komihana Colvin he tino nui te mahi ngātahi a Ahitereiria me ngā kaupapa whakahau ture o rāwāhi ki te rutu i te hara ā-motu. "He tino uaua, engari he maha tonu ēnei whenua e whiu mate ana mo ēnei hara," tana kī. Tata ki te 72,000 ngā tono i te tau mā Interpol ki te tiritiri mōhiohio mō ngā mahi hara e whakapaetia ana. I roto i ngā tau e toru kua taha, tata ki te 250 ngā tono pērā mai i ngā whenua e whiu ana i te mate. O taua tau, e 15 ngā tono mai i ngā whenua maha tae atu ki Haina i ākiritia. I te tau 2009, i whakakahatia ngā tohutohu tautuhi manakē mō te mahi a te WHK ki ngā pirihimana kē i te tau 2009, ā, kei roto hoki te paunatanga o te uara o taua tauwhitinga me te mōrea ka anga atu ngā pōhēhētanga ki te whiu mate.

title: Ka mate te taitama Ihipiana i muri i te 'patu nui' i te kura o Kairo
summary: Kua mate tētahi tama kura o Kairo i muri i te tino patua e tana kaiako, kua kī te minita mātauranga o Ihipa.
text: I mate te tau 12 tau i te Rātapu "i muri i te patua e te kaiako i te rā tōmua", ka kī tētahi kōrero minita. E kī ana kua whakarewaina he "uiui whawhai" ki nga āhuatanga o te matenga o te tama, ā, kua whakatārewatia te kaiako e te kura. I kī ngā pūrongo paetata, nāna te taitama i tapaina ko Islam Ngaha, i patua ia mo te kore mahi i ana mahi kāinga. I whara tōna māhunga, a, i pāngia e ia he toto roro, ka kī atu te rangatira o te tari ā-ture, a Hishama Wānanga ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. Ka kī te kaiako "kaore a ia i whai whakaaro ki te whakamate i a ia, engari he wāhanga o te whakatinanatanga te patupatu", i pūrongotia e te nūpepa whakahaere kāwanatanga a Al-Ahram Al-Masa'i. I tērā tau, ka kī te Kaunihera ā-Motu o Ihipa mō te Tamarikitanga me te Whaea kua piki ake ngā whakaekenga ki ngā tamariki i waenganui i Hānuere me Whiringahora i whakaritea ki te wawaenga i roto i ngā tau e toru kua hipa. E kī ana e 50% o ngā take tukino ki ngā tamariki i rēhitatia ki ngā kura. I te wā o Mahuru, ka whiua te kaiwhakahaere o tētahi whare pani o Kairo kia toru tau i roto i te whare herehere mo te whakaeke i ngā tamariki.

title: E kī ana te PM o Pakitāne e ohorere ana a ia i te patunga kohukohu
summary: Kua kī te Pirimia o Pakitāne, o Nawaz, e "ohorere ana, e pouri ana" a ia i te patunga o tētahi tauira whare wānanga i whakapaea ki te kohukohu ki a Islam.
text: E kī ana a ia e kore te kāwanatanga e "whakaae" kia mau ngā tangata whenua i te ture "ki o rātau ake ringa". I patua kinotia te tauira pukapuka pukapuka e ngā hoa tauira i te kāinga. E waru ināianei kua whakataua ki te kōhuru me te pūtōraru, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere. He take tino tairongo, he take whakakakā te kohukohu i Pakitāne. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā i ngā ture kohukohu, e whakaae ana i te whiu mate i ētahi take, i te nuinga o te wā ka whakamahia ki te tukino i te hunga iti. Kua tāutua te tauira i patua ko Mashal Kani, i whakapaea ki te whakairi i ngā karere kohukohu i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. Ko te pūrongo pāpāho paetata i tangohia a ia, a, i patua i roto i te whare noho i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Aotearoa i te taone ki te raki o Mardan. I whakaaturia e te ataata whakairoiro i whakairihia tuihonotia he tini tāngata i waho o te whare e whana ana, e maka ana i ngā ahanoa, tae atu ki ngā papa, ki tētahi tinana hāwhe tahanga e whāwhā ana i runga i te whenua. I whakataua e Tēnā Ngaha, nāna i tautoko tētahi whakahāwea whānui i runga i ngā ihirangi kohukohu i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, i te whakaekenga, i roto i tana kōrero tuatahi i te patunga o te Tāite. "Ko te tikanga kia tū tahi te iwi ki te whakahē i tēnei hara, ki te whakatoko i te manawanui me te ture ture i roto i te iwi," tana kī. "Kia mōhiotia e nga whakapae o tēnei mahi, e kore te kāwanatanga e whakaae ki ngā tangata e mau ana i te ture ki o rātau ringa ake." Kua whakakāhore nga pirihimana i ngā whakaaro kāore ngā āpiha i mahi hei whakaora i te ora o Tēnā Kani, e kī ana kua mate kē te tauira i to rātau taenga atu ki te tirohanga. Kua hopukina e rātau e 12 ngā tāngata mo taua mahi, ā, kei te kimi i ētahi atu pōhēhētanga. I te Hātarei e whakahē ana ngā kaiwhaiwhai motika tangata i ngā tāone maha o Hōia i te Hātarei e whakahē ana i te kōhuru, ā, ka tohe te UN i Pakitāne ki ngā mana "kia mahi mārō me te kawe mai i ngā whakapae ki te tika tere". Ka kī atu ngā kaiwhakaatu ki te pāpāho e kino ana a Tēnā Kani ki ētahi atu tauira mō ōna whakaaro ohaoha, ā, i roto i tētahi taupatupatu wera i te wā o te karaehe i te rā i patua ai ia. Kaore te imam i te wharenui o te rohe i whakaae ki te ārahi i te inoi i te nehunga o Tāne Kani i te Paraire. Engari i kī te pāpā o te tauira he koretake nga whakapae kohukohu. "I te tuatahi ka patua e rātau taku tama, ā, ināianei kei te tāpiri tote rātau ki o mātau motu," te kī a Hānara Shaer ki te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero. Neke atu i te 65 ngā tāngata kua patua i Pakitāne i muri i te whakapaetanga ki te kohukohu mai i te tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, ka kī tētahi pūrongo kura whakaaro o nā noa nei.

title: Obituary: Doris Lessing
