summary: He titiro ki te oranga o Doris Lessing, te kaituhituhi tautohetohe i ahu mai i te tika pāpori ki te mana wahine me te pakiwaitara pūtaiao, kua mate i te 94 o ona tau.
text: I puta mai i a Doris Lessing te riri o te tokomaha o ngā Kaiāwhina mā te huatau ehara i te tino wehi ngā whakaekenga 9/11 ina whakaritea ki te whakahau IRA i te UK. Ko nga kōrero he mea noa iho ki tētahi kaituhi e kore rawa e whai ki te karo i te tautohetohe i roto i ana kōrero tūmatanui me ana tuhituhi. I whānau a Doris May Tayler i Kermanshah, i te wāhi ki te uru o Irana ināianei, i reira tōna pāpā o Ingarangi he karaka ki te Pēke Emepaea o Pahia. I te tau 1925 ka neke te whānau ki Rhodesia ki te Tonga, ināianei ko Zimbabwe, ki te whakahaere i tētahi pāmu kānga, ahakoa kāore i angitu te mahi. I whakanuia tōna tamarikitanga e tōna whaea whakahīhī, nāna i whakatau kia ū tana tamāhine ki tētahi ture pākaha. Ko te mawhititanga anake o Lessing i tāna i whakaahua ai he oranga pouri i roto i te ngahere o Awherika, i hōparatia e ia me tōna tuakana ko Harry. Mārena I kōrero a ia i muri iho ko te āhua nei ko ngā tamarikitanga pouri e whakaputa ana i ngā kaituhi pakiwaitara. "Koia anō, kāore au i te whakaaro hei kaituhi i taua wā," tana kī. "I te whakaaro noa ahau me pēhea te mawhiti, i ngā wā katoa." I tonoa ia e ōna mātua ki tētahi kura kōtiro katoa i te pūmatua, i Salisbury. Engari i taka a Lessing i te 13 o ona tau, ka whakamutua tana mātauranga tika. Heoi anō, i whāngaia e ia tōna whakaaro ki ngā mōkihi pukapuka i tonoa mai i Ingarangi, ka kite i a Dickens rāua ko Kipling i te wā o tōna oranga, me te waihanga pūrākau moe mō tōna tuakana. I whakaawetia hoki ia e ngā pūmahara kawa o tōna pāpā ki tana mahi i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, nāna ia i hauā. "I hangaia tātau katoa e te pakanga," ka tuhituhi a ia, "kua hurihuri, kua hurihia e te pakanga, engari te āhua nei kua wareware ki a tātau." I te 15 o ona tau, ka wehe atu a Lessing i te kāinga, a, ka mahi hei nēhi, i reira ka hoatu e tana kaitukumahi he pukapuka mō ngā tōrangapū me te mātauranga pāpori hei pānui. I te tau 1937 ka neke ia ki Salisbury, i reira ka tūtaki ia, ka moe i a Frank Wisdom. Tokorua ā rāua tamariki, engari i rahua te mārena, a, ka mahue i a ia te kāinga o te whānau. Ko te pakiwaitara pūtaiao e noho ana i Salisbury, ka uru ia ki tētahi karapu pukapuka ā Ihupuku, ko tētahi o ōna mema matua ko Gottfried Lessing. I muri iho ka mārena te tokorua - ahakoa, kotahi anō, he poto noa iho te uniana. Ka matekiri a Lessing ki te Tōpūtanga me Āwherika, ā, ka neke ki Rānana i reira i whakaputaina ai tana pukapuka tuatahi, The Grass is Singing, i te tau 1949. Ko te pūrākau o te wahine a tētahi kaiahuwhenua mā me tana take ki tētahi pononga o Awherika ka noho hei kaihoko tino pai i tēnei wā, ā, ka whati i te whenua hou i roto i tōna whakaahuatanga o tētahi whanaungatanga ā-iwi. Ko te pukapuka nui a Lessing, ā, ko tana tino tautohetohe pea, ko te Pukatuhipoka Koura, i whakaputaina i te tau 1962. He pūrākau apa-maha mō ngā wāhi rerekē o te tuakiri o tētahi wahine, ōna hiahia me ōna mauahara, koia te mahi tino matatini, roa rawa hoki, i whakaputaina e ia. Na te pukapuka i whakarite a Lessing hei ata o te nekeneke mana wahine e tipu tere ana. Ahakoa rā, i te nuinga o te wā, kāore i taea e ia te ātete ki te whakawai i te tuahine. "Ko tā rātou e tino hiahia ana kia kī atu ahau, 'Ha, e ngā tuahine, e tū tahi ana ahau me koutou i roto i tō whawhai ki te haeata koura e kore ai aua tāngata kararehe katoa.' "E tino hiahia ana rātau kia whakamāramatia e te tangata ngā kōrero māmā mō ngā tāne me ngā wāhine?" I te mutunga o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, ka whakarērea e Lessing ngā kaupapa pāpori mō te pakiwaitara pūtaiao me tana rangatū Canopus in Argus, e whakaahuatia ana e ia hei mahi tino pai māna. I roto i a ia i whakahuahua ai i tētahi kitenga hākinakina o te wā heke mai me te whakatoi me ngā pākihi māori hei tikanga. I kī te kaiwhakawāwā, a Paul Schlueter, ko te "tino nui o Lessing ki te whakaahua i te whakapeka me te matenga whakamutunga o te Ao, he tino hōhonu". I hangaia hoki e ia he pukapuka whakamīharo, pēnei i te rangatū o ngā Tamariki o te Tukino me te Briefing for a Descent into Hell (1971), he whakamātautau whakamataku, rangirua hoki o te mate hinengaro. Nō nā tata nei, i hangaia e Lessing ngā pukapuka pēnei i te The Good Terrorist (1985), he kōrero mō ngā tōrangapū mārena, me te Tamaiti Tuarima (1988), mō te tūkinotanga i pā ki tētahi whānau e tētahi tamaiti ārai pāpori, taikaha hoki. I kī a Lessing i whakaawetia te pukapuka e tōna ake wheako i te whānautanga i te 19 o ona tau, ā, ko te wahine i te moenga o muri, he whaea kē o ngā kōtiro tokorua, e whakakāhore ana i te tama kātahi anō ka whānau mai i a ia. I Whiringahora 2007 ka noho ko ia te toa tawhito rawa, a, ko te wahine tua11 anake i roto i te 106 tau, i toa i te Whakawhiwhinga Pukapuka Pukapuka. "Tērā tētahi mea whakarihariha i roto i a au nā te mea he rite tonu taku whakawhitiwhiti i te tangata," tana kī i tētahi wā. Heoi anō, he mea nui ki a ia kia kaua e māharahara ki ngā whakaaro o ētahi atu. "Kei te wātea mātou... Ka taea e au te kōrero i taku whakaaro. He waimarie mātou, he manaaki, nā reira he aha e kore ai e whakamahia?"

title: Kōtaha: Joko Widodo
summary: I pōtitia a Joko Widodo hei perehitini o Initonīhia i a Hōngongoi 2014, i roto i tētahi toa i tohu i tētahi huringa moana i roto i ngā tōrangapū o te whenua.
text: I haere mai a ia i tētahi papamuri māhaki, e tū ana a ia i runga i te taumira koi ki nga kaiārahi o mua o te whenua, i karanga mai i te rangatiratanga tōrangapū me te hōia. I te tau 2014 ka tū a Tēnā Widodo - e mōhiotia nuitia ana ko Jokowi - i runga i tētahi pūhara ārai hāmate "tangata o te iwi", e kī ana ki te rutu i te rawakore me te tāpae i te nepotism me te inoi. I toa tūturu a ia. Engari kāore anō kia mutu te rēhi. Ka tū anō a Tēnā Widodo mo te pōti i tēnei tau ki tōna tauwhāinga roa, a Prabowo Subianto. E rima tau i muri mai i te whakahau whakamutunga, kua ngaro ētahi o tōna kanapa. Whakatika ki runga I whānau mai i te tau 1961 i Solo, he taone i waenganui o Java, ko Tēnā Widodo te tama a te kaihoko rākau. I tīmataria e te kaihanga taonga tana mahi tōrangapū ki te Rōpū Manapori o Initonīhia (PDIP) i te wā i pōtitia ai ia ko te rangatira o Solo i te tau 2005. Kātahi ka oma a Tēnā Widodo hei kāwana o Jakarta, a, i whiwhi i tētahi wikitōria nui i te tau 2012. I kitea a ia e aroha ana ki te rawakore, ā, ka tipu ake te manakohanga mā ngā mehua pēnei i te whakanuku i ngā kainoho pārekareka me te whakarewa i ngā umanga iti. I te tuatahi ka whakahauhau a ia mo te perehitini i runga i tētahi pūhara o te tāpae i te hāmate, te nepotism me te inoi - ā, ka pana ki te pūtea penapena i roto i te mātauranga, te mātauranga me te nui ake o te whakamahinga o te hangarau i roto i te whakahaere. I te whakatūnga o Tēnā Widodo i Whiringahora 2014, ka karangatia e ia he wairua kotahitanga me te mahi uaua, a, ka kī taurangi ki te whakaora i te whakapehapeha ā iwi, me te hanga i tētahi aroaro moana kaha ake. He āhua wiriwiri te tīmatanga o te whakahaere a Tēnā Widodo. Ka whakatūpato nga kaiwhakawāwā kāore a ia i te wheako i roto i ngā tōrangapū ā iwi me ngā pānga ao whānui. Ka rere tana kāwanatanga ki ētahi kaupapahere, pēnei i te whakakore i te hoko waipiro i roto i ngā toa iti me te whakahau i te pūkenga o Initonīhia i waenganui i ngā kaimahi kē, kia hoki whakamuri ki a rātou ā muri ake nei nā tō rātou manakohanga, kāore rānei i te mōhiotia. I puta mai te tautohetohe tuatahi o te ao whānui a Tēnā Widodo i Aperira 2015 i tana tūtakitanga ki te pēhanga o te ao whānui ki te muru i ngā mema tokorua o Ahitereiria o te mowhiti maunu rongoā o Pākihi Iwa, i anga atu ki ngā rerenga mate. I whakakāhore a ia, e kī ana e hiahiatia ana he āhuatanga mārō ki ngā rongoā hei pare i Initonīhia. I ngā tau tata nei, kua pana a Tēnā Widodo ki te whakaneke i ngā hanganga o Initonīhia - te hanga huarahi, ngā matatara me ngā rerewhenua. Engari kia taea ai te mahi, kua pōhiritia e ia te pūtea penapena Hainamana, ā, kua whakaae ki ngā moni me ngā mahi ngātahi ki ngā kamupene kē. Kua whakapaea ia e tōna tauwhāinga, a Tēnā Prabowo, ki te hoko atu i te whenua ki ngā manene, ā, e kī ana ngā kaipānui ātete kei te anga atu a Initonīhia ki te tomokanga mai o nga kaimahi Hainamana. Ko te tikanga o tētahi hītori roa, ā, i ētahi wā, he take tautohetohe ēnei, i te tau pōti. I ngā tau tata nei kua kite a Initonīhia i ngā rōpū whakapono tūturu e nui haere ana te kōrero. I whakapaea te kāwana o Jakarta o Mua me te urunga a Tēnā Widodo, o Basuki Tjahaja Purnama, e mōhiotia nuitia ana ko Ahok, he kohukohu mō ngā kōrero i whakaputaina e ia i te wā o tētahi whaikōrero tōmua i te wā o Mahuru 2016. I muri iho i nga huihuinga maha i nga tiriti, ka hereheretia a ia mo te rua tau - i kitea he tūponotanga mo te manawanui whakapono. Kua whakaaturia e Tēnā Widodo e mārama ana tana mōhio ki tēnei ia e piki haere ana, ā, kua kaha tana mahi ki te whakaatu i ōna taipitopito tuakiri Ingarihi. Ahakoa kua whakaaturia a ia he ngāwari whakapono, he tokomaha i mīharo a ia mā te kōwhiri i a Ma'ruf Amin hei hoa whakahaere mōna mo te pōti 2019. He minita kaha a ia i tākaro i tētahi tūranga matua i roto i ngā whakahēnga i ahu mai ki te hinganga o Ahok. Kua kitea te nekehanga he ngana ki te whakararuraru i ētahi atu kaipōti Mohimana tūturu i tōna ara, engari tērā pea kua ngaro i a ia ētahi tautoko i waenganui i ngā kaipōti taitamariki, ohaoha.

title: Ka toa a Jo Shapcott i te whakawhiwhinga Pukapuka Costa o te Tau
summary: Kua toa te kaitito o Jo Shapcott i te whakawhiwhinga Pukapuka Costa o te Tau mō Of Mutability, he kohinga oriori i whakaawetia e tana pakanga ki te mate pukupuku.
text: Ka kī atu te kaituhi ki te AO i ohorere a ia i tana toa, e kī ana "ko te mea whakamutunga tērā e tatari ana ahau". I whakanuia e nga kaiwhakawā te pukapuka whārangi 54 hei "hākari ora", kātahi anō ka "whakaraupapa" rātau i ngā whiti a Shapcott. Ko te tuarua o nga tau i roto i te haupae kua toa te pukapuka whiti i te whakawhiwhinga £30,000. Ko te whakawhiwhinga o tērā tau i riro i te kaitito o Christopher Reid mō tana kohinga A Scattering, he takoha ki tana wahine tōmuri. Ko te toa a Shapcott i puta mai i te utu o te pukapuka whānau makau a Edmund de Waal, The Hare with Amber Eyes. "He tino whakamīharo ērā atu pukapuka i runga i te rārangi poto," te kī a Shapcott. "I toa ngā whiti i tērā tau, nā reira i whakaaro ahau, ehara i te whiti anō." I te whakaae a ia ki te whakawhiwhinga mō ngā whiti katoa, ka tāpiri mai a ia, i a ia e hiahia ana ki te whakahauhau i ētahi atu tāngata kia aro atu ki te tūmomo. "He maha ngā kaipānui i reira e aroha ana pea ki ngā whiti mēnā ka whakamātauria e rātou, engari kāore, nā te mea kāore rātou i te whakaaro mō rātou," tana kī. Ahakoa i whakaawetia e ōna ake wheako, ka tohe a Shapcott ehara tana pukapuka i tōna mate anake. "E pā ana ki tētahi wheako o te mate - he wheako huri ora - ā, mā tēnā e pā ana ia kaipānui ki tērā," tana kī. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te pae whakawā, te kaipānui a Andrew Neil, i toa te pukapuka i te whakawhiwhinga nā te mea he "āhei". "He tino nui tēnei, he whiti tika," tana kī. "Ina tae koe ki ngā ringa o te tangata, ka aroha rātau. " Ka pānui anō rātou, ka pānui ā-waha, kātahi ka tono kia hokona hoki e ō rātou hoa." He maha ngā whakawhiwhinga whiti i toa ai a Rānōna Shapcott mai i te whakaputanga o tana pukapuka tuatahi i te tau 1988, tae atu ki te whakawhiwhinga Commonwealth Poetry me te whakawhiwhinga Whiti Whakamua. Ko ia te Ahorangi o te Tuhituhi Auaha i te Kāreti o Royal Holloway i te Whare Wānanga o Rānana, ā, ko ia te perehitini o nāianei o te Rōpū Whiti. I tīpakohia te whakawhiwhinga Pukapuka Costa o te Tau mai i ngā toa e rima i pānuitia i mua o ia kāwai. Kua whiwhi kē ia toa i roto i te pukapuka, te haurongo, te whiti, te pukapuka tuatahi me ngā kāwai tamariki i te £5,000.

title: I māturu ngā whakaahua tahanga o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa 'i muri i te hack iCloud'
summary: Kua māturu tuihonotia ngā whakaahua tūpāpaku o ngā tāngata rongonui tae atu ki a Wānanga Lawrence i muri i tētahi mātāmua mārama.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Amelia ButterlyNewsbeat i te wā i kī ētahi whetū he kōrero kōrero ngā pikitia, te āhua nei kua whakaūngia e ētahi ko rātou i roto i ngā atahanga. Ko te rārangi o te nuinga o ngā whetū wahine i tohua, he ingoa anō hoki tae atu ki a Rihanna, Keiti Upton, Selena Gomez me Kimi Kardashian. I kī te māngai o Lawrence ka mahi ture tana tīma. "He tūkino tēnei i te tūmataitinga. Kua whakapā atu ki ngā mana, ā, ka whiua e ia te tangata e whakairi ana i ngā whakaahua tāhae o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa," te kī a tana kaikōrero ki a Newsbeat. I whakaae hoki a Mary Elizabeth Winstead, nāna i whetū i roto i ngā pikitia tae atu ki A Good Day to Die Hard, nāna hoki ngā pikitia. "Ki a koutou e titiro ana ki ngā whakaahua i tangohia e au me taku tāne i ngā tau kua taha nei i roto i te tūmataitinga o to mātau kāinga, ko te tūmanako kia tino pai koe ki a koutou anō," tana kihi. "I te mōhiotanga kua mukua aua whakaahua i mua noa atu, ka taea anake e au te whakaaro i te mahi whakamataku i uru ki tēnei. Te whakaaro mō ngā tāngata katoa i kōhuatia." I muri iho ka pānuitia e ia e haere ana a ia ki "tētahi wehenga ipurangi" nā te trolling i whiwhi ai ia. "He rā tino pai mō te pātene paraka," tana tāpiri mai. I kī te whetū o Nickelodeon me te kaiwaiata o Wikitōria Justice ehara i te mea tūturu ngā whakaahua e kī ana ki te whakaatu i a ia e noho tahanga ana. I kī atu tētahi kaikōrero mō te kaiwhakatangitangi o Ariana Grande ki a BuzzFeed ko ngā atahanga i kīia mōna, he "tino kōrero." He whānui te rārangi o ngā tāngata rongonui kua kōhuatia, ā, ko ētahi atu ingoa tae atu ki a Avril Lavigne, Cara Delevingne, Te Wānanga McKaka me Kaley Cuoco. I whakaae hoki te whetū Glee, a Becca Tobin ki tōna whakaurunga ki te rārangi me tētahi tweet whakangahau e kī ana, "Merry XXXmas". Ka puta mai hoki a Hilary Duff, Amber Heard, Hayden Panettiere me Kate Bosworth. He maha ngā whetū i runga i te rārangi kua auau i runga i te Twitter i muri i te tiritiri tuihono o ngā whakaahua. E tatari ana a Newsbeat ki te whakaūnga mai i te pae pāpāho pāpori mēnā kei te whakatārewatia ngā pūkete e tiritiri ana i ngā atahanga. Kāore anō a Āporo kia kōrero mō ngā kerēme nā te tangata nāna i tāhae ngā atahanga i whiwhi mā te kōpeke ki iCloud, te ratonga rokiroki mamao. I whakairihia ngā atahanga ki te pae wānanga 4chan, ā, i whakaurua he atahanga neke atu i te 100 ngā whetū. I muri i te whakairinga i ngā atahanga maha i runga i te ipurangi, ka whakapārewa te kairangitaki rongonui o Perez Hilton. Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter me Radio1Newsbeat i YouTube

title: Tūtaki ki te Miss Ingarangi hou: Te tākuta tamariki e rua ngā waeine
summary: I roto i te roanga o te 24 haora, e rua - tino rerekē - ngā wā whakararuraru io i pā mai ki a Hawai Mukherjee.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Kirsty GrantNewsbeat i te tuatahi, i tatari te tau 23 tau ki te kite mehemea kua toa a ia i te taitara whakaaturanga ātaahua o Miss England. I muri i tana karaunatanga, me neke a ia ki tana mahi hou - hei tākuta tamariki i Boston, Lincolnshire. Ko tana mahi tuatahi tēnei mai i tana whiwhinga me ngā tohu tākuta e rua mai i te Whare Wānanga o Rātata. "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha taku āmaimai," tana kī atu ki a Radio 1 Newsbeat. "Ko taku rā tuatahi i tētahi mahi kua ako ahau i te rima tau, i te kitenga rānei i te hua o Miss Ingarangi? " I taku toa i a Miss Ingarangi i ohorere ahau, a, kaore i whakapono. I tino whakaponokore ahau i muri i te atamira." Kāore a Haina i pīrangi kia īnaki tana mahi hou ki tōna taitara hou hei Miss Ingarangi - engari kua kitea he māminga. "I haere ahau i te rā tuatahi ki te tiki parakuihi i te wharekai, a, ka mōhio te wahine ki a au. I pātai mai a ia me pēhea te whakataetae, ka kī atu ahau ki a ia, a, ka peke ake a ia i runga i te hari." E rua nga tau arokē tēnei mo Haha i a ia e whakawhitiwhiti ana i ana akoranga me tōna hiahia ki nga whakaaturanga. "I muri i aku hua GCSE i whakatau ahau he hōhā rawa ahau. Ko tāku anake i mahi ai ko te akoranga. He tino pai ki a au te akoranga. "I whakaaro ahau e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi i tētahi mea rerekē, ā, i hiahia ahau ki te tāpiri i tētahi mea anō ki tōku oranga." I ngā wā katoa e aroha ana a ia ki ngā toi whakaari, nā reira ka whakatūria e ia he kamupene kanikani. Na aua hoapā, ka whakamōhiotia ia ki te ao tauira. E kī ana a ia, he tokomaha nga tāngata i huatau kia whai wāhi a ia ki ngā whakaaturanga, ā, i te tau 2015, ka whakatata atu ki a ia e te whakataetae Miss India. "I waenganui ahau i taku tau tuatahi o te kura tākuta, nā reira i mataku rawa ahau ki te haere ki Īnia mō te marama kotahi ki te waiho i taku mātauranga - nā reira i whakakāhoretia e au." Kotahi tau i muri mai, ka whakatau a ia kia whai wāhi ki ētahi whakaaturanga ruarua, engari i whakaaro ia he tika, he iti hoki te whakarite. I muri iho i te wehenga, ka whaia a Haina i tōna kōtaha pāpāho pāpori i te tau 2017, ā, ka mōhio ia kia hoki ki te whakataetae. E rua tau i muri mai, kua puta ia i te whare wānanga, a, ka karaunatia ko Miss England. E kī ana a ia ko tana tohutohu mō ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te whai i ngā mahi me ngā ara rerekē ko te tuhi i tētahi rārangi mahi ā-tinana. "Ko te whakaaro tino māhorahora mō ngā tāngata e wareware ana i ngā mea." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: Pirihimana rangatahi: Ko te tūmanako tono a te komihana o Te Raki o Uēra
summary: E kī ana te Komihana Pirihimana me te Komihana Hara o Uēra ki te Raki e tūmanako ana a ia ki te whakahoki i tētahi hinganga whakaharahara i roto i te tokomaha o ngā āpiha rangatahi i roto i te ope.
text: E whakaatu ana ngā whika i te hekenga o ngā āpiha i raro iho i te 26 tau puta noa i Uēra me Ingarangi. E kī ana a Winston Roddick kua pā te hinganga o te ohaoha ki te tono, engari e tūmanako ana ia ko ngā kōrero pūtea e ahu ana ki te pikinga "nui" o ngā āpiha rangatahi. I Uēra me Ingarangi, e 9,088 ngā āpiha i raro iho i te 26 i te 2009-10, engari i whakapeka tērā ki te 4,758 i te 2011-12. I te tau 2012, i te tau 2012, i te tau 2012, i te tau 2012, i te tau 2012, nā te iti ake o ngā herenga pūtea e pōturi ana i te tono. I whiwhi ngā raraunga mō te maha o ngā pirihimana i roto i tētahi tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio e te Ao o Te Ao o Te Reo Irirangi 4 i tēnei mutunga wiki, ā, i whakaaturia te nui o taua hinganga i waenganui i ngā āpiha taitamariki. Puta noa i Ingarangi me Weera, tata tonu ki te 50% te tokomaha o ngā pirihimana taitamariki i roto i te rua tau. Engari i ngā Pirihimana o Te Raki o Wales, me ngā ope i Cleveland me Staffordshire, neke atu i te 70% te hinganga o te tokomaha o ngā āpiha i raro i te 26 i taua wā. "Ko te hinganga o te ohaoha o nāianei kua pā ki te tono pirihimana hou," te kī a Tēnā Roddick. Tahua tuatahi "Heoi anō, i te wā o taku whakahau kia pōtitia hei komihana, i kitea e au te whakanui i te tokomaha o ngā āpiha i runga i nga tiriti hei tētahi o aku manakē e rima. " E whakapono ana ahau mā tēnei e whakaiti te hara me te whakangāwari i te āwangawanga tūmatanui mo te haumarutanga i nga tiriti." I kī a Tēnā Roddick ka kōrerorero a ia ki te rangatira kātipa, a Mark Polin, "ngā huarahi me ngā tikanga kia taea ai tēnei". Ka kōrerorerotia hoki e ia te hukihuki o tana tahua tuatahi ki nga pirihimana me te pae hara i tēnei wiki, ka tāpiritia e ia. "Ki te whakaūngia te tahua, ka kite tātau i te pikinga o te tono i ngā āpiha rangatahi, ā, ka tino piki ake ngā whika."

title: Covid: Shielders' lives 'on hold' as lockdown goes on
summary: I whakatakotoria e Sheila Smith tana tēpu mo te hapa Kirihimete me tōna whānau i Whiringa ā Rangi. Ā, kei te tautuhia tonutia ināianei, kua rākaitia ki ngā whakapaipai kāinga mō te wā ka taea e ia te hākari hākari me ana hoa aroha.
text: E pāngia ana a ia e te mate pūkahukahu pūkahukahu, ā, kua whakangungu mai i Poutāpeta. E hiahia ana ia ki tētahi mea e titiro whakamua ana, ka whakaritea e ia tana tēpu kai mō tētahi whānau e hui tahi ana i tōna kāinga i Chard, Somerset, i te moata. "Ehara i te mea he aha te wā o te tau. We're just going to have a lovely time," Mrs Smith, who lives alone with her Great Dane, Lucy, said. Kāore i taea e te hunga whai mate mate nui te kite i ngā hoa, whanaunga rānei mai i Poutāpeta, ā, kei te wehe noa iho i tō rātou kāinga mō ngā wāhui hauora. I te wā o te raka tuatahi, i tohutohutia rātau kia mahi i ētahi atu hipanga - whakangungu ranei - kia kore ai e kirimana i te Covid-19 nā te mea i whakaarohia he mōrearea ake rātou ki te hiahia rongoā ki te hōhipera. Kei te tohutohutia tonutia ngā tāngata tino mōrearea kia whakatūpatotia anō. I kī a Mrs Smith: "I whakatakotoria [te tēpu] i Whiringa ā Rangi mō te wā e haumaru ana mō taku whānau ki te toro anō - me te kore rāhuitanga, me te kore hīpoki, me ngā waiata Kirihimete e purei ana." I kī a ia ko te wā i muri i te raka tuatahi i muri i te tīmatanga anō o te oranga pūnoa mō te tokomaha he "tino uaua" nā te mea i noho taratahi tonu a ia. "I rongo koe i te panaia ki waho, a, he tino mokemoke." 'Really scared' Naomi Thomas, from Wellington, has terminal cancer and was first diagnosed in 2009. "Kua 11 tau ahau i te mate pukupuku ināianei. Kāore au e pīrangi kia noho a Covid hei mea e mate ana i a au ina tae rawa atu ahau," tana kī. I te wā o te raka tuatahi, ka kī a ia he "tino uaua ki te mārama ki ngā mea e haere ana i te ao o waho". "I te hokinga mai o ngā mea ki te pūnoa, kāore au i tino mataku, engari ināianei kei te kino kē atu, ā, kua whiwhi mātou i tēnei momo hou, kei te tino mataku ahau ināianei." She runs the Wedding Wishing Well Foundation, a charity that runs nuptials for people with terminal diseases. "I kitea e mātau kua puta ohorere tētahi wahine marena hou i hikitia tana mārena nā te raka ā-motu," tana kī. "Ehara tēnā i te mea noa iho ki a mātau. E kōrero ana mātou ki ngā tākuta kia tika ai ō mātou tauine wā, engari i tangohia tēnei i o mātau ringa." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko tōku oranga tōku whānau, ōku hoa me aku mahi nā reira e hapa ana ahau i te katoa." Ko Sarah Miles, mai i Cheddar, e whakangungu ana nā te mea he mate manawa tōmuri tōna me te mate huka. I kī a ia i "tino wehi" a ia ki te hopu i te coronavirus. Ko tana tama pōtiki, ko Sam, e mahi ana i tētahi toa māmā, ka karo i a ia i te kāinga e tiritiri ana rātau ki te tūpono ka puta mai tētahi tangata i pāngia e te mate. "Kāore e taea e au te āwhina engari ka miharo he aha te āhua o te hoki ki tētahi toa. Kāore au e kite i te tino puta," tana kī. "Kua tino waia ahau ki te hokohoko tuihono ka tino hiahia ahau i ia rā ina puta ake," tana kī. Kua hapa a ia i te kite i ngā mema o te whānau e noho tawhiti ana, pēnei i tētahi o ana tama me ōna mātua. He ākonga pakeke a Jamie, tana tama mātāmua, ā, e noho ana i Weston-super-Mare. I wehe ana tama tokorua i mua i te Kirihimete kia noho tahi ai rāua. I kī a Ms Miles: "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i a [Jamie] mai i te wiki i mua i te Rā o Whaea i tērā tau, ā, he ngākau pouri, kāore i taea te whakapā atu ki a ia, te kite tika rānei i a ia." title: Ko ngā rawa Āhia i whāranu i muri i te whakamutu i te whakanuitanga o te US Federal Reserve
summary: I whāranu ngā rawa o Āhia i muri i te kīanga a te Federal Reserve e whakamutu ana i tana hōtaka whakanui nui nui nā te kaha ake o te whakahaerenga o Amerika.
text: I kī hoki te pēke matua o Amerika ka mau tonu ngā mokatere huamoni iti mō "tētahi wā nui". Heoi anō, i kitea ētahi atu kōrero Whāngai mō te āhua o te mākete mahi a AMERIKA hei kawe mai i tētahi mokatere ā muri ake. Nā tēnei i peke ai te tāra US ki te toru wiki te teitei ki te yen, e akiaki ana i te pikinga o ngā rawa o Tiapanī. I katia e te tohu o Te 225 te 0.7% i te 15,658.20 i te wā i whakamutua e te Topix whānui ake te 0.65% teitei ake i te 1,278.90. I Ahitereiria, i piki te ASX 200 i te 0.5% ki te 5,476.20. New Zealand's NZX 50 stock index hit a record high of 5,381.71 at one point before closing 0.3% higher at 5,370.18. I mahue i te pēke matua o te whenua ngā mokatere huamoni i te tata ki te ono tau te teitei o te 3.5% i te Tāite. Heoi anō, i katia e Hang Seng o Hong Kong te 0.5% i te 23,702.04 i muri i te pikinga o ngā moni kino i ētahi o ngā pēke nui rawa o Haina. "Ahakoa ka nui ake te whakawhāititanga o te QE o AMERIKA ki ngā tiritiri," te kī a Te Māngai Oliver, te upoko o te rautaki pūtea penapena me te rangatira o te ohanga i AMP Capital. "Tērā pea ka haere tonu te tipu o te US me ngā here moni e tūmanakohia ana kia ngāwari tonu mō tētahi wā, tērā pea ka haere kē atu te mākete pūru hurihuri i roto i ngā hea." Ināianei ka titiro whakamua ngā kaiwhakangao ki te pūrongo whakatupu hou o te whakahaerenga o Amerika ā muri ake nei i te Rāitema me te whakataunga kaupapahere moni a te Pēke o Tiapanī i te Paraire. Ko te whiwhinga pūrongo kua whakarea hoki e ngā mākete ngā hua mai i ētahi o ngā kamupene nui rawa o Āhia. I kite a Samsung Electronics, te kaihanga waea atamai nui rawa o te ao, i ōna hea e piki ana i te 4.5% ahakoa he koi te hekenga o ngā hua ia hauwhā i muri i te ngaronga o te tiri mākete ki ngā tauwhāinga Hainamana māmā ake. Neke atu i te 7% ngā hea i Nintendo i te tuatahi i muri i te pūrongo a te kamupene kēmu i ngā hua pai ake i te tūmanako. Heoi anō, ka hoki whakamuri nga hea ki te kati i te 1%. Heoi anō, i rahua a Yahoo Japan me Mitsubishi Iraira ki te whakapakari i a rāua hua. I kite ngā kamupene e rua i a rātau hea e hinga ana i te 5.6% me te 3.8%. Neke atu i te 3% i hinga te kaiwhakahaere tomokanga ipurangi o Kōrea ki te Tonga o Naver i muri i te iti noa iho o ngā hua hua. I Hingapoa, i piki ake te umanga hanganga o Yongnam Holdings i te 20% i runga i te rongo he wāhanga tērā o tētahi whakawhāiti i toa i tētahi kirimana $1.5bn hei hanga i tētahi taunga rererangi tuarua o te ao whānui i Myanmar.

title: Tā a Ēnā Me: I hereheretia te tangata mo te ora mo te kaupapa kōhuru o Te Tiriti
summary: Kua whiua tētahi tangata nāna i whakatakoto ki te whakamate i te pirimia i roto i tētahi whakaekenga whai i a ia, kia ora i roto i te whare herehere me te wā mōkito e 30 tau.
text: I whakawāteatia a Naa'imur Zakariyah Pūkaha, e 21, mai i te raki o Rāwāhi, i tērā marama mo te whakarite i nga mahi pūtōraru. I whakaaro a Pūkaha ki te whakapakū i tētahi pōma i ngā kuwaha o Te Tiriti o Downing, kātahi ka patua a Ēnā Me ki te naihi, pū rānei. Na te whiu i a ia, ka kī a Tēnā Kaiwhakatika Haddon-Cave "kua mahia e Pūkaha tana whakaeke" mehemea kāore ia i hopukina. I hopukina a Pūkaha e tētahi mahi huna e pā ana ki ngā Pirihimana o Metropolitan, MI5 me te WH. I hopukina a ia i muri i te kohikohi i tētahi pēke me te koti mai i tētahi mahinga huna i whakapono ai ia kua whakaurua ki ngā pakū. Ka kī te tiati: "E mōhio tūturu ana ahau i ngā wā katoa e whakapono ana a Pūkaha he tūturu ngā pūrere, ā, ka taea te tūkino nui." I tāpiritia e ia he "māharahara" nga āpiha huna i roto i te kēhi i ngā wā katoa, ā, ko Pūkaha te "kaiwhakakīkī me te kaituhi" o ana ake mahi. He pēhea te maunga o Pūkaha e te korero kōrero o te kāinga o TE WĀ, a Dominic Casciani Pūkaha, i whakapā atu ki ngā kaihoko IS mā te pāpāho pāpori - engari kāore i te mōhiotia e ia he māngai tūturu te hoapā. I kōrerotia e taua māngai a Pūkaha ki tētahi tīma MI5 o ngā kaitākaro tūranga tuihono, nāna i whakamōhio ki a ia he whika IS pono rātau. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi i tētahi pomu whai i a ia i runga i te Pāremata," te kī a Pūkaha ki nga kaitākaro tūranga MI5. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te ngana ki te whakamate i a Theresa May. Ko tāku e hiahia ana ināianei he pūtau moe hei takoto pāpaku mō tēnei wā." Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i a Dominic Casciani Pūkaha, i kī a Tēnā Kaiwhakatika Haddon-Cave, kua "korerotia, i whakapono" ko te pōma peke i hoatu ki a ia "ka taea te whakararuraru i runga i tētahi tauine e ōrite ana ki ērā i takea mai i te Papa Tākaro o Manatāne", i reira e 22 ngā tāngata i patua. I tautohe te rōia o Pūkaha kua horoia ia e tōna matua kēkē - i patua ā muri ake i roto i tētahi tānga taiapa i a ia e whawhai ana ki te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi i Hiria - a, i kī mai kāore tana kiritaki i whakaaro kia haere ki te mahi. Engari i pānuitia e te tiati he rīpoata whakamātautau ki te kōti kua whakaae a Pūkaha i roto i te whare herehere ka mahia e ia te whakaekenga mehemea i taea e ia. I whakaahuatia ia e tētahi pūrongo rerenga tōmua he taitama "mātauranga, mātauranga hoki" e kaha ana ki te "mahi i raro i te hihiani ki te pānga whakamataku". Ka kī atu a Tēnā Kaiwhakatika Haddon-Cave ki a Pūkaha ka "nui te wā" ki te ako i te Koran i roto i te whare herehere, kātahi anō ka tāpiri ko te Islam he "hāhi rangimārie". I tāpiritia e te tiati ko Pūkaha - taketake mai i Birmingham - he "tangata tino mōrearea" ā, he uaua ki te matapae mehemea ka whakawāteatia a ia. I te wā o tana whakawātanga o Old Bailey, ka tautohe a Pūkaha ki tētahi utu motuhake o te whakauru ki te whanonga e āwhina ana i te whakaritenga o ngā mahi pūtohu, e pā ana ki tētahi ataata "tautoko" i whakaahuatia e ia mō tētahi hoa mahi e hiahia ana ki te hono ki a IS i Ripia. I tua atu i te whiu ora, e ono tau i hoatu ki a Pūkaha i roto i te whare herehere mo te ataata tautoko IS. Ka whakahaere ngātahi ngā rerenga, kaua e whai muri.

title: Neke atu i te whitu miriona ngā hunga whakaruru i rewa i te tau 2012 - UN
summary: E kī ana te UN e 7.6 miriona ngā tāngata i noho whakaruru i te tau 2012, ā, ko te tau katoa ināianei he teitei ake i tētahi wā mai i te tau 1994.
text: E kī ana tētahi pūrongo mai i te tari o te Komihana Tiketike o UN mō ngā Hunga Whakaruru (UNHCR) ko Hiria he "take hou nui" e taraiwa ana i ngā tau rerenga. E kī ana te pūrongo e 55% o ngā hunga whakaruru katoa i haere mai i ngā whenua e rima: Awhekenetāna, Somalia, Iraki, Hūtane me Hiria. I kitea hoki kua taurimatia e ngā whenua e tipu ana ināianei te 81% o ngā hunga whakaruru o te ao, 11% neke atu i te tekau tau ki mua. "He tau whakamataku ēnei. E whakaata ana rātau i te mamae takitahi i runga i tētahi tauine tino nui, ā, e whakaata ana rātau i ngā uauatanga o te iwi ao whānui ki te ārai i ngā papā me te whakatoko rongoā i te wā tika mō rātou," te kī a te rangatira o TE WHK, o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa. I kī a Tēnā Wānanga ko te whika o te 7,6 miriona ko te tikanga he tangata rewa hou ia 4.1 hēkona. "I ia wā e kimokimo ana koe, ka whakahaua tētahi atu tangata kia rere," tana kī. E kī ana te UNHCR i takea ngā whika i runga anō i ngā raraunga mai i te kōwhiringa anō, mai i ngā kāwanatanga me ētahi atu NGO. I noho tonu a Awhekenetāna ko te pūtake nui rawa o te hunga whakaruru o te ao, he tūnga kua puritia ināianei mō te 32 tau, me te 95% o ngā hunga whakaruru o Pūkeirangi i Irana, i Pakitāne rānei. Ko ngā Hūmārie te rōpū tuarua nui rawa o te hunga whakaruru i te tau 2012, i muri mai i ngā Hīrapa. Ko nga Hiriani te rōpū tuawhā nui rawa. Heoi anō, kaore nga whika e whakaata ana i ētahi atu tāngata kotahi miriona kua rere i Hiria i roto i ngā marama e ono kua taha. E kī ana te UN mēnā ka haere tonu ngā āhuatanga o nāianei, ka mahue i a Hiria ētahi atu tāngata e rua miriona i te mutunga o tēnei tau. I ngā rā torutoru e tūmanakohia ana kia tonoa ki ngā whenua o Ūropi kia mauria ētahi o rātau ki roto. E kī ana hoki te rīpoata kua tohua te pikinga o te nekeneke mai i Mali me te Whenua Manapori o Kongo. Ko te ope taua a Mali, i tino pūruatia e Wīwī, e whawhai ana ki te hunga whakakeke o Tuareg i tēnei tau. I hopukina e nga Māori te mana o te raki o te whenua i muri i te kukitanga hōia i tērā tau. I te Whenua Manapori o Kongo, e 800,000 ngā tāngata kua rere mai i tērā tau i waenganui i ngā ope kāwanatanga me te nekeneke whakakeke M23.

title: Ribblehead Viaduct: Ka tīmata te mahi whakaora nui
summary: Kei te whakatūria te paepae ki tētahi o ngā tohu whenua hītori rawa o Aotearoa i te tīmatanga o tētahi kaupapa whakaora £2.1m.
text: I whakarārangitia e te Kōeke II te Ribblehead Viaduct, e 104 ft (32m) te teitei, i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1875, ā, ka kawea te raina rerewhenua o Settle to Carlisle. I kī te Network Rail me tohu anō i ngā hononga moata kua whakakinotia me te whakakapi i ngā kōhatu pakaru i runga i ngā kopere e 24 e hāngai ana i te hanganga roa e 1,318 ft (402m). E tūmanakohia ana kia oti te mahi tapi i te mutunga o Hui tanguru. Nā Network Rail, i kī ngā rangatira kua pau "ngā marama o te mahi uaua ki te whakamahine i ngā mahere" arā ko te tātari i ngā tauira moata kotahi tekau mai i te arawhiti "kia tino mōhio ai ka tata tonu te whāranu i whakamahia i roto i te tapi ki te mea taketake". I kī a Phil James, te kaiwhakahaere ara o te Raki ki te Raki i Network Rail: "He hōnore te tiaki i te maha o ngā whare me ngā hanganga nui puta noa i te whatunga rēra, engari me noho a Ribblehead Viaduct hei tētahi o ngā taonga karauna o te pūkaha tūmatanui o Wikitōria. " E mōhio ana mātou he tino hira te hanganga i te paetata, i te ao whānui hoki, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te hoatu i te tiaki me te aro atu e tika ana kia hākinakina e ngā whakatupuranga pāhihi me ngā kaitirotiro ā muri ake." I kī te Mana Pāka ā-Motu o Aotearoa ko "ngā tapi nui tuatahi mai i ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua". I kī a Hēmi Munday, mai i te mana: "Mēnā ka pātai atu koe ki tētahi tangata i Ingarangi ki te whakaahua i tētahi tereina i runga i tētahi arawhiti, tērā pea ka whakaaro rātau ki a Ribblehead Viaduct. It is a star attraction for our area, although it is but one of many superb Victorian viaducts in the Yorkshire Dales National Park." Neke atu i te 100 ngā kaimahi i mate i te wā o tōna hanganga, e rima tau te roa ki te whakaoti. E 2,000 nga kaimahi i noho i roto i tētahi taone i hangaia i te riu i raro nei, koia te whakaaro mō te rangatū pouaka whakaata ITV Heriko. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Arotakenga ki te matenga tūroro i te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini Elizabeth i Glasgow
summary: Kei te haere tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i te matenga o tētahi pakeke i runga i te hōhipera hou e £842m o Pākehā i muri i te ono haora e tatari ana ki te rongoā.
text: I kī te Pūkete o Ia Rā i pāngia e te tūroro te hopu manawa i roto i tētahi pānui i te Wae Aromatawai Inamata o te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini Elizabeth. I kī a NHS Greater Glasgow me Clyde (GGC) kei te mahia he arotakenga o te rongoā a te tūroro. E kī ana i "raro i te pēhanga" te wae aromatawai i te haerenga mai o taua tangata. Ko ngā tūroro e tae ana ki te hōhipera i raro i te tukunga mai i te tākuta ka kitea tuatahitia i te Wae Aromatawai Inamata (IAU). Ko te hunga e tae mai ana me te kore tohutohu e kitea ana i te Aituā me te Ohorere (A&E). I kī tētahi kōrero mai i NHS GGC i te tangata "i mate pouri i ngā haora tōmua o te ata Tūrei" i muri i te whiwhinga "i tētahi aromatawai tuatahi a tētahi mema o ngā kaimahi nēhi i te taenga atu ki te IAU". 'Arotakenga katoa' "Kua whakapā hāngai tētahi mema matua o tā mātou tīma whakahaere rongoā ki te whānau ki te whakaū kei te mahia tētahi arotakenga katoa o te rongoā tūroro, ā, ka tiria te hua ki a rātou ina mutu." I kī te poari hauora ko te IAU "i tino kaimahi" i te wā engari i "raro i te pēhanga tāpiri nā te nui ake i te toharite o ngā tūroro e haere ana". Na te āhuatanga, i kī ai, i ahu mai ki "ngā tūroro e tatari ana kia roa ake i te mea noa kia whakaaetia". I whakakāhore a NHS GGC i ngā pūrongo nūpepa o ngā tūroro e hoatu ana i ngā whakawhitinga toto i roto i te pānuitanga i waenganui i ngā tirohanga pōrearea. I whakamutua e tana kōrero: "I te wā e arokē ana te wae, ka taea e mātou te whakaū ki a koe kāore he whakahekenga toto i roto i te kauhanga, i ngā wāhi tatari rānei. " I tino kaha te mahi a o mātau kaimahi ki te whakarite kia aromatawaitia ngā tūroro e haere ana ki te hōhipera, kia tūhuratia, kia tātaritia, kia rongoatia, kia whakaaetia rānei ki tētahi moenga, kia tere rānei te tuku atu, ā, ka whakapōhēhē mātou ki aua tūroro i tatari roa." I kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Shona Robison kua whakapā atu a ia ki te poari hauora mō te kēhi, ā, ka "āta whakamōhiotia ngā kauneketanga katoa" mai i te arotakenga ki te tiaki i te tūroro. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka whakamahia te hua o te arotakenga hei ako i ngā akoranga me te mahi i ngā huringa tika e taunakitia ana. " Kua whakapūmautia mātau e te poari hauora ka mahia e rātau ngā mahi wawe e hiahiatia ana." Ngā raruraru o mua Kua pā ki te hōhipera nui ngā raruraru ki ngā wā tatari tūroro mai i te whakatuwheratanga o Aperira. I te marama e whai ake nei, he pūrongo o ngā tirohanga hūkere i te wā e uaua ana ngā kaimahi ki te whakatikatika i ngā whakaurunga tūroro. I Hāmata, i whakaūngia kei te tukuna ngā pūtiro raparongoā kāwanatanga hei āwhina ki te whakapai ake i ngā wā tatari aituā me te ohorere (A&E) i muri i te whakaaturanga a ngā whika ko te tino kino i Pākehā. Ahakoa te kauneketanga, i whakaaturia e ngā whika i tērā marama kāore tonu te hōhipera i te tutuki i tētahi ūnga kāwanatanga o te tukatuka i te 95% o ngā tūroro i roto i te whā haora. E noho ana te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini Irihāpeti e 1,109 moenga i te taha o te Hōhipera Ariki 256 moenga mō ngā Tamariki Māuiui i te pae o te Hōhipera Whānui o te Tonga tawhito. I whakakapia e te whare wānanga hou te Hōhipera Ariki mō ngā Tamariki Māuiui i Yorkhill, te Hōhipera Whānui ki te Tonga, ngā Whare Hauora o Te Uru me Wikitōria.

title: Ka whakakore a Tūpono i ngā paihikara pia i waenganui i ngā amuamu
summary: Kua rāhuitia e Tūtukupu ngā paihikara pia i waenganui i ngā amuamu mō ngā tūruhi haurangi e haurangi ana, e haurangi ana.
text: Na te kōti i te Tūtira i whakaae ai ngā mana ki te whakakore i tā rātou whakamahinga i waenganui o te taone o Hōnea, e karanga ana i ngā mahi he "raruraru whakahau tūmatanui". He huarahi pai ngā paihikara mō ngā tūruhi e whakanui ana i ngā takahanga rōpū, pēnei i ngā rōpū tūruhi, ki te haere huri noa i Tūtukupu. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kua noho rātau hei tauira mo nga raruraru i takea mai i te tāpoi tāpoi maha. Ko ngā paihikara pia he kāta iti kua whakakētia ki ngā tūru paihikara kua whakaritea huri noa i te tēpu pae. Ka whakahikotia e ngā kaihoko te paihikara i a rātau e hīkoi ana i te taha o ngā awa rongonui o te taone, i a rātau e inu pia. I te Wenerei ka mana te 'pōrearea' i te rāhuitanga. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te Hōro Taone kua kore e whakaaetia ngā tohutūmahi ki te rēti i ngā paihikara. I muri i te kīanga a te Kōti Takiwā o Tūpono "tērā pea ka rāhuitia te paihikara pia i te pokapū o te taone kia kore ai e pōrearea". I tērā tau, tata ki te 6,000 ngā tangata whenua i haina i tētahi petihana e karanga ana ki te kaunihera kia whakakore i ngā paihikara, e karanga ana he "tītohunga wehi". I taua wā, ka kī atu tētahi tangata whenua ki a NOS news: "Kua noho to mātau taone hei pāka whakangahau nui." He torutoru noa iho ka mahue i a koe ngā manene haurangi nā Anna Holligan, Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero e rongo ana koe i a rātau i mua i tō kitenga i a rātou. Mō ētahi tūruhi, ko ēnei taonga taumaha e whakarato ana i te huarahi tino pai ki te kite i te taone. Te whakakotahi i ngā āhuatanga e rua - te waipiro me te paihikara. He tino paingia rātau ki ngā mahi tūpāpaku. Ko ngā tāngata haurangi e maringi pia ana i a rātau e ngana ana ki te whakatere i ngā tiriti whāiti i runga wīra, kua noho hei tirohanga mōhio i roto i te ngākau hītori o te taone. Ki te tokomaha o ngā tangata kua noho hei tohu o te raruraru e pā ana ki 'te momo tāpoi hē'. Kātahi anō ka pānuitia e te kaunihera ngā mahere hei whakanui i ngā tāke hōtēra hei ngana ki te whakaiti i te maha o ngā kaihaere pūtea. He rongonui te Tatimana mo to rātau ahurea paihikara, engari he torutoru noa iho ka mahue i nga manene haurangi e whakahau ana i ēnei waka hou, i ētahi wā ka utua e te hunga e whakamahi ana i ngā paihikara hei huarahi māia, whai tikanga hoki ki te haere tonu ki te ora. I whakaae te rangatira tōmuri o Tūtukupu, a Eberhard van der Laan - i mate i tērā marama - ki ngā tangata whenua, a, ka whakatūria he ārai i nga paihikara. I werohia tēnei i te kōti i tērā tau e whā ngā kaiwhakahaere paihikara pia, nāna i kī e "whakamana ana te taone i te wāteatanga o te iwi". I taua wā, ka patua e nga kaiwhakawā te āraitanga a te koromatua, e kī ana kāore i tika te whakahau. Heoi anō, i roto i tētahi whakahaere i te Tūrei, ka whakaae nga kaiwhakawā i te Kōti Takiwā o Tūpono ki te rāhuitanga. "Ko te pahekotanga o ngā raruraru waka, te whanonga ārai pāpori me te pokapū o te taone arokē e whakatautika ana i tētahi rāhuitanga," ka kī rātau. Kua eke koe i runga paihikara pia? Kei Tūtukupu rānei koe e noho ana? Ī-mēra mai ki a mātou i haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk me ō wheako. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: Te mate o Huntington: Ka hinga te wahine whai ira ki te tono i te NHS
summary: Ko tētahi wahine nāna i kī tērā pea ka whakatahe a ia mehemea i mōhio ia he mate kino tōna pāpā, he mate roro tuku iho, kua rahua i tana tono ki te tono i te NHS.
text: I kī a ia e toru ngā NHS Trusts e nama ana ki a ia he mahi tiaki ki te kōrero ki a ia mō te mate o Huntington o tōna pāpā. Ko te tamaiti a tētahi tangata e mate ana i te mate, e 50% te tūponotanga ki te tuku iho. Engari i whakataua e te Kōti Tiketike ko te whakataunga kia kaua e kōrero ki a ia mō te tātaritanga a tōna pāpā i tautokona e tētahi "tinana whakaaro rongoā". I roto i tana whakawā i te kōti i Rāwāhi, i kitea e Mrs Justice Yip, i runga i te toenga o ngā tūponotanga, kāore te kaikerēme e haere ki mua me te whakamutunga o tōna hapu mehemea i whakamōhiotia ia ki te mōrea. I tāpiri mai a ia, ahakoa i a ia "te aroha nui rawa atu ki ngā āhuatanga kino e kitea ai e te kaikerēme, me ākiritia tēnei kerēme". Ko te wahine, e mōhiotia ana ko ABC hei pare i te tuakiri o tana tamāhine ake, i kitea anake he mate tōna pāpā e whā marama i muri i te whānautanga. I kī atu tōna pāpā ki ngā tākuta kāore a ia i pīrangi kia kōrerotia tana tamāhine mō tōna tātaritanga, e wehi ana kei whakamate a ia i a ia, ka whakatahe rānei mēnā ka kitea e ia. Ko te mate o Huntington i takea mai i tētahi ira hē, ā, ka ngaro haere ngā pūtau roro, e pā ana ki te nekeneke, te wairua me ngā pūkenga whakaaro. Ka taea hoki te whanonga whakatuki. I te tau 2007 i muri i tana patunga i tōna whaea, a, i herea i raro i te Ture Hauora Hinengaro. I rapu kaimahi rongoā i te whakaaetanga a te pāpā ki te whakaatu i tana tātaritanga ki tana tamāhine, e hapu ana i taua wā, engari i whakakāhore ia. Ko te nuinga o te wā ka puta mai ngā tohu o te mate i waenganui i te 30 me te 50 tau. I kōrero a ABC, e 40 tau ināianei, ki te Kōti Tiketike - nāna i rongo tuatahi i te kēhi i te tau 2015 - i kitea e ia te āhua o tōna pāpā i te tau 2013. Ko tana tamāhine, kāore anō kia whakamātauria, e 50% te tūponotanga ki te tuku iho i a ia. Ka taea anake te mahi i ngā whakamātautau mō te mate ina tae te tangata ki te 18. I te whakahau a ia i te Hauora NHS Trust o Hato Hōri i te tonga-hauauru o Rānōna me te Hauora Hinengaro o Hato Hōri NHS Trust me te Ngātahitanga NHS Foundation Trust mō te £345,000 i roto i ngā tūkinotanga. Te mate o Huntington

title: Notre-Dame: Whānau i roto i te whakaahua huaketo i kitea i muri i te rapunga
summary: Kua kitea tētahi whānau i whakaahuatia i waho o te whare karakia o Notre-Dame i ngā meneti i mua i te hū o te ahi, i muri i te rapunga huaketo.
text: E kī ana a Brooke Windsor, e 23, ko te pāpā me te tamaiti i whakaahuatia e ia mō te haora i mua i te mura kua tae mai ki mua. Ko tana whakaahua, e whakaatu ana i a rātau e tākaro ana i mua i te rohe 850 tau, i tiria whānuitia i Twitter. I kī atu a ia ki te AO e hiahia ana a ia ki te tiritiri i te "pūmahara" ki a rātau, e akiaki ana i tētahi kimi ao whānui. I te whakaūnga kua kitea rātou, ka tūtohu a Ms Windsor: "Kua mutu te rapu! Kua tae te whakaahua ki te pāpā me te whānau." E kī ana a Ms Windsor, kāore te tangata me tōna whānau e hiahia ana kia mōhiotia. Engari, e kī ana a Ms Windsor i tuhia e ia tētahi karere ki a ia, e pānui ana: "Kia ora anō mō taua whakaahua ātaahua, ka kitea e mātou he wāhi motuhake mōna." Neke atu i te 240,000 ngā wā i tiria ai te tweet a Ms Windsor, ā, e 467,000 ngā wā i pai ki a ia, me ngā tāngata puta noa i te ao e uru ana ki te kimi i a rātou. I whakaahuatia tana whakaahua pākaha he "hītori" me tētahi "wā motuhake" e ngā kaiwhakamahi Twitter i te nui o te tūkinotanga ki a Notre-Dame i ohorere ai te ao. Kua kī taurangi te Perehitini o Wīwī, a Emanuera Macron ki te hanga anō i te whare karakia. Neke atu i te €800m ($902m; £692m) kua tautohe kētia hei āwhina ki te hanga anō i te pae Tuku iho o te Ao o Unesco.

title: Arotakenga Whakapau Moni: Ko te whakapau moni o te pūtea kawenga 'tae atu ki te 50%'
summary: Ko te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā kaupapa waka nui kia nui ake i te Pāremata o nāianei, mā te 50% ki te £61bn, kua pānuitia e te Tumuaki George Osborne hei wāhanga o te Arotakenga Whakapau.
text: Nā Bill WilsonBusiness reporter, BBC News I karangatia e ia "te pikinga nui rawa i roto i tētahi whakatupuranga" i runga i ngā kaupapa huarahi me te rēra. Hei wāhanga o taua mea, ka kī a ia ka tīmata te mahi i te rerewhenua tere rawa HS2 e hono ana i te raki o Ingarangi ki te tonga. Heoi anō, ahakoa ka piki te whakapau moni, ka hinga te tahua whakahaere a te Tari Waka ki te 37%. I pānuitia hoki e te hanga huarahi a Tēnā Osborne ka haere tonu te whakawhiriwhiritanga o ngā iaia rēra nui e toru. Koinei te Trans-Pennine i te raki o Ingarangi, Midland Mainline i waenganui o Ingarangi me te ara Uru Nui mai i Rānana puta noa i te tonga-hauauru o Ingarangi ki Weera. Tērā anō "te hōtaka hanga huarahi nui rawa mai i nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua", tana kī. Ko ētahi atu kaupapa kua pānuitia e Tēnā Osborne hei wāhanga o te whakapau moni i te wāhanga, ko te £11bn mō te waka i Rāwāhi, me ētahi £300m mō te paihikara i te UK. Ka whakatūria te Waka mō te Raki, he tinana e whakakotahi ana i ngā waka me ngā mana ā rohe puta noa i te raki o Ingarangi. 'Relieved' Anthony Smith, chief executive of independent user watchdog Transport Focus, said: "Rail passengers will be relieved to hear that the big projects designed to relieve overcrowding and lead to more reliable journeys have been protected. " Ka whakangāwari ngā kaiwhakamahi o te whatunga huarahi rautaki ki te kite ka pupuritia te hōtaka pūtea penapena e rima tau. "Engari ko te hunga e whakamahi ana i te pahi ka miharo me pēhea te pānga o ēnei huringa ki tō rātou haerenga paetata." A, ka kī a Penny Gaines, te tūru o te rōpū pēhanga Kāti HS2: "He mārama tonu te arewhana mā a HS2. Me whakapai ake te waka i te Raki, engari ehara i te hononga ki Rānana e pupuri ana i nga rangatiratanga o te Raki. "Ko te kaha ki te whakawhiti i ngā Pennines, kei te uru ki ngā pūtahi o te taone mai i ngā taone o te rohe. Koinei te wāhi e hiahiatia ana e te moni te whakapau moni mo te waka, ehara i te raina rerewhenua nui kotahi." Tauākī Ngahuru me te Arotakenga Whakapau Moni 2015 i whakaaturia e te Tumuaki George Osborne, ka whakaritea e te Arotakenga Whakapau he aha ngā whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga i roto i ngā tau e whā e whai ake nei, ā, ko te Tauākī Ngahuru he whakahōutanga ā-tau o ngā mahere kāwanatanga mō te whakahaerenga. Pūrongo motuhake: Ko te pānuitanga hōhonu katoa o te Arotakenga Whakapau Moni me ngā Tuhinga Tauākī Ngahuru: Hono ki ngā tuhinga Tauākī Ngahuru me te Arotake Whakapau moni mā te HM Treasury He aha te tikanga mōu: He pēhea te pānga o te Tauākī Ngahuru me te Arotakenga Whakapau ki ō pūtea Mātaki: Ka tīmata te pānuitanga pouaka whakaata a TE AO i te Rua me te Hongere Rongokōrero o TE AO i te 11:30 GMT,  me te pānuitanga o te Reo Irirangi 5 Live mai i te 11:55 GMT Rail fares, i kī a Tēnā Osborne tērā te hauwhā o te miriona pauna pūtea penapena i roto i ngā pūkenga i Keni hei āwhina i te whakahaere i ngā nekenekehanga taraka utanga, hei wāhanga o Operation Stack. Anō hoki, i kī a ia ka pau ētahi £5bn ki te tiaki i ngā huarahi. Engari ko tana pūtea matua hou e £250m mō te whawhai i ngā rua i whakaahuatia he "taka i te moana e ai ki te tauine o te raruraru" e te kaipūkaha matua o RAC, a David Bizley. I kī hoki te kāwanatanga ka "tuku i ngā whakaritenga kia whakatio i ngā utu kaupae kua whakaritea, kaua e neke atu i te utunga moni (RPI) mō te Pāremata katoa". A, e kī ana ka āta titiro ki te tuku i "ngā mana waka nui ki ngā rohe taone nui e ārahi ana i te taone, tae atu ki Greater Manchester, rohe taone nui o Sheffield, rohe taone o Liverpool, te Rāwhiti ki te Raki, Tees Valley me te West Midlands".

title: Ko te ātete ki ngā mana whakakotahi o Dorset e mahere ana i te 'pōrangi'
summary: He "pōrangi", "tōmuri" me te "kore painga", te kī a te kāwanatanga.
text: Plans to replace nine councils with two unitary authorities were officially opposed by Christchurch Borough Council earlier this month. I kī tētahi whakautu a tētahi rōia kāwanatanga i te wero "kāore e whakaaetia" i whakawehi i te "raruraru nui" ki te tukanga. I kī te kaunihera e whakaaro ana i te reta me te tango tohutohu ā-ture. I raro i ngā mahere, ka mutu katoa ngā kaunihera e iwa, ā, ka hanumi a Bournemouth, Poole me Ōtautahi. Ka hangaia te kaunihera tuarua mai i te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Dorset, East Dorset, North Dorset, Purbeck, Weymouth & Portland me West Dorset. I mua rā ka kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o Ōtautahi, a Rawiri Flagg, e hiahia ana te mana ki te "pupuri i to mātau rangatiratanga". Engari i kī ngā kaitautoko o ngā huringa, nā te mea ka pā mai i Aperira 2019, ka taea e rātau te tiaki i te £108m i roto i te ono tau. 'Tautoko kaha' i kī atu te Kaunihera o Ōtautahi ki te kāwanatanga kua mahi "i tua atu i ōna mana" ki te whakatakoto i ngā huringa ki te aroaro o te Pāremata i Poutāpeta. Engari i kī te rōia, i tuhituhi mō te hēkeretari kāwanatanga ā rohe a Hemi Brokenshire, he "kāore e taea te tautohetohe". "Ko tēnei, he tikanga kāore e whakaaetia ki te rapu tōmuri ki te whakatū i tētahi wero... ahakoa tōna tautoko kaha a te nuinga o ērā atu mana i Dorset," te kī a te reta. I kī a Tēnā Flagg: "Kua whiwhi urupare mātou ki tā mātou reta kawa mahi tōmua. " Ināianei kei te whakaaro to mātau tīma ture i ngā ihirangi o te reta, ā, ina whiwhi mātou i ā rātou tohutohu ka whakaarohia e mātou to mātau tūnga."

title: Ka piki ake te hara o Keni ahakoa he utauta 'matapae pirihimana' hou
summary: I nui ake te hara i Keni ahakoa te whakaurunga o tētahi pūnaha rorohiko pirihimana hou i hoahoatia hei matapae i te wāhi e pā ana, kua kitea he pūrongo.
text: Kāore ētahi āpiha i mārama he pēhea te mahi a te pūmanawa, ā, kāore i te nui te wā hei whakamahi tika i te hangarau, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Keni. I whakaurua puta noa i te rohe i Aperira 2013 i muri i te whakawātanga e whā marama i Medway i kite i te tutu tiriti e hinga ana i te 6%. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Keni kua hurihia ināianei te āhua o te whakamahinga o te pūnaha £130,000. Ko te kaupapa "pirihimana matapae", i runga anō i te pūmanawa i tīmataria i Los Angeles, i whakaaetia e te Mana Pirihimana o Keni kua whakakorea ināianei. Ka whakamahia e te 'hara ki runga' ngā āhuatanga o mua me ngā mōhiohio o nāianei hei matapae āhea, āhea hoki ka puta ai te hara. I te tau tuatahi o tana mahinga, ka mutu i Aperira 2014, ka piki ake ngā pāpātanga katoa o te hara i tuhia i te takiwā. I kī te Kawanatanga Tuarua Rangatira o Paul Brandon kua whakaurua te "pirihimana matapae" i te wā kotahi me tētahi akoranga a te Kaitirotiro Pirihimana o Tōna Nui (HMIC) i kitea ko te 90% anake o te hara i tuhia tikatia e ngā Pirihimana o Keni. "He nui te wā i haumi ai mātou ki te whakanui ake i tērā tae atu ki te 96%, ā, mā te mahi i tēnā ka kite mātou i te nui ake o te hara i runga i ngā pukapuka," tana whakamārama. I whakaae a Tēnā Brandon kāore anō kia pai te whakamahi i te pūnaha rorohiko hōu. "Kāore pea mātou i whiwhi i te maha o ngā āpiha me ngā kaimahi me ētahi atu umanga ki ngā wāhi i tāutua hei rohe ki ngā pirihimana e ai ki tā mātou i tūmanako ai. " Kua whakawhāititia e mātau te maha o ngā wāhi hei tautiaki me te whakanui ake i te maha o ngā haora tautiaki i aua wāhi. "I te wāhi i mahia ai e mātou tēnā, he pai katoa ētahi o ngā hua o mua."

title: Whakapehapeha Cymru: I raro i te takahanga tuma 'haumaru mō te rima tau'
summary: He "pā me te haere" mēnā ka puta te Whakapehapeha Cymru i tēnei tau, engari i tiakina - me ngā mano tāngata i Kānata mō te takahanga.
text: Nā Pirihi WoodBBC News I rangirua te takahanga moe wahine, tāne, tōkeke, me te transgender (LGBT) i tōna wāhi pūnoa - Cooper's Field - kei te whakawāteatia anō i muri i te mahi hei rohe pīrangi o te Rōpū Toa. Engari i tiakina e te kohi moni te whakamahinga o tōna pae hou i te Pokapū Tūmatanui. I kī te Manukura o Lu Thomas tērā pea ka "whakararuraru" mehemea kāore i puta. Neke atu i te 100 ngā rōpū whakahaere i whakatūtū mai i Kuini Street i te Hātarei, me ngā katinga huarahi puta noa i te pokapū o te taone nui o Kānata. "I pā me te haere i tēnei tau mēnā i taea e mātou te whakatakoto i te takahanga, i huihui mai i tērā meneti," te kī a Ms Thomas. "I a Cardiff te taone nui, mēnā kāore i taea e mātou te taurima i tā mātou takahanga Whakapehapeha ā-tau, tērā pea ka whakararuraru. " Tērā pea ka tukuna he karere ki te hapori LGBT kāore rātau i whakaaturia i Weera, ā, kāore i tautokona. E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakakotahi i ngā tāngata kia whakahīhī ko wai rātou." I muri i te māramatanga o ngā take o te Āpure o Kupa i tērā o Mahuru, ka whakarewaina he whakahau ki te tiaki i te takahanga, me te kaitapere o Tā Īna McKellen e karanga ana i te āhuatanga "whakamataku" me te kī "Kei te pūmatua te whakapehapeha". Kia puta, kua kawea mai te £360,000 mā te kohi moni, ngā hoko tīkiti, ngā tautoko iti, ngā tūnga mākete me ngā koha. Kua tiakina te pae hou mō ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei, ahakoa me haere tonu te kohi moni ki te whakarite ka taea te whakatū i te takahanga. Ahakoa ngā raruraru, e whakapono ana a Ms Thomas ko te wāhi hou he "tūnga tūturu i roto i te ngākau o te taone" e āwhina ana i a ia ki te "toro atu ki te hunga whānui ake". I mua i te takahanga, ka kōrero a ia mō ngā take e pā ana ki te hapori LGBT i Weera. Ko tētahi o ēnei he ture hou e āhei ai ngā tāne tāne ki te hoatu toto i muri i te papare i te wahine mō te toru marama, kaua ko te 12 marama, engari i kī a ia kāore tēnei i te tino tawhiti. "E mārama ana te pōhiri i te huringa, engari e hiahiatia ana e tātau he kōrero pono he aha te take e hiahia ana ngā tāne tāne ki te papare i te wahine mō te toru marama i mua i te koha," te tāpiri mai a Ms Thomas. "Ki te whakaaro i te pikinga o ngā STD i roto i te hapori hāngai, me whai taupatupatu he aha tonu te take i tonoa ai ngā tāne tāne kia papare i mua i te koha." I hoatu hoki e ia tana tautoko i muri i tētahi ratonga tuakiri ira tangata i Uēra - i muri i te pānuitanga o tētahi i te Paraire. "He maha ngā GP e whakaakona ana ināianei ki te āwhina i ō rātou tūroro ki tō rātou tuakiri ira tangata, he tīmatanga pai, engari he nui haere te hiahia mō tētahi whare hauora whakatapua," tana kī. Ko tētahi tāpiritanga hou ki te Whakapehapeha he teneti whakapono, me ngā tāngata mai i ngā papamuri whakapono rerekē e whakanui ana i tō rātou wāhi i roto i te hapori LGBT. Ko te karakia i arahina e te pīhopa mo te wā tuatahi - me te Pīhopa o Hato Rawiri, ko Joanna Penberthy, i whai wāhi hoki ki tētahi kōrero mo te whakapono me te tōkaitanga. Ko ngā mahi i mahia i waho o te Pokapū Tūmatanui , me ngā hara o Fun Lovin i tākaro i te Paraire, Into the Ark i te Hātarei me te Hāhi o Charlotte i te Rātapu. Tērā te tautohetohe i te wā i whakatakatia ai te upoko o Goldie Lookin' Chain i te rārangi i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, me ngā kaiwhakahaere e kī ana kua tāpui rātau i tētahi tāpuitanga "hē". I whakaarahia ngā pātai mō te tika o ngā pūkenga o Newport, ko ōna taunga ko Your Mother's Got a Penis. I kī ngā pirihimana o South Wales Ch Supt Belinda Davies ka noho ngā āpiha i te mutunga wiki i te takahanga, ā, ka whakahauhau i ngā tāngata kia "whakatata atu ki a rātou me te tango kiriāhua".

title: Ko te rārangi hiko toi o Qatari Sheikha 2013
summary: Kua whakaingoatia te upoko wahine o te Mana Whare Taonga o Qatar (QMA) ko te tangata tino kaha i te ao toi.
text: I haere mai a Sheikha Al-Mayassa bint Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani i runga i te Power 100 ā-tau o te pukapuka ArtReview nā "te kaha hoko nui o tana whakahaere". I puta tuatahi a Sheikha Al-Mayassa i runga i te Power 100 i te tau 2011 i te tau 90, ka piki ki te tau 11 i te 2012. Ko Ai Weiwei o Haina, nāna i tīmataria te tatauranga whakamuri i te tau 2011, te kaiwaiata teitei rawa i te tau iwa. Ko ētahi atu ingoa mōhio i roto i te 10 o runga ko te kaihoko toi ko Larry Gagosian, i whakaripa ki te whā, me te tumuaki o Tate ko Tā Nicholas Serota, i whakatakotoria ki te ono. I meinga te mea whakamutunga hei Hoa Whakahonore e Piriniha Charles i te Wenerei i Te Whare o Buckingham hei āhukahuka i ana ratonga ki te toi. Ko Sheikha Al-Mayassa te tuahine o Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al-Thani, nāna i mahi te tūranga o te emir o Qatar i te wā i whakarerea e tōna pāpā i Hune. E ai ki a ArtReview, ka pau i te QMA te $1bn i te tau (£618m) ki te whakawhanake i ngā taiwhanga, te tautoko i ngā hākari kiriata me te tautoko i ngā toi tūmatanui. I tautokona hoki e ia te whakaaturanga a Tate Modern's Damien Hirst, nāna i kawe neke atu i te 463,000 ngā manuhiri i tōna whakahaerenga i tērā tau. I tīmataria hoki te Power 100 o tērā tau e tētahi wahine - ko Carolyn Christov-Bakargiev, te kaitiaki o te whakaaturanga Documenta 13 whai mana i Kassel, Tiamana. Ko David Zwirner, nāna ngā taiwhanga i Rāwāhi me Niu Ioka, kei te wāhi tuarua i roto i te rundown o tēnei tau, i te wā e toru ana tōna hoa pakihi o mua ko Iwan Wirth. Ka haere mai a Tā Nicholas i muri noa iho i a Hans Ulrich Obrist rāua ko Julia Peyton-Jones, ngā kaihanga tahi o ngā taiwhanga Serpentine i Rānana. I whakahiatotia e tētahi hūri ao whānui e 13, e whakaahuatia ana te Power 100 hei "hopuāhua ahurei o te tirohanga toi o nāianei". E ai ki te pukapuka toi o nāianei, ko ērā i whakaurua e "whakawāteatia ana i runga i tō rātou awe aowhānui i runga i te whakanaotanga toi me te āwhina ki te ao toi i roto i ngā marama e 12 kua hipa".

title: Maradona: He aha te take i raru ai te taonga tuku iho o te ata whutupaoro
summary: He kōpaki āhuatanga, he mana atahanga whai hua, me tētahi kura amphibious mai i Pērara.
text: Nā Joshua NevettBBC News Koinei noa iho ētahi o ngā tāwhiti pūrongo o te taonga o Diego Maradona. I mate te ata whutupōro o Āhiana i te 60 i tērā wiki, ka mahue i a ia tētahi tawhito pūtea uaua e pāoro ana i tōna oranga whaiaro i ētahi wā. Mai i te matenga o Maradona, kua nui te taurangi mo ana taonga me nga uri e whai wāhi ana ki tetahi wahi. He whanau nui a Maradona, e waru neke atu ranei nga tamariki i roto i nga tau maha o nga wahine rereke e ono. E tūmanakohia ana kia wehewehea tōna taonga tuku iho ki waenganui i aua tamariki. Engari kāore he pūrongo o te wira, e kī ana ngā tohunga ture me ngā kaipūrongo o Āhiana ka tawhiti rawa atu te tuku iho. E tūmanako ana rātau ki tētahi pakanga kōti roa e tārewa ana i ngā tautohetohe whānau, ngā whakamātautau DNA me ngā kerēme ohorere o te pāpātanga i te wā e whāia ana e ngā rōia ki te tatau i te uara pono o te pānga o Maradona. "E matapae ana ahau he raruraru te tukanga tuku iho," te kī a Iraia Kier Joffe, he rōia i te pūmatua o Āhiana, o Aotearoa. "E whakaaro ana ahau ka roa te wā ki te kōmaka." Na, ko wai nga tamariki a Maradona? Ko ngā whakakitenga pāpātanga he kaupapa noa iho o te oranga ātaahua o Maradona. I tētahi wā ka whakakata tētahi o ana tamāhine i te kaiwaenga whakaeke o mua ka tata tonu te tīmata o te tīma whutupōro 11 me tana uri e tipu haere tonu ana. He maha nga tau i whakakāhore ai a Maradona i te whai tamariki i tua atu i a Gianinna, 31, me Dalma, 33, he tamāhine rāua tahi me tana wahine tuatahi ko Claudia Villafañe, i whakarerea e ia i te tau 2003 i muri i te tata ki te 20 tau o te mārenatanga. I te mutunga, ka whakaae te toa o te Ipu o te Ao ki ētahi atu tamariki tokoono. I mōhio a Maradona ki a Diego Junior, 34, me Jana, 24, hei kikokiko me tōna toto i te waenganui o nga tau 2010 i muri i nga whawhai kōti ki o rātau whaea, i whai take ai ia. Kaore he tautohetohe matua pērā i te whānautanga o tana tama tuarua i te tau 2013, e whitu tau te pakeke o Diego Fernando. Kātahi ka puta mai he whanaketanga ohorere i te tau 2019, i te kīanga a te rōia o Maradona kua whakaae ia ki te whakaae ki te pāpātanga o ngā tamariki tokotoru i whānau mai i Cuba, i reira ia i noho ai i ngā tau maha mai i te tau 2000 e whakararuraru ana i tētahi tikanga cocaine. Mā tēnā tātau e whakahōu ai. Ināianei, e rua anō - ko ngā Āhiana Santiago Lara, 19 me Magalí Gil, 23 - e whakapono ana ko Maradona to rātau matua. E kī ana rāua kei te mahi ā-ture rāua ki te whakatū i tēnei, e hiahiatia ana e rāua hei tono i tētahi wāhanga o te taonga tuku iho o Maradona. He pono, kua tono kē te rōia o Tāne Rāna ki tētahi kōti kia hukihuki i te tinana o te kaiwhutupōro ki te kohikohi tauira mō tētahi whakamātautau DNA. Ahakoa rā, ahakoa i whakatūria e Tēnā Rāna rāua ko Ms Gil he hononga matua, kāore i te mārama te nui o te whiwhinga o rāua kainga. He aha te uara whakaaro o te taonga a Maradona? Kaore he korero whanui mo nga taonga o Maradona, engari i roto i etahi ripoata taurangi, e rua nga inenga i whakamahia e nga pu papaho. Ko te tuatahi e whakatau tata ana i te uara katoa o nga rawa katoa a Maradona, mai i ana motokā hākinakina ki ana taonga. Ko tētahi taonga tuku iho i waenganui i te $75m (£55m) me te $100m tētahi whakatau tata kua whakahuatia whānuitia e te pāpāho o Āhiana. I tohutorotia tēnei, me te kore e whakahuatia ki tētahi pūtake, i roto i tētahi tuhinga i tuhia e Julio Chiappetta, he kaipānui hākinakina o Āhiana e tata ana ki a Maradona. Ko te ngahuru tuarua ko te wāriu kupenga a Maradona, arā, ko te tapeke katoa o ngā mea a te tangata (ā rātou rawa) tango i ngā mea e nama ana rātou (ā rātou taunahatanga). He $500,000 te wāriu kupenga a Maradona i te wā o tōna matenga, e ai ki te Celebrity Net Worth, he paetukutuku e pūrongo ana i te taonga o ngā tāngata rongonui. E kī ana te paetukutuku e hāngai ana whakatau tata ki te "tātari pūtea, rangahau mākete, me ngā pūtake o roto". Ko ētahi o ngā rawa e pūrongotia whānuitia ana e Maradona ko: E kī ana a Celebrity Net Worth i whiwhi a Maradona i "tekau miriona tāra mai i ngā utu me ngā tautoko" i a ia e mahi ana hei kaitākaro me te kaiwhakahaere. Ko tētahi wāhanga nui o tēnei rawa i ahu mai i tana kirimana ki te karapu whutupōro Itari o Napoli, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo o te tau 1990 a te New York Times, i tāia e ia te utu e $3m, me tētahi atu $8m ki te $10m i roto i ngā tautoko. I hangaia, i whati hoki a Itari i a Maradona, ka hoatu ki tētahi ringa, ka ngana ki te tango i tētahi. I te tau 2005, i kī te kāwanatanga o Itari e nama ana a Maradona i te 37.2m hōro (£32m; $48.6m) i roto i ngā tāke kāore anō kia utua e hoki ana ki ōna rā o Napoli. Tae noa mai ki tēnei rā, kāore anō kia utua te nuinga o te nama. Kāore a Maradona i whakaae ki te utu, ā, mehemea i ora roa ia, tērā pea ka haere tonu ki te mahi pēnā. Ahakoa rā, he taunaha nui tonu te pire tāke. I whakaurua tēnei ki roto i te whakatau tata a Celebrity Net Worth, nā reira ko te āhua iti rawa o te $500,000. I kī tētahi hoa, ko te kairīpoata o Āhiana, ko Luis Ventura, kāore anō kia manakohia e ngā tikanga whakapau moni a Maradona. I te putanga mai i runga i te hōtaka pouaka whakaata Fantino a la tarde, ka pātaitia a Ventura mehemea kua "mate rawakore" a Maradona. "He tino rawakore," te kī a Ventura. "He pai ki a ia te whakapau moni, a, no te tono moni a tētahi ki a ia, ka hoatu e ia." Me pēhea te tiritiri i tōna kainga tupu? Puta noa i tona oranga, he tautohetohe tino tūmatanui a Maradona ki nga hoa o mua me ana tamariki, me nga taha katoa e whakaputa ana i a raatau amuamu i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, i te pouaka whakaata Argentina ranei. Ko te hauora me te taonga o Maradona i te nuinga o te wā ko ngā pūtake māhanga o te tautohetohe. I te Whiringa-a-rangi 2019, hei tauira, i korero a Maradona ki tana taonga tuku iho i muri i tana tamahine a Gianinna i whakapuaki i nga awangawanga mo tona hauora i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. "E kī atu ana ahau ki a koe katoa e kore au e waiho i tētahi mea, ka hoatu e au," te kī a Maradona i roto i tētahi ataata i tukuna ki YouTube. Heoi anō, i raro i te ture o Āhiana, ka taea anake e te tangata te hoatu i te tuatoru o ā rātou rawa i roto i te wira, me te toenga ka tukuna atu ki ā rātou tamariki, hoa rānei. I te mea kāore a Maradona i mahue i tētahi wira, ā, kāore ōna hoa i te wā o te matenga, me whiwhi ana tamariki i tētahi wāhanga ōrite o te pānga katoa. "Ehara te ahurea o Āhiana i te whakatakoto wira. Ko te nuinga o te iwi kāore," te kī a Tēnā Joffe. I whakapā atu te BBC ki te rōia o Maradona, a Matías Morla, ki te pātai mō te wira me ētahi atu take tuku iho, engari i te wā o te tānga, kāore he whakautu. Ki te kore he wira, ka āhua hangarau ngā mea. Ka taea e nga uri o Maradona - e mohiotia ana, kaore ranei - te whakaputa kerēme mo tetahi wahi o tana taonga tupu i te kōti e iwa nga ra i muri i tona matenga i te 25 o Whiringa. Ko ngā pūrongo pāpāho o Āhiana e huatau ana ko Jana, te tamāhine tuatoru a Maradona, te tuatahi i mahi i te Tāite. Kātahi ka whakatauria e te kaiwhakawā "ko wai e mau ana i te aha" i mua i te whakaputa i te mea e mōhiotia ana ko te whakapuakitanga o ngā uri tupu, ka kī atu a Sebastian Limeres, he rōia e tohunga ana ki te tuku iho. Ka pau pea ngā marama i tēnei. I tēnei wā, "kāore e taea e mātou te matapae mēnā ka pai te haere o ngā uri tupu", te kī a Tēnā Limeres. Heoi anō, kāore e taea e koe te kōwhiri i tō whānau. Tērā pea ka kī ētahi, nā te ringa o te Atua i whakatau ai. Ētahi atu kōrero mō Diego Maradona:

title: 'I tēnei wā, kei te taraiwa ngā kaitito waiata i a Heke'
summary: Ko ngā kaitito waiata i muri i ētahi o ngā takitahi nui rawa o UK "e taraiwa ana i a Heke" kia tutuki ai ngā mutunga, kua korerotia ki ngā MP.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC kaipānui pūoro o Fiona Bevan, nāna i tuhi waiata mō One Direction, Steps me Lewis Capaldi, i kī he tokomaha ngā kaituhi e raruraru ana nā te āhua o te utu a ngā ratonga roma i ngā royalti. I whakaaturia e Bevan kua riro i a ia te £100 noa iho mō te tuhi tahi i tētahi riu i runga i te pukaemi tau tuatahi a Kiriata Minogue, Disco. "Kāore e taea e ngā kaitito waiata tino angitu o te ao te utu i a rātau reti," tana tāpiri mai. "I tēnei wā, kei te taraiwa ngā kaitito waiata i a Kiriata. He tino hakaha." 'Tino ohorere' i hoatu e Bevan he whakaaturanga ki tētahi uiuinga a te komiti tīpako mamati, ahurea, pāpāho, tākaro hoki ki te ohaoha o te roma, ā, ināianei e pūkete ana mō neke atu i te toru hauwhā o ngā moni whiwhinga mahi pūoro i te UK. I rongo ngā MP mai i ngā kaiwhakatangitangi tae atu ki a Chic's Nile Rodgers me te saxophonist Soweto Kinch, tae atu ki ngā kaiwhakahaere pūoro a Maria Forte me Kwame Kwaten. I kī a Rodgers kāore ia i titiro ki ana moni roma i mua i te taiepa Covid-19 "nā te mea he nui rawa aku moni whakatere ka taea e au te tautoko i taku rōpū katoa". I muri i tana titiro ki ngā whika i tēnei tau, ka "tino ohorere" a ia. "Kāore mātou i te mōhio he aha te wāriu o te roma," te kī a te kaiwhakatangitangi, me te tāpiri "kāore he huarahi e kitea ai e koe," nā ngā whakaaetanga kāore i te kitea i waenganui i ngā tapanga pūkete me ngā ratonga roma. "Me whai pūataata tātau," tana kī atu ki te komiti. I kī te kaiwaiata me te kaiwhakanao e pupuri ana ngā tapanga pūkete tae atu ki te 82% o ngā royalti ka whiwhi rātou i ngā ratonga roma pēnei i Spotify, Apple Music me Amazon Music, e karanga ana i te pūnaha "he wawau noa iho". A, i whakapaea e ia nga tapanga matua mo te pupuri moni i nga kaiwaiata. "E titiro ana ahau ki ngā tapanga pūkete hei hoa mōku. A, ko te mea whakamere, i ia wā ka arotaupū ahau i ōku hoa, ka kitea e au he moni. I ia wā. "A, i ētahi wā, he mīharo, te nui o te moni." I kī a Rodgers, ko ōna hua ko Chic's Le Freak, Madonna's Like A Virgin me David Bowie's Let's Dance, i kī me huri te umanga i te āhua o te tātaitanga o ngā utu roma. I tēnei wā, ka kautetia ia whakatangi waiata hei hoko, e hoatu ana i ngā tapanga te tiri o te moni whiwhinga a te raiona, tana kī. Engari i haere tonu a Rodgers ki te tautohe he rite kē atu te roma ki te pāohotanga reo irirangi, ki te raihana rānei o te hopukanga taketake, e hoatu ai ki ngā kaiwaiata mō te 50% o ngā royalti. "Kua whakatau takitahi ngā tapanga e whakaarotia ana he hoko tētahi roma nā te mea ka whakamōrahitia ā rātou hua," tana kī. "Me whakahōu e ngā kaiwaiata me ngā kaitito waiata ngā whiti i roto i ā rātou kirimana hei whakaata i te āhua pono o te whakapaunga o ā rātou waiata - arā, mā tētahi raihana. He mea e tono ana te tangata i [ngā ratonga roma]". Heoi anō, i tūmanako a Rodgers ka taea e ngā tapanga, ngā ratonga roma, ngā kaituhi me ngā kaiwhakatangitangi te whakarite i tētahi mahi tika ake; ka tono ki ngā MP kia meinga te UK hei "kaiārahi" ki te whakarite i te mākete roma. "Ināianei he neke whakaahua whakaahua nui tēnei mō ngā kaitito waiata me ngā kaiwaiata puta noa i te ao," tana kī. I kī te kaiwhakatangitangi jazz i whakatauria e Mercury, a Soweto Kinch, he tino hira te wā o te uiui i muri i te "whakawāteatanga" a Covid-19 i te tirohanga pūoro ora. I kī a ia kua whakatakotoria e te roma tētahi uaua ki ngā tūmomo pūoro me ngā kaiwhakatangitangi whakamātautau, nā te arotahi nui ki ngā pūoro tūtohi. "E kore rawa mātou e whai a Kate Bush, a David Bowie rānei i roto i te rauropi pūoro o tēnei rā, nā te mea he tino mōrearea," tana kī. "Kei te hanga waiata koe mō ngā rārangipāpāho, kāore koe i te tango i ngā mōrea pūoro whakamīharo tērā pea i tangohia e Bowie i ngā tau kua taha nei." Ka haere tonu te uiui ki te tau 2021, ā, ka rongo i ngā "tirohanga a ngā tohunga umanga, ngā kaiwaiata me ngā tapanga pūkete me ngā pūhara roma anō". I te wātū tuatahi i tērā marama, ka kī atu te kaiwhakatangitangi o Nadine Shah ki ngā MP "he tokomaha ngā hoa pūoro" i mataku ki te hoatu whakaaturanga "nā te mea kāore mātou e hiahia ki te ngaro i te manakohanga ki ngā pūhara roma me ngā tapanga matua". Hei urupare, ka whakatūpato te manukura o te komiti a Julian Knight MP i ngā kamupene kia kaua e whakararuraru i te uiui. "He maha ngā pūtake rerekē i korerotia mai ki a mātau kua manawapa ētahi o ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te kōrero mai ki a mātau nā te mea e wehi ana rātau ka mahia he mahi ki a rātau ki te kōrero rātau i te wāhi tangata," te kī a Naiti. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te kī atu ka tino hina ta mātau tirohanga mehemea he whakaaturanga tā mātou o tētahi tangata e whakararuraru ana i ngā kaiwhakaatu ki tētahi o a mātau uiui. Kaua tētahi tangata e pā ki te whakararuraru mo te kōrero ki tētahi komiti paremata, ā, ko te tangata e tūkino ana ki tētahi o a tātau kaiwhakaatu, ka mōrearea te whakahawea ki tēnei Whare. "E kore tēnei komiti e whakararuraru pērā, ā, e kore e whakararuraru ki te whakaingoa me te whakamā i tētahi tangata i kitea e uru ana ki taua ngohe." Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakairihia e Hāpana te tāpaetanga hokohoko tiketike i te tau 2012
summary: Kua whakairihia e Tiapanī tētahi tāpaetanga hokohoko tiketike mō te 2012, i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā kawenga ake ki Uropi me Haina.
text: I piki te āputa hokohoko ki te 6.9tn iene ($78bn; £49bn) mo te tau katoa, ka kī te manatu pūtea. I muri i ngā kī taurangi pōti a te Pirimia hou o Tiapanī, a Shinzo Abe ki te whakarewa i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, me te whakanui moni o mua tata nei a te pēke matua. I kī ngā kaiwawao tērā pea kua heke te tāpaetanga, i te mea e tūmanakohia ana kia pai ake ngā kawenga ake i ngā marama e heke mai nei. "I te pikinga ake o ngā kawenga ake nā te whakaoranga ā-nuku i roto i te āhua o te ao whānui, tērā pea ka tīngongo te tāpaetanga hokohoko a Tiapanī i ngā marama e heke mai nei," te kī a Tatsushi Shikano, mai i Mitusbishi UFJ Morgan i Tokyo. "Ahakoa kāore e taea te tārere ki te nui o tēnei tau i te mea he iti noa iho te whakaoranga kaweake, ā, ka noho teitei tonu ngā kawemai nā te nui o ngā utu kawemai hinu." E whitu marama whai muri kua hinga ngā kawenga ake o Tiapanī. I hinga ngā tukunga i te 5.8% i Hakihea, i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Ko tētahi o ngā take ko te kaha o te yen, e nui ake ai te utu o ngā hua ki rāwāhi. Kua pā hoki ngā kawekawe Tiapanī ki te tono pōturi mai i Uropi utaina i te nama, tae atu ki tētahi tautohetohe rohe ki Haina, nāna i āki te whakapōhēhē i ngā hua Hapanihi, pēnei i ngā motokā, i te tuawhenua. Hei rutu i te kaha o te yen, me ētahi atu take e anga ana ki te whakahaerenga pēnei i te nuinga o nga tau o te whakahekenga, kua pēhi a Tēnā Abe i te Pēke o Tiapanī (BOJ) ki te whakatinana i ngā kaupapahere whakaiti moni taekaha. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka tāruatia e te BOJ tana ūnga utunga moni ki te 2% me te kī ka whakatinanatia te hoko rawa tūwhera mai i te 2014. Ahakoa i mua i te pānuitanga kua hinga te iene i te 7% ki te tāra US i roto i ngā marama e rua kua hipa mai i ngā teitei pūkete o mua, i te mea e tūmanako ana ngā kaiwhakangao ki te nekehanga. E hiahia ana te pūngao me ngā kawenga ake e hinga ana, kei te raruraru a Tiapanī ki te pikinga o ngā kawemai, i a ia e āhua ana ki te whakatutuki i ōna whakaritenga pūngao. I piki ake ngā kawemai i te 1.9% i Tīma i whakaritea ki te tau i mua, i whakaaturia ngā raraunga o te minita, me ngā kawemai pūngao e pupuhi ana i te 34%. I muri i te wetewete tuimotu o ōna hiko hiko karihi i muri i te rū me te tsunami i te tau 2011, me kawemai e Tiapanī he kora mai i rāwāhi. Na te mōrearea māori i whakaoho he whakarewa i te tipu o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, nāna i whakaoho te whakaaro ārai karihi kaha i te whenua. I whakawhirinaki a Tiapanī ki te pūngao karihi mō te 30% o tōna whakatipuranga hiko. Ko te taraiwa o ngā kawemai pūngao tētahi o ngā take matua i whakairihia ai e Tiapanī tana tāpaetanga hokohoko tuatahi i roto i ngā tau neke atu i te 30 tau i te 2011 o te 2.56tn yen.

title: Ka rahua te Royal Mail ki te whakatū i te pūkete £50m Ofcom fine
summary: Kāore i taea e Royal Mail te whai pūkete £50m mai i Ofcom i hurihia.
text: Ko te whaina, i pānuitia i a Aotearoa 2018, e pā ana ki ana mahi i te tau 2014 i te wā e ngana ana a Whistl, e mōhiotia ana ko TNT, kia noho hei tauwhāinga tuatahi i roto i te tukunga mēra ā-taiao. I whai te tūhuratanga a Ofcom i tētahi amuamu a Whistl kua tūkinotia e Royal Mail tōna tūnga mākete kaha. I werohia e Royal Mail te whaina, engari i te Tūtira, ka ākiritia e te Rūnanga Pīra Whakataetae tana tono. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o Ofcom: "I kitea e mātou i whai a Royal Mail i tētahi rautaki tika o te whakahāweatanga utu ki a Whistl, koia anake tōna tauwhāinga nui mō te tuku mēra pakihi. " He kawenga motuhake tā Royal Mail ki te whakarite kāore tōna whanonga i te ārai whakataetae. "E tūmanako ana mātou mā tā mātou whaina, kua tautokona katoatia e te Rūnanga, ka tino nui te mahi a te Royal Mail me ētahi atu kamupene kaha i a rātau mahi ā-ture." I kitea e te tūhuratanga a Ofcom e piki ana te utu o te Royal Mail i te tau 2014, ko te tikanga o ngā kiritaki ā-taiao, pērā i a Whistl, e hiahia ana ki te whakataetae me utu he utu nui ake i ngā wāhi e toe ana i whakamahia ai e ia te Royal Mail mō te tukunga. I kī a Whistl e pai ana kua tautokona te whakahaere a Ofcom. "He tino kino te pānga o ngā mahi a Royal Mail ki te pūtea penapena, me te hauora whakataetae o te wāhanga poutāpeta o UK," te kī a Whistl. I kī a Whistl ināianei kei te titiro ki ana kōwhiringa hei whakatau mēnā ka rapu tūkinotanga. I kī a Royal Mail i pouri i te whakataunga a te rūnanga. "Kei te whakaaro mātou i ngā kōwhiringa ā-ture katoa, tae atu ki te rapu whakaaetanga ki te pīra, ki te tono hoki kia utua te whiu, ā, ka noho tārewa i tētahi tono. " Ka homai e mātou he whakahōutanga ina oti i a mātou tā mātou arotakenga ā-ture," tana kī. I tautohe kua whakarewaina e ia ngā utu hei pare i te Ratonga Ao Whānui, ko te tikanga ka utua te pou i te mokatere ōrite, ahakoa te wāhi e tukuna ana puta noa i te UK. Kāore i rite ki ōna tauwhāinga, me haere tonu te whakarato i taua utu. I pānuitia te whakataunga CAT i te tono a Royal Mail ki te Kōti Tiketike kia whakamutua tētahi tuki poutāpeta, e kī ana he "tūtohutanga tūpono" tā te pōti o ngā kaimahi. E whakawehi ana te tuki ki te whakararuraru i te pōti poutāpeta i te whakahaerenga ki te pōti nui, tae atu ki te poutāpeta Kirihimete. E kī ana a Royal Mail ko te pōti tuki "he ture, nō reira, he kore, he kore", engari ko te Uniana o ngā Kaimahi Whakawhitiwhiti "e whakakāhore ana" i te kerēme a Royal Mail.

title: Pōti US: E rapu ana te whakahau a te puku i tētahi wāhanga o te tatau anō i Wisconsin
summary: Me rapu a Perehitini Donald Trump i tētahi wāhanga o ngā pōti i te āhua o Wisconsin, e 20,000 ngā pōti e whakaritea ana e tana tauwhāinga ko Joe Biden.
text: I ngā haora i mua i te rā kati o te Wenerei, ka kī te whakahau a te Pāpāho e hiahia ana ki tētahi tatau anō i ngā takiwā o Milwaukee me Dane, e whakapae ana i ngā whakahēnga. Kua whakapuakina e Tēnā Puhi ngā kerēme tinihanga kāore i te mōhiotia, ā, kāore e pai ana ki te tīmata i tētahi tukunga. E kii ana a Mr Biden ki te whakaroa i te tauwhiro ka pakaru te urupare a te mate uruta o Amerika. Kua whakaputaina e te whakahau a te Pāpāho he kōhukihuki o ngā whakawā e whakataetae ana i ngā hua i ngā tūnga matua, ahakoa e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere pōti kāore he whakaaturanga o ngā tūtohutanga whānui. Ahakoa te kore whakatika, tae atu ki te hawhe o ngā kaipōti o Te Pākehā e whakapono ana ki te kerēme a te perehitini i whakawāteatia te pōti ki a ia, e huatau ana tētahi poipoi a Kōrero/Ipsos. Ko te Perehitini whiriwhiri a Biden, he Democrat, e whakaarohia ana kua toa i te pōti kaingākautia e neke atu i te 5.6 miriona ngā pōti - 3.6 ōrau piro. I roto i te pūnaha kāreti pōti o Amerika e whakatau ana i te perehitini, e 306 ana pōti ki te 232 o Tēnā Puhi. Me tahuri e te perehitini ngā hua i roto i ngā tūnga e toru neke atu rānei kia toa ai i te pōti, e kī ana ngā kaitirotiro he mea tawhito. Kua tū tētahi tatau ā-ringa i Hōria, e 14,000 ngā pōti i mua i a Tēnā Biden. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakaputaina ngā hua ā muri ake nei i te Tāite. He aha te mea e haere ana i Wisconsin? I raro i te ture o Wisconsin, kei a Tēnā Trump te mana ki te tono kōrero anō nā te mea he iti iho i te 1% te tawhē o te toa a Tāne Biden engari he nui ake i te 0.25%. Heoi anō, me mātua taupoki tana whakahau i nga utu o te mahi. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere kāwanatanga i te Wenerei kua whiwhi rātau i te $3m (£2.2m) mai i te whakahau a te Pāpāho hei utu i ngā utu o te tatau anō, e rua wiki te roa. I kī te Komihana Pōti o Wisconsin i te Mane ka pau te utu o te tatauranga katoa i te $7.9m. I roto i tana tono mō tētahi wāhanga o te tatau anō, ka whakapae te whakahau pōti anō a te Pāpā kua whakarerekētia, kua tukuna hētia, ā, kua karohia ngā ture tuakiri kaipōti. Kāore i homai he whakaaturanga. Ko Milwaukee rāua ko Dane, ko ngā wāhi tūturu o te Manapori, e tohu tahi ana i neke atu i te tuatoru o ngā pōti a Tēnā Biden, i pūrongotia e te Milwaukee Journal Sentinel. I Milwaukee, i toa a Mr Biden i te 317,270 pōti ki te 134,357 i te Takiwā o Dane ko te tawhē ko te 260,185 ki te 78,800 e manakohia ana e Mr Biden. E tautoko ana te kōrero anō i ngā tūmanako o ngā kaiwawao o Te Pāpāho, he matapihi kotahi rā tā ngā rōia whakahau a Te Pāpā ki te kōnae mō tētahi tatau anō i Wisconsin - ā, i whai painga i taua mea. Heoi anō, e hiahia ana rātau ki te arotake i ngā pōti i roto i ngā takiwā Manapori e rua huri noa i te taone kāreti o Madison me te taone nui o Milwaukee. E tohu ana tērā ehara te take tūturu i muri i te nekehanga kia tae ki tētahi tātaitanga tika o ngā pōti, engari kia kitea ngā mea e whakapae ana rātou he mahi tinihanga kaipōti i ngā wāhi e whakahaeretia ana e te Manapori. E whā tau ki muri, he tatau anō te kāwanatanga i pūteatia e te Rōpū Kākāriki i hua ai te neke o ētahi rau pōti noa iho.
