Nā te mea neke atu i te 20,000 ngā makatea o te Tūruhi i te kāwanatanga, ko ngā tatau anō - tētahi wāhanga, kī rānei - te āhua nei ka waiho tonu a Joe Biden ki runga ina kōrerotia, ka oti katoa. Heoi anō, ka whakaaetia e te tono a te Pāpāho kia haere tonu te whakahau ki te whakapuaki kei te mahi i ngā mea katoa e taea ana ki te whakamatautau i ngā hua pōti, e tiaki ana i ngā tūmanako a ngā kaiwawao o te Pāpāho puta noa i te whenua. Ahakoa rā, kei te tika te karaka. I roto i ngā wiki tata nei, ka whakamanatia e ngā kāwanatanga ngā hua. Ka haere tonu te hurihuri pōturi ki te whakatūnga o Biden i te Hānuere, ahakoa e whakaae ana te perehitini, kāore rānei. I te rā i muri i te pananga a Tēnā Puhi i tētahi mana haumarutanga ā-ipurangi i whakahē i ana kerēme tinihanga kaipōti. I kī a Perehitini Trump i "whakamutua" e ia te rangatira o te Cyber-security and Infrastructure Security Agency (Cisa) mō ana kōrero "tino hē" mō te taparenga pōti. I whakaritea e Tēnā Pirihitini te riri o te Whare Mā i runga i tētahi paetukutuku Cisa e kiia nei ko Te Mana Rongo, nāna i whakakāhore ngā mōhiotanga pōti, ko te nuinga o ērā i whakanuia e Tēnā Puhi. Na te whakakore a Tēnā Puhi ki te whakaae ki te hinganga me te tīmata i tētahi tauwhiro hiko i riri ai a Joe Biden me ētahi atu Pāremata. Kua whakatupato a Mr Biden ki te kore e whakariterite ki te whakahaere i te pakarutanga o te coronavirus, "ka mate pea te tangata" ki te kore e puta he tauwhiro maeneene. Ko te pokapū kāwanatanga e whakarewa ana i te tukanga - te General Services Administration (GSA), e whakahaeretia ana e tētahi kaiwhakarite a Trump - kāore anō kia mōhio ki a Tēnā Biden me tōna hoa whakahaere ko Kamala Harris hei toa o te pōti 2020. He pēhea te haere o ētahi atu whakamātautau pōti a Te Puhi? E anga ana te whakahau a te Pāpāho ki tētahi rā kati o te 8 o Hakihea ki te whakatika i ngā tautohetohe pōti katoa. Kua tautuhia ngā kitenga whaimana kia whakaūngia ina tūtaki te Kāreti Pōti o Amerika i te 14 o Hakihe. I tēnei wā, i kī ngā kaiwhakahaere pōti o Hōria i tētahi tatau anō o te kāwanatanga i pānuitia i te Rāitema kāore i tūmanakohia kia hurihia te wikitōria o Tēnā Biden i te kāwanatanga, ki te whakarato rānei i ētahi whakaaturanga hei tārua i ngā kerēme tinihanga a Tēnā Puhi. Engari i kitea e te arotaupū e hia mano ngā pōti kāore anō kia tatauria i mua, e kī ana te kaiwhakahaere pūnaha pōti o te kāwanatanga ka whakawhāititia te ārahi a Tēnā Biden i runga i a Tēnā Trump mai i te 14,156 ki te 12,781. I te 4 o Whiringa ā-Rangi, ka ngana tētahi kōti a te Pāpāho ki te tatari i te tatau, e kiia ana he raruraru ki te tukatuka pōti, engari i ākiritia e te kaiwhakawā a tērā rā. I Arāna i te Wenerei, ka kī te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Keiti Hobbs, he Democrat, e whiwhi ana ia i ngā tuma tukino, i a ia e whakapae ana i te perehitini me ngā mema o te Rōpū Nui mō te hora i ngā mōhiotanga mō ngā hua. I Te Wenerei, ka tono te whakahau a te Pāpāho ki tētahi kaiwhakawā kia whakahokia rātau ki roto i a rātau kerēme whakawā i taka e rātau i te Rātapu. E hiahia ana rātau ki te whakaora i ta rātau kerēme i āraia hētia ngā kaitirotiro o te Pākehā kia kaua e mātakitaki i te tatau pōti. I Michigan i te Tūrei, kāore ngā mema o tētahi poari pōti ā-rua i whakaae ki te whakamana i te toa a Tāne Biden i taua āhua, kia hoki whakamuri noa iho i muri i te hīanga. I whakahē nga Pākehā e rua i runga i te poari mema whā ki ngā whakahēnga pōti iti i Te Takiwā o Wayne, te kāinga ki Te Takiwā o Te Wānanga. Engari i muri i te whakapaetanga a Democrats i a rātau e ngana ana ki te whakakore i ngā kaipōti i te taone pango nui. Hei whakararuraru, ka puta i te poari tētahi taumira e tono ana kia whakahaeretia e te hēkeretari Manapori o Te Kāwanatanga tētahi arotaupū o ngā mana whakahaere e pā ana. I tēnei wā, kua whakaputaina e te rōpū Pākehā o Nevada me te whakahau a te Pāpā tētahi atu whakawā e wero ana i te toa a Tēnā Biden i reira. E kī ana - kāore he whakaaturanga - "ko te tinihanga me te tūkino e kore ai e tika ngā hua o te pōti o Nevada". E tono ana te mahi ture hou ki tētahi kaiwhakawā kia whakapuaki i a Tēnā Puhi "toa o te pōti i Nevada", tērā rānei, ka whakakorea ngā hua.

title: Bed shortages lead to patient 'harm' in South Tees
summary: Kua hoatu ki te tiaki nui i tētahi whakawhirinaki hōhipera te whakatauranga kino rawa atu i muri i te "tūkinotanga" ki ngā tūroro nā te mea kāore i wātea ngā moenga.
text: South Tees Hospitals Trust's intensive care was rated inadequate following the inspection of Middlesbrough's James Cook University Hospital and Northallerton's Friarage Hospital. I whakaarahia e nga kaitirotiro nga awangawanga mo te mana whakapokenga me te iti o nga kaimahi. I kī te whakawhirinaki he maha ngā take i roto i te pūrongo kua whakahuatia. Ko te tiaki takenui mō ngā tūroro e whakawehi ana i te ora, ā, e hiahia ana ki te aroturuki auau, i te nuinga o te wā i roto i ngā wae tohunga. 'Ngā mahi nui' I haere te Komihana Kounga Tiaki (CQC), e whakahaere ana, e tirotiro ana i ngā ratonga hauora me ngā ratonga tiaki pāpori i Ingarangi, ki ngā hōhipera i Hānuere me Hui tanguru. E kī ana: "I pā mai he tūkino ki ngā tūroro mai i ngā mahi nui e toru nā te mea kāore i wātea ngā moenga tiaki nui. " Kāore ngā kaimahi i te pūrongo i ngā iti kaimahi me tō rātou pānga, ā, ko ngā pakaru whakahaere whakapokenga nā te kore e taea e te ratonga te wehe i ngā tūroro me te whakapokenga." I kī te CQC i ōna kaitirotiro "i kitea he kore whakaūnga e tika ana ngā taumata kaimahi nēhi ki te tiaki haumaru i ngā tūroro". I tāpiritia: "Ahakoa e mōhio ana ngā kaiārahi ki ētahi o ngā mōrea, ngā take me ngā uauatanga kāore i mahia i ngā wā katoa." Kua whakatauria e ia te tiaki nui i ngā hōhipera e rua hei Koretake, te whakatauranga iti rawa e taea ana, ā, i whakahekea te whakatauranga whānui o te whakawhirinaki kia hiahiatia he whakapai ake, te kī a te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata. Ahakoa i mau tonu ōna taipitopito tuakiri mō te tiaki me te urupare, i whakatārewatia rangitahitia te Hōhipera o Northallerton, A&E, i ia Poutāpeta nā te haumarutanga tūroro me te iti o ngā kaimahi. I kī te kaitirotiro matua o ngā hōhipera, a Prof Ted Baker, me "tere te mahi". I kī te whakawhirinaki i kitea ngā kitenga a te CQC, ā, kua "oti kētia" ētahi mahi. I tāpiri mai a Siobhan McArdle, te rangatira nui: "I roto i ngā wiki e toru e whai ake nei ka whakaotia e mātou tētahi mahere mahi whānui hei whakatau i ngā take tūturu katoa."

title: Coronavirus: Ko nga umanga o Swindon i 'awangawanga' i te pikinga o nga keehi
summary: E kī ana ngā rangatira pakihi i Swindon kei te rongo rātou i te "mōrearea" me te "māharahara" i muri i te taurua o ngā pāpātanga whakapokenga coronavirus i te taone i roto i te wiki.
text: Ko te taraiwa o ngā kēhi i te taone e whakahaeretia ana e te tīmatatanga i tētahi pokapū tuari kai o Tiorangi. Ko nga whika a Public Health England (PHE) i whakaatu i te tere o nga keehi hou mo ia 100,000 tangata i te taone ko te 48.6, mai i te 19.8 i te wiki kua hipa. Ko te pikinga nui rawa atu o ngā kēhi hou i Ingarangi i te wiki ki te 31 o Hōngongoi. I kī ngā rangatira pārekareka me ngā wharekai i te taone e tūmanako ana rātau e kore rātau e whakahaua kia kati anō i o rātau tatau i ngā wiki noa iho i muri i te whakatuwheratanga anō. I kī a Pascal Aiguier, mai i te Wharekai o Jack i Taone Tawhito, kua "pūmau" te hokohoko mai i tana whakatuwheratanga anō i tērā marama, ā, ka "tino whakararuraru" mēnā ka whakaūngia ngā tikanga pākaha. Ka kī a ia: "He āhua mōrearea ahau. E tino mōhio ana ahau ki ngā hātepe me whai mātou. "He tino whakamā mēnā me kati anō mātou, nā reira kei te whakawhiti tonu ahau i ōku maihao." I kī a Daniel Raisey, mai i The Victoria Inn: "I makaia kētia e mātau a mātau kararehe pia katoa i to mātau maukati i mua. " Ki te mahi anō he whana tāpiri i roto i ngā niho." Wanda Hawkins, from The Pantry Coffee Shop, added: "We've been thinking about if we go back into lockdown, but we'd still be able to open. " We've got our PPE in place, and restrictions in place, so we feel it will be OK. Ka purei noa iho mātou mā te taringa." I kī a Jim Robbins o te Kaunihera o Swindon Borough i "tino māia" ia i roto i te wāhi XPO Logistics. Kua whakatangihia e te MP Tory o Swindon South, a Robert Buckland, te tūponotanga o tētahi raka paetata, e kī ana: "Ahakoa he mahi nui, he tino nui tēnei, kāore he whakaaturanga e tohu ana kei roto a Swindon i tētahi tūnga ōrite ki ētahi atu taone kua kite i ngā tīmatanga hapori." I whakaūngia e te mana ā-rohe kua whakamātauria e tētahi wae whakamātautau pūkoro ngā kaimahi XPO Logistics mai i tērā Wenerei, ā, e 457 ngā tāngata i whakamātauria i te Paraire. E kī ana kei te tino mahi tahi te umanga me ngā tīma hauora tūmatanui o te rohe, ā, ko te tūmanako ka mutu te tīmatatanga i roto i te wiki.

title: Ko te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā kamupene Pākehā e 'pōturi ana'
summary: I pōturi te pūtea penapena i ngā umanga Pākehā tere i te hauwhā tuatahi o te tau 2021, kua kitea e te rangahau a KPMG.
text: E 21 ngā mahi pūtea pūtea (VC) i whakaaetia i roto i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o te tau, heke iho i te 23 i te hauwhā whakamutunga o te tau 2020. I hinga hoki te uara paheko o ngā mahi, mai i te £97.6m neke atu rānei ki te £64.3m. I taumira te whakataka ia hauwhā ki te UK katoa, i kite i tētahi pūkete £5.1bn i haumi i roto i ngā kamupene tipu tere. E whitu o ngā mahi a Pākehā mō ngā kamupene ā-Pākehā, kātahi anō ka rima i Etinitini me te toru i Aberdeen. Ka whai te hinganga i te tau i kitea ai e te wāhanga "tauine-ake" ngā taumata pūkete o te pūtea penapena me ngā mahi i Pākehā. I kī a Amy Burnett, ko te kaiwhakahaere hinonga tūmataiti matua o KPMG i Pākehā, ko ngā whika o te koata tuatahi he "tino ngoikore, he whakakino hoki", engari i tāpiritia he mārama tonu te hiahia o ngā kaiwhakangao ki ngā tauine o Pākehā. "I tētahi wā, i whakaekea e mātou te ia huri noa ki te mutunga o te tau 2020, me te rōrahi nui me te uara, ā, kei te kite mātou ināianei i tēnā pūmau me te whārite i a ia anō," tana kī. "Ka whakaatu anō ngā raraunga e hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakangao ki ngā wāhanga matua o Pākehā - te pūngao waro iti, te rongoā me te hangarau. "Mō ngā kaiārahi pakihi pūkenga, ka whakarato tērā i tētahi wā koura ki te urutau me te awhi i ngā huarahi ā muri ake."

title: Ko Piki-Z hei kaiwhakanao nui i runga i te kēmu ataata NBA 2K13
summary: Kua pānuitia a Piki-Z hei kaiwhakanao nui i te kēmu ataata NBA 2K13.
text: Kua kōwhiria e te kaiwaiata e 24 ngā waiata mō te whakaaturanga oro, e whā o ōna ake riu me ngā mahi pēnei i a Coldplay, Daft Punk, Kanye West me U2. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Piki-Z he "wā ahurei" ki te whakauru ki te māngai poitūkohu ā-tau. I kī a 2K Sports, te kamupene o Amerika e hanga ana i te kēmu, kua āwhina a Piki-Z ki te hoahoa i ngā tahua kēmu me ētahi atu huānga arokite. Ko ētahi o ngā waiata hei āhuahira i roto i te kēmu ko te Pānuitanga Ratonga Tūmatanui a Piki-Z, te Whakamīharo a Kanye West, te Whakarewatanga o U2, te Shove It a Santigold me te Viva La Vida a Coldplay. Neke atu i te rima miriona kape i hokona e te wāhanga o te kēmu o tērā tau, ā, i kī te 2k Sports ehara te whakauru a Piki-Z i te tautoko maimai noa iho. Ka tukua te taitara hōu, e whakaatu ana i ngā whetū o nāianei me ētahi o ngā tino nui o te tākaro, i te 2 o Whiringa ā-rangi. "He tino whakamīharo tana whakauru," te kī a Jason Argent o te kamupene. "He haora te roa o ngā wātū, ā, he tino taonga tōna tāurunga." He rangatira iti a Piki-Z o te tīma poitūkohu o New York, o Brooklyn Nets, ā, kātahi anō ka āwhina ki te hoahoa anō i te moko o te tīma. I tīmataria e te whetū te rārangi rangatira rap o tērā tau, he $37 miriona (£22m) ā, e whakaarotia ana he nui ake i te $460m (£288m). I whakatūria e ia te toa kākahu taone o Rocawear me te rangatira tapanga o Damon Dash, ā, kei a ia hoki tētahi mekameka iti o ngā pae hākinakina.

title: Whakarite ana ki te haruru papamuri o te kupenga
summary: Ko ngā mea katoa e mahia ana e koe i runga i te ipurangi ko ngā pōkai raraunga e rere ana i waenganui i tō mīhini me ngā pae e whakamahia ana e koe, ahakoa he tono i runga i te eBay, mā te whakamahi i tētahi pūkaha rapu, te mātakitaki rānei i ngā topenga ataata i YouTube.
text: Nā Mark WardTechnology correspondent, BBC News A, ka mutu tō mahi i taua mea, ka mutu te whakawhiti raraunga ara rua. Ko te mea pouri, ehara i te mea pai rawa te whakamahinga o te ipurangi. I te tipu o te kupenga, ka pērā hoki tēnei "ngunguru papamuri" o ngā ngohe raraunga nanakia. Ināianei ka hangaia e ia te 5.5 gigabits o ngā raraunga ia hēkona. Kāore i te nui ki te poke i ngā paipa o te kupenga, engari he haruru nui. He maha ngā pūtake e āwhina ana ki taua tapeke. Ko ngā pūmārō whirihora hē me ngā mōrearea mai i ngā whatunga tūmataiti he wāhanga o taua mea, engari ko te nuinga e hangaia ana e ngā huaketo rorohiko e rapu ana i ngā tūpāpaku hōu. "E kite ana mātou i te nui o ngā mīhini, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā he mīhini e whakahaere ana i ngā putanga maha o Windows, ehara i te mea kua whakapokea noatia, engari kei te whakapoke anō, ā, kei te ngana tonu ki te whakapoke i ētahi atu," te kī a Te Māngai Matua i te tinana wāhitau ipurangi APnic, nāna i mahi tētahi o ngā tūhuratanga tauine nui tuatahi o tēnei waka. Ko te mahi a aua mīhini kua whakapokea ko te hanga i tētahi wāhitau IP - he waehere ahurei kua tautapatia ki ngā mīhini katoa i runga i te kupenga - kātahi ka tuku i ētahi pōkai raraunga kia kite mēnā he tūkino pea i taua tauwāhi. Ki te kore, ka hangaia he wāhitau hōu ka ngana anō. Me te mea anō. Me te mea anō. Ka tīmata ngā huaketo tino poauau i te wāhitau kupenga 1.1.1.1, ā, ka mahi mai i reira. E 4.3 miriona anake ngā wāhitau i roto i te putanga o nāianei o te pūnaha wāhitau o te kupenga, e mōhiotia ana ko IPv4, nā reira he pai te wā o te huaketo whakatuki ki te karapa i tētahi wāhanga nui o tērā i mua i te tūnga. Pūtake pākiki Kāore ētahi huaketo e mahi i tētahi huarahi mōrearea. Ko tētahi huaketo, ko Conficker, he tino whakatuki ki te kimi i ngā tūpāpaku hōu, ā, ko te 70% o te haruru ka taea te whakapae i ngā huaketo kei raro i taua wāhanga pūmanawa kino. Ka teitei ake taua whika, e kī ana a Tēnā Huston, engari mō ngā pūkenga waehere rawakore o te tangata i waihanga i a Conficker. "Kotahi tonu te mea i hē ki a rātau," te kī a Tēnā Huston. "Ehara i te kite i te ipurangi katoa ka kitea e rātau te hawhe anake." Nā te mea kua tautuhia tētahi o ngā uara i roto i te wāhanga waehere e whakamahia ana hei whakaputa i ngā wāhitau IP matapōkere ki te kore. Mā tēnei e whakatepe te maha o ngā wāhitau IP ka taea e te huaketo te whakaputa. Ki tētahi waeine, e kī ana a Tēnā Huston, ko ētahi o ngā ngunguru papamuri e tūmanakohia ana. I whakaaturia e te rangahau i te tau 2001 e te kaipūtaiao rorohiko o Te Whare Wānanga "I tēnei rā ko te whika e 50mbps," te kī a Tēnā Huston. "Kua tipu te nui o te turituri papamuri i te 50 i roto i te tekau tau, engari ehara tēnā i te mea whakamīharo." Ko te mea whakamīharo, ko tana kī, ko nga pūtake o nga waka. "Ko ētahi wāhitau tōkau, tūkino hoki e āhua nei he tau matapōkere e kawe ana i te nui o ngā waka," tana kī. Waea whakararo Hei tauira, i kī a ia, ko te rangahau ki tētahi wāhitau kaingākau i kitea ai ko ngā waka katoa e haere mai ana i ngā taputapu wāhi hoko tūhono-kupenga (aka rēhita moni) i hokona ki ngā wharekai. I huatau a Tēnā Huston i puta mai tēnei nā te mea kāore i hurihia te wāhitau IP taunoa i roto i ngā pūmārō mō te paetata i te tāutatanga o ngā taputapu ki tētahi wharekai. Ko tētahi atu tauira ko te awhe o ngā pouwhanga DSL he wāhitau IP mārō tā rātou i whakamahia hei kimi i te wā tika. I te nui o ngā taputapu i hokona ka tipu, ka tipu haere te nui o ngā waka i hangaia e rātou. "He aituā, ehara i te kino," tana kī, "engari he ruarua noa iho ngā wāhitau e kawe mai ana i ngā megabits o ngā waka." I kī a Tēnā Huston i kawea te rangahau ki te hum papamuri hei tirotiro i te hauora o ngā wāhitau IP e hoatu ana. Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahia ana tētahi kaitirotiro whatunga ā-rohe pērā i a APnic ko te hoatu i tētahi wāhitau i poke i ngā waka. "Mēnā ka whiwhi koe i tētahi whatunga e kawe ana i ngā megabits, ā, kei raro koe i tētahi tūhononga DSL, kāore e nui te mahi," tana kī. Waihoki, kei te pae te āwhina. Kei te haere te neke mai i IPv4 ki tētahi putanga hōu ake e mōhiotia ana ko IPv6, ā, he nui ake te mokowā wāhitau o te pūnaha hōu - 340 trillion, trillion, trillion e ētahi whakatau tata. E hiahiatia ana i te nui ake o ngā pūrere e tūhono ana ki te kupenga, engari ka whakawhāiti hoki i te pānga o ngā taputapu whirihora hē. He tino nui hoki, e kī ana a Tēnā Huston, e kore e taea e ngā huaketo te karapa ki te kimi i ngā tūpāpaku hou. Ākuanei ka whakahekea taua haruru papamuri ki te kōhimuhimu.

title: I whakapaetia ngā pūoho hē mo te tāhae a Van Gogh i Ihipa
summary: Ko te tāhaetanga o tētahi peita a Vincent Van Gogh e wātea ana mō te $50m (£32m) mai i tētahi whare taonga o Kairo i te Hātarei, kua whakapaetia i runga i te haumarutanga rawakore.
text: I kī te rōia matua o Ihipa, a Abdel Meguid Mahmud, kāore tētahi o ngā pūoho i te Whare Taonga o Tītī, ā, e whitu anake i roto i ngā kāmera haumarutanga e 43 e mahi ana. I kī a ia kāore i mahi ngā pūoho pakaru me ngā kāmera mō tētahi wā. Tērā te mōrearea i te Hātarei i te kīanga hē a te minita ahurea o Ihipa kua whakaorangia te pikitia. I kī a Farouk Hosni e rua ngā Itari i hopukina i te taunga rererangi o Kairo, a, i kitea te kānawehi iti. Engari i muri iho ka hoki whakamuri a ia, ka kī kua hoatu ki a ia he mōhiohio "hē", ā, kei te ngaro tonu te pikitia. Ko te pikitia - e mōhiotia ana ko ngā Putiputi Poppy me te Vase And Flowers - i tapahia mai i tōna tāpare i te Whare Taonga o Te Hātarei. I kī atu a Tēnā Mahmud ki nga kaipānui i te Rātapu kua "koretake" ngā tikanga haumarutanga i te whare taonga, e whakaahua ana he "mata mata". "E 43 ngā kāmera haumarutanga, engari e whitu anake e mahi ana. E parea ana ia pikitia e tētahi pūoho, engari anō, kāore he tangata e mahi ana," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Mahmud e kimi ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o te whare taonga i ngā wāhanga tohunga hei whakatika i te pūnaha haumarutanga, engari "kāore i taea e rātou te kitea". I tāpiritia e ia kua tukuna e nga rōia o te kāwanatanga he whakatūpato mo te hiahia ki te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga i nga whare taonga o Kairo i muri i te iwa o nga whakaahua o te rangatira o Ihipiana o te rau tau 19, i tāhaetia mai i te Whare o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa i tērā tau. I kitea aua peita i te 10 rā i muri iho ka mahue ki waho. E pūrongotia ana ngā pirihimana e arotahi ana ki te kimi i te peita ngaro o Van Gogh i runga i ngā tauranga hau me te moana o Ihipa. 'I hopukina ngā Itari' I te Hātarei, tērā tētahi pūrongo kua hopukina e rua ngā Itari i te taunga rererangi o Kairo e pā ana ki te tāhaetanga i muri i te haerenga ki te whare taonga i mua o te rā. E ai ki te minita ahurea o Ihipa, a Tēnā Hosni, e 10 anake ngā tāngata i haere ki te whare taonga i te Hātarei. I pūrongotia e te kōwhiringa rongokōrero o te kāwanatanga o Mena kua whakaarahia e nga Itari te tohe i muri i to rātau kitenga i te haere ki tētahi whare paku, kātahi ka tere te wehe atu i nga kāinga. I kī te pokapū rongokōrero o Itari o Ansa he tamariki nga Itari tokorua, ā, he wāhanga rātau o tētahi rōpū whakatere e haere ana ki te taiwhanga. Kāore i te mārama mēnā kei te hopukina tonutia te tokorua. Ko te mahi, e whanganga ana i te 30cm mā te 30cm (1ft by 1ft), me te whakaahua i ngā putiputi kōwhai me te whero, e whakapono ana i peitatia e Vincent Van Gogh i te tau 1887, e toru tau i mua i tōna matenga i tētahi motu pū i whakaekea e ia anō. I tangohia te pikitia i taua whare taonga i te tau 1978, engari i ora mai i te tekau tau i muri mai i Kūweiti. I hangaia te Whare Taonga o Te Whare Taonga o Te Wānanga e tētahi pāremata Ihipiana o taua ingoa anō i ngā tau kotahi mano e toru tekau mā rua, ā, kei a ia hoki ngā mahi a Monet, Renoir me Degas.

title: 'Skull Cracker' Michael Wheatley i te kōti mo te tāhaetanga
summary: Kua puta mai tētahi tangata i te kōti e whakapaea ana ki te tāhae patu i a ia e oma ana i tētahi whare herehere tuwhera i Keti.
text: I hopukina a Michael Wheatley, e 55, e mōhiotia ana ko te "Skull Cracker", i Rāwāhi i muri i te poho o te Wenerei ki te Rōpū Hanga o Chelsea i Sunbury i Tara. E whakapaea ana a ia ki te tāhaetanga o te £18,350, he patu whakawai, ā, he nui rawa te ture. I whakahokia ia e nga Kaiwhakawā o Redhill kia puta ki te Kōti Karauna o Guildford i te 29 o Me. Ko Kevin Perry, e 53, o West India Dock Road, ka puta ki te kōti ā muri ake nei e whakapaea ana ki te āwhina i te hunga hara, ki te whakataka i te ara o te tika me te whakahaere i ngā taonga tāhae. 'Kāore i hoki mai' ka kōrero anake a Tēnā Wheatley ki te whakaū i tōna ingoa i te wā o te whakarongo e rima meneti. I karapotia a ia e ngā pirihimana tokowhā i roto i ngā kākahu oka, a, i herea puta noa i te whakarongo. I kī te rōia o Te Rōia o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga i muri i te ngaro tuatahi i te Hātarei i a ia e raihana rangitahi ana mō te rā kotahi mai i te Kāwai D HMP Standford Hill i te Motu o Heppey. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore a ia i hoki mai, nā reira i kore ai e ture." I te 18:00 BST i te Hātarei, ka hoki a ia ki te whare herehere. Kaore tētahi tangata i whara i te wā o te poho i te peka o te rōpū whare i Staines Road, engari i kī tētahi kōrero mō te kamupene kua mahue te rūrū o ngā kaimahi.

title: E kī ana a Enda Kenny 'ka waihanga i ngā uauatanga nui mō NI'
summary: Mēnā ka mahue i a Ingarangi te Uniana o Ūropi , ka waihangatia he "uauatanga nui" mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, kua kī te pirimia o Kīriria.
text: I te kōrero a Taoiseach Enda Kenny i muri i tētahi hui ki te Pirimia o UK, a David Cameron i Downing Street i te Mane. I kī a ia he "tino nui" te take o te mema EU o Ingarangi mō Airangi, ā, i tae mai i te wā o te "rangirua nui" mō Uropi. Engari i pai a ia mo te whakahou EU me te pupuri i te UK i roto i te uniana. Ko Ingarangi, i kī a ia, he mema "tino nui, tino taketake". "Ko tā mātou arotahi ki te āwhina i Ingarangi me te āwhina i ō mātou hoa mahi i Uropi kia whai hua ai te katoa i ngā whakahōu," tana kī atu ki tētahi hui pānui. "I roto i tēnei ka puta mai pea he Uropi tino pai, he whakaraupapa, he mātauranga, he kikokore hoki." Kua whakamāramatia tonutia e te Kāwanatanga o Kīriria kāore e pīrangi ana ki te kite i a Ingarangi e wehe ana i te EU. Ko tōna tino āwangawanga ko te ohaoha - ko te UK te hoa tauhokohoko nui rawa o Airangi, ā, ko ngā whenua e rua e hokohoko ana i runga i te 1bn ūropi o ngā taonga me ngā ratonga i ia wiki. Ko ētahi atu āwangawanga o Airangi ko ngā pānga tūpono ki Aiarangi ki te Raki me te pātahitanga whānui ake o Ingarangi-Airana. I kōrero a Tēnā Kenny mō "ngā uauatanga nui" e pā ana ki ngā pānga ohaoha ki Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ko te Whenua o Aiarangi te mākete kaweake nui rawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki, ā, he tino hōhonu ngā hononga whakawhiti taitapa o te wāhanga kai māori. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko o te wehe atu i te EU ka pai ake a Aiarangi ki te Raki i waho o te uniana. Kua kī te minita pūtea o Stormont o Mua, a Sammy Wilson, ka whiwhi pea a Aiarangi ki te Raki "he £540m tāpiri i roto i tana tahua" ki te wehe atu te UK. I kī a ia ka whai hua pea te pūtea paraka ā-tau i te UK e penapena ana i tana koha pūtea ki Uropi. I te hui pānui me Tēnā Kenny i Te Tiriti o Te Mane, ka kī a Tēnā Karauna ko te pātahitanga takirua i waenganui i te UK me Aiarangi "kāore anō kia kaha ake, kia whai hua ake rānei" i tēnei rā. I kī a ia i tiritiri te UK me Aiarangi i tētahi "hiahia kaha kia nui ake te whakataetae o te EU" me te manakē i ngā whakaaetanga hokohoko hira. I te mutunga o te tau 2017, me pupuri tētahi taupānga mo te mematanga UK o te EU. I te mutunga wiki, ka kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Kīriria, a Charlie Flanagan, ko te putanga o UK mai i Uropi he "pekenga ki te mea tē mōhiotia".

title: E whakamātau ana a Royal Mint ki te whakawai i ngā kaihoko ki ngā moni koura hou
summary: Ko te Royal Mint me hoko i ngā rangatū o ngā moni koura hou, iti ake, i roto i tētahi tono kia nui ake ngā tāngata e haumi ana i roto i te pūru.
text: Mō te iti iho i te £90, ka taea e ngā kaihoko te whai wāhi ki ngā piki me ngā heke o te mākete koura - ahakoa ko te nuinga o ngā marama tata nei. Nā te mea e whakaarotia ana aua moni he ngāwari ā-ture, ka wātea te pikinga o te uara i te Tāke Whiwhinga Pūtea mō ngā tangata o UK. Ka taea e ngā kaihoko te tuku i ngā moni koura ki a rātou, ka taea rānei e rātou te rokiroki ki roto i te taupoki o te Royal Mint. Ko te pae, e tata ana ki Kānata, e tiakina ana e te ope pirihimana o te Manatu Arotahi. Ko ngā moni hou he putanga iti iho o te moni koura kotahi auau o Britannia, e hokohoko ana i tēnei wā mō te £791. Ko ērā: '24 karati' i kī a Shane Bissett, te kaiwhakahaere o te moni whakamahara me te pūru a te Royal Mint, e hiahia ana ia ki te whakaahei "i te hokonga koura ki ngā kiritaki". "Ka tukuna e ngā moni he whakataki tino utu" ki te mākete koura, ka tāpiritia e ia. Ko te tangata i hoko koura i te tau kua ngaro te moni. I tēnei wā kei te hokohoko te konganuku utu nui i te $1205 i te auau - heke iho i te $1345 12 marama ki mua. Engari ko te tangata nāna i hoko tekau tau ki mua, he nui te hua, i te mea he $424 noa iho te utu i Whiringahora 2004. Ko te moni koura tino iti rawa i tukuna e te Royal Mint i mua ko te Sovereign, e wātea ana i te £187. Heoi anō, he mea hanga ki te koura 22 karati, i whakaritea ki te 24 kāra o te Britannia. Kia penapena ai ngā moni ki te whare putunga o te Royal Mint, me hoko e ngā kaihoko he ngongo tekau neke atu rānei. He paetukutuku kē tā te Royal Mint e taea ai e ngā kaiwhakangao te hokohoko moni koura me te hiriwa me te kite i ngā utu ora kua whakahōutia. Neke atu i te mano tau te puna moni a te Royal Mint mō ngā kīngi, ngā kuini me ngā kāwanatanga.

title: Jubilee Sailing Trust 'saved' after raising £1m in five days
summary: E kī ana tētahi aroha rere kua "tautuhia kia tiakina" i muri i tētahi tono kohi moni ohorere i kohia neke atu i te £1m i roto i te rima rā.
text: I whakatūpato a Jubilee Sailing Trust i te Mane tērā pea ka mutu ngā ngohe ki te kore e tutuki te ūnga £1m. I kī kua kohia e ia te £1,065,000 i te rā kati o te Paraire. I kī te aroha o Southampton, e tuku ana i ngā tāngata hauā ki te rere i runga i ngā kaipuke teitei, neke atu i te 3,500 ngā tāngata i āwhina. I kī te kaiwhakahaere mahi a Jon Greenspan e toru hauwhā o te moni i ahu mai i ngā tangata rangatira me ngā kamupene, me te toenga i ahu mai i ngā koha iti. E rua nga taurangi e £100,000, ka tāpiritia e ia. I kī a Tēnā Kākāriki i te rangatira nui o te whakawhirinaki, a Duncan Souster, i te whai i ngā hoapā "wāriu kupenga tiketike". I roto i tētahi karere ataata i whakairihia tuihonotia, ka kī a Tēnā Souster: "I mahia e mātou! Kāore e taea e au te whakapono ki tēnā. Kātahi te wiki whakamīharo. E tino mōhio ana ahau ka haere tonu a mātau mahi whakamīharo." I kī te aroha, e 51 ngā tāngata, ka puta he kōrero anō i muri i te hui a nga kaitiaki i te Mane. I kī a Tēnā Greenspan i tētahi "taiao kohi moni uaua" me "ngā pire nui i te 18 marama ki mua" kua pau ngā moni tāpui a te aroha, i te wā kua tipu ngā utu whakahaere ā-tau ki te £5m. I kī tētahi kōrero tōmua mai i te whakawhirinaki kua pāngia e ia "ngā take pūkaha nui" me ōna kaipuke e rua me te "kore rawakore" o ana ngohe. Ko ngā oko o te aroha, ko STS Lord Nelson me SV Tenacious, i hoahoatia, i whakaurua hoki kia āhei ai ngā tāngata hauā ā-tinana - tae atu ki ngā kaiwhakamahi tūru - ki te rere taha ki te taha me ngā tāngata kāore i te hauā. I te tau 2012, ka haere a Ariki Nelson ki tētahi hurihanga e rua tau ki te toro i ngā whenua e 30. I whai wāhi a Tenacious ki te Whakaaturanga Hīupiri Taimana o Thames i taua tau anō.

title: Pakihi: Te whakapiki i te pēhanga mo tētahi mahi hokohoko
summary: "Tokotoru noa iho ngā tāngata e mārama ana: kua mate tētahi, kua pōrangi tētahi, kua wareware ahau." Ko te kōrero rongonui tēnei a Ariki Palmerston mo te Pātai Schleswig-Holstein.
text: editor@faisalislamon I mua i te rā hapa tūpāpaku o Poihānea i Pōroa, ka whakamatautau ki te hoatu ki te "whiti ratchet" - ko te mea e kīia ana ki a au ko te kākano i waenganui o te nati e hiahiatia ana kia whāwhā i roto i ngā whakaritenga hokohoko i muri i te Pakihi. He pono, ko ngā kupu kua whakaritea e te PM i te tīmatanga o ngā PMQ e tīwhiri ana ki te raruraru me te rongoā. "E tohe ana o mātau hoa i te EU ki te whakaoti i tētahi ture hou ā muri ake nei kāore mātau i tēnei whenua e whakaū, e whai ana rānei i te hūtu, kātahi ka hiahia rātou ki te mana aunoa ki te whiu i a mātau me te whakautu," tana kī. Engari ko te tikanga, ehara i te mea uaua. E mōhio ana ahau, kua whakaae ngā kaiwhakarite UK me EU ki te "whakaheke-kore" i runga i ōna paerewa mo te hokohoko. Ko te whānuitanga, ko ngā paerewa ōrite e tīari ana ināianei i runga i ngā mana kaimahi, ka haere tonu te taiao me te huringa āhuarangi. Ka hangaia e rātou he pūtake i raro iho nei e kore ngā taha e rua e "whakaheke", e hinga rānei. He papa tākaro taumata tēnei, ā, kāore he tautohe ka noho ētahi momo whakaritenga pēnei i roto i te tuhinga. Ka kitea e ētahi i te UK tēnei tautohetohe. Ki a rātau, ko te tino take o Te Wānanga ko te whakararuraru i ngā ture me ngā ture EU. Ko te whakautu, ka taea e tātau, engari ka herea tērā ki te utu a te EU (ā, i tua atu) e whai mana ana ki te rāhui i te hokohoko UK. Te whakawhiti-utu Engari ka aha mēnā ka nui ake aua paerewa? I mua, mō tētahi wāhi o te Āpure Tākaro Taumata - ngā moni mō ngā kamupene e mōhiotia ana ko te āwhina kāwanatanga, ka tohe te EU kia mau tonu te UK ki ngā paerewa EU e tipu haere ana - e mōhiotia ana ko te "tīaroaro hihiri". Ko te tūnga taketake o te EU, ka whakaūngia hoki ēnei e ōna rōpū. Mai i te raumati, kua taka tēnā i roto i nga whakaritenga. Heoi anō, i whakawaengatia te kōrero i tētahi whiti "ratchet". Mēnā ka whakaarahia e ngā rōpū e rua ngā paerewa, ka hangaia e ia te tauanga hou, i raro iho nei ka taea e tētahi iwi te whakautu. Ka whakarato i tētahi whakararuraru ki te whakarerekē, nā reira ka hōhonu. Engari he kōwhiringa ariki tā ia taha: mēnā ka mau tonu ngā paerewa, kia rerekē rānei ki ngā hua. Ahakoa rā, i whakakāhoretia tēnā e te UK i te raumati. Nga mea taketake He aha te mea e whai ake nei ki a Brexit? Nā reira ka hoki mai te EU ki te kī mēnā kāore e whakaaetia tētahi pūnaha noa iho, me whai mana kotahi ariki ngā taha e rua ki te whakahoki ki ngā tūpāpaku ā muri ake. Ināianei e whakaarotia ana he mana tino nui te "whakawhiti-whakawhiti" - nā reira mēnā ka whakahekea e tētahi taha tētahi atu i runga i ngā wae rererangi, ka taea e tētahi te whakahoki i ngā kawenga ake motokā. I kitea tēnei hei whiti ratchet taha kotahi e te UK me tētahi "whiti kunenga" e hiahiatia ana e te EU. E ai ki te kōrero a te Tumuaki Tiamana o Angela Merkel i tēnei ata: "Ehara i te mea e hiahiatia ana e mātou he papa tākaro taumata mō tēnei rā, engari mō ngā rā e haere ake nei. " Mō tēnei, me kimi whakaaetanga tātau me pēhea te urupare a ia taha ina huri tētahi i tō rātou āhuatanga ā-ture. Ki te kore ka puta he here whakataetae tika, e kore e taea e tātau ki a tātau kamupene." Koia anō te ngākau o te raruraru. E te Ariki i tēnei wā me hoki tātou ki ngā kupu a te PM: "Ki te puta he ture hou ā muri ake nei." He āhua rite tēnā ki te tautuhi i tō ake pae mō tētahi toa whakaritenga. He ngāwari noa iho te mahi, mā te whāngai i te āhua taketake o te whiti e whakaae ai ngā taha e rua ki te whakarewa i te tauanga i roto i ngā paerewa. Nā reira he taupatupatu tino tika mēnā e hiahia ana te UK kia herea pēnei. Engari kia mārama, ka whai mana ariki te UK me te EU ki te wehe atu i te tauanga o nāianei o ngā paerewa, mai i ngā paerewa teitei ake i whakaaetia tahitia. Kātahi anō ka kitea e te rerekētanga (ā, me whakaatu ia taha i te hokohoko whakahawea) he utu ōrite, e ai ki ngā utu hokohoko me ngā tāke. He tika te raruraru, engari he whakaaro whakaaro hoki, he uaua ki te whakaputa tauira raima. E pā ana ki te mōrea o nga utu utu ā muri ake. Ko te pātai mō ngā taha e rua, mēnā e rapu ana ki te karo i te tūponotanga o taua mahi ā muri ake nei, ka whakatautika i ngā utu whānui i roto i te 22 rā. Tērā pea ka waihangatia e te "ratcheting" te pēhanga o tēnei te mokowā mo tētahi mahi.

title: Newcastle United: Kāore te Kāwanatanga 'i whakauru' i roto i te tono whakahaere i pūruatia e Hauti Arapia
summary: Kua whakakāhore te kāwanatanga i uru "ahakoa te wā" i runga i te tono rahua a tētahi rōpū i pūruatia e Arapia ki te hoko i a Newcastle United.
text: Heoi anō, i whakaae ngā kaiwhakahaere kua tū ngā hui i waenganui i te Tari Tawahi me te Rōpū Matua. I kī a Downing Street i tonoa he kaiawhina matua kia tirohia te haerenga o te mahi, engari kaua e uru atu. E whai ana i tētahi pūrongo Mēra o ia Rā i whakapā atu ki te pirimia i muri i te uauatanga o te mahi £300m. I kī tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga: "I a mātau e pōhiri ana i te pūtea penapena o rāwāhi, he take arumoni tēnei mō ngā rōpū āwangawanga, ā, kāore te kāwanatanga i uru ki ngā kōrero whakahaere i te hokonga o Newcastle United." I whakapeka a Newcastle United me te Rōpū Matua ki te kōrero. Kua whakaae te whakawhāiti ā-Arapia, arā ko te pūtea rangatira ariki PIF, PCP Capital Partners me Reuben Brothers, ki te hoko i te karapu mai i te rangatira o Sports Direct o Maika Ashley i Aperira nei. I te āta tirohia te whakahaeretanga i raro i te whakamātautau a ngā rangatira me ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Rōpū Matua, mēnā ka tika te rangatira o te karapu. Kua pūrongotia e te Mēra o Ia Rā kua tuhituhi te rangatira ki a Boris Johnson e kī ana e tūmanako ana ia kia "whakatika me te whakaaro anō" te Rōpū Matua i tētahi whakatauranga "hē" nāna i whakahaere. I whakaūngia e te kaiwhakahaere mana o te PM te tono a Tēnā Hōnea ki a Ariki Udny-Lister - he tohunga o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, he kaiawhina tū roa e hoki ana ki ōna rā hei rangatira o Rāwāhi - ki te tirotiro i te haerenga o ngā kōrero, engari kāore a ia i tono ki a ia kia uru atu. I mahue atu te rōpū whakahaere, nāna i whakaahua he "kaiwhakangao motuhake, arumoni tino mārire", i te mahi i a Hōngongoi, e whakapae ana i te "tukanga roa tē mōhiotia" o te Rōpū Matua mo te tiango. I kī te Rōpū Matua i mua i tana poari "i ngā wā maha, i tōna whakaaro mō ēhea ngā mea e whakapono ana ka whai mana ki te karapu" mēnā i haere tonu te whakawhāiti ki te mahi. Tātaritanga Alistair Magowan, I tua atu i tētahi haupae rorohiko kāwanatanga, he tino nui te tikanga ki ngā kerēme a te Mēra o Ia Rā mō te whakahaeretanga o Newcastle. Kua mārire te whakawhāiti i pūruatia e Hauti mō ngā marama mai i tōna hokonga i tērā o Hōngongoi. Ahakoa ngā kerēme a te rangatira o Maika Ashley e hiahia tonu ana ia ki te hoko ki te whakawhāiti, ko te taiapa matua ki te tango i ngā wā katoa ko te taumata o te whakaurutanga o te kāwanatanga o Hauri, nāna i tautohetohe ki te Rōpū Matua, ā, ka taea tonu te haere ki te whakawāteatanga. Ko te take o te karapu, he motuhake a Piriniha Karauna Moameta Bin Ararere ki te PIF, e tautoko ana i te mahi £300m, nō reira kāore e whakahaere i te karapu, ā, ka herea ki te whakamātautau a ngā rangatira me ngā kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū. Engari mēnā he pono te pūrākau Mēra, ā, ka whakapā atu a Bin Ararere ki te PM mō te whakahaeretanga, he uaua ki te whakakāhore kāore a ia i te tino whakauru. He pātai anō mō te kāwanatanga. E kī ana kāore anō kia uru ki te whakahaere. Engari he aha i tuhituhi ai a Boris Johnson i tētahi reta ki tētahi rōpū kaitautoko i Aotearoa i tērā o Aotearoa e tono ana kia tukuna e te Rōpū Matua he "mārama ake" ki te aha i pā ki taua mahi? Ināianei kua whakarewaina e Newcastle United ngā whakahaere ture ki te rōpū i runga i te tono haukoti, i a rātau e rapu ana hoki i te whakawāwā hei whakatau i te tautohetohe. I te hoatu whakaaturanga i tētahi komiti tīpako o ngā MP i Aperira 2020, ka kī te Hēkeretari Ahurea a Oliver Dowden mō te Rōpū Matua anake ki te aromatawai i ngā whiwhinga tūpono o ngā karapu whutupōro i raro i te whakamātautau a ōna rangatira me ngā kaiwhakahaere. Kua kī te minita o te Tari Ā-Rohe a Hemi Cleverly e rua ngā hui mariko i tū i waenganui i te Tari Whenua, Kotahitanga me te Whanaketanga me te rōpū whakahaere i te whakahaere. I kī a Chi Onwurah, te MP Labour mō Newcastle Central, "i a ia e pīrangi ana ki a Newcastle United" i "ngenge a ia i ngā pūrākau rerekē katoa", ka tāpiri: "Te āhua nei kāore mātou i te rongo i ngā mea kua tūpono." I kī hoki a ia e hiahia ana ia ki te "pūataata me te mārama" i runga i ngā ture o te Rōpū Matua me "ngā mea i pā ki a Newcastle United". Ko te whakakāhoretanga a te kāwanatanga i te whakaurutanga i waenganui i tētahi haupae rorohiko i runga i te PM o mua o Rawiri, a Rawiri, me te umanga pūtea i rahua o Greensill Capital. Kua whakaohotia e ia he taupatupatu whānui ake mo nga whakamātau a nga kamupene tūmataiti ki te whakaawe i nga minita me nga kaiwhakahaere. Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka hoki whakamuri a Toyota i te kaupapa motokā rererangi' i Tiapanī
summary: Kua pānuitia e te kaihanga motokā Hapanihi tōna pūrua mō tētahi rōpū kaipūkaha e hanga ana i tētahi motokā rererangi.
text: Ka hoatu e ia te 40 miriona iene (£274, 000) ki te rōpū Cartivator e mahi ana i waho o te taone o Te Taone o Tiapanī waenganui. E pūrongo ana te Arotakenga Āhia o Te Āhia o Te Arotakenga Āhia kua whakaae a Tōtika me ōna kamupene rōpū ki te tautoko i te kaupapa. Nō tēnei wā kua utua e te huihuinga mō te whanaketanga o te motokā Skydrive, e whakamahi ana i te hangarau taiapa, ā, e toru ngā wīra me ngā rotors e whā. Hangarau retro: Ko ngā tauira motokā rererangi i whakamātauria i Tiamana Ka whakarite a Hekerangi ki te whakamātau i te whatunga motokā rererangi i te tau 2020 Ine 9.5ft (2.9m) mā te 4.3ft (1.3m), e kī ana a Skydrive ko ia te motokā rererangi iti rawa o te ao. He tere rere tōrunga tōna o te 100km/h (62mph), i a ia e haere ana ki runga ake i te 10m i runga ake i te whenua. E tūmanako ana te tīma o ngā tūao e 30 e whakawhanake ana i te motokā Skydrive ka taea te whakamahi i tōna tauira tauira hei whakamārama i te mura o te Orangirangi ina taurima a Tokyo i ngā kēmu raumati i te tau 2020. Ko ngā motokā rere he mea whakakakara o te marama i tēnei wā, me ngā kamupene mai i te US, Tiamana, Hōrana, Haina me Tiapanī e kimi ana ki te huri i te pakiwaitara pūtaiao hei pono.

title: Ka 'mārena' te koti ringa o Duke rāua ko Duchess of Cambridge
summary: He koti ringa hou tā te Ariki me te Ariki o Kemipiria hei tohu i a rāua hei tokorua mārena, kua pānuitia e Te Whare o Kensington.
text: I whakaaetia e te Kuini te koti ringa o te wahine i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. Ka whakakotahitia e ia te koti ringa o Piriniha William me te whakangungu rakau a tana wahine, mai i te koti ringa o te whānau o Middleton. I hoahoatia e te Kāreti o Ngā Ringa i Rānana, ko ngā ringa mārena e whakakotahi ana i ngā whakangungu rakau motuhake o te tāne me te wahine ariki. Ko te whakangungu rakau a Piriniha William, i te taha mauī o te koti ringa, ko tana putanga o te Royal Coat of Arms, i tukuna ki a ia e te Kuini i tōna huritau 18. E whakaatu ana i ngā momo tohu ariki o ngā wāhi rerekē o Te Hononga o Ingarangi - ko ngā raiona e toru o Ingarangi, te raiona o Pākehā me te hapa o Airani. E karapotia ana e tētahi kākahu kikorangi e mau ana i te pepeha Honi soit qui mal y pense - Whakamā ki te hunga e whakaaro kino ana - e tohu ana i te Order of the Garter, he Hoa Naiti a ia. Ko te whakangungu rakau a te Ariki o Cambridge i ahu mai i te koti ringa o Middleton, i tukuna ki te whānau i te tau 2011, i mua i tana mārenatanga. Kua wehea poutū, ko tētahi haurua kikorangi, ko tētahi hawhe whero, ā, kei roto ko tētahi chevron koura puta noa i te pokapū me ngā "cotises" mā i ia taha. Kei roto hoki e toru ngā kākano - e tohu ana i te ariki me ōna tuakana ko Pippa rāua ko Hemi - me ngā kakau koura me ngā rau. I hangaia ngā ringa mārena mā te whakanoho i te whakangungu rakau o Middleton ki te taha o Piriniha William. Ko te tikanga a te whānau o Spencer I roto i nga ringa o te tokorua, e karapotia ana te whakangungu rakau a te Ariki o Cambridge e te kupenga oki, hei whakataurite i te kākahu a tana tāne - he tikanga mō ngā hoa rangatira kāore i a rātau anō e āhei ana ki te karapoti i o rātau ringa ki te raupapa o te kōaro. E tautokona ana ngā whakangungu rakau e rua e te raiona ariki me te unicorn, e mau ana ia i tētahi kara e toru tohu, e mōhiotia ana he tapanga. He anga escallop whero tā te tapanga i takea mai i te koti ringa o Spencer, kua whakamahia e ngā tīpuna o Piriniha William i te taha o tōna whaea mō ngā rau tau maha. Ka puritia e te tokorua te koti ringa mo ake tonu atu, engari ka rerekē pea ētahi wāhanga i te rerekētanga o o rāua ake āhuatanga me ō rāua tūranga. Ka puritia hoki e rātau o rātau ake koti ringa hei tohu i a rātau anō hei tangata takitahi, te kī a Te Whare o Kensington.

title: He rau rau e hono ana ki te hīkoi whakahē a NATO i Newport i te Hātarei
summary: Tata ki te 600 ngā tāngata kua whai wāhi ki tētahi hīkoi puta noa i Newport i mua i te tūnga o te NATO e tū ana i te taone.
text: I whakatūpato ngā pirihimana me ngā kaiwhakahaere kaunihera ka whakararuraru pea te hīkoi i te wā i whakaritea ai ngā paraka huarahi takahuri. Neke atu i te 150 nga upoko o te kāwanatanga me nga minita ka haere ki te tihi. Kua whakatūria he puni rangimārie ki te Papa Tredegar o te taone, ā, he tokomaha atu ngā kaiwhakahauhau e tūmanakohia ana kia tae mai ki te tihi i te Celtic Manor Resort o Newport mai i te Tāite. He maha ngā huarahi i pāngia i te wā o te hīkoi, i tīmata mai i te papa motokā o te Kōti Karauna o Newport i te 14:00 BST. Ko ngā rōpū tae atu ki te Whakatū i te Pakanga i whakaritea he kaiako me ngā kaiwhakahauhau i peia mai i Rānana, i Birmingham, i Norwich me Newcastle. Kua āwhina te Whakahau mō te Ārai Karihi (CND) ki te whakarite i tētahi Tumuaki Kaitatau i te Rātapu i te Hōro o Te Takiwā o Kānata me ngā kōrero a ngā tautohetohe tōrangapū me ngā kaiwhaiwhai rangimārie. Ka mihi nga pirihimana ki nga kaiwhakahaere i uru ki te whakahē hūmārie o te Hātarei. I kī a Gwent Police Ch Supt Alun Thomas: "E manaaki ana te ratonga pirihimana i te mana mo te whakahē hūmārie, ā, he whakahauhau ki te mahi tahi me ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te whakangāwari i te hīkoi, e pai ana ahau ki te pūrongo i hipa me te kore take. " Ka haere atu tā mātou mihi ki te katoa mō tā rātou mahi tahi me te tautoko i tēnei rā i Newport." Kua tukua e nga kaikaunihera Mahi o te Kaunihera o Newport City tētahi reta tūwhera ki ngā kaiārahi o te ao e haere ana ki te tihi e karanga ana ki "ngā rongoā tōrangapū, ehara i te hōia" ki te āhuatanga i Kaha i waenganui i ngā tūmanako o tētahi rangahau mo te wā roa i waenganui i a Iharaira me ngā Pārihia. "E hiahia ana mātou kia pai koe i roto i ō whāinga katoa ki te whakaū i te rangimārie i te ao," ka kī rātau. Engari i kī a Pippa Bartolotti, te kaiārahi Rōpū Kākāriki o Wales me tētahi o ngā kaiwhakahaere No NATO Newport: "Ko te NATO e maumaharatia ana e te tokomaha o ngā tāngata hei tōpana mo te wawao, kua huri hei tōpana mo te whakatoi, ā, kāore tētahi tangata e tino mōhio kua pā mai tēnei huringa māheahea i roto i ngā tau e 10 ki te 15 kua hipa atu." Ināianei i Kānata, ka whakaritea ngā katinga huarahi i te pō Hātarei tae noa ki te ata Rātapu kia āhei ai ētahi atu mahi i runga i tētahi rāhui haumarutanga huri noa i Te Kāreti Pūoro me te Kāreti Ariki o Te Kāreti Puoro me te Whakaari e tū ai ngā hapa tumuaki. I kī te kaunihera o Kānata ka katia te huarahi ki te rāwhiti me te raki mai i Castle Street ki te Huarahi ki te Raki mai i te 20.30-06.30 BST.

title: Ope Mokowā: Ka whakarewaina tikatia e te puku te ratonga hōia hou o AMERIKA
summary: Kua pūteatia e Perehitini Donald Trump tētahi ope Pentagon e arotahi ana ki te whawhai i te mokowā - te Ope Mokowā o Amerika.
text: Ko te ratonga hōia hou, ko te tuatahi i roto i ngā tau neke atu i te 70, e taka ana i raro i te Ope Rererangi o Amerika. I tētahi pūtake taua tata ki Washington, i whakaahuatia e Tēnā Trump te mokowā hei "rohe whawhai hou rawa o te ao". "I waenganui i ngā tuma tūpāpaku ki to tātau haumarutanga ā iwi, he tino nui rawa te rangatiratanga o Amerika i te mokowā," tana kī. "Kei te ārahi mātou, engari kāore mātou i te nui te ārahi, engari ākuanei ka ārahi mātou i te nui." "Mā te Ope Mokowā mātau e āwhina ki te whakakaha i te whakatoi me te whakahaere i te whenua tiketike whakamutunga," tana tāpiri mai. I whakaūngia te tohatoha pūtea i te Paraire i te hainatanga a te perehitini i te pūtea hōia ā-tau o Amerika e $738bn (£567bn). Ka pūteatia te whakarewatanga o te Ope Mokowā e tētahi $40m tuatahi mō tōna tau tuatahi. He aha tonu te mahi a te Ope Mokowā? Ehara i te mea kia purua ngā hōia ki te āwhiotanga, engari ka parea ngā rawa o AMERIKA - pēnei i ngā rau o ngā aorangi e whakamahia ana mō te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero me te mātakitaki. I te kitenga o nga rangatira hōia o Amerika i a Haina me Rūhia e haere whakamua ana i te rohe whakamutunga o te hōia. I kī tōmua te Tuakana Perehitini o Maika Pene he taiaho ā-rangi me ngā tawhā ārai aorangi e hiahiatia ana e te US ki te ātete. "Kua tino rerekē te taiao mokowā i te whakatupuranga whakamutunga," tana kī. "Ko te mea i mua i te rangimarie, i te tautohetohe, kua kōpikopiko, kua hoariri ināianei." Ka hangaia e te Ope Mokowā ki runga i te mahi a te Tono Mokowā o Amerika (SpaceCom), i waihangatia i a Aotearoa hei whakahaere i ngā mahi mokowā a te hōia o Amerika. I kī te Hēkeretari o te Ope Rererangi, a Pāremata, ko te Ope Mokowā e 16,000 ngā kaimahi o te Ope Rererangi me ngā kaimahi ā-iwi. Ka arahina e te Tianara o te Ope Rererangi, o Piki Raymond, e whakahaere ana i te SpaceCom i tēnei wā. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, i huatau mai te Perehitini o Rūhia o Tūroro ki te whakawhānuitanga o Mātau i te mokowā, ā, i hiahiatia he urupare mai i Rūhia. "E whakaaro tūwhera ana te kaiārahi tōrangapū-tōrangapū o Amerika ki te mokowā hei whare tapere hōia, ā, ka whakarite ki te whakahaere i ngā mahi i reira," te kī a Tēnā Hapa.

title: Coronavirus: He tohutohu hou mō ngā mārena i Ingarangi
summary: Kua whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga he tohutohu hou mo nga mārena i Ingarangi, e whakaae ana i ngā hākari tae atu ki te 30 tāngata, engari e tohutohu ana ki ngā pōhiri.
text: Mai i te 4 o Hōngongoi, ka taea e te mārena me ngā hoa mahi tūmatanui te haere whakamua, engari e 30 anake ngā tāngata tae atu ki te tokorua, ngā kaimahi pēnei i te kaiwhakaahua me ngā kaiwhakaatu. Ko te tikanga kia tawhiti te tangata, kia kaua e waiata, ā, me horoi ringa i mua i te whakawhiti mowhiti. Ko te tikanga kia iti ngā pōhiri, e rua anake ngā kāinga e āhei ana ki te tūtaki ki rō whare. Mai i te tīmatanga o te raka i te 23 o Poutāpeta, kua rāhuitia ngā mārena i Ingarangi i raro i ngā āhuatanga katoa. I tēnei wā e whakaaetia ana ngā mārena iti i ērā atu iwi o UK, e tautuhi ana i ā rātou ake ture raka. I Aiarangi ki te Raki, ka whakaaetia ngā mārena tae atu ki te 10 tāngata ki waho. I Wales, ka taea hoki ngā hākari, engari me mātakina te tawhiti pāpori, i te wā ka taea ngā mārena o waho me ngā mahi ā-iwi i Pākehā. Ngā ture hōu mō Ingarangi I raro i te tohutohu hou mō Ingarangi i whakaputaina i te Mane, ka whakaaetia ngā mārena iti me ngā hākari mahi ā-iwi ina taea anake te mahi haumaru me te whai i ngā aratohu tawhiti pāpori. E kī ana te tohutohu: E huatau ana hoki ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga ki te huri i ngā tahora mārena tūturu kia kore ai e noho kanohi-ki-te-kanohi, te whakapai ake i te hauora, te whakamahi rānei i ngā hīpoki kanohi. Ko te whakaritenga kia whai i te ture 2m - 1m rānei me ētahi atu whakatūpatotanga - tērā pea ka whakahaere i te tikanga o te pāpā e haere ana i tana tamāhine ki raro i te ara, ki te kore rātau e noho i roto i te whare kotahi. Ko te tau mōrahi o ngā tāngata e 30 kei roto ko ngā tāngata katoa i te hui - tae atu ki te tokorua, ngā kaiwhakaatu, ngā kaiwhakahaere, ngā manuhiri me ngā kaiwhakarato pēnei i ngā kaiwhakaahua me ngā kaihoko. E kī ana hoki te tohutohu i ngā whiwhinga "i te nuinga o te wā e whai ana, e haere tahi ana rānei me ngā mārenatanga, ngā hoa mahi ā-iwi rānei kia kaua e tū i tēnei wā". It says small celebrations should only take place if they follow social distancing guidelines, such as groups of up to two households indoor, or up to six people from different households outdoors. Ko te take i tonoa ai te tangata kia kaua e waiata, kia kōrero nui rānei, i runga anō i ngā tohutohu pūtaiao e hua ana kia nui ake ngā pata romahā e tomo ana ki te hau, ā, ka taea e ētahi atu. Te pūrākau a Hana: 'E kore e pēnei i te mārena' Ko Hana Randolph me tana hoa aroha me mārena i te tīmatanga o Mahuru, engari kua whakatau kia waiho ki "te wā whakamutunga" ki te whakatau mēnā ka haere ki runga i te ara. E māharahara ana te tau 33 tau mai i te tonga-hauauru o Rānōna, ki te whakakore rātau ināianei, kāore e taea e ā rātou kaiwhakarato te whakahoki moni i te mea ka haere tonu te hui. Engari e kī ana a ia: "Kāore au i te whakaaro he mārena." "He utu nui katoa ngā mārena, engari ka taea pea e koe te whakatika mēnā kei te whai hākari koe mō te 100 tāngata," tana kī. I raro i te tohutohu hou, me tapahi e ia tēnā mā te rua tuatoru. Ki a ia, ehara i te mahi ngāwari te pōhiri i ngā manuhiri: "Tokotoru ngā tuakana o taku hoa me ō rātou hoa me tētahi irāmutu, ā, ina tāpiritia e koe tēnā, ko te tikanga me tino mārire koe ki ngā mema o te whānau." Ahakoa e kī ana a Hana ka rongo ngā mārena i te "whakarihariha" i runga i ngā āhuatanga, nā te kore māramatanga mai i te kāwanatanga i tino pouri ai tōna whakaaro. "Ka taea e au te haere ki tētahi pāparapara me te inu me ngā tauhou, engari kāore e taea te inu tawhiti pāpori me ngā mea e arohaina ana," tana kī. "Te āhua nei he kuware." E kī ana te kāwanatanga ko ngā wāhi kāore e whai i te tohutohu ka anga atu ki te mahi a te Kaiwhakahaere Hauora me te Haumaru, te mana ā-rohe rānei. Ki te kore e whakatakoto i ngā mehua tika, ka taea te takahi i ngā ture hauora me te haumaru tīariari me ngā wāhi ka anga atu ki ngā whakamōhiotanga whakaū, ka tāpiritia e te tohutohu. I kī tētahi tangata, e hiahia ana kia noho ingoamuna, me mārena rāua ko tana hoa wahine i te mutunga o Hōngongoi, engari nā ngā ture hou "kua kore e taea te mārena kia rite ki te whakarite". "It's a joke - the venue we have is a farmhouse and we would have been in the courtyard," he said. "Ka taea e mātou te whakahē me ngā rau o ētahi atu tāngata, ka taea e mātou te huihui ki te whakanui i tētahi kēmu whutupōro me ngā tauhou, engari kāore e taea e mātou te pōhiri o waho me ā mātou manuhiri e 25. Ka tua atu i te koretake." Ko te wā mārena o te kōanga me te raumati o te tau 2020 i UK kua pāngia e te mate urutā, me te tokomaha o ngā mārena i whakahaua ki te hiki i a rātau mārena. Kua tū kē ētahi mārena i ngā hākari whakakapi, kotahi te tokorua i Northamptonshire e pupuri ana i tētahi hākari tiriti, ā, tokorua ngā kaimahi hōhipera e whakatū ana i tētahi mārena tawai i a rātau e mau ana i ngā taonga ārai whaiaro. Ahakoa he ngāwari noa iho te nuinga o ngā kamupene mārena me ngā wāhi mō te hiki, ka kī ētahi wahine marena hou kua maukatia rātau i roto i tētahi pakanga kia whakahokia mai a rātau moni. He wahine marena hou, he tāne rānei koe e whakarite ana i tētahi mārena? Ka haere tonu koe, ka whakaroa rānei? Tiria ō mahere mārena me ō whakaaro mō ngā mea ka whakaaetia, ā, kāore e whakaaetia mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU.

title: Ko te tawhiti 'whakararuraru' o ngā toto tāhae ki te whānau o Highlands
summary: Ko te hauora kino o te tūkino o te heitara toto tāhae me tana whakahau mo te pono he pānga "paitini" ki te oranga whānau, kua kī tana wahine.
text: Ko Bruce Norval, mai i Inverness, i waenganui i ngā mano o ngā tūroro e pāngia ana e te ate kakā C mā ngā hua toto tāhae i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau. Ko ētahi i pāngia e te HIV, ā, neke atu i te 2,400 ngā tāngata kua mate. Kua kōrero a Pirihi Norval ki te whakarongo ki te pānga ki te oranga o ia me tana tamāhine me tana tama. 'Mēnā he waituhi te roimata' I mua, ka rongo te Uiui Toto Whakapokea i Etinitini kua tukuna e tētahi kaituku okana i pāngia e te HIV mai i tētahi whakahekenga toto tāhae i te huaketo ki ngā kaiwhiwhi katoa o ōna tākihi, te manawa me te ate. Tokorua ngā kaiwhiwhi e mōhiotia ana kua mate. Ua parau te tane a te hoê vahine tei pohe: "Mai te peu e mea hamanihia te roimata i te vaihi, e nehenehe ïa vau e papai i te hoê buka no nia i te taata faahiahia o tei rave ino roa mai ia 'u i taua mau matahiti atoa ra." Ko te kaha o Tēnā Norval ki te hura i te pono i muri i te whakahaere i ngā hua tāhae, i tua atu i te hauora o tōna hauora kino, ka rongo te uiui. I kōrero a Mrs Norval ki te whakarongo i whakaaro ia ki te tango i tōna ake ora, i te wā e 28 ana tana tamāhine, ināianei e 28, kua hōhiperatia i runga i ngā wāhi hinengaro hinengaro, tae atu ki tētahi wā e whakanui ana a ia i tōna rā whānau 21. I a ia e tamariki ana, i whakaaro te tama a Norvals, e 22 ināianei, he "pūnoa" te hoki ki te kāinga me te tūmanako kia kitea kua mate tōna pāpā, ka rongo hoki te uiui. I pānuitia ngā kōwae mai i ngā whakaaturanga tuhituhi a Tēnā Norval ki te uiui, tae atu ki tētahi wāhanga i whakaahuatia ai e ia te āhua o tōna hauora he pānga "whakararuraru" ki ana hoa aroha. Engari i kī atu hoki a Mrs Norval ki te uiui e "tū tahi" ana tōna whānau, e whakaaro ana ki te āwhina ki te kawe mai i te hunga "nāna i āwhina" ki te heitara ki te mahi. I tūtaki tuatahi te pukapuka wāhitau pango i Rānana i a rātau e mahi ana hei nēhi. I kī atu a Tēnā Norval ki a Pirihi he hemophiliac a ia, engari kāore ia i mōhio i te wā i whai ate kakā C a ia. I kī a Mrs Norval kāore tana tāne i mōhio he huaketo tōna tae noa ki te tau 1990, i taua tau anō i whānau ai ta rāua tamāhine. I kī a ia he tākuta, e "rere ana" ki te haere ki tētahi atu whare hauora, ka whakawhirinaki ki runga i te tāpare tatau, ka kī atu ki tana tāne tērā pea ka whiwhi ia i te mate pukupuku "engari kāore pea". I kī a Mrs Norval i mahue i te tātaritanga tana tāne me ngā māharahara kino ki te hauora o ta rāua tamāhine, me te whakawhirinaki hōhonu ki ngā tohunga rongoā. Na te hauora kino o Tāne Norval me ngā uauatanga o te whānau i pā ki te pūtea, ka rongo te rongo. I tētahi wā ka whakatūpatotia ngā Norval ka taea te panaia i to rātau whare kaunihera i runga i te rēti kāore anō kia utua. I whakawāteatia te huaketo e te rongoā ā muri ake, engari kāore anō a Tēnā Norval kia ora mai i ōna āhuatanga taumaha, arā ko te ruaki, te ngenge nui me te pouri. I kōrero hāngai, ā-hinengaro hoki a Mrs Norval mō te pānga o tēnei me te whakahauhau a tana tāne, me ngā māharahara mo tōna hauora, ki a ia me ta rāua tamāhine. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore he hāwhe haora kāore e huri te kōrero ki te whakahau, kei te waea rānei tētahi tangata. Kei te kōrero tonu a ia ki te iwi mō taua mea." Kua tūtaki a Tēnā Norval ki ngā kaipōrangapū ki te tohe ki te mahi hei āwhina i ngā tūpāpaku, ā, ka auau te kōrero ki te pāpāho kia mōhio ai ki te heitara. I rongo hoki te uiui i tētahi pukapuka wāhitau pango e puritia ana e Tēnā Norval ki ngā ingoa o ētahi atu tūpāpaku, me tana whakawhiti i te hunga kua mate. I tētahi rā ka hoki mai tana tamāhine ki te kāinga kia kite i tōna pāpā i tōna tari iti i runga i te waea me te tangi i a ia e whiwhi ana i tētahi ingoa. 'Kōwhiria he tāne, he tamāhine rānei' i kōrero a Mrs Norval i te wā i hōhipera ai ta rāua tamāhine i a ia e 21 ana. Ka kī a ia: "I kī mai te kaitohutohu ki a au: 'me kōwhiri koe i waenganui i tō tāne me tō tamāhine. He tino kino rawa te whakahauhau a tō tāne ki te haere tonu, e kore rawa tō tamāhine e pai anō'." I kī a Mrs Norval i riri a ia, engari i ngā tau i muri mai ka whakaaro ki ngā kupu a te kaiwhakahaere. I kī a ia kua whakaritea e tana tamāhine te whakahauhau. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te tū tahi mātou. E hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i ngā tāngata i āwhina ki tēnei e kawea ana ki te mahi." I mua ake, ka rongo te uiui i te āhua o tētahi tangata 23 tau i pāngia e ia he mate mate i roto i te tūtukitanga o te motokā i te tau 1984, e 15 ngā wae toto i te ngana ki te whakaora i tōna ora - ko tētahi o ēnei i pāngia e te HIV. I tukuna atu te huaketo ki ngā kaiwhiwhi katoa o ana tākihi, manawa me te ate. I kōrerotia e te tāne o tētahi wahine i whiwhi i tētahi o ngā tākihi e rua, ā, i muri iho ka mate me pēhea tana "haere ki roto ki tētahi mahi whakaora, a, ka puta mai me te whiu mate". I kitea he HIV a ia, engari kāore i kōrerotia i taua wā mai i te tākihi whakawhiti. I kī tana tāne i ia wāhui rongoā, ko te mea tuatahi i mahia e ngā tākuta ko te whakatūpato i te tokorua kia kaua e kōrero ki tētahi tangata mō te tātaritanga HIV, mā te whakamahi i te tauhae e pā ana ki te āhuatanga hei take matua kia huna. I mate a ia i te 30 o ona tau. Ka kī tana pouaru: "Mai i taua wā, he maha ngā wā i whakaaro ai ahau he aha tēnei mate kino i whakaaetia ai kia whakapoke i ngā mano o ngā tāngata, tae atu ki ngā mano tini o ngā whanaunga me ngā kaitiaki i tino pāngia e ēnei mahi." E rua wiki te uiui tūmatanui o UK i Pākehā ki te whakarongo mai i ngā tūroro i pāngia e te HIV me te ate kakā mai i ngā hua toto tāhae i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, i ngā whānau hoki o ngā tāngata i whakapokea. I tapaina tētahi uiui tūmatanui tōmua ki ngā hua toto tāhae i Pākehā he "kākahu mā" e ngā tūpāpaku. E ono tau te roa o te Uiui Penrose - i whakaputaina i te tau 2015 - ā, neke atu i te £12m te utu, ahakoa he whāiti ōna mana me ōna ture tohutoro.

title: Ka titiro atu te Federal Reserve ki ētahi atu mokatere huamoni o Amerika
summary: E whakahau ana ētahi mema o te Federal Reserve i te pēke kia tere ake te whakapiki i ngā mokatere huamoni, he aha pea ka tohu i te huringa mai i te huarahi ā-nuku i roto i ngā tau tata nei.
text: E tūmanako ana rātau kia kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha me te utunga o te utunga hei whakamana i te mahi whakatuki ake i te wā waenganui. I whakatakotoria o rātau whakaaro i roto i ngā meneti o te hui a te pēke o Poutāpeta, i whakaputaina i te Wenerei. Ko ngā mākete tiritiri, e mātakitaki tata ana i ngā mokatere, i tohua i runga i te pānuitanga. Ka whakamahia e te Whāngai ngā mokatere huamoni hei utauta matua hei pupuri i te whakahaerenga o te US i runga i tētahi ara o te tupu tautokona me te whakahaere i te utunga moni. I tino whakahekea e ia ngā mokatere i te wā o te raruraru pūtea hei akiaki i ngā mahi ohaoha, engari kua pōturi te pikinga o te Whāngai i ngā mokatere i roto i ngā tau tata nei i te kaha o te whakahaerenga. He iti ake te poupou? I whakaae ngā kaiuru "tata katoa" kia tika tonu tētahi huarahi ā-nuku ki te whakapiki i ngā mokatere huamoni i te wā waenganui, e ai ki ngā meneti. Heoi anō, i kī "he tokomaha o ngā kaiuru" e tūmanako ana rātau kia kaha ake te tupu me te utunga moni i ngā tau tata nei, e hua ana ko te ara mō ngā mokatere huamoni "tērā pea ka iti ake te poupou i tā rātou i tūmanako ai i mua", e ai ki ngā meneti. I kōrerorerotia hoki e ngā mema te hiahia ki te kōrero "i tētahi wā" tērā pea ka neke ōna kaupapahere mai i te ngana ki te akiaki i ngā mahi ohaoha, ki te noho kūpapa - ki tētahi "āhuatanga tautāwhi" rānei. Ka puta mai ngā kōrero i muri i te pikinga o te tipu i tērā tau, nāna i pana te pāpātanga kore mahi ki te 4.1% - te taumata iti rawa mai i te tau 2000. E matapae ana ngā kaitohutohu ka whakanuia e ngā utu tāke me ngā whakapau moni tūmatanui kātahi anō ka whakanuia te tupu, ā, tērā pea ka utua te utunga. Heoi anō, he māharahara ngā tautohetohe hokohoko, ko te nuinga o ngā utu o ngā taonga i te US me Haina. Ko te pikinga o te mokatere moni a te Whāngai ka nui ake ngā mokatere mō ngā kiritaki me ngā umanga. Ka whai hua ngā kaitiaki, engari ka nui ake te utu o te nama, e whakaiti ana i ngā mahi i roto i ngā umanga pēnei i te whare me ngā hoko motokā, me te whakapiki i ngā utu mō ngā umanga e whakawhirinaki ana ki te nama.

title: Ka mate te kaiwhakarewa o Hays Travel i muri i te ngahoro i te mahi
summary: Kua mate te kaiwhakarewa o te māngai haere takitahi nui rawa o UK, a Hays Travel, i muri i te ngahorotanga i te tari matua o te umanga.
text: Ko John Hays te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o te umanga o Sunderland, i te taha o tana wahine me tana rangatira tahi ko Irene. Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā kaimahi o Tōma Kuki i te wā i pakaru taua kamupene i Whiringahora i tērā tau. I mate a Tēnā Hays "i a ia e mahi ana i te mahi i arohaina e ia" ā, i "tino manaakitia" e ngā kaimahi, ka kī tētahi kōrero. Kua 40 tau te kamupene e mahi ana. I roto i tētahi takoha ki a Mr Hays, ka kī te umanga: "Puta noa i tēnei tau uaua kua hipa atu i mahia e ia ngā mea katoa i runga i tōna kaha ki te tiaki i ngā mahi me te tiaki i te umanga haere. " I tino manaakitia ia e ana kaimahi, hoa mahi, whānau me ōna hoa, ā, i mōhiotia puta noa i tōna oranga mō ana mahi maha. "I rite tonu tana whakahīhī ki ana kaimahi pono." I whakaahuatia ia e Julie Elliot, Labour MP mō Sunderland Central, i roto i tētahi tweet he "tangata ātaahua me te kaiārahi pakihi whakaaweawe". I te tau 2016, i whakaahuatia e te Kaunihera o Sunderland, nāna ia i whakawhiwhia ki a ia a Freeman of the City i te tau 2016, tōna matenga he "ngaromanga nui". I kī te kaikaunihera o Graeme Miller, te kaiārahi o te kaunihera: "I tino pono tonu a ia ki Sunderland me te Rāwhiti ki te Raki i te wā i puritia ai e te kamupene ōna pakiaka ki konei, kāore tōna HQ i neke i Rānana. " Ahakoa i te whakatairanga i ngā tauira, i tōna whakauru rānei ki Sunderland AFC... I noho pono tonu a ia ki ōna pakiaka me ana kawenga hapori." I mua i te tangohanga o ngā rau o ngā toa o Thomas Cook i tērā tau, e 190 ngā toa, e 1,900 ngā kaimahi, me ngā hokonga o te £379m, e pūrongo ana i ngā hua o te £10m. I whakaahuatia e ia te hokonga hei "pūhuri kēmu" e tata ana ki te toru te maha o ngā toa o te umanga, ā, ka tāruatia ōna kaimahi. Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka pōti ngā kaimahi o te Tari Kāinga ki te tuki i ngā mahi me te utu
summary: E hia mano ngā mema o te uniana o ngā Ratonga Tūmatanui me ngā Ratonga Arumoni (PCS) i te Tari Kāinga kua tautuhia ki te tuki i ngā mahi, te utu me ētahi atu take.
text: I kī te PCS e 57.2% o te hunga i pōti i te mahi taraiwa - ko te neke atu ko te 20%. Ahakoa kāore anō kia tautuhia ngā rā, tērā te āhua o ngā tuki e pā ana ki ngā Kēmu Orimipia o Rāwāhi 2012 nā te mea kei roto ngā kaimahi o te Taitapa. I kī te Minita Manene, a Damian Green, he "tino kore whakaaetia" te tuki. Ko ngā taipitopito o ngā rā taraiwa me te āhua o te mahi mahi e tūmanakohia ana i te Tāite. Neke atu i te 75% o ngā mema i pōti i manakohia e te mahi poto noa iho te mahi tuki. I kī te uniana e tautohetohe ana mō ngā take tawhito ki te Tari Kāinga, tae atu ki ngā kaimahi o te UK Border Agency. Tata ki te 16,000 ngā mema uniana i pōtitia puta noa i te Tari Kāinga, tae atu ki te Taitapa, te Ratonga Tuakiri me te Uruwhenua me te Tari Pūkete Hara. I kī te PCS e haere tonu ana ngā tapahi i te UK Border Agency "ki te whakararuraru i ngā taitapa me ngā tūtira i ngā taunga rererangi". 'E whakararuraru ana i ngā ratonga tūmatanui' i kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o PCS, a Mark Serwotka: "E whakapono ana mātou kua mahi pōhēhē [ngā minita] i te tapahi i ngā mahi maha, ā, i te take o UKBA, kua ngana noa rātou ki te pepa i runga i ngā whāwhā mā te hora i ngā kaimahi tino whakangungu i o mātau taitapa. " Ki te kore ēnei take e whakataua, ka whakawehi rātou ki te tukituki i te kaha o te Tari Kāinga ki te whakarato i ngā ratonga tūmatanui nui, ā, kāore e taea e mātou te noho whakamuri me te whakaae kia puta tērā." I tēnei wiki ka kī te Tari Arotaupū ā-Motu kua whakatakotoria e te UK Border Agency e 1,000 anō ngā kaimahi i te mea e hiahiatia ana, ā, me utu ētahi atu tāngata me te whakanui i ngā wā whakaroa hei whakatutuki i tana kawenga mahi. I kī te uniana mō ōna mema ko ngā take whānui ake i raro i te tautohetohe ko: ngā ngaronga mahi, otirā ko ngā whakahōutanga whakahau; te utu me ngā here pēnei i ngā mahere a te kāwanatanga ki te whakakapi i te utu i te 1% mō ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei; me te whakawāteatanga, pēnei i te whakamahi i ngā kamupene tūmataiti hei whakawātea i tētahi whakaputunga o ngā nekeneke me ngā mahi whakangungu i te Taitapa. 'Kāore he mana' i whakatūpato a Tēnā Kākāriki ki te uniana kāore a ia i whakapono ka tautokona e te iwi whānui tētahi raruraru, a, ka karanga kia whakaarohia anōtia. Ka kī a ia: "Kotahi anake i roto i te 10 ngā mema PCS i pōti mō te mahi taraiwa. Kaore he mana o te kaiārahi uniana ki te karanga i ngā tuki whakararuraru i runga i tēnā take, ā, me whakaaro anō. "Ko te haumarutanga o te rohe o UK he tino hiranga, ā, ka whakamahia e mātou tā mātou puna kaimahi ohorere kia whakaiti ai mātou i ngā raruraru i takea mai i te mahi uniana kua whakaritea. "Ka kore rawa e whakaaetia ngā mahi e whakararuraru ana i te Omirangi, ā, e kore te iwi whānui e tautokona." Ko te PCS tētahi o ngā uniana nui rawa i te UK me ngā mema wāhanga tūmatanui e 250,000. Kua mahia e ngā mema PCS i te Tari Waka he mahi mahi i ngā wiki tata nei, i te wā e tautuhia ana ngā kaimahi i ētahi atu tari, tae atu ki ngā minita o te wawao me te ture, ki te pōti me pēhea te whakahau ki ngā tapahi.

title: I huraina ngā whitiāhua 'ngaro' a Andy Warhol
summary: Ahakoa e tino mōhiotia ana mō ana peita, e rima tau a Andy Warhol e whakaputa ana i ngā pikitia. Heoi anō, ko te nuinga kāore anō kia kitea mō ngā tekau tau, e whakaatu ana tētahi pukapuka hou.
text: Nā Vincent DowdWitness, BBC World Service I te mutunga o te tau 1963, ka rīhi a Andy Warhol i tētahi wheketere pōtae o mua i 231 East 47th Street i New York City. Ko te studio, kua ngaro roa, ka mōhiotia ko The Factory. I karangatia e ētahi tāngata ko Te Wheketere Hiriwa, nā te mea i te tuatahi tata tonu ngā mea katoa i hipokina ki te pepa hiriwa, ki te hiriwa peita rānei - tae atu ki te wharepaku. He tautau tērā mō ngā hoa o Warhol, mō ngā tautau maha hoki e tūmanako ana ka ūkuia e tōna rongonui nui ki a rātou. Engari he wāhi mahi anō tērā, e huri ana i ngā whakaahua hiraka i rongonui ai a Andy Warhol puta noa i te ao. Ehara i tēnā anake, engari i te whakamātau hoki te tau 37 tau ki te hanga pikitia. Kātahi anō ka whakaputaina e te mātauranga o Amerika o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Aotearoa. Tata tonu ki te tiaki i te tau ōrite. "I te nuinga o te wā ka whai whakaaro te tangata he aha tā rātou e whakaaro ai he kiriata Warhol, ahakoa kāore anō rātou kia kite," te kī a Crimp. "Engari kāore he momo kiriata Warhol kotahi. " Ka taea e koe te kī, i te nuinga o te wā kāore a ia i whakatika i ana pikitia. Engari i tua atu i tērā, he nui ngā rerekētanga. "Tērā ngā kiriata poto ngū, ko te nuinga o te pango me te mā. Engari tērā anō te Moe, he pikitia ngū roa rawa o [kaiwaiata mahinga] a John Giorno e moe ana. "Tērā rānei te Emepaea - he pūtiro pateko o te Whare Kāwanatanga o te Kāwanatanga e waru haora e haere ana. Nō muri mai he pikitia e kiia nei ko **** (Four Stars), e 25 haora te roa i te tuatahi." E ai ki a Crimp, ko ngā whitiāhua tōmua a Warhol "i hangaia ki tētahi kāmera Bolex, he 100 waewae tōna e whā meneti te wā mata. Nā reira ko tētahi pikitia Warhol 40 meneti, e 10 ngā tākai poto e honoa tahitia ana. "I muri iho ka tono ia i tētahi kāmera Auricon, i te tuatahi hei hanga i te Emepaea. E 33 meneti te roa, nā reira i huri ai tāna e taea ai." Anō hoki, tata ki te 500 ngā Whakamātautau Mata, he tākai kotahi o tētahi tangata i auau ki te Wheketere. He nui ērā i ngaro, engari he āhua anō mai i ngā āhuatanga o Lou Reed rāua ko Dennis Hopper. 'Tino tahanga' Ko tētahi tangata i puta mai i roto i te ringa o ngā pikitia o mua, he kaitapere taitamariki ko Allen Midgette. Ka mahara a ia ki tētahi pihi ātaahua i tū i waho o New York City. "I waea atu ahau ki te Wheketere kia kite i ngā mea e haere ana, ā, ka kī a Andy: 'Aue, kei te haere katoa mātou ki Philadelphia ki te hanga pikitia, he aha koe i kore ai e haere mai?' "I muri i ngā haora, ka mauria mātau e ia ki te Whare Taonga Toi, engari kāore a ia i mōhio he aha te pūtiro. " I homai e rātau he kākahu hope iti ki a au; ki te kore i tino tahanga ahau. I waenganui tonu o te rūma ko tēnei sphinx whakamīharo mai i Ihipa i runga i te pūhara. Nā reira ka piki ahau ki reira - i runga ahau i te LSD. "I wawe tonu te whiwhi a Andy, a, ka tīmata ki te tākaro. Tērā tētahi mea tino hihiri mo te hīkoi i roto i te tahanga o tētahi sphinx Ihipiana." Ka puta hoki a Midgette i roto i te Wharekai Tahanga, he pikitia Warhol e kī ana a ia ko tōna ariā. "I kī atu ahau ki a Andy, he aha koe e kore ai e rēti i tētahi wharekai, ā, māku e tākaro te kaiwaiata? " Na, i whakaaro ahau kāore pea he mea e puta, engari i taku mīharo ka kī mai a ia i tētahi rā: 'Aue, i kitea e mātau he wharekai.' "Nā reira ko te mea panuku ka tonoa mātou katoa kia tangohia o mātau kākahu. Kāore anō kia whai wāhi i roto i ngā whitiāhua - i ngā wā katoa ka tono rātau ki a koe kia tangohia ō kākahu ka noho noa iho ki reira." 'Tipua titonga' I roto i ngā kiriata o Karaihe o muri ake pēnei i a Au i Shot Andy Warhol me Factory Girl - i tākaro ai a Sienna Miller i te 'muse' o Warholian Edie Sedgwick - Ka whakaaturia te Wheketere hei kōaro. Engari e kī ana a Midgette ehara i te pērā. "Ehara te Wheketere i te wāhi whakamere," tana whakamārama. "I te wā e haere ana te whakaahuatanga kāore i taea e koe te kī e whakahaere ana a Andy: kāore a ia i te kōrero i tētahi kupu. " Kāore a ia i whakarite i a koe mō taua mea, ā, kāore he pōreareatanga: ahakoa he aha te mea i tūpono. Ehara i te pēnei i tēnei whakaaro o Karaihe. "I a koe e haere mai ana, tērā pea ka tohu atu a Andy i tētahi pikitia me te kī: 'Aue, e hiahia ana koe ki te mahi i tētahi peita iti ki tērā?' "I kī tonu ahau kāo nā te mea kāore au i te utua hei kaitapere, nā reira he aha ahau me peita ai, ā, kaua hoki e utua?" Heoi kāore a Crimp e whakaae ehara a Warhol i te kaiwhakahaere. "Tērā pea he pono tētahi wāhanga o ngā kiriata o mua, he kāmera pateko tōna: ka tukua e ia ngā kaitapere kia haere tonu me te mahi i ngā mea katoa e hiahia ana rātau. " Engari i te wā ka tae koe ki ana kiriata o muri ake, he kāmera tino pūkoro tā te nuinga o rātou, ā, ka kite koe i te mātauranga hanganga o Warhol. He tangata tino nui a ia i roto i te hītori o te whare pikitia tāne." I kitea he iti noa iho te taunga o te pikitia a Warhol i te tau 1967, ā, mō tētahi wā, te āhua nei ka taea e ngā whitiāhua Warhol te mahi moni. I tēnei wā he maha ngā tākainga i karangatia e te hoa mahi o Warhol, a Paul Morrissey. E kī ana a Crimp ko tētahi wāhanga o te huringa nā te mea kua ngāwari kē atu te tohatoha i ngā kiriata pono i roto i a Mātau. Ahakoa he whāiti te ihirangi erotic o te nuinga o ngā kiriata Warhol, he rongo tōtika tō rātou mō te mārama. I Pipiri 1968 ka mauria e Valerie Solanas he hurihuri, a, ka pūhia a Warhol ki te tauwāhi hou o Te Wheketere i Union Square. I waimarie a ia i ora ai. 'Brand Warhol' I muri i tana whakaoranga, ka ngaro tana hiahia ki te hanga pikitia. Ahakoa rā, i haere tonu a Morrissey ki te whakahaere i ngā taitara āhuahira-roa pēnei i te Flesh and Heat i hokona hei wāhanga o 'Brand Warhol'. Ko te nuinga o nga pikitia i ngaro atu i te tirohanga i te tīmatanga o nga tau 70. Engari e whakaaro ana a Douglas Crimp i noho whakaawe tonu rātau. "I taua wā ko rātau te pūtahi o te whakamātautau i raro i te whenua. Mai i te matenga o Warhol [i te tau 1987] kua āta hoki mai rātau ki te rererangi." E kī ana a Crimp, kua kite a Crimp i ētahi o ngā whitiāhua, ā, i whakaawetia e rātou. Ahakoa neke atu i te haurua o ngā kiriata Wheketere kua whakaoratia ināianei, he uaua tonu ki te hopu. Ko te MoMA i Niu Ioka anake e rēti ana i ngā tārua 16mm, ā, i ētahi wā ka whakaaetia ngā taiwhanga mamati i ētahi wā. He ruarua ngā taitara i puta mai i Itari, engari kāore anō kia whakamanatia te putanga DVD. Engari tērā pea ko to rātau tūponotanga tata i hoatu ai ki ngā pikitia a Warhol to rātau wāhi i roto i te pūrākau o Amerika o nga tau kotahi rau e ono tekau mā rua. Our Kind of Movie: The Films of Andy Warhol by Douglas Crimp is published in the US by The MIT Press.

title: Tautohetohe rākau Sheffield: I pā ngā utu ā-ture o te kaunihera ki te £250k
summary: Kua whakahaeretia e te Kaunihera Taone o Sheffield tētahi pire ā-ture e £250,000 e tiaki ana i ngā mahi tukituki rākau, kua huraina e te HAU.
text: Ko te tapeke, kei roto ko ngā ratonga ture, ngā utu tohutohu me ētahi atu utu, ko ngā whakarongo kōti i te 2016 me te 2017 e pā ana ki te aronui Streets Ahead. I kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau i te utu ki ngā kaihautū i te taone "tērā pea ka karohia". I kī tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera, he "huarahi hāngai" me te rapu i te "mahi tino pai" mō ngā kaihautū. Hei wāhanga o Streets Ahead, he kaupapa haere tonu e £2bn hei whakapai ake i ngā huarahi me ngā ara waewae i Sheffield, tata ki te 5,500 ngā rākau kua tapahia mai i te tau 2012. E tohe ana te mana i te hunga i tohua mo te tukituki i te mate, i te mate, i te tūkino rānei, engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau kua ngaro hoki ētahi rākau hauora. Kua mōhio te AO e £149,660 i pau i runga i ngā utu e hono ana ki tētahi raupapa e aukati ana i ngā tāngata e pupuri ana i te mahi mā te tū i roto i ngā rohe haumaru i hangaia huri noa i ngā rākau kua whakamatea. I pau tētahi atu £103,701 i muri i te mahi ā-ture a ngā kaiwhakahauhau i te tau 2016, e kī ana kua rahua te kaunihera ki te aromatawai i te pānga taiao o te hinga. I ākiritia e te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike te tono mō tētahi arotakenga ā-ture ki roto i te hōtaka, ā, i tukuna e te kaunihera he whakahau i a Aotearoa ki ērā "hara i roto i ngā ārai haumaru". I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te Reo Irirangi o TE Reo Irirangi o Aotearoa, i kī a Bryan Lodge, te mema kāpata o te Kaunihera Taone o Sheffield mō te taiao me te tirohanga tiriti, i kī i mua ko te rōpū ngaro i roto i tētahi mahi tūmatanui "e utu ana i ngā utu". Ahakoa tēnei, kua rapu noa iho te kaunihera i ngā utu "tūturu" mai i ngā mema tokotoru o te Rōpū Hohenga Rākau o Sheffield (STAG) i tonoa kia utu i te £1,000 ia. I kī a Dave Dillner, te kaiwhakarewa o STAG: "Ko te hē o te kaunihera, nā te mea i taea te karo, ka taea e rātau te mahi tahi me mātau. " Ko STAG he tangata āwangawanga o Sheffield kua whawhai ki te tiaki i tō rātou taiao mō tēnei whakatupuranga me ngā whakatupuranga e heke mai nei." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Lodge: "I te mutunga, i kitea he tika te hōtaka whakakapinga rākau tiriti i runga i ngā tatau katoa e te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike, ā, i tukuna he whakahau hei ārai i te hara i roto i ngā ārai haumaru huri noa i ngā mahi rākau. " Mā ētahi atu mahi ā-ture hei whakaora i ngā utu nui ake, ka hua mai he utu pāhono, ā, he āhua kore hua te mahi."

title: Ka piki ake ngā whika tupu i te wā e piki ana te mokatere
summary: I nui ake te tupunga o te āhua o te UK i te tupu i roto i ngā marama e toru ki Mahuru - ka whakanuia te pikinga o ngā mokatere huamoni i Whiringa ā Rangi.
text: I piki te hua ā-whare nui (GDP) mō te hauwhā i te 0.4% i whakaritea ki te 0.3% i ia hauwhā tuatahi e rua o te 2017, e ai ki ngā whika hōu rawa o te Office for National Statistics. I kī nga kaitohutohu he rama kākāriki nga whika mo te pikinga mokatere a tērā wiki. Ki te puta, ko te pikinga tuatahi mai i te 5 o Hōngongoi 2007. Ināianei kei te tohu ngā mākete pūtea i tētahi tūponotanga 84% ka piki ake ngā mokatere mai i tō rātou pūkete o nāianei iti iho i te 0.25% ina tūtaki te Komiti Kaupapahere Moni o Ingarangi (MPC) i te 2 o Whiringa ā-Rangi. I whakaaturia e Kāwana Mark Carney ki te AO i tērā marama ka piki pea ngā utu i te "wā tata rawa". I kī te kaitohutohu o UK, o Ruth Gregory, o te kamupene rangahau Capital Economics, ko ngā whika "tērā pea kua hiritia te mahi i runga i te pikinga mokatere huamoni a tērā wiki". Ahakoa he tokomaha nga kaitohutohu e pāoro ana i taua tirohanga, e whakaaro ana ētahi ka puritia e te Pēke o Ingarangi ngā mokatere ki te wāhi e noho ana. "Mēnā ka taea e tātau te kohikohi... he whakaterenga o te tupu ohaoha he iti rawa ka taea e koe te kimokimo me te hapa, ka pai ake te whakaaro o te Pēke o Ingarangi ki te pikinga mokatere a tērā wiki," te kī a Te Pēke o Ingarangi mai i Minerva Lending. Ka piki ake ngā mokatere huamoni a tērā wiki? Mā te tātaritanga a te kaiwhakatika ohaoha o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Ingarangi e whakakaha i ngā tohenga a ngā kāhu mokatere huamoni i runga i te komiti kaupapahere moni a te Pēke o Ingarangi. A tērā Rāite, ka tūtaki te komiti tautuhi mokatere a te Pēke ki te whakatau mēnā ka whakarewaina ngā mokatere huamoni mō te wā tuatahi i roto i te tekau tau. Na te utunga o te utunga i te 3%, kua tohu a Mark Carney, te kāwana, kei runga i ngā kāri te pikinga. Ā, he kaha ake te tipu o te ohaoha i te tokomaha o ngā kaitohutohu i tūmanakohia ai, ka whakakaha te hunga e tautoko ana i taua aronga haere i runga i te MPC. Kia mārama, he iti noa iho te pikinga o te mokatere. Ā, ka āta piki haere te mokatere ā muri ake. Engari kei te tuku te Pēke i tētahi karere mārama - pōturi, i te mutunga, kua mutu te wā o ngā mokatere huamoni iti rawa o te hītori. Neke atu i te hēneti te piki o te pauna ki te tāra, a, tata tonu ki te hēneti ki te ūropi i roto i ngā haora tuatahi o te tauhokohoko i muri i te pānuitanga. I kī a Tumuaki Piripi Hammond: "He mahi angitu, manahau hoki tā mātou e tautoko ana i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata mahi. " Ko taku arotahi ināianei, me te haere ki te Pūtea, kei te whakarewa i te hua kia taea ai e mātou te tuku i ngā mahi utu teitei ake me te paerewa ora pai ake." I kī te tumuaki kōruru o John McDonnell: "Kāore te UK i te tere te tipu ki te nuinga o o mātau hoa tauhokohoko i te EU, i te Hononga o Amerika rānei. " Kāore e taea e te Tumuaki te huna tonu i ngā take, nā te mea ko tana huarahi ki te whakahaere i ngā tikanga mahi e tino mōrearea ana i ngā paerewa ora o te iwi mahi." Ko te kaitāpae nui rawa atu ki te tipu i te hauwhā tuatoru ko te wāhanga ratonga, i whakawhānuitia e te 0.4%. Ko te tikanga, ko te papatono rorohiko, ko ngā kaihokohoko mīhini me ngā kaihoko ngā umanga i whakaatu i te mahinga tino kaha. I whakawhānuitia te whakanao mā te 1% i te hauwhā - he hokinga ki te tupu i muri i te koata tuarua ngoikore. Heoi anō, i kirimana te hanganga i te 0.7% i te hauwhā, ka tere ake mai i te 0.5% hekenga i tuhia i roto i ngā marama e toru kua hipa.

title: I muri i te tata ki te toru tau ka puta atu te rangatira o Makitānara, a Don Thompson
summary: I muri i te rua me te hāwhe tau i roto i te mahi, kei te whakararo te rangatira o Makitānara, a Don Thompson, i te wā e raruraru tonu ana te kamupene ki tētahi pūtake kiritaki whakapeka i te US.
text: Ka whakakapia ia e Steve Easterbrook, te āpiha matua o te kamupene o nāianei, i Poutāpeta. "He uaua ki te poroporoaki ki te McFamily," te kī a Tēnā Thompson, he toa 25 tau, i roto i tētahi pānuitanga pēhi. Kātahi anō ka pūrongotia e Makitānara ngā hua whakakino. Ko ngā whiwhinga hauwhā tuawhā ko te $1.1bn, heke iho i te 21% mai i te tau i mua. I pūrongotia hoki e te kamupene tana whakapeka tuarima o ngā hokohoko. Ko te mea nui, ko ngā hokonga i te mākete whai hua o AMERIKA i heke iho i te 4.1%, i te mea kei te karo tonu ngā kiritaki o Amerika i a Makitānara, e manakohia ana e ngā wharekai "tere-noa" pēnei i a Chipotle me Shake Shack. I muri i te tukunga o ngā moni whiwhinga i tērā Paraire, ka kī a Makitānara ka noho tonu ōna hua i raro i te pēhanga mō ngā marama maha e whai ake nei i a ia e whai ana ki te whakahoki i ngā kiritaki ki ngā huringa tahua. Kei te anga atu hoki te kamupene ki tētahi take mahi i te US, i reira ngā mahi ki te whakakotahi i ngā kaimahi kai tere i puta ai ki te pāpātanga o ngā whakawāteatanga. I utua a Tēnā Tomihana e $9.5m i te tau 2013, te tau hōu rawa e wātea ana ngā raraunga. Ko tōna kaiwhakawhiwhi, ko Steve Easterbrook, i tipu ake i Watford, UK, ā, i mua i whakahaere i ngā mekameka wharekai Pizza Express me Wagamama. I haere a ia ki te Kura Wetereo o Watford Boys, ā, i ako i ngā Pūtaiao Māori i te Whare Wānanga o Durham, i mua i tana nohonga hei kaikaute i Price Waterhouse.
