Ka noho a Tēnā Easterbrook ko te tuarua anake o te rangatira nui o Amerika ki te whakahaere i a Makitānara.

title: Kōhuru o Perewa: Ka peia e Tiamana e rua nga kaiwhakahaere o Rūhia
summary: I ngā marama i muri i te pūhia o tētahi tangata i tētahi pāka o Perewa, ka makaia e Tiamana e rua ngā kaiwhakahaere Rūhia nā te mea e whakapae ana i whakahaua te kōhuru e Rūhia, e te whenua o Rūhia rānei.
text: I muri noa iho i te whakatau a te rōia nui o Tiamana ki te whakahaere i te kēhi, ka puta mai nga pananga. Kua whakapaea e Tiamana a Rūhia i te korenga e āwhina i te tūhuratanga. Kua whakakāhoretia e Rūhia ngā whakapae o tōna whakauru he "tino koretake" me te kī ka utua. I pūhia a Zelimkhan Khangoshvili, he rangatira whakakeke o Aotearoa, e 40 tau te pakeke o mua, i muri i te pāka o Kleiner Tiergarten i a Aotearoa. I tere te hopukina o tētahi tangata, engari he iti noa iho ngā mōhiohio i hoatu ki nga pirihimana. Kua whakataurite te pāpāho Tiamana i te whakaekenga o Kēngoshvili ki te kōhurutanga o te māngai mōhiohio o Rūhia o Rūhia, o Rūhia me tana tamāhine i UK i tērā tau. I tētahi wā uaua ka puta mai te haupae whakawhanaunga mō ngā whenua e rua, e rima rā i mua i tētahi tihi nui o Ukraine e pā ana ki ngā kaiārahi o Tiamana, Rūhia, Wīwī me Ukraine. He aha i whakapaetia ai a Rūhia? "He rawaka ngā take pono hei huatau ko te patunga... i kawea mō ngā kaupapa kāwanatanga o te Tōpūtanga o Rūhia, mō ērā rānei o te Whenua Motuhake o Rūhia, hei wāhanga o te Tōpūtanga o Rūhia," te kī a te rōia a te rangatira o Tiamana i te Wenerei. I muri noa iho i te patunga, ka whakaraua te kaipōhēhē i te kitenga i a ia e mahue ana i tētahi paihikara, pū me te wig ki te Awa pātata o Spree. E kī ana te rōia i rere te kaipōhēhē mai i Mohihi ki te taunga rererangi o Charles de Gaulle i Parihi e ono rā i mua i te patunga i raro i te ingoakē o Vadim S. Vadim S i puta tuatahi mai i roto i tētahi uruwhenua kāinga o Rūhia i te tau 2015. Nā ngā pūrongo i te Tūtira i huatau ko tōna ingoa katoa ko Vadim Sokolov, e 49, ahakoa kāore i whakaarotia ko tōna tuakiri tūturu. Kātahi ka kīia kua rere a Vadim S ki Pōkākā i noho ai ia i tētahi hōtēra tae noa ki te 22 o Aotearoa. E ai ki nga rōia, i kī te visa a te kaipōhēhē e haere ana a ia hei kaipūkaha tūmatanui e mahi ana mō tētahi kamupene i Hato Pāremata, ko Zao Rust te ingoa. Heoi anō, ko te āhua nei kei raro te kamupene i te "whakaraupapa anō" me te tau waeatuhi kua whakarārangitia mōna ka tautapatia hoki ki ngā kamupene o te minita waea o Rūhia. Ko wai te whakapae? He ingoakē a Vadim S, e kī ana nga rōia. Ahakoa e kīia ana e rātau ko Vadim K anake, kua whakaingoatia e te paetukutuku rangahau ko Bellingcat te tangata e pupuri ana ko Vadim Krasikov, i whānau mai i Aotearoa 1965 i Sovieti Kazakhstan. E whakaahua ana ngā rōia i a Vadim K hei whakapae i te kōhurutanga o tētahi kaipāngai Rūhia i Mohihi i te tau 2013. I whakatata atu hoki te tūkino i taua whakaekenga e tētahi tangata i runga paihikara nāna ia i pūhia ki muri o te māhunga. I tukuna he whakamana hopu e Mohihi i te tau 2014, engari i unuhia i a Hōngongoi 2015. He pēhea te urupare a Rūhia? I muri i te kōhurutanga o Aotearoa, ka kī tētahi kōrero Rūhia kāore he pānga ki Rūhia, ki ōna mana rānei. I te Wenerei , i whakaahuatia e te kāwanatanga o Rūhia i Berlin te hipanga o Tiamana he tōrangapū, a, i kī i tino matekiri i te whakataunga. I kī te minita ā-rohe i Mohihi ka whakahaua kia urupare ki ngā tikanga whakautu. I kī atu a Leonid Slutsky, te upoko o te komiti o te take ā-rohe o Rūhia (pāremata), ki te wāhi rongokōrero o Interfax ko te pananga o ngā kaiwhakahaere tokorua he hipanga whakarihariha, ā, ko te "wairangi o Rūhia". I kī atu te Tumuaki o Hēnea ki nga kaipānui i te tihi o te NATO i Watford, tata ki Rāwāhi: "I whakataua e mātau tēnei whakataunga nā te mea kāore mātau i kite e tautoko ana a Rūhia i a mātau ki te whakawātea i tēnei kōhuru." Ko wai te tūkinotanga? I roto i tana kōrero i te Wenerei (i te reo Tiamana), i kitea e te rōia a te rangatira o Tiamana te tūkino ko "Tornike K". E kiia ana he maha nga tau e noho ana a Khangoshvili i Georgia i raro i te ingoa o Tornike Kavtarashvili. I whawhai a Kēngoshvili i te pakanga tuarua o Rūhia ki ngā ope Rūhia i Kaukaka ki te Raki i te wā 2001-2005. He urunga tata a ia no te Perehitini o Rūhia o Aslan Maskhadov, nāna i whakahaere te ātete toitū o Rūhia ki Rūhia i mua i tana matenga i roto i tētahi poho ope motuhake o Rūhia. I rere a Khangoshvili ki Tiamana i muri i te matenga i te pūmatua o Hōriana o Tbilisi i te tau 2015. I tono whakangungu a ia i Tiamana, engari kāore i whakaaetia. Ināianei kei te whakahaeretia a Akinaia e Ramzan Kadyrov, he hunga whakakeke o mua nāna i whakawhiti taha, ā, ināianei kua tino pono ki te Perehitini o Rūhia o Tūroro.

title: E £100k te wāriu o te pū Hainamana i kitea i roto i te māra
summary: Kaore tētahi whānau mai i te raki o Wales i mōhio he pū Hainamana o te rau tau 18 e noho ana i roto i ta rātau kāri o muri.
text: Tata ki te 120 tau te noho o te pū repo ki te whānau, ā, i kitea e tētahi tohunga i haere mai ki te uara i ētahi atu tūemi i to rātau kāinga. Nō te tau 1789, i te wā o Qianlong, ā, kua uaratia i te whare hoko o Duke of Dorchester i te £100,000. I kī te Tumuaki Whakahaere me te Upoko o te Toi Āhia a Lee Young he "kitenga ātaahua". I neke te whānau, nō Anglesey, ki Dorchester i Dorset, ā, i whakamahia te pū hei whakapaipai māra. I kī a Tēnā Young he tino rerekē te pū hōia e 258 kiroki (40 9lb) i Ingarangi, i te mea he uaua te kite i waho o Āhia. "He tino āhua kore tēnei kitenga", tana kī. "Ka kite koe i ēnei i ngā wāhi pēnei i Pēhi, engari ehara i te mea ka hoki mai i Haina, nā reira he āhua ohorere te kite i roto i te kāri o muri o tētahi tangata." Ka hokona te pū repo i te Mane 9 o Whiringa ā Rangi, e uaratia ana ki te £100,000. I kī a Mr Young kua noho tiketike tonu te painga o te ao whānui e whiwhi ana i ngā rota pēnei, ahakoa he rāhuitanga coronavirus e whakahau ana kia haere mamati. Ko te hītori E ai ki ngā kaihoko e hoko ana i te pū parahi Hainamana ātaahua, i te tau 1789, i te wā o Qianlong. Ko te pū pū 258kg e mau ana i te tuhituhinga o te toru o nga marama o te tau 54 o Qianlong (1789), Governors Cup, mai i Guo Xing Fu te rōpū kaihokohoko. Ko Guo Xing Fu te whakahaere i te hokohoko moana puta noa i te tonga ki te tonga o Haina, i hokona e nga kaihokohoko tawahi katoa nga utanga kaweake Hainamana ki te tauranga moana o Xiamen i te wa o te hurihanga o nga rangatiratanga o Ming me Qing.

title: Coronavirus: Ko te roma tāpaetanga kiriata e toru ana i roto i te raka
summary: Kua tikiake ngā kiriata hou i te nuinga o te wā i whakaritea ai ngā tikanga raka noho i te kāinga i te UK.
text: E ai ki te Mea, ko te rōpū parenga ā-hinengaro o te UK, ko ngā hononga katoa ki ngā pae roma kore mana i tāruatia i waenganui i a Hui tanguru me Aperira. A, mō ētahi kiriata kātahi anō ka tukua, kua torutoru. I kī a Kieron Sharp, te rangatira nui o Fact, ehara i te mea ohorere. "He mea nui kia maumahara ko te huarahi ā-ture anake o te mātakitaki kiriata mā ngā kaiwhakarato whaimana. " Ko ia hononga pirated ka kitea e mātou e whakakāhore ana i te kaipupuri motika o te moni e tika ana ki a rātou, ā, ka whakawehi hoki i te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā ihirangi ā muri ake." Kāore te mea i whakaingoatia ngā kiriata i kite i ētahi tara i roto i te roma, engari i whakahauhau i ngā tāngata kia pūrongo i ngā pūtake ture kore mana e puta mai ana ki Crimestoppers. Ko ōna kitenga e kitea ana i roto i ētahi atu akoranga. I kitea e te umanga aroturuki tāpaetanga a Muso ngā waka ki ngā pae roma me ngā pae tikiake kore mana i tata ki te 60% i te wā o Poutāpeta. I kitea neke atu i te 300 miriona ngā toronga ki ngā pae tāpaetanga i te UK, ā, neke atu i te kotahi miriona i te US. I kite te kiriata toa o Oscar Parasite i te pikinga o te tono 240% i runga i ngā pae roma kore mana i te tīmatanga o te mate urutā. Ko te kiriata 2011, Contagion, mō tētahi tīmatanga huaketo, i kite i te pikinga o ngā toronga roma tāpaetanga o te 151%.

title: Te ahi o te whare o Stafford: Ko te tarukino me te paera i whakataua hei take o te mura
summary: Ko te ahi o te whare i mate ai ngā tamariki tokowhā, ehara i te mea i takea mai i te tupunga o te tarukino, i te pahū rānei o te paera, kua kī pirihimana.
text: I mate a Riley Holt, waru, Keegan Unitt, ono, Tilly Rose Unitt, whā, me Olly Unitt, tokotoru, i te mura i Highfields i Stafford i tērā Tūrei. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Staffordshire kua whakataua e rātau ngā take e rua o te ahi i waenganui i te taurangi tuihono. Kua utua tētahi wahine, e 24, me tētahi tāne, e 28, i runga i te whakapae i te patu tangata i te whakawāwā nui. I kī atu tētahi kōrero mō te tōpana ki te AO ka taea e rātau te "whakahaere i te tupu o te tarukino [mana], ā, kāore hoki e whakapono kei roto te paera" i muri i te taurangi pāpāho pāpori i runga i te take o te ahi. I kī rātau kei te haere tonu te mahi whakamātautau. I tēnei wā e noho ana te wahine me te tāne i tētahi wāhitau i waho o te rohe. I whakaraua rātau e ngā āpiha tata ki te 13:30 GMT i te Paraire, ā, kua utua tae noa ki Poutāpeta. I te wā o te ahi, ka peke te whaea o nga tamariki, a Natalie Unitt, me tana hoa 28 tau, a Pirihi Moulton, i te matapihi papa tuatahi me te tuakana o nga tuakana, o Jack, i te wā o te ahi. Kaore rātau i pā ki ngā whara whakamate. Mai i tērā wā ka kohia e tētahi whārangi kohi moni mō te whānau neke atu i te £30,000 - neke atu i te 1,900 ngā tāngata e koha ana. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Outdoor education cuts short-sighted says council leader
summary: Kua whakapaea e tētahi kaiārahi kaunihera e toru ngā mana noho tata he "kite poto" i te matenga o tētahi ratonga mātauranga o waho.
text: A centre at Talybont, Powys, will close after Newport and Torfaen scrapped funding for the Gwent Outdoor Education Service Partnership, with Blaenau Gwent saying it would follow suit. Ka tuwhera tonu te kaunihera o Monmouthshire i ngā pokapū tata ki Monmouth me Abergavenny. Council leader Peter Fox said it was a valuable service which enriched lives. The four councils have been in partnership since 1996 to provide reduction-cost outdoor education at three centres - Hilston Park near Monmouth, Gilwern Outdoor Centre near Abergavenny, and Talybont Outdoor Centre in Powys. Engari kua rītahatia te pūtea e te rua tuatoru mai i te £340,000 i te 2012/13 ki te £112,000 i te 2017/18. I hua tēnei i te whā o ngā tau e rima kua hipa, ka kī tētahi pūrongo a ngā āpiha kaunihera o Monmouthshire i a Hakihea. The Talybont site - a former railway station - will now close in February and be returned to site owners Newport City Council for disposal. Tokorua ngā mema kaimahi - he kaiwhakarite pae me tētahi tunu kai - ka whakakorea i te utu e £30,000, e ai ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. I whakaae ngā kaiārahi Tūturu i Monmouthshire i te Wenerei ki te memeha i te mahi ngātahi me te whakahaere tonu i ngā pūtahi e toe ana, kei te takiwā. Councillor Fox said the cabinet believed in outdoor education and would continue to deliver it. "Kei te tango mai ngā mana ā-rohe i tētahi mea tino whai hua, [i reira] ka taea e tātau te whakanui i te oranga o te tamaiti," tana kī. "Ki te unu i tēnā mō ngā mea iti rawa i roto i te tauine o ngā tahua, kāore au i te mārama he aha rātou i mahi ai." I kī a Richard John, mema kāpata mō ngā tamariki me ngā rangatahi, e tūmanako ana ia ka "whai hua tonu" ngā rangatahi mai i ngā pūtahi e toe ana. "Engari e pouri ana kei te mutu tēnei tauira nui o te ngātahitanga," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ko ngā hopunga o te hunga hara wahine tuihono e ngā pirihimana o Welsh 'taurua'
summary: Kua tāruatia te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i mau i te tikiake i ngā atahanga whakarihariha o ngā tamariki i te tau kua taha, e ai ki tētahi pirihimana matua.
text: Nā Te Wānanga o Te T E kī ana ngā āpiha whakamātautau ka mōrearea pea te rangatahi nā te kore huarahi pai ki te whakaora i te hunga hara. Engari e kī ana te Manatu Ture e tīmata ana tētahi hōtaka hou i tēnei wiki. I kī te Kaiāwhina Rangatira Kātipa i ngā Pirihimana o South Wales a Jonathan Drake: "Tērā pea e rua ngā hopunga me ngā mahi i te tau i mua, ā, e kite ana ahau ka tipu tonu taua tau i te wā poto. " Engari ko taku karere matua he pai ake te ārai i te rongoā." As part of the 18 month long operation, police have been working with child safety charity, the Lucy Faithfull Foundation, which ACC Drake says helps offenders - and potential offenders - understand and address their behaviour. "E whakapono ana ahau ka tino pai te wā ki te whakaiti i tēnā momo hara," tana kī. Engari tērā pea ka hinga te hunga kua herea ki te uru ki ngā atahanga whakarihariha i waenganui i ngā āputa i muri i te tangohanga a te Manatu Ture i ngā akoranga mō te hunga hara i tērā tau i kitea ai e tētahi pūrongo ka whakanuia e rātau te mōrea o te hara anō. I kī atu a Tania Bassett, mai i te National Association of Probation Officers, ki te hōtaka BBC Wales Live kua mahue i a rātau te "kore" o ngā raweke tauwhāiti mō te hunga e uru ana ki ngā atahanga whakarihariha i runga i te ipurangi. Ka kī a ia: "Ināianei kei te whakamahi mātou i tētahi hōtaka hara ā-waha whānui ake, ā, kāore i te tino kōrero i ngā take tauwhāiti o te hara ipurangi. " Ki te kore tātau e whakatau i ngā take taketake o te hara tōnā, ka haere tonu te tangata ki te hara anō." Kua kōrero a BBC Wales Live ki tētahi tangata kua hereheretia e toru ngā wā mō te mātakitaki me te tohatoha i ngā mano o ngā whakaahua whakarihariha o ngā tamariki. "He take tūkino nāku i te tamaiti," tana kī. "I muri i te kaha ake o te Ipurangi, ka whakaatu rātau i a rātau i roto i te āhuaahua tūturu, kātahi ka neke kē atu ki ngā atahanga tūkino tamariki." I kī a ia i mōhio a ia kua tūkinotia ngā tamariki, engari i taea e ia te "whakaiti i aua whakaaro". 'Tūkinotanga tē mōhiotia' E whakahē ana a ia ki ngā akoranga i mahia e ia i roto i te whare herehere - ko ngā akoranga ōrite kua tangohia ināianei - ā, kāore i rongo i te pai. Ināianei ka utua e ia te tautoko mai i te aroha o Monmouthshire, o StopSO. "Kāore au i konei ki te mahi i tētahi momo take mo te atawhai ki ngā tāngata e mahi ana i ngā hara tōnā, ehara tēnā i taku rārangi take. He hara whakamataku rātau e tūkino ana ki ngā tūpāpaku. "Engari ki te tika tō whakahaere i te whakapae o taua hara, ka iti iho ō tūpāpaku," tana kī. E kī ana a Juliet Grayson, tētahi o ngā kaiwhakaū o StopSO, kāore i te nui te aro atu ki te whakaora i te hunga hara wahine. "Nā te mea kāore e taea e te tangata te kī, 'māmā kei a au tēnei āhuatanga tōkai rerekē ki ngā tamariki, ka taea e koe te tiki āwhina ki a au", kāore rātau e whiwhi i te āwhina. "I ētahi wā ka kī atu ahau ki ngā tāngata 'ka pēhea tō whakaaro mēnā ko tō tama e haere mai ana ki a koe e kī ana e hiahia āwhina ana rātou?' E hiahia ana koe kia whiwhi rātou i te āwhina haumanu ka taea e rātou te whakamutu - kāore rānei e tīmata i te wāhi tuatahi." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te Ratonga Whare Herehere me te Ratonga Whakamātautau ināianei kei te whakamōhio i te iHorizon, he akoranga whakaora hōu mō te hunga kua mahi i ngā hara ā-waha i runga i te ipurangi anake hei "āwhina i ngā kaiuru ki te whakawhanake i ngā pūkenga pai ake hei whakahaere i tō rātou mōrea o te hara anō". I kī te kaiwhakaatu kāore he āputa i roto i te whakarato, ā, "ka puritia e mātou ngā hōtaka rongoā katoa i raro i te arotakenga auau". Ka wātea a BBC Wales Live i te BBC iPlayer i muri tata mai i te pāohotanga i runga i te BBC One Wales i te 22:30 i te Wenerei 9 Me.

title: Ko te urupare tono a Donna Keogh 'tino pai'
summary: He urupare "tino nui" tētahi paetukutuku i whakatūria hei whakahauhau i ngā kaiārahi hou ki te ngaronga o tētahi taitamariki i te 20 tau ki mua, ka kī pirihimana.
text: E toru wiki ki muri i whakarewaina ai tētahi tūhuratanga anō ki te ngaronga i te tau 1998 o Donna Keogh, 17 tau, mai i Middlesbrough. Neke atu i te 4,000 ngā tāngata kua haere ki te pae FindDonna, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana. Kua whakapārewa kē atu ki ngā mātua o Donna mo tana whakahaere i tana tūhuratanga tōmua. I tua atu i ngā toronga paetukutuku, ka kī ngā pirihimana kua tiria te tono e hia mano i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. Kai te kitea tōna ngaronga hai kōhuru. I kī a Det Supt Michael Hunt: "E rua tekau tau mai i tōna ngarotanga, he tino rawe te urupare a te iwi o Middlesbrough ki tā mātou tūhuratanga whakahōu. " Kua whiwhi hoki mātou i te maha o ngā waea waea, e tuku mōhiohio ana ki ngā āpiha. "He moata rawa ki te kōrero anō, engari ka tino tūhura mātou i ngā mōhiohio ka whiwhi mātou, ā, ka mahi mātou ki te whāinga kia mārama ki te mea i pā ki a Donna." Ko te ngaronga o te tamaiti i Aperira 1998 tētahi o ngā take e toru e tūhuratia ana e te tōpana i muri i te whakawhiwhinga ki te £3.77m e te Tari Kāinga. I kitea te tinana o Te Karaehe o Te Raki o Te Raki o Whiringa 2000, e ono wiki i muri i tana ngaro i Middlesbrough. I huri a ia ki te kairautanga hai pūtea i tana tūkinotanga heroine. I mahi a Rahera Uira, he kaimahi wahine hoki, i Middlesbrough, ā, i kitea whakamutunga i Me 2002. Kotahi tekau tau i muri i tōna ngaronga, ka kitea tōna anga i roto i tētahi rua i te taha o te taone.

title: Ka hīpae a Ron Howard ki te whakahaere i te pikitia Han Solo
summary: Kua uru atu a Ron Howard ki te whakahaere i te pikitia Han Solo i muri i te putanga atu o ngā kaiwhakahaere e rua o mua i te kaupapa i waenganui o te whakanaotanga.
text: I mahue a Phil Lord rāua ko Christopher Miller nā tā rāua i kī ai he "rerekētanga auaha" ki ngā kaiwhakarato. I kī te perehitini o Lucasfilm, a Kathleen Kennedy, i "hari" a ia i te hononga o Hauati hei kaiwhakahaere. Ka tīmata anō te whitiāhua kāore i te taitara i tēnei wā i te 10 o Hōngongoi, ā, ka tukua a tērā tau. I mua rā kua whakahaeretia e Hauati te Waehere Da Vinci, Frost/Nixon, The Grinch, Rush me Inferno. I muri i ngā marama o te papā i waenganui i a Kennedy, he kaiwhakanao hoki i runga i te whitiāhua, me te Ariki rāua ko Miller, ka puta mai te pānuitanga ka mauria e ia ngā whatumanawa o te pikitia Han Solo. I muri i te wehenga o te pūrehurehu, ka whakaahuatia rātau e Kennedy he "kaipūkino pūkenga" engari i kī he "rerekē ō rātou kitenga auaha" ki te tīma Lucasfilm. Kōrero a Kathleen Kennedy: "I Lucasfilm, e whakapono ana mātou ko te whāinga teitei rawa o ia pikitia ko te rekareka, te kawe whakamua i te wairua o te kōrero i tīmataria e George Lucas i te 40 tau ki mua. " Mā tēnā hinengaro, e hari ana mātou ki te whakapuaki ka hīpae a Ron Howard ki te whakahaere i te pikitia Han Solo kāore i te ingoatia. "He hōtuhi tino pai tā mātou, he kaipuke whakamīharo me ngā kaimahi, me te tino whāinga ki te hanga i tētahi whitiāhua tino pai. Ka tīmata anō te whakaahuatanga i te 10 o Hōngongoi." Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whiwhi te kaitiaki matū OPCW i te mana ki te tautapa i te whakapae
summary: Kua tukua e te kaitiaki rākau matū tuatahi o te ao he mana hou ki te tautapa i te whakapae mo nga whakaekenga, ahakoa nga whakahē a Rūhia.
text: Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, ka taea anake e te Rōpū Whakahaere mō te Whakakorenga o ngā Rākau Matū (OPCW) te kī mēnā i whakamahia ngā rākau matū - engari ehara nā wai i whakamahi. I tutuki pai te tautohetohe a Ingarangi e hiahiatia ana he mana hou hei mahi i ngā whakaekenga matū tukurua i Hiria. I kī a Rūhia i haere te neke "ki tua atu i te tononga" a te kaitiaki. I kī hoki e anga ana te rōpū ki tētahi "raruraru i hangaia noatia". Heoi anō, i pōti ngā mema o te OPCW i te nuinga o te mehua, i whiwhi i te pōti mā te 82 ki te 24 - nui rawa atu i te nuinga e rua tuatoru e hiahiatia ana. I tonoa e Ingarangi te mehua, ā, ka kī te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o Poihāne ka "whakakaha i te whakakorenga o ngā rākau matū me te ārai i te whiu mō tā rātou whakamahinga". He hipanga hira whakamua a Honatana Marcus, te wawao o TE AO me te korero whakawhanaunga He hipanga hira tēnei mo te mana ringa. E whakakaha ana i te whakaaro whakaaro ki te whakamahinga o nga rākau matū. E tohu ana i tētahi wikitōria mo te raupapa o te ao whānui i runga i ngā ture, ā, kei raro nei i te nui haere o te uaua i tukuna ai te pikinga o ngā pūkenga me te wairua ā iwi i nga whenua maha. Engari e kore e mōhiotia he pūtake hou o te tanuku i waenganui i Rūhia me te Uru. Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, ko ngā kaitirotiro rākau matū e mahi ana i raro i te maru o te OPCW i roto i tētahi tūnga pākiki. Ka taea e rātau te tuku tīma ki tētahi whakaekenga rākau matū e kiia ana. Ka taea e rātau te tango tauira me te tā i a rātau whakatauranga. Ka taea e rātau te whakatau mēnā kua pā mai he mahi rākau matū. Engari ahakoa he aha ngā whakaaturanga i puta mai i a rātau, kāore i taea e rātau te tohu i te matimati ki tētahi whenua, kaitapere kāwanatanga rānei hei whakapae. He kutukutu tēnā. He rite ki te tūhura a te kaitirotiro i tētahi patunga, ki te whakamutu anake āe, kua mahia te kōhuru tino hara, engari kāore e taea te mōhio ki te tangata hara pea. I ngā marama tata nei, ka kawea mai e te kāwanatanga o Hiria te take ki te rama o te ao whānui i ngā marama o mua tata nei. I Aperira, ka pohū ngātahitia e Te Hononga o Amerika, UK, me Wīwī e toru ngā pae kāwanatanga o Hiriani hei urupare ki ngā whakaekenga matū e kiia ana. Kua auau tonu te whakakāhore a te kāwanatanga o Hiriani, e pūruatia ā-wā ana e Rūhia, ki te whakamahi i ngā rākau matū. I muri hoki i te paitini o te māngai taurua o Rūhia o Rūhia, o Rūhia me tana tamāhine i runga i te oneone o Ingarangi. I whakamutua e ngā kaihoko UK he māngai io kōeke hōia i hangaia e Rūhia ko Novichok i whakamahia i roto i te whakaekenga i te taone o Salisbury. I whakapaea e nga mana o Ingarangi a Rūhia ki te whakauru hāngai; Ko Rūhia hoki te urunga matua o te kāwanatanga o Hiriani. I kī atu te Minita Mahi o Rūhia, a Te Minita Mahi o Rūhia, a Te Minita Mahi o Rūhia, ki a Kōrero Rongokōrero o Kōrero Kōrero Kōrero Rūhia Rūhia Rūhia "He nui ngā whenua i pōti ki te mehua e tīmata ana ki te whakaaro me pēhea te tīariari me te mahi a te rōpū ā muri ake nei," tana kī.

title: Ko ngā tohutohu mahi mātua ki ngā tamariki i te nuinga o te wā 'kua tawhito'
summary: He mahi matua tā ngā mātua i roto i ngā whakataunga mahi a ā rātou tamariki, engari he tawhito ō rātou whakaaro, ā, he kino te mōhiotanga, e huatau ana i tētahi pūrongo.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Judith BurnsEducation, BBC News E 70% o ngā rangatahi e whakawhirinaki ana ki ō rātou mātua mō ngā tohutohu mahi, e kī ana te pūrongo a te Association of Colleges (AoC). Me tūhono ngā kaitohutohu mahi ki ngā kaitukumahi paetata me te whakahōu i ngā mātua me ngā tauira mō ngā mākete mahi paetata me ngā mahi puta, e tohe ana i ngā kaituhi. "Ka taea e ngā mema o te whānau kāore i te mōhio te whakararuraru i ngā hiahia o te tamaiti," ka whakatūpato rātau. I ētahi wā ka taea e ngā mātua te "pana" i a rātau tamariki "ki ngā mahi e kitea ana he haumaru, he tūturu rānei, engari kāore pea i te tino pai ki te tangata, ki te whakaaro rānei ki ngā mahi puta noa", e tautohe ana rātau. 'Ngā huringa nui' I tāia e ngā kaituhi tētahi uiuinga AoC i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ā, ka mahia ngā uiuinga hōhonu ki ngā mātua, tamariki me ngā tohunga mahi i ngā kāreti i Barking me Dagenham, Middlesbrough me Weymouth. Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā tauira tuarua i Ingarangi i kitea e 49% anake te mōhio ki ngā mahi e wātea ana. E kī ana te AoC e hiahia ana ngā rangatahi i uiuia ki ngā "huringa nui" ki ngā tohutohu mahi, tae atu ki ngā hononga pai ake ki ngā kaitukumahi, te wā kia "haere" ki ngā mahi tūturu, wheako mahi wā roa me ngā mōhiohio paetata e hāngai ana. E whai ana ngā kitenga i ngā whakatūpato auau mō ngā ngoikoretanga i roto i ngā tohutohu mahi mai i ngā tinana mai i Ofsted ki te Confederation of British Industry me te Komiti Tīpako Mātauranga. I te tau 2012 i hoatu ki ngā kura te kawenga ā-ture mō te hoatu mōhiohio mahi takitahi ki ngā ākonga. I mua i taua wā i homai e ngā mana ā-rohe ngā ratonga mahi ki ngā kura, ko te nuinga mā ngā Ratonga Connexions paetata. E kī ana te pūrongo kāore he tirotiro ā-pūnaha i runga i te mahi ā-ture, ā, ka whakaarahia ngā māharahara kāore ngā ākonga i te whiwhi mōhiohio mō ngā ara mahi pēnei i ngā akoranga, ngā akoranga rānei i tukuna i roto i ngā kura mātauranga anō. E kī ana ngā kairangahau e mōhio ana ngā rangatahi i uiuia e rātau ki ngā wāhi mahi i kitea e rātau i ia rā, pēnei i ngā kaiako, ngā pirihimana, ngā kaitiaki makawe rānei. Heoi anō, kāore rātau i mōhio he aha ngā mahi e wātea ana ki a rātou i te paetata, ko ēhea ngā kamupene me ngā umanga rānei ngā kaitukumahi nui rawa. I kī a Ms Sutton i whakaaturia e te pūrongo te rangatahi e hiahia ana rātou ki te "tohutohu ā-ringa ake" me pēhea te rangahau i ngā mahi me ngā hipanga e hiahiatia ana e rātou. "It's our responsibility as adults to become better informed about the local jobs market to be able to offer more relevant realistic and timely advice." I kī te tohutohu a te Kāwanatanga i tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Mātauranga: "E tāraro ana tēnei pūrongo he aha mātou e tika ana kia whakahauhau i ngā kura kia whakauru i ngā kaitukumahi ki ngā tohutohu mahi. " Ka whakamāramatia tēnei e tā mātou tohutohu hou mō ngā kura mō ngā mahi. Me whakamahi ngā kura i ngā kaitukumahi hei whakaaweawe, hei kaiārahi, hei whakamōhio atu ki te rangatahi ki ā rātou mahi tino pai. "E toru hauwhā o ngā kaitukumahi e kī ana he mea nui te wheako mahi ina tono, nā reira he tino nui te whakapā atu o ngā kura ki te ao mahi." I kī a Adrian Prandle, kaitohutohu kaupapahere i te Association of Teachers and Lecturers: "Ehara i te mea mīharo kāore te rangatahi i te makona ki te taumata me te momo tautoko mahi e whiwhi ana rātau. " I tino pōhēhē te kāwanatanga, i te wā o te kore mahi taitamariki tiketike, ki te maka i te ratonga mahi me te kore whakarato i tētahi whakakapinga tika. "E whakaae ana mātou he ngātahi te rongoā, ā, me whānui ngā mahi ngātahi i waenganui i ngā kura, ngā kura, ngā kaitukumahi, te Pokapū Tūtira Tāpiri me ētahi atu".

title: Te heitara RHI: Ko te heitara 'moni mō te pungarehu' RHI hei utu i ngā kaihautū NI £490m
summary: Ko te utu o te aronui tohutohu wera whakahou (RHI) ki te kaihautū o Aiarangi ki te Raki ko te £490m, kua kī te Tari mo te Whakahaerenga.
text: Ko te whakatau tata taketake mo te kaupapa i tukuna i te whakarongo a te komiti Whakaminenga ko te £400m i roto i te 20 tau. I te Paraire, ka kī te DfE ko te £490m te "kawenga mōrahi" i runga i te tahua. Ko te tikanga o te tatūnga o te aronui Renewable Heat Incentive (RHI) ki Aiarangi ki te Raki, ko te tikanga he nui ake ngā moni i tukuna i te utu o te hinu. I whakatūria te aronui kākāriki e te Tari Hinonga, Hokohoko me te Pūtea Penapena i raro i te whakahaeretanga o te Minita Tuatahi o Arlene Foster i te tau 2012 ki te whakahauhau i ngā umanga me ētahi atu kaiwhakamahi kāore i te kāinga kia neke mai i te whakamahi i ngā hinu fossil ki ngā pūnaha whakamahana whakahou. I roto i te mea kua tapaina ko te heitara "moni-mo-pungarehu", ko te tikanga o te aronui hē ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te whiwhi moni nui ake i te nui ake o te hinu i tahuna e rātau. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te DfE: "E ai ki te utu o te aronui RHI, i whakaarohia e te pūrongo a te Comptroller & Auditor General ngā utu 20 tau o te aronui, mēnā kāore he mea e mahia, kia £1,150m. " I kī a C&AG ko tēnei e pā ana ki 'te maha o ngā rangirua' ā, e tohu ana i 'te whakatau tata tino pai o te take kino rawa'. "I runga anō i te 3% o te tohatoha mō te aronui GB, ko te pūtea e wātea ana ko te £660m. I runga anō i aua whika i whakaputaina, ko te kawenga mōrahi o te tahua o Aiarangi ki te Raki ko te £490m. " I kī te kaikawe kōrero kua hangaia e te tari ngā tono mō ngā huringa ki te RHI, ā, mēnā ka whakaaetia, ka nui pea te whakahekenga o ngā utu ā muri ake ki te Kaiwhakahaere o NI. I roto i te kōrero taipitopito ko ngā tohutohu ā-ture me te whakauru ki te Kōmihana o Ūropi. I mua ake, i kī te Minita Pūtea o Máirtín Ó Muilleoir ko te utu pea "te wāhi tino pai o te £600m". I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Radio Ulster e hia rau ngā tāngata e "whakamahi ana i te wera i runga i te huarahi kāore e taea te whakawātea". "Ko te tangata e whakamahana ana i tētahi wharau wātea, kua tāhaetia he moni tūmatanui," tana tāpiri mai. I kitea e tētahi arotaupū takitahi he take i te hawhe o ngā tāutanga e 300 i tirohia - 14 o ēnei i taka ki te kāwai tino nui i whakapaetia ai te tinihanga, ā, kua whakatārewatia ngā utu ki te rima o ēnei. Engari i kī te minita pūtea he nui ake te tau. "Ko te whakaaturanga ko ngā utunga," tana kī. "Mēnā i whakamahia tēnei i runga i te huarahi e tika ana, kāore mātou e whakamahi i te nui o te wera." I kī a ia "kei te whiwhi ētahi tāngata i te £40,000 i te tau mai i tēnei aronui" ā, me tango ināianei tonu te hunga "kēmu i te pūnaha". I kī a Tēnā Ó Muilleoir i te wā i tukua te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi ki te utu i te hawhe o ngā utu o te aronui, tērā tētahi "wero tāpiri" mēnā kāore te aronui i te whakamahia "mō ngā take i whakaritea ai". He "tino nui" te tuma i puta mai i te kaupapa ki te tahua, ka kī a ia, kātahi anō ka uaua tana tari ki te tiki i ngā mōhiohio RHI katoa mai i te Tari mō te Whakahaerenga. Na te heitara i whakararuraru ai te whakararuraru tōrangapū i Stormont, me ngā karanga kia tū a Mrs Foster i te wā e mahia ana he tūhuratanga. I tērā wiki, i whati a Honatana Bell, tētahi minita hinonga o mua, i ōna hoa mahi o te Rōpū Kotahitanga Manapori, ā, he maha ngā kerēme mīharo mō te whakahaeretanga o te kaupapa tautohetohe. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, i ora a Mrs Foster, te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Kotahitanga Manapori, i te pōti kāore i te whirinaki. I te Mane, ka whakatūria e nga kaipōrangapū ātete he whakahē i te tīmatanga o Mrs Foster ki te kōrero i runga i te RHI. Kua anga atu te Kaikōrero Whakaminenga o Kōpana Newton ki te whakahē i muri i tana whakaaetanga kia haere tonu tana kaiārahi rōpū, ā, i te wā o tana uiuinga i te Reo Irirangi Ulster, ka kī a Tēnā Ó Muilleoir ka "kawea mai e te kaikōrero he kawenga" ki tana mahi. "Kāore au e kite i te wā heke mai mō Kōpana i taua mahi i te tau 2017," tana kī.

title: Ka haere te haupae o Heathrow-Crossrail ki te Kōti Tiketike
summary: Me whakahaere e te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike mēnā me utu ngā tereina Crossrail mō ia wā e haere ana rātau ki te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow.
text: I pau i te taunga rererangi te £1bn ki te hanga i te raina e rima maero i te 20 tau ki muri hei tūhono i te pokapū ki te ara o te Uru Nui. I whakatau tōmua te Office of Rail and Road (ORR) kāore e taea e Heathrow te utu tereina mō te whakamahi i te raina, e kī ana ka utu mō te £42m i te tau. I kī te taunga rererangi e hiahia ana ki te "whakarite kia tika ngā utu urunga riu". Kua whakataua e Heathrow te whakataunga ki te Kōti Tiketike mō tētahi arotakenga whakawā, ā, ka tūmanakohia he whakahaere "e tata ana", ka kī tētahi kaikōrero taunga rererangi. E whā ngā tereina Crossrail i te haora ka haere i waenganui i ngā kāpeka o Paddington me Heathrow 2 ki te 4, e whakakapi ana i ngā tereina Tūhono Heathrow mai i Me 2018. Kua tautohe a Heathrow me whakahau ngā tohutūmahi tereina ki te whakamahi i te ara i pūteatia e te taunga rererangi mā te moni tūmataiti. Engari i whakataua e te ORR i tērā Me "kāore e whakaaetia te taunga rererangi ki te whakauru atu i ana utu hōu katoa mō ngā tohutūmahi tereina hei whakamahi i tōna ara". I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikawe kōrero mō te kaiwhakarite rerewhenua kua tonoa e te taunga rererangi kia utua ia tereina he utu hanga hītori o te £597 me te utu whakapaunga whakahaere o te £138, e tino nui ake ai ngā utu katoa o Crossrail. I kī te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow e "tuku tonu ana ki te whakanui ake i ngā waka tūmatanui ki Heathrow, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou ki te taenga mai o Crossrail i Me 2018". I kī hoki tētahi kaikōrero ko te utu whakaora pūtea penapena ko te £460.09 mō ia tereina i waenganui i te 2019 me te 2028. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Waka (DfT) he "kore e tika te kōrero mō ngā takahanga ā-ture e haere tonu ana" engari kua pūruatia e te kāwanatanga te whakahaere a te ORR. Kāore anō a Transport for London (TfL) kia kōrero.

title: E peita ana te whakataetae whutupōro o Lowry mō te hokonga
summary: Ko tētahi peita o tētahi whakataetae whutupōro a LS Lowry e tūmanakohia ana kia tiki i waenganui i te £3.5m me te £4.5m i te hokonga i Mei.
text: Ko te Football Match, i peitatia i te tau 1949, kua whakaahuatia e Christie's London he "mahi hou hou". E whakaatu ana te mahi i ngā rau rau o ana whika rākau rongonui i huihuia i tētahi tauritenga ki te āhua o ngā wheketere me ngā tumera pupuhi. Ko te pikitia, nā tētahi kaikohi tūmataiti, kāore anō kia kitea i te wāhi tūmatanui mo te 20 tau. Ka hokona hei wāhanga o te hokonga a Christie o te Toi Peretania o te rau tau 20. Ko te utu teitei rawa i utua i te hokonga mo te Lowry ko te £3.8m mo tana peita i te Paraire Pai, i Daisy Nook, i te tau 2007. I hokona tētahi atu peita o tētahi whakataetae whutupōro a Lowry mō te £1.9m e te Professional Footballers' Association (PFA) i te tau 1999. I hokona e te uniana o ngā kaitākaro te pikitia o te tau 1953, Going To The Match, i Te Wānanga i Rānana. He kaitautoko whutupōro ngākau nui a Lowry i tautoko i a Manchester City. I mahi a ia mō tētahi kamupene āhuatanga i Manatāneta, engari, ahakoa he peita noa iho i tōna wā wātea, i taea tonu e ia te āhukahuka nui. I whakatūria a Lowry hei kaiwaiata whai mana i te koroneihana o te Kuini i te tau 1953, ā, i te tau 1967, ka tukuna e te Poutāpeta Ahuwhānui tētahi pane kuini e whakaputa ana i tētahi o ana peita. I mate a ia i te tau 1976 i te 88 o ona tau.

title: Covid: Ko ngā tāngata katoa neke atu i te 50 i Wales ka tukuna he jab i te kōanga
summary: Ko ngā tāngata katoa neke atu i te 50 me ngā tāngata katoa e nui ake ana te mōrearea i a Covid ka tukuna he kano ārai mate i te kōanga, i raro i ngā mahere hou a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh.
text: Ko tētahi rautaki kano ārai mate i whakakitea e te Minita Hauora o Vaughan Gething e whai ana kia tukuna he wero ki ngā pakeke katoa i te ngahuru. I muri i te whakahēnga he pōturi ake te whakawhitiwhiti o te kano ārai mate i ētahi atu wāhi o te UK. Ko nga whika hou e whakaatu ana i te 86,039 nga werohanga i whakahaerehia e te 22:00 GMT i te Rātapu. E 327,000 ngā werohanga - 280,000 o te kano ārai mate Pfizer-BioNTech me te 47,000 o te jab Oxford-AstraZeneca - kua tukuna ināianei ki te Welsh NHS. Ko te tikanga o nga whika ko te 2.7% o te taupori o Wales kua werohia - i whakaritea ki te neke atu i te 4% i Northern Ireland, tata ki te 3.5% i Ingarangi me te 3% i Scotland. Puta noa i te UK tata ki te 400,000 nga werohanga tuarua kua whakahaerehia, tae atu ki te 374,613 i Ingarangi, 79 i Wales, 13,949 i Northern Ireland, tae atu ki te 3 o Hanuere, 36 i Scotland. I whakaae a Mr Gething kua "tere ake te toenga o te UK i a mātau", engari i kī ko ngā whika werohanga hou i whakaatu i tētahi "whakaterenga nui" i roto i te whakawhitinga. I whakapaea e nga Tohutohu o Welsh te kāwanatanga o tētahi "tīmatanga pōauau", i te kī a Plaid Cymru he "tōmuri i te rā". Ko ngā tāngata katoa neke atu i te 70, ngā kainoho kāinga tiaki katoa me ngā kaimahi, me ngā kaimahi NHS me ngā kaimahi tiaki pāpori ka tukuna he wero i te waenganui o Hui tanguru, i raro i ngā tauine wā ōrite ki ētahi atu iwi o UK. Ko ngā mahere werohanga a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e whai ana kia kapi i te 2.5 miriona tāngata i te wā o Mahuru, me ngā kano ārai mate i tukuna e te kāwanatanga o UK. Mr Gething said: "Delivering this vaccination programme to the people in Wales is a huge task but an huge amount of work is going on to make it a success. " Kei te pai ta matou haere whakamua me te mano atu o nga tangata e werohia ana i ia ra." Te kano ārai mate i Wales Ka whakaritea e te mahere he rangatū o ngā "tohu nui" mō te whakarewatanga o te kano ārai mate i Wales - i runga anō i te putanga o ngā kano ārai mate kua whakaaetia hei whakamahi. I tētahi hui pānui, ka kī a Tēnā Gething e whai ana te kāwanatanga ki te werohanga: I kī a Tēnā Gething e 700,000 ngā tāngata ka werohia i te waenganui o Hui tanguru. E ai ki te mahere, ka piki ake te maha o ngā pokanga a ngā GP e tuku ana i ngā kano ārai mate mai i te 100 ki neke atu i te 250 i te mutunga o Hānuere. Ka piki ake te maha o ngā pokapū werohanga maha i roto i ngā wiki e rua e whai ake nei ki te 35, e ai ki te mahere a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh. Ko tētahi o ērā ko Margam Orangeery, i Neath Port Talbot, e tata ana ki te 500 ngā tāngata ka werohia ia rā. I te hui pānui, i tautāwhi a Tēnā Gething i te whakataunga whānui o UK ki te whakanui ake i te āputa i waenganui i te hoatu i ngā rongoā e rua o te kano ārai mate Pfizer, ā, ka kī ka "karo i ētahi atu mate". "Ko ia kano ārai mate e whakarato ana i te taumata teitei o te parenga ki te kino o te coronavirus. He rongo tino pai tēnā mō tātau katoa," tana tāpiri mai. I kī te kaikorero hauora o Welsh Conservative, a Andrew RT Davies, me whai minita werohanga te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e "ara ake i te ata ki te whakaaro mō ngā werohanga, ā, ka haere ki te moe me te whakaaro mō ngā werohanga". I kī a ia mā tēnei nekehanga e āwhina i te kāwanatanga ki te whakaora mai i tētahi "tīmatanga pōauau" ki te hōtaka kano ārai mate. I kī a Tēnā Davies e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga he "arotahi me te aronga hei whakahaere i tēnei whakamua". I pōhiritia e te kaiārahi Plaid Cymru, a Arama Price, te rautaki, engari i kī kua "tōmuri i te rā". I kī a Mr Price he tokomaha ngā tāngata, tae atu ki ōna mātua ake, e hiahia ana ki te mārama: "Kua korerotia ki ōku mātua, e 80 tau, kāore e taea e tō rātou pokanga te wero i a rātou mō tētahi atu toru wiki, engari kei te tīmata te pokanga GP i tēnei wiki." He aha te hira o te kano ārai mate a Oxford? Ko Daniel Davies, te kaipānui tōrangapū o BBC Wales He tino nui te kano ārai mate Oxford-AstraZeneca ki te whakarite kia kotahi neke atu rānei te werohanga a ngā tāngata katoa neke atu i te 70 i te Rā o Kānata. E whakaaro ana ngā poari hauora ki te whakamahi i ngā rāhui o te kano ārai mate Pfizer, engari kāore rātou anake e tae ki te tohu tuatahi o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh. Hei whakatere ake i ngā mea, e hiahiatia ana he nui ake ngā rawa o te kano ārai mate o Oxford. Heoi anō, kāore i te rite ki te kano ārai mate Pfizer, kāore te kararehe i puritia e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh. Engari, ka tukuna hāngai atu ki te raina o mua - tae atu ki ngā GP me ngā rongoā hapori - e Public Health England. Neke atu i te 24,000 ngā rongoā Oxford i tae ki Wales i tērā wiki; 26,000 e tika ana i tēnei wiki; ā, ko tētahi atu 80 ki te 100,000 e tūmanakohia ana kia tae mai i roto i ngā rōpu e whā a tērā wiki. Mēnā ka tae ki te waenganui o Hui tanguru, ka huri te aro atu ki ngā tāngata neke atu i te 50 me ngā taitamariki ka nui ake te mōrearea o tō rātou hauora. Ka taea e rātau te tūmanako he rongoā i te Kōanga, engari kei te haere tonu ngā kōrero i waenganui i ngā iwi e whā o UK ki te nēra i tētahi rā tauwhāiti ake. 'Tino whakamataku' Ko Dr Helen Alefounder he GP i Colwyn Bay, Conwy county, ā, he wāhanga o tētahi tīma i whakahaere i ngā kano ārai mate e 400 i te tiakitanga, i tērā wiki i muri i te whiwhinga i te kano ārai mate i te Wenerei. "I waenganui i a mātau me te pokanga i te taha e mahi ana mātou, e 20,000 ngā tūroro hei werohanga," tana kī atu ki a BBC Radio Wales. "It's an absolutely huge task, it's really scary, but we are really keen and committed to get it done because everyone is sick of lockdown and let's be honest, everyone wants life to return to as normal as possible and the only way we're going to do that is to mass vaccinate people." Kua whakairihia e ētahi atu pokanga GP i runga i te pāpāho pāpori kāore anō rātau kia whiwhi i te maha o ngā rongoā e ai ki te kī taurangi. Ināianei ka whakaputaina ngā tau werohanga i ia rā, ā, ka piki te maha o ngā pokapū werohanga maha mai i te 22 ki te 35. E huatau ana hoki te mahere werohanga ka taea te whakamahi i ngā rongoā rongoā ki te hora i te kano ārai mate. I kī a Dr Gill Richardson, te āpiha haepapa matua mō te hōtaka werohanga Covid i Weera, i kī ngā GP e "hiahia ana ki te haere" ki te tohatoha i te kano ārai mate. I kii ia ko te tauira mo te kaupapa werohanga a Wales i arotahi ki te kano kano a Oxford-Astrazeneca, i whakaaetia i te mutunga o Hakihea, a, "he nui ake te rahinga" i tumanakohia mai. I kī anō a ia: "E mōhio ana ahau he tino uaua mēnā kāore anō koe kia whai reta, ā, kei te māharahara koe, engari ka whakatata atu koe, ā, ina whakatata atu koe e hiahia ana mātou kia wawe rawa, kia pai hoki ki a koe." Ko Michael Sullivan, 93, mai i Radyr, Cardiff, tētahi o te hunga kāore anō kia whiwhi i tana reta. Ka kī a ia: "E rongo ana ahau i ēnei tāngata katoa e whai ana i ā rātou wero tuarua, ā, kāore tētahi tangata i whakaaro ki te whakapā mai ki a au ki te kī ka whiwhi ahau i tētahi i te wāhi tuatahi. He āhua pōrearea. Ka whakaaro ahau kāore tētahi tangata i te mahi i tā rātou e mahi ana. "He ngāwari ake te hauā, koia tētahi atu mea me hinengaro - ka whakaora i tōku ora." I kī a Elen Jones, te kaiwhakahaere o Wales o te Royal Pharmaceutical Society, he "hiahia me te pūkenga ki te āwhina ki te tuku i te hōtaka werohanga, pērā i te rewharewha i ia tau". I tāpiritia e ia ka taea e ngā kaihoko te āwhina ki te tuku i te kano ārai mate "i tētahi taumata paetata ake". Kua kaha te pēhanga o ngā minita o Welsh mai i te wā i mārama ai kei te takamuri a Wales i ētahi atu iwi kāinga i ngā wiki tuatahi o te whakawhitiwhiti kano ārai mate. Kāore tonu i te mārama he aha tērā e pēnei ai - ko ngā uauatanga arawhiti o te takahanga me te huringa o ngā tohutohu i waenganui i ngā rongoā tuatahi me te tuarua e pā ana puta noa i te UK, ehara i te mea ki Wales anake. E kī ana te minita hauora kua puta kē "he hipanga nui i roto i te tukunga". Ko te whakamātautau o tēnā mēnā ka taea e te pūnaha i Wales te whakatutuki i ngā whāinga tuku i whakaritea i roto i te rautaki werohanga - e whakawhirinaki ana hoki ki tētahi putanga kano ārai mate. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi The Orangeery, Margam Country Park © Philip Halling -- Geograph Britain and Ireland Health in Wales

title: Ngā Kaipuke Tiketike: Ko te tauomaoma moana hei rere atu ki Belfast i te tau 2015
summary: Ka tīmata te whakataetae Kaipuke Teitei o te ao whānui i Belfast a tērā tau, kua pānuitia.
text: I te Tūtira, ka kī te Kaunihera Taone o Belfast ka noho te taone hei "pou tīmata" mō ngā Kaipuke Teitei 2015. E kī ana ka noho te takahanga hei wāhanga o te Hākari Moana o Titanic a tērā o Hōngongoi. Kua whiwhi pūrua a Belfast Tall Ships 2015 mai i te kamupene hokomaha o Lidl. E mōhiotia ana he wāriu te mahi ngātahi i te £300,000. Ko te wā whakamutunga i haere ai ngā Kaipuke Teitei i te wā o te Hākari Moana o Belfast e whā rā i te tau 2009, e 40 ngā kaipuke e taunga ana i ngā waka i te taone. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere e 500,000 ngā tāngata i toro atu ki te takahanga. E 250,000 anō i mātakitaki i ngā kaipuke e wehe atu ana i Belfast Lough, ā, e whakapono ana ka kawea mai e te takahanga te £16m ki te whakahaerenga o te rohe. I kī a Kevin Grant, mai i te tīma hākari o Belfast Tall Ships, he "tirohanga" mīharo te rēhi 2015. "He angitu nui te tau 2009 mō te taone, he tino tohu mō mātau. I tēnei wā, e tatari ana mātou ki tētahi wāhi i te rohe e 80 ngā oko, ā, tata ki te 1,000 ngā kaimahi," tana kī. "Kua taurimatia e mātou te nui o ngā takahanga tino angitu, ahakoa ko te MTV (ngā tohu) i te tau 2011, ko ngā Pirihimana o te Ao me ngā Kēmu Ahi i te tau 2013, ā, kātahi anō ka hipa mātau i te Giro. " Ki taku whakaaro he aha te mea nui ka tae mai tātau ki te nuinga o ngā oko katoa, nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau he tirohanga tēnā i roto i a ia anō." Ka tīmata ngā Whakataetae Kaipuke Teitei 2015 i Belfast i mua i te haerenga ki Nōwei me Tenemaka.

title: I whakakitea te mahere whakawhānui mō te Taunga Rererangi o Leeds Bradford
summary: Kua whakakitea ngā mahere whakawhānui mō te Taunga Rererangi o Leeds Bradford kia taea ai te kawe mai i te rua o ngā pāhihi i roto i ngā tau e 15 e whai ake nei.
text: Ka kitea e ngā tono te tuku a te Kaunihera o Leeds i te 36.2 heketea whenua kākāriki i roto, e tata ana ki te taunga rererangi. Ka whakamahia hei whakanui ake i te whare kāpeka pāhihi me te whakawhanake i tētahi kāinga taunga rererangi, tae atu ki tētahi hōtēra, wharekai me ngā toa. Ka hua hoki ngā mahere ki ngā ūnga rererangi hou e whakaurua ana. Kawea mai he mahi hou Ko te taunga rererangi, i Yeadon, e whakamahia ana e ngā pāhihi 3.3m i te tau, engari e whakaatu ana ngā tohu i te kaha ki te whakanui ake i tērā ki te 7.1m i te tau 2030. I kī te kaunihera me whakawhānui te taunga rererangi kia taea ai te whakanoho i te pikinga i matapaetia. Kei roto hoki i te mahere whakawhānui tētahi pāka whakahaere hau hei kawe mai i ngā kamupene rangahau me te whanaketanga me tētahi pāka utanga hau mō te whakahaere utanga pai ake. I kī te mana mā te tuku i te whenua o te kaunihera e āwhina i ngā umanga ki te tipu me te kawe mai i ngā mahi me ngā pūkenga hou. Kei te tirohia hoki ngā tūhononga waka pai ake tae atu ki tētahi huarahi hono hōu. Ka kōrerorerotia ngā tono i tētahi hui a te poari nui o te kaunihera i te 15 o Hōngongoi. Ki te whakaaetia, ka haere rātau ki te whakaaro tūmatanui ā muri ake o te tau.

title: I whakakorea te Pokapū Hākinakina o Ebbw Vale i muri i te tiango o te tuanui
summary: Kua whakakorea ngā kiritaki i tētahi pokapū hākinakina o Blaenau Gwent i muri i te marangai nui i hinga ai te tuanui.
text: Kua whakahaua a Ebbw Vale Sports Centre kia kati i te waipuketanga o te whare i muri i te 11:00 GMT i te Hātarei. I kī te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o South Wales kua pā ki te "waipuke nui", nāna i pā ki te hawhe o te whare. Kaore he tangata i whara. E whai ana i tētahi whakatūpato kōwhai "kia mōhio" mō te marangai me te hau. Ko te whakatūpato, i tukuna i te Paraire, ka noho tonu tae noa ki te 22:00 i te Hātarei. E rua ngā whakatūpato waipuke kua tukuna e Natural Resources Wales - mō te Awa o Ely i Peterston-Super-Ely me Ebbw Fawr i Cwm - i te wā e 15 ngā matohi waipuke. Na te marangai taumaha me ngā hau kaha i whakararuraru ai ngā ratonga rēra, me ngā rāhuitanga i te Arawhiti M48 Severn i Monmouthshire. I whakatārewatia ngā ratonga a Arriva Trains Wales i waenganui i Newport me Hereford mō tētahi wā nā te waipuke riu i Abergavenny, me te takaware kotahi haora e pā tonu ana ki te ahiahi o te Hātarei. Tērā anō ētahi takaware me ngā whakakorenga i ngā ratonga Valley Lines i waenganui i Mountain Ash me Aberdare i te Riu o Cynon. I katia te Arawhiti o Severn ki te rāwhiti, ā, ka katia ki ngā waka taha tiketike ki te hauauru. Kei te noho hoki ngā rāhuitanga tere i runga i te Arawhiti o Britannia mai i Anglesey i te raki o Wales. Kua whakakorea hoki e nga Waka Waka o Airani nga ratonga waka tere mai i Holyhead ki Dublin.

title: He tino tawhiti te heke o te honu moana kākāriki i te Moana Iniani
summary: I heke te honu moana kākāriki i te 3,979 km (2,472 km) i roto i te tau, e ai ki ngā kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Swansea.
text: I whakapiria he rangi ki muri o ngā honu e waru e ngā kaipūtaiao e whakamahi ana i te hangarau aorangi hei aroturuki i ngā tikanga o te momo. I kitea e te kaupapa tētahi i haere mai i ngā Moutere o Chagos i te Moana Iniani ki te takutai o Somalia i Awherika ki te rāwhiti. E whakapono ana ko te hekenga honu kākāriki rawa atu i whakapūketetia. I te uiui ngā kaipūtaiao o Swansea, e mahi tahi ana me ngā hoa mahi i Ahitereiria me ngā Seychelles, i te mahinga o ngā wāhi pare moana kua whakatūria e ngā kāwanatanga puta noa i te ao i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha ki te whakapai ake i te atawhai me te pare i ngā momo me ngā momo tipua i te tūkinotanga me te whakararuraru. I whakaputaina i roto i te putanga hou o te Koiora Atawhai, i kitea e te tīma rangahau te akoranga i arotahi ki ngā honu moana kākāriki e tāuri ana i ngā Moutere o Chagos i te Moutere o Chagos i te tau 2010, e ai ki a Prof Graeme Hays mai i te Kāreti o te Pūtaiao i te Whare Wānanga o Swansea. "Ko te karere mai i tēnei rangahau ko ngā whatunga o ngā wāhi pare iti me hanga i te taha o ngā mea nui ake kia noho ai ngā momo e heke ana i ngā tawhiti roa ki ngā rohe haumaru mō te wā roa e taea ana," tana kī. GREEN SEA TURTLE FACTS Source: National Geographic Nicole Esteban, a Swansea University researcher who has worked on the project, said: "Green sea turtles are an iconic species and their welfare tells us a lot about the health of our oceans. " E kai ana rātau i roto i ngā pātītī moana e pau ana nā te pokenga me ētahi atu take i hangaia e te tangata. "Ka āwhina tā mātou akoranga ki te whakatau i te tauwāhi o ēnei wāhi hira, ā, ka miramira hoki i te hiahia ki te pare i ngā pātītī, me te hanga i tētahi whatunga o ngā wāhi pare moana iti (MPAs)." I tērā tau, ka unuhia e te kāwanatanga o Welsh ngā mahere mō ngā rohe atawhai moana e 10 e manakohia ana e te hōpara huringa ki ngā Wāhi Parenga Moana 125 (MPAs) e kapi ana i te 36% o ngā moana o Welsh.

title: Ko te aronui mō ngā kaiwhaiwhai rangatahi 'ka taea te tauira mō UK'
summary: Ka taea e tētahi hōtaka e mahi ana me ngā kaiwhaiwhai rangatahi i Pākehā te homai he tauira mō ētahi atu aronui huri noa i Uropi, e ai ki tētahi arotakenga takitahi.
text: Nā Reevel AldersonBBC Scotland's social affairs correspondent The Scottish Guardianship Service (SGS) kua tautokona neke atu i te 100 ngā rangatahi kāore i te noho tahi - ko ētahi i aituā i te hokohoko. Each child is allocated a guardian to offer support and guidance during the immigration and welfare processes. E toru tau te pūtea a te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini i te kaupapa whakahaurangi. Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā tamariki kāore i te noho tahi e tono ana mō te whakangungu i te UK i ia tau. Ko te kaupapa whakahaurangi o Pirihitini, i whakarewaina i te tau 2010, kua āwhina i te rangatahi ki te wehe i o rātau mātua mai i ngā whenua rerekē e 17, ko te nuinga o rātou (85%) e 15-17 te pakeke. Kei roto i a rātou ngā tamariki mai i Awhekenetāna, Vietnam, Nigeria me Irana. Ko te ratonga, e whakahaeretia ana e Aberlour Childcare Trust me te Kaunihera Tūruhi o Pākehā, kua whakamihitia e ngā kairangahau mai i ngā Whare Wānanga o Swansea me Bedfordshire i roto i tētahi arotakenga takitahi. I kī ta rātau pūrongo e mau tonu ana ki a au: "Ko te nuinga o ngā akoranga mai i te kaihautū ka taea te tiritiri ki ngā kaihanga kaupapahere me ngā tohunga i ētahi atu wāhi o UK me Uropi." Ko ngā kaitaunaki takitahi SGS, koia anake te ratonga o tōna momo i te UK, e whakarato ana i ia rangatahi ki tētahi "kaitiaki" hei āwhina i a rātou ki te whakatere i te pūnaha whakangungu me te hanga anō i ō rātou oranga i Pākehā. Ka mahi ngā kaitiaki hei kaitaunaki takitahi mō te tamaiti, e āwhina ana i a rātou ki ngā mea katoa mai i te mahi ki ngā rōia ki te āwhina i a rātou ki te hanga whatunga pāpori. E pūteatia ana e te Big Lottery Fund, Paul Hamlyn Foundation me te Kāwanatanga o Pākehā, nāna i pānui inā noa nei me haere tonu te pūtea i te ratonga mō ētahi atu tau e toru. Ka puta mai te whakamihi mo te kaupapa i te wā e mahi ana te Komiti Tōtahi mo ngā Motika Tangata i tētahi uiuinga ki ngā mana o te rangatahi i te UK. I kī te Minita o Pirihitini mō te Rangatahi me ngā Tamariki a Aileen Campbell: "Me noho haumaru ngā tamariki katoa, engari me noho haumaru, kia tiakina, kia whakarongo hoki." "Kua whakaaturia e ngā whakaaturanga mai i te kaihautū tuatahi e mahi ana te ratonga, ā, mā te pūtea haere tonu e āhei ai ki te āwhina ki te whakapai ake i ngā oranga o ngā tamariki me ngā rangatahi e rapu ana i ngā tamariki me ngā rangatahi." 'Pōraru, mataku hoki' ka kī a John Wilkes, te rangatira nui o te Kaunihera Rerenga o Pākehā: "Ahakoa ngā whakapainga, ehara tonu te pūnaha whakangungu i te mea rata ki te tamaiti. " He tino uaua ki ngā rangatahi tūkino, e noho mokemoke ana, e rongo ana i tō rātou ara i roto i tētahi ahurea rerekē, ki te whakatere i ōna uauatanga me te mahi ki te tini o ngā tohunga mātauranga tae atu ki ngā rōia, ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Tari Kāinga me ngā kaimahi pāpori." "Mā te whai kaitiaki i tō rātou taha, i tō rātou taha ka nui te rerekētanga ki te wheako o taua taitamariki i Pākehā." I kī a ia, ko te tikanga hoki he pai ake te mōhiotanga o ngā tamariki ki te pūnaha whakangungu, nāna i tino whakanui ake i o rātau wā kia rongo tika. I kī a Jackie Hothersall, te kaiwhakahaere o ngā tamariki me ngā ratonga whānau i Aberlour: "Ko ngā tamariki me ngā rangatahi e kōrerotia ana ki a mātau ka haere tawhiti ki te UK. " Ka tae mai rātau me te kore whānau, hoa rānei; i te nuinga o te wā e pōraru ana, e mataku ana, ā, i te nuinga o te wā kāore rātau e kōrero Ingarihi. "I te nuinga o te wā ka tae mai rātau i roto i te āhua o te mate me te ohorere nā ngā wheako i rere ai rātau."

title: Ka whakamahi te kairangi i te ipurangi mokowā hei whakahaere i te karetao i runga i te Ao
summary: Kua whakamahia te ipurangi ā-ao e tētahi kaiāwhina i te Teihana Mokowā Ao Whānui (ISS) hei tuku tono ki tētahi karetao i runga i te Ao.
text: Ko te hangarau whakamātautau, e kiia nei ko te kawa Disruption-Tolerant Networking (DTN), tērā pea he huarahi ā muri ake ki te whakawhiti kōrero ki ngā kaiāwhina i Mars. I tēnei wā, mēnā he raruraru ina tukuna ngā raraunga i waenganui i ngā takawaenga o Te Ao me te Mars, ka ngaro pea ngā mōhiohio. Ka taea e te DTN te tuku i tētahi huarahi pakari ake hei tuku raraunga i ngā tawhiti nui. I whakahaeretia e te European Space Agency (Esa) me NASA te whakamātautau i te mutunga o Whiringa ā-rangi. I whakamahia e te rangatira ISS Expedition 33 Sunita Williams tētahi rorohiko pona me te pūmanawa DTN hei whakahaere i tētahi takawaenga i Tiamana. He ōrite te DTN ki te ipurangi i runga i te Ao, engari he nui ake te manawanui ki ngā takaware me ngā raruraru e puta ana ina huri haere ngā raraunga i waenga i ngā aorangi, ngā aorangi, ngā teihana mokowā me ngā waka ātea tawhiti. Tērā pea nā ngā āwhā kōmaru, i te wā rānei kei muri te waka ātea i tētahi aorangi. "E pā ana ki te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero i ngā tawhiti nui, nā te mea kāore te ipurangi 'pūnoa' e tūmanako kia pau pea ngā meneti i mua i te tukunga o tētahi mea kia tae mai," te kī a Kimi Nergaard mai i Esa ki te HAU. I tonoa tuatahitia te mahi i runga i te DTN i te tekau tau ki muri e Vint Cerf - tētahi o ngā kaihanga o te ipurangi i runga i te Ao. I whakamātauria tuatahitia te hangarau i Whiringa 2008, i te wā i tutuki pai ai te tuku atahanga a NASA ki tētahi waka ātea e 20 miriona maire te mamao me tētahi pūnaha whakawhitiwhiti i runga anō i te kupenga. Whatunga mokowā Ka whakamahia e te pūnaha tētahi whatunga kōpuku - ngā pūwāhi tūhononga - hei whakatikatika i ngā takaware. Mēnā he raruraru, ka penapenatia te raraunga ki tētahi o ngā kōpuku kia wātea anō te whakawhitiwhitinga hei tuku anō. Mā tēnei tikanga "penapena me te whakamua" e whakarite kia kaua e ngaro ngā raraunga, ā, ka āta mahi ki tōna ūnga. "Mā te ipurangi i runga i te Ao, mēnā ka momotu tētahi mea, me tuku anō e te pūtake ngā mea katoa, ka ngaro rānei ō raraunga," te kī a Tēnā Nergaard. "Engari kei te DTN tēnei manawanui whakararuraru, ā, koia te rerekētanga - me kaha ake i runga i ngā momo tawhiti me ngā momo whatunga e kōrero ana mātou." I tēnei wā, hei whakawhiti kōrero ki te Curiosity, te takawaenga hou i tau ki Gale Crater i te Aorangi Whero i te 6 o Aotearoa, ka whakamahia e NASA me Esa te mea e kiia nei ko te "whakawhitiwhitinga pito-ki-te-pito". "I te nuinga o te wā, ka tonoa hāngai te takawaenga i runga i te mata o Mars mai i Te Ao, i ētahi take rānei mā te whakamahi i te waka ātea e āwhio ana i Mars hei aorangi tānga raraunga - engari kei te whakaarotia tonutia he whakawhitiwhitinga pito-ki-te-pito kotahi," te kī a Tēnā Nergaard. "Kāore i hangaia hei whatunga. He maha ngā takahuri i runga i te mata o Mars, he maha ngā waka ātea e āwhio ana i a Mars, engari e kitea ana he tūemi takitahi. "Engari ko te ariā, ā muri ake nei ka whakamahia ngā takawaenga i runga i te Mars me te waka ātea e āwhio ana hei whatunga, kia taea ai e koe te tuku mea ki te whatunga pērā i tō tuku i ngā mea mā te ipurangi i runga i te Ao. " Ka noho tonu mā ngā ngaru reo irirangi, engari i runga i ngā auau rerekē, kia taea ai e koe te whakawhitiwhiti mokatere raraunga teitei ake i ngā mea e whakamahia ana i tēnei rā." I kī a Badri Younes o NASA he angitu te whakamātautau, ā, i whakaaturia "te āheinga o te whakamahi i tētahi hanganga whakawhitiwhiti kōrero hōu hei tuku tono ki tētahi karetao mata mai i tētahi waka ātea āwhiowhio, ā, ka whiwhi atahanga me ngā raraunga mai i te robot".

title: Coronavirus: 'Kaua e whakapae katoa ki a mātau' e kī ana ngā ākonga o Nottingham
summary: I te piki haere tonu o ngā kēhi coronavirus i Nottingham, ināianei kei Ingarangi, kua tohu ētahi i te maihao whakapae ki ngā ākonga o te taone.
text: Nā David PittamBBC News, Nottingham Kua kī te kaiwhakahaere hauora tūmatanui o te taone, a Alison Challenger, e toru hauwhā o ngā kēhi tōrunga hou e 2,532 i te taone i roto i ngā rā e whitu kua hipa i waenganui i ngā tāngata 18 ki te 22 tau te pakeke. Kua piki ake ngā utu puta noa i te taone, engari he tino poupou i ngā wāhi e nui ana te taupori ākonga. Ko te nuinga o ngā kēhi kei University Park, Lenton Abbey me Jubilee Campus, e noho ana te nuinga o ngā ākonga e 50,000 o te taone. Engari i kī ngā ākonga e noho ana i reira he tika te pine i te pikinga ki runga noa iho i a rātou. I whakapuakina e Lenton ngā kupu matua i tērā marama i te whainatanga o tētahi ākonga e £10,000 mō te hautū i tētahi hākari i taua rohe. I kī a Julie Pinnock, e 60, e noho ana i Mapperley: "Ko ngā ākonga [nāna i piki ake]. " E tino kino ana taku kōrero, nā te mea ko te katoa, engari kāore e taea e koe te whakaaro ko te kawe mai i aua rangatahi katoa ki konei mō te whare wānanga te mea i mahia." I kī a Annette Clay, e whakahaere ana i tētahi wāhi putiputi i te pokapū o te taone: "Ko te tikanga kia waiho rātau ki te kāinga tae noa ki muri i te Kirihimete." Āe, i kī a Emma, e 33, ko te hokinga mai o ngā ākonga he rite ki te "hupa Covid". Engari kua kī ētahi tauira kei te meinga rātau hei koati haere noa mo te pikinga o te taone. I kī a Matthew Edwards, he tauira pūtaiao taiao e 20 tau i te Whare Wānanga o Nottingham (UoN): "Me whai whanaungatanga, engari kāore mātou i te kawenga mō ngā kēhi hou katoa. " I know the stereotype is that we do not care about the area as we don't live here [year-round], but I don't think that's true. "I ngā wā katoa e tūpato ana ahau ki te tūtaki ki ngā tāngata, ā, nā te nui o ngā utu, kua whakaae ahau kāore e taea e mātou te tūtaki i te āhua o tā mātou i mua. " He tangata hoki tātau. He hē te pine i ngā whakapae katoa ki a mātau - kei te haere noa tēnā i a mātau." Rosa Hodgkinson, a second year geography student at UoN, said she felt most students were following the rules. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki taku whakaaro he tino ngāwari te whakapae i a mātau, engari kei te mahi noa mātou i ngā mea i kī mai ai te kāwanatanga kia mahia. "I whakaurua mātau e te kāwanatanga ki konei, ka mahue i a mātau anō, ā, ināianei kei te whakawehi kia kaua mātau e hoki ki te kāinga mo te Kirihimete." Ko Rhiannon Brown, he tauira hinengaro hinengaro 19 tau i Nottingham Trent, kei te noho wehe i a ia anō ahakoa e whai ana i ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga. Ka kī a ia: "I mōhio te kāwanatanga ki tāna e mahi ana i tana whakahokinga mai i a mātau. I pēnei ahau i kīa mai ki a mātau. "Ehara i a mātau te hē kei te hora." Kua kī kē te Kaunihera Taone o Nottingham ko te hokinga mai o ngā ākonga ki te taone nui he take i muri i te pikinga o ngā kēhi. I tēnei wā kei te whakahaere a UoN i tōna ake hōtaka whakamātautau mō Covid-19, e piki ake ana i ngā kēhi i waenga i ngā ākonga me ngā kaimahi ahakoa kāore ō rātou tohumate. I kī te kaunihera i whakamāramatia e tēnei ētahi o te pikinga o ngā kēhi, engari ehara i te katoa. Ko ngā raraunga mō te wiki ki te 4 o Whiringahora e whakaatu ana i ngā kēhi e 546 i tuhia ki te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga, o Lenton Abbey me te takiwā o Jubilee Campus me te 223 i Arboretum, Forest me te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga. 'Scared' David Mellen, the council leader, said there were "questions to be asked" about why students were told to return. Engari i tāpiritia e ia he pikinga "nui" i ngā wāhi katoa me ngā rōpū pakeke puta noa i te taone, ehara i te mea i roto i te iwi whānui ākonga anake. Kua mōhio te Uniana Ākonga o UoN "kāore i taea te pupuri i te mate i roto i te hapori ākonga". I roto i tētahi reta tūwhera i kī ai ētahi o ōna mema i rongo i te "mataku", "i ūkuia tikatia mō ngā ture whakaū" me te "riri ki te hunga e whakapae ana i ngā [ākonga] mō... he tauari matapae, ka taea te karo". I whakatakotoria e ia te whakapae ki te tatau o te kāwanatanga mō te whakaae kia whakatuwhera anō ngā whare wānanga, engari kāore i te tuku tautoko, ārahi rānei. A spokeswoman for the Department for Education said: "We understand this has been a very difficult time for students which is why we prioritised their education and wellbeing, so young people's lives are not put on hold. " Kua tautokona e mātou ngā whare wānanga ki te whakarato i tētahi whakaranu tuihono me te ā-tangata, te ako i roto i tētahi huarahi haumaru Covid i tēnei wā." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakapōhēhē a One Direction's Liam Payne mō te whakaahua paepae.
summary: Kua whakapārewa te kaiwaiata One Direction, a Liam Payne mō tētahi pikitia i tangohia i a ia e whakataurite ana i runga i te paepae.
text: Nā Amelia ButterlyNewsbeat kaipānui i whakairihia te whakaahua ki Twitter, engari mai i tērā wā kua tangohia. Ka tūtohu te tau e 20 tau: "Tērā pea kua kite koe i tētahi whakaahua mōku i tēnei rā i tangohia i runga i tētahi whare. E pouri ana ahau i te noho i reira me te tango whakaahua. "He mea heahea, he mea tūkino te mahi. E pouri ana ahau, ā, kāore au e tautoko i ētahi kaihautū e ngana ana ki te tārua i tēnei, he tino mōrearea hoki." Kua whakairihia e ngā hoa o te kaiwhakatangitangi ngā atahanga o tōna kāinga o Rāwāhi ki te pae whatunga pāpori, e ahu ana ki ngā kaihautū e mahi ana i te wāhi e noho ana te whetū taitama. "E mōhio ana ahau kua tuhituhi ōku hoa i te nui o ngā pikitia o tōku whare i ngā rā torutoru nei, engari ka mutu te haere mai me te tatari ki waho," ko te tuhituhi a Payne. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te haere ki waho me te katoa me te hākinakina i te wā me ōku hoa, kaua e kino mō te kore e hiahia ki te tango pikitia. " Aroha mai mēnā kua āhuaatua ahau ki tētahi tangata, engari kua mōhio ahau mēnā ka tangohia e au tētahi pikitia, ka haere tonu mai ētahi atu tāngata i ia rā, e tūmanako ana kia pai te katoa." I tērā marama i hangaia e One Direction he hītori tūtohi i te US. Ko ta rātau pukaemi tuatoru, Midnight Memories, i uru ki te US Billboard 200 i te tau tuatahi, nā reira ko rātau anake te rōpū i runga i te tūtohi i tō rātou wiki tūwheratanga. I haere hāngai tonu hoki ki te tau tuatahi i te UK, ā, ko te pukaemi hokohoko tere rawa mō te rua tau. Ko Midnight Memories te whai ake o Take Me Home, i haere hoki ki te tau tuatahi. Ko ta rātau pukaemi tuatahi, Up All Night, i haere ki te tau rua i te UK i te wā i whakaputaina i te tau 2011. Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter

title: Terminal breast cancer patients 'abandoned' in nurse shortage
summary: E hia mano ngā tūroro mate pukupuku uma e whakahētia ana tētahi nēhi tohunga tūturu, e ai ki te Breast Cancer Care.
text: Nā Laurel IvesBBC Health E whakaatu ana ngā whika i te tata ki te toru hauwhā (72%) o ngā NHS Trusts puta noa i te UK kāore i te whakarato nēhi kua tohua. E toru tau ki muri, ka kī taurangi te kāwanatanga ka uru ngā tūroro mate pukupuku katoa ki tētahi nēhi i tohua i te tau 2020. I kī te Tari Hauora e "tukua ana ki te whakanui ake i te kaha" o ngā nēhi mate pukupuku tohunga. I puta atu a Samia al Qadhi, te rangatira nui o te aroha o Breast Cancer Care, i te hinganga o te tiaki tūroro. "E whakaatu ana a mātau whika whakamīharo i te nui o te tiaki nēhi NHS mō ngā tāngata mate pukupuku uma kāore e taea te rongoā," tana kī. "I muri i tēnei tātaritanga huri ora, ka whakarērea tonutia ngā tūroro me te kore tautoko tohunga haere tonu me whakahaere rātou i ngā rongoā matatini me ngā pānga taha whakangoikore, pēnei i te mamae pūmau me te ngenge." I whakapā atu te aroha ki ngā whakawhirinaki hauora NHS i te UK, ā, i whiwhi i ngā raraunga i raro i ngā ture Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio. 'I mataku ahau, i taratahi' I kitea a Jo Myatt, 42, mai i Chorley, i te mate pukupuku uma tuarua i Aotearoa 2016, 10 tau i muri i te mate pukupuku o te uma tuatahi, ā, i muri i ngā tau maha o ngā mammograms mārama. I korerotia ki a ia kua horapa te mate pukupuku ki tōna ate me ōna wheua. "I muri i taku tātaritanga, i roto i te wā o te whakaaro 20 meneti, i rongo ahau kua ngaro taku tuakiri me taku heke mai me te hunga e arohaina ana e au. " Kāore he tautoko i muri i taku tātaritanga. Kāore he nēhi tiaki uma tuarua, tuarua rānei. I kōrerotia ahau e tētahi GP i te ahiahi o te Paraire, ā, ka tukuna mai ki te kāinga me taku tāne me te kore mōhiotanga me te kore kaupapa. "I mahue katoa ahau i roto i te pouri, i te mataku, i te mokemoke, i te whakararuraru." I huri a Jo i ngā hōhipera kia whiwhi ai i tētahi nēhi tohunga i tērā tau, e tautoko ana i a ia ināianei "ā-tinana, ā-hinengaro" ā, kei te whakahauhau ia ināianei kia nui ake ngā nēhi kia wātea ki te hunga mate pukupuku kāore e taea te rongoā. "Ināianei ka taea e au te īmēra noa iho ki taku nēhi mō te rongoā me ngā pānga taha. It's so stressful trying to keep track of all the different treatments and appointments, and the nurse helps me co-ordinate it all." Ko ngā nēhi te aronga 'tino hira' o te tiakitanga, e 35,000 ngā tāngata e mate ana i te mate pukupuku tuarua (e mōhiotia ana hoki ko te mate pukupuku metastatic, arā atu anō, te wāhanga whā rānei), ā, i ia tau e 11,500 e mate ana i te mate. He nēhi whakatapua tā ētahi torutoru, ā, ko ētahi ka whai nēhi e wehe ana i tō rātou wā i waenganui i ngā tūroro mate pukupuku tuatahi me te tuarua. He rerekē te tūmanako ora mō ngā tūroro mate pukupuku tuarua, engari, i te pai ake o ngā rongoā, he nui ake ngā tāngata e noho roa ana i muri i te tātaritanga, ka nui ake te nui o te tiaki tohunga. I kī a Ms al Qadhi: "Ko ngā tāngata e noho ana i te mate pukupuku o te uma e kī mai ana ki a mātau ko te urunga ki tētahi nēhi tohunga te aronga tino hira o tā rātou tiakitanga, ā, ki te kore e rongo rātou i te taratahi, i warewaretia, i te kore kitea. " Na, me kaua e tahitahitia nga hinganga o tēnei rā i raro i te whāriki. E karanga ana mātou ki te kāwanatanga kia waihanga i tētahi mōkī tautoko tuarua mō te mate pukupuku uma kāore e taea te rongoā." I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero NHS: "He ahurei ngā tāngata katoa whai mate pukupuku, ā, e kī ana ngā tūroro kei te pai ake tō rātou wheako ki te tiaki i ia tau - e mōhio ana ki tō wā e ora ana i te mate pukupuku ināianei kei tōna tiketike rawa."

title: E kī ana ngā MP i te aronui whakamana 'nanakia noa iho', e kī ana ngā MP
summary: Me āta tirotiro anō te kāwanatanga i ōna mana takuhe "nanakia", kua kī tētahi komiti o ngā MP.
text: Ko ngā mana takuhe he whiu i whakaritea ki ngā kaikerēme kāore e tutuki i ngā here pēnei i te haere ki ngā hui pokapū mahi. I kitea e te Komiti Mahi me te Penihana ko ngā mātua takitahi, ngā kaitiaki tiaki me ngā tāngata hauā me ngā āhuatanga hauora he "mōrearea tōtika" ki ngā whakaaetanga. I tohe te Tari Mahi me te Penihana he "tika" tana kaupapa. I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikōrero DWP ko ngā whakamanatanga i "whakamahia anake i roto i te iti o ngā kēhi". Heoi anō, i kī te pūrongo a te komiti he "tiketike rawa" te utu tangata o te pūnaha o nāianei. Tae atu ki ngā wāhui ngaro, ka taea te whakamana i ngā whakaaetanga mō te kore whakaatu i ngā mahi ki te kimi mahi, ā, ka kite i ngā kaikerēme e ngaro ana i te 100% o te whakaaetanga a te kaiwhaiwhai, te whakaaetanga paerewa nama ā-ao rānei. I ētahi take "taumata tiketike" - pēnei i te rahunga ki te mahi utu - ka ngaro pea i ngā kaikerēme ngā painga mō te toru tau. I taunakitia e te pūrongo a te komiti kia rua marama te wā mōrahi mō aua whakamanatanga mō te rahunga tuatahi ki te whakaū, ā, e whā ki te ono marama mō ngā pakaru e whai ake nei. I whakatūpato hoki ka mōrearea ngā tamariki hei "tūkino tūpāpaku" i te whakahekenga o ngā painga a ngā mātua i tūkino i to rātau oranga. 'He tino uaua me te mamae' Me te kore whakaaturanga mārama e whakahaere ana ngā mana i te hokinga mai ki te mahi a ngā mātua takitahi, he "uaua ki te whakatika" i to rātau whakaurunga ki roto i te pūnaha, ka kī te pūrongo. Neke atu i te 500 ngā urupare i whiwhi te komiti e whakamārama ana i te wheako o ngā kaikerēme o te kāwanatanga whakamana, arā ko ngā take o te "tino uauatanga me te mamae". I roto i ēnei ko tētahi kaiwhakamahi tūru tūru i "ngaru sofa" me ōna hoa, i moe rānei i roto i te whare pukapuka o te kāreti mō te tau kotahi i te tangohanga hē o tana painga katoa. A, ka rongo te komiti i tētahi tangata i whakamanatia i tana hapa i tētahi wāhui pokapū mahi e toru rā i muri i tana maunga ki te hōhipera e pāngia ana e te mate hukihuki. I kī atu tētahi atu kaiwhakautu, he matua kotahi ko Arāna te ingoa, ki ngā MP i whakamanatia ia i muri i ngā raruraru tiaki tamariki, ko te tikanga me neke ia mai i te mahi wā katoa ki te mahi wā. I whakaahuatia e ia te hekenga o tana moni whiwhinga ā-marama mai i te toharite o te £800 ia marama ki te £300, ka waiho ia e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā mōkihi kai mai i ōna hoa. I kī a Frank Field, e whakahaere ana i te komiti, kua rongo a ia i ngā kōrero o te "uauatanga wehi, koretake hoki" mai i ngā tāngata kua whakamanatia. I kī te komiti kāore i "mōhiotia" ngā minita e hia ngā tāngata e mamae ana nā te kāwanatanga whakamana, nā te rahunga "kāore e whakaaetia" ki te arotake tika i tōna pānga.

title: Hartlepool 'tiketike' hau turbine kaupapa marohi
summary: Kua tāpaetia ngā mahere mō ngā mīhini hau teitei rawa i Ingarangi me Uēra ki Hartlepool, Teesside.
text: Kei te rapua te whakaaetanga mō ngā turbine kotahi e toru neke atu i te 200m (655ft) te teitei i Graythorp Industrial Estate, Brenda Road West Industrial Estate me Tofts Road West. I kī te Tari Pūngao me te Huringa Āhuarangi e whakapono ana ko ēnei te teitei rawa atu i Ingarangi me Weera. Kua tuhia e te Kaunihera o Hartlepool Borough mō te 40 ngā whakahē ki ngā mahere. Neke atu i te 300 ngā urupare whakaaro kua whiwhia mai i ngā tangata, ngā kaunihera me ētahi atu whakahaere. Ko te kaiwhakawhanake aronui ko te kamupene pūngao whakahou o Hartlepool, Seneca Global Energy Ltd. I kī te rōia o Ward Hadaway, ko Mark Whitehead, e mahi ana mō te kamupene, ka taea e ngā mīhini kotahi te whakaputa i te rōrahi pūngao ōrite ki ngā turbine pūnoa e toru, e whā rānei e whakamahia ana i ētahi atu aronui. "Mā te pikinga o te tere o te hau i te tiketike e āhei ai te rōrahi o te whakatipuranga pūngao whakahou mai i ia turbine kia whakamōrahitia, i a ia e whai hua ana ki te whakaiti i te maha o ngā turbine e whakamahia ana," tana kī. "Ko te tikanga o tēnei hei tuku i ngā taumata tiketike o te hiko whakahou i a ia e whakaiti ana i te pānga arokite ki te rohe karapoti." O ērā e whakautu ana ki te whakaaro ki tēnei wā, neke atu i te kotahi i roto i te 10 ahanoa i runga i ngā take pēnei i te whakaiti i te uara āhuatanga, te āraitanga o te tirohanga me te pānga ki ngā kararehe. Kei te tū ētahi atu kōrero mō te tauwāhi o ngā mīhini i whakaritea mō Tofts Road West me Graythorp Industrial Estate. I whakamāramatia e te Ramblers Association me Network Rail tō rātou pae marohi o nāianei i mahue i a rātou i roto i te "tawhiti takahuri" o te raina rerewhenua me ngā whare pātata. Ko te taupānga mō ngā turbine e toru me te teitei o te aki mōrahi - e inetia ana mai i te whenua ki te tihi o tētahi mata turbine e tohu ana ki runga - o te 206m (677ft) ka whakaarohia a tērā tau. Hei whakataurite, tata ki te 120-125m (tata ki te 400ft) te teitei o ngā mīhini i ngā pāmu hau o Northumberland pērā i Lynemouth me Middlemoor. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Graythorp Industrial Estate plans Brenda Road West Industrial Estate plans Tofts Road West plans Hartlepool renewables Renewables map

title: Mōrearea kaiheke: Me whakaae te EU 'ki ngā hunga whakaruru e 200,000', e kī ana te UN
summary: Me whakaae ngā iwi EU ki ngā hunga whakaruru e 200,000 hei wāhanga o tētahi "rautaki noa iho" hei whakakapi i tā rātou huarahi "ā-wā" ki te mate kaiheke, e kī ana te UN.
text: I kī a Te Upoko o te pokapū rerenga o UN, me nekeneke e te EU te "tōpana katoa" mō te raruraru, e karanga ana he "wā whakamahuki". Ko ngā kaiārahi EU, e wehe ana i te tiritiri i te kawenga rerenga, e whāwhā ana ki te whakaae ki tētahi urupare i roto i ngā hui i te Paraire. I Hakari, e hia rau nga hunga whakaruru e maukati ana i roto i te tumu ki nga mana. Ko ngā kaiheke e tūmanako ana kia tae ki te rohe o Ahurangi, kāore i whakaae ki te heke mai i tētahi tereina e karapotia ana e ngā pirihimana i te taone o Hakaria o Bicske, e 40km (25 māwhiti) mai i Putapeta. E hiahia ana ngā whakahōutanga ora mō te mōrearea o ngā mana o Hakaria ki te neke i ngā kaiheke ki tētahi puni tūruhi pātata - engari e wehi ana ngā kaiheke ki te rēhita i reira ka whakakāhoretia a rātau kaupapa ki te rapu whakangungu i Tiamana me ētahi atu whenua. I te pūmatua o Hakaria, i Putapeta, e hia rau ngā hunga whakaruru kua tautohe kia "haere ki Whiria" nā te mea kāore anō kia whakaaetia kia eke ki ngā tereina. Kua katia hoki e Hakari tōna whakawhitinga taitapa matua ki Hēpia i muri i te mawhititanga o ētahi kaiheke e 300 i tētahi puni i te taone o Roszke, e akiaki ana i tētahi mahi rapu pirihimana. Ināianei, kua tanumia tētahi tamaiti Kurīhi Hiriani i toromi i a ia e ngana ana ki te tae ki Kariki ki tōna taone tupu o Kobane i te Paraire. I whakawhiti te whānau o Ahana Kurdi i te rohe mai i Tākehi ki Hiria, e mau ana i ngā kāwhena e mau ana i tōna tinana me ērā o ngā mema o te whānau i mate tahi me ia. Kua horahia whānuitia ngā whakaahua o te tinana ngoikore o te kōhungahunga, i horoia ki uta i runga i tētahi one tākehi, e whakanui ana i te whakapouri i te mate o te kaiheke. I te maunga o te raruraru, kei te anga atu te EU ki te pēhanga kaha ki te whāngai i tētahi kaupapa here whakahoahoa ki ngā rere kaiheke - ko te tino nui rawa e kitea ana i te ao whānui mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I whakahē a Tēnā Wānanga, o te Komihana Tiketike mō ngā Hunga Whakaruru (UNHCR), i te pūnaha "kāore i te whārite, kāore i te mahi" o te kōti, nāna i kī he painga anake ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāngata. Ka tohe a ia ki te EU kia whakaae ki te 200,000 ngā hunga whakaruru hei wāhanga o "tētahi hōtaka whakawhitiwhiti maha" e whai ana i te "whai wāhitanga whakahau" o ngā āhuatanga mema katoa. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Wānanga me hanga e Uropi "ngā āheinga kaiwhiwhi tika", i Kariki, e whakakapi ana i tētahi huarahi "ā-wāhanga" ki tētahi "rautaki noa iho". I ētahi atu whanaketanga: Mōrearea kaiheke: ko te pānuitanga taipitopito Tekau ngā whakaahua kaha e whakatakotoria ana e Hakari te ritua EU ki te Rāwhiti-Uru Ka huri tētahi atahanga i o tātau tirohanga? Ko te raruraru kaiheke i roto i ngā whakairoiro e hīpae ana ngā MP o Hakaria 'Whakamā' i te Paraire e pōti ana hoki ki te hanga puni pupuri hou mō ngā kaiheke, ā, mēnā he āhua ohorere te āhuatanga. I whakaahuatia e te Pirimia o Te Rāwiki te āhuatanga he "raruraru Tiamana" i te wāhi i tae mai ai te hunga e tae ana ki te EU "e hiahia ana ki te haere". Heoi anō, i whakahē te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rakapuō, a Jean Asselborn - e upoko ana i ngā hui EU i runga i te raruraru - i whakahē i te kaiārahi tūturu o Hakari i runga i te pouaka whakaata Tiamana, e kī ana: "I ētahi wā me whakamā tētahi ki a Tōnara Orban." Mōrearea kaiheke: Ngā pātai matua He aha te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e neke ana? Kei raro ngā whenua EU i te pēhanga o ngā kaiheke mai i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui me Āwherika ki te mawhiti i te pakanga me te tukinotanga. Ko Itari, Kariki me Hakari, i runga i nga taitapa o te EU, kai raro i te pēhanga motuhake. No hea mai rātou? Ko ngā Hiriani te rōpū nui rawa atu i runga i te iwi, whai muri i ngā Hūnihi me ngā Eritrea. He aha te tangata i rere ai i Hiria? I hū mai tētahi whakatikanga ki a Perehitini Harahara i Mati 2011, ā, mai i tērā wā ka heke iho te whenua ki tētahi pakanga tūmatanui matatini. Neke atu i te 240,000 ngā tāngata kua mate, ā, neke atu i te hawhe o te iwi whānui o Hiria kua rere i o rātau kāinga. He aha te take i raruraru ai a EU ki ngā kaiheke me te hōhuru? Kua kī te Perehitini o te Kaunihera o Ūropi o Donald Tusk, neke atu i te 100,000 ngā hunga whakaruru me tuari puta noa i ngā whenua EU - he nui ake te pikinga i runga i tētahi ūnga Kōmihana o Ūropi o mua o te 40,000. Kua kī te Tumuaki Tiamana o Hēnea Tūturu me te Perehitini Wīwī, o Te Perehitini Wīwī, o Te Perehitini o Wīwī, ka whakatakotoria e rātau he kaupapa mo te whakaraupapatanga o te hunga whakaruru i roto i te EU. Nā Nick Thorpe, ko te kaipānui o Te Pirimia o Hakaria, ko Te Pirimia o Hakaria, ko Te Pirimia o Hakaria, he kaiārahi tōrangapū e tipu ana i runga i te papā. Ahakoa kāore a ia e whakaae ki te whakahē i roto i tana rōpū Fidesz, he pai ki a ia te mau i ōna hoariri. Engari i roto i te mate rerenga tangata ināianei e whakararuraru ana i Hakari, ehara i te mea ko ngā kaiheke anake e whakaekea ana e ia, engari, ka nui haere a Tiamana. Kua whakaahuatia e Tēnā Orban tonu ngā tono mō te here i ngā tohatoha o te hunga whakaruru kia whakaaetia e ngā whenua EU katoa hei "heahea" - he muhani whaiaro ki te Tumuaki o Hēnera. Te āhua nei e rua ngā kōpaki o tana kēmu ināianei: ki te whakaoho i te hōroiroi i te kāinga mā te puta mai i te kāinga me te kaha, me te toro atu ki ngā whakaaro ārai kaiheke puta noa i Uropi. Kōtaha: Ka hopukina e te PM o Hakari, a Tōnara Orban Tiamana tōna wā hei āwhina Me pēhea e taea ai e EU te whakatika i te raruraru? Kua whakatārewatia ngā ratonga aowhānui i te teihana rerewhenua o Keleti o Putapeta, engari he rau rau i kōpikopiko ki te tereina tuatahi i te Rāitema, e tūmanako ana ka mauria rātau ki te rohe o Ahurangi. He tokomaha ngā tāngata i haere tonu ki te puni i te teihana o Keleti, me ētahi atu wāhi i Putapeta, i te pō. I whakaaturia e ngā atahanga nga kaiheke e moe ana i te pō i runga i te tereina i Bicske. Kua uiuia e te hōtaka o te Reo Irirangi Whā o Tēnei Rā tētahi kaiako Hiriani i tētahi puni i Hakari, nāna i kī e hiahia ana tōna whānau ki te whakangungu i Tiamana i muri i tana uaua ki te ora i Repanona me Tāke. "Ka mahia e nga kāwanatanga katoa tēnei pakanga ki Hiria," te kī a te wahine, i kitea ko Hamza. "Ā, ināianei rātou... āraia mātau ki te haere ki o rātau whenua." He kaiheke, he hunga whakaruru rānei? Kua tautuhia te kupu kaiheke i roto i te Oxford English Dictionary hei "tangata e neke ana, rangitahi, pūmau rānei, mai i tētahi wāhi, rohe, whenua noho rānei ki tētahi atu". Ko te hunga rerenga, e ai ki te Hui Rerenga o te tau 1951, ko te tangata katoa "i runga i te wehi tūturu" o te whakatoinga kei waho i tō rātou whenua whenua, ā, "kāore e taea", "kāore rānei e hiahia" ki te rapu i te parenga o taua whenua. Kia whiwhi ai i te tūnga, me haere te tangata i te tukanga ā-ture o te tono whakangungu. Ko te kupu kaiheke e whakaarotia ana he kupu kūpapa, engari ko ētahi e whakahē ana i te AO me ētahi atu pāpāho mō te whakamahi i tētahi kupu e kī ana rātou e tohu ana i tētahi mea tūturu, ā, kaua e hoatu ki ngā tāngata e rere ana i te mōrearea. Pakanga mo nga kupu hei whakaahua i nga kaiheke Kei Hakari koe? Kei Bicske koe i runga i te tereina rānei? He hoa me ō whānau e pāngia ana e tēnei pūrākau? Īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk ō wheako. Mēnā kei te hari koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU, tēnā whakaurua ngā taipitopito whakapā.

title: Ko ngā tono penapena a Epsom me St Helier NHS 'mohoao'
summary: Kua whakahē ngā kaiwhakahauhau i ngā mahere a tētahi whakawhirinaki NHS e kite ana i te ngaronga o ngā whakairinga 115 tae atu ki ngā tākuta.
text: Kua tīmataria e Epsom rāua ko Hato Helier, he hōhipera ōna i Surrey me Rānana, he whakaaro 90 rā ki ngā kaimahi mō ngā marohi.
