I whakaahuatia e Mātini Mātini, e tūtaki ana i te rōpū pēhanga o London Health Emergency, he "mōrearea". Kua kī te whakawhirinaki, e kimi ana ki te tiaki i ngā miriona pauna, e whakapono ana ka pai ake te mahi. I kī ngā whakairinga rongoā a Tēnā Mātini: "Koinei noa iho ngā tapahi mōrearea hou i Epsom me Hato Helier, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou kia tino kino kē atu." The trust said it wanted to save £18.7m by March 2012 but it would still be left with a £19.3m deficit at the end of the financial year. E 26 ngā tākuta i pāngia e ngā pou rongoā, e kī ana te whakawhirinaki e tohu ana i te 4% o ngā kaimahi rongoā. Ko te whakawhirinaki te rangatira me te whakahaere i te Hōhipera o Epsom i Epsom, Surrey, me ngā hōhipera e toru i Rānana: Hōhipera o Hato Helier, Hōhipera o Kuini Meri mō ngā Tamariki, me te Hōhipera o Sutton.

title: Ka whakapūmautia e te haumanu ira ngā pūkahukahu o ngā tūroro fibrosis cystic
summary: Kua whakaūngia e te haumanu ira, ā, he iti noa iho te pai ake o te fibrosis cystic i ētahi o ngā tūroro e 136 i roto i tētahi whakamātautau.
text: Nā te korero kōrero a Pallab GhoshScience, kāore i whakaaturia e o rātau pūkahukahu te whakapeka, i te wawaenga, i muri i to rātau ngongo i ngā tārua hauora o te ira e pā ana ki te CF kotahi i te marama mō te tau, ko ngā hua i whakaputaina i roto i te whakaaturanga Lancet Respiratory Medicine. A, ko ngā pūkahukahu i tino kōpikopiko i mua i te whakamātautau i whakaatu i te 3% whakapainga. Ko ngā pūkahukahu o ngā tūroro kāore i mau i te haumanu ira i whakaatu i te hekenga o te 3-4% i te wawaenga i taua wā kotahi. I whakatūpato a Prof Eric Alton, o Imperial College London, nāna i ārahi te whakamātautau: "He iti noa iho te pānga, ā, he tāupe. Kāore anō kia rite ki te haere hāngai ki te whare hauora." E tūmanako ana a Prof Alton me ōna hoa mahi i te UK Cystic Fibrosis Gene Therapy consortium, arā ko ngā kaipūtaiao i ngā Whare Wānanga o Edinburgh me Oxford, tae atu ki Imperial, kia whai whakamātautau anō a tērā tau. Ko te fibrosis cystic he āhuatanga tuku iho i takea mai i tētahi ira hē e ahu ana ki te hanganga o te harore piripiri e whakararuraru ana i te ihu, korokoro me ngā pūkahukahu. Ko te tūmanako ora toharite o ngā tūroro ko te 41. 'Me tōrunga koe' Ko Kieran Kelly, ko te nuinga o te wā e mau ana i ngā pire e 40, ngā werohanga me ngā rongoā ngongo puta noa i te rā, i waenganui i te hunga e whai wāhi ana ki te whakamātautau. I kī atu a ia ki a BBC News: "I tino hauora ake ahau. Tērā pea he hinengaro, engari i pai ake ahau i roto i a au anō. "Me ora koe i ia rā kei a koe," tana tāpiri mai. "Me tino pai koe, me noho noa koe i tō oranga me te hākinakina." E noho ana a Nadia Raiti me Tāne Kelly i Brighton, ā, kei te whakaaro rāua ki te mārena ā muri ake i tēnei marama. Ka kī a ia: "Me tino tūmanako koe. I to mātau tūtakitanga tuatahi [e iwa tau ki mua], ko te toharite o te tūmanako ora ko te 28. "Nā reira i ia wā ka kite koe i ngā whanaketanga rongoā, he tino whakahauhau i ngā wā katoa". Engari e mōhio ana rāua tahi kāore pea te rongoā ira hou e rite i te wā hei āwhina i a Tēnā Kelly. "He tino hākinakina te pānga ki te tangata e whai wāhi ana ki ngā whakamātautau," tana kī. "He tino pai mēnā ka pērā." Engari i kī a Miss Raiti kua whai hua kē ia i ngā rongoā i hangaia nā ētahi atu tāngata i whai wāhi ki ngā whakamātautau o mua. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko tā Kieran e mahi ana ka āwhina i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ā muri ake nei. E tino whakahīhī ana ahau ki a ia." I kī ētahi atu akoranga a Prof Kiriuati Elborn, o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini i Te Whare Wānanga o Kuini, he "whakahauhau" ngā hua, engari kāore i pai ake te rongoā i ētahi o ngā rongoā e wātea ana i tēnei wā. A, ka karangatia e ia ētahi atu whakamātautau tauine iti kia kite ai mēnā ka pai ake te rongoā nui ake. "Mēnā i runga ahau i te poari o tētahi kamupene rongoā, ka hiahiatia e au ētahi atu akoranga hei whakatau i te rongoā tino pai, ā, mēnā ka taea te whakakotahi i te rongoā o nāianei ki ētahi atu rongoā hei whakanui ake i te pānga," tana kī. "He wawe rawa te haere tonu me ngā whakamātautau nui ake e toru e utu ana i ngā miriona miriona". I kī te rangatira nui o Cystic Fibrosis Trust, a Ed Owen: "Ko te painga o te haumanu ira, ko te whakaeke i te hēnga taketake o te fibrosis cystic, ā, ka taea te whakaiti i ngā mahi rongoā o ia rā e mau ana te hunga whai fibrosis cystic i ia rā, ā, (ka tukuna te tūponotanga) o te whakapai ake mo te wā roa hei panoni i o rātau oranga". Whāia a Pallab i Twitter

title: 3aaa: Uiui hara ki te umanga whakangungu Derby i rahua
summary: Kua tīmata tētahi tūhuratanga hara ki tētahi umanga whakangungu i hinga, neke atu i te 3,000 ngā tauira.
text: I muri noa iho i te whakawāteatanga o te Tari Mātauranga (DfE) i tana kānataraki, e kī ana kua kitea e ia te "hē nui". Tata ki te 500 ngā mahi puta noa i te UK i ngaro i te umanga o Derby. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Derbyshire i whai te nekehanga i muri i ngā whakaaro tinihanga i mahia e te DfE ki te umanga. Ka tīmataria e ngā āpiha o te tīma tūhura tinihanga tohunga o te ope te tukanga o te uiui tika ki ēnei whakaaro, e kī ana. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Tere motokā o Stevenage: Ko te kaimātakitaki i whara 'hōhā me te kore mahi'
summary: I whara tētahi kaimātakitaki i muri i te whakahaeretanga i tētahi takahanga tere motokā, ka kī a ia e "hōhā" ana i te kore e taea te mahi.
text: Ko Rhys Hunt, e 21, tētahi o ngā tāngata e 18 i whara i te huihuinga aroha i Stevenage i a Hōngongoi. E rua marama te mahi ā-ringa i roto i te tūru tūruhi, a, i kī mai kua pāngia e ia ētahi marama "uaua" e pā ana ki te moni. E whakapono ana a ia tērā pea i "tākaro i ētahi atu kēmu ataata i tōku oranga katoa" mai i te tūtukitanga, engari e tūmanako ana kia hoki mai ki te mahi i te Tau Hōu. E tū ana a Tēnā Hunt, mai i Hatfield, i te wāhi tāpui matua o Monkswood Way me tana hoa wahine me tētahi hoa i te wā o te takahanga i te 18 o Hōngongoi. E whakaatu ana ngā whakarākeitanga ataata i ngā motokā e rua e tūtuki ana i tētahi komititanga, ā, kotahi te tūtuki i ngā tāngata e tū ana i te taha o te huarahi, ā, ka tuki tētahi ki ngā kaimātakitaki i te tāpuitanga matua. E toru wiki i muri iho ka tukua katoatia ngā tāngata i whara i te hōhipera, ā, kua kī a Tēnā Hunt i mua i a ia i rongo ia he "waimarie ki te ora" ngā tāngata katoa i roto i te tūtukitanga. E rima marama i muri mai ka kī a ia, ahakoa kua "kōmakatia" e ia tana uauatanga tuatahi ki te utu pire, kua raruraru te "hōhā". "Mai i taku whiwhinga i taku mahi tuatahi, kua tino whakamahia ahau ki te oho ake i te ata, ki te haere ki te mahi, ki te hoki mai ki te kāinga me te whakangā," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Hunt inā noa nei i ngana ia ki te mahi kirikiri i runga i te papa o tana kōtiro, engari i tana tūnga ake i muri iho "kāore he taumahatanga i runga i taku waewae matau". Ināianei kei te mahi ture a ia ki te atekōkiri i patu i a ia, ā, ki te angitu, ka kī ka hoatu e ia he moni "ki ngā tāngata kua āwhina i ahau i roto i taku tūru tūruhi, ngā tāngata i āwhina mōku i a au e mate ana".

title: Pūtea 2015: He aha tātau i whai Pūtea anō ai?
summary: Ka tukuna e George Osborne he Tahua i te Wenerei 8 o Hōngongoi, iti iho i te whā marama i muri i tana tukunga i te mea whakamutunga.
text: Nā Anthony ReubenHead of statistics, BBC News Budget headline numbers £730bn Government's approx annual expenditures £30bn The IFS says this would have to be cut from government depts to meet deficit targets by 2018-19 £12bn Planned cuts to welfare budget by 2017-18 £5bn Government plans to recover this in a clampdown on tax avoidance Of course,  he nui ngā mea i pā mai i Poutāpeta, ā, kua kore te tumuaki e whai hoa tauwhāinga kia hari tonu. Ahakoa rā, e tūmanako ana hoki ia kia whai Arotakenga Whakapau i te ngahuru me tētahi Tauākī Ngahuru i te hōtoke, e tāpiri ana ki te maha o ngā wāhanga tautuhi i roto i te tau kotahi. Me whai kōrero whakamere tāna, kāore rānei ia e whakararuraru, ā, he tokomaha nga kaipūrongo i whakahē i ngā Tohutohu mō te kore e hoatu i ētahi atu taipitopito mō ētahi o a rātau kaupapa i te wā o te whakahau pōti. Kia mahara, kei te whakaaro ia ki te tapahi i te whakapau moni katoa mā te 1% mō ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei, kātahi ka whakatio i te tau tuatoru kia whakakore i te tāpaetanga. Ko tētahi o ngā pātai nui rawa ko te wāhi e whakaaro ana ia ki te kimi i te £12bn i kīa mai i roto i te whakapau oranga i te tau 2017-18. Ehara i te mea ngāwari nā te mea kua whakataua e ia me te pirimia ngā whakahekenga ki te maha o ngā painga. Na te kī a te pirimia e kore ia e tapahi i ngā painga kaitiaki, i te takuhe tamariki rānei, ka kite koe mai i te tūtohi i runga ake nei he aha ia i tūmanakohia ai kia tapahia e ia ngā hua tāke mahi me te takuhe whare. Kāore tonu pea a ia e hoatu i ngā taipitopito katoa o te wāhi e haere mai ai ngā tapahi, engari ka mīharo mēnā kāore mātou i mōhio anō mō taua mea i te mutunga o te rā. Ka kitea e koe mai i te tūtohi i raro nei he pēhea te tūmanako a Tēnā Osborne ki te kawe mai i ngā moni tāke me te whakapau moni kia tata atu ki a rāua anō ki te whakakore i te tāupenga pūtea ā-tau i te wā o tēnei pāremata. E mārama ana, tata tonu ki te katoa o ngā mahere e puta mai ana i te tapahi ki te whakapau moni, ehara i te pikinga o ngā tāke. I waenganui i ngā mehua i hoahoatia hei kohi moni anō, ko te £5bn i roto i ngā penapena mai i ngā tikanga ārai ārai, tērā pea, kāore rānei. Me pūtea hoki e te kāwanatanga te £4bn i roto i ngā utu tāke i kīa mai i mua i te pōtitanga, arā ko ngā mea pēnei i te whakarato tamariki tāpiri me te whakapiki i te paepae mahi pane kuini. Ka huri tēnei i te aro atu ki te whakapau moni a te tari. Kāore i te mārama e hia ngā taipitopito ka whiwhi mātou mō ngā whakapau moni a te tari i tēnei Pūtea, ā, e hia te nui ka tiakina mō tētahi Arotakenga Whakapau ā muri ake o te tau. E kī ana te Institute for Fiscal Studies mā te pūkete i ngā wāhi whakapau moni me piki, me kimi e Tēnā Osborne te £30bn o ngā whakapau moni a te tari i te tau 2018-19. Kua pānuitia kētia e ia kua kitea te £3bn i roto i ngā penapena tōtika puta noa i ngā tari i tēnei tau. I te pāremata whakamutunga, he tino pai te pūkete a te kāwanatanga ki te whakatutuki i ngā tapahi e hiahiatia ana i roto i te whakapau moni a te tari, engari tērā pea ka uaua ake i tēnei wā. E tūmanako ana koe kia mahia e te kāwanatanga ngā tapahi ngāwari rawa i te tuatahi, ā, he iti noa iho te nuinga o te Whare o Ngātahi mēnā ka kitea e ētahi o ngā mehua kāore i te manakohia i waenganui i ōna tūru tuarā. Anō hoki, ka piki haere tonu te utu o te hekenga o te wāhanga tūmatanui i te nuinga o ngā kaimahi o te wāhanga tūmatanui e haere ana, e ora roa ana. Ahakoa kei te hinga te nui o te moni e namatia ana e te kāwanatanga i ia tau, kei te nui haere tonu te tapeke o te moni i tonoa e ia, ko te tikanga me utu te huamoni ki ētahi atu moni, ahakoa he iti rawa te huamoni. Ehara i te mea e parea ana te whakapau moni ki te Ratonga Hauora ā-Motu - kua kī taurangi te kāwanatanga kia whakapau moni anō i te £8bn i te tau ki runga i te tau 2020, e tohu ana i ngā tapahi nui ake i ētahi atu tari. E parea ana te whakapau moni mātauranga mō ngā tamariki e rima ki te 16 tau mō ia tauira, nā reira me whakatika hoki te pikinga o ngā tau tauira mā te tapahi i tētahi atu wāhi. E parea ana hoki te āwhina o te ao whānui, ā, ka tipu hāngai ki te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Ko te hua, e whakaaro ana te IFS ko ngā mahere o nāianei ki te tapahi i te whakapau moni mā te 1% mō ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei, kātahi ka whakatio mō te tuatoru, ko te tikanga o te tapahi mō ngā tari kāore i parea e 5.4% i te tau mō te toru tau. Ka tae mai tērā ki runga i ngā tapahi kua mahia kētia mai i te tau 2010, e whakaaturia ana i te tūtohi i raro nei. Ko ngā tahua tuatahi o ngā pāremata hou e mōhiotia ana mō te kohi tāke me te tapahi whakapau moni, engari he uaua ki te whakaaro kāore e kitea e Tēnā Osborne tētahi mea hei whakareka i te kōrero a tērā wiki. E mōhio ana tātau mai i te whakahau a te Rangatira ka tipu anō te whakaaetanga whaiaro o te tāke moni whiwhinga, ā, ka puta he mehua e pai ai te whakanui ake i te paepae mo te utu tāke tuku iho. Ki te kore ia e kite i tētahi mea hou, hopu whatu hoki hei whakareka i te hōtaka, tūmanako kia pā katoa ngā kupu matua o te Tāite ki te tapahi oranga.

title: Ka tohe ngā MSP kia whakakāhore i te Pire Putanga EU
summary: Ka tonoa ngā MSP kia whakakāhore tika ki te hoatu i te whakaaetanga a Holyrood ki te Pire Putanga EU i te Tūtira.
text: Kei te tūpono ngā kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me UK ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture o Te Pākehā mō ngā mea e pā ana ki ngā mana i muri i te wehenga atu o te UK i te EU. Kua whakatakotoria e nga minita o Pirihitini he mōtini mo te taupatupatu i te Tūrei, e tono ana i ngā MSP kia kaua e whakaae ki te pire. E tūmanakohia ana ka puta tēnei, me te pūrua a Labour, Greens me Lib Dems i te SNP i ngā wāhanga ātete o te pire. Kāore ngā minita o UK i whakaae ki te kī mēnā ka haere tonu rātau ki te whakawa ture me te kore whakaaetanga a Holyrood, e kī ana kei te whai wāhi tonu ki te whakaaetanga. I kī atu te Minita Tuatahi o Nicola Sturgeon ki ngā kaiārahi pakihi i Rāwāhi i te Mane "kua pau te wā" kia mahia he mahi. Ko te haupae e pā ana ki te whakamahinga o ngā mana whakahaere i tēnei wā mai i Pōroa i muri i te Pakihi. E whakaae ana ngā kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me UK kia whakamahia ētahi i roto i ngā "anga" mana whānui o UK, e waihanga ana i ngā ture me ngā ture hono puta noa i te UK, engari he rerekē ō rātou whakaaro me pēhea ēnei e tatū ai, e whakahaere ana. E hiahia ana ngā minita o Pirihitini kia rapua te whakaaetanga a Holyrood mō te whakamahi i ēnei mana, i te wā e tautohe ana ngā minita o UK ka taea e tēnei te hoatu i ngā pāremata he "whakahē" ki ngā hanganga whānui o UK. Kāore i taea e tētahi rangatū kōrero roa te whakaputa i tētahi mahi i waenganui i ngā taha e rua, ahakoa i taea e ngā minita UK te whakaae ki ngā hoa mahi i Weera. Ka whakaarohia e nga mema pāremata o Welsh tētahi mōtini whakaaetanga i a rātau ake i te Tūrei. E kī ana ngā minita o Pirihitini ka taea kē e rātau te whakawhirinaki ki ā rātou ake ture whirinoa o Te Kōti Matua, engari kua werohia i te Kōti Matua e ngā āpiha ture o UK. I kī te mōtini i tukuna e te minita o Pirihitini o Pirihitini, a Maika Russell, ko tētahi wāhanga o te pire o Aotearoa ka "aukati i te māiatanga ture me te mana whakahaere o te Pāremata o Pirihitini me te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini". I kī a Tēnā Russell he "wā kaha ki te whakakotahi ki te pare i ngā mana o te mana whakahaere". Kua whakatakotoria e nga Tohutohu tētahi menemana e tono ana i te whakaaetanga a te pāremata ki te pire, i te wā i whakaraupapatia e Labour tētahi e karanga ana ki "ngā kōrero whakawhiti-rōpū i te ngana ki te whakarite i tētahi huarahi whakamua". Kua whakaputaina hoki e te komiti kaupapa ture o Holyrood tētahi pūrongo e tūtohu ana mēnā kāore e kitea he rongoā tōrangapū ki te haupae, me whakakāhore ngā MSP i te whakaaetanga mō ngā wāhanga tautohetohe o te Pire Putunga. I kī te komiti ko ngā rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me UK "ka taea te whakatau mā te whakakaha i te whakawhirinaki tahi me te manaaki", engari ki te kore e taea tēnei, kaua ngā MSP e whakaae ki te wāhanga o te pire e pā ana ki ngā mana kua whakaritea. I pūruatia tēnei tūnga e ngā mema o SNP, Labour me Kākāriki, i te wā i pōti ngā mema o te komiti Conservative.

title: V Tē Taea te Tūpono: Ko te rōpū kanikani Īnia i toa i te Pūmanawa o Amerika
summary: Ko te mātakitaki i a V Unbeatable, he rōpū kanikani mai i te taone o Pīhīhī o Īnia, he rite tonu ki te mātakitaki i tētahi whakamutunga o te Omirangi 100m. He whakaharahara, he whakamīharo io, he mīharo tākaro.
text: Kātahi anō ka toa te rōpū i te tau 15 o America's Got Talent: The Champions. Ko ta rātau mahinga i te whakamutunga, e whakaatu ana i te kaipatu toka punk o Blink 182, ko Travis Barker, ehara i te mea whakamīharo. I tētahi wā, ka pupuri a Barker i tētahi rākau pahū i te hau. Ka hoki whakamuri tētahi mema taitamariki o te rōpū kanikani ki runga i a ia i a ia e hopu ana i te rākau pahū me te taunga ki runga i te kākano o ētahi atu kaikanikani i mua i te pupuri i te rākau. Ka ngaro te hinengaro huihuinga o te huihuinga. E tū ana ngā kaiwhakawā o Howie Mandel, Haimona Wai, Heidi Klum me Alesha Dixon, e rūrū ana i o rātau mahunga i runga i te whakaponokore. Anei te wā: "I hari mātau. He tūturu taua wā," te kī a Om Pekash, te kaiārahi o te rōpū, ki a Andrew Clarance o TE HAU. "I tino kaha ta mātau mahi. Kaore i taea e mātau te tuku i tēnei wā kia heke atu. He toa mātau ināianei." Engari ehara i te mea ngāwari to rātau haere kia tae ki tēnei wā, ā, kua tae ki te tūkinotanga. I tīmata i ngā tau kua taha nei i te wā i mahue ai a Tēnā Pekash i tōna kāinga i te tūnga o Īnia ki te raki o Hākano Pakatōkā ki te kimi mahi. E 10 ona tau i tana kitenga i tētahi mahi i roto i tētahi wheketere karaehe, nāna i utu he utu ā-marama e 5,000 rupeea ($70; £54). Hei penapena moni, ka moe ia i te wheketere me te kai i ana kai i reira. Ko te moni i penapenatia e ia, ka whakahokia e ia ki te kāinga. Tērā tētahi māra e tata ana ki te wheketere e haere mai ai ētahi tamariki torutoru ki te kanikani. "Ka mātakitaki ahau i a rātau e kanikani ana, ā, i tētahi rā, ka whakatau ahau ki te ako mai i a rātou." I taua wā, ka tūtaki a Tēnā Pekash ki a Vikas, e kanikani ana hoki me nga tamariki. I whai whakaaro tahi rāua ki te waihanga i te rōpū kanikani. "I haere mai nga tamariki rōpū i nga tūpāpaku i Naigaon rāua ko Haina i Pīhīhī. Māku e utu ta rātau haerenga. Me pēhea e taea ai e au te tono moni ki a rātou? Ko rātau aku tamariki." Ka haere te moni o tana utu ki ngā kākahu, ki te kai me te haere mō te rōpū. Heoi anō, ka tūtaki a Vikas ki tētahi aituā kino. I a ia e mahi ana i tētahi mahi kanikani, ka hinga a ia, a, ka mahue i te pararaiha. Kotahi marama a ia i te hōhipera, engari kāore i taea e ngā tākuta te whakaora i a ia. Ināianei, i ia wā e mahi ana te rōpū, ka manaakitia e rātau a Vikas mā te mau i tōna ingoa ki muri o o rātau koti. I tāpiritia hoki e rātau tana tīmatanga ki te ingoa o to rātau rōpū - koia rātau i karangatia ai ko V Unbeatable. Kaore i roa ka tīmata te rōpū ki te tirotiro i ngā takahanga paetata me ngā whakataetae kanikani. "I tīmata mātou ki te toa i ētahi o ēnei takahanga. Ka whakamahia e mātau te moni whakawhiwhinga hai tiaki i a mātau anō me te kore e whakararuraru ki te penapena moni. E tika ana kia tika mātau," te kī a Tēnā Pekash. I to rātau whiwhinga i tētahi īmēra mai i te America's Got Talent e tono ana i a rātau ki te whakataetae, ka tono a Tēnā Pekash ki a Rohit Jaatav, he hoa mahi roa me te koreographer, ki te āwhina i te rōpū i roto i te whakataetae. "I kite ahau i mua i a Om Harash e mahi ana me tana rōpū i runga i tētahi atu whakaaturanga ao rangirua kanikani i reira ahau he koreographer," te kī a Tēnā Iaatav ki te HAU. "Engari he moemoeā tēnei mōku. I hiahia hoki ahau ki te moemoeā nui me te mahi i tētahi mea." Ki a Tēnā Pekash, ko tēnei toa hoki mo nga tamariki maha i whakaakona e ia i roto i nga tau. "I purua e rātau ngā mea katoa ki runga i te raina mō tēnei. The plan is to own our very own dance studio where we can practice and train others," he says. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: Te momona o te tangata pū mokemoke
summary: E rua rau tau ki muri, ka pūhia e tētahi kōhuru te Pirimia o Spencer Perceval i te Whare o Ngātahi. Na tōna matenga i tīmata tētahi tuma i uaua ai ngā ratonga haumarutanga ki te mahi mai i taua wā - te tangata pūtā takitahi.
text: Nā Jon KellyBBC News Magazine Ka whakatika te kaipatu i mua i te pirimia, e ārai ana i tōna ara. Kātahi ka toro atu a John Bellingham i tōna ringa, ka pēhi i tētahi pū ki te poho o te kaiārahi, ka kumea te keu. He kaihokohoko whakarihariha a Bellingham. Ko te matenga o tana tūkinotanga, a Spencer Perceval, i te 11 o Me 1812 i te Whare o Ngātahi, ko te wā anake i kōhurutia ai tētahi pirimia o Ingarangi. Engari i tautuhia e te kōhuru he tātauira kino i roto i ngā rau tau e rua e whai ake nei mō tētahi rangatū o ngā pūtā takitahi i ngana ki te whakanui ake i o rātau ake whakaaro mā te tiki i tētahi pū me te whakangungu i runga i te rangatira o to rātau iwi. I te rau tau i muri mai i te tau 1865, tokowhā nga perehitini o Amerika i mate pērā. Ahakoa ehara i te tangata pū takitahi, i whakarerekētia e Gavrilo Princip te ara o te hītori o te Uru mā te kōhuru i a Archduke Franz Ferdinand i te tau 1914. He takahanga tērā i whakaoho i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao. Ko te oranga o te Pirimia o Iharaira o Yitzhak Rabin, ko te kaiārahi motika ā iwi o Amerika, ko Mātini Kīngi me te pirimia o Huitene, ko Olof Palme, i tapahia katoatia e tētahi tangata whai pū, pērā ki tērā o te kaiārahi Initia me te kaiwhaiwhai o Mohandas Whakarārangi. Ehara a Perceval i te rangatira tuatahi i mate i te ringa o te kōhuru. I whakapūmautia e Shakespeare te whakatupu i ahu mai ki te okanga ki te mate o Julius Caesar. He maha ētahi atu emepara me ngā kīngi i tūtaki ki o rātau matenga i runga i te āhua ōrite. Engari i te nuinga o te wā ka hinga rātau ki te ringa o tētahi tangata whai āheitanga whai painga - he mema o te porowhita o roto. Ehara hoki a Perceval i te kaiārahi tuatahi i mate i te pū a te kōhuru. Ko te Earl tuatahi o Moray, te rangatira o Pākehā, e whakaarotia ana e ngā kaituhituhi hītori ko ia te upoko tuatahi o te kāwanatanga i patua e te patu, i te tau 1570. Engari i puta mai te matenga o Perceval i tētahi wā rerekē. Nā ngā nekehanga o te hangarau utanga me te hangarau kiripaka i ngā rau tau 18 me te 19 i ngāwari kē atu ai te mahi kōhuru. Kāore i rite ki ngā rā i tata ai ngā kaiwhakatupu o Roma ki a Hiha ki te wero i a ia ki te mate, ko te taenga mai o te raiwhara, ko te tikanga kua kore ngā kaitiaki pono e whakaū i te haumarutanga. Ā, ka taea e Bellingham, pēnei i a Princip rāua ko te kōhuru a John F Kennedy, a Lee Harvey Oswald, te kitea he whakaaturanga pōuri o te pakeke o te tangata. "He tino kaha te āhua o Bellingham, he tino hiahia a ia," te kī a te kaituhituhi hītori o Andro Linklater, te kaituhi o Why Spencer Perceval Had to Die. "I hiahia a ia ki te manaakitanga. He hē a ia, engari he arorau. "He momo tuakiri tino hōu - tērā tirohanga mātao, mātao, pākaha ki te ao." I tēnei uaua, ka taea te tiro i te pikinga o te tangata pūtā takitahi - i whakaaetia e te anarchist o te rau tau 19, te akoranga pūtohu o te "whakatūpato o te mahi" - hei tautohetohe kōaro ki te tupunga pūmau o te kāwanatanga ā iwi puta noa i te Uru i taua wā kotahi. Rite tonu ki ngā tangata whenua noa iho e whiwhi ana i te mana kia rangona tō rātou reo e o rātau rangatira, waihoki ka whai wāhi te hunga mokemoke ki te ūkui i ngā mea tino kaha i roto i te iwi nā te tika o te raiwhara. I te mea he mea nui kia āhei ngā kaiārahi ki te haere ki waho i waenganui i o rātau pōti, na te pikinga o ngā patu tika, whakamate hoki i okioki ai aua kaiārahi anō ki te whakaaro. Ko ngā āhuatanga o Bellingham rāua ko Oswald - me ērā i whakakāwaitia hei "kaipatu spree" pēnei i a Anders Behring Breivik - he painga takahanga matua i ngā wā katoa. Ahakoa ka taea te hū atu ki ngā whatunga pūtohu me ngā whakatupuranga, kāore e taea e te tangata pūtā mokemoke - ā, ka anga atu ngā mana ki te uaua o te kite i a rātou i te wāhi tuatahi. E ai ki te kaitirotiro pūtohu o te Peka Motuhake o Mua, a David Lowe, ināianei he tohunga ki te hara me te haumarutanga i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te "Ki te kore koe e whai mōhiohio, ko te huarahi anake e taea ai e koe te rutu i te tuma ko te matatū auau," ka whakatūpato a ia. "It's all about trying to spot this individual - keeping a watching brief for that one person who isn't behaving like everyone else is. I te mutunga, e hiahiatia ana e koe he huānga waimarie." Nā reira, kua noho whānui tonu te wehi ka taea e aua tangata te tuki i ngā wā katoa. I te wā o te kōhuru takitahi, ko te kaha o ngā kaipōrangapū ki te tauwhiti ki te iwi whānui e tika ana kia whakaaturia e rātau e ngā whakaritenga o te haumarutanga me te matatū - he tītohunga kāore i hoatu he kīanga pai ake i te Popemobile, te waka ārai matā i hoahoatia hei whakangungu i te Pāpā i te whakaeke. Ko tēnei āhuatanga o te āwangawanga tētahi e kitea ana e te ahurea kaingākau ki te pokanoa. Ko te pikitia hākari a Wolfgang Petersen i roto i te Raina Ahi - nāna i whakatū te kaipupuhi haurangi a John Malkovich ki te māngai o te Ratonga Huna a Clint Eastwood - i whakaatu i te hou o te mate o te kōhurutanga o Kennedy i te 30 tau. He nui ake te mau tonu ko te pukapuka a Frederick Forsyth i te tau 1971 The Day of the Jackal, i muri iho ka huri hei pikitia e whakaatu ana i a Edward Fox hei Ingarihi huna i utua ki te patu i te perehitini Wīwī. I a ia e tuhi ana i te pukapuka, ka whakaaro a Forsyth ka kitea e ngā kaipānui tana toa kaitirotiro. Engari i kitea kētia e te kaituhi, he nui kē atu te ātaahua o te kōhuru hei momo ārai Hemi Bond. "I whakaaro ahau kua hangaia e au he toa nui, kino i roto i te Jackal," te kī a Forsyth. "Engari i te putanga mai, kāore tētahi tangata i hiahia ki te mōhio mō te pirihimana pai, ngohengohe, ngāwari. Ko ngā tāngata katoa e mātakitaki ana i te pikitia e pū ana mō Edward Fox." He iti iho te ātaahua o te rangirua o ngā pūtā pēnei i a Oswald, i te kaipatu rānei a Robert Kennedy, o Sirhan Sirhan. He uaua ki te whakapono i taea e ēnei tāngata whakamīharo te whakatutuki i te kōhurutanga o tētahi tangata e tiakina tata ana. Ehara i te mea he tino mau tonu ngā kaupapa whakatupu mō ngā kōhurutanga i runga i ngā ngaru ohorere i whakaekea e rātau. "Ka kite koe i te ātaahua o tētahi whakamāramatanga pai ake i ētahi pūāhua aroha pēnei i a Oswald i patua ai te perehitini," te kī a Tā Arama Roberts, te ahorangi mātāmua o te whanaungatanga ao whānui i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, me te perehitini o te Whare Wānanga o Ingarangi. "He uaua ki te whakaae he pōauau te hītori." Mēnā he whakamarietanga, e whakapono ana a Roberts, ko te kore angitu kei a rātau ki te whakatutuki i a rātau whāinga i kīa. "E kī ana ahau kāore anō rātau kia tutuki i a rātau whāinga," tana kī. "I tīmataria e Gavrilo Princip te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, engari kāore ia i whakaaro; I hiahia noa ia ki te patu i tētahi archduke. Kaore a ia i whakapono ki te whakamatenga nui i takea mai i tana mahi." Ka tāpiri mai a ia, ko ngā pūtā takitahi, ka āhei ki te tiritiri i te whakapono hē e takoto ana ngā mate o te iwi ki te ahua anake i runga. "Ko te tikanga, ko te whakatoi, ahakoa he aha te āhua o te kāwanatanga kei a koe, he whānui ake te pāpori. Ko te ariā mā tētahi mahi horoi o te tutu e panoni i te whenua tōrangapū kua whakakāhoretia i ētahi wā nā te mea he hua hākinakina." Ehara i te whakaotinga i a Bellingham, i kawea i te wiki i muri i te kōhurutanga o Perceval, i noho roa ki te tātuhi. Heoi anō, kai te rongo tonu nga rūrū o te patunga.

title: E karanga ana a Tā Rārangi Branson ki ngā pēke kia nui ake te whakatārewa
summary: Kua karangatia e Tā Rārangi Branson ētahi atu whakatārewa mai i ngā pēke hei āwhina i te rangatahi i te mākete mahi.
text: I kōrero te pāhi Puhi ki a Newsbeat i te kitenga o ngā whika kore mahi hou rawa, neke atu i te kotahi miriona 16 ki te 24 tau te pakeke e kore mahi tonu ana. Kei te whakarewaina e ia tētahi kaupapa e whai wāhi ana ki te rangatahi kore mahi ki te whakatakoto i tētahi hākari i te Royal Opera House. I hoatu e ia ki a Newsbeat ana aki mō te tīmata i tētahi umanga, ā, ka kī me noho pai tonu te hunga e raruraru ana. E kī ana a Tā Richard, nāna te rangatiratanga o Virgin i tīmata i te tau 1970, ā, he tini ngā umanga, he mea nui kia whai wāhi te rangatahi ki te whakamātau i ō rātou whakaaro. "He maha ngā kaupapa whakamīharo mai i te rangatahi, ā, ko ēnei whakaaro hou me ngā kaimahi hou e waihanga ana i ngā mahi o te wā heke." "Kaore he pātai me nui ake te whakatārewa mai i ngā pēke." E whakaaro ana a Tā Richard me nui ake te hiahia o ngā pēke ki te tuku moni iti kia whiwhi whakaaro ai i te whenua. "I te tuatahi ka kitea e taku whaea he meka, ka hoatu ki tētahi teihana pirihimana, ā, i muri i te ono marama ka whakahokia e rātau te whakakai ki a ia, ā, e £200 te wāriu. " Ko te tikanga, i whānau a Puhi i runga i taua moni tārewa £200. Ka taea te tīmata i ngā rangatiratanga tino nui i runga i te moni iti rawa." 'Kimihia he kōaro' Ko ngā whika hou e whakaatu ana i te kore mahi i waenganui i te 16 ki te 24 tau te pakeke i hinga i te 17,000 i te hauwhā hou ki te 1,02 miriona. Engari ko te tikanga tonu o tēnā kotahi i roto i te rima rangatahi kua kore mahi. E kī ana te kaipakihi e ngana ana a ia ki te tiki i ngā kaipōrangapū ki te whakamātau i ngā huarahi whakatārewa hou. "[Kaua] hoatu noa iho i ngā moni ākonga kia haere ki te whare wānanga," te kī a te rangatira o Virgin. "But if someone has a great idea might turn that into an entrepreneurial loan so they can get their business going. " I waiho e te kāwanatanga te £10m hei tīmata i tēnā - ā, he hipanga tēnā ki te ahunga tika." Ko tana tohutohu mō ngā kaimahi rangatahi kia māia me te whakarite kia whakapai ake tō rātou whakaaro i te oranga o tētahi tangata. "Koia tēnā e pā ana ki te umanga," te kī a te 61 tau. For those out of work, Sir Richard says a positive mental attitude is vital. "Me ngana ki te mahi i te tino pai," tana kī. "Haere ki waho, kia ora, kia ora. " Me ngana noa ki te kimi i tētahi kōaro ki ia hē. "Mēnā kei te tika koe, kei te hauora koe, tērā pea ka pai ake koe, ā, ka whiwhi mahi tonu koe." Ahakoa te UK e taka ana ki te whakahekenga, e kī ana a Tā Richard kua mōhiotia e ia ngā wā uaua ake, ā, e whakaaro ana he wā anō mō ngā tāngata atamai. "Kua kite ahau i te maha o ngā whakahekenga, engari i te wā o te whakahekenga he wāhi - he iti iho te utu o ngā mea katoa, ā, ka taea e koe te tīmata i tō pakihi mai i tētahi pūtake utu iti iho me te mahi pai."

title: Avelina Lésper: Ka whakapōhēhē te kaiwhakawāwā mo te pakaru i ngā mahi toi i te ataahua o Mehiko
summary: Kua whakapārewa tētahi kaiwhakawāwā toi mō te whakangaromanga pokanoa i tētahi utanga i tētahi whakaaturanga toi tūturu i Mehiko.
text: I whakatakotoria e Avelina Lésper tētahi ipu inu wātea ki te taha o te mahi hei whakaatu i tōna whakahē i te wā i pakaru. Ko te tāutanga, nā te kaiwaiata Mehikihi a Gabriel Rico, i whakaaturia i te Taiwhanga OMR i Mexico City. Ko te mahi he pihanga karaehe nui me ngā ahanoa matapōkere pēnei i te whutupōro me te huruhuru i roto, ā, e $20,000 (£15,400) te wāriu. Kua aroha mai a Ms Lésper mo te "mahi tangihanga" i te ataahua o Zona Maco i te Hātarei, i tohe ai a ia "kāore i te tika". "Pēnei i rongo te mahi i taku kōrero, ā, kua rongo i taku whakaaro", tana kī i roto i tētahi tauākī ataata i tiria e Milenio, he nūpepa Mehikihi e whakaputa ana i ana tīwae. I kī atu te rehetoi a Gabriel Rico ki a BBC News, "E pouri ana ahau nā te mea he tino whakahāwea tēnei ki ngā wāhanga. He āhuatanga whakapōhēhē tēnei." I roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki Instagram, ka kī te taiwhanga he aituā te whakangaromanga o te mahi toi, engari i whakahē i te whanonga o Ms Lésper he kore ngaio. "I tata rawa mai a Lésper ki te mahi ki te whakatakoto i tētahi kēne soda ki runga, ā, ka tango pikitia hei whakahē, kāore i te pōhēhētia te whakangaromanga," te kī a te taiwhanga. "Kāore mātou i te mārama he pēhea te whakangaromanga a tētahi kaiwānanga toi ngaio i tētahi mahi a tētahi o ngā kaiwaiata tino mātauranga o tēnei wā." Engari ko te kaipeita Ekuatoa o Pavel Égüez, nāna i kite i taua mahi, i tiaki i a Ms Lésper, e kī ana kāore a ia i pā ki te mahi toi. Kāore i te mārama mēnā e hiahia ana te taiwhanga ki te tono i a Ms Lésper kia utu i ngā mahi toi pakaru. I kī te Taiwhanga OMR māna e whakatau "he aha te mea tika" i muri i ngā kōrero ki te rehetoi me te ataahua. E kī ana a Ms Lésper i tono ia ki te whakatika i te mahi toi, e huaina ana ko Nimble and Sinister Tricks (Kia tiakina me te kore heitara me te hāmate). I kī te Taiwhanga OMR i tino rapua te mahi a Tāne Rico e ngā kaikohi me ngā umanga. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe:

title: Trincomalee 'marino' i muri i te hōta
summary: Kua whakaritea e nga pirihimana i Sri Lanka he hōta ki te taone ki te rāwhiti o Trincomalee i muri i nga rangatū o nga pahūtanga pōma.
text: I kī atu te Tuarua Kaitirotiro Ahuwhānui (DIG) Rohan Abeywardhana ki a KOE Sandeshia, e 14 ngā tāngata tae atu ki ngā kaiāwhina haumarutanga e 2 i patua i roto i te pahūtanga pōma tata ki te mākete huawhenua. Kai te marino te taone i muri i te whakahau a nga pirihimana i te hōtae, ka tāpiri mai a ia. Neke atu i te 40 i whara i te pākarekareka, e ai ki nga pirihimana. Kua tahuna e te huihuinga riri nga toa me nga motokā i muri i te pahūtanga i Trincomalee Central Road. I kī atu te kaiwhakaatu kanohi o Saman Mallawaarachchi, te korero kōrero a Trincomalee Divaina, ki a bbcsinhala.com i kite ia i ētahi tinana maha e marara ana i te tiriti. Neke atu i te 10 ngā toa i te Huarahi Matua, ā, i puta mai he paowa i ngā toa tahuna, ka tāpiritia e Mallawarachchi. I kī a ia i te āwangawanga o te taone i te huihuinga o te huihuinga ki te rapu i o rātau whanaunga. Kāore anō kia hopukina e ngā pirihimana tētahi pōhēhētanga, te kī a DIG Abeywardhana. Kua tonoa e Perehitini Mahinda Kāripaka te Minita Whanaketanga Hinonga a Rohitha Bogollagama hei karere motuhake māna ki Trincoamlee. I mua ake, tokorua nga pirihimana i patua, a, tokorua i whara i roto i te pahūtanga tata ki te tauranga. Ko te whakaekenga whakakeke hou rawa tērā i whakapaetia ki ngā ope haumarutanga mai i te Mane, e 20 ngā tāngata kua mate, ā, ka haere mai i mua i ngā kōrero e hāngai ana ki te tiaki i tētahi rangatahi. E whakakāhore ana te hunga whakakeke Taika Tamila i te whakauru ki nga whakaekenga. Kua whakaritea kia tūtaki nga rōpū e rua ki Hiniwa mo nga kōrero i te 19 o Āperira.

title: I rere te rūpahu NASA i te kōaro 'ao hukarere'
summary: Ko te tātaritanga o ngā raraunga i kohia e te rūpahu Pānga Hōhonu a NASA i Comet Hartley e whakaatu ana i te ahanoa e karapoti ana i tētahi kapua nui o ngā korakora hukapapa pīngore.
text: Na Honatana AmosScience, ko te kaipūtaiao matua o te mahi ātea, ko Dr Maika A'Hearn, i kī atu ki ngā kaipānui he tino nui ētahi o ēnei "pōro hukarere". "E whakaaro ana mātou ko ngā mea nui rawa atu ko te rahi o te pōro korowha, ā, tērā pea tae atu ki te rahi o te poitūkohu," tana kī. I te 4 o Whiringa o Whiringa ā-Rangi, ka tata atu ki te 700km ki te ahanoa pīnati 1.5km te roa. I whakahokia e ngā taputapu roangaru me ngā taputapu pōkākā o te rūpahu te nui o ngā pikitia me ētahi atu raraunga e hoatu ai ki ngā kaipūtaiao ētahi atu mōhiotanga ki ngā āhuatanga rerekē me ngā whanonga o ētahi o ngā ahanoa tino whakamīharo o te Pūnaha Kōmaru. Ko te aromatawai o te kapua rawa e karapoti ana i a Hartley e tohu ana i te aroaro o te whānui o ngā rahi korakora. Mō ia korakora 25cm, tērā pea kotahi mano ngā korakora 2.5cm, e kī ana a Dr Pete Schultz, he kaipūtaiao mīhana mai i te Whare Wānanga o Brown. "Ki a au ko tēnei mea katoa he 'ao hukarere' kātahi anō ka rūrū noa iho koe," koia tana whakaahuatanga i te taiao huri noa i te karihi o te kōhuru. Engari i whakapuakina e te tīma ehara ēnei korakora i te hukapapa mārō i runga i te tikanga e mārama ana te nuinga o te iwi ki a rātou. Engari, he kohinga kākano iti. "E mōhio ana mātou kāore e taea te nui ake te hukapapa [kākano] i runga i tētahi taumata taketake i tētahi wāhi i waenganui i te kotahi me te 10 moroiti," te whakamārama a Dr Jessica Sunshine, te kaihautū matua tuarua o te mīhana. "Koia tēnā e pā ana ki te mātotoru o o mātau makawe. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, ehara ngā pōro hukarere i tā mātou i whakaaro ai - kāore mātou i te kite i ngā korakora rahi whatu. Ko tā mātou e kite nei he huihuinga hukapapa iti rawa. He rite kē atu rātau ki te pupuhi dandelion i te poro tio." Mai i te 4 o Whiringa Whiringa, kua whai wāhi te tīma pūtaiao ki te whakaaro i te āhua rerekē me ngā ngohe e puta ana i ngā pito tōraro o te kōaro i whakaritea ki tōna waenganui māeneene. E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga i te whenua papatahi i te wāhi e whakaeto ana te wai i raro i te mata, ā, ka puta atu i roto i te uhi puehu o te kōhuru. Ko ngā rohe kōauau, i tērā taha, kei reira ngā pūkaha waro taikura e tāhae ana i te hukapapa me ngā korakora puehu i roto i te kōhuru. Kei runga a Deep Impact i tētahi mahi whānui, kua whakaritea anōtia kia haere ki Hartley i muri i tana rere angitu o Comet Tempel 1 i te tau 2005. I taua mahi tuatahi, ka tukua e te waka ātea tētahi pānga i tūtuki ki te karihi o Tempel e whana ana i ngā mano tāhei otaota hukapapa. E whakaarotia ana he rauemi kei roto i ngā kōhua kāore i te rerekē mai i te whakatūnga o te Pūnaha Kōmaru. Ka whakaurua e rātou ngā pūhui whai taonga i te waro, te hauwai, te hāora me te hauota. Ko te mea whakamīharo koinei ngā huānga e hanga ana i ngā waikawa karihi me ngā waikawa amino, ngā mea tino nui mō te ora e mōhio ana tātau; ā, tērā ētahi e whakapono ana ko ngā pānga kōaro i ngā tau tōmua o te Pūnaha Kōmaru ka taea te whakatō i te Ao ki ngā mātāmua matū tika mō te koiora. I tua atu i a Hartley me Tempel 1, kua rere tata atu te waka ātea ki ētahi atu kōhua e rima - Borrelly, Wild 2, Halley, Giacobini-Zinner, me Grigg-Skjellerup (kāore ngā mahi ki a Giacobini-Zinner me Grigg-Skjellerup i whakahoki atahanga). He nui ake te katoa i a Hartley. Tata ki te 23 miriona km mai i Te Ao te tūtakitanga o Deep Impact ki Comet Hartley. Ināianei kei te tere te hoki atu o te tokorua i a rāua anō, ahakoa kei te whakaahua tonu te rūpahu i a Hartley. Ka haere tonu te whakahau mātakitaki tae noa ki te mutunga o tērā wiki, i taua wā ka whiwhi a Deep Impact i ētahi pikitia 122,000 katoa. "E tohu ana tērā mō te 22GB o ngā raraunga, nā reira ka homai e tēnei he tirohanga whānui o tēnei kōaro - neke atu i te mea i taea e mātou te hoki mai i tētahi atu kōaro," te kī a Tim Larson, te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa o te mīhana. "I muri i tērā, ka mahia e mātou tētahi tōkarikari whakamutunga i runga i ngā taputapu, ā, ka [purua] te waka ātea ki tētahi aratau mārire i Tīma e tatari ana ki ētahi atu tohutohu." Kua tonoa e NASA he whakaaro mō te aha ki te Pānga Hōhonu ā muri ake. Ahakoa tērā, kāore e whakaurua tētahi atu rere kōaro. Ināianei he iti rawa te hinu i runga i te papa hei whakatika nui ki tōna arawhiti. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk

title: Sellafield waste firm to set up surplus food charity
summary: Kei te whakatūria tētahi aroha hou hei āwhina ki te rutu i te rawakore kai i Cumbria hei wāhanga o te mahi tukurua i te pae karihi o Sellafield.
text: Kua toa a Te Recycling Lives i tētahi kirimana £150,000 hei tukatuka i te konganuku parakore mai i te pae o Sellafield, e whakakorea ana. Ka kitea e te take he maha nga pokapū i whakatūria hei tohatoha i ngā kai nui ka tukuna ki te peke. Ka whakahaeretia rātou mō te aroha kai ā-motu o Fareshare. 'Uara pāpori' i kī a Martin Chown, te kaiwhakahaere o te mekameka whakarato o Sellafield Ltd: "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakarite kia whiwhi ōhua mōrahi o ō mātou hapori paetata i ngā moni e whakapaua ana e mātau i Sellafield. " Ka mahia tēnei e mātou mā te whakahau kia mahi tahi ngā kamupene toa ki a mātau ki te tautoko i te tupu paetata." Ka whakatūria e Recycling Lives tōna pānga tukatuka ki Workington, engari ka whakatū i ngā pokapū tuari kai i ngā tauwāhi maha puta noa i Cumbria. I kī te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere a William Fletcher: "E koa ana mātou ki te whakamahi i tēnei kirimana hei waihanga uara pāpori puta noa i Cumbria. " Ka nekehia e te ratonga whakaraupapatanga kai ngā kai nui mai i ngā kaiwhakanao, ngā kaiwhakarato me ngā hokomaha, ka haere ki te putunga whenua, ā, ka tohatoha ki ngā aroha me ngā rōpū hapori i ngā wāhi tango. "Kei te mahi tahi mātou me ngā mana ā-rohe ki te tāutu i ngā wāhi kohinga puta noa i Allerdale me Copeland."

title: Rebecca Adlington in Glasgow 2014 Commonwealth Games role
summary: Kua whakaaturia mai te kaikauhoe o Ōrirangi a Rebecca Adlington hei karere whai mana mō ngā Tākaro Kotahitanga o Glasgow 2014.
text: Ka hono atu a ia ki te Orangirangi tino angitu o Ingarangi, a Tā Pirihi Hoy, nāna hoki i mahi te tūranga. Ka kite te tūnga i ngā karere e mahi tahi ana me ngā kaiwhakahaere kēmu, ā, ka puta i roto i ngā whakahau whakatairanga kōtaha tiketike. I toa a Adlington i ngā mētara parahi e rua i te Omirangi o te tau 2012. I toa hoki a ia i ngā mētara e rua i te Omirangi o Beijing. Ka kī a ia: "He hōnore te whakauru hei karere mō ngā Tākaro Kotahitanga o Glasgow 2014, ā, kei te hari ahau ki te whakapuaki i taku tautoko ki te takahanga tākaro nui e haere mai ana ki te UK. " Mā te angitu nui o Rāwāhi 2012 anake e whakanui ake te ngahau me te hiahia ki ngā Kēmu, ā, kāore e taea e au te tatari kia noho hei wāhanga o te haerenga ki te 2014." Ka āwhina te kaikauhoe, mai i Mansfield, Nottinghamshire, ki te whakarewa i te mascot whai mana i tētahi takahanga i Glasgow i te Tāite. I kī a Ariki Smith, te kaiwhakahaere o Glasgow 2014: "Ko Rebecca te kaikauhoe tino nui rawa atu o Ingarangi, ā, he tuakiri rongonui a ia puta noa i te tūāwhiotanga tākaro. " I te taha o Tā Pirihi, ka whakatokona e Rebecca ngā Kēmu me te āwhina ki te whakarite i te nuinga o ngā tāngata e taea ana te mahi i te nuinga o te takahanga hākinakina me te ahurea nui rawa atu o Pākehā."

title: E piki ana te 700% o ngā mahi truancy i Wales i roto i te rima tau
summary: Kua piki ake te 700% i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa ake ngā whakawāteatanga o ngā mātua i Wales mō te truancy a ā rātou tamariki.
text: Ko ngā kēhi kōti mo te korenga e tuku i tētahi tamaiti ki te kura i tākirirangi mai i te 60 i te 2007 ki te tata ki te 500 i te 2011. I kī te kaunihera o Merthyr Tydfil he angitu ake te tono herenga i te whaina i ngā mātua. Engari i kī te Minita Mātauranga a Leighton Andrews ko te whaina tētahi āhuatanga o te kaupapa here ki te rutu i te truancy. I muri i ngā tirohanga me ngā āpiha kaunihera o Merthyr, i whakaurua tana tari mātauranga ki ngā tikanga motuhake i tērā marama. I kī te kaunihera e tono ana i ngā kaiwhakawā kia utaina ngā rerenga whiu herenga - e hiahia ana kia mahi tahi ngā mātua ki te mana, kia anga atu rānei ki te hoki ki te kōti me te wā herehere - kua nui ake te angitu i te tohatoha whaina. Kua oti i te kāwanatanga o Welsh tētahi whakaaro mo te whaina e £120 mō ngā mātua e kore e tuku i a rātau tamariki ki te kura. Neke atu i te 30,000 ngā whaina wāhi i tukuna e ngā kaunihera i Ingarangi i tērā tau, engari kāore anō kia pai ake ngā pāpātanga o te kaitatū. I kī atu tētahi matua, a Gavin Vanden Berg, ki te hōtaka kāore a ia i whakaaro ka mahi te whaina. Ko tana tama 15 tau ko Brandon he haere tōtika ki te kura. "If a parent is really trying their best to get their child to school, other than physically taking them to the school themselves, what else can they do?" he said. I kī a Prof Ken Reid, he kaitohutohu ki te kāwanatanga o Welsh i runga i tana kaupapa here whanonga, ko te whaina i ngā mātua te huarahi hē. "Ko ngā whakaaturanga katoa mai i te rangahau i Ingarangi, kāore tonu rātou i te mahi. Ko ngā whiu ā-ture katoa i a mātau i roto i ngā tau e 50, 60 rānei i runga i te truancy kāore anō kia nui te rerekētanga, ā, kāore anō kia mahi." Behaviour and attendance Mike Cotton, a former school governor and father of four from Morriston, Swansea, said truancy was a "major problem, even with quite intelligent children", and the 700% increase was "absolutely amazing". I tāpiritia e ia he kawenga whānui tā ngā mātua mō ā rātou tamariki, ā, "kei reira ngā kaiako ki te whakaako, ehara i te kaimahi pāpori". Education Minister Leighton Andrews told Week In Week Out that penalty notices were just one aspect of a national policy to tackle truancy in Wales, based on recommendations made by Prof Reid. Engari e whā tau i muri i te tuhituhi i tana rīpoata, ka pouri a Prof Reid ki te kauneketanga. "Kāore anō kia whai rautaki ā-motu i runga i te whanonga me te haere mai ahakoa ngā whakaūtanga i hoatu ki a mātau ka pā mai e whā tau ki mua." Wiki I Te Wiki - Kei te Whakawāteatia ngā Mātua i runga i te BBC One Wales, i te 22:35 GMT, Tūrei 5 o Poutāpeta.

title: Ko te whakamatautau drone Amazon i runga i te Fleam Dyke 'whakamataku'
summary: Ko ngā mahere hei whakamātau i ngā rīpene tuku hou a Amazon i runga ake i tētahi huarahi Rōmana "hira ā-motu" kua whakaingoatia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau.
text: Kua pūrongotia ngā kitenga o te rererangi kāore i te rangi i runga i te Huarahi Rōmana me te huarahi o Fleam Dyke, e tata ana ki Kemipiri. Kāore a Amazon i whakaae ki te whakaū, ki te whakakāhore rānei mēnā kei te whakamahi i te whenua. Engari e mōhio ana te AO kua tukuna kētia te whakaaetanga a te UK Civil Aviation Authority (CAA). Tērā ētahi kitenga mai i Cambridge Aero Club me ngā kaiwhakamahi whenua i taua rohe. 'Turituri taiwhenua' i kī a Julia Napier, hēkeretari o Ngā Hoa o te Huarahi Rōmana me Fleam Dyke i "tino wehi" a ia. "He tino mīharo te ariā ki te kawe mai i ngā rīpene ki waenganui o te taiwhenua, ka hinga ngā kupu a te tangata," tana kī. "He pae pūtaiao motuhake tēnei. He mea nui hoki hei whakamaharatanga hītori o Roma. "E haere ana te tangata ki konei ki te kimi i te rangimārie, te ariā ka taea e ngā drones te whiu i runga i o rātau mahunga, te tuku mōkihi ki ngā tāngata kāore e taea te tatari neke atu i te rua rā, me whiwhi rātou i te mea hou... ko te tikanga kia nui ake te turituri i te taiwhenua." Ko te Huarahi Rōmana me Fleam Dyke e noho ana i waenganui i te A11 me Balsham. E mōhiotia ana ka whakamātauria nga rīpene i runga ake i te pae tae noa ki Whiringahora. Kātahi anō ka tae mai te tukunga tere o te haumarutanga o te rīpene i raro i te rama. E rua ngā hapa tata i tēnei tau i waenganui i ngā rīpene me ngā rererangi i te Taunga Rererangi o Stansted. I kī tētahi kōrero mō Amazon, e whakarite ana ki te tuku i te pūnaha tuku 30 meneti hōu i raro i te kara Prime Air, kāore i taea e rātou te whakaū i te whakamātautau i te pae mō ngā take "arumoni" - engari i tohe ko te haumarutanga te "tino manakē" o te kamupene.

title: Ngā whakahē a Hong Kong: Ngā inoi mai i te pātū whakahē
summary: E hia rau ngā tuhipoka poutāpeta kua whakapiria ki ngā pakitara e tata ana ki te tari matua o te kāwanatanga o Hong Kong. He aha ta rātau kōrero?
text: 689 tēnā hīpae whakararo "Hong Kong, haere ki reira!" ka tīmata tēnei karere. Ka haere tonu: "689 tēnā hīpae whakararo" e pā ana ki te rangatira nui o Hong Kong, o CY Leung mā tōna ingoa kāinga, e whakaatu ana i te maha o ngā pōti komiti i pōtitia e ia. Ko te āhua o te tuhipoka e pāoro ana i te kāhua ātaahua o te whakahē i tēnei wā, ā, kua hainatia "E te hunga i whānau mai i muri i te 90" Ata hāmarara kua noho te hāmarara hei tētahi o ngā tohu o te whakahē i ngā tiriti, i te tuihono hoki. Ko nga hāmarara i mauria hei pare i nga kaiwhakatūtū i te wherikotanga o te rā, ka hurihia hei whakangungu rakau ki te korohū roimata. E pānui ana tēnei karere i a Hong Kong Haere mōna! Te mana whiriwhiri ā-ao Kua riri te hunga i runga i nga tiriti i te whakahaere a te kāwanatanga Hainamana e whakawhāiti ana i a wai e āhei ana ki te tū hei kaitono i te pōti mō te kaiārahi o Hong Kong, i te tau 2017. He tokomaha nga kaiwhakahaere he tauira i tīmata i tētahi whakapōhēhē karaehe i te mutunga o Mahuru. E pānui ana tēnei karere: "Te mana whiriwhiri tūturu o te ao whānui. Haere te katoa! Ngā ākonga waenganui 1/10." He whakahē hūmārie i tēnei wā, he rangimarie nga whakaaturanga. Heoi anō, kua tātuhia e ngā kaiwaiata he whakarara ki te whakahē a te Tapawhā o Tiananmen i te tau 1989 i huri hei whawhaitanga i te wā i whakatuwheratia ai e nga hōia Hainamana he ahi. Wehi Ko ētahi o ngā karere e whakaata ana i te wehi ki te tutu o te kāwanatanga, me te pāoro hoki i ngā whakahē o mua mai i te ao. I whakamahia tētahi kīanga ōrite ki tērā i raro nei i roto i ngā whakahē i waenganui i te patunga o ngā kaiwhakahaere whawhai anō o Vietnam i te whare wānanga o Te Kāwanatanga o Kent, i Ohaio, i te tau 1970. Ngā whakaahua nā Saira Asher

title: Ka hokona te pane kuini onge mō te utu pūkete i te hokonga o Hiniwa
summary: Kua tīkina e tētahi o ngā pane kuini tino ātaahua o te ao he utu pūkete i te hokonga i Huiterangi, ka kī atu ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te HAU.
text: Ko te tikanga o te Huitene Treskilling Yellow e pupuri ana i tōna taitara hei pane kuini utu nui rawa o te ao i muri i te huringa ringa i Hiniwa. Heoi anō, kua kōwhiria e nga kaihoko kia kaua e whakaatu i te nui o ta rātau utu. Ko te pane kuini - he putanga o tētahi pane kuini e toru hereni o te tau 1855 e tika ana kia tāngia kākāriki - e whakapono ana ko te whakamutunga o tōna momo. I kī te kaihoko a David Feldman ko te pane kuini te ahanoa tino utu nui o te ao. I whakaarohia e te whare hoko ka hokona mō te 1.5 miriona ki te 2 miriona hōro (£1.3m - £1.7m). I kī a Tēnā Feldman he "rekareka" te kaihoko. I oatitia ngā kaihoko katoa i te hokonga o te Hātarei kia huna. 'Haki i mua' I hokona tikatia te pane kuini i Zurich i te tau 1996 mō te 2,88 miriona francs Swiss (tata ki te $2,3 miriona i taua wā), he pūkete hou o te ao mō tētahi pane kuini kotahi. Ko te 1856 British Guiana 1 cent Magenta e whakaarotia ana ko te tino rongonui o ngā pane kuini, engari kua puritia ki roto i tētahi taumaha mai i te tau 1980 i muri i te hokonga a John du Pont. I tēnei wā kei te mahi te uri o te umanga du Pont i tētahi whiu kōhuru. Ko te Kōwhai Treskilling "tētahi o ngā pane kuini tino rongonui i te ao," e ai ki a Robert Odenweller, he tohunga pane kuini o Amerika. E ai ki te whare hokohoko, nāna i nama ko "Mona Lisa o te ao philatelic", he "haki o mua" te pane kuini, ā, kei roto i ngā ringa o te tini o ngā whika rerekē, tae atu ki tētahi Kīngi Romaniana. E kīia ana i kitea i te tau 1885 e tētahi tamaiti kura 14 tau mai i Stockholm i kitea i a ia e tirotiro ana i ngā tuhinga a tōna whānau.

title: Free flu vaccines for care staff and more younger children
summary: Free flu vaccines are now being offered to all primary school pupils and two and three-year-old children in Wales.
text: Nā Owain ClarkeBBC Wales korero hauora Ko te whakahau rewharewha hōtoke hou, i whakarewaina i Torfaen ā muri ake, ka kite hoki i ngā kaimahi i ngā kāinga noho me ngā kāinga tiaki e tuku ana i ngā kano ārai mate koreutu. I tērā tau i kitea ai te nuinga o ngā kēhi mai i te taiepa rewharewha 2009, neke atu i te 16,600 i kitea e ngā GP. I kī te Hauora Tūmatanui o Wales ko te rongoā te "huarahi pai rawa atu hei pare i a koe anō". Neke atu i te 820,000 ngā kano ārai mate rewharewha i hoatu e NHS Wales i tērā tau. Ko ngā whanaketanga i tēnei tau ko: I tērā tau i Weera, tata ki te 48% te tangohanga o te kano ārai mate rewharewha i roto i ngā rōpū mōrearea i raro i te 65%. Ko te kano ārai mate mō te hunga 65 neke atu rānei ko te 68.8% i tērā tau - te teitei rawa atu i runga i te pūkete engari kei raro tonu i te ūnga. I whakarewaina e te Hēkeretari Hauora a Vaughan Gething AM te whakahau i tana whiwhinga i tana werohanga i tētahi rongoā rongoā i Cwmbran. I kī a Tēnā Gething mō ngā mokatere tango "ka taea e mātou te mahi pai ake i ngā wā katoa". "Ehara tēnā i te mea e māharahara ana ahau ki ngā ūnga kāwanatanga nā te mea ka pai ake tā mātou tiaki i tō mātou iwi whānui mēnā ka nui ake ngā tāngata ki te tango i te jab," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a ia e pā ana ki te huri i te ahurea, kia tino nui ai te rewharewha. "He ngāwari noa iho te hora o te rewharewha, i waenganui i ngā tamariki," tana kī. "Mā te whakaroa i te hōtaka kia whakauru i ngā tamariki pakeke kura tuatahi katoa i tēnei tau e tūmanako ana mātou ki te pare i a rātou i te hopu rewharewha, me te ārai hoki i a rātou ki te hora ki ētahi atu i roto i tō rātou whānau me te hapori e mōrearea ana." I tērā hōtoke te tino kino mo te iwa tau, me te nui o te mate, ā, e 2,680 ngā tūroro rewharewha i haere ki te hōhipera - 192 i roto i te tiaki nui. HE PĒHEA TE MAHI O TE KANO ĀRAI MATE? I kī a Dr Richard Roberts, te upoko o te hōtaka mate ārai ārai i Public Health Wales: "Ko te werohanga ki te rewharewha te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te ārai. Kāore ā mātou whirinoa, ka taea e koe te ngana ki te whakaiti i te horahanga, ka taea e koe te hoatu ārai mate ina pāngia tētahi, engari ko te huarahi pai rawa atu ko te werohanga." I tāpiritia e ia ko ngā tāngata whai āhuatanga pūmau, pūnaha ārai rānei, neke atu i te 10 ngā wā e pā ana ki ngā putanga tino kino mai i te rewharewha "ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i ētahi atu tāngata e parea ana i tēnei tau". Ahakoa ko te nuinga o ngā kano ārai mate rewharewha NHS e hoatu ana i roto i ngā pokanga GP, e wātea ana hoki mō ngā pakeke i roto i ngā rongoā hapori maha puta noa i Wales.

title: Ko te pūtau tātā pararaiha o Neil Burton 'awhi i te tūmanako'
summary: Ko tētahi tangata e rua ōna āhuatanga āhua kore nei i pararaiha ai ia, e tūmanako ana ka taea e te rongoā tohunga ki rāwāhi te whakaora i ngā ahuareka ngāwari o te oranga whānau.
text: E whā tau ki muri ka mate a Neil Burton, e 32, he pāpā tokotoru mai i Northampton, i te myelitis whakawhitiwhiti me te mate o Guillain Barre, nā rāua tahi i pararaiha me te numbness i roto i ngā waewae. E whakapono ana a ia ka taea e ia te awhi anō i ana tamariki. Heoi anō, kei te wāhanga whakamātautau anake te rongoā i te UK nā reira me haere ia ki a Iharaira mehemea e hiahia ana ia ki te whiwhi i tana hiahia. Kei te whakarite a ia me tōna whānau i ngā takahanga hei kohi i te £25,000 e hiahiatia ana. Ka pā te myelitis whakawhitiwhiti ki te taura tuaiwi, ā, ka pā ki te pararaiha me te ngoikore i roto i ngā waewae, ā, ka taea e ētahi te whakaora katoa, tētahi wāhanga rānei i roto i te rua tau. Ko te Guillain Barre syndrome he mate o te pūnaha io e pā ana ki te ngoikoretanga me te ngoikoretanga, me te pararaiha. Nā ngā mate e rua i tino whakarerekē te oranga o Tēnā Pēne. "I tino hohe ahau me aku tamariki i mua i te mate," tana kī. "Nā te mea kua pararaiha ngā wāhi nui o tōku tinana, i roto i ōku ringa, kua aukati i a au ki te mahi i ngā mea pūnoa katoa, pēnei i te piki ake i aku tamariki me te taraiwa ki te mahi." Ahakoa kei roto i tētahi tūru tūru me te whakawhirinaki ki tētahi ventilator mō tōna hā, kei te mahi tonu a Tēnā Burton i tētahi kamupene IT i Kettering i mua i tōna mate, ko te rerekētanga anake ināianei he rorohiko whakahaere reo tāna. I kī tōna tuakana ko John Burton he "whakaaweawe". I kī a ia mehemea kāore e taea te haere tonu te manaakitanga o tōna tuakana, ka haere katoa ngā moni i kohia ki tētahi aroha myelitis whakawhiti. I kī a Yvonne Kolesar, te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū myelitis transverse he iti rawa te rangahau e mahia ana i te UK mō te mate, i pāngia i waenganui i te toru me te rima tāngata i roto i te miriona. "E tino hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i ngā rongoā rangatahi, pūkoro whakarunga e whakauru ana ki tētahi hōtaka rangahau," tana kī. E tohunga ana a Prof Robin Franklin mai i te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge ki te rangahau pūtau tātā, ā, e whakapono ana he torutoru noa iho ngā rongoā pūtau tātā kua kitea he pai ki te rongoā. "Kāore anō kia tino māia te whakaaturanga e āwhina ana ngā pūtau tātā ki ēnei herenga," tana kī. Engari kāore te kore whakaaturanga i te aukati i a Tēnā Pēnā i tana rapu rongoā. "Ko taku tūmanako kia mahi ngā pūtau tātā i te mahi tapi i runga i taku taura tuaiwi, ā, kia taea ai e au te neke aku ringa, nā te mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te awhi i aku tamariki neke atu i ngā mea katoa o te ao," tana kī.

title: Ka tukua e Suzanne Evans te tūmanako ki te tono ārahi UKIP
summary: E kī ana te manukura tuarua o UKIP, a Suzanne Evans, kua tukua e ia te tūmanako kia noho ko ia te kaiārahi panuku o te rōpū - engari e tohe ana e kore a ia e "tuku" ki te UKIP.
text: I kī a Ms Evans, e whakatārewatia ana i tēnei wā i te UKIP, ka "tino pīrangi" a ia ki te oma, engari he "torutoru tāngata i runga" i whakarite kāore e taea e ia. Ko te āraitanga e ono marama a Ms Evans mo te whakararuraru i te rōpū - ko te tikanga kua ākiritia e ia - ko te tikanga kāore e taea e ia te tū. I kī a ia ka whakahokia e ia te kaikaunihera o Lisa Duffy hei whakakapi i a Nigel Farage. I kī a Ms Evans me "whakawātea i tōna atahanga mārō matau, ā, ka tautuhi mārō i a ia ki te whenua pūtahi" me te whakahaere hoki i ētahi "whakahōu ā-roto". Kua ākina te whakataetae ārahi e te whakatau a Tēnā Wairangi kia tū i muri i te pōti a UK ki te wehe i te Uniana o Ūropi, e kī ana "kua tutuki tōna hiahia tōrangapū". I roto i tētahi kōrero i Westminster, ka kī a Ms Evans, i karangatia hei kaiwhakakapi pea: "E tino hiahia ana ahau ki te oma i taua pōtitanga. " Ka aroha, he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata i runga i te UKIP, ahakoa he aha ngā take whaiaro o ā rātou ake, kua tino mōhio kāore e taea e au." 'Wehenga mā' I kī a ia kua "tūkinotia" te pukapuka ture a te rōpū hei whakatārewa i a ia kia kore ai ia e tohu i te rōpū i te whakataetae whakaminenga o Me me te whakataetae ārahi e tū mai nei. I muri i tētahi hui whakatinanatanga ā-roto, i kitea e ia kua whakahē tūmatanui a ia i tētahi hoa kaitono, ā, ka mau i a ia hei kaikōrero rōpū, kāore he mana. I ngaro i a Ms Evans - nāna i whakakāhore tonu ngā kerēme ki a ia - i ngaro i tētahi tono a te Kōti Tiketike kia hurihia te whakataunga. I roto i te kōrero, ka kī a ia: "Me anga atu ahau ki te pono, kāore he tikanga e whakaaetia ai ahau ki te hoatu i tōku ingoa ki runga i te pepa pōti... Ināianei kua tukua e au te tūmanako kia noho ko te kaiārahi panuku o UKIP." I kī a Ms Evans kua pātai a ia mēnā ka noho tonu i roto i tētahi rōpū e "whakaaetia, ā, e whakahau ana i ngā whika matua kia pēnei te whanonga", engari i kī a ia nā te tautoko a ngā mema i "nui ake ai tana whakaaro kia kaua e tuku i runga i te UKIP". I kī hoki a ia, ki te kaiārahi tika, ko te "rangi te tepe mo te rōpū". Mā te tautoko i a Lisa Duffy, he kaikaunihera rohe mō Ramsey i Cambridgeshire, ka kī a Ms Evans ko ia "te wā tino pai" me "huri, kia tipu, kia tupu". I kī a ia e hiahiatia ana e UKIP "he wehenga mā mai i mua" kia rite ki tētahi rōpū tōrangapū i te "karapu whutupōro noa iho i te haereere". I raro i te ārahitanga a Ms Duffy, ka tautohe a ia, ka "nui ake te whakakotahitanga me te whakaaetanga" o te rōpū. I mua i tōna whakatārewatanga, i tuhituhi a Ms Evans i te whakahau pōti nui a UKIP 2015. I kapakina a ia i tana mahi kaupapahere i roto i te rōpū whawhai i muri i te "āheitanga" a Tēnā Wairangi i muri i te pōtitanga nui. Kua whakakāhore a Tēnā Wairangi i tana āraitanga nā te whakahē i a ia.

title: Ngā mōrearea o ngā whakawhitinga waka awa
summary: Na te matenga o tētahi tangata e 52 tau i roto i tētahi motokā i kōrurutia e te wai i tētahi waka awa i te rohe o Hēmihi/Berkshire kua miramiratia ngā mōrearea o aua whakawhitinga huarahi.
text: I te tau 2010 anake, 13 ngā tāngata i mate i muri i te tomokanga o ngā waka ki ngā wai o te whenua, nā ngā aituā, nā ngā take māori rānei. I te wāhi o te aituā i Compton Woods tata ki Newbury, i kī ai te waka "tino nui rawa i te waipuke" ā, i whakaaturia e tētahi rākau ine ngā taumata wai kia neke atu i te 4ft (1.2m) te teitei. Wai tere ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka kite koe i te kaha o te au. " Some locals we've spoke to say that this ford is particularly troublesome and that cars have been caught here and swept away in the past." I kī a Kevin Kikorangi, te upoko o te haumarutanga huarahi i RoSPA, ko ana tohutohu e pā ana ki ngā waka ko "ina mōrearea te waipuke kia āta aro atu ki ngā āhuatanga huarahi me te whakarongo ki ngā whakatūpato, tohutohu rānei i tukuna i te taha o te huarahi. " He ngāwari noa iho te whakahāwea i te kaha o te wai tere tere. "Ko te 10 meneti, ahakoa he raruraru, tērā pea ka karo i tētahi motokā pakaru, kino atu rānei. " Kia mōhio koe ka piki ohorere pea ngā awa, awa rānei, ā, kāore pea e haumaru te whakawhiti i tētahi wā poto noa iho." I raro noa iho i te 2,000 ngā whakawhitinga awa i te UK, e ai ki a Dr Lee Chapman mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te wetroads.co.uk Whare Wānanga o Te T I kī a ia i muri i te marangai o mua tata nei "e kore a ia e whakawhiti i tētahi waka i roto i tētahi waka". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He mōrearea te waka nā te mea ko te wāhi e whakawhiti ana te awa i te huarahi. " E kite ana te tangata i ngā waka he tapahi poto, kaore rātau e whakaaro ki ngā pānga. "Ka whiwhi koe i ētahi tāhaetanga o te motokā nā te mea kei te whakaraerae koe i a koe ki te wai rere." 'Whakamaumahara kino' I kī te kaiwhakahaere mōrearea waipuke o te Taiao o te Taiao o Te Taiao, a Īna Tomes, he "whakamaumahara kino he tino mōrearea te wai waipuke". I tāpiri mai a ia: "E tohutohu ana mātou i ngā tāngata kia noho atu i ngā awa pupuhi, engari i te wā e tohu ana ētahi atu marangai nui." Kua tāutatia e ētahi kaunihera paetata he kuwaha waipuke mā ngā waka, ā, ka katia ngā kēti mēnā he tino mākū te huarere. He tohu whakatūpato tā te waka i toromi ai te tangata i roto i tana waka, i Thornford Road, e kī ana: 'tirohia ngā tohu hōhonu i mua i te whakawhitinga' me ngā ine wai e rua. I kī a Tēnā Kikorangi kāore a RoSPA i te mōhio ki tētahi whakaaturanga" hei huatau he haumaru ake ngā waka kōpae i ngā waka me ngā tohu whakatūpato anake. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te hōhonutanga o te wai ka taea e koe te taraiwa haumaru i runga i te teitei o tō waka i te whenua, kei hea hoki ngā wae hiko. " Mēnā kei roto koe i tētahi waka, ā, kei te tere te piki haere o te wai huri noa i a koe, whakarērea wawetia te waka, engari kia tūpato mēnā kei te tere te neke o te wai, ā, kia tūpato ki ngā au kaha me ngā otaota - ka rawaka te wai hōhonu o te kuao kau ki te tukituki i a koe i ō waewae."

title: Ka peke te tono mō ngā ratonga waka tūroro NI i te 50% i roto i te rima tau
summary: Kua peke te tono mō ngā ratonga waka tūroro i NI i te 50% i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa.
text: Nā Clodagh RiceBBC News NI Ko te tikanga o te wā e tatari ana ki tētahi waka tūroro i muri i te waea i te 999 kua piki haere tonu i taua wā. Ka puta mai ngā raraunga mai i te ratonga waka tūroro i te wā e whakarewa ana te rōpū whakahaere i tētahi whakaaro mō ngā huringa kua marohitia. E kī ana ko ngā marohi, e utu ana ki te £30m, ko "te whanaketanga tino hākinakina" i roto i te whakarato waka tūroro i roto i te 20 tau. I te tau 2017/18 e 201,508 ngā urupare waka tūroro i tukuna i muri i ngā waea - tauruatia te tau e rima tau ki mua. Ko ngā mahi hōu kei roto i ngā tono ko te whakapai ake i te whakahaere waea kia tere ake ai te tāutu i ngā tūroro tino mate, tae atu ki te waihangatanga o ngā mahi neke atu i te 300, tae atu ki ngā kaiāwhina 125. Ka tuwhera te whakaaro ki te iwi whānui mō te 12 wiki, i mua i te tukunga atu ki te Tari Hauora. Engari ko ngā huringa o tēnei tauine e hiahiatia ana te whakaaetanga a te minita. Kaore he minita i Aiarangi ki te Raki nā te tiango o te tiritiri hiko i Hānuere 2017. Kua whakaritea kētia ngā huringa ōrite ki Ingarangi, Pākehā me Weera. I kī a Michael Bloomfield, te kaiwhakahaere matua o te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o Aiarangi ki te Raki (NIAS), ka tukuna he kaupapa ki te Tari Hauora. I kī a ia mā te tari e whakatau mēnā e hiahiatia ana te whakaaetanga a te minita, kāore rānei. "He huringa tino nui tēnei i te āhua o tā mātou tuku i ā mātou ratonga, ā, ko te tikanga he whakataunga tērā ka tangohia e te minita," te kī a Tēnā Bloomfield. Ngā ūnga Ko te ūnga NIAS o nāianei ko te 72.5% o ngā waea whakawehi ora i Aiarangi ki te Raki me urupare i roto i te waru meneti, engari ko te whika tūturu kei raro iho i taua ūnga, i te 45.2%. I raro i te pūnaha whakakāwai waea o nāianei, ko ngā waea "whero" tino nui, e whakawehi ana i te ora, e 30% o te katoa o ngā waea i mahia ki te ratonga waka tūroro. Engari e tohu ana ngā whakaaturanga he iti iho i te 7% o ēnei waea e whakawehi ana i te ora, ko te tikanga e 23% o ngā urupare e kore e pai te mahi. Ko te pūnaha hōu kua marohitia ko ngā kaiwhakahaere waea e pātai ana i ngā pātai rerekē hei tāutu i ngā takahanga whakamate ora i raro i te "kāwai 1" e tika ana kia 7% o ngā waea. Ko tētahi tauira o te āhua o te mahinga o ngā tūroro i tēnei wā, ko te wā e tukuna ana ngā waka tūroro maha ki tētahi mahi kāore e hiahiatia ana. Ko te tikanga o ngā tono ka taea e ngā kaimahi waka tūroro te mahi nui ake mō ngā tūroro me te kore hiahia ki te kawe i a rātou ki te hōhipera. Tata ki te haurua (49.5%) o aua waea i tangohia e te ratonga waka tūroro i waenganui i Whiringahora 2017 me Mati 2018 i whakamahia e ngā paramedics, ā, kāore i hiahiatia kia mauria ngā tūroro ki te hōhipera. Nā tērā i tiaki te ōrite o te 543 tekau mā rua haora neke o ngā kaimahi e mahi ana i A&E. "Ehara tēnei i te penapena moni, engari ko te tauaro," te kī a Tēnā Bloomfield. "E pā ana tēnei ki te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga me te kounga, ehara i te mea mo te whakatutuki i ngā ūnga."

title: E toru nga kōpikopiko e mate ana nā te tītī 'i takea mai i te mumura'
summary: E karanga ana tētahi wahine ki te whakakore i te mumura nā te mea i kī a ia i mate ai e toru o ana kararehe mōkai i te pō kotahi.
text: Nā Te Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero, i kī a Derby Abbie Sisson, e whakahaere ana i tētahi pokapū whakaora mai i tōna kāinga i Ripley, i Te Wānanga, i te matenga o Iareta, a Sarah rāua ko Shirley i te Paraire i muri i ngā tīmatanga. I kī a ia he tītī anō tana mōkai Chihuahua, engari i pai i muri i te rongoā. I kī a Ms Sisson: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakakore katoa [i ngā mumura]." 'Weird screech' Ko ngā budgies e toru i waenganui i te 34 o Ms Sisson i tōna pokapū whakaora kāinga e kiia nei ko One Flew Over the Budgie's Nest. I kī a ia i te tīmatanga o te mumura i te 18:30 GMT, ka tīmata ngā manu - he tokomaha o rātou e noho ana i roto i tētahi rererangi o waho - ka tīmata ki te "wehi me te rere haere". "Ko rātau te mumura tino kaha kua rongo ahau," tana kī. "I te tīmatanga o [rātou], ka tīmata a Jareth ki te tīmata, a, ka mate i roto i te 10 meneti i a rātau e haere tonu ana. " Kātahi anō ka pērā anō a Sara. "I puta mai o rātau parirau, ā, kāore i taea e rātau te rere, te haere rānei, ā, i roto i ngā hēkona e 30 whakamutunga, ka mahia e rātau tēnei auē rerekē, a, ka pahemo." I kī a ia ka haere tonu te mumura i taua ahiahi, nā Shirley - i te kāinga o Ms Sisson - i te tīmatanga. I mate a ia i ētahi haora i muri iho. Ka kī a ia: "Kei te tino pōrearea ahau." I kī a ia e rangirua ana a ia ka puta he ārai mumura katoa, engari i karangatia kia whakaarohia te rōrahi o ngā whakaaturanga tata ki ngā kāinga. "Ki taku whakaaro me whai raihana ngā takahanga i ngā pō tautuhi o te tau, me tino whakaaro rānei rātou ki ngā taumata turituri mō ngā wāhi noho," tana kī. 'Ehara i te mea rerekē' Ehara i te mea "rerekē" kia mate ngā manu mōkai ina tūpono ki ngā turituri nui, wiriwiri ohorere, e kī ana a Dr Yvette Rowntree, o Scarsdale Vets i Derby. "He nui ake hoki te kite a ngā manu i te tae i ngā whāngote, nā reira he tino whakawehi ki ngā manu te āhua o te kāmura ātaahua ki a mātau," tana kī. "He nui ake te mōrearea o ngā manu i roto i ngā manu rererangi, nā te mea kāore he hanganga mārō i waenganui i a rātou me ngā mumura, nā reira mēnā ka taea kia mauria mai ngā manu manu ki roto i tēnei wā, engari ehara tēnei i te mōrearea mēnā ka whakamahia ngā manu ki waho." I tāpiritia e ia me kati e ngā rangatira ngā matapihi me ngā ārai me te whakatangi pūoro papamuri. I te Pāremata i te Mane, ka tautohetohetia tētahi petihana e karanga ana ki te whakakore i te hokonga kāmura ki te iwi whānui, nā te whara o ngā tāngata, ngā kararehe me ngā kararehe. Kua tohe hoki ngā tākuta kirihou i ngā tāngata kia rua ngā whakaaro i mua i te hoko mumura nā te mataku ki te nui o ngā whara. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Te whakaoho o te karapu pō o Shoreditch: He hara te tangata ki te kōhuru
summary: Kua kitea he hara ki te kōhuru tētahi rerenga i haere i muri i te patunga i tētahi tangata i waho o tētahi karapu ki te raki o Rāwāhi.
text: I okaina e Tyla Gopaul, e 22, a Zakaria Abukar Shariff Ali i waho o te hōpua o Rolling Stock i Shoreditch i ngā haora tōmua o te 24 o Whiringa 2018. I rongo te hūri i a Tēnā Ali e mahi ana hei "kaihanga rangimārie" i roto i tētahi tautohetohe i waenganui i ētahi atu tāngata tokorua i te wā i whakaekea ai ia. I whakaae a Gopaul, mai i Islington, ki te patu tangata, engari i kitea he hara ki te kōhuru i muri i te whakawātanga i te Old Bailey. I rongo te kōti kua puta he whakawhitinga ā-waha i roto i te karapu i waenganui i ngā tāngata tokorua - ko Lee Haydon rāua ko Te Wānanga, e mōhiotia ana ko Hamza. I haere rātau ki Waterson Street ki te whakatau i te tautohetohe i uru mai ai a Tēnā Ali, a, ka mahi hei "kaihanga rangimārie". I kī te rōia o Anthony Orchard QC kua "marino" te tokorua, engari kātahi a Gopaul ka "oma huri noa i te kokonga" me te "tūtuki" i te naihi ki roto i te puku o te tau 26 tau. I mauria a Tāne Ali ki te hōhipera, engari i mate a muri ake i taua rā. 'I hinga ki runga i te naihi' i kitea a Gopaul i runga i te CCTV e rere atu ana i te wāhi, a, ka rere i te whenua i roto i te 24 haora, ka korerotia ki te hūri. I whakahokia ia i Kaiperu i Whiringa 2019. Na te hoatu whakaaturanga, ka kī a Gopaul kua haere a ia "ki te whakarite kāore he whawhai, ā... ki te whakangāwari i te katoa". Kātahi ka unuhia e ia he maripi maukati hei whakamataku i a Hamza, engari i tukitukia ia ki a Tēnā Ali kua "hinga ki runga i te naihi", ka kī te tangata whakapae. Ka whiua ia i te Rāitema me tētahi atu tangata, ko Destiny Bannerman, 20, mai i Ilford, nāna i tautohe i mua ki te āwhina i te hunga hara.

title: Ko wai, he aha, he aha: He aha i kore ai e whakamahia e ētahi atu whenua ngā tuhipoka kirihou?
summary: I tīmata te Pēke o Kānata ki te whakawhitiwhiti i ngā tuhipoka waerau e $100 i tēnei wiki ki te whawhai i te tinihanga me te whakaiti i ngā utu. Nō reira he aha i kore ai ētahi atu whenua e whakamahi moni kirihou?
text: Nā Rema PūkahaRongokōrero Rongokōrero I runga i taua mea, he maha ngā painga o ngā tuhipoka kirihou. He roa te roa, ā, kāore e tere te paru - he painga nui i ngā whenua whai āhuarangi wera, me ngā pūkoro werawera. "He taiao uaua te āhuarangi ā-rangi mō ngā tuhipoka pēke, engari nā te nui o te hauhau me te pāmahana tiketike," te kī a te kairangahau waerau o Stane Straus. "Mā tēnei e ngongo ai ngā tuhipoka pepa i te haukū, nā reira ka poke, ka tere te ngoikore. Ko ngā tuhipoka waerau, i tērā taha, kaore e ngongo i te haumākū. "Ka taea e koe te kī atu ka patua e ngā tuhipoka waerau ngā tuhipoka pepa mō te mā me te mauroa i ngā āhuarangi katoa, engari ko tēnei painga o ngā tuhipoka waerau e tū ake ana i ngā āhuarangi pātata." He haumarutanga, he utu, he taiao hoki a Kānata i te wā i whakatau ai kia haere kirihou. I te tūnga o te tinihanga i te whenua mai i te 2001 ki te 2004, ka whakapaetia ngā pire $10 me te $5 i tāngia i te 2001 me te 2002, i whakaarotia he iti rawa ngā āhuahira haumarutanga. I tēnei wāhanga, kua tino whakatūria kētia te hangarau waerau i Ahitereiria i te tau 1988, ā, ko ngā āhuahira haumarutanga pēnei i ngā matapihi pūataata me ngā tohuwai moroiti he rongoā ki te raruraru o Kānata. E kī ana a Kānata ko tana pire $100 te moni hōhonu rawa o te ao, tae atu ki tētahi hologram i roto i te matapihi pūataata. E whakaatu ana hoki i tētahi porohita tau e ōrite ana ki te uara o te karakia ina puritia ki te rama. Ka whai mai tētahi whakaritenga waerau $50 i Poutāpeta me tētahi pire $20 i te mutunga o te tau 2012. I te mutunga o te tau 2013, ka whakaurua ngā pire hōu e $10 me te $5, ā, ka tāngia ngā moni kānata katoa ki te waerau. Tukurua ana i ngā tuhipoka hōu, e kī ana te kaitātari matua o Pēke Kānata, a Julie Girard, ka roa ake i ngā pire pepa. Ko te roanga o te pire $20 - ko te tikanga kia whitu tau te roanga o te pire $20 - te tikanga kia whitu tau te roanga o te pire $20. Mā tēnā e tiaki ngā utu whakanao nā te mea he iti ake ngā pire e hiahiatia ana - ā, ka tukurua hoki te kirihou i te mutunga o tōna oranga. "Tērā pea ka noho tētahi tangata i runga i tētahi tūru pātītī i tētahi rā, he mea hanga moni ōna wāhanga," te kī a Girard. E waiata ana hoki a Stane Straus i ngā whakamihi o te waerau, mai i tētahi tirohanga taiao, i whakaritea ki ngā moni "pepa" tūturu. Ko te nuinga o ēnei i hangaia ki te miro - ko ngā pire pepa o Amerika he 75% miro - arā, ka whakamāramatia e ia, he nui tonu ngā pareketo me te wai hei whakaputa. Nō reira he aha i kore ai e nui ake ngā whenua e moni ki tēnei hangarau? I tēnei rā, e 23 ngā whenua e whakamahi ana i ngā tuhipoka waerau, engari e ono anake kua tahuri i ngā whakaritenga katoa hei kirihou. E kī ana a Tom Hockenhull, te kaitiaki o te whakaaturanga Moni Hōu i te Whare Taonga o Ingarangi, ko tētahi take kei te kati te āputa haumarutanga i waenganui i te pepa me ngā tuhipoka kirihou. Ināianei ka taea te hanga "tuhipoka hinu" - ngā tuhipoka pepa me tētahi matapihi waerau pūataata - ka whakamāramatia e ia. "He haumaru ake te pepa i tērā i mua, ā, ko te tuhipoka hōu [Peretania] £50, hei tauira, he āhuahira tino uaua ki te tinihanga," tana tāpiri mai. Ināianei kei te haere whakamua nga kaitinihanga me te waerau. "He tino uaua te waerau ki te tinihanga, engari kāore anō kia aukati i te whakamātau a te tangata: ka puta mai ngā tāwhai pai i ētahi wā," te kī a Tēnā Hockenhull. Mōrea hoki ka tohu atu a ia ki ētahi hēnga mōhio o ngā tuhipoka waerau: Anō hoki, he nui ake te utu o ngā tuhipoka waerau hei whakaputa i te wā poto, tērā pea he whakahoki mō ngā whenua e tipu ana. Ka puta noa mai te utu mai i tō rātou mauroa tāpiri i te roanga o te wā. Ko tētahi atu take tērā pea ko te whakatūpato o nga kaihoko pūtahi. "He rōpū tino tūturu ngā pēke matua," te kī a Stane Straus. "Ko ngā tāngata e whakatau ana kia tahuri ki te waerau - tētahi wāhanga, te katoa rānei - kei te mōrearea whaiaro. " He maha ngā pēke matua e tatari ana kia tahuri rā anō ētahi atu, kātahi ka whai mai."

title: I muri i te rua wiki ka puta atu te 'kaitohutohu uniana' a Oliver Lewis
summary: Kua haere te kaitohutohu matua a Boris Johnson mo te pupuri tahi i te UK, e kī ana i "kore e taea" tōna tūnga e ētahi atu i roto i Downing Street.
text: Ko Oliver Lewis, he urunga o te kaitohutohu matua o mua o te pirimia, a Dominic Cummings, he wāhanga matua o te whakahau kia wehe atu te UK i te EU. I puta mai tōna haerenga i te wā e karanga ana te Rōpū ā Iwi o Pirihitini ki tētahi atu taupānga mo te rangatiratanga. E rua wiki noa iho nei i whakaūngia ai a Tēnā Lewis i tana tūranga. I whakakapia e ia a Luke Graham, tētahi MP Conservative o mua. I whakapeka a Downing Street ki te kōrero mō ngā take kaimahi. I muri i te wehenga atu o Tēnā Pirihi, ka tūtohu te Minita Tuatahi o Pākehā, a Nicola Sturgeon: "He wehewehenga i roto i te wae o te Kotahitanga. Tērā pea ka pouri noa iho rānei ki te mōhio he pēhea te miro o te kēhi." I kī te kaiārahi tuarua o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te "I te nui o te tautoko mo te rangatiratanga, kei te ngaro nga kaitohutohu o te Tories pēnei i te kiore i runga i te kaipuke totohu," tana kī. "He mana tā ngā tāngata i Pākehā ki te whakatau i tō rātou ake wā heke mai i roto i tētahi taupānga i muri i te taiepa." I tua atu i te mate urutā, ko te pare i te uniana tētahi o ngā wero matua a Boris Johnson i ngā marama e heke mai nei. Ka tonoa e te SNP tētahi atu taupānga mēnā ka toa rātau i te pōti Holyrood i Me - i te wā e purei tonu ana te pānga o te mahi a Te Pākehā ki Aiarangi ki te Raki. I whakatūria a Oliver Lewis hei upoko o te wae Uniana i te tīmatanga o te marama, ā, i kitea he kaitākaro hira i te Tau 10 i a ia te taringa o Tēnā Hōnea. Nā reira ko tōna haerenga i te rua wiki i muri iho e whakaatu ana kāore i te pai te katoa i Te Tiriti o Downing. Tawhiti atu i reira. E kī ana ngā pūtake, ko Tēnā Pirihitini te tūkinotanga hiko - i muri i ngā huringa kaimahi i te ngākau o te kāwanatanga i tērā wiki. Te āhua nei he uaua ki a Tēnā Lewis te mahi tahi me tētahi atu kaitohutohu motuhake, a Henry Newman, i kawea mai ki te mahi Tau 10 i tērā wiki. E tino tata ana a Tēnā Newman ki te hoa wahine a te pirimia, a Carrie Symonds. Huri noa i Westminster, he mīharo ēnei tautohetohe hiko. Engari ko te wehi o ētahi e karapoti ana i a Tēnā Hōnea, kei te haere tonu rātou - ā, e whakaatu ana i tētahi mahi kāore tonu te kaipuke i te tino pūmau. I roto i ngā kupu a tētahi pūtake: "Me noho ngā mea katoa ki reira." Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i a Nick. Kua kī a Tēnā Hōnea i tētahi atu taupānga mo te rangatiratanga o Pirihitini - i muri i te mea whakamutunga i te tau 2014 - kia kaua e puta, e whakaahua ana he pōti "kotahi i roto i te whakatupuranga". Ko Tēnā Lewis te kaiwhakahaere rangahau o te whakahau Pōti Waiho i roto i te taupānga mema EU 2016, e tuhi ana i tana whakahau. I uru atu a ia ki te kāwanatanga o UK hei kaitohutohu mo te kaupapa here o Te Hononga i mua i tana mahi ki te tiaki i te uniana.

title: Ka tuki ki ngā whare taonga e ono o Welsh i te mutunga wiki o te Aranga
summary: E ono ngā whare taonga puta noa i Wales ka pā ki ētahi atu tuki i te Aranga i muri i te pakarutanga o ngā kōrero mo tētahi haupae utu.
text: Kua whakahē ngā mema o te Kotahitanga o ngā Ratonga Tūmatanui me ngā Ratonga Arumoni (PCS) ki ngā mahere kia mutu ngā utu tāpiri ki ngā kaimahi o te mutunga wiki me ngā kaimahi hararei pēke. I te Tūtira, ka kī te Whare Taonga o te Motu o Wales kua hoki whakamuri te uniana i runga i tētahi whakaaetanga ki te pōti i ngā mema i runga i tētahi taumira kua marohitia. I kī te PCS "kāore he maia" o ngā mema ki te whakahaere. Kua kī te Whare Taonga ā-Motu o Wales e anga ana ki te 4.7% tapahi i roto i tana āwhina ā-tau mai i te Kāwanatanga o Welsh me ngā utu mutunga wiki e tata ana ki te £750,000 i te tau. I whakatārewatia ngā katinga i whakaritea i te wā o Mahuru i muri i ngā whakaritenga mā te Ratonga Kaitohutohu, Whakaraupapatanga me te Arbitrase. Engari i kī te Whare Taonga o te Motu o Uēra i puta mai i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama kāore a PCS e pōti i ngā mema i runga i tētahi mahi huatau, e ai ki te whakaaetanga i a Hakihea. I kī te Whare Taonga ka tīmata te kōrero ki te hunga e pāngia ana i te 4 o Āperira. "Ko te whakatau i tēnei tautohetohe ināianei he take tino wawe mō Amgueddfa Cymru (National Museum Wales), nā ngā pēhanga o te pūtea iti iho," te kī a te kaikōrero. Heoi anō, i kī a PCS kua pōti ngā mema "tino nui" i ngā hui wāhi mahi ki te "whakapuaki i tō rātou whakaaetanga" ki te whakahaere matua o te Whare Taonga o te Motu o Wales me tō rātou "whakakore ki te tīmata anō i ngā whakaritenga". I kī te hēkeretari o PCS Wales, a Shavanah Taj: "Kua tōia tēnei tautohetohe ināianei mo te rua tau, ā, kei raro te ngākau whakaputa. E mōhio ana mātou kua tapahia te tahua a te Whare Taonga engari kaua e whakaae ko te kaimahi 'i mua-o-te whare' - ko te tino utu i roto i te rōpū - ko wai te tikanga kia tino patua, mā te tuku i a rātau utu mutunga wiki."

title: Tautohetohe o te rēra ki te tonga: E kī ana te minita o te rēra ka taea e te kāwanatanga te whakahaere kōrero
summary: Kua kī te minita o te rēra hou, a Paul Maynard, ka whakaaro te kāwanatanga ki te whakarite kōrero i waenganui i te Tonga me te uniana o TE WHT ki te whakamutu i ta rātau tautohetohe.
text: Kua pāngia e ngā pāhihi ngā marama takaware, ngā whakakorenga me te whakahekenga o te wātaka i waenganui i te iti o ngā kaimahi me te mahi taraiwa a ngā kaitātaki. I kī a Tēnā Maynard he "kore whakaaetia" te taumata ratonga o nāianei. I te wā i tāruatia e te taone nui o Rānōna, a Te Rangatira o Rānōna, a Te Rangatira o Rānōna, tana karanga kia tangohia e Waka mō Rāwāhi te māngai. 'I puritia he taumaha' I roto i tētahi reta ki te Hēkeretari Waka hou a Pirihi Grayling, ka kī a Tēnā Kani: "Kāore e kore e taunoa te māngai ināianei, ā, kua karangatia e au i mua kia hīpae tō tari ki te whakahaere. " Ahakoa ngā kōrero whānui ake mō te mana whakahaere, ināianei ka tono ahau kia haere tētahi hipanga atu anō me te whakanoho i taku tīma matua o TfL (Transport for London) ki te whakahaere i te māngai ki te Tonga kia whiwhi rā anō mātou i tētahi taumira pūmau." I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o TE WĀ, a Mick Cash: "Kei te taumahatia ngā pāhihi me ngā kaimahi e tēnei mahi rēra rahua, ā, he turi te mūmū mai i te tīma hou i te DfT (Tari Waka)."
