I tāpiritia e Tēnā Moni me "mahi whawhai" hei tango i te Rerewhenua o Govia Thameslink, te kamupene nāna te Tonga, me te kawe mai i ngā Rerewhenua Whakahaere Hāngai (he kamupene pupuri i whakatūria e te DfT hei whakahaere i ngā māngai o te kaupae e hiahiatia ana kia noho tūmatanui) "i mua i te mōrearea nui". Engari i kī atu a Tēnā Maynard ki tētahi Komiti Tīpako Waka: "E kore te huri noa i te whakahaere e āwhina nā te mea kāore tērā e whakatau i ngā take tautohetohe, ā, ka raruraru anō." Kei te tautohetohe te Tonga me te RMT mō ngā mahere mō ngā atekōkiri, kaua ko ngā tautīaki, ki te whakatuwhera me te kati i ngā tatau hariata. I te whakarongo, ka kī te mema o te komiti o Huw Merriman MP - e whakamahi ana i ngā tereina ki te Tonga ki te haere ki te Pāremata - i kī te uniana e hiahia ana ki ngā pūmautanga mai i te kāwanatanga mō te haumarutanga mahi mo te wā roa o ngā tautīaki, kāore i taea e te Tonga te whakarato i te mutunga o tōna māngai o nāianei. I kī a ia he "gobsmacking" kāore anō te DfT kia kōrero ki ngā rōpū e rua inā noa nei, ā, ka karangatia kia noho tahi me rātou, ā, "kia noho hei wāhanga o taua mahi ki te kawe mai i tētahi taumira". Ka whakautua e Tēnā Maynard: "E kore rawa ahau e whakahaere i tēnā. Māku e whai tohutohu, ā, ki te wāhi e taea ai e mātou, e rapu ana ki te mahi i tēnā." Kua whakapārewa te tonga mo te raruraru.

title: Janet i Glastonbury: He huinga hākinakina, hihiri mai i tētahi kuini R&B
summary: I te whakahaerenga ki Glastonbury, ka whakaarahia e Janet Jackson ētahi tukemata ruarua i tana tweeting i tētahi pānui whakaahua rārangi e whakanoho ana i tōna ingoa ki runga ake i ngā kupu matua.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC kaipānui pūoro Kia tika ai, he mahi matua te whetū i te kāinga i te US, i reira ko ia tētahi o ngā kaiwaiata wahine tino angitu o ngā wā katoa. Ahakoa rā, e 17 ngā taunga 10 o runga ki tōna ingoa, nāna tēnei hākari i tautuhi i tētahi tūponotanga. He mea whakamīharo, ehara i te tākaro haumaru, ka hoatu e Janet tētahi whakaterenga whiowhio o tana mahi, e purei ana i tētahi waiata pōturi o ngā ara e 21 i roto i te 50 meneti noa iho. I ētahi wā, he ānini te tere. Ko tētahi o ana tino taunga, Ko ngā Mea Tino Pai i roto i te Ora E Wātea ana, i whiua i muri i te kōrihi tuatahi; me ngā riu iti o Throb me Come On Get Up i whiwhi i te hau kī ake. Mō ngā kaipāngai mārō, he rārangi huinga moemoeā tērā (ā, he tokomaha rātau e waiata ana i o rātau pūkahukahu) engari mō tētahi huihuinga hākari tauhou ki ngā kokonga o tana whakarārangi tuarā, he tino pōraruraru ētahi o ngā kōwhiringa waiata. Engari ko te manaaki o te rārangi huinga ā-aro, i ia wā ka tīmata tētahi riu pukaemi, he pahū pakū i te kokonga - ahakoa ko te kōwhao o te tau 1980 o What Have You Done For Me Lately, ko ngā rangi pakū haurangi rānei o Escapade me Miss You Much. He mahinga uaua ā-tinana, kī tonu i ngā nekehanga kanikani ātaahua - i te nuinga o te wā i hikitia hāngai mai i ngā ataata i pūhia e Janet i te 30 tau ki mua. Engari he ngāwari noa iho te hinga o te pakeke e 53 tau ki tana rōpū kaikanikani e waru, ahakoa e mau ana i tētahi koti hiku taumaha i te wera 30C. Kotahi noa iho tana okiokinga, ki te tārewa i te werawera i tōna kanohi ki te tauera, kātahi ka whiua whakatuki ki te papa kia taea ai e ia te mahi panuku. Ko te mea, i tino hari a ia i a ia e kōpikopiko ana me nga kaikanikani, ka kata i te wā e pupuhi ana tētahi i a ia i te wā o Escapade, me te takahuri i tana kōpikopiko whero i a rātau e whakararuraru ana i ētahi o ngā mahi tawhito a The Jacksons. I ētahi wā he mārire rawa ngā kupu a Janet i roto i te whāranu, engari te āhua nei kua mahi a ia i tētahi huarahi waiata - ko te nuinga - i a ia e hāereere ana i te atamira; ā, i kitea e te Ngeru Pango tāhaehae ka taea e ia te tātua i te wā e hiahiatia ana e ia, Kaua rawa te whetū tino mārire, he iti noa iho tana whakangahau atamira, hāunga ētahi whakahauhau ruarua kia waiata, ā, i te wā o Nasty, e kī ana: "Ka taea e au te ako ki te pīrangi ki tēnei, Glastonbury". Ahakoa rā, i te tūtakitanga ki te pēhi i muri i te whakaaturanga, ka kī a ia he "whakamīharo" te tirohanga mai i te atamira. "He tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata," ka mīharo a ia. "Te āhua nei he tino hākinakina te katoa i ia tau. He nui rawa ngā kōrero e rongo ana ahau mo taua mea." He ngāwari noa iho te whakarapa i a Janet i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, i ngā tau kotahi mano, i ngā tau kotahi mano, i ngā tau kotahi I tēnei wā, i tāhaetia tana pukaemi Rhythm Nation i ngā kupu matua, me ngā waiata e whiu ana i te tika pāpori, te whakaaro ā-iwi, te noho kore kāinga me te kore tuhituhi. E rua o aua waiata, State Of The World me The Knowledge, i hangaia he pūtahi o te huinga o te Hātarei, ā, i kitea he hāngai ināianei i te tau 1989. Engari ko ngā patu, ehara i ngā tapahi hōhonu, i tino tūhono. He miramira te funk aroha o Love Will Never Do (Without You), pērā ki te takahi hōia o Rhythm Nation, nāna i kati te huinga. Ko te tikanga o te takaware hangarau i te tīmatanga o tana whakaaturanga, me whakataka te whakatakotoranga anō o Together Again. I te tātaritanga whakamutunga, tērā pea he pai ake te whakataka i te huarahi jukebox me te arotahi ki ngā pahū 10, 12 rānei, engari i muri i te āhua o te haerenga 50 meneti o te hītori R&B o nāianei, kāore i taea e koe te whakapae i a Janet i te pōrearea. He nui tana mahi mō mātau i tēnei wā. Rārangi Tautuhi: Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Whare pukapuka huawhenua hei āwhina i ngā kaiwhakanao gin o Pākehā
summary: Kua hangaia e ngā kaipūtaiao i te Whare Wānanga o Heriot-Watt tētahi whare pukapuka huawhenua hei āwhina i ngā kaiwhakarato gin ki te waihanga hua hōu.
text: Kua whakamātauria e nga tohunga e 72 ngā tipu me ngā harore e whakamahia ana e ngā kaihoko - mai i te ongaonga ki te lavender me te harore chaga, e tipu ana i runga i ngā rākau birch. E tūmanako ana rātau ka whakarewaina hoki e te tinana mātauranga ngā hokonga kaweake, mā te whakatū i ngā tāwara rerekē o te gin kia kore ai e tū i ngā tikanga. E toru tau nga kaipūtaiao e mahi ana i te kaupapa. Ka taea te whakatipu i ngā otaota gin katoa i Pākehā, e wātea ana i te arumoni, mai i tētahi pūtake tautoko. Kua whakamāramatia takitahitia ia mea, ā, ko tōna tāwara, te kakara me te waha e whakarārangitia ana e te tīma i te International Centre for Brewing and Distilling (ICBD) i te whare wānanga. E ai ki te Kai me te Inu o Pākehā, 70% o te gin o UK e hangaia ana i Pākehā, ā, ka tūmanakohia kia eke ngā hoko ki te £1.5bn i te tau 2020. I hangaia tuatahitia te whare pukapuka hei āwhina i ngā kaiwhakarato gin o Pākehā ki te waihanga i ngā hua ahurei, hōu, engari ināianei kei te whakamahia hei whakarite kia tutuki i ngā paerewa kawemai o ngā whenua pērā i a Mātau. He maha ngā mema o te Scottish Craft Distillers Association (SCDA) kua whakamahi kē i te whare pukapuka hei waihanga i ngā gins hou me ngā waipiro huawhenua. Gin facts Source: Scotland Food and Drink Matthew Pauley, assistant professor at the ICBD and a beverage industry consultant, said: "By definition, gin must taste predominantly of juniper. Ko te waihanga i tētahi gin hou e tū ana i te mākete e hiahiatia ana he otaota māheahea, he kakara me te waha e whakamihi ana, e whakarei ake ana rānei i te juniper. "Our botanical library will help gin producers create Scottish gins with locally available botanicals that are available in dried form, from a sustainable source, to ensure consistency and availability. " Mā te puna mātou e kōrero ki ngā kaiwhakarato me pēhea te mahi a te otaota mēnā ka tāpiritia i mua, i muri rānei i te whakahekenga." I kī a ia ka taea e ngā mema o te SCDA te haere ki te taiwhanga e taea ai e rātou te "whakamātau me te tūhura i ngā reka tāwara hou, me te iti iho te whakamātautau me te hapa". Ināianei e hiahia ana te tīma ki te āwhina i ngā kaiwhakarato ki te karo i ngā raruraru ki ngā kaweake. I kī a Dr Annie Hill, ahorangi pāhono i te ICBD: "I whakatata mai tētahi kaiwhakanao gin nāna i whakarārangi ngā otaota i roto i ā rātou mea whakarato, ā, i puritia tā rātou tauira e ngā tikanga o Amerika. " I mōhio mātou kāore te haurua o ngā otaota i roto i tā mātou whare pukapuka i te rārangi Haumaru (Gras) o Amerika. Ko ngā gins Pākehā e whakarārangi ana i ēnei otaota hei mea whakauru, ka taea te whakakore e ngā tikanga o Amerika me te kore tūhuratanga, pātai rānei. "Kei te whakamātauria e mātou ināianei ngā pūhui tūkino tērā pea hei whakaatu he haumaru mō ngā kiritaki, ā, kāore i runga ake i ngā tepe paepae. Mā tēnei e hoatu ki ngā kaiwhakanao gin ngā whakaaturanga e hiahiatia ana e rātou hei whakamatau i te haumaru o tō rātou gin." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He iti rawa te mōrearea o ngā otaota ki ngā kaiinu gin i te UK, i te Hononga rānei - ko te whakamōhiotanga pātahi o te waipiro e nui ake ana i ētahi atu pūhui kino ake." I pūteatia te Whare Pukapuka Botanical o te ICBD e Interface, ā, kei te wātea ināianei ki ngā mema o te Scottish Craft Distillers Association. Kei te kōrerorero te tīma me pēhea te whakawātea whānui, ā, e tūmanako ana ki te tāpiri i ētahi atu otaota, tae atu ki ngā nati me ngā putiputi ki te puna.

title: £1.2bn mō Pākehā i roto i ngā mahere whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga o UK
summary: Kua pānuitia e te Tumuaki o Stuad Javid tētahi atu £1.2bn mō Pākehā i roto i ngā mahere whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga o UK.
text: Kotahi tau nga tahua a te tari, ehara i te toru tau noa iho, nā te rangirua i te pānga o Te Pakihi. I kī taurangi te tumuaki e "huri ana i te whārangi i runga i te whakawhāititanga" i a ia e haere ana ki tētahi whakapau moni tōmua. Engari i kī te hēkeretari pūtea o Pākehā, a Derek Mackay, kāore te mōkī pūtea i "wete i te tūkinotanga" o te haumarutanga. Kei roto i te pūtea i Pākehā te £160m mō ngā kaiahuwhenua ki te whakatau i tētahi haupae roa i runga i te whakaraupapatanga o ngā utu Kaupapahere Ahuwhenua Noa. Ko te whakapau moni tāpiri - ko te nuinga o te wā e hāngai ana ki te hauora, ki ngā kura me ngā pirihimana - ka pūteatia mā te nama, kaua ko te pikinga tāke. I whakahuahuatia e Tēnā Javid te £13.8bn o te pūtea penapena tāpiri puta noa i te UK, e ōrite ana ki te £1.2bn mō Pākehā i raro i te tauira pūtea a te iwi i whakaritea e kiia nei ko te tātai Barnett, i tāna i kī ai ko te pikinga hokohoko tere rawa mō te 15 tau. Ka kī a Tēnā Javid: "Kāore he tari e tapahia a tērā tau. Kua nui ake tana tahua mo te whakapau moni o ia rā, i te iti rawa e hāngai ana ki te utunga moni. "Koia tēnā e kī ana ahau i te mutunga o te whakawhāititanga." Engari i kī a Tēnā Mackay: "Ahakoa ngā kī taurangi o te pūtea tāpiri mai i te kāwanatanga o UK, kāore tēnei pānuitanga e nui ake te mōhiotanga ki a mātau, kāore e wete i te tūkinotanga o te haumarutanga, ka kore e pare i a mātau i a Pakihi, ā, ka hoatu noa iho ētahi o ngā moni e nama ana ki Pākehā. " Kua herea ngā ratonga tūmatanui o Pirihitini e te tekau tau o te whakawhāititanga o UK i ngaro ai i a mātau neke atu i te £12bn o te pūtea penapena tūturu. "He iti noa iho te mahi a tēnei pānuitanga ki te whakatau i te tūkinotanga i takea mai i te whakawhāititanga o UK, i ngā tautohetohe pūtea maha rānei e tārewa ana mātau ki te Pūtea Moni." Ko te utu pāmu Ko te utu pāmu e £160m e whakatau ana i tētahi haupae i runga i te āhua o te utu a te EU i ngā nama. I te tau 2013, i pānuitia e te EU ngā nekehanga kia tika ake te whakaraupapa i ngā utu Kaupapahere Ahuwhenua Pūnoa, i runga anō i te toharite hōro mō ia heketea. I utua e te EU te moni whakarewa hei kawe mai i nga kaiahuwhenua maunga o Pirihitini ki te toharite o nga utu heketea o ērā atu whenua EU katoa. Heoi anō, i whakatauria e te kāwanatanga o UK kia horahia ngā utu puta noa i te wāhanga pāmu katoa, i runga anō i ngā tuari hītori. I kī te perehitini o te National Farmers' Union Scotland, a Andrew McCornick, ko te tikanga o te pānuitanga he "hē taketake kua whakatikaina". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mō ngā tau e ono kua taha, kua tautohetohe roa mātou kia whakahuatia te tika o te pūtea ūngutu, ā, ko te £160m e tohu ana i te pikinga nui rawa atu i roto i te pūtea ahuwhenua i roto i te pūmahara." I kī te Hēkeretari o te Whakahaerenga Ā-Taiwhenua, a Fergus Ewing: "Kua tautohe ahau kia whakahokia tēnei moni ki ngā kaiahuwhenua o Pākehā, ā, ka pēhi i te kāwanatanga o UK kia whakatika i tēnei tūkinotanga hītori, nāna i tango ngā kaiahuwhenua, ngā kaiahuwhenua me ngā kaiwhakahaere whenua o te tautoko nui." 'Mōrea nui' I whakatakotoria e te tumuaki nga mahere whakapau moni ki te tūponotanga kei te haere te UK ki tētahi atu pōti nui - ko te tuatoru o te whenua i roto i te rima tau. Ko te mahere whakapau moni a te tumuaki i runga anō i ngā tohu i whakaputaina i Mati e te Office for Budget Responsibility (OBR), te kaitiaki moni takitahi. I raro i aua matapae, neke atu i te £15bn te nama a te kāwanatanga i roto i tōna tepenga tārewa i whakaritea e ia anō o te 2% o te uara o te whakahaerenga ā-motu. I whakatūpato hoki te kaiwhakahaere o te Whare Wānanga mō ngā Akoranga Moni, a Paora Hōnea, ka taea e te ngoikoretanga o nāianei i roto i te whakahaerenga o UK te taumaha i te whakapuakitanga a te kāwanatanga mo te mutunga o te whakawhāititanga. Ka kī a ia: "E noho ana mātou i tētahi wā o te rangirua o te ohaoha tino nui, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ko te mōrea nui ki te kī kua mutu te whakawhāititanga, ka tīmata te mahi kino rawa atu, tērā pea mēnā kāore he mahi a tātau. " Kātahi ka tīmata te tātaritanga me te nama, ā, kei te mōrearea tātau ki te whai i tētahi atu rongoā whakawhāiti kia mutu ai tērā mō tētahi wā tuarua." I kī te Hēkeretari o Pirihitini a Alister Jack ko te pānuitanga whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga o UK he "rongo nui mō Pākehā". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He £1.2bn tāpiri e tika ana kia whakamahia hei whakatipu i te ōhanga me te haumi i ngā ratonga tūmatanui nui puta noa i Pākehā. " He mārama ake i tērā atu wā ka whai hua a Pākehā i te noho hei wāhanga o tētahi Hononga o Ingarangi kaha, ā, e tohutohu ana ahau i te kāwanatanga o Pākehā kia mahi tahi me mātau i a mātau e haumi ana ki Pākehā ki te tuku mahi, ngā huarahi me te tupu tautoko. "He rā tino pai tēnei mō ngā kaiahuwhenua o Pākehā me te pirimia e tuku ana i tana kī taurangi kia whakatika i ngā hē o te pūtea tika mā te whakarato i tētahi atu £160m."

title: Ko te rama waka i te tuatahi mō Sark kore motokā
summary: Ko te wā tuatahi e whakamahia ana ngā rama waka rangitahi i te motu kore motokā o Sark.
text: I whakatakotoria ngā rama ki Dixcart Lane, e rua ngā kokonga matapo i te roanga o te 500m, ā, he whānui rawa mō tētahi tarakihana i te wā kotahi. Kua arokē te huarahi i te mea koia anake te urunga ki ngā hōtēra e rua, e mahi ana rāua tahi i te whakahoutanga me te mahi whakahou. E rāhuitia ana nga motokā i runga i te motu. Ka tangohia nga rama i te wā o Hui tanguru. I kī a Paul Armorgie, te kaiwhakahaere o Stocks Hotel, ā, kei te mahi a Dixcart Hotel: "I mōrearea ngā pēke whenua ngohengohe i ia taha o Dixcart Lane nā te mea kei te ngana ngā tarakihana ki te whakawhiti tētahi ki tētahi. " Te āhua nei ko ngā rama waka rangitahi anake te huarahi tika hei aukati i ngā tūkinotanga mau tonu ki te ara me te karo i te pōrearea i waenganui i ngā atekōkiri." Ka noho tonu ngā rama kia oti rā anō ngā mahi, arā, i te wā o Hui tanguru.

title: Haina 'raiona kurī': Ko te mastiff kararehe o Henan e noho ana hei poti o Awherika
summary: I kitea he tinihanga tētahi kararehe i whakaahuatia he raiona o Awherika i tētahi kararehe Hainamana - i te tīmatanga o te kararehe ki te auau i mua i ngā manuhiri.
text: Nā Michael BristowBBC News, i kī ngā pūrongo pāpāho Hainamana kua whakakapia e te kararehe tana raiona tūturu ki tētahi kurī mastiff o Tīpetiana. I kī tētahi rangatira kararehe i te takiwā o Henan ko te kurī - nā tētahi o nga kaimahi - i purua ki roto i te pāka i te tukunga atu o te raiona tūturu ki tētahi pokapū tāuri. I kī ngā manuhiri whakapouri ki te kararehe i te taone o Louhe kua tinihangatia rātau. E ai ki tētahi pūrongo i roto i te Beijing Youth Daily, ka mārama te tinihanga i te haerenga o tētahi whaea ki te kararehe, i tētahi pāka i te taone o Louhe, ki te whakaatu i tana tama i ngā oro rerekē o ngā kararehe. Engari i to rātau taenga atu ki te pāka i tohua ko "Raiona o Awherika" - he tohu e whakamārama ana i te awhe me ngā āhuatanga o te kararehe - ka ohorere rātau ki te rongo i te kiri o te kararehe. I taua wā ka whakaaturia e nga kaitiaki kararehe ko te raiona e kiia nei he mastiff Tīpetiana, he kararehe he koti parauri huruhuru, he āhua rite ki te raiona. I whakahuatia te manuhiri wahine, ko Liu, e kī ana: "Kei te tino ngana te kararehe ki te tinihanga i a mātau. E ngana ana rātau ki te huna i ngā kurī hei raiona." I whakahuatia te rangatira o te tari kararehe o te pāka, a Liu Suya, e te Beijing Youth Daily, e kī ana kua mauria te raiona ki tētahi whare tāuri, ā, i whakatakotoria rangitahitia te mastiff o Tīpetiana ki roto i tōna pāka nā ngā āwangawanga haumaru. Ko te āhua nei i hē hoki ētahi atu momo; Tērā tētahi pokiha mā i roto i te ana o te reparo me tētahi atu kurī e puta ana hei wuruhi.

title: Ka whakakāhore te Kōti Tiketike i te tono kia aukati i te hononga huarahi o Heysham-M6
summary: Kua whakakāhoretia e te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike tētahi ngana ki te ārai i tētahi huarahi nui e hono ana i a Heysham me Morecambe ki te M6.
text: Transport Solutions for Lancaster and Morecambe (TSLM) sought a judicial review against the £123m road, approved by the government in March. Engari he whakawā mai i tētahi whakarongo i a Hōngongoi, kātahi anō ka tukua ināianei, i whakataua kāore he take mō te arotakenga. Ka mahere a TSLM ki te tono i te whakataunga. E whakapono ana te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Lancashire mā te kaupapa e whakahaere te tupu ohaoha. I te whakarongo, ka whakakāhoretia e Tēnā Kaiwhakatika te kerēme a te rōpū whakahaere kua whakamahia te hātepe hē kia whiwhi ai i te whakaaetanga whakarite. I kī hoki a ia he hāngai, he whānui hoki te tukanga whakaaetanga whanaketanga, ā, tērā pea ka hoatu te whakaaetanga mō te aronui, ahakoa te ara. I kī te Manukura TSLM, a David Gate, e kore te huarahi e "āwhina i te paheketanga i Te Wānanga [rānei] ki te whakatupu anō i Morecambe". "Kāore ngā pakihi e tino whakaaro ka mahi. I te pātaitanga, kāore he umanga kotahi i āwhina i tētahi pene kotahi ki taua mea." Councillor John Fillis, cabinet member for highways and transport, said the road had been given development consent "because there's such a strong case for it in terms of value for money and the benefits to the economy and local transport". "We've always been confident of the case for the road, which enjoys wide support from people and businesses in the area and I'm very happy that we are closer to getting on with the job."

title: Ko te whānau o Utaha i whakamataku i te 'kaikawe tino nui' o Hawaii
summary: Kua puta mai tētahi tangata o Hawaii ki te whakamataku i tētahi whānau ki ngā tuma me ngā tukunga kāore i te hiahiatia ki tō rātou kāinga i Utaha.
text: E kī ana ngā rōia i tukuna e Loren Okamura, e 44, ngā rau tāngata - mai i ngā kaimahi raka ki ngā kaihoko rongoā ki ngā kaimahi wahine - ki te kāinga o te whānau neke atu i te kotahi tau. I "whakamamaetia" nga tūpāpaku e te "tino nui o te cyberstalking", te kī a te rōia a te hau, a John Huber. Ka noho tautāwhi a Tēnā Okamura kia tukuna rā anō ia ki Utaha mō tētahi whakarongo. I auau te ūnga o Walt Gilmore, tana wahine, ana tamariki me ana mokopuna e noho tahi ana me ia i roto i te 15 marama i to rātau kāinga tata ki Salt Lake City me ngā karere whakawehi me ngā whakairinga tuihono. I roto i ētahi whakairinga ko ngā tono rongoā me ngā kairau. Ko ētahi mō ngā tukunga matapōkere, ratonga rānei pēnei i te paipa, te mahi rākau, te tapahi rākau me te tōia. I tētahi take, ka taraiwa tētahi rōpū taitamariki mai i Idaho ki te hoko taonga hī ika ki te rangatira kāinga tē mōhiotia. I tētahi atu take, i kīa mai he tangata whai raruraru rongoā kia eke ki Tauranga, ā, ka riri ki te mōhio kua tinihangatia rātau. I kī a Tēnā Gilmore he "whakamataku" ōna tūtakinga ki ngā kaikirimana riri, ki ngā kaituku, ki ngā kairau me ngā kairau. I kiia ētahi manuhiri kia haere mai ki te kāinga ki te kimi kararehe ngaro, ka waiho a Tēnā Gilmore me ōna hoa noho tata ki te kōrero ki a rātau kua tinihangatia rātau. E whakaaro ana ngā pirihimana e 500 ngā manuhiri tē hiahiatia kua tae mai ki te kāinga mai i Aotearoa 2018, e ārahi ana i te kaipupuri kāinga ki te whakairi i tētahi tohu nui i waho o ngā manuhiri whakatūpato "he tūkino katoa mātou i tēnei tinihanga" me te tono manuhiri kia whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana. I hopukina a Tēnā Okamura e tētahi tīma o TE WHK i Hawaii i te Paraire. E anga ana a ia ki ngā whakapae o te cyberstalking, te mahi tuma ā-rohe me te kawe i ngā tāngata ki te kairautanga. E kī ana ngā rōia i tukuna hoki e ia te tamāhine a Tēnā Kirimore ki ngā kuputuhi me ngā īmēra whakawehi, tae atu ki tētahi o Me e kī ana ki a ia kia "moe me te whatu kotahi e tuwhera ana, kia titiro tonu ki runga i tōna pakihiwi." I kī hoki te īmēra: "Me whakamate noa koe i a koe me te mahi i tō whānau." E kī ana ngā pirihimana i mōhio te whānau o Gilmore rāua ko Tāne Okamura, ahakoa kāore i te mārama te kaupapa i muri i te whakatoi. I tāutua a ia ko ia te kaipōhēhē matua i te Hānuere, engari i pau ngā kaihoko tae noa mai ki tēnei wā ki te kohikohi i ngā whakaaturanga nui nā te mea kei te whakamahi ia i ngā taupānga whakamunatanga hei whakapā atu ki ngā tūpāpaku, ka kī a Tēnā Huber. E kī ana a Tēnā Gilmore e mōhio ana ia he aha i ūkuia ai tōna whānau, engari kāore e hiahia ana ki te kōrerorero tae noa ki te whakawātanga, ka pūrongo te teihana pouaka whakaata Rongokōrero o Hawaii.

title: Maka ngā 'kai whakatika tere me ngā tī-toxes' i tēnei Tau Hōu
summary: Mēnā ko tō taumira o te Tau Hōu ko te ngaro i ētahi taumaha, karohia ngā kai auau, nā te mea kāore e mahi, ā, ka tūkinotia, e kī ana te tākuta matua o NHS Ingarangi.
text: Ehara i te whakatika tere ngā pire kai, "tī-toxes" me ngā hua pēhi hiahia, e kī ana a Prof Stephen Powis, te kaiwhakahaere rongoā o NHS. Ko ngā hua e mahi ana i tēnei kerēme ka whai pānga taha, tae atu ki te pārekareka me ngā take manawa, ka whakatūpato a ia. Ka roa te wā ki te āhua haumaru, ā, me kai tika, me te kori tinana. I te takatū o te iwi whānui mo te Pō o te Tau Hōu, ka whakatūpato hoki a Prof Powis ki ngā mōrearea o te "maturuturu rōpū", te whakatika tere rānei i ngā rongoā hangover. I tērā tau, i hōhiperatia te tauira o Kendall Jenner i muri i tētahi tauhohenga kino ki tētahi rongoā matūkai IV, i hangaia ki te rongoā tote, te konupora, te konupūmā, ngā huaora B me te huaora C. I roto i ngā take tino taumaha, mā te whakauru auau ki ngā turuturu mō ngā rongoā hangover ka pā pea ki te nausea, te tūkino ate, te mate rānei nā te nui rawa o te huaora A. I kī a Prof Powis: "Kāore i te tīariari ngā rongoā hangover merekara me ngā whakatika tere, ā, ko te tangata tuihono e kī ana ka mahia e rātou, tērā pea ka tere te utu i a koe. " He wā tino pai ngā taumira o te Tau Hōu ki te whakarerekē, engari ko te mea pono he iti noa iho te angitu ki ngā pire kai me ngā tī detox - ā, ka nui ake pea te kino i te pai. "He whakaaro pai te whakarite i ngā whāinga o te Tau Hōu me te neke i ētahi pauna nui i muri i te Kirihimete, engari he ngāwari kē atu te pupuri ina mahia āta mahia, kia haumaru hoki." He aki tā te NHS hei āwhina i ngā tāngata ki te whakatutuki i ā rātou whāinga hauora o te Tau Hōu: Me pēhea te kite i tētahi kai māhorahora E tohutohu ana te British Dietetic Association (BDA) i ngā tāngata kia noho atu i ngā kai e whakatoko ana i tētahi mea mīharo, hua rānei hei whakatika i tō raruraru taumaha, me te kore koe e huri i tō āhua noho. Ko ngā kai katoa e kī taurangi ana i te ngaronga tere o te taumaha neke atu i te 2lbs (0.9kg) o te ngako tinana i te wiki, he rangirua hoki. I te nuinga o te wā e whakatairanga ana ngā kai auau i te kai kotahi anake momo kai, te karo rānei i ngā rōpū kai katoa. Kaua hoki e tinihangatia e te tautoko a te tangata rongonui - mēnā he pai rawa te pono, ko te tūponotanga. E kī ana te BDA: "Ko te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te ngaro i te taumaha me te pupuri i a ia, ko te mahi i ngā kōwhiringa hauora ake, te kai i tētahi kai whārite me ngā wāhanga tika te rahi, me te hohe ā-tinana." He kutukutu te ariā o te "detox", e kī ana te BDA, ahakoa e tika ana kia iti iho te inu waipiro me te nui ake o te moe, te hau hou me te mahi. Kei te tinana tōna ake pūnaha hanga-roto hei whakakore me te tango parakore. Kāore he pire, he inu motuhake, he pārekareka, he hinu rānei e āhei ana ki te mahi i tētahi mahi whakangāwari.

title: E tūtaki ana te mahere pāka pātītī o Tākihi me Caicos ki te ātete
summary: "Ehara rātou i te mea nui ake i ngā kararehe wai," te kī a Daniel Turner mō te dolphinaria, ngā pāka kararehe rānei e whakaatu ana i ngā pātītī.
text: Nā Gemma HandyProvidenciales, Turks & Caicos Islands Mr Turner is a spokesman for Born Free, a charity which is actively campaigning for the closure of all dolphinaria worldwide. "Kaore he oranga o ēnei kararehe e noho ana i roto i te whakarau, kāore he momo whakaongaonga me te tauwhitinga pāpori, kāore e taea te kauhoe i ngā rau kiromita i ia rā, e noho rānei i roto i ngā rōpū whānau," tana kī. "Mēnā e tino hiahia ana te tangata ki te whakauru ki ēnei kararehe kia tino whakaaetia e tō rātou mōhiotanga me te kite i tō rātou noho, me kite rātou i a rātou i te mohoao; he nui tonu te wā hei mahi pēnā mō rātou." Ko te nuinga o ngā tūruhi miriona e haere ana ki te moutere iti o Karipiana o Ngā Moutere o Turks me Caicos (TCI) i ia tau e tūmanako ana ki tētahi tūtakinga mohoao. Mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, he pounamu ratarata e kiia nei ko Jojo, ā, e paingia ana e ngā tangata whenua me ngā tūruhi. Ko Tim Ainley, he kaiwhakahaere haereere i te motu TCI o Providenciales, e kauhoe auau ana me Jojo mai i te tau 1985. E pāoro ana a ia i nga whakaaro o Tēnā Tena. "Kāore koe e ako i tētahi mea mō te pātītī e mātakitaki ana i a ia e peke ana i roto i ngā hoops," tana kī. Haven Ahakoa tētahi tautohetohe rongonui o mua tata nei ki ngā pāka whāngote moana i whakaohotia e te pakipūmeka Blackfish, nāna i whakapae a SeaWorld ki te tūkino i ngā tohorā kaipatu, ka noho pai tonu aua pūkenga i ētahi wāhi o te Kāriana, e aia ana e tētahi umanga tere nui. Ko Dolphin Cove e noho ana i Jamaica - e whakaingoatia ana hei taonga tuatahi o te motu - e whakaaro ana ki te whakapau i ngā miriona tāra ki te takahuri i ngā pāka puta noa i te rohe. Kua tonoa e te kamupene te hanga i ngā wāhi whakangahau ki ngā moutere TCI e rua. Kua roa te wā e whakaarotia ana a TCI he rāhui mō ngā pātītī mohoao me ngā tohorā me ngā ture e whakakore ana i to rātau herenga. I te wā tuatahi ka tūmatanui ngā mahere a Dolphin Cove i te tau 2012, ka puta mai he tautohetohe. E hia mano i haina i tētahi petihana e tono ana kia makaia te tono, ā, neke atu i te 100 ngā reta riri i te ao. Tērā anō te tautohetohe i te putanga mai kua whakatikaina e te kāwana TCI ngā ture kia puritia ai ngā whāngote moana hei whakaaturanga, whakaaturanga me te mahinga. I taua wā, ka whakamihi te Kāwana o taua wā, a Ric Todd, i te āwhina ohaoha i kī ai ia ka "tino whakawhiwhia" i ngā whakahere tāpoi a te Rohe o Ingarangi. Ehara a ia i te mea ko ia anake. He tokomaha ngā tangata i te motu moe o TCI, Grand Turk, e pōhiri ana i te whakaongaonga moni e whakapono ana rātau ka whakaohotia e te pānga, nāna i whiwhi whakaaetanga whakatakoto whakahuahua. 'Kahungatanga' Engari mō ōna hoariri - e mau tonu ana i muri i te whawhai e toru tau - kātahi anō ka tīmata te pakanga tūturu. E tautohe ana a Pāremata, o te rōpū kāwanatanga taiao, ko ngā tūruhi e haere ana ki ngā pāka pātītī, he kūare ki te raruraru o ngā kararehe. E whakapae ana a ia ka whāngaia auautia ngā pātītī hei ārai i ngā keke hauora, ā, ka hoatu ki ngā rongoā urutomo auau hei aroturuki i tō rātou āhuatanga. Ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakawāwā tino kōrero o te hanga dolphinaria i TCI i ahu mai i roto i te kāwanatanga anō. I whakaahuatia e te Tumuaki o mua o te Tari Taiao me ngā Take Moana a Kathleen Wood te "apo i ngā pātītī mō te taonga ohaoha" hei "ōrite tūturu o te kahungatanga". I roto i tētahi reta i tukuna e ia ki te Tari Whakarite TCI i tērā tau, i tūtohutia e ia kia whakakāhoretia te kaupapa. I tautohe a Ms Wood ka pā kino ki te whakaahua o te whenua hei ūnga kākāriki, ā, ka taea te whakararuraru i te tokomaha o ngā tūruhi me ngā puna haere e whakahōrite ana i ngā wāhi e āhei ai ngā pāka whāngote moana ki te mahi. I kōrero anō a ia mō te pānga kino o te rauropi ki te pae o North Creek, he wāhi nui mō ngā flamingo nui ake e 500, tae atu ki te conch me te mānawa. 'Tino pai rawa atu i te ao' I te ao whānui, kua rarautia ngā pāka moana mo te whakakī i te hokohoko ki te hopu kararehe mohoao me ngā pāpātanga mate tiketike i waenganui i a rātau kararehe. Kāore a Dolphin Cove i tuku kōrero, ahakoa ngā tono tukurua, engari e whakaahua ana tōna paetukutuku i ōna pūkenga hei "i waenganui i ngā mea tino pai o te ao". He maha nga tau i whakahaeretia ai e ia tētahi hōtaka tāuri i roto i te whare. Hoki mai ki Providenciales, e tūmanako ana a Tēnā Ainley ka angitu te whakahau a ngā kaitiaki taiao me ngā kaiwhaiwhai ki te ārai i ngā mahere a Dolphin Cove. "Kei te tino arokē mātou ki te pokanoa i ngā pātītī, engari mēnā ka tū mātou me te whakarongo, ka kitea he nui kē tā rātou hei whakaako i a mātau." A, i a ia e kōrero ana mō JoJo te pounamu mohoao rata, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "He whawhai tēnei e mōhio ana ahau e hiahia ana ia kia mahia e au."

title: Te matenga o Kirsty Maxwell: E inoi ana te whānau ki ngā tāngata mō ngā whakautu
summary: Kua inoi ngā whanaunga o tētahi wahine i hinga ki tōna matenga mai i tētahi paepae papa 10 i Paniora ki ngā tāngata tokorima mai i Rāhui kia kōrero ki a rātau he aha i tūpono.
text: I mate a Kirsty Maxwell, mai i West Lothian, i muri noa iho i te tomokanga ki tētahi whare nohoanga i nohoia e nga tāngata. E hiahia ana tōna whānau ki ngā "whakautu" mai i ngā tāngata, kua whakakāhore i tētahi kawenga mo te matenga o Mrs Maxwell. I ngana ki te whakapā atu ki a rātau mō tētahi pakipūmeka o Aotearoa, engari kāore anō rātau kia kōrero. I kī te whaea o Kirsty, a Denise Curry: "Ko te mea anake i tonoa e mātau ko te kōrero mai ki a mātau he aha i tūpono ki taua rūma. " E hiahia ana ahau ki ngā whakautu mai i a rātou, nā te mea kāore he reo o Kirsty." I roto i tētahi kōrero tōmua i whakaputaina ki te pāpāho, tokowhā o ngā tāngata i whakaahua i te matenga o Mrs Maxwell he "aituā kino" me te kī kua "tōia o rātau ingoa i roto i te poharu" kāore i hē i a rātau anō. Ko nga tāngata i waenganui i tētahi rōpū e 50 i te hararei mai i Rātata, ā, e whakapono ana te whānau o Whaea Mekisuere he mōhiohio anō pea ēnei tāngata. "I ngā wā katoa e kī ana mātou ko ngā whakautu ki ngā mea i pā ki a Kirsty kei Benidorm me Rātata," te kī a tōna whaea. "E tūmanako ana ahau nā te pakipūmeka ka whai tikanga ngā tāngata kei a rātou ngā whakautu ki te haere mai ki mua ki te āwhina i te whānau, nā te mea he tino uaua ki a mātau." Ko wai a Kirsty Maxwell? He wahine 27 tau a Kirsty Maxwell mai i Livingston, West Lothian. I moe ia i tana tāne ko Arama i te marama o Mahuru 2016, kua mōhio ia ki a ia mo te 10 tau. I te hoko rāua i tētahi kāinga hou, ā, i whakaaro rāua ki te tīmata i tētahi whānau. I kī tana taina, a Ryan Curry: "I te wā tino hari a ia i roto i tōna oranga." I pēhea te matenga o Kirsty Maxwell? I haere a Mrs Maxwell ki Benidorm i Paniora mo te mahi heihei me tētahi rōpū hoa i te 28 o Āperira 2017. I te noho nga wāhine i My Pretty Payma Apartments, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko Apartmentos Payma. I haere rātau ki te kai me te inu i to rāua pō tuatahi, ā, ka hoki mai a Whaea Mekisuere me ngā hoa tokorua ki ngā whare noho i ngā haora tōmua o te 29 o Āperira. I whakaahuatia rātau i runga i te CCTV e tatari ana ki ngā hīkoi i te 05:35. I haere a Mrs Maxwell ki te moe, ā, i whakaahuatia e tētahi o ōna hoa tana ngongoro i roto i to rātau whare noho i te papa iwa i te 06:50. Kotahi haora i muri iho, i te 07:51, ka hinga a Mrs Maxwell ki tōna matenga i te paenga o te whare noho 10E, i te papa tekau, e rima nga tāngata i nohoia e ngā tāngata tokorima mai i Rātata. Kua whakaūngia e te whānau o Whaea Mekisuere kāore ōna hītori moe. E hiahia ana rātau ki te mōhio me pēhea a ia i mutu ai i roto i te rūma, me te aha i pā mai i roto i te rūma. He aha te mahi a nga tāngata o Rātata? Ko ngā tāngata tokorima katoa - ko Hohepa Kura, ko Callum Northridge, ko Ricky Gammon, ko Anthony Holehouse me Daniel Bailey - i hoatu kōrero ki nga pirihimana i Paniora. I kī a Tēnā Gammon e inu ana a ia i roto i te rūma noho me Tēnā Bailey rāua ko Tāne Kahurangi, i te wā e moe ana a Tāne Holehouse rāua ko Tāne Northridge i roto i o rāua rūma. I kī a Tēnā Kahurangi he patoto i te tatau, ā, ka whakatuwheratia e ia ki a Mīhana Mekisuera, nāna i haere ki roto i te whare kaukau "tino riri" ka ngana ki te piki atu i tētahi matapihi iti o roto e whakarapa ana i te wāhi kītini. I whakaaro a ia he wahine a Mrs Maxwell i noho tahi me tōna hoa i tētahi atu whare noho, ka kī atu a ia ki nga pirihimana, ā, kua puta atu ia i te whare noho, a, e hiahia ana ki te hoki mai ki roto. I kī a Tēnā Gammon i āhua a Mīhana Mekisuere me te mea kua tangohia e ia tētahi mea. I kitea e tētahi pūrongo tūkino i muri iho he waipiro i roto i tōna pūnaha, engari kāore he tohu o ētahi atu rongoā. I kī a Tēnā Bailey i haere a ia ki te whakaoho i a Tēnā Northridge. I kī a Tēnā Holehouse e moe ana a ia tae noa ki tana rongonga i a Tēnā Kahurangi e hamama ana "Kei roto koe i te rūma hē," ā, kore rawa ia i kite i a Mīhana Mekisuera. I haere atu a Whaea Mekisuere mai i te whare kaukau ki te paepae. I rangona a Tēnā Kahurangi ki te hamama "kua peke te kōtiro". I kī a ia kāore a ia i kite i a Whaea Mekisuere e peke ana, ā, ka haere noa iho ia ki te paepae. I hopukina e nga pirihimana a Tēnā Kiriata i runga i te whakapae i te kōhuru, engari i tukua ia e rua rā i muri iho, kaore he utu, i muri i te āhua o te kōti. I tukuna e ia tētahi kōrero e kī ana he harakore a ia i tētahi hē, ā, i tohutohutia e tētahi rōia Pāniora kia kaua e kōrero mō ngā take ā-ture i te wā e tuwhera ana te kēhi. I kī a ia he "aituā kino". I pātaitia hoki ērā atu tāngata tokowhā i roto i te whare noho i te kōti hei wāhanga o te uiui e toru marama i muri iho. Ka hoki noa rātau ki Paniora, a, ka whakamahi i to rātau mana ā-ture ki te whakautu i ngā pātai anake a to rātau rōia. I muri i te whakarongo a te kōti, ka whakaputaina e Tēnā Northridge tētahi kōrero mō ngā tāngata tokowhā. "He aituā kino tēnei, ā, e whakakāhore ana mātau i tētahi pānga ki tēnei mahi whakararuraru," tana kī. "It goes without saying that our deepest sympathy goes out to Kirsty's family and our thoughts are with them all at this terrible time. " Kua tōia o mātau ingoa i roto i te paru, ā, kua whakamahia i runga i te āhua whakahāwea puta noa i tēnei tukanga, ehara i te hē o mātau ake." I whakahē a Kōrero Curry, te pāpā o Mrs Maxwell, i nga tāngata mo te whakautu anake i ngā pātai a to rātau rōia. Ka kī a ia: "He whakahāwea ki a mātau, kei te whakaroa noa iho i te mamae ki a mātau. He aha ēnei tāngata i mahi ai i tēnā? He aha rātau i whakaroa ai i to mātau mamae?" Me pēhea e āwhina ai te tangata? Kāore anō te kaiwhakawā me ngā pirihimana kia whakaū ki te whānau o Mrs Maxwell mēnā kei te tūhuratia tonutia tōna matenga hei kōhuru. Heoi anō, kei te tuwhera tonu te kēhi, ā, kei te tatari tonu ngā mana ki ngā hua o ngā whakamātautau DNA i tangohia mai i a Mrs Maxwell. Kāore anō tōna whānau kia pā ki te tūhuratanga a ngā mana Pāniora, ā, kua utua e ia te kaitirotiro tūpāpaku a Rawiri Swindle, nāna i whakatū te Mahi Anagram hei tirotiro i ngā ngohe a te kaipatu rangatū a Pita Tobin. E hiahia ana rātou kia whakapā atu tētahi tangata whai mōhiohio ki a rātou mā te paetukutuku Kirsty Maxwell, ka taea te mahi ingoamuna. I kī te pouaru o Whaea Mekisuere ko Arama: "I kī taurangi mātau hei whānau e kore e waiho he pōhatu mō Kirsty. Ko taku Kirsty tēnei. Kāore e taea te whakapono ki ngā āhuatanga e karapoti ana i a ia. Kei te noho tonu rātou, engari he aha atu anō taku mahi?" Ka pāohotia a Killed Abroad i runga i te BBC One Scotland i te 21:00 BST i te Mane 20 o Aotearoa, ā, ka wātea i iPlayer ā muri ake nei. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko nga pirihimana o Kenya 'i patua e nga pirihimana rangatira a Alexander Monson'
summary: I patua e nga pirihimana tētahi rangatira o Ingarangi i mate i Kēnia.
text: I hopukina a Alexander Monson, e 28, tama a Ariki Nicholas Monson, mo te kai paipa tarukino i te tauranga one o Diani i Me 2012. I ngā wā katoa e mau tonu ana tōna whānau i patua ia e nga pirihimana, i te wā i kī ngā āpiha i mate a ia i te rongoā rongoā. Kua taunakitia e te Kaiwhakawā Matua o Te Kaiwhakawā Matua o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa kia whiua e whā nga āpiha. Ētahi atu mea mai i Lincolnshire E ai ki te pokapū rongokōrero o TE WĀ, ka kī a Tēnā Odenyo: "Ehara tōna matenga i te mea māori, ehara hoki i te rongoā. " I whakapototia tōna ora e nga pirihimana, nō reira, me whiu e te kaiwhakahaere o te ture tūmatanui nga āpiha i whakahuatia." Ko nga āpiha e whakapae ana kei roto - ko Naftali Chege, ko Hoani Pamba, ko Charles Munyiri rāua ko Ismael Pamba - i whakahē hoki tētahi ki tētahi, ka kī a Tēnā Odenyo. I whakamutua e ia i mate te pakeke e 28 tau i te moto ki te māhunga me tētahi ahanoa pūnoa, i whakaekea i a ia e pupuri ana. I neke a Tāne Monson, ko ia te tama a te 12th Baron Monson me te uri o te pānga whānau i Lincolnshire, ki Kenya ki te noho tahi me tōna whaea o Hilary Monson i te tau 2008. I te wā o te uiuinga i Mombasa, ka kī a ia kua hopukina tana tama i muri i tētahi pō me ōna hoa i runga i te whakapae i te kai paipa, he momo tarukino. I muri iho ka korerotia ki a ia kua kitea tana tama i runga i te papa o te teihana pirihimana e kōruru ana. I kōrero a Mrs Monson ki te uiuinga, i tīmata i te tau 2015, ka toro atu a ia ki tana tama i te hōhipera i reira i mekameka ai ia ki tētahi moenga. "He tino uaua ki a ia te hā," tana kī. 'Whakaekenga kino' I roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna mō te whānau, ka kī a Ariki Monson: "He take whakaharahara kua tukua e te kaiwhakawā te whakataunga tika." "I patua ā-ture a Arehanara, ā, ko nga pirihimana o Kēnia i taua pō i te Teihana Pirihimana o Diani i puritia ai ia, e taunakitia ana hei whakawāteatanga." I kī a ia i pāngia tana tama ki "tētahi whakaekenga kino" i a ia e tiaki ana i ngā pirihimana, ā, i "mahue i a ia te takoto moe i roto i tētahi pūtau, ā, ā muri ake, i muri i te tēpu pūrongo o te teihana, kua whakakorea te aro atu ki te rongoā me te āhua o te tikanga". I kitea e tētahi tohunga rongoā takitahi i utua e te whānau i mate a Tāne Monson i te moto kino ki muri o tōna māhunga. I whakaaturia hoki e ngā pūrongo tūkino kāore ōna rongoā i roto i tana pūnaha i te wā o tōna matenga.

title: Haupae rekereke tiketike: I 'ohorere' ngā MP i ngā pūrākau waehere kākahu wahine
summary: Kua whakaaturia e tētahi uiui ki ngā waehere kākahu mahi te "whakahāweatanga whānui" ki ngā wāhine, kua kī ngā MP.
text: I ākina te tūhuratanga e tētahi petihana, e tautohetohetia ana e ngā MP, nāna i karanga kia kaua e hiahiatia he rekereke tiketike i te mahi. I kī ngā MP i "ohorere" rātau i ngā pūrākau i tukuna hei wāhanga o te uiui, arā ko tētahi kēhi o tētahi wahine i kīa kia tae ōna makawe ki te pūkenga. Kua kī te kāwanatanga kia kaua te kaitukumahi e whakawātea i runga i nga take ira tangata. Ko ngā waehere kākahu mahi "me tika", e kī ana. Neke atu i te 152,000 ngā tāngata i haina i te petihana i whakatūria e Nicola Thorp, mai i Rāwāhi, i muri i tana tukunga atu ki te kāinga mai i tana mahi rangitahi i tana whakakāhore ki te mau hū me te "rekereke 2in ki te 4in". I whakawāteatia i te Pāremata nā te mea neke atu i te 100,000 ngā waitohu. I kī a Helen Jones, e tūtaki ana i te Komiti Petihana: "He pai ki te kī atu i ohorere mātau i te mea i kitea e mātau. " I kitea e mātou ngā āhuatanga he nui ake [ki te] - e kī ana ahau i ngā tau 1950 engari tērā pea he tika ake ngā tau 1850 - i te rau tau 21. "Kua whakaaturia e [te uiui] te whakahāweatanga whānui ki ngā wāhine, ngā tirohanga tīwharawhara o te āhua o te wahine, te kākahu me te whanonga hoki. " Kua whakaaturia mai ngā āhuatanga tawhito ki ngā wāhine i te wāhi mahi, ā, kua whakaaturia e whakahāwea ana ngā wāhine i ngā wā katoa ina ngana rātau ki te whakamatautau i aua āhuatanga." I kī a ia he "huarahi roa" ki te whakatika i ngā raruraru, engari "e tika ana kia pai ake ngā tāngata katoa i te wāhi mahi i tēnei". I a ia e kōrero ana i roto i taua taupatupatu kotahi, ka kī a Gill Furniss o Labour kua pāngia e tana tamāhine tētahi whatinga metatarsal i te mau rekereke tiketike i roto i tētahi mahi hokohoko. "I tino tāpiri i te muhani ki te whara, i whakahētia ia he utu, he utu māuiui rānei i a ia kāore i runga i te utu mo te roa rawa," tana tāpiri mai. I whakaputaina e te komiti ōna kitenga i roto i tētahi pūrongo i te Hānuere, e kī ana e hia rau ngā wāhine i tiritiri i a rātau pūrākau mō te mamae i takea mai i te mau rekereke tiketike mō ngā wā roa, ngā whakaritenga kia mau pūeru whakaatu me te hoatu anō i ngā wā katoa. E kī ana he "whānui" ngā waehere kākahu aukati, ā, ko te ture tīariari "kāore anō kia tino pai ki te pare i ngā kaimahi i te whakahāweatanga i te mahi". Ka karanga te komiti petihana ki te kāwanatanga kia arotake i te ture, kia tono hoki ki te Pāremata kia hurihia mēnā e hiahiatia ana, kia pai ake ai.' 1970s diktat' I tūtohutia hoki kia "tino whakanuia" e te kāwanatanga ngā whiu e wātea ana ki ngā rūnanga mahi e kitea ana ki ngā kaitukumahi. Mō te kāwanatanga, ka tohe te Minita Ōritetanga o Caroline Dinenage ki ngā kaitukumahi kia arotake i ngā waehere kākahu me te whakarite i "ngā diktat wāhi mahi o te tau 1970" hei mea o mua. Kua tuhituhi a ia ki ngā tinana hokohoko matua mō ngā "mahi mahi tawhito, whakahāwea" i huraina i tēnei take. Ka kī a ia: "Neke atu i te 40 tau ā mātou ture ārai whakahāwea i tēnei rohe, engari he tūpono haumaru kua tīari ēnei momo waehere kākahu i raro i te hihiani, me ngā kaimahi wahine e whakamau ana i te whakahāweatanga nā te mea koia tēnā ngā mea. " E hū ana i roto i ngā rekereke, i ngā papatahi rānei, kei te whakaheke tātau waewae, ā, kei te huri ngā āhuatanga. "Nā tēnei petihana i tino mārama ai taua huringa ki te rohe tūmatanui." Ko te tikanga kia kaua ngā wāhine e mau i ngā mea i whakararurarutia, i te utu rānei kāore e hiahiatia e tētahi hoa tāne, ka tāpiri mai a ia. "Me tārua anō ahau e tino whakatau ana te kāwanatanga i aua whakaritenga kākahu e aukati ana ō rātou pānga."

title: £4.3m Rhyl harbour bridge delayed by cable theft
summary: Kua takaware tētahi piriti waewae me te pahikara e £4.3m puta noa i te whanga o Rhyl i muri i te tāhaetanga o ngā taura i te pae.
text: I kī te kaunihera o Denbighshire i tāhaetia ngā taura hiko me ngā taura whakawhitiwhiti kua whakatakotoria kētia. I kī te mana ā rohe kua takaware te tāutatanga o te tēka tuarua, ki te tonga tae noa ki te 4 o Hōngongoi, ā, ka whakatuwheratia te piriti i te wā o Mahuru. Ka karangatia te piriti ko Pont y Ddraig, (Dragon's Bridge), i tapaina e te tauira o te kura o Rhyl ko Leon Jones. E whai ana i tētahi whakataetae i waenganui i ngā kura paetata, ā, ka pōhiritia ngā tamariki katoa i whai wāhi ki te whakatuwheratanga. Tata ki te 200m (656ft) o te taura i tāhaetia i Aperira, ā, i kī te kaunihera o Denbighshire kua hopukina ngā pōhēhētanga. Ahakoa te takaware e whā wiki, ka kī te kaunihera e "pai ana te haere" o te mahi, ā, kua tāutatia te pou arawhiti 45m teitei (tata ki te 148ft). I tāutatia te tēka piriti tuatahi i te 10 o Hune. Ka katia te whanga i waenganui i te Tāite, 4 o Hōngongoi me te Rātapu, 14 o Hōngongoi mō te tāutanga o te tēka tuarua, e ai ki ngā āhuatanga hau. Ina oti, ka homai e te piriti te hononga whakamutunga i roto i te 15 maire (24km) o te paihikara kore waka puta noa i Conwy me Denbighshire. I tēnei wā, ko te Arawhiti Kikorangi anake te āputa i runga i te ara pahikara, ā, me heke ngā kaieke paihikara ki te whakawhiti i te wai.

title: Kātahi ka kī te kōtiro taitamariki 'i whakarerea' e te kaitiaki i a ia e oma ana
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi kaimahi kāinga tiaki nāna i whakarere tētahi taitamariki i te wā o tētahi haerenga e pā ana ki te mahi, kātahi ka kī kua oma atu a ia, e tīmata ana i te rapunga pirihimana.
text: I te mauria ia e Graham Mackie i runga i tētahi haerenga huri noa mai i ngā Taitapa o Pākehā ki te tiro i tētahi whakanohonga tērā pea i te Midlands. I a ia e hoki ana ka haere whakarerekē ia, a, ka mahue i a ia ki tōna hoa, engari kāore he koti, he pāhi moni, he waea rānei. I te putanga mai i te Kōti Karauna o Kānata, ka whakaae te tau 33 tau ki tētahi whakapae whakawiri tamariki, a, ka hereheretia mo te 15 marama. I korerotia ki te kōti i te wā e 18 haora e ngaro ana a Mackie i tētahi pūrongo teka kua oma atu a ia i tētahi wharekai kai tere i Kānata. Nā tēnei i āki te rapunga taitapa a ngā āpiha o ngā ope motuhake e toru, i mua i tana kitenga kāore i whara. I whakaingoatia e te Kaiwhakawā o Pita Davies a Mackie, o Church Street, Ecclefechan, Dumfries me Galloway, he "rūpahu pōhēhē, whakangāwari, kaingākau, kore whakaaro". Ka kī a ia: "Ehara tēnei i te take o te whakawā kino, he whakarere haere tonu tēnei."

title: Waiata tahi me Bono mo te Paraire Pai 'āe'
summary: Ko te pō tērā i puta ai te whakaahua tautuhi o te haerenga o Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te rangimārie.
text: Ki tētahi taha, ko te kaiārahi o Ulster Unionist i taua wā, ko David Trimble. I tētahi atu, ko te kaiārahi SDLP i taua wā, ko Hoani Hume. Ko te tangata i waenganui, e pupuri ana i o rātau ringa pēnei i nga kairiri whakawhiwhinga toa, ko te whetū toka nui rawa o te ao - ko Bono. I tutuki i te Konohete mō Āe, i tū i te 18 o Me 1998 i mua i ngā tamariki kura e 2,000, tōna whāinga. E toru rā i muri iho, ka tino tautokona e Aiarangi ki te Raki te Whakaaetanga Paraire Pai i roto i tētahi taupānga. Ko Tim Wheeler, te kaiwaiata matua o te pēne o County Down Ash, he tirohanga taha o te wā hītori - engari kāore ōna pūmahara o te pō i te tino māhorahora. Engari, ka maumahara a ia ki te whakatakoto waiata i runga i te rere me te tuku kita me ngā taputapu ki te pēne nui rawa o te aorangi. "Kātahi anō ka rere mai a U2 i mua i te mea katoa, ā, kāore rātau i mau mai i tētahi o ā rātou taputapu, me whakamahi e rātou ā mātou taputapu katoa," te kī a Wheeler ki a BBC News NI's The Sunday News. Ka mahara a ia ki te tono a The Edge mai i U2 i tētahi kita nā Charlotte Hatherley, te kaitā matua o Aha i taua wā. "I te ngana a ia ki te whakaaro i ngā mana. E ngana ana a ia ki te nui ake o te momo oro, ā, ka hīkoi ia i tētahi o ana pahikara, ā, he nui rawa te peke - ā, ka peke ia. He tino rekareka." Tērā pea i taumarutia rātau e Bono et al, engari ko Ash nāna i mahi te nuinga o te hiki taumaha i runga i te atamira i te pō, e tuku ana i tētahi huinga 40 meneti, kātahi ka mahi i ētahi uhi kua whakaritea wawetia ki U2. I taua wā, i te eke te pēne taitamariki o Downpatrick i te pikinga ake o te pānui me te manakohanga - ko ta rātau pukaemi tīmata, i te tau 1977, he angitu nui, he angitu arumoni, i whakanuia e ngā takahuringa reo irirangi taumaha mō ngā takitahi pēnei i te Kōtiro mai i Mars me Aue. I roto a Wheeler rāua ko hoa i te studio e hopu ana i te whai ake i te wā i whiwhi ai rātau i te waea - e hiahia ana rāua ki te whakauru ki tētahi konohete e whakahauhau ana mō tētahi pōti āe? "I puta katoa mai i roto i ngā rā torutoru ki taku maharatanga. Ki taku whakaaro he tino mārire noa iho mēnā ka tutuki te whakahau āe. "Ki taku whakaaro tērā pea i whakapā atu te whakahaere a U2 ki to mātau whakahaere i ētahi rā i mua. I roto mātau i te taiwhanga i Rānana, ā, i pēnei rātau: 'Ka taea e koe te whakawhiti atu ki Belfast i roto i te toru rā?' "He tino hira ki a mātau te whakauru. Ki taku whakaaro i whakaaro a U2 e hiahiatia ana e rātau he pēne o Aiarangi ki te Raki kia tino mahi ai te konohete - he tino pai." I tāpiritia e Wheeler, e 21 ōna tau i taua wā, me te kata: "He pēne tino nui, puta noa i te ao, pūrākau pūrākau a U2 mai i te tonga, ā, i hiahiatia e rātau ētahi tamariki mai i te raki - he tino pai te takirua, e whakaaro ana ahau." I whakaarotia te konohete koreutu mō te rangatahi hei pana whakamutunga hei āwhina ki te tiki i te pōti āe i runga i te raina i te wiki o te taupānga. Ahakoa he nui te whiriwhiringa o ngā kaipōti o Aiarangi ki te Raki e pōti ngāwari ana i te whakaaetanga mā te 71% ki te 29%, he iti iho te haumarutanga o te pōti "āe" i mua. I tūmanakohia kia kaha te tautoko a ngā Katorika i te whakaaetanga, engari i hiahiatia e te mahi te tautoko ā-hapori me te nuinga mārō kia haere whakamua. E ai ki te pūrongo a te Washington Post i taua wā, i āwangawanga a David Trimble. "Neke atu i te 70% kei te haumaru mātou. I raro i te 60%, kei roto mātou i ngā uauatanga. I waenganui, me āta titiro koe ki te whiriwhiringa, ngā rerekētanga matawhenua kia ngana ki te tiki whakaaro mēnā he pūtake haumaru rawa mātou hei haere tonu." E toru rā noa iho me ngā waea e rua ki a Bono i muri iho, i runga a Ash i te atamira i te konohete i te Waterfront o Belfast. "He meneti whakamutunga ngā mea katoa," te kī a Wheeler. "E mahara ana ahau i runga i te pahi whakatere e taraiwa ana i reira i te pō i mua - ki taku whakaaro i purua mātau ki runga waea pūkoro me Bono, e ngana ana ki te mōhio he aha ngā waiata ka mahia tahitia e mātou, me pēhea hoki te haere o te whakaaturanga." I whakatauria ka whakatangi a Ash i tā rātou ake whakaaturanga, ā, ka haere mai a U2 i te mutunga ki te mahi i ētahi tau ruarua me te āwhina mai i ngā tamariki paetata, tae atu ki ngā uhi o te Beatles' Don't Let Me Down me John Lennon's Give Peace a Chance. E ai ki a Wheeler, he "mātauranga" a Bono ahakoa i makaia ia e ia mō tētahi koromeke mā te karanga i tētahi tauhira a Ben E Kingi. "Ki te mutunga, ka huri noa a Bono ka kī 'me mahi tātou i a Stand By Me'. Kātahi anō ka unuhia e ia tēnā i te hau angiangi, kāore he whakatūpato. "E whā ngā tangi tino ngāwari, kātahi anō mātou ka tīmata ki te parirau, kātahi ka titiro mai ia ki a au, ka mea: 'Waiata koe i te whiti panuku'. " I pēnei ahau, kāore au i te mōhio he aha ngā kupu waiata, nā reira i kī atu ahau 'me mahi noa koe'." Ahakoa ēnei hiccups mārama, he tino angitu te konohete, ā, koia anō, i puta mai taua whakaahua tawhito. I mahara a Wheeler ki "tētahi whakaaro nui o te pai" i muri i te konohete i pā ki tētahi pēne e toru ōna mema mātāmua i noho i o rātau oranga katoa i raro i te taumarumarutanga o ngā Raruraru. "I ngā wā katoa ka tino mārire te haere mai ki Belfast. I ngā wāhi katoa te Ope Taua, ā, i ngā wā katoa ka pōma ngā tuma me ngā mahi i to mātau taone. "E mahara ana ahau i runga ahau i Belfast, a, i kite ahau i tētahi pirihimana kātahi anō ka pūhia, ā, kei te hipokina ki roto i te pēke tinana. " I a koe e tamariki ana, ka haere tonu koe me te whakaaro he mea noa iho. A, no to mātau tīmatanga ki te haere i te ao, ka mōhio koe he wāhi tino rerekē tērā ki te tipu ake." E rua tekau tau mai i taua pō, ā, ko te taupānga whakaaetanga o te tau 1998, kua kore te kāwanatanga i Aiarangi ki te Raki. He āhuatanga "tino pouri", e kī ana a Wheeler, engari "kei te noho mātou i tētahi wā he nui ake te rangimārie". Tērā pea ka āwhina tētahi atu pō whetū i te Waterfront? "E miharo ana ahau! Ka kī atu a ia me te kata. "Āe, huihuia - mēnā ka taea e tētahi konohete te mahi ōrite mō tērā, me noho mātou ki te kōmaka." Ka taea e koe te rongo i te uiuinga katoa me Tim Wheeler a Ash i te Rātapu News i te 13:00 GMT i te Rātapu.

title: Kōtaha whenua o Togo
summary: He maha nga tau o Togo, he whenua whāiti i te takutai ki te hauauru o Āwherika, he maha nga tau i ūnga ai te whakahē i runga i tana pūkete motika tangata me te whakahaere tōrangapū.
text: I tukuna he rangatiratanga mai i Wīwī i te tau 1960, kua uaua a Togo ki te hanga i tētahi whenua pūmau me te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Kua rongonuitia te whenua hei wāhi whakawhiti mo te rei i whāia ki tētahi atu wāhi o te rohe. Kua ara ake te kaiwhaiwhai i roto i ngā tau tata nei puta noa i te whenua, i reira ka patua e ngā rōpū taihara he arewhana mō ngā tuka me te rhino mō ō rātou haona, i mua i te tukunga atu ki Āhia hei whakamahi i ngā whakapaipai me ngā rongoā e mōhiotia ana. Ko Togo tētahi o ngā kaiwhakarato pūkoro e rima o te ao, e whakamahia ana i roto i ngā maniua, engari ka noho rawakore tonu, e whakamauru ana ki te āwhina kē. FACTS Togolese Republic Capital: Lome Population 7.6 million Area 56,785 sq km (21,925 sq miles) Languages French (official), local languages Major religions Indigenous beliefs, Christianity, Islam Life expectancy 59 years (men), 61 years (women) Currency CFA (Communaute Financiere Africaine) franc LEADER President: Faure Gnassingbe Eyadema Faure Gnassingbe Eyadema succeeded his father, who died in 2005 after controlling the country with an iron fist for 38 years. I tāutatia e te hōia a Faure Gnassingbe hei perehitini, engari i muri i te kaha o te pēhanga o te kāinga, o te ao whānui, ka karangatia e ia he pōti. E hia rau i mate i te whakatūpato i tōna wikitōria i roto i aua panekōrero. E toru anō ngā pōti i toa ai a Gnassingbe, i te tau 2010, 2015 me te 2020. I whakahētia katoatia e te ātete. Nā ngā huringa ā-ture i te tau 2019 i whakaae ai a Perehitini Gnassingbe ki te rapu pōti anō, ā, ka noho pea ki te tari tae noa ki te tau 2030 - he take i whakaoho i ngā whakahē nui i te tau 2017-18. Ko te Reo Irirangi PĀPĀHO te mea tino rongonui, otirā i ngā wāhi taone. Ko te teihana pouaka whakaata matua ko te Pouaka Whakaata Togolaise a te kāwanatanga. Ka whakahaere hoki te kāwanatanga i a Togo-Presse i ia rā. Kua nui haere te pāpāho tūmataiti. He tini ngā reo irirangi arumoni, hapori hoki, me ngā nūpepa ā-wiki, tae atu ki ētahi teihana pouaka whakaata tūmataiti. I whakaurua tētahi waehere pene e whakahē ana i ngā hara pāpāho i te tau 2015, e whakaara ana i ngā āwangawanga wāteatanga pāpāho. RĀRANGI WĀ Ko ētahi mahi matua i roto i te hītori o Togo: 15-17th rau tau - Ko ngā hapu Ewe mai i Nigeria me te Ane mai i Ghana me Ivory Coast e noho ana i te rohe kua nohoia kētia e ngā iwi o Kwa me Voltaic. Heoi anō, i ngā tau 1700, ka nohoia ngā rohe takutai e Danes. 1884 - I whakatūria e te kaitiaki Tiamana o Togoland, he mahi tōpana i whakamahia hei whakawhanake i ngā māra. I te tau 1914, ka ngaro i ngā Tiamana a Togoland ki ngā ope o Ingarangi me Wīwī i te tau 1914, ā, i te tau 1922 ka tukua te wāhi ki te uru o te whenua ki Ingarangi, i te wā e hoatu ana ki Wīwī te rohe ki te rāwhiti e tētahi tono mai i te Rōpū o nga Iwi. 1960 - Rangatiratanga. 1967 - Ka mau a Gnassingbe Eyadema i te mana i roto i te kupenga toto, ka memeha nga rōpū tōrangapū. 1992 - Kua whakaaetia te kaupapa ture hou. I te tau 1993 ka memeha a Perehitini Eyadema i te kāwanatanga, ka tīmata i ngā whakahē me ngā matapaki kino ki ngā pirihimana. E hia mano e rere ana ki ngā tūnga noho tata. 2005 - Ka mate a Perehitini Eyadema, e 69 ona tau. Ka whakatūria e te hōia tana tama ko Faure hei perehitini, ā, ka haere tonu ia ki te toa i te pōti i taua tau, i te 2010, 2015 me te 2020. E whakakāhore ana nga rōpū ātete i nga hua he tinihanga.

title: Brett Kavanaugh: Ka tautuhia e te Senate te rā kati mo te whakaaturanga kaiwhakapae
summary: Kua hoatu e te Senate tētahi wahine e whakapae ana i te tautapa o te Kōti Matua o Te Kōti Matua, o Te Kōti Matua, tae noa ki te Paraire ki te whakatau mehemea ka whakaaturia e ia.
text: I tukuna e te Manukura o te Komiti Whakawāwā o Te Senate o Chuck Grassley tētahi reta e tautuhi ana i te rā kati o te 21 o Mahuru ki ngā rōia o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa. Kua tino whakakāhore te Kaiwhakawā o Kavanaugh, e 53, i te whakapae. Kua hui a ia ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Whare Mā i tēnei wiki. I whakapeka a Prof Ford ki te whakaatu ki te kore e tīmata te WHK ki te uiui i te kaiwhakawā. Kua kī ana rōia e whiwhi ana kaiako hinengaro o California i ngā tuma mate, ā, me neke ki te kāinga mai i te whakapae i ngana te tautapa ki te wero i a ia i te 36 tau ki mua. Kua tapaina e te Kaiwhakawā Kavanaugh, e 53, te kerēme "tino hē". Kua karangatia e te Komiti Whakawāwā o te Senate ki te Kaiwhakawā o Kavanaugh rāua ko Prof Ford ki te whakaatu - i te wāhi tūmatanui, i tētahi wātū kati rānei - a tērā Mane. Kua whakapekatia e te tīma ture a Prof Ford te tono a te Senate ki te whakaatu. I kī tana rōia o Lisa Banks i mua i te haerenga o tana kiritaki ki te Rōpū Nui, e hiahia ana a ia ki tētahi tūhuratanga a TE WHK ki te Kaiwhakawā Kavanaugh. I roto i tētahi kōrero i te Wenerei ka kī a Ms Banks ko te kaupapa a te Komiti kia neke whakamua me tētahi whakarongo e rua anake ngā kaiwhakaatu, "ehara i te tūhuratanga tika, whakapono pai rānei". "He maha ngā kaiwhakaatu kua puta tūmatanui ō rātou ingoa, ā, me whakauru ki tētahi haerenga," te pānui a te kōrero. "He koretake te tere ki te whakarongo, ā, e hāngai ana ki te Komiti e kite ana i te pono," ka tāpiri mai. He aha te take i whakaritea ai e te Senate he rā kati? I roto i tana reta ki te tīma ture a Prof Ford, ka kī a Tēnā Grassley "ehara i te mahi a te WHK ki te tūhura i tētahi take pēnei". "Kua whakatuwheratia anō e au te whakarongo nā te mea e whakapono ana ahau he mana tō te tangata e haere mai ana me ngā whakaaro o te tūkinotanga, ā, nā te mea ko te kawenga a te Komiti kia tino arotake i te kaha o tētahi tautapa ki te Kōti Matua," te tuhituhi a te Pākehā o Aotearoa. Ko te Senate, ko te manukura o te komiti, "me te Senate anake", e whakaritea ana ki te tirotiro i te tautapa o te Kōti Matua o te perehitini. "Kāore te WMA e aromatawai i tētahi aromatawai whakawhirinakitanga o ngā mōhiohio e whiwhi ana ki tētahi tautapa. " E kore hoki e whakaritea ki te uiui i tētahi take nā te mea e whakaaro ana te Komiti he mea hira." Heoi anō, i te tau 1991, i tūhuratia e te WHK ngā kerēme whakatoi ki te tautapa o te Kōti Matua i taua wā, o Clarence Thomas. Na te Whare Mā i raro i a Perehitini George H W Bush i whakahau taua uiui. E toru rā te roa, ka kī a TNN, ā, i ākiritia ngā kerēme a Anita Hill he koretake. I whakaūngia whāititia te Kaiwhakawā o Tamati, ā, ka noho tonu a ia hei kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Matua. E kī ana te reta a Tēnā Grassley tae noa ki te ata Paraire ki te whakarato i te komiti ki tana whakaaturanga me tana haurongo mēnā ka whakaaro ia ki te whakaatu a tērā Mane. I kī a ia i "whakararuraru" a ia ki te rongo kua anga atu a ia ki ngā tuma me te whakatoi, engari ka tohe ia ki te kōrero i mua i te komiti. "Kua rite tonu tō kōrero e hiahia ana a Dr Ford ki te kōrero i tana pūrākau. E tino tūmanako ana ahau ka whakaae a Dr Ford ki taku tono kia pērā, i te tūmataiti, i te tūmatanui rānei, i te Mane." Kua whakapaea ia e Prof Ford i te haurangi e ngana ana ki te tango i ōna kākahu i tētahi hākari whare i tētahi tapa taone o Washington DC i te tau 1982 i a rāua e taitamariki ana. E kī ana a ia i pinea ia ki tētahi moenga, a, ka whiua tōna ringa ki runga i tōna waha i tana whakamātau ki te hāmama. E kī ana a Anita Hill - nāna te whakapae ki a Clarence Thomas i tātuhi i ngā whakarara mutunga kore ki te tautohetohe a Ford-Kavanaugh - e kī ana kia kaua e hohoro te kaiwhakapae. "Kaua e whakatere i ēnei whakarongo," ka tuhituhi a ia i roto i tētahi wāhanga whakaaro mō te New York Times. "E kore e tohu noa iho ehara i te mea hira ngā whakapae whakaekenga ā-waha." He aha ngā kōrero a Te Tūruhi me ētahi atu Pākehā? I te Wenerei, ka tautoko tonu a Perehitini Donald Trump i tana tautapa, ka kī atu ki ngā kaipānui i waho o te Whare Mā: "He tangata tino pai a ia, he tino uaua ki a au te whakaaro i pā mai tētahi mea." "E hiahia ana ahau ki te kite i tāna kōrero [Prof Ford] engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te hoatu i ngā wā katoa e hiahiatia ana e rātau," te kī a te perehitini o Te Pākehā. "Ki te puta mai a ia he tino whakamīharo." I te Wenerei ka tūtohu te Senator o Te Whenua o Aotearoa, he "whakahau" kia neke whakamua i runga i te pōti Kavanaugh. Kua karangatia e ia te whakapae ki a Kaiwhakawā Kavanaugh "he tākaro puku". "Ka whakarongo ahau ki te wahine, engari ka katia tēnei e mātou," te kī a te senator o South Carolina. I kī te hoa o Te Pākehā o Susan Collins o Maine i te Wenerei e tūmanako ana a Prof Ford "ka whakaaro anō me te whakaatu" i te Mane. Ko Ms Collins rāua ko Te Senator o Aotearoa, ko Lisa Murkowski, he Pākehā ngāwari kua pōti ki ngā Pāremata i mua, nā reira ka taea e rātau te tārere pōti ina tae mai ki te Kaiwhakawā Kavanaugh. Kua karanga rāua ki te Kaiwhakawā Kavanaugh rāua ko Prof Ford ki te whakaatu i raro i te oati. I te Wenerei, ka kī a Senator Jeff Flake - nāna i kī i mua e kore ia e whakatau i tana pōti kia rongo rā anō i ngā whakaaturanga e rua - ka karanga hoki ki a Prof Ford kia whakaae ki te tono a te Senate. I tēnei wā, i kī a Senator Manapori o Claire McCaskill - e anga ana ki tētahi whawhai pōti anō uaua i Mīharo - ka kī a ia e "pōti kaua ki te Kaiwhakawā Kavanaugh". "Kāore taku whakataunga i runga anō i aua whakaaro, engari i runga anō i tōna tūnga i runga i ngā take matua maha, ko te mea nui rawa atu ko te horonga o ngā moni pōuri, ingoamuna e kuru ana i to tātau kāwanatanga ā iwi," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero.

title: Ka wehe atu te wahine Īnia i te kāinga mo te kore whare paku
summary: Kua toa tētahi wahine mārena hou i tētahi kāinga i te āhua o Īnia o Madhya Ppakikākā i tana uauatanga kia whai whare taonga i te kāinga o tana tāne.
text: E rua rā i muri i tana mārenatanga i tērā tau ka mahue i a Anita Narre te kāinga o te tāne o Shivram i tērā tau nā te mea kaore he whare taonga o te whare. E waru rā i muri iho i te hanganga a Shivram, he kaimahi utu ia rā, i tētahi ki ngā penapena me te āwhina a nga kōinga. I pānuitia e tētahi NGO he utu $10,000 mō Mrs Narre mo tana whakataunga "toa" me te whakahau i tana tāne ki te hanga whare haumaru. Neke atu i te hawhe miriona ngā Initia e kore tonu e uru ki te noho noho taketake. Kai te tāhapa te raruraru i Īnia ā-taiwhenua, a, ko nga wāhine e tino mamae ana. I kī a Shivram kāore i taea e ia te hanga whare taonga i te kāinga nā te kore moni. I whakaae a ia ka hoki tana wahine ki te kāinga i muri noa iho i tana hanganga i tētahi me ana penapena me "ētahi tautoko mai i te kaunihera kāinga". "Ehara i te mea pai ki nga wāhine te haere ki waho ki te whakaheke. Koia tērā te take me whai wharepaku ia kāinga. Ko te hunga kāore e tika kia mātua whakarite he kotahi," te kī a Mrs Narre ki te HAU. He tokomaha ngā tāngata i Īnia kāore e āhei ana ki ngā whare haumaru, ki ētahi atu whare horoi rānei. Engari i raro i ngā ture paetata hou i ngā kāwanatanga tae atu ki Chhattisgarh, e herea ana ngā māngai o te iwi ki te hanga i tētahi whare hauora i roto i tō rātou ake kāinga i roto i te tau kotahi o te pōtitanga. Ko te hunga e kore e mahi pēnā, ka anga atu ki te pana. Kua whakaurua te ture e whakahau ana i ngā whare taonga i roto i ngā kāwanatanga maha hei wāhanga o te puku "noho noho mō te katoa" e te kāwanatanga o Īnia. E whai ana te hōtaka ki te haepapa i te mahi o te whakahekenga tuwhera, e ngātahi ana i ngā wāhi taone rawakore me ngā taone rawakore o Īnia. Ka whakawāteatia he moni motuhake mō te tangata ki te hanga whare taonga hei whakatoko i te hauora me te haepapa i te mahi o te kohinga tūtae - te hamu rānei - e mahia nuitia ana e te iwi hahaka.

title: E tono ana te rangatira o te Rōpū Mahi Tahi a Richard Pennycook kia tapahia te utu nui
summary: Kua tonoa e te upoko o te Rōpū Co-op kia 60% te tapahi ki tana mōkī utu katoa nā te mea kua ngāwari kē atu te mahi.
text: Ka hinga tana utu take mai i te £1,250,000 ki te £750,000, ā, ka kite hoki ia i ngā utu tohutohu. Chief executive Richard Pennycook says the business is now back "in calmer waters" and the reduction reflects the revised demands of the current job. I kī a ia ko te utu utu "ehara i te rongo matua", arā ko te whakaoranga o te Co-op. Mō tēnā, i whakawhiwhia e ia te "tūponotanga" o ōna hoa mahi e 70,000. Ko Tēnā Pennycook te kaiwhakahaere pūtea o te rōpū, engari i riro ia hei rangatira nui i te tau 2014 i te wā i whakarerea ai e te rangatira o mua, a Euan Sutherland, i muri i te 10 marama i roto i te mahi. Ko tana mōkī utu katoa - tae atu ki te utu me ngā tāpiri - i pūrongotia he £3m. Me tono koe kia tapahia te utu? Kei te whakaekea e te Co-op tētahi mahere e toru tau hei whakaū i te umanga i muri i te putanga mai o ngā raruraru hōhonu i te tau 2013 me tōna pēke, ā, kua hokona nuitia e ia. Ko te kai me ngā nehunga I puta mai ngā rongo mo te utu a Tēnā Pennycook i te wā i puta mai ai te Rōpū Mahi Tahi - kei roto ko ngā pātaka kai e 2,800, e 1,000 ngā kāinga nehunga me ngā ratonga pūtea - i pūrongotia ōna hua pūtea mō te 2015. Ko te hua he £23m mo te tau, heke iho i te £124m i tērā tau, i te wā i whakarewaina te whika e te whiwhinga kotahi o te £121m mai i te hoko i ētahi wāhanga o tana umanga. Ko te hua i mua i te tāke ko te £81m, mai i te £73m i tērā tau. I kī te Co-op kua haere whakamua, me ngā hokonga i ōna umanga kai me te kāinga nehunga e tipu ana. Ko ngā hokonga i roto i ōna toa kai e 2,800 i tipu te 1.6%, kia whai hua ai te £250m. I kī te Co-op i te nui ake o ōna pātaka māmā i te mākete kai o UK, nā te mea kei te huri ngā tikanga hokohoko a te tangata i a rātau e haere auau ana ki te hoko kai. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, i pūrongotia e te umanga rangahau kai a Kantar kua piki ake ngā hokonga a te Co-op i tō rātou tere tere mai i te wā i hokona ai e ia te tauwhāinga o Somerfield i te tau 2009, e piki ana i te 3.9%. I tana umanga whare nehunga, koia te mekameka nui rawa o te whenua, ko ngā hua e £78m, ā, ka piki ake ngā hoko i te 9.9%. E whakaaro ana ki te whakatuwhera i tētahi atu kāinga nehunga e 200 i roto i ngā tau e toru e whai ake nei, e whakanui ake ai i te rahi o tōna pānga ki neke atu i te 1,100 kāinga. Arotakenga I te tau 2013, i tūtuki te Co-op i te kitenga o tētahi rua £1.5bn i roto i ngā moni a te Pēke Co-op. I whakaorangia te pēke e tētahi rōpū kaiwhakangao, ā, ināianei kei te Rōpū Co-op tētahi tūnga 20% i te pēke. I tērā wiki, i pūrongotia e te Pēke Co-op kua neke atu i te rua ōna hinganga tāke ā-tau ki te £610m, mai i te £264m i te 2014. Nā ngā raruraru i te Rōpū Mahi Tahi i arotakea ai te umanga e te Ariki Myners. Nā tēnei i tino tapahia ai te maha o ngā mema o te poari, ā, me whai tohu ngā kaiwhakahaere ināianei ki te whakahaere i te umanga.

title: Te tangi i Awherika ki te Tonga i muri i te kitenga o te wahine i okaina, e iri ana i te rākau
summary: Kua auau te hashtag #JusticeForTshego i runga i te Twitter i Awherika ki te Tonga i muri i te patunga nui o Tshegofatso Pule, e 28 tau.
text: I kitea tōna tinana i okaina e iri ana i tētahi rākau tata ki Rahanahana. E waru marama a ia e hapu ana, e whakahua ana te pāpāho paetata i nga pirihimana e kī ana. He nui tonu ngā taumata tukino ki ngā wāhine i Awherika ki te Tonga, ā, i tērā tau, ka kī a Perehitini Cyril Ramaphosa ko te whenua tētahi o "ngā wāhi haumaru kore rawa i te ao hei wahine". I whakaaturia e ngā tatauranga hara i whakaputaina i tērā tau, e 2,930 ngā wāhine pakeke i patua i roto i te wā 12 marama mai i te 2017 ki te 2018, kotahi te kōhuru i ia toru haora. I ngaro a Ms Pule i tērā wiki, ā, i kitea tōna tinana i te Mane, ka pūrongotia e te nūpepa o Sowetan. Ka whakahuatia hoki e ia te kaikorero pirihimana a Capt Kay Makhubele e kī ana kua whakatuwheratia he tūhuratanga kōhuru. I runga i te Twitter, kua whakahauhau te iwi i nga pirihimana kia kimi i te tangata hara, engari e pātai ana hoki rātau mehemea ka tika te mahi a te pūnaha tika ki a Ms Pule. I tērā tau, na te pāpātanga o ngā kōhuru wāhine i whiwhi i te nui o ngā whakaaturanga i ahu mai ki ngā rangatū o ngā whakaaturanga me ngā tāngata e karanga ana kia nui ake ngā mahi. Mai i taua wā kua whakatuwheratia anō ngā kōti hara tōkai motuhake - kua mahi kōaro rātou i roto i ngā tau tata nei nā ngā uauatanga pūtea, e pūrongo ana i te Pumza Fihlani o TE AO mai i Rahanaburg. More resources have also been directed towards both places of safety for survivors of abuse, as well as government-funded programmes aimed at changing men's behaviour, our reporter says. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: Te utunga o te utunga kōhua: Ko te raruraru puehu 'whakahāwea' a BICEP
summary: Ko tētahi o ngā kerēme pūtaiao nui rawa o te tau kua whiwhi i tētahi atu tūponotanga.
text: Nā Honatana AmosScience, i kī te tīma BICEP o Amerika kua kitea he tauira i runga i te rangi i mahue i te tere o te whakawhānuitanga o te mokowā i muri noa iho i te Pahū Nui. I tere te whakatau i te whakapae whakamīharo e ētahi atu i whakaaro tērā pea i whakahāwea te rōpū i ngā pānga whakararuraru o te puehu i tō tātau ake ikarangi. Ināianei kua whakarewaina taua whakamāramatanga e tētahi tātaritanga hōu mai i te aorangi Planck o te European Space Agency (Esa). I roto i tētahi pepa i whakaputaina i runga i te tūmau tā tōmua arXiv, ka kitea e ngā kairangahau a Planck he nui ake te puehu o te wāhanga o te rangi e kitea ana e te tīma BICEP i tāna i whakaaro. Ehara tēnei mōhiohio hōu i te tikanga kua mate te kerēme taketake ināianei. Ehara i te mea ināianei tonu. Ināianei kei te mahi ngā rōpū BICEP me Planck i tētahi aromatawai tōtahi o ngā pānga, ā, tērā pea ka tukua tēnei ki te mutunga o te tau. Heoi anō, mēnā ka whakaaturia te tautohetohe kāore e taea te tautoko i ngā raraunga e wātea ana, ka kitea he matekiri nui, i muri iho i te ngahau tuatahi me te kōrero o ngā Whakawhiwhinga o Aotearoa. Ko te mea i kiia e BICEP (e mohiotia ana hoki ko BICEP2) ko te kimi i nga whakaaturanga kua rapua roa mo te "utunga o te kohukohu". Ko te ariā tēnei i pā ki te Ao Nui tētahi tipu taupua i roto i tōna trillionth tuatahi o te trillionth o te trillionth o te hēkona. I hangaia te ariā hei āwhina ki te whakamārama he aha te āhua o te mokowā hōhonu i ngā taha katoa o te rangi - ko te ariā he tere rawa te whakawhānui i ngā wā tuatahi ka taea te whakaene i ngā tauritenga. He matapae tino tauwhāiti te utunga o te utunga - tērā pea ka haere tahi me ngā ngaru pūngao tō-ā-papa, ā, ka waiho e ēnei pārekareka i roto i te kākahu o te mokowā-wā he tohu tūturu ki te "mārama tawhito rawa" i te rangi - te Papamuri Ngaruiti Cosmic rongonui (CMB). I kī te tīma BICEP kua kitea e tana whātata i te Pou ki te Tonga tētahi tohu pēnei. Ko ngā 'pārekareka' kōhukihuki e kiia ana ko te whakarerekētanga aratau-B, ā, ka puta te āhua o tētahi hurihuri āhuatanga i roto i ngā āhuatanga aronga o te rama CMB. Engari he tino uaua te kitenga, i tētahi wāhanga nā te mea ko te whakarerekētanga aratau B tino ngoikore mai i te tata ki te 14 miriona tau ki mua, me wetewete i te whakarerekētanga e hangaia ana i tēnei rā i tō tātau Ikarangi Milky Way. Ko te pūtake matua o tēnei "turituri" whakararuraru ko te hurihuri i ngā kākano puehu. Ka mau ēnei korakora maha, ka tiaro ki ngā āpure autō e miro ana i tō tātau ikarangi. Nā reira, ka whakaputa hoki ēnei kākano i tō rātou mārama me te kounga aronga, ā, ka taea e tēnei te poke i tētahi tohu papamuri tuatahi. Ko te rautaki a te tīma BICEP ko te ūnga i te wāhi tino mā o te rangi, i runga i te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga, ā, i whakamahia e ia ngā mōhiohio puehu katoa ka taea e ia te pūtake hei mahi i te wetewete. Heoi anō, ko te āheitanga ki ngā raraunga puehu e whakahiatotia ana e te aorangi Planck o Uropi, nāna i whakamahere te rangi ngaruiti i ngā auau maha atu i te tīma o Amerika. Mā tēnei e ngāwari ake ai te whakaahua i te puehu me te kite i ōna pānga whakararuraru. Ko te pūrongo Planck i roto i te pepa arXiv e whakamārama ana i ngā āhuatanga polarisation puehu puta noa i tētahi wāhi nui o te rangi i ngā pae waenga me ngā pae tiketike. He iti noa iho te wāhanga o aua āpure e hāngai ana ki te BICEP, engari kāore ngā hua i te whakahauhau. He nui ake te puehu i roto i te "rua ki te tonga" o BICEP i te mea i tūmanakohia. He pono, ko te nuinga o te tohu o Amerika - tērā pea ko te katoa - tērā pea i takea mai i te puehu. "Tērā pea, engari he tino tiketike te hapa i roto i tā mātou inenga," te kī a te kaipūtaiao Planck, a Dr Cécile Renault. "Ko te whakamutunga me tātari tahi tātou i ngā raraunga - BICEP me Planck - kia whiwhi ai i te tohu ā-ao tika [versus]. He tino moata rawa ki te kōrero." Kua whakahekea kētia e te rōpū Amerika te maia ki tōna ake hua i te wā i whakaputaina ai tētahi pepa mō te kerēme utunga moni i roto i ngā Reta Arotake Ā-Tinana i June. I te tirohanga a te tokomaha o ngā kaiwaiata, ka rūrū kē atu te tātaritanga hou o Planck i taua maia. Ko te pānuitanga 'moata' ka kī taurangi ngā kairangahau Planck ki te pūrongo anō mō tā rātou ake rapunga mō tētahi tohu whakarerekētanga tuatahi ākuanei (tērā pea i te wā kotahi me te pepa hono ki te BICEP). He rerekē tā rātou huarahi ki te mea o Amerika "He whānui ake te whānuitanga o Planck, ā, kua whakamaheretia te rangi katoa; He tairongo ake te BICEP2, engari kotahi anake te auautanga, ā, he iti noa iho te āpure tirohanga," te whakamārama a Prof Peter Coles mai i te Whare Wānanga o Sussex, nāna i aroturuki te pūrākau e tipu ana i tana rangitaki, In The Dark. "I waenganui i a rātou ka taea pea e rātou te tāutu i tētahi pūtake nui o te whakarerekētanga i runga ake i te papamua, nā reira ehara i te mea e kore e taea te wehe i tētahi wae ngaru tō-ā-papa. Heoi anō, he mahi uaua tēnā, ā, kāore he taurangi ka mahi. Me tatari noa mātou kia kite." Engari ko te mea e taea ana te kōrero ināianei, ka tāpiri mai a Prof Coles, ko te kerēme a BICEP o Poutāpeta "he moata, ki te kōrero iti rawa". Ahakoa kāore i tutuki ngā tohu a Amerika me Ūropi i tēnei wā, ka tohu ēnei rōpū i te huarahi mō ngā kitenga ā muri ake e whakaritea ana ki te hangarau tiketike. Ināianei kua kitea e Planck ētahi wāhanga o te rangi he iti iho te puehu i te wāhi i tirohia e BICEP. "Ki te titiro koe ki ngā mahere kua hangaia e mātou, ko ngā wāhi kikorangi kē atu me haere koe ki te kimi i te tohu tuatahi," te whakamārama a Dr Renault. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i runga i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: Kōtaha whenua o Whītī
summary: Kei Whītī tētahi o ngā ohanga tino whanake i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, e whakawhirinaki nui ana ki ana mahi tāpoi me te huka.
text: Mai i te rangatiratanga o Ingarangi i te tau 1970, ko te tauwhāinga i waenganui i ngā iwi taketake o Whītī me ngā iwi o Īnia i te pūtake o te nuinga o te whakararuraru tōrangapū i te whenua. E 300 moutere me ngā motu e 540 e marara ana i runga i te 1,000,000 maero tapawhā (3,000,000 km tapawhā). O ngā moutere e 300, tata ki te 100 e nohoia ana. NGĀ TAKE MATUA Te Whenua o te Pūmatua o ngā Moutere o Whītī: Te Iwi Whānui o Suva 900,000 Horahanga 18,376 km māra (7,095 sq miles) Ngā reo Matua Ingarihi, Whītī, Hīnī Hāhi Matua Karaitiana, Hinduism, Islam Life expectancy 67 tau (tāne), 73 tau (wāhine) Moni Tāra Whītī LEADERS Perehitini: Jioji Konousi Konrote Jioji Konousi Konrote i pōtitia hei perehitini i Whiringahora 2015. Ko ia te perehitini taketake tuatahi, a, ko te tuatahi i pōtitia e te pāremata. I tīpakohia ngā perehitini o mua e te Kaunihera Nui o ngā Rangatira (GCC). He roa tana mahi i roto i te hōia, te kāwanatanga me te ratonga whakawhanaunga. Te Pirimia: I oatitia a Josaia Voreqe "Frank" Bainimarama hei pirimia i te wā o Mahuru 2014, e waru tau i muri i te hurihanga i te kāwanatanga o Laisenia Wānanga i roto i tētahi kukitanga toto, e whakapae ana i te hāmate me te tītaha ki ngā Whītī iwi. He Whītī taketake i whānau mai i te tau 1954, kua roa te toa a Tēnā Bainimarama i ngā mana ōrite mō te iwi iti o te iwi o te whenua. More commonly known as Frank, he is sometimes referred to with the title Ratu to denote his heritage as a chief. E mahi ana ngā pouaka whakaata tūmataiti me ngā teihana reo irirangi MEDIA i te taha o ngā wāhi e whakahaeretia ana e te Kaporeihana Pāohotanga o Whītī. Kua whakamihi a Reporters Without Borders ki te "wairua ātete" o te pāpāho, engari e kī ana kua rāhuitia ngā kaipūrongo e tētahi ture pāpāho "draconian". RĀRANGI WĀ Ko ētahi rā matua i roto i te hītori o Whītī: 1643 - Ko te kaihōpara Tatimana a Abel Tasman te Pākehā tuatahi i haere ki ngā moutere. 1970 - Te rangatiratanga i muri i te rau tau o te ture o Ingarangi. 1987 - Ko te tuatahi o ngā kukitanga e rua e turaki ana i te kāwanatanga nui o Īnia o te Pirimia o Timoci Bavadra. 1999 - I pōtitia a Te Pirimia o Whītī tuatahi o Whītī, engari i te tau i muri iho. 2014 - I pōtitia te kaiārahi hōia o mua o Frank Bainimarama hei pirimia, e waru tau i muri i te hopu i te mana i roto i te kukitanga.

title: Te puni whakangungu o Ahitereiria i Nauru 'nanakia, whakaiti'
summary: He "nanakia" me te "whakaiti" ngā here i tētahi puni whakangungu o Ahitereiria i te rohe o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa o Nauru, e kī ana a Amnesty International.
text: E toru rā i noho ai ngā māngai o te rōpū motika i te puni tukatuka o waho, ināianei e 386 ngā tāngata. I kitea e Amnesty he teneti kōpikopiko, wera, mākū, kaore he tūmataitinga. Na te rangirua i runga i te roanga o te tautāwhi i ahu mai ai ki te hauora hinengaro "kino", e kī ana. Hei urupare, ka kī ngā āpiha e wātea ana ngā taonga me ngā ratonga tautoko. I whakaurua anō e Ahitereiria te tukanga ki waho i te wā o Mahuru i roto i tētahi tono kia kaua e haere mōrearea ki Ahitereiria mā te poti. I ngā marama tata nei kua piki te maha o ngā taenga mai. I whakatuwheratia tētahi atu pokapū tukatuka o Ahitereiria i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki i Te Motu o Manus i Papua Niu Kini. Kua huatau te rōpū Mahi whakahaere me te ātete kia noho pea ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku ki te rima tau i roto i ngā puni o waho i te wā e tukatukatia ana a rātau kerēme. Ko te 'whiu taumaha' i Nauru, i kitea e te Whakawāteatanga i roto i tana rīpoata, e noho ana nga taurewa i roto i tētahi puni 150m mā te 100m, i roto i ngā teneti 16 tangata, 5 tangata rānei i roto i ngā moenga tāpae me ngā ipu kirihou mō ngā kākahu. I tae te pāmahana ki te 40 waeine i roto i te pūhui, me te hauhau tiketike, ā, he iti noa iho te marumaru, ā, kāore he tūmataitinga. I te taenga mai o te tonotono i reira, ka waipuketia tētahi wāhanga o te puni nā te ua timatanga, ā, kua mākū ngā teneti me ngā moenga. Na te kore mōhiohio mō tētahi rārangi wā mō te tukatuka i a rātau kerēme whakangungu i te mamae o ngā taurewa. "He rite tēnei ki te whiu taumaha mo te hunga hara. I Ahitereiria, ki taku whakaaro he pai ake te mahi a te hunga hara i tēnei. Ahakoa e mōhio ana te tangata hara e hia nga tau e noho ai rātau i roto i te whare herehere, engari kaore mātau i te mōhio," ka whakahuatia e te Whakawāteatanga tētahi o nga taurewa me te kōrero. E iwa nga tāngata i te taraiwa hiakai, tae atu ki tētahi kāore anō kia kai mo te neke atu i te 40 rā, e kī ana. I kī a Dr Kiriata Thom o Amnesty he whakaaturanga mārama kua "hangaia te puni i runga i te hohoro, kaore he whakaaro ki ngā tangata e ngoikore ana i roto i aua āhuatanga pōauau". I takahia nga mana o nga taurewa, e kī ana a Amnesty, e nga kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria me Nauru. Ko te tikanga kia mutu ināianei tonu ngā whakawhitinga ki te puni, ā, me kati te pokapū, e kī ana. I a ia e urupare ana ki te pūrongo, ka kī tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga "ehara i te mea ohorere" kāore a Amnesty i whakaae ki te pokapū tukatuka, e kī ana i ngā rōpū "ātete ki te tukatuka ki waho, ā, i whakatūria te tautāwhi manene i mua noa atu i tēnei pānga". E wātea ana te kai me te wai i ngā wā katoa, pērā ki te uru ki te tiaki rongoā me ngā ratonga tautoko hauora hinengaro ina hiahiatia, ka kī te kaikōrero. E wātea ana hoki ngā mahi whakangahau. I runga i te tukatuka i ngā kerēme a ngā taurewa, i te mahi ngātahi a Ahitereiria ki te kāwanatanga o Nauru, ā, e tūmanako ana kia tīmata i ngā aromatawai i te tōmua o tērā tau, ka kī te kaiwhakaatu. I whakataua e te kāwanatanga kia whakatū anō i ngā puni tukatuka ki waho i a Aotearoa, i muri i te whakamutu i te kaupapahere - e mōhiotia ana ko te Rongoā o te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa - i te tau 2008. Ko te nekehanga, i taunakitia e tētahi pae tohunga, i puta mai hei urupare ki te pikinga koi o te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku e tae mai ana mā te poti.

title: Ka peke te rōpū whakatangitangi Hainamana i te kaiwaiata Rūhia i roto i te haupae tereina
