summary: Kua panaia e te Beijing Symphony Orchestra tētahi kaiwaiata Rūhia mo te whakahawea i tētahi pāhihi tereina nāna i tono kia tangohia ōna waewae i te tūru.
text: I muri iho ka whakapōhēhē a Oleg Vedernikov, engari ināianei kua panaia mō te tūkino i te rongo o te rōpū whakatangitangi. I whakaahuatia taua mahi e tētahi atu pāhihi, ā, i whakairihia tuihonotia, e akiaki ana i tētahi urupare riri mai i te iwi whānui. I puta mai i te wā o tētahi whakahau whai mana ki te aukati i ngā manene e tomo ana, e noho ana, e mahi ana i Haina. Ko Tēnā Vedernikov, e 45, te kaiwaiata matua o te rōpū whakatangitangi. I a ia e haere ana mai i Shenyang, i Haina ki te raki, ki Beijing i te pō Mane i tana whakauru ki te tautohetohe. Ko te ataata o te mahi - kua tirohia e ngā miriona tāngata i Haina - i whakaatu i a ia me ōna waewae tahanga i runga i te tūru i mua. I te whakahē a te wahine ki ōna waewae e pā ana ki tōna māhunga, ko te āhua nei ka urupare a ia ki te nui o ngā kōrero whakahāwea me ngā muhani i roto i te reo Hainamana matau. Ko tana urupare he maka pounamu wai ki a ia. Kua pūrongotia e te pāpāho Hainamana ka kī atu te kaitiaki tereina ki te wahine kia "wareware - he rehetoi a ia". E kī ana a Michael Bristow o TE HAU, i Beijing, kua patohia taua mahi ki tētahi whakaaro ārai kē i Haina, e whakaohotia ana e te kāwanatanga. A, i te wā e nui ake ana te arotahi ki ngā manene i Haina. I Aperira ka whakarewaina e te mana ā rohe i Beijing he whakahāwea ki te hunga kāore he whakaaetanga tika kia noho me te mahi i reira.

title: He pēhea te pānga o ngā whakaaturanga hokohoko ki te coronavirus
summary: Mai i ngā waea ki ngā mātakitaki, ngā rererangi ki te tarau, kei te whakakorea ētahi o ngā whakaaturanga hokohoko nui rawa o te ao nā te pakarutanga o te coronavirus.
text: He maha ake ngā kaiwhakahaere e kume ana i ngā takahanga i runga i te mataku ki te hora i te mate whakamate, me te maha o ngā mano o ngā kaitāri me whakarerekē i ngā mahere haere. Ko te whakakorenga kōtaha tino tiketike i tēnei wā ko te Mobile World Congress, i Pārera, i te mutunga o tēnei marama. Ko BT, Ericsson, Facebook, LG, Nokia, Kapa me Tiwhione i waenganui i ngā toa matua e tūmanako ana ngā manuhiri kia kitea. I te nuinga o te wā, neke atu i te 100,000 ngā tāngata e kawea ana e te takahanga, ā, e 6,000 o rātau e haere ana mai i Haina. Ehara i te mea ko te takahanga hangarau anake kua whakakorea nā te tīmatatanga. Kua karangatia hoki a Cisco Live, i tautuhia ki Melbourne i te tīmatanga o Poutāpeta, neke atu i te 8,500 ngā tāngata e tūmanakohia ana kia haere mai. Ko te huihuinga ā-tau mō te umanga whatunga o Amerika e noho ana i ngā kiritaki ki mua i ngā kaipūkaha me ngā kaiwhakahaere, he wātū whakangungu, me ngā takahanga whakangahau ahiahi. Te whatunga mō te whatunga, mēnā ka hiahia koe. Engari i kī tētahi karere i te paetukutuku o te takahanga: "Ko ā mātou kiritaki, hoa me ngā kaimahi tā mātou tino manakē, ā, e tino whakapono ana mātou ko tēnei te whakataunga tika i tukuna ki ngā āhuatanga o nāianei. Ko o mātau whakaaro kei te hunga e pāngia ana e tēnei āhuatanga." I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, i whakakorea e te kaihanga mataaratanga nui rawa o Huiterangi, a Swatch, tana tihi "Time to Move" mō te pāpāho me ngā kaihoko nā te coronavirus. I whakaritea te whakaaturanga o ngā hua rangatira hou a te umanga ki Zurich i te wiki tuatahi o Poutāpeta. Kei a Swatch te tini o ngā toa rangatira tae atu ki Omega, Tissot, me Longines. Heoi anō, i kī te rōpū e hiahia ana ki te "whakaū i te oranga" o ngā manuhiri, ngā hoa me ngā hoa mahi. Kua pāngia hoki te umanga ahua e te coronavirus i te mea kua karangatia te whakaaturanga hokohoko denim Kingpins i Hong Kong. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o te takahanga e kore te whakaaturanga, kua whakaritea mō te waenganui o Mei, e haere tonu nā te mea: "Kei te tino māharahara mātou ki te āhuatanga i Haina, ā, e mōhio ana mātou he tokomaha o ā mātou kaiwhakaatu me ngā kaitāri e pā ana ki ngā uauatanga tino nui me te rangirua nā ngā mahi ki te pupuri i te horahanga o te huaketo." I a ia e haere tonu ana ki mua, ko te whakaaturanga hau nui rawa o Āhia, e tū ana i tēnei wiki, kua taumarutia e te tīmatatanga. Ko te Singapore Airshow, e tū ana i ia rua tau, e kawe ana i ngā rau o ngā whare rererangi ā-ao i a rātau e whakaatu ana i ā rātou hua hou me te tūmanako ki te tuki i ngā mahi miriona tāra. Ko te maha o ngā kaiwhakaatu e kume ana i te whakaaturanga kua eke ki te 70, tae atu ki ētahi o ngā ingoa nui rawa i roto i te umanga ātea, tae atu ki a Lockheed Martin me te Bombardier o Kānata. "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i te mārire," te kī a Jon Grevatt, te kaitātari umanga waea o Āhia-Kiwa mō te kaiārahi hōia a Jane. "He maha ngā kamupene i konei kei runga i te pae, kāore he kaiwhakahaere matua o ngā whenua kāinga e haere ana. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, kāore e puta ngā hui kiritaki me te kōrerorero mahi pūnoa i tēnei tau," tana tāpiri mai. Ko tētahi takahanga pakihi nui kāore anō kia pāngia e te tīmatatanga ko te Geneva International Motor Show. Ko te whakaaturanga, e tū ana i te 5-15 o Poutāpeta, ko tētahi o ngā takahanga tino hira i roto i te maramataka umanga mīhini, hei pūhara mō ētahi o ngā whakarewatanga motokā hōu tino kōtaha o te ao. I roto i tētahi īmēra ki te BBC, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o te whakaaturanga e mahi ngātahi ana me ngā mana hauora kia parea ai ngā kaimahi, ngā kaiwhakaatu me ngā manuhiri i te whakapokenga. I tāpiritia: "Nō tēnei wā kāore he kaiwhakaatu i whakakore nā te tīmatanga o te huaketo." Kua pā hoki ngā takahanga tākaro, me te whakaroatanga o te 2020 Hainamana Grand Prix.

title: Te tono a te whaea i muri i te kitenga o te tamaiti i te autism i a ia e hiahia ana ki ngā rongoā paturopi
summary: E karanga ana tētahi whaea kia nui ake te mōhiotanga ki tētahi āhuatanga iti e mōhiotia ana e whakapono ana ia i huri i tana tama ngāwari i te pō.
text: E wehi ana a Alison Maclaine kei te hē ētahi tamariki ki te autism me ngā take hauora hinengaro ina tino pāngia e rātou tētahi mate ka taea te rongoā paturopi noa iho. I pāngia e tana tama e waru tau a Jack ngā huringa tuakiri whakararuraru, ā, "i ngaro te tau o tōna oranga". A, ka kī a ia i mahue ia "i roto i te pouri" i a ia me tōna whānau "kāore he kounga o te ora". Ināianei e whakapono ana a Alison e mate ana a ia i te Paediatric Acute-onset Neuropsychiatric Syndrome (PANDAS), i whakaohotia e tētahi mate streptococcal - he āhuatanga ka taea te rongoā paturopi ngāwari me ngā rongoā ārai ārai. I moe tētahi mea hē i tētahi Paraire o Hānuere i tērā tau, e titiro whakamua ana ki tētahi whakataetae whutupōro e tākaro ana a ia i te rā e whai ake nei. Engari i te taenga atu ki te wāhi i te ata Hātarei, ka āwangawanga a ia i te māharahara. I muri iho i ngā whakamātau maha, kāore i taea e ia te tomo ki roto i te whare. I te kāinga i Dumfries, ka mōhio a Alison he tino hē tētahi mea. Ka kī atu a ia ki te HAU: "I tīmata a ia ki te whakapōhēhē auau. I kī a ia kāore ia i te tika kia ngahau, kāore i tika kia whai hoa, kāore i tika kia whai mea pai, kāore e tika ana kia tākaro whutupōro. "I te mutunga ka ahu mai ki te 'Kāore au e tika kia ora, ina tae au ki te kāinga ka noho noa ahau ki waho kia whakatio rā anō ahau ki te mate'." Ka tae ki te wā moe, kāore a Jack i whakaae ki te whai uhi me ngā urunga, ā, ka tīmata ki te tārua me mate ia, kia moe rā anō ia. I te rā e whai ake nei ka totohu kē atu tana whanonga. Ka kī a Alison: "Ko tētahi o ngā mea kino rawa o te ao ko te whakarongo ki tō tamaiti e kī ana ki a koe e hiahia ana ia ki te mate me te tono kia āwhina koe i a ia." He aha te PANS/PANDAS? E ai ki te aroha PANS PANDAS UK, PANS (Paediatric Acute-onset Neuropsychiatric Syndrome) he āhuatanga neuropsychiatric e whakaohotia ana e tētahi urupare ārai hē e hua ana i te mumura o te roro o te tamaiti. Ko te PANDAS he huinga iti o te PANS, i whakaohotia e tētahi urupare ārai hē ki tētahi mate streptococcal e hua ana i te mumura o te roro o te tamaiti. Ka tere rawa te mahi, ka puta pea te tamaiti i ngā āhuatanga tae atu ki te māharahara, te whanonga whakatuki, te pouri, te pōhēhētanga, te moe me te tīmatanga o te mate pākaha. I mōhiotia tuatahitia i Te Hononga o Amerika i te tau 1998 i reira e whakaarohia ana e ngā aroha o PANS PANDAS te nuinga o ngā tamariki e 200 ka pāngia. I te tau 2018, i mōhiotia e te Rōpū Hauora o te Ao te āhuatanga, engari i te UK kāore i te mōhiotia whānuitia. Kāore he whakamātautau mārama mō te āhuatanga, nā reira me whakahaere e ngā tākuta ngā āhuatanga hinengaro. Ko te urupare wawe ki te rongoā paturopi, ki te rongoā ārai rānei, ko te mea e whakaū ana i te āhuatanga. I kī te aroha o PANS PANDAS UK i te rahunga ki te mārama ki te āhuatanga i te UK, ko te tikanga e hē ana te kōrero a ngā tamariki ki ngā Ratonga Hauora Hinengaro Tamariki me te Taitamariki (CAMHS). 'Tino pouri' Kātahi ka whakatuki a Jack, a, ka wehe atu i tana taina aroha, a Cara. Ka riri a ia, ka tīmata ki te whakahoki, ki te tākaro i ngā taonga tākaro pēpi. I roto i ngā marama e whai ake nei, ka auau te kitenga i a ia he autism me te māharahara nui. Engari kāore a Alison, he tohunga hinengaro hinengaro, i whakaae. Ka kī a ia: "I tae ki te wāhi i tino pouri ai ahau. " I whakaaro ahau kāore ōna kounga o te ora, kāore he kounga o te ora. Tērā ētahi wā i whakaarohia ai e au ngā mea." Na taua pouri i mahi ai a Alison i tana ake rangahau me te kitenga o PANS me PANDAS. I kī a Alison he rite te pānui i ngā āhuatanga ki te pānui i tētahi whakaahuatanga o tana tama me ōna huringa whanonga. I te mutunga ka kitea tūmataititia a Jack e tētahi tohunga tamariki i Ingarangi, ā, ka rongoatia ki ngā rongoā paturopi ngāwari. I mahi rāua i te pō, ā, ka whakahokia mai e Alison tana tama. Ka kī a ia: "I tino nui te urupare a Jack ki te rongoā. Kāore a ia i mahue i te tiriti i roto i te rima marama hāunga te kura. I muri i ngā rā e rua i runga i ngā rongoā paturopi ka hiahia a ia ki te haere mai ki Morrisons me māua ko Cara. I te āhua nei kua hoki mai a Jack." Kei te pōrangi a Alison ināianei, e whakapono ana mehemea i hoatu ki a Jack he rongoā paturopi i tana whakaaturanga tuatahi ki te GP i te Hānuere, tērā pea ka rerekē te putanga. Ka kī a ia: "He tino whakapōrearea te mōhio he ngāwari rawa te rongoā. Ināianei e kino ana ahau ki te whakaaro he tamariki anō kei roto i te āhuatanga kei a rātou tēnei mate kāore anō kia piki ake, ā, kua tukuna ki raro i tētahi ara hauora hinengaro/hinengaro kāore e taea te whakatika i te raruraru." I kī a Dr Tim Ubhi, nāna i whakatau te āhua o Jack: "Ko te raruraru i konei ki te kore mātou e mōhio ki tēnei āhuatanga, ā, ka waihotia e mātou, tērā pea he tamariki kei reira e mamae ana ka taea te rongoā, te whakapai ake hoki i ō rātou āhuatanga. " Nā reira he kawenga tā mātou hei tākuta ki te whakaaro mō tēnei hei here me te mahi i te mahi kia mōhio ai mātou ki ngā mahi a te here i te UK." I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Pākehā: "E whakamanamana ana mātou he ngākau pouri te mātakitaki i tētahi tangata e arohaina ana, engari i te wā e tamariki ana. " Kei te mahi tahi mātou me ngā hoa ki te whakapai ake i ngā putanga me te tautoko mō ngā pakeke me ngā tamariki whai āhuatanga āhua kore, me te whakarite kia whiwhi te katoa i te rongoā tika. "Kāore e taea e ngā minita te mahi, te whakaawe rānei i ngā whakataunga rongoā, ngā tikanga rānei, ā, e kore e tika kia pērā." Mēnā kua pāngia koe, tētahi tangata rānei e mōhio ana koe, e ngā take hauora hinengaro, ka taea pea e ēnei whakahaere te āwhina.

title: Ngā Āpiha Tēka Rererangi a te Hau: I whakaakona ngā kaihautū rererangi ki te kopere i ngā kaihopu
summary: E hia mano nga kaihautū waka rererangi o Amerika e mau pū ana i roto i te paihirangi. He aha rātau i mahi ai - ā, he pēhea rātau e whakaakona ai?
text: Nā Owen AmosBBC News, Washington DC I ia tau, e hia rau ngā kaihautū o Amerika e haere ana ki Artesia, New Mexico, ki te ako i ngā pūkenga hou. E 56 haora te roa o te whakangungu, kua horahia puta noa i te rima rā. Tae atu ki te 48 ngā tāngata kei ia akomanga. He kaihautū noa rātau, e mahi ana mō ngā waka rererangi pūnoa: Delta, hei tauira, United, Southwest rānei. Engari kāore rātau i te ako mō ngā rererangi hou, ngā ture hōu rānei. Kei te ako rātau me pēhea te kopere i ngā kaikaha. Tekau mā whitu tau ki muri, i roto i te 74 meneti, e whā ngā rererangi o Amerika i kahakina. Ko te rā ko te 11 o Mahuru 2001. Kotahi tau i muri iho, ka puta te Ture Whakahauhau Ki te Pūrarau, e āhei ai ngā kaihautū o Amerika - e mahi ana mō ngā waka rererangi o Amerika - ki te mau pū i roto i te paihirangi. I puta te karaehe tuatahi o ngā Āpiha Tēka Rererangi a te Hau, e mōhiotia ana ngā kaihautū mau pū, i Aperira 2003. Mai i taua wā ka haere ngā akomanga. Ahakoa tērā, kāore te hōtaka i te mōhiotia whānuitia. I tērā marama, i a ia e kōrero ana mō ngā kaiako whai pū, ka kī a Perehitini Trump "he tokomaha ngā tāngata kāore i te mārama" kei te rāhuitia ētahi kaihautū. He aha hoki ngā tūponotanga o tō kaihautū e pōkai ana i te wera? Kāore te kāwanatanga o Amerika e whakaatu e hia ngā kaihautū e mau ana, e kī ana anake "mano" kua whakaakona. E hunaia ana ngā ingoa o ērā e pā ana. I kōrero te AO ki tētahi kaihautū Amerika e whakaaro ana i te kotahi i roto i te 10 o ngā kaihautū arumoni 125,000 o Te Hononga o Amerika. "Tērā pea he iti iho," tana kī. He mea noa iho te kaupapa. He koreutu te whakangungu - pērā ki te pū - engari kāore e utua tāpiritia ngā kaihautū patu. Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i Artesia e wehe ā-tau ana ki reira. "Kua tūtaki ahau ki ngā rau o rātou," te kī a Erika Sarandrea, ko te tumuaki tuarua o te Federal Air Marshal Service, e whakahaere ana i te kaupapa. "Ko ngā kupu tuatahi i puta mai i taku mangai ko te 'kia ora'." E kī ana a Sarandrea - e mahi ana i tua atu i te tiriti mai i te Pokapū Hokohoko Ao i te 9/11 - e kī ana ko te nuinga o ngā FFDO, pēnei i a ia, he hōia (e whā tau a ia hei hōia taua o Amerika). "He tangata whenua rātau," tana kī. "E māharahara ana rātau ki te haumarutanga me te haumarutanga o a rātau pāhihi. E tino mau ana rātau ki te ngākau." Ka tīmata te whakangungu i roto i te akomanga, i mua i te neke ki tētahi wāhi tākaro. Ka ako ngā ākonga ki te kopere mai i ngā tūru me ngā tūnga tū, me te whakarite mō ngā kaihopu e ngana ana ki te tāhae i tā rātou pū. E whakaakona ana nga kaihautū kia kaua e tāia atu i te pailati - "E hiahia ana rātau kia katia taua tatau, kia mau te rererangi ki runga i te whenua," te kī a Sarandrea - ā, ka ako hoki rātau i ngā ture mo te rokiroki i ngā pū. I roto i te paihirangi, ka mauria e nga kaihautū nga pū i roto i te pūkoro. I waho, me kawe rātau ki roto i ngā pouaka maukati. "Ko to rātau mana [ngā kaihautū] e takoto ana i roto i te tēka rererangi," te kī a te tumuaki tuarua. "Kāore e taea e rātou te haere haere ki ngā pātaka, ki ngā mātāmua rānei me te pū i runga i tō rātou tangata." Ko te tikanga kia noho nga kaihautū patu i roto mo te waka roa. I muri i te whiwhinga whiwhinga i New Mexico, ka whakangungu ngā FFDO ia ono marama. Ā, ia rima tau, he tāmata e rua rā. Ko tēnei katoa, ehara i te hēneti tāpiri i roto i a rātau utu. "Kāore he nui e taea e mātou mō rātou i tua atu i te kī 'kia ora'," te kī a Sarandrea. "Ka tukuna e mātau he tiwhikete whakamihi ki a rātau ia rima tau. Ina haere rātau, ka hoatu e mātau he whakamaharatanga ki a rātau." Kāore anō kia kahakina tētahi waka rererangi o Amerika mai i te 9/11, nā reira kāore anō tētahi FFDO kia whakamahi tika i ta rātau patu. (I te tau 2008, ka pūhia e tētahi kaihautū he puare i roto i te pailati i a ia e ngana ana ki te whakaputu i tana pū). Engari i te ao whānui, e 55 ngā kahakina rererangi mai i te tau 2001. I roto i a Mātau, ko ētahi rerenga mōrearea - ko ērā e haere ana ki ngā wāhi mōrearea, e mau ana rānei i ngā pāhihi i runga i ngā rārangi mātakitaki - he rūma hau patu. Ko nga marshals, e whā marama neke atu rānei te whakangungu tuatahi, e noho ana i roto i te rūma. Ko ngā kaihautū patu tētahi atu apa parenga, ā, he māmā ake. I te tau 2013, i kī te uniana o nga kaihautū a Alpa, e $17 te utu o te kāwanatanga ki te whakanoho i tētahi FFDO ki runga i tētahi rererangi - i whakaritea ki te $3,000 (£2,100) mō tētahi rūnanga. E kī ana a Sarandrea ko ngā rūnanga hau, me ngā kaihautū patu, he whakararuraru hira mō ngā kaiwhakataetae e moemoeā ana ki tētahi atu 9/11. "E whakapā tonu ana ahau ki ngā hoa mahi puta noa i te ao, ā, e whakapono ana mātou he huringa ki taua mea," tana kī. "Ki a Isil, me Al-Mōrea, tērā tētahi whakamautanga ki te rererangi. Ki a au - ā, he whakaaro whaiaro - ko te taonga karauna [mō ngā pūtūtū]. "Eke ki runga i tētahi rererangi, whakahaeretia, ko koe te rōpū pūtohu tau tuatahi i te ao." Kāore ētahi atu whenua e rākau ana i ā rātou kaihautū, ki tā Sarandrea e mōhio ana, ā, kāore ētahi whenua e whakaae ki ngā kaihautū patu i tō rātou rohe. Engari ko te nuinga e mahi ana. "Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te noho i runga i te hōtaka āwhina visa [e āhei ana kia ngāwari ake te urunga ki a Mātau] me whai whakaaetanga rūnanga hau," tana kī. "Mō te nuinga o te wā, kāore ā mātou uauatanga." Engari me pēhea ngā pāhihi e whakahē ana? Ko ngā tāngata kāore e hiahia pū ki roto i te paihi? Ko ngā kaihaere e māharahara ana ki tētahi kaihautū patu me ngā raruraru hauora hinengaro, kino atu rānei? "He tino kaha te TSA [te kāwanatanga kāwanatanga] i runga i te tirotiro pūmau," te kī a Sarandrea. "Ko te tangata e uru ana ki te rererangi, ki te waka rānei, kei te haere tonu te tirotiro e haere ana. Ehara hoki mātou i te mahi ngātahi me ngā FFDO - e kōrero ana hoki mātou ki te waka rererangi. "Nō reira ki te kī tētahi waka rererangi 'E, he wero tā mātou ki tēnei kaimahi,' e mōhio ana rātou ko wai ā rātou FFDO, nā reira ka whakapā mai rātou ki a mātou. " Mēnā he āwangawanga, ka kumea atu e mātou i te hau, ka tangohia e mātou ā rātou taputapu. He tere rawa tā mātou mahi - ahakoa kei hea rātou i te ao." Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: E tautoko ana ngā uniana kaihautū i te hōtaka - ko te mea matua, ko Alpa, e hiahia ana kia whakanuia e te kāwanatanga te pūtea mai i te $20m ki te $25m i te tau - ā, kua nui ake te ohauru o ngā akoranga. Neke atu i te 20 tau a Bill Cason he kaihautū, ā, ko ia te perehitini o te Federal Flight Deck Officers Association - ahakoa, nā ngā ture o te hōtaka, kāore e taea te kōrero mēnā he FFDO a ia. E kī ana a Cason ko ngā āpiha tūao e tohu ana i "ngā mea tino pai i roto i tō tātau āhuatanga ā-motu". He uaua te whakangungu, e kī ana a Cason, kia "whakararurarutia, ā, i te mutunga ka hinga, tētahi atu whakaekenga kāhua 9/11 ki te iwi whānui rererangi me a tātau utanga utu nui". Ā, ko taua wā 74 meneti, i te rā o Mahuru 17 tau ki mua, e kore e warewaretia ākuanei. "He mea tonu kei muri i te hinengaro o nga kaihautū," te kī a Sarandrea. "E whakaaro ana rātau 'Tērā pea me māharahara ahau ki tēnei'. E kore rawa koe e mōhio."

title: Ngaro te poti Savannah mohoao i hopukina anō i Bristol
summary: Kua hopukina anōtia tētahi poti Savannah āhua mohoao i mawhiti i te whare o tōna rangatira e whā rā ki mua.
text: I ngaro te kararehe tāne 4ft (1.2 m) i tētahi kāinga i te takiwā o Sea Mills o Bristol i te ahiahi o te Rāhina, i mau i roto i te kāri o tētahi whare i ētahi tiriti i te ata Hātarei, i muri i te rongonga i roto i ngā ngahere pātata, ā, i whakawaia ki roto i tētahi pāka me tētahi wāhanga pīkaokao. I kī te rangatira o te ngeru, a Laura Page, i hari a ia ki te whakahoki mai. I kī a Hazel Richards, e whakahaere ana i tētahi paetukutuku e āwhina ana ki te kimi i ngā kurī ngaro, i whakamahia e ia ngā kāmera kararehe kia "mōhio ai ki te wāhi e haere ana te kararehe". "I whakamahia e au tētahi whānuitanga wera, a, ka heke i tētahi ara i tētahi wāhi ngahere," tana kī. "I rongo ahau i tētahi turituri rerekē i roto i ngā taratara mātotoru - ā, nā te mea he kaha rawa te marangai - he māeneene te paru, ā, ka kite ahau i tētahi tapuwae e mārama ana he poti nui." I kī a ia ka whakawaia te kararehe ki roto i tētahi pāka e Ms Page, e pupuri ana i te mīti. "I tua atu i ngā tohu iti e rua i runga i tōna māhunga, me te ngaronga o tōna kara, ki te kore e tino pai a ia," tana kī. "I tino rekareka a ia. I āwangawanga a ia ki te whakahoki mai i tana poti. I tino māharahara a ia." Ko te momo Savannah he rīpeka i waenganui i te ngeru kāinga me te Serval o Awherika.

title: Charlie Gard: E anga ana ngā mātua ki te 'whakahoki' i runga i ngā tuma hōhipera
summary: E kī ana ngā mātua o Charlie Gard kua pāngia rātau e tētahi "whakahokinga" i muri i te whakaaturanga a te Hōhipera o Great Ormond Street kua whiwhi ngā kaimahi i ngā tuma mate.
text: I kī te hōhipera i karangatia ngā pirihimana i muri i te whakatārewa i ngā whānau me ngā kaimahi. Kei roto te hōhipera me ngā mātua o Charlie i tētahi pakanga ā-ture mo te tautoko ora tonu mō te 11 marama te pakeke, he mate iranga āhua kore nei tōna. I kī a Connie Yates rāua ko Pirihi Gard kua pāngia e rāua "ngā kōrero tino mamae mai i te iwi whānui". I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Gard: "Ki te kore te tiaki tino pai a ngā tākuta i GOSH [Hōhipera Tiriti Nui o Ormond] e kore ta māua tama e ora, ā, kāore he rā e haere ana kāore mātou e maumahara ki tēnā." I kī a Ms Yates: "Kāore mātou, ā, kāore anō mātou kia whakaae ki ngā kōrero whakawehi, whakahāwea rānei ki tētahi kaimahi i GOSH." Heoi anō, i whakahē a ia i te hōhipera mo te kore tono i te iwi whānui "kia kaua e kōrero i tētahi mea mamae ki a mātau, ki o rātau tākuta me ētahi atu kaimahi". I a ia e urupare ana ki te kōrero a ngā mātua o Charlie i te pō o te Rātapu, ka kī tētahi kaikorero mō GOSH: "E whakamanamana ana mātou ki ngā kōrero a ngā mātua o Charlie, ā, e whakaae ana mātou ki te tūkino i tētahi tangata e pā ana ki tēnei kēhi e kore e whakaaetia. " He wā pouri tēnei mō ngā mātua aroha o Charlie ina hoatu ki a rātau ia tautoko." Ko Charlie, i whānau mai i te 4 o Aotearoa 2016, he momo mate mitochondrial, he āhuatanga e ngoikore ai te uaua me te tūkino roro kāore e taea te whakahoki. E hiahia ana ōna mātua ki te kawe i a ia ki te US mō te rongoā pūkenga. Kua ngaro i a rātau ētahi kēhi kōti hei tahuri i te whakataunga a te hōhipera kia whakaaetia kia mate i runga i te rangatiratanga. Ko te pakanga kōti hou rawa ko te whakaaturanga hou mai i tētahi kaimātai hinengaro o Amerika kua toro atu ki a Charlie i te hōhipera ki te whakatau mēnā me haere ia ki Amerika mō te hauora. E hiahia ana ngā mātua o Charlie ki te kawe i a ia ki Niu Ioka mō te rongoā whakamātautau, e kī ana te tākuta o Amerika tērā pea ka 10% te wā ki te whakapai ake i tōna hauora. Ka whakahokia te kēhi ki te aroaro o te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike i te Mane.

title: Tūkino i te kāinga: Tokoono nga wāhine i patua i muri i te pūrongo hoa
summary: Tokoono nga wāhine i Aiarangi ki te Raki kua patua mai i te tau 2015 ahakoa i mua i te pūrongo i o rātau hoa taikaha ki nga pirihimana.
text: E waru ngā wā i whakapā atu ai tētahi wahine ki nga pirihimana i mua i tana matenga, ka whakaaturia ngā whika i whiwhia e TE Rongokōrero o NI. I kī te whānau o tētahi o nga wāhine e hiahiatia ana he ture uaua ake hei pare i nga wāhine. Ināianei kei te whakaarohia e te whakaminenga tētahi pire hou hei whakakaha i ngā ture tūkino ā-kāinga o NI. I kī ngā pirihimana ka pōhiritia e rātau he parenga nui ake i roto i te ture mō ngā tūpāpaku. I patua a Connie Leonard i tōna kāinga i Maguiresbridge, County Fermanagh, i te tau 2017. I kī tōna tuakana ko Fergal me hoatu ki nga pirihimana he mana kaha ake ki te rutu i te tutu i te kāinga. I kī atu a ia ki te HAU: "He maha ngā take e whakaaro ana ahau tērā pea i mahia, ā, tērā pea i whakaorangia te ora o Connie." "Ko te tangata whakamutunga i te ao i whakaaro ahau ka pā mai tētahi mea ki a Connie." I whakaekea a Ms Leonard me tana tama ko Conor, e 55 tau te pakeke o Peadar Phair, he hoa o mua o Ms Leonard. E toru nga wā i pūrongotia ai e ia a Phair i mua i tana kōhurutanga, ā, kua tangohia e ia he whakahau whakahāwea kore ki a ia. I muri iho ka mate a Phair. Ko ngā pirihimana, e kī ana a Tēnā Rēti, me "mōhio he aha ō rātou mana, ā, ka pai te whakamahi i ēnei mana". Me "tika te aroturuki me te whai ake" me mōhio ngā āpiha "he aha ngā mahi e tika ana kia mahia e rātou". I kī te Ratonga Pirihimana o Aiarangi ki te Raki (PSNI), nāna i tuku ngā whika ki te AO i muri i tētahi tono wāteatanga mōhiohio, ka pōhiritia he parenga nui ake i roto i te ture mō ngā tūkinotanga o te kāinga. I kī a Det Ch Insp Lindsay Fisher: "E ai ki te ture, e tino herea ana ngā pirihimana e te ture. " Nō reira kei te mahi tonu mātou i roto i te ture mō tā mātou urupare ki ngā take tūkino i te kāinga, ki tētahi atu hara rānei. "Ka pōhiritia e ngā pirihimana ētahi atu ture e tautoko ana i ngā tūkinotanga o te kāinga, ā, ka rapu ki te kawe mai i te hunga hara ki te tika." Na Det Ch Insp Fisher i tohutohu i te tangata e mate ana i te tūkinotanga kia "toro atu ki ngā pirihimana, ki tētahi mema whānau rānei". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei konei te PSNI ki te āwhina i ngā tūkinotanga o te tūkino i te kāinga, ā, he ratonga tautoko whakarei tā mātou." I kī te Minita Ture a Naomi Long kei te haere te tukanga whakakaha i ngā ture a NI. I kī a ia e whakaaro ana a ia ki te whakaurunga o ngā Whakahau Parenga Tutu i te Kāinga, e āhei ai ngā pirihimana i ētahi atu wāhi o te UK ki te uru atu ki te wāhi e whakapono ana rātau kei te mōrearea te tangata, engari kāore i te rawaka ngā whakaaturanga hei kawe mai i tētahi utu hara. Ka kī a ia: "Kua hainatia e au inapō i runga i tētahi tukanga whakaaro mō ngā whakamōhiotanga me ngā whakahau parenga tūkino i te kāinga. Ka pā mai tēnā i roto i ngā wiki e whai ake nei." Motuhake, ka hoki mai tētahi pire hei whakakaha i ngā ture tūkino i te kāinga ki Stormont i Tīma. Ko te tikanga e kore ngā hara tūkino i te kāinga i Aiarangi ki te Raki e whakawhāititia ki te whanonga taikaha ā-tinana. Ka hangaia he momo whakaweti, e mōhiotia ana ko te mana whakahauhau, he hara i Aiarangi ki te Raki mo te wā tuatahi. Ko ngā whakapae mo ngā hara tūkino tino nui rawa ka whiua e ia tae atu ki te 14 tau i roto i te whare herehere. 'Kāore i te tino pai' i kī a Sonya McMullan mai i Woman's Aid Northern Ireland e hiahiatia ana e ngā pirihimana "he mana pakari ake" e pā ana ki te tūkino i te kāinga. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore ngā ture kei ētahi atu wāhi o UK i konei i Aiarangi ki te Raki. " Kāore i te tino pai tēnā e pā ana ki ngā whakahau parenga me ngā whakahau ohorere e nui ake ai te mana o nga pirihimana ki te tango i te whakapae me te whiwhi whakahau i a rātau anō. "E hiahiatia ana e mātou ngā whakahau ārai ohorere me ngā mana e tango ana i te onus i te tūkinotanga, ā, ki te wāhi e whiwhi ai ngā pirihimana i taua raupapa me te kore whakaaetanga rānei a te tūkinotanga". Mēnā kua pāngia koe e tēnei pūrākau, ka kitea e koe ētahi atu mōhiohio me te tautoko i te paetukutuku o te Raina Hohenga o TE HAU: http://bbc.co.uk/actionline

title: I tonoa e ngā kaiwhakawā nekeneke o Amerika kia tukatuka i ngā kēhi e 700 i te tau
summary: Me whakanui ake te pēhanga a te tari ture o Amerika ki ngā kaiwhakawā ki te whakatere ake i te tukanga o ngā kēhi nekeneke, te pūrongo pāpāho o Amerika.
text: Me whakawātea e ngā kaiwhakawā kia 700 neke atu rānei ngā kēhi i te tau kia whiwhi ai i tētahi whakatauranga mahinga "pai". Engari ka whakatūpato ngā kaiwhakawāwā i te kaupapa ka kite i ngā whakarongo e rere ana, e whakararuraru ana, e 600,000 e tatari ana kia rangona ā rātou kēhi nekeneke. Kua tonoa e Perehitini Trump he ture hou "uaua" i ngā rā tata nei. Kua whakairihia e ia ētahi tuhituhi e pēhi ana i ngā kaipānui kia "mahi ināianei". E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere whakahaere kei te mahi rātou i tētahi mōkī ture hōu hei kati i ngā "mārō" i roto i te ture nekeneke o nāianei, ā, ka whakamahia pea te "kōwhiringa karihi" hei pana i roto i te Kāwanatanga me te nuinga iti iho mēnā e hiahiatia ana, ka pūrongotia e te Pēhi Pāhono. He aha ngā huringa? E mahi ana te Rōia Matua o Amerika i ngā kaupapa here hōu hei āwhina ki te whakawātea i te whakaputunga o ngā kēhi tārewa i ngā kōti manene. I roto i ōna tohutohu, ka kī te tari ture mā te tautuhi i tētahi mōkito ā-tau i runga i te maha o ngā kēhi i tukatukatia ka oti ngā whakarongo i runga i te "āhua tika, māia, tika hoki". I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te tari o Devin O'Malley i oti i ngā kaiwhakawā te toharite o ngā kēhi e 678 i te tau, engari i oti i ētahi kaiwhakawā neke atu i te 1,000 ngā kēhi, ka pūrongotia e te Washington Post. Engari i kī atu te National Association of Immigration Judges (NAIJ) ki te Poutāpeta ka puta pea te pūnaha ki ngā uauatanga ā-ture. "Tērā pea ka pātai ki te taparenga me te tōkeketanga o te kōti mēnā ka whakaawetia te whakataunga a te kaiwhakawā e ngā take i waho o ngā take o te kēhi, mēnā rānei ka whakahētia ngā nekeneke i te āwangawanga a te kaiwhakawā ki te pupuri i tana mahi," te kī a te Perehitini o NAIJ, a Te Perehitini o NAIJ, a Te Perehitini o Te Wānanga. I kī atu te American Immigration Lawyers Association (AILA) ki te paetukutuku Daily Beast kia kaua ngā kaiwhakawā e pēhi tika ki te whakawātea i te whakaputunga kēhi. "E tino māharahara ana mātou ka rere ngā take i roto i te pūnaha, ā, ka karohia te tukanga tika ki ēnei tohatoha hōu," te kī a te Tohutohu Kaupapahere Matua o AILA, a Laura Lynch.

title: A14 Cambridgeshire: he iti iho te utu e manakohia ana e te akoranga
summary: Ko te akoranga hou rawa ki tētahi aronui £1.5bn i whakaritea hei whakapai ake i te A14 i Cambridgeshire e manakohia ana he utu iti iho i te mea i marohitia i mua.
text: I kī te pūrongo a te kaitohutohu mā te haurua o te utu ki te £1 mō ngā motokā me te £2 mō ngā taraka ka whakaheke i te maha o ngā atekōkiri e neke ana ki ngā huarahi wātea o te rohe. I kī ngā kaiwhakawāwā kāore tonu rātau i te mōhio he whirinoa te utu i te kaupapa mā te whakamahi tāke. I kī te kāwanatanga ka nui te koha o te tawhiti. Kua kī te Tari Waka (DfT) kāore e taea te tīmata te mahi i runga i te huarahi i mua i te tau 2018. I kī te mātauranga a ngā kaiwhakahaere pūkaha o Atkins he utu nui ake o te £2 mō ngā motokā me te £4 mō ngā taraka ka "uaua ake" ki te whakapōturi i ngā atekōkiri kia kaua e neke atu i tētahi huarahi tawhiti. New local roads Councillor Graham Wilson, who represents Huntingdon and Godmanchester on Cambridgeshire County Council, said: "The toll needs to be very low to stop people using local roads as rat-runs but if the toll is very low, then it isn't going to generate as much money. " He pai ake te pūtea i te huarahi mā te tāke ahuwhānui i te mahi mā te pūnaha tawhiti. "Mā te A14 kāore anō kia parea ngā kāinga paetata [mai i ngā atekōkiri e rapu ana ki te karo i ngā tawhiti], nā reira me āta titiro te taipitopito o te mahi tawhiti." E whai ana te kaupapa ki te whakaiti i te paheketanga i runga i te 20 maero (32km) o te A14 i waenganui i Cambridge me Huntingdon. E hono ana te huarahi i te tauranga ipu i Felixstowe i Suffolk me ngā huanui M1 me M6 mā Cambridgeshire me Northamptonshire. Ko te kōwhiringa hou rawa e huatau ana ki te waihanga i tētahi Huntingdon Southern Bypass e toru ara i waenganui i Trinity Foot tata ki St Ives me Ellington tata ki te A1. Kei roto hoki ko te whakahekenga i te viaduct o Huntingdon A14 tīariari mai i tētahi huarahi matua me te whakarato i ngā huarahi hōu e rua mō ngā waka paetata i waenganui i Trinity Foot me tētahi whakawhitinga Girton hou. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te DfT me te utu iti iho he "iti rawa" o te 8% o ngā waka ka wehe atu i te hipa hou kia kore ai e tawhiti. "Mā te utu, he iti iho te utu ki te kaihautū," te kī a te kaihautū. "Tērā pea ka homai e ngā tawhiti he iti noa iho o te pūtea e hiahiatia ana, me te nuinga e haere mai ana i te kāwanatanga matua me ngā hoa paetata." I kī a Honatana Djanogly, te MP Conservative mō Huntingdon, he mea nui "kei te noho tonu he huarahi kore utu pai i runga i te ara A14 hei whakamahi i ngā waka paetata". "E māharahara ana hoki ahau kia kaua ngā huarahi paetata e herea ki ngā HGV e whakawhiti ana ki te karo i ngā tawhiti," tana kī. "Heoi anō, i whakaaro ahau he pātai kē atu tēnei mo te whakahau i ngā rāhuitanga taumaha, kaua ko te utu tawhiti." E whakaaro ana te kāwanatanga i te taumata £1/£2 ka whakarewaina te £33.1m i te tau ki te 2031 (i ngā utu 2011). I kī te DfT ināianei e whitu ngā kōwhiringa hei whakaaro.

title: E 125,000 ngā haramono i mate i te tīmatanga o te mate i ngā pāmu ika o Lewis
summary: Tata ki te 125,000 ngā haramono kua mate nā te tīmatanga o te mate i ngā pāmu ika e rua i te Motu o Te Motu o Aotearoa.
text: Nā Andrew ThomsonBBC Scotland Marine Harvest i whakaū kua pā ki ngā pae i Loch Erisort e te huakita Pasturella Skyensis. Kua whakapārewa te kamupene ki ngā tāngata paetata e māharahara ana ki te haunga pirau i taua rohe me te kitenga o ngā taraka e mau ana i ngā ika tūpāpaku. E whakapono ana kua mau te pathogen i nga pāmu i te mutunga o Aotearoa. Ko tētahi ariā i muri i te putanga mai o te mate, ko te rerekētanga o te āhuarangi me te pikinga o te pāmahana moana ka mōrearea ake pea ngā pāmu ika o Pākehā ki ngā mate huakita. 'Tino whakararuraru' Ka tino ngoikore te haramono kua whakapokea, ka mutu te kai, ā, i te haerenga o te mate, ka mate pea. I whakapūtātia e te kaiwhakahaere tautoko pakihi a Marine Harvest, a Steve Bracken, he "tino nui" te tīmatatanga, ā, kua pā ki a ia. "Kei te rohe tata ki te 500 tāna te mate," tana kī. "Tata ki te 4 kirokaramu te ika, nā reira tata ki te 125,000 ngā ika kua ngaro i a mātau i roto i tēnei wā. " He tino whakararuraru, engari ka kite mātou i ētahi wā kei reira ēnei tīmatanga o ngā mate e uaua ana ki te whakamārama. I tēnei take kua kitea e mātau [Pasturella Skyensis] i mua." I kī a ia i kitea tuatahitia te pathogen i tētahi o ngā pāmu a te kamupene i Skye i te tau 2002. I kitea hoki i reira i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, engari i taua wā kāore te kamupene i te tino mōhio he aha tērā. "I tōna take kino rawa ka mate te ika, engari ka urupare ki te rongoā, ā, koia tērā e mahia ana e mātau i Loch Erisort i tēnei wā," te kī a Tēnā Bracken. "Ka whakamahi mātou i ngā rongoā paturopi hei whakahaere i te whakapokenga, ā, kua roa te wā, engari kei te kite mātou kei te mahi ngā rongoā paturopi. " Ki taku whakaaro kua puta tātau i te tino kino, engari kai te māharahara tonu mātau, ā, kāore anō kia puta i te ngahere. Kei te tino āta aroturuki mātou i te āhuatanga kia tino mōhio ai kei te ngaro atu te mate." Ko te whakamutu i te horahanga o ngā Taraka e mau ana i ngā ika mate e hia mano he āhuahira auau i te rohe i ngā wiki tata nei. Kei te whakamahia ngā kaikirimana tohunga ki te kawe i ngā tinana ki te tātua matua e purua ai ki roto i tētahi pūkūnatu anaerobic, ā, ka hurihia hei maniua wai. I kī te Kotinga Moana i mahia tēnei e hāngai ana ki ngā tikanga haumarutanga koiora pākaha. I te wā roa ake, e tūmanako ana ka taea te hanga i tētahi rongoā mō te mate, engari mō tēnei wā ko te tino manakē mō te kamupene ko te aukati i te uru ki ētahi atu pae. He tiketike te whakamōhiotanga o te ika i roto i ngā pāmu haramono, ā, ka tere te hora atu o tētahi ika whakapoke i te mate ki ngā mano o ētahi atu. I kī a Tēnā Bracken kua taea e te kamupene te aukati i te tae atu ki tētahi atu o a rātau pāmu ika i Loch Erisort, kotahi maero noa iho i Tavay. Kua pāngia te wāhanga ahuwhenua i Pākehā e ngā raruraru nui o te kutu moana me te mate gill amoebic, ā, e tūmanako ana kāore a Pasturella Skyensis e noho hei take nui tuatoru. Kei roto i ngā ika mohoao ngā momo huakita i roto i ngā ika mohoao, tērā pea ko te take o te whakapokenga, engari, e wehi ana ka mōrearea ake pea te rerekētanga o te āhuarangi ki ngā pāmu ika o Pirihitini ki ngā mate huakita. Kāore i te nui te mōhio mō te whakapokenga, engari i kī a Tēnā Bracken ka nui ake te ako a te kamupene mai i tēnei mahi.

title: Sawfish snout senses, swipes and swers
summary: Ka whakaaturia ngā ihu whakaharahara o te ika kani hei rākau whaiwhai katoa, e rongo ana i te pārurenga me te patu i a rātou.
text: Nā te korero kōrero a Rārangi BlackEnvironment, o TE Rongokōrero o TE RONGO, ka taea te tipu neke atu i te mita te roa i ētahi momo, kua tāutua i mua ka taea te rongo i te pārurenga mā ā rātou āpure hiko. Ināianei, kua whakaahuatia e nga kairangahau te ika e whakararuraru ana i nga niho o nga kani. E huatau ana rātou i roto i te Koiora o Nāianei he nui ake ngā kaiwhakangau hohe i te whakaaro o mua, e āwhina ana ki te tiaki i a rātou e tino hiahiatia ana. Kua whakarārangitia katoatia ngā momo e whitu hei Tino Mōrearea i runga i te Rārangi Whero e mōhiotia ana e te ao whānui. E huatau ana ngā kairangahau, i te nuinga o Ahitereiria, he ahurei pea te ika i waenganui i o rātau hoa i te whai ihu, i te rostrum rānei, e mahi ana hei okana pūoko me te rākau whaiwhai. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te karanga he pūhihi me tētahi rākau, nā te mea koia tērā - ka āwhina i a rātau ki te kimi i te pārurenga, engari ki te whakamate hoki," te kī a Pārera Wueringer mai i te Whare Wānanga o Queensland, nāna i ārahi te tīma rangahau. I mahia te rangahau mā te whakamahi i te ika kani whakarau. Ko te tikanga o ngā ture o Ahitereiria mo nga tikanga o te rangahau kararehe, kāore i whakaaetia te tīma ki te whakaahua i te ika kani e whai pārurenga ora ana. Engari, i tārewa kē ngā kikokiko mullet me te kikokiko tuna i roto i ā rātou kura, ā, ka horaina ngā kāmera ataata i raro i te wai hei hopu i a rātou. I horaina ngā āpure hiko ngoikore i roto i te wai, i raro hoki, hei tāwhai i ngā āpure i hangaia e ngā ika ora, e mōhio ana te ika mā te whakamahi i ngā huānga kōpaka o ngā electroreceptors i te taha o te pouaka. E whakaatu ana ngā pikitia i te ika kani e whakatata ana ki te "pārurenga" me te miri tūkaha, ka wero i te kikokiko ki runga i ngā niho o te kani, me te kaha rawa o ngā moto i ētahi wā ka wehewehea ngā paraka ika mate i ētahi wā. Ka whakamahia hoki e rātau ngā niho hei pine i ngā wāhanga mīti ki raro. I whakaaturia hoki e ngā pikitia kāore te ika kani e whakamahi i tō rātou rostra ki te raiwhara i roto i te parataiao, pērā ki ētahi momo pānga. Heoi anō, ka miria e rātou ngā niho ki raro, tērā pea hei whakakoi. E rongo ana te hiko i te rostra o te ika kani e whakanuia ana hei tohu, me ngā tauira e hokohoko ringa ana mō ngā mano tāra. I tino mau hoki nga ika mo te hokohoko aquarium, tae noa ki te wā i whakakorea e te Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species (CITES) te nuinga o te hokohoko ao whānui i te tau 2007. Mā te paepae niho hoki e tino ngāwari ai te ika ki te tāweke i roto i ngā kupenga hī ika; A, me te tokomaha e noho ana i ngā wahapū, ko te whanaketanga ākau me te ngaromanga o te wāhi noho tētahi atu take kua ūkuia ngā iwi whānui puta noa i ngā kōpae me ngā kōpae iti. Pēnei i ngā mangō me ngā hihi e pā ana ki a rātou, ka mōrearea hoki te iwi whānui i tō rātou tipu pōturi me te whakaputa uri. "Ko te ika kani i waenganui i ngā ika tino mōrearea i te ao," te kōrero a Sonja Fordham, te perehitini o te rōpū atawhai Shark Advocates International. "Ko ngā mahi atawhai - mai i te mātauranga ki te parenga ā-motu pākaha - e hiahiatia wawetia ana i ngā wāhi pātata me ngā wāhi ā-roto huri noa i te ao hei ārai i te ngaro me te whakatoko i te whakaoranga o ēnei kararehe whakamīharo." E tūmanako ana a Pārera Wueringer ka āhei tana rārangi rangahau ki ngā whakaaro ā-ringa e ora ai ngā kararehe. "Tērā tētahi āpure rangahau e tū mai nei e ngana ana te tangata ki te mahi me ngā kaha āpure hiko rerekē, āpure autō rānei hei whakakaha i ngā kararehe pēnei i te mangō me ngā hihi i ngā taonga hī ika," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero. "A, ki te mahi i tēnā, me mōhio koe he aha te kaha o te āpure e kawea ana e ngā kararehe. " Waihoki, i a rātau taua rongonui he tangata mangere ki raro; Ināianei kua neke rātou ki te tīwae wai ki te tango i ā rātou pārurenga i reira, kia rāhuitia ai ngā tikanga hī ika e whakaaetia ana i ō rātou rohe." Whāia a Rārangi Twitter

title: Ka whakapuaki a Megan Fox i te whānautanga o te tama a Noa Shannon Green
summary: Kātahi anō ka whakaaturia e te whetū o Karaihe a Megan Fox te whānautanga o tana tama, tata tonu ki te marama i muri i te tūponotanga.
text: Nā Steve HoldenNewsbeat kaipānui whakangahau i whakaūngia e te kaiwhakaari te tama, ko Noa Shannon Green te ingoa, i whānau mai i te 27 o Mahuru. Kua mārena a Fox ki te pāpā o te pēpi, ko te kaitapere pouaka whakaata o Amerika, ko Kōrero Kākāriki. "He tino waimarie mātau ki te whai rangimarie i ētahi wiki i te kāinga, engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te tuku i tēnei i mua i te mahi a ētahi atu," te kī a tētahi kōrero i tana whārangi Facebook. "I whānau ahau ki ta māua tama ko Noa Shannon Green i te 27 o Mahuru. He hauora, he hari, he tino tika a ia." I puta mai a Fox, e 26, i roto i ngā kiriata Transformers e rua, tae atu ki ngā whitiāhua o Te Tinana o Te Tinana me Hona Hex. I mārena rāua ko tana tāne ko Green, e 39, i June 2010 i Hawaii i muri i tētahi tautohetohe e whā tau i roto i tētahi wehenga poto i te tau 2009. E tino mōhiotia ana a Kākāriki mō tana mahi hei Rawiri Hiriwa i roto i ngā rangatū pouaka whakaata o te tau 1990 o Beverly Hills 90210.

title: Ko ngā pānga taha o ngā mātua e wehi ana i te 'whakakīa e te pāpāho pāpori'
summary: Ko te wehi ki ngā pānga taha o te kano ārai mate te take matua mō ngā tāngata e whakakāhore ana i a rātou, e huatau ana tētahi pūrongo mai i te Royal Society for Public Health (RSPH).
text: I waenganui i ngā mātua, i whakakāhoretia tēnei e te pāpāho pāpori, tae atu ki te haurua e tūpono ana ki ngā karere tōraro mō ngā kano ārai mate. Ko te pūrongo a te Iwi, e tautokona ana e te kamupene rongoā o Amerika ko Merck, i karangatia mō ngā pūhara pāpāho pāpori me te pāpāho kia nui ake te mahi hei whawhai i ngā "rongo kōrero". Kua whakaorangia e ngā kano ārai mate e hia miriona ngā oranga, ā, he āhua kore nei ngā pānga taha, e kī ana. "Ko te horahanga o ngā mōhiohio hē - mēnā ka pā ki te tangohanga o ngā kano ārai mate - ka tino tūkino pea i te hauora o te iwi whānui," te kī a Shirley Cramer, te rangatira nui o te RSPH. Nō nā tata nei i kī ai te āpiha tākuta matua o Ingarangi, a Prof Dame Sally Davies, me waiho e ngā mātua ngā pūrākau i horahia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau ārai ārai mate, ā, ka werohia a rātau tamariki. He aha kei roto i te pūrongo? Kei roto ngā kitenga o ngā uiuinga o ngā tāngata e tata ana ki te 5,000 puta noa i te UK mō tō rātou mōhiotanga me ō rātou āhuatanga ki ngā rongoā, pēnei i te MMR, te rewharewha me te HPV. Kei roto i a rātou e 2,600 ngā mātua, e 2,000 ētahi atu pakeke, neke atu i te 200 ngā tohunga rongoā, pēnei i ngā nēhi, ngā kairongoā me ngā GP. He aha te kōrero a ngā mātua? I te katoa, i kitea e te pūrongo he tino pai ngā āhuatanga o ngā mātua ki ngā kano ārai mate, me te 90% e whiwhi ana i a rātau tamariki i te werohanga auau. I te UK e 10, 11 rānei ngā werohanga rerekē, ko ētahi he maha ngā werohanga. Engari tata ki te kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā mātua i uiuia i kī kua kōwhiria e rātau kia kaua e hoatu ki ta rātau tamaiti te wero MMR, e pare ana i te karawaka, te pīpī me te rubella. Ko ngā take matua i tukuna ko ngā māharahara mō ngā pānga taha, whai muri i ngā rangirua mēnā i mahi te rongoā. Mō te wero rewharewha, kotahi i roto i ngā mātua e rima i kōwhiri kia kaua e hoatu ki ta rātau tamaiti, ā, kotahi i roto i te 14 i whakakāhore i tētahi jab HPV mō ta rātau tamāhine taiohi. I whakapuakina anō e aua mātua ngā māharahara mō ngā pānga taha tē hiahiatia. He take anō tā rātou? He pānga taha tō ngā kano ārai mate katoa, engari i te nuinga o te wā he mārire pēnei i te ānini, i te ngenge rānei, ā, ka pā ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata. He tino āhua kore rawa ngā pānga taha tino nui, e ōrite ana ki te iti iho i te kotahi i roto i te miriona kēhi, e ai ki te pūrongo. Kua tino whakahekea e ngā kano ārai mate te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e ngā mate urutā puta noa i te ao. He mea hira rātou puta noa i te oranga - mai i te tamarikitanga ki te pakeketanga, i tua atu rānei. He aha te wāhanga o te pāpāho pāpori? Ka taea e ia te hora i ngā mōhiohio hē, i ngā "rongo kōrero" rānei mō te haumarutanga o te rongoā, ahakoa he tino pai ngā whakaaturanga ki te hē, e kī ana te pūrongo. I kī ngā tāngata i ngā rōpū pakeke katoa he nui ake te kite i ngā karere tōraro mō ngā kano ārai mate i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i ngā mea tōrunga. Ka taea hoki e ngā mātua te whakaaweawe i ngā kupu matua tōraro i roto i ngā nūpepa me te tuihono, ā, ka roa pea te wā ki te huri i ngā whakaaro o te tangata. Ahakoa te 20 tau i muri i te whakaputanga a Andrew Wakefield i tana pepa kua whakawāteatia ināianei i runga i tētahi hononga whakapae i waenganui i te kano ārai mate MMR me te autism, "Kei te noho tonu a Uropi me ngā hua", te kī a te pūrongo. Kāore hoki ngā kaiwhakahauhau ārai ārai mate e āwhina. Ka āhei a rātau karere ki ngā kōrero māminga e pā ana ki ngā pānga taha, ā, ka tukitukia te whakaaro o te iwi whānui, e ai ki te pūrongo. He aha te tūtohutanga a te RSPH? E hiahia ana kia nui ake te mātauranga i ngā kura e pā ana ki te uara me te hiranga o te werohanga, hei āwhina ki te whakakore i ngā pūrākau e karapoti ana i ngā kano ārai mate. E hiahia ana hoki ki te kite i ngā werohanga e tukuna ana i ngā wāhi rerekē, pēnei i ngā pahū-ake tiriti tiketike, ngā whare tākaro me ngā pokapū hapori, hei whakahauhau i te tangohanga. Ā, e hiahia ana kia whiua e te pēhi me ngā pūhara pāpāho pāpori te "rongo kōrero".

title: National Eisteddfod 2019 to be held in Llanrwst
summary: Ka tū te hākari Eisteddfod ā-Motu 2019 ki Llanrwst, kua pānuitia.
text: I kī te rangatira nui o Elfed Roberts, e 30 tau mai i te haerenga whakamutunga o te hākari ki te Riu o Conwy. I pānuitia te pānuitanga i muri i te hui a te Kaunihera Eisteddfod o te Motu i Aberystwyth i te Hātarei. I kōwhiria a Llanrwst i runga i Abergele, i te takiwā hoki o Conwy, hei taurima i te takahanga, ā, ka mihi te kaiārahi kaunihera o Gareth Jones ki te taone. "We'll be supporting the Eisteddfod committee with their arrangements over the next 18 months as they prepare for their event," he said. I kī a Trystan Lewis, e tūtaki ana i te komiti paetata: "Ahakoa kei Llanrwst ngā Maes, he Eisteddfod mō te takiwā katoa, ā, ko te wero kei a au ko te whiwhi i ngā tāngata katoa ki runga i te papa - ngā kaikōrero Welsh me ngā kaikōrero Welsh - kia noho hei wāhanga o tēnei Eisteddfod mīharo." I kī a Elfed Roberts kua waihangatia katoatia ngā komiti, ā, kua "kaha kē te mahi". "E tūmanako ana mātou ki te tīmata i te mahi i te taumata pāpāho puta noa i te takiwā o Conwy, kia angitu ai te kaupapa me te hākari i te rohe," tana kī. I te titiro whakamuri ki te hākari o tēnei tau i Anglesey, ka kī a Tēnā Roberts kua mahue i te takahanga he nui ake te £93,200 ahakoa he nui ngā utu tāpiri nā te huarere kino me ngā whakaritenga haumarutanga. Ka kī a ia: "Ahakoa he kino te huarere i te mutunga wiki tuatahi, he Eisteddfod mahara tērā, ā, e tino whakamihi ana mātou ki te iwi o Anglesey, ā mātou tūao me ngā manuhiri tino pai mō tēnei." Looking forward to the 2018's urban experimental festival in Cardiff Bay, the council heard the local committee there was already more than half way to reaching its fundraising target of £320,000. Engari i kī a Tēnā Roberts kei te mahi tonu hei whakatika i ngā take rerekē - ko tētahi ko te whenua i Te Moana o Kānata nō ngā kamupene rerekē - ā, kei te haere tonu ngā kōrero ki a rātou mō te whiwhi whakaaetanga ki te whakamahi. Ka kī a ia: "Ka rerekē nā te tauwāhi. Engari he mea nui kia maumahara he ngohe i Kānata e tino ōrite ana ki tā mātou i Anglesey." Ka haere a Elfed Roberts i muri i te Eisteddfod o tērā tau. E tūmanako ana te Eisteddfod ki te whakatū i tētahi rangatira nui hou kia noho i te wā o Pipiri 2018 kia taea ai e rātau te mahi i te taha o Elfed Roberts i te wā o te hākari i Te Moana o Aotearoa.

title: Poole-Channel Islands sailings cancelled
summary: Kua whakakorea e Condor Ferries ngā rerenga tere katoa mai i ngā Moutere o Channel ki Poole a tērā marama.
text: I kī te kamupene kua hinga te tono i te nui o ngā whakaritenga taratahi i Guernsey me Jersey. I whakaahuatia e te rangatira nui o Paul Luxon ngā rāhuitanga "mārama" hei "moto anō ki a mātau". I kī a ia kāore e taea e Condor te whakahaere poti i te hautanga o te kaha pūnoa, ā, ka whakawhitia ngā tīkiti ki te ratonga taketake ki Pokapū. I Akuhata, i panuitia e te kamupene waka waka e 200 nga tangata kua whakakorea i Condor Ferries na te mate uruta coronavirus, i hua ai te 75% o te moni whiwhinga. Mr Luxon said the Poole to Channel Islands services would be cancelled between 6 November and 3 December. Ka kī a ia: "E mōhio ana mātou kāore i te roa te wā whakangahau, nā reira ka whakahaere mātou i tētahi ratonga mai i Poole i te 4 o Hakihea kia taea ai e ngā ākonga i ngā whare wānanga me te kāreti o UK te hoki ki te kāinga ki o rātau whānau i tētahi wā hira. " Our schedule will also support Islanders who are booked to travel over Christmas and New Year."

title: E waru nga whakatau a te kōti UAE i runga i te 'ataata pakipūmeka tinihanga'
summary: E ono ngā manene me ngā tangata whenua UAE tokorua kua whiua kia tae atu ki te kotahi tau i roto i te whare herehere mō te hanga i tā rātou kōrero he ataata tinihanga mō te ahurea taitamariki o Aotearoa.
text: I kitea e te kōti haumarutanga kāwanatanga he hara rātau ki te "whakahāwea i te whakaahua o te iwi UAE ki rāwāhi", e ai ki te nūpepa a te kāwanatanga, te Motu. I whakaūngia e te whānau o Te Whānau o Amerika, ko ia tētahi o ngā tokoono i hereheretia mo te tau kotahi, tokotoru o rātau i ngaro. Ko nga manene te tuatahi i whakataua i raro i te ture cybercrimes 2012. Ka whakarato i tētahi take ā-ture hei whakatau i ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i te hangarau mōhiohio hei whakahē i ngā mana matua, e tautohe ana mō te whakahōu tōrangapū, te whakarite rānei i ngā whakaaturanga kāore i te raihanatia. 'Kāore he hara e hiahiatia ana' I pūrongotia e te Motu he Amerikana, e kīia ana e ngā tīmatanga "S C", me ngā Initia tokorua, "R" me "A", i whiua kia kotahi tau i roto i te whare herehere, ā, ka hoatu he 10,000 dirham ($2,723; £1,666) te whaina. Tokorua ngā tangata whenua UAE, ngā tuakana -"S D" me "S D" - i hereheretia mō te waru marama, ā, e 5,000 dirhams, i te wā i murua tētahi tuakana tuatoru, "A D", i tāpiritia te nūpepa. He wahine Kānata, "S", he wahine Peretania, "L", me tētahi tangata Amerikana, "T", i whakawāteatia i te ngaro, a, ka whiua kia kotahi tau i roto i te whare herehere, a, ka whainatia kia 10,000 dirhams. I whakapaea ngā whakapae ki te tūkino i te Tuhipānui 28, e tono ana ki te hereheretanga mō te tangata e whakamahi ana i te hangarau mōhiohio "me te whakaaro ki te whakararuraru i ngā mahi, ki te whakaputa rānei, ki te whakaputa rānei i ētahi mōhiohio, rongokōrero, pakiwaituhi, ētahi atu atahanga rānei e āhei ana ki te whakamōrearea i te haumarutanga o te kāwanatanga me ōna painga tiketike, te takahi rānei i te raupapa tūmatanui". I whakairihia te ataata 19 meneti, e huaina ana ko Te Kura Riri o Satwa, ki YouTube i Whiringahora 2012. Ka tuwhera ki te kupu whakamārama: "Ko ngā takahanga e whai ake nei he mea pono, ā, kāore he hara i whakaritea ki te iwi o Satwa, UAE rānei." I tautuhia ki te takiwā o Satwa o Aorangi, he pakipūmeka tawai te ataata mō tētahi whare waihanga e whakaakona ai ngā ākonga ki te maka hū hei momo rākau, me te rapu āwhina mā te pāpāho pāpori ina hiahiatia he pūrua. I kī te whānau o Cassim i whakangahau te ataata ki ngā taitamariki i Aotearoa e kāhua ana i a rātau hei "gangstas" engari i mōhiotia kē atu mō tō rātou whanonga māmā. I kī te Pokapū Emirates mō ngā Motika Tangata (ECHR) i whakakorea te āheitanga tika ki ngā rōia, ā, ka waitohu i ngā tuhinga kāore rātau i mārama. "Kei te mamae ēnei kaipūkino rangatahi i ngā hua o ngā mana e nui haere ana te tairongo ki ngā momo whakahē, ahakoa te māmā. Kua whakatakotoria e tēnei kēhi he raruraru ki te tukanga ā-ture me ngā ture ipurangi whāiti i te UAE," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere o te ECHR, a Rori Donaghy.

title: Ka pēhea te āhua o te tauwhiro o Te Pakihi?
summary: Ko te ariā o tētahi wā tauwhiro i muri i te wā o Te Wānanga e kōrerotia ana i te nuinga o te wā. Engari he iti rawa te whakaaro whakaaro ki tōna āhua.
text: Nā Ben WrightTe korero tōrangapū, BBC News Bespoke, off-the-stick rānei? I roto i ngā kupu makaro o Te Pakihi, ka whakamahia tēnei kōwhiringa tuitui, i waenganui i tētahi mea i hangaia hei ine me te rite-ki-te mau, hei whakaahua i ngā kōwhiringa mō te tuitui tahi i tētahi pātahitanga i waenganui i te UK me te EU i muri tonu i a Mati 2019. Kaua tēnei e pōrarutia ki te "mahi ngātahi hōhonu, motuhake hoki" e kī taurangi ana a Ēnā Me. Engari, ko tā te pirimia e whakaahua ana he "wā whakatinanatanga" engari he tokomaha ētahi atu e karanga ana ko "te tauwhiro" - te wāhanga whakaritenga i waenganui i Ingarangi e wehe ana i te EU me te tae ki ētahi ūnga ā muri ake me te ūnga whakamutunga. Ina kōrero a Mrs May mō tētahi Brexit "māeneene" e karo ana i tētahi "tapa pari", ko ngā whakaritenga mō tētahi wāhanga tauwhiro e kōrerotia ana e ia, e hāngai ana i ngā pūnaha tikanga, ngā mana nekeneke, ngā ture rererangi, te mahi tahi i te ture taihara me ētahi atu mahi. Engari e 15 marama mai i te taupānga EU, ā, ko ngā whakaritenga i Pōroa, kei raro te kāwanatanga o UK i te pēhanga (kāore i te iti rawa i te umanga) ki te tātaki i te āhua o tēnei wāhanga tauwhiro - hei whakakapi i te kupu whakapuaki ki ngā tono tauwhāiti. Koinei te mea i tangohia e nga minita kāpata, i te tūmataiti, i te iwi whānui hoki puta noa i te raumati, ā, tērā pea he arotahi o te whaikōrero a Ēnā Me i Hinokano i te Paraire. E rua tau anake ngā whakaritenga e whakaaetia ana e te tukanga Tuhipānui 50 ki te hama i tētahi whakaaetanga whakahekenga (ngā ture whakarerekētanga), e tika ana kia whakaarohia "te anga mō te pātahitanga ā muri ake o [te UK] ki te uniana". Me te ono marama kua hipa kē, e mārama ana kāore tētahi taha e whakapono ana he wā anō ki te tākai me te whakarite i tētahi mahi hokohoko hou i taua wā. I te mea ā-ture, ka taea e te EU te whakamutu i tētahi pātahitanga hokohoko hōu ki te UK i muri noa iho i te wehenga atu o Ingarangi. Koia te take e whakapono ana te kāwanatanga ināianei ka hiahiatia he wā tauwhiro. Ko te tikanga, me whakarite ki te EU, engari he aha tātau e mōhio ana mō ngā whakaaro o Ēnā Me? Ahakoa kāore he tūnga kāwanatanga i kōrerotia tikatia, he tino māia ana minita mo te kaupapa i te raumati, ā, kua mārama ngā wehewehenga. I te 20 o Hune, ka pēhia e te Tumuaki, a Piripi Hammond, te hiahia ki te whakarite i "ngā whakaritenga tauwhiro whai hua tahi". Kotahi marama i muri mai, ka kī te Hēkeretari Mahi, a Liam Fox, (he kaiwhakahauhau Waiho) me mutu tētahi wā tauwhiro i te rā o te pōti panuku, i te tau 2022. I te waenganui o Aotearoa, ka tuhia e nga minita kāpata e rua tētahi tuhipānui tōtahi e kī ana i tētahi "wā wā whāiti hei whakanui ake i tō tātau painga ā iwi me te hoatu i te mōhiotanga nui ake o te umanga - engari e kore e taea te noho whakamuri ki te noho i te EU". I kī hoki rātau ka noho te UK i waho o te uniana tikanga i roto i tēnei wā tauwhiro. Kātahi i te 12 o Mahuru, ka kī atu a Piripi Hammond ki tētahi komiti o te Whare Ariki e kimi ana te kāwanatanga i tētahi mahi tauwhiro e āhua ana "he rite tonu ki te tūnga kōkuhu". He whakaaro tika kāore te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe, a Boris Johnson. Kāore i kōrerotia e tana kōrero kupu 4,300 i roto i te Daily Telegraph mō te wā o Ingarangi i muri i te wā o Ingarangi. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri iho i Niu Ioka, ka kī a Tēnā Hōnea kia kaua te UK e utu i ngā utu "taikaha" ki te EU mō te uru ki te mākete kotahi i muri i a Pakihi, ā, ka tohe kia kaua e "roa rawa" tētahi wā tauwhiro. Ka haere tonu te tautohetohe, ā, taro ake nei me kōwhiri a Ēnā Mei. Ahakoa te āhua nei e whakaae ana te kāpata ki tētahi wā tauwhiro, he māra tōrangapū tērā mō te pirimia. Kua whakapūmau te kāwanatanga kua kore a Ingarangi e noho hei mema o te mākete kotahi i te rā o Pakihi, ā, ka mahue i a ia te uniana tikanga. Engari, e hiahia ana kia uru tonu ki te mākete kotahi me ngā whakaritenga tikanga kia rite ki a rātou ināianei, i a rātou e wātea ana ki te tuki i ngā mahi hokohoko ki ngā whenua ehara i te EU. Koia tērā te tūnga "wāhi reka" i kōrerotia e Piripi Hammond. E kī ana nga hoariri o te Tories he moemoeā tēnei. I te raumati, ka tae mai te Rōpū Mahi ki te tirohanga ko te huarahi anake hei whakaiti i te raruraru o te ohaoha i roto i tētahi wā tauwhiro, ko te pupuri i Ingarangi i te mākete kotahi (mā te mema o te European Free Trade Association me te Horahanga Ohaoha o Ūropi) me te uniana tikanga. He kōwhiringa mārama "i waho o te whata". Engari mō te tokomaha o ngā Conservatives Eurosceptic, ehara i te tīmatanga. Ko te tikanga o te nekehanga koreutu haere tonu o te iwi ki Ingarangi, he mahi haere tonu mo te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture me te tūtohu utu nui. Engari e whakaaro ana a Henry Newman, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te kura whakaaro Open Europe, ko tētahi whakaritenga "utu-ki-te-tākaro" te mea e rapua ana e te UK. "Ki taku whakaaro me kī te UK ka whakaritea ngā whakawā ECJ, me te utu noa iho me te mea he mema EU mātau i taua wā," te kī a Tēnā Newman. Tērā anō, ko te hoatu moni ki runga i te tēpu whakarite ināianei hei utu i tētahi mahi tauwhiro, tērā pea he huarahi mō te UK ki te weteārai i ngā kōrero tūpono. E hia? Ko te whika o te 10bn hōro i te tau mo te toru tau e rangona ana i Whitehall. Ki te kore ngā utu e haere tonu i tua atu i te wā tauwhiro, ka puritia pea a Boris Johnson ki runga i te papa. I tua atu i te utu, ko te āwangawanga nui i waenganui i ngā Tories e tautoko ana i a Pakihi, ko tētahi mahi tauwhiro e āhua rite ana ki te tūnga kōkuhu ka whakapakeketia ki tētahi mea pūmau. Ko Prof Kenneth Armstrong te kaituhi o Te Wā o Te Wā: Wehe atu i te EU - He aha, me pēhea, āhea? E whakapono ana a ia mēnā ka whakaritea e te UK tōna ara ki te mākete kotahi, ka whakaweto pea te whāinga o te whakarite i tētahi whakaaetanga hokohoko koreutu whānui ki te EU mō ake tonu atu. Ko te hua? "He UK e ngaro ana i roto i te tauwhiro," e whakatūpato ana a Prof Armstrong. Ko te whakararuraru i ngā take mō te UK ko te mea kāore te EU e whakaatu ana i te hiahia ki te tuitui tahi i tētahi mahi tauwhiro whakaritea. E mārama ana te tono whakarite a te EU me whai painga ngā whakaritenga tauwhiro ki te Uniana o Ūropi, "he iti noa iho te wā, ā, e herea ana ki ngā tikanga whakaū tōtika". Kāore ngā kaiārahi EU e hiahia kia whiwhi te UK i ngā painga o te tūnga o te ohaoha me te kore tikanga o te mematanga. "Kāore he whiriwhiri cherry," ko te mantra i Pōroa. Ko ngā mema e 27 e toe ana o te EU e whakakotahi ana i roto i ngā whāinga me ngā tohutohu. Ahakoa ka taea e Ēnā Me te here i tana kāpata huri noa i tētahi tūnga tauwhiro e whakaae ana ki ngā parirau katoa o tana rōpū, ka hiahiatia tonutia te whakaaetanga a te EU. Tērā pea ka neke whakamua ngā whakaritenga ki te EU mēnā he mārama ake te UK mō te utu e hiahia ana ki te utu, ā, ka taea te whakamahere i te wāhi e ahu mai ai te tauwhiro.

title: Te whakahē a Senedd i ngā huringa tiaki pēpi tohunga o Wales ki te uru
summary: E hia rau ngā kaiwhakahauhau e ātete ana i ngā huringa ki te tiaki pēpi tohunga i te uru o Uēra kua whakahē i te whakaminenga.
text: Ko te tikanga o ngā mahere ka kati te rōpū pēpi tiaki motuhake o te Hōhipera o Withybush i Haverfordwest. Kua kī te poari hauora o Hywel Dda me te kāwanatanga o Welsh ka pai ake te taumata tiaki i ngā huringa. I kī te kaiwhakahauhau a Chris Overton kāore te Minita Hauora a Mark Drakeford i whakaae ki te kite i a ia. I tūtaki a Tēnā Drakeford ki ētahi atu kaiwhakahē, a, i kī mai he "hari" a ia ki te mahi pēnā. I kī a Dr Overton, te tūru o te Tīma Hohenga Tiaki Withybush (SWAT) me tētahi tohunga whakawhānau i Withybush, i runga i te Facebook: "Kāore te Minita i whakaae kia kite i a au i tēnei rā. Kāore he take i homai." Heoi anō, i whakairihia e Tēnā Drakeford i runga i te twitter "I hari ahau ki te tūtaki i ngā kaiwhakahauhau mai i Pembrokeshire i tēnei ata kua whakaritea - e tūmanako ana ahau i kitea e rātau he whaitake te hui." I tērā marama, tata ki te 1,000 ngā tāngata i hīkoi ki te whakahē i nga kaupapa tautohetohe. I raro i te pūnaha hou kua marohitia, ka homai e ngā tākuta i Carmarthen he tiaki tohunga, ā, ko ētahi atu hōhipera e whakarato ana i tētahi ratonga ā-kaiwhakawhanau. Ka noho te Hōhipera o Bronglais i Aberystwyth, Ceredigion, hei wae kohanga ā-kaiwhakawhanau, ahakoa i te wā tauwhiro ka pupuri hoki i ētahi kaitohutohu. I te tuatahi i whakaaturia ngā mahere i te tau ki muri e te poari hauora, engari i whakahētia e te kaitiaki tūroro paetata mō ngā māharahara ka mōrearea pea te oranga o te katinga o te rōpū pēpi tiaki motuhake i Haverfordwest. Ko te tikanga ka uru atu a Tēnā Drakeford ki te arotake i te whakataunga, a, ka tango tohutohu mai i tētahi pae tohunga. I whakaaturia e te pae tohutohu ko te whakarato i ngā wae tiaki pēpi motuhake puta noa i te poari hauora "kāore i te haumaru, i te tautoko rānei". I te Wenerei, i whakaae a Mark Drakeford ki te tūtaki i tētahi tonotono iti, arā, ko AMs, ko Joyce Watson me Rebecca Evans. I kī a Ms Evans he wā tērā mō te minita ki te "kōrero taipitopito i ngā māharahara". I tāpiri mai a Ms Watson: "Kua whakaūngia e te minita, i te wā e whakatūria ana te wae ā-kaiwhakawhanau ki Withybush, ka whai taupoki whakawhānau hei tautoko i ngā kaiwhakawhanau. " Heoi anō, he mea nui kia hangaia ngā ratonga katoa i muri i tēnei wāhanga whakatū tuatahi i te haumarutanga o ngā whaea me ngā pēpi." Nō nā tata nei i tuhituhi ai a Dr Overton ki a Tēnā Drakeford, ā, i whiwhi whakautu mai i te āpiha rongoā matua o Weera, a Dr Ruth Hussey. 'Ngā Mana o te tamaiti' I roto, ka tuhituhi a ia: "Ko ngā huringa ratonga e whakatinanatia ana e whakatairanga ana i ngā mana o te tamaiti mā te whakanui i te tūponotanga o te ora me te oranga mo te wā roa mō ngā pēpi māuiui me ngā pēpi moata e hiahia ana ki te tiaki nui. " Ka tutuki tēnei mā te nui ake o te whakarongo ki ngā paerewa o te British Association of Perinatal Medicine (BAPM) ka homai e te ratonga whirihora anō." I roto i tētahi whakautu ki a Dr Hussey, ka tuhituhi a Dr Overton: "Hei tākuta, he mahi tāku te whakaara i ngā māharahara ina mōrearea ngā tūroro. Ka haere tonu ahau ki te mahi i taku manawa whakamutunga." I tētahi atu īmēra, ka pātai mai a ia: "He pēhea te haumaru ake mō te tamaiti whai epiglottitis, te whakaeke huango taumaha rānei kia haere 45 meneti atu i roto i te ohorere? " He pēhea te haumaru ake mō tētahi wahine hapū nui e toto ana ki te mate, pērā i pūrongotia i roto i ngā pepa me haere anō kia 45 meneti i roto i te ohorere?" Kua whakaingoatia e ia nga kaupapa he "hē tino heahea" e mate ai. I kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh: "He mārama te tohutohu a te pae tohunga mō te wā heke mai o ngā ratonga kōhungahunga i Hywel Dda: kāore i te haumaru, i te pūmau rānei te ngana ki te whakarato tonu i ngā ratonga tohunga kōhungahunga puta noa i ngā hōhipera katoa o Hywel Dda. " I whakaae te minita ki ngā tohutohu a te pae kia whakawhanake i tētahi Wae Neonatal Taumata 2 hōu i te Hōhipera o Glangwili, e mahi ana ki te iwi whānui o Pembrokeshire mā tētahi huarahi e āhei ai ngā kaitohutohu ki te pupuri i ō rātou tohungatanga, ā, ka whakarato i te ratonga tino pai mō ngā whaea me ā rātou pēpi."

title: Hinga i ngā ope ārai pakanga: JVP
summary: Ko te tikanga kia hinga nga whakamātau a nga kāwanatanga o Īnia me Hiri Rānaka ki te whakamutu i te whawhai, e kī ana a Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP).
text: I kī te Hēkeretari Ahuwhānui o JVP o Tilvin Silva ko te whāinga o te haerenga o te tonotono Īnia hiko tiketike ki Colombo i tērā wiki ko te whakahau i te kāwanatanga kia whakamutua te whawhai ki te LTTE. I haere tē mōhiotia te Kaitohutohu Haumarutanga ā-Motu o Īnia, o MK Rayanan, te Hēkeretari Whakangungu o Onamata me te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o Shiv Shankar Menon ki Sri Lanka i tērā wiki. Ko te tonotono Īnia i Colombo I kōrerorero te tīma Īnia ki a Perehitini Kāripa, te Hēkeretari Whakangungu o Gotabhatya Kāripa, me ngā kaipōrangapū Tamila i Sri Rānaka. I kikī te ngutu o nga kāhui o Hiri Rānaka me Īnia i runga i te hua o nga kōrero. I kī atu te kaiārahi o Mua Mauī, a Dr. Vickramabahu Karunaratne, ki a TE Tūtira kua tohe te tonotono Īnia ki a Sri Lanka kia tīmata anō ngā kōrero ki te Hāwhe Tamila. "Ko te tikanga o te mūmū huna o te kāwanatanga, kua rite rātau ki te mahi i ngā hiahia o Īnia," te kī a Tilvin Silva ki ngā kaipūrongo i Colombo. E kore e ngāwari ki te kāwanatanga, e kī ana a Tēnā Silva, ki te huri i te rautaki whawhai i te mea kaore te whenua e āwhina i te nekehanga. "Ka āta whakarerekētia e te kāwanatanga te rautaki whawhai kia kore ai te iwi e whakatika ki taua mea," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Bodyguards set to protect Flora Day nesting swans
summary: Me utua nga kaitiaki tinana hai pare i nga wani kōhanga i tētahi hākari ā-tau.
text: Ka kawea e te Rā Flora ngā mano ki te taone o Cornish o Helston ia Mei. Engari ko te takahanga e rite ana ki ngā wani e kōhanga ana i Koroneihana Lake, tērā pea ka "tino whakararuraru" mō ngā manu, te kī a te Kaunihera Taone o Heston. I tērā tau ka whakatakotoria e tētahi wani he hēki ki te tapa o te huarahi, e ahu ana ki tētahi wāhi e taiapatia ana. I whakaterea e te kaiwhakaahua a Rebecca Wilbur te ariā kia utua he haumarutanga hei pare i a rātau i te wā o te takahanga. Kua pūruatia e te kaunihera te kaupapa, ā, kua kohia e tētahi whakahau pāpāho pāpori te £310 hei utu i te utu o te whakamahi i ngā tautīaki hei pare i ngā wani me ā rātou hēki. More on this story, plus other Devon and Cornwall news Councillor Dave Potter said: "When it gets very busy, it's very disturbing for the swans at that very critical time of their cycle." Ka kōhanga ngā wani ngū i Aperira me Mei. I te 8 o Mei ka tū te Rā Flora. Kei roto i ngā mārena e kanikani ana i ngā tiriti, i roto, i waho hoki o ngā kāinga me ngā toa ki te "peia atu i te hōtoke me te pōhiri i te kōanga".

title: West Hertfordshire Hospitals NHS Trust: New site 'not on shortlist'
summary: Kua pānuitia e tētahi whakawhirinaki NHS e titiro ana ki te kaha o te hanga hōhipera hou i tētahi rārangi kōwhiringa kāore he pae hōu.
text: I pānuitia e West Herts Hospitals NHS Trust i June e titiro ana ki te whakakapi, kaua ki te whakahou i ngā whare tīariari. E kī ana kua whakaaturia e tētahi akoranga whaimana ināianei he roa rawa te tiki i tētahi pae hōu me te whakahaere. I kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau mō tētahi hōhipera hou he "whakataunga tirohanga poto". I hiahia rātau ki tētahi hōhipera hou, i hangaia ki waenganui ki Hemel Hempstead, St Albans me Watford me te whakakapi i ngā hōhipera tīariari i aua tauwāhi. 'Take longer' West Herts Hospitals NHS Trust had agreed to invest in existing hospitals and wanted to bid for £350m of government funding with investment planned for existing services, including refurbishing Watford General Hospital. I whakaarohia e ia ko te utu o te hanga i tētahi pānga hou i waenganui i ngā tauwāhi e toru e tata ana ki te £700m - ā, kua whakataua, engari i titiro anō i muri i te korerotanga ki ngā rangatira NHS ka taea e rātau te tūhura i ngā kōwhiringa e wātea ana ki tētahi atu £190m. Following a feasibility study by an independent team appointed by the Trust, it has now proposed a shortlist, with its preferred option being new emergency facilities developed next to the existing Watford General Hospital. Ko tētahi o ngā rōpū e whakahauhau ana mō tētahi hōhipera hou i karangatia he tinana takitahi kia whakatūria e te kāwanatanga ki te titiro ki ngā marohi. I kī a Jean Ritchie, mai i te Whakahau Hōhipera Hōhipera: "He aha te mana o tētahi tinana tūmatanui pēnei i te Whirinaki ki te whakararuraru i te wā heke mai o te tiaki hōhipera mā te whakatau i tētahi whakataunga poto, me te kore he take oro?" All trusts getting government funds are expected to deliver new buildings within five years and the Trust said it "would take longer for new hospital facilities to be up and running" on any new site. Trust deputy chief executive, Helen Brown, said this was a "once in a generation opportunity to transform our hospital buildings" and a final decision would be made early next year. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka nekehia e Google ngā kaipūkaha ki waho o Rūhia
summary: Kua whakaūngia e Google ngā pūrongo e whakaaro ana ki te neke i ngā kaipūkaha ki waho o tōna tari i Rūhia.
text: I kī te umanga "kei te tuku tonu" ki ngā kaiwhakamahi Google i te whenua, ā, ka kī atu ki te AO kua nekehia ngā kaipūkaha ki ētahi atu whenua i ngā wā o mua. I whakapeka a Google ki te kōrero e hia ngā kaimahi ka pāngia e te nekehanga. I a Hōngongoi i tēnei tau, ka tukuna e te pāremata o Rūhia tētahi ture e hiahia ana ki ngā kamupene ipurangi kia penapena i ngā raraunga whaiaro o ngā tangata whenua i roto i te whenua. Kua kī te Pirihitini kua hoahoatia te ture hei āwhina i te parenga raraunga, engari kua kitea e ngā kaiwhakawāwā he ngana ki te whakatau i te urunga ipurangi i te mea ka hoatu e te ture he mana ki te kāwanatanga ki te ārai i ngā pae kāore i pai ki te whakaū. He maha ngā kamupene hangarau e penapena ana i ngā raraunga kaiwhakamahi ki ngā pūkenga rokiroki raraunga nui puta noa i te ao, ā, kāore e hono i te tauwāhi o te raraunga ki te tauwāhi o te kaiwhakamahi, ko te tikanga kāore te nuinga o ngā raraunga kaiwhakamahi e puritia ki te whenua ōrite ki a rātou. Ka pupuri a Google i ētahi kaimahi tae atu ki ngā tīma hokohoko, mākete me ngā tīma tautoko i tōna tari o Rūhia, e ai ki te Wall Street Journal. ""E tino māia ana mātou ki ā mātou kaiwhakamahi me ngā kiritaki o Rūhia, ā, he tīma tūturu tā mātou i Rūhia e mahi ana ki te tautoko i a rātou," te kī a te umanga i roto i tētahi kōrero.

title: Kidderminster Harriers kit sponsor aims to tackle mental health stigma
summary: Kua pānuitia tētahi aroha hauora hinengaro hei kaitautoko mō tētahi karapu whutupōro i roto i tētahi tono ki te rutu i te tauhae huri noa i te hauora hinengaro.
text: Ināianei ka puta te Rōpū Kaleidoscope Plus ki ngā kete kāinga, tawhiti hoki mō Kidderminster Harriers. I kī te rangatira nui o te karapu, a Neil Male, ko te hauora hinengaro "he tauhae nui tonu i roto i te hapori whutupōro". "E hiahia ana mātou ki te mahi tahi me ngā kaitākaro... ki te whakaako i a rātau e pai ana kia kaua e pai," tana kī. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, i pūrongotia e te Pānga Whutupōro Ngaio he "tara" i roto i te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhutupōro e rapu ana i te tautoko hauora hinengaro. I te wā o Hui tanguru, ka hono a Pirini William ki ngā kaitākaro ngaio ki te whakarewa i ngā Heads Up Weekends, he kaupapa e hāngai ana ki te whakapūnoa i ngā kōrerorero mō te hauora hinengaro. "E kōrero ana mātou mō te kaha ā-tinana, e kore rawa mātou e kōrero mō te kaha o te hinengaro," te kī a te ariki i taua wā. "Me noho ā-hinengaro tātau katoa, kāore he mea nui ake i ngā kaitākaro ngaio e... me koi ō rātou mahunga, me ō rātou waewae me ō rātou waewae." Ko te Rōpū Kaleidoscope Plus te aroha hauora hinengaro tuatahi e tautoko ana i tētahi karapu Rōpū ā-Motu, te kī a tōna Tumuaki Tumuaki o Monica Shafaq. "Ehara tēnei i te mea he kaitautoko noa iho," tana kī. "Our sponsorship is designed not only to raise awareness and encourage people to talk about mental health, but also to signpost them to relevant services." I kī a Ms Shafaq e tūmanako ana a ia "e whakakotahi ana i te hauora hinengaro ki te whutupōro" mā te mahi ngātahi ka "āhei ngā kaitākaro ki te mārama ki te hiranga o te oranga o ō rātou hoa tākaro me ō rātou ake". Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk

title: Dipton open cast mine protesters cleared of trespass
summary: E waru nga kaiwhakahē kua whakawāteatia i te mahi ārai i tētahi maina tuwhera.
text: I hopukina nga wāhine tokoono me ngā tāngata tokorua i te pae o te Rōpū Pēke e tata ana ki Dipton, County Durham, i Aperira. I kī rātau e ngana ana rātau ki te ārai i tētahi hara kararehe i runga i te pae, kua kitea he newts nui rawa. I muri i te whakawātanga i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Teesside, kāore rātau i hara ki te hara kino, engari i hoatu he whakahau ārai i a rātau e whakatata ana ki te pae. E anga ana ki ngā utu ko: E hiahia ana te Rōpū Pēke ki te tango i te 500,000 tāhei waro mai i te pae i Pont Valley. Heoi anō, he tini nga pirihimana me nga pirihimana i haere ki te pae i muri i te whakatūnga o te puni a nga kaiwhakahaere. Ko ētahi i mekameka ki ngā taputapu pūkaha, ā, i herea tētahi ki tētahi rākau. Kua keria hoki ngā kauhanga ki te hōhonutanga o te 8ft (2.4m). I kī nga kaiwhakahaere kua kitea e rātau he newts nui - he momo i whakawāteatia hei mōrearea i raro i te ture o Ūropi. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri iho, ka kī a Jessica Sankey: "He kawa ta mātau tauhohenga. " Ahakoa e hari ana mātau i te wetewete, kua ngaro tonutia te pae." I kī te Rōpū Pēke kua mahia e ia he maha ngā uiuinga i roto i ngā tau, ā, kāore he newts i kitea.

title: Ka whakaingoatia e ngā pirihimana ngā āpiha i roto i te kēhi kerēme wahine huna
summary: Kua whakaingoatia e nga Pirihimana o Metropolitan e rua nga tāngata whai pānga ki nga wāhine i a rātau e mahi ana hei āpiha huna.
text: Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i roto i tōna hītori kua whakaūngia e ia ngā tuakiri o ngā mahi huna. E whakapaea ana te tokorua - ko Jim Boyling rāua ko Bob Lambert - ki te tinihanga i nga wāhine mā te whai pānga ki a rāua me te kore whakaatu ko wai rāua. Tokotoru nga wāhine e hāmenetia ana te Tūtaki mo taua take, engari e whakakāhore ana i te hara. E tautohe ana te tōpana i takea mai ngā pātahitanga i runga i ngā whakaaro "pono". Ko te 'kukume tahi' Hei pare i te haumarutanga o ngā āpiha huna, he kaupapa pirihimana kia kaua e whakaū, kia whakakāhore rānei ko wai rātou i raro i ngā āhuatanga katoa. Engari i tērā marama i whakataua ai e Tēnā Justice Bean i te Kōti Tiketike kua kore e taea e Te Whāwhā o Pākehā te whakawhirinaki ki tēnei i ngā kēhi o Tēnā Boyling rāua ko Tēnā Lambert, ā, - i roto i tētahi nekehanga tawhito rawa - kua whakaūngia e te tōpana ināianei kua mahi huna rātau. E whakahau ana a Helen Steel i ngā Pirihimana o Metropolitan mō tētahi pātahitanga i a ia ki tētahi atu āpiha huna - ehara i tētahi o ngā kaimahi i whakaingoatia i te Paraire. I kī atu a ia ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā i whakapono a ia he "tangata tūturu" a ia i to rātau tīmatanga ki te hanga pātahitanga i te tau 1990. "I kōrero mātou mō te whai tamariki tahi," tana kī. "I kōrero mātau mo te whakapau tahi i te toenga o o māua oranga, kātahi ka ngaro atu a ia. " He maha nga tau i pau ai ahau ki te rapu. I te mutunga, i kitea e au kua whakamahia e ia te tuakiri o tētahi tamaiti e waru tau te pakeke. "I taua wā ka tino hinga tōku ao nā te mea ko tēnei tangata, i mōhiotia e au, i arohaina e au, ohorere ana kāore au i mōhio ko wai rātou, he aha rānei tō rātou ingoa. " Me pēhea e taea ai e koe te whai hononga pono i runga anō i te tukutuku teka katoa? "E kī ana ēnei tāngata e aroha ana rātau ki a mātau, e hiahia ana rātau ki te noho i roto i o mātau oranga mo te toenga o o rātau oranga, engari i mōhio rātau ka mutu ta rātau whakairinga i roto i ngā tau torutoru noa iho, ā, ka ngaro atu rātau i o mātau oranga, ā, ka mahue i a mātau. " Ehara tēnā i te aroha, he tūkino tēnā." I kī nga Pirihimana Tūtaki i a Tēnā Boyling - ko tōna ingoakē ko Hēmi Wānanga i nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua - he pātahitanga ki ngā wāhine tokorua i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, i a ia e horaina pukutia ana. I muri iho ka moe ia i tētahi o ngā wāhine, ā, tokorua ana tamariki ki a ia. I nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, he pātahitanga tōna pātahitanga ki tētahi wahine i tūtaki ai ia i tētahi rōpū motika kararehe, i a ia hoki e huna ana. E ai ki ngā tuhinga ā-ture, i kitea e TE Rongokōrero, ka whakakāhore te tōpana i "tinihangatia" nga wāhine, ā, e kī ana i puta mai ngā pātahitanga nā te "ātaahua tahi me ngā whakaaro whaiaro pono". E kī ana te 'wikitōria wāhanga' o Scotland Yard kāore i whakamana i ngā pātahitanga, i te "whakaae ā-ringa" rānei i roto i aua pātahitanga, ā, e whakakāhore ana i tīmataria hei "mahi tika". I kī a Harriet Wistrich, he rōia mō ngā wāhine i tēnei take, ko te whakaingoatanga o ngā āpiha e tohu ana i tētahi "wikitōria wāhanga". I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a ia: "Kua kumea ngā pirihimana ki tēnei whanaketanga tino nui tuatahi i roto i te rūnanga i mauria mai e nga wāhine i roto i ta rātau pakanga roa mo te tika me te haepapatanga." I kī tētahi kōrero mō ngā Pirihimana Tūtaki: "E hāngai ana to mātau wawao ki te whakahaere i hoatu e Tēnā Ture Bean. " Ko te tūnga o te ope, kua tāruatia e mātau he maha nga wā, ko te whanaungatanga tōkai mo te wā roa i waenganui i tētahi āpiha huna me tētahi mema o te iwi whānui, ā, kāore anō kia whakamanatia."

title: Ka whakawāteatia e Aruba te mana o Tūria o Hugo Carvajal e hiahiatia ana e Mātau
summary: Kua tukua te rangatira o Tūria o Te Motu o Aruba, i muri i te hereheretanga i runga i ngā whakapae a Mātau mo nga mahi hokohoko rongoā.
text: I kī te Pūtea Moni o Amerika i a ia e pare ana i ngā tukunga rongoā a te hunga whakakeke o Kōpia Farc. Engari i kī tētahi kaiwhakawā i te motu he uruwhenua whakawhanaunga a Gen Carvajal, ā, he mana kore mana tana hopunga. I whakatūria ia e Venezuela hei consul mōna i Aruba. Ko Aruba, he wāhanga o te Kingitanga o Hōrana, e 27km (17 maero) ki te raki o Venezuela. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Tūria, a Iraia Jaua, ka mauria mai a Ken Carvajal ki te kāinga. "Kei te rere tētahi waka rererangi i tēnei wā ... ki te haere ki te tiki i to mātau hoa o Hugo Carvajal," tana kī. Ko Gen Carvajal te upoko o te mōhiohio hōia o Venezuela i waenganui i te 2004 me te 2009. He urunga tata a ia no te perehitini tōmuri, o Hugo Chavez, i mate i te mate pukupuku i tērā tau. I te tau 2008, i whakapaea ia e te Pūtea Moni o Amerika me tētahi atu mana matua o Tūria ki te "āwhina rawa i ngā ngohe hokohoko rongoā a ngā Ope Taua Tōkeke o Koropia (Farc)". I whakakāhoretia e Tēnā Chavez nga whakaaro i taua wā. I puta mai te pānuitanga o te Pūtea Moni o Amerika i te rā i muri i te peia e Venezuela te karere o Amerika ki Caracas mo te pūrua i tētahi mahi parirau matau haukotia ki a Tēnā Chavez.

title: Public consultation on Suffolk care homes begins
summary: Kua tīmata tētahi whakaaro tūmatanui 12 wiki ki ngā mahere hei hoko, hei kati rānei i ngā kāinga tiaki mana ā-rohe e 16 i Te Wānanga.
text: He wāhanga tēnei o te rautaki a te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o T I kī te kaunihera e hiahia ana ki te "whakarite kia tutuki ngā hiahia o te hunga pakeke ki ngā ratonga maha, tae atu ki ngā kāinga tiaki wāhanga takitahi". The consultation runs until 24 January 2011 and the council's cabinet will consider the responses in March 2011. The council said its homes provide 526 places, which is 9.5% of the registered residential care home places in Suffolk. An online questionnaire can be completed on the Suffolk County Council website and the consultation booklet and form is available at all of the care homes.

title: I pūhia e te kaipūkaha Facebook i runga i ngā kerēme tāhae
summary: Kua pūhia e Facebook tētahi kaipūkaha haumarutanga e whakapaea ana ki te whakamahi i tōna āheitanga ki ngā raraunga hei kakau tuihono i ngā wāhine.
text: I kī te āpiha haumarutanga matua o Alex Stamos i roto i tētahi kōrero ki te HAU: "I tere tonu tā mātou uiui i tēnei āhuatanga, ā, i wawe tonu te pūhia te tangata." I te tuatahi ka tīmata a Facebook ki te tūhura i ngā kerēme ki te kaimahi i muri i ngā amuamu a te kaiwhakarewa o Spyglass Security, o Ake Ohauru i te Mane. Kātahi ia ka whakapā atu ki a Tēnā Stamos mā Twitter i muri i tana tweeting i ana whakaaro. I taua wā ka kī a Facebook: "Ahakoa kāore e taea e mātou te kōrero mō ētahi take kaimahi, e mōhio ana mātou ki te āhuatanga me te tūhura." I te Rāitema, i te whakaū i te whakairinga o ngā kaimahi, ka kī a Tēnā Stamos: "He mea nui kia noho haumaru, kia tūmataiti hoki ngā mōhiohio a te tangata ina whakamahi rātou i Facebook.
