" Koinei te take he pākaha ā mātou mana kaupapahere me ngā rāhuitanga hangarau kia uru anake ngā kaimahi ki ngā raraunga e hiahiatia ana e rātou hei mahi i ā rātou mahi - hei tauira ki te whakatika i ngā iro, ki te whakahaere i ngā take tautoko kiritaki, ki te urupare rānei ki ngā tono ā-ture whaimana. "Ka panaia ngā kaimahi e tūkino ana i ēnei mana." Kāore anō a Facebook kia whakaū mēnā kei te mahia he mahi ā-ture ki te kaimahi. I puta mai nga whakaaro ki te kaimahi i te wiki i te pānuitanga a Facebook me whakarewa i tētahi ratonga dating tuihono hōu.

title: Covid: US backs waiver on vaccine patents to boost supply
summary: Kua makaia e te US tana tautoko i muri i tētahi nekehanga i te World Trade Organization (WTO) ki te hiki rangitahi i ngā parenga ārai mō ngā kano ārai coronavirus.
text: E kī ana ngā kaitautoko o te nekehanga ka whakanuia te whakaputa rongoā ā-ao, engari e tautohe ana ngā kaiwhakanao rongoā kāore e whai pānga e hiahiatia ana. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā e tango ana i ngā utu pūtea mai i ngā kaiwhakawhanake rongoā tapahi. Ko te whakataunga a te Perehitini o Amerika a Joe Biden i puta mai i waenganui i te pēhanga a Democrats i roto i tana rōpū ki te tango i ngā parenga ārai. I te pānuitanga o te kaupapahere hou, ka kī te Māngai Hokohoko o Amerika, a Katherine Tai, "ko ngā wā whakaharahara e karanga ana ki ngā tikanga whakaharahara". I kī a Ms Tai ināianei ka eke te US ki ngā whakaritenga i te WTO ki te ngana ki te whakaū i te waiver, engari ka whakatūpato ka roa pea tēnei. Ko Īnia rāua ko Āwherika ki te Tonga ngā reo ārahi i roto i tētahi rōpū e 60 ngā whenua e ngana ana ki te tiki i ngā ārai ārai mō ngā kano ārai. Kotahi rau o ngā tūnga e 164 o te WTO e kiia ana e manakohia ana, ā, ka tūmanakohia he pae mō te rawa hinengaro kia kōrerorerotia te take a tērā marama. Ki te whakaaetia, e kī ana ngā kaitautoko, ka whakaaetia e te waiver te whakaputa i ngā kano ārai mate kia piki ake me te whakarato i ngā rongoā utu nui ake mō ngā whenua iti rawa. I tūtaki ngā whenua e manakohia ana e te nekehanga ki te ātete kaha mai i te whakahaeretanga o mua o Donald Trump, te UK me te EU. I tonoa e Tēnā Biden he waiver i te wā o te whakahau pōti perehitini o te tau 2020. He aha te rawa hinengaro? Ko te rawa hinengaro e whakaahua ana i ngā hanganga, pēnei i ngā hanganga, e parea ana e ngā ārai, manatārua me ngā moko. Mā ēnei e ārai te tārua, ā, ka whakaaetia te kaitaketake kia utua ā-pūtea. Ka hoatu e ngā ārai he tohutohu mo te wā poto ki te whakanao hei utu i ngā utu o te whanaketanga me te whakahauhau i te pūtea penapena. E tautohe ana ngā kamupene hangarau hangarau kua homai e taua parenga he tohutohu ki te whakaputa i ngā kano ārai mate Covid i roto i ngā wā pūkete. He aha te tikanga o te waiver? He maha ngā whenua e tipu ana kua tautohe ko ngā ture e hiahia ana ki ngā whenua ki te pare i ngā ārai me ētahi atu momo rawa hinengaro, he taunahua ki te whakanui ake i te whakanaotanga o ngā rongoā me ētahi atu hua e hiahiatia ana hei rutu i te taiepa. I karangatia e Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, te upoko o te WHO, te whakataunga a te US he "hītori" me te kī i tohua "he wā tino nui i roto i te whawhai ki a Covid-19". I kī te NGO rongoā, MSF - Tākuta Kore Taitapa - ka "whakanuia te urunga tika me te wā tika ki ēnei utauta rongoā whakaora i te wā e haere tonu ana a Covid-19 ki te tūkino i ngā whenua puta noa i te ao." Ka tae mai ngā karanga mō tētahi ārai ārai ārai mate i te wā e anga ana ngā whenua moni iti ki ngā iti o te kano ārai mate. Ka whakamāramatia e MSF ko te nuinga o ngā tūnga moni iti e mahi ana "i whiwhi anake i te 0.3 ōrau o te putanga kano ārai mate Covid-19 o te ao whānui, i te wā kua whiwhi te US i te nui o ngā rongoā hei pare i tōna iwi whānui". Ko Īnia, e tuku ana i ngā kano ārai mate ki ētahi atu whenua, ināianei me whakakore ngā kawenga ake i a ia e kākari ana ki ngā kēhi coronavirus, ā, ka taka ki muri i ōna ūnga werohanga. Engari kua whakapuakina e ngā kamupene rongoā to rātau ātete ki tētahi waiver, e tohe ana ehara ngā ārai i te taunahua tuatahi, ā, ka whakatūpato ka taea e te neke te whakararuraru i te mahi hou. I kī atu te tumuaki o te Tōpūtanga o te Ao Whānui o ngā Kaiwhakanao Rongoā me ngā Pāhonotanga, a Tōma Cueni, ki te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā o TE AO kia kaua e whakaūngia te whakawhitinga hangarau. "E tino māharahara ana ahau mēnā ka tukuna tēnei e koe me te tuku i ngā kamupene ki te ngana ki te whakaoti i te huarahi tika, haumaru, kounga tiketike, ka taea e koe te whakararuraru i te kounga me te haumaru o ngā kano ārai mate e kitea ana e mātou ināianei, ā, ka whakararuraru." I kī a ia kei te tiritiri kē ngā kamupene rongoā ki te Uru i te hangarau. "Ko ngā whākī pounamu i tēnei wā he ārai hokohoko, e ārai ana i ngā kamupene kia kaua e neke i a rātau taonga mai i tētahi whenua ki tētahi atu. He iti me te pōharatanga i roto i ngā mekameka putanga, e hiahiatia ana kia whakahuatia. Ā, i tēnei wā tonu ko te hiahia kino o ngā whenua rangatira ki te tiritiri wawe i ngā rongoā ki ngā whenua rawakore. "Kāore tētahi o ēnei e whakatauria ana ki te waiver ārai." I kī atu a Dr Amesh Adalja, tohunga matua i te Pokapū Haumarutanga Hauora o Johns Hopkins mō te Haumarutanga Hauora, ki te pokapū rongokōrero o Kōrero ko te waiver "he nui te nui o te whakawāteatanga o ngā rawa o ngā kamupene rongoā, nā ōna mahi hou me ngā pūtea pūtea i taea ai te whanaketanga o ngā kano ārai mate Covid-19 i te wāhi tuatahi". Kaore he tangata e parea kia parea rā anō te katoa: i runga i taua ao me ngā kaiārahi umanga e whakaaetia ana. Engari kua karangatia e ngā kamupene rongoā te whakataunga a te US ki te whakahoki i te tiritiri o ngā tohutohu huna mō ngā werohanga he tirohanga poto, e kī ana kei te mārama ki te tukanga whakanao koia te tino uauatanga, otirā ina tae mai ki te momo hou o ngā kano ārai mate mRNA - pēnei i a Pfizer me Moderna - tae atu ki te wāteatanga o ngā rauemi taketake. E kī ana rātau, he rite tonu ki te tohatoha i tētahi tohutao me te kore tiritiri i te aratuka, i ngā mea whakauru rānei, ā, ka puta pea ki ngā take kounga me te whakanao iti iho. Engari, kua manakohia kētia e te UK me te EU tētahi pūnaha raihana, e tiria ai te mōhiotanga, ā, he nui ake te tirotiro. Kei te mahia kētia i ētahi take i runga i te tūroro - pēnei i te herenga i waenganui i Oxford AstraZeneca me te Serum Institute of India. Ā, ka taea te whakahau i taua raihana, ahakoa ka āhei ngā kamupene rongoā ki te utu. Kua huatau ētahi tohunga hokohoko tērā pea kei te tūmanako te US, mā te pūrua i te hiki i ngā ārai, ka tuwhera ake pea ngā kaiwhakanao ki te tiritiri i ngā tohunga - i te itinga rawa rānei, mō tētahi utu iti iho. He aha te tauhohenga? I kī te Perehitini o te Kōmihana o Ūropi o Ursula von der Leyen "kua rite hoki te EU ki te kōrerorero i ngā tono e kōrero ana i te raruraru i runga i te āhua tika, i te āhua hāngai". Kua hurihia e te Perehitini Wīwī o Emanuera Macron tōna tūnga, ināianei e kī ana kei te "tino manakohia a ia". I kii tetahi kaikorero a te kawanatanga o UK e "mahi tahi ana me nga mema WTO ki te whakatika i tenei take" me te "korerorero me nga mema o te US me te WTO ki te whakanui i te whakanao me te whakarato i nga kano kano a Covid-19". I karangatia e te upoko o te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao te panui a US he "wa tino nui" i te whawhai ki a Covid-19. Ko te āhua o te waiver i pā ki ngā hea i roto i ngā kamupene rongoā Pfizer, Moderna me Novavax. E kī ana ētahi tohunga me tiritiri hoki ngā kamupene rongoā i ngā mōhiotanga, pēnei i ngā pūkenga whakanao, me ngā whenua rawakore kia whai hua tūturu. Ko ngā whakaaetanga raihana tētahi atu huarahi ki te whakarewa i te whakanaotanga. Ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakanao kano ārai mate Covid nui rawa ko te Serum Institute of India e hanga ana i te jab Oxford-AstraZeneca i raro i tētahi kirimana raihana me te kamupene Anglo-Huitene.

title: Te whare herehere o Maghaberry: Ka mate te kōhuru o Lisburn, a Gerard Mulligan i roto i te tiakitanga
summary: Kua mate tētahi tangata 44 tau i te whare herehere o Maghaberry, County Antrim.
text: E mōhiotia ana ko Gerard Mulligan taua tangata, mai i Lisburn, County Antrim, ā, i mate ia i te whare herehere haumarutanga tiketike i te ahiahi o te Hātarei. I whakataua a Tēnā Mulligan ki te kōhuru i tōna pāpā, a Gerald Mulligan, i tōna kāinga i Limehurst Way, i Lisburn, i te wā o Mahuru. Kua whakarewaina e te PSNI, te koroni me te Ombudsman Herehere ngā tūhuratanga ki te matenga o te herehere. Kāore anō te Ratonga Whare Herehere o Aiarangi ki te Raki kia whakaū i te tuakiri o te herehere, kia whakaputaina rānei ētahi taipitopito mō tōna matenga, engari i kī kua whakamōhiotia ngā whanaunga tata o taua tangata. I kī te tumuaki o te Ratonga Whare Herehere o Phil Wragg: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakaroa atu i taku aroha me tērā o te Ratonga Whare Herehere o Aiarangi ki te whānau o te herehere kua mate i Maghaberry. " Kei a rātau ōku whakaaro i tēnei wā uaua." I kitea te pāpā o te herehere kua mate i roto i te whakaara o tētahi motokā tata ki tōna kāinga i te 26 o Mahuru, ā, i hopukina ia i muri tata iho.

title: Ka taea e te waina Hōriana te toa i ngā kaiinu o te ao?
summary: E whakaarotia ana ko te tūnga o Hōria o mua ko te wāhi whānau o te mahi waina. Engari i a ia e whai ana ki te whakarewa i ngā kawenga ake puta noa i te ao, ka uaua rawa ōna waina ahurei mō te nuinga o ngā kaiinu?
text: Nā Natalia GolyshevaKaipānui pakihi, BBC News, i Hōria e whai ana ahau i ngā tāngata tokorua ki roto i tētahi whare pōuri e rite ana ki te urupa i te wāhanga o te whare wāina. E tanumia ana i raro i te whenua he maha ngā qvevri - he kōhua uku rēmana nui kī tonu i te wai karepe e āta moīana ana ki te waina. E 2,000 rita wai kei ia ipu, ka tāpirihia ki te kiri karepe me ngā kākano, ka waiho mō te ono marama. He momo waina tawhito e kiia ana e nga kaituhituhi i whakamahia tuatahitia i Georgia i te 5,980 BC. Mā tēnei ka noho te āhua o Rōpūria o mua, kei te rohe o Kaukaka ki te tonga o Rūhia, te whenua whakanao waina tawhito rawa o te ao. Engari he aha te āhua o te waina i hangaia e te tikanga qvevri? Ka ringihia te wai tae amipere ki roto i taku karaehe, ā, he parani te āhua. He āhua mīti te reka, ā, ka tutuki aku pūkoro. Ka rehu taku māhunga, tata tonu tonu. "He uaua tēnei mō te tauhou, engari ina puta koe i te tumeke tuatahi, he utu," te kī a Koka Archvadze, ko te tumuaki tuarua o te pānga o Tsinandali, e 100km (62 maero) ki te rāwhiti o te pūmatua o Hōria, o Tbilisi. Mō ngā rau tau, he wāhanga matua te mahi waina o te ōhanga Hōriana, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā kawenga ake e haere ana ki Rūhia. Heoi anō, kāore te pātahitanga i mahi i ngā wā katoa e manakohia ana e Hōria. Ahakoa e whakapehapeha ana a Hōria i ngā wā katoa ki te nui o ngā momo karepe taketake, i te wā i keria e te USSR mai i te tau 1922 ki te 1991 te nuinga o ngā aka whero me te mā e whai hua ana. I mahia tēnei e rātau hei whakakapi i a rātou ki ngā aka rōrahi tiketike kia taea ai e rātou te hanga waina nui. I te whiwhinga o Hōria i tōna rangatiratanga, he nui te kaha ki te whakanui ake i te whakawhānuitanga o ngā momo tawhito. Kātahi i te tau 2006, i te hoko a Rūhia i te 95% o ngā kawenga waina a Hōria, ka rāhuitia e Mohihi ta rātau kawemai. I whakapono ngā Hōriana he whakaekenga tōrangapū te ārai hei utu ki ngā kaupapa here ā-Uru a te Perehitini Hōriana o Mikheil Saakashkvili. Na te nekehanga i haukotia ai te mahi waina Hōriana, ā, ka tīmata ki te kimi i ngā hokonga kaweake i ngā whenua atu i Rūhia. Ahakoa i whakakorea e Rūhia te aukati i te tau 2013, ināianei ka kaweake a Hōria i tana waina ki ngā whenua e 55. Ahakoa ko Rūhia tonu tōna mākete kaweake nui rawa, kua hinga tōna tiri ki te 62%. Ka whaia e Ukraine i te 12%, Haina 8% me Kazakhstan 4%. Ko te katoa o ngā kawenga ake i tērā tau e 18% teitei ake i te 2017. E kī ana a Irakli Cholobargia, mai i te Georgian National Wine Agency, kua nui haere te arotahi ki Uropi ki te uru me Amerika ki te Raki. "I roto i te rōrahi ehara mātau i te whenua nui," tana kī. "Ko to mātau kaha mōrahi [mō te whakanao] ināianei ko te 300 miriona pounamu i te tau, koia te rahi o tētahi whare waina nui o Ahitereiria. " Kāore e taea e mātou te whakataetae ki Wīwī, Paniora, Hiri me Āwherika ki te Tonga [i te rahi], engari ko tā mātou e tuku nei ko tō mātou ahurei, ā mātou momo karepe, me te waina qvevri, tō mātou hītori. "Ko ta mātau rautaki ināianei ko te whakatū i ngā mākete ki te Uru, Āhia hoki, me te whakaputa i te mākete kaweake katoa." Ko tētahi kaihanga waina Hōriana e whakanui ana i ana kawenga ake ko Gia Piradashvili, te kaiwhakarewa o Winiveria. Kei te wātea ana waina ināianei i ngā whenua tae atu ki Peretiama, Kānata, Wīwī, Tiamana, Itari, Rāwhia, Hōrana, Nōwei, me te US. "Kāore mātou e pīrangi ki te whakaputa i ngā waina arumoni, ā, kāore mātou e mahi tahi me ngā mekameka nui me te hokomaha," tana kī. "Ka mahi kē mātou me ngā toa waina me ngā wharekai kounga tiketike. " Kore rawa ahau i whakaaro ka tukuna taku waina ki ngā wharekai tino pai i Itari, i Wīwī rānei, he wharekai whetū Michelin. Engari ināianei kei te mahi mātou, ā, ehara i te mea ko tātau anake." Hoki ki te pānga o Tsinandali ināianei ka kaweake ki ngā whenua tae atu ki Huiterangi me Monaco. I whakatūria i te rau tau 17, e kīia ana ko Tsinandali te whare wāina tuatahi i Hōria ki te whakaputa i tana waina i roto i ngā pounamu karaehe. Hokohoko ā-Ao Ētahi atu mea mai i te rangatū o te AO e mau ana i tētahi tirohanga aowhānui mō te hokohoko: Mā ngā waina qvevri e kaute ana tae atu ki te 10% o te whakanaotanga Hōriana, ko te nuinga o ērā atu mea i hangaia e ngā tikanga hōu. Engari i te ahurei o ngā momo karepe, ka rerekē pea ngā tāwara ki ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana e te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i Uropi ki te uru, i te US rānei. "Ehara i te tino ātaahua te kōtaha whakakakara mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata," te kī a Lisa Granik, he tohunga o New York mō te waina Hōriana, kei a ia te tohu matua o te Waina. "He tino rerekē rānei ka uaua ki a rātau te mārama." Ka tāpiri mai a ia he uaua hoki te whakahua i ngā ingoa Hōriana, ā, he tokomaha ngā Kaiāwhina "kāore i te mōhio kei hea a Hōria, e whakararuraru ana rātou ki te āhua o Amerika [o taua ingoa kotahi]". Ko te ōritetanga tētahi atu uauatanga, e kī ana a Ms Granik, nā te mea he maha ngā whare wāina Hōriana kāore e tāpiri i tētahi pūngāwhā taikura ki ā rātou pounamu hei kaitiaki. "He uaua ki a rātau te ātete i te haere [ko te hua]," tana kī. "Me whakarewa te hauora me te ōritetanga." Heoi anō, ka whakamutua e Ms Granik, i te nui ake o ngā kaiinu waina i te Uru e hiahia ana ki te whakamātau i tētahi mea hou, rerekē hoki, ka tipu pea te rongonui o ngā waina Hōriana. "He nui ngā mano tau kāore e hiahia ana ki tētahi Bordeaux. Kei te kimi rātau i tētahi mea rerekē, mohoao hoki. "Ā, he pai ki a rātau tēnei ariā o te waina māori, ārai rangatōpū he tawhito, he tawhito hoki, ā, kei te tuwhera rātau ki tēnei."

title: Haerenga a te Pāpa: E hia mano e haere ana ki te Mass i Glasgow
summary: Kua whakanuia e Pope Benedict XVI tētahi Mass tuwhera i Glasgow, i haere mai ai te tekau mano tāngata, i te rā tuatahi o tana haerenga ki Ingarangi.
text: Tata ki te 70,000 ngā tāngata i haere ki te takahanga whakanui i Bellahouston Park. I roto i tana karakia, ka whakatūpato te Pāpā ki ngā tāngata e rapu ana "ki te aukati i te whakapono whakapono i te kōrero tūmatanui". I mua ake, ka tohe a ia ki te UK kia ātete i "ngā momo whakatuki ake o te ao". Ināianei kua tae mai te Pāpā mā runga waka rererangi ki Heathrow. I tūtaki a ia ki a ia e te Koromatua o Rānōna, a, e toru ngā pukapuka i hoatu ki a ia, tae atu ki te pukapuka hītori a Tēnā Hōnea, To Dream of Roma. E noho ana te Pāpā i te pō i te Nunciature Apotoro - te nohoanga o tōna māngai i Ingarangi - i Wimbledon, ki te tonga-hauauru o Rāwāhi, i mua i tētahi rā o ngā takahanga, tae atu ki tētahi ratonga i Te Whare Wānanga o Westminster, i te Paraire. I karangatia e tētahi kaikōrero mo te Hāhi Katorika i Ingarangi me Uēra te rā tuatahi o te haerenga he "angitu". "I āwangawanga ngā tāngata katoa i roto i te ope o te Pāpā e te iwi i nga tiriti o Etinitini me te huri i Glasgow i tēnei ahiahi. Ehara i te mea ko te rahi anake o te huihuinga engari ko to rātau ngākau nui," tana kī. I roto i tana kauhau i Glasgow, ka kī te Pāpā ko aua tangata e hiahia ana ki te aukati i te whakapono i haere tonu ki te peita "hei tuma ki te ōritetanga me te wāteatanga". Engari i tohe a ia: "Ko te whakapono he pūmautanga o te wāteatanga tūturu me te manaakitanga." I kī te korero kōrero o TE WĀ, a Rawiri Willey, koinei te kaupapa e "hiahia ana te Pāpā ki te hama ki te kāinga i roto i tana haerenga ki te kāwanatanga e whā rā". I kī hoki te kōpaka he "mana tāketanga o te whanaungatanga" i whakawehi "ki te whakapouri i te pono kāore e rerekē ana mō te āhua o te tangata, tōna taenga me tōna tino pai". I tāpiri mai a ia: "E hiahiatia ana e te iwi i tēnei rā he reo mārama e whakatakoto ana i tō tātau mana kia ora, ehara i te ngahere o ngā wāteatanga whakangaro i a ia anō, engari i roto i tētahi iwi e mahi ana mō te oranga pono o ōna iwi, ā, ka tuku i ngā tohutohu me te parenga ki a rātau i mua i to rātau ngoikoretanga me te ngoikoretanga." I tohe hoki a ia ki nga taitamariki Katorika o Pākehā kia ātete i ngā whakamatautauranga "whakangaro me te whakawehewehe" o ngā rongoā, moni, wahine, āhuaatua me te waipiro. I tūmanako te Hāhi Katorika i Pākehā kia tae atu ki te 100,000 ki te takahanga, engari i muri iho ka whakahekea te kaha i muri i te pōturi o te tango tīkiti. I haere te Pāpā ki Glasgow mai i Etinitini, i reira i pōhiritia ai ia i tana haerenga ki UK e te Kuini i Holyroodhouse. I tōna taenga atu ki Bellahouston Park, ka pōhiritia te Pāpā mai i te pēne paipa Pirihimana o Strathclyde. I a ia e huri haere ana i te pāka i roto i tana Pāpa, ka hurihia te matapihi o te waka, ā, ka kihi te kōpae i tētahi pēpi e kākahu ana i te hūtu māwhero. I tae mai te Minita Tuatahi o Alex Salmond ki te pāka e mau ana i te kākahu tartan me te putiputi kōwhai, i te wā e poipoi ana te huihuinga i ngā haki kōwhai me te mā o te Whatikana. I waiatatia e te whetū o Ingarangi Got Talent a Susan Boyle te waiata How Great Thou Do i muri i te kauhau. Kua whakangahau kē a ia i te huihuinga hākinakina - he tokomaha o rātau e poipoi ana i ngā haki whakamaharatanga me ngā "pōkai hūnene" - me te waiata I Dreamed A Dream. I mahia hoki e te toa o Pop Idol 2003 a Mīharo McManus, nō Glasgow. 'Koha motuhake' Ko te haerenga te tuatahi ki UK e te pontiff mai i a Hoani Paora II i te tau 1982. Koia hoki te tuatahi i tohua hei haerenga kāwanatanga nā te mea kua pōhiritia te Pāpā e te Kuini, kaua ko te Hāhi. I mua ake, ka kī te Kuini he wā hai "whakaiti i te pātahitanga" i waenganui i te Katorika me nga Hāhi o Ingarangi me Pākehā. I whakamihi hoki a ia ki te "koha motuhake" a te Hāhi Katorika ki te āwhina i te hunga rawakore me te mōrearea puta noa i te ao. I kī te Pāpā e hiahia ana a ia ki te "toro atu i te ringa o te whakahoahoa" ki te katoa o te UK, ehara i te iwi Katorika anake. I tāpiri mai a ia: "I tēnei rā, e tohe ana te Hononga o Ingarangi kia noho hei iwi hou, ahurea maha hoki. I roto i tēnei hinonga uaua, kia mau tonu tōna manaaki ki aua uara tūturu me ngā kīanga ahurea kua kore e uara, e whakaae ana rānei ki ngā momo whakatuki ake." Kātahi ka uru atu te Pāpā ki te whakatūtū ā-tau o te Rā o Hato Ninian, ahakoa te haumarutanga kikī, i whakaarohia e ngā pirihimana e tata ana ki te 125,000 ngā tāngata i huri ki te whakatūpato i a ia. I whakaaro ngā Perehipiteriana, ngā māori, me ētahi atu rōpū i Etinitini ki te whakahē ki ngā kaupapa here a te Whatikana mō te mana whānau, ngā mana tāne me te whakatahe, ahakoa kāore ngā pirihimana i pūrongo i ētahi whakaaturanga nui. Ko ngā rōpū iti mai i te rōpū Whakahē i te Pāpa, te Grand Orange Lodge of Scotland me te kaiwhakarewa o te Hāhi Perehipiteriana Wātea, ko te Reverend Ian Paisley, ināianei ko Lord Bannside, i puta ki te whakahē. Kua pūrongotia e ngā pihopatanga i Ingarangi me Uēra e hia mano ngā wāhi kāore anō kia whakakīa mō tētahi whakatūpato i Te Pāka o Rāwāhi i te Rātapu mō te katinara o te rau tau 19 o John Henry Newman. Na te haerenga i tautohetohe ai te UK nā te utu me te heitara e karapoti ana i te tūkino tamariki i roto i te Hāhi Katorika. Huri noa i te BBC BBC Religion Related Internet Links Pope Benedict XVI in the UK The Guardian National Catholic Safeguarding Commission Association of Chief Police Officers Humanist Society of Scotland

title: E 550 tau mai i te whānautanga o Kahu Nanak e whakanui ana i ngā tāhuhu o Gravesend
summary: Tata ki te 5,000 ngā Tīmata Tīmata e whakanui ana i te huritau 550 o te whānautanga o te kaiwhakarewa o Te Tīmatanga o Te Tīmatanga o Te Tīmata.
text: Kei te tohua te takahanga i te gurdwara i Gravesend me ngā inoi, te here tāhae, ngā toi taua me te hanga "langar" i roto i te kītini ā-iwi. I whakawāteatia te whare i Saddington Street i te tau 2011, ā, ko tētahi o ngā mea nui rawa atu i te UK. Neke atu i te 15,000 ngā tāhuhu e noho ana i taua rohe, e tohu ana neke atu i te 15% o te iwi whānui o Gravesend. I te tirohanga i Gravesend Min Kaur, he tino nui tēnei huritau mō ngā tāhuhu tīmata i te whakatuwheratanga o tētahi ara manene i waenganui i Īnia me Pakitāne, e āhei ana ki te uru ki tētahi o ngā wāhi tapu rawa o te Tīmata. I wehea te rohe Punjab i te wā o te pātaki o Īnia Peretania i te tau 1947, engari i whakatuwheratia te pānuitanga o Kartarpur, e hono ana i ngā wāhi wehewehe, i ngā rā i mua i te huritau 550 o te whānautanga o Kahu Nanak, i te 12 o Whiringa Whiringa. Ka whakaaetia e ia te urunga kore visa mō ngā hīrere Īnia ki te wāhi tapu o Gurdwara Darbar Sahib i Pakitāne. Ko nga gurdwara hītori o Īnia, tae atu ki te wāhi tapu rawa o Te Tīmata, ko te Harmandir Sahib, te Temepara Koura rongonui i Te Urupa, i whakaawe i te temepara i Gravesend. Ko tōna pourewa, e 60ft Nishaan Sahib (haki Tīmata) e tū whakakake ana i mua i te whare e rima. Kua hoahoatia te matatini me ngā waharoa e whā hei whakatakoto i te mātāpono o te tuwhera ki te katoa. Pānuitanga o Kartarpur: I waitohu a Īnia rāua ko Pakitāne i te mahi a te kaupapa o te temepara o Tīmata, ko te tuakana o te gurdwara, ko Manpreet Mahi Dhaliwal, he rā matua tērā i roto i te maramataka o Tīmata. "Ka whai wāhi mātou ki te huihui katoa me te whakaharatau i ngā whakaakoranga matua pēnei i te whakaatu aroha ki ētahi atu, kia ōrite te mahi i te katoa ahakoa te iwi, te hāhi, te ira tangata rānei, me te mea nui rawa atu te maumahara ki te atua me te whakatipu i te aroha i roto," tana kī. I kī a Kamarata Narwan, he mema o te whakaminenga, mai i Dartford, i tino mīharo nga tāhuhu ki a Kahu Nanak. "I tīmataria e ia te tīmatanga o te Tīmata, a, e manaaki ana mātau i a ia," tana kī. I akona mātau e ia kia atawhai tētahi ki tētahi."

title: Pānga pāpāho pāpori 'iti' i roto i ngā taiohi, ka kitea e te akoranga nui
summary: He iti noa iho ngā pānga o te whakamahinga pāpāho pāpori ki te oranga taiohi, ā, tērā pea he "iti", e hua ana tētahi akoranga o ngā taitamariki 12,000 UK.
text: He nui ake te pānga o te whānau, ngā hoa me te oranga kura ki te oranga ora, e kī ana te tīma rangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Oxford. E kī ana he hōhonu ake, he pakari ake tana akoranga i ngā mea o mua. Ā, ka tohe i ngā kamupene kia tuku raraunga me pēhea te whakamahi a te tangata i te pāpāho pāpori kia mārama ake ai ki te pānga o te hangarau ki te oranga o te rangatahi. Ko te akoranga, i whakaputaina i roto i te tuhitaka PNAS, e ngana ana ki te whakautu i te pātai mēnā he iti iho te ngākau ora o ngā taitamariki e whakamahi ana i te pāpāho pāpori i te wawaenga, mēnā rānei he nui ake te whakamahinga o te pāpāho pāpori. He rite tonu te tūpono o ngā rangahau o mua mō te pātahitanga i waenganui i ngā mata, te hangarau me te hauora hinengaro o ngā tamariki. E kī ana a Prof Andrew Przybylski rāua ko Amy Orben, mai i te Whare Wānanga Ipurangi o Oxford i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, i runga anō i ngā whakaaturanga whāiti kāore e hoatu ana i te pikitia katoa. I whakamutua e ta rātau akoranga ko te nuinga o ngā hononga i waenganui i te ngākau ora me te whakamahinga pāpāho pāpori he "noa iho", e kaute ana mō te iti iho i te 1% o te oranga o te taitamariki - ā, ko te pānga o te pāpāho pāpori "ehara i te tiriti kotahi". I kī a Prof Przybylski, ko te kaiwhakahaere rangahau i te whare wānanga: "99.75% o te oranga o te tangata kāore he pānga ki tā rātou whakamahi i te pāpāho pāpori." I tonoa e te akoranga, i tū i waenganui i te 2009 me te 2017, e hia mano ngā pakeke 10 ki te 15 tau ki te kōrero e hia te roa o te whakamahi pāpāho pāpori i tētahi rā kura pūnoa, ā, ka whakatauria hoki te makona i a rātau ki ngā āhuatanga rerekē o te ora. I kitea e rātau he nui ake ngā pānga o te wā i pau i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i roto i ngā kōtiro, engari he iti, ā, kāore i nui ake i ngā pānga i kitea i roto i ngā taitama. He iti iho i te haurua o ēnei pānga he mea nui te tatauranga, ka kī rātau. "Kaua ngā mātua e māharahara ki te wā i runga i te pāpāho pāpori - he hē te whakaaro pērā," te kī a Prof Przybylski. "Kua mau tonu mātou i te wā - engari me whakamutu tēnei ariā o te wā mata. " Kāore ngā hua i te whakaatu i ngā whakaaturanga mō te āwangawanga nui." I kī ngā kairangahau he mea nui ināianei te tāutu i ngā rangatahi e nui ake ana te mōrearea i ētahi pānga o te pāpāho pāpori, me te kimi i ētahi atu take e pā ana ki tō rātou oranga. E whakaaro ana rātou ki te tūtaki ki ngā kamupene pāpāho pāpori ākuanei ki te kōrerorero me pēhea rātou e mahi tahi ai ki te ako anō me pēhea te whakamahi a te tangata i ngā taupānga - ehara i te wā anake e pau ana i a rātou. 'Hipanga iti tuatahi' i kī a Ms Orben, te kaituhi ako tahi me te kaiako hinengaro i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, me tuku e te umanga ā rātou raraunga whakamahinga me te tautoko i ngā rangahau takitahi. "He kī te āheitanga ki te mārama ki ngā tūranga maha e tākaro ana te pāpāho pāpori i roto i te oranga o te rangatahi," tana kī. I tāruatia e Dr Max Davie, te āpiha mō te whakapai ake i te hauora i te Kāreti Ariki o Paediatrics me te Hauora Tamariki, te karanga kia mahi tahi ngā kamupene me ngā kaipūtaiao, ā, ka karangatia te akoranga "te hipanga iti tuatahi". Heoi anō, i kī a ia he take anō hei tūhura, pēnei i te whakararuraru o te wā mata ki ētahi atu ngohe hira pēnei i te moe, te mahi me te wā me te whānau, hoa rānei. "E tūtohu ana mātou kia whai ngā whānau i tā mātou tohutohu i whakaputaina i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ā, ka karo tonu i te whakamahi mata mō te kotahi haora i mua i te moenga, nā te mea he take anō i tua atu i te hauora hinengaro kia hiahia ai ngā tamariki ki te moe pai i te pō."

title: £5m pūtea penapena i roto i te whakangahau i Buckley, Flint me Deeside
summary: Neke atu i te £5m e whakapaua ana ki te whakapai ake i ngā pūkenga i ngā pokapū whakangahau e toru e whakahaeretia ana e te kaunihera i Flintshire.
text: Kua oti tētahi whare tākaro hou me ngā piu i roto i tētahi whanaketanga £2.4m i Deeside, arā ko tētahi wāhi hākinakina tino taumaha i roto i te whare e oti tonu ana. Kei te hangaia tētahi ara peihana 10-pine ki Flint i roto i tētahi whakamohoatanga £1.1m. Ā, ka whakatuwheratia tētahi rūma whakapakari tinana hou me te taiwhanga kanikani i Buckley a tērā tau hei wāhanga o tētahi whakahoutanga £1m. Kua uru te kaunihera o te rohe ki tētahi mahi ngātahi me tētahi umanga tūmataiti, Alliance Leisure, ki te mahi i ngā whakapainga. Councillor Dennis Hutchinson, executive member for leisure and public protection at Flintshire council, said: "In these difficult financial times, when all the talk is of public sector budget cuts, partnering with a private sector company has allowed us to make facility and service improvements for the benefit of our community." Ko te akoranga taura tiketike i kī a ia ko ta rātau whāinga kia whakahauhau i ētahi atu tāngata kia whai wāhi ki te tākaro auau me te ngohe ā-tinana. Kei te oti ngā mahi i te pokapū whakangahau o Deeside. I hangaia e te wāhanga tuatahi e ono ngā papa whutupōro waipuke 5-a-taha. Ko te wāhanga tuarua e whakatuwheratia ana a tērā marama, kei roto ko tētahi huinga whakapakari tinana e 80 teihana, e rua ngā whare whakapakari tinana, he taiwhanga whakapakari me ngā rūma huri hōu. Ko te wāhanga whakamutunga, nā te mea ka oti i te Hānuere 2012, kei roto ko tētahi spa rā me tētahi papa tākaro tino taumaha me tētahi papa tākaro tiketike me te papa reti. Ākuanei ka tīmata te mahi i te pokapū whakangahau o Flint, ā, ka kite i tētahi ara peihana 10 pine i roto i te hōro hākinakina me tētahi kākāriki peihana rō whare i runga i te papa i runga. And from next January work is due to start at Buckley leisure centre, attached to Elfed high school, where work includes long awaited extra parking spaces as well as new facilities. It is hopeed upgrades will also be carried out at council leisure centres in Holywell and Mold.

title: Ka tipu ngā āwangawanga āhuarangi i waenganui i te mākū o Hui tanguru i runga i te pūkete
summary: I tērā marama ko te Hui tanguru tino mākū i te UK mai i te tīmatanga o ngā pūkete i te tau 1862, e ai ki te Tari Tūtaki.
text: Nā Mark KinverEnvironment kaipānui i whiwhi te UK i te toharite o te 209.1mm o te marangai, 237% i runga ake i te wawaenga mō te marama i waenganui i te 1981 me te 2010. I tētahi atu wāhi, i huatau tētahi uiuinga e tata ana ki te hauwhā o ngā tāngata i whakaaro ko te huringa āhuarangi te "take tino pēhi e anga ana ki te UK". I huatau hoki te tauira māngai o ngā tāngata e 1,401 kua tāruatia te "āwangawanga āhuarangi" mai i te tau 2016. I te wā o Hui tanguru, ka tukuna katoatia e ngā āwhā o Ciara, a Dennis me Jorge te nui o te marangai i runga i ētahi wāhi o UK. I tukuna hoki e Storm Dennis te tapeke toharite tuarua o ia rā i roto i tētahi huingararaunga e hoki ana ki te tau 1891. I taka hoki a Ciara rāua ko Jorge i te ua nui hei āhuahira i te 0.5% o ngā rā mō te marangai toharite o UK. 'Tino ātaahua' "He tino āhua kore nei e toru ngā takahanga marangai tino whānui i te marama maramataka kotahi," te kī a Dr Mark McKaka, te upoko o te Pokapū Mōhiohio Āhuarangi o te Motu. "Kua āwhina te rangahau pakaru whenua o te Tari Tūtaki ki te nui o ngā whakaaturanga e tino mōrearea ana te marangai tino nui mō te UK, ā, kua whakanuia e te huringa āhuarangi te tūponotanga o ngā takahanga timatanga tino nui." Nā tētahi akoranga a te Rōpū Mōrearea Mātauranga o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare E rua tekau mā toru ōrau o ērā i pātaitia i kī ko te huringa āhuarangi te take tino pēhi e anga ana ki te UK i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei, tuarua anake ki a Brexit (25%). Kua piki hoki te māharahara mō te huringa āhuarangi, me te 40% - e rua ngā wā i te 2016 - o ngā kaiwhakautu e kī ana he "tino māharahara, tino māharahara rānei" mō te take. I kitea hoki i roto i tōna rōpū tauira he iti te āhua o te āhuarangi, me te 64% o ngā kaiwhakautu e whakaaro ana kei te rongo kē a Ingarangi i ngā pānga o te huringa, i whakaritea ki te 41% i te uiuinga 2010. I kī a Prof Nick Pidgeon, tētahi o ngā kaituhi o te akoranga, ko te nui o te mahi me te pānuitanga pāpāho o te take, kāore a ia i mīharo ki te nui o te āwangawanga mō te huringa āhuarangi i waenganui i te iwi. Heoi anō, i "tino ohorere" a ia mō te āhua o te tangata ki ngā mōrea āhuarangi, pēnei i ngā ngaru wera me te whakamahanatanga, kua "tino rerekē" mai i te wā whakamutunga i whakaaturia i roto i tētahi uiuinga i te tau 2013. "I te [uiuinga] whakamutunga, i tino mārama ehara te 'tohutoro wera' i te mea i kitea e te tangata hei wāhanga o te huringa āhuarangi mō te UK," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero. "Kua rerekē tēnā ināianei, ā, ki a mātou, he tino hira tēnā ki te kaupapahere me te karere urutaunga āhuarangi." Ahakoa i kawea te uiuinga i Whiringahora 2019, i mua i te horahanga o te coronavirus huri noa, ka kī a Prof Pidgeon kua whakatūria te āwangawanga mō te huringa āhuarangi i roto i ngā hinengaro o te iwi, ā, kei te puta mai he huringa whakaahua ki te mōhiotanga taiao nui ake i roto i te iwi. I kī a Prof Pidgeon ko ngā kitenga o te akoranga, e pūteatia ana e ngā kaunihera rangahau o UK, ka whakamahia e te Komiti Huringa Āhuarangi o UK, e tohutohu ana i te kāwanatanga mo taua take. I kitea e Dr Kate Lonsdale, te toa tahi o te UK Climate Resilience Programme: "Kua nui haere te mārama o te whakaaro pūtaiao kei te nui haere ngā mōrea āhuarangi i te tūponotanga me te taumahatanga. " Ināianei kei a mātau he whakaaturanga e kite ana ngā tāngata i Ingarangi i ēnei mōrea e hāngai ana ki o rātau oranga i tēnei rā, kaua ko tētahi mea ka pā ki ngā tāngata ā muri ake nei, i ētahi atu wāhi hoki. Ko te taenga mai o ngā āwhā e toru i tapaina i te wā o Hui tanguru, kāore i taea e te maha o ngā pūnaha awa, nā reira e waipuketia ana ngā mano kāinga i Aotearoa, i Uēra me ngā Midlands ki te Hauauru. I kī a John Curtin, ko te kaiwhakahaere nui mō te Whakahaeretanga Waipuke me te Mōrearea Taiao o te Taiao, kua whakamātauria e te marangai me ngā taumata awa ngā parenga waipuke o te iwi, ā, kua taea e ia te pare neke atu i te 80,000 ngā kāinga. Heoi anō, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "He tūkinotanga whaiaro ia kāinga waipuke, ā, me nui ake tātau ki te waipuke."

title: Aroha mai a Helen Mary Jones o Plaid Cymru mō te retweet 'mamae me te mamae'
summary: Kua whakapārewa tētahi pāremata Plaid Cymru mō tētahi retweet i mōhiotia e ia kua "mamae me te mamae ki te tokomaha".
text: Nā Catrin Haf Jones i tiria e te kaipānui tōrangapū o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, a Helen Mary Jones, tētahi tweet e whakahē ana i te hunga e whakataurite ana i te whakahāweatanga e anga ana ki te iwi whakawhiti ki te Holocaust. Heoi anō, he tokomaha nga mema o te rōpū i karanga i te whakapae "haurua ngākau" ā, kua whakakorea e ētahi o rātau mematanga. E kī ana te kaiārahi Plaid Cymru, a Arama Price, kua "tukua te rōpū ki ngā mana o te iwi whakawhiti". I tiria e Ms Jones tētahi tweet a tētahi kaiako o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga e kī ana: "Ahakoa tō tūnga i runga i te tuakiri o te ira tangata me te ira tangata, kāti koa te whakataurite i tēnei ki te Whakanui. Ka tū ahau me ētahi atu tokomaha ki mua, ki te wāhi rānei o te hunga e purua ana ki runga i ngā tereina e ahu ana ki ngā puni mate." I urupare te kaitono o Plaid Cymru o Mua, o Pirihi Arāna, mai i Clwyd South, ki tana retweet mā te kī i runga i te "pouri nui" i whakaaro ai ia me wehe atu ia i te rōpū. "Kāore he kōwhiringa i mahue i a au te tūnga tūmatanui o ētahi māngai pōti ki te iwi whakawhiti," tana kī i runga i te Twitter. I kī a Nicholas James, he mema o Plaid Cymru mai i Wrexham mai i te tau 2015, kua whakakorea e ia tana mematanga e kī ana ko te retweet a te mema o te Senedd (MS) mō Mid and West Wales ko "te kakau witi whakamutunga". "Kua roa tēnei e puta ana," tana kī. "I wehe ahau nā te mea kua kite ahau i te tūkinotanga ā-hinengaro o te transphobia ki ngā tāngata, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau he mea nui kia noho hei urunga kaha. " Mēnā e hiahia ana a Plaid Cymru ki te hoko i te whakaahua o tētahi Uēra whānui, takitahi ki te pōti i te pōtitanga e whai ake nei i Mei, kāore e taea e ia te whakarapa i tētahi MS i pōtitia e tiritiri ana i te transphobic... rauemi i Twitter." I kī a Tēnā Hemi i kitea e ia he whakahāwea te tweet nā te mea "i ūkuia ngā tāngata trans me ngā tāngata tāne i te wā o te Whakanuitanga, ā, he mōrearea pea te whakarapa i ēnei tāngata e ūkuia ana mō te whakahāweatanga anō." I mukua e Ms Jones te karere mai i tana pūkete i te Mane, e whakapōhē ana i tētahi tweet whai muri i te Wenerei. "E ai ki tētahi retweet mōku i te mutunga wiki, kua mōhio ahau ināianei kua mamae me te mamae ki te tokomaha, ā, e pouri ana ahau," tana kī. Heoi anō, i kī te mema o te rōpū, a Aled Williams, mai i Maesteg, he "hāwhe ngākau" te whakapae, a, ka karanga ki a ia kia whakarerea. "Kua tawhiti rawa tēnei mō te tokomaha o tātau," tana kī. "Ko te mea e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakamahi i tētahi mea pēnei hei tukituki i te whawhai a te iwi trans i tēnei rā mō ngā motika me te whakaaetia, i whakaaro ahau he weriweri tēnā ki te pono. " Kāore au e pīrangi ki tētahi tangata e whakapono ana e tohu ana i ahau, nā te mea kāore rātau e tohu ana i tāku e whakapono ana. "E whakamihi ana ahau ki te tukunga iho o Helen Mary Jones. Ki taku whakaaro ehara i te mea tika kia noho ia hei Plaid Cymru MS." Hei urupare, ka kī te kaiārahi Plaid Cymru, a Arama Price: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakaū anō i te whāinga tūturu a Plaid Cymru ki ngā mana o te iwi whakawhiti. He tāne ngā tāngata trans, he wāhine ngā wāhine trans. "E maioha ana ahau ki te whakapae mai i tētahi mema o taku kāpata kōruru i muri i tētahi karere kua mukua ināianei, nāna i mamae me te mamae ki te tokomaha."

title: Ngā pahūtanga o Volgograd: Ka haumaru ngā Kēmu 'māia' o TE WHK
summary: E kī ana te perehitini o te Komiti o te Orangirangi o te Ao Whānui e maia ana a ia ka tukua e ngā mana Rūhia he Kēmu "haumaru, haumaru hoki" i Sochi.
text: I tuhituhi a Thomas Bach ki a Perehitini Tūroro ki te whakapuaki i ngā aroha mo nga whakaekenga "whakarihariha" i tūtuki ki a Volgograd i roto i te 24 haora. E kī ana ngā kaihoko i honoa ngā whakaekenga i runga i tētahi teihana rerewhenua me te pahi trolleybus, i patua ai e 31 neke atu rānei ngā tāngata. Neke atu i te marama i mua i te tīmatanga o te Hākinakina o te Hōtoke. I ūkuia hoki a Volgograd i Whiringahora, i te wā i patua ai e tētahi wahine whakapae e ono nga tāngata i roto i te whakaekenga i runga i te pahi. E mōhiotia whānuitia ana i Rūhia ko ngā tāngata i mahi i ngā whakapae o Volgograd i roto i te tauwhāinga ā-Māori ki te ture o Rūhia i ngā whenua o Kaukaka o Akinaia me Dagestan, ā, ko te ūnga ko ngā Kēmu, e kī ana te korero kōrero o Mohihi o TE HAU, a Daniel Sandford. I roto i tētahi kōrero, kāore te manatu ā-rohe o Rūhia i whakapae i tētahi rōpū, engari i whakaritea ngā whakaekenga ki ngā mahi a ngā kaiwhakawhanake i Te Hononga o Amerika, i Hiria me ētahi atu wāhi. I karangatia e ia te pārurutanga o te ao whānui i roto i te whawhai ki "tētahi hoariri mōrearea ka taea anake te hinga tahi", i pūrongotia ai te kōwhiringa rongokōrero o Kōrero. I kī te Kāwana ā Rohe o Te Kāwana o Te E kī ana ngā kaihoko āmaimai o Rūhia, neke atu i te 14 ngā tāngata i mate i roto i tētahi pomu whai i a ia i runga i tētahi pahi tōkeke i Volgograd i te ata Mane. I puta mai i te rā i muri i te matenga o te 17 tāngata i tētahi atu whakaekenga whai i a ia i te teihana matua o te taone. I whara ngā piro i roto i ngā whakaekenga e rua. I roto i tana kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Bach e "mōhio tūturu ana ka mahia ngā mea katoa hei whakaū i te haumarutanga o ngā kaitākaro me ngā kaiuru katoa o ngā Kēmu Orangirangi", e tūwhera ana i te 7 o Hui tanguru. Engari e kī ana ngā kōrero ahakoa te kaha o te haumarutanga i Sochi, kei te āmaimai ngā Rūhia i te whai i ēnei whakaekenga i Volgograd - e takoto ana i te 700km ki te raki o Sochi - ka taea hoki e ngā tūruhi te tuki ki tētahi atu wāhi. Kāore tētahi tangata i whakaae ki te mahi i tētahi poho, engari he maha nga marama i muri i te whakawehi a te kaiārahi whakakeke o Rūhia, tae atu ki te Omirangi. I kī a Tūroro Markin, he kōrero mō te Komiti Whakamatau - te mana rangahau matua o Rūhia - i whakamahia ngā pakū ōrite i roto i ngā whakaekenga e rua. "E whakaū ana tēnei i te ariā e honoa ana ngā whakaekenga e rua. Tērā pea i whakaritea rātau i te wāhi kotahi," tana kī. Kua whakahaua e Perehitini Hapa kia whakamaheretia ngā tikanga haumarutanga puta noa i Rūhia, engari i Volgograd. I whakataua e te US nga whakaekenga, ā, ka tukuna tana "tautoko katoa ki te kāwanatanga o Rūhia i roto i ngā whakaritenga haumarutanga mō ngā Kēmu Orangirangi o Sochi". I kī te Kaunihera Haumarutanga UN i whakataua e ōna mema "i roto i ngā whakaritenga tino kaha" ngā mahi "hara, kāore e tika ana". I kī te Pirimia o UK, a Rawiri, a Rawiri, i runga i te Twitter i "ohorere, i pouri" a ia i ngā whakaekenga, a, ka tukuna atu ki Mohihi ngā āwhina katoa e hiahiatia ana. Mākete arokē I tū te pahūtanga hou i te taha o tētahi mākete arokē i te takiwā o Dzerzhinsky o Volgograd. I kī a Maksim Akhmetov, tētahi kaipānui pouaka whakaata Rūhia i te wāhi o te pākarekareka, i kī te pahi trolleybus i te tāngata e haere ana ki te mahi i te haora tere o te ata. I whakaahuatia e ia te tirohanga he "wehi", kātahi anō ka "tūkinotia" te pahi, ā, he "tinana i ngā wāhi katoa, he toto i runga i te hukarere". I kī te Minita Hauora o Veronika Skvortsova ko te whara ko tētahi wahine hapū, tokorua 16 tau te pakeke me tētahi pēpi e ono marama te pakeke kua mate ōna mātua. E rima nga rā o te tangi i pānuitia e te kāwana ā rohe. Na te kaha o te pahūtanga i tango te nuinga o waho o te pahi, a, ka whati i ngā matapihi i roto i ngā whare pātata. "Ināianei ka taea te kī atu i whakaritea te pūrere pakū e tētahi kaiwhakatūtū whai i a ia - he tangata kua kohia ōna kongakonga tinana, kua tukuna hoki hei whakamātau iranga," te kī a te Komiti Whakamatau i roto i tētahi kōrero. I te wā o te tina i te Rātapu, i te wā o te Rātapu, i te wā e kī ana i ngā tāngata e haere ana ki te whakanui i te Tau Hou. I roto i ngā tau tata nei, he maha nga whakaekenga a te hunga Māori i te rohe o Kaukaka ki te Raki. Kua whakaekea hoki e nga whawhai nga taone nui o Rūhia.

title: I patua te tangata o Northampton i roto i te whakaekenga 'taikaha, whakamataku'
summary: Kua mate tētahi tangata i muri i te whakaahuatanga a ngā pirihimana he whakaekenga "taikaha, whakamataku" i tōna kāinga o Northampton.
text: Ko te matenga o Rawiri Brickwood, e 74, e whakamahia ana hei kōhuru, i muri i te whakaekenga i te whare i Te Ara o Te Taone. I muri noa iho i te 02:00 BST i te Hātarei, ka mate a Tēnā Brickwood, i muri noa iho i te 02:00 BST i te Hātarei, ka kī pirihimana. Kua whakatūria he rūma mahi nui hai tūhura i te kōhurutanga o Tēnā Brickwood. He tini ngā tāngata kua takoha ki a Tēnā Brickwood i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, e whakaahua ana i a ia he "tangata atawhai, aroha hoki", he "tangata pukumahi pono" me tētahi "poutohu o Abington". I kī a Det Ch Insp Mick Graham, o Ngā Pirihimana o Northamptonshire: "Waimarie, he tino āhua kore nei ngā mahi o tēnei āhua, ā, ka inoi atu ahau ki te iwi whānui kia whakapā mai ki a mātau mēnā e mōhio ana rātou ki tētahi mea mō te matenga o Tēnā Brickwood, he aha rānei i pā mai i ngā haora e ahu mai ana ki tēnei mahi."

title: Ka whakatūpato pirihimana 'kia tōkeke'
summary: Kua whakatūpato te kauwhau i Sri Rānaka ki nga pirihimana i te takiwā o Tōnapura kia kaua e whai wāhi ki a rātau whakamatautau mo te tutukitanga pōti.
text: I kī atu te kaiwhakawā tāpiri o Tōnapura, a MMM Mihail, ki te kōti tūwhera he 'kore pai' te mahi a nga pirihimana i runga i ngā whakaekenga o mua tata nei ki ngā kaipōrangapū ātete. I tāpaetia e ia nga kōrero i te wā i tukuna e nga pirihimana he pūrongo B pōraru mo te whakaekenga o te kaitapere kaingākautia me te kaitono o te Rangatira o Ranjan Ramanayaka i te 13 o Aotearoa. I haere mai ngā kaitautoko o Ramanayaka me te Rōpū ā Iwi o te Hononga o te Motu (UNP) tae atu ki a Dunesh Gankanda, MP, i raro i te whakaekenga a te māpu i Gallella, Wewelwatta. Kua hopukina e nga pirihimana e whā nga mema o te Toputanga wāteatanga o te Iwi o te Hononga o te Iwi (UPFA) i muri i te takanga. Heoi anō, ko te whakatūpato tuarua ki ngā pirihimana i tukuna e te rangatira pirihimana o Wewelwatta, ko Saman Liyanage i kī ai ko te tokowhā he kaitautoko UNP nāna i whakaeke te āhuatanga o tētahi kaitautoko UPFA. Ka tukua e te kōti nga pōhēhētanga i runga i te utu, a, ka whakahaua e nga pirihimana kia kōnae i tētahi pūrongo tika mo nga whakapae ki nga pōhēhētanga. Ko te wā tuarua tēnei i whakapaea ai nga pirihimana i te kawanatanga o Hariagamuwa i te korenga e whakahaere i ngā tūhuratanga tōkeke. I te 12 o Aotearoa, ka whakatūpato te kaiwhakawā o Tōnapura, o Kānata A Kahandagamage ki nga pirihimana i te 12 o Aotearoa kia kaua e whai wāhi, kia whakahaere i ngā tūhuratanga tika, ā-ture hoki mō ngā amuamu mo te tutukitanga pōti. I muri i te tukunga atu o nga kaitautoko tokorima o Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) i runga i te utu, ka kōrero te Kaiwhakawā o Kahandagame. Tokotoru o ngā pōhēhētanga i pāngia he whara i roto i te tūnga ki ngā kaitautoko UPFA i te 10 o Aotearoa. E whakapae ana ngā kaitautoko ātete i ngā pirihimana kāore i te mahi ki ngā kaitautoko rōpū whakahaere e tuku ana i te tutu i te whakahaerenga ki te pōti o te Kaunihera Porowini (RW). Heoi anō, i kōrero tōmua atu a Te Kaitirotiro Tuarua o Pirihimana (DIG), a Uplali Hewage, ki a KOE Sandeshia e whakararuraru ana a JVP i te tutu pōti. I te 23 o Aotearoa ka tū te pōti mō ngā RW o Te Raki me te Raki Waenganui.

title: Kāore te āpiha moana o Plymouth o mua i hara ki ngā hara wahine e rua
summary: Kua whakawāteatia tētahi āpiha matua o te moana o mua, nāna i mahi he aho whakaekenga kino ki ngā tāngata i nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, e 90 tekau mā rua.
text: I tērā tau i kitea ai he hara a Charles Howeson, e 68, mai i Plymouth, e 10 ngā whakaekenga kino ki ngā tāngata tokowaru. I mua ake, ka wetekina ia e te hūri i te Kōti Karauna o Bristol i te tūkinotanga nui me te whakaekenga kino ki tētahi kaiwhakapae iwa. I tukuna he utu ki a ia tae noa ki te whiu a tērā Paraire. I hikitia e te Kaiwhakawā o Mark Horton te whiu i muri i te rongonga mai i a Daniel Janner QC, e tiaki ana, kua kitea a Howeson i te mate pukupuku kāore e taea te mahi, ā, ka tīmata i te kōpuku me te radiotherapy. He rongo anō mai i Devon. I te wā o te whakawātanga i tērā tau, ka rongo te kōti i whakamahia e Howeson tōna tūnga mana i roto i te Royal Navy me te aroha o Plymouth Area Groundwork Trust ki te mahi i ngā hara. I rahua te hūri ki te whakatau i nga whakapae e rua, kua wetekina ia ināianei. I whakakāhore a Howeson, o Craigie Drive, Plymouth, i ngā whakapae katoa, ā, e hiahia ana ki te tono ki ōna whakapae. He rangatira a ia i roto i te taua moana, ā, kua mau hoki i a ia ngā tūnga pakihi kōtaha tiketike, tae atu ki te Kaunihera Kaihoko mō te Wai me ngā Tereina Tuatahi o te Uru. I roto i tētahi kōrero i puta i waho o te kōti, ka kī tana wahine a Emma Howeson: "E whakapono ana ahau ki taku tāne e 40 tau, ā, e hiahia ana māua ki te mihi ki to mātau tīma ture me te whānau katoa, ngā hoa me ngā hoa mahi o mua kua tino mārama e mōhio ana rātau ki te harakore o Charles. " Ka haere tonu mātau ki te whawhai ki te whakawātea i tōna ingoa, ā, e tono ana mātau ki nga whakapae o tērā o Hakihea," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ka taka ngā mākete hea i muri i te pōti Waiho
summary: I tino nui te hinga o Wall Street me te FTSE 100 i roto i tētahi rā mohoao o te tauhokohoko i muri i te pōti a te UK mō Pakihi.
text: Nā Pirihi JohnstonBusiness kaipānui i hinga te taupū kikorangi o Rāwāhi i te 7% i te tauhokohoko tōmua ki neke atu i te 5,800 ngā piro, engari i whakamutua te rā 3.15% i raro iho i te 6,138. I pāngia katoatia e ngā mākete o New York me Ūropi ngā hinganga nui ake, ā, i whakairihia e te Dow Jones tana kiriata nui rawa atu i te rā kotahi i roto i te tata ki te rima tau. I tūpou hoki a Sterling, neke atu i te 8% ki te tāra me te 6% ki te ūropi. I tapahia e te pokapū whakatauranga nama a Moody's te tirohanga a UK mai i te pūmau ki te tōraro i te pō Paraire, e kī ana ka ngoikore pea te tupu o te ohaoha. I tino nui te hinga o Wall Street i te tauhokohoko tōmuri, ā, neke atu i te 600 ngā piro, te 3.4% rānei o te Dow ki te kati i te 17,400 ngā piro. I hinga te S&P 500 i te 3.6% - te kiriata nui rawa o ia rā i roto i te 10 marama - i te wā i hinga te Nasdaq i te 4.1% hei hoatu i te taupū arotahi hangarau i tōna rā kino rawa mai i te 2011. I kī a Jack Ablin, te āpiha pūtea penapena matua o BMO Private Bank: "He takahanga tēnei i mau ai te nuinga o ngā kaihoko huri noa. Ka kite mātou i ētahi atu rā pēnei i tēnei rā, i te mea ka hē pea te whakaaro nui i ētahi atu take." I Rāwāhi ko te FTSE 250, ko te nuinga o ngā kamupene e hokohoko ana i te UK, i whakahekea te 7.2% ki te kati i te 16,088 ngā piro. Ko te rōpū ratonga pūtea a Aldermore te hinga nui rawa atu i te 250, heke iho i te 32%, me te kaihanga whare o Crest Nicholson e kati ana i te 26% i raro iho. Ko ngā kaihanga whare hoki ngā hinga nui rawa e toru i runga i te FTSE 100, ā, e 29% te kiriata o Taylor Wimpey. I kī te kaitātari o Liberum, a Charlie Campbell: "He kino te hua mō ngā hea a ngā kaihanga whare i te pahekotanga o te pōturi o te GDP, te pikinga o ngā mokatere mo te wā roa me te rangirua tōrangapū pēnei i te Kryptonite mō taua rōpū hea." Heoi anō, i whakamutua tonutia e te taupū FTSE 100 te wiki teitei ake i te tīmatanga i te 6,021 ngā piro. I peke te kaikari koura o Randgold i te 14%, i te wā i piki ake ngā kamupene kiritaki tae atu ki GlaxoSmithKline, Unilever me Diageo, neke atu i te 3%. I muri i te tautohetohe a te Pēke o Ingarangi ki te uru atu ki te āwhina i ngā mākete. I kī a Kāwana Mark Carney kua rite te Pēke ki te whakarato i te £250bn hei tautoko i ngā mākete, engari i tāpiritia "ka taea te tūmanako i ētahi mākete me te whakawhāititanga o te ohaoha i te wā e puta ana tēnei tukanga". I kī hoki te 'kimi utu' Te Pēke Matua o Ūropi e āta tirotiro ana i ngā mākete pūtea, ā, kei te whakapā tata atu ki ētahi atu pēke matua. I kī a Laith Khalaf, te kaitātari matua i Hargreaves Lansdown, i āwhina ngā kaiwhakangao i te kimi i ngā utu i te taupū kikorangi ā muri ake nei i te rā. "He nui tonu ngā rawa FTSE 100 i whakamutua te rā i te rohe tōrunga, ko te nuinga o aua kamupene he nui ngā moni whiwhinga o rāwāhi, e whai hua ana i tētahi pauna ngoikore," tana kī. "E titiro whakamua ana, e tūmanako ana mātou kia nui ake te kōpikopiko i ngā rā me ngā wiki e haere ake nei." Tauhohenga o Te Pakihi: E rima ngā wāhi hei mātakitaki i runga i te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Jack: Ko te taupāngatanga pakihi nui e whakahē ana i te tumeke o te Taone i te hua o te taupānga UK 'tērā pea ka pā ki te kore' Ka pēhea te pānga o Te Pākehā ki ō pūtea? Tērā pea ka whai te mātāmua o te mākete āhuatanga i ngā Atekōkiri EU 'e anga ana ki te pikinga o ngā utu penehīni' Ngā waea pakihi mō te pūmautanga me te aronga i hinga neke atu i te 10% i te Paraire ki ngā taumata kāore i kitea mai i te 1985, e ngoto ana i te $1.3236 ki te tāra, i mua i te hokinga mai o ētahi whenua ki te $1.3578. I kī a John Higgins o Capital Economics: "Ahakoa he iti iho tēnei i te $1.50 i tae ki te tōmuri o te Rāitema (wā UK), kāore i te tino rerekē i te taumata i tae atu ki te wiki i mua i te tīmatanga o te panekōrero whakaaro ki te huatau tērā pea he Pakihi. Nō reira te āhua nei he tinihanga te huatau kua hinga te sterling i te oho o tēnei putanga." I pā ngā hua o te here kāwanatanga o UK ki tētahi pūkete hōu, ā, neke atu i te 30 ngā piro pūtake ki te 1.018% e ai ki ngā raraunga o Kōrero. Neke atu i te 20 ngā piro pūtake i hinga ngā hua e rua tau ki ō rātou taumata iti rawa mai i te waenganui o te 2013, i te 0.233%. Kua nui hoki te hinga o ngā utu hinu o Ūropi i te oho o te putanga o te taupānga, ā, ko te 4.9% ki te $48.41 i te oko - ko te hinganga nui rawa mai i Hui tanguru. I hinga hoki te 4.7% ki te $47.77 i te oko. I peke te koura i te 5% ki tōna taumata tiketike i roto i ngā tau neke atu i te toru tau i te $1,322 i te auau. I puta hoki te pānga o te pōti puta noa i te whenua. I hinga te Dax i Frankfurt i te 6.8% - tōna rā kino rawa mai i te tau 2008 - i te mutunga o Parihi i te 8% i raro iho, me te hinganga tata ki te 12% i Milan me Madrid. I kī te kaitātari o Ngā Mākete Pūtea, a Oliver Roth, ko te kiriata i roto i te Dax "kāore i tino kino ki tā mātou i wehi ai. I te whakatuwheratanga i heke iho tata ki te 10% engari i āhua whakaū ngā mākete ... Heoi anō, he nui te āwangawanga i muri i tēnei mōrearea tōrangapū." I kī a IAG, nāna a British Airways me Iberia, ka pā te hua o te pōti ki ōna hua, ka tukuna heke iho i te 22.5% i Rānana. "I muri i te hua o te taupānga, ā, i te wā e tūmanako tonu ana a IAG ki te nui o te hua mahi i tēnei tau, kua kore e tūmanako kia nui ake te hua mahi e ōrite ana ki te 2015," tana kī. I kaha hoki te pā ki ngā pēke o UK, me te katinga o Raiti i te 21% i raro iho, i hinga te Pēke Ariki o Pākehā i te 18.8% me te 17.7%. Tae atu ki ngā kaihanga whare, e whakaarotia ana he tino mōrearea te wāhanga pēke i te ngoikore o te āhua o te UK. I Wīwī, i hinga a Societe Generale i te 20% me te 17.4% o Te Pēke o Tiamana, ā, i rēreti te 13% o Commerzbank. Ināianei, ko ngā hea i Santander - te pēke nui rawa o te rohe ūropi - i hinga tata ki te 20% i Madrid. I kī a David Tinsley i UBS tērā pea ka "nui te pikinga o te rangirua o te ohaoha" ā, ka tūmanakohia kia mahia e te Komiti Kaupapahere Moni a te Pēke o Ingarangi (MPC), tae atu ki te mutunga mokatere huamoni me te toronga o tana hōtaka whakaiti ine nui. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka tapahia e te MPC ngā mokatere kaupapahere ki te kore, ā, ka mahi i ētahi atu hokonga rawa, i te tauira tuatahi o te £50-75bn, kāore i muri ake i te 2017," tana kī.

title: I muri i te haupae o te Pō o te Tau Hōu, ka patua e te tangata o Te Tau Hou te wahine i muri i te haupae o te Pō o te Tau Hou'
summary: I okaina e tētahi tangata tana wahine kia mate i muri i tana whai wāhi ki tētahi kēmu inu i te Pō o te Tau Hōu, ka rongo te kōti.
text: Ko Rawiri Clark, e 49, e whakakāhore ana i te kōhuru, i waea atu ki ngā ratonga ohorere e iwa meneti i mua i waenganui pō, ka mea: "Aroha mai, kua patua e au taku wahine." I kitea a Melanie Clark, e 44, i to rātau kāinga i Cloverdale, Stoke Prior, tata ki Bromsgrove, ka korerotia ki te kōti. I rongo i te wā o tētahi tautohetohe ka kī atu a ia ki tana tāne e hiahia ana ia kia wehe atu ia i to rātau kāinga i te ata. I whānau mai a Tēnā Clark i Awherika ki te Tonga, engari he uruwhenua Peretania tōna, ka rite tonu te tono ki ngā pirihimana kia kopere i a ia, ka rongo te Kōti Karauna o Birmingham. I kī te rōia o Pineamine Aina QC ko te tangata whakapae, ko tōna rā whānau i te Rā o te Tau Hōu, ā, ko tana wahine i whakaarotia kia neke atu i te rua te tepenga puku inu i te wā o te oka. I haere te tokorua ki te kāinga o tētahi hoa, i reira rāua i tiritiri ai i ngā pounamu prosecco e toru i mua i te tākaro i tētahi kēmu inu nakahi me ngā arawhata, ka rongo nga kaiwhakawā. I muri i to rāua wehenga atu i te pānga o to rāua hoa, ka hoki te tokorua ki te kāinga i runga i te waka, a, ka tīmata ki te tautohetohe. Ka kī te rōia, nāna i kī i okaina te wahine ki te pouaka: "Ko te take o te ture i patua a Melanie Clark e tana tāne i muri i te tautohetohe. " I te wā o te tautohetohe i te Pō o te Tau Hou, ka kī atu a Melanie Clark ki tana tāne e hiahia ana ia kia wehe atu ia i to rātau kāinga i te ata." I muri i tana maunga ki te teihana pirihimana o Worcester, ka kī a Tēnā Clark kāore a ia i maumahara ki te okaina i a ia. I rongo te kōti i te tangata whakapae me tana wahine, i noho i ngā rūma motuhake, i whakamahi pūkoro hei tuku karere i muri i te hokinga ki te kāinga. I muri i tana tuku karere e kī ana kua tūtaki tana wahine ki tētahi atu wahine, ka whakautua e ia ka karanga ia ki nga pirihimana ki te tango i a ia i te pānga a tērā rā. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: Te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o Ingarangi ki te Rāwhiti o Ingarangi "e kore e whakaaetia"
summary: Kua whiwhi te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o Ingarangi ki te Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i tēnei tau, i te wā e 149 anō tana ūnga.
text: Ko ngā whika i whakaputaina mō ngā marama tuatahi e iwa o te tau 2013 e whakaatu ana e 40 ngā kaiāwhina i mahue i te ratonga, i te wā e 44 i mauria. I kī a Norman Lamb, Liberal Democrat MP mō Te Raki o Norfolk, he "kore whakaaetia" taua āhuatanga. I kī te ratonga he wā roa te tukanga, ā, he nui ake te tono i tūmanakohia ina puta ngā ākonga i te tōmua o tērā tau. Kua whakahētia e ngā MP te Rāwhiti o Ingarangi Ambulance Service NHS Trust, e mahi ana i Bedfordshire, Cambridgeshire, Essex, Hertfordshire, Norfolk me Suffolk, e ngā MP mō ngā wā urupare rawakore. I whakarerea tōna poari kaitiaki i te raumati, ā, kei te rapu tonu i tētahi rangatira matua pūmau i muri i te rahua o te tukanga uiui mahi ki te whakakī i te pou. 'Kāore e tino whakaaetia' Ko ngā whika, i whakaputaina i raro i te Ture Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio, i whakaaturia i te tau 2012 he ngaromanga kupenga e 52 ngā kaiāwhina, e 57 e haere ana, e rima i tauria. I pānuitia e te whakawhirinaki i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka pau te £14m ki ngā waka tūroro ohorere hou me te £2.3m i runga i tana waka urupare. I kī a Tēnā Reme, he minita hauora hoki: "E kore rawa e whakaaetia kua pau i a rātau he taonga i runga i ngā waka tūroro tūmataiti i a rātau e kore ai e tiki i ngā kaimahi o mua. " E kore e taea te whakawhanake i tētahi kitenga mārama mo te wā roa mō te huri i te rōpū whakahaere i tēnei wā he tīma nui noa iho. "We desperately need a strong leadership team which can turn the organisation around and deliver the improvements that are needed." I kī a Denise Burke, te kaitono paremata o Labour mō Te Raki o Norfolk: "E whakaae ana mātou kāore he whakatika tere kia whiwhi ai i ngā kaimahi mātauranga e hiahiatia ana, engari e hia te wā e hiahiatia ana e tēnei whakawhirinaki kia tika ai? " Kei te waiho ngā kaimahi o mua i te rōpū whakahaere." 'Take ā-motu' I whakatakotoria e te whakawhirinaki ōna ūnga tono āwhina i Aperira 2013. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te ratonga: "He take ā-motu tēnei, ā, kei te whakataetae mātou ki ētahi atu whakawhirinaki whai wāteatanga. " Kua tukuna e mātou he mahi ki ngā kaiāwhina neke atu i te 70, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou kia nui ake te tiki i te tōmua o tērā tau ina puta mai ngā ākonga paramedics. "He tukanga wā roa tēnei." I kī a Therese Coffey, te MP Conservative mō Te Tairāwhiti: "Ko tētahi wāhanga o te take ko te rangatira nui o mua e ngana ana ki te whakaiti i te maha o ngā kaiāwhina i runga i te whenua. " I whakaaetia noa iho te mahere [hou] i ngā marama e rua ki mua, nā reira kaua mātou e tino mīharo kāore anō kia tae rawa atu te tono, engari me kite mātou i tēnā whakatere." I whakaaturia hoki e nga whika he tono kupenga o ngā kaiāwhina tohunga e toru i te tau 2013, i te wā e 82 te ūnga mo te wā roa.

title: I hereheretia ngā tāngata i runga i te matenga o Leigh Price i Coventry
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi tangata mo te 10 tau mo te matenga o tētahi kaiwaewae i patua e tētahi motokā tāhae i Coventry.
text: I patua a Leigh Price, e 38, e tētahi Chevrolet Captiva - i tāhaetia i te maripi i ngā meneti noa iho - i Barras Lane i Earlsdon, a, ka mate i te hōhipera i a Hōngongoi. I whakaae a Jason Harris, e 26, i mua i ngā hara maha i te Kōti Karauna o Warwick. E ono tau i roto i te whare herehere i hoatu ki a Gerry Fawkner te whakapae tahi mo te tāhaetanga, me te whai tuhipānui me te mata, te ira rānei. I tautohe hoki a Fawkner, e 23, o Almond Tree Avenue, i Coventry, i mua. I hereheretia a Hāhi, o Chevral Avenue, o Radford, mo te 10 tau i muri i tana whakaaetanga i te mate i te taraiwa mōrearea, te tāhaetanga, te whai rākau whakahāwea, kāore he raihana, ā, kāore he inihua. I kī te whānau o Tēnā Price i puta mai tōna matenga "he tino ohorere" ā, i rongo rātau i te "whakararuraru." I taua wā, ka kī a Det Sgt Alan Hands, mai i ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands, kua "haere noa iho a Tēnā Price ki te kāinga."

title: Ko te pūtea penapena a te umanga pūngao tai e £500m i roto i ngā kaupapa o Pākehā
summary: I kī te kamupene hiko tai o Atlantis ka haumi e tata ana ki te £500m i roto i ngā kaupapa Pākehā i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei.
text: Kua uru te kamupene ki tētahi mahi ngātahi me te umanga pūtea penapena Equitix. E hiahia ana a Equitix ki te whiwhi i te 25% neke atu rānei o ia kaupapa Atlantis, he pūtea penapena neke atu i te £100m. I kī te kamupene pūngao ka "whakaneke te mahi ngātahi hou i te kōpaki o ngā kaupapa hiko tai o Atlantis i Pākehā". Kei roto i te pūtea penapena Atlantis ko te £51m kua tukua kētia ki te hanganga i te wāhanga tuatahi o tana kaupapa iMeyGen i te Pentland Firth, kua whakaritea hei whakaputa hiko i tēnei tau. I kī te rangatira nui o Atlantis, a Tim Cornelius: "He hipanga hira tēnei whakaaetanga ki a Equitix ki a mātau ki te whakauru i tētahi hoa whai wheako nui o ngā kaupapa hanganga nui me te uru ki te pūmatua whānui, me te hiahia ki te mahi tahi me mātau ki te whakatere i te whanaketanga anō o te umanga hiko tai o UK." 'Tino nui te kaha o te tupu' i kī ai te kaiwhakahaere matua o Equitix, a Nick Parker: "E hari ana mātou ki te uru ki tēnei whakaaetanga mahi ngātahi ki Atlantis, te kaiārahi mākete mārama i roto i te umanga pūngao tai e haumaru ana i te urunga ki tētahi arapae o ngā wāhi pūtea penapena matua, ā, he tino nui te kaha o te tupu i te UK." I tērā Tīma, i whakarewaina e Atlantis tana kōpaki pūngao tai mā te whiwhi i ngā kaupapa e rua mai i ScottishPower Renewables (SPR) i roto i tētahi mahi tiritiri katoa. Kei roto i te whakaritenga tētahi whanaketanga 100MW i te Ness o Duncansby i te Pentland Firth me tētahi kaupapa 10MW i te Sound of Islay i te uru o Pākehā. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o WWF Scotland, a Lang Banks: "He tino pai te rongo i ngā mahere a ngā kaiwhakangao kia whai i muri i te umanga hiko tai o Pākehā. " Mā ētahi o ngā tai tino kaha i Uropi, kua tino whakatūria a Pākehā ki te ārahi i te whakawhanake i tēnei hangarau whānui, e āwhina ana ki te tapahi i te kohu āhuarangi me te waihanga i ngā mahi pūkenga, kākāriki."

title: Hong Kong: 'Ka taea te kāpō i ngā Whatu e rima,' ka whakatūpato a Haina ki te Uru
summary: Kua tino riria e Haina te UK, te US, Ahitereiria, Aotearoa me Kānata i muri i te whakapaetanga ki tētahi mahi kōnohete ki te whakangū i ngā kaiwhakawāwā i Hong Kong.
text: I whakahē ngā whenua, e hanga ana i te toa Whatu e Rima, i te kawenga a Haina i ngā ture hou hei whakakore i ngā kaiwhakatikatika i pōtitia i Hong Kong. Ka tohe rātau ki a Beijing kia whakahoki i te ara. I urupare tētahi kaikōrero o te manatu ā-rohe o Hainamana mēnā ka "kaha ngā whenua ki te tūkino i te rangatiratanga o Haina, me tūpato rātau ka kāpō o rātau whatu". "E kore rawa te Hainamana e whakaoho i te raruraru, engari kāore rātau i te mataku i te raruraru," te kī a Zhao Lijian ki ngā kaipūrongo i Beijing i te Rāitema, e kī ana ehara i te mea "he aha mēnā e rima, 10 rānei ō rātou whatu". I tērā wiki, ka peia e Hong Kong e whā ngā kaipānui kāwanatanga i tōna rōpū whakahaere i muri i te putanga o te kāwanatanga o te taone ki te ākiri i ngā kaipōrangapū e whakaarotia ana he tuma ki te haumarutanga ā iwi. Hei urupare, ka pānuitia e ngā kaipānui kāwanatanga ā iwi katoa o Hong Kong to rātau tukunga iho. Mo te wā tuatahi mai i te wā i whakahokia ai e te UK te rohe ki Haina i te tau 1997, tata tonu kāore he reo whakahē o te tinana. Ko te panatanga o ngā kaipānui e whā i tirohia e te tokomaha ko te whakamātau hou a Haina ki te rāhui i ngā wāteatanga o Hong Kong, he mea e whakakāhore ana a Pēhi. Na nga minita ā-rohe o te rōpū Whatu e Rima i tohutohu i a Haina kia whakahokia mai rātau, e kī ana he mārama te takanga o ngā whakaritenga here ā-ture a Beijing ki te pare i ngā wāteatanga me te mana motuhake o te rohe. I whakapaea hoki e rātau a Beijing ki te whakararuraru i ngā mana o te iwi i Hong Kong ki te kōwhiri i o rātau māngai. Ko Five Eyes he toa tiritiri mōhiohio o ngā whenua Pākehā e rima i whakatūria i te wā o te Pakanga Makariri, ā, i te tuatahi i hangaia hei aroturuki i te USSR me ōna pirihitini. I mua atu, ka kī te Manatu Take Tawahi o Haina i Hong Kong i tētahi ngana a ngā kāwanatanga kē ki te whakawehi, ki te pēhi rānei i a Beijing ki te mahi mana whakahaere. I whakahokia a Hong Kong ki Haina i raro i te mātāpono "kotahi whenua, e rua ngā pūnaha", nāna i āhei ai ki te pupuri i ētahi atu mana me ngā wāteatanga i te tuawhenua tae noa ki te tau 2047. Hei Rohe Whakahaere Motuhake, me whai pūnaha ture a Hong Kong, he maha ngā rōpū tōrangapū, me ngā mana tae atu ki te wāteatanga o te whakaminenga me te whaikōrero koreutu. Engari i te mutunga o Pipiri ka puta a Haina i tētahi ture haumarutanga ā-motu tautohetohe, tawhiti rawa i te rohe i muri i ngā tau o ngā whakahēnga ā-kāwanatanga me ngā whakahēnga anō o Beijing, nāna i whakaiti te mana motuhake o Hong Kong, ā, ka ngāwari kē atu te whiu i ngā kaiwhakatūtū. E whakahē ana i te "wehenga, te hurihanga me te whakakotahitanga ki ngā ope kē". E kī ana a Beijing ka whakahokia e te ture te mauritanga ki te rohe, engari e kī ana ngā kāwanatanga ki te uru me ngā rōpū motika tangata e whakawhāiti ana i te wāteatanga o te whaikōrero me te whakahē. I muri i te whakaurunga o te ture, he tokomaha nga rōpū kāwanatanga ā iwi i whakakorea i te mataku mo to rātau haumarutanga. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka hopukina tētahi kaipānui nāna i āwhina ki te tūhura i te whakaekenga pirihimana i tērā tau, i te kōrero a ngā kaipūrongo he tikanga whakapōturi i te pūrongo. Hei urupare ki te ture haumarutanga, ka tukuna e te UK ki ngā tangata o Hong Kong e pupuri tonu ana i te tūnga o British National Overseas (BNO) he ara ki te tangata whenua o Ingarangi. Neke atu i te 300,000 ngā tāngata e pupuri ana i ngā uruwhenua BNO i tēnei wā, ā, e 2.9 miriona ngā tāngata i whānau i mua i te tukunga atu e āhei ana ki tētahi. I tērā marama i tino whakahē a Haina i te UK hei urupare, e kī ana ki a Rāwāhi kia "whakatika wawe i ōna hē". Ētahi atu kōrero mō ngā renarena o Haina-Hong Kong

title: Pakanga Makariri Steve: Ka whakanuia e te kaiwaiata Twitter a Birmingham i roto i ngā mahi hou
summary: Kua whakakitea e tētahi rehetoi e mōhiotia ana mō ngā toirau whakarihariha e whakaatu ana i a Piripi Doketa rāua ko Cilla Black i roto i ngā tauari pōrearea, kua whakakitea te "taumata" o ana hanganga.
text: Ko te mahi hou a Cold War Steve - he manaakitanga ki tōna taone tupu o Birmingham - e whakaatu ana i tētahi kōhukihuki o ngā māramatanga paetata i tautuhia ki tētahi taone nui o te rau tau 19. Ko te wāhanga, ko Benny's Babbies, i tapaina mai i te kaimahi i roto i te hopi hopi motēra Crossroads. Ka kitea tōna kanohi nui e whakatata ana i runga i te huihuinga i raro nei. I kī a Steve, ko te ingoa tūturu o Christopher Spencer, ko te hunga huihuinga, arā ko Mawa Yousafzai, ko te kaiwhakangahau māmā tōkeke o Bob Carolgees me te comedian Joe Lycett, he "hākari nui o te rerenga kētanga o te taone". I muri i tana whakatata atu ki ngā kaitiaki, ka whakakitea e ia "tētahi putanga tāpare koura nui" i te Whare Taonga me te Taiwhanga Toi o Birmingham (BMAG), i muri i te whakatata atu ki a ia e ngā kaitiaki. Engari i a ia e kati tonu ana i waenganui i te raka coronavirus, ka wātea a Benny's Babbies, pēnei i ngā mahi i akiaki i te Pakanga Makariri ki te rongonui o te ao, ki te tiro tuihono. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk .

title: Ka hopukina e ngā atahanga hihiani te hukapapa mekemeke hou o te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga
summary: I te mutunga wiki ka kitea tuatahitia e ngā aorangi hihiani te hukapapa mekapa hou o Te Moana ki te Tonga.
text: Nā Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent The EU's Sentinel-1 me te waka ātea TerraSAR-X o Tiamana, i hipa tahi i runga i te paraka 1,290-sq-km (500-sq-mile), i tapaina ōpakitia ko "A74". I whakaaturia e o rātau pūoko kua tere te neke atu o te maunga i te Brunt Ice Shelf - te pūhara māngi i puta mai ai i te Paraire. Ko te rongo pai, kāore he whakararuraru i puta i te pūtake pātata o UK. Neke atu i te 20km te tūnga rangahau o Halley mai i te raina whati, engari i pūrongotia e ngā teihana GPS i tāutatia huri noa i te pūkenga. "Kāore mātou i whakaaro he tauhohenga noa iho nā te mea, he iti noa iho te wehenga o te hukapapa huri noa i Halley i te wāhi i puta ai te A74; kāore he huarahi pai kia tukuna atu te hau ki te hukapapa i raro i te teihana," te whakamārama a Dr Oliver Marsh mai i te British Antarctic Survey (BAS). "Mai i te whakawhānautanga o te Paraire, he nui ake ngā raraunga GPS tino tika e ine ana i ngā huringa henimita i roto i te uaua i runga i te katoa o ngā tauanga, ā, kāore tētahi o ēnei e whakaatu ana i tētahi mea rerekē i ngā mea e puta ana i mua i te whanautanga," tana kī atu ki a Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero. I tēnei wā kei te pōrori a Halley. I tētahi wāhanga, nā Covid; he iti rawa te pūtaiao o te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga e whakahaeretia ana i tēnei wā. Engari nā te mea e tatari ana a BAS kia kite i te whanonga o te Brunt Ice Shelf ina tīmata ngā maunga ki te kāhui mai i te pūhara. Ko A74 te hua o ngā whāwhā maha kua tupu i te Brunt - ko ētahi i roto i ngā tau maha, ko ētahi inā noa nei. Ko te whanau o te Paraire pea te tuatahi i roto i ngā rangatū o ngā wehenga i ngā rā me ngā wiki e heke mai nei. Ko te tino painga ināianei ko te wāhanga o te Brunt ki te hauauru o Halley. Kua tata tapahia katoatia tēnei e ngā whāwhā whānui me ngā whāwhā, ā, ka puritia anake e tētahi whārōrō hukapapa tino angiangi e pinea ana ki te papa moana i tētahi tauwāhi e mōhiotia ana ko te McDonald Ice Rumples. Ki te puta tēnei, tērā pea he tauhohenga tata ki Halley, me te hukapapa i raro i te teihana e neke ana ki te moana i te tere tere. Engari mēnā ka kāwhe tonu tēnei wāhanga, ko te whakaaro a te tangata. "Ko tēnei takahanga kānanga o nā tata nei i hua ai te hanganga o te motumotu A74 e āhua rite ana ki tētahi takahanga tōmua i tū i taua rohe i te wā o Mahuru 1971," te whakamārama a Prof Hilmar Gudmundsson mai i te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria. "I tua atu, i te uru o Brunt, kei reira te teihana rangahau o Halley, kāore he pūkete mātakitaki hāngai o tētahi takahanga nui o tēnei rahi mai i te wā i whakatūria ai te teihana i ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. Heoi anō, mā te whakataurite i te mahere o Frank Worsley o te tau 1915, i hangaia i te wā o te Imperial Trans-Antarctic Expedition a Ernest Shackleton, me te tūnga o mua o te kāhui i te tau 1955, e tohu ana ko te whata hukapapa o Brunt ki te uru i waenganui i te 1915 me te 1955. "Ināianei ka tata mai tētahi takahanga kāhui nui ōrite i te uru o Brunt." I haere poto tētahi tīma iti ki Halley i Hānuere me te tōmua o Hui tanguru ki te mahi i ngā taputapu aunoa o te teihana, tae atu ki tōna ine spectrophotometer e ine ana i te whanonga o te "rua" hāora o te Ao. Ko tētahi o ngā mahi a te rōpū ko te whakarewa i ngā wae GPS hiko kōmaru o Brunt ki runga ake i te hukarere hinga. E rua o ēnei ināianei e haere tahi ana me te maunga hou i a ia e tere ana ki te moana. He pono, ko ngā raraunga o tēnei takirua i whakatūpato tuatahi i a BAS ki te kāhui i te Paraire i te pūrongotanga o o rātau tūnga kua neke tata ki te 100m i roto i te haora i waenganui i te 08:00 me te 09:00 GMT. I mua, tata tonu ki te 8m ia rā te neke o te hukapapa. I riro mai te atahanga TerraSAR-X o te pokapū mokowā Tiamana (DLR) i runga i tēnei whārangi hei tautoko i te Oko Rangahau Polarstern, e mahi ana i te rohe. Ko nga kaipūtaiao o te kaipuke, i arahina mai i te Whare Wānanga o Alfred Wegener (AWI), e ako ana i ngā tauwhitinga i te Moana Weddell i waenganui i te hukapapa, te moana me te haurangi. Kei hea tonu tēnei? Kei runga i te Brunt Ice Shelf, arā, ko te māngi o ngā hukapapa kua rere atu i te whenua ki te Moana o Weddell. I runga i tētahi mahere, ko te Moana Weddell tērā wāhanga o Te Moana ki te Moana ki te Tonga, ki te tonga tonu o te Moana Atarangi. Kai te taha rāwhiti o te moana te Brunt. Pēnei i ngā whata hukapapa katoa, ka whakawāteatia e ia ngā hukapapa i ia wā. He pēhea te nui o te berg hou? Ko te inenga aorangi hōu rawa e tata ana ki te 1,290 km māra. Tata ki te 1,500 km māra te nui o Rānōna; tata ki te 1,300 km māra te takiwā o Welsh o Monmouthshire. He nui tēnā, ahakoa kāore i te nui ki te taniwha A68 berg i whanau i a Hōngongoi 2017 mai i te Larsen C Ice Shelf i te taha ki te uru o te Moana Weddell. I te tuatahi e 5,800 km māra tērā, engari mai i tērā wā ka pakaru ki roto i ngā wāhanga iti maha. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i runga i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: E kī ana a Nick Park i whakaaweawe i a Bristol Zoo Creature Comforts
summary: Kua whakaaturia e te kaihanga o te kiriata Hākoritanga Aardman Creature Comforts i whakaawetia ia e te Kararehe o Bristol me te kaitiaki kararehe o te pouaka whakaata, a Johnny Morris.
text: I kī a Nick Park ko te āhua o te mahi a te kaiwhakaatu Kararehe o mua i ōna "reo rekareka" mō ngā kararehe te tīmatanga. "Tērā pea i whakaawetia ahau e tēnā. I tino whakanohoia e ia te Kararehe o Bristol ki runga i te mahere," tana kī. E whakanui ana te Kararehe o Bristol i tōna huritau 175 i te 11 o Hōngongoi. I kī a Tēnā Park i whakaawetia a ia i a ia e Animal Magic - ko tētahi wāhanga i whakaahuatia i te Kararehe o Bristol i nga tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua. "He nui taku rangahau i reira, ā, he rua pea pākākā he raima katoa, he peita mā kia whakaaro ai ngā pea kei te Tiritiri rātou. " E mahara ana ahau he waahi iti ki roto i te ana, a, i purua e au ki roto i te pikitia. "Kua peitatia pēnei i te whare taonga tūmatanui i nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. He raina Plimsoll tāu kei reira tētahi tae ki raro me tētahi atu i runga ake - ko te tikanga he mā, he kikorangi rānei hei hoatu i ngā tae o te Tiritiri ki taku whakaaro. "Kāore au i te tino mōhio mēnā i reira rātau mō ngā pea pākākā, mō te iwi whānui rānei." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Koia tērā e purei ana ahau i roto i Creature Comforts, te āhua i hangaia ai e mātou taua taiao he tino wehi, engari ko ngā kararehe, pēnei i te tangata, ka whakaae ki tēnei i runga i tētahi āhua rerekē." I whakatūria te Kararehe o Bristol i te tau 1836, ā, e whakaatu ana ngā pūkete i ōna kaihoko taketake ko te kaipūkaha tino rongonui o Bristol, ko Isambard Kingdom Brunel, me te kaiwhakanao tiakarete ko Joseph Fry I ngā rā o mua, ko te tikanga kia whakarato i tētahi rōpū kararehe kia ako ai te tangata mō te kingitanga kararehe. Engari i ngā tau 1970 ka whakakapia ngā taiao kararehe tawhito o Wikitōria ki ngā taiao māori ake. I mutu te pupuri i ngā kararehe nui ake o Bristol, ā, ka arotahi kē ki te tiakitanga, te mātauranga me te parenga o ngā momo mōrearea mō ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake. Ka pāohotia te Animal Magic Zoo i te Mane 11 o Hōngongoi i te 1900 BST i BBC One West, ā, i muri iho i te BBC iPlayer. Ka tāruatia te hōtaka i te 21 o Hōngongoi i te 21 o Hōngongoi i te 1900 BST.

title: TSB: He aha te tikanga mō tētahi taone ina kati tētahi pēke?
summary: Ko te peka TSB i Hadleigh, ko Suffolk tētahi o ngā 164 i tautuhia kia haere i te wā e tapahia ana e te pēke e 900 ngā mahi. He aha te tikanga mō tētahi taone ina kati te pēke?
text: Nā Rachael McMenemy rāua ko Mariam IssimdarBBC News ka kite a Dr Sian Dawson i te Hadleigh TSB mai i tōna wāhi e noho ana. E kī ana a ia, he mea nui te pēke mō tana umanga whare hauora podiatry. "He moepuku tēnei," te kī a Dr Dawson. "Kaore au e whakapono." Ahakoa he Rōpū Hanga Ipswich tā Hadleigh, ko te pēke tata rawa i muri i te katinga he 20 meneti te taraiwa i Ipswich, i Sudbury rānei. "Ka katia e au taku pūkete TSB ki te wehe atu rātau i Hadleigh," tana kī. "E kore e pai ki te noho tahi me rātau mo te umanga." Dr Dawson, 41, who is also a local Conservative district councillor, praised the staff at the bank. E kī ana a ia: "He peka tino mātauranga. " He tino pōrangi te whakaaro kei te puta tēnei. He tokomaha rawa aku kiritaki e utu ana mā te haki, nā reira e whakawhirinaki ana ahau ki te ratonga pēke." Ko Hadleigh, e tata ana ki te 8,000 te taupori, e mōhiotia ana ko tētahi o ngā "taone wūru" o Te Wānanga - he tohutoro ki te mahi kākahu i ahu mai ki te nuinga o ōna rawa. Ko tōna Tiriti Tiketike ko te nuinga o ngā toa takitahi, ā, he maha ngā whare tāpare rākau motuhake. Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i ngaro ai i a Hadleigh tētahi pēke i ēnei wā - i katia e Barclays e toru tau ki mua, ā, kāore anō kia hokona te whare. E kī ana a Muriel Wasp rāua ko tana tāne ko Paul Wasp ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i whakawhiti i a rātau pēke ki TSB i taua wā. "E tino pouri ana ahau mo te whakatupuranga pakeke. He tokomaha o rātau e haere ana ki reira ki te kōrerorero iti. It's another part of Hadleigh life gone," says Mrs Wasp. Ka tāpiri mai tana tāne a Paora: "He tokomaha i roto i Hadleigh, e whakaaro ana ahau, kāore anō kia whiwhi i te ipurangi, kāore anō kia whai rorohiko. Nā, he aha tā rātou mahi?" E kī ana to rātau hoa ko Neil Henderson, e mahi ana mō te Karapu Whutupōro o Hadleigh Town, i whakahaere tonu te karapu i te nui o ngā tauwhitinga moni, ā, kāore i te mōhio me pēhea te pāngia. I tae mai a Sylvia Nudds, e 77, e noho ana i Dedham, i Essex, ki te TSB o Hadleigh i te ata o te Rāitema ki te whakamahi i tana mīhini moni. I ohorere a ia i te rongonga e kati ana. "Me haere tātau ki ētahi atu kāinga e rua kia whiwhi moni ai. Ka riri ahau," tana kī. "I whakawhiti ahau mai i Barclays [ki TSB] nā te mea kei te kati rātou. " Ka aroha, ko te iti ake o ngā toa, ko te nui ake o te whakapeka o te taone. Ka haere mai mātou mō te pēke, he tino huarahi." E kī ana a Julie Towells, nāna te Delicatessen o Ferguson, i whakamahia e ia te TSB ki te tiki huringa mō ana mahi. "Ināianei kāore e taea e au te tiki huringa mai i hea," tana kī. "Mō ngā take hauora, ka whakamahi mātou i te kāri engari mō ngā take ohaoha ka whakamahi moni mātou. Hei pakihi iti, ka whiua mātou mā te whakamahi kāri i te mea me utu he utu tauwhitinga. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te whakamahi kāri te mahi a te nuinga o te tangata, engari ka uaua nga pakeke. Kei te hiahia tonu rātau ki te whakamahi moni. Me ārahi mātou i te tokomaha me te whakaatu ki a rātou me pēhea te karapa." Kāore te rōpū whare i Hadleigh e tuku i te pūkete paerewa o nāianei, i ngā tauwhitinga kāri rānei. E whakaahua ana te Poutāpeta o Jeremy Brown i te katinga he "tino pouri" me te kī i tukuna anake e te Poutāpeta o te taone "ngā pūkenga pēke taketake". "Kāore au e pīrangi kia haere, kia haere rānei tētahi kamupene. But most shops in Hadleigh are independents so it won't be the death knell of the High Street," says Mr Brown. I kī a Melissa Baxter, kaiwhakahaere o te pāparapara Eight Bells, mā te whakamahi i te Poutāpeta ka roa ake ngā tauwhitinga ki te tae ki ngā pūkete. "Kāore he mea e tere ki te whakatakoto noa iho i te pēke i raro i te huarahi," tana kī. E kī ana a Kōpana Bulloch, kaiwhakahaere pūtea kiritaki i TSB: "Kei te mahi mātou ki te whakarite i te tauwhiro ki te mamati, e kitea ana puta noa i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, e whakahaeretia ana i runga i te tairongo, i te āhua o ā mātou hoa mahi me ngā kiritaki. " Kei te mahi mātou i ngā hipanga hei tautoko i ngā kiritaki mōrearea me ērā i ngā tauwāhi ā-taiwhenua." I kī te kamupene e 94% o ngā kiritaki TSB kāore e hiahiatia kia neke atu i te 20 meneti ki tētahi TSB kē. Ka kitea i konei tētahi rārangi katoa o ngā pēke TSB e pāngia ana. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Covid-19: I tāpirihia e Īnia ki te 'rārangi whero' coronavirus mō te haere
summary: Kua tāpirihia a Īnia ki tētahi "rārangi whero" o ngā whenua e rāhuitia ai te nuinga o te haere ki te UK, i runga i te mataku o tētahi momo Covid hou, kua kī te hēkeretari hauora.
text: Mai i te 04:00 BST i te Paraire 23 o Āperira, ka whakakāhoretia te tāurunga o te nuinga o ngā tāngata i haere mai i Īnia i ngā rā e 10 kua taha. Ka whakaaetia ngā kaipupuri uruwhenua o Ingarangi, Airani rānei, ngā tāngata whai mana noho o UK, engari me taratahi i tētahi hōtēra kua whakaaetia e te kāwanatanga mō te 10 rā. I kī a Mātā Hancock e 103 ngā kēhi UK o te momo Īnia. I roto i tētahi kōrero ki te Whare o Ngātahi i te Mane, ka kī te hēkeretari hauora ko te nuinga o ngā kēhi o te momo hou - e mōhiotia ana ko B.1.617 - kua honoa ki ngā haerenga o te ao whānui. I kī a ia kua tātaritia ngā tauira whakamātautau kia kite ai mēnā he "āhuatanga āwangawanga" tō te momo hou pēnei i te nui ake o te whakawhitinga, te ātete rānei ki ngā rongoā me ngā rongoā. Ka kī atu a ia ki ngā MP: "I muri i tana ako i ngā raraunga, ā, i runga anō i te whakatūpatotanga, kua mahia e mātou te whakataunga uaua, engari he tino nui ki te tāpiri i Īnia ki te rārangi whero." E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere hauora ko tēnei momo hou, i kitea tuatahitia i Īnia, he huringa iranga mōrearea e hiahiatia ana kia hōparatia. He wawe rawa ki te kī mēnā he nui ake te urutā, te whakamate, ā, ka karo i ngā kano ārai mate - ā, mēnā me hono ki te rārangi Variant of Concern nā ngā momo o Awherika ki te Tonga, Kent me Brazil.
