Kei te haere tonu ngā aromatawai, ā, i tēnei wā kei te kimi te kāwanatanga ki te aukati i ētahi atu kēhi e tae mai ana, e hora ana ki te whenua. Koia hoki te kāwanatanga e whakapiki ana i te whakamātautau pātōtō kia tere te kimi i ētahi kēhi hōu i te UK, ā, kei te whakamōhio i tētahi momo whakamātautau taiwhanga hōu tere ka taea te whakaatu i roto i ngā haora mēnā he pai tētahi tangata mō Covid - ā, mēnā ko te whakapokenga kei a rātou tētahi o ngā taupēnga e mōhiotia ana, tae atu ki tēnei mea hou mai i Īnia. Ko te tikanga ka tere ake te wehe a te tangata ki te ārai i te hoatu ki ō rātou hoa, whānau, hoa noho tata me ngā hoa mahi. Ka taea e koe te pānui i ētahi atu kōrero mai i a Mīharo i konei. I tūtohu te Hēkeretari Waka a Grant Shapps i te nekehanga kia kore ai e ngaro i te UK tana "kauneketanga uaua i runga i te whakawhitiwhiti kano ārai mate". E whakaatu ana tētahi tuhinga kōrero i tāruatia e ngā kaiwhakahaere i Public Health England i waenganui i te 25 o Poutūterangi me te 7 o Āperira, e 3,345 ngā taenga mai i Īnia i rēhitatia ki ngā raraunga haere taitapa o UK. O aua 161 - 4.8% ranei - i whakamatautau pai mo Covid-19 i muri i te whakamatautau PCR. Ka pā te ture haere hou ki Ingarangi me Pākehā. I tēnei wā kāore he rerenga hāngai o te ao whānui ki Weera, ki Aiarangi ki te Raki rānei. I kī te Hēkeretari Waka o Pākehā, a Michael Matheson: "Ka noho mōrearea tonu te haere o te ao whānui, e hiahia ana ki tētahi huarahi tūpato, i runga i te iwi e whā." I kī a Tēnā Hancock e 557 hoki ngā kēhi o te momo o Awherika ki te Tonga i kitea i te UK mai i Hakihea, me tētahi "kāhui" o ngā kēhi i te tonga o Rānana me ngā kēhi tūhāhā i Barnet, Birmingham me Sandwell i tērā wiki. Ahakoa e rua hautoru e pā ana ki te haere o te ao whānui, he "iti noa iho" te tarenga hapori, ka tāpiritia e ia. I kī a ia kei te "whakapiki" te kāwanatanga i ngā mahere mō tētahi pūtiro booster kia noho ai ngā kano ārai mate "i mua i te huaketo". He iti iho i te whā marama ki muri ka whakakorea e Īnia ngā rerenga mai i te UK hei aukati i te horahanga o te momo UK. Ināianei, i te tūhuratanga o te mea e kiia nei ko te 'taupēnga Īnia', ā, ka piki ngā tau kēhi i reira, kua pā mai te whakamuri. E whakaatu ana i te tere o te rerekētanga o te hihiri i waenganui i ngā whenua. I te tāpiritanga whakamutunga a te kāwanatanga o Aotearoa i ngā whenua ki te rārangi whero, tae atu ki Pākaratēhi me Pakitāne, i te tīmatanga o Aperira, ka pānuitia te wiki. I tēnei wā neke atu i te toru rā. Kua whakatepeti kētia ngā rerenga hāngai ki Īnia, mai i Īnia hoki - he whakataunga i whakatauria e te kāwanatanga o Īnia i te Hānuere - ki te 30 i te wiki, ko te tikanga he tokomaha ināianei e rere ana ki te tāpui i ngā tūru torutoru whakamutunga i mua i te Paraire. Kei te tumanako tonu te umanga haerere ka timata ano te haerenga o te ao mai i Ingarangi i te 17 o Mei, engari ko te panui o tenei ra e tohu ana ka roa te wa kia tuwhera ra ano te ao ki a tatou. Kei te roa haere te rārangi o ngā whenua i runga i te rārangi rāhui, kaua e poto ake. I a ia e urupare ana ki tētahi pātai mai i te hēkeretari hauora kōruru a Jonathan Ashworth, ka kī a Tēnā Hancock ka puta te whakamātautau Covid i ngā wāhi i kitea ai ngā kēhi o te momo Īnia. I pātai a Yvette Cooper o Labour, te manukura o te Komiti o te Take Kāinga, he aha i kore ai a Īnia i whakaurua ki te rārangi whero i mua ake nei, ka tāpiri: "Kua kitea e Hong Kong i tēnei wiki e 47 ngā kēhi Covid i runga i te rerenga kotahi o Delhi, ā, e 16 anō ngā rerenga hāngai, he maha atu anō ngā rerenga hāngai mai i Īnia ki konei, i mua i te Paraire anake." I urupare a Tēnā Hancock mā te kī ko ngā whakataunga i ia whenua i "puritia i raro i te arotakenga auau". I puta mai te pānuitanga i muri i te whakakorenga a te Pirimia o Boris Johnson i tētahi haerenga i whakaritea ki Īnia, i te 26 o Āperira, i waenganui i te pikinga o ngā kēhi i reira. Kua pūrongotia e Īnia neke atu i te 200,000 ngā kēhi ia rā mai i te 15 o Āperira. Kua pānuitia e tōna pūmatua o Delhi tētahi raka wiki i muri i te taraiwa pūkete o ngā kēhi i whakararuraru i te pūnaha rongoā o te taone. I te wā i tuhia e te UK e whā nga mate i roto i te 28 rā o te whakamātautau coronavirus tōrunga, e ai ki ngā whika hou a te kāwanatanga. Ko te whika iti rawa ia rā mai i te 7 o Mahuru, ahakoa he iti iho te maha o ngā mate i tuhia i te Mane me te mutunga wiki nā te takawaretanga pūrongo. I whakaaturia hoki e ngā raraunga e 2,963 hoki ngā mate hou. I tēnei wā, neke atu i te 10m ngā tāngata i te UK i whiwhi i te wero tuarua o te kano ārai mate Covid-19, ā, tata ki te 33 miriona ngā tāngata kua whiwhi i tā rātou wero tuatahi. He pēhea te mahi taratahi hōtēra? Ko nga kaihaereere katoa e hoki ana ki te UK me whakakii i tetahi puka kairapu pāhihi i mua, tae atu ki nga taipitopito o to raatau whenua wehenga me te wahitau UK. Me whakaatu hoki rātou i te tohu o tētahi whakamātautau Covid tōraro i tangohia i roto i te 72 haora i mua i te haerenga kia whakaaetia kia uru ki te UK. I Ingarangi, ko te noho i roto i tētahi hōtēra taratahi e utu ana i te £ 1,750 mō ia pāhihi e haere ana ko ia anake hei utu i te waka, ngā whakamātautau, te kai me te nohoanga. Me utu e ia pakeke tāpiri, tamaiti rānei neke atu i te 12, te £650, ā, ko ngā tamariki e rima ki te 12 tau te pakeke e utu ana i te £325. Me whakamatautau Covid nga kaihaereere e hoki mai ana i nga ra tuarua me te waru o te taratahi, i te utu e £210. Ehara te hua whakamātautau tōraro i te tikanga ka taea e rātou te whakapoto i tō rātou wā taratahi, engari mēnā he pai te whakamātautau, me wehe rātou mō te 10 rā anō. E kore hoki e taea e rātou te whakamutu wawe mā te aronui Whakamātautau ki te Tuku, e taea ai e ngā kaihaere mai i ngā whenua rārangi whero te wehe i te taratahitanga kāinga i muri i te whakamātautau tōraro i te rā rima. E anga ana ngā kaiwhati ture ki ngā whiu pākaha - tae atu ki ngā whiu whare herehere tae atu ki te 10 tau. Kei te ngana koe ki te haere ki Īnia mai i te UK? Kei Īnia rānei koe e ngana ana ki te tae ki te UK? Whakapā mai mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā atu mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei: Ō mōhiohio hoapā Kua neke atu i te 16 tau te pakeke E whakaae ana ahau ki ngā Ture Ratonga I ētahi wā ka whakaputaina he tīpakonga o ō tākupu me ō pātai, e whakaatu ana i tō ingoa me tō tauwāhi i a koe e whakarato ana ki te kore koe e kōrero kē. E kore rawa ō taipitopito hoapā e whakaputaina. Kaua rawa koe e whakamōrearea i a koe anō, i ētahi atu rānei, i ngā mōrea koretake, i te takahi rānei i ētahi ture. Kei te pupuri te BBC i te mana ki te tīpako mai i ēnei koha i runga anō i ngā whakaritenga ētita, ā, e herea ana ki ngā ture me ngā tikanga tuihono me ngā tohutohu ētita o TE AO. Mō ētahi atu mōhiohio e pā ana ki te whakahaere a te BBC i ō raraunga whaiaro, tirohia i konei. Mēnā kei te pānui koe i tēnei whārangi, ā, kāore koe e kite i te puka, me toro koe ki te putanga pūkoro o te paetukutuku BBC ki te tuku i tō pātai, tākupu rānei, ka taea rānei e koe te īmēra mai ki a mātou i HaveYourSay@bbc.co.uk. Please include your name, age and location with any submission.

title: Ngā Hurai o Wīwī: Tokorua nga tuakana i whakaekea i te tiriti o Parihi
summary: E uiui ana nga pirihimana Wīwī i tētahi whakaekenga ki ngā tuakana Hurai tokorua i tētahi tapa taone o Parihi, i reira i hamama ai nga kaihōia i te tūkinotanga anō o te Hēmi.
text: E kī ana te mātāmua, e 29, me tōna tuakana, 17, i rāhuitia tētahi o ngā kaihōia ki te kani kōpae, ā, i pāngia rāua tahi i te wā o te whawhai. E kī ana rātau i whakatārewatia rātau i a rātau e taraiwa ana i Bondy i te ahiahi o te Tūrei, e mau ana i ngā kippas. E tata ana a Bondy ki Aulnay-sous-Bois, he wāhi i pā ki te whakararuraru pirihimana i tēnei marama. Kāore anō kia herea ngā pōhēhētanga e pā ana ki te whakaekenga o te Tūrei. He wāhanga a Bondy no te takiwā o Seine-Saint-Denis, ki te raki o Parihi, i reira i hū ai te tutu i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama nā te whakapae i te taitama pango e pirihimana. I mahue i te hōhipera te tangata, ko Theo te ingoa, i te hōhipera i tēnei wiki i muri i te rongoā ohorere. Na te tutu hoki i tūtuki ētahi atu wāhi o waho ake. He nui te kiato o ngā tauiwi o Seine-Saint-Denis, he tokomaha o rātau he Mohimana. E pāngia ana te rohe i te nui o te kore mahi me te rawakore taone. I kī tētahi rōpū Wīwī e whawhai ana i te anati-Semitism, e kiia nei ko BNVCA, kua tūkinotia ngā Hurai tokorua i te tuatahi e ngā kaihōia tokorua i whai i a rātau i roto i te van. 'Ka mate koe!' I roto i tētahi kōrero ki ngā pirihimana, i whakahuatia e te kaipānui arumoni Wīwī LCI (i te reo Wīwī), e kī ana te taina, i te wā i tapahia e te vani to rātau motokā, ka whakahekea e tōna tuakana tōna matapihi ki te pātai he aha. "E mahi ana ahau i tāku e hiahia ana i runga i te huarahi," te whakautu a te atekōkiri. "E nga Hurai paruparu! E p***s koe! Ka mate koe!" E kī ana te taitamariki kātahi ka oma atu te atekōkiri ki tōna tuakana e mau ana i tētahi kani kōrere, ka tūtuki i a ia i a ia e ngana ana ki te pare i tōna kanohi i te whakaeke. I tana kitenga i te kaihōia e whai ana i te kakī o tōna tuakana, ka patua ia e ia, a, ka whai mai he whawhai mo te kani, i tapahia ai ōna ake maihao, ka kī a ia. Kātahi ētahi o te iwi ka uru atu ki te whakamutu i te whakaekenga, ka kī atu ki nga tuakana kia haere, ka haere rātau ki te wāhi tūpāpaku o te hōhipera, ka kī te taina. Ka kī atu tētahi kaiwhakaatu ki a LCI kua tangohia e ia he kōrere i tētahi tangata i roto i te riri, engari i kī kāore a ia i kite i ngā kippa. "Kāore ahau i kite i te Hurai, i te Karaitiana, i te whakapono rānei i taua wāhi," tana kī. "Mo te kōrero a nga tuakana, kāore au i rongo i tētahi mea pērā." I te tuatahi ka kī te BNVCA kua ngaro tētahi matimati o tētahi o nga tuakana i te whakaekenga, engari i muri iho ka whakatikaina e rātau ta rātau pūkete (i te reo Wīwī) o taua mahi. Ko te anati-Semitism tētahi āhuatanga o ngā whakaekenga a te Māori i Wīwī i ngā tau tata nei:

title: London Night Tube: Ka 'haumaru' ngā pāhihi, e kī ana ngā pirihimana
summary: Ka haumaru ngā pāhihi i runga i te Ngongo Pō o Rāwāhi i a rātau i runga i te ratonga awatea, kua kī pirihimana.
text: Ka tīmata te ratonga pō katoa i ngā raina o Wikitōria me Waenganui i te Paraire. Ka horapa atu ki ngā raina Jubilee, Northern me Piccadilly i tēnei ngahuru. I kī a Supt Chris Horton, o ngā Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi (BTP), tata ki te 100 ngā āpiha e tautiaki ana. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kaua he take e kore ai e haumaru te tangata i te pō pērā i te awatea." Ka whakahaere te ratonga i ngā ahiahi o te Paraire me te Hātarei. I te nuinga o te wā ka mutu ngā ratonga ngongo i te 00:30 i runga i ngā raina maha. Kua hoatu e te Koromatua o Rānōna, o Te Koromatua o Rāwāhi, e £3.4m ki te utu o te whakarato i tētahi pirihimana e kitea ana. I kī a Ch Supt Horton e kore e rerekē te whakahaere i te Ngongo Pō ki te whiu i te tere o te mutunga wiki, ā, ko te wero matua o te pirihimana ko te mahi ki ngā tāngata i "kino ake mō te mau" i muri i te inu waipiro. Ka kī a ia: "Me mātua whakarite mātou e tiaki ana i ngā tāngata, koia tā mātou whāinga matua, engari me mātua whakarite hoki kia whanonga te tangata, ā, kaua e wehi i ētahi atu tāngata ki te hara. " Koia tērā te wero matua mō mātau, engari he ōrite te take kei a mātau i te Paraire me te Hātarei i tēnei wā." E "whakatau ana ngā āpiha BTP ki te whakarite he taiao haumaru" ā, ka arotahi ki ngā "wāhiwera" e mōhiotia ana i waenganui o Rānōna, i ngā pito tawhiti o te whatunga. Ka tīmata hoki ngā pahi hōu 24 haora e waru ngā pahi hou 24 haora i tēnei Paraire, ka kī te taone nui. Ka kī a Tēnā Kani: "Ka haere tahi ngā ara me te Ngongo Pō hei āwhina i ngā tāngata o Rāwāhi kia tae atu, mai i tō rātou tatau o mua puta noa i te pō. " It's another key step in helping everyone travel quickly and safely at night, and another boost to unlocking the full potential of our night-time economy." Ngā ara pahi hōu 24 haora:

title: Kēhi Lynette White: I pātaitia ngā whakaaturanga toto kōhuru
summary: Kua pātaitia tētahi tohunga ā-ture i tētahi whakawā mō ngā whakaaturanga toto i mahue i te tangata e ora ana ināianei mo te kōhurutanga o Lynette White i Kārepa.
text: I pātaitia te tohunga mehemea tērā pea i whara a Jeffrey Gafoor i roto i tētahi whawhai ki a Miss White, tērā pea i patua ā muri ake e tētahi, neke atu rānei o ngā tāngata rerekē. I whakaae a Gafoor ki te kōhuru o te tau 1988. Tokotoru nga tāngata i hē te hara i mua. E waru nga pirihimana o mua e whakakāhore ana i te whakarerekētanga o te ara o te tika. I hopukina a Gafoor i te tau 2003, engari i mua i taua wā, tokotoru nga tāngata i whakawāteatia mo te kōhuru i mua i te whakawāteatanga i runga i te tono i te tau 1992. Tokorima ngā tāngata, i mōhiotia nei ko te Rima o Kānata, i whakawāteatia tuatahitia, ā, tokotoru o rātau ko Stephen Miller, ko Ihu Abdullahi rāua ko Toni Paris i whakawāteatia, i hereheretia mō te ora i te tau 1990. E rua tau i muri mai i te whakakorenga o o rātau whakapae, ka tukua te Toru o Kānata i a rātau e mōhiotia ana. Na te uiuinga 10 tau i hopukina ai rātau, i whakapaea ai ngā pirihimana o mua i mahi i te tūhuratanga taketake ki te "whakauru" i ngā tāngata. Neke atu i te 50 ngā wā i okaina ai a Miss White, he kairau, i roto i tētahi whare noho i Hemi Tiriti, i Kānata, i whakamahia e ia ki te whakangahau i ngā kiritaki, i ngā haora tōmua o te 14 o Hēpuari 1988. I kī atu a Gafoor, e mahi ana i tētahi whiu ora, ki te Kōti Karauna o Swansea, e 10 ki te 12 ngā wā i roto i tētahi rūma moe pouri. I kī a ia kua tonoa e ia tana £30 i muri i tana whakakāhore ki te noho kore ārai ki a ia. Ka tīmata te whawhai, a, ka patua ia e ia. I kī a ia i mahi ko ia anake. 'Uaua' ka kī atu a Dr Angela Gallop, he kaipūtaiao ā ture, ki te Kōti Karauna o Swansea i te Wenerei mō ngā whakamātautau toto i mahia e ia i te tau 1999, 11 tau i muri i te kōhuru. Kua rākaitia anōtia te whare noho i taua wā, engari i taea e tana tīma te tango i ngā tatau taketake me ngā papa panekoti, ā, ka uru ki ōna kākahu me ētahi atu tūemi. Mo te wā tuatahi, ka kī a ia, i taea e rātau te tango peita hou i tētahi tatau, a, ka kitea he toto i raro. I whakaahuatia e ia he pēhea te kitenga o ngā kōtaha DNA i ngā wāhi maha e ōrite ana, e ōrite ana rānei ki tērā o Gafoor rāua ko Miss White. I whakaae a ia ko te motu whakamate i te korokoro o Hine White. I muri iho i tērā, he maha nga wā i okaina ai ia i roto i te poho i te wā i takaia tana koti - ki muri ki mua - kia mau tonu ki a ia, ā, kua tapahia ōna ringa e rua. Ko William Coker QC, te rōia e tiaki ana i taua wā, ko Det Insp Graham Mouncher, nāna i whakahaere i te tūhuratanga i ia rā, tae atu ki ngā hopunga taketake o ngā tāngata tokorima, i hoatu ki a Dr Gallop e rua pea ngā wāhanga o te tutu. I kī a ia e 10, 12 noa iho ngā okanga i kōrerotia e Gafoor i te wā neke atu i te 50, ā, kāore anō ia kia kōrero i te tapahi i tōna korokoro e toru nga wā. I kī a Tēnā Coker kāore a Gafoor i mōhio mehemea kua tūhono nga oka. Kātahi ia ka tū, ā, kāore anō ia kia whara anō. Engari i tētahi wā, i pāngia e ia tētahi tapahi. "Mēnā e tika ana a ia mō te 10, 12 rānei ngā oka, kātahi ka mārama kē atu. Tērā pea he meneti, he haora rānei te whakaekenga kino i muri iho," te pātai a Tēnā Coker. "Ka taea te hangarau," te whakautu a Tākuta Gallop. 'I mahue i te tere' ka pātai mai a Tēnā Coker mehemea i te wā o te whawhai tuatahi kāore a Miss White i whara, engari i whara a Gafoor, e whakamārama ana he aha i kitea ai ōna toto i ngā wāhi putanga ki te whare noho. Tērā pea nā Hine Mā tonu i whakawhiti te toto o Gafoor i whara ki ōna kākahu, tae atu ki tōna tōkena mauī. I kī a Dr Gallop kāore anō ia kia tonoa kia hanga anō i te tirohanga hara, ki te rapu toto anake ehara i reira. "Tērā pea ka pā mai te whakaekenga kino i muri i tana haerenga," ko te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Coker. I kī a Gafoor, i tāpiritia e Tēnā Coker, i muri i te mutunga o te whakaekenga, ka noho ia i runga i te moenga "mō te rua meneti, kātahi ka haere wawe". I whakaae a Dr Gallop mehemea i pā mai tēnā, ka tūmanako ia kia kitea te toto o Gafoor i runga i te moenga. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: Te whanaketanga o te Whare Wānanga o Oxford Port Meadow i arotakea
summary: Ko te huri-U i runga i tētahi whakataunga e āhei ai te Whare Wānanga o Oxford ki te hanga whare ākonga i runga i tētahi papa tākaro, ka pau pea te kaunihera o te taone nui i tētahi "tapeke whitu-whika", kua kitea he pūrongo.
text: Kei te haere te whanaketanga i runga i te kaupapa i Port Meadow i muri i te whakaaetanga whakarite a te kaunihera i mua. Kei te arotake i te kēhi i te Tāite, engari e kī ana ko "ngā āhuatanga tino hāngai" anake ka whakaaro anō. E whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau he whakakino te kaupapa i ngā tirohanga o tētahi whakamaharatanga kua whakaritea me tētahi wāhi ātaahua tino ātaahua. Ka rite pea te whanaketanga o Castle Mill, i Roger Dudman Way e tata ana ki te teihana rerewhenua, i te wā o Mahuru. I kī te kaiwhakahauhau o Celine Wills, mai i Binsey, he wāhi whenua noa iho te pae e tika ana kia tuwhera ki te katoa. 'E tipu ana te huarahi' Kāore te whare i hanumi ki te whenua, ka tāpiri mai a ia. I kī a Alison Cobb, kei a ia te wāteatanga o te taone, he take mo te pīra. "Ko ngā mea katoa e pā ana ki Port Meadow me whakamōhio, me whakaae hoki e ngā tangata rangatira me ngā tangata whenua o Wolvercote, ā, kāore i kōrerotia ki a mātau ngā tangata rangatira," tana kī. I kī te pūrongo mai i te upoko o te whanaketanga o te taone ki te Komiti Whakarite Rohe ki te Hauauru: "Mēnā e tika ana kia pērā, ka taea te whakaaro ki te whakakore i te whakaaetanga whakarite, ahakoa tērā pea ka tino manawapa te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga ki te whakakore i tētahi whakaaetanga whakarite whaimana atu i ngā āhuatanga tino ātaahua. " Mēnā i pērā, ka whai mai te utu nui e whitu whika pea." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te whare wānanga: "Ko te pae o to mātau taone, e mau ana ki te hītori o Oxford anō, he whakaranu haere tonu o te tawhito me te hou, te māori me te hanga. " Ka whakarato a Castle Mill i te nohoanga mō ngā rau ākonga, nā reira ka whakaheke i te pēhanga i runga i te mākete whare rēti o Oxford. "Ka mahia e ia mā te whakamahi anō i tētahi pae rerewhenua o mua, kaua e aurara i runga i te whenua kāore anō kia mahia."

title: Ngā kōrero taipitopito o Te Rohe o Kīriria
summary: E kī ana te kaiwhakarite matua o te EU e titiro ana ngā kōrero ki ngā "minutiae" me pēhea te mahi a te taitapa o Kīriria.
text: Nā John CampbellBBC News NI Economics & Business Editor i kōrero a Mīharo Barnier i muri i tētahi hui me te Hēkeretari o Te Wānanga o Te Aotearoa. Ko te tauwhāinga he whakaritenga ka pā ki te kore e taea te pupuri i te taitapa o Kīriria kia rite ki te horopaki o tētahi mahi whānui ake. Kua whakaae ngā taha e rua ki te hiahia mō tētahi tauwhāinga, engari ehara i te pēhea e mahi ai. Kua tonoa e te EU tētahi tauwhāinga e noho ana a Aiarangi ki te Raki i te uniana o ngā tikanga EU, ngā wāhanga nui o te mākete kotahi me te pūnaha WAP EU. Kua whakakāhoretia e te kāwanatanga o UK hei tuma ki te taparenga o te UK, ā, kua huatau mai he tauwhāinga e kite ana i te UK e noho ana ki te uniana tikanga EU mō tētahi wā whāiti i muri i te tau 2020. I kī a Tēnā Barnier kua tonoa e te EU ki te UK mō ētahi atu raraunga e āhei ai te aromatawai i te mana me ngā taki "ko wai, āhea, me pēhea" ka mahia te mana me ngā taki. I whakaahuatia e ia he "mahi hangarau" e hiahiatia ana kia tika te mahi. I whakamātauria e ia, ki te kore he pūrua kua whakaaetia, ka wehe atu te UK i te EU me te kore mahi. I kī a Tēnā Raab me mahi tētahi rongoā mō ngā hapori i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te Whenua o Aiarangi. I whakaahuatia e ia he "tūmanako" kei te tae atu tētahi mahi.

title: Mā te ngaro o ngā raraunga 'ka mōrearea pea ngā tūroro tūmataiti'
summary: Tērā pea kei te mōrearea ngā tūroro i te rahunga o ngā hōhipera tūmataiti ki te pūrongo i ngā mahi nui, kua whakatūpato te Kāreti Ariki o ngā Tākuta (RCS).
text: Nā Darragh MacIntyreBBC Panorama i kitea e tētahi tūhuratanga o Te Panorama o TE AO kāore i te nui ngā raraunga mō ngā putanga tūroro. Ko te tikanga o tēnei ko te wāhanga tūmataiti "e kore e taea te pakari, te haumaru rānei ki te NHS", te kī a te perehitini RCS, a Derek Alderson. E kī ana te kāwanatanga ka kaha ake ngā tohutohu hou ki ngā whare hauora hinganga. Ko ngā māharahara, i whakaarahia e te RCS, e arotahi ana ki te pūrongo i ngā mahi nui me ngā mea e kiia nei ko "kaua rawa e takahanga" - ngā hē tino nui e kore e puta. Kāore ēnei e pūrongotia ki ngā pātengi raraunga ā-motu i runga i te āhua ōrite, i te katoa rānei, te kī a te RCS. I whakatūpato hoki kāore he raraunga arotaupū rongoā mai i te wāhanga tūmataiti, pēnei i te kore e tāpae i ngā huinga raraunga mō ngā hua o te pokanga pukupuku, ahakoa he maha ngā hātepe mate pukupuku. 'Kāore i te tino pai' te kī a Tēnā Alderson: "Kāore mātou i te mōhio ki ngā mea e haere ana i te wāhanga tūmataiti. " Kāore e taea te pakari, te haumaru rānei pērā i te NHS i tēnei wā mō te take māmā kāore i a koe te pūrongo katoa o ngā tūroro katoa e rongoatia ana. "Kāore i te pai. Me huri ngā mea," tana kī. Ka tohu hoki te RCS ki ngā āputa i roto i te pūrongo mō te pokanga whakanao, kāore he huingararaunga i runga i te katoa o ngā mahi. E whakaae ana te nuinga o te umanga rongoā tūmataiti he raruraru ki te raraunga me te pūataata. I kī a Kōrero O'Connor, o te Tōpūtanga o ngā Tākuta Takitahi: "Kei runga i ngā hōhipera tūmataiti te whakaara i tā rātou kēmu me te whakaatu i ngā raraunga me te tino pai o te tiaki, nā te mea kāore he mea hei huna mā rātou." I tāpiritia e Tēnā O'Connor, e tohu ana tōna rōpū whakahaere i ngā tākuta tūmataiti e 1,200: "Ko aua hōhipera tūmataiti kāore i a rātou ngā raraunga, ā, kāore i te pūataata, me kati, kāore rānei e whakaaetia kia whakahaere i ngā hātepe rongoā matatini." I rongo a Panorama i ngā tūpāpaku o te tākuta nanakia o Īna Paterson, i hereheretia mo te 20 tau mo te whara i ngā tūroro. Ahakoa i kitea kua tūkinotia e ia ngā tūroro i roto i te NHS, neke atu i te 700 ngā tāngata i tūkinotia e ia i ngā hōhipera tūmataiti, tae atu ki a Beryl Parkes. I tangohia e Paterson tētahi o ōna uma, ā, i hiahiatia e ia ētahi atu pokanga hei whakatika i ana hē. Ka kī a Ms Parkes: "E whakapono ana koe ki te tākuta, ehara i a koe? Ka oati rātau kia mahia e te tangata te pai rawa mō rātou." Engari kāore tētahi tangata i te tirotiro i a Paterson. A, no te arotakenga o te mahinga a Ms Parkes, ka puta mai kāore ia i mahi - nā te mea kāore i a ia te mate pukupuku i te wāhi tuatahi. "Ko te tikanga kia ora a ia," tana kī. "E whakaaro ana ahau he pai rawa tēnā mōna, nā te mea ko te tikanga he moni katoa." I whakahētia ngā kaiwhakahaere o Paterson i Spire Healthcare mo te korenga e whakahaere i to rātau tākuta moni tiketike. Ka kī atu te kamupene ki te AO e "tino pouri ana mō te mamae i pā ki ngā tūroro". I mōhio hoki a Panorama kāore e taea e ētahi tūroro te whiwhi utu mēnā ka tūkinotia rātau e tētahi tākuta tūmataiti. Tērā pea ka kore te hōhipera e whakaae ki te taunaha nā te mea he kaikirimana takitahi te tākuta me "ngā mana whakaharatau". I kī te rōia o Suzanne White: "Ka whakaaro ngā tūroro katoa e haere ana i tētahi hōhipera tūmataiti ka hipokina rātou, ā, kāore noa iho. He whakamīharo tēnā." Kāore pea e taea e ngā tūroro te whiwhi utu mai i te kamupene inihua a te tākuta, nā te mea mēnā ka whakatau te kaiwhakarato kua whati te tākuta i ngā ture, ka taea e rātou te kore e pai ki te taupoki. 'Tino whakawātea' He āputa āhua kore nei i roto i te pūnaha, engari he kino ki ngā tūroro. Ka urupare a Tēnā O'Connor: "Ki te kī atu i tētahi tūroro kua hē ki a rātou, e kore e whiwhi i te utu tika." E hiahia ana a ia kia tika te utu a te kāwanatanga me ngā rōpū hauora tūmataiti. Kua kitea e Panorama tētahi take kāore i taea e tētahi tūroro i tūkinotia te whiwhi utu mai i te hōhipera tūmataiti, i te tākuta rānei e haepapa ana. I tutuki kē tana tono i te NHS, nā te mea ko tana whakaaro tuatahi i roto i tētahi hōhipera NHS. Ahakoa ko te rōia i toa i te kēhi, e whakaaro ana he hē te whakahau a te NHS ki te utu. I kī a Suzanne White: "Kei te tino hōhā ahau ki taua mea, ā, he tino rīpeka, nā te mea he rite tonu taku kite. " He aha te hōhipera tūmataiti whai tākuta nāna i hoatu te tiaki whakarihariha - me te whai hua - kaore e utu i aua tūroro? "He aha te take i waewae ai te NHS i te pire?" I tērā tau, neke atu i te 500,000 ngā tūroro NHS i tohua ki ngā hōhipera tūmataiti. Engari ko te wāhi tino tere e tipu ana i te wāhanga ko te utu i a ia anō, e pūtea ai ngā tāngata kāore he inihua i a rātau ake mahinga ki te rangi e tata ana ki te £900m ia tau. Ko ngā tohutohu NHS me ngā tūroro utu whaiaro e tata ana ki te haurua o te umanga o te wāhanga hauora tūmataiti. 'Tougher enforcement' I kī te Association of Independent Healthcare Organisations he kaha ngā whakaaturanga he haumaru te wāhanga takitahi, ā, he manakē te haumarutanga tūroro ki te NHS. E kī ana kua whakatauria e te Komihana Kounga Tiaki te tata ki te 60% o ngā hōhipera tūmataiti he pai, he tino pai rānei mō te haumarutanga. I kī te Tari Hauora kua whakaritea kētia e ngā paerewa hōu ngā whakaritenga mārama ake mō te tukunga o te tiaki haumaru. E kī ana ka whakahohea he mahi whakaū uaua ake ki ngā kaiwhakarato hē. Ināianei ka whakatauria ngā whare hauora whakanao e te CQC, ā, me mātua whakarite ngā hōhipera tūmataiti kia whakaaturia ngā whakatauranga i roto i ngā kāinga, i te ipurangi hoki. He pēhea te haumaru o tō mahi? i te Mane i te 20:30 BST i BBC One, ā, e wātea ana i iPlayer.

title: He wawao te tautohetohe a Cumberbatch, e kī ana te whetū o Selma, a David Oyelowo
summary: Kua tautāwhi a Rawiri Oyelowo i te kaitapere me te hoa o Ingarangi, a Benedict Cumberbatch, mō te whakamahi i te kupu "tae" i te wā o tētahi uiuinga.
text: Nā Natalie JamiesonNewsbeat, kua whakapārewa te kaipānui whakangahau a Cumberbatch, ā, i kī mai i "whakararuraru i te hara" i muri i te whakamahinga o te kupu i runga i tētahi whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata o Amerika hei whakaahua i ngā kaitapere pango. "Ki taku whakaaro he wawau," te kī a te whetū o Selma o Oyelowo ki a Newsbeat. "Ina titiro koe ki tāna i kōrero tonu ai, e mārama ana he kaitautoko nui a ia ki ngā kaiwhakatū pango." I te kōrero a Rawiri Oyelowo i te whakaaturanga tuatahi o UK o Selma, i reira ia e whetū ana hei kaiwhaiwhai motika tūmatanui o te tau 1960, a Mātini Luther Kingi, Jr. I kōrerotia e Cumberbatch a Rawiri Oyelowo rāua ko Chiwetel Ejiofor hei wāhanga o tētahi kōrero whānui ake ki te kaihautū kōrero kōrero a Tavis Smiley mō te rerenga kētanga i roto i te umanga pikitia. "Ki te whakaeke i a ia mō tētahi wā, ehara i tāna e kōrero tonu ana, e whakaaro ana ahau he tino tinihanga, ā, e whakaatu ana i te pakeke e noho ana tātau e kimi ana te tangata i ngā ngau oro, ehara i te rawa." Ētahi atu: He aha te take i whakahāwea ai te kupu 'tae' i kī ai hoki te kaitapere kua kōrero a ia ki a Cumberbatch mō te tautohetohe i mura tuihono i ngā rā torutoru kua taha. "I toro atu ahau ki a ia ki te tautoko, a, i kī mai ahau he wawau," tana kī. I te pātaitanga mehemea i rongo a ia i te take o Karaihe me te umanga pikitia ki te rerenga kētanga, ka whakautu a Oyelowo me te "tino pai". "Ka kitea e koe i te mea i ia wā ka puta ake he pikitia o tēnei rahi me te roa. " Kei te kōrero anō mātou mō te rerenga kētanga, ā, nā te mea kāore i te rawaka." I kōrerotia e ia tana mahi o mua tata nei i Interstellar he mea kāore i whakapūtātia hei pūāhua pango, ā, i kī "kia tae ki te wāhi e piki ake ai ahau me Ryan Gosling mō te tūranga kotahi". "Ehara tēnā i te kī kāore tēnā e puta, kāore i te puta i te nuinga o te wā." I huatau a Oyelowo me nui ake te rerenga kētanga i waenganui i ngā tāngata whai mana ki te pūtea me te hanga kiriata. "Ko te tino pai te rākau tino pai ki te whakaaro nui. E hiahia ana ahau kia noho hei wāhanga o te rongoā, ehara i te raruraru. "Me haere tonu koe ki te pahū i ngā mahinga pai." Kua whakaingoatia a Benedict Cumberbatch mō te kaitapere tino pai o Oscar mō tana mahi i roto i te The Imitation Game, ā, i te wā i hapa a David Oyelowo i tētahi whakaingoatanga whakatau mō Selma, kei te oma te pikitia mō te pikitia tino pai i te hui o tērā marama. Heoi anō e whakaaro ana a Rawiri ka tūkinotia te mahi a Cumberbatch i te whakaaturanga tōraro i whiwhi ai a Benedict? "Kāore rawa," te kī a Oyelowo. "Ki taku whakaaro he wāhanga noa iho tēnei o te huringa rongo heahea e whāngaia ana e tātau katoa, ā, ka haere atu pēnei i te pepa maramara pērā i tāna. " He kaitapere mātauranga a ia, he mahinga tino mātauranga tana i roto i te Kēmu Tāwhai, ā, e kī ana ahau, he whakarerekētanga noa iho i ngā mea e tika ana kia kōrerotia e tātau, arā, ko taua mahinga whakamīharo." Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter, BBCNewsbeat i Instagram me Radio1Newsbeat i YouTube

title: Ka whakamanatia e Google kia kore ai e mahi ā-ture i roto i a Mātau
summary: Kua whakataua e te Federal Trade Commission (FTC) kia kaua e mahi ā-ture ki a Google i te mutunga o tētahi tūhuratanga 19 marama ki te matua rapu.
text: I kitea kāore a Google i tītaha i ōna hua rapu kia manakohia ai ōna hua. Kua whakaae a Google ki te tuku āheitanga ki ngā kaipānui ki ētahi atu mōhiohio mō ā rātou whakahau, ā, kua whakaae kia kaua e whakamahi i ngā rauemi a ētahi atu kaiwhakarato pēnei i ngā arotakenga hua i roto i ōna hua rapu. Kei te tatari tonu a Google ki tētahi whakataetae whakataetae mai i te Kōmihana o Ūropi. Ka pā tētahi atu mana uru matua ki te whakamahi a Google i ngā ārai i hokona e ia i te whiwhinga o Motorola Mobility i tērā tau mō te $12.5bn (£7.9bn). Kua kī a Google ka utua e ia ngā utu "tika, tika hoki" ki ngā kamupene e hiahia ana ki te whakamahi i ōna ārai tino nui. Ko ngā ārai tino nui paerewa ko ngā mea e tino nui ana ki ngā paerewa umanga, hei tauira, ko te hangarau e āhei ai ngā pūrere pēnei i ngā waea atamai me ngā paparorohiko ki te tūhono ki te ipurangi mā te Wi-Fi. Kua whakaae kia kaua e tango i ngā whakahau e whakahau ana i ngā raihana kia tango i ā rātou hua mai i te hoko mēnā he tautohetohe mō te nui o te utu tika. I karangatia e ngā tauwhāinga 'whakakino, moata hoki' kia kaha ake ngā whakaaetanga ki a Google. I kī a Fairsearch, he rōpū whakahaere e tohu ana i ētahi o ngā kaiwhakawāwā a Google pērā i a Microsoft, i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Ko te whakatau a te FTC ki te kati i tana tūhuratanga me ngā whakaritenga tūturu anake mai i a Google, he whakakino, he moata hoki, e haere mai ana i ngā wiki noa iho i mua i te kamupene kia mahi i tētahi tono tika, taipitopito hoki hei whakatika i ngā tūkinotanga e whā o te mana i tāutua e te Kōmihana o Ūropi,  tuatahi i waenganui i a rātou he whakaaturanga tītaha o ōna ake āhuatanga i roto i ngā hua rapu." I tonoa te FTC kia tūhura mēnā kei te manako a Google i ōna ake hua i roto i ngā hua rapu. I kī atu te manukura FTC o Jon Leibowitz ki tētahi hui pānui kāore i kitea e te kōmihana he whakaaturanga e tītaha ana te pūkaha rapu a Google ki ana ake ratonga. "Tērā pea e whakapono ana ētahi me nui ake te mahi a te kōmihana, engari mō tā mātou wāhi e whai ana mātou i ngā take e ārahi ai rātau," tana kī. "Ka mahia e mātau i runga i te kaha tika. Mā tēnei e whakamutu ai te tūhuratanga. He pai mō ngā kiritaki, he pai mō te whakataetae, ā, ko te mea tika hei mahi." Mā tētahi o ngā huringa nui rawa e whakatinanatia e Google e āhei ai ngā kaipānui ki te tārua i ngā raraunga whakahau pānui ki ētahi atu pūkaha rapu, pēnei i te Bing a Microsoft. E kī ana hoki a Google ka mutu te tārua ihirangi mai i ētahi atu paetukutuku hei whakamahi i ōna whakarāpopototanga, ahakoa i tohe te kamupene he ture te mahi i raro i ngā whakaritenga whakamahi tika o te ture manatārua o Amerika. Hei urupare ki te whakataunga, ka kī te āpiha ture matua o Google, a David Drummond i roto i tētahi pou rangitaki: "I pānuitia e te Komihana Mahi a te Hautahi o Amerika i tēnei rā kua katia tana tūhuratanga ki a Google i muri i tētahi arotakenga 19 marama e hipa ana i ngā whārangi tuhinga e hia miriona ngā whārangi, ā, he maha ngā haora whakaaturanga. " He mārama te whakamutunga: He pai ngā ratonga a Google mō ngā kaiwhakamahi, he pai hoki mō te whakataetae." Pai nui Ehara i te mea kei waho te matua rapu i te ngahere mo te take o nga mahi ārai whakataetae. I te taha o te tūhuratanga FTC, kei raro tonu a Google i te tirotiro mai i te Uniana o Ūropi. I a Hakihea, ka hoatu e te Komihana Whakataetae a te EU te matua rapu i te marama ki te whakatau i ngā wāhi matua e whā: ka tūmanakohia kia urupare a Google ki ēnei māharahara ākuanei. Mēnā ka kitea he hara ki te takahi i ngā ture ārai whirinaki EU, ka anga atu a Google ki te whaina tae atu ki te $4bn (£2.5bn).

title: Ka tāruatia te 'masterplan' o Glentress
summary: Kei te tāruatia tētahi "mahere matua" mō Te Ngahere o Te Ngahere i ngā Taitapa o Pākehā hei āwhina i tōna whanaketanga hei "ūnga hākinakina nui".
text: Forestry Commission Scotland (FCS) wants to ensure activities are "co-ordinated in a sustainable way". E kī ana ko tētahi "wae matua" e whakarongo ana ki ngā tirohanga a te iwi paetata, ngā umanga me ngā kaiwhakamahi ngahere. He maha ngā takahanga e whakaritea ana ā muri ake nei kia āhei ai te iwi whānui ki te kōrero mō te kaupapa. I kī a Hugh McKay, kaiwhakahaere hapori me te hākinakina i Kirikiri: "He tau tuatahi arokē engari he pai mō Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga. " Neke atu i te 301,000 ngā toronga mō te tau, kua riro i a mātou tētahi whakatauranga koura mai i te kaupapa Pakihi Tāpoi Kākāriki, he tohu VisitScotland whetū whā, ā, kei te mahi a Go-Ape i te ngahere. "The cafe and bike services have well and truly bedded in and we are getting positive comments on the site as a whole. " He rongo pai katoa tēnei, engari kāore mātou e hiahia ki te tū tonu, ā, e whakaaro ana mātou he nui ake ngā mea hei tuku i a Glentress hei tautoko i ngā kaupapa a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā." I kī a ia i rite tonu te whakatata atu ki a rātau e ngā umanga hou e hiahia ana ki te kōrero mō te whanaketanga ā muri ake, engari kāore te FCS i pīrangi ki te mahi i tēnei "i runga i te āhua ā-wā". "Koinei te wāhi e haere mai ai te kaupapa matua hōu o Te Kirikiri, nā te mea ka tino āta titiro ki te pikitia nui ake ka taea te tuku," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā McKay, ahakoa i āwhina te kaihautū i te 25% o te utu mo te whakahaere i ngā ngahere o Pākehā, me whakaara te toenga e te umanga. "We've worked very hard to build in better income streams at Glentress," he said. "Ko te tikanga o tēnei kei te neke mātou ki tētahi tūnga tautoko whaiaro kē atu e whati ai mātou, engari he roa tonu tā mātou haere." Ka tū ngā wātū toamahi mō "ngā kaiāwhina matua" i te tīmatanga o Mei. The first open days for members of the public will be on the afternoons of 24 and 25 May at Glentress Peel.

title: Abingdon reservoir inquiry draws to close
summary: I tēnei wiki ka mutu tētahi uiui tūmatanui ki ngā mahere mō tētahi puna nui i Oxfordshire.
text: E tono ana a Thames Water i te whanaketanga, e whā ngā maero tapawhā o te whenua ki te tonga ki te hauauru o Abingdon, ā, e utu ana i te £1bn. E kī ana te kamupene wai e hiahiatia ana te puna hei whakatutuki i te hiahia wai ā muri ake nei i te Rāwhiti ki te Tonga. Ka mutu tana mahi i tana take i te Wenerei. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau kāore i te hiahiatia, ā, ka tūkino i te taiao. Kua tāpaetia katoatia e te Cotswold Canal Trust, te Rōpū Ki te Whanaketanga Puna (GARD) me te Taiao Taiao ā rātou tauākī whakamutunga i tēnei wiki. I tīmata te uiui i te Pokapū Hui o Oxford i Park End Street. Ka tūmanakohia te hua ā muri ake i tēnei tau.

title: Ngaronga o Luke Durbin: Hopunga tuarua i roto i te rūpahu kōhuru
summary: Kua hopukina tētahi tangata tuarua hei wāhanga o te uiui kōhuru ki te ngaronga o tētahi tangata o Te Wānanga e ngaro ana mai i te tau 2006.
text: Kua hopukina tētahi tangata 25 tau i runga i te whakapae i te "āwangawanga ki te kōhuru" o Luke Durbin, ka kī pirihimana. I mua ake, i hopukina tētahi tangata 40 tau i Ipswich i runga i te whakapae ki te kōhuru. I pūrongotia a Tēnā Durbin, 19 i taua wā, i te 13 o Me 2006 i muri i tana korenga i hoki mai i tētahi pō me ōna hoa i te pokapū o te taone o Ipswich. Kai te puritia ngā pōhēhētanga e rua. I kī te tīma whakamatau nui o Norfolk me Te Tīma whakamatau nui kāore i kitea a Tēnā Durbin, engari i whakapono kua "patua ā-ture" a ia. I hopukina te tangata e 40 tau i tētahi whare papa i Spring Road. I rapua hoki tētahi wāhitau tuarua i Redwald Road pātata, i Rendlesham, hei wāhanga o te uiuinga.

title: Avon and Somerset Chief Constable Colin Port to step down
summary: Me hīpae te kātipa matua i muri i tana whakakāhore ki te tono anō mō tana ake mahi.
text: I pānuitia e Hōne Tauranga e kore ia e rapu i te whakahōutanga o tana kirimana ki ngā Pirihimana o Avon me Ngā Pirihimana, i te rā i muri i te oatitia o Sue Mountstevens hei pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC). I te wā e puta mai ana i Ingarangi me Weera, he maha ngā PCC kua oatitia i te rā i whakakapia ai nga mana pirihimana e te tūranga hou. Kua tīmata kē ētahi atu komihana ki te whakarerekē i o rātau ope. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Tauranga kua kī atu a Ms Mountstevens ki a ia e hiahia ana ia ki te "tīmata i te tukanga ki te tiki i tētahi rangatira kātipa" ki te mau i te tōpana "whakamua". Ka kī a ia: "I kī atu ahau ki a ia kāore au i te hiahia ki te tono mo taku mahi." 'Mahi nui' Ka riro i a Rob Beckley te rangatira o te kātipa ina wehe atu a Tēnā Tauranga. Ka taupokina hoki e ia te tūranga i te wā o te tukanga tono. Ko Ms Mountstevens, nāna i toa i te pōti hei PCC tuatahi o te rohe, ko ia anake te kaitono takitahi e tū ana i Avon me Somerset. I kī a ia i te mea e iwa wiki noa iho a Tēnā Tauranga e toe ana ki te whakahaere i tana kirimana, e hiahia ana ia kia haere te mahi ki tētahi "tukanga whakataetae" i te wā tata nei. "I tono ahau ki a ia kia hoatu, ā, ka kī ia e kore ia e tono mō tana mahi, ā, ka whakaaro ia mēnā ka whakarerea e ia, kāore rānei. "Kāore au e āhei ki te whakahōu i tana kirimana mō te wā roa - kotahi tau noa iho - ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki tētahi kātipa matua e āhei ana ki te mahi mō te wā e heke mai nei mō Avon me Somerset. " He mahi tino pai te mahi a Hōne Tauranga - kāore e taea e mātou te mahi roa rawa me ia i runga i tētahi kirimana kotahi tau." I kī a ia e hiahia ana ia ki a ia te tino pai mo te wā heke. 'Tino whakahīhī' I roto i tana kōrero, i whakaūngia e Tēnā Tauranga ka haere a ia i te ratonga pirihimana i te 26 o Hānuere 2013 i te mutunga o tana wāhui wā pūmau. "E tino whakahīhī ana ahau ki te ārahi i a Avon me Somerset Constabulary, ā, he nui rawa te mahi ngātahi a ōna tāne me ōna wāhine ki te mana pirihimana," tana kī. "E pouri ana ahau ki te haere, ki te mīharo hoki i ngā karere tautoko maha kua whiwhi ahau i te pō mai i ngā pirihimana me ngā kaimahi, ngā hoa mahi ACPO, ngā hoa me ngā hoa o Avon me Somerset Constabulary. " Ki a rātou katoa, e mihi ana ahau ki a koe." I kī a Tā Hugh Orde, te perehitini o te Association of Chief Police Officers: "Kua ārahi a Hōne Port i ngā Pirihimana o Avon me Somerset i roto i ngā tau e waru kua taha, e whakaiti ana i te hara me te whakapiki i te whakaaro tūmatanui, e ārahi ana i te ope i roto i tētahi wā o te huringa nui me te whakahaere i te maha o ngā kēhi hara kōtaha tiketike. " Ka ngaro nui ōna pūkenga me ōna wheako ki te ratonga." I whakatūria a Tēnā Tauranga hei upoko o ngā Pirihimana o Avon me Somerset i Hānuere 2005 i muri i tana whakawhitinga mai i te Kāhui Pirihimana o Norfolk, i reira a ia te rangatira tuarua o te kātipa. I tīmata tana mahi ki ngā Pirihimana o Greater Manchester i te tau 1974, ā, i mahi hoki ia ki ngā Pirihimana o Warwickshire. I te tau 1994, i mahi a Tēnā Tauranga mō ngā Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao hei kaiwhakarite tūhuratanga ki te Rūnanga Hara o te Ao Whānui mō Tararara o mua. Ko ia hoki te kaiwhakahaere o ngā tūhuratanga mō te Rūnanga Hara o te Ao Whānui mō Rwanda. I waenganui i te tau 1999 me te 2002 i tuaruatia ia ki Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te tūhura i ngā āhuatanga e karapoti ana i te matenga o Rosemary Nelson, te rōia motika tangata i patua e tētahi rōpū taua pūmau i te tau 1999.

title: Āwhā Dennis: He waipuke anō i te wā e haere tonu ana te tūkinotanga o te āwhā
summary: He nui ake ngā waipuke kua pā ki ngā taone i te huarere tino nui i mauria mai e te Āwhā o Dennis.
text: Kua tohutohutia ngā tangata whenua kia waiho o rātau kāinga i ētahi wāhi o Worcestershire i te wā e pakaru ana te Awa o Severn i ōna tahataha. Neke atu i te 200 ngā whakatūpato waipuke puta noa i Ingarangi, Weera, me Pākehā, tae atu ki ngā whakatūpato e iwa taumaha - "mōrearea rānei ki te ora" - ngā whakatūpato mō ngā awa o Lugg, Severn, Wye me Trent. Kua kitea he tinana i muri i te tāhaetanga o tētahi wahine i Worcestershire. I tāhaetia a Yvonne Booth, e 55, ki roto i te waipuke i muri i te maunga o tana motokā i te taha o Tenbury Wells, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Mercia ki te Uru. I kī tōna whānau i roto i tētahi kōrero: "He mema tino aroha a Yvonne o to mātau whānau, ā, kei te whakararuraru katoa mātau i tēnei rongo." I whakaora ngā kaimahi ratonga ohorere i roto i ngā poti i ngā tangata i Hereford i te pikinga o te Awa Wye ki tōna taumata tiketike rawa i runga i te pūkete. I whakaorangia hoki ngā tāngata i Shrewsbury i muri i te pakarutanga o te Awa o Severn i ōna tahataha. I kī te korero kōrero o TE AO o Piripi Mackie, i Upton i Severn, e whakapono ana ka taea te pakaru i ngā parenga i hangaia i muri i ngā waipuke o te tau 2007 i te pō. E rua o ngā whakatūpato taumaha e whitu i Ingarangi i te ahiahi o te Mane mō Uckinghall me Upton upon Severn - i reira i tohutohutia ai ngā tangata kia whakanuku i o rātau kāinga. E rua ngā whakatūpato taumaha i Uēra mō te Awa o Wye i Monmouth - i reira i whakakorea ai ngā kāinga - ā, kāore he whakatūpato tino nui i Pākehā, tae atu ki te 21:00 GMT. I kī atu te Hēkeretari Taiao a George Eustice ki te kāwanatanga "kāore e taea te pare i ia kāinga" me te tiaki i tana urupare ki te āwhā. Kei te whakararurarutia tonutia te haere puta noa i te UK, me ētahi huarahi-A kua katia me ngā raina tereina. I kī te Taiao Taiao, neke atu i te 480 ngā āhuatanga i waipuketia i muri i te āwhā i mauria mai ai te marangai nui me te hau kaha. I kī a John Curtin, te upoko o te waipuke me te whakahaere moana o te Taiao Taiao, i runga i te Twitter ko taua tau "tērā pea ka piki" - engari he iti iho ngā whika i whakaaturia i ērā mō te Āwhā Ciara i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama. Ka tohua ētahi atu marangai taumaha ā muri ake o te wiki. He maha ngā kura kua kati, ā, ka āraia tonutia ngā huarahi e ngā waipuke me ngā whenua whenua. I kite ngā awaawa o South Wales i ngā taumata wai tiketike rawa atu i te 40 tau i te mutunga wiki - he tauine waipuke "kāore anō kia mōhiotia", e ai ki ngā Rauemi Māori o Wales. I kī a Jeanette Cox ko te ahanoa mōrehu anake i te papa o raro o tōna kāinga, te kāinga o Nantgarw, e tata ana ki Kānata, he whakaahua mārena mōna me tana tāne tōmuri. I kī a Mrs Cox, e 68, he "whakamataku" te kite i te wai i raro o te arawhata i ngā haora tōmua o te ata Rātapu. I whakakorea rāua ko tana tamāhine ko Rahera i to rāua kāinga, engari i hoki mai i te Mane ki te aromatawai i te tauine o te tūkinotanga. "Kua nekehia e te wai ngā mea kāore au i whakaaro ka neke. Ki taku whakaaro e rua noa iho ngā kāpata e tū ana - kua ngaro te toenga," te kī a Mrs Cox. Kua whakatūria he pokapū āwhina mō ngā tangata rewa ki te kura tuarua i te taone, i reira neke atu i te 130 ngā āhuatanga i whakakorea i te Rātapu. I mahi ngā tīma urupare ki ngā haora tōmua o te Mane ki te whakaora i ngā tangata i paea i o rātau kāinga mā te poti. Kua whakatūpato te kaunihera o te rohe kia nui ake pea ngā whakawhitinga. I Staffordshire, nā te waipuke nui i karangatia ai tētahi hui tuki āhuarangi taitamariki. Ko te hui ā-motu tuatahi i tīmata i te ahiahi o te Rātapu, me ngā kaitautapa e haere ana mai i te UK. Engari i tohutohu ngā pirihimana kia whakakorea te takahanga i muri i te marangai taumaha i kore ai e taea te haere i ngā huarahi huri noa i te wāhi, te kī a te UK Student Climate Network. I kī a Sophia Coningham, 15, mai i Rāwāhi, tērā tētahi "haehae hākinakina" i roto i a rātau mahi ki te miramira i te huringa āhuarangi e aukatia ana e te huarere whakaharahara o tēnei wiki. I York, i tae te Awa o Ouse ki te 4.41m i runga ake i tōna taumata pūnoa. E hia mano ngā pēke kirikiri kua whakatakotoria huri noa i ngā āhuatanga mōrearea e pātata ana, engari kua kī te Taiao Taiao kei te "pai ake" te āhuatanga o te taone. I kī te Hēkeretari Taiao a Tēnā Eustice mō te £2.5bn kua pau ki te whiu i ngā āhuatanga huarere tino nui mai i te tau 2015, ā, kua tohaina te £4bn mō ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei. I tāpiritia e ia kāore i hiahiatia te whakarite i a Cobra, te komiti ohorere a te kāwanatanga, "i tēnei wā". I tū tētahi hui Cobra i te kitenga o ētahi wāhanga o UK i te waipuke i te whakahaerenga ki te pōti nui o te tau 2019. I kī a Downing Street ka whiwhi te Pirimia o Boris Johnson i "ngā whakahōutanga auau" i runga i te waipuke, e whakaahuatia ana he "wehi". I kī a Luke Pōti, te hēkeretari taiao kōruru, he "tāwai" kāore a Tēnā Hōnea i haere ki ngā hapori pāngia. Kua whakahohea e te kāwanatanga tētahi kaupapa pūtea ohorere mō ngā wāhi e pāngia ana e te waipuke, arā ko ētahi wāhanga o Rātata, o Aotearoa, o Aotearoa, o Shropshire, o Telford me Wrekin, o Te Waipuke me Herefordshire. I raro i te aronui Bellwin, ka taea e ngā mana ā rohe te tono kia whakahokia e te kāwanatanga ngā utu kāore e taea te inihua i runga ake i tētahi paepae, kāore anō kia whakapūtātia. He maha ngā whakatūpato waipuke me ngā matohi i tukuna mō Ingarangi i te Rātapu, e ai ki te Tāne Curtin o te Taiao. I kī a ia "ko ngā āhuatanga whenua waiwai" i mahue i te Āwhā Ciara i te tīmatanga o te marama, i āwhina ki ngā waipuke tino nui i takea mai i te Āwhā o Dennis. I whakapuakina ngā mahi nunui i te tonga o Uēra me ētahi wāhi o Ingarangi, i te mea i whiua ētahi wāhanga o UK e ngā hau neke atu i te 90mph. Neke atu i te kotahi marama te wāriu o te marangai i taka i roto i te 48 haora i ngā wāhi. I whakakorea ngā rerenga me ngā ratonga tereina, ā, ka katia ngā huarahi, i te wā i whakatūria ngā pūtahi ohorere mō te hunga i wehe i o rātau kāinga. Mō ētahi atu mōhiohio, tirohia te paetukutuku BBC Weather me tō teihana Reo Irirangi Paetata mō ngā whakahōutanga auau. Kua pāngia koe e te Āwhā o Dennis? Whakapā mai mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: Papā o Ukraine: Ka whakawhānuitia e te US me te EU ngā whakaaetanga ki Rūhia
summary: Kua pānuitia e te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Perehitini o Amerika, he mana hou o te ohaoha ki Rūhia.
text: Kei roto i a rātou te whakakore i ngā tāngata i roto i a Mātau kia kaua e pēke me ngā pēke Rūhia e toru. I mua rā ka whakawhānuitia e te EU ōna whakaaetanga, e hāngai ana ki te wāhanga hinu, ngā taputapu waea me ngā hangarau tairongo. Engari ko te manakē o Ahitereiria ko te uru ki te wāhi hinga o te rere MH17 i te rāwhiti o Ukraine. Kāore e taea e ngā tohunga o te ao whānui te tae atu ki te pae nā te whawhai taumaha i waenganui i te ope taua o Ukraine me te hunga whakakeke pro-Rūhia. Ko te nui o te utu o Rūhia kua nui ake te pēhanga ki te whakamutu i tana tautoko i te hunga whakakeke, e whakapono ana ngā kāwanatanga ki te Uru i muri i te hinganga o te waka rererangi o Malaysia Airlines i mate ai e 298 ngā tāngata i te rāwhiti o Ukraine. Kua whakapaea hoki a Mohihi e te EU me Mātau ki te whakarato i ngā rākau taumaha ki te hunga whakakeke - he whakahau e whakakāhore ana. I kī a Tēnā Tūpāpaku e whakawhānui ana a Mātau i ōna whakaaetanga ki te ūnga i ngā wāhanga matua o te whakahaerenga o Rūhia - te pūngao, ngā ringa me te pūtea. "Ki te haere tonu a Rūhia i tēnei ara o nāianei, ka tipu tonu ngā utu o Rūhia," te kī a Tēnā Taupānga. I kī te Pūtea Moni o Amerika ko ngā pēke e hāngai ana i tēnei hurihanga o ngā whakamanatanga ko VTB, te Pēke o Mohihi, me te Pēke Ahuwhenua o Rūhia (Rosselkhozbank). He nui te utu o ngā whakamanatanga ki Rūhia, ā, e whakapau ana tōna pēke matua i te tekau miriona tāra hei tiaki i te rouble, kua kī atu tētahi mana matua o te tari kāwanatanga ki te HAU. Ko te tātaritanga a Harani Vaidyanathan, Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero, Washington Ehara tēnei ngaru hou o ngā mana o AMERIKA i puta mai i te mīharo nui. Mō ngā wiki tata nei, i whakawehi te US i ētahi atu mahi ki Rūhia. E karanga ana hoki ki te EU kia utaina he whiu mārō. I kī te whakahaeretanga ko ngā mahi kino e karapoti ana i te MH17 me noho hei "waea whakaoho" ki ngā whenua EU e hiahia ana kia mahia tētahi mea hei whāwhā i ngā mahi a ngā kaihīhī e whakahaeretia ana e Rūhia. E tūmanako ana a Perehitini Pakihi ka pēhi ēnei tikanga hou ki a Perehitini Hapa ki te huri i tōna ara, he mea kāore i taea e ngā mana o mua te mahi i tēnei wā. No te pātaitanga a tētahi kaipānui mehemea ko te tīmatanga tēnei o tētahi pakanga mātao hou, ka kī a Tēnā Tūpāpaku ehara i te mea. Ko te pātahitanga o US-Rūhia, i roto i ngā kupu a tētahi mana o Amerika, he "uaua". Tae atu ki ngā whakahēnga, he mahi tahi - kei te mahi tahi nga iwi e rua ki te tutei karihi o Irana, me te whakaiti i te putunga rākau matū a Hiria. E tūmanakohia ana ngā taipitopito katoa o ngā mana EU hōu i te Wenerei, ina tautuhia hoki te EU ki te whakaingoa i ētahi atu mana Rūhia e anga ana ki ngā whakatio rawa me ngā rāhuitanga haere i Uropi. I whakaahuatia e te Tumuaki Tiamana, a Angela Merkel nga tikanga hou rawa he "kore e taea". I kī atu a Tūroro Chizhov, te karere o Rūhia ki te EU, ki te HAU: "E pouri ana ahau nā te mea kei te heke haere te EU i runga i ngā ara e kore e ahu ki hea." I kī a ia e whakapono ana a ia me whai mana a Ukraine mo tana mahi i roto i te papā i te rāwhiti o te whenua. Engari i kī a Te Kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria i te Wenerei e arotahi ana tana kāwanatanga ki te tiki i ngā tūpāpaku o Ahitereiria mai i te pakarutanga o te MH17: "I tēnei wā kāore tā mātou arotahi i runga i ngā whakaaetanga, ko tā mātou arotahi ki te kawe mai i o tātau tūpāpaku ki te kāinga i runga i te tere e taea ana e tātau." E whakapono ana nga kāwanatanga ki te uru i pūhia e nga kaihīhī pro-Rūhia te waka rererangi i te 17 o Hōngongoi me tētahi tawhā Rūhia, e whakapono ana he rere hōia a Ukraine. E whakakāhore ana te hunga whakakeke me Mohihi i tēnā, engari e whakapae ana i te hōia o Ukraine. Ka inoi a Kerry ki Rūhia e Kōrero ana i Washington, ka tohe te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika ko Hoani Kerry ki a Rūhia me te hunga whakakeke kia hoatu he āheitanga katoa ki te pae hinga. "Kāore tonu e taea e rātou te whakarite kua tangohia katoatia ngā toenga o ngā tūpāpaku, ā, he kawenga kāore e taea e tētahi whānau te kawe, ā, he paerewa kāore e whakaaetia mō te whanonga, wā," tana kī. Kei te haere tonu ngā hōia o Ākarana i tētahi whakahāwea e hāngai ana ki te karapoti i te hunga whakakeke i te rohe o Donetsk. I roto i ngā whanaketanga hou rawa: Kāore ngā kaiārahi o Uropi i pīrangi ki te neke ki ngā mana o te ohaoha, engari e rua ngā whakaaro i nekehia: ko te whakapouri i te āhua o te āraitanga o ngā kaihoko kia kaua e uru ki te wāhi hinga o te waka rererangi i hinga, ā, tērā, ko te mea ko Rūhia, mai i te takanga,  kua whakaaetia ngā rākau taumaha puta noa i te rohe ki Ukraine. Ko te tatauranga i Uropi, me mahi mō tōna ake whakawhirinakitanga, ā, tērā pea me haere kē atu ki te whakarite kia mārama ai a Perehitini Tūroro me tōna porohita ā-roto e whai hua ana a rātau mahi. Ka pēhea te urupare a Rūhia? He uaua ki te kōrero, ahakoa i kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rūhia e kore a Rūhia e whakautu, e "taka rānei ki roto i te wairangi". Papā o Ukraine: Ka kōpeketia e EU a Rūhia i tērā mutunga wiki, ka whakaekea e te EU ētahi atu tangata Rūhia e 15 me ngā mea e 18 ki ngā whakatio rawa me ngā rāhuitanga visa mō tō rātou whakauru ki te papā o Ukraine. Kei roto i te rārangi o ngā ūnga e 87 o ngā mana EU ināianei ko ngā upoko o te Ratonga Haumarutanga a te Haurua (FSB) me te mōhiohio kē, te perehitini o Akinaia, tae atu ki ngā kamupene pūngao e rua o Crimean. Heoi anō, kua whakatūpato te kamupene UK BP, e tata ana ki te 20% o te matua hinu o te kāwanatanga o Rūhia, o Rosneft, ka "pā kino" pea ētahi atu whakaaetanga ki a Rūhia ki tana mahinga.

title: Ko te hinu tino pai rawa i roto i te tekau tau e whakahaere ana i te mutunga wiki hararei o Amerika
summary: Ka haere ngā atekōkiri o Amerika ki ngā huarahi i tēnei mutunga wiki hararei e hākinakina ana i ngā utu hinu iti rawa mō te tekau tau.
text: I te Paraire, ko te utu toharite o te kārani penehīni US (3.7 rīta) ko te $2.31 (£1.58) - 40 hēneti iti iho i te wā kotahi i tērā tau. Ahakoa kei te tīmata te piki o ngā utu hinu, he poto noa iho te haere ki runga ake i te $50 i te Rāitema, ka noho māmā tonu te hinu. Ko te nuinga o ngā Kaiāwhina e 38 miriona e tūmanakohia ana kia taraiwa i te mutunga wiki roa o te Rā Whakamaharatanga. Ko te hararei o te Mane e whakaarotia ana ko te tīmatanga kore mana ki te wā raumati. Ko te maha o ngā atekōkiri i runga i te huarahi e tūmanakohia ana kia teitei rawa mai i te tau 2005. I kitea e tētahi uiuinga a te American Automobile Association (AAA) e 55% o ngā atekōkiri i kī he nui ake te haere nā te iti o ngā utu hinu. "Kua hoki tika mai te haerenga huarahi nui o Amerika ki te iti o ngā utu korohū, ā, e hia miriona ngā tāngata mai i te takutai ki te takutai kua rite ki te tīmata i te raumati me tētahi haerenga o te Rā Whakamaharatanga," te kī a te rangatira nui o AAA, a Marshall Doney. I te Paraire, ko te utu o te hinu o Te Uru o Te Uru - ko te tohu hinu o Amerika - ko te $49.24 i te oko. Kua piki ake te utu hinu i te marama kua hipa i te mea kua tapahia e ētahi kaiwhakarato o te ao whānui ā rātou huaputa, ā, kua whakahaua rangitahitia ngā kaiwhakarato Kānata ki te whakatū i te whakanaotanga nā te ahi. Nā tēnei i whakawātea te whakanao hinu hou mai i Irana e tūtuki ana ki te mākete o te ao whānui. Kua hinga te whakanaotanga hinu o Amerika, ā, kua kite ētahi o ngā pūkenga hinu i Te Raki o Dakota me Te Raki i te whakapeka koi i roto i o rātau rangatiratanga paetata. Kua hinga te maha o ngā pūkaha hinu o Amerika i te 80% i roto i ngā tau e rua kua taha. Puta noa i te US, kei Mississippi ngā utu korohū iti rawa i te $2.08 i te kārani, ā, kāore i tino teitei ake a Tekihi me South Carolina. Kei California te utu teitei rawa mō te penehīni i te US i te $2.80, engari ahakoa ko taua whika he $1 iti iho i te tau i mua. Ka haere ngā atekōkiri matua o Amerika i te toharite o te 50 maire (80km) mai i ō rātou kāinga. I kitea e te rangahau AAA ko Orlando, Florida, me Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, tae atu ki Washington DC te ūnga matua mō ngā kaihaere i te mutunga wiki roa. Kua piki ake te maha o ngā atekōkiri o Amerika i te pai ake o te āhua o te whakahaerenga. He tokomaha ngā Kaiāwhina kua titiro ki ngā utu hinu iti, tae atu ki te hinganga o te kore mahi, te pikinga pōturi o ngā utu me te uru ngāwari ki te nama hei take ki te hoko motokā. I tērā tau, tata ki te 17.5 miriona ngā waka i hokona i te US.

title: I kitea ngā mētara pakanga i Bolton i te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga
summary: E rima ngā mētara mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao i kitea i tētahi teihana pahi i Bolton i te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga.
text: I kitea nga mētara e tētahi mema o te iwi whānui i te teihana pahi o Trinity Street i te 11 o Whiringa ā Rangi. E toru ngā whakaahua i kitea me ngā mētara, ko tētahi o ēnei no te tahitahi maina. E hiahia ana ngā pirihimana ki te whakakotahi anō i a rātau ki tō rātou rangatira, ā, e tono ana ki te tangata e whakaaro ana kua ngaro pea i a rātou kia whakapā atu. I kī tētahi kaikōrero e whā o ngā mētara i "whakatūria te kōti" i roto i te haupae, ā, ko te tuarima ko ia anake. I kī a Det Con Paul Gore mai i te teihana pirihimana o Scholey Street e whakamanamana ana nga pirihimana ki te tangata nāna rātau i tuku atu. Ka kī a ia: "Tērā pea kua ngaro ēnei mētara i muri i te haerenga ki tētahi ratonga whakamaharatanga rānei i te Rātapu, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau kei te whakararuraru rātau i te āhua o te ngaro i ēnei taonga tino uara. " E toru hoki ngā whakaahua i kitea me ngā mētara, ko tētahi o ēnei kua tukuna e mātou, he whakaahua o te tahipahū. "Kei te rokiroki haumaru ngā mētara me ngā whakaahua i te teihana pirihimana o Scholey Street, ā, ka inoi mātou ki te rangatira o ngā mētara, ki tētahi tangata rānei e whai mōhiohio ana mō wai rātou, kia whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana." I tū ngā whakatūtū puta noa i Greater Manchester i tērā Rātapu. I Bolton, i tū he whakatūtū i te 11:15 GMT i muri mai i te ratonga hāhi me te whakatakoto kupenga i te whakamaharatanga o te pakanga.

title: Ka whakakāhore te tari o Taraiwa i te pūrongo tūranga whakahau a Te Rūnanga
summary: Ko ngā huatau e whakatū ana a Taraiwa i a ia ki te tākaro i tētahi tūranga ki te whakaahua i a Pakihi, he "tino hē", kua kī tana kaikōrero.
text: I whakakāhore hoki a ia i tētahi pūrongo i whakaarotia e te pirimia o Labour o Mua ko Ēnā Me he "tino māmā" me Jeremy Corbyn hei "nutter". Kua pānuitia e Tēnā Kōkā kei te hau a ia i ētahi o ana umanga, e ahu ana ki te taurangi mo tōna wā heke. Kua tūtohutia hoki e ia kia tuwhera tonu "ngā kōwhiringa" i runga i a Pakihi. I toa a Tēnā Kōkā, i toa i ngā pōti nui e toru, ā, i Downing mai i te tau 1997 ki te 2007, i whakahau kia noho tonu te UK ki te Uniana o Ūropi i te whakahaerenga ki te taupānga o Pipiri. Kua whakaahuatia e ia te whakataunga kia wehe atu i te EU - mā te 51.9% ki te 48.1% - hei "pākihi". I ngā kōrero a Osborne i te wā o Mahuru, ka pānuitia e Tēnā Kōkā e kati ana ia i tana umanga rorohiko me te umanga tohutohu, a Toni Kōkā Associates, me ngā kamupene pāhono o Windrush me Firerush, ā, i hiahia ki te whakapau i te nuinga o tōna wā ki ngā mahi kore hua. A, i tērā marama, ka kī a ia e whakaaro ana mēnā he "tūranga" tōna ā muri ake i roto i ngā tōrangapū o UK. I roto i tētahi pūrongo o te Rātapu Times, i whakahuatia tētahi pūtake e kī ana kua whakahē te pirimia o mua i te Tāne Kōpia o Labour rāua ko Mīhana Me. I pūrongotia hoki he "maha ngā kōrerorero" ki te Tumuaki o Mua o George Osborne "mō te āhua o te āhua tōrangapū o te Pākehā". I tāpiritia e te Sunday Times e titiro ana a Tēnā Kōkā ki ngā pae tari tūpono i Westminster. I pātaitia mō te pūrongo, ka kī te tari o Tēnā Kōkā: "Kua pānuitia kētia e Taraiwa kei te mauria mai e ia ngā kaimahi katoa ki raro i te tuanui kotahi. Nā reira, āe, ka huihui katoa ngā kaimahi o Rāwāhi ki te tauwāhi kotahi. Heoi anō, kāore i Westminster. "Ka kore te rōpū hou e whai hua, e ai ki tā mātou i pānui ai, ā, kua katia te taha arumoni. Ka hoatu ngā rawa o te umanga ki te rōpū hou kāore i te whai hua." I kī te kaikōrero a Tēnā Kōkā ka haere tonu a ia ki te tuhi tuhipānui me te hoatu i ētahi uiuinga i te wā o te tukanga o Te Pakihi, engari i kī kāore a ia i te rapu i tētahi tūnga tika. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore anō a Tēnā Kōkā kia whai kōrero 'auau' ki a Hōri Osborne e pā ana ki a Pakihi, ahakoa kua kōrerorerotia e ia ki a ia me tana mahi ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata. " E kōrerorero ana a ia ki te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, me te āwhina ki ngā minita kāwanatanga nā te mea kei te tino hohe tonu a ia i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui me Āwherika me ana mahi kore hua. Kāore anō a ia kia kōrerorero ki ngā minita kāwanatanga." Ka "pānuitia e Tēnā Kōkā tētahi pānui tika i ēnei mea katoa i te Tau Hōu", ka tāpiri mai a ia.

title: E whitu nga arewhana i patua e te tereina taonga
summary: E whitu nga arewhana i patua i muri i te patua e tētahi tereina taonga tere i Īnia i a rātau e ngana ana ki te whakaora i ngā tamariki tokorua i runga i te ara.
text: I kī nga kaiwhakahaere i te Uru o Māpia e rima i mate inamata tonu, a, tokorua ētahi atu i muri iho ka tukua ki o rātau mate. I whara tētahi atu arewhana, engari i ora. I mau nga arewhana pēpi i runga i te ara i Moraghat Tea Garden, tata ki Binnaguri i te takiwā o Āpaipaiguri. Ka kopikopiko ētahi atu ki te raina ki te whakawātea i a rātau. He maha nga haora i muri i te tūtukitanga, ka katia te ara, e tūhono ana i a Āpaipaiguri Hou ki Assam, i te mea e tiaki ana ētahi atu arewhana i nga kararehe tūpāpaku, i whara hoki. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o te ngahere 'aituā auau' e rite tonu ana te tuki o ngā tereina tere ki ngā arewhana i taua rohe i te wā e whakawhiti ana te ara e mōhiotia ana e ngā arewhana, e ai ki te Times of India. E kī ana rātau kua tonoa e rātau ki ngā kaiwhakahaere rerewhenua kia whakahekea te tepe tere i taua rohe kia kore ai e puta aua mahi. E toru marama ki muri, ka mate tētahi arewhana i tētahi aituā ōrite. Mai i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, e 118 nga arewhana i patua e nga tereina i Īnia, e ai ki te Wildlife Trust of India.

title: Tokorua i mate i te piriti Wīwī e tiango ana i te taha o Toulouse
summary: I mate tētahi kōtiro 15 tau me tētahi atekōkiri taraka i te horonga o tētahi piriti whakatārewa i te tonga-uru o Wīwī.
text: E rua ngā waka i taka ki te Awa o Tarn ki te raki o Toulouse i te takanga o te piriti tata ki te kāinga o Mirepoix-sur-Tarn i te 08:00 (07:00 GMT). Tokorima hoki ngā tāngata i tino whara, tae atu ki ngā kaiwhakaora tokorua me ngā tāngata paetata i whakamātau ki te tiaki i ngā tūpāpaku. Kua whakatuwheratia he tūhuratanga. Kua roa te āwangawanga ki te āhua o nga arawhata o te whenua. I te haere te kōtiro i roto i tētahi motokā me tōna whaea i te horonga o te piriti, e ai ki nga mana ā rohe. I tōia tōna whaea i te wai e ngā kaimātakitaki, ka kī te rōia tūmatanui o Toulouse, engari i mate a ia anō. I taka hoki tētahi taraka ki te awa, ā, i kitea te tinana o tōna atekōkiri i te wā o te mahi o te rā, e pā ana ki ngā hepaoro me ngā kaimahi ratonga ohorere. Ko ngā pūrongo tuatahi kua hē hoki tētahi waka tuatoru - he vani - ki roto i te wai ināianei. Kua kī atu ngā kaiwhakaatu ki a Pirihi Bockman o TE AO i Toka, he iti iho i te meneti i mua i te horonga o te hanganga. He pēhea te haumaru o te piriti? Kua huatau mai a Erika Oget, te rangatira o Mirepoix-sur-Tarn, i ngā whakatūpato mō te rāhuitanga taumaha o te piriti - e whakaaturia ana i ia taha o te whakawhitinga - tērā pea i waihotia e ngā atekōkiri. "I ētahi wā kua kite tonu ahau i ngā waka tino taumaha e whakamahi ana i te piriti," te kī a Tēnā Oget ki te HAU. "I ngā wā katoa e mataara ana mātou ki te mahi i ngā taki ki ngā pirihimana o te rohe, ki te aukati i a rātou ina kite mātou, engari i ētahi wā kāore mātou e kite i a rātou." Ko te piriti - 155m (170 yards) te roa, tata ki te 7m te whānui - e hoki ana ki te tau 1931, ā, i whakaahuatia e Tēnā Oget hei "wāhi whakawhiti tino hira" i te rohe. I whakahoutia i te tau 2003 e te kaunihera o Haute-Garonne, ā, i tirohia whakamutunga i tērā tau, kāore he raruraru hanganga. E 25,000 ngā arawhata huri noa i Wīwī e hiahia ana ki te mahi tapi kōhukihuki, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo a te Senate mai i Pipiri. I kī atu a Senator Herve Maure, nāna i whakahaere te arotaupū, ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE Mane: "He tino mōrearea te āhua o a mātau arawhata. Mēnā ka tiango tētahi piriti kāore i te whakarārangitia hei mōrearea, he aha te āhuatanga o aua arawhata i kitea he mōrearea?"

title: E whakahau ana a Romania ki te patu i ngā kurī taka noa i muri i te matenga o te tama
summary: E hia rau ngā Romaniana kua whakaatu ki te tautoko i tētahi kaupapa ki te patu i ngā kurī taka noa i te pūmatua i muri i te matenga o tētahi taitama e whā tau.
text: E kī ana te Koromatua o Bucharest, a Sorin Oprescu, ka tū he taupānga i te 6 o Whiringa ā-rangi, e pātai ana ki ngā tangata whenua mehemea e whakaae ana rātau ki te "euthanasia" mō ngā kurī taka noa. I tū he huihuinga nga kaitautoko o te mehua i te pokapū o te taone i te Rātapu. I whakaekea e tētahi pōkai kurī te tama e tata ana ki tētahi pāka i te wiki ki mua. Tata ki te 65,000 ngā kurī taka noa o te taone. E whakahau ana ngā kaiwhakangahau i roto i te rōpū motika kararehe 4Pfoten (Whā Paws) i ngā mana kia whāngai i te sterilisation maha o ngā kurī hei rongoā, kaua ko te whakakore. I kī atu te kaiwhakahaere whakahau a te rōpū, a Gabriel Paun ki te AO e whakararuraru ana a 4Pfoten i ngā kurī taka noa i Huria, engari e hiahiatia ana he mahi nui ake i te motu kia pā ai ki te iwi whānui kurī. "I ngā tau tata nei kua whiua katoatia e mātau e 100,000 ngā kurī i Ruānia, e 10,600 o rātou i Huria, engari kāore i te nui, he kaupapa tūmataiti tēnei - e hiahia ana mātou kia mahi rātou i taua mea anō i te taumata ā-motu," tana kī. "Ehara tēnei i te raruraru paetata, he ā-motu - ahakoa kei te wātea a Bucharest i ngā takawaenga, kāore he taitapa whakahaere o ngā kurī - ka hoki mai rātou." E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere oranga kararehe tata ki te 1,100 ngā tāngata i ngaua e ngā kurī taka noa i Bucharest i ngā marama tuatahi e whā o tēnei tau. Kua karangatia e Perehitini Traian Basescu ki te kāwanatanga kia whakamana i tētahi ture mo te euthanasia mō ngā takawaenga, e kī ana "kei runga ake te tangata i ngā kurī". E kī ana ngā pāruru kōpikopiko o te paetukutuku rongokōrero o Balkan Insight i raro i te ture o nāianei, me mau ngā kurī taka noa ki ngā pāruru kurī tīariari, e noho ai mō te 14 rā, i taua wā ka taea te whāngai. Engari ko te raruraru, he maha ngā kurī kāore i whāngaia i roto i taua wā, ā, kua kōpikopiko ngā whare kurī. I haere te kuia o te tamaiti iti i mate ki te whakaaturanga o te Rātapu. Ka kī a Aurica Anghel: "E tūmanako ana ahau ki tētahi huringa mō te pai ake - kāore au e hiahia ki te kite i ngā kurī i te tiriti ināianei." I kī tētahi atu kaiwhakatūtū, i roto i ōna pōkai kurī e tīpokapoka ana i nga tiriti i muri i te pouri, ka tāpiri: "E wehi ana ahau ki te haere ki waho." I kī a Tēnā Paun ināianei kei te whakauru a 4Pfoten i ngā MP Romaniana ki te ārai i te patunga maha e haere ana ki mua. I kī a ia i tētahi ture hukihuki - i raro i te matapakinga mō ngā tau - i whakaarohia te whakakorenga maha, engari ināianei e wehi ana a 4Pfoten ka whakatikaina pea hei whakamana i tētahi kurī taka noa. "We've just got a letter saying we have to leave tomorrow morning, so they're stopping us doing it [castration]," he said, but added: "We won't leave, because we have a contract to catch dogs, castrate them and take them to the shelter for adoption." I kī a ia e hiahiatia ana e te raruraru he rongoā i te pūtake - me whakapai ake te ahurea o te rangatiratanga kararehe. E hiahiatia ana he whiu uaua mō te hunga i whakarere i ngā kurī, ā, me whakauru e nga mana te whakatakotoranga kurī kia taea ai te whakataki i ngā rangatira, tae atu ki ngā uruwhenua mōkai, ka kī a ia. I amuamu hoki a ia he māminga te whakamahinga o te kupu "euthanasia", nā te mea ko te kaupapa kia moe ngā kurī hauora, ehara i te mea ko te hunga māuiui anake, te whakatuki, te pakeke rawa rānei. "I mahia e mātau tā mātou ake poipoi, ā, ki te hurihia e koe te kupu ki te 'patu', kāore he tangata e hiahia ana ki tēnā," tana kī.

title: Stormy Daniels: Ka whiwhi te rōia o te puku i te raupapa tautāwhi
summary: I whiwhi te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump i tētahi raupapa ārai ki tētahi kaiwhakaari kiriata pakeke hei ārai i a ia ki te kōrero tūmatanui mō tā rātou take whakapae, e whakaatu ana ngā tuhinga ā-ture.
text: I whiwhi te rōia whaiaro o Tēnā Puhi i te whakahau ki a Stormy Daniels i roto i ngā takahanga whakawhitiwhiti tūmataiti i tērā marama. Ka āraia ia kia kaua e tiritiri i "ngā mōhiohio muna" mō tō rāua pātahitanga whakapae, te pūrongo pāpāho o Amerika. E kī ana a Tēnā Trump he hē katoa ngā whakaaro ki a ia. I kī atu te hēkeretari pēhi o te Whare Mā, a Sarah Huckabee, ki ngā kaipānui i te Wenerei kua toa te perehitini i ngā takahanga whakawhitiwhiti ki te kaiwhakaari, ko tōna ingoa tūturu ko Stephanie Clifford. "Kua toa kētia tēnei kēhi i roto i te whakawāteatanga, ā, ko tētahi mea i tua atu i tērā, ka tohutoro atu ahau i a koe ki te tohutohu o waho o te perehitini," tana kī. Engari i kī atu te rōia e tohu ana i a Ms Clifford ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero i "pōhēhētia" a ia i te kōrero a te Whare Mā. "Kia tū ake te kaikawe kōrero o te Whare Mā me te kī kua toa a Trump i te kēhi i roto i te whakawāteatanga," te kī a Michael Avenatti. "Me pēhea koe e toa ai i tētahi mea kāore anō kia pōhiritia tērā taha?" tana kī. I īmēra atu te rōia o Tēnā Puhi, a Mikaera, i te raupapa tautāwhi ki te tīma ture a Ms Clifford i te 28 o Hui tanguru, e ai ki te Rongokōrero o NBC. "Me noho muna tonu te tuhinga, ā, kaua e whakaaturia ki tētahi tangata e ai ki ngā ture o te whakahau a te tiati," te kī a te īmēra. Kua puta mai ngā taipitopito o te raupapa tautāwhi i te rā i muri i te tāpaetanga a Ms Clifford i tētahi whakawā ki a Tēnā Puhi, e kiia ana he muhu tētahi kirimana kāore i hainatia e ia. I kī a ia ko te whakaaetanga, i tāruatia i mua i te pōtitanga 2016, he "kore" nā te mea kāore anō ia kia hainatia. E kī ana te kōti ā iwi, i kōnaetia i Los Angeles i te Tūtira, i ngā rā anake i mua i te pōtitanga, i hainatia e Ms Clifford rāua ko Tēnā Kōrero tētahi "whakaaetanga whakangū" engari kāore a Tēnā Puhi, "nā reira ka kore ā-ture, ā, kāore he hua". E pā ana hoki ki te "haere tonu o te whakawāteatanga" o tērā marama i whiwhi ai te raupapa tautāwhi e Tēnā Pirihi. Ko te whakahau, i tukuna i te 27 o Hui tanguru, ka āraia a Ms Clifford kia kaua e tiritiri i ētahi mōhiohio e pā ana ki te whakaaetanga kāore i te whakawātea. I whakaūngia e Tēnā Kōrero i tērā marama kua utua tūmataititia e ia a Ms Clifford $130,000 (£95,000) engari kāore i kōrero he aha mōna. I kī a ia kāore te Whakahaere o te Puhi, te whakahau rānei a te Pāpāho i te rōpū ki tēnei tauwhitinga.

title: TT hei utu i te US $500m mō te hoko hē
summary: Kua whakaae te Royal Bank of Scotland ki tētahi whakataunga $500m (£359.7m) ki te Kāwanatanga o New York mō te hoko hē o ngā hua pūtea i mua i te raruraru pūtea o te ao whānui o te tau 2008.
text: Ko TĀPI te pēke tuaono hei whakatau ki te kāwanatanga i runga i ngā kerēme ōrite, e honoa ana ki ngā mōkete mōrearea. The agreement will see the bank pay $400m in relief to homeowners, as well as $100m to the state. Kei te anga tonu a TT ki tētahi whaina nui rawa mai i te Tari Ture o Amerika. I kī te pēke i tērā marama kua waiho e ia te £3.2bn ($4.4bn) hei taupoki i ngā kāinga e tū mai ana ki a Mātau me ētahi atu. 'Hipanga hira' Na te hokonga o ngā pūtea mōkete mōrearea i āwhina ki te tūtukitanga utu whare i te wā o te raruraru pūtea, ka kī te tari rōia o New York. "Ahakoa kei muri pea i a mātau te raruraru pūtea, kei te rongo tonu ngā tāngata o Niu Ioka i ngā pānga o te tūtukitanga whare," te kī a te rōia o te kāwanatanga, a Erika Schneiderman. "Ko te whakatau o tēnei rā tētahi atu hipanga hira i roto i tā mātou mahi whānui ki te āwhina i ngā tāngata o New York ki te hanga anō i ō rātou oranga me ō rātou hapori." Ko te nuinga o te kāwanatanga o UK te nuinga o te kāwanatanga. E ngana ana ki te hoki ki te hauora pūtea mai i te raruraru pūtea, i te wā i tārewa ai mō te tekau miriona pauna. I kī te pēke i tērā marama kua hoki mai ki te hua mo te wā tuatahi i roto i te tekau tau.

title: Coronavirus: He moata rawa mō ngā mahere haere Kirihimete, e kī ana ngā whenua o Ūropi
summary: He maha nga whenua Pakeha kua whakatupato he moata rawa ki te whakarite mo te haerenga Kirihimete, i te mea kei te piki haere tonu nga keehi coronavirus puta noa i te whenua.
text: I Huitene, kua kīia ngā tāngata kia takatū mō ngā rāhuitanga haere pea i te wā hararei. I tēnei wā, i kī ngā mana o Kīriria me Wīwī he wawe rawa ki te kī mehemea ka taea e te tangata te whakarite haere. E ono wiki tae noa ki te wā whakahari, kei te kaha ngā raka me ētahi atu tikanga i ngā whenua maha. Kua tino whakawhānuitia e Potukara te maha o nga wāhi e herea ana e te hōta pō. Mai i te Mane, e toru hauwhā o te whenua ka noho i raro i nga rāhuitanga tino uaua a te kāwanatanga. I kī atu te tahumaero matua o Huitene a Anders Tegnell ki ngā tangata whenua kia whakarite mō te haere whāiti i waenga i ngā wāhi rerekē i te wā o te Kirihimete kia kore ai ngā ratonga rongoā ā-rohe e āwangawanga. Tērā pea ka mahia he whakataunga tauwhāiti i roto i te wiki, e rua rānei, ka kī a ia, me whakarite ngā Huitene kia rerekē tonu ngā mea "i mua tonu i te Kirihimete". I kii ano a Mr Tegnell "ko te nuinga nui" o nga keehi Covid-19 hou i tenei wa e haere mai ana i nga roopu tūmataiti. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana a ia ki te whakakore i te mahi waipiro i roto i ngā pāparapara me ngā pae i muri i te 22:00, nā te tīmatanga o tērā mutunga wiki, e kore e piki ake i ngā huihuinga pāpori tūmataiti. I te Tāite, ka pānuitia e ngā mana e 40 ngā mate hou, te tawhiti teitei rawa o ia rā o te whenua mo te rima marama. I tēnei wā, ka kī te Pirimia tuarua o Airana, a Leo Varadkar, kāore anō a ia kia tohutohu i ngā tangata whenua o Kīriria e noho ana ki rāwāhi ki te tāpui rerenga ki te kāinga, kātahi anō ka "wawe rawa" ki te hoatu tohutohu pērā. He rite tonu te whakaaro i tiria e te Pirimia o Wīwī, a Jean Castex, nāna i kī he "moata rawa" ki te kī mēnā ka taea e ngā tangata whenua te hoko tīkiti tereina ki te haere i te Kirihimete. I tāpiritia e ia kāore he whakaiti i ngā rāhuitanga raka mō te rua wiki neke atu rānei. "He kore noa iho te whakangāwari i te raka ināianei," tana kī atu ki tētahi hui rongokōrero, "he ngoikore nga whiwhinga." I raro i ngā rāhuitanga raka, ka taea anake e ngā tāngata i Wīwī te wehe i ō rātou kāinga ki te haere ki te mahi mēnā kāore e taea e rātou te mahi mai i te kāinga, ki te hoko taonga nui, ki te rapu āwhina rongoā, ki te mahi rānei mō te kotahi haora i ia rā. Kua katia ngā toa kāore i te tino nui, ngā wharekai me ngā pae, engari kei te tuwhera tonu ngā kura me ngā pārekareka. I tāpiritia e Mr Castex ka whakaaetia pea ētahi toa kia whakatuwhera anō mai i te 1 o Hakihea, i runga anō i ngā tau kēhi. Engari i kī a ia me kati tonu ngā pae me ngā wharekai. Kei te kākari a Wīwī ki te pikinga nui o ngā kēhi, neke atu i te 1.9 miriona ngā mate kua whakaūngia, e ai ki te tatau a te Whare Wānanga o Johns Hopkins. I te Rāitema, i pānuitia e nga mana hauora Wīwī he 32,638 ngā hōhipera - tata ki te 350 teitei ake i te taumata i tae ki Aperira. Engari ko te maha o ia rā o ngā mate hou neke atu i te 2,500 i raro iho i te Wenerei, ā, ko te toharite nekehanga e whitu rā o Wīwī i heke iho mo te rima o nga rā i roto i te haupae. I Itari, ko te nuinga o te whenua kei te raka, engari he karanga mō ngā tikanga pākaha ake i te nui haere o te maha o ngā mate. E 636 anō ngā mate i pūrongotia i te Tāite. I kī te Minita o te Take ā-Rohe o Francesco Boccia me whakanui anake te tangata i te Kirihimete me ngā mema o te whānau tata. I te UK, i tū ngā kōrero mō ngā iwi e whā e whakatata tahi ana ki ngā ture Covid i te Kirihimete.

title: Coronavirus: Ko nga hapa nui e aroturuki ana i nga kaihaereere taitapa o Airani
summary: He reta māturu mai i te Minita Hauora a Robin Swann ki tōna hoa i te Republic of Ireland kua whakaatu i ngā hē nui i te āhua o te aroturuki i ngā manuhiri mai i ngā whenua mōrearea o Covid-19 i muri i te whakawhiti i te rohe.
text: Nā Enda McClaffertyBBC News NI Political Correspondent E tohu ana i "ngā whakararurarutanga nui ina tae mai ki te whakaū, ki te aroturuki rānei" i te hunga e hiahiatia ana kia taratahi i a ia anō. I kī a Tēnā Swann "kāore ā mātou tikanga ki te aroturuki i a rātou mō ngā taki wāhi" ki te kore rātou e whakaoti i tētahi puka kaikite. I karangatia e ia he "rongoā tere". I kī hoki te minita hauora e hiahiatia ana te mahi ngātahi tata atu i waenganui i ngā kāwanatanga e rua, tērā pea ka pā ki ngā "whakaaetanga ture me ngā whakaaetanga tiritiri raraunga" hōu. "E whakapono ana ahau he whakatutukitanga nui tēnei, e whakaatu ana i to mātau whāinga ki te mahi tahi kia pai ai te whakatau i ngā uauatanga noa iho," ko te tuhituhi a Tēnā Swann. I te Paraire, ka kī te Tari Hauora o te Whenua o Airani: "Kei te mahia tonutia te aroturuki hoapā i runga i te motu katoa, me ngā mōhiohio i tiria ki te raki me te tonga, pērā i te tīmatanga o tēnei ohorere hauora tūmatanui." Kāore he mate hou e pā ana ki te coronavirus i tuhia ki ia taha o te rohe i te Paraire. Heoi, 15 nga keehi hou i whakapumautia i Airangi ki te Raki i te 20 nga keehi hou i whakapumautia i te Republic of Ireland. Ko te mate o te Republic of Ireland e tū ana i te 1,763. Ko te mate whaimana i tuhia e te Tari Hauora o NI, i runga anō i ngā whakamātautau tōrunga, ko te 556, engari ina whakaurua ngā mate katoa i whakahuatia ai a Covid-19 i runga i te tiwhikete mate, ko te tawhiti ko te 850. 'Ngā whakararuraru nui' I raro i ngā whakaritenga o nāianei, me whakaoti e ngā manuhiri ao whānui e tae ana ki te Whenua o Aiarangi i mua i te haerenga ki Aiarangi ki te Raki tētahi puka kairapu i roto i te 48 haora o te whakawhiti i te rohe. Me taratahi hoki rātou mō te 14 rā mēnā ka tae mai i tētahi whenua e tino mōrearea ana. Engari i roto i te reta ki te Minita Hauora o Airana a Stephen Donnelly, ka tuhituhi a Tēnā Swann: "He tino whakararuraru ina whakaū, kia aroturuki rānei i tēnei i tēnei wā." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te whakawhirinaki mātou ki ngā tāngata katoa kua haere ki te Whenua o Airani, kātahi ki Aiarangi ki te Raki e whakaoti ana i tā mātou puka kairapu pāhihi. " Ki te kore rātou e mahi pēnā, kāore he tikanga o te aroturuki i a rātou mō ngā taki wāhi kia tino mōhio ai kei te taratahi rātou." Kātahi ka huatau a Tēnā Swann ko te "rongoā arorau" ko te whakarite kia homai e ngā kaihaere ao whānui katoa e tae ana ki te motu ngā raraunga "e āhei ana mō ngā taki whakatikatika i roto i ā mātou ake mana". I roto hoki i te reta, ka tohe a Tēnā Swann ki tōna hoa i Dublin kia kōrero ki a ia "te āheitanga" o ō rātou mana whakahaere ki te hopu me te tiritiri mōhiohio mō ngā kaihaere ao whānui e neke ana puta noa i te rohe. I tukuna te reta i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki. I roto i tana korero i te Paraire, i kii te Tari Hauora o Airani ko nga minita hauora me nga tohunga hauora tūmatanui mai i nga mana e rua "kei te whakapā tata tonu ki te maha o nga take e pa ana ki a Covid". "Hei wāhanga o te mahi a te kāwanatanga i konei ki te whakatū i te whai ake i ngā pāhihi e tae mai ana i rāwāhi, tae atu ki te whakamōhio i tētahi puka kairapu pāhihi hiko, kei te whakaarohia me pēhea te whakarei ake i te mahi tahi ki te raki-tonga e pā ana ki te haere ki rāwāhi, tae atu ki ētahi atu tiritiri mōhiohio," te kī a tētahi kaikōrero. I kī te Minita Tuatahi o NI a Arlene Foster ko te rerekētanga o ngā ture taratahi a NI me ROI he mea me whakatau. 'Kaha ake nga ture taratahi' I tana korero ki a BBC Good Morning Ulster, ka kii ia: "Kei te tae mai nga tangata i runga i nga rerenga o te ao mai i nga waahi o te ao, a, ka tae mai ratou ki te motu o Ireland ka noho pea ratou mo etahi ra i Northern Ireland. " E āwangawanga ana mātou ka tae mai rātou ki Dublin me te haereere, ā, kāore i te mōhio he kaha ake ngā ture taratahi i Aiarangi ki te Raki." I kī a Mrs Foster e whakaaro ana a ia e tika ana kia whakaarahia e te Tari Hauora ngā māharahara. Kua rapu hoki a TE Rongokōrero o NI i tētahi urupare ki ngā māharahara i whakaarahia i roto i te reta mai i te kāwanatanga o Kīriria, engari kāore anō kia whiwhi urupare. Tērā pea he tono nui te mahi whakawhiti-taitapa a Enda McClafferty Ehara i te mea i ia rā ka whiwhi koe i tētahi pāremata uniana e karanga ana kia tata atu te mahi tahi ki te Whenua, engari kei te pana a Kōpa Swann mō tēnā noa iho. E hiahia ana a ia kia nui ake i ngā waea taitapa anake, e hiahia ana ia ki ngā whakaaetanga ture me ngā whakaaetanga tiritiri raraunga hei mono i tētahi āputa. Engari tērā pea he tono nui i roto i tētahi ao e tūpono ana te parenga raraunga i te katoa. Tērā pea he whakamātautau tēnei mō te whakaaturanga mātauranga i waenganui i Dublin me Belfast nā te mea kāore e taea e ngā tīma aroturuki te taki i te hunga e whakaarotia ana he mōrearea tiketike. He mea nui tēnā ina mahara koe i te taenga tuatahi mai o te coronavirus ki tēnei taha o te rohe i te wā o Huitanguru mā te taunga rererangi o Dublin.

title: E pouri ana a Ngārara mo te rārangi tānga o Quantico Hindu
