summary: Kua whakapārewa te kaiwhakaari Initia o Ngārara i muri i te whakapouri i runga i tētahi rārangi tā i runga i tana rangatū pouaka whakaata o Amerika Quantico.
text: I whakaaturia e tētahi wāhanga o mua tata nei o te māngere tūtei te pūāhua matua, i tākarotia e Ms Chopra, e whakakāhore ana i tētahi tā i paoa e ngā Hindu i mua i te tihi o Kahamiri. He tokomaha nga kaihautū Īnia i whakapouri i te pūrākau o te whakaaturanga, a, ka whakaekea ia i runga i te ipurangi. I whakapuakina e Ms Chopra he "Initia whakakake" i roto i tētahi tweet, ā, "tino pouri" i te mamae i takea mai i te whakaaturanga. I te 1 o Hune, ka whakaaturia te pūāhua matua, a Alex Parrish, e tū ana i tētahi whakaekenga whakamataku. Ahakoa i whakaritea e ngā Hūpia i mua i te tihi o Kahamiri, te rohe tautohetohe i ngā Pākehā i kīia e Īnia rāua ko Pakitāne, ka kitea e te pūāhua o Ms Chopra, ko te tikanga ko ngā tāngata hūhū e ngana ana ki te tāpare i ngā Hūhia. E rua nga pakanga i whawhai ai a Pakitāne rāua ko Īnia ki te rohe o Kahamiri mai i te pātaki i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Tērā te weriweri tuihono i muri i te pāohotanga o te wāhanga, ā, ko ētahi e kōrero ana i a Ms Chopra "he muhani ki Īnia" me te wāhanga he whakaekenga ki ngā Hindu. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka whakapārewa a ABC mō te hīkoi ki "tētahi take tōrangapū matatini" me te tiaki i a Ms Chopra i ngā whakaekenga tuihono, e whakamārama ana kāore a ia i tuhi, i whakahaere, i maka rānei i te whakaaturanga, ā, kāore hoki ōna tāurunga ki ngā tānga. Kua anga atu a Ms Chopra ki te riri a nga kaipāngai i mua. I muri i tana mau i tētahi kākahu e whakaatu ana i ōna waewae i roto i tētahi hui ki te Pirimia o Īnia, o Moemoe Modi i tērā tau. A, ko ana haerenga o mua tata nei ki ngā hunga whakaruru o Rohinyga i Pākaratēhi, i riri hoki i runga i te ipurangi. I muri i te tīmatanga o tana mahi i roto i te whare pikitia Īnia, i toa a Ms Chopra i ngā mihi mo tōna angitu o te ao whānui. Neke atu i te 50 ngā whitiāhua i whetū ai a ia i reira i mua i tana neke ki te US. I tua atu i tana mahi pouaka whakaata, i puta mai a ia i roto i te kiriata Baywatch o tērā tau, i tākaro ai ia i te toa. E tatau ana te Ariki o Te Ariki o Te Ariki o Te Wānanga I whakakorea a Quantico i tērā marama i mua i te pāohotanga o te Toto o Te Toto, ā, e waru anake ngā wāhanga e toe ana i tōna rangatū tuatoru me te whakamutunga.

title: Kua mate te tangata me ētahi atu i muri i te takanga o te whanga o Fraserburgh
summary: Kua mate tētahi tangata, ā, tokowhā ētahi atu e whiwhi ana i te rongoā i muri i tētahi mahi i runga i tētahi poti hī ika i te whanga o Fraserburgh.
text: Tata ki te 14:00 i karangatia nga ratonga ohorere i muri i ngā pūrongo o tētahi rōpū tāngata e mate ana i runga i te poti Sunbeam. Kotahi te tangata i kōrerotia kua mate i tētahi wā poto i muri iho. Tokowhā ētahi atu tāngata e rongoatia ana i te hōhipera. Kāore anō kia whakaputaina ngā taipitopito, engari kāore i te whakapono kei roto i tētahi āhuatanga whakamate. 'Tino pouri' Kua whakamōhiotia te Kaiwhakahaere Hauora me te Haumaru (HSE) me te Peka Whakamatau Aituā Moana (MAIB). I kī nga kaitiaki taiwhenua i tonoa rātau ki te āwhina i te waka tūroro me nga kaimahi ahi. I kī a Insp Nick Thom, o Pirihimana Pākehā: "Kei te whānau o tēnei tangata o mātau whakaaro i tēnei wā tino pouri." I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero MAIB: "Kei te tukuna e te Peka Tūhura Aituā Moana ngā kaitirotiro ki Fraserburgh i muri i tētahi mahi i tēnei ahiahi e pā ana ki tētahi oko hī ika."

title: Rārangi Hākari Latitude: Ko Te Wānanga me ngā Tuakana Matū ki te upoko matua
summary: Ko Liam Gallagher, Haim me ngā Chemical Brothers te upoko o Latitude Festival i te tau 2020.
text: Ka mahi hoki a Michael Kiwanuka, Keane, Charli XCX me Bill Bailey i te hākari i Suffolk i waenganui i te 16 me te 19 o Hōngongoi. I te tau 2018, i tākaro a Gallagher i tētahi huinga ohorere i Latitude i te tau 2018. Ko te putanga 15 tēnei o te hākari i Henham Park, arā ko te kōhua, te toi, te whiti me te whare tapere me te puoro hoki. Ka tīmata a Haim i te pō Paraire, i a ia e tākaro ana i te hākari i te tau 2014. Ka kī rātau: "Ko Latitude tētahi o ā mātou hākari makau ki te tākaro - ināianei kei te tino hiahia mātou ki te hoki mai ki te panekōrero." Kua tautuhia a Liam Gallagher ki te tākaro i te atamira matua i te Hātarei, ā, ka katia e nga Tuakana Matū te hākari i te Rātapu. Ka mahia e rātau ngā riu mai i tā rātou pukaemi i whakaingoatia e Te Papawhenua, tae atu ki te tīpako mai i tētahi whakarārangi whakamuri e kī ana i ngā waiata kanikani. Ka mahia hoki e te kaiwaiata-kaiwaiata o Ingarangi a Michael Kiwanuka, pērā ki a Keane, nāna i huihui anō i tēnei tau mō te wā tuatahi mai i te tau 2013. "Ko Latitude tētahi o ā mātou hākari tino pai ki te haere atu," te kī a Keane. "Kāore e taea e mātou te tatari kia noho i runga i te pire a tērā raumati." He iti ake te rāhuitanga o QI me Have I Got News for You a Bill Bailey, māna e upoko i te Papa Tākaro Kōrero. "I tērā wā i tākaro ai ahau i Latitude ehara i te kino rawa nā reira kei te tino tūmanako ahau ki te panekōrero i te tau 2020," tana kī. Ka mahi te kaitito a John Cooper Clarke i runga i te atamira, me te uiui hoki mō tana mahi. There will also be a Women's Prize for Fiction panel and Salon London will showcase a selection of authors and academics. I anga atu te hākari ki te whakahē i tērā tau mai i ngā rōpū motika kararehe mo te tikanga "kūare me te nanakia" o te tae māwhero i ōna hipi. Kāore anō kia mōhiotia mēnā ka puta mai anō ngā hipi kanapa.

title: Kātahi anō ka wātea ngā waiata a te KLF ki te roma
summary: I muri i ngā tau ngū, kua tukuatu e te KLF tētahi tīpakonga o ā rātou waiata tino rongonui ki ngā ratonga roma pēnei i Spotify, YouTube me Apple Music.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC pūoro pūoro kāore i te wātea tika te pūoro a te pēne mai i te tau 1992, i te wā i mukua ai e rātau te katoa o tā rātou putumōhio tuarā. Engari e waru ngā waiata, tae atu ki ngā waiata kanikani pēnei i te 3AM Eternal me What Time Is Love, e wātea ana ināianei i runga i tētahi whakahiatotanga e waru ara, Solid State Logik. Nā ngā pānui rererangi i Rāwāhi i huatau ka tukua e te KLF ētahi atu pūoro i tēnei tau. Ka kohia e Solid State Logik ngā taunga nui rawa o te pēne - tae atu ki te ngātahitanga a Tammy Wynette Justified & Ancient, me te tātauira Glitter-sampling Doctorin' The Tardis. E 29 tau i muri i te hurihanga o ngā kaiwhakarewa o Jimmy Cauty rāua ko Bill Drummond i o rāua tuarā ki te pūoro, me tētahi mahinga tautohetohe i ngā Tohu Brit 1992 - i reira rāua i herea ai mō te rōpū tino pai ki a Simply Red. I whakamāramatia e te pūhopa to rātau whakahāwea ki te umanga mā te mahi i te 3AM Eternal i a rātau e whakairi ana i ngā pātea mai i tētahi pū mīhini ki te hunga whakaminenga, i mua i te kōrero a te kaipānui: "Kua mahue i te KLF te umanga pūoro." I te taraiwa i te wāhi ki te kāinga, ka mahue i a rātau he hipi tūpāpaku ki runga i ngā hipanga o tētahi rōpū i muri i te whakaaturanga me tētahi tuhipoka e pānui ana, "I mate ahau mo te hipi hipi". I muri iho ka tahuna e Cauty rāua ko Drummond te £1m o a rāua royalti i roto i ngā paihere tuhipoka £50, i te motu mamao o Pirihitini o Jura. I ngā tekau tau tata nei kua arotahi te pūhopa ki ngā kaupapa pukapuka me ngā kaupapa toi, tae atu ki ngā mahere ki te hanga i tētahi "tara a te iwi", i whakaawetia e te matenga o te tuakana o Cauty, ā, i hangaia mai i te pereki, e 23 grams pungarehu tangata kei ia tangata. Engari kua karanga ngā kaipānui mō ā rātou pūoro - me ngā topenga bootleg o ā rātou ataata me ngā mahinga e eke ana ki te tekau miriona tirohanga i YouTube, me ētahi putanga "oro-ōrite" o ā rātou taunga nui rawa e puta ana i Spotify. I te wā i tukua e ētahi atu puritia roma pēnei i a AC/DC me Neil Young me te whakawātea i ā rātou putumōhio tuarā, ka mau tonu te KLF. I te tau 2018, i whakaingoatia e Billboard to rātau ngaro hei tētahi o ngā āputa tino nui e waru i runga i ngā ratonga roma, i te taha o ngā pūkete a De La Soul me Aaliyah. I pānuitia e te pēne to rātau aranga ohorere i roto i ngā pānui whakaahua e rua i whakapiria i raro i tētahi arawhiti rerewhenua i Shoreditch, i Rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, i te taha o te tuhituhi e tohutoro ana i te KLF. I whakaaturia e te pūkete Instagram o te kōtiro a Cauty tētahi whika e waihanga ana i te graffiti i te Pō o te Tau Hōu. E ai ki tētahi kōrero i te whārangi YouTube o te pēne, ko Solid State Logik (i tapaina ki te tēpu whāranu i whakamahia e te pēne hei waihanga i ā rātou taunga nui rawa) ko te tuatahi o ngā putanga e rima i whakaritea, e kapi ana i ngā putanga katoa o te pēne, i raro i ngā ingoa maha. I pānuitia: "Kua whakaritea e KLF te mahi i mahia i waenganui i te 1 o Hānuere 1987 me te 31 o Hakihea 1991 e The Justified Ancients of Mu Mu, The Timelords [and] The KLF. " Ko tēnei whakawhiwhinga hei kōrero i tētahi pūrākau i roto i ngā upoko e rima mā te whakamahi i te roma. Ko te ingoa o te pūrākau ko Samplecity Thru Transcentral." Ka whakaingoatia e te kuputuhi ētahi kaupapa e whakaritea ana mō te tuku, ko ētahi kāore anō kia rangona i mua, tae atu ki te Kick Out The Jams, te Pure Trance Series, me tētahi rōrahi tuarua o Solid State Logik. "Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te mōhio anō mō ngā mahi i mahia e The Justified Ancients of Mu Mu, The Timelords, The KLF rānei, ka kitea e koe ngā pono, ngā rongo me ngā hāwhe pono e marara ana puta noa i te ipurangi," ka haere tonu te kōrero. "Mai i ēnei pono, ngā rongo me ngā hāwhe pono, ka taea e koe te hanga i ō ake whakaaro. " I horoia ngā take tūturu i tētahi manga āwhā i Brixton i tētahi wā i te mutunga o te rau tau 20." Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka tapahia e Īnia ngā mokatere huamoni mo te toru o nga wā i tēnei tau
summary: Kua tapahia e Īnia ngā mokatere huamoni mo te toru o nga wā i tēnei tau i te ngana ki te whakaora i te tupu i roto i tōna māiatanga pōturi.
text: I whakahekea e te Pēke Rāhui o Īnia (TT) tōna mokatere kī ki te 7.25% mai i te 7.5%. Kua toua te tere o te tupu o Īnia, i waenganui i te whakahekenga o ngā wāhanga matua pēnei i te whakanaotanga, e āki ana i te kāwanatanga kia whakahekea ngā tohu tupu. Ko te hua, kua pēhia te pēke matua ki te mahi i ngā hipanga hei āwhina ki te whakaoho i tētahi ngaru hou o te tupu ohaoha i roto i te rangatiratanga nui rawa o Āhia. Heoi anō, ko te pēke - kua mahia ētahi mehua i ngā marama tata nei - i kī he iti noa iho te wāhi hei whakangāwari anō i ana kaupapahere. E kī ana ka noho tonu te nui o te utu kaihoko hei tuma matua, ā, "kāore e taea te whakaheke i tōna ārai ki te aranga ake o ngā pēhanga utunga moni". "Ko te toenga o ngā mōrea i takea mai i te aromatawai a te Pēke Rāhui o te hihiri o te utunga moni, he iti noa iho te mokowā mō te whakaiti moni anō," te kī a TĀPI i roto i tana tauākī kaupapahere moni. 'Ngā mahi kaupapahere' I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, i whakahekea e Īnia tana tohu tupu ki te 5% mō te tau ki te 31 o Mati 2013, e tāraro ana i ngā whakamātautau e anga ana ki te whakaora i te āhua o te mahi pōturi. Tērā ētahi āwangawanga ka pōturi kē atu tōna tere tipu, kāore i te iti rawa nā te takaware i ngā whakahōu matua, nāna i whara te pūtea penapena kē. I tautohe te pēke matua, ahakoa kua whakahekea ngā mokatere huamoni, me mahi hoki te kāwanatanga i ngā hipanga tika hei āwhina ki te whakapiki i te maia ki te āhua o te whakahaerenga. "Ki te kore ngā mahi kaupapahere hei wetemaukati i ngā herenga whakarato whakamau me te mau mai i ngā whakapainga mau tonu i roto i te hua me te whakataetaetanga, ka whakaiti pea te tupu, ā, ka puta anō ngā uaua o te utunga moni," ka whakatūpato. I kī te kaiwawao i te kōrero a te pēke matua kāore e taea te mahi i ētahi atu hipanga kia mahi rā anō te kāwanatanga. "Kāore e taea e te pēke matua te eke ki tētahi huringa whakaiti whakatuki mēnā kāore rātau i te mōhio kua whakatauria ngā herenga hanganga," te kī a Radhika Rao, te kaitohutohu i te pēke DBS. "Te āhua nei e kore e taea ētahi patunga tapu mā te pōturi ake te tupu."

title: Golden Globes 2019: Olivia Colman, Ben Whishaw me Richard Madden toa
summary: Ko ngā whetū o Ingarangi ko Olivia Colman, Christian Bale, Richard Madden me Ben Whishaw i waenganui i ngā toa i ngā Tohu Golden Globe o tēnei tau.
text: I whakahonoretia a Colman mō te pikitia The Favourite, ā, i toa a Bale mō te tākaro i te Takahanga Perehitini o Amerika o Dick Cheney i Vice. I toa a Madden rāua ko Whishaw i ngā tohu pouaka whakaata mō a rāua mahi i roto i ngā whakaari o TE AO Bodyguard me A Very English Scandal. Ko Bohemian Rhapsody, mō te tangata tuatahi o Kuini, ko Pāremata, i toa i ngā tohu nunui e rua, tae atu ki tētahi mō tōna whetū o Rami Malek. Ko te Golden Globes te hui nui tuatahi o te wā tohu o Karaihe, ā, ka taea te āwhina i tētahi whitiāhua, whetū whitiāhua rānei i roto i te rēhi mo te Oscars. I whakaingoatia a Colman ko te kaiwhakaari tino pai i roto i tētahi pūoro/kōhua mō tana mahi hei Kuini Anne i roto i te Makau, ā, i hoatu e ia tētahi whaikōrero whakaae tino mīharo i whakamutua ki a ia e pupuri ana i tana tohu me te tuku karere ki tōna whānau: "Ed me ngā tamariki - titiro! Āe!" I homai e Karaitiana Bale tētahi o ngā wā tōrangapū o te pō i tana whakamoemiti ki a "Hatana" mō tana mahi i Vice. I tākaro a Bale i a Tiki Keney, he tuakana perehitini mai i te 2001 ki te 2009, ā, e whakapaetia ana e te pikitia mo te maha o ngā mate o te ao. 'Kāore au i kite i tēnei e haere mai ana' Kāore i rite ki ngā Oscars, ka utua e te Golden Globes te pouaka whakaata me te pikitia. I te tīmatanga o tana paraihe mo te kaitapere whakaari pouaka whakaata tino pai, ka kī a Madden: "Kāore au i kite i tēnei e haere mai ana." I tākaro te whetū o Pirihitini i a Haihana David Budd i roto i te Bodyguard o BBC One. Neke atu i te 17 miriona ngā tāngata i mātakitaki i te wāhanga whakamutunga i te UK - nā reira ko te wāhanga tino mātakitaki o tētahi whakaari pouaka whakaata o UK mai i te tīmatanga o ngā pūkete o nāianei i te tau 2002. Kei Netflix te rangatū i waho o te UK. I whakamahia e ia tana whaikōrero hei takoha ki te hoa whetū o Keeley Hawes, "te kaiwhakaari tino pai rawa atu ka taea e au te mahi tahi", te kaihanga rangatū o Jed Mercurio, me tōna whaea me tōna pāpā, i rere mai i Pākehā mo te hui. Ināianei, i whakatapua e Whishaw tana kaitapere tino pai i roto i tētahi tohu rangatū whāiti o te pouaka whakaata ki a Norman Scott, te tangata i whakaahuatia e ia i roto i A Very English Scandal. I ūkuia a Scott i roto i tētahi mahi kōhuru i rahua e kiia ana e te pāremata Liberal, a Jeremy Thorpe, i tākarotia i roto i te whakaari a Hugh Grant. I kī a Whishaw "i mau a Scott i te whakatūnga i runga i te toa me te whakatoi e kitea ana e au he tino whakaaweawe", ka tāpiri: "He toa tūturu a ia, he ata, ā, ko Norman, māu tēnei." Kotahi tonu te whakawhiwhinga mō Killing Eve, te whakaari hara rerekē i tuhia e te kaihanga o Fleabag, o Phoebe Waller-Bridge. I haere tērā ki a Sandra Oh, e purei ana i a Eve, ā, i tapaina ko ia te kaiwhakaari tino pai i roto i tētahi whakaari pouaka whakaata - ā, i taurimatia hoki te hui i Los Angeles. Ko te kaiwhakatangitangi o Mark Ronson tētahi atu toa o Ingarangi, e tiritiri ana i te whakawhiwhinga mo te waiata tino pai ki a Lady Gaga mō Shallow, ta rātau waiata waiata mai i te pikitia A Star Is Born. Heoi anō, ko tērā anake te toa o te pō, ahakoa e rima ngā whakaingoatanga i haere ki te hui. Ngā toa matua o Golden Globes: Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ngā rongoā Holbeach: E rua i hereheretia i runga i te matenga o Alex Buchan
summary: Tokorua ngā tāngata i whakarite i ngā rōpū rongoā ia wiki i mate ai tētahi tamaiti kura, kua hereheretia, me te tiati e kī ana ki a rātau he "haepapa tūturu".
text: Tekau mā whā tau a Alex Buchan i kitea i te pānga i Fleet Street, Holbeach, Lincolnshire, i te tīmatanga o Aperira 2019. I kitea i tōna taha tētahi paparorohiko hākinakina me te kaupapa "The Punisher". I kī atu te Kaiwhakawā o Hoani Pini ki a Anōpia Tena, 19, rāua ko Sam Kingi, 21, ka noho te mate ki runga i o rāua hinengaro mo te toenga o to rāua oranga. Ko Tena, o Fleet Road, Fleet, nāna i hoko rongoā i te rōpū, me Kingi, o Fleet Street, Holbeach, nāna i taurima te takahanga, i korerotia e te Kaiwhakawā o John Pini QC i te Kōti Karauna o Lincoln, ahakoa kāore he whakaaturanga hei kawe mai i ngā whakapae hara ki a rātau mo te matenga, ko rāua tahi te kawenga mo te mea i tūpono. I whakaae a Turner ki te pupuri i te ecstasy me te hiahia ki te whakarato i te 5 o April 2019 me tētahi atu utu mo te whakarato i te ecstasy i waenganui i te 1 Whiringa 2018 me te 7 April 2019. I whakaae a Kīngi e āwangawanga ana ki te whakarato i te hākinakina me ngā whakapae e rua mo te whakaae kia whakamahia ngā kāinga mo te whakarato rongoā. I hereheretia a Turner mo te toru tau me te waru marama, a, e toru tau a Kingi i muri i te whakaaetanga ki nga whakapae. I korerotia ki te kōti ka whakatūria e nga tāngata tokorua he rōpū rongoā ia wiki i te kāinga o Kingi, e whakarite ana i ngā tono ki ngā tamariki pakeke o te kura. I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Pini, i te whiu, "He take tino kino tēnei. E pā ana ki te ngaromanga o tētahi oranga tino tamariki me te tino aroha. "Kāore anō kia whakapaea te tangata whakapae e pā ana ki te matenga o Alex, ā, kāore e taea e te whiu e whakaritea ana e te kōti te whakaata i te mate. " Heoi anō, ka whai kawenga tūturu koe mo te matenga o Alex Buchan i runga i tō hinengaro mo te toenga o tōu oranga." Whāia a BBC East Yorkshire me Lincolnshire i Facebook, Twitter, me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: COP25 Kōrero huringa āhuarangi: 'Kua ngaro i a mātou tētahi wā hira'
summary: Kua whakamutua ngā kōrero āhuarangi UN i Madrid i roto i tētahi mahi whakararuraru mo te tapahi i te kohu kohu kati kati, nāna i matekiri te tokomaha.
text: Anei ngā kīanga matua mai i ngā kaiārahi, ngā tohunga me ngā kaiwhaiwhai i te putanga o te UN Climate Change Conference (COP25). Te hēkeretari a te UN "E pouri ana ahau ki ngā hua o COP25. I ngaro i te iwi ao whānui tētahi wā hira ki te whakaatu i te nui ake o te hiahia ki te whakamaurutanga, te urutaunga me te pūtea ki te rutu i te raruraru o te āhuarangi." Ko Carolina Schmidt, te minita taiao o Hiria me te perehitini o te hui "Kāore tonu te whakaaetanga i reira ki te whakanui ake i te hiahia ki ngā taumata e hiahiatia ana e tātau. I mua i te whakaotinga, e hiahia ana ahau ki te karanga mārama, kaha hoki ki te ao ki te whakakaha i te wira tōrangapū me te whakatere i te mahi āhuarangi ki te tere e hiahiatia ana e te ao. E tūmanako ana ngā whakatupuranga hou ki ētahi atu mea mai i a mātau." Ko Laurence Tubiana, ko tētahi o ngā kaihoahoa o te Whakaaetanga o Parihi "Kāore ngā kaitākaro matua e hiahia ana ki te tuku i Madrid i noho ki ngā tūmanako, engari he mihi ki tētahi toa mārō o ngā whenua motu iti, Ūropi, Āwherika me Amerika Rātini, i whiwhi mātau i te hua tino pai, ki te hiahia o ngā whakapoke nui." Ko Alden Meyer, ko te rangatira rautaki i te Uniana o ngā Kaipūtaiao Āwangawanga "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i tētahi momotu pēnei i waenganui i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e te pūtaiao me ngā whakaritenga āhuarangi e tuku ana i ngā mahi whai tikanga. Ko te nuinga o ngā whenua whakaputa nui rawa o te ao e ngaro ana i te mahi, ā, kei te ātete i ngā karanga ki te whakapiki i to rātau hiahia." Ko Krista Mikkonen, te minita taiao o Hinerangi me te māngai EU i te hui "Te āhua nei me noho te EU ināianei hei kaiārahi, ā, e hiahia ana mātou kia noho, ā, koia tā mātou e mahi nei." Ko Jair Bolsonaro, te perehitini o Paratira "E hiahia ana ahau ki te mōhio: he taumira anō rānei kia whakawhāititia a Uropi, ka whakararuraru tonu rānei i a Paratira?" Ko Whiriwhiri Nasr, ko te kaitautapa Ihipiana e kōrero ana mō ngā whenua o Awherika "Ko ngā hoa mahi me ngā rōpū e karanga ana kia nui ake te hiahia, e kī ana ko te taparenga taiao te uho, e karanga ana ki te ohorere āhuarangi, mēnā kāore koe i te hāngai ki tētahi kōrero mō te pūtea āhuarangi... Tirohia anō koa ō tūnga. Kaore mātau i konei ki te whai kōrero tino pai, ā, ka tīmata te tangata ki te whakamihi me te pakipaki mo nga kupu pai. Kei konei mātou ki te mahi me te whakarite kia tukua e mātou te mōkī tika, ki te whakarei ake i te hiahia me te neke whakamua." Kera Sherwood O'Regan, Indigenous Peoples Organisations "We can't help but feel the irony of your refusal to include human rights and indigenous people's rights in Article Six [of the Paris agreement] when we know that market approaches have already directly harmed our communities. Kaore e taea te tautoko i to tātau mōhiotanga ki te kore e tautokona o tātau mana. Ka whakamahia e koe ngā whakaritenga pēnei i tētahi kēmu tapeke kore e mahi ai koe i ngā mahi i muri i ngā tatau kati, e whakawhiti ana i ā mātou mana mō ngā hua o ngā kaporeihana tonu nāna tēnei raruraru i te wāhi tuatahi. Engari ka wareware koe kāore e taea e tātau te whakarite ki te āhua." Ian Fry, Tuvalu representative "There are millions of people all around the world who are already suffering from the impacts of climate change. Ko te whakakāhore i tēnei mea ka taea e ētahi te whakamārama he hara ki te tangata." Ko Tā Rawiri Kingi, te māngai kāwanatanga o Ingarangi i ngā kōrero āhuarangi o Parihi 2015 "Mēnā kāore te Hononga o Amerika i te tautoko i tētahi whakaaetanga whai tikanga, he tino uaua ki te toenga o te ao te whakaaetanga. Ā, e wehi ana ahau, i te wā kei a mātau a [Perehitini Donald] Trump i Te Hononga o Amerika me Perehitini [Jair] Bolsonaro i Paratira, he tino uaua ki te whakaae ki aua whenua katoa." Ko Li Shuo, te kaitohutohu kaupapahere o Āhia ki te Rāwhiti "I whakaaturia e COP25 te ngenge o te hiahia nui rawa o ngā kaituku [kati kati] nui rawa o te ao." Ko Arama Currie, te rōpū āhuarangi taitamariki o Generation Zero "Kua ngenge mātau i ngā kāwanatanga e taha ana ki ngā whakapoke. Kua ngenge tātau i te whakawhitiwhiti i o tātau oranga mo te moni. Kua ngenge te iwi i te waihotia i te wā e whakarite ana te hunga tukituki me ngā whakaweti i runga i te whakapono kino. E mōhio ana mātau kia puta rā anō rātau i te mana, ka haere tonu rātau ki te whakararuraru i to tātau wā heke." Ko Alexandria Villasenor, 14, he kaiwhaiwhai āhuarangi i uiuia e TE WHK "Ko te rerekētanga i waenganui i te taitamariki i runga i nga tiriti me ngā whakaritenga, ko te taitamariki i runga i nga tiriti e mahi ana i runga i te wawe. Kua rahua mātau e COP25, ā, he tau anō tēnei o te hinganga."

title: Special needs pupils 'took own lives' in Kent amid Covid-19 pandemic
summary: Tokorima ngā tamariki whai hiahia mātauranga motuhake kua mate i Kent mai i te tīmatanga o te mate urutā Covid-19, kua whakaūngia e te kaunihera o te rohe.
text: I kii me whakaaro nga mate i waenga i nga "take hauora whanui" o te coronavirus. The "break in routine" caused by the pandemic "will have had an impact", said cabinet member for children's services Sue Chandler. I kī a ia he "whakararuraru" ia mate, engari "he iti rawa ngā tau". Ko ngā tamariki whai mahere hiahia motuhake i waenganui i te hunga i pōhiritia kia haere tonu ki te kura puta noa i te raka. I kī atu a Sarah Hammond, te kaiwhakahaere o ngā ratonga tamariki o te kaunihera, ki te Kaitiaki: "I tino kaha mātou ki te tiki i ngā mātua ki te tuku i a rātau tamariki, engari kāore mātou i neke atu i te 10%" I kī a ia e rua, e toru rānei ngā mate e tūmanakohia ana ia tau. 'Raruraru ki te tiaki' I kī te Pātengi Raraunga Mate Tamariki ā-Motu e 25 pea ngā tamariki i roto i ngā rā tuatahi e 56 o te raka. E kī ana kāore i te mārama ngā take, engari "he rāhuitanga ki te mātauranga me ētahi atu ngohe, te raruraru ki ngā ratonga tiaki me ngā ratonga tautoko, te āhua nei he take āwhina i te kāinga me te taratahi". Ko ngā tamariki i mate i Keni i waenganui i te 13 me te 17 te pakeke, ā, he hiahia motuhake tae atu ki te mate tūāwhiorangi ā-hinengaro me te mate ā-hinengaro. I kī a Tania Tirraoro, he whaea o ngā tamariki tokorua whai autism, ko te tikanga o ngā ratonga i whakawhirinaki ki ngā tamariki hauā kua "tangohia mō te tokomaha, mēnā kāore i te nuinga". I kī a Ms Tirraoro, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o te paetukutuku Ngahere Hiahia Motuhake, me hoatu ngā rauemi ki ngā kura kia tae mai ki te hauora hinengaro, ā, i te raumati "me mātua whakarite ngā wāhi paetata kia ngāwari te urunga ki ngā kaitohutohu taitamariki hauora hinengaro". I kī a Ms Chandler i ngā wā katoa e arotahi ana te kaunihera ki te hauora hinengaro, ā, he "raweke kaha" kia tino mōhio ai kei te āwhinatia ngā tamariki whai "āhuatanga ōrite". Mēnā kua pāngia koe e ngā take i whakaarahia i tēnei tuhinga, e wātea ana te āwhina mai i te Raina Hohenga o TE HAU.

title: I ngaro a Marco Pierre White i te pakanga o te Kōti Tiketike
summary: E anga ana te kaitao rongonui o Marco Pierre White ki tētahi pire tae atu ki te £500,000 i muri i te ngaronga o te pakanga i te Kōti Tiketike me ngā hoa pakihi tokorua o mua.
text: I tautohe a Tēnā Mā i takahia e Andrew Parton rāua ko Pita Featherman tētahi whakaaetanga e pā ana ki Te Rākau Yew i Highclere, tata ki Newbury, Berkshire. I te tono tūkinotanga a ia i muri i tana ngaronga i ngā hea e wātea ana mō te £175,000, tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Kaiwhakawā Morgan kāore a ia i "pono", e whakahau ana i a ia kia utu utu. I pātai hoki te kaiwhakawā i te whakarongo i Rāwāhi ki te "mōhiotanga" o te kaitao whānau o Leeds i te kerēme. I te tautohetohe a Tēnā Mā i ngā kerēme i whakaritea he mahi ki a Tēnā Parton rāua ko Tāne Featherman e taea ai e rāua te whakamahi i tōna ingoa e pā ana ki te wharekai o Newbury. I kī a ia "kāore he here tōmua" i whakaaetia, engari i kī rātau i pāngia te umanga i te whare noho o te rau tau 17 i muri i te korerotanga ki a rātau kāore e taea e rātau te whakamahi i tōna ingoa. I whakaarohia e nga rōia i te kōti ka taea te waiho i te kaitao whetū o Mīharo me tētahi pire mo te £500,000. I tēnei wā, he kaiwhakawā a Tēnā Mā, nāna te tūnga o te kaitao matua i runga i te rangatū pouaka whakaata o ITV's Hell's Kitchen, i tēnei wā he kaiwhakawā i runga i te putanga o Ahitereiria o MasterChef.

title: Ko te tikanga kia nui ake ngā tamariki e tiakina ana, e kī ana ngā MP
summary: Me nui ake ngā tamariki e mōrearea ana, e kī ana tētahi komiti o ngā MP e tirotiro ana i te parenga tamariki i Ingarangi.
text: Nā Sean Coughlan, te korero mātauranga o Te Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero, i whakatūpato rātau, he maha rawa te painga o te rangirua i hoatu ki ngā mātua whakawātea, ā, kāore i pai ake. I kī hoki ngā MP he iti rawa te tautoko mō ngā tamariki pakeke, otirā i te wā i mahue i ngā tamariki mōrearea te pūnaha tiaki. I kī te kāwanatanga he "kore whakaaetia" tētahi tūkinotanga, kātahi anō ka "waenganui i tētahi whakahōu nui" o te pūnaha. I whakatūpato te pūrongo, mai i te Komiti Tīpako Mātauranga o te Whare o Ngātahi, he maha rawa ngā tamariki e mahue ana i roto i ngā āhuatanga o te "wā roa, te waihotanga pūmau". I huatau ngā MP he maha rawa ngā wā i hoatu ki o rātau mātua he maha ngā wā ki te huri - i te utu o a rātau tamariki i mahue me te kore tautoko me te haumarutanga e hiahiatia ana e rātau. Ko te atahanga o te tiaki ehara i te tere rawa o ngā ratonga pāpori ki te mahi ki te tango i tētahi tamaiti i waihotia i tētahi whānau, i kitea e te pūrongo he nui rawa te whakaaro ki te waiho i te tamaiti ki te whānau. Ko ēnei mātua, tērā pea he raruraru ki te waipiro, ki te tūkino rongoā rānei, i "aroturukitia" i roto i ngā tau maha e ngā umanga tautoko, kaua e anga atu ki ngā raweke hāngai. I karangatia e te pūrongo he atahanga pai ake mō ngā ratonga tiaki - tērā pea ka tukuna he putanga pai ake i te waiho i tētahi tamaiti i roto i tētahi tautuhinga kāinga taikaha, whakangaro rānei. Nā ngā heitara e karapoti ana i a Jimmy Savile me ngā kēhi whakapai kōtaha tiketike, kua nui ake te māharahara mo te apo i te rangatahi. Ā, ka whakaarahia e te pūrongo ngā māharahara mō tētahi āputa mō ngā tamariki pakeke, tērā pea ka mōrearea rātou ki te whanonga pākaha o ngā pakeke. "Kāore i te pai te tiaki i ngā tamariki pakeke ake. He maha rawa te wā e tukua ana, e waihotia ana, e kore rānei e whakarongohia, ka taea te pana atu i te tiaki i te tamariki rawa, ā, kāore i te tino whakaritea, i te tautokona. Me huri tēnei," te kī a te manukura o te komiti, a Kiriuati. Ahakoa tērā pea ka tūmanako ngā whānau pai ake ki te whakarato tautoko tonu mō ngā tamariki ki te rua tekau mā rua, ki tua atu rānei - ka tautohe te rōpū rōpū whakawhiti-rōpū o ngā MP ko ngā tamariki mōrearea rawa, pērā i te hunga e wehe ana i ngā kāinga tiaki, i te nuinga o te wā he iti rawa te tautoko. "Mō ngā tamariki e tino tūkino ana, ka mutu te mātua i mua ake," te pūrongo a ngā MP. Ko te whakaroa i ngā ratonga tautoko hei tiaki i ngā tamariki pakeke ake ka whai utu pūtea, ka mōhiotia e ngā MP. A, ka whakatūpato rātau kia kaua e whakaaetia ngā pēhanga ki ngā mana ā rohe ki te tūkino i te kaha o ngā raweke wawe i roto i ngā whānau raruraru. Ko te whakaroa i te raweke me te whakaae kia kino ake ngā raruraru he "mahi hē", e kī ana a Tēnā Kiriuati. "Ahakoa he aha tō tirohanga ki ngā tapahi, he mea nui kia kaua ngā tamariki i roto i tō tātau iwi e tino mōrearea ana ki te tūkino me te taikaha, ehara i te mea hei utu i te utu," tana kī. I tohu atu a David Simmonds, te kaiwhakahaere o te Poari Tamariki me te Taitamariki o te Pānga Kāwanatanga Paetata, ki te toenga uaua ki te whakatau mēnā ka tangohia he tamaiti i tētahi whānau - me te pāoro i ngā māharahara mō ngā pēhanga pūtea. "Ko te whakarite i te haumarutanga o ngā tamariki mōrearea tētahi o ngā mahi tino hira e mahia ana e ngā kaunihera, ā, ka anga atu ngā kaimahi pāpori ki ngā whakataunga tino uaua i ia rā, i ia rā mō te wā e hīpae ai me te tango i tētahi tamaiti i tōna whānau. " E mārama ana ngā kaunihera ki te hiranga o te raweke wawe hei ārai i ngā raruraru i raro ake i te raina, ā, e rapu ana ki te haumi i tēnei. "But as the committee rightly points out, the current financial climate means councils are being forced to take extremely tough spending decisions." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Mātauranga: "E kore e whakaaetia kia tūkinotia, kia waihotia rānei tētahi taiohi. Ko te tikanga kia parea nga tamariki i te tūkino ahakoa to rātau pakeketanga. "E ai ki ngā tuhipoka a te komiti, kei waenganui te kāwanatanga i tētahi whakahou nui o te pūnaha parenga tamariki - kia whiwhi ai ia tamaiti i te āwhina e hiahiatia ana e rātou, ina hiahiatia e rātou. " Kua whakaarahia e te komiti mātauranga ētahi take hira e hiahiatia ana kia āta whakaarohia, ā, i te whakaaro i ēnei take e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakarato i tētahi urupare kāwanatanga katoa." I kī a Lisa Harker, mai i te NSPCC: "E pōhiritia ana te arotahi a te komiti ki te aro atu ki te tamariki i a mātou e mōhio ana koia te take matua e herea ai ngā tamariki ki ngā mahere parenga tamariki. Ā, i te nuinga o te wā e kite ana ngā tohunga i ngā taitamariki he manahau ake kia taea ai te waiho i roto i ngā āhuatanga wairua mō te roa rawa". I tāpiri mai a ia ko te pūnaha parenga tamariki "he maha rawa te hapa o ngā taitamariki pakeke". "Ahakoa he nui ake te āhua o ētahi ki ngā pakeke, he tamariki tonu rātou, ā, kāore e taea te whakaaro ka taea e rātou te tiaki i a rātou anō, te mōhio rānei ko wai hei tono āwhina."

title: Te āwangawanga 'hūkere huarahi' o Stonehenge i muri i te katinga o A344
summary: Na te katinga o tētahi huarahi matua e rere ana i te taha o Stonehenge i nui ake ai te mātiti waka huri noa i te whakamaharatanga, kua kīia.
text: I katia te A344 i te taha o ngā pōhatu i Hune, ā, ka keria hei "whakaora i te rangatiratanga" o te Pae Tuku iho o te Ao. I kī te Koromatua o Amesbury, a Īna Doketa, ko te A303 "kāore i te mahi" ki ngā waka, e "maringi ana" ki ngā kāinga. English Heritage said the road closure issues had all been addressed at public inquiries two years ago. I Whiringa 2011, i whakaaetia e te minita huarahi a Maika Penning ngā mahere hei kati i tētahi wāhanga 879m (2,884ft) o te A344 mai i tōna komititanga ki te A303 i Stonehenge Bottom. Kotahi marama i muri iho, ka whakaaetia e te Kaunihera o Wiltshire tētahi raupapa ture waka mō te toenga o te huarahi ki Airman's Corner. Engari i kī a Tēnā Doketa, he Rangatira hoki, kei te tūtira ngā waka ināianei mō ngā māwhiti i runga i te A303, ā, kei te "ngangau". 'Rongoā tika' "Kāore au i te mōhio e hia ngā waka kua puta mai i te A344 engari kāore te A303 i te whakatikatika," tana kī. "We're particularly concerned now because we find that traffic is finding its way back to Amesbury centre and spilling out into Larkhill as well to get around this block. " Ka mauria whakamua te take ki te poari rohe o Amesbury i te marama o Mahuru me te Chamber of Trade o Stonehenge - nā reira e tūmanako ana ahau ka taea e mātou te whiwhi i te nui o ngā tāngata e pana ana i tēnei, kia whiwhi ai mātou i tētahi rongoā tika." I kī te Highways Agency, i roto i tētahi kōrero, e "whakatinana ana i ngā huringa ki te whatunga huarahi he wāhanga o te mahere whakahaere Tuku iho Ingarihi mō te pae tuku iho o te ao".

title: Ka hinga te whakamātautau whakaeke ā-hoa Paralympian nā te mate
summary: Kua hinga te whakawātanga o tētahi Pararaiha i whakapaea ki te whakaeke i tētahi kaihoko i tētahi hōtēra whetū e rima i muri i te matenga o te rōia.
text: E kiia ana kua mau i a Ariki Wānanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Wā E whakakāhore ana te pakeke e 48 tau i nga whakaaro. I ākiritia ngā kaiwhakawā i te Kōti Karauna o Southwark i te rā i muri noa iho i te tīmatanga o te whakawā, i te mea kāore i taea e te rōia o Te Kōti o Te Rūnanga te haere tonu. Ka kī atu te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike, a Tēnā Kaiwhakawā o Nicol ki nga kaiwhakawā: "E wehi ana ahau kua korerotia mai ki a au kei te mate a Ms Strudwick; kāore i taea e ia te haere tonu tēnei kēhi. "Ko te hua o tēnei, kāore he tangata e āhei ana ki te tū i taua pānui poto, ā, e wehi ana ahau kāore aku kōwhiringa engari ki te tuku i a koe kia kaua e mahi i tēnei take." Ka tukuna te kēhi ki te Tumuaki o ngā Ture Tūmatanui ki te whakatau mehemea ka anga atu te hoa ki tētahi whakamātautau tuarua. I toa te kaikauhoe toa a Ariki Holmes i ngā mētara koura e iwa, a, e 35 ngā pūkete o te ao i roto i tana mahi tākaro. I muri iho ka mahi a ia hei kaiwhakahaere o te whakaurunga Pararaiha mō ngā Tākaro o Rāwāhi 2012, ā, i noho ia hei hoa Conservative i te Whare Ariki i te tau 2013. I tēnei wā, kāore a ia i te whai wāhi, ā, ehara i te rōpū paremata.

title: Me nui ake te mahi a Grantham ki te mōhio ki a Margaret Thatcher?
summary: E wehe ana te pirimia o mua o Margaret Thatcher i te whakaaro, nā reira he aha te whakaaro o ngā tāngata i Grantham ki ngā waea hei whakatoko i te tūhononga o te taone ki tana tamāhine tino rongonui?
text: Nā Caroline LowbridgeBBC News Online I te toa kai o mua me te poutāpeta i tipu ake ai a Margaret Hilda Roberts, kāore he mea nui ake i te tohu iti hei tohu i tōna hononga ki te Wheua o Te Wānanga ā muri ake. The premises on North Parade, on the edge of Grantham town centre, have been a natural health and chiropractic centre since 1994, after being a restaurant for a decade. Ka whakamāramatia e ngā kaimahi ko te rūma moe tawhito o Wheua Thatcher e whakamahia ana hei rūma hypnotherapy. "He pouri kāore he mea nui ake hei kite," te kī a Sandra Good, nāna te umanga. "E whakaaro ana ahau i tētahi rā tērā pea ka pouri kāore he mea i mahia hei tiaki i te whare hei whare taonga. " He nui rawa ngā tūruhi e haere mai ana ki te whakaahua i te whare, ko ētahi e toa ana ki te haere ki roto. "I haere mai rātau i Hapanihi, i haere mai rātau i Potukara, i Amerika, i te ao katoa. " I tētahi wā i whakaaro ahau ka kihi a ia i te kāpeti i roto i te rūma, i tino harikoa a ia. 'Kātahi tōna whakamīharo' "Ko ētahi he haerenga kaiako, ko ētahi e haere ana. I ētahi wā ka whiwhi mātou i tētahi rōpū tūruhi Hainamana, Hapanihi rānei i waho. I ētahi wā kotahi, e rua rānei. Ka haere mai tētahi i ia wiki. "E hiahia ana ētahi tāngata ki te kite. E hiahia ana ētahi tāngata ki te kōrero mō taua mea me te kī i te mīharo o to rātau whakaaro i a ia." E haere ana ki te pokapū o te taone, e noho ana a Alan Bywater, e 46, i runga i tētahi tēpu i te taha o tētahi whakapakoko o Tā Isaac Newton, i whānau tata ki Grantham. E whakaaro ana a Tēnā Bywater me nui ake te mahi a te taone ki te whakatoko i tōna hononga ki a Wheua Thatcher. "Ko te tikanga kia nui ake," tana kī. "He whakapakoko tā rātou nāna i whakataka he āporo ki runga i tōna māhunga, engari kāore he mea āna, nē? " Tērā pea me whai whakapakoko rātau. Ko ia te pirimia tino pai mai i te pakanga, ki ōku titiro tonu." Engari kāore te hoa o Tāne Bywater, o Yasmine Bougatef, i te tino mōhio. "I te pānui ahau i roto i te pepa ko ia te mea i puta ai te whakahekenga whakamutunga me te ngaro o te katoa i a rātau mahi, koia te mahi a Cameron ināianei," te kī a te tau 27 tau. "Kāore au i te whakapono ki tēnā, engari ko ia te pirimia wahine tuatahi. Tērā pea he nui te ngākau me te kaha mōna i tētahi wāhi e whakahaeretia ana e ngā tāngata. "Tērā pea me whai mōhiohio anō mātou ina haere mai ngā tūruhi ki te kite i a ia." I mahue i a Wheua Thatcher, kātahi ko Miss Roberts, a Grantham i te tau 1943 ki te tīmata i tētahi tohu matū e whā tau i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, kātahi ka neke ki Colchester ki te mahi hei kēmihana rangahau. He maha nga wā i haere ai a ia ki Grantham, e ai ki te kaituhituhi kōrero o te rohe me te kairīpoata mōnehu a Jim Allen, e noho ana i te taone. "I roto i taku wheako i te kōrero ki a ia, i ngā wā katoa ka tino aroha tana kōrero mo te taone," te kī a Tēnā Aotearoa. "Te āhua nei he whakahīhī a ia i haere mai i Grantham, ā, he nui ake i te whakahīhī ki tōna kura." Kua tūtohitia te pikinga o Wheua Thatcher ki te hiko i roto i tētahi pikitia hei tuku i te 5 o Hānuere. I mua i tēnei pānuitanga, kua karangatia e te taone nui o Grantham o Ray Wooten tētahi huarahi o Margaret Thatcher e ahu ana ki tētahi whakapakoko mōna i waenganui o te taone. 'Kāore i ako mōna' Kua karangatia hoki e te MP Conservative mō Grantham me Stamford Nick Boles kia whakatūria he whare taonga i whakatapua ki a ia. E noho ana i te taha o te Pokapū Hokohoko o Isaac Newton, e whakaae ana a Kerry Anne McSheffrey, 18, he nui ōna hoa kura kāore i te tino mōhio ki a Wheua Thatcher. E kī ana a ia: "I haere a ia ki taku kura, ki te Kura Kōtiro o Kesteven me Grantham. " I think she opened something at the school ages ago and there's a little plaque, but we didn't learn about her." Kāore a Miss McSheffrey i te tino mōhio mēnā me nui ake te whakatoko i te tūhononga o Grantham ki a ia: "E mārama ana kei reira te Pokapū Hokohoko a Isaac Newton me te whakapakoko mōna, engari kāore a ia i te tino kaingākautia." I katia te whare taonga o Grantham, e noho ana i tētahi whakaaturanga o ngā whakamaharatanga a Margaret Thatcher, nā te whakapau moni a te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Lincolnshire. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakatuwheratia anō e tētahi whakawhirinaki aroha te whare taonga i te wā mō te Hīupiri Taimana o te Kuini i Hune. I muri i te Whakatūtū ki te Raki i reira te pāpā o Wheua Thatcher i whakahaere ai i tana umanga kai, ināianei e tū ana tētahi hokomaha nui 24 haora ki te anga atu. I konei, kāore e wehewehea ana ngā kaihoko i roto i ā rātou karanga kia nui ake te āhukahuka. E kī ana a Kiriata Metcalfe, e 52: "Me mahi tētahi mea. I te heke haere te whenua. "Kāore koe e mōhio kua noho a ia, i whānau rānei i reira mēnā kāore koe i mōhio nā te mea he iti rawa te tohu." E kī ana a Kenneth Carratt, e 81: "I mahia e ia ngā mea e hiahia ana ki te mahi. Kai te whiwhi whakamaharatanga rātau. Ki taku whakaaro he ariā pai tēnā." He hītori roa tō te wāhanga o Grantham me Stamford ki te kōwhiri i ngā MP Conservative. "Kāore a ia i te pai ki te iwi Mahi," ko te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Carratt. "Kāore au i te whakaaro he tokomaha ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki tētahi whakamaharatanga ināianei. E mōhio ana ahau ka uru mai ngā Tohutohu i ia wā, engari koia tēnā ngā kāinga e karapoti ana." E kī ana a Brenda Bell, e 53: "Ka taea e rātau tētahi mea pēnei i tētahi māra whakamaharatanga, he whakapakoko rānei ki a ia. Kei a rātau tētahi mō Isaac Newton, ehara i te mea? "Mēnā kei te hīkoi noa koe, kei te taraiwa rānei koe i roto i te taone, e kore rawa koe e mōhio he hononga tōna ki te taone."

title: Ka ngaro i te kaiwhakahaere o te Karapu Tamariki o Celtic, a Frank Cairney, te tono pēre tuarua
summary: Kua ngaro i te kaiwhakahaere o Celtic Boys Club o Frank Cairney tana tono tuarua kia tukua i a ia e tono ana i tana whakapae mo te tūkino i ngā kaiwhutupōro taitamariki.
text: I whiua a Cairney, e 84, i te wā o Hui tanguru kia whā tau i roto i te whare herehere i runga i ngā whakapae e iwa e hoki ana ki nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā whā. I tono a ia kia tukuna he utu i runga i nga taunga hauora, engari i whakakāhore te kaiwhakawā i muri i te whakarongo ki te Kōti Pīra Hara. I whakawāteatia a Cairney i ngā whakapae ōrite i te 20 tau ki mua. I rongo tana whakawātanga i te Kōti Sheriff o Hamilton i tērā Hakihea kua tino mamae ōna tūkinotanga i te tūkinotanga. I whakaahuatia e Sheriff Daniel Kelly a Cairney, o Viewpark, North Lanarkshire, he "wuruhi i roto i ngā kākahu hipi". Ko ngā raruraru manawa i tono hoki te kaiako o mua mo te utu i tētahi whakarongo i tērā Me. I rongo te kōti e hiahia ana a ia kia tukua mai i te whare herehere i mua i tana tono nā "ngā uauatanga hauora" tae atu ki ngā raruraru manawa. I rongo a Ariki Turnbull e kore a Cairney, kāore i konei i te kōti, e mōrearea te rere, ā, ka ū ki ngā whakahau a te kōti i mua i tana pīra. Engari i whakamutua e te tiati ehara i te mea tika kia tukuna he utu ki a ia. Me tono a Cairney i tōna whakapae i runga i te take i kore ai e whakaaturia e nga rōia tētahi whakaaturanga matua ki a ia i mua i tana whakawā. I rongo hoki te kōti e whakapono ana a Cairney kāore a ia i whiwhi i tētahi whakawā tika nā te pūrongo pēhi whakawātea. E tūmanakohia ana kia rangona te tono ā muri ake i tēnei tau. Ko ngā kaikino karapu o Cairney i waenganui i ngā kaiako e whā o mua o Celtic Boys Club e whakawāteatia ana ki te tūkino i te tamariki. I Whiringa ā Rangi, i hereheretia te kaiwhakarewa o Boys Club a Jim Torbett mo te ono tau, ā, i whakawāteatia hoki tētahi atu kaiako, ko te kaiako o Gerald Kingi, ki te tūkino i ngā tamariki i tētahi kura. I hoatu ki a Hēmi McCafferty, e 73, he whiu whare herehere anō i muri i te whakaaetanga ki ngā rangatū o ngā hara tūkino tamariki. I whiua a ia kia ono tau me te iwa marama i muri i tana whakaaetanga ki ngā whakapae e 12 e pā ana ki ngā whakaekenga ki ngā taitama taitamariki e 10 i waenganui i te 1972 me te 1996. I te mahi kē a ia i tētahi wā whare herehere mo te tūkinotanga.

title: E kite ana a Birmingham i ngā 'pakaru Covid whakamīharo' me ngā rōpū whare nui
summary: I muri i te kitenga i ētahi "pakaru Covid whakamīharo", ka kī te rangatira pirihimana o te rohe.
text: I kī te Rangatira Kātipa o Tā Dave Thompson, nāna i noho wā ki te Wae Tautoko Whakahaere o te ope i te Rāitema, kua waiho e ētahi tāngata ngā ture hōu e whā o ngā ture. Heoi anō, ka tūtohu a ia i te "nuinga kua mahi i te mea tika". E 20 ngā whakamōhiotanga whiu pūmau i tukuna e te tōpana, ā, e kī ana mō te 50 ngā rōpū "i oma mai i tētahi wāhitau" i Wednesbury. I haere ngā āpiha ki ngā kāinga i Te Ara o Mārō i mua noa iho i te 23:30 GMT, ā, ka korerotia ki te kaipupuri kāinga ka whainatia ia, ka kī tētahi kaihautū tōpana. "Ka arotakea e mātou te CCTV me te ataata mau tinana kia mōhio ai mēnā he take hei tuku i tētahi whaina £10,000 mō tētahi takahi tika me te tinihanga o ngā ture Covid-19," tana tāpiri mai. I mua ake, ka whainatia te kaiwhakahaere o tētahi rōpū i William Street, i te pokapū o te taone o Birmingham, ā, ka kiia ētahi atu kia wehe atu i te whare noho. "E whakapono ana mātou tae atu ki te 30 ngā tāngata i te wāhitau me ētahi e rere ana kua piki i roto i te matapihi," te kī a pirihimana. I karangatia hoki ngā āpiha ki tētahi rūma Shisha i Digbeth i reira te nui o ngā waka me ngā tāngata i huihui, ka kī pirihimana, ka kī atu ki te kaiwhakahaere ka "whiwhi ia i te whaina nui". I kī te Kaiāwhina Rangatira Kātipa o Mātā Ward i whiwhi te ope o West Midlands neke atu i te 700 ngā waea mō ngā pakaru whakapae i te pō o te Rāite. "Ko te nuinga o ngā pakaru taumata iti, ā, i te katoa, ka kōrero ngā āpiha ki ngā tāngata i tūtakia e rātau, a, ka nekehia rātau," tana kī. Most of the West Midlands is now under tier four restrictions where people have been told to stay at home to avoid spread Covid-19 as cases across the UK continue to rise. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi West Midlands Police Tier 4- Stay at Home - GOV.UK

title: I hereheretia te pāremata o Īnia o Aotearoa mo te hāmate
summary: Kua whiua tētahi o ngā kaipōrangapū tino ātaahua, tautohetohe hoki o Īnia, a Aoram Purelalitha, ki te whare herehere mo te whā tau mo nga utu hāmate i roto i tētahi take kua roa mo te 18 tau.
text: I kitea he hara te minita nui o te kāwanatanga ki te tonga o Tamila Nadu ki te whakaemi taonga neke atu i te $10m (£6.1m) kāore i kitea. Me utu e ia he rupee 1bn ($16m; £10m) te whaina, a, ka whakarerea hei minita nui. He kaiwhakaari o mua, kua tohua tōna oranga e te rangatū tiketike me te pāpaku. I tukuna te whakataunga e tētahi kōti motuhake i Bangalore i waenganui i te haumarutanga kikī. Tae atu ki ētahi atu tokotoru, ka whiua a Purelalitha ki tētahi wā herehere ināianei tonu, a, ko te tikanga kia tonoa ki te whare herehere o Parappana Agrahara i Bangalore. Engari i amuamu a ia mo nga mamae o te poho me te māuiui i muri i te tukunga o te whakataunga, ka pūrongotia e te Times of India, a, ka tonoa ki te hōhipera o te whare herehere mo te aromatawai. Tātaritanga: Ko Anaru ki te Raki, Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero, he tokomaha ngā Initia o Delhi e whakamihi ana ki te whakapae a te minita nui o Tamila Nadu - i muri i nga tau e karo ana i te tika - i runga i te tūmanako he neke anō ki te horoi i te pūnaha tōrangapū o te whenua. Kua whakamaheretia e te Kōti Matua o Īnia te noose, e whakakore ana i te tari i tētahi MP i herea ki tētahi hara nui, me te whakahau i ngā whakamātautau aroturuki tere hei ārai i a rātau ki te whakamahi i to rātau mana ki te aho i ngā mea. Engari kaore he pae ki te tokomaha o ngā kaipōrangapū e haere tonu ana ki te kawe i te kaupapa here i a rātau e anga ana ki ngā whakapae e kite ana i a rātau e whakatārewatia wawetia ana i te nuinga o ētahi atu whakatiputanga, kia kitea rā anō tō rātou harakore, hara rānei. Kua kī taurangi te Pirimia hou o Moemoe Modi ki te kāwanatanga mā, engari i raro noa iho i te tuatoru o nga minita i whakatūria e ia ki ngā utu hara, a, kotahi tonu te whakapae ki te kōhuru. Nō nā tata nei i whakataua e te Kōti Matua o Īnia, ahakoa ka whakaaetia e te kaupapa ture a Tēnā Modi ki te mahi i tēnei, me tautuhi e ia he tauira pai ake ki a wai e whakatūria ana e ia. I tautohe te māngaitanga i hara a Purelalitha me ētahi atu tokotoru ki te iwi, ka pūrongotia e te Indian Express. Kua whiua e te kōti ngā whakapae e whā ki te whā tau i roto i te whare herehere, ā, e anga ana hoki a Purelalitha ki tētahi pai rupeea 1bn ($16m, £10m). Kua whakahaua ētahi atu kia utu i te whaina tata ki te $1.6m ia. Ki te kore tētahi o ngā tokowhā e utu i to rātau whaina, ka whakaroatia to rātau whiu herehere ki te tau kotahi. E kī ana ko nga kaitautoko o te rōpū AIADMK i whakamararatia e nga pirihimana i a rātau e ngana ana ki te haere ki te kōti. E kī ana a Jill McGivering o TE AO he tangata pūrākau a Purelalitha - he whetū kiriata o mua, he whetū kiriata tōmua, i waenganui i ngā tōrangapū o Īnia ki te tonga mo te toru tekau tau. Purelalitha: Kōtaha tuakiri Mercurial: I arotahi te kēhi hāmate ki ōna rawa whaiaro, ā, i mauria mai e tētahi rōpū tōrangapū tauwhāinga, i ngā wā katoa e tautohe ana a Purelalitha he whakahauhau tōrangapū. E mōhiotia ana e ana kaiārahi ko Amma, ko Whaea rānei, e whakaawe ana ia i te pono kaha, tae atu ki te koropiko. Engari kua pāhonotia a ia ki tētahi āhua noho whai rawa. Tata ki te 20 tau ki muri ka whati i te mārena o tana tama whāngai ngā pūkete o te ao mō tōna tauine tino nui - tae atu ki ngā manuhiri e 150,000.

title: Bristol greenbelt 'needed for housing' think tank says
summary: Kua karangatia e tētahi kura whakaaro ētahi atu kāinga i runga i te whenua kākāriki huri noa i Bristol me Bath.
text: The Centre for Cities says building on greenbelt is the only way of addressing the region's growing housing crisis. I kī a Alexandra Jones, mai i te kura whakaaro: "Tata ki te 4,300 ngā whare ka taea te hanga ki runga i te whenua parauri - e mārama ana kāore i te tata ki ngā mea e hiahiatia ana." The Metro Mayor for the west will have the power to decide housing policy when he or she is elected in May. Ms Jones, from the independent organisation, added that greenbelt takes up half the land in South Gloucestershire and two thirds of land in the Bath and North East Somerset Council area. Three local councils which have signed up to the Metro Mayor model have all pledged to increase the number of new homes being built. Ko te whāinga kia hanga i ētahi atu kāinga e 85,000 i roto i ngā tau e 20 e whai ake nei, e ōrite ana ki te hanga i ngā tāone e rua te rahi o Bath. I Whiringahora, i tāruatia e te kāwanatanga tētahi whakaaetanga mana whakahaere £1bn ki te Kaunihera Taone o Bristol, Bath me te Kaunihera o Te Rāwhiti ki te Raki me te Kaunihera o Te Tonga o Te Rāwhiti. Ko te whakaaetanga ko te waihanga i tētahi Koromatua Metro māna e whakatau whakataunga matua mō ngā wāhi nui pēnei i te whare, ngā mahi me ngā huarahi.

title: Oscars 2016: I pēhea te mahi a Chris Rock?
summary: He mahi pēhanga tiketike tonu te hautū i ngā Oscars. Mō Pirihi Rock, nāna i whakahaere te hui 2016, he nui ake te tūnga i te tūnga mēnā ka tau ana kōrero whakangahau.
text: Ko Rock, ko tētahi o ngā comedians pango tino rongonui i te ao, i te hautū i roto i te tau i te wā o te rēhi - ko te kore o ngā pūmanawa rerekē i whakaingoatia mō ngā tohu - i mua. Mo te tuarua o nga tau i roto i te haupae, kāore he kaitapere pango, kaiwhakaari rānei i whiwhi whakaingoatanga. Ko ngā kiriata e whakaatu ana i ngā kaitapere pango, ngā kaiwhakahaere me ngā kaituhituhi i waihotia - ahakoa ngā mea i kitea e te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakawāwā he mahi whakawhiwhinga i roto i ngā pikitia pēnei i ngā Kararehe Kore Iwi, Straight Outta Compton me Creed. Na nga whakaingoatanga o Hānuere i akiaki tētahi hashtag huaketo - #OscarsSoWhite - i reira i mau ai ngā kaiwhaiwhai me ngā kaihoko whitiāhua ki te pāpāho pāpori ki te tangi i te kore rerenga kētanga. I hiahia ngā kaimātakitaki ki te kite me pēhea te kōrero a Rock i te tautohetohe. Kāore i taea te whakapae i a ia ki te hīkoi taha. Ka whakatuwheratia e ia tana kōrero mō te iwi, kātahi ka hoki ki te kaupapa puta noa i te pō. "Āe, kāore e taea e tētahi tangata te whakapae i a Pirihi Rock ki te karo i te arewhana i roto i te rūma," ko te tuhituhi a Aaron Blake o The Washington Post. Engari he rekareka? I whiwhi urupare whāranu ana kōrero tōmua mai i te hunga e mātakitaki ana i te kāinga, me ētahi kata hākinakina mai i te hunga whakarongo ora o te whakaaturanga, engari i te āhua nei ehara i te take nui te kore whakaaturanga i ngā whakaaturanga tohu. "He aha ināianei?" ka pātai a ia, e mōhio ana mō te 71 o ngā tau e 88 i tū ai tētahi hui Oscar, kāore he tautapa pango. "Kī atu '62, '63 rānei... Kaore te iwi pango i whakahē," tana kī. "He mea tūturu tā mātou hei whakahē; E mōhio ana koe, kei te arokē rawa mātou ki te wero, ki te māharahara ko wai i toa i te kaiwhakaahua tino pai." I whakaaro ētahi he ākiri rawa ēnei whakawāwā - ko te mea, i whakahē te iwi i te kore rerenga kētanga i te 1962 me te 1963 Oscars - ā, ko ētahi i mīharo #OscarsSoWhite i te kaha o te whakaawe i te whakaaturanga. "He aha koe i tūmanako ai kia puta mai a Pirihi Rock, ā, ohorere ana ko Angela Davis?" te pātai a te kaimātai pāpori o Tressie McMillan Cottom i Twitter. "I hurihia e koe tētahi whakaaturanga katoa. [He aha] he mea nui mēnā he whakakata a Chris? Ko koe. I toa." He pono, i kī ētahi e tūmanakohia ana aua kōrero whakakatakata. "Me maumahara i ngā wā katoa he āhuatanga o te whakatūpato i roto i te kōhua a Rock," ko te tuhituhi a Gene Denby o NPR. I te haerenga o te monologue, ka haere tonu nga hangarau, ka waiho ētahi ki te miharo mehemea ka kotahi te tuhipoka o te ngahau a Rock. "Tērā pea ka whakahuatia @chrisrock IA kōrero ki a #OscarsSoWhite i tētahi āhuatanga?" ko te tuhituhi a Pat Kiernan o NY1. I kī ētahi he tohutohu pea tēnei mahi. "Mēnā kei te mārire koe, ā, tērā pea ka mahue i ētahi o ēnei hangarau, KOIA TĒNĀ TE TAKE," ko te tuhituhi a Te New York Times' Dave Izkoff. Te āhua nei i whakaae te katoa ki te whakapā atu ki te kaiwhakaari Clueless, a Stacey Dash. I kōrero tūmatanui a Pīhono, he pango, ki ngā whakahē, ā, i huatau kia whakahōrite kē te tangata i ngā whakaaturanga pēnei i ngā Tohu NAACP me ngā Tohu BET, e whakaatu ana i ngā kaitapere tae. I mauria poto mai ia e Rock ki runga i te atamira, ka whakaingoatia ia ko te kaiwhakahaere o te hōtaka torotoro iti o Oscar. Kāore ētahi tāngata i whiwhi. Engari kāore te hunga i kata. "Ko wai i whakaaro he ariā pai tēnā?" i tuhituhi a Kōrero Stelter Rock o TNN i whiwhi kōeke tiketike mō te kōrero i te tautohetohe i a ia e pupuri tonu ana i te mārama o te oro - ahakoa ko ētahi tāngata ahakoa he nui rawa tana arotahi ki ngā kaitapere pango, ehara i ētahi atu rōpū kāore i te mōhiotia. "He aha i tohutoro tonu ai a Pirihi Rock ki ngā tāngata pango me te mea ehara #OscarsSoWhite i te kore whakaaturanga [tāngata tae], ehara i te hunga pango anake?" te pātai a Franchesca Ramsey o te Whakaaturanga Pō Engari i te mutunga o te pō, kua toa a ia i te nuinga o ngā kaimātakitaki. "Tērā ētahi hēnga mārire, engari kāore a Pirihi Rock i tuku i ngā kaimātakitaki kia wareware i te take o te rerenga kētanga," ki te tūtohu i te rōpū mātauranga Feminist Frequency, nāna i kī kua waitohu a Rock i te aorangi mā te kī "Black Lives Matter".

title: Ka toa te Kaunihera o Walsall i te pakanga o te Kōti Tiketike o nga Urupa Mohimana
summary: Kua ngaro te pakanga o te Kōti Tiketike i tētahi tangata Mohimana nāna i kī i takahia ōna mana tangata e te whakakore a te kaunihera ki te whakaae i tētahi tapa māpere huri noa i te urupa.
text: I whakakāhoretia a Atta Ul-Haq ki te tāuta i te ārai ki runga i te urupa o tōna pāpā i Streetly Cemetery i Walsall. I kī a ia ko tana hāhi he Mohimana Barelvi i whakakore i ngā tāngata e haere ana i runga i ngā urupa, engari i kī te kaunihera he "tairongo" tana urupare. Kua kī te rōia a Tēnā Ul-Haq e whakaaro ana a ia ki te tono i te whakahaere. I tautohetohe a Tēnā Ul-Haq i te whakakore a te kaunihera ki te tuku i a ia ki te whakatū i te tapa 4in (10cm) i takahia tōna mana ki te whakamahi i tana hāhi, e ai ki te Tuhipānui 9 o te Whakaritenga o Ūropi mō ngā Motika Tangata. I tautāwhi te Kaunihera o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rohe o Te Rohe o Te Whenua o Te Wānanga o Te Rūnanga o I kī hoki kāore e taea te whakanoho i ngā hiahia o Tēnā Ul-Haq me te kore tūkino i ngā mana o ētahi atu Pirihitini. I rongo nga kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike i ngā tohenga e rua i a Hakihe, a, ka whakahokia ta rātau whakahaere i tēnei rā, ka ākiritia te wero a Tēnā Ul-Haq. I whakamutua e rātau kua "mahi ngā rangatira kaunihera i runga i tētahi huarahi e tika ana" me te kī i ngā mea i whakatauria e te kaunihera i roto i tō rātou "tawhē whakawa". 'Tino matekiri' i kī te rōia a Tēnā Ul-Haq, a Natalia Kāria, e hiahia ana a ia ki te kawe i tana take ki te kōti pīra. I kī a ia he "nui ake te painga tūmatanui ki te iwi Mohimana". I kī a Mehboob Matloob, nāna i whakarite he whakahē i waho o te Kaunihera o Aotearoa 2016, i "tino matekiri" a ia ki te whakahaere. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: Kua tanumia hoki te tuakana o Tāne Matloob ki te urupā o Streetly, ā, i kī ia kua pakaru nga pari o tōna urupa. "Kāore au e kite me pēhea e taea ai e rātau te whakatika," tana kī. I kī te kaunihera i "koa" ki te whakahaere, e kī ana i ōna ture urupā "kaua e whakahāwea ki tētahi tangata, hapori rānei, ā, e tika ana, e tika ana." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Handling of 'kill threat' 91-year-old Highland man flawed
summary: Kua whakahē tētahi kaitiaki i a Pirihimana Pākehā mo tana mahi ki tētahi tangata 91 tau e kiia ana kua whakawehi ki te patu i tētahi whanaunga.
text: I whakatūria e nga āpiha patu te kaitiaki i roto i tana motokā i te A9 tata ki Inverness i te 14 o Whiringa o Whiringa i tērā tau. Kātahi ia ka puritia mo te tata ki te ono haora i mua i te tukunga atu me te kore utu. I kī te Komihana Pirihimana me te Komihana Arotake a John McNeill he "hinganga nui" i te āhua o te whakahaeretanga o te kēhi. I kī a Pirihimana Pākehā i kitea te putanga o te pūrongo a Prof McNeill, ā, i kī kua tukua ki te tiaki i te tangata. I roto i tētahi waea 999, ka kī tētahi whanaunga o te tangata 91 tau e haere ana te kaitiaki ki tōna kāinga i Ross-shire me te whakaaro ki te whakamate i a ia. Ka kī atu te kaiwaea ki nga pirihimana e whakapono ana ia he tika te tuma, ā, ka whakapae ka taea pea e te kaitiaki te pupuri i ngā pū. He whakangungu tāpiri i muri tata iho, ka whakatūria te kaitiaki e ngā āpiha i roto i ngā waka urupare patu e toru i te A9 i Daviot. Tokowhā nga āpiha i tohu atu i a rātau pū ki a ia, i mua i tana hereheretanga, a, ka mauria ki te teihana pirihimana o Inverness. I puritia a ia mo te tata ki te ono haora i runga i te whakapae i te mahi tuma hara i mua i te tukunga atu me te kore utu. I kī a Prof McNeill he "hē nui me ngā hinganga" i roto i te whakahaeretanga o taua āhuatanga. I kitea e ia "kāore he take tika hei pupuri i taua tangata" hei whakapae mō te mahi tuma hara, kāore i taea te whakaoti i ā rātou uiui, te whiwhi rānei i ētahi atu mōhiohio, whakaaturanga rānei. E whā ngā tūtohutanga i tukuna e ia, arā ko te arotake i ngā mahi a ētahi o ngā āpiha e pā ana me te whakarato whakangungu tāpiri ki ngā āpiha i roto i te tautāwhi, te tiaki me te tiaki i ngā herehere. I kī tana pūrongo kāore i kitea e ngā pirihimana he mōhiohio hei tohu kua hara te pakeke 91 tau, hei tautoko rānei i ngā whakapuakitanga tōmua a tōna whanaunga. I te tūnga o nga pirihimana i te kaitiaki, kaore rātau i whakamārama i nga take mo tana tautāwhi, ā, ka puritia ia i roto i ngā herehere mō te 17 meneti tae noa ki te taenga mai o ētahi atu āpiha ki te teihana pirihimana. 'Ngā kōrero tika' I kī te PIRC me haukotia te pakeke 91 tau e ngā āpiha e iti iho ana te kaha, ā, ko te tikanga kia tukua mai i tōna tautāwhi i tētahi "wāhanga tōmua rawa". I kī hoki a ia ko te haihana o te rūma whakahaere "kāore i te nui ngā mōhiohio, mōhiohio rānei hei whakapuaki i tētahi mahi patu" ā, kāore i rite ki te tohutohu ā-motu. I kitea hoki e te pūrongo kāore tētahi o ngā āpiha hāngai i whakarite kia tika te rapu i taua tangata i te tari pirihimana o Inverness, ā, i mahia e tētahi āpiha tautāwhi "ngā kōrero kāore i te tika" e pā ana ki ngā take tautāwhi. Ka kī te komihana: "I tēnei take, he nui ngā rahunga i roto i ngā tukanga pirihimana, ā, he maha ngā kitenga me ngā tūtohutanga ki ngā Pirihimana Pākehā ki te whakatau i ēnei take. " Kei roto i ēnei ko ētahi atu whakangungu mō ngā āpiha e pā ana ki te tautāwhi, te tiaki me te tiaki i ngā herehere, ā, ka roa te haere ki te whakaū i te iwi whānui paetata e mārama ana ngā āpiha pirihimana o Inverness me te ū ki te whakaritenga ā-ture kia mōhio ai ngā taurewa katoa ki ō rātou motika. "E whakaaro ana hoki ahau ka whai hua ētahi atu whakangungu mō ngā āpiha e mahi ana i te tūranga o te Rangatira Patu Tuatahi e pā ana ki te kohikohi mōhiohio, te pupuri pūkete me te whakataunga." I kī a Asst Ch Cons Bernard Higgins ka urupare katoa te tōpana ki te pūrongo me ngā tūtohutanga a te komihana. Mr Higgins said: "Police Scotland is committed to keep people safe and officers across Scotland continuously work to ensure the service we provide to our communities meets this commitment. " Kua tino nui te haere o ngā Pirihimana Pākehā i roto i ngā wāhi matua mai i te 1 o Āperira 2013 tae atu ki ētahi o ngā take i whakaarahia e te PIRC i roto i ā rātou tūtohutanga."

title: Ka whakapōhēhē a RAF Lakenheath mō te pūkenga oro 'pokanoa'
summary: Kua whakapārewa tētahi taunga rererangi i muri i te haerenga o tētahi o ana waka rererangi "ohorere", i waihangatia he pahū nui i rangona i runga i te whenua.
text: I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō RAF Lakenheath, i Te Wānanga, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i whakairi ki Twitter mō te rongo i te oro tata ki Watton i Norfolk. I whakaaturia e ngā rīpene rererangi te turituri i takea mai i tētahi waka rererangi F-15 e rere ana i roto i te 25 maire (40km) o te taone i te 17 o Āperira. Ka whakapārewa te kaikorero mo "ētahi whakararuraru" tērā pea i puta mai. Ka waihangatia he pūoro oro i te wā e whati ana te rererangi i te ārai oro, nā reira ka puta he ngaru pūngao tiketike. "Te āhua nei kua pōhēhē pea tētahi o a mātau waka rererangi, ā, kāore i mōhio i te wā o te rerenga," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Ka haere tonu mātou ki te whakatakoto i ngā rāhuitanga tere o te hau i roto i ngā kōrero rererangi kia kore ai tēnei e puta ā muri ake nei." Tata ki te 75 ngā pūkaha e noho ana i RAF Lakenheath, i tērā marama i pānuitia ai he whakaiti i ngā haora rererangi nā te mutunga o te wawao o Amerika.

title: I whiua a Kamaruzzaman o Bangladesh ki te mate
summary: Kua whiua tētahi kaiārahi tūturu o te rōpū ātete o Pākaratēhi, o Kiriata-e-Islami, e te rūnanga hara whawhai o te whenua.
text: I kitea he hara a Mātāmua i runga i te rima o ngā tatau e whitu o te whakamamaetanga me te kōhuru maha i mahia i te pakanga rangatiratanga o te tau 1971. I whakatūria te rūnanga i te tau 2010 ki te whakamātau i ngā tāngata e whakapaea ana ki te ngātahitanga. Kua tautuhia a Kamaruzzaman, nāna i whakakāhore i nga whakapae, a, i kī he whakahauhau tōrangapū tana whakawā. E kī ana a Jamaat e whakamahi ana te kāwanatanga i nga whakamātautau hai whāwhā i nga ngohe ātete i mua i te pōtitanga a tērā tau. Ināianei, e kī ana ngā rōpū motika ao whānui e taka ana te rūnanga i ngā paerewa o te ao whānui. Ko nga whawhai tiriti i roto i tētahi rūma kōti kōti o Kotahi, i whakawāteatia a Kamaruzzaman - te hēkeretari kaiāwhina o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o T I kitea he hara a ia ki te whakahaere i ngā mea i whakaahuatia e te ture ko tētahi o ngā wāhanga kotahi tino toto i roto i te pakanga rangatiratanga - ko te patunga o ngā kaiahuwhenua 120 neke atu rānei i te kāinga mamao ki te raki o Sohagpur, ā, i muri iho ka mōhiotia ko te "Kāinga o nga Pouaru". Tokotoru nga wāhine pouaru nā te patunga i whakaatu ki a Kamaruzzaman i te wā o tana whakawā. I whakaahuatia e rātau tana ārahi i nga hōia hōia o Hōia ki te kāinga, a, ka āwhina i a rātau ki te whakarārangi me te kawe i nga kaiahuwhenua. E kī ana a Koerere Saeed, i te kōti, i te āhua o Te Kōti, i te āhua o Te Kōti, ā, i te pānuitanga o te whakataunga ka tū a ia ki te whakapuaki ko te "whakawā hē". "E kore te hītori e muru i tētahi tangata," tana kī. "Mā te hītori e puru te katoa ki te tauranga." Na te pānuitanga o te whakataunga me te rerenga mate i āki ai te hākari mai i te huihuinga i huihui ki waho, e kī ana a Masud Kani o TE AO i Kotahi. I whakataua a Kamaruzzaman, e tata ana ki te 18 i te wā o te pakanga wehenga o Pākaratēhi, i a Aotearoa 2010, kotahi marama i muri i te hopukina i roto i tētahi kēhi hara motuhake. I whakapaea a ia he kaiwhakahaere matua o te al-Badr, he ope āwhina o te ope hōia i patua ai ngā hinengaro Takaia i te wā o te papā o te tau 1971. I puta mai tōna whakapae i tētahi wā whakamātautau mō te Pirimia o Hēkana Hasina, nāna i whakarite te mahi i ngā hara whawhai o te tau 1971 tētahi o ngā whāinga matua a tōna kāwanatanga. E kī ana ngā kaiwawao ka whāwhā noa iho te rerenga mate i tētahi āhuatanga kē i tētahi whenua i whawhai ai ngā pirihimana me ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Rūnanga i tēnei wiki ki ngā whawhai whakamate i nga tiriti o te pūmatua o Kotahi. Ko te rōpū hāmarara i muri i ngā whakahēnga - he wāhanga o Kiriata - e karanga ana ki te whakaurunga o ētahi atu ture ā-Rangi, ā, kua whakaaturia he ngāwari noa iho te nekeneke i ngā tau nui ki nga tiriti. Ko nga whakaaro i whakakāhoretia e iwa nga whika matua o Kiriata i waenganui i nga tāngata toko 12 i whakataua ki nga hara whawhai e te rūnanga whakawā. I ātete a Kiriata, te rōpū Rūnanga nui rawa o te whenua, ki te rangatiratanga o Takaia, engari e whakakāhore ana i tētahi mahi i roto i ngā hara whawhai i mahia e nga hōia o Pakitāne. Kua whakakāhore katoa te hunga i whakapaea ki nga hara pakanga nga whakapae ki a rātau. Ko nga whakaponotanga o ngā Māori tōmua tokotoru - tae atu ki te kaiārahi o Te Wānanga o Delwar Hossain Sayeedi, i whiua kia mate i te wā o Hui tanguru - i whakaoho i ngā whakahēnga i patua ai te tini o ngā tāngata. I whakatūria te rūnanga whakawā e te kāwanatanga i te tau 2010 ki te whakamātau i ngā Takaia e whakapaea ana ki te mahi tahi me ngā ope hōia i ngana ki te aukati i te whiwhinga o Pakitāne ki te Rāwhiti o mua kia kore ai e whiwhi i te rangatiratanga. Kāore i te mārama te nuinga o ngā tāngata i patua i te wā o te pakanga e iwa marama o te wehenga: ko ngā whika whai mana o Takaia e huatau ana ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e toru miriona i mate, engari e huatau ana ngā kaiwhaiwhai takitahi i te 500,000 te mate mate.

title: Ko te tauira o Rānōna ko Harry Uzoka 'i patua i runga i te kōtiro'
summary: I maripi tētahi tauira tāne ki te mate e tētahi atu tauira "kāore i angitu" ki a ia i runga i tētahi kōtiro, kua rongo te kōti.
text: I mate a Harry Uzoka, e 25, i runga i te papa i waho o tōna kāinga i Shepherd's Bush, ki te uru o Rāwāhi, i muri i tana okanga. Ko te patunga te hua o te tautohetohe i waenganui i te tūkino me George Koh i runga i te kōtiro a Tāne Uzoka, ka rongo te Old Bailey. E whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Koh, e 24, o York Way i Camden, i te kōhuru. I korerotia ki te Bailey Tawhito a Tēnā Uzoka i karangatia a Tēnā Koh "he kōrero" i runga i Instagram, ā, i whakaritea he whawhai i muri i te kitenga i kī a Tēnā Koh kua moe ki te hoa wahine tauira a Tāne Uzoka, o Ruby Campbell. I korerotia ki te hūri he "tautohetohe" i whakaritea ki Ollgar Road i Shepherd's Bush i muri i ngā rangatū waea me ngā karere i WhatsApp me Instagram. I honoa a Tēnā Koh e Merse Dikanda rāua ko Honatana Okigbo, e 24, ā, i tauria e Tēnā Uzoka tōna hoa noho ko Adrian Harper, ka korerotia ki te kōti. Engari i te haerenga mai o Tēnā Uzoka me tōna hoa me ngā pae dumbbell, e toru neke atu rānei ngā maripi i mauria e te rōpū a Tāne Koh, tae atu ki te machete, ka rongo te kōti. "Ehara i te mea uaua ki te mahi ko tēhea taha i toa. I nui ake te tokomaha o Uzoka rāua ko Harper, ā, he iti noa iho te wā e tū ana ngā pae ki ngā maripi," te kī a te rōia o Rārangi Horwell QC ki te whakarongo i te Mane. I whakaritea e te tīma a Tāne Koh kia "tino whara", tana kī. 'Te wawao i a ia anō' ka oma atu a Tēnā Uzoka rāua ko Tāne Harper i te mōhiotanga kua tūtaki rāua ki ngā maripi, engari ko Tēnā Harper anake i mawhiti, ka rongo te kōti. Ka kī atu te rōia ki te kōti, a Tēnā Koh, "he tauira hoki engari kāore i angitu ki a Uzoka", he "mea hiahia" ki a Tēnā Uzoka, engari ko taua "mīharo ki tētahi atu tauira, ā, kua huri tōna angitu ki te whakahawea". I korerotia ki nga kaiwhakawā i ngana a Tēnā Koh ki te muku i tana pūkete, a, ka tono ki tana kamupene waea pūkoro kia huri i tana tau. E toru rā i muri i te okanga, ka hoatu e Tēnā Koh ki ngā pirihimana, a, ka kī atu ki ngā āpiha kua mahi a ia i muri i tana "tukituki ki te whenua" e Tēnā Uzoka, ā, "kāore he whakaaro" ki te okaina i a ia ki te pouaka. I roto i tētahi kōrero kua whakaritea, ka kī atu a ia ki nga pirihimana: "I wehi ahau ka patua ahau e ia, ka whara nui rānei ahau. " I runga ahau i te papa i tana takanga mai ki runga ki a au. E mau tonu ana ahau he tika aku mahi i runga i nga āhuatanga." I korerotia ki te hūri kua tautohe a Tēnā Koh ki ngā whakapae e rua mo te whai maripi. E whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Okigbo, mai i Camden i te raki o Rāwāhi, i te kōhuru. E whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Dikanda, kāore he wāhitau pūmau, i te kōhuru, he machete i te 11 o Hānuere, a, he naihi i te 25 o Hānuere. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: Ka whakatuwheratia e ngā wharenui puta noa i UK ngā tatau ki te iwi whānui
summary: Neke atu i te 90 ngā wharenui puta noa i te UK kua whakatuwhera i o rātau tatau ki ngā manuhiri kia āhei ai ngā Pirihitini ki te "whakamārama i tō rātou whakapono i tua atu i ngā kupu matua whakarihariha".
text: I kī te Kaunihera Mohimana o Ingarangi e tūmanako ana ka whakaaturia e te rā tūwhera o te Rātapu te kotahitanga i roto i "tētahi wā uaua mō ngā hapori whakapono". E toru nga wā i uru ai te maha o nga wharenui i tēnei tau ki tērā tau, e kī ana. Tata ki te toru miriona ngā Pirihitini - tata ki te 5% o te iwi whānui - ā, e 1,750 ngā wharenui i te UK. Ko ngā wharenui i roto i te rā tuwhera ko ērā i Rāwāhi, i Birmingham, i Manchester, i Leeds, i Glasgow, i Kānata me Belfast. 'E kōrero ana i ngā āwangawanga' Ka puta mai te Rā Haere ki Taku Wharenui i muri i te hīkoi ngū o ngā kaitautoko o te nekeneke anō o Pegida i te Hātarei. I kī te korero kōrero o te take whakapono o te HAU, a Caroline Wyatt, he iti iho i te 200 ngā tāngata i puta ake, engari ko te whakahē he tohu o ngā āwangawanga i runga i a Islam e whāia ana te rā tuwhera ki te kōrero. Kua piki ake te maha o ngā whakaekenga ārai Mohimana i Rāwāhi mai i ngā whakaekenga i Parihi, me ngā rau i pūrongotia i tērā tau. 'He nui te mōhiotanga' Nā Emma Ailes, i te Pokapū Ahurea Āmāri i waenganui o Rānōna Ko te dome koura me te minaret o te Pokapū Ahurea Āmāri he tohu whenua whakaharahara, e tirotiro ana i roto i ngā rākau i te taha ki te uru o Regent's Park. Tērā pea ka kitea e te hunga e haere ana te kākano ātaahua e iri ana i runga ake i te rūma inoi nui o te wharenui - i tēnei rā i pōhiritia rātau kia haere ki roto kia tata atu ai te tirohanga. "I ngā wā katoa e kōrero ana aku tamariki mō te whare ina haere mātou i runga i te pahi," te kī a te kaiako o Berit Eis, 42, i haere mai me te tāne a Paora me a rāua tamariki ko Soren, e rima, me Ellen, tokowhā. "Kāore mātou e mahi i tētahi hāhi engari e noho ana mātou i roto i tētahi hapori rerekē, ā, e hiahia ana ahau kia mōhio rātou ki ngā hāhi rerekē. Ehara te mea nui i te whakapono, engari ko te whakaute." I rongo te pāpā me te tama Hurai a Rawiri rāua ko Joel Greenbury mō taua rā i roto i to rāua whare karakia, ā, i hiahia rāua ki te kite i ngā inoi o te ahiahi. "I think there's a lot of ignorance - people tend to not know about other groups," says David. "Hei wāhanga o tētahi atu hāhi iti i te UK, ka taea e au te pāhono ki tērā." E kī ana te kaiwhakahaere o te pokapū, a Dr Ahmed Al-Dubayan, e tūmanako ana ia he hipanga te takahanga ki te "whakawātea i ngā kapua" o te pōhēhētanga mo tōna whakapono. Ko te tuatahi, e kī ana a ia, ko te pōhēhētanga ko tēnei rā anake te rā e tuwhera ana ngā tatau o te wharenui ki ngā tauhou. "He pono, kei te tuwhera rātou i ia rā." I waenganui i ngā manuhiri i te rā tūwhera o te Wharenui o Regent's Park, ko Nadia Fattouki, e 21 me tōna hoa ehara i te Mohimana, ko Ben Chappell, e 26, ko ngā ākonga e rua. I kī a Natia i ētahi wā ka tūtaki a ia ki te kore mōhiotanga mo te Islam. "He wahine, ki te mau arai ahau, me whakamārama e au tēnā. Me whakamārama e au to mātau pātahitanga whakapono." Ko Olima Kama rāua ko tōna hoa ko Aisha Moriarty, i whakatupuria he Karaitiana, engari i tahuri ki a Islam i te tau kotahi ki mua, e koropiko ana rāua tahi i te wharenui. I kī rātau kāore rātau i tūtaki ki tētahi tūkinotanga mō tō rātou whakapono whaiaro, engari he mea nui kia pai ake te māramatanga o te tangata. "Ko ngā mea katoa e puta ana i roto i te pāpāho, he mōhiotanga. Ko te Islam e pā ana ki te rangimārie me te hari," te kī a Olima. I kī a Sajjad Amin, mai i te Wharenui o Khizra o Manchester: "Kei te whakatokona e mātou te mātauranga me te tukituki i ngā ārai mā te whakaae kia kite ētahi atu tāngata i ngā mahi a ngā wharenui i ia rā. " Ehara i te tauhohenga ki tērā [Islamophobia] - kua mahia tēnei e ngā wharenui i roto i ngā tau. Mēnā ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te maha o ngā wharenui e whai wāhi ana, ka taea e tātau te āwhina ki te tukituki i ngā ārai." I kī a Mehri Niknam, mai i te Tūāpapa Whakapono o Hohepa, he rōpū Hūrae-Hurai, i anga atu ngā Pirihitini ki tētahi uauatanga uaua ki te rongoā i ngā mōhiotanga mō te Islam. "E wehi ana te tangata i ngā mea kāore rātau i te mōhio, ā, ka waihangatia e ia ngā pūrākau kī tonu i ngā pūāhua whakamataku," tana kī, kātahi anō ka whakapakaritia e ngā "kararehe" o te Kāwanatanga Āmāri me ngā whakaekenga o Parihi o Whiringa ā-Rangi. I "taea, ka taea" te whakatau i tēnei kore mōhiotanga mā te mātauranga - engari ko te onus i runga i ngā Pirihitini ki te ārahi i te huarahi, ka kī a ia. He aha te mea e pā ana ki roto i te wharenui? Neke atu i te 2.5 miriona ngā Pirihitini i te UK, neke atu i te 1,500 ngā wharenui. Ko te wharenui he wāhi huihui mo nga inoi, ki te ako, ki te whakanui i nga hākari pēnei i a Ramadan. Ka taea hoki te whakamahi hei whare i ngā kura me ngā pūtahi hapori. Kimihia ētahi atu mea me te tūhura i ngā wharenui puta noa i te ao mā tā mātou kaiārahi pāhekoheko o TE AO iWonder: I roto i te Wharenui: He aha tāu e hiahia ana ki te mōhio?

title: Clash over Douglas house fire sprinkler row
summary: Kua pakaru tētahi haupae i te Motu o Tangata i runga i te whakakore a te kāwanatanga ki te pūtea i ngā tauhiuhi i roto i ngā whare tūmatanui.
text: E hiahia ana te Kaunihera o Douglas kia tāutatia ngā pūrere haumaru ahi ki ngā kāinga hanga hou - engari e whakapono ana me tutuki e te Tari Tiaki Pāpori te utu. I whakapaea e te kaiārahi a Rawiri Karaitiana te kāwanatanga o te "whakatakoto pūtea i mua i te haumarutanga". I kī a Martyn Quayle i tangohia e tana tari te haumarutanga ahi me te kounga hanganga "tino nui". Douglas Borough Council voted to make it a policy to install sprinkler systems in new-build public sector housing. Engari ka tautoko anake te kāwanatanga i ngā tāutanga e hiahiatia ana i raro i ngā ture whare, ā, ka kī atu ki te kaunihera me tutuki ngā utu o te whakatinana i tana kaupapahere. I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Karaitiana te āhuatanga he "tino whakakino", kātahi anō ka "kore te mana e whakaae ki te pūtea ā-mokatere o ngā pūnaha tauhiuhi". "Tērā pea he tokomaha atu ngā mema o te kāwanatanga i haere ki te mahi a te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Te Motu o Tangata i tērā tau, nāna i whakaatu ki te pānga whakairoiro e whakaora ana ngā pūnaha tauhiuhi, kātahi ka kore rawa te tari e tae ki tēnei whakamutunga tirohanga poto. " He āhua iti noa iho te utu o te tāuta i ngā pūnaha tauhiuhi i roto i ngā āhuatanga hanga hou - i te rohe o te £2,600 mō ia wae - ā, kei te pouri ahau, kei te whakamīharo hoki ahau kei te whakatakoto pūtea te tari i mua i ngā whakaaro haumaru." Kua tautohetohe te Tari Tiaki Pāpori i ngā whika, e kī ana ko te utu tāuta me te tiaki tae atu ki te £6,000 mō ia whare. Mr Quayle, social care minister, said: "I can assure Douglas Borough Council should any change in the building regulations take place my department is happy to revise our house building programme and costings appropriate. " E mōhio ana ahau kei te rapu te Kaunihera o Douglas Borough ki te whakahau i taku tari ki te utu i ēnei utu tāpiri nui i te wā e pēhi nui ana te moni a te kaihautū, ā, kāore he tono kia āwhina ki ēnei utu. "E tino nui ana taku tari ki te haumarutanga ahi me te kounga o te hanganga o ngā whare o te wāhanga tūmatanui."

title: Rare Harry Potter book auction at Edinburgh Oxfam shop
summary: Kei te hoatu tētahi putanga tuatahi o Harry Potter ki tētahi toa aroha o Etinitini ki tētahi hokonga ngū.
text: I ohorere nga kaimahi i te pātaka o Oxfam i Newington i to rātau kitenga i te rōrahi o Harry Potter me te Chamber of Secrets i waenganui i ngā koha. Kei waenganui i ngā taitara e 20 e tūmanako ana te aroha ka āwhina ki te kohi i ngā rau pauna mā te kawe mai i ngā tono mai i ngā mema o te iwi whānui me ngā kaikohi. Kei te whakahaeretia te hokonga hei wāhanga o te Bookfest ā-tau a Oxfam. I kī a Rawiri Hendrie, te kaiwhakahaere o te toa pukapuka o Oxfam, ko te tuarua tēnei o ngā wā i taka ai tētahi pukapuka Harry Potter ki ōna ringa. "I taku mōhiotanga tuatahi ki tētahi putanga tuatahi o te pukapuka tuatahi o Harry Potter i waenganui i ngā koha a te toa i tērā tau, i whakaaro ahau he kotahi te kitenga i roto i te oranga, engari ko te puta mai i tētahi atu he rite ki te uira e rua ngā wā," tana kī. "Ko ngā putanga tuatahi pono o ngā pukapuka o mua o Harry Potter e tino mōmona ana, nā reira ko te kimi i ngā pukapuka e rua i roto i te tau kotahi, he rongo tino mīharo, he rongo tino pai mō te whāinga a te toa kia kohi moni nui rawa mō ngā mahi whakahauhau a Oxfam." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tino pai hoki tēnei kape, nā reira e tino tūmanako ana ahau ka āwhina mai i ngā kaikohi nui." I whakaputaina tuatahitia a Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, koia te tuarua i roto i te rangatū rongonui a te kaituhi o Etinitini, o TE 2 o Hōngongoi 1998, nā reira ka tohu hoki te hokonga ngū i te rā whānau 13 o te pukapuka. Ka tukua te pikitia whakamutunga i roto i te māngai o Harry Potter, a Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2, a tērā wiki. Ka whakaaturia ngā pukapuka e tukuna ana i roto i te hokonga ngū ki ngā pātaka e toru o Etinitini o te aroha, me te tono e kati ana i te 17 o Hōngongoi. E whakanui ana a Bookfest i te pānga o te koha pukapuka, te hoko pukapuka rānei mai i Oxfam ki ngā oranga o te hunga rawakore puta noa i te ao.

title: Ka piki ake ngā hua panuku i te hokinga mai o te maia kiritaki
summary: Kua pūrongotia e Panuku he kaha te pikinga o ngā hua hāwhe tau i te nui ake o ngā utu whare me te whāngai whakaora ohaoha haere tonu ki te hokohoko o te whare.
text: E kī ana ko ngā hua tāke tōmua mō ngā marama e ono ki a Hōngongoi i piki te 19.3% ki te £324.2m, i whakaritea ki te £271.8m i te tau i mua. Ko te katoa o nga hokonga he 10.3% kaha ake i te tau kua hipa, i tapiritia e Next. I tipu te 16.2% ki te £694.3m mai i te £597.6m i te tau i mua. I piki ake ngā hokonga Hokohoko Panuku ki te 7.5% ki te £1,07bn mai i te £bn. I kī te kaihoko ko te pai ake o te whakahaerenga, te iti o ngā mokatere huamoni, te nui ake o te wātea o te nama, te iti iho o te whakahekenga utu i runga i te tiriti tiketike me te rangi raumati pai ake, i āwhina katoa ki te whakapai ake i tana mahinga hoko. "Anō hoki, kua āwhina tētahi mākete whare pai ake i tā mātou umanga kāinga," ka tāpiritia. Next said it expected pre-tax profits in 2015 to be between 11% and 17% higher at between £775m and £815m. E tohu ana i te tipu hoko o te 10% i te koata tuatoru me te 4% i roto i ngā marama e toru ki te Kirihimete. I whakaae te kaihoko ki tana tohu hoko mō te whā o nga koata "tērā pea ka āhua hāngai" engari i kī te tau e hiahiatia ana kia kitea i roto i te horopaki o te "mahinga hokohoko tino kaha i te koata whakamutunga i tērā tau". Ko ngā hea panuku he 2.58% i raro iho ki te 6980p i te tauhokohoko tōmua i te London Stock Exchange

title: Ko te kōrerorero tuihono i te mahi ka whiwhi i ngā kōnui mai i ngā rangatira
summary: E hiahia ana koe ki te noho hoa Facebook me tō pāhi? E whakaaetia ana rānei ki te Snapchat i ō hoa mahi i roto i ngā haora tari?
text: Nā Catherine LawsonBusiness reporter Well, kei te nui haere te rongonui o tēnei momo whatunga pāpori ā-tari hei huarahi mawhiti i te whakatoi o te īmēra rangatōpū. Ko ngā umanga e hiahia ana ki te whakaraupapa i ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ā-roto e huri ana ki ngā taupānga kōrerorero pēnei i Chatter, Slack me Yammer, tae atu ki ngā pūhara tūturu pēnei i Facebook. Ko te mākete mō ngā pūmanawa pāpori hinonga, e karangatia ana, ka nui ake i te $8bn (£5.3bn) i te tau 2019, mai i te $5bn ināianei, e ai ki te umanga rangahau Markets and Markets.
