Kua tata ki te 20 tau ngā ipurangiroto kamupene, engari ko te āhua rata pūkoro o te maha o ngā taupānga karere e rūrū ana i tēnei mokowā. I te Hānuere 2015, i whakakitea e Facebook tana pūhara whatunga pakihi hōu, Facebook at Work, ā, kātahi anō ka whakarewaina tētahi taupānga kōrerorero pāhono, Kōrerorero Mahi. Te āhua nei e hiahia ana te matua whatunga pāpori, me ōna kaiwhakamahi 1.5 miriona, ki te whārahi i te mākete rangatōpū, tae atu ki te ao tūmataiti. Kua hainatia e Facebook neke atu i te 300 ngā kamupene rerekē, tae atu ki Heineken, Lagardere me Hootsuite. 'Ahurea ngātahi' Ko te mahi nui rawa atu i pā mai ki te Royal Bank of Scotland, nāna i pānui i te mutunga o Whiringahora i muri i tētahi hōtaka kaihautū angitu ka whakataka atu i te Facebook at Work ki ngā kaimahi 100,000 katoa i te 2016. Engari he aha ai? Kevin Hanley, director of design at RBS says it's all about facilitating collaboration between different arms of the business. Ko Facebook at Work "he wae matua ki te taraiwa i tētahi ahurea pūataata ake, whakauru, ngātahi," tana kī. Ko ngā whakaaro i pāorotia e Julien Codorniou, te kaiwhakahaere o Facebook o ngā mahi pūhara ā-ao, e kī ana he nui ake te pūhara i te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero, he utauta e whakahaere ana i te hua. "E whakapono ana mātou he wāhi mahi whai hua ake te wāhi mahi tūhono," tana kī. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te tūhono i ngā kaimahi e toru miriona puta noa i te ao. He waea noa iho tāu e hiahia ana. "Kei te hoatu reo mātou ki te katoa." Facebook at Work functions in the same way as personal Facebook, and Mr Hanley says the familiarity explains its success at RBS. "We're finding there is no steep learning curve or training required. Ko te tikanga he nui ake te mokatere whakatamariki i ngā whakamātau o mua ki te mahi i tētahi mea ōrite," tana kī atu ki te HAU. Tāpirihia ngā painga o tōna taupānga pūkoro, e whakawātea ana i ngā kaimahi mai i ngā taupānga ā-papamahi, ā, kua kitea e TT te utauta kia "taea te whakamahi inamata". 'Matimati i runga i te mokowhiti' Ko tētahi o ngā take tino māia ki te whakamātau i ēnei huarahi mahi hōu ko te kimi i tētahi whiringa pai ki te uauatanga o ngā īmēra rangatōpū, ā, me anga atu, i ētahi wā ka tino nui. I whakatinanatia e te umanga pūmanawa kaute a Sage te tomokanga whakawhitiwhiti tuihono Chatter ki roto i tana umanga i Aperira 2015. E kī ana a Sandra Campopiano, te āpiha tāngata matua o te umanga, e 9,000 ngā kaupapa kua nekehia kētia i te īmēra ki "ngā karere hāngai, hopu, ngā rōpū me ngā wānanga tuwhera rānei." "We want our people to use channels that feel natural to them and which help them to be collaborative," she says. "Nā reira ko te pāpori tētahi o ngā kōwhiringa, otirā i roto i tētahi kamupene hangarau e tino mamati ana te tokomaha o ā mātou hoa mahi." E whakamārama ana a Andy Jankowski, te kaiwhakarewa o Enterprise Strategies, he umanga whakawhitiwhiti rangatōpū, ko te uara o ēnei whatunga pāpori hinonga hōu (ESNs) e takoto ana i tēnei kaha ki te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero māori, kōrerorero hoki. "Ka whakaaetia e rātou ngā kaimahi ki te tākupu, ki te pātai whakamārama, ki te tiritiri rānei i ngā wheako hei tautoko i ngā karere e whakawhitiwhiti ana," tana kī. "Mā te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero mā tētahi whatunga pāpori ā-roto e āhei ai koe ki te whai matimati i runga i te manawa o te whakahaere." Te matenga o te īmēra? Engari ko ēnei huarahi whakawhitiwhiti kōrero hōu e tino tātaki ana i te mutunga o te īmēra mahi? E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā o te pūhara whakahirahira he tikanga whakawhitiwhiti kōrero kotahi. I te nuinga o te wā kāore he huarahi pai o ngā kaituku ki te mōhio mēnā e hāngai ana, e mārama ana rānei ngā ihirangi o ā rātou karere. Ā, ka moumou wā ngā kaiwhiwhi ki te tātari i ngā īmēra kāore e hiahiatia ana e rātou te kite. "He tītohunga noa iho te nui o te īmēra i roto i ngā kaporeihana maha, nā reira kāore ngā kaimahi e pānui i ngā mea katoa e whiwhi ana rātou," te kī a Tēnā Jankowski. "Mā tēnei e waihanga i tētahi taiao e puta ai ngā kaimahi i te koromeke nā ngā īmēra kāore anō kia pānuitia." Nekehia ngā kōrerorero mai i te īmēra ki tētahi whatunga pāpori e taea ai e te tangata te kōwhiri, te waho rānei, ā, he tere te neke, he huarahi kitea ki te tiritiri mōhiohio me te whakaoti raruraru, e tautohe ana rātau. Ahakoa e whakaaro ana a Tēnā Jankowski ko te īmēra tonu te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te whakawhiti kōrero ki tētahi tangata, ki tētahi rōpū iti rānei, e whakaae ana ia kua tata pea te mutunga o te īmēra pāohotanga o te kamupene. E kī ana a Ms Campopiano "tērā pea ka kite mātou i te [īmēra] e mate ana, pērā i te waeatuhi." He moumou wā? Engari he pono ka tino whakapōrearea te whiwhi i ngā matohi karere mutunga kore me ngā whakahōutanga kōrerorero i roto i te taiao mahi, ā, ka iti iho, ehara i te teitei ake, te hua? E kore tātau katoa e whakawhiti ataata ngeru? Ko te tuarā, e tautohe ana a Tēnā Hanley rāua ko Ms Campopiano: ko te kaha ki te kōwhiri i ngā kōrerorero kāore i te hāngai e whakawātea ana i te wā. Ā, e kī ana a Tēnā Codorniou, ahakoa ka uru ngā kaimahi ki Facebook at Work tae atu ki te 50 ngā wā i ia rā, ko ngā kōrerorero e pā ana ki te mahi. Ko te mea, e whakapono ana a Tēnā Jankowski he tino whaitake pea ngā raraunga i hauhaketia e ēnei ngohe whatunga pāpori katoa mō ngā umanga. "Kei te whakamahi kē mātou i te tātaritanga whatunga pāpori me te pāpāho pāpori hei whakatau i ngā whakataunga mākete," tana kī. "Ka aha mēnā ka taea e mātou te whakahaere i te mana ā-rōpū o ngā kaimahi katoa kia pai ake ai ngā whakataunga pakihi i runga anō i ngā kōrerorero me ngā kitenga e tiria ana puta noa i tā mātou whatunga pāpori ā-roto?" Ko ngā āwangawanga haumarutanga Ko tētahi take e rua pea ngā whakaaro o ngā kamupene mō te whakamahi i ngā taupānga kāhua pāpāho pāpori mō ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ā-roto, ko te haumarutanga raraunga - kei hea, me te haumaru, kei te rokiroki tō kaiwhakarato ESN i ēnei kōrerorero rangatōpū tairongo katoa? Ko te tikanga o te whakakorenga a te EU i te whakaaetanga Safe Harbour, ko te tikanga kāore e taea e ngā kamupene te whakaaro kei te tuku ngā kaiwhakarato ratonga ā-US i ngā parenga tūmataitinga tika. Mēnā kei roto i a Mātau, ka hari koe ki te kāwanatanga o Amerika ki te tiki i ōna ringa ki runga i a rātou, e whakatara ana i te Ture Patriot? He mea tēnā hei kōrerorero - tuimotu pea. Whāia te kaiwhakatika Hangarau o te Pakihi @matthew_wall i Twitter

title: Hakopa Rees-Mogg: Wehewehea i roto i ngā tikanga i muri i te Brexit 'e kore e taea'
summary: Ko te wehewehenga i roto i ngā tikanga e whakahaere ana i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te toenga o te UK i muri i te Brexit e kore e taea, kua kī a Hakopa Rees-Mogg.
text: I te kōrero te Tūroro rongonui i tētahi takahanga hei wāhanga o te hui a te rōpū Rangatira i Birmingham. "Kāore he Conservative e mahi i tētahi mea hei tūkino i te uniana, ā, ko Aiarangi ki te Raki," tana kī. Kua puta mai te rohe o Airana hei take nui i roto i nga whakaritenga o Te Pakihi. Kua oati te Pirimia o Ēnā Me ki te wehe i te uniana tikanga o te EU me te mākete kotahi, engari i taua wā kāore i kī taurangi kia kaua e whakapakeke i te rohe. Ko te tikanga kāore he hanganga ōkiko hōu, ā, kāore he taki, he mana hōu rānei mō ngā tikanga, ngā paerewa hua rānei. Ko tana rongoā ko te Mahere Chequers, me tōna "rohe tikanga paheko" me te "hāngaitanga tonu" ki ngā ture EU mō ngā taonga me ngā ahuwhenua. Ko te Rōpū Rangahau Ūropi (ERG), e tūtakina ana e Hakopa Rees-Mogg, e hoki ana ki tētahi "Pakihi-wehenga mā". E kī ana te ERG e karo ana tēnei mahere i te hiahia ki te whai i aua ture EU katoa. Kua karangatia e ia ngā taki tikanga whakaraupapa me te mahi tata atu i waenganui i Pētere me Tapiri ki te whakangāwari i ngā āwangawanga me te maunu. E whakapono ana te ERG ka taea te karo i tētahi taitapa mārō mā te whakamahi i te hangarau "tūturu" me te "whakarerekē" i ngā whakaritenga tīariari. E whakapono ana a Tēnā Rees-Mogg he rongoā mō te rohe o Kīriria "mā te whakaaro o tētahi tangata tika e tutuki ana i ngā whakaritenga o ngā māharahara o te Uniana o Ūropi ki te mākete kotahi". I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi takahanga tapawhā hei wāhanga o te hui a te Rōpū Rangatira i Birmingham i te pō Rātapu ka kī a Tēnā Rees-Mogg: "Ko tōku whenua ko Te Hononga o Ingarangi, ā, ehara tēnei i te mea e pā ana ki te DUP e tautoko ana i ngā Tohutohu. ' He wāhi nui o tōku whenua pērā i a Somerset' "Koinei tōku whakaaro, he pēhea hoki te whakaaro o te nuinga o ngā Tohutohu i tō rātou whenua, he pēhea tā rātou whakamārama?" "Ko mātau te rōpū Conservative me te Unionist, kāore he Conservative e mahi i tētahi mea hei tūkino i te uniana, ā, kei roto hoki i a Aiarangi ki te Raki. " He wāhi tēnei o tōku whenua pērā i a Tara, ā, kāore e taea e au te kōrero i tētahi mea nui ake i tērā nā te mea ko Taraiwa te pokapū o te ao nui i roto i tētahi arotakenga tika," tana tāpiri mai. I a ia e kōrero ana i te ata Mane, ka kī te Tumuaki o Piripi Hammond he tino matatini ngā whakaritenga i runga i te rohe o te Pākehā, ā, e tika ana kia kōrerorerotia ngā taipitopito ki te EU.

title: E kī ana a John Leslie i ngā whakaaro whakaekenga wahine 'heahea'
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e te kaiwhakaatu o Pita Kikorangi o Mua, a John Leslie, he "heahea" me te "whakarihariha".
text: I te hoatu whakaaturanga i tana whakawātanga i te Kōti Karauna o Southwark, ka whakakāhore te pakeke e 55 tau ki te hopu i ngā uma o te wahine i tētahi rōpū Soho i te tau 2008. I mua ake, ka kī tētahi hoa o te tūkino whakapae kua whakapārewa te hoa o Tēnā Pirihitini mo tōna whanonga i muri iho. Kua whakakāhore a Tēnā Leslie i te whakapae mo te whakaekenga ā-waha. I ngā tau i mua i te mahi whakapae, ka kī atu a ia ki nga kaiwhakawā, kua whakaputaina ia i roto i te pēhi nūpepa he "taniwha whakatuki, tōnā". I tana hoatu whakaaturanga, ka kī a ia: "He porangi noa iho te ariā ka mahia e au, otirā ko te āhua o taku mahi i ngā mea katoa e haere ana. " I paranoia ahau, i mōhio ahau, i mōhio hoki ki ngā wāhi katoa i noho ai ahau. "Ki te haere ki tētahi tauhou kāore anō ahau kia tūtaki ki te mahi i tēnā he mea whakarihariha noa iho." "Ka kī atu ahau 'kia ora', kua kōrero ahau ki a ia. Kaore ahau e pā atu ki a ia pēnei i tētahi mannequin, a, ka haere atu." I rongo hoki te hūri i te whakatakanga o ngā whakapae wahine motuhake ki a ia i te tau 2003. 'Tino mīharo' I te toru o nga rā o te whakawātanga a Tēnā Pirihitini, ka kī te hoa o te kaiwhakapae kua haere a ia ki te rōpū i te 5 o Hakihe, ā, ahakoa kāore a ia i maumahara ki te kite i tētahi tūkinotanga, ka whakaahuatia e ia tāna i mahara ai ki "te mutunga mai". "Kāore i rerekē te āhua o Hoani," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu, kāore e taea te mōhio mō ngā take ā-ture. "I tino manawawera tonu a ia, i tino hari hoki ki reira, engari te āhua nei he neke ohorere o te hauora mai i [te kaiwhakapae]. " A, tata tonu te whakaponokore me te āhua o te whakaaro whakarihariha." I kī te kaiwhakaatu i tētahi wahine i te hākari, i whakapono a ia tērā pea he hoa tawhito o Tēnā Pirihi, ka whakatata atu ki a ia ā muri ake i te ahiahi, a, ka whakapārewa mo tōna whanonga. Ka kī atu te kaiwhakaatu ki te hūri: "Ko te mea nui, 'aroha mai ki a Hoani, kei te tino hiahia a ia ki konei, kua roa te wā mai i tana haerenga ki tētahi hākari pēnei, ā, i ētahi wā ka tino hiahia a ia, ā, ka haere ki runga'." E whakapae ana te kaiwhakapae i hopu a Tēnā Leslie i ōna uma, a, ka kata i muri tonu i to rātau rūrū ringa. Ka haere tonu te whakawā

title: Cardinal Keith O'Brien 'did a lot of good'
summary: Kua whakamihi te māngai o te Pāpā i te UK ki te mahi a Katinara Keith O'Brien.
text: I kī a Papal Nuncio Antonio Mennini, ahakoa i hē ia, he nui te mahi pai a te katinara mō te hāhi. I whakarerea a Katinara O'Brien i te wā o Hui tanguru i muri i te toru o nga tohunga me tētahi tohunga o mua i whakapae i te whanonga hē i nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Mai i tērā wā ka mahue i a ia a Pākehā mo te "whakahoutanga wairua, te inoi me te penitene". I kī te Papal Nuncio "ahakoa tōna hē" i mahia e te katinara "he nui te pai mo te hāhi". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore e taea e tātau te whakawā i te katinara anake mō ēnei mahi tino nui, nā te mea he pango me te mā i roto i ia tangata, he tōrunga, he tōraro tātau." I kī a ia e tūmanako ana ka whakatūria he whakakapinga ki a Katinara O'Kōrero hei Pīhopa Pīhopa o Hato Anaru me Etinitini a tērā marama. Tokotoru ngā pīhopa i kī a ia he manakē te kimi i tētahi whakakapinga mō te hāhi. Ka whakatūria hoki ngā pīhopa ki te whakakī i ngā tūranga wātea i Paisley me Dunkeld i te mutunga o te raumati, ka tāpiritia e ia. I tēnei wā, e toru anake ngā pīhopa o te Hāhi Katorika e mahi ana i ōna pihopatanga e waru. Ko Katinara O'Brien te minita Katorika Roma matua rawa o Ingarangi tae noa ki tana tūnga hei Pīhopa Pīhopa o Hato Anaru me Etinitini.

title: Stephen Crabb: Ka taea e ngā Conservatives te tuku i ētahi atu AM i te 2016
summary: Ka taea e ngā Tohutohu te tuku i ētahi atu AM i te pōti whakaminenga o tērā tau i muri i te angitu o te pōti nui, kua kī te Hēkeretari o Welsh.
text: I kī hoki a Stephen Crabb e noho ana a Labour i roto i te mana "pōti i muri i te pōti" "ehara i te mea hauora". I tukuna e nga Tohutohu a rātau hua tino pai mai i te tau 1983 i tēnei tau i to rātau hokinga mai i ngā MP Welsh e 11 ki Westminster. I tēnei wā, ka kī te kaiārahi Welsh o te Rōpū Kākāriki, o Pippa Bartolotti, e toru nga tūru ā rohe e hāngai ana rātau. I kī atu a Tēnā Pāpaka ki a Te Reo Irirangi o Uēra i "ngā take katoa kia tūmanako, kia ngākau māia" mō te pōti whakaminenga. 'Whakahau mīharo' I kī atu a ia ki te hōtaka Tāpiri Rātapu: "Ka haere mātou ki tērā me tētahi rautaki tino mārama. " Kai roto mātau i te ngākau pai hai Welsh Conservatives. He tīma tino pai tā mātou o ngā kaitono whakaminenga, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau he whakahau tino mīharo tēnei. "Ka tino āta tirohia te pūkete a Labour i runga i te kāwanatanga o Welsh mō ngā tau e 16 kua taha." I kī a Tēnā Pāpaka kāore e taea e te rōpū te waiho te "āhuatanga a Jeremy Corbyn" engari ka arotahi ki ngā take Welsh me Welsh Labour. 'Up for the fight' The Green Party's leader in Wales, Pippa Bartolotti, told BBC Wales' Sunday Politics Wales programme the party is confident to gain its first seats. I whakaahuatia e ia te Pōti Nui o tēnei tau hei "whakaharatau kākahu" mō te pōti o Me a tērā wā, me te nui o te "moenga" o ngā kaitono hou. E hāngai ana te rōpū ki ngā tūru ā-rohe o waenganui me te uru, ki te tonga o Wales waenganui, ki te tonga hoki o Wales ki te hauauru. "Kāore he tangata e kī ana he ngāwari noa iho, engari kei runga mātou i te whawhai, kei runga mātou i te wero," tana kī.

title: 'Ngā pō moe e tatari ana ki ngā Paraire tūpāpaku'
summary: Ko ngā hoa e tatari ana ki ngā whiu i te whare herehere o al-Hair i Riyadh, kāore a Arapia e moe i te Rāitema i te taenga mai o te Paraire.
text: "Kāore i taea e au te moe i te pō katoa inanahi," te kī a DD Ranjith de Silva, he Hiri Rānaka i whiua kia mate e ngā mana motuhake o Hauri. I karangatia e ia a BBC Sandeshaya (BBC Sinhala) i tētahi ata Paraire mai i tōna pūtau whare herehere i te rohe No.9 i a au e tae ana ki te mahi. "I ia Paraire, ka mahia ngā panenga me ngā tapahi i mua i ngā herehere katoa. Mō ngā marama, kāore anō mātou kia moe i ngā Tāite i te mea kāore i te mōhio ko wai te tūpāpaku panuku." Kāore i rite ki Sri Lanka, e whakaaetia ana ngā hoa ki te whakamahi waea i Hauti Arapia mēnā he moni tā rātou hei utu i ngā wāhi waea. Ko te tautohe a PM e toru nga Rānaka o Hiri EJ Victor Corea, i whiua a Hainath Pushpakumara me de Silva ki te mate mo te mau i nga ringa ahi me te whakawehi i nga tangata whenua. E whakaae ana te tokotoru ki nga whakapae, engari e mau tonu ana kāore e whiua te hara ki te mate. "Kāore te kāwanatanga o Sri Rānaka i homai he āwhina ā-ture ki a mātau ina hiahiatia. I to rātau urunga, kua tōmuri rawa." I kī a Ranjith de Silva i kōrero a ia ki te Pirimia o Mahinda Kāripakse, nāna i kī taurangi kia mahi i "ngā mea katoa e taea ana" hei whakaora i o rātau ora. "E whakapono ana mātau ki te Pirimia. Kai te kaha hoki te mahi a nga kaiwhakahaere o te kāwanatanga ināianei. Engari kāore anō kia tukuna atu te karere ki Tōna Rangatira te Kīngi, kei a ia te kōrero whakamutunga." I kī ngā rōpū HR o De Silva kāore i a rātau te whakamātautau tika nā te kore whakaaturanga ā-ture. I tonoa e ia ngā rōpū motika tangata pēnei i te Amnesty International (AI) me te Komihana Motika Tangata o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao kia tohe i nga mana o Hauti kia whakaora i o rātau ora. E kī ana a De Silva kāore rātau i te tono whakawāteatanga, engari he whiu tika mo te hara e tohungia ana o rātau ora. "Kia 25 tau. At least our loved ones would know we'll be coming home any day." Ka whakahē te kaiwhaiwhai motika tangata i te āhua o te kāwanatanga e kī ana ka whakaorangia e te raweke a Perehitini Kumaratunga nga oranga o nga tāngata tokotoru o Hiri Rānaka. "Ko a mātau uiui ki ngā mahi a te pūnaha o Arapia e mārama ana mēnā ka puta mai he tono mai i te upoko o te āhua o te whenua e noho ana ngā herehere, ka whakarongo nui ki ngā mana tiketike o Arapia," te kī a te Komihana Motika Tangata o Āhia (AHRC) i roto i tētahi kōrero. I mua, ka hoatu e nga kaiwhaiwhai me nga whanaunga i arahina e te whetū kiriata o Ranjan Ramanayake he petihana ki te Pirimia i Colombo. I kī a PM Kāripakse e mahi ana te kāwanatanga mo to rātau tukunga i mua tonu i te tūtakitanga a nga kaiwhakahaere ki a ia. I kī a Ramanayake ko te Te Tari Mahi Tawahi (FEB) me whai wāhi ki te whakapae mo te raruraru o nga tāngata e toru o Hiri Rānaka.

title: Ko te tumera teitei rawa o Sellafield hei wetewete
summary: Ka wetewetehia te hanganga teitei rawa o Sellafield i roto i tētahi "mahi mārire" e mau ana i ngā tau maha.
text: I hangaia te tumera 200ft (61m) i ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rima ki runga i tētahi tipu tukatuka papa 11 i te pae karihi. Kua kore e tutuki i ngā paerewa hoahoa o nāianei, ā, me whakawātea, engari nā tōna tauwāhi, me whakahaere te whakamahinga o ngā pakū. Engari, ka hangaia he pūhara, ā, ka wetewetehia e ngā taiepa te hanganga nui mai i runga. Me tango e rātau te 600 tāhei raima, neke atu i te 25 tāhei tīra poapoa. I kī a Matthew Hodgson, te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa: "Ko te mahi o te whakaheke i te tāpae he mahi mārire hei whakarite i te haumarutanga 100% o ngā kaimahi katoa me ngā tipu karihi e karapoti ana. " E mārama ana kāore e taea te whakangaro taketake mā te whakamahi i ngā pakū, nō reira ka whakamahia e mātou tētahi pūhara piki whaiaro mātauranga e whakaheke ai i te tumera i runga i te āhua whakahaere. "Ka hangaia he tāruarua iti o te tumera tapered hei whakamātau i te tikanga i te nui o te diameter o te tumera i raro iho i a koe e heke ana, nā reira me nui ake te rahi o te pūhara. " Ka whakamahia tētahi pūnaha tapahi waea taimana motuhake hei tango i ngā wāhanga nui o te hanganga raima me te kōrere konganuku o roto. "Me whakaheke katoa ēnei ki te pūtake o te tāpae hei aroturuki i mua i te whiu." I kī a Steve Slater, te upoko o te whakakorenga: "Ka puta me te tawhito, me te hou, me te tāpae hou o te Separation Area Ventilation (SAV) hou. " Kei te haere tonu te mahi ki te hanga i taua tāpae whakakapinga hou." Kua tīmata te wāhanga tuatahi o te mahi, ki te tāuta i tētahi hiki mahi me tētahi hanganga arawhiti tuanui, e āhei ai te uru ki te pūtake o te tumera.

title: E tātaki ana ngā kōnae Cambridge Analytica i ngā tohutohu pōti
summary: Ko ngā tuhinga i tiria e te kaipānui o Cambridge Analytica, ko Christopher Wylie, e tātaki ana i te āhua o te kamupene matua SCL Group ki te whakaawe i ngā pōti puta noa i te ao.
text: E pā ana hoki tētahi reta ki tana tautoko i ngā mahi ā-hinengaro e 15 e pā ana ki te Manatu Arotahi o UK i te Hānuere 2012. E whakahuatia ana te Tari Tawahi me te kī i tētahi atu wāhanga o SCL he "hari ki te mahi" i runga i tētahi mahi whakamataku. E pā ana hoki ngā kōnae ki ngā mahi i mahia mō Māngai Bolton i runga i ngā pōti a Amerika. Te āhua nei he tohutoro tēnei ki a John Bolton, te karere o mua o Amerika ki te UN. Kātahi anō ia ka whakatūria hei Kaitohutohu Haumarutanga ā-Motu a Perehitini Pu. I pūrongotia e te Kaitiaki tōna whakauru ki tētahi whakamātautau Cambridge Analytica hei ūnga i ngā ataata YouTube ki ngā kaipōti kōtaha o Amerika. Kai te rama te tohutohu tōrangapū i muri i ngā pūrongo i whakaemi i ngā raraunga o ngā miriona kaiwhakamahi Facebook me te kore whakaaetanga, ā, ka whakamahia tēnei i roto i ngā whakahau tōrangapū. Kua kī te umanga kua "whakangaromia e ia" ngā mōhiohio i te tono a Facebook, ahakoa kua pūrongotia e Channel 4 News kei te rere haere tonu ngā tārua o tētahi wāhanga o te taonga. "E tino nui ana tā mātou whakaaro ki ngā mahi tōtika i mua e tā mātou tohutohu tōrangapū o mua (ehara i te US), ā, i tēnei wā ko rātou te kaupapa o tētahi tūhuratanga katoa, takitahi hoki kua whakakīa e mātau ki te whakatū i ngā take," te kī a Cambridge Analytica i roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i te Tūtira. "Ka whakawāteatia ōna kitenga i te wā e tika ana." 'Wheako ao whānui' I whakaputaina ngā kōnae e te Komiti Mamati, Ahurea, Pāpāho me te Hākinakina o UK. Ka whakamāramatia e rātou ētahi o ngā mahi e mahia ana e Cambridge Analytica me ngā kamupene kua honoa ki a ia, tae atu ki te Rōpū SCL, te Rangahau Pūtaiao Huri noa me te IQ Rōpū. I kōrero a Tēnā Wylie ki ētahi o ngā tuhinga i tōna āhua i mua i te komiti i te Mane. I roto i tētahi tuhinga, ka kī a SCL he pai ake pea te whakahauhau i ngā tāngata "kia kaua e pōti" i te ngana ki te whakahauhau i ngā kaipōti tārere. Mā te whakaahua i ana mahi i roto i tētahi pōti o Rīria, ka kī a SCL Global kua tohutohu "kaua e ngana ki te whakahauhau i ngā kaipōti tārere kia pōti mō ā mātou kiritaki, tērā pea ko tētahi rautaki pai ake ko te whakapati i ngā kaipōti ātete kia kaua e pōti". 'Ngā renarena iwi' E kī ana kua tutuki tēnei mā te "whakarite i ngā tohutohu ārai pōti i te rā o te pōti i roto i ngā pā ātete" me te whakamahi i "ngā whika whakapono paetata hei whakamōrahi i ta rātau tono i waenganui i ngā hapori wairua, ā-taiwhenua". I whakamanamana ia ki te whakatakoto i tētahi whakahau tuhituhi tōrangapū hei waihanga i tētahi "nekeneke" taitamariki i Trinidad me Tobago, me te whakaputa i "ngā karere whakahau, i a ia e puta mai ana i te taitamariki, kāore i te mōhiotia ki tētahi rōpū tauwhāiti". E kī ana ko te hua "i waihangatia he nekehanga taitamariki kotahi". I Rāwhia, e kī ana kua mōhio ko "ngā tautohetohe iwi kāore i te kōrerotia" "i te ngākau o te pōti". "I whakapae puku nga tangata whenua i nga Rūhia mo te tāhae i a rātau mahi... rāhuitia ki tēnei mōhiotanga, i taea e SCL te whakaata i ēnei take tūturu i roto i te karere a tana kiritaki," te kī a te tuhinga. Ka tātakina e ngā kōnae he pēhea te āwhina a SCL i te Tari Ā-Rohe me te Kotahitanga o UK "i roto i te whakaritenga rautaki ki te ātete i te toa taikaha" i Pakitāne. "E kore ahau e tūtohu noa iho i a rātou, ka mahi anō ahau ki a rātou i te wā poto," ko te tuhituhi a tētahi mana, kua whakawāteatia tōna ingoa.

title: Deepcut: E tono ana a Liberty ki te uiui tūmatanui ki te tūkino i te pātene
summary: Kua karangatia e te rōpū motika tangata o Liberty he uiui tūmatanui ki te tūkino ā-tinana, ā-waha hoki i te whare taua o Deepcut i Tara.
text: E kī ana he tokomaha nga hōia o nāianei, o mua hoki i hoatu he kōrero mo te mamae i te tutu, i te tūkino rānei i reira. Nō nā tata nei i whakataua e te koroni te matenga o Pte Cheryl James, 18, he whakamate i a ia, ā, i whakahē i ngā paerewa oranga o te taua. I kī a Liberty kua whakaaturia e te uiuinga a Pte James tētahi ahurea "paitini, taikaha, tōnā" i te pārekareka. I kī hoki ētahi atu pūkete tūkino i te puni i puta mai i roto i ngā pakipūmeka e rua o nā noa nei, Deepcut - te Whakamā o te Taua, me te Wiki i te Wiki - Te Whawhai a te Whānau mo te Pono. Kua tuhituhi ki te Hēkeretari Whakangungu a Michael Fallon ki te tono uiui "mataiti, takitahi" mō ngā whānau o Privates James, Sean Benton me James Collinson - e toru i roto i ngā hōia taitama tokowhā i kitea kua mate i ngā motu pū i waenganui i te 1995 me te 2002. I tērā wiki ka tāpaetia e te tuakana māhanga o Pte Benton, a Tony rāua ko te tuahine o Tracey Lewis tētahi tono mō tētahi uiuinga hou ki ngā āhuatanga e karapoti ana i tōna matenga. I kī a Liberty e mahi ana hoki mō ngā kaimahi o Deepcut o mua, a Mark Harrison, e kī ana he tūkino a ia i te tūkinotanga me te taikaha, ā, ko Dan Griffiths, e whakapae ana i patua ia e tētahi kaiako taua. Ka kī a Tēnā Harrison: "Ko te tangata nāna tēnei i mahi ki a au i mōhiotia e te Taua he mōrearea ki te rangatahi nā te mea i mahi hara ia i mua i tana taenga mai ki Deepcut. " Na ana mahi i whakarerekē tōku oranga mo ake tonu atu, ā, kei te tino uaua tonu ahau i tēnei rā. "E hiahia ana ahau kia rangona, ā, e hiahia ana ahau kia whakapūmautia e kore tēnei e puta anō." I kī te pāpā o Pte James, a Des: "He maha nga tau i moumou ai te MoD ki te karo i tētahi uiui tūmatanui ki Deepcut, ā, ka whakakāhore i tētahi ahurea tūkino tae noa ki nā tata nei. " Tērā pea ka tātuhia e te uiui tūmatanui he raina i raro i tēnei poapoa pōuri i runga i te rongo o te Ope o Ingarangi." I kī a Liberty i te tau 2002-3 i whakahiatotia e ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana tētahi kōrero o te 118 "mahi tiaki me ngā take whakaweti", i te nuinga o Deepcut. I whakamutua e tētahi arotakenga takitahi i te tau 2006 e Nicholas Blake QC kāore he take mō tētahi uiui tūmatanui. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Manatu Arotahi: ""E whakapono ana mātou ki te hiranga o te pūataata mā tētahi tikanga e tino tika ana, ā, kāore anō mātou kia whakahē ki tētahi o ētahi atu uiuinga Deepcut i whakaarahia ki tēnei wā. " Heoi anō, kāore i te hiahiatia te arotakenga a Tā Nicholas Blake i tētahi uiuinga tūmatanui ki ngā āhuatanga i te whare o Deepcut, ā, i tiria tēnei tirohanga e te Komiti Whakangungu o te Whare o Ngātahi."

title: Great Get Together: Jo Cox event continues with social distancing
summary: Ka haere tonu tētahi mutunga wiki o ngā takahanga hapori hei whakahonore i te MP i kōhurutia a Jo Cox ahakoa ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus, kua whakaūngia.
text: I tīmata te Great Get Together i te tau 2017 ki te whakapakari i te whaikōrero a Batley me Spen MP e kī ana "he nui ake ngā mea e ōrite ana i tērā e wehe ana i a tātau". This year's take place next weekend in a "slightly different way", her sister Kim Leadbeater said. Kei roto i ngā takahanga he ratonga hapori whakapono maha me te tunu mariko. I te 16 o Pipiri 2016, i pūhia ētahi atu pūrākau mai i Aotearoa, a, i okaina i Birstall. I whakawāteatia a Thomas Mair mo tana kōhuru i muri mai i taua tau. The events held from 19-21 June will continue the ethos of neighbors, friends, and community members gathering to celebrate what they have in common, but complying with social distancing guidelines. I kī a Ms Leadbeater, he karere mō te Jo Cox Foundation: "I ngā marama tata nei kua kite mātou i tētahi urupare whakamīharo mai i ngā hapori huri noa i te UK ki te urutā Covid-19. " He whakamaumahara tēnei ki te huarahi a Jo, tētahi kua whāngaia e mātau i tōna tūāpapa, me arotahi mātou ki ngā mea e taea ana e mātou, kaua ki ngā mea kāore e taea e mātou. "Koia mātou i whakatau ai ka haere whakamua te Huihui Nui, ā, i ngā wā katoa e hāngai ana ki te hapori, - i tētahi huarahi rerekē noa iho." Ko ētahi o ngā takahanga i whakaritea huri noa i te UK ko tētahi ahiahi bingo tiriti i Llantwit, South Wales, me tētahi kaupapa hei tuku reta me ngā kāri ki ngā kāinga tiaki hei whawhai i te mokemoke i Harleston, Norfolk. I Rānana, ka huihuia mariko te huihuinga hapori ā-tau a te Bankside Open Spaces Trust i te 21 o Pipiri. Kei te mahi tahi te tūāpapa me Facebook, e whakarato ana i tētahi pūtea pūtea e £10,000 hei tautoko i ngā rōpū hapori. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka tukuna e ngā tauranga o Felixstowe me Harwich te tono mō te tūnga Freeport hōu
summary: E rua ngā tauranga o Te Tairāwhiti kua whakarewaina he tono tōtahi kia noho ko tētahi o ngā tauranga wātea e 10 o UK i muri i te Brexit.
text: Kua honoa te Tauranga o Felixstowe i Suffolk me Harwich International i Essex hei Freeport East. Mā te mahi Freeports a te kāwanatanga e āhei ai ngā kamupene ki te kawemai i ngā taonga, kātahi ka kaweake anō i waho o ngā ture tāke me ngā tikanga pūnoa. I kī a Hutchison Ports, nāna ngā tauranga o Suffolk me Essex, ka āwhina te tūnga ki te kawe mai i te "whakatupuranga hou mau tonu". I kī te kāwanatanga mā tana aronui Freeports e āwhina ki te whakahaere i te tupunga o Ingarangi mā te whakaraupapa i ngā tukanga whakarite hei āwhina i te whakawhanaketanga anō o te papa parauri; te tuku i tētahi mōkī āwhina tāke hei āwhina ki te whakahaere i ngā mahi, te tupu me te mahi hou; me te whakarato i ngā tikanga tikanga ngāwari. E tūmanakohia ana kia homai e ngā kaihoko he whakaaturanga me pēhea rātau e āwhina ai i te kāwanatanga kia tae ki ōna ūnga waro i te tau 2050. I kī a Clemence Cheng o Ngā Tauranga o Hutchison: "Me ngā pūkenga hangarau tōmua e haere tahi ana me te mahi ngātahi me ngā whare wānanga, tae atu ki te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge, ka taea e tēnei pahekotanga te noho hei autō kaha ki te kawe mai i te pūtea penapena hou ki te UK, ā, ki te rohe." I kī a Paul Davey mai i te Tauranga o Felixstowe: "Ko ngā pūtea penapena e haere mai ana ka āwhina ki te whakaputa i te āhua o te āhua o te rohe i ngā tauranga anake." I kī a Freeport East i pūruatia ana tono e ngā hoa mahi hinonga paetata, ngā MP, ngā whare wānanga me ngā kaunihera. Ko te Tauranga o Felixstowe te tauranga ipu nui rawa atu o te UK, e kaute ana mō neke atu i te 40% o ngā kawemai ipu me ngā kaweake mai i te UK. Ko Harwich International Port he waka waka nui me ngā ratonga e rua ia rā ki Hōrana me tētahi teihana rerewhenua pāhihi whakatapua me ngā ratonga ki Rānana. Ko Harwich hoki te pūtake mahi me te tautiakitanga mō te pāmu hau o Galloper, he wāhanga o Te Tairāwhiti Pūngao o Te Raki o Te Tairāwhiti. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ngaronga o Te Tīwae Whakamutunga: I whakaputaina te tīwae whakamutunga
summary: Kua whakaputaina e te Washington Post te tīwae whakamutunga o te kaipānui Hauti o Aotearoa - he karanga mō te wāteatanga pēhi puta noa i te ao Arapia.
text: I kī te nūpepa i whakataua kia haere whakamua i muri i te whakaaetanga ki a Tēnā Tīhoggi e kore e hoki haumaru. Kāore anō kia kitea te kairīpoata mai i te tomokanga ki te rūnanga o Hauti i Istanbul i te 2 o Whiringa ā-rangi, i reira e whakapae ana ngā mana tākehi i patua ia. Ko Arapia, e whakakāhore ana i te patunga, i whakaae ki ngā kaihoko i roto i te pō. I kitea ngā tīma tirohanga hara tākehi e wehe ana i te rūnanga i te ata o te Rāite. Kua kī ngā pūtake e tata ana ki te tūhuratanga he whakaaturanga ororongo tā rātou mo te whakamamaetanga a Tēnā Kēhoggi me te kōhurutanga whakamutunga i te rūnanga. Heoi anō, kāore anō ēnei kia tūmatanuitia. I te Wenerei, ka kī a Perehitini Donald Trump kua tonoa e te US te hopukanga "mēnā kei te tīariari". Ināianei, kua kī ngā kaipōrangapū o te ao e kore rātau e haere ki tētahi hui pūtea penapena i Hauti Arapia a tērā wiki. Heoi anō, he maha ngā umanga nui - tae atu ki a Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga, o Te Wānanga me te EDF - e hiahia tonu ana ki te haere ahakoa te nui o te pēhanga mo te poapoa. He aha te kōrero a te tīwae whakamutunga? I kī te kaiwhakatika o ngā Whakaaro Huri noa o te Poutāpeta, a Karen Attiah, ko te tīwae "e tino hopu ana i te whāinga me te hiahia o [Tēnā Khashoggi] ki te wāteatanga i te ao Arapia", kātahi anō ka tāpiritia he "wāteatanga i hoatu e ia tōna ora". I whakaaturia e Ms Attiah i tukuna i te rā i muri i te ngarotanga o Tēnā Kēhopgi. Mō tētahi wā, "i tūmanako a ia ka hoki mai a Ēnā ki a mātau kia taea ai e māua te whakatika tahi", ka tuhituhi a Ms Attiah. Engari i te mōhiotanga "kāore tēnei e puta", ka whakatauria kia whakaputaina te tīwae. I roto i taua tau, i muri i te whakatūpatotanga a ngā mana o Hauti kia mutu te whakahē i ngā kaupapa here a te rangatira karauna - i whakaaturia he whakahē kaha ki te āhua o te wāteatanga pēhi i te ao Arapia, ā, i kī a ia, ka waiho tōna iwi "kāore i te mōhiotia, i te mōhiotanga rānei". "Kei te anga atu te ao Arāpia ki tōna ake putanga o tētahi Ārai Rino, ehara i te mea i whakahaua e ngā kaitapere o waho, engari mā ngā ope ā-kāinga e whakataetae ana ki te mana," ko tana tuhituhi. "E hiahiatia ana e te ao Arāpia tētahi putanga hōu o te pāpāho tawhito kia taea ai te whakamōhio atu ki ngā tangata whenua mō ngā takahanga o te ao. Ko te mea nui ake, me whakarato e tātau he pūhara mō ngā reo Arapia." I kōrerotia e ia te kēhi o tōna hoa kaituhi Hauri, a Saleh al-Shehi, nāna i kī "ināianei kei te mahi i tētahi whiu whare herehere e rima tau mō ngā kōrero e hāngai ana ki te whakatūnga o Hauri". "Kua kore aua mahi e mau tonu i te hua o te whakahoki mai i te iwi ao whānui," ko tana tuhituhi. "Engari, ka tere pea te whakaoho i te whakahēnga i muri mai i te ngū." Ko te hua, i kī a ia, he "mana wātea" tā ngā kāwanatanga ki te whakangū i te pāpāho. Te ngaronga o Te Wānanga o Whiringahora: Ko ngā takahanga matua 2 3 Whiringa ā-rangi, 4 o Whiringahora, 7 o Whiringahora, 13 o Whiringahora, 15 me te 17-18 o Whiringahora: Pānuitia ētahi atu mea: Ko ngā mea e mōhio ana mātou mō te ngaronga o te kaipānui Hauri: He pēhea te haere o te tūhuratanga a Tākehi? I te Wenerei, ki te Rāitema, tata tonu ki te iwa haora te rapu i te whare o te consul Hauri, kātahi ka neke atu ki te rūnanga tata ki te 200m (650ft) te mamao, e ai ki te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero. I roto i te tīma ko ngā rōia me ngā tohunga ā-ture i roto i ngā kākahu mā. He maha ngā waka me ngā pereti tau whakawhanaunga o Hauti i whakaahuatia e ngā kāmera C KK e neke ana mai i te rūnanga ki te whare i raro noa iho i te rua haora i muri i te tomokanga o Tēnā Tīwhara ki te rūnanga i te rā i ngaro atu ai ia. Ko te wā tuatahi i rapua ai te whare rūnanga i te Mane. He aha te tūnga hou o Te Puhi? Ko Arapia tētahi o ngā pirihitini tino tata o Washington, ā, ko te ngaronga o Te Tītī e whakanoho ana i te whakahaere ki tētahi tūnga mārire. Mā te whakaū i te rīpene i kī kia homai he whakaaturanga o te patunga, ka tāpiri mai a Tēnā Puhi: "Kāore anō ahau kia tino mōhio kei te tīariari, tērā pea, tērā pea." I kī a Tēnā Puhi e tūmanako ana a ia ki tētahi pūrongo mai i te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Maika Pompeo, kātahi anō ka tae atu ki Hauti Arapia me Tāke. I kī te perehitini ka puta mai te pono "i te mutunga o te wiki". I whakakāhoretia e ia ngā huatau e ngana ana ia ki te whakarato uhi mō Arapia: "Kāo, kāore rawa, e hiahia ana ahau ki te mōhio he aha te mea e puta ana." I ngā rā torutoru kua taha, kua whakaarahia e Tēnā Puhi te tūponotanga o "ngā kaipatu nanakia" i muri i te ngaronga o te kaipānui. Ā, kua whakatūpato a ia kia kaua e rere ki te whakapae i ngā kaiārahi Hauri, e kī ana ki te wāhi rongokōrero o Associated Press e whakamahia ana rātau hei "hara kia kitea rā anō he harakore". He aha te mea e pūrongotia ana kei runga i te hopukanga? Ko te putanga o ngā whakaaturanga ororongo i patua e ngā kaihoko Tākehi i te tōmua o a rātau uiuinga. Ko ngā pūrongo i roto i te pāpāho tākehi e hoatu ana i ngā taipitopito mōrearea o ōna meneti whakamutunga, tae atu ki ngā karanga. E kī ana tētahi nūpepa Tākehi e rangona ana te consul tonu, a Moameta al-Otaibi, i roto i te hopukanga ororongo o te matenga o Tēnā Khashoggi. E whakahua ana a Yeni Safak, e tata ana ki te kāwanatanga, ki a ia e kī ana ki ngā māngai Hauti e kiia ana i tonoa ki Hāpua: "Mahia tēnei i waho. Ka raruraru ahau i a koe." E pūrongo ana te New York Times e whā o ngā māngai e 15 e whai hononga ana ki a Piriniha Karauna, ā, ko tētahi atu he tangata matua i roto i te mahi ā-roto o te whenua. I rere anō a Tēnā Otaibi ki Riyadh i te Tūrei.

title: Ka hoatu mētara a Prince of Wales ki ngā 'toa toi'
summary: Kua whakahonoretia e te Piriniha o Uēra me ngā mētara i tētahi hākari o Rānōna.
text: Ko Lord Rothschild i waenganui i ngā kaiwhiwhi e rima, mō tana koha "tino nui" ki te oranga ahurea o Ingarangi. Tokorua hoki ngā mārena i mōhiotia, tae atu ki a Phillip rāua ko Christine Carne, nāna te mōhiotanga i āwhina ki te pūtea i ngā ākonga whakaari me ngā tauira pūoro. Ko ngā mētara, i whakawhiwhia tuatahitia i te tau 2008, e whakanui ana i te tautoko a te tangata ki ngā toi me te rerekētanga e mahia ana e rātou. Calls to inspire the next generation of arts philanthropists have been made, underlining the importance of individual support for cultural activities. Jonathan Moulds, chairman of Arts and Business who organises the Prince of Wales Medals for Art Philanthropy, said: "We must also turn our thoughts to how we can collectively inspire a new generation of individuals to be generous with their time, their determination and their money. " Ehara ngā toi i te kōwhiringa tāpiri," tana tāpiri mai. He hiahia a Ariki Rothschild ki ngā toi pai, ā, kua mahi tahi me ngā whare wānanga maha, tae atu ki te Taiwhanga ā-Motu, i te wā i homai e te Rothschild Foundation he maha ngā mahi. Ko ētahi atu kaiwhiwhi mētara ko Lady Bernstein, he kaikanikani kanikani, he kaikanikani o mua o te Royal Ballet i mutu tana mahi i te whara i te 22 o ona tau. I te tau 2011 ka tukuna e ia he moni e £1 miriona ki te koreographer o Wayne McGregor nāna i hoatu ki te hanga whare hei whakamahi i tana kamupene. "He māia, he mōrearea, he ahurei hoki a Angela Bernstein. He Diaghilev pono a ia," tana kī. Mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, kua pūteatia e te kaitautoko toi whānau Pāniora a Delfina Entrecanales ngā wāhi studio mō ētahi kaiwaiata e 400, tae atu ki a Tacita Dean me Mark Wallinger. Ko tētahi toronga ki ōna kāinga o Rāwāhi i te Tau Hōu ka arotahi ki te nohoanga mahi mō ngā kaiwaiata o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui me Āwherika. I whakawhiwhia hoki ki tētahi mētara mō tā rāua tautoko whānui i te ao pūoro, tae atu ki tētahi koha £500,000 i taea ai te hanga i tētahi wāhi pūoro karaehe o te ao i te Kāreti o Royal Welsh i te tau 2011. He kaitautoko hoki rātau i ngā toi arokite, e iwa ngā mahi nui e wātea ana ki te Tate i tērā tau. Kua whakamāramatia hoki e ngā Toi me ngā Pakihi te rerekētanga i waenganui i te aroha i Rāwāhi me ērā atu whenua. E £41 mō ia upoko o te iwi whānui i te pūmatua, ā, e 82p noa iho i ērā atu wāhi o Ingarangi. I kitea hoki e tētahi pūrongo i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau he nui te tītaha o te pūtea toi ki Rānana.

title: I tinihangatia a Google me Facebook i roto i te 'tinihanga' nui
summary: Kua whakaūngia e Google me Facebook kua mate rāua ki tētahi tinihanga e kiia ana e $100m (£77m).
text: Nā te kaipānui o Pirihi BaraniukTechnology i Ia Poutāpeta, i pūrongotia kua whakahaua tētahi tangata Rituānia i runga i tētahi whakaekenga hītinihanga īmēra ki "ngā kamupene ipurangi e rua o Amerika" kāore i whakaingoatia i taua wā. I tinihangatia rātau ki te waea neke atu i te $100m ki ngā pūkete pēke a te tinihanga whakapae. I te 27 o Āperira, ka pūrongotia e Fortune ko ngā tūpāpaku e rua ko Facebook me Google. Ko te tangata i whakapaea i muri i te tinihanga, ko Evaldas Rimasauskas, e 48, i whakapae he kaiwhakanao ā-Āhia, a, i tinihangatia nga kamupene mai i te 2013 neke atu rānei tae noa ki te 2015. "I tukuna ngā īmēra hītinihanga tinihanga ki ngā kaimahi me ngā māngai o ngā kamupene i aituā, ā, i rite tonu te whakahaere i ngā tauwhitinga miriona tāra ki te kamupene [Āhia]," te kī a te Tari Ture o Amerika (DOJ) i ia Mati. Ko ēnei īmēra e kiia ana nā ngā kaimahi o te umanga ā-Āhia, e kiia ana e te DOJ, ā, i tukuna mai i ngā pūkete īmēra i hoahoatia kia āhua nei i haere mai rātou i te kamupene, engari kāore i te mea. I whakapaea hoki e te DOJ a Tēnā Rimasauskas ki te whakarewa i ngā nama, ngā kirimana me ngā reta "i āhua hē kua kawea, kua hainatia hoki e ngā kaiwhakahaere me ngā māngai o ngā kamupene i aituā". "I kitea e mātou tēnei tinihanga ki tā mātou tīma whakahaere kaihoko, ā, i tere tonu te whakatūpato i ngā mana," te kī a tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō Google i roto i tētahi kōrero. "I whakaorangia e mātou ngā moni, ā, e koa ana mātou kua whakatauria tēnei take." Heoi anō, kāore te umanga i whakaatu i te nui o ngā moni i whakawhitia, i whakahokia hoki. Kāore anō hoki a Facebook - engari i kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu: "I whakaorangia e Facebook te nuinga o ngā moni i muri noa iho i te mahinga, ā, kua mahi tahi ki te ture i roto i tana tūhuratanga." I ūkuia e ngā kamupene nunui "I ētahi wā e whakaaro ana ngā kaimahi [i ngā kamupene nunui] kei te tiakina rātou, ehara te haumarutanga i te wāhanga o tā rātou mahi," te kī a Hemi Maude i te umanga haumarutanga ā-ipurangi o Avecto, e kōrero ana mō te tuma hītinihanga e anga ana ki ngā kamupene nunui. "Engari he wāhanga te tangata o te haumarutanga tino pai e taea ana e koe - koia koe i whakangungu ai i a rātou." I kī atu hoki a ia ki te AO kua kōrerotia e ngā kiritaki a Avecto ngā whakamātau hītinihanga i whakamahia ai ngā pūkete īmēra kōhuatia a ngā kaimahi matua hei whakatūpato i ngā kaimahi he pono te tono kia waea atu i te moni. Kua nui ake te mātauranga o ngā tinihanga hītinihanga i tēnei wā, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo Europol o nā noa nei. He tino māharahara te "tinihanga CEO" - e tāruatia ai ngā kaiwhakahaere e te tinihanga. "I te nuinga o te wā he tairongo wā te tono, ā, i te nuinga o te wā e rite ana ki te katinga o ngā haora pakihi kia uaua ai te manatokonga o te tono," te whakamārama a te pūrongo. "I te nuinga o te wā ka whai painga aua whakaekenga i ngā takahanga pūrongo tūmatanui pēnei i ngā whakakotahitanga, tērā pea he rerenga ā-roto me te rangirua." Kia kore ai e tukua ki taua tinihanga, ka tohutohutia ngā kamupene kia āta manatoko i ngā tono utu hōu i mua i te whakamanatanga.

title: PTSD 'i ngā taumata mōrearea' i waenganui i ngā pirihimana
summary: He tino pūnoa kē atu te mate hauora (PTSD) i waenganui i ngā pirihimana i te UK i tērā i whakaarotia, e huatau ana tētahi uiuinga hōu. E whakaahua ana tētahi rorohiko i tana pakanga ki te mate rongoā.
text: Ko Danny ShawHome affairs correspondent@DannyShawBBCon Twitter Lee Jackson te momo pirihimana e rere ana ki te mōrearea, te momo kāore e mataku ki te tukituki i ngā tatau, ki te whati whawhai rānei. He āpiha urupare i whakaakona e Taser i ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana, neke atu i te 19 tau te mahi, kua tata ki ngā hara katoa e taea ana te whakaaro, ā, kotahi te toru meneti i te matenga i muri i tana wero i runga i tētahi motokā pakaru i a ia e uiui ana i tētahi tūtukitanga motokā. Engari i papaa a PC Jackson e tētahi āhuatanga rongoā e pā ana ki ngā mano o ngā āpiha me te kore mōhio - PTSD, e pā ana ki te māharahara, ngā raruraru moe me ngā pūmahara auau o ngā takahanga whakararuraru. "I whakaaro ahau he tino mōrearea ahau," te kī a te kātipa 47 tau. "Kāore au i kite i ngā mea e hanga ana, i ngā raruraru rānei e pā ana ki a mātau." I te tau 2015 ka karangatia ia ki tētahi tautohetohe taikaha i te kāinga. "He pō Paraire tērā mōku anō," tana kī. "I pulled up to stop some people arguing because it was starting to get a little bit more physical". "I te mutunga ka whakaekea ahau - i whakamātau tētahi ki te wero i taku whatu." Ka whakapokea tōna whatu, ka kāpō rangitahi a ia. Kotahi wiki tana wehenga i te mahi, engari i muri i tana hokinga mai ka tīmata ki te whakahoki i te pō. "Ka oho ake ahau i roto i te werawera, ā, ka rongo ā-tinana ahau kua hoki mai anō ahau ki te noho i taua wā," te kī a PC Jackson. I pāngia tana mahi - i rangirua a ia mēnā ka taea e ia te mahi tika i tana mahi, ā, i whakaaro ia kei te haere te katoa ki te tiki i a ia - ā, ka noho ia hei "moepuku" ki te noho tahi i te kāinga. Kātahi anō ka rapu āwhina a ia, ā, ka kitea te PTSD - nā te tini o ngā mahi mōrearea i whakahaeretia e ia, i kitea e ia. "Ko tāku i mahi ai ko te waiho noa iho i roto i tētahi pouaka i roto i tōku roro, ka mahue, ā, kore rawa e hoki whakamuri," tana whakamārama. E hua ana tētahi uiuinga hōu nui i ngā raruraru hauora e pā ana ki a PC Jackson i roto i ngā pirihimana i tērā i whakaarotia. 'Kāore e mahi ngā ngutu mārō o runga' I kitea e te mātauranga o ngā pirihimana e tata ana ki te 17,000 puta noa i te UK e 95% o ngā āpiha me te 67% o ngā kaimahi pirihimana whakahaere kua tūpono ki ngā takahanga mōrearea, tata tonu ki te mahi katoa. O te hunga i pā ki te mate, 20% i pūrongotia ngā āhuatanga i roto i ngā wiki e whā o mua e ōrite ana ki te PTSD, ki te āhuatanga pūmau ake, te PTSD matatini, e pā ana ki te ngoikoretanga ā-hinengaro me te momotu. E rua hautoru o te hunga whai PTSD kāore i te mōhio kei te mamae rātau, e ai ki te rangahau. "Ko te wā tuatahi i te UK ka kitea e tātau i muri i te āhua ahurea o te 'kapa tahuna' kua kite i te nui rawa," te kī a te kairangahau matua o Dr Jess Miller mai i te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge, nāna i whakahaere te akoranga. "He raruraru tēnei o te wāhanga rongoā, tūmatanui hoki," e kī ana a ia, e tohu ana ko ngā mokatere o te PTSD i roto i ngā pirihimana e tata ana ki te rima ngā wā e teitei ake ana i te iwi whānui. I waenganui i ngā kitenga tino māharahara, e kī ana a Dr Miller, neke atu i te haurua o ērā i uiuia i kī he iti rawa te wā ki te tukatuka i ngā mahi i mua i te tukunga atu i te waea panuku. "E kore te āhua ngutu o runga mārō e mahi i roto i ngā mahi pirihimana o nāianei," tana kī. I kī atu tētahi āpiha ki te uiuinga kua whakamataku ia i te pō i muri i tana haerenga ki ngā tirohanga kōhuru; i kī tētahi atu he pakaru āmaimai tōna me ngā whakaaro whai i a ia i muri i te whakaoranga anō i tētahi mate i roto i te tiakitanga i te wā o te uiuinga tika; I kōrero ētahi mō te āwangawanga o te whakapau marama ki te tirotiro i ngā rauemi pūtōraru "whakamataku", i ngā rangitaki kōrerorero paepaea rānei i runga i te ipurangi. E kī ana a Gill Scott-Moore, te rangatira nui o Police Care UK, te aroha nāna i pūtea te rangahau: "He tino uaua te ratonga ki te mōhio me te urupare ki ngā tohu me ngā āhuatanga o te mārakerake trauma, ā, e tino whakawhirinaki ana ki te whakarato NHS whānui kāore i te whakaritea mō te rongoā tohunga e hiahiatia ana." I Aperira, i whakarewaina tētahi ratonga oranga pirihimana ā-motu hei whakarato tohunga mō te whakarato hauora mahi ki ngā ope puta noa i Ingarangi me Weera. Ko te ratonga, i hangaia me te pūtea penapena £7.5m mai i te Tari Kāinga, kua whakahaeretia e te Kāreti Pirihimana i te taha o te Kāhui Matua o Te Kāhui o Te Rūnanga o Te Aotearoa, o Andy Rhodes, e ārahi ana i te take ā-motu. "Kāore te akoranga i te mīharo ki a au, ā, ka homai he whakaaturanga hei tautoko i te pūtea penapena i roto i te ārai me ngā ratonga tāhapa,'' te kī a te Rangatira Kāhui Rhodes. " Mā te tauhae huri noa i te hauora hinengaro e āta whakaiti ana, kei te kite mātou i ngā take huna e puta mai ana pēnei i ngā taumata tiketike o te hauā me te pānga trauma, e āhei ana ki te whakanui ake ki te kore e whakahuatia," tana tāpiri mai. I taea e PC Lee Jackson te whakatau i ōna raruraru - i muri i te ono marama o te tohutohu takitahi. Engari e kī ana a ia he nui ake ngā mea e hiahiatia ana hei hoatu mōhiohio ki ngā āpiha me ngā kaimahi me pēhea te kite i ngā tohu o te PTSD me te wāhi e haere ai ki te tautoko. E kī ana a ia: "He tikanga tā mātou mō ngā mea katoa i roto i ngā pirihimana [engari] kāore mātou i te wā e mahi ana koe i ngā mahi mōrearea, i te mate rānei i roto i a koe anō, ā, tērā pea ka hiahiatia e mātou tēnā." I karangatia e Che Donald, te tuakana ā-motu o te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana o Ingarangi me Weera, he pūtea kāwanatanga anō hei āwhina i ngā āpiha "kei te wāhi pakaru". "Mēnā kei te whati ngā āpiha, me pēhea tātau e tūmanako ai kia tika te mahi me te tiaki i te iwi whānui?" tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ka puta atu te kaitono pirihimana o Te Pirihimana o Aotearoa, a Alan Charles i runga i te hara
summary: Kua noho tētahi komihana pirihimana o Derbyshire hei kaitono Mahi tuarua i roto i ngā rā e rua ki te tū i runga i tētahi hara hara o mua.
text: I kī a Alan Charles i tū a ia i muri i te putanga mai o tētahi "hara iti" i a ia e taitamariki ana, ka āraia ia i te tūranga. I te Wenerei ka kī a Bob Ashford i tētahi hara i mahia i a ia e 13 ana tau, i āraia ia i te tauwhāinga i Avon me Somerset. Nā tērā i tapaina ai e te MP o Te Rāwhiti I te tiaki i tōna hoa mahi, ka kī te MP Labour: "Kāore au i te whakaaro ahakoa kāore te kāwanatanga i mōhio he nui tēnei ture i te mea kua whakaritea." I kī a Tēnā Charles, i kōwhiria hei kaitono o Labour hei pirihimana tuatahi me te komihana hara o Te Pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC) i June, he iti hoki tana hara, ā, i mahia e ia i te 47 tau ki mua. Kaore a ia i tuku i ētahi taipitopito o te mahi i whakawāteatia ai ia, engari i kī ia me tū ia i muri i tana whiwhinga whakamāramatanga mō ēhea hara i whakakorea ai ngā kaitono. Neke atu i te 20 tau a ia i mahi hei kaikaunihera, ā, hei tūru tuarua o te Mana Pirihimana o Derbyshire. Ka kī a Tēnā Charles: "He hara hara iti i mahia e au i a au e 14 tau te pakeke... nā reira i hoatu ai ki a au te whiwhinga herenga o te tau kua āraia ahau kia kaua ahau e tū mo te pou PCC. "Kua whakataua e au i tēnei rā te whakataunga uaua kia tū hei kaitono o te Rōpū Mahi mō ngā Pirihimana me te Komihana Hara mō Te Komihana Hara mō Te Pirihimana." 'Paerewa tiketike' E mārama ana te AO kāore he āhua o te hurihanga o ngā ture tika mō ngā PCCs. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Tari Kāinga: "Ka whakakorea e te Ture Whakahōu Pirihimana me te Ture Haepapa Pāpori 2011 tētahi tangata kia kaua e tū mō te pōti hei PCC mēnā kua herea rātou i tētahi hara e taea ai te tuku i tētahi tangata ki te whare herehere; ahakoa i tonoa rātau ki te whare herehere mo taua hara, kāore rānei. "I tautuhia tēnei paerewa tiketike ki te whakaaetanga whakawhiti-rōpū nā te mea ka puritia e ngā PCC ngā ope pirihimana, ko tana mahi ko te tautoko i te ture, ki te pūkete." Kua toa te kāwanatanga i te ariā o ngā PCC hei tikanga kia nui ake ai te haepapa o nga pirihimana. Ka whai mana rātau ki te utu me te ahi i ngā kātipa rangatira, ki te tautuhi i ngā tahua ope pirihimana me te kōmihana i ētahi ratonga ture taihara. I kī te Tari Kāinga ka hoatu e ngā PCCs he reo ki te iwi whānui, ka whakakaha i te whawhai ki te hara, me te āwhina ki te whakarite kia noho haumaru ngā hapori paetata. Ka whakakapia e ngā PCC ngā mana pirihimana i ngā wāhi e 41 i Whiringa ā Rangi.

title: Kōtaha: Ed Balls
summary: Ko te taiapa nui rawa i taea e Ed Balls i te pōtitanga ārahi o Labour i te tau 2010 ko te whakatū i tōna ake tuakiri tōrangapū, motuhake i tērā o Kōnata Paraone.
text: Nā Kōrero WheelerTe kaipānui tōrangapū, Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero E nama ana a ia ki a Tēnā Paraone, nāna ia i kite i a ia i a ia e taitamariki ana i te tōmua o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua. I te wā e 30 ana a ia, ko ia te tuarua o te whakahau i te Whare Taonga Moni, ahakoa he mana kāore i pōtitia, e āwhina ana ki te whakahaere i ngā kukitanga kaupapahere nui rawa a te tumuaki o Tēnā Paraone pēnei i te tukunga atu o te mana o ngā mokatere huamoni ki te Pēke o Ingarangi me ngā whakamātautau ohaoha e rima i āraia ai a Ingarangi i te ūropi. I mua hoki a ia i te whawhai i waenganui i ngā kaitautoko a Tāne Paraone me te Tiriti o Te 'Tauwhāinga' I roto i tēnei wā ka whiwhi rongonui a ia - i ākiritia i ngā wā katoa hei kōrero kino - mō te kōrero ki ngā hoa mahi Mahi e kitea ana he hoariri no Tēnā Paraone. Kua whakakāhoretia e ia te kerēme a Ariki Mandelson he wāhanga ia o tētahi "tauwhāinga" Parauri ki te pirimia o Tēnā Kōkā, e kī ana he "tanuku auaha" ehara i te whawhai i waenganui i ngā puni e rua. Engari ko tana whakataetae riri, ahakoa he pārekareka, kua kite i a ia e tapaina ana e tētahi mea whakaweti i mua - he mea i whakakāhoretia e ngā hoa i ngā wā katoa. I te tomokanga o Kōnata Paraone ki te Tau 10 i te tau 2007, ka hoatu ki a Tēnā Balls, nāna i noho ko te MP mō Morley rāua ko Outwood e rua tau ki mua, te tūranga matua o te hēkeretari mātauranga, ahakoa he iti noa iho te pōhatu hīkoi ki te whakawhiwhinga nui ake o te tumuaki. Ko ngā whawhai kaupapahere Ka pouri ki a ia, ehara i te mea, engari he tūranga tērā i hiahia tonu ai ia. Kaore a ia i kite kanohi ki te tumuaki o mua o Alistair Darling i runga i te whakahaerenga, ā, i taha ki a Kōnata Paraone i roto i ngā whawhai kaupapahere a te rōpū i te whakahaerenga ki te pōti nui o te tau 2010. Engari, e ai ki a Ariki Mandelson, kāore i taea e tētahi Tāne Paraone ngoikore te tāuta i a Tēnā Balls, tana urunga tōrangapū tino tata, ki te Whare Taonga Moni. Ehara pea i te mea mīharo, ko Tēnā Balls te tuatahi o ngā kaitohutohu ārahi o Labour o tērā raumati ki te whati i ngā rārangi ki te kaupapa here ohaoha i whawhai ai a Labour i te pōti nui o te tau 2010. Kua kī a ia i hē a Tēnā Darling ki te tuku i te rōpū ki te whakawhāiti i te tāpaetanga pūtea pūkete o Ingarangi i roto i te whā tau, e kī ana ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero, ahakoa i tāhaetia e ia te rārangi rōpū i roto i te kāwanatanga tūmataiti, "kāore ia i whakaaro ka taea te mahi". 'Kaitākaro tīma' I te ngaronga o te mana o Labour, ā, i whakakapia a Tēnā Paraone e Ed Miliband, ehara a Tēnā Balls i tana kōwhiringa tuatahi mō te tumuaki kōruru. Heoi anō, i whakamīharo te kaiārahi Mahi hou i te tokomaha mā te kōwhiri i a Aotearoa - he pāremata tino pai, pūkenga hoki, engari he tangata kāore i a ia ngā taipitopito tuakiri ohaoha o Tēnā Balls. I tana waihotanga i ngā marama i muri iho, e kī ana i ngā take whaiaro, ka whai wāhi a Tēnā Balls ki te tūranga, ā, mai i tērā wā ka haere tētahi rārangi whakatuki e tautohe ana ki ngā tapahi kāwanatanga. Ko te tama a tētahi ahorangi kararehe, i kuraina a Ed Balls i tētahi kura tūmataiti tamariki katoa, i Nottingham High, me te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, i reira i whiwhi ai ia i tētahi tohu hōnore karaehe tuatahi, i mua i tana haerenga ki Harvard, i te US, hei tohunga Kennedy. I te wā o te whakahau pōti nui o te tau 2010, ka kite a ia i tētahi wero Tūturu kaha i tōna ake wātūtanga e te wehewehe, ā muri ake nei, i roto i tētahi uiuinga o TE WĀ, i kitea e tēnei he "toa" a ia me tētahi "kaitākaro tīma". Kāore i tino mōhio ka tomo a Tēnā Pōro ki te rēhi kia whakakapi i a Tēnā Paraone i te upoko o te Rōpū Mahi i muri i te ngaronga o te mana o te rōpū - kāore i te iti rawa nā te mea e whakaaro ana tana wahine, te hēkeretari kāinga kōruru o Yvette Kupa, i tana ake tono ārahi. I te mutunga, ka whakatau a Ms Kupa, tokotoru ana tamariki, ā, e tohu ana i tētahi wāhanga noho tata i West Yorkshire, kia kaua e tū. Ahakoa i tīmata hei tauhou, ka whakatūria e ia he whakahau ārahi ā-taikaha, he tuatoru whai hua i muri i nga tuakana o Miliband. Ka pāngia a ia e te taurangi pēhi e hiahia tonu ana a ia ki te ārahi i te rōpū - engari me tino kaha te rama tōrangapū i runga i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, me nui rawa tana mahi i roto i tana paepae kia kore ai ia e nui rawa te kino mō Ed Miliband - kia tūmanako rānei te kaiārahi Mahi.

title: Grammys 2020: Snubs me ngā ohorere
summary: Ehara i te mea ngāwari te whiwhi i tētahi whakaingoatanga Grammy. Ahakoa he tohu pāpaku pēnei i te "pukaemi taonga jazz tino pai" i whiwhi i ngā tāurunga 302.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC kaipānui pūoro Mō te pūkete nui ake o te whakawhiwhinga o te tau, e 1,160 ngā kaitono i tāpaetia. I whakawhāititia e ngā mema o te Recording Academy tērā ki te waru ngā tautapa, me ngā āhuatanga o Taylor Swift, Lizzo me Billie Eilish i roto i te oma. Ka tautuhia e taua kāwai he tauira, me ngā kaiwaiata wahine e tohu ana i ngā tohu "whā nui" - te kaiwaiata hōu tino pai, te waiata o te tau, te pūkete o te tau me te pukaemi o te tau. He nui hoki ngā mea hei whakanui i a Lil Nas X - me ngā whakaingoatanga i roto i te pūkete o te tau, te pukaemi o te tau me te rehetoi hōu tino pai. Engari, ahakoa e 84 ngā kāwai, he taupatupatu tonu mō ngā snubs e mōhiotia ana. Ā, kāore tēnei tau i te rerekē, me Ed Sheeran rāua ko Maren Morris i whakaweto i ngā kāwai matua. Anei ētahi o ētahi atu take mōhiotia, whika, tatauranga me ngā whakamīharo. He rongo whāranu mō Taylor Swift Taylor Swift he tino aroha ki ngā Grammys, e 10 ngā toa i raro i tōna tātua - tae atu ki ngā tohu pukaemi e rua o te tau. Engari kāore te Academy i horoi i tana pukaemi whakamutunga i runga i te aroha. I whiwhi te Rongo kōruru me te rapu utu i tētahi whakaingoatanga kotahi mō te pukaemi pakū tino pai. I pai ake a Swift i tēnei tau, e whā ngā whakaingoatanga - engari kei te whakatio tonu a ia i te kāwai pukaemi tino pai; i matapaetia whānuitia ai ia kia haere atu. Ka taea e ia te whakamarie i a ia anō, ahakoa rā, ki te torokī mō te waiata o te tau, e mōhio ana ki te mahi tito waiata. Ko te whaiāipo, ko te riu taitara kanohi whetū o tana pukaemi tuawhitu, ko ia anake te waiata i roto i te oma kia tuhia e te tangata kotahi. A, ko Taylor Alison Swift tērā. Ka taea e Billie Eilish te whati i tētahi o ngā pūkete a Taylor... I te 17 o ona tau, ko Billie Eilish te kaiwaiata pōtiki i roto i te hītori o Grammys ki te whiwhi i ngā whakaingoatanga i roto i ngā kāwai matua e whā. Ka huri a ia i te 18 a tērā marama, engari, ahakoa rā, ko ia te toa pōtiki rawa o te pukaemi o te tau mo tana tīmatanga kōauau, mārire ina moe tātau katoa, ki hea tātau e haere ai. Ki te pēnā a ia, ka tāhaetia e ia te karauna mai i a Taylor Swift, e 20 noa iho ōna tau i tana toa i te pukaemi o te tau mō tana pūkete tuarua, Fearless, i te tau 2010. E rua tau te pakeke o te "waiata o te tau" a Lizzo, he kaha, he harikoa hoki te mahi a Lizzo i tēnei tau; ā, ka whiwhi tika te kaiwhakatangitangi whānau o Tūroro ki tētahi hurihanga mō te kaiwaiata hou tino pai. He tautohetohe ake tana whakaingoatanga o te tau mō Truth Hurts. He aha? Nā te mea i tukua tuatahitia te waiata whakamana tote hei takitahi i te tau 2017. Waimarie mō Lizzo, kāore anō kia tukuna mō tētahi Grammy i taua wā; ā, i puta tuatahi i runga i tētahi pukaemi i tēnei tau - ka puta te Truth Hurts i runga i te putanga deluxe o Cuz I Love You, i whakaputaina i Aperira - ko te tikanga i hoatu e te Academy te haere ki mua. Kua katia te Pāhi i tūtaki ngā Whetū ki te Uru o Bruce Springsteen i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, me ngā kaiwhakawāwā e whakamihi ana i ana pūrākau tino taipitopito me ngā rangi i patua e te huarere. Engari ko te whetū, e 20 ōna Grammys ki tōna ingoa, i ngaro atu i ngā whakaingoatanga; ahakoa i roto i ngā kāwai o Amerika i kitea ai e ngā Whetū ki te Uru tōna kāinga tūturu. Ko tana whitiāhua, ko Springsteen i Broadway, i tukuna atu hoki mo te kiriata puoro tino pai. Taihoa, me pēhea e āhei ai te A Star Is Born anō? I rere a Sparks i te wā i mahia e Lady Gaga rāua ko Pirihitini Kupa i te hākari o tēnei tau - ā, i muri mai i a rāua mahinga mātao he whakawhiwhinga mō te mahinga pūrehurehu/rōpū pahū tino pai. Nā reira he mīharo te kite i te whakaaturanga mō A Star Is Born i whakaingoatia i tēnei tau. Waimarie, he whakamārama ngāwari: I puta mai a Pāpaku hei kotahi i mua tonu i te mutunga o te wā tika mō ngā Grammys 2019. Engari i tōmuri rawa te whakaaturanga o te pikitia kia whakaarohia. Ko te tikanga o ēnei mea katoa ka taea te huihui anō a Ally rāua ko Jack ki Los Angeles a tērā Hānuere. Ka rīpeka ngā maihao. I whānakotia a BTS!!!!!! Ki te whakapono koe ki a rātau kaihautū, koia tērā. I whati i te pēne taitama Kōria ki te Tonga ngā momo pūkete katoa i tēnei tau, e rua ngā pō i Wembley Stadium, me te piro i ta rātau 10 tuatahi o runga ki a Boy With Luv. I tino tūmanako a rātau kaihautū tino whakatapua ka ahu atu ki tētahi whakaingoatanga o Grammy, engari ka pouri ehara i te mea... Ko te kāwai mahinga rōpū pahū tino pai, koia tā rātou ūnga tino tūpono, i whakanuia e ngā ngātahitanga pēnei i a Shawn Mendes me Camila Cabello's Senorita; me te tūhono a Lil Nas X ki a Billy Ray Cyrus i runga i te Huarahi Tawhito o te Taone Tawhito. A, kia tika, he nui ake te pānga o aua waiata katoa ki ngā tūtohi me te reo irirangi i ngā mea katoa i whakaputaina e BTS i roto i ngā marama e 12 kua hipa. Tērā pea a tērā tau, e hoa. Ka neke ake a Ariana Grande ki nga rōpū nunui Nā te mea ko ia tētahi o ngā whetū nui rawa i runga i te aorangi, he mīharo ki te whakaaro kāore anō a Ariana Grande kia whakaingoatia mō tētahi o ngā whakawhiwhinga matua o te Grammys. Ko te mea, i toa noa iho a ia i tana tohu tuatahi i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau - i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau - i te tīmatanga o te pukaemi pahū tino pai mō Sweetener. Ka huri tērā i te tau 2020, i te mea ka whiwhi a Thank U, Next i tētahi hurihanga mō te pukaemi o te tau; ā, ko te 7 Rings kotahi te kōeke mō te pūkete o te tau. Ka puta mai te āhukahuka i te nekehanga atu o Grande i te pahū raina whakanao ki tētahi kāhua kōrerorero kē atu - me tana pukaemi tuarima e kōrerorero ana i te pouri me te māharahara i pāngia e ia i muri i te matenga o tana hoa tāne o Mac Miller. Ehara a ia i te whetū anake e whiwhi ana i tētahi whakamohoa: ko te pukapuka waiata nui a Lana Del Rey, ko Norman F***ing Rockwell, ka whiwhi i a ia tana whakaingoatanga tuatahi i roto i tētahi o ngā kāwai "nui e whā". The Beyoncé Bounce Ahakoa i roto i te tau kāore he pukaemi "tika", e whā ngā whakaingoatanga ka tīkina e te whetū, mō tana mahi i te Kingi Raiona a Disney; me tana kiriata konohete whakamana Homecoming. Ko te tapeke, ināianei e 70 ngā whakaingoatanga puta noa i tana mahi - ko te tikanga kei te kati wawe a ia ki a Quincy Jones, ko ia te kaiārahi wā katoa me te 80. Ko ngā take matapōkere me ngā mea taumaha ka tīkina e Mīharo tētahi whakaingoatanga mō te pukapuka ororongo o tana pukapuka whakamaharatanga, Becoming. Ki te toa a ia, ka noho ko ia te kuia tuatahi tuarua hei pupuri i tētahi Grammy. Ko te tuatahi ko Hillary Kikorangi, nāna i whiwhi tohu mō It Takes a Village i te tau 1996. Ko Rosalíá te kaiwaiata hou tino pai tuatahi i mōhiotia mō ngā pūoro i hopukina katoatia i te reo Pāniora. Ko te whetū, ko tana pūoro e whakakotahi ana i ngā huānga o te flamenco, te reggaeton me te hip-hop, i whakaaturia i roto i te Oro o te 2019 i te tīmatanga o te tau. I tūmanakohia whānuitia kia kite a Sam Smith's Dancing With A Stranger i ētahi mahi i roto i ngā kāwai pahū me te kanikani, engari kāore i taea te kōeke. Kāore anō kia whakaingoatia te whetū, i toa i ngā Grammys e whā i te tau 2015, mai i taua wā. A, ko te tikanga kei te rakuraku tōna māhunga e te tangata whenua o Maren Morris. I tērā wiki, i toa a ia i te pukaemi o te tau i ngā Tohu CMA; engari kātahi anō a ia ka waru ki roto i te rārangi poto o Te Wānanga, me te whakaingoatanga kotahi mō tana takirua Brandi Carlile Common. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Te whakaekenga o Westminster: He aha te mea i tūpono
summary: Tokoono nga tāngata i mate, tae atu ki te kaihōia, ā, neke atu i te 50 ngā tāngata i whara i muri i te whakaekenga wehi tata ki nga Whare Pāremata i te 22 o Poutāpeta. Koinei tā tātau e mōhio ana mō ngā mea i tūpono i taua rā.
text: I ahatia? E 82 hēkona te roa o te whakaeke. I tīmata i te 14:40 GMT i te wā i taraiwa ai a Tīwhana i tētahi motokā - i utua mai i tētahi kōpae i Birmingham - i runga i te Arawhiti o Westminster, e tata ana ki ngā Whare Pāremata. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu i tere ake a ia, ka eke ki te papa kohatu, a, ka tīmata ki te tuki noa i ngā kaiwaewae. E whakapono ana nga pirihimana e taraiwa ana a Te Motokā ki te 76mph. E 82 hēkona te whakaekenga o te motokā kātahi ka tūtuki ki ngā taiapa i waho o te Whare o Te Whare o Aotearoa. Ka mahue i a ia tana motokā, a, ka oma ki te Pāremata, i reira ka tūtakia ia e nga pirihimana. I okaina, i patua a RW Keith Palmer - e mau ana i tētahi kākahu ārai engari kāore i rāhuitia - a, i patua. Kātahi ka pūhia a Te Hunga Patu e nga āpiha patu. Tae atu ki a PC Palmer, i patua a Aysha Frade, tētahi tangata whenua o Ingarangi, me te tūruhi o Amerika, o Kurt Cochran, i te whakaekenga. I mate tētahi tangata 75 tau, a Leslie Rhodes mai i Clapham i te tonga o Rānana, i ōna whara i te rā a muri ake, ā, i mate a Romanian Andreea Cristea, i hinga mai i te Arawhiti o Westminster ki te Awa o Thames, neke atu i te rua wiki i muri iho. Ko wai te kaihōia? I whānau a Tītī, e 52, i Kete i te Rā Kirihimete o te tau 1964. I mua i te whakaekenga o Poutāpeta i whakapono a ia e noho ana i te West Midlands. He hara tōna i mua, engari ko tana whakapae hou rawa, mo te whai maripi, i a Hakihea 2003. Kaore anō a ia kia whakawāteatia mo te hara pūtohu. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri noa iho i te whakaekenga, ka kī atu te Pirimia o Ēnā Me ki ngā MP, ahakoa i "kotahi te wā i tūhuratia ai a Te Pirimia" he "whika tāpiri" a ia, ā, "ehara i te wāhanga o te pikitia mōhiohio o nāianei". I muri i tōna whānautanga, ka rēhitatia a Masood ki te takiwā o Dartford o Kent, engari i tapaina tōna ingoa ko Adrian Russell Elms. E rua tau i muri mai, ka moe tona whaea i tetahi tangata ko Ajao te ingoa, a, i a ia e tamariki ana, i mohiotia a Masood ko Adrian Russell Ajao. I muri iho ka whakamahia e ia a Ajao me Elms tae noa ki tana tahuritanga ki a Islam, a, ka noho ko Masood. He maha nga tau e mahi ana a Masood i Hauti Arapia e whakaako ana i te reo Ingarihi hei reo tuarua i te Mana Ahuwhānui o te Rererangi Tūmatanui i te taone tauranga o Jeddah, e mārama ana te HAU. I hoatu e ia tana mahi hei "kaiako" i a ia e utu ana i te motokā i whakamahia e ia hei mahi i te whakaeke. Heoi anō, i kī te Tari Mātauranga kāore he pūkete mōna i mahi hei kaiako mātauranga i ngā kura kāwanatanga Ingarihi. E whakapono ana a Te Wānanga e toru neke atu rānei ngā tamariki. Ko wai ngā tūpāpaku? Ko te pirihimana i mate ko PC Keith Palmer, e 48, o te tono parenga paremata me te whakawhanaunga. E 15 tau tana mahi, kua mārenatia, a, he tamāhine e rima tau te pakeke. I mahi a ia i roto i te Royal Artillery i mua i tana uru ki nga pirihimana. I patua a Aysha Frade, nāna i mahi whakahaere i DLD College London, i muri i te patua e te motokā o te kaihōia i mua i te taenga atu ki te Pāremata. E 44 tōna tau, ā, he whaea mārena no ngā tamāhine tamariki tokorua. Ko te tūpāpaku tuatoru ko Kurt Cochran, e 54, mai i Utaha, i Rānana ki te whakanui i tana huritau 25 o tana mārena. I tino whara tana wahine a Melissa. I muri i te whakaekenga, i whiwhi rongoā a Leslie Rhodes, e 75, he kaihoroi matapihi kua mawhiti, i te hōhipera i muri i te whakaekenga. I unuhia tana tautoko ora i te 23 o Poutāpeta. I mate a Romanian Andreea Cristea, i te hararei me tana hoa tāne o Andrei Burnaz, i te 6 o Āperira nā ōna whara. I te hōhipera a ia mai i te whakaekenga. I kī tōna whānau i roto i tētahi kōrero: "I muri i te whawhai mo tōna oranga mo te rua wiki, ko ta mātau tamāhine aroha, kāore e taea te whakakapi - he tamāhine tino pai, he tuahine, he hoa, he hoa whakatapua me te tangata tino ahurei, aroha ki te ora ka taea e koe te whakaaro - i tāhaetia i o mātau oranga i runga i te huarahi tino ngākau kore, wairua hoki. " Ka maumaharatia tonutia a ia hei hihi mārama mō mātou e tiaho tonu ana i roto i o tātau ngākau mō ake tonu atu." He aha tātau e mōhio ana mō ngā tūpāpaku Ko wai te hunga i whara? Neke atu i te 50 ngā tāngata mai i ngā whenua e 12 neke atu rānei i whara i te whakaekenga, e 31 o rātau i hiahia ki te hōhipera. I waenganui i ērā i whara, tokotoru nga pirihimana i haere puta noa i te Arawhiti o Westminster i to rātau hokinga mai i tētahi hui whakamihi. Ko RW Kristofer Aves tētahi o ngā tokorua i whakaahuatia he whara "tino nui". I kī te Komihana Tuarua o Mark Rowley ko ngā tūpāpaku e tohu ana i "tētahi wāhanga whakawhiti tūturu o ngā pakeke". Tae atu ki ngā Pirihitini, he tāngata nō Wīwī, Kōrea ki te Tonga, Kariki, Tiamana, Pōrana, te Whenua o Airana, Haina, Itari me te US. I waenganui i ētahi atu i whara, tokowhā ngā tauira whare wānanga o te Whare Wānanga o Edge Hill, i Ormskirk, i Nekehire. I pēhea te tūhuratanga a te pirihimana? Tokowhitu ngā tāngata me ngā wāhine tokorima te pakeke i waenganui i te 21 me te 58 i hopukina i Rāwāhi, i Te Ture Pūrarau - engari i tukua katoatia ā muri ake, kāore he mahi anō. I kī te Komihana Tuarua o Mark Rowley e 2,700 ngā tūemi kua hopukina, tae atu ki te "nui rawa" o ngā raraunga rorohiko. E mōhiotia ana kua tūhono te waea a Te Taupānga ki WhatsApp e rua meneti i mua i te whakaekenga, engari ko te tikanga o te pūnaha whakamunatanga o te taupānga kārererere, kāore pea ngā pirihimana e mōhio he aha mēnā i whakawhitiwhitia tētahi mea. I utua te Hyundai i whakahaeretia e Masood i Spring Hill, Birmingham, mai i tētahi peka o Enterprise. Tata ki te 3,500 ngā kaiwhakaatu i whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana - 1,000 i runga i te Arawhiti o Westminster me te 2,500 i roto i te pānga Paremata i taua wā. E hia rau ngā ataata me ngā pikitia kua tukuatu ki te paetukutuku NPCC, ka tāpiritia e Tēnā Rowley. I te 25 o Poutāpeta, ka kī te Komihana Kaiāwhina Tuarua o Te Komihana o Neil Basu i whakapono ngā kaitohutohu kua mahi ko ia anake, ā, kāore he mōhiohio, he mōhiohio rānei hei huatau i whakaritea ētahi atu whakaekenga. "Tērā pea e kore tātau e mārama he aha i mahi ai ia i tēnei," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a ia, ahakoa "mārama tonu te āro atu o Te Pirihimana ki te toa", kāore anō kia kitea e ngā pirihimana he whakaaturanga o tētahi pāhonotanga ki te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi, ki te al-Mōrea rānei. I whakahōutia tēnei pūrākau i te Paraire 7 o Mahuru 2018, i mua i te tīmatanga o ngā uiuinga a ngā tūpāpaku.

title: Te tautohetohe urupa o te whare karakia o Hertfordshire i whakaroa te tanumanga
summary: E rua haora i takawaretia ai te nehunga nā te tautohetohe mo te rahi o te urupa.
text: I kī a Pita Worby me tanumia tōna pāpā a William, engari i kī tētahi tohunga i Old Hall Green i Hertfordshire kāore i te tino hōhonu te urupa. I muri i te whakaaetanga, ka whakaaetia e te tohunga te tanumanga o te tau 98 tau kia haere tonu, engari i kī a Tēnā Worby i "whānako i te pouri" tōna whānau. I whakapārewa tētahi pīhopa Katorika matua mo "te mamae tāpiri". I puta ake te tautohetohe i mua i te ratonga o te Wenerei, engari i kī a Tēnā Worby e whakapono ana te whānau kua whakatauria i mua. I kī a Tēnā Worby, e 62, i tae atu ia ki te Whare Karakia o Hato Edmund me ngā Māharahara Ingarihi i te rā o te nehunga, kāore i kitea te tohunga, ā, i whakamōhiotia ia kei te tanumanga engari he "raruraru" me te haere tonu te tautohetohe. "I eke ahau ki runga i ōku ringa me ōku turi, a, ka inea te rua e 46in (117cm)," te kī a Tēnā Worby. "I te oneone kirikiri ko te mōkito e taunakitia ana ko te 24in (61cm) ā, i te haerenga o te kāwhena o tōku pāpā ki roto, e 30in (76cm)." E ai ki te Rōpū Mate Māori, kāore he hōhonutanga mōkito ā-ture mō te tanumanga, engari e tūtohu ana te Manatu Ture kia iti iho te 24in (61cm) oneone i waenganui i te taupoki kāwhena me te taumata whenua. I muri i ētahi atu kōrero, ka haere tonu te ratonga. "He tokomaha nga tangi i tatari ki waho i roto i te mātao mātao i te mea he torutoru noa iho ka taea te tatari i roto i te hōro o te whare karakia nā te tawhiti pāpori," te kī a Tēnā Worby. "I inoi ahau ki te tohunga kia tukua taku pāpā kia tanumia. I whakaponokore ahau. E whānako ana ahau i tōku pouri. "E whakaae ana māua ko taku whānau, ehara i te nehunga. I ohorere katoa mātau me te riri." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Pīhopa Paul McAleenan, Pīhopa Āwhina i Westminster: "Ka mahia ngā mahi katoa ki te mahi i tēnei mahi nui i runga i te rangatiratanga mō te tūpāpaku me te tiaki i te hunga e pouri ana. " I tēnei wā, tērā ētahi raruraru e pā ana ki te kaupapa urupa i whakararuraru ai te whānau o te tūpāpaku. "E pouri ana mātau mo te mamae tāpiri i pāngia e rātau." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: I tukuna ngā mahere o te teihana pahi hōu o Cardiff Central Square
summary: Kua tukuna te tono whakarite mō te teihana pahi hou miriona pauna o Kānata ki te kaunihera o te taone.
text: Ko te whakawhitinga 420,000 sq ft, i te taha o te teihana rerewhenua o Cardiff Central, ka whai whare tūmataiti hoki, me ngā tari me ngā toa. Ka noho te teihana pahi o Kānata hei wāhanga o tētahi whakawhanaketanga anō o Central Square, arā ko te tari matua hou o TE Wānanga o Aotearoa. "Kei te panoni te waharoa ki to mātau taone," te kī a te kaiārahi kaunihera a Phil Bale. I tukuna te tono whakarite i muri i tētahi wā whakaaro tūmatanui 28 rā, ā, e tūmanako ana ngā kaiwhakawhanake kia mōhio ki te hua i te mutunga o Hui tanguru 2017 i muri i tētahi wā tirotiro 16 wiki e ngā mahere taone. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawhanake o Central Square Rightacres Property ka whai wāhi kāhua "taunga rererangi" me tētahi pokapū paihikara 600.

title: Kei te piki haere ngā rongoā ārai mate mō ngā tamariki
summary: Kua piki ake te maha o ngā rongoā ārai mate i whakaritea ki ngā tamariki i Ingarangi, i Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i ngā tau e toru kua taha, ko ngā whika i whiwhia e te Kōnae o TE 4 e whakaatu ana.
text: Nā Oliver NewlanFile i te 4 I Ingarangi, he 15% te pikinga. I kite a Pākehā i te pikinga 10%. A, i Aiarangi ki te Raki ka piki te tau i te 6%. I te tapeke, e 950,000 ngā rongoā i tukuna i waenganui i Aperira 2015 me Mati 2018. Kua honoa e ngā tohunga te pikinga ki ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro tohunga. Ko te tikanga kia whakaritea he rongoā ārai mate ki ngā tamariki i raro anake i te tirotiro tata. E kī ana a NHS Ingarangi, NHS Scotland me te Poari Hauora me te Poari Tiaki Pāpori i Aiarangi ki te Raki e tino ū ana rātau ki te whakapai ake i ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro tamariki. Kāore i taea e NHS Wales te whakarato whika whakahaunga nā te mea kāore i te pupuri i ngā raraunga i tonoa. I whiwhi ngā whika e ngā tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio, ā, e pā ana ki tētahi rōpū ārai ārai kaha e mōhiotia ana ko ngā kaitāmi reuptake serotonin tīpako (SSRIs). I piki te tapeke o ngā rongoā mai i te 290,393 i te 2015-16 ki te 330,616 i te 2017-18. I kitea te pikinga teitei rawa i roto i ngā tūroro pōtiki, te hunga 12 neke atu rānei, i reira i piki ai te maha o ngā rongoā i te toharite mā te 24%, mai i te 14,500 ki te tata ki te 18,000. I kī a Dr Bernadka Dubicka, e tūtaki ana i te kaiako tamariki me te taitamariki i te Kāreti Ariki o ngā Hinengaro Hinengaro: "I tēnei wā kotahi anake i roto i ngā tamariki e whā me ngā taitamariki e whakamahia ana mō ō rātou raruraru hauora hinengaro. " Ko te mea kei te piki ake ngā rongoā mō ngā rongoā ārai mate, ka kitea pea he pōturi engari he nekehanga pūmau ki te tiaki i ngā tāngata katoa e mate ana. "Engari kāore e taea te whakanui i te hiranga o te tuku i ngā tamariki ki ngā rongoā ā-hinengaro. " Ko te mea kāore mātou i te mōhio mai i ngā raraunga o tēnei rā, he aha ēnei rongoā ārai mate e whakaritea ana, me pēhea. "He mea nui kia āta whakamahia, kia āta mātakina, ā, ka aromatawaitia ngā mōrea me ngā painga o te tango i aua take takitahi." The mental health charity Young Minds says waiting times for specialist child and adolescent mental health services (Camhs) have been increasing too, making it difficult for families to get support. I kī a Marc Bush, te kaitohutohu kaupapahere matua i Young Minds: "Kātahi anō ka huatau te kāwanatanga ko te wā tatari toharite mō te urunga whānui ki Camhs e tata ana ki te 12 wiki, he roa te wā e pouri ana. " Koia hoki te take e huri ana ngā tohunga o mua ki ngā pūpato whakahaunga, nā te mea kei te whakaaro rātou, 'Kei te kite ahau i tētahi tangata i mua i a au e raruraru ana me tētahi taumata āwangawanga kāore au e hiahia ki te waiho i a rātou - me pēhea taku tuku i ētahi momo whakamāmātanga mai i tērā?'" I ngā take āhua kore nei, ka taea e ngā rongoā ārai mate te whakaoho i ngā whakaaro o te whakamomori me te tūkino i a ia anō i roto i ngā tamariki. Ā, he mārama ngā tohutohu a te National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE): Heoi anō, kua rongo te Kōnae i te 4 i ngā āwangawanga kāore ēnei tohutohu i te whaia i ngā wā katoa. I kitea a Reece Burrowes, 17, kua mate i tētahi pāka i te tonga-rāwhiti o Rāwāhi i te 6 o Hakihea 2015, i ngā rā i muri i te whakaritenga o tētahi rongoā ārai mate e kiia nei ko Sertraline e ana GP. Ahakoa i whakapūketetia e te uiuinga ki te matenga o Reece tētahi whakataunga mate mā te whai i a ia, ā, kāore he whakapae i whakaritea ki ngā tākuta o Reece, ki a Sertraline rānei, kua kīia ki te Kōnae i te 4 ētahi o ngā tohutohu whakatau NICE kāore i whaia e ngā tākuta. I kī te matua matua o Reece, a Haimona Banks: "He tohutohu NICE, e mōhio ana koe i roto i te ariā me whai rātou, engari e mōhio ana ahau ko tētahi o ngā māharahara ko tō rātou whakaaro, 'Mēnā ka tohutoro ahau i a rātou ki Camhs, tērā pea he rārangi tatari.' "Mai i ngā mea kua puta i a mātou, ko tā mātou tirohanga kaua e hoatu i te rongoā, ka tatari. " Engari ka taea e au te whakaaro he tino uaua te karanga a te tākuta." I kī a Dr Shruti Garg, tētahi kaitohutohu Camhs i te Tūranga NHS Trust, ko ngā raruraru ki te rangatahi e whakawhiti ana i ngā ratonga Camhs, tērā pea ka nui ake ngā utu whakahaunga. "Ko ngā ratonga Camhs puta noa i te nuinga o ngā wāhi o te whenua e taupoki ana tae noa ki te 16 tau - ka tīmata ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro pakeke i te 18, nā reira he āputa mō te whakarato ratonga puta noa i ēnei ratonga." I kī atu te Tari Hauora i Ingarangi ki te AO kua oati i te £1.7bn hei panoni i a Camhs. E kī ana tēnei, ka āwhina ki te whakarato āheitanga nui ake ki ngā rongoā whānui ake, ahakoa kei reira tonu ngā tūroro e whai hua ana i ngā rongoā ārai mate. I Pākehā, i kī te Minita mo te Hauora Hinengaro a Clare Haughey he manakē te hauora hinengaro o te rangatahi, ā, kua haumi te £5m ki te waihanga i tētahi tūmahi hei whakapai ake i ngā ratonga Camhs. I kī te Poari Hauora me te Poari Tiaki Pāpori i Aiarangi ki te Raki ko te nuinga o ngā tohutohu i whakaaetia ki Camhs i kitea i roto i te iwa wiki, ā, kei te whakaaro ināianei ki te whakapau i tētahi atu £1m ki ngā kaupapa Camhs. Mēnā kua pāngia koe, tētahi tangata rānei e mōhio ana koe, e ngā take hauora hinengaro, ka taea e koe te uru tuihono ki ngā rauemi mā te Raina Hohenga o TE HAU. Kōnae i te 4: Tatau i te Utu: Ko te Whakamahinga Ārai Pōrearea i roto i ngā Tamariki kei te Reo Irirangi 4 i te 20:00 BST i te 24 o Hōngongoi.

title: Covid: I whakaorangia ngā kaihīkoi o te Takiwā o Peak i te hukarere i muri i te waiho i ngā ture
summary: Me whakaora tētahi rōpū i ngā here "Arctic" i muri i te waiho i ngā ture raka kia haere ki tētahi hīkoi o te Takiwā o Tihi.
text: I karangatia e nga kaihīkoi tokowhā he tīma whakaora hei āwhina i te Hātarei i muri i te ngaronga i Bleaklow Moor, i Derbyshire. Tata ki te 25 maire (40km) i haere te rōpū mai i Middleton, Manchester, ki tētahi wāhi tūtukitanga rererangi o te tau 1948, ahakoa he tohutohu e rāhui ana i te mahi ki ngā wāhi paetata. I kī tētahi kōrero mō ngā kaiwhakaora i te hukarere hōhonu i runga i te moor, ko te tikanga tērā pea he "mate" te putanga. I kī a Pita Józefczyk, o Glossop Mountain Rescue, i haere tētahi tīma e 25 ngā tūroro ki te kimi i te rōpū - tokorua ngā tāne me ngā wāhine tokorua - tata ki te 15:40 GMT. E rima haora rātau e haere ana, ā, kua ngaro rātou, ā, kua kīia he "ngenge rawa" ki te haere tonu. Kaore i roa ka kitea te tokowhā, i roto i te 20 o o rātau tau, he mihi ki ta rātau tohu waea, a, ka hoki ki o rātau motokā. I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Józefczyk ngā here hei "Tiritiri". "I te mātao o te hau, i pēnei i te tango i te 12 waeine," tana kī. "I to mātau kitenga i a rātou, he tino mātao rātau. " Mehemea kotahi kiromita te tawhiti, kāore pea he tohu waea. "Tērā pea ka mate." I kī a Tēnā Józefczyk kua kite tana tīma i te pikinga tae atu ki te 70% i roto i ngā waeatanga mai i Poutāpeta, ā, kua "wawau". I kī a ia, ahakoa ngā rāhuitanga o nā noa nei, e whā ngā wā i roto i te rua wiki i haere ai rātau ki Bleaklow Moor. I ngā tau o mua, he āhua kore nei ngā waea ki te pae i te wā o Hānuere. E whakahua ana a Tēnā Józefczyk i te pikinga o tētahi wāhanga o te rongonui o te wāhi tūtukitanga B-29 o te moor - e kitea tonutia ai te pakarutanga o te waka rererangi - i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. Ka kī a ia: "Ko taku karere ki te iwi ko: Whakapiri ki ngā ture ka noho ki te kāinga." Ko ngā ture Covid a te kāwanatanga e kī ana kia kaua te tangata e haere ki waho o tō rātou "rohe ā-rohe mō te mahi" engari kāore te ture e whakapūtā i tētahi tawhiti mōrahi.
