Kua whakapā atu ki ngā Pirihimana o Derbyshire - e arotake ana i tana kaupapahere whaina - mō tētahi kōrero. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi National lockdown - Noho ki te Kāinga

title: Ko ngā karere ataata pēpi 'whakamīharo' mō ngā mātua hou
summary: E iwa wiki i whānau wawe ai a Leo, Eli rāua ko Oscar Radido i te Hōhipera o Princess Anne i Southampton.
text: Ahakoa i taea e Eri rāua ko Leo te hoki ki te kāinga e rima wiki i muri iho, ko Oscar iti, i te whānautanga, he 1lb 9.75oz (730g) noa iho - iti iho i te rohi parāoa - i pau tētahi marama anō i roto i te rōpū kōhungahunga kōhungahunga E kī ana to rātau whaea, a Wikitōria, he wā whakamataku, he wā taratahi hoki. Nā tētahi taupānga ataata hōu e whakamahia ana e ngā kaimahi i te hōhipera ka mātakitaki i ana pēpi me te kite i ā rātou mahi. Ka kī a Wikitōria: "I te wā tuatahi i tūtaki ai ahau ki a rātau i roto katoa rātau i roto i ngā pūkoro, e mārama ana ka hipokina ki ngā ngongo me ngā waea. He iti rawa rātou, ā, he tino ngoikore te āhua. "He uaua. Ka mauria e ētahi atu a rātau pēpi ki te kāinga, ā, me noho mātau ki konei. Me waiho rātau e koe i ia rā, ā, he tino uaua tēnā." Tata ki te 60,000 ngā pēpi - kotahi i ia 13 - ka whānau moata i ia tau i te UK. Ko te wae kōhungahunga o Southampton tētahi o ngā 60 i te UK e whakamahi ana i te taupānga NHS pono hei āwhina ki te tūhono i ngā mātua hou ki a rātau pēpi huri noa i te karaka. Ka whakamahia e ngā kaimahi hei tango whakaahua me ngā ataata ka taea te whakamua ki te whaea me te pāpā. I taea e Wikitōria rāua ko tōna hoa ko Derrick te takiuru ki te taupānga i te kāinga me te kite i ngā whakahōutanga mō ā rāua pēpi, ahakoa i waenganui pō. Ka kī a Wikitōria: "Ka whiwhi koe i tēnei pikitia ātaahua, ā, i te nuinga o te wā he karere e kī ana 'Kia ora māmā, Kia ora papa. He ahiahi ātaahua'. "Me waiho e koe ō pēpi, ā, kei te tino hara koe ki te waiho i a rātou. He mea whakamīharo te mōhio kei roto rātou i ngā ringa haumaru, me ngā tāngata e tino māharahara ana ki te tango pikitia me te tuku noa atu ki a koe kia pai ai koe." I kī a Fiona Lawson, he mātāmua i te hōhipera, he uaua ki ngā mātua te wehe i ta rātau pēpi, i te kēhi rānei o Wikitōria, i ngā pēpi. "He tino ātaahua ki a mātou te whakamāmā i taua pupuhi mā te tuku ataata ki a rātou, te tuku whakaahua ki a rātou, ngā karere iti." E pūtea ana ngā aroha hōhipera i te taupānga vCreate haumaru kia wātea ai mā ngā mātua te whakamahi. I roto i ngā tau e rua kua taha, neke atu i te 5,000 ngā whānau kua whai hua. E tūmanako ana ka wātea te taupānga i te tata ki te haurua o ngā wae kōhungahunga o UK i te tīmatanga o tērā tau.

title: Brexit: E tukitukia ana e te rohe o te Moana o Airana te uniana?
summary: He maha ngā taitara o Larne. Mo nga rau tau he tauranga, he whanga tērā. Mō ngā manuhiri, koia te wāhi tuatahi e kitea ana e rātau ina tae mai rātau i runga i te waka waka mai i Pākehā.
text: Nā Stephen WalkerBBC News NI Political Correspondent Heoi anō, ākuanei ka whai ingoa hou tēnei wāhanga o Antrim ki te rāwhiti. Kua tata a Larne ki te noho hei taone taitapa. Koinei te wāhi e tīmata ai ngā whakaritenga tikanga hou o Te Pakihi, ā, ka kitea e Larne i runga i te rohe. Ko te moana e rangatira ana i ngā mea katoa i tēnei wāhi o te ao, ā, ka taea e koe te tautuhi i tō mātakitaki i te taha o ngā waka kahurangi me te mā i a rātau e rere ana ki roto, ki waho hoki o te whanga, e haere ana ki Cairnryan. Ko te hononga ki Pākehā e whakarato ana i ngā mahi paetata me te haumarutanga ohaoha - engari ināianei ka tae mai tēnei whārōrō wai hira me tētahi taitapa ohaoha, ā, ka noho a Larne ki waenganui o te pūrākau o Te Pakihi. 'Huringa tino nui mai i te pātaki' Pērā tonu ki te wehenga EU o UK, he rerekē ngā whakamāramatanga tōrangapū ki ngā mea e tūpono ana. I tautuhia e te kaiārahi UUP o mua a Ariki Empey ētahi o ngā oro i tēnei wiki i tana kīanga i te āhua o ngā taki i Larne i tohu i te huringa tōrangapū tino nui "mai i te wāwāhi". Kua maukatia a ia me te Ariki o DUP i roto i tētahi pakanga kupu uniana i ngā rā torutoru kua taha. Tērā ētahi kerēme me ngā tautohetohe mēnā ka whakararurarutia te wāhi o Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i te uniana. Koia tēnā te take? Kai te mātakitaki tātau i te wetewete o ngā here tōrangapū kua hono i Aiarangi ki te Raki ki ērā atu o UK mo te nuinga o nga tau? He wāhi tīmatanga pai a Larne ki te ine whakaaro i waenganui i te hunga e hiahia ana ki te pupuri i Aiarangi ki te Raki i te UK. He wāhi motuhake tōna i roto i te hītori o te kaiwawao i konei i mauria mai ai ngā ringa ki uta mō te UVF i te wā o te raruraru o te Ture Kāinga o te tau 1914. I tēnei rā, ko te taone kaha e 20,000 te nuinga o te uniana, ā, i Westminste, ko te rohe e whakaaturia ana e te DUP's Sammy Wilson - he pīrangi pūkenga o Pakihi. I tēnei wiki, i te pupuhi mai o te hau mātao o Hakihea i te moana, he tokomaha ōna wahanga i haere ki nga tiriti o te pokapū o te taone ki te hoko koha Kirihimete. I mua i tētahi kāmera o TE Rongokōrero o NI, he tokomaha i whakapuaki i o rātau whakaaro mo Te Kotahitanga me te uniana. He whānui, he tino mōhio o rātau whakaaro. I kī tētahi kaipōti uniana he haumaru te uniana "i tēnei wā" engari kātahi ka tāpiri mai i roto i te tekau tau "tērā pea he pūrākau rerekē". I kōrero tētahi atu he haumaru te uniana i tēnei wā, engari e herea ana he poipoi taitapa "i tētahi rā". Te āhua nei e mōhio ana ētahi kāore e rerekē ngā āhuatanga tōrangapū o nāianei me tētahi kaihoko e kī ana kei te "pai te mahi, nā reira he aha i huri ai?". Ko taua hiahia kia noho tonu te uniana i tiria e te tokomaha i hoatu o rātau whakaaro i runga i te kāmera, ā, i pāorotia taua kaupapa e Davy Wilson e whakahaere ana i tētahi umanga utanga i Larne. E whakaahua ana te pakeke e 54 tau i a ia he kaiwawao tōrangapū me te 'u' iti. I kī atu a ia ki a BBC News NI e kore rawa he rohe o Te Moana ki te Raki me te Whenua, ā, e tohe ana ia ki tētahi rohe o te Moana o Airana i ngā wā katoa. E whakapono ana a ia kei te noho tonu te uniana "te whakaaturanga tino pai i te taone" ā, i kī a ia kāore tētahi tangata i kaha rawa te tautohe ohaoha mō tētahi Aiarangi kotahi. I kī a ia ehara i te mea hou te kōrero mo te uniana e whakararurarutia ana, ā, i ngā wā katoa i raro i te tuma te wāhi o Aiarangi ki te Raki i te UK i a ia e ora ana. E mārama ana te kaituhituhi kōrero paetata me te kaituhi a Rawiri Hume he aha i whakaaro ai ētahi kaiwawao ka tukitukia e ngā mana taitapa te wāhi o Aiarangi ki te Raki i te UK. "He tāngata tino whakatūpato nga kaiwawao," tana kī. "I ngā wā katoa e kī ana ahau i ngā wā katoa e kimi ana rātau i te Lundy e hoko ana i a rātou. " Nā tēnā whakapae, ka whāngai tēnei momo tauari ki taua whakapae i runga i te huarahi tino nui." Ko ngā mea e tūpono ana i te tauranga o Larne i ngā marama e heke mai nei, kei te āhua tonu o te tākaro a Pakihi. I hangaia te hītori i te taha o te takutai o Antrim ki te rāwhiti, engari ināianei kei te hangaia he kōrero hou e tūtuki ai ngā ao tōrangapū me te tauhokohoko. He pūrākau hoki tēnei mo te tuakiri me te rangatiratanga. He kōrero hurihanga me ngā hurihanga kāore anō kia tuhia te mutunga.

title: Man Booker Prize: 2007 winner Anne Enright makes longlist
summary: Kua pānuitia ngā pukapuka e 13 kua rārangihia mō te Whakawhiwhinga Pukapuka Tangata o tēnei tau, me te toa o mua ko Anne Enright i waenganui i ērā e tautohetohe ana.
text: Ko te kaituhi o Airana, i toa i te whakawhiwhinga £50,000 i te tau 2007, kua rārangihia mō tana pukapuka tuaono, The Green Road. Tokotoru ngā Pirihitini - ko Tom McKaka, ko Andrew O'Hagan me Sunjeev Sahota - ka mahia te rārangi roa i te taha o ngā Amerika e rima. Ko ngā kaituhituhi pūrākau mai i Īnia, Hamika, Aotearoa me Naria e whakatata ana i te rārangi kaitono o tēnei tau. Ka whakakitea he rārangi poto o te ono i te 15 o Mahuru, ā, ka pānuitia te toa katoa i te 13 o Whiringa ā-rangi. I toa te kaituhi o Ahitereiria i te whakawhiwhinga o tērā tau mo tana pukapuka pakanga The Narrow Road to the Deep North. Ko te rārangi roa o ngā kaituhi me ngā taitara e whai ake nei: Kua rārangihia katoatia a Clegg, Obioma me Smaill mō ā rātou pukapuka tīmata, i te wā kua rārangihia a McKaka rāua ko O'Hagan i mua. This year's prize continues the policy introduced last year of allowing all authors writing in English, regardless of nationality, to be considered for the award. I mua i te tau 2014, ko te whakawhiwhinga - i whakaaturia tuatahitia i te tau 1969 - i tuwhera anake ki ngā kaituhi mai i te UK me te Kotahitanga, te Whenua o Aiarangi me Zimbabwe. Ko Marlon James te kaituhi tuatahi i whānau mai i Hamika i whakaingoatia mo te paraihe, i a Laila Lalami te kaituhi rārangi roa tuatahi i whānau mai i Moroko. I tēnei wā kei te noho ngā kaituhi e rua i te US, ko te tuatahi i Minneapolis, ko te whakamutunga i Santa Monica. I kī te kaituhi me te kaipānui a Michael Wood, te tūru o ngā kaiwhakawā o tēnei tau, he tino "whakamīharo... E rua pea te roa o te rārangi roa". "He whakamīharo te awhe o ngā mahinga rerekē me ngā momo o ēnei pukapuka," ka haere tonu a ia. "Ka mahi katoa rātou i tētahi mea mīharo ki te reo kua kōwhiria e rātou ki te whakamahi." I whakaarotia a Enright i whānau mai i Dublin i te wā i toa ai te Huihuinga, tana pukapuka tuawhā, i te whakawhiwhinga o te tau 2007, i patua ai ngā taitara pēnei i a Ian McEwan's On Chesil Beach me Mohsin Hamid's The Reluctant Fundamentalist.

title: Ka tautohe a Swinney ka piki ake te pūtea NHS ki runga ake i te £12bn
summary: Ko te tahua mō NHS Scotland me piki ake i te £288m ki neke atu i te £12bn, kua kī te Hēkeretari Pūtea a John Swinney.
text: Ko te pānuitanga he wāhanga o tētahi mōkī o ngā tikanga pūtea i whakaritea e Tēnā Swinney i roto i tana tauākī pūtea ki ngā MSP. I pānuitia hoki e ia te pūtea mō te hanganga, ngā kura, te whare me te tōtika pūngao. I whakapaea e Labour me ngā Conservatives a Tēnā Swinney i te kore e pare i te pūtea NHS i roto i ngā tahua whai muri. I roto i tana tauākī pūtea ki te Pāremata o Pirihitini, ka kī te hēkeretari pūtea: "E whai ana tēnei tahua i te whakahau tōrangapū tino kātoretore kua pā ki a Pākehā. " Kāore i taea e tētahi te hapa i ngā wawata i whakapuakina i runga i te māramatanga manawa e hiahia ana te iwi o Pākehā ki te noho i tētahi whenua rangatira ake, he whenua ātaahua ake i tēnei rā." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te haere tonu tēnei pūtea i a mātau mahi hei whakaiti i ngā tapahi oranga a te kāwanatanga o UK me te tautoko e £81m, ā, ka tuku i ā mātou whakaritenga ki te whakawhānui i te tiaki tamariki me te whakarato kai kura koreutu mō ngā tauira P1-P3 katoa. " Ā, mā mātou e haumaru te wā heke mai o te ratonga hauora i roto i ngā ringa tūmatanui, me te pūtea tāpiri i te 2015-16 e kawe mai ana i te pūtea hauora katoa ki neke atu i te £12bn mō te wā tuatahi." 'Kāore i puritia' te kaikorero pūtea a Te Hunga Mahi o Pirihitini, a Iain Gray, i kī te tuhinga pūtea i whakaatu i tētahi pikinga tūturu i roto i ngā tahua NHS huri noa i te 1%, he iti iho i te hauwhā o te pikinga i whakaritea i Ingarangi. "Kāore anō kia piki haere te whakapau hauora i konei, ahakoa i whakaritea ki te NHS Ingarihi e whakahaeretia ana e Tory," tana kī atu ki a MSPs. "He iti iho te £700m o to mātau NHS i te mea e tika ana, mehemea i puritia e [Mr Swinney] ana kī taurangi. " Kua tōrino te whakamahinga o te wāhanga tūmataiti i roto i tā mātou ratonga hauora." I urupare a Tēnā Swinney kua piki ake te whakauru o te wāhanga tūmataiti ki te NHS i Pākehā mai i te 0.8% ki te 0.9% noa iho. I whakapuakina e ngā Tohutohu o Pirihitini te Ratonga Mōhiohio Pāremata o Pirihitini i tātaritia e te Institute of Fiscal Studies, nāna i whakaatu kua hinga te tahua hauora i waenganui i te 11.8bn ki te £11.6bn i waenganui i te 2008 me te 2014. I kī te kaiārahi Rangatira o Pirihitini, a Ruth Davidson: "Kaore he mea e ngaro atu ana i te mea kua whakahaeretia e Alex Salmond ngā tapahi ki te NHS o Pākehā. " I kī te IFS takitahi, ā, ināianei kua tae mai te ratonga mōhiohio tōkeke a te pāremata ki te whakatauranga ōrite." I te wā o ngā pātai a te minita tuatahi i mua i te tauākī pūtea, ka tohe a Tēnā Salmond kei te nui haere te pūtea NHS. Ko te tahua hukihuki Ko te tahua hukihuki, e hiahiatia ana te whakaaetanga a MSPs, i tautuhia: Heoi anō, ka anga atu ētahi wāhi ki ngā utu pūtea kia nui ake ai te whakapau moni ki tētahi atu wāhi, tae atu ki: I pānuitia hoki e Tēnā Swinney ngā utu o ngā tāke tuatahi kia whakaritea e Pākehā mō neke atu i te 300 tau. I raro i te ture i whakaaetia i Westminster e rua tau ki mua, ka taea e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini te whakarewa i tētahi tāke tauwhitinga āhuatanga hou, hei whakakapi i te mahi pane kuini, me tētahi tāke peke.

title: Ko te waehere o te minita hou e whāwhā ana i te whakaweti me te whakatoi
summary: Ka taea te panaia ngā minita mō te whakaweti, te whakatoi, te "whanonga tika, aukati rānei" i raro i tētahi waehere whanonga i whakaputaina e Ēnā Me.
text: E kī ana hoki te waehere minita kua whakahōutia me pūrongo ngā minita i ngā hui whai mana i te UK, i rāwāhi rānei. Mēnā e whai ana i tētahi aho heitara i whakapuaki i ngā tumuaki o ngā mema kāpata o mua, o Tā Michael Fallon me Priti Patel. Kua whakahaua e Ēnā Me ana minita kia pānui i te tuhinga kua whakarerekētia. I whakaurua te waehere whanonga o te minita e John Major i te tau 1992, ā, he maha ngā whakahōutanga, i te nuinga o te wā hei urupare ki ngā heitara. I whakaputaina te putanga whakamutunga e Mrs May i Hakihea 2016. Mai i taua wā, kua waiho a Tā Michael Fallon hei hēkeretari wawao i muri i ngā whakaaro hē ki ngā kaipūrongo wahine. I tērā marama i tonoa ai a Tēnā Kākāriki kia waiho hei Hēkeretari Tuatahi o te Kāwanatanga i muri i tana whakawāteatanga kua takahia te waehere o te minita mā te mahi kōrero "hē, māminga" mō ngā mea i mōhiotia e ia mō ngā kerēme i kitea i runga i tana rorohiko tari i te tau 2008. Ko te pūnaha amuamu takitahi Ko te waehere hōu e tātaki ana, ko te wā tuatahi, "ko te whakatīwheta, te whakaweti, ētahi atu whanonga hē, aukati rānei i ngā wāhi katoa e tū ana, kāore e ōrite ki te Waehere Minita, ā, e kore e whakaaetia". I whakarerea a Ms Patel hei hēkeretari whanaketanga ao whānui i Whiringa ā Whiringa ā Rangi i muri i te korenga pūrongo i ngā hui me ngā mana kāwanatanga o Iharaira i te wā o tētahi hararei tūmataiti i te whenua. Nā te mahi i puta ai tētahi wāhanga hōu i roto i te waehere o te minita, e kī ana: "Mēnā ka tūtaki te minita ki tētahi rōpū o waho, ki tētahi tangata rānei, ā, ka kite i a rātou e kōrerorero ana i ngā umanga whai mana me te kore whai mana - hei tauira i tētahi wā pāpori, i te hararei rānei - me whakahoki ngā ihirangi nui ki te tari i muri tata nei i te takahanga". Ka taea e ngā minita te noho tonu hei MP mēnā kua panaia rātau i te kāpata, i tētahi atu mahi tari rānei, ā, kāore ngā ture hōu e pā ana ki ngā kaiwhakahaere, ki ngā mema rānei o ngā rōpū ātete. Many Conservative and Labour MPs are still under investigation following allegations about their behaviour. Kei te tātuhia e te kaiārahi o Ngātahi a Andrea Leadsom ngā mahere me tētahi rōpū mahi whakawhiti-rōpū mō tētahi pūnaha amuamu takitahi hei rutu i te tūkino me te whakatūtū i te Pāremata. I pānuitia e Mrs May te tānga o te waehere hou mō ngā minita i te hui tuatahi o tana kāpata hou i te 10 o Downing Street. Na te pirimia "i tono ki ngā hoa mahi kāpata katoa kia whakaū ā muri ake nei kua pānuitia e rātau me a rātau tīma o te minita", te kī a tana kaikōrero whai mana.

title: Hauora Karunanidhi: Ko te minita nui o Tamila Nadu i te hōhipera
summary: Kua huihui mai te huihuinga nui ki waho o tētahi hōhipera i te tūnga o Tamila Nadu o Īnia ki te tonga, i reira e rima nga wā i whakaaetia ai tētahi pāremata i mahi hei minita nui i te Hātarei.
text: Ko Muthuvel Karunanidhi, e 94, kei te "aroturukitia, kei te rongoatia" i roto i te rōpū tiaki nui. E kī ana ngā tākuta kua whakapai ake a ia i muri i te whakapokenga o te ara mimi. Engari e uaua ana ngā pirihimana ki te pupuri i ngā huihuinga ā-hinengaro e hiahia ana ki ngā rongo. I muri iho i te 50 tau hei kaiārahi o te rōpū DMK o Īnia, kua whakaemi a ia i tētahi tino nui e whai ake nei i Īnia, ā, he pai ki a ia tētahi tūnga atua i waenganui i ana kaitautoko. I whakaaetia tuatahitia te pāremata 94 tau ki te hōhipera i te taone o Chennai i te pō Hātarei, i muri i te taka o tōna pēhanga toto, e ai ki tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki tana pūkete Twitter. Tērā tētahi "tūponotanga rangitahi" i roto i tōna āhuatanga rongoā i te pō Rātapu, engari ināianei kua kīia ngā tohu nui o Tēnā Karunanidhi he "whakanoa". I ngā rā tata nei ka pā ki a ia tētahi hātepe hei huri i tana ngongo tracheostomy hei āwhina i a ia ki te hā. I ētahi wā e whakaritea ana a ia ki tōna tauwhāinga o mua, te tino minita nui o Tamila Nadu, o Aoram Purelalitha, i te tau 2016 i muri i te matenga o te manawa. I tangihia tōna matenga e te tekau mano o ngā tāngata, a, e whitu rā te wā tangi i Tamila Nadu.

title: Ko Zuckerberg a Facebook hei whakaatu i te aroaro o te komiti o Amerika
summary: Me whakaatu te rangatira nui o Facebook, a Mark Zuckerberg, i mua i te Komiti Tauhokohoko o te Whare o Amerika e pā ana ki te whakamahinga me te parenga o ngā raraunga kaiwhakamahi a te umanga.
text: Kua anga atu a Facebook ki te whakahē i muri i te putanga mai kua mōhiotia mō ngā tau kua hauhaketia e Cambridge Analytica ngā raraunga mai i te 50 miriona o ōna kaiwhakamahi. Ka whakaatu a ia i te aroaro o te komiti i te Wenerei, 11 o Āperira. I pōhiritia e te manukura o te komiti ko Greg Walden me te mema o Frank Pallone te whakataunga a Tēnā Zuckerberg. "He wā hira tēnei whakarongo ki te whakamārama i ngā take tūmataitinga raraunga kiritaki takenui me te āwhina i ngā Kaiāwhina katoa kia mārama ake ki ngā mea e pā ana ki ā rātou mōhiohio whaiaro tuihono," te kī a te tokorua. Kei te anga atu a Facebook ki te tirotiro i tana kohinga raraunga i muri i ngā whakaaro i whiwhi raraunga a Cambridge Analytica, tētahi umanga tohutohu tōrangapū, i ngā raraunga mō ngā kaiwhakamahi Facebook tekau miriona hei whakamātau ki te whakaawe i te pōti. I mahi a Cambridge Analytica mō te whakahau a te Perehitini o Amerika Donald Trump. Ko te kamupene, i pūteatia e te kaitautoko o te Pāpāho, ko Robert Mercer, i takiruatia ngā raraunga kiritaki ki ngā mōhiohio kaipōti. I kohia e Cambridge Analytica ngā raraunga mā tētahi taupānga whakamātautau tuakiri, e kiia nei ko This Is Your Digital Life, i tikiake e te iti iho i te 200,000 tāngata. Heoi anō, i tukuna e te taupānga he āheitanga ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai ki ngā kōtaha o ngā hoa Facebook o ngā kaiuru, e āhei ai rātou ki te kohikohi raraunga mai i ngā kaiwhakamahi e hia miriona. I kī a Tēnā Wānanga rāua ko Tēnā Pallone i tērā marama e hiahia ana rāua ki te whakarongo hāngai mai i a Tēnā Zuckerberg i muri i te korenga o ngā kaiwhakahaere matua o Facebook ki te whakautu pātai i te wā o tētahi kōrero tūmataiti me ngā kaimahi o te rōpū kāwanatanga mō te whakamahi me te pare i ngā raraunga kiritaki a Facebook me ngā kaiwhakawhanake hunga tuatoru. Kua whakaputaina hoki e Facebook ngā putanga hōu o ōna ture ratonga me te kaupapahere whakamahi raraunga. I kī te umanga he roa ake ngā tuhinga i ngā putanga o mua kia mārama ake, kia mārama ake ai tō rātou reo. E kī ana te kaupapahere raraunga ināianei: "Kāore mātou e hoko i ō mōhiohio ki tētahi tangata, ā, e kore rawa mātou e hoko." Heoi anō, kāore tēnei e aukati i te umanga ki te whakamahi i ngā raraunga kia ūkuia ai e ngā kaipānui ā rātou whakatairanga. Ka tiritiri tonu hoki i ngā tātaritanga ingoamuna me ngā kitenga ki ngā rōpū tuatoru. Ināianei ka mahia e Facebook tētahi whakaaro wiki i mua i te whakaotinga o te kuputuhi me te whakaaetanga. Ko te 'takanga o te whakawhirinaki' Facebook, e rua miriona ōna kaiwhakamahi, ināianei ko tētahi o ngā huarahi matua e tūhono ai ngā kaipōti ki ngā kaipōti. E kimi ana ki te whakatika i tōna atahanga tūmatanui me te whakaora i te whakawhirinaki o ngā kaiwhakamahi mai i te putanga mai o te heitara o Cambridge Analytica. I kī a Facebook i tērā marama kua utua e ia ngā kaihautū ā-ture ki te tirotiro mēnā kei a Cambridge Analytica tonu ngā raraunga. Kua whakapārewa a Tēnā Zuckerberg mō tētahi "takahi whirinaki", ā, i tangohia ngā pānuitanga whārangi katoa i roto i ngā nūpepa maha o te Rātapu o UK me Amerika. Kua kī hoki a ia e pōhiritia ana e ia ētahi atu ture. Kua tonoa hoki e nga komiti tauhokohoko me nga komiti whakawāwā o te Senate o Amerika kia puta mai a Tēnā Zuckerberg i mua i a rātau. Ā, kei te uiui te Komihana Mahi a te Hautahi o Amerika mēnā i uru a Facebook ki ngā mahi tika i tino whara ai ngā kiritaki.

title: Te rangahau o Paora rāua ko Sandra Dunham: Ko te pō whakamutunga o te tokorua i UK
summary: Ko tētahi tokorua e anga ana ki te rangahau ki a Mātau i runga i ngā utu tinihanga, me rere atu i te UK i te ahiahi o te Rāite, e mārama ana te HAU.
text: I haere a Paora rāua ko Sandra Dunham ki te hōhipera i te wiki ki muri i te kīanga kua ngana rāua ki te whakamate i a rāua anō kia kore ai rāua e tukuna ki a Mātau. E whakapono ana kei te puritia te tokorua, mai i Northampton, e nga pirihimana i te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow i te pō. I tūmanakohia kia whakahokia rātau i te Wenerei. I kī te rōia o Karen Todner he "tokorua mahi uaua mai i Northamptonshire e kaha ana ki te whakakāhore i ngā whakaaro ki a rāua." I tautohetohe te tokorua i ngā kōti o UK me Ūropi kia kaua rāua e whakahokia ki a Mātau nā ngā māharahara mō tō rāua hauora me tō rāua manaakitanga i a rāua e pupuri ana i reira. I pātai mai mehemea kua nui te whakaaro ki te hauora hinengaro o Dunhams, ka kī te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Ēnā Me: "Ko te ture ināianei kāore i te Tari Kāinga, te hēkeretari kāinga, te mana ki te uru atu. " He take ēnei e haere ana i mua i te kōti, ā, e mārama ana mō ō rātou māngai ā-ture ki te whakatau mēnā e hiahia ana rātou ki te mahi anō i mua i te kōti." Ko ngā whakaaro e anga ana a Tēnā Dunham ki te pokapū i tōna wā hei rangatira nui me te perehitini o Pace, he kamupene US e hanga ana i ngā rino whakapiri mō te umanga hiko. I whakapaea ia i runga i te 13 o ngā tatau tinihanga me te horoi moni e tētahi hūri matua i Maryland i Tīma 2011. E whakapaea ana a Mrs Dunham ki te āwhina me te whakahauhau i a ia. I mahi te tokorua i te US i waenganui i te 1999 me te 2009. Kua kī ngā mana i te UK me te US e kore rātau e kōrero mō te kēhi o Dunham kia puta rā anō te rangahau.

title: Ka tīmata te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero a te ratonga ahi o West Yorkshire
summary: Ko ngā mahere hei tapahi i ngā pou kaipatu ahi e 200, ka kati i ngā teihana ahi me te whakaiti i te maha o ngā mīhini i West Yorkshire, me haere ki te whakaaro tūmatanui.
text: Ko te ratonga ahi o te rohe, e kī ana tērā pea ka anga atu ki ngā tapahi pūtea tae noa ki te tau 2020, e kī ana ka tiakina e ngā huringa te £8m. I kī te mana ahi i tana whakatau kia whakaputaina ngā tono hei whakaaro kia kaua e tirohia hei tohu tautoko mō rātou. Ka whakatauria e te mana i tana hui i te 21 o Hakihe. Tae atu ki te tapahi i ngā pou kaipatu ahi wā katoa, ko ētahi atu tūtohutanga ko te kati i te teihana ahi o Haworth i Bradford me te hanumi i ngā teihana ahi o Shipley me Idle ki tētahi pae hou. 'Ngā hua haumaru' I Leeds, ka hanumia ngā teihana ahi o Hunslet me Morley, pērā ki a Rothwell me Garforth me Cookridge me Moortown. Kua tonoa hoki kia kati i te teihana ahi o Marsden i Kirklees me te tango i tētahi mīhini mai i Halifax. I Wakefield, ka hangaia he teihana ahi hou mō Ossett kia tata atu ki te pokapū o te taone o Wakefield, me tētahi mīhini i tangohia mai i te teihana o Wakefield. I kī te Āpiha Ahi Matua o Haimona Pilling me whakarite e ia he whakarato mo te wā roa hei hanga anō i te uhi ahi, ā, kāore he mea i "ehara i te kōwhiringa". I kī te Uniana o nga Rōpū Ahi ka whai "hua nui" pea nga tono mo te haumarutanga tūmatanui. I kī te kaikaunihera o Mehboob Kani, te kaiwhakahaere o te mana ahi: "I waenganui i tēnei wā me te 30 o Whiringa ā Rangi, kei te uru mātau ki tētahi mahi whakarongo, ā, kāore he mea atu. " E hiahia ana mātau ki te whakataurite i nga tohenga ngaio me nga whakaaro o te iwi o te rohe. "Kāore he whakataunga whakamutunga e tangohia i mua i te pūrongo mai o te hua o te whakaaro ki a mātau i te 21 o Hakihea."

title: I tangohia te tohu pāparapara o te tangata pango o Ashbourne i waenganui i te haupae whakahāwea
summary: Kua tangohia tētahi ahua o te māhunga o te tangata pango i tētahi tohu pāparapara i waenganui i te haupae mo te whakahāwea.
text: I kī te Kaunihera Takiwā o Derbyshire Dales i te Mane ka "tangohia ināianei tonu" te āhuahira rino me te rākau o te rau tau 18 i Ashbourne. Tata ki te 150 ngā tangata i huihui ki te tango i te whika, e kī taurangi ana kia whakahokia mai, i mua i te mahi a te kaunihera. Neke atu i te 40,000 ngā waitohu i kohia e tētahi petihana hei tango i te māhunga, i whakarewaina i te Paraire. I kī te tangata whenua o Ashbourne, a Mark Redfern, ko te māhunga, he wāhanga o te tohu Kōeke II* kua rārangitia mō te The Green Man & Black's Head Royal Hotel i St John Street, "ka whakaoratia i a ia i runga i te whenua, ā, ka hoki ki tōna tūnga ā muri ake". I kī a ia i kite ngā kaikaunihera paetata i te tangohanga. I roto i tētahi pou Facebook, ka kī a Tēnā Redfern ka hoatu ki te māhunga "he mitimiti peita pango", ā, i kī ko te nekehanga hei tiaki i te tūkinotanga. Kua kohia e tana tama, a Haora Redfern, 17 tau, neke atu i te 4,000 ngā waitohu i runga i tētahi petihana e karanga ana kia noho tonu te upoko mō ngā take hītori. I kī te tangata noho o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, nāna i kī i uru a ia ki te tango i te āhuahira: "Kei te mahi te tangata i ēnei mahi whakahāwea me te kore mōhio ki ngā take." I kī a ia he upoko te whika no tētahi tangata Tākehi i haere mai ki Ashbourne i ngā rau tau ki mua, a, ka hokona kawhe. "I mauria mai e ia te rangatiratanga. He tangata Tākehi tino manaaki, e arohaina ana a ia, nā reira i runga i tōna hōnore ka whakaarahia e rātau tōna māhunga. Kaore he pānga ki te kahungatanga," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ka haere ia ki runga ki te tohu ki te whakaora i a ia me tōna pāpā. "He parauri pōuri tonu te tohu," tana kī. "I whakamāramatia mai e taku pāpā ki a au he tangata Tākehi tēnei, ehara i te tangata pango. I peitatia he parauri, kātahi ka hē tētahi mea i roto i te whakaoratanga." Ko te whakatau a te Kaunihera Takiwā o Derbyshire Dales ki te tango i te māhunga i whai i te whakapakoko o tētahi kaihokohoko kahunga i Bristol e haehae ana i te wā o ngā whakaaturanga i te Rātapu. I kī tētahi kaikaunihera i kōrero tētahi kaikaunihera ki te rōpū, e whakamārama ana me tango rangitahi te kaunihera i te whika mō ngā painga o te haumarutanga tūmatanui i mua i te whakaritenga. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te rōpū, he arawhata tāna, kātahi ka whakatau ka tangohia e rātau te whika hei tiaki haumaru, ā, kāore i te hiahia ki te waihanga i tētahi tautohetohe, i roto i ngā āhuatanga kāore mātau i whakahē. " E tūmanako ana mātou kia riro i a mātau te whika māhunga ā muri ake nei." I kī a Ingarangi Hītori: "Hei kaitohutohu a te kāwanatanga mo te tuku iho, ka rite mātou ki te tohutohu i te kaunihera mō ngā hipanga panuku mēnā e hiahiatia ana e rātou." I kī tētahi tauira mātauranga tangata e 20 tau mai i te taone - kāore i pīrangi kia whakaingoatia - he rite te tohu ki te gollywog, he pepeha kākahu o te rau tau 19 e whakaarotia ana he whakahāwea. "Ki taku whakaaro kei te whakamā te tangata," tana kī. I kī a Matthew Holt, he tauira whanaungatanga ao whānui 19 tau mai i Ashbourne: "Ko te tikanga kei roto i tētahi whare taonga e taea ai e tātau te ako mō taua mea me tētahi whakaahuatanga hei horopaki." I kī te kaikaunihera o Barry Lewis, te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Derbyshire, kia kaua e tangohia te whika, ahakoa he "mārama te āhua o te ahurea, te whakahāwea". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei reira te tuku iho ahurea hei whakamatautau i a mātau i ētahi wā, kia whakararuraru ai mātau." I kī tētahi kaikōrero Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana i haere mai ngā āpiha mai i te 21:00 tae noa ki te 23:00 BST ki te "mātakitaki i te āhuatanga me te whakarite kāore he pakaru o te rangimārie". "Kaore he hopunga," tana kī. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Kei te whakapono tonu te Aranga mō te nuinga?
summary: E tū ana tētahi hēki Aranga nui, huruhuru i waenganui i tētahi tiriti iti i tētahi wāhi hokohoko i te raki o Rānana.
text: Caroline WyattReligious affairs correspondent@CarolineWyatton Twitter Kei raro nei he karere Aranga: "Ko tēnei hēki hei whakamahara i ngā tāngata kia hoko i ngā kaihoko takitahi." I whakaaro ahau tērā pea hei whakamahara i te iwi ki tērā atu karere o te Aranga - te Aranga o Ihu Karaiti, hei tauira, ka tohua e ngā hāhi puta noa i te whenua i te Rātapu. Engari te āhua nei ko te karere o te hokohoko te mea kaha ake, me te pukapuka Retail Week e pānui ana i ngā rongo hari ka tata ki te 5% te waewae i ngā pokapū hokohoko, ngā pāka hokohoko me ngā tiriti tiketike i te mutunga wiki o te Aranga "i te wā e whakapau ana ngā kaihoko i a rātau moni utu". Kāore i te mārama mēnā ka nui ake hoki te nui o ngā waewae i ngā whare karakia puta noa i te whenua, ahakoa kei te nui ake ngā ratonga Kirihimete me te Aranga i te nuinga o ngā wiki. E 1.3 miriona ngā tāngata i te UK i haere ki ngā ratonga o te Hāhi Aranga o Ingarangi anake i te tau 2013 - i whakaritea ki te 2.5 miriona mō te Kirihimete. Mō ngā tau maha ināianei, kua tangi ngā whika hāhi ārahi i te mea i roto i tētahi whenua e whai mana tonu ana i te Karaitiana, e tata ana ki te 60% o ngā tāngata e tohu ana i a rātau anō i roto i te tatauranga o te tau 2011 (ahakoa he iti rawa te haere ki ngā ratonga hāhi, e whakapono ana rānei ki te Atua), kua toromi te karere whakapono o te Aranga e te hākari tiakarete me te hokohoko o te ao e hākaritia ana i ngā hokomaha puta noa i te whenua. I whakapaea e ngā hokomaha i tēnei tau, i whakapaea ētahi mekameka hokomaha nui he "ārai whakapono", nā te mea kāore rātau i whakaae ki te whakaputu i ngā hēki Aranga tiakarete me tētahi karere Karaitiana - i runga i ngā take kāore i tino pai te hoko i ngā tau o mua. Ko te āhua nei i pātai atu tētahi kaihoko mekameka hokomaha ki te kamupene e whakarato ana i ngā hēki, te Kamupene Tiakarete Whai Tikanga, he aha te pānga o te Aranga ki te Hāhi. He pūrākau tērā i tino pouri ai te tokomaha o ngā kaiārahi hāhi, me te mamae i te āhua o te ngaronga o tōna tikanga whakapono i tētahi wā matua i roto i te maramataka Karaitiana. I ngā tau tata nei, i whakapuakina e te Pīhopa Pīhopa o Ioka, a Dr John Sentamu, i roto i tana kauhau o te Rātapu o te Aranga, tōna pouri i te tata ki te tuatoru o ngā tamariki o Ingarangi i roto i tētahi uiuinga i kī ai rātau ko te Aranga te whānautanga o te rāpeti Aranga, engari neke atu i te hawhe kāore i mōhio ki tōna tikanga whakapono. Ehara i te pātai tērā pea ka pōhēhē tētahi whakatupuranga pakeke ake i te UK, he tokomaha o rātau e maumahara ana ki ngā Aranga o to rātau tamarikitanga. Ko te haere ki te karakia i te Rātapu o te Aranga i kitea pea he iti noa iho, engari he maha ngā whānau me ngā hapori i huihuia mai. He aha te hanganga whakapono o Ingarangi me Uēra i te tatauranga o te tau 2011? Karaitiana: 33.2 miriona (59%, heke iho i te 12% mai i te 2001) Mohimana: 2.7 miriona (5%, tae atu ki te 2001) Kāore he hāhi: 14.1 miriona (25%, tae atu ki te 10% mai i te 2001) Mō ngā tamariki i whānau i te wā o te pakanga, ka noho tonu te tiakarete hei taonga ātaahua - me te Aranga ka maharatia ake mōna. He miramira tonu te kimi hēki Aranga mō te tokomaha o ngā tamariki i tēnei rā, engari i roto i tētahi wā e nui ana mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i te uru, ehara te tiakarete me ngā kākahu hou i te mea "motuhake", engari he auau ake te whakangahau. Te āhua nei he iti noa iho te wāhi o te mana o te Atua me te Atua i roto i te oranga o te tokomaha o ngā taitamariki pakeke i tēnei rā. I kitea e tētahi poipoi YouGov mō ngā āhuatanga pāpori i waenganui i ngā pakeke 18-24 tau i Ingarangi i June 2013, neke atu i te 900 ngā mātua (82%), ngā hoa (77%), ngā pūkenga (38%), ngā toa (32%) me ngā tāngata rongonui (21%) he nui ake ngā āhuatanga hira ki a rātou i ngā kaiārahi whakapono, i haere whakamutunga mai me te 12%. E 25% noa iho o te hunga i urupare i kī e whakapono ana rātau ki te Atua, 19% ki tētahi mana wairua teitei ake, i te 18% kāore i te mōhio, me te 38% i kī kāore rātau i whakapono ki tētahi Atua, ki tētahi mana wairua teitei ake rānei. Heoi anō, ko te āhuatanga kotahi o te Aranga kua tīmata ētahi ki te awhi i te ngākau nui i roto i ngā tau tata nei, ahakoa he kōrero noa iho, ko te Lent - ehara i te mea nui rawa i roto i tōna āhua taketake o te nohopuku wairua, te tuku mīti rānei, engari mā te whakamahi i ngā wiki e ahu atu ana ki te Aranga hei wāhi ki te tuku i te tiakarete, te waipiro, te kai paipa rānei. Tērā pea ka kitea e ētahi te Lent ināianei he wā ā-ao ki te horoi i te tinana i te nui o ia rā, mēnā ehara i te wairua. Ahakoa he tokomaha o tātau e āhei ana ki te whakangāwari i tō tātau hiakai mō ngā kai i ngā tekau tau o mua, ā, ko te nuinga o te UK ehara i te whakapono, i te iti iho rānei o te whakapono i ngā tekau tau ki mua, tērā te hiakai e toe ana. He hiakai ki tētahi momo tikanga i roto i te ora, i runga ake, i tua atu i te rawa. Mai i te nui o te manakohanga o te tangata me te hinengaro, o ngā "ratonga Rātapu" kāore i te whakapono, i te "kabbalah" rānei, me te manakohanga mau tonu o te ioka, kaua e kōrero i te tupunga o ētahi o ngā hāhi kāore anō kia whakatūria, me ngā pukapuka pēnei i te 'Religion for Atheists' a Alain de Botton, he tokomaha i te uru e rapu tonu ana i te whakautu ki te pātai "he aha tātau i konei?",  ahakoa kua kore rātau e whakapono ki te whakautu e takoto ana i roto i te hāhi whakaritea. Tērā pea ka kitea ngā rōpū hou me ngā tangata e tuku whakautu ana hei "kaihoko takitahi" i tēnei mākete mō te tikanga teitei ake, i te mea ka ngaro ngā kaihoko o mua o te Hāhi Karaitiana i te UK i ngā karakia, ahakoa he āta haere i te hekenga poupou o ngā tekau tau ki mua. Heoi anō, ko te mōhiotanga anake ka rongo ētahi whānau mō te tikanga o te Aranga i ngā rā e heke mai nei, ahakoa he aha te pātai, ehara te whakautu i te tiakarete ake.

title: Te Hōhipera o Hato Hōri i roto i te 'ngangau' i runga i te rahunga pūnaha IT
summary: I makaia tētahi hōhipera o Rāwāhi ki te "ngangau" i te hekenga o tana pūnaha rorohiko mō ngā haora maha.
text: I pūrongotia ngā take hangarau i Hato Hōri i Tooting, ki te tonga o Rāwāhi, tata ki te 17:00 BST, ā, i whakatauria e te 19:40. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu kāore anō kia mōhiotia te take, ā, kua whakarewaina he tūhuratanga. I whakaahuatia e tētahi wahine he "ngangau", ka tāpiri: "E waru haora mātau i konei. Kāore tonu mātou i whai moenga, ā, kei te tatari mātou ki ngā hua X-ray." I tāpiri mai te tūroro, kāore i pīrangi kia whakaingoatia: "I rongo ahau i tētahi tākuta e kī ana, 'Kāore anō ahau kia mahi i tētahi hōhipera i mua i te wāhi i heke ai ngā rorohiko katoa'. I kī te hōhipera ka tuwhera tonu te tari ohorere, ā, ka homai he "ratonga katoa".

title: E tohutohu ana a Pīhopa Pīhopa Welby i te āwhina mō te hiakai o UK
summary: E hiahiatia ana he āwhina anō hei ārai i ngā whānau i te UK e hiakai ana, kua kī te Pīhopa Pīhopa o Canterbury.
text: Kai te moumou te kai i roto i te nui "whakamīharo" engari ko te hiakai "e kakau ana i ngā wāhi nui" o te whenua, ka tuhituhi a Pirihitini Welby i roto i te Mēra i te Rātapu. I tāruatia e ia tētahi pūrongo paremata, kia tukua i te Mane, e whai ana ki te whakamutu i te hiakai i te UK i te tau 2020. I kī a Nick Clegg he wāhanga o ngā mana whai hua, ā, i tonoa he "pūnaha rama waka" hei whakawhāiti i a rātou. I kī te tuarua pirimia i ngā whakaaetanga - i te wāhi e tū ai ngā utu takuhe mō ngā takahitanga pēnei i ngā uiuinga ngaro, i te kore rānei e whai wāhi ki tētahi ngohe e pā ana ki te mahi - kaua e whakaritea i ngā wā katoa "i te pō". I kī te pīhopa nui i mahue i a ia te ohorere i te raruraru o te rawakore o UK i te hunga e mamae ana i ngā puni rerenga o Awherika, nā te mea he tino ohorere. E tūmanakotia ana te pūrongo paremata kia whakatakoto i tētahi tinana hou e mōhiotia ana ko Feeding Britain, ki te rutu i te hiakai i waenganui i te hunga rawakore. E tūmanakohia ana kia karangatia ngā pēke kai nui ake hei tohatoha i ētahi atu kai koreutu me te tohutohu i ngā tāngata me pēhea te tono i ngā painga, te pikinga o te utu mōkito, me te whakarato kai kura koreutu i ngā hararei o te kura mō ngā tamariki o ngā whānau rawakore. Ko te pūrongo te mahi a tētahi uiuinga paremata katoa ki te hiakai me te rawakore kai, i arahina e te MP Labour o Frank Field me te Pīhopa o Truro, a Tim Thornton. 'Whakamā ki te hiakai' I kī te pīhopa nui i rapu te rīpoata ki te "whakakotahi i ngā tāngata mai i ngā hāhi, i ngā pēke kai, i te umanga kai me te kāwanatanga kia tino rerekētia". I waenganui i ngā huatau i roto i tana tuhinga, ka kī a ia kia ngāwari kē atu te tuku kai a ngā kamupene kai UK ki ngā kai kāore e taea e rātou te hoko. I muri i tana whakaahuatanga i ngā tirohanga o tētahi puni rerenga i te Whenua Manapori o Kongo, ka tuhituhi a ia: "... i ētahi wiki i muri mai i Ingarangi, i te kōrero ahau ki ētahi tāngata - he whaea, he pāpā me tētahi tamaiti - i roto i tētahi pēke kai. "I whakamā rātau ki te noho ki reira. Ka pouri te kōrero a te pāpā. I kī a ia kua tīpoka rāua i ngā kai o te rā kotahi i te wiki kia nui ake ai te mahi mō te tamaiti, engari kātahi ka hiahiatia he taea hou mō te motokā kia taea ai e rātau te mahi i te pō, ā, kāore i taea te whakatutuki i ngā mutunga. "Nā reira me haere mai rātau ki tētahi pēke kai. I manaakitia rātau i runga i te manaakitanga, i te aroha, e nga tūao o nga hāhi o te rohe. Otira i hiakai ratou, i whakama hoki ki te hiakai. "I kitea e au he nui ake te mīharo o to rātau raruraru. He iti iho te taumaha, engari i konei." I kī a Tēnā Clegg tērā "ētahi whakaaturanga" e whai hua ana i ngā whakaaetanga i whakahaua ai te tangata ki te whakamahi rangitahi i ngā pēke kai. "Ahakoa e tika ana kia whai mana i roto i te pūnaha takuhe, e whakaaro ana ahau me whakauru atu e tātau tētahi momo pūnaha rama waka kia kore ai ētahi o ngā whakamanatanga e whakaritea kia rite ki te 'pō' i ētahi wā," tana kī. "Tērā pea ka āwhina ki te whakamāmā i ētahi o te raruraru." Kua whakapaea e te Trussell Trust, e whakahaere ana i ngā pēke kai neke atu i te 400, te nui o te whakamahinga o aua pēke i runga i te pikinga o te utu o te oranga, ngā moni whiwhinga pateko me ngā huringa ki ngā painga. I kī te Minita Pakihi 'E mau ana ki te mahere' ko Matthew Hancock tētahi take i nui ake ai te whakamahinga o ngā pēke kai, "he tokomaha atu ngā tāngata e mōhio ana ki a rātou". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te pātai matua me te pātai nui i konei ko: me pēhea koe e rutu ai i ēnei raruraru hōhonu o te rawakore? A, ko te huarahi tino pai rawa atu i roto i tēnā ko te mahi - e kore e mōhiotia." I kī tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga kia kaua te iwi UK e hiakai nā te mea "he nui a mātau kai hei haere". "Ahakoa e whakahuahua ana tēnei pūrongo i ngā wāhi hira hei whakaaro, me maumahara tātau kua puta tēnei whenua i te hōhonutanga hōhonu rawa i roto i te pūmahara ora, ā, ko te whakapiri ki te mahere ohaoha mo te wā roa o tēnei kāwanatanga te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te whakapai ake i ngā paerewa ora," tana kī. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, e 43 ngā kaiārahi Karaitiana, tae atu ki ngā pīhopa Pākehā e 27, i hainatia he reta e whakahau ana i a Rawiri Karauna kia nui te kai a te tangata, e kī ana "ko ngā whakahekenga me ngā rahunga" i roto i te pūnaha painga e taraiwa ana i ngā tāngata ki ngā pēke kai.

title: 'I waea atu ahau ki te mahi me te inoi kia kaua taku pēpi e oho ake'
summary: I roto a Melissa Brooker i tana mahi hei kaiwhakahaere HR matua mo te 10 tau, ā, "i aroha ki ia meneti".
text: Nā Rebecca MarstonPakihipānui pakihi, BBC News Kātahi ka whānau tana tamaiti tuatahi. "Ka pouri, i te tau i hoki mai ai ahau i tango i te tiaho mōku," tana kī. "I āta mārama, ka mārama tonu te hiahia o aku kaitukumahi ki te nui o te wā kanohi. I kite ahau ka mahue ahau i ngā hui matua me ngā huarahi mā te whakapiri mārō ki ngā haora i utua ai ahau." Nā reira ka ngana ia ki te kimi huarahi huri noa. "I whakaae ahau ki ngā hui me ngā waea i aku rā whakatā. I waea atu ahau ki ngā waea i te wā e moe ana taku pēpi, me te inoi kia kaua ia e oho ake. "I mahi ahau i ngā wā katoa i kitea e au. Ahakoa he aha ō haora, tērā te tūmanako mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te haere whakamua, me noho koe 'i ngā wā katoa'. Kāore i tautokona." Ka mahi hoki a "Sarah" i roto i te HR. Kāore a ia e pīrangi ki te whakamahi i tōna ingoa tūturu nā te mea kei te māharahara a ia ki te ngaro i tana mahi. Ahakoa e aroha ana a ia ki tāna mahi, e kī ana a ia, "Na te taratahitanga i rongo ai ahau i te mahi mai i te wā e haere ana i tētahi wā, ā, kua whakangaro i te wairua. E whiua ana ahau mo te kore e rima rā i te wiki." 'Pihikete uaua' Ehara tēnei i te āhua o te wāhi mahi ngāwari. Mai i te tau 2014, ko te ture e whai mana ana tētahi kaimahi ki te tono kia ngāwari te mahi. Ehara i te mea he tino ōrite ngā pūrākau a Sarah rāua ko Melissa. I kitea e tētahi uiuinga a ngā tohunga mahi ngāwari, a Timewise, e rua hautoru o ngā kaimahi wā e noho taratahi ana, e uaua ana ki te hanga tūhononga ngaio. I hoki mai a Sarah ki te mahi i muri i tētahi āputa roa ake i te mea noa iho, tokorua ngā tamariki e tata ana ki a rātou. "He pihikete uaua ahau, whakapono mai ki a koe, engari i ētahi wā i tangi ai ahau. Kua memeha noa iho ngā whakahoahoa i hangaia e au i roto i te rima tau." I te mea ko te mahi ngāwari te āhua o te nuinga o tātau ināianei e mahi ana i te UK, he raruraru nui tēnei. Ko te pūrongo a 'Flexism' Timewise, Mahi Wā-Wā: Te Rohe Aukati?, i kitea: E kīia ana e te kaiwhakarewa o Timewise ko Karen Mattison tētahi atu momo whakahāweatanga: "flexism". "Ko te nuinga o te ahurea mahi e hāngai tonu ana ki te tauira e rima rā o te tau 1950, me te kore ngāwari i te wā e tū ana ngā hui, te whakangungu me te whatunga - ka waiho ngā kaimahi wā-wā e noho taratahi ana. " He iti noa iho te 6% o ngā tāngata e whakaarotia ana kia mahi i tētahi '9 ki te 5' tūturu, he kaha tā mātou tono mō te huringa. "Ehara te wā wā me te ngāwari i te wā heke mai o te mahi. Ko ratou te inaianei. Ā, ko rātou te huarahi e hiahia ana te nuinga o te iwi ki te mahi." I kitea e tētahi uiuinga o nā tata nei mō te tinana kaute Cima ko te mahi ngāwari i runga i te rārangi mō te rua tuatoru o ngā kaiwhakautu, i runga ake i te utu. 'Utauta rautaki' E karanga ana a Timewise ki ngā pakihi kia nui ake te mahi hei whakahaere i te kaha o ā rātou kaimahi wā mā te mahi i tētahi huarahi āwhina ake. Kei te whakarewaina e te rōpū te Whatunga PowerFlex - te whatunga pakihi tuatahi o UK hei tautoko i ngā kaimahi waenganui, matua hoki. Ka whakarite kia tukuna ngā wāhi whatunga, ngā kaikōrero me ngā whakangungu, hei āwhina i te hunga e mahi ana i te wā wā, i te ngāwari hoki e ngaro ana i ngā huarahi e tangohia ana e ō rātou hoa mahi wā katoa. E kī ana a Claire McCartney mai i te Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development (CIPD), mā te whakamahi tika, ka kawea mai e te mahi ngāwari ngā painga nui. "Ka taea te whakamahi i te mahi ngāwari hei utauta rautaki hei tautoko i te mahinga pai ake o te tangata me te whakahaere mā te whakawhanake i te rerenga kētanga nui ake, te whakataetae parani me te whakanui ake i ngā taumata o te whakaaetanga mahi me te tukutahi mai i ngā kaimahi." Engari ka tāpiri mai a ia, kia puta ai tēnei, he "tino hira kia whiwhi rātou i ngā huarahi ōrite ki ērā e mahi ana i ngā tauira tūturu ake, ina tae mai ki te whanaketanga pūkenga me te kauneketanga". Te mahi ngāwari me te Pūtake ture: Ko ngā kamupene ārahi CIPD, tae atu ki EY, Lloyds Banking Group, Dixons Carphone me Diageo i muri i a Timewise me ana mahi. Kua mahia e Raiti ētahi huringa nui. I roto i ngā tau e rua kua whakanuia te wāhanga o ngā tūranga hōu me ngā whakaritenga mahi agile mai i te iti iho i te 10% ki neke atu i te 90%. E kī ana a Assad Malic mai i Dixons Carphone e titiro ana ki te whakakore katoa i ngā kirimana paerewa. "We have an ambition to remove the standard 37-hour, 9am to 5pm contract all over the coming years and we go to every effort to make our flexible and part-timers' experience feel inclusive and progressive," he says. 'Kāore he kōwhiringa' Na te kore whakaae ki tōna āhua mahi i whakarere ai a Melissa Brooker i tana mahi, ā, ka whakatū i a ia anō. Ināianei ka mahi a ia ki tāna e hiahia ana, ā, kāore he tangata e āwangawanga. "Ko te mea ātaahua, mai i taku noho takitahi, kāore ngā kiritaki i te tino raruraru mō ngā haora e mahi ana ahau. Mēnā e hiahia ana ahau ki te kī, 'Kāore e taea e au te mahi i mua i te 3pm,' kei te pai tonu rātou. E hapa ana ahau i te noho hei wāhanga o tētahi tīma, engari koinei taku rongoā, ā, kua tino pai te mahi mōku." I tēnei wā, kua mau a "Hara" ki tōna oranga mahi pouri. "Me whakapiri atu ahau. Kāore aku kōwhiringa. I muri i te 11 tau i tēnei taumata ka taea e au te haere ki hea? "Ahakoa he aha, he ruarua tonu ngā uiuinga mahi a au, ā, i kīia mai ki a au me mahi wā katoa, kāore he kōwhiringa kē." Te āhua nei ka nui tonu te mahi a Timewise ki te huri i te whenua mahi mō ngā tāngata pēnei i a Sarah.

title: Ka hangaia e te waiata Īnia huaketo he ngaru tōrangapū i Pakitāne
summary: Kua huaketo tētahi waiata ā-iwi Īnia e paingia ana, he maha ngā mahi whakarihariha i Pakitāne i muri i te paroditanga a tētahi rōpū ki te kōrero mō te ngangau tōrangapū o nā noa nei.
text: Nā Prasanna JoshiBBC Hindi Karachi Vynz i tuhi, i whakaahua hoki i tētahi putanga Urdu o te waiata reo Marathi Sonu, ki te kōrero mō te tukunga iho o te pirimia o mua o Nawaz Ngaha. E whakamahara ana ta rātau pūhohe i te pāremata ātete, a Matua Kani mo te whai i ngā utu hāmate ki a Tēnā Ngaha. I puta atu a Tēnā Ngaha i muri i te whakakorenga a te Kōti Matua i a ia i te tari i a Hōngongoi. Ko ngā kupu waiata "Immu hame aap pe bharosa sahi thaa" e whakamāoritia ana mai i te Urdu ki "i tika mātou ki te whakawhirinaki ki a koe Immu". Ko Immu, e pā ana ki a Matua Kani, te kāpene o mua o te tīma kirikiti o Pakitāne, ā, ināianei ko te perehitini o te rōpū tōrangapū o Pakitāne Tehrik-e-Insaf (PTI) 'Kia ngahau noa iho' "E whai ana mātou kia hari te iwi," te kōrero a te kaiwhakarewa o te pēne o Mansoor Tuhihi ki te AO i runga i te waea mai i Karachi. E kī ana a Tēnā Tuhihi i hangaia e ia a Karachi Vynz me tētahi rōpū hoa i te tau 2014. E whakaahua ana rātau i a rātau anō he rōpū comedians takitahi e hiahia ana ki te hanga i ngā ataata kia huaketo. "Ka pupuri mātou i ngā ripa ki ngā mea e puta ana i runga i te pāpāho pāpori kia whiwhi ai i tētahi mea mīharo. Kātahi mātou ka tākaro ki a ia kia hanga ihirangi rekareka, whakamere, whakangahau hoki mō ā mātou kaimātakitaki," tana tāpiri mai. Ahakoa nga tohutoro ki a Matua Kani, ka kī a Tēnā Tuhihi kāore rātau i te tautoko i tētahi pāremata i runga i tētahi atu, e whakamārama ana nā te manakohanga o Tāne Kani i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i pai ai ia mo te waiata. Neke atu i te miriona ngā tirohanga o te waiata i runga i You Tube me Facebook i te wā e tuhi ana. Kua mahue i ngā kaitautoko o ngā kaipōrangapū e rua ngā tākupu e hia mano i runga i te ataata, i whakairihia i ngā rā i muri i te whakakorenga a te Kōti Matua o Hōia i te Pirimia o Nawaz Ngaha i tērā wiki. I puta mai te whakahaere i muri i te rūpahu ki ngā rawa o tōna whānau i muri i te mahue o ngā Pepa Panama 2016 e hono ana i ana tamariki ki ngā kamupene o waho. Ko te waiata taketake i Marathi: Ko ta rātau whakahere hou rawa e whakaaetia ana e te waiata ā-iwi o Marathi (reo e kōrerotia ana i Manashtra) 'Sonu' kua huaketo i roto i ngā reo Initia paetata. I tētahi putanga, i whakamahia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu reo irirangi kaingākau te waiata hei miramira i te raruraru o nga huarahi kōhua o Pīhīhī.

title: Ka pōhiritia e te kaipuke kaipuke o Belfast te kaipuke tere mō te £50m refurb
summary: Kua tau tētahi kaipuke tere ki te whāngai kaipuke o Harland & Wolff i Belfast mō tētahi kaupapa whakahou "kāore anō kia kitea".
text: Nā John CampbellBBC News NI Economics & Business Editor Ka mahi te Rōpū MJM ā-Newry i te Azamara Pursuit i roto i ngā marama e toru e whai ake nei. Ko te tikanga ka tukuna e MJM ana kaimahi ki te mahi kaupapa i ngā tauranga i Karipiana, i te tuawhenua rānei o Uropi. Koinei te wā tuatahi ka mahi te kamupene i tētahi kaupapa kaipuke tere i Aiarangi ki te Raki. E kī ana kei te kaupapa te kaha ki te "whakatuwhera i a Belfast mō ētahi atu mahi o tēnei tauine". Journey from the Bahamas Gary Annett, MJM's chief executive said, "We are delighted to welcome the Azamara Pursuit safely to Belfast following its two-week journey from the Bahamas: "Watching her berth at Harland and Wolff is the fulfilment of long-held ambition of MJM Group founder and chair Brian McConville to bring a project of this scale to Belfast." Tae atu ki te 800 ngā tāngata e mahi ana i te kaupapa e mōhiotia ana he uara huri noa i te £50m. Ka whakarato a Harland & Wolff i te taunga, te tautoko me ētahi atu ratonga mō te kaupapa. 'Tautoko tawhito rawa' Azamara Club Cruises, he tohu huri noa o Royal Caribbean Cruise, kātahi anō ka hokona te kaipuke, ā, ka kawea mai ki te ratonga i muri i te whakahoutanga. I kī a Richard Twynam, Kaiwhakahaere Whakahaere o Azamara Club Cruises, UK me Ireland: "Kua kite mātou i te tautoko tawhito rawa mai i te mākete UK mō Azamara Pursuit, nā reira e hari ana mātou ki te whakaatu i tō mātou āhukahuka i tēnei mā te whakaae kia tū tōna haerenga panoni i konei i Belfast.' Ka pau i nga wiki torutoru nei nga kaimahi o te kaipuke ki te whakamōhio i a rātau ki te oko i mua i te mahi whakahou i te wā o Pipiri & Hōngongoi. I te mutunga o Hōngongoi ka rere atu ki Southampton i mua i tana haerenga tuatahi mai i Southampton ki Norway i te 1 o Akuhata 2018.

title: Groups hit out at Reading Borough Council £8m budget cut plan
summary: Kua puta ngā rōpū hauora me ngā rōpū tiaki i Pānui i ngā tono a te kaunihera kia tapahia te £8m mai i ngā ratonga o mua.
text: Ka anga atu te tiaki pāpori pakeke ki te motu nui rawa, neke atu i te £1m, e kīia ana e Age UK he "tino whakamataku". Kua karangatia e te National Obesity Forum ngā mahere kia tapahia neke atu i te £400,000 mai i te hauora tūmatanui "hara". I kī te Kaunihera o Reading Borough "he tapahi tau-ki-te-tau" i roto i te pūtea a te kāwanatanga matua me te pikinga o te iwi whānui i "uaua ki ngā rauemi kaunihera". Me kimi te kaunihera i te £25m i roto i ngā tapahi i roto i te toru tau, mai i te 2015 ki te 2018. Ko tana tahua mo te 2014/2015 ko te £413m. I kī te rangatira matua o Age UK Berkshire, a Mike Allan, ka pā ngā tapahi £8m kua tāutua kētia ki te tiaki i ngā pakeke, tae atu ki te nēhi me te nohoanga whakaruru. I kī te manukura o te National Obesity Forum a Tam Fry he "tino nui" ngā mahi hauora tūmatanui a Reading ki te "whakamāmātia te momona". "He hara te whakaaro o te kaunihera ki te tapahi i a rātau," tana kī. Ko te tikanga o te tapahi o te kāwanatanga matua kua tata ki te 90% o ngā kaunihera i Ingarangi kua kore e tuku i te tiaki pāpori ki ngā tāngata e iti ana ōna hiahia. But Reading East MP Rob Wilson, Conservative, said the Labour-run Reading Borough Council did not need to cut frontline services to make savings. "Kua hangaia e te Kaunihera Pānui Borough he nama e £300m i roto i ngā tau e 15 kua hipa atu, ā, kei te whakapau i te 15% o te tāke kaunihera a te iwi ki te huamoni nama," tana kī. "Ki taku whakaaro ehara tēnei i te mea tika kia mahia." I whakahē hoki a ia i te whakapau moni a te kaunihera e £60m ki tētahi "pokapū tūmatanui hou". I kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o Jo Lovelock i ngā tikanga penapena utu o mua "i ngana ki te karo i te pānga ki ngā ratonga o mua e tukuna ana e mātau". "Kei te wāhi mātou ināianei kua kore mātou e whai kōwhiringa engari ki te mahi i ētahi o ngā whakataunga uaua e kore e pā ki aua ratonga," tana kī. Councillors will consider the proposals at a policy meeting on Monday.

title: Michael Morpurgo's Shadow wins children's book prize
summary: Kua toa te pukapuka pukapuka a Michael Morpurgo Shadow i te whakawhiwhinga pukapuka tamariki o te Whare Whero o tēnei tau, e pōtitia ana e ngā kaipānui rangatahi.
text: He toa tuatoru tēnei mō Morpurgo, ko ia anake te kaituhi i roto i te hītori 31 tau o te whakawhiwhinga. E kōrero ana a Kōruru i te pūrākau o te taitama e whakahoahoatia ana e tētahi kurī hongi taua i Awhekenetāna. "He pukapuka uaua te tuhi i te kōruru nā te mea i tuhituhi ahau mō tētahi papā o nāianei," te kī a Murpurgo. I whakawhiwhia ki a ia te whakawhiwhinga i tētahi hui i Birmingham i te Hātarei. Ko tana pukapuka, kua tautuhia ki tētahi pokapū tautāwhi mō ngā kaiwhaiwhai i UK, i whakaputaina i tērā o Mahuru. 'Taketake, tūturu' "I mōhio ahau ki te mea he whānau hōia e whawhai ana ināianei i roto i te whawhai, e mate ana i roto," te kī a te kaituhi tau 67 tau, e noho ana i Devon. "Nā reira he tairongotanga he mata, he tūturu hoki. I tuhituhi ahau i te Kōruru, pērā ki aku pukapuka katoa, nā te mea i tino hiahia ahau ki te kaupapa - nga pūtahi tautāwhi me te mamae o te pakanga. "I whakahaua ahau ki te tuhituhi engari kāore au i te tino mōhio me pēhea te whiwhinga. Ko te tikanga o te toa i tēnei whakawhiwhinga, i pōtitia e te tini o ngā kaipānui, he nui rawa te tikanga." I toa a Kōruru i te kāwai mō ngā kaipānui taitamariki me te whakawhiwhinga whānui i roto i ngā tohu, e whakaritea ana e te Tōpūtanga o ngā Rōpū Pukapuka Tamariki. Ko nga toa o mua a Morpurgo mo te Kingitanga o Kensuke me te Rangimarie Tūmataiti. Ko tana pukapuka War Horse, i whakaputaina i te tau 1982, kua hangaia hei whakaputanga whare tapere angitu i te West End me Broadway. Ko tētahi putanga pikitia, i toroa e Steven Spielberg, ka puta i te tōmua o tērā tau. Ko ētahi atu toa i ngā tohu pukapuka o te tau 2011 ko Angela McAllister rāua ko Alison Edgson's Yuck! Ehara tēnā i te Taniwha i roto i te kāwai mō ngā tamariki nohinohi ake, me ngā TimeRiders a Alex Scarrow i te kāwai kaipānui pakeke. Ko ngā toa o mua o te whakawhiwhinga ko JK Rowling, Robert Swindells, Roald Dahl, Jacqueline Wilson, Malorie Blackman me Sophie McKenzie.

title: Coronavirus Costa Atlantica: Ka tūhura a Tiapanī i te tīmatanga i runga i te waka tāmau
summary: Kei te uiui a Tiapanī i tētahi tīmatanga huaketo i waenganui i ngā kaimahi o tētahi kaipuke tere i tau ki Nakasaki i Hānuere, ā, kāore he kēhi pūrongo tae noa ki te taraiwa i tēnei wiki.
text: Ināianei e 91 ngā kaimahi o te Costa Atlantica i roto i te 623 kua whakamātauria he pai i tēnei wā, kotahi i roto i te āhua nui. Kāore he pāhihi o te kaipuke i runga i te kaipuke, ā, ka nekehia ki Nakasaki mō ngā tapi, kaua ki Haina nā te pakarutanga o te huaketo. Ko te tikanga kia herea nga kaimahi ki te kaipuke, engari ko te pūrongo pāpāho paetata i mahue i ētahi te oko. I whakatūpatotia tuatahitia ngā mana ā rohe ki te tūponotanga o te huaketo i runga i te Costa Atlantica i tērā mutunga wiki. Kei te whakamātauria ngā kaimahi katoa - kāore i te mōhiotia o rātau iwi. "E whakaaro ana mātou ka mārama ake te pikitia ina whiwhi mātou i ngā tauira katoa," ka whakahuatia a Katsumi Nakata, te upoko o te tari hauora me te ora o te kāwanatanga ā-rohe. "Ki te whakaaro i ngā rauemi rongoā whāiti kei a mātau i tēnei rohe, he uaua ki a mātau te pupuri me te whakahaere i te hauora o ngā tāngata katoa e 630. " Me pupuri e tātau te pūnaha rongoā mō ngā tangata whenua," tana kī. I whakapuakina e te Pānga Rongoā o Nakasaki tētahi "āhuatanga nui ā-rongoā" i te Tāite. Kāore anō a Nagasaki, he taone tauranga i te tonga o Tiapani, kia kite i ngā tīmatanga nui o te coronavirus, ā, i te mea ko te tikanga kia herea ngā kaimahi ki te kaipuke, he pēhea te āhua o taua tīmatatanga ināianei ko te kaupapa o te tūhuratanga. I tae mai te oko ki Nakasaki i te 29 o Hānuere, ā, i taratahitia, engari kāore he mate i kitea i taua wā. Ka kī atu nga mana ki nga kaimahi kāore e taea e rātau te haere ki tua atu o te whanga ki te hōhipera, ka pūrongo a Ērā. Engari e kī ana a NHK i haere ngā kaimahi ki te taone ahakoa i muri i te tono a nga mana ā rohe kia noho rātau ki runga i te papa. I whakaūngia e tētahi kamupene kaiako me tētahi umanga tīkiti kua kawea e rātau ngā kaimahi i te mutunga o Poutāpeta, ā, e whakapae ana ngā kaiwhakahaere i mahue i te kaipuke i ētahi atu wā. Tērā anō pea ka mauria mai e ngā kaimahi hou i runga i te waka i Nakasaki te huaketo. I pūrongotia e NHK kua whakamātauria te haurua o ngā kaimahi i tēnei wā. Ko ngā tākuta i tukuna e te Manatu Hauora me ngā ope taua o Tiapanī e āwhina ana i te mahi. I haere mai a Tiapanī mo te whakahē mo tana whakahaere i tētahi atu mate coronavirus i runga i tētahi kaipuke tere - te Diamond Princess - i te wā o Hui tanguru. I muri i te whakamātautautanga pai o tētahi pāhihi o mua, ka puritia ki te tauranga i Yokohama me ōna pāhihi me ngā kaimahi i taratahitia i runga i te papa. Neke atu i te 700 i whakamātauria he pai, ā, 13 i mate, e ai ki ngā raraunga o te Whare Wānanga o Johns Hopkins.

title: Pakihi: E kī ana te UK me te EU
summary: Kua kī te UK me te EU e noho tonu ana rātau ki tētahi whakaaetanga hokohoko i muri i te Pakihi, i muri i ngā whakaritenga hou i Rāwāhi.
text: I kī te kaiwhakarite matua o EU, a Mīharo Barnier, he āhua āhua "i tēnei wā" i tukuna ai te tūnga UK mō ngā mana hī ika me ngā ture whakataetae i muri i te Pakihi. I kī tōna hoa o UK, a Rawiri Frost, "he āputa nui" e noho tonu ana i ēnei wāhi, engari ka taea tonutia he mahi. Kua whakataua e te UK te whakaroa i te rā kati o Hakihea kia tae ki tētahi mahi. Koinei te tuarua o nga whakaritenga whaimana i puritia mai i te mate coronavirus, i muri i te whakaaetanga a nga taha e rua ki te "whakanui" i nga korero i te Pipiri. Ko te tikanga kia tūtaki ōpaki ngā kaiwhakarite matua o ngā taha e rua i Rāwāhi a tērā wiki, me tētahi atu hurihanga o ngā kōrero whai mana kua whakaritea mō te waenganui o Aotearoa i Pōroa. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i ngā kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Barnier kāore anō te UK kia whakaatu i tētahi "hiahia ki te whati i te kokoti" i runga i ngā hī ika me ngā ture i muri i te whakataetae. "Na tōna whakakore o nāianei ki te tuku ki ngā here o te whakataetae tuwhera, tika hoki, ki tētahi whakaaetanga whārite mō ngā hīnga ika, ka whakaritea e te UK he whakaaetanga hokohoko i tēnei wā," tana kī atu ki ngā kaipānui. I kī a ia kāore he mōrea kāore he take ki te kore e hurihia e te UK te ara i runga i ngā kaupapa, arā, "i te ngākau" o ngā painga hokohoko a te EU. I tāpiritia e ia ka hiahiatia he whakaaetanga i Whiringahora "i te mea hou rawa" kia taea ai te whakapūtā i mua i te mutunga o te wā tauwhiro o nāianei i te mutunga o Tīma. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Frost i ngā hī ika me ngā ture mo te whakataetae - e mōhiotia ana ko ngā whakarato "papa tākaro taumata" - ka noho tonu ko ngā "wāhi uaua rawa". I kī a ia e whakapono tonu ana a ia ka taea tonutia tētahi mahi i te wā o Mahuru, engari me "anga atu te kāwanatanga ki te tūponotanga" e kore tētahi e tūtuki. Engari i tāpiritia e ia kua whakaaturia e te EU tētahi "huarahi hāngai" i runga i ngā tono a Ingarangi kia whakawhāiti i te tūranga o te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture i muri i te mutunga o te wā tauwhiro. Mēnā kua akona mātau e ngā tau e whā kua taha, e 40 tau rānei, i tētahi mea mō ngā whakaritenga me te Uniana o Ūropi, arā, he iti noa iho te haere o rātou, ā, āhua kore nei e whakamutua me te kore rā kati e tūtata noa ana, engari... tino nui ināianei. Ehara anō tēnei i tēnā wā. I ngā wā katoa kāore e taea e tēnei te wā e unuhia ai tētahi tuhinga i roto i te pūkoro hūtu, he mahi kua oti. Ina kī a Mīharo Barnier he whakaaetanga hokohoko i waenganui i te UK me te EU "i tēnei wā kāore e taea", ka tāia tō whatu ki taua kupu "kāore e taea". Engari he mea nui hoki "i tēnei wā". Kai te kōrero tonu ngā taha e rua, ā, he pai ki te whakararuraru te āhua tōmuri. Kāore tētahi o ēnei e whakaū ana ka puta he take - kāore pea. Engari e hiahia ana ngā taha e rua ki tētahi, mēnā ka kitea e rātau tētahi ka taea e rātau te noho tahi. Me maumahara, ahakoa he aha te mea e tūpono ana i waenganui i tēnei wā me te Pō o te Tau Hōu, ka rerekē ngā mea a tērā tau. I te mutunga o Hānuere i tēnei tau, i pā mai a Brexit. I te tīmatanga o Hānuere a tērā tau, ka pā mai i te tīmatanga o Hānuere a tērā tau. I kī a Tēnā Frost ko te UK, kua tohe tonu ki ngā rangatū o ngā mahi motuhake i ngā wāhi rerekē, e hiahia ana hoki ki te whakaaro i tētahi hanganga "māmā ake" mō tētahi whakaaetanga. Heoi anō, i whakapuakina e ia ngā tono o mua o UK mō tētahi "mōhiotanga tōmua" mō ngā tikanga o tētahi mahi i tēnei marama e kore e tutuki. I kī a ia ko ngā tono EU ki te whati i te kokoti, kāore i taea te whakahonore i ngā "tikanga taketake kua auau te whakamārama". E kī ana ia taha me neke tētahi. A, ki te whai mahi, tērā pea ka tae mai i te tekau mā tahi o nga haora. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, me puta mai ngā whakararuraru i te wā o Mahuru i mua i te whakaaetanga o tētahi mahi i Whiringahora - ka waiho ngā taha e rua kia nui te wā hei whakarite i tētahi whakaaetanga i mua i te mutunga o te tau. Tērā ētahi huatau mo te kauneketanga tūpāpaku i tēnei wiki - i runga i te tūranga o te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture, i runga hoki i te hanganga katoa o tētahi whakaaetanga ā muri ake. Engari he nui ngā rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā taha e rua, ā, ka haere ki te ngākau o te tukanga o Te Wānanga: he pēhea te tata o te tiaro o te UK ki te EU ā muri ake nei? He kī hoki te rangatiratanga o UK; mō te EU ko te manakē ko te pare i te taparenga o tōna mākete kotahi. A, mo tēnei wā, te āhua nei kei te kōrero ngā taha e rua i mua i a rāua i te wāhi tangata. Pānuitia ētahi atu tātaritanga a Pirihi Mohi mō ngā mea e puta ana i roto i ngā kōrero hokohoko i muri i te tautohetohe āwhina a Tēnā Barnier, kia whakaae ki tētahi mahi, ka hiahiatia e te EU ngā pūmautanga "pakari" mai i te UK mō ōna ture ā muri ake mō te whakarato tautoko kāwanatanga ki ngā kamupene. I whakahē a ia i te UK mō te whakarato "kāore he kitenga" i tōna kāwanatanga ā muri ake i tēnei rohe, ā, ka karangatia kia tiritiri i ētahi atu taipitopito o ana kaupapa. Ka mutu te whai a te UK i ngā ture "āwhina kāwanatanga" EU i te mutunga o te wā tauwhiro, ā, kāore anō kia whakakitea ngā taipitopito o tōna kāwanatanga e whai ake nei. Kua kī te Pirimia o Te Pirimia, a Te Pirimia, e hiahia ana a ia kia ngāwari ake te āwhina a te kāwanatanga o UK ki ngā kamupene e raruraru ana.

title: I whakatārewatia nga pirihimana o Īnia i roto i te kēhi whakakōhuru hou e whakapaetia ana
summary: Tokowhā nga pirihimana kua whakatārewatia, a, ko te tuarima i whakawhitia ki runga i te whakahaere i tētahi kēhi kōhuru hou e whakapaetia ana e tata ana ki te pūmatua o Īnia, o Delhi.
text: Kua kī atu te pāpā o te tūkino e 21 tau ki te AO i werohia a ia. I kitea tōna tinana i te Hātarei. Tokorua ngā tāngata kua hopukina, ā, kua pūrongotia kua rere tētahi pōhēhētanga tuatoru. Ināianei, tokorima nga tāngata kua tae mai ki te kōti mo te whakarongo ki te kēhi o te tāhaetanga, te taikaha rōpū me te kōhurutanga o tētahi tau 23 tau, he take i tumeke ai a Īnia. Ko te tūkino i te kēhi hou rawa he kaimahi wheketere i Noida, he tapa taone o Delhi. I ngaro atu a ia i te pō Paraire i a ia e hoki ana ki te kāinga i te mahi, ka pūrongotia e te pāpāho Īnia. I amuamu te pāpā o te wahine i te tuatahi kāore i urupare ngā pirihimana i tana pūrongo i tōna ngaronga, e kī ana kua haere kē a ia me tētahi tangata. Na te kēhi i whakaoho nga whakahē i Noida. I puta mai nga Rongo o te kōti aroturuki tere o te kēhi i mua noa iho i te whakarongo tuatahi i Delhi i te kēhi o nga pōhēhētanga e rima i te taikaha rōpū o tērā marama. He kikī te haumarutanga i te whare kōti, e kī ana a Andrew North, kei waho o te whakarongo. Kua kī nga kaiwhakawa he nui tonu ta rātau whakaaturanga ā ture ki nga pōhēhētanga, e āhei ana ki te whiu mate ki te kitea he hara. Kua whakaingoatia nga whakapae tokorima ko Ram Mahi, ko tōna tuakana ko Mukesh, ko Pawan Pakā, ko Vinay Kama, ko Akshay Thatea. E tūmanakohia ana kia tū to rātau whakawā i roto i tētahi kōti riu tere hou i ngā wiki tata nei. Ko te ono o nga tangata e whakapaea ana e pā ana ki te whakaekenga, he taiohi, ka whiua e te poari ture pūhouhou. I te 16 o Hakihe, tata tonu te haora i werohia ai te tūkinotanga, he ākonga, i runga i te pahi i mua i tana mahue i tētahi hoa i te taha o te huarahi. I muri iho ka mate a ia i ōna whara. I te oho o te whakaekenga, ka haere tonu nga whakahē puta noa i Īnia. I roto i tētahi whakaaturanga i Delhi i te Rātapu ko nga kaiwhakahaere i runga i te taraiwa hiakai mo te neke atu i te wiki. E karanga ana ngā kaiwhakangahau ki ngā ture whakangungu uaua ake me ngā whakahōu ki ngā pirihimana, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā i te nuinga o te wā ka kore e kōnae utu ki ngā kaihōia whakapae. I te Rātapu hoki, ka whakakāhore te pāpā o te hunga i aituā i tētahi pūrongo nūpepa o Ingarangi e hiahia ana ia kia whakaingoatia tana tamāhine. I kī te Iwi o te Rātapu kua whakaaetia e te pāpā te whakaingoa i a ia me tana tamāhine, ahakoa he ture Īnia e pare ana i ngā tūkinotanga o te wahine mā te whakakore i to rātau tāutunga. I mauria e te nūpepa he whakaahua o te pāpā, engari i kī te whānau kāore i tonoa e te whānau kia whakamahia he whakaahua o te tūkinotanga. I muri iho ka whakahuatia te pāpā e te Hindustan Times me ngā nūpepa Hindu e whakakāhore ana i ngā kōrero i takea mai ki a ia. "Kua kī noa iho ahau e kore mātau e whakahē mēnā ka whakamahia e te kāwanatanga te ingoa o taku tamāhine mō tētahi ture hou mo te hara ki nga wāhine, he pākaha ake, he pai ake hoki te tāpare i te mea tīariari," ka whakahuatia ia e te Hindustan Times me te kōrero. I tērā wiki, ka kī atu te pāpā ki a TE Hīnī, kāore ōna raruraru ki te ingoa o tana tamāhine e whakamahia ana i roto i te horopaki o tētahi ture ārai whakakōhuru kua whakahōutia. "He māharahara a ia. Kaore he raruraru ki te whānau," tana kī. Kua tohe hoki te minita Īnia o Shashi Tharoor ki nga mana kia whakaaturia te ingoa kia taea ai te whakamahi mo tētahi ture ārai whakakōhuru hou.

title: E riri ana te taupatupatu mo Uropi
summary: Noho ki te Uniana o Ūropi, waiho, whakarite anō rānei i tōna mematanga?
text: Koia tērā i hiahiatia e tētahi petihana neke atu i te 100,000 tāngata kia pātaitia mātau, engari i te pō Mane ka pōti ngā MP kia kaua mātau e 483 pōti ki te 111. I karangatia e te Pirimia o Rawiri Karauna - tae atu ki nga kaiārahi o te Liberal Democrats me te Labour - ki ngā MP kia whakahē i te ariā. Nā reira, i whiwhi rātau i tō rātou ake ara, engari he ānini nui ki te kaiārahi Conservative. Ngā ture me te rīpene whero I tēnei wā tina (25 o Whiringahora) kua kī a ia "kāore he toto kino" i waenganui i a ia me aua MP i whawhai ki tāna i tono ai. I tāpiri mai a ia e mōhio ana a ia i rongo te tangata i te "kaha" mo te take, engari me "ārahi" ia i runga i te take. E 24 a Mark Williams me te kaiwhakahaere hoko mai i Gravesend i Kent. "Kāore au i te whakaaro me noho tātau ki te EU, me wehe tātau," tana kī. "Kāore au i te pīrangi ki ngā ture me te rīpene whero i purua e rātau ki ngā mea katoa, me mahi i ngā wā katoa," tana tāpiri mai. I muri i tana kitenga i te 81 o ana MP e whakahē ana i a ia me te pōti i te manakohanga o tētahi taupānga, koinei te tutukitanga nui rawa i pāngia e Rawiri Karauna mai i te nekehanga ki Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti. 'Ehara i te tika' "E mōhio ana ahau ki tētahi geezer (MP Adam Holloway) mai i konei i pōti i tētahi atu huarahi, ā, kua whakarerea i tōna tūnga," te kī a Mark. "E whai wāhi ana te katoa ki tētahi whakaaro i te mutunga o te rā, ā, i pōti noa iho ia i tana kitenga e tika ana," ko te tāpiri mai a Mark. He taurua tēnei tutukitanga i pāngia e Hoani Meiha i nga tau 90, i te wā i whakapokea ai ia e 41 ngā MP. E kī ana ētahi kua ngaro i te UK tōna tuakiri mā te noho hei wāhanga o te EU, ā, he moumou moni. Ko ētahi e tautohe ana he pai, mai i ngā utu tīpokapoka māmā ake i tō waea pūkoro ki ētahi atu wāhi mahi. Tērā pea i tūkinotia e aua MP i whakapoke i te pirimia o rātau wā ki tētahi mahi matua ā muri ake nei, ā, ināianei ka whakahaua pea kia whakarerea i to rātau tūnga. E whakaaro ana a Lana Bance e rua tekau mā rima tau te pakeke he tika tēnā. "Ko te tikanga kia whai mana tātau ki te whakatau," tana kī. "Ki taku whakaaro he tino kino te korerotia ki a rātau ko tēhea huarahi pōti, ehara i te mea tika kia kōrerotia ki," tana tāpiri mai. "He tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata i tēnei whenua kāore e tū ake ki tā rātou e whakapono ana, nā reira he pai i mahia e rātou, he pōtae ki a rātou." I kite a Labour i ngā MP e 19 e whakakeke ana, engari i karangatia tonutia e te kaiārahi o Ed Miliband te ātete a te tokomaha o ngā MP o te pirimia he "whakamā".

title: Te whakamanatanga o te tarukino e hia miriona te wāriu - pūrongo kāwanatanga
summary: Ka taea e te whakamana i te tarukino te whakaputa i ngā rau miriona pauna i te tau i roto i te tāke me te tapahi utu mō ngā pirihimana me ngā whare herehere, kua kitea e tētahi rangahau kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Nick HopkinsInvestigations correspondent, BBC Newsnight Ko te pūrongo o te Pūtea ā-roto, i whiwhia e TE Pō Rongokōrero, i kī ai te whakarite i te mākete ka "whakaputa moni tāke mōhiotia" me te "ārahi ki ngā penapena katoa ki te pūnaha ture hara". I tautohetohe ngā MP i te take i te Mane, i muri i te petihana e karanga ana ki te whakamanatanga, neke atu i te 220,000 ngā waitohu. Kaore nga minita e whakaaro ki te whakarerekē i te ture. I kī te Tari Kāinga "kāore he kaupapa" ki te huri i te ture mo te tarukino, e whakawāteatia ana ināianei hei rongoā ture kore mana o te Tauaha B, ā, kei te āta hinga te whakamahinga o te tarukino. '216 tāna' I whakahaeretia te akoranga Pūtea i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau i runga i te whakahau a ngā Pāremata Liberali i a rātau e tauwhāinga ana, engari kāore i whakaputaina. I tonoa ngā pononga tūmatanui kia whakaarohia ngā "pānga tōtika tūpono o te whakamōhio i tētahi mākete tarukino i te UK". E kī ana te mātauranga e 2.2 miriona ngā tāngata e 16 ki te 59 te pakeke kua whakamahia te tarukino i tērā tau - e kai paipa ana i te tapeke o te 216 tāna. I arotakea e ngā kaitirotiro kāwanatanga te mahi a te Institute for Social and Economic Research, nāna i whakaaro ka āwhina te raihana tarukino ki te whakaiti i te tāpaetanga pūtea o UK tae atu ki te £ 1.25bn i te tau - mai i ngā tāke i whakarewaina me ngā whakahekenga utu. E tautohe ana te pūrongo o te Pūtea Moni tērā pea he whakatau tata rawa. Engari e whakaae ana mā te whakarite i te tarukino ka nui ake te nui o te tāke, tae atu ki te penapena i te kāwanatanga tae atu ki te £200m i te kōti me ngā utu pirihimana i te tau. I kī te kaikōrero hauora o Liberal Democrat, a Norman Lamb, e hiahia ana tana rōpū ki te whakaaro ki te whakarite me te tāke i te tarukino, e tohu ana ki te tauira o ngā huringa i ētahi o ngā kāwanatanga o Amerika. Ka kī a ia: "Kua tino nui te neke o te taupatupatu ināianei... i a tātau e kite ana i te āhua i muri i te tīmatanga o tēnei taupatupatu, me te maha o ngā kāwanatanga i roto i a Mātau e whakatau ana ki te whakatū i ngā mākete ture kua whakamanatia. "Ā, ko te tikanga taketake ki a au, e hoatu ana e koe he hua mōrearea ki ngā ringa o te hunga hara kāore e hiahia ana ki tō oranga, e rapu ana rānei koe ki te whakarite? " Ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ki te parenga hauora tūmatanui o te tangata me te karo i te whakatinanatanga whakarihariha o te tokomaha o te rangatahi, he nui te āhua o te mākete ā-ture." Engari i kī te Tari Kāinga i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Kāore he kaupapa a te kāwanatanga ki te whakamana, ki te whakawātea rānei i te tarukino. " He mārama ngā whakaaturanga pūtaiao, rongoā hoki he rongoā kino te tarukino e tūkino ana i te hauora hinengaro me te hauora ā-tinana o te tangata, ā, ka tūkino i ngā tangata me ngā hapori."

title: Kāore te tauranga ātea tuatahi i Snowdonia
summary: Ehara a Snowdonia i te kāinga ki te tauranga ātea tuatahi o UK, engari tērā pea he pūtake mō te haere ātea ā muri ake, kua puta.
text: Kua kōwhiria e te UK Space Agency te A'Mhoine Peninsula i Pākehā hei pae manako mō ngā whakarewa poutū. Engari kāore anō kia whakatauria te Papa Rererangi o Llanbedr mō ngā whakarewa whakapae e hangaia ana mō ngā waka ātea. I kī te kaiwhakahaere matua o te Wānanga o Aerospace Wales i koa a ia kei te oma tonu a Llandbeder. I kī a John Whalley: "Nā te papawhenua me te ahupūngao, ko te wāhi tika anake hei whakarewa i ngā pūroro nui i UK ko te raki o Pākehā. " Ki te hē ngā mea, kāore rātau e heke iho ki ngā pūtahi o te iwi whānui i a koe e rere ana i runga i te Moana ki te Raki." I kī te kōwhiringa i kōwhiria te pae Pākehā i te mea ko te wāhi tino pai rawa i te UK kia tae ki ngā āwhiotanga aorangi me ngā pūroro whakarewa poutū. Kua pānuitia hoki tētahi pūtea whanaketanga hōu e £2m mō ngā tauranga mokowā whakarewa whakapae puta noa i te UK i ngā pae tūpono pēnei i Prestwick, Newquay me Snowdonia, e ai ki tētahi kēhi pakihi angitu. Ko te tātaritanga a Kōrero Meechan, te korero pakihi o TE AO Wales Tērā pea he rite ki ngā mea o te pakiwaitara pūtaiao, engari ko te mea pono he umanga nui te mokowā ināianei, ā, ka nui ake i te wā e heke mai nei. He mahi ātea kē tā Wales me ētahi kamupene me ngā whare wānanga kua hohe kē i te wāhanga mokowā. He nui te haere a Llanbedr hei pae tauranga ātea, ā, ka pōrearea te umanga i Uēra kāore anō kia kōwhiria hei tauranga ātea tuatahi o UK. Heoi anō, kua waiho te tatau kia tuwhera ki te tipu hei kotahi ā muri ake nei. Ka pōhiritia te pūtea £2m hei āwhina i tēnā. Heoi anō, ehara i te nui o te moni e hiahiatia ana, ā, ka tono hoki ētahi atu pae mōna. I kī te kōwhiringa i whakaritea te pūtea ki te whakarewa i ngā hiahiatanga mō te rere ā-roto, ngā whakarewa aorangi me ngā waka ātea. I tērā Tīma, i kī tētahi pūrongo kaunihera o Gwynedd he mahere hei huri i te papa rererangi o Llanbedr hei pokapū tino pai, e whakamātau ana i ngā waka rererangi mamao, ka utu i te £25m. Ko te Kāwanatanga o Welsh te rangatira o te papa rererangi o Llanbeder, he pae hōia o mua, engari ka rīhitia ki a Snowdonia Aerospace LLP e mahi ngātahi ana me te kaikirimana waea o QinetiQ. I kī a Tēnā Whalley kua "kaha te mahi" o te rōpū i muri i ngā tirohanga ki te kawe mai i te pūtea penapena whakaroto me ngā kōrero. I kī a ia "kei te hangaia tonutia te hangarau" mō ngā rerenga whakapae tērā pea ka whakamahia mō ngā tūruhi mokowā ā muri ake nei, ahakoa he tawhiti. "E hari ana mātou kei te oma tonu a Llanbedr me te pokapū ātea o Snowdonia," tana kī. "Ko wai e mōhio ana kei hea te tauranga mokowā whakapae tuatahi? " I ngā wā katoa e kī ana te UK Space Agency i runga anō i te whakataetae arumoni, engari ko te mea nui rawa, i runga anō i te kēhi haumaru mō te papa rererangi. "Nā reira, hei tauira, kei roto a Llanbedr i tētahi tūnga tino pai ki te whakaputa i tētahi kēhi haumaru tika nā te mea he wāhi iti te iwi whānui, ā, kei te haere hāngai atu koe ki te moana." I kī te Hēkeretari o Welsh a Alun Cairns he "hiahia te kāwanatanga o UK ki te mau i te UK ki te tau mokowā arumoni". "Ināianei he matapihi mīharo tā Wales ki te mahi i tētahi tūranga ārahi ki te whakaahua i taua wā heke," tana kī. "Kei a mātou te papawhenua tika me tētahi pūtake pūkaha pūkenga i roto i ngā mahi ātea, ngā mea hiko me ngā pūmanawa, e tū ana kia rerekē me te tupu i roto i te mākete mokowā tere e tipu ana." Heoi anō, i kī tētahi kōrero mō te puni o Shell Island, e noho tata ana ki te papa rererangi o Llanbedr, kua hikitia e te rongo ka noho te pae whakarewa poutū i Pākehā i "he taumahatanga iti" i o rātau pakihiwi. "Heoi anō, kei te tūpato mātou ināianei ki te whakarongo mai i ngā minita o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, Snowdonia Aerospace, me te UK Space Agency he aha te 'pānga' o te pānga whakarewa whakapae mō ngā umanga katoa e noho tata ana ki te papa rererangi, e kawe mai ana i ngā tūruhi i te tau, " tāna tāpiri.

title: Higgs boson: Karanga ki te whakaingoa anō i te korakora hei mihi ki ētahi atu kaipūtaiao
summary: E kī ana tētahi o ngā kaipūtaiao nāna i āwhina ki te whakawhanake i te ariā o te boson Higgs me whakaingoa anō te korakora.
text: Nā te korero kōrero a Pallab GhoshScience, e whakapono ana a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero o Te Aotearoa, e whakapono ana te ingoa me whakaae te ingoa ki ngā mahi a ētahi atu - ehara i te mea ko te kaiahupūngao UK anake ko Pita Higgs. Kua whakakāngia anōtia te taupatupatu roa i muri i te taurangi ka whakawhiwhia te Whakawhiwhinga Ahupūngao o tēnei tau mō te ariā Higgs. I pānuitia te kitenga o tētahi korakora i whakaarotia ko te Higgs i te Large Hadron Collider i a Hōngongoi i tērā tau. I kī atu a Prof Hagen o Amerika ki a BBC News: "I whakaaro tonu ahau ehara te ingoa i te mea tika. " Ki te whakakotahi i tētahi tangata, ka whakawāteatia te āwhina a ētahi atu e pā ana ki te mahi. Ahakoa kāore au i tīmata i tēnei whakahau ki te huri i te ingoa, e pōhiritia ana e au." I hangaia e Prof Peter Higgs tētahi ariā he pēhea te whai rawa o ētahi atu korakora ngota-roto, te papatipu rānei, ā, ka whakaputaina tana mahi i te tau 1964. Heoi anō, i puta takitahi mai ētahi atu kairangahau me ngā whakaaro ōrite, ā, kua roa te tautohetohe a Prof Higgs, kia hurihia te ingoa o te korakora. Kua kōrero ngā tāngata mō ngā koha matua e mahia ana e Whāwhā Englert, Peter Higgs, Gerald Guralnik, Tom Kibble, Robert Brout me Carl Hagen. E rima i kōrero i tētahi hui pānui i tērā tau ki te whakapuaki i te kitenga o tētahi korakora i whakaarotia ko te Higgs, engari ko Prof Higgs anake i whiwhi pakipaki nui mai i ngā kairangahau i konei. "I kitea a Pita Higgs he whetū toka, ā, kāore i mōhiotia e te nuinga o te hunga whakarongo. I mārama ko Higgs te ingoa rangatira nā te mea kua pāhono tōna ingoa ki te poson," te kī a Prof Hagen ki a TE Rongokōrero o te Ao. I kī atu tētahi kaiwhakaatu mai i Cern - e whakahaere ana i te Large Hadron Collider - ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero kāore i tae atu ki te taiwhanga te whakatau i te ingoa o ngā korakora hou i kitea. "Ko te nuinga o te wā kua whakaingoatia ngā korakora e ngā kaitohutohu e matapae ana, he tauira ko te 'quark'; e ngā kaiwhakamātau rānei e kite ana i ngā korakora tē mōhiotia pēnei i te neutron," tana kī. "I ngā take katoa, ka whakamahia noatia te ingoa, ā, ka whakaaetia e te hapori ahupūngao korakora, ā, i ēnei rā e te Rōpū Raraunga Korakora e pā ana ki ngā boson Higgs." I tētahi hui ahupūngao i Mati ki te kōrerorero i te kitenga o te Higgs, i whakahaua ngā kairangahau kia kōrero ki te korakora ko te "SM Scalar Boson". I taua wā, i whakaarohia nā te mea i hiahia ngā kaiahupūngao kia tino mōhio ko te korakora i kīia ko te Higgs i mua i te whakaingoatanga pērā. Ahakoa e ono ngā kaitohutohu e tūhono ana ki te whakawhanake i te ariā o te Higgs, he tokomaha ngā kaipūtaiao e whakapono ana he nui rawa te waha o te whakaingoa i te korakora ki ēnei tangata katoa. Ahakoa ko ngā tauwhāiti i waihangatia mai i ngā ingoa o ngā ingoa e ono, he ātaahua. Ko tētahi tauira ko "BEHGHK", ka whakahuatia "berk". E kī ana a Prof Hagen, e whai wāhi ana ki te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Ka taea te whakaingoa i te mōrahi o ngā tangata tokotoru noa iho hei toa o te Whakawhiwhinga o Aotearoa. Me ora hoki aua toa, ā, ko ngā kaipūtaiao tokorima i whakawhanake i te ariā Higgs e āhei tonu ana ki te whakawhiwhinga, kei roto i te 70 me te 80 tau. I mate a Prof Brout i te tau 2011. Nō reira he nui te pēhanga i runga i te komiti o Aotearoa e whakatau ana i te whakawhiwhinga ahupūngao hei whakawhiwhi mō te Higgs i mua i te matenga o ngā toa. Engari ko tēhea e toru? E whakapono ana a Prof Hagen kia mōhiotia ngā mea katoa e ono e huaina ana ki te ariā, tae atu ki te tīma nui o ngā kaipūtaiao me ngā kaipūkaha i te LHC. "He whakararuraru te ārai i tēnei e ngā ture a te komiti o Aotearoa. E tūmanako ana ahau ka kitea he huarahi huri noa. Ki te kore, me noho tātau ki ngā whakataunga katoa e mahia ana". I kī a Prof Jordan Nash, i Imperial College London, ā, ko ia i waenganui i te hunga i āwhina ki te kite me te whakaahua i te korakora i te LHC i tērā tau, tērā pea e kore e taea te huri i te ingoa i tēnei wāhanga.
