"Ki taku whakaaro he hauora kei te āta titiro te iwi pūtaiao ki ngā mahi tino pakaru i mahia e tēnei rōpū kaipūtaiao, engari ināianei kua mōhio mātou ki a rātou mahi i te 50 tau ki mua, kua matapae i tētahi mea ka kitea e tātau i te whakamātautau. " E kī ana, ko te ingoa o te 'korakora Higgs' e whakamahia ana e te pūtaiao mō ngā tekau tau. "Ka hoatu ngā ingoa ki ngā korakora i matapaetia, ā, i te mutunga ka mau tētahi ingoa. Ko te tikanga kia kaua tēnei e kitea he iti noa iho ki ētahi atu i āwhina hoki ki te whakawhanake i tēnei ariā." Whāia a Pallab i Twitter: @bbcpallab

title: E tiaki ana a Michael Fallon i te ahuwhānui i roto i te haupae karihi o Kōpia
summary: Ko te rangatira o te kaimahi wawao e "tino whai mana" ana ki te kōrero tautoko i a Trident, kua kī a Michael Fallon.
text: I kī te hēkeretari whakangungu he "rerekē" mēnā kāore a Ken Tā Nicholas Houghton i whakautu pātai mō taua mea, i muri i ngā kerēme i takahia e ia te whakatūtū tōrangapū o te hōia. I kī a Tā Nicholas i te mutunga wiki ka māharahara a ia mehemea ka "whakamāoritia ki te hiko" tētahi tirohanga ārai karihi. Kua kī a Jeremy Corbyn o Labour e kore rawa ia e pēhi i te "pātene karihi". Ka karanga a ia ki a Tēnā Fallon kia "mahia he mahi" i muri i ngā kōrero a Tā Nicholas. 'Whakautu hāngai' I whakapaea e te kaiārahi Mahi a Tā Nicholas ki te tītaha tōrangapū i muri i tana kōrero ki a Andrew Marr o TE AO e kore e whakaae ki te whakarewa i ngā rākau karihi ka "tino tukituki" te "whakararuraru" o Ingarangi. I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te hōtaka o te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, ka kī a Tēnā Fallon kāore anō a Tā Nicholas kia whakaekea a Tēnā Kōpihi, ā, kua "hoatu e ia he whakautu hāngai ki tētahi pātai hāngai". "Ki taku whakaaro i haere tonu a ia ki te kī kāore a ia i te kōrero whaiaro mō te tūnga o Tēnā Kōpihi, engari i pātaitia ia mō te whakararuraru karihi, ā, ka hoatu e ia he whakautu, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau e tino tika ana kia mahi i tēnā," tana kī. I anga atu a Tēnā Kōpihi, he mema tōmua o te Whakahau mō te Ārai Karihi, ki te whakahē mai i tana kāpata kōruru i te hui ā-tau a tana rōpū i tana whakaaturanga e kore e ahi i ngā rākau karihi o Ingarangi mehemea he PM a ia- ā, mai i tērā wā ka whakamihi ia ki te whakakāhoretanga a Te Hunga Mahi o Pirihitini ki a Trident.

title: E āwangawanga ana te whānau mo te ngaro o te kōtiro o Hiria, o Yusra Hussien, 15
summary: Ko te whānau o tētahi 15 tau e ngaro ana, e whakaarotia ana kua haere ki Hiria, e wehi ana kāore pea rātau e kite anō i a ia.
text: E rua wiki ki mua, e rua wiki ki mua, e whakapono ana kei te haere tahi me Samya Dirie, 17, mai i Rāwāhi. I kī a Whaea Sucdi Ali e takatū ana te whānau mo tētahi "tauari kino rawa" kāore pea a ia e hoki mai ki te kāinga. I whakapuakina hoki e Miss Ali kua whakawhitiwhiti kōrero a Ihu ki ōna hoa i runga i Facebook mai i tana ngarotanga. I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te HAU, ka kī a Miss Ali kua kī atu a Ihu ki ōna hoa tuihono e "kore e taea e ia te whakaatu" tōna tauwāhi, tāna rānei e mahi nei. "Kua kī a ia 'Kua neke atu ahau, kei te noho ahau i tētahi oranga hari, ā, kei te haumaru, kei te hari ahau'," te kī a tōna whaea. Kaore anō a Ihu kia whakapā atu ki tōna whānau mai i tana ngarotanga. Engari i kī a Miss Ali kei a ia tonu te "tūmanako kia hoki mai a ia" ā, ka mōhio ia ko tāna e mahi ana "ehara i te mea tika hei mahi". "Mēnā kei Hiria a ia, kei roto a ia i tētahi wāhi mōrearea. He tamaiti a ia, 15 ōna tau, kāore anō a ia kia noho mokemoke atu i tōna whānau. "E mōhio ana koe ki te āhuatanga i Hiria - ehara i te pai, engari mō tētahi kōtiro 15 tau kāore anō kia kite i tētahi oranga tōraro." I kī a ia me mahi te whānau ki te rangirua o te kore mōhio mēnā kei te "mate, kei te ora rānei" a ia. Kai te mahia te tūhuratanga ki te ngaronga o Ihu e te Wae Pūrarau o te Rāwhiti ki te Tonga. I pūrongotia a Yusra e ngaro ana e ōna mātua, nāna i kite whakamutunga i a ia i te 07:00 BST i te 24 o Mahuru. I kī rātau ka haere ta rāua tamāhine ki te kura, engari kāore i reira i te haerenga o tōna pāpā ki te tiki i a ia i te 15:30. E whakapono ana ngā Pirihimana 'Ehara i a Yusra' i tūtaki a ia ki a Samya Dirie i mua i tana rere ki Istanbul i Turkey. "Kāore he waea, kāore he whakamārama," te kī a Miss Ali, nāna i tāpiri kāore te whānau i mōhio i te tuatahi kua ngaro tōna uruwhenua. I whakaahuatia e Miss Ali te āhuatanga he "ngākau pouri" me te whakaae ko Ihu, e hiahia ana ki te whakangungu hei tākuta niho i tana wehenga atu i te kura, tērā pea ka whakawāteatia tuihonotia. "Ahakoa he aha te mea i tūpono, ehara tēnei i a Yusra. I puta tētahi mea ki tōna hinengaro kia whakapono ai ia kei te mahi ia i te mea tika." I whakapaea e te whaea te "whakapaipai ipurangi" e kī ana kua "horoia te roro, te whakararuraru rānei" i te tauira o te Wānanga o te Taone 15 tau. "I hē tētahi mea, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te mōhio he aha i tūpono," tana tāpiri mai. "Ko te whakapae te whakapae i te whakapaipai Ipurangi." I roto i tētahi tono hāngai ki a Yusra, ka kī a Miss Ali e hiahia ana te whānau kia mōhio a ia ki a ia "kāore he hē". "E kore a ia e hopukina ki te hoki mai a ia ki te UK. Kāore koe i te raruraru, e aroha ana mātou ki a koe."

title: E tohutohu ana te kōinga o Hōia i Īnia kia whakahokia mai te kukupa 'tūtei'
summary: Kua tohe tētahi kōinga o Hōia ki te Pirimia o Īnia, a Moemoea Modi kia whakahokia tana kukupa, e puritia ana ināianei i Īnia mo nga whakapae tūtei.
text: I kī te tangata, e noho ana i te 4km (2.5 km) noa iho i te rohe, ka rere ia i ana kukupa ki te whakanui i te hākari Eid. I kī ngā pirihimana he rīngi tō te kukupa i runga i tētahi o ōna waewae, i tuhituhia ki tētahi waehere e ngana ana rātau ki te wetewete. E kī ana te kōinga o Hōia, e kī ana nāna te kukupa i hopukina, ko te waehere tōna tau waea pūkoro. Kua kitea e te nūpepa Haeata o Pakitāne te tangata ko Habibullah, ā, e pūrongo ana he kotahi tekau mā rua ana kukupa. Ka kī atu a Habibullah ki te pepa he "tohu o te rangimārie" tana kukupa, ā, me "kaiponu a Īnia i te tūkino i ngā manu harakore". I hopukina e nga kōinga te manu i te Mane i te rohe o te ao whānui i Kahamikia e whakahaeretia ana e Īnia, a, ka hoatu ki nga pirihimana. Ko te rohe o Kahamiri e kīia ana e Īnia rāua ko Pakitāne, a, ko te tirohanga o nga whakawhitinga hōia auau i waenganui i nga hoa noho tata karihi. Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i tau ai te kukupa e rere ana i Pakitāne i roto i te raruraru ki nga kaiwhakahaere Īnia. I Me 2015, i hopukina he kukupa mā i muri i te kitenga o tētahi taitama 14 tau i tētahi kāinga e tata ana ki te rohe. A, i Whiringahora 2016, ka mauria tētahi atu kukupa i muri i te kitenga i tētahi tuhipoka e whakawehi ana i te pirimia o Īnia. He roa te wā e tauwhāinga ana nga iwi e rua, a, ko te pakanga whakamutunga i waenganui i a rāua i tū i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua.

title: I whakawāteatia te hoa tāne o Keiti Price, o Eri Boyson, i te RW whakawehi
summary: Kua wetekina te hoa tāne o Katie Price i te whakawehi i tētahi pirihimana i muri i te haupae me te paparazzi.
text: I whakapaea a Eri Boyson ki te kōrero ki tētahi pirihimana ka whati tōna kauae, engari i whakawāteatia. I kī a Tēnā Boyson ka whakaaro a Price i a ia e "whāia" ana e ngā kaiwhakaahua tokorua i waho o tōna kāinga i Gravesend, Keti, i Whiringahora 2018. I whakawāteatia a ia i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Medway. I whakaahuatia e ia te wete he "whakamāmātanga nui". I kitea kāore te tau e 31 tau i hara ki te whakamahi i ngā kupu whakawehi, whakahāwea, whakahawea rānei, whanonga rānei me te whakaaro ki te wehi, ki te whakapataritari rānei i te tutu ture ki a RW Paul Blundell. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te tēpu, a Christine Rose: "Kāore mātou i te whakapono nā te tangata whakapae i wehi, i whakapataritari rānei i te tutu ture ki a PC Blundell. " I mura te āhuatanga i te mea ko tētahi tangata e mōhiotia ana ināianei he pirihimana e whakaahua ana i te kōtiro a Tāne Boyson." I tāpiritia e ia kāore nga kaiwhakawā i rongo i te whakaaturanga ataata e tautoko ana i te kēhi ture. I a ia e kōrero ana i waho o te kōti, ka kī a Tēnā Boyson: "Kei te rongo ahau i te tūkinotia ahau nā wai ahau me te āhuatanga. " He tino whakamāmā, ka taea e au te haere tonu ki tōku oranga." Whāia a BBC South East i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram hoki. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki southeasttoday@bbc.co.uk.

title: Aretha Franklin: He oranga i roto i ngā pikitia
summary: Ko Aretha Franklin, te "kuini o te wairua" e whitu tekau tau tana mahi, kua mate i Detroit i te 76 o ona tau.
text: Anei te titiro whakamuri ki tōna oranga me ōna wā i roto i ngā pikitia. I whānau mai a Aretha Louise Franklin i Memphis i te tau 1942, i tana hopukanga tuatahi i a ia e 14 noa iho ana. Engari kāore tana mahi i tino tīmata tae noa ki tana hainatanga mō ngā Pūkete Atarangi i te tau 1966. I haere tonu a ia ki te whai aho tau, i waenganui i a rātou Kore rawa ahau i Aroha ki te Tangata (The Way I Love You), Respect me (You Make Me Feel Like) A Natural Woman. I konei a ia e mahi ana i runga i te Top of the Pops i te tau 1968. Ko ngā raruraru whaiaro me tētahi whāinga kino ki te disco i iti iho te angitu o ngā tau 1970, ahakoa i haere tonu a ia ki te mahi whānui. I konei kei te whai wāhi a ia ki tētahi 'Oha Karaihe' i te Mahinga Momo Ariki o te tau 1980. I taua tau anō ka puta ia i te taha o John Belushi rāua ko Dan Aykroyd i roto i te kōrero kōrero The Blues Brothers. I a ia e waiata ana i tana waiata tauhira Whakaaro, tae atu ki ētahi rārangi mai i Jailhouse Rock. I pā te mahi a Franklin ki te pikinga ake i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, he mihi ki ngā takirua kōtaha tiketike, i waenganui i ētahi atu, i ngā Eurythmics. Anei a ia i roto i te studio me Dave Stewart rāua ko Annie Lennox e hopu ana i a Sisters Are Doin' It for Themselves i te tau 1985. Ko tēnei whakaahua mai i Hānuere 1993 e kite ana i a ia e hono ana ki a Stevie Wonder, Michael Jackson me Taiana Rara i a rātau e whakanui ana i te whakatūnga o Perehitini Pire Kikorangi i mua i te Whakamaharatanga o Lincoln i Washington DC. Ināianei, e whakaatu ana tēnei pūtiro mai i te tau 1997 i a ia e noho ana i Niu Ioka me te kaipāngai o Donald Trump, e rua tekau tau i mua i tana pōtitanga hei Perehitini o Te Hononga o Amerika. I haere mai tētahi whakatupuranga kaiwaiata hou ki te kite i a Franklin hei wahine pūoro kaumātua. Anei a ia i te tau 1998 me Mariah Carey i tētahi konohete "Divas Live" i te Whare Tapere Beacon o New York. I te tau 1987 ka noho ko ia te wahine tuatahi i whakaurua ki te Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. E rua tekau tau i muri mai ka hoki mai a ia ki te takoha ki a Ahmet Ertegun, te kaiwhakarewa o Atlantic Records. I tērā Whiringa o Whiringa, i te 75 o ona tau, ka hoatu e ia tana mahinga whakamutunga i tētahi gala i Niu Ioka hei āwhina i te Tūāpapa Āwhina o Elton John. I roto i tana huinga waiata e iwa he whakaaturanga o Say A Little Prayer. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko te motokā rangatira e wātea ana ki te £1.2m i waho o Harrods
summary: I muri i te tūnga o tētahi motokā rangatira e £1.2m i waho o Harrods i waenganui o Rānōna.
text: I te ahiahi o te 22 o Hōngongoi i whiua te Koenigsegg CCXR me tētahi Lamborghini Murcielago LP670-4 SuperVeloce e £350,000. I kī te Kaunihera o Kensington rāua ko Chelsea i tino takahi nga waka kikorangi kōmā i ngā ture tūranga. I hokona te pātaka o Knightsbridge e ngā kaiwhakangao mai i Qatar i Aperira mō te £1.5bn. I hokona e te rōpū Qatar Holding, i arahina e te Pirimia o Qatari, a Sheikh Hamad Bin Jassim Bin Jabr Al-Thani, mai i Moameta Al Fayed. He tino āhua kore rawa ngā motokā e rua, ā, ko te Koenigsegg i hangaia e Huitene tētahi o ngā mea e ono anake i hangaia. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Harrods: "Ko ngā take e pā ana ki ngā tīkiti tūnga me te whakaū, ko te rohe o te Royal Borough o Kensington me Chelsea." I kī te kaunihera i tukuna ngā whakamōhiotanga utu whiu e £120, engari i tukua ngā motokā mō te £70 ia i te utunga o ngā whaina i roto i te 14 rā. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "He nui ake te iti o te wāhi tūnga mō ngā tangata i Kensington me Chelsea i tētahi atu wāhi o te whenua. " I taua wā he nui tonu a mātau kaihīkoi torotoro e kawea ana ki konei e o tātau toa pai, wharekai me ētahi atu tūnga. "Ko tā mātou manakē ko ō mātou tangata. To keep space available for them, we must deter visitors from taking up residents' bays, and our experience is that clamping is simply the most effective deterrent."

title: I kī atu ngā kaihoko kia kaua e hoko nui ake i te pūnoa
summary: E rapu ana ngā hokomaha ki te whakaū i ngā kaihoko kāore he take o te hoko hua nui i te wā e mana ana ngā rāhuitanga raka hōu.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Tom EspinerBusiness, i tono a BBC News Asda ki ana kiritaki kia "haere tonu ki te hokohoko whakaaro, ā, kaua e hoko nui ake i tā rātou e hiahia ana." Tērā te nui o te hokohoko kai tuihono i muri i te pānuitanga o ngā rāhuitanga raka hou i te Mane, engari kua heke anō te tono. I kī ngā pātaka he pai tō rātou wāteatanga, ā, kua nui ake ngā kāniwha tuku. Kua tāruatia e Tesco me Sainsbury te maha o ngā kāniwha tuku mai i Poutāpeta. I te pānuitanga o ngā rāhuitanga raka hou i te Mane, he tere tuihono e ngā kaihoko hokomaha ki te tāpui i ngā kāniwha tuku. Mai i taua wā ka marino taua pātōtō, engari i hiahia ngā hokomaha nunui i te Wenerei ki te whakaū i ngā kiritaki kāore he take o te hoko nui, i te mea e hiahia ana ngā toa ki te karo i te tāruatanga o te hoko mauri i whakaohotia e te raka tuatahi. I kī a Asda "i tēnei wā he kaha te wātea hua puta noa i ōna pātaka me ōna kōpae, ā, kei te mahi ōna hoa mahi i te karaka kia mau tonu ngā whatanga." I kī a Sainsbury's he "wātea pai me te whakahauhau i ngā kiritaki kia hoko pūnoa. Kāore mātou i te rāhui i ngā hua i tēnei wā." Kua whai tepe hoko a Tesco i ngā hua maha mai i te raka tuatahi, ā, kātahi anō ka whāiti ngā tūemi tae atu ki ngā hēki, raihi, hopi me te pukapuka wharepaku i muri i ngā takawaretanga utanga i te wā o Hakihea i te wā i ngangau ai ngā tauranga. I kī a Tesco i te Wenerei he "wātea pai i roto i ngā pātaka me te tuihono, me te nui o ngā kararehe hei haere, ā, ka whakahauhau mātou i ā mātou kiritaki kia hoko pūnoa." I te wā o te raka tuatahi, ka kite ngā hokomaha i te nui o te hiahia mō te hokohoko tuihono i te wā e ngana ana te tangata ki te karo i te whāranu i roto i ngā toa. Kua whakanuia katoatia e nga mekameka nunui to rātau kaha ki te tuku kai. Kua neke atu i te rua te maha o ngā kāniwha tuku tuihono e wātea ana mai i te tīmatanga o te raruraru, ā, ināianei e 1.5 miriona ngā kāniwha i ia wiki. Kāore ēnei katoa e whakamahia puta noa i te UK i tēnei wā, nā reira kāore he mahere a Tesco i tēnei wā mō ētahi atu kāniwha. Ko Sainsbury's, te tuarua nui rawa, kua neke atu i te rua te maha o ōna kāniwha tuku tuihono mai i Poutāpeta, ā, ka taea te whakatutuki i ngā whakahau neke atu i te 800,000 i ia wiki. Kua piki ake a Asda, te mekameka nui rawa atu, i te maha o ngā kāniwha ia wiki e wātea ana mā te 90% mai i Mati ki te 850,000, ā, i te tīmatanga o Aperira kei te whakaaro ki te tuku i ngā kāniwha 900,000 ia wiki. I kī a Morrison, te mekameka hokomaha nui rawa atu o UK, kua whakanuia e ia tana mahi tuihono e rima mai i Poutāpeta. I kī a Asda i te Wenerei e rua ana hoki te rahi o tana mahi ngātahi ki a Uber Eats. Mai i Hui tanguru ka tukuna e Asda he ratonga tuku 30 meneti mai i ngā pātaka e 200. Kei te hīkoi hoki a Asda i ngā tikanga haumaru Covid, tae atu ki te whakarua i ngā haora haumaru haumaru, ētahi atu teihana noho ma, te whakanui ake i te horoi, me te "tāpiri i tētahi koti ārai ki ngā 'wāhi pā' kiritaki i ngā pātaka pēnei i ngā kakau pākatio me te pouaka whakamātao, ngā wāhi takiputa, me ngā kakau trolley me te kete katoa". He taupānga tūtira mariko tā te mekameka e kiia nei ko "Quidini" e taea ai e ngā kiritaki te noho i roto i tō rātou motokā ki te tatari ki tētahi kāniwha i tētahi pātaka mēnā kei te arokē.

title: I kitea te 'Demo' i tuhia ki Hūtane ki te Tonga i roto i ngā Mahere Google
summary: Kua kitea te kupu "whakaaturanga" e piri ana i te whenua o Hūtane ki te Tonga i Google Maps.
text: I kitea e te kairangahau haumarutanga ā-ipurangi a Tim Hopper te hē i muri i te rangahau i te tauwāhi o tētahi puni rerenga i te whenua. Kotahi noa iho te putanga o te kupu, i tētahi kokonga mamao ki te tonga-rāwhiti o te iwi o Awherika waenganui, e tata ana ki te rohe ki Uganda. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō Google kua whakatikaina te take ināianei. "E aroha ana ahau ki ngā mahere me te titiro ki a rātou i ngā wā katoa e taea ana," te kī a Tēnā Hopper ki a TE Rongokōrero. I kī a ia kua pānui a ia mō Operation Broken Silence, he rōpū kore hua, me tana mahi ki te Puni Tūruhi o Yida. "I te mutunga ka tirohia e au te mahere o Hūtane ki te Tonga kia whai horopaki mō taua mahi," tana kī. "Ko taku whakaaro tino pai ko te mahi i horaina pokanoatia, ā, kāore tētahi tangata i kite. " Ko Hūtane ki te Tonga ki te tonga-rāwhiti he wāhi tino waihotia o te ao."

title: Ko ngā ratonga rēra i pā ki te tāhae taura i waenganui i Te Kārewa me Newport
summary: Ko te raruraru nui o te ratonga rēra i te tonga o Uēra i te Hātarei i takea mai i ngā tāhae taura i waenganui i Te Wānanga me Newport.
text: I oti i ngā kaipūkaha ngā tapi i te ata Rātapu, e ai ki te ratonga National Rail Enquiries. Engari i whakakorea ētahi ratonga o te ata Rātapu i waenganui i Cardiff Central me Bristol Temple Meads. I whakakorea ngā ratonga Arriva Trains Wales, CrossCounty me Great Western Railway, i anga atu rānei ki ngā takaware tae atu ki te 70 meneti i te ahiahi o te Rāhoroi. I whakatuwheratia anō ētahi raina ā muri ake me te maha o ngā tereina e rere ana, e whakaratoa ana ngā pahi whakakapi. I pāngia ngā ara i waenganui i Gloucester, Manchester Piccadilly, Holyhead, tae atu ki waenganui i Pembroke Dock me Milford Haven. I pā hoki ētahi atu ratonga ko ngā tereina CrossCountry i waenganui i Ngā ratonga Rerewhenua Nui me Ngā Rerewhenua Nui ki te Uru i waenganui i London Paddington, Cardiff Central me Swansea.

title: Q&A: Mate pukupuku i Wales
summary: Ko te mate pukupuku he mate kua pā ki te whānau, ki ngā hoa, ki a tātau anō rānei. Engari he aha ngā take nui rawa e anga ana ki ngā tūroro me te mahi rongoā i Weera? He pēhea te pūnoa o te mate pukupuku?
text: Nā Owain ClarkeBBC Wales te take nui rawa o te mate moata i Wales me te UK. Ko te tangata i whānau i muri i te tau 1960 ināianei he 50% te tūponotanga ki te whakawhanake i te mate. Ko te tamaiti i whānau mai i tēnei rā, he nui ake te mate pukupuku i te kore. Ko te tikanga o ngā nekehanga rongoā ki te rongoā i ngā āhuatanga pēnei i te mate manawa, i te whiu rānei, ko te tikanga kei te roa ake te ora o te tangata - ā, tērā pea ka pā ki te mate pukupuku. E tūmanakohia ana kia piki ake te pupūtanga o te mate pukupuku i te 2% i te tau. Ko te tikanga o te maha o ngā tāngata e noho ana i te mate pukupuku i Uēra ka taurua ki neke atu i te 200,000 i te tau 2030. Kua tata ki te 50% ngā tohutohu mō te mate pukupuku e whakapaetia ana i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa - ka whakanuia te pēhanga o ngā ratonga tohunga me ngā ratonga tātaritanga. He uaua anō mō ēnei ratonga nā te mea he iti ake ngā kaimātai me ngā matawai o Uēra i te wawaenga o Ūropi - i te wā e pakeke ake ana ngā kaitohutohu. E whakapau ana te NHS Welsh i te 7% o tana tahua katoa mo te tiaki mate pukupuku. Tata ki te 40% o ngā mate pukupuku e pāhono ana ki ngā āhuatanga āhua noho. He aha te take i hira ai te tātaritanga wawe? Ko te tikanga o ngā nekehanga o te rongoā, ināianei neke atu i te 50% te wā e ora ai i te mate. Engari ko te tātaritanga tōmuri - ina hōhonu te puku, kua horapa rānei ki ētahi atu wāhi o te tinana - ka tino whakaheke i te wā e whakaora ana i te mate pukupuku hōhonu, e rua ki te toru ngā wā he nui ake te utu ki te rongoā i te mate pukupuku o mua. E whai ana a Wales ki te whakatere ake i te tātaritanga mate pukupuku mō te katoa Me pēhea te whakataurite a Wales ki te ora o te mate pukupuku? E whakaatu ana ngā whika hou kāore he rerekētanga nui i roto i ngā pāpātanga ora e rima tau i waenganui i Uēra me Ingarangi mō tētahi mate pukupuku. Engari kua tāruatia e tētahi o ngā tohunga mate pukupuku o Uēra tōna tirohanga he roa te huarahi e haere ai i mua i to tātau whakataurite i te tino pai i Uropi. Kua huatau mai a ia kia 300 anō ngā tūroro ka ora pea i te mate pukupuku i ia tau i Uēra mēnā ka mahia ngā ratonga i konei me te wawaenga o Ūropi me te 600 oranga i tiakina mēnā ka whakaripa a Uēra ki te tino pai. E kī ana te Whatunga Pukupuku o Wales he maha ngā mātauranga kua whakaaturia he "tino rawakore" te ora o te mate pukupuku katoa i Wales i whakaritea ki ētahi atu iwi o UK me ētahi atu iwi tipua. E whakaatu ana tēnei i te tokomaha atu o ngā tāngata i ia tau e ora ana i te mate pukupuku i Uēra - ahakoa i ētahi o ngā momo mate e takamuri ana te iwi i ētahi atu whenua o Ūropi. Mō te mate pukupuku kopirua, ko Uēra te tūnga 26 o ngā whenua 29 o Ūropi mō ngā mokatere ora e rima tau o nā noa nei. I whakaripa a Uēra i te 28 i roto i ngā whenua e 29 o Ūropi i roto i te rima tau e ora ana mō te mate pukupuku pūkahukahu (i raro iho i Pōrana, Rituānia me Rāwhia) me te 25 i roto i te 29 mō te ora o te pukupuku pukupuku whekau (i raro iho i Horowinia, Potukara me Etonia) I kitea e tētahi atu akoranga te UK (me Weera) kia whakaripa ki raro i te pūkahukahu, te pukupuku, te uma me te pukupuku whekau i whakaritea ki ngā whenua e 13 me ngā pūnaha tiaki hauora ōrite. He nui hoki te rerekētanga i roto i Uēra i runga i te pupūtanga o te mate pukupuku me ngā tauira whakaata ora o te rawakore. Kua huatau hoki ngā rangahau ao whānui i te tātaritanga tōmuri he take āwhina ki ēnei pāpātanga ora rawakore. He aha te take i takaware ai te tātaritanga? He maha ngā take e tākaro ana i konei. He iti te āhukahuka i ngā tohu me ngā āhuatanga i waenganui i te iwi whānui - engari i roto i ngā hapori tūkino ake. Ko ētahi tangata e wehi ana i te tātaritanga mate pukupuku, ahakoa e tino whakapae ana rātau i te mate pukupuku. Tērā pea ka manawapa ētahi ki te kite i ō rātou GP nā te mea kei te māharahara rātou ki te "moumou i te wā o te tākuta" - e whakapono ana rānei ka "ngaro" ngā tohu. Kua whakaaturia hoki e te rangahau he iti iho ngā GP i Uēra i ētahi atu whenua ki te tūhura i ngā tohu whakatūpato tūpono - e mahi ana hei "kaitiaki kēti" pākaha ake. Tērā pea he takaware ki te whakarite me te whakaoti i ngā whakamātautau tātaritanga - otirā mēnā kāore i te mārama ngā tohu. Kua titiro a Kate Brain, he hinengaro hinengaro hauora mai i te Kura Rongoā o te Whare Wānanga o Cardfiff he aha te take kāore te tangata e haere mai ki mua me ngā āhuatanga mate pukupuku, te whakamātau rānei. I kī a ia ka taea e te tangata te ākiri i ngā āhuatanga hārangirangi, ā, kāore e haere ki tō rātou tākuta, engari he rōpū anō me ngā āhuatanga rerekē tērā pea he take. "Ka āhei ngā tāngata ki te whakaroa i te rapu āwhina, engari ka kite hoki mātou i ngā rerekētanga i roto i ngā tāngata mai i ngā hapori tūkino, me te iti iho te mōhiotanga ki ngā āhuatanga, ā, he whakapono tōraro e pā ana ki te mate pukupuku e whakaroa ana i te rapu āwhina," tana kī. Ka taea e Wales te ako mai i ētahi atu whenua? I te tau 2016, ka haere ngā tohunga mate pukupuku o Uēra ki Tenemaka ki te titiro ki te āhua o te mōrearea o te ora - tae atu ki ngā whare hauora tū kotahi e mahi ana i ngā whakamātautau maha i te wā kotahi. Pēnei i Weera, i Tenemaka mēnā he mārama, he tohu whakamataku rānei, ka piki ake ēnei i ngā wā katoa. Ko te wero he pēhea te pai ake o te tātari i aua tūroro me ngā āhuatanga hārangirangi, uaua ake rānei. Ko te hua o te haerenga kimi tūturu, kua tīmata ngā aronui i ngā wāhi poari hauora o Cwm Taf me Abertawe Bro Morgannwg mō ngā GP ki te whakapā atu i ngā tūroro kāore i te mārama ki ngā pūtahi tātaritanga - kei reira te whāinga kia whakaoti i ngā whakamātautau katoa e hiahiatia ana i te haerenga kotahi. I Neath Port Talbot me Ogmore Valley GP kua whai kōwhiringa ināianei ki te tohutoro i ngā tūroro ki tētahi whare hauora "kotahi-tū" - he āhuatanga hārangirangi tā rātou e whakapae ana te tākuta he mate pukupuku pea. Me pēhea ngā wheako o ngā tūroro? He pai te wheako o ngā tūroro ki te tiaki mate pukupuku i Wales - me te 96% o ngā tūroro e whakatau ana i tā rātou tiaki he pai, he tino pai, he tino pai rānei.

title: Tekau tau te pakeke i waenganui i te tokorima i whara i te tūtukitanga o te motokā pirihimana o Glasgow
summary: I waenganui i ngā tāngata e rima i whara tētahi 10 tau i te tūtukitanga o tētahi motokā pirihimana ki tētahi atu waka.
text: I kī ngā pirihimana i tīmata te mahi tata ki te 15:35 i te Tūtira i te korenga o tētahi motokā Skoda ki te tū i te Huarahi Stravanan i te takiwā o Castlemilk o Glasgow. I whai mai tētahi pirihimana pirihimana o Peugeot, ā, ka tūtuki ki te rangatū kikorangi BMW 3 i Te Huarahi o Carmunnock i tōna komititanga ki Ngā Māra o Craiglinn. Kaore te Skoda i tū i muri i te tūtukitanga. I mauria te tangata 39 tau e taraiwa ana i te BMW ki te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini Elizabeth (QEUH) i Glasgow, ā, ka mauria tana pāhihi 10 tau ki te Hōhipera Ariki mō ngā Tamariki. Tokotoru hoki nga pirihimana tāne i mauria ki te QEUH. I kī a Ch Insp Darren Faulds: "Kei te haere tonu a mātau uiui ki ngā āhuatanga e karapoti ana i te tūtukitanga, tae atu ki te waka i rahua ki te tū. " E tohutohu ana ahau i te tangata i kite i te tūtukitanga, i te rohe rānei i te wā o te tūtukitanga kia whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana. "Waihoki, ko te tangata whai whakarākeitanga pīhono e āwhina ana i tā mātou tūhuratanga, me whakapā atu." I katia te huarahi mō te toru haora i muri i te tūtukitanga, kua kōrerotia ināianei ki te Komihana Pirihimana me te Komihana Arotake.

title: Ngā aki pātaitai Topa: Te Kararehe a te Whai me pēhea te whakangahau anō
summary: Kua hipa atu koe i a rātou, e tika? Kua kī koe, "Aue, he mea anō tāku" kia puta atu i a rātou, e tika?
text: Engari te āhua nei kāore pea ngā pō Hātarei e tino whakamere ake i ngā wā tata nei - ā, tērā pea kei te pau noa iho ō takunga. Kua raka e toru, ā, he mea tonu ngā pātaitai Topa. Engari kotahi tonu te mea e puta ana i ia marama, tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki te noho hei wāhanga o. Kei roto hoki ētahi o ngā tāngata tino mōhio i runga i te pouaka whakaata - te Chasers. Ka whakamārama a Mark Labbett - AKA The Beast - ki Radio 1 Newsbeat: "He pātaitai Topa ā-marama tā mātou, e tino tika ana mō ngā mana whakangungu me ngā mana whakahīhī." Ko ia tētahi o ngā kanohi o te pouaka whakaata tī mai i te tau 2009, ā, e whakaae ana he pai te pātaitai auau a Chasers ki te pupuri i te mōhiotanga. "I ētahi wā he pātai matapōkere. He mea whakamere te tono a ngā Chasers pakeke mō ngā pātai hōu rawa mō te rau tau 21, otirā ko te whakangahau, te pūoro me te pouaka whakaata. He wāhi whakataurite tēnā o te ngoikoretanga. "E hiahia ana ngā Chasers taitamariki ki ngā pātai mō ngā tau 1970 me te 80 hei whakapai ake i aua wāhi. Ko te mahi ngaio e pā ana ki te mahi i ō ngoikoretanga." Tērā pea kei te miharo koe ko tēhea Chaser ka toa i tētahi pātaitai o ngā Chasers. Ko Paora Sinha (The Sinnerman) te tino ōrite. Mēnā kei te āki anō koe ki ngā pātaitai Topa i te raka tuatoru, kei te Kararehe ētahi aki hei whakaeke i a koe ki te wāhi tuatahi (ka herea kia nui ake te mau ki te toa koe, e tika?) E kī ana a Mark: "Whakarongo āta whakarongo ki te pātai me te whakarite kei te whakautu koe i te pātai kua pātaitia ki a koe." A, mēnā kei te karo koe i tētahi pātaitai Topa nā te mōhio o te whānau? "Tērā tētahi āhuatanga ā-hinengaro e kiia nei ko te pānga Dunning-Kruger, ko te tikanga he tokomaha ngā tāngata e whakaaro ana he mōhio ake rātau i a rātou. " E karanga ana mātou i aua tāngata e noho ana i te 'maunga heahea' ā, he pai tonu rātou ki te kite nā te mea e mōhio ana koe kei te kuru rātou." Kei a tātau katoa tēnā matua kēkē. Kua tino whakaū te Chase ināianei, he whakaaturanga āmio. Kātahi anō ka oti i a Beat The Chasers tētahi oma tuarua i ITV. Ināianei he hōtaka anō e noho tahi ana a Mark, Anne Hegerty (The Governess) me Shaun Wallace (The Dark Destroyer) ki runga pahi. Tīmata ana i te pō o te Rāite i ITV, e kiia ana ko The Chasers Road Trip. "Ko te ariā, ka tukuna e rātau e toru ngā tāngata mātauranga huri noa i Tiapanī me Amerika e titiro ana ki ngā āhuatanga maha o te mōhiotanga," te kī a Mark. "I titiro mātou ki te mōhiohio kararehe me te mōhiohio karetao me te āhua o te whakawhanake a ngā tamariki i te mōhiotanga. " I kitea e rātau tētahi mea e ōrite ana ki a mātau katoa. He pai ake tātau katoa ki te moe hōhonu i te tangata toharite." Mēnā kua āta whakaaro koe, ā, i whakaaro tonu koe ka taea e koe te Chaser, e ai ki a Mark, he pūkenga motuhake me te nui o te wā. "Me whiwhi koe i tā mātou e kīia nei he pūmahara piripiri, tērā kaha ki te ngongo me te whakahoki anō i ngā take, tata tonu me te kore whakamātau, kātahi ka tāpiri atu ki tērā he nui o te whakangungu. " E rua, e toru tau rānei te mahi mārō a te Chaser hou, a Darragh [Ennis], ki te tiki i ngā momo mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e ia. "E pā ana ki te huna, te hīpoki, te kati rānei i tō ngoikoretanga, ā, he nui te mahi." Anei tētahi pātai mēnā e whakaaro ana koe he pai rawa koe mō te Whai. He aha i tapaina ai a Mark Labbett ko te Kararehe i ITV's The Chase? A) I tīmataria e Te Wānanga B) E 6ft7 a ia C) He rite tōna ingoa whānau ki "Te Kararehe" i te Wīwī D) E pā ana ki tētahi pikitia o te tau 1990 (Whakautu: C) Whāia te Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: Ngā tapahi kaunihera: He pēhea te pānga o ngā whakahekenga ki Greater Manchester?
summary: Kei te takatū kē ngā mana ā-rohe tekau o Greater Manchester mō te utu tahua neke atu i te hauwhā miriona pauna a tērā tau.
text: Nā Kevin FitzpatrickBBC Te kaipānui tōrangapū o Manatāne, ko te whika katoa e tūmanakohia ana e te £285m e haere mai ana i runga i te £1.2bn o ngā tapahi mai i te wā i whakaurua ai ngā tikanga whakawhāiti a te kāwanatanga i te tau 2010. During that time, almost 10,000 council jobs have been lost and councils are now running some of the services they provide with a third less money than they had in 2010. Kei a Manatū te tahua nui rawa atu, nā reira ko te tino pānga ki te whakawhāititanga i Greater Manchester. Me tiaki e te kaunihera o te taone te £59m a tērā tau, ā, e hiahia ana ki te tapahi i ētahi atu mahi e 600. Kei te whakarite i ngā tapahi whānui ki ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro me ngā ratonga taiohi, me te maha o ngā tautiaki whakawhiti kura, kauhoe koreutu me ngā rawa katoa ki ngā rōpū hapori e rārangi ana kia whakakorea. E tūmanakohia ana me tapahi tētahi atu £31m i te 2016-17. Tātaritanga: Kua kaha ake te pānga o te kāwanatanga ā rohe i te Uru ki te Raki i te whakapau moni i tētahi atu rohe i Ingarangi. E ngana ana nga minita ki te whakaiti i te tāpaetanga, a, ko te tikanga o te whakarite i nga tahua nui ake. Ko ngā kaunihera taone nui ake e whiwhi ana i te moni nui rawa hei mahi i ngā raruraru pāpori tino pēhi. Ahakoa kua whakatio te tahua a te kāwanatanga ā-rohe, ka penapena ngā kaiārahi kaunihera nā te pikinga o ngā utu, otirā ko te tiaki pāpori pakeke. Engari, ko te mea, kua whakahekea ngā whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga ā-rohe i ētahi atu tari. E whakapae ana a Labour i te kāwanatanga ki te whiu i ngā kaunihera ki te Raki i te utunga o ngā rangatira ake i te Tonga. Ka whakamāramatia e te kāwanatanga kai te whiwhi tonu rātau i te pūtea nui ake. Kua urupare ngā kaunihera tino pai mā te mahi ngātahi, auaha, māia hoki. Engari e kore e kore ētahi e uaua ana ki te whakatikatika. So far it's estimated North West councils have had their budgets reduced by a third since the general election. Ā, kāore he tohu e tata ana te pēhanga ki te whakangāwari. I kī a Tā Rārangi Leese, te kaiārahi Mahi o te Kaunihera Taone o Manatāne: "Me tautuhi e mātou he tahua whārite me te kaha o ngā tapahi ki tā mātou pūtea kāwanatanga matua - i runga i ngā tapahi o mua - kia tino uaua, ehara i te mea e taea ana i te mamae." Ka whakamāramatia e te kāwanatanga, ahakoa ngā tapahi, kei te whiwhi tonu a Manatū i ētahi o ngā pūtea teitei rawa atu i te whenua, me te whakapau moni a te taone nui i te £2,518 mō ia whare i tēnei tau - neke atu i te £400 teitei ake i te wawaenga o Ingarangi. I tētahi atu wāhi, e tūmanakohia ana me tiaki e Rochdale te £37m, Salford £30m me Bolton £25m. Ko Jim MacMahon o Labour te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera o Oldham, me tiaki e ia te £35m. Ka kī a ia: "Kua hipa atu ngā penapena ināianei, kei te kōrero mātou mō ngā tapahi, ā, me haere mātou ki ngā mea e kitea ana e te tangata, e rongo ana, e whakawhirinaki ana." I Taraiwa, e tono ana te kaunihera whakahaere Conservative ki te kati i ngā karapu taitamariki me ngā pūtahi tamariki i a ia e ngana ana ki te tiaki i te £24m. Tērā ētahi whakahē i waho o ngā hui kaunihera, i ētahi kura tuatahi kua whakaritea kia ngaro ā rātou tautiaki lollipop. I kī te kaiārahi o Sean Anstee: "He tino uaua ki ngā mana ā rohe i tēnei wā, engari, ki te haere tonu mātou ki te whakapau moni kāore i a mātou, ko tā mātou e waihanga ana he mahi ā muri ake me te iwi mō te rangatahi kāore e whai hua." Kei te āta whakaatu ngā mana ā-rohe e 10 o Greater Manchester i ngā mahere penapena me te kōrero ki te iwi whānui mō tō rātou pānga i mua i te tautuhi i ā rātou tahua i Poutāpeta.

title: Hui Tory: Moni i pānuitia mō ngā mahere huarahi ā-rohe
summary: Kua kī atu te hēkeretari waka hou a Patrick McLoughlin ki te hui a te Rōpū Rangatira e whakarite ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakapai ake i ngā piro raruraru e 57 i runga i ngā huarahi i Ingarangi.
text: I kī a ia ka pau i te kāwanatanga te £170m mo nga mahi. Engari ko te kōrero ki te hōro he "iti noa iho te whakamataku", tana kī. Ko tōna āhua whakamutunga i te tau 1984 i te wā i kī atu ai a Tēnā McLoughlin - he kaikari o mua - ki ngā kaitautapa ka mahi tonu a ia ahakoa e kiia ana he "Tory scab". I te ngana ki te whakahoki i te tapanga iwi kotahi i whakamahia e te kaiārahi Mahi o Ed Miliband i roto i tana whaikōrero hui i tērā wiki, ka kī te hēkeretari waka: "Ko ahau te tama a te kaikari, ko te mokopuna a te kaikari." "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakamārama i tētahi wāhi. Ki te hiahia koe ki te mārama ki tētahi iwi, e Tēnā Miliband, māku e whakaatu ki a koe tētahi iwi. Kai te tū a ia i tēnei paepae. He iwi kotahi ahau o Tory." 'Madness' E pānui ana i te pūtea hei whakatika i ngā "pinchpoints" i runga i ngā huarahi o Ingarangi, ka kī a Tēnā McLoughlin: "Me anga atu tātou, kua haumi mātou hei whenua mō ngā tau. " He nui rawa te paheketanga, kāore i te nui ngā aronui hōu. He pōrangi, ā, ka kōmakatia e mātou." I whakahau hoki a ia kia pēhi whakamua te kāwanatanga me a rātau kaupapa mo tētahi hononga tere tere i waenganui i Rānōna. Kua tūtaki nga tono ki te ātete i roto i te Rōpū Rangatira. Kua whakaahuatia e tētahi minita kāpata o mua te raina i whakaritea he "wehi". Engari i kī te hēkeretari waka i tēnei rā: "Kāore e taea e mātou te kore e hanga. Kei te haumi o mātau tauwhāinga puta noa i te ao ki te waka tino pai, ā, me mātua mahi anō tātau." I kī taurangi a ia ka tika te utu i te hunga e pāngia ana ōna kāinga me ōna hapori e te raina hou. A, i kī a ia e hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakaiti i ngā wā haere mai i Rāwāhi ki Pākehā ki raro iho i te toru haora. Ko te pūtea mō ngā whakapainga huarahi hei tango i ngā whākōkī pounamu me te whakarewa i te āhua o te mahi mā te whakapai ake i te urunga ki ngā rohe hinonga paetata. Kei roto ko ngā mahi i ngā huanui M1, M62 me M5, tae atu ki te A1 me te A404.

title: Na te tūtukitanga o te piriti i raruraru ai te rēra o Staffordshire
summary: I whakakorea, i takaware rānei ngā ratonga rerewhenua i muri i te tūtukitanga o tētahi arawhiti rerewhenua e tētahi waka.
text: I pā te piriti i runga i te Raina Matua o Te Tairāwhiti i Worston Lane, tata ki Stafford, i te ahiahi o te Rāite, ka waiho he whāwhā kitea i runga i te pakitara. I takaware, i nekehia rānei ngā ratonga CrossCountry me London Northwestern mā Stafford, Stoke-on-Trent me Crewe nā te tūkinotanga. I pūrongotia e te National Rail kua tīmata anō te ratonga pūnoa i te Paraire i te 17:00 GMT. Na ngā kaipūkaha i haumaru te piriti me te wāhi karapoti i mua i te tīmatanga o ngā tapi, te kī a Network Rail. I kī ngā tereina CrossCountry i whakaritea he rāhuitanga tere 20mph, ā, i pāngia ōna ratonga i waenganui i Birmingham New Street, Bournemouth, Southampton Central, Exeter me Manchester Piccadilly. Ko ngā ratonga i tukuna e London Northwestern Railway i waenganui i London Euston me Crewe, i waenganui hoki i a Birmingham New Street me Liverpool Lime Street i te raruraru me ngā Virgin Trains i waenganui i London Euston me Manchester Piccadilly, Crewe, Liverpool Lime Street me Scotland. I tohutohutia ngā pāhihi kia tirohia ō rātou ara i mua i te haerenga. I te wā o te raruraru, ka taea te whakamahi i ngā tīkiti i runga i ētahi atu tereina me ētahi atu pahi, i kī a Network Rail. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Ka tohuāki ngā drones i te 'waipuke' o ngā amuamu ki ngā pirihimana
summary: Kei te "waipuketia" ngā ope pirihimana i te UK ki ngā pūrongo e pā ana ki ngā rīpene, kua kī tētahi tūhuratanga.
text: I tērā tau, neke atu i te 3,456 ngā mahi e pā ana ki ngā rīpene i whakapūketetia, i whakaritea ki te 1,237 anake i te 2015, i pūrongotia e te pokapū rongokōrero PA. E kī ana ngā tau mō te 10 ngā mahi i ia rā, e kī ana. Ko ngā amuamu ā-drone ko ngā whakaekenga tūmataitinga, ngā tautohetohe i waenganui i ngā hoa noho tata, ngā hapa tata ki te rererangi me te maunu whare herehere, e kī ana a PA. I kī te kōwhiringa rongokōrero he nui ake pea te nuinga o ngā mahi taiapa i te whika i hoatu e ia nā te mea kāore i urupare ngā tōpana katoa i whakapā atu ki tana tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio. Tērā pea ka pā nui te whakamahinga o te taiapa ki te tūmataitinga whaiaro, ka kī atu a Prof David Dunn, tētahi kaipūtaiao pāremata mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare "I mua he taiepa tāu, he pakitara tāu, ā, ka taea e koe te mahi i ngā mea katoa e hiahia ana koe i roto i tō kāri me te kore whakararuraru i a koe," tana kī. "Kua rerekē tēnā nā te rīpene." Ko te nuinga o ngā pūrongo i takiurutia e ngā tōpana e pā ana ki ngā tohenga i takea mai i ngā rīpene e rere ana i runga i ngā māra, mō ngā wā roa rānei e tata ana ki te huihuinga. I ētahi take, e kī ana ngā pirihimana, te āhua nei kei te whakamahi ngā tāhae i te rīpene ki te tirotiro mēnā kei te nohoia tētahi whare i mua i te pakarutanga. Kua whakamahia hoki e te hunga hara he rīpene hei kawe rongoā me ētahi atu tāhae ki roto i ngā whare herehere. I te tau 2016, e 70 ngā hapa tata i waenganui i ngā rererangi me ngā rererangi i ngā taunga rererangi o UK, e ai ki ngā whika i kohia e te Poari Airprox o UK, e rangitaki ana i ēnei mahi. I te tau 2015, e 29. I kī a Ass Ch Con Steve Barry, e upoko ana i te rōpū e whakahaere ana i ngā rīpene i runga i te Kaunihera Pirihimana o te Motu, he nui ake ngā mema o te iwi whānui e māharahara ana ki te whakamahinga o ngā rīpene e tata ana ki a rātou, ki tō rātou whānau rānei. "Me whakataurite e mātou te tupunga o tēnei hangarau mā te whakarite kia mōhio te iwi whānui ki te anga ture kaha me ngā tohutohu kaiwhakamahi taipitopito e wātea ana e pā ana ki te whakamahinga taiapa," tana kī. E kī ana ngā ture UK mō te whakamahi taiapa i te waka iti: Kei te whakahaere te Tari Waka i tētahi mahi whakawhitiwhiti hei whakaaro mēnā e hiahiatia ana he tikanga hōu kia noho haumaru ai ngā drones. Ko tētahi hipanga e whakaarohia ana ko te hanganga o tētahi hara hara e hāngai ana i te whakamahinga o te taiapa.

title: E whakaū ana a Hakari i te āraitanga 'nanakia' mo te moe mārō
summary: Ko te moe tōraro i ngā wāhi tūmatanui ināianei e hē ana ki te ture i Hakari.
text: I mauria mai te ture e te kāwanatanga o te Pirimia, engari i karangatia e nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao he "nanakia" e tohe ana ki te mana tangata. E whakakore ana i te noho i runga i nga tiriti, ā, i whakaaetia tuatahitia e te pāremata o Putapeta i Hune. E kī ana te kāwanatanga ko te whakaae ki ngā pirihimana ki te tango i ngā tūmoe tōraro i ngā wāhi tūmatanui, ko te "painga o te iwi katoa". Ka mana te huringa ture i te Mane, ā, he putanga kaha ake o tētahi ture 2013 nāna i hara te moe mārō. Ko tōna whāinga ko "te whakarite kāore ngā tāngata noho kore kāinga i runga i ngā tiriti i te pō, ā, ka taea e ngā tangata whenua te whakamahi i te mokowā tūmatanui," e ai ki a Attila Fulop, te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o te Take Pāpori. I te wā o June, ka karangatia e te tohunga whare o nga Iwi o te Hononga o Te Ao, ko Leilani Farha he "nanakia, he hotokore ki te ture motika tangata o te ao whānui". "He aha tēnei 'hara' kua mahia e te hunga noho kore? E ngana ana ki te ora noa iho?" tana kī i roto i tētahi reta tūwhera ki te kāwanatanga. E 11,000 ngā wāhi e wātea ana mō te hunga noho kore kāinga i roto i ngā pāruru e whakahaeretia ana e te kāwanatanga. Engari e kī ana ngā tohunga neke atu i te 20,000 ngā tāngata noho kāinga kore puta noa i te whenua. I tērā marama, ka pōti te Pāremata o Ūropi ki te whakarewa i ngā mahi ā-ture, i muri i te kīanga a ngā mema nā te mahinga a Hakari i tōna kāinga kore i āwhina ki tētahi "mōrea mārama o tētahi pakaru nui" o ngā uara o te Uniana o Ūropi. E kī ana te kāwanatanga i Hakari kei te whakanuia te pūtea mo te whakarato kāinga kore. "Ka whakaratoa te āwhina i runga i te āhua rangatira," e kī ana i roto i tētahi kōrero. "E tukuna ana ki ngā tāngata noho kore kāinga i te ao, i te pō e taea ai e rātou te kai, te horoi i a rātou me te moe." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Ka whiwhi ngā hōhipera o Lincolnshire i te £25m mō te whakahoutanga
summary: E toru ngā hōhipera o Lincolnshire me whakahou i muri i te whakawhiwhinga ki tētahi NHS Trust e £25m te pūtea.
text: Lincoln County, Boston Pilgrim and Grantham and District hospitals will use the cash to update wards, modernise buildings or extend car parks. Kua haumarutia te moni mā te ProCure21+, he kaupapa a te Tari Hauora mō te whakawhanake i ngā ratonga NHS. United Lincolnshire Hospitals NHS Trust (ULHT) said the work would ensure high-quality and more efficient services. I tangohia te whakawhirinaki i ngā tikanga motuhake i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau i muri i te whakahēnga mō te kore kaimahi me te tiaki tūroro rawakore i te tau 2013. Ko te mahi hou rawa, e tūmanakohia ana kia oti i a Poutāpeta, ka whakarerekētia ngā huringa ki ngā whare kohanga i ngā hōhipera o Boston Pilgrim me Lincoln County me ngā pūkenga pai ake mō ngā tūroro matenui. 'Whakahaere pai ake' I kī a Paul Boocock, te kaiwhakahaere o ngā pānga o te whakawhirinaki, ka whakahōutia hoki te tīrama, te whakamahana me te whakaora i ngā pae hei whakaiti i ngā utu i te wā roa. "He hipanga hira tēnei ki te panoni i ā mātou ratonga rongoā me te whakarite kia haumaru, kia pūmau hoki mō te rau tau 21," tana kī. "Mā te whakahōu i ā mātou whare, ka pai ake tā mātou whakatutuki i ngā paerewa rongoā tino kounga, ā, ka noho hei whakahaere pūngao pai ake." Ka puta mai te mahi i mua i tētahi arotakenga nui o ngā ratonga hauora me ngā ratonga rongoā i Lincolnshire. A public consultation will be held later this year to get people's views on the future of care and services, including the possibility of one central maternity unit in the county. I kī a Christine Talbot, te manukura o te komiti tirotiro hauora o te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Lincolnshire, ahakoa he "rongo pai" te pūtea, he māharahara tōna mō ngā moni e pau ana ina huri ngā ratonga i muri i te arotakenga.

title: Ka nui ake te utu o te āhuatanga, e kī ana a Rics
summary: Ka noho te āhuatanga hei "nui ake te utu" i roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei e waihanga ana i tētahi hiahia nui mō tētahi hōtaka hanga whare, e kī ana ngā kaitirotiro.
text: Nā Kevin PeacheyKaipānui pūtea whaiaro Ka piki tonu ngā utu āhuatanga me te utu o te rēti kāinga nā te iti o te putanga, i kitea he uiuinga a te Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (Rics). E kī ana kua piki ake ngā utu mō ngā marama e toru kua hipa i ngā wāhi katoa o te UK. Kua hinga te maha o ngā kāinga i runga i te mākete i ia marama mai i Hui tanguru. "Ko te tawhito o te taka o te hanganga hou i muri i te tīmatanga o te raruraru pūtea o te ao whānui ināianei kei te tino tuki ki te kāinga, me ngā hoko me ngā mākete tuku e whakaatu tonu ana i te tono e nui ake ana i te putanga i ia marama," te kī a Haimona Rubinsohn, te rangatira o te ohanga i Rics. "If the five-year projections from members regarding the outlook for both prices and rents is anything to go by, property is set to become even more unaffordable going forward making the government's focus of boosting the delivery of new homes absolutely critical." Tātaitai utu whare Titiro ki te Rāwhiti I kitea e te uiuinga ka haere tonu te tono ki te nui ake i ngā wāhi maha o te UK. Ko te hua o te pikinga o ngā utu, engari kāore te pikinga tere rawa i Rāwāhi - pērā i ngā tau tata nei - engari i te Rāwhiti o Ingarangi. Kua rite tonu te kite a East Anglia i te tere tere o te pikinga i ia marama e toru kua hipa, te kī a Rics. I Rāwāhi, e kīa ana kua pāngia te pito o runga o te mākete e ngā huringa ki te mahi pane kuini, e 5% anake ētahi atu kaitirotiro e tūmanako ana kia piki ake ngā utu i roto i ngā marama e toru e whai ake nei i te hunga e matapae ana i te hinganga. E whai ana ngā whika i ngā matapae mai i te māngai pānga o Savills e tūmanako ana kia piki ake ngā utu whare o UK ki te 17% i te mutunga o te tau 2020. Ka awhe tēnei mai i te 21.6% e piki ana i te Tonga ki te Rāwhiti o Ingarangi ki te 12% e piki ana i te Raki ki te Rāwhiti o Ingarangi, e kī ana te māngai pānga. Ma te tere o te pikinga o ngā mokatere huamoni e whakatau te tere, te tuari me te toitūtanga o te tupunga utu whare, e kī ana. I whakamāramatia ngā rangahau utu whare Ka whakapūketetia e ngā uiuinga maha ngā utu whare o UK ia marama, engari he iti noa iho te rerekē o te tikanga o te katoa. Ko te taupū utu whare a te Nationwide Building Society te mea tere rawa atu ki te tuku. Ka whakamahi i tētahi uara toharite mō ngā āhuatanga i muri i te whakaaro i ngā wae pēnei i te tauwāhi me te rahi. E ai ki tōna ake whakatārewa mōkete e tohu ana i te 13% o te mākete. Ka whakaputaina tētahi uiuinga a te Halifax, ināianei he wāhanga o te Rōpū Pākehā o Raiti, i ētahi rā i muri iho. Ko Raiti te kaituku moni mōkete nui rawa i te UK me te 20% o te mākete, ā, pēnei i te Nationwide, ka whakamahi i ōna ake raraunga moni tārewa kāinga. Ko ngā whika mai i te Rēhita Whenua e whakaarotia ana ko te tino pakari, engari ka whakaputaina ā muri ake i ngā raraunga a ngā kaituku moni. Ka tātaitia te huringa utu mō ngā āhuatanga kua hokona maha mai i te tau 1995. Ko tēnei uiuinga anake e kapi ana i Ingarangi me Weera. Ko tētahi uiuinga o ngā utu whare i Pākehā e whakaputaina ana e ngā Rēhita o Pākehā, mā te whakamahi i te wawaenga ngāwari o ngā utu whare. Ko ngā Ratonga Whenua me ngā Āhuatanga e āwhinatia ana e te Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency e whakaputa ana i tētahi taupū utu whare ia hauwhā i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ko te mana tatauranga mana o UK - te Office for National Statistics - tētahi atu uiuinga rongonui, e whakamahia ana hei tohutoro e te kāwanatanga. Ka tukuna e ia tētahi wehenga ā-rohe whānui o UK. Ka tātuhia e ia ngā raraunga mai i te uiuinga mōkete kua whakaritea e te Kaunihera o ngā Kaituku Mokete, nā reira ka aukati i ngā kaihoko moni o te rawa. Housing market sentiment is reflected in the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (Rics) survey of some of its members. Ko ētahi atu tānga ko tētahi taupū Hometrack o ngā utu whare i ngā tāone o UK, me tētahi uiuinga Rightmove o ngā utu tono. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors Savills matapae e rima tau

title: E rapu ana a WHK ki te wetemaukati i te iPhone o te pūtiro o Texas
summary: Kua tono a Āporo ki te āwhina i te WMA ki te wetemaukati i te waea atamai o te tangata pūtā nāna i patu e 26 ngā tāngata i tētahi whare karakia i Tekihi i tērā Rātapu.
text: E 20 ētahi atu i whara i a Devin Kelley i te Hāhi Kaiiriiri Tuatahi o Te Whare Karakia o Te Wānanga I kī te WHK kua tukuna tana ringa waea ki tōna taiwhanga hara matua, i Virginia, i te mea kāore i taea e ngā pirihimana o te rohe te wetemaukati. I kī a Āporo kua tono "ināianei tonu" ki te āwhina. I kī te kamupene e mahi tahi ana me ngā kaupapa whakahau ture i ia rā, ā, kua whakaakona e ia "mano" ngā āpiha mō te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te whakahaere i ana pūrere me pēhea te tono mōhiohio. Mēnā i tiakina e Kelley ana raraunga waea ki te ratonga iCloud a Apple, tērā pea kei roto i tēnei ngā mōhiohio mō ngā tau i waeahia, ngā karere i tukuna me ngā pikitia i whakamahia hei tango. Te matimati o te tangata mate "E whakamiramira ana i tētahi take kua rongo katoa koe i mua, te haere whakamua o te hangarau me ngā waea me ngā whakamunatanga," te kī a te māngai motuhake o TE WHK o Christopher Combs. "Ko te whakahau ture, ahakoa i te rohe, i te taumata o te rohe, i te taumata rānei o te hau, kāore e taea te uru ki ēnei waea." Heoi anō, tērā pea i hapa te wā o te WHK ki te tiki raraunga i runga i te waea a Kelley. I maukatia e Apple iPhones me tētahi tapukara, ka tono waehere hipa anake i muri i te korenga o te wetemaukati mō te wā 48 haora. Nō reira tērā pea ka wetemaukatia te waea e te matimati o te tangata mate i ngā haora i muri i tōna matenga, mēnā kāore i pau te pūhiko, i whakaweto, i whakaara anō rānei.

title: £655k 'Cooking Bus' to be sold off, Welsh ministers confirm
summary: Ka hokona tētahi "Pahi Tunu" hei whakaako i ngā tamariki i Uēra mō te kai - e kī ana ngā tohunga kāore e taea te kawe mai i ētahi painga hauora - ka hokona atu.
text: I whakaarahia ngā rangirua mō te kaupapa - e utu ana i te £655,000 hei whakahaere i te 2012-13 - i roto i tētahi pūrongo i whakaputaina i te rua tau ki mua. I whakamahia ngā kītini e whā o te taraka kua tahuri hei hoatu i ngā tauira o te kura tuatahi ki te whakarite kai, ngā pūkenga tunu kai me ngā akoranga hauora kai. I kī nga minita kua tae ki te mutunga o tōna oranga whakahaere e tūmanakohia ana. I kitea e tētahi pūrongo Hauora Tūmatanui o Uēra 2013 "he kore whakaaturanga tōtika" mō te aronui, i whakarewaina i te tau 2006. I te whakaūnga i te Minita Hauora a Mark Drakeford kua whakaae ki te hokonga o te pahi, ka kī tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga kua tūtohutia e te Hauora Tūmatanui o Uēra te "pūtea penapena tūpono" me te tohutohu kia whakaarohia ētahi atu kōwhiringa hei whakarite i te "toro tika, ngā putanga me te uara mō te moni". "Kei te whakarato ngā tīma kura hauora paetata i ngā pūkenga tunu kai me te whakangungu hauora kai mā ētahi atu huarahi", te tāpiri mai a te kaikōrero.

title: Bin Laden: Kei te whakahaere a Mātau ināianei i te atahanga o al-Mōrea
summary: E noho ana tētahi koroua, āhua ngoikore i runga i te papa, he mana mamao pouaka whakaata i tōna ringa.
text: Nā Natalia AntelavaBBC News, Washington Ka whiua e ia tōna pahau kiwikiwi me ngā toka mārire i a ia e mātakitaki ana i a ia i runga i te mata. Ko te tangata ko Osama Bin Laden, i hopukina i runga i tētahi rīpene e kī ana te kāwanatanga o Amerika i whakahokia mai e ngā Hiri o te Moana moana i a rātau i ta rātau mahi i Aparapara. Ka whakaahuatia e te Pentagon ngā hua o te poho, i reira i patua ai e ngā hōia o Amerika te tangata tino hiahiatia o te ao, hei "mōhiohio nui rawa atu i whiwhi mai i tētahi pūtake kotahi". Ko te Mārama, e mārama ana, he mana whakahaere katoa tā te Pentagon i runga i ngā mōhiohio, ā, kei te kōwhiri i tāna e hiahia ana kia tino āta tirohia e te iwi whānui. Kāore he ororongo, kāore he horopaki, ā, kāore he whakamāramatanga i homai mō te kōwhiringa o ngā topenga i whakataua e te Pentagon kia tukua, kāore hoki ētahi atu mōhiohio mēnā he whakaata anō, kāore rānei. Engari, mā te whakaatu i tētahi Bin Laden ngoikore, ngoikore hoki, e ngana ana te US ki te whakapoke i te whakaahua o te kaiārahi al-Mōrea i te aroaro o ana kaitautoko puta noa i te ao. Ko ngā topenga e rima i whakaputaina e Pentagon i te Hātarei e whakaatu ana he nui ake ōna rawa, ehara i te mea he pūtake mōhiohio hōu. E whakaatu ana rātau i tētahi Osama Bin Laden e noho ana ki tētahi papamuri tōkau, e kōrero hāngai ana ki te kāmera, he ora, he hākori tōna kanohi. Ko te tangata kotahi tonu i tuku kōrero ataata ki ōna hoariri me ōna kaitautoko, ahakoa i roto i te toru o ngā topenga ataata e whakamātauria ana e ia, kaua e tuku i ngā whaikōrero tūturu. Ko te tono me te mana kāore he whakakitenga nui o ngā topenga, engari e kī ana te kāwanatanga o Amerika ko ētahi atu raraunga i roto i o rātau ringa e whakaae ana, tae noa ki te rā i mate ai ia, ko Bin Laden te whakahaere i ngā mahi a Al-Mōrea, ā, ko tōna pūhui i Aparapara he pokapū mana-me te whakahau mō te rōpū whakahaere. E kī ana te Pentagon ko "te kohinga nui rawa o ngā rawa pūtohu" e whakaatu ana hoki i ngā mea e ngana ana ngā kaiwhakahaere pūtohu ki te whakatū i ngā tau maha - te tūranga i tākaro ai a Whakahāhā Bin Laden i roto i ngā mahi a ngā pānga ā-rohe o tana rōpū whakahaere, pēnei i te al-Mōrea i Te Takiwā o Arapi. He maha nga tau i whakaaro ai ko te rōpū whakahaere i mahi takitahi i te nuinga o te wā, ināianei e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o Pentagon he mahi nui a Bin Laden i roto i ana ngohe. Mēnā he pono, tērā pea he moto nui tōna matenga ki tētahi rōpū nāna i tuku te mea e kiia nei ko te "kaiwhakatūtū tarau" ki te pupuhi i tētahi waka rererangi i runga i Tūroro, ā, ko Washington e kite ana ko te tuma nui rawa ki tōna haumarutanga whenua. Kāore te Pentagon e whakamārama i ngā taipitopito me pēhea, mēnā ka pā ngā rawa i kohia ki Pakitāne ki te whawhai a Mātau ki a al-Mōrea ki tētahi atu wāhi. Ahakoa i whiwhi a Tēnā Tūpāpaku i tana tangata, he nui ake ngā mea e toe ana i runga i te rārangi e hiahiatia ana - tae atu ki a Anwar al-Awlaki, he kaitohutohu whānau i a Mātau i Īmene i whakaahuatia e te Pentagon he mōrearea ake i a Bin Laden. I te Rāitema, iti iho i te wiki i muri i te matenga o Bin Laden, ka whakarewaina e te US tētahi tuki taiapa ki tētahi wāhi mamao o Īmene i roto i tētahi ngana whakapae ki te whakamate i a Tēnā Awlaki. E whakaū ana ngā pūtake i Īmene i puta te whakaekenga, engari e kī ana e rua anake nga kaiwhakawhanake iti i patua. Kāore i te mārama mēnā i honoa te whakaekenga taiapa ki ngā mōhiohio i kitea i roto i te pūhui o Bin Laden, engari he tino whakamere te wā. Na te taraiwa taiapa o Amerika i whakatakariri i ngā rau mano o ngā kaiwhakatūtū i Īmene, e karanga ana ki te tukunga iho o te urunga o Washington i roto i tana whawhai ki te wehi - ko Perehitini Ali Arapia Saleh. E whakapae ana nga kaiwhakahaere i reira ki a Tēnā Saleh e whakaae ana ki te whakaeke hei whakawhiti mo te tautoko e tino hiahiatia ana e ia.

title: Hui SNP 2015: E kī ana a Sturgeon e kore pea e puta te toa pōti nui ki te taupānga
summary: Kua kī atu te kaiārahi SNP o Nicola Sturgeon ki te HAU, ahakoa he "toa patupatu" i te pōtitanga o Pirihitini o tērā tau, kāore e rawaka ki te pana i tētahi taupānga tuarua.
text: I mua rā ka whakatuwheratia e ia te hui a tana rōpū e karanga ana ki te hunga e whawhai ana ki te rangatiratanga ki te pōti i te SNP. I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE HAU, a Laura Kuenssberg, ka kī a Ms Sturgeon ka whakatauria e ia mēnā kua hurihia e ngā kaipōti "Kāo" o rātau hinengaro. Ka kōrero anō a Ms Sturgeon ki tana hui i te Hātarei. I roto i tana uiuinga o TE WĀ, ka kī te minita tuatahi o Pākehā: "Ko tēnā [toa i te pōti o tērā tau] i roto i a ia anō, kāore au i te whakaaro ka kore e taea tētahi atu taupānga nā te mea he tokomaha ngā tāngata e tūmanako ana ahau - ā, kāore au i te tango i tētahi mea noa iho - engari e tūmanako ana ahau ki te pōti i te SNP kāore anō kia tautoko i te rangatiratanga, kāore pea e tautoko i te rangatiratanga, ā, e kore pea e tautoko i te rangatiratanga." Kaore a Ms Sturgeon e tātuhia mēnā ka tū he taupānga tuarua i a ia e whakahaere ana. Ko te tātaritanga a Laura Kuenssberg, te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE AO i te wā e whārahi ana te SNP i ōna tauwhāinga, kāore te wā heke mai o Pākehā i te UK i te noho mamao. Koia tērā e kore ai e taea e ia te mawhiti i te taurangi mō tētahi rā tūpono mō tētahi atu pōti e wehe ai i a Pākehā i ērā atu o te UK. Koia hoki i kōrero ai ia ki te AO i tēnei rā mō te wā tuatahi, e kore ngā hua o te pōti o Pirihitini a tērā tau e noho hei keu mō tētahi atu taupānga. Nō reira ki te kore e angitu te pōti tōtika, he aha? Kua rite tonu tana kōrero mēnā ka pōti te toenga o te UK ki te wehe i te EU tērā pea he keu mō tētahi atu pōti. Engari kāore a ia me te toenga o te kaiārahi e hiahia ana ki te tautuhi i ētahi atu whakamātautau pūmau, e pā ana ki tētahi neke "ōrite, mārama hoki" i roto i te whakaaro tūmatanui. Hei poto - ka haere anake rātau ina whakaaro rātau ka taea e rātau te toa. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i te Tātaritanga a Te Tātaritanga a Kōrero Taylor, te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o Aotearoa i te wā i tukuna e Ms Sturgeon tana whakatūpato hui i roto i te hōro, e mārama ana kei te utu tonu te hiahia ki te pakipaki. I urupare mārire rātau ki te huatau he atekōkiri matua tērā e āhei ana ki te whakarewa i te tautoko mō te rangatiratanga: ko te whakawhāititanga anō o UK, te whakakapinga o Trident, i runga ake i ngā putanga katoa o Ingarangi i te EU me te kore whakaaetanga a Pirihitini. I korerotia tērā pea me hiki tētahi taupānga, he tino mātao ake te urupare. Ehara i te mea pouri, engari he tino nui. Ehara i te momo mea e tino hiahia ana rātau ki te rongo, he ōrite ngā mea katoa. E kite ana ahau i tētahi whawhai nui ki te raina Sturgeon? Kāore au e. Āe, tērā ētahi āwangawanga, ko te nuinga o te wā i whānau mai i te pōrearea ehara ngā mea i tua atu i a rātou. Engari ko te nuinga o ngā mema e mārama ana ki te rautaki hāngai. He aha atu anō, e manaaki ana, e aroha ana rātau ki to rātau kaiārahi. Mo te nuinga o te wā, ka ārahi rātau i a ia. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i a Kōrero A, i te wā o taua pōti, ka kī a ia: "Ka heke iho mēnā ka whakawā tātau, e whakawā ana ahau, kua hurihia e ngā tāngata i pōti 'Kāo' i tērā tau o rātau hinengaro." I whakapono a Ms Sturgeon ko te SNP tonu te rōpū tino pai hei whakahaere i Pākehā. I roto i tana whaikōrero tūwhera ki te rōpū pono, ka kī te MSP mēnā ka toa tana rōpū i tētahi wā tuatoru ka hangaia e ia e 50,000 ngā kāinga utu ōrau, e wātea ana ki te £3bn. Ko te hui i Aberdeen te mea nui rawa atu i puritia e te SNP. Kua angitu te angitu o te SNP mai i te taupānga o tērā tau, i toa i te katoa engari e toru o ngā tūru e 59 o Pākehā i te pōti nui i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. He iti iho i te whitu marama kia kōwhiria rā anō e ngā kaipōti ngā māngai ki te Pāremata o Pirihitini, ka tohe a ia ko te SNP "he rōpū anō me tētahi atu mahi". Ka kī atu a ia ki ngā kaitautapa: "E mārama ana, he nui te hiahia ki ngā kōrero a tā mātou whakahau mō te rangatiratanga. " Engari me whakamārama e au tēnei: Ko te mea nui ki a au me ngā tāngata puta noa i te whenua ko tāna e kī ana mō ngā mahi me te āhua o te mahi, te haumarutanga o o tātau hapori, o tātau hōhipera me ngā pūtahi hauora, o tātau kura, kura me ngā whare wānanga me a tātau kaupapa ki te whakamahi i ngā mana hou hei rutu i te rawakore me te ōritetanga. "I runga i ēnei take katoa me te maha atu, ka whakatakotoria e tā mātou whakahau ngā kaupapa here taketake, hāngai, mārō hoki kia kaha ake ai tēnei whenua." E 3,500 ngā kaitautapa kua rēhita ki te haere ki te hui, tae atu ki te tata ki te 1,000 ngā kaitirotiro, ngā kaiwhakaatu me ngā kaipūrongo. Ināianei e whā ngā wā e nui ake ana te rōpū i te 18 o Mahuru i tērā tau, i te wā i tū ai te taupānga rangatiratanga. Nā ngā panekōrero whakaaro i huatau ai e pupuri ana i ngā kaiārahi nui i runga i a Labour, ngā Tohutohu me ngā Pāremata Liberali i mua i te pōti i mua i te pōtitanga o tērā tau. I kī atu a Ms Sturgeon ki te hui: "I te pōti nui i te tau 2010, iti iho i te hawhe miriona tāngata i pōti i te SNP. I te pōtitanga o Pirihitini i te tau i muri iho, ka tipu to mātau tautoko ki te neke atu i te 900,000 ngā pōti. "A, i te pōtitanga nui i tēnei tau, tata ki te 1.5 miriona ngā tāngata i kōwhiri i to mātau rōpū. " E tata ana ki te kotahi miriona anō ngā tāngata - i roto i te rima tau noa iho, puta noa i ngā wāhi katoa o tō mātou whenua - i whakapati kia whakawhirinaki ki te SNP hei ārahi i a Pākehā ki mua." Ko te SNP "te ātete kaha, kotahi, mārō hoki" ki ngā Tohutohu i Aotearoa e karanga ana ngā tāngata puta noa i te UK "e karanga ana", tana kī. He pēhea te āhua o te hui? Nā te pūrongo tōrangapū o Piripi Sim ahakoa kāore anō kia tae mai ngā kaitautapa e 3,500 i te wā i haere ai a Nicola Sturgeon ki te atamira ki te whakatuwhera tika i te hui SNP 2015, ka pōhiritia a ia. Ko te nuinga o ngā kōrero tōmua i runga i te atamira, i waenganui hoki i ngā kaitautapa, e pā ana ki te tauine o tēnei takahanga, te huihuinga nui rawa o te SNP. Tērā tētahi mehua o te whakapehapeha i whāranu ki te whakaongaonga e kitea ana i roto i te hōro hui, me te whakakaha i te nui tonu o ngā mema o te rōpū me te whakaaturanga hauora i roto i te panekōrero mo te pōtitanga o Holyrood a tērā tau. I hiahia a Ms Sturgeon ki te āwhina he nui ake tana rōpū i te rangatiratanga noa iho, ahakoa te whakatū ki ngā kaipōti "Kāo" i te wā o tana whaikōrero tūwhera. A, i te whakapuakitanga o te umere nui rawa i tana tārarotanga i tōna whakapono ki te rangatiratanga, te āhua nei kua whakawhiwhia hoki e tēnei rōpū kaitautoko rerekē te pūhara kaupapahere whānui ake. Tērā anake te rūma tū i ngā takahanga paetata e kōrerorero ana i ngā mea katoa mai i te rongoā ki te utu ā-whakahaere, i te huihuinga e huihui ana i ngā wāhi whakaaturanga e whakatairanga ana i ngā take mai i Pirihitia ki te rangahau mate pukupuku. I tēnei wā, he tino āta whakaritea te hui ki te tāraro i te nui o te SNP - me te whānui o ōna painga me ōna whakaawetanga.

title: I horoia e ngā angaanga Rōmana te awa ngaro o Rātana
summary: Kua huraina e ngā kaimātai whenua e mahi ana me te kaupapa Crossrail o Rāwāhi e 20 ngā angaanga e whakapono ana nō te wā o Roma.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Melissa HogenboomScience, Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero Tērā pea i horoia ngā wheua i tētahi wāhi tanumanga pātata i te taha o tētahi o ngā awa "ngaro" o Rāwāhi - te Walbrook. I tērā tau kua kitea hoki e ngā kaimātai whenua i Rānana e 10,000 ngā tuemi Rōmana i tētahi pae pātata. Ka taea e ēnei kitenga hou te hoatu i ngā kitenga hou ki te oranga o te iwi Roma. I kitea hoki ngā taonga uku tata tonu, tērā pea i haere i te ara ōrite ki ngā angaanga. Kāore i ngāwari noa iho te horoi i ētahi atu kongakonga wheua i te awa. I te rau tau 15, ka wehea e te awa o Walbrook ngā wāhi ki te uru me te rāwhiti o te taone, ko ōna pakitara paru haukū e whakarato ana i ngā āhuatanga tino pai hei tiaki i ngā taonga taonga. I kitea ngā kitenga tata ki te 3m i raro iho i te whenua, i raro hoki i te urupa o Bedlam, he tanumanga i reira e hia rau ngā anga i houhia ai. Ahakoa kāore anō kia rāhuitia, i kī a Nicholas Elsden mai i te Museum of London Archaeology tērā pea nō te rau tau 3 ki te 4 AD, i tērā wā i tanumia ai e ngā Rōmana o rātau iwi, ehara i te tahu i a rātou. "He tino rerekē te kite i te nui o ngā mea e whakawhāiti ana [i te wāhi kotahi] ina kāore koe i roto i te urupa. E 100 mita mātau i waho o ngā taiepa o te taone o Roma." E hiahiatia ana e te ture o Roma te tanumanga i waho o te taone, i whakamāramatia e Tēnā Elsden, ko te tikanga he wāhi tanumanga e porowhita ana i te taone. "Ko tā mātou e titiro nei i konei he pēhea te tirohanga a ngā Rōmana ki o rātau tūpāpaku. Kaore koe e whakaaro e whakaaetia ana ngā tanumanga o nāianei kia horoia ki roto i te awa," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero. I kī a Don Walker, he kaimātai wheua hoki mai i te Whare Taonga o Te Whenua o Rāwāhi, tērā pea i tanumia nga angaanga ki ngā taiao rerekē, e whakaaturia ana e ō rātou uriuri parauri me te kiwikiwi. "E whakaatu ana ngā mātauranga ā-ture ina ngaro te tinana i te taha o te awa, ka haere tawhiti rawa te angaanga, nā te mea e mānu ana, ka taea rānei te huri i te pūtake o te awa. " Tērā pea i tanumia rātau ki tētahi wāhi kāore i nui te whenua e wātea ana. I tēnei wā te āhua nei kua kohikohi tahi rātou mā ngā tukanga māori." Mai i ngā kitenga tuatahi, ka kī a Tēnā Walker kāore he whakaaturanga o tētahi "tākaro hara", engari ka puta noa iho ngā taipitopito mō tō rātou ira tangata me tō rātou pakeke mā ētahi atu tūhuratanga. I tāpiritia e ia ka kitea e ngā tautohu matū i runga i ngā niho te wāhi i haere mai ai ēnei tāngata me ngā momo kai i kainga e rātau. E whakapono ana ngā kaimātai whenua mā te Kaupapa Crossrail e ārahi atu ki ētahi atu kitenga e huna ana i raro i ngā tiriti o Rāwāhi, ā, e kī ana ka taea te panoni i tō tātau mōhiotanga ki a Rānōna. Ko ētahi atu kitenga o nā tata nei ko ētahi tinana e whakapono ana mai i te wā o te Mate Pango me te rākau i whakaarotia he whakaaturanga o tētahi ara waka o te Tau Parahi e 3,500 tau te pakeke puta noa i Rāwāhi. I tēnei wā, neke atu i te 40 ngā wāhi mahi e whakahaeretia ana e Crossrail me ngā tūhuratanga whaiwhenua i ia pae i mua i ngā mahi hanganga matua hei hanga i ngā teihana matua. Ka tūhono te kaupapa i ngā teihana e 37 mai i te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow me Maidenhead i te uru, mā te waenganui o Rānana, ki Abbey Wood me Shenfield i te rāwhiti, ā, ka oti i te tau 2018.

title: E whakatūtū ana ngā kaumoana o te Orimipia i Weymouth me Portland
summary: Members of the Team GB Olympic sailing team were given a heroes welcome as they took part in an open-top bus parade through Weymouth and Portland.
text: I toa te tīma i tētahi mētara koura me ngā mētara hiriwa e whā i roto i ngā takahanga rere i tū i te National Sailing Academy o Portland. I tīmata te whakatūtū i Osprey Quay i te 14:30 BST, ā, ka mutu i te taha moana o Weymouth i te 18:20. I kī a Lindsay Bell, o te Royal Yachting Association, he mihi ki ngā tangata whenua mo ta rātau "tautoko whakamīharo". "He tino pai te kite i te huihuinga e huri ana ki te whakatūpato i ngā kaitākaro me tā rātou tautoko i tino pana ai i ngā hēramana kia eke ki te tino pai, ā, kāore i taea e rātou te mahi ki te kore rātou," tana tāpiri mai. Ko nga kaitākaro, tae atu ki te toa koura e whā nga wā, ko Ben Ainslie, i runga i te pahi i arahina e te rōpū waka pirihimana. Ka whakaaturia e Tēnā Ainslie tana mētara ki te huihuinga, ka mea: "Koinei te mētara nui rawa, taumaha hoki kua kitea e mātau i roto i ngā tau. Kua noho i roto i taku pēke mō tērā wiki, neke atu rānei, ā, i te mutunga ka tiakina e taku whaea me taku pāpā." I kī a Luke Patience, i toa hiriwa ki a Kiriuati Bithell i te 470: "He whakamīharo te iwi whānui, he mea kāore e tino mōhio ana mātou nā te mea kei runga mātou i te wai." E hia mano ngā tāngata i whakarārangi i te ara mā Fortuneswell, Portland Heights, Hope Square, Weymouth mā Victoria Square me Wyke Regis, i mua i te whakatūtū i te taha moana. He wāhanga te takahanga o ngā hākari kāniwha ā-tau a Weymouth. Nā ngā āhuatanga huarere kino i mua o te rā, i whakakorea tētahi whakaaturanga i whakaritea e te tīma hekerangi o ngā Rewera Whero. I karangatia hoki tētahi rerenga whakamaharatanga o te Pakanga o Ingarangi e pā ana ki te Huripari me te Spitfire, engari i puta mai te pomu o Te Rangitahi i te ahiahi. I kī te manukura o te Kāniwha o Roger Hogbin i ētahi mahi i tāpuia hei mahi i te takahanga, engari kua whakaritea anōtia ngā kaiwhakatū e toe ana ki te whakarato i tētahi hōtaka whakangahau katoa.

title: I hereheretia te tangata maripi o Liverpool mo te whakaekenga pāhihi o te tereina 'whakamataku'
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi tangata maripi nāna i mahi tētahi whakaekenga "tāwiri, whakamataku" ki tētahi pāhihi rēra ā-ari.
text: I whakaae a Hemi Donnelly, e 23, i ngana ki te tāhae, ā, he tuhipānui mata i runga i tētahi tereina i Liverpool i te 27 o Hakihe. I kī nga Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi, i kōwhao a Donnelly, o Garston, i tana tūkinotanga e 56 tau, a, ka whakawehi ki te "okaina i a ia" ki tētahi maripi e waru inihi (20cm). I whiua a Donnelly i te Kōti Karauna o Liverpool kia rima tau i roto i te whare herehere. I kōwhao a Donnelly, o Stormont Road, i tana tūkino ki te kanohi, a, ka tono kia tukua e ia tana wati i roto i tētahi "whakaekenga tāwiri, kāore i te whakapataritari ki tētahi tangata e whakaaro noa ana ki tana ake umanga", te kī a Det Sgt Ian Henderson. I kī a ia i te whakakāhoretanga a te tūkino, ka whakaputaina e Donnelly te naihi, a, ka puritia ki tōna puku. I kī a Det Sgt Henderson i ātete te tūkino i mua i te whakahokinga a Donnelly i te naihi ki tōna hope, a, ka hoki ki tōna tūru. 'Mahi whakamataku' I mahue i a ia te tereina i Liverpool Central, a, ka whiua te rākau, engari i hopukina. "Kua tino mamae te tūkino, ā-hinengaro, ā-tinana hoki, mai i tēnei mahi whakamataku," te kī a te āpiha. "Ko ngā whara i takea mai i te kōwhao ka hiahiatia he maha ngā toronga ki tana niho. " Kua ngaro tōna maia, ā, ka pāngia e ia te māharahara, ngā moepuku me ngā mōhiotanga." I tāpiritia e ia kua pā hoki ki te oranga o te tūkinotanga, i te mea he mahi a ia anō, ā, me whakamutu i te mahi. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk Related Internet Links HM Courts Service

title: Rare pine martens to be relocated to mid Wales
summary: Me whakanuku atu ngā mātāmua paina mai i ngā wāhi o Ngā Whenua Teitei o Pākehā ki Powys me Ceredigion hei whakaora i a rātou i te ngaro i Weera.
text: Kei te tīpako te Vincent Wildlife Trust i ngā wāhi tuku tika i waenganui o Weera. Ko te kaupapa whakaora paina marten £1.2m e whakarite ana ki te neke i te 20 tuatahi ki Wales i te ngahuru. I te tau 2016 ka taea te whakauru atu i tētahi atu 20. He āhua kore rawa te whāngote i Weera, kāore e taea e ngā kaitiakitanga te hoatu whakatau tata i te iwi whānui. Ko te ngaronga o te wāhi noho, te whaiwhai huruhuru me te whakamatenga a nga kaitiaki kēmu i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 1900 kua whakapaetia mo to rātau hekenga. I kī te āpiha atawhai a Lizzy Croose: "I Pākehā he tino tūruhi te paina martens. " Ko to rātau whakaurunga anō ki Wales tērā pea he wāhi nui mō te tāpoi kararehe e ōrite ana ki te angitu o te manu whero." Kei te kimi te Vincent Wildlife Trust i ngā pae ruarua noa iho ngā huarahi, kāore he tākaro arumoni, ā, he iti noa iho te iwi whānui pokiha - ko ngā pokiha me ngā ekara koura anake ngā kaiwhaiwhai UK e mōhiotia ana. E hiahiatia ana e te paina he wāhi noho ngahere i a rātau e kōhanga ana i roto i ngā rākau me te ana i roto i ngā rua rākau. E hiahiatia ana hoki e rātau te nui o ngā whāngote iti me ngā hua rākau hei kai. Ka whānau ngā whāngote whāngote i a Hōngongoi me Aotearoa, ā, ka whānau i Poutāpeta, i Aperira rānei. Ko a rātau tamariki, e kiia nei ko ngā kete, ka noho ki te whaea kia noho motuhake rā anō rātau i Aotearoa. Ka taea e rātou te noho i waenganui i te kotahi me te rima kete i roto i te punipuni. Kaore he mahi a te tāne ki te whakatipu i te tamariki, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā e hoa ana ki ngā uwha maha.

title: BBC Sound of 2017: Rag 'N' Bone Man interview
summary: Kua whakaingoatia te bluesman hip-hop Rag 'N' Bone Man hei kaiomaoma i roto i te Oro o te 2017, e whai ana ki te matapae i ngā mahi hou nui rawa o te tau.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC Music reporter i whānau mai a Rory Graham i Uckfield, tata ki Brighton, ka tīmata te tau 31 tau i tana mahi puoro hei MC ngahere i mua i te whakahauhau a ōna mātua i a ia ki te waiata. I te tau 2012, i tana tautoko i a Joan Armatrading, i muri i tana tukunga atu ki ngā kaiwhakahaere ana hopukanga tōmua - tae atu ki ngā ataata o ia e waiata ana i runga i te wharepaku. "Kāore au i mōhio ki tētahi mea mōna," tana kī atu ki tana nūpepa paetata The Argus. "I mahia e au ētahi o aku hopukanga tōmua i a au e noho ana i runga i te whare haumaru... Te āhua nei he pai ki a rātau ahakoa." Na roto i te mahi auau, i hangaia e ia he pūkenga pono tae noa ki te Bitter End, mai i tana 2015 Disfigured EP, i whiwhi tautoko mai i a Huw Stephens i te Reo Irirangi 1 me Jo Whiley i te Reo Irirangi 2. Na te reo hākinakina kāore i rite ki a Joe Cocker, kātahi anō ka riro i a ia tētahi taunga nui ki te Tangata kotahi i whakaaetia e te rongopai, nāna i tīmata ngā tūtohi Tiamana mō ngā wiki e 13 kua taha, ā, i werohia a Clean Bandit mō te tau tuatahi o te Kirihimete o UK. I kōrero a ia ki te BBC mō tōna reo irirangi pirate i mua, ka noho "nui i Tiamana" me ana waiata Disney makau. Oro o te 2017: Ko te Rima o Runga 5.Natia Rose 4.Jorja Smith 3. Raye 2. Rag 'N' Bone Man 1. Ray BLK Ngā mihi mō te hanga i te Sound of 2017's top five! He pēhea tōna whakaaro? He mea tino mīharo te noho hei wāhanga o. Te āhua nei kua mahia e au ngā mahi uaua katoa mō tētahi take. I hea koe i whiwhi ai i te ingoa o Rag 'N' Bone Man? I te ata Hātarei, ka haere ahau ki te whare o taku tipuna i te ata Hātarei, ā, ka noho māua ki te kai i a mātau pāreti me te mātakitaki i ngā whakahaere anō o Steptoe and Son i BBC Two. I whakaaro ahau he ngahau - ā, he rite tonu te tangi a Rag 'N' Bone Man ki a au. I whakamaharatia ahau ki ngā tāngata pēnei i a Sonny Boy Williamson me Big Mama Thornton. Whakaarohia te rerekētanga mēnā i mātakitaki koe i ngā tāruatanga o Fawlty Towers. Āe, tērā pea ka karangatia ahau ko Basil! I tohutohu tētahi i a koe kia hoki ki te noho hei Rory? I pātaitia ahau mehemea e hiahia ana ahau ki te huri i ngā wā e rua, engari he pai ki a au. Ahakoa whakaaro koe he heahea, kāore rānei, he mahara. Neke atu i te toru marama te tau tuatahi o te tangata i Tiamana. He rerekē te nui i Uropi i te tuatahi? He tino heahea. Kore rawa ahau i tūmanako. Kua mahi ahau hei kaiwhakatangitangi mō ngā tau e rima, ono rānei, engari i kite ahau i a au he kaiwaiata i raro i te whenua, ā, i hari ahau ki te mahi i tēnā. Engari, e mōhio ana koe, i te tīmatanga o te nui ake ka whakaaro ahau, "He aha i kore ai? He aha e kore ai e horahia ki te hunga whānui ake?" I te UK, i tāuru anake te waiata ki te tūtohi i muri i te mahinga a Emily Middlemas i runga i te X Factor. I pēhea tōu whakaaro mo tēnā? Kāore aku kōwhiringa i roto i taua take! Ehara te X Factor i taku mea. Kaore au e mātakitaki i aua whakaaturanga. Engari i whakaaturia mai e tētahi ki a au tana waiata i te waiata i runga i ta rātau waea, ā, ko te tikanga, i whāia e ia. He roa tō wā ki te mahi hip-hop i a koe e taitamariki ana. He MC pai koe? Ki taku whakaaro ko au - engari i ngā wā katoa i whakaaro ahau he pai ake te katoa i a au, e mōhio ana koe? I taku tīmatanga ki te waiata, ka mahue i a au. He aha koe i akiaki ai ki te tīmata ki te waiata? I haere māua ko taku pāpā ki ēnei wātū tāmi me ngā pō hopuoro tuwhera, engari i mataku tonu ahau ki te waiata i runga i te atamira. He rerekē ki te rapa - he nui ake te pēhanga. Engari kotahi tonu te wā i mahia ai e au, ā, ka haere mai te tangata ki te kī, "E hoa, kei te mōhio koe he aha te āhua o tō reo?" kia pēnei ahau, "Āe, tērā pea me mahi auau i tēnei!" I hea taua mahi? Ko taku huritau 21 tērā i tētahi pātaka i East Grinstead. Ka kī taku pāpā, "Me whakatika koe ki te waiata" ā, nā te mea ko tōku rā whānau, ā, he ruarua aku inu ka haere ahau, "Āe, ka mahia e au!" He aha tāu i waiata ai? Ko ngā tāngata i runga i te atamira he taurua, mēnā kāore i te takitoru, tōku pakeke, ā, e whakatangi ana rātau i ngā rangi me ngā paerewa blues tawhito. I mōhio ahau ki ngā kupu katoa nā te mea i whakatangihia e tōku pāpā i runga i te kita kiriata i a au e tamariki ana. Ko te waiata tuatahi i tukuatu koe ki YouTube he waiata tawhito o Amerika, ko Reuben's Train. I mīharo ahau ki te kite i a koe e purei kita ana i runga, nā te mea kua kore koe... Kāore au i te nui, kāo, engari kātahi anō ahau ka whakatau kia tīmata anō ki te mahi. He aha te pakeke i tīmata ai koe ki te ako? I mōhio tonu ahau nā te mea i tākaro taku pāpā, engari kāore au i tino hiahiatia. E mōhio ana koe he aha te āhua o te whakamātau a tō pāpā ki te whakauru i a koe ki tētahi mea! Engari i taku tīmatanga ki te waiata, ā, i hiahia ahau ki te ngana ki te tuhi waiata, ka mōhio ahau me ako anō ahau i a au anō. Nā reira kāore ō whakangungu ōkawa? I hiahia tonu taku whaea ki te tuku i ahau ki tētahi kura puoro, engari kāore i a mātau te moni. Nā reira, ahakoa ināianei, ehara ahau i te kaiwaiata pai ā-hangarau. Mēnā ka tono mai koe ki a au kia waiata i tētahi hākori, kāore au e mōhio me pēhea. He aha atu anō tāu i a koe e tamariki ana? He nui taku tākaro poitūkohu - engari he iti noa iho taku wehi i a au e tamariki ana. He nui ngā raruraru i puta mai i taku whaea. He nui tonu te pire tawhito e karapoti ana i taku whare. I tipu ake ahau i tētahi taone iti ko Uckfield, ā, kāore he nui hei mahi - nā reira he nui ta mātau whawhai. Kore rawa ahau i tino raruraru, engari i whakamahia e mātau te bobby o te rohe e karapoti ana i te whare e kī ana, "Kua tae anō a Rory ki tēnei." Kātahi koe ka uru ki te pūoro ngahere? Āe, i te 16, i te 17 rānei o aku tau. I whakamahia e mātau te mahi i ngā teihana reo irirangi pirate iti me te whakaputa i ngā whāranu ngahere. He aha te āhua o aua whakaaturanga reo irirangi pirate? Ā, e rua ā mātou rīpene, e kore rawa e whakaaetia kia whakaaturia ki tētahi tangata! He tino kino rātau. I whakarongo anō ahau ki tētahi i tērā rā, ā, he wehi. Kei te maukati mārō ahau i a rātou. He aha te mea tino whakamā? Ko tōku reo. Kātahi anō ka pakaru, nā reira he rite tonu taku tangi ki a Scooby Doo. Kua hanga pūoro koe hei Rag 'N' Bone Man mō te rima, e ono tau rānei, ināianei. I mahi koe ki te tautoko i a koe anō i te tīmatanga? Āe, he kaitiaki ahau, e tiaki ana i ngā tāngata whai Asperger syndrome me Down's syndrome. He rite tonu te mahi a taku tuahine. He mahi tino whai hua, engari he tino whakaheke. He whakapau ā-hinengaro, āe. Engari i te nuinga o te wā he tino ngahau, kia pono. I tiaki ahau i tētahi tuakana me tētahi tuahine i te mate o Down, ā, i haere mātou i roto i te motokā, ka whakapiri i ngā waiata Disney me te waiata. Tata ki te whā tau tōku oranga. He aha tā rātou waiata Disney tino pai? I whakamahia e au ngā ariā o ngā kiripuaki o te Pukapuka Ngahere ki ngā tamariki; ā, i aroha hoki mātau ki ngā Aristocats. Koia tērā tētahi o ā mātou makau - Everybody Wants To Be A Cat. I roto i taua wā, i hoatu e koe tō Wolves EP mō te koreutu. He aha? I tohua e Wolves tētahi wāhi e hiahia ana ahau ki te tuhi waiata tika, ā, i hiahia ahau kia rongo te hunga whānui ake. Nā reira i whakaaro ahau, "He aha mātou e kore ai e hoatu noa? Me pēhea tēnā e kino ai?" E aroha ana te tangata ki ngā mea koreutu. A, i mahi. Mēnā ka tino whakawhānuitia te hunga whakarongo. He waiata i tino urupare ai te tangata? Tērā tētahi e kiia nei ko Life In Her Yet. I tuhia e au i muri i taku kōrero ki taku tipuna mō te noho anō i a ia anake, i muri i te ngaronga o tana wahine. Kāore e taea e au te whakaaro i te noho tahi me tētahi tangata mō te 50 tau, kātahi ka noho ko koe anake. Ko te waiata tuatahi tērā i whakaaro ai ahau ka taea e au te tuhi mō ngā mea pērā. No hea mai te Tangata? I pātai mai tētahi hoa ki a au i tētahi pātai kāore au i tino mōhio ki te whakautu, ā, i pēnei ahau, "He aha koe i pātai mai ai ki a au?" Koia tērā i akiaki ai i te raina, "Ehara ahau i te poropiti, i te mesia rānei". Pēnei, haere ki te pātai ki tētahi atu. Kāore i a au ngā whakautu māu! He rekareka, nā te mea i kōrero ahau ki ētahi atu tāngata, ā, e whakaaro ana rātau e pā ana ki te tangata. Tērā pea... Engari koia tērā te pai o te pūoro - ka taea e te tangata te whakamārama i te waiata mō rātou anō. I kite ahau i a koe e tākaro ana i Brixton inā noa nei, ā, ka kī atu koe ki te hunga whakarongo: "He uaua ki te tuhi waiata pouri ina tino hari ahau." He pēhea te nui o te raruraru? Tērā tētahi wā i rongo ai ahau i te nui o te pōrearea, ā, kāore au i hari i roto i taku pātahitanga - ā, nā tērā i tino tuhituhi ai ahau.
