Engari kei te ako tonu ahau hei kaitito waiata, nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau kei roto ahau ki te tuhi waiata hari ake. Ahakoa he pai, kāore rānei, kāore au i te mōhio. Kātahi anō koe ka tweeted kua ara koe i te 3am e tuhi ana i ngā kupu rap mō EastEnders, nā reira ka noho tonu ko te pūtake o te pukaemi tau tuarua. Haha! Āe, kei a au tonu tēnā taha tino tamariki ki a au. E rua aku riu i runga i te pukaemi hou e rap ana ahau. E hiahia ana ahau kia rongo hoki ngā tāngata i tērā taha o taku pūoro. Ka tukua te pukaemi tuatahi a Rag 'N' Bone Man, Human, i te 10 o Hui tanguru e Te Pūoro o Te Pūoro. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whāiti te tāpaetanga o te hokohoko a AMERIKA ki te $34.2bn i June
summary: I hinga te tāpaetanga o te hokohoko a AMERIKA i te 22.4% ki te $34.2bn (£22.3bn) i June, te āputa iti rawa mai i Whiringahora 2009.
text: Ko te ōrautanga o te whakahekenga te nui rawa mai i Hui tanguru 2009. Ko te toharite e toru marama o te tāupenga hokohoko, e haeana ana i te whakawhāititanga ā-marama, i hinga hoki ki te $39.5bn i roto i ngā marama e toru ki Pipiri mai i te $40.5bn i te wā tōmua. I tēnei wā, i whakahōutia te mōkito hokohoko o Me ki te $44.1bn mai i te $45.0bn i pūrongotia i mua. Ka taea e te iti iho o Pipiri te ārahi i te kāwanatanga ki te whakahōu i te tupu o te ohaoha mō te hauwhā o Aperira-ki-Pipiri mai i tōna mokatere ā-tau tuatahi o te 1.7%. "E ōrite ana ngā mea katoa, ko te tikanga o tēnei he arotakenga whakarunga kupenga mō te 0.8 ōrau piro, ā, ka tupu te hauwhā tuarua ki te 2.5%," te kī a te kaitohutohu o Wells Fargo, o Tim Quinlan. I Hune, i hinga ngā kawemai o ngā taonga me ngā ratonga i te 2.5% ki te $225.4bn, ko te nuinga o te hekenga o ngā kawemai penehīni me ngā rawa mahi me ngā rawa. I piki ake ngā kaweake o ngā taonga me ngā ratonga i te 2.2% ki tētahi pūkete $191.2bn. O ērā, i piki ake ngā kawenga ake ki te Uniana o Ūropi e 27 iwi i te 1.5% i te wā i piki ake ngā kawenga ake ki Haina i te 4.5% i Pipiri. I hinga ngā kawemai mai i Haina i te 2.2%, ka heke iho te tāpaetanga hokohoko ki Haina ki te $26.6bn mai i te $27.9bn i Me.

title: Covid: Care homes 'could close' without money guarantee
summary: Ka taea te kati i ngā kāinga tiaki ki te kore te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e whakaroa i te pūtea "nui" mō rātou, e ai ki te tinana e tohu ana i te wāhanga.
text: Nā Cemlyn DaviesBBC Wales te korero tōrangapū o Care Forum Wales i kī anake kua taurangitia ngā "moni uaua" tīariari tae noa ki te mutunga o Poutāpeta. The older people's commissioner for Wales added it was important to "provide the support that's needed". I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he £88m anō kua tukua ki tēnei wā, ā, kei te whakaoti i te tahua o tērā tau. Ko ngā moni uauatanga he "tino nui ki te pupuri i ngā kāinga tiaki kia tuwhera", i kī atu te rangatira nui o Care Forum Wales a Mary Wimbury ki te hōtaka Tōrangapū o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa. "Unlike a lot of other businesses, care homes have to carry on during this pandemic and their costs have gone up - it's things like the increased staffing, infection control measures and also we've seen more empty beds during the crisis so income's gone down," she said. "We've only got a guarantee that's going to be there until the end of March this year and it's absolutely vital if we're to keep the sector sustainable in any way that it continues beyond that because we're not going to have seen the end of the pandemic by the end of March." I pātai mai he aha ka tūpono mēnā ka mutu te pūtea, ka kī a Ms Wimbury: "Kāore au e kite me pēhea e kore ai mātou e kite i ngā kāinga tiaki e kati ana, tino pouri. " E mārama ana tērā ka tino pā ki tēnā - ehara i te mea anake ki ngā whakarato ā muri ake, engari ki aua tāngata e noho ana i aua kāinga i roto i taua āhuatanga. "Kei te kōrero koe mō ngā pakeke mōrearea. Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahia ana koe kia neke rātou ahakoa he aha, engari i te wā o te mate urutā." The older people's commissioner for Wales Heléna Herklots welcomed all the support provided by ministers, but warned "we're not through this pandemic yet". "It's going to be important that Welsh Government continues to provide the support that's needed over the coming weeks and months as we go through the next phase of the pandemic," she added. E whakaatu ana ngā whika o te Office for National Statistics e 1,396 ngā mate kāinga tiaki e pā ana ki Covid i Wales tae atu ki te 22 o Hānuere - 22% o te katoa o ngā mate e hono ana ki te huaketo. The week up to 22 January also saw the highest weekly tally of care home deaths since the start of the pandemic. Heoi anō, kei te hinga te maha o ngā kēhi tōrunga i kitea i roto i ngā kāinga tiaki - ki raro rawa mai i Oketopa. Kua pōhiritia hoki e te wāhanga ngā mahere hei mahi i ētahi atu whakamātautau i roto i ngā kāinga tiaki pakeke. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka kī ngā minita kua tukuna he jab ki ngā kainoho me ngā kaimahi i ia kāinga tiaki pakeke "ka taea te tae atu". The latest statistics show 78.2% of care home residents in Wales have had their first dose of a Covid-19 vaccine. I kī a Ms Herklots e "hiahia ana ia ki te kite i te kauneketanga tere ake" ki te werohanga i ngā tangata e toe ana. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh: "E mōhio ana mātou he pēhanga pūtea tāpiri - e tautokona ana ēnei i tēnei wā mā tā mātou pūtea uauatanga. " Neke atu i te £88m kua tohaina ki tēnei wā, me ngā whakaritenga tīariari e toro atu ana ki te mutunga o te tau ā-pūtea. Kai te whakaoti mātau i te tahua mo tērā tau." Tōrangapū Wales, BBC One Wales, 10:00 GMT i te 7 o Hui tanguru, i te BBC iPlayer Related Internet Links Care Forum Wales

title: Ka whakatuwhera anō te teihana o Birmingham New Street
summary: Kua whakatuwheratia anō te teihana New Street o Birmingham i muri i te whakawhanaketanga anō e £600m.
text: Kei roto i te whakahoutanga he huihuinga hou mō ngā pāhihi me tētahi atrium e āhei ai te mārama māori ki roto mō te wā tuatahi mai i te wā i hangaia anōtia ai te teihana pokapū o te taone i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua. Kua tāutatia hoki ngā escalators me ngā hīkoi hōu ki runga i ngā pūhara. Ko te kanohi o te teihana he wāhanga o te whanaketanga nui ake o te pokapū hokohoko o Grand Central. I kī a Mark Carne, te rangatira nui o Network Rail: "I tangohia e mātau tētahi teihana tino kino o te tau 1960, ka tapahia he rua nui i reira te papa motokā, a, ka purua ki roto i tētahi atrium te rahi o te papa whutupōro hei waipuke i te huihuinga ki te mārama māori." Pūtake o ngā take o te Tiriti Hōu: Network Rail

title: Ka tuwhera te Whare Taonga Whutupōro ā-Motu i te kāinga hou o Manatū
summary: Mā te pana i roto i te hurihanga i te tomokanga ki te Whare Taonga Whutupōro ā-Motu hou, ka tangi te haruru o te huihuinga o te rā derby i roto i ō taringa.
text: Nā Tom AireyBBC News, Manatāneta Ko te momo āhuahira e tūmanako ana ngā kaitiaki ka pā ki ngā mano o ngā kaihautū whutupōro e tūmanako ana rātau ka toro atu ki te tātaritanga i tōna kāinga hou i Manchester. "Kāore i taea te haere mai ki te taone i tētahi wā pai ake i te tau i toa ai a Manatū City i te Rōpū Matua, ā, ko Manatū United e haere mai ana i te tuarua." I haere mai i Ingarangi me Blackpool nui a Jimmy Armfield, koia te momo tautoko e hiahiatia ana e te Whare Taonga Whutupōro ā-Motu hou i te rā o tōna whakatuwheratanga. Ko tētahi hāte i homai e te kaitākaro i huri i te kaiwaiata o TE AO e noho ana i te taha o ngā tūemi pēnei i te pōro mai i te Whakamutunga o te Ipu o te Ao 1966 me te hāte o Āhiana a Diego Maradona i mau i a ia i te wā o te mahi 'ringa o te Atua'. Ko te whare taonga, e noho ana ināianei i roto i te whare o Urbis o mua i te pokapū o te taone, i tīmata te ora i Deepdale, te kāinga o Preston North End i Lancashire i te tau 2001. I a ia e toa ana i te taitara rōpū whutupōro tuatahi i te tau 1889 me ngā rangatira o te papa rōpū whutupōro tawhito rawa e whakamahia tonutia ana, e mārama ana te kite i te take i tīpakohia ai a Preston hei kāinga taketake o te whare taonga. Heoi anō, kāore i pai te haere o tōna neke atu i Nekehire. I roto i tētahi kōrero i te tau 2009, ka kī a Preston North End i "ohorere, i wehi" rātau i nga kaupapa. Ko Kevin Moore, nāna i whakatū te Whare Taonga Whutupōro ā-Motu i te tau 2001, ināianei ko te kaiwhakahaere o tōna pae hou. "We have learned a lot, we are all very proud of what we did in Preston but we've been able to learn and develop and build on that success and what works and how to improve things." E rua te rahi o te pae hou o te mea taketake, i katia i Aperira 2010. E 2,500 ngā tuemi i mahi i te tukanga tīpakonga uaua hei whakaū i tētahi wāhi i roto i ngā kāpata karaehe kanapa. Kei te whakaaturia hoki te whītiki kakī i mau i te kaitiaki o Te Taone o Manatāne, o Bert Trautmann, nāna i tākaro i muri i te whatinga o tōna kakī i te whakamutunga o te Kapu FA o te tau 1956 i waenganui i a Birmingham me Manchester City. Ahakoa kua kore pea a Deepdale e noho hei kanohi tūmatanui o te whare taonga, ka noho tonu a Preston hei kāinga o te pokapū rangahau me te kohinga o te whare taonga, neke atu i te 140,000 ngā tuemi e pupuritia ana, e whakatārewa ana rānei ki te whare taonga. I kī a Jimmy Armfield i te tuatahi ka miharo ia he aha rātau i neke ai i te tātaritanga. Ka kī a ia: "Me whakapono ahau he whakataunga mākete tēnei, he taone nui a Manatāne, he wāhi arotahi me tētahi taunga rererangi me ngā teihana tereina matua, e whakaaro ana ahau koia tērā i reira ai. " Engari ahakoa kei hea e tūmanako ana ahau kia pai te haere". 'Te hunga whakarongo whānui rawa' Hei aroha, he tino nui ngā koha ki te roanga o te whare taonga. He koreutu te tomokanga ki te whare taonga, engari me ngā tau manuhiri e tūmanakohia ana kia eke ki te 350,000 i te tau i whakaritea ki te 100,000 i te tau i Preston, he tiketike te kaha o ngā koha. E ai ki Visit Manchester, te poari tūruhi o te taone, neke atu i te 100 miriona ngā tāngata i haere ki te taone i te tau 2010. I kī a Tēnā Moore ko te whare āhua poro karaehe, e utu ana i te £8m hei whakahou, ko te wāhi tino pai hei kawe i te kohinga "ki te hunga whānui rawa". He maha ngā āhuatanga taketake o te whare e toe ana, me ngā wāhanga maha kua whakahōutia kia ōrite ki ngā kainoho hou. Ko te rerewhenua funicular, e manakohia ana ki te hiki kia hāngai ki te hanga o te whare, ināianei kua whakahuatia e te kaiwaiata whutupōro o TE AO ko John Motson. Kei roto ngā whakaaturanga taipitopito i ngā takahanga i rūrū ai te ao, tae atu ki te ahi o te Valley Parade i Bradford, i mate ai e 56 ngā tāngata, me te mōrearea o Hillsborough i Sheffield. I tēnei rā, i kite ai i te ngaromanga o ngā oranga e 96, nāna i whakaawe tētahi wāhanga i te kaiwhakaahua o Kiriuati Roy Clarke ki te tīmata i tana kaupapa 23 tau e haere tonu ana, The Homes of Football. Ka kī a ia: "He whakararuraru tērā i whakaaro ai ahau ka tāhaetia ngā mea katoa i mōhio ahau i roto i te tākaro ināianei, ā, ka puta he kēmu hou, ka whana tonu i te pōro, engari ka rerekē pea ngā mea katoa e karapoti ana." Ko tana whakaaturanga i te whare taonga, kei roto ko ngā whakaahua e 60 mai i ngā whakaritenga o te Kapu o te Ao ki ngā turi poharu i te whana pāka, he wāhanga o tana kohinga mamati 100,000 ehara i te mea ko ngā kēmu anake, engari ko ngā kaihautū e mahi ana i te tākaro. "I a au e tamariki ana, ka haere ahau ki ngā kēmu me te tīmata ki te mātakitaki i ngā kaipāngai ki te ōrite, he nui te riri o taku pāpā - ka kī atu ahau titiro ki taua tangata i reira, ka kī mai ia ki a au kia mātakitaki i te kēmu." Mā ngā whakaaturanga toi me te wā e whiu ai ki tētahi "kaitiaki mariko" e tū ana i waenganui i ngā pou tūturu mai i te taiwhanga tawhito o Wembley, e tino pai ana te pae ki ngā kaitautoko noa iho o te kēmu ātaahua. I kī a Toni Collins, ko te tumuaki o te Pokapū Ao Whānui o te Whare Wānanga o De Montfort mō te Hītori Hākinakina me te Ahurea, i kite ia i tētahi whare taonga ā-motu mō te tākaro hei maunga tino nui. I kī a ia: "Ko te whutupōro he wāhanga tau tōpu o te ahurea o te iwi o Ingarangi, ā, e tika ana kia ōrite te āhukahuka ki ētahi atu ngohe ahurea pēnei i te whare tapere, te opera, te puoro, me ōrite te mahi. " Ki te hoki koe ki ngā rau tau 15 me te 16 ka kitea e koe ngā tāngata e tākaro whutupōro ana, e mārama ana ehara i te mea e mōhio ana mātou i tēnei rā - engari ahakoa he kēmu tēnei e tino hāngai ana ki te hītori." Ka haere ngā Kāinga o te Whutupōro i te Whare Taonga Whutupōro ā-Motu tae noa ki Hakihea. He koreutu te tomokanga ki te whare taonga, me ngā utu tāpiri mō ētahi o ngā whakaaturanga pāhekoheko.

title: Ka toa te kaimahi matua pirihimana o Shropshire i te whare e £650,000 i te tānga
summary: Kua toa tētahi kaimahi pirihimana i tētahi pāmu kōeke II i rārangitia e Shropshire i roto i tētahi tānga whakawhiwhinga.
text: I hokona e Alison Bellamy he tīkiti e £20 te wāriu kia toa ai i te £650,000 Grafton Farm. I kī ngā rangatira o mua o Jane rāua ko Nigel Chalenor kua homai hoki e £120,000 ki Severn Hospice, nāna i tiaki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e tata ana ki a rāua. I kī a Ms Bellamy kua wareware ia kua tomo ia ki te tānga nā te taiepa Covid-19 engari i "ohorere me te wiriwiri" i te rongonga kua toa a ia. I korerotia ki te tau 49 tau kua toa a ia e Mrs Chalenor mā tētahi whāngai ora i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i te Tāite. I kī a Ms Bellamy, e mahi ana mō ngā Pirihimana o Mercia ki te Uru, i tana tēpu i tana rongonga i te rongo, ā, "i hiahiatia he takoto". I pātai mai mehemea ka neke a ia mai i Telford ki tōna kāinga hou - kua oti i a ia ngā taonga, e ono ngā rūma moe, he whare tākaro, he tāpu wera me ngā eka whenua e toru - ka kī a ia kāore ia i te mōhio i a ia "kāore e taea te tango". I kī a Tāne rāua ko Whaea Chalenor, tokorua ā rāua tamariki, ā, e 22 ētahi atu hei mātua whāngai, e hiahia ana rāua ki te hoko i to rāua kāinga tata ki Loppington ki te neke ki rāwāhi me te āwhina i ngā hapori kua tangohia. I hokona e rātau he tīkiti mō te £2 ia, ā, i hiahia rātau ki te utu i te uara o te whare me te toenga e haere ana ki te aroha. I kī a Severn Hospice, nāna hoki i pānui te toa i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, kua pā ana mahi kohi moni ki te taiepa huaketo. E kī ana me kohi e ia £2 mō ia £3 i pau ki te tiaki i ngā tāngata whai mate kāore e taea te rongoā. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk

title: Chanel Miller: Ka whakatakoto te kaupapa o te Whare Wānanga o Stanford i ana kupu ki te pae whakaeke
summary: Kua whakamahia e ngā ākonga i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o California te hangarau mamati hei whakaatu i te tautoko mō te mōrehu o te tūkinotanga tōnā, o Chanel Miller. Engari i waenganui i te pouri i te maumaharatanga a te whare wānanga ki te whakaeke.
text: Nā Lauren TurnerBBC News Mā te whakamahi i te ao rangirua whakarahi, ka whakaatahia e ngā ākonga ana kupu ki te pae i te whare wānanga i tūkinotia ai ia i te tau 2015. Kua hurihia te rohe hei māra whakaaro - engari he tautohetohe mo te kōwhiringa kupu mō tētahi tohu, ā, kāore anō kia tāutatia. E wehi ana ngā ākonga i tēnei, ko te tikanga kāore te tangata ināianei i te mōhio he aha te tikanga o te māra. I kite te whakaaturanga Dear Visitor i ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i ngā iPads me ngā kawerongo kia kite me te rongo i ngā kupu i tuhituhi ai a Ms Miller ki te kaihōia o Brock Turner i roto i tana tauākī pānga ki te tūkinotanga. I tuhia i raro i te ingoa ingoa o Emily Doe, ā, i haere huaketo i muri i te pānuitanga tuihono. I kitea e te hūri a Tena, e 20 i taua wā, e toru ngā whakapae: te whakaeke i tētahi tūkino haurangi, te tūkino i tētahi tūkino me te ngana ki te whakakōkā i a ia. I kitea a Ms Miller e tata ana ki tētahi putunga e ngā tauira Huitene tokorua. I hoatu ki a Turner he wā whare herehere poto e ono marama, e toru marama tana mahi. I whakawāteatia a ia, a, ka noho tonu ki te rēhita o te hunga hara wahine. I tēnei wā kāore he tohu tohu, ā, kāore he mahere hei tāuta i tētahi i muri i te whakakāhoretanga a te whare wānanga i ngā kupu i kōwhiria e Ms Miller kia whakamahia. Ko ngā kaihanga o Dear Visitor - ngā ākonga katoa, ngā ākonga rānei o mua i Stanford - i hiahia ki te kaupapa ao rangirua o te Paraire, whai muri i tētahi takahanga kotahitanga, kia haere ki te whakatika i taua hē. 'Matapihi ki te ao whirinoa' i kī a Hope Schroeder: "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakarewa i te reo o Chanel Miller i tēnei mokowā e tika ana. Ehara i te whakakapinga engari he tāpiritanga ki tētahi tohu ā-tinana." I kī a ia kāore hoki te pae i te whakamahia kia rite ki te tikanga - me ngā kēne pia me ngā kariri vape i kitea i roto i te kāri - ā, ka warewaretia tōna tikanga. I roto i te whakaaturanga, ka hoatu ki ngā ākonga he iPads kua whakaritea ki tētahi taupānga ao rangirua kia kite ai rātou i te āhua mēnā kua tāutatia he tohu ki te māra. "Māna rātau e hoatu he matapihi ki tētahi ao whirinoa," tana kī. "I taea e mātou te tāuta i ngā ahanoa mamati e āhua nei kei reira. " I whai wāhi hoki mātou ki te uiui i ngā ākonga mō te take. I whakaaro mātou he mōrea i te roanga o te wā, kāore i taea e ngā ākonga i roto i te rima, 10 tau rānei te mōhio he aha te māra. Nā reira ka taea hoki te pāwhiri i ngā reta a ngā ākonga. Kātahi mātou ka tono i ngā tāngata ki te tuhi reta i ā rātou ake." I whakapā atu te tīma Manuhiri Aroha ki a Ms Miller, nāna te pukapuka Mōhio ki Tōku Ingoa i whakaputaina i tēnei wiki, kia haere ai ia ki mua mō te kaupapa. "He pai ki a ia te ariā, ā, i whiwhi mātou i tana whakaaetanga ki te whakamahi i tōna reo tūturu i te mokowā," ko te tāpiri mai a Ms Schoeder. I uiui hoki ngā tauira ki ngā tohunga tūkino kia tino mōhio ai ka "whakaaro, kia mōhio hoki" te wheako. Ko te ahorangi o te Kura Ture o Stanford, ko Michele Dauber, nāna i ārahi te puku angitu ki te auporo i te Kaiwhakawā a Aaron Persky, i uru hoki ki te hanganga o te māra. I kī a ia ko te manakē tuatahi ko te haumarutanga, e whakaahua ana i te wāhi rehurehu hei "tāwhiti whakakōhuru". Engari i kī a ia, i muri i te āraitanga i tētahi whakaekenga i reira anō, ko te whāinga panuku ko te "whakaae ki te tūkino". I whakaae a Stanford ki tētahi tohu, mehemea i tangohia ngā kupu mai i te tauākī pānga o te tūkinotanga. I whakakāhoretia e te whare wānanga ngā kōwhiringa kupu tuatahi me te tuarua a Ms Miller. I tukuna e rātau ā rātou ake huatau, engari kāore a Ms Miller i whakaaro he tika. Ko tētahi huatau ko "Kei konei tonu ahau, kei te pai ahau, kei konei tonu ahau" - ko ngā kupu i kōrerotia e Ms Miller ki tōna tuahine i muri i te whakaekenga - engari ko te kōwae panuku e whakamārama ana i ngā mea i hunaia e Ms Miller, ā, kāore a ia i te pai. 'Kei roto tahi ngā mōrehu i tēnei' Ka kī a Ahorangi Dauber: "Kua nui te pakaru o tēnei taitama. Koinei tonu te iti rawa o te mahi a Stanford. "I te putanga mai o te pukapuka a Chanel, e whakaaro ana ahau he tauhohenga tika a Stanford ko te whakaaro anō i ta rātau whakataunga mo te tohu me te whakatakoto kia rite ki ta rātau i kī taurangi ai. I whati i a rātau he kī taurangi ki tētahi tangata kua tino tūkinotia." He mōrehu tūkino te ākonga o Sabrina Medler i tōna tau whakamutunga i Tūroro, nāna i tuhi mō ōna ake wheako i tēnei wiki, e kī ana i whakamanatia ia e te pānui i te tauākī pānga a Chanel Miller. I kī a Ms Medler he rite tonu tana haere ki te māra, ā, kua rongo ia i te "rangimārie" i reira. Ka kī a ia: "He rerekē te urupare a ngā mōrehu ki taua mea. I ngā wā katoa i kitea e au he whakamarie te mokowā. I a au e noho ana i reira ka rongo ahau i tētahi hononga ki a Chanel Miller. Ka rongo ahau kei roto tahi ngā mōrehu i tēnei." Engari i whakaae a ia he whakamaumahara hoki ki te mutunga o te kēhi, kātahi anō ka kore a Tūroro e mahi i te tika ki a Ms Miller. Ināianei kua whakaritea e ia tētahi petihana o te whare wānanga e tono ana kia whakapōhēhē tūmatanui a Tūroro mō te kore tāuta i tētahi tohu me ngā kupu i kōwhiria e Ms Miller. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Whare Wānanga o Stanford: "I muri i te hanganga o te kāri, i tino kaha mātou ki te whiwhi whakaaetanga ki tētahi kīanga ōkiko mō te mokowā, ā, e pouri ana mātou kāore i taea. " I hiahia te whare wānanga ki te whakarite ka whakarato te mokowā i tētahi taiao tautoko mō ngā mōrehu katoa, kāore pea rātou katoa i tae ki te wāhi ōrite o te whakaora i muri i te mate, ā, tērā pea he tauhohenga ā-hinengaro. "We welcome this student-led initiative that offers the use of augmented reality in the space and provides visitors the agency to engage with the garden and its purpose." I kī hoki te whare wānanga i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina e Provost Persis Drell i Mati 2018 e tū tonu ana, i reira i whakamāramatia ai e ia te whakataunga a Stanford. I roto, e kī ana a ia i rongo i ngā kupu a Ms Miller "i whakapuakina ngā whakaaro e kore e tautokona i roto i tētahi wāhi whakaora". I tāpiritia e ia kua "whakarerekētia to mātau hapori mo ake tonu atu" ā, kei te mahi a Tūroro ki te "waihanga me te whāngai i tētahi ahurea kāore e puta mai ngā mahi ōrite ā muri ake nei".

title: Te tūtukitanga o te waka rererangi o Germanwings: Ko te kaiurungi 'i hiahia ki te whakangaro i te waka rererangi'
summary: Te āhua nei e hiahia ana te kaihautū o te rererangi o Germanwings i tūtuki ki te Aorangi Wīwī, ko Aotearoa Lubitz, ki te "whakangaro i te waka rererangi", te kī a ngā kaiwhakahaere.
text: I kī te rōia o Marseille, a Brice Robin, e kī ana i ngā mōhiohio mai i te hopu reo "pouaka pango", ko te kaihautū anake i roto i te paihirangi. I āta tīmataria e ia he hekenga i te wā e maukati ana te kaihautū. I kī a Tēnā Kōpana he "mūmū tūturu i roto i te paihi" i te whawhai a te kaihautū ki te tomo anō. I kī a ia ka ngana anō ngā pūmana waka rererangi ki te whakapā atu ki te rererangi, engari kāore he hua. Ka rangona ngā pāhihi e hamama ana i mua tonu i te tūtukitanga, ka tāpiri mai a ia. Kei te puta mai ngā taipitopito o mua o te kaihautū Tiamana - ahakoa he mea ngaro tonu ōna take mō te tūtukitanga. Ngā whakahōutanga ora mai i te rā He aha i pā mai i te hāwhe haora whakamutunga? I whakangungu nui a Tēnā Lubitz, e 27, ā, "100% e tika ana ki te rere me te kore whakatūpato", e ai ki a Carsten Spohr, te upoko o Lufthansa, te kaikawe Tiamana nāna ngā Germanwings. I kī a Tēnā Spohr kua haukotia te whakangungu a Tāne Lubitz mō ngā marama maha e ono tau ki mua, engari kāore i kōrero he aha. I tīmata anō te whakangungu i muri i te "whakatūnga anō o te kaitono", tana kī. I kī atu te Tumuaki Tiamana o Hēnea Tūturu ki ngā kaipānui, nā ngā mahi mārama a te kaihautū, i hoatu he "ahu hou, kāore i te mōhiotia". Kua rapua e nga pirihimana te kāinga o te kaihautū i Montabaur, tata ki Frankfurt, tae atu ki tētahi whare noho i puritia e ia i Duesseldorf. I tūtuki te Hītori 320 mai i Pārera ki Duesseldorf ki tētahi maunga, ka mate katoa ngā pāhihi e 144 me ngā kaimahi e ono, i muri i te hekenga e waru meneti. Andreas Lubitz: Germanwings co-pilot under scrutiny Ko wai a Andreas Lubitz? "E rongo ana mātou i te kaihautū e tono ana ki te kaihautū kia whakahaere i te waka rererangi, ā, ka rongo mātou i te tangi o te tūru e neke whakamuri ana me te tangi o te kati tatau," te kī a Tēnā Kōpana ki ngā kaipānui. I kī a ia ko te kaihautū, i tapaina i roto i te pāpāho Tiamana ko Patrick S, tērā pea i haere ki te whare haumaru. "I taua wā, kei te whakahaere te kaihautū i te waka rererangi ko ia anake. I a ia anake, ka pēhi te kaiurungi i ngā pātene o te pūnaha aroturuki rererangi hei mahi i te hekenga o te rererangi. "I whakahaeretia e ia tēnei pātene mō tētahi take kāore anō mātou kia mōhio, engari te āhua nei ko te take he whakangaro i tēnei waka rererangi." Ināianei, i kī te ratonga aroturuki tuihono Flightradar24 i ngā raraunga aorangi kua tātaritia kua hurihia e tētahi te teitei o te waka rererangi mai i te 38,000ft (11,582m) ki te 100ft - te tautuhinga mōkito e taea ana. "I waenganui i te 09:30:52 me te 09:30:55 ka kitea e koe kua hurihia ā-ringa te autopilot mai i te 38,000ft ki te 100ft me te iwa hēkona i muri iho ka tīmata te rererangi ki te heke, tērā pea me te tautuhinga autopilot 'hekenga tuwhera'," i whakahuatia e Kōrero a Kōrero. I ora a Tēnā Lubitz tae noa ki te pānga whakamutunga, ka kī a Tēnā Kōpa. I tāpiritia e te rōia ko "te whakamāramatanga tino tika" nā te kaihautū i ārai i te kaihautū kia kaua e tomo anō ki te paihirangi. I tāpiritia e ia ko te kaihautū "kāore i mōhiotia e mātau" kia whai hononga ki te whakararuraru, ki te pūtōraru rānei. Tātaritanga: Ko Te Arotahi ināianei ka neke mai i ngā mīhini ki te tangata e rere ana i te waka rererangi. Kua kī mai tētahi tohunga aituā ki a au ka āta tirohia e nga kaihoko te papamuri o te kaihautū, o tōna whānau hoki. I nama moni a ia? He riri anō? Ka titiro rātau ki tōna hāhi, mēnā i raruraru a ia ki te ture, mēnā he oranga aroha pūmau tōna. He āhua kore nei tēnei momo takahanga, engari kua pā mai i mua, ahakoa he rerekē ngā take. I muri i te 9/11, ka mahia e rātau he paihi. Ka puritia e ia nga kaiwhakataetae, engari i te mutunga ka whakaaetia hoki e tētahi tangata te pupuri i o rātau hoa mahi ki waho. Me waea atu ngā waka rererangi. Ko tēhea te tuma nui ake - te pūtōraru, te whai i a ia rānei? Kāore ngā pāhihi i mōhio ki te tūtukitanga e tū mai ana "tae noa ki te wā whakamutunga" i te wā ka rangona ngā hāmama, ka kī a Tēnā Kōpa, kātahi anō ka mate wawe rātau. I muri i ngā whakakitenga o te Tāite, he maha ngā waka rererangi kua oati ki te huri i ā rātou ture kia rua neke atu rānei ngā kaimahi i roto i te pailati i ngā wā katoa. I tēnei wā, ka haere ngā whanaunga me ngā hoa o ngā tūpāpaku ki te rohe o Alpine i heke iho ai te waka rererangi, e tata ana ki te taone o Seyne-les-Alpes. Na te whakaaturanga o te take pea o te tūtukitanga i whakapataritari ai te riri. "Kāore e taea e te tangata kotahi te whai mana ki te whakamutu i ngā oranga o ngā rau tāngata me ngā whānau," te kī a Esteban Rodriguez, tētahi kaimahi wheketere Pāniora i ngaro i a ia ngā hoa tokorua i runga i te rererangi. I kī te tumuaki o tētahi kura tuarua o Tiamana i ngaro e 16 ngā tauira me ngā kaiako tokorua i te tūtukitanga, he "tino kino rawa atu i ta mātau i whakaaro ai". Kāore anō kia kitea te "pouaka pango" tuarua - e pūkete ana i ngā raraunga rererangi. Ko ētahi atu mahi i whakaarotia nā te mahi kaihautū tika Pūtake: Whatunga Haumaru Rererangi

title: Huringa āhuarangi: Ko te tikanga kia 'hāmenetia' ngā minita i runga i ngā ūnga
summary: Me whakamau e nga minita te ūnga huringa āhuarangi mana o UK - ka anga atu rānei ki nga kōti, kua kī te kaipūtaiao matua o te kāwanatanga.
text: E tautoko ana te kaitātari taiao o Te Wānanga E kī ana a ia ko te whāinga kāwanatanga o nāianei - he 80% kohu i tapahia i taua rā kotahi - he ngoikore rawa ki te pare i te āhuarangi. Kua kī taurangitia e nga minita he kaupapa here āhuarangi nui ake i roto i ta rātau mahere Tupu Mā e haere mai ana, kua roa hoki te takaware. Engari i kī atu a Prof King ki a BBC News e mōhio ana te kāwanatanga he ngoikore rawa te ūnga 80% i muri i taua kaupapa. I ētahi marama 18 ki mua, i kī taurangi te Hēkeretari Taiao o Aotearoa Leadsom kia 100% te whakaiti kohu kia mau tonu ai te UK ki ōna here i raro i te mahi āhuarangi o Parihi 2015. Engari kāore i taea e nga minita te whakatapu i taua 100% tapahi i roto i te Ture Huringa Āhuarangi. "E tino mōhio ana te kāwanatanga ki ngā mea e hiahiatia ana - engari kāore i te mahi. " Mēnā he mahi ā-ture hei whakahau i ngā minita kia tika te whanonga, kia pērā tonu - māku e tautoko." Kei te tautoko a Prof King i tētahi mahi ture tuatahi a tētahi rōpū iti, Mahere B, e whakahaeretia ana e te rōia kāwanatanga o mua, o Tim Crosland. E tautohe ana e herea ana te Hēkeretari Pakihi a Greg Clark i raro i te ture ki te whakamau i ngā ūnga mēnā e whakaatu ana te pūtaiao e hiahiatia ana. Ko te take tēnei o te kēhi. Kua tuhituhi a Tēnā Crosland ki a Tēnā Clark, ā, e kī ana mēnā kāore he whakautu pai i muri i te 14 rā, ka mauria e ia te kēhi ki te Kōti Tiketike mō te arotakenga ā-ture. "Kua mārama te whakapakeke o te pūtaiao mai i te whakaaetanga o te Ture Huringa Āhuarangi," tana kī. "Mēnā e kī mai ana ngā kaipūtaiao ki a mātau ko tā mātou ara kohu o nāianei ka mau pea mātou ki te pāpātanga, kātahi ka whakapiri ki te ara o nāianei he koretake. " Ko te pūtaiao tino pai e wātea ana e kī mai ana ki a mātau ko ngā mōrea o te whakawhiti i ngā pūwāhi tīpoka e tino nui ana i waenganui i te 1.5 me te 2C. A, ko te tikanga o te UK e tapahi ana i te kohu ki te kore." He whai hua? Ka tautohetohetia tana kēhi i te kōti e Honatana Crow, te Rōia Matua ki a Piriniha Charles, me tētahi rōia matua o te Whare Taonga o mua. E kī ana a Tēnā Crosland he rabbi ōna hoa kerēme "nāna i ako kia kaua e waiho tētahi mate atawhai"; ngā rangatahi e mataku ana mō te wā heke; me tētahi kaitautoko mai i Mauritius e tohu ana i ngā whenua moutere e mōrearea ana i te pikinga o te wai moana. He rite tonu te pōrearea o ētahi atu rōpū ki ngā takaware roa i roto i te rautaki āhuarangi a te kāwanatanga, ā, kei te whakaaro hoki ētahi ki te mahi ā-ture. Ahakoa rā, tērā pea ka whai hua te pana i tētahi rautaki kohu kore ina kore e taea e te kāwanatanga te tae ki tōna ūnga o raro. Ko ClientEarth, tētahi o ngā rōpū taiao tino angitu o UK i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha, kua tīmata i te whakamahinga o ngā kōti hei tuku i ngā kaupapahere taiao. I kī a Honatana Hāhi, he rōia āhuarangi me te rōpū: "E tūmanako ana mātou mā te kerēme a Mahere B e āwhina ki te aro atu ki te tino nui o te wero e anga atu ana ki a tātau, me te whakarite kia mau tonu to mātau kāwanatanga ki ngā whāinga i whakaaetia i Parihi. " Engari kāore ngā ūnga e whakaiti i te kohukohu." I tāpiritia e ia ko te arotahi ināianei me whakarite kia tutuki i te Ture Huringa Āhuarangi tōna whāinga. I kī te kāwanatanga ka whakaarohia te reta a Mahere B, ā, ka urupare i te wā e tika ana, ka tāpiri: "He kaiārahi ao whānui te UK i runga i te huringa āhuarangi". I kī tētahi kaikōrero ko te mahere Tupu Mā e whai ake nei, e whakahuahua ana me pēhea te whakaiti i te kohukohu, he "hao, pakari... me te hanga i runga i ngā huarahi ohaoha puta noa i te whenua". Whāia a Roger i Twitter @rharrabin

title: Ka waihotia e te kura reo te ingoa 'AIHI'
summary: Me huri tōna ingoa i tētahi kura reo Ingarihi me te rōpū mātauranga e kiia nei ko "AIHI" nā ngā pāhonotanga ki te whakararuraru.
text: Nā Hōne CoughlanTe korero kōrero o Te Mātauranga i kī ai tētahi kaikōrero kua uaua haere ki ngā takahanga reo aowhānui i raro i te kara o AIHI. Tērā anō ētahi "kōrero tōraro" mō ngā kaimahi e mau ana i ngā hāte o Īhi, e kī ana te kaikōrero. Kua whāngaia e te waitohu anō te ingoa o Oxford International Education Group. Ko te mekameka o ngā kura reo me ngā kaiwhakarato mātauranga kua karangatia ko Isis mai i te tau 1991, i tangohia tōna ingoa mai i te wāhi o te Awa o Thames i Oxford e kiia nei ko te Isis. E tono ana i ngā ākonga Engari kua whakataua e te rōpū kua kore e taea te pupuri i te ingoa, ina nui rawa ngā āhuatanga tōraro o te whakararuraru pākaha, me Īhi tētahi o ngā ingoa e āpiti ana ki te Kāwanatanga Āmāri i Hiria me Iraki. I kī tētahi kōrero kua whakatauria kia kaua e tatari ki tētahi huringa i roto i te āhuatanga tōrangapū, engari kia haere ki mua me te whakawhiti mai i te Mātauranga o Te Ao kia kore ai e mōrearea anō ngā mōrearea whakamā. "Ehara i te kōwhiringa te whai i ā mātou kaimahi i ētahi mākete e mahi ana me ngā kāri pakihi o Īhi, ngā wāhitau īmēra rōpū Īhi, ngā kara o Īhi. Na reira, i muri iho i te 24 tau i a Īhi, ka whakatauria te whakataunga pouri kia whakaingoa anō," te kī a te kaikōrero. Kua hurihia e ngā peka pēnei i te kura reo i Kākāriki i te tonga o Rāwāhi o rātau tohu. I tua atu i ngā raruraru o te tohu i roto i te UK, i āwangawanga te rōpū mō ngā whakaaro aowhānui o te ingoa o Īhi. Kua uaua ake te tono ākonga, tae atu ki te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, ki te ingoa o Īhi, ā, he māharahara mō ngā uauatanga mō ngā kaimahi e mahi ana ki rāwāhi. Tērā anō ētahi āwangawanga mō ngā pūkaha rapu ipurangi me ngā hua tērā pea ka whai mai i tētahi tangata e kimi ana i ngā pūtahi whakangungu AIHI. I tīmataria te rōpū mātauranga, e whakahaere ana i ngā akoranga Ingarihi mō ngā ākonga o rāwāhi, ki te pūtea mai i te Prince's Trust. Ko te tauira hou rawa tēnei o te ingoa o Īhi kua kore e whakaarotia e tika ana. I tērā wiki, ka kī te Rōpū Tirorangi o te Ao ka tangohia a Īhi mai i tētahi rārangi ingoa tūpāpaku mō te āwhā. I runga i tētahi rārangi mō ngā āwhā ā muri ake i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, e pā ana ki te atua atua o Ihipiana tahito, engari ināianei kua whakatakahia, kua whakakapia ki a Ivette. Ko tētahi umanga tūmataiti me tētahi pūmanawa pūmanawa i waenganui i ngā umanga kua taka mā te whakamahi i a Īhi hei ingoa mō rātou.

title: Ko te pokapū o Snowdonia i toa e nga ariki kia hokona
summary: Me hoko tētahi pokapū ngohe o waho i Snowdonia kua whakamahia e ngā whakatupuranga tamariki o West Midlands.
text: The Towers Outdoor Education Centre at Betws-y-Coed is owned by Wolverhampton City Council but needs £600,000 spending on "immediate repairs". The centre, which was visited by the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge in 2015, has been closed since August after the council halted building work. Kua tata ki te 60 tau te toro atu o ngā tamariki kura o Wolverhampton ki te pokapū. "He wā pouri tēnei ki a mātau. Many people, including myself, have been to the Towers over the years, but we are where we are," said Wolverhampton City Council leader Ian Brookfield. "Kāore ngā kura e hiahia ana ki te whakamahi anō, ā, he tino whakararuraru." I kōrero ngā āpiha ki tētahi hui i te Wenerei, e 18 noa iho i roto i ngā kura e 102 i te mana ā rohe i haere ki te pokapū i tērā tau, e ai ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. "Kāore te pokapū i te utu mōna anō," tāpiri mai te kaikaunihera o te taone nui o Dr Michael Hardacre. "Tērā tētahi petihana hei tiaki i te pokapū, e 404 noa iho ngā tāngata kua hainatia. " E ono ngā whakaaturanga 'iti rawa' o te huamoni, ā, ko te putanga tino pai rawa atu kia whai pūrua pūtea tētahi o ngā rōpū āwhina mō ā rātou marohi." E whai ana te whakataunga i tētahi whakahau kia tiakina te pokapū i te toki, me tētahi kaiako e whakaahua ana hei "rauemi nui" mō te rangatahi. Another teacher, Gareth Hawkins, who is the assistant head at Woodfield Primary School in Wolverhampton, claimed the centre was running at almost full capacity, with charities, social enterprises and pupil referral units also using it. I kī a ia he "tino taonga nui" te pokapū mō tōna kura i roto i ngā tau. Engari i kī atu a Dr Hardacre ki ngā hoa kaikaunihera: "Ka aroha, kāore he rākau moni mīharo. " Kua kaha te mahi a te kaunihera kia whai wāhi ā-pūtea ai te pokapū, engari he maha nga tau i āwhinatia ai e ngā kaiutuutu." Ināianei ka whakatauria e te poari whakahaere rawa o te mana te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te hoko atu i te pokapū.

title: Tatauranga 2021: Ehara i te kōwhiringa aunoa te iti o te iwi Welsh
summary: Kua karangatia ngā karanga mō te tatauranga panuku kia whakaurua ngā rōpū iwi motuhake: te pango, te Welsh me te Āhia Welsh.
text: I roto i te uiuinga 2021, ka hoatu ki ngā tāngata ētahi kōwhiringa mō te tuakiri. Kei roto i tēnei tētahi kōwhiringa i te wāhanga rōpū iwi mō te Welsh mā, engari kei te riri ngā kaiwhakahauhau i roto i te kōwhiringa rōpū iwi pango, kāore he kōwhiringa Welsh pango, ko Ingarangi pango anake. I kī te Office for National Statistics, e haepapa ana ki te tatauranga, kua uiui ki te iwi whānui. Engari i kī te kaiwaiata o Kizzy Crawford e hiahia ana a ia ki te kite i te kōwhiringa pango Welsh i roto i te wāhanga o te iwi i runga i te tatauranga, e puta mai ana ia 10 tau. I kī atu a Crawford, he taonga tuku iho a Karipiana me Welsh, ki te hōtaka Newyddion 9 o TE WĒRA: "Mō ngā tau ināianei, i ngā wā katoa me whakakī ahau i tētahi puka pēnei, me te kōrero i tōku iwi, kāore anō kia whai kōwhiringa mōku. " Kāore anō ahau kia kite i tētahi mea e tohu ana i ahau. I ngā wā katoa ka whakatakotoria e au te reo Peretania whāranu, whāranu rānei, engari ehara tēnā i te tika. E whakaaro ana ahau he Welsh ahau. "I ngā wā katoa i whakaaro ahau kāore te tangata e whakaae ki a au hei wahine Welsh nā te tae o tōku kiri. Ko ngā mea pēnei e whakaū ana i tēnā." Ina oti i ngā tāngata o Uēra te tatauranga i roto i te rua tau, e ai ki te putanga hukihuki, ka puta he pouaka mō ngā tāngata mā e mōhio ana he Welsh, Ingarihi, Pākehā, Airani ki te Raki, Ingarangi rānei. Engari mō ngā rōpū iti o te iwi i tēnei wāhanga, ko te taunahatanga he pango o Ingarangi me Āhia Peretania, ā, kāore he kōwhiringa ki te kī i te Welsh pango, i te Āhia Welsh rānei. He rerekē te pātai i tukuna i Pākehā, e taea ai e ngā tāngata o te iwi iti te tohu i tētahi pouaka mēnā he Ingarangi, he Pākehā, he Pākehā rānei. Ko te tatauranga i reira e whakahaeretia ana e ngā Pūkete ā-Motu o Pākehā, ehara i te ONS. Ka tūtohu a Yasmin Begum, he kaituhi me te kaiwhaiwhai mai i Kānata o Welsh me ngā taonga tuku iho o Hōia, mō taua take, e kī ana: "He Welsh Pakistani ahau, ehara i te Āhia Peretania." Kua tono te kaunihera o Gwynedd ki te ONS kia whakaarohia anō ngā kāwai. "It's very important that they re-think this question," councillor Nia Jeffreys said. "He pēhea te kupu, me te kōwhiringa anake o te pango o Ingarangi, o Āhia rānei o Ingarangi, he rite ki te whakahau i ngā tāngata kia kōwhiri i waenganui i te noho Welsh, te pango rānei, te Āhia rānei. E kore e whakaaetia." Engari kua tiakina e te ONS te kōwhiringa kōwhiringa, e kī ana he maha ngā pātai e āhei ai te tangata ki te kōrero i tō rātou tuakiri ā-motu me te rōpū iwi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Ko ngā tāngata katoa e hiahia ana ki te tohu hei Welsh ka taea mā tō rātou tuakiri ā-motu me tō rātou iwi. " Kua hoahoatia ngā uiui tatauranga kia whai kōwhiringa ai te tangata ki te mahi i tēnei. "Kua uru whānui mātou ki ngā kaiwhakamahi i Weera, ā, e tono ana mātou kia taea e te tangata e hiahia ana ki te tāutu hei Welsh me tētahi atu kāwai (tae atu ki Āhia, Āhia rānei Peretania me te pango, pango o Ingarangi, Kāriana, Āwherika rānei) mā te whakaoti i tētahi o ngā kōwhiringa tuhi-mai."

title: GBBO: He pēhea te urupare a ngā kaimātakitaki ki te wāhanga tuatahi o te Hongere 4
summary: Kua pai te heke o te wāhanga tuatahi o te Great British Bake Off i te Hongere 4 ki ngā kaimātakitaki - ahakoa i roa te wā ki te whakarite ki te rārangi hōu me ngā wehenga pānuitanga.
text: Ko te rangatū hou - koia te tuatahi mai i te wā i mahue ai te whakaaturanga i te AO - ka kite i a Paora Karaihe e hono ana ki te hoa kaiwhakawā o Prue Leith, me Noel Fielding rāua ko Sandi Toksvig i runga i ngā mahi whakaaturanga. He toharite e 5.8 miriona ngā kaimātakitaki i mātakitaki i te whakaaturanga - e piki ana ki te 6.5 miriona ina whakaurua te hunga e mātakitaki ana i te +1. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi o te rangatū i toa whānui i runga i ngā kaiwhakawāwā, engari ko ngā kaimātakitaki e hiahiatia ana e te Hongere 4 kia whakatūpato. "Kei te rongo ahau kei te whati ahau i tētahi momo ture mā te mātakitaki i tēnei me te kore a Mel, Sue me Meri," ki te tuhituhi a Kelly i te tīmatanga o te wāhanga. Engari me ētahi atu kaimātakitaki e whakapuaki ana i te whakaaturanga "te mea tino pai mo te noho o Ingarangi," ko te nuinga i mau ki a ia, ā, kua toa i te wā i mutu. I paingia ngā kaiwhakaatu o Toksvig i Twitter, me te tuhituhi a Meri: "He māori a Sandi ki te hoatu i tēnei whakaaturanga i te noho tahi me te whakahinuhinu." I kī a Mīharo he "tino ātaahua" te kaihautū tahi o Sandi, a Noel, i te kī a Rob kei te "tino pai" a ia me te whetū Mighty Boosh hei kaiwhakaatu. I tuhituhi a Greg ka "tiaki takitahi a Fielding i tēnei rangatū". Engari i kī a Stephanie: "He rite anō 🙈 ki Top Gear " (Kāore mātou i te whakaaro he whakamihi tēnā i te hekenga o te wā o Pirihi Evans.) I kī a Chloe ko Sandi rāua ko Noel "ehara i a Mel rāua ko Sue", i te wā i tuhituhi a Hana: "Kāore te kupu tunu i te ōrite i a rāua." Engari i kōrero te tauwhāinga o mua o Rav Whakakotahi mō te tokomaha i tana kīnga: "Ahakoa ka mau tonu tōku ngākau ki a Mel rāua ko Sue, kei te tino mātauranga te mahi a Sandi rāua ko Noel." He tino whakawhanaunga. Kāore te katoa i pīrangi ki ngā wehenga arumoni, ā, he tokomaha ngā kaimātakitaki i tere ki te tweet i o rātau whakaaro i te tīmatanga o ngā pānuitanga. "He hē noa iho ngā pānuitanga i GBBO," ko tētahi o ngā tauhohenga tā ake ki te wehenga tuatahi. Tae noa ki te tuatoru, ka kī a Julie kei te "whāngai" a ia ki ngā pōreareatanga, ā, ka tūtohu a Gemma ko rātau te "mea anake e kino ana ahau ki te GBBO hou". I kī tonu te toa o mua o Nadiya Hu huka e pupuri ana a ia i te mātakitaki i te whakaaturanga kia taea rā anō e ia te tīpoka i ngā pānuitanga: Engari i whakamātauria e Pauline: "Kaua e mōhio ki ngā pānuitanga - ka whakaaetia ahau ki te mahi tī!" Waihoki, i rongo a Keiti i ngā pānuitanga "i hanga i te tanuku" i te wā e kī ana a Te Hukihuki "ka hoatu he wā ki a koe ki te kōrero i waenganui i ngā wāhanga". Ko ngā huringa Rārangi hōputu me ngā wehenga pānui, he tokomaha ngā kaimātakitaki i kī he mōhio te whakaaturanga. Ka tūtohu a Sue: "He pōtae ki te Hongere 4 - he pai te mahi mō te pupuri i te hōputu nui ōrite o te GBBO. " Āe, kāore i te tino pai ngā pānuitanga, engari kāore i tino kino te whakanoho! 👍 " "Kua whāia tēnei e te Hongere 4... I te wā tika mō tētahi huringa kua āhua tawhito," ki te tūtohu a Sam. I kī te kaiwhakaatu 1Xtra o Nick Bright he "ōrite tonu te whakaaturanga ki ngā tāngata rerekē e rua". "Tino koa i puritia e rātau te hōputu mōhiotia. Kua māwhiti ahau," ko te tuhituhi a Wendy. Ka kī a Aoife: "BBC? Hongere 4? Hei aha atu mā wai. Kei te mahi keke reka te iwi ma Paora. Kei te pai tonu ngā mea katoa i te ao." Pātai pai nga keke. Ko te whakaaturanga, ko nga tauwhāinga me a rātau tunu. "Mō te wiki tuatahi he whakamīharo te āhua o ēnei whakaaturanga!" te kī a Alex, e pā ana ki te paerewa tino tiketike i te wāhanga tuatahi. He "whakamīharo" te āhua o te keke merengi a Flo e ai ki a Hemi, ahakoa i kī a Fiona he "nui rawa te tae kai i roto i te paraoa paraoa kia pai ai ahau" (ki runga i tō kēmu, Flo). I tohua e Laura te pounamu champagne me ngā keke parāoa mō te "tino whakamīharo". He tino reka te āhua o ngā rīhi, nā reira ka kī a Laura (he mea kē): "Ināianei kei te pōraru ahau mēnā e hiahia ana ahau ki te keke, ki te BLT, ki tētahi katsu pīkaokao rānei? " Ko tāku e mōhio ana, kei te tino hiakai 😩 ahau ināianei " Nā reira, ka hoki mai ngā kaimātakitaki? Na te tangi, āe. "Kātahi te wāhanga tuatahi tino mātauranga o #GBBO - tino hiahia ki te toenga o tēnei rangatū!" ki te tuhituhi a Rhys. Ka kī a Dee: "Koa kua hoki mai a GBBO. Tuhipoka ki a koe anō: tuhia te toenga o ngā rangatū hei karo i ngā pānuitanga. Miss Mary, Sue me Mel - e whakarite ana ki te rārangi hou me te aroha ki a Flo 💓 " Heoi anō, kāore pea ētahi kaimātakitaki e piri ki te rangatū. "Kua tūkinotia e koe tētahi whakaaturanga tino mātauranga," ko te tuhituhi a Louise ki te whārangi Facebook mana o te whakaaturanga. "E whakahaua ana ngā hangarau, kāore i te tino pai nga kaihanga parāoa, ā, he uaua rawa ngā uauatanga. " He whakawā rawa a Prue, ā, he tino tere rawa te mea katoa ki te waihanga i tētahi ariā tanuku. Tino matekiri." He aha te whakaaro o nga kaiwhakawāwā? I kī a Michael Hogan o te Telegraph: "Tērā pea kua ngaro a Meri, a Mel rāua ko Sue, engari ka noho toa tonu te tohutohu o te whakaaturanga." E ai ki a Mark Lawson o te Kaitiaki, "Ko te rangatū tuawaru o te wero patisserie tino nui e āhei ana ki te āhua ōrite, engari he rerekē noa iho." I tuhituhi a Frances Taylor o te Radio Times: "He āhua taratara i ngā tapa, he iti noa iho te tahuna i waho. Engari ko tā mātou Bake Off tonu." Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: E whakaarohia ana te utu utunga o te Rerewhenua Taitapa
summary: E whakaaro ana te Kaunihera Taitapa o Pirihitini ki te tapahi i te utu katoa o tana koha ki te Rerewhenua Taitapa.
text: I tēnei wā he toenga tārewa o te £7.7m hei utu i waenganui i tēnei wā me te 2045 - 30 tau i muri i te oma o ngā tereina tuatahi i waenganui i Tweedbank me Edinburgh. Heoi anō, ināianei kei te tonoa kia tono moni ināianei tonu hei utu i taua tapeke. Kua huatau tētahi pūrongo ki te mana ā rohe ka taea te tiaki i te £4.3m i te wā roa. I kitea e te whanaketanga o te Rerewhenua Taitapa te SBC e whakaae ana ki a Transport Scotland ki te utu i te £15.3m ki ngā utu i ngā utu 2012. I whakahekea tērā e te £6.8m nā ngā utu kua puta kētia e te mana ā rohe, ka waiho he toenga o te £8.4m kia utua i roto i te 30 tau. I tēnei wā e tū ana te whika i te £7.7m, engari e herea ana ki te utunga o te taupū utu hokohoko (RPI). E huatau ana kia whai painga te kaunihera i te utu iti o te nama hei utu i taua nama. I roto i ngā tau e 29 e whai ake nei ka whakahekea ngā utu mō te £4.3m i whakaritea ki te mahi o nāianei.

title: I whiua e ngā tāngata neke atu i te £250k te tāhae wheketere o Scunthorpe
summary: Tokorua ngā tāngata i tāhaetia neke atu i te £230,000 o ngā pānga mai i tētahi wheketere, kua whakatārewatia.
text: I tāhaetia e Mark Elston, e 48, me tōna hoa ko Tim Barry, e 49, nga wāhanga mīhini mai i te tipu o Tata Steel i roto i te rua tau. I rongo te Kōti Karauna o Hull i whakamahia e Elston tōna tūnga hei kaiwhakahaere i te umanga ki te whakaputa i ngā whakahau kōrero mō ngā kawenga, i tīkina e Barry i muri iho. I tautohe te tokorua ki ngā tatau tāhae e toru i ngā whakarongo o mua. I whiwhi a Elston i tētahi whiu whare herehere e rua tau i whakatārewatia mo te rua tau, ā, ko Barry, o Newton Aycliffe, Durham, he wā 14 marama i whakatārewatia hoki mo te rua tau. I kī ngā Rōia hākinakina, neke atu i te 660 ngā pānga e wātea ana mō te £233,000 i tāhaetia i waenganui i a Hōngongoi 2012 me Whiringa 2014, ā, i hokona tonutia, me Elston rāua ko Barry e wehe ōrite ana i ngā hua. I whakaahuatia e Jeremy Evans, mai i te Ratonga Ture Karauna, a Elston, o Messingham, North Lincolnshire, he "tauira tauhira o tētahi tangata hara kara mā nui". "Ko tana kaupapa whakahau he tino hākinakina," te kī a Tēnā Evans. "I whai a ia ki te whakarewa i tētahi moni whiwhi māhorahora kē me te hara i āta whakaritea, hei tautoko i tētahi āhua noho tiketike." I hokona e Tata Steel te wheketere i te tau 2016 ki tētahi umanga pūtea penapena ā-UK, nāna i whakaingoa anō te kamupene British Steel.

title: E tohutohu ana a Asda me Boots i te whakahōutanga o te pūnaha mokatere 'pakaru'
summary: Kua tuhituhi ngā rangatira o ngā kaihoko neke atu i te 50 tae atu ki a Asda me Boots ki te tumuaki e whakahau ana i a ia kia huri i ngā ture tāke hei whakarewa i te Tiriti Teitei o UK.
text: I kī te rōpū e hiahia ana kia whakatikaina e ia te "pūnaha utu pakihi pakaru", e kīia ana e ia kua tawhito. E kī ana kua peke te tāke i te 50% mai i ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, ā, kua āwhina ki ētahi kaihoko e haere ana i waho o te umanga. I kī te Pūtea Moni kua pānuitia he pūtea £3.6bn i tērā marama "hei tautoko i ā mātou Tiriti Tiketike me ngā pūtahi taone". "Ka whakapuakina e te tumuaki ētahi atu taipitopito o te kaupapa here a te kāwanatanga i ngā wiki me ngā marama e heke mai nei," ka tāpiritia. I roto i te reta ki te tumuaki, i whakaritea e te tinana hokohoko o te British Retail Consortium, ka whakamātauria e te rōpū ko te wāhanga hokohoko e 5% o te whakahaerenga, engari i utua e ia te 25% o ngā utu pakihi katoa, he tāke ā-āhuatanga. E kī ana "ko tēnei rerekētanga" e tūkino ana i ngā Tiriti Tiketike me te "tūkino i ngā hapori e tautokona ana e rātau". Ko te hua, i kī te rōpū he nui haere te maha o ngā toa wātea, me ngā utu wātea i te whā me te hāwhe tau te teitei. Ko ngā utu pakihi he tāke mo nga āhuatanga e whakamahia ana mo te pakihi. E whakahaua ana rātau e te kaunihera paetata, engari i tautuhia e te kāwanatanga matua. Ko ngā kairīhi, ngā rangatira rānei o ngā tari, ngā toa, ngā pāpara, me ngā whare putunga e utu katoa ana i ngā utu pakihi. I kī atu a Hemi Lowman, te rangatira nui o te Association of Convenience Stores, ki te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā o TE WĀ: "He pūnaha tino tawhito tēnei, i hoahoatia mō tētahi wā he hokohoko ōkiko anake, me ngā tāngata e mahi pakihi ana mai i ngā kāinga ōkiko. Kua roa tēnā e huri ana. "Ko te mea nui rawa ko te āhua o te whakararuraru ki te pūtea penapena - nō reira ki te tango koe i tētahi toa hokohoko, ā, ka whakapai ake koe, ka hoatu e koe ngā mea ehara i te mea hira noa iho ki te umanga, engari he mea hira pea ki taua hapori, pēnei i te CCTV, ngā paepae kōmaru pea, te mau mai i tētahi mīhini moni, e kite ana i ō pire utu pakihi. " Ināianei ko te tikanga ko tērā atu huarahi. Ko te tikanga kia whakahauhau me te whakahauhau i te pūtea penapena, kaua e whiu i ngā umanga mōna." I waenganui i ētahi atu mea, e hiahia ana te rōpū kia nui ake ngā utu pakihi i Rāwāhi me te Rāwhiti ki te Tonga hei tango i te pēhanga i ngā kamupene i te Raki me te Midlands. Heoi anō, i kī hoki e hiahia ana ki te karo i te pikinga tāke katoa. "Te āhua nei kei te nui haere te tūponotanga o tētahi Brexit kore, e whakapono ana mātou ka nui ake te uaua ki ngā kaihoko i te UK," te kī a te reta. "I tēnei horopaki, he tino hira te whakaaro o te pirimia ki te whai i tētahi mōkī ohaoha hei whakarewa i ngā umanga me te pūtea penapena i te UK; E tino whakapono ana mātou ko te whakahōutanga o te pūnaha mokatere pakihi pakaru me noho ki mua me te pokapū o taua pōkai." E toru miriona ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana e ngā kaihoko i te UK, ā, ko te umanga te kaitukumahi tūmataiti nui rawa o UK, e ai ki te British Retail Consortium. Ehara i te mea ko te wāhanga hokohoko anake e tono ana i ngā mana uru hei āwhina i a ia ki te whakarite mō tētahi Brexit kāore he mahi. Hei tauira, kua tonoa e te umanga kai o UK ki te kāwanatanga kia whakakore i ngā āhuatanga o te ture whakataetae kia āhei ai ngā kamupene ki te whakariterite me te whakahaere i ngā whakarato ki a rātou anō i muri i te kore mahi. I tērā taha, ko te pūtea kāwanatanga hei āwhina i ngā kamupene UK ki te whakatikatika i tētahi pūnaha tikanga kāore i te mahi, i pūrongotia e te hōtaka Newsnight a TE AO i tērā wiki. I a Hakihea, ka whakakitea e te Treasury me HM Revenue & Customs tētahi pūtea whakangungu £8m ka taea e ngā kamupene me ngā takawaenga hokohoko, pēnei i ngā kaituku utanga, te tono, engari e 741 noa iho ngā kamupene kua tono mō ngā rawa.

title: E3 2017: Ka pūmatua a Mario i te hokinga mai o Nintendo
summary: Kua tautuhia te hokinga mai o Super Mario hei whakatutukitanga tino nui i roto i tētahi tau whakaora whakamīharo kē mō Nintendo.
text: Ko te kaipānui hangarau o Amerika ki te Raki kāore i māharahara ngā kaipānui pono (ā, ko taku tikanga pono), engari he maha ngā tāngata - i roto i a au - e pātai ana ki te kaha o Nintendo ki te whakataetae tūturu ki a Kapa me Microsoft i te mākete papatohu. Ko te Wii U - he whai ake i te Wii tino angitu - kua tarava, ā, ko te papatohu hou, ko te Whakawhiti, te āhua nei he tino taketake rawa hei pānga. Heoi anō i te E3 i tēnei tau, kei te kī tonu te kamupene i te maia. Kua utua tana rautaki. "Te āhua nei kua whakahokia mai te mojo a Nintendo," te kī a Tom Phillips, te kaiwhakatika rongokōrero i Eurogamer. "Ka titiro koe ki te wāhi e whakaritea ana a Nintendo ināianei ki te 12 marama ki mua, he tino pō me te ao. I tino hurihia e rātau ngā mea." I te mātakitaki i te Wii, ka tīmata te Whakawhiti ki tētahi tīmatanga pupuhi i te putanga mai o Poutāpeta. I hokona e ia e tata ana ki te toru miriona ngā wae i te marama tuatahi, nā reira ko te papatohu hokohoko tere rawa a te kamupene. Ko te putanga nui tuatahi - Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - kua whakaarohia ināianei ko tētahi o ngā kēmu tino pai i hangaia, he maha miriona ngā tārua i hokona. Nā reira he whakamaumahara i te wā tika, ki te whakawā i ngā papatohu kēmu i runga i te hiko tukatuka, i te āheinga whakairoiro pono rānei, ka rite ki te arotake i tētahi pikitia i runga anake i te kounga o tōna CGI. Ko te mea e tukuna tonutia ana e Nintendo ko te auahatanga kāore e taea e ētahi atu kaiwhakaputa. Kaua e hē, ehara te pōhēhētanga mau tonu o ngā taitara pēnei i a Mario (Zelda rānei) i te nostalgia, engari he waihanga anō. I hipa atu te Whakawhiti i ngā tūmanako o mua o te kamupene, nā reira ināianei he nui ake te hiahia. Neke atu i te 100 miriona ngā wae i hokona e te Wii i roto i tōna oranga e waru tau. Ka taea tēnā te tārua? "E kore ahau e teka ki a koe, ko te Wii tētahi mea e titiro ana mātou," te kī a Nicolas Wegnez, te kaiwhakahaere ahuwhānui mō Nintendo i te UK, ki te HAU. "E tino hiahia ana mātou ki te hoki ki taua ara tipu o te menemene i te tokomaha atu o ngā tāngata e tākaro ana i ngā hua Nintendo." Hei āwhina i taua whāinga, ka huri anō a Nintendo ki tōna whetū nui rawa. Ko Super Mario Odyssey - i pānuitia tōna rā tuku o Whiringahora i te Tūtira - kei roto ko te whāinga tuatahi o te paramu pūkoro ki te ao "tūturu" i a ia, i roto i te taumata kotahi, e noho ana i tētahi wā i roto i te āhua o tētahi taone tūturu, i whakaahuatia ki Niu Ioka. E wātea ana koe ki te tīpokapoka me te mahi i ngā tūmahi i a koe anō - pēhi tonu ki te pūrākau matua, te nekeneke rānei i a koe ki ētahi atu mahi. He rite tonu ki te Grand Theft Auto, engari kei te āwhina koe i ngā tāngata, kaua e tākaro i a rātou ki te kanohi. Tērā tētahi pūkaha kēmu hōu e whakamahi ana i ngā pūmana nekehanga-rua o te Whakawhiti; ka whiua e te piu o ngā ringa te pōtae hou o Mario - e kiia nei ko Cappy - ki tētahi ahunga hei hinga i ngā hoariri, i te tauwhiti rānei ki ngā ahanoa. E kore e taea te mōhio tūturu ki te kounga o tētahi kēmu i roto i tētahi pokapū hui turituri, nā reira ka waiho e au ērā e mōhio ake ana i a au ki te tuku i te whakataunga pono o te kēmu ina tukua. Tae noa ki taua wā, ka tukua e Nintendo ngā Ringa - he kēmu whawhai e tārere ana ngā tāngata i o rātau ringa huri noa i a mātau i konei - me Splatoon 2, he pūtiro peita whakataetae e whakaatu ana i ngā kēmu, e whakatūria ana e Nintendo hei panekōrero hākinakina. OK me te kore 4K? Engari ko te raruraru o Nintendo tētahi kua anga atu ki a ia mo te neke atu i te tekau tau ināianei. E tino whakawhirinaki ana tōna papatohu ki ngā kēmu i hangaia e ngā tipua i roto i tōna ake kamupene. Ko ngā kēmu hunga-tuatoru, i te nuinga o te wā, he rite tonu ki ngā tangata whenua tuarua i runga i ngā pūhara o Nintendo ina whakaritea ki te mahinga i te Xbox me te PlayStation. I te tīmatanga o aua papatohu ki te tuku i ngā arokite 4K katoa, ka whānui ake taua āputa i te kounga. "Ko te taumira [4K] tētahi mea he wāhanga o te kaupapa, engari ki a mātou he nui ngā mahi hou ina whakaaro koe ki a koe i roto i te Whakawhiti," te kī a Tēnā Wegnez. "Kei te haere mātou ki tētahi huarahi e arotahi ana ki ngā huarahi tākaro hou, ngā wheako kēmu hōu." He auaha te wheako kēmu i te Whakawhiti, engari ehara i te neke whakaharahara i kitea e mātau i te putanga mai o te Wii, i reira i haere ai ngā kēmu mai i te pēhi pātene i tō rūma moe ki te poipoi hoari i roto i te rūma noho me tō whanau. I rawaka taua pekenga anake hei akiaki i te Wii ki ngā hokonga whakamīharo, engari kāore e taea e te Whakawhiti te kohikohi i taua nui o te āwhina ki ngā pūmārō mātauranga anake - ā, kāore he taitara hunga-tuatoru anō, tērā pea he tuanui ki te angitu o te Whakawhiti. "Ehara mātau i te kamupene nui pērā ki o mātau tauwhāinga," e whakaae ana a Tēnā Wegnez. "Me rerekē tā mātou mahi. I tino aroha mātou ki ā mātou hua." ___________ Whāia a Dave Lee i Twitter @DaveLeeBBC Ka taea e koe te toro haumaru atu ki a Dave mā te taupānga karere whakamuna Signal i: +1 (628) 400-7370

title: Mahere pōturi: Te whakamahere i ngā ara hīkoi o Ingarangi
summary: E mōhio ana koe ki te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te hīkoi mai i Leeds ki Manchester? Mai i Tring ki Milton Keynes, i Carlisle rānei ki Inverness? Ki te kore, ehara koe i te mea ko koe anake.
text: Nā David SillitoMedia and Arts Correspondent E noho ana tātau i tētahi wā ka whakaaturia mai e ā mātou waea te ara tere rawa ki ngā wāhi katoa - mēnā kei te taraiwa tātau, arā. E hīkoi ana? Ā, he take kē tēnā. Kei te tuku rongoā a Geographer Daniel Raven-Ellison; he mahere hou i hangaia e ngā tūao i te wā o te raka hei whakaatu i ngā ara hīkoi tino pai i waenganui i ngā taone matua katoa o Ingarangi. Ko ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana ināianei ko te 10,000 ngā kaihīkoi hiahia ki te whakamātau i ngā ara i runga i tana "mahere pōturi". Ko tētahi wāhanga o ngā tohutohu waka mana a te kāwanatanga i te wā o te taiepa ko te "hīkoi, mēnā ka taea e koe". He pai mō te pupuri i te mate me te paheketanga. He pai hoki mo to tātau hauora. Heoi anō, ina haere atu koe i tō rohe paetata, kāore i te mārama me pēhea te kimi i te ara hīkoi pai rawa atu ki tētahi kāinga pātata, ki te hiahia rānei koe - ki tētahi taone, taone rānei e noho tata ana. Koia tērā e tūmanakohia ana ka whakaotia mā te mahere pōturi. 'Pēnei i te pereti spaghetti' I tauria e Tēnā Raven-Ellison e 700 ngā tūao i te wā o te raka ā-motu i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ki te tā i ngā ara tino pai i waenganui i ngā taone me ngā tāone o Ingarangi, e tohu ana i ngā "ara pōturi" e 7,000 mō te tangata e hiahia ana ki te karo i ngā motokā, i ngā waka tūmatanui rānei i tētahi haerenga roa ake. Ko te nuinga o ngā huarahi pōturi e whai ana i ngā ara rongonui, engari i te nuinga o te wā he tawhiti rawa atu ki te mahi ko tēhea hei whakamahi, me pēhea rānei e tae pai ai ki a rātou. "Ki te titiro koe ki te mahere o Ingarangi kua hipokina e ngā ara waewae," tana kī. "Engari he āhua rite ki te pereti spaghetti. He tawhiti rawa atu i te mārama he aha ngā ara tino pai mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te hīkoi mai i tētahi taone ki tētahi taone." Ināianei e hiahia ana ia ki ētahi atu tūao hei whakamātau i ngā ara kia haumaru, kia hīkoi, kia pai hoki. Ko te āhua o te ara tino pai i runga i te mahere, ko te mea pono, he poharu, he rākau otaota kāore e taea te haere, he kōpikopiko kino rānei. Kei te kaupapa te tautoko a te Ordnance Survey, e whakaaro ana ki te tāpiri i ngā ara pōturi ki tōna pātengi raraunga tuihono. I te wā o te raka, ka piki ake ngā rapunga mō ngā mokowā kākāriki taone i runga i te pātengi raraunga OS e 949%. I te hōpara waewae te tangata i o rātau wāhi noho i runga i te waewae i runga i te āhua o te tokomaha, he mea hou rawa. I tipu ake te mahere pōturi i te hiahia o te tangata kia tīpokapoka kē atu i o rātau tatau. 'He rauemi ā-motu' Ko tētahi raruraru e ngana ana te mahere ki te whakatau, i a ia e taraiwa ana, ā, ka nui haere ngā ara pahikara e puta ake ana i runga i ngā nekeneke waea, he tawhiti rawa atu ngā ara hīkoi, i te nuinga o te wā ka mau i ngā tāngata i runga i ngā huarahi kāore he ara, i runga rānei i ngā huarahi roa koretake. Tērā anō, he taupānga hīkoi ka taea te whakaatu i ētahi atu ara rata ki te hunga haere, engari ko te nuinga o te wā, i hoahoatia hei tāutu i te ara ātaahua tino pai, kaua ko te hīkoi tino pai. Engari he nui ake tēnei i te haere mai me ētahi ara huatau - he ngana ki te waihanga i tētahi pūnaha huarahi waewae, he whiringa pōturi ki ā mātou huarahi matua me ngā huarahi. Kāore tētahi tangata i roto i te kaupapa e tūmanako ana kia tukua e te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ngā motokā me te hīkoi mai i tētahi taone ki tētahi taone i ia rā. Engari e tūmanako ana rātau ka taea e ia te miramira i ngā mano o ngā ara poto ake, kia ngāwari ake ai te kite i te tūhonotanga o ngā kāinga me ngā kāinga ki a rātou anō. Ehara i te utauta noa iho hei whakahauhau i a tātau kia hīkoi anō, he utauta whakahauhau. Ina kitea he ara, he mea hei tiaki, hei whakapai ake. Kātahi anō ka nui ake i te rauemi hōu noa iho, he tikanga e ngana ana ki te huri i tētahi taupatupatu. Ko te hīkoi, i tētahi taumata, he ngohe paetata, ia rā hoki hei whakaputa i te aro nui o te motu. Ina tomo te hīkoi ki te ao tōrangapū, he nui ake i te hīkoi, i te hīkoi rānei e kōrerorerotia ana e te tangata. He roa te hītori tōrangapū o te hīkoi e hono ana ki te mana ki te tīpokapoka me te uru ki te taiwhenua, engari i te mutunga o te wā he pakanga tēnei mo tētahi mahi whakangahau, he mahi whakangahau i te mutunga wiki e pā ana ki ngā pūtu pakari me ngā tōkena mātotoru. E whai ana te mahere pōturi ki te whakarewa i te tūnga o te hīkoi i roto i tā mātou kōrerorero ā-motu, kia kitea ehara i te mea he mahi pai noa iho, he mahi hauora, engari he wāhanga o tā mātou hanganga waka ā-motu. Hei tauira, e kore pea e tino pai ngā tau e haere ana mai i Tring ki Milton Keynes. Engari mēnā ko ngā haerenga ngāwari rawa i waenganui i ngā paetata, ko te karo i ngā waka i runga i ngā huarahi kore kohatu, he tokomaha pea o tātau e kite ana i te hīkoi whai hua anake ki o tātau motokā, kātahi ki ngā ara taiwhenua kua tohua kia hoki ki o tātau waka. Ko te mahere hōu he ngana ki te tāutu i tētahi rauemi ā-motu me te arotahi ki tōna tiaki me te whakapai ake. He maha ngā huarahi ohorere e huri ana te Coronavirus i te oranga, ā, ko te hunga e whakaaro ana kia nui ake te hīkoi hei wāhanga o tō tātau oranga ināianei, he utauta hou tā rātou. Ehara ngā mahere i te whakaahua noa iho i te ao, ka taea e rātou te āwhina ki te whakarerekē. Hei mōhio anō mō te mahere pōturi, pāwhiri ki konei.

title: Kua tautuhia te whenua tōrangapū Pāniora mō te wā hou
summary: He koha cherries. He nui te harakore. Heoi anō, ehara te pōti nui o Paniora i te wā mo nga kaipōrangapū ki te whakamatautau i te tūponotanga.
text: Nā Shaun LeyPresenter, The World This Weekend, Madrid Nā reira, i te huihuinga o ngā kāmera i a Esperanza Aguirre i te wā o tētahi hīkoi whakahau, ka kite ahau kāore a ia e pūkoro i ngā cherries i homai ki a ia e te kaihoko. Engari, ka tohaina e ia. Kāore e taea te hoko i tētahi tangata mō te ringa o ngā cherries, ā, ko Ms Aguirre - te Countess of Murillo me Bornos me tētahi minita kāpata o mua - ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakawāwā tino kōrero o te ahurea hāmate i ētahi wāhi o ngā tōrangapū Pāniora. Ko ia, me ōna hoa mema o te Partido Popular (PP) e mahi ana mō ngā tau e rima kua taha, e whakararuraru ana i te whakatutukitanga tohu a te kāwanatanga - e whakaū ana i te āhua o te āhua o te PP. Ko ia nāna i kī atu ki te Pirimia, a Mariano Rajoy, me whakapōhēhē e ia mo te whakapōhēhē a te rōpū. Ko te ara whakahau, mā ētahi o ngā tiriti tino huatau o Madrid, ka mauria mātau ki te Tapawhā o Margaret Thatcher. Ka whakaarahia mai e Ms Aguirre huatau, nāna te Ingarangi i whakarite he wahine hōnore, ki te whakapakoko ingoa i te tapawhā, e pātai mai ana ki a au mehemea ko Madrid anake te taone i hoatu ki te pirimia o Ingarangi o mua. Ko ngā kaitākaro hōu i tētahi ara, he āhua rite ngā tōrangapū Pāniora ki ngā tōrangapū o Ingarangi o ngā tau tuatahi o Mīhana Thatcher i Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti: he rōpū tūturu me tētahi rōpū manapori, he maha ngā wehenga, engari he kaha rawa ētahi atu rōpū he kaitākaro paetata anake i roto i tētahi whakahau pōti nui. Ko ngā kōwae nui e rua, ko PP me tōna tauwhāinga, ko PSOE, ko te hua o tētahi whakararuraru hītori i muri mai i te matenga o Gen Franco i te tau 1975. Ko te tikanga, i tātuhia e ngā pūkenga me ngā ā ihupuku he raina i raro i ngā wehenga o mua. I pōturi, he tokomaha o rātau i whakaurua ki roto i ēnei rōpū nunui e rua. Mai i tērā wā, kua whiriwhiria e rātau te mana, i ētahi wā me ngā rōpū iti iho e tautoko ana i a rātau. Heoi anō, tērā pea he pōti tēnei e huri ana i ērā mea katoa. E whakataetae ana i te mana i Paniora Podemos: Ko te rōpū parirau mauī i whakatūria i te tau 2014 e te ahorangi o te whare wānanga o Pablo Iglesias Pāniora Te Rōpū Kaimahi Manapori Pāniora (PSOE): Te rōpū mauī o waenganui-mauī kua kaha kē atu ki te PP mai i te tau 1982 Ciudadanos (Tangata whenua): I hangaia te rōpū Centrist i Catalonia i te tau 2006 e ātete ana i te rangatiratanga o Catalan i mua i te haerenga ki te motu i te tau 2013 Partido Popular (People's Party, PP): Te rōpū matau o te Pirimia Mariano Rajoy,  i roto i te mana mai i Tīma 2011 I roto i ngā rā e toru i pau i a au i runga i te huarahi whakahau, ka kī mai ngā kaipōrangapū mai i te taha matau me te mauī, tae atu ki ngā tohutohu, i kōrero mai ki a au i taua mea anō: ko te tikanga o te tiango o te ohaoha me te hāmate, kāore tētahi o ngā rōpū nunui e toa hāngai, ā, ko te tikanga o te pikinga nui o ngā rōpū tōrangapū hou e rua, e kore pea rātau e wikitoria anō. Ko tētahi ko Podemos, i arahina e te rangatira o Pablo Iglesias, he taitamariki mātauranga, i a au i konei mo te pōti nui whakamutunga e rima tau ki mua, ko tētahi o ngā tohunga o te Ao Tēnei Mutunga Wiki. I roto i te taupatupatu a nga kaiārahi pouaka whakaata i tērā wiki, ka tū a ia nā tōna hiku me ōna kahu takahuri. Heoi anō, ko Podemos, he rōpū toitū i tipu ake i ngā whakahēnga tiriti e kiia nei ko "ngā whakarihariha" - ko ētahi o ngā rangatahi o Paniora he wāhanga o te hunga mahi, engari kāore he mahi - tērā pea kua eke ki te taumata. I kite ahau i te hiranga o te rōpū hou rawa, a Ciudadanos (Tangata whenua), i te haerenga ki tētahi tapa taone ki te uru, o Pozuelo. I tētahi hararei tūmatanui inā noa nei, i te kaha o te mārire o ōna tiriti, ā, i te nui o ngā rākau me ngā taiepa kua tapahia māriretia, kāore ngā oro o te taone i uru. Kei mua o te teihana rerewhenua, e rua ngā wā e haere ana ōna kaihaere rekereke i ia rā, he pānui whakaahua e whakaatu ana i tētahi taitama āhua nui. I ngā tau tata nei, ka whakatakoto tahanga a Albert Rivera kia aro atu, arā, i te mea he toa kauhoe ia o mua, ehara pea i te uauatanga. Ahakoa rā, i tēnei rā, ko Ciudadanos, te rōpū e ārahi ana ia, e pōti tonu ana i te 20%. Ehara i te mea kino mo te mea i tīmata hei rōpū e ātete ana ki te rangatiratanga o Catalan, e rua tau noa iho nei. I muri i te kōrerorero ki ētahi tangata whenua e hākinakina ana i tētahi kawhe hararei i roto i te hau mārire, ka noho ahau ki a Prof Luis Garicano. Kai runga a ia i te hapati mai i te Kura Ohaoha o Rāwāhi, e whakahauhau ana i runga i te ngākau nui o te tauhou tōrangapū ko ia. Mehemea ka toa a Ciudadanos i te pōti, ka noho a ia hei minita pūtea. Engari he pono, i kī ahau, he rōpū hou, iti iho hoki i te PP, i te PSOE rānei, ka taea anake te tūmanako hei hoa tauwhāinga? E kī ana a Prof Garicano kua ako a Tēnā Rivera i te tūponotanga o nga Pāremata Liberali i Ingarangi (ehara pea i te mea mīharo, i te mea he hoa te ahorangi ki a Nick Clegg rāua ko tana wahine, a Miriama Gonzalez Durantez; I te Kāreti o Uropi rāua katoa). "E kore mātou e haere ki tētahi kāwanatanga kāore mātou i te whakahaere," tana kī mai ki a au. Tērā pea kua mate te pūnaha rōpū rua tawhito, i kī a Prof Garicano. Te hanganga me te hāmate Ki te pērā, ko tētahi whare ka taea te tiaki hei whakamaharatanga ki tōna whakangaromanga e takoto ana i Valdemoro, he taone iti tata ki te 27km ki te tonga o Madrid. Kei runga ake i te pāka, i runga tonu i te pāka, me te tirohanga ātaahua ki te taone, he whare nui, kua mahue, kāore anō kia oti. Ehara tēnā i te mea rerekē i Paniora. Ko te take, ko te pikinga o ngā utu āhuatanga me te hanganga i muri mai, ko tētahi o ngā take i hinga ai te āhua o te mahi Pāniora. Ko te katoa, e 2,000 ngā rangatira kua honoa ki ngā kerēme hāmate, ā, ko te nuinga o tēnā e pā ana ki te whakawhiwhinga o te whakaaetanga whakarite me ngā whakangāwari mō ngā kirimana. E whakapono ana ngā tangata whenua ka noho tēnei hei kāinga rangatira mō Francisco Granados. I te wā kotahi te koromatua i konei, kātahi ia ka noho ko te upoko o te peka o PP o Madrid tae noa ki te tau 2011. I taua wā, e ai ki te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike, ko ia "te uho o te rōpū hara", ko tētahi i hua ai he toenga hauora i roto i tētahi pūkete pēke o Huiterangi. I kī ngā rōia i hangaia e ia rāua ko Rawiri Marjaliza, i te hanganga, he kaupapa whakatakotoranga, me te 250m hōro (£180m) te wāriu o ngā kirimana tūmatanui i whakawhiwhia i roto i ngā tau e rua kua hipa. I tērā tau, i hereheretia te rangatira PP o mua i runga i ngā utu tuatahi o te horoi moni, te pāhonotanga hara, te hokohoko whakaawe, te utu whakapati, te hē o ngā moni, te tūkino i te mana me te tinihanga. Ko te whare, me tōna pourewa, ngā matapihi pakaru me te taiapa waea kāniwha pakaru, ka taea te karanga ko "Granados's Folly" - hāunga ehara i te mea ko ngā kaipōrangapū PP anake i mau i roto i te heitara. Tērā anō ētahi hāpori. Ahakoa tērā, ka kī mai a Antonio Hernando, he MP me te kaikorero mō PSOE, ki a au ko ngā Hāpori - i panaia mai i te tari, i te tīmatanga o te raruraru o te ohaoha - ka puta mai hei rōpū nui rawa, ahakoa ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te tomo mātou ki tētahi wā kāore anō mātou kia mōhio mai i te tauwhiro o Paniora ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi." Ko te tikanga o tēnā, ko te mahi mahi ki a Ciudadanos, ki Popodemos rānei. I te kōanga, nā tētahi momo whakaaetanga ōrite i ārai ai a Ms Aguirre kia noho hei rangatira, ahakoa i toa a PP i te wāhanga nui rawa o te pōti me te nui rawa o ngā tūru kaunihera. I taku pātai atu ki a ia he aha i kore ai ia i toa, ka whakatikaina ahau e ia ki te āhua o te wero e tika ana i Margaret Thatcher Square. "I toa ahau i te pōti, engari i whai mana te toa o te hunga ngaro," tana kī. I muri i te Rātapu a tērā Rātapu, tērā pea ko te tangi ā iwi o te PP. Haupae whare i te pōtitanga o Paniora: Te whakahoki i ngā whare noho o Pārera Mātauranga i Murcia: E karanga ana ngā kaipōti o Paniora ki te rūrū i roto i te akomanga Te iwi whānui ā-taiwhenua o Paniora i te Raki: E ātete ana i te huringa i tētahi kāinga e mate ana

title: Hull telecoms company KCOM backs new £563m takeover bid
summary: Kua waihotia e te kamupene pūkoro ā-Hull KCOM tētahi whakahaere a tētahi o ngā moni penihana nui rawa o Ingarangi i muri i tētahi tono hōu i tāpiritia e tata ana ki te £60m ki tōna uara.
text: I tāruatia e te umanga - rongonui mō ōna pouaka waea tae kirīmi - tētahi tono £504m e te Aronui Penihana o ngā Whare Wānanga (USS). Engari ināianei kei te tautoko tōna poari i tētahi tono £563m mai i Macquarie Infrastructure and Real Assets (MIRA). Kei a KCOM tētahi mana whakahaere mō ngā pūkoro i Hull me ētahi atu wāhi o Te Rāwhiti o Aotearoa, ka tukua e te kamupene ngā ratonga ā-reo me ngā ratonga ā-ipurangi ki ngā kiritaki me ngā umanga e 140,000 puta noa i te taone - ko te wāhanga anake o te UK kāore he wāhi nui ake o BT. Neke atu i te 50,000 ngā tāngata i Hull i hoko hea i KCOM i te wā e mānu ana i te London Stock Exchange i te tau 1999 me te utu tiritiri o te 225p. E uara ana te tāpae hōu i ōna hea i te 108p ia, mai i te tāpae 97p-a-tiri i tāpaetia e USS i Aperira. I kī a Patrick De Smedt, te manukura tōmua o KCOM: "Mā tēnei tāpae e whakarato ana i ā mātou kaipupuri moni nui ake mō ā rātou hea, tae atu ki te whakarato i a KCOM ki tētahi hoa kaha i a mātou e mahi ana ki te pupuri, ki te hanga me te whakarei ake i tā mātou whakahere me tā mātou tūnga." I kī te kaikōrero MIRA a Leigh Harrison: "He kaha te tuku iho paetata a KCOM kua hangaia neke atu i te rau tau, ā, kua tino whakatūria kia haere tonu ki te whakatutuki i ngā hiahia torotoro waea o te rohe." I muri i te tukunga a te kamupene i tētahi whakatūpato hua i tērā tau, i muri mai i te aho o ngā huringa whakahaere, tae atu ki te whakakapinga o tōna rangatira nui me te rangatira pūtea. I roto i tana pūrongo hāwhe tau i tērā tau, i pūrongotia e KCOM he hinganga o ngā hua, i te wā i piki ake te nama kupenga i te 60% ki te £108.5m nā te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā hanganga puta noa i tōna whatunga Hull me East Yorkshire. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka taea e ngā mahi te haere i waenganui i ngā whakahekenga o te Kaunihera o Moray
summary: Neke atu i te 130 ngā mahi ka taea te haere ki te Kaunihera o Moray i te wā e rapu ana te mana ki te penapena pūtea pauna maha.
text: Kua hoatu e ngā kaikaunihera te rama kākāriki kia neke atu i te £5m penapena a tērā tau, ā, ka kitea pea ki te 136 ngā ngaronga mahi. Ko te whakahaeretanga SNP iti - i whakaaetia i June - i kī kua tukua ki te karo i ngā whakahōutanga whakahau ki te wāhi e taea ai. Ināianei ka uiui te kaunihera ki nga kaimahi. 'Ngā wā uaua' Ka uiui hoki te mana ki te iwi whānui mō ētahi atu penapena tae atu ki te tapahi i ngā haora puna, te tapahi i te tiriti me te kati i te Pokapū Hapori o Elgin. Council leader Graham Leadbitter said: "There can be no doubt that there are difficult times ahead but we'll continue to invest where this will make a significant contribution towards delivering the council's vision of making life better for everyone in Moray. " Heoi anō, e mōhio ana tātau katoa ehara tēnei i te mea ngāwari, ā, ka tautuhia ki tētahi horopaki o te haere tonu o ngā herenga pūtea mo te wā roa, ko te tikanga me huri ngā mea, ā, ka mutu ētahi mea. "Unfortunately this will lead to redundancies within our workforce, and we're working with staff to support them through a consultation process."

title: Mā te mura o te tipu Mossmorran ka 'wiriwiri' ngā whare o Fife
summary: Na te mura tē whakaritea i tētahi tipu matū o Fife i wiriwiri ai ngā whare, ā, ka kōruru ngā matapihi me ngā tatau, ka kī ngā tangata whenua.
text: Nā Angie BrownBBC Pākehā, Etinitini me te Rāwhiti kaipānui i whakatūpatotia tuatahitia e te haruru i muri mai i te haruru nui i te 09:50. I pūrongotia e ētahi he turituri pēnei i te "mīhini rererangi auau" me te kī i "tino riri" rātau mo taua āhuatanga. I whakapārewa ngā rangatira o ExxonMobil, a, ka kī kua tū te mura i muri i te ono haora. Na te Scottish Environment Protection Agency (Sepa) i tohutohu i ngā tangata kia pūrongo i tētahi pokenga mā te īmēra. 'Kei te kino ake' i kī atu a Hemi Kei, te manukura o te Rōpū Hohenga Mossmorran, ki te paetukutuku rongokōrero o TE Aotearoa: "Kāore anō kia kōrerotia ngā take, ā, kei te kino haere tonu, ā, kei te auau ake. " Kai te tino riri te iwi ināianei i a rātau e whakamau ana mai i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. "Kāore mātau i whakamōhiotia mō tēnei mura, ā, ko te tuatahi i mōhio ahau i taku rongonga i te haruru nui i runga i te māhunga. He rite ki te mīhini rererangi pūmau. "I pūrongotia e te iwi o rātau tatau me ngā matapihi e wiriwiri ana, e pārekareka ana. " Me tino pākaha ake te aroturuki i tēnei pae." I kī a Rārangi Innes, e 68, e noho ana i Lochgelly e whakarapa ana i te pae, i mua i te Paraire: "I te noho ahau i te kāinga i te wā i whakararurarutia ahau e te haruru me te turituri nui mai i te aronga o te pae, kātahi ka kite ahau i tētahi mura nui, ā, i tino kitea he mea tino mānu nā te mea kāore anō mātou kia whakamōhiotia. " Kei te tino riri ahau mo tenei na te kaha o te haruru ka wiriwiri te whare. I mua i te mura o te mura i te kaha o te kaha. "He turituri rawa ki te hākinakina i te māra, ā, ka whakahokia e taku wahine te horoi horoi nā te mea kāore ia i pīrangi kia tūkinotia o mātau kākahu." I kī a Hakopa McAlister, te kaiwhakahaere tipu i te Fife Ethylene Plant o ExxonMobil: "Kua tīmata anō ngā mahi pūnoa i muri i te tere o te mahi a to mātau tīma ki te whakatika i tētahi take pūkaha i puta i mua i tēnei rā. " E mārama ana mātou ki ngā māharahara, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te tārua i tā mātou whakapāha mō ngā raruraru i puta mai i ngā hapori paetata." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Hēpa: "I tua atu i te whakauru hāngai ki te whakahaeretanga pae, ka tohutohu a Exxonmobil Chemical Ltd kia tīmata anō ngā mahi pūnoa i te 15:25, ā, kua mutu te mura kāore i whakaritea. " Kei te aroturuki tonu ngā tīma ture me te kounga o te hau. Ka homai e SEPA he whakahōutanga anō mō ngā hua i te Mane 17 o Hune."

title: Ngā visa UK: Ko te pū o ngā kaiheke pūkenga tiketike 'me whakakore'
summary: Ko te tikanga kia tangohia te pū o te maha o ngā kaiheke pūkenga tiketike e haere mai ana ki te UK, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo matua i whakaritea e te kāwanatanga i mua i a Pakihi.
text: E kī ana te Komiti Tohutohu Hekenga he nui ake te koha pai o ēnei kaimahi ki ngā moni tūmatanui. E hua ana kia herea ngā kaimahi EU ki ngā ture visa ōrite ki ētahi atu kaiheke. Engari e kī ana tērā pea ka tukuna e te UK he tūnga motuhake ki a rātau i raro i tētahi mahi a Pakihi. Kua kī te kāwanatanga ka "āta whakaarohia" ngā tono a te komiti. I tāruatia e Labour te pūrongo, e karanga ana ki tētahi "mutunga o te whakahāweatanga" ki ngā kaiheke ehara i te EU. I raro i te pūnaha o nāianei, ko ngā kaimahi mai i te Horahanga Ohaoha o Ūropi (EEA) - kei roto ko ngā whenua EU katoa tae atu ki te UK, tae atu ki Nōwei, Tiorangi me Lichtenstein - kia ngahau ki te wāteatanga o te nekeneke, te haere me te mahi i roto i te rohe me te kore visa. E tūtohu ana te komiti i tētahi kaupapahere e āhei ai te urunga nui ake mō te hekenga pūkenga tiketike me te whakawhāiti i te urunga mō ngā kaimahi pūkenga iti. E huatau ana ki te whakaroa i te aronui o nāianei mō ngā kaiheke pūkenga tiketike - e mōhiotia ana he visa Tier 2 - ki ērā mai i ngā whenua EEA hoki. Hei wāhanga o tēnei tukanga, me whakakore te pū o te katoa o ngā kaimahi e whakaaetia ana kia tomo ki raro i te Tier 2, ā, ka whakawhānuitia te awhe o ngā mahi e tika ana mō ngā visa, e kī ana te komiti. Ko te kaupapahere o nāianei ko te whakaae kia 20,700 ngā kaimahi pūkenga tiketike ki UK i ia tau i runga i ngā visa Tier 2. Ko te paepae utu o nāianei mō aua visa ko te £30,000, e kī ana te pūrongo me pupuri. Ka hoatu te manakē matua ki ngā mahi i runga i tētahi "rārangi mahi iti". Ko ngā tauira ko: E ai ki ngā kaimahi pūkenga iti, e kī ana te komiti "kāore i te mōhio me whai ara mahi mō ngā kaimahi pūkenga iti" mai i te EU ki te whakakī i ngā mahi pēnei i te kai, i te manaakitanga rānei. Ko te "okotahi pea" ki tēnei ture mō te ahuwhenua tau, i reira te 99% o ngā kaimahi e haere mai ana i ngā whenua EU. Kāore hoki i te tūtohu kia whai okotahi mō ngā kaimahi e haere mai ana ki UK ki te mahi i te wāhanga tūmatanui. He rerekē ngā ture? E kī ana te komiti - he tohunga takitahi, kāore i te kite i ētahi "take māia hei tuku i tētahi huinga ture rerekē" mō ngā kaimahi mai i te EEA i ērā o ētahi atu whenua - engari rawa mēnā kua tae mai tētahi tūnga pērā hei wāhanga o ngā whakaritenga o Te Pakihi. "Kei te āhua tonu te pānga o te kaiheke ki ngā take pēnei i ō rātou pūkenga, mahi, pakeke me te whakamahinga o ngā ratonga tūmatanui, ā, ehara i te mea taketake i runga i tō rātou iwi," e kī ana. Ka kī tonu te rīpoata kāore he whakaaturanga kua tūkinotia e te hekenga o Ūropi te ora i te UK. Ka whakamutua ka nui ake te utu tāke a ngā kaiheke EU i tā rātou e whiwhi ana i ngā painga, he nui ake te āwhina ki ngā kaimahi NHS i te rongoā e uru ana rātou, ā, kāore he pānga ki ngā pāpātanga hara. E kī ana ko te pānga o ngā hekenga EEA katoa ki te UK mai i te tau 2004 he iti iho i tērā o te hinganga o te uara o te pauna i muri i te pōti taupānga. 'Te arewhana o Te Rūma i roto i te rūma' Nā Dominic Casciani, i whakaritea e ngā Minita kōrero o te kāinga o TE AO tēnei pūrongo nā te mea e hiahiatia ana e rātau he take mārama mō te tūranga o ngā kaimahi o Ūropi i te whenua - me ngā take o te whakamutu i to rātau wāteatanga o te nekeneke. Engari he wawe rawa ki te mōhio e hia ngā tūtohutanga a te komiti ka whakaaetia nā te arewhana o Te Rūma. Nā reira, ahakoa kāore ngā tohunga e hiahia ana ki tētahi mahi nekeneke motuhake mō ngā kaimahi EU ā muri ake (kāore te pūrongo e māharahara ana ki te hunga e noho kē ana i te UK), kāore e whakaaro mēnā he pai, he kino rānei tētahi mahi motuhake mō Ingarangi. Tērā pea ka taea tēnei mahi. E whakatakoto ana te mahere Chequers a te pirimia i tētahi "anga nekeneke" - he pūnaha e āhei ai ngā tangata whenua o Ingarangi me EU ki te ako me te mahi i ērā atu whenua, tērā pea ka honoa ki tētahi mahi hokohoko. Nō reira mēnā ka tukuna e ngā minita he urunga motuhake mō ngā kaimahi EU ā muri ake, hei whakahoki mō tētahi mea e hiahia ana rātou mō te UK, kāore tēnei pūrongo e āwhina i a mātau ki te mōhio mēnā e whai painga ana. 'Pēhanga i runga i te PM' I tonoa te MAC kia mahi i te rangahau i a Hōngongoi 2017 e te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Amber Rudd. E whakaarotia ana ka taea e ia te hanga i te kaupapa here nekeneke a te kāwanatanga i muri i te Pakihi. I kī te kaiāwhina kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Norman Smith, tērā pea ka tīmata a Mrs Me ki te "tātuhi" i ana mahere mō tēnei i te hui a te Rōpū Rangatira o Whiringahora. I tāpiritia e ia ka whakanuia e te rīpoata te pēhanga ki a ia kia kaua e whakararuraru i te wāteatanga o te nekeneke i te wā o nga whakaritenga o Te Wānanga.
