Whakapai ake koa i tō pūtirotiro Tō kaiārahi ki te jargon o Te Pākehā 'He mutunga ki te hekenga pūkenga iti' i kī a Stephen Clarke, te kaitātari ohaoha matua i te Resolution Foundation, mēnā ka whakaaetia ngā tūtohutanga, ka tohu "te huringa nui rawa ki te mākete mahi o UK i roto i tētahi whakatupuranga" ā, ka tohu i tētahi "neke nui" mō ngā wāhanga pēnei i ngā hōtēra me te whakanao kai. Ka kī a ia: "Mēnā ka whakaritea, ka whakamutua e ēnei tono te hekenga pūkenga iti, me te manakē i te hekenga waenganui, pūkenga tiketike hoki i ngā wāhi e iti ana te mahi. I pōhiritia e te Royal College of Nursing ngā tūtohutanga, e kī ana kua roa te UK e whakawhirinaki ana ki te tono i ngā tohunga nēhi mai i te ao. Engari i kī a Ariki Kākāriki o Deddington, te manukura o Migration Watch UK, he "kāpō ki te pānga" o te hekenga EU ki ngā hapori maha. I kī a ia ka "whakaaetia e ngā marohi ngā taumata tiketike tonu o te nekeneke" ā, "ko te putanga whānui ko te whakaiti i te mana nekeneke". Pūrongotia te 'pōhēhē' E kī ana te kāwanatanga ka whakarongo ki te pūrongo me te kawe mai i tētahi pūnaha nekeneke e mahi ana mō te katoa o te UK, ka tāpiri: "He mahi hira, he pai hoki te mahi a ngā tangata EU i roto i tō mātou whakahaerenga me te iwi, ā, e hiahia ana mātou kia haere tonu i muri i to mātau haerenga". I kī te hēkeretari kāinga o te kōruru, a Diane Abbott, ko te tikanga kia "i runga anō i o tātau hiahia ohaoha, i a tātau e tutuki ana i a tātau here ā-ture me te mahi tika i ngā tāngata". "Ko te tikanga o [tēnei] ko te whakamutu i te whakahāweatanga ki ngā kaiheke ehara i te EU, i te nuinga o te Kotahitanga," tana tāpiri mai. Engari i kī a Yvette Kupa, te MP Mahi me te tūru o te Komiti Tīpako o te Take Kāinga, he "pōhēhē" te pūrongo me ngā "āputa nui" i waenganui i ngā rangahau me ngā tūtohutanga a te MAC. "E whakaae ana te MAC kua waiho e rātau te pātahitanga nui i waenganui i te nekeneke me te hokohoko," tana kī. I puta mai te pūrongo hei whika mō te 2017, i whakaaturia ai ko te hekenga kupenga mai i te EU i tōna taumata iti rawa mai i te 2012 - me te hekenga kupenga katoa i te 282,000. E hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki te tapahi i te hekenga kupenga katoa ki te tekau mano.

title: Mātauranga mekemeke: Ko ngā kamupene i runga i ngā ipu kaipuke
summary: I a Alessio De Laureto e whakataka ana i ngā mowhiti kāmeka ki roto i te hinu kōhukihuki, e kī ana a ia e tino hari ana a ia ki te mahi i roto i tētahi pouaka.
text: Nā te kaipānui Pakihi a Haimona FryBusiness Waimarie mō te Itari 30 tau, kāore tana kaihoko rongonui a Don Luigi i runga anō i tētahi mea i hangaia mai i te pepa, i te kirihou rānei. Engari, ka whakahaeretia e ia tana umanga mai i tētahi ipu kaipuke tawhito - ko ngā pouaka tīra e whakapau ana i tō rātou wā ki te huri haere i te ao i runga i ngā kaipuke utanga. A, he tawhiti rawa atu a Tēnā De Laureto i te mokemoke. Ko tana umanga e noho ana i Pop Brixton, he whanaketanga kai arokē me te hokohoko i te tonga o Rānana, e 50 ngā ipu kaipuke o mua, ā, i whakatuwheratia i te tau 2015. Kei roto i ōna hoa noho tata e 15 ētahi atu kaihoko me ngā wharekai, me ngā pae, ngā kaihoko kākahu, me ngā tari mō ētahi atu kamupene tīmata, tae atu ki tētahi kaihanga tukuoro Nihokikorangi. "E tino hari ana ahau ki konei," te kī a Tēnā De Laureto. "Ko au me taku hoa pakihi ko Maria e tīmata ana, nā reira kāore i taea e māua te utu i te rēti o tētahi toa tika [pereki me te moata], ā, he pai ake tēnei i te whai wāhi pahū-ake, mākete rānei e tūpono ana ki te marangai." I te nui ake o te utu o te rēti i tētahi tauwāhi pereki me te moata i te UK, he wāhanga a Pop Brixton o tētahi nekehanga iti, engari e tipu haere ana ki te hanga i ngā kāinga kai, i ngā kāinga hokohoko rānei, i ngā "malls pahū-ake" rānei i hangaia mai i ngā ipu kaipuke. I Rānana hoki, ko Boxpark, e rua ngā pae ināianei, i Shoreditch i te rāwhiti o te taone, me Croydon i te tonga. Ināianei, kei Bristol ko Cargo One, me te Cargo Two ka tuwhera i te kōanga. Ka tukuna e ia ngā umanga tīmata he huarahi utu nui ake ki te whiwhi tuanui i runga i o rātau mahunga, me te whai wāhi ki te mirimiri pakihiwi ki ētahi atu umanga whakaaro ōrite, i tētahi wāhi e whai hua ai rātou katoa i te waewae paheko e puta mai ana i te noho hei wāhanga o tētahi hapori hokohoko nui ake. Hei whakapiki ake i ngā tau manuhiri, me te huri i ngā pae ki ngā wāhi whakangahau whānui ake, ka whakaritea e Boxpark rāua ko Pop Brixton ngā konohete pūoro auau i ō rātou tauwāhi. Engari me pēhea tonu te whiwhi a ngā kamupene i o rātau ringa ki ngā ipu kaipuke? Ngā kōeke kounga I te tau 2015, e 2.48 miriona ngā ipu kaipuke paerewa 40ft (12m) i tae mai ki te UK, engari e 2.41 miriona anake i toe anō, e ai ki ngā whika whai mana mai i te Tari Waka. Ko te nuinga o te wā ka whakatārewatia ngā mea e noho ana i te ratonga nā te mau me te roimata, ā, ka hokona atu. A, ki te hiahia koe ki tētahi hei wharau kāri nui, ka taea e koe te tiki i tētahi mō te £1,100. Ko tētahi o ngā kaihoko nui rawa o ngā ipu ko Bullman Marine Supplies and Containers, e noho ana i te taha o te Thames i Barking, ki te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi. I tēnei wā, neke atu i te 7,000 ngā ipu hei hoko, ā, he pūtake hoki i ngā mea hōu mai i Haina mō ngā kaihoko e hiahia ana ki tētahi i roto i te āhua kanapa. Ka taea e tētahi o ēnei te whakahoki i a koe e £2,500. E kī ana te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa o Bullman, a Oliver Bullman: "Ka hokona e mātou ngā ipu kua whakamahia mai i ngā raina kaipuke e hoko ana ina tae ki tō rātou uara tuhituhi rawa, i reira ka whakakapia e te raina ngā ipu kua pau ki ngā mea hou. " Kei te āhua tonu o tō rātou oranga i te tūkinotanga o rātou. Ka pau pea ngā ipu e mau ana i te tīra maka i roto i te whā, e rima tau rānei, ā, ko ētahi atu, me ngā tapi me te whakahoutanga e hiahiatia ana, ka taea te 25 tau." E wātea ana ngā ipu whakamahia i roto i ngā kōeke kounga e toru - A, B, me C - me te A te kounga tino pai. Ka tahuri hoki a Bullman i ngā ipu mō ngā kiritaki, ka huri ki ngā mea katoa mai i ngā pae pūkoro ki ngā hurihanga whakahaere huihuinga, ngā wae whakaaturanga, me ngā whatanga paihikara. Ko te 'Fascination' Boxpark i Shoreditch, i whakarewaina i te tau 2011, te papa kai tuatahi me te hokohoko i hangaia katoatia mai i te kaipuke hei whakatuwhera i te UK. E kī ana tōna kaiwhakarewa, a Roger Wade, ko te tīmatanga o te ariā e hoki ana ki te tau 1999 i a ia e whakahaere ana i te waitohu huatau o Boxfresh. E kī ana a ia: "I ngā wā katoa i roto ahau i te mahi mahi. I a mātau e haere ana ki ngā whakaaturanga hokohoko Tiamana me Boxfresh ka hangaia e mātau he toa iti, kātahi ka tukituki, nā reira ka tīmata ahau ki te whakaaro 'he aha ahau e kore ai e hanga i tētahi whakaaturanga hokohoko i roto i tētahi ipu?'. "Ko te tīmatanga tērā o taku mīharo, i te tau 1999. I ngā tau i muri mai e whakahaere ana tētahi hoa i ngā whanaketanga hokohoko, nā reira i te tau 2008-09 ka miharo ahau 'he aha e kore ai e hanga i tētahi whanaketanga hokohoko katoa i roto i ngā ipu?'. "Ko Boxpark te mātāmua pahū-ake tuatahi o te ao i to mātau whakarewatanga i Shoreditch i te tau 2011." Ināianei ko Boxpark Shoreditch te kāinga ki ngā wharekai me ngā pae e 19, me ngā toa e 27, ā, e 35 ngā wāhi hei kai me te inu i tōna pae tuarua i Croydon. E tūhono ana ia ipu ki te hiko matua me te wai, ā, ka taea e Boxpark te āwhina i ngā kairīhi ki te whakauru i ō rātou kāinga. Ko te nuinga o te wā e £20,000 ngā rēti i te tau, neke atu i te wāhi mākete, engari he iti iho i te pereki me te moata. Ā, kua puta katoa ngā pae i ngā ture whakarite me te tauwāhi whare. Ko 'ngā aue rokiroki' i Pop Brixton, ko Rik Campbell tētahi o ngā rangatira o te wharekai Initia o Kricket, he mokowā mō ngā kai e 20 i roto i tōna ipu. E kī ana a ia: "Ka whakarato a Pop Brixton i tētahi pūhara mō ngā tīmatanga, ngā umanga rangatahi rānei kia arotahi ki ā rātou hua, ratonga rānei, mā te tango i te maha o ngā ānini whakahaere e pā ana ki te whakahaere i tētahi umanga takitahi. " He taiao tino pai ki te whakamātau i tētahi ariā me te kore nui rawa o ngā whakapaunga pūtea, me te nui o ētahi atu umanga e whakaputa aunoa ana i ngā waewae mārō. "[Heoi anō] ko te nui rawa o te rokiroki - he iti rawa te mokowā, ko te tikanga me noho tonu mātou ki runga i tā mātou tono kai me te inu." Ahakoa he āhua kōpikopiko, kua taea e Pop Brixton te whakamatau i a Kricket he pai ana kai me ana ratonga, ā, ināianei he wāhi pereki me te moata i Soho, i waenganui o Rāwāhi. Ko tētahi atu umanga i Pop Brixton ko te umanga tukuoro Boombocs, e hanga ana i ngā pūnaha tukuoro Nihokikorangi rākau. E kī ana tōna rangatira me tōna kaiwhakarewa, a Jonny Williams, i te whakatatū i Pop Brixton i a ia i te mahi mai i te kāinga. "Mēnā kāore i taea e au te uru ki konei ka noho tonu ahau i te kāinga e mahi ana i runga i taku sofa, ehara i te mea tino pai." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Boxpark Pop Brixton Cargo One Bullman Containers

title: Te takutai o Lincolnshire: Ka mate ngā manu i muri i te horoinga o te rongoā ārai mate i runga i ngā one
summary: Ko te matenga o ngā manu e 12 i muri i ngā ipu rongoā ārai i horoia ki te takutai o Lincolnshire, e tūhuratia ana e ngā pirihimana.
text: I kitea he ipu i Chapel Beach i Chapel St Leonards i te ata o te Rāitema i te taha o nga manu. Tokowhā ētahi atu i kitea i ngā one i Anderby Creek, Mogg's Eye me Skegness. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Kaunihera Takiwā o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti kāore i te mōhiotia i hea mai ai ngā matū, engari kei te tangohia. Na te mana i tohutohu i te iwi kia karo i te rohe, ā, kaua e tuku i ngā kararehe kia kai i ngā kararehe mate i te one. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire e haere tonu ana ngā tūhuratanga ki te whakatau i te āhua o te rawa me te hononga ki ngā manu mate. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kua tangohia ngā manu, ā, ka tirohia e ngā tohunga o te Tari Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua (Defra). I kī te kaunihera i horoia nga ipu "nā te ahunga hau". I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Ka kore e taea e mātou te mōhio i hea mai ēnei, he aha rānei ngā tūkinotanga i puta mai i te huarahi. " E pouri ana ki te whakaaro kua haere rātau ki te moana mā te putunga, mā ētahi atu tikanga rānei, ā, kua mānu ki te Moana ki te Raki." E tonoa ana te tangata whai mōhiohio kia whakapā atu ki nga pirihimana. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki te yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk, tukua rānei he ataata ki konei. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Kaunihera Takiwā o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti

title: I patua nga kōinga o Mali Fula 'i roto i te toto mātao'
summary: E 32 ngā tāngata i patua e ngā kaiwhakangau tūturu i tētahi kāinga tūhāhā i waenganui o Mali, e kī ana tētahi rōpū paetata.
text: Ko nga kaiwhakangau, e mōhiotia ana ko "Dozo", i karapoti i te kāinga i te rohe o Mopti, a, ka wehea ngā mema o te rōpū iwi o Fula i ērā atu kōinga i mua i te patunga i a rātau. Ko nga tamariki i waenganui i nga tūpāpaku i te whakaekenga o te Hātarei, ka kī tētahi mana. Kua nui haere te tutu i waenganui i a Fula, he hepara tūturu, me ētahi atu rōpū iwi. E 10 anō ngā tāngata i ngaro i te kāinga, e tata ana ki te taone o Djenné, e kī ana a Abel Aziz Diallo, te perehitini o Tabital Pulaaku, he pāhonotanga Fulani. "I karapotia e rātau te kāinga, i wehea te iwi o Fula i ētahi atu, a, e 32 neke atu rānei ngā tāngata i patua i roto i te toto mātao," tana kī atu ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. E amuamu ana te Fula kei te ūkuia auautia rātau e nga kaiwhakangau tūturu i runga i te ingoa o te whawhai ki nga toa. E whakapae ana rātau i te hōia o Mali e tautoko ana i aua mahi. Kua whakapaea hoki te ope taua o Mali e nga rōpū motika mo te mahi i te tūpāpaku i te rohe matua. E kī ana te taua he mahi ēnei ki nga kaiwhakawhanake. I te Rāitema ka tono a Mātau ki a Mali kia tūhura i muri i te kitenga o ngā tinana e 25 i roto i ngā urupa maha i te rohe o Mopti. I whakaae te kāwanatanga o Mali ki ngā huānga o te taua.

title: I pōtitia te rerenga o mua hei tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini
summary: Kua whakaingoatia tētahi rerenga o mua ko te tumuaki hou o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini.
text: I haere mai te rōia motika tangata o Debora Kayembe ki UK mai i te Whenua Manapori o Kongo, ā, e noho ana i Pākehā mai i te tau 2011. Ka tangohia e Ms Kayembe te tūranga i te 1 o Poutāpeta, ka noho ko ia te tangata tae tuatahi hei mahi pēnā mai i te wā i waihangatia i te tau 1858. Ko ia te wahine tuatoru e pupuri ana i te tūnga, whai muri i a Muriel Gray me te tumuaki putaatu o Ann Henderson. 'Tino hōnore' kua mahi a Ms Kayembe i runga i te poari o te Kaunihera Tūruhi o Pirihitini, ā, he mema ia no te tari rōia i te Kōti Hara o te Ao Whānui me te Pānga Pae o te Kōti Hara o te Ao Whānui. I te tau 2019, i whakairihia tana whakaahua ki te pakitara o te Royal Society of Edinburgh - te Awherika tuatahi i whiwhi i tēnei hōnore - mō ana whakatutukitanga me ana mahi. Ms Kayembe said: "I am delighted and deeply honoured to be elected as the first person of colour to hold the position of rector of the University of Edinburgh. " E mōhio katoa ana ahau ki te hiranga o taku mahi i tētahi wā tino nui. "Kei te anga atu mātou ki ngā wero maha: mai i te mate urutā Covid-19 ki ngā pakanga mo te tika ā-iwi me te tatauranga mai i mua i te patunga o George Floyd me te whānautanga o te Black Lives Matter Movement. " Respect for the values of humanity and kindness lies at the heart of all my work and I look forward to working with staff, students, and the whole university community, to ensure that everyone is valued." I kī a Ahorangi Pita Mathieson, te tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini: "E hari ana ahau ki te pōhiri i a Ms Kayembe ki te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini. " He whakapapa roa, he whakapapa rangatira tō te tūnga tumuaki, me ngā tumuaki e haere mai ana i te whānui o te oranga tūmatanui me te ahurea. "I very much look forward to working with our new rector as we navigate our way through the Covid-19 pandemic and build a bright future for the entire University community." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Whare Wānanga o Edinburgh

title: Final submissions in Rosepark Care Home fire inquiry
summary: Ko te uiui ki te matenga o ngā pakeke e 14 i roto i te ahi o te kāinga tiaki, ko te whakarongo ki ngā tukunga whakamutunga i mua i te whakawāteatanga a te sheriff.
text: E ngana ana te uiui aituā kino ki te whakatū i te take o te mura o te Whare Tiaki o Rosepark, i Uddingston i te tau 2004. Kua tirohia hoki mēnā ka taea te whakatūpato tika hei ārai i ngā mate me te tāutu i ngā hēnga haumaru. Kāore i puta he whakapae i te mahi ā-ture ki ngā rangatira o te kāinga. I te tau 2007, ka hinga tētahi kēhi hara ki te rangatira o Tōma Balmer, ā, i taka hoki ngā utu i raro i tētahi whakapae hou i te tau 2008. I oti i te FAI te tango whakaaturanga i a Aotearoa i tērā tau i muri i te nohoanga mō te 141 rā, ā, kua whakaritea e te Karauna me ētahi atu rōpū i te kēhi ngā tukunga tuhituhi. Kei te rangona te uiui e te Tumuaki Sheriff o Brian Lockhart, ā, kei te hui anō ki te Kōti Sheriff o Hamilton. I mua i te hikitanga, ka kī te Tumuaki o Sheriff Lockhart: "Kua mōhiotia tēnei uiui e pā ana ki te roanga o ngā takahanga me te tau me te matatinitanga o ngā take kua puta mai." Kua mahia ngā tukunga tuhituhi, kaua ko te hātepe pūnoa, e kite ana i ngā rōpū e pā ana ki te kōti. Mā te whakarongo e whai wāhi whakamutunga ki ngā rōpū katoa ki te whakatakoto i ngā tukunga whakamutunga, ā, he poto noa iho.

title: Haina 'ki te tirotiro i ngā moutere o te Moana o Haina ki te Rāwhiti'
summary: E kī ana a Haina me whakahaere i tētahi tirohanga o ngā moutere o te Moana o Haina ki te Rāwhiti, i waenganui i tētahi haupae whakawhanaunga kawa ki Tiapanī.
text: I kī te pokapū rongokōrero o te kāwanatanga o Pakihi, he wāhanga te uiuinga o te "hōtaka hei tiaki i ōna mana moana me ōna painga". Ko te motu e kiia ana ko Diaoyu i Haina me Senkaku i Hapani. Ko te haupae i runga i ngā moutere, e whakahaeretia ana e Tiapanī, kua mahue i a ia ngā here i waenganui i Tokyo me Pēhi. I kī a Pakihi, ko te uiuinga te wāhanga tuarua o tētahi hōtaka hei whakamahere i ngā moutere rohe me ngā ākau o Haina, i muri i te otinga o te wāhanga tuatahi i te tau 2009. "Ko te wāhanga tuarua ka taupoki i ngā moutere tae atu ki ngā Moutere o Diaoyu," te kī a te pūrongo, e kī ana i te National Administration of Surveying, Mapping and Geoinformation. Kāore i whakawhānuitia te pēhea, āhea hoki ka tū ai te mahi rangahau. He maha nga tau e haruru ana te haupae mo te rangatiratanga o nga moutere, e takoto ana ki te tonga o Okinawa, ki te raki o Taiwana. I tīmata anō i te wā o Mahuru i te wā i hokona ai e te kāwanatanga Tiapanī e toru o ngā moutere mai i tō rātou rangatira Hapanihi tūmataiti, i ahu mai ki ngā whakahē i ētahi tāone Hainamana me ētahi umanga Tiapanī e mahi ana i Haina. Mai i tērā wā he maha nga wā i rere ai ngā kaipuke kāwanatanga o Hainamana i roto i ngā mea e kī ana a Tiapanī ko ōna wai rohe huri noa i ngā moutere. I te mutunga o tērā tau, ka rere hoki tētahi waka rererangi kāwanatanga Hainamana i ngā moutere i te mea i kīia e Tiapanī he tūkino i tōna wāhi rererangi. He maha nga wā i whāia ai nga kairiri Hapanihi mai i taua wā. Kua tautohe te Pirimia hou o Tiapanī, o Te Pirimia o Tiapanī, i pōtitia i a Hakihea, he āhuatanga uaua. E kī ana a ia kāore te take o te rangatiratanga i runga i te whakaritenga, engari kua karangatia hoki he kōrero anō ki Beijing. I tērā wiki i pānuitia ai kua whakaritea e Tiapanī kia whakanuia te whakapau hōia mō te wā tuatahi i roto i te tekau tau - ahakoa he iti noa iho - i roto i tētahi nekehanga kua honoa ki te haupae ki Haina. Te āhua nei kei te kimi hoki a Tiapanī ki te whakapakari i ōna āheinga i taua rohe - i pūrongotia e te kaipānui tūmatanui NHK i te Mane e rua anō ngā kaipuke tautiaki ka horaina ki taua rohe ā muri ake o te tau. I kī te kōwhiringa Rongokōrero o Parakihetohe, e kī ana i ngā pūtake kāwanatanga tē mōhiotia, i te Tūtira e titiro ana ngā kaiwhakahaere waea ki te whakatū i ngā waka rererangi e tata ana ki te mekameka motu tautohetohe, e whakapau ana i tētahi waka rererangi i tētahi motu iti ki te tonga o Okinawa. Ko te takawaenga matua o Āhia ki te Rāwhiti o Amerika, ko Kurt Campbell, i Tiapanī ā muri ake nei i te wiki mō ngā kōrero e tūmanakohia ana kia whakaurua te haupae rohe, nā reira i tohutohu ai a Washington i ngā taha e rua kia tūpato. Kei Beijing hoki te kaiārahi Hapanihi o Mua, o Yukio Hatoyama, i Pēhi i tētahi haerenga tūmataiti. I mua i te pōtitanga o Tīma, kua karangatia e Tēnā Hatoyama, tōna Rōpū Manapori ināianei i muri i te pōtitanga o Hakihe, ki a Tiapanī kia whakapai ake i ōna here ki a Beijing i roto i te whakataurite anō i ngā toa tūturu. Pūrongo pāpāho paetata e rapu kōrero ana a ia ki ngā kaiārahi Hainamana.

title: Ka tīmata te whakaaro o te whare pukapuka o Te Whare Pukapuka o Te Whare Pukapuka
summary: Kua tīmata tētahi whakaaro mō te wā heke mai o ngā whare pukapuka o Gloucestershire.
text: I Whiringa ā-Rangi, i whakataua e tētahi arotakenga ā-ture tētahi whakataunga a te kaunihera o te rohe kia tapahia te pūtea mō ngā whare pukapuka e 10, i te mea kāore anō kia ū ki ngā ture tika. Kei roto i ngā tono hōu ko ngā mahere kia tuwhera tonu ngā whare pukapuka matua e ono rā i te wiki, ka whakatuwheratia ētahi e rima rā i te wiki, ā, ko ētahi ka noho hei mahi whakahaere hapori. Ka mutu te whakaaro tae noa ki te 11 o Poutāpeta. Me tapahi e te kaunihera te whakapau moni mo nga whare pukapuka ma te £1.8m. E tono ana kia whakamutua te pūtea mō ngā whare pukapuka e whitu, engari ka haere tonu ki te kaimahi me te whakahaere i ngā whare pukapuka o Matson me Tuffley i Gloucester me Hesters Way i Cheltenham. Ko te rautaki hukihuki ko tētahi "whatunga" o ngā whare pukapuka matua e iwa e tuwhera ana i te ono rā i te wiki, ā, e 12 ngā whare pukapuka paetata e tuwhera ana e rima rā i te wiki. It would also feature 10 partnership libraries run by the county in partnership with communities, and seven Community Offer Libraries. Hei wāhanga o te whakawhitiwhitinga, kei te pātaitia ngā kainoho he aha te tikanga kia mahia ki ngā whare pukapuka pūkoro, he aha hoki te taumata tautoko e hiahiatia ana mō ngā whare pukapuka e whakahaeretia ana e te hapori.

title: Hana Cobley: Māmā 'i patua te kōhungahunga kātahi anō ka whānau mai i roto i te mahi whakamataku'
summary: I whakangūngia e tētahi wahine tana kōhungahunga kātahi anō ka whānau mā te whakahau i tētahi mea ki raro i tōna korokoro i mua i te takai i a ia ki roto i ngā pēke kirihou, a, ka waiho ia kia mate, ka rongo te kōti.
text: E whakapae ana nga kaiwhakawa i mahue i a Hannah Cobley te pēpi i tētahi wāhi tipu i tētahi pāmu o Te Pāmu o Aotearoa i noho ai ia me ōna mātua. I muri iho ka rapu a ia i te ipurangi kia mōhio ai e pēhea te roa e taea ai e te kōhungahunga kātahi anō ka "ora me te kore whāngai", ka korerotia ki nga kaiwhakawā. E whakakāhore ana a Ms Cobley, e 29, i te kōhuru i te Kōti Karauna o Aotearoa. E toru nga whatinga angaanga i pāngia e te pēpi, e rua haora i mua i te matenga, ka kī te rōia o Hona Hankin QC. E whakakāhore ana a Ms Cobley, he umanga waka tōna pāpā, ā, kei te pupuri kararehe hoki i te pāmu i Stoney Stanton, i te kōhurutanga o te tamaiti i ngā haora tōmua o te 26 o Āperira 2017. 'Hapu huna' E kī ana te tangata whakapae, nāna i mahue i te kura wetereo te 15 o ona tau, ā, kua mahi hei atekōkiri mō te umanga o tōna pāpā, e kī ana tōna maharatanga kua whānau mate te pēpi. I te whakatuwheratanga o te kēhi, ka kī a Tēnā Hankin: "Ko tēnei take e pā ana ki te matenga o tētahi kōtiro kātahi anō ka whānau huna, huna rānei. " Kāore te pāpā o te tamaiti, kāore tōna tuakiri i te mōhiotia, kāore rānei te whānau me ngā hoa o te whaea i mōhio ki te hapu, he hua nō te tūnga pō kotahi." I kī a ia i whakaahuatia ia e te whaea o te tangata whakapae i roto i tētahi uiuinga pirihimana he "tino tinihanga". I kī a Tēnā Hankin i whānau mai te kōhungahunga i waenganui i te 02:00 me te 02:45 ki roto i te peihana o tētahi whare paku o waho i te pāmu. Ka kī atu a ia ki te hūri: "I whānau mai a Ms Cobley ki tētahi tamaiti ora. Ahakoa moata i te 32 wiki o te hapu - tata ki te whitu marama - he pēpi hauora noa iho a ia. "Mēnā i kawea mai e Ms Cobley tōna hapu ki te tiaki kaiwhakawhanau i mua i te whakawhānautanga, tērā pea ka tino whakarite ia i te āhua pai o tana pēpi." I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Hankin: "Kāore he mea i mahia e Ms Cobley hei whakarite kia ora tana pēpi. I tua atu, ko te take o te ture, ko Ms Cobley, me te māramatanga o te whāinga, i āta patua tana pēpi." I rongo te kōti i muri i te whānautanga ka haere te tangata whakapae ki Skegness me tōna whaea, a, ka "mahi noa" tae noa ki te toru rā i muri mai nā te toto. I mōhio ngā kaimahi rongoā i Te Ariki o Te Ariki o Te Ariki o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa, ā, ka whakatūpato i ngā pirihimana e māharahara ana ki te ngaro o tētahi pēpi. I kī a Tēnā Hankin i te mutunga ka whakaae te tangata whakapae ki tōna pāpā mo te whānautanga i roto i te wharepaku, engari i kī kua mate kē te pēpi, ā, kua hunaia ia "i roto i te mauri" i muri i te wharau. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko Aberdeen, ko te mōrehu o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, e 98 te pakeke, e rapu ana i ētahi atu hōia
summary: E hiahia ana tētahi hōia o mua e 98 tau i ora i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao me te rima tau hei herehere ki te kimi i ngā hōia i pā ki tētahi whakamatautau ōrite.
text: E 16 tau a Jimmy Johnstone, e noho ana i Aberdeen, i tana rēhitatanga i te tau 1937. I hopukina ia e nga hōia Tiamana i te raki o Wīwī i muri i te pakanga mo Saint-Valery-en-Caux i te tau 1940. Ināianei kei te mahi tahi a Tēnā Johnstone me te aroha o te Pakanga Kāpō o Pirihitini i runga i te tūmanako ka taea e ētahi o ōna hoa herehere - ō rātou whānau rānei - te whakapā atu. I haere ngā hōia o te 51st Highland Division i ngā rau maero ki ngā puni i Tiamana, mā Peretiama me Hōrana. I Pipiri 1943, ka taea e ia te oma me tōna hoa herehere o te pakanga a Ake Lockwood mō te rua wiki i mua i to rātau hopukina anō. 'He āhua wairangi' i kī a Tēnā Johnstone, he iti noa iho tōna kitenga, e hiahia ana ia ki te whakarongo mai i ētahi atu i reira, i o rātau whānau rānei. These include Private 'Kleats' McKenzie of the Seaforth Highlanders, Jackie Lockwood, Gerald Fury, Bert Petrie and Jim Watt. I a ia e mahara ana ki te pakanga o te tau 1940 ka kī a ia: "He taone iti tēnei i te riu, nā reira ko nga Tiamana o rātau reheke i runga i nga pari, a, he waka rererangi. I whiua mātau - kaore koe i te mōhio. "I whara tonu ahau i te poho - i pūhia. He nick anō tōku taringa. He tamariki ahau, he āhua wairangi, he toa." I whakamāramatia e ia: "E hia mano mātau i roto i nga puni. Ko taku tau herehere o te pakanga ko 14320 - kei te maumahara tonu ahau ināianei. I mahi mātau i ngā pāmu, i ngā arawhata me ngā maina waro. "Ko te mea katoa i hoatu ki a koe hei kai, he hupa wai noa iho me te parāoa Tiamana i waenganui i ngā tāngata tokorima. I mahi mātau i ia rā mo te 12 haora." No te mawhititanga o te tau 1943, ka mahara a ia: "I te puni he komiti e whakahaere ana i te mawhiti. Nā reira mēnā he kaupapa tāu ki te mawhiti, ka kohia e rātau ngā pire huaora, tiakarete, ngā mea pēnei māu. "E rua wiki mātau e oma ana, e whakaahua ana hei tangata whenua Pōrana." 'Toro atu' I tana kōrero mo te tau 1945, ka kī mai a ia: "Ko tētahi o nga tautīaki Tiamana, nāna i kī he herehere whawhai ia i Pākehā i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, i kōrero mai ki a au. " He tautiaki pakeke katoa ngā tautīaki i a mātau, ā, kua kore e taea te whawhai. Kāore i taea e tēnei tautiaki pakeke te kōrero Ingarihi, nā reira i kōrero mātou i te reo Tiamana. Ka kī mai a ia ki a au 'Homai e koe he tuhipoka e kī ana he kaitiaki pai ahau, ā, māku koe me ō hoa e kawe ki tēnei whare pāmu e mōhio ana ahau'. "I tuhia e au tētahi tuhipoka e kī ana me whakaara ia ki muri, engari i whakaaro ia kua tuhia e au he tuhipoka pai. I tino hari a ia, a, ka purua ki roto i tana pēke. "I mauria ahau e ia me ngā hoa tokotoru ki tēnei pāmu. He pouri, he mākū. E toru rā i reira mātou. Kātahi mātau ka rongo i te haerenga o ngā anga o Rūhia me ngā pomu e huri noa ana i a mātau, nā reira ka kī mai te kaitiaki me haere mātou. He maha rawa ngā matā. "I te wā i whakawāteatia e ngā Amerikana nga hōia, e mahara ana ahau i mauria e tēnei haihana Amerika te tautiaki tawhito, a, ka hoatu he tika ki a ia. Engari ināianei kei te aroha ahau ki taua tautiaki tawhito. E pouri ana ahau ki te tuhi i taua tuhipoka ināianei. E whakapono ana ahau ki te Paipera me te murunga hara. Engari i taua wā i muri i te herehere o te pakanga mo taua wā katoa, koia tōku whakaaro." I whakamutua e Tēnā Johnstone: "He tokomaha ngā tāngata e kī ana 'Jimmy, he tino toto tōu'. " Ko taku āwhina kāinga, ko Scottish War Blinded me ngā tāngata katoa e toro ana - koia te take i mau tonu ai ahau kei konei tonu ahau. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te toro atu ki ngā herehere o mua o te pakanga i pā ki ēnei mea, ki ō rātou whānau rānei. E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakarongo mai i a rātau." Ko ngā mōrehu o ngā mahi i pā ki a Tēnā Johnstone, tētahi whanaunga rānei e hiahia ana ki te kōrero ki a ia, e tonoa ana kia whakapā atu ki te aroha i te 0800 035 6409.

title: Ka hurihia e Māmā te ingoa o te tama i muri i te hē i roto i te moko hou
summary: Kua mahi tētahi whaea mai i Huitene i muri i te hē o te takikupu o te ingoa o tana tama ko Kevin.
text: Nā Michael BaggsNewsbeat reporter Kia tika ai tana waituhi hou, ka whakatau te whaea (e hiahia ana kia mōhiotia ko Johanna anake) ki te huri i te ingoa o Kevin e rima tau ki a Kelvin. I mahia te hē i tana haerenga ki te tiki i ngā ingoa o Kevin rāua ko Nova (tana tamāhine) i runga i tōna ringa. I kite noa iho a Johanna i te patopato i roto i te moko i a ia e hoki ana ki te kāinga i roto i te motokā me tōna whanaunga. "Kāore te takikupu i hē ki a au i te tuatahi," tana kī atu ki a Newsbeat. "Ki a au, he kōaro te kuputuhi kia tika ai te ahunga ina tū ahau. " I a mātau e noho ana i roto i te motokā ki te kāinga, ka whakaahuatia e taku whanaunga. Koia tērā ka kite ahau i tāna kōrero. "E kī ana a Kelvin, kaua ko Kevin. Kāore au i whakaaro he pono. "E kata ana taku whanaunga, ā, kei te whakaaro mātou - he whakangahau tēnei?" E kī ana a Johanna ka hoki wawe rāua ko tōna whanaunga ki te whare moko ki te kōrero ki a rātau mō te hē. I korerotia ki a ia he ngāwari noa iho te whakatika mā te pokanga taiaho. I muri i te titiro ki te tango i te moko, ka korerotia ki a Johanna ka pau pea te tau ki te tango katoa i te mahi. "I muri i te whakaaro iti, ka whakatau mātau ki te whakaingoa anō i a ia ko Kelvin," tana kī. "Ināianei he pai ake ki a mātou, ā, kāore mātou e hiahia ki te huri anō." I kī atu a Johanna ki te nūpepa Huitene o Blekinge Läns Tidning, ināianei kei te whakaaro ia kia whai moko i te ingoa o tana tamāhine kātahi anō ka whānau mai, ko Freya. Engari i tēnei wā, ka whakarite ia kāore he tangata e hiahia ana ki te huri i ngā taipitopito i runga i o rātau uruwhenua. "Ka tuhia e au ki runga i tētahi pepa, ā, ka tirohia neke atu i te 10,000 ngā wā," tana kī atu ki te pepa. Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Whakahē ārai ārai raka o Liverpool: Ka piki ngā hopunga ki te 27
summary: Kotahi tekau mā tahi anō ngā tāngata kua hopukina i muri i tētahi huihuinga ārai raka i Liverpool.
text: E hia rau nga kaiwhakahaere i haere puta noa i te pokapū o te taone i te Hātarei, i te wā e 27 nga tāngata i herea. I hopukina tētahi tangata 32 tau mo te whakaeke i tētahi pirihimana, i te wā i puritia tētahi wahine i runga i te whakapae i te ngana ki te whara me te taraiwa mōrearea. Ko ngā tāngata e 25 e toe ana i hopukina mō te takahi i te whakahau tūmatanui me ngā ture coronavirus. I kī a Supt Diane Pownall: "E pā ana ngā ture ki te katoa, ā, he tika - he ture hoki - ina kōwhiri te tangata ki te waiho i a rātou mō ā rātou ake take kaingākau, hē hoki. " He whanonga mōrearea tēnei, ā, tērā pea ka mōrearea te iwi o Liverpool e mahi ana ki te whakarite ka taea e tātau te wehe haumaru i te raka." Ko nga keehi Liverpool Ko te rohe tetahi o nga reeti teitei rawa atu o nga mate coronavirus me nga mate i Oketopa, i te wa i noho ai ko te rohe tuatahi i Ingarangi ki te anga atu ki nga herenga taumata teitei rawa atu i mua i te raka tuarua o te motu. Tata ki te 100,000 ngā tāngata kua whakamātauria mō te huaketo mai i te tīmatanga o ngā whakamātautau tuatahi o te taone whānui o te whenua i Liverpool i tērā mutunga wiki. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: E 400 tau te pakeke o te kaipuke Potukara i kitea i Cascais
summary: Kua kitea e nga kaimātai whenua tētahi kaipuke 400 tau te pakeke i te takutai o Potukara, i te mea i kīia e tētahi tohunga ko te "kitenga o te tekau tau".
text: Ko ngā mea kakara, ngā uku me ngā pū i whakairotia ki te koti ringa o Potukara e takoto ana i te taha o Cascais, e tata ana ki te pūmatua o Lisbon. E whakapono ana te tīma e hoki mai ana te kaipuke i Īnia i te wā i totohu ai i waenganui i te tau 1575 me te 1625. I te tiketike tēnei o te hokohoko kakara a Potukara ki Āhia. I te hōhonutanga o te 12m (40ft) i tino pai te tiakitanga, ka kī atu te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa o Jorge Freire ki te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero. "Mai i tētahi tirohanga tuku iho, koinei te kitenga o te tekau tau," tana kī, e karanga ana "te kitenga tino hira o ngā wā katoa" mō te whenua. Ko te porcelain Hainamana mai i te mutunga o te rau tau 16 me te tīmatanga o te rau tau 17 i waenganui i te pakaru, pērā ki ngā pū parahi me ngā anga cowry - he moni i whakamahia i roto i te hokohoko kahunga. I kī te kaunihera pūwhenua o Cascais i kitea te kaipuke i te tīmatanga o Mahuru i a ia e dredging ana i te waha o te awa o Tagus, e rere ana i mua i te taone taone puta noa i Lisbon. I kī atu a Koromatua Kānata ki te nūpepa Guardian he "kitenga whakaharahara", e whakapakari ana i tō rātou "tuakiri huihuinga me ngā uara tiritiri". Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: Ko te kitenga he wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa whaiwhenua 10 tau e tautokona ana e te taone o Cascais, te kāwanatanga Potukara me te taua moana, me te Whare Wānanga o Nova i Lisbon. I kī te Minita Ahurea, a Luis Mendes, ko te waha o te awa o Tagus i whakaarotia he "wāhiwera" mo nga pakaru. "I haere mai tēnei kitenga ki te whakamātau," tana kī.

title: Tākuta Ko Wai: Pita Capaldi ki te tuohu atu i te rangatū o TE AO
summary: Kai te heke iho te kaitapere o Pita Capaldi i te tūranga ārahi i roto i te rangatū pūtaiao o TE Tākuta Wai.
text: I ohorere a Capaldi i ngā kaihautū mā te pānui i te wā o tētahi uiuinga ki te kaiwhakaatu o te Reo Irirangi 2 o TE Reo Irirangi o Jo Whiley. I kī te whetū whānau o Glasgow, e 58 tau, nāna i noho ko te kaitapere tua12 hei tākaro i te Tākuta i te tau 2013, ka waiho e ia a Doctor Who i te mutunga o te tau. "Kei te mōhio ahau kua tae ki te wā ki te neke atu," tana kī. "E pouri ana ahau, e aroha ana ahau ki a Doctor Who, he hōtaka tino pai ki te mahi." 'He kōhukihuki' I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore e taea e au te whakamihi i ngā tāngata e mahi tahi ana ahau, engari he tangata rerekē ahau i ngā wā katoa." I kī a ia i tonoa ia kia noho tonu i muri i te paunga o tana kirimana, engari i hiahia ia ki te neke atu ki ētahi atu whakamātautau i muri i te tekau o nga rangatū e haere mai nei. Ka rere te rangatū hou i te kōanga, ā, ka kī a Capaldi ka whakaaturia tana wāhanga whakamutunga i te Kirihimete. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko tētahi o ngā painga tino nui o te noho ko Doctor Who ko te kite i te ao i tōna tino pai. " Mai i ā mātou kaimahi mātauranga me te tīma auaha e mahi ana mō te kaipānui tino pai i te aorangi, ki ngā kaimātakitaki me ngā kaipāngai e tohu ana ki tētahi wā mārama ake i mua. "Kāore e taea e au te mihi ki te katoa. He kōhukihuki." Ko te rangatū panuku hoki te whakamutunga me Whīni Moffat hei kaituhi matua me te kaiwhakanao nui. I whakamihi a Moffat ki te mahinga a te whetū i roto i tētahi pānuitanga o te BBC: "Kei te whawhai tonu te Tākuta whakamīharo, mura, hūkere a Pita i te whawhai pai, ā, ko ana mahi tino nui e haere mai ana. " E ngā taniwha o te ao nui, kia tūpato - kāore anō a Capaldi kia mutu ki a koe!" I tāpiri mai a ia: "Pēnei i a Pita, kei te anga atu ahau ki te waiho i te mahi tino pai rawa atu ka riro i a au, engari i te mōhiotanga e mahi ana ahau i roto i te kamupene o te tino pai, me te atawhai, me te tino mātauranga o ngā tāngata, ka reka ake te whakamutunga tino pouri." Ka tūtohu te kaituhi 'Whakaaro nui me te charisma' a Tākuta Who ko Mark Gatiss: "Tino pouri kei te haere atu te tino pai o Pita Capaldi i te mutunga o te tau. Engari ko ia - ā, ka noho tonu - he Tākuta tino nui." I kī a Charlotte Moore, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te Ihirangi o TE HAU: "He Tākuta tino nui a ia nāna i kawe mai tōna ake whakaaro nui me tōna mana ahurei ki te tūranga." Ko te rangatū pūtaiao e paingia ana he Ariki Wā e mōhiotia ana ko "Te Tākuta", e haere ana i roto i te wā me te mokowā i te Tardis, e rite ana ki tētahi pouaka waea pirihimana o te tau 1960. Kei te pūāhua matua te kaha ki te whakatupu anō, he āhuatanga nāna i whakaae kia tākaro te tokomaha o ngā kaitapere i te tūranga i roto i ngā tau. E ai ki ngā kaihanga pukapuka, ko ērā i roto i te tāpare hei whakakapi i a Capaldi ko Ben Whishaw, ko Rory Kinnear me Rārangi Mariade. I pāohotia tuatahitia a Doctor Who i te tau 1963, ā, i whakarewaina anō i te tau 2005, ko te rangatū tua10 ko te whakamutunga o Pita Capaldi. I te tau 2013, i tino mōhiotia a Capaldi, nāna i whakakapi a Mātā Smith hei Tākuta i te tau 2013, mō tana mahi hei tākuta āmio waha kino, o Te Wānanga o Te Aotearoa. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Tokowhā nga tūpāpaku i te tūtukitanga o te whainga pirihimana o Te Pirihimana
summary: Tokowhā nga tāngata i mate i roto i te tūtukitanga motokā i te wā o te whainga pirihimana i Pirihi.
text: I whaia tētahi BMW e whā ngā tāne e ngā āpiha i Bingley Road i mua i te tūtukitanga i te komititanga me Toller Lane i te 05:30 BST. I katia te huarahi, i te takiwā o Heaton o te taone, e ngā pirihimana, ā, tērā pea ka hiritia tonutia mō te nuinga o te Tāite. Kua kōrerotia te tūtukitanga ki te Tari Motuhake mō te Whanonga Pirihimana (IOPC). I pūrongotia e tētahi tangata e noho tata ana ki te tirohanga i te whakaohotanga e tētahi "pahū tino nui". I kī a Roger Wood, e 67: "Kāore anō kia oho tika ahau i te ata ka kitea e au te mea i tūpono i te kīanga a tētahi o ōku hoa noho tata kua kite rātau i runga i te rongo kua mate te tangata. He tino wehi." E tono ana ngā kaipōrangapū i te pūtea penapena £100bn i roto i te waka ki te raki; E rua i puritia i runga i ngā tākarotanga 'kua ūngaia', i kī a Pirihitini Yates, e noho ana i raro iho i te meneti e haere ana i te wāhi hinga, i kī te motokā i "tukitukia ki tētahi rākau". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I mōhio ahau he tino nui tērā i taku kitenga i te maha o ngā waka ratonga ohorere i reira i runga i te tirohanga, i te mea he tino nui rawa rātou." 'Nui te auē' i kī a Salim Pūkaha, e 69: "Kua 33 tau ahau e noho ana i Toller Lane, ā, he tere rawa te haere mai o ngā motokā ki konei. " Ehara i te mea rerekē te rongo i ngā whakatangi me ngā pirihimana e whai ana i ngā tāngata." I kī atu tētahi tangata whenua o te rohe, nāna i kī ko Zaff tōna ingoa, i rongo ia i "tētahi tangi nui i muri mai i te pahū nui" i te ata nei. I kī a ia i whakamahia te huarahi hei ara rēhi, ka tāpiri "me mahi tētahi mea". I whakaūngia e te IOPC tētahi motokā Pirihimana o Te Uru kāore i tohua e whai ana i te BMW kiwikiwi. I kī a Miranda Biddle, te kaiwhakahaere ā-rohe o IOPC: "He mahi tino kino tēnei, ā, ko o mātau aroha kei te whānau me ngā hoa o te hunga kua mate. " Kei te haere a mātau kaihoko ki ngā hātepe i muri i te mahi, kua haere ki te tirohanga, ā, kua tīmata ki te kohikohi whakaaturanga." I tāpiritia e ia kua whakatuwheratia he tūhuratanga takitahi. Ko te tikanga o te mahi, e 13 ngā rangatahi kua mate i roto i ngā aituā waka maha i Leeds me Bradford i ngā marama tata nei. I Whiringa o Whiringa 2017 tokorima ngā tāngata i mate i te tūtukitanga o tētahi waka ki tētahi rākau i te takiwā o Meanwood o Te Wānanga. I Pipiri tokowhā nga tāngata i mate i te tūtukitanga i Horsforth.

title: E kī ana te kaitiaki o UK
summary: Kāore e hiahiatia kia tangohia e ngā wāhine whai whakatō uma silicone i hangaia e tētahi kamupene Wīwī, e kī ana ngā mana o UK.
text: Ākuanei ka whakatau ngā mana Wīwī mēnā me tango ngā wāhine i ngā whakatōnga i homai e Poly Implant Prothese (PIP), i waenganui i ngā āwangawanga ki ngā mōrea hauora. Engari e kī ana te UK Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) kāore tētahi o ngā whakaaturanga ki ngā hononga e taea ana ki te mate pukupuku e tautoko ana i te tangohanga. E whakaarotia ana tae atu ki te 40,000 ngā wāhine o Ingarangi kei a rātou ngā whakatō silicone PIP. Kua kīia ngā wāhine whai whakatō e āwangawanga ana kia whakapā atu ki te tākuta tākuta, ki te whare hauora rānei e whakauru ana i a rātou. E ai ki te MHRA, ko te nuinga (95%) o ngā whakatō i whakaurua tūmataititia, iti iho i te 5% i whakamahia i roto i te NHS. I te UK, neke atu i te 250 ngā wāhine o Ingarangi e tīmata ana i te mahi ture, e kī ana tētahi rōia. Neke atu i te hawhe i pāngia ngā whakatōnga pakaru, ka kī atu a Esylllt Tiwhi ki te wāhi rongokōrero. I whakamahia e PIP te silicone kōeke rongoā-kore e whakapono ana he mea hanga mō ngā moenga, e ai ki te British Association of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons (BAAPS). Ko te tikanga o tēnei he nui ake te ritua o ngā pūrere utu iti. 'Rapua he tohutohu' E waru ngā kēhi o te mate pukupuku, ko te nuinga o te mate pukupuku, kua pūrongotia i roto i ngā tūroro me ngā whakatō PIP, te Tumuaki Hauora o Wīwī, a Ia-Yves Grall, ki te nūpepa Rangatiratanga. I mate te iwa o nga tūroro i Gers i te mate pukupuku i tērā tau. Engari i kī te tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Wīwī, a Dominique Maraninchi, i tērā wiki kāore i honoa ngā kēhi ki ngā whakatō hē. I kī te MHRA he "iti rawa ngā whakaaturanga hei tohu i tētahi pāhonotanga ki te mate pukupuku" i muri i te arotakenga o ngā whakaaturanga e wātea ana ki ngā tinana ngaio UK e hāngai ana. E kī ana kua mahi i runga i te whakaaro ki te rēhita pukupuku me ngā tinana ngaio mō te pokanga uma me te haparapara. "Ko ngā tohutohu a te MHRA o nāianei ki ngā wāhine whai momo whakatō uma, ko ngā wāhine e māharahara ana ki ō rātou uma, e whakaaro ana rānei kua pakaru pea ā rātou whakatō, me rapu tohutohu rongoā mai i tō rātou tākuta whakatō," te kī a te kōwhiringa. I tāpiritia: "I tēnei wā kāore he whakaaturanga hei tautoko i te tangohanga auau o ngā whakatō uma PIP." I kī tētahi kōrero mai i te British Association for Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgeons (BAPRAS): "Kāore anō a BAPRAS kia kite i ngā whakaaturanga e whakaatu ana i ngā raruraru hauora i takea mai pea i ngā whakatō uma PIP, ā, ka tino aromatawai i ngā mea e wātea ana. " I tēnei wā e whakapono ana mātau ko te pānuitanga e tūmanakohia ana e nga mana rongoā o Wīwī he mehua whakatūpato. "Ka whakapā atu ngā tākuta ki tētahi tūroro kua whiwhi i tēnei momo whakatō mēnā e hiahiatia ana he mahi." I kī a Douglas McGeorge, te kaitohutohu tākuta kirihou me te perehitini o mua o te British Association of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons (BAAPS), me tirotiro ngā tūroro whai whakatō uma mēnā kua whiwhi rātou i tētahi mai i te PIP. "Ehara te karere i konei i te mauri," tana kī. "Kāore i te rerekē te tohutohu. Me taki ngā wāhine whai whakatō PIP e te whare hauora i reira rātau i mahi ai, ā, ka taea te aroturuki ā muri ake. "He nui ake te mokatere rahunga o ēnei whakatō, nā reira ka kōwhiri pea ētahi wāhine kia tangohia ā rātou whakatō i mua i tērā, ā, ka hari ētahi atu ki te mātakitaki." Whakahaere: Neke atu i te 300,000 ngā whakatō e whakapono ana kua hokona huri noa e PIP i roto i ngā tau e 12 kua hipa. Tata ki te 30,000 kua whakaurua ki Wīwī, neke atu i te 1,000 kua pakaru. I haere a PIP ki te whakahaere i tērā tau, ā, i rāhuitia te whakamahinga o ōna whakatō. E kī ana nga mana Wīwī ka whakatau rātau i te Paraire mēnā ka pātai atu ki nga wāhine i hoatu ki taua momo whakatō uma kia tangohia rātau. Kua whakatūria e te kāwanatanga Wīwī he komiti motuhake hai titiro ki te take.

title: Te tikanga o te pakipaki i ngā konohete puāwaitanga
summary: Tērā tētahi wā uaua i roto i te mahinga tino nui o te Symphony Number 6 a Tchaikovsky i B Minor, "Pathetique" i te Hōro o Usher, hei wāhanga o te Hākari Ao Whānui o Etinitini i te mutunga wiki.
text: Nā Pauline McLeanBBC Scotland I te wā i kawea mai e te Reo Irirangi o Te Reo Irirangi o Te Reo Irirangi - i raro i te kaiārahi o Mariss Jansons - te nekehanga tuatoru ki tōna whakamutunga whatitiri, tērā te okioki poto rawa, he hamama o te "pārekareka" kātahi ka pakipaki te pakipaki. Engari kāore anō kia mutu. Ko te hunga kāore anō kia pānui i a rātau tuhipoka hōtaka, ka riwhi i o rātau tūru. Ko ērā, nāna i whakapoke i te tikanga, ā, i pakipaki mōhio i waenganui i ngā nekeneke, ka kōarotia. Engari he aha te tikanga mo te pakipaki i te wā o ngā nekeneke i ngā konohete puāwaitanga? Mēnā e whakaaetia ana te whakamihi i tētahi aria i roto i te opera, he aha i kore ai ngā mahi a te rōpū whakatangitangi katoa? E kī ana a Susan Nickalls, te kaiwānanga pūoro o The Scotsman, he toenga e tūtuki ana. "Ka nui ake taku riri ina mare te tangata me te kōkuhu i roto i tētahi konohete. Ehara te pakipaki i te hara engari kei te āhua tonu o ngā āhuatanga," tana kī. "Ki taku whakaaro he pai ki te tangata te wātea ki te whakapuaki i a rātau i tēnei wā, engari ko te mea e kino ana ahau ki te wā he tino mārire te wā, ā, ka kawea koe ki tētahi atu wāhi katoa, ā, ka mutu te wāhanga e hiahia ana koe ki te noho ki reira tae noa ki te pāoro o te patu whakamutunga, ki ngā mokowhiti aho whakamutunga rānei,  Ā, he tangata tonu i tētahi wāhi e hiahia ana kia noho tuatahi ki te pakipaki. A, ka haukotia taua wā." Pakipaki māhorahora Tērā pea ka whakamārama i te āhua ātete i runga i te kanohi o te kaiārahi i a ia e haere tonu ana ki te wāhanga. Engari he pono, i roto i te whakahauhau kia iti iho te kōpikopiko me te nui ake o te māhorahora, kaua e kōrero i te hunga taitamariki, me whakamīharo aua tīmatanga pakipaki? E whakaae ana a Carol Main. Hei kaiwhakahaere o Live Music Now Scotland, he rite tonu tana whakahau ki te mau pūoro ki ngā kaimātakitaki hou e pahū ana ki te pakipaki māhorahora. "E whakahauhau ana mātou i tēnā, ā, kia pono, e whakaaro ana ahau i whakatangihia taua wāhanga i runga i tētahi huarahi e whakahauhau ana hoki i te pakipaki," tana kī. "Kāore au i āwangawanga, ā, ki taku whakaaro kāore anō te rōpū whakatangitangi. " He pātai mo te whakaaro nui. Mēnā ka ngaro i a koe te haere tonu, ka nekehia rānei te rōpū whakatangitangi, ka rerekē. "Ko te tauaro ko tāu i kite ai i te mutunga o Gotterdammerung i te Proms, i te ngaronga o te hunga whakarongo i tēnei wā, ka noho mārire rātau mō te 10, 15 hēkona rānei i muri i te mutunga o te wāhanga. Rite tonu ki te pakipaki." Ka whakamāramatia hoki e ia he rerekē ngā whenua e whai ana i ngā tikanga konohete rerekē. E whakamihi ana te hunga whakarongo o Ingarangi i ngā konohete puāwaitanga - engari āhua kore nei e tū ki te mahi pēnā. I Itari, he tino pūnoa te oati tū i te konohete. Nā reira me te aho katoa o ngā konohete a ngā rōpū o te ao whānui i waenganui i tēnei wā me te mutunga o Aotearoa, kātahi anō ka tīmata ngā āhuatanga o te tikanga konohete.

title: Me 'huri te akoranga' o Ēnā Me ki Te Wānanga - Sturgeon
summary: Ko te Pirimia o Ēnā Me "me huri i te ara" i runga i a Pirimia, "i mua i te tōmuritanga", kua kī a Nicola Sturgeon.
text: Kei Pōroa a Mrs Me mō ngā kōrero mō tētahi toronga ki te rā kati o Te Wānanga, kua whakatakotoria te whakapae mo te takaware ki ngā MP i roto i tētahi kōrero tūmatanui. I kī te minita tuatahi o Pirihitini he "tino tūkino" ngā kōrero a Mrs May, ā, "kāore i whakaaetia" tōna ake kawenga mo te "pārekareka". I kī a Ms Sturgeon "ki te rahua ngā mea katoa", me whakakore e ngā MP te Tuhipānui 50. Ko tētahi petihana e karanga ana kia puta tēnei - he nekehanga e whakakore ana i a Pakihitini - kua hipa i te miriona waitohu ahakoa te nui o ngā waka e tūtuki ana i te paetukutuku pāremata o UK. I kī a Mrs May e "tūmanako pono" ana a ia ka wehe atu te UK i te EU me tētahi mahi, ahakoa te whakataunga i whakaritea e ia ki ngā kaiārahi o Ūropi e rua ngā wā i ākiritia e ngā MP. Kei tētahi tihi te pirimia i Pōroa e ngana ana ki te whiwhi i tētahi toronga poto ki te rā kati o te Tuhipānui 50 kia wehe atu te UK i te EU, e kī ana mā tēnei e āhei ai ngā MP ki te whakatau i o rātau hinengaro. I a ia e kōrero ana mai i Te Tiriti o Te Wenerei, ka kī a ia kua "ngenge te iwi whānui i te whawhai me ngā kēmu tōrangapū" me te kī kua "wā tiketike" ka whakatauria e ngā kaipōrangapū ngā hipanga panuku. I tana kōrero ki te iwi whānui kei "to rātau taha", ka kī a ia: "Nō reira kua mahia e te pāremata ngā mea katoa e taea ana kia kore ai e kōwhiria. Kua hiahia ngā MP katoa ki te kōrero ko te mea kāore rātau e hiahia." I riri te urupare a ngā MP o ngā rōpū katoa ki ngā kōrero, me te kōrero a te Kaikōrero o Commons a John Bercow ki a rātau i te Rāitema "kāore tētahi o koutou he kaikaiwaiū". A, ka paunatia e Ms Sturgeon ki roto i te haupae i te wā o ngā pātai ki te minita tuatahi i Holyrood, e kī ana he "tino rangirua" te kōrero a Mrs May, ā, "he whakapono pōhēhē". Ka kī a ia: "He tino tūkino nga kōrero a te pirimia inapō, ā, e tūmanako ana ahau ka whakaarohia e ia tēnā. Engari i rahua hoki ana kōrero ki te whakaae ki tētahi o ngā kawenga e mau ana i a ia mo te raruraru o te UK i tēnei wā. "I pīrangi a ia ki te whakapae i te katoa hāunga a ia anō, engari ki taku whakaaro e mōhio ana te nuinga o te iwi ko te pirimia nāna i whakaoho te Tuhipānui 50 me te kore kaupapa; nāna i tātuhi i ngā raina whero tūpāpaku i a ia mai i te tīmatanga; nāna i karanga he pōti nui koretake; nāna i whakaroa te pōti tuatahi i tana mahi i te ngana ki te whakahaere i te karaka; i rahua ki te whakarongo me te huri i te ara i muri i te hinganga tuatahi o tana mahi, kātahi ko te tuarua. "Me huri e ia te ara ināianei i mua i te tōmuritanga, ā, me whai kawenga ia mo te raruraru o tēnei whenua." E manako ana a Ms Sturgeon ki te pupuri i tētahi atu taupānga i runga i a Pakihi, ā, ka kī atu a ia ki ngā MSP "ki te rahua ngā mea katoa" me whakakore te whakamōhiotanga o te Tuhipānui 50, me te pupuri i te UK i te EU. I te taenga atu ki Pōroa mō tētahi tihi o ngā kaiārahi EU, ka kī a Mrs May e "mahi ana ia ki te whakarite kia whakaae te pāremata ki tētahi mahi kia taea ai e tātau te haere i runga i te āhua tika". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mā tētahi toronga poto e homai ai ki a mātau taua wā hei whakatau kia wehe i te Uniana o Ūropi, ki te tuku i taua hua o taua taupānga, ā, e tino tūmanako ana ahau ka noho ki tētahi mahi whakaritea." I kī hoki a Ms Sturgeon he "tamariki" te kaiārahi Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn mo te haere atu i tētahi hui ki a Mrs May me ētahi atu kaiārahi rōpū nā te mea i reira te Rōpū Takitahi MP Chuka Umunna. I kī a Tēnā Kōpihi, e noho ana i Pōroa mō ōna ake kōrero, e rapu ana a ia i tētahi "whiringa whaitake" ki te mahi a te pirimia kia kore ai e puta atu. A, ka kī atu a Ms Sturgeon ki ngā MSP me tatari tētahi whakahōutanga tūmanako mō ana mahere mō te rangatiratanga o Pirihitini kia oti rā anō te "wāhanga" o nāianei o Te Wānanga. Ka kī a ia: "I kī ahau ka tatari ahau tae noa ki te mutunga o tēnei wāhanga o ngā whakaritenga o Te Pākehā tae noa ki te whakatakoto i ōku whakaaro ki te huarahi whakamua mō Pākehā. " I a au e mahi ana i tēnei roa e whakaaro ana ahau ko tōna kawenga ki te tatari kia kite he aha te māramatanga e puta mai ana i ngā rā tata nei, ahakoa he mārama noa iho tēnā kāore he māramatanga. Kātahi ka whakatakotoria e au ōku whakaaro ki te ara whakamua." I werohia te minita tuatahi i runga i tēnei e te kaiārahi Lib Dem o Pirihitini, a Willie Rennie, nāna i kī ka pūhui te rangatiratanga i te "wehenga me te ngangau" o Te Wānanga. I kī a ia he "maiorooro" a Ms Sturgeon mo te whakapono ka "pōrearea" te wehe atu i te EU, i a ia e tautohe ana hoki ko Pākehā e wehe ana i te UK he "wāhanga keke". Engari i whakautua e Ms Sturgeon e whakaaro ana a Tēnā Rennie "me pana noa iho ngā tāngata i Pākehā me te mau, me te whakamau i te tūkinotanga o Te Pākehā, kaua ko Pākehā e whai kōwhiringa ana kia mawhiti".

title: Ture hou hei tahuri i ngā hoa mahi ā-iwi ki te mārena
summary: Ākuanei ka taea e nga mārena tangata kotahi i Aiarangi ki te Raki te tahuri i ta rātau mahi ā iwi ki te mārena, kua kī te kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Piki McCormackBBC News NI Political Reporter The Northern Ireland Office (NIO) i kī ka mana ngā ture i te 7 o Hakihe. I muri mai i tētahi whakaaro tūmatanui e ono wiki mō ngā motika tahuringa e hiahiatia ana e ngā mārena i NI. Ka homai e ngā ture he matapihi e toru tau hei tahuri i tētahi hoa mahi tūmatanui tīariari hei mārena. Ka whakawāteatia ngā utu i roto i te tau tuatahi, ka kī te kāwanatanga. Ka taea hoki e ngā mārena kē te tahuri i tētahi mārena tīariari hei mahi ā iwi. I pā mai ngā ture e whakaae ana i ngā mārena tangata kotahi i Aiarangi ki te Raki i te Hānuere, engari kāore i toro atu ki ngā hoa mahi ā iwi. Mai i Mahuru, ka taea te tū ngā mārena whakapono tuatahi o te tangata kotahi. I whakatakotoria e te kāwanatanga te ture hou mo nga mahi ā iwi i te Pāremata i te Rāitema, ā, ka kī ka "whakahokia" ngā pātahitanga tahuri katoa, kia kitea ai rātou mai i te rā i hangaia ai te pātahitanga taketake. I kī te minita 'ōritetanga o te mārena katoa' o NIO o Kōpana Walker kua tutuki i te kāwanatanga ōna whakaritenga katoa e pā ana ki te mārena tangata kotahi me te whakarato mahi ā iwi i Aiarangi ki te Raki. "E tika ana kia uru ngā mārena katoa i Aiarangi ki te Raki ināianei ki ngā pātahitanga ā-ture ōrite me ngā mana pāhono, ngā parenga me ngā āheinga, hei mārena e noho ana i ērā atu o te UK, ā, e koa ana ahau kua taea e mātou te kawe mai i ngā ture e tika ana kia taea ai tēnei," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia ko ētahi atu huringa ki te ture mārena me te mahi ngātahi ā iwi, he take kia haere whakamua te Kaiwhakahaere me te Whakaminenga o NI. I kī a Amnesty International ko te nekehanga e tohu ana i "te wāhanga whakamutunga i te whakatutukitanga o te ōritetanga o te mārena" i Aiarangi ki te Raki. I kī a Patrick Corrigan, ko te kaiwhakahaere o NI o te rōpū he "rā nui o te hākari". "I whawhai mātau ki te huri i te ture kia ōrite ai te whakamihi i ngā mārena katoa me ngā whānau katoa, ā, ināianei kua tutuki i a mātau tēnā - i te tuatahi me te mārena tūmatanui, kātahi ko te mārena whakapono, ā, ināianei i te mutunga, me te tahuringa mahi ā iwi," tana tāpiri mai. I kī te Minita Pūtea a Conor Murphy he "hipanga nui whakamua mo te ōritetanga o te mārena". "Neke atu i te 1,300 ngā hoa mahi ā-iwi ōrite. Mai i Hakihea, ka whai mana ēnei mārena ki te tahuri i ta rāua mahi ā iwi ki te mārena."

title: Ka mate a Katherine Johnson: Ka mate te kaipāngarau NASA i te 101
summary: I te 101 o ona tau, kua mate te kaipāngarau o Awherika-Amerika o Nasa, a Katherine Johnson.
text: I pānuitia e NASA tōna matenga i runga i te Twitter, e kī ana e whakanui ana i tōna oranga me te whakahonore i "tōna tawhito o te tino pai i pakaru ai ngā ārai ā-iwi, pāpori hoki". I tātaitia e Ms Johnson ngā arawhiti tākirirangi me ngā āwhiotanga o te Ao mō ngā mahi mokowā o mua o NASA. I whakaahuatia a ia i roto i te kiriata i whakatauria e Oscar 2016 Hidden Figures. E kōrero ana te pikitia i te pūrākau o ngā wāhine o Awherika-Amerika, nā ōna pūkenga pāngarau i āwhina ki te whakanoho i te kaiāwhina o Amerika ko John Kete ki te āwhiotanga huri noa i te Ao i te tau 1962. I manatokona e Ms Johnson ngā tatauranga i mahia e ngā rorohiko hiko hou i mua i tana rerenga. I tātaitia kētia e Ms Hōnea te arawhiti mo te rere ātea o Ahana Shepard - te Amerika tuatahi i te mokowā. Koia tōna pūkenga me tōna rongonui i tono motuhake ai a Glenn mōna, ā, kāore i pai ki te rere ki te kore ia e manatoko i ngā tatauranga. I āwhina hoki a ia ki te tātai i te arawhiti mo te rere o te Apollo 11 o te tau 1969 ki te Marama. I whakaahuatia e te kaiwhakahaere NASA a Jim Bridenstine a Ms Johnson hei "kaiārahi mai i o mātau rā pūkenga". "I āwhina a Ms Johnson i to mātau iwi ki te whakanui ake i ngā rohe o te mokowā ahakoa i a ia e mahi ana i ngā whāinga nui i whakatuwhera hoki i ngā tatau mō ngā wāhine me ngā tāngata tae i roto i te rapu tangata whānui ki te hōpara i te mokowā," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. "Nā tōna ngākau tūturu me tōna pūkenga pāngarau i āwhina ki te whakanoho i te tangata ki runga i te Marama, ā, i mua i tērā ka taea e o tātau kaiāwhina te mahi i ngā hipanga tuatahi i te mokowā e whai ana tātau ināianei i tētahi haerenga ki Mars." I whakawhiwhia ki a Ms Johnson te Mētara Perehitini o te Wāteatanga i te tau 2015. I muri iho ka kōrerotia ia e te Perehitini o Amerika, a Te Perehitini o Amerika, i roto i tana wāhitau o te Tūnga o te Ūniana hei tauira o te wairua tūhura o te whenua. Ko wai a Katherine Johnson? I whānau a Ms Johnson i tētahi taone iti i West Virginia i te tau 1918, ā, i mīharo ki ngā tau mai i tōna tamarikitanga. "I tatauria e au ngā mea katoa. I tatauria e au ngā kaupae ki te huarahi, ngā kaupae ki te whare karakia, te maha o ngā rīhi me ngā taonga hiriwa i horoia e au... ko ngā mea katoa e taea te tatau, i mahia e au," tana kī i tētahi wā. I tino pai a ia, i puta mai i te kura tuarua i te 14 noa iho, i te whare wānanga i te 18. E kī ana a NASA he tino mīharo ana mahi mātauranga "i tētahi wā i tū ai te kura mō ngā Āwherika-Amerika i te kōeke tuawaru mō te hunga e āhei ana ki te whāngai i taua rangatiratanga". I muri i tana mahi hei kaiako me te noho hei whaea noho i te kāinga, ka tīmata a Ms Johnson ki te mahi mō te tuatahi o NASA, te National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics (Naca), i te tau 1953. I reira, i a ia te taitara mahi "rorohiko" ā, i whakaritea ki te tātai i ngā arawhiti mō ngā mahi ātea o mua o Amerika. I te wā o te tauomaoma mokowā i waenganui i a Mātau me te Uniana o Rōpūria o mua, ka mahi a Ms Hōnea me ōna hoa mahi o Awherika-Amerika ki ngā kaimahi mā, ā, ka whakamahia ngā whare taonga me ngā wāhi kai rerekē. I kī tonu a ia he arokē rawa a ia ki ana mahi kia māharahara ai ki te mahi ōrite. "I akona mātau e taku pāpā, 'He pai koe ki tētahi tangata i tēnei taone, engari kāore koe i te pai ake,'" tana kī atu ki a NASA i te tau 2008. "Kāore au i te whakaaro whakaiti. Kāore anō kia mahia. He pai ahau ki tētahi atu, engari kāore i te pai ake." He aha te tauhohenga? I muri i tōna matenga, ka ārahi a NASA i ngā takoha ki a Ms Johnson i muri i tōna matenga, e whakaahua ana i a ia he "toa Amerika" e kore e warewaretia tōna "tawhito pūkenga". I kī a Margot Lee Shetterly, nāna i tuhi Ngā Whika Huna, ko tōna "hōnore ora" te kōrero i te pūrākau a Ms Johnson. "Nā tōna māramatanga mātau i āwhina ki te kite me te whakanui i ētahi atu #hiddenfigures i roto i te hītori. I hurihia e koe te kōrero... E te Atua, ko Katherine Johnson," ka tuhituhi a ia i runga i te Twitter. I hoatu hoki e te kaitono perehitini o Amerika o Hillary Kikorangi he takoha ki a Ms Hōnea i runga i te Twitter. "Na ana tatauranga i āwhina ki te whakanoho i ngā Kaiāwhina ki te mokowā, ki te āwhiotanga, ā, i te mutunga, ki te Marama," ka tuhituhi a ia. I whakamoemiti te kaiwhakaari o Taraji P. Henson, nāna i tākaro i a Ms Johnson i roto i ngā Whika Huna, ki te pāngarau mō te tiritiri i tōna "mōhiotanga, māia, aroha noa me te ātaahua ki te ao". "Na to kaha o mahi ka taea e nga kotiro iti i nga wahi katoa te moemoea nui me te MARAMA!! Ka ora tonu tō tawhito..." i tuhituhi a ia i runga i Twitter. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki te mātakitaki:

title: Ko te umanga hinu me te korohū i roto i te 'hākinakina' 2014, ka kitea he uiuinga
summary: Kua pūrongotia e te umanga hinu me te korohū o UK tana mahinga ā-tau kino rawa atu mo te whā tekau tau.
text: I kī te tinana umanga Oil & Gas UK i te hinganga o ngā utu hinu me te pikinga o ngā utu, ko te tikanga o te wāhanga i pau me te haumi i te £5.3bn neke atu i te whiwhinga mai i ngā hokonga i te tau 2014. Ko taua putanga moni te nui rawa mai i te pūtea nui i roto i ngā pūhara i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau. I whakaaturia hoki e te uiuinga ā-tau a te tinana kua tautuhia te pūtea penapena i roto i te umanga kia hinga i tēnei tau, tae atu ki te wiri. I kī te Hinu & Korohū UK i ngā kitenga "hākinakina" i whakawhāititia ai te tino wawao o te mahi a te kāwanatanga hei whakaū i te wā roa o te umanga. Ahakoa i tūmanakohia te keri poka e 25 i tērā tau, e 14 anake i tūponotia, e haere tonu ana i te ia whakararo. E 50 miriona anake ngā pāro rāhui hinu, tōna ōrite korohū rānei i kitea. I tēnei tau, e tūmanako ana ngā mema o Oil & Gas UK i waenganui i te waru me te 14 ngā poka hōpara, ā, e rima anake ngā poka hei arotake i ngā kitenga tuatahi. E tohu ana tēnei ki te whakataka poupou o te pūtea penapena ki te whakawhanake i ngā rāhui hou me te whakaroa i ngā āpure o nāianei. I whakaaturia hoki e te uiuinga: Kua piki te utu mō ia oko i tangohia ki tētahi pūkete teitei o te £18.50. E tūmanakohia ana kia hinga tērā i te wā e whakahoki ana te umanga i ōna utu, tae atu ki tētahi nekehanga tautohetohe ki te huri i ngā tauira tītaka mō ngā kaimahi o waho. E kīia ana me whakapai ake ngā ine utu me te tōtika tae atu ki te 40% mō ia oko hinu mēnā he wā e tū ana mō te wāhanga o waho o UK. I kī te rangatira nui o Oil & Gas UK, a Malcolm Webb: "Ahakoa i te $110 mō ia oko, ko te kaha o te umanga ki te mōhio ki te kaha katoa o te rauemi hinu me te korohū o UK i whakanuia e te whakanui ake i ngā utu, he kawenga tāke taumaha me ngā ture kāore i te tika. " I nga utu hinu o nāianei, he mārama rawa tātau ināianei e kite ana i nga hua. "Me te kore pūtea penapena tautoko i ngā āpure hōu, tīariari hoki, ka ngaro atu ngā hanganga takenui, ka mau i ngā pokapū hira o te Moana ki te Raki, ka whakakore i ngā wāhi o te peihana me te waiho hinu me te korohū ki te whenua." Mai i te 2010 tae noa ki te waenganui o te 2014, he tino pūmau ngā utu hinu o te ao, tata ki te $110 i te oko. Engari mai i Pipiri, i hinga ngā utu i raro iho i te $50, ā, kātahi anō ka hokona i te $60. I whakahaeretia tēnei e te tono ngoikore i ngā whenua maha nā te tupu o te ohaoha, me te pana o te whakanaotanga o Amerika, me te wehenga mai i te whanonga o mua e ngā iwi kaweake hinu, mā te pupuri i te whakanaotanga, kaua e tapahi kia mau tonu te utu. I a ia e urupare ana ki te pūrongo, ka kī taurangi a Tumuaki George Osborne kia mahi anō hei tautoko i te umanga hinu me te korohū o te Moana ki te Raki. Ka kī a ia: "Ahakoa he tino painga te hinganga nui o te utu hinu ki te rangatiratanga o Ingarangi, he uaua tērā mo te umanga hinu me te korohū o te Moana ki te Raki. " He pūtea penapena pūkete tā mātou i te Moana ki te Raki, ā, he nui tonu te hinu kei reira. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakamōrahi tonu i te pūtea penapena i te Moana ki te Raki kia tino mōhio ai ka whakarato tonu i ngā mahi me ngā painga ohaoha ki te katoa o te UK. " He rawa nui te Moana ki te Raki, ā, ka mahia e mātau nga mea katoa hai pare. "Kua tapahia kētia e au ngā tāke i te Moana ki te Raki, ā, kei te titiro mātou ināianei ki ngā mea anō ka taea e mātou ki te mahi tahi me te umanga hei tautoko i te pūtea penapena i tēnei wāhanga hira." Ko te tikanga kia tūtaki a Tēnā Osborne ki ngā kaiārahi umanga i te Wenerei ki te kōrerorero he aha ngā mahi e hiahiatia ana e te umanga me te kāwanatanga hei whakarite i te angitu mo te wā roa o te wāhanga. I kī te Minita Pūngao o Pākehā o Aotearoa, a Fergus Ewing: "Ko tēnei pūrongo e whakamiramira ana i te mahi tōmuri, kōhukihuki hoki i runga i te tāke me ngā ture, me tuku e te kāwanatanga o UK kia mōhio ai ki te umanga e hiahiatia ana hei pare i ngā mahi me te pūtea penapena. " E whakahauhau ana kia tūmanakohia e Oil and Gas UK te pikinga o te whakanao ā-tau tuatahi i roto i te 15 tau i tēnei tau. "Heoi anō, hei tautoko i ngā ngohe o te Moana ki te Raki i te wā roa ake, me whakapai ake ngā taumata hōpara, ā, me tautoko te pūtea penapena mo te wā roa kia tika ai te putanga hou ki te roma. " Me āwhina tēnei ki te pare i ngā rīhīti tāke ā muri ake me te whakarite i te hokinga tika ki te iwi." I karangatia e te uniana Unite he raweke kāwanatanga ināianei ki te whakatū i tāna i kī ai he "tauomaoma kino ki raro" i roto i ngā paerewa mahi puta noa i te umanga o te Moana ki te Raki. I kī te Hēkeretari o Te Hononga o Pirihitini, a Pat Rafferty: "I tēnei ata ka mārama te kite i te whakaaro o te umanga ki te tuhi anō i te whenua o waho mō te whakatupuranga e whai ake nei, ā, he kino te whakaaro mō ngā mahi, te utu, ngā pūkenga me tētahi taiao mahi haumaru. " Ehara tēnei i te huarahi ki te whakarite mō te wā heke mai o tō tātau wāhanga ohaoha tino hira me ngā kāwanatanga o UK me ngā kāwanatanga o Pirihitini, me mutu te mātakitaki me te uru wawe." Kai te pāngia koe e te hinganga ohorere o nga utu hinu? Ka taea e koe te tiritiri i ō wheako mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk Whakaurua koa he tau hoapā mēnā kei te hari koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Īmēra mai i ō pikitia, ataata, ororongo rānei ki a mātou i yourpics@bbc.co.uk Ngā Ture me ngā tikanga mō te tuku koha ki te BBC.

title: Kotahi te Tangata, E Rua Guvnors: Ko Owain Arthur i te tango i a Hemi Corden
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e te kaitapere Welsh o Owain Arthur te "uauatanga" o te tango i a Hemi Corden i West End i patua e Kotahi te Tangata, E Rua Guvnors.
text: Na Tim MastersEntertainment me te korero toi, ko TE Rongokōrero o Te Whare Tapere, e ārahi ana i tētahi kōrero hou i te Whare Tapere o Royal Haymarket, e tākaro ana i te kaitiaki hākinakina o Francis Henshall. "I ētahi wā ka rongo tonu ahau i te reo o Hemi e kōrero ana i tētahi raina e kōrero ana ahau," tana kī i muri i te pō tūwheratanga o te Tūrei. "Engari i te pō nei ka mahue i a ia i roto i te rūma whakakākahu, a, ka haere ahau ki runga i te atamira hei ahau anō." Kei roto i te hunga hou ko Oliver! ko te whetū ko Jodie Prenger me te kaiwaiata S Club o mua ko Hannah Spearritt. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te AO i muri i te whakaaturanga, ka whakaae a Arthur nā te haere a te Kuini ki tētahi mahinga arokite i āwhina ki te whakangāwari i ōna io o te pō tuatahi. "Tērā te hanganga ki te pō nei, engari i te taenga mai o te Kuini i tērā wiki he pēhanga tāpiri - nā reira he pō pēhi i whakaritea ki tērā." I a ia e whakakī ana i a Arthur mō Corden e whā ngā wā i te wā o te whakaaturanga o mua o te West End i te Whare Tapere o Adelphi. I te wā o tōna pō tuatahi i runga i te atamira, ka tono te kaiwhakahaere o te Whare Tapere o te Motu, a Nicholas Hytner ki te kaitapere Welsh kia tango i a Corden. "I tana tukunga mai ki a au kāore i tino rēhitatia," te whakaae a Arthur. "Kāore au i mōhio he aha te kōrero, nā reira ka kōrero tonu ia ki te whakakī i ngā āputa. Engari i whakaae ahau, a, anei ahau." I kī atu a Hytner ki te AO ehara te rongonui o Arthur - te kore rānei - ehara i te take. "He pai ake te whakaaro ki te tiki i te tangata i mōhio mātau he tino pai, kaua ki te haere ki tētahi tangata rongonui. " Kāore mātau i maka i a Hemi nā te mea he rongonui a ia. I makaia ia e mātau nā te mea i mōhio mātau he kaitapere kōmeke tino pai a ia. I makaia e mātau a Owain nā te mea he kaitapere kōmeke tino pai a ia, ā, e mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka rongonui a ia i te wā." He pai te āhua o nga tohu o mua mai i nga kaiwhakawāwā. Mā te whakaahua i a Arthur he "tino pai", e kī ana a Patrick Marmion o te Mēra o ia Rā i roto i tētahi arotakenga whetū whā: "I a Corden te wā kōmeke me te kōrero ā-tinana, ā, he mahinga tāruarua tēnei." Ko te whakatangi a Richard Bean, i runga anō i te The Servant of Two Masters, i whakatuwheratia tuatahitia i te National Theatre i Me 2011. E kōrero ana te urutaunga pakipaki i te pūrākau o te kaiwhakatangitangi skiffle i pekea e Francis Henshall e whiu ana i ngā mahi mō ngā rangatira tokorua i roto i tana mahi hou hei kaitiaki i ngā tau kotahi rau e ono tekau mā rua. I whakatuwheratia te whakaaturanga i te Whare Tapere o Adelphi i Whiringa ā Rangi ki ngā arotakenga hākinakina. Kei roto i ngā mahi atamira o mua a Arthur ko te whakaputanga o te Whare Tapere ā-Motu o Hytner o The History Boys, tae atu ki a Romeo rāua ko Juliet mō te Royal Shakespeare Company, The Comedy of Errors for the Royal Exchange Theatre me Birdsong i te Comedy Theatre. "Ko te wero nui rawa ko te whakaoti i a au," te kī a Arthur. "Kāore anō ahau kia tākaro i tētahi tūranga ārahi i roto i tētahi whakaaturanga i te West End. Kāore i taea e au te whakamā atu i taua mea - me haere ahau ki te hākinakina." I kī a ia kaore he take o te ngana ki te pakoire i te mahinga a Corden. "Nā te āhei ki te whakaharatau me tētahi kamupene hou i āki ai ahau kia rerekē. Kua hurihia ētahi rārangi hei whakaurutau i a Francis hei Welshman. Kei te whakatuwheratia e Corden te whakawhiti a US me te hunga taketake o te tākaro i te tākaro i Broadway i Aperira. "Ko te momo mea tērā pea e kore e whakawhiti i te Atahanganui, engari he pai te whakamātau," te kī a Hytner. "E aroha ana ngā Kaiāwhina e haere mai ana ki Rānana, engari ko te pātai kāore e taea e mātou te whakautu kia tae rā anō mātou ki reira, mēnā ka whiwhi te hunga whānui ake o Broadway, mēnā ka rangi ki tētahi āhua ngahau tino Peretania. Ki taku whakaaro ka pērā. He nui te ngahau he ao whānui." I tāpiri mai a Arthur kua whiwhi karere ia mai i a Corden i mua tonu i te pō whakatuwheratanga. "I tukuna mai e ia he kuputuhi ātaahua ki a au e kī ana: 'Nāu ināianei - haere.' "I pēnei i tētahi tukunga whaimana, mēnā e hiahia ana koe. Pēnei i a ia e kī ana, 'Māku e kawe ki Niu Ioka, engari kei te mahi koe i Rānana. Kei a koe - ka tukitukia e koe!'"

title: E anga ana te hēkeretari ture ki te mahi ture mo te coronavirus i roto i nga whare herehere
summary: Kei te anga atu te Hēkeretari o te Ture a Robert Buckland ki te mahi ture mo tana whakahaere i te pakarutanga o te coronavirus i roto i nga whare herehere puta noa i Ingarangi me Wales.
text: E rua ngā aroha e kī ana mahere ki te rutu i te horahanga he "pōturi rawa" ki te pānga, nā reira he "ture". E kī ana te kāwanatanga tae atu ki te 4,000 ngā herehere ka taea te tuku atu ki te rua marama i mua ki te waihanga mokowā anō - engari i te Tūtira, e 18 anake i tukua. I kī te kāwanatanga he kaupapa pakari tāna hai pare i nga herehere. Engari i kī te hēkeretari tika o te kōruru o Labour, a David Lammy: "Ko te wā te tino take hei ārai i o tātau whare herehere kia kore ai e noho hei wāhiwera Covid-19." Tae noa ki te Wenerei, e 232 ngā herehere i whakamātauria he pai mō Covid-19 puta noa i ngā whare herehere e 60. E 96 hoki ngā kaimahi i pāngia i tēnei wā, ā, i kitea te coronavirus i roto i te haurua o ngā whare herehere katoa puta noa i ngā whenua e rua. Kua karangatia e te Rōpū Kāwana o te Whare Herehere kia whakahekea te iwi whānui o te whare herehere ki te 15,000. I tukuna e te Rōpū Hauati mō te Whakahōu Pene me te Whare Herehere tētahi reta ā-ture whai tikanga - te hipanga tuatahi i roto i ngā takahanga arotakenga ā-ture - i te Paraire. I kī nga aroha i muri i "ngā wiki o ngā tuhinga whawhai" i waenganui i a rātau me te kāwanatanga, e karanga ana kia tere ake te mahi. 'Whakatika ki tēnei wero' I kī te rangatira nui o te Rōpū o Howard, a Wīwī Crook, kua "whakaae tūmatanui a Tēnā Buckland kia tino whakahekea te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i roto i te whare herehere kia taea ai te whakaora ora". Engari i kī a ia kāore e taea e ngā mehua kua whakaritea e te kāwanatanga. "Kei te tere haere te tere o te whakapokenga, ā, kei te ngaro atu te matapihi wātea ki te pare i te tangata," tana tāpiri mai. "Me whakatika ngā minita ki tēnei wero, ā, me mahi wawe ki te ārai i tētahi pākihi hauora tūmatanui." I kī a Pita Dawson, ko te tumuaki o te Prison Reform Trust, he "iti rawa, he tōmuri rawa" ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga i te wā i tae mai ki te whare herehere. 'Tuku rangitahi' I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore i taea te mārama ake ngā tohutohu pūtaiao me ngā tohutohu whakahaere - mēnā e tino nui ana ngā minita ki te whai atu, me haere kē atu rātou, me mahi ināianei." I kī te Manatu Ture ka urupare ki te reta i te wā e tika ana. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "He mahere pakari, ngāwari hoki tā mātou kia noho haumaru ai ngā herehere, ngā kaimahi me te iwi whānui i runga anō i ngā tohutohu hou mai i te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi. " Hei wāhanga o te mahere ā-motu hei pare i te NHS me te whakaora ora, kua pānuitia kētia e mātou tae atu ki te 4,000 ngā herehere mōrearea i roto i te rua marama o tō rātou rā tuku, ka tukua rangitahitia mai i te whare herehere, tae atu ki ngā wāhine hapū." Engari i kī a Tēnā Lammy o Labour he maha tonu ngā take, tae atu ki te PPE koretake mō ngā kaimahi me te whakamātautau takitahi o ngā herehere. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E tūmanako ana mātou ka tino nui te mahi a te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga mo te Ture i tēnei whakatūpato i pūhia e ēnei rōpū whakahaere taihara. " E hiahiatia ana he mahi kōhukihuki hei ārai i tētahi mōrearea hauora tūmatanui i roto i te pūnaha tika."

title: David Van Day to stand in Thurrock Council election
summary: Kua pānuitia e te kaiwaiata a David Van Day ka tū ia mo te pōti hei kaikaunihera paetata.
text: Ko te whetū pahū o mua, nāna i rongonui i nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, ka tū hei Rangatira i te poipoi o tērā tau. E ai ki te pūrongo tuatahi a Tō Thurrock, ka whakataetae a Van Day i te rohe o Aveley me Upland i te Kaunihera o Thurrock. I tēnei wā kei te puritia te tūru e Tim Aker, te MEP UKIP mō te Rāwhiti, i pōtitia i te tau 2014. He tangata rongonui ahau i mua... Tangohia ahau i konei! Ko te hoa puni o Van Day, e noho ana i South Ockendon, i tū mo te pōti paetata o te tau 2007 i Aotearoa. I kī a ia kāore i taea e ia te kōrero mō tōna tauwhāinga i tēnei wā i muri i tana mahinga.

title: Tīmata: Ka tīmata a Heathrow ki te whakamātau i ngā pāhihi
summary: Me tīmata te taunga rererangi o Heathrow ki te whakamātau i te Tīpoka i waenganui i ngā pāhihi e rere ana ki UK mai i ngā whenua mōrearea.
text: I kī atu te hēkeretari hauora ki ngā MP he "ringa" kēhi e tūmanakohia ana kia tae ki UK i mua i te Kirihimete. Ka tīmata te whakamātautau i Kāpeka 1, i mua i te whakawhānuitanga ki ētahi atu kāpeka, taunga rererangi o Gatwick me Eurostar i te mutunga o te wiki. I te wā o Mahuru, tata ki te 1,000 ngā tāngata i tae mai ki UK mai i ngā whenua i pāngia e te Tīpoka i Awherika ki te Uru. I tēnei wā, kua mate tētahi mana rongoā UN i pāngia e te Tīpoka i a ia e mahi ana i Liberia i tētahi hōhipera i Tiamana. Tīpoka: He aha te mahi i te UK? Ko ngā āhuatanga o te tāpoi ko te kirikā, te ānini, te ruaki, te pārekareka, te toto - engari he rite ēnei ki ngā mate pūnoa pēnei i te rewharewha me ētahi iro puku. Mēnā kei a koe ēnei āhuatanga, ā, kua whakapā atu ki tētahi tūroro Tīpoka, waea atu ki te 111 i te tuatahi, kaua e haere hāngai ki A&E, ki tētahi GP rānei. Mēnā kāore anō kia whakapā atu ki te tāpoi, rapua te āwhina mai i te 111, tō GP, tō A&E rānei mēnā e hiahiatia ana. Kei te iti tonu te wā e whakawhanake ana i te tāpoi i te UK. Whakamātautau tāpoi: Ka mahi? Me pēhea te kore e hopu i te Tīpoka Ko te nuinga o ngā pāhihi e rere ana mai i Liberia, Sierra Leone me Kini, i reira i mate ai te tāpoi neke atu i te 4,000 ngā tāngata, ka mātakina i mua i te whakaaetanga kia eke ki runga i te waka rererangi. I raro i ngā tikanga whakamātautau hōu o UK, ka kitea rātou e ngā āpiha o te Ope Taitapa i te taenga atu. Kātahi ka mahia e ngā nēhi me ngā kaitohutohu o Public Health England te whakamātautau tūturu. Ka tangohia e ngā pāhihi ō rātou pāmahana, ka whakaoti i tētahi uiui mōrearea, ā, ka tuhia ngā taipitopito whakapā. Ka mauria ki te hōhipera te tangata e whakapae ana i te tāpoi. Ko ngā pāhihi e whakaarotia ana he tino mōrearea nā te whakapā atu ki ngā tūroro o te Tīmata, engari kāore nei i te whakaatu i ngā tohu, ka whakapā atu ki ia rā e te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi. Kāore he rerenga hāngai ki UK mai i Liberia, Sierra Leone, Kini rānei, ko te tikanga me hopu ngā tāngata e haere ana mai i aua whenua i tētahi rerenga tūhono ki te UK, ā, ka tae ki ngā taunga rererangi kāore i te tirotiro i ngā pāhihi. Ka noho kē ngā "mōhiohio tino kitea" i ngā wāhi tāurunga katoa ki te UK. E whakaaro ana te Tari Hauora ko te 85% o nga taenga katoa ki te UK mai i nga whenua kua pangia ka haere mai ma Heathrow. I kī te kaipānui waka o TE WĀ, a Rārangi Westcott, kotahi tonu te rerenga i te Tūrei tērā pea ka herea ki ngā tikanga whakamātautau hou. Ko te rererangi o Brussels Airlines i wehe atu i Liberia ki Brussels i te po o te Mane, me nga whakawhitinga e haere mai ana ki Heathrow i te 09.30 BST i te Turei. Ka whakawhānuitia te whakamātautau ki te Kāpeka 2 i te Wenerei, ā, ka whakataka atu ki ērā atu kāpeka e toru i te mutunga o te wiki, ka tāpiritia e to mātau korero. "I tēnei wā kāore he whakamātautau i Pōroa me Parihi i reira te nuinga o ngā rerenga hāngai mai i te rohe pāngia ka tau, ka whakawhiti rānei ki te UK," tana kī. I rere atu te korero kōrero ITV o Neil Connery ki Heathrow mai i Pōroa i te ata Tūrei, ā, i kī mai i pātaitia ia ki te mana taitapa i tīmata ai tana haerenga. "I pātai tētahi tīma iti o ngā kaiwhakahaere taitapa e mau ana i ngā karapu ārai kikorangi ki ētahi pāhihi i te taenga mai o Lhr," tana kihi. I kī te kaiwhakatika haere a te Independent, a Haimona Calder, e toru ngā waka rererangi e mahi ana i roto i ngā whenua e toru e tino pāngia ana - Air France, Royal Air Maroc me Brussels Airlines - ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā rerenga i te wiki. Ko ngā taenga mai o te 'tāngata mōrearea iti' e tohu ana i tētahi neke tere o te kaupapahere mai i te kāwanatanga o UK. I tērā wiki, i kī kāore he mahere mō te whakamātautau i te wā i whakamātauria ai ngā tāngata i mua i te wehenga atu i ngā whenua pāngia. I kī te WHO he koretake, ā, ko te tikanga o te whakamātautau i "te nuinga o ngā tāngata mōrearea iti". I te Mane, ka kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Jeremy Hunt me whakarite te UK mō te āhuatanga e heke ana i Awherika ki te Uru. I kī a ia: "E whakaū ana [te āpiha rongoā matua] kei te iti tonu te mōrea hauora tūmatanui i te UK, ā, kei te noho tonu ngā mehua i tēnei wā, tae atu ki te whakamātautau puta atu i ngā whenua e toru e pāngia ana, e tuku ana i te taumata parenga tika. " Heoi anō, ahakoa me ōrite tonu te urupare ki ngā ohotata hauora o te ao, ka tohutohu hoki ia i te kāwanatanga kia whakaritea he pikinga pea o te taumata mōrearea." I tāpiritia e Tēnā Hunt ko te whiu i te tīmatatanga i Āwherika te "huarahi tino hira" o te ārai i te taenga mai o te Tīpoka ki te UK. Kua oati te kāwanatanga o UK i te £125m "hei āwhina ki te pupuri, ki te whakahaere, ki te tiaki me te hinga i te Tīpoka", e hia rau ngā kaimahi NHS kua tono ki te haere ki Awherika ki te Uru, ā, e 750 ngā hōia kua horaina hei āwhina ki te hanga i ngā pūtahi rongoā me te whakarato tautoko arawhiti. Ko te oko tūpāpaku o UK, ko RFA Argus, he hōhipera tino whai rawa, e tūmanakohia ana kia rere atu ki Sierra Leone ā muri ake i tēnei wiki. E kore e whakamahia hei tiaki i ngā tūroro i whakapokea e te tāpoi, engari ko te nuinga o te wā ki te kete waka me ngā tāngata. Kaore he rongoā, he rongoā rānei mō te tāpoi, e tukuna ana mā te werawera, te toto me te hure. Ka mauria ngā tāngata katoa i te UK e whakapae ana i te Tīpoka ki te hōhipera, ā, ka mauria ngā tātauira toto ki te taiwhanga tohunga o Public Health England mō te whakamātautau tere. Mēnā he pai te whakamātautau, ka whakawhitia te tūroro ki tētahi wae taratahi i te Hōhipera Royal Free i Rānana. Ko te pokapū i tiaki i te nēhi o Ingarangi a William Pooley, nāna i pāngia te Tīpoka i Awherika ki te Uru. Kei te tūtatari ngā hōhipera i Newcastle, Liverpool me Sheffield ki te tuku i ngā pūkenga ōrite mēnā he pātōtō ohorere i roto i ngā kēhi Tīpoka. E 26 ngā moenga taratahi ka taea te whakarite i ngā hōhipera e whā. I kī atu te hēkeretari hauora kōruru a Andy Burnham ki a BBC Radio 5 live ko te whakamōhio i te whakamātautau "ko te mea tika hei mahi" i runga anō i ngā tohutohu a te āpiha tākuta matua. I kī a ia he iti rawa te rongoā whakamātautau ZMapp, kua whakamahia hei tiaki i ngā tūroro o te tāpoi, ā, me nui ake te mahi hei whakawhānui i te kaha whakanao.

title: Ka mate te kaiwhakahauhau taiao a Ariki Pita Melchett, e 71 tau te pakeke
summary: Kua mate te kaiwhakahauhau taiao mo te wā roa me te kaiahuwhenua waro a Ariki Pita Melchett, e 71 tau te pakeke.
text: Ko Lord Melchett, e noho ana i Ringstead, Norfolk, he kaiwhakahaere nui o Greenpeace UK, ā, kātahi anō ka noho ko te kaiwhakahaere kaupapahere o te Soil Association. I te tau 1999, i whakawāteatia a ia i te tūkinotanga hara i muri i tana whakapae i te tāhaetanga i tētahi poro kānga GM i Lyng. I kī te hoa o Elizabeth Buchannan ko ia "he tangata whakatūtū i noho hei kaiwhakahauhau tohetohe". I haere a Pita Mond, te tuawhā o Baron Melchett, mai i Eton ki te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge, i reira ia i pānui ai i te ture. Na te mate i ārai i a ia tana whakamutunga, engari i muri iho ka riro i a ia he MA i roto i te mātauranga i te Whare Wānanga o Keele, i muri mai i te 18 marama i te Kura Ohaoha o Rāwāhi. I riro i a Ariki Melchett tōna taitara i te 25 o ona tau, i muri i te matenga wawe o tōna pāpā. Ka noho a ia hei Whip Rōpū Mahi, he minita iti i te Tari Taiao, he minita kāwanatanga mō Aiarangi ki te Raki i raro i a Jim Callaghan. I te tau 1989, i te tau kotahi mano, i te tau 1999, ka anga atu a ia me ngā hoa kaiwhaiwhai e 27 ki ngā utu tūkino hara i muri i te tāhaetanga i ngā hua whakakē ā-ira, engari i whakawāteatia i te whakaaetanga a te hūri ki ta rātau wawaotanga i whakapono rātau ka whakapokea e te hua te taiao. I te tau 1985, i whakamātau a ia ki te tapahi i te waea paenga o tētahi papa rererangi o Amerika i Sculthorpe i East Anglia hei wāhanga o tētahi whakahē ārai karihi. I a ia e kōrero ana ki a Sue Lawley i Desert Island Discs i te tau 2000, ka kī a ia me whai te iwi whānui ki a koe ki te whakarerekē.
