"Ka toa anake koe i tētahi whakahau mēnā ka tautokona koe e te tangata, ā, ka tautoko anake te tangata i a koe mēnā kei te tika koe - mēnā he tika tāu e kōrero nei, mēnā rānei ko tāu e matapae nei ko te take," tana kī. I kī te kaiwhakahaere nui o Greenpeace UK, a John Sauven, ka "tino mahue i a ia e ngā tāngata katoa e aroha ana ki ngā kararehe me te hiahia ki te pare i te taiao o te ao". "I roto i ngā tau e 12 o Pita e whakahauhau ana i Greenpeace, i mataku ia ki te mau i ngā kaporeihana nunui pēnei i te BP me te Monsanto, engari i te tautoko i ngā rongoā pēnei i te whakamātao Greenfreeze hei tiaki i te apa hāora. " E noho rangimārie ana tātau katoa ki te whenua me ōna kararehe nā ana mahi. He tohetohe pono, he kaiwhakahauhau ki te mutunga." I kī a Helen Browning, te āpiha nui o te Pānga Oneone, i reira a Ariki Melchett mo te 18 tau, i "tino pouri" te rōpū i tōna matenga. "He tino hira, he tangata whai mana i roto i te taiao me te nekeneke waro puta noa i tōna oranga," tana kī. I kī a Ms Buchannan, he mema o te poari ā-rangatira i te Tari Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua: "He tangata whakaharahara a ia, engari he tino whakawhirinakitanga tōna nā te mea i te pāmu tonu ia i Norfolk nā reira kāore ia i te pāmu noa iho, i te mahi a ia, ā, i te whakamatau ia me pēhea e taea ai e koe te pāmu i tētahi huarahi rerekē. " I puritia e ia ēnei whakaaro me ēnei mea i a ia e noho ana i ngā wā katoa he rangatira pono... he ngāwari, he atawhai, he toa hoki, he ngākau nui.

title: Ka hoki a Osprey EJ ki te rāhui mo te wā tāuri 15
summary: Kua hoki mai tētahi osprey wahine ki tētahi rāhui māori Highlands mō tā RSPB Scotland e kī ana ko tōna wā tāuri 15.
text: I kitea te manu, e mōhiotia ana e ngā kaitiakitanga ko EJ, i tōna kōhanga i te rāhui o RSPB i Cairngorms i te Wenerei. Ka heke mai ngā Ospreys mai i Āwherika ki te uru ki Pākehā ki te tāuri, ā, ka kitea e kimi ika ana i ngā awa me ngā roto. Ko EJ te osprey wahine tino angitu o Loch Garten. I te wā tāuri o tērā tau, kāore a ia i whakaae ki te waiho i tana kākahu hēki ahakoa i tanumia ki raro i te hukarere. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o Loch Garten Osprey Centre, a Jess Tomes: "He umanga mōrearea te hekenga osprey mō ēnei manu, nā reira kāore mātou e tino mōhio ko ēhea ngā osprey ka hoki ki tō mātou kōhanga. " He tino nui te wāhanga o te papanga o Loch Garten - he rite ki te pōhiri i te kāinga i tētahi hoa tino aroha. Kei te rekareka noa iho mātou." Me takirua te manu ki tētahi hoa hou i tēnei tau i muri i te ngaronga o Odin, tōna hoa e iwa tau, i te waenganui o tērā tau. I kī a RSPB Pākehā e "rere tiketike" ana ngā tūmanako ka taea e tētahi takirua hou te tāpiri ki te tatau a EJ e 25 ngā pīpī osprey rere mai i te kōhanga o Loch Garten.

title: Taupānga EU: E kī ana te tumuaki i ngā taki taitapa NI 'tē mōhiotia' mēnā ka wehe atu a UK i te EU
summary: Kua kī te Tumuaki he nui ake ngā taki pākaha i te rohe i waenganui i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te Whenua, me wehe atu te UK i te EU.
text: I Aiarangi ki te Raki a Hōri Osborne e whakahauhau ana mō tētahi pōti 'Noho' i roto i te taupānga EU. Engari i kī te kaiwhakahauhau 'Waiho' a Sammy Wilson kāore i tū ki te tirotiro. "He rohe whenua i waenganui i Nōwei me Huitene, ā, kāore i a koe aua momo taki me aua pou taitapa," te kī a Tēnā Uira ki a Good Morning Ulster. "He rohe whenua i waenganui i Wīwī me Huiterangi, ā, kāore i a koe te hiri o te rohe, nā reira he aha i rerekē ai a Aiarangi ki te Raki me te Whenua o Aiarangi?" Heoi anō, i a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te hōtaka kotahi, ka kī te Tumuaki mēnā ka pōti te UK ki te haere: "Ohorere ana he wāhanga te Whenua o te EU, ehara tonu i te rohe i waenganui i te UK me te Whenua o Aiarangi, koia te rohe i waenganui i te UK me te Uniana o Ūropi," tana kī. " E utu ana te Uniana o Ūropi i tētahi tāke, he utu mo nga mea e haere mai ana ki roto, e kore e utua e tātau i te meneti nā te mea kei te EU mātau. "Nā, ko wai ka tirotiro he aha aua taonga?" I kī a ia he taki auau i waenganui i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te Whenua, mēnā ka noho hei rohe i waenganui i te UK me te EU. "I konei i tēnei wāhi o te UK, ka āwhina (te EU) ki tō mātou rohe whenua. " Kāore e taea e koe te kī 'e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakahaere i ā mātou taitapa', i a rātou e kī tonu ana, engari ka mea, 'engari kāore e pā ki ngā taitapa'. He kerēme kuware tēnei a ngā kaiwhakahauhau Waiho." I mua rā ka whakatangihia e te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Ēnā Hāmipi te tūponotanga o ngā huringa tohetohe, e mōhio ana ko ngā whakaritenga haere koreutu o nāianei i roto i te motu o Aiarangi i mua i te mema o te UK o te EU. I kī a ia i te wā o tētahi putanga o Ingarangi (Brexit) - ka pupuri te UK i tētahi rohe tuwhera ki Airangi. I whakaahuatia e ia ngā kerēme ki te hē he "mahi whakamataku". Engari i a ia e kōrero ana i mua i tana haerenga ki Perehi i te Mane, ka kī a Tēnā Osborne ka "kore e taea te whakarerekē i ngā whakaritenga taitapa". "Waiho ngā kaiwhakahauhau e huatau ana ehara tēnei i te take, kāore i te hāngai ki ngā tāngata," tana tāpiri mai. Ko Nōwei, Huitene, Wīwī me Huiterangi tētahi wāhanga o te Whakaaetanga a Rōpū, nāna i whakakore te nuinga o ngā taitapa ā-roto o te EU, e whakahohe ana i te nekehanga uruwhenua puta noa i te nuinga o te kōti mai i te tau 1995. Heoi anō, kua kōwhiria e te UK me te Whenua o Aiarangi. E hiahia ana te UK ki te pupuri i ōna ake taitapa, ā, he pai ake ki Dublin te pupuri i tana whakaritenga nekeneke koreutu ki te UK - e kiia nei ko te Wāhi Haere Noa - kaua e hono ki Rōpū. 'Ohorere ohaoha' I whakatūpato hoki te Tumuaki he tino mōrearea a Aiarangi ki te Raki ki ngā hua pūtea o te putanga o Ingarangi i te EU. I kī a ia "e whakaae ana ia reo takitahi whai tikanga tērā tētahi tumeke ohaoha hōhonu e whara ai i ngā mahi, ngā oranga me ngā paerewa ora a te iwi. Ka whakatūpato a ia ka anga atu ngā kaiahuwhenua ki ngā utu pārekareka iti iho, e kī ana mā te waiho i te EU ka rawakore te UK, nō reira kāore i kitea e ia "me pēhea e taea ai e koe te pupuri i te taumata tautoko ōrite mō te ahuwhenua".

title: Ka tautāwhi te minita taiao o Therese Coffey i te tweet kaipatu tarutaru o Roundup
summary: Kua tiakina e tētahi minita taiao nāna i whakaoho tētahi āwhā Twitter mā te "whakatairanga" i tētahi kaipatu tarutaru tautohetohe i tana mahi.
text: I te 12 o Aotearoa, ka tūtohu te MP o Te Tairāwhiti o Te Tairāwhiti: "E takatū ana ki te hora i te Whakatata whakamīharo!" i te 12 o Aotearoa. I te rā i mua, i kitea e tētahi hūri o Amerika he mōrearea tana kaipatu tarutaru Roundup, ā, kāore i whakatūpato i ngā kaihoko. He tokomaha ngā kaiwhakamahi Twitter i whakahē i tana tweet, engari kāore a ia i ripeneta. Ka tūtohu a ia ā muri ake: "Pēnei i te nui o ngā matū me ngā pareketo, ka tika tō whakahaere i te mōrea. Pērā anō ki tāu e mahi ai ki te whakamā me ētahi atu matū o te whare. He rite tonu te whakawhāiti." I kī atu a Ms Coffey ki a Te Reo Irirangi o Aotearoa: "E whakaaro ana ahau he mea nui kia āta whakaaro tātau ki ēnei take. " Kaore mātau e whakaae kia hokona rātau i tēnei whenua mehemea kāore i te haumaru." I kī a ia i whakatau a ia ki te tweet nā te mea he "pai ki te tautoko i te pūtaiao". Na te tweet taketake a Ms Coffey i whakapataritari te maha o ngā urupare takenui me te urupare pōraru o "Er..." mai i te MP o Mua o Te Wānanga o Ben Gummer, tama a te Hēkeretari Taiao o mua ko John Gummer. I karangatia e te kaipūtaiao o Dr David Coombes te tweet he "kaitono mō te tweet tino tika o te tau". I kī atu a Nick Rau, he kaiwhakahauhau me te rōpū taiao o Ngā Hoa o te Ao, ki te HAU: "I a ia e hēkeretari ana i raro i te kāwanatanga i Defra, he whakakino te kite i a Therese Coffey e rere ana ki te tiaki i a Roundup, he kaipatu tarutaru e pupuri ana i te glyphosate. " Ko te tikanga kia whakatauria te kaupapahere kāwanatanga e te pūtaiao me te huarahi tūpato ake mai i tētahi tangata pakeke." I California i whakahaua a Monsanto kia utu i ngā tūkinotanga $289m (£226m) ki tētahi tangata nāna i kī he otaota kei roto i te glyphosate tōna mate pukupuku. Ko te whakawā tuatahi tērā i haere ki te whakawā e whakapae ana i tētahi hononga glyphosate ki te mate pukupuku. E whakakāhore ana a Monsanto nā te glyphosate i mate ai te mate pukupuku, ā, e kī ana e hiahia ana ki te tono ki te whakahaere.

title: E whakakāhore ana te tangata o Derby i te kōhuru i te tuakana
summary: Kua whakakāhore tētahi tangata i whakapaea ki te okaina i tōna tuakana ki te mate i Derby.
text: I kitea a Mateusz Woznicki, e 27, kua mate i tētahi whare i Leveret Close, i Chellaston, tata ki te 23:20 BST i te Hātarei, 21 o Hōngongoi. I puta tōna tuakana, a Marcin Woznicki, o St Clare's Close, Derby, ki te aroaro o te kōti karauna o te taone i mua, i reira ia i tautohe ai kia kaua e hara ki te kōhuru me te tūkino i te tinana. E 22 tau te pakeke e hoki ana ki te kōti karauna mo te whakawā i te Hānuere. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko nga kaiwhakahaere rōpū o Keni i te kōti o Rituānia mo nga kaihopu pīkaokao
summary: E anga ana tētahi tokorua o Ingarangi ki tētahi whakawā mo te kahungatanga o nāianei, te hokohoko me te apo i te kōti Rituānia.
text: I whakamahia e Darrell Houghton rāua ko Jackie Judge ngā kaimahi Rituānia i roto i ta rāua umanga hopu pīkaokao i West Malling, Kent. I te tau 2016 ka whakahaua e te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike nga rōpū rōpū kia utu i te £1m hei utu ki ngā tāngata tokoono i kī kua tūkinotia ā-tinana, ā-hinengaro hoki. I muri i tētahi mahi tōtahi me ngā Pirihimana o Keti, ka tīmataria e ngā mana o Rituānia ngā mahi hara. I te putanga mai i tētahi whakarongo tuatahi i Rituānia i mua, ka tautohe rāua kia kaua e hara ki te "whai painga i te whakararurarutanga tangata, te tono me te hokohoko tāngata... mā te whakamahi i te tutu ā-tinana, ā-hinengaro hoki" me te pokanoa i a rātou "i raro i ngā āhuatanga o te kahungatanga", e pā ana ki ngā tūpāpaku e 12. I tautohe hoki te tangata waenganui o Rituānia o Edikas Mankevicius kia kaua e hara ki te tono me te kawe i ngā tāngata "kia kaha ai te whakamahi". E kiia ana i tauria e Tēnā Mankevicius neke atu i te 30 ngā kaiheke i waenganui i te 19 me te 58 mō Tēnā Houghton rāua ko Ms Judge. I rongo te kōti i whakaaria mai ki a rātau he mahi utu pai i roto i ngā āhuatanga pai, e hopu ana i ngā pīkaokao i whakaritea hei parekura i ngā pāmu puta noa i te UK. Engari, e kiia ana i puritia rātau i roto i ngā āhuatanga hākinakina, "i whakawehitia ki tētahi Rottweiler, i whakahaua kia kai hēki pirau, ā, ka makaia mai i ngā matapihi" i roto i tā rātou mahi i DJ Houghton Catching Services Ltd. I te tau 2012, i kī te Ratonga Ture Karauna (CPS) he iti rawa ngā whakaaturanga hei whakahau i a Tēnā Houghton rāua ko Ms Judge, engari e whā tau i muri mai ka whakataua e te kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike te manakohanga o nga kaimahi. I ētahi marama i muri iho ka hopukina a Tēnā Mankevicius - e kimi ana ngā Pirihimana o Keni - i Klaipeda, Rituānia. Kua whakarārangitia te whakawā mo te 3 o Mahuru. I whakawhiwhia ki a Tēnā Houghton rāua ko Ms Judge ngā whakamōhiotanga whakapae e ngā mana o Rituānia, ko te tikanga me whai wāhi rāua ki ngā whakahaere, ā, ka puta mā te hononga ataata mai i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Medway.

title: Taunton £21m road delays could cost an extra £10m
summary: Ko ngā takaware ki tētahi huarahi nui i Taunton ka utu i te £10m anō hei whakaoti me tētahi haupae mō wai ka utu i te utu tāpiri.
text: Ko te Northern Inner Distributor Road (NIDR), e hono ana i te rāwhiti me te hauauru o te taone, e rua tau i muri i te hōtaka, ā, ko te tikanga kia utu i te £21m. I kī te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Somerset he whakarihariha ngā takaware, ā, ko te kaikirimana i whakatūria e ia e "kore e tuku". I kī ngā kaikirimana, a Carillion, ka mahi ngātahi tonu me te kaunihera ki te whakaoti i te kaupapa. 'Whakatauria o tātau rerekētanga' E whakapae ana ngā taha e rua i a rāua anō mō ngā takaware e mōhiotia ana he wāhanga o ngā raruraru hangarau me te piriti. E mōhio ana te AO ka pau te utu i te £10m i runga i te £21m taketake, engari ināianei kei roto ngā taha e rua i tētahi pakanga ā-ture mō wai ka utu i te tāpiri. I kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o te rohe, a Conservative John Osman, kāore i taea e ia te kōrero mō te haupae ture, engari i tāpiri mai "e kore ia e hoatu whenua" ki a Carillion. "He mahi tāku ki te pare i ngā pauna a nga kaihautū, ā, ka mahi ahau i taku pai ki te pare i tēnā. " E hiahia ana rātau [Carillion] ki ētahi atu moni. Ehara ahau i te tangata aroha, kāore au i te rite ki te hoatu," te kī a Tēnā Osman. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Carillion: "Ka mahi ngātahi tonu mātou me te kaunihera ki te whakaoti i te NIDR me te whakatika i o mātau rerekētanga ki te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Rohe o Te Rohe." E honoa ana te kaupapa ki te whakatupuranga anō o te takiwā o Firepool i Taunton, e whakawhirinaki ana ki te huarahi hou kia pai ake ai te urunga.

title: E kī ana a Cameron i ngā mōrearea mō te arotakenga waea 'māharahara'
summary: Kua kī a Rawiri Karauna i ngā rangatū o ngā mōrearea kāwanatanga e pā ana ki te arotakenga o te wawao, he "māharahara".
text: Kua whakaputaina e te Daily Telegraph ētahi tuhinga tae atu ki tētahi reta mai i a Te Wānanga ki a Tēnā Kōrero e whakahuahua ana i ngā māharahara mō te nui rawa o te utunga pūtea. I kī atu a Tēnā Karauna ki tētahi komiti o ngā MP e "kore e āwhina" ngā mōrearea, ā, ka tāpiritia ki te "pēhanga tūmatanui" i te wā o ngā kōrero pūtea. Engari i kī a ia i hua te arotakenga i tētahi putanga "pai, whai tikanga" mō ngā ope taua o te whenua. I pātaitia a Tēnā Karauna mō te arotakenga o te wawao i ngā haora noa iho i muri i tētahi tuhinga o te Manatu Arotahi [MoD] - i māturu ki te Daily Telegraph - i huatau te āhua o te whakahaere, he "tino pakaru" te ngākau whakangākau puta noa i nga ope taua. Tae atu ki te 17,000 ngā kaiāwhina ratonga kua tautuhia kia ngaro a rātau mahi i raro i ngā tono e kī ana ngā minita ka whakahōu i te hōia a te iwi me te kore whakararuraru i te haumarutanga. 'Pēhanga tūmatanui' Ka kī atu te pirimia ki te komiti takawaenga o ngā tuarā matua o Ngātahi, te āhua nei he "āhua raruraru" te MoD ki ngā mōrearea - kātahi anō ka "māharahara tēnei ina noho te tari e haepapa ana ki te haumarutanga". I pātai tauwhāititia mō te reta tūmataiti a Dr Fox - i whakatūpato ai te hēkeretari waea i te tiketike o ngā whakaritenga pūtea mō ngā tapahi "draconian" ki te wawao - i kī a ia me tautohetohe ia mō te "hiranga o te kore e tapahi hōhonu rawa i te wawao". "E tū ana ngā minita mō ā rātou tari, ā, ka whakaritea te take mō ā rātou tari," tana kī. I ētahi wā ka mahia ā-waha, i ētahi wā ka puta i roto i te reta. Ka aroha, i ētahi wā ka puta i roto i ngā nūpepa ā-motu." I ngā wā katoa e whakakāhore ana a Dr Fox i tētahi mōhiotanga ki te māturu - koia te kaupapa o tētahi tūhuratanga MoD e haere tonu ana. I kī a Tēnā Karauna kāore te haupae i runga i te māturu i "whakarerekē" i te hua o te whakataunga pūtea a te MoD - ka kite i tana pūtea e tapahia ana e te 7.5% i roto i te whā tau. Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore e āwhina ngā reta mārire. Ka tāpiri rātau ki te pēhanga tūmatanui... Ko te tikanga o ngā hui kei raro i te āta tirotiro ā-waho." I whakaūngia e Tēnā Karauna he "āputa" i waenganui i ngā rauemi e hiahiatia ana e te MoD me ngā penapena e rapua ana e te Pūtea Moni, ā, ko te pūtea waea i tuku iho i a Labour he "āhua tūtukitanga tereina". I kī a ia me "whakararuraru iti" i te mutunga o te tukanga ki te "whakakotahi i ngā rōpū e rua kia whiwhi ai i tētahi putanga pai, tika hoki" - nāna i āwhina e kore e pā ki ngā mahi i Awhekenetāna. I whakaputaina i tērā marama, ka kī taurangi te arotakenga waea i te rūrū tino tawhiti o nga ope taua mo te nuinga o nga tau. I tautāwhi a Tēnā Karauna i te whakataunga kia maka i te kaikawe rererangi o Ark Royal me te waka rererangi peke Harrier a te Royal Navy, e kī ana tērā pea he "ngāwari ake" te pupuri i a rāua tahi, engari he "hē" mō ngā hiahia mo te wā roa o te UK. I pātaitia hoki ia e ngā MP mō tētahi reta i tukuna ki te Times e ngā rangatira hōia hei tautoko i ngā kaupapa, ā, mēnā kāore he mahi a te 10 ki te whakakīkī. I kī a Tēnā Karauna kāore a ia i te mōhio, engari kāore a ia i "ohorere" mehemea koia tēnā. Kāore he pūtake e 10 i kī ā muri ake kāore he wāhi o ngā kaimahi i roto i te hukihuki o te reta, engari i kī te Kōrero Tōrangapū o TE WĀ, kua kī atu ki a ia kua huatau a Dr Fox i te reta ki ngā rangatira hōia i muri i ngā kōrero me ngā kaimahi hei mana whakautu ki ngā whakahēnga tōmua i whakaputaina i roto i te Times. Kua kī ngā kaiwhakawāwā i whakahaeretia te arotakenga e te rapunga penapena nui, kaua ko ngā hiahia haumarutanga ā muri ake. 'I pakaru te ngākau whakaputa' i pūrongotia e te Daily Telegraph i te Rāitema nā tētahi tātaritanga MoD ā-roto o te tukanga i whakaara ake i ngā māharahara kua "kino te whakapakari i te maia me te ngākau whakapuaki o ā mātou kaimahi". Ko te tere o te arotakenga, e whakahaeretia ana e te Kaunihera Haumarutanga ā-Motu, ko te tikanga he iti rawa te wā ki te uiui ki ngā pirihitini, ki te mau i ngā tohutohu o waho, ki te whakarite hoki i ngā kaimahi mahi mō te tauine o te rūrū, e kī ana. I kī a Dr Fox i "kāore i whakamanatia" te tuhinga, ā, kāore i whakaata i ngā whakaaro o ngā kaiwhakahaere matua, ngā minita, ngā rangatira rānei o ngā ope taua - nāna i tautoko te tukanga puta noa. I kī a Labour i whakaaturia e te māturu kua hē te tukanga katoa. "I tuituia ngā whakataunga i Whitehall ki te whakatutuki i ngā mahere whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga, ehara i ngā hiahia haumarutanga o to mātau iwi," te kī a te hēkeretari whakangungu kōruru a Jim Murphy. I kī te Ariki Moana Tuatahi o mua me te minita Mahi o Te Ariki Uru i te tuhinga e whakaatu ana i te mea he tokomaha nga kaimahi mahi i rongo i te "tino pakaru" i te kore whakaaro. "He tino mārama te whakaaro kāore i kōrerotia ki te iwi, ā, he āwangawanga tēnā," tana kī atu ki ngā Tōrangapū o ia Rā. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ko te tuhinga "kāore i te tika" e whakaata ana i ngā whakaaro o nga rangatira hōia matua.

title: I mōhio a David Cameron mō ngā tapahi Ford i mua i te hoatutanga o te koha
summary: Kua kī te pirimia e mōhio ana te kāwanatanga e whakaaro ana a Ford ki te tapahi mahi i Hēmihana me Essex i mua i tana hoatutanga ki te kamupene.
text: I pānuitia e Ford ka whakaweto i ōna tipu o Tarapēke me Dagenham i tērā wiki me te ngaronga o ngā mahi e 1,400. I puta mai ngā rongo i ngā rā i muri i te hoatutanga o te moni kāore i kitea mai i te Pūtea Whakatupu ā-Rohe. I pātai atu te MP Labour mō te Whakamātautau o Southampton, a Alan Whitehead ki a David Cameron mehemea i mōhio a ia ki ngā hinganga mahi i mua. I kōrero a Tēnā Karauna i mua i te Kotahitanga: "E mārama ana i kōrerorerotia ēnei take, ā, e tino mahi ngātahi ana mātou me ngā kamupene mahi waka katoa i Te Hononga o Ingarangi. " E ai ki taku kōrero i mua, he tino pai rawa nga rongo mai i te nuinga o rātau - mai i Te Aotearoa, mai i Taraiwa, mai i Jaguar me Land Rover. "He tino rangirua te mea i tūpono ki Ford i ngā tikanga o Southampton, engari me mahi tātau i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e tātau hei āwhina i aua tāngata ki te mahi."

title: Ngā arotakenga Aquaman: Ka totohu, ka kauhoe rānei te tuhituhi?
summary: Kua whiwhi arotakenga whāranu a Aquaman, e whetū ana ki a Jason Momoa i roto i te tūranga taitara, mai i ngā kaiwhakawāwā.
text: I muri i ngā āhuatanga poto e rua i roto i Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice and Justice League, kātahi anō ka whai pūrākau taketake te kīngi o te iwi o raro i te moana. Ahakoa i kī ētahi kaiarotake he āhua hōhā te tuhituhi, i whakaaro ētahi he tino whakangahau. "He tāmata te kite i tētahi toa kāore i te tino nui ki a ia," te kī a Hemi Luxford i roto i te Radio Times. "Mai i tana mahi pōkai, he whakataki taumaha i runga i te waka ruku, e mārama ana ko te whakangahau te manakē matua, kaua ko te hanga ao nui. " He whakamatautau ki te ākiri i tēnei ngangau ariā tiketike hei whitiāhua tama tangata kino noa iho, engari i waenganui i te moana o CGI me tētahi hōtuhi pārekareka, he nui tonu te ngahau." I roto i tana arotakenga whetū e toru mō te Whakaata, ka tuhituhi a Pirihi Hunneysett: "Ko te wāhanga tuaono o te DC Extended Universe e kauhoe ana ki roto i ngā whare pikitia i runga i te tai tiketike o te CGI whakamīharo me ngā ngaru o te mahi pukapuka kōmeke a te tama tangata." "E ora ana i runga i te whāngai turuturu o te aroha, ka toromi o mātau kaiārahi i roto i te tsunami o ngā arokite kounga Avatar e kite ana i ngā taua, ngā kahui me ngā wiriwiri o ngā kararehe moana nui e whawhai ana i roto i tētahi whakamutunga pūkenga tino mīharo." I kī a Geoffrey Macnab o te Independent: "Ko Aquaman te ōrite o te bouillabaisse - he tiu ika o tētahi whitiāhua tama tangata kua makaia ki roto i ngā mea katoa e wātea ana. " He uaua ki te kūnatu i ngā mokamoka, he pīkaokao, engari he nui te tāwara. "He utu whakaongaonga, i hangaia i runga i te nui o te whakapono kia puta atu ai i ōna wā o te tino heahea." E rua ngā whetū i hoatu e Robbie Collin ki te pikitia i roto i tana arotakenga mō te Telegraph, i tuhituhi: "Ko tētahi pikitia e mōhio ana koe ka tino pai te mahi hei kōhiko, he kōhiko, he kōhukihuki, ā, ka kumea ki ngā ahunga katoa mā te whakataetae i ngā au. " He iti rawa te ōritetanga, ahakoa ko ngā whakaahua takitahi e āhua nei kua kōnuitia ō rātou wāhanga pēnei i ngā moka mai i ngā jigsaw ōrite. "Āhua kore nei a Momoa rāua ko Heard e tūhono hei kaitapere puta noa i te takakau mata kākāriki, ā, ko te pūrākau e mau ana i ngā riu o ngā kī tārua me te whakapiri." I kī a Helen O'hara o te Emepaea: "He pono te tānga: he uaua rawa, engari ka mōhiotia. He aha te mea e whakangahau ai te pikitia, ko te kaiwhakahaere o Hemi Wan e maka ana i te nui o ngā mahi whakamīharo ki te pakitara, ā, ko te nuinga o aua mea e mau ana (ahakoa kāore i te noho tahi i ngā wā katoa). "He whakangahau i te mātakitaki i tētahi mea tino mōrihariha, e pahū ana i runga i ngā huarahi rerekē. " Ina whakaaro koe he kakau tāu, ka puta mai tētahi mea rerekē. "Ka tangohia e Momoa ia inihi o te mokowā e hoatu ana e te pikitia ki a ia, ā, ka rere i te maero i runga i te atahono nanakia, ā, he kaiwhakahaere hohenga nui a Wan, ehara i te mea kia mātakitaki noa iho koe, engari kia rite tonu te whakamīharo i a koe." I karangatia e Pita Pirihitini o te Kaitiaki "he pukupuku katoa" i roto i tana arotakenga whetū e rua "He kiriata mahi, pōturi me te mākū, he pārekareka i runga i te nui, me tētahi hoahoa whakanao i raro i te wai e āhua nei he putanga nui rawa o ngā tuemi kitsch ka purua e koe ki roto i ngā kura ika," ka tuhituhi a ia. "Ko te whakaahuatanga tamariki pai a Momoa o Aquaman e haere ana ki tēnei wā. He pikitia tēnei e kore rawa e puta ake mo te hau." I kī a Hugh Armitage o Digital Spy: "He whitiāhua mātātoa hē a Aquaman, engari he tino whakangahau, ā, ko tētahi o ngā wāhanga tino kaha rawa atu i roto i ngā Ao maiorooro o te māngai DC." "Ko tētahi o ngā kaha o te whitiāhua ko te mārama o tōna maka ki te momo pikitia kei roto rātou, ā, kaua e tino nui rawa. " Ka hoatu hoki e Aquaman ki ngā Ao o DC tētahi o ōna whakamutunga tino pai, he pakanga CGI nui e mārama ana ki te mahi me tōna tūhononga ki te pūrākau o te pikitia." Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko te tangata o Ingarangi i whawhai ki a IS e hara ana ki te whakapae pūtohu
summary: Kua kitea he hara tētahi tangata Peretania i whawhai ki tētahi hōia a Kurīhi ki te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi, ki te haere ki tētahi puni whakangungu pūtohu.
text: Kāore he mōhiotanga hōia o mua a Aidan James, 28, o Formby, Merseyside, i tana haerenga atu ki Hiria i te tau 2017. I whakakāhore a ia i ngā hara whakamataku, engari i kitea he hara i te whakawā anō i te Bailey Tawhito o te haere ki tētahi puni i Iraki i reira te rōpū WHK kua rāhuitia. I whakawāteatia a Hemi i te haere ki tētahi puni whakangungu pūtohu i Hiria. I tae atu nga kaiwhakawā ki nga whakataunga auau i muri noa iho i te rā o te whakawāteatanga. I kī a Tēnā Kaiwhakawā Edis i whakamāramatia e nga whakataunga te whanonga o te tangata whakapae "ehara i te mea hei whakatoko i ngā mahi pūtōraru a ia". Ka kī atu a ia ki a Hemi: "E whakaaro ana ahau he kēhi pūtohu tino rerekē tēnei." I kī a ia he "tino poto" te whakauru a Hemi ki te PŪ, ka tāpiri "he mea i pā mai i tana haerenga, engari ko te ūnga whakamutunga i tētahi atu wāhi". 'Whakarerekētia' Ko Hemi, he kaitono kāore i tutuki ki te Ope o Ingarangi, i tipu ake i Merseyside, a, ko ia te Pirihitini tuatahi i whawhai ki a IS kia whakawāteatia mo aua hara. Ko te take o te ture, ko tōna whakaaro ki te whawhai ki te IS, me ana mahi i a ia e mahi ana, kāore i te nui ki te pūtōraru, engari i reira a ia i roto i ngā puni i tū ai te whakangungu mō tētahi take ariā whānui ake. I puritia e ia tētahi rātaka i mua, i tōna wā i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, ka rongo te Bailey Tawhito. I Aperira 2017, ka tuhituhi a ia: "I reira ka taea e au te whakarerekē, ka taea e au te mahi i tētahi mea hei whakahīhī, kaua e rongo i te koretake i ngā wā katoa." I muri i tana whakaaturanga tuihono i ana kaupapa tuihono, ka whiwhi a ia i tētahi toronga mai i te aronui whakawhanaunga a te kāwanatanga Ārai me tētahi whakatūpato kia kaua e haere ki Hiria, ka rongo te kōti. I roto i ngā rā ka hopukina ia i runga i te whakapae ki te whakarite ki te pūtōraru, engari kāore he utu i muri mai, ā, i te mutunga ka whakahokia tana uruwhenua. I korerotia ki te hūri ka whakawhirinaki ia ki tana rātaka: "Kei te whakaaro tonu ahau ki te haere ki Hiria/Iraki... ki te whawhai i tēnei pakanga tino hira ki te ariā mate o [IS]." I Aotearoa 2017, i muri i tētahi wā i roto i tētahi whare hauora hinengaro, ka rere a ia ki Iraki, ka tukuna he karere ki te kāinga e kī ana: "I ū ki te whaea haumaru." I noho wā a ia i tētahi puni rerenga whenua o Te Rūnanga o Hiriani, ā, i muri iho i tētahi whare whakangungu YPG o Hiriani. I rongo te hūri i tana pukapuka i whakapūketetia ētahi tauwhitinga ki te PŪ, i tuhituhia e ia i runga i ngā kupu tōrunga, engari i muri i tana whakangungu riri ki te YPG ka uru ia ki te whawhai ki te IS. I te mutunga o te tau 2017 ka whakatau ia ki te hoki ki UK. I roto i ngā tuhinga īmēra ki tētahi pirihimana mai i te tīma Ārai Pirihimana o Merseyside, ka rongo te kōti i a Hemi i tuhituhi: "Kāore au e hoki mai ki te whakapae i te pūtōraru." Ka whakautua e te āpiha: "Kaore tētahi tangata e kī ana he pūtohu koe, ā, he maha ngā tāngata pēnei i a koe kua hoki mai i Hiria, ā, ki tōku mōhiotanga, kāore tētahi o rātou i whakahaua." Heoi anō, i hopukina ia i te taenga atu ki te taunga rererangi o Liverpool i te Hui tanguru 2018, ā, i whakataua ki ngā hara whakamataku i te rā e whai ake nei. I whakahokia a Hemi ki te whare herehere tae noa ki te whiu i te 7 o Whiringa ā Rangi.

title: Ka 'pouri' a Tiwhione mō ngā take tohu e pā ana ki a Wester Ross
summary: E kī ana te kamupene torotoro waea o Tiwhione e pouri ana mō ngā take tohu e pā ana ki ōna kiritaki i Wester Ross.
text: Kua kōrerotia e ngā tāngata i Ullapool me te rohe whānui ake te ngaromanga o te tohu. Kua mau ētahi ki te pāpāho pāpori ki te amuamu kua korerotia ki a rātau e Tiwhione, neke atu i te rua wiki te whakatau. I tautohetohe tētahi kaihautū mō te kamupene i taua wā, ā, i kī e mahi ana ngā kaipūkaha ki te whakatika i ngā take. Ka kī a ia: "E pouri ana mātou ki ngā kiritaki i Ullapool me ētahi wāhi karapoti e pā ana ki ngā take tohu i tēnei wā. " Kua tupu tētahi hapa i runga i te whatunga, ā, kei te mahi ā mātou kaipūkaha ki te whakatika me te whakahaere i ngā wā tata nei."

title: Pūtea EU: E tū ana ngā whenua ki ngā manakē
summary: Kua tino wehewehea ngā kaiārahi EU e hui ana i Pōroa i te Rāitema i runga i ngā manakē whakapau moni a te rōpū iwi e 27 mō te 2014-2020.
text: Ko te tihi e rua rā i runga i te tahua tau maha o te EU e taumarutia ana e te mōrearea o te rohe ūropi me te tapahi mamae ki ngā tahua ā iwi. Kei hea ētahi o ngā pūpāpāho matua e tū ana i runga i te Anga Pūtea Maha-Tau (MFF) o te EU? UK E kore te UK e whakaae ki te tapeke o te tahua pūtea o te 973bn hōro (£782.5bn; $1.25tn) i tonoa e te Perehitini o te Kaunihera o Ūropi, o Te Rūnanga o Ūropi, koia te take mo te whakaritenga. He iti iho te 20bn hōro i te MFF 2007-2013, engari he nui rawa, e kī ana te UK. E hiahia ana te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, ki tētahi whakatio tūturu i roto i te hokohoko EU, ā, kei te whakawehi i tētahi whakahē mēnā ka ngana ōna hoa EU ki te whakanui ake i te tahua. I tērā marama i pōti ai ngā Pākehā i roto i tana Rōpū Rangatira me ngā MP Mahi ātete mō tētahi tapahi tūturu - he raina uaua ake i tōna ake. E tautoko ana a Hōrana rāua ko Huitene i tana karanga mo te whakatio. E hiahia ana te UK kia nekehia e te EU ngā moni ki te rangahau, ki te whakahaere hou me te mākete kotahi, i waho atu i ngā wāhi pūtea nui tūturu o te whakahoahoa - āwhina mō ngā rohe rawakore - me te ahuwhenua. Ko te tikanga kia kaua ngā moni whakahoahoa e haere ki ngā whenua rangatira rawa o te EU, e tautohe ana te UK. E whakatau ana hoki te UK ki te pupuri i tana utu pūtea tautohetohe - e wātea ana ki te 3,56bn hōro i te tau 2011. Kua tautuhia kia piki ki te 4.1bn i te tau 2014. Ko te UK anake te whenua whai utu - engari ināianei e kī ana a Tenemaka e hiahia ana hoki ki tētahi. I whakaritea e Tiamana, Ateria, Hōrana me Huitene he "utu i runga i te utu", ka waiho a Wīwī hei kaitāpae nui rawa ki te utu UK. Kua whakakāhore kētia e Wīwī Wīwī te mahere a Van Rompuy, i a ia e whakaae ana ki te tautohe kia whakahekea te whakapau moni EU. Ko te tikanga o Wīwī e whakahē ana i te tapahi ki te Kaupapahere Ahuwhenua Pūnoa (CAP), ā, kei te whakapiri ki tērā. Ko nga kaiahuwhenua Wīwī he painga nui o te CAP, e kitea ana e Parihi ko tētahi o nga tūāpapa o te EU. E ahanoa ana hoki a Wīwī ki te kaupapa a Tēnā Van Rompuy kia tapahia te whakapau moni mo te whakahoahoa. E kī ana ngā pūtake whakawhanaunga i Pōroa kua rite a Wīwī ki te tākaro mō te wā ki te kore e whiwhi i te momo whakaaetanga e hiahiatia ana i tēnei wiki. He take te utu UK mō Wīwī, nā te mea i te tau 2011 ko te koha Wīwī ki a ia ko te 966m hōro. E hiahia ana a Tiamana Tiamana, pēnei i ētahi atu kaitāpae kupenga ki te pūtea EU, kia tapahia taua pūtea. E kī ana a Tiamana me pupuri te MFF i te 1% o te katoa o te Moni Whiwhinga ā-Motu (GNI) o te EU, e tata ana ki te 960bn hōro. Kāore e taea e te Tumuaki o Te Rūnanga o Te Ao Nui te whakahoki i te CAP, nā te mea he nui te rorohiko pāmu o ana pirihitini Pāpori Karaitiana (CSU) i Te Kotahitanga Pāpori Karaitiana (CSU). E kī ana ngā pūtake whakawhanaunga e hiahia ana a Tiamana ki te kōrero mo te utu UK, ā, e kore e tukua tana "utu i runga i te utu" mēnā ka mau te UK ki tōna tūnga. E kī ana a Mīharo Tūturu me pupuri e te EU tētahi atu tihi i runga i te tahua i te tōmua o tērā tau ki te kore he take i tēnei wiki. E tohe ana a Pōrana Pōrana, i uru ki te EU i te tau 2004, kia kaua e tapahia te tahua. Kai waenganui i tētahi rōpū whenua ā iwi i Ūropi Waenganui, ki te Rāwhiti hoki, e whai hua ana ōna rangatiratanga i te pūtea EU māhorahora. E tautohe ana rātau kia kaua e whakamahia te āhua o te whakawhāititanga i Uropi hei takunga hai whakaroa i a rātau kaupapa whanaketanga ohaoha nui. Ko Pōrana te kaiwhiwhi nui rawa o te pūtea whakahoahoa o te EU - e 67,3bn hōro i roto i te tahua 2007-2013. Mai i te tau 2007 kua whiwhi a Pōrana i te 6bn hōro mai i te EU hei whakapai ake i tana whatunga huarahi. He tata tonu te tūnga o Pōrana i runga i te tahua ki Wīwī, Itari, Kariki, Paniora - tawhiti katoa rātau i te tūnga o UK. E tautoko ana te kāwanatanga o Taikarowākia i te motu i whakahaua e Tiamana ahakoa he kaiwhiwhi nui te Whenua o Taikarowākia i ngā moni whakahoahoa, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere i Pōroa. Kai te taha o te hunga e hiahia ana ki te whakaiti i ngā moni hāngai mō ngā kaiahuwhenua, e kī ana e hiahiatia ana e te EU he tahua mo te rau tau 21. I whiwhi ngā Tiekeke i te tata ki te 26bn hōro i roto i ngā moni whakahoahoa i te MFF 2007-2013. I whakahē te Kōti o Ūropi o ngā Kaihautū i te aroturuki a Taikarowākia i aua kaupapa, e kī ana he kino kē atu i ētahi atu kāwanatanga EU, ā, tērā ētahi take hāmate e pā ana ki ngā mana ā-rohe.

title: Kei te haere te mahi i te whare whakangahau gin o Orkney
summary: Kei te haere te mahi ki tētahi whare whakangahau gin hou me te pokapū manuhiri i Orkney.
text: I kī te kamupene i muri i te kaupapa, a Orkney Distilling Ltd, e tūmanako ana kia whakatuwheratia te pānga i Kirkwall i te mutunga o te raumati. Kua tautuhia te whanaketanga ki te waihanga tae atu ki te 10 ngā mahi paetata. I hangaia a Orkney Distilling i te tīmatanga o tērā tau e te tokorua o te rohe ko Stephen rāua ko Aly Kemp, nāna i hanga ā rāua ake momo gin e kiia nei ko Kirkjuvagr. Ka neke te whakanaotanga katoa o Kirkjuvagr ki te whare whakangahau hou o Kirkwall i Ayre Road ina mahia. I kī hoki te kamupene he mahere tāna mō ētahi atu raina hua, ka whakaaturia ā muri ake i tēnei tau. 'Tino harikoa' te kī a Tēnā Kemp: "I muri i ngā marama whakarite, kei te tino hiahia mātou ki te kite i te kaupapa ināianei kei te haere. " Ko tā mātou whāinga kia oti te kaupapa i te mutunga o Aotearoa, me tā mātou arotahi ki te whakangungu i ā mātou kaimahi hou, ā, ka āta neke i te whakanaotanga katoa o Kirkjuvagr ki Ayre Road." I tapiritia e ia: "Na te pikinga nui o nga tau turuhi i matapaetia mo tenei tau, tae atu ki te pikinga o nga haerenga ki nga kaipuke tere, he tino hiahia mo etahi atu taonga kounga tiketike i te rohe hei whakarei ake i te wheako o te hunga e haere ana ki o tatou moutere." I roto i tētahi whanaketanga motuhake, kua pūrongotia e te kamupene e whakahaere ana i te whare whakangahau ki te raki o UK tētahi pikinga nui o te huaputa i te tau kua hipa. I kī te Kamupene Shetland Distillery o Unst i tipu te huaputa i te 300% ki te 300,000 pounamu nā te manakohanga o ōna gins me ngā wehikē. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te Distillery a Mark Turnbull: "He tau tino arokē tēnei me te nui o te tono mai i ā mātou kaihoko me ngā whakahau tuihono. " E koa ana mātou kei te nui ake ngā tāngata e hākinakina ana i ā mātou hua me te tautoko i te distillery me Unst."

title: Me pēhea e taea ai te pūtea i te tiaki pāpori?
summary: Ko tētahi o ngā "tē mōhiotia" tōrangapū. I muri i ngā tatau kati, tata tonu ki ia pāremata e whakaae ana kua tawhito te pūnaha o nāianei mō te utu i te hauora me te tiaki pāpori.
text: Ko Laura KuenssbergPolitical editor@bbclaurakon Twitter Engari he torutoru noa iho o rātau e hiahia ana ki te kōrero tūmatanui kua roa te tōmuri o te whakahou. Ahakoa e tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga i tēnei Rāitema ki te whakapuaki ka taea e ngā kaunihera te kohi moni anō mai i ā rātou kaihautū ki te utu ki te tiaki i o tātau pakeke i runga i te rangatiratanga, he torutoru noa iho i Westminster e whakatakune ana he rongoā mo te wā roa. He aha hoki? E kī ana ngā pūtake kei te titiro te Tari Kāpata ki ngā tikanga maha hei kimi i ētahi whakautu. Engari ahakoa he aha tā rātou e haere mai ana, e kore e ngāwari te whiwhi i ētahi atu rōpū tōrangapū ki te hoko, engari he iti noa iho te nuinga. Nā reira tērā pea ka hiahiatia he momo whakatika kē. Kua korerotia ki te AO e whakaaro ana te Tau 10 ki ngā mahere mō tētahi kōmihana whakawhiti-rōpū ki te titiro ki ngā utu o te hauora me te tiaki pāpori, i mua i te taupānga. I muri i ngā minita hauora e toru o mua - ko Norman Lamb, te Liberal Democrat, Stephen Dorrell, he Conservative, me Labour Alan Milburn - i whakarewaina he tono mō tētahi arotakenga ā-motu kia kitea ai te whakaaro whakaaro, ka tonoa e te tīma a David Cameron te tokotoru kia whakaatu i ta rātau kaupapa ki te kāwanatanga, i roto i tētahi whakaaetanga kāore te pūnaha o nāianei i te tautoko. I kī mai a Norman Lamb ki a au: "I haere mātou ki roto ki te kōrero ki a rātou, ka hoatu he pepa ki a rātou, ā, kāore anō mātou kia urupare mai i tērā, ā, kāore anō mātou kia urupare mai i tērā, engari ko te hiahia kia uru tēnei kāwanatanga ki tēnei, kia tū hoki ngā rōpū katoa ki ā rātou kawenga,  to join a process, to ensure that we reach a one in a generation settlement for the health and care settlement I think is absolutely fundamental." No te pātaitanga he aha tana kōrero ki te tīma o Ēnā Me, ka whakautua e Tēnā Reme: "Whakaurua. Kōrero mai ki a mātou ināianei. "Tērā tētahi tino wawao mo tēnei. Ki te haere tonu koe ki te tapa o te pari, ka mamae te iwi tūturu ki runga, ki raro hoki i to mātau whenua." I kī a Wheua Cavendish, nāna i pupuri ngā kōrero i te Tau 10: "I tino hiahia ahau ki te ariā tērā pea ka taea e mātou te tiki taupoki hau whakawhiti-rōpū mō tētahi rongoā..... e mōhio ana tātau katoa i hangaia e te NHS o te tau 1948 tētahi pūnaha kāore i te tika ināianei nā te mea kāore i te whakatau i ngā whakamātautau hōu." I kī a ia kāore a ia i whakaaro ka taea te whakaoti i te "whakawhāititanga" me te kore tukanga e pā ana ki ngā rōpū tōrangapū katoa. E mōhiotia ana ētahi minita e whakahauhau ana i te kāwanatanga o Ēnā Me ki te whakaaro i te ariā o tētahi kōmihana. I kī mai tētahi o ana kaitautoko i te kāwanatanga ki a au "tērā tētahi āhukahuka me whakapau moni anō tātau". Engari i kī tētahi atu minita me kōrerorero anō mō te nui o te āwhina a ngā whānau, ā, tērā pea me whakakē "ngā tūmanako a te iwi". Nā ngā huringa i roto i tō tātau iwi tēnei tētahi o ngā pātai uaua rawa e hiahiatia ana e ngā minita ki te whakautu. He nui tonu ngā whakamātau i mua. Engari ko te pono o ngā mea e pā ana ki ngā kaunihera maha - me te mea nui ake, e hia mano ngā whānau - ināianei i roto i o rātau oranga, ka uaua ake te waiho i ia rā.

title: Ko te whakahē Kirihimete tau tuatahi e kore nei koe e rongo i roto i ngā toa
summary: E 35 tau mai i te wā i patua ai e ētahi kaitapere i roto i ngā hūtu ātaahua ngā tāngata toka o Status Quo me Slade ki te tau tuatahi o te Kirihimete.
text: Nā Pirihi WoodBBC News I kīia ko Koe anake te Flying Pickets' Only You he makau ki te Pirimia o Margaret Thatcher. Engari i hangaia anake te rōpū a cappella i te wā e whakahauhau ana ngā mema ki ngā kaupapa here a tana Rōpū Rangatira. I to rātau hononga ki ngā kaikari i te tau e whai ake nei, ka rerekē ngā whakaaro, ā, ka mutu ētahi toa ki te whakaputu i a rātau pūkete. "Kāore i whiwhi te iwi. He tino rekareka," te kī a te mema rōpū o Ric Lloyd. "E kiia ana ko te waiata makau a Thatcher. " A, kāore ngā DJ reo irirangi i mārama ki te tikanga o te ingoa tae noa ki te tau i muri mai i te wā i rerekē ai pea to rātau whakaaro ki a mātau." E kīia ana te wā e ngā kōrero hītori he "wāhi huri" mō Ingarangi - me ngā whare kaunihera i hokona me ngā hapori mahi i rerekē mō ake tonu atu i te hekenga o te mahi taumaha, a, ka mate. He tokomaha o te rōpū - tae atu ki te frontman o Kōrero Hibbard, mai i Ebbw Vale - i haere mai i ngā wāhi kari waro. A, no to rātau hanganga, he hurihanga te ingoa ki te āhua o to rātau hononga ki ngā rārangi piki me ngā kaikari kari i runga i ngā utu i nga tau kotahi mano e whitu tekau mā rua. Ko Koe anake te tau tuatahi mo te rima wiki - i waenga i te waiata a Billy Joel Uptown Girl me Paul McCartney's Pipes of Peace. "I mārama tonu ngā mea e haere ana i tēnei wā me te haere mai o Tēnā ki te hiko me te taraiwa a nga kaikari i muri i te kotahi," te kī a Raiti. "I te tīmata katoa. I tino rerekē te iwi i te hokonga atu o a tātau rawa - ngā taonga a te iwi, ngā whare (kaunihera), ngā umanga. "He wā tino hūkere tēnei." Mō te nuinga o te rau tau, kua tīngongo te mahi waro i te putanga mai o ētahi atu pūtake pūngao me ngā mahi utu pai ake. Engari i noho tonu hei toto ora mō ngā wāhi, pērā i ngā Riu o Rhondda. I te tūtukitanga o Koe Anake ki ngā whatanga, e 174 ngā rua mahi i Ingarangi e whakamahi ana i ngā tāngata 148,000. Engari i muri i te tau o ngā tuki me ngā matapaki ki ngā pirihimana, he maha ngā pahū i kati, ā, kāore anō kia ora te umanga. I puta noa mai ngā Flying Pickets "i te wā noa iho", te kī a Raiti. He tauira ture a ia i te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth i nga tau kotahi rau e ono tekau mā ono, i muri i tana mātakitaki i ētahi ingoa nunui e mahi ana i te Hōro Nui. I muri iho ka uru atu a Raiti ki a Y Blew - i whakaarohia ko ia te pēne toka tuatahi hei hopu i Welsh - i mua i te hainatanga mō United Artists hei kaitito waiata. I tērā wā ka tūtaki ia ki te kaituhituhi a John Burrows, nāna i hiahia kia whakaritea e ia he waiata cappella mō te rōpū whare tapere 7:84 "radical, left wing, alternative". I tāpiri mai a Raiti: "I muri i ngā whakakitenga, he nui te haere ki te whakaaturanga panuku me te waiata i roto i ngā van. " He tino waro te āhua o te tipu ki ētahi atu mea. "He kaitapere katoa mātau me ngā whakapono manapori me ētahi papamuri pūoro, ā, ka neke atu ki ētahi atu kōhua, e whakawhanake ana i ngā kōrero 20 meneti." A, no te mōhiotanga o ngā kamupene pūkete ka taea e te cappella te tuku i tētahi mea hou ki te tirohanga pūoro pahū, ka whai mai he mahi pūkete. Ko ngā kāniwha e tautoko ana i a Dionne Warwick me tētahi āhua i runga i te whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata o Noel's House Party i tere te whiwhi i a rātau he pūtake tino pai. A, i muri i a rātou, ka kite ngāwari noa iho ta rātau uhi o Yazoo's Only You i te pēne ki runga i ngā tūtohi hākari. "I muri i te tīmatanga o te taraiwa a te kaimaina, ka mōhio kē atu ētahi mema o te pāpāho ki te āhua o te pēne, ā, ka nui ake te take," te kī a Raiti. "I tētahi wā, i tonoa a Kōrero rāua ko Stripe (ngā mema o te pēne) kia mau i tētahi koha Kirihimete mō tētahi whakaaturanga o te ata Hātarei, ā, ka mau ki tētahi tauera tī a Karl Marx. " I runga i te hau, ā, he maha ngā whakaari me ngā tāngata e waea ana ki te kī 'E kore koe e mahi anō'." A, i te hiahia o to rātau tapanga ki te "kume ki te ahunga kotahi", ka kī a Raiti e arotahi ana ngā mema o te rōpū ki te tautoko i ngā kaikari me ngā mahi takuhe, e pā ana ki tā rātou mahi. I kī te kaituhituhi kōrero pāpori a Ben Curtis ka rongo tonu te tawhito o ngā katinga maina waro tae noa ki tēnei rā. Ka kī a ia: "Ko ētahi wāhanga o ngā awaawa e noho tonu ana i ētahi o ngā wāhi tino uaua i Uropi." I whakaahuatia e Dr Curtis ngā pahū hei take matua i "ūkuia ai te mahere" i ētahi wāhi i muri i te tuki, ka tāpiritia: "He wāhi huri tērā i roto i te hītori o Ingarangi o nāianei." Ko te nuinga o Uēra ki te tonga i hangaia huri noa i te kari waro, ā, e 250,000 te mahi i tōna taumata i te tau 1921. Engari i muri i te ngaronga o ngā mākete o rāwāhi i muri i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ka haurua taua whika i roto i te tekau tau. Heoi anō, i kī a Dr Curtis i whakapono nga kaimahi ki te whakakotahitanga i te tau 1947, i te wā i kawea mai ngā pahū ki raro i te mana o te Poari Waro o te Motu. Engari i te whakawhitinga o te UK ki ētahi atu pūtake pūngao me ngā mahi whakanao utu pai ake, ka heke iho ngā kaimahi i te tonga o Uēra mai i te 100,000 i te tau 1960 ki te 40,000 i te tau 1970. Ahakoa rā, ka noho kīngi tonu te waro i ngā wāhi maha, ā, i te wā e noho whakarākeke ana te utu, ka tuki nga kaikari kari i te tau 1972 me te 1974. E rima tau i muri iho, ka haere mai te kaitaunaki mākete wātea, a Tēnā, i "ātete ā-ariā" ki ngā mahi whakahaere kāwanatanga pēnei i te kari waro, ā, ka tīmata ngā katinga. I tāpiri mai a Dr Curtis: "I noho tonu ngā pahū hei wāhi arotahi mō ētahi kāinga, ā, he moto mate to rātau katinga. " Mō te tonga o Wales, i ngaro te papanga pāpori, me ētahi atu mahi e hono ana ki ngā maina, ngā toa me ngā karapu ora e kati ana." E whakapono ana hoki a Raiti kei te rongo tonu ngā pānga o te wā, e kī ana: "Kei te pōhēhē ahau ki ngā mea e haere ana i roto i te iwi ināianei. E aroha ana ahau ki te rangatahi. "He uaua ake ināianei ki te kimi wāhi noho, mahi rānei. " He momo whakatupuranga koura tā te tangata (i mua) i roto i ngā huarahi maha."

title: Ka rongo te uiui a Derek Moore i te tūkinotanga o te ahi o Bosley mill
summary: Kua rongo tētahi uiuinga ki te "tirohanga whakangaromanga" i mihi ki nga kaimahi whakaora i muri i te pahūtanga o te mira o Bosley i Cheshire.
text: Ko Derek Moore, e 62, tētahi o ngā tāngata tokowhā i mate i te pahūtanga i te mira parāoa o Wood Treatment Ltd i te 17 o Hōngongoi. I whakatuwheratia, i hikitia te uiuinga ki tōna matenga i Macclesfield kia taea ai e tōna whānau te tū i tētahi nehunga ināianei. I kī a Coroner Nicholas Rheinberg i pāngia e Tēnā Moore ngā whara o te māhunga me te tuaiwi i hua ai tōna "mate wawe". I kitea tōna "tinana tino tahuna" i te pae tata ki te wiki i muri i te pahūtanga, ka kōrerotia te uiuinga i te Hōro Taone o Macclesfield. I pāngia e Tēnā Moore te tātā roro me te taura tuaiwi, ka kī te koroni. 'E mura ana te ahi' i hoatu e Det Ch Supt Piripi Jones, mai i ngā Pirihimana o Cheshire, he whakaaturanga ki te uiuinga mō te "mahi uaua, mōrearea hoki" mō ngā pirihimana me ngā kaipatu ahi. I kī a ia i kitea e nga āpiha tuatahi i runga i te pae he "ahi e mura ana" e karapoti ana i a rātau me te "tokomaha e haere ana i whara". I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Jones he pēhea te "poka poka ki roto i ngā whare hinga' i a rātau e rapu ana i ngā kaimahi ngaro". Mā te whakatūpato tērā pea he "roa" te tūhuratanga, ka kī a ia e mahi ana ngā kaitohutohu ki te whakatau mēnā he "hara i raro i te ture hara". I korerotia ki te uiuinga kāore anō kia whakaorangia te tinana o tētahi o ngā tūpāpaku e whā, a Jason Shingler, ā, kei te wera tonu ngā ahi iti i te pae. I hikitia ki tētahi rā ā muri ake.

title: Coronavirus: E pūrongo ana a Hong Kong i te pikinga nui rawa atu o ngā kēhi i te rā kotahi
summary: Kua tuhia e Hong Kong tana pikinga teitei rawa atu i te ra kotahi mai i te timatanga o te mate uruta, kua kii te Kaiwhakahaere Matua o te rohe, a Carrie Lam.
text: I tētahi hui pānui o te Rātapu, i kī a Ms Lam neke atu i te 100 ngā mate hou, ā, ka pānuitia he rāhuitanga hou hei pupuri i te horahanga. I whakaahuatia e ia te āhuatanga he "tino nui" me te kī "kāore he tohu" e whakahaeretia ana. Me mahi ngā kaimahi tūmatanui kāore i te tino nui, ā, ka nui ake te whakamātautau. I kī taurangi te rangatira nui ka mahia e ngā mana ngā whakamātautau 10,000 i ia rā, ā, ka whakahaua hoki te mau hīpoki kanohi i ngā wāhi tūmatanui o rō whare. Kua whakahaua kētia ngā uhi kanohi i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui. E 108 ngā kēhi hou, e 83 o rātou paetata, e 25 i kawemai, ka kī nga mana hauora. I puta mai te panui i nga ra i muri i te katinga ano o Hong Kong Disneyland, iti iho i te marama i muri i te whakatuwheratanga ano, i te whakahokinga mai o te kawanatanga i nga tikanga tawhiti pāpori. I katia e ngā mana ngā pae, ngā whare tākaro me ngā karapu i tērā wiki i waenganui i te tīmatanga hou, ā, ka āraia ngā wharekai kia kaua e whakaae kia kai ngā kaihoko i te 6pm kua hipa. Ka whakaroatia ēnei rāhuitanga. He iti noa iho ngā kēhi coronavirus i kitea e Hong Kong i muri i te whakatakotoranga i ngā tikanga tere, pākaha hoki i te tīmatanga o te tau hei ārai i tōna horahanga. Engari kua nui ake i te 500 ngā mate hou i pūrongotia i roto i ngā wiki e rua kua hipa. I ngā wiki tata nei, ka rāhuitia e nga mana ētahi huihuinga ā-kāwanatanga, tae atu ki te whakatūpato 4 o Pipiri mō ngā tūpāpaku o te 1989 Tiananmen Square, me tētahi huihuinga ā-tau i te 1 o Hōngongoi, e kī ana i te coronavirus me ngā tikanga tawhiti pāpori. Heoi anō, he tokomaha i wehi i te whakamahi a ngā pirihimana i te tīmatanga o te coronavirus hei takunga mō te rāhui i ngā huihuinga ā-kāwanatanga, ā, tekau mano i whakapoke i ngā rāhuitanga. I Hāmata, ka puta i a Haina tētahi ture haumarutanga hou tino nui e whakahē ana i te tahuritanga, te wehenga me te whakakotahitanga ki ngā ope kē i Hong Kong. Kua whakataua te ture e ngā whenua maha me ngā kaiwhaiwhai motika tangata, e kī ana kua tautuhia te ture, ā, ka whakakino i ngā wāteatanga. Heoi anō, kua ākiritia e Haina te whakahē, ā, e kī ana ngā kaitautoko e tika ana kia whakaora i te raupapa i Hong Kong. Te ture haumarutanga hou o Hong Kong

title: Ko ngā tauira i kōwhiria mō te kaupapa rererangi i whakaaweawe i te Pere Whero
summary: Kua kōwhiria tētahi kāreti o Dorset kia whai wāhi ki tētahi kaupapa ā-rererangi i whakaawetia e tētahi kaihautū Pere Whero tōmuri.
text: The 12 pupils from the Glenmoor and Winton Federated Trust have been picked for Blue Skies by the Jon Egging Trust. I kōwhiria mō ngā take o te whakaaro whaiaro me te whakahauhau, ka ārahitia ngā pakeke 13-15 tau e ngā kaihautū whakamātautau mai i te Kura Kaihautū Whakamātautau o te Emepaea. I mate a Jon Egging, e 33, i te tūtukitanga o tana waka rererangi Hawk T1 i muri i tētahi whakaaturanga i te Hākari Rererangi o Bournemouth i te tau 2011. Kei roto i te maramara kupu ko te whakaoti raruraru, te mahi a te tīma me ngā tūmahi whakawhitiwhiti kōrero i te papa rererangi o te Manatu Whakamarumaru i Boscombe Down. 'Mōhio ki te kaha' Ko ētahi atu tūmahi i roto i te kaupapa e toru marama ko ngā pūkenga whakaterenga i Salisbury Plain me tētahi rā hanga rōpū me tētahi hōia taua i whara. Ka hoatu he hua ki te rōpū, e tīmata ana i tā rātou wātū tuatahi a tērā marama, ki tētahi BTEC i roto i ngā Pūkenga Mahi i muri i te aronui. I kī te pouaru a Tāne Egging, a Emma: "Kei te whakarato mātou i ngā huarahi hou hei āwhina i te rangatahi kia mōhio ki tō rātou kaha. " E mōhio ana ahau ka pā pai tātau ki te oranga o te rangatahi e pā ana." I muri i tōna matenga, ka whakatūria te Jon Egging Trust e tana pouaru, a Dr Emma Egging, tōna whaea a Dawn, tōna hoa tamariki a James Godley me te kaihautū o Red Arrows, a Ben Plank. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Jon Egging Trust

title: E kī ana ngā komiti MP 'kāore e whakaaetia' te utu a te pāhi Motability
summary: Ko te utu £1.7m i utua ki te rangatira nui o te umanga e whakahaere ana i te kaupapa motokā mono Motability, e "tino kore e whakaaetia," e kī ana ngā MP.
text: Kua tipu te mōkī utu a Maika Betts i te 78% mai i te £954,000 i te tau 2008. I kī a Motability i takea te utu a Tēnā Bett i runga anō i te whakataurite ki ngā kamupene FTSE 250. I kitea e nga komiti Pūtea me te Mahi me te Penihana he moni e £2.4bn e whakaputua ana hoki. Ka tirohia e te Tari Arotaupū ā Iwi nga take i whakaarahia, ka kī te kāwanatanga. "Kua kī te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga e whakarato ana a Motability i tētahi ratonga tino nui ki ngā tāngata hauā, engari kei te āwangawanga ngā taumata o te utu ā-kaiwhakahaere me ngā rāhui pūtea," te tāpiri mai a tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Mahi me te Penihana. Ka whakaritea e te aronui Motability ngā motokā mō ngā tāngata hauā hei whakawhiti i ētahi o ā rātou whakaaetanga hauātanga o te āhua - tā rātou takuhe Utu Rangatiratanga Whaiaro. Ko ngā Mahi Āwhina - ko te umanga e whakahaere ana i te kaupapa - he tohutohu e kore e anga atu ki te whakataetae. E kī ana nga komiti Paremata e rua me whakamārama e te kāwanatanga he aha te āwhina kāwanatanga mō te umanga - i te korenga o te whakataetae - he tika te whakamahinga o ngā moni tūmatanui. I kī a Frank Field MP, te tūru o te Komiti Mahi me te Penihana, neke atu i te tekau ngā wā e whiwhi ana te Pirimia. "Ko ngā taumata utu i pūkorotia e ōna kaiwhakahaere me ngā moni rāhui e whakaputua ana e ia, kua tino kore e taea te pono o tōna tūnga i te mākete," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Tēnā Āpure neke atu i te tekau ngā wā e whiwhi ana te Pirimia. I kī a Nicky Morgan MP, te tūru o te Komiti Pūtea, ko ngā "taumata tiketike o te utu ā-kaiwhakahaere me ngā rāhui pūtea nui he uaua ki te tapawhā ki ngā whāinga hōnore o te kaupapa". "Te āhua nei kua ngaro pea te ara o Motability," tana tāpiri mai. Kua whakakāhore a Motability Operations i te hanga moni "tohunga", ā, e kī ana kua homai e ia he waka 4.5 miriona ki ngā tāngata hauā me ō rātou whānau mai i tōna whakarewatanga i te tau 1977. I runga i te utu a te rangatira nui o Maika Betts, ka kī te umanga kua "arotakea ki te mākete kia tino mōhio ai he whakataetae i te wā roa, me te whakarite hoki e pā ana ngā utu ki te mahinga e pā ana ki te kounga o te ratonga i homai".

title: Octavia Spencer: Te Whakakore i te 'wahine pango sassy' mo te wehi
summary: Kua rite a Octavia Spencer ki te tāhaehae i te pukapuka ture, he maripi toto i te ringa.
text: Nā Alex TaylorBBC News Ka tīmata te kaiwhakaari me te kaiwhakanao i a ia i roto i te kiriata wehi ā-hinengaro MA, e tūwhera ana i roto i ngā whare pikitia i tēnei mutunga wiki. E kite ana i a ia e tākaro ana i a Sue-Ann - he kaiāwhina kararehe ngahau, ko tōna hiahia ki te huri i tōna papa ki tētahi wāhiwera taitamariki e hīpoki ana i te whāinga whakamataku. He rerenga koi tēnei i te whakahaerenga o ngā tūranga nāna ia i whakarite hei tēpara o te wā whakawhiwhinga - mai i tētahi toa o Oscar mō te Āwhina o te tau 2011, ki ngā whakaingoatanga mō ngā Whika Huna i te tau 2016 me te Hanga Wai i te tau i muri iho. Engari he whai take te neke. Ko ngā pikitia e toru, i a ia e whakarite ana i a ia ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakaari pango e rua anake i whiwhi i ngā tautapa Academy e toru, ka kawea mai he rāhuitanga. "I whakaaro ahau i ngā wā katoa e hiahia ana te tangata ki te kite i a au hei kaitiaki, he tangata whakaaro rānei, he wahine pango rānei. A, ko te mea rekareka, kāore tētahi o rātou i te oranga tūturu. "Nā reira i whakaaro ahau, i te mea kāore au i te mahi i tētahi mea e āhua mamao ana ki a au, tērā pea ka haere ahau ki te koura me te mahi i tētahi mea i waho rawa atu i taua awhe i tērā pito o te tūāwhiorangi." E kī ana a Spencer i te tūranga 'matatini' i "peke i te wā" ki te whetū i roto i te pikitia, i tāia ki te matatinitanga o Sue-Ann, i roto i tētahi pikitia e whakataurite ana i ngā tino rerekē o te ngahau pōuri kānga pahū me te wehi kōaro. Ko te whakaingoa anō i a ia hei "Ma" ki tētahi rōpū taitamariki (i mua i a Maggie, i tākarotia e te kaiwhakaari Karaehe o Taiana Hiriwa), ka ngana a ia ki te hākari "pēnei i te whetū pōhatu" - inu mārō, kihi me te kanikani i tōna ara ki te whakaaetanga. I raro i tēnei uara ohorere o te mātakitaki i a Spencer i roto i taua rohe tauhou, ko ngā āhuatanga o te pūāhua e whakatangihia ana e ia e whakaata ana i tētahi āhua mokemoke, i pāngia e tētahi wā o mua. E kī ana a Spencer, ko te hōhonutanga huna o te hiahia o Sue-Ann ki te whakaaetanga me te utu, e hiahiatia ana he mārire. "Kāore he tāpare tohutoro," tana kī. "He nui noa iho taku rangahau, ā, i taku mōhiotanga he aha ōna raruraru, he ngāwari noa iho te whai i tōna tukanga whakaaro me tōna tauira whakaaro, me te mārama he aha ia e urupare ai ki a ia. " Ina tūtaki tuatahi koe ki a ia, kāore koe e hiahia kia haere ia ki raro i taua huarahi e mōhio ana koe kei te heke a ia. A, i whakaaro noa ahau he pūāhua tino whakamere ki te tākaro." E whakatuwhera ana i ngā tatau Engari e kite ana te kaiwhakaari whānau o Aotearoa, e 47, i tētahi atu, he tikanga whānui ake ki te whakarite i a MA hei kaupapa ārahi tuatahi. I a ia e 20 tētahi kaiwhakaari, hou ki Los Angeles i muri i tana whiwhinga mai i te Whare Wānanga o Auburn, ka uaua a ia ki te pakaru ki Karaihe. I roto i tētahi kōtaha me AARP, ka maharatia e ia tētahi wā hei kaiāwhina whakanao i runga i te whakaari kōti a Hoera Wānanga A Time to Kill, nāna i tāraro tana pakanga. "I hiahia ahau kia noho hei wahine nāna i tīmata tēnei whawhai ki te Ku Klux Klan, engari i kī a Schumacher, 'Kāo, he reka rawa tō kanohi mō tēnā. Ka taea e koe te pānui mā te nēhi.' Nā reira i pānui ahau mō te nēhi, ā, i whiwhi ahau". I haere tonu te kanga o ngā tūranga iti, kāore i te whakaahuatia mō te 15 tau. E whakaatu ana te titiro ki tana pukapuka whakaahua 133 tāwere i tākaro ai ia i te tūranga o te "nēhi" 17 ngā wā i mua i tōna mahi. Ināianei, he rerekē te āhuatanga. Ā, e tūmanako ana a Spencer mā te whakamua i tētahi pikitia wehi hei wahine pango - he āhua rerekē, ahakoa i te tau 2019 - ka taea e ia te āwhina ki te tukituki i ngā whakaaro whakawhāiti. Heoi anō, e kī ana, he inoi ki te kaiwhakahaere o te pikitia, o Tate Taylor, nāna i mahi tahi i mua i te Āwhina, ki te whakaū i te tūranga. "Ehara i te mea mōku anake," e kī ana a ia, "engari mō ngā kōtiro taitamariki e āhua rite ana ki a au, ki ngā kōtiro parauri iti rānei kia whai wāhi ki aua wā, kia āhei ai ki te tākaro i ngā tāngata tino whati me ngā tāngata matatini." 'Kanikani ki tō ake kaipahū' Nā ēnei whakamātautau i pēnei ai a Spencer i tētahi tauhou? "Tino, i ētahi wā" tana whakautu. "I think each one of us, at some point in our lives, feels like an outsider, and that's what's relatable about Sue-Ann because we all know what it feels like. But then, she says, she "grew up and realized we all have our own paths. Ā, i ētahi wā ka whakawhiti rātou, ā, i ētahi wā kāore rātou. Engari me hari koe ko wai koe. "Ehara hoki i te mea he tauhou koe, ko te tikanga noa iho ka kanikani koe ki tō ake kaipahū." Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko te minita mātauranga o Guernsey i roto i te 'kore tere' i runga i ngā huringa GCSE
summary: E kī ana te minita mātauranga o Guernsey e kore a ia e "tere" ki te tirotiro i ngā huringa kua marohitia ki ngā GCSEs.
text: Kāore anō te tari kia kōrerorero i ngā nekehanga i Ingarangi ki te maka i ngā GCSE e manakohia ana e tētahi Baccalaureate Ingarihi hou. I kī a Tuarua Robert Sillars "kāore he mea i taurangitia" i te mea he tawhiti rawa te tuhinga whakawhitiwhiti. Ka kī a ia: "Me mārama tātau he aha tēnā, he aha ngā pānga, he aha te pai mō Guernsey." I kī a Deputy Sillars: "Me Wales, Northern Ireland e kore e whai i a ia, kei Scotland tō rātou ake, nā reira kei roto mātou i tētahi wāhi tino pai ki te kōwhiri i ngā mea tino pai mō tō mātou motu. " He mana motuhake a Guernsey e whai ana i tōna ake marautanga me ā mātou kura tuarua e tuku ana i ngā akoranga whakamātautau tae atu ki ngā GCSEs, iGCSEs, BTECs me ētahi atu tohu e mōhiotia ana. "Our schools and students will continue to work hard to achieve the best that they can and gain the skills they need to move on to the next stage of their education, training or employment." I kī a ia he mea nui kia mōhio ngā mātua me ngā tamariki mō te wā heke, ā, ka mātakitaki tonu te tari i ngā whanaketanga i Ingarangi me te hiahia.

title: I hokona te kongakonga kāwhena o Hato Cuthbert
summary: Ko ngā kongakonga o te kāwhena me te koroka e kiia ana nā tētahi hunga tapu o te rau tau 7 me hokona i te hokonga.
text: E whakapono ana kua tangohia nga relics i te whakatuwheratanga o te urupa o Hato Cuthbert i te Whare Karakia o Durham i te rau tau 19. No te kaihoahoa tohutohu o te whare karakia, o Ian Curry, i mate i te tau 2012. I kī a Newcastle Auctioneers Anderson & Garland he "tino rerekē" te hoko i aua tuemi. I whakamanatia e te tohunga matua o Steven Moore ngā tūemi, e whakaaturia ana i roto i tētahi tāpare, i waenganui i te £200 me te £300, engari i whakaae "me pēhea tō uara i tētahi wāhanga hītori pēnei?". 'Talismanic object' St Cuthbert was a monk, bishop and hermit of Lindisfarne who lived in the Anglo-Saxon kingdom of Northumbria, and died in 687. I hangaia nga Rongopai o Lindisfarne hei whakahonore i a ia. I kī nga kaihoko i tangohia ngā kongakonga o te kāwhena i te whakatuwheratanga o te urupa o Hato Cuthbert i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, kātahi ka whakatuwheratia anō i te tau 1899, ā, ka tangohia ngā wāhanga e toe ana. I kī a Tēnā Moore kua mauria nga kongakonga puta noa i te ao, engari kāore a ia i mōhio ki tētahi atu wāhanga kua hokona mai. "He ahanoa he puranga rākau me te kākahu tawhito, engari he ahanoa talismanic," tana kī. "Ki te whai i tētahi mea e tino kaha ana te pāhono ki a Hato Cuthbert, he momo mātauranga tōna. " He mea e tūhono ana i a tātau ki ngā wā o mua." I kī a ia i whakaaro a ia ka puta mai ngā kaihoko tūpono i te hunga e hiahia ana ki te whakapono, ki te hītori, ki te Rāwhiti ki te Raki rānei. Ka hokona ngā kongakonga i te 27 o Poutāpeta, ā, he wāhanga o te kohinga o ngā tūemi hāhi i kohia e Tēnā Curry i te wā o tana mahi i te whakahoutanga o te whare karakia. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Anderson me Garland Durham Cathedral

title: BBC Proms: Cellist Gabetta i runga i te rama o te pō tuatahi
summary: Kua hoatu ki a Cellist Sol Gabetta te mahi rangatira o te whakatuwhera i te wā Proms o tēnei tau i te Royal Albert Hall o Rāwāhi.
text: Ka mahia e te Āhiana tau 35 tau te Konohete a Elgar i roto i te E iti i te 15 o Hōngū, i tana tīmatatanga o Proms. Ko Gabetta, nāna i tīmata ki te ako i te cello e whā tau te pakeke, he kaiwaiata rongonui kē i te ao whānui, ā, kua mahi puta noa i te ao. Kua mahi tahi a ia me ngā kaiārahi whakamihi, ā, he maha ngā tohu kōtaha tiketike, tae atu ki tētahi Whakawhiwhinga Gramophone me te Echo Klassik Preis - he whakawhiwhinga pūoro Tiamana - tae atu ki te whiwhi i tētahi whakaingoatanga Grammy. Hei tohu i tana konohete Proms, kua hangaia he kiriata poto ko Cello, e whakaatu ana i a ia e purei ana i te whakatuwheratanga o te konohete Elgar i te wā e kōpura ana tētahi whakaaturanga rama mamati puta noa i te mata o tana cello 300 tau. I konei ka kōrero a ia ki te kaiwhakanao o te pikitia, a Rārangi Slaney o 59 Productions, mō tōna ngahau i mua i te whakaaturanga, he aha hoki te cello he taputapu tino pai. Kei te tūmanako koe ki te tākaro i te Proms i tēnei tau? Koinei taku wā tuatahi e tākaro ana i te Proms, nā reira he mea tino nui ki a au te tīmata i taku tīmatanga i te pō tuatahi. Ka mahia e au te Konohete Cello a Elgar, he konohete tino hira mō ngā pūkoro katoa - engari he tino motuhake te whakatangi i Rānana, i mua i te hunga Ingarihi. Ka taea e koe te whakaaro i te nui o tēnei i roto i tōku māhunga, e mōhio ana kei mua ahau i tētahi iwi whānui e mōhio ana pea ki te wāhanga i a au! He tokomaha pea i roto i te hunga whakarongo ki tēnei wāhanga 100 pea. He pēhea te wheako o te hanga i te pikitia mō te Proms? E tino mōhio ana ahau ki te konohete a Elgar. I te wā tuatahi i hopukina e au, e 60 ngā wā i mahia e au i roto i te tau kotahi. Engari he rerekē te hanga i tēnei pikitia - koia tonu taku wā tuatahi e purei ana pēnei. I a tātau e tamariki ana, e ako ana tātau me pēhea te mahi. E ako ana mātou me pēhea te whakarite, ā-hinengaro, ā-tinana, ki te tākaro mō te rua haora me te kore e ngaro te pūngao, engari i ētahi wā he uaua ake te tākaro i mua i ngā kāmera i te noho i runga i te atamira. He tino rerekē te kite i ngā Proms i tāngia ki taku cello pēnei i te whakaahua! He aha te take e aroha ai te tangata ki te cello? He tino ngāwari. Ko te cello anake te taputapu e whā ngā reo pēnei i ngā mea e rongo ana koe e waiata ana i roto i te waiata, i tētahi tangi rānei e whakatangihia ana i runga i te piana. He nui rawa ngā tūponotanga. He tokomaha ngā tāngata e kōrero ana mō te reo tangata o te cello. Engari he taputapu tino riri hoki, engari mēnā kei te purei koe i ngā aho pōuri rawa, iti rawa. I tērā wā, he tino mārire hoki - engari kaua rawa e 'tangi', pērā i ētahi wā e rongo ana koe i te wairangi. Kātahi ko te pūwhiti tino nui - ehara i te kaha anake, engari he kaha, he maha rawa ngā tae. Kāore anō ētahi atu taputapu e whai ana i tēnei momo mana. Kei a koe te piana, engari he tino rerekē tēnā tikanga: he pūkaha ake, ā, kāore he pūkaha mō te cello. He huānga tino māori ki te mahi, ā, he tairongo hoki. Mēnā he makariri te rangi, ka makariri tō pūkoro, ā, mēnā he wera rawa - kāore ia e werawera, engari ka rongo koe kāore te pūwhiti o te oro i te mārama, i te tere hoki e tika ana. He nui taku manaaki i te taputapu. Ki te kore a ia e pai, ka ngana ahau ki te huri i te rūma, i ngā take rānei e pouri ana i a ia. Taihoa - he ia tō cello? Ehara tonu! I te kōrero a Sol Gabetta ki a Richard Slaney o 59 Productions. Ko te pō whakatuwheratanga o te konohete Prom kei te 1900 BST i te 15 o Hōngongoi i te Royal Albert Hall, London. Whāia mātou i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram i bbcnewsents, īmēra rānei entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakatūpato panuku i te tirohanga i te hinganga o ngā hoko
summary: Kua hinga ngā hea i Panuku i te 12% i muri i te pūrongo a te kaihoko i ngā hokonga hinga, ā, ka whakatūpato ka "uaua" te 2017.
text: I kī te kaihoko i hinga ngā hokonga utu katoa i te 0.4% i roto i ngā rā e 54 ki te 24 o Hakihe, ā, kua tautuhia ngā hua ā-tau ināianei ki te mutunga iti o ngā tūmanako. I matapaetia e te umanga ko ngā hua o te tau katoa ko te £792m, i whakaritea ki ngā tohutohu o mua o te £785m-£825m. I te tau 2017, ka pā pea ngā hokonga i te tau 2017 i te pikinga o te utunga moni e whakakino ana i te tupunga moni whiwhinga, ā, ka kōpeke i te hokohoko kaihoko. I heke iho ngā hea panuku i te £5.72, tata rānei ki te 12%, i te £41.98 i te ahiahi o te ahiahi i Rānana. "Te āhua nei he tau uaua anō te tau ki mua; nō reira kei te whakarite mātou i te kamupene mō ngā wā uaua ake," te kī a te kamupene. E kī ana ka piki pea te utu kākahu "kaua e neke atu i te 5%" i muri i te hinganga o te uara o te pauna i tērā tau. I tāpiritia mā tēnei e "whakaheke i ngā moni hoko huri noa i te 0.5%". I mua o te Wenerei, i tohu hoki tētahi pūrongo mai i te British Retail Consortium (BRC) ki te pikinga o ngā pēhanga utu i te wāhanga. I kī te BRC i piki ake te utu o ngā kākahu me ngā kākahu i a Hakihea i whakaritea ki Whiringa ā Rangi, te pikinga tuatahi o ngā utu mo te tata ki te rua tau. I kī a muri mai kei te tahua mō te tupu o ngā hoko utu katoa i te tau ki Hānuere 2018 i roto i te awhe o te hinganga o te 4.5% me te pikinga o te 1.5%. Mēnā i tae mai i te waenganui o te hinganga o te 1.5%, ka "iti noa iho te kino" i te mahinga o tēnei tau, ka tāpiritia. Kei te matapae kē a Next i te hinganga o ngā hua mō tērā tau, e kī ana e tūmanako ana kia mahi i waenganui i te £680m me te £780m. Heoi anō, i kī te kaihoko kua "pai te whakanoho ki te huarere i te hekenga o te tono kaihoko". Ko ngā whika a 'Gamble' Next mō ngā rā e 54 ki te Pō o te Kirihimete i kitea ai ngā hokonga i roto i ngā pātaka i hinga i te 3.5%, i te wā i piki ake ngā hokonga Whaiaronga Panuku i te 5.1%. I roto i tana kōrero, ka kī te kamupene ahakoa he "wā uaua" i haere ki tōna hokonga whakamutunga me te 3% iti iho i tērā tau, engari i hokona e ia te 7% iti iho ngā hua i te 12 marama ki mua. "I muri mai ka tūpono ki te pupuri i a rātau hoko i te utu katoa i te whakahaerenga ki te Kirihimete, koia tā rātou e mahi ai, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka whakamahia e rātou ngā hoko hei whakamātau i ngā tāngata ki roto i ngā toa ā muri ake," te kī a Kirsty McGregor o te pukapuka Drapers. Heoi anō, i kī a ia, te āhua nei kāore i utua taua rautaki i tēnei tau. "Ki taku whakaaro ko tā mātou e kite nei he neke atu i te whakapau moni nui ki ngā kākahu me ngā kākahu. Te āhua nei kei te whakapau moni anō te tangata ki te haere ki waho, ki te hangarau, ki ngā mea pērā." I whakaae te tauākī tauhokohoko a Panuku ki ngā "taumata tino rangirua i te wāhanga kākahu". I kī hoki te kamupene, ko tōna rangatira nui ko te Ariki Wolfson, he "iti noa iho te kitenga o te huarahi ka mauria e te kāwanatanga o UK ki Te Kāwanatanga". Heoi anō, ehara te hinganga o te whakapau moni i runga i ngā kākahu me ngā kākahu me te kōpeke i ngā moni whiwhinga kiritaki anake i ngā raruraru e anga ana ki a Panuku e ai ki a Neil Wilson, te kaitātari mākete matua i ETX Capital. "Ko te raruraru ngāwari ko te Next kei te whakaiti i te mākete," tana kī. "Kua mau tonu ngā hokonga hokohoko UK i ngā marama i muri mai i te pōti o Te Pōti, engari kua pāngia e Panuku. Kua mamae mō tētahi wā, ā, e hiahiatia ana he mahere hurihuri. "Kei te raruraru te parani mō te hāngaitanga me ngā mōrea e haere ana ki te ara o Marks rāua ko Spencer i mua i te kākahu, e tono ana ki tētahi pūtake kiritaki whāiti ake." Ko te tirohanga pouri o Panuku mō te 2017 i pā ki ētahi atu kaihoko, me Marks and Spencer, Debenhams me te rangatira o Primark Associated British Foods i raro iho i te tauhokohoko. Heoi anō, he pai ake ngā rongo mai i te kaihoko whakahekenga utu B&M, i kite i ōna hea e peke ana i te 7% i muri i tana pūrongo i te pikinga nui o ngā hoko i te whakahaerenga ki te Kirihimete. I kī a B&M i piki te 7.2% i roto i ngā marama e toru ki te 24 o Hakihe, i te wā i piki ake te moni puta noa i te rōpū neke atu i te rima ki te £789.1m.

title: Ka puta atu te whetū o Tākuta Foster, o Suranne Jones i te tākaro o West End
summary: Kua kī te kaiwhakaari a Tākuta Foster, o Suranne Jones, kua "tino kōaro" a ia i muri i tana tango atu i te tākaro Frozen o West End nā te mate.
text: I whakapārewa te whetū, e 39, ki ngā kaihautū i muri i tana hapa i ngā mahinga whakamutunga e whā o te whakahaerenga o te whakaaturanga, i mutu i te Hātarei. I kī a Jones, nāna i tākaro i tētahi whaea kua kahakina tana tamaiti, he "tino pānga" te kaupapa o te whakaaturanga. "E mōhio tūturu ana ahau kua āwhina ki tōku whakaaro i raro i te huarere," tana tāpiri mai. I te whakairinga i tētahi karere ki tōna whārangi Instagram, ka kī a Jones kāore i taea e ia te whakaoti i te matinee o te Rāwiki i te Whare Tapere Royal Haymarket i Rāwāhi i muri i tana ānini i runga i te atamira. "I hoki mai ahau i muri i te mate, ā, he wawe rawa," ko tana tuhituhi. "Ko te tangata e mōhio ana ki te whakaaturanga e mōhio ana he wāhanga tino whakaheke, ā, i muri i te toru marama me te mate kāore i taea e au te whakamutu i te oma." 'I tangohia tōna utu' I kī a ia e tūmanako ana ia kia hoki ki te atamira mo te mahinga whakamutunga i te Hātarei, engari i kī atu tana tākuta kia kaua ia e "whakaoti i a au me te mōrearea anō ki te mate". "Kua pā mai tēnei whakaaturanga ki a au," tana kī. "I a koe e wheako ana i te hunga whakarongo i te wā kotahi, ā, ka kī tonu koe me pēhea koe e nekehia ana, e whakahekea ana e ia. I ngā wā katoa e whakaaro ana mātau he kaiwhakaari ka taea e mātau te pana me te whakahaere tonu, engari i ētahi wā kāore e taea e mātou." I kī te toa o te whakawhiwhinga Bafta e whakaaro ana a ia ki te okioki i mua i te tīmatanga o te whakaahuatanga mō ngā rangatū hōu e waru wāhanga o TE AO o Gentlemen Jack ā muri ake i tēnei marama. Ka whakaahuatia te rangatū, e waihangatia ana, e whakahaeretia ana e te kaituhi o Happy Valley, o Sally Wainwright, i West Yorkshire me Copenhagen. I tākaro a Jones i te tūranga o Dr Gemma Foster, he wahine i whakapae i tana tāne he take, i roto i te rangatū whakaari o TE AO Kotahi o Tākuta Foster.

title: E rua ngā utu o te pūtea taketake o te wheketere Trident
summary: Kua tauruatia te utu o tētahi whakamohoa o te wheketere taiapa Trident o UK - ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia neke atu i te rua tau anō hei whakaoti.
text: I tohaina te pūtea o te £2bn mō te hanga anō i ngā pūkenga i waenganui i te 2005 me te 2015 i ngā pae Atomic Weapons Establishment (AWE) e rua o Berkshire. I pau i a AWE te £3.96bn i te mutunga o te tau ā-pūtea 2015/16, kua whakaaturia mai tētahi tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio (FoI). I kī tētahi kaikōrero AWE ko te moni i pau he wāhanga o te "pūtea whakaae ā-tau". E toru o ngā kaupapa e rima i whakaritea i ngā pae i Aldermaston me Burghfield i oti i te wā tika i te tau 2015. Heoi anō, i whakaaturia e te urupare a te Manatu Arotahi (MoD) ki te FoI kua tūmanakohia ināianei kia oti i a AWE ngā kaupapa Pegasus me Mensa i te tau 2020. Ka penapena, ka whakahaere hoki a Pegasus i ngā wae konupūmā mō ngā nuku karihi, ā, ko Mensa te wāhi e huihuia ai ngā rākau. I kī te MoD e whakarato ana i ngā whakatau tata mo te nui o ngā moni i pau i tēnei tau, ā, ā muri ake nei ka "whakararuraru" tōna tūnga whakarite. I kī tētahi kaikōrero AWE: "Ko ngā whika i whakaputaina e te MoD, hei urupare ki te tono Wāteatanga o ngā Mōhiohio o nā noa nei, he wāhanga o tā mātou pūtea whakaae ā-tau mai i te kāwanatanga, e whakarite ana i tō mātou āheinga ki te tautoko i te ārai karihi o UK. " Ko tēnei pūtea e kapi ana i ngā utu pūtea o tētahi pae raihana karihi matatini me ngā pūkenga karihi whakakapinga, e herea ana ēnei katoa ki te āta tirotiro." I kī te MP o Newbury, ko AWE, ko ngā takaware he "rongo kino mō te kaihautū". I tāpiri mai a ia e whakapono ana a ia kei te pai ake ngā tukanga tiki i te MoD, ā, ka iti iho ngā whakapaunga.

title: Mā te pōti e āwhina ki te kōwhiri i te ingoa o te whatianga pea pākākā
summary: Kua tonoa te iwi whānui kia āwhina ki te kōwhiri i te ingoa o te whatianga pea pākākā tuatahi i whānau mai i UK mo te 25 tau.
text: I whānau mai te whatianga tāne i te Highland Wildlife Park, tata ki Kincraig, i a Hakihea. Kua kōwhiria e te pāka e whā ngā ingoa e taea ana, ā, kei te tono i ngā tāngata kia pōti mō tā rātou makau. Ko ngā ingoa e whā e whakaaturia ana i runga i te rārangi poto ko Poulsen, MacKinnon, Artor me Hamish. He whanonga pea rongonui a Poulsen, i a MacKinnon te ingoa o tētahi "kaitautoko tūturu" o te pāka. I kī ngā kaimahi he ingoa Pictish a Artor e pā ana ki ngā pea, tae atu ki te "hurihanga" ki te pāpā o te whatianga, ko tōna ingoa ko Arktos ko te tikanga o te "pea" i te reo Kariki. I kī rātau ko Hamish "he ingoa Pākehā kaha e pai ana ki a mātau kaitiaki. He tino pai mō tētahi pea pākākā i whānau mai i ngā Whenua Teitei?" Kei te whakahaeretia te pōti i te whārangi Facebook o te pāka.

title: E kī ana a Pirihi Grayling i te mahi EU a Cameron 'tērā pea ka kino ake ngā mea'
summary: Kua whakahē te kaiārahi o Ngātahi, a Pirihi Grayling i te mahi whakahōu EU a Rawiri, e kī ana ka waiho pea a Ingarangi i roto i tētahi "āhuatanga kino ake" i mua.
text: I whakatūpato a Tēnā Grayling, e hiahia ana kia wehe atu a Ingarangi i te EU, ka taea te whakaweto i te whenua i ngā whakataunga i te wā e whakakotahi ana ngā iwi o te rohe ūropi. I whakahokia hoki e ia te kerēme a te PM i whakaaro ai ngā kaiwhakahauhau Waiho he "utu e tika ana kia utua" mō te puta. I kī a ia ko te waiho i te EU "ka waihangatia te wā mō ētahi atu mahi". I roto i tana whaikōrero, ka whakatūpato a Tēnā Grayling e kore te UK e tū ki te ara o te whakaurunga o te rohe ūropi ka tukitukia tōna tūnga e te mana whakahaere a Tēnā Karauna i roto i tana whakaritenga anō EU. "Ko tētahi o ngā hua ohorere o ngā kōrero whakariterite anō, kua whakaae mātou e kore a Ingarangi 'e whakararuraru i te whakatinanatanga o ngā mahi ā-ture e hono hāngai ana ki te taumahi o te rohe ūropi'. He tino nui tēnei - ā, kāore i te mōhiotia - te ngaronga o te mana," tana kī. "Ināianei kāore i a mātou tētahi utauta matua hei ārai i ētahi atu whakaurunga EU - tērā pea ka tōia mātou ki roto. Ko te mea tērā pea kei roto tātau i tētahi āhuatanga kino atu i a mātau i mua." I kī te Kaiāwhina Kaiwhakatika Tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Norman Smith, e ngana ana a Tēnā Grayling me ērā atu kaiwhakahauhau Waiho ki te whakawhiti i te arotahi ki te mahi a Tēnā, i muri i ngā "oro me te weriweri" o ngā rā o mua tata nei, i a rātau e whakapono ana koinei te tikanga o te taupānga - ā, he take tērā e whakaaro ana rātau ka taea e rātau te "toa ngāwari ake" i te āhua o te whakahaerenga. I whakatūpato a Tēnā Grayling - ko tētahi o ngā mema tokoono o te tīma matua o Tēnā Karauna e tautoko ana i te whakahau Waiho - ka kōwhiri tonu te UK kia noho i roto i tētahi "EU kāore anō kia whakahoutia, ā, ka nui ake te moni me te kaha anō i ia wā". "Kāore i hurihia e tēnei whakaaetanga te waeine e whakahaere ana te Uniana o Ūropi i o tātau oranga," tana kī. "Kāore anō te whakaritenga anō kia whakahokia ngā mana ki te Pāremata, ki te iwi rānei i pōtitia, e haepapa ana ki a ia." Ka kī atu te minita ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā he "manaaki nui" tōna ki te pirimia, ā, i "tino whakawhetai" ki a ia mō te whakaae i ngā minita ki te kōrero i o rātau hinengaro i mua i te taupānga 23 o Pipiri mēnā me noho tonu a Ingarangi ki te EU. I kī hoki a ia ka taea e te kāwanatanga te mahi tahi i muri i te taupānga, engari i tūmanako te iwi whānui ki tētahi "matapakinga pakeke" i runga i te EU, ka tāpiritia: "Kāore rātau e tūmanako kia noho aunoa mātau." 'Kāwanatanga kotahi' E kōrero ana i ngā kerēme a Tēnā Karauna - nā te mea ka haere mai i roto i tētahi whaikōrero ki ngā kaimahi motokā ā muri ake - i whakapono te whakahau Waiho "ngā mahi ngaro me te āhua o te mahi kōkuhu pea... he utu e tika ana kia utua" - i kī a ia "he utu ngā ture o te Uniana o Ūropi i ngā mahi i te whenua". "I waho o te Uniana o Ūropi, ka taea e tātau te whakatau whakataunga me te hanga ture e hiahiatia ana e tātau ake ā iwi," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Tēnā Karauna kua whiwhi parenga mō te Taone o Rāwāhi i roto i tana tiriti whakahōu, i whakaaetia i tērā marama i tētahi tihi o Pōroa. I whiwhi hoki a ia i tētahi waihotanga mō Ingarangi mai i te tukutahi a te EU ki te "uniana tata atu". Engari ko Vote Leave, te rōpū whakawhiti-rōpū he mema a Tēnā Grayling, e whakaputa rangahau ana ā muri ake nei e whakamatautau ana i tēnei kerēme. E huatau ana kua "tukua" e te UK tōna mana ki te whakahē i tētahi tiriti EU ā muri ake nei hei whakamau i te tukanga o te uniana ohaoha me te moni puta noa i te rohe ūropi. I kī atu a Tēnā Grayling i tēnei rā: "Ehara i te āhuatanga pateko. E whakapono ana ahau kua tukua kētia e tātau te mana nui ināianei ki te Uniana o Ūropi ki te whakahaere i a tātau take. "Engari ā muri ake nei i a rātau e neke ana ki te whakauru anō, ko te mōrearea kāore e taea e tātau te aukati i a rātau ki te mahi i ngā mea ka pā tonu ki a mātau." I tāpiri mai a ia: "I te nekehanga o te rohe ūropi ki te nui ake o te whakakotahitanga, ki te noho hei kāwanatanga kotahi, ko ngā whakataunga ka pā ki te Taone o Rāwāhi, hei tauira."

title: Mate rongoā anthrax: Ka tuwhera te uiuinga a Declan Wallace
summary: Kua whakatuwheratia, kua hikitia tētahi uiuinga ki te matenga o tētahi kaiwhakamahi rongoā o Te Rūnanga i mate i tērā wiki i muri i te whakapokenga ki te anthrax.
text: I mate a Declan Wallace, e 48, mai i Kirkham, i te Hōhipera o Wikitōria i Blackpool. I kī te Kōwhiringa Parenga Hauora e whakapono ana kua werohia e ia te hīkini tāhae. I kī a Blackpool Coroner Anne Hind kāore i taea te whakahaere i tētahi whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri katoa nā te mōrea o te whakapokenga ki ngā kaimātai pathologists. I kī a ia kua whakaūngia e ngā whakamātautau toto te paitini anthrax. Ka tīmata anō te whakarongo i tētahi rā kāore anō kia whakaūtia. Ko te anthrax he mate huakita tāhapa e kitea nuitia ana i roto i ngā kararehe matimati pēnei i te kau, te hipi me te koati. I te nuinga o te wā ka whakapoke i te tangata ina hū, ka kai rānei i ngā spores anthrax. E whitu nga keehi kua whakapumautia o te whakapokenga i Uropi mai i Pipiri - kotahi i Lanarkshire, e toru i Tiamana, e rua i Tenemaka, kotahi i Wīwī.

title: E 56,000 ngā whakamātau hekenga a ngā pirihimana taitapa ki Keni
summary: I whakakorea e ngā Ope Taitapa te toharite o ngā whakamātau 153 e ngā kaiheke e ngana ana ki te tae ki UK mai i Wīwī i ia rā i tērā tau.
text: Neke atu i te 56,000 ngā nganatanga i mahia e ngā tāngata e ngana ana ki te uru ki Keni mai i ngā tauranga me ngā kāpeka Wīwī i te tau 2016. Ko ngā whika kāwanatanga, i whakaputaina i raro i te wāteatanga o ngā mōhiohio, ko te tuarua teitei rawa i roto i te whitu tau, ahakoa e taka ana i te 25,000 i whakaritea ki te 2015. I kī te Tari Kāinga he "angitu" te hekenga. I kī a Dover me Deal MP Charlie Elphicke he "mīharo". Kei roto i ngā tatauranga ko ngā tāngata e whakaputu ana i roto i ngā waka i ngā tauranga o Calais me Dunkirk, tae atu ki ngā kāpeka Eurotunnel me Eurostar. I whakaaturia hoki e rātau te maha o ngā tauiwi ture kore mana i kitea i ngā tauranga waka waka o UK i tērā tau. E 1,868 i kitea i te 2016, i whakaritea ki te 1,305 i te 2015. I kī a Tēnā Elphicke: "He mīharo te whakamātau a ngā kaiheke i Calais ki te pakaru ki Ingarangi, neke atu i te 50,000 ngā wā i tērā tau. " E tārarotia ana e ēnei whika te tauine pono o te uauatanga e anga atu ana tātau - he aha hoki tātau e hiahia ai ki te pūtea penapena anō i tō tātau rohe. "Koinei te take i kaha ai mātou ki te wete i te Ngahere o Calais." Ko te Ngahere te kāinga ki ngā tangata e 7,000 e noho ana i roto i ngā āhuatanga kino, ā, ka noho hei tohu matua o te mate hekenga o Uropi. I haehae i Whiringahora, ā, ka pahia ngā kaiheke ki ngā pūtahi kaiwhiwhi puta noa i Wīwī ki te tono whakangungu. I mahi tahi te kāwanatanga me ngā mana Wīwī ki te wetewete i te puni, ā, kua hangaia he taiepa i te huarahi matua ki Calais hei ārai i te pekenga o ngā kaihoko ki roto i ngā taraka. I kī te kaiwhakahaere haumarutanga taitapa ā-ao, o Te Ope Taitapa o UK, ko te pūtea penapena nui i roto i ngā mana taitapa i te tau kua taha ki te taka o ngā whika.
