Ka kī a ia: "Ko te 56,000 [whika] he whakaata hāngai o te mea kei te mahi mātou ināianei me te Wīwī ki te whakahaere i ngā taki hōhonu ake, engari o te hanganga, te taiapa, me te CCTV kua haumi katoatia. " Tērā tētahi iwi nui o ngā kaiheke, ngā kaiwhaiwhai me ngā kaihoko huri noa i Calais, engari ko tēnei hanganga hou, me te mahi a te Wīwī ki te wete i ngā puni, kua whai pānga." I kī te Tari Kāinga ko te maha o ngā nganatanga i roto i ngā wā i auau ai te whakamātau a aua kaiheke ōrite ki te uru ki ngā rā rerekē. I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikōrero: "Mā ēnei whika e tino mārama ai kei te mahi tā mātou huarahi ki te whakaū i te rohe o UK. " Ahakoa o mātau angitu ki te ārai i ngā ngana ki te tomo ki te UK i runga i te ture, kaore mātau i te māhorahora. "Ka mahi ngātahi tonu mātou me ō mātou hoa Wīwī ki te pupuri i te haumarutanga taitapa me te pupuri i ngā pāhihi tika me te hokohoko kia neke." I kī te Road Haulage Association kua nui haere te tutu i ngā wāhi tāurunga Wīwī i ngā wiki tata nei, ā, kāore ngā atekōkiri i whakaae ki te haere. I kī te kaikorero o Rod McKenzie: "Kei te wehi, kei te riri o mātau mema. Ko nga rōpū kaiheke kaiheke, i te nuinga o te wā e mau ana i nga pae rino e whakaeke ana i o rātau waka. "He nui rawa te tokomaha o nga pirihimana, ā, e mārama ana kua kore e taea e rātau te whakatikatika i ngā tau e ngana ana ki te whakawhiti ki te UK. " E rongo ana mātou i ngā atekōkiri e kore e pai ki te haere i waenganui i Dover me Calais i te wā e whakarerekē ana i ā rātou waka huri noa i te Tauranga i te utu o ngā mano pauna."

title: He aha te Extinction Rebellion me te aha e hiahia ana?
summary: Kua whakarewaina e te rōpū whakahau taiao o Extinction Rebellion tētahi whakahē e whakaaro ana kia haere tonu mō te rua wiki.
text: I Rāwāhi, e whai ana kia "noho rangimārie i ngā pūtahi hiko me te whakaweto i a rātou" me ngā whakahē i whakaritea ki ngā tāone o te ao, tae atu ki Tūtukupu, Perewa, Niu Ioka me Poihākena. Engari ko wai ngā kaitautoko o Extinction Rebellion, ā, he aha tā rātou e tūmanako ana kia tutuki? He aha te Extinction Rebellion? E hiahia ana a Extinction Rebellion (XR mō te poto) kia whakapuakina e ngā kāwanatanga tētahi "ohorere āhuarangi me te rauropi" me te mahi wawe hei whakatau i te huringa āhuarangi. E whakaahua ana i a ia anō he "nekehanga kaiwhaiwhai ā-iwi kāore i te tutuki". I whakarewaina te Extinction Rebellion i te tau 2018, ā, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ināianei he rōpū e hiahia ana ki te mahi i ngā whenua maha. Ka whakamahia e te rōpū he karaihe haora i roto i te porohita hei moko mōna, hei tohu i te wā e pau ana mō ngā momo maha. 2025tau i te wā e whai ana te rōpū ki te kore kohu waro 298,000followers i runga i Facebook 1,130people i hopukina i runga i ngā whakahēnga o Rāwāhi o Aperira 2018 tau i whakatūria ai te rōpū He whaitake ōna whāinga? I te UK, e toru ngā tono matua o te Extinction Rebellion: Ko te whakaiti i te kohu CO2 ki te tata ki te kore i roto i te ono tau ka tino hao. E hiahiatia ana he rāhuitanga taumaha mo te rererangi. Me huri ngā kai, mā te whakaiti i te mīti me te miraka kau. A, me tino nui te nui o te pūngao whakahou, tae atu ki ētahi atu huringa toitū maha. Engari e kī ana te hunga e pā ana ki te Extinction Rebellion kei runga i a ia te wā heke mai o te aorangi. "Kua mahue i a mātou te tōmuri rawa kia hīpae mātou i runga i tētahi huarahi āhua merekara ki te mahi i tēnei āhuatanga," te kī a te kaiwhakarewa tahi o Gail Bradbrook. Heoi anō, kāore te rōpū e kī he aha ngā rongoā hei rutu i te huringa āhuarangi. Engari, e hiahia ana kia hangaia e te kāwanatanga he "huihuinga tangata whenua", i hangaia e ngā tāngata i tīpakohia matapōkeretia e tohu ana i tētahi wāhanga whakawhiti o te iwi. Ka whakatau ōna mema me pēhea te whakatika i te raruraru āhuarangi, me ngā tohutohu a ngā tohunga. He aha ōna tikanga? I Aperira 2019, i tū a Extinction Rebellion i tētahi whakaaturanga nui i Rānana. I roto i te 11 rā, ka tū ētahi o ngā ara tino pākaha o te taone. Neke atu i te 1,100 ngā hopunga i hua ai te mahi - ko te nuinga o te whakapae kāore i te whai i ngā tohutohu pirihimana kia neke. I whakapiria e ētahi kaiwhaiwhai ki ngā tereina, ki te tomokanga o te London Stock Exchange. Ko ētahi i hīkoi i runga i te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow, ā, ko ētahi i mekameka i a rātau anō. I te ao whānui, e whakaaro ana te Extinction Rebellion e 400 anō o ōna kaiwhaiwhai kua hopukina mai i te 31 o Whiringahora 2018, tae atu ki te 70 i New York City. I te wā o June, ka āraia e nga kaiwhaiwhai nga waka i Niu Ioka, he tokomaha nga kaiwhakahaere Tiamana i mekameka i a rātau i waho o te Tumuaki o Te Rūnanga o Perewa, ā, i Parihi ka whakamahia e nga pirihimana he rehu pepa hei whakawātea i ngā kaiwhaiwhai e ārai ana i tētahi piriti i runga i te Seine. He aha ngā kōrero a ngā kaiwhakawāwā mōna? Ehara i te mea uaua ki te kimi i ngā tāngata e whakahē ana ki ngā tohutohu a Extinction Rebellion - mai i ngā atekōkiri takaware i Twitter ki ngā kōwae nūpepa. Kua whakahētia ōna kaitautoko hei "kaitautoko taiao" e whakaaro ana ki te whakangaro i ngā hararei e hia mano, ā, ka mōrearea ki te whakararuraru i ngā mano o ngā kaitautoko tūpono. He £7.5m anō te utu o nga pirihimana i nga whakahē a Rānōna, e ai ki te Komihana Pirihimana o Tūtaki, a Cressida Dick. E kī ana a Extinction Rebellion ko te tangata e riri ana i ōna whakahē me "mōhio anō mō te kaha o te raruraru rauropi me te āhuarangi". Kua tiakina hoki e ia te tūkino hara, pēnei i te tukituki i ngā matapihi. E kī ana i ētahi wā e hiahiatia ana aua tohutohu, ā, he "tino tūpato" kia kaua e mōrearea tētahi tangata. Ko wai e tautoko ana i te Extinction Rebellion? Tērā pea ka whakaae te rangatahi ki ōna whāinga, e huatau ana tētahi uiuinga o ngā tāngata e 3,000 i whakahaeretia e YouGov i Aperira. I waenganui i ngā pakeke 18 ki te 24 tau, 47% i "tino tautokona", i "āhua tautokona" rānei i te raruraru o ngā waka me ngā waka tūmatanui hei miramira i ngā whāinga a Extinction Rebellion. I whakaritea tērā ki te 36% o te hunga 50-65 me te 28% o ngā pakeke neke atu i te 65. Kua whiwhi tautoko hoki mai i ngā whika tūmatanui, pēnei i te kaiwhakaari o Emma Thompson, ngā kaipōrangapū o Diane Abbott me Caroline Lucas me ngā pēne Radiohead me Massive Attack.

title: Ngā tauira e parakuihi ana i runga i ngā inu pūngao
summary: Kotahi i roto i te 20 ngā tauira taiohi e haere ana ki te kura i runga i te tīni inu pūngao, kaua ko te parakuihi pai, e huatau ana tētahi uiuinga.
text: Nā Hannah Rārangi, ko te tuatoru o ngā taitamariki UK e kai ana i ngā parakuihi hauora pēnei i te parai, i te mātao rānei, e huatau ana te poipoi o ngā tamariki e 2,000 te pakeke i waenganui i te 12 me te 18. E whā i roto i te 10 tīpoka parakuihi katoa kia ngaro ai te taumaha, e huatau ana te poipoi mō te whakahau Make Mine Milk. I kī a Kōrero Lightman, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te Association of School and College Leaders, he māharahara nga hua. I kī a ia ko ngā tauira e parakuihi ana i runga i ngā inu pūngao, kāore i te tūtohutia mō ngā tamariki, he mea i kitea e ia hei kaiako mātāmua. 'Hyperactive' "Ina tae mai ngā tamariki ki ngā kura kua tīmata te rā ki te kai, te inu rānei i ngā mea kāore i te tika kia noho i roto i te akomanga. " Ka taea e rātou te hyperactive, ā, he tino kino te pānga ki tō rātou whanonga." I tāpiritia e ia me mātua whakarite kei te kai parakuihi pai a rātau tamariki, kaua e tuku moni ki te hoko i tētahi mea e haere ana ki te kura. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He nui ngā pānuitanga ki ēnei inu, ā, he huatau, ā, e aroha ana ngā taitamariki ki ngā mea huatau." I kī hoki a Dr Mary Bousted, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te Association of Teachers and Lecturers (ATL), he tino nui kia whai parakuihi pai, whai kiko hoki ngā tamariki ki te whakatatū i a rātou mō te rā, kia āhei ai rātou ki te arotahi i roto i te akomanga. "He mea hira hoki te parakuihi hauora ki te aukati i ngā tamariki kia pārekareka, kia kino hoki te whanonga. " He māharahara te whakaaro kei te parakuihi ētahi tamariki i runga i ngā inu pūngao, pēnei i te Pūru Whero, e kī ana i te huka me ngā whakaongaonga, ā, he iti noa iho te uara kai. "School breakfast clubs can play a key role in making sure children have had a good breakfast before they start school to help their learning. Ā, e hiahia ana mātou kia whakaakona ngā tamariki mō te kai hauora, kia ako ai rātou ki ngā kai hauora me pēhea te tunu kai whai hua." Ko te ihirangi kawhe i roto i aua inu pūngao e ahu mai ana i te 8mg o te kawhe - he rite tonu ki te kawhe espresso - ki te 400mg. 'Kāhua pūtiro' Ko ētahi o ngā hua "kāhua pūtiro" iti iho ka taea te pupuri i te 175mg o te kawhe i roto i te pounamu 60ml. Ko ngā inu e pupuri ana i ngā inu neke atu i te 150mg o te kawheina mō ia rīta (mg/l) me tapa ki te kupu "ihirangi kawhe tiketike", ā, e taunaki ana te Food Standards Agency kia "pau anake ngā tamariki i ngā inu ngāwari me ngā taumata tiketike o te kawheine". Kāore ngā kaihanga o te Red Bull Energy Drink i hiahia ki te kōrero mō te take i whakaarahia engari e kī ana tōna paetukutuku: "Kua mōhiotia te tātai motuhake a Red Bull Energy Drink puta noa i te ao e ngā kaitākaro matua, ngā ākonga, ina mahi i ngā mahi tono, i ngā puku roa rānei." Ka tāpiritia ko te inu "te taputapu tino pai ina hohe koe, e hiahia ana koe ki te tautuhi i ngā tino pai whaiaro". I kī te tumuaki o te British Soft Drinks Association Gavin Partington: "E mārama ana te umanga inu ngohengohe kāore e tika ana ngā inu pūngao mō ngā tamariki, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakawhiti i taua karere ki te rangatahi me ō rātou mātua. " Tērā pea ka kōwhiria e ngā pakeke he inu pūngao, he rite tonu te kawhe ki te kapu kawhe noa, ina hiahia rātou ki te āwhina ā-tinana, ā-hinengaro rānei. Engari, pēnei i ngā kai me ngā inu katoa, me pau ngā inu pūngao i runga i te ngāwari hei wāhanga o te kai whārite me te āhua noho hohe."

title: Coronavirus: 'Critical' to get protective kit to front line - NHS medical director
summary: He "tino nui" te tae atu o ngā taputapu ārai whaiaro ki ngā kaimahi NHS kia taea ai e rātou te whai i ngā tohutohu tino pai rawa mō tōna whakamahinga, kua kī tētahi mana matua.
text: I hurihia e te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi ana tohutohu i te Paraire kia whakaaetia ai te whakamahi anō i ngā kākahu mēnā ka pau ngā rawa. I kī te kaiwhakahaere rongoā o NHS Ingarangi, a Prof Stephen Powis, ko te tohutohu o mua i noho tonu te "tino pai" - engari e hiahiatia ana he kete tika. I kī te hēkeretari hapori e 400,000 ngā kākahu e tae mai ana i te Rātapu. Engari kāore a Robert Jenrick i tautohetohe i te huatau a tētahi kaipānui ka mutu noa iho tēnei NHS Ingarangi i te toru rā. A, i whakaae a ia ko te "putanga poto" i ngā wāhi pēnei i ngā hīpoki me ngā apron i puta ai tētahi "wā tino māharahara mō ngā tāngata i te raina o mua". I te wā i tuhia e te UK ētahi atu mate coronavirus e 888, ka eke te tapeke o ngā mate hōhipera ki te 15,464. I a ia e kōrero ana i te kōrero coronavirus o ia rā i No 10, i kī a Prof Powis e "tino kaha ana te mahi" o te kāwanatanga ki te whakarato i ngā taonga ārai ki ngā kaimahi rongoā o mua. I kī te tohutohu PHE i mua i ngā kaimahi rongoā e tiaki ana i ngā tūroro Covid-19 me mau i ngā kākahu ārai wai roa. Engari i hurihia tēnei i te Paraire, me te PHE e whakahuahua ana i ngā kōwhiringa e toru mēnā kāore i te wātea ngā kākahu e kī ana "he whakararuraru" e hiahiatia ana "i ngā wā o te tino iti". I kī a Prof Powis ko te tohutohu o mua i noho tonu "te tohutohu tino pai mō te āhua o te urutā kua tae atu ki a mātau". "Kia tino mōhio ai ka taea te whai i taua tohutohu, he tino nui rawa atu i runga i ngā mea katoa kei a mātou ngā rawa PPE e haere ana ki te raina o mua," tana kī, me te tāpiri ko te haumarutanga o ngā kaimahi NHS he take hiranga "whaiaro". "He tākuta ahau, he maha nga tau i mahi ai ahau i te raina o mua, ā, ka taea e au te whakaū i a koe mōku me ōku hoa mahi rongoā, he tino whaiaro tēnei," tana kī. "Ko ōku hoa, ōku hoa mahi, whānau whānui ēnei." Ka nui rānei ngā kākahu tāpiri e 400,000? Ka pōhiritia te tātaritanga a te kaipānui hauora o TE WĀ, a Philippa Roxby, he kawenga kākahu 84 tan mai i Tākehi i te Rātapu, engari kāore e roa te wā e tata ana ki te hawhe miriona kaimahi NHS o mua. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, ākuanei ka anga atu rātau ki te whakamahi anō i ngā kākahu, ki te mau whirinoa rānei kāore i hoahoatia hei ātete i ngā wai, e ai ki ngā tohutohu hou mai i te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi. Ahakoa e kī ana ngā minita i ngā wā katoa ko te iti he hua o te hiahia nui o te ao whānui mō ngā taputapu parenga, kāore ngā tākuta me ngā nēhi i te mīharo. Te āhua nei he maha nga tau i mahi ai a Prof Steve Powis, he tākuta i mahi i te raina o mua. A, i huatau mai ia he aha te mea i hiahiatia e ōna "hoa mahi rongoā" ko te mea i kīa mai ki a rātau e rua wiki ki mua i te huringa o te tohutohu. I roto i te tohutohu hōu, e whakaaetia ana mēnā ka puta mai ngā iti, e toru ngā kōwhiringa e whakaaturia ana mō te wā kāore e wātea ana ngā kākahu. Ko tētahi kōwhiringa kia rāhuitia e ngā hōhipera ngā kākahu mō ngā mahi pokanga me ngā hātepe e tuku ana i ngā pathogens romahā. E tono ana hoki i ngā kaimahi kia whakamahi anō i "ngā kākahu hapara, ngā kākahu rānei, ngā kākahu ōrite rānei (hei tauira, koti taiwhanga ringa roa, kākahu tūroro ringa roa, kākahu mahi mahi rānei) me tētahi kākahu kirihou ka taea te whakamahi mō ngā AGP (ngā hātepe hanga aerosol) me ngā tautuhinga mōrearea tiketike me te horoi ringa ina tangohia te kākahu, te kākahu rānei". I mua ake, ka kī te Kāreti Ariki o Nēhi i hangaia te tohutohu me te kore whakaaro katoa, ā, ko te Pānga Rongoā o Ingarangi (BMA) - e tohu ana i ngā tākuta - i kī me whakahaere e te pūtaiao, ehara i te wāteatanga. 'He tino matekiri' i kī a Dr Rob Harwood, te manukura o te komiti tohutohu i te BMA: "He maha rawa ngā kaimahi rongoā kua mate kē. " Kāore e taea te tūmanako kia nui ake ngā tākuta me ō rātou hoa mahi ki te whakaora i ētahi atu, ā, ko te tikanga o tēnei tohutohu hōu ka taea e rātou te mahi pērā. Ehara i te whakataunga me mahi rātau." I tāpiri mai a Dr Harwood: "He tino matekiri ki a mātau kāore i taea e te kāwanatanga, ahakoa i muri i te marama, te whakatau i tēnei iti rawa o te PPE." I whakatūpato a Unison, te uniana mahi nui rawa o UK, ka kore pea ngā kaimahi i "ngā wāhi mōrearea tiketike" e pai ki te mahi mēnā ka pau ngā kākahu. I kī a Prof Neil Mortensen, mai i te Kāreti Ariki o Ingarangi, me "kaua e mōrearea tō rātou hauora" mēnā kāore i te wātea ngā kākahu ārai wai, ngā kākahu rānei. I kī a ia i "tino whakararuraru" a ia i te tohutohu hou, arā, i kī a ia, "ahakoa i roto i te whare mahi" kāore pea e hiahiatia e ngā tākuta me ā rātou tīma te PPE tika. Kua pāngia koe e ngā take i whakaarahia i roto i tēnei pūrākau? Tiria ō wheako mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: Ka whakatūpato te umanga karihi i te whāinga āhuarangi o UK i te mōrearea
summary: Ka hapa te UK i tana whāinga o te waro kore kupenga i te tau 2050 ki te kore e kitea he huarahi hei pūtea i ngā teihana hiko karihi, kua kī te umanga karihi.
text: Nā Dominic O'ConnellToday Programme Business Correspondent I tukuna e te umanga he reta muna ki a Tumuaki Rishi Sunak, kua kitea e te BBC. I ākina te reta e te mataku ka whakamahia e te kāwanatanga te Pūtea o tērā wiki ki te waiho i tētahi mahere hei utu i ngā tipu hou mā te whakataka i ngā pire pūngao. Tērā pea ka tāpiritia e te kaupapa he £6 i te tau ki ngā pire pūngao. I whakatakotoria e te Pūtea Moni i tērā tau hei utu mo tētahi teihana hiko hou i Sizewell i Te Wānanga. Ko te katoa engari ko tētahi o ngā hiko karihi tīariari o UK, e whakarato ana i te 20% o te hiko o te whenua, ka haere i te mutunga o te tekau tau. Kotahi anake te mea hou, i Hinkley Point i Somerset, kei te hangaia. Kei te utua e te kamupene taputapu Wīwī EDF me tōna hoa i roto i te kaupapa, China General Nuclear Power Corp (CGN). E pūruatia ana te hanganga e te kī taurangi ka utua e te UK te £92.50 mō ia haora megawatt e whakaputaina ana, neke atu i te rua te utu mākete o nāianei. Na te utu nui i tino nui ai te whakahē, a, ka āki i te rapunga i tētahi tikanga hou mo te whakahaere i ngā tipu karihi. "Tērā tētahi hiahia kōhukihuki mō tētahi tikanga pūtea hōu, pakari hoki e whakaū ana i te maia o te kaiwhakangao, e whakaiti ana i te utu o te pūmatua, ā, ka whakarato uara tino nui ki te kaihoko," e kī ana te reta a te Pānga Mahi Karihi ki te tumuaki. "Ki te kore te anga kaupapahere tika me te tauira pūtea penapena i roto i te ture, kātahi ka kore e taea te whakakapi i tēnei kaha me te whakaū i ā mātou hiahia hiko ā muri ake." Ka tāpiri mai te pāhonotanga kāore e taea e te UK te whakawhirinaki ki te pūngao whakahou "whakawhirinaki ki te huarere" - hau me te hiko kōmaru - mō ōna hiahia hiko katoa ā muri ake. Kāore hoki i taea te tatari kia puta mai ngā hangarau "huarahi". "I taunakitia e te Komiti mo te pūrongo Net Zero a te Komiti o te Huringa Āhuarangi kia hangaia he whāranu pūngao ā muri ake ki te 38% hiko mārō, arā, ko te karihi anake te kōwhiringa whai hua," te kī a te reta. Ka kitea hoki he hē ki ngā whakaotinga a te Komihana Hanganga ā-Motu mō te hiko karihi, e kī ana kāore i te āta whakaaro ki ngā whakaritenga huringa āhuarangi a te kāwanatanga - te take kotahi i āraia ai e te Kōti Pīra te waka rererangi tuatoru i whakaritea i Heathrow. Kua kī te kōmihana ka hiahiatia e te UK tētahi atu tipu karihi hou te rahi o te mea e hangaia ana i Hinkley Point i mua i te tau 2025. "He tino hē tēnei whakatauranga - kāore i te iti rawa nā te mea kāore te aromatawai i te pūkete o te tukutahi kupenga kore kua whakaritea ināianei," te kī a te reta. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o te umanga karihi e kī ana te Pūtea Moni i te tirohanga hina o te kaupapa ki te pūtea i ngā tipu mā te whakataka i ngā pire kiritaki. Kua kī ōna tohunga kaute, nā te mea ka kite te mahere i te kāwanatanga e piki ana i te pire mō ngā utu nui, ka taea e te utu katoa te tatau hei wāhanga o te nama a te kāwanatanga. I te Tūtira, ka whakaaturia e te kāwanatanga te hiahia ki te rūrū i te kaupapahere pūngao mā te whakatuwhera i te tatau ki te hanganga o ngā pāmu hau hou ki uta. I rāhuitia rātau e Rawiri Karauna i te wā o te pirimia. Kua tonoa e te AO ki te Whare Taonga mō tētahi kōrero.

title: Kua whakakorea e te MP o Natalie McGarry te whakapae tāhae
summary: Kua whakakorea e te MP o Mua o Natalie McGarry tōna whakapae mo te tāhaetanga i muri i te whakatau a nga kaiwhakawā kua pāngia e ia te matenga o te tika.
text: I muri i te pānuitanga o te whakahaere, ka tangi a Ms McGarry, e 38, i te kōti pīra i Etinitini. Ināianei ka anga atu a ia ki te whakawā anō. I te wā o Pipiri, i hereheretia te MP o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti mo te 18 marama mo te tāhaetanga i te £25,000 mai i ngā rōpū rangatiratanga. I taua wā ka whakawāteatia a Ms McGarry i runga i te utu i muri i te tāpaetanga o tētahi pīra. I whakakorea e nga kaiwhakawā o Te Ariki Kānata, a Ariki Kete rāua ko Te Ariki Turnbull nga whakapae tāhaetanga a te tangata pāremata i muri i te whakarongo ki te Kōti Pīra Hara i Etinitini. I whakataua e nga kaiwhakawā ta rātau whakahaere i muri i te rongonga i ngā tāpaetanga, e kore e taea te pūrongo mō ngā take ā-ture, mai i te kaitaunaki wawao o Kōnata Jackson QC. Ka tīmata a Ms McGarry ki te tangi i te kōrero a Ariki Kānata, te kaiwhakawā matua rawa o Pākehā, ki a ia i te whakataunga a te kōti, ā, ka whakamōhio atu ki a ia me tū anō ia ki te whakawā. Kaore a ia i kōrero i a ia e wehe ana i te kōti. I pōtitia a Ms McGarry hei mema SNP i te tau 2015, engari kāore i rapu pōti anō i te tau 2017.

title: Koinei te mutunga o nga rangatira o te whare wānanga 'ngeru momona'?
summary: Kei te heke iho a Dame Prof Glynis Breakwell i tana tūranga hei tumuaki tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Bath - i muri i tētahi whakahau kaha, tae atu ki te tokomaha o ana kaimahi, e amuamu ana mō ngā taumata utu nui rawa.
text: Sean CoughlanEducation correspondent It might be a fall from grace, but it's also a rather graceful fall - staying on full pay during a sabbatical that will take her into 2019. E kī ana tōna rangatira harrier, te Minita Mātauranga o mua, a Ariki Adonis, he "mōrihariha" ngā tikanga o te wehenga, ā, he tohu o tētahi ahurea tino ātaahua i runga i ngā whare wānanga. Kei te huri a ia i ōna tirohanga ki ētahi atu umanga, e whakarārangi ana i a Exeter, Southampton me Birmingham i waenganui i ngā whare wānanga neke atu i te 50 e utu ana i o rātau rangatira neke atu i te £300,000 ia tau. Ko tana whakahau he iti rawa ngā ture - ā, me whai haepapa tika ngā whare wānanga ina puta mai te nuinga o a rātau pūtea i te pāhi moni tūmatanui, i ngā pēke rānei o ngā ākonga. He kaihautū, he kaiwhakarite rānei? Ko te Ariki Adonis e tino whakarerekē ana i tāna e kite nei he papā o te hiahia ki ngā tinana i runga i te mātauranga tiketike, e āhua whakawhitiwhiti ai ngā kaihautū, ngā kaipānui me ngā kaiwhakahaere. Kāore he kōrero a te rōpū māngai o te whare wānanga, o Ngā Whare Wānanga o UK, mō tēnei tautohetohe mō te utu a te tumuaki tumuaki o Bath, te pūrākau nui rawa o nāianei i roto i te mātauranga tiketike. E noho ana i runga i tōna poari ko Dame Glynis - ā, e kī ana ngā Whare Wānanga UK kāore he mahere kia hurihia tērā. Tērā tētahi tinana mana hou, te Office for Students, me tētahi rangatira nui, ko Nicola Dandridge, ko ia te rangatira nui o ngā Whare Wānanga o UK. Ko te nuinga o ngā whare wānanga he aroha - engari ehara i te mea e whakahaeretia ana e te Komihana Aroha, ko te kaiwhakahaere ko te Kaunihera Pūtea Mātauranga Tiketike mō Ingarangi (Hefce). Engari e kī ana a Hefce kāore tēnei whakaritenga e whakaae ana "ki te kōrero ki tētahi whare wānanga e hia te nui e taea ai e ia te utu i tana VC". A, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā pērā i a Ariki Adonis e aukatia ana te reo o te painga tūmatanui. Tērā pea he moni tūmatanui, engari he kōrerorero tūmataiti. Te āhua nei he tino pai te utu o ngā tāngata e whakaū ana i a rātou anō he painga rātou. Ko te mate tuakiri Ko te pakanga mo te utu e whakaatu ana hoki i tētahi raruraru tuakiri i roto i te mātauranga tiketike. He hinonga hīkaka rātau, e hiahia ana ki te utu i ngā rangatira moni nui? He rōpū ratonga tūmatanui rānei rātau, he nui ake te tweed i te kākahu? I te nuinga o te wā ko rātau ngā kaitukumahi paetata nui rawa i muri i te NHS, ā, kāore pea ō rātou taumata utu matua i te wāhi i roto i ngā kamupene tūmataiti e ōrite ana te rahi. Engari i taua wā, ehara ngā whare wānanga i te umanga, ā, kaore rātau e pakaru. E wāriu ana ngā whare wānanga ki te āhua o te āhua o te motu - engari hei umanga, me āia rānei e ngā uara ratonga tūmatanui, me noho rānei hei tauwhāinga mahi whaiaro mō te tiri mākete? E whakaaro ana tātau ki ngā tumuaki hei rangatira aroha e noho ana i te oranga tiketike? Kei te noho rānei ngā kaiārahi pakihi matua i tētahi āhua noho ā-whakahaere? E kī ana a Nick Hillman, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te Whare Wānanga Kaupapahere Mātauranga Tiketike, mō ngā ture o te whare wānanga "ka puta mai ngā tikanga mahi tawhito ki te āhua tawhito". "He whare wānanga tino nui ngā whare wānanga, ā, ko ētahi hurihanga neke atu i te £1bn i te tau. Ināianei ka whakaakona e rātau te hawhe o ngā rangatahi katoa, ā, kei te pupuri i ngā kī ki tō tātau rangatiratanga ā muri ake," tana kī. Engari, e kī ana a Tēnā Hillman, ko te tikanga o tēnei ko te whakapai ake i te whakahaere me te whai "rārangi pūataata ake o te haepapatanga". Kāore ngā Whare Wānanga UK e kōrero mō te tautohetohe i Bath, engari i runga i te take whānui ake o ngā taumata utu ka kī tētahi kōrero mō te rōpū: "E mārama ana kei te pātaitia te utu tiketike." Engari e tautohe ana te rōpū kaiārahi o te whare wānanga: "He mea nui hoki kia mārama ko ngā tumuaki tumuaki he kaiārahi o ngā rōpū nui o te ao whānui, he nui ngā hurihanga me ngā mano kaimahi e mahi ana i ngā tūranga maha." Te whakawhānui ake i ngā āputa utu Tērā anō ētahi atu take nunui kua whakarerekē i te taupatupatu. Kei te utu ngā ākonga i ngā utu akoranga. Ko a rātau moni e mahi ana ki roto i ngā whare aroha noa me ngā motokā atamai. Ko te pikinga hou o ngā utu, ki te £9,250, i nui ake ngā raruraru mō te uara mō te moni - ā, ka nui ake ngā pātai mō te whakapau moni a ngā whare wānanga. E kore ngā ākonga, e amuamu ana mō te iti o ngā haora whakaako, e kore e mīharo ki ngā pūrākau mō ngā kerēme utu a ngā tumuaki mō ngā ratonga horoi horoi. Tērā te riri i te pānuitanga a te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga mō tētahi "kaihautū" - ahakoa i kī te whare wānanga ka "whakamahia te atekōkiri e ngā manuhiri whānui me ngā kaimahi matua, tae atu ki te tumuaki tumuaki, he kaiwhakamahi iti noa iho tēnei ratonga". Ko tētahi atu take e mahi ana i ngā utu tiketike hei kaupapa tūkino, he tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata kua kite i te hinganga o ā rātou utu tūturu i ia tau. E kī ana te uniana o ngā kaiako UCU kua kitea e ngā tau o te whakawhāititanga me te tautāwhi utu te utu a ngā kaiako e taka ana i runga i te 16%. E tautohetohe ana tēnei e te rōpū kaitukumahi o te whare wānanga, te UCEA, e kī ana kua hinga noa iho te utu mātauranga i te 2% i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha. Ināianei, ko te wawaenga o ngā tumuaki mō te utu me ngā painga e tū ana i te £281,000. A, ko te moni a nga tumuaki tumuaki o te whare wānanga, ahakoa kāore i te wāhanga tūmataiti, te āhua nei e whakaata ana i ngā tauira whānui ake o te whakarākeitanga utu mō te tokomaha i raro me te whakaterenga utu mō ētahi tāngata torutoru i runga. Na te kī taurangi a te pirimia o tētahi arotakenga nui o te pūtea o te whare wānanga, ka noho tonu tēnei hei papa riri.

title: Ngā tākarotanga o Las Vegas: E kōrero ana ngā hōia o Ingarangi mo te 'ngangau'
summary: Tokotoru nga hōia o Ingarangi i whakamihitia e te pirimia mo te āwhina i ngā tūpāpaku o te whawhaitanga o Las Vegas, kua kōrero mō te "pandemonium" i anga atu ki a rātau.
text: I te tīmatanga o Stephen Paddock ki te tākaro mai i tētahi hōtēra pātata i te Rātapu. I āwhina rātau ki te tiaki i ngā tūpāpaku i muri i te matenga o ngā tāngata e 58 neke atu rānei, ā, tata ki te 500 i whara i roto i te iti iho i te 10 meneti. I kī a Trooper Finlay, mai i Cheshire, e "ngana ana ia ki te mahi i taku whakaaro tino pai". I te mahi whakangungu a ia i California hei wāhanga o te ope 1 o te Kuini Dragoon Guards i mua i tana wehenga atu ki a Troopers Woodward me May ki te whakanui i tōna huritau 25 i te taone. I roto rātau tokotoru i te Tropicana, he hōtēra e anga atu ana ki te Hōtēra o Mandalay Bay i reira a Paddock e tākaro ana, ā, i te tuatahi i whakaaro rātau kei te rongo rātau i te mumura, i mua i te mōhiotanga ki te oro he pū. Kātahi rātau ka oma ki te rohe i waenganui i ngā hōtēra e rua, tae atu ki te 500 ngā tāngata i whara, a, ka wehe ki te āwhina i ngā tūpāpaku. I kī a Trooper Woodward, mai i Rātata, i puta mai i a ia tētahi tangata i tōna 30 tau, i pūhia i tōna tuarā o raro, ā, e uaua ana ki te hā. "I mahia e au ngā mea katoa e taea ana e au hei āwhina i a ia... meneti i muri iho, kaore he urupare mai i te rangatira - i tirohia e au tōna manawa, a, ka mōhio kua pahemo a ia." I āwhina hoki a Trooper Woodward i ētahi atu tūpāpaku e toru, ka tāpiritia: "He ngangau noa iho me te pārekareka, he mauri i ngā wāhi katoa. " E ngana ana mātau ki te tiki i ngā tāngata i whakatotoka i te wehi me te ohorere - e tū ana i te tiriti - i te tiki i a rātau i te ara o te tākaro, nā reira he mea nui kia ngana ki te tiki i a rātou katoa ki tētahi tauwāhi haumaru." I kī a Trooper May, mai i Littlehampton: "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i ngā tāngata e mataku ana ki a rātou - e ngana ana ki te piki ki runga i ngā tāngata, e ngana ana ki te puta atu i te ara." I mahara a Hōia Finlay, mai i Ellesmere Port, i te kitenga i tētahi wahine i pūhia i te tuarā o raro. I kī a ia i whakamahia e ia he tauera me tētahi hāte hei pēhi i te motu, ka tāpiritia: "I a au e tiaki ana i tēnei taitama, kua haere mai tētahi atu wahine i pūhia ki te waewae, nā reira i ngana ahau ki te whakarewa i tōna waewae ki te whakamutu i te toto me te ngana ki te mahi tonu ki tērā wahine." I whiwhi whakamihi a rātau mahi mai i a Ēnā Me, nāna i mihi ki a rātau i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki mo a rātau mahi. Ka kī a Trooper Finlay: "I taua wā kāore au i te tino whakaaro, i te ngana noa ahau ki te mahi i tāku i whakaaro ai he tino pai, ā, ko tērā te āwhina i ngā tāngata kia haumaru, ki te tiaki rānei i ngā whara." I kī tōna pāpā o Kev i a ia e "wehi ana i roto, e wehi ana i te mea kino" i tana rongonga mo te tākaro nui rawa i roto i te hītori o Amerika o nāianei. "I te korenga i taea e au te whakapā atu ki a ia, i puta katoa taku māhunga. Ina kitea e au tana mahi, kāore e taea e au te whakaahua te āhua o te whakapehapeha me te nui o te whakamāmātanga," tana kī.

title: I hereheretia a Moameta Yamin mo te mema o Al-Mōrea i Hiria
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi tauira Peretania mō ngā mematanga o al-Mōrea - i muri i te whakamahinga a ngā pirihimana i te āhukahuka reo hei tohu i a ia he tangata hīpoki nāna i whaikōrero tinihanga i Hiria i runga i tētahi ataata YouTube i te tau 2013.
text: Nā Daniel De SimoneBBC News Moameta Yamin, e 26, mai i te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, kua roa te hokinga mai i te papā, a, ka tīmata anō i te oranga pūnoa. Engari, i muri i tana kitenga i a ia e mahi whakatūpato ana i Whitehall i June 2017, ka tūhonotia e nga kaiwhaiwhai. I te Old Bailey, i whiua a Yamin kia 10 tau me te ono marama i roto i te whare herehere. I hunaia tōna kanohi e tētahi hīpoki i roto i ngā whakaata o Hiria, i whakapūketetia tuatahitia mō tētahi pakipūmeka a Vice News, i tukuatu e rātou ki YouTube, ā, i muri iho ka tirohia e tata ki te kotahi miriona tāngata. Engari i te tūnga o ngā pirihimana me te pātai ki a ia i Whitehall e whā tau i muri iho, ka tāhoputia e rātau te tūtakinga ki ngā kāmera mau tinana, ā, ka takina tēnei mā te whakamahi i te hangarau āhukahuka kanohi me te reo hoki. I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Mark Dennis QC, nāna i herehere a Yamin, i whakaaturia e ngā whakarākeitanga o Hiria kua puritia e ia "ngā tirohanga pūhāhā, ā, i tino tautokona te whakamahinga o te tutu". I tāpiritia e ia kua whai a Yamin i tētahi "oranga ture" mai i tana hokinga ki UK, a, ka whakakāhore i te whakararuraru. I June 2017 - he wā o te haumarutanga nui ake i muri i ngā whakaekenga whakamataku maha - ka whakatūpatotia ngā pirihimana ki tētahi tangata e mahi whakatūpato ana i muri i te whakamaharatanga 'Women at War' i Whitehall. I whakapūketetia a Yamin, nāna i whakaahua te rohe i runga i tana waea pūkoro, e ngā kāmera mau tinana o ngā āpiha urupare, e kī ana ki a rātau tōna ingoa me tōna wāhitau, engari i te tuatahi ka hē ngā whakautu ki ētahi atu pātai ngāwari. I kī a ia i muri i te whakamaharatanga nā te mea i hiahia a ia ki te "noho i roto i te marumaru" me te pātai atu ki nga āpiha mo a rātau rākau. Nō muri noa iho ka taea e ngā kaitohutohu te hanga hononga i waenganui i te mahi me te ataata Takahanga, nāna i whakaatu tētahi Yamin hīpoki i te rohe o Hiria me tētahi rōpū tāngata i tautohe pono ki a al-Mōrea. I roto i te ataata kāore anō kia whakatikaina e kitea ana a ia e pupuri ana i tētahi raiwhara me te whaikōrero ki te kāmera e kōrero ana ki te "iwi o Ingarangi" e kōrero ana ia ki "Islam me te Caliphate" me te kī: "Ko tā mātou mahi hei al-Mōrea, e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakahoki mai i tēnā, ā, e mōhio ana ahau kāore he kōrero e tika ana ki te mahi i tēnei i runga i te rangimārie,  nā reira me whawhai tātau". I te tīmatanga o taua tau ka whakarērea e Yamin tētahi akoranga pūkaha i te Whare Wānanga o City, i Rānana, ki te haere ki Hiria. I uru poto atu a ia ki tētahi rōpū āwhina i mua i tana hokinga ki UK, ka putua ana pūkete pēke, te hoko taonga riri, me te hoki mai mā Tāke. Ko ngā karere WhatsApp mai i taua wā e whakaatu ana i a Yamin e kī ana ki ngā mema o te whānau e mahi ana ia i te mahi aroha, me tētahi karere e kī ana "Kua kite ahau i te mate i tōna kanohi, ā, kei muri ahau i a ia i konei i te whenua o Hiria". I Me 2014 i hopukina a Yamin i te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow, i te taenga mai i runga i tētahi rerenga mai i Atene, i runga i te whakapae e haere ana ki Hiria ki te tuku kākahu ki tētahi atu tangata e pā ana ki ngā mahi pūtohu - engari i muri iho ka tukua ia. Kātahi ia ka tīmata anō i ana akoranga, ka oti i a ia tētahi tohu mātauranga pūkaha tūmatanui, ā, kātahi anō ka rēhita ki tētahi akoranga paetahi. Engari, i muri i tana hopunga i tēnei tau, ka tautohe ia ki te mema o tētahi rōpū rāhui, me te whakarite i ngā mahi pūtōraru, me te utu whakamutunga e pā ana ki ngā hipanga i mahia e ia kia tae ki Hiria. I mahue te whakapae mo te pupuri raiwhara mo nga take pūtohu ki te takoto i runga i te kōnae. 'Tino pouri' I kī te ture kāore he whakaaturanga anō o ngā mahi a Yamin i waenganui i Whiringahora 2013 me tōna hokinga ki UK i Me 2014. I kī te rōia o te rōia o Hossein Zahir QC i roto i te whakamaurutanga he turi tana kiritaki i te taringa kotahi, he matapo i te whatu kotahi, ā, "i tino whakakāhore i tōna whakaaro o mua". I kī a ia he "tino pouri, he raruraru hoki a Yamin ki tana mahi". Ko tana kēhi e whakamiramira ana i te wero ki nga kaihoko i te whakamatau i nga tāngata i haere ki Hiria i uru ki nga mahi pūtohu. Mehemea ehara i te mea mo nga whakakitenga i runga i te Youtube, kāore e taea te utu i a Yamin. Kua kī te kāwanatanga, neke atu i te 900 ngā tāngata o te "āwangawanga haumarutanga ā-motu" i uru ki te papā i Hiria, ā, tata ki te 40% kua hoki ki te UK, neke atu i te 40 kua whakataua ki ngā hara hara.

title: E whakatūpato ana a Osborne i a Uēra mo te 'tumeke ohaoha' o te wehe atu i te EU
summary: Ki te wehe atu i te EU ka whai "tumeke ohaoha hōhonu" ki Weera, kua whakatūpato te Tumuaki o George Osborne.
text: I kī a Tēnā Osborne ka pau te tekau mano o ngā mahi, ka whakahekea te uara o ngā kāinga, ā, ka mōrearea te umanga tāpoi i Weera. I tētahi haerenga ki te raki o Weera, ka kī hoki te Tumuaki he kanapa te UK i roto i tētahi EU hou. I kī te kaiwhakahauhau waiho a Poihāne, he nui ake ngā moni i hoatu e Uēra ki te EU i tāna i whiwhi ai. Kua tautohe te rōpū Economists for Brexit, mā te wehe atu i te EU e whakarewa te whakahaerenga o UK. Engari i kī a Tēnā Osborne: "I a mātau e haere tonu ana ki te whakatipu i to tātau whakahaerenga, he nui te wā e heke mai ana a Uēra me ngā mahi e 24,100 e tūmanakohia ana kia waihangatia mēnā ka noho tonu tātau ki te EU." I tāruatia hoki e ia te tātaritanga e hua ana he pōti Waiho i te 23 o Pipiri ka piki ake te kore mahi i Uēra i te 24,000 i roto i te rua tau, i te wā e 3,000 te kore mahi a te taiohi. Ko te pānga o te tumeke i te putanga atu i te EU me te mākete kotahi o te hokohoko koreutu, tērā pea ka ōrite ki te whakaiti £2bn ki te rahi o te whakahaerenga o Welsh i te tau 2018, te kī a Tēnā Osborne. Ko te tikanga he £20,000 te iti iho o ngā utu whare i te tau 2018 i te mea ka pōti te UK ki te Noho, ki te whakaaro ka tipu kē ngā utu ki ngā tohu a te Office for Budget Responsibility, ka tāpiritia e ia. Heoi anō, kua kī kē te Hēkeretari Pakihi o Mua o Tā Vince Cable he pai te hinganga utu mō te utu me te toenga o te ohaoha. 'Whakawehi i ngā oranga' I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te Reo Irirangi o Te Reo Irirangi o Wales' Good Morning Wales, ka kī a Poihāne: "He tino pai te mahi a Ingarangi i te ao i ngā tau tata nei. Kua kite mātou i tā mātou tiritiri kaweake ki te EU e heke ana, ā, he mea whakamīharo ko ētahi atu whenua kua pai ake i a mātau ki te kaweake ki te mākete kotahi ahakoa tō mātou mematanga. "Ka whiwhi moni a Wales i te EU engari he moni UK tēnā. He nui ake te āwhina a Uēra ki te EU i tōna hokinga mai. Ka hoki mai mātou mō te haurua o ngā mea i hoatu e mātou ki tēnei mea, ā, ka haere hoki mō Weera." I kī te Tumuaki: "Mai i te tāpoi, ki te mahi me te ahuwhenua, ka whai hua a Wales i te hokohoko ki te EU, engari ka mōrearea ērā mea katoa ki te pōti mātou ki te haere. " E whakaae ana ia reo takitahi whai tikanga mēnā ka pōti te UK ki te wehe i te EU, tērā pea ka puta he tumeke ohaoha hōhonu e whakawehi ana i ngā mahi, ngā oranga me ngā paerewa ora i konei i Weera." Ko ngā whika o nāianei, e kī ana a ia, e whakaatu ana e 130,000 ngā tāngata e mahi ana i roto i te umanga tāpoi i Wales me ngā tūruhi EU i Wales i pau i te £206m i te 2014, neke atu i te haurua o ngā whakapau manuhiri o te ao whānui. I kawea ake e Uēra te wāriu o ngā taonga e £5.8bn ki te EU i te tau 2014, ko te 43% o te katoa o ngā kawenga taonga kaweake, i tāpiritia e Tēnā Osborne. A, i kī a ia i roto i ngā tau e rima kua whai hua a Uēra i ngā kaupapa pūtea penapena e 96 mai i te EU, e waihanga ana, e pare ana rānei i ngā mahi e 16,000, ā, e ōrite ana ki te tata ki te kotahi tuatoru o ngā kaupapa pūtea penapena kē katoa i Uēra i taua wā.

title: Te ora me te mate i runga i te A9
summary: Ko te A9 te huarahi e aroha ana ngā Pākehā ki te kino, e mau ana i tētahi rongo hei waharoa ki te tirohanga whakamīharo o ngā Highlands, hei huarahi kaipatu tino rongonui hoki o Pākehā.
text: Nā Steven BrocklehurstBBC Scotland news website Ko te huarahi roa rawa o Pākehā, e 273 maire (439km) ki raro i te tuaiwi o te whenua mai i te whanga o Scrabster i te raki ki te raki o Forth Valley i te tonga. Ko te A9 te āpiha tautiaki a Pc Fraser Cameron mō ngā tau e rima kua hipa, ā, e kī ana ia he "tino rawe" te whai tari me ēnei tirohanga whakamīharo. "He tokomaha ngā tāngata e haere ana i te huarahi i ia rā ka āraia ki ngā mea kei mua i a rātou," tana kī. "E hapa ana rātau i te tirohanga, e hiahia ana ki te haere mai i A ki B." E kī ana te atekōkiri taraka a Alex Stewart ki te hōtaka o TE Ora me te mate i runga i te A9: "Ina tūruhi i konei i te raumati ka mīharo rātau i ngā tirohanga. Me tino mātakitaki koe i a rātou." Ko ngā tūruhi tauhou ki ngā huarahi o Pākehā tētahi take i whakaarotia ai te A9 ko tētahi o ngā huarahi tino mōrearea o Pākehā. E honoa ana hoki tōna rongo ki tētahi tahora huarahi pōraru, ngā whārōrō roa o te huarahi kotahi me ngā kaihīkoi e mau ana i muri i ngā rōrahi tiketike o ngā waka taonga taumaha, e rāhuitia ana ki te 40mph, e ahu ana ki te pōrearea o te atekōkiri me ngā nekeneke mōrearea. Ka whakakāhore a Rorohiko Karauna i te tūtohu huarahi kaipatu, e kī ana: "E kore au e whakaakona pērā. Ko ngā tāngata e haere ana i reira ka puta ngā raruraru i tētahi ara, i tētahi atu rānei." E kī ana a ia he raruraru nui te manawanui o te atekōkiri, i te mea he tokomaha ngā tāngata e kōpeke ana i te motokā i mua, ka mau rānei i te wāhi kāore e tika ana, hei tiaki i ētahi hēkona ruarua. E whakaae ana a Alex Stewart, nāna i taraiwa te A9 mo te 39 tau, e kī ana: "I ōku titiro he nui tēnei i raro i te pōrearea, ā, i tērā wā ka tino hē mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata." Kei te haere ngā mahere ki te whakapai ake i tētahi wāhanga 80 maero (128 km) mai i Pehi ki Inverness ki te huarahi takirua katoa i te utu e £3bn. I kī te Minita Waka o Keith Brown ko te whakamohoa te kaupapa waka nui rawa i roto i te hītori o Pākehā, ā, kāore e oti tae noa ki te tau 2025. Heoi anō, ka takiruatia ētahi wāhanga i mua i taua wā, me te whārōrō o Kincraig-Dalraddy i te tau 2017 me te whārōrō o Luncarty- Birnam i te tau 2019. E kī ana a Tēnā Stewart: "Kei te wāhanga te A9 ināianei me noho hei huarahi takirua. " He tino arokē tēnei huarahi. Kua utua e mātau te raihana pūtea huarahi, e tino whai wāhi ana mātau ki tētahi huarahi haumaru, tika hoki. "Ehara i te mea e rua i tēnei wā. He pārekareka, he pārekareka. Kua oti." E kī ana a Jo Blewett, te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa o Transport Scotland mō te whakamohoa A9: "E mārama ana ahau ki te iwi whānui e hiahia ana kia tere ake te haere. " Tērā te hiahia nui kia hangaia tēnei huarahi ki tētahi paerewa hōu, haumaru hoki." Engari e kī ana a ia he uaua nui, ā, he kaupapa tino matatini. He maha nga tau e karanga ana ki ngā whakapai ake ki te A9, engari he rite tonu ngā huringa ki te huarahi i roto i ngā tekau tau, ā, ko te nuinga o te huarahi anake e hoki ana ki tētahi whakahoutanga nui i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau. Ko tētahi whakamohoatanga tino hiahiatia i tīmata tata ki te 40 tau ki muri, ko te whakawhiti i te Awa o Tay ki te raki o Dunkeld me te karo i ngā taone me ngā kāinga e 18. Ko te Arawhiti Kessock, e whakawhiti ana i te Beauly Firth mai i Inverness ki te Motu Pango, tētahi o ngā arawhata e 12 i hangaia i roto i te whakamohoatanga taketake. I tīmata te hanganga o te piriti i te tau 1976, ā, i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1982. I te taha o te Arawhiti o Cromarty i whakapototia te tawhiti ki te raki mā te 14 maero (22 km), ka tapahia a Beauly, Muir of Ord, Conon Bridge me Dingwall. I te taha o te piriti o Dornoch, i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1991, tata ki te 90 meneti i tapahia te wā haere A9 tawhito. E toru tekau tau ki muri, ā, kei te mahi anō te Arawhiti o Kessock, ā, kua tangohia katoatia, kua whakatakotoria anōtia te mata o te huarahi. Ko nga whakapainga ki te A9 i te mutunga o nga tau 1970 i whakatuwhera i nga Highlands mo nga turuhi mai i te UK me tua atu. Ko tētahi umanga kua whai hua mai i te pikinga o ngā waka tūruhi ko te Whare o Bruar, te kaihoko kākahu, kai me ngā taonga kāinga i whakatūria e Mark rāua ko Linda Birkbeck. E noho ana i tētahi pae 11 eka i waho tonu o te A9 e Kōkā Atholl i te taiwhenua o Perthshire, ā, i waenganui i ētahi atu āhuatanga ko te tari kākahu cashmere nui rawa atu i Ingarangi. E 1.2 miriona ngā manuhiri e tū ana i te Whare o Bruar i ia tau, he tokomaha e noho ana ki te kai i roto i ngā hōro kai whānui. E kī ana te kaiwhakahaere o Patrick Birkbeck: "Ki te kore te A9 kāore he kiritaki." Tekau mā rima maero (24 km) ki raro i te huarahi i Ballinluig ko te Motorgrill, i whakatūria e te rangatira o Clive Bridges neke atu i te 30 tau ki muri. E kī ana a ia kaore te tangata e haere ki tōna wāhi ki te whakaroa. "Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e haere mai ana, e tiki ana i ā rātou kai, e tiki ana i ā rātou hinu, haere ki te whare haumaru, ka haere," te kī a Clive. Ka haere te A9 i roto i ngā rau maero o ngā whenua rerekē, uaua hoki. Ko Drumochter Summit - 1,516ft (462m) i runga ake i te taumata moana - ko te pito teitei rawa i te A9 me tētahi o ngā huarahi teitei rawa o te whenua. Mō ngā pirihimana me ngā tīma parau hukarere, he pakanga auau kia tuwhera tonu te huarahi. E kī ana a Alex Stewart he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata e whakarite ana kia mau ki roto i tētahi "pouaka tīni" i -10C. E kī ana te atekōkiri parau hukarere a Billy: "Ka taea e koe te whakaū ka kite koe i te whā, e rima rānei ngā hapa tata i ia oma. Ka tata tonu rātau ki te tomo i te wā, ā, kāore anō. "But we'll never be able to educate them and tell them to wait until there is a space to overtake." He mōrearea anō tā te A9 e iti iho ana i te mārama i ngā waka taumaha, i te rangi kino rānei. I tērā tau, tata ki te 200 ngā tia i runga i te huarahi. E toru tau ki muri i te putanga mai o tētahi tia ki tōna ara i te wā e haere ana te āpiha i runga i tana motopaika. Mō te kaitiaki ngahere, he mahi huri noa i te tau te pupuri i ngā tau tia. E kī ana a ia: "He kararehe mārō nui rātau, ā, ki te tūtuki koe ki tētahi tia i runga i te huarahi ina mahi koe i te 60 mph, 70 mph rānei, he pai te wā ka tuhia tō motokā. "He pai te wā ka whara, ka kino ake rānei te tangata. He nui tonu te tūtukitanga e pā ana ki ngā tāngata e tūtuki ana i te tia, ki te huri rānei ki te karo i te tia me te tuki i ētahi atu motokā." Kua kite a Malcolm i te nui o te huarahi i roto i ngā tau, ā, kāore i te whakaaro he tino kino. E kī ana a ia: "Ka kite koe i ētahi taraiwa heahea, engari kāore au i te mōhio mēnā he kino kē atu i tētahi atu huarahi. " Kia pono he tino pai ki ahau te huarahi. He wāhi bonny kei runga." Ko te ora me te mate i runga i te A9 kei TE 21:00 i te Tāite 6 o Poutāpeta.

title: A417 dual carriageway bid backed by emergency services
summary: E tautoko ana ngā ratonga ohorere i tētahi whakahau mō tētahi huarahi takirua hei karo i tētahi wāhi pango aituā i te A417 tata ki Gloucester.
text: E hiahia ana te kaunihera o te rohe kia tāpiritia te whārōrō huarahi e toru maero (5km) tata ki Birdlip ki te rārangi o ngā manakē aronui huarahi a te Highways Agency. Tokotoru nga tāngata i mate i runga i te whārōrō huarahi i te rā kotahi o Whiringa ā Rangi. I kī te Ngātahitanga Haumaru Huarahi o Gloucestershire he "mārama" ngā painga haumaru o tētahi huarahi takirua. Ko ngā tūhononga huanui Ko te mahi ngātahi - i hangaia mai i ngā pirihimana, i ngā ratonga ahi me ngā ratonga waka tūroro - i kī he maha nga tau e taupatupatutia ana te haumarutanga i runga i te huarahi. Koia anake te wāhanga o te huarahi kotahi i runga i te ara e tūhono ana i te M4 me te M5. E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga o te kaunihera o te rohe e 39 ngā whara nui, e waru ngā mate i reira mai i te tau 1998. "Mā ngā whakapainga ki tēnei whārōrō e kawe mai ngā painga ohaoha nui me ngā painga pāpori i te mea he wāhanga o tētahi ara rautaki, ā, e whakamahia ana e ngā waka 1,500 i ia haora," te kī a Garry Handley, te kaiwhakahaere o te Ngātahitanga Haumaru Huarahi o Gloucestershire. I te Hānuere i kohia e te kaunihera o te rohe kia haumaru te pūtea mō te hipa neke atu i te 1,000 ngā waitohu i roto i te wiki kotahi.

title: Ka paraihe te puku i te 'waeine whakahē' i runga i te hōnore
summary: Kua paraihetia e te kaiwhaiwhai o Amerika a Donald Trump ngā whakahē mo te whiwhi tohu hōnore mai i tētahi whare wānanga.
text: Ko te Whare Wānanga o Robert Gordon (RGU) o Aberdeen e whakaatu ana i te whakawhiwhinga hōnore o te Tākuta Whakahaere Pakihi i te Paraire. Ko ngā kaupapa a Tēnā Puhi ki te hanga i te "papa korowha tino nui rawa o te ao" i Aberdeenshire kua kitea he whakawehe i te raki ki te rāwhiti. Kua whakaohotia e te waeine ngā whakahē, engari i kī a Tēnā Puhi i tōna taenga atu ki Aberdeen: "Kei te katoa ō rātou whakaaro." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He whare wānanga tino nui, he hōnore nui." I tēnei wā, ka kī te rōpū whakahau Tripping Up Trump ka hoatu e ia tētahi petihana kaha e 6,500 ki RGU i te ahiahi o te Wenerei e tono ana i te whare wānanga kia kounu i te whakawhiwhinga. I tērā wiki ka whakahokia e tētahi tumuaki o mua o RGU tētahi tohu hōnore hei whakahē i te whakawhiwhinga ōrite e hoatu ana ki a Tēnā Puhi. I kī a Dr David Kennedy, te tumuaki o RGU i waenganui i te 1987-97, i "whakawehi" a ia i ngā kaupapa hei whakahonore i te kaipāngai. I kī te whare wānanga i mōhio te hōnore ki tōna "mātauranga pakihi" me te whāinga a tana kamupene ki te raki ki te rāwhiti o Pākehā. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka tīmata te mahi i te papa korowha tautohetohe a Tēnā Puhi i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. E whakapono ana te piriona ko te utu katoa o te kaupapa e tata ana ki te £750m. Heoi anō, e whakahē ana ētahi tangata ki ngā kaupapa, ā, kāore e pai ana ki te hoko i o rātau whenua ki te piriona. He tokomaha nga hoariri o te whanaketanga kua hokona he tūnga i roto i tētahi whenua kotahi eka i te ngākau o te wāhi taunga i roto i tētahi tono kia whakararurarutia. As well as a championship golf course, the luxury development on the Menie Estate includes a 450-bedroom hotel, 950 holiday apartments and 500 residential homes.

title: Winterbourne Tirohia ngā tūroro i roto i ngā matohi haumaru tiaki hou
summary: He tokomaha nga tūroro i tūkinotia i tētahi hōhipera tūmataiti i katia i muri i te tūhuratanga o te Panorama o TE WĀ, he āwangawanga hou i whakaarahia ki to rātau haumarutanga.
text: Nā Alison HoltSocial Affairs Correspondent, BBC News I tērā wiki e ono ngā kaimahi o mua i hereheretia mō te tūkino me te aro atu ki ngā tūroro i Winterbourne View, Bristol. E whakaatu ana ngā whika NHS i ngā matohi tiaki kua tukuna mō te 19 neke atu rānei o ōna tūroro 51 o mua mai i te wā i nekehia ai rātou ki ētahi atu kāinga tiaki. I kī te kāwanatanga "kāore he takunga" mo to rātau tūkinotanga. O ngā tūroro kua tukuna ki ngā matohi tiaki, kotahi neke atu rānei kua tūkinotia, ā, kotahi te uiui hara e haere ana. Heoi anō, ehara i te mea ko te tikanga o ngā matohi katoa kua tūkinotia tētahi tangata. I kī atu ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki a Panorama e wehi ana rātau i ngā pakeke mōrearea e whakaputua ana i roto i tētahi pūnaha kāore i te tuku i te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e rātou. E wiriwiri ana, e rūrū ana mā te whakamahi i tētahi kaipānui huna i te kōanga o te tau 2011, ka whakaahuatia pukutia e Panorama ngā kaimahi tautoko e pakipaki ana i ngā tūroro, e pine ana i raro i ngā tūru, ā, ka hoatu ki a rātau he ua whiu mātao i Winterbourne View. I tērā wiki i te Kōti Karauna o Bristol, toko 11 ngā tāngata i whiua mo te tūkinotanga o ngā tūroro i te hōhipera. Tokoono i hereheretia, tae atu ki te kaiārahi o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, e 32, nāna i whakaae e iwa nga tatau o nga tūroro kino, a, e rua tau i hereheretia. I anga atu a Haimona Blake, 18 noa iho i taua wā, ki ētahi o ngā tūkinotanga tino whakararuraru i Winterbourne View, tae atu ki te mākū i te wai, a, ka mahue i te wiriwiri me te rūrū i runga i te whenua mātao i waho. I nekehia a Simone ki tētahi hōhipera NHS - Postern House i Wiltshire - i te whakaaturanga tonu o ngā whakaaro tūkino. E 40 meneti noa iho te taraiwa o Postern House mai i ngā mātua o Simone, e āhei ai rātau ki te toro i a ia i ngā wā maha i te wiki. In June of this year her parents received a letter from Ridgeway Partnership, the health trust that runs Postern House, telling them she was the subject of a safeguarding alert and that four members of staff had been suspended. I kī tōna whaea, a Lorna Blake: "Kāore i korerotia mai ki a mātau he aha ā rātou mahi hē... ahakoa ehara tēnei i te ōrite ki te Tirohanga o Winterbourne, kua hē tonu a ia - ahakoa he hē, he aha rānei, kei te hē tonu." E whakaae ana a Ridgeway Partnership, e whakahaere ana i te Whare o Postern, me kōrero anō te whānau mō te tūhuratanga. Wiltshire council says it has no reason to doubt that Postern House provides good care. E kī ana te Kaunihera o Wiltshire me te Mahi Ngātahi o Ridgeway kāore e taea te whakataurite i te mahi ki Winterbourne View. Ināianei kua nekehia a Simone ki tētahi atu hōhipera e 200 maero te mamao; ko tana tuawhā i roto i te rua tau. He roa rawa te haerenga e waru haora ki ōna mātua. "Kāore mātou e kite i a ia, ā, e toru ngā wā i te wiki... ehara i te mea tino pai ki te kore e kite i tō tamaiti," te kī a Whaea Blake. I kitea e te rangahau mō te uiuinga "Count me in" i te tau 2010, e taka ana i raro i te maru o te Komihana Kounga Tiaki, i Ingarangi me Weera, kotahi i roto i te 20 ngā tūroro hauā ako i te hōhipera i kī kua tūkinotia rātou i te 10 neke atu rānei i roto i ngā marama e toru kua hipa. 'Mahue whenua' I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te minita tiaki me te tautoko a Norman Lamb i te hōtaka Panorama "kei te miramira tonu i te tiaki tika me te kounga rawa". "Kaore he takunga mo tēnei," tana kī. Mr Lamb said a review set up by the Department of Health "has found clear evidence that there are far too many people in specialist inpatient learning disability services... ā, he tokomaha e noho ana i reira mō te roa rawa". Ka haere tonu a ia: "I te nuinga o te wā ka mutu te tangata ki ēnei pūkenga nā ngā mōrearea ka taea te ārai, ka taea rānei te whakahaere mēnā ka hoatu ki ngā tāngata te tautoko tika i ō rātou kāinga, i ngā tautuhinga hapori rānei." I tārarotia hoki e Tēnā Reme ka whakaputaina tētahi pūrongo whakamutunga mō Winterbourne View "taro ake nei", tae atu ki tētahi whakaaetanga e tautuhi ana i ngā kawenga a ngā kaitiaki me te kāwanatanga. I kī te rangatira nui o te aroha hauātanga ako a Mencap, a Mark Goldring, i ngā take pēnei i te miramira a Simone i tētahi pūnaha kua uru ki te whakaputu i ngā tūroro uaua me te whanonga uaua. "What allowed Winterbourne View and places like it to flourish was that those places were effectively being used... hei whenua mahue e nga tinana tūmatanui kāore anō kia whakaritea ki mua." Ko te tohutohu ā-motu mō ngā tāngata hauā ako e tono ana kia tiakina rātou i roto i ō rātou hapori, engari kua whakaarohia e te Tari Hauora (DoH) i Ingarangi e 1,500 ngā tāngata whai whanonga uaua kei ngā hōhipera i tēnei wā. I tirohia e Margaret Flynn he aha te hē i Winterbourne View i roto i te pūrongo tino whānui, te Arotakenga Kēhi Nui. I kī a ia me huri tērā: "Mēnā kāore he mea atu i puta mai i te heitara o te Hōhipera o Winterbourne View e tino tūmanako ana ahau he tirotiro i tētahi mahi e neke haere ana i te tangata me te mea he pawns rātau. Ka taea e tātau, ā, me mahi i tētahi mea pai ake." Panorama: The Hospital that Stopped Caring, BBC One, Monday 29 October at 20:30 GMT and then available in the UK on the BBC iPlayer.

title: Te ānini i huri i tōku oranga
summary: E whā tau ki muri ka oho ake a Rawiri Baldwin me te ānini whakaheke kua tino huri i tōna oranga.
text: Kua kore e taea e Rawiri, mai i Ross-shire, te noho ake, te haere rānei me te kore e pā ki te mamae nui, ā, me karo ia i te kata, i te tihe rānei nā te mea he mōrearea ki tōna hauora. Ko te tau 37 tau tētahi o ngā tāngata e 3,250 i te tau i te UK e whakawhanake ana i tētahi māturu wai cerebrospinal (CSF leak). Ka puta te āhuatanga ina turuturu te wai i te kiriuhi e karapoti ana i te taura tuaiwi, roro rānei, ka iti iho te tautoko o te roro. Tērā pea ka pā mai i te mate, i te pokanga rānei, pēnei i te whiwhi i te epidural i te wā e whānau ana, ā, ka whakararuraru pea ōna pānga. I kī a Hōri Kānata, i a ia e pā ana ki tētahi whara ki tōna tuaiwi i runga i te huinga o tana tākaro 2005, o Hiria, nā te māturu CSF i puta mai ai ia ki te whakaaro i a ia ki te whai i a ia. 'I waho i te kikorangi' Heoi anō, ahakoa tana pūrākau, kāore tonu te āhuatanga i mōhiotia e te nuinga o ngā kaimahi rongoā o mua. I kī atu a Rawiri ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi o Pākehā: "Ki a au i puta mai i te kikorangi. " I whakamahia e au te waka wai mā. I te kayaking ahau i tētahi ahiahi, ā, kāore au i te pai. "He poto tōku manawa, ā, he ngākau tōku manawa, ā, he iti noa iho taku ānini, engari kāore i taea e au te puru taku matimati ki runga. " I hoki ahau ki te kāinga, ka haere ki te moe, ā, kāore i tino whakaaro nui ki taua mea." I kī a Rawiri i te ata i muri mai he mamae kino tōna māhunga. "Ehara i tō momo ānini noa iho ka taea e koe te tango i te paracetamol me te wareware," tana kī. "He ānini tino rongonui, ā, ka kino tonu. " I a au e takatū ana ki te haere ki te mahi, kua piki haere tēnei ānini, ā, i te mutunga o te rā, kāore i taea e au te tū. "Kāore i taea e au te haere i waenganui i te rūma moe me te kaukau. I ngōki ahau, he tino taumaha." I te taha o ngā rā, ka tīmata a Rawiri, e 37 ōna tau, ki te whakawhanake i ētahi atu tohu. Ka tīmata tana kitenga ki te rehu, ka tīmata tōna rongo ki te haere, he tinnitus tonu tōna tinnitus, ā, i pāngia hoki tōna ārohitanga me tōna pūmahara. Ka kī a ia: "Ko tētahi o ngā āhuatanga tino rerekē e whiwhi ana te hunga whai māturu CSF ko tēnei whakaaro rerekē kei te kumea tō roro ki raro i tō tuaiwi. " He tohu tino uaua ki te whakapuaki ki tētahi tangata kāore anō kia rongo. "He momo pēhanga tōtika, me te mea he pereki kei runga i tō māhunga, e pana ana i tō roro ki raro." Mai i tērā wā, kāore i tutuki te whakamātau a ngā tākuta ki te rongoā i te māturu CSF a Rawiri, e whakaarotia ana kei tētahi wāhi i runga i tōna tuaiwi o runga. Kua rongoatia hoki ia i Los Angeles e Dr Wouter Schievink, te tākuta kotahi i pai ai te mahi i te āhua o George Clooney. 'Hoki mai me te rapu utu' Heoi anō, kāore anō a Rawiri kia tīmata anō i tōna oranga o mua, ā, e kī ana mai i te whakawhanaketanga o te māturu CSF, kua ngaro i a ia tana mahi, ā, i kitea ko te huarahi anake e whiwhi ai ia i te āwhina ko te takoto. "Ina takoto koe, kāore i a koe [ngā āhuatanga], kua tino heke rānei," tana kī. "Engari ina noho koe, ka tū rānei, ka hoki mai rātau me te rapu utu. " Ko tērā huānga tērā e pēnei ai te hauā, ā, kāore e taea e koe te noho pērā." I kī a Rawiri koia tērā tētahi o ngā huānga tino nanakia o te māturu CSF. Ka kī a ia: "Ka taea e koe te whakaaro ka taea e koe te whakatika ki te haere ki te mahi, ka taea e koe te ora i tō oranga. " Engari i a koe e noho ana, he rite ki te matawā hēki, he wā noa iho i mua i te hokinga mai o ēnei tohu whakamataku me te whakahau i a koe kia hoki anō ki te moe. "He tino uaua te noho tahi. He tino mono mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, ā, mō te nuinga he tino huri i te ora." I roto i ngā tau e rua me te hāwhe kua taha, kāore i neke atu i te 10, 15 rānei ngā wā i wehe atu ai a Rawiri i te kāinga, ā, ko te nuinga o ērā i runga i te kaumoana, i te waka tūroro rānei ki te haere ki te rongoā, ki te karapa rānei. I muri i te whakawhanaketanga tuatahi o tōna ānini huri ora, e toru marama kātahi anō ka kitea a Rawiri. Heoi anō, ko ia tētahi o ngā mea waimarie. I te toharite, ka anga atu ngā Pākehā whai māturu CSF ki te tatari 13 marama i mua i to rātau mōhiotanga he aha te hē ki a rātou. I kī a Hemi Walkden, he tākuta neurosurgeon e āwhina ana ināianei ki te tiaki i a Rawiri, he nui tonu te mahi hei whakaako i ngā kaimahi rongoā i runga i te māturu CSF. 'Atamira tōmua' Ka kī a ia: "Me kī atu ahau ko te whakaakoranga mō tēnei āhuatanga i te kura tākuta, ahakoa i te mātauranga paetahi, he kore. " He iti noa iho te wāhi tohunga o te neurosurgery, o te neurology rānei e mōhio ana ki tēnei āhuatanga, koia tērā te take he maha ngā toronga ki ngā tohunga rongoā, he maha ngā tātaritanga hē i mua i te taenga atu ki tētahi tangata e mārama ana ki tēnei āhuatanga. "Engari i taua wā kua huri ngā marama hei tau, ā, ka heke haere tō auau angitu o ngā tūhuratanga me te rongoā i te roanga o te wā. " So, it's not that we're stumped, it's unfortunately recognition of this condition at an early stage and getting the person to the right department with the right expertise." E wātea ana ētahi atu mōhiohio mō te here i te CSF Leak Association.

title: Epic 7,500-mile cuckoo migration wows scientists
summary: Kua tata te oti tētahi o ngā hekenga roa rawa i tuhia e tētahi manu whenua.
text: Nā Frank GardnerBBC News Mā te whakamahi i tētahi tūtohu aorangi, kua aroturukitia e ngā kaipūtaiao tētahi koekoeko kātahi anō ka rere neke atu i te 7,500 maire (12,000km) mai i Āwherika ki te tonga ki tōna whenua tāuri i Monokōria. Kua ora te manu i ngā whakawhitinga moana me ngā hau nui i muri i te whakawhiti i ngā whenua e 16. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao, "he haerenga nui". I te 20 o Poutāpeta, ka wehe atu te cuckoo noa (Cuculus canorus), i tapaina ko Onon i muri i tētahi awa o Monokōria, i tōna kāinga hōtoke i Zambia i te 20 o Poutāpeta. Ko Onon tētahi o ngā Cuckoos e rima i tohua ki Mongolia i tērā raumati e te Kaupapa Cuckoo o Mongolia - he mahi ngātahi i waenganui i ngā kaipūtaiao paetata me te British Trust for Ornithology (BTO) hei aroturuki i te hekenga tawhiti. Kua whakawhiti a Onon i ngā mano kiromita o te Moana Iniani me te kore tū, e rere ana i te tere toharite o te 60km/h me te whakawhiti i ngā whenua tawhiti rawa atu ki Kenya, Saudi Arabia me Bangladesh. Heoi anō, i roto i ngā manu e rima i tohua, ko Onon anake te mea i whakapūketetia hei whakaoti i tana haerenga whakamīharo whakamīharo. Ko tētahi atu cuckoo kua tohua, ko Bayan te ingoa, i noho i tētahi wāhanga o te hōtoke i te taha o Mt Kilimanjaro i Awherika ki te Rāwhiti, i tae atu ki Yunnan i Haina - engari e whakapono ana kua mate i te ngenge, i patua rānei mō te kai. I rere 10,000km i roto i te rua wiki noa iho, e āki ana i ngā kaipūtaiao kia whakapono kua tae mai i te hiakai, i te ngenge hoki, kāore pea i tino mataara kia noho i waho o te mōrearea. E kī ana a Dr Chris Hewson o BTO kua whakaaturia e te kaupapa tūtohu aorangi he nui ngā mea e pā ana ki te hekenga tawhiti. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te tango nui, ka taea e ngā manu te haere tawhiti, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka taea e rātou te kimi i ngā here tika mō te mōmona, ā, e mōhio ana hoki ki hea haere ai ki te tiki i ngā āhuatanga hau pai hei āwhina i a rātou, hei tauira, ki te whakawhiti i te Moana Iniani," tana kī. "Nā reira kāore ngā utu o te hekenga i te tino nui ki tā mātou i whakaaro ai i mua." Engari kei konei tonu ngā mōrearea mō ēnei manu heke, mai i ngā kaiwhaiwhai, tae atu ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai, ki te āwhā, ki te matekai. Heoi anō - e ai ki a Dr Hewson - i te wā e torutoru noa iho tātau e āhei ana ki te rere ki hea nā te coronavirus, tērā tētahi mea whakamarie mō tētahi manu e haere ana i ngā tawhiti tino nui, e whakaatu ana kei te mahi tonu te ao. He tokomaha i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i whai i nga haerenga a nga manu. Ka tūtohu tētahi kaiwhakamahi hei urupare ki te taenga haumaru o Onon ki Monokōria: "Aroha ki tēnei... Kei te mahi te tangata iti i ngā rere katoa kāore e taea e tātau! E mau mai ana i ngā wāhi ki a mātau. Ngā mihi mō te tiritiri!" Ko te korero kōrero Haumarutanga o TE AO ko Frank Gardner te Perehitini o te British Trust for Ornithology. Ka kitea ētahi atu taipitopito o te haerenga o te cuckoos i www.birdingbeijing.com

title: E kī ana te kōmihana i te tāke kaunihera i Pākehā 'me mutu'
summary: Ko te pūnaha tāke kaunihera o nāianei i Pākehā "me mutu", kua mutu te Komihana Whakahōu Tāke Paetata.
text: I titiro ki ngā whirinoa, ā, e toru ngā kōwhiringa, kotahi i runga anō i te āhuatanga, ko ētahi i runga i te whenua me te moni whiwhinga. I whakapono te tinana whakawhiti-rōpū me noho tonu tētahi pūnaha hōu hei "tāke ahuwhānui" ehara i te "pūnaha utu mō ngā ratonga tauwhāiti". Ko te tikanga ka kohia e ngā kaunihera o Pākehā te 15p o ia pauna i pau i te tāke kaunihera. Ko te tirohanga nui o te kōmihana, ko te tikanga kia whakawhānuitia te pūtake tāke a te kāwanatanga ā rohe, mēnā ka taea te whakamātautau, kia whakawhānuitia ki te whakauru i ngā moni whiwhinga kāore anō te pūrongo kia tūtohutia tētahi kōwhiringa, engari e tūmanako ana ki te whakamōhio atu ki ngā taupatupatu i mua i te pōtitanga o Holyrood o tērā tau. Ka āwhina te pūnaha o nāianei i te £2bn hei āwhina ki te utu i ngā whakapaunga a te kāwanatanga ā-rohe pēnei i te para me te tukurua, te mātauranga, te tiaki huarahi me ngā pūkenga whakangahau. I whakahuahuatia e te kōmihana e toru ngā whiringa ka taea te kawe mai i tētahi moni ōrite; I kī tana pūrongo: "Ko te tirohanga nui o te kōmihana, ko te tikanga kia whakawhānuitia te take tāke a te kāwanatanga ā rohe, mēnā ka taea te whakamātautau, kia whakawhānuitia ki te whakauru i te moni whiwhinga. " E mōhiotia whānuitia ana te moni whiwhinga hei whakataka tāke, ahakoa he nui ngā uauatanga whakahaere o te tāke moni tāupe paetata." 'Kia tika ake te tāke paetata' I whakatūria te rōpū whakahōu e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me te Hui o ngā Mana Paetata o Pirihitini i te Hui 2015, ā, i whakaritea ki te tirotiro i ngā whiringa e "tuku ana i tētahi pūnaha tāke paetata tika ake". I whakarārangitia he maha o ngā tūtohutanga, tae atu ki; I tāpiritia e te pūrongo: "E whakapono ana mātou ko te wā tēnei ki te whakahou i te tāke paetata. Kua nui ake tā mātou tātaritanga hōhonu o ngā momo tāke e wātea ana i mua atu ki te whakamōhio atu ki ngā taupatupatu me te hanganga o ngā tono taipitopito. "Kua whakamutua e mātou kāore he tāke tino pai, engari kua whakaaturia e mātou he huarahi hei hoahoa i tētahi pūnaha tāke pai ake. " Ināianei he āhuatanga tūturu ki te tīmata i tētahi hōtaka kia tika ake ai te tāke paetata - kia nui ake te māia, kia pūmau ake, kia pai ake, kia nui ake hoki te whakamana paetata." He pēhea te urupare a nga kaipōrangapū? Ko Mako Biagi, te Minita a te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini mō te Kāwanatanga Paetata - "Ka āta whakaarohia e mātou ngā kitenga o te pūrongo, ā, mā mātou e tautuhi ā mātou tono taipitopito mō te whakahōu i te mutunga o te wā paremata, e whakatinana ana i ngā tikanga o te pūrongo a te kōmihana." Ko Ake Baillie, te kaikawe kōrero ratonga tūmatanui o Te Hunga Mahi o Pirihitini - "He pūrongo whānui tēnei e titiro ana ki ngā kōwhiringa rerekē mō te pūtea kāwanatanga ā-rohe. Ko te wero mō ngā rōpū tōrangapū katoa ināianei ko te whakaaro i ēnei kōwhiringa me te haere mai ki mua me tā rātou rongoā hei hoatu ki te pōti a tērā tau." Willie Rennie, Scottish Liberal Democrat leader - "This report sets out plenty of alternatives for the reform of local government finance but after eight years, people might have expected more from a government that said it was committed to reforming the council tax system." Ruth Davidson, Scottish Conservative leader - "The Scottish Conservatives decided to set up an independent commission into fair and competitive taxation last year, headed by Sir Iain McMillan, to study these issues. Ina pūrongotia tērā, ka whakatakotoria e mātou ā mātou ake mahere mō te tāke paetata." Andy Wightman, kaitono MSP Kākāriki Pākehā me te mema kōmihana - "Ka āta whakaarohia e te Rōpū Kākāriki o Pirihitini ngā kitenga a te kōmihana, ā, ka kawea mai ngā tono whakamua i roto i tā mātou whakahau mō te pōti Holyrood 2016."

title: I whakaaweawe a Sutherland Clearances i te mahi hou a te kaitito
summary: Kua whakaawetia e ngā Clearances Highland o te tīmatanga o te rau tau 19 te mahi hou a tētahi kaitito Pākehā.
text: Ko Robert Aitken he puoro hou a Kildonan he puoro i tuhia e ia mo tetahi waea atamai me te paparorohiko hou. Museum Without Walls: Scotland's Clearances Trail App was created to mark the 200th anniversary of clearances in the Strath of Kildonan. Kua whakamihitia te whakaaturanga e Guy Perrotta, te kaiwhakanao me te kaiwhakahaere o tētahi pakipūmeka toa taurua. Kei runga i te taupānga ngā riu Pan's Calling me Red River Rant. I kī a Aitken, i whānau mai, i whakatupuria i Brora i Sutherland: "Ko taku whāinga ko te whakataka i te hunga whakarongo ki tētahi wā motuhake me te wheako i te pūrākau ora o tētahi āhuatanga. " E hiahia ana ahau kia rongo te pūoro, kaua e rangona noa iho. "Ki a Kildonan he mea nui hoki te tirotiro i ngā kaupapa nui o te ora, i taua wā, i tēnei wā - ki te tūhono i ngā wā o mua ki tō tātau wā i roto i ngā mea kāore au e kite nei he wā tōmua, engari ko te huringa neke tonu o te ora hei wā āwhiowhio." I hangaia e te whetū o Jaws Perrotta te Mystic Voices, he kiriata pakipūmeka mō te Pakanga Pequot o te tau 1630 i waenganui i ngā Māori o Amerika me ngā tangata whenua Ingarihi me ā rātou pirihitini. Ko te whetū kauae ko Roy Scheider tētahi o ngā kaipānui tokotoru o te pikitia. I kī a Perrotta: "He tino rerekē a Kildonan i ngā mea e kitea ana i ētahi mahi e pā ana ki te hītori o Pākehā, ā, i ētahi wā ka uru atu ki te āhua o te pūoro. " He manawa hau hou a Kildonan." Tīmata i te mutunga o te rau tau 18 me te rau tau 19, ka kite ngā Highland Clearances i ngā taone e nohoia ana e ngā whakatupuranga whānau i whakawāteatia hei whakawātea i te pāmu hipi nui me te whakatipu tia. E rapu ana ngā kaipupuri whenua ki te "whakapai ake" i ō rātou pānga e hāngai ana ki te hurihanga mahi. Ko to rātau tūmanako kia nui ake te pūtea mai i te whenua mā te whakahaere i ngā pānga tākaro, mā te tīmata rānei i te pāmu kararehe tauine ahumahi. I ētahi wā, ko ngā tāngata i noho i runga i te whenua mō ngā whakatipuranga i mahue noa iho, ā, ko ētahi i panaia ā-taikaha, ā, ka tahuna, ka tukitukia o rātau kāinga. I te tau 1813, tata ki te 100 ngā tāngata i wehe atu i te Strath of Kildonan. He maha ngā whānau i rere ki Hudson Bay, i te raki rāwhiti o Kānata, i reira i whakahaua ai rātou ki te hanga i ō rātou ake whare hei tiaki i a rātou i ngā āhuatanga hōtoke taumaha. I te kōanga e whai ake nei, ka haere waewae rātau ki te Kāinga o te Awa Whero huri noa i te roto o Winnipeg i Kānata i reira i kī taurangi ai te rangatira o Pākehā, te Earl of Selkirk, ki a rātou. He tokomaha i mahi i te 100 maero (161km) i roto i ngā hū hukarere ā-ringa.

title: Rūpahu kōhuru Leigh-on-Sea: Tokowhā i hopukina i muri i te matenga o Luke Bellfield
summary: Kua hopukina tētahi taitamariki i runga i te whakapae i te kōhuru i muri i te matenga o tētahi 18 tau i te whakaekenga tata ki tētahi pāpara.
text: I okaina a Luke Bellfield e tata ana ki Te Peterboat, i te Tiriti Tiketike i Leigh-on-Sea, tata ki te 18:00 GMT i te Paraire, a, ka mate i muri tata mai i te hōhipera. I kī nga Pirihimana o Essex he taitama 17 tau te taitamariki i hopukina. Tokowhā nga tāngata kua hopukina ināianei e pā ana ki te uiui, a, ka noho tonu rātau ki te tiakitanga pirihimana. I hopukina tētahi wahine 20 tau mai i Westcliff me tētahi tangata 20 tau mai i Southend i runga i te whakapae ki te āwhina i te hunga hara. I hopukina tētahi taitama 17 tau mai i Keni i runga i te whakapae ki te āwhina i te hunga hara me te tāhaetanga o tētahi waka motokā. Kua kore ngā āpiha e kimi i tētahi taitamariki e ngana ana rātau ki te kimi e pā ana ki te tūhuratanga, ka kī pirihimana. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: E kī ana a Ed Miliband ki a Labour: Ko mātau te hunga tūmanako ināianei
summary: I kī a Ed Miliband ka whakahokia e tana "whakatupuranga hou" a Labour ki te mana, i tana whaikōrero nui tuatahi hei kaiārahi rōpū.
text: Nā Emma GriffithsPolitical reporter, BBC News, i Manatāne, i whakamihi a ia ki ngā whakatutukitanga a te rōpū, engari i kī rātau me anga atu rātau ki "ngā pono mamae" - pēnei i te pakanga o Iraki e "hē". I roto i tētahi whaikōrero haora te roa, ka oati a ia hei kaiārahi ātete "haepapa", ā, kaua e whakahē i ia tapahi whakapau moni kua marohitia. Engari i kī a ia i tukuna e Rawiri Karauna he tirohanga "pouri" ki ngā mea e taea ana, ā, i kī ko Labour te "hunga tūmanako" e huri ana i Ingarangi. I mihia a Ed Miliband e te pakipaki ngākau nui mai i ngā kaitautapa i roto i te hōro pōkai i te wāhi o Manatū Central i a ia e tae ana me tana hoa hapū, o Justine. I te tīmatanga o tana whaikōrero, ka pā ki a ia tētahi reo tino whaiaro i te tīmatanga o tana whaikōrero, e kōrero ana mō tōna whakatipuranga me te wheako o ōna mātua hei hunga whakaruru e rere ana i ngā Nazi i hanga ai ōna uara me te takoha ki tōna tuakana "whakaharahara" a Rawiri. Ka umere nga kaiwhaiwhai i a ia e kī ana kua puta mai a Labour i te "wairangi" mō ngā wehenga tūmatanui, ā, ka kī e kore ia e tuku i te Tories, i te Lib Dems rānei "kia whai rangatiratanga i te tikanga o Ingarangi o te wāteatanga". A, ka whakamihi rātau ki tana kōrero kia "i runga anō i ngā uara, ehara i te toa anake". Heoi anō, te āhua nei ko ana kōrero mo Iraki e riri ana i tōna tuakana ko Rawiri, nāna i patu whāiti mo te kaiārahi o te rōpū. He MP anake a Tēnā Miliband mai i te tau 2005, ā, ehara i te wāhanga o te kāwanatanga i te wā o te whakaekenga o Iraki - he whakataunga i kitea he whakawehe mō te Rōpū Mahi. "E whakapono ana ahau i hē mātau. He hē te mau i a Ingarangi ki te whawhai, ā, me pono tātau mo tēnā," tana kī. Engari i whakaahuatia a Rawiri Miliband e pātai ana ki te kaiārahi tuarua o Labour, a Harriet Harman: "I pōti koe, he aha koe i pakipaki ai?" I kī te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Nick Robinson, nāna i whakapuaki te tuakana o Miliband, kua hoki mai ki Rāwāhi, i te Wenerei kei te heke iho a ia i ngā tōrangapū o mua. I te pō o te Tūrei, ka whakaūngia e te kaiawhina a Rawiri Miliband ka whakapuaki kōrero te hēkeretari ā-rohe o mua i te ahiahi o te Wenerei. 'Kaua e whakaae' I pōti katoa a ia, a Alistair Darling rāua ko Andy Burnham mo te pakanga i te tau 2003. I kī atu a Jack Straw, he hēkeretari ā-rohe i te wā o te whakaekenga, ehara te kaiārahi hou i te MP i taua wā, nā reira "he nui ake te wāteatanga ki te kī kāore mātou i tika, engari kāore au i te whakaae ki tōna tirohanga". I roto i te whaikōrero whānui, ka oati a Ed Miliband ki te pōti "āe" i roto i tētahi taupānga mō te huri i te pūnaha pōti ki AV, i kī ai a Labour me mōhio ki ngā māharahara mō ngā mahi me ngā utu i hua mai i te nekeneke. I kī a ia i tautokona e ia te whakaiti i te tāpaetanga, engari ko te tupu te manakē. Ko te hēkeretari pūngao o mua, e 40, i tapaina ko te kaiārahi Mahi i te Hātarei i toa i te pōti a ngā MP, ngā mema o te rōpū me ngā kaiwawao mahi mā te 1% noa iho. Mai i taua wā ka āraia e ia te whakahē e nama ana ia ki tana ārahitanga ki ngā uniana nā te mea he nui ake te ōrautanga pōti o tōna tuakana ko Rawiri mai i ngā MP me ngā mema o te rōpū. I whiwhi a ia i tētahi oati tū i te wā e pā ana ki te tapanga i hoatu e ētahi nūpepa ki a ia, ka kī a ia "Red Ed? Haere mai ki waho," ka tohe i tētahi "taupatupatu pakeke" mo te tōrangapū. A, ka whakatūpato a ia, i a ia e kī ana he mea hira ngā whakakotahitanga mahi, "kāore ōna taraka me te kupu whakapuaki mō ngā ngaru o ngā tuki tūkino" ā, me tūpato a Labour kia kaua e whakararuraru i te iwi whānui. I kī a ia me anga te rōpū ki ngā take mō tōna hinganga pōti nui, ā, ka haere ki "tā mātou ake haerenga", te whakaatu i te ngākau māhaki me te ako i ētahi "pono mamae" mō te wāhi i hē ai rātau. "E anga ana tēnei whenua ki ētahi kōwhiringa uaua, ā, ko tātau hoki. Me huri hoki tātau," tana kī. "I tēnei wiki ka eke mātau ki te hoki ki te mana." 'Boom and bust' Ed Miliband i whakamihi i ngā mahi a Labour i te tari, e kī ana ko Ingarangi he "ataahua ake, kaha ake i te 13 tau ki mua" engari i kī me pātai te rōpū me pēhea i ngaro ai e rima miriona ngā pōti i waenganui i te 1997 me te 2010 me te "whakaheke i ngā whakaaro tawhito". I kī a ia i mārama a ia ki te riri o ngā kaipōti kāore a Labour i tū atu ki ngā tono a te Taone mō te whakawāteatanga, ā, i te mea ka kitea he whakawehe i a ia i tōna rangatira tawhito o Kōnata Paraone, "i tētahi kāwanatanga Mahi i kī ka taea te whakamutu i te pūkenga me te pakaru". Ahakoa e toru tau noa iho tōna tamariki ake i te Pirimia o Rawiri Karauna me te Tuarua Pirimia o Nick Clegg, i kī a ia i roto i ngā tikanga me ngā uara i ahu mai a ia i tētahi whakatupuranga hou. Ināianei ka whakahaere taua whakatupuranga i a Labour me "ngā āhuatanga rerekē, ngā whakaaro rerekē, ngā huarahi rerekē o te mahi tōrangapū". I whakaekea e ia te pirimia mo te tuku i tētahi "tirohanga pouri, kino ki ngā mea e taea ana e tātau" e kī ana ki ngā mema Mahi: "Ko mātau te hunga tūmanako, ā, mā mātou tahi e huri a Ingarangi." I pōhiritia te whaikōrero e te kaiārahi uniana o Derek Simpson hei "tika ki te pirimia panuku". Ka kī a ia: "I whakaaturia e Ed ka taea e ia te whakawātea i te kino o ngā wā o mua o Labour, ā, i tēnei wā he whiringa tūturu ki ngā tapahi a te tauwhāinga." Engari i pātai a Gtau Leach, te rangatira o te ohanga o te Whare Wānanga o ngā Kaiwhakahaere, ki te tūnga o Tēnā Miliband mō ngā ture mahi hou mō ngā kaimahi kōwhiringa me ngā utu mōkito. "Ka whara ngā mehua e rua i ngā umanga iti me ngā umanga nunui, kaua e tautokona. He rā tōmua, engari ka kitea e mātau he mānuku atu i ngā mahi a New Labour ki te kōrero i tētahi rārangi take hinonga," tana kī. I muri noa iho i te whaikōrero, ka kī a Rawiri Miliband i whakaaro ia he "tino kaha": "Ko te whaikōrero tērā a tētahi pāremata pono, he whaikōrero ā-hinengaro hoki. I puta mai ōna painga whaiaro." Ka pōtitia te kāpata kōruru o Labour e ōna MP - ā, i te katinga o ngā tautapa i te 1700 BST i te Wenerei, nā reira me tāuru e Rawiri Miliband tōna ingoa ki roto i te pōti i taua wā mēnā ka noho ia ki te tēpu o mua o Labour.

title: Coronavirus: Ko ngā taumata waka 'ināianei e rua te raka iti'
summary: Ināianei kei te taumata ōrite ngā waka i runga i ngā huarahi o Ingarangi ki tērā i kitea i ngā tau tōmuri o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau e waru tekau mā rua, e kī ana te AA.
text: Nā Justin ParkinsonBBC News I hinga ki waenganui i te 35% me te 40% o te rōrahi tōmua o te coronavirus i te tīmatanga o te raka, engari mai i tērā wā ka rua ki te 75%. I kī atu te upoko o te kaupapahere huarahi AA a Jack Cousens ki te AO ka hoki ngā waka ki te pūnoa "i te mutunga o Hōngongoi". Engari i kī ngā Hoa o te Ao kia kaua e whakaaetia te pokenga kia "ngokingoki" ki te taumata tōmua o te taiepa. Kua āta piki haere ngā waka mai i te tīmatanga o Āperira, i te mea kua whakangāwari ngā rāhuitanga haere, ā, e hia rau mano tāngata kua hoki mai ki te mahi. Kei te whakapōturi te kāwanatanga i ngā tāngata kia kaua e whakamahi i ngā waka tūmatanui mēnā ka taea te karo, ā, kua kī atu ki ngā pāhihi kia mau hīpoki, hei whakawhāiti i te horahanga o te coronavirus. I kī a Tēnā Cousens: "Ko te karere kia karo i ngā waka tūmatanui e tino resonating ana, i ia wiki, he tokomaha atu ngā tāngata kua haere ki waho i roto i o rātau motokā." I tāpiritia e ia "nā te ngaronga o te pō" he "iti rawa ngā waka" i muri i te 19:00, i te wā i mārire ake ngā mutunga wiki i te whakakorenga o ngā takahanga maha. "I te whakatuwheratanga anō o ngā toa, i te wā e takatū ana ngā makawe me ētahi atu mahi tata ki te hoki mai i te tōmua o Hōngongoi, ka tae pea ngā waka ki ngā taumata o mua i te mutunga o Hōngongoi," te kī a Mr Cousens. I hinga te kohu waro UK i te 31% i Aperira, engari kua nui ake mai i taua wā. I kī a Maika Childs, te upoko o te pūtaiao i Ngā Hoa o te Ao: "Ko te whakapeka o te kohu i te wā o te raka whakaū, ka kore noa iho mēnā ka piki ake ngā taumata. " Mā te kī me haere te tangata ki muri i te wīra ināianei, kei te āwhina te kāwanatanga ki te nui ake o te pokenga i te whakamahinga huarahi." Kua oati te kāwanatanga o UK i te £250m mō ngā whakapainga i roto i ngā hanganga paihikara me te hīkoi, ā, he maha ngā taone me ngā tāone e whakawātea ana i ētahi atu wāhi huarahi mō ngā kaiwaewae me ērā i runga paihikara.

title: Ko te kāinga whakamutunga o Shakespeare i Stratford-upon-Avon hei whakahou
summary: Me whakahou te wāhi o te kāinga whakamutunga o Shakespeare i Stratford-upon-Avon i te wā mo tōna huritau 400.
text: The Shakespeare Birthplace Trust have been asking members of the public on its plans for New Place, the site of the home where the bard died in 1616. Ka mahia hoki ngā mahi atawhai ki te Whare o Nash - i te taha o te Wāhi Hōu - ā, ka whakaoratia ngā māra pātata, e kī ana te whakawhirinaki. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mai i te whakawhirinaki e whakaarohia ana he utu e £3.5m ngā mahere. I kī te whakawhirinaki i noho a Shakespeare i New Place i a ia kāore i Rānana, ā, i reira ia i noho ai i ngā tau e 18 whakamutunga o tōna oranga. I whakawāteatia i te rau tau 18. Ko ngā whakaaro mō te whakahoutanga o te Wāhi Hōu ko te waihanga i tētahi whakahuahua o te hanganga o te whare i runga i ōna tūāpapa "hei waihanga i te āhua me te tauine o taua whare," te kī a te whakawhirinaki. Ka whakapai ake te urunga hauā me ngā whare kaukau i te Whare o Nash, e tomo ai ngā manuhiri ki te wāhi o New Place, ā, ka tapaina ki te tāne tuatahi o te mokopuna a Shakespeare. Temporary site closure Once plans are finalised, the trust plans to apply for funding later this year with a view to work starting in the autumn of 2014. Ka katia te pae tae noa ki te 23 o Āperira 2016 - te rā o te rā whānau o Shakespeare - kia taea ai te mahi. I kī a Mark Armstrong mai i te whakawhirinaki: "Ko tā mātou whāinga ko te waihanga i tētahi wāhi tino pai hei taonga tuku iho hei whakamaumahara i te huritau 400 o te matenga o Shakespeare. " We want to involve all parts of the Stratford community - and everyone with an interest in this important site at the heart of our town - in helping us shape the future of New Place." Ka taea e ngā mema o te iwi whānui te hoatu i ō rātou whakaaro mō ngā mahere tuihono, ā-tangata hoki i te whakamutunga i te wātū whakaaro e toru i te Paraire.

title: Work to cap 12m wide sinkhole near Rhes-y-Cae school
summary: Kei te haere te mahi ki te whakatū i tētahi rua totohu whānui 12m (39ft), i whakatuwheratia i runga i te whenua i te taha o tētahi kura tuatahi i Flintshire.
text: I tīmata ngā tohunga maina ki te mahi tata ki Ysgol Rhes-y-Cae i Halkyn Mountain i muri i ngā marama o te aroturuki. I puta mai te rua i te marama o Mahuru, kotahi tau i muri i te whakatuwheratanga o tētahi rua 7m (23ft) whānui i taua pae kotahi. Kāore e whakatauria kia tangohia te taiapa huri noa i te rohe kia ono marama anō te aroturuki. I tērā wiki, ka whakatuwheratia he rua iti i runga i te papa pātata o Holywell Golf Club. "Waimarie, he āhua kore noa iho e puta mai te tōpū maina i runga i te tauine o te mea i Rhes-y-Cae, engari he iti ake ngā mahi e pā mai ana i ētahi wā," te kī a Edwin Christmas mai i Grosvenor Estate, ko ia te kaipupuri whenua o te rohe o te rua totohu. "He pono, i whakatuwheratia tētahi atu rua iti i tērā wiki i runga i te papa o Holywell Golf Club. ' Tohutohu tohunga' "E whakaatu ana ēnei momo mahi i te hiahia kia āta whakahaere mātou i te rohe hei whakaiti i ngā mōrea tūpono ki te haumarutanga me ngā painga o ngā kaiwhakamahi whenua."
