Mai i te mahi hou i Rhes-y-Cae, ka kī te kaipupuri whenua e mahi tahi ana me ngā kaitohutohu tohunga, ngā pirihimana me te hapori paetata, tae atu ki te kura me ngā tangata whenua, ki te whakarite i te haumarutanga tūmatanui. E kī ana ngā tangata whenua e mōhiotia ana kei roto i te rohe ngā poka kua kore e whakamahia, ā, kua hinga, kua whakatuwheratia ki Halkyn Common i mua. I kī a Tēnā Kirihimete: "Ahakoa ko te tohutohu a o mātau tohunga, kāore he mōrearea nui mō ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i te whenua i Halkyn Mountain, ko te haumarutanga o ngā tāngata me ngā manuhiri o te rohe he tino hira ki a mātau." I kī te pānga i mua, i muri i ngā tohutohu tohunga me te tirotiro whānui, i hipokina te rua tuatahi ki tētahi pū raima i hangaia i a Aotearoa 2010, i hangaia ki ngā paerewa mahi tino pai rawa atu i whakaaetia e te mana waro.

title: Ko te whaea o James Bulger ki te tuku i te tuakiri hou o Venables
summary: Kāore te whaea o Hemi Bulger i kōhurutia e hiahia kia tukua te tuakiri hou o tētahi o ana kaipatu nā te mea kāore a ia e hiahia ki te "toto i runga i ōku ringa".
text: I patua e Jon Venables rāua ko Robert Thompson, e 10 rāua, te pakeke e rua tau i muri i tana hopu i a ia i Bootle i te tau 1993. Kua noho ingoamuna te tokorua me ngā tuakiri hou mai i te wā i tukua ai i ngā rerenga ora. Kei te wero te pāpā me te matua kēkē o Hemi i te ingoamuna o Venables i a ia e rua anō ngā hara. Ko te wero ture hou, i mauria mai e Ralph rāua ko Jimmy Bulger i tētahi whakarongo i te Kōti Tiketike o Rāwāhi i te Tūtira, e pā ana ki tētahi raupapa i tukuna tuatahitia i te tau 2001. I kī a Ms Fergus, ehara nei i te wāhanga o te kēhi, kaore a ia e tautoko i te pakanga ture a tana tāne. "Kāore au e pīrangi kia mate tētahi atu ki te āhua o te matenga o Hemi...", e wehi ana pea "ka titiro te tangata ki a [Venables rāua ko Thompson]". I kī atu a Ms Fergus ki te HAU: "E waru tau i roto i te hunga hara taitamariki [whare wānanga] ehara i te rerenga. I te nuinga o te wā e pā ana ki a rāua tokorua, i whiwhi rāua i te tino pai o ngā mea katoa. "He pai ake to rātau oranga, i tōku whakaaro, i to rātau patunga i a Hemi. I whiwhi rātau i ngā mea katoa i tonoa e rātau: ngā rūma moe, ka taea e rātau te kōwhiri i ngā moenga, ngā ārai, ngā kāpeti, kāore pea i a rātau tēnā i te kāinga. "Engari tae noa mai ki tēnei rā, kua kī tonu ahau, kāore au e hiahia kia mate rātou, nā te mea kāore au e hiahia ki te toto i runga i ōku ringa. Kāore au e whakaae ki te patu i tētahi tangata. "Ko tāku i hiahia ai ko te tika mō Hemi me te whiwhi i taua tika, ko rāua tokorua e haere ana mai i te hunga hara taitamariki ki tētahi whare herehere tika, ā, ka noho wā tika ki reira." I kī te rōia-kaitaunaki o Kōpana Makin, e tohu ana i te pāpā me te matua kēkē o Hemi, i tukuna te whakahau taketake i runga i te take i whakaorangia ai a Venables, ā, kāore e hara anō. Engari i hereheretia a ia i muri i tana whakaaetanga ki te whai i ngā atahanga tūkino tamariki mo te tuarua o te wā o Hui tanguru. I whiua a ia kia rua tau i roto i te whare herehere i te tau 2010 i muri i tana tautohe he hara ki te tikiake me te tohatoha i ngā atahanga whakarihariha.

title: Wātaka 4G i whakaaetia e ngā tohutūmahi whatunga pūkoro UK
summary: Kua whakaae ngā tohutūmahi pūkoro o UK ki tētahi wātaka hōu mō te takahanga o ngā ratonga 4G.
text: I tētahi hui me te kaiwhakahaere whakawhitiwhiti kōrero o Ofcom me te kāwanatanga, ka whakaae ngā tohutūmahi tauwhāinga ki te whakatau i ō rātou rerekētanga me te tiki tere i ngā ratonga. I kī te kāwanatanga me whakarewa ngā ratonga raraunga tere rawa i te kōanga 2013, e ono marama i mua atu i te whakaritenga. Kua whakaae a O2 me Tiwhione kia kaua e whai i te mahi ture ki a EE. I pouri rāua i te whakaaetanga a EE ki te tāpiri i te 4G ki tōna whatunga tīariari ā muri ake i tēnei tau. Tērā pea ka whakapuaki te mahi tahi EE i te wā ka ora wawe ana ratonga. "Ko te tuku tere i te 4G he wāhanga matua o tā mātou rautaki whakatupu ohaoha," te kī a Te Hēkeretari Ahurea a Maria Miller. "E whakamanamana ana ahau ki ngā tohutūmahi pūkoro mō tā rātou mahi tahi ki te kawe mai i ngā ratonga 4G tino nui." Nā tētahi pahekotanga o ngā take, mai i te huringa o te kāwanatanga ki ngā tuma o te mahi ā-ture mai i ngā tohutūmahi, i pōturi te tukanga ki te whakawātea i ngā tūāwhiorangi e whakamahia ana e ngā pāohotanga pouaka whakaata tairitenga. Ahakoa kei te whakahōtakatia tonutia te hokonga o ngā ngaru rererangi i whakawāteatia e te whakawhiti mamati mō Hānuere a tērā tau, ka tere kē atu te ūkui mō te whakamahinga 4G i te mea i whakaarotia tuatahitia. I kī a Ofcom kua whiwhi i te putanga tōmua o ngā auautanga i whakamahia i mua mō te pāohotanga teretere mamati. I kī a Ed Richards, te rangatira nui o Ofcom: "Ko ngā mahi i mahia e mātau ki te umanga me te kāwanatanga e karo ana i te mōrea o te takaware nui, ā, he rongo tino nui mō ngā kiritaki tērā pea i tatari mō te whakatupuranga panuku o ngā ratonga aunui pūkoro." Tokotoru te kaiwhakahaere tuatahi ki te kōrero, i muri i te hui. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "E kite ana mātou i tēnei hei hipanga tōrunga mō ngā kiritaki UK mā te tango i te mana whakahaere i runga i te LTE e whai hua ana ki te kaiwhakahaere kotahi anake." Ko te LTE, ko te Kunenga Wā Roa rānei, te tāwara o te 4G ka horaina e ngā tohutūmahi UK. Ko te tikanga o ngā takawarenga ki te hokonga kua hinga te UK i muri i ētahi atu whenua. "I muri i te neke atu i te rima tau i te hanganga, kātahi anō ka whakaaetia te hōtaka hei whakawhiwhi tūāwhiorangi mō te 4G," te kī a Matthew Howett, tētahi kaitātari me te umanga rangahau Ovum. "I roto i ngā wiki, kua haere te UK i muri i ngā whenua pērā i Angola, Azerbaijan me Uzbekistan ki tētahi o ngā rautaki takahuri 4G tino nui kua kitea e mātau." Tērā pea ka tīmataria e EE te takahanga o ana ratonga 4G ā muri ake i tēnei marama. I pātai atu ki a Ofcom i Whiringa ā Whiringa o Whiringa i tērā tau mēnā ka taea te whakamahi i tōna tūāwhiotanga tīariari mō ngā ratonga 4G, ā, i tukuna te whakaaetanga i a Aotearoa. Ka whakahaere te ratonga i runga i tōna tūāwhiorangi 1800MHz, he tāhei kāore nā O2, Tiwhione rānei. Kua tautuhia hoki te toru ki te pupuri i ētahi o ngā tūāwhiorangi-4G tīariari o EE, engari kāore e pērā tae noa ki Mahuru 2013. Kua kī taurangi kē a EE ki te tuku ratonga 4G ki ngā tāone UK e 16 i mua i te mutunga o te tau, ā, ka whai kia whakarato i te 4G ki te 98% o te UK mā te 2014. I a mātou e kōrero ana i muri i te hui, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero EE: "E pōhiritia ana e mātou te hua o te hui o tēnei rā me te Hēkeretari Ahurea me te Ofcom, me te mihi ki a rātou mō tā rātou tautoko i te tango i ngā tuma o te rūnanga me te whakahaere i te whakaurunga tere o ngā whatunga pūkoro 4G whakatupuranga panuku mō Ingarangi. I te tuatahi ka wehi ngā tauwhāinga ka hoatu e tōna whakarewatanga tōmua he painga tika ki a EE. I pūhuitia te take i te whakaaturanga ka mahi anake te ringa waea whakahohe 4G tuatahi a Apple, te iPhone 5, i runga i te whatunga a EE. Ināianei kua whakatakatia e O2 rāua ko Tiwhione a rāua tuma o te mahi ā-ture hei ārai i te takahuri, ka tākaro tonu rāua i te hopu, e kī ana a Tēnā Howett. "I te mutunga ka whakawhirinaki te painga o EE ki tōna whakarewatanga 4G tōmua ki te pai o te urupare a ētahi atu tohutūmahi," tana kī. "He nui ngā mea i hangaia ki te iPhone 5 '4G tāuketanga' ka whiwhi a EE, engari kua arokē hoki ētahi atu pūpāpāho ki te whakamohoa i ā rātou hangarau 3G, ā, mō tētahi wā ka tata te whakataetae i te āheinga tere 4G o EE."

title: Te heitara mīti hoiho: Kaihokohoko Tatimana i te kōti
summary: Kua whakawāteatia e tētahi kaihokohoko mīti Hōnea mo te hoko i te 300 tāhei mīti hoiho hei mīti kau, i te wā o tētahi o ngā heitara kai nui rawa o Uropi.
text: E whakakāhore ana a Willy Selten i te raweke i ngā tukunga mīti kau mai i tana wheketere i te taone o Oss. I puta mai a Tēnā Selten i te kōti i te Tūtira i Den Bosch e whakapaea ana ki te whakahē i ngā tuhinga. Tata ki te 50,000 tāhei mīti i auporotia puta noa i Uropi i te wā o te whakamataku hoiho i te tau 2013. I whakaekea te umanga nui a Tāne Selten, a Willy Selten BV, e te mana haumaru kai o Hōnea, ā, i muri iho ka hopukina ia. E whakapae ana ngā rōia i ngā pūkete a te umanga i tukatukatia te mīti hoiho hei mīti kau. I whakaae a Tēnā Selten i tukatukatia te mīti hoiho i te tipu, ā, i kī pea i mahia ētahi hē nā te rawakore o ngā mana rokiroki. Engari i kī atu a ia ki te wāhi rongokōrero o Hōnea ANP kāore a ia i mōhio ki te hoko mīti hoiho hei mīti kau, a, i kī ia ka whakapono ia ka wetekina ia. I whakapuakina te kamupene i te wā o Aperira. I te Mane ka noho tētahi kaiwhakahaere rangatira parekura i Ingarangi te tangata tuatahi i whiua e pā ana ki te heitara mīti hoiho. I whainatia a Pita Boddy, e 65, e £8,000 (€10,800) i muri i tana whakaaetanga ki tētahi tatau o te kore e ū ki ngā ture aroturuki mīti EU.

title: He aha te take e whai hua ai te amuamu mā te Twitter
summary: Tērā tētahi wā ko te reta kupu kaha anake te tikanga kia rangona tō amuamu e tētahi kamupene, engari ko te tweeting ināianei te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te tiki i tō amuamu ki mua o te tūtira?
text: Nā Lucy WallisBBC News I te tūtohutanga a Angie Konrad kua whakawetohia te whakamahana i runga i tana tereina, kāore a ia i tūmanako kia pānuitia e ngā tohutūmahi o taua raina te karere me te whakatūpato i te atekōkiri kia whakakā i te whakamahana kia pai ai tana haere i runga i te whakamarie. E taea ana e Twitter ngā kamupene te whakauru ki tētahi pātahitanga mahana ake ki ā rātou kiritaki, engari ina hē ngā mea mō te kiritaki, koia hoki te huarahi pai rawa atu kia tere te whakatau i ngā amuamu, ā, i te wā tūturu e kī ana te comedian David Schneider, he tohunga Twitter hoki, ā, ka whakahaere i te tohutohu pāpāho pāpori That Lot. "Mēnā kei te 29 koe i roto i te rārangi i runga i tētahi waea waea, ko koe anake e mōhio ana ki tēnā. Ko koe me te tangata e pupuri ana i a koe. Engari ki te tweet koe, he tūmatanui, ā, ka taea te piki ake, ā, ki taku whakaaro kei te tino mōhio ngā kamupene ki tēnā," te kī a Tēnā Schneider. Ka taea e te miriona te arotake kino, te tākupu tōraro rānei, ā, he rite tonu te hiahia o ngā kamupene ki te whakakore i te riri kiritaki i tētahi wāhi tūmatanui pēnei i Twitter. Ki te mahia i runga i te mātauranga, ka taea hoki te mahi i runga i te manakohanga o te kamupene. "E mahara ana ahau i tētahi wā i puta ai te weto i runga i te O2 i runga i te whatunga, ā, he nui tonu te pēhi kino," te kī a Tēnā Schneider. "I tino whakatuki te iwi i te pūkete O2 me te O2 - i te auau. " I tūpono he tangata tino pūkenga, whakahāwea, ngahau i runga i tā rātou whāngai Twitter i taua wā, nāna i mahi i te tūkinotanga i runga i te huarahi tino whakangahau." E kī ana a Tēnā Schneider he ātaahua te kite i te ngaru whakahē e huri ana ki ngā kōrero pai mai i ngā kiritaki. Ina whakamahia tētahi amuamu ki tētahi pā whaiaro, ka taea hoki te haere huaketo i Twitter. Hei tauira, i kōwhiria e tētahi māngai ratonga kiritaki o Argos ki te whakautu ki te amuamu a te kiritaki a Immy "Badman" Bugti mā te whakamahi i te kāhua tiriti ōrite i whakamahia e ia i roto i tana tweet. He putanga poto o ngā karere i pānuitia: "@Argos_online: Yo, wen you getting' da ps4 tings in moss side? Kua kore e tatari anō." "@BadManBugti: Tangata Kino Haumaru. We getting' sum more PS4 tings in wivin da next week, y'get me." Neke atu i te 1,500 ngā wā i tīmataria anō te urupare a te kamupene mai i Argos i roto i ngā haora ruarua. E kī ana a Jo Causon, te rangatira nui o te Whare Wānanga o te Ratonga Kiritaki, kua nui ake te mōhio o ngā kiritaki, ā, e tūmanako ana kia pā ngā whakahaere ki a rātou hei tangata tūturu, ehara i te tauwhitinga noa iho. "One of the key things that we're seeing in the changing world we're all living in, that we want to have better dialogue, not just monologue, with our organisations," says Ms Causon. E ai ki tētahi poipoi e 2,000 ngā tāngata e te pokapū whakawhitiwhiti kōrero Fishburn Hedges me Echo Research i Aperira 2012, 36% o ngā tāngata i whakamahi i tētahi pūhara pāpāho pāpori hei whakapā atu ki tētahi kamupene nui, ā, 65% i kī he huarahi pai ake i ngā pūtahi waea kia whakapā atu ki ngā kamupene. Kāore i whakawhāititia ki te rangatahi anake, me te 27% o ngā tāngata neke atu i te 55 kua whakamahi i te pāpāho pāpori ki te amuamu. E tūmanako ana a Ms Causon kia nui ake te manakohanga o ngā amuamu mā Twitter i te tupunga o te pāpāho pāpori. "He tokomaha o tātau i tēnei wā kāore i te amuamu mā Twitter, engari i a tātau e haere ana, he mea waenga kōwhiringa, ā, me āhei ngā whakahaere ki te urupare tika," te kī a Ms Causon. E tata ana ki te 15,000 ngā amuamu i ia rā mō ngā ratonga pūtea i te tau 2013, e ai ki ngā raraunga amuamu mai i te Mana Whanonga Pūtea, i aroturukitia e Hannah Moore mai i te hōtaka Pouaka Moni o TE Reo Irirangi 4 ngā whāngai Twitter o ngā pēke matua e waru mō tētahi rā mahi, ā, kāore i kitea he raruraru i whakatauria i Twitter, engari i āwhina ki te pana i ngā tono ki mua o te tūtira. "I te amuamu a ngā kiritaki mō te tārewa i runga i ngā raina waea mokatere mārō, ka kī taurangi [ētahi] kaimahi kia waea kē atu ki a rātou, ā, mēnā kei te pōraru koe ko tēhea tari e hiahia ana koe ki te whakapā atu, he tino āwhina a Twitter," tana kī. "I homai e ngā pēke tino pai ngā tau waea, ngā puka me ngā hononga tukutuku tika i roto i ngā meneti - ka penapena anō i a koe i tētahi tau 0845." E ai ki a Ms Causon, he mea nui kia noho haepapa te kiritaki ki te kōwhiri i te hongere tika mō tā rātou amuamu. "Kāore tētahi raruraru pēke i roto i a ia anō e tuku ana i a ia ki tētahi wāhi tūmatanui pēnei i Twitter, nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau e pā ana ki te āhua o te raruraru me ngā mea e kimi ana koe kia whakataua." Mēnā kei te ngāwari kē atu te amuamu a Twitter, ka ngāwari ake hoki ki ngā kiritaki te hoatu urupare pai ki ngā kamupene, nā reira kāore he mōrearea ka huri tātau hei iwi aue. Whakarongo ki te pūrongo katoa mō te Pouaka Moni i te Reo Irirangi 4. Hopu rānei i te BBC iPlayer.

title: Egg boxes Spitfire unveiled at Duxford war museum
summary: Kua whakaaturia tētahi tauira Spitfire rahi ora i hangaia mai i ngā pouaka hēki e 6,500 i tētahi whare taonga o Cambridgeshire.
text: I tū te waka rererangi i te taha o ētahi atu rererangi tauhira i te Whare Taonga Pakanga Emepaea o Duxford i te Rātapu hei āwhina ki te kohi tautoko mō te aroha o ngā ope Āwhina mō ngā Toa. E ono wiki te roa o te takoha o te Pakanga o Ingarangi ki ngā kaihanga o Charlotte Austen rāua ko Jack Munro ki te whakamahi i ngā tēpara 10,000 me te 10 rīta peita. I kī te kaiwhakairo o Ms Austen, e 27, he wero "uaua" me te "hākinakina". I āwhina ngā mema o te iwi whānui ki te whakanoho i ngā pouaka hēki o Eggs for Soldiers ki te whakaoti i te whakairo. I kī a Ms Austen: "He tino haere te mahi i te Spitfire. He tino hākinakina ki a au te wero. Ko te Āwhina mō ngā Toa he aroha e tino whakapono ana ahau, ā, he tino hōnore." E rima rīta kāpia e hiahiatia ana e te tauira, e 5,000 nēra, e 100 mita tapawhā kānawehi me te whitu mita huka. I kī te kaihanga tahi me te kaihoahoa o Jack Munro, e 26: "He tino hākinakina te mahi i tētahi kaupapa ahurei. " Ko te wero nui rawa i te hanganga o te Eggs for Soldiers Spitfire ko te waihanga anō i te āhuahanga atahanga, engari matatini, i runga i te tika e taea ana. "He kōpiko rua ia mata o te Spitfire, ā, hei tārua i tēnei, kua whakamahia e mātou he pahekotanga o ngā pūkenga hanga rākau tūturu me ngā tukanga mamati arā atu anō pēnei i te tapahi taiaho."

title: Ka tīmata te mahi huarahi pahikara o Rāwāhi
summary: Kua tīmata te mahi i te ara ki te raki-tonga o tētahi ara pahikara £160m puta noa i Rānana.
text: I tīmataria e Te Koromatua o Poihāne te mahi i runga i te mea e kiia nei ko te "huarahi" i St George's Circus i Southwark, ki te tonga o Rāwāhi. Neke atu i te toru maero te mahi o te ara ki te raki-tonga, mai i King's Cross ki Elephant and Castle. Ka kitea e te ara ki te rāwhiti-hauauru ngā kaieke paihikara e wehea ana i ngā waka neke atu i te 18 maero, mai i Barking ki Acton. 'I whakahekea ngā mate' i kī a Ashok Sinha, te rangatira nui o te Whakahau Paihikara o Rāwāhi, he mea "tino pai" te kaupapa. Ka kī a ia: "Ka tino whakahekea e te pātaki mō ngā kaieke paihikara ngā whara nui me ngā mate i ngā taraka. Kei te pupuri pai a Boris [London Mayor] i tana kupu taurangi." Engari, i kī ngā hoariri ka nui rawa te mokowā huarahi o te kaupapa, ā, ka nui ake te paheketanga. London First, London Travelwatch, City of London, Canary Wharf and the London Taxi Drivers' Association have all voiced concerns. I kī te Taone o Rānōna ahakoa kāore i te ātete ki te tikanga o "ngā huarahi hurihuri" he māharahara mō te iti o te āheitanga mai i te katinga o ngā tūtakinga huarahi taha. He āwangawanga anō mō ētahi atu mōrearea mō ngā kaiwaewae, ā, ka mea: "Ko tā mātou āwangawanga tuatahi, pērā i ngā wā katoa, ko te haumarutanga o ngā kaiwhakamahi huarahi katoa." E tūmanakohia ana kia tuwhera ngā ara a tērā tau. I kī a Tēnā Hōnea: "He rā nui tēnei mō te paihikara me Rānana, te whakamutunga o ngā tau whakahauhau a ngā kaieke paihikara me ngā marama o te whakarite a TfL. "Mā te whiwhi i ētahi atu tāngata i runga i ā rātou paihikara ka whakaheke i te pēhanga i runga i te huarahi, i ngā whatunga pahi me te rēra, ka tapahia te pokenga me te whakapai ake i te ora mō te katoa, ahakoa paihikara rānei, kāore rānei." E tūmanako ana a TfL ka takitoru te maha o ngā kaieke paihikara nā ngā ara hou. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi o te mahi mā St George's Circus he panoni i te Huarahi Blackfriars "mai i tētahi tiriti e whakahaeretia ana e te motokā ki tētahi huarahi taone hou". Kei roto i te mahi ko te whakatō rākau hou, tata ki te 1,858 sq m (20,000 sq ft) o te mokowā hōu mō ngā kaiwaewae me tētahi ara pahikara motuhake e rua. Ka oti te mahi i te ara ki te tonga o te awa i te mutunga o te tau. Ki te raki o te awa, ka tīmata te mahi i te raumati, ā, ka oti te kōanga 2016.

title: Ko te MP o Ahitereiria ko Bob Katter 'ka pihi i ngā tauwhāinga kua mate' i roto i te pānui pōti
summary: Kua tiakina e te pāremata o Ahitereiria a Bob Katter tētahi ataata e whakaatu ana i a ia e patu ana i ōna tauwhāinga pōti.
text: He pāremata whenua motuhake a Tāne Katter mai i te raki o Queensland. I roto i te pānui, e kitea ana a ia e pupuhi ana i runga i te paowa mai i tētahi pū tākaro me ngā tinana o ngā "tāngata kanohi" tokorua mai i nga rōpū matua e takoto ana i roto i te oneone. I karangatia e te Pirimia o Ahitereiria, a Te Pirimia o Ahitereiria, a Tēnā Katter kia unuhia ngā pānuitanga, arā, "i roto i te tino kino o te ngao". Engari e 71 tau te pakeke o Tēnā Katter, e upoko ana i te Rōpū o Ahitereiria o Katter, ā, e tohu ana i te pōti o Kennedy, i kī a ia he "mātauranga" me te "rekareka o ngā pānuitanga". Ko te kōrero kōrero me te tūkinotanga Ko te pānui, i hangaia mā te āwhina o te paetukutuku whakarihariha o Betoota Advocate, ka tīmata ki ngā mema o te Rōpū Mahi me te tauwhāinga ā-Motu e hama ana i tētahi tohu ki te whenua e pānui ana "Ahitereiria hei hoko". Ka makaia e Tēnā Katter te tohu ki runga i te whenua, ā, ina whakakapia, ka whakamahia e ia tētahi tautohu pango nui hei huri i te tohu ki "Ahitereiria kaua e hoko", i mua i te tapahi ki te tirohanga me te pū. "Ki taku whakaaro ka ngahau te nuinga o te iwi ki te ngahau. I whakaaro ahau he tino rekareka, me whakaae ahau," tana kī atu ki te ABC. "Ko te mea ehara i te mea rekareka ko te hoko atu i tēnei whenua. E kino ana mātau ki a ia, ā, e ātete ana mātau ki taua mea." I karangatia e Queensland Senator Barry O'Sullivan te pānui "whakarihariha" me te Minita Pūtea o Mathias Cormann i kī he "whakararuraru". I runga i te papatono pouaka whakaata parakuihi o Sunrise, ka pēhi te kaiwhakaatu a Rawiri Koch i a Tēnā Katter he aha i tukua ai e ia te ataata i muri noa iho i te matenga o tētahi tangata pū e 49 ngā tāngata i te hōpua o Pulse i Otaota, i Pārera. I urupare a Tēnā Katter he pānuitanga ōrite kāore i puta he tautohetohe, ā, i kī hoki kāore i te mōhio ki te tākaro. Tātaritanga: Ko Haora Tērā, Kaiwhakatika o Ahitereiria, paetukutuku Rongokōrero o TE AO Mēnā ko tēnei te tino pai o Ahitereiria e tuku ana i te huarahi o te heitara tōrangapū, kātahi ka tino mātakitaki tātau i te whakahau pōti tino hōhā o te ao. Ko te pānui a Tēnā Katter he āhuatanga ngahau o Ahitereiria - he hē tōrangapū, he pārekareka, ā, kāore pea i te tino rekareka ki tāna e whakaaro ana. Engari he "whakarihariha", he "tino kino rānei"? Me tuku rānei i muri mai i ngā tākarotanga i Otaota? He tawhiti a Ahitereiria i Pārera, ā, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i ngā pūtahi ā-rohe e tiritiri ana i te āhua ngahau o Tēnā Katter. I ētahi wā he pārekareka, he kore reka rānei te ngahau. I ētahi wā kāore e pā ki te whatu pūru. Engari ki te kore nga wahanga o Katter e pīrangi ki tana hangarau, ka taea e rātau te maka i a ia i te pōti i te 2 o Hōngongoi. I kī te kaiwhakatika o te Kaitaunaki o Betoota, o Clancy Overell, nāna i tākaro tētahi o ngā tāngata pūhia i roto i te ataata, e mōhio ana ia tērā pea ka "hau ake te tangata" i te ataata, engari kāore i te tino mōhio he ōrite te mōhiotanga o Tēnā Katter. I tautāwhi a Tēnā Overell i te wā o te ataata, e kī ana ki te AO e pā ana ngā tākaro i roto i a Mātau i ia rā. "Kāore e taea te ārai i ngā Ahitereiria kia kaua e mahi kōrero kōrero me ngā kaupoai me ngā pū kāhua ki te uru," tana kī. He ataata mai i te pōti kāwanatanga o Queensland 2012 e whakaatu ana i te kanikani raina a Tēnā Katter me tētahi rōpū rangatahi. I whakaahuatia ia e taua ataata anō e takahuri ana i runga i tōna māhunga, ahakoa tērā pea i whakamahia he taurua tinana mo te mahi.

title: Ngā whakahēnga o te Rā o Parihi: I tirohia e nga pirihimana whakararuraru ngā ataata 'whakaeke'
summary: E uiui ana nga mana Wīwī i nga pirihimana whakararuraru mo nga mahi tukino e toru ki nga kaiwhakahaere o te Rā o Me i Parihi.
text: Kua huri haere ngā ataata i te wā o ngā matapaki i waenganui i ngā pirihimana me ngā kaiwhakahaere i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. Te āhua nei ko tētahi e whakaatu ana i tētahi āpiha e kōkuhu ana i tētahi rākau ki roto i te tarau o te kaiwhakahaere i te Boulevard du Montparnasse. I tētahi atu āpiha e kitea ana e pakipaki ana i tētahi kaiwhakahaere, a, ko te tuatoru e whakaatu ana i tētahi āpiha e maka ana i tētahi pōhatu papa. E uiui ana ngā kaitirotiro i ia mahi i runga i te tono a te rangatira pirihimana o Parihi, o Didier Lallement, e kī ana ngā pūrongo. I kī te minita o roto o Christophe Castaner "tērā te whiu" mēnā ka kitea he hē ētahi āpiha. Kua anga atu a ia ki ngā karanga kia whakarerea, i muri i te kīanga a ngā kaiwhakawāwā kua horahia e ia he "rongo kōrero" ki te whakapae i ngā kaiwhakahaere o tētahi "whakaeke" ki te hōhipera o La Pitié-Salpêtrière i Parihi. Ko ngā mea e whakaaturia ana e ngā ataata i whakaahuatia ngā ataata i te wā i anga atu ngā pirihimana whakararuraru ki ngā whakahēnga o te Rā o Me i te Wenerei e pā ana ki ngā kaiwhakahaere kōwhai me ngā toa "paraka pango" mauī me ngā hīkoi uniana tūturu. I whakairihia e te kairīpoata a David Dufresne, nāna i miramira ngā whakaaro o te tutu pirihimana mai i te tīmatanga o ngā whakahēnga a ngā pirihimana i tērā tau, i whakairihia ngā whakakitenga ki tana whāngai Twitter. I roto i tētahi ataata, i whakaahuatia i te Boulevard du Montparnasse, e karapoti ana tētahi kaiwhakahaere i runga i te whenua e ngā pirihimana whakararuraru CRS, ā, te āhua nei ka kōkuhu tētahi i tana truncheon ki muri o tōna tarau. I tētahi atu mahi, e rua nga wā e pakipakia ana te tangata ki te kanohi e te āpiha, i te wā e panaia ana he wahine i a ia. He aha te minita i raro i te pēhanga? I te whakapaetanga a Tēnā Castaner i ngā kaiwhakahaere i te Rāitema ki te whakaeke i te hōhipera, ka kōrero hoki ngā kaiwhakahaere hōhipera me ārai e ngā kaimahi ngā kaiwhakahaere i te tatau o te rōpū whakangungu nui o Pitié-Salpêtrière. Ko te hōhipera whakaako nui kei te rohe 13 (rohe) i waenganui o Parihi, tata ki Place d'Italie, i reira i whakamahia ai e nga pirihimana he korohū roimata hei whakatūtū i ngā kaiwhakatūtū i te Wenerei. I kī te minita i te Rāitema ko te "paraka pango" he "whakaeke" i te hōhipera, i mate ai a Pirinihi Taiana i te tau 1997. I te Paraire, ka whakaae a Tēnā Castaner kia "kaua ia e whakamahi i te kupu" engari i mau tonu ka tomo ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te hōhipera, ā, ka karangatia kētia he "urutomo taikaha". "Kaore ahau e raruraru ki te mōhio kua hē taku kōrero," tana kī atu ki nga kaipānui. I kī atu a Edouard Philippe ki ngā kaipānui he "maia" tōna ki a Tēnā Castaner, e kī ana he "tika" a ia ki te whakatika i tana kōrero tuatahi. He aha tonu te mea i pā mai i te hōhipera? I kī atu te kaiwhakahaere o te hōhipera o Marie-Anne Ruder ki te pāpāho Wīwī i te Rāitema ko ngā kaiwhakahaere - tae atu ki ētahi me ngā hīpoki me ētahi gilets jaunes - he "taikaha, he whakawehi" i to rātau tomokanga ki te taunga o te hōhipera. E whakaatu ana ngā ataata i ngā kaiwhakahaere e rere ana i roto i te kēti e whai tata ana i ngā pirihimana. Ko ētahi e piki ana i te arawhata o waho ki te rōpū tiaki nui i waenganui i te āhua o te mauri, i te wā e hamama ana ngā nēhi "he tiaki nui tēnei". "He nui ake te āhua o te rere i tētahi mea," te kī a te nēhi o Mikael Matos, nāna i tohe kia kaua tētahi o ngā kaiwhakahaere e mau hīpoki. "Kāore mātou i rongo i te whakaekea, i te mōrearea rānei," te kī a Gwenaëlle Bellocq ki a Le Figaro, i te ohorere o to rātau taenga mai, i tere rawa te whakarongo a te rōpū ki te tīma tākuta. E 32 ngā tāngata i hopukina e ngā pirihimana, kua tukua katoatia ināianei i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā tūhuratanga. I te nuinga o te wā he rā mahi i ārahi ai te uniana i Wīwī, i tohua te takahanga 1 o Me e ngā matapaki i tukitukia ai e ngā kaiwhakahaere ngā matapihi toa, a, ka makaia ngā pūwhiti ki ngā āpiha neke atu i te 7,000 i horaina ki Parihi. I pāorotia e rātau ngā whakahēnga "kākahu kōwhai" ia wiki kua tāhaetia a Wīwī mai i Whiringa o Whiringa ā Rangi, e rūrū ana i te kāwanatanga o te Perehitini Wīwī o Emanuera Macron.

title: Te pāhi panuku o Microsoft: Ko ngā whakamātautau e anga ana ki a Tahia Nadella
summary: Kua whakaūngia e Microsoft kua noho a Tahia Nadella hei rangatira nui hou.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Dave LeeTechnology, BBC News I mua rā ko ia te whakahaere i te wehenga Kapua me te Hinonga o te umanga, ā, kāore anō kia whakahaere i tētahi kamupene nui, engari me whakakapi i te Steve Ballmer nui ake i te ora hei tirotiro i ngā hua me ngā ratonga. Nā reira, ki hea tīmata ai ki ngā mea i kīia e ētahi ko te "mahi kino rawa atu i te ao"? Kātahi anō koe ka whakaritea hei whakahaere i a Microsoft, ā, ko te rā tuatahi tēnei. Ka noho koe, ka tito i a koe anō, ka titiro āmaimai ki tētahi rārangi mahi tino taumaha me whakaputa pea i roto i ngā pukapuka. He encyclopaedia o te ānini. Ina titiro a Tēnā Nadella ki tana kōpaki hou ka kite ia i tētahi mea - tērā pea ka tautohe ētahi - e rite ana ki te tīma whutupōro o Ingarangi: ko ngā whetū pakeke e ngana ana ki te piri ki tō rātou mātauranga, i te taha o ngā tauhou kāore anō kia tae ki tō rātou kaha katoa. Kua tae ki te wā mo te kōrero a te tīma. Nokia Tuatahi, te hainatanga whetū o te umanga o tērā tau, ko Nokia pūkoro pūkoro o Hinerangi. Mā te waea atamai Lumia te pūrere tino angitu e whakahaere ana i te pūnaha Windows Phone, te āhua nei he tāpiritanga tino pai a Nokia ki te whānau Microsoft - ahakoa he 5.4bn hōro ($7.2bn; £4.6bn). Engari he aha ināianei? "He roa te hītori o Microsoft ki te raruraru me te pōturi ki te whakauru i ngā whiwhinga," te kī a Pirihi Kākāriki, te kaitātari hangarau matua i te rōpū tohutohu o Davies Murphy. "He nui rawa, he hira rawa a Nokia ki te whakakī." Ko tētahi rautaki pea ko te whakapau me te hanga ki runga i te tohu Lumia, ā, i whakaritea ki te ingoa pakihi o Microsoft, tērā pea ka āhua āhua mārō ngā pūrere ki te aroaro o ngā kaihoko. "Kua whiwhi rātau i te nui o te whakawhirinakitanga ki ngā ringa waea Lumia," ko te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Kākāriki. "Kei reira te mahi whenua." Ko te whakahē pūmau, nui rawa o Tēnā Ballmer, he pōturi rawa a ia i te tohu me te pūkoro. Tērā pea kei te tere a Tēnā Nadella ki te whakahoki i te wā ngaro. Engari nā te hokonga a Google i te umanga ringa waea a Motorola, he rangirua ka taea e te hoko noa iho i tētahi kaiwhakanao waea nui te mahi. He nui te tūmanako i pinea e Microsoft ki Metro, he atanga hōu mō Windows i whakakore i te papamahi kua whakamātauria me te pātene Tīmata, ā, i tukuna kētia he huinga tāpa ātaahua. He pai te tuku i a ia ki ngā mata pā, ā, ko te tikanga ka ōrite te āhua o Windows mēnā ka tirohia i runga i tētahi rorohiko papamahi, paparorohiko, waea atamai rānei. Engari kāore anō kia tino pai ki te kaupapa. "Kei a rātou tonu tētahi taumahinga me te take PR ki Windows 8," te kī a Tēnā Kākāriki. "Kei te uaua tonu ngā kiritaki ki te haere tonu. Kāore ngā kiritaki pakihi uho i te whakamohoa ki taua kiritaki." Kei te mōrearea te noho hei hua "pekepeke", me ngā kamupene e whakatau ana kia whakapiri ki Windows 7, me te tatari noa ki ngā mea katoa e puta mai ana i muri i Windows 8. Windows 9, e kī ana koe? Tērā pea - ko te rongo ka tīmata te mahi i a Aperira, engari kāore anō kia whakaūngia. Tērā pea he wā ki te hoki ki ngā mea taketake. "He āhua whakararuraru a Windows 8 mō ngā tono a te katoa," te kī a Nick Odantzis, te kaiwhakatika whakahaere o Windows Magazine. "I whakarerekētia e rātau he tokomaha ngā tāngata e pīrangi ana ki a Windows mō tōna āhua - he pūnaha whakahaere mārō pai mō te mahi mahi, mō te mahi i ngā mea ahuwhānui." Ko te wero ki te wehenga kēmu ehara i te whakatika - engari kia aukati i te pakaru. He tekau tau pai tēnei. I te tuatahi, he tokomaha i pātai ki te arorau o Microsoft e whakarewa ana i tētahi papatohu - engari i kitea he mahi matua, ko tētahi o ngā whakamiramira tūturu mō te kamupene i ngā tau tata nei. Engari me te pakanga papatohu hou e haere ana, he tino nui ngā tau e whai ake nei mō te angitu mo te wā roa o te Xbox. I tēnei wā, ko ētahi tatauranga - i whakaputaina e te tāwhai o Te Aotearoa, nā reira pānuitia he aha tāu e hiahia ai - e huatau ana kei te hokona te Xbox One hōu e te PlayStation 4, me ngā kēmu i runga i te papatohu a Te Aotearoa e hoko ana hoki i ētahi atu mea. I mua i te whakarewatanga, i kitea e te Xbox One i roto i tētahi kōhukihuki PR i runga i tana kaupapahere kēmu tōmua, i ngā whakaaturanga e arotahi ana ki ngā āhuahira Xbox One TV, ka miharo ngā kēmu mārō mehemea he mīhini "kēmu" pono. Engari he roa, he roa te huarahi ki te haere i roto i tēnei pakanga. He tokomaha ngā tohunga kēmu e whakapuaki ana he nui ake te hao o te Xbox One i te PS4, e hua ana me manawanui pea a Microsoft i roto i te pakanga kakī me te kakī. Kua āwhina kētia e Te Kamupene te mahi rorohiko kapua a te kamupene ki te whakarewa i ngā hokohoko. Ko te tikanga o te rorohiko kapua - arā, i tēnei horopaki, ko te whakamahi i ngā pūmanawa e "ora" ana i runga i te ipurangi, kaua i tō mīhini paetata - he wāhi nui te tipu, ā, tērā pea ko te āhua o te whakamahinga o ngā pūmanawa pēnei i a Microsoft Office ā muri ake nei. He pono, ko Office 365, e haere ana i roto i te kapua, kua pai te heke ki ngā umanga, e ārai ana, ki tētahi waeine, ngā whakahere ōrite mai i ngā āhuatanga o Google. Kua tīmataria e Windows Azure, tētahi tono ā-kapua o nāianei, te tauwhiro, engari he tino hua e hāngai ana ki ngā umanga. Ākuanei ka kite pea mātou i tētahi putanga o Windows e āhua rite ana ki te ChromeOS a Google - he pūnaha whakahaere māmā, māmā hoki, kei te whakahaere te nuinga o ana taupānga mā te tukutuku, kaua e tāutatia ki te mīhini anō. Tērā pea ka whakarewaina e te umanga ngā mahi ki te whakatoko i tana ratonga rokiroki kapua OneDrive kātahi anō ka whakaingoatia anō hei whirinoa ki Dropbox, Google Drive me Amazon Cloud Drive. Ko tētahi mahi matua mō Tēnā Nadella ko te whakahari i te katoa. "Ki taku whakaaro me whakatū anō e te rangatira hou te tuakiri o Microsoft," e kī ana a Catherine Ellis, te kaiwhakatika whakahaere o Windows Magazine. He pono - he iti noa iho te whana o te ngākau whakangākau o te kamupene i roto i ngā tau o Ballmer. "Kāore rawa te pūtake kaimahi o Microsoft i tino hoko ki a Ballmer me ngā kitenga katoa i a ia mō te umanga," e tautohe ana te kaitātari a Tēnā Kākāriki. "Pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā kaihoko, i kitea he iti rawa tana kite." Tae atu ki te wehenga atu o Tēnā Ballmer, kua puta atu ētahi atu kaiwhakahaere tūnga tiketike i te kamupene i roto i ngā tau tata nei. I waenganui i a rātou ko Don Mattrick, te upoko o mua o Xbox, kua neke atu ki te kamupene kēmu pāpori o Zynga. Ko tētahi wāhanga o te mahi tono, kātahi ka nui ake i te rangatira matua - he kaimahi katoa o te rūma whakamuri hei whakaaro. "It's not about hiring one guy at the moment - it's about hiring 20," says Mr Green. "The management team has been decimated in the past nine months. " Me whakanoho e ia he whakatupuranga rutene hou katoa. Ā, me whiwhi ia i te hoko katoa mai i te kapa me te kōnae." Kia whiwhi ai rātau ki te taha, e kī ana a Tēnā Kākāriki, me tere te mahi a Tēnā Nadella. "Me whakamahere e ia tētahi kitenga e rima tau mō Microsoft i ōna rā tuatahi e 90." Whāia a Dave Lee i Twitter @DaveLeeBBC

title: Jerry Lewis: Ka mate te comedian US i te 91 tau i Las Vegas
summary: Kua mate te kaiwhakangahau o Jerry Lewis, tētahi o ngā comedians tino angitu o Hollywood, i te 91 o ona tau.
text: I kī tētahi kōrero whānau i mate a ia i tōna kāinga i Las Vegas i te ata Rātapu. Na te mahi ngātahi 10 tau a Lewis me Dean Martin i kite i a rātau e whetū ana i roto i ngā pikitia e 16, ā, ka tutuki i te angitu nui o te tari pouaka. Ka noho ko ia te kaitapere tino utu i Karaihe, e tioka ana i ngā taunga pēnei i te The Bell Boy, Cinderfella me The Nutty Professor. Ko ētahi atu angitu rongonui ko te Kingi o te Kōrero i te tau 1983, i tākaro ai ia i tētahi kaihautū whakaaturanga kōrero i tāhaetia e Robert de Niro. I takoha nga hoa rangatira i te pakarutanga o te rongo o tōna matenga. I karangatia e Whoopi Goldberg "he taonga mo te rangi, engari he ngaromanga nui mo te kōhua". I tūtohu te kaitapere Star Trek a William Shatner he "iti iho te rekareka o te ao i tēnei rā". I kī te kaitapere o Hēmi Kānata, nāna te kāhua kōrero i tino whakaawetia e Jerry Lewis: "Ehara taua wairangi i te whakapakoko. He tipua tē mōhiotia a Jerry Lewis, he manaaki tē mōhiotia, he tino pukuhohe. Ko ahau nā te mea ko ia!" Tērā anō ētahi takoha mai i ngā tamahine a ngā hoa mahi roa o Lewis, o Frank Sinatra rāua ko Dean Martin. "E Jerry, ka hari a Papa ki te kite i a koe me taku pouri ki te kite i a koe e haere ana. Hōmai ki a ia tētahi o ō awhi pea mōku. Ka aroha tonu ahau ki a koe," ki a Nancy Sinatra. I tuhituhi hoki a Deana Martin i runga i te Twitter: "Kei te pouri ahau i te ngaronga o to mātau hoa roa (Uncle) Jerry Lewis. Kua aroha ahau ki a ia i tōku oranga katoa, ā, ka tino mihi ahau ki a ia." I muri iho ka tukua e te Whare Mā tētahi kōrero e whakamihi ana i "te oranga whakaharahara o tētahi o a mātau kaiwhakangahau tino nui", kātahi anō ka "pā atu a Lewis ki ngā oranga o ngā miriona". "I ora a Jerry i te Moemoeā o Amerika - i tino aroha ia ki tōna whenua, ā, i aroha tōna whenua ki a ia," te kī a Te Hēkeretari Pēhi a Sarah Huckabee Sanders i roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki Twitter. I whānau a Lewis ko Joseph Levitch i Newark, New Jersey, ki ngā mātua Rūhia-Hurai i roto i te mahi whakaaturanga. I tīmata a ia ki te mahi i runga i te atamira i te rima o ona tau i te taha o ōna mātua. I te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā whā, ka mahi tahi a Lewis me Dean Martin i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano, e whakatau ana i te taha pōrangi ki te tangata mārire o Mātini. I roto i ngā tau e 10 e whai ake nei ka puta rātau i roto i ngā karapu pō, i runga i te pouaka whakaata, i ngā whitiāhua hoki, engari i mutu ta rāua mahi ngātahi i te wehenga kawa. I te tīmatanga o nga tau kotahi rau e whitu tekau mā iwa rau, ka hangaia e ia te whakaari Holocaust rongonui, The Day the Clown Cried, mō tētahi clown i makaia ki te whare herehere, ā, i te mutunga ka whakamahia hei whakangahau i ngā tamariki me te ārahi i a rātau ki roto i ngā ruma korohū o te puni whakatōpū. Kāore anō kia whakaputaina. Ka puta mai ngā atahanga ngaro i te pikitia o Te Holocaust o Lewis, ko Lewis hoki te kaihautū o tētahi telethon roa, nāna i kohi ngā miriona tāra mo te mate uaua. I te tau 1995, ka noho ko ia te whetū tino utu i roto i te hītori o Broadway hei Mr Applegate i roto i te pūoro Damn Yankees. I toa hoki a ia i te rongonui hei kaituhi. Heoi anō, i ōna tau whakamutunga, ka whakawāteatia e ia te tautohetohe ki ngā kōrero whakahāwea, ā, i te tau 2007 ka whakahaua ia kia whakapōhēhē i muri i tana mahi i tētahi poapoa ārai tāne i te wā o te telethon. I roto i tētahi uiuinga, i kī a Lewis i tētahi wā ko te kī ki tōna angitu ko te pupuri i tētahi kounga pēnei i te tamaiti, engari i tāpiri mai: "Kua tino angitu ahau i te tino pōrangi." "E titiro ana ahau ki te ao mā ngā whatu o te tamaiti nā te mea e iwa ahau," tana kī atu ki a Kōrero i te tau 2002. "I noho pēnā ahau. I mahia e au he mahi i taua mea. He wāhi tino pai tēnei." I tino rongonui hoki a Lewis i Wīwī i reira i karangatia ai ia ko "le Roi du Crazy" ("te Kingi o te Pōrangi"). I whakaurua ia ki roto i te Legion of Honour, te tohu teitei rawa o Wīwī, i te tau 1984.

title: Ka nekehia e te hē o te mahere āporo te Taunga Rererangi o Dublin ki te pāmu
summary: Nā tētahi hē hangarau i runga i te pūmanawa mahere a Apple i mōrearea ai te wāhi e noho ana te taunga rererangi o Dublin.
text: Ko te taunga rererangi o te pūmatua kei te taha ki te raki, tata ki te ono maero i waho o te pūmatua. Engari i runga i te taupānga mahere iOS 6 ka hoatu tōna tūnga hei pāmu i Dundrum, e toru maero ki te tonga o te taone. Ko te papa rererangi he pānga 35 eka e noho ana i te wāhanga o te Minita Ture o Airana, a Alan Shatter. Na te hapa i puta ai ia i tētahi kōrero. "E mōhio ana ahau i ētahi wā ka taea te mahi hē, ā, e mīharo ana ahau ki te kite kua tohua te Airfield, i roto i te taupānga mahere iOS 6 pūnaha whakahaere hōu a Apple, ki te atahanga o tētahi rererangi," tana kī. "Airfield, a 35-acre estate with working farm, formal gardens and cafe is of course a famous and immensely popular, important local amenity. " E mārama ana ehara te ingoa i te hē anake, engari he mōrearea te māminga i te mea ka puta pea he kaihautū, tauhou ki te rohe, i roto i tētahi āhuatanga ohorere, ā, kāore ētahi atu mōhiohio e wātea ana, e ngana ana ki te taunga. "Kua whakaritea e au kia whakamōhiotia a Āporo ki te hapa, ā, i tono kia whakatikaina wawetia. " I roto i te horopaki o Airfield he maha ngā atahanga whirinoa ka taea te whakapau pēnei i te kau, te koati, te hipi, te putiputi, tētahi atu momo tipu rānei i te wā e whakahaere ana te Airfield i tētahi whare kōhungahunga. "Ko te rererangi he rerenga whakaaro tino tika." I muri iho ka haere te Taunga Rererangi o Dublin ki Twitter ki te whakaū i ōna kaiārahi. Pōraru "Ki te pōraru tētahi, kāore te Taunga Rererangi o Dublin i te neke ki te taha tonga. #mapfail," ka tūtohu. Ā, kāore anō a Āporo kia whakararuraru noa iho i ngā taunga rererangi. Kua ngaro hoki te kararehe o te taone. Kei te taunga o Phoenix Park i te hauauru o te taone, engari ko te tikanga o te hē whakamahere a te kamupene kei te puta mai i Temple Bar - he pākākā i te pokapū o te taone, kī tonu i ngā pae me ngā karapu pō. Kua pātai mai ētahi kaiwaiata mehemea ka kite tētahi i te rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kararehe rōpū me nga tangata o te kararehe. He maha ngā kaiwhakamahi i te Republic of Ireland me ētahi atu wāhi kāore i kite i te taha rekareka. Kua mauria e rātau ki Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr me ētahi atu whatunga pāpāho pāpori ki te tawai i ngā hinganga o te taupānga whakamahere. I kī a Āporo e whakamīharo ana ki ngā urupare kiritaki katoa e whiwhi ana mō te taupānga, ā, ka kaha te mahi ki te whakapai ake. I whakatau te kamupene ki te whakawhanake i tōna ake pūmanawa mahere i muri i te whakatau kua kore e hiahia ki te whakamahi i te ōrite o Google. Kua waihangatia te pūnaha ake a Apple mā te whakamahi i ngā raraunga mai i te umanga whakaterenga TomTom me ētahi atu. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te kaikōrero o Āporoiti ko Trudy Muller he mahi nui te whakarewatanga o ngā Mahere Āporo mō te umanga.

title: Lives 'at risk' at HMP Chelmsford, ex-prisoner claims
summary: Tērā pea ka noho te oranga o nga hoa herehere i tētahi whare herehere i whakaarahia ai ngā māharahara mo te nui haere o ngā taumata tutu, kua kī tētahi herehere o mua.
text: I kī taua tangata, e rua nga rerenga i te Whare Herehere o Chelmsford, i kite ia i nga herehere e ringihia ana he wai kōhua ki runga i a rāua anō. I tērā tau, i kī tētahi pūrongo kua nui haere te "whakaweti, te tutu taumata iti, me te whakarongo ki ngā herehere". I kī tētahi kōrero mo te ratonga whare herehere tērā tētahi "kore manawanui ki te tukino". I kī te herehere o mua, e hiahia ana kia noho ingoamuna, i tōna nohonga tuatahi i ngā tau tata nei, "he nui ake te raupapa" ā, i rongo ia i te "tino haumaru". "I tērā wā i reira ahau i kite ai ahau i ngā mahi taikaha e toru. I tēnei wā he tutu i ia rā," tana kī. "He hākinakina noa iho te wāhi katoa." I whakaahuatia e te tino herehere tētahi whakaekenga herehere i ringihia ai he wai kōhua ki runga i a ia i a ia e moe ana, i mua i te patua ki te tokotoko konganuku. "E mōhio ana ahau kua mahi hara te iwi, ā, e tika ana kia mahi rātau i tō rātou wā, engari kei reira te oranga o te tangata," tana kī. "Me nui ake ngā kaimahi. I tētahi rā noa, ka titiro huri noa koe i runga i te parirau, ā, e 30 ngā tāngata i runga i te papa, kotahi te āpiha i a koe." Ko te pūrongo o tērā tau, nā te Poari Aroturuki Motuhake o Chelmsford, i whakaarahia hoki ngā māharahara mō te "ngaronga o te tokomaha o ngā āpiha whakahaere pūkenga me ngā āpiha parirau" e whai ana i tētahi "pānga kino nui ki te tiaki me te haumarutanga o ngā herehere". Hei urupare ki te kerēme a te herehere o mua, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero ratonga whare herehere: "He kore manawanui tā mātou ki te tutu i roto i ngā whare herehere, ā, ka taea e te hunga hara te tāpiri wā ki ta rātau whiu. " Ka arotakea tonutia e mātou ngā taumata kaimahi, ā, ka urupare ki ngā pēhanga o mua tata nei mā te tono i ngā āpiha whare herehere tāpiri e 1,700 i te motu."

title: 'Kāore he wāhitau' mōkihi i tukua ki Donegal
summary: Kua tutuki pai te tuku i tētahi mōkihi me tētahi wāhitau kāore e taea te pānui me te ingoa kāore e taea te pānui ki tōna kaiwhiwhi i Airangi.
text: I kī a Shane Crumlish, e noho ana i Carndonagh, i ohorere a ia i te mōkihi - he koha ma tana wahine - i tae ki tōna tatau. I te taenga atu, kāore i taea te pānui i tana wāhitau - i tuhia tuatahitia ki te tautohu pango. E rua ngā tuhipoka i āpitihia e pānui noa ana: "Whakamātauria a Carndonagh, Co Donegal." "Me pēhea tēnei i tae mai ai ki konei, kāore au i te mōhio," te kī a Tēnā Crumlish ki a Te Reo Irirangi o TE Reo Irirangi o Aotearoa. "Kāore he tangata i roto i te whare i te taenga mai, nā reira i mahue noa iho i waho i roto i tētahi o aku motokā." I kī a ia kāore i taea te pānui i te ingoa, i te wāhitau rānei i runga i te mōkihi, ā, tokorua ngā poutāpeta paetata i mōhio ki hea haere ai. "Kua kōrero ahau ki te poutāpeta, a Hoani mai i Moville," te kī a Tāne Crumlish. "I waenganui i a ia me tētahi atu poutāpeta kua mahia e rātau he āhua āwhā māhunga, ā, ka puta ake te ariā: 'Ko te tikanga mō Shane.'" I kī a Tēnā Crumlish i ngā tau tata nei ka tonoa e ia he kohikohi, ā, he kaiwhiwhi auau i ngā mōkihi ōrite. "Tērā pea i whakaarohia e rātau mai i reira," tana kī. 'Te tama whai mōhiti' Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i whakapokea ai e te mahi kaitirotiro a Tētahi Poutāpeta - te ratonga poutāpeta o Airana - te tūponotanga ki te tuku i te pou kōrero ki Donegal. I te tau 2015 i tutuki pai ai tētahi reta ki tōna kaiwhiwhi ahakoa i tonoa ki: "Tō tangata Henderson, taua tama me ngā mōhiti e mahi ana i te PhD i konei i Kuini i Belfast; Buncrana, County Donegal, Ireland." Neke atu i te 80 maire te haere o te reta mai i Belfast, i mua i te tukunga atu ki te tari o te wahine a te tauira a Barry Henderson, o Roisin, i Buncrana, tata ki te 7,000 te taupori.

title: I tinihangatia te kaitiaki o Fylde i te £7K
summary: E whakatūpato ana tētahi kaitiaki o Te Rūnanga i te £7,000 e ngā tinihanga i runga i te waea, ki ētahi atu pakeke kia karo i tōna tūponotanga.
text: I korerotia ki a "Marjorie", e 73, mai i Te Tairāwhiti o Fylde i te wā o Hui tanguru, kua toa a ia i te £210,000 i roto i tētahi whakataetae a tētahi tangata e kī ana nō tētahi rōpū tārewa o Amerika. Engari i korerotia ki a ia me utu tāke e £7,000 i te tuatahi. I kī te wahine, nāna i hoatu te moni, i ohorere a ia i tana mōhiotanga ko ia te tūkino i te tinihanga. "I whakararuraru ahau, kāore au i whakapono me pēhea ahau i mau ai," tana kī. 'Ngā ūnga mōrearea' "Kāore i taea e au te moe mō ngā wiki." I kī a Det Con Toni McClements, o te rōpū hara ohaoha o Te Kāhui Pirihimana: "He tino whakapouri tēnei momo tinihanga i te mea ka tere te haere o te hunga e mate ana i te hari o te 'toa' ki te pouri katoa ina mōhio rātau kua tinihangatia rātau. " E hāngai ana ki ngā pakeke me ngā mōrearea kia whai wāhi ai tātau katoa ki te tiaki i ngā whanaunga pakeke, i te hunga rānei e hiahia ana ki tā mātou tautoko." I kī a ia ko te āraitanga te kaupapa here tino pai, ā, ka tohe i ngā tāngata kia pōhēhē mō tētahi tangata e tuku ana i ngā paraihe mā te waea, mā te poutāpeta rānei. "Kia mahara mēnā he pai rawa te āhua kia pono pea," tana kī.

title: Peru: Tokotoru e mate ana i roto i ngā matapaki i runga i te kaupapa maina koura o Conga
summary: E toru neke atu rānei ngā tāngata i mate i waenganui i ngā pirihimana me ngā kaiwhakatūtū e ātete ana i tētahi kaupapa kari koura miriona tāra.
text: E hia rau nga tāngata i whakaekea nga whare kāwanatanga i te taone o Celendin, e akiaki ana i nga mana kia whakapuaki i tētahi āhua ohorere i te rohe. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ka whakangaromia e te kaupapa Conga, e pūteatia ana e te kamupene ā-US, o Newmont, ngā rawa wai. I karangatia e Newmont he whakatū rangitahi ki te mahi i tērā tau i muri i ngā whakahēnga ōrite. I te whakamārama i ngā whakaaturanga hou rawa, ka kī nga kaiwhakahaere kua riri rātau i te taone nui e whakapuaki ana i tana tautoko mo te maina koura tuwhera. Kua whakapuakina e te kāwanatanga he āhua ohorere e 30 rā i roto i ngā kawanatanga e toru i taua rohe, i Celendin, i Hualgayoc me Cajamarca. I tangohia tētahi mehua ōrite i te wā i whakapuakina e Perehitini Ollanta Humala he āhua ohorere i Cajamarca i muri i te whakanui ake o ngā whakahē ki tōku. Ko Jobs Newmont, e noho ana i Denver, Colorado, te rangatira nui o te kaupapa Conga, ka tīmata i te whakanaotanga i te tau 2015, ā, he toronga o Yanacocha, te maina koura nui rawa o Amerika Rātini. Ko te kaupapa, e 3,700 m (12,140 waewae) i runga ake i te taumata o te moana, ko te neke i te wai mai i ngā roto e whā i runga i ngā maunga ki ngā puna ka hangaia e te kamupene. E kī ana nga kaiwhakahaere kaore nga puna e whakakapi tika i nga roto, e whakarato ana hoki i te wai whenua mo te ahuwhenua me te hawai tarutaru mo nga kararehe. E kī ana te Newmont Mining Corporation kua tāruatia ana mahere i runga i te whakaaro ki ngā hapori paetata, ā, ka tutuki i ngā paerewa taiao tiketike. E kī ana ka hangaia e te maina o Conga ngā mahi e hia mano. Ko te maina te kaupapa pūtea penapena nui rawa o Peru.

title: Tom Daley Twitter 'troll' kia tūhuratia e ngā pirihimana
summary: E kī ana ngā pirihimana kei te titiro rātau ki tētahi kaiwhakamahi Twitter nāna i whakapae i te kairuku a Tom Daley i te tuku i tōna pāpā tōmuri.
text: I hapa a Daley rāua ko tōna hoa ko Pete Waterfield i tētahi mētara mō Ingarangi Nui i te mutunga o te tuawhā i roto i te ruku pūhara 10m tukutahi a ngā tāngata. I muri tata iho, ka tīmataria anō e Daley tētahi pou mai i Rileyy69 e kī ana: "I tukua e koe tō pāpā ki raro, e tūmanako ana ahau e mōhio ana koe ki tēnā." I urupare a Daley mā te tweeting: "I muri i taku hoatutanga i aku mea katoa... ka whiwhi koe i te pōrangi e tuku mai ana i tēnei ki a au..." I whakaūngia e ngā Pirihimana o Dorset e uiui ana i taua mahi. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu: "E pā ana ki ngā tuhituhi ki @tomdaley1994 - e mōhio ana mātou ki te take, ā, kei te āta titiro mātou ki taua take." Whakapae, i mate te pāpā o te kairuku o Plymouth, a Rob i tērā tau i te mate pukupuku roro. I a ia e kōrero ana i mua i te Omirangi o Rāwāhi, ka whakaaturia e Daley i hoatu e tōna pāpā ki a ia "ngā whakaaro katoa" e hiahiatia ana e ia. I kī atu te tau 18 tau ki te BBC: "Mā te whiwhi mētara e whai painga ai ngā uauatanga katoa i a au. " Mai i taku tamarikitanga ki te whakataetae i te Orimipia. "Kei te mahi ahau mōku anō me taku pāpā. Ko a māua moemoeā mai i a māua tamarikitanga. "I hiahia tonu ahau ki te mahi, ā, i tino tautoko a pāpā i ngā mea katoa. " Ka tino motuhake te mahi mōna." I ngana te kaiwhakamahi Twitter o Rileyy69 ki te whakapōhēhē ā muri ake nei i te rā. Ka tūtohu a ia: "@TomDaley1994 aroha mai e hoa, i hiahia noa ahau kia toa koe nā te mea ko te omirangi kei te riri noa iho ahau kāore mātou i toa, aroha mai ki a Tom whakaae ki taku whakapae. " tēnā kāore au e pīrangi kia kinongia ahau, e pouri ana ahau kāore koe i toa, i te pakiaka ahau ki a koe ki te mahi i Ingarangi i te whakahīhī katoa i te tino riri."

title: Ko nga roopu o Yorkshire hei tohu i te timatanga o Tour de France
summary: Ka tū ngā hapori o Aotearoa i te ara o te Tour de France hei tohu i te tatauranga kotahi marama ki te tīmatanga o te whakataetae pahikara.
text: Ko ngā hākari La Fête du Tour e tū ana i ngā tāone, i ngā taone me ngā kāinga i ia tau puta noa i Wīwī. E kākahu kōwhai ana ngā kaiuru me te haere pahikara me te pikiniki i te ara. Ka tīmata te rēhi i te pokapū o te taone o Leeds i te 5 o Hōngongoi, ā, ka haere tonu mai i York ki Sheffield i te 6 o Hōngongoi. I kī a Kiriata Titchener, mai i te tīma o Aotearoa Grand Départ, e tūmanako ana a ia ki tētahi "hauora pai". "He wā hei whakanui i tēnei mea e haere mai ana, " tana kī. " It's a fun thing and La Fête is that official start that says lets get really excited about this thing." He maha ngā rōpū paihikara e whakahaere ana i ngā ekenga i ētahi wāhanga o te ara, e 600 ngā tāngata e tūmanakohia ana i tētahi takahanga i whakaritea e te Karapu Paihikara o Skipton i Te Raki o Aotearoa i te Rātapu. I Huddersfield, neke atu i te 200 ngā tāngata, tae atu ki ngā kaieke hauā, ka whai wāhi ki tētahi huringa huri noa i te taone i te Hātarei. I York, kua whakaritea e tētahi rōpū paihikara wāhine - te Yorkshire Bike Belles - tētahi takahanga i te ara pahikara o te taone. Many of the events will also be used to raise money for Marie Curie Cancer Care.

title: Coronavirus: He tohutohu mō ngā tāngata whai mate hauora
summary: Ka taea e te coronavirus te pā ki te tangata, engari ko ngā tāngata whai raruraru hauora tīariari me ngā pakeke e whakaarotia ana he nui ake te mōrearea ki te whakawhanake i ngā tohu taumaha.
text: Na Michelle RobertsHealth editor, BBC News online Mēnā he mate hauora mo te wā roa kei te māharahara pea koe. Nā reira anei ngā tohutohu a ngā tohunga. Ko wai e mōrearea ana? Mā te hauora e kore koe e nui ake te tūponotanga ki te whakapā atu ki te coronavirus. Engari te āhua nei ko ngā tāngata pakeke, te hunga ngoikore ngā pūnaha ārai me ngā tāngata whai mate pūmau, tae atu ki te mate manawa, te mate huka, te huango rānei, ka mōrearea ake ngā pānga kino ki te mau i a rātou. Ko te nuinga o te iwi ka tīmata ki te whakaora wawe mai i te coronavirus i muri i te okiokinga o ētahi rā. Ki ētahi tāngata, he taumaha ake, ā, i ētahi wā ka whakawehi i te ora. He rite ngā tohu ki ētahi atu mate e tino pūnoa ana, pēnei i te makariri me te rewharewha: Ko ngā tāngata e nui ake ana te mōrearea ko te hunga neke atu i te 70, ahakoa he mate hauora tō rātou, kāore rānei, me ngā tāngata kei raro iho i te 70 me ētahi o ngā āhuatanga hauora e whai ake nei: E kīia ana te katoa kia whai i ngā tikanga tawhiti pāpori hei āwhina ki te whakaiti i te tūponotanga ki te hopu me te hora i te coronavirus. Ā, e 16m ngā tāngata i roto i ngā rōpū mōrearea teitei ake e tino tohutohutia ana kia whai i ngā tohutohu. Neke atu i te 2.5m ngā tāngata e tino mōrearea ana ki ngā raruraru, pēnei i ngā tūroro e mate ana i te mate pukupuku, i ngā tāngata rānei i runga i te rongoā ārai mate, e tonoa ana kia wehe i te kāinga mō te 12 wiki hei pare i a rātau anō - he mehua e kiia nei ko te whakangungu. Mēnā kei roto koe i tēnei kāwai whakangungu mōrearea rawa, ā, kāore anō koe kia whiwhi reta mō taua mea mai i te NHS, kua whakapā atu rānei ki tō GP, ki tō tākuta hōhipera rānei mā te waea, tuihono rānei. He huangō tōku, me aha ahau? Ko te tohutohu a Asthma UK ko te tango tonu i tō inhaler ārai (ko te tikanga he parauri) ia rā. Mā tēnei e āwhina ki te tapahi i tō mōrea o te whakaeke huango e whakaohotia ana e tētahi huaketo romahā, tae atu ki te coronavirus. Mauria tō pūngākau whakaora kikorangi i ia rā, ki te rongo koe i ō āhuatanga huango e mura ana. Mēnā kei te kino haere tō huangō, ā, kei te mōrearea pea koe ki te coronavirus, whakapā atu ki te ratonga coronavirus NHS 111 tuihono. Tīmataria tētahi rātaka rerenga taumata mēnā he ine rerenga taumata tāu i te mea he huarahi pai tēnei ki te aroturuki i tō huangō me te āwhina ki te kōrero i te rerekētanga i waenga i ō tohu huango me te mate coronavirus. He pakeke ahau, me wehe ahau i a au anō? Ko te tikanga kia mutu te whakapā atu o te katoa - ahakoa te pakeke - ki ētahi atu hei āwhina ki te aukati i te horahanga o te huaketo me te tiaki i te hunga tino mōrearea. Ko te tikanga o tēnā me karo i ngā huihuinga me ngā hoa me te whānau me ngā wāhi kōpikopiko. He tino hira tēnei mō ngā tāngata neke atu i te 70 me te hunga whai mate hauora i raro i te mea he nui ake te mōrearea o te whakawhanake i ngā āhuatanga kino ake mēnā ka whakapokea rātou. E taunaki ana a Caroline Abrahams, kaiwhakahaere aroha i Age UK, kia āta tirohia e ngā tāngata whai hoa pakeke me ngā whanaunga kia rite tonu te tirotiro i a rātou. Ka taea e ngā pakeke me ō rātou whānau te waea koreutu ki te Age UK Advice i 0800 169 65 65. Ka aha mēnā he take hauora pūmau tōku? Ko te tangata e nui ake ana te mōrea o ngā huaketo pēnei i te rewharewha, te rewharewha rānei, me mahi i ngā hipanga tika hei whakaiti i te mōrea o te whakapokenga. Ko te hunga e tīmata ana ki te whakaatu i ngā tohu - he mare me te kirikā hou, tohetohe - me noho ki te kāinga. Mēnā ka kino ake ngā tohumate, kāore rānei i te pai ake i muri i te whitu rā, me waea atu rātou ki tō rātou GP, me whakamahi rānei i te ratonga NHS 111. He mate huka ahau, me aha ahau? Ko te hunga e noho ana i te mate huka momo 1, momo 2 rānei, ka nui ake pea te mōrearea o ngā āhuatanga taumaha ake. I kī a Dan Howarth, te upoko tiaki i Diabetes UK: "Ka taea e te Coronavirus, te Covid-19 rānei te whakararuraru i ngā tāngata mate huka. " Mēnā he mate huka koe, ā, he tohu pēnei i te mare, te pāmahana tiketike me te poto o te manawa, me āta tirotiro koe i tō huka toto." Mēnā kei a koe ēnei tohumate, me noho koe ki te kāinga mō ngā rā e whitu me te tango tonu i ō rongoā. Kaua e haere ki tētahi mahi GP, rongoā, hōhipera rānei, ahakoa he wāhui hōhipera tāu. Whakamahia te ratonga coronavirus tuihono NHS 111 mēnā kei te whakaaro koe kāore e taea e koe ō tohu i te kāinga, ka kino ake tō āhuatanga, kāore rānei ō tohu e pai ake i muri i te whitu rā. Mēnā ka āta tirotiro koe i tō huka toto, i runga i te tohutohu a tō tākuta, me mahi tonu koe i tēnei. Ki te kore koe e tirotiro i ō taumata huka toto i te kāinga, kia mōhio koe ki ngā tohu o te hyperglycemia, arā ko te tino matewai, te nui ake o te mimi i te pūnoa (i te pō), te ānini, te ngenge me te ngoikore. Me waea atu koe ki tō tākuta mēnā kei a koe ēnei tohumate. Mēnā kāore ō tohu coronavirus, ā, kei te hiahia koe ki te haere ki tētahi wāhui mate huka auau, tirohia mēnā ka taea tēnei e koe i runga i te ipurangi, mā te waea rānei, kaua e haere ki tētahi whare hauora. Me māharahara ngā wāhine hapū? Kāore anō kia nui ake te mōrearea o ngā wāhine hapū (me ā rātou pēpi) ki te hopu i te coronavirus, engari e kī ana te kāwanatanga me tūpato ngā whaea mō tēnei wā. Pēnei i te tangata, me mahi rātau i ngā hipanga kia kore ai e whakapokea. Kei waenganui rātau i ngā tāngata e tika ana kia "tino pākaha" ki te whai i ngā tohutohu whaimana. E tohutohutia ana ngā kaimahi hauora hapū: He kaipaipa ahau, kei te mōrearea ake ahau? E tohutohu ana a Deborah Arnott, te rangatira nui o te aroha hauora tūmatanui, a Ash, ko te hunga e kai paipa nui ana me tapahi, kia ngana rānei ki te whakamutu katoa ki te whakaheke i tō rātou mōrea. "He nui ake te āhua o te hunga kaipaipa ki te whiwhi i ngā mate romahā, ā, e rua ngā wā e pā ana ki te niumonia i te hunga kaipaipa," tana kī. "He pai te whakamutu i te kai paipa mō tō hauora i roto i ngā huarahi maha, ā, me kite ngā kaipaipa i te coronavirus hei whakahau anō ki te whakamutu i ngā parenga o tō rātou tinana ināianei i mua i te horahanga o te coronavirus i te UK." Me pēhea taku rongoā? He mea nui ahakoa kei te mate koe, ka haere tonu koe ki te tango i ō rongoā kua whakaritea. Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kohikohi rongoā i a koe e mate ana, pātai atu ki tētahi hoa, ki tētahi mema rānei o te whānau kia kohikohi māu. E hiahia ana ahau ki tētahi wero rewharewha? He huaketo rerekē te coronavirus ki te rewharewha, nā reira kāore te wero rewharewha e ārai i te mate, engari ka mate hoki koe i te rewharewha, ā, ka tino taumaha pea ki ētahi tāngata. Ka taea e ngā tāngata e 65 neke atu rānei, ngā wāhine hapū me ngā tamariki me ngā pakeke whai āhuatanga hauora, ngā pūnaha ārai ngoikore rānei te tiki koreutu i te NHS. Me pēhea e noho haumaru ai ahau? E whakaarohia ana ka horahia te huaketo e te mare me ngā mata tāhae, pēnei i ngā kakau me ngā kakau tatau i ngā wāhi tūmatanui. Ka taea e te hauora pai te aukati i te horapa o te huaketo: Kia hohe ā-tinana mā te whakakori tinana i rō whare, i tō māra rānei mēnā ka taea.

title: Kaore te rangatira o Peugeot e tuku ki a Vauxhall
summary: Ka taea te hainatia tētahi whakaaetanga hukihuki hei hoko i ngā umanga Pākehā a General Motors ki PSA, te rangatira o Peugeot me Citroen, a tērā wiki.
text: E mārama ana te kaiwhakatika o Haimona JackBusiness E hiahia ana ngā kamupene e rua ki te waitohu i tētahi "tauākī whāinga" i mua i te wiki e tīmata ana te whakaaturanga Motokā o Hiniwa i te 6 o Mati hei ārai i te taurangi haere tonu e taumarumaru ana i te putanga o ngā tauira hōu. Kua tere te neke o ngā takahanga e whakatau ana i te wā heke mai o Vauxhall i te UK. Mai i te pānuitanga ohorere o tērā wiki e whakaaro ana a GM ki tētahi hoko, kua tūtaki te whakahaere matua o ngā kamupene e rua ki ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā uniana i Tiamana me te UK. E wehi ana rātau ka tapahia e PSA, nā te kāwanatanga Wīwī, he mahi i waho o Wīwī. I roto i tētahi waea ki te Pirimia o Ēnā Me inapō, ka "whakapuakina e te pāhi PSA te hiahia ki te whakawhanake i te pūkenga o Vauxhall mō ōna kiritaki pono". Ehara tēnā i te ōrite ki te whakaū i te wā heke mai o ngā kaimahi 4,500 o Vauxhall i Luton, i Ellesmere Port me puta noa i te UK. Ma te whakahuahua e tohu nga marama tīmatanga o te rorohiko kaha puta noa i Uropi. Ka pōturi ake te haere whakamua i muri i te hainatanga o tētahi mahi. Kāore i te tino mōhio pūtea ki te whakamutu i te whakanaotanga o tētahi motokā i mua i te whakaurunga o tētahi tauira hōu, ā, kāore te Astra i hangaia i Ellesmere Port mō tētahi whakahōutanga tae noa ki te tau 2020. I taua wā, e whakaarotia ana he tino mōrearea te Tauranga o Ellesmere ki te whakataetae mai i tētahi tipu PSA i Sochaux i Wīwī. He whakaharahara te utu me te matatinitanga o te neke i te whakanao motokā ahakoa te wā. Ka hiahiatia he maha nga tau o te whakarerekētanga o ngā mekameka whakarato, ngā pūhara me ngā pūhara IT. Hei tauira, ka korerotia mai ki a au i ngā tipu Jaguar Land Rover i te UK, ka whakaatu poto tonu ngā rorohiko i tētahi tohuāki Ford ina takiuru ngā kaiwhakamahi - ā, i hokona e Ford te JLR ki Tata i te tekau tau ki mua. Ahakoa rā, kotahi tonu te mea e whakaae ana ngā tohunga umanga katoa, he nui rawa ngā tipu e 24 i Uropi e nui rawa ana tētahi kamupene paheko. E rua anake ngā wheketere o aua 24 - ā, ākuanei ka noho aua tipu ki waho o te EU - e whakaarotia ana ko te UK te māmā i roto i tēnei tautohetohe whakanao. Kua whakapuakina e te kāwanatanga i konei tana tautoko mō te wāhanga waka me te whakakaha i ngā waka hiko hōu me te hangarau pūhiko - he mea e whakaarotia ana he kī ki te whakatūpato i a Nissan kia nui ake te pūtea penapena i te UK.

title: I taratahitia te kaipuke tere o Amerika i runga i te kēhi karawaka, 'ka wehe atu i St Lucia'
summary: I muri i te kēhi o te karawaka, kua mahue i tētahi kaipuke tere o Amerika te motu o Karipiana o Hato Lucia.
text: E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga aroturuki tuihono i te kaipuke - e whakaarotia ana ko Freewinds, nā te Hāhi o Scientology - e haere ana ki te motu o Curacao. I kī a Dr Merlene Fredericks James i te Rāitema he kēhi karawaka, ā, "i whakaaro he tūpato kia taratahitia e mātau te kaipuke". E hua ana ngā pūrongo i rere te kaipuke i muri i te tukunga a ngā mana e 100 ngā kano ārai mate. E whakaatu ana te paetukutuku aroturuki kaipuke MarineTraffic.com tētahi kaipuke e kiia nei ko SMV Freewinds i te 23:18 wā paetata (03:18 GMT) ā, ka tau ki te pūmatua o Curacao, o Willemstad i te 06:00 i te Hātarei. Tata ki te 65 km (40 km) ki te raki o Venezuela te motu o Hōnea, ā, kei te tautohetohe ngā mana o te Pēhi Pāhono me pēhea te urupare ina tae mai. Kāore he tangata i runga i te kaipuke i whakaaetia kia wehe i te kaipuke i Hato Ruhia. I kī a Dr Fredericks James i roto i tētahi tauākī ataata i whakairihia ki YouTube i te Tūtira i mōhio ai te minita ki te kēhi karawaka. "He ngāwari noa iho te whakapoke i ētahi atu mā te mare, te mare, te mare, ngā pata i runga i ngā mata maha, ērā atu mea," te kī a Dr Fredericks James. "Nā te mōrea o te whakapokenga tūpono - ehara i te mea mai i te kēhi karawaka, engari mai i ētahi atu tangata i runga i te poti i taua wā - i whakaaro mātou he tūpato te whakatau kia kaua e tuku i tētahi tangata kia heke." I kōrerotia e ia he 25 tau te teitei o ngā mate karawaka. I pūrongotia e NBC News, e kī ana i tētahi Pare Tairāwhiti o Hato Lucia, ko te poti ko te Freewinds, he oko 440ft (134m) nā te Hāhi o Scientology, i whakaarotia e 300 ngā pāhihi i runga i te papa. E whakarārangi ana te paetukutuku a te Hāhi o Scientology i te tauranga kāinga o te kaipuke hei Curacao, ā, e whakaahua ana i te kaipuke hei "whakahoki whakapono e mahi ana i te taumata tino hōhonu o te tohutohu wairua". Nō tēnei wā kāore anō te rōpū whakahaere kia kōrero mo te kēhi. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, i pūrongotia e ngā kaiwhakahaere hauora o Amerika neke atu i te 700 ngā tāngata i pāngia e te karawaka, e tohu ana i te 25 tau te teitei mō ngā kēhi o te mate urutā i te whenua. Kua tuhia ngā kēhi i ngā kāwanatanga e 22, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā e pā ana ki ngā tamariki kāore anō kia werohia, i kī te Centers for Disease Control and Prevention i te Mane. I kī ngā āpiha ko te pikinga o ngā kēhi te nui rawa mai i te tau 1994, tae atu ki te 78 i pūrongotia i te wiki kua hipa. E kiia ana kua kōwhiria e ētahi mātua kia waiho a rātau tamariki kia kore e werohia nā te kerēme pūtaiao kāore i te pūtaiao ka puta he mate pēnei i te autism, i runga rānei i ngā take whakapono. Ko te nuinga o ngā kēhi i pā mai i ngā rohe tīmatanga e 13, tae atu ki ngā hapori Hurai orthodox o New York City. Kai runga koe i te kaipuke? Tiria ō wheako mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: E whakaahua ana te tūpāpaku o Alton Towers i te 'pahū māuiui'
summary: Ko te wā tuatahi i whakaahuatia ai e tētahi tangata i whara i te tūtukitanga o te rōra o Alton Towers te "pahū māuiui" i rongo ai ia i te tūtukitanga o nga waka o te eke.
text: I runga a Joe Pugh, 18, i runga i te Smiler me tana hoa wahine ko Leah Washington, 17, i te aituā i te 2 o Hune. I pakaru ōna turi i te tūtukitanga, ā, mai i tērā wā ka tapahia tōna waewae. "E mahara ana ahau ki tētahi pahū māuiui me te konganuku e huri ana ki te konganuku me te pae haumaru e tukia ana ki ōku turi," tana kī atu ki te Mēra i te Rātapu. "I titiro ahau ki ōku ringa, a, he toto i ngā wāhi katoa." Ko te tokorua i waenganui i ngā tāngata tokorima i tino whara i te tūtukitanga, nā reira i kati ai te pāka tāhuhu o Staffordshire mo te ono rā. I pāngia e Miss Washington, 17, mai i Barnsley i South Yorkshire, ngā whara tino nui, i tapahia tōna waewae mauī i runga ake i te turi, ā, ka rongoatia mō tētahi ringa whati. I kī a Tēnā Pugh kua whakahaua ia me ētahi atu i runga i te eke kia rua ngā wā i mua i te tīmatanga kia taea ai e ngā kaimahi te mahi i ngā taki haumaru. I kī hoki a ia he takaware 20 meneti i te wā i okioki ai te rōra i te tihi o tētahi o ngā maunga rōra. I kī a ia "kāore rātau i whakapono ki tā mātou i kite ai" i te tūtukitanga, ā, ka mahue rātau i roto i te kāata i te koki 45 waeine. I whakaahuatia e ia te riri i tana kitenga i tētahi kōtiro e whakaahua ana i a ia me ētahi atu e mau ana i runga i te eke, ā, ka noho "riri" tonu mō te tūtukitanga, e tohe ana kia mōhio tētahi tangata kei runga i te ara te tereina wātea, ā, me whakaweto te eke. I kī taurangi a Tēnā Pugh e kore a ia e haere anō ki te eke Smiler. I te Wenerei, ka kī atu te tuakana o Rea ki te AO "kua tino pai ake tōna hauora me tōna wairua". I pāngia hoki e Daniel Thorpe, he kaiwhakahaere kaiāwhina hōtēra tau 27 tau mai i Buxton, Derbyshire, 20 tau te pakeke o Te Hukihuki Balch mai i Leyland i Nekehire, me Manaben Chauhan, 49, o Wednesbury, West Midlands. Kua kī a Alton Towers kei te whakapā atu ki ngā tūpāpaku o te tūtukitanga me o rātau whānau. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Kua whakapā atu mātou ki ngā whānau katoa, ā, kua whakapūmau mātou ki a rātou ka homai e mātou te tautoko katoa ki ērā katoa e pā ana, ināianei, puta noa i tō rātou whakaoranga me te whakaoratanga."

title: Donald Trump ki te tīmata anō i ngā tohutohu pōti i te rā matua o te kahungatanga
summary: Me tū e te Perehitini o Amerika a Donald Trump tana huihuinga whakahau pōti tuatahi mō ngā marama maha i Tulsa, Oklahoma i te rā e whakanui ana ngā Amerika o Awherika i te mutunga o te kahungatanga.
text: Ka tū te huihuinga i te 19 o Hune, e mōhiotia ana ko "Juneteenth". I kī te whakahau a te Puhi i whakakake tana Rōpū Pākehā ki tana mahi i te toa i te Pakanga Tūmatanui me te whakamutu i te kahungatanga. E whai ana te rongo i ngā wiki o ngā whakahēnga ārai whakahāwea i whakaohotia e te matenga o Hōri Pirihi, he tangata pango, i roto i te tiakitanga pirihimana. I te tau 1921 ko te taone o Tulsa te wāhi o tētahi o ngā parekura kino rawa atu o te iwi pango i roto i te hītori o Amerika. I whakatārewatia ngā huihuinga a Tēnā Puhi, i kitea he tino nui mō te whakakaha i tōna pūtake, nā te pakarutanga o te coronavirus i Poutāpeta. E anga ana a ia ki te pōtitanga anō i Whiringa ā Rangi, engari kei muri i tana tauwhāinga Manapori, a Joe Biden, i roto i te panekōrero. E kī ana ngā korero, ahakoa he tuma tonu te huaketo, e whakaaro ana te whakahau a Tēnā Puhi ka uaua ake ki ōna hoariri te whakahē i ana huihuinga. I te pānuitanga o te wāhi, ka kōrero a Tēnā Trump ki te iti o ngā mate coronavirus i Oklahoma - i te 7,500 kēhi tētahi o ngā mea iti rawa o te whenua. "Ka tīmata mātou i a mātau huihuinga," tana kī. "Ko te mea tuatahi... ka noho ki Oklahoma, i Tulsa, Oklahoma. He wāhi hou ātaahua, he mea hou, ā, kei te titiro whakamua rātou. He mahi tino pai ta rātau mahi ki a Covid, e mōhio ana koe, i te āhua o Oklahoma. I kī a ia ka tū ētahi atu huihuinga i Pārera, i Tekihi me Arāna, engari kāore ia i kōrero he aha ngā whakatūpatotanga haumaru ka mahia, ā, mēnā ka hoatu te tawhiti pāpori. I te Wenerei hoki, ka whakakāhoretia e Tēnā Puhi ngā waea kia whakaingoa anō i ngā turanga hōia i tapaina ki ngā tauwhānui o te Rōpū, nāna i whawhai mo te mana ā-ture ki te whakakahunga i te iwi pango. He aha te take i tautohetohe ai te rā me te wāhi? Ko Juneteenth he whakamaharatanga ā-tau o te mutunga o te kahungatanga. Ahakoa ehara i te hararei a te hau, e whakanuia whānuitia ana e ngā Amerikana o Awherika. E whakanui ana i te pānuitanga o te Pānuitanga Whakawāteatanga ki ngā Amerikana o Awherika i Tekika. Ko Tekihi te āhua whakamutunga o te Confederacy - ko ngā kāwanatanga ki te tonga i wehe atu, i whakaoho i te Pakanga Tūmatanui - ki te whiwhi i te pānuitanga, i te 19 o Pipiri 1865, i ngā marama i muri i te mutunga o te pakanga. He tino nui hoki te tauwāhi o te huihuinga i Tulsa. I Me me Pipiri 1921 ka whakaekea e tētahi māpu mā te takiwā pango rangatira o Greenwood, e mōhiotia ana ko te "Black Wall Street", me ngā pū me ngā pakū - ka mate tae atu ki te 300 ngā tāngata, ā, ka whakangaromia e 1,000 ngā umanga me ngā kāinga. I te tiakitanga o te wā o te huihuinga, ka kī te kaiawhina whakahau a Te Pāpāho, a Katari Pearson i roto i tētahi kōrero e "whakakake ana te rōpū o [te toa o te Pakanga Tūmatanui o Aperahama] Lincoln, e whakakake ana te Pākehā ki te hītori o Juneteenth". I tāpiritia e ia kua "hangaia e Tēnā Puhi he pūkete angitu mō ngā Amerika pango". I tēnei wā, i karangatia e Te Hēkeretari Pēhi o te Whare Mā, a Kayleigh McEnany te rā "he rā whai tikanga" ki a Tēnā Puhi. "He rā tēnei e hiahia ana ia ki te tiritiri i ētahi o ngā kauneketanga kua mahia i a mātou e titiro whakamua ana me ētahi atu mea e hiahiatia ana, i a mātou e titiro ana ki te whakahou pirihimana," ka haere tonu a ia. Engari i whakahē te whakahau a Biden i te whakataunga, me te kaiawhina matua o Kamau Marshall e karanga ana i a Tēnā Trump he kaikiri. I whakataua hoki e te Senator o California a Kamala Harris te wā, e tweet ana: "Ehara tēnei i te kemo noa iho ki ngā rangatira mā - kei te makaia e ia he rōpū kāinga pōhiri ki a rātau." He aha atu anō kua puta? Na te matenga i tērā marama o Tēnā Pirihitini, he tangata pango kore rākau, i muri i te tūturi a te pirihimana i runga i tōna kakī i Minneapolis, i Minnesota, kua whakaoho i ngā wiki o te whakahē me te rapunga wairua mō ngā wā whakahāwea o Amerika. Ka tūtohu a Tēnā Trump i te Wenerei ko ngā turanga hōia i tapaina mō ngā tauwhānui o Te Rūnanga "kua noho hei wāhanga o tētahi taonga tuku iho o Amerika, he hītori o te Toa, te Wikitōria me te Wāteatanga". Ā muri ake ka kī te hēkeretari pēhi o te Whare Mā, a Kayleigh McEnany, ko te āheinga ki te whakaingoa anō i aua turanga he "tino tīmata-kore" mō Tēnā Puhi. E whai ana ngā kōrero a Tēnā Puhi i ngā pūrongo e tuwhera ana ngā kaiwhakahaere hōia matua ki ngā huringa i waenganui i te rapunga wairua o te motu i muri i te matenga o Hōri Pirihi. Ki te tokomaha, ko ngā tohu o te Confederacy e whakapuaki ana i tētahi wā whakahāwea. He ūnga auau ngā whakamaharatanga o te Rūnanga mō ngā kaiwhakahaere i muri i te matenga o George Floyd. I te pō o te Wenerei ka whakahekea e te hunga whakahē i Richmond, Virginia, he whakapakoko o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga. I tēnei wā, ka whakaekea e ngā kaiwhakatūtū i te taone pātata o Pokapū tētahi whakamaharatanga o te Rōpū, e whā ngā whakapakoko, e ai ki ngā pūrongo pāpāho paetata.

title: Xinjiang: Ka whakamanatia e AMERIKA ngā mana Hainamana mo te 'tūkinotanga' o ngā Pirihitini
summary: Kua pānuitia e te US he whakaaetanga ki ngā kaipōrangapū Hainamana e kī ana he kawenga mō te tūkinotanga motika tangata ki ngā iti Mohimana i Pakihi.
text: E whakapaea ana a Haina ki ngā tautāwhi maha, ki te whakatoinga whakapono me te whakakore i ngā Uighurs me ētahi atu. Ka ūkuia e nga whakamanatanga ngā painga pūtea tūhono ki a Mātau o te rangatira o te Rōpū ā Iwi ā rohe o Chen Quanguo me ērā atu mana tokotoru. E whakakāhore ana a Haina i te tūkinotanga o ngā Pirihitini i Te Uru o Te Uru. E whakaarotia ana kua herea e ngā mana tētahi miriona tāngata i roto i ngā puni mātauranga anō i roto i ngā tau tata nei. E kī ana rātau e hiahiatia ana te "whakangungu mahi" hei ātete i te whakawhanaunga me te wehewehenga. Ko Tēnā Chen, e noho ana i runga i te Politburo kaha o te Rōpū Ā iwi o Hainamana, ko ia te mana Hainamana tino rangatira e pā ana ki ngā mana o Amerika, e kī ana te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho. E kitea ana a ia hei kaihoahoa o nga kaupapa here a Beijing ki te hunga iti, a, i mua i a ia e whakahaere ana i Tibet. Ko ērā atu mana i ūkuia ko Wang Mingshan, ko te tumuaki o te Tari Haumarutanga Tūmatanui o Te Rūnanga o Te Ao; Ko Zhu Hailun, he mema matua o te rōpū i Xinjiang, me te mana haumarutanga o mua, o Huo Liujun. Ināianei he hara i roto i a Mātau te whakahaere tauwhitinga pūtea ki a rātou katoa, ā, ka whakatio ā rātou rawa ā-US. Heoi anō, e kore a Tēnā Huo e herea ki ngā rāhuitanga visa e ārai ana i ētahi atu me o rātau whānau kia kaua e tomo ki a Mātau. Kua whakatakotoria hoki ngā whakamanatanga ki te Tari Haumarutanga Tūmatanui o Te Aotearoa. I kī te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika ko Maika Pompeo e whakatau ana a Mātau ki "ngā tūkinotanga mōrearea, ā-pūnaha hoki" i te rohe. "E kore te Hononga o Amerika e tū noa i te wā e mahi ana te CCP [Rōpū Ā iwi Hainamana] i ngā tūkinotanga motika tangata e hāngai ana ki ngā Uighurs, ngā Kazakhs iwi me ngā mema o ētahi atu rōpū iti i Pakihi," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. I kī a ia e whakatakoto ana hoki a Mātau i ētahi rāhuitanga visa tāpiri ki ētahi atu mana o te Rōpū Ā iwi kāore i whai ingoatia, e whakapono ana he kawenga mō ngā tūkinotanga i Pakihi. Ka herea hoki ngā mema o tō rātou whānau ki ngā rāhuitanga. Kua tiketike kē ngā tautohetohe i waenganui i a Mātau me Haina i runga i te taiepa coronavirus me te whakatau a Haina ki te whakauru i tētahi ture haumarutanga ā-motu i Hong Kong kua anga atu ki ngā whakahē nui mai i te Uru. He aha te mahi a Haina i Xinjiang? E kī ana ngā rōpū motika tae atu ki te miriona ngā Pirihitini kua herea i roto i ngā puni whare herehere haumarutanga tiketike puta noa i te takiwā o Xinjiang. I tērā tau, i kitea e te AO ngā tuhinga māturu e whakaatu ana i ngā tāngata e 15,000 mai i te tonga o Te Whenua i tukuna ki ngā puni i roto i te wiki kotahi anake. I whakaaturia e aua tuhinga ōrite ka taea anake te tuku i ngā herehere ina "mārama hōhonu rātau ki te āhua o te ture, te hara, me te mōrearea o a rātau mahi o mua". E kī ana nga mana Hainamana e whakaakona ana nga Uighurs i roto i "ngā pūtahi whakangungu mahi" kia whawha ai i te whakararuraru whakapono taikaha. Heoi anō, e whakaatu ana ngā whakaaturanga he tokomaha e herea ana mō te whakapuaki noa i tō rātou whakapono - hei tauira, te inoi, te mau ārai rānei - mō te whai tūhononga rānei ki rāwāhi ki ngā wāhi pēnei i Tāke. Ko ngā Uighurs, ko te nuinga o ngā Mohimana, he iwi tākehi, ā, tata ki te 45% o te iwi whānui o Xinjiang. I tērā marama i kitea ai e tētahi pūrongo a te tohunga o Haina a Adrian Zenz e whakahau ana a Haina i ngā wāhine i Pakihi, kia whakaurua rānei ki ngā pūrere ārai. Na te rīpoata i āki ngā karanga aowhānui kia tūhuratia e nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao.

title: Kua whakaaetia ngā 'superhubs' o te waka tūroro o Worcestershire
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere hei hoko i ngā teihana waka tūroro e toru me te waihanga i ngā "superhubs" hōu e rua i Worcestershire.
text: I kī te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o West Midlands ka whiwhi ngā teihana i Spetchley Road, Worcester me Barnsley Hall Drive, Bromsgove ki tētahi whakamohoa £1.45m. Ka whiwhi rāua tahi i tētahi waka 24 haora me te whare whakarite waka tūroro. E toru ngā teihana, i Kidderminster, Evesham me Redditch, ka whakakapia ki te nui ake o ngā teihana hapori utu iti. I kī te ratonga waka tūroro ka "tere ake te urupare ki ngā ohorere". Kei roto i ēnei e toru ngā teihana waka tūroro hapori i Redditch, e toru i Kidderminster me te toru i Worcester, tāpiri atu ki te pokapū i Spetchley Road. 'Takaware roa' Ka marara ngā waka tūroro i whakaritea i ngā pokapū i Worcester me Bromsgrove ki ngā teihana waka tūroro hapori huri noa i te rohe mai i reira ka urupare rātou ki ngā ohotata rongoā. Ka whakaakona hoki ngā kaiāwhina hapori arā atu anō ki te tiaki i ngā tūroro i roto i ō rātou ake kāinga, kaua i A&E. I kī te ratonga waka tūroro ka whakahekea e tēnei "ngā haerenga koretake ki te hōhipera". Heoi anō, e māharahara ana a Ray Salmon, kaiwhakahaere ā-rohe mō Unison, ki te pānga o ngā huringa ki ngā kaimahi me ngā tūroro. Ka kī a ia: "Mō ētahi tūroro, hei tauira, hei tauira, he kēhi manawa rānei, tērā pea me tiki wawe rātau ki te hōhipera. " Mēnā me waea te waka urupare tere ki tētahi waka tūroro, otirā i ngā wāhi tawhiti, ka roa te takaware i mua i te taenga atu ki te tūroro, ā, ko te katoa ka pā ki te kounga o te tiaki ka whiwhi te tūroro." Ko ngā huringa he wāhanga o te aronui Make Ready e tino whakatinanatia ana i Worcestershire a tērā tau. I kī te manukura whakawhirinaki waka tūroro a Tā Graham Meldrum: "E kore e kore e tino whai painga mō ngā tūroro mā te whakaae kia nui ake ngā moni ki ngā ratonga o mua. " Ina oti te whakatinanatanga, ka whakawāteatia e Make Ready ngā rauemi ka taea te haumi anō ki te tiaki tūroro."

title: Funeral for artist Alison Lapper's son Parys
summary: Kua tū te nehunga mō te tama a te kaiwaiata a Alison Lapper, nāna i whakatakoto mō tētahi whakairo rongonui o Trafalgar Square i a ia e hapu ana i a ia.
text: I mate ohorere a Parys Lapper i tērā wiki i te 19 o ona tau. Ko tōna whaea, i whānau mai me ngā waewae poto, ā, kāore he ringa, i whakatakoto tahanga mō te mahi toi i runga i te paepae tuawhā o te tapawhā i te tau 2005. I roto i tētahi takoha tuhituhi i pānuitia i Worthing Crematorium, ka kī a Ms Lapper: "He hōnore tōku noho hei whaea mōu." Neke atu i te kotahi rau nga kaieke paihikara i kawe i a Parys i tana haerenga whakamutunga mai i te kāinga o te whānau i Shoreham-by-Sea, West Sussex. I tū te whānau i tētahi whare tuwhera i te ahiahi o te Tūrei kia whakapaipaitia e ōna hoa, kia peita, kia whakapiri i ngā karere, ki te waitohu rānei i o rātau ingoa ki runga i tana kāwhena wātea. I kī tētahi reta, i pānuitia mō Ms Lapper i te karakia: "E Parys, ka noho tonu koe hei tama merekara ātaahua mōku. " Mai i te tuarua i puta mai ai koe ki waho me te hāparangi i tō māhunga, ka aroha ahau, ā, nāu tōku ngākau. "I ētahi wā, he tino tairongo, he ngāwari koe, ka noho māua i runga i taku moenga mō ngā haora, ā, ka tākaro koe ki ōku matimati." I mutu: "Ka noho tonu koe hei wāhanga mōku, he hōnore mōku te noho hei whaea mōu, kāore au e hapa mō te ao." I taurimatia tahitia e Ms Lapper te whakaaturanga 2016 BBC Four No Body's Perfect me te kaiwhakaahua ahua o Rankin, e hōpara ana i te pānga o te whakaahua mamati, te pāpāho pāpori me te ahurea kiriāhua ki te āhua o te tuakiri o te tangata. I puta hoki a Parys i runga i te mata hei tētahi o ngā whetū i runga i te rangatū o te Tamaiti o Tō Tātau Wā, e aroturuki ana i ngā pēpi mano tau mai i tō rātou tamarikitanga ki tō rātou oranga pakeke.

title: Ngā hiri X Factor: I hoki mai ngā kurī o Te Motu o Tangata ki te mohoao
summary: E rua ngā punua hiri i whakaorangia ki te hauora i muri i to rātau paenga i te takutai o Te Motu o Tangata i te rangi āwhā, kua tukua anō ki te mohoao.
text: I whakaorangia ngā hiri i tapaina ki ngā kaiwhakawā X Factor, a Gary (Barlow) me Tulisa (Contostavlos) i te whā wiki noa iho o te pakeke. Ko nga punua te mea hou rawa kia whāngaia e Jenny Corran i te Manx Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals. I kī a Ms Corran i "rekareka a ia ki te kite i a rātau e hoki ana ki te wāhi e noho ana rātou". Kua whakaorangia, kua whakahokia e te MSPCA neke atu i te 100 ngā hiri mai i te tau 2001. Ka kī a Ms Corran: "Ka tae mai rātau ki raro i te taumaha, ā, ka āwhina mātou i a rātau ki te whakahoki anō i to rātau kaha i runga i te kai hupa ika, ngā huaora me te herring. ' Will to fight' "Ka tukua anake e mātou ina 100% rite. " Kāore koe i te rangirua mēnā ka mahia e rātou, kāore rānei - e mōhio ana koe ka mahia e rātau nā te mea kei a rātau te hiahia ki te whawhai." Ina whānau mai ngā kurī e 12 kirokaramu te taumaha, ā, ka taea e te kurī hiri hauora te taumaha ki te 60 kiroki i roto i te toru wiki.
