Ka kī a Ms Corran: "Ka wete hāngai tonu te whaea, ka hoki ki te moana ki te hī ika. " Me whakaheke e nga kurī o rātau koti mā, ā, tata tonu te ako ki te hī ika. "Mēnā he huarere kino e kore rātau e hī ika. Kia taea ai e rātau te hoki ki te taumaha whānau, ā, koia tātau e haere mai ai." Ahakoa he tirohanga mōhio ngā hiri kiwikiwi huri noa i te Motu o Tangata, ko rātou tētahi o ngā hiri tino onge o te ao. E ai ki te Manx Wildlife Trust, tata ki te 40 ngā kurī e whānau ana i ngā wai o Manx i ia tau. Kei te whakangote tonu te MSPCA i Ard Jerkyll i ngā hiri e toru ko Haimona (Cowell), Nicole (Scherzinger) me Cheryl (Cole) ki te hauora, ā, ka whakarite kia tukua rātou ki te mutunga o te marama.

title: He nui te hukarere, engari he iti ake ngā rā retihuka, e kī ana a Ski-Scotland
summary: He hōhonu ake te hukarere o ngā pokapū reti o Pākehā i ētahi taunga Alpine i tēnei tau, engari he iti ake ngā rā e taea ai te retihuka.
text: I kī a Ski-Scotland e 235,303 ngā rā kaihīrere o te tau, ā, tata ki te £23.7m mō te whakahaerenga o Pākehā. Engari i heke tērā i te wā o Whiringa 2012 ki Me 2013 i te wā e 290,996 ngā rā reti, neke atu i te £29m. Ko ngā hau tiketike me te hukarere hōhonu rawa kua whakapaetia mō te hinganga. I ētahi wā ka nui ake te wā e whakapau ana ngā kaimahi o te pokapū retihuka ki te keri i ngā oma, ngā tows me ngā tūru i tā rātou hoko tīkiti. Ko te tapeke, ko te wā hou e 441 ngā rā mahi puta noa i ngā taunga e rima o Pākehā - CairnGorm, Glencoe, Glenshee, Nevis Range me The Lecht. I kī a Heta Negus, o Ski-Scotland: "I te mutunga o Hānuere, he hōhonu ake te hukarere i runga i te nuinga o ngā papa o runga o Pākehā i tērā i ngā taunga rongonui o te ao i te Alps, Pyrenees, tae atu ki ngā Rockies. " Ko te mea, e rua ngā hōhonu o ētahi ara i ngā Highlands i ērā o rāwāhi - ā, ka haere tonu mai te hukarere." Ko te tikanga o te rā retihuka, ko te tangata kotahi e retihuka, e huka ana rānei i te rā kotahi. He maha ngā wā e hoki ana ki ngā pākeke i te tau.

title: Coronavirus: 'Kāore au i te mōhio ki a au anō me te kore mahi whakangungu'
summary: "Kua tuihono katoa te whare wānanga. Ko te tikanga kia haere ahau ki Parihi - kua ngaro tērā. Kua whakakorea katoatia ngā whakaritenga pāpori i mahia e au ki te uni."
text: Nā Kameron VirkNewsbeat te kaipānui a Rebekah Dussek, pērā i te tikanga o te katoa, e ngana ana ki te noho i te kāinga me te whakaiti i tana hoapā pāpori i te nuinga o te wā e taea ana nā te pakarutanga o te coronavirus. Engari pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, kei te māharahara a ia ki te pānga o te kore e āhei ki te whakapau wā i te whare tākaro ki tōna hauora hinengaro. E aroha ana a Repeka ki te whare tākaro nā te mea "ina tino kaha koe ki te pana i a koe anō, koia anake tāu e whakaaro ana". "Kāore e taea e koe - ina tino tere tō rere - e whakaaro ana ki tētahi atu mea," tana kī atu ki a Radio 1 Newsbeat. E kī ana te tauira hītori tau 22 tau ki te mahi uaua i roto i te whare tākaro ka tino "āhua whakatutukitanga" ki a ia. I to mātau kōrero ki a Rebekah, kei te tuwhera tonu tana whare tākaro, ahakoa he tokomaha kua kati puta noa i te UK. As well as the physical impact of gym exercise, Rebekah says the classes "feel like a community" to her. E whā ngā wā i te wiki i te whare tākaro, e mōhio ana ia ki te hiahia o ngā kaiako rerekē ki te whakahaere i ā rātou akomanga me ngā kōrerorero ki ētahi atu kaiako i mua i te haerenga. Rebekah says the gym is great for helping her with depression - even if that's just because it gets her out of the house. Nō reira mēnā kotahi anake tana haere ki waho i te rā, "koia tēnā e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi i taku wā". "I tētahi wā ka kati rātou, kātahi ka mahi ahau i taku ake mahi," tana kī. "Engari i a rātau e tuwhera tonu ana, ka tino ngana ahau ki te haere ki ngā mea katoa e taea ana e au." Ko ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga i tēnei wā kia karo i ngā huihuinga me ngā wāhi kōpikopiko - pēnei i ngā whare tākaro. I tētahi rā o te wiki pūnoa, ka whakawhitiwhiti a Kate O'Flaherty i tana akoranga nēhi ākonga me tana mahi wā, me te whakarite wā kia kite i te whānau me ngā hoa - me te pupuri i tētahi mahi whakangungu. E kī ana te pakeke e 21 tau he tino hira te mahi hei āwhina i a ia ki te mahi i te māharahara me te pouri. 'It's something I've taken for granted' But with Ireland on lockdown - schools, colleges and other public buildings have been closed since last week - Kate says: "I feel like I don't really know myself now that I'm not able to do anything." "I te whakaaro ahau 'Aue, ka taea e au te arotahi ki te whare tākaro'. Kātahi ahau ka whiwhi kuputuhi mai i taku whare tākaro e kī ana kei te kati katoa ngā whare tākaro i Dublin. "Kei te mōhio ahau he mea noa iho tēnei mea kua tangohia e au tae noa ki tēnei wā." Kua tino pai a Kate i te rā o te hōtoke i Dublin ki te haere ki waho ki te whakakī i tōna whare tākaro. "E taunaki ana rātau mēnā ka taea e koe te haere ki waho, haere ki te hīkoi - kia tawhiti atu tō pāpori i te katoa - me mahi tēnā. " Nā reira kātahi anō ahau ka ngana ki te tiki i tētahi hau hou me te āhua o te rā." Kei te titiro hoki a Kate ki ngā mahi i te kāinga. "He nui ngā mea ka taea e koe. Kāore anō ahau kia tīmata, engari he mea tino hiahia ahau ki te titiro mō ngā wiki e rua e whai ake nei." Kī tonu a YouTube i ngā mahi mahi, mai i te ioka ki te whakangungu wā kaha tiketike, ā, he maha ngā kaiwhakaako whaiaro e tuku ana i ngā akoranga tuihono i tēnei wā. 'He mea tino nui te ngaronga o te mahi mahi' Engari ka māmā ērā ki te kata - he mea e kī taurangi ana te kuini tōia o Dolly Trolley ki tana karaehe hākinakina roma ora. I te nuinga o te wā ka tū ā-tangata ngā akomanga hākinakina a Dolly, engari kāore te kaiwhakangahau pārekareka me te kaiwhakangahau pārekareka i pīrangi kia mutu nā te coronavirus - nā reira ka whakamaua kētia e ia i tōna rūma noho. "Koia te mea e hiahiatia ana e te tangata i tēnei wā. He āhua kata, he takunga ki te whakamau i ētahi lycra me te whai wāhi ki te kanikani, kia neke me te waihanga i ētahi hapori me te ngātahitanga," tana kī atu ki a Newsbeat. E kī ana a Dolly ko te mahi whakangungu he "mea tino nui kia tangohia atu i a koe". "Nā reira e whakaaro ana ahau he mea e hiahiatia ana e te tangata i roto i o rātau oranga. " Me ngana tātau ki te pupuri i te āhua o te pūnoa, me te āhei ki te mahi i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e tātau kia mau tonu." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: Leo Latifi: Ko te takanga o te kākahu i patua ai te tama 'kāore i te mau haumaru'
summary: Kāore i "mau haumaru" ki te pakitara tētahi wae kākahu i hinga, a, ka patua tētahi taitama e iwa tau e piki ana ki runga, kua rongo tētahi uiuinga.
text: I mate a Leo Latifi i te whara nui o te upoko i muri i te tūtukitanga o tōna māhunga i runga i te tēpu i te takanga o te pouaka i Me 2019. I haere a ia ki tētahi karapu kaukau i muri i te kura i te Kura Tuarua o Great Baddow i Chelmsford, Essex. Tērā pea ka "tino kore" kia takahuri te wae mehemea i whakaūngia ki te pakitara, ka rongo te uiuinga. I whakamutua e tētahi hūri i te Kōti o Chelmsford Coroner he aituā te matenga o Leo i "tino āwhina ki te kore aromatawai i tētahi mōrea mārama, mārama hoki nā te kore e haumaru anō tētahi wae kākahu ki tētahi pakitara mārō". I kī a Michael Goodwin, tētahi tohunga pūkaha pūkaha, kāore anō kia "whirihora tika" te wae kākahu. I kī te koroni matua o Essex, a Caroline Beasley-Murray, i whakapono te tohunga he "mōrea mārama ka hinga te wae". I te whakarāpopototanga o ngā whakaaturanga a Tēnā Goodwin, ka kī a ia: "I tōku whakaaro kāore i tika te whirihora o te wae kākahu i te mea kāore i haumaru ki te pakitara mā te whakamahi i ngā pūkenga whakatika i whakaratoa e te kaiwhakanao. I rongo te uiui kua nekehia nga pouaka i te wā i whakatakotoria ai te papa hou i te tau 2013-14, ā, "tino pea" i whakaūngia e ngā tīwiri ki te pakitara i mua i tēnei. I kī a Paul Draper, te kaiwhakahaere pakihi i te Kura Tuarua o Great Baddow, "kua aromatawaia he pūmau, he haumaru, he tika hoki mō te whāinga". I kī atu a ia ki te uiuinga kua takina rātau i te wā o te arotaupū i te tau 2017, engari kāore a ia i kimi i ngā whakatikatika ki te pakitara. "I whakamātau ahau ki te neke. E 17 kohatu ahau. Kāore i taea e au te neke," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Goodwin he "iti rawa" te tikanga taki a Tēnā Draper. I kī ngā mātua o Leo, a Eddie rāua ko Natalie Latifi i te matenga o ta rāua tama i "te mamae kino rawa atu e taea ana te whakaaro". "Kua mārama mātou ināianei kia kaua tēnei tūkinotanga e puta," ka kī rātau i roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina e o rātau rōia. "I whakawhirinaki mātou ki te kura nāna i whakarato ngā wāhi mō ngā akoranga kauhoe, ā, i tūmanako mātou kia haumaru aua kāinga. " Ko te mōrea nui i puta mai i tētahi wae kākahu nui e kore e haumaru ki te pakitara, ko te tikanga kia mārama ki te hunga whai tūnga kawenga i te kura." I kī a Mrs rāua ko Mrs Latifi i tūmanako rāua ko te matenga o ta rāua tama, ko te tikanga "kāore e whakaaetia kia pā mai ngā mahi ōrite kia kore ai tētahi atu whānau e pā ki to mātau mamae". Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Kei mua te tautohetohe haumarutanga ā-ipurangi o US-Haina
summary: E noho ana i to rātau tihi i California i tēnei wiki ka kitea e Perehitini Xi Jinping rāua ko Perehitini Pakihi tētahi take hou e tata ana ki te tihi o ta rāua rārangi take: ko te tāhaetanga a ngā mūrere Hainamana o ngā mea ngaro arumoni, hokohoko hoki a Amerika.
text: Ko te korero kōrero a Damian GrammaticasChina Cyber security, e ai ki te karangatanga nui, kua korerotia mai ki a au, ko te tau rua i runga i te rārangi o ngā māharahara e whakaarahia ana e te US ki te kaiārahi hou o Haina. Mā tērā anake e tuarua ki ngā māharahara o Amerika mō Kōrea ki te Raki, e māharahara ana te Whare Mā ki te hōtaka karihi o Ūngia me ngā tuma o mua tata nei ki te whakarewa i ngā whakaekenga ki ngā ope me ngā pirihitini o Amerika, me tētahi take kōhukihuki kē atu i a Hiria, i Irana rānei. Ahakoa e toru, e whā tau rānei ki mua, kāore i tino mōhiotia te tūtei ā-ipurangi. Ko te mea i akiaki i tōna pikinga whakaharahara, ko te whakaaro i roto i a Mātau kua pākaha ināianei te tāhaetanga o ngā mōhiohio a ngā mūrere Hainamana mai i ngā kamupene o Amerika. I kī te tauine 'māharahara' o Kenneth Lieberthal, tētahi kaiwhakahaere o mua mō Āhia i runga i te Kaunihera Haumarutanga ā-Motu a Perehitini Bill Kikorangi, ā, ināianei i te Whare Wānanga o Brookings, "he tino mōhio mātou ki ngā mea e tāhaetia ana e rātou, ā, he tino nui te nui." I a ia e kōrero ana i Beijing, ka kī mai a Tēnā Lieberthal ki a au "me tino māharahara te ngaronga o taua tauine o ngā mōhiohio proprietary". "Ka pā ki te whakataetae o Amerika, ka pā ki te hiahia o ā mātou kamupene ki te haumi i roto i ngā mahi hou mēnā ka tika ngā hua ki tētahi atu wāhi. Ka pā ki ngā mahi a Amerika, nā reira he tino nui rawa ngā take. A, ko tētahi e nui ana te aro atu ki tēnei taumata." He uaua te take i te mea ko te tau tuatahi me te rua o nga rangatiratanga o te ao i tēnei rā. E hiahia ana ngā kamupene Amerika ki te hoko ki Haina, ā, e hiahia ana ki te uru ki tōna mākete. E hiahia ana ngā kamupene Hainamana ki te haumi ki Amerika. Kei te hiakai a Haina ki ngā hangarau arā atu anō. Engari e whakatūpato ana te US e kore te tāhae i a rātou e mahi ki ngā painga mo te wā roa o Haina, e āwhina rānei ki te whakawhanake i tōna ake ahurea hou. I reira te tauwhitiwhiti ki te kite i te Kōrero Tumuaki Whakahaere o US-Haina i Beijing i tēnei wiki. He maha ngā kaiārahi pakihi matua o AMERIKA me Hainamana, ngā kaiwhakahaere taumata kāpata o nāianei, o mua, ngā kaiwhakahaere me ētahi atu e kōrerorero ana i ngā wāhi hokohoko me te pūtea penapena. I waenganui i ngā kamupene o Amerika e whakaaturia ana ko ngā matua hinu pēnei i a Exxon Mobil me ngā rorohiko hangarau pēnei i a Microsoft me te Western Digital Corporation. Engari i muri i ngā menemene mō ngā whakaahua rōpū, e whakahau ana ngā whika pakihi tino kaha o Amerika i to rātau kāwanatanga kia mahi. He pūrongo i tērā marama e te Komihana takitahi i runga i te Tāhaetanga o te Rawa Hinengaro o Amerika i ngaro ai te US mai i te tāhae IP i te $300bn (£192bn) i te tau. E kī ana ko te 50-80% o ngā tāhae i whakaarotia e Haina. I kī mai a Ryan Lance, te manukura me te Tumuaki Whakahaere o te hinu nui o ConocoPhillips, ki a au ko ngā māharahara mō ngā whakaekenga ā-ipurangi he wāhi kōrero nui i te kōrero a te CEO. "Ka whiwhi mātou i ngā urutomo ki roto i ā mātou pūnaha i ia rā," tana kī. "I haere mai rātau i te ao katoa, nā reira ehara i te take noa iho ki Haina. Engari ko te tikanga, hei kamupene, me pare mātou i ā mātou raraunga, pare i ā mātou rawa hinengaro, ā, he nui te wā me te kaha ki te mahi i tēnā." I te pēhitanga mēnā kei te ūkuia ngā rorohiko a ConocoPhillips mai i Haina, ka kī mārama, "E whakapono ana mātou. Āe." Kātahi anō ka whakapaea e te Pentagon ngā mūrere Hainamana ki te tāhae i te hangarau waea mai i ngā kaikirimana o Amerika. I waenganui i ngā mōhiohio i tangohia, e whakapono ana he hoahoa mō te kairiri whakamoho hōu rawa o Amerika, te F-35, mō ngā hepaoro me ngā kaipuke riri, ngā tūroro Patriot, me ngā pūnaha ārai tūroro tino hōhonu o Amerika. Tērā pea i whakakino, i whakamā hoki aua tāhae ki Amerika, engari, i te tūmataiti, e kī ana ngā mana e whakaae ana ngā taha e rua ka ngana tonu ngā iwi ki te tāhae i ngā mea ngaro hōia me ngā mea ngaro tōrangapū i a rāua anō. He rite tonu te mahi a te US ki Haina. E kī ana a Xu Guangyu, tētahi tianara PLA o mua, "He aha te utiuti nei? Ko te tiki mōhiohio, otirā ko ngā mōhiohio hōia mai i ētahi atu whenua, kāore i tīmata noa iho ki te ipurangi. Kua hia rau tau te tūtei. He pūnoa." Engari ko te mea e pā ana ki Amerika, ko te āhua nei kei muri te āhua o Hainamana i tētahi whakahau kōnohete e hāngai ana i ngā mōhiohio tairongo, hangarau rānei e puritia ana e ngā umanga tūmataiti o Amerika. He maha ngā kamupene e manawapa ana ki te whakaatu i ngā mōhiohio kua ngaro i a rātou. Engari e mōhiotia ana ko waenganui i ngā ūnga i roto i a Mātau ko ngā kamupene pēnei i a Koka Koro, ngā kamupene pāpāho pēnei i te The New York Times me ngā waehere pūtake kei te ngākau o ngā pūnaha a Google. I kī a Google i whakatakina e ia te kōpeketanga o ana rorohiko neke atu i te toru tau ki mua ki tētahi kāreti hangarau i te takiwā o Shandong. I whakakāhore te kāreti he pānga ki nga whakaekenga. Engari e kī ana a Kenneth Lieberthal kei te mahi te US i te tāhae ā-ipurangi hei take tūmatanui, e whakapono ana he whakaaturanga mārama kei roto te hōia a Haina. "E rua ngā rōpū nui i Haina e pā ana ki te nui o te tūkinotanga," tana kī. "He tino pai te whakarite. Kei ia rā, he tino pūkenga rātau, otirā i te urutomo. Engari kāore rātau i te pūkenga ki te hīpoki i o rātau riu, ā, he tino pai to mātau whakaaro ko wai rātou." Tērā pea ka kōrerotia e Tēnā Xi o Haina i to rātau tihi kua honoa tētahi wae o te Ope Whakaora a te Iwi Hainamana i Shanghai ki ngā whakaekenga. Kua whakamāramatia e te umanga hangarau o Amerika Mandiant he pēhea te āhua o te wae PLA i muri i ngā whakaekenga ki ngā kamupene tūmataiti o Amerika. A, e kī ana a Kenneth Lieberthal ka kī te perehitini o Amerika me whakahaere anō a Haina i nga tāhae ipurangi. I te tōrangapū kei te tino whakahaua te take i Amerika. Koia tērā te take i tino tiketike ai te rārangi take, ā, ki te kore a Haina e mahi, ka mōrearea ngā tāhae a ngā kamupene tūmataiti ki te tūkino i ngā pānga o Amerika-Hainamana. "Kei tēnei ngā āhuatanga katoa e paitini ana i tētahi pātahitanga," te kī a Tēnā Lieberthal. "Mai i te tirohanga a te tangata whenua o Amerika, ko Haina Ā iwi tēnei e haere mai ana ki te tāhae i a tātau mea ngaro me te whakamahi ki a mātau. Ko te whakaahua kino rawa atu o te whenua, ā, ko te whanonga Hainamana e whāngai ana i taua atahanga." I ētahi wā e kī ana a Haina kāore i te mārama, kāore rānei e taea te whakatau, ā, he tūkino hoki i ngā whakaekenga a Amerika. Engari he nui rawa te rapu tere tuihono kia kite ai i te nui o te mahi a Haina i ngā whakaekenga ā-ipurangi. Ka kitea e koe ngā tāngata e tuku ana i ngā akoranga i roto i te hacking, ngā pūmanawa hacking mō te hoko, tae atu ki ngā mūrere Hainamana hei utu. Ka tukuna e rātou ki te tāhae mōhiohio māu, mō te $30 rānei i te haora, tangohia tuimotu tētahi paetukutuku e hiahia ana koe. Kei te hurihuri a Haina i ngā rārangi pūmanawa rorohiko māmā, pūkenga hoki. Ko ētahi ahakoa kāore i te whakarewa i ngā whakaekenga, engari kei te mahi rātou ki te aukati i a rātou. Mai i ngā tari i Beijing, kei te hanga waehere tētahi rōpū papatono hei pare i ngā pūnaha mai i ngā whakaekenga DDOS. Ka āwhina te umanga, a Nexusguard, ki te pare i ngā kamupene i Āhia, Amerika me Uropi i ngā tūkinotanga tuihono. E whakapono ana a William Guo, te kaiwhakahaere hangarau o Nexusguard, ka taea e ngā mūrere Hainamana te whiwhi moni nui. "He tino noa iho ēnei momo whakaekenga," tana kī. "He tino ngāwari ki te whakarewa, ā, he uaua ki te whakamauru. Mai i ngā whakaekenga i kitea e au, ko te nuinga mō te moni." I kī a ia ka utua ngā mūrere ki te whakaeke i ngā pūnaha a tētahi atu, ki te ngana rānei ki te kōkuhu i ngā kamupene, ā, kua rongo ia i ngā kerēme i whiwhi tētahi rōpū mūrere i neke atu i te $10m i mua i te maunga. Ko te mea kāore pea a Tēnā Pakihi e kōrero ki a Xi Jinping, ko te mea tonu ka mahia e te US ki te kore a Haina e āwhina ki te whāwhā i ngā tāhaetanga. Engari kei te piki haere te pēhanga kia urupare a Mātau, i te mea kei te tūkino te hara ā-ipurangi i ngā kamupene me ngā mahi a Amerika, e whakakino ana i te whakataetae me te mahi hou o Amerika. E ai ki te whakatūpato a Tēnā Lieberthal: "Mēnā ka tīmata mātou ki te kite i te nui o ngā hua e whakaatu ana i ngā hangarau tāhae mai i a Mātau, e whakaaro ana ahau ka kite koe i ngā mehua i te mutunga ka whakaritea he utu, e ārai ana i aua taonga mai i a Mātau, ki tētahi atu kupu e ngana ana ki te huri i te tātai ohaoha mēnā kāore e tika ana ngā hua o te whakaaro ki te kāwanatanga o Haina."

title: Kōtaha Haina - tirohanga whānui katoa
summary: Ko Haina te whenua tino nui rawa o te ao, me te ahurea motukore e tata ana ki te 4,000 tau.
text: Ko te nuinga o ngā huānga e hanga ana i te tūāpapa o te ao hou i takea mai i Haina, tae atu ki te pepa, te paura, te pēke nama, te kāpehu me te moni pepa. Neke atu i te rua tekau tau i whakarākeitanga ai a Haina i raro i te ture ā Ihu mārō a te kaiwhakaū o te Whenua o te Iwi, o Mao Zedong. Engari ināianei kei Haina te rangatiratanga tere rawa o te ao, ā, kei te whai i ngā mea kua whakaahuatia hei hurihanga mahi tuarua. Kua whakarewaina hoki e ia tētahi hōtaka hōpara mokowā nui, e whakauru ana i ngā mahere hei whakatatū i tētahi teihana mokowā i te tau 2020. I whakatūria te Whenua o te Iwi o Haina (PRC) i te tau 1949 i muri i te hinganga o te Rōpū Ā iwi i te Kuomintang i roto i tētahi pakanga tūmatanui. I hoki te Kuomintang ki Taiwana, e rua ngā tūnga Hainamana tauwhāinga - te PRC i te tuawhenua me te Whenua o Haina i runga anō i Taiwana. E kī ana a Beijing ko te motu o Taiwana he wāhanga o te rohe Hainamana me whakakotahi anō ki te tuawhenua. I mua, na te kerēme i ahu mai ki te tanuku me ngā tuma o te whakaekenga, engari mai i te tau 2008 kua neke ngā kāwanatanga e rua ki tētahi āhuatanga pāhekoheko ake. Na te kaiārahi o Mao Zedong i whakahaere te whakatinanatanga kino o tētahi kitenga ā Ihu o te iwi. E hia miriona i mate i roto i te Pekenga Nui Whakamua - he hōtaka whakahaere kāwanatanga i runga i te ahuwhenua me te tere o te mahi mahi - me te Hurihanga Ahurea, he ngana hūkere ki te pakiaka i ngā huānga e kitea ana he whakahē ki te ture ā Ihupuku. Heoi anō, na te matenga o Mao i te tau 1976 i tīmata ai tētahi kaiārahi hou me te whakahou ohaoha. I te tīmatanga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, ka wetewetehia e te kāwanatanga te pāmu huihuinga, ā, ka whakaaetia anō te hinonga tūmataiti. Kāore anō kia ōrite te mokatere o te huringa ohaoha ki te whakahou tōrangapū, me te Rōpū Ā iwi - te rōpū tōrangapū nui rawa o te ao - e pupuri ana i tōna mana whakahaere me te pupuri i te mana pākaha ki te iwi. Kai te whāwhā tonu nga mana i nga tohu ātete, a, ka tukuna atu nga tautohetohe kōrero ki nga puni mahi. I ēnei rā, ko Haina tētahi o ngā tino kawekawe o te ao, ā, kei te kawe mai i te nui o te pūtea penapena kē. Heoi anō, kei te haumi i te nuinga o ngā tāra ki rāwāhi. Ko te tiango o ngā mākete kaweake ao whānui i haere tahi me te raruraru pūtea o te ao whānui o te tau 2009 i te tuatahi ka pā ki Haina, engari ko tōna whakahaerenga i waenganui i te tuatahi o te ao ki te whakahoki, ka tere te hoki ki te tupu. I te wā o Hui tanguru 2011 ka mau tikatia a Tiapanī kia noho ko te rangatiratanga tuarua nui rawa o te ao, ahakoa i te tōmua o te tau 2012 ka tīmata te raruraru nama i te rohe ūropi - ko tētahi o ngā mākete nui rawa mō ngā taonga Hainamana - kua tīmata ki te tō i te tupunga o Haina. Hei mema o te Rōpū Hokohoko Ao, ka whai hua a Haina i te urunga ki ngā mākete kē. Engari kua uaua te whanaungatanga ki ngā hoa tauhokohoko i runga i te nui o te hokohoko a Haina me te tāpaetanga taonga. Nā te tuatahi i tono ai a Beijing kia whakarewaina te uara o tana moni, te renminbi, e nui ake ai te utu o ngā taonga Hainamana mō ngā kaihoko kē, ā, tērā pea ka pupuri i ngā kawenga ake. Kua urupare a Beijing me te whakaiti i ngā rāhuitanga i runga i te hokohoko moni. E wehi ana ētahi Hainamana i te pikinga o te hinonga tūmataiti me te matenga o ngā mahi whakahaere kāwanatanga e mau ana i ngā utu pāpori taumaha pēnei i te kore mahi me te tāpepe. Waihoki, na te tere o te tipu o te mahi i whakakī te hiahia pūngao. Ko Haina te kaihoko hinu nui rawa i muri i a Mātau, me te kaiwhakanao waro nui rawa o te ao. E pau ana i a ia te nuinga tāra ki te whai i ngā pūngao kē. Tērā tētahi pūtea nui i roto i te hiko wai, tae atu ki te kaupapa $25bn Three Gorges Dam. Ko te whakaaetanga pāpori Ko te rerekētanga o te ohaoha i waenganui i te taone o Haina me ngā tuawhenua ā-taiwhenua, kei waenganui i ngā mea nui rawa o te ao. I roto i ngā tekau tau tata nei, he tokomaha nga tangata taiwhenua rawakore kua huihui ki ngā tāone ki te rāwhiti o te whenua, e hākinakina ana ki te hanganga. I te tīmatanga o te tau 2012, te āhua nei he nui ake te tokomaha o ngā kainoho o te taone i te iwi whānui ā-taiwhenua mō te wā tuatahi, e ai ki ngā whika whai mana. E whakaatu ana te riri pāpori i roto i nga whakahē a nga kaiahuwhenua me nga kaimahi. Tekau mano tāngata e haere ana ki Beijing i ia tau ki te tāpae petihana ki ngā mana i runga i te tūmanako kia kitea he whakawātea mō te hāmate whakapae, ngā tāwhiti whenua me ngā whakapūtātanga. Ko ētahi atu raruraru pēhi ko te hāmate, e pā ana ki ia taumata o te iwi, me te nui haere o te mate HIV. Ko tētahi mate o te pūkenga ohaoha ko te tūkinotanga taiao; Ko Haina te kāinga ki te maha o ngā tāone tino poke o te ao. Kei te whakahē tonu ngā kaiwhakahauhau motika tangata i a Haina mō te kawe i ngā rau tāngata i ia tau, ā, i te korenga e whakamutu i te whakamamaetanga, tae atu ki te whakatau tonu i ngā kīanga tōrangapū me ngā mahi toi. E hiahia ana te whenua ki te tohu i ngā mea e kitea ana he whakahē i waenganui i ōna iti iwi, tae atu ki ngā Uighurs Mohimana i te raki-uru. He tautohetohe te ture Hainamana mo Tibet. E whakapaea ana e ngā rōpū motika tangata nga mana o te whakangaromanga ā-pūnaha o te ahurea Puta o Tīpetiana me te whakatoinga i ngā māngai e pono ana ki te Dalai Pae, te kaiārahi wairua i peia e whakahauhau ana ki te mana motuhake i roto i Haina.

title: I wehewehea e EU te whakamahinga o te glyphosate tarutaru nui
summary: Kua rahua te pōti EU ki te whakatika i tētahi tautohetohe mo te whakamahinga o te glyphosate, te kaipatu tarutaru nui rawa o te ao.
text: I karangatia e tētahi mātauranga UN te matū "tērā pea he pukupuku", engari i kī ētahi atu kaipūtaiao he haumaru te whakamahi. I te 15 o Hakihea ka pau te raihana glyphosate o nāianei i te EU. Ko te hawhe anake o ngā kāwanatanga mema e 28 i tāruatia he tono Kōmihana o Ūropi kia whakahōu i te raihana mo te rima tau. Ināianei ka ngana tētahi komiti tono EU ki te whakahaere i te take. Ko te UK i waenganui i ngā kāwanatanga e 14 e tautoko ana i te tūnga Kōmihana i runga i te glyphosate. E iwa i pōti ki a ia - tae atu ki Wīwī me Itari. Ko Tiamana i waenganui i te tokorima i papare i a rātou. I whakaurua te Glyphosate e te mātāmua o Amerika i te tau 1974, engari i pau tōna ārai i te tau 2000, ā, ināianei kua hokona te matū e ētahi atu kaiwhakanao. Ko te kaipatu tarutaru Monsanto e kiia ana ko Roundup. E kī ana te Mana Haumaru Kai o Ūropi (EFSA) kāore e taea e te glyphosate te mate pukupuku i roto i te tangata. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā i te whakamahinga whānui o te glyphosate e whakaiti ana i te tipua tipua, mā te patu i ngā tipu e tino hiahiatia ana mō ngā ngārara maha me ētahi atu kararehe. Kua rāhuitia e ētahi whenua me ētahi rohe te whakamahinga glyphosate i ngā pāka tūmatanui me ngā māra. Kāore tōna pānga ki ngā tipu i te tīpako, ko te tikanga ka mate te nuinga o rātou ina hoatu. Pānuitia ētahi atu kōrero mō ngā matū pāmu: He pēhea te mahi a te glyphosate? I te nuinga o te wā ka whāranu ki ētahi atu matū e āwhina ana ki te uru ki roto i ngā tipu, e āraia ai tētahi ara whākōkī matua. Ka āraia e te raruraru ngā tipu kia kore ai e hanga i ētahi pūmua e hiahiatia ana mō tō rātou tipu. Ko te "ara shikimate" e whitu ngā whākōkī, e āhei ai te tipu ki te hanga waikawa amino, ngā paraka hanga pūmua. Kāore e kitea te ara i roto i ngā kararehe. Ko ētahi huawhenua, pēnei i te soybean, kua whakakētia ā-ira hei ātete i te glyphosate. Ka rehu ngā kaiahuwhenua ki ngā pārae i mua i te putanga mai o ā rātou hua i te kōanga, kia kore ai e whakataetae ngā hua ki te tarutaru. Ka whakamahia hoki e ētahi hei rongoā kotinga tōmua hei whakamaroke i ngā huawhenua, kia ngāwari ake ai te hauhake. E kī ana te UK Soil Association he mōrearea taua whakamahinga, nā te mea ka taea te whakanui ake i ngā toenga glyphosate i roto i te kai. He pēhea te whānuitanga? E whakaahuatia ana ko te kaipatu tarutaru tino rongonui o te ao. I roto i te US, neke atu i te 750 ngā hua kei roto. Kua tata ki te 15 kōpaki te whakamahi i te Glyphosate puta noa i te ao mai i te tau 1996, i te wā i whakaurua ai ngā hua e kiia nei ko "Roundup Ready", i hangaia ā-ira hei ātete i te glyphosate. E kī ana tētahi akoranga 2016 a ngā Pūtaiao Taiao o Uropi i te nui o te māharahara mō te whakamahinga nui o te glyphosate, nā te mea kua hangaia e ētahi tipu te ātete ki a ia - ko te tikanga ka nui ake te whakamahi a ngā kaiahuwhenua i te otaota. I rāhuitia e Sri Lanka te whakamahinga o te glyphosate i te tau 2015 - ahakoa e whakahē ana te umanga tī i te rāhuitanga. I te tau 2015 hoki, ka mutu te rehu ā-rangi o te glyphosate - ahakoa i whakamahia whānuitia hei patu i ngā tipu koka kore mana. He aha te pānga ki te tangata? E kiia ana he iti te tūkinotanga o te glyphosate, i roto i ngā whakamōhiotanga e whakamahia ana e ngā kaiahuwhenua, ahakoa i kīia e te UN International Agency for Research on Cancer "tērā pea he pukupuku". E kī ana te Kōmihana o Ūropi, i tua atu i te EFSA, kāore i kitea e te Pokapū Matū o Ūropi me ētahi atu tinana pūtaiao he hononga ki te mate pukupuku i roto i te tangata. E kī ana te Pānga Oneone e kitea auautia ana ngā whakataki glyphosate i roto i te parāoa. E ai ki te US National Pesticide Information Center, ko te nuinga o te matū e tere ana te haere i roto i te tinana i roto i te mimi me te feces.

title: Te tutu i te kāinga: He pēhea te āwhina a ngā whakaahua i ngā tūpāpaku ki te aroha anō ki a rātou anō
summary: Ko nga wāhine māia, māhorahora, tūmanako hoki e menemene hari ana mo te kāmera.
text: Alina IsachenkaBBC Russian I te tirohanga tuatahi, ka taea e nga whakaahua te whakaahua i nga wahine noa mai i nga wahi katoa o te ao. Engari he rerekē te kōrero a ngā whakaahua a Dasha Buben. Ko ngā kaupapa o ngā whakaahua ko ngā mōrehu o te tūkino i te kāinga i Pērara, e ai ki te Pūtea Iwi o te Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao (UNFPA), e toru i roto i ngā tāngata e whā o Pērara - ngā tāne me ngā wāhine - kua pā ki ētahi momo tutu i te kāinga. Ko Alina tētahi o rātou. "I pēnei ahau he tinana kore wahine, e tīari ana anake kia patua," te kī a te tau 22 tau. I mua, i whakahaua ia kia pau ngā haora e tīpokapoka ana i nga tiriti tata ki tōna kāinga kia mawhiti ai i ngā whakaekenga a tōna taina. "I a au e tamariki ana, he whara roro tōku, ā, ka tāruatia e taku tuakana: 'kātahi te whakamā kāore koe i mate i taua wā'," te kī a Alina. " Ka tū tonu taku whaea mōku mōna. I mataku ahau ka whara, ka whakamatea rānei ahau e ia... I te mutunga ka tīmata ahau ki te whara i a au ki te rau." 'Whakaaturia he rongoā' Engari i tētahi pō o Hānuere i tērā tau, kāore a Alina i hoki ki te kāinga. Heoi anō, i rapu rerenga a ia i Radislava - he rōpū kāwanatanga-kore e whakarato whakaruru rangitahi ana ki ngā tūkinotanga o te tūkinotanga o te kāinga. I reira ia i uru ai ki te kaupapa whakaahua I Survived. I whakatūria te hōtaka e te kaiwhakaahua o Dasha Buben, nāna i mahi tahi me tētahi kaiwaiata makawe me tētahi kaiwaiata whakapaipai ki te āwhina i ngā tūpāpaku o te tūkino i te kāinga kia hoki anō ki tō rātou whakaaro whaiaro me te kaha ake i roto i ngā rangatū poutū. "I hiahia ahau ki te whakaatu he rongoā," te kī a Dasha, tētahi kaiwhakatika whakaahua o mua i tētahi pukapuka paetata. "Kia aroha ai ngā wāhine ki a rātau anō mā te titiro ki ngā whakaahua, engari kia āhua māori hoki rātou." I uiui a ia ki tētahi hinengaro hinengaro i mua i te kopere, a, ka ngana ki te āwhina i nga wāhine kia noho pai. Engari he ngāwari kē atu te kōrero i te mahi. "I haere mai nga wāhine, a, ka tahuri atu i te kāmera. I mataku rātau. I rūrū ahau i o rātau ringa me te kōrero ki a rātau kia haumaru ai rātau," te kī a Dasha. "I whakamā ahau i to rātau titiro mai ki a au. He whakamā ki aku whakatakotoranga mārire me tōku tinana, nā te mea he iti noa iho taku taumaha," e mahara ana a Alina. Ki a ia, he tino uaua te whakatuwhera i mua i te kāmera. "I ia rā, he kōtiro haumaru, kāore au i te ātaahua i roto i te poraka whārōrō. [I te kopere whakaahua] i mahia e rātau ōku makawe me ōku whakapaipai, ā, ka mōhio ahau ka taea hoki e au te ātaahua." 'Ngā whatu atawhai' "Kāore au i te tino pēnei. He iti iho te ātaahua," te kī a Elena, e 43 tau te pakeke e titiro ana ki tētahi o ngā whakaahua. I mahue i a Elena tōna taone tupu o Vileyka me tana tama 11 tau i muri i te tūkinotanga ā-tinana a tana hoa i a ia. I whakawehi hoki a ia ki te kimi me te whakamate i a ia. Ināianei e noho ana i Minsk, e rua ana mahi kia tutuki ai ngā mutunga. "I te tīmatanga [o te kopere whakaahua] i tino ngenge ahau ka taea anake e au te noho," tana kī. "Engari kātahi ahau ka kite i a au e mahi ana i ētahi whakatakotoranga me te hākinakina." "I kī te kaiwhakaahua he kanohi tino atawhai tōku i kitea e ia. Kātahi ia ka tīmata ki te tangi. Na ko ahau hoki," te mahara a Elena. Ko te whakairi pikitia hei whakaoranga kāore he ture tauwhāiti mo te tutu i te kāinga i Pērara. Mai i te tau 2014, kua taea e ngā kōti te whakamau i ngā whakahau tautāwhi ki ngā whakapae whakapae. Ko ngā whika mai i te raina āwhina ā-motu tuatahi o te whenua e huatau ana he nui ake ngā tūpāpaku e haere mai ana. Engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhaiwhai he tokomaha e karo ana i te haere ki ngā pirihimana, i te unu rānei i a rātau amuamu nā te mea e wehi ana rātau e kore rātau e parea, ka kore rānei e pai te whiu e wātea ana. Ko ngā kaupapa auaha pēnei i ēnei kopere whakaahua e āwhina ana kia kitea ake te raruraru, e kī ana a Olga Gorbunova, he kaiwhakahaere i Radislava, kua pau i te 15 tau te rangahau i te take. E kī ana a ia ka taea hoki e te pāpāho pāpori te tākaro i tētahi tūranga nui i roto i te tukanga whakaora; Ka whakairihia e ngā tūkino i te kāinga ngā pikitia mai i te kopere whakaahua, ā, he maha ngā tākupu me ngā "pai". "Ahakoa te kaha o te mahi a o mātau hinengaro hinengaro ki ngā tūpāpaku, he kaha ake, he pai ake hoki te pānga o ngā kaiwhakamahi Facebook ki ngā wāhine," te kī a Olga, i a ia e tamariki ana. "Ki a au he tino kitenga tēnei." He nui tonu ngā mahi kei mua, e kī ana a Dasha ko tēnei kaupapa whakaahua te tino uaua i roto i tana mahi 13 tau. I te mutunga, ka tapahia e ia ōna makawe "hei tuku i te hauā me ngā āhuatanga tōraro". "Ko te whāinga ki te hanga i ngā poutū, i te tuatahi, ko te tuku haumanu ā-hinengaro me tētahi tukanga whakaae ki a ia anō, tae atu ki te whai wāhi ki te whakawhanake i te whakaaro whaiaro," te kī a te kaiwhakaahua. "Engari he nui tonu ngā mahi kei mua." E whakaaro ana a Alina me nui ake tana mahi hei whakapai ake i tōna whakaahua whaiaro. "Ka taea e au te whakaae ki tōku tinana, engari kāore i te katoa. Ināianei me kimi ahau, me whakaae ko wai ahau," tana kī. Ko tana whāinga mo te wā poto ko te noho hei moko - ehara i te mea iti rawa ki te peita i runga i tētahi riu i runga i tōna tinana, e tino pouri ana a ia ināianei. "Engari he mahi noa iho tēnei ki te mahi moni," tana kī. "Ko taku moemoeā tūturu ko te noho hei hinengaro hinengaro hei āwhina i ngā tūkinotanga i te kāinga pēnei i a au." .

title: Ka rere te kaipuke utanga o Rūhia i te takutai o Cornwall
summary: I rere tētahi kaipuke utanga Rūhia 16,000 tan i tētahi one i Cornwall.
text: Tata ki te 05:40 GMT ka tū te Kuzma Minin i Gyllyngvase Beach i Falmouth. I whakapuakina e te Maritime and Coastguard Agency (MCA) tētahi mahi nui, ā, i kī mai he rārangi o te kaipuke 590ft (180m) tata ki te rima waeine. Ko te oko nui, e 18 ngā kaimahi Rūhia i runga i te papa, engari kāore he utanga, i whakaterea anō i roto i tētahi mahi "māminga, mārire" i te tai tiketike. E toru ngā waka whanga me tētahi waka whakaora i tōia te kaipuke i te one i muri noa iho i te 14:00. I kī a Marc Thomas, te kaiwhakahaere mahi takutai matua, kua whakahaua te kaitiaki taiwhenua kia mahi "tino uaua ki te nekeneke i ngā oko" i roto i ngā āhuatanga hau. I kī ngā rongo hou mai i Cornwall me te rangatira whanga o Kuzma Minin Falmouth, a Mark Sansom: "He mahi angitu, he pai hoki tēnei mahi e pā ana ki ngā umanga maha. " E hiahia ana mātau ki te mōhio ki te mahinga tino pai o te kaihautū me nga kaimahi oko katoa i roto i tētahi mahi tino uaua. "Kua mauria te Kuzma Minin ki Falmouth Bay ki te punga, kia taea ai te tirotiro." I kī te kaitiaki tairāwhiti kāore he pūrongo pokenga. I rahua tētahi mahi tōmua ki te whakatere anō i te kaipuke i te pakarutanga o ngā taura tō. Na te tīma hepaoro i wīwī ngā mema o te kaitiaki moana ki runga i te kaipuke i mua kia taea ai te tirotiro i nga kaimahi o Kuzma Minin. I whakatūpato a Supt Matthew Longman mai i ngā Pirihimana o Devon me Cornwall i ngā mema o te iwi whānui kia noho atu i te one i rere ai te kaipuke. "He mea nui kia mōhio te iwi whānui kāore he utanga i runga i tēnei kaipuke," tana kī. "E maumahara ana tātau katoa ki nga tirohanga i te wā i rere ai te Napoli i te rāwhiti o Devon. E wehi ana ahau kāore he taonga pērā i runga i te Kuzma Minin." I kī atu a Rawiri Barnicoat ki te AO te āhua nei he "taunga tauhira". "Te āhua nei i tōia e ia te punga, ā, kāore pea i rite ngā mīhini, tērā pea he raruraru anō tāna," tana kī. "Ina pakaru taua punga i te moenga moana, ā, ka tīmata koe ki te tō, kāore ō mana." Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu, a Megan Hocking, e "whakaaro ana ia ki ngā tāngata katoa i runga i ngā tāhae me te poti whakaora - he āhuatanga wehi mō tētahi mahi whakaora". I whakaahuatia e te tangata whenua o Falmouth, a Jess Hughes te huarere i te takutai o Cornish he "tino nui" me te kī he "tino hau" i te pō Mane. Ko Gyllyngvase Beach he one tūruhi kirikiri tata ki te 10 meneti mai i te pokapū o te taone o Falmouth.

title: Ka pā ngā āwangawanga haumaru ki ngā tākuta ki te rāwhiti
summary: E kī ana te Pānga Āpiha Rongoā o te Kāwanatanga (GMOA) ka tīmata anō ngā tākuta i te raki me te rāwhiti ki te mahi anake mēnā ka pai ake te āhuatanga haumarutanga.
text: I haere nga tākuta ki te whakahē i te mahi mā te whakatū i te mahi i ngā hōhipera ki te raki me te rāwhiti i muri i te tākarotanga o tētahi hoa mahi, a Dr. Palitha Padmakumara i Batticaloa i te pō o te 17 o Whiringa ā Rangi. I kī atu te kaikorero mō te GMOA, a Dr. Upul Ngāsekara ki a TE AO Sandeshaya kua tukua e rātau he reta e whakamārama ana i o rātau mataku me ngā tono e hāngai ana ki te mahi hauora. Kāore i tū tētahi hui i whakaritea hei kōrerorero i te take ki te Hēkeretari Hauora, a Dr, a Athula Kahandaliyanage, i te Mane. Ko ngā rōpū patu i te rāwhiti e mōhio ana kāore nga mana hauora i mōhio ki te āhuatanga haumarutanga tūturu e kaha ana i te raki me te rāwhiti, ka kī a Dr. Ngāsekara ka tīmata anō ngā tākuta ki te mahi i Vavuniya, Mannar, Jaffna me Kāmunai mēnā ka pai ake te āhuatanga haumarutanga. I kī atu tētahi tākuta e āpiti ana ki te hōhipera o Batticaloa ki a TE AO Sandeshaya e whakawehi tonu ana ngā rōpū patu i nga kaimahi rongoā i roto i te hōhipera. "Ahakoa i whakawehitia mātau i te pū kia haere tahi me rātau ki te tiaki i ngā tūroro, kore rawa mātau i whakaaro ka patua mātau," te kī a te tākuta e hiahia ana kia noho ingoamuna. I rite tonu te noho o nga rōpū patu i te taone o Batticaloa, i tana kī, i te wā e titiro ana nga kaiāwhina ratonga haumarutanga. "Kāore ngā minita me ngā kaiwhakahaere i te mōhio mēnā he pango, he mā rānei a Batticaloa". Kāore a ia i pīrangi ki te tāutu i ngā rōpū, engari i kī te Kaitirotiro Pirihimana (IGP), te Ope Tūmahi Motuhake Pirihimana (STF) me te Ope Taua o Sri Lanka (SLA) i mōhio katoa ko wai ngā rōpū. "Ki te whakaaetia tētahi mema o ēnei rōpū ki te hōhipera, tokowhā nga mema patu e tū tiaki ana i te taha o te moenga o te tangata. Ahakoa ka haere mai te kaitohutohu mo nga whakatata kaore rātau e haere," te kī a te tākuta. "Kāore anō mātou kia whiwhi i ētahi whakaūnga haumarutanga mai i te wā i patua ai a Dr Padmakumara," tana kī atu ki a Elmo Fernando.

title: Ka wehi a Donald Trump i te taiao ā muri ake nei
summary: E kī ana tētahi rangatira o te Pākehā o Amerika e wehi ana a ia mo te wā heke mai o ana mokopuna tokowhitu me Donald Trump i te Whare Mā.
text: Na Te kaitātari taiao o Te Wānanga Taiao o Aotearoa, ko Te Upoko o te US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) i raro i a George W Bush, i whakapaea e Tēnā Puhi te waiho i te pūtaiao māia. A, ka whakatūpato a ia ko tana tuma ki te maka i ngā kaupapahere parenga āhuarangi ka mōrearea te wā heke mai o te ao. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko o te puku ko ngā ture mo te āhuarangi me te pūngao e whakararuraru ana i ngā umanga. Engari e kī ana a Ms Todd Whitman me kimi huarahi whakatairanga pakihi me te kore tūkino i te aorangi. Kāore anō kia mārama ngā taipitopito o te kaupapahere āhuarangi a Tēnā Puhi, engari kua kōrero tana tīma mō te whakarewa waro, te whakatuwhera i ngā ararere hinu hou, me te whakaae ki te kari i te koraha tūmatanui, i te keri rānei i te Tiritiri. I te taha tōrangapū, kua huatau rātau kia puta atu i te mahi āhuarangi o te ao, te tango i te mahere hiko mā a Perehitini Pakihi, me te wete i te tari pūngao o Amerika me te EPA anō. I uiuia te kāri puku a Ms Todd Whitman i runga i ngā kaupapahere tērā pea a Te Puhi mō tētahi pakipūmeka - Huringa Āhuarangi: te Kāri Tūruhi - e rere ana i runga i te Reo Irirangi 4 i te 20:00 i te Tūtira. Ka kī a ia: "He tino māharahara ki a au te āhua nei he whakahāwea ki te pūtaiao mo te pare i te taiao. " E tino māharahara ana ahau mo te wā heke mai o taku whānau me tōku whānau huri noa i te ao nā te mea kāore anō a Māmā Ao kia kite i ngā rohenga ā-whenua, ā, ko ngā mea e pā ana ki tētahi atu whenua. "Ki te haere atu i tētahi mea kei a koe te 97% o ngā kaipūtaiao e kī ana kei te puta tēnei, ā, he pānga tā te tangata ... Kua tae ki te wāhi me ngana mātou ki te whakapōturi mēnā ka ora mātou." I tautohe a ia e tuku ana a Tēnā Puhi i tētahi taonga tuku iho o te Pākehā. I hainatia e George Bush Snr te Hui Anga UN i Awatea i te tau 1992. I kī a ia, ko Aperahama Lincoln te perehitini tuatahi hei pare i te whenua tūmatanui, ā, i whakatūria e Rārangi Nixon te EPA. "He tūturu te atawhai," tana kī. "E tūmanako ana ahau kia hē a Tēnā Puhi, engari he nui rawa ō mirionea maha mai i te umanga hinu i roto i tana Kāpata. " E hiahia ana mātou kia whai hiko me te pūngao takitahi, engari ko te raruraru kei te mahi i runga i te whārite hei pare i te hauora me te taiao. Engari mai i te tirohanga a Te Puhi, te āhua nei kāore i te uru ki te whārite." Nā ngā pātai kāpata i ngā kōwhiringa a Tēnā Puhi mō ngā pou Kāpata i whakaoho ai ngā kaipūtaiao. He tokomaha o rātau kua rangirua ki te pūtaiao āhuarangi - ahakoa e kore e taea te mōhio me pēhea rātau e mahi ai i te wā kotahi. Ko te tautapa mo te Hēkeretari Pūngao ko te kāwana o Mua o Te Kāwana o Te Aotearoa, nāna i tautohe i mua mo te whakakorenga o te tari e ārahi ana ia. Ko te kōwhiringa mō te upoko o te EPA ko Scott Pruitt, e hiahia ana ki te maka i te hōtaka hiko mā e tautoko ana i te tautohe a Amerika ki te UN ki te whāwhā i te kohu CO2. Ko te kōwhiringa a Tēnā Puhi mō te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga ko Rex Tillerson, ko te upoko o te mātāmua hinu o Exxon Mobil, e tūhuratia ana mō te whakapohehe i ōna kaipupuri i runga i ngā mōrea ki te āhuarangi. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko kua nui ake te EPA i ōna mana, ā, me whakahoki anō. I kī atu a Nick Loris mai i te Tūāpapa Tuku iho libertarian ki a BBC News: "Kua ārahi a Scott Pruitt i te whakahau ki tētahi EPA tino whakatuki - he kōwhiringa e rere mohoao ana, e pākaha ana, me ngā ture nui rawa kāore he painga taiao whai tikanga. " E hiahia ana a ia ki te whakahoki i te parenga taiao ki te taumata o te āhua e pai ake ai te whakaoti i te nui o ā mātou whakamātautau taiao," tana tāpiri mai. Engari i kī a Ms Todd Whitman e tūmanako ana a ia kāore te whakahaere hou i tino taumaha i te tirohanga tuatahi. "Ina noho a ia i te tari, ka kitea e Pruitt he uaua kē atu i ta rātau i whakaaro ai," tana kī. "E tūmanako ana ka taea e rātou te whakarongo - kātahi ka tīmata ki te whakangāwari. " Ka tawhiti rawa te haere o ngā ture, ā, tērā pea he ture kua hipa atu i tō rātou whaitakenga, ā, me tapahi anō ki tētahi waeine... engari ki te maka katoa..." He uaua te matapae i te pānga o Tēnā Puhi ki te kaupapahere āhuarangi o te ao. I muri tonu i te hua o te pōti, ka whakamātauria e Haina, te EU, te UK me Tiamana - tae atu ki ngā iwi maha e tipu ana - to rātau manawa kia mau ki te mahi i whakaaetia i Parihi i tērā tau ki te whāwhā i te kohukohu. I te kāinga, e whakaarotia ana kāore e taea e Tēnā Puhi te whakatutuki i tana kī taurangi kia whakaarahia te umanga waro o Amerika nā te mea kua tahuri atu ngā kaiwhakangao i te waro ki te korohū me ngā whakahou māmā ake. Engari mēnā ka tutuki i a Tēnā Puhi te whakaiti ake i ngā utu pūngao o AMERIKA (e hua ana ētahi tātaritanga kua heke kē rātou ki ngā taumata Hainamana), tērā pea ka rongo ētahi atu iwi i te pēhanga ki te whakataetae i te utu pūngao mai i ā rātou ake mahi taumaha. A, no te tūtaki anō ngā kāwanatanga ki te whakatutuki i ta rātau kī taurangi ki te whakararuraru i ngā mea e whakaaetia ana e rātau katoa, ka tino whakararuraru pea te ngaro o Amerika i te tēpu. Engari he wawe rawa ki te whakawa. Hei tauira, ka ngana pea a Haina ki te hopu i te whenua tiketike tūturu mā te whakatika i ōna kaha ki te pare i te āhuarangi - ka tika te tango hei kaiārahi ao i roto i te tono kia parea te aorangi. Tērā pea e kore e pai ki te perehitini ā muri ake. Whāia a Roger i Twitter @rharrabin

title: Ka whati te mahi a Kraftwerk i te paetukutuku a Tate
summary: I muri i te tere ki te hoko tīkiti mō tētahi whakaaturanga o ā rātou pukaemi i te wā o Hui tanguru.
text: E waru ngā whakaaturanga e whakatangi ana ngā pūkenga hiko Tiamana i te Hōro Turbine, e whakatangi ana i tētahi pukaemi katoa i ia pō. Engari i hinga te paetukutuku a Tate i raro i te tono i te tīmatanga o te tāpuitanga i te Wenerei. I tāmia ngā raina i muri i te tohutohu a te taiwhanga ki ngā kaihautū kia ngana ki te tāpui mā tōna raina tīkiti waea. Tae noa ki te 08:50 GMT, ka kī te whārangi tīkiti i te paetukutuku a Tate: "Kātahi anō ka hokona a Kraftwerk i Tate Modern, ā, kei te pā mātou ki tētahi tono tīkiti e pā ana ki tā mātou tūmau tukutuku. I tāpiritia: "He kaimahi anō tā mātou i tēnei rā, engari he tino tiketike te tono." I te 17:15 GMT ka kī atu tētahi kaikawe kōrero o Tate ki te AO "kua hokona katoatia ngā tīkiti ki Kraftwerk - Kua hokona ināianei te Putumōhio 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8". "E mōhio ana mātou he tokomaha ngā tāngata i pā ki ngā uauatanga ki te hoko tīkiti i tēnei rā," ka haere tonu te āpiha pēhi. "I takea tēnei nā ngā taumata tono tawhito rawa mō tētahi rangatū ahurei o ngā mahinga." 'Ngā raruraru tūmau' Ahakoa te amuamu a ngā kaihautū mō tētahi uaua e rima haora ki te hoko tīkiti, ka tautāwhi te tumuaki o Tate o Nicholas Serota i te tukanga hoko. "Ehara tēnei i te paetukutuku tuatahi e tūtuki ana i te tono nui," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "He rite tonu te mahi a te pae Orangirangi." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He iti noa iho ngā tīkiti, he nui te tono, ā, e tūmanako ana ahau ka taea e mātou te whakaae ki te tokomaha o rātou." I whakairihia hoki e te taiwhanga ngā karere e whakapōhē ana mō te raruraru ki tōna whārangi Twitter. Engari i urupare ngā kaihautū riri i a rātau ake karere. Ka tūtohu a Pete Gleadall: "Kāo, kāore hoki i te mahi, kāore hoki te paetukutuku. Ki te kore e taea e koe te whakatikatika i te tono, tiki i ētahi kaihoko tīkiti ngaio e taea ana." I te tuhituhi a Steve Philips: "'Me ngana koa ki te hoko tīkiti tuihono anō ā muri ake' - āhea? He aha te mea e aukati ana i a koe ki te hoko tuihono ināianei?" I whakairihia e Lynne Dellar ki te whārangi Facebook o Tate: "Kua 2 haora ahau i runga i te waea. Kua tata pau te pātene waea anō. He pai ki te mōhio mēnā kei te moumou ahau i tōku wā kia taea ai e au te haere ki te tiki parakuihi," Kua kī hoki ētahi kaihautū kua haere ā-tangata rātau ki Tate Modern, ki te ngana ki te hoko tīkiti. I mua o te Wenerei, ka kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō Tate: "I mahi ngātahi ngā tīma ratonga IT me ngā tīkiti a Tate, ā, he hātepe kia taea ai e ōna pūnaha IT me te paetukutuku te whakahaere i te rōrahi nui o te tono. " Ka raruraru mātou ki tā mātou tūmau, koia mātou e whakahaere ana i ngā tāngata ki ngā raina waea." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka hokona e Tate ngā tīkiti miriona i te tau mā ōna pūnaha tukutuku, ā, mō tēnei takahanga, he iti rawa te 900 tīkiti e hokona ana mō ia pō." Ko Kraftwerk i te aronga o te pahū kōtuitui, ā, he tino nui tōna whakaawetanga ki ngā pūoro hip-hop me te kanikani i ngā tau tōmuri o ngā tau 1970 me ngā tau tōmua o te 1980. Kraftwerk: E whakaahuatia ana te Putumōhio hei "hōpara i ngā whakamātautau oro, arokite hoki a te rōpū" me te kī taurangi "ngā pānga Ahu-3 whakaharahara". I whakatangihia tuatahitia i te Whare Taonga Toi Hōu o New York i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. Tīmata ana ki tā rātou pukaemi tuawhā, Autobahn o te tau 1974, ka whakatangi hoki te tokowhā i te Radio-Activity (1975), Trans Europe Express (1977), The Man-Machine (1978), Computer World (1981), Techno Pop (1986), The Mix (1991) me Tour de France (2003), tae atu ki ētahi atu hanganga mai i tā rātou whakarārangi tuarā. Ko ngā whakaaturanga te tuatahi o te rōpū i Rāwāhi mai i te tau 2004.

title: Covid-19: Te Whare Wānanga o Hertfordshire students fined for attending house party
summary: Tekau mā whā ngā tāngata, tae atu ki ngā tauira whare wānanga e waru, kua whainatia mō te whati i ngā rāhuitanga raka me te haere ki tētahi hākari whare.
text: I karangatia ngā pirihimana ki tētahi āhuatanga i Eagle Way, Hatfield, Hertfordshire, tata ki te 01:00 GMT i te Rātapu. I tukuna e te Kāhui Pirihimana o Hertfordshire ki ngā kaitāri he whaina e £200. I kī te Whare Wānanga o Hertfordshire ka mahia he "mahi tika" ki tētahi ākonga i takahi i ngā ture. I te 12 o Hānuere, tokorima ngā ākonga i whainatia e £200 ia mō te huihuinga kia whai wāhi ki tētahi whakataetae kēmu WHK. I Whiringa ā Rangi, i te wā o te kati whakamutunga, tokorima ngā ākonga i whakatārewatia i runga i te whakararuraru i te whare wānanga o Hatfield. I kii a Ch Insp Simon Mason: "I ngana te hunga i reira ki te wehe atu i te rawa i te wa i kite ai ratou i nga pirihimana, he tohu marama i mohio ratou kei te takahi ratou i nga ture Covid. " Kei te mahi ngātahi mātou me te Whare Wānanga o Hertfordshire, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te āwhina he iti noa iho ngā ākonga i take ai mātau - i tēnei take, e waru o ērā e pā ana." Na te āpiha i tohutohu i te hunga "i whakamatautauria ki te takahi i ngā ture" kia "whakaaro roa, kia uaua" mō ā rātou mahi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te whare wānanga ka whakatinanatia ngā ākonga katoa kua takahi i ngā ture Covid-19. "He maha ngā whakamanatanga ka taea e mātou te hoatu mō te takahi waehere, tae atu ki ngā whakatūpato, ngā whaina, ngā whakatārewatanga me ngā aukatitanga," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Ko te nuinga o a mātau ākonga e whai ana i ngā tohutohu, ā, ka mahi tonu mātou me ngā pirihimana me te mahi ki te hunga kāore." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Te matenga o Hamzah Kani: Ko Amanda Hutton 'i puritia he tama mate puta noa i te pō'
summary: Ko tētahi wahine i whakapaea ki te parekura o tana tama i kitea kua mate i roto i tōna moenga, ka puritia tōna tinana mo nga haora, ka rongo te kōti.
text: I kitea nga toenga o Hamzah Kani i roto i tōna moenga i Pirihitini i te wā o Mahuru 2011, tata tonu ki te rua tau i muri i tōna matenga i Tīma 2009. I kī atu a Amanda Hutton, e 43, ki te Kōti Karauna o Te Kōti Karauna o Te Kōti Karauna i noho a ia ki a Hamzah "puta noa i te pō" i muri i tana kitenga kua mate a ia. E whakakāhore ana a ia i te patu tangata, engari kua whakaae ia ki te aro atu ki te tamaiti me te ārai i te tanumanga tika o te tinana. I mate a Hamzah i te rā i mua i tana matenga, engari i kī atu a Ms Hutton ki te kōti i whakaaro ia he "kino" a ia, ehara i te tino mate. Ka kī atu a ia ki te hūri ka hoki a ia ki te kāinga i muri i tana waea i tētahi hokomaha mai i tana tama pakeke, a Tariq, e 24, ki te kī e hoki ana ngā whatu o Hamzah ki tōna māhunga. "I rere atu ahau ki runga ki taku rūma moe, a, ka kitea kua mate a Hamzah," tana kī. "I tangohia ia e au me te tirotiro i ōna pūwāhi mokowhiti katoa, ā, kāore he mea. I whakamātau ahau ki te hoatu waha ki a ia, engari kāore i mahi." I kī a Ms Hutton e hiahia ana a ia ki te waea atu ki ngā pirihimana, engari i whakatūria ia e Tariq. I kī a ia kāore a ia i te mōhio he aha. I pātai mai he aha tana mahi i muri i te matenga o Hamzah, ka kī a ia: "I noho ahau i roto i taku rūma moe i te pō katoa ki a ia. I puritia ia e au mo nga haora." I rongo te kōti ka tīmata a ia ki te inu nui i muri i te matenga o Hamzah, a, ka moe i runga i te sofa. "Kāore au i mōhio me aha," tana kī. I tūmanakohia kia tīmata a Ms Hutton i tana wawao i te Mane, engari, i korerotia ki te hūri, kāore a ia i roto i te āhua tika nā te mea i inu a ia. I whakaae a ia i te kōti ka haere nga pirihimana ki te tiki i a ia i te ata Mane, engari kāore i taea e ia te haere tonu ki te whakawā i tana taenga atu ki te kōti. I kī a ia ko Aftab Kani - tōna hoa tuatahi me te pāpā o Hamzah - i kite i a ia i te mutunga wiki, a, ka kī atu ki a ia me tautohe hara a ia. I mua ake, i whakaae a Ms Hutton kua haere tonu a ia ki te tā i te takuhe tamariki mō Hamzah i muri i tōna matenga, engari i kī atu a ia ki te hūri nā te mea i whakaaro ia ka pātaitia ngā pātai mēnā ka mutu tana kerēme. I kī atu a ia ki te kōti he "kai pārekareka" a Hamzah, engari i whakaaro ia ka "tipu ake" a ia i ōna uauatanga ki te kai. I kī a Ms Hutton i tētahi atu tama, ko Qaiser, kua pakeke ināianei, i puta hoki i tētahi wāhanga i a ia e tamariki ana. I pātai atu a Stephen Meadowcroft QC ki a ia mehemea kei te "māharahara" a ia mo Hamzah. Ka kī a ia: "Kāo, ehara ahau i te mea he ōrite a Qaiser, ā, kua tipu ake a ia i reira. Nā reira i whakaaro noa ahau ka tipu ake a [Hamzah] i reira." I pātai atu a Paul Greaney QC ki a ia: "He tamaiti e whā me te hāwhe tau tāu i uru ki roto i te pēpi e ono ki te iwa marama te pakeke, kāore i te kai, ā, kāore koe i rapu rongoā mōna?" Ka whakahoki a ia: "Kāo, kāore au." I whakakāhore a Ms Hutton i te inu nui i mua i te matenga o Hamzah, ā, ka whakakāhore i te inu he mea hira ake ki a ia i te oranga o tana tama. I whakakāhore hoki a ia i te maukati i a ia i roto i tētahi rūma i roto i te pouri hei whiu. 'He wā kino' Ka kōrero te tangata whakapae ki te kōti mo tōna pātahitanga ki a Aftab Kani i tīmata i a ia e 16, 17 rānei. I kī a Ms Hutton ka taea e Tēnā Kani te taikaha ki a ia. "He wā pai, he wā kino," tana kī. Kua rongo te hūri i te mutunga o te whanaungatanga o Ms Hutton rāua ko Tāne Kani i muri i tana whakatau i a ia ki te whakaeke i a ia i te tau 2008. Ka kī atu a Tēnā Greaney ki te kōti he nui rawa te otaota i roto i te kītini i te tomokanga o ngā pirihimana ki te kāinga o Hutton i te wā o Mahuru 2011, he uaua ki te whakatuwhera i te pākatio. I kī a ia i tirohia e ngā āpiha te pouaka whakamātao kītini me te "wāhanga o runga... he kai pirau anake". I whakaae a Ms Hutton i mua ki te aro atu ki te tamaiti me te ārai i te tanumanga ā-ture o tētahi tinana i a Hōngongoi. I tautohe hoki tana tama ko Tariq, e 24, ki te ārai i te tanumanga tika, tika hoki o te tūpāpaku o Hamzah. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: E whawhai ana nga taurewa anō o Rūhia mo te tika
summary: Ko te tūponotanga o ngā tāngata e 18 i hopukina i Rūhia i muri i ngā whakahēnga anō a Hapa i te wā o Me, he iti noa iho te whakaaturanga i hoatu ki te whakamātautau o Pussy Riot.
text: Nā Leonid RagozinBBC News, Mohihi Ko te raruraru o te pēne punk mana wahine o Pussy Riot, nāna i kaha ki te waiata i tētahi waiata ārai ārai i roto i te whare karakia matua o Mohihi, kua noho hei take nui o te ao whānui. Engari i tawhiti atu i ngā kāmera pouaka whakaata, kua whāwhā pūnahatia e nga mana te whakahē. I whakaritea te mārena o Nikolai Lambin mo te 12 o Me. He hākari māmā, ngāwari hoki. I te haere te kaiwhaiwhai tōrangapū o te taone o Siberia o Tyumen ki te wāhi mā te pahi. Engari ko te mea i kīa mai ko tētahi o ngā rā tino hari i roto i tōna oranga ka huri hei moepuku. E kī ana a Tēnā Lambin, i tana hekenga, tokowhā nga pirihimana kākahu tōkau i a ia ki roto i te van. E kī ana a ia, i te wā i roto, ka tino patua a ia, a, ka whakawehi ki te hīkaka. I te mutunga, ka whakaae ia ki te haina i tētahi whākinga e mau ana a ia i te hīkini. E kī ana a ia i whakatōkia nga rongoā ki runga i a ia e nga pirihimana i te wā o te whakamatautau. Kātahi ia ka mauria ki te kōti, e 15 meneti noa iho te wā i whakawāteatia ai e te tiati nga whakapae, i runga anō i te whākinga a Tēnā Lambin me ngā kōrero a nga pirihimana tokorua. Ka tukua ia e te kōti i runga i te utu. I tū te mārena o Tāne Lambin i ētahi rā i muri iho, ā, kei te tatari ia ināianei ki te whakawā. E whakapono ana a ia ko tana "hara" anake i hangaia e ia he rōpū i runga i tētahi whatunga pāpori Rūhia hei tautoko i ngā hīkoi whakahē i Mohihi. E kī ana nga pirihimana paetata kāore rātau i kite i tētahi hē a nga āpiha, i muri i te arotakenga o te hopunga a Tēnā Lambin i runga i te tono a ana rōia. Kāore i tino mōhiotia e te pāpāho i taua wā, ka puta tēnei mahi hei tīmatanga mo tētahi ngaru hou o te tāmitanga tōrangapū, i whakaaturia hei puku ki te pupuri i te ture me te whakahau. I muri noa iho i te whakatūnga o Tūroro i te 7 o Me, ka mau nga mana ki te ātete, nāna i whakakotahi te tekau mano i roto i ngā hīkoi tiriti o Mohihi i te wā pōti. I rongonuitia e Tēnā Hapa nga kaiuru hei rangitaki o Bandar-log - nga makimaki whakarihariha mai i te Pukapuka Ngahere a Rudyard Kipling. E hua ana te panekōrero whakaaro he tokomaha nga Rūhia e tautoko tonu ana i ana tikanga uaua. Kotahi tekau mā waru nga hopunga i te ahiahi o te whakatūnga o Tēnā Hapa i whakamutua ki ngā matapaki me ngā rau o ngā hopunga. Kaore i roa ka tukua katoatia ērā i herea, engari kotahi marama i muri iho ka hopukina anō te 18 o rātau i roto i nga poho ohorere i runga i o rātau whare noho. I whakataua rātau ki te whakaeke pirihimana me te whai wāhi ki ngā whakararuraru maha. Te āhua nei ko te nuinga o rātau he kaiwhaiwhai, he kaiwhakahaere noa rānei. Kei roto i a rātou ko ngā ākonga, ngā kaipūtaiao, tētahi māngai haere, he kaipānui, he kaihiko, tae atu ki tētahi moana moana, nāna i haere i mua i a Tēnā Hapa i te wā o tētahi whakatūtū Tapawhā Whero i te tau i mua. "Anō nei i tīpakohia rātau hei tohu i ngā hīkoi rerekē o te ora," te kī a tētahi kōtiro o tētahi o ngā whakarau ki te HAU. I tukua ētahi o te hunga i hopukina i runga i te utu, engari ko te nuinga kai roto tonu i te whare herehere. He tokomaha e amuamu ana mo te tūkinotanga. E kī ana te kaiwhaiwhai parirau mauī o Tūroro Akimenkov kua tere te ngaro i a ia tōna kitenga nā te kore mārama i roto i tōna whare herehere. Na ana inoi kia tukua i runga i te pēre i nekehia ai ia ki tētahi whare rongoā, e kī ana a ia he kino kē atu ngā here i te whare herehere nā te mātao me te haukū. Kāore tonu a ia i whiwhi rongoā rongoā. Ka kī atu nga mana o te whare herehere ki nga rōia o Tēnā Akimenkov ka tika anake ia ki te tuku mehemea ka tino kāpō a ia. E kī ana a Tēnā Akimenkov e kore e roa i mua i tērā putanga, ā, ka whakaahua i tōna whakamatautau he "whakamamaetanga". 'Ehara i te whakararuraru' Ko te nuinga o nga whakaaturanga ki nga "kaiwhakararuraru" i puta mai i te wā o nga whakarongo hopu, i takea mai i runga anō i nga whakaaturanga a nga pirihimana i tū ki nga kaiwhakahaere. He tino pōhēhē nga rōpū motika tangata. "Kaore he whakararuraru nui, e ai ki te ture o Rūhia - kāore he tutu patu, kāore he motokā i tahuna, kāore he parakete, kāore he pogroms," te kī a Sergey Davidis o te pokapū motika tangata Whakamaharatanga. "I tua atu, ko nga pirihimana i whakamahi i te kaha nui rawa me te hunga whakahē i tiaki i a rātau anō." I whakakāhoretia e nga mana nga amuamu katoa mo te whanonga o nga pirihimana i muri i nga takahanga o te 6 o Me. Ko ētahi o rātau i whakawhiwhia ki ngā raorao e te rangatira o Mohihi mo te "ārai i tētahi mahi whakatoi". I kī te hēkeretari pēhi a Tēnā Hapa, a Dmitry Peskov, i taua wā he "ngohengohe rawa ngā pirihimana ki ngā kaiwhakahaere, nāna i whakatū tētahi mahi whakatoinga kua roa e tūmanakohia ana". I whakahuatia hoki a ia e tētahi MP e hiahia ana a ia kia "pania to rātau ate i runga i te tarmac", kāore anō kia whakakāhoretia e ia. I kitea e tētahi o nga pirihimana he tangata "nāna i whakamātau ki te patu i a ia" i te wā o nga matapaki. E ono wiki a ia i roto i te whare herehere me te wiki i roto i tētahi whare hauora hinengaro, i mua i te tukunga atu a te kōti i a ia i runga i te utu. I puta mai i te wā o te whakarongo kāore a Tēnā Arkhipenkov i te tapawhā i tū ai nga matapaki. I hopukina a ia i taua wā e tata ana ki te wāhi o tētahi atu mahi whakahē, e kī ana a ia kāore a ia i whai wāhi. Engari ahakoa tōna tukunga, kāore anō kia whakatakatia ngā utu. E rua anō ngā pōhēhētanga e kī ana kāore rātau i tata ki te tirohanga i te wā o nga matapaki, e whakaūngia ana e a rātau hopunga i tērā atu mahi whakahē. E hiahia ana ngā rōia ki tētahi atu pōhēhētanga - ko Mīharo Kosyakin, e pāngia ana e te kōhukihuki mārire - kia whakararurarutia. I whakamāramatia te raruraru o nga herehere o te 6 Me e te rerenga tuatahi i tukuna i te kēhi. I whiua a Maxim Luzyanin, he kaihoko me te rangatira whare tākaro, kia whā me te hāwhe tau i roto i te whare herehere i muri i tana tautohe i te hara ki ngā whakapae katoa. He tokomaha nga pōhēhētanga e kī ana mā o rātau rōia e ngana ana ngā kaihoko ki te whakahau i a rātau ki te whakaatu ki nga kaiārahi whakahē, arā, ko Alexei Navalny rāua ko Sergey Udaltsov. I whakahaua tikatia te whakamutunga ki te whakarite i tētahi whakararuraru, engari ka noho wātea tonu ngā tāngata tokorua. Kua whakataua a Tēnā Navalny i roto i tētahi kēhi hāmate kāore i te hāngai. Heoi anō, tokorua nga kawana o Tēnā Udaltsov kai te whare herehere. Ko tētahi o rātau, ko Leonid Razvozzhayev, i ngaro atu i tētahi tari UN i Ukraine, i reira a ia e rapu ana i te whakangungu tōrangapū. E kī ana a ia i kahakina a ia, i tāhaetia puta noa i te rohe, a, i whakamamaetia i mua i te mutunga o te whare herehere o Mohiku. Kua kī nga kaiwhakahaere o Rūhia i hoatu e ia ki a rātau. He nui ngā whakamaumahara i kawea mai e te pōtitanga anō a Tūroro e kore te pirihimana huna o mua e whakararuraru ki te wehe me te whakawātea i ōna hoariri tōrangapū.

title: 'Crocodile Dundee' MP e ārahi ana i te pana mārena tāne o Ahitereiria
summary: E whakaae ana a Outback Conservative Australian MP Warren Entsch ko ia te tangata iti rawa e ārahi ana i te whakahau a te whenua mo te mārena tangata kotahi.
text: Nā Marie McInerneyMelbourne, Wikitōria I mahi a ia hei kaiahuwhenua karaihe, "kaihopu pūru" - e whakatata ana i ngā kau - me te kaikai, ā, i mahi i roto i te Royal Australian Air Force hei kaiwhakarato mīhini rererangi. I whakaahuatia e ētahi ko te Crocodile Dundee o te Pāremata o Ahitereiria, e kī ana tana haurongo whaimana, i muri i tōna whānau, ko tōna tino aroha ko tana motopaika Harley Davidson. Ko te rohe 'kakī whero' o te pōti o Te Pōtitanga o Te Kāwanatanga o Queensland, e 65 tau te pakeke o Te Kāwanatanga o Queensland, e kapi ana i tētahi wāhi i te raki ki te rāwhiti o Ahitereiria, neke atu i te rua te rahi o te āhua o Tasmania. I tētahi wā ka kī rongonuitia e tētahi hoa MP tūturu o Bob Katter kāore he tāngata moe wahine i roto i tōna pōti noho tata, e kī ana kia haere "whakamuri mai i Bourke ki Brisbane" mēnā ka kitea he tangata e noho ana i reira. He rohe "kakī whero" tauhira, kāore i te mōhiotia mō ngā tirohanga pāpori, engari mō Tēnā Entsch, ka kaha te whakaaro ki tana tautohe mo te mārena tangata kotahi. "Ka whiwhi waea ahau mai i ngā whānau me ngā hoa o ngā tāngata tāne e kī ana mēnā ka taea e tētahi 'pāmu karaihe o Queensland ki te raki, te pūru pūru Liberal' te tū ake mō ngā mana o taku hoa tāne, whanaunga rānei, kātahi ka hiahia ahau ki te puta mai ki te mahi hoki," tana kī, i mua i te pōti o te rūma rōpū o te Tūtira mēnā me pōti koreutu ngā MP mō taua take. Te mārena i Ahitereiria "Ko au te kaitaunaki iti rawa, nā reira kāore e taea e te tangata te kī he tangata tāne noa iho e pana ana i tana ake rārangi take," tana kī. I te Tūtira ka pānuitia e Tēnā Entsch i te Tūtira ka tēpu ia i te pāremata i tētahi pire tūmataiti e tautokona ana e te rōpū whakawhitiwhiti hei whakamana i te mārena tangata kotahi. Ko te Rōpū ā Iwi me te Rōpū Liberal, e noho ana i te tauwhāinga kāwanatanga, e whakahē ana i te whakarerekētanga o te ture. Engari kua hangaia te whakahau mo te ōritetanga o te mārena i Ahitereiria, otirā i te oho o te taupānga o Kīriria o tēnei tau e manakohia ana e te mārena tangata kotahi. I te taenga mai o ngā MP ki te pūmatua o te iwi i tēnei wiki mō tētahi wātū paremata hou, ka mārama te taunga rererangi o Canberra ki ngā kara aniwaniwa, he tohu o te whakapehapeha tāne. E whakaatu ana te pōti neke atu i te 70% o ngā Ahitereiria e manakohia ana e te mārena tangata kotahi, engari e ātetetia ana e te nuinga o ngā hāhi, me ngā MP i ngā taha e rua o te whare. Ko te hunga i roto i te tauwhāinga e manakohia ana e tētahi huringa e pana ana ki te pōti hinengaro mo te take. Ehara i te mea ko Airangi, ko te whakamōhio i te mārena tangata kotahi i Ahitereiria e hiahiatia ana he pōti pāremata, ehara i te whiriwhiringa ahuwhānui. E mau tonu ana te ātete a te Pirimia o Te Pirimia, o Te Pirimia. I puta tuatahi mai a Tēnā Entsch hei kaitaunaki ōritetanga mārena i muri i te whakatikatanga a te Pirimia tūturu o Hoani Hauati i te Ture Mārena i te tau 2004 hei whakapūtā i te mārena i waenganui i "te tāne me te wahine". I kōrero te MP o Kuinirangi i roto i tētahi nūpepa ā-motu mō te toa i kitea e ia i ngā tekau tau i mua mai i tētahi hoa inu i "whenua kaupoai" i pā ki tētahi mahi huringa wahine, ā, ka hoki mai ki te mahi i te pāparapara hei kaitiaki. Ka kī atu a Entsch ki te AO ā muri ake ka whiwhi īmēra ia i a ia - ināianei he tākuta e mahi ana i te āhua o Wikitōria - nāna i mihi ki a ia i tana hiahia ki te mōrearea i tōna rongo tōrangapū i runga i ngā motika tāne me ngā motika transgender. "Ko koe te tangata kua whakaatu i te toa pono mā tō whakaaetanga, te manawanui me te tautoko, ehara i te mea ināianei anake i roto i te pāpāho ā-motu, engari i aua tau katoa ki mua i taua tauwhāinga iti, engari tērā pea ka nui ake te whakarihariha o te Whenua o te Kōwhiu," tana kī atu ki a ia. Engari kāore te katoa e whakaae. E kī ana a Tēnā Entsch, e tūtaki ana i te komiti paremata o ngā Hoa o Te Wahine Moe wahine, Tāne Wahine, Tōkeke, Transgender me Intersex Ahitereiria, kāore a ia i te tūkino i roto i tana pōti mō tōna tūnga, engari e whakaae ana a ia ki ngā whakahēnga tino "pono". "He tino āhuaatua, he whakarihariha ētahi, ko ētahi he āhua hauora ake i roto i a rātau tautohetohe," tana kī. He tokomaha e tautohe ana mai i te tirohanga o te whakapono, o te tikanga rānei, engari e kite ana ia i te whakaaro mo te take he whakatipuranga. E tatau ana a ia i tētahi pīhopa mōnehu, tokorua ana tama tāne, i waenganui i ana kaitautoko, ā, ka kitea ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i raro iho i te 45 e kōrero ana a ia e kore e mārama he aha te ōritetanga o te mārena he take taupatupatu. E whakaaro tonu ana a Tēnā Entsch me tana kaitautoko Mahi o te pire, a Terri Butler, ki te whakauru atu i ta rātau pire ki te pāremata a tērā wiki, engari e whakaae ana rātau kua whakatakatia i muri i te āraitanga a Tēnā Wānanga i tētahi pōti koreutu mō ngā MP Tauwhāinga. E kī ana te MP o te ngahere ka mahi tonu a ia hei "reo" mō te iwi tāne. "I te mutunga o te rā me whakatau ahau ehara i te mea ko wai e homai ana ki a au te nuinga o ngā pōti, engari ko tāku e whakapono ana, ā, kei te hari ahau ki te whakawāteatia i runga i tāku e whakapono ana he tika," tana kī. He kaituhi a Marie McInerney i Melbourne.

title: Te toa i te tīkiti £1m e puritia ana i roto i te tī
summary: I puritia e tētahi tokorua i whiwhi i te £1m i runga i te tānga o te EuroMillions Millionaire Raffle ta rāua tīkiti toa i roto i tētahi tītī tawhito i te Kirihimete.
text: I purua e Judy rāua ko Frank Whitmore, mai i Tockwith, North Yorkshire, te tī ki runga i tētahi wae kītini i muri i te kitenga i to rāua toa i te Pō o te Kirihimete. I tutuki pai ta rātau whakawhiwhinga mai i Camelot i te Wenerei i whakamāramatia e Mrs Whitmore, e 62, i whakatau te whānau ki te hokohoko meneti whakamutunga ahakoa te haurangi. Ka kī a ia: "He taonga tuku iho te tī. Na te kuia tupuna o Frank. "He tapu ki a mātou, tā mātou tī iti." Tokotoru nga tamariki a te tokorua, tokowhā nga mokopuna, tokotoru nga mokopuna. Ināianei kei te whakaaro a Tāne rāua ko Whaea Whitmore, kua mārena rāua mo te 43 tau, ki te whakawātea i o rāua mahunga i muri i to rāua toa. Engari e kore rātau e haere ki rāwāhi i te mea e kino ana a Mrs Whitmore ki te rere, ā, kāore he uruwhenua. E 40 tau a Tēnā Whitmore, e 68, e whakahou ana i ngā kīhini i te wā e mahi ana tana wahine i tētahi wharekai. Ināianei ka whakaaro a ia ki te hokohoko i tana motokā, ā, ka hokona pea e te tokorua he wīra moana, ka kī rātau. I hokona te tīkiti toa i te Poutāpeta o Tockwith.

title: I hangaia e UKNova hei whakatū i ngā hononga awa pouaka whakaata me te reo irirangi
summary: Kua mutu te tuku hononga BitTorrent a UKNova i muri i te rironga o te pae tiritiri kōnae hōu rawa kia ūkuia e ngā pūkaro manatārua.
text: I kī ōna kaiwhakahaere i mahia e rātau te mahi i muri i te whiwhinga tono mai i te Tōpūtanga ki te Tāhae Manatārua (Fact). Kua whakatūria e UKNova hei ratonga pouaka whakaata me te reo irirangi koreutu, ā, kua tono ki ōna mema kia kaua e tāpiri i ngā rauemi e wātea ana hei hoko ki tētahi atu wāhi. Mai i te tau 2003 e mahi ana. Ko te tikanga o te whakamahinga a UKNova i ngā hononga BitTorrent, kāore i puritia ētahi rauemi pirated i runga i ōna ake tūmau, engari i whakarato i ngā tikanga mō ōna mema ki te tikiake me te tukuatu rauemi ki ngā rorohiko a tētahi. I whakaūngia e te mea kua whakapā atu ki te pae, engari i whakapeka ki te homai i ētahi atu taipitopito ina whakapā atu ki te HAU. Ratonga 'matatika' Kāore i rite ki ētahi atu pae tiritiri kōnae, kāore a UKNova i whakahaere pānuitanga i ōna whārangi. I kī tētahi o ōna kaiwhakahaere kāore i whakahaeretia mō te hua, i ora noa iho i ngā koha tūturu, ā, kāore he tangata i utua. "Ko to mātau tino āwangawanga i ngā wā katoa ko te whai i tētahi āhuatanga matatika, ā, kia kaua e tūkino ki ngā roma moni a ngā kaihanga hōtaka, kaipānui rānei," te kī a Roger Evans ki te HAU. "Kia tino mōhio ai tērā i pā mai he kaupapahere pākaha tā mātou i ngā wā katoa kāore he mea e wātea ana i runga i te DVD, i ngā hongere pouaka whakaata mārō rānei." I kī a Tēnā Evans e tata ana ki te 30,000 ngā mema o te ratonga, tae atu ki ngā hōia i Awhekenetāna me ngā kaimahi i roto i te umanga pouaka whakaata. I kī a ia ka tuku tonu i tētahi wānanga me te ratonga kōrerorero, engari kāore he mema hōu e whakaaetia kia hono mō te wā e heke mai nei i muri i te amuamu. "I waenganui i ngā mema o Fact ko BSkyB me te Rōpū Matua, ā, ko tā mātou hipanga tuatahi ko te tango i ngā hononga ki ā rātou rawa," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Ēnā. "Engari i kī a Fact kei te takahi ia hononga, ā, me tango - ko te tikanga e mahi ana mō ngā kaipānui ehara i te mema o te rōpū whakahaere. " I roto i te iwa tau o te mahinga, kāore anō mātau kia whiwhi amuamu mai i tētahi hongere pouaka whakaata. Kāore mātou e whakapono ka taea e Fact te kawe mai i tētahi mahi angitu ki a mātau - engari i tēnei wāhanga kāore ā mātou moni, rauemi rānei hei tiaki i tā mātou take i te kōti." Kua uru hoki te Throttling file-sharing Fact ki te hereheretanga o te rangatira o Surfthechannel.com - tētahi atu pae i tuku hononga ki ngā papatono pouaka whakaata me ngā whitiāhua kua tāruatia ā-ture. E whā tau a Anton Vickerman i roto i te whare herehere i muri i te kitenga i te hara ki te tinihanga i te wā o June mō te "whakangāwari" i te takahi manatārua. I hopukina a ia i muri i te mahi tahi a Fact me te Motion Picture Association of America ki te utu i tētahi kaihautū tūmataiti nāna i tango whakaahua i ngā taputapu rorohiko a Tēnā Vickerman i roto i tōna kāinga i muri i tana whakatakune e hiahia ana ki te hoko i te āhuatanga. Ko ētahi atu pae tiritiri kōnae hei tango tuimotu i ngā marama tata nei ko te pūaroturuki BitTorrent Demonoid me te ratonga locker mamati Megaupload. Anō hoki, kua whakahaua e ngā kōti ētahi kaiwhakarato ratonga ipurangi kia rāhuitia te urunga ki The Pirate Bay me Newzbin.

title: E kī ana a BT ka taea e Openreach te whai mana pūtea penapena me te poari
summary: Ka hangaia e te Rōpū BT tētahi poari motuhake mō tana umanga Openreach i roto i tētahi tono kia whakapati i tana kaiwhakarite kia kaua e pakaru te kamupene.
text: I kī atu te manukura BT o Tā Maika Rake ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā ka tukua hoki ki a Openreach he mana anō hei whakatau i ngā whakataunga pūtea penapena. Kua whakapaea e ngā tauwhāinga a BT kāore i te nui te haumi i Openreach, e whakahaere ana i tana whatunga waea me te aunui. Ka pūrongo a Ofcom i te Tūtira me pēhea te whakahaere i te Openreach. I kī a Tā Mike: "E tino hiahia ana mātou ki te whakatū i tētahi poari Openreach, ka whai manukura takitahi me te nuinga o ngā kaiwhakahaere takitahi." 'Aunui tere ake' I te pātaitanga mō te pūkete ratonga kiritaki a te kamupene, ka kī a ia, "Kāore anō kia pai tā mātou ratonga kiritaki," engari kei te haere tonu ngā whakapainga, tae atu ki te kawe mai i ētahi atu ratonga kiritaki ki te UK. I Me, i whakahuahuatia e BT ngā mahere hei haumi i te £6bn i roto i ngā tau e toru e whai ake nei i roto i ngā ratonga aunui tere ake me ngā ratonga pūkoro. Ka whakarite ki te tuku i tāna e whakaahua ana he aunui "tino tere" ki ngā kāinga 12 miriona i te tau 2020, tae atu ki te whakapai ake i ngā ratonga pūkoro 4G tere ake. Heoi anō, i kī a Sky he "hiahia whāiti" te kaupapa, ā, ka karangatia e BT kia haumi i roto i te whatunga muka aunui o UK. Kua huatau katoa a Sky, Tiwhione me TalkTalk kia wehea a Openreach i BT. I te wawaenga, i whiwhi ngā kāinga UK i te tere o te 29Mbps i tērā tau, e ai ki te kaiwhakahaere o Ofcom.

title: Ka maringi ngā mea ngaro i roto i te īmēra
summary: He whakamā ngā hapa īmēra, engari ka puta i ia rā. Heoi anō, ko ngā hapa īmēra e whakaatu ana i ngā taipitopito muna o ngā mahi whakawhanaunga taumata tiketike, ka āhua whakaoho.
text: Nā Anthony ZurcherEditor, Echo Chambers Koia te take i haere ai te Minita Whakangungu o Kōpia ki Washington DC i te Wenerei mō ngā rā e toru o ngā hui me ngā mana o Amerika i roto i te whakahaeretanga o Te Taupānga me te Rōpū Nui. I mua i te haerenga, ka tukuna ohorere e te pūkete īmēra prensa@mindefensa.gov.co te minita waea tētahi tuhinga whārangi 55 i te reo Ingarihi ki ngā kaipūrongo tini i Washington me ngā taipitopito o te haerenga o Tēnā Pinzon, mai i te mea hira (te rautaki me ngā take whakakaha) ki te mea noa iho (te tau rererangi auau a te minita, te wāhi e noho ai ia me tāna e kai ai). E kī ana te pukapuka reo Pāniora o Kōpia o Semana kua huri te mahi whakawhanaunga hei whakaari. "Ko te whāinga o te haerenga ko te whakaata i te huringa o Koropia me te whakahōutanga o ngā Ope Taua me ngā Pirihimana o te Motu, engari kua noho hei wāhanga mārire mō te minita," e pūrongo ana (i te reo Pāniora). I te mōhiotanga o ngā kaiwhakahaere o Kōpia ki te hē, ka tohe rātau ki ngā kaipūrongo kia kaua e whakaputa mōhiohio mai i te tuhinga mō te wehi ki te whakararuraru i te haumarutanga ā iwi. Kua ū te pāpāho o Koropia... Āhua nei. I whakahuatia e te pouaka whakaata RCN o Kōpia tūmataiti nga kaupapa mo te haerenga o te minita ki te Whare Mā. I hoatu e Daniel Pacheco o El Espectador tētahi rārangi whānui o ngā mea i roto i te tuhinga, tae atu ki ngā mahere kia pau te 40 meneti e kōrero ana mō ngā take haumarutanga ā-motu o Kōpia ki ngā āpiha ārai rongoā. "Mā te pono e whakaaetia ana e tētahi tuhinga muna, ka whakaaturia e te minita wawao, tāpiri atu ki te kōrero hoa noho pai e pupuritia ana e te matauranga o Koropia, tērā tētahi āhukahuka tūturu e tohu ana a Nikarakua, Venezuela, Rūhia me Irana i ngā 'uauatanga' mō te haumarutanga ā-motu o Koropia," ka tuhituhi a ia. E whakaatu ana hoki te tuhinga e whakaaro ana te minita ki te tono tautoko haere tonu mō te fumigation ā-rangi hei haepapa i ngā hua kokaine o te whenua me te pūrua mō ana mahi tauwhāinga "espada de honor". I kī te Māngai o Kōpia ki a Mātau, a Luis Carlos Villegas i te putanga o te tuhinga, ahakoa he "hapa nui", "kāore he whakamīharo, i te mea kāore he pānga i waenganui i Koromopia me te US". I te ata o te Rāitema, ka kōrero a Tēnā Pinzon ki te māturu i roto i tētahi hui pānui i hipa e TE AO Mundo. "Ko tōku whakaaro he hē noa iho tēnei, kāore i tika kia puta," tana kī. "Ki taku whakaaro kua hoatu kētia he kohete, ā, mēnā he tikanga tika, ka tino mahia." "Ehara tēnei i te mārire, engari he kōnae i tukuna e te hapa," ka haere tonu a ia. "Mēnā i mōhio tūturu ahau he mea kino tēnei, i tātaitia, i tātaritia, ka kōrero pēnā ahau. Engari ki taku whakaaro ehara i te take." Ko tētahi o ngā whāinga i kīa mo te haerenga mai o te minita o Koropia ko te whakaatu i te āhua o te whanaungatanga o US-Koropia i tua atu i ngā take whakangungu me ngā take rongoā. Heoi anō, ināianei, ko nga whakakitenga haumarutanga ā iwi i roto i te tuhinga e whakahaere ana i nga rongo. He tutukitanga whakamā tēnei mō tētahi kāwanatanga o Kōpia e hiahia ana ki te whakamua i tōna waewae tino pai ki Washington.

title: Steve Bannon: Ko ngā maripi o te Pākehā mō te kaiawhina o te Pāpā
summary: Kai te whiua e te Pākehā te kaitohutohu o mua o te Whare Mā, a Steve Bannon i muri i te ngaromanga pōti whakamīharo o te rōpū i Alabama.
text: Na tētahi tangata o te rōpū o New York i tohutohu i te rōpū kia "mahue" a Tēnā Bannon, e kī ana: "He ngenge, he pōrangi, he wātea noa iho tana mahi." E whakapaetia ana te rangatira o Breitbart News mo te hēki ki a Perehitini Donald Trump ki te whakahoki i a Roy Moore, i ngaro i te Tūrei. Engari te āhua nei kāore a Tēnā Puhi i te hiahia ki te whakataka i a Tēnā Pēnā, e kōrero ana ki a ia mō te 15 meneti i te Tūtira, ka kī te New York Times. E kī ana ngā kaitirotiro he pāremata tauhohe te perehitini e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā whatu me ngā taringa o ngā pirihitini pērā i a Tēnā Bannon. 'Pakanga ki te whakatūnga' I kī taurangi te kaitohutohu o mua i Whiringahora ki te whakamatautau i "ia kaingākau o te Pākehā". He kaitautoko ngākau nui a ia ki a Tēnā Moore, he kaiwhakawā tūturu o mua, i hinga i te hinganga tuatahi o te Pākehā i Aotearoa i roto i te 25 tau. Engari ahakoa nga whakahē katoa, kai te whakatoi a Tēnā Bannon. I kī atu tētahi pūtake kāore i whakaingoatia e tata ana ki a ia ki a Bloomberg: "Kāore tēnei e aukati i te whawhai a Steve ki te whakatūnga. " Ko tāna katoa he ringihia he penehīni ki runga." I whakarewaina e te Māngai o New York, a Pete Kingi tētahi whakaekenga tino whaiaro ki a Tēnā Bannon i te ata o te Wenerei. Ka tūtohu te tangata o te Rōpū ā Iwi: "I muri i te mōrearea o Aotearoa, me mahi e te rōpū Pākehā te mea tika me te MAHUE i a Steve Bannon." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mēnā e hiahia ana mātou kia Nui Anō a Amerika mō ngā Kaiāwhina katoa, me haere a Bannon! Ka haere INĀIANEI!!" I muri iho ka puta mai a Tēnā Kīngi i runga i te TNW ki te kī i te kaitohutohu o mua o te Pāpā "te āhua nei he momo haurangi i kopikopiko ki te atamira tōrangapū", ahakoa i whakaritea e Tēnā Pēnā te papare i te waipiro. I whakaekea hoki e te tangata kōwanatanga ngā "tirohanga matatau" a Tēnā Bannon, nāna i kī kāore i tohu i ngā uara tūturu. I tāpiritia e ia e whakapae ana a ia i te ngaromanga pōti i Alabama i runga i te "whakarihariha" a nga kaipōti ki a Tēnā Bannon. I kīia e Illinois Republican Adam Kinzinger ki a Mr Bannon he "RINO", he kupu whakahāwea ko te tikanga o te Pākehā i runga i te ingoa anake. "E kore e manakohia ana rautaki ā-hinengaro i konei. #YoureFired," te tuhituhi a Tēnā Kinzinger. Ko Steve Law, te perehitini o te Pūtea Kaiārahi o te Senate, he rōpū tōrangapū e hāngai ana ki te Kaiārahi Nuinga o Te Aotearoa, ko Mitch McConnell, i whakaputu hoki. "Ehara i te mea i pau i a Steve Bannon tētahi tūru nui o te Senate i tētahi o ngā tūnga o te whenua, engari i tōia hoki e ia te perehitini o Te Hononga o Amerika ki roto i tōna kōrero," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. "He whakamaumahara kino tēnei e whai take ana te kounga o te kaitono ahakoa kei hea koe e oma ana." Kātahi anō ka tautuhia e Tēnā Bannon ana ūnga ki a Tēnā McConnell, e kitea ana e ia he mātao i runga i te rautaki a te perehitini o Amerika Tuatahi. I karangatia e te poari ētita o te National Review, he pukapuka tūturu, he "Svengali mokatere tapahi... kāore anō kia tūtaki ki tētahi kaitono tōrangapū kāore i pai ki a ia". I tino huaina te kaitohutohu o mua o te Pāpāho ki te whakawhāiti i te tono pūkenga a Tēnā Puhi i te whakahau pōti o tērā tau. I mahue i a Tēnā Pēnā te Whare Mā i a Aotearoa ki te āwhina i te whakahaeretanga a Tēnā Puhi hei "parirau i waho" mā te hoki ki tana tūranga hei upoko o te Rongokōrero parirau matau. Engari i te pōtitanga tuatahi o Aotearoa, ka pūruatia e ia te kaiwhakawā o mua o Roy Moore, i a ia e tūpono ana ki tōna rangatira o mua. I pūruatia e Tēnā Trump tētahi Pākehā matua, a Luther Strange, i ngaro. Ka tīmata ētahi i Washington ki te kite i a Tēnā Bannon hei "kaihanga kīngi" mō te rōpū. I muri iho ka tautokona e Tēnā Puhi a Tēnā Moore i te wā o tana whakataetae ki a Democrat Doug Jones, nāna i toa i te tawhē angiangi heu i te pō o te Tūrei. I pūrongotia e te Washington Post i whakataua e Tēnā Puhi tana whakataunga i muri i tētahi kōrero roa ki tana kaiawhina o mua.

title: E whakaarohia ana te aronui kāmera tere toharite o te Ngahere Hōu
summary: Ko ngā kāmera tere toharite kei waenganui i ngā kōwhiringa e tūhuratia ana hei whakaiti i te maha o ngā mate huarahi kararehe i te Ngahere Hōu.
text: I te tau 2014, e 68 ngā kararehe i mate i te pāka ā-motu, ā, i te hinganga o te tau, ka noho tonu ngā wāhiwera aituā.
