I kī tētahi pūrongo o te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Hampshire ka kōrerorerotia ki ngā pirihimana tētahi rohe tere wawaenga whakamātautau, engari kāore he pūtea mō te kaupapa i tēnei wā. Ko ētahi atu tikanga ko te takahuri i ngā tohu me ngā peha huri tau me ngā tohu huarahi mohoao. E ai ki te pūrongo e whakaarohia ana e ngā kaikaunihera, ka utu tētahi pūnaha taki tere toharite i te rohe o te £100,000 me te £40,000 mō ia wae tāpiri. E kī ana a Te Kāhui Pirihimana i whakatūpato i te aronui he utu utu, ā, e hiahiatia ana he tohu pūkoro 3G me ngā putanga hiko hei mahi - he raruraru tūpono i te ngākau o te ngahere. Engari i kī te pūrongo he "hiahia" tonu te kaupapa mō te kaunihera. 'Whakapau whakaaro nui' E hui ana te Komiti Tīpako Whakahaerenga, Waka me te Taiao o te mana ki te kōrerorero i ngā mahere. I kī te mema o te komiti me te kaikaunihera o te rohe Conservative mō Ringwood, a Steve Rippon-Swayne: "He uaua ki te kōrero he aha atu anō ka taea [ki te tapahi i ngā mate kararehe] - ko ngā mea katoa e pā ana ki te whakaū i te tere e utu ana i te moni me te nui. " Kei te unuhia te moni e te kāwanatanga nā reira me whakapau whakaaro nui tātau." I kī te kaunihera i puta mai ngā kāhui tūpāpaku e pā ana ki ngā ponies, kau me ētahi atu kararehe i runga i ngā ara matua e toru - te B3078 Cadnam ki Godshill, te B3054 Hatchet Pond ki Portmore me te B3056 Beaulieu ki Lyndhurst. Ko ngā Verderers - e whakahaere ana i te ngahere - kei te utu kē i te 80% o te utu ki tētahi kāmera tere pūkoro i ngā pae mōrearea tiketike. I kī te pūrongo o te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Hampshire kāore e taea te whakataka puta noa i te pāka ā-motu, ā, kua whakahaeretia hoki te whakahekenga tere ki te 30mph.

title: Chertsey residents claim 'homes sacrificed to save others'
summary: Kua kī ngā tāngata e noho ana i tētahi tiriti kāore i waipuketia i Surrey ka patua o rātau kāinga hei whakaora i ērā o o rātau hoa noho tata.
text: Kei te tāuta te Taua i ngā ārai waipuke i Chertsey ki te ngana ki te tiaki i ngā kāinga e 200. Engari i kī ngā tangata o Meadow View, i reira ka whakatūria he wawao rangitahi, kua korerotia ki a rātau ka mamae o rātau kāinga. I kī te Taiao Taiao: "Kāore mātou e whakahere i tētahi hapori hei painga mō tētahi atu." Ka haere tonu te urupare waipuke a Surrey i ngā wiki e heke mai nei i muri i te taenga atu o te Awa o Thames ki tōna taumata tiketike i roto i ngā tekau tau, me ētahi atu āwhā i matapaetia. Kua kī ngā tīma ohorere e pā ana ki te mōrearea he nui ake te marangai e tohu ana, ā, ka tārere tonu ngā taumata wai. E iwa ngā whakatūpato waipuke tino nui - te taumata matohi teitei rawa o te Taiao Taiao - e noho tonu ana i runga i te whārōrō o Te Thames. I tangohia e nga hōia e rima ngā kawenga taraka kirikiri i mua ki te ngana ki te tiaki i ngā kāinga i te waipuke i te mutunga wiki. I kī atu a Andrew Graham, mai i te Taiao Taiao, ki a BBC Te kōwhiringa e ngana ana te kōwhiringa ki te whakatakoto i tētahi wawao rangitahi i te Ara Arawhiti. Ka kī a ia: "He tino nui rawa te ngongo ka kī i te wai ka waihanga i tētahi ārai kia hoki mai anō ai te awa nā te marangai i te mutunga wiki, ka parea e tēnei ngā āhuatanga e 200 ki te tonga o te huarahi." I kī a Caroline Camis, e noho ana i Meadow View, kua kī atu ngā kaimahi o te kōwhiringa ki tētahi hui a ngā tangata e rima ngā kāinga, tae atu ki a ia, e kore e parea e tētahi ārai ka hangaia ki waenganui o te huarahi. "I haere mai ngā pirihimana o Sussex inanahi, ā, i kī mai rātau me tango o mātau whare e rima i te tāwhara, ā, ka mamae - ā, kei te taha kino mātou - ki te tiaki i ētahi atu whare i Chertsey," tana kī. "I tēnei wā, kāore he pata wai i runga i to mātau tiriti - ki te tuku rātau i te āhua o te ao e kore e waipuke." I tāpiri mai a Ellie Mowen, tōna hoa noho tata: "Kei te tino riri mātou katoa nā te mea e kite ana koe, e rima ngā whare e tika ana kei te taha hē o tēnei ārai. " Kei te whiwhi āwhina ētahi tāngata, ā, kāore ētahi." I kī a Tēnā Kahurangi kāore te kōwhiringa i te kōwhiri i waenganui i ngā hapori. I kī a ia kua tuwhera katoa ngā kōrere i runga i ngā awa katoa i te roanga o te awa mai i te 4 o Hānuere "Ka haere te wai, i muri i tā mātou mahi i tēnā, ka haere ki te wāhi e hiahia ana, nā reira kāore he māminga o ngā taumata wai ki runga, ki raro rānei, ā, kāore mātou e whakahere i tētahi hapori mō te painga o tētahi atu." E 250 anō ngā tāngata i whakaorangia i te Wenerei, ka kawea mai te tapeke ki te 850. 'Te wai tiketike rawa mai i te tau 1947' i kī te Kāhui Matua o Lynne Owens: "He mahi nui tēnei mō te takiwā, ā, kei te whakarite mātou mō te oma roa - mō ngā rā e 15 e whai ake nei." I kī a ia ka kino kē atu te āhuatanga i te mutunga wiki. "He teitei ake ō mātou taumata wai i tā mātou i kite ai i te takiwā, ā, kei te titiro whakamuri mātou ki te tau 1947 me mua," tana tāpiri mai. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana e whakamahia ana ngā tautiaki poti me ngā kāmera hei pare i ngā āhuatanga kua whakakorea, me ngā kāmera āhukahuka pereti tau e noho ana i runga i ngā ara ki roto, i waho hoki o ngā wāhi waipuke hei whakakaha i ngā mahi hara. I kī a Ch Supt Matt Twist: "E mōhio ana mātou he tino māharahara mō te hunga hara e whai wāhi ana i te waipuke me te whakarite i ngā āhuatanga wātea." Ka tūtohu te Rīpeka Whero e whakarato ana ngā tūao i te āwhina tuatahi me te tautoko ā-hinengaro ki ngā whakawhitiwhiti waipuke. Ko te matohi waro waikura i Egham, kei te raruraru ngā manga ki te whakatikatika i te marangai taumaha, ko te tikanga kāore i taea e ētahi tāngata te whakamahi i ō rātou whare haumaru, ā, kei te whakahaua kētia kia whakamahi i ngā pākete kī tonu i te paru ngeru. I kī a Steve Wilkins e toru haora te roa o te wai waipuke mai i tana kāri o mua ki te papa whenua o tōna whare, ā, ka tāpiri mai: "I tere tonu te haere mai o tērā." I roto i aua haora e toru, ka nekehia e ia ngā taonga pēnei i te pouaka whakaata me te rorohiko ki runga, ka mau i ētahi kāpeti. I te tuatahi ka whakatau a ia me tōna whānau kia noho ki tō rātou whare kia kite mēnā ka heke te wai, engari 10 haora i muri mai me waea rātau ki te 999 kia whakaorangia e te poti. I a ia e kōrero ana mai i tētahi hōtēra i te Tāite, ka kī a Tēnā Wilkins: "I moe tonu mātou, ahakoa kei te tino pōhēhē mātou. " He hiahia motuhake tā taku tama, ā, e whakaaro ana ia kei te hoki ia ki te kāinga i tēnei ata, engari kāore a ia." I kī a ia i te mutunga ka puta te whakawhititanga "tino tere" me tōna whānau i roto i tētahi hōtēra kua wareware i te maha o ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e rātau. "Kei te noho mātou i ia rā ināianei," tana kī. Kua whakatūpato te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Te Ratonga Whakaora o Te Ahi me te Whakaora i ngā mōrearea o te kohu mai i ngā pūhiko hiko me ngā papu wai e whakamahi ana i te penehīni, i te diesel rānei. I kī te ratonga ahi he tokomaha nga tangata me ngā umanga e whakamahi ana i ngā papu me ngā whakahiko mō ngā wiki maha. Kei te tuaritia ngā tohutohu me ngā pūoko waro waikura ki ngā wāhi i pā ki te waipuke. Kua tae mai tētahi matohi anō mai i ngā kaiwhakarato hauora kāore i te mōhio ki hea i neke ai ō rātou tūroro - kei te tonoa ngā tāngata e whiwhi ana i te nēhi, i te tiaki pāpori rānei i tō rātou kāinga kia whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaitiaki i tō rātou tauwāhi hou. Kua tukuna hoki e te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi he tohutohu ki ngā tūpāpaku waipuke mō te whakaiti i ngā mōrea hauora.

title: Āwhā o Melbourne: Tokotoru i mate i te wā e pā ana te tūkinotanga whānui o te hau
summary: Tokotoru ngā tāngata - tae atu ki tētahi taitama whā tau - kua mate i te takanga rākau i muri i te āwhā i te āhua o Ahitereiria o Wikitōria.
text: I whakapūketetia ngā hau tae atu ki te 158km/h (100mph), nā reira i tūkino whānuitia ai te hiko ki ngā kāinga e 95,000. I pā mai ngā mate i ngā wāhi o waho ake puta noa i te pūmatua o te kāwanatanga, o Melbourne - he taone kē i te tīmatanga o Covid. I te Paraire, i whakatūpatotia hoki ngā tangata o waho ake e 88 kua tāhaetia e te āwhā te wai inu. Neke atu i te 2,100 ngā waea a ngā tangata whenua mō te āwhina ohorere i muri i te whakawhitinga o te āwhā i te tūnga i te tōmuri o te Rāite, ka whakahekea ngā aho hiko me ngā whare tūkino. I kurua te taitama e whā tau e tētahi rākau i runga i tētahi ara hīkoi i te tapa taone o Blackburn South, a, ka mate i te hōhipera, ka kī nga mana. I te haere tahi a ia me tōna pāpā me tōna tuahine kōhungahunga i te pānga o te aituā tata ki te 18.00 wā paetata (08.00 GMT), ka pūrongotia e te Herald Sun. "Kātahi anō rātau ka haere ki waho mō tētahi hīkoi iti - e rua meneti noa iho, ka haere rātau ki waho - ā, ohorere ana te taka o te rākau ki runga i a ia," te kī a tētahi whanaunga ki te nūpepa. Ko ērā atu tūpāpaku he tangata 59 tau i te tapa taone o Belgrave, me tētahi wahine 36 tau i Fernshaw, tata ki Melbourne. I mate rāua i te takanga o nga rākau ki runga i o rāua motokā. Na te āwhā i tomo ai te wai kāore i te mōhiotia mai i te matatara ki te pūnaha wai inu o te taone, e pā ana ki ngā whare e 250,000. Me kōhua wai aua tangata i mua i te inu tae noa ki te tōmuri o te Paraire, e kī ana te kamupene taputapu o Yarra Valley Water. Kua tata ki te rua marama a Melbourne i muri i te kitenga i te pakarutanga o te coronavirus kino rawa atu o Ahitereiria. Tata ki te 500 ngā tāngata kua mate i Wikitōria, engari kei te pōturi haere ngā mate hou. I tēnei wā, e whakaaetia ana ngā kainoho kia wehe i te kāinga mō ngā take tino nui anake, mō te kotahi haora mahi i ia rā. .

title: Kua whakaritea e te umanga Hainamana ki te hoko i te Whare o Fraser
summary: Kua whakaritea te mekameka pātaka tari o UK House of Fraser kia hokona ki te tokotoko Hainamana Sanpower, e mārama ana te HAU.
text: E tūmanakohia ana kia 89% te tiri a Sanpower i roto i te kamupene e uara ana i te umanga tata ki te £450m. E tūmanakohia ana ko te take te pūtea hokohoko nui rawa atu o Haina ki tēnei wā. I whakatūria te Rōpū Sanpower i Nanjing i te tau 1993 e te kaipakihi 49 tau o Yafei Yuan. Ngā pātaka Haina? Neke atu i te 100 ngā kamupene e whakahaere ana i ngā wāhanga maha, mai i te hokohoko ki te āhuatanga, tae atu ki te mekameka pātaka tari o Nanjing Xinjiekou. I tēnei wā, e 30,000 ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana e Sanpower, ā, e whakapono ana he rawa e tata ana ki te £5bn. E whakaarotia ana ka whakarite a Sanpower ki te haumi i te £70m ki te £80m ki roto i te Whare o Fraser kia taea ai te pūtea i tētahi whakahoutanga pātaka whānui me ngā whakapainga paetukutuku. Ka taea hoki te mau i te pātaka tari ki Haina mā te whakatuwhera i ngā pātaka hōu, mā te huri rānei i ētahi pae tīariari ki te ingoa o te Whare o Fraser. Ka hangaia e te Whare o Fraser ngā hokonga huri noa i te £1.2bn i te tau, ā, e 7,300 ngā tāngata e mahi ana. E 12,000 hoki ngā kaimahi mana whakahaere i ngā pātaka e 61. Kua roa te rapunga mō ngā kaiwhakangao hou i te tau kua taha. He hītori taunaki Ko te hua ohorere o Sanpower, i puta tuatahi mai i te mutunga o Poutāpeta, i puta mai i te wā e whakatakoto ana ngā kaihoko i ngā mahere hei whakatere i te Whare o Fraser ā muri ake i tēnei tau. Kua whakahaere te Whare o Fraser i tētahi tukanga hoko ara-takirua. Ko te kamupene, i whakatūria i te tau 1849, e kimi ana i ngā kaihoko tūpono, i a ia e whakaaro ana hoki ki tētahi rārangi tērā pea i te whakawhitinga hea. I whakarārangitia tuatahitia te Whare o Fraser ki te mākete hea i te tau 1948, ā, ka noho hei kamupene tūmatanui tae noa ki te wā i hokona ai e Whiriwhiri al-Fayed i te tau 1985. I whakarārangitia anōtia i te tau 1994 i mua i te hokona i roto i tētahi mahi £350m i te tau 2006 e tētahi rōpū pūtea penapena i arahina e te kaipakihi Tiorangi o Jon Asgeir Johannesson's Baugur Group. I mutu ngā kōrero Kirihimete Hauora mō tētahi hokonga ki te hoa Wīwī o Galeries Lafayette i te Hānuere. I te tau 2012, i tana titiro ki te hoko i tētahi tūnga iti i roto i te umanga. He hanganga rangatiratanga uaua tā te Whare o Fraser me te 49% o te kamupene pupuri, Highland Group Holdings, nā ngā māngai o ngā pēke Tiorangi i rahua o Landesbanki me Glitnir. Ko te manukura o Don McKaka e 20% ana, ko ngā kaimahi hokohoko ko Tom Hunter rāua ko Kevin Stanford te 11% me te 9%, ko te Rōpū Pākehā o Raiti e 5% ana, ā, ko ētahi atu whakahaere e 6%. I te Hānuere, ko te Whare o Fraser tētahi o ngā pātaka tari torutoru hei pūrongo i ngā hokonga Kirihimete hauora, i te wā i raruraru ngā tauwhāinga tae atu ki a Marks & Spencer me Debenhams.

title: Ngā Pae Hōu: E whakaatu ana te mahere o Pluto i te 'tohorā' o tētahi āhuahira
summary: Kua tukua e ngā kaipūtaiao tā rātou mahere hou o Pluto, mā te whakamahi i ngā atahanga mai i te waka ātea New Horizons.
text: Nā Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent Ka wetekina ngā wāhanga e kitea ana o te porowhita ki runga i tētahi pūwhitinga papatahi, e hoatu ana i tētahi atu tirohanga o ngā āhuahira kua tīmata ki te puta mai i ngā rā tata nei. E kitea ana ko ngā pūrei mārama me te pōuri i te paenga, tae atu ki tētahi tāhei pōuri roa e kīia ana ko "te tohorā". Ināianei kua iti iho i te whitu rā te mamao atu o te rūpahu New Horizons o te pokapū mokowā o Amerika (NASA) i tōna rerenga hītori. Nā te mea ka hipa atu i te mata o te aorangi whito i te tawhiti iti iho i te 13,000km, e hopu ana i te tini o ngā atahanga me ētahi atu momo raraunga pūtaiao. Ka pine koi ngā pikitia i taua wā, e whakaatu ana i ngā ūnga i runga i te mata o te tinana 2,300km whānui i tētahi taumira pai ake i te 100m mō ia pika. I te mahere i tēnei whārangi, he iti iho te whakatau i ngā āhuahira. I riro mai ngā whakaahua i hangaia ai i waenganui i te 27 o Pipiri me te 3 o Hōngongoi. He pahekotanga o ngā whakaahua mai i te kāmera taumira tiketike, "pango me te mā", o Lorri, me tōna taumira raro, atahanga tae e mōhiotia ana ko Ralph. Ko te wāhi mā i waenganui e taupoki ana i te mata o te aorangi whito ka puta mai ki New Horizons i te tata tata atu. Ki te rāwhiti ko te whenua kōpikopiko i puta ai te nuinga o ngā kōrero i tēnei wā. Kāore i te mārama he aha te tohu o ēnei pupuhi. He rau km te tawhiti o ia mea. Kei roto i te "hiku" o te tohorā, i te taha mauī o te mahere, he mea e rite ana ki te tōnati. Tērā pea he māra pānga, he puia rānei, ahakoa i tēnei taumira ka noho tonu tētahi whakamāramatanga hei taurangi parakore. Kua ora a New Horizons i tōna raruraru mutunga wiki, i reira ka tūtuki te rūpahu ki tētahi aratau haumaru pare, ā, ka taka ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ki Te Ao mō te neke atu i te haora. E kī ana ngā kaipūkaha e mārama ana rātau ki te take o te hē rorohiko. Ko tēnei momo hapa, e āwhina ana rātau, kua whakahaeretia ināianei mō ngā rā hītori o te rūpahu. Tae atu ki te Wenerei, he iti iho i te 7.5 miriona km mai i Pluto a New Horizons. E neke ana i te tata ki te 14km/s - he tere rawa ki te haere ki te āwhiotanga i te 14 o Hōngongoi. Engari, me kohikohi kē ia i ngā mōhiohio katoa e taea ana i a ia e tahitahi ana i mua i a Pluto anake, engari ko ōna marama e rima hoki: Charon, Styx, Nix, Kerberos, me Hydra. Ka puta te rere i te huritau 50 o te hipanga angitu tuatahi o Amerika o Mars e te waka ātea Mariner 4. Hei whakataurite, ka kohia e New Horizons kia 5,000 ngā raraunga i Pluto i te Aorangi Whero. Ko te uaua o New Horizons ko te whakahoki i aua mōhiohio katoa ki Te Ao. He nui te tawhiti ki Pluto - neke atu i te 4.5 billion km - ā, he iti rawa ngā mokatere moka. Tērā pea ka pau te 16 marama ki te whakatangi anō i ia wāhanga pūtaiao i whiwhi i te wiki e whai ake nei. Ka whakamātauria e te AO tētahi hōtaka Sky At Night motuhake e kiia nei ko Pluto Revealed i te Mane 20 o Hōngongoi, e whakamātauria ana ngā wā nunui katoa mai i te rere o New Horizons. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i runga i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: Ka puta atu te pāremata 'whakatoi ā-waha' o Wīwī, a Denis Baupin
summary: Kua puta atu te kaikōrero tuarua o te pāremata i Wīwī i muri i te whakapae whakatoi ki a ia e ngā hoa mahi.
text: I whāwhā a Denis Baupin i tētahi mema wahine o te Rōpū Kākāriki, a, ka tukuna he karere mārama ki ētahi atu, ka kī nga wāhine i roto i ngā uiuinga i roto i te pāpāho Wīwī. Ka kī atu tana rōia ki a Agence France-Presse kua whakarerea e Tēnā Baupin tana tūranga. I tāpiritia e ia a Tēnā Baupin i whakakāhore i nga whakaaro, ā, tērā pea ka tono i nga wāhine mo te tūtaratara. I mua o te Mane, i tonoa e te perehitini o te Whakaminenga o te Motu, a Claude Bartolone, kia whakarerea a Tēnā Baupin. Tokowhā nga wāhine i whakaritea nga whakaaro ki nga rōpū rongokōrero Wīwī o Wīwī o Wīwī Inter me Mediapart i te Mane. I kī a Wīwī Inter i kōwhiria e nga wāhine kia haere mai ki mua i muri i te hoatutanga a Tēnā Baupin i tana tautoko i a Mati ki tētahi whakahau kōtaha tiketike e whakahē ana i te tukino ki nga wāhine. I kī tētahi o ana kaiwhakapae, ko te kaikorero o te Rōpū Kākāriki, ko Sandrine Rousseau, i whāwhā a Tēnā Baupin i tōna uma i roto i tētahi pānuitanga, a, ka ngana ki te kihi i a ia. I tana kōrero ki ngā hoa mahi tokorua, ka kī tētahi: "Aue, kua tīmata anō ia", te kī a Ms Rousseau. Tokotoru ētahi atu mema o te Rōpū Kākāriki i kī kua whiwhi rātau i te maha o ngā karere mārama, i te kaupapa rānei o te whanonga whakarihariha, mai i a Tēnā Baupin. He mema te pakeke e 53 tau no te Rōpū Kākāriki, e tino wehewehea ana, tae noa ki tērā marama. I kī ana kaiwhakapae i mataku rātau i mua mo a rātau mahi, a, kaore i kōrero. Ko ētahi o ngā whakaaro e 15 tau ki muri. Kua mārena a Tāne Baupin ki a Emmanuelle Cosse, te minita whare i te kāwanatanga Manapori o Te Kāwanatanga o Te T I roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i te ahiahi o te Mane, ka kī te rōia a Tāne Baupin e "tino whakakāhore ana i te kerēme o te whakatoi ā-waha me te tukino, he ariā tauhou ki a ia".

title: E pātai ana ngā kaituhi pouaka whakaata wāhine, kei hea ngā kaituhi pouaka whakaata wahine katoa?
summary: Neke atu i te 70 ngā kaituhi pouaka whakaata wahine kua hainatia he reta e whakapae ana i ngā rangatira whakaari kāore i te hoatu wāhi ki a rātau ki te mahi i ngā whakaaturanga tuatahi.
text: Ko te reta tuwhera, e kī ana ko te whakaari o Ingarangi he "tino tuhituhi e ngā tāngata", i hainatia e 76 ngā kaituhituhi. I kī rātau i rongo rātau i te "mōrearea me te riri" i te kore mahi a nga wāhine e tae ana ki te mata i roto i ngā whakaari pouaka whakaata o runga. I haere mai te AO me te ITV mō te whakahē, engari i tohu rāua ki te maha o ngā hōtaka nui me ngā kaituhi wahine. I kī te reta, i whakaputaina e Pāohotanga: "Te āhua nei he nui rawa te āputa i waenganui i te kōmihana me te hanganga ina tae mai ki ngā mahi a te wahine." Ko ngā kaihaina - kua tuhituhi mō ngā whakaaturanga pēnei i EastEnders, Emmerdale me Midsomer Murders - i whakapuaki i te "mamae me te pōrearea" o te kore e kite i ētahi atu wāhine i roto i ngā taumata tiketike o te whakaari pouaka whakaata. E pā ana te reta ki tētahi tuhipānui i Cultbox, e iwa ngā whakaari ITV hōu mō te 2018. "O ngā whakaari hou e iwa i rārangitia, kotahi anake he kaituhi ārahi wahine," te kī a te reta. "I runga i te tika, kāore te tuhipānui i te tūturu, mai i te wā i whakaputaina ai, kua pānuitia e ITV e rua anō ngā whakaari mō te 2018. Na ngā kaituhi tāne rāua tahi. "E hua ana tērā he iti iho i te 10% o ngā whakaari hou e ITV mō tēnei tau ka tuhia e ngā wāhine. Tērā pea ka mārama koe ki tō mātou riri?" I kī te reta e rima anake ngā kaituhi wahine i whakamahia e te Kaiwhakaatu Ngū o TE AO i roto i tana whakahaerenga 20 tau, ā, ka whakahē i a Tākuta Wai mō ngā rangatū e rima i tuhia katoatia e ngā tāngata. I whakamahia te 'An Unpped Resource' Call the Midwife hei tauira o tētahi whakaari āhua kore nei me tētahi tīma tuhituhi wahine. I whakamāramatia e te reta he nui nga wāhine i roto i nga "puni whakaara o te tuhituhi pouaka whakaata", pēnei i te hopi. Ko ngā opera hopi "e tono ana i te auahatanga, te ōritetanga me te pūmahara whakaahua mō ngā tau pūrākau me ngā pūāhua tino nui", te kī a te reta. "Heoi anō, ka noho tonu ēnei kaituhi wahine whai pūkenga, pukumahi hoki hei rauemi kāore anō kia mahia." E kī ana, kāore ngā wāhine i te "whiwhi ki ngā whakaaturanga taumata panuku e taea ai e rātou te whakawhanake anō i ō rātou pūkenga me te whakapiki i ō rātou kōtaha". I whakapuakina e te reta: "He whakahauhau te nui o ngā whakaari ITV hōu he pūāhua wahine i mua, i waenganui. He rawe te kite kei te kōrerotia ngā pūrākau wahine ināianei. It's just that we feel we might be better qualified to tell our own stories." He tīma rerekē 'hira, he mea nui' Hei urupare, ka kī te HAU: "Kua tuhia e ngā wāhine neke atu i te 40% o te whakaari a te upoko o te whakaari a Piers Wenger mai i te wā i tangohia ai te tūranga i te tau ki mua." Mā te miramira i ngā kaituhi pēnei i a Anna Symon, nāna i whiwhi i tana rangatū taketake tuatahi - I kī a Wenger: "I te nuinga o te wā ko te whakaari haere tonu te wāhi anake hei kaituhi hou, engari ehara i te mea ā-rua ināianei." I whakaaturia hoki e Wenger kua tuhia e nga wāhine "he maha" o ngā hōtuhi mō te rangatū tuatahi o Doctor Who a Chris Chibnall. "He tika, he mea hira, he mea nui hoki te whai tīma rerekē i runga i taua whakaaturanga," tana kī. I kī te upoko o te whakaari a ITV, a Polly Hill: "Ko te whakaari o nā tata nei i ITV - Bancroft, Wikitōria, Next of Kin, Girlfriends me Vera - he kaituhi wahine katoa, me ngā kaiārahi wahine kaha. " Kāore te rārangi e pā ana ki te pikitia katoa o ngā kōmihana ITV. E whā ā mātou whakaari hou i tuhia e ngā wāhine kāore anō kia pānuitia, tae atu ki ngā kaituhi wahine e mahi ana i ngā rangatū e hoki mai ana." I tāpiri mai a ia: "I a mātou e titiro ana ki te tuku i ngā kaimātakitaki i te awhe tino nui o te whakaari, ka tautoko tonu mātou me te kōmihana i ngā kaituhi wahine, ā, ka tino nui te whakaaturanga i runga, i waho hoki o te mata." title: I whakaae a Anders Breivik ki te Whare Wānanga o Nōwei o Oslo
summary: Kua toa te kaipatu nui o Nōwei o Anders Behring Breivik i tētahi wāhi ki te ako i te pūtaiao tōrangapū i te whare wānanga o Oslo.
text: I whakaae te pakeke e 36 tau ki te patu i ngā tāngata e 77 i tana pohū i waenganui o Oslo, kātahi ka haere ki tētahi puni taitamariki i tētahi motu pātata i te tau 2011. Kua ako a Breivik i ētahi kōwae akoranga mai i te tono tuatahi ki te Whare Wānanga o Oslo i te tau 2013, engari ināianei ka whakaakona ia hei ākonga katoa. Kaore a ia e whakapā atu ki ngā kaimahi, ki ngā ākonga rānei i a ia e ako ana i tōna pūtau. I te tau 2012, i whiua ia ki te mōrahi 21 tau i roto i te whare herehere mo te mahi i te whawhaitanga kino o Nōwei mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Ka taea te whakaroa i tēnei wā herehere mehemea e whakaarotia ana he mōrearea tonu ia ki te iwi. I kī te tumuaki o te whare wānanga, a Ole Petter Ottersen, ko ngā herehere o Nōwei "e whai mana ana ki te whai i te mātauranga tiketike i Nōwei mēnā ka tutuki i a rātou ngā whakaritenga whakauru, ā, ka angitu i te whakataetae ki ētahi atu kaitono." I te tuhituhi i runga i te paetukutuku o te whare wānanga, ka whakaae a Tēnā Ottersen kua anga atu te whare wānanga ki "ngā matawaenga whanonga" mō te whakaurunga a Breivik. I tāpiritia e te tumuaki he tauira tā te whare wānanga i patua e Breiv. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ka ū te whare wānanga ki ōna ture "mō tātau ake, ehara mōna." I a ia e ako ana i tōna whare herehere, ka herea a Breivik ki ngā ture pākaha. Kāore ia e whakaaetia kia uru ki ngā rauemi ipurangi, kia whiwhi rānei i ētahi tohutohu whaiaro mai i ngā kaiako. Ka tū ngā whakawhitiwhitinga katoa ki te whare wānanga mā "tētahi tangata hoapā i roto i te whare herehere". I tono tuatahi a Breivik ki te ako i te tau 2013 engari kāore i tutuki i ngā whakaritenga tāurunga i te mea kāore anō ia kia oti i te kura tuarua. Heoi anō, i whakaaetia ia ki te ako i ētahi kōwae pūtaiao tōrangapū. I kitea e tētahi kōti o Oslo he mahi pūtōraru tōmua tana mahi whakamate i tētahi puni taitamariki o te Rōpū Mahi i te motu o Utoeya. I whāngaia e ia ngā tirohanga parirau matau pūhāhā, a, i kī mai kua urupare a ia ki tāna i kite ai he mahi a Pākehā-Āmāri o Uropi.

title: Ngā tina pōkai: Te mamae me ngā mōrearea mō ngā mātua
summary: I te wā e hoatu ana ki ngā kaiako te hurihanga e tētahi arotakenga whaimana o ngā hapa kura ki te tirotiro i ngā tina pōkai a ngā tauira, ka tiria e te kaipānui mātauranga me te whaea o Hana Rārangi ētahi mea ngaro hara.
text: Ko te toru o nga rā i roto i te haupae kua hoki mai tētahi āporo i roto i te tina pōkai a taku tama. He whero whero tonu, engari he nui haere te piripiri, he māmā hoki te pakaru i ōna haerenga, e whakaaro ana ahau mēnā ka whakahokia mai mō te whā o ngā wā me tētahi tuhipoka Poutāpeta e kī ana, 'Kainga ahau, ki tētahi atu rānei!' i runga i te tūmanako huakore ka kai tonu ia. "He aha ahau i kai ai i tētahi mea i roto i taku pouaka tina mo te whā rā, e Mā?" te kī a te pakeke e whitu tau i roto i te pōhēhētanga tūturu. He ngenge rawa ki te tautohetohe, e whakaae ana ahau he take tāna, ka whakakapia ki tētahi paramu hou me ētahi cherries, e mōhio ana ahau ka hoki mai rātau i roto i te pō nei. He aha tēnei pārekareka i pēnei ai ahau i te rahunga hei matua? He aha hoki i mamae ai te mahi ngāwari o te pōkai i aku tamariki ki tētahi pouaka kī tonu i te kai? Ina whāngaia e ngā kararehe a rātau tamariki, te āhua nei he tauwhitinga ngāwari noa iho. Heoi anō, ki a tātau pakeke, me o tātau mōhiotanga tangata katoa me ngā tohutohu kai, he tino māminga. Tērā pea - kei te uaua rawa ngā kaupapa here tina pōkai a ngā mātua me ngā kura. Tērā pea he raina pai i waenganui i te kai hauora me te mate kai, i taku tirohanga, ā, i ētahi wā he māuiui rōpū te raruraru, ehara i te mea nā te tangata. Te āhua nei ehara ahau i te mea ko au anake e whakamamae ana i a au i runga i nga tina pōkai a aku tamariki. E kī ana te whaea o Olivia: "Me tino wawao ahau, i te mea kua pōkai katoa aku tina tokotoru, ā, ehara ahau i te tangata e whakarite ana i te pō i mua, he pai ki a au te whakaaro he hou rawa a rātau hanawiti. " Kua tapahia nga kirinuku e tētahi. I te kaha o te tangi a Hemi mo te kore e hiahia ki te kai i ngā kirinuku, nā reira i huatau tana kaiako kia tapahia... kāore i mahia i te kāinga. "Ko ērā atu tokorua e hiahia ana ki te hawhe hanawiti anake nā te mea he tino pōturi te kai, ā, ki te kore e tere te whakaoti, ka tapahia ki roto i tō rāua wā tākaro utu nui!" Ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Nō nā tata nei i tukuna mai e taku tāne he tuhinga e whakamārama ana i ngā kino o ngā mīti tukatuka, nā reira mō tētahi wā e tunu ana ahau i ngā tunu mō ngā tapahi mātao. Kaore i roa ka hoki ahau ki te patopato, a, ka hokona anō e au te tukatuka." Te muna hara E ngana ana tātau katoa hei mātua ki te mahi i te pai rawa atu, me te pupuri i te kāinga. He nui rawa ngā kaitao rongonui e kōrero mai ana ki a mātau he ngāwari noa iho te whakakotahi i te tunu kai mai i te raruraru me te mahi pukumahi me te oranga whānau - me te iti noa iho o te whakaritenga. Ko te mea e wareware ana ki a rātau, ko te tunu kai hai oranga. Ko te mea pono, kāore e taea e tātau katoa te whakahaere, kāore hoki e tika kia herea e tātau ina pai te mahi a tētahi mīhini pai, mōhinuhinu i roto i te wheketere. Ahakoa rā, ko taku muna tina pōkai tino hara ko te tuku i taku tama ki te kura me tētahi taonga i hangaia e te hokomaha, pēnei i te tīhi me te huamata pasta. Mō ētahi take he pai ake i te mea kāinga. Tērā pea ko te nui o ngā whakakakara waihanga me te kāpia Xanthum e hoatu ana i te tapa. Engari kei te whakamā rawa ahau ki te waiho ki roto i tōna pōkai taketake, ki te puta he āhua māngere ahau, nā reira ka whakawhitia ki roto i te pouaka kirihou kia puta atu hei mōku ake. Ahakoa ka tunu katoa mātou i te raruraru, ka mutu a tātau mahi toa i roto i te tīmatanga mai i ngā kaimahi tautoko o te kura - i a tātau ake tamariki rānei. Ko te whakamātau pai a Rahera ki tētahi mea hou, hauora hoki, e kī ana i te katoa. Choc-chip contraband "I tētahi wā i pōkaitia e au ngā kōtiro ki tētahi Tupperware kī tonu i te pasta me te pesto (kātahi anō ka hangaia!) - i te whakaaro kei te hoatu e au he huringa pai ki a rātau - kia pānuitia anake te mahi whakararuraru ina hoki mai rātou i te mea he nati!" E kī ana a ia he rerekē te urupare a ana tamāhine tokorua. "I pāngia tētahi e te wāhanga, ā, i māharahara ka tapaina ia mo te ora - otirā he tino mate nati tētahi kōtiro i roto i tana karaehe. Ahakoa te āhua nei he pārekareka tētahi ki te kore e tika ki te kai i te kai rāhui." Ehara hoki a ia i te whaea tuatahi e pōrangi ana i te nati. I whiwhi a Julie i tētahi karanga kōhukihuki i a ia e mahi ana i tētahi rā mai i te kura o tana tamāhine, e kī ana: "Kua tonoa ia e koe ki te kura me ngā hanawiti pata pīnati. Kei te mōhio koe ki tāu i mahi ai?" E miharo ana te whaea o tētahi o Ruth mehemea he nui ake ngā ture o te kura mō te kai hauora ki te whakamātau i te kaha o ngā mātua. E kī ana a ia: "I ētahi wā ko tāu e hiahia ana ki te tuku i tō tamaiti ki te kura me tētahi keke tiakarete tino toru i roto i tā rātou pouaka tina hei tiritiri ki ō rātou hoa katoa i mua i te tōia atu e ngā pirihimana hapa!" Ko te pono, e kopikopiko ana tātau katoa i ngā ara hokohoko ki te rapu i te whakaaweawe, engari he tokomaha o tātau e mutu ana ki ngā tūemi tawhito ōrite. Ahakoa tērā pea ka whakakīa te hara o ngā mātua nā te mea kei te whakaaro mātou kāore mātou i te tuku i te kai tino rerekē, mō te tokomaha o ngā tamariki ka whakaputa te mōhiotanga i te mauruuru. E kī ana a Helen: "Te āhua nei he ōrite te mea a Maddie i ia rā, i ia rā. Ko te tikanga kia hōhā a ia, engari e pūmau ana he pai. "E kore a ia e whakaae ki te whai i tētahi mea kino, ki te korerotia ia. Kua ngana ahau ki te puru i tētahi pihikete rīwai, hanawiti tiamu rānei, engari ka kī mai a ia ki a au." Mehemea he ngāwari noa iho ngā mea i tōku kāinga, i reira ka whakarewaina e taku tama ngā poho i te pō i runga i te kāpata kai i a au e kaukau ana i tōna tuahine. Heoi anō, ko te tina pōkai he toronga o te tēpu hapa a te whānau e mutu ai ngā pakanga o tēnei rā i roto i te kai pārekareka o āpōpō. Hei tā Dr Christopher Green, te kaituhi o te pukapuka matua Toddler Taming: "Ka taea e mātou te kōwhiri i te kai kaihoahoa hauora rawa, purua ki runga i te pereti, tae atu ki roto i te waha o te kōhungahunga, engari ki te whakatau rātou kei te haere tonu - checkmate - kēmu mutu." Ahakoa kua akona ahau e te wheako kāore he take o te whakahau, kāore e taea e au te āwhina i a au anō.

title: Ko te monorail 'Futuristic' i tonoa mō Derby
summary: E tonoa ana tētahi monorail piriona pauna "futuristic", i whakaawetia e tētahi e hangaia ana mō ngā tara tahito o Ihipa, kia tūhono i a Derby ki tētahi pokapū HS2 pea.
text: I kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o te taone, a Chris Poulter, ka whakahaere te huarahi i te rangi i ngā tāngata mai i te pokapū o te taone ki te teihana tereina tere rawa i Toton, i Rātata. I kī a Tēnā Poulter he "mea tino futuristic" te kaupapa, ā, ko tētahi o ngā whiringa maha e whakaarotia ana. Heoi anō, ka kī ngā tohunga o te rēra ka taea e te monorail te "whakakino i a Derby". 'Ehara i te tūruhi tūruhi' I kī a Tēnā Poulter ko te ariā, ehara anō i te kaupapa whai tikanga, ka mauria ngā pāhihi ki Toton mā te takiwā pakihi me ngā hākinakina i Pride Park. I kī te Tari Waka (DfT) e haere ana tētahi arotakenga o te kaupapa HS2. I kī a Tēnā Poulter he tūhononga tere ake, he iti iho hoki te urutomo i te tereina, ā, ka tāpiritia e te kaunihera te karanga ki te tohunga o te kaiwhakanao o Te Wānanga o Bombardier, e hanga ana i ngā tereina monorail mō Kairo, Ihipa. "Kei te hanga a Bombardier i ngā waka monorail mō ngā tara, nā reira he aha e kore ai e taea e tātau tētahi mea pēnei i Derby?" tana kī. Te kanohi o te wā heke? Neke atu i te tekau tau ki muri i kōrerorerotia ngā mahere mō tētahi pūnaha ōrite. Kāore anō te kaunihera kia kōrero me pēhea te utu o te aronui hou - e tūmanakohia ana kia noho piriona - engari i kī te (DfT) e whakahauhau ana i ngā aratau waka auaha. I kī a Will Tanner, he kaiwhakahaere o Bombardier, he "tino whai hua" te ariā. "Kei a mātou te hangarau hei mahi, nā reira he aha i kore ai?" tana kī. Heoi anō, i kī a Sim Harris, te kaiwhakatika o Railnews, he rite tonu te "whakararuraru" o ngā monorails, ā, ka pai ake te whakaaro o Derby ki tētahi rerewhenua māmā hei tūhono ki HS2. "Kāore anō kia tino angitu ngā monorails i mua," tana kī. "He take motuhake te mea e hangaia ana i Ihipa nā te mea he tūruhi tūruhi tēnā, engari ehara te hononga i waenganui i a Derby me Toton hei tūruhi tūruhi. " E tūmanako ana ahau kāore e puta nā te mea e whakaaro ana ahau ka whakarerekē i a Derby. E tohutohu ana ahau i te kaunihera kia whakaarohia ngā hua." I kī tētahi kaikōrero DfT: "Kātahi anō ka tukuna e mātou he whakaaro mō te kaupae māmā, ki te rapu i ngā whakaaro me ngā ariā hōu hei whakamōhio i ngā momo waka auaha ki roto i o mātau taone me ngā taone." I tāpiritia e ia te whakataunga mēnā ka whakaurua he monorail i Derby ki te kaunihera o te taone. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Covid: Ko te momo coronavirus hou kei Wales
summary: Kei Wales kē tētahi momo coronavirus hou i kitea e rere haere ana i Ingarangi, kua whakaūngia e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh.
text: I te Mane, i kii te kawanatanga o UK ko te momo "ka honoa pea" ki te horapa tere ake i te tonga ki te rawhiti o Ingarangi. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e 10 neke atu rānei ngā kēhi i whakaūngia i Wales, ā, he nui ake ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana kia kitea. I kī tētahi tohunga e āwhina ana ki te aroturuki i ngā irakētanga o te huaketo "kāore ia i te tino māharahara" me te tohe kia marino. Neke atu i te 1,000 ngā kēhi kua tuhia puta noa i ngā rohe kaunihera Ingarihi e 60. I kī a Matt Hancock, te minita kāwanatanga o UK e whakahaere ana i te NHS i Ingarangi, "kāore he mea hei huatau" nāna i kino ake te mate, kāore rānei ngā kano ārai mate e mahi ināianei. I tana pānuitanga i ngā rāhuitanga uaua ake i Rānana me ētahi wāhanga o Essex me Hertfordshire, ka kī a ia: "Kua kitea e mātou i tēnei wā neke atu i te 1,000 ngā kēhi me tēnei momo i te tonga o Ingarangi, ahakoa kua kitea ngā kēhi i roto i ngā wāhi mana ā-rohe rerekē e 60. " Kāore mātou i te mōhio ki te whānuitanga o tēnei nā te momo hou, engari ahakoa tōna take me mahi tere, he tino nui rawa ki te whakahaere i tēnei mate whakamate i te wā e whakataka ana te rongoā." I kī a ia kua whakamōhiotia te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao mō te momo hou, ā, kei te mahi ngā kaipūtaiao UK i ngā akoranga taipitopito. I kī te Ahorangi o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare T Kei te whakamōhio tonu te huaketo i ēnei huringa i a ia e haere ana." Ko te nuinga o ngā irakētanga ki te waehere iranga o te huaketo e kore e pā ki tōna mōrea ki te iwi whānui, engari i kī a ia he mea nui kia mātakina nā te mea ko te pikinga o te pāpātanga o tētahi rerekētanga tērā pea mō tētahi "take koiora" pēnei i te nui ake o te whakawhitinga. I kī a Prof Connor ko te taupēnga hou - e kiia nei ko N501Y - ka taea te whakaiti i te pai o te rongoā nā te mea ko ngā irakētanga "e taka ana ki roto i ngā pūmua tara". "Koia tērā te pūmua i waho o te huaketo e āwhina ana ki te uru ki roto i ngā pūtau me te whakapokenga," tana whakamārama. E whakawhirinaki ana ngā kano ārai mate Moderna me Pfizer/Biontech ki ngā pūmua taraiwa, te kī a Prof Connor. Ka tohe a ia ki te iwi kia kaua e mataku, kia whai tonu i ngā tohutohu kia mātakitaki i te tawhiti pāpori, horoi i ō ringaringa me te mau ārai kanohi. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te neke pea mātou ki te wāhi e haere ai mātou mai i tēnei he taiepa ki tētahi mate toitū - nā reira he mate e rere haere ana i roto i te iwi whānui, ā, ka werohia e mātou i ia tau, hei tauira pēnei i a tātau ki te rewharewha." I tāruatia e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he "māhorahora te huaketo ki te whakangū", me te tāpiri i ētahi atu raupapatanga me te aroturuki. I kī a Dr Gill Richardson, ko ia te āpiha kawenga matua mō te kano ārai mate Covid-19 i Wales: "Ko ngā huaketo he mea ora e huri ana, e urutau ana, ā, e mōhio ana mātou mai i te huaketo taketake o Wuhan e 25 tonu ngā irakētanga. " He mea nui kia kī, i tēnei wā kāore i te whakaarohia kia pā ki te whanonga o te huaketo, ā, kāore i te whakaarohia kia pā ki te pai o te rongoā." He ture ngāwari mō te mārama ki ngā "momo hou" katoa, "ngā momo hou" rānei: Pātai mēnā kua rerekē te whanonga o te huaketo. He tino nui tēnei i te mea e whakangū ana ngā huaketo i ngā wā katoa, koia tonu tā rātou mahi. Nō tēnei wā kua hoatu ki a mātau te "whakamataku" engari ehara i te "whakautu". I kii a Matt Hancock ko te momo hou o te coronavirus "ka honoa pea" ki te tere ake o te horapa i te tonga-rawhiti o Ingarangi. Ehara tēnei i te ōrite ki te kī "kei te take" te pikinga, ā, kāore a Tēnā Hancock i kī kua tere ake te horapa o tēnei huaketo mai i te tangata ki te tangata. Ka nui ake pea ngā momo hōu mō ngā take kāore he pānga ki te huaketo. Ko tētahi whakamāramatanga mō te putanga mai o te "momo Pāniora" i te raumati ko te tāpoi. Nā reira i tēnei wā he kupu matua whakamataku i ngā wāhi katoa, engari kāore tonu he taipitopito pūtaiao kia mōhio ai he pēhea te nui o tēnei. Ko nga rongo o te momo hou ka puta mai i te piki haere tonu o nga keehi i Wales. I te Mane i whakaaturia kua takahi kē a Wales i ētahi o ngā tohu matua e whakamahia ana hei whakatau mēnā ka raka te whenua. I kī te Minita Tuatahi a Mark Drakeford ka taea te whakauru i tētahi raka i muri i te Kirihimete ki te kore e tīmata te hinga. Ko nga whika o te Hauora Tūmatanui o Wales i te Mane i whakaatu i a Merthyr Tydfil te reeti keehi teitei rawa atu i te UK, me te 870.3 nga keehi mo ia 100,000 tangata i roto i nga ra e whitu o mua tata nei. E waru nga rohe o Welsh i roto i nga rohe 10 me nga reeti keehi teitei rawa atu i te UK.

title: Ko ngā Tasers mō ngā pirihimana o mua 'he hē'
summary: He hē te tuku Tasers ki ngā pirihimana katoa o mua, ka kī tētahi pirihimana me te komihana hara o Welsh.
text: E ātete ana a Christopher Salmon ki te kaupapa a Steve White, te upoko o te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana. E tautohe ana a Tēnā Mā ka taea e ngā pūrere te pare i ngā āpiha ki "ngā tāngata mōrearea". Engari i kī te komihana o Dyfed-Powys, a Tēnā Salmon: "He hē te patu auau ki ngā Tasers, ā, ka tautohe ki ngā tikanga o te mahi pirihimana o Ingarangi." I kī te komihana mō ngā Pirihimana o South Wales, a Alun Michael, kāore a ia i te whakahē i te whakamahinga o ngā Tasers, engari i tāpiri mai: "He take mō te whakataunga paetata. " Ko te tikanga ko te rangatira kātipa, e haepapa ana ki ngā pirihimana me te komihana hara, ki te whakatau me pēhea, ki hea hoki e whakamahia ai, i raro hoki i ngā whakaritenga." I whakaurua ngā Tasers ki ngā pirihimana o Ingarangi i te tau 2003 hei whiringa whakamate kore mō ngā āpiha patu e anga ana ki ngā pōhēhētanga mōrearea. E hiahiatia ana ngā āpiha kia whai akoranga whakangungu i mua i te whakaaetanga ki te whakamahi i tētahi Taser, ā, ka kīia anake kia horaina ina whakawehitia ki te tutu. I te tau 2013, e 10,380 ngā wā i horaina ai ngā pūrere puta noa i Ingarangi me Weera, ā, e 154 ngā amuamu mō tō rātou whakamahinga. He maha nga mate e pā ana ki te whakamahinga o nga pū whakaoho.

title: Ko nga tautīaki taitapa o Ārepa e herea ana i Pakitāne
summary: Kua herea e nga pirihimana o Hōia e toru nga tautīaki taitapa o Ārepa i muri i to rātau whakawhiti i te rohe, ka mate i tētahi tangata, a, ka whara i tētahi atu i roto i tētahi motokā i whaia e rātau, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere.
text: E kī ana nga pirihimana i hopukina nga tautīaki mo te tomo ki Pakitāne me te patu i tētahi motu o Hōia. E kī ana tētahi pūrongo e whaia ana nga tāngata nā te mea i uru rātau ki te maunu taitapa. Kaore anō kia puta he kōrero mo taua mahi mai i nga kaiwhakahaere o Ārepa. I pā mai i tētahi rohe taitapa tūhāhā o te takiwā o Baluchistan o Pakitāne me te rohe o Sistan-Baluchistan o Irana. Kāore i te mārama ngā taipitopito mō te raupapa o ngā takahanga. E kī ana nga kaiwhakahaere o Hōia i whaia e nga tautīaki o Ārepa nga tāngata ki Pakitāne, a, e ngana ana ki te whakahoki i a rātau ki Irana. I whakatuwheratia e nga ope a Ārepa he ahi ki runga i te waka e haere ana nga tāngata, e whakapae ana nga pirihimana. "I whara rāua tahi o ngā Hūpia, a, kotahi i mate ā muri ake. E karapoti ana ngā hōia hōia i te rohe i ngā Ārepa, ā, kua mauria rātau ki te tiakitanga," te kī a Saeed, ko tētahi pirihimana pirihimana o te rohe, ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. Kāore i te mārama mēnā i whakaraua nga tautīaki, ā, i tīkina mai nga tāngata hōia ki te oneone o Hōia, o Ārepa rānei.

title: E karanga ana ngā tākuta ki te whakamutu i ngā whakakapinga konganuku
summary: E kī ana ngā tākuta tohunga i te UK kia kaua ngā tūroro e hoatu ki ngā whakakapinga konganuku katoa, ahakoa ngā whakaūnga mai i ngā kaiwhakarite i waenganui i ngā āwangawanga haumaru.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Mīharo RobertsHealth, Ka taea e ngā whakatō konganuku-konganuku nui te pānga kino ki te mau. Nō nā tata nei i kitea ai e te Newsnight o TE AO me te British Medical Journal ngā raruraru e mōhiotia ana mō te nuinga o nga tau. E tohe ana te Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) ka taea tonu te whakamahi i ngā whakatō, engari kāore te British Hip Society e whakaae. E kī ana ōna tākuta kia kaua e mahia ngā mahinga. Engari kāore e pāngia ngā tūroro whai hononga iti iho i te 36mm (1.4in) me te hunga kua ara anō te hope. I kī te MHRA i tērā wiki ko ngā tūroro kua pā kē ki ngā whakakapinga konganuku-konganuku nui - e 49,000 ngā tūroro katoa - me aroturuki ia tau mo te ora. I kī te kaiwhakarite me whai whakamātautau toto rātau hei tirotiro i ngā otaota konganuku meneti mai i ngā hononga, me ngā karapa atahanga resonance autō mēnā kua whakarewaina e rātou ngā taumata konganuku, ka whakaatu rānei i ngā āhuatanga kino. E ai ki ngā whika hou mai i te National Joint Registry for England and Wales, tata ki te 1,400 ngā tūroro he whakakapinga konganuku-konganuku nui i te tau 2010. E kī ana te Rōpū Hip o Ingarangi kia kaua ngā tūroro pēnei e whiwhi i aua whakatōnga nā te mea kāore i te nui ngā whakaaturanga hei whakaatu i ngā painga e nui ake ana i ngā mōrea. Engari i kī a Dr Susanne Ludgate, ko te kaiwhakahaere rongoā o te MHRA, i whakatautikatia nga whakatō i ētahi wā. "E mōhio ana mātou he whakaaturanga puta noa iho o te nui ake o ngā mokatere arotakenga e pā ana ki ngā whakakapinga nui o te konganuku-ki-te-konganuku. Engari he whāranu ngā whakaaturanga rongoā, ā, kāore tēnei e tautoko i to rātau tangohanga i te mākete. Mā ngā whakatō pūkaha konganuku-ki-te-konganuku e āhei ai ngā tūroro rangatahi ki te ārahi i ngā oranga mamae, takitahi. "Ko te ōrautanga o ngā tūroro i whakatōngia ki ēnei whakatō konganuku nui i heke ki te 2% i te 2010, ā, kei te heke haere tonu. " Tērā ētahi atu whakakapinga hope e wātea ana e kitea ana he hua pai mō ngā tūroro. "Kei te āta tirotiro tonu te MHRA, i roto i tā mātou rōpū tohutohu tohunga, i ngā whakaaturanga hōu rawa mō ēnei pūrere. Ka tere tā mātou mahi mēnā e hiahiatia ana e mātou, ā, mēnā he pātai tā ngā tūroro, me kōrero rātou ki tō rātou tākuta tākuta orthopaedic, tākuta rānei."

title: I karangatia ngā tuki tōmua o te Kirihimete i muri i te 'hua'
summary: Kua karangatia te mahi taraiwa i runga i te whatunga Merseyrail i muri i tētahi "hua nui" i roto i tētahi tautohetohe roa mō ngā tereina whakahaere atekōkiri anake (DOO).
text: I roto i ngā rangatū hou o ngā hīkoi, i whakaaro ngā kaimahi ki te tuki i ia Hātarei mō te iwa wiki mai i te 2 o Whiringa Whiringa. Ināianei kua whakatārewatia ngā mahi katoa i muri i te tono a te kamupene e whakaū ana i tētahi tautiaki i ia tereina, e kī ana te uniana o te Rail, Maritime and Transport (TT). I kī a Merseyrail ināianei ka mahi ki tētahi mahi whakamutunga ki te uniana. I tīmata te mahi mahi i runga i te whatunga i te tau 2017 i muri i te whakaurunga o ngā DOO - e kati ai ngā atekōkiri i ngā tatau, kaua ko ngā tautiaki. I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o TE WĀ, a Mick Cash, he "whanaketanga nui" te tāpae hou. "Kua whakahokia e mātou i te tuma o te mahi atekōkiri anake puta noa i Merseyrail ehara i te mea ko te pūmautanga anake o tētahi tautiaki i ia tereina, engari he kī taurangi ka pupuri taua tautiaki i tētahi tūranga haumaru." I kōrerorerotia ngā tono hou i tētahi hui a ngā māngai o TE WHT me te kaiwhakahaere ā-motu o te uniana. I kī te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Merseyrail, a Andy Heath: "E koa ana ahau i muri i te whakaaro i te Komiti Nui o te Motu o TE Motu, kua tautokona e te Komiti Nui o te Motu te kaupapa hou i roto i te tumuaki, ā, i taua wā, kua hoatu ki ā mātou kiritaki, kaihoko me ngā kaihokohoko te painga o te ārahi ki te Kirihimete mā te whakatārewa i ngā rā e iwa o ngā tuki i whakaritea."

title: Ko ngā kairangitaki o Ahitereiria me Ingarangi i puritia i Irana
summary: Tokorua ngā tangata o Ahitereiria e herea ana i Irana kua tāutua ko Kīngi rāua ko Mark Firkin.
text: I te rangitaki a Ms Kingi, e pupuri ana hoki i tētahi uruwhenua UK, ā, i rangitaki a Tēnā Firkin i a rāua haerenga ki Āhia me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. I whakaritea i hopukina rātau i te 10 wiki ki mua tata ki Tehran, engari i mārama te rongo o te hopunga, ā, ko tētahi atu wahine o Ingarangi-Ahitereiria, i te Wenerei. I kī a Ahitereiria kua auau te whakaara i a rātau take ki Tehran, tae atu ki tētahi hui i waenganui i ngā mana i tērā wiki. I kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Marise Payne kua pokaia e ia mō rātau i roto i tētahi hui me tōna hoa o Ārepa. I whakaahuatia e ia nga tautāwhi he "take tino āwangawanga" i te Rāitema, a, i whakaūngia kua tukuna he āwhina ki ngā whānau o nga taurewa tokotoru. "E tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i a Mark rāua ko Jolie ki te kāinga i te wā tata nei," te kī a o rāua whānau i te Tāite. Ka puta mai te āhuatanga i waenganui i te nui o te renarena i waenganui i te Uru me Irana. He tokomaha nga tangata takirua kua herea ki Irana i roto i ngā tau tata nei, tae atu ki te wahine o Ingarangi-Ārepa, o Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe. I ngā marama o mua tata nei, kua whakararurarutia hoki te whanaungatanga i waenganui i te UK me Irana e te haupae i runga i te tīmatanga o ngā taraka hinu i te Kōwhiu. I pānuitia hoki e Ahitereiria i a Hōngongoi ka hono ki a Mātau me te UK ki te whakahau i te Strait of Hormuz ki ngā tuma o Ārepa. Ko ngā 'āwangawanga nui' o UK a Ms King - he iwi takirua o UK me Ahitereiria - me Tēnā Firkin, he tangata whenua o Ahitereiria, i pūrongotia kua haere i runga i ngā uruwhenua o Ahitereiria. I te tau 2017, ka wehe atu te tokorua i Ahitereiria ki te Uru ki te haere ki tētahi haerenga nui puta noa i Āhia ki UK. I te tuhinga rātau i a rātau mahi i runga i Instagram me Youtube, i reira neke atu i te 20,000 ō rātou kaiārahi. Ko ngā ataata o to rātau haerenga i roto i ngā whenua kotahi tekau mā rua e whakaatu ana i ā rātou tauwhitinga ahurea, ā, i te nuinga o te wā e whakaatu ana i ngā whakaata taiapa o te whenua māori. "Ko tā mātou whakahau nui rawa... ko te tūmanako kia whakaawe i te tangata e hiahia ana ki te haere, me te ngana hoki ki te whati i te tauhae huri noa i te haere ki ngā whenua e whiwhi ana i tētahi tākai kino [mana] i roto i te pāpāho," te tuhituhi tuihono a te tokorua. He torutoru noa iho ngā taipitopito o ngā āhuatanga o to rātau hopunga kua whakawāteatia, engari i kī te Kaporeihana Pāohotanga o Ahitereiria kua whakaritea e rātau he taiapa me te kore whakaaetanga. E whakapono ana rātau kei te puritia rātau i te whare herehere o Evin o Tehran, e herea ana hoki a Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe. I kī atu tētahi pūtake ki te AO kua korerotia ki a Ms King kei te puritia ia hei wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa mō tētahi whakawhiti herehere tūpāpaku ki Ahitereiria. Ko te wahine tuarua o Ingarangi-Ahitereiria e herea ana, e pūrongotia ana he tohunga mātauranga o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge e kauhau ana i tētahi whare wānanga o Ahitereiria. Kua whakamātauria kētia a ia i runga i ngā utu tē mōhiotia, a, e 10 tau i hereheretia ai. Kāore ngā take i te whakapono e pā ana. Ahakoa kei te mārama tonu ngā whakapae ki a ia, ka hoatu auautia ngā whakaritenga 10 tau ki Irana mō ngā utu tūtei, ka kī te Times. E whakapono ana ngā wāhine Peretania-Ahitereiria tokorua ko ngā kaipupuri uruwhenua tuatahi o Ingarangi, kāore he iwi takirua o Ārepa e puritia ana i te whenua i roto i ngā tau tata nei. I te Wenerei, ka tūtaki te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o UK a Dominic Raab ki te karere o Ārepa ki te kōrerorero i te whanonga o Irana i runga i te hinu a te taraka i hopukina. I "whakaarahia e ia ngā māharahara nui mo te maha o ngā tangata whenua takirua e herea ana e Irana me ō rātou here tautāwhi", te kī a te Tari Ā-Rohe o UK.

title: Network Rail to upgrade open Scottish level crossings
summary: Ko ngā whakawhitinga taumata rerewhenua katoa i Pākehā me whiwhi ārai haumaru, kua whakaūngia e Network Rail.
text: E whai ana i te whakaotinga angitu o tētahi aronui kaihautū e whakamātau ana i ngā ārai iti hōu i tētahi whakawhitinga taumata i Ardrossan i Ayrshire. Ko ngā wāhi tuatahi hei tiki i a rātou kei ngā Highlands katoa. Ko Corpach, Brora, Kirkton me Dalchalm. E 23 ngā whakawhitinga taumata tuwhera i Pākehā, ko te nuinga o rātou i ngā Highlands. I kī hoki a Network Rail ka whakatakotoria he ārai haurua roa ki Halkirk i Caithness. £4m Upgrade Ko te tirohanga o te tūtukitanga i waenganui i te motokā me te tereina i mate ai e toru ngā mema pakeke o te whānau kotahi i te wā o Mahuru 2009. Me whakapau te rēra whatunga i te £4m ki te whakamohoa i ngā whakawhitinga, ā, e tūmanako ana kia oti ngā whakapainga i te tau 2014. Ka taea te tāuta i ngā ārai hōu mō te £100,000 i te whakawhitinga, i whakaritea ki te toharite neke atu i te £500,000 i raro i te pūnaha tawhito. I kī a David Simpson, te kaiwhakahaere o te ara Network Rail mō Pākehā: "He tino angitu te whakamātautau o tēnei pūnaha hou i runga i te rerewhenua raina kotahi i Ardrossan. " Kua hangaia, kua angitu hoki te whakamātau i tētahi pūnaha auaha, auaha hoki e whakapai ake ai i te haumarutanga o ngā whakawhitinga taumata tuwhera." Ko Dave Thompson, SNP MSP mō Skye, Lochaber me Badenoch, he kaitautoko reo o te pūnaha hou. Pānuitanga nau mai Ka kī a ia: "I hari ahau ki te kite i te whakaotinga angitu o te pūnaha whakawhiti taumata AOCL+B hou i Ardrossan. " E maioha ana ahau ki te pānuitanga ka whakamohoatia ināianei e whā nga whakawhitinga o Highland. "These four barrier implementations on open Highland crossings are the initial first tranche of a roll-out to all the open crossings that remain in the Highlands." I karangatia e ia te nekehanga he "hipanga nui whakamua" i roto i te haumarutanga o te huarahi me te rēra. I kī te Hēkeretari Kāpata mō te Hanganga me te Pūtea Penapena Pūtea, a Alex Neil: "Ko te haumarutanga rerewhenua, tae atu ki ngā whakawhitinga taumata, ka rāhuitia tonutia ki Westminster. " Heoi anō, hei whakaatu i tā mātou whakaaetanga, i pānuitia e te kāwanatanga o Pākehā i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau tētahi pūtea tāpiri e £10m hei āwhina ki te whakangāwari i te katinga o ngā whakawhitinga taumata, ā, ka haere tonu ahau ki te hononga ki te Network Rail mō ēnei take."

title: He iti noa iho te heke o te kore mahi i Jersey i Aotearoa
summary: I heke te kore mahi i Jersey i Aotearoa i whakaritea ki te marama o mua, e ai ki ngā whika mai i te wae tatauranga o Amerika.
text: I Aotearoa e 1,670 ngā tāngata i rēhitatia kua kore mahi me te tuaono o ērā kore mahi mō te neke atu i te tau. E 40 iti iho ngā tāngata kore mahi i a Hōngongoi, ā, e 60 iti iho i te toharite mō ngā marama e toru kua hipa. I kī te tari haumarutanga pāpori e 75% o ērā kāore i te mahi e tono ana i ngā painga. Ko te maha o ngā taiohi e kimi mahi ana ko te 330, he ōrite te tau ki tērā marama. O ērā, e 130 i runga i te aronui mahi a te Kāwanatanga. I kī te kaitātai tatauranga o Te Kāwanatanga o Duncan Gibaut i roto i te pūrongo ko ētahi umanga, pēnei i te pūtea, i raro i ngā whika i roto i ngā whika i roto i ngā tāngata anake i rēhitatia ki te haumarutanga pāpori hei rapu mahi hohe.

title: Corrie Mckeague: E whakaaro ana te whaea ki te whakahau peke whenua
summary: The mother of missing airman Corrie Mckeague says she is considering taking out an injunction to stop police filling in the landfill site where she believes her son's body is.
text: I kitea whakamutunga a Corrie Mckeague, e 23, mai i Bury St Edmunds i te marama o Mahuru. I karangatia e nga pirihimana te rapunga peke whenua tata ki Cambridge i te Paraire. I kī tōna whaea o Nicola Urquhart i "tua atu i te whakararuraru". Neke atu i te 13,000 ngā waitohu o tētahi petihana e karanga ana ki ngā Pirihimana o Te Rūnanga kia haere tonu te rapu. Kāore anō kia kitea te kaimahi RAF mai i Dunfermline, Fife, mai i tētahi pō i te taone o Te Taone o Te Wānanga i te wā i whakaaturia ai ia e te CCTV e tomo ana ki tētahi whanga utanga ipu. Ka tīmata ngā pirihimana ki te rapu i te wāhi peke whenua o Milton i Poutāpeta, engari i muri i te 20 wiki ka pānuitia kua mutu. Heoi anō, kua kī rātau ināianei ka rapu i ngā ururua i tahuna i mua, ā, ka mahia he arotakenga o te tūhuratanga. Ka kī te whaea o Tāne Mckeague: "Kei te tino riri ahau. Kei tua atu ahau i te whakararuraru i a rātau i a au... I kōrero mai rātau ki a mātau i te tīmatanga e rapu ana rātau i te putunga whenua, i teka rātau. "Kāore rātau i te rapu i te putunga whenua, i te rapu rātau i tētahi wāhi o te putunga whenua." I kī a Mrs Urquhart ka kī atu nga pirihimana ki a ia "e whakaaro ana mātou kei reira tonu a ia, engari kāore mātou i te rapu ināianei". I te pō Paraire ka tīmataria he petihana ki ngā pirihimana kia haere tonu te rapu i te pae. "Ko te whakatau a inanahi kia mutu te rapu i te peke, ko te tikanga kua tukua e rātau ināianei ki te kimi i a Corrie," ko te tuhituhi a Mrs Urquhart i runga i Facebook. "Kua whakahokia e nga pirihimana o Suffolk te peke, ā, kei te ngana ki te whakakī anō i tēnei wiki. " Kei te whiwhi tohutohu ahau mō te tūponotanga mō tētahi whakahau kia aukati i a rātau ki te whakakī i te peke, kia nui ake rā anō te pono me te kōrero māmā mai i ngā pirihimana."

title: I whakahaua te pouaru i muri i te nehunga o te tūkino
summary: Kua kī te pouaru o tētahi tangata i patua i roto i tētahi whakaekenga tiriti, i whakararuraru a ia i te wā i utua ai ia e £374 nā te mea i hinga tōna nehunga.
text: I pāngia e Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, e 65, te māhunga i a ia e pāngia ana e tētahi whakaekenga matapōkere i Te Wānanga o Ka kī atu tana wahine ki te Mēra o Birmingham i te nehunga i te hiahia o te hunga tangi ki te whakanui i te kāwhena. I kī te Kaunihera Taone o Birmingham ko te utu nā ngā kaimahi e mahi ana i te wā anō. Mai i tērā wā ka kī nga kaiwhakahaere nehunga ka utua e rātau te utu. I kī a Gail Abbott i oti te ratonga i Sutton Coldfield Crematorium i Aotearoa i roto i te kāniwha wā 30 meneti i utua e rātau. Engari, nā te hiahia o te hunga tangi ki te whakanui i te kāwhena o tana tāne, tae atu ki te 15 meneti te tōmuri o te iwi ki te wehe atu i te whare karakia. E kī ana a Ms Abbott kātahi ka korerotia ki nga kaimahi mō te utu tōmuri 15 meneti i muri i te mutunga o te ratonga. I a ia e kōrero ana ki a WHK WM ka kī a ia: "Nāna ahau i whakararuraru mo te wā tuarua. Me pēhea e taea ai e rātau te utu i te manaakitanga? "E kore e taea te whakaaro. Me whiwhi mātou i te kāniwha wā mō ngā nehunga tae atu ki te 45 meneti, ehara i te 30." I kī a Daniel Ross o Daniel Ross Funerals ka utua e ia te utu, ā, kua tonoa e ia ngā ratonga tangihanga "hei whakaatu i ētahi momo tangata". Ka kī a ia: "Ko te take i hoatu ai e rātau te utu nā te whakahaeretanga o ngā tāngata e wehe ana i te whare karakia. " Neke atu i te 200 ngā tāngata i hiahia ki te whakanui i te kāwhena. " I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te kaunihera o te taone nui kua huatau rātau ki te kaiwhakahaere nehunga kia tāpui te whānau i tētahi ratonga taurua, e roa ana mo te haora. I tāpiri mai a ia: "I tēnei wā kāore i tangohia taua huatau. Ko te mea koinei te ratonga whakamutunga o te rā e hiahiatia ana e ngā kaimahi kia mahi i tua atu i ō rātou haora mahi pūnoa." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Kaunihera Taone o Birmingham

title: E whakakāhore ana te minita ture o Īnia i te utu tāhaetanga
summary: Kua whakakāhore te minita ture o Īnia i ngā whakaaro nāna rāua ko tana wahine i tāhaetia ngā moni kāwanatanga i whakaritea ki tētahi NGO e whakahaeretia ana e rātau ki te āwhina i ngā tāngata hauā.
text: I kī a Koerere Khurshid kāore tētahi o ngā utu i whakatauria e tētahi hongere pouaka whakaata me ngā kaiwhakahauhau ārai hāmate "ka taea te whakamātau". E kī ana te hongere pouaka whakaata i hē a Tēnā Khurshid rāua ko tana wahine ko Louise i te $134,456 (£83,815) i hoatu ki to rātau NGO. Kua tonoa e nga kaiwhakahauhau ārai hāmate te tukunga iho o Tēnā Khurshid. Kua whakapae te hongere rongokōrero o Aj Tak, e 7,1 miriona ngā rupeea i hoatu e te Manatu Ora Pāpori ki te Whakawhirinaki Whakamaharatanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Wā Ko te tinihanga whakapae, i kī te hongere, i pā ki ngā waitohu a ngā mana kāwanatanga, he oati tautohe kōti kōrero kōrero me ngā puni kāore i te noho hei āwhina i te hunga hauā. I whakahē nga kaiwhakahauhau ārai hāmate, i arahina e Arvind Kejriwal, i te mutunga wiki, e whakahau ana i te tukunga iho o Tēnā Khurshid me te rūpahu ki nga whakaaro. I kī atu a Tēnā Khurshid, nō te rōpū whakahaere o te Rōpū Nui, ki nga kaipānui i te Rātapu "kāore e taea te whakamatau i tētahi kupu [o ngā utu]." "Ka taea e rātou [te hongere me ngā kaiwhakahauhau] te hāmama, te hāparangi me te hāparangi kia huri kikorangi rā anō ki o rātau kanohi," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Khurshid e tuwhera ana a ia ki tētahi tūhuratanga a "tētahi mana", engari me tūhura hoki e te rūpahu te tūranga o te rōpū pāpāho nāna te hongere o Aj Tak. I whakaaturia hoki e Tēnā Khurshid ngā pikitia o nga puni i kī ai ia kua puritia hei āwhina i te hunga hauā. Kua tiakina e te minita o te Rōpū Nui a V Rayansamy a Tēnā Khurshid, e kī ana ko nga kaiwhakahauhau, i arahina e Tēnā Kejriwal, e whakauru ana ki te "whakaaturanga māmā" mā te "whakakino i te iwi". Kātahi anō ka whakatūria e Tēnā Kejriwal he rōpū ārai hāmate. Nō nā tata nei, i tonoa e ia he rūpahu ki ngā hononga pakihi whakapae i waenganui i a Robert Vadra, te hunaonga a te rangatira o te rōpū Rōpū Nui, o Sonia Whakarārangi me tētahi kamupene whanaketanga āhuatanga matua DLF. Kua whanaia e nga whakaaro he haupae tōrangapū i Īnia. Kua whakakāhore a Tēnā Vadra rāua ko DLF i nga whakaaro.

title: E rārangi ana ngā pēke ki te whai wāhi ki te hoko tiri a Raiti
summary: Kei te hoatu e ngā pēke matua a rātau tukunga ki te Pūtea Moni ki te whakahaere i tētahi hokonga tūpono e £20bn o te wāhanga ā-motu o Te Pēke o Raiti.
text: Ka tae noa ki te Mane ngā pēke ki te whakahaere i te hokonga o te 39% o te kāwanatanga i Raiti, me te hokonga o TĀPI, e 81% nā te kaihautū, ā muri ake nei. Kāore anō kia whakatauria te tikanga hoko. I te Paraire, ka kī te kaiwhakatika pakihi o TE WĀ, a Robert Peston kua tae mai ngā tohutohu mai i ngā moni rangatira ariki o ētahi whenua. I kī a ia kua whakaaturia hoki e ngā umanga tūmataiti te hiahia ki te hoko i te 10% o Raiti, i mua, i te wā kotahi rānei me te whakanoho hea ki ngā umanga pūtea penapena,. I pūrongotia e te Sunday Times e hiahia ana a Temasek, te ringa pūtea penapena a te kāwanatanga o Hōroa, ki te hoko i te 10% o ngā hea a Raiti mō te £4.5bn. He kaipupuri hea a Temasek i roto i te pēke tāwhai o UK, Standard Chartered. Ngā Paraka I te wā e whakaarohia ana te tikanga hoko, ka kōwhiria e ngā Pūtea Penapena Pūtea UK (UKFI), e whakahaere ana i ngā hea a te kāwanatanga, he rārangi pēke hei whakahaere. Ā muri ake, ka whakawhāititia te papa tākaro. I kī a UKFI i roto i tētahi kōrero ko te nekehanga he "whakarite tika noa iho mō te wā ka tū he tauwhitinga" ā, "ehara i te mea he tohu" kei te tūtata mai tētahi mea. E tūmanakohia ana kia tīmata te hokonga o Raiti tae atu ki te £5bn o te pupuri a te kāwanatanga hei hoko, me tētahi whakawāteatanga kāhua tauhira o te tau 1980 - he hokonga hāngai o ngā hea ki ngā kaihoko hokohoko - kāore e taea. Ko tētahi tikanga pea ko te tuku i ngā poraka nui o ngā hea ki ngā kaihoko ngaio, ā-rōpū, ahakoa rānei, e ai ki tā mātou pūrongo korero, rawa ariki, pūtea tūmataiti rānei. I kī te pokapū rongokōrero o Kōrero i te Paraire e hiahia ana ngā ingoa nui rawa o te pēke ao whānui ki te whai wāhi, ahakoa he iti noa iho te moni whiwhinga utu mai i te hoko ina whakaritea ki ngā whakaritenga arumoni pūnoa. E kī ana ka hiahia ngā pēke ki te whai wāhi ki te mana, ā, ka kīia a HSBC, Barclays, UBS me Credit Suisse tērā pea kei waenganui i a rātou. I te wā o June, ka kī te Tumuaki o George Osborne kua rite te kāwanatanga ki te tīmata ki te hoko i ana hea o Raiti, i te Paraire e hokohoko ana i te 64p, i runga ake i te utu wehenga a te kāwanatanga i runga ake i te 61p.

title: Sutton on Sea: £6m development plan for Colonnade site submitted
summary: Kua tāpaetia tētahi mahere miriona pauna maha hei whakawhanake anō i te pae Colonnade o Sea.
text: Kua whakatakotoria e te Kaunihera Takiwā o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti ngā mahere hei whakakapi i te hanganga o ngā tau 1950 ki tētahi wharekai, wharekai, taiwhanga me ngā mahau one hou. I te tau 2018 i whakatakotoria tuatahitia he kaupapa whakawhanaketanga anō, engari i kawea mai he whakahē mai i ngā rangatira o te mahau one. The plans will now go through the planning process, with a decision expected by May 2021. Steve Kirk, the council's portfolio holder for coastal economy, said: "The Colonnade project is something that we've been working on for some time and the submission of these plans is a major milestone. " As well as providing a replacement Colonnade, it'll bring some fantastic new facilities to the town, serving as an asset for local residents and a draw for visitors from further afield." E tūmanakohia ana kia utu te kaupapa i te £6.1m, ā, kua tukuna e te mana he tono mō te pūtea e £4.2m mai i te Pūtea Taone a te kāwanatanga. A decision on the funding request is expected to be made next month. Kei roto hoki i te whakawhanaketanga anō ko ngā mokowā whakaaturanga me ngā wharau hokohoko, ā, i te taha whenua, ko ngā wāhi mō te tauhokohoko pakū-ake me ngā takahanga. The council say plans to redevelop the surrounding Pleasure Gardens are being finalised in consultation with residents. Whāia a BBC East Yorkshire me Lincolnshire i Facebook, Twitter, me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Kaunihera Takiwā o Te Rāwhiti o Lindsey

title: Ka hoatu e te Windows 10 a Microsoft te tirohanga Skye
summary: Ko ngā āhuahira o Skye ki te raki i roto i ngā arokite o te pūnaha whakahaere whakatupuranga panuku o Microsoft Windows 10.
text: Kua puta mai tētahi whakaahua o te Quiraing i te koiora o Trotternish hei kōwhiringa mō ngā whakaaturanga papamahi. Kāore anō a Microsoft kia kī mēnā ka wātea te atahanga ina puta te pūmanawa i te mutunga o Hōngongoi. Ko te Quiraing tētahi wāhanga o te Trotternish Ridge i hangaia e ngā rārangi whenua tawhito nui. Ko te Quiraing te mea nui rawa atu o nga horo. Kua puta ake tōna āhua i roto i ngā arokite o Windows 10 i roto i ngā rangitaki e pūrongo ana i te putanga o te pūmanawa hōu. He tino pai te whenua o Skye ki ngā umanga hangarau me ngā umanga auaha. I "māhanga" te kēmu rorohiko Skylanders ki te motu i te tau 2013. Ko ngā kiriata pūtea nui i pūhia ki Skye ko Prometheus me 47 Ronin.

title: 'Ngā hinganga nui' i roto i te tiaki a te Hōhipera o Glan Clwyd i te tūroro i mate
summary: Me utu e te poari hauora mō te raki o Uēra te £20,000 ki te wahine a tētahi tūroro hōhipera kāore i kite i tētahi kaitohutohu mō te 12 haora, ā, i muri iho ka mate, kua kī te Ombudsman Ratonga Tūmatanui mō Weera.
text: Ko te tūroro, a Tēnā X, he hītori o te hinganga tākihi pūmau, a, i mate i te Hōhipera o Glan Clwyd, i Denbighshire, i te tau 2014. I kī te poungaio "e kore tōna whānau e mōhio" mehemea ka taea ia te whakaora mehemea i whiwhi ia i te "rongoā i te wā tika". I whakaae te Poari Hauora o te Whare Wānanga o Betsi Cadwaladr i ngā hinganga i roto i tana tiakitanga. I kī te pūrongo a te poungaio o Nick Bennett i whiwhi a Tēnā X, ā, he mate rongoā anō ōna i te hōhipera, e toru ngā wā i te wiki mai i Hui tanguru 2012. I muri i tana mate nui i a ia e hararei ana ki rāwāhi i te wā o Hui tanguru 2014, ka whakahokia mai ia ki Glan Clwyd, engari kāore i kitea e tētahi kaitohutohu tae noa ki te rā e whai ake nei. I amuamu tana wahine, e kiia nei ko Mrs X, mo te whakataunga kia kaua e tiaki wawe i tana tāne i roto i te Intensive Therapy Unit (ITU) e whakapono ana ia ka whakanuia tōna wā e ora ai. I amuamu hoki a ia mo te "whakawāteatanga" o ngā tuhipoka rongoā a Tāne X mo te ono marama i muri i tōna matenga, ka kī te pūrongo. I kī a Tēnā Pēneti he "taea te karo" tōna matenga, ā, i kitea he maha o ngā hinganga nui, tae atu ki: I tūtohutia e ia ki te poari hauora, tae atu ki te utu i te £20,000 ki a Mrs X "mo te mamae i takea mai i te matenga o tana tāne". I karangatia hoki e ia ngā whakapai ake ki te tiaki tūroro tākihi. I kī a Tēnā Bennett: "He whakararuraru tērā i tatari a Tēnā X neke atu i te 12 haora i mua i te kitenga o tētahi tākuta matua, ā, ko te ngaro o ngā kaitohutohu tākihi i te hōhipera, ko te tikanga o te rongoā tātaritanga tino nui i tōmuri rawa. " Me noho tonu te whānau o Tāne X i runga i te rangirua o te mōhiotanga mehemea i tangohia ngā wāhi mō te rongoā, tērā pea ka whakaorangia tōna ora. He tino tika tēnei." Hei urupare, ka kī te rangatira nui o te poari hauora, a Gary Doherty, kua mahia ngā whakapainga. "E pouri ana ahau kāore mātou i tuku i te paerewa tiaki e tika ana kia whiwhi mātou, ā, ka whakapā hāngai atu ahau ki te whānau ki te tuku i ā mātou whakapae mō tēnei, me te āhua o te amuamu i muri iho," tana kī. "Kua tuhipokatia e mātou ngā kōrero katoa a te poungaio me te whakaae ki ngā tūtohutanga katoa i mahia e ia. " Ka hanga mātou i runga i ngā mahi kua mahia kētia e mātou kia tino whakatinanatia ēnei katoa, ā, ka pūrongotia tō mātou kauneketanga ki tēnei ki te poungaio i roto i te toru marama."

title: HS2: Arotakenga hei tirotiro i ngā utu me ngā painga o te kaupapa rēra
summary: Kei te whakarewaina e te kāwanatanga tētahi arotakenga o te hononga rēra tere rawa HS2 - me tētahi whakataunga "haere, kāore rānei" i te mutunga o te tau, kua kī te Hēkeretari Waka o Grant Shapps.
text: Ka whakaarohia mēnā me pēhea te haere tonu o te kaupapa hei tūhono i Rānana, te Midlands me te raki o Ingarangi. Kua pau kētia te nuinga o ngā piriona, engari kāore a Tēnā Shapps i whakaae ki te whakahaere i te tango katoa. I kī a ia he "haepapa" te kite mēnā e tino "tāpae ana" ngā painga. Ko te wāhanga 1 o te whanaketanga i waenganui i Rāwāhi me Birmingham ka whakatuwheratia i te mutunga o te tau 2026, me te wāhanga tuarua ki Leeds me Manchester kua whakaritea kia oti i te 2032-33. I hoahoatia hei kawe i ngā tereina e āhei ana ki te haere i te 250mph. I te pātaitanga mō ngā moni kua pau kētia ki te kaupapa, ka kī a Tēnā Shapps: "Nā te mea kua pau i a koe te moni nui ki tētahi mea, ehara i te mea me parau koe kia nui ake ngā moni ki roto." I kī a ia e tono ana nga minita ki nga kaiarotake "homai noa iho ki a mātau nga take". "Haere ki te kimi i ngā mōhiohio katoa kei reira... he aha tonu te utu ki te whakaoti i tēnei kaupapa, ā, ka pai ake mātou ki te whakatau i taua whakataunga - haere, kaua rānei e haere i te mutunga o te tau." Ka tūtakina te arotakenga e Takitaki Oakervee, he kaipūkaha tūmatanui me te tūru o mua o HS2 Ltd. £55.6bn Pūtea tīariari £32.7bnPūtea taketake £7.4bnKua pau kētia ki te kaupapa 9,000Ngā tūtira e tautokona ana e te rerewhenua 345 maeroTe ara tere tiketike hōu 50 menetiTe penapena wā haere i waenganui i Rāwāhi me Manatū Ariki Berkeley, tētahi atu kaipūkaha tūmatanui i mahi i te hanganga o te Kauhanga Hongere,  ka noho hai tuarua mōna. I mua rā ka whakahē te hoa Labour i te kaupapa. Ka tukuna he rīpoata whakamutunga ki te kāwanatanga i te ngahuru. I te wā o te whakahau ārahi a te Rōpū Rangatira, ka kī a Boris Johnson e kore ia e maka i ngā mahere mō te hononga rēra hou, engari i whakapuakina e ia "ngā māharahara mō te kēhi pakihi". I a Hōngongoi, ka whakatūpato te manukura o nāianei o te kaupapa ka piki pea te utu katoa ki tētahi atu £30bn - mai i te tahua o nāianei e £56bn. I kī te hoa mahi a Ariki Adonis, tētahi hēkeretari waka o mua i mahi hei kaitohutohu hanganga ki a Ēnā Me, he "heahea te arotakenga" me te "tīwiri i a Birmingham me te Raki". Ka tūtohu a ia ka noho "he whawhai moka nui, i te wā e whakahaere ana te tari waka mō te uhi, ā, ka pararaiha a HS2 Ltd i te pōhēhētanga". Ka tirohia e te arotakenga: He aha te tikanga o te HS2 mō ngā pāhihi? I tautohe te Hēkeretari Waka o Mua, a Pirihi Grayling, e hiahiatia ana he hononga kaupae hou hei tango i te pēhanga i tētahi pūnaha e "pakaru ana i ngā maunga". A, i June i tēnei tau, neke atu i te 20 ngā kaiārahi pakihi i tohe ki te kāwanatanga kia tuku katoa i te HS2, e kī ana ka "horahia te rere o te pūtea penapena puta noa i te Midlands, te Raki o Ingarangi, ki Pākehā". I kī te Koromatua Rangatira o te West Midlands, a Andy Street, e noho ana i runga i te pae arotake, he "tino nui" a HS2 mō te West Midlands, ā, "kei te waihanga kē i ngā mahi me te hanga kāinga hou". Engari i kī atu a Conservative MP Dame Cheryl Gillan, ka haere tōna wāhanga HS2, ki te Ao o Te Reo Irirangi 4 i te Kotahi o ōna utu, ā, "ināianei kua kore e taea te uara mō te moni mō te kaihautū o Ingarangi". I te wā o Me, ka tautohe tētahi komiti hoa i te kaupapa ka mōrearea te "huri poto" i te Raki o Ingarangi. I kī ta rātau rīpoata he nui rawa te aronui ki te tapahi i ngā wā haere, ā, kāore i te nui te pānga o te ohaoha ki ngā rohe. I karangatia hoki e ia te aronui o te Northern Powerhouse Rail - he aronui motuhake e tūhono ana i ngā taone me ngā tāone i te rohe - kia oti i te taha o HS2. I amuamu te Koromatua Mahi o Greater Manchester Andy Burnham, e tautoko ana i te HS2, e rua ngā māngai i pōtitia e te pae arotake mai i te West Midlands, engari kāore he tangata mai i te Raki. I kī te hēkeretari waka kōruru a Andy McDonald i tautokona e Labour te pūtea penapena i roto i te kaha o te rēra hōu, me te tāpiri e "hiahiatia ana te whakahaere pai ake o te whakawhānuitanga o te rerewhenua, kāore i te iti rawa i runga i te kaupapa HS2." Kotahi te MP Conservative, i huatau a Bob Seely i te "hawhe o runga" o HS2 - te wāhanga e kapi ana i te Raki o Ingarangi - me hanga, engari kaua te ara o Birmingham ki London, i whakaahuatia e ia he "arewhana mā tino nui". Ko te pātai matua, he uara HS2 mō te moni? I kī mai tētahi tangata matua o mua i te Whare Taonga ki a au inā noa nei, he iti iho te piro i ērā atu kaupapa, nā reira he nui rawa te mōrea o te kāwanatanga ki te hoatu moni nui ki roto. Ka taea e te kāwanatanga te whakakore - engari, ko te whakatūpato matua ki tēnā ko te nui kua pau kētia, ā, ka ngaro. Mō ngā ātete katoa ki taua mea, he nui hoki ngā kaitautoko ngākau nui o HS2, ā, ka pouri rātau. Ehara i te whakakore katoa, tērā pea ko te kōwhiringa pai ake ko te whakarerekē i ngā mahere i tētahi ara. Whakawhirinaki mai ki a au, ahakoa te mahi e kore e ngāwari mō ngā take pūtea, ā-ture rānei. I kī a Joe Rukin, mai i te whakahau Stop HS2: "Mēnā he arotakenga tūturu tēnei, me mutu te mahi ināianei, nā te mea kei te mahia ngā tūkinotanga kāore e taea te whakatika i tēnei wā ki ngā wāhi noho ahurei, ki ngā ngahere tawhito." I whakapaea e ia a HS2 o te "tuku whakahau pupuri pēnei i te kore āpōpō", e pā ana ki te hokonga whakahau o ngā āhuatanga i te ara o te raina. I whakaarahia hoki e ia ngā māharahara kei te whai wāhi te manukura arotake, a Tēnā Oakervee, ki te "tohu i ana ake mahi kāinga" i tana mahi tōmua i runga i te kaupapa.

title: Pakanga o Hiria: Ko te whakamutunga o te rōpū 'Beatles' o Ingarangi i hopukina e Kurds
summary: Tokorua ngā tāngata o Ingarangi i whakapono he mema o tētahi pūtau rōpū o te Kāwanatanga Āmāri rongonui, kua hopukina e ngā kairiri o Hiriani Kurīhi, e kī ana ngā mana o Amerika.
text: Ko Alexanda Kotey, e 34, me El Shafee Elsheikh, e 29, ngā mema whakamutunga e rua o te pūtau e noho nui ana. Ko te tokowhā, nō Rānana, i tapaina ko "te Beatles" nā ō rātou nako Peretania. I kī nga kaiwhakahaere o Amerika kua poutāpeta e te "pūtau kawenga" neke atu i te 27 ngā taumaha, a, he tokomaha atu anō i whakamamaetia. Kua karangatia e nga whānau o nga tūpāpaku o nga tāngata e rua kia haere ki te whakawā. I kī atu a Diane Foley - ko tana tama ko Hemi, he kaipānui Amerika, i hopukina, i panaia e IS - i kī atu ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā e hiahia ana ia kia anga atu ngā tāngata ki te hereheretanga ora. "Kai tua atu i te whakaaro o a rātau hara," tana tāpiri mai. I kī atu hoki a Nicolas Henin, he kaipānui Wīwī i pau i te 10 marama hei whakarau IS, i tēnei rā e hiahia ana a ia ki te tika. I whakapuakina e ia, ko te ngana ki te whakakāhore i nga tāngata o o rātau mana ā iwi, ka whāngai anake i nga kerēme a IS mo te tūkinotanga a te Uru. Ko wai te IS 'Beatles'? Ko wai te 'Beatles' o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi? Ko te kaimahi nāna i waiho he rongoā mo te toa Me pēhea rātau i hopukina ai? I whakaūngia nga hopunga hou e nga kaiwhakahaere o Amerika. I kī ngā āpiha i whakahuatia e te pāpāho o Amerika kua hopukina aua tāngata tokorua e ngā mema o ngā Ope Manapori o Hiriani (SDF), e whakarite ana i ngā toenga o IS. I tēnei wā, i kī te Tari Ā-Rohe o UK kāore i kōrero mō ia kēhi, tūhuratanga rānei. I pūrongotia tuatahitia to rātau hopunga e te New York Times, nāna i mōhio e hiahia ana ngā mana o Amerika ki te huna i te rongokōrero. Ko te whāinga ko "kia nui ake te wā ki te whai i ngā kaiārahi mōhiohio i hangaia mai i to rātau tautāwhi me te whakarite poho ki ngā ūnga o te Kāwanatanga Āmāri", te kī a te nūpepa. I te waenganui o Hānuere, ka kī atu nga kairiri Hiriani i a rātau ki ngā mana o AMERIKA i te waenganui o Hānuere, tērā pea kua hopukina rāua tokorua, ā, i whakaūngia ngā tuakiri o ngā tāngata ā muri ake mā te whakamahi i ngā tapukara me ētahi atu raraunga koiora. Ka kī atu ngā whānau o ngā tāngata ki te AO kāore rātau i mōhio ki te hopu kia pūrongotia rā anō te pūrākau e ngā rōpū rongokōrero. He aha te āhua o IS i Hiria? I tere te whakaiti i tērā tau i whakapuakina ai e te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi - tōna rohe mana - i tere te whakaiti i tērā tau. I Whiringahora, ka ngaro i te rōpū tōna "pūmatua" o Raqqa ki te SDF. I te tīmatanga o Whiringa o Whiringa, ka ngaro a Deir-al Zour i Hiria i te rā kotahi i ngaro ai a al-Qaim i Raki. Ko te SDF he toatanga o nga kairiri a Kurīhi me ngā Arāpia e ātete ana ki te IS. Kua tākaro te rōpū pūrua a AMERIKA i tētahi tūranga matua ki te taraiwa i te IS mai i ōna pā i Hiria. Kua kī te US e whai ana kia mau tonu tētahi aroaro hōia tūwhera i te whenua kia tino mōhio ai ki te hinganga o te rōpū toa. Heoi anō, ko te aroaro o te nui o nga ope taua a Kurīhi i te raki o Hiria kua whakaoho i te hoa noho tata ki Tākehi. Tātaritanga: He aha te mea i pā ki ngā kairiri kē katoa? Ko Kōnata Corera, ko te korero haumarutanga e kiia ana kua homai e te tokorua he mōhiohio nui i muri i to rāua hopunga. Tērā pea ka āwhina tēnā ki te whakautu i te pātai whānui ake o te mea i pā ki nga kairiri kē i te wehenga o te kōaro. E hia o ngā mano o ngā kairiri kē i patua, e hia rānei i haere ki ētahi atu whenua, e rapu ana rānei ki te hoki mai ki te kāinga? He ūnga manakē ēnei tāngata - engari ehara i te mea anake. Ka whakaarahia hoki e to rātau hopu te take o te mea e tūpono ana. Ka taea te whakawā i a rātau i roto i a Mātau, i te mea i uru rātau ki te patunga o ngā taumaha o AMERIKA - engari tērā pea ētahi i roto i te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho e hiahia ana ki te tuku i a rātau ki Te Whanga o Aotearoa. Ā, kāore i te mārama mēnā he take tēnei mō te Kāwanatanga o UK, nā te mea he pūrongo tērā pea kua tangohia e te tokorua to rāua kirirarautanga UK i a rāua mā te whakamahi i ngā mana e wātea ana ki te Tari Kāinga. Na te hōkona huna i tuku i ngā rau rau o nga kairiri IS kia mawhiti

title: Storm Dennis: Community spirit 'alive and well' after flood
summary: I roto i tētahi hapori i ngaro ai ngā whānau maha i ngā mea katoa, kua whakakīa e ngā kōinga te karapu whutupōro o te rohe ki ngā koha.
text: I muri i te pakarutanga o te awa i te wā o te Āwhā o Dennis, ka hiahia ngā tāngata i Taff's Well ki te mahi i tētahi mea hei whakangāwari i te "pouri me te whakangaromanga" i puta mai i o rātau hoa noho tata. I whakatuwheratia e te karapu whutupōro kāinga ōna tatau mō ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te kaukau wera, kai, inu rānei. Ināianei, kua mihi tētahi whānau ki nga kaiahuwhenua nāna rātau i whakaora i roto i te tarakihana. I mauria a Amy Price, e 20, tōna whānau, me ngā kurī ki te haumaru i Llanover, Monmouthshire, i muri i te maunga i roto i te wai waipuke. "Kua paea mātou, ā, kāore e taea e mātou tētahi atu mea," te kī a Ms Price, e tatari ana i runga i tōna kāinga mō te toru haora i mua i te taenga mai o nga kaiahuwhenua. I Taff's Well, i muri i te pānga o te waipuke, ka whakatūria he whārangi Facebook mō ngā koha mō te hunga kua ngaro ngā mea katoa. Ahakoa te marangai tonu me te hau, ka tae mai ngā tāngata me ngā tūemi mai i te nappies ki te kai kurī ki te niho. He pēke moe, he mops, he pākete, he taonga tākaro ngohengohe, he paraikete, he kākahu, he urunga me ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e te hunga pāngia. A, ka hōhonu kē atu te wairua hapori - e toru maero ki raro i te huarahi, ā, i te nuinga o te wā he tauwhāinga i runga i te papa, ka tukuna hoki e Pentyrch RFC e rima ngā kawenga koha. I kī te kaiwhakahaere RFC o Taff, a Tracy Smith: "He iti noa iho te pōrangi. " I huihui mai te hapori inanahi - i whakaputaina e mātau he pou e tono ana i tētahi āwhina, mēnā ka taea e koe te whakaheke ki te karapu whutupōro. "I whakatuwheratia hoki e mātou mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakaruru, he tī, he kawhe. I tino motuhia inanahi. I te mātakitaki mātau i ngā tāngata e ngana ana ki te mawhiti i o rātau whare." I kī a ia kāore anō a ia kia kite i te waipuke "o tēnei nui" i mua. "I te kōrero ahau ki tētahi tangata, ā, i kī mai a ia i te wā whakamutunga i waipuke pēnei i te kāinga i nga tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua," tana kī. Kei te haere tonu mai ngā koha, ā, ka pau i ngā tūao te Mane ki te waihanga i ngā mōkī kai me te hoatu kākahu me ētahi atu tūemi ki ngā whānau e pāngia ana. I kī a Mīharo Bartlett: "He whakararuraru noa iho. " Inanahi i konei ahau i te rā katoa, ā, i tēnei rā kua tauratia e au ngā tamariki ki te āwhina. Kei te mahi katoa mātou i ngā mea e taea ana e mātou." I Maes-y-Coed, i te takiwā o Heath o Kārepa, tata tonu ki ngā rūma katoa o te pokapū hapori kua kī i ngā koha, i muri i tētahi rōpū Facebook e tono ana ki te āwhina i honoa e ngā tāngata e 2,000 i roto i ngā haora. Kua utaina e ngā tūroro, tae atu ki ngā PCSO me ngā tauira pirihimana, ngā motokā me ngā koha hei tuku ki ngā pūtahi āwhina i ngā wāhi tino pāngia. I kī a Natalie Pascoe, nāna i whakatū te pīra: "He tino whakaaweawe te kite i te huihuinga mai o ngā hapori puta noa i Wales ki te tautoko i a rātou anō. " He tūhononga ōku i reira [i ngā awaawa] mā taku mahi, he tino whakararuraru."

title: Mirumiru tautoko: He pēhea te mahi, ā, ko wai kei roto i a koe?
summary: Puta noa i te UK, e toru ngā kāinga ka whakaaetia ki te waihanga i tētahi mirumiru rangitahi i tēnei Kirihimete.
text: Nā Michelle RobertsHealth editor, BBC News online E kī ana ngā iwi e whā ka whakangāwari ngā ture coronavirus mō te rima rā i waenganui i te 23-27 o Hakihea kia whakanui tahi ai ngā whānau. Ka taea e ia "mirumiru Kirihimete" te tūtaki i te kāinga, i tētahi wāhi karakia, i tētahi wāhi tūmatanui rānei o waho, engari ka pupuritia ngā ture tīariari mō te hui i roto i ngā pāparapara me ētahi atu wāhi manaakitanga puta noa i te wā whakaharihari. Kāore he tepe ki te maha o ngā tāngata i roto i tētahi whare e hono ana ki tētahi mirumiru i Ingarangi, i Uēra me Aiarangi ki te Raki, ahakoa e kī ana te tohutohu o Ingarangi me "iti rawa". Kua kī te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ka taea e ngā mirumiru Kirihimete te mōrahi e waru tāngata, ā, kotahi anake te "whare whānui". Kāore ngā tamariki i raro iho i te 12 e tatau i roto i te tapeke. He aha te mirumiru tautoko? Ko te mirumiru he rōpū tāngata e tata ana tō whakapā ā-tinana. Ko te whāinga ko te āwhina i ngā tāngata kua motuhia i ngā hoa me te whānau. Me "tāuke" ngā mirumiru. Kotahi i roto i tētahi, kāore e taea e koe te tīmata i tētahi atu ki tētahi kāinga kē.
