Ka taea e ngā tāngata i ia mirumiru te noho pō i roto i ngā kāinga o tētahi, te haere tahi ki ngā wāhi o waho, ā, kāore e hiahiatia kia tawhiti pāpori. Ka kaute te mirumiru tautoko hei whare kotahi - ko te tikanga mō te wā Kirihimete ka taea e te mirumiru te hono ki ētahi atu whare e rua. He pēhea tā rātou mahi i Ingarangi? I Ingarangi, ka taea e ngā pakeke takitahi e noho takitahi ana - ngā mātua takitahi rānei āna tamariki kei raro iho i te 18 - te hanga mirumiru tautoko me tētahi atu kāinga. Ka taea e te whare tuarua te rahi ahakoa te rahi, ā, ka taea te whakauru i ngā tāngata "mōrearea" i te whakangungu i mua. Ki ngā wāhi katoa e taea ana, e taunaki ana te kāwanatanga kia noho tētahi mirumiru tautoko ki tētahi atu whare paetata kia kore ai e haere koretake. Ko te tangata i roto i te mirumiru i whakapā atu hei wāhanga o te hōtaka whakamātautau me te whakataki o Ingarangi me noho ki te kāinga. Ki te whakawhanake i ngā tohu coronavirus, me wehe ngā tāngata katoa i roto i te mirumiru. Kua whakaaetia ngā mirumiru tautoko kia haere tonu i te wā o te raka. Mai i te 2 o Hakihea, ina wehe atu a Ingarangi i te raka me te tomo ki tētahi pūnaha taumata, ka whakaaetia ngā tāngata ki te hanga mirumiru tautoko me te hunga e noho ana i tētahi rohe whai whakatauranga taumata teitei ake. Ka taea e ngā mirumiru te whakawhiti taitapa ki Pākehā me Weera, e herea ana ki ngā rāhuitanga paetata. The government says it will be expanding the eligibility of support bubbles from 2 December to help whānau with very young children or people with continuous care needs, meaning households can form a support bubble with another household, if at least one of them has: Childcare bubbles As well as the support bubble rules, the government in England also has a set of rules that apply to families with children under 14 (as well as ki ngā pakeke mōrearea). Ka taea e rātou te hanga i tētahi mirumiru tiaki tamariki me tētahi atu whare hei whakarato i te tiaki tamariki ōpaki (kāore i te utua, kāore anō kia rēhitatia). Me noho tēnei i waenganui i ngā kāinga e rua i ngā wā katoa. Ka taea e rātou te whakarato i te tiaki tamariki i tētahi, i ngā kāinga rānei e rua mai i ngā kāinga e rua. I te Kirihimete, ka whakaaetia ngā mirumiru tiaki tamariki kua rēhitatia. A, ki te takitahi koe, kei konei ngā aratohu kāwanatanga katoa mō Ingarangi. Me pēhea a Weera? Tae atu ki te 9 o Whiringa ā-Rangi, ka taea e ngā kāinga e rua ahakoa te rahi te hanga mirumiru tāuke me te tūtaki i roto i ō rātou ake kāinga me ō rātou māra. Ka taea e ngā tāngata i roto i te mirumiru kotahi te noho i roto i ngā kāinga o tētahi i te pō. Ā, ka taea e rātou te tūtaki i roto i ngā rōpū nui ake i te whā i ētahi atu wāhi o waho. Mēnā he wāhanga koe o tētahi whare whānui rangitahi i te wā o te wā whatiahi, i roto rānei i tētahi i mua i tērā, kāore koe e hiahiatia kia noho ki te whare whānui kotahi. Ka taea kē e koe te hanga mirumiru hou. Heoi anō, ina whakaae koe me te hono ki taua whare whānui hou, kāore e taea e tētahi whare te wehe ki te hanga i tētahi whare hou. Me pēhea a Pākehā? I raro i te pūnaha taumata e rima i Pākehā, ka taea e ngā tāngata e noho ana i a rātou anō, me ngā tamariki anake rānei i raro iho i te 18 tau te hanga i tētahi whare whānui me ngā tāngata mai i tētahi atu whare. Ka taea e tēnei rōpū tāngata te toro atu ki ngā kāinga o tētahi, ka haere ki roto. Kāore e hiahiatia kia noho 2m (6ft) te wehe, ā, ka taea te noho i te pō. Ka kautetia ngā tāngata i roto i ngā whare whānui hei kāinga kotahi, ā, ka taea te tūtaki tonu me te whakahoahoa tētahi ki tētahi ahakoa ngā rāhuitanga whānui i te whāranu o ngā kāinga. Ka taea hoki e ngā mārena kāore e noho tahi te hanga i tētahi whare whānui, arā ko ngā tamariki e noho tahi ana rātou. Kaua te whare e hanga i tētahi whare whānui me neke atu i tētahi. Heoi anō, ka taea e tētahi o rātou te whakamutu i te whakaritenga i ngā wā katoa, ā, - ki te tatari rātou kia 14 rā neke atu rānei - kātahi ka hanga i tētahi whare whānui hōu me tētahi atu. Mēnā ka whakawhanake tētahi mema o tētahi whare whānui i ngā tohumate, ka whakamātauria rānei he pai mō Covid, me wehe ngā tāngata katoa i roto i te mirumiru. Me pēhea a Aiarangi ki te Raki? Ka taea e ngā kāinga e rua ahakoa te rahi te hanga mirumiru tautoko. Ka taea e ngā mema te noho wā ki rō whare me te noho pō tahi me tētahi. I raro i ngā rāhuitanga hou rawa, ka whakatepetia ēnei mirumiru ki te mōrahi o te 10 tāngata, tae atu ki ngā tamariki, i te wā kotahi. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i te Kaiwhakahaere o Aiarangi ki te Raki i konei. He aha ngā mirumiru i ngā kura? Kei te whakamahi ngā kura i ngā mirumiru rōpū tau, akomanga rānei hei tautoko i te tawhiti pāpori me te whakaiti i te whakapā tata i waenga i ngā ākonga. Mā te pupuri i ngā rōpū motuhake kāore e whāranu ka tere ake, kia ngāwari ake hoki ina puta mai he take tōrunga ki te tāutu i te hunga e hiahia ana pea ki te wehe i a rātou anō me te whakaiti i tō rātou tau.

title: Ka mutu a Subdued Proms i muri i te Ture, Britannia! haupae
summary: Kua tū tētahi putanga ngoikore o te Pō Whakamutunga o ngā Proms i Rānana, i muri i te haupae i runga i te Ture, Britannia! ka whakawehi ki te taumarumaru i te takahanga.
text: I kite i tētahi putanga whakawhāiti o te BBC Symphony Orchestra e purei ana ki tētahi Royal Albert Hall wātea, kia ū ai ki ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus. I muri i tētahi haupae tūmatanui, ko ngā waiata whenua Ture, Britannia! me te Whenua o te Tūmanako me te Kororia i waiatatia e tētahi kōhanga reo iti. I whakahētia te AO mō ngā mahere kia waiho ngā kupu waiata i tērā marama. I kī ngā kaiwhakawāwā i whakaarahia e ngā kupu tētahi kawanatanga o Ingarangi, he emepaea o mua, e tūpono ana ki ngā uara o Ingarangi o nāianei me te nekehanga Black Lives Matter. I tohe te AO i tana whakataunga taketake he iti iho i te tōrangapū i ngā rāhuitanga i whakaritea ki ngā kaiwhakatangitangi, me ngā waiata, i te wā o te taiepa. Engari i muri i te whakahoki i te pēhi, me te raweke a te Pirimia o Poihāne, ka whakahokia e ia ngā kupu waiata, e kī ana ka mahia e ngā mema tawhiti pāpori o ngā Kaiwaiata o TE AO i roto i ngā wāhi wātea o te Royal Albert Hall. I muri i te whakarerenga pea, kātahi ko te pōhēhētanga, i muri mai i te tautohetohe, me ngā whakapae mākū - kātahi anō ka whakahaere a Britannia i ngā ngaru hau. Na reira i kaha ai te tikanga i runga i te hunga i whakaaro he emepaea rawa nga kupu mo tenei ra me tenei tau. Engari ehara i te tino mahi i te Pō Whakamutunga o tēnei tau: he Prom kāore he hīkoi, me te Orchestra Symphony Orchestra i arahina e te kaiārahi o Hinerangi o Dalia Stasevska, ā, kāore i kitea he haki, he pōtae rānei. Ko te kaiwaiata o Pirihitini o Nicola Benedetti - he whakakapinga tōmuri mō tētahi kaiwaiata tōmuri - i tākaro i te makau whakaheke a Te Lark Ascending The talking point of the night, tērā pea ko te mahi anō a te kaitito o Errollyn Wallen i te Hiruharama makau a Hubert Parry, nāna i whakamōhio atu ki ngā tohutoro dissonance me ngā tohutoro kikorangi - he takoha, i kī a ia, ki te whakatupuranga Windrush o ngā kaiheke i haere mai ki Ingarangi. I waiatatia e te soprano o Awherika ki te Tonga, a Golda Schultz. He tau tino rerekē tēnei; he tino rerekē te Pandemic Proms me te kore he hunga whakarongo ora, otirā ko te Pō Whakamutunga o tēnei ahiahi i āhua ngoikore ai te Whenua o te Tūmanako me te Kororia a Edward Elgar. I tino haukotia te wā Proms 2020 e te urutā coronavirus, me te wā e waru wiki noa iho ki te rua wiki o ngā whakaaturanga ora, i mahia me te kore kaimātakitaki. I whakangāwaritia hoki te hōtaka i ētahi atu huarahi - ko te nuinga o ngā mahi iti ake, me ngā kaiwaiata me ngā rōpū rōpū ā-UK. He rōpū whakaiti e 65, kaua ko te 300 noa iho i mahia i te Royal Albert Hall - me ngā kaiwaiata e tū ana i roto i ngā tūru hei whakarite i te tawhiti pāpori. Heoi anō, tērā ētahi whakamātau angitu ki te mahi i te tino pai o te āhuatanga. I te mutunga wiki whakatuwheratanga, ka whakatūria e Haimona Rattle me te London Symphony Orchestra a rātau kaitākaro parahi ki roto i ngā pouaka huri noa i te Hōro o Albert, e whakautu ana, e tūtuki ana tētahi ki tētahi i a rātau e tākaro ana i ngā Canzons parahi a Giovanni Gabrieli. I tīmata anō hoki te kaiwaiata ā-iwi o Laura Marling i tana tīmatanga o Proms, e whakatangi ana i tētahi huinga waiata takatāpui e haere tahi ana me tētahi rōpū aho kāore i whakahaeretia te 12 Ensemble. A, i whakatangihia e te Aurora Orchestra te 7th Symphony a Beethoven mai i te pūmahara i a ia e tū ana (kua noho hei moko mō rātou) e tātuhi ana i te whakamihi me te mīharo i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. I takiruatia ta rātau mahinga ki tētahi mahi hou a Rārangi Ayres, pērā i a Beethoven, kua pāngia e te ngaromanga rongo mō ngā tau e 20 kua taha. I roto i ngā wāhanga motuhake e toru - i tapaina "moemoeā, ngaromanga rongo me te poroporoaki" - ka whakaarahia e ngā kaitākaro te wheako o te rongo whakaheke, me ngā raina aho i uru mai i te tangi tiketike o te tinnitus, me ngā kaupapa pūoro e rehu ana, e pakaru ana. I whakatuwheratia te Pō Whakamutunga ki te mārena o Figaro, ā, i whakaaturia e te soprano o Awherika ki te Tonga, a Golda Schultz e waiata ana i te The Glamorous Life a Sondheim, me tētahi whakaritenga hou o Hiruharama, nā te kaitito o Errollyn Wallen. I kī te kaitito o Ingarangi, i whānau mai i Belize, ko tana whakaritenga o te "waiata taonga nui... i waihangatia he nui ngā whakaaro kaha" i waenganui i te hunga Proms "arā, hei kaitito, ko tāu e hiahia ana". I kī a ia he "whakamīharo" te wā hei whakarite mō ngā Proms, i a ia e tipu ake ana me te mea taketake, ā, i arohaina e ia. I whakatapua e ia tana putanga ki te whakatupuranga Windrush - "Tērā pea ko ahau tētahi o aua tāngata i tukuna anō ki te kāinga," tana kī atu ki a Parakuihi. E whakaahua ana i te tawhiti pāpori o Tērā Pō he "mīharo", ka kī a ia: "Ko te wairua o ngā tāngata e aroha ana ki te pūoro i roto i te hōro." Ko te kaiwaiata 'matewai roa' ko Nicola Benedetti he whakakapinga meneti whakamutunga mō Lisa Batiashvili, nāna i wehe atu nā te mate, e purei ana i te The Lark Ascending a Vaughan Williams. I roto i tētahi wāhanga ataata i hopukina kētia, ka kī te kaitātaki, a Dalia Stasevska: "I roto i ēnei wā uaua, kua tino hiahia mātou ngā kaiwhakatangitangi kia taea te tākaro tahi anō me te tākaro ora. " Being able to play together again during these last two weeks has felt like drinking water after a long thirst." I kī te BBC ka kite ngā Proms o tērā tau i te Ture, Britannia! me te Whenua o te Tūmanako me te Kororia i waiatatia katoatia, e tārua ana i tētahi tikanga e hoki ana ki ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. He aha te Ture, Britannia! He tino tautohetohe? Ture, Britannia! i tautuhia ki te puoro e Thomas Arne i te tau 1740, ā, ko ōna kupu i takea mai i tētahi oriori a James Thomson. Kei roto ko ngā irava pēnei: "Ture, Britannia! whakahaere i ngā ngaru / E kore rawa ngā Pirihitini e noho pononga." He rite tonu te tohutoro a Land Of Hope And Glory ki te "kaha" o te Emepaea o Ingarangi o mua, e kitea ana e ētahi tāngata i tēnei rā he raruraru. I a ia e kōrero ana i a Aotearoa, ka kī a Chi-chi Nwanoku, te kaiwhakarewa o Chineke!, he rōpū whakatangitangi kua mahi i te Proms, ā, ko ōna kaiwhakatangitangi he pango, Āhia, ā-iwi hoki, ka kī a Ture, Britannia! he "whakahāwea". I tāpiritia e ia ko te tangata pango "e mōhio ana ki tō rātou hītori, te emepaea me te kawanatanga" ka "uaua ki te hākinakina i te āhua o ēnei waiata". I kī te kaipānui a Honatana Dimbleby i ngā wā katoa i kitea e ia tērā wāhanga o tērā pō "hāneanea", e hua ana kia hurihia te raina tuarua "tinihanga" ki: "E kore rawa ngā Pirihitini e whakarerekētia". I kī te BBC i te tuatahi i whakaaro ki te whakatangi i ngā waiata i roto i tētahi putanga whakatangitangi nā ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus - ahakoa i whakaritea e ngā kaiwaiata i ētahi atu pō o te Proms. I whakapuakina e te Pirimia o Poihāne tana whakahē ki te whakataunga taketake, e kī ana ki ngā MP: "E aroha ana te iwi ki a tātau tikanga me to tātau hītori me ōna hēnga katoa", me te tāpiri i ngā ngana ki te "whakatau" he "heahea". I muri iho ka whakahokia e te AO te whakataunga, e kī ana: "Ināianei ka whakaurua e ngā wāhanga e rua tētahi rōpū tīpako o ngā Kaiwaiata o TE WĀ", e whakamārama ana i ngā kupu ka waiatatia i roto i te Hōro, me te hunga whakarongo e wātea ana ki te waiata i te kāinga. I puta mai i muri i te whakakapinga o te tumuaki o te Ariki Hall i te tūranga e Tim Davie, te rangatira nui o mua o te ringa arumoni o TE AO Studios. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Pakihi: Kāore he take e mau mai ana i te mōrea o te putunga e kī ana te kaitiaki
summary: Tērā pea ka tino pā te pānga poto ki te whakahaerenga o UK me ngā moni tūmatanui, kua whakatūpato te kaitiaki moni o te whenua.
text: Ki te wehe atu te UK i te EU me te kore mahi, tērā pea ka puta ki ngā iti me te whakaputunga o ētahi hua kawemai, e kī ana te Office for Budget Responsibility. I kī te OBR i te kore o ngā tauira mō Te Pākehā i uaua ai te matapae. Engari i kitea ko te Wiki Toru Rā o te tau 1974 i ākina e te mahi mahi a ngā kaikari maina i hinga ai te 3% i roto i te huaputa ia hauwhā. I kī te OBR he ngoikore ake ngā mahi ohaoha me ngā utu nui ake ka puta mai i tētahi Brexit kore. I kī te OBR mēnā kāore he whakaaetanga mō ngā paerewa me tuku anō ngā mea katoa hei whakaaetanga: "I roto i tētahi tauari kāore e taea e te UK me te EU te whakaae ki te āhukahuka tahi tonu ('grandfathering') o ngā paerewa hua tīariari me ngā tohu ngaio, me whakaae anō pea ngā taonga tīariari katoa i mua i te hoko me ngā ratonga ka tino rāhuitia e te ngaronga o te urunga mākete." E kī ana mā tēnei e ahu atu ki ngā whākōkī taonga i a rātau e tatari ana ki ngā whakaaetanga hou. I whakatūpato hoki mō te mōrea o te taunga o te rererangi o Ingarangi kāore e taea te rere, me kaua e whakaaetia. 'Wiki e toru rā' E kī ana ko ngā putunga i tohuāki ai tēnei ka whakakino noa iho i te āhuatanga: "Me tino nui ēnei whākīkī, tērā pea ka tohuāki i ngā kāinga me ngā umanga kia ngana ki te whakaputu taonga i mua, ka whakapōrearea anō ngā iti." I kī te OBR he "tata ki te kore e taea te tōkarikari me te maia ki te pānga tūpono o tēnei momo tauari i mua. " Heoi anō, ahakoa ehara i te whakarara hāngai, e tika ana kia mōhio ko te 'Wiki Toru Rā', i whakaurua i te tōmua o te tau 1974 hei urupare ki ngā iti o te pūngao me te nui ake o te tinihanga i te wāhi o ngā kaikari, i pāhonotia ki te hinganga o te huaputa i raro iho i te 3% i taua koata."

title: Hei tīmata anō i ētahi ratonga kēmu PlayStation
summary: Kua kī a Kapa ka tīmata anō ētahi ratonga i runga i tana Whatunga TeihanaPurei, i katia i muri i te tāhaetanga o ngā taipitopito whaiaro o ngā kaiwhakamahi 77m.
text: I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o Te Kaitiaki kua whakarewaina e rātau te haumarutanga o ā rātou pūnaha rorohiko i muri i te tāhaetanga o ngā ingoa kaiwhakamahi, ngā wāhitau īmēra me ngā taipitopito takiuru. I whakapārewa ngā kaiwhakahaere, tae atu ki a Kazuo Hirai, te upoko o te wae PlayStation o Te TeihanaPurei, mō te pakaru haumarutanga. Na te tāhae i āki te mahi ā-ture me ngā tūhuratanga i te US me Uropi. "Kua mahi te rōpū whakahaere i te karaka ki te whakahoki mai i ēnei ratonga ki runga i te raina, ā, kei te mahi noa iho i muri i tā mātou manatoko i ngā taumata haumarutanga puta noa i ā mātou whatunga," te kī a Tēnā Hirai i roto i tētahi kōrero. E kitea ana a ia hei kaiwhakataetae hei upoko o Te Kaporeihana Hōhonu. "Ko ēnei whakaekenga ture e mārama ana te miramira i te raruraru whānui ki te haumarutanga ā-ipurangi," te kī a Tēnā Hirai. Ā muri ake, i tētahi hui rongokōrero, ka whakapārewa a Tēnā Hirai me ētahi atu kaiwhakahaere o Te Rūnanga tokorua, a, ka tuohu hōhonu. "E tino whakapōhēhē ana mātou mō te nui o te āwangawanga me te raruraru ki ā mātou kaiwhakamahi," tana kī. I whiwhi ngā kaiwhakamahi TeihanaTākaro i tā rātou tohu tuatahi kei te hē tētahi mea ki te ratonga i te 20 o Āperira. I ngā rā e whai ake nei, e toru ngā kōrero poto i tukuna e Kapa e tono ana i ngā kaiwhakamahi kia manawanui i a ia e uiui ana i tētahi "urutomo waho", i te hack rānei. I te 27 o Āperira ka kitea te whānuitanga katoa o te pakaru haumarutanga. I roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki te rangitaki PlayStation whaimana, ka kī te kamupene kua whakararurarutia ngā mōhiohio pūkete kaiwhakamahi mō te Whatunga PlayStation me ngā ratonga Qriocity i muri i tētahi "urutomo kore mana, kore mana hoki ki tā mātou whatunga". I kī a Kapa, ahakoa i whakamunatia ngā raraunga kāri nama, ā, kāore he whakaaturanga i tāhaetia, kāore i taea te whakahaere i te tāhaetanga o te raraunga. Mā te whatunga PlayStation e āhei ai ngā kaitākaro ki te tikiake pūmanawa me te tākaro me ētahi atu kaiwhakamahi.

title: Piripīni Duterte: I whakawhānuitia te ture taua i Mindanao
summary: Kua tino pōti ngā kaiwhakatika i Piripīni ki te whakaroa i te ture taua ki te mahi i tētahi tauwhāinga ā-Māori i te motu whakangāwari o Mindanao.
text: Ko ngā kaiwhakawhanake e honoa ana ki te Kāwanatanga Āmāri e noho ana i ētahi wāhi o Marawi, he taone i te tonga, mai i Me. I kī a Perehitini Rodrigo Duterte e hiahiatia ana te toronga hei kuru i te tauwhāinga, engari e kī ana kaiwhakawāwā he wāhanga tērā o tētahi hopu hiko whānui ake. Ko Mindanao te kāinga ki te maha o ngā rōpū whakakeke Mohimana e rapu ana i te mana motuhake anō. Ka whakaaetia e te ture taua te whakamahinga o te hōia ki te whakaū i te ture me te tautāwhi i te iwi me te kore utu mō ngā wā roa. He take tairongo tēnei i Piripīni, i reira i whakahaua ai te ture taua e te kaiwhakahauhau tōmuri o Ferdinand Marcos mo te nuinga o tana ture. I te Hātarei, ka pau tētahi ture taua 60 rā i whakaritea i mua. I pā mai i te 23 o Me, i muri noa iho i ngā matapaki whakamate i waenganui i te taua me ngā pūtā e honoa ana ki te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi. Ko te tikanga o te toronga ka noho mana tonu te ture tae noa ki te 31 o Hakihea. I te wā o Me, ka whakatūpato a Perehitini Duterte ka taea te whakaroa atu i te ture taua puta noa i Piripīni i muri i te matenga o nga pirihimana i Marawi. I pātai ētahi kaipānui ātete he aha te take me hoatu ki te katoa o te motu ki te tonga, kaua ko te taone anake. "E wehi ana ahau mā te kaupapa ki te whakaroa i te ture taua i Mindanao e waiho te ara mo tētahi ture taua whānui o Piripīni," i whakahuatia e Senator Risa Hontiveros e TE WHK me te kōrero. I kī tētahi atu senator, a Franklin Drilon, he roa rawa te toronga, i te wā i kī te tangata kōwanatanga o Edcel Lagman "kāore he take pono" mōna. Kotahi tekau mā rua nga kaiwhakahaere i haukotia hoki ngā kōrero i te whakarongo o te Hātarei, e waiata ana "kaua rawa ki te ture taua", ka pūrongotia e te kōwhiringa rongokōrero. I kī te rangatira o te ope taua, a Tianara Eduardo Ano, e tika ana kia rāhuitia te nekehanga a nga kaiwhakawhanake o te Rūnanga, e whakatūpato ana ka hora te tutukitanga haere tonu ki ētahi atu tāone i runga i te motu, ka pūrongotia e te paetukutuku Rongokōrero GMA. I whakaahuatia e ia he "pakanga taone momo-Moana", e pā ana ki te whawhai i te taone o Te Kāwanatanga i puritia e IS. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere haumarutanga e kōrero ana ki te rōpū nui i mua i te pōti, e hiahiatia ana te ture hei whakatikatika i te rohe, e whakaaetia ai ngā kaitautoko o IS ki te whakatū i ngā whakatikanga ōrite i ētahi atu wāhi o Mindanao. I kī rātau, tata tonu ki te 60 ngā pūtā i mahue i tētahi wāhi 49 heketea o Marawi, engari e tata ana ki te 1,000 ngā toa pro-IS i hohe ki tētahi atu wāhi i te tonga, e pupuri ana i ngā taumahatanga e 23. Ko Marawi te kāinga ki ngā tangata e 200,000, engari he tokomaha kua rere i te tutu. Tērā te mataku mo te hunga e mau ana e anga ana ki te kore kai me te wai. Neke atu i te 420 ngā kaiwhakawhanake, e 100 ngā hōia me ngā tāngata e 45 kua mate i roto i te whawhai. I tīmata ngā matapaki i te rahua o te taua i tana ngana ki te hopu i a Isnilon Hapilon, e whakapono ana ko ia te kaiārahi IS matua i Piripīni, ā, e honoa ana ki te rōpū Maute paetata, nāna i whakapuaki te pono ki te IS. Hei urupare ka whakaekea e te rōpū Maute ētahi wāhi o te taone, ka mau herehere. Ko wai te rōpū Maute? - Aroturuki BBC

title: Ngā huringa nui mō ngā moni pūngao whakahou a te kāwanatanga
summary: Me whakarerekē e te kāwanatanga te āhua o te whakawhāiti i te pūngao whakahou, kua pānuitia.
text: E kī ana ngā Minita o te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū tuarua ka tapahia e rātau te tautoko mō te hau ki uta me te pūngao kōmaru, engari ka nui ake te pūrua ki te hiko hau o waho. I whakaahuatia e te Hēkeretari Matua o te Whare Taonga a Danny Alexander te neke o te pārekareka hei "whakataurite anō" me te kī e kore te whakapau moni katoa e rerekē. Engari i kī a Labour he kino te utu "tapahi me te huri" mo te umanga. Ka whakaaria mai ngā kaiwhakarato utu mō te hiko hau ki uta me te pūngao kōmaru mai i te 2015, ā, ka nui ake te nui o te utu mō te hiko hau o waho. Ko te neke o te pūngao hau e haere mai ana i mua i te Tauākī Ngahuru a Tumuaki George Osborne, ka tukuna e ia ki ngā MP i te Tāite. Ko ētahi atu pānuitanga tauākī tōmua ko: I kī ngā pūtake mai i ngā rōpū tauwhāinga e rua he nui rawa te pūtea penapena i roto i te hau ki uta me te pūngao kōmaru, kua kore rātou e hiahia ki te tautoko nui o te kāwanatanga. Waihoki, i kī rātau, e hiahiatia tonutia ana e ngā pūtake hau o waho he pārekareka anō hei whakahauhau i te pūtea penapena mo te wā roa. I whakakāhore a Tēnā Alexander i ngā huatau he urupare te nekehanga ki te pouri o ngā MP Conservative i ngā pāmu hau e noho ana i ō rātou taiwhanga. I kī ngā pūtake Conservative me Liberal Democrat i pai te whakataunga nā te mea he kaupapa here tā rātou e ātete ana i te tuma mai i te Rōpū Rangatiratanga o UK, e whakahē ana i ngā pāmu hau katoa i runga i te tikanga. Ko ngā utu taraiwa - ko te nuinga e whakapūmautia ana e te kāwanatanga hei utu i ia wae hiko - kua tautuhia ki runga ake i te uara pūngao o nāianei, hei momo pārekareka mo te wā roa hei whakahauhau i ngā kamupene kia haumi. I kī tētahi pūtake Conservative i tūmanako ia ki "tētahi tapahi tino nui" i roto i ngā utu mō te hau ā-uta i te tau 2015 me tua atu. I kōrero tētahi atu mo te "tīmatanga o te mutunga mō ngā whakahou pakeke". I kī tētahi pūtake: "Kei roto mātou i tētahi wāhi tino pai. Ki te kore mātou e whakawhāiti i te ā-uta, ka nui rawa tātau ki uta, ehara te herenga i te pūtea, engari i te tōrangapū. Ditto solar. "Nā reira mā te aukati i te kōmaru me te ā-uta ka pai te uara mō te moni, ka taea e mātou te neke tere ake i te mea e tūmanakohia ana ki ngā tōpana mākete, ā, ka taea e mātou te whakarite ko te hangarau whakahou kotahi ka taea te haere ki te tauine i ngā tau 2020 - hau o waho - ka whiwhi i te tautoko tōmua e hiahiatia ana e tētahi hangarau pakeke." I kī te Minita Pūngao a Michael Fallon me hora ngā utu "kia tika ake". I whakakāhore a Downing Street ko te mutunga o ngā pāmu hau ki uta, he urupare ki te āwangawanga tūmatanui kei te tūkino rātau i te taiwhenua. I kī te kaikorero mana o te pirimia: "I takea te whakataunga i runga i te utu hinga o ngā pāmu hau ki uta". Engari, mō Labour, ka kī atu te hēkeretari matua o te kōruru ki te Whare Taonga o Pirihi Leslie ki te Reo Irirangi 5 ora: "Kei te tapahi noa iho rātou me te huri i ngā wā katoa - he tino kino mō te pūtea penapena pūmau, mo te wā roa." I tāpiritia e Kōnata MacDougall, te āpiha whakahaere matua o te umanga pūngao whakahou RES: "He moto tēnei pānui mō te maia o te kaiwhakangao, ā, ka tapahia te tukunga o te hau ki uta - te hangarau pūngao whakahou iti rawa i roto i te whāranu pūngao o UK. " Mā te whakararuraru i te hau ki uta i mua i te pakeketanga me te whakakapi ki te pūngao waro iti nui ake, ka nui ake te utu ki te kaihoko." * Ka whakahōutia e Tēnā Osborne ngā MP mō te āhua o te whakahaerenga mai i te 11:15 GMT i te Rāitema, me te pānuitanga ora me te tātaritanga o te Tauākī Ngahuru i te paetukutuku rongokōrero o TE AO, te pouaka whakaata me te reo irirangi o TE AO.

title: I whakaorangia te whakaahua o te ope pakaru a Pāpā e te pāpāho pāpori
summary: I mua i te whakaahua mamati, he maha ngā atahanga i hopukina me te tā i te wā kotahi. Mēnā ka pakaru taua pikitia, me noho tahi koe.
text: Nā Georgina RannardBBC News Alexiz Connolly, e noho ana i te Rāhui Iniani o Campo, California, tētahi whakaahua pēnei - he whakaahua taua o tōna pāpā i tangohia i te tau 1977, engari ināianei kua pouri, kua kōpikopiko. I te Wenerei ka whakairihia e ia te pikitia ki te hapori Reddit tuihono e tiritiri ana i ngā whakaahua o "ngā tamariki mātao o te hītori". "Ko te rā whānau 60 o taku pāpā i te Paraire, ā, i te kohikohi ahau i ana whakaahua tamariki anake, ko tētahi o ēnei ko tana whakaahua taua," te kī a Alexiz, e mahi ana i tētahi mīhini kāniwha e whakatika ana i te casino. I te huatau a tētahi kaiwhakamahi kia tono āwhina a Redditors ki te whakaora i te atahanga ki tōna kororia o mua, ka tangohia e Alexiz te tohutohu. I raro iho i te 12 haora, ka whiwhi a ia i ngā hua i tūmanakohia e ia - he whakaahua māeneene me te mārama o tōna pāpā e mau ana i ōna ngenge o te Ope Taua 1 o Ranger. "Kei te roimata ahau! Kia nui te mihi ki a koe mo tēnei! E whakamanamana ana ahau ka whai wā tētahi ki te whakatika i tana whakaahua," ko te tuhituhi a Alexiz ki a koe/TheBlackPopeSJ, nāna i whakatika te pikitia. Na te pūrākau whakamahana manawa hoki i menemene ai te tangata i runga i Reddit, i reira i pōtitia ai e tata ana ki te 45,000 ngā wā. "Kei te āwangawanga ahau i te aroha o te whakaahua o tōku pāpā," te whakamārama a Alexiz. "Kua homai hoki ki a au te wā hei pātai atu ki taku pāpā mō tōna wā i roto i te taua." I uru atu a Gary Connolly ki nga ope taua o Amerika i te kura tuarua me tana tuakana i te tau 1976, i muri noa iho i te mutunga o te Pakanga o Vietnam. He hepara Karaitiana a ia ināianei. I kōrero a Redditor u/DayGlowBeautiful mō te pūrākau: "Kei te mīharo ahau ki tō ohaoha ki te āwhina i tētahi tauhou matapōkere i runga i te ipurangi me tētahi tohu whakamīharo. Koinei tāku e tūmanako ana kia mahia e te ipurangi mō te tangata, kia tata mai tātau katoa." I whakamāramatia e tētahi atu kaiwhakamahi he uaua ake te whakaora whakaahua mamati i te āhua nei. "Me whakaaro koe he miriona rangatū o ngā hononga kiri iti. He uaua ake te waihanga i ngā mea kāore i reira. "I te mea kāore taua rohe i te tino ōrite ki tētahi atu mea, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā raraunga kua tata ngaro katoa, me te kore e peita noa iho i tētahi mea hou, kāore he mea hei whakatika. " He ia tino pai te arotautanga me te whakaoratanga atahanga, me ngā pikitia hītori i roto i ngā kaiwhakaahua whakaaweawe. Ka panoni te kaiwaiata o Marina Amaral i ngā whakaahua pango me te mā i tangohia i ngā tau 1860 mā te whakamahi i ngā pūkenga matihiko hei tāpiri tae ki ngā whakaahua pango me te mā. Nō nā tata nei i whakamahia e ia ōna pūkenga ki te whakatae i tētahi kohinga whakaahua ātaahua o ngā nēhi o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao o Ingarangi ki te whakataki i o rātau tuakiri. I a Aotearoa, ko ngā pikitia i hangaia i te tau 2010 e te kaiwaiata o Heta Taras e whakaatu ana i ngā tohu whenua o nāianei, pēnei i te Pourewa o Eiffel, i honoa ki ngā atahanga hītori i tiria tata ki te 200,000 ngā wā i runga i tētahi whārangi toi Facebook. Ko Jordan Lloyd tētahi atu kaitae kua huri tōna kanohi ki te hītori. Ko te nuinga o ana mahi ko te rangahau pikitia me te peita apa ki ngā atahanga mai i te tini ki te mano. Ā, i Instagram, ko ngā pūkete pēnei i te History Coloured e tiritiri ana i ngā pikitia hītori e āhei ana ki te kawe mai i ngā mano o ngā kaiārahi.

title: Whakaora Chibok: Mai i te #BringBackOurGirls ki te #HopeEndures
summary: I muri i te kitenga o tētahi o rātau e rua tau i muri i tana hopunga, ka whiwhi āwhina tētahi o rātau mō ngā kōtiro kura e 200 i kahakina i Naria.
text: #Bringbackourgirls noho ko tētahi o ngā whakahau pāpāho pāpori nui rawa atu. I whiwhi i te tautoko a te hunga rangatira mai i te Kuia Tuatahi o Amerika, a Mīharo Taupānga, ki te kaiwhaiwhai hōia o Mawa Yousafzai me te kaihautū whakaaturanga kōrerorero o Amerika, o Ēnā DeGeneres. Ināianei kua kitea te kōtiro, i kitea ko Amina Ali Nkeki, kua mau anō te tangata ki Twitter. He tokomaha nga tāngata i pōhiri i nga rongo, a, i tūmanako ka kitea wawe ērā atu kōtiro i kahakina e nga kaiwhakawhanake o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa. He hashtag me te ingoa o te wahine i whakaorangia, ko #ChibokgirlAminaAli, i ahu mai i Lagos, te taone nui rawa o Nigeria. I karanga ētahi tāngata ki te mahi, i riri rānei i te kore mahi i tēnei wā. Kua anga atu a Perehitini Muhammadu Buhari ki te whakahē mura mai i nga kaiwhakahauhau Whakahokia mai a Mātau Kōtiro mo te kore haere whakamua ki te kimi i nga kōtiro. I tana haerenga mai ki te mana i tērā Me, ka kī a ia kāore e taea te hinga i a Te Rūnanga me te kore whakaora i a rātau. Ahakoa i a rātau e tuhituhi ana, i pōhēhē ētahi ki te whaitake o te whakahau. Ko tētahi o ngā whakahēnga matua o te nekeneke #BringBackOurGirls he tauira tērā o te 'clicktivism', he mahi tuihono mō tētahi take kāore e huri i tētahi mea, engari ka āhei te tangata ki te whakaaro kua mahia e rātou tētahi mea e whakapono ana rātou. Engari ko te nuinga o ngā kōrero tuihono i arotahi ki te tūmanako ka kawea mai e te putanga mai anō o Amina Ali mo te hokinga mai o ērā atu wāhine me ngā kōtiro i kahakina.

title: Ko te kuao wuruhi tahito i Kānata 'i ora i te 56,000 tau ki mua'
summary: Ko tētahi whatianga wuruhi i kitea i te raki o Kānata i noho i te 56,000 tau ki mua, e kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao.
text: I hunaia i roto i te permafrost mo te tekau mano tau, i kitea te whatianga wahine e tētahi kaikari koura tata ki te taone o Dawson i te rohe o Yukon i te tau 2016. Mai i taua wā ka tapaina ia ko Zhur, ko te tikanga wuruhi, e te iwi Tr'ondek Hwech'in o te rohe. Ināianei e kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao ko te whatianga, kei te mau tonu te hiako, ngā makawe me ngā niho, ko "te mummy wuruhi tino oti e mōhiotia ana". "He 100% tūturu a ia - ko ōna whatu katoa e ngaro ana," te kī a te kaituhi matua o Ahorangi Julie Meachen, he kaimātai me te ahorangi o te kikokiko i te Whare Wānanga o Des Moines i Aioa, ki te EurekAlert! paetukutuku rongokōrero pūtaiao. Mā te whakamahi i ngā pūkenga maha, ka taea e te tīma te whakatau i ngā āhuatanga maha o te oranga o te whatianga, mai i tōna pakeke me tōna kai ki tētahi take tūpono o te mate. Ko ngā kitenga, i whakaputaina i roto i te pukapuka Koiora o Nāianei i te Mane, e whakaatu ana kua kai te whatianga me tōna whaea i "ngā rauemi wai", tae atu ki ngā ika pēnei i te haramono. Mā te whakataurite i ngā raraunga mai i te DNA o te wuruhi me te tātaritanga o tōna enamel niho, ka kitea e rātau tērā pea i ora, i mate hoki ia i waenganui i te 56,000 me te 57,000 tau ki mua. I tēnei wā, i kitea e ngā hihi X o te tinana, e ono ki te waru wiki tōna pakeke i tōna matenga. I kitea e te mātauranga, ahakoa he āhua noa iho ngā fossil wuruhi tahito i Yukon, i Alaska rānei e noho tata ana, he āhua kore nei ngā mummies o ngā whāngote nui ake. "E whakaaro ana mātou i roto a ia i tōna ana, a, i mate inamata i te tiango o te ana," ka whakahuatia a Ahorangi Meachen me te kōrero. "I whakaaturia e ā mātou raraunga kāore a ia i matekai, ā, tata ki te 7 wiki te pakeke i tōna matenga, nā reira he pai ake mātou ki te mōhio kāore te kōtiro iti rawakore i mamae roa." Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: Ngā taumata-hangarau kia whai tūnga taumata-A i roto i te mahere pūkenga
summary: Ka whiwhi ngā akoranga hangarau mō ngā pakeke 16 ki te 19 tau i te tūnga ōrite ki ngā taumata-A mai i te 2014 engari mēnā anake ka kawea mai e rātou te tautoko pakihi, whare wānanga rānei, kua pānuitia e te kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Judith BurnsBBC News education reporter The Tech-level qualifications are aimed at raising the status of vocational qualifications in England. Ka whai te whakatikatika i ngā māharahara mō te kounga tāupe. I kī tētahi tinana whakawhiwhinga he "hē" te whakatau he koretake ētahi atu tohu pūkenga. Ko te tikanga o ngā huringa, ko ngā akoranga mahi anake e tutuki ana i te tūnga taumata-Hangarau ka tatau i roto i ngā ripanga rōpū tuarua mō ngā tau 16 ki te 19 tau mai i te 2016. Ka tangohia ētahi 80% o ngā tohu mahi mō tēnei rōpū pakeke. E rua nga momo tohu mahi i raro i te pūnaha hou. Ka roa te roa o ngā taumata hangarau whakangungu ā-ringa hei whakaoti i ngā Taumata-A, ā, me tautoko e tētahi pāhonotanga ngaio, e rima rānei ngā kaitukumahi kua rēhitatia ki te Whare Kamupene. Ka arotahi ēnei tohu ki te whakangungu ā-ringa, e ahu ana ki ngā mahi e mōhiotia ana hei tauira i te pūkaha, te rorohiko, te kaute, te manaakitanga rānei. Anō hoki, ka ōrite te wā ki te whakaoti i ngā Tohu Mātauranga Ahuwhānui Hoatu hei taumata-AS, ā, ka arotahi ki te akoranga whānui ake o tētahi wāhi hangarau, kāore e hono hāngai ana ki tētahi mahi. Me tautoko ēnei tohu mai i ngā whare wānanga e toru hei tatau i roto i ngā ripanga mahinga. Ko tētahi taumata-Hangarau me tētahi tohu pāngarau uho, hei tauira ko te pāngarau taumata-AS, ā, ko tētahi kaupapa whānui ka nui ki tētahi Baccalaureate Hangarau ā-pūranga, e kī ana te kāwanatanga. I muri i te arotakenga o ngā tohu mahi mō te kāwanatanga e Prof Alison Wolf e rua tau ki mua, nāna i huatau kua hinga te pūnaha o nāianei i te rangatahi, me ngā kura i whakamatautauria ki te whakaako i ngā tohu mātauranga e tino nui ana ngā piro i roto i ngā ripanga mahinga kura. Ko te tikanga o tēnei ka whakaarahia ngā ākonga ki te tango i ngā tohu mātauranga kāore pea e āwhina i a rātou ki te mahi, ki te mātauranga tiketike rānei, ka huatau a ia. I tērā tau ka pānuitia e te kāwanatanga ngā mana ko ēhea ngā tohu mahi mō ngā pakeke 14 ki te 16 tau ka tatau i roto i ngā ripanga rōpū o te kura. I te Rāitema, ka kī te Minita Pūkenga, a Matthew Hancock: "He mea nui te mātauranga mahi tino kounga ki te rangatiratanga ā muri ake me te oranga o ngā miriona. " Nā te mea he tino hira te mātauranga hangarau, he tino nui ngā tohu e tangohia ana e te rangatahi, he tino kounga, he tautoko hoki i ā rātou hiahia. "Ko ēnei whakahōu he tino hiahiatia, ā, ka whakarite kia āwhina ngā taumata Hangarau i ngā tāngata ki ngā akoranga me ngā mahi." I kī a Chris Jones, te tumuaki o te tinana whakawhiwhinga pūkenga mahi o City and Guilds: "Ko te arotahi nui rawa ki ngā tēpu rōpū i roto i te pānuitanga o tēnei rā, he tino whakakino. " Mā te whakauru anake i ngā tohu taumata-Hangarau ki ngā ripanga rōpū, ka kitea he maha ētahi atu tohu mahi e kore e whai hua. He hē tēnei. 'Paerewa koura' "E whakaaturia ana e ngā rangahau o mua tata nei mai i te IPPR [Institute for Public Policy Research], ko ngā whenua e nui ake ana te rangatahi e uru ana ki te mātauranga mahi e kite ana i ngā taumata iti iho o te kore mahi a te taiohi." I kī teNGARA i tāruatia te kaupapa, engari me mātua whakaū te pūnaha "me whakahau i te manaaki puta noa i ngā wāhanga katoa" ā, kaua e whakahaeretia e tētahi "ringa o ngā kamupene". I kī a Neil Carberry, te kaiwhakahaere o te mahi me ngā pūkenga o te CD: "Ko te whakamātautau litmus ko ngā taumata Hangarau e tuku ana i te whakangungu paerewa koura e hiahiatia ana e ngā kaitukumahi i te wā kāore i te kitea hei karaehe tuarua. " Me whai mātauranga kaupapa whānui ngā akoranga, te aromatawai uaua, te wheako ā-ringa mārō, me te noho hei pōhatu hīkoi ki tētahi mahi nui. "Me tino mārama te pūnaha hōu mō tēhea whakarato e kiia ana ko te 'mahi' me te 'hoatu ahuwhānui'. " Ko te whakaaro he tohu mātauranga katoa, nā reira me karo tātau i tētahi pūnaha taumata-rua, e kitea ai he whāiti rawa tētahi, ā, he whānui rawa tētahi. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i te toa taumata-Hangarau uaua ake e toro atu ana ki ngā mea e rua." I tautokona e Gill Clipson, o te Association of Colleges, te karanga kia whakaaetia ngā tohu mātauranga e ngā whare wānanga me ngā umanga, engari i whakatūpato "he whāiti rawa te waihanga i ngā 'ara' motuhake e toru e wehe ana i ngā tohu ki ngā kāwai kua whakaritea kētia me ngā ūnga kua whakaritea kētia". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore e taea te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te hoatu i ngā ākonga te wā ki te kōwhiri i te whāranu tika o ngā tohutohu." I whakatūpato a Kōrero Lightman o te Association of School and College Leaders that "developing high quality vocational qualifications that have A level status is a complex and highly specialized task, and the timescale set is challenging in the extreme". I kī a Tristram Hunt o Labour: "I muri i te toru tau o te kāwanatanga e whakaheke ana i te mātauranga mahi, e tata ana ki te miriona ngā rangatahi e kore mahi ana. " Ehara i te mea kei te tino tākaro a Rawiri Karauna rāua ko Mikaera Gove ināianei, i te wā e tautuhi ana a Labour i te rārangi take mō ngā pūkenga. "It is right that pupils have a choice of taking new vocational courses, but Michael Gove needs to reassure parents that it will be a gold standard to sit alongside A-levels and not an afterthought. " Mā ngā mahere a Labour mō tētahi Tech Bacc e whakarite kia mahi ngā tauira i ngā akoranga mahi uaua kua whakamanatia e ngā kaitukumahi, Ingarihi me te pāngarau ki te 18 me tētahi whakanohonga wheako mahi kounga."

title: Te utu a ngā kaiako o Te Motu o Tangata: Ko ngā utu kotahi 'kaua e whakatika i te tautohetohe'
summary: Ko ngā utu tapeke mō ngā kaiako i te Motu o Tangata "kāore he mea hei whakatau" i te tautohetohe o nāianei mō te utu me ngā herenga, kua kī tētahi uniana.
text: Kua whakaaetia he utu utu me ngā utu kotahi i waenganui i te £850 me te £2,850 e tāpiritia ana ki te utu a ngā kaiako o Hakihea. E toru ngā uniana i pūrua i te mahi, engari i whakapeka te National Association of Schoolmasters, Union of Women Teachers (NASUWT) ki te whakaae. I kī te uniana e pōti ana i ngā mema mēnā ka mahia he mahi tuki. Ko ngā utu kotahi e āhukahuka ana i te tūtohutanga a te Tinana Arotake Kaiako Kura 2018 o tētahi pikinga utu 3.5% puta noa i te papa, kāore i whakatinanatia katoatia. 'Horo ā muri ake' I raro i ngā ture o te mahi hou, kua whakaae te Tari Mātauranga, Hākinakina me te Ahurea (DESC) ki te whakatuwhera anō i ngā whakaritenga i ngā tau katoa e 0.5% i raro iho i te utunga o Manx. Ko te NASUWT e tohu ana i te 70% o ngā kaiako i te motu. I ākiritia e Damien McNulty, o te kaiwhakahaere ā iwi o te uniana, te tono utu. "Ko ngā hiriwa e 30 hei whakamātau ki te hoko i a mātau kāore e pā ki ngā taha," tana kī. I kī a ia ko te utu kaiako ki te kāinga i tēnei wā e 30% i raro iho i te wāhi i noho tonu ai ki te utunga o te utunga o Manx, ā, kāore te whakaaetanga i "here i te kaitukumahi kia tuku ki te whakatau i tētahi horo ā muri ake". Ka ahu hoki te take ki te whakatikatika i ngā arotakenga a ngā kaiako, te whakatārewatanga o ngā whakamanatanga o waho tae noa ki Mahuru, me ngā kōrero mō te kaupapahere akoranga, tae atu ki ngā take i whakaarahia i roto i tētahi pūrongo takitahi o nā noa nei. I whakaae katoa ngā mema o te National Association of Head Teachers, te National Education Union, me te Association of School and College Leaders i te mahi. He aha e kore ai e whai i te Motu o Tangata i runga i Facebook me Twitter? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka ngaro a Banksy i te pakanga ki te umanga kāri mihi i runga i te moko 'pomu putiputi'
summary: Kua ngaro i a Banksy tētahi pakanga ki tētahi umanga kāri mihi i runga i te moko o tētahi o ana mahi tino rongonui.
text: I werohia e Full Colour Black te mana o te rehetoi ki te tohu i tana whakaahua o tētahi kaiwhakahaere e maka ana i ngā putiputi. Kua makaia e te tari moko o Ūropi tana moko, ā, kua whakapaea ia he "maiorooro ki ngā mahi pono" ina ngana ki te pare. Kia whaimana ai tētahi moko, me hoko taonga e te kaipupuri mā te whakamahi i te atahanga. Engari i kī te mana kua whakaputaina e ia kia kore ai e whakamahi i ngā ture manatārua, he motuhake, ā, ka hiahiatia e te kaiwaiata rongonui o Bristolian kia whakaatu i tōna tuakiri pono. I te tau 2005, i rehu tuatahi a Banksy i te pikitia ki runga i tētahi pakitara i Hiruharama i te tau 2005, ā, i tono tana kamupene mō te moko i te tau 2014. Me whakamahi i roto i ngā tau tuatahi e rima, engari i kī te EU Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) kāore anō ia kia hokona he taonga, ētahi atu tūemi rānei mā te whakamahi i te atahanga tae noa ki te wero a Full Colour Black i te moko i te tau 2019. Kātahi anō ka whakatūria e ia tētahi toa tuihono me tētahi toa i mua i Croydon, ki te tonga o Rāwāhi, e whakamārama ana kua "hanga taonga ia mō te whakatutuki i ngā kāwai moko i raro i te ture EU". I kī te EUIPO he "mārama kāore he whakaaro o Banksy" ki te whakamahi i te moko i tana kōnaetanga, ā, i te tau 2019 ko ngā taonga i hokona e ia "i waihangatia, i hokona anake" hei ngana kia kaua e ngaro te moko. 'Ko te manatārua mō ngā mea ngaro' "Ehara tōna whakaaro i te whakamahi i te tohu hei tohu hokohoko hei whakahokohoko taonga me te whakairo i tētahi wāhanga o te mākete hāngai, engari hei karo anake i te ture," te kī a te whakahaere. "He maiorooro ēnei mahi ki ngā mahi pono." I kī hoki te EUIPO kua tono ia mō ngā moko kia whai mana ā-ture ai ki ana mahi me te kore whakauru ki te ture manatārua. "Kua kōwhiria e Banksy kia noho ingoamuna, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā ki te peita graffiti i runga i ngā āhuatanga o ētahi atu tāngata me te kore whakaaetanga, kaua ki te peita ki runga i ngā kānawehi, i tōna ake āhuatanga rānei," tana kī. "Kua kōwhiria hoki e ia kia tino kōrero e pā ana ki tōna whakahāwea ki ngā mana ā-hinengaro." I whakahuatia te whakahaere mai i tētahi o ana pukapuka, i kī ai ia "ko te manatārua mō ngā mea ngaro". I kī atu te rōia o Full Colour Black, a Aaron Wood o te umanga o Blaser Mills, ki a BBC News i "tino pai ki te putanga" te kamupene kāri mihi. 'Kei te mōrearea te kōpaki moko katoa a Banksy' Ka kī a ia: "I ngā wā katoa ka tirohia e Banksy ko te manatārua mō ngā mea ngaro, ā, mēnā e hiahia ana ia ki te whakataetae i tētahi tangata mā te whakamahi i tētahi atahanga, me whakawhirinaki ia ki te manatārua. " Ko te raruraru mō Banksy e whakamahi ana i te manatārua me puta mai ia i ngā kōruru. Me kī a ia, 'Anei ahau, nāku i waihanga te mahi.' A, i a ia e mahi ana i tēnā, ka ngaro i a ia taua taupoki ingoamuna. Nā reira kaore a ia e mahi i tēnā. "Engari ka taea e te tangata te kōnae i tētahi moko, nā reira i whakaputaina e te hinonga rangatōpū a Banksy tētahi moko mō tēnei mahi toi. Ka taea e te moko te mau tonu mo ake tonu atu, he mana whakahaere pūmau. Ahakoa he wā noa iho te manatārua, ā, me puta mai ia i te ingoamuna, mēnā ka whakawhirinaki ia ki te moko ka noho ingoamuna tonu ia, ā, ka taea e ia te mahi mō ake tonu atu. A, i whakaaro mātau ehara i te āhua tika o nga take." Kua werohia e te kamupene ngā moko o ētahi atu mahi Banksy e ono, ā, ināianei tērā pea ka whakataetae anō. "I te huarahi tino pai, kei te mōrearea te kōpaki moko katoa a Banksy," tana tāpiri mai. 'Kāore he whakaaro ki te whakamahi hei moko' Kāore anō ngā māngai o Banksy kia urupare ki tētahi tono tākupu. I kī te tohunga manatārua me te moko o Liz Ward, ko te tumuaki i Virtuoso Legal, he "take tino rerekē" nā te mea ko te nuinga o ngā rehetoi e whakawhirinaki ana ki te ture manatārua hei pare i a rātau mahi kia kore ai e whakaaetia. "Mā te manatārua, mēnā ka tono koe i tētahi tangata, me hoatu e koe tō ingoa ki runga i te puka kerēme," tana kī atu ki a BBC News. "E mārama ana kāore a Banksy, ahakoa i rēhitatia e ia tētahi moko, kāore i whai whakaaro ki te whakamahi hei moko. " Ko te nuinga o ngā rangatira moko e rēhita ana i tētahi ingoa parani, moko rānei nā te mea ka waiho e rātou hei ingoa mō rātou. Ka kī rātau, 'Ki te hokona e koe he kaiwhakaako takirua me Nike, Puma rānei, e mōhio ana koe kei te whiwhi koe i te kounga pai.' Koia tērā te take i tino whai hua ai ngā moko. Kāore a Banksy i waihanga i tētahi moko hei rawa pakihi." Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: I kitea he hara te kaiwaiata tiki 'kaiwhaiwhai' o Te Wānanga
summary: Kua whakawāteatia tētahi rehetoi tiki "kaiwhaiwhai" nāna i whakairi ngā whakakitenga o ana tūpāpaku i runga i te ipurangi ki te whanonga whakawehi me te tūkino.
text: I kitea he hara ki ngā whakapae e rima i te Kōti Sheriff o Glasgow. I tīmata ngā pirihimana i tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i te whakaaturanga o tōna whanonga e te Pāpori o TE Pāpori i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. I whakaahuatia pukutia e Anganui, e 38, i a ia e whakatata ana ki te tini o nga wāhine i Glasgow, i Uropi ki te Rāwhiti. I whakaaturia e te tūhuratanga o TE AO he pēhea tana whakairi i ngā whakaaturanga o ngā tūtakinga ki tana hongere YouTube, tae atu ki te ororongo i hopukina i te wā o te wahine. I whakaahuatia e Anganui he kaiako mārena me te āhua noho, ā, ka tohe he "akoranga" tāna i mahi ai. Engari he tokomaha nga wāhine i hoatu he whakaaturanga i te wā o te whakawā, i riri rātau, i whakamataku i ana whakatata. I te whakahokinga i a ia i roto i te tiakitanga e tārewa ana i te whiu, ka kī a Sheriff Lindsay Wood: "Ko ēnei whakapae he whakapā hara e pā ana ki ngā kōtiro taitamariki i pāngia i roto i ngā huarahi maha. " Tokorua o rātau he kōtiro kura, a, ko tētahi i tino mōrearea. He āwangawanga tūmatanui ēnei." I rongo nga kaiwhakawā i te whakatata atu o Anganui ki ngā kōtiro kura tokorua i tētahi ara mokemoke i Uddingston, South Lanarkshire, i te tau 2016, i a rāua e 16 me te 17 tau. I kī atu tētahi o rātau ki nga kaiwhakawā i karangatia ia e ia he "ātaahua" me te whakararuraru i a ia. I tāpiri mai a ia: "I pātai mai a ia ki a au mehemea kei te kura ahau, ā, he aha taku mahi i te kura. " I te pātai mai a ia mehemea he hoa tāne tāku, a, ka kī atu ahau kāo. "I pātai mai a ia ki a au mehemea kua mārena ahau i a au e mau ana i tētahi rīngi, engari kāore i runga i taku matimati mowhiti mārena. " Ka kī atu ahau kāo, a, ka haere atu. "Kātahi ia ka pātai mai ki taku tau, ā, i hiahia ahau ki te mōhio mehemea e hiahia ana ahau ki te haere ki te kawhe - ka kī atu ahau kāo." I panaia atu tētahi wahine 21 tau i te kōti i tana whakaahuatanga i te whai i a ia i te pokapū o te taone o Glasgow i te tau 2016. Ka kī te wahine: "I whakamātau ia ki te kukume i ahau kia tata ki a ia kia taea ai e ia te kihi i ahau, nā reira ka panaia atu ia e au. " Ka purua e ia tōna ringa ki runga i taku pāpāringa me tētahi atu ringa ki taku tuarā, ka kumea ahau ki roto. "He tino hiahia noa iho tōna i ōna kanohi." I whakaaro tētahi wahine e 20 tau te pakeke e tākaro ana a Anganui i tētahi kōrero māia ki a ia i tana whakatata atu ki a ia i te Tiriti o Buchanan o Glasgow i Whiringa ā Rangi i tērā tau. Ka kī a ia: "I homai e ia he whakamihi ki a au, a, i kī mai he rite ahau ki a Kimi Kardashian." Ka kī atu te wahine ki nga kaiwhakawā i rongo a ia i te "hākinakina" me te "whakamataku" i a Anganui. I muri iho ka karere a ia ki a ia i runga i Instagram, engari i āraia ia e ia i tana karangatanga i a ia he "whakahāwea" mo te whakakāhore i ana nekehanga. I kī te rōia, a Donna Armstrong, e whakangungu ana: "Kāore a ia i pīrangi ki te wehi, ki te whakaoho rānei i tētahi tangata." I kitea he hara te nuinga o te whakataunga a Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te 'Hara me te riri' I muri i te pānuitanga o te whakataunga, ka whakamihi te āpiha rangahau matua o Pirihimana Pākehā i te kēhi ki ngā tūpāpaku o Te Wānanga mo te haere mai ki mua. I kī a Det Insp Mark McLennan: "I whakatoia ngā wāhine, a, i mataku i tōna aro tē hiahiatia. " E hiahia ana ahau ki te hoatu takoha ki te toa o ēnei wāhine i te haerenga mai ki mua me te hoatu whakaaturanga kia kawea mai ai a Anganui ki te tika, engari i a ia e tūmanako ana kia whakaae rātau ki tōna whanonga kāore i te tika, i te mea kāore i te hiahiatia. "Me mōhio te tangata kāore e taea e rātau te tūmanako kia whakaaetia tō rātou whanonga mēnā ka whakararuraru me te riri. " E whakahauhau ana ahau i te tangata kua pā ki tēnei momo whanonga kia whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana me te pūrongo ki ngā Pirihimana Pākehā."

title: 'Ngāwari ki te kaha' ka tupu te takahanga huarere o La Niña i te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa
summary: Kua tupu tētahi takahanga huarere La Niña kaha ki te kaha i te Moana nui ā Kiwa, e ai ki te World Meteorological Organization (WMO).
text: Nā Matt McItihiKorero taiao Ko te tītohunga tūturu e hua ana i te whakamātaotanga nui o te pāmahana mata o te moana, Ko tēnei La Niña, kua tautuhia kia mutu tae noa ki te hauwhā tuatahi o te 2021, tērā pea ka whai pānga whakamātao ki ngā pāmahana o te ao. Engari e kore e aukati i te 2020 kia kore ai e noho ko tētahi o ngā tau mahana rawa i runga i te pūkete. E whakaahuatia ana a La Niña ko tētahi o ngā wāhanga e toru o te takanga huarere e mōhiotia ana ko te El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO). Kei roto i tēnei ko te wāhanga mahana e kiia nei ko El Niño, te La Niña mātao ake me tētahi wāhanga kūpapa. Ka tupu a La Niña ina pupuhi te hau kaha i ngā wai mata mahana o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa i Amerika ki te Tonga, ki Initonīhia. I tō rātou wāhi, ka puta ake ngā wai mātao mai i te hōhonu o te moana ki te mata. Mā tēnei takahanga e ahu atu ki ngā huringa huarere nui i ngā wāhi rerekē o te ao. Mēnā ka puta mai tētahi takahanga La Niña tino kaha, e hua ana te rangahau tērā pea ka pā ki te UK me Uropi ki te Raki tētahi hōtoke tino mākū. Ko te tikanga o La Niña ko te tikanga o ngā whenua pēnei i Initonīhia me Ahitereiria ka nui ake te ua i te mea noa, ā, he nui ake te timatanga hohe i Āhia ki te tonga-ki-te-rāwhiti. Tērā pea ka nui ake ngā āwhā i Kānata me te raki o Amerika, i te nuinga o te wā e ahu ana ki ngā āhuatanga hukarere. Ka pā pea ngā tūnga ki te tonga o Amerika e te tauraki i te wā kotahi. Ko te wā whakamutunga i tupu ai tētahi takahanga kaha i te tau 2010-2011. E kī ana te WMO ināianei he 90% te tūponotanga o ngā pāmahana o te moana o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa e toe ana ki ngā taumata La Niña mō te toenga o tēnei tau. E 55% te tūponotanga o ngā here e mau tonu ana tae noa ki te hauwhā tuatahi o tērā tau. Ahakoa ko te tikanga ka whakamātao te takahanga La Niña ki te ao, kāore tēnei e nui rawa te rerekētanga ki te 2020. "I te nuinga o te wā he pānga whakamātao tā La Niña ki ngā pāmahana o te ao, engari he nui ake tēnei i te wāhikē i te wera e mau ana i tō tātau hauora e ngā korohū kati kati," te kī a Prof Petteri Taalas, mai i te WMO. "Nō reira, ko te 2020 e noho tonu ana hei tētahi o ngā tau mahana rawa i runga i te pūkete, ā, ko te 2016-2020 e tūmanakohia ana ko te wā mahana rawa atu e rima tau i runga i te pūkete," tana kī "He mahana ake ngā tau La Niña ināianei ahakoa i ngā tau me ngā takahanga kaha o El Niño o mua." E kī ana te WMO e pānui ana i te La Niña ināianei kia whai wāhi ai ngā kāwanatanga ki te whakakorikori i a rātau kaupapa i ngā wāhi matua pēnei i te whakahaere mōrearea me te ahuwhenua. Ko tētahi āhuatanga hira o La Niña ko te pānga tērā pea ki te toenga o te wā āwhā o Aterangi. Ka whakahekea e te takahanga La Niña te kutikuti hau, arā, ko te huringa o te hau i waenganui i te mata me ngā taumata o runga o te hau takiwā. Mā tēnei e tipu ai ngā āwhā. Ka mutu te wā āwhā i te 30 o Whiringa ā Rangi, ā, e 27 ngā āwhā i tapaina. He nui ake tēnei i te 25 i matapaetia e te US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. Whāia a Mātā i Twitter.

title: Ko nga amuamu putea e piki ake ana i te 21%, e kii ana a FSA
summary: Neke atu i te 12,000 ngā amuamu i whiwhi ngā umanga pūtea i ia rā i te hawhe tuarua o te 2011, i aia e ngā māharahara mo te inihua parenga utu.
text: I piki te maha o ngā amuamu i te 21% i whakaritea ki ngā marama e ono o mua, ka kī te Mana Ratonga Pūtea (FSA). I roto i tēnei, ka piki ngā amuamu mō te inihua moni tārewa i te 85% ki raro noa iho i te miriona, e whakaatu ana te raraunga. I hinga ngā amuamu mō ngā penapena me ngā pūkete o nāianei i taua wā kotahi. Ko te tikanga ko te inihua parenga utu hē (PPI) hei utu i ngā utunga moni a ngā kaituku moni mēnā ka mate, ka mate, ka ngaro rānei ā rātou mahi. Engari na te hokonga hē o te inihua i ahu mai ki ngā ture hou me pēhea te mahi i ngā kēhi, ā, i waihangatia hoki he pire utu tāpiri e rere ana ki te nuinga pauna mō ngā pēke. I waipuketia ngā amuamu ki ngā pēke i tērā tau, e akiaki ana i te FSA kia nui ake te wā ki te mahi i ngā kēhi hītori i te tepenga e waru wiki noa iho. E whā i roto i ngā amuamu e rima e haere mai ana mā ngā kamupene whakahaere kerēme, pānuitanga i runga i te pouaka whakaata me ngā nūpepa. I piki te maha o ngā kēhi i kitea e te kaihoko i te hawhe tuarua o te tau, me te £2.1bn i utua ki ngā kiritaki i hokona hētia te PPI. Ka huihuia e te FSAdata ngā raraunga amuamu katoa i whakaputaina e ngā umanga pūtea. I whakapūketetia e Barclays te nuinga o ngā amuamu mō ia parani, engari ko te Rōpū Pākehā o Raiti te tau nui rawa mō ia rōpū pēke. E 281,000 ngā amuamu i mahia ki a Barclays i te hawhe whakamutunga o te tau 2011, mai i te 251,500 mai i Hānuere ki Hune. "Kei te teitei ake tonu ngā amuamu i te mea e tūmanakohia ana e ā mātou kiritaki, engari kei runga mātou i te ara tika ki te whakaheke," te kī a Antony Jenkins, te rangatira nui o Te Pūtea Hokohoko me te Pēke Pakihi. I kī te Rōpū Pākehā o Raiti "he tino nui te whiwhi ratonga kiritaki" me te kī kei te heke iho ngā amuamu pēke, me te nui o ngā amuamu e pā ana ki te PPI. Engari i kī a Rārangi Raiti, te rangatira nui o te rōpū kiritaki ko tēhea?: "Ko ngā raraunga amuamu he whakaaturanga kei te kore tonu ētahi pēke e mahi tika ki ā rātou kiritaki ina hē ngā mea. " Ko te pikinga o ngā amuamu PPI e whakaatu ana i te whānuitanga o te hokohoko hē PPI. Ināianei me kite mātou i ngā pēke e mahi ana me te mahi i ēnei amuamu kia tere, kia pai hoki, ā, me mahi te FSA ki tētahi tangata e tō ana i o rātau waewae ki te whakatau amuamu."

title: 'Unanswered question' over Lake Vyrnwy estate sale
summary: I kī ngā tāngata e noho ana i te pānga o Lake Vyrnwy i Powys kei a rātau tonu "ngā pātai kāore anō kia whakautua" i muri i te tūtakitanga ki ōna rangatira hou.
text: Kua whakaingoatia e te rangatira o Severn Trent ko United Utilities me RSPB Cymru hei kaihoko manakohia. Ko te hokonga £11m e whakaahuatia ana ko te mea nui rawa atu i roto i te pūmahara ora i Uēra me Ingarangi. I kī tētahi tangata whenua e wehi ana ia kei te "wehewehe" te pānga. I kī nga kaihoko tōtahi e hiahia ana rātau ki tētahi kitenga tiritiri. I kī atu a David Rowlands ki te hui i Abertridwr: "Kei te hiahia tonu ahau ki te pātai engari kei te māharahara ahau kei te wehe te pānga" Whakaaro "I ngā wā katoa ka whakahaeretia te pānga hei wae kotahi. Ko te hua o tēnei ritua ki tēnei rīhi, ka mau tonu te wehenga", tana tāpiri mai. I kī tētahi atu kairīhi kei te rangirua tonu te wā heke. ""Kāore anō mātou kia kōrerotia i mua i tā mātou i rongo ai i mua. He kairīhi mātau, ā, kāore mātou i te mōhio ki hea mātou e tū ana". I tīmata tētahi whakaaro e toru marama i tērā marama i muri i te whakaingoatanga o ngā kaihoko manako ki te whakawhanake i te pānga i a Hōngongoi. I tukuna e United Utilities me RSPB Cymru mō ngā puringa ahuwhenua i runga i te pānga, i te wā i tapaina ko FIM Sustainable Timber and Energy LP he kaihoko manako mō te ngahere arumoni. He tokomaha nga tāngata o te rohe i pūrua i tētahi tono tāwhai a te kaipāngai mirionea o Para, o Rhys Jones. 'Fabulous bids' Ted Pearce, Director of Property for Severn Trent, said Friday was an opportunity for a really good open session with the community of people around Vyrnwy. "He tino pai tā mātou urupare, he tino taonga ki a mātou. We were really pleased to see the level of engagement which we've had here today," said Mr Pearce. "He tono tino pai tā mātou, he tokomaha o rātou e hari ana mātou ki te mahi tahi," tana whakamārama. "Mō tēnei rawa utu nui, i whakaaro noa mātou he pai ake te tono mai i UU [United Utilities] me RSPB. E whakamahia ana rātau ki te mahi i ngā pānga whenua nui o tēnei āhua," te kī a Tēnā Pearce. "Kua whakamahia rātou ki te mahi ki ngā hapori, ā, he whakaaro nui tā rātou." 'Wāhi whakamīharo' I kōrero a Daniel Jenkins-Jones, te upoko o ngā take tūmatanui me RSPB Cymru, mō te tono hono. I kī a ia e tiritiri ana rātau i to rātau kitenga mo te whakahaeretanga ā muri ake o te pānga. "Mā te haere ki tētahi rīhi wā roa ake ka taea e mātou ngā mahere pai ake, mārō ake mō te wā heke," te kī a Tēnā Jenkins-Jones. I whakapuakina e ia te hiranga o te mahi tahi me te iwi o te rohe. "We want their input so it's a shared vision for the estate. Ka taea e au te kī atu ka ngana mātou ki te pato ki ngā 250,000 e haere ana ki tēnei wāhi whakamīharo, ā, ka hoatu ki a rātou ngā take kia noho roa ake, kia nui ake te moni. Ka puta mai ngā mahi i tēnā," te kī a Tēnā Jenkins-Jones. Ka whakarato a United Utilities i ngā ratonga wai me te wai parakore ki ngā tāngata e tata ana ki te whitu miriona tāngata i te raki o Ingarangi, e whakarato ana i ngā kāinga neke atu i te toru miriona me ngā kāinga pakihi neke atu i te 400,000. Ko ngā wāhanga o te māra o te Roto o Vyrnwy e tukuna ana hei rīhi e whai wāhi ana ki te parenga motuhake, ā, kei roto ko ngā Pae Pūtaiao Motuhake, he Wāhi Parenga Motuhake mō ngā manu me tētahi Wāhi Atawhai Motuhake mō ōna wāhi noho tuawhenua.

title: Ka whakatau ngā kaiheke ki te toa i te hongere Ingarihi
summary: E huna ana i muri i tētahi pokapū tākaro nui i tētahi tapa taone kāore i te whakaahuatia o Cherbourg, e takoto ana tētahi puni kaiheke noa iho ki tētahi rōpū Hūnihi i whakapono ko te tauranga i konei te whakautu.
text: Nā Te Rongokōrero o Te Rongokōrero, ki te raki o Wīwī Ko ta rātau pātai tēnei: kei hea rātau e tū ai te wā tino pai ki te whakaoti i te haerenga i tīmataria e rātau i ngā marama maha ki mua mai i o rātau kāinga tupu i Awhekenetāna? I te whakamātautau, i rahua hoki ki te puta i te haumarutanga whakarei huri noa i te tauranga o Te Tauranga me te Kauhanga Hongere, ka whakatau rātau kia haere tata ki te 500km (310 maero) ki te hauauru ki Normandy i runga i te whakapono ka ngāwari kē atu te pakaru i te haumarutanga i Cherbourg. A, ko te tikanga o tēnā ka tae atu ki Ingarangi e huna ana i roto i tētahi taraka, i runga i tētahi waka waka e whakawhiti ana i te Hongere. Engari ehara i te mea. "I kī mai tētahi ki a au he ngāwari, engari i konei he uaua ake," te kī a Aotearoa. "He haumarutanga, ā, he kāmera C KKK i ngā wāhi katoa, nā reira he tino uaua ki te uru ki roto i tētahi motokā, taraka rānei, kātahi ki roto i tētahi kaipuke ka haere ki Ingarangi." Ahakoa e kī ana a Aotearoa kāore anō ia kia whakatata atu ki a ia e ngā kaiwhaiwhai e tuku wāhi ana i runga poti iti kia tae ki te takutai Ingarihi, ā, kāore e mahia tonutia nā te mea e whakaaro ana ia he mōrearea rawa, te āhua nei kei te whakamatautauria ētahi kaiheke me ngā hunga whakaruru e tēnei kōwhiringa mōrearea. I te tauranga o Carteret i te koiora o Cherbourg, ka kōrero mai nga kaihīika ki a au mo tētahi mahi i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau i whakamātau ai tētahi rōpū kaiheke ki te eke ki tētahi poti motokā me te whakaaro mārama kia tae ki te Motu o Hongere o Jersey. Engari i mau rātau e nga pirihimana. He pēhea te pirihimana o te rohe o UK-Wīwī? Ka tomo te pūrākau kaiheke o Uropi ki te wāhanga hou: Hekenga i roto i ngā tūtohi, ā, i roto i ngā wiki e rua kua taha, e toru ngā mahi e pā ana ki ngā Arapia me ngā Ārepa e rere ana ki te uaua i runga i ngā poti pīrahi i te takutai ki te tonga o Ingarangi. I roto i tētahi puni kaiheke nui e tata ana ki Dunkirk, ka kī mai tētahi mema rangatira o te iwi o Kurīhi ki a au e mōhio ana ia ki ngā tāngata i reira kua tino hiahia ki te mau poti iti puta noa i te Hongere. Engari he tawhiti rawa atu i te mārama e hia e tino mahi ana i tēnei i ngā mōrea e pā ana ki ngā mōrea me te nui o ngā moni e whakapaea ana e nga kaiwhaiwhai. E whakaae ana nga mana Wīwī o te rohe he torutoru noa iho ngā take o a rātau kaitiaki taiwhenua e whakaora ana i ngā kaiheke i roto i ngā poti iti, engari e mōhio ana kei te iti tonu ngā tau. Ko Franck Dhersin, te rangatira o Teteghem tata ki Dunkirk, e whakaiti ana i ngā uauatanga o te whakatere i te Hongere me ōna au kaha, ngā hau me ngā oneone. E tautohe ana a ia ka tere te kite i ngā kaiwhaiwhai e ngana ana ki te hoko poti motokā i Wīwī. Ko te whakamātautau mēnā he tika, he whakaaro hiahia rānei tēnei i ngā marama e heke mai nei o te raumati.

title: Ka whatu ngā kaiwhakahaere i te Royal Manx Show 'tino angitu'
summary: Kua karangatia e ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Whakaaturanga Ahuwhenua o Royal Manx te takahanga he "tino angitu" i te mea neke atu i te 18,000 ngā tāngata i tae mai.
text: Ko te whakaaturanga pāmu e rua rā i Knockaloe Farm i Patrick e whakanui ana i te 60 tau o tana whakamana Kingi, ahakoa i tū tuatahitia i te tau 1858. I kī a Hēkeretari a Christine Pain: "I waimarie mātau ki te rā, ā, i tino hari mātou i te hurihanga o te iwi whānui o Manx ki te tautoko i te whakaaturanga." I karaunatia te pūru Hereford a te kaiahuwhenua o Sulby, a Derek Griffin, hei toa tino toa. I oti i a ia tētahi wikitōria rua mō Tēnā Griffin me tana pūru Polled Hereford e rima tau, i muri i te wikitōria o tērā marama i te whakaaturanga ki te tonga. 'Tino harikoa' te kī a Tēnā Griffin: "E tino hari ana ahau ki te toa. He tino nui te tikanga o te whiwhi i tēnei whakawhiwhinga." E puritia ana te pūru ki te pāmu o Tāne Griffin i te raki o te motu. I tāpiri mai a Mrs Pain: "E tino manaakitia ana mātau ki te whai i te taitara Ariki i runga i to mātau ingoa. " Kāore anō kia maha nga rōpū ahuwhenua Ariki i te UK, ā, he hōnore nui ki a mātau tēnei hōnore mo te 60 tau. "E tino pai ana mātau ki te huihuinga nui i huri ki te tautoko. He takahanga tino pai tēnei, ā, ka huihui mai te katoa ki te hākinakina i ngā āhuatanga rerekē katoa o te whakaaturanga." E hia rau ngā kararehe mai i te motu katoa i whakaurua ki ngā karaehe maha i roto i ngā rā e rua. I kī te perehitini o te whakaaturanga, a Hōne Kelly: "E tino whakahīhī ana ahau ki te perehitini engari he tino mahi tīma, ā, me mihi ahau ki ngā tūao whakamīharo katoa kua tino angitu anō te whakaaturanga i tēnei tau. " He takahanga tino pai tēnei, ā, i tino whakaaturia te tino pai i roto i te pāmu, ngā hua me ngā mahi a Manx." Tae atu ki ngā kararehe, he maha ngā whakaaturanga o ngā mīhini tauhira, o nāianei, o ngā motokā tawhito, tae atu ki tētahi mākete pāmu. Tērā anō ngā whakaaturanga a ētahi o ngā kaieke BMX me ngā kaieke reti o te ao, me te toa enduro o te ao, a David Knight.

title: I kitea he kurī tāhae i Leicester 100 maero mai i te kāinga
summary: Kua kitea tētahi kurī i paiheretia ki muri o tētahi motokā i mua i tōna rangatira, tata ki te 100 maire (160 km) te mamao atu i Aotearoa.
text: I tāhaetia a Mia, he Bichon Frise, i a Arama Harcup e tata ana ki tōna kāinga i Wraysbury i Berkshire. I tīmataria e ia me tōna whānau tētahi whakahau pāpāho pāpori kia mauria mai ia ki te kāinga tata ki te rima wiki ki mua. I kī a Tēnā Harcup i "ohorere" a ia i tana waea mai i tētahi katipa kurī ki te kī kua kitea a Mia. Ka kī a ia: "I whakararuraru katoa mātau. I ohorere mātau kātahi anō ka tāhaetia e tētahi ta mātau kurī. "I oma ahau ki roto i te whare ki te tiki i aku kī motokā hei whai i a rātou, engari kāore au i mōhio ki hea rātau i haere ai. " I waea mātau ki nga pirihimana, a, ka hoatu he kawenga karere ki Facebook. He tāngata mātau e tiritiri ana i ngā whakairinga i te roa me te whānui o te whenua." I te 11 o Me, ka kī a ia i whiwhi waea mai i tētahi katipa kurī o Te Kurī i karapa i tana moroiti i muri i tana kitenga e kopikopiko ana i nga tiriti. "I taraiwa ahau i te ata a tērā ata ki te tiki i a ia," tana kī. "I runga i te marama [nga tamariki]. He āhua paruparu a ia, nā reira ka hoatu e mātau he whakangāwari ki a ia. "Engari kāore au i te whakaaro kua pāngia ia e taua mea - kei te whanonga a ia me te mea kāore he mea i puta, ā, kātahi anō ia ka haere i te hararei. " Mehemea ka taea e ngā kurī anake te kōrero, ka taea e ia te kōrero mai ki a mātau he aha te mea i haere."

title: Te tumuaki o te Puhi-Kimi: Hui tuarua i te mutunga o Hui tanguru
summary: Me tūtaki te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump ki te kaiārahi Kōria ki te Raki o Kimi Rangi-un mō tētahi tūnga tuarua i te mutunga o Hui tanguru, e kī ana te Whare Mā.
text: I puta mai te pānuitanga i muri i te tūtakitanga a Tēnā Puhi ki te kaiwhakarite o Kōria ki te Raki, o Kimi Yong-chol i te Whare Mā. I tūmanakotia kia tukua e ia he reta mai i a Kimi Rangi-un ki a Tēnā Puhi. He iti noa iho te kauneketanga i mahia i runga i te whakawāteatanga mai i to rātau tihi hītori i Hōroa i tērā o Pipiri. Kāore anō kia pānuitia he wāhi mō te tihi hou. Kai te whakatū te taurangi ka taea te tū ki Vietnam. Ko te haerenga o Kimi Yong-chol ki Washington te tohu tuatahi o te nekeneke i roto i te matauranga karihi me Kōrea ki te Raki mō ngā marama, ko ngā pūrongo a te tari kāwanatanga o TE Kāwanatanga o Aotearoa. Kāore i te mārama he aha te reta i pūrongotia mai i a Kimi Rangi-un. Engari i tūmanakohia kia whakatakotoria te papa mo tētahi atu tihi, ka tāpiritia e to mātau korero. I kī a Perehitini Trump e tatari ana a ia ki nga kōrero. I kī tana hēkeretari pēhi a Sarah Sanders i muri i te hui o te Whare Mā ka haere tonu te kauneketanga i roto i ngā kōrero mo te whakawāteatanga, engari i tāpiri mai: "Ka haere tonu te Hononga o Amerika ki te pupuri i te pēhanga me ngā whakaaetanga ki Kōrea ki te Raki." He aha te mea i pā mai i te tihi whakamutunga? Kaore i tino nui te whakaaetanga i te tihi o Hōroa, nā reira he iti noa iho te angitu o te ine. Kua tūponotia ngā whakaritenga karihi i waenganui i Washington me Ūngia, kāore he pūkete taipitopito o ngā pūkenga karihi o Kōria ki te Raki, ā, kei te mau tonu ngā whakaaetanga. Heoi anō, kua arokē a Tēnā Kimi ki te whakarewa i tōna whakaahua huri noa. Kua pai ake tana whanaungatanga ki Kōrea ki te Tonga, ā, kua whakangaromia e ngā whenua e rua ngā pou ārai i te rohe ārai nui - me te utu haere ki ngā whenua o tētahi. Te āhua nei kua pai ake hoki ngā here i waenganui i Kōrea ki te Raki me Haina, ā, he maha nga haerenga a Tēnā Kimi ki Beijing ki te tūtaki i a Perehitini Xi. He aha te mea i tutuki i te tihi o Hōroa? He hītori te tihi mo te mea i pā mai - engari i runga i te pepa, ko ngā mea katoa i tutuki i a ia he whakaaetanga kīanga hārangirangi i whakaae ai ngā whenua e rua ki te mahi ki te whakawāteatanga. Kāore anō kia tino whakamāramatia he aha te tikanga o te whakawāteatanga - kāore i roto i te whakaaetanga ētahi rārangi wā, ngā taipitopito, ngā tikanga rānei hei manatoko i tēnei tukanga. Mēnā he tihi tuarua, he tokomaha e tatari ana kia puta mai tētahi mea raima ake. Kāore e taea e Kōria ki te Raki me te US te haere atu ki te karanga i tētahi atu whakaaetanga hārangirangi. Kei hea te hōtaka karihi o Kōria ki te Raki i tēnei wā? Kāore anō a Kōria ki te Raki kia whakahaere i tētahi whakamātautau tūroro mai i te tihi. Kua wetewetehia hoki tētahi wāhi whakamātau karihi me tētahi pūkaha mīhini tūroro matua. Heoi anō, i whakamātauria e ia tētahi rākau takahanga "hangarau tiketike" hou i Whiringa ā Rangi - tana pūrongo whaimana tuatahi o tētahi whakamātautau rākau i roto i te tau. Heoi anō, kāore tēnei i tangohia hei tohu i tētahi tuma nui. Engari kāore tonu i te mārama e hia ngā pūkenga karihi e tīari tonu ana i Kōrea ki te Raki. I kitea e tētahi pūrongo i muri i te tihi o tērā tau te whānuitanga o te whatunga tūroro o Kōria ki te Raki. Heoi anō, ehara tēnei i te takahi i te whakaaetanga o Hōroa - nā te mea kāore anō a Kōria ki te Raki kia whakatū i te whanaketanga rākau, ki te whakaweto rānei i ōna turanga tūroro. Ka puta tonu te tihi hou? Ko te tikanga. Te āhua nei e hiahia ana ngā taha e rua kia puta. Ko te tihi whakamutunga he rōra i roto i a ia anō - i whakakorea, kātahi ka tīmata anō i muri i tētahi reta i tukuna e te ringa ki a Tēnā Puhi mai i a Tēnā Kimi. Ehara i te mea e kore e taea te pā mai anō tētahi mea ōrite - me tatari noa tātou kia kite. Heoi anō, i tēnei wā, te āhua nei kua tae wawe mai tētahi reta.

title: Rānana 2012: Ka whiwhi hōnore a Jade Jones rāua ko Ellie Simmonds
summary: Kua whiwhi ngā whetū o te Omirangi o Rānōna, a Jade Jones rāua ko Ellie Simmonds, i a rāua MBE me te OBE i tētahi hui i Te Whare o Buckingham.
text: I hoatu e Piriniha Charles ki nga toa koura e rua o rātau hōnore. I kī te tauwhāinga Taekwodo Jones, mai i Flint, i te 19 o ona tau ka noho ko te toa koura pōtiki o Uēra i Rāwāhi 2012, he "wā tino whakahīhī". I karangatia e Simmonds o Swansea, mai i Walsall, he "whakamīharo" me tētahi "huarahi pai ki te whakamutu i tētahi tau nui". I puta mai a Jones, e 20 ināianei, hei tētahi o ngā whetū nui rawa o Rāwāhi 2012 i tana toa i te kāwai wāhine -57kg i te taekwondo i Aotearoa. I whakawhiwhia ngā kaitākaro e rua ki ngā hōnore o te Tau Hōu i muri i to rāua āwhina ki te Omirangi me ngā Paralympics. 'Hōnore nui' I muri iho, ka kī a Jones: "He tino pai, he ngāwari hoki te kōrerorero ki a Piriniha Charles." "I kī a ia he tino hākinakina e ia te Omirangi, ā, e hiahia ana ia kia waimarie ahau mō te wā heke. " I te tuatahi i whakaaro ahau kāore au e whakamīharo, nā te mea he tamariki anō ahau, engari i taku taenga mai ki konei ka ngana ahau ki te tango katoa. "It's just a great honour and it's something that will stay with me for the rest of my life, so I'm really proud of it." I whakawhiwhia ki a Simmonds, e whakangungu ana i te puna wai o Swansea, ā, he MBE kē, he OBE mō ngā ratonga ki te tākaro Paralympic. 'Arotahi panuku' I tāpiritia e te tau 18 tau ki ana koura e rua o Pēhi me te rua anō i Rāwāhi 2012. Ahakoa i āmaimai a ia i mua i te takahanga, i kī a ia he "whakamīharo" te whakahonore. "He tino pai te hākari," tana kī. "I kī mai a ia (Prince Charles) 'Pai ki tō kauhoe', ā, ka pātai mai ia he aha taku arotahi panuku, nā reira he tino pai. " I kī ahau e iwa ngā wā i te wiki mō te 18 haora, ā, ko taku arotahi panuku ko ngā Whakataetae o te Ao i tēnei tau i Kānata." I whakaahuatia e Simmonds, nāna i kī ko tana whāinga mo te wā roa panuku ko ngā kēmu 2016 o Te Aotearoa, te whiwhi i tana OBE hei tāpiri i te 12 marama angitu. "He huarahi pai ki te whakamutu i tētahi tau nui, kia noho ki tētahi wāhi tawhito, ki Te Whare o Buckingham," tana kī. "He tau tino pai tērā tau i Rānana, nā reira he tino pai te noho anō ki Rānana ki te tiki i tēnei."

title: Whitby: E hia rau ngā mahi i waihangatia i Woodsmith Mine
summary: E rua rau ngā mahi e hangaia ana e tētahi kamupene e whakawhanake ana i tētahi maina potash nui i Te Raki o Aotearoa.
text: Kei te totohu a Anglo American Crop Nutrients i ngā maina nui e rua kia uru ki ngā putunga o te toa polyhalite kotahi maero te hōhonu i tōna maina Woodsmith tata ki Whitby. Ina tukatukatia ka hokona huri noa ki nga kaiahuwhenua hei maniua maori. Kei roto i ngā tūranga ko ngā kaipūkaha tohunga ki ngā kaimahi hanganga kāore i te tohunga, ā, i kī te umanga e tūmanako ana kia haere te maha o ngā mahi ki ngā tāngata paetata. Ko Sirius Minerals, te umanga nāna i whakahaere te maina i mua, i tangohia e Anglo America i Mati 2020. I kī te umanga ka wātea ngā tūranga i ngā wāhanga i ngā marama e heke mai nei, ā, ka whakaurua ngā mahi e mahi hāngai ana mō ngā kaikirimana o Amerika me ngā kaikirimana hanganga. Kei te totohu a Anglo American i ngā poka e rua kia uru ai ki te toa polyhalite e takoto ana neke atu i te maero i raro i te mata mā te whakamahi i ngā mīhini poka nui. Ina oti te maina, ka mauria mai te kohuke ki runga i te poka whakanao, ā, ka whakawhitia ki te kauhanga waka kohuke, māna e kawe te toa i runga i tētahi tātua kawe whenua e 23 maero te roa ki tētahi tipu tukatuka i Teesside. I kī a Haimona Kata, te Āpiha Whanaketanga Matua o te Kaupapa Woodsmith: "He wā tino mīharo tēnei mō te kaupapa, ā, he wā tino pai mō ngā tāngata tika. " He mahi uaua, ā, me kaha te mahi tikanga, ngā pūkenga mahi ā-rōpū me ngā pūkenga whakawhitiwhiti, me te āhua pai ki te haumaru. "Engari he mahi tino whai hua hoki - he mahi ka kōrerotia e koe ki ō mokopuna." Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: BG Group to sell stake in Brazil's Comgas for $1.8bn
summary: Kua pānuitia e te kaiwhakanao korohū o UK BG Group tētahi mahi hei hoko i tōna tūnga i roto i ngā Comgas o Parīhi ki Cosan ā-Sao Paulo mō te $1.8bn (£1.1bn).
text: I kī a HONONGA e tūmanako ana kia oti te mahi i te mutunga o te tau. I pūrongotia hoki e te rōpū he pana i roto i ngā hua o te koata tuatahi, i peke ki te $2.2bn mai i te $1.4bn i te tau i mua. I piki te moni hua 20% ki te $5.8bn. I whakarewaina ngā hua e te nui ake o te whakanaotanga me ngā utu pūngao "pakari". "Kua tino kaha ake ngā hua pūtea o te Rōpū HONONGA i te koata tuatahi, ā, me te whakanaotanga hōu e haere mai ana, he kauneketanga anō i runga i ā mātou kaupapa nui, me te angitu haere tonu o te hōpara, ka noho mārō tonu mātou ki te whakaoti i ā mātou whāinga mo te wā roa," te kī a Tā Frank Chapman, te rangatira nui o te Rōpū HONONGA. I kī a ia ka hokona e te kamupene ētahi atu rawa kia wātea ai te moni. "E tūpato ana mātou ki te whakamutu i te mahi [a Comgas] hei wāhanga o ā mātou mahere ki te tuku i ētahi $5bn o te pūmatua i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei mā ngā whakawāteatanga rautaki."

title: Coronavirus: 450 ngā mahi i raro i te tuma i te kamupene Celtic Manor o Newport
summary: Tata ki te haurua o ngā mahi tata ki te 1,000 i tētahi o ngā hōtēra rongonui o Wales ka ngaro nā te pānga o te mate Covid-19 ki te wāhanga tāpoi.
text: I kī atu ngā rangatira i te Kohinga Celtic i Newport, nāna i whakatū te Kapu Ryder o te korowha i te tau 2010 me te Hui NATO 2014, kia whakakorea e 450 o ōna whakairinga e 995. Ko te kamupene, nā te piriona tuatahi o Weera, ko Tā Terry Māti, tētahi o ngā kaitukumahi nui o Newport. Kua tukuna he reta ki ngā kaimahi pāngia. I kii te Kawanatanga o Welsh ka whakapuaki te minita tuatahi i nga huringa i te Paraire, kia neke atu i te toru wiki, ka kite i nga waahanga o nga manuhiri, manaakitanga, whakangahau me nga mahi tuuruhi o Wales ka whakatuwhera ano. Kua katia te hōtēra whetū e rima mai i te tīmatanga o te raka coronavirus i te 23 o Poutūterangi, ā, ina whakatuwhera anō i te 14 o Hōngongoi, ka mahia anake "i raro i ngā kaha whakaheke me ngā pūkenga whāiti e hāngai ana ki ngā aratohu haumaru hei whakaiti i te mōrea o te coronavirus". "E mārama ana ka pā tonu te mate Covid-19 ki te ōhanga o te ao, to tātau iwi me ngā mahi haere, tāpoi me ngā takahanga mō ngā marama maha e haere ake nei," te kī a tētahi kōrero kamupene. "Me hanga anō e te Kohinga Celtic tana umanga kia tika ai mō te wā heke. " Na te tino whakahekenga o ngā nohoanga me ngā moni hua, kāore tōna tauira pūtea o nāianei i te tautoko," tana kī. He aha te Kohinga Celtic? E 650 ngā rūma moe o te Kohinga Celtic puta noa i ngā pae hōtēra e whā - tae atu ki te taunga matua e 400 rūma moe - i te wā kei te hangaia tētahi atu hōtēra pūtea 154 rūma i Langstone pātata i te taha o te komititanga Coldra o te M4. I whakatuwheratia te £83m International Convention Centre Wales i tērā tau - he mahi ngātahi me te Kāwanatanga o Welsh - i runga i tētahi pae 2,000 eka e titiro atu ana ki te huanui M4 i te rāwhiti o Newport. Ko te wāhi 5,000-kaha, i hangaia ki tētahi pūtea a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e £22.5m, i whakamanamana i tētahi ahiahi me te whetū whitiāhua o Hollywood, a Arnold Schwarzenegger hei tētahi o ana takahanga tuatahi i muri i te whakatuwheratanga i te marama o Mahuru 2019. Kei roto hoki i te kōpaki e toru ngā akoranga korowha, he maha ngā wharekai, e rua ngā spa, he whare noho whenua, he whare kōhungahunga tamariki me tētahi papa tākaro mātātoa. He pēhea i tino rongonuitia ai? I hokona e Tā Terry, te tuawhā o ngā tangata rangatira o Wales me te rawa e £1.24bn, te Whare Manor me te wāhi hōhipera o mua i te tau 1980. Ko te kaimahi hiko 77 tau, i whānau mai i te Hōhipera Kohanga o Lydia Beynon tawhito i June 1943, i huri i te rohe hei tētahi o ngā hōtēra rongonui me ngā matatini korowha o UK. I hangaia e ia e toru ngā akoranga korowha whakataetae - tae atu ki te akoranga hou Rua Tekau mō te Kapu Ryder 2010, he takahanga whakaaturanga ā-rua e tākaro ai ngā kaitākaro korowha tino pai o Uropi i te tino pai mai i Te Hononga o Amerika. Ko ngā kaiwhakangahau pēnei i ngā kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata o Ant me Dec, ko te kaitapere o Karaihe ko Michael Douglas, ko te kaiwaiata Amerika ko Meat Loaf me te comedian Rob Brydon kua whetū ki te whakataetae korowha ā-tau o te hōtēra. Engari ko te pānga o te mate coronavirus, ko te tikanga o te rōpū Celtic Manor me mahi i te "whakataunga tino uaua" ki te tīmata ki te kōrero ki ngā kaimahi mō te whakahōutanga. 'Ngā hua ohaoha whakararuraru' "I takea tēnei whika i runga anō i ngā rāhuitanga o nāianei e karapoti ana i te manaakitanga me te tāpoi," i tāpiritia e te tauākī Celtic Manor. "Tērā pea ka tino heke te tapeke ki te whakaae kia whakatuwhera anō ētahi atu o ā mātou pūkenga i te wā whakaaro." E kī ana te kamupene "e tino pouri ana ki te mahi i tēnei mahi hei urupare ki ngā hua ohaoha kino" o te taiepa coronavirus. I tāpiritia e te Celtic Manor "e mārama ana ki te pānga nui o tēnei ki ngā oranga o ngā mema o te tīma pāngia me ō rātou whānau". "Ka mahia ngā mea katoa e taea ana hei tautoko i te hunga pāngia, ā, kua uru tētahi pae tauwhitiwhiti kaimahi ki te tukanga whakataunga," tāpiritia te kōrero. He aha te tauhohenga? I karanga a Lorraine Gaskell, o te GMB, ki a Tā Terry ki te āwhina. "He rongo wehi tēnei mō Newport," tana kī. "This workforce has helped to make Terry Matthews the first billionaire in Wales, so we think it's only right that in these unprecedented times, he puts his hand into his very well lined pocket and keeps the staff on furlough." I tapaina e ia te whakataunga "kite poto, nanakia hoki". "Ina pahemo tēnei mate urutā, ka hiahiatia e ia ō rātou pūkenga, te mahi uaua me te ngākau nui ki te pupuri i te Celtic Manor Resort hei tētahi o ngā wāhi matua o Wales." I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e "mahi ana i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e mātou hei āwhina" ā, kua whakakīa te mōkī tautoko pakihi "tino māhorahora" i te UK. "Ahakoa e pōhiritia ana te whakatau a te kāwanatanga o UK ki te whakaheke i te mokatere VAT i te wāhanga manaakitanga, ka tono tonu mātou mō ngā kaupapa parenga mahi ā-wāhanga mō ngā wāhanga pēnei i te tāpoi, te manaakitanga me ngā takahanga e kati tonu ana, e tino pāngia ana rānei e ngā tikanga Covid-19," te kī a te kaikōrero.

title: Ko te hōia o te SAS mai i Hereford i tautuhia mo te haupae takitahi puta noa i te Atarangi
summary: Ko tētahi hōia SAS o mua e hiahia ana ki te "hoe moana" mō te 30 tau, kua tautuhia ki te whakawhiti i te Atarangi ki te Raki anake.
text: I kī a Īna Awa, mai i Hereford, kāore anō kia tutuki tētahi haupae takitahi kāore i tautokona i waenganui i Niu Ioka me ngā Moutere o Scilly, ā, he "mātātoa pono". I whakamahia e Tēnā Awa, e whakamahi ana i te sextant me ngā whetū hei whakatere, i te āhua o te ao hei kaiārahi i a ia e mawhiti ana i muri i tana kahakina i a ia e mahi ana i Hiria. Ko tana haupae takitahi, e kapi ana i te 3,500 maero (5,632 km), mō ngā aroha e rua. "Kei te kitea e au he mātātoa pono, ā, pērā ki tētahi mahinga pono, e kore rawa koe e mōhio ki te hua kia tae rā anō koe ki reira, ā, koia tonu te take e mahi ana ahau," tana kī. E 27 tau a Tēnā Rivers, e 27 tau i roto i te hōia, e kohi moni ana mō te Special Air Service Regimental Association (SASRA) me te Hospice o Hato Mikaera i Hereford. I kī a ia he aroha "mātauranga" rāua tahi, ā, e tūmanako ana hoki ki te whakaara i te mōhiotanga ki ngā uauatanga hauora hinengaro e anga ana ki ngā kaimahi hōia me ngā hōia. I a ia i te kura, ka kī a ia, i whakaaetia ia e tētahi kaiako papawhenua, ā, ka "whakangāwari i ngā mahere me ngā kāpehu", ā, nā taua whakaterenga taketake i "mau i a au i roto i taku mahi hōia". I kī a Tēnā Awa i āwhina hoki i a ia kia ora i a ia e mahi ana hei kaitohutohu haumaru i Hiria i te tau 2013, ā, i pehipehi tana tīma. Ka titiro a ia ki ngā tohu māori, pēnei i te āhua o ngā rākau e whakawhirinaki ana ki te rā me te pūkohu i runga i ngā toka i roto i ngā rā e toru e haere ana puta noa i te whenua. "Nā aua tohu māori i homai ki a au te atatohu ki te raki me te wāhi haumaru i Tāke," tana kī. I te tīmatanga o tana mahi hōia, ka tīmata a Tēnā Rivers, nāna i tīmata tana haere a tērā marama, i te wā i noho ai ia i te Royal Citadel i Plymouth i te tīmatanga o tana mahi hōia.
