"I used to look out across Plymouth Sound and think one day I'll actually hoe across from New York back to the UK," he said. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Haupae Sentinel

title: Tikanga waea: Me pēhea e kore ai e ngaro hoa
summary: Ko rātou te mea tuatahi e tirohia ana e te tokomaha o tātau i te ata, ko te mea whakamutunga i te pō. E kore rawa a mātau waea e tawhiti atu i to mātau taha, ā, kei te taki mātou i ia 12 meneti, e ai ki a Ofcom.
text: Nā Marie JacksonBBC News He take aroha tērā e āhua nei kua tautuhia kia mutu, nā reira e rima ngā ture o te whakamahi waea e tika ana kia mātakina - mai i te kore waea i te wā hapa ki te whakaweto i te takiputa. Kaua koe.... 1. Kōrero i runga i te waea i ngā wā kai He tino kāo mō te nuinga (81%) o tātau - engari ko te haurua o tātau kua noho tahi me ētahi atu kua mahia. Neke atu i te hauwhā (26%) o ngā taitamariki pakeke e whakaae ana. "Ko te tikanga kia weto tonu rātau, kia ngaro atu i te tirohanga i te wā o te kai, i ngā hui me ngā rōpū," e tohe ana a Taiana Mather, o te tohutohu o te Tikanga Ingarihi. "Ko te tangata kei a koe te tangata tino hira. Kaore tētahi o tātau e tino nui." Ā, mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakatika i ngā mea e taea ana e ia mō ngā pātahitanga, ka purua e ngā tamariki a Gareth Southgate - a rātau waea ki tētahi taha i te wā o te kai a te tīma, ā, ohorere ana ka tae atu ki te haurua whakamutunga o te Kapu o te Ao. He mea noa iho? Āe, tērā pea. Engari ahakoa te titiro ki te mata i te tēpu kai kāore i te kā - mō ētahi. Neke atu i te whā i roto i te rima ngā tāngata e 55 neke atu rānei te pakeke e whakaaro ana kāore e whakaaetia te taki whakamōhiotanga, i whakaritea ki te haurua (46%) o te 18 ki te 34 tau. 2. Whakarongo ki ngā pūoro nui i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui Ko taua taiapa tīni mai i te tēka o runga o te pahi e auē ana i tētahi tukuoro pūkoro - e mōhiotia ana ko te sodcasting. Ka pā hoki ki te mātakitaki ataata me te tākaro nui i ngā kēmu ataata, me te whakarongo ki ngā pūoro. E toru hauwhā (76%) o tātau e whakahē ana - engari kāore e aukati i a tātau ki te mahi. 3. Kia noho ki te waea i te wā e whakarongo ana koe Kei te tae koe engari i runga i te waea i waenganui o te kōrerorero. E whakairi ana koe, e kī atu ana kia ora" me te pōkai atawhai i ō parāoa me ō clementines - ka kōrerorero rānei ahakoa he aha? He pūtake o te pōrearea mō te tokomaha o ngā kaimahi toa, kaiwhiwhi me te kaiwaiata. I te kaha o te riri o tētahi kaimahi taki o Sainsbury i te whakakāhoretanga a tētahi kiritaki ki te whakamutu i tana waea, kāore a ia i whakaae ki te mahi ki a ia. Ka whakapāha te hokomaha. "He tino āhuaatua te kuputuhi me te kōrero," te kī a te tohunga tikanga o Diana Mather. "He kararehe tonu mātau - ko ngā pheromones, te charisma, te aura - ki te kore mātou e arotahi tētahi ki tētahi, kei te moumou mātou i tētahi wā nui kia mōhio pai ake ai tētahi ki tētahi." Tērā pea i hapa ngā hoa mahi o John McDonnell ki te mōhio pai ake ki te tumuaki kōruru i tēnei wātū o Commons. He kōrero tāna i runga i te Tauākī Ngahuru 2016 - engari kāore ōna hoa mahi katoa i hopu i aua pheromones. 4. Hīkoi i a rātau e titiro ana ki tō waea Kua whakararo ō rātou māhunga, kua tīhorea ngā whatu ki te mata - ā, kei tō ara tonu rātou. Kei roto koe i te karanga Titiro ake! Titiro ake! Engari kāo - ko te slalom ara anō - e karo ana i ngā kaiwaewae i te rohe waea. Ā, he whakatūpato tūmatanui tā @tiredhorizon kaiwhakamahi Twitter mō rātou. Purua ō waea ki ngā whare tūmatanui, ki ngā hōhipera, ki ngā taraka whakamuri hoki. E whakaahua ana a ia i te pana i ngā ipu nunui huri noa i a rātou, ā, kua kite i a rātou e whakararuraru ana i ngā kaitiaki e pana ana i ngā tūroro i roto i ngā moenga hōhipera. Ehara i te pai. 5. Raweke i ngā pūrere i a koe e mātakitaki ana i te pouaka whakaata me ētahi atu Te āhua nei kei te whakaritea tēnei ture. E whā i roto i te 10 (41%) ngā pakeke e whakaaro ana e kore e whakaaetia te whakamahi waea i a rātou e kōpikopiko ana me te whānau i runga i te sofa i mua i a Strictly. Mō te whakatupuranga pakeke ake (ērā neke atu i te 55) he nui ake te take - 62% e whakahē ana - i te taitamariki - kotahi anake i roto i te rima e raruraru ana.

title: HMP Wealstun: E 200 ngā toronga waka tūroro o te whare herehere i roto i te 6 marama i runga i ngā rongoā
summary: Neke atu i te 200 ngā wā i karangatia ai ngā waka tūroro i roto i te ono marama ki ngā mahi e pā ana ki te rongoā i te whare herehere, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo.
text: I kī ngā kaitirotiro i rahua a HMP Wealstun i West Yorkshire ki te rutu i te "raruraru nui". E 820 ngā tāngata e pupuri ana i te whare herehere whakangungu kāwai C me te whare herehere noho tata ki Wetherby. I kī te Ratonga Whare Herehere me te Ratonga Whakamātautau e "mahi uaua ana ki te whakatau i te take rongoā". I kī a Pita Clarke, te kaitirotiro matua o ngā whare herehere, he pai te mahinga o te whare herehere, engari i tāpiri mai: "Na te wātea o ngā rongoā kore mana i whakararuraru i te nuinga o ngā mea e ngana ana te whare herehere ki te whakatutuki." I kī a ia e 69% o ngā herehere i kī atu ki ngā kaitirotiro he ngāwari noa iho te whiwhi rongoā, ā, tata ki te hauwhā o ngā herehere katoa i kī kua whiwhi rātau i tētahi tikanga rongoā mai i te tomokanga ki te whare herehere. I whakaingoatia tēnei e Tēnā Clarke he "whika whakamīharo i te wā poto i noho ai te tokomaha o ngā herehere i reira". 'Whakaora mai i te whakapeka' I kī a ia: "Kua āta arotahi ahau ki te maha o ngā ngoikoretanga matua, nā te mea i whakararurarutia e rātou te nuinga o ngā mahi tino pai e mahia ana i Wealstun. " He iti noa iho taku rangirua mēnā ka whakatauria ngā wāhi matua o te whakarato rongoā kore mana me te rahunga ki te aromatawai i ngā mōrea, ka taea e Wealstun te whakaora i te hekenga o ngā kōeke mai i te tirohanga whakamutunga, ā, ka neke atu ki te mahi pai ake i ngā hiahia o ōna herehere." I whakamihi a ia ki ngā whakapainga o ngā āhuatanga ora me te rongoā, engari i whakatūpato hoki te pūrongo kua ono ngā taumata tūkino i a ia anō mai i te tirohanga whakamutunga. I kī a Phil Copple, te tumuaki mō ngā whare herehere i te Whare Herehere me te Ratonga Whakamātautau: "Kei te kaha te mahi a te Kāwana me tana tīma ki te whakatau i te take rongoā i HMP Wealstun. " Kei te whakapakari te matawai X-ray hōu i te haumarutanga, ā, kei te mahi ngātahi te whare herehere me ngā pirihimana ki te hopu i aua kawenga." Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.
